SCENE:
Rousillon; Paris; Florence; Marseilles


ACT I. SCENE 1.
Rousillon. COUNT'S palace

Enter BERTRAM, COUNTESS ROUSILLON, HELENA, LAFEU, black

  COUNTESS. delivering son me, bury husband.
  BERTRAM. going, madam, weep o'er father's death anew;
    attend Majesty's command, in
    ward, evermore subjection.
  LAFEU. find King husband, madam; you, sir, a
    father. generally times good of
    necessity hold virtue you, worthiness stir it
    wanted, lack such
    abundance.
  COUNTESS. hope Majesty's amendment?
  LAFEU. hath abandon'd physicians, madam; whose
    practices hath persecuted time hope, finds other
    advantage process losing hope time.
  COUNTESS. young gentlewoman father- O, 'had,' how
    sad passage 'tis!-whose skill great his
    honesty; stretch'd far, made nature  
    immortal, death play lack work. Would, for
    King's sake, living! death of
    King's disease.
  LAFEU. call'd man speak of, madam?
  COUNTESS. famous, sir, profession, his
    great so- Gerard de Narbon.
  LAFEU. excellent indeed, madam; King spoke
    admiringly mourningly; skilful have
    liv'd still, knowledge set mortality.
  BERTRAM. it, good lord, King languishes of?
  LAFEU. fistula, lord.
  BERTRAM. heard before.
  LAFEU. notorious. gentlewoman the
    daughter Gerard de Narbon?
  COUNTESS. sole child, lord, bequeathed my
    overlooking. hopes good education
    promises; dispositions inherits, makes fair gifts
    fairer; unclean mind carries virtuous qualities,
    commendations pity-they virtues traitors
    too. simpleness; derives  
    honesty, achieves goodness.
  LAFEU. commendations, madam, tears.
  COUNTESS. 'Tis brine maiden season praise in.
    remembrance father approaches heart the
    tyranny sorrows takes livelihood cheek. No
    this, Helena; to, more, thought
    affect sorrow have-
  HELENA. affect sorrow indeed, too.
  LAFEU. Moderate lamentation dead: excessive
    grief enemy living.
  COUNTESS. living enemy grief, excess makes it
    mortal.
  BERTRAM. Madam, desire holy wishes.
  LAFEU. understand that?
  COUNTESS. thou blest, Bertram, succeed thy father
    manners, shape! Thy blood virtue
    Contend empire thee, thy goodness
    Share thy birthright! Love all, trust few,
    wrong none; thine enemy
    power use, thy friend  
    thy life's key; check'd silence,
    tax'd speech. heaven will,
    thee furnish, prayers pluck down,
    Fall thy head! Farewell. lord,
    'Tis unseason'd courtier; good lord,
    Advise him.
  LAFEU. best
    attend love.
  COUNTESS. Heaven bless him! Farewell, Bertram.            Exit
  BERTRAM. wishes forg'd thoughts be
    servants you!  [To HELENA]  comfortable mother, your
    mistress, make her.
  LAFEU. Farewell, pretty lady; hold credit your
    father.                             Exeunt BERTRAM LAFEU
  HELENA. O, all! father;
    great tears grace remembrance more
    shed him. like?
    forgot him; imagination
    Carries favour in't Bertram's.
    undone; living, none,  
    Bertram away. 'Twere one
    love bright star
    wed it, me.
    bright radiance collateral light
    comforted, sphere.
    Th' ambition love plagues itself:
    hind mated lion
    die love. 'Twas pretty, plague,
    hour; sit draw
    arched brows, hawking eye, curls,
    heart's table-heart capable
    line trick sweet favour.
    gone, idolatrous fancy
    sanctify relics. here?

                       Enter PAROLLES

    [Aside]  him. love sake;
    notorious liar,
    great fool, solely coward;  
    fix'd evils sit fit him
    place virtue's steely bones
    bleak i' th' cold wind; withal, full oft see
    Cold wisdom waiting superfluous folly.
  PAROLLES. Save you, fair queen!
  HELENA. you, monarch!
  PAROLLES. No.
  HELENA. no.
  PAROLLES. meditating virginity?
  HELENA. Ay. stain soldier you; a
    question. Man enemy virginity; barricado it
    him?
  PAROLLES. out.
  HELENA. assails; virginity, valiant the
    defence, weak. Unfold warlike resistance.
  PAROLLES. none. Man, setting you, will
    undermine blow up.
  HELENA. Bless poor virginity underminers blowers-up!
    military policy virgins blow men?
  PAROLLES. Virginity blown down, man quicklier blown  
    up; marry, blowing again, breach yourselves
     made, lose city. politic commonwealth
    nature preserve virginity. Loss virginity rational
    increase; virgin till virginity first
    lost. made metal make virgins. Virginity
    lost ten times found; kept, it
    lost. 'Tis cold companion; with't.
  HELENA. stand 't little, die a
    virgin.
  PAROLLES. 't; 'tis rule
    nature. speak part virginity accuse your
    mothers; infallible disobedience. hangs
    virgin; virginity murders itself, be
    buried highways, sanctified limit, desperate
    offendress nature. Virginity breeds mites, a
    cheese; consumes paring, dies with
    feeding stomach. Besides, virginity peevish, proud,
    idle, made self-love, inhibited sin the
    canon. not; choose lose by't. with't.
    ten year make ten, goodly  
    increase; principal worse. Away
    with't.
  HELENA. do, sir, lose liking?
  PAROLLES. see. Marry, ill ne'er likes.
    'Tis commodity lose gloss lying; longer kept,
    worth. with't 'tis vendible; answer time
    request. Virginity, courtier, wears cap of
    fashion, richly suited unsuitable; brooch and
    toothpick, wear now. date your
    pie porridge cheek. virginity,
    virginity, French wither'd pears: it
    ill, eats drily; marry, 'tis wither'd pear; was
    better; marry, 'tis wither'd pear. you
    it?
  HELENA. virginity yet.
    master thousand loves,
    mother, mistress, friend,
    phoenix, captain, enemy,
    guide, goddess, sovereign,
    counsellor, traitress, dear;  
    humble ambition, proud humility,
    jarring concord, discord dulcet,
    faith, sweet disaster; world
    pretty, fond, adoptious christendoms
    blinking Cupid gossips. he-
    shall. God send well!
    court's learning-place, one-
  PAROLLES. one, i' faith?
  HELENA. well. 'Tis pity-
  PAROLLES. pity?
  HELENA. wishing body in't
    felt; we, poorer born,
    baser stars shut wishes,
    effects follow friends
    show think, never
    Returns thanks.

                      Enter PAGE

  PAGE. Monsieur Parolles, lord calls you.      Exit PAGE  
  PAROLLES. Helen, farewell; remember thee, will
    thee court.
  HELENA. Monsieur Parolles, born charitable star.
  PAROLLES. Mars, I.
  HELENA. think, Mars.
  PAROLLES. Man?
  HELENA. wars hath born
    Mars.
  PAROLLES. predominant.
  HELENA. retrograde, think, rather.
  PAROLLES. so?
  HELENA. backward fight.
  PAROLLES. advantage.
  HELENA. running away, fear proposes safety: the
    composition valour fear makes virtue of
    good wing, wear well.
  PAROLLES. full business answer thee acutely. I
    return perfect courtier; instruction shall
    serve naturalize thee, thou wilt capable courtier's
    counsel, understand advice thrust thee;  
    thou diest thine unthankfulness, thine ignorance makes
    thee away. Farewell. thou hast leisure, thy prayers;
    thou hast none, remember thy friends. thee good
    husband thee. So, farewell.
 Exit
  HELENA. remedies oft lie,
    ascribe heaven. fated sky
    free scope; doth backward pull
    slow designs dull.
    power mounts love high,
    makes see, feed mine eye?
    mightiest space fortune nature brings
    join likes, kiss native things.
    Impossible strange attempts those
    weigh pains sense, suppose
    hath be. strove
    show merit miss love?
    King's disease-my project deceive me,
    intents fix'd, leave me.        Exit




ACT I. SCENE 2.
Paris. KING'S palace

Flourish cornets. Enter KING FRANCE, letters,
and divers ATTENDANTS

  KING. Florentines Senoys th' ears;
    fought equal fortune, continue
    braving war.
  LORD. 'tis reported, sir.
  KING. Nay, 'tis credible. receive it,
    certainty, vouch'd cousin Austria,
    caution, Florentine move us
    speedy aid; dearest friend
    Prejudicates business, seem
    make denial.
  LORD. love wisdom,
    Approv'd Majesty, plead
    amplest credence.
  KING. hath arm'd answer,
    Florence denied comes;
    Yet, gentlemen  
    Tuscan service, freely leave
    stand part.
  LORD. serve
    nursery gentry, sick
    breathing exploit.
  KING. here?

              Enter BERTRAM, LAFEU, PAROLLES

  LORD. Count Rousillon, good lord,
    Young Bertram.
  KING. Youth, thou bear'st thy father's face;
    Frank nature, curious haste,
    Hath compos'd thee. Thy father's moral parts
    Mayst thou inherit too! Paris.
  BERTRAM. duty Majesty's.
  KING. corporal soundness now,
    thy father friendship
    soldiership. far
    service time,  
    Discipled bravest. lasted long;
    haggish age steal on,
    wore act. repairs me
    talk good father. youth
    wit observe
    To-day young lords; jest
    Till scorn return unnoted
    Ere hide levity honour.
    courtier, contempt bitterness
    pride sharpness; were,
    equal awak'd them; honour,
    Clock itself, knew true minute when
    Exception bid speak, time
    tongue obey'd hand. him
    us'd creatures place;
    bow'd eminent top low ranks,
    Making proud humility
    poor praise humbled. man
    copy younger times;
    Which, well, demonstrate  
    goers backward.
  BERTRAM. good remembrance, sir,
    Lies richer thoughts tomb;
    approof lives epitaph
    royal speech.
  KING. him! say-
    Methinks hear now; plausive words
    scatter'd ears, grafted them
    grow there, bear- 'Let live'-
    good melancholy oft began,
    catastrophe heel pastime,
    out-'Let live' quoth he
    'After flame lacks oil, snuff
    younger spirits, apprehensive senses
    things disdain; judgments are
    Mere fathers garments; constancies
    Expire fashions.' wish'd.
    I, him, too,
    wax honey bring home,
    quickly dissolved hive,  
    give labourers room.
  LORD. loved, sir;
    lend lack first.
  KING. fill place, know't. long is't, Count,
    physician father's died?
    fam'd.
  BERTRAM. months since, lord.
  KING. living, yet-
    Lend arm-the rest worn out
    applications. Nature sickness
    Debate leisure. Welcome, Count;
    son's dearer.
  BERTRAM. Majesty.                 Exeunt [Flourish]




ACT I. SCENE 3.
Rousillon. COUNT'S palace

Enter COUNTESS, STEWARD, CLOWN

  COUNTESS. hear; gentlewoman?
  STEWARD. Madam, care content wish
    found calendar past endeavours; we
    wound modesty, make foul clearness deservings,
    publish them.
  COUNTESS. knave here? gone, sirrah. The
    complaints heard believe; 'tis my
    slowness not, lack folly commit
    ability make knaveries yours.
  CLOWN. 'Tis unknown you, madam, poor fellow.
  COUNTESS. Well, sir.
  CLOWN. No, madam, 'tis poor, of
    rich damn'd; ladyship's good will
    world, Isbel woman may.
  COUNTESS. Wilt thou beggar?
  CLOWN. beg good case.
  COUNTESS. case?  
  CLOWN. Isbel's case mine own. Service heritage; I
    blessing God till issue o'
    body; bames blessings.
  COUNTESS. thy reason thou wilt marry.
  CLOWN. poor body, madam, requires it. driven the
    flesh; devil drives.
  COUNTESS. worship's reason?
  CLOWN. Faith, madam, holy reasons, are.
  COUNTESS. world them?
  CLOWN. been, madam, wicked creature, flesh
    blood are; and, indeed, marry repent.
  COUNTESS. Thy marriage, sooner thy wickedness.
  CLOWN. o' friends, madam, hope friends for
    wife's sake.
  COUNTESS. friends thine enemies, knave.
  CLOWN. Y'are shallow, madam-in great friends; knaves come
    aweary of. ears land
    spares team, leave crop. his
    cuckold, drudge. comforts wife the
    cherisher flesh blood; cherishes flesh  
    blood loves flesh blood; loves flesh blood
    friend; ergo, kisses wife friend. men
    contented are, fear in
    marriage; young Charbon puritan Poysam the
    papist, howsome'er hearts sever'd religion, their
    heads one; jowl horns deer
    i' th' herd.
  COUNTESS. Wilt thou foul-mouth'd calumnious knave?
  CLOWN. prophet I, madam; speak truth way:

              ballad repeat,
                men full true find:
              marriage destiny,
                cuckoo sings kind.

  COUNTESS. gone, sir; talk anon.
  STEWARD. you, madam, bid Helen you.
    speak.
  COUNTESS. Sirrah, gentlewoman speak her; Helen
    mean.  
  CLOWN.  [Sings]

               'Was fair face cause' quoth she
                 'Why Grecians sacked Troy?
               Fond done, fond,
                 King Priam's joy?'
               sighed stood,
               sighed stood,
                 gave sentence then:
               'Among bad good,
               bad good,
                 good ten.'

  COUNTESS. What, good ten? corrupt song, sirrah.
  CLOWN. good woman ten, madam, purifying o' th'
    song. God serve world year! find
    fault tithe-woman, parson. ten,
    quoth 'a! good woman born blazing
    star, earthquake, 'twould mend lottery well: man
    draw heart ere 'a pluck one.
  COUNTESS. gone, sir knave, command you.  
  CLOWN. man woman's command, hurt done!
    honesty puritan, hurt; will
    wear surplice humility black gown big heart.
    going, forsooth. business Helen hither.
 Exit
  COUNTESS. Well, now.
  STEWARD. know, madam, love gentlewoman entirely.
  COUNTESS. Faith do. father bequeath'd me; she
    herself, advantage, lawfully make title as
    love finds. owing paid; and
    paid demand.
  STEWARD. Madam, late she
    wish'd me. was, communicate own
    words ears; thought, dare vow her, they
    touch'd stranger sense. matter was, loved your
    son. Fortune, said, goddess, put such
    difference betwixt estates; Love god, not
    extend qualities level; Diana queen
    virgins, suffer poor knight surpris'd without
    rescue assault, ransom afterward.  
    deliver'd bitter touch sorrow e'er heard
    virgin exclaim in; held duty speedily acquaint you
    withal; sithence, loss happen, concerns you
    it.
  COUNTESS. discharg'd honestly; yourself.
    likelihoods inform'd before, hung so
    tott'ring balance nor
    misdoubt. Pray leave me. Stall bosom; I
    honest care. speak further
    anon.                                           Exit STEWARD

                            Enter HELENA

    young.
    nature's, ours; thorn
    Doth rose youth rightly belong;
    blood us, blood born.
    show seal nature's truth,
    love's strong passion impress'd youth.
    remembrances days foregone,  
    faults, thought none.
    eye sick on't; observe now.
  HELENA. pleasure, madam?
  COUNTESS. know, Helen,
    mother you.
  HELENA. Mine honourable mistress.
  COUNTESS. Nay, mother.
    mother? 'a mother,'
    Methought serpent. 'mother'
    start it? mother,
    put catalogue those
    enwombed mine. 'Tis seen
    Adoption strives nature, choice breeds
    native slip foreign seeds.
    ne'er oppress'd mother's groan,
    express mother's care.
    God's mercy, maiden! curd thy blood
    thy mother? matter,
    distempered messenger wet,
    many-colour'd Iris, rounds thine eye?  
    Why, daughter?
  HELENA. not.
  COUNTESS. mother.
  HELENA. Pardon, madam.
    Count Rousillon brother:
    humble, honoured name;
    note parents, noble.
    master, dear lord is; I
    servant live, vassal die.
    brother.
  COUNTESS. mother?
  HELENA. mother, madam; were-
    lord son brother-
    mother! mothers,
    care heaven,
    sister. other,
    But, daughter, brother?
  COUNTESS. Yes, Helen, daughter-in-law.
    God shield not! 'daughter' 'mother'
    strive pulse. What! pale again?  
    fear hath catch'd fondness. see
    myst'ry loneliness, find
    salt tears' head. sense 'tis gross
    love son; invention asham'd,
    proclamation thy passion,
    thou dost not. true;
    then, 'tis so; for, look, thy cheeks
    Confess it, th' th' other; thine eyes
    grossly shown thy behaviours
    kind speak it; sin
    hellish obstinacy tie thy tongue,
    truth suspected. Speak, is't so?
    so, wound goodly clew;
    not, forswear't; howe'er, charge thee,
    heaven work thine avail,
    truly.
  HELENA. Good madam, pardon me.
  COUNTESS. love son?
  HELENA. pardon, noble mistress.
  COUNTESS. Love son?  
  HELENA. love him, madam?
  COUNTESS. about; love hath in't bond
    Whereof world takes note. Come, come, disclose
    state affection; passions
    full appeach'd.
  HELENA. confess,
    knee, high heaven you,
    you, high heaven,
    love son.
    friends poor, honest; so's love.
    offended, hurts him
    lov'd me; follow not
    token presumptuous suit,
    till deserve him;
    desert be.
    love vain, strive hope;
    captious intenible sieve
    pour waters love,
    lack lose still. Thus, Indian-like,
    Religious mine error, adore  
    sun worshipper
    more. dearest madam,
    hate encounter love,
    loving do; yourself,
    aged honour cites virtuous youth,
    true flame liking
    chastely love dearly Dian
    Love; O, then, give pity
    state choose
    lend give lose;
    seeks find search implies,
    But, riddle-like, lives sweetly dies!
  COUNTESS. intent-speak truly-
    Paris?
  HELENA. Madam, had.
  COUNTESS. Wherefore? true.
  HELENA. truth; grace swear.
    father left prescriptions
    rare prov'd effects, reading
    manifest experience collected  
    general sovereignty; will'd me
    heedfull'st reservation bestow them,
    notes faculties inclusive were
    note. rest
    remedy, approv'd, set down,
    cure desperate languishings whereof
    King render'd lost.
  COUNTESS. motive
    Paris, it? Speak.
  HELENA. lord son made this,
    Paris, medicine, King,
    conversation thoughts
    Haply absent then.
  COUNTESS. you, Helen,
    tender supposed aid,
    receive it? physicians
    mind: he, him;
    They, help. credit
    poor unlearned virgin, schools,
    Embowell'd doctrine,  
    danger itself?
  HELENA. in't
    father's skill, great'st
    profession, good receipt
    legacy sanctified
    th' luckiest stars heaven; and, honour
    give leave success, venture
    well-lost life mine Grace's cure.
    day hour.
  COUNTESS. Dost thou believe't?
  HELENA. Ay, madam, knowingly.
  COUNTESS. Why, Helen, thou shalt leave love,
    Means attendants, loving greetings
    mine court. stay home,
    pray God's blessing thy attempt.
    to-morrow; this,
    thee thou shalt miss.          Exeunt

ACT II. SCENE 1.
Paris. KING'S palace

Flourish cornets. Enter KING divers young LORDS taking leave
for Florentine war; BERTRAM PAROLLES; ATTENDANTS

  KING. Farewell, young lords; war-like principles
    throw you. you, lords, farewell;
    Share advice betwixt you; gain all,
    gift doth stretch 'tis receiv'd,
    both.
  LORD. 'Tis hope, sir,
    well-ent'red soldiers, return
    find Grace health.
  KING. No, no, be; heart
    confess owes malady
    doth life besiege. Farewell, young lords;
    live die, sons
    worthy Frenchmen; higher Italy-
    bated inherit fall
    monarchy-see  
    woo honour, wed it; when
    bravest questant shrinks, find seek,
    fame cry aloud. farewell.
  LORD. Health, bidding, serve Majesty!
  KING. girls Italy, heed them;
    French lack language deny,
    demand; beware captives
    serve.
    BOTH. hearts receive warnings.
  KING. Farewell.  [To ATTENDANTS]  me.
                                       KING retires attended
  LORD. O sweet lord, stay us!
  PAROLLES. 'Tis fault, spark.
    LORD. O, 'tis brave wars!
  PAROLLES. admirable! wars.
  BERTRAM. commanded coil with
    'Too young' year' "Tis early.'
  PAROLLES. thy mind stand 't, boy, steal bravely.
  BERTRAM. stay forehorse smock,
    Creaking shoes plain masonry,  
    Till honour bought up, sword worn
    dance with. heaven, steal away.
  LORD. honour theft.
  PAROLLES. Commit it, Count.
  LORD. accessary; farewell.
  BERTRAM. grow you, parting tortur'd body.
  LORD. Farewell, Captain.
  LORD. Sweet Monsieur Parolles!
  PAROLLES. Noble heroes, sword kin. Good sparks and
    lustrous, word, good metals: find regiment of
    Spinii Captain Spurio, cicatrice, emblem of
    war, sinister cheek; sword
    entrench'd it. live; observe reports me.
  LORD. shall, noble Captain.
  PAROLLES. Mars dote novices!       Exeunt LORDS
    ye do?

                            Re-enter KING

  BERTRAM. Stay; King!  
  PAROLLES. spacious ceremony noble lords; have
    restrain'd list cold adieu. more
    expressive them; wear cap the
    time; muster true gait; eat, speak, move, the
    influence receiv'd star; devil lead
    measure, followed. them, more
    dilated farewell.
  BERTRAM. so.
  PAROLLES. Worthy fellows; prove sinewy sword-men.
                                     Exeunt BERTRAM PAROLLES

                              Enter LAFEU

  LAFEU.  [Kneeling]  Pardon, lord, tidings.
  KING. fee thee stand up.
  LAFEU. man stands brought pardon.
    kneel'd, lord, mercy;
    bidding stand up.
  KING. had; broke thy pate,
    ask'd thee mercy for't.  
  LAFEU. Good faith, across!
    But, good lord, 'tis thus: cur'd
    infirmity?
  KING. No.
  LAFEU. O, eat
    grapes, royal fox? Yes, will
    noble grapes, royal fox
    reach them: medicine
    breathe life stone,
    Quicken rock, make dance canary
    spritely fire motion; simple touch
    powerful araise King Pepin, nay,
    give great Charlemain pen in's hand
    write love-line.
  KING. this?
  LAFEU. Why, Doctor She! lord, arriv'd,
    her. Now, faith honour,
    convey thoughts
    light deliverance, spoke
    sex, years, profession,  
    Wisdom, constancy, hath amaz'd more
    dare blame weakness. her,
    demand, business?
    done, laugh me.
  KING. Now, good Lafeu,
    Bring admiration, the
    spend too, thine
    wond'ring thou took'st it.
  LAFEU. Nay, fit you,
    day neither.                       Exit LAFEU
  KING. special prologues.

                   Re-enter LAFEU HELENA

  LAFEU. Nay, ways.
  KING. haste hath wings indeed.
  LAFEU. Nay, ways;
    Majesty; mind him.
    traitor like; traitors
    Majesty seldom fears. Cressid's uncle,  
    dare leave together. Fare well.            Exit
  KING. Now, fair one, business follow us?
  HELENA. Ay, good lord.
    Gerard de Narbon father,
    profess, found.
  KING. knew him.
  HELENA. spare praises him;
    Knowing enough. On's bed death
    receipts gave me; chiefly one,
    Which, dearest issue practice,
    experience th' darling,
    bade store triple eye,
    Safer mine two, dear. so:
    And, hearing high Majesty touch'd
    malignant honour
    dear father's gift stands chief power,
    tender it, appliance,
    bound humbleness.
  KING. you, maiden;
    credulous cure,  
    learned doctors leave us, and
    congregated college concluded
    labouring art ransom nature
    inaidable estate-I not
    stain judgment, corrupt hope,
    prostitute past-cure malady
    empirics; dissever so
    great credit esteem
    senseless help, past sense deem.
  HELENA. duty pay pains.
    enforce mine office you;
    Humbly entreating royal thoughts
    modest bear back again.
  KING. give thee less, call'd grateful.
    Thou thought'st me; give
    death live.
    full know, thou know'st part;
    knowing peril, thou art.
  HELENA. hurt try,
    set rest 'gainst remedy.  
    greatest works finisher
    Oft weakest minister.
    holy writ babes hath judgment shown,
    judges babes. Great floods flown
    simple sources, great seas dried
    miracles greatest denied.
    Oft expectation fails, oft there
    promises; oft hits
    hope coldest, despair fits.
  KING. hear thee. Fare thee well, kind maid;
    Thy pains, us'd, thyself paid;
    Proffers reap reward.
  HELENA. Inspired merit breath barr'd.
    things knows,
    'tis square guess shows;
    presumption when
    heaven count act men.
    Dear sir, endeavours give consent;
    heaven, me, make experiment.
    impostor, proclaim  
    level mine aim;
    think, sure,
    art past power past cure.
  KING. Art thou confident? space
    Hop'st thou cure?
  HELENA. greatest Grace lending grace.
    Ere horses sun bring
    fiery torcher diurnal ring,
    Ere murk occidental damp
    Moist Hesperus hath quench'd sleepy lamp,
    twenty times pilot's glass
    Hath told thievish minutes pass,
    infirm sound parts fly,
    Health live free, sickness freely die.
  KING. thy certainty confidence
    dar'st thou venture?
  HELENA. Tax impudence,
    strumpet's boldness, divulged shame,
    Traduc'd odious ballads; maiden's name
    Sear'd otherwise; ne worse worst-extended  
    vilest torture life ended.
  KING. Methinks thee blessed spirit doth speak
    powerful sound organ weak;
    impossibility slay
    common sense, sense saves way.
    Thy life dear; life rate
    Worth life thee hath estimate:
    Youth, beauty, wisdom, courage, all
    happiness prime happy call.
    Thou hazard intimate
    Skill infinite monstrous desperate.
    Sweet practiser, thy physic try,
    ministers thine death die.
  HELENA. break time, flinch property
    spoke, unpitied die;
    deserv'd. helping, death's fee;
    But, help, promise me?
  KING. Make thy demand.
  HELENA. make even?
  KING. Ay, sceptre hopes heaven.  
  HELENA. shalt thou give thy kingly hand
    husband thy power command.
    Exempted arrogance
    choose royal blood France,
    low humble propagate
    branch image thy state;
    one, thy vassal, know
    free ask, thee bestow.
  KING. hand; premises observ'd,
    Thy performance serv'd.
    make choice thy time, I,
    Thy resolv'd patient, thee rely.
    question thee, must,
    trust,
    thou cam'st, tended on. rest
    Unquestion'd undoubted blest.
    Give here, ho! thou proceed
    high word, deed match thy deed.
                                              [Flourish. Exeunt]




ACT II. SCENE 2.
Rousillon. COUNT'S palace

Enter COUNTESS CLOWN

  COUNTESS. on, sir; put height your
    breeding.
  CLOWN. show highly fed lowly taught. my
    business court.
  COUNTESS. court! Why, place make special, you
    put contempt? court!
  CLOWN. Truly, madam, God lent man manners, may
    easily put court. make leg, put off's
    cap, kiss hand, nothing, leg, hands, lip,
    cap; fellow, precisely, for
    court; me, answer serve men.
  COUNTESS. Marry, bountiful answer fits questions.
  CLOWN. barber's chair, fits buttocks-the pin
    buttock, quatch buttock, brawn buttock, buttock.
  COUNTESS. answer serve fit questions?
  CLOWN. fit ten groats hand attorney, your
    French crown taffety punk, Tib's rush Tom's
    forefinger, pancake Shrove Tuesday, morris Mayday,
    nail hole, cuckold horn, scolding
    quean wrangling knave, nun's lip friar's
    mouth; nay, pudding skin.
  COUNTESS. you, I, say, answer fitness all
    questions?
  CLOWN. duke beneath constable, fit
    question.
  COUNTESS. answer monstrous size fit
    demands.
  CLOWN. trifle neither, good faith, learned should
    speak truth it. is, belongs to't. me
    courtier: harm learn.
  COUNTESS. young again, could, fool in
    question, hoping wiser answer. pray you, sir,
    courtier?
  CLOWN. O Lord, sir!-There's simple putting off. More, more, a
    hundred them.
  COUNTESS. Sir, poor friend yours, loves you.
  CLOWN. O Lord, sir!-Thick, thick; spare me.  
  COUNTESS. think, sir, eat homely meat.
  CLOWN. O Lord, sir!-Nay, put to't, warrant you.
  COUNTESS. whipp'd, sir, think.
  CLOWN. O Lord, sir!-Spare me.
  COUNTESS. cry 'O Lord, sir!' whipping, 'spare
    me'? 'O Lord, sir!' sequent your
    whipping. answer whipping, were
    bound to't.
  CLOWN. ne'er worse luck life 'O Lord, sir!' see
    thing's serve long, serve ever.
  COUNTESS. play noble housewife time,
    entertain merrily fool.
  CLOWN. O Lord, sir!-Why, there't serves again.
  COUNTESS. end, sir! business: give Helen this,
    urge present answer back;
    Commend kinsmen son. much.
  CLOWN. commendation them?
  COUNTESS. employment you. understand me?
  CLOWN. fruitfully; legs.
  COUNTESS. Haste again.                              Exeunt




ACT II. SCENE 3.
Paris. KING'S palace

Enter BERTRAM, LAFEU, PAROLLES

  LAFEU. miracles past; philosophical
    persons make modern familiar things supernatural and
    causeless. make trifles terrors,
    ensconcing knowledge submit
    unknown fear.
  PAROLLES. Why, 'tis rarest argument hath shot
    times.
  BERTRAM. 'tis.
  LAFEU. relinquish'd artists-
  PAROLLES. say-both Galen Paracelsus.
  LAFEU. learned authentic fellows-
  PAROLLES. Right; say.
  LAFEU. gave incurable-
  PAROLLES. Why, 'tis; too.
  LAFEU. help'd-
  PAROLLES. Right; 'twere man assur'd a-
  LAFEU. Uncertain life death.  
  PAROLLES. Just; well; said.
  LAFEU. novelty world.
  PAROLLES. indeed. showing, shall
    read what-do-ye-call't here.
  LAFEU.  [Reading ballad title]  'A Showing Heavenly
    Effect Earthly Actor.'
  PAROLLES. it; same.
  LAFEU. Why, dolphin lustier. 'Fore me, speak in
    respect-
  PAROLLES. Nay, 'tis strange, 'tis strange; brief
    tedious it; facinerious spirit that
    acknowledge the-
  LAFEU. hand heaven.
  PAROLLES. Ay; say.
  LAFEU. weak-
  PAROLLES. debile minister, great power, great transcendence;
    should, indeed, give made alone
    recov'ry King, be-
  LAFEU. Generally thankful.
  
                 Enter KING, HELENA, ATTENDANTS

  PAROLLES. it; well. King.
  LAFEU. Lustig, Dutchman says. maid better,
    whilst tooth head. Why, lead a
    coranto.
  PAROLLES. Mort du vinaigre! Helen?
  LAFEU. 'Fore God, so.
  KING. Go, call lords court.
                                               Exit ATTENDANT
    Sit, preserver, thy patient's side;
    healthful hand, banish'd sense
    Thou repeal'd, time receive
    confirmation promis'd gift,
    attends thy naming.

                     Enter LORDS

    Fair maid, send thine eye. youthful parcel
    noble bachelors stand bestowing,  
    O'er sovereign power father's voice
    use. Thy frank election make;
    Thou hast power choose, forsake.
  HELENA. fair virtuous mistress
    Fall, love please. Marry, one!
  LAFEU. give bay Curtal furniture
    mouth broken boys',
    writ beard.
  KING. Peruse well.
    noble father.
  HELENA. Gentlemen,
    Heaven hath restor'd King health.
  ALL. understand it, heaven you.
  HELENA. simple maid, wealthiest
    protest simply maid.
    Majesty, already.
    blushes cheeks whisper me:
    'We blush thou shouldst choose; but, refused,
    white death sit thy cheek ever,
    ne'er again.'  
  KING. Make choice see:
    shuns thy love shuns love me.
  HELENA. Now, Dian, thy altar fly,
    imperial Love, god high,
    sighs stream. Sir, hear suit?
  LORD. grant it.
  HELENA. Thanks, sir; rest mute.
  LAFEU. choice throw ames-ace my
    life.
  HELENA. honour, sir, flames fair eyes,
    speak, threat'ningly replies.
    Love make fortunes twenty times above
    wishes, humble love!
  LORD. better, please.
  HELENA. receive,
    great Love grant; leave.
  LAFEU. deny her? sons mine have
    whipt; send th' Turk make eunuchs of.
  HELENA. afraid hand take;
    wrong sake.  
    Blessing vows; bed
    Find fairer fortune, wed!
  LAFEU. boys boys ice; her.
    Sure, bastards English; French ne'er 'em.
  HELENA. young, happy, good,
    make son blood.
  FOURTH LORD. Fair one, so.
  LAFEU. grape yet; thy father drunk wine-but
    thou be'st ass, youth fourteen; known
    thee already.
  HELENA.  [To BERTRAM]  dare you; give
    service, whilst live,
    guiding power. man.
  KING. Why, then, young Bertram, her; thy wife.
  BERTRAM. wife, liege! beseech Highness,
    business give leave use
    mine eyes.
  KING. Know'st thou not, Bertram,
    me?
  BERTRAM. Yes, good lord;  
    hope marry her.
  KING. Thou know'st rais'd sickly bed.
  BERTRAM. it, lord, bring down
    answer raising? well:
    breeding father's charge.
    poor physician's daughter wife! Disdain
    corrupt ever!
  KING. 'Tis title thou disdain'st her, which
    build up. Strange bloods,
    colour, weight, heat, pour'd together,
    confound distinction, stand off
    differences mighty. be
    virtuous-save thou dislik'st,
    poor physician's daughter-thou dislik'st
    virtue name; so.
    lowest place virtuous things proceed,
    place dignified doer's deed;
    great additions swell's, virtue none,
    dropsied honour. Good alone
    good name. Vileness so:  
    property go,
    title. young, wise, fair;
    nature heir;
    breed honour. honour's scorn
    challenges honour's born
    sire. Honours thrive
    acts derive
    fore-goers. mere word's slave,
    Debauch'd tomb, grave
    lying trophy; oft dumb
    dust damn'd oblivion tomb
    honour'd bones indeed. said?
    thou canst creature maid,
    create rest. Virtue she
    dower; honour wealth me.
  BERTRAM. love her, strive 't.
  KING. Thou wrong'st thyself, thou shouldst strive choose.
  HELENA. restor'd, lord, glad.
    rest go.
  KING. honour's stake; defeat,  
    produce power. Here, hand,
    Proud scornful boy, unworthy good gift,
    dost vile misprision shackle up
    love desert; canst dream
    We, poising defective scale,
    weigh thee beam; wilt know
    plant thine honour where
    grow. Check thy contempt;
    Obey will, travails thy good;
    thy disdain, presently
    thine fortunes obedient right
    thy duty owes power claims;
    throw thee care ever
    staggers careless lapse
    youth ignorance; revenge hate
    Loosing thee justice,
    terms pity. Speak; thine answer.
  BERTRAM. Pardon, gracious lord; submit
    fancy eyes. consider
    great creation dole honour  
    Flies bid it, find late
    nobler thoughts base now
    praised King; who, ennobled,
    'twere born so.
  KING. hand,
    thine; promise
    counterpoise, thy estate
    balance replete.
  BERTRAM. hand.
  KING. Good fortune favour King
    Smile contract; ceremony
    expedient now-born brief,
    perform'd to-night. solemn feast
    attend coming space,
    Expecting absent friends. thou lov'st her,
    Thy love's religious; else, err.
              Exeunt LAFEU PAROLLES stay behind,
                                      commenting wedding
  LAFEU. hear, monsieur? word you.
  PAROLLES. pleasure, sir?  
  LAFEU. lord master make recantation.
  PAROLLES. Recantation! Lord! master!
  LAFEU. Ay; language speak?
  PAROLLES. harsh one, understood bloody
    succeeding. master!
  LAFEU. companion Count Rousillon?
  PAROLLES. count; counts; man.
  LAFEU. count's man: count's master style.
  PAROLLES. old, sir; satisfy you, too
    old.
  LAFEU. thee, sirrah, write man; title age
    bring thee.
  PAROLLES. dare do, dare do.
  LAFEU. thee, ordinaries, pretty wise
    fellow; thou didst make tolerable vent thy travel; might
    pass. scarfs bannerets thee manifoldly
    dissuade believing thee vessel great burden. I
    found thee; lose thee care not; art
    thou good taking up; thou'rt scarce
    worth.  
  PAROLLES. Hadst thou privilege antiquity thee-
  LAFEU. plunge thyself anger, thou hasten thy
    trial; if-Lord mercy thee hen! So, good
    window lattice, fare thee well; thy casement open,
    thee. Give thy hand.
  PAROLLES. lord, give egregious indignity.
  LAFEU. Ay, heart; thou art worthy it.
  PAROLLES. not, lord, deserv'd it.
  LAFEU. Yes, good faith, ev'ry dram it; bate thee
    scruple.
  PAROLLES. Well, wiser.
  LAFEU. Ev'n thou canst, thou hast pull smack
    o' th' contrary. thou be'st bound thy scarf and
    beaten, thou shalt find proud thy bondage. I
    desire hold acquaintance thee, my
    knowledge, default 'He man know.'
  PAROLLES. lord, insupportable vexation.
  LAFEU. hell pains thy sake, poor doing
    eternal; past, thee, motion
    age give leave.                                 Exit  
  PAROLLES. Well, thou hast son disgrace me:
    scurvy, old, filthy, scurvy lord! Well, patient; there
    fettering authority. beat him, life, can
    meet convenience, double double a
    lord. pity age of-
    beat him, meet again.

                         Re-enter LAFEU

  LAFEU. Sirrah, lord master's married; news for
    you; mistress.
  PAROLLES. unfeignedly beseech lordship make some
    reservation wrongs. good lord: serve
    master.
  LAFEU. Who? God?
  PAROLLES. Ay, sir.
  LAFEU. devil thy master. dost thou garter up
    thy arms o' fashion? Dost make hose thy sleeves? other
    servants so? Thou wert set thy lower part thy nose
    stands. mine honour, hours younger, beat  
    thee. Methink'st thou art general offence, man should
    beat thee. thou wast created men breathe
    thee.
  PAROLLES. hard undeserved measure, lord.
  LAFEU. to, sir; beaten Italy picking kernel
    pomegranate; vagabond, true traveller;
    saucy lords honourable personages the
    commission birth virtue heraldry. are
    worth word, call knave. leave you.
 Exit

                           Enter BERTRAM

  PAROLLES. Good, very, good, then. Good, good; it
    conceal'd awhile.
  BERTRAM. Undone, forfeited cares ever!
  PAROLLES. matter, sweetheart?
  BERTRAM. solemn priest sworn,
    bed her.
  PAROLLES. What, what, sweetheart?  
  BERTRAM. O Parolles, married me!
    Tuscan wars, bed her.
  PAROLLES. France dog-hole, merits
    tread man's foot. th' wars!
  BERTRAM. letters mother; th' import know
    yet.
  PAROLLES. Ay, known. th' wars, boy, th'
      wars!
    wears honour box unseen
    hugs kicky-wicky home,
    Spending manly marrow arms,
    sustain bound high curvet
    Mars's fiery steed. regions!
    France stable; dwell in't jades;
    Therefore, th' war!
  BERTRAM. so; send house,
    Acquaint mother hate her,
    wherefore fled; write King
    durst speak. present gift
    furnish Italian fields  
    noble fellows strike. War strife
    dark house detested wife.
  PAROLLES. capriccio hold thee, art sure?
  BERTRAM. chamber advise me.
    send straight away. To-morrow
    wars, single sorrow.
  PAROLLES. Why, balls bound; noise it. 'Tis hard:
    young man married man marr'd.
    away, leave bravely; go.
    King wrong; but, hush, 'tis so.      Exeunt




ACT II. SCENE 4.
Paris. KING'S palace

Enter HELENA CLOWN

  HELENA. mother greets kindly; well?
  CLOWN. well, health; very
    merry, well. given, very
    well, i' th' world; well.
  HELENA. well, ail very
    well?
  CLOWN. Truly, indeed, things.
  HELENA. things?
  CLOWN. One, heaven, God send quickly!
    other, earth, God send quickly!

                        Enter PAROLLES

  PAROLLES. Bless you, fortunate lady!
  HELENA. hope, sir, good mine good
    fortunes.
  PAROLLES. prayers lead on; on,  
    still. O, knave, lady?
  CLOWN. wrinkles money, she
    say.
  PAROLLES. Why, nothing.
  CLOWN. Marry, wiser man; man's tongue shakes
    master's undoing. nothing, nothing, know
    nothing, nothing, great part your
    title, nothing.
  PAROLLES. Away! th'art knave.
  CLOWN. said, sir, 'Before knave th'art knave';
    'Before th'art knave.' truth, sir.
  PAROLLES. to, thou art witty fool; found thee.
  CLOWN. find yourself, sir, taught find
    me? search, sir, profitable; fool find
    you, world's pleasure increase of
    laughter.
  PAROLLES. good knave, i' faith, fed.
    Madam, lord to-night:
    business calls him.
    great prerogative rite love,  
    Which, due, time claims, acknowledge;
    puts compell'd restraint;
    want, delay, strew'd sweets,
    distil curbed time,
    make coming hour o'erflow joy
    pleasure drown brim.
  HELENA. else?
  PAROLLES. instant leave o' th' King,
    make haste good proceeding,
    Strength'ned apology think
    make probable need.
  HELENA. commands he?
  PAROLLES. That, obtain'd, presently
    Attend pleasure.
  HELENA. wait will.
  PAROLLES. report so.
  HELENA. pray you.                              Exit PAROLLES
    Come, sirrah.                                         Exeunt




ACT II. SCENE 5.
Paris. KING'S palace

Enter LAFEU BERTRAM

  LAFEU. hope lordship thinks soldier.
  BERTRAM. Yes, lord, valiant approof.
  LAFEU. deliverance.
  BERTRAM. warranted testimony.
  LAFEU. dial true; lark bunting.
  BERTRAM. assure you, lord, great knowledge,
    valiant.
  LAFEU. sinn'd experience transgress'd
    valour; state dangerous, I
    find heart repent. comes; pray you
    make friends; pursue amity

                         Enter PAROLLES

  PAROLLES.  [To BERTRAM]  things done, sir.
  LAFEU. Pray you, sir, tailor?
  PAROLLES. Sir!  
  LAFEU. O, well. Ay, sir; he, sir, 's good workman, a
    good tailor.
  BERTRAM.  [Aside PAROLLES]  King?
  PAROLLES. is.
  BERTRAM. to-night?
  PAROLLES. her.
  BERTRAM. writ letters, casketed treasure,
    order horses; to-night,
    possession bride,
    End ere begin.
  LAFEU. good traveller end dinner;
    lies three-thirds truth pass a
    thousand nothings with, heard thrice beaten.
    God save you, Captain.
  BERTRAM. unkindness lord you, monsieur?
  PAROLLES. deserved run lord's
    displeasure.
  LAFEU. made shift run 't, boots spurs all,
    leapt custard; run
    again, suffer question residence.  
  BERTRAM. mistaken him, lord.
  LAFEU. ever, at's prayers.
    Fare well, lord; me: no
    kernal light nut; soul man clothes;
    trust matter heavy consequence; them
    tame, natures. Farewell, monsieur; spoken
    deserve hand; we
    good evil.                              Exit
  PAROLLES. idle lord, swear.
  BERTRAM. so.
  PAROLLES. Why, him?
  BERTRAM. Yes, well; common speech
    worthy pass. clog.

                          Enter HELENA

  HELENA. have, sir, commanded you,
    Spoke King, procur'd leave
    present parting; desires
    private speech you.  
  BERTRAM. obey will.
    marvel, Helen, course,
    holds colour time, does
    ministration required office
    particular. Prepar'd not
    business; found
    unsettled. drives entreat you
    presently home,
    muse entreat you;
    respects seem,
    appointments need
    Greater shows view
    not. mother.
                                               [Giving letter]
    'Twill days ere you; so
    leave wisdom.
  HELENA. Sir, say
    obedient servant.
  BERTRAM. Come, come, that.
  HELENA.  
    true observance seek eke that
    homely stars fail'd
    equal great fortune.
  BERTRAM. go.
    haste great. Farewell; hie home.
  HELENA. Pray, sir, pardon.
  BERTRAM. Well, say?
  HELENA. worthy wealth owe,
    dare 'tis mine, is;
    But, timorous thief, fain steal
    law vouch mine own.
  BERTRAM. have?
  HELENA. Something; scarce much; nothing, indeed.
    would, lord.
    Faith, yes:
    Strangers foes sunder kiss.
  BERTRAM. pray you, stay not, haste horse.
  HELENA. break bidding, good lord.
  BERTRAM. men, monsieur?
    Farewell!                                        Exit HELENA  
    thou home, come
    Whilst shake sword hear drum.
    Away, flight.
  PAROLLES. Bravely, coragio!                             Exeunt

ACT III. SCENE 1.
Florence. DUKE's palace

        Flourish. Enter DUKE FLORENCE, attended; two
               FRENCH LORDS, TROOP SOLDIERS

  DUKE. that, point point, hear
    fundamental reasons war;
    great decision hath blood forth
    thirsts after.
  LORD. Holy quarrel
    Grace's part; black fearful
    opposer.
  DUKE. marvel cousin France
    business shut bosom
    borrowing prayers.
  LORD. Good lord,
    reasons state yield,
    common outward man
    great figure council frames
    self-unable motion; dare not
    it, found  
    incertain grounds fail
    guess'd.
  DUKE. pleasure.
  LORD. younger nature,
    surfeit ease, day day
    physic.
  DUKE. be
    honours fly us
    settle. places well;
    fall, avails fell.
    To-morrow th' field. Flourish.                     Exeunt




ACT III. SCENE 2.
Rousillon. COUNT'S palace

Enter COUNTESS CLOWN

  COUNTESS. hath happen'd it, save he
    her.
  CLOWN. troth, young lord melancholy
    man.
  COUNTESS. observance, pray you?
  CLOWN. Why, boot sing; mend ruff and
    sing; questions sing; pick teeth sing. a
    man trick melancholy sold goodly manor a
    song.
  COUNTESS. writes, means come.
                                              [Opening letter]
  CLOWN. mind Isbel court. ling
    Isbels o' th' country ling and
    Isbels o' th' court. brains Cupid's knock'd out;
    begin love, man loves money, stomach.
  COUNTESS. here?
  CLOWN. E'en there.                          Exit  
  COUNTESS.  [Reads]  'I daughter-in-law; hath
    recovered King undone me. wedded her, bedded
    her; sworn make "not" eternal. hear run
    away; report come. breadth enough
    world, hold long distance. duty you.
                                           unfortunate son,
                                                       BERTRAM.'
    well, rash unbridled boy,
    fly favours good king,
    pluck indignation thy head
    misprizing maid virtuous
    contempt empire.

                           Re-enter CLOWN

  CLOWN. O madam, yonder heavy news soldiers
    young lady.
  COUNTESS. -matter?
  CLOWN. Nay, comfort news, comfort; your
    son kill'd thought would.  
  COUNTESS. kill'd?
  CLOWN. I, madam, run away, hear the
    danger standing 't; loss men, be
    children. more. my
    part, hear son run away.                Exit

              Enter HELENA FRENCH GENTLEMEN

  GENTLEMAN. Save you, good madam.
  HELENA. Madam, lord gone, gone.
  GENTLEMAN. so.
  COUNTESS. patience. Pray you, gentlemen-
    felt quirks joy grief
    face neither, start,
    woman 't. son, pray you?
  GENTLEMAN. Madam, serve Duke Florence.
    met thitherward; came,
    And, dispatch hand court,
    Thither bend again.
  HELENA. letter, madam; passport.  
    [Reads]  'When thou canst ring finger, which
    off, show child begotten thy body
    father to, call husband; "then" I
    write "never."
    dreadful sentence.
  COUNTESS. Brought letter, gentlemen?
  GENTLEMAN. Ay, madam;
    contents' sake pains.
  COUNTESS. prithee, lady, cheer;
    thou engrossest griefs thine,
    Thou robb'st moiety. son;
    wash blood,
    thou art child. Florence he?
  GENTLEMAN. Ay, madam.
  COUNTESS. soldier?
  GENTLEMAN. noble purpose; and, 't,
    Duke lay honour
    good convenience claims.
  COUNTESS. Return thither?
  GENTLEMAN. Ay, madam, swiftest wing speed.  
  HELENA.  [Reads]  'Till wife, France.'
    'Tis bitter.
  COUNTESS. Find there?
  HELENA. Ay, madam.
  GENTLEMAN. 'Tis boldness hand haply, which
    heart consenting to.
  COUNTESS. France wife!
    good him
    she; deserves lord
    twenty rude boys tend upon,
    call hourly mistress. him?
  GENTLEMAN. servant only, gentleman
    known.
  COUNTESS. Parolles, not?
  GENTLEMAN. Ay, good lady, he.
  COUNTESS. tainted fellow, full wickedness.
    son corrupts well-derived nature
    inducement.
  GENTLEMAN. Indeed, good lady,
    fellow deal  
    holds have.
  COUNTESS. Y'are welcome, gentlemen.
    entreat you, son,
    sword win
    honour loses. entreat you
    Written bear along.
  GENTLEMAN. serve you, madam,
    worthiest affairs.
  COUNTESS. so, change courtesies.
    draw near?            Exeunt COUNTESS GENTLEMEN
  HELENA. 'Till wife, France.'
    France wife!
    Thou shalt none, Rousillon, France
    hast thou again. Poor lord! is't
    chase thee thy country, expose
    tender limbs thine event
    non-sparing war? I
    drive thee sportive court, thou
    Wast shot fair eyes, mark
    smoky muskets? O leaden messengers,  
    ride violent speed fire,
    Fly false aim; move still-piecing air,
    sings piercing; touch lord.
    shoots him, set there;
    charges forward breast,
    caitiff hold to't;
    kill not, cause
    death effected. 'twere
    met ravin lion roar'd
    sharp constraint hunger; 'twere
    miseries nature owes
    mine once. No; thou home, Rousillon,
    honour danger wins scar,
    oft loses all. gone.
    holds thee hence.
    stay 't? No, no, although
    air paradise fan house,
    angels offic'd all. gone,
    pitiful rumour report flight
    consolate thine ear. Come, night; end, day.  
    dark, poor thief, steal away.         Exit




ACT III. SCENE 3.
Florence. DUKE's palace

Flourish. Enter DUKE FLORENCE, BERTRAM, PAROLLES, SOLDIERS,
drum trumpets

  DUKE. General Horse thou art; we,
    Great hope, lay love credence
    thy promising fortune.
  BERTRAM. Sir, is
    charge heavy strength; yet
    strive bear worthy sake
    th' extreme edge hazard.
  DUKE. thou forth;
    Fortune play thy prosperous helm,
    thy auspicious mistress!
  BERTRAM. day,
    Great Mars, put thy file;
    Make thoughts, prove
    lover thy drum, hater love.                   Exeunt




ACT III. SCENE 4.
Rousillon. COUNT'S palace

Enter COUNTESS STEWARD

  COUNTESS. Alas! letter her?
    done
    sending letter? Read again.
  STEWARD.  [Reads]  'I Saint Jaques' pilgrim, thither gone.
    Ambitious love hath offended
    barefoot plod cold ground upon,
    sainted vow faults amended.
    Write, write, bloody war
    dearest master, dear son, hie.
    Bless home peace, whilst far
    zealous fervour sanctify.
    labours bid forgive;
    I, despiteful Juno, forth
    courtly friends, camping foes live,
    death danger dogs heels worth.
    good fair death me;
    embrace set free.'  
  COUNTESS. Ah, sharp stings mildest words!
    Rinaldo, lack advice much
    letting pass so; spoke her,
    diverted intents,
    hath prevented.
  STEWARD. Pardon me, madam;
    over-night,
    o'er ta'en; writes
    Pursuit vain.
  COUNTESS. angel shall
    Bless unworthy husband? thrive,
    prayers, heaven delights hear
    loves grant, reprieve wrath
    greatest justice. Write, write, Rinaldo,
    unworthy husband wife;
    word weigh heavy worth
    weigh light. greatest grief,
    feel it, set sharply.
    Dispatch convenient messenger.
    haply hear  
    return; hope she,
    Hearing much, speed foot again,
    Led pure love. both
    dearest skill sense
    make distinction. Provide messenger.
    heart heavy, mine age weak;
    Grief tears, sorrow bids speak.     Exeunt




ACT III. SCENE 5.

Without walls Florence
A tucket afar off. Enter WIDOW FLORENCE, daughter DIANA,
VIOLENTA, MARIANA, CITIZENS

  WIDOW. Nay, come; approach city lose
    sight.
  DIANA. French count honourable service.
  WIDOW. reported great'st commander;
    hand slew Duke's brother.  [Tucket]
    lost labour; contrary way. Hark! you
    trumpets.
  MARIANA. Come, return again, suffice the
    report it. Well, Diana, heed French earl; the
    honour maid name, legacy rich as
    honesty.
  WIDOW. told neighbour solicited a
    gentleman companion.
  MARIANA. knave, hang him! Parolles; filthy
    officer suggestions young earl. Beware  
    them, Diana: promises, enticements, oaths, tokens, all
    engines lust, things under; a
    maid hath seduced them; misery is, example, that
    terrible shows wreck maidenhood, that
    dissuade succession, limed twigs that
    threatens them. hope advise further; I
    hope grace are, there
    danger modesty lost.
  DIANA. fear me.

            Enter HELENA dress pilgrim

  WIDOW. hope so. Look, pilgrim. lie
    house: thither send another. question her.
    God save you, pilgrim! bound?
  HELENA. Saint Jaques le Grand.
    palmers lodge, beseech you?
  WIDOW. Saint Francis here, port.
  HELENA. way?
                                                  [A march afar]  
  WIDOW. Ay, marry, is't. Hark you! way.
    tarry, holy pilgrim,
    till troops by,
    conduct lodg'd;
    hostess
    ample myself.
  HELENA. yourself?
  WIDOW. so, pilgrim.
  HELENA. you, stay leisure.
  WIDOW. came, think, France?
  HELENA. so.
  WIDOW. countryman yours
    worthy service.
  HELENA. name, pray you.
  DIANA. Count Rousillon. one?
  HELENA. ear, hears nobly him;
    face not.
  DIANA. some'er is,
    bravely here. stole France,
    'tis reported, King married  
    liking. so?
  HELENA. Ay, surely, mere truth; lady.
  DIANA. gentleman serves Count
    Reports coarsely her.
  HELENA. name?
  DIANA. Monsieur Parolles.
  HELENA. O, him,
    argument praise, worth
    great Count himself, mean
    repeated; deserving
    reserved honesty, that
    heard examin'd.
  DIANA. Alas, poor lady!
    'Tis hard bondage wife
    detesting lord.
  WIDOW. sweet, good creature, wheresoe'er is
    heart weighs sadly. young maid her
    shrewd turn, pleas'd.
  HELENA. mean?
    amorous Count solicits  
    unlawful purpose.
  WIDOW. does, indeed;
    brokes suit
    Corrupt tender honour maid;
    arm'd him, guard
    honestest defence.

    Enter, drum colours, BERTRAM, PAROLLES, the
                          ARMY

  MARIANA. gods forbid else!
  WIDOW. So, come.
    Antonio, Duke's eldest son;
    That, Escalus.
  HELENA. Frenchman?
  DIANA. He-
    plume; 'tis gallant fellow.
    lov'd wife; honester
    goodlier. Is't handsome gentleman?
  HELENA. well.  
  DIANA. 'Tis pity honest. Yond's knave
    leads places; lady
    poison vile rascal.
  HELENA. he?
  DIANA. jack-an-apes scarfs. melancholy?
  HELENA. Perchance hurt i' th' battle.
  PAROLLES. Lose drum! well.
  MARIANA. shrewdly vex'd something.
    Look, spied us.
  WIDOW. Marry, hang you!
  MARIANA. courtesy, ring-carrier!
                              Exeunt BERTRAM, PAROLLES, ARMY
  WIDOW. troop past. Come, pilgrim, bring you
    host. enjoin'd penitents
    five, great Saint Jaques bound,
    house.
  HELENA. humbly you.
    matron gentle maid
    eat to-night; charge thanking
    me, and, requite further,  
    bestow precepts virgin,
    Worthy note.
    BOTH. offer kindly.                   Exeunt




ACT III. SCENE 6.
Camp Florence

Enter BERTRAM, FRENCH LORDS

  LORD. Nay, good lord, put to't; way.
  LORD. lordship find hiding, hold more
    respect.
  LORD. life, lord, bubble.
  BERTRAM. deceived him?
  LORD. it, lord, mine direct knowledge,
    malice, speak kinsman, a
    notable coward, infinite endless liar, hourly
    promise-breaker, owner good quality worthy your
    lordship's entertainment.
  LORD. fit knew him; lest, reposing his
    virtue, hath not, great trusty
    business main danger fail you.
  BERTRAM. knew action him.
  LORD. fetch drum, which
    hear confidently undertake do.
  LORD. troop Florentines suddenly surprise  
    him; enemy.
    bind hoodwink suppose other
    carried leaguer adversaries when
    bring tents. lordship present at
    examination; not, promise life in
    highest compulsion base fear, offer betray and
    deliver intelligence power you, that
    divine forfeit soul oath, trust my
    judgment anything.
  LORD. O, love laughter, fetch drum; he
    stratagem for't. lordship sees bottom
    success in't, metal counterfeit lump of
    ore melted, give John Drum's
    entertainment, inclining removed. comes.

                      Enter PAROLLES

  LORD. O, love laughter, hinder honour of
    design; fetch drum hand.
  BERTRAM. now, monsieur! drum sticks sorely  
    disposition.
  LORD. pox 't; go; 'tis drum.
  PAROLLES. drum! Is't drum? drum lost! was
    excellent command: charge horse own
    wings, rend soldiers!
  LORD. blam'd command the
    service; disaster war Caesar not
    prevented, command.
  BERTRAM. Well, greatly condemn success.
    dishonour loss drum; to
    recovered.
  PAROLLES. recovered.
  BERTRAM. might, now.
  PAROLLES. recovered. merit service is
    seldom attributed true exact performer, have
    drum another, 'hic jacet.'
  BERTRAM. Why, stomach, to't, monsieur. think
    mystery stratagem bring instrument honour
    native quarter, magnanimous enterprise,
    on; grace attempt worthy exploit.  
    speed it, Duke speak extend to
    greatness, utmost
    syllable worthiness.
  PAROLLES. hand soldier, undertake it.
  BERTRAM. slumber it.
  PAROLLES. evening; presently pen
    dilemmas, encourage certainty, put myself
    mortal preparation; midnight hear further
    me.
  BERTRAM. bold acquaint Grace it?
  PAROLLES. success be, lord, the
    attempt vow.
  BERTRAM. th' art valiant; and, thy soldiership,
    subscribe thee. Farewell.
  PAROLLES. love words.                          Exit
  LORD. fish loves water. strange
    fellow, lord, confidently undertake this
    business, done; damns do,
    dares damn'd 't.
  LORD. him, lord, do.  
    steal man's favour, week
    escape great deal discoveries; find out,
    after.
  BERTRAM. Why, make deed that
    address unto?
  LORD. world; return invention, and
    clap probable lies. almost
    emboss'd him. fall to-night; is
    lordship's respect.
  LORD. make sport fox ere case him.
    smok'd Lord Lafeu. disguise and
    parted, sprat find him; you
    night.
  LORD. twigs; caught.
  BERTRAM. brother, me.
  LORD. As't lordship. leave you.   Exit
  BERTRAM. lead house, show you
    lass spoke of.
  LORD. honest.
  BERTRAM. fault. spoke once,  
    found wondrous cold; her,
    coxcomb i' th' wind,
    Tokens letters re-send;
    done. fair creature;
    her?
  LORD. heart, lord.                 Exeunt




ACT III. SCENE 7.
Florence. WIDOW'S house

Enter HELENA WIDOW

  HELENA. misdoubt she,
    assure further
    lose grounds work upon.
  WIDOW. estate fall'n, born,
    acquainted businesses;
    put reputation now
    staining act.
  HELENA. you.
  give trust Count husband,
    sworn counsel spoken
    word word; cannot,
    good aid borrow,
    Err bestowing it.
  WIDOW. you;
    show'd approves
    Y'are great fortune.
  HELENA. purse gold,  
    buy friendly far,
    over-pay pay again
    found it. Count woos daughter
    Lays wanton siege beauty,
    Resolv'd carry her. fine consent,
    direct 'tis bear it.
    important blood nought deny
    demand. ring County wears
    downward hath succeeded house
    son son descents
    father wore it. ring holds
    rich choice; yet, idle fire,
    buy will, dear,
    Howe'er repented after.
  WIDOW. see
    bottom purpose.
  HELENA. lawful then. more
    daughter, ere won,
    Desires ring; appoints encounter;
    fine, delivers fill time,  
    chastely absent. this,
    marry her, add thousand crowns
    pass'd already.
  WIDOW. yielded.
    Instruct daughter persever,
    time place deceit lawful
    prove coherent. night comes
    musics sorts, songs compos'd
    unworthiness. steads us
    chide eaves, persists
    life lay 't.
  HELENA. to-night
    assay plot; which, speed,
    wicked meaning lawful deed,
    lawful meaning lawful act;
    sin, sinful fact.
    it.                                   Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE 1.
Without Florentine camp

Enter FRENCH LORD SOLDIERS ambush

  LORD. hedge-corner.
    sally him, speak terrible language will;
    understand yourselves, matter; must
    understand him, us, we
    produce interpreter.
  SOLDIER. Good captain, th' interpreter.
  LORD. Art acquainted him? thy voice?
  SOLDIER. No, sir, warrant you.
  LORD. linsey-woolsey thou speak again?
  SOLDIER. E'en speak me.
  LORD. band strangers i' th'
    adversary's entertainment. hath smack all
    neighbouring languages, man of
    fancy; speak another, we
    know, straight purpose: choughs' language,
    gabble enough, good enough. you, interpreter,  
    politic. couch, ho! comes; beguile two
    hours sleep, return swear lies forges.

                         Enter PAROLLES

  PAROLLES. Ten o'clock. hours 'twill time
    home. done? a
    plausive invention carries it. begin smoke me;
    disgraces late knock'd door. find my
    tongue foolhardy; heart hath fear Mars
    it, creatures, daring reports my
    tongue.
  LORD. truth e'er thine tongue was
    guilty of.
  PAROLLES. devil move undertake recovery
    drum, ignorant impossibility, and
    knowing purpose? give hurts, and
    exploit. slight carry it.
    'Came little?' great I
    dare give. Wherefore, instance? Tongue, put  
    butterwoman's mouth, buy of
    Bajazet's mule, prattle perils.
  LORD. is, that
    is?
  PAROLLES. cutting garments serve turn,
    breaking Spanish sword.
  LORD. afford so.
  PAROLLES. baring beard; in
    stratagem.
  LORD. 'Twould do.
  PAROLLES. drown clothes, stripp'd.
  LORD. serve.
  PAROLLES. swore leap'd window citadel-
  LORD. deep?
  PAROLLES. Thirty fathom.
  LORD. great oaths scarce make believed.
  PAROLLES. drum enemy's; swear I
    recover'd it.
  LORD. hear anon.          [Alarum within]
  PAROLLES. drum enemy's!  
  LORD. Throca movousus, cargo, cargo, cargo.
  ALL. Cargo, cargo, cargo, villianda par corbo, cargo.
  PAROLLES. O, ransom, ransom! hide mine eyes.
                                            [They blindfold him]
  SOLDIER. Boskos thromuldo boskos.
  PAROLLES. Muskos' regiment,
    lose life language.
    German, Dane, Low Dutch,
    Italian, French, speak me;
    discover undo Florentine.
  SOLDIER. Boskos vauvado. understand thee, speak thy
    tongue. Kerely-bonto, sir, betake thee thy faith, for
    seventeen poniards thy bosom.
  PAROLLES. O!
  SOLDIER. O, pray, pray, pray! Manka revania dulche.
  LORD. Oscorbidulchos volivorco.
  SOLDIER. General content spare thee yet;
    And, hoodwink'd thou art, lead thee on
    gather thee. Haply thou mayst inform
    save thy life.  
  PAROLLES. O, live,
    secrets camp show,
    force, purposes. Nay, speak that
    at.
  SOLDIER. wilt thou faithfully?
  PAROLLES. not, damn me.
  SOLDIER. Acordo linta.
    on; thou art granted space.
                   Exit, PAROLLES guarded. short alarum within
  LORD. Go, Count Rousillon brother
    caught woodcock, muffled
    Till hear them.
  SOLDIER. Captain, will.
  LORD. 'A betray ourselves-
    Inform that.
  SOLDIER. will, sir.
  LORD. Till dark safely lock'd.
                                                          Exeunt




ACT IV. SCENE 2.
Florence. WIDOW'S house

Enter BERTRAM DIANA

  BERTRAM. told Fontibell.
  DIANA. No, good lord, Diana.
  BERTRAM. Titled goddess;
    worth it, addition! But, fair soul,
    fine frame hath love quality?
    quick fire youth light mind,
    maiden, monument;
    dead, one
    now, cold stern;
    mother was
    sweet got.
  DIANA. honest.
  BERTRAM. be.
  DIANA. No.
    mother duty; such, lord,
    owe wife.
  BERTRAM. o'that!  
    prithee strive vows.
    compell'd her; love the
    love's sweet constraint, ever
    thee rights service.
  DIANA. Ay, serve us
    Till serve you; roses
    barely leave thorns prick ourselves,
    mock bareness.
  BERTRAM. sworn!
  DIANA. 'Tis oaths makes truth,
    plain single vow vow'd true.
    holy, swear by,
    High'st witness. Then, pray you, me:
    swear Jove's great attributes
    lov'd dearly, oaths
    love ill? holding,
    swear protest love
    work him. oaths
    words poor conditions, unseal'd-
    opinion.  
  BERTRAM. Change it, change it;
    holy-cruel. Love holy;
    integrity ne'er knew crafts
    charge men with. Stand off,
    give thyself sick desires,
    recovers. thou art mine, ever
    love begins persever.
  DIANA. men make ropes scarre
    forsake ourselves. Give ring.
  BERTRAM. lend thee, dear, power
    give me.
  DIANA. not, lord?
  BERTRAM. honour 'longing house,
    Bequeathed ancestors;
    greatest obloquy i' th' world
    lose.
  DIANA. Mine honour's ring:
    chastity's jewel house,
    Bequeathed ancestors;
    greatest obloquy i' th' world  
    lose. proper wisdom
    Brings champion Honour part
    vain assault.
  BERTRAM. Here, ring;
    house, mine honour, yea, life, thine,
    bid thee.
  DIANA. midnight comes, knock chamber window;
    order mother hear.
    charge band truth,
    conquer'd maiden bed,
    Remain hour, speak me:
    reasons strong; them
    back ring deliver'd.
    finger night put
    ring, time proceeds
    token future past deeds.
    Adieu till then; fail not. won
    wife me, hope done.
  BERTRAM. heaven earth won wooing thee.
 Exit  
  DIANA. live long heaven me!
    end.
    mother told woo,
    sat in's heart; men
    oaths. sworn marry me
    wife's dead; lie him
    buried. Frenchmen braid,
    Marry will, live die maid.
    Only, disguise, think't sin
    cozen unjustly win.                   Exit




ACT IV. SCENE 3.
The Florentine camp

Enter FRENCH LORDS, SOLDIERS

  LORD. mother's letter?
  LORD. deliv'red hour since. something
    in't stings nature; reading chang'd
    man.
  LORD. worthy blame laid shaking off
    good wife sweet lady.
  LORD. hath incurred everlasting displeasure
    King, tun'd bounty sing happiness to
    him. thing, dwell darkly
    you.
  LORD. spoken it, 'tis dead, grave
    it.
  LORD. hath perverted young gentlewoman Florence,
    chaste renown; night fleshes in
    spoil honour. hath monumental ring,
    thinks made unchaste composition.
  LORD. Now, God delay rebellion! ourselves,  
    things we!
  LORD. traitors. common of
    treasons reveal till attain
    abhorr'd ends; action contrives
    nobility, proper stream, o'erflows
    himself.
  LORD. meant damnable trumpeters our
    unlawful intents? company to-night?
  LORD. till midnight; dieted hour.
  LORD. approaches apace. gladly his
    company anatomiz'd, measure own
    judgments, curiously set counterfeit.
  LORD. meddle till come; his
    presence whip other.
  LORD. meantime, hear wars?
  LORD. hear overture peace.
  LORD. Nay, assure you, peace concluded.
  LORD. Count Rousillon then? travel
    higher, return France?
  LORD. perceive, demand, altogether  
    counsel.
  LORD. forbid, sir! great deal
    act.
  LORD. Sir, wife, months since, fled his
    house. pretence pilgrimage Saint Jaques le Grand;
    holy undertaking austere sanctimony she
    accomplish'd; and, residing, tenderness nature
    prey grief; fine, made groan last
    breath, sings heaven.
  LORD. justified?
  LORD. stronger part letters, which
    makes story true point death. death
    itself, office come, was
    faithfully confirm'd rector place.
  LORD. Hath Count intelligence?
  LORD. Ay, confirmations, point from
    point, full arming verity.
  LORD. heartily glad this.
  LORD. mightily make comforts our
    losses!  
  LORD. mightily times drown gain in
    tears! great dignity valour hath acquir'd for
    home encount'red shame ample.
  LORD. web life mingled yarn, good ill
    together. virtues proud faults whipt them
    not; crimes despair cherish'd by
    virtues.

                      Enter MESSENGER

    now? master?
  SERVANT. met Duke street, sir; hath taken
    solemn leave. lordship morning France. The
    Duke hath offered letters commendations King.
  LORD. needful there, were
    commend.
  LORD. sweet King's tartness.
    lordship now.

                        Enter BERTRAM  

    now, lord, is't midnight?
  BERTRAM. to-night dispatch'd sixteen businesses, month's
    length apiece; abstract success: congied the
    Duke, adieu nearest; buried wife, mourn'd for
    her; writ lady mother returning; entertain'd my
    convoy; main parcels dispatch effected many
    nicer needs. greatest, ended
    yet.
  LORD. business difficulty morning
    departure hence, requires haste lordship.
  BERTRAM. business ended, fearing hear it
    hereafter. dialogue Fool and
    Soldier? Come, bring counterfeit module has
    deceiv'd double-meaning prophesier.
  LORD. Bring forth.  [Exeunt SOLDIERS]  sat i' th'
    stocks night, poor gallant knave.
  BERTRAM. matter; heels deserv'd it, usurping his
    spurs long. carry himself?
  LORD. told lordship stocks carry  
    him. answer understood: weeps like
    wench shed milk; hath confess'd to
    Morgan, supposes friar, time his
    remembrance instant disaster setting i' th'
    stocks. hath confess'd?
  BERTRAM. me, 'a?
  LORD. confession taken, read his
    face; lordship in't, are, must
    patience hear it.

                   Enter PAROLLES guarded, and
                  SOLDIER interpreter

  BERTRAM. plague him! muffled! me.
  LORD. Hush, hush! Hoodman comes. Portotartarossa.
  SOLDIER. calls tortures. without
    'em?
  PAROLLES. confess constraint; ye
    pinch pasty, more.
  SOLDIER. Bosko chimurcho.  
  LORD. Boblibindo chicurmurco.
  SOLDIER. merciful general. General bids you
    answer note.
  PAROLLES. truly, hope live.
  SOLDIER. 'First demand horse Duke is
    strong.' that?
  PAROLLES. thousand; weak unserviceable.
    troops scattered, commanders poor
    rogues, reputation credit, hope live.
  SOLDIER. set answer so?
  PAROLLES. Do; sacrament 't, you
    will.
  BERTRAM. All's him. past-saving slave this!
  LORD. Y'are deceiv'd, lord; Monsieur Parolles,
    gallant militarist-that phrase-that whole
    theoric war knot scarf, practice the
    chape dagger.
  LORD. trust man keeping sword
    clean; wearing his
    apparel neatly.  
  SOLDIER. Well, set down.
  PAROLLES. 'Five thousand horse' said-I true- 'or
    thereabouts' set down, speak truth.
  LORD. truth this.
  BERTRAM. con for't nature delivers it.
  PAROLLES. 'Poor rogues' pray say.
  SOLDIER. Well, set down.
  PAROLLES. humbly you, sir. truth's truth-the rogues are
    marvellous poor.
  SOLDIER. 'Demand strength a-foot.'
    that?
  PAROLLES. troth, sir, live present hour, I
    true. see: Spurio, hundred fifty;
    Sebastian, many; Corambus, many; Jaques, many; Guiltian,
    Cosmo, Lodowick, Gratii, hundred fifty each; mine own
    company, Chitopher, Vaumond, Bentii, hundred fifty each; so
    muster-file, rotten sound, life, amounts not
    fifteen thousand poll; half dare shake the
    snow cassocks shake to
    pieces.  
  BERTRAM. him?
  LORD. Nothing, thanks. Demand my
    condition, credit Duke.
  SOLDIER. Well, set down. 'You demand him
    Captain Dumain i' th' camp, Frenchman; his
    reputation Duke, valour, honesty, expertness
    wars; thinks possible, with
    well-weighing sums gold, corrupt revolt.' say
    this? it?
  PAROLLES. beseech you, answer the
    inter'gatories. Demand singly.
  SOLDIER. Captain Dumain?
  PAROLLES. him: 'a botcher's prentice Paris, from
    whipt shrieve's fool child-a
    dumb innocent nay.
  BERTRAM. Nay, leave, hold hands; his
    brains forfeit tile falls.
  SOLDIER. Well, captain Duke Florence's
    camp?
  PAROLLES. knowledge, is, lousy.  
  LORD. Nay, me; hear your
    lordship anon.
  SOLDIER. reputation Duke?
  PAROLLES. Duke poor officer of
    mine; writ day turn o' th' band.
    letter pocket.
  SOLDIER. Marry, search.
  PAROLLES. good sadness, know; it
    file Duke's letters tent.
  SOLDIER. 'tis; paper. read you?
  PAROLLES. no.
  BERTRAM. interpreter well.
  LORD. Excellently.
  SOLDIER.  [Reads]  'Dian, Count's fool, full of
    gold.'
  PAROLLES. Duke's letter, sir; an
    advertisement proper maid Florence, Diana, take
    heed allurement Count Rousillon, foolish idle
    boy, ruttish. pray you, sir, put up
    again.  
  SOLDIER. Nay, read favour.
  PAROLLES. meaning in't, protest, honest behalf
    maid; knew young Count dangerous and
    lascivious boy, whale virginity, devours all
    fry finds.
  BERTRAM. Damnable both-sides rogue!
  SOLDIER.                                         [Reads]
    'When swears oaths, bid drop gold, it;
    scores, pays score.
    Half won match made; match, make it;
    ne'er pays after-debts, before.
    soldier, Dian, told thee this:
    Men mell with, boys kiss;
    count this, Count's fool, it,
    pays before, owe it.
    Thine, vow'd thee thine ear,
                                                   PAROLLES.'
  BERTRAM. whipt army rhyme in's
    forehead.
  LORD. devoted friend, sir, manifold  
    linguist, amnipotent soldier.
  BERTRAM. endure cat, a
    cat me.
  SOLDIER. perceive, sir, General's be
    fain hang you.
  PAROLLES. life, sir, case! afraid die,
    that, offences many, repent the
    remainder nature. live, sir, dungeon, i' th'
    stocks, anywhere, live.
  SOLDIER. done, confess freely;
    therefore, Captain Dumain: answer'd to
    reputation Duke, valour; his
    honesty?
  PAROLLES. steal, sir, egg cloister; rapes
    ravishments parallels Nessus. professes keeping of
    oaths; breaking 'em stronger Hercules. lie,
    sir, volubility truth fool.
    Drunkenness virtue, swine-drunk; and
    sleep harm, save bedclothes about
    him; conditions lay straw.  
    say, sir, honesty. everything
    honest man have; honest man should
    nothing.
  LORD. begin love this.
  BERTRAM. description thine honesty? pox him! For
    me, cat.
  SOLDIER. expertness war?
  PAROLLES. Faith, sir, led drum English
    tragedians-to belie not-and soldier-ship
    not, country honour the
    officer place called Mile-end instruct the
    doubling files-I man honour can-but of
    certain.
  LORD. hath out-villain'd villainy rarity
    redeems him.
  BERTRAM. pox him! cat still.
  SOLDIER. qualities poor price, not
    gold corrupt revolt.
  PAROLLES. Sir, cardecue sell fee-simple his
    salvation, inheritance it; cut th' entail  
    remainders perpetual succession perpetually.
  SOLDIER. brother, Captain Dumain?
  LORD. me?
  SOLDIER. he?
  PAROLLES. E'en crow o' th' nest; altogether great as
    goodness, greater great deal evil. He
    excels brother coward; brother reputed one
    is. retreat outruns lackey: marry,
    coming cramp.
  SOLDIER. life saved, undertake betray
    Florentine?
  PAROLLES. Ay, Captain Horse, Count Rousillon.
  SOLDIER. whisper General, his
    pleasure.
  PAROLLES.  [Aside]  drumming. plague drums!
    deserve well, beguile supposition of
    lascivious young boy Count, run danger.
    suspected ambush taken?
  SOLDIER. remedy, sir, die.
    General traitorously discover'd  
    secrets army, made pestiferous reports men
    nobly held, serve world honest use; therefore
    die. Come, headsman, head.
  PAROLLES. O Lord, sir, live, death!
  SOLDIER. you, leave your
    friends.  [Unmuffling him]  you; here?
  BERTRAM. Good morrow, noble Captain.
  LORD. God bless you, Captain Parolles.
  LORD. God save you, noble Captain.
  LORD. Captain, greeting Lord Lafeu? am
    France.
  LORD. Good Captain, give copy sonnet
    writ Diana behalf Count Rousillon? not
    coward compel you; fare well.
                                        Exeunt BERTRAM LORDS
  SOLDIER. undone, Captain, scarf; that
    knot 't yet.
  PAROLLES. crush'd plot?
  SOLDIER. find country women were
    received shame, begin impudent  
    nation. Fare ye well, sir; France too; speak of
    there.                                Exit SOLDIERS
  PAROLLES. thankful. heart great,
    'Twould burst this. Captain more;
    eat, drink, sleep soft
    captain shall. Simply thing am
    make live. braggart,
    fear this; pass
    braggart found ass.
    Rust, sword; cool, blushes; and, Parolles, live
    Safest shame. fool'd, fool'ry thrive.
    place means man alive.
    them.                                        Exit




ACT IV SCENE 4.
The WIDOW'S house

Enter HELENA, WIDOW, DIANA

  HELENA. perceive wrong'd you!
    greatest Christian world
    surety; fore throne 'tis needful,
    Ere perfect mine intents, kneel.
    Time desired office,
    Dear life; gratitude
    flinty Tartar's bosom peep forth,
    answer 'Thanks.' duly inform'd
    Grace Marseilles, place
    convenient convoy. know
    supposed dead. army breaking,
    husband hies home; where, heaven aiding,
    leave good lord King,
    welcome.
  WIDOW. Gentle madam,
    servant trust
    business welcome.  
  HELENA. you, mistress,
    friend thoughts labour
    recompense love. Doubt heaven
    Hath brought daughter's dower,
    hath fated motive
    helper husband. But, O strange men!
    sweet make hate,
    saucy trusting cozen'd thoughts
    Defiles pitchy night. lust doth play
    loathes, away.
    hereafter. You, Diana,
    poor instructions suffer
    behalf.
  DIANA. death honesty
    impositions, yours
    suffer.
  HELENA. Yet, pray you:
    word time bring summer,
    briers leaves thorns
    sweet sharp. away;  
    waggon prepar'd, time revives us.
    All's Ends Well. fine's crown.
    Whate'er course, end renown.           Exeunt




ACT IV SCENE 5.
Rousillon. COUNT'S palace

Enter COUNTESS, LAFEU, CLOWN

  LAFEU. No, no, no, son misled snipt-taffeta fellow
    there, villainous saffron made unbak'd
    doughy youth nation colour. daughter-in-law
    alive hour, son home, more
    advanc'd King red-tail'd humble-bee speak
    of.
  COUNTESS. him. death most
    virtuous gentlewoman nature praise creating. If
    partaken flesh, cost dearest groans a
    mother. owed rooted love.
  LAFEU. 'Twas good lady, 'twas good lady. pick thousand
    sallets ere light herb.
  CLOWN. Indeed, sir, sweet-marjoram sallet, or,
    rather, herb grace.
  LAFEU. sallet-herbs, knave; nose-herbs.
  CLOWN. great Nebuchadnezzar, sir; skill in
    grass.  
  LAFEU. dost thou profess thyself-a knave fool?
  CLOWN. fool, sir, woman's service, knave man's.
  LAFEU. distinction?
  CLOWN. cozen man wife, service.
  LAFEU. knave service, indeed.
  CLOWN. give wife bauble, sir, service.
  LAFEU. subscribe thee; thou art knave fool.
  CLOWN. service.
  LAFEU. No, no, no.
  CLOWN. Why, sir, serve you, serve great a
    prince are.
  LAFEU. that? Frenchman?
  CLOWN. Faith, sir, 'a English name; fisnomy more
    hotter France there.
  LAFEU. prince that?
  CLOWN. Black Prince, sir; alias, Prince Darkness; alias,
    devil.
  LAFEU. Hold thee, purse. give thee suggest
    thee thy master thou talk'st of; serve still.
  CLOWN. woodland fellow, sir, loved great fire;  
    master speak good fire. But, sure, he
    prince world; nobility remain in's court. I
    house narrow gate, too
    pomp enter. humble may; but
    chill tender: the
    flow'ry leads broad gate great fire.
  LAFEU. thy ways, begin aweary thee; thee
    before, fall thee. thy ways;
    horses look'd to, tricks.
  CLOWN. put tricks 'em, sir, jades'
    tricks, law nature.
 Exit
  LAFEU. shrewd knave, unhappy.
  COUNTESS. 'a is. lord made  sport
    him. authority remains here, thinks is
    patent sauciness; pace, runs
    will.
  LAFEU. well; 'tis amiss. tell
    you, heard good lady's death, lord
    son return home, moved King master  
    speak behalf daughter; which, minority of
    both, Majesty self-gracious remembrance did
    propose. Highness hath promis'd it; and, to
    stop displeasure hath conceived son, there
    fitter matter. ladyship it?
  COUNTESS. content, lord; happily
    effected.
  LAFEU. Highness post Marseilles, body as
    number'd thirty; 'a to-morrow, am
    deceiv'd intelligence hath seldom fail'd.
  COUNTESS. rejoices hope ere die.
    letters son to-night. beseech
    lordship remain tal meet together.
  LAFEU. Madam, thinking manners safely be
    admitted.
  COUNTESS. plead honourable privilege.
  LAFEU. Lady, made bold charter; but, my
    God, holds yet.

                         Re-enter CLOWN  

  CLOWN. O madam, yonder's lord son patch velvet
    on's face; scar 't no, velvet
    knows; 'tis goodly patch velvet. left cheek a
    cheek pile half, cheek worn bare.
  LAFEU. scar nobly got, noble scar, good liv'ry of
    honour; belike that.
  CLOWN. carbonado'd face.
  LAFEU. son, pray you;
    long talk young noble soldier.
  CLOWN. Faith, dozen 'em, delicate fine hats, and
    courteous feathers, bow head nod man.
                                                          Exeunt
