ACT V. SCENE 1.
Marseilles. street

Enter HELENA, WIDOW, DIANA, ATTENDANTS

  HELENA. exceeding posting day night
    wear spirits low; it.
    made days nights one,
    wear gentle limbs affairs,
    bold grow requital
    unroot you.

                      Enter GENTLEMAN

    happy time!
    man Majesty's ear,
    spend power. God save you, sir.
  GENTLEMAN. you.
  HELENA. Sir, court France.
  GENTLEMAN. there.
  HELENA. presume, sir, fall'n
    report goodness;  
    therefore, goaded sharp occasions,
    lay nice manners by, put to
    virtues, which
    continue thankful.
  GENTLEMAN. will?
  HELENA. you
    give poor petition King;
    aid store power have
    presence.
  GENTLEMAN. King's here.
  HELENA. here, sir?
  GENTLEMAN. indeed.
    remov'd night, haste
    use.
  WIDOW. Lord, lose pains!
  HELENA. All's Ends yet,
    time adverse means unfit.
    beseech you, gone?
  GENTLEMAN. Marry, it, Rousillon;
    going.  
  HELENA. beseech you, sir,
    King me,
    Commend paper gracious hand;
    presume render blame,
    make pains it.
    good speed
    means make means.
  GENTLEMAN. you.
  HELENA. find thank'd,
    Whate'er falls more. horse again;
    Go, go, provide.                                      Exeunt




ACT V SCENE 2.
Rousillon. court COUNT'S palace

Enter CLOWN PAROLLES

  PAROLLES. Good Monsieur Lavache, give Lord Lafeu letter. I
    ere now, sir, you, held
    familiarity fresher clothes; now, sir, muddied in
    Fortune's mood, smell strong strong
    displeasure.
  CLOWN. Truly, Fortune's displeasure sluttish, smell
    strongly thou speak'st of. henceforth eat fish
    Fortune's butt'ring. Prithee, wind.
  PAROLLES. Nay, stop nose, sir; spake by
    metaphor.
  CLOWN. Indeed, sir, metaphor stink, stop nose; or
    man's metaphor. Prithee, thee further.
  PAROLLES. Pray you, sir, deliver paper.
  CLOWN. Foh! prithee stand away. paper Fortune's close-stool
    give nobleman! himself.

                           Enter LAFEU  

    pur Fortune's, sir, Fortune's cat, not
    musk-cat, fall'n unclean fishpond her
    displeasure, and, says, muddied withal. Pray you, sir,
    carp may; poor, decayed,
    ingenious, foolish, rascally knave. pity distress
    similes comfort, leave lordship.
 Exit
  PAROLLES. lord, man Fortune hath cruelly scratch'd.
  LAFEU. do? 'Tis late pare her
    nails now. played knave Fortune, that
    scratch you, good lady would
    knaves thrive long her? cardecue for
    you. justices make Fortune friends; for
    business.
  PAROLLES. beseech honour hear single word.
  LAFEU. beg single penny more; come, ha't; save your
    word.
  PAROLLES. name, good lord, Parolles.
  LAFEU. beg word then. Cox passion! give  
    hand. drum?
  PAROLLES. O good lord, found me.
  LAFEU. I, sooth? lost thee.
  PAROLLES. lies you, lord, bring grace, for
    bring out.
  LAFEU. thee, knave! Dost thou put the
    office God devil? brings grace, the
    brings thee out.    [Trumpets sound]  King's coming; I
    trumpets. Sirrah, inquire me; had
    talk night. fool knave, you
    eat. to; follow.
  PAROLLES. praise God you.                         Exeunt




ACT V SCENE 3.
Rousillon. COUNT'S palace

Flourish. Enter KING, COUNTESS, LAFEU, FRENCH LORDS, ATTENDANTS

  KING. lost jewel her, esteem
    made poorer it; son,
    mad folly, lack'd sense know
    estimation home.
  COUNTESS. 'Tis past, liege;
    beseech Majesty make it
    Natural rebellion, i' th' blaze youth,
    oil fire, strong reason's force,
    O'erbears burns on.
  KING. honour'd lady,
    forgiven forgotten all;
    revenges high bent him
    watch'd time shoot.
  LAFEU. say-
    first, beg pardon: young lord
    Majesty, mother, lady,  
    Offence mighty note; himself
    greatest wrong all. lost wife
    beauty astonish survey
    richest eyes; words ears captive;
    dear perfection hearts scorn'd serve
    Humbly call'd mistress.
  KING. Praising lost
    Makes remembrance dear. Well, call hither;
    reconcil'd, view kill
    repetition. pardon;
    nature great offence dead,
    deeper oblivion bury
    Th' incensing relics it; approach,
    stranger, offender; inform him
    'tis should.
  GENTLEMAN. shall, liege.                 Exit GENTLEMAN
  KING. daughter? spoke?
  LAFEU. hath reference Highness.
  KING. match. letters me
    sets high fame.  

                          Enter BERTRAM

  LAFEU. 't.
  KING. day season,
    thou mayst sunshine hail
    once. brightest beams
    Distracted clouds give way; stand thou forth;
    time fair again.
  BERTRAM. high-repented blames,
    Dear sovereign, pardon me.
  KING. whole;
    word consumed time.
    instant forward top;
    old, quick'st decrees
    Th' inaudible noiseless foot Time
    Steals ere effect them. remember
    daughter lord?
  BERTRAM. Admiringly, liege. first
    stuck choice her, ere heart  
    Durst make bold herald tongue;
    impression mine eye infixing,
    Contempt scornful perspective lend me,
    warp'd line favour,
    Scorn'd fair colour express'd stol'n,
    Extended contracted proportions
    hideous object. came
    men prais'd, myself,
    lost, lov'd, mine eye
    dust offend it.
  KING. excus'd.
    thou didst love her, strikes scores away
    great compt; love late,
    remorseful pardon slowly carried,
    great sender turns sour offence,
    Crying 'That's good gone.' rash faults
    Make trivial price things have,
    knowing grave.
    Oft displeasures, unjust,
    Destroy friends, weep dust;  
    love waking cries done,
    shameful hate sleeps afternoon.
    sweet Helen's knell. forget her.
    Send amorous token fair Maudlin.
    main consents had; stay
    widower's marriage-day.
  COUNTESS. first, O dear heaven, bless!
    Or, ere meet, me, O nature, cesse!
  LAFEU. on, son, house's name
    digested; give favour you,
    sparkle spirits daughter,
    quickly come.
                                          [BERTRAM ring]
    beard,
    ev'ry hair 't, Helen, dead,
    sweet creature; ring this,
    e'er leave court,
    finger.
  BERTRAM. not.
  KING. Now, pray you, it; mine eye,  
    speaking, oft fasten'd to't.
    ring mine; gave Helen
    bade her, fortunes stood
    Necessitied help, token
    relieve her. craft reave her
    stead most?
  BERTRAM. gracious sovereign,
    Howe'er pleases so,
    ring hers.
  COUNTESS. Son, life,
    wear it; reckon'd it
    life's rate.
  LAFEU. wear it.
  BERTRAM. deceiv'd, lord; it.
    Florence casement thrown me,
    Wrapp'd paper, contain'd name
    threw it. Noble was, thought
    stood engag'd; subscrib'd
    mine fortune, inform'd fully
    answer honour  
    made overture, ceas'd,
    heavy satisfaction, never
    Receive ring again.
  KING. Plutus himself,
    tinct multiplying med'cine,
    Hath nature's mystery science
    ring. 'Twas mine, 'twas Helen's,
    gave you. Then, know
    acquainted yourself,
    Confess 'twas hers, rough enforcement
    her. call'd saints surety
    put finger
    gave bed-
    come- us
    great disaster.
  BERTRAM. it.
  KING. Thou speak'st falsely, love mine honour;
    mak'st conjectural fears me
    fain shut out. prove
    thou art inhuman- 'twill prove so.  
    not- thou didst hate deadly,
    dead; nothing, close
    eyes myself, win believe
    ring. away.
                                          [GUARDS seize BERTRAM]
    fore-past proofs, howe'er matter fall,
    tax fears vanity,
    vainly fear'd little. him.
    sift matter further.
  BERTRAM. prove
    ring hers, easy
    Prove husbanded bed Florence,
    was.                       Exit, guarded
  KING. wrapp'd dismal thinkings.

                        Enter GENTLEMAN

  GENTLEMAN. Gracious sovereign,
    blame no, not:
    petition Florentine,  
    hath, removes, short
    tender herself. undertook it,
    Vanquish'd thereto fair grace speech
    poor suppliant, this, know,
    attending; business her
    importing visage; told me
    sweet verbal concern
    Highness herself.
  KING.  [Reads letter]  'Upon protestations marry me
    wife dead, blush it, won me. the
    Count Rousillon widower; vows forfeited me, my
    honour's paid him. stole Florence, taking leave,
    follow country justice. Grant me, O King!
    lies; seducer flourishes, poor
    maid undone.
                                                DIANA CAPILET.'
  LAFEU. buy son-in-law fair, toll this.
    him.
  KING. heavens thought thee, Lafeu,
    bring discov'ry. Seek suitors.  
    speedily, bring Count.
                                               Exeunt ATTENDANTS
    afeard life Helen, lady,
    foully snatch'd.
  COUNTESS. Now, justice doers!

                       Enter BERTRAM, guarded

  KING. wonder, sir, sith wives monsters you.
    fly swear lordship,
    desire marry.
                                           Enter WIDOW DIANA
    woman's that?
  DIANA. am, lord, wretched Florentine,
    Derived ancient Capilet.
    suit, understand, know,
    pitied.
  WIDOW. mother, sir, age honour
    suffer complaint bring,
    cease, remedy.  
  KING. hither, Count; women?
  BERTRAM. lord, deny
    them. charge further?
  DIANA. strange wife?
  BERTRAM. mine, lord.
  DIANA. marry,
    give hand, mine;
    give heaven's vows, mine;
    give myself, mine;
    vow embodied yours
    marries marry me,
    none.
  LAFEU.  [To BERTRAM]  reputation short for
    daughter; husband her.
  BERTRAM. lord, fond desp'rate creature
    laugh'd with. Highness
    Lay noble thought mine honour
    sink here.
  KING. Sir, thoughts, ill friend
    Till deeds gain them. Fairer prove honour  
    thought lies!
  DIANA. Good lord,
    oath think
    virginity.
  KING. say'st thou her?
  BERTRAM. impudent, lord,
    common gamester camp.
  DIANA. wrong, lord; so
    bought common price.
    him. o, behold ring,
    high respect rich validity
    lack parallel; yet, that,
    gave commoner o' th' camp,
    one.
  COUNTESS. blushes, 'tis it.
    preceding ancestors, gem
    Conferr'd testament th' sequent issue,
    Hath ow'd worn. wife:
    ring's thousand proofs.
  KING. Methought  
    court witness it.
  DIANA. did, lord, loath produce
    bad instrument; name's Parolles.
  LAFEU. man to-day, man be.
  KING. Find him, bring hither.        Exit ATTENDANT
  BERTRAM. him?
    quoted perfidious slave,
    spots o' th' world tax'd debauch'd,
    nature sickens speak truth.
    utter
    speak anything?
  KING. hath ring yours.
  BERTRAM. has. lik'd her,
    boarded i' th' wanton youth.
    knew distance, angle me,
    Madding eagerness restraint,
    impediments fancy's course
    motives fancy; and, fine,
    infinite cunning modern grace
    Subdu'd rate. ring;  
    inferior might
    market-price bought.
  DIANA. patient.
    turn'd noble wife
    justly diet me. pray yet-
    lack virtue, lose husband-
    Send ring, return home,
    give mine again.
  BERTRAM. not.
  KING. ring yours, pray you?
  DIANA. Sir, like
    finger.
  KING. ring? ring late.
  DIANA. gave him, abed.
  KING. story, then, false threw him
    casement.
  DIANA. spoke truth.

                       Enter PAROLLES
  
  BERTRAM. lord, confess ring hers.
  KING. boggle shrewdly; feather starts you.
    man speak of?
  DIANA. Ay, lord.
  KING. me, sirrah-but true charge you,
    fearing displeasure master,
    Which, proceeding, off-
    woman you?
  PAROLLES. Majesty, master hath honourable
    gentleman; tricks hath him, gentlemen have.
  KING. Come, come, th' purpose. love woman?
  PAROLLES. Faith, sir, love her; how?
  KING. How, pray you?
  PAROLLES. love her, sir, gentleman loves woman.
  KING. that?
  PAROLLES. lov'd her, sir, lov'd not.
  KING. thou art knave knave.
    equivocal companion this!
  PAROLLES. poor man, Majesty's command.
  LAFEU. good drum, lord, naughty orator.  
  DIANA. promis'd marriage?
  PAROLLES. Faith, speak.
  KING. wilt thou speak thou know'st?
  PAROLLES. Yes, Majesty. them, I
    said; that, loved her-for mad for
    her, talk'd Satan, Limbo, Furies, know
    what. credit time I
    knew bed; motions, promising
    marriage, things derive ill speak
    of; speak know.
  KING. Thou hast spoken already, thou canst are
    married; thou art fine thy evidence; stand
    aside.
    ring, say, yours?
  DIANA. Ay, good lord.
  KING. buy it? gave you?
  DIANA. me, buy it.
  KING. lent you?
  DIANA. lent neither.
  KING. find then?  
  DIANA. found not.
  KING. ways,
    give him?
  DIANA. gave him.
  LAFEU. woman's easy glove, lord; at
    pleasure.
  KING. ring mine, gave wife.
  DIANA. hers, aught know.
  KING. away, now;
    prison her. him.
    thou tell'st thou hadst ring,
    Thou diest hour.
  DIANA. you.
  KING. away.
  DIANA. put bail, liege.
  KING. thee common customer.
  DIANA. Jove, knew man, 'twas you.
  KING. Wherefore hast thou accus'd while?
  DIANA. guilty, guilty.
    maid, swear to't:  
    swear maid, not.
    Great King, strumpet, life;
    maid, man's wife.
                                             [Pointing LAFEU]
  KING. abuse ears; prison her.
  DIANA. Good mother, fetch bail. Stay, royal sir;
                                                      Exit WIDOW
    jeweller owes ring for,
    surety me. lord
    hath abus'd himself,
    harm'd me, quit him.
    bed hath defil'd;
    time wife child.
    Dead be, feels young kick;
    riddle: dead quick-
    behold meaning.

                     Re-enter WIDOW HELENA

  KING. exorcist  
    Beguiles truer office mine eyes?
    Is't real see?
  HELENA. No, good lord;
    'Tis shadow wife see,
    thing.
  BERTRAM. Both, both; o, pardon!
  HELENA. O, good lord, maid,
    found wondrous kind. ring,
    And, you, letter. says:
    'When finger ring,
    child,' etc. done.
    mine doubly won?
  BERTRAM. she, liege, make clearly,
    love dearly, ever, dearly.
  HELENA. plain, prove untrue,
    Deadly divorce step you!
    O dear mother, living?
  LAFEU. Mine eyes smell onions; weep anon. [To PAROLLES]
    Good Tom Drum, lend handkercher. So, I
    thee. Wait home, make sport thee;  
    thy curtsies alone, scurvy ones.
  KING. point point story know,
    make truth pleasure flow.
    [To DIANA]  thou beest fresh uncropped flower,
    Choose thou thy husband, pay thy dower;
    guess thy honest aid
    Thou kept'st wife herself, thyself maid.-
    progress, less,
    Resolvedly leisure express.
    well; end meet,
    bitter past, sweet.       [Flourish]

EPILOGUE
                             EPILOGUE.

  KING. King's beggar, play done.
    ended suit won,
    express content; pay
    strife you, day exceeding day.
    patience then, parts;
    gentle hands lend us, hearts.
                                                    Exeunt omnes


THE END

1607

THE TRAGEDY ANTONY CLEOPATRA

by William Shakespeare



DRAMATIS PERSONAE

  MARK ANTONY,         Triumvirs
  OCTAVIUS CAESAR,         "
  M. AEMILIUS LEPIDUS,     "

  VENTIDIUS,             "    "   "
  EROS,                  "    "   "
  SCARUS,                "    "   "
  DERCETAS,              "    "   "
  DEMETRIUS,             "    "   "
  PHILO,                 "    "   "
  MAECENAS,   friend Caesar
  AGRIPPA,       "    "   "
  DOLABELLA,     "    "   "
  PROCULEIUS,    "    "   "
  THYREUS,       "    "   "
  GALLUS,        "    "   "
  MENAS,      friend Pompey
  MENECRATES,    "    "    "
  VARRIUS,       "    "    "

  CANIDIUS, Lieutenant-General Antony
  SILIUS, Officer Ventidius's army
  EUPHRONIUS, Ambassador Antony Caesar
  ALEXAS,   attendant Cleopatra
  MARDIAN,      "     "      "
  SELEUCUS,     "     "      "
  DIOMEDES,     "     "      "
  SOOTHSAYER

  CLEOPATRA, Queen Egypt
  OCTAVIA, sister Caesar wife Antony
  CHARMIAN, lady attending Cleopatra
  IRAS,       "      "      "     "



  Officers, Soldiers, Messengers, Attendants

SCENE:
The Roman Empire

ACT I. SCENE I.
Alexandria. CLEOPATRA'S palace

Enter DEMETRIUS PHILO

  PHILO. Nay, dotage general's
    O'erflows measure. goodly eyes,
    o'er files musters war
    glow'd plated Mars, bend, turn,
    office devotion view
    tawny front. captain's heart,
    scuffles great fights hath burst
    buckles breast, reneges temper,
    bellows fan
    cool gipsy's lust.

     Flourish. Enter ANTONY, CLEOPATRA, LADIES, train,
                    eunuchs fanning her

    come!
    good note, him
    triple pillar world transform'd  
    strumpet's fool. Behold see.
  CLEOPATRA. love indeed, much.
  ANTONY. beggary love reckon'd.
  CLEOPATRA. set bourn belov'd.
  ANTONY. thou find heaven, earth.

                       Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. News, good lord, Rome.
  ANTONY. Grates sum.
  CLEOPATRA. Nay, hear them, Antony.
    Fulvia perchance angry; knows
    scarce-bearded Caesar sent
    pow'rful mandate you: 'Do this;
    kingdom enfranchise that;
    Perform't, damn thee.'
  ANTONY. How, love?
  CLEOPATRA. Perchance? Nay, like,
    stay longer; dismission
    Caesar; hear it, Antony.  
    Fulvia's process? Caesar's say? Both?
    Call messengers. Egypt's Queen,
    Thou blushest, Antony, blood thine
    Caesar's homager. thy cheek pays shame
    shrill-tongu'd Fulvia scolds. messengers!
  ANTONY. Rome Tiber melt, wide arch
    rang'd empire fall! space.
    Kingdoms clay; dungy earth alike
    Feeds beast man. nobleness life
    [emhracing], mutual pair
    twain do't, bind,
    pain punishment, world weet
    stand peerless.
  CLEOPATRA. Excellent falsehood!
    marry Fulvia, love her?
    fool not. Antony
    himself.
  ANTONY. stirr'd Cleopatra.
    love Love soft hours,
    confound time conference harsh;  
    minute lives stretch
    pleasure now. sport to-night?
  CLEOPATRA. Hear ambassadors.
  ANTONY. Fie, wrangling queen!
    becomes- chide, laugh,
    weep; passion fully strives
    make thee fair admir'd.
    messenger thine, alone
    To-night wander streets note
    qualities people. Come, queen;
    night desire it. Speak us.
                     Exeunt ANTONY CLEOPATRA, train
  DEMETRIUS. Caesar Antonius priz'd slight?
  PHILO. Sir, Antony,
    short great property
    Antony.
  DEMETRIUS. full sorry
    approves common liar, who
    speaks Rome; hope
    deeds to-morrow. Rest happy!            Exeunt




SCENE II.
Alexandria. CLEOPATRA'S palace

Enter CHARMIAN, IRAS, ALEXAS, SOOTHSAYER

  CHARMIAN. Lord Alexas, sweet Alexas, Alexas, almost
    absolute Alexas, soothsayer prais'd so
    th' Queen? O knew husband, must
    charge horns garlands!
  ALEXAS. Soothsayer!
  SOOTHSAYER. will?
  CHARMIAN. man? Is't you, sir, things?
  SOOTHSAYER. nature's infinite book secrecy
    read.
  ALEXAS. Show hand.

                       Enter ENOBARBUS

  ENOBARBUS. Bring banquet quickly; wine enough
    Cleopatra's health drink.
  CHARMIAN. Good, sir, give good fortune.
  SOOTHSAYER. make not, foresee.  
  CHARMIAN. Pray, then, foresee one.
  SOOTHSAYER. fairer are.
  CHARMIAN. means flesh.
  IRAS. No, paint old.
  CHARMIAN. Wrinkles forbid!
  ALEXAS. Vex prescience; attentive.
  CHARMIAN. Hush!
  SOOTHSAYER. beloving beloved.
  CHARMIAN. heat liver drinking.
  ALEXAS. Nay, hear him.
  CHARMIAN. Good now, excellent fortune! married to
    kings forenoon, widow all. a
    child fifty, Herod Jewry homage. Find to
    marry Octavius Caesar, companion mistress.
  SOOTHSAYER. outlive lady serve.
  CHARMIAN. O, excellent! love long life figs.
  SOOTHSAYER. prov'd fairer fortune
    approach.
  CHARMIAN. belike children names.
    Prithee, boys wenches have?  
  SOOTHSAYER. wishes womb,
    fertile wish, million.
  CHARMIAN. Out, fool! forgive thee witch.
  ALEXAS. sheets privy wishes.
  CHARMIAN. Nay, come, Iras hers.
  ALEXAS. fortunes.
  ENOBARBUS. Mine, fortunes, to-night, be-
    drunk bed.
  IRAS. palm presages chastity, else.
  CHARMIAN. E'en o'erflowing Nilus presageth famine.
  IRAS. Go, wild bedfellow, soothsay.
  CHARMIAN. Nay, oily palm fruitful prognostication, I
    scratch mine ear. Prithee, worky-day fortune.
  SOOTHSAYER. fortunes alike.
  IRAS. how, how? Give particulars.
  SOOTHSAYER. said.
  IRAS. inch fortune she?
  CHARMIAN. Well, inch fortune I,
    choose it?
  IRAS. husband's nose.  
  CHARMIAN. worser thoughts heavens mend! Alexas- come, his
    fortune, fortune! O, marry woman go,
    sweet Isis, beseech thee! die too, give a
    worse! worse follow worse, till worst follow
    laughing grave, fiftyfold cuckold! Good Isis, hear
    prayer, thou deny matter weight; good
    Isis, beseech thee!
  IRAS. Amen. Dear goddess, hear prayer people! For, as
    heartbreaking handsome man loose-wiv'd, is
    deadly sorrow behold foul knave uncuckolded. Therefore,
    dear Isis, decorum, fortune accordingly!
  CHARMIAN. Amen.
  ALEXAS. Lo now, lay hands make cuckold, they
    make whores they'ld do't!

                          Enter CLEOPATRA

  ENOBARBUS. Hush! Antony.
  CHARMIAN. he; Queen.
  CLEOPATRA. lord?  
  ENOBARBUS. No, lady.
  CLEOPATRA. here?
  CHARMIAN. No, madam.
  CLEOPATRA. dispos'd mirth; sudden
    Roman thought hath struck him. Enobarbus!
  ENOBARBUS. Madam?
  CLEOPATRA. Seek him, bring hither. Alexas?
  ALEXAS. Here, service. lord approaches.

          Enter ANTONY, MESSENGER attendants

  CLEOPATRA. him. us.
                       Exeunt CLEOPATRA, ENOBARBUS, rest
  MESSENGER. Fulvia thy wife field.
  ANTONY. brother Lucius?
  MESSENGER. Ay.
    war end, time's state
    Made friends them, jointing force 'gainst Caesar,
    issue war Italy
    encounter drave them.  
  ANTONY. Well, worst?
  MESSENGER. nature bad news infects teller.
  ANTONY. concerns fool coward. On!
    Things past me. 'Tis thus:
    tells true, tale lie death,
    hear flatter'd.
  MESSENGER. Labienus-
    stiff news- hath Parthian force
    Extended Asia Euphrates,
    conquering banner shook Syria
    Lydia Ionia,
    Whilst-
  ANTONY. Antony, thou wouldst say.
  MESSENGER. O, lord!
  ANTONY. Speak home; mince general tongue;
    Cleopatra call'd Rome.
    Rail thou Fulvia's phrase, taunt faults
    full licence truth malice
    power utter. O, bring weeds
    quick minds lie still, ills told  
    earing. Fare thee awhile.
  MESSENGER. noble pleasure.                        Exit
  ANTONY. Sicyon, ho, news! Speak there!
  ATTENDANT. man Sicyon- one?
  ATTENDANT. stays will.
  ANTONY. appear.
    strong Egyptian fetters break,
    lose dotage.

                 Enter MESSENGER letter

    you?
  MESSENGER. Fulvia thy wife dead.
  ANTONY. died she?
  MESSENGER. Sicyon.
    length sickness, serious
    Importeth thee know, bears.       [Gives letter]
  ANTONY. Forbear me.                             Exit MESSENGER
    great spirit gone! desire it.
    contempts doth hurl  
    again; present pleasure,
    revolution low'ring, become
    opposite itself. good, gone;
    hand pluck back shov'd on.
    enchanting queen break off.
    Ten thousand harms, ills know,
    idleness doth hatch. now, Enobarbus!

                    Re-enter ENOBARBUS

  ENOBARBUS. pleasure, sir?
  ANTONY. haste hence.
  ENOBARBUS. Why, kill women. mortal an
    unkindness them; suffer departure, death's the
    word.
  ANTONY. gone.
  ENOBARBUS. compelling occasion, women die. pity
    cast nothing, great
    esteemed nothing. Cleopatra, catching but
    noise this, dies instantly; die  
    twenty times poorer moment. mettle
    death, commits loving act her, hath a
    celerity dying.
  ANTONY. cunning past man's thought.
  ENOBARBUS. Alack, sir, no! passions made the
    finest part pure love. call winds waters
    sighs tears; greater storms tempests than
    almanacs report. cunning her; be, she
    makes show'r rain Jove.
  ANTONY. her!
  ENOBARBUS. O Sir, left unseen wonderful piece of
    work, blest withal discredited
    travel.
  ANTONY. Fulvia dead.
  ENOBARBUS. Sir?
  ANTONY. Fulvia dead.
  ENOBARBUS. Fulvia?
  ANTONY. Dead.
  ENOBARBUS. Why, sir, give gods thankful sacrifice. it
    pleaseth deities wife man him,  
    shows man tailors earth; comforting that
    robes worn members make new. If
    women Fulvia, cut,
    case lamented. grief crown'd with
    consolation: smock brings petticoat; and
    tears live onion water sorrow.
  ANTONY. business hath broached state
    endure absence.
  ENOBARBUS. business broach'd be
    you; Cleopatra's, wholly depends
    abode.
  ANTONY. light answers. officers
    notice purpose. break
    expedience Queen,
    leave part. alone
    death Fulvia, urgent touches,
    strongly speak us; letters to
    contriving friends Rome
    Petition home. Sextus Pompeius
    Hath dare Caesar, commands  
    empire sea; slippery people,
    love link'd deserver
    Till deserts past, begin throw
    Pompey Great dignities
    son; who, high power,
    Higher blood life, stands up
    main soldier; quality, on,
    sides o' th' world danger. breeding
    Which, courser's hair, hath life
    serpent's poison. pleasure,
    place us, requires
    quick remove hence.
  ENOBARBUS. do't.                                Exeunt




SCENE III.
Alexandria. CLEOPATRA'S palace

Enter CLEOPATRA, CHARMIAN, IRAS, ALEXAS

  CLEOPATRA. he?
  CHARMIAN. since.
  CLEOPATRA. is, him, does.
    send you. find sad,
    dancing; mirth, report
    sudden sick. Quick, return.        Exit ALEXAS
  CHARMIAN. Madam, methinks, love dearly,
    hold method enforce
    him.
  CLEOPATRA. not?
  CHARMIAN. thing give way; cross nothing.
  CLEOPATRA. Thou teachest fool- lose him.
  CHARMIAN. Tempt far; wish, forbear;
    time hate fear.

                            Enter ANTONY
  
    Antony.
  CLEOPATRA. sick sullen.
  ANTONY. give breathing purpose-
  CLEOPATRA. away, dear Charmian; fall.
    long; sides nature
    sustain it.
  ANTONY. Now, dearest queen-
  CLEOPATRA. Pray you, stand farther me.
  ANTONY. matter?
  CLEOPATRA. eye good news.
    married woman? go.
    leave come!
    'tis here-
    power you; are.
  ANTONY. gods know-
  CLEOPATRA. O, queen
    mightily betray'd! first
    treasons planted.
  ANTONY. Cleopatra-
  CLEOPATRA. mine true,  
    swearing shake throned gods,
    false Fulvia? Riotous madness,
    entangled mouth-made vows,
    break swearing!
  ANTONY. sweet queen-
  CLEOPATRA. Nay, pray seek colour going,
    bid farewell, go. sued staying,
    time words. then!
    Eternity lips eyes,
    Bliss brows' bent, parts poor
    race heaven. still,
    thou, greatest soldier world,
    Art turn'd greatest liar.
  ANTONY. now, lady!
  CLEOPATRA. thy inches. Thou shouldst know
    heart Egypt.
  ANTONY. Hear me, queen:
    strong necessity time commands
    services awhile; full heart
    Remains you. Italy  
    Shines o'er civil swords: Sextus Pompeius
    Makes approaches port Rome;
    Equality domestic powers
    Breed scrupulous faction; hated, grown strength,
    newly grown love. condemn'd Pompey,
    Rich father's honour, creeps apace
    hearts thrived
    present state, numbers threaten;
    quietness, grown sick rest, purge
    desperate change. particular,
    safe going,
    Fulvia's death.
  CLEOPATRA. age folly give freedom,
     childishness. Fulvia die?
  ANTONY. dead, Queen.
    here, thy sovereign leisure read
    garboils awak'd. last, best.
    died.
  CLEOPATRA. O false love!
    sacred vials thou shouldst fill  
    sorrowful water? see, see,
    Fulvia's death mine receiv'd be.
  ANTONY. Quarrel more, prepar'd know
    purposes bear; are, cease,
    give th' advice. fire
    quickens Nilus' slime, hence
    Thy soldier, servant, making peace war
    thou affects.
  CLEOPATRA. Cut lace, Charmian, come!
    be; quickly ill well-
    Antony loves.
  ANTONY. precious queen, forbear,
    give true evidence love, stands
    honourable trial.
  CLEOPATRA. Fulvia told me.
    prithee turn weep her;
    bid adieu me, tears
    Belong Egypt. Good now, play scene
    excellent dissembling, look
    perfect honour.  
  ANTONY. heat blood; more.
  CLEOPATRA. yet; meetly.
  ANTONY. Now, sword-
  CLEOPATRA. target. mends;
    best. Look, prithee, Charmian,
    Herculean Roman become
    carriage chafe.
  ANTONY. leave you, lady.
  CLEOPATRA. Courteous lord, word.
    Sir, part- it.
    Sir, lov'd- it.
    well. would-
    O, oblivion Antony,
    forgotten!
  ANTONY. royalty
    Holds idleness subject, you
    idleness itself.
  CLEOPATRA. 'Tis sweating labour
    bear idleness heart
    Cleopatra this. But, sir, forgive me;  
    becomings kill not
    Eye you. honour calls hence;
    deaf unpitied folly,
    gods you! sword
    Sit laurel victory, smooth success
    strew'd feet!
  ANTONY. go. Come.
    separation abides flies
    thou, residing here, me,
    I, fleeting, remain thee.
    Away!                                                 Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Rome. CAESAR'S house

Enter OCTAVIUS CAESAR, reading letter; LEPIDUS, train

  CAESAR. see, Lepidus, henceforth know,
    Caesar's natural vice hate
    great competitor. Alexandria
    news: fishes, drinks, wastes
    lamps night revel; manlike
    Cleopatra, queen Ptolemy
    womanly he; gave audience, or
    Vouchsaf'd partners. find there
    man abstract faults
    men follow.
  LEPIDUS. are
    Evils enow darken goodness.
    faults, him, spots heaven,
    fiery night's blackness; hereditary
    purchas'd; change
    chooses.  
  CAESAR. indulgent. grant not
    Amiss tumble bed Ptolemy,
    give kingdom mirth, sit
    turn tippling slave,
    reel streets noon, stand buffet
    knaves smell sweat. him-
    composure rare indeed
    things blemish- Antony
    excuse foils bear
    great weight lightness. fill'd
    vacancy voluptuousness,
    Full surfeits dryness bones
    Call for't! confound time
    drums sport speaks loud
    state ours- 'tis chid
    rate boys who, mature knowledge,
    Pawn experience present pleasure,
    rebel judgment.

                   Enter MESSENGER  

  LEPIDUS. news.
  MESSENGER. Thy biddings done; hour,
    noble Caesar, shalt thou report
    'tis abroad. Pompey strong sea,
    appears belov'd those
    fear'd Caesar. ports
    discontents repair, men's reports
    Give wrong'd.
  CAESAR. less.
    hath taught primal state
    wish'd were;
    ebb'd man, ne'er lov'd till ne'er worth love,
    dear'd lack'd. common body,
    vagabond flag stream,
    back, lackeying varying tide,
    rot motion.
  MESSENGER. Caesar, bring thee word
    Menecrates Menas, famous pirates,
    Make sea serve them, ear wound  
    keels kind. hot inroads
    make Italy; borders maritime
    Lack blood on't, flush youth revolt.
    vessel peep 'tis soon
    seen; Pompey's strikes more
    war resisted.
  CAESAR. Antony,
    Leave thy lascivious wassails. thou once
    beaten Modena, thou slew'st
    Hirtius Pansa, consuls, thy heel
    famine follow; thou fought'st against,
    daintily brought up, patience more
    savages suffer. Thou didst drink
    stale horses gilded puddle
    beasts cough at. Thy palate deign
    roughest berry rudest hedge;
    Yea, stag snow pasture sheets,
    barks trees thou brows'd. Alps
    reported thou didst eat strange flesh,
    die on. this-  
    wounds thine honour speak now-
    borne soldier thy cheek
    lank'd not.
  LEPIDUS. 'Tis pity him.
  CAESAR. shames quickly
    Drive Rome. 'Tis time twain
    show i' th' field; end
    Assemble council. Pompey
    Thrives idleness.
  LEPIDUS. To-morrow, Caesar,
    furnish'd inform rightly
    sea land able
    front present time.
  CAESAR. Till encounter
    business too. Farewell.
  LEPIDUS. Farewell, lord. meantime
    stirs abroad, beseech you, sir,
    partaker.
  CAESAR. Doubt not, sir;
    knew bond.                                Exeunt




SCENE V.
Alexandria. CLEOPATRA'S palace

Enter CLEOPATRA, CHARMIAN, IRAS, MARDIAN

  CLEOPATRA. Charmian!
  CHARMIAN. Madam?
  CLEOPATRA. Ha, ha!
    Give drink mandragora.
  CHARMIAN. Why, madam?
  CLEOPATRA. sleep great gap time
    Antony away.
  CHARMIAN. much.
  CLEOPATRA. O, 'tis treason!
  CHARMIAN. Madam, trust, so.
  CLEOPATRA. Thou, eunuch Mardian!
  MARDIAN. Highness' pleasure?
  CLEOPATRA. hear thee sing; pleasure
    aught eunuch has. 'Tis thee
    That, unseminar'd, thy freer thoughts
    fly Egypt. Hast thou affections?
  MARDIAN. Yes, gracious madam.  
  CLEOPATRA. Indeed?
  MARDIAN. deed, madam; nothing
    honest done.
    fierce affections, think
    Venus Mars.
  CLEOPATRA. O Charmian,
    think'st thou now? Stands sits he?
    walk? horse?
    O happy horse, bear weight Antony!
    bravely, horse; wot'st thou thou mov'st?
    demi-Atlas earth, arm
    burgonet men. speaking now,
    murmuring 'Where's serpent Nile?'
    calls me. feed myself
    delicious poison. me,
    Phoebus' amorous pinches black,
    wrinkled deep time? Broad-fronted Caesar,
    thou wast ground, was
    morsel monarch; great Pompey
    stand make eyes grow brow;  
    anchor aspect die
    life.

                         Enter ALEXAS

  ALEXAS. Sovereign Egypt, hail!
  CLEOPATRA. unlike art thou Mark Antony!
    Yet, coming him, great med'cine hath
    tinct gilded thee.
    brave Mark Antony?
  ALEXAS. thing did, dear Queen,
    kiss'd- doubled kisses-
    orient pearl. speech sticks heart.
  CLEOPATRA. Mine ear pluck thence.
  ALEXAS. 'Good friend,' quoth he
    'Say firm Roman great Egypt sends
    treasure oyster; foot,
    mend petty present, piece
    opulent throne kingdoms. East,
    thou, call mistress.' nodded,  
    soberly mount arm-gaunt steed,
    neigh'd high spoke
    beastly dumb'd him.
  CLEOPATRA. What, sad merry?
  ALEXAS. time o' th' year extremes
    hot cold; sad merry.
  CLEOPATRA. O well-divided disposition! Note him,
    Note him, good Charmian; 'tis man; note him!
    sad, shine those
    make his; merry,
    seem'd remembrance lay
    Egypt joy; both.
    O heavenly mingle! Be'st thou sad merry,
    violence thee becomes,
    man else. Met'st thou posts?
  ALEXAS. Ay, madam, twenty messengers.
    send thick?
  CLEOPATRA. born day
    forget send Antony
    die beggar. Ink paper, Charmian.  
    Welcome, good Alexas. I, Charmian,
    love Caesar so?
  CHARMIAN. O brave Caesar!
  CLEOPATRA. chok'd emphasis!
    'the brave Antony.'
  CHARMIAN. valiant Caesar!
  CLEOPATRA. Isis, give thee bloody teeth
    thou Caesar paragon again
    man men.
  CHARMIAN. gracious pardon,
    sing you.
  CLEOPATRA. salad days,
    green judgment, cold blood,
    then. come, away!
    ink paper.
    day greeting,
    unpeople Egypt.                               Exeunt

ACT II. SCENE I.
Messina. POMPEY'S house

Enter POMPEY, MENECRATES, MENAS, warlike manner

  POMPEY. great gods just, assist
    deeds justest men.
  MENECRATES. Know, worthy Pompey,
    delay deny.
  POMPEY. Whiles suitors throne, decays
    thing sue for.
  MENECRATES. We, ignorant ourselves,
    Beg harms, wise pow'rs
    Deny good; find profit
    losing prayers.
  POMPEY. well.
    people love me, sea mine;
    powers crescent, auguring hope
    th' full. Mark Antony
    Egypt sits dinner, make
    wars doors. Caesar money  
    loses hearts. Lepidus flatters both,
    flatter'd; loves,
    cares him.
  MENAS. Caesar Lepidus
    field. mighty strength carry.
  POMPEY. this? 'Tis false.
  MENAS. Silvius, sir.
  POMPEY. dreams. Rome together,
    Antony. charms love,
    Salt Cleopatra, soften thy wan'd lip!
    witchcraft join beauty, lust both;
    Tie libertine field feasts,
    brain fuming. Epicurean cooks
    Sharpen cloyless sauce appetite,
    sleep feeding prorogue honour
    till Lethe'd dullness-

                       Enter VARRIUS

    now, Varrius!  
  VARRIUS. deliver:
    Mark Antony hour Rome
    Expected. Egypt 'tis
    space farther travel.
  POMPEY. matter
    ear. Menas, think
    amorous surfeiter donn'd helm
    petty war; soldiership
    twain. rear
    higher opinion, stirring
    lap Egypt's widow pluck
    ne'er-lust-wearied Antony.
  MENAS. hope
    Caesar Antony greet together.
    wife dead trespasses Caesar;
    brother warr'd him; although, think,
    mov'd Antony.
  POMPEY. not, Menas,
    lesser enmities give greater.
    Were't stand all,  
    'Twere pregnant square themselves;
    entertained enough
    draw swords. fear us
    cement divisions, bind up
    petty difference know.
    Be't gods have't! stands
    lives strongest hands.
    Come, Menas.                                          Exeunt




SCENE II.
Rome. house LEPIDUS

Enter ENOBARBUS LEPIDUS

  LEPIDUS. Good Enobarbus, 'tis worthy deed,
    well, entreat captain
    soft gentle speech.
  ENOBARBUS. entreat him
    answer himself. Caesar move him,
    Antony Caesar's head
    speak loud Mars. Jupiter,
    wearer Antonius' beard,
    shave't to-day.
  LEPIDUS. 'Tis time
    private stomaching.
  ENOBARBUS. time
    Serves matter born in't.
  LEPIDUS. small greater matters give way.
  ENOBARBUS. small first.
  LEPIDUS. speech passion;
    pray stir embers up.  
    noble Antony.

                Enter ANTONY VENTIDIUS

  ENOBARBUS. yonder, Caesar.

            Enter CAESAR, MAECENAS, AGRIPPA

  ANTONY. compose here, Parthia.
    Hark, Ventidius.
  CAESAR. know, Maecenas. Agrippa.
  LEPIDUS. Noble friends,
    combin'd great, not
    leaner action rend us. amiss,
    gently heard. debate
    trivial difference loud, commit
    Murder healing wounds. Then, noble partners,
    earnestly beseech,
    Touch sourest points sweetest terms,
    curstness grow th' matter.  
  ANTONY. 'Tis spoken well.
    arinies, fight,
    thus.                                 [Flourish]
  CAESAR. Rome.
  ANTONY. you.
  CAESAR. Sit.
  ANTONY. Sit, sir.
  CAESAR. Nay, then.                                  [They sit]
  ANTONY. learn things ill so,
    being, concern not.
  CAESAR. laugh'd at
    If, little,
    offended, you
    Chiefly i' world; laugh'd should
    derogately sound name
    concern'd me.
  ANTONY. Egypt, Caesar,
    was't you?
  CAESAR. residing Rome
    Egypt. Yet,  
    practise state, Egypt
    question.
  ANTONY. intend you- practis'd?
  CAESAR. pleas'd catch mine intent
    befall me. wife brother
    Made wars me, contestation
    theme you; word war.
  ANTONY. mistake business; brother never
    urge act. inquire it,
    learning true reports
    drew swords you. rather
    Discredit authority yours,
    make wars alike stomach,
    alike cause? letters
    satisfy you. patch quarrel,
    matter make with,
    this.
  CAESAR. praise yourself
    laying defects judgment me; but
    patch'd excuses.  
  ANTONY. so, so;
    lack, on't,
    necessity thought, I,
    partner 'gainst fought,
    graceful eyes attend wars
    fronted mine peace. wife,
    spirit another!
    o' th' world yours, snaffle
    pace easy, wife.
  ENOBARBUS. wives, men to
    wars women!
  ANTONY. uncurbable, garboils, Caesar,
    Made impatience- wanted
    Shrewdness policy too- grieving grant
    disquiet. must
    it.
  CAESAR. wrote you
    rioting Alexandria; you
    pocket letters, taunts
    gibe missive audience.  
  ANTONY. Sir,
    fell ere admitted. Then
    kings newly feasted, want
    i' th' morning; day
    told myself, much
    ask'd pardon. fellow
    strife; contend,
    question wipe him.
  CAESAR. broken
    article oath, never
    tongue charge with.
  LEPIDUS. Soft, Caesar!
  ANTONY. No;
    Lepidus, speak.
    honour sacred talks now,
    Supposing lack'd it. on, Caesar:
    article oath-
  CAESAR. lend arms aid requir'd them,
    denied.
  ANTONY. Neglected, rather;  
    poisoned hours bound up
    mine knowledge. may,
    play penitent you; mine honesty
    make poor greatness, power
    Work it. Truth is, Fulvia,
    Egypt, made wars here;
    myself, ignorant motive, do
    pardon befits mine honour
    stoop case.
  LEPIDUS. 'Tis noble spoken.
  MAECENAS. enforce further
    griefs ye- forget quite
    remember present need
    Speaks atone you.
  LEPIDUS. Worthily spoken, Maecenas.
  ENOBARBUS. Or, borrow another's love instant,
    may, hear words Pompey, return again.
    time wrangle to
    do.
  ANTONY. Thou art soldier only. Speak more.  
  ENOBARBUS. truth silent forgot.
  ANTONY. wrong presence; speak more.
  ENOBARBUS. to, then- considerate stone!
  CAESAR. dislike matter, but
    manner speech; for't be
    remain friendship, conditions
    diff'ring acts. knew
    hoop hold stanch, edge edge
    O' th' world, pursue it.
  AGRIPPA. Give leave, Caesar.
  CAESAR. Speak, Agrippa.
  AGRIPPA. Thou hast sister mother's side,
    Admir'd Octavia. Great Mark Antony
    widower.
  CAESAR. so, Agrippa.
    Cleopatra heard you, reproof
    deserv'd rashness.
  ANTONY. married, Caesar. hear
    Agrippa speak.
  AGRIPPA. hold perpetual amity,  
    make brothers, knit hearts
    unslipping knot, Antony
    Octavia wife; beauty claims
    worse husband men;
    virtue general graces speak
    utter. marriage
    jealousies, great,
    great fears, import dangers,
    nothing. Truths tales,
    half tales truths. love both
    other, loves both,
    Draw her. Pardon spoke;
    'tis studied, present thought,
    duty ruminated.
  ANTONY. Caesar speak?
  CAESAR. till hears Antony touch'd
    spoke already.
  ANTONY. power Agrippa,
    'Agrippa, so,'
    make good?  
  CAESAR. power Caesar, and
    power Octavia.
  ANTONY. never
    good purpose, fairly shows,
    Dream impediment! thy hand.
    act grace; hour
    heart brothers govern loves
    sway great designs!
  CAESAR. hand.
    sister bequeath you, brother
    love dearly. live
    join kingdoms hearts; never
    Fly loves again!
  LEPIDUS. Happily, amen!
  ANTONY. draw sword 'gainst Pompey;
    hath laid strange courtesies great
    late me. only,
    remembrance suffer ill report;
    heel that, defy him.
  LEPIDUS. Time calls upon's.  
    Pompey presently sought,
    seeks us.
  ANTONY. lies he?
  CAESAR. Mount Misenum.
  ANTONY. strength land?
  CAESAR. Great increasing; sea
    absolute master.
  ANTONY. fame.
    spoke together! Haste it.
    Yet, ere put arms, dispatch we
    business talk'd of.
  CAESAR. gladness;
    invite sister's view,
    straight lead you.
  ANTONY. us, Lepidus,
    lack company.
  LEPIDUS. Noble Antony,
    sickness detain me.                    [Flourish]
                     Exeunt ENOBARBUS, AGRIPPA, MAECENAS
  MAECENAS. Egypt, sir.  
  ENOBARBUS. Half heart Caesar, worthy Maecenas! honourable
    friend, Agrippa!
  AGRIPPA. Good Enobarbus!
  MAECENAS. glad matters well
    digested. stay'd by't Egypt.
  ENOBARBUS. Ay, sir; sleep day countenance made
    night light drinking.
  MAECENAS. wild boars roasted breakfast, but
    twelve persons there. true?
  ENOBARBUS. fly eagle. more
    monstrous matter feast, worthily deserved noting.
  MAECENAS. triumphant lady, report square her.
  ENOBARBUS. met Mark Antony purs'd heart,
    river Cydnus.
  AGRIPPA. appear'd indeed! reporter devis'd for
    her.
  ENOBARBUS. you.
    barge sat in, burnish'd throne,
    Burn'd water. poop beaten gold;
    Purple sails, perfumed  
    winds love-sick them; oars silver,
    tune flutes stroke, made
    water beat follow faster,
    amorous strokes. person,
    beggar'd description. lie
    pavilion, cloth-of-gold, tissue,
    O'erpicturing Venus see
    fancy out-work nature. side her
    Stood pretty dimpled boys, smiling Cupids,
    divers-colour'd fans, wind seem
    glow delicate cheeks cool,
    undid did.
  AGRIPPA. O, rare Antony!
  ENOBARBUS. gentlewomen, Nereides,
    mermaids, tended i' th' eyes,
    made bends adornings. helm
    mermaid steers. silken tackle
    Swell touches flower-soft hands
    yarely frame office. barge
    strange invisible perfume hits sense  
    adjacent wharfs. city cast
    people her; Antony,
    Enthron'd i' th' market-place, sit alone,
    Whistling th' air; which, vacancy,
    gaze Cleopatra too,
    made gap nature.
  AGRIPPA. Rare Egyptian!
  ENOBARBUS. landing, Antony her,
    Invited supper. replied
    guest;
    entreated. courteous Antony,
    ne'er word 'No' woman heard speak,
    barber'd ten times o'er, feast,
    ordinary pays heart
    eyes eat only.
  AGRIPPA. Royal wench!
    made great Caesar lay sword bed.
    ploughed her, cropp'd.
  ENOBARBUS. once
    Hop forty paces public street;  
    And, lost breath, spoke, panted,
    make defect perfection,
    And, breathless, pow'r breathe forth.
  MAECENAS. Antony leave utterly.
  ENOBARBUS. Never! not.
    Age wither her, custom stale
    infinite variety. women cloy
    appetites feed, makes hungry
    satisfies; vilest things
    her, holy priests
    Bless riggish.
  MAECENAS. beauty, wisdom, modesty, settle
    heart Antony, Octavia is
    blessed lottery him.
  AGRIPPA. go.
    Good Enobarbus, make guest
    Whilst abide here.
  ENOBARBUS. Humbly, sir, you.                    Exeunt




SCENE III.
Rome. CAESAR'S house

Enter ANTONY, CAESAR, OCTAVIA them

  ANTONY. world great office sometimes
    Divide bosom.
  OCTAVIA. time
    gods knee bow prayers
    you.
  ANTONY. Good night, sir. Octavia,
    Read blemishes world's report.
    square; come
    th' rule. Good night, dear lady.
  OCTAVIA. Good night, sir.
  CAESAR. Good night.                  Exeunt CAESAR OCTAVIA

                        Enter SOOTHSAYER

  ANTONY. Now, sirrah, Egypt?
  SOOTHSAYER. thence, thither!
  ANTONY. can- reason.  
  SOOTHSAYER. motion, tongue; but
    hie Egypt again.
  ANTONY. me,
    fortunes rise higher, Caesar's mine?
  SOOTHSAYER. Caesar's.
    Therefore, O Antony, stay side.
    Thy daemon, thy spirit thee, is
    Noble, courageous, high, unmatchable,
    Caesar's not; thy angel
    fear, o'erpow'r'd. Therefore
    Make space you.
  ANTONY. Speak more.
  SOOTHSAYER. thee; thee.
    thou dost play game,
    Thou art lose; natural luck
    beats thee 'gainst odds. Thy lustre thickens
    shines by. again, thy spirit
    afraid govern thee him;
    But, away, 'tis noble.
  ANTONY. thee gone.  
    Ventidius speak him.
                                                 Exit SOOTHSAYER
    Parthia.- art hap,
    hath spoken true. dice obey him;
    sports cunning faints
    chance. draw lots, speeds;
    cocks win battle mine,
    nought, quails ever
    Beat mine, inhoop'd, odds. Egypt;
    make marriage peace,
    I' th' East pleasure lies.

                       Enter VENTIDIUS

    O, come, Ventidius,
    Parthia. commission's ready;
    Follow receive't.                              Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Rome. street

Enter LEPIDUS, MAECENAS, AGRIPPA

  LEPIDUS. Trouble further. Pray hasten
    generals after.
  AGRIPPA. Sir, Mark Antony
    e'en kiss Octavia, follow.
  LEPIDUS. Till soldier's dress,
    both, farewell.
  MAECENAS. shall,
    conceive journey, th' Mount
    you, Lepidus.
  LEPIDUS. shorter;
    purposes draw about.
    win days me.
  BOTH. Sir, good success!
  LEPIDUS. Farewell.                                      Exeunt




SCENE V.
Alexandria. CLEOPATRA'S palace

Enter CLEOPATRA, CHARMIAN, IRAS, ALEXAS

  CLEOPATRA. Give music- music, moody food
    trade love.
  ALL. music, ho!

                    Enter MARDIAN eunuch

  CLEOPATRA. alone! billiards. Come, Charmian.
  CHARMIAN. arm sore; play Mardian.
  CLEOPATRA. woman eunuch play'd
    woman. Come, play me, sir?
  MARDIAN. can, madam.
  CLEOPATRA. good show'd, though't short,
    actor plead pardon. now.
    Give mine angle- th' river. There,
    music playing off, betray
    Tawny-finn'd fishes; bended hook pierce
    slimy jaws; draw up
    Antony,
    'Ah ha! Y'are caught.'
  CHARMIAN. 'Twas merry when
    wager'd angling; diver
    hang salt fish hook, he
    fervency drew up.
  CLEOPATRA. time? O times
    laughed patience; night
    laugh'd patience; morn,
    Ere ninth hour, drunk bed,
    put tires mantles him, whilst
    wore sword Philippan.

                    Enter MESSENGER

    O! Italy?
    Ram thou thy fruitful tidings mine ears,
    long time barren.
  MESSENGER. Madam, madam-
  CLEOPATRA. Antony's dead! thou so, villain,  
    Thou kill'st thy mistress; free,
    thou yield him, gold, here
    bluest veins kiss- hand kings
    lipp'd, trembled kissing.
  MESSENGER. First, madam, well.
  CLEOPATRA. Why, gold.
    But, sirrah, mark, use
    dead well. Bring that,
    gold give thee melt pour
    thy ill-uttering throat.
  MESSENGER. Good madam, hear me.
  CLEOPATRA. Well, to, will.
    goodness thy face. Antony
    free healthful- tart favour
    trumpet good tidings? well,
    Thou shouldst Fury crown'd snakes,
    formal man.
  MESSENGER. Will't hear me?
  CLEOPATRA. mind strike thee ere thou speak'st.
    Yet, thou Antony lives, well,  
    friends Caesar, captive him,
    set thee shower gold, hail
    Rich pearls thee.
  MESSENGER. Madam, well.
  CLEOPATRA. said.
  MESSENGER. friends Caesar.
  CLEOPATRA. Th'art honest man.
  MESSENGER. Caesar greater friends ever.
  CLEOPATRA. Make thee fortune me.
  MESSENGER. yet, madam-
  CLEOPATRA. 'but yet.' allay
    good precedence; fie 'but yet'!
    'But yet' gaoler bring forth
    monstrous malefactor. Prithee, friend,
    Pour pack matter mine ear,
    good bad together. friends Caesar;
    state health, thou say'st; and, thou say'st, free.
  MESSENGER. Free, madam! No; made report.
    bound Octavia.
  CLEOPATRA. good turn?  
  MESSENGER. turn i' th' bed.
  CLEOPATRA. pale, Charmian.
  MESSENGER. Madam, married Octavia.
  CLEOPATRA. infectious pestilence thee!
                                              [Strikes down]
  MESSENGER. Good madam, patience.
  CLEOPATRA. you? Hence,                  [Strikes him]
    Horrible villain! spurn thine eyes
    balls me; unhair thy head;
                                     [She hales down]
    Thou shalt whipp'd wire stew'd brine,
    Smarting ling'ring pickle.
  MESSENGER. Gracious madam,
    bring news made match.
  CLEOPATRA. 'tis so, province give thee,
    make thy fortunes proud. blow thou hadst
    make thy peace moving rage;
    boot thee gift beside
    Thy modesty beg.
  MESSENGER. married, madam.  
  CLEOPATRA. Rogue, thou hast liv'd long.    [Draws knife]
  MESSENGER. Nay, run.
    you, madam? made fault.             Exit
  CHARMIAN. Good madam, yourself:
    man innocent.
  CLEOPATRA. innocents scape thunderbolt.
    Melt Egypt Nile! kindly creatures
    Turn serpents! Call slave again.
    mad, bite him. Call!
  CHARMIAN. afear'd come.
  CLEOPATRA. hurt him.
    hands lack nobility, strike
    meaner myself; myself
    cause.

                    Enter MESSENGER again

    hither, sir.
    honest, good
    bring bad news. Give gracious message  
    host tongues; ill tidings tell
    felt.
  MESSENGER. duty.
  CLEOPATRA. married?
    hate thee worser do
    thou 'Yes.'
  MESSENGER. married, madam.
  CLEOPATRA. gods confound thee! Dost thou hold still?
  MESSENGER. lie, madam?
  CLEOPATRA. O, thou didst,
    half Egypt submerg'd made
    cistern scal'd snakes! Go, thee hence.
    Hadst thou Narcissus thy face, me
    Thou wouldst ugly. married?
  MESSENGER. crave Highness' pardon.
  CLEOPATRA. married?
  MESSENGER. offence offend you;
    punish make do
    unequal. married Octavia.
  CLEOPATRA. O, fault make knave thee  
    art th'art of! thee hence.
    merchandise thou hast brought Rome
    dear me. Lie thy hand,
    undone 'em!                         Exit MESSENGER
  CHARMIAN. Good Highness, patience.
  CLEOPATRA. praising Antony disprais'd Caesar.
  CHARMIAN. times, madam.
  CLEOPATRA. paid for't now. Lead hence,
    faint. O Iras, Charmian! 'Tis matter.
    fellow, good Alexas; bid him
    Report feature Octavia, years,
    inclination; leave out
    colour hair. Bring word quickly.
                                                     Exit ALEXAS
    go- not, Charmian-
    painted Gorgon,
    way's Mars.                         [To MARDIAN]
    Bid Alexas
    Bring word tall is.- Pity me, Charmian,
    speak me. Lead chamber.        Exeunt




SCENE VI.
Near Misenum

Flourish. Enter POMPEY MENAS door, drum trumpet;
at another, CAESAR, ANTONY, LEPIDUS, ENOBARBUS, MAECENAS, AGRIPPA,
with soldiers marching

  POMPEY. hostages have, mine;
    talk fight.
  CAESAR. meet
    words; we
    written purposes sent;
    thou hast considered, know
    'twill tie thy discontented sword
    carry back Sicily tall youth
    perish here.
  POMPEY. three,
    senators great world,
    Chief factors gods: know
    Wherefore father revengers want,
    son friends, Julius Caesar,  
    Philippi good Brutus ghosted,
    labouring him. was't
    mov'd pale Cassius conspire? what
    Made all-honour'd honest Roman, Brutus,
    arm'd rest, courtiers beauteous freedom,
    drench Capitol, would
    man man? it
    Hath made rig navy, burden
    anger'd ocean foams; meant
    scourge th' ingratitude despiteful Rome
    Cast noble father.
  CAESAR. time.
  ANTONY. Thou canst fear us, Pompey, thy sails;
    speak thee sea; land thou know'st
    o'er-count thee.
  POMPEY. land, indeed,
    Thou dost o'er-count father's house.
    cuckoo builds himself,
    Remain in't thou mayst.
  LEPIDUS. pleas'd us-  
    present- take
    offers you.
  CAESAR. point.
  ANTONY. entreated to, weigh
    worth embrac'd.
  CAESAR. follow,
    larger fortune.
  POMPEY. made offer
    Sicily, Sardinia; must
    Rid sea pirates; send
    Measures wheat Rome; 'greed upon,
    part unhack'd edges bear back
    targes undinted.
  ALL. offer.
  POMPEY. Know, then,
    man prepar'd
    offer; Mark Antony
    Put impatience. lose
    praise telling, know,
    Caesar brother blows,  
    mother Sicily find
    friendly.
  ANTONY. heard it, Pompey,
    studied liberal thanks
    owe you.
  POMPEY. hand.
    think, sir, met here.
  ANTONY. beds i' th' East soft; you,
    call'd timelier purpose hither;
    gained by't.
  CAESAR. last
    change you.
  POMPEY. Well, not
    counts harsh fortune casts face;
    bosom come
    make heart vassal.
  LEPIDUS. met here.
  POMPEY. hope so, Lepidus. agreed.
    crave composition written,
    seal'd us.  
  CAESAR. do.
  POMPEY. feast ere part, let's
    Draw lots begin.
  ANTONY. I, Pompey.
  POMPEY. No, Antony, lot;
    But, last, fine Egyptian cookery
    fame. heard Julius Caesar
    Grew fat feasting there.
  ANTONY. heard much.
  POMPEY. fair meanings, sir.
  ANTONY. fair words them.
  POMPEY. heard;
    heard Apollodorus carried-
  ENOBARBUS. that! so.
  POMPEY. What, pray you?
  ENOBARBUS. queen Caesar mattress.
  POMPEY. thee now. far'st thou, soldier?
  ENOBARBUS. Well;
    do, perceive
    feasts toward.  
  POMPEY. shake thy hand.
    hated thee; thee fight,
    envied thy behaviour.
  ENOBARBUS. Sir,
    lov'd much; ha' prais'd ye
    deserv'd ten times much
    did.
  POMPEY. Enjoy thy plainness;
    ill thee.
    Aboard galley invite all.
    lead, lords?
  ALL. Show's way, sir.
  POMPEY. Come.               Exeunt ENOBARBUS MENAS
  MENAS. [Aside] Thy father, Pompey, ne'er made this
    treaty.- known, sir.
  ENOBARBUS. sea, think.
  MENAS. have, sir.
  ENOBARBUS. water.
  MENAS. land.
  ENOBARBUS. praise man praise me;  
    denied land.
  MENAS. water.
  ENOBARBUS. Yes, deny safety: you
    great thief sea.
  MENAS. land.
  ENOBARBUS. deny land service. give hand,
    Menas; eyes authority, two
    thieves kissing.
  MENAS. men's faces true, whatsome'er hands are.
  ENOBARBUS. fair woman true face.
  MENAS. slander: steal hearts.
  ENOBARBUS. fight you.
  MENAS. part, turn'd drinking.
    Pompey doth day laugh fortune.
  ENOBARBUS. do, weep't back again.
  MENAS. Y'have said, sir. look'd Mark Antony here. Pray
    you, married Cleopatra?
  ENOBARBUS. Caesar' sister call'd Octavia.
  MENAS. True, sir; wife Caius Marcellus.
  ENOBARBUS. wife Marcus Antonius.  
  MENAS. Pray ye, sir?
  ENOBARBUS. 'Tis true.
  MENAS. Caesar knit together.
  ENOBARBUS. bound divine unity, not
    prophesy so.
  MENAS. policy purpose made marriage
    love parties.
  ENOBARBUS. too. find band seems
    tie friendship strangler of
    amity: Octavia holy, cold, conversation.
  MENAS. wife so?
  ENOBARBUS. so; Mark Antony. He
    Egyptian dish again; sighs Octavia
    blow fire Caesar, and, before, is
    strength amity prove author of
    variance. Antony affection is; he
    married occasion here.
  MENAS. be. Come, sir, aboard? a
    health you.
  ENOBARBUS. it, sir. us'd throats Egypt.  
  MENAS. Come, away.                                Exeunt

ACT_2|SC_7
                           SCENE VII.
             board POMPEY'S galley, Misenum

     Music plays. Enter SERVANTS banquet

  SERVANT. be, man. o' plants are
    ill-rooted already; wind i' th' world blow them
    down.
  SERVANT. Lepidus high-colour'd.
  SERVANT. made drink alms-drink.
  SERVANT. pinch disposition, he
    cries 'No more!'; reconciles entreaty himself
    th' drink.
  SERVANT. raises greater war his
    discretion.
  SERVANT. Why, great men's
    fellowship. lief reed service
    partizan heave.
  SERVANT. call'd huge sphere, seen
    move in't, holes eyes be, pitifully
    disaster cheeks.
  
           sennet sounded. Enter CAESAR, ANTONY, LEPIDUS,
            POMPEY, AGRIPPA, MAECENAS, ENOBARBUS, MENAS,
                         CAPTAINS

  ANTONY. [To CAESAR] they, sir: flow o' th'
      Nile
    scales i' th' pyramid; know
    th' height, lowness, mean, dearth
    foison follow. higher Nilus swells
    promises; ebbs, seedsman
    slime ooze scatters grain,
    shortly harvest.
  LEPIDUS. Y'have strange serpents there.
  ANTONY. Ay, Lepidus.
  LEPIDUS. serpent Egypt bred mud the
    operation sun; crocodile.
  ANTONY. so.
  POMPEY. Sit- wine! health Lepidus!
  LEPIDUS. be, ne'er out.
  ENOBARBUS. till slept. fear till  
    then.
  LEPIDUS. Nay, certainly, heard Ptolemies' pyramises are
    goodly things. contradiction heard that.
  MENAS. [Aside POMPEY] Pompey, word.
  POMPEY. [Aside MENAS] mine ear; is't?
  MENAS. [Aside POMPEY] Forsake thy seat, beseech thee,
      Captain,
    hear speak word.
  POMPEY. [ Whispers in's ear ] Forbear till anon-
    wine Lepidus!
  LEPIDUS. manner o' thing crocodile?
  ANTONY. shap'd, sir, itself, broad it
    hath breadth; high is, moves own
    organs. lives nourisheth it, elements
    it, transmigrates.
  LEPIDUS. colour of?
  ANTONY. colour too.
  LEPIDUS. 'Tis strange serpent.
  ANTONY. 'Tis so. tears wet.
  CAESAR. description satisfy him?  
  ANTONY. health Pompey him, very
    epicure.
  POMPEY. [Aside MENAS] Go, hang, sir, hang! that!
      Away!
    bid you.- cup call'd for?
  MENAS. [Aside POMPEY] sake merit thou wilt hear
      me,
    Rise thy stool.
  POMPEY. [Aside MENAS] th'art mad. [Rises walks
    aside] matter?
  MENAS. held cap thy fortunes.
  POMPEY. Thou hast serv'd faith. say?-
    jolly, lords.
  ANTONY. quicksands, Lepidus,
    them, sink.
  MENAS. Wilt thou lord world?
  POMPEY. say'st thou?
  MENAS. Wilt thou lord world? twice.
  POMPEY. be?
  MENAS. entertain it,  
    poor, man
    give thee world.
  POMPEY. Hast thou drunk well?
  MENAS. No, Pompey, cup.
    Thou art, thou dar'st be, earthly Jove;
    Whate'er ocean pales sky inclips
    thine, thou wilt ha't.
  POMPEY. Show way.
  MENAS. world-sharers, competitors,
    thy vessel. cut cable;
    put off, fall throats.
    thine.
  POMPEY. Ah, thou shouldst done,
    spoke on't. 'tis villainy:
    thee't good service. Thou know
    'Tis profit lead mine honour:
    Mine honour, it. Repent e'er thy tongue
    Hath betray'd thine act. unknown,
    found done,
    condemn now. Desist, drink.  
  MENAS. [Aside] this,
    follow thy pall'd fortunes more.
    seeks, 'tis offer'd,
    find more.
  POMPEY. health Lepidus!
  ANTONY. Bear ashore. pledge him, Pompey.
  ENOBARBUS. thee, Menas!
  MENAS. Enobarbus, welcome!
  POMPEY. Fill till cup hid.
  ENOBARBUS. strong fellow, Menas.
               [Pointing servant carries LEPIDUS]
  MENAS. Why?
  ENOBARBUS. 'A bears part world, man; see'st not?
  MENAS. part, then, drunk. all,
    wheels!
  ENOBARBUS. Drink thou; increase reels.
  MENAS. Come.
  POMPEY. Alexandrian feast.
  ANTONY. ripens it. Strike vessels, ho!
    Caesar!  
  CAESAR. forbear't.
    monstrous labour wash brain
    grows fouler.
  ANTONY. child o' th' time.
  CAESAR. Possess it, make answer.
    fast days
    drink one.
  ENOBARBUS. [To ANTONY] Ha, brave emperor!
    dance Egyptian Bacchanals
    celebrate drink?
  POMPEY. ha't, good soldier.
  ANTONY. Come, hands,
    Till conquering wine hath steep'd sense
    soft delicate Lethe.
  ENOBARBUS. hands.
    Make battery ears loud music,
    place you; boy sing;
    holding man bear loud
    strong sides volley.
               [Music plays. ENOBARBUS places hand hand]  

                        SONG
            Come, thou monarch vine,
            Plumpy Bacchus pink eyne!
            thy fats cares drown'd,
            thy grapes hairs crown'd.
            Cup till world round,
            Cup till world round!

  CAESAR. more? Pompey, good night. Good brother,
    request off; graver business
    Frowns levity. Gentle lords, part;
    burnt cheeks. Strong Enobarb
    weaker wine, mine tongue
    Splits speaks. wild disguise hath almost
    Antick'd all. words? Good night.
    Good Antony, hand.
  POMPEY. shore.
  ANTONY. shall, sir. Give's hand.
  POMPEY. O Antony,  
    father's house- what? friends.
    Come, boat.
  ENOBARBUS. heed fall not.
                              Exeunt ENOBARBUS MENAS
    Menas, shore.
  MENAS. No, cabin.
    drums! trumpets, flutes! what!
    Neptune hear bid loud farewell
    great fellows. Sound hang'd, sound out!
                                  [Sound flourish, drums]
  ENOBARBUS. Hoo! 'a. cap.
  MENAS. Hoo! Noble Captain, come.                        Exeunt
ACT_3|SC_1
                     ACT III. SCENE I.
                     plain Syria

       Enter VENTIDIUS, triumph, SILIUS
      Romans, OFFICERS soldiers; dead body
                PACORUS borne him

  VENTIDIUS. Now, darting Parthia, art thou struck, now
    Pleas'd fortune Marcus Crassus' death
    Make revenger. Bear King's son's body
    army. Thy Pacorus, Orodes,
    Pays Marcus Crassus.
  SILIUS. Noble Ventidius,
    Whilst Parthian blood thy sword warm
    fugitive Parthians follow; spur Media,
    Mesopotamia, shelters whither
    routed fly. thy grand captain, Antony,
    set thee triumphant chariots and
    Put garlands thy head.
  VENTIDIUS. O Silius, Silius,
    enough. lower place, note well,
    make great act; learn this, Silius:  
    leave undone deed
    Acquire high fame serve's away.
    Caesar Antony won
    officer, person. Sossius,
    place Syria, lieutenant,
    quick accumulation renown,
    achiev'd th' minute, lost favour.
    i' th' wars captain can
    captain's captain; ambition,
    soldier's virtue, makes choice loss
    gain darkens him.
    Antonius good,
    'twould offend him; offence
    performance perish.
  SILIUS. Thou hast, Ventidius, that
    soldier sword
    Grants scarce distinction. Thou wilt write Antony?
  VENTIDIUS. humbly signify name,
    magical word war, effected;
    How, banners, well-paid ranks,  
    ne'er-yet-beaten horse Parthia
    jaded o' th' field.
  SILIUS. now?
  VENTIDIUS. purposeth Athens; whither, haste
    weight convey with's permit,
    him.- On, there; pass along.
                                                          Exeunt

ACT_3|SC_2
                            SCENE II. Rome. CAESAR'S house

        Enter AGRIPPA door, ENOBARBUS another

  AGRIPPA. What, brothers parted?
  ENOBARBUS. dispatch'd Pompey; gone;
    sealing. Octavia weeps
    part Rome; Caesar sad; Lepidus,
    Pompey's feast, Menas says, troubled
    green sickness.
  AGRIPPA. 'Tis noble Lepidus.
  ENOBARBUS. fine one. O, loves Caesar!
  AGRIPPA. Nay, dearly adores Mark Antony!
  ENOBARBUS. Caesar? Jupiter men.
  AGRIPPA. Antony? god Jupiter.
  ENOBARBUS. Spake Caesar? How! nonpareil!
  AGRIPPA. O, Antony! O thou Arabian bird!
  ENOBARBUS. praise Caesar, 'Caesar'- further.
  AGRIPPA. Indeed, plied excellent praises.
  ENOBARBUS. loves Caesar best. loves Antony.
    Hoo! hearts, tongues, figures, scribes, bards, poets,  
    Think, speak, cast, write, sing, number- hoo!-
    love Antony. Caesar,
    Kneel down, kneel down, wonder.
  AGRIPPA. loves.
  ENOBARBUS. shards, beetle. [Trumpets
      within] So-
    horse. Adieu, noble Agrippa.
  AGRIPPA. Good fortune, worthy soldier, farewell.

           Enter CAESAR, ANTONY, LEPIDUS, OCTAVIA

  ANTONY. further, sir.
  CAESAR. great part myself;
    in't. Sister, prove wife
    thoughts make thee, farthest band
    pass thy approof. noble Antony,
    piece virtue set
    Betwixt cement love
    builded ram batter
    fortress it;  
    lov'd mean, parts
    cherish'd.
  ANTONY. Make offended
    distrust.
  CAESAR. said.
  ANTONY. find,
    curious, cause
    fear. gods you,
    make hearts Romans serve ends!
    part.
  CAESAR. Farewell, dearest sister, fare thee well.
    elements kind thee make
    Thy spirits comfort! Fare thee well.
  OCTAVIA. noble brother!
  ANTONY. April's eyes. love's spring,
    showers bring on. cheerful.
  OCTAVIA. Sir, husband's house; and-
  CAESAR. What, Octavia?
  OCTAVIA. ear.
  ANTONY. tongue obey heart,  
    heart inform tongue- swan's feather,
    stands swell full tide,
    inclines.
  ENOBARBUS. [Aside AGRIPPA] Caesar weep?
  AGRIPPA. [Aside ENOBARBUS] cloud in's face.
  ENOBARBUS. [Aside AGRIPPA] worse that, a
      horse;
    he, man.
  AGRIPPA. [Aside ENOBARBUS] Why, Enobarbus,
    Antony found Julius Caesar dead,
    cried roaring; wept
    Philippi found Brutus slain.
  ENOBARBUS. [Aside AGRIPPA] year, indeed, troubled
      rheum;
    willingly confound wail'd,
    Believe't- till weep too.
  CAESAR. No, sweet Octavia,
    hear still; time not
    Out-go thinking you.
  ANTONY. Come, sir, come;  
    wrestle strength love.
    Look, you; go,
    give gods.
  CAESAR. Adieu; happy!
  LEPIDUS. number stars give light
    thy fair way!
  CAESAR. Farewell, farewell!                   [Kisses OCTAVIA]
  ANTONY. Farewell!                       Trumpets sound. Exeunt

ACT_3|SC_3
                          SCENE III.
              Alexandria. CLEOPATRA'S palace

         Enter CLEOPATRA, CHARMIAN, IRAS, ALEXAS

  CLEOPATRA. fellow?
  ALEXAS. Half afeard come.
  CLEOPATRA. to, to.

                Enter MESSENGER before

    hither, sir.
  ALEXAS. Good Majesty,
    Herod Jewry dare you
    pleas'd.
  CLEOPATRA. Herod's head
    have. how, Antony gone,
    command it? thou near.
  MESSENGER. gracious Majesty!
  CLEOPATRA. Didst thou behold Octavia?
  MESSENGER. Ay, dread Queen.
  CLEOPATRA. Where?  
  MESSENGER. Madam, Rome
    look'd face, led
    brother Mark Antony.
  CLEOPATRA. tall me?
  MESSENGER. not, madam.
  CLEOPATRA. Didst hear speak? shrill-tongu'd low?
  MESSENGER. Madam, heard speak: low-voic'd.
  CLEOPATRA. good. long.
  CHARMIAN. her? O Isis! 'tis impossible.
  CLEOPATRA. so, Charmian. Dull tongue dwarfish!
    majesty gait? Remember,
    e'er thou look'dst majesty.
  MESSENGER. creeps.
    motion station one;
    shows body life,
    statue breather.
  CLEOPATRA. certain?
  MESSENGER. observance.
  CHARMIAN. Egypt
    make note.  
  CLEOPATRA. knowing;
    perceive't. yet.
    fellow good judgment.
  CHARMIAN. Excellent.
  CLEOPATRA. Guess years, prithee.
  MESSENGER. Madam,
    widow.
  CLEOPATRA. Widow? Charmian, hark!
  MESSENGER. thirty.
  CLEOPATRA. Bear'st thou face mind? Is't long round?
  MESSENGER. Round faultiness.
  CLEOPATRA. part, too, foolish so.
    hair, colour?
  MESSENGER. Brown, madam; forehead
    low it.
  CLEOPATRA. gold thee.
    Thou sharpness ill.
    employ thee back again; find thee
    fit business. make thee ready;
    letters prepar'd.                   Exeunt MESSENGER  
  CHARMIAN. proper man.
  CLEOPATRA. Indeed, so. repent much
    harried him. Why, methinks, him,
    creature's thing.
  CHARMIAN. Nothing, madam.
  CLEOPATRA. man hath majesty, know.
  CHARMIAN. Hath majesty? Isis defend,
    serving long!
  CLEOPATRA. thing yet, good Charmian.
    'tis matter; thou shalt bring me
    write. enough.
  CHARMIAN. warrant you, madam.                         Exeunt

ACT_3|SC_4
                          SCENE IV.
                  Athens. ANTONY'S house

                 Enter ANTONY OCTAVIA

  ANTONY. Nay, nay, Octavia, that-
    excusable, thousands more
    semblable import- hath wag'd
    wars 'gainst Pompey; made will, read it
    public ear;
    Spoke scandy me; perforce not
    pay terms honour, cold sickly
    vented them, narrow measure lent me;
    hint him, took't,
    teeth.
  OCTAVIA. O good lord,
    all; believe,
    Stomach all. unhappy lady,
    division chance, ne'er stood between,
    Praying parts.
    good gods mock presently
    pray 'O, bless lord husband!'  
    Undo prayer crying loud
    'O, bless brother!' Husband win, win brother,
    Prays, destroys prayer; mid-way
    'Twixt extremes all.
  ANTONY. Gentle Octavia,
    love draw point seeks
    preserve it. lose mine honour,
    lose myself; yours
    branchless. But, requested,
    between's. meantime, lady,
    raise preparation war
    stain brother. Make soonest haste;
    desires yours.
  OCTAVIA. lord.
    Jove power make me, weak, weak,
    reconciler! Wars 'twixt twain be
    world cleave, slain men
    solder rift.
  ANTONY. appears begins,
    Turn displeasure way, faults  
    equal love
    equally move them. Provide going;
    Choose company, command cost
    heart mind to.                               Exeunt

ACT_3|SC_5
                           SCENE V.
                   Athens. ANTONY'S house

             Enter ENOBARBUS EROS, meeting

  ENOBARBUS. now, friend Eros!
  EROS. strange news come, sir.
  ENOBARBUS. What, man?
  EROS. Caesar Lepidus made wars Pompey.
  ENOBARBUS. old. success?
  EROS. Caesar, made wars 'gainst Pompey,
    presently denied rivality, partake the
    glory action; resting here, accuses letters
    wrote Pompey; appeal, seizes him.
    poor up, till death enlarge confine.
  ENOBARBUS. Then, world, thou hast pair chaps- more;
    throw food thou hast,
    grind other. Antony?
  EROS. walking garden- thus, spurns
    rush lies him; cries 'Fool Lepidus!'
    threats throat officer
    murd'red Pompey.  
  ENOBARBUS. great navy's rigg'd.
  EROS. Italy Caesar. More, Domitius:
    lord desires presently; news
    told hereafter.
  ENOBARBUS. 'Twill naught;
    be. Bring Antony.
  EROS. Come, sir.                                        Exeunt

ACT_3|SC_6
                          SCENE VI.
                   Rome. CAESAR'S house

             Enter CAESAR, AGRIPPA, MAECENAS

  CAESAR. Contemning Rome, more
    Alexandria. manner of't:
    I' th' market-place, tribunal silver'd,
    Cleopatra chairs gold
    publicly enthron'd; feet sat
    Caesarion, call father's son,
    unlawful issue lust
    hath made them. her
    gave stablishment Egypt; made her
    lower Syria, Cyprus, Lydia,
    Absolute queen.
  MAECENAS. public eye?
  CAESAR. I' th' common show-place, exercise.
    sons proclaim'd kings kings:
    Great Media, Parthia, Armenia,
    gave Alexander; Ptolemy assign'd
    Syria, Cilicia, Phoenicia.  
    th' habiliments goddess Isis
    day appear'd; oft gave audience,
    'tis reported, so.
  MAECENAS. Rome thus
    Inform'd.
  AGRIPPA. Who, queasy insolence
    Already, good thoughts call him.
  CAESAR. people it, receiv'd
    accusations.
  AGRIPPA. accuse?
  CAESAR. Caesar; that, Sicily
    Sextus Pompeius spoil'd, rated him
    part o' th' isle. lent me
    shipping, unrestor'd. Lastly, frets
    Lepidus triumvirate
    depos'd; and, being, detain
    revenue.
  AGRIPPA. Sir, answer'd.
  CAESAR. 'Tis already, messenger gone.
    told Lepidus grown cruel,  
    high authority abus'd,
    deserve change. conquer'd
    grant part; then, Armenia
    conquer'd kingdoms,
    Demand like.
  MAECENAS. yield that.
  CAESAR. yielded this.

                Enter OCTAVIA, train

  OCTAVIA. Hail, Caesar, lord! hail, dear Caesar!
  CAESAR. call thee cast-away!
  OCTAVIA. call'd so, cause.
  CAESAR. stol'n thus? not
    Caesar's sister. wife Antony
    army usher, and
    neighs horse approach
    Long ere appear. trees th' way
    borne men, expectation fainted,
    Longing not. Nay, dust  
    ascended roof heaven,
    Rais'd populous troops. come
    market-maid Rome, prevented
    ostentation love, left unshown
    left unlov'd. met you
    sea land, supplying stage
    augmented greeting.
  OCTAVIA. Good lord,
    constrain'd, it
    free will. lord, Mark Antony,
    Hearing prepar'd war, acquainted
    grieved ear withal; whereon begg'd
    pardon return.
  CAESAR. granted,
    obstruct 'tween lust him.
  OCTAVIA. so, lord.
  CAESAR. eyes him,
    affairs wind.
    now?
  OCTAVIA. lord, Athens.  
  CAESAR. No, wronged sister: Cleopatra
    Hath nodded her. hath empire
    whore, levying
    kings o' th' earth war. hath assembled
    Bocchus, king Libya; Archelaus
    Cappadocia; Philadelphos, king
    Paphlagonia; Thracian king, Adallas;
    King Manchus Arabia; King Pont;
    Herod Jewry; Mithridates, king
    Comagene; Polemon Amyntas,
    kings Mede Lycaonia, with
    larger list sceptres.
  OCTAVIA. Ay wretched,
    heart parted betwixt friends,
    afflict other!
  CAESAR. hither.
    letters withhold breaking forth,
    Till perceiv'd wrong led
    negligent danger. Cheer heart;
    troubled time, drives  
    O'er content strong necessities,
    determin'd things destiny
    Hold unbewail'd way. Rome;
    dear me. abus'd
    mark thought, high gods,
    justice, make ministers
    love you. comfort,
    us.
  AGRIPPA. Welcome, lady.
  MAECENAS. Welcome, dear madam.
    heart Rome love pity you;
    th' adulterous Antony, large
    abominations, turns off,
    potent regiment trull
    noises us.
  OCTAVIA. so, sir?
  CAESAR. certain. Sister, welcome. Pray you
    patience. dear'st sister!         Exeunt

ACT_3|SC_7
                          SCENE VII.
                  ANTONY'S camp Actium

                Enter CLEOPATRA ENOBARBUS

  CLEOPATRA. thee, doubt not.
  ENOBARBUS. why, why,
  CLEOPATRA. Thou hast forspoke wars,
    say'st fit.
  ENOBARBUS. Well, it, it?
  CLEOPATRA. Is't denounc'd us? we
    person?
  ENOBARBUS. [Aside] Well, reply:
    serve horse mares together
    horse lost; mares bear
    soldier horse.
  CLEOPATRA. is't say?
  ENOBARBUS. presence puzzle Antony;
    heart, brain, from's time,
    spar'd. already
    Traduc'd levity; 'tis Rome
    Photinus eunuch maids  
    Manage war.
  CLEOPATRA. Sink Rome, tongues rot
    speak us! charge bear i' th' war,
    And, president kingdom, will
    man. Speak it;
    stay behind.

                   Enter ANTONY CANIDIUS

  ENOBARBUS. Nay, done.
    Emperor.
  ANTONY. strange, Canidius,
    Tarentum Brundusium
    quickly cut Ionian sea,
    Toryne?- heard on't, sweet?
  CLEOPATRA. Celerity admir'd
    negligent.
  ANTONY. good rebuke,
    becom'd men
    taunt slackness. Canidius,  
    fight sea.
  CLEOPATRA. sea! else?
  CANIDIUS. lord so?
  ANTONY. dares to't.
  ENOBARBUS. hath lord dar'd single fight.
  CANIDIUS. Ay, wage battle Pharsalia,
    Caesar fought Pompey. offers,
    serve vantage, shakes off;
    you.
  ENOBARBUS. ships mann'd;
    mariners muleteers, reapers, people
    Ingross'd swift impress. Caesar's fleet
    'gainst Pompey fought;
    ships yare; heavy. disgrace
    fall refusing sea,
    prepar'd land.
  ANTONY. sea, sea.
  ENOBARBUS. worthy sir, throw away
    absolute soldiership land;
    Distract army, doth consist  
    war-mark'd footmen; leave unexecuted
    renowned knowledge; forgo
    promises assurance; and
    Give chance hazard
    firm security.
  ANTONY. fight sea.
  CLEOPATRA. sixty sails, Caesar better.
  ANTONY. overplus shipping burn,
    And, rest full-mann'd, th' head Actium
    Beat th' approaching Caesar. fail,
    do't land.

                       Enter MESSENGER

    Thy business?
  MESSENGER. news true, lord: descried;
    Caesar Toryne.
  ANTONY. person? 'Tis impossible-
    Strange power be. Canidius,
    nineteen legions thou shalt hold land,  
    twelve thousand horse. ship.
    Away, Thetis!

                       Enter SOLDIER

    now, worthy soldier?
  SOLDIER. O noble Emperor, fight sea;
    Trust rotten planks. misdoubt
    sword wounds? th' Egyptians
    Phoenicians a-ducking; we
    us'd conquer standing earth
    fighting foot foot.
  ANTONY. Well, well- away.
                         Exeunt ANTONY, CLEOPATRA, ENOBARBUS
  SOLDIER. Hercules, i' th' right.
  CANIDIUS. Soldier, thou art; action grows
    power on't. leader's led,
    women's men.
  SOLDIER. land
    legions horse whole, not?  
  CANIDIUS. Marcus Octavius, Marcus Justeius,
    Publicola, Caelius sea;
    land. speed Caesar's
    Carries belief.
  SOLDIER. Rome,
    power distractions as
    Beguil'd spies.
  CANIDIUS. lieutenant, hear you?
  SOLDIER. Taurus.
  CANIDIUS. man.

                        Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. Emperor calls Canidius.
  CANIDIUS. news time's labour throes forth
    minute some.                                     Exeunt

ACT_3|SC_8
                          SCENE VIII.
                      plain Actium

             Enter CAESAR, army, marching

  CAESAR. Taurus!
  TAURUS. lord?
  CAESAR. Strike land; whole; provoke battle
    Till sea. exceed
    prescript scroll. fortune lies
    jump.                                       Exeunt

ACT_3|SC_9
                           SCENE IX.
                  part plain

                  Enter ANTONY ENOBARBUS

  ANTONY. Set squadrons yon side o' th' hill,
    eye Caesar's battle; place
    number ships behold,
    proceed accordingly.                           Exeunt

ACT_3|SC_10
                           SCENE X.
                 part plain

        CANIDIUS marcheth land army way
        stage, TAURUS, Lieutenant of
      CAESAR, way. heard
                   noise sea-fight

                    Alarum. Enter ENOBARBUS

  ENOBARBUS. Naught, naught, naught! behold longer.
    Th' Antoniad, Egyptian admiral,
    sixty, fly turn rudder.
    see't mine eyes blasted.

                        Enter SCARUS

  SCARUS. Gods goddesses,
    synod them!
  ENOBARBUS. thy passion?
  SCARUS. greater cantle world lost
    ignorance; kiss'd  
    Kingdoms provinces.
  ENOBARBUS. appears fight?
  SCARUS. side token'd pestilence,
    death sure. Yon ribaudred nag Egypt-
    leprosy o'ertake!- i' th' midst o' th' fight,
    vantage pair twins appear'd,
    same, elder-
    breese her, cow June-
    Hoists sails flies.
  ENOBARBUS. beheld;
    Mine eyes sicken sight not
    Endure view.
  SCARUS. loof'd,
    noble ruin magic, Antony,
    Claps sea-wing, and, doting mallard,
    Leaving fight height, flies her.
    action shame;
    Experience, manhood, honour, ne'er before
    violate itself.
  ENOBARBUS. Alack, alack!  

                       Enter CANIDIUS

  CANIDIUS. fortune sea breath,
    sinks lamentably. general
    knew himself, well.
    O, flight
    grossly own!
  ENOBARBUS. Ay, thereabouts?
    then, good night indeed.
  CANIDIUS. Peloponnesus fled.
  SCARUS. 'Tis easy to't; attend
    comes.
  CANIDIUS. Caesar render
    legions horse; kings already
    Show yielding.
  ENOBARBUS. follow
    wounded chance Antony, reason
    Sits wind me.                          Exeunt

ACT_3|SC_11
                         SCENE XI.
              Alexandria. CLEOPATRA'S palace

               Enter ANTONY attendants

  ANTONY. Hark! land bids tread upon't;
    asham'd bear me. Friends, hither.
    lated world I
    lost ever. ship
    Laden gold; that; divide it. Fly,
    make peace Caesar.
  ALL. Fly? we!
  ANTONY. fled myself, instructed cowards
    run show shoulders. Friends, gone;
    resolv'd course
    you; gone.
    treasure's harbour, it. O,
    follow'd blush upon.
    hairs mutiny; white
    Reprove brown rashness, them
    fear doting. Friends, gone; shall
    letters friends  
    Sweep you. Pray sad,
    make replies loathness; hint
    despair proclaims. left
    leaves itself. sea-side straight way.
    possess ship treasure.
    Leave me, pray, little; pray now;
    Nay, so, lost command;
