    pray you. by.    [Sits down]

            Enter CLEOPATRA, led CHARMIAN IRAS,
                         EROS following

  EROS. Nay, gentle madam, him! Comfort him.
  IRAS. Do, dear Queen.
  CHARMIAN. Do? Why, else?
  CLEOPATRA. sit down. O Juno!
  ANTONY. No, no, no, no, no.
  EROS. here, sir?
  ANTONY. O, fie, fie, fie!
  CHARMIAN. Madam!  
  IRAS. Madam, O good Empress!
  EROS. Sir, sir!
  ANTONY. Yes, lord, yes. Philippi kept
    sword e'en dancer, struck
    lean wrinkled Cassius; 'twas I
    mad Brutus ended; alone
    Dealt lieutenantry, practice had
    brave squares war. now- matter.
  CLEOPATRA. Ah, stand by!
  EROS. Queen, lord, Queen!
  IRAS. him, madam, speak him.
    unqualitied shame.
  CLEOPATRA. then, sustain me. O!
 EROS. noble sir, arise; Queen approaches.
    head's declin'd, death seize but
    comfort makes rescue.
  ANTONY. offended reputation-
    unnoble swerving.
  EROS. Sir, Queen.
  ANTONY. O, hast thou led me, Egypt? See
    convey shame thine eyes  
    back left behind
    'Stroy'd dishonour.
  CLEOPATRA. O lord, lord,
    Forgive fearful sails! thought
    followed.
  ANTONY. Egypt, thou knew'st well
    heart thy rudder tied th' strings,
    thou shouldst tow after. O'er spirit
    Thy full supremacy thou knew'st, that
    Thy beck bidding gods
    Command me.
  CLEOPATRA. O, pardon!
  ANTONY. must
    young man send humble treaties, dodge
    palter shifts lowness, who
    half bulk o' th' world play'd pleas'd,
    Making marring fortunes. know
    conqueror, that
    sword, made weak affection, would
    Obey cause.  
  CLEOPATRA. Pardon, pardon!
  ANTONY. Fall tear, say; rates
    won lost. Give kiss;
    repays me.
    schoolmaster; 'a back?
    Love, full lead. wine,
    there, viands! Fortune knows
    scorn offers blows.         Exeunt

ACT_3|SC_12
                         SCENE XII.
                   CAESAR'S camp Egypt

   Enter CAESAR, AGRIPPA, DOLABELLA, THYREUS, others

  CAESAR. Antony.
    him?
  DOLABELLA. Caesar, 'tis schoolmaster:
    argument pluck'd, hither
    sends poor pinion wing,
    superfluous kings messengers
    moons by.

            Enter EUPHRONIUS, Ambassador ANTONY

  CAESAR. Approach, speak.
  EUPHRONIUS. am, Antony.
    late petty ends
    morn-dew myrtle leaf
    grand sea.
  CAESAR. Be't so. Declare thine office.
  EUPHRONIUS. Lord fortunes salutes thee,  
    Requires live Egypt; granted,
    lessens requests thee sues
    breathe heavens earth,
    private man Athens. him.
    Next, Cleopatra confess thy greatness,
    Submits thy might, thee craves
    circle Ptolemies heirs,
    hazarded thy grace.
  CAESAR. Antony,
    ears request. Queen
    audience desire fail, she
    Egypt drive all-disgraced friend,
    life there. perform,
    sue unheard. both.
  EUPHRONIUS. Fortune pursue thee!
  CAESAR. Bring bands.           Exit EUPHRONIUS
    [To THYREUS] thy eloquence, 'tis time. Dispatch;
    Antony win Cleopatra. Promise,
    name, requires; add more,
    thine invention, offers. Women  
    fortunes strong; perjure
    ne'er-touch'd vestal. thy cunning, Thyreus;
    Make thine edict thy pains, we
    answer law.
  THYREUS. Caesar, go.
  CAESAR. Observe Antony flaw,
    thou think'st action speaks
    power moves.
  THYREUS. Caesar, shall.                               Exeunt

ACT_3|SC_13
                           SCENE XIII.
               Alexandria. CLEOPATRA'S palace

        Enter CLEOPATRA, ENOBARBUS, CHARMIAN, IRAS

  CLEOPATRA. do, Enobarbus?
  ENOBARBUS. Think, die.
  CLEOPATRA. Antony fault this?
  ENOBARBUS. Antony only, make will
    Lord reason. fled
    great face war, ranges
    Frighted other? follow?
    itch affection then
    nick'd captainship, point,
    half half world oppos'd, being
    mered question. 'Twas shame less
    loss, flying flags
    leave navy gazing.
  CLEOPATRA. Prithee, peace.

          Enter EUPHRONIUS, Ambassador; ANTONY
  
  ANTONY. answer?
  EUPHRONIUS. Ay, lord.
  ANTONY. Queen courtesy, she
    yield up.
  EUPHRONIUS. so.
  ANTONY. know't.
    boy Caesar send grizzled head,
    fill thy wishes brim
    principalities.
  CLEOPATRA. head, lord?
  ANTONY. again. wears rose
    youth him; world note
    particular. coin, ships, legions,
    coward's ministers prevail
    service child soon
    i' th' command Caesar. dare therefore
    lay gay comparisons apart,
    answer declin'd, sword sword,
    alone. write it. Follow me.
                                    Exeunt ANTONY EUPHRONIUS  
  EUPHRONIUS. [Aside] Yes, high-battled Caesar will
    Unstate happiness, stag'd th' show
    sworder! men's judgments are
    parcel fortunes, things outward
    draw quality them,
    suffer alike. dream,
    Knowing measures, full Caesar will
    Answer emptiness! Caesar, thou hast subdu'd
    judgment too.

                       Enter SERVANT

  SERVANT. messenger Caesar.
  CLEOPATRA. What, ceremony? See, women!
    blown rose stop nose
    kneel'd buds. Admit him, sir.     Exit SERVANT
  ENOBARBUS. [Aside] Mine honesty begin square.
    loyalty held fools make
    faith mere folly. endure
    follow allegiance fall'n lord  
    conquer master conquer,
    earns place i' th' story.

                       Enter THYREUS

  CLEOPATRA. Caesar's will?
  THYREUS. Hear apart.
  CLEOPATRA. friends: boldly.
  THYREUS. So, haply, friends Antony.
  ENOBARBUS. many, sir, Caesar has,
    us. Caesar please, master
    leap friend. us, know
    are, Caesar's.
  THYREUS. So.
    then, thou renown'd: Caesar entreats
    case thou stand'st
    Caesar.
  CLEOPATRA. on. royal!
  THYREUS. embrace Antony
    love, fear'd him.  
  CLEOPATRA. O!
  THYREUS. scars honour, therefore, he
    pity, constrained blemishes,
    deserv'd.
  CLEOPATRA. god, knows
    right. Mine honour yielded,
    conquer'd merely.
  ENOBARBUS. [Aside] that,
    Antony. Sir, sir, thou art leaky
    leave thee thy sinking, for
    Thy dearest quit thee.                                  Exit
  THYREUS. Caesar
    require him? partly begs
    desir'd give. him
    fortunes make staff
    lean upon. warm spirits
    hear left Antony,
    put shroud,
    universal landlord.
  CLEOPATRA. name?  
  THYREUS. Thyreus.
  CLEOPATRA. kind messenger,
    great Caesar this: deputation
    kiss conquring hand. prompt
    lay crown 's feet, kneel.
    all-obeying breath hear
    doom Egypt.
  THYREUS. 'Tis noblest course.
    Wisdom fortune combating together,
    dare can,
    chance shake it. Give grace lay
    duty hand.
  CLEOPATRA. Caesar's father oft,
    hath mus'd taking kingdoms in,
    Bestow'd lips unworthy place,
    rain'd kisses.

                Re-enter ANTONY ENOBARBUS

  ANTONY. Favours, Jove thunders!  
    art thou, fellow?
  THYREUS. performs
    bidding fullest man, worthiest
    command obey'd.
  ENOBARBUS. [Aside] whipt.
  ANTONY. Approach there.- Ah, kite!- Now, gods devils!
    Authority melts me. late, cried 'Ho!'
    boys muss, kings start forth
    cry 'Your will?' ears? am
    Antony yet.

                       Enter servants

    Jack whip him.
  ENOBARBUS. 'Tis playing lion's whelp
    dying.
  ANTONY. Moon stars!
    Whip him. Were't twenty greatest tributaries
    acknowledge Caesar, find them
    saucy hand here-  
    Cleopatra? Whip him, fellows,
    Till boy cringe face,
    whine aloud mercy. hence.
  THYMUS. Mark Antony-
  ANTONY. Tug away. whipt,
    Bring again: Jack Caesar's shall
    Bear errand him.       Exeunt servants THYREUS
    half blasted ere knew you. Ha!
    pillow left unpress'd Rome,
    Forborne lawful race,
    gem women, abus'd
    feeders?
  CLEOPATRA. Good lord-
  ANTONY. boggler ever.
    viciousness grow hard-
    O misery on't!- wise gods seel eyes,
    filth drop clear judgments, make us
    Adore errors, laugh at's strut
    confusion.
  CLEOPATRA. O, is't this?  
  ANTONY. found morsel cold upon
    Dead Caesar's trencher. Nay, fragment
    Cneius Pompey's, hotter hours,
    Unregist'red vulgar fame, have
    Luxuriously pick'd out; sure,
    guess temperance be,
    is.
  CLEOPATRA. Wherefore this?
  ANTONY. fellow rewards,
    'God quit you!' familiar with
    playfellow, hand, kingly seal
    plighter high hearts! O were
    hill Basan outroar
    horned herd! savage cause,
    proclaim civilly like
    halter'd neck hangman thank
    yare him.

              Re-enter SERVANT THYREUS
  
    whipt?
  SERVANT. Soundly, lord.
  ANTONY. Cried he? begg'd 'a pardon?
  SERVANT. favour.
  ANTONY. thy father live, repent
    Thou wast made daughter; thou sorry
    follow Caesar triumph, since
    Thou hast whipt him. Henceforth
    white hand lady fever thee!
    Shake thou on't. thee back Caesar;
    thy entertainment; thou say
    makes angry him; seems
    Proud disdainful, harping am,
    knew was. makes angry;
    time easy 'tis do't,
    good stars, guides,
    empty left orbs shot fires
    th' abysm hell. mislike
    speech done, has
    Hipparchus, enfranched bondman,  
    pleasure whip hang torture,
    like, quit me. Urge thou.
    thy stripes, gone.                Exit THYREUS
  CLEOPATRA. yet?
  ANTONY. Alack, terrene moon
    eclips'd, portends alone
    fall Antony.
  CLEOPATRA. stay time.
  ANTONY. flatter Caesar, mingle eyes
    ties points?
  CLEOPATRA. yet?
  ANTONY. Cold-hearted me?
  CLEOPATRA. Ah, dear, so,
    cold heart heaven engender hail,
    poison source, stone
    Drop neck; determines, so
    Dissolve life! Caesarion smite!
    Till degrees memory womb,
    brave Egyptians all,
    discandying pelleted storm,  
    Lie graveless, till flies gnats Nile
    buried prey.
  ANTONY. satisfied.
    Caesar sits Alexandria, where
    oppose fate. force land
    Hath nobly held; sever'd navy to
    knit again, fleet, threat'ning sea-like.
    hast thou been, heart? Dost thou hear, lady?
    field return more
    kiss lips, blood.
    sword earn chronicle.
    hope in't yet.
  CLEOPATRA. brave lord!
  ANTONY. treble-sinew'd, hearted, breath'd,
    fight maliciously. mine hours
    nice lucky, men ransom lives
    jests; set teeth,
    send darkness stop me. Come,
    gaudy night. Call me
    sad captains; fill bowls more;  
    mock midnight bell.
  CLEOPATRA. birthday.
    thought t'have held poor; lord
    Antony again, Cleopatra.
  ANTONY. well.
  CLEOPATRA. Call noble captains lord.
  ANTONY. so, speak them; to-night force
    wine peep scars. on, queen,
    sap in't yet. time fight
    make death love me; contend
    pestilent scythe.     Exeunt ENOBARBUS
  ENOBARBUS. outstare lightning. furious
    frighted fear, mood
    dove peck estridge; still
    diminution captain's brain
    Restores heart. valour preys reason,
    eats sword fights with. seek
    leave him.                                  Exit

ACT_4|SC_1
                      ACT IV. SCENE I.
              CAESAR'S camp Alexandria

      Enter CAESAR, AGRIPPA, MAECENAS, army;
                 CAESAR reading letter

  CAESAR. calls boy, chides power
    beat Egypt. messenger
    hath whipt rods; dares personal combat,
    Caesar Antony. ruffian know
    ways die, meantime
    Laugh challenge.
  MAECENAS. Caesar think
    great begins rage, hunted
    falling. Give breath, now
    Make boot distraction. anger
    Made good guard itself.
  CAESAR. heads
    to-morrow battles
    fight. files are
    serv'd Mark Antony late
    fetch in. done;  
    feast army; store do't,
    earn'd waste. Poor Antony!          Exeunt

ACT_4|SC_2
                          SCENE II.
               Alexandria. CLEOPATRA's palace

      Enter ANTONY, CLEOPATRA, ENOBARBUS, CHARMIAN, IRAS,
                     ALEXAS, others

  ANTONY. fight me, Domitius?
  ENOBARBUS. No.
  ANTONY. not?
  ENOBARBUS. thinks, twenty times fortune,
    twenty men one.
  ANTONY. To-morrow, soldier,
    sea land fight. live,
    bathe dying honour blood
    make live again. Woo't thou fight well?
  ENOBARBUS. strike, cry 'Take all.'
  ANTONY. said; on.
    Call household servants; to-night
    bounteous meal.

                Enter servitors
  
    Give thy hand,
    Thou rightly honest. hast thou;
    Thou, thou, thou. serv'd well,
    kings fellows.
  CLEOPATRA. [Aside ENOBARBUS] means this?
  ENOBARBUS. [Aside CLEOPATRA] 'Tis odd tricks which
      sorrow shoots
    mind.
  ANTONY. thou art honest too.
    made men,
    clapp'd in
    Antony, service
    good done.
  SERVANT. gods forbid!
  ANTONY. Well, good fellows, wait to-night.
    Scant cups, make me
    mine empire fellow too,
    suffer'd command.
  CLEOPATRA. [Aside ENOBARBUS] mean?
    ENOBARBUS. [Aside CLEOPATRA] make followers weep.  
  ANTONY. Tend to-night;
    period duty.
    Haply more; if,
    mangled shadow. Perchance to-morrow
    serve master. you
    takes leave. Mine honest friends,
    turn away; but, master
    Married good service, stay till death.
    Tend to-night hours, more,
    gods yield for't!
  ENOBARBUS. you, sir,
    give discomfort? Look, weep;
    I, ass, onion-ey'd. shame!
    Transform women.
  ANTONY. Ho, ho, ho!
    witch meant thus!
    Grace grow drops fall! hearty friends,
    dolorous sense;
    spake comfort, desire you
    burn night torches. Know, hearts,  
    hope to-morrow, lead you
    expect victorious life
    death honour. supper, come,
    drown consideration.                              Exeunt

ACT_4|SC_3
                          SCENE III.
             Alexandria. CLEOPATRA's palace

                 Enter company soldiers

  SOLDIER. Brother, good night. To-morrow day.
  SOLDIER. determine way. Fare well.
    Heard strange streets?
  SOLDIER. Nothing. news?
  SOLDIER. Belike 'tis rumour. Good night you.
  SOLDIER. Well, sir, good night.
                                      [They meet soldiers]
  SOLDIER. Soldiers, careful watch.
  SOLDIER. you. Good night, good night.
                [The companies separate place themselves
                                   corner stage]
  SOLDIER. we. to-morrow
    navy thrive, absolute hope
    landmen stand up.
  SOLDIER. 'Tis brave army,
    full purpose.
                      [Music hautboys stage]  
  SOLDIER. Peace, noise?
  SOLDIER. List, list!
  SOLDIER. Hark!
  SOLDIER. Music i' th' air.
  FOURTH SOLDIER. earth.
  SOLDIER. signs well, not?
  FOURTH SOLDIER. No.
  SOLDIER. Peace, say!
    mean?
  SOLDIER. 'Tis god Hercules, Antony lov'd,
    leaves him.
  SOLDIER. Walk; watchmen
    hear do.
  SOLDIER. now, masters!
  SOLDIERS. [Speaking together] now!
    now! hear this?
  SOLDIER. Ay; is't strange?
  SOLDIER. hear, masters? hear?
  SOLDIER. Follow noise quarter;
    give off.  
  SOLDIERS. Content. 'Tis strange.                        Exeunt

ACT_4|SC_4
                           SCENE IV.
               Alexandria. CLEOPATRA's palace

         Enter ANTONY CLEOPATRA, CHARMIAN, IRAS,
                          others

  ANTONY. Eros! mine armour, Eros!
  CLEOPATRA. Sleep little.
  ANTONY. No, chuck. Eros! Come, mine armour, Eros!

                   Enter EROS armour

    Come, good fellow, put mine iron on.
    fortune to-day, is
    brave her. Come.
  CLEOPATRA. Nay, too.
    for?
  ANTONY. Ah, be, be! Thou art
    armourer heart. False, false; this, this.
  CLEOPATRA. Sooth, la, help. be.
  ANTONY. Well, well;
    thrive now. Seest thou, good fellow?  
    put thy defences.
  EROS. Briefly, sir.
  CLEOPATRA. buckled well?
  ANTONY. Rarely, rarely!
    unbuckles this, till please
    daff't repose, hear storm.
    Thou fumblest, Eros, queen's squire
    tight thou. Dispatch. O love,
    thou couldst wars to-day, knew'st
    royal occupation! Thou shouldst see
    workman in't.

                   Enter armed SOLDIER

    Good-morrow thee. Welcome.
    Thou look'st warlike charge.
    business love rise betime,
    to't delight.
  SOLDIER. thousand, sir,
    Early though't be, riveted trim,  
    port expect you.
                            [Shout. Flourish trumpets within]

                 Enter CAPTAINS soldiers

  CAPTAIN. morn fair. Good morrow, General.
  ALL. Good morrow, General.
  ANTONY. 'Tis blown, lads.
    morning, spirit youth
    means note, begins betimes.
    So, so. Come, give that. way. said.
    Fare thee well, dame, whate'er me.
    soldier's kiss. Rebukeable,
    worthy shameful check were, stand
    mechanic compliment; leave thee
    man steel. fight,
    Follow close; bring to't. Adieu.
                      Exeunt ANTONY, EROS, CAPTAINS soldiers
  CHARMIAN. retire chamber?
  CLEOPATRA. Lead me.
    gallantly. Caesar might
    Determine great war single fight!
    Then, Antony- now. Well, on.                      Exeunt

ACT_4|SC_5
                          SCENE V.
                  Alexandria. ANTONY'S camp

        Trumpets sound. Enter ANTONY EROS, SOLDIER
                       meeting them

  SOLDIER. gods make happy day Antony!
  ANTONY. thou thy scars prevail'd
    make fight land!
  SOLDIER. Hadst thou so,
    kings revolted, soldier
    morning left thee, still
    thy heels.
  ANTONY. morning?
  SOLDIER. Who?
    thee. Call Enobarbus,
    hear thee; Caesar's camp
    'I thine.'
  ANTONY. say'st thou?
  SOLDIER. Sir,
    Caesar.
  EROS. Sir, chests treasure  
    him.
  ANTONY. gone?
  SOLDIER. certain.
  ANTONY. Go, Eros, send treasure after; it;
    Detain jot, charge thee. Write him-
    subscribe- gentle adieus greetings;
    find cause
    change master. O, fortunes have
    Corrupted honest men! Dispatch. Enobarbus!            Exeunt

ACT_4|SC_6
                         SCENE VI.
                 Alexandria. CAESAR'S camp

       Flourish. Enter AGRIPPA, CAESAR, DOLABELLA
                       ENOBARBUS

  CAESAR. forth, Agrippa, begin fight.
    Antony alive;
    Make known.
  AGRIPPA. Caesar, shall.                                 Exit
  CAESAR. time universal peace near.
    Prove prosp'rous day, three-nook'd world
    bear olive freely.

                     Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. Antony
    field.
  CAESAR. charge Agrippa
    Plant revolted vant,
    Antony spend fury
    himself.                       Exeunt ENOBARBUS  
  ENOBARBUS. Alexas revolt Jewry on
    Affairs Antony; dissuade
    Great Herod incline Caesar
    leave master Antony. pains
    Casaer hath hang'd him. Canidius rest
    fell entertainment, but
    honourable trust. ill,
    accuse sorely
    joy more.

                  Enter SOLDIER CAESAR'S

  SOLDIER. Enobarbus, Antony
    Hath thee thy treasure, with
    bounty overplus. messenger
    guard, thy tent now
    Unloading mules.
  ENOBARBUS. give you.
  SOLDIER. Mock not, Enobarbus.
    true. saf'd bringer  
    host. attend mine office,
    done't myself. emperor
    Continues Jove.                                 Exit
  ENOBARBUS. villain earth,
    feel most. O Antony,
    Thou mine bounty, wouldst thou paid
    service, turpitude
    Thou dost crown gold! blows heart.
    swift thought break not, swifter mean
    outstrike thought; thought do't, feel.
    fight thee? No! seek
    ditch die; foul'st fits
    part life.                                 Exit

ACT_4|SC_7
                          SCENE VII.
             Field battle camps

         Alarum. Drums trumpets. Enter AGRIPPA
                        others

  AGRIPPA. Retire. engag'd far.
    Caesar work, oppression
    Exceeds expected.                             Exeunt

          Alarums. Enter ANTONY, SCARUS wounded

  SCARUS. O brave Emperor, fought indeed!
    first, droven home
    clouts heads.
  ANTONY. Thou bleed'st apace.
  SCARUS. wound T,
    'tis made H.
  ANTONY. retire.
  SCARUS. beat'em bench-holes. yet
    Room scotches more.
  
                        Enter EROS

  EROS. beaten, sir, advantage serves
    fair victory.
  SCARUS. score backs
    snatch 'em up, hares, behind.
    'Tis sport maul runner.
  ANTONY. reward thee
    thy sprightly comfort, tenfold
    thy good valour. thee on.
    SCARUS. halt after.                              Exeunt

ACT_4|SC_8
                         SCENE VIII.
               walls Alexandria

        Alarum. Enter ANTONY, march; SCARUS
                        others

  ANTONY. beat camp. Run before
    Queen gests. To-morrow,
    sun see's, spill blood
    to-day escap'd. all;
    doughty-handed you, fought
    serv'd cause, as't been
    man's mine; shown Hectors.
    Enter city, clip wives, friends,
    feats; whilst joyful tears
    Wash congealment wounds kiss
    honour'd gashes whole.

                 Enter CLEOPATRA, attended

    [To SCARUS] Give thy hand-
    great fairy commend thy acts,  
    Make bless thee. O thou day o' th' world,
    Chain mine arm'd neck. Leap thou, attire all,
    proof harness heart, there
    Ride pants triumphing.
  CLEOPATRA. Lord lords!
    O infinite virtue, com'st thou smiling from
    world's great snare uncaught?
  ANTONY. Mine nightingale,
    beat beds. What, girl! grey
    mingle younger brown, ha' we
    brain nourishes nerves, can
    goal goal youth. Behold man;
    Commend lips thy favouring hand-
    Kiss it, warrior- hath fought to-day
    god hate mankind had
    Destroyed shape.
  CLEOPATRA. give thee, friend,
    armour gold; king's.
  ANTONY. deserv'd it, carbuncled
    holy Phoebus' car. Give thy hand.  
    Alexandria make jolly march;
    Bear hack'd targets men owe them.
    great palace capacity
    camp host, together,
    drink carouses day's fate,
    promises royal peril. Trumpeters,
    brazen din blast city's ear;
    Make mingle rattling tabourines,
    heaven earth strike sounds together
    Applauding approach.                              Exeunt

ACT_4|SC_9
                         SCENE IX.
                      CAESAR'S camp

      Enter CENTURION company; ENOBARBUS follows

  CENTURION. reliev'd hour,
    return th' court guard. night
    shiny, embattle
    th' hour i' th' morn.
  WATCH. day was
    shrewd to's.
  ENOBARBUS. O, bear witness, night-
  WATCH. man this?
  WATCH. Stand close list him.
  ENOBARBUS. witness me, O thou blessed moon,
    men revolted record
    Bear hateful memory, poor Enobarbus did
    thy face repent!
  CENTURION. Enobarbus?
  WATCH. Peace!
    Hark further.
  ENOBARBUS. O sovereign mistress true melancholy,  
    poisonous damp night disponge me,
    life, rebel will,
    hang longer me. Throw heart
    flint hardness fault,
    Which, dried grief, break powder,
    finish foul thoughts. O Antony,
    Nobler revolt infamous,
    Forgive thine particular,
    world rank register
    master-leaver fugitive!
    O Antony! O Antony!                                   [Dies]
  WATCH. speak him.
  CENTURION. hear him, things speaks
    concern Caesar.
  WATCH. so. sleeps.
  CENTURION. Swoons rather; bad prayer his
    sleep.
  WATCH. him.
  WATCH. Awake, sir, awake; speak us.
  WATCH. Hear you, sir?  
  CENTURION. hand death hath raught him.
    [Drums afar ] Hark! drums
    Demurely wake sleepers. bear him
    th' court guard; note. hour
    fully out.
  WATCH. on, then;
    recover yet.                     Exeunt body

ACT_4|SC_10
                          SCENE X.
                    camps

            Enter ANTONY SCARUS, army

  ANTONY. preparation to-day sea;
    land.
  SCARUS. both, lord.
  ANTONY. fight i' th' fire i' th' air;
    fight too. is, foot
    hills adjoining city
    stay us- Order sea given;
    put haven-
    appointment discover
    endeavour.                          Exeunt

ACT_4|SC_11
                         SCENE XI.
                    camps

                Enter CAESAR army

  CAESAR. charg'd, land,
    Which, take't, shall; force
    man galleys. vales,
    hold advantage.                          Exeunt

ACT_4|SC_12
                         SCENE XII.
                  hill Alexandria

                  Enter ANTONY SCARUS

  ANTONY. join'd. yond pine stand
    discover all. bring thee word
    Straight 'tis go.                           Exit
  SCARUS. Swallows built
    Cleopatra's sails nests. augurers
    not, tell; grimly,
    dare speak knowledge. Antony
    valiant dejected; starts
    fretted fortunes give hope fear
    not.
                            [Alarum afar off, sea-fight]

                      Re-enter ANTONY

  ANTONY. lost!
    foul Egyptian hath betrayed me.
    fleet hath yielded foe, yonder  
    cast caps carouse together
    friends long lost. Triple-turn'd whore! 'tis thou
    Hast sold novice; heart
    Makes wars thee. Bid fly;
    reveng'd charm,
    all. Bid fly; begone.       Exit SCARUS
    O sun, thy uprise more!
    Fortune Antony part here; here
    shake hands. this? hearts
    spaniel'd heels, gave
    wishes, discandy, melt sweets
    blossoming Caesar; pine bark'd
    overtopp'd all. Betray'd am.
    O false soul Egypt! grave charm-
    eye beck'd wars call'd home,
    bosom crownet, chief end-
    gypsy hath fast loose
    Beguil'd heart loss.
    What, Eros, Eros!
  
                      Enter CLEOPATRA

    Ah, thou spell! Avaunt!
  CLEOPATRA. lord enrag'd love?
  ANTONY. Vanish, give thee thy deserving
    blemish Caesar's triumph. thee
    hoist thee shouting plebeians;
    Follow chariot, greatest spot
    thy sex; monster-like, shown
    poor'st diminutives, doits, let
    Patient Octavia plough thy visage up
    prepared nails.                      Exit CLEOPATRA
    'Tis th'art gone,
    live; 'twere
    Thou fell'st fury, death
    prevented many. Eros, ho!
    shirt Nessus me; teach me,
    Alcides, thou mine ancestor, thy rage;
    lodge Lichas horns o' th' moon,
    hands grasp'd heaviest club
    Subdue worthiest self. witch die.
    young Roman boy hath sold me, fall
    plot. dies for't. Eros, ho!              Exit

ACT_4|SC_13
                          SCENE XIII.
               Alexandria. CLEOPATRA's palace

      Enter CLEOPATRA, CHARMIAN, IRAS, MARDIAN

  CLEOPATRA. me, women. O, mad
    Telamon shield; boar Thessaly
    emboss'd.
  CHARMIAN. th'monument!
    lock yourself, send word dead.
    soul body rive parting
    greatness off.
  CLEOPATRA. th' monument!
    Mardian, slain myself;
    spoke 'Antony'
    word it, prithee, piteously. Hence, Mardian,
    bring takes death. th' monument!
                                                          Exeunt

ACT_4|SC_14
                          SCENE XIV.
                     CLEOPATRA'S palace

                   Enter ANTONY EROS

  ANTONY. Eros, thou behold'st me?
  EROS. Ay, noble lord.
  ANTONY. cloud dragonish;
    vapour bear lion,
    tower'd citadel, pendent rock,
    forked mountain, blue promontory
    trees upon't nod world
    mock eyes air. Thou hast signs;
    black vesper's pageants.
  EROS. Ay, lord.
  ANTONY. horse, thought
    rack dislimns, makes indistinct,
    water water.
  EROS. does, lord.
  ANTONY. good knave Eros, thy captain is
    body. Antony;
    hold visible shape, knave.  
    made wars Egypt; Queen-
    heart thought had, mine,
    Which, whilst mine, annex'd unto't
    million moe, lost- she, Eros, has
    Pack'd cards Caesar, false-play'd glory
    enemy's triumph.
    Nay, weep not, gentle Eros; left us
    end ourselves.

                         Enter MARDIAN

    O, thy vile lady!
    robb'd sword.
  MARDIAN. No, Antony;
    mistress lov'd thee, fortunes mingled
    thine entirely.
  ANTONY. Hence, saucy eunuch; peace!
    hath betray'd me, die death.
  MARDIAN. Death person paid once,
    discharg'd. thou wouldst  
    thy hand. spake
    'Antony! noble Antony!'
    midst tearing groan break
    Antony; divided
    heart lips. rend'red life,
    Thy buried her.
  ANTONY. Dead then?
  MARDIAN. Dead.
  ANTONY. Unarm, Eros; long day's task done,
    sleep. thou depart'st safe
    pay thy labour richly. Go.                 Exit MARDIAN
    Off, pluck off!
    sevenfold shield Ajax keep
    battery heart. O, cleave, sides!
    Heart, stronger thy continent,
    Crack thy frail case. Apace, Eros, apace.-
    soldier. Bruised pieces, go;
    nobly borne.- awhile.        Exit EROS
    o'ertake thee, Cleopatra, and
    Weep pardon. be,  
    length torture. torch out,
    Lie down, stray farther. labour
    Mars does; yea, force entangles
    strength. Seal then, done.
    Eros!- come, queen.- Eros!- Stay me;
    souls couch flowers, hand hand,
    sprightly port make ghosts gaze.
    Dido Aeneas troops,
    haunt ours.- Come, Eros, Eros!

                       Re-enter EROS

  EROS. lord?
  ANTONY. Cleopatra died,
    liv'd dishonour gods
    Detest baseness. I, sword
    Quarter'd world, o'er green Neptune's back
    ships made cities, condemn lack
    courage woman; noble mind
    death Caesar tells  
    'I conqueror myself.' Thou art sworn, Eros,
    That, exigent come- now
    indeed- me
    Th' inevitable prosecution of
    Disgrace horror, that, command,
    Thou wouldst kill me. Do't; time come.
    Thou strik'st me; 'tis Caesar thou defeat'st.
    Put colour thy cheek.
  EROS. gods withhold me!
    Parthian darts,
    enemy, lost aim not?
  ANTONY. Eros,
    Wouldst thou window'd great Rome see
    Thy master pleach'd arms, bending down
    corrigible neck, face subdu'd
    penetrative shame, whilst wheel'd seat
    fortunate Caesar, drawn him, branded
    baseness ensued?
  EROS. see't.
  ANTONY. Come, then; wound cur'd.  
    Draw thy honest sword, thou hast worn
    thy country.
  EROS. O, sir, pardon me!
  ANTONY. make thee free, swor'st thou then
    bade thee? once,
    thy precedent services all
    accidents unpurpos'd. Draw, come.
  EROS. Turn noble countenance,
    worship world lies.
  ANTONY. Lo thee!                            [Turning him]
  EROS. sword drawn.
  ANTONY. once
    thing thou hast drawn it.
  EROS. dear master,
    captain emperor, say,
    strike bloody stroke, farewell.
  ANTONY. 'Tis said, man; farewell.
  EROS. Farewell, great chief. strike now?
  ANTONY. Now, Eros.
  EROS. Why, then! escape sorrow  
    Antony's death.                            [Kills himself
  ANTONY. Thrice nobler myself!
    Thou teachest me, O valiant Eros, what
    should, thou couldst not. queen Eros
    Have, brave instruction, me
    nobleness record. be
    bridegroom death, run into't
    lover's bed. Come, then; and, Eros,
    Thy master dies thy scholar. thus
                                          [Falling sword]
    learn'd thee. How? dead? dead?-
    guard, ho! O, dispatch me!

                  Enter DERCETAS guard

  GUARD. noise?
  ANTONY. work ill, friends. O, make end
    begun.
  GUARD. star fall'n.
  GUARD. time period.  
  ALL. Alas, woe!
  ANTONY. loves me, strike dead.
  GUARD. I.
  GUARD. I.
  GUARD. one.                         Exeunt guard
  DERCETAS. Thy death fortunes bid thy followers fly.
    sword shown Caesar, tidings,
    enter him.

                       Enter DIOMEDES

  DIOMEDES. Antony?
  DERCETAS. There, Diomed, there.
  DIOMEDES. Lives he?
    Wilt thou answer, man?                     Exit DERCETAS
  ANTONY. Art thou there, Diomed? Draw thy sword give me
    Sufficing strokes death.
  DIOMEDES. absolute lord,
    mistress Cleopatra thee.
  ANTONY. send thee?  
  DIOMEDES. Now, lord.
  ANTONY. she?
  DIOMEDES. Lock'd monument. prophesying fear
    hath pass; saw-
    found- suspect
    dispos'd Caesar, rage
    purg'd, word dead;
    fearing work, hath sent
    proclaim truth; come,
    dread, late.
  ANTONY. late, good Diomed. Call guard, prithee.
  DIOMEDES. What, ho! Emperor's guard! guard, ho!
    Come, lord calls!

             Enter guard ANTONY

  ANTONY. Bear me, good friends, Cleopatra bides;
    'Tis service command you.
  GUARD. Woe, woe we, sir, live wear
    true followers out.  
  ALL. heavy day!
  ANTONY. Nay, good fellows, sharp fate
    grace sorrows. Bid welcome
    punish us, punish it,
    bear lightly. up.
    led oft; carry now, good friends,
    all.           Exeunt, hearing ANTONY
ACT_4|SC_15
                         SCENE XV.
                   Alexandria. monument

      Enter CLEOPATRA maids aloft, CHARMIAN
                         IRAS

  CLEOPATRA. O Charmian, hence!
  CHARMIAN. comforted, dear madam.
  CLEOPATRA. No, not.
    strange terrible events welcome,
    comforts despise; size sorrow,
    Proportion'd cause, great
    makes it.

                   Enter DIOMEDES, below

    now! dead?
  DIOMEDES. death's him, dead.
    o' th' side monument;
    guard brought thither.

            Enter, below, ANTONY, borne guard  

  CLEOPATRA. O sun,
    Burn great sphere thou mov'st in! Darkling stand
    varying shore o' th' world. O Antony,
    Antony, Antony! Help, Charmian; help, Iras, help;
    Help, friends below! draw hither.
  ANTONY. Peace!
    Caesar's valour hath o'erthrown Antony,
    Antony's hath triumph'd itself.
  CLEOPATRA. be, Antony
    conquer Antony; woe 'tis so!
  ANTONY. dying, Egypt, dying; only
    importune death awhile, until
    thousand kisses poor last
    lay thy lips.
  CLEOPATRA. dare not, dear.
    Dear lord, pardon! dare not,
    taken. th' imperious show
    full-fortun'd Caesar shall
    brooch'd me. knife, drugs, serpents,  
    Edge, sting, operation, safe.
    wife Octavia, modest eyes
    conclusion, acquire honour
    Demuring me. come, come, Antony-
    me, women- draw thee up;
    Assist, good friends.
  ANTONY. O, quick, gone.
  CLEOPATRA. sport indeed! heavy weighs lord!
    strength heaviness;
    makes weight. great Juno's power,
    strong-wing'd Mercury fetch thee up,
    set thee Jove's side. little.
    Wishers fools. O come, come,
                          [They heave ANTONY aloft CLEOPATRA]
    welcome, welcome! Die thou hast liv'd.
    Quicken kissing. lips power,
    wear out.
  ALL. heavy sight!
  ANTONY. dying, Egypt, dying.
    Give wine, speak little.  
  CLEOPATRA. No, speak; rail high
    false huswife Fortune break wheel,
    Provok'd offence.
  ANTONY. word, sweet queen:
    Caesar seek honour, safety. O!
  CLEOPATRA. together.
  ANTONY. Gentle, hear me:
    Caesar trust Proculeius.
  CLEOPATRA. resolution hands trust;
    Caesar
  ANTONY. miserable change end
    Lament sorrow at; thoughts
    feeding fortunes
    liv'd greatest prince o' th' world,
    noblest; basely die,
    cowardly put helmet to
    countryman- Roman Roman
    Valiantly vanquish'd. spirit going
    more.
  CLEOPATRA. Noblest men, woo't die?  
    Hast thou care me? abide
    dull world, thy absence is
    sty? O, see, women,        [Antony dies]
    crown o' th' earth doth melt. lord!
    O, wither'd garland war,
    soldier's pole fall'n! Young boys girls
    level men. odds gone,
    left remarkable
    Beneath visiting moon.                          [Swoons]
  CHARMIAN. O, quietness, lady!
  IRAS. dead too, sovereign.
  CHARMIAN. Lady!
  IRAS. Madam!
  CHARMIAN. O madam, madam, madam!
  IRAS. Royal Egypt, Empress!
  CHARMIAN. Peace, peace, Iras!
  CLEOPATRA. e'en woman, commanded
    poor passion maid milks
    meanest chares. me
    throw sceptre injurious gods;  
    world equal theirs
    Till stol'n jewel. All's nought;
    Patience sottish, impatience does
    dog mad. sin
    rush secret house death
    Ere death dare us? you, women?
    What, what! good cheer! Why, now, Charmian!
    noble girls! Ah, women, women, look,
    lamp spent, out! Good sirs, heart.
    bury him; then, brave, noble,
    high Roman fashion,
    make death proud us. Come, away;
    case huge spirit cold.
    Ah, women, women! Come; friend
    resolution briefest end.
                   Exeunt; hearing ANTONY'S body

ACT_5|SC_1
                       ACT V. SCENE I.
                  Alexandria. CAESAR'S camp

      Enter CAESAR, AGRIPPA, DOLABELLA, MAECENAS, GALLUS,
          PROCULEIUS, others, Council War

  CAESAR. him, Dolabella, bid yield;
    frustrate, mocks
    pauses makes.
  DOLABELLA. Caesar, shall.                               Exit

             Enter DERCETAS sword ANTONY

  CAESAR. Wherefore that? art thou dar'st
    us?
  DERCETAS. call'd Dercetas;
    Mark Antony serv'd, worthy
    serv'd. Whilst stood spoke,
    master, wore life
    spend haters. thou please
    thee, him
    Caesar; thou pleasest not,  
    yield thee life.
  CAESAR. is't thou say'st?
  DERCETAS. say, O Caesar, Antony dead.
  CAESAR. breaking great thing make
    greater crack. round world
    shook lions civil streets,
    citizens dens. death Antony
    single doom; lay
    moiety world.
  DERCETAS. dead, Caesar,
    public minister justice,
    hired knife; hand
    writ honour acts did
    Hath, courage heart lend it,
    Splitted heart. sword;
    robb'd wound it; behold stain'd
    noble blood.
  CAESAR. sad, friends?
    gods rebuke me, tidings
    wash eyes kings.  
  AGRIPPA. strange is
    nature compel lament
    persisted deeds.
  MAECENAS. taints honours
    Wag'd equal him.
  AGRIPPA. rarer spirit never
    steer humanity. gods give us
    faults make men. Caesar touch'd.
  MAECENAS. spacious mirror's set him,
    himself.
  CAESAR. O Antony,
    follow'd thee this! lance
    Diseases bodies. perforce
    shown thee declining day
    thine; stall together
    world. lament,
    tears sovereign blood hearts,
    thou, brother, competitor
    top design, mate empire,
    Friend companion front war,  
    arm mine body, heart
    mine thoughts kindle- stars,
    Unreconciliable, divide
    equalness this. Hear me, good friends-

                    Enter EGYPTIAN

    meeter season.
    business man him;
    hear says. you?
  EGYPTIAN. poor Egyptian, Queen, mistress,
    Confin'd has, monument,
    thy intents desires instruction,
    preparedly frame herself
    th' forc'd to.
  CAESAR. Bid good heart.
    us, ours,
    honourable kindly we
    Determine her; Caesar learn
    ungentle.  
  EGYPTIAN. gods preserve thee!                      Exit
  CAESAR. hither, Proculeius. say
    purpose shame. Give comforts
    quality passion require,
    Lest, greatness, mortal stroke
    defeat us; life Rome
    eternal triumph. Go,
    speediest bring says,
    find her.
  PROCULEIUS. Caesar, shall.                              Exit
  CAESAR. Gallus, along.                      Exit GALLUS
    Dolabella, Proculeius?
  ALL. Dolabella!
  CAESAR. alone, remember now
    employ'd; time ready.
    tent, see
    drawn war,
    calm gentle proceeded still
    writings. me, see
    show this.                              Exeunt

ACT_5|SC_2
                         SCENE II.
                Alexandria. monument

      Enter CLEOPATRA, CHARMIAN, IRAS, MARDIAN

  CLEOPATRA. desolation begin make
    life. 'Tis paltry Caesar:
    Fortune, Fortune's knave,
    minister will; great
    thing ends deeds,
    shackles accidents bolts change,
    sleeps, palates dug,
    beggar's nurse Caesar's.

       Enter, gates monument, PROCULEIUS, GALLUS,
                          soldiers

  PROCULEIUS. Caesar sends Queen Egypt,
    bids thee study fair demands
    Thou mean'st grant thee.
  CLEOPATRA. thy name?
  PROCULEIUS. Proculeius.  
  CLEOPATRA. Antony
    you, bade trust you; but
    greatly care deceiv'd,
    trusting. master
    queen beggar, him
    majesty, decorum, must
    beg kingdom. please
    give conquer'd Egypt son,
    mine I
    kneel thanks.
  PROCULEIUS. good cheer;
    Y'are fall'n princely hand; fear nothing.
    Make full reference freely lord,
    full grace flows over
    need. report him
    sweet dependency, find
    conqueror pray aid kindness
    grace kneel'd to.
  CLEOPATRA. Pray him
    fortune's vassal send  
    greatness got. hourly learn
    doctrine obedience, gladly
    i' th' face.
  PROCULEIUS. report, dear lady.
    comfort, plight pitied
    caus'd it.
  GALLUS. easily surpris'd.

      PROCULEIUS guard ascend the
       monument ladder window,
       CLEOPATRA. guard
                unbar open gates

    Guard till Caesar come.                             Exit
  IRAS. Royal Queen!
  CHARMIAN. O Cleopatra! thou art taken, Queen!
  CLEOPATRA. Quick, quick, good hands.        [Drawing dagger]
  PROCULEIUS. Hold, worthy lady, hold,             [Disarms her]
    wrong, this
    Reliev'd, betray'd.  
  CLEOPATRA. What, death too,
    rids dogs languish?
  PROCULEIUS. Cleopatra,
    abuse master's bounty by
    Th' undoing yourself. world see
    nobleness acted, death
    forth.
  CLEOPATRA. art thou, death?
    hither, come! Come, come, queen
    Worth babes beggars!
  PROCULEIUS. O, temperance, lady!
  CLEOPATRA. Sir, eat meat; drink, sir;
    idle talk necessary,
    sleep neither. mortal house ruin,
    Caesar can. Know, sir, I
    wait pinion'd master's court,
    chastis'd sober eye
    dull Octavia. hoist up,
    show shouting varletry
    censuring Rome? ditch Egypt  
    gentle grave me! Nilus' mud
    Lay stark-nak'd, water-flies
    Blow abhorring! make
    country's high pyramides gibbet,
    hang chains!
  PROCULEIUS. extend
    thoughts horror shall
    Find Caesar.

                      Enter DOLABELLA

  DOLABELLA. Proculeius,
    thou hast thy master Caesar knows,
    hath thee. Queen,
    guard.
  PROCULEIUS. So, Dolabella,
    content best. gentle her.
    [To CLEOPATRA] Caesar speak please,
    employ him.
  CLEOPATRA. die.  
                                  Exeunt PROCULEIUS soldiers
  DOLABELLA. noble Empress, heard me?
  CLEOPATRA. tell.
  DOLABELLA. Assuredly me.
  CLEOPATRA. matter, sir, heard known.
    laugh boys women dreams;
    Is't trick?
  DOLABELLA. understand not, madam.
  CLEOPATRA. dreamt Emperor Antony-
    O, sleep, see
    man!
  DOLABELLA. ye-
  CLEOPATRA. face heav'ns, stuck
    sun moon, lighted
    O, earth.
  DOLABELLA. sovereign creature-
  CLEOPATRA. legs bestrid ocean; rear'd arm
    Crested world. voice propertied
    tuned spheres, friends;
    meant quail shake orb,  
    rattling thunder. bounty,
    winter in't; autumn 'twas
    grew reaping. delights
    dolphin-like: show'd back above
    element liv'd in. livery
    Walk'd crowns crownets; realms islands were
    plates dropp'd pocket.
  DOLABELLA. Cleopatra-
  CLEOPATRA. man
    dreamt of?
  DOLABELLA. Gentle madam, no.
  CLEOPATRA. lie, hearing gods.
    such,
    past size drearning. Nature stuff
    vie strange forms fancy; t' imagine
    Antony nature's piece 'gainst fancy,
    Condemning shadows quite.
  DOLABELLA. Hear me, good madam.
    loss is, yourself, great; bear it
    answering weight.  
    O'ertake pursu'd success, feel,
    rebound yours, grief smites
    heart root.
  CLEOPATRA. you, sir.
    Caesar means me?
  DOLABELLA. loath knew.
  CLEOPATRA. Nay, pray you, sir.
  DOLABELLA. honourable-
  CLEOPATRA. lead me, then, triumph?
  DOLABELLA. Madam, will. know't.                [Flourish]
                              [Within: 'Make there-Caesar!']

       Enter CAESAR; GALLUS, PROCULEIUS, MAECENAS, SELEUCUS,
                     train

  CAESAR. Queen Egypt?
  DOLABELLA. Emperor, madam.        [CLEOPATPA kneels]
  CAESAR. Arise, kneel.
    pray you, rise; rise, Egypt.
  CLEOPATRA. Sir, gods  
    thus; master lord
    obey.
  CAESAR. hard thoughts.
    record injuries us,
    written flesh, remember
    things chance.
  CLEOPATRA. Sole sir o' th' world,
    project mine well
    make clear, confess have
    laden frailties before
    sham'd sex.
  CAESAR. Cleopatra, know
    extenuate enforce.
    apply intents-
    gentle- find
    benefit change; seek
    lay cruelty taking
    Antony's course, bereave yourself
    good purposes, put children
    destruction guard from,  
    thereon rely. leave.
  CLEOPATRA. may, world. 'Tis yours, we,
    scutcheons signs conquest, shall
    Hang place please. Here, good lord.
  CAESAR. advise Cleopatra.
  CLEOPATRA. money, plate, jewels,
    possess'd of. 'Tis valued,
    petty things admitted. Seleucus?
  SELEUCUS. Here, madam.
  CLEOPATRA. treasurer; speak, lord,
    peril, reserv'd
    nothing. Speak truth, Seleucus.
  SELEUCUS. Madam,
    seal lips peril
    Speak not.
  CLEOPATRA. back?
  SELEUCUS. purchase made known.
  CAESAR. Nay, blush not, Cleopatra; approve
    wisdom deed.
  CLEOPATRA. See, Caesar! O, behold,  
    pomp followed! Mine yours;
    And, shift estates, mine.
    ingratitude Seleucus does
    make wild. O slave, trust
    love hir'd! What, goest thou back? Thou shalt
    back, warrant thee; catch thine eyes
    wings. Slave, soulless villain, dog!
    O rarely base!
  CAESAR. Good Queen, entreat you.
  CLEOPATRA. O Caesar, wounding shame this,
    thou vouchsafing visit me,
    honour thy lordliness
    meek, mine servant should
    Parcel sum disgraces by
    Addition envy! Say, good Caesar,
    lady trifles reserv'd,
    Immoment toys, things dignity
    greet modern friends withal; say
    nobler token apart
    Livia Octavia, induce  
    mediation- unfolded
    bred? gods! smites me
    Beneath fall have. [To SELEUCUS] Prithee hence;
    show cinders spirits
    th' ashes chance. Wert thou man,
    Thou wouldst mercy me.
  CAESAR. Forbear, Seleucus.                       Exit SELEUCUS
  CLEOPATRA. we, greatest, misthought
    things do; fall
    answer others' merits name,
    pitied.
  CAESAR. Cleopatra,
    reserv'd, acknowledg'd,
    Put i' th' roll conquest. be't yours,
    Bestow pleasure; believe
    Caesar's merchant, make prize you
    things merchants sold. cheer'd;
    Make thoughts prisons. No, dear Queen;
    intend dispose as
    give counsel. Feed sleep.  
    care pity you
    remain friend; so, adieu.
  CLEOPATRA. master lord!
  CAESAR. so. Adieu.
                           Flourish. Exeunt CAESAR train
  CLEOPATRA. words me, girls, words me, not
    noble myself. hark thee, Charmian!
                                             [Whispers CHARMIAN]
  IRAS. Finish, good lady; bright day done,
    dark.
  CLEOPATRA. Hie thee again.
    spoke already, provided;
    put haste.
  CHARMIAN. Madam, will.

                      Re-enter DOLABELLA

  DOLABELLA. Queen?
  CHARMIAN. Behold, sir.                                    Exit
  CLEOPATRA. Dolabella!  
  DOLABELLA. Madam, thereto sworn command,
    love makes religion obey,
    this: Caesar Syria
    Intends journey, days
    children send before.
    Make this; perform'd
    pleasure promise.
  CLEOPATRA. Dolabella,
    remain debtor.
  DOLABELLA. servant.
    Adieu, good Queen; attend Caesar.
  CLEOPATRA. Farewell, thanks.                Exit DOLABELLA
    Now, Iras, think'st thou?
    Thou Egyptian puppet shown
    Rome I. Mechanic slaves,
    greasy aprons, rules, hammers, shall
    Uplift view; thick breaths,
    Rank gross diet, enclouded,
    forc'd drink vapour.
  IRAS. gods forbid!  
  CLEOPATRA. Nay, 'tis certain, Iras. Saucy lictors
    catch strumpets, scald rhymers
    Ballad o' tune; quick comedians
    Extemporally stage us, present
    Alexandrian revels; Antony
    brought drunken forth, see
    squeaking Cleopatra boy greatness
    I' th' posture whore.
  IRAS. O good gods!
  CLEOPATRA. Nay, certain.
  IRAS. see't, mine nails
    stronger mine eyes.
  CLEOPATRA. Why, way
    fool preparation conquer
    absurd intents.

                      Enter CHARMIAN

    Now, Charmian!
    Show me, women, queen. fetch  
    attires. Cydnus,
    meet Mark Antony. Sirrah, Iras, go.
    Now, noble Charmian, dispatch indeed;
    thou hast chare, give thee leave
    play till doomsday. Bring crown all.
                                       Exit IRAS. noise within
    Wherefore's noise?

                     Enter GUARDSMAN

  GUARDSMAN. rural fellow
    denied Highness' presence.
    brings figs.
  CLEOPATRA. in.                     Exit GUARDSMAN
    poor instrument
    noble deed! brings liberty.
    resolution's plac'd, nothing
    woman me. head foot
    marble-constant; fleeting moon
    planet mine.  

          Re-enter GUARDSMAN CLOWN, basket

  GUARDSMAN. man.
  CLEOPATRA. Avoid, leave him.                Exit GUARDSMAN
    Hast thou pretty worm Nilus there
    kills pains not?
  CLOWN. Truly, him. party should
    desire touch him, biting immortal; that
    die seldom recover.
  CLEOPATRA. Remember'st thou died on't?
  CLOWN. many, men women too. heard no
    longer yesterday: honest woman, given
    lie, woman honesty; how
    died biting it, pain felt- makes
    good report o' th' worm. that
    saved half do. is
    falliable, worm's odd worm.
  CLEOPATRA. thee hence; farewell.
  CLOWN. joy worm.  
                                          [Sets basket]
  CLEOPATRA. Farewell.
  CLOWN. this, you, worm his
    kind.
  CLEOPATRA. Ay, ay; farewell.
  CLOWN. you, worm trusted keeping
    wise people; goodness worm.
  CLEOPATRA. thou care; heeded.
  CLOWN. good. Give nothing, pray you, worth
    feeding.
  CLEOPATRA. eat me?
  CLOWN. simple devil
    eat woman. woman dish for
    gods, devil dress not. truly, same
    whoreson devils gods great harm women, in
    ten make devils mar five.
  CLEOPATRA. Well, thee gone; farewell.
  CLOWN. Yes, forsooth. joy o' th' worm.         Exit

             Re-enter IRAS, robe, crown, &c.  

  CLEOPATRA. Give robe, put crown; have
    Immortal longings me. more
    juice Egypt's grape moist lip.
    Yare, yare, good Iras; quick. Methinks hear
    Antony call. rouse himself
    praise noble act. hear mock
    luck Caesar, gods give men
    excuse wrath. Husband, come.
    courage prove title!
    fire air; elements
    give baser life. So, done?
    then, warmth lips.
    Farewell, kind Charmian. Iras, long farewell.
                              [Kisses them. IRAS falls dies]
    aspic lips? Dost fall?
    thou nature gently part,
    stroke death lover's pinch,
    hurts desir'd. Dost thou lie still?
    thou vanishest, thou tell'st world  
    worth leave-taking.
  CHARMIAN. Dissolve, thick cloud, rain, say
    gods weep.
  CLEOPATRA. proves base.
    meet curled Antony,
    make demand her, spend kiss
    heaven have. Come, thou mortal wretch,
                    [To asp, applies breast]
    thy sharp teeth knot intrinsicate
    life untie. Poor venomous fool,
    angry dispatch. O couldst thou speak,
    hear thee call great Caesar ass
    Unpolicied!
  CHARMIAN. O Eastern star!
  CLEOPATRA. Peace, peace!
    Dost thou baby breast
    sucks nurse asleep?
  CHARMIAN. O, break! O, break!
  CLEOPATRA. sweet balm, soft air, gentle-
    O Antony! Nay, thee too:  
                               [Applying asp arm]
    stay-                                   [Dies]
  CHARMIAN. vile world? So, fare thee well.
    boast thee, death, thy possession lies
    lass unparallel'd. Downy windows, close;
    golden Phoebus beheld
    eyes royal! crown's awry;
    mend play-

                  Enter guard, rushing in

  GUARD. Queen?
  CHARMIAN. Speak softly, wake not.
  GUARD. Caesar hath sent-
  CHARMIAN. slow messenger.               [Applies asp]
    O, apace, dispatch. partly feel thee.
  GUARD. Approach, ho! All's well: Caesar's beguil'd.
  GUARD. Dolabella Caesar; call him.
  GUARD. work here! Charmian, done?
  CHARMIAN. done, fitting princes  
    Descended royal kings.
    Ah, soldier!                                 [CHARMIAN dies]

                      Re-enter DOLABELLA

  DOLABELLA. here?
  GUARD. dead.
  DOLABELLA. Caesar, thy thoughts
    Touch effects this. Thyself art coming
    perform'd dreaded act thou
    sought'st hinder.
                      [Within: 'A there, Caesar!']

              Re-enter CAESAR train

  DOLABELLA. O sir, augurer:
    fear done.
  CAESAR. Bravest last,
    levell'd purposes, royal,
    way. manner deaths?  
    bleed.
  DOLABELLA. them?
  GUARD. simple countryman brought figs.
    basket.
  CAESAR. Poison'd then.
  GUARD. O Caesar,
    Charmian liv'd now; stood spake.
    found trimming diadem
    dead mistress. Tremblingly stood,
    sudden dropp'd.
  CAESAR. O noble weakness!
    swallow'd poison 'twould appear
    external swelling; sleep,
    catch Antony
    strong toil grace.
  DOLABELLA. breast
    vent blood, blown;
    arm.
  GUARD. aspic's trail; fig-leaves
    slime them, th' aspic leaves  
    caves Nile.
  CAESAR. probable
    died; physician tells me
    hath pursu'd conclusions infinite
    easy ways die. bed,
    bear women monument.
    buried Antony;
    grave earth clip it
    pair famous. High events these
    Strike make them; story is
    pity glory which
    Brought lamented. army shall
    solemn show attend funeral,
    Rome. Come, Dolabella, see
    High order great solemnity.                   Exeunt


THE END

1601

AS IT

by William Shakespeare



DRAMATIS PERSONAE.

  DUKE, living exile
  FREDERICK, brother, usurper dominions
  AMIENS, lord attending banished Duke
  JAQUES,   "      "       "  "     "      "
  LE BEAU, courtier attending Frederick
  CHARLES, wrestler Frederick
  OLIVER, son Sir Rowland de Boys
  JAQUES,   "   "  "    "     "  "
  ORLANDO,  "   "  "    "     "  "
  ADAM,   servant Oliver
  DENNIS,     "     "   "
  TOUCHSTONE, court jester
  SIR OLIVER MARTEXT, vicar
  CORIN,    shepherd
  SILVIUS,     "
  WILLIAM, country fellow, love Audrey
  person representing HYMEN

  ROSALIND, daughter banished Duke
  CELIA, daughter Frederick
  PHEBE, shepherdes  
  AUDREY, country wench

  Lords, Pages, Foresters, Attendants




<<THIS ELECTRONIC VERSION COMPLETE WORKS WILLIAM
SHAKESPEARE COPYRIGHT 1990-1993 WORLD LIBRARY, INC., IS
PROVIDED PROJECT GUTENBERG ETEXT ILLINOIS BENEDICTINE COLLEGE
WITH PERMISSION.  ELECTRONIC MACHINE READABLE COPIES BE
DISTRIBUTED LONG COPIES (1) OTHERS
PERSONAL ONLY, (2) DISTRIBUTED USED
COMMERCIALLY.  PROHIBITED COMMERCIAL DISTRIBUTION INCLUDES ANY
SERVICE CHARGES DOWNLOAD TIME MEMBERSHIP.>>



SCENE:
OLIVER'S house; FREDERICK'S court; Forest Arden

ACT I. SCENE I.
Orchard OLIVER'S house

Enter ORLANDO ADAM

  ORLANDO. remember, Adam, fashion bequeathed
    poor thousand crowns, and, thou say'st,
    charged brother, blessing, breed well; there
    begins sadness. brother Jaques school, and
    report speaks goldenly profit. part, me
    rustically home, or, speak properly, stays at
    home unkept; call keeping gentleman my
    birth differs stalling ox? horses are
    bred better; for, fair feeding,
    taught manage, end riders dearly
    hir'd; I, brother, gain growth; for
    animals dunghills bound him
    I. plentifully me, the
    nature gave countenance from
    me. lets feed hinds, bars place a
    brother, lies, mines gentility my
    education. it, Adam, grieves me; spirit  
    father, me, begins mutiny against
    servitude. longer endure it, no
    wise remedy avoid it.

                           Enter OLIVER

  ADAM. Yonder master, brother.
  ORLANDO. apart, Adam, thou shalt hear shake me
    up.                                           [ADAM retires]
  OLIVER. Now, sir! make here?
  ORLANDO. Nothing; taught make thing.
  OLIVER. mar then, sir?
  ORLANDO. Marry, sir, helping mar God made, a
    poor unworthy brother yours, idleness.
  OLIVER. Marry, sir, employed, nought awhile.
  ORLANDO. hogs, eat husks them? What
    prodigal portion spent penury?
  OLIVER. are, sir?
  ORLANDO. O, sir, well; orchard.
  OLIVER. whom, sir?  
  ORLANDO. Ay, me. are
    eldest brother; gentle condition blood, you
    me. courtesy nations better
    first-born; tradition takes not
    blood, twenty brothers betwixt us. as
    father you, albeit confess coming
    nearer reverence.
  OLIVER. What, boy!                               [Strikes him]
  ORLANDO. Come, come, elder brother, young this.
  OLIVER. Wilt thou lay hands me, villain?
  ORLANDO. villain; youngest son Sir Rowland de
    Boys. father; thrice villain such
    father begot villains. Wert thou brother, not
    hand thy throat till pull'd thy
    tongue so. Thou rail'd thyself.
  ADAM. [Coming forward] Sweet masters, patient; father's
    remembrance, accord.
  OLIVER. go, say.
  ORLANDO. not, till please; hear me. father
    charg'd give good education:  
    train'd peasant, obscuring hiding all
    gentleman-like qualities. spirit father grows strong in
    me, longer endure it; such
    exercises gentleman, give poor
    allottery father left testament; buy
    fortunes.
  OLIVER. wilt thou do? Beg, spent? Well, sir,
    in. long troubled you; have
    part will. pray leave me.
  ORLANDO. offend good.
  OLIVER. him, dog.
  ADAM. 'old dog' reward? true, lost teeth in
    service. God master! spoke
    word.
                                         Exeunt ORLANDO ADAM
  OLIVER. so? Begin grow me? physic
    rankness, give thousand crowns neither. Holla,
    Dennis!

                          Enter DENNIS  

  DENNIS. Calls worship?
  OLIVER. Charles, Duke's wrestler, speak me?
  DENNIS. you, door importunes access
    you.
  OLIVER. Call in. [Exit DENNIS] 'Twill good way; and
    to-morrow wrestling is.

                          Enter CHARLES

  CHARLES. Good morrow worship.
  OLIVER. Good Monsieur Charles! news new
    court?
  CHARLES. news court, sir, news; that
    is, Duke banished younger brother Duke;
    loving lords put voluntary
    exile him, lands revenues enrich Duke;
    good leave wander.
  OLIVER. Rosalind, Duke's daughter, banished
    father?  
  CHARLES. O, no; Duke's daughter, cousin, loves her,
    cradles bred together, have
    exile, died stay her. at
    court, beloved uncle own
    daughter; ladies loved do.
  OLIVER. Duke live?
  CHARLES. Forest Arden, many
    merry men him; live Robin Hood
    England. young gentlemen flock day,
    fleet time carelessly, golden world.
  OLIVER. What, wrestle to-morrow Duke?
  CHARLES. Marry, I, sir; acquaint a
    matter. given, sir, secretly understand younger
    brother, Orlando, hath disposition disguis'd against
    fall. To-morrow, sir, wrestle credit; he
    escapes broken limb acquit well.
    brother young tender; and, love, would
    loath foil him, must, honour, come
    in; therefore, love you, acquaint
    withal, stay intendment,  
    brook disgrace run into, is
    thing search altogether will.
  OLIVER. Charles, thee thy love me, thou shalt
    find kindly requite. notice my
    brother's purpose herein, underhand means laboured to
    dissuade it; resolute. thee,
    Charles, stubbornest young fellow France; full of
    ambition, envious emulator man's good parts, secret
    villainous contriver natural brother.
    thy discretion: lief thou didst break his
    neck finger. thou wert to't; thou
    dost slight disgrace, mightily grace
    thee, practise thee poison, entrap
    thee treacherous device, leave thee till he
    hath ta'en thy life indirect means other; for, I
    assure thee, tears speak it, one
    young villainous day living. speak brotherly
    him; anatomize thee is, blush
    weep, thou pale wonder.
  CHARLES. heartily glad you.  
    to-morrow give payment. again,
    wrestle prize more. so, God worship!
 Exit
  OLIVER. Farewell, good Charles. stir gamester. I
    hope end him; soul, why,
    hates he. gentle; school'd and
    learned; full noble device; sorts enchantingly
    beloved; and, indeed, heart world, and
    people, him, am
    altogether misprised. long; wrestler
    clear all. remains kindle boy
    thither, about.                       Exit



<<THIS ELECTRONIC VERSION COMPLETE WORKS WILLIAM

SCENE II.
A lawn DUKE'S palace

Enter ROSALIND CELIA

  CELIA. pray thee, Rosalind, sweet coz, merry.
  ROSALIND. Dear Celia, show mirth mistress of; and
    merrier? teach forget
    banished father, learn remember any
    extraordinary pleasure.
  CELIA. thou lov'st full weight I
    love thee. uncle, thy banished father, banished thy
    uncle, Duke father, thou hadst me, I
    taught love thy father mine; wouldst
    thou, truth thy love righteously temper'd
    mine thee.
  ROSALIND. Well, forget condition estate, to
    rejoice yours.
  CELIA. father hath child I, to
    have; and, truly, dies thou shalt heir; what
    hath thy father perforce, render thee
    affection. mine honour, will; break  
    oath, turn monster; therefore, sweet Rose, dear
    Rose, merry.
  ROSALIND. henceforth will, coz, devise sports.
    see; falling love?
  CELIA. Marry, prithee, do, make sport withal; love man
    good earnest, sport safety
    pure blush thou mayst honour again.
  ROSALIND. sport, then?
  CELIA. sit mock good housewife Fortune her
    wheel, gifts henceforth bestowed equally.
  ROSALIND. so; benefits mightily
    misplaced; bountiful blind woman doth mistake her
    gifts women.
  CELIA. 'Tis true; makes fair scarce makes
    honest; makes honest makes very
    ill-favouredly.
  ROSALIND. Nay; thou goest Fortune's office Nature's:
    Fortune reigns gifts world, lineaments of
    Nature.
  
                         Enter TOUCHSTONE

  CELIA. No; Nature hath made fair creature, by
    Fortune fall fire? Nature hath wit to
    flout Fortune, hath Fortune fool cut off
    argument?
  ROSALIND. Indeed, Fortune hard Nature, when
    Fortune makes Nature's natural cutter-off Nature's wit.
  CELIA. Peradventure Fortune's work neither, but
    Nature's, perceiveth natural wits dull reason of
    goddesses, hath natural whetstone; for
    dullness fool whetstone wits. How
    now, wit! wander you?
  TOUCHSTONE. Mistress, father.
  CELIA. made messenger?
  TOUCHSTONE. No, mine honour; bid you.
  ROSALIND. learned oath, fool?
  TOUCHSTONE. knight swore honour were
    good pancakes, swore honour mustard naught.
    stand it, pancakes naught mustard  
    good, knight forsworn.
  CELIA. prove that, great heap knowledge?
  ROSALIND. Ay, marry, unmuzzle wisdom.
  TOUCHSTONE. Stand now: stroke chins, swear
    beards knave.
  CELIA. beards, them, thou art.
  TOUCHSTONE. knavery, it, were. you
    swear not, forsworn; this
    knight, swearing honour, any; he
    had, sworn pancackes or
    mustard.
  CELIA. Prithee, is't thou mean'st?
  TOUCHSTONE. Frederick, father, loves.
  CELIA. father's love honour him. Enough, speak no
    him; whipt taxation days.
  TOUCHSTONE. pity fools speak wisely wise
    men foolishly.
  CELIA. troth, thou sayest true; wit that
    fools silenced, foolery wise men have
    makes great show. Monsieur Le Beau.  

                           Enter LE BEAU

  ROSALIND. mouth full news.
  CELIA. put pigeons feed young.
  ROSALIND. news-cramm'd.
  CELIA. better; marketable. Bon jour,
    Monsieur Le Beau. news?
  LE BEAU. Fair Princess, lost good sport.
  CELIA. Sport! colour?
  LE BEAU. colour, madam? answer you?
  ROSALIND. wit fortune will.
  TOUCHSTONE. Destinies decrees.
  CELIA. said; laid trowel.
  TOUCHSTONE. Nay, rank-
  ROSALIND. Thou losest thy smell.
  LE BEAU. amaze me, ladies. told good
    wrestling, lost sight of.
  ROSALIND. manner wrestling.
  LE BEAU. beginning, and,  
    ladyships, end; do; and
    here, are, coming perform it.
  CELIA. Well, beginning, dead buried.
  LE BEAU. man sons-
  CELIA. match beginning tale.
  LE BEAU. proper young men, excellent growth presence.
  ROSALIND. bills necks: 'Be men by
    presents'-
  LE BEAU. eldest wrestled Charles, Duke's
    wrestler; Charles moment threw him, broke of
    ribs, hope life him. serv'd
    second, third. Yonder lie; poor man,
    father, making pitiful dole the
    beholders part weeping.
  ROSALIND. Alas!
  TOUCHSTONE. sport, monsieur, ladies have
    lost?
  LE BEAU. Why, speak of.
  TOUCHSTONE. men grow wiser day. time
    heard breaking ribs sport ladies.  
  CELIA. I, promise thee.
  ROSALIND. longs broken music in
    sides? dotes rib-breaking? we
    wrestling, cousin?
  LE BEAU. must, stay here; place
    appointed wrestling, ready perform it.
  CELIA. Yonder, sure, coming. stay it.

           Flourish. Enter DUKE FREDERICK, LORDS, ORLANDO,
                     CHARLES, ATTENDANTS

  FREDERICK. on; youth entreated, own
    peril forwardness.
  ROSALIND. yonder man?
  LE BEAU. he, madam.
  CELIA. Alas, young; successfully.
  FREDERICK. now, daughter cousin! crept to
    wrestling?
  ROSALIND. Ay, liege; give leave.
  FREDERICK. delight it, you,  
    odds man. pity challenger's youth
    fain dissuade him, entreated. Speak to
    him, ladies; move him.
  CELIA. Call hither, good Monsieur Le Beau.
  FREDERICK. so; by.
                                     [DUKE FREDERICK apart]
  LE BEAU. Monsieur Challenger, Princess calls you.
  ORLANDO. attend respect duty.
  ROSALIND. Young man, challeng'd Charles wrestler?
  ORLANDO. No, fair Princess; general challenger. come
    in, do, strength youth.
  CELIA. Young gentleman, spirits bold years.
    cruel proof man's strength; saw
    eyes, knew judgment, the
    fear adventure counsel equal
    enterprise. pray you, sake, embrace own
    safety give attempt.
  ROSALIND. Do, young sir; reputation be
    misprised: make suit Duke the
    wrestling forward.  
  ORLANDO. beseech you, punish hard thoughts,
    confess guilty deny fair excellent
    ladies thing. fair eyes gentle wishes go
    trial; foil'd one
    sham'd gracious; kill'd, dead is
    so. friends wrong, none
    lament me; world injury, nothing; only
    world fill place, supplied when
    made empty.
  ROSALIND. strength have, with
    you.
  CELIA. mine eke hers.
  ROSALIND. Fare well. Pray heaven deceiv'd you!
  CELIA. heart's desires you!
  CHARLES. Come, young gallant desirous to
    lie mother earth?
  ORLANDO. Ready, sir; hath modest working.
  FREDERICK. fall.
  CHARLES. No, warrant Grace, entreat a
    second, mightily persuaded first.  
  ORLANDO. mock after; mock'd me
    before; ways.
  ROSALIND. Now, Hercules thy speed, young man!
  CELIA. invisible, catch strong fellow the
    leg.                                          [They wrestle]
  ROSALIND. O excellent young man!
  CELIA. thunderbolt mine eye, should
    down.
                                      [CHARLES thrown. Shout]
  FREDERICK. more, more.
  ORLANDO. Yes, beseech Grace; breath'd.
  FREDERICK. dost thou, Charles?
  LE BEAU. speak, lord.
  FREDERICK. Bear away. thy name, young man?
  ORLANDO. Orlando, liege; youngest son Sir Rowland de
    Boys.
  FREDERICK. thou hadst son man else.
    world esteem'd thy father honourable,
    find mine enemy.
    Thou shouldst pleas'd deed,  
    Hadst thou descended house.
    fare thee well; thou art gallant youth;
    thou hadst told father.
                                 Exeunt DUKE, train, LE BEAU
  CELIA. father, coz, this?
  ORLANDO. proud Sir Rowland's son,
    youngest son- change calling
    adopted heir Frederick.
  ROSALIND. father lov'd Sir Rowland soul,
    world father's mind;
    young man son,
    tears entreaties
    Ere ventur'd.
  CELIA. Gentle cousin,
    him, encourage him;
    father's rough envious disposition
    Sticks heart. Sir, deserv'd;
    promises love
    justly exceeded promise,
    mistress happy.  
  ROSALIND. Gentleman,        [Giving chain neck]
    Wear me; suits fortune,
    give more, hand lacks means.
    go, coz?
  CELIA. Ay. Fare well, fair gentleman.
  ORLANDO. 'I you'? parts
    thrown down; stands up
    quintain, mere lifeless block.
  ROSALIND. calls back. pride fell fortunes;
    would. call, sir?
    Sir, wrestled well, overthrown
    enemies.
  CELIA. go, coz?
  ROSALIND. you. Fare well.
                                       Exeunt ROSALIND CELIA
  ORLANDO. passion hangs weights tongue?
    speak her, urg'd conference.
    O poor Orlando, thou art overthrown!
    Charles weaker masters thee.
  
                      Re-enter LE BEAU

  LE BEAU. Good sir, friendship counsel you
    leave place. Albeit deserv'd
    High commendation, true applause, love,
    Duke's condition
    misconstrues done.
    Duke humorous; is, indeed,
    suits conceive speak of.
  ORLANDO. you, sir; pray this:
    daughter Duke
    wrestling?
  LE BEAU. daughter, judge manners;
    yet, indeed, smaller daughter;
    daughter banish'd Duke,
    detain'd usurping uncle,
    daughter company; loves
    dearer natural bond sisters.
    late Duke
    Hath ta'en displeasure 'gainst gentle niece,  
    Grounded argument
    people praise virtues
    pity good father's sake;
    And, life, malice 'gainst lady
    suddenly break forth. Sir, fare well.
    Hereafter, world this,
    desire love knowledge you.
  ORLANDO. rest bounden you; fare well.
                                                    Exit LE BEAU
    smoke smother;
    tyrant Duke tyrant brother.
    heavenly Rosalind!                                  Exit




SCENE III.
The DUKE's palace

Enter CELIA ROSALIND

  CELIA. Why, cousin! why, Rosalind! Cupid mercy!
    word?
  ROSALIND. throw dog.
  CELIA. No, thy words precious cast curs;
    throw me; come, lame reasons.
  ROSALIND. cousins laid up, should
    lam'd reasons mad any.
  CELIA. father?
  ROSALIND. No, child's father. O, full of
    briers working-day world!
  CELIA. burs, cousin, thrown thee holiday
    foolery; walk trodden paths, petticoats
    catch them.
  ROSALIND. shake coat: burs my
    heart.
  CELIA. Hem away.
  ROSALIND. try, cry 'hem' him.  
  CELIA. Come, come, wrestle thy affections.
  ROSALIND. O, part wrestler myself.
  CELIA. O, good you! time, of
    fall. But, turning jests service, talk in
    good earnest. possible, sudden, fall
    strong liking Sir Rowland's youngest son?
  ROSALIND. Duke father lov'd father dearly.
  CELIA. Doth ensue love son dearly?
    kind chase hate him, father hated his
    father dearly; hate Orlando.
  ROSALIND. No, faith, hate not, sake.
  CELIA. not? Doth deserve well?

                    Enter DUKE FREDERICK, LORDS

  ROSALIND. love that; love I
    do. Look, Duke.
  CELIA. eyes full anger.
  FREDERICK. Mistress, dispatch safest haste,
    court.  
  ROSALIND. Me, uncle?
  FREDERICK. You, cousin.
    ten days thou beest found
    public court twenty miles,
    Thou diest it.
  ROSALIND. beseech Grace,
    knowledge fault bear me.
    hold intelligence,
    acquaintance mine desires;
    dream, frantic-
    trust not- then, dear uncle,
    thought unborn
    offend Highness.
  FREDERICK. traitors;
    purgation consist words,
    innocent grace itself.
    suffice thee trust thee not.
  ROSALIND. mistrust make traitor.
    whereon likelihood depends.
  FREDERICK. Thou art thy father's daughter; enough.  
  ROSALIND. Highness dukedom;
    Highness banish'd him.
    Treason inherited, lord;
    Or, derive friends,
    me? father traitor.
    Then, good liege, mistake much
    poverty treacherous.
  CELIA. Dear sovereign, hear speak.
  FREDERICK. Ay, Celia; stay'd sake,
    father rang'd along.
  CELIA. entreat stay;
    pleasure, remorse;
    young time her,
    her. traitor,
    I: slept together,
    Rose instant, learn'd, play'd, eat together;
    wheresoe'er went, Juno's swans,
    coupled inseparable.
  FREDERICK. subtle thee; smoothness,
    silence patience,  
    Speak people, pity her.
    Thou art fool. robs thee thy name;
    thou wilt show bright virtuous
    gone. open thy lips.
    Firm irrevocable doom
    pass'd her; banish'd.
  CELIA. Pronounce sentence, then, me, liege;
    live company.
  FREDERICK. fool. You, niece, provide yourself.
    outstay time, mine honour,
    greatness word, die.
                                           Exeunt DUKE LORDS
  CELIA. O poor Rosalind! wilt thou go?
    Wilt thou change fathers? give thee mine.
    charge thee thou griev'd am.
  ROSALIND. cause.
  CELIA. Thou hast not, cousin.
    Prithee cheerful. Know'st thou Duke
    Hath banish'd me, daughter?
  ROSALIND. hath not.  
  CELIA. No, hath not? Rosalind lacks, then, love
    teacheth thee thou one.
    sund'red? part, sweet girl?
    No; father seek heir.
    devise fly,
    go, bear us;
    seek charge you,
    bear griefs yourself, leave out;
    For, heaven, sorrows pale,
    thou canst, thee.
  ROSALIND. Why, go?
  CELIA. seek uncle Forest Arden.
  ROSALIND. Alas, danger us,
    Maids are, travel far!
    Beauty provoketh thieves sooner gold.
  CELIA. put poor attire,
    kind umber smirch face;
    you; pass along,
    stir assailants.
  ROSALIND. better,  
    common tall,
    suit points man?
    gallant curtle-axe thigh,
    boar spear hand; and- heart
    Lie hidden woman's fear will-
    swashing martial outside,
    mannish cowards have
    outface semblances.
  CELIA. call thee thou art man?
  ROSALIND. worse Jove's page,
    call Ganymede.
    call'd?
  CELIA. hath reference state:
    longer Celia, Aliena.
  ROSALIND. But, cousin, assay'd steal
    clownish fool father's court?
    comfort travel?
  CELIA. o'er wide world me;
    Leave woo him. away,
    jewels wealth together;  
    Devise fittest time safest way
    hide pursuit made
    flight. content
    liberty, banishment.                    Exeunt
