ACT II. SCENE I.
The Forest Arden

Enter DUKE SENIOR, AMIENS, LORDS, foresters

  DUKE SENIOR. Now, co-mates brothers exile,
    Hath custom made life sweet
    painted pomp? woods
    free peril envious court?
    feel penalty Adam,
    seasons' difference; icy fang
    churlish chiding winter's wind,
    bites blows body,
    till shrink cold, smile say
    'This flattery; counsellors
    feelingly persuade am.'
    Sweet adversity,
    Which, toad, ugly venomous,
    Wears precious jewel head;
    life, exempt public haunt,
    Finds tongues trees, books running brooks,  
    Sermons stones, good everything.
    change it.
  AMIENS. Happy Grace,
    translate stubbornness fortune
    quiet sweet style.
  DUKE SENIOR. Come, kill venison?
    irks poor dappled fools,
    native burghers desert city,
    Should, confines, forked heads
    round haunches gor'd.
  LORD. Indeed, lord,
    melancholy Jaques grieves that;
    And, kind, swears usurp
    doth brother hath banish'd you.
    To-day Lord Amiens myself
    steal lay along
    oak antique root peeps out
    brook brawls wood!
    place poor sequest'red stag,
    hunter's aim ta'en hurt,  
    languish; and, indeed, lord,
    wretched animal heav'd groans
    discharge stretch leathern coat
    bursting; big round tears
    Cours'd innocent nose
    piteous chase; hairy fool,
    marked melancholy Jaques,
    Stood th' extremest verge swift brook,
    Augmenting tears.
  DUKE SENIOR. Jaques?
    moralize spectacle?
  LORD. O, yes, thousand similes.
    First, weeping needless stream:
    'Poor deer,' quoth 'thou mak'st testament
    worldlings do, giving thy sum more
    much.' Then, alone,
    Left abandoned velvet friends:
    ''Tis right'; quoth 'thus misery doth part
    flux company.' Anon, careless herd,
    Full pasture, jumps  
    stays greet him. 'Ay,' quoth Jaques
    'Sweep on, fat greasy citizens;
    'Tis fashion. Wherefore look
    poor broken bankrupt there?'
    invectively pierceth through
    body country, city, court,
    Yea, life; swearing we
    mere usurpers, tyrants, worse,
    fright animals, kill up
    assign'd native dwelling-place.
  DUKE SENIOR. leave contemplation?
  LORD. did, lord, weeping commenting
    sobbing deer.
  DUKE SENIOR. Show place;
    love cope sullen fits,
    full matter.
  LORD. bring straight.             Exeunt




SCENE II.
The DUKE'S palace

Enter DUKE FREDERICK, LORDS

  FREDERICK. man them?
    be; villains court
    consent sufferance this.
  LORD. hear her.
    ladies, attendants chamber,
    abed, morning early
    found bed untreasur'd mistress.
  LORD. lord, roynish clown, oft
    Grace wont laugh, missing.
    Hisperia, Princess' gentlewoman,
    Confesses secretly o'erheard
    daughter cousin commend
    parts graces wrestler
    foil sinewy Charles;
    believes, gone,
    youth surely company.
  FREDERICK. Send brother; fetch gallant hither.  
    absent, bring brother me;
    make find him. suddenly;
    search inquisition quail
    bring foolish runaways.                Exeunt




SCENE III.
Before OLIVER'S house

Enter ORLANDO ADAM, meeting

  ORLANDO. there?
  ADAM. What, young master? O gentle master!
    O sweet master! O memory
    Sir Rowland! Why, make here?
    virtuous? people love you?
    wherefore gentle, strong, valiant?
    fond overcome
    bonny prizer humorous Duke?
    praise swiftly home you.
    not, master, kind men
    graces serve enemies?
    yours. virtues, gentle master,
    sanctified holy traitors you.
    O, world this, comely
    Envenoms bears it!
  ORLANDO. Why, matter?
  ADAM. O unhappy youth!  
    doors; roof
    enemy graces lives.
    brother- no, brother; son-
    son; call son
    call father-
    Hath heard praises; night means
    burn lodging lie,
    it. fail that,
    means cut off;
    overheard practices.
    place; house butchery;
    Abhor it, fear it, enter it.
  ORLANDO. Why, whither, Adam, wouldst thou go?
  ADAM. matter whither, here.
  ORLANDO. What, wouldst thou beg food,
    base boist'rous sword enforce
    thievish living common road?
    do, do;
    do, can.
    subject malice  
    diverted blood bloody brother.
  ADAM. so. hundred crowns,
    thrifty hire sav'd father,
    store foster-nurse,
    service limbs lie lame,
    unregarded age corners thrown.
    that, doth ravens feed,
    Yea, providently caters sparrow,
    comfort age! gold;
    give you. servant;
    old, strong lusty;
    youth apply
    Hot rebellious liquors blood,
    unbashful forehead woo
    means weakness debility;
    age lusty winter,
    Frosty, kindly. you;
    service younger man
    business necessities.
  ORLANDO. O good man, thee appears  
    constant service antique world,
    service sweat duty, meed!
    Thou art fashion times,
    sweat promotion,
    choke service up
    having; thee.
    But, poor man, thou prun'st rotten tree
    blossom yield
    lieu thy pains husbandry.
    thy ways, together,
    ere thy youthful wages spent
    light settled low content.
  ADAM. Master, on; follow the
    gasp, truth loyalty.
    seventeen years till four-score
    lived I, live more.
    seventeen years fortunes seek,
    fourscore late week;
    fortune recompense better
    die master's debtor.          Exeunt




SCENE IV.
The Forest Arden

Enter ROSALIND GANYMEDE, CELIA ALIENA, CLOWN alias TOUCHSTONE

  ROSALIND. O Jupiter, weary spirits!
  TOUCHSTONE. Care spirits, legs weary.
  ROSALIND. find heart disgrace man's apparel,
    cry woman; comfort weaker vessel, as
    doublet hose show courageous petticoat;
    therefore, courage, good Aliena.
  CELIA. pray bear me; further.
  TOUCHSTONE. part, bear bear you;
    bear cross bear you; you
    money purse.
  ROSALIND. Well,. Forest Arden.
  TOUCHSTONE. Ay, Arden; fool I; at
    home place; travellers content.

                        Enter CORIN SILVIUS
  
  ROSALIND. Ay, so, good Touchstone. you, here, a
    young man solemn talk.
  CORIN. make scorn still.
  SILVIUS. O Corin, thou knew'st love her!
  CORIN. partly guess; lov'd ere now.
  SILVIUS. No, Corin, old, thou canst guess,
    thy youth thou wast true lover
    sigh'd midnight pillow.
    thy love mine,
    man love so,
    actions ridiculous
    Hast thou drawn thy fantasy?
  CORIN. thousand forgotten.
  SILVIUS. O, thou didst love heartily!
    thou rememb'rest slightest folly
    love make thee run into,
    Thou hast lov'd;
    thou hast sat now,
    Wearing thy hearer thy mistress' praise,
    Thou hast lov'd;  
    thou hast broke company
    Abruptly, passion makes me,
    Thou hast lov'd.
    O Phebe, Phebe, Phebe!                          Exit Silvius
  ROSALIND. Alas, poor shepherd! searching thy wound,
    hard adventure found mine own.
  TOUCHSTONE. mine. remember, love, broke my
    sword stone, bid coming a-night to
    Jane Smile; remember kissing batler, the
    cow's dugs pretty chopt hands milk'd; remember
    wooing  peascod her; cods,
    giving again, weeping tears 'Wear these
    sake.' true lovers run strange capers;
    mortal nature, nature love mortal
    folly.
  ROSALIND. Thou speak'st wiser thou art ware of.
  TOUCHSTONE. Nay, ne'er ware mine wit till break
    shins it.
  ROSALIND. Jove, Jove! shepherd's passion
    fashion.  
  TOUCHSTONE. mine; grows stale me.
  CELIA. pray you, question yond man
    gold give food;
    faint death.
  TOUCHSTONE. Holla, clown!
  ROSALIND. Peace, fool; thy Ensman.
  CORIN. calls?
  TOUCHSTONE. betters, sir.
  CORIN. wretched.
  ROSALIND. Peace, say. Good you, friend.
  CORIN. you, gentle sir, all.
  ROSALIND. prithee, shepherd, love gold
    desert place buy entertainment,
    Bring rest feed.
    young maid travel oppress'd,
    faints succour.
  CORIN. Fair sir, pity her,
    wish, sake mine own,
    fortunes relieve her;
    shepherd man,  
    shear fleeces graze.
    master churlish disposition,
    recks find heaven
    deeds hospitality.
    Besides, cote, flocks, bounds feed,
    sale; sheepcote now,
    reason absence, nothing
    feed on; is, see,
    voice be.
  ROSALIND. buy flock pasture?
  CORIN. young swain erewhile,
    cares buying thing.
  ROSALIND. pray thee, stand honesty,
    Buy thou cottage, pasture, flock,
    thou shalt pay us.
  CELIA. mend thy wages. place,
    willingly waste time it.
  CORIN. Assuredly thing sold.
    me; report
    soil, profit, kind life,  
    faithful feeder be,
    buy gold suddenly.             Exeunt




SCENE V.
Another part forest

Enter AMIENS, JAQUES, OTHERS

                       SONG
  AMIENS.    greenwood tree
               loves lie me,
               turn merry note
               sweet bird's throat,
             hither, hither, hither.
               see
               enemy
             winter rough weather.

  JAQUES. More, more, prithee, more.
  AMIENS. make melancholy, Monsieur Jaques.
  JAQUES. it. More, prithee, more. suck melancholy
    song, weasel sucks eggs. More, prithee, more.
  AMIENS. voice ragged; you.
  JAQUES. desire me; desire sing.
    Come, more; stanzo. Call 'em stanzos?  
  AMIENS. will, Monsieur Jaques.
  JAQUES. Nay, care names; owe nothing. Will
    sing?
  AMIENS. request myself.
  JAQUES. then, man, you; but
    call compliment th' encounter dog-apes;
    man heartily, methinks a
    penny, renders beggarly thanks. Come, sing; you
    not, hold tongues.
  AMIENS. Well, end song. Sirs, cover while; Duke
    drink tree. hath day look
    you.
  JAQUES. day avoid him. to
    disputable company. matters he; but
    give heaven thanks, make boast them. Come, warble,
    come.

                       SONG
              [All here]
  
           doth ambition shun,
           loves live i' th' sun,
           Seeking food eats,
           pleas'd gets,
         hither, hither, hither.
           see
           enemy
           winter rough weather.

  JAQUES. give verse note made yesterday in
    invention.
  AMIENS. sing it.
  JAQUES. goes:

             pass
             man turn ass,
             Leaving wealth ease
             stubborn please,
           Ducdame, ducdame, ducdame;
              
             Gross fools he,
             me.

  AMIENS. 'ducdame'?
  JAQUES. 'Tis Greek invocation, call fools circle. I'll
    sleep, can; cannot, rail the
    first-born Egypt.
  AMIENS. seek Duke; banquet prepar'd.
                                                Exeunt severally




SCENE VI.
The forest

Enter ORLANDO ADAM

  ADAM. Dear master, further. O, die food! lie
    down, measure grave. Farewell, kind master.
  ORLANDO. Why, now, Adam! greater heart thee? Live a
    little; comfort little; cheer thyself little. uncouth
    forest yield savage, food or
    bring food thee. Thy conceit nearer death thy
    powers. sake comfortable; hold death awhile the
    arm's end. presently; bring thee
    eat, give thee leave die; thou
    diest come, thou art mocker labour. said!
    thou look'st cheerly; thee quickly. thou
    liest bleak air. Come, bear thee shelter;
    thou shalt die lack dinner, live
    desert. Cheerly, good Adam!          Exeunt




SCENE VII.
The forest

A table set out. Enter DUKE SENIOR, AMIENS, LORDS, outlaws

  DUKE SENIOR. transform'd beast;
    find man.
  LORD. lord, hence;
    merry, hearing song.
  DUKE SENIOR. he, compact jars, grow musical,
    shortly discord spheres.
    seek him; speak him.

                         Enter JAQUES

  LORD. saves labour approach.
  DUKE SENIOR. Why, now, monsieur! life this,
    poor friends woo company?
    What, merrily!
  JAQUES. fool, fool! met fool i' th' forest,
    motley fool. miserable world!  
    live food, met fool,
    laid bask'd sun,
    rail'd Lady Fortune good terms,
    good set terms- motley fool.
    'Good morrow, fool,' quoth I; 'No, sir,' quoth he,
    'Call fool till heaven hath fortune.'
    drew dial poke,
    And, lack-lustre eye,
    wisely, 'It ten o'clock;
    see,' quoth he, 'how world wags;
    'Tis hour ago nine;
    hour 'twill eleven;
    so, hour hour, ripe ripe,
    then, hour hour, rot rot;
    hangs tale.' hear
    motley fool moral time,
    lungs began crow chanticleer
    fools deep contemplative;
    laugh sans intermission
    hour dial. O noble fool!  
    worthy fool! Motley's wear.
  DUKE SENIOR. fool this?
  JAQUES. O worthy fool! hath courtier,
    says, ladies young fair,
    gift it; brain,
    dry remainder biscuit
    voyage, hath strange places cramm'd
    observation, vents
    mangled forms. O fool!
    ambitious motley coat.
  DUKE SENIOR. Thou shalt one.
  JAQUES. suit,
    Provided weed judgments
    opinion grows rank them
    wise. liberty
    Withal, large charter wind,
    blow please, fools have;
    galled folly,
    laugh. why, sir, so?
    plain parish church:  
    fool doth wisely hit
    Doth foolishly, smart,
    senseless bob; not,
    wise man's folly anatomiz'd
    squand'ring glances fool.
    Invest motley; give leave
    speak mind, through
    Cleanse foul body th' infected world,
    patiently receive medicine.
  DUKE SENIOR. Fie thee! thou wouldst do.
  JAQUES. What, counter, good?
  DUKE SENIOR. Mischievous foul sin, chiding sin;
    thou thyself hast libertine,
    sensual brutish sting itself;
    th' embossed sores headed evils
    thou license free foot hast caught
    Wouldst thou disgorge general world.
  JAQUES. Why, cries pride
    tax private party?
    Doth flow hugely sea,  
    Till wearer's means ebb?
    woman city name
    city-woman bears
    cost princes unworthy shoulders?
    her,
    neighbour?
    basest function
    bravery cost,
    Thinking him, suits
    folly mettle speech?
    then! then? then? wherein
    tongue hath wrong'd him: right,
    hath wrong'd himself; free,
    taxing wild-goose flies,
    Unclaim'd man. here?

             Enter ORLANDO sword drawn

  ORLANDO. Forbear, eat more.
  JAQUES. Why, eat yet.  
  ORLANDO. shalt not, till necessity serv'd.
  JAQUES. kind cock of?
  DUKE SENIOR. Art thou bolden'd, man, thy distress?
    rude despiser good manners,
    civility thou seem'st empty?
  ORLANDO. touch'd vein first: thorny point
    bare distress hath ta'en show
    smooth civility; arn inland bred,
    nurture. forbear, say;
    dies touches fruit
    Till affairs answered.
  JAQUES. answer'd reason, die.
  DUKE SENIOR. have? gentleness force
    force move gentleness.
  ORLANDO. die food, it.
  DUKE SENIOR. Sit feed, table.
  ORLANDO. Speak gently? Pardon me, pray you;
    thought things savage here,
    put countenance
    stern commandment. whate'er  
    desert inaccessible,
    shade melancholy boughs,
    Lose neglect creeping hours time;
    look'd days,
    bells knoll'd church,
    sat good man's feast,
    eyelids wip'd tear,
    'tis pity pitied,
    gentleness strong enforcement be;
    hope blush, hide sword.
  DUKE SENIOR. True days,
    holy bell knoll'd church,
    sat good men's feasts, wip'd eyes
    drops sacred pity hath engend'red;
    sit gentleness,
    command have
    wanting minist'red.
  ORLANDO. forbear food while,
    Whiles, doe, find fawn,
    give food. poor man  
    hath weary step
    Limp'd pure love; till suffic'd,
    Oppress'd weak evils, age hunger,
    touch bit.
  DUKE SENIOR. find out.
    waste till return.
  ORLANDO. ye; blest good comfort!
 Exit
  DUKE SENIOR. Thou seest unhappy:
    wide universal theatre
    Presents woeful pageants scene
    play in.
  JAQUES. world's stage,
    men women players;
    exits entrances;
    man time plays parts,
    acts ages. infant,
    Mewling puking nurse's arms;
    whining school-boy, satchel
    shining morning face, creeping snail  
    Unwillingly school. lover,
    Sighing furnace, woeful ballad
    Made mistress' eyebrow. soldier,
    Full strange oaths, bearded pard,
    Jealous honour, sudden quick quarrel,
    Seeking bubble reputation
    cannon's mouth. justice,
    fair round belly good capon lin'd,
    eyes severe beard formal cut,
    Full wise saws modern instances;
    plays part. sixth age shifts
    lean slipper'd pantaloon,
    spectacles nose pouch side,
    youthful hose, sav'd, world wide
    shrunk shank; big manly voice,
    Turning childish treble, pipes
    whistles sound. scene all,
    ends strange eventful history,
    childishness mere oblivion;
    Sans teeth, sans eyes, sans taste, sans thing.  

                  Re-enter ORLANDO ADAM

  DUKE SENIOR. Welcome. Set venerable burden.
    feed.
  ORLANDO. him.
  ADAM. need;
    scarce speak myself.
  DUKE SENIOR. Welcome; fall to. trouble you
    question fortunes.
    Give music; and, good cousin, sing.

                         SONG
            Blow, blow, thou winter wind,
            Thou art unkind
              man's ingratitude;
            Thy tooth keen,
            thou art seen,
              thy breath rude.
    Heigh-ho! sing heigh-ho! green holly.  
    friendship feigning, loving mere folly.
            Then, heigh-ho, holly!
              life jolly.

            Freeze, freeze, thou bitter sky,
            dost bite nigh
              benefits forgot;
            thou waters warp,
            Thy sting sharp
              friend rememb'red not.
    Heigh-ho! sing, &c.

  DUKE SENIOR. good Sir Rowland's son,
    whisper'd faithfully were,
    mine eye doth effigies witness
    limn'd living face,
    hither. Duke
    lov'd father. residue fortune,
    cave me. Good man,
    Thou art thy master is.  
    Support arm. Give hand,
    fortunes understand.              Exeunt




ACT III. SCENE I.
The palace

Enter DUKE FREDERICK, OLIVER, LORDS

  FREDERICK. since! Sir, sir, be.
    part made mercy,
    seek absent argument
    revenge, thou present. it:
    Find thy brother wheresoe'er is;
    Seek candle; bring dead living
    twelvemonth, turn thou more
    seek living territory.
    Thy lands things thou dost call thine
    Worth seizure seize hands,
    Till thou canst quit thee thy brother's mouth
    thee.
  OLIVER. O Highness knew heart this!
    lov'd brother life.
  FREDERICK. villain thou. Well, push doors;
    officers nature
    Make extent house lands.  
    expediently, turn going.              Exeunt




SCENE II.
The forest

Enter ORLANDO, paper

  ORLANDO. Hang there, verse, witness love;
    thou, thrice-crowned Queen Night, survey
    thy chaste eye, thy pale sphere above,
    Thy huntress' full life doth sway.
    O Rosalind! trees books,
    barks thoughts character,
    eye forest looks
    thy virtue witness'd where.
    Run, run, Orlando; carve tree,
    fair, chaste, unexpressive she.             Exit

                     Enter CORIN TOUCHSTONE

  CORIN. shepherd's life, Master Touchstone?
  TOUCHSTONE. Truly, shepherd, respect itself, good
    life; respect shepherd's life, nought.
    respect solitary, well;  
    respect private, vile life. in
    respect fields, pleaseth well; respect
    court, tedious. spare life,
    you, fits humour well; plenty
    it, stomach. Hast philosophy in
    thee, shepherd?
  CORIN. sickens worse at
    ease is; money, means, content, is
    good friends; property rain wet,
    fire burn; good pasture makes fat sheep; a
    great night lack sun; hath
    learned wit nature art complain good breeding,
    dull kindred.
  TOUCHSTONE. natural philosopher. Wast in
    court, shepherd?
  CORIN. No, truly.
  TOUCHSTONE. thou art damn'd.
  CORIN. Nay, hope.
  TOUCHSTONE. Truly, thou art damn'd, ill-roasted egg, on
    side.  
  CORIN. court? reason.
  TOUCHSTONE. Why, thou wast court thou saw'st good
    manners; thou saw'st good manners, thy manners must
    wicked; wickedness sin, sin damnation. Thou art
    parlous state, shepherd.
  CORIN. whit, Touchstone. good manners the
    court ridiculous country behaviour the
    country mockable court. told salute not
    court, kiss hands; courtesy be
    uncleanly courtiers shepherds.
  TOUCHSTONE. Instance, briefly; come, instance.
  CORIN. Why, handling ewes; fells, you
    know, greasy.
  TOUCHSTONE. Why, courtier's hands sweat? the
    grease mutton wholesome sweat man? Shallow,
    shallow. instance, say; come.
  CORIN. Besides, hands hard.
  TOUCHSTONE. lips feel sooner. Shallow again. A
    sounder instance; come.
  CORIN. tarr'd surgery  
    sheep; kiss tar? courtier's hands are
    perfum'd civet.
  TOUCHSTONE. shallow man! thou worm's meat respect good
    piece flesh indeed! Learn wise, perpend: civet is
    baser birth tar- uncleanly flux cat. Mend
    instance, shepherd.
  CORIN. courtly wit me; rest.
  TOUCHSTONE. Wilt thou rest damn'd? God thee, shallow man! God
    make incision thee! thou art raw.
  CORIN. Sir, true labourer: earn eat, I
    wear; owe man hate, envy man's happiness; glad other
    men's good, content harm; greatest pride is
    ewes graze lambs suck.
  TOUCHSTONE. simple sin you: bring ewes
    rams together, offer living the
    copulation cattle; bawd bell-wether, betray
    she-lamb twelvemonth crooked-pated, old, cuckoldly ram,
    reasonable match. thou beest damn'd this,
    devil shepherds; how
    thou shouldst scape.  
  CORIN. young Master Ganymede, mistress's brother.

                  Enter ROSALIND, reading paper

  ROSALIND.   'From east western Inde,
              jewel Rosalinde.
              worth, mounted wind,
              world bears Rosalinde.
              pictures fairest lin'd
              black Rosalinde.
              face mind
              fair Rosalinde.'
  TOUCHSTONE. rhyme years together, dinners, and
    suppers, sleeping hours, excepted. right
    butter-women's rank market.
  ROSALIND. Out, fool!
  TOUCHSTONE.   taste:
                hart lack hind,
                seek Rosalinde.
                cat kind,  
                Rosalinde.
                Winter garments lin'd,
                slender Rosalinde.
                reap sheaf bind,
                cart Rosalinde.
                Sweetest nut hath sourest rind,
                nut Rosalinde.
                sweetest rose find
                find love's prick Rosalinde.
    false gallop verses; infect
    them?
  ROSALIND. Peace, dull fool! found tree.
  TOUCHSTONE. Truly, tree yields bad fruit.
  ROSALIND. graff you, graff a
    medlar. earliest fruit i' th' country; for
    rotten ere half ripe, right
    virtue medlar.
  TOUCHSTONE. said; wisely no, forest
    judge.
  
                      Enter CELIA, writing

  ROSALIND. Peace!
    sister, reading; stand aside.
  CELIA.   'Why desert be?
             unpeopled? No;
           Tongues hang tree
             civil sayings show.
           Some, life man
             Runs erring pilgrimage,
           streching span
             Buckles sum age;
           Some, violated vows
             'Twixt souls friend friend;
           fairest boughs,
             sentence end,
           Rosalinda write,
             Teaching read know
           quintessence sprite
             Heaven show.  
           heaven Nature charg'd
             body fill'd
           graces wide-enlarg'd.
             Nature presently distill'd
           Helen's cheek, heart,
             Cleopatra's majesty,
           Atalanta's part,
             Sad Lucretia's modesty.
           Rosalinde parts
             heavenly synod devis'd,
           faces, eyes, hearts,
             touches dearest priz'd.
           Heaven gifts have,
           live die slave.'
  ROSALIND. O gentle pulpiter! tedious homily love have
    wearied parishioners withal, cried 'Have
    patience, good people.'
  CELIA. now! Back, friends; shepherd, little; with
    him, sirrah.
  TOUCHSTONE. Come, shepherd, make honourable retreat;  
    bag baggage, scrip scrippage.
                                     Exeunt CORIN TOUCHSTONE
  CELIA. Didst thou hear verses?
  ROSALIND. O, yes, heard all, too; them
    feet verses bear.
  CELIA. matter; feet bear verses.
  ROSALIND. Ay, feet lame, bear themselves
    verse, stood lamely verse.
  CELIA. didst thou hear wondering thy be
    hang'd carved trees?
  ROSALIND. days you
    came; found palm-tree. so
    berhym'd Pythagoras' time Irish rat, I
    remember.
  CELIA. Trow hath this?
  ROSALIND. man?
  CELIA. chain, wore, neck.
    Change colour?
  ROSALIND. prithee, who?
  CELIA. O Lord, Lord! hard matter friends meet;  
    mountains remov'd earthquakes, encounter.
  ROSALIND. Nay, it?
  CELIA. possible?
  ROSALIND. Nay, prithee now, petitionary vehemence, tell
    is.
  CELIA. O wonderful, wonderful, wonderful wonderful, yet
    wonderful, that, whooping!
  ROSALIND. Good complexion! dost thou think, am
    caparison'd man, doublet hose my
    disposition? inch delay South Sea discovery.
    prithee quickly, speak apace. would
    thou could'st stammer, thou mightst pour conceal'd man
    thy mouth, wine narrow-mouth'd bottle-
    all. prithee cork
    thy mouth drink thy tidings.
  CELIA. put man belly.
  ROSALIND. God's making? manner man?
    head worth hat chin worth beard?
  CELIA. Nay, hath beard.
  ROSALIND. Why, God send man thankful.  
    stay growth beard, thou delay the
    knowledge chin.
  CELIA. young Orlando, tripp'd wrestler's heels
    heart instant.
  ROSALIND. Nay, devil mocking! Speak sad brow true
    maid.
  CELIA. I' faith, coz, 'tis he.
  ROSALIND. Orlando?
  CELIA. Orlando.
  ROSALIND. Alas day! doublet hose?
    thou saw'st him? he? look'd he?
    he? makes here? me? Where
    remains he? parted thee? shalt thou him
    again? Answer word.
  CELIA. borrow Gargantua's mouth first; 'tis word too
    great mouth age's size. ay these
    particulars answer catechism.
  ROSALIND. doth forest, man's
    apparel? freshly day wrestled?
  CELIA. easy count atomies resolve  
    propositions lover; taste finding him, and
    relish good observance. found tree, a
    dropp'd acorn.
  ROSALIND. call'd Jove's tree, drops forth
    fruit.
  CELIA. Give audience, good madam.
  ROSALIND. Proceed.
  CELIA. lay he, stretch'd wounded knight.
  ROSALIND. pity sight, becomes
    ground.
  CELIA. Cry 'Holla' thy tongue, prithee; curvets
    unseasonably. furnish'd hunter.
  ROSALIND. O, ominous! kill heart.
  CELIA. sing song burden; thou bring'st out
    tune.
  ROSALIND. woman? think, speak.
    Sweet, on.
  CELIA. bring out. Soft! here?

                   Enter ORLANDO JAQUES  

  ROSALIND. 'Tis he; slink by, note him.
  JAQUES. company; but, good faith, as
    lief alone.
  ORLANDO. I; yet, fashion sake, too
    society.
  JAQUES. God buy you; meet can.
  ORLANDO. desire strangers.
  JAQUES. pray mar trees writing love songs in
    barks.
  ORLANDO. pray mar verses reading them
    ill-favouredly.
  JAQUES. Rosalind love's name?
  ORLANDO. Yes, just.
  JAQUES. name.
  ORLANDO. thought pleasing was
    christen'd.
  JAQUES. stature of?
  ORLANDO. high heart.
  JAQUES. full pretty answers.  
    acquainted goldsmiths' wives, conn'd rings?
  ORLANDO. so; answer painted cloth, whence
    studied questions.
  JAQUES. nimble wit; 'twas made Atalanta's
    heels. sit me? rail against
    mistress world, misery.
  ORLANDO. chide breather world myself, against
    faults.
  JAQUES. worst fault love.
  ORLANDO. 'Tis fault change virtue. am
    weary you.
  JAQUES. troth, seeking fool found you.
  ORLANDO. drown'd brook; in, see
    him.
  JAQUES. mine figure.
  ORLANDO. fool cipher.
  JAQUES. tarry longer you; farewell, good Signior Love.
  ORLANDO. glad departure; adieu, good Monsieur
    Melancholy.
                                                     Exit JAQUES  
  ROSALIND. [Aside CELIA] speak saucy lackey,
    habit play knave him.- hear,
    forester?
  ORLANDO. well; you?
  ROSALIND. pray you, is't o'clock?
  ORLANDO. time o' day; clock in
    forest.
  ROSALIND. true lover forest, sighing
    minute groaning hour detect lazy foot
    Time clock.
  ORLANDO. swift foot Time? as
    proper?
  ROSALIND. means, sir. Time travels divers paces with
    divers persons. Time ambles withal, Time
    trots withal, Time gallops withal, stands still
    withal.
  ORLANDO. prithee, doth trot withal?
  ROSALIND. Marry, trots hard young maid the
    contract marriage day solemniz'd; the
    interim se'nnight, Time's pace hard  
    length year.
  ORLANDO. ambles Time withal?
  ROSALIND. priest lacks Latin rich man hath
    gout; sleeps easily study,
    lives merrily feels pain; one
    lacking burden lean wasteful learning, other
    knowing burden heavy tedious penury. Time ambles
    withal.
  ORLANDO. doth gallop withal?
  ROSALIND. thief gallows; softly
    foot fall, thinks there.
  ORLANDO. stays withal?
  ROSALIND. lawyers vacation; sleep term
    term, perceive Time moves.
  ORLANDO. dwell you, pretty youth?
  ROSALIND. shepherdess, sister; skirts of
    forest, fringe petticoat.
  ORLANDO. native place?
  ROSALIND. coney dwell kindled.
  ORLANDO. accent finer purchase  
    removed dwelling.
  ROSALIND. told many; religious
    uncle mine taught speak, youth inland
    man; knew courtship well, fell love.
    heard read lectures it; God I
    woman, touch'd giddy offences he
    hath generally tax'd sex withal.
  ORLANDO. remember principal evils laid
    charge women?
  ROSALIND. principal; another
    halfpence are; fault monstrous till his
    fellow-fault match it.
  ORLANDO. prithee recount them.
  ROSALIND. No; cast physic are
    sick. man haunts forest abuses young
    plants carving 'Rosalind' barks; hangs odes upon
    hawthorns elegies brambles; all, forsooth, deifying the
    Rosalind. meet fancy-monger, give
    good counsel, quotidian love
    him.  
  ORLANDO. love-shak'd; pray your
    remedy.
  ROSALIND. uncle's marks you; taught me
    man love; cage rushes you
    prisoner.
  ORLANDO. marks?
  ROSALIND. lean cheek, not; blue eye sunken,
    not; unquestionable spirit, not;
    beard neglected, not; pardon that,
    simply beard younger brother's revenue.
    hose ungarter'd, bonnet unbanded, your
    sleeve unbutton'd, shoe untied, thing you
    demonstrating careless desolation. man; you
    point-device accoutrements, loving yourself
    lover other.
  ORLANDO. Fair youth, make thee love.
  ROSALIND. it! make love
    it; which, warrant, apter confess
    does. points women give
    lie consciences. But, good sooth,  
    hangs verses trees Rosalind admired?
  ORLANDO. swear thee, youth, white hand Rosalind, I
    he, unfortunate he.
  ROSALIND. love rhymes speak?
  ORLANDO. rhyme reason express much.
  ROSALIND. Love madness; and, you, deserves as
    dark house whip madmen do; reason why
    punish'd cured lunacy so
    ordinary whippers love too. profess curing
    counsel.
  ORLANDO. cure so?
  ROSALIND. Yes, one; manner. imagine his
    love, mistress; set day woo me; which
    time I, moonish youth, grieve, effeminate,
    changeable, longing liking, proud, fantastical, apish,
    shallow, inconstant, full tears, full smiles; every
    passion passion anything, boys and
    women part cattle colour; like
    him, loathe him; entertain him, forswear him; now
    weep him, spit him; drave suitor  
    mad humour love living humour madness; was, to
    forswear full stream world live nook
    monastic. cur'd him; take
    wash liver clean sound sheep's heart,
    spot love 't.
  ORLANDO. cured, youth.
  ROSALIND. cure you, call Rosalind, and
    day cote woo me.
  ORLANDO. Now, faith love, will. is.
  ROSALIND. it, show you; and, way,
    forest live. go?
  ORLANDO. heart, good youth.
  ROSALIND. Nay, call Rosalind. Come, sister, you
    go?                                                   Exeunt




SCENE III.
The forest

Enter TOUCHSTONE AUDREY; JAQUES behind

  TOUCHSTONE. apace, good Audrey; fetch goats,
    Audrey. how, Audrey, man yet? Doth simple feature
    content you?
  AUDREY. features! Lord warrant us! features?
  TOUCHSTONE. thee thy goats, most
    capricious poet, honest Ovid, Goths.
  JAQUES. [Aside] O knowledge ill-inhabited, worse Jove a
    thatch'd house!
  TOUCHSTONE. man's verses understood, man's
    good wit seconded forward child understanding, it
    strikes man dead great reckoning room.
    Truly, gods made thee poetical.
  AUDREY. 'poetical' is. honest deed and
    word? true thing?
  TOUCHSTONE. No, truly; truest poetry feigning,
    lovers poetry; swear poetry may
    lovers feign.  
  AUDREY. wish, then, gods made poetical?
  TOUCHSTONE. do, truly, thou swear'st thou art honest;
    now, thou wert poet, hope thou didst
    feign.
  AUDREY. honest?
  TOUCHSTONE. No, truly, thou wert hard-favour'd; honesty
    coupled beauty honey sauce sugar.
  JAQUES. [Aside] material fool!
  AUDREY. Well, fair; pray gods make me
    honest.
  TOUCHSTONE. Truly, cast honesty foul slut were
    put good meat unclean dish.
  AUDREY. slut, gods foul.
  TOUCHSTONE. Well, praised gods thy foulness;
    sluttishness hereafter. be, will
    marry thee; end Sir Oliver Martext,
    vicar village, hath promis'd meet in
    place forest, couple us.
  JAQUES. [Aside] fain meeting.
  AUDREY. Well, gods give joy!  
  TOUCHSTONE. Amen. man may, fearful heart, stagger
    attempt; temple wood, no
    assembly horn-beasts. though? Courage! horns are
    odious, necessary. said: 'Many man end
    goods.' Right! man good horns end
    them. Well, dowry wife; 'tis his
    getting. Horns? so. Poor men alone? No, no; noblest
    deer hath huge rascal. single man therefore
    blessed? No; wall'd town worthier village, so
    forehead married man honourable bare
    brow bachelor; defence no
    skill, horn precious want. comes
    Sir Oliver.

                       Enter SIR OLIVER MARTEXT

    Sir Oliver Martext, met. dispatch here
    tree, chapel?
  MARTEXT. give woman?
  TOUCHSTONE. gift man.  
  MARTEXT. Truly, given, marriage lawful.
  JAQUES. [Discovering himself] Proceed, proceed; give her.
  TOUCHSTONE. Good even, good Master What-ye-call't; you, sir?
    met. Goddild company. am
    glad you. toy hand here, sir. Nay; pray be
    cover'd.
  JAQUES. married, motley?
  TOUCHSTONE. ox hath bow, sir, horse curb, and
    falcon bells, man hath desires; pigeons
    bill, wedlock nibbling.
  JAQUES. you, man breeding, married
    bush, beggar? church good
    priest marriage is; fellow but
    join join wainscot; will
    prove shrunk panel, green timber warp, warp.
  TOUCHSTONE. [Aside] mind be
    married another; marry me
    well; married, good excuse me
    leave wife.
  JAQUES. thou me, counsel thee.  
  TOUCHSTONE. Come, sweet Audrey;
    married live bawdry.
    Farewell, good Master Oliver. Not-
               O sweet Oliver,
               O brave Oliver,
           Leave thee.
    But-
                 Wind away,
               Begone, say,
           wedding thee.
                           Exeunt JAQUES, TOUCHSTONE, AUDREY
  MARTEXT. 'Tis matter; ne'er fantastical knave all
    flout calling.                       Exit




SCENE IV.
The forest

Enter ROSALIND CELIA

  ROSALIND. talk me; weep.
  CELIA. Do, prithee; grace tears
    man.
  ROSALIND. weep?
  CELIA. good desire; weep.
  ROSALIND. hair dissembling colour.
  CELIA. browner Judas's.
    Marry, kisses Judas's children.
  ROSALIND. I' faith, hair good colour.
  CELIA. excellent colour: chestnut colour.
  ROSALIND. kissing full sanctity touch of
    holy bread.
  CELIA. hath bought pair cast lips Diana. nun of
    winter's sisterhood kisses religiously; ice of
    chastity them.
  ROSALIND. swear morning, and
    not?
  CELIA. Nay, certainly, truth him.  
  ROSALIND. so?
  CELIA. Yes; pick-purse horse-stealer; but
    verity love, concave covered
    goblet worm-eaten nut.
  ROSALIND. true love?
  CELIA. Yes, in; in.
  ROSALIND. heard swear downright was.
  CELIA. 'Was' 'is'; besides, oath lover no
    stronger word tapster; confirmer
    false reckonings. attends forest Duke,
    father.
  ROSALIND. met Duke yesterday, question him.
    asked parentage was; told him, good as
    he; laugh'd go. talk fathers when
    man Orlando?
  CELIA. O, brave man! writes brave verses, speaks brave
    words, swears brave oaths, breaks bravely, quite
    traverse, athwart heart lover; puny tilter, that
    spurs horse side, breaks staff noble
    goose. all's brave youth mounts folly guides.  
    here?

                         Enter CORIN

  CORIN. Mistress master, oft enquired
    shepherd complain'd love,
    sitting turf,
    Praising proud disdainful shepherdess
    mistress.
  CELIA. Well, him?
  CORIN. pageant play'd
    pale complexion true love
    red glow scorn proud disdain,
    little, conduct you,
    mark it.
  ROSALIND. O, come, remove!
    sight lovers feedeth love.
    Bring sight, say
    prove busy actor play.                Exeunt




SCENE V.
Another part forest

Enter SILVIUS PHEBE

  SILVIUS. Sweet Phebe, scorn me; not, Phebe.
    love not; so
    bitterness. common executioner,
    heart th' accustom'd sight death makes hard,
    Falls axe humbled neck
    begs pardon. sterner be
    dies lives bloody drops?

          Enter ROSALIND, CELIA, CORIN, distance

  PHEBE. thy executioner;
    fly thee, injure thee.
    Thou tell'st murder mine eye.
    'Tis pretty, sure, probable,
    eyes, frail'st softest things,
    shut coward gates atomies,
    call'd tyrants, butchers, murderers!  
    frown thee heart;
    mine eyes wound, kill thee.
    counterfeit swoon; why, fall down;
    Or, thou canst not, O, shame, shame,
    Lie not, mine eyes murderers.
    show wound mine eye hath made thee.
    Scratch thee pin, remains
    scar it; lean rush,
    cicatrice capable impressure
    Thy palm moment keeps; mine eyes,
    darted thee, hurt thee not;
    Nor, sure, force eyes
    hurt.
  SILVIUS. O dear Phebe,
    ever- near-
    meet fresh cheek power fancy,
    wounds invisible
    love's keen arrows make.
  PHEBE. till time
    thou me; time comes,  
    Afflict thy mocks, pity not;
    till time pity thee.
  ROSALIND. [Advancing] why, pray you? your
      mother,
    insult, exult, once,
    wretched? beauty-
    As, faith, you
    candle dark bed-
    proud pitiless?
    Why, means this? me?
    ordinary
    nature's sale-work. 'Od's life,
    means tangle eyes too!
    faith, proud mistress, hope it;
    'Tis inky brows, black silk hair,
    bugle eyeballs, cheek cream,
    entame spirits worship.
    foolish shepherd, wherefore follow her,
    foggy south, puffing wind rain?
    thousand times properer man  
    woman. 'Tis fools you
    makes world full ill-favour'd children.
    'Tis glass, you, flatters her;
    sees proper
    lineaments show her.
    But, mistress, yourself. knees,
    heaven, fasting, good man's love;
    friendly ear:
    Sell can; markets.
    Cry man mercy, love him, offer;
    Foul foul, foul scoffer.
    thee, shepherd. Fare well.
  PHEBE. Sweet youth, pray chide year together;
    hear chide man woo.
  ROSALIND. fall'n love foulness, fall
    love anger. so, fast answers thee
    frowning looks, sauce bitter words. look
    me?
  PHEBE. ill bear you.
  ROSALIND. pray fall love me,  
    falser vows made wine;
    Besides, not. house,
    'Tis tuft olives hard by.
    go, sister? Shepherd, ply hard.
    Come, sister. Shepherdess, better,
    proud; world see,
    abus'd sight he.
    Come, flock.        Exeunt ROSALIND, CELIA, CORIN
  PHEBE. Dead shepherd, find thy might:
    'Who lov'd lov'd sight?'
  SILVIUS. Sweet Phebe.
  PHEBE. Ha! say'st thou, Silvius?
  SILVIUS. Sweet Phebe, pity me.
  PHEBE. Why, arn thee, gentle Silvius.
  SILVIUS. sorrow is, relief be.
    sorrow grief love,
    giving love, sorrow grief
    extermin'd.
  PHEBE. Thou hast love; neighbourly?
  SILVIUS. you.  
  PHEBE. Why, covetousness.
    Silvius, time hated thee;
    bear thee love;
    thou canst talk love well,
    Thy company, erst irksome me,
    endure; employ thee too.
    recompense
    thine gladness thou art employ'd.
  SILVIUS. holy perfect love,
    poverty grace,
    plenteous crop
    glean broken ears man
    main harvest reaps; loose then
    scatt'red smile, live upon.
  PHEBE. Know'st thou youth spoke erewhile?
  SILVIUS. well; met oft;
    hath bought cottage bounds
    carlot master of.
  PHEBE. love him, him;
    'Tis peevish boy; talks well.  
    care words? words well
    speaks pleases hear.
    pretty youth- pretty;
    But, sure, proud; pride him.
    make proper man. thing him
    complexion; faster tongue
    make offence, eye heal up.
    tall; years tall;
    leg so-so; 'tis well.
    pretty redness lip,
    riper lusty red
    mix'd cheek; 'twas difference
    Betwixt constant red mingled damask.
    women, Silvius, mark'd him
    parcels did, near
    fall love him; but, part,
    love not, hate not; yet
    hate love him;
    chide me?
    mine eyes black, hair black,  
    And, rememb'red, scorn'd me.
    marvel answer'd again;
    one: omittance quittance.
    write taunting letter,
    thou shalt bear it; wilt thou, Silvius?
  SILVIUS. Phebe, heart.
  PHEBE. write straight;
    matter's head heart;
    bitter passing short.
    me, Silvius.                                  Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE I.
The forest

Enter ROSALIND, CELIA, JAQUES

  JAQUES. prithee, pretty youth, acquainted with
    thee.
  ROSALIND. melancholy fellow.
  JAQUES. so; love laughing.
  ROSALIND. extremity abominable
    fellows, betray modern censure worse than
    drunkards.
  JAQUES. Why, 'tis good sad nothing.
  ROSALIND. then, 'tis good post.
  JAQUES. scholar's melancholy, is
    emulation; musician's, fantastical; the
    courtier's, proud; soldier's, is
    ambitious; lawyer's, politic; lady's,
    nice; lover's, these; a
    melancholy mine own, compounded simples, extracted
    objects, and, indeed, sundry contemplation my
    travels; rumination wraps humorous  
    sadness.
  ROSALIND. traveller! faith, great reason be
    sad. fear sold lands men's; then
    rich eyes and
    poor hands.
  JAQUES. Yes, gain'd experience.

                        Enter ORLANDO

  ROSALIND. experience makes sad. a
    fool make merry experience make sad- to
    travel too.
  ORLANDO. Good day, happiness, dear Rosalind!
  JAQUES. Nay, then, God buy you, talk blank verse.
  ROSALIND. Farewell, Monsieur Traveller; lisp wear
    strange suits, disable benefits country, be
    love nativity, chide God making
    countenance are; scarce have
    swam gondola. [Exit JAQUES] Why, now, Orlando! where
    while? lover! serve  
    trick, sight more.
  ORLANDO. fair Rosalind, hour promise.
  ROSALIND. Break hour's promise love! divide a
    minute thousand parts, break part the
    thousand part minute affairs love, said
    Cupid hath clapp'd o' th' shoulder, I'll
    warrant heart-whole.
  ORLANDO. Pardon me, dear Rosalind.
  ROSALIND. Nay, tardy, sight. had
    lief woo'd snail.
  ORLANDO. snail!
  ROSALIND. Ay, snail; slowly, carries
    house head- jointure, think, make
    woman; besides, brings destiny him.
  ORLANDO. that?
  ROSALIND. Why, horns; fain beholding to
    wives for; armed fortune, prevents
    slander wife.
  ORLANDO. Virtue horn-maker; Rosalind virtuous.
  ROSALIND. Rosalind.  
  CELIA. pleases call so; hath Rosalind a
    leer you.
  ROSALIND. Come, woo me, woo me; holiday humour,
    consent. now, I
    Rosalind?
  ORLANDO. kiss spoke.
  ROSALIND. Nay, speak first; were
    gravell'd lack matter, occasion kiss.
    good orators, out, spit; for
    lovers lacking- God warn us!- matter, cleanliest shift to
    kiss.
  ORLANDO. kiss denied?
  ROSALIND. puts entreaty, begins new
    matter.
  ORLANDO. out, beloved mistress?
  ROSALIND. Marry, you, mistress; I
    honesty ranker wit.
  ORLANDO. What, suit?
  ROSALIND. apparel, suit.
    Rosalind?  
  ORLANDO. joy are, talking
    her.
  ROSALIND. Well, person, you.
  ORLANDO. Then, mine person, die.
  ROSALIND. No, faith, die attorney. poor world six
    thousand years old, time man
    died person, videlicet, love-cause. Troilus had
    brains dash'd Grecian club; he
    die before, patterns love.
    Leander, liv'd fair year, Hero had
    turn'd nun, hot midsummer night; for,
    good youth, wash Hellespont, and,
    cramp, drown'd; foolish
    chroniclers age found was- Hero Sestos. these
    lies: men died time time, worms have
    eaten them, love.
  ORLANDO. Rosalind mind; for, I
    protest, frown kill me.
  ROSALIND. hand, kill fly. come, I
    Rosalind coming-on disposition;  
    will, grant it.
  ORLANDO. love me, Rosalind.
  ROSALIND. Yes, faith, I, Fridays Saturdays, all.
  ORLANDO. wilt thou me?
  ROSALIND. Ay, twenty such.
  ORLANDO. sayest thou?
  ROSALIND. good?
  ORLANDO. hope so.
  ROSALIND. then, desire good thing? Come,
    sister, priest, marry us. Give hand,
    Orlando. say, sister?
  ORLANDO. Pray thee, marry us.
  CELIA. words.
  ROSALIND. begin 'Will you, Orlando'-
  CELIA. to. you, Orlando, wife Rosalind?
  ORLANDO. will.
  ROSALIND. Ay, when?
  ORLANDO. Why, now; fast marry us.
  ROSALIND. 'I thee, Rosalind, wife.'
  ORLANDO. thee, Rosalind, wife.  
  ROSALIND. commission; but- thee,
    Orlando, husband. girl priest;
    and, certainly, woman's thought runs actions.
  ORLANDO. thoughts; wing'd.
  ROSALIND. long her, have
    possess'd her.
  ORLANDO. day.
  ROSALIND. 'a day' 'ever.' No, no, Orlando; men are
    April woo, December wed: maids when
    maids, sky wives. will
    jealous thee Barbary cock-pigeon hen,
    clamorous parrot rain, new-fangled than
    ape, giddy desires monkey. weep for
    nothing, Diana fountain, you
    dispos'd merry; laugh hyen, when
    thou inclin'd sleep.
  ORLANDO. Rosalind so?
  ROSALIND. life, do.
  ORLANDO. O, wise.
  ROSALIND. wit this. wiser,  
    waywarder. Make doors woman's wit, out
    casement; shut that, 'twill key-hole; stop
    that, 'twill fly smoke chimney.
  ORLANDO. man wife wit, 'Wit,
    wilt?' ROSALIND. Nay, check it, till met your
    wife's wit neighbour's bed.
  ORLANDO. wit wit excuse that?
  ROSALIND. Marry, seek there. never
    answer, her
    tongue. O, woman make fault husband's
    occasion, nurse child herself, will
    breed fool!
  ORLANDO. hours, Rosalind, leave thee.
  ROSALIND. Alas, dear love, lack thee hours!
  ORLANDO. attend Duke dinner; o'clock be
    thee again.
  ROSALIND. Ay, ways, ways. knew would
    prove; friends told much, thought less. That
    flattering tongue won me. 'Tis cast away,  
    so, death! o'clock hour?
  ORLANDO. Ay, sweet Rosalind.
  ROSALIND. troth, good earnest, God mend me, and
    pretty oaths dangerous, break jot
    promise, minute hour, will
    pathetical break-promise, hollow
    lover, unworthy call Rosalind, may
    chosen gross band unfaithful. Therefore
    beware censure, promise.
  ORLANDO. religion thou wert my
    Rosalind; so, adieu.
  ROSALIND. Well, Time justice examines such
    offenders, Time try. Adieu.             Exit ORLANDO
  CELIA. simply misus'd sex love-prate. must
    doublet hose pluck'd head, show the
    world bird hath nest.
  ROSALIND. O coz, coz, coz, pretty coz, thou didst
    fathom deep love! sounded;
    affection hath unknown bottom, Bay Portugal.
  CELIA. rather, bottomless; fast pour affection  
    in, runs out.
  ROSALIND. No; wicked bastard Venus, begot of
    thought, conceiv'd spleen, born madness; blind
    rascally boy, abuses one's eyes, are
    out- judge deep love. thee,
    Aliena, sight Orlando. find a
    shadow, sigh till come.
  CELIA. sleep.                                  Exeunt




SCENE II.
The forest

        Enter JAQUES LORDS, habit foresters

  JAQUES. killed deer?
  LORD. Sir, I.
  JAQUES. present Duke, Roman conqueror; and
    set deer's horns head a
    branch victory. song, forester, purpose?
  LORD. Yes, sir.
  JAQUES. Sing it; 'tis matter tune, make noise
    enough.

                    SONG.

      kill'd deer?
      leather skin horns wear.
                              [The rest hear burden:]
           sing home.

      thou scorn wear horn;  
      crest ere thou wast born.
           Thy father's father wore it;
           thy father bore it.
      horn, horn, lusty horn,
      thing laugh scorn.                   Exeunt




SCENE III.
The forest

Enter ROSALIND CELIA

  ROSALIND. now? past o'clock?
    Orlando!
  CELIA. warrant you, pure love troubled brain, hath
    ta'en bow arrows, forth- sleep. Look, who
    here.

                      Enter SILVIUS

  SILVIUS. errand you, fair youth;
    gentle Phebe bid give this.
    contents; but, guess
    stern brow waspish action
    writing it,
    bears angry tenour. Pardon me,
    guiltless messenger.
  ROSALIND. Patience startle letter,
    play swaggerer. Bear this, bear all.
    fair, lack manners;  
    calls proud, love me,
    man rare Phoenix. 'Od's will!
    love hare hunt;
    writes me? Well, shepherd, well,
    letter device.
  SILVIUS. No, protest, contents;
    Phebe write it.
  ROSALIND. Come, come, fool,
    turn'd extremity love.
    hand; leathern hand,
    freestone-colour'd hand; verily think
    gloves on, 'twas hands;
    huswife's hand- matter.
    invent letter:
    man's invention, hand.
  SILVIUS. Sure, hers.
  ROSALIND. Why, 'tis boisterous cruel style;
    style challengers. Why, defies me,
    Turk Christian. Women's gentle brain
    drop giant-rude invention,  
    Ethiope words, blacker effect
    countenance. hear letter?
  SILVIUS. you, heard yet;
    heard Phebe's cruelty.
  ROSALIND. Phebes me: mark tyrant writes.
                                                         [Reads]

            'Art thou god shepherd turn'd,
            maiden's heart hath burn'd?'

    woman rail thus?
  SILVIUS. Call railing?
  ROSALIND. 'Why, thy godhead laid apart,
             Warr'st thou woman's heart?'

    hear railing?

            'Whiles eye man woo me,
            vengeance me.'
  
    Meaning beast.

            'If scorn bright eyne
            power raise love mine,
            Alack, strange effect
            work mild aspect!
            Whiles chid me, love;
            prayers move!
            brings love the
            love me;
            seal thy mind,
            thy youth kind
            faithful offer take
            make;
            love deny,
            study die.'
  SILVIUS. Call chiding?
  CELIA. Alas, poor shepherd!
  ROSALIND. pity him? No, deserves pity. Wilt thou love
    woman? What, make thee instrument, play false  
    strains thee! endur'd! Well, her,
    love hath made thee tame snake, her-
    love me, charge love thee; not,
    thou entreat her. a
    true lover, hence, word; company.
                                                    Exit SILVIUS

                         Enter OLIVER

  OLIVER. Good morrow, fair ones; pray you, know,
    purlieus forest stands
    sheep-cote fenc'd olive trees?
  CELIA. West place, neighbour bottom.
    rank osiers murmuring stream
    Left hand brings place.
    hour house doth itself;
    within.
  OLIVER. eye profit tongue,
    description-
    garments, years: 'The boy fair,  
    female favour, bestows himself
    ripe sister; woman low,
    browner brother.' you
    owner house inquire for?
  CELIA. boast, ask'd, are.
  OLIVER. Orlando doth commend both;
    youth calls Rosalind
    sends bloody napkin. he?
  ROSALIND. am. understand this?
  OLIVER. shame; me
    man am, how, why, where,
    handkercher stain'd.
  CELIA. pray you, it.
  OLIVER. young Orlando parted you,
    left promise return again
    hour; and, pacing forest,
    Chewing food sweet bitter fancy,
    Lo, befell! threw eye aside,
    mark object present itself.
    oak, boughs moss'd age,  
    high top bald dry antiquity,
    wretched ragged man, o'ergrown hair,
    Lay sleeping back. neck
    green gilded snake wreath'd itself,
    head nimble threats approach'd
    opening mouth; suddenly,
    Orlando, unlink'd itself,
    indented glides slip away
    bush; bush's shade
    lioness, udders drawn dry,
    Lay couching, head ground, catlike watch,
    sleeping man stir; 'tis
    royal disposition beast
    prey doth dead.
    seen, Orlando approach man,
    found brother, elder brother.
  CELIA. O, heard speak brother;
    render unnatural
    liv'd men.
  OLIVER. do,  
    unnatural.
  ROSALIND. But, Orlando: leave there,
    Food suck'd hungry lioness?
  OLIVER. turn back, purpos'd so;
    kindness, nobler revenge,
    nature, stronger occasion,
    Made give battle lioness,
    quickly fell him; hurtling
    miserable slumber awak'd.
  CELIA. brother?
  ROSALIND. Was't rescu'd?
  CELIA. Was't oft contrive kill him?
  OLIVER. 'Twas I; 'tis I. shame
    was, conversion
    sweetly tastes, thing am.
  ROSALIND. bloody napkin?
  OLIVER. by.
    last, betwixt two,
    Tears recountments kindly bath'd,
    desert place-  
    brief, led gentle Duke,
    gave fresh array entertainment,
    Committing brother's love;
    led instantly cave,
    stripp'd himself, arm
    lioness torn flesh away,
    bled; fainted,
    cried, fainting, Rosalind.
    Brief, recover'd him, bound wound,
    And, small space, strong heart,
    hither, stranger am,
    story, excuse
    broken promise, give napkin,
    Dy'd blood, shepherd youth
    sport doth call Rosalind.
                                               [ROSALIND swoons]
  CELIA. Why, now, Ganymede! sweet Ganymede!
  OLIVER. swoon blood.
  CELIA. it. Cousin Ganymede!
  OLIVER. Look, recovers.  
  ROSALIND. home.
  CELIA. lead thither.
    pray you, arm?
  OLIVER. good cheer, youth. man!
    lack man's heart.
  ROSALIND. so, confess it. Ah, sirrah, body think
    counterfeited. pray brother how
    counterfeited. Heigh-ho!
  OLIVER. counterfeit; great testimony in
    complexion passion earnest.
  ROSALIND. Counterfeit, assure you.
  OLIVER. then, good heart counterfeit man.
  ROSALIND. do; but, i' faith, woman by
    right.
  CELIA. Come, paler paler; pray draw homewards.
    Good sir, us.
  OLIVER. I, bear answer back
    excuse brother, Rosalind.
  ROSALIND. devise something; but, pray you, commend my
    counterfeiting him. go?                   Exeunt

ACT V. SCENE I.
The forest

Enter TOUCHSTONE AUDREY

  TOUCHSTONE. find time, Audrey; patience, gentle Audrey.
  AUDREY. Faith, priest good enough, old
    gentleman's saying.
  TOUCHSTONE. wicked Sir Oliver, Audrey, vile Martext.
    But, Audrey, youth forest lays claim to
    you.
  AUDREY. Ay, 'tis; hath interest the
    world; man mean.

                         Enter WILLIAM

  TOUCHSTONE. meat drink clown. troth,
    good wits answer for: be
    flouting; hold.
  WILLIAM. Good ev'n, Audrey.
  AUDREY. God ye good ev'n, William.
  WILLIAM. good ev'n you, sir.  
  TOUCHSTONE. Good ev'n, gentle friend. Cover thy head, cover thy
    head; nay, prithee cover'd. you, friend?
  WILLIAM. twenty, sir.
  TOUCHSTONE. ripe age. thy William?
  WILLIAM. William, sir.
  TOUCHSTONE. fair name. Wast born i' th' forest here?
  WILLIAM. Ay, sir, God.
  TOUCHSTONE. 'Thank God.' good answer.
    Art rich?
  WILLIAM. Faith, sir, so.
  TOUCHSTONE. 'So so' good, good, excellent good; and
    not; so. Art thou wise?
  WILLIAM. Ay, sir, pretty wit.
  TOUCHSTONE. Why, thou say'st well. remember saying: 'The
    fool doth wise, wise man be
    fool.' heathen philosopher, desire eat a
    grape, open lips put mouth; meaning
    grapes made eat lips open. do
    love maid?
  WILLIAM. do, sir.  
  TOUCHSTONE. Give hand. Art thou learned?
  WILLIAM. No, sir.
  TOUCHSTONE. learn me: have; a
    figure rhetoric drink, pour'd cup a
    glass, filling doth empty other; your
    writers consent ipse he; now, ipse, I
    he.
  WILLIAM. he, sir?
  TOUCHSTONE. He, sir, marry woman. Therefore, you
    clown, abandon- vulgar leave- society- which
    boorish company- female- common is
    woman- is: abandon society female; or,
    clown, thou perishest; or, thy understanding, diest;
    or, wit, kill thee, make thee away, translate thy life into
    death, thy liberty bondage. deal poison thee,
    bastinado, steel; bandy thee faction;
    o'er-run thee policy; kill thee hundred and
    fifty ways; tremble depart.
  AUDREY. Do, good William.
  WILLIAM. God rest merry, sir.                         Exit  

                          Enter CORIN

  CORIN. master mistress seeks you; away, away.
  TOUCHSTONE. Trip, Audrey, trip, Audrey. attend, attend.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE II.
The forest

Enter ORLANDO OLIVER

  ORLANDO. Is't acquaintance should
    her? love her? loving woo?
    and, wooing, grant? persever enjoy
    her?
  OLIVER. call giddiness question, poverty
    her, small acquaintance, sudden wooing, sudden
    consenting; me, love Aliena; she
    loves me; consent enjoy other. It
    good; father's house revenue
    Sir Rowland's estate you, live
    die shepherd.
  ORLANDO. consent. wedding to-morrow.
    Thither invite Duke all's contented followers. Go
    prepare Aliena; for, you, Rosalind.

                        Enter ROSALIND
  
  ROSALIND. God save you, brother.
  OLIVER. you, fair sister.                             Exit
  ROSALIND. O, dear Orlando, grieves thee wear
    thy heart scarf!
  ORLANDO. arm.
  ROSALIND. thought thy heart wounded claws a
    lion.
  ORLANDO. Wounded is, eyes lady.
  ROSALIND. brother counterfeited swoon
    show'd handkercher?
  ORLANDO. Ay, greater wonders that.
  ROSALIND. O, are. Nay, 'tis true. never
    thing sudden fight rams Caesar's
    thrasonical brag 'I came, saw, overcame.' brother
    sister sooner met look'd; sooner look'd but
    lov'd; sooner lov'd sigh'd; sooner sigh'd but
    ask'd reason; sooner knew reason but
    sought remedy- degrees made pair
    stairs marriage, climb incontinent, else
    incontinent marriage. wrath  
    love, together. Clubs part them.
  ORLANDO. married to-morrow; bid Duke
    nuptial. But, O, bitter thing into
    happiness man's eyes! I
    to-morrow height heart-heaviness, I
    brother happy wishes for.
  ROSALIND. Why, then, to-morrow serve turn for
    Rosalind?
  ORLANDO. live longer thinking.
  ROSALIND. weary you, then, longer idle talking. Know
    then- speak purpose- are
    gentleman good conceit. speak should
    bear good opinion knowledge, insomuch you
    are; labour greater esteem some
    measure draw belief you, good, and
    grace me. then, please, do
    strange things. have, year old, convers'd
    magician, profound art damnable.
    love Rosalind heart gesture cries
    out, brother marries Aliena marry her.  
    straits fortune driven; not
    impossible me, inconvenient you, set
    eyes to-morrow, human is, any
    danger.
  ORLANDO. Speak'st thou sober meanings?
  ROSALIND. life, do; tender dearly, I
    magician. put array, bid your
    friends; married to-morrow, shall; to
    Rosalind, will.

                     Enter SILVIUS PHEBE

    Look, lover mine, lover hers.
  PHEBE. Youth, ungentleness
    show letter writ you.
  ROSALIND. care have. study
    despiteful ungentle you.
    follow'd faithful shepherd;
    him, love him; worships you.
  PHEBE. Good shepherd, youth 'tis love.  
  SILVIUS. made sighs tears;
    Phebe.
  PHEBE. Ganymede.
  ORLANDO. Rosalind.
  ROSALIND. woman.
  SILVIUS. made faith service;
    Phebe.
  PHEBE. Ganymede.
  ORLANDO. Rosalind.
  ROSALIND. woman.
  SILVIUS. made fantasy,
    made passion, made wishes;
    adoration, duty, observance,
    humbleness, patience, impatience,
    purity, trial, obedience;
    Phebe.
  PHEBE. Ganymede.
  ORLANDO. Rosalind.
  ROSALIND. woman.
  PHEBE. so, blame love you?  
  SILVIUS. so, blame love you?
  ORLANDO. so, blame love you?
  ROSALIND. speak too, 'Why blame love you?'
  ORLANDO. here, doth hear.
  ROSALIND. Pray you, this; 'tis howling Irish
    wolves moon. [To SILVIUS] can.
    [To PHEBE] love could.- To-morrow meet all
    together. [ PHEBE ] marry marry woman,
    married to-morrow. [To ORLANDO] satisfy if
    satisfied man, married to-morrow. [To
    Silvius] content pleases contents you, and
    married to-morrow. [To ORLANDO] love
    Rosalind, meet. [To SILVIUS] love Phebe, meet;- I
    love woman, meet. So, fare well; left you
    commands.
  SILVIUS. fail, live.
  PHEBE. I.
  ORLANDO. I.                                         Exeunt




SCENE III.
The forest

Enter TOUCHSTONE AUDREY

  TOUCHSTONE. To-morrow joyful day, Audre'y; to-morrow we
    married.
  AUDREY. desire heart; hope no
    dishonest desire desire woman world. come
    banish'd Duke's pages.

                            Enter PAGES

  PAGE. met, honest gentleman.
  TOUCHSTONE. troth, met. sit, sit, song.
  PAGE. you; sit i' th' middle.
  PAGE. clap into't roundly, hawking, or
    spitting, hoarse, prologues
    bad voice?
  PAGE. I'faith, i'faith; tune, gipsies
    horse.
  
                      SONG.
        lover lass,
          hey, ho, hey nonino,
        o'er green corn-field pass
          spring time, pretty ring time,
        birds sing, hey ding ding, ding.
        Sweet lovers love spring.

        acres rye,
          hey, ho, hey nonino,
        pretty country folks lie,
          spring time, &c.

        carol began hour,
          hey, ho, hey nonino,
        life flower,
          spring time, &c.

        present time,
          hey, ho, hey nonino,  
        love crowned prime,
          spring time, &c.

  TOUCHSTONE. Truly, young gentlemen, great
    matter ditty, note untuneable.
  PAGE. deceiv'd, sir; time, lost our
    time.
  TOUCHSTONE. troth, yes; count time lost hear such
    foolish song. God buy you; God mend voices. Come,
    Audrey.                                               Exeunt




SCENE IV.
The forest

Enter DUKE SENIOR, AMIENS, JAQUES, ORLANDO, OLIVER, CELIA

  DUKE SENIOR. Dost thou believe, Orlando, boy
    hath promised?
  ORLANDO. not:
    fear hope, fear.

               Enter ROSALIND, SILVIUS, PHEBE

  ROSALIND. Patience more, whiles compact urg'd:
    say, bring Rosalind,
    bestow Orlando here?
  DUKE SENIOR. I, kingdoms give her.
  ROSALIND. bring her?
  ORLANDO. I, kingdoms king.
  ROSALIND. marry me, willing?
  PHEBE. I, die hour after.
  ROSALIND. refuse marry me,  
    give faithful shepherd?
  PHEBE. bargain.
  ROSALIND. Phebe, will?
  SILVIUS. death thing.
  ROSALIND. promis'd make matter even.
    word, O Duke, give daughter;
    yours, Orlando, receive daughter;
    word, Phebe, marry me,
    else, refusing me, wed shepherd;
    word, Silvius, marry her
    refuse me; go,
    make doubts even.
                                       Exeunt ROSALIND CELIA
  DUKE SENIOR. remember shepherd boy
    lively touches daughter's favour.
  ORLANDO. lord, time him
    Methought brother daughter.
    But, good lord, boy forest-born,
    hath tutor'd rudiments
    desperate studies uncle,  
    reports great magician,
    Obscured circle forest.

                    Enter TOUCHSTONE AUDREY

  JAQUES. is, sure, flood toward, couples are
    coming ark. pair strange beasts which
    tongues call'd fools.
  TOUCHSTONE. Salutation greeting all!
  JAQUES. Good lord, bid welcome. motley-minded
    gentleman met forest. hath a
     courtier, swears.
  TOUCHSTONE. man doubt that, put purgation.
    trod measure; flatt'red lady; been
    politic friend, smooth mine enemy; undone
    tailors; quarrels, fought
    one.
  JAQUES. ta'en up?
  TOUCHSTONE. Faith, met, found quarrel the
    seventh cause.  
  JAQUES. seventh cause? Good lord, fellow.
  DUKE SENIOR. well.
  TOUCHSTONE. God 'ild you, sir; desire like. press in
    here, sir, rest country copulatives, swear
    forswear, marriage binds blood breaks. A
    poor virgin, sir, ill-favour'd thing, sir, mine own; a
    poor humour mine, sir, man will. Rich
    honesty dwells miser, sir, poor house; pearl
    foul oyster.
  DUKE SENIOR. faith, swift sententious.
  TOUCHSTONE. fool's bolt, sir, dulcet
    diseases.
  JAQUES. But, seventh cause: find quarrel on
    seventh cause?
  TOUCHSTONE. lie times removed- bear body more
    seeming, Audrey- thus, sir. dislike cut certain
    courtier's beard; word, beard not
    cut well, mind was. call'd Retort
    Courteous. word cut, would
    send word cut himself. call'd Quip  
    Modest. cut, disabled judgment.
    call'd Reply Churlish. cut,
    answer spake true. call'd Reproof
    Valiant. cut, lie. This
    call'd Countercheck Quarrelsome. Lie
    Circumstantial Lie Direct.
  JAQUES. oft beard cut?
  TOUCHSTONE. durst Lie Circumstantial, nor
    durst give Lie Direct; measur'd swords
    parted.
  JAQUES. nominate order degrees lie?
  TOUCHSTONE. O, sir, quarrel print book, have
    books good manners. degrees. first,
    Retort Courteous; second, Quip Modest; third, the
    Reply Churlish; fourth, Reproof Valiant; fifth, the
    Countercheck Quarrelsome; sixth, Lie Circumstance;
    seventh, Lie Direct. avoid Lie
    Direct; avoid If. knew seven
    justices quarrel; parties were
    met themselves, thought If, as: 'If  
    so, so.' shook hands, swore
    brothers. peace-maker; virtue If.
  JAQUES. rare fellow, lord?
    good thing, fool.
  DUKE SENIOR. folly stalking-horse, the
    presentation shoots wit:

          Enter HYMEN, ROSALIND, CELIA. MUSIC

    HYMEN.    mirth heaven,
              earthly things made even
                Atone together.
              Good Duke, receive thy daughter;
              Hymen heaven brought her,
                Yea, brought hither,
              thou mightst join hand his,
              heart bosom is.
  ROSALIND. [To DUKE] give myself, yours.
    [To ORLANDO] give myself, yours.
  DUKE SENIOR. truth sight, daughter.  
  ORLANDO. truth sight, Rosalind.
  PHEBE. sight shape true,
    then, love adieu!
  ROSALIND. father, he;
    husband, he;
    ne'er wed woman, she.
  HYMEN.    Peace, ho! bar confusion;
            'Tis make conclusion
              strange events.
            hands
            join Hymen's bands,
              truth holds true contents.
            cross part;
            heart heart;
            love accord,
            woman lord;
            together,
            winter foul weather.
            Whiles wedlock-hymn sing,
            Feed questioning,  
            reason diminish,
            met, things finish.

                       SONG
            Wedding great Juno's crown;
              O blessed bond board bed!
            'Tis Hymen peoples town;
              High wedlock honoured.
            Honour, high honour, renown,
            Hymen, god town!

  DUKE SENIOR. O dear niece, thou art me!
    daughter, degree.
  PHEBE. eat word, thou art mine;
    Thy faith fancy thee doth combine.

                 Enter JAQUES de BOYS

  JAQUES de BOYS. audience word two.
    son Sir Rowland,  
    bring tidings fair assembly.
    Duke Frederick, hearing day
    Men great worth resorted forest,
    Address'd mighty power; foot,
    conduct, purposely take
    brother here, put sword;
    skirts wild wood came,
    Where, meeting religious man,
    question him, converted
    enterprise world;
    crown bequeathing banish'd brother,
    lands restor'd again
    exil'd. true
    engage life.
  DUKE SENIOR. Welcome, young man.
    Thou offer'st fairly thy brothers' wedding:
    one, lands withheld; other,
    land large, potent dukedom.
    First, forest ends
    begun begot;  
    after, happy number,
    endur'd shrewd days nights us,
    share good returned fortune,
    measure states.
    Meantime, forget new-fall'n dignity,
    fall rustic revelry.
    Play, music; brides bridegrooms all,
    measure heap'd joy, th' measures fall.
  JAQUES. Sir, patience. heard rightly,
    Duke hath put religious life,
    thrown neglect pompous court.
  JAQUES DE BOYS. hath.
  JAQUES. I. convertites
    matter heard learn'd.
    [To DUKE] honour bequeath;
    patience virtue deserves it.
    [To ORLANDO] love true faith doth merit;
    [To OLIVER] land, love, great allies
    [To SILVIUS] long well-deserved bed;
    [To TOUCHSTONE] wrangling; thy loving voyage  
    months victuall'd.- pleasures;
    dancing measures.
  DUKE SENIOR. Stay, Jaques, stay.
  JAQUES. pastime I. have
    stay abandon'd cave.               Exit
  DUKE SENIOR. Proceed, proceed. begin rites,
    trust end, true delights.    [A dance] Exeunt

EPILOGUE
                           EPILOGUE.
  ROSALIND. fashion lady epilogue; but
    unhandsome lord prologue. it
    true good wine bush, 'tis true good play
    epilogue. good wine good bushes; and
    good plays prove good epilogues. a
    case then, good epilogue, cannot
    insinuate behalf good play! not
    furnish'd beggar; beg me. My
    conjure you; begin women. charge
    you, O women, love bear men, of
    play you; charge you, O men, love
    bear women- perceive simp'ring you
    hates them- women play please.
    woman, kiss beards that
    pleas'd me, complexions lik'd me, breaths defied
    not; and, sure, good beards, good faces,
    sweet breaths, will, kind offer, make curtsy,
    bid farewell.

THE END





1593

THE COMEDY ERRORS

by William Shakespeare

DRAMATIS PERSONAE

SOLINUS, Duke Ephesus
AEGEON, merchant Syracuse

ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS twin brothers sons to
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE Aegion Aemelia

DROMIO EPHESUS twin brothers, attendants on
DROMIO SYRACUSE Antipholuses

BALTHAZAR, merchant
ANGELO, goldsmith
FIRST MERCHANT, friend Antipholus Syracuse
SECOND MERCHANT, Angelo debtor
PINCH, schoolmaster

AEMILIA, wife AEgeon; abbess Ephesus
ADRIANA, wife Antipholus Ephesus
LUCIANA, sister
LUCE, servant Adriana

A COURTEZAN

Gaoler, Officers, Attendants





SCENE:
Ephesus


<<THIS ELECTRONIC VERSION COMPLETE WORKS WILLIAM

THE COMEDY ERRORS

ACT I. SCENE 1

A hall DUKE'S palace

Enter DUKE EPHESUS, AEGEON, Merchant
of Syracuse, GAOLER, OFFICERS, ATTENDANTS

AEGEON. Proceed, Solinus, procure fall,
  doom death end woes all.
DUKE. Merchant Syracuse, plead more;
  partial infringe laws.
  enmity discord late
  Sprung rancorous outrage duke
  merchants, well-dealing countrymen,
  Who, wanting guilders redeem lives,
  seal'd rigorous statutes bloods,
  Excludes pity threat'ning looks.
  For, mortal intestine jars
  'Twixt thy seditious countrymen us,
  hath solemn synods decreed,
  Syracusians ourselves,
  admit traffic adverse towns;
  Nay, more: born Ephesus
  Syracusian marts fairs;
  Again, Syracusian born
  bay Ephesus-he dies,
  goods confiscate Duke's dispose,
  thousand marks levied,
  quit penalty ransom him.
  Thy substance, valued highest rate,
  amount hundred marks;
  law thou art condemn'd die.
AEGEON. comfort: words done,
  woes end likewise evening sun.
DUKE. Well, Syracusian, cause
  thou departed'st thy native home,
  thou cam'st Ephesus.
AEGEON. heavier task impos'd
  speak griefs unspeakable;
  Yet, world witness end
  wrought nature, vile offence,
  utter sorrow leave.
  Syracuse born, wed
  woman, happy me,
  me, hap bad.
  liv'd joy; wealth increas'd
  prosperous voyages made
  Epidamnum; till factor's death,
  great care goods random left,
  Drew kind embracements spouse:
  absence months old,
  herself, fainting under
  pleasing punishment women bear,
  made provision me,
  safe arrived was.
  long became
  joyful mother goodly sons;
  And, strange, other
  disdnguish'd names.
  hour, self-same inn,
  woman delivered
  burden, male twins, alike.
  Those, parents exceeding poor,
  bought, brought attend sons.
  wife, meanly proud boys,
  Made daily motions home return;
  Unwilling, agreed. Alas! soon
  aboard.
  league Epidamnum sail'd
  always-wind-obeying deep
  Gave tragic instance harm:
  longer retain hope,
  obscured light heavens grant
  convey fearful minds
  doubtful warrant death;
  gladly embrac'd,
  incessant weepings wife,
  Weeping come,
  piteous plainings pretty babes,
  mourn'd fashion, ignorant fear,
  Forc'd seek delays me.
  was, means none:
  sailors sought safety boat,
  left ship, sinking-ripe, us;
  wife, careful latter-born,
  fast'ned small spare mast,
  sea-faring men provide storms;
  twins bound,
  Whilst heedful other.
  children dispos'd, wife I,
  Fixing eyes care fix'd,
  Fast'ned end mast,
  And, floating straight, obedient stream,
  carried Corinth, thought.
  length sun, gazing earth,
  Dispers'd vapours offended us;
  And, benefit wished light,
  seas wax'd calm, discovered
  ships making amain us-
  Corinth that, Epidaurus this.
  ere came-O, more!
  Gather sequel before.
DUKE. Nay, forward, man, break so;
  pity, pardon thee.
AEGEON. O, gods so, now
  Worthily term'd merciless us!
  For, ere ships meet leagues,
  encount'red mighty rock,
  violently borne upon,
  helpful ship splitted midst;
  that, unjust divorce us,
  Fortune left alike
  delight in, sorrow for.
  part, poor soul, burdened
  lesser weight, lesser woe,
  carried speed wind;
  sight up
  fishermen Corinth, thought.
  length ship seiz'd us;
  And, knowing hap save,
  Gave healthful ship-wreck'd guests,
  reft fishers prey,
  bark slow sail;
  homeward bend course.
  heard sever'd bliss,
  misfortunes life prolong'd,
  sad stories mishaps.
DUKE. And, sake thou sorrowest for,
  favour dilate full
  befall'n thee till now.
AEGEON. youngest boy, eldest care,
  eighteen years inquisitive
  brother, importun'd me
  attendant-so case like,
  Reft brother, retain'd name-
  bear company quest him;
  whilst laboured love see,
  hazarded loss lov'd.
  summers spent farthest Greece,
  Roaming clean bounds Asia,
  And, coasting homeward, Ephesus;
  Hopeless find, loath leave unsought
  place harbours men.
  end story life;
  happy timely death,
  travels warrant live.
DUKE. Hapless, Aegeon, fates mark'd
  bear extremity dire mishap!
  Now, trust me, laws,
  crown, oath, dignity,
  princes, they, disannul,
  soul sue advocate thee.
  thou art adjudged death,
  passed sentence recall'd
  honour's great disparagement,
  favour thee can.
  Therefore, merchant, limit thee day
  seek thy beneficial hap.
  friends thou hast Ephesus;
  Beg thou, borrow, make sum,
  live; no, thou art doom'd die.
  Gaoler, thy custody.
GAOLER. will, lord.
AEGEON. Hopeless helpless doth Aegeon wend,
  procrastinate lifeless end.
<Exeunt


SCENE 2

The mart

Enter ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE, DROMIO SYRACUSE, MERCHANT

FIRST MERCHANT. Therefore, give Epidamnum,
  goods confiscate.
  day Syracusian merchant
  apprehended arrival here;
  And, buy life,
  statute town,
  Dies ere weary sun set west.
  money keep.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. bear Centaur, host.
  stay there, Dromio, till thee.
  hour dinner-time;
  Till that, view manners town,
  Peruse traders, gaze buildings,
  return sleep mine inn;
  long travel stiff weary.
  thee away.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. man word,
  indeed, good mean.
<Exit
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. trusty villain, sir, oft,
  dull care melancholy,
  Lightens humour merry jests.
  What, walk town,
  inn dine me?
FIRST MERCHANT. invited, sir, merchants,
  hope make benefit;
  crave pardon. o'clock,
  you, meet mart,
  afterward consort till bed time.
  present business calls now.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Farewell till then. lose myself,
  wander view city.
FIRST MERCHANT. Sir, commend content.
<Exit MERCHANT
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. commends mine content
  Commends thing get.
  world drop water
  ocean seeks drop,
  Who, falling find fellow forth,
  Unseen, inquisitive, confounds himself.
  I, find mother brother,
  quest them, unhappy, lose myself.

Enter DROMIO EPHESUS

  almanac true date.
  now? chance thou art return'd soon?
DROMIO EPHESUS. Return'd soon! approach'd late.
  capon burns, pig falls spit;
  clock hath strucken twelve bell-
  mistress made cheek;
  hot meat cold,
  meat cold home,
  home stomach,
  stomach, broke fast;
  we, 'tis fast pray,
  penitent default to-day.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Stop wind, sir; this, pray:
  left money gave you?
DROMIO EPHESUS. O-Sixpence Wednesday last
  pay saddler mistress' crupper?
  saddler it, sir; not.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. sportive humour now;
  me, dally not, money?
  strangers here, dar'st thou trust
  great charge thine custody?
DROMIO EPHESUS. pray jest, sir, sit dinner.
  mistress post;
  return, post indeed,
  score fault pate.
  Methinks maw, mine, clock,
  strike home messenger.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Come, Dromio, come, jests season;
  Reserve till merrier hour this.
  gold gave charge thee?
DROMIO EPHESUS. me, sir? Why, gave gold me.
  ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. on, sir knave, foolishness,
  thou hast dispos'd thy charge.
DROMIO EPHESUS. charge fetch mart
  Home house, Phoenix, sir, dinner.
  mistress sister stays you.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Now, Christian, answer me
  safe place bestow'd money,
  break merry sconce yours,
  stands tricks undispos'd.
  thousand marks thou hadst me?
DROMIO EPHESUS. marks pate,
  mistress' marks shoulders,
  thousand marks both.
  pay worship again,
  Perchance bear patiently.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Thy mistress' marks! mistress, slave, hast thou?
DROMIO EPHESUS. worship's wife, mistress Phoenix;
  doth fast till home dinner,
  prays hie home dinner.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. What, wilt thou flout face,
  forbid? There, that, sir knave.
[Beats him]
DROMIO EPHESUS. you, sir? God's sake hold hands!
  Nay, not, sir, heels.
<Exit
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. life, device other
  villain o'erraught money.
  town full cozenage;
  As, nimble jugglers deceive eye,
  Dark-working sorcerers change mind,
  Soul-killing witches deform body,
  Disguised cheaters, prating mountebanks,
  such-like liberties sin;
  prove so, sooner.
  Centaur seek slave.
  greatly fear money safe.
<Exit
