ACT Il. SCENE 1

The house ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS

Enter ADRIANA, wife ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS, LUCIANA, sister

ADRIANA. husband slave return'd
  haste seek master!
  Sure, Luciana, o'clock.
LUCIANA. merchant hath invited him,
  mart dinner;
  Good sister, dine, fret.
  man master liberty;
  Time master, time,
  come. so, patient, sister.
ADRIANA. liberty more?
LUCIANA. business lies o' door.
ADRIANA. serve so, takes ill.
LUCIANA. O, bridle will.
ADRIANA. asses bridled so.
LUCIANA. Why, headstrong liberty lash'd woe.
  situate heaven's eye
  hath bound, earth, sea, sky.
  beasts, fishes, winged fowls,
  males' subjects, controls.
  Man, divine, master these,
  Lord wide world wild wat'ry seas,
  Indu'd intellectual sense souls,
  pre-eminence fish fowls,
  masters females, lords;
  attend accords.
ADRIANA. servitude makes unwed.
LUCIANA. this, troubles marriage-bed.
ADRIANA. But, wedded, bear sway.
LUCIANA. Ere learn love, practise obey.
ADRIANA. husband start where?
LUCIANA. Till home again, forbear.
ADRIANA. Patience unmov'd! marvel pause:
  meek cause.
  wretched soul, bruis'd adversity,
  bid quiet hear cry;
  burd'ned weight pain,
  much, more, complain.
  thou, hast unkind mate grieve thee,
  urging helpless patience relieve me;
  thou live bereft,
  fool-begg'd patience thee left.
LUCIANA. Well, marry day, try.
  man, husband nigh.

Enter DROMIO EPHESUS

ADRIANA. Say, tardy master hand?
DROMIO EPHESUS. Nay, hands me, two
  ears witness.
ADRIANA. Say, didst thou speak him? Know'st thou mind?
DROMIO EPHESUS. Ay, ay, told mind mine ear.
  Beshrew hand, scarce understand it.
LUCIANA. Spake doubtfully thou could'st feel meaning?
DROMIO EPHESUS. Nay, struck plainly to
  feel blows; withal doubtfully could
  scarce understand them.
ADRIANA. say, prithee, coming home?
  hath great care wife.
DROMIO EPHESUS. Why, mistress, master horn-mad.
ADRIANA. Horn-mad, thou villain!
DROMIO EPHESUS. cuckold-mad;
  But, sure, stark mad.
  desir'd home dinner,
  ask'd thousand marks gold.
  "Tis dinner time' quoth I; 'My gold!' quoth he.
  'Your meat doth burn' quoth I; 'My gold!' quoth he.
  'Will home?' quoth I; 'My gold!' quoth he.
  'Where thousand marks gave thee, villain?'
  'The pig' quoth 'is burn'd'; 'My gold!' quoth he.
  'My mistress, sir,' quoth I; 'Hang thy mistress;
  thy mistress; thy mistress.'
LUCIANA. Quoth who?
DROMIO EPHESUS. Quoth master.
  'I know' quoth 'no house, wife, mistress.'
  errand, due tongue,
  him, bare home shoulders;
  For, conclusion, beat there.
ADRIANA. back again, thou slave, fetch home.
DROMIO EPHESUS. back again, beaten home?
  God's sake, send messenger.
ADRIANA. Back, slave, break thy pate across.
DROMIO EPHESUS. bless cross beating;
  holy head.
ADRIANA. Hence, prating peasant! Fetch thy master home.
DROMIO EPHESUS. round you, me,
  football spurn thus?
  spurn hence, spurn hither;
  service, case leather.
<Exit
LUCIANA. Fie, impatience loureth face!
ADRIANA. company minions grace,
  Whilst home starve merry look.
  Hath homely age th' alluring beauty took
  poor cheek? hath wasted it.
  discourses dull? Barren wit?
  voluble sharp discourse marr'd,
  Unkindness blunts marble hard.
  gay vestments affections bait?
  fault; master state.
  ruins found
  ruin'd? ground
  defeatures. decayed fair
  sunny repair.
  But, unruly deer, breaks pale,
  feeds home; poor stale.
LUCIANA. Self-harming jealousy! fie, beat hence.
ADRIANA. Unfeeling fools wrongs dispense.
  eye doth homage otherwhere;
  lets here?
  Sister, promis'd chain;
  love detain,
  fair quarter bed!
  jewel enamelled
  lose beauty; gold bides still
  touch and, touching, will
  gold; man hath name
  falsehood corruption doth shame.
  beauty eye,
  weep left away, weeping die.
LUCIANA. fond fools serve mad jealousy!
<Exeunt


SCENE 2

The mart

Enter ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE

ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. gold gave Dromio laid up
  Safe Centaur, heedful slave
  wand'red care seek out.
  computation mine host's report
  speak Dromio first
  mart. See, comes.

Enter DROMIO SYRACUSE

  now, sir, merry humour alter'd?
  love strokes, jest again.
  Centaur! receiv'd gold!
  mistress home dinner!
  house Phoenix! Wast thou mad,
  madly thou didst answer me?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. answer, sir? spake word?
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. now, here, half hour since.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. hence,
  Home Centaur, gold gave me.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Villain, thou didst deny gold's receipt,
  told'st mistress dinner;
  which, hope, thou felt'st displeas'd.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. glad merry vein.
  means jest? pray you, master, me.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Yea, dost thou jeer flout teeth?
  Think'st thou jest? Hold, thou that, that.
[Beating him]
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Hold, sir, God's sake! jest earnest.
  bargain give me?
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. familiarly sometimes
  fool chat you,
  sauciness jest love,
  make common hours.
  sun shines foolish gnats make sport,
  creep crannies hides beams.
  jest me, aspect,
  fashion demeanour looks,
  beat method sconce.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Sconce, call it? would
  leave battering, head. use
  blows long, sconce head, and
  insconce too; seek wit shoulders.
  pray, sir, beaten?
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Dost thou know?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Nothing, sir, beaten.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. why?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Ay, sir, wherefore; say
  hath wherefore.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Why, flouting me; wherefore,
  urging time me.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. man beaten season,
  wherefore rhyme reason?
  Well, sir, you.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. me, sir! what?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Marry, sir, gave
  nothing.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. make amends next, to
  give something. say, sir, dinnertime?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. No, sir; meat have.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. good time, sir, that?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Basting.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Well, sir, 'twill dry.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. be, sir, pray eat it.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. reason?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. make choleric, purchase me
  dry basting.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Well, sir, learn jest good time;
  time things.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. durst denied that, you
  choleric.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. rule, sir?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Marry, sir, rule plain the
  plain bald pate Father Time himself.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. hear it.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. time man recover
  hair grows bald nature.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. fine recovery?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Yes, pay fine periwig, and
  recover lost hair man.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Time niggard of
  hair, being, is, plentiful excrement?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. blessing bestows
  beasts, hath scanted men hair hath
  wit.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Why, man
  hath hair wit.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. man hath the
  wit lose hair.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Why, thou didst conclude hairy
  men plain dealers wit.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. plainer dealer, sooner lost;
  loseth kind jollity.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. reason?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. two; sound too.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Nay, sound pray you.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. ones, then.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Nay, sure, thing falsing.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. ones, then.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. them.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. one, save money spends in
  tiring; other, dinner drop his
  porridge.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. time prov'd there
  time things.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Marry, did, sir; namely, time recover
  hair lost nature.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. reason substantial, why
  time recover.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. mend it: Time bald,
  world's end bald followers.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. knew 't'would bald conclusion. But,
  soft, wafts yonder?

Enter ADRIANA LUCIANA

ADRIANA. Ay, ay, Antipholus, strange frown.
  mistress hath thy sweet aspects;
  Adriana, thy wife.
  time thou unurg'd wouldst vow
  words music thine ear,
  object pleasing thine eye,
  touch thy hand,
  meat sweet-savour'd thy taste,
  spake, look'd, touch'd, carv'd thee.
  now, husband, O, it,
  thou art estranged thyself?
  Thyself call it, strange me,
  That, undividable, incorporate,
  thy dear self's part.
  Ah, tear thyself me;
  know, love, easy mayst thou fall
  drop water breaking gulf,
  unmingled drop again
  addition diminishing,
  thyself, too.
  dearly touch thee quick,
  Should'st thou hear licentious,
  body, consecrate thee,
  ruffian lust contaminate!
  Wouldst thou spit spurn me,
  hurl husband face,
  tear stain'd skin harlot-brow,
  false hand cut wedding-ring,
  break deep-divorcing vow?
  thou canst, thou it.
  possess'd adulterate blot;
  blood mingled crime lust;
  one, thou play false,
  digest poison thy flesh,
  strumpeted thy contagion.
  fair league truce thy true bed;
  live dis-stain'd, thou undishonoured.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Plead me, fair dame? not:
  Ephesus hours old,
  strange town talk,
  Who, word wit scann'd,
  wit word understand.
LUCIANA. Fie, brother, world chang'd you!
  wont sister thus?
  Dromio home dinner.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Dromio?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. me?
ADRIANA. thee; thou didst return him-
  buffet thee, blows
  Denied house his, wife.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. converse, sir, gentlewoman?
  drift compact?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. I, Sir? till time.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Villain, thou liest; words
  Didst thou deliver mart.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. spake life.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. thus, then, call names,
  inspiration?
ADRIANA. ill agrees gravity
  counterfeit grossly slave,
  Abetting thwart mood!
  wrong exempt,
  wrong wrong contempt.
  Come, fasten sleeve thine;
  Thou art elm, husband, vine,
  weakness, married thy stronger state,
  Makes thy strength communicate.
  aught possess thee me, dross,
  Usurping ivy, brier, idle moss;
  all, pruning, intrusion
  Infect thy sap, live thy confusion.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. speaks; moves theme.
  What, married dream?
  sleep now, hear this?
  error drives eyes ears amiss?
  uncertainty,
  entertain offer'd fallacy.
LUCIANA. Dromio, bid servants spread dinner.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. O, beads! cross sinner.
  fairy land. O spite spites!
  talk goblins, owls, sprites.
  obey not, ensue:
  suck breath, pinch black blue.
LUCIANA. prat'st thou thyself, answer'st not?
  Dromio, thou drone, thou snail, thou slug, thou sot!
DROMIO SYRACUSE. transformed, master, I?
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. thou art mind, I.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Nay, master, mind shape.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Thou hast thine form.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. No, ape.
LUCIANA. thou art chang'd aught, 'tis ass.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. 'Tis true; rides me, long grass.
  'Tis so, ass; be
  me.
ADRIANA. Come, come, longer fool,
  put finger eye weep,
  Whilst man master laughs woes scorn.
  Come, sir, dinner. Dromio, gate.
  Husband, dine to-day,
  shrive thousand idle pranks.
  Sirrah, master,
  dines forth, creature enter.
  Come, sister. Dromio, play porter well.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. earth, heaven, hell?
  Sleeping waking, mad well-advis'd?
  these, disguis'd!
  say, persever so,
  mist adventures go.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Master, porter gate?
ADRIANA. Ay; enter, break pate.
LUCIANA. Come, come, Antipholus, dine late.
<Exeunt

ACT III. SCENE 1

Before house ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS

Enter ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS, DROMIO EPHESUS, ANGELO, BALTHAZAR

ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Good Signior Angelo, excuse all;
  wife shrewish hours.
  linger'd shop
  making carcanet,
  to-morrow bring home.
  villain face down
  met mart, beat him,
  charg'd thousand marks gold,
  deny wife house.
  Thou drunkard, thou, didst thou this?
DROMIO EPHESUS. will, sir, know.
  beat mart hand show;
  skin parchment, blows gave ink,
  handwriting think.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. thou art ass.
DROMIO EPHESUS. Marry, doth appear
  wrongs suffer blows bear.
  kick, kick'd; pass,
  heels, beware ass.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Y'are sad, Signior Balthazar; pray God cheer
  answer good good here.
BALTHAZAR. hold dainties cheap, sir, dear.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. O, Signior Balthazar, flesh fish,
  table full makes scarce dainty dish.
BALTHAZAR. Good meat, sir, common; churl affords.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. common; nothing
  words.
BALTHAZAR. Small cheer great makes merry feast.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Ay, niggardly host sparing guest.
  cates mean, good part;
  cheer have, heart.
  But, soft, door lock'd; bid in.
DROMIO EPHESUS. Maud, Bridget, Marian, Cicely, Gillian, Ginn!
DROMIO SYRACUSE. [Within] Mome, malt-horse, capon, coxcomb, idiot, patch!
  thee door, sit hatch.
  Dost thou conjure wenches, thou call'st store,
  many? thee door.
DROMIO EPHESUS. patch made porter?
  master stays street.
DROMIO SYRACUSE.  [Within]  walk came,
    catch cold on's feet.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. talks there? Ho, open door!
DROMIO SYRACUSE.  [Within]  Right, sir; when,
    wherefore.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Wherefore? dinner;
    din'd to-day.
DROMIO SYRACUSE.  [Within]  to-day not;
    may.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. art thou keep'st out
    house owe?
DROMIO SYRACUSE.  [Within]  porter time,
    sir, Dromio.
DROMIO EPHESUS. O Villain, thou hast stol'n mine
    office name!
  ne'er credit, mickle blame.
  thou hadst Dromio to-day place,
  Thou wouldst chang'd thy face name, thy ass.

Enter LUCE, within

LUCE.  [Within]  coil there, Dromio? gate?
DROMIO EPHESUS. master in, Luce.
LUCE.  [Within]  Faith, no, late;
  master.
DROMIO EPHESUS. O Lord, laugh!
  proverb: set staff?
LUCE.  [Within]  another: that's-when? tell?
DROMIO SYRACUSE.  [Within]  thy called Luce
    -Luce, thou hast answer'd well.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. hear, minion? in, hope?
LUCE.  [Within]  thought ask'd you.
DROMIO SYRACUSE.  [Within]  no.
DROMIO EPHESUS. SO, Come, help: struck! blow blow.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Thou baggage, in.
LUCE.  [Within]  sake?
DROMIO EPHESUS. Master, knock door hard.
LUCE.  [Within]  knock till ache.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. cry this, minion, beat door down.
LUCE.  [Within] that, pair stocks town?

Enter ADRIANA, within

ADRIANA.  [Within]  door, noise?
DROMIO SYRACUSE.  [Within]  troth, town is
    troubled unruly boys.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. there, wife? might
    before.
ADRIANA.  [Within]  wife, sir knave! door.
DROMIO EPHESUS. pain, master, 'knave' sore.
ANGELO. cheer, sir, welcome; fain either.
BALTHAZAR. debating best, part neither.
DROMIO EPHESUS. stand door, master; bid hither.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. wind, in.
DROMIO EPHESUS. so, master, garments thin.
  cake warm within; stand cold;
  make man mad buck bought sold.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. fetch something; break ope gate.
DROMIO SYRACUSE.  [Within]  Break breaking here,
    break knave's pate.
DROMIO EPHESUS. man break word you,
    sir; words wind;
  Ay, break face, break behind.
DROMIO SYRACUSE.  [Within]  thou want'st breaking;
    thee, hind!
DROMIO EPHESUS. 'out thee!' pray thee in.
DROMIO SYRACUSE.  [Within]  Ay, fowls no
    feathers fish fin.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Well, break in; borrow crow.
DROMIO EPHESUS. crow feather? Master, so?
  fish fin, fowl feather;
  crow in, sirrah, pluck crow together.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. thee gone; fetch iron crow.
BALTHAZAR. patience, sir; O, so!
  war reputation,
  draw compass suspect
  Th' unviolated honour wife.
  this-your long experience wisdom,
  sober virtue, years, modesty,
  Plead part unknown;
  doubt not, sir, excuse
  time doors made you.
  rul'd me: depart patience,
  Tiger dinner;
  And, evening, alone
  reason strange restraint.
  strong hand offer break in
  stirring passage day,
  vulgar comment made it,
  supposed common rout
  ungalled estimation
  foul intrusion enter in
  dwell grave dead;
  slander lives succession,
  hous'd possession.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. prevail'd. depart quiet,
  mirth merry.
  wench excellent discourse,
  Pretty witty; wild, yet, too, gentle;
  dine. woman mean,
  wife-but, protest, desert-
  Hath oftentimes upbraided withal;
  dinner.  [To ANGELO]  home
  fetch chain; 'tis made.
  Bring it, pray you, Porpentine;
  house. chain bestow-
  spite wife-
  mine hostess there; good sir, make haste.
  mine doors refuse entertain me,
  knock elsewhere, disdain me.
ANGELO. meet place hour hence.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. so; jest cost expense.
<Exeunt


SCENE 2

Before house ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS

Enter LUCIANA ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE

LUCIANA. forgot
  husband's office? Shall, Antipholus,
  spring love, thy love-springs rot?
  love, building, grow ruinous?
  wed sister wealth,
  wealth's sake kindness;
  Or, elsewhere, stealth;
  Muffle false love show blindness;
  sister read eye;
  thy tongue thy shame's orator;
  sweet, speak fair, disloyalty;
  Apparel vice virtue's harbinger;
  Bear fair presence, heart tainted;
  Teach sin carriage holy saint;
  secret-false. acquainted?
  simple thief brags attaint?
  'Tis double wrong truant bed
  read thy board;
  Shame hath bastard fame, managed;
  Ill deeds doubled evil word.
  Alas, poor women! make believe,
  compact credit, love us;
  arm, show sleeve;
  motion turn, move us.
  Then, gentle brother, again;
  Comfort sister, cheer her, call wife.
  'Tis holy sport vain
  sweet breath flattery conquers strife.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Sweet mistress-what else, not,
  hit mine-
  knowledge grace show not
  earth's wonder-more earth, divine.
  Teach me, dear creature, speak;
  Lay open earthy-gross conceit,
  Smoth'red errors, feeble, shallow, weak,
  folded meaning words' deceit.
  soul's pure truth labour you
  make wander unknown field?
  god? create new?
  Transform me, then, pow'r yield.
  I, know
  weeping sister wife mine,
  bed homage owe;
  more, more, decline.
  O, train not, sweet mermaid, thy note,
  drown thy sister's flood tears.
  Sing, siren, thyself, dote;
  Spread o'er silver waves thy golden hairs,
  bed them, he;
  glorious supposition think
  gains death hath means die.
  Love, light, drowned sink.
LUCIANA. What, mad, reason so?
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. mad, mated; how, know.
LUCIANA. fault springeth eye.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. gazing beams, fair sun, by.
LUCIANA. Gaze should, clear sight.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. good wink, sweet love, night.
LUCIANA. call love? Call sister so.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Thy sister's sister.
LUCIANA. sister.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. No;
  thyself, mine self's part;
  Mine eye's clear eye, dear heart's dearer heart,
  food, fortune, sweet hope's aim,
  sole earth's heaven, heaven's claim.
LUCIANA. sister is, be.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Call thyself sister, sweet, thee;
  Thee love, thee lead life;
  Thou hast husband yet, wife.
  Give thy hand.
LUCIANA. O, soft, sir, hold still;
  fetch sister good will.
<Exit LUCIANA

Enter DROMIO SYRACUSE.

ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Why, now, Dromio! run'st thou
  fast?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. me, sir? Dromio?
  man? myself?
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Thou art Dromio, thou art my
  man, thou art thyself.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. ass, woman's man, besides
  myself.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. woman's man, thyself?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Marry, sir, myself, due
  woman-one claims me, haunts me, one
  me.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. claim lays thee?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Marry, sir, claim would
  lay horse; beast: not
  that, beast, me; she,
  beastly creature, lays claim me.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. she?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. reverent body; ay, one
  man speak 'Sir-reverence.'
  lean luck match, a
  wondrous fat marriage.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. dost thou fat marriage?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Marry, sir, kitchen-wench,
  grease; put but
  make lamp run light.
  warrant, rags tallow burn
  Poland winter. lives till doomsday, burn
  week longer world.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. complexion of?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Swart, shoe; face
  clean kept; why, sweats, man may
  shoes grime it.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. fault water mend.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. No, sir, 'tis grain; Noah's flood
  it.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. name?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Nell, sir; three
  quarters, ell quarters, measure
  hip hip.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. bears breadth?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. longer head foot than
  hip hip: spherical, globe; find
  countries her.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. part body stands Ireland?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Marry, sir, buttocks; found by
  bogs.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Scotland?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. found barrenness, hard in
  palm hand.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. France?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. forehead, arm'd reverted,
  making war heir.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. England?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. look'd chalky cliffs, I
  find whiteness them; guess stood her
  chin, salt rheum ran France it.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Spain?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Faith, not, felt hot in
  breath.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. America, Indies?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. O, sir, nose, o'er embellished with
  rubies, carbuncles, sapphires, declining rich aspect the
  hot breath Spain; armadoes caracks be
  ballast nose.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. stood Belgia, Netherlands?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. O, Sir, low. To
  conclude: drudge diviner laid claim me; call'd me
  Dromio; swore assur'd her; told privy
  marks me, as, mark shoulder, the
  mole neck, great wart left arm, I,
  amaz'd, ran witch.
  And, think, breast made faith,
    heart steel,
  transform'd curtal dog, made turn i' th' wheel.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. hie thee presently post road;
  wind blow shore,
  harbour town to-night.
  bark put forth, mart,
  walk till thou return me.
  us, none,
  'Tis time, think, trudge, pack gone.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. bear man run life,
  fly wife.
<Exit
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. witches inhabit here,
  'tis high time hence.
  doth call husband, soul
  Doth wife abhor. fair sister,
  Possess'd gentle sovereign grace,
  enchanting presence discourse,
  Hath made traitor myself;
  But, guilty self-wrong,
  stop mine ears mermaid's song.

Enter ANGELO chain

ANGELO. Master Antipholus!
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Ay, name.
ANGELO. well, sir. Lo, chain.
  thought ta'en Porpentine;
  chain unfinish'd made stay long.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. this?
ANGELO. yourself, sir; made you.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Made me, sir! bespoke not.
ANGELO. twice, twenty times have.
  home it, wife withal;
  supper-time visit you,
  receive money chain.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. pray you, sir, receive money now,
  fear ne'er chain money more.
ANGELO. merry man, sir; fare well.
<Exit
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. tell:
  think, man vain
  refuse fair offer'd chain.
  man live shifts,
  streets meets golden gifts.
  mart, Dromio stay;
  ship put out, straight away.
<Exit

ACT IV. SCENE 1

A public place

Enter MERCHANT, ANGELO, OFFICER

SECOND MERCHANT. Pentecost sum due,
  importun'd you;
  not, bound
  Persia, guilders voyage.
  make present satisfaction,
  attach officer.
ANGELO. sum owe you
  growing Antipholus;
  instant met you
  chain; o'clock
  receive money same.
  Pleaseth walk house,
  discharge bond, too.

Enter ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS, DROMIO EPHESUS, COURTEZAN'S

OFFICER. labour save; comes.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. goldsmith's house, thou
  buy rope's end; bestow
  wife confederates,
  locking doors day.
  But, soft, goldsmith. thee gone;
  Buy thou rope, bring home me.
DROMIO EPHESUS. buy thousand pound year; buy rope.
<Exit DROMIO
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. man holp trusts you!
  promised presence chain;
  chain goldsmith me.
  Belike thought love long,
  chain'd together, not.
ANGELO. Saving merry humour, note
  chain weighs utmost carat,
  fineness gold, chargeful fashion,
  doth amount odd ducats more
  stand debted gentleman.
  pray presently discharg'd,
  bound sea, stays it.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. furnish'd present money;
  Besides, business town.
  Good signior, stranger house,
  chain, bid wife
  Disburse sum receipt thereof.
  Perchance you.
ANGELO. bring chain yourself?
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. No; bear you, time enough.
ANGELO. Well, sir, will. chain you?
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. not, sir, hope have;
  return money.
ANGELO. Nay, come, pray you, sir, give chain;
  wind tide stays gentleman,
  I, blame, held long.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Good Lord! dalliance excuse
  breach promise Porpentine;
  chid bringing it,
  But, shrew, begin brawl.
SECOND MERCHANT. hour steals on; pray you, sir, dispatch.
ANGELO. hear importunes me-the chain!
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Why, give wife, fetch money.
ANGELO. Come, come, gave now.
  send chain send token.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Fie, run humour breath!
  Come, chain? pray it.
SECOND MERCHANT. business brook dalliance.
  Good sir, whe'r answer no;
  not, leave officer.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. answer you! answer you?
ANGELO. money owe chain.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. owe till receive chain.
ANGELO. gave half hour since.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. gave none; wrong so.
ANGELO. wrong more, sir, denying it.
  stands credit.
SECOND MERCHANT. Well, officer, arrest suit.
OFFICER. do; charge Duke's obey me.
ANGELO. touches reputation.
  consent pay sum me,
  attach officer.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Consent pay thee had!
  Arrest me, foolish fellow, thou dar'st.
ANGELO. thy fee; arrest him, officer.
  spare brother case,
  scorn apparently.
OFFICER. arrest you, sir; hear suit.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. obey thee till give thee bail.
  But, sirrah, buy sport dear
  metal shop answer.
ANGELO. Sir, sir, law Ephesus,
  notorious shame, doubt not.

Enter DROMIO SYRACUSE, bay

DROMIO SYRACUSE. Master, bark Epidamnum
  stays till owner aboard,
  then, sir, bears away. fraughtage, sir,
  convey'd aboard; bought
  oil, balsamum, aqua-vitx.
  ship trim; merry wind
  Blows fair land; stay nought an
  owner, master, yourself.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. now! madman? Why, thou peevish sheep,
  ship Epidamnum stays me?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. ship to, hire waftage.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. THOU drunken slave! rope;
  told thee purpose end.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. rope's end soon-
  bay, sir, bark.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. debate matter leisure,
  teach ears list heed.
  Adriana, villain, hie thee straight;
  Give key, desk
  cover'd o'er Turkish tapestry
  purse ducats; send it.
  arrested street,
  bail me; hie thee, slave, gone.
  On, officer, prison till come.
<Exeunt DROMIO
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Adriana! din'd,
  Dowsabel claim husband.
  big, hope, compass.
  Thither must, will,
  servants masters' minds fulfil.
<Exit


SCENE 2

The house ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS

Enter ADRIANA LUCIANA

ADRIANA. Ah, Luciana, tempt thee so?
  Might'st thou perceive austerely eye
  plead earnest? Yea no?
  Look'd red pale, sad merrily?
  observation mad'st thou case
  heart's meteors tilting face?
LUCIANA. denied right.
ADRIANA. meant none-the spite.
LUCIANA. swore stranger here.
ADRIANA. true swore, forsworn were.
LUCIANA. pleaded you.
ADRIANA. he?
LUCIANA. love begg'd begg'd me.
ADRIANA. persuasion tempt thy love?
LUCIANA. words honest suit move.
  praise beauty, speech.
ADRIANA. Didst speak fair?
LUCIANA. patience, beseech.
ADRIANA. cannot, hold still;
  tongue, heart, will.
  deformed, crooked, old, sere,
  Ill-fac'd, worse bodied, shapeless everywhere;
  Vicious, ungentle, foolish, blunt, unkind;
  Stigmatical making, worse mind.
LUCIANA. jealous one?
  evil lost wail'd gone.
ADRIANA. Ah, say,
  others' eyes worse.
  nest lapwing cries away;
  heart prays him, tongue curse.

Enter DROMIO SYRACUSE.

DROMIO SYRACUSE. go-the desk, purse. Sweet
  now, make haste.
LUCIANA. hast thou lost thy breath?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. running fast.
ADRIANA. thy master, Dromio? well?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. No, Tartar limbo, worse hell.
  devil everlasting garment hath him;
  hard heart button'd steel;
  fiend, fairy, pitiless rough;
  wolf, nay worse, fellow buff;
  back-friend, shoulder-clapper, countermands
  passages alleys, creeks, narrow lands;
  hound runs counter, draws dry-foot well;
  that, Judgment, carries poor souls hell.
ADRIANA. Why, man, matter?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. matter; rested case.
ADRIANA. What, arrested? me, suit?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. suit arrested well;
  suit buff 'rested him, tell.
  send him, mistress, redemption, money desk?
ADRIANA. fetch it, sister.  [Exit LUCIANA]  at:
  unknown debt.
  me, arrested band?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. band, stronger thing,
  chain, chain. hear ring?
ADRIANA. What, chain?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. No, no, bell; 'tis time gone.
  ere left him, clock strikes one.
ADRIANA. hours back! hear.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. O yes. hour meet sergeant,
    'a turns back fear.
ADRIANA. Time debt! fondly dost thou reason!
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Time bankrupt, owes
    worth season.
  Nay, thief too: heard men say
  Time stealing night day?
  'a debt theft, sergeant way,
  Hath reason turn back hour day?

Re-enter LUCIANA purse

ADRIANA. Go, Dromio, money; bear straight,
  bring thy master home immediately.
  Come, sister; press'd conceit-
  Conceit, comfort injury.
<Exeunt


SCENE 3

The mart

Enter ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE

ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. man meet doth salute me
  well-acquainted friend;
  doth call name.
  tender money me, invite me,
  give kindnesses,
  offer commodities buy;
  tailor call'd shop,
  show'd silks bought me,
  therewithal measure body.
  Sure, imaginary wiles,
  Lapland sorcerers inhabit here.

Enter DROMIO SYRACUSE

DROMIO SYRACUSE. Master, gold me
  for. What, picture Adam new-apparell'd?
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. gold this? Adam dost thou mean?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Adam Paradise,
  Adam prison; the
  calf's skin kill'd Prodigal; behind
  you, sir, evil angel, bid forsake liberty.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. understand thee not.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. No? Why, 'tis plain case: that
  went, bass-viol, case leather; man, sir,
  that, gentlemen tired, sob, rest
  them; he, sir, takes pity decayed men, give
  suits durance; sets rest more
  exploits mace morris-pike.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. What, thou mean'st officer?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Ay, sir, sergeant band;
  brings man answer breaks band; on
  thinks man bed, 'God give
  good rest!'
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Well, sir, rest foolery. Is
  ship puts to-night? gone?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Why, sir, brought word an
  hour bark Expedition put to-night; and
  hind'red sergeant, tarry the
  boy Delay. angels deliver you.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. fellow distract, I;
  wander illusions.
  blessed power deliver hence!

Enter COURTEZAN

COURTEZAN. met, met, Master Antipholus.
  see, sir, found goldsmith now.
  chain promis'd to-day?
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Satan, avoid! charge thee, tempt not.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Master, Mistress Satan?
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. devil.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Nay, worse, devil's
  dam, habit light wench; and
  thereof wenches 'God damn me!' That's
  'God make light wench!' written
  men angels light; light effect
  fire, fire burn; ergo, light wenches burn.
  her.
COURTEZAN. man marvellous merry, sir.
  me? mend dinner here.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Master, do, expect spoon-meat,
  bespeak long spoon.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Why, Dromio?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Marry, long spoon
  eat devil.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Avoid then, fiend! tell'st thou supping?
  Thou art, all, sorceress;
  conjure thee leave gone.
COURTEZAN. Give ring mine dinner,
  Or, diamond, chain promis'd,
  gone, sir, trouble you.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. devils parings one's nail,
  rush, hair, drop blood, pin,
  nut, cherry-stone;
  she, covetous, chain.
  Master, wise; give her,
  devil shake chain, fright it.
COURTEZAN. pray you, sir, ring, chain;
  hope cheat so.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Avaunt, thou witch! Come, Dromio, go.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. 'Fly pride' peacock. Mistress, know.
<Exeunt ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE DROMIO SYRACUSE
COURTEZAN. Now, doubt, Antipholus mad,
  demean himself.
  ring hath mine worth forty ducats,
  promis'd chain;
  denies now.
  reason gather mad,
  present instance rage,
  mad tale told to-day dinner
  doors shut entrance.
  Belike wife, acquainted fits,
  purpose shut doors way.
  hie home house,
  wife that, lunatic,
  rush'd house perforce
  ring away. fittest choose,
  forty ducats lose.
<Exit


SCENE 4

A street

Enter ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS OFFICER

ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Fear not, man; break away.
  give thee, ere leave thee, money,
  warrant thee, 'rested for.
  wife wayward mood to-day,
  lightly trust messenger.
  attach'd Ephesus,
  'twill sound harshly cars.

Enter DROMIO EPHESUS, rope's-end

  man; brings money.
  now, sir! for?
DROMIO EPHESUS. that, warrant you, pay all.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. money?
DROMIO EPHESUS. Why, sir, gave money rope.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. hundred ducats, villain, rope?
DROMIO EPHESUS. serve you, sir, hundred rate.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. end bid thee hie thee home?
DROMIO EPHESUS. rope's-end, sir; end I
  return'd.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. end, sir, you.
[Beating him]
OFFICER. Good sir, patient.
DROMIO EPHESUS. Nay, 'tis patient; in
  adversity.
OFFICER. Good now, hold thy tongue.
DROMIO EPHESUS. Nay, persuade hold hands.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Thou whoreson, senseless villain!
DROMIO EPHESUS. senseless, sir, I
  feel blows.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Thou art but
  blows, ass.
DROMIO EPHESUS. ass indeed; prove it
  long 'ears. served hour my
  nativity instant, hands for
  service blows. cold heats with
  beating; warm cools beating. am
  wak'd sleep; rais'd sit; driven
  doors home; welcom'd home
  return; nay, bear shoulders as
  beggar wont brat; think, hath lam'd me,
  beg door door.

Enter ADRIANA, LUCIANA, COURTEZAN, SCHOOLMASTER
call'd PINCH

ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Come, along; wife coming yonder.
DROMIO EPHESUS. Mistress, 'respice finem,' respect end; or
  rather, prophesy parrot, 'Beware rope's-end.'
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Wilt thou talk?
[Beating him]
COURTEZAN. now? husband mad?
ADRIANA. incivility confirms less.
  Good Doctor Pinch, conjurer:
  Establish true sense again,
  demand.
LUCIANA. Alas, fiery sharp looks!
COURTEZAN. Mark trembles ecstasy.
PINCH. Give hand, feel pulse.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. hand, feel ear.
[Striking him]
PINCH. charge thee, Satan, hous'd man,
  yield possession holy prayers,
  thy state darkness hie thee straight.
  conjure thee saints heaven.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Peace, doting wizard, peace! mad.
ADRIANA. O, thou wert not, poor distressed soul!
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. minion, you, customers?
  companion saffron face
  Revel feast house to-day,
  Whilst guilty doors shut,
  denied enter house?
ADRIANA. O husband, God doth din'd home,
  remain'd time,
  Free slanders open shame!
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Din'd home! Thou villain, sayest thou?
DROMIO EPHESUS. Sir, Sooth say, dine home.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. doors lock'd shut out?
DROMIO EPHESUS. Perdie, doors lock'd shut out.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. revile there?
DROMIO EPHESUS. Sans fable, revil'd there.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. kitchen-maid rail, taunt, scorn me?
DROMIO EPHESUS. Certes, did; kitchen-vestal scorn'd you.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. rage depart thence?
DROMIO EPHESUS. verity, did. bones bear witness,
  felt vigour rage.
ADRIANA. Is't good soothe contraries?
PINCH. shame; fellow finds vein,
  And, yielding him, humours frenzy.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Thou hast suborn'd goldsmith arrest me.
ADRIANA. Alas, money redeem you,
  Dromio here, haste it.
DROMIO EPHESUS. Money me! Heart goodwill might,
  surely, master, rag money.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Went'st thou purse ducats?
ADRIANA. me, deliver'd it.
LUCIANA. witness did.
DROMIO EPHESUS. God rope-maker bear witness
  rope!
PINCH. Mistress, man master possess'd;
  pale deadly looks.
  bound, laid dark room.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Say, wherefore didst thou lock to-day?
  dost thou deny bag gold?
ADRIANA. not, gentle husband, lock thee forth.
DROMIO EPHESUS. And, gentle master, receiv'd gold;
  confess, sir, lock'd out.
ADRIANA. Dissembling villain, thou speak'st false both.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Dissembling harlot, thou art false all,
  art confederate damned pack
  make loathsome abject scorn me;
  nails pluck false eyes
  behold shameful sport.
ADRIANA. O, bind him, bind him; me.
PINCH. company! fiend strong him.

Enter four, offer bind him. strives

LUCIANA. Ay me, poor man, pale wan looks!
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. What, murder me? Thou gaoler, thou,
  thy prisoner. Wilt thou suffer them
  make rescue?
OFFICER. Masters, go;
  prisoner, him.
PINCH. bind man, frantic too.
[They bind DROMIO]
ADRIANA. wilt thou do, thou peevish officer?
  Hast thou delight wretched man
  outrage displeasure himself?
OFFICER. prisoner; go,
  debt owes requir'd me.
ADRIANA. discharge thee ere thee;
  Bear forthwith creditor,
  And, knowing debt grows, pay it.
  Good Master Doctor, safe convey'd
  Home house. O unhappy day!
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. O unhappy strumpet!
DROMIO EPHESUS. Master, ent'red bond you.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. thee, villian! Wherefore
  dost thou mad me?
DROMIO EPHESUS. bound nothing?
  mad, good master; cry 'The devil!'
LUCIANA. God help, poor souls, idly talk!
ADRIANA. bear hence. Sister, me.
<Exeunt ADRIANA, LUCIANA, OFFICERS, COURTEZAN
  now, suit arrested at?
OFFICER. Angelo, goldsmith; him?
ADRIANA. man. sum owes?
OFFICER. hundred ducats.
ADRIANA. Say, grows due?
OFFICER. Due chain husband him.
ADRIANA. bespeak chain me, not.
COURTEZAN. husband, rage, to-day
  house, ring-
  ring finger now-
  Straight meet chain.
ADRIANA. so, it.
  Come, gaoler, bring goldsmith is;
  long truth hereof large.

Enter ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE, rapier drawn, and
DROMIO SYRACUSE.

LUCIANA. God, thy mercy! loose again.
ADRIANA. naked swords.
  call bound again.
OFFICER. Away, kill us!
<Exeunt ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE and
DROMIO SYRACUSE fast be, frighted
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. witches afraid swords.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. wife ran you.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Centaur; fetch stuff thence.
  long safe sound aboard.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Faith, stay night; will
  surely harm; speak fair, give us
  gold; methinks gentle nation that, for
  mountain mad flesh claims marriage me,
  find heart stay turn witch.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. stay to-night town;
  away, stuff aboard.
<Exeunt

ACT V. SCENE 1

A street priory

Enter MERCHANT ANGELO

ANGELO. sorry, sir, hind'red you;
  protest chain me,
  dishonestly doth deny it.
SECOND MERCHANT. man esteem'd city?
ANGELO. reverend reputation, sir,
  credit infinite, highly belov'd,
  lives city;
  word bear wealth time.
SECOND MERCHANT. Speak softly; yonder, think, walks.

Enter ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE DROMIO SYRACUSE

ANGELO. 'Tis so; chain neck
  forswore monstrously have.
  Good sir, draw me, speak him.
  Signior Andpholus, much
  put shame trouble;
  And, scandal yourself,
  circumstance oaths deny
  chain, wear openly.
  charge, shame, imprisonment,
  wrong honest friend;
  Who, staying controversy,
  hoisted sail put sea to-day.
  chain me; deny it?
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. had; deny it.
SECOND MERCHANT. Yes, did, sir, forswore too.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. heard deny forswear it?
SECOND MERCHANT. ears mine, thou know'st, hear thee.
  Fie thee, wretch! 'tis pity thou liv'st
  walk honest men resort.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Thou art villain impeach thus;
  prove mine honour mine honesty
  thee presently, thou dar'st stand.
SECOND MERCHANT. dare, defy thee villain.
[They draw]

Enter ADRIANA, LUCIANA, COURTEZAN, OTHERS

ADRIANA. Hold, hurt not, God's sake! mad.
  him, sword away;
  Bind Dromio too, bear house.
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Run, master, run; God's sake house.
  priory. In, spoil'd.
<Exeunt ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE DROMIO SYRACUSE priory

Enter LADY ABBESS

ABBESS. quiet, people. Wherefore throng hither?
ADRIANA. fetch poor distracted husband hence.
  in, bind fast,
  bear home recovery.
ANGELO. knew perfect wits.
SECOND MERCHANT. draw him.
ABBESS. long hath possession held man?
ADRIANA. week hath heavy, sour, sad,
  man was;
  till afternoon passion
  Ne'er brake extremity rage.
ABBESS. Hath lost wealth wreck sea?
  Buried dear friend? Hath eye
  Stray'd affection unlawful love?
  sin prevailing youthful men
  give eyes liberty gazing.
  sorrows subject to?
ADRIANA. these, last;
  Namely, love drew oft home.
ABBESS. reprehended him.
ADRIANA. Why, did.
ABBESS. Ay, rough enough.
ADRIANA. roughly modesty me.
ABBESS. Haply private.
ADRIANA. assemblies too.
ABBESS. Ay, enough.
ADRIANA. copy conference.
  bed, slept urging it;
  board, fed urging it;
  Alone, subject theme;
  company, glanced it;
  vile bad.
ABBESS. thereof man mad.
  venom clamours jealous woman
  Poisons deadly mad dog's tooth.
  sleeps hind'red thy railing,
  thereof head light.
  Thou say'st meat sauc'd thy upbraidings:
  Unquiet meals make ill digestions;
  Thereof raging fire fever bred;
  fever fit madness?
  Thou say'st sports hind'red thy brawls.
  Sweet recreation barr'd, doth ensue
  moody dull melancholy,
  Kinsman grim comfortless despair,
  heels huge infectious troop
  pale distemperatures foes life?
  food, sport, life-preserving rest,
  disturb'd mad man beast.
  consequence is, then, thy jealous fits
  Hath scar'd thy husband wits.
LUCIANA. reprehended mildly,
  demean'd rough, rude, wildly.
  bear rebukes, answer not?
ADRIANA. betray reproof.
  Good people, enter, lay hold him.
ABBESS. No, creature enters house.
ADRIANA. servants bring husband forth.
ABBESS. Neither; place sanctuary,
  privilege hands
  Till brought wits again,
  lose labour assaying it.
ADRIANA. attend husband, nurse,
  Diet sickness, office,
  attorney myself;
  home me.
ABBESS. patient; stir
  Till us'd approved means have,
  wholesome syrups, drugs, holy prayers,
  make formal man again.
  branch parcel mine oath,
  charitable duty order;
  depart, leave me.
ADRIANA. leave husband here;
  ill doth beseem holiness
  separate husband wife.
ABBESS. quiet, depart; thou shalt him.
<Exit
LUCIANA. Complain Duke indignity.
ADRIANA. Come, go; fall prostrate feet,
  rise tears prayers
  won Grace person hither
  perforce husband Abbess.
SECOND MERCHANT. this, think, dial points five;
  Anon, sure, Duke person
  melancholy vale,
  place death execution,
  ditches abbey here.
ANGELO. cause?
SECOND MERCHANT. reverend Syracusian merchant,
  put unluckily bay
  laws statutes town,
  Beheaded publicly offence.
ANGELO. come; behold death.
LUCIANA. Kneel Duke pass abbey.

Enter DUKE, attended; AEGEON, bareheaded;
with HEADSMAN OFFICERS

DUKE. proclaim publicly,
  friend pay sum him,
  die; tender him.
ADRIANA. Justice, sacred Duke, Abbess!
DUKE. virtuous reverend lady;
  hath thee wrong.
ADRIANA. Grace, Antipholus, husband,
  made lord had
  important letters-this ill day
  outrageous fit madness him,
  desp'rately hurried street,
  bondman mad he,
  displeasure citizens
  rushing houses, bearing thence
  Rings, jewels, rage like.
  bound home,
  Whilst order wrongs went,
  fury committed.
  Anon, wot strong escape,
  broke guard him,
  mad attendant himself,
  ireful passion, drawn swords,
  Met and, madly bent us,
  Chas'd away; till, raising aid,
  bind them. fled
  abbey, pursu'd them;
  Abbess shuts gates us,
  suffer fetch out,
  send bear hence.
  Therefore, gracious Duke, thy command
  brought borne help.
DUKE. Long thy husband serv'd wars,
  thee engag'd prince's word,
  thou didst make master thy bed,
  grace good could.
  Go, you, knock abbey gate,
  bid Lady Abbess me,
  determine stir.

Enter MESSENGER

MESSENGER. O mistress, mistress, shift save yourself!
  master man broke loose,
  Beaten maids a-row bound doctor,
  beard sing'd brands fire;
  ever, blaz'd, threw him
  Great pails puddled mire quench hair.
  master preaches patience him, while
  man scissors nicks fool;
  sure, send present help,
  kill conjurer.
ADRIANA. Peace, fool! thy master man here,
  false thou dost report us.
MESSENGER. Mistress, life, true;
  breath'd it.
  cries you, vows, you,
  scorch face, disfigure you.
[Cry within]
  Hark, hark, hear him, mistress; fly, gone!
DUKE. Come, stand me; fear nothing. Guard halberds.
ADRIANA. Ay me, husband! Witness you
  borne invisible.
  hous'd abbey here,
  there, past thought human reason.

Enter ANTIPHOLUS OFEPHESUS DROMIO OFEPHESUS

ANTIPHOLUS OFEPHESUS. Justice, gracious Duke; O, grant justice!
  service long thee,
  bestrid thee wars, took
  Deep scars save thy life; blood
  lost thee, grant justice.
AEGEON. fear death doth make dote,
  son Antipholus, Dromio.
ANTIPHOLUS OFEPHESUS. Justice, sweet Prince, woman there!
  thou gav'st wife,
  hath abused dishonoured me
  strength height injury.
  imagination wrong
  day hath shameless thrown me.
DUKE. Discover how, thou shalt find just.
ANTIPHOLUS OFEPHESUS. day, great Duke, shut doors me,
  harlots feasted house.
DUKE. grievous fault. Say, woman, didst thou so?
ADRIANA. No, good lord. Myself, he, sister,
  To-day dine together. befall soul
  false burdens withal!
LUCIANA. Ne'er day sleep night
  tells Highness simple truth!
ANGELO. O peflur'd woman! forsworn.
  madman justly chargeth them.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. liege, advised say;
  disturbed effect wine,
  heady-rash, provok'd raging ire,
  Albeit wrongs make wiser mad.
  woman lock'd day dinner;
  goldsmith there, pack'd her,
  witness it, then;
  parted fetch chain,
  Promising bring Porpentine,
  Balthazar dine together.
  dinner done, coming thither,
  seek him. street met him,
  company gentleman.
  perjur'd goldsmith swear down
  day receiv'd chain,
  Which, God knows, not; which
  arrest officer.
  obey, peasant home
  ducats; return'd.
  fairly bespoke officer
  person house.
  th' met wife, sister, rabble more
  vile confederates. them
  brought Pinch, hungry lean-fac'd villain,
  mere anatomy, mountebank,
  threadbare juggler, fortune-teller,
  needy, hollow-ey'd, sharp-looking wretch,
  living dead man. pernicious slave,
  Forsooth, conjurer,
  gazing mine eyes, feeling pulse,
  face, 'twere, outfacing me,
  Cries possess'd. together
  fell me, bound me, bore thence,
  dark dankish vault home
  left man, bound together;
  Till, gnawing teeth bonds sunder,
  gain'd freedom, immediately
  Ran Grace; beseech
  give ample satisfaction
  deep shames great indignities.
ANGELO. lord, truth, witness him,
  din'd home, lock'd out.
DUKE. chain thee, no?
ANGELO. had, lord, ran here,
  people chain neck.
SECOND MERCHANT. Besides, sworn ears mine
  Heard confess chain him,
  forswore mart;
  drew sword you,
  fled abbey here,
  whence, think, miracle.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. abbey walls,
  didst thou draw thy sword me;
  chain, Heaven!
  false burden withal.
DUKE. Why, intricate impeach this!
  drunk Circe's cup.
  hous'd him, been;
  mad, plead coldly.
  din'd home: goldsmith here
  Denies saying. Sirrah, you?
DROMIO EPHESUS. Sir, din'd there, Porpentine.
COURTEZAN. did; finger snatch'd ring.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. 'Tis true, liege; ring her.
DUKE. Saw'st thou enter abbey here?
COURTEZAN. sure, liege, Grace.
DUKE. Why, strange. call Abbess hither.
  mated stark mad.
<Exit ABBESS
AEGEON. mighty Duke, vouchsafe speak word:
  Haply friend save life
  pay sum deliver me.
DUKE. Speak freely, Syracusian, thou wilt.
AEGEON. name, sir, call'd Antipholus?
  bondman Dromio?
DROMIO EPHESUS. hour bondman, sir,
  he, him, gnaw'd cords
  Dromio man unbound.
AEGEON. remember me.
DROMIO EPHESUS. remember, sir, you;
  bound now.
  Pinch's patient, you, sir?
AEGEON. strange me? well.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. life till now.
AEGEON. O! grief hath chang'd last;
  careful hours time's deformed hand
  written strange defeatures face.
  yet, dost thou voice?
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Neither.
AEGEON. Dromio, thou?
DROMIO EPHESUS. No, trust me, sir, I.
AEGEON. thou dost.
DROMIO EPHESUS. Ay, sir, not; and
  whatsoever man denies, bound him.
AEGEON. voice! O time's extremity,
  Hast thou crack'd splitted poor tongue
  short years son
  feeble key untun'd cares?
  grained face mine hid
  sap-consuming winter's drizzled snow,
  conduits blood froze up,
  hath night life memory,
  wasting lamps fading glimmer left,
  dull deaf ears hear;
  witnesses-I err-
  thou art son Antipholus.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. father life.
AEGEON. years since, Syracuse, boy,
  Thou know'st parted; perhaps, son,
  Thou sham'st acknowledge misery.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Duke in
  city witness so:
  ne'er Syracuse life.
DUKE. thee, Syracusian, twenty years
  patron Antipholus,
  time ne'er Syracuse.
  thy age dangers make thee dote.

Re-enter ABBESS, ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE DROMIO SYRACUSE

ABBESS. mighty Duke, behold man wrong'd.
[All gather them]
ADRIANA. husbands, mine eyes deceive me.
DUKE. men genius other;
  these. natural man,
  spirit? deciphers them?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. I, sir, Dromio; command away.
DROMIO EPHESUS. I, Sir, Dromio; pray stay.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. Aegeon, art thou not? his
DROMIO SYRACUSE. O, master! hath bound
ABBESS. bound him, loose bonds,
  gain husband liberty.
  Speak, Aegeon, thou be'st man
  hadst wife call'd Aemilia,
  bore thee burden fair sons.
  O, thou be'st Aegeon, speak,
  speak Aemilia!
AEGEON. dream not, thou art Aemilia.
  thou art she, son
  floated thee fatal raft?
ABBESS. men Epidamnum I
  twin Dromio, up;
  rude fishermen Corinth
  force Dromio son them,
  left Epidamnum.
  tell;
  fortune in.
DUKE. Why, begins morning story right.
  Antipholus', like,
  Dromios, semblance-
  urging wreck sea-
  parents children,
  accidentally met together.
  Antipholus, thou cam'st Corinth first?
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. No, sir, I; Syracuse.
DUKE. Stay, stand apart; which.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Corinth, gracious lord.
DROMIO EPHESUS. him.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Brought town famous warrior,
  Duke Menaphon, renowned uncle.
ADRIANA. dine to-day?
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. I, gentle mistress.
ADRIANA. husband?
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. No; nay that.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. I, call so;
  fair gentlewoman, sister here,
  call brother.  [To LUCIANA]  told then,
  hope leisure make good;
  dream hear.
ANGELO. chain, sir, me.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. be, sir; deny not.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. you, sir, chain arrested me.
ANGELO. did, sir; deny not.
ADRIANA. money, sir, bail,
  Dromio; brought not.
DROMIO EPHESUS. No, me.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. purse ducats receiv'd you,
  Dromio man bring me.
  meet other's man,
  ta'en him, me,
  ERRORS arose.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. ducats pawn father here.
DUKE. need; thy father hath life.
COURTEZAN. Sir, diamond you.
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. There, it; my
  good cheer.
ABBESS. Renowned Duke, vouchsafe pains
  abbey here,
  hear large discoursed fortunes;
  assembled place
  sympathized day's error
  suffer'd wrong, company,
  make full satisfaction.
  Thirty-three years travail
  you, sons; till present hour
  heavy burden ne'er delivered.
  Duke, husband, children both,
  calendars nativity,
  gossips' feast, me;
  long grief, nativity!
DUKE. heart, gossip feast.
<Exeunt ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE, ANTIPHOLUS OF
EPHESUS, DROMIO SYRACUSE, DROMIO EPHESUS
DROMIO SYRACUSE. Master, fetch stuff shipboard?
ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS. Dromio, stuff mine hast thou embark'd?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. goods lay host, sir, Centaur.
ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE. speaks me. master, Dromio.
  Come, us; anon.
  Embrace thy brother there; rejoice him.
<Exeunt ANTIPHOLUS SYRACUSE ANTIPHOLUS EPHESUS
DROMIO SYRACUSE. fat friend master's house,
  kitchen'd to-day dinner;
  sister, wife.
DROMIO EPHESUS. Methinks glass, brother;
  sweet-fac'd youth.
  walk gossiping?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. I, sir; elder.
DROMIO EPHESUS. question; it?
DROMIO SYRACUSE. draw cuts senior; till then,
    lead thou first.
DROMIO EPHESUS. Nay, then, thus:
  world brother brother,
  hand hand, another.
<Exeunt


THE END

1608

THE TRAGEDY CORIOLANUS

by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  CAIUS MARCIUS, CAIUS MARCIUS CORIOLANUS

    Generals Volscians
  TITUS LARTIUS
  COMINIUS

  MENENIUS AGRIPPA, friend Coriolanus

    Tribunes People
  SICINIUS VELUTUS
  JUNIUS BRUTUS

  YOUNG MARCIUS, son Coriolanus
  ROMAN HERALD
  NICANOR, Roman
  TULLUS AUFIDIUS, General Volscians
  LIEUTENANT, Aufidius
  CONSPIRATORS, Aufidius
  ADRIAN, Volscian
  CITIZEN Antium  
  VOLSCIAN GUARDS

  VOLUMNIA, mother Coriolanus
  VIRGILIA, wife Coriolanus
  VALERIA, friend Virgilia
  GENTLEWOMAN attending Virgilia

  Roman Volscian Senators, Patricians, Aediles, Lictors,
    Soldiers, Citizens, Messengers, Servants Aufidius, other
    Attendants

SCENE:
Rome neighbourhood; Corioli neighbourhood; Antium



ACT I. SCENE I.
Rome. street

Enter company mutinous citizens, staves, clubs, weapons

  CITIZEN. proceed further, hear speak.
  ALL. Speak, speak.
  CITIZEN. resolv'd die famish?
  ALL. Resolv'd, resolv'd.
  CITIZEN. First, Caius Marcius chief enemy the
    people.
  ALL. know't, know't.
  CITIZEN. kill him, corn own
    price. Is't verdict?
  ALL. talking on't; done. Away, away!
  CITIZEN. word, good citizens.
  CITIZEN. accounted poor citizens, patricians good.
    authority surfeits relieve us; yield
    superfluity wholesome, guess
    relieved humanely; dear. The
    leanness afflicts us, object misery,  
    inventory particularize abundance; sufferance a
    gain them. revenge pikes ere become
    rakes; gods speak hunger bread, in
    thirst revenge.
  CITIZEN. proceed Caius Marcius?
  CITIZEN. first; dog the
    commonalty.
  CITIZEN. services his
    country?
  CITIZEN. well, content give good
    report for't pays proud.
  CITIZEN. Nay, speak maliciously.
  CITIZEN. you, hath famously it
    end; soft-conscienc'd men content it
    country, mother be
    partly proud, is, altitude virtue.
  CITIZEN. nature account a
    vice him. covetous.
  CITIZEN. not, barren accusations;
    hath faults, surplus, tire repetition.  [Shouts  
    within]  shouts these? side o' th' city is
    risen. stay prating here? th' Capitol!
  ALL. Come, come.
  CITIZEN. Soft! here?

                       Enter MENENIUS AGRIPPA

  CITIZEN. Worthy Menenius Agrippa; hath lov'd
    people.
  CITIZEN. honest enough; rest so!
  MENENIUS. work's, countrymen, hand? you
    bats clubs? matter? Speak, pray you.
  CITIZEN. business unknown th' Senate; have
    inkling fortnight intend do, we'll
    show 'em deeds. poor suitors strong breaths;
    strong arms too.
  MENENIUS. Why, masters, good friends, mine honest neighbours,
    undo yourselves?
  CITIZEN. cannot, sir; undone already.
  MENENIUS. you, friends, charitable care  
    patricians you. wants,
    suffering dearth, well
    Strike heaven staves lift them
    Roman state; on
    takes, cracking ten thousand curbs
    strong link asunder ever
    impediment. dearth,
    gods, patricians, make it, and
    knees them, arms, help. Alack,
    transported calamity
    Thither attends you; slander
    helms o' th' state, care fathers,
    curse enemies.
  CITIZEN. Care us! True, indeed! ne'er car'd us
    yet. Suffer famish, storehouses cramm'd with
    grain; make edicts usury, support usurers; repeal daily
    wholesome act established rich, provide more
    piercing statutes daily chain restrain poor. the
    wars eat up, will; love bear
    us.  
  MENENIUS. must
    Confess wondrous malicious,
    accus'd folly. you
    pretty tale. heard it;
    But, serves purpose, venture
    stale't more.
  CITIZEN. Well, hear it, sir; to
    fob disgrace tale. But, an't you, deliver.
  MENENIUS. time body's members
    Rebell'd belly; accus'd it:
    gulf remain
    I' th' midst o' th' body, idle unactive,
    cupboarding viand, bearing
    labour rest; th' instruments
    hear, devise, instruct, walk, feel,
    And, mutually participate, minister
    appetite affection common
    body. belly answer'd-
  CITIZEN. Well, sir, answer made belly?
  MENENIUS. Sir, you. kind smile,  
    ne'er lungs, thus-
    you, make belly smile
    speak- tauntingly replied
    th' discontented members, mutinous parts
    envied receipt; fitly
    malign senators that
    you.
  CITIZEN. belly's answer- What?
    kingly crowned head, vigilant eye,
    counsellor heart, arm soldier,
    steed leg, tongue trumpeter,
    muniments petty helps
    fabric, they-
  MENENIUS. then?
    Fore me, fellow speaks! then? then?
  CITIZEN. cormorant belly restrain'd,
    sink o' th' body-
  MENENIUS. Well, then?
  CITIZEN. agents, complain,
    belly answer?  
  MENENIUS. you;
    bestow small- little-
    Patience awhile, you'st hear belly's answer.
  CITIZEN. Y'are long it.
  MENENIUS. Note this, good friend:
    grave belly deliberate,
    rash accusers, answered.
    'True it, incorporate friends,' quoth he
    'That receive general food first
    live upon; fit is,
    storehouse shop
    body. But, remember,
    send rivers blood,
    court, heart, th' seat o' th' brain;
    And, cranks offices man,
    strongest nerves small inferior veins
    receive natural competency
    live. once
    You, good friends'- belly; mark me.
  CITIZEN. Ay, sir; well, well.  
  MENENIUS. 'Though cannot
    deliver each,
    make audit up, all
    back receive flour all,
    leave bran.' to' t?
  CITIZEN. answer. apply this?
  MENENIUS. senators Rome good belly,
    mutinous members; for, examine
    counsels cares, digest things rightly
    Touching weal o' th' common, find
    public benefit receive
    proceeds you,
    yourselves. think,
    You, great toe assembly?
  CITIZEN. great toe? great toe?
  MENENIUS. that, o' th' lowest, basest, poorest,
    wise rebellion, thou goest foremost.
    Thou rascal, art worst blood run,
    Lead'st win vantage.
    make ready stiff bats clubs.  
    Rome rats point battle;
    side bale.

                      Enter CAIUS MARCIUS

    Hail, noble Marcius!
  MARCIUS. Thanks. matter, dissentious rogues
    That, rubbing poor itch opinion,
    Make scabs?
  CITIZEN. good word.
  MARCIUS. give good words thee flatter
    Beneath abhorring. have, curs,
    peace war? affrights you,
    makes proud. trusts you,
    find lions, finds hares;
    foxes, geese; surer, no,
    coal fire ice
    hailstone sun. virtue is
    make worthy offence subdues him,
    curse justice it. deserves greatness  
    Deserves hate; affections are
    sick man's appetite, desires that
    increase evil. depends
    favours swims fins lead,
    hews oaks rushes. Hang ye! Trust ye?
    minute change mind
    call noble hate,
    vile garland. matter
    places city
    cry noble Senate, who,
    gods, awe, else
    feed another? seeking?
  MENENIUS. corn rates, whereof say
    city stor'd.
  MARCIUS. Hang 'em! say!
    sit th' fire presume know
    i' th' Capitol, rise,
    thrives declines; side factions, give out
    Conjectural marriages, making parties strong,
    feebling stand liking  
    cobbled shoes. grain enough!
    nobility lay ruth
    sword, make quarry
    thousands quarter'd slaves, high
    pick lance.
  MENENIUS. Nay, persuaded;
    abundantly lack discretion,
    passing cowardly. But, beseech you,
    troop?
  MARCIUS. dissolv'd. Hang 'em!
    an-hungry; sigh'd proverbs-
    hunger broke stone walls, dogs eat,
    meat made mouths, gods not
    Corn rich men only. shreds
    vented complainings; answer'd,
    petition granted them- strange one,
    break heart generosity
    make bold power pale- threw caps
    hang horns o' th' moon,
    Shouting emulation.  
  MENENIUS. granted them?
  MARCIUS. tribunes, defend vulgar wisdoms,
    choice. One's Junius Brutus-
    Sicinius Velutus, not. 'Sdeath!
    rabble unroof'd city
    Ere prevail'd me; time
    Win power throw greater themes
    insurrection's arguing.
  MENENIUS. strange.
  MARCIUS. home, fragments.

                     Enter MESSENGER, hastily

  MESSENGER. Caius Marcius?
  MARCIUS. Here. matter?
  MESSENGER. news is, sir, Volsces arms.
  MARCIUS. glad on't; ha' means vent
    musty superfluity. See, elders.

         Enter COMINIUS, TITUS LARTIUS, SENATORS;  
                  JUNIUS BRUTUS SICINIUS VELUTUS

  SENATOR. Marcius, 'tis true told us:
    Volsces arms.
  MARCIUS. leader,
    Tullus Aufidius, put to't.
    sin envying nobility;
    am,
    he.
  COMINIUS. fought together?
  MARCIUS. half half world th' ears, he
    party, revolt, make
    wars him. lion
    proud hunt.
  SENATOR. Then, worthy Marcius,
    Attend Cominius wars.
  COMINIUS. promise.
  MARCIUS. Sir, is;
    constant. Titus Lartius, thou
    Shalt strike Tullus' face.  
    What, art thou stiff? Stand'st out?
  LARTIUS. No, Caius Marcius;
    lean crutch fight t'other
    Ere stay business.
  MENENIUS. O, true bred!
  SENATOR. company th' Capitol; where, know,
    greatest friends attend us.
  LARTIUS.  [To COMINIUS]  Lead on.
    [To MARCIUS]  Follow Cominius; follow you;
    worthy priority.
  COMINIUS. Noble Marcius!
  SENATOR.  [To Citizens]  homes; gone.
  MARCIUS. Nay, follow.
    Volsces corn: rats thither
    gnaw garners. Worshipful mutineers,
    valour puts forth; pray follow.
         Ciitzens steal away. Exeunt SICINIUS BRUTUS
  SICINIUS. man proud Marcius?
  BRUTUS. equal.
  SICINIUS. chosen tribunes people-  
  BRUTUS. Mark'd lip eyes?
  SICINIUS. Nay, taunts!
  BRUTUS. mov'd, spare gird gods.
  SICINIUS. Bemock modest moon.
  BRUTUS. present wars devour him! grown
    proud valiant.
  SICINIUS. nature,
    Tickled good success, disdains shadow
    treads noon. wonder
    insolence brook commanded
    Cominius.
  BRUTUS. Fame, aims-
    grac'd- cannot
    held attain'd by
    place first; miscarries
    general's fault, perform
    th' utmost man, giddy censure
    cry Marcius 'O, he
    borne business!'
  SICINIUS. Besides, things well,  
    Opinion, sticks Marcius, shall
    demerits rob Cominius.
  BRUTUS. Come.
    Half Cominius' honours Marcius,
    Marcius earn'd not; faults
    Marcius honours, indeed
    aught merit not.
  SICINIUS. hear
    dispatch made, fashion,
    singularity, goes
    present action.
  BRUTUS. along.                                    Exeunt




SCENE II.
Corioli. Senate House.

Enter TULLUS AUFIDIUS SENATORS Corioli

  SENATOR. So, opinion is, Aufidius,
    Rome ent'red counsels
    proceed.
  AUFIDIUS. yours?
    thought state
    brought bodily act ere Rome
    circumvention? 'Tis days gone
    heard thence; words- think
    letter here;.yes, is:
    [Reads]  'They press'd power, known
    east west. dearth great;
    people mutinous; rumour'd,
    Cominius, Marcius enemy,
    Rome worse hated you,
    Titus Lartius, valiant Roman,
    lead preparation
    'tis bent. 'tis you;  
    it.'
  SENATOR. army's field;
    made doubt Rome ready
    answer us.
  AUFIDIUS. folly
    great pretences veil'd till when
    show themselves; hatching,
    seem'd, appear'd Rome. discovery
    short'ned aim, was
    towns ere Rome
    afoot.
  SENATOR. Noble Aufidius,
    commission; hie bands;
    guard Corioli.
    set before's, remove
    Bring army; find
    Th' prepar'd us.
  AUFIDIUS. O, doubt that!
    speak certainties. Nay more,
    parcels power already,  
    hitherward. leave honours.
    Caius Marcius chance meet,
    'Tis sworn strike
    Till more.
  ALL. gods assist you!
  AUFIDIUS. honours safe!
  SENATOR. Farewell.
  SENATOR. Farewell.
  ALL. Farewell.                                           Exeunt




SCENE III.
Rome. MARCIUS' house

Enter VOLUMNIA VIRGILIA, mother wife MARCIUS;
they set low stools sew

  VOLUMNIA. pray you, daughter, sing, express more
    comfortable sort. son husband, freelier
    rejoice absence won honour the
    embracements bed show love. yet
    tender-bodied, son womb; youth
    comeliness pluck'd gaze way; when, day of
    kings' entreaties, mother sell hour her
    beholding; I, honour person-
    picture-like hang th' wall, if
    renown made stir- pleas'd seek danger where
    find fame. cruel war him, he
    return'd brows bound oak. thee, daughter, I
    sprang joy hearing man-child than
    proved man.
  VIRGILIA. died business, madam, then?
  VOLUMNIA. good report son;  
    found issue. Hear profess sincerely: dozen
    sons, love alike, dear thine my
    good Marcius, eleven die nobly country
    voluptuously surfeit action.

                        Enter GENTLEWOMAN

  GENTLEWOMAN. Madam, Lady Valeria visit you.
  VIRGILIA. Beseech give leave retire myself.
  VOLUMNIA. not.
    Methinks hear husband's drum;
    pluck Aufidius th' hair;
    children bear, Volsces shunning him.
    Methinks stamp thus, call thus:
    'Come on, cowards! fear,
    born Rome.' bloody brow
    mail'd hand wiping, goes,
    harvest-man task'd mow
    lose hire.
  VIRGILIA. bloody brow? O Jupiter, blood!  
  VOLUMNIA. Away, fool! man
    gilt trophy. breasts Hecuba,
    suckle Hector, look'd lovelier
    Hector's forehead spit blood
    Grecian sword, contemning. Valeria
    fit bid welcome.              Exit GENTLEWOMAN
  VIRGILIA. Heavens bless lord fell Aufidius!
  VOLUMNIA. beat Aufidius' head knee
    tread neck.

         Re-enter GENTLEWOMAN, VALERIA usher

  VALERIA. ladies both, good day you.
  VOLUMNIA. Sweet madam!
  VIRGILIA. glad ladyship.
  VALERIA. both? manifest housekeepers. are
    sewing here? fine spot, good faith. little
    son?
  VIRGILIA. ladyship; well, good madam.
  VOLUMNIA. swords hear drum  
    schoolmaster.
  VALERIA. O' word, father's son! swear 'tis very
    pretty boy. O' troth, look'd Wednesday half an
    hour together; confirm'd countenance! run
    gilded butterfly; caught go
    again, again, comes, up
    again, catch'd again; fall enrag'd him, how
    'twas, set teeth tear it. O, warrant, he
    mammock'd it!
  VOLUMNIA. on's father's moods.
  VALERIA. Indeed, la, 'tis noble child.
  VIRGILIA. crack, madam.
  VALERIA. Come, lay stitchery; play the
    idle huswife afternoon.
  VIRGILIA. No, good madam; doors.
  VALERIA. doors!
  VOLUMNIA. shall, shall.
  VIRGILIA. Indeed, no, patience; threshold
    till lord return wars.
  VALERIA. Fie, confine unreasonably; come,  
    visit good lady lies in.
  VIRGILIA. speedy strength, visit my
    prayers; thither.
  VOLUMNIA. Why, pray you?
  VIRGILIA. 'Tis save labour, love.
  VALERIA. Penelope; yarn
    spun Ulysses' absence fill Ithaca full moths.
    Come, cambric finger, you
    leave pricking pity. Come, us.
  VIRGILIA. No, good madam, pardon me; forth.
  VALERIA. truth, la, me; excellent news
    husband.
  VIRGILIA. O, good madam, yet.
  VALERIA. Verily, jest you; news him
    night.
  VIRGILIA. Indeed, madam?
  VALERIA. earnest, true; heard senator speak it. it
    is: Volsces army forth; Cominius the
    general gone, part Roman power. lord and
    Titus Lartius set city Corioli;  
    doubt prevailing make wars. true,
    mine honour; so, pray, us.
  VIRGILIA. Give excuse, good madam; obey everything
    hereafter.
  VOLUMNIA. alone, lady; now, disease
    mirth.
  VALERIA. troth, would. Fare well, then. Come,
    good sweet lady. Prithee, Virgilia, turn thy solemness o'
    door us.
  VIRGILIA. No, word, madam; not. much
    mirth.
  VALERIA. then, farewell.                           Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Before Corioli

Enter MARCIUS, TITUS LARTIUS, drum colours,
with CAPTAINS soldiers. MESSENGER

  MARCIUS. Yonder news; wager- met.
  LARTIUS. horse yours- no.
  MARCIUS. 'Tis done.
  LARTIUS. Agreed.
  MARCIUS. Say, general met enemy?
  MESSENGER. lie view, spoke yet.
  LARTIUS. So, good horse mine.
  MARCIUS. buy you.
  LARTIUS. No, sell give him; lend will
    half hundred years. Summon town.
  MARCIUS. lie armies?
  MESSENGER. mile half.
  MARCIUS. hear 'larum, ours.
    Now, Mars, prithee, make quick work,
    smoking swords march hence
    fielded friends! Come, blow thy blast.  

          sound parley. Enter SENATORS others,
                      walls Corioli

    Tullus Aufidius, walls?
  SENATOR. No, man fears he:
    lesser little.  [Drum afar off]  Hark, drums
    bringing youth. break walls
    pound up; gates,
    shut, pinn'd rushes;
    open themselves.  [Alarum off]  Hark off!
    Aufidius. List work makes
    cloven army.
  MARCIUS. O, it!
  LARTIUS. noise instruction. Ladders, ho!

                   Enter army Volsces

  MARCIUS. fear not, issue city.
    put shields hearts, fight  
    hearts proof shields. Advance, brave Titus.
    disdain thoughts,
    makes sweat wrath. on, fellows.
    retires, Volsce,
    feel mine edge.

          Alarum. Romans beat back trenches.
                      Re-enter MARCIUS, cursing

  MARCIUS. contagion south light you,
    shames Rome! herd of- Boils plagues
    Plaster o'er, abhorr'd
    Farther seen, infect another
    wind mile! souls geese
    bear shapes men, run
    slaves apes beat! Pluto hell!
    hurt behind! Backs red, faces pale
    flight agued fear! Mend charge home,
    Or, fires heaven, leave foe
    make wars you. to't. on;  
    stand fast beat wives,
    trenches. Follow me.

         alarum. Volsces fly, MARCIUS follows
                          gates

    So, gates ope; prove good seconds;
    'Tis followers fortune widens them,
    fliers. Mark me, like.

                    [MARCIUS enters gates]

  SOLDIER. Fool-hardiness; I.
  SOLDIER. I.                    [MARCIUS shut in]
  SOLDIER. See, shut in.
  ALL. th' pot, warrant him.             [Alarum continues]

                      Re-enter TITUS LARTIUS

  LARTIUS. Marcius?  
  ALL. Slain, sir, doubtless.
  SOLDIER. fliers heels,
    enters; who, sudden,
    Clapp'd gates. alone,
    answer city.
  LARTIUS. O noble fellow!
    sensibly outdares senseless sword,
    bows stand'st up. Thou art left, Marcius;
    carbuncle entire, big thou art,
    rich jewel. Thou wast soldier
    Cato's wish, fierce terrible
    strokes; thy grim and
    thunder-like percussion thy sounds
    Thou mad'st thine enemies shake, world
    feverous tremble.

          Re-enter MARCIUS, bleeding, assaulted enemy

  SOLDIER. Look, sir.
  LARTIUS. O, 'tis Marcius!  
    fetch off, make remain alike.
                            [They fight, enter city]




SCENE V.
Within Corioli. street

Enter Romans, spoils

  ROMAN. carry Rome.
  ROMAN. this.
  ROMAN. murrain 't! silver.
                               [Alarum continues afar off]

          Enter MARCIUS TITUS LARTIUS trumpeter

  MARCIUS. movers prize hours
    crack'd drachma! Cushions, leaden spoons,
    Irons doit, doublets hangmen would
    Bury wore them, base slaves,
    Ere fight done, pack up. them!
                                                Exeunt pillagers
    hark, noise general makes! him!
    man soul's hate, Aufidius,
    Piercing Romans; then, valiant Titus, take
    Convenient numbers make good city;  
    Whilst I, spirit, haste
    Cominius.
  LARTIUS. Worthy sir, thou bleed'st;
    Thy exercise hath violent
    fight.
  MARCIUS. Sir, praise not;
    work hath warm'd me. Fare well;
    blood drop physical
    dangerous me. Aufidius thus
    appear, fight.
  LARTIUS. fair goddess, Fortune,
    Fall deep love thee, great charms
    Misguide thy opposers' swords! Bold gentleman,
    Prosperity thy page!
  MARCIUS. Thy friend less
    placeth highest! farewell.
  LARTIUS. Thou worthiest Marcius!                  Exit MARCIUS
    sound thy trumpet market-place;
    Call thither officers o' th' town,
    mind. Away!                 Exeunt




SCENE VI.
Near camp COMINIUS

Enter COMINIUS, retire, soldiers

  COMINIUS. Breathe you, friends. fought; off
    Romans, foolish stands
    cowardly retire. me, sirs,
    charg'd again. Whiles struck,
    interims conveying gusts heard
    charges friends. Roman gods,
    Lead successes own,
    powers, smiling fronts encount'ring,
    give thankful sacrifice!

                         Enter MESSENGER

    Thy news?
  MESSENGER. citizens Corioli issued
    Lartius Marcius battle;
    party trenches driven,
    away.  
  COMINIUS. thou speak'st truth,
    Methinks thou speak'st well. long is't since?
  MESSENGER. hour, lord.
  COMINIUS. 'Tis mile; briefly heard drums.
    couldst thou mile confound hour,
    bring thy news late?
  MESSENGER. Spies Volsces
    Held chase, forc'd wheel
    miles about; I, sir,
    Half hour brought report.

                           Enter MARCIUS

  COMINIUS. yonder
    flay'd? O gods!
    stamp Marcius, have
    Before-time thus.
  MARCIUS. late?
  COMINIUS. shepherd thunder tabor
    sound Marcius' tongue  
    meaner man.
  MARCIUS. late?
  COMINIUS. Ay, blood others,
    mantled own.
  MARCIUS. O! clip ye
    arms sound woo'd, heart
    merry nuptial day done,
    tapers burn'd bedward.
  COMINIUS. Flower warriors,
    is't Titus Lartius?
  MARCIUS. man busied decrees:
    Condemning death exile;
    Ransoming pitying, threat'ning th' other;
    Holding Corioli Rome
    fawning greyhound leash,
    slip will.
  COMINIUS. slave
    told beat trenches?
    he? Call hither.
  MARCIUS. alone;  
    inform truth. gentlemen,
    common file- plague! tribunes them!
    mouse ne'er shunn'd cat budge
    rascals worse they.
  COMINIUS. prevail'd you?
  MARCIUS. time serve tell? think.
    enemy? lords o' th' field?
    not, cease till so?
  COMINIUS. Marcius,
    disadvantage fought, did
    Retire win purpose.
  MARCIUS. lies battle? side
    plac'd men trust?
  COMINIUS. guess, Marcius,
    bands i' th' vaward Antiates,
    trust; o'er Aufidius,
    heart hope.
  MARCIUS. beseech you,
    battles fought,
    th' blood shed together, th' vows  
    made endure friends, directly
    Set Aufidius Antiates;
    delay present, but,
    Filling air swords advanc'd darts,
    prove hour.
  COMINIUS. wish
    conducted gentle bath
    balms applied you, dare never
    Deny asking: choice those
    aid action.
  MARCIUS. they
    willing. here-
    sin doubt- love painting
    smear'd; fear
    Lesser person ill report;
    brave death outweighs bad life
    country's dearer himself;
    alone, minded,
    Wave express disposition,
    follow Marcius.           [They shout wave  
       swords, arms cast caps]
    O, alone! Make sword me?
    shows outward, you
    Volsces? is
    bear great Aufidius
    shield hard his. number,
    all, select all; rest
    bear business fight,
    obey'd. march;
    quickly draw command,
    men inclin'd.
  COMINIUS. March on, fellows;
    Make good ostentation, shall
    Divide us.                                Exeunt




SCENE VII.
The gates Corioli

TITUS LARTIUS, set guard Corioli, drum trumpet
toward COMINIUS CAIUS MARCIUS, enters LIEUTENANT, soldiers,
and scout

  LARTIUS. So, ports guarded; duties
    set down. send, dispatch
    centuries aid; rest serve
    short holding. lose field
    town.
  LIEUTENANT. Fear care, sir.
  LARTIUS. Hence, shut gates upon's.
    guider, come; th' Roman camp conduct us.       Exeunt




SCENE VIII.
A field battle Roman Volscian camps

Alarum, battle. Enter MARCIUS AUFIDIUS doors

  MARCIUS. fight thee, hate thee
    Worse promise-breaker.
  AUFIDIUS. hate alike:
    Afric owns serpent abhor
    thy fame envy. Fix thy foot.
  MARCIUS. budger die other's slave,
    gods doom after!
  AUFIDIUS. fly, Marcius,
    Halloa hare.
  MARCIUS. hours, Tullus,
    fought Corioli walls,
    made work pleas'd. 'Tis blood
    thou seest mask'd. thy revenge
    Wrench thy power th' highest.
  AUFIDIUS. Wert thou Hector
    whip bragg'd progeny,  
    Thou shouldst scape here.

       fight, Volsces aid
        AUFIDIUS. MARCIUS fights till driven in
                             breathless

    Officious, valiant, sham'd me
    condemned seconds.                            Exeunt




SCENE IX.
The Roman camp

Flourish. Alarum. retreat sounded. Enter, door,
COMINIUS Romans; door, MARCIUS, arm scarf

  COMINIUS. thee o'er thy day's work,
    Thou't thy deeds; report it
    senators mingle tears smiles;
    great patricians attend, shrug,
    I' th' end admire; ladies frighted
    And, gladly quak'd, hear more; dull tribunes,
    fusty plebeians hate thine honours,
    hearts 'We gods
    Rome hath soldier.'
    cam'st thou morsel feast,
    fully din'd before.

         Enter TITUS LARTIUS, power, pursuit

  LARTIUS. O General,  
    steed, caparison.
    Hadst thou beheld-
  MARCIUS. Pray now, more; mother,
    charter extol blood,
    praise grieves me. done
    done- can; induc'd
    been- country.
    effected good will
    Hath overta'en mine act.
  COMINIUS. be
    grave deserving; Rome know
    own. 'Twere concealment
    Worse theft, traducement,
    hide doings silence that
    Which, spire top praises vouch'd,
    modest. Therefore, beseech you,
    sign are, reward
    done, army hear me.
  MARCIUS. wounds me, smart
    hear rememb'red.  
  COMINIUS. not,
    fester 'gainst ingratitude
    tent death. horses-
    Whereof ta'en good, good store- all
    treasure field achiev'd city,
    render tenth; ta'en forth
    common distribution at
    choice.
  MARCIUS. you, General,
    make heart consent take
    bribe pay sword. refuse it,
    stand common part those
    beheld doing.

           long flourish. cry 'Marcius, Marcius!'
   cast caps lances. COMINIUS LARTIUS stand bare

    instruments profane
    sound more! drums trumpets shall
    I' th' field prove flatterers, courts cities  
    Made false-fac'd soothing. steel grows
    Soft parasite's silk, made
    overture th' wars. more, say.
    wash'd nose bled,
    foil'd debile wretch, note
    done, shout forth
    acclamations hyperbolical,
    lov'd dieted
    praises sauc'd lies.
  COMINIUS. modest you;
    cruel good report grateful
    give truly. patience,
    'gainst incens'd, put you-
    means proper harm- manacles,
    reason safely you. known,
    us, world, Caius Marcius
    Wears war's garland; token which,
    noble steed, camp, give him,
    trim belonging; time,
    Corioli,  
    th' applause-and clamour host,
    Caius Marcius Coriolanus.
    Bear th' addition nobly ever!
                           [Flourish. Trumpets sound, drums]
  ALL. Caius Marcius Coriolanus!
  CORIOLANUS. wash;
    face fair perceive
    blush no. Howbeit, you;
    stride steed, times
    undercrest good addition
    th' fairness power.
  COMINIUS. So, tent;
    Where, ere repose us, write
    Rome success. You, Titus Lartius,
    Corioli back. Send Rome
    best, articulate
    good ours.
  LARTIUS. shall, lord.
  CORIOLANUS. gods begin mock me. I, now
    Refus'd princely gifts, bound beg  
    Lord General.
  COMINIUS. Take't- 'tis yours; is't?
  CORIOLANUS. lay Corioli
    poor man's house; us'd kindly.
    cried me; prisoner;
    Aufidius view,
    wrath o'erwhelm'd pity. request you
    give poor host freedom.
  COMINIUS. O, begg'd!
    butcher son, should
    free wind. Deliver him, Titus.
  LARTIUS. Marcius, name?
  CORIOLANUS. Jupiter, forgot!
    weary; yea, memory tir'd.
    wine here?
  COMINIUS. tent.
    blood visage dries; 'tis time
    look'd to. Come.                         Exeunt




SCENE X.
The camp Volsces

A flourish. Cornets. Enter TULLUS AUFIDIUS bloody, soldiers

  AUFIDIUS. town ta'en.
  SOLDIER. 'Twill deliver'd back good condition.
  AUFIDIUS. Condition!
    Roman; cannot,
    Volsce, am. Condition?
    good condition treaty find
    I' th' part mercy? times, Marcius,
    fought thee; hast thou beat me;
    wouldst so, think, encounter
    eat. th' elements,
    e'er meet beard beard,
    mine his. Mine emulation
    Hath honour in't had; where
    thought crush equal force,
    True sword sword, potch way,
    wrath craft him.  
  SOLDIER. devil.
  AUFIDIUS. Bolder, subtle. valour's poison'd
    suff'ring stain him; him
    fly itself. sleep sanctuary,
    naked, sick, fane Capitol,
    prayers priests times sacrifice,
    Embarquements fury, lift up
    rotten privilege custom 'gainst
    hate Marcius. find him, it
    home, brother's guard, there,
    hospitable canon, I
    Wash fierce hand in's heart. th' city;
    Learn 'tis held, must
    hostages Rome.
  SOLDIER. go?
  AUFIDIUS. attended cypress grove; pray you-
    'Tis south city mills- bring word thither
    world goes, pace it
    spur journey.
  SOLDIER. shall, sir.                            Exeunt
