ACT II. SCENE I.
Rome. public place

Enter MENENIUS, Tribunes people, SICINIUS BRUTUS

  MENENIUS. augurer tells news tonight.
  BRUTUS. Good bad?
  MENENIUS. prayer people, love
    Marcius.
  SICINIUS. Nature teaches beasts friends.
  MENENIUS. Pray you, wolf love?
  SICINIUS. lamb.
  MENENIUS. Ay, devour him, hungry plebeians the
    noble Marcius.
  BRUTUS. lamb indeed, baes bear.
  MENENIUS. bear indeed, lives fike lamb. are
    men; thing you.
  TRIBUNES. Well, sir.
  MENENIUS. enormity Marcius poor not
    abundance?
  BRUTUS. poor fault, stor'd all.  
  SICINIUS. pride.
  BRUTUS. topping boasting.
  MENENIUS. strange now. censured
    city- o' th' right-hand file? you?
  TRIBUNES. Why, censur'd?
  MENENIUS. talk pride now- angry?
  TRIBUNES. Well, well, sir, well.
  MENENIUS. Why, 'tis great matter; thief of
    occasion rob great deal patience. Give your
    dispositions reins, angry pleasures- the
    least, pleasure so. blame
    Marcius proud?
  BRUTUS. alone, sir.
  MENENIUS. alone; helps are
    many, actions grow wondrous single: your
    abilities infant-like alone. talk of
    pride. O turn eyes napes your
    necks, make interior survey good selves! O
    could!
  TRIBUNES. then, sir?  
  MENENIUS. Why, discover brace unmeriting,
    proud, violent, testy magistrates-alias fools- Rome.
  SICINIUS. Menenius, too.
  MENENIUS. humorous patrician, loves
    cup hot wine drop allaying Tiber in't; to
    imperfect favouring complaint, hasty
    tinder-like trivial motion; converses more
    buttock night forehead the
    morning. utter, spend malice breath.
    Meeting wealsmen are- call you
    Lycurguses- drink give touch palate adversely, I
    make crooked face it. worships have
    deliver'd matter well, find ass compound with
    major part syllables; content to
    bear reverend grave men, lie
    deadly good faces. the
    map microcosm, too?
    harm bisson conspectuities glean this
    character, too?
  BRUTUS. Come, sir, come, enough.  
  MENENIUS. me, yourselves, thing. are
    ambitious poor knaves' caps legs; wear good
    wholesome forenoon hearing orange-wife and
    fosset-seller, rejourn controversy threepence
    day audience. hearing matter
    party party, chance pinch'd the
    colic, make faces mummers, set bloody flag
    patience, and, roaring chamber-pot, dismiss
    controversy bleeding, entangled hearing. All
    peace make calling parties
    knaves. pair strange ones.
  BRUTUS. Come, come, understood perfecter giber
    table bencher Capitol.
  MENENIUS. priests mockers, shall
    encounter ridiculous subjects are. speak
    purpose, worth wagging your
    beards; beards deserve honourable grave to
    stuff botcher's cushion entomb'd ass's
    pack-saddle. Marcius proud; who, a
    cheap estimation, worth predecessors Deucalion;  
    peradventure 'em hereditary
    hangmen. God-den worships. conversation
    infect brain, herdsmen beastly
    plebeians. bold leave you.
                                  [BRUTUS SICINIUS aside]

               Enter VOLUMNIA, VIRGILIA, VALERIA

    now, fair noble ladies- moon, she
    earthly, nobler- follow eyes fast?
  VOLUMNIA. Honourable Menenius, boy Marcius approaches; the
    love Juno, go.
  MENENIUS. Ha! Marcius coming home?
  VOLUMNIA. Ay, worthy Menenius, prosperous
    approbation.
  MENENIUS. cap, Jupiter, thee. Hoo!
    Marcius coming home!
  VOLUMNIA, VIRGILIA. Nay, 'tis true.
  VOLUMNIA. Look, letter him; state hath another,
    wife another; home you.  
  MENENIUS. make house reel to-night. letter me?
  VIRGILIA. Yes, certain, letter you; saw't.
  MENENIUS. letter me! estate years'
    health; time make lip physician. The
    sovereign prescription Galen empiricutic and, to
    preservative, report horse-drench. he
    wounded? wont home wounded.
  VIRGILIA. O, no, no, no.
  VOLUMNIA. O, wounded, gods for't.
  MENENIUS. too, much. Brings victory in
    pocket? wounds him.
  VOLUMNIA. On's brows, Menenius, time home with
    oaken garland.
  MENENIUS. disciplin'd Aufidius soundly?
  VOLUMNIA. Titus Lartius writes fought together, Aufidius
    off.
  MENENIUS. 'twas time too, warrant that; he
    stay'd him, fidius'd the
    chests Corioli gold them. Senate
    possess'd this?  
  VOLUMNIA. Good ladies, go. Yes, yes, yes: Senate has
    letters general, son name
    war; hath action outdone deeds
    doubly.
  VALERIA. troth, wondrous things spoke him.
  MENENIUS. Wondrous! Ay, warrant you, true
    purchasing.
  VIRGILIA. gods grant true!
  VOLUMNIA. True! pow, waw.
  MENENIUS. True! sworn true. wounded?
    [To TRIBUNES]  God save good worships! Marcius coming
    home; proud. wounded?
  VOLUMNIA. I' th' shoulder i' th' left arm; large
    cicatrices show people stand place.
    received repulse Tarquin hurts i' th' body.
  MENENIUS. i' th' neck i' th' thigh- I
    know.
  VOLUMNIA. expedition twenty-five wounds
    him.
  MENENIUS. twenty-seven; gash enemy's grave.  
    [A shout flourish]  Hark! trumpets.
  VOLUMNIA. ushers Marcius. carries
      noise, leaves tears;
    Death, dark spirit, in's nervy arm doth lie,
    Which, advanc'd, declines, men die.

            sennet. Trumpets sound. Enter COMINIUS the
              GENERAL, TITUS LARTIUS; them,
           CORIOLANUS, crown'd oaken garland; with
                   CAPTAINS soldiers HERALD

  HERALD. Know, Rome, Marcius fight
    Corioli gates, hath won,
    fame, Caius Marcius; these
    honour Coriolanus.
    Rome, renowned Coriolanus!             [Flourish]
  ALL. Rome, renowned Coriolanus!
  CORIOLANUS. this, offend heart.
    Pray now, more.
  COMINIUS. Look, sir, mother!  
  CORIOLANUS. O,
    have, know, petition'd gods
    prosperity!                                  [Kneels]
  VOLUMNIA. Nay, good soldier, up;
    gentle Marcius, worthy Caius, and
    deed-achieving honour newly nam'd-
    it? Coriolanus thee?
    But, O, thy wife!
  CORIOLANUS. gracious silence, hail!
    Wouldst thou laugh'd coffin'd home,
    weep'st triumph? Ah, dear,
    eyes widows Corioli wear,
    mothers lack sons.
  MENENIUS. gods crown thee!
  CORIOLANUS. live yet?  [To VALERIA]  O sweet lady,
    pardon.
  VOLUMNIA. turn.
    O, home! welcome, General.
    y'are all.
  MENENIUS. hundred thousand welcomes. weep  
    laugh; light heavy. Welcome!
    curse begin root on's heart
    glad thee! three
    Rome dote on; yet, faith men,
    crab trees home not
    grafted relish. welcome, warriors.
    call nettle nettle, and
    faults fools folly.
  COMINIUS. right.
  CORIOLANUS. Menenius ever, ever.
  HERALD. Give there, on.
  CORIOLANUS.  [To wife mother]  hand, yours.
    Ere house shade head,
    good patricians visited;
    receiv'd greetings,
    change honours.
  VOLUMNIA. lived
    inherited wishes,
    buildings fancy; only
    thing wanting, doubt  
    Rome cast thee.
  CORIOLANUS. Know, good mother,
    servant way
    sway theirs.
  COMINIUS. On, Capitol.
                 [Flourish. Cornets. Exeunt state, before]

                BRUTUS SICINIUS forward

  BRUTUS. tongues speak bleared sights
    spectacled him. prattling nurse
    rapture lets baby cry
    chats him; kitchen malkin pins
    richest lockram 'bout reechy neck,
    Clamb'ring walls eye him; stalls, bulks, windows,
    smother'd up, leads fill'd ridges hors'd
    variable complexions, agreeing
    earnestness him. Seld-shown flamens
    press popular throngs puff
    win vulgar station; veil'd dames  
    Commit war white damask in
    nicely gawded cheeks th' wanton spoil
    Phoebus' burning kisses. pother,
    whatsoever god leads him
    slily crept human powers,
    gave graceful posture.
  SICINIUS. sudden
    warrant consul.
  BRUTUS. office may
    power sleep.
  SICINIUS. temp'rately transport honours
    begin end, will
    Lose hath won.
  BRUTUS. comfort.
  SICINIUS. Doubt not
    commoners, stand, they
    ancient malice forget
    honours; which
    give make question
    proud do't.  
  BRUTUS. heard swear,
    stand consul, he
    i' th' market-place, put
    napless vesture humility;
    Nor, showing, manner is, wounds
    th' people, beg stinking breaths.
  SICINIUS. 'Tis right.
  BRUTUS. word. O, miss rather
    carry suit gentry him
    desire nobles.
  SICINIUS. better
    hold purpose, put it
    execution.
  BRUTUS. 'Tis will.
  SICINIUS. good wills:
    destruction.
  BRUTUS. fall out
    authorities. end,
    suggest people hatred
    hath held them; to's power  
    made mules, silenc'd pleaders, and
    Dispropertied freedoms; holding them
    human action capacity
    soul fitness world
    camels war, provand
    bearing burdens, sore blows
    sinking them.
  SICINIUS. This, say, suggested
    time soaring insolence
    touch people- time want,
    put upon't, easy
    set dogs sheep- fire
    kindle dry stubble; blaze
    darken ever.

                           Enter MESSENGER

  BRUTUS. matter?
  MESSENGER. Capitol. 'Tis thought
    Marcius consul.  
    dumb men throng and
    blind hear speak; matrons flung gloves,
    Ladies maids scarfs handkerchers,
    pass'd; nobles bended
    Jove's statue, commons made
    shower thunder caps shouts.
    like.
  BRUTUS. Capitol,
    carry ears eyes th' time,
    hearts event.
  SICINIUS. you.                                Exeunt




SCENE II.
Rome. Capitol

Enter OFFICERS, lay cushions, Capitol

  OFFICER. Come, come, here. stand for
    consulships?
  OFFICER. Three, say; 'tis thought one
    Coriolanus carry it.
  OFFICER. brave fellow; vengeance proud and
    loves common people.
  OFFICER. Faith, great men have
    flatter'd people, ne'er loved them; many
    loved, wherefore; that, they
    love why, hate ground.
    Therefore, Coriolanus care love or
    hate manifests true knowledge their
    disposition, noble carelessness lets plainly
    see't.
  OFFICER. care love no,
    waved indifferently 'twixt good harm;  
    seeks hate greater devotion can
    render him, leaves undone fully discover
    opposite. affect malice and
    displeasure people bad dislikes- to
    flatter love.
  OFFICER. hath deserved worthily country; his
    ascent easy degrees who, been
    supple courteous people, bonneted, further
    deed all, estimation report; but
    hath planted honours eyes actions in
    hearts tongues silent confess
    kind ingrateful injury; report otherwise
    malice that, giving lie, pluck reproof
    rebuke car heard it.
  OFFICER. him; worthy man. Make way, they
    coming.

         sennet. Enter PATRICIANS TRIBUNES
         PEOPLE, LICTORS them; CORIOLANUS,
            MENENIUS, COMINIUS Consul. SICINIUS  
               BRUTUS places themselves.
                         CORIOLANUS stands

  MENENIUS. determin'd Volsces, and
    send Titus Lartius, remains,
    main point after-meeting,
    gratify noble service that
    Hath stood country. you,
    reverend grave elders, desire
    present consul general
    well-found successes report
    worthy work perform'd
    Caius Marcius Coriolanus; whom
    met remember
    honours himself.                 [CORIOLANUS sits]
  SENATOR. Speak, good Cominius.
    Leave length, make think
    state's defective requital
    stretch out. Masters o' th' people,
    request kindest ears; and, after,  
    loving motion common body,
    yield passes here.
  SICINIUS. convented
    pleasing treaty, hearts
    Inclinable honour advance
    theme assembly.
  BRUTUS. rather
    bless'd do, remember
    kinder people than
    hath hereto priz'd at.
  MENENIUS. off, off;
    silent. you
    hear Cominius speak?
  BRUTUS. willingly.
    caution pertinent
    rebuke give it.
  MENENIUS. loves people;
    tie bedfellow.
    Worthy Cominius, speak.
                       [CORIOLANUS rises, offers away]  
    Nay, place.
  SENATOR. Sit, Coriolanus, shame hear
    nobly done.
  CORIOLANUS. Honours' pardon.
    wounds heal again
    hear them.
  BRUTUS. Sir, hope
    words disbench'd not.
  CORIOLANUS. No, sir; oft,
    blows made stay, fled words.
    sooth'd not, hurt not. people,
    love weigh-
  MENENIUS. Pray now, sit down.
  CORIOLANUS. scratch head i' th' sun
    alarum struck idly sit
    hear nothings monster'd.                          Exit
  MENENIUS. Masters people,
    multiplying spawn flatter-
    thousand good one- see
    venture limbs honour  
    on's ears hear it? Proceed, Cominius.
  COMINIUS. lack voice; deeds Coriolanus
    utter'd feebly. held
    valour chiefest virtue and
    dignifies haver. be,
    man speak world
    singly counterpois'd. sixteen years,
    Tarquin made head Rome, fought
    mark others; Dictator,
    praise point at, fight
    Amazonian chin drove
    bristled lips him; bestrid
    o'erpress'd Roman i' th' consul's view
    Slew opposers; Tarquin's met,
    struck knee. day's feats,
    act woman scene,
    prov'd man i' th' field, meed
    brow-bound oak. pupil age
    Man-ent'red thus, waxed sea,
    brunt seventeen battles  
    lurch'd swords garland. last,
    Corioli, say
    speak home. stopp'd fliers,
    rare made coward
    Turn terror sport; weeds before
    vessel sail, men obey'd
    fell stem. sword, death's stamp,
    mark, took; face foot
    thing blood, motion
    tim'd dying cries. ent'red
    mortal gate th' city, painted
    shunless destiny; aidless off,
    sudden re-enforcement struck
    Corioli planet. all's his.
    din war 'gan pierce
    ready sense, straight doubled spirit
    Re-quick'ned flesh fatigate,
    battle he; did
    Run reeking o'er lives men, if
    'Twere perpetual spoil; till call'd  
    field city stood
    ease breast panting.
  MENENIUS. Worthy man!
  SENATOR. measure fit honours
    devise him.
  COMINIUS. spoils kick'd at,
    look'd things precious were
    common muck world. covets less
    misery give, rewards
    deeds them, content
    spend time end it.
  MENENIUS. noble;
    call'd for.
  SENATOR. Call Coriolanus.
    OFFICER. doth appear.

                            Re-enter CORIOLANUS

  MENENIUS. Senate, Coriolanus, pleas'd
    make thee consul.  
  CORIOLANUS. owe still
    life services.
  MENENIUS. remains
    speak people.
  CORIOLANUS. beseech you
    o'erleap custom; cannot
    Put gown, stand naked, entreat them
    wounds' sake give suffrage. you
    pass doing.
  SICINIUS. Sir, people
    voices; bate
    jot ceremony.
  MENENIUS. Put to't.
    Pray fit custom, and
    you, predecessors have,
    honour form.
  CORIOLANUS. part
    blush acting, well
    people.
  BRUTUS. Mark that?  
  CORIOLANUS. brag 'Thus did, thus!'
    Show th' unaching scars hide,
    receiv'd hire
    breath only!
  MENENIUS. stand upon't.
    recommend you, Tribunes People,
    purpose them; noble consul
    joy honour.
  SENATORS. Coriolanus joy honour!
                             [Flourish. Cornets. exeunt all
                                        SICINIUS BRUTUS]
  BRUTUS. intends people.
  SICINIUS. perceive's intent! require them
    contemn requested
    give.
  BRUTUS. Come, inform them
    proceedings here. th' market-place
    attend us.                             Exeunt




SCENE III.
Rome. Forum

Enter citizens

  CITIZEN. Once, require voices, to
    deny him.
  CITIZEN. may, sir, will.
  CITIZEN. power it, a
    power power do; show wounds
    deeds, put tongues those
    wounds speak them; so, noble deeds, we
    noble acceptance them. Ingratitude is
    monstrous, multitude ingrateful make a
    monster multitude; members should
    bring monstrous members.
  CITIZEN. make thought of, help
    serve; stood corn, stuck
    call many-headed multitude.
  CITIZEN. call'd many; heads
    brown, black, abram, bald, our
    wits diversely colour'd; wits  
    issue skull, fly east, west, north,
    south, consent direct to
    points o' th' compass.
  CITIZEN. so? judge wit would
    fly?
  CITIZEN. Nay, wit man's
    will- 'tis strongly wedg'd block-head; at
    liberty 'twould southward.
  CITIZEN. way?
  CITIZEN. lose fog; parts
   melted rotten dews, fourth return for
    conscience' sake, thee wife.
  CITIZEN. tricks; may, you
    may.
  CITIZEN. resolv'd give voices? that's
    matter, greater part carries it. say, would
    incline people, worthier man.

                Enter CORIOLANUS, gown humility,
                               MENENIUS  

    comes, gown humility. Mark behaviour.
    stay together, he
    stands, ones, twos, threes. make his
    requests particulars, single
    honour, giving voices tongues;
    follow me, direct him.
  ALL. Content, content.                         Exeunt citizens
  MENENIUS. O sir, right; known
    worthiest men done't?
  CORIOLANUS. say?
    'I pray, sir'- Plague upon't! bring
    tongue pace. 'Look, sir, wounds
    country's service, when
    brethren roar'd ran
    th' noise drums.'
  MENENIUS. O me, gods!
    speak that. desire them
    you.
  CORIOLANUS. me? Hang 'em!  
    forget me, virtues
    divines lose 'em.
  MENENIUS. mar all.
    leave you. Pray speak 'em, pray you,
    wholesome manner.                                    Exit

                       Re-enter citizens

  CORIOLANUS. Bid wash faces
    teeth clean. So, brace.
    cause, sir, standing here.
  CITIZEN. do, sir; hath brought to't.
  CORIOLANUS. Mine desert.
  CITIZEN. desert?
  CORIOLANUS. Ay, mine desire.
  CITIZEN. How, desire?
  CORIOLANUS. No, sir, 'twas desire trouble poor
    begging.
  CITIZEN. think, give anything, hope to
    gain you.  
  CORIOLANUS. then, pray, price o' th' consulship?
  CITIZEN. price kindly.
  CORIOLANUS. Kindly, sir, pray ha't. wounds show
    you, private. good voice, sir; what
    you?
  CITIZEN. ha' it, worthy sir.
  CORIOLANUS. match, sir. worthy voices begg'd.
    alms. Adieu.
  CITIZEN. odd.
  CITIZEN. 'twere give again- 'tis matter.
                                       Exeunt citizens

                      Re-enter citizens

  CORIOLANUS. Pray now, stand tune your
    voices consul, customary gown.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. deserved nobly country, you
    deserved nobly.
  CORIOLANUS. enigma?
  FOURTH CITIZEN. scourge enemies;  
    rod friends. loved common
    people.
  CORIOLANUS. account virtuous, have
    common love. will, sir, flatter sworn
    brother, people, earn dearer estimation them; 'tis a
    condition account gentle; wisdom their
    choice hat heart, practise
    insinuating nod counterfeitly. That
    is, sir, counterfeit bewitchment popular man
    give bountiful desirers. Therefore, beseech I
    consul.
  CITIZEN. hope find friend; give
    voices heartily.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. received wounds country.
  CORIOLANUS. seal knowledge showing them. I
    make voices, trouble farther.
  CITIZENS. gods give joy, sir, heartily!
                                                 Exeunt citizens
  CORIOLANUS. sweet voices!
    die, starve,  
    crave hire deserve.
    wolvish toge stand here
    beg Hob Dick appear
    needless vouches? Custom calls to't.
    custom wills, things do't,
    dust antique time lie unswept,
    mountainous error highly heap'd
    truth o'erpeer. fool so,
    high office honour go
    thus. half through:
    part suffered, do.

                      Re-enter citizens more

    moe voices.
    voices. voices fought;
    Watch'd voices; voices bear
    wounds dozen odd; battles thrice six
    heard of; voices have
    things, less, more. voices?  
    Indeed, consul.
  SIXTH CITIZEN. nobly, honest
    man's voice.
  SEVENTH CITIZEN. consul. gods give him
    joy, make good friend people!
  ALL. Amen, amen. God save thee, noble consul!
                                                 Exeunt citizens
  CORIOLANUS. Worthy voices!

             Re-enter MENENIUS BRUTUS SICINIUS

  MENENIUS. stood limitation, tribunes
    Endue people's voice. Remains
    That, th' official marks invested, you
    Anon meet Senate.
  CORIOLANUS. done?
  SICINIUS. custom request discharg'd.
    people admit you, summon'd
    meet anon, approbation.
  CORIOLANUS. Where? Senate House?  
  SICINIUS. There, Coriolanus.
  CORIOLANUS. change garments?
  SICINIUS. may, sir.
  CORIOLANUS. straight do, and, knowing again,
    Repair th' Senate House.
  MENENIUS. company. along?
  BRUTUS. stay people.
  SICINIUS. Fare well.
                                  Exeunt CORIOLANUS MENENIUS
    now; methinks
    'Tis warm at's heart.
  BRUTUS. proud heart wore
    humble weeds. dismiss people?

                            Re-enter citizens

  SICINIUS. now, masters! chose man?
  CITIZEN. voices, sir.
  BRUTUS. pray gods deserve loves.
  CITIZEN. Amen, sir. poor unworthy notice,  
    mock'd begg'd voices.
  CITIZEN. Certainly;
    flouted downright.
  CITIZEN. No, 'tis kind speech- mock us.
  CITIZEN. us, save yourself, says
    us'd scornfully. show'd us
    marks merit, wounds receiv'd for's country.
  SICINIUS. Why, did, sure.
  ALL. No, no; man 'em.
  CITIZEN. wounds show in
      private,
    hat, waving scorn,
    'I consul,' he; 'aged custom
    voices permit me;
    voices therefore.' granted that,
    'I voices. you,
    sweet voices. left voices,
    you.' mockery?
  SICINIUS. ignorant see't,
    Or, it, childish friendliness  
    yield voices?
  BRUTUS. told him-
    lesson'd- power
    petty servant state,
    enemy; spake against
    liberties charters bear
    I' th' body weal; now, arriving
    place potency sway o' th' state,
    malignantly remain
    Fast foe th' plebeii, voices might
    curses yourselves? said
    worthy deeds claim less
    stood for, gracious nature
    voices, and
    Translate malice love,
    Standing friendly lord.
  SICINIUS. said,
    fore-advis'd, touch'd spirit
    inclination; pluck'd
    gracious promise, might,  
    call'd up, held to;
    gall'd surly nature,
    easily endures article
    Tying aught. So, putting rage,
    ta'en th' advantage choler
    pass'd unelected.
  BRUTUS. perceive
    solicit free contempt
    loves; think
    contempt bruising you
    hath power crush? Why, bodies
    heart you? tongues cry
    rectorship judgment?
  SICINIUS. you
    Ere denied asker, again,
    mock, bestow
    su'd-for tongues?
  CITIZEN. confirm'd: deny yet.
  CITIZENS. deny him;
    hundred voices sound.  
  CITIZEN. hundred, friends piece
    'em.
  BRUTUS. instantly, friends
    chose consul take
    liberties, make voice
    dogs, beat barking
    so.
  SICINIUS. assemble;
    And, safer judgment, revoke
    ignorant election. Enforce pride
    hate you; besides, forget not
    contempt wore humble weed;
    suit scorn'd you; loves,
    Thinking services, you
    Th' apprehension present portance,
    Which, gibingly, ungravely, fashion
    inveterate hate bears you.
  BRUTUS. Lay
    fault us, tribunes, labour'd,
    impediment between,  
    Cast election him.
  SICINIUS. chose him
    commandment guided
    true affections; minds,
    Pre-occupied do
    should, made grain
    voice consul. Lay fault us.
  BRUTUS. Ay, spare not. read lectures you,
    youngly began serve country,
    long continued; stock springs of-
    noble house o' th' Marcians; came
    Ancus Marcius, Numa's daughter's son,
    Who, great Hostilius, king;
    house Publius Quintus were,
    water brought conduits hither;
    Censorinus, nobly named so,
    people chosen censor,
    great ancestor.
  SICINIUS. descended,
    hath person wrought  
    set high place, commend
    remembrances; found,
    Scaling present bearing past,
    fixed enemy, revoke
    sudden approbation.
  BRUTUS. ne'er done't-
    Harp still- putting on;
    presently, drawn number,
    Repair th' Capitol.
  CITIZENS. so; all
    Repent election.                   Exeunt plebeians
  BRUTUS. on;
    mutiny put hazard
    stay, past doubt, greater.
    If, nature is, fall rage
    refusal, observe answer
    vantage anger.
  SICINIUS. th' Capitol, come.
    stream o' th' people;
    seem, partly 'tis, own,  
    goaded onward.                          Exeunt




ACT III. SCENE I.
Rome. street

Cornets. Enter CORIOLANUS, MENENIUS, GENTRY, COMINIUS,
TITUS LARTIUS, SENATORS

  CORIOLANUS. Tullus Aufidius, then, made head?
  LARTIUS. had, lord; caus'd
    swifter composition.
  CORIOLANUS. Volsces stand first,
    Ready, time prompt them, make road
    Upon's again.
  COMINIUS. worn, Lord Consul, so
    ages see
    banners wave again.
  CORIOLANUS. Aufidius?
  LARTIUS. safeguard me, curse
    Volsces, vilely
    Yielded town. retir'd Antium.
  CORIOLANUS. Spoke me?
  LARTIUS. did, lord.
  CORIOLANUS. How? What?  
  LARTIUS. met you, sword sword;
    things earth hated
    person most; pawn fortunes
    hopeless restitution, might
    call'd vanquisher.
  CORIOLANUS. Antium lives he?
  LARTIUS. Antium.
  CORIOLANUS. seek there,
    oppose hatred fully. home.

                       Enter SICINIUS BRUTUS

    Behold, tribunes people,
    tongues o' th' common mouth. despise them,
    prank authority,
    noble sufferance.
  SICINIUS. Pass further.
  CORIOLANUS. Ha! that?
  BRUTUS. dangerous on- further.
  CORIOLANUS. makes change?  
  MENENIUS. matter?
  COMINIUS. Hath pass'd noble common?
  BRUTUS. Cominius, no.
  CORIOLANUS. children's voices?
  SENATOR. Tribunes, give way: th' market-place.
  BRUTUS. people incens'd him.
  SICINIUS. Stop,
    fall broil.
  CORIOLANUS. herd?
    voices, yield now
    straight disclaim tongues? offices?
    mouths, rule teeth?
    set on?
  MENENIUS. calm, calm.
  CORIOLANUS. purpos'd thing, grows plot,
    curb nobility;
    Suffer't, live rule
    rul'd.
  BRUTUS. Call't plot.
    people cry mock'd them; late,  
    corn gratis, repin'd;
    Scandal'd suppliants people, call'd them
    Time-pleasers, flatterers, foes nobleness.
  CORIOLANUS. Why, before.
  BRUTUS. all.
  CORIOLANUS. inform'd sithence?
  BRUTUS. How? inform them!
  COMINIUS. business.
  BRUTUS. unlike
    yours.
  CORIOLANUS. consul? yond clouds,
    deserve ill you, make me
    fellow tribune.
  SICINIUS. show that
    people stir; pass
    bound, enquire way,
    of, gentler spirit,
    noble consul,
    yoke tribune.
  MENENIUS. calm.  
  COMINIUS. people abus'd; set on. palt'ring
    Rome; Coriolanus
    Deserved dishonour'd rub, laid falsely
    I' th' plain merit.
  CORIOLANUS. corn!
    speech, speak't again-
  MENENIUS. now, now.
  SENATOR. heat, sir, now.
  CORIOLANUS. Now, live, will.
    nobler friends, crave pardons.
    mutable, rank-scented meiny, them
    Regard flatter, and
    behold themselves. again,
    soothing nourish 'gainst Senate
    cockle rebellion, insolence, sedition,
    plough'd for, sow'd, scatter'd,
    mingling us, honour'd number,
    lack virtue, no, power, that
    beggars.
  MENENIUS. Well, more.  
  SENATOR. words, beseech you.
  CORIOLANUS. How? more!
    country shed blood,
    fearing outward force, lungs
    Coin words till decay measles
    disdain tetter us, sought
    catch them.
  BRUTUS. speak o' th' people
    god, punish; not
    man infirmity.
  SICINIUS. 'Twere well
    people know't.
  MENENIUS. What, what? choler?
  CORIOLANUS. Choler!
    patient midnight sleep,
    Jove, 'twould mind!
  SICINIUS. mind
    remain poison is,
    poison further.
  CORIOLANUS. remain!  
    Hear Triton minnows? Mark you
    absolute 'shall'?
  COMINIUS. 'Twas canon.
  CORIOLANUS. 'Shall'!
    O good unwise patricians! Why,
    grave reckless senators, thus
    Hydra choose officer
    peremptory 'shall,' but
    horn noise o' th' monster's, spirit
    turn current ditch,
    make channel his? power,
    vail ignorance; none, awake
    dangerous lenity. learn'd,
    common fools; not,
    cushions you. plebeians,
    senators; less,
    When, voices blended, great'st taste
    palates theirs. choose magistrate;
    he, puts 'shall,'
    popular 'shall,' graver bench  
    frown'd Greece. Jove himself,
    makes consuls base; soul aches
    know, authorities up,
    supreme, confusion
    enter 'twixt gap take
    th' other.
  COMINIUS. Well, th' market-place.
  CORIOLANUS. gave counsel give forth
    corn o' th' storehouse gratis, 'twas us'd
    Greece-
  MENENIUS. Well, well, that.
  CORIOLANUS. people absolute pow'r-
    nourish'd disobedience, fed
    ruin state.
  BRUTUS. people give
    speaks voice?
  CORIOLANUS. give reasons,
    worthier voices. corn
    recompense, resting assur'd
    ne'er service for't; press'd th' war  
    navel state touch'd,
    thread gates. kind service
    deserve corn gratis. i' th' war,
    mutinies revolts, show'd
    valour, spoke them. Th' accusation
    made Senate,
    unborn, native
    frank donation. Well, then?
    bosom multiplied digest
    Senate's courtesy? deeds express
    words: 'We request it;
    greater poll, true fear
    gave demands.' debase
    nature seats, make rabble
    Call cares fears; time
    Break ope locks o' th' Senate bring in
    crows peck eagles.
  MENENIUS. Come, enough.
  BRUTUS. Enough, measure.
  CORIOLANUS. No, more.  
    sworn by, divine human,
    Seal end withal! double worship,
    part disdain cause, other
    Insult reason; gentry, title, wisdom,
    conclude yea no
    general ignorance- omit
    Real necessities, give while
    unstable slightness. Purpose barr'd, follows
    purpose. Therefore, beseech you-
    fearful discreet;
    love fundamental part state
    doubt change on't; prefer
    noble life long, wish
    jump body dangerous physic
    death it- pluck out
    multitudinous tongue; lick
    sweet poison. dishonour
    Mangles true judgment, bereaves state
    integrity become't,
    power good would,  
    th' ill doth control't.
  BRUTUS. enough.
  SICINIUS. spoken traitor answer
    traitors do.
  CORIOLANUS. Thou wretch, o'erwhelm thee!
    people bald tribunes,
    depending, obedience fails
    greater bench? rebellion,
    meet, be, law,
    chosen; hour
    meet meet,
    throw power i' th' dust.
  BRUTUS. Manifest treason!
  SICINIUS. consul? No.
  BRUTUS. aediles, ho!

                           Enter AEDILE

    apprehended.
  SICINIUS. call people,  [Exit AEDILE]   
    Attach thee traitorous innovator,
    foe th' public weal. Obey, charge thee,
    follow thine answer.
  CORIOLANUS. Hence, goat!
  PATRICIANS. surety him.
  COMINIUS. Ag'd sir, hands off.
  CORIOLANUS. Hence, rotten thing! shake thy bones
    thy garments.
  SICINIUS. Help, ye citizens!

              Enter rabble plebeians, AEDILES

  MENENIUS. sides respect.
  SICINIUS. power.
  BRUTUS. Seize him, aediles.
    PLEBEIANS. him! him!
  SENATOR. Weapons, weapons, weapons!
                              [They bustle CORIOLANUS]
  ALL. Tribunes! patricians! citizens! What, ho! Sicinius!
    Brutus! Coriolanus! Citizens!  
  PATRICIANS. Peace, peace, peace; stay, hold, peace!
  MENENIUS. be? breath;
    Confusion's near; speak. tribunes
    th' people- Coriolanus, patience!
    Speak, good Sicinius.
  SICINIUS. Hear me, people; peace!
  PLEBEIANS. hear tribune. Peace! Speak, speak, speak.
  SICINIUS. point lose liberties.
    Marcius you; Marcius,
    late nam'd consul.
  MENENIUS. Fie, fie, fie!
    kindle, quench.
  SENATOR. unbuild city, lay flat.
  SICINIUS. city people?
  PLEBEIANS. True,
    people city.
  BRUTUS. consent establish'd
    people's magistrates.
  PLEBEIANS. remain.
  MENENIUS. do.  
  COMINIUS. lay city flat,
    bring roof foundation,
    bury distinctly ranges
    heaps piles ruin.
  SICINIUS. deserves death.
  BRUTUS. stand authority
    lose it. pronounce,
    part o' th' people, power
    elected theirs: Marcius worthy
    present death.
  SICINIUS. lay hold him;
    Bear th' rock Tarpeian, thence
    destruction cast him.
  BRUTUS. AEdiles, seize him.
  PLEBEIANS. Yield, Marcius, yield.
  MENENIUS. Hear word; beseech you, Tribunes,
    Hear word.
  AEDILES. Peace, peace!
  MENENIUS. seem, country's friend,
    temp'rately proceed  
    violently redress.
  BRUTUS. Sir, cold ways,
    prudent helps, poisonous
    disease violent. Lay hands him
    bear rock.
                                    [CORIOLANUS draws sword]
  CORIOLANUS. No: die here.
    beheld fighting;
    Come, me.
  MENENIUS. sword! Tribunes, withdraw awhile.
  BRUTUS. Lay hands him.
  MENENIUS. Marcius, help,
    noble; him, young old.
  PLEBEIANS. him, him!
                      [In mutiny TRIBUNES, AEDILES,
                                     people beat in]
  MENENIUS. Go, house; gone, away.
    nought else.
  SENATOR. gone.
  CORIOLANUS. Stand fast;  
    friends enemies.
  MENENIUS. put that?
  SENATOR. gods forbid!
    prithee, noble friend, home thy house;
    Leave cure cause.
  MENENIUS. 'tis sore us
    tent yourself; gone, beseech you.
  COMINIUS. Come, sir, us.
  CORIOLANUS. barbarians, are,
    Rome litter'd; Romans, not,
    calved i' th' porch o' th' Capitol.
  MENENIUS. gone.
    Put worthy rage tongue;
    time owe another.
  CORIOLANUS. fair ground
    beat forty them.
  MENENIUS. myself
    brace o' th' them; yea, tribunes.
  COMINIUS. 'tis odds arithmetic,
    manhood call'd foolery stands  
    falling fabric. hence,
    tag return? rage doth rend
    interrupted waters, o'erbear
    us'd bear.
  MENENIUS. Pray gone.
    wit request
    little; patch'd
    cloth colour.
  COMINIUS. Nay, away.
                     Exeunt CORIOLANUS COMINIUS, others
  PATRICIANS. man marr'd fortune.
  MENENIUS. nature noble world:
    flatter Neptune trident,
    Jove for's power thunder. heart's mouth;
    breast forges, tongue vent;
    And, angry, forget ever
    heard death.                 [A noise within]
    goodly work!
  PATRICIANS. a-bed.
  MENENIUS. Tiber.  
    vengeance, speak 'em fair?

            Re-enter BRUTUS SICINIUS, rabble again

  SICINIUS. viper
    depopulate city and
    man himself?
  MENENIUS. worthy Tribunes-
  SICINIUS. thrown Tarpeian rock
    rigorous hands; hath resisted law,
    law scorn trial
    severity public power,
    sets nought.
  CITIZEN. know
    noble tribunes people's mouths,
    hands.
  PLEBEIANS. shall, on't.
  MENENIUS. Sir, sir-
  SICINIUS. Peace!
  MENENIUS. cry havoc, hunt  
    modest warrant.
  SICINIUS. Sir, comes't you
    holp make rescue?
  MENENIUS. Hear speak.
    consul's worthiness,
    faults.
  SICINIUS. Consul! consul?
  MENENIUS. consul Coriolanus.
  BRUTUS. consul!
  PLEBEIANS. No, no, no, no, no.
  MENENIUS. If, tribunes' leave, yours, good people,
    heard, crave word two;
    turn harm
    loss time.
  SICINIUS. Speak briefly, then,
    peremptory dispatch
    viperous traitor; eject hence
    danger, here
    death; decreed
    dies to-night.  
  MENENIUS. good gods forbid
    renowned Rome, gratitude
    deserved children enroll'd
    Jove's book, unnatural dam
    eat own!
  SICINIUS. disease cut away.
  MENENIUS. O, limb disease-
    Mortal, cut off: cure it, easy.
    Rome worthy death?
    Killing enemies, blood hath lost-
    dare vouch hath
    ounce- dropt country;
    left, lose country
    do't suffer it
    brand th' end o' th' world.
  SICINIUS. clean kam.
  BRUTUS. awry. love country,
    honour'd him.
  SICINIUS. service foot,
    gangren'd, respected  
    was.
  BRUTUS. hear more.
    Pursue house pluck thence,
    infection, catching nature,
    Spread further.
  MENENIUS. word more, word
    tiger-footed rage, find
    harm unscann'd swiftness, will, late,
    Tie leaden pounds to's heels. Proceed process,
    parties- belov'd- break out,
    sack great Rome Romans.
  BRUTUS. so-
  SICINIUS. ye talk?
    taste obedience-
    aediles smote, resisted? Come!
  MENENIUS. this: bred i' th' wars
    'a draw sword, ill school'd
    bolted language; meal bran together
    throws distinction. Give leave,
    undertake bring  
    answer lawful form,
    peace, utmost peril.
  SENATOR. Noble Tribunes,
    humane way; course
    prove bloody, end it
    Unknown beginning.
  SICINIUS. Noble Menenius,
    people's officer.
    Masters, lay weapons.
  BRUTUS. home.
  SICINIUS. Meet market-place. attend there;
    Where, bring Marcius, proceed
    way.
  MENENIUS. bring you.
    [To SENATORS]  desire company; come,
    worst follow.
  SENATOR. Pray him.                   Exeunt




SCENE II.
Rome. house CORIOLANUS

Enter CORIOLANUS NOBLES

  CORIOLANUS. pull mine ears, present me
    Death wheel wild horses' heels;
    pile ten hills Tarpeian rock,
    precipitation stretch
    beam sight; still
    them.
  PATRICIAN. nobler.
  CORIOLANUS. muse mother
    approve further, wont
    call woollen vassals, things created
    buy sell groats; show bare heads
    congregations, yawn, still, wonder,
    ordinance stood up
    speak peace war.

                          Enter VOLUMNIA
  
    talk you:
    milder? me
    False nature? play
    man am.
  VOLUMNIA. O, sir, sir, sir,
    put power on
    worn out.
  CORIOLANUS. go.
  VOLUMNIA. man are
    striving so; lesser been
    thwartings dispositions, if
    show'd ye dispos'd,
    Ere lack'd power cross you.
  CORIOLANUS. hang.
  VOLUMNIA. Ay, burn too.

                    Enter MENENIUS SENATORS

  MENENIUS. Come, come, rough, rough;
    return mend it.  
  SENATOR. remedy,
    Unless, doing, good city
    Cleave midst perish.
  VOLUMNIA. Pray counsell'd;
    heart apt yours,
    brain leads anger
    vantage.
  MENENIUS. said, noble woman!
    stoop th' herd, that
    violent fit o' th' time craves physic
    state, put mine armour on,
    scarcely bear.
  CORIOLANUS. do?
  MENENIUS. Return th' tribunes.
  CORIOLANUS. Well, then, then?
  MENENIUS. Repent spoke.
  CORIOLANUS. them! gods;
    do't them?
  VOLUMNIA. absolute;
    noble  
    extremities speak. heard say
    Honour policy, unsever'd friends,
    I' th' war grow together; grant that, me
    peace th' lose
    combine there.
  CORIOLANUS. Tush, tush!
  MENENIUS. good demand.
  VOLUMNIA. honour wars seem
    not, ends
    adopt policy, worse
    hold companionship peace
    honour war; both
    stands request?
  CORIOLANUS. force this?
  VOLUMNIA. lies speak
    th' people, instruction,
    th' matter heart prompts you,
    words roted in
    tongue, bastards syllables
    allowance bosom's truth.  
    Now, dishonours all
    town gentle words,
    put fortune and
    hazard blood.
    dissemble nature where
    fortunes friends stake requir'd
    honour. this
    wife, son, senators, nobles;
    show general louts
    frown, spend fawn 'em
    inheritance loves safeguard
    ruin.
  MENENIUS. Noble lady!
    Come, us, speak fair; salve so,
    dangerous present, los
    past.
  VOLUMNIA. prithee now, son,
    bonnet thy hand;
    stretch'd it- them-
    Thy knee bussing stones- busines  
    Action eloquence, eyes th' ignorant
    learned ears- waving thy head,
    correcting thy-stout heart,
    humble ripest mulberry
    hold handling. them
    Thou art soldier and, bred broils,
    Hast soft which, thou dost confess,
    fit thee use, claim,
    good loves; thou wilt frame
    Thyself, forsooth, theirs, far
    thou hast power person.
  MENENIUS. done
    speaks, why, hearts yours;
    pardons, ask'd, free
    words purpose.
  VOLUMNIA. Prithee now,
    Go, rul'd; thou hadst rather
    Follow thine enemy fiery gulf
    flatter bower.
  
                           Enter COMINIUS

    Cominius.
  COMINIUS. i' th' market-place; and, sir, 'tis fit
    make strong party, defend yourself
    calmness absence; all's anger.
  MENENIUS. fair speech.
  COMINIUS. 'twill serve, he
    thereto frame spirit.
  VOLUMNIA. will.
    Prithee now, will, it.
  CORIOLANUS. show unbarb'd sconce? I
    base tongue give noble heart
    lie bear? Well, do't;
    Yet, single plot lose,
    mould Marcius, dust grind it,
    throw't wind. th' market-place!
    put part never
    discharge th' life.
  COMINIUS. Come, come, prompt you.  
  VOLUMNIA. prithee now, sweet son, thou hast said
    praises made thee soldier, so,
    praise this, perform part
    Thou hast before.
  CORIOLANUS. Well, do't.
    Away, disposition, possess me
    harlot's spirit! throat war turn'd,
    quier'd drum, pipe
    Small eunuch virgin voice
    babies lulls asleep! smiles knaves
    Tent cheeks, schoolboys' tears up
    glasses sight! beggar's tongue
    Make motion lips, arm'd knees,
    bow'd stirrup, bend his
    hath receiv'd alms! do't,
    surcease honour mine truth,
    body's action teach mind
    inherent baseness.
  VOLUMNIA. thy choice, then.
    beg thee, dishonour  
    thou them. ruin. Let
    Thy mother feel thy pride fear
    Thy dangerous stoutness; mock death
    big heart thou. thou list.
    Thy valiantness mine, thou suck'dst me;
    owe thy pride thyself.
  CORIOLANUS. Pray content.
    Mother, market-place;
    Chide more. mountebank loves,
    Cog hearts them, home belov'd
    trades Rome. Look, going.
    Commend wife. return consul,
    trust tongue do
    I' th' flattery further.
  VOLUMNIA. will.                                   Exit
  COMINIUS. Away! tribunes attend you. Arm yourself
    answer mildly; prepar'd
    accusations, hear, strong
    yet.
  CORIOLANUS. word 'mildly.' Pray go.  
    accuse invention; I
    answer mine honour.
  MENENIUS. Ay, mildly.
  CORIOLANUS. Well, mildly then- mildly.            Exeunt




SCENE III.
Rome. Forum

Enter SICINIUS BRUTUS

  BRUTUS. point charge home, affects
    Tyrannical power. evade there,
    Enforce envy people,
    spoil Antiates
    ne'er distributed.

                           Enter AEDILE

    What, come?
  AEDILE. coming.
  BRUTUS. accompanied?
  AEDILE. Menenius, senators
    favour'd him.
  SICINIUS. catalogue
    voices procur'd,
    Set th' poll?
  AEDILE. have; 'tis ready.  
  SICINIUS. corrected tribes?
  AEDILE. have.
  SICINIUS. Assemble presently people hither;
    hear 'It so
    I' th' strength o' th' commons' either
    death, fine, banishment, them,
    fine, cry 'Fine!'- death, cry 'Death!'
    Insisting prerogative
    power i' th' truth o' th' cause.
  AEDILE. inform them.
  BRUTUS. time begun cry,
    cease, din confus'd
    Enforce present execution
    chance sentence.
  AEDILE. well.
  SICINIUS. Make strong, ready hint,
    hap give't them.
  BRUTUS. it.                               Exit AEDILE
    Put choler straight. hath us'd
    conquer, worth  
    contradiction; chaf'd, cannot
    rein'd temperance; speaks
    heart, looks
    break neck.

          Enter CORIOLANUS, MENENIUS COMINIUS, others

  SICINIUS. Well, comes.
  MENENIUS. Calmly, beseech you.
  CORIOLANUS. Ay, ostler, th' poorest piece
    bear knave th' volume. Th' honour'd gods
    Rome safety, chairs justice
    Supplied worthy men! plant love among's!
    Throng large temples shows peace,
    streets war!
  SENATOR. Amen, amen!
  MENENIUS. noble wish.

                  Re-enter the.AEDILE,with plebeians
  
  SICINIUS. Draw near, ye people.
  AEDILE. List tribunes. Audience! peace, say!
  CORIOLANUS. First, hear speak.
  TRIBUNES. Well, say. Peace, ho!
  CORIOLANUS. charg'd present?
    determine here?
  SICINIUS. demand,
    submit people's voices,
    officers, content
    suffer lawful censure faults
    prov'd you.
  CORIOLANUS. content.
  MENENIUS. Lo, citizens, content.
    warlike service done, consider; think
    wounds body bears, show
    graves i' th' holy churchyard.
  CORIOLANUS. Scratches briers,
    Scars move laughter only.
  MENENIUS. further,
    speaks citizen,  
    find soldier; take
    rougher accents malicious sounds,
    But, say, soldier
    envy you.
  COMINIUS. Well, well! more.
  CORIOLANUS. matter,
    pass'd consul full voice,
    dishonour'd hour
    again?
  SICINIUS. Answer us.
  CORIOLANUS. then; 'tis true, so.
  SICINIUS. charge contriv'd take
    Rome season'd office, wind
    power tyrannical;
    traitor people.
  CORIOLANUS. How- traitor?
  MENENIUS. Nay, temperately! promise.
  CORIOLANUS. fires i' th' lowest hell fold people!
    Call traitor! Thou injurious tribune!
    thine eyes sat twenty thousand deaths,  
    thy hands clutch'd millions, in
    Thy lying tongue numbers, say
    'Thou liest' thee voice free
    pray gods.
  SICINIUS. Mark this, people?
  PLEBEIANS. th' rock, th' rock, him!
  SICINIUS. Peace!
    put matter charge.
    heard speak,
    Beating officers, cursing yourselves,
    Opposing laws strokes, defying
    great power him- this,
    criminal capital kind,
    Deserves th' extremest death.
  BRUTUS. hath
    Serv'd Rome-
  CORIOLANUS. prate service?
  BRUTUS. talk it.
  CORIOLANUS. You!
  MENENIUS. promise made mother?  
  COMINIUS. Know, pray you-
  CORIOLANUS. further.
    pronounce steep Tarpeian death,
    Vagabond exile, flaying, pent linger
    grain day, buy
    mercy price fair word,
    check courage give,
    have't 'Good morrow.'
  SICINIUS. has-
    lies- time time
    Envied people, seeking means
    pluck power; last
    hostile strokes, presence
    dreaded justice, ministers
    distribute it- o' th' people,
    power tribunes, we,
    Ev'n instant, banish city,
    peril precipitation
    rock Tarpeian, more
    enter Rome gates. I' th' people's name,  
    so.
  PLEBEIANS. so, so! away!
    banish'd, so.
  COMINIUS. Hear me, masters common friends-
  SICINIUS. sentenc'd; hearing.
  COMINIUS. speak.
    consul, show Rome
    enemies' marks me. love
    country's good respect tender,
    holy profound, mine life,
    dear wife's estimate, womb's increase
    treasure loins. would
    Speak that-
  SICINIUS. drift. Speak what?
  BRUTUS. said, banish'd,
    enemy people country.
    so.
  PLEBEIANS. so, so.
  CORIOLANUS. common cry curs, breath hate
    reek o' th' rotten fens, loves prize  
    dead carcasses unburied men
    corrupt air- banish you.
    remain uncertainty!
    feeble rumour shake hearts;
    enemies, nodding plumes,
    Fan despair! power still
    banish defenders, till length
    ignorance- finds till feels,
    Making reservation yourselves
    foes- deliver you
    abated captives nation
    won blows! Despising
    city, turn back;
    world elsewhere.
                                              Exeunt CORIOLANUS,
                   COMINIUS, MENENIUS, PATRICIANS
  AEDILE. people's enemy gone, gone!
                        [They shout throw caps]
  PLEBEIANS. enemy banish'd, gone! Hoo-oo!
  SICINIUS. gates, follow him,  
    hath follow'd you, despite;
    Give deserv'd vexation. guard
    Attend city.
  PLEBEIANS. Come, come, gates; come!
    gods preserve noble tribunes! Come.           Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE I.
Rome. gate city

Enter CORIOLANUS, VOLUMNIA, VIRGILIA, MENENIUS, COMINIUS,
with young NOBILITY Rome

  CORIOLANUS. Come, leave tears; farewell. beast
    heads butts away. Nay, mother,
    ancient courage? us'd
    extremities trier spirits;
    common chances common men bear;
    sea calm boats alike
    Show'd mastership floating; fortune's blows,
    struck home, gentle wounded craves
    noble cunning. us'd load me
    precepts make invincible
    heart conn'd them.
  VIRGILIA. O heavens! O heavens!
  CORIOLANUS. Nay, prithee, woman-
  VOLUMNIA. red pestilence strike trades Rome,
    occupations perish!
  CORIOLANUS. What, what, what!  
    lov'd lack'd. Nay, mother,
    Resume spirit wont say,
    wife Hercules,
    labours done, sav'd
    husband sweat. Cominius,
    Droop not; adieu. Farewell, wife, mother.
    yet. Thou true Menenius,
    Thy tears salter younger man's
    venomous thine eyes. General,
    thee stern, thou hast oft beheld
    Heart-hard'ning spectacles; sad women
    'Tis fond wail inevitable strokes,
    'tis laugh 'em. mother, wot well
    hazards solace; and
    Believe't lightly- alone,
    lonely dragon, fen
    Makes fear'd talk'd seen- son
    exceed common caught
    cautelous baits practice.
  VOLUMNIA. son,  
    wilt thou go? good Cominius
    thee awhile; determine course
    wild exposture chance
    starts i' th' thee.
  VIRGILIA. O gods!
  COMINIUS. follow thee month, devise the
    thou shalt rest, thou mayst hear us,
    thee; so, time thrust forth
    thy repeal, send
    O'er vast world seek single man,
    lose advantage, doth cool
    I' th' absence needer.
  CORIOLANUS. Fare ye well;
    Thou hast years thee, thou art full
    wars' surfeits rove one
    unbruis'd; bring gate.
    Come, sweet wife, dearest mother, and
    friends noble touch; forth,
    Bid farewell, smile. pray come.
    remain ground  
    Hear still, aught
    formerly.
  MENENIUS. worthily
    ear hear. Come, weep.
    shake years
    arms legs, good gods,
    thee foot.
  CORIOLANUS. Give thy hand.
    Come.                                                 Exeunt




SCENE II.
Rome. street gate

Enter Tribunes, SICINIUS BRUTUS AEDILE

  SICINIUS. Bid home; gone, further.
    nobility vex'd, sided
    behalf.
  BRUTUS. shown power,
    humbler done
    a-doing.
  SICINIUS. Bid home.
    great enemy gone, they
    Stand ancient strength.
  BRUTUS. Dismiss home.                         Exit AEDILE
    mother.

                   Enter VOLUMNIA, VIRGILIA, MENENIUS

  SICINIUS. meet her.
  BRUTUS. Why?  
  SICINIUS. mad.
  BRUTUS. ta'en note us; way.
  VOLUMNIA. O, Y'are met; th' hoarded plague o' th' gods
    Requite love!
  MENENIUS. Peace, peace, loud.
  VOLUMNIA. weeping, hear-
    Nay, hear some.  [To BRUTUS] gone?
  VIRGILIA.  [To SICINIUS]  stay too. the
      power
    husband.
  SICINIUS. mankind?
  VOLUMNIA. Ay, fool; shame? Note this, fool:
    man father? Hadst thou foxship
    banish struck blows Rome
    thou hast spoken words?
  SICINIUS. O blessed heavens!
  VOLUMNIA. Moe noble blows thou wise words;
    Rome's good. thee what- go!
    Nay, thou shalt stay too. son
    Arabia, thy tribe him,  
    good sword hand.
  SICINIUS. then?
  VIRGILIA. then!
    make end thy posterity.
  VOLUMNIA. Bastards all.
    Good man, wounds bear Rome!
  MENENIUS. Come, come, peace.
  SICINIUS. continued country
    began, unknit himself
    noble knot made.
  BRUTUS. had.
  VOLUMNIA. 'I had!' 'Twas incens'd rabble-
    Cats judge fitly worth
    mysteries heaven
    earth know.
  BRUTUS. Pray, go.
  VOLUMNIA. Now, pray, sir, gone;
    brave deed. Ere go, hear this:
    doth Capitol exceed
    meanest house Rome, son-  
    lady's husband here, this, see?-
    banish'd exceed an.
  BRUTUS. Well, well, leave you.
  SICINIUS. stay baited
    wits?                Exeunt TRIBUNES
  VOLUMNIA. prayers you.
    gods do
    confirm curses. meet 'em
    day, unclog heart
    lies heavy to't.
  MENENIUS. told home,
    And, troth, cause. me?
  VOLUMNIA. Anger's meat; myself,
    starve feeding. Come, go.
    Leave faint puling lament do,
    anger, Juno-like. Come, come, come.
                                    Exeunt VOLUMNIA VIRGILIA
  MENENIUS. Fie, fie, fie!                                  Exit




SCENE III.
A highway Rome Antium

Enter ROMAN VOLSCE, meeting

  ROMAN. well, sir, me; name, think,
    Adrian.
  VOLSCE. so, sir. Truly, forgot you.
  ROMAN. Roman; services are, are, 'em.
    yet?
  VOLSCE. Nicanor? No!
  ROMAN. same, sir.
  VOLSCE. beard you, favour is
    appear'd tongue. news Rome? a
    note Volscian state, find there. have
    saved day's journey.
  ROMAN. hath Rome strange insurrections: people
    senators, patricians, nobles.
  VOLSCE. Hath been! ended, then? state thinks so; they
    warlike preparation, hope in
    heat division.
  ROMAN. main blaze past, small thing make  
    flame again; nobles receive heart banishment
    worthy Coriolanus ripe aptness take
    power people, pluck tribunes
    ever. lies glowing, you, mature
    violent breaking out.
  VOLSCE. Coriolanus banish'd!
  ROMAN. Banish'd, sir.
  VOLSCE. intelligence, Nicanor.
  ROMAN. day serves now. heard the
    fittest time corrupt man's wife fall'n out
    husband. noble Tullus Aufidius in
    wars, great opposer, Coriolanus, no
    request country.
  VOLSCE. choose. fortunate accidentally to
    encounter you; ended business, merrily
    accompany home.
  ROMAN. supper strange things
    Rome, tending good adversaries. you
    army ready, you?
  VOLSCE. royal one: centurions charges,  
    distinctly billeted, th' entertainment, on
    foot hour's warning.
  ROMAN. joyful hear readiness, man, I
    think, set present action. So, sir, heartily
    met, glad company.
  VOLSCE. part me, sir. be
    glad yours.
  ROMAN. Well, together.




SCENE IV.
Antium. AUFIDIUS' house

Enter CORIOLANUS, apparel, disguis'd muffled

  CORIOLANUS. goodly city Antium. City,
    'Tis made thy widows: heir
    fair edifices fore wars
    heard groan drop. not.
    thy wives spits boys stones,
    puny battle slay me.

                           Enter CITIZEN

    Save you, sir.
  CITIZEN. you.
  CORIOLANUS. Direct me, will,
    great Aufidius lies. Antium?
  CITIZEN. is, feasts nobles state
    house night.
  CORIOLANUS. house, beseech you?
  CITIZEN. you.  
  CORIOLANUS. you, sir; farewell.             Exit CITIZEN
    O world, thy slippery turns! Friends fast sworn,
    double bosoms wear heart,
    hours, bed, meal exercise
    together, twin, 'twere, love,
    Unseparable, hour,
    dissension doit, break out
    bitterest enmity; fellest foes,
    passions plots broke sleep
    other, chance,
    trick worth egg, grow dear friends
    interjoin issues. me:
    birthplace hate I, love's upon
    enemy town. enter. slay me,
    fair justice: give way,
    country service.




SCENE V.
Antium. AUFIDIUS' house

Music plays. Enter SERVINGMAN

  SERVANT. Wine, wine, wine! service here! our
    fellows asleep.                                     Exit

                     Enter SERVINGMAN

  SERVANT.Where's Cotus? master calls him.
    Cotus!                                                  Exit

                       Enter CORIOLANUS

  CORIOLANUS. goodly house. feast smells well, I
    guest.

                 Re-enter SERVINGMAN

  SERVANT. have, friend?
    you? place you: pray door.  
 Exit
  CORIOLANUS. deserv'd entertainment
    Coriolanus.

                   Re-enter SERVINGMAN

  SERVANT. you, sir? porter eyes his
    head entrance companions? Pray out.
  CORIOLANUS. Away!
  SERVANT. Away? away.
  CORIOLANUS. th' art troublesome.
  SERVANT. brave? talk'd anon.

          Enter SERVINGMAN. meets him

  SERVANT. fellow's this?
  SERVANT. strange look'd on. him
    o' th' house. Prithee call master him.
  SERVANT. here, fellow? Pray avoid the
    house.  
  CORIOLANUS. stand- hurt hearth.
  SERVANT. you?
  CORIOLANUS. gentleman.
  SERVANT. marv'llous poor one.
  CORIOLANUS. True, am.
  SERVANT. Pray you, poor gentleman, other
    station; place you. Pray avoid. Come.
  CORIOLANUS. Follow function, batten cold bits.
                                      [Pushes him]
  SERVANT. What, not? Prithee master a
    strange guest here.
  SERVANT. shall.                              Exit
  SERVANT. dwell'st thou?
  CORIOLANUS. canopy.
  SERVANT. canopy?
  CORIOLANUS. Ay.
  SERVANT. that?
  CORIOLANUS. I' th' city kites crows.
  SERVANT. I' th' city kites crows!
    ass is! thou dwell'st daws too?  
  CORIOLANUS. No, serve thy master.
  SERVANT. How, sir! meddle master?
  CORIOLANUS. Ay; 'tis honester service meddle thy
    mistress. Thou prat'st prat'st; serve thy trencher;
    hence!                                      [Beats away]

             Enter AUFIDIUS SERVINGMAN

  AUFIDIUS. fellow?
  SERVANT. Here, sir; beaten dog, for
    disturbing lords within.
  AUFIDIUS. com'st thou? wouldst thou? Thy name?
    speak'st not? Speak, man. thy name?
  CORIOLANUS.  [Unmuffling]  If, Tullus,
    thou know'st me, and, me, dost not
    man am, necessity
    Commands myself.
  AUFIDIUS. thy name?
  CORIOLANUS. unmusical Volscians' ears,
    harsh sound thine.  
  AUFIDIUS. Say, thy name?
    Thou grim appearance, thy face
    Bears command in't; thy tackle's torn,
    Thou show'st noble vessel. thy name?
  CORIOLANUS. Prepare thy brow frown- know'st thou yet?
  AUFIDIUS. thee not. Thy name?
  CORIOLANUS. Caius Marcius, hath done
    thee particularly, Volsces,
    Great hurt mischief; thereto witness may
    surname, Coriolanus. painful service,
    extreme dangers, drops blood
    Shed thankless country, requited
    surname- good memory
    witness malice displeasure
    thou shouldst bear me. remains;
    cruelty envy people,
    Permitted dastard nobles, who
    forsook me, hath devour'd rest,
    suffer'd th' voice slaves be
    Whoop'd Rome. extremity  
    Hath brought thy hearth; hope,
    Mistake not, save life; if
    fear'd death, men i' th' world
    'voided thee; mere spite,
    full quit banishers,
    Stand thee here. thou hast
    heart wreak thee, wilt revenge
    Thine wrongs stop maims
    shame thy country, speed thee straight
    make misery serve thy turn. it
    revengeful services prove
    benefits thee; fight
    cank'red country spleen
    fiends. be
    Thou dar'st this, prove fortunes
    Th'art tir'd, then, word, am
    Longer live weary, present
    throat thee thy ancient malice;
    cut show thee fool,
    thee hate,  
    Drawn tuns blood thy country's breast,
    live thy shame, unless
    thee service.
  AUFIDIUS. O Marcius, Marcius!
    word thou hast spoke hath weeded heart
    root ancient envy. Jupiter
    yond cloud speak divine things,
    ''Tis true,' more
    thee, noble Marcius. twine
    Mine arms body, against
    grained ash hundred times hath broke
    scarr'd moon splinters; clip
    anvil sword, contest
    hotly nobly thy love
    ambitious strength did
    Contend thy valour. thou first,
    lov'd maid married; man
    Sigh'd truer breath; thee here,
    Thou noble thing, dances rapt heart
    wedded mistress  
    Bestride threshold. Why, thou Mars, the
    power foot, purpose
    hew thy target thy brawn,
    lose mine arm for't. Thou hast beat out
    Twelve times, nightly since
    Dreamt encounters 'twixt thyself me-
    sleep,
    Unbuckling helms, fisting other's throat-
    wak'd half dead nothing. Worthy Marcius,
    quarrel Rome that
    Thou art banish'd, muster all
    twelve seventy, and, pouring war
    bowels ungrateful Rome,
    bold flood o'erbeat. O, come, in,
    friendly senators th' hands,
    here, taking leaves me
    prepar'd territories,
    Rome itself.
  CORIOLANUS. bless me, gods!
  AUFIDIUS. Therefore, most. absolute sir, thou wilt  
    leading thine revenges, take
    Th' half commission, set down-
    thou art experienc'd, thou know'st
    Thy country's strength weakness- thine ways,
    knock gates Rome,
    rudely visit parts remote
    fright ere destroy. in;
    commend thee shall
    yea thy desires. thousand welcomes!
    friend e'er enemy;
    Yet, Marcius, much. hand; welcome!
                                  Exeunt CORIOLANUS AUFIDIUS

                    SERVINGMEN forward

  SERVANT. strange alteration!
  SERVANT. hand, thought strucken with
    cudgel; mind gave clothes made false report
    him.
  SERVANT. arm has! turn'd  
    finger thumb, set top.
  SERVANT. Nay, knew face in
    him; had, sir, kind face, methought- to
    term it.
  SERVANT. so, were- hang'd,
    thought think.
  SERVANT. I, sworn. simply rarest
    man i' th' world.
  SERVANT. is; greater soldier wot
    on.
  SERVANT. Who, master?
  SERVANT. Nay, matter that.
  SERVANT. Worth him.
  SERVANT. Nay, neither; the
    greater soldier.
  SERVANT. Faith, you, that;
    defence town general excellent.
  SERVANT. Ay, assault too.

                       Re-enter SERVINGMAN  

  SERVANT. O slaves, news- news, rascals!
  BOTH. What, what, what? partake.
  SERVANT. Roman, nations;
    lief condemn'd man.
  BOTH. Wherefore? wherefore?
  SERVANT. Why, wont thwack general-
    Caius Marcius.
  SERVANT. 'thwack general'?
  SERVANT. 'thwack general,' always
    good him.
  SERVANT. Come, fellows friends. too
    hard him, heard himself.
  SERVANT. hard directly, troth
    on't; Corioli scotch'd notch'd a
    carbonado.
  SERVANT. cannibally given, have
    broil'd eaten too.
  SERVANT. thy news!
  SERVANT. Why, made son  
    heir Mars; set upper end o' th' table; question
    asked senators stand bald him.
    general makes mistress him, sanctifies himself
    with's hand, turns white o' th' eye discourse.
    bottom news is, general cut i' th' middle
    half yesterday, half
    entreaty grant table. go, says,
    sowl porter Rome gates th' ears; mow all
    him, leave passage poll'd.
  SERVANT. do't man imagine.
  SERVANT. Do't! do't; you, sir, as
    friends enemies; friends, sir, were, durst
    not- you, sir- show themselves, term it, friends,
    whilst directitude.
  SERVANT. Directitude? that?
  SERVANT. see, sir, crest and
    man blood, burrows, conies
    rain, revel him.
  SERVANT. forward?
  SERVANT. To-morrow, to-day, presently.  
    drum struck afternoon; 'tis parcel their
    feast, executed ere wipe lips.
  SERVANT. Why, stirring world again.
    peace rust iron, increase tailors, and
    breed ballad-makers.
  SERVANT. war, I; exceeds peace as
    day night; spritely, waking, audible, full vent.
    Peace apoplexy, lethargy; mull'd, deaf, sleepy,
    insensible; getter bastard children war's a
    destroyer men.
  SERVANT. 'Tis so; war sort be
    ravisher, denied peace great maker of
    cuckolds.
  SERVANT. Ay, makes men hate another.
  SERVANT. Reason: another. The
    wars money. hope Romans cheap Volscians.
    rising, rising.
  BOTH. In, in, in, in!                                   Exeunt




SCENE VI.
Rome. public place

Enter Tribunes, SICINIUS BRUTUS

  SICINIUS. hear him, fear him.
    remedies tame. present peace
    quietness people, before
    wild hurry, make friends
    Blush world well; had,
    suffer by't, behold
    Dissentious numbers pest'ring streets see
    tradesmen singing shops, going
    functions friendly.

                          Enter MENENIUS

  BRUTUS. stood to't good time. Menenius?
  SICINIUS. 'Tis he, 'tis he. O, grown kind
    late. Hail, sir!
  MENENIUS. Hail both!
  SICINIUS. Coriolanus miss'd  
    friends. commonwealth doth stand,
    do, angry it.
  MENENIUS. All's well, better
    temporiz'd.
  SICINIUS. he, hear you?
  MENENIUS. Nay, hear nothing; mother wife
    Hear him.

                     Enter citizens

  CITIZENS. gods preserve both!
  SICINIUS. God-den, neighbours.
  BRUTUS. God-den all, god-den an.
  CITIZEN. Ourselves, wives, children, knees
    bound pray both.
  SICINIUS. Live thrive!
  BRUTUS. Farewell, kind neighbours; wish'd Coriolanus
    lov'd did.
  CITIZENS. gods you!
  TRIBUNES. Farewell, farewell.             Exeunt citizens  
  SICINIUS. happier comely time
    fellows ran streets
    Crying confusion.
  BRUTUS. Caius Marcius was
    worthy officer i' war, insolent,
    O'ercome pride, ambitious past thinking,
    Self-loving-
  SICINIUS. affecting sole throne,
    assistance.
  MENENIUS. so.
  SICINIUS. this, lamentation,
    consul, found so.
  BRUTUS. gods prevented it, Rome
    Sits safe him.

                             Enter AEDILE

  AEDILE. Worthy tribunes,
    slave, put prison,
    Reports Volsces powers  
    ent'red Roman territories,
    deepest malice war
    Destroy lies 'em.
  MENENIUS. 'Tis Aufidius,
    Who, hearing Marcius' banishment,
    Thrusts horns world,
    inshell'd Marcius stood Rome,
    durst peep out.
  SICINIUS. Come, talk Marcius?
  BRUTUS. rumourer whipp'd. be
    Volsces dare break us.
  MENENIUS. be!
    record can;
    examples hath been
    age. reason fellow
    punish him, heard this,
    chance whip information
    beat messenger bids beware
    dreaded.
  SICINIUS. me.  
    be.
  BRUTUS. Possible.

                           Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. nobles great earnestness going
    Senate House; news come
    turns countenances.
  SICINIUS. 'Tis slave-
    whip fore people's eyes- raising,
    report.
  MESSENGER. Yes, worthy sir,
    slave's report seconded, more,
    fearful, deliver'd.
  SICINIUS. fearful?
  MESSENGER. spoke freely mouths-
    probable know- Marcius,
    Join'd Aufidius, leads power 'gainst Rome,
    vows revenge spacious between
    young'st oldest thing.  
  SICINIUS. likely!
  BRUTUS. Rais'd weaker sort wish
    Good Marcius home again.
  SICINIUS. trick 't.
  MENENIUS. unlikely.
    Aufidius atone
    violent'st contrariety.

                      Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. Senate.
    fearful army, led Caius Marcius
    Aufidius, rages
    territories, already
    O'erborne way, consum'd fire took
    lay them.

                            Enter COMINIUS

  COMINIUS. O, made good work!  
  MENENIUS. news? news?
  COMINIUS. holp ravish daughters and
    melt city leads pates,
    wives dishonour'd noses-
  MENENIUS. news? news?
  COMINIUS. temples burned cement, and
    franchises, whereon stood, confin'd
    auger's bore.
  MENENIUS. Pray now, news?
    made fair work, fear me. Pray, news.
    Marcius join'd wi' th' Volscians-
  COMINIUS. If!
    god; leads thing
    Made deity Nature,
    shapes man better; follow him
    brats confidence
    boys pursuing summer butterflies,
    butchers killing flies.
  MENENIUS. made good work,
    apron men; stood  
    voice occupation and
    breath garlic-eaters!
  COMINIUS. shake
    Rome ears.
  MENENIUS. Hercules
    shake mellow fruit. made fair work!
  BRUTUS. true, sir?
  COMINIUS. Ay; pale
    find other. regions
    smilingly revolt, resists
    mock'd valiant ignorance,
    perish constant fools. is't blame him?
    enemies find him.
  MENENIUS. undone unless
    noble man mercy.
  COMINIUS. it?
    tribunes do't shame; people
    Deserve pity wolf
    shepherds; friends, they
    'Be good Rome'- charg'd  
    deserv'd hate,
    show'd fike enemies.
  MENENIUS. 'Tis true;
    putting house brand
    consume it, face
    'Beseech you, cease.' made fair hands,
    crafts! crafted fair!
  COMINIUS. brought
    trembling Rome, never
    S' incapable help.
  TRIBUNES. brought it.
  MENENIUS. How! Was't we? lov'd him, but, beasts
    cowardly nobles, gave clusters,
    hoot o' th' city.
  COMINIUS. fear
    roar again. Tullus Aufidius,
    men, obeys points
    officer. Desperation
    policy, strength, defence,
    Rome make them.  

                       Enter troop citizens

  MENENIUS. clusters.
    Aufidius him? they
    made air unwholesome cast
    stinking greasy caps hooting at
    Coriolanus' exile. coming,
    hair soldier's head
    prove whip; coxcombs
    threw caps tumble down,
    pay voices. 'Tis matter;
    burn coal
    deserv'd it.
  PLEBEIANS. Faith, hear fearful news.
  CITIZEN. mine part,
    banish him, 'twas pity.
  CITIZEN. I.
  CITIZEN. I; and, truth, very
    us. did, best;  
    willingly consented banishment, our
    will.
  COMINIUS. Y'are goodly things, voices!
  MENENIUS. made
    Good work, cry! Shall's Capitol?
  COMINIUS. O, ay, else?
                                    Exeunt COMINIUS MENENIUS
  SICINIUS. Go, masters, dismay'd;
    side glad have
    true fear. home,
    show sign fear.
  CITIZEN. gods good us! Come, masters, home. I
    i' th' wrong banish'd him.
  CITIZEN. all. come, home.
                                                 Exeunt citizens
  BRUTUS. news.
  SICINIUS. I.
  BRUTUS. Capitol. half wealth
    buy lie!
  SICINIUS. Pray go.                                Exeunt




SCENE VII.
A camp short distance Rome

Enter AUFIDIUS LIEUTENANT

  AUFIDIUS. fly th' Roman?
  LIEUTENANT. witchcraft's him, but
    soldiers grace fore meat,
    talk table, end;
    dark'ned action, sir,
    own.
  AUFIDIUS. now,
    means lame foot
    design. bears proudlier,
    person, thought would
    embrace him; nature
    changeling, excuse
    amended.
  LIEUTENANT. wish, sir-
    mean, particular- not
    Join'd commission him, either
    borne action yourself,  
    left solely.
  AUFIDIUS. understand thee well; thou sure,
    account, not
    urge him. seems,
    thinks, apparent
    th' vulgar eye, bears things fairly
    shows good husbandry Volscian state,
    Fights dragon-like, achieve soon
    draw sword; hath left undone
    break neck hazard mine
    Whene'er account.
  LIEUTENANT. Sir, beseech you, carry Rome?
  AUFIDIUS. places yield ere sits down,
    nobility Rome his;
    senators patricians love too.
    tribunes soldiers, people
    rash repeal hasty
    expel thence. Rome
    osprey fish, takes it
    sovereignty nature.  
    noble servant them, not
    Carry honours even. 'twas pride,
    daily fortune taints
    happy man; defect judgment,
    fail disposing chances
    lord of; nature,
    thing, moving
    th' casque th' cushion, commanding peace
    austerity garb
    controll'd war; these-
    hath spices all- all,
    dare free him- made fear'd,
    hated, banish'd. merit
    choke utt'rance. virtues
    Lie th' interpretation time;
    power, commendable,
    Hath tomb evident chair
    T' extol hath done.
    fire drives fire; nail, nail;
    Rights rights falter, strengths strengths fail.  
    Come, away. When, Caius, Rome thine,
    Thou art poor'st all; shortly art thou mine.
                                                          Exeunt
