ACT V. SCENE I.
Rome. public place

Enter MENENIUS, COMINIUS, SICINIUS BRUTUS, Tribunes, others

  MENENIUS. No, go. hear hath said
    general, lov'd him
    dear particular. call'd father;
    o' that? Go, banish'd him:
    mile tent fall down, knee
    mercy. Nay, coy'd
    hear Cominius speak, home.
  COMINIUS. me.
  MENENIUS. hear?
  COMINIUS. time call name.
    urg'd acquaintance, drops
    bled together. 'Coriolanus'
    answer to; forbid names;
    kind nothing, titleless,
    Till forg'd i' th' fire
    burning Rome.  
  MENENIUS. Why, so! made good work.
    pair tribunes wrack'd Rome
    make coals cheap- noble memory!
  COMINIUS. minded royal 'twas pardon
    expected; replied,
    bare petition state
    punish'd.
  MENENIUS. well.
    less?
  COMINIUS. offer'd awaken regard
    For's private friends; answer was,
    stay pick pile
    noisome musty chaff. 'twas folly,
    poor grain two, leave unburnt
    nose th' offence.
  MENENIUS. poor grain two!
    those. mother, wife, child,
    brave fellow too- grains:
    musty chaff, smelt
    moon. burnt you.  
  SICINIUS. Nay, pray patient; refuse aid
    never-needed help, not
    Upbraid's distress. sure, you
    country's pleader, good tongue,
    instant army make,
    stop countryman.
  MENENIUS. No; meddle.
  SICINIUS. Pray him.
  MENENIUS. do?
  BRUTUS. make trial love do
    Rome, Marcius.
  MENENIUS. Well, Marcius
    Return me, Cominius return'd,
    Unheard- then?
    discontented friend, grief-shot
    unkindness? Say't so?
  SICINIUS. good will
    Rome measure
    intended well.
  MENENIUS. undertake't;  
    hear me. bite lip
    hum good Cominius unhearts me.
    well: din'd;
    veins unfill'd, blood cold, then
    pout morning, unapt
    give forgive; stuff'd
    pipes conveyances blood
    wine feeding, suppler souls
    priest-like fasts. watch him
    Till dieted request,
    set him.
  BRUTUS. road kindness
    lose way.
  MENENIUS. Good faith, prove him,
    Speed will. ere long knowledge
    success.                                          Exit
  COMINIUS. hear him.
  SICINIUS. Not?
  COMINIUS. sit gold, eye
    Red 'twould burn Rome, injury  
    gaoler pity. kneel'd him;
    'Twas faintly 'Rise'; dismiss'd me
    speechless hand. do,
    writing me; not,
    Bound oath yield conditions;
    hope vain,
    noble mother wife,
    Who, hear, solicit him
    mercy country. hence,
    fair entreaties haste on.           Exeunt




SCENE II.
The Volscian camp Rome

Enter MENENIUS WATCH guard

  WATCH. Stay. you?
  WATCH. Stand, back.
  MENENIUS. guard men, 'tis well; but, leave,
    officer state come
    speak Coriolanus.
  WATCH. whence?
  MENENIUS. Rome.
  WATCH. pass; return. general
    hear thence.
  WATCH. Rome embrac'd fire before
    speak Coriolanus.
  MENENIUS. Good friends,
    heard general talk Rome
    friends there, lots blanks
    hath touch'd ears: Menenius.
  WATCH. so; back. virtue name
    passable.  
  MENENIUS. thee, fellow,
    Thy general lover. been
    book good acts men read
    fame unparallel'd haply amplified;
    verified friends-
    chief- size verity
    lapsing suffer. Nay, sometimes,
    bowl subtle ground,
    tumbled past throw, praise
    stamp'd leasing; therefore, fellow,
    leave pass.
  WATCH. Faith, sir, told lies behalf
    uttered words own, pass here;
    no, virtuous lie live chastely.
    back.
  MENENIUS. Prithee, fellow, remember Menenius, always
    factionary party general.
  WATCH. Howsoever liar, you
    have, that, telling true him, cannot
    pass. back.  
  MENENIUS. din'd, canst thou tell? speak with
    till dinner.
  WATCH. Roman, you?
  MENENIUS. thy general is.
  WATCH. hate Rome, does. you, when
    push'd gates defender them, in
    violent popular ignorance enemy shield, think
    front revenges easy groans women, the
    virginal palms daughters, palsied
    intercession decay'd dotant be? you
    blow intended fire city ready flame
    weak breath this? No, deceiv'd; therefore
    back Rome prepare execution. condemn'd;
    general sworn reprieve pardon.
  MENENIUS. Sirrah, thy captain knew here, me
    estimation.
  WATCH. Come, captain not.
  MENENIUS. thy general.
  WATCH. general cares you. Back, say; go, I
    half pint blood. Back- utmost  
    having. Back.
  MENENIUS. Nay, fellow, fellow-

                      Enter CORIOLANUS AUFIDIUS

  CORIOLANUS. matter?
  MENENIUS. Now, companion, errand you; shall
    estimation; perceive Jack
    guardant office son Coriolanus. Guess my
    entertainment thou stand'st i' th' state of
    hanging, death long spectatorship crueller
    suffering; behold presently, swoon come
    thee. glorious gods sit hourly synod thy
    prosperity, love thee worse thy father
    Menenius does! O son! son! thou art preparing fire us;
    thee, water quench it. moved come
    thee; assured move thee, I
    blown gates sighs, conjure thee to
    pardon Rome thy petitionary countrymen. good gods assuage
    thy wrath, turn dregs varlet here; this,  
    who, block, hath denied access thee.
  CORIOLANUS. Away!
  MENENIUS. How! away!
  CORIOLANUS. Wife, mother, child, not. affairs
    servanted others. owe
    revenge properly, remission lies
    Volscian breasts. familiar,
    Ingrate forgetfulness poison rather
    pity note much. gone.
    Mine ears suits stronger than
    gates force. Yet, lov'd thee,
    along; writ thy sake     [Gives letter]
    it. word, Menenius,
    hear thee speak. man, Aufidius,
    belov'd Rome; thou behold'st.
  AUFIDIUS. constant temper.
                                  Exeunt CORIOLANUS Aufidius
  WATCH. Now, sir, Menenius?
  WATCH. 'Tis spell, see, power! the
    home again.  
  WATCH. hear shent keeping your
    greatness back?
  WATCH. cause, think, swoon?
  MENENIUS. care th' world general; such
    things you, scarce any, y'are slight.
    hath die fears another.
    general worst. you, are, long;
    misery increase age! you, was
    to: Away!                                          Exit
  WATCH. noble fellow, warrant him.
  WATCH. worthy fellow general; rock, the
    oak wind-shaken.                            Exeunt




SCENE III.
The tent CORIOLANUS

Enter CORIOLANUS, AUFIDIUS, others

  CORIOLANUS. walls Rome to-morrow
    Set host. partner action,
    report th' Volscian lords plainly
    borne business.
  AUFIDIUS. ends
    respected; stopp'd ears against
    general suit Rome; admitted
    private whisper- no, friends
    thought you.
  CORIOLANUS. man,
    crack'd heart Rome,
    Lov'd measure father;
    Nay, godded indeed. latest refuge
    send him; love have-
    show'd sourly him- offer'd
    conditions, refuse
    accept. grace only,  
    thought more, little
    yielded to; fresh embassies suits,
    state private friends, hereafter
    lend ear to.  [Shout within]  Ha! shout this?
    tempted infringe vow
    time 'tis made? not.

       Enter, mourning habits, VIRGILIA, VOLUMNIA, VALERIA,
                   YOUNG MARCIUS, attendants

    wife foremost, honour'd mould
    trunk fram'd, hand
    grandchild blood. out, affection!
    bond privilege nature, break!
    virtuous obstinate.
    curtsy worth? doves' eyes,
    make gods forsworn? melt, not
    stronger earth others. mother bows,
    Olympus molehill should
    supplication nod; young boy  
    Hath aspect intercession which
    Great nature cries 'Deny not.' Volsces
    Plough Rome harrow Italy; never
    gosling obey instinct, stand
    man author himself
    knew kin.
  VIRGILIA. lord husband!
  CORIOLANUS. eyes wore Rome.
  VIRGILIA. sorrow delivers chang'd
    Makes so.
  CORIOLANUS. dull actor now
    forgot part out,
    full disgrace. flesh,
    Forgive tyranny; say,
    that, 'Forgive Romans.' O, kiss
    Long exile, sweet revenge!
    Now, jealous queen heaven, kiss
    carried thee, dear, true lip
    Hath virgin'd e'er since. gods! prate,
    noble mother world  
    Leave unsaluted. Sink, knee, i' th' earth;       [Kneels]
    thy deep duty impression show
    common sons.
  VOLUMNIA. O, stand blest!
    Whilst softer cushion flint
    kneel thee, unproperly
    Show duty, mistaken while
    child parent.                       [Kneels]
  CORIOLANUS. this?
    knees me, corrected son?
    pebbles hungry beach
    Fillip stars; mutinous winds
    Strike proud cedars 'gainst fiery sun,
    Murd'ring impossibility, make
    slight work.
  VOLUMNIA. Thou art warrior;
    holp frame thee. lady?
  CORIOLANUS. noble sister Publicola,
    moon Rome, chaste icicle
    curdied frost purest snow,  
    hangs Dian's temple- dear Valeria!
  VOLUMNIA. poor epitome yours,
    th' interpretation full time
    show yourself.
  CORIOLANUS. god soldiers,
    consent supreme Jove, inform
    Thy thoughts nobleness, thou mayst prove
    shame unvulnerable, stick i' th' wars
    great sea-mark, standing flaw,
    saving eye thee!
  VOLUMNIA. knee, sirrah.
  CORIOLANUS. brave boy.
  VOLUMNIA. he, wife, lady, myself,
    suitors you.
  CORIOLANUS. beseech you, peace!
    Or, ask, remember before:
    thing forsworn grant never
    held denials. bid me
    Dismiss soldiers, capitulate
    Rome's mechanics.  
    unnatural; desire not
    T'allay rages revenges with
    colder reasons.
  VOLUMNIA. O, more, more!
    grant thing-
    that
    deny already; ask,
    That, fail request, blame
    hang hardness; hear us.
  CORIOLANUS. Aufidius, Volsces, mark; we'll
    Hear nought Rome private. request?
  VOLUMNIA. silent speak, raiment
    state bodies bewray life
    led thy exile. thyself
    unfortunate living women
    hither; thy sight, should
    Make eyes flow joy, hearts dance comforts,
    Constrains weep shake fear sorrow,
    Making mother, wife, child, see
    son, husband, father, tearing  
    country's bowels out. poor we
    Thine enmity's capital: thou bar'st us
    prayers gods, comfort
    enjoy. we,
    Alas, country pray,
    Whereto bound, thy victory,
    Whereto bound? Alack, lose
    country, dear nurse, thy person,
    comfort country. find
    evident calamity, had
    wish, side win; thou
    foreign recreant led
    manacles streets, else
    Triumphantly tread thy country's ruin,
    bear palm bravely shed
    Thy wife children's blood. myself, son,
    purpose wait fortune till
    wars determine; persuade thee
    show noble grace parts
    seek end one, thou shalt sooner  
    March assault thy country tread-
    Trust to't, thou shalt not- thy mother's womb
    brought thee world.
  VIRGILIA. Ay, mine,
    brought boy name
    Living time.
  BOY. 'A tread me!
    run till bigger, fight.
  CORIOLANUS. woman's tenderness be
    Requires child woman's face see.
    sat long.                                [Rising]
  VOLUMNIA. Nay, thus.
    request tend
    save Romans, destroy
    Volsces serve, condemn us
    poisonous honour. No, suit
    reconcile them: Volsces
    'This mercy show'd,' Romans
    'This receiv'd,' side
    Give all-hail thee, cry 'Be blest  
    making peace!' Thou know'st, great son,
    end war's uncertain; certain,
    That, thou conquer Rome, benefit
    thou shalt reap name
    repetition dogg'd curses;
    chronicle writ: 'The man noble,
    attempt wip'd out,
    Destroy'd country, remains
    th' ensuing age abhorr'd.' Speak me, son.
    Thou hast affected fine strains honour,
    imitate graces gods,
    tear thunder wide cheeks o' th' air,
    charge thy sulphur bolt
    rive oak. dost speak?
    Think'st thou honourable noble man
    remember wrongs? Daughter, speak you:
    cares weeping. Speak thou, boy;
    thy childishness move more
    reasons. man world
    bound to's mother, lets prate  
    i' th' stocks. Thou hast thy life
    Show'd thy dear mother courtesy,
    she, poor hen, fond brood,
    cluck'd thee wars, safely home
    Loaden honour. request's unjust,
    spurn back; so,
    Thou art honest, gods plague thee,
    thou restrain'st duty which
    mother's part belongs. turns away.
    Down, ladies; shame knees.
    surname Coriolanus 'longs pride
    pity prayers. Down. end;
    last. home Rome,
    die neighbours. Nay, behold's!
    boy, have
    kneels holds hands fellowship,
    reason petition strength
    thou hast deny't. Come, go.
    fellow Volscian mother;
    wife Corioli, child  
    chance. give dispatch.
    hush'd city afire,
    speak little.
                              [He holds hand, silent]
  CORIOLANUS. O mother, mother!
    done? Behold, heavens ope,
    gods down, unnatural scene
    laugh at. O mother, mother! O!
    won happy victory Rome;
    son- it, O, it!-
    dangerously prevail'd,
    mortal him. come.
    Aufidius, make true wars,
    frame convenient peace. Now, good Aufidius,
    stead, heard
    mother less, granted less, Aufidius?
  AUFIDIUS. mov'd withal.
  CORIOLANUS. dare sworn were!
    And, sir, thing make
    Mine eyes sweat compassion. But, good sir,  
    peace you'fl make, advise me. part,
    Rome, back you; pray you
    Stand cause. O mother! wife!
  AUFIDIUS.  [Aside]  glad thou hast set thy mercy thy
      honour
    difference thee. work
    fortune.
  CORIOLANUS.  [To ladies]  Ay, by;
    drink together; bear
    witness back words, we,
    conditions, counter-seal'd.
    Come, enter us. Ladies, deserve
    temple built you. swords
    Italy, confederate arms,
    made peace.                       Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Rome. public place

Enter MENENIUS SICINIUS

  MENENIUS. yond coign o' th' Capitol, yond cornerstone?
  SICINIUS. Why, that?
  MENENIUS. displace little
    finger, hope ladies Rome, his
    mother, prevail him. hope in't;
    throats sentenc'd, stay execution.
  SICINIUS. Is't short time alter the
    condition man?
  MENENIUS. differency grub butterfly; yet
    butterfly grub. Marcius grown man to
    dragon; wings, creeping thing.
  SICINIUS. lov'd mother dearly.
  MENENIUS. me; remembers mother now
    eight-year-old horse. tartness face sours ripe
    grapes; walks, moves engine ground
    shrinks treading. pierce corslet with
    eye, talks knell, hum battery. sits  
    state thing made Alexander. bids is
    finish'd bidding. god but
    eternity, heaven throne in.
  SICINIUS. Yes- mercy, report truly.
  MENENIUS. paint character. Mark mercy mother
    bring him. mercy is
    milk male tiger; poor city find. this
    'long you.
  SICINIUS. gods good us!
  MENENIUS. No, case gods good us.
    banish'd respected them; and, returning to
    break necks, respect us.

                           Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. Sir, save life, fly house.
    plebeians fellow tribune
    hale down; swearing if
    Roman ladies bring comfort home
    give death inches.  

                         Enter MESSENGER

  SICINIUS. news?
  MESSENGER. Good news, good news! ladies prevail'd,
    Volscians dislodg'd, Marcius gone.
    merrier day greet Rome,
    No, th' expulsion Tarquins.
  SICINIUS. Friend,
    Art thou true? Is't certain?
  MESSENGER. sun fire.
    lurk'd, make doubt it?
    Ne'er arch hurried blown tide
    recomforted th' gates. Why, hark you!
                  [Trumpets, hautboys, drums beat, together]
    trumpets, sackbuts, psalteries, fifes,
    Tabors cymbals, shouting Romans,
    Make sun dance. Hark you!               [A shout within]
  MENENIUS. good news.
    meet ladies. Volumnia  
    worth consuls, senators, patricians,
    city full; tribunes you,
    sea land full. pray'd to-day:
    morning ten thousand throats
    doit. Hark, joy!
                                   [Sound shouts]
  SICINIUS. First, gods bless tidings; next,
    Accept thankfulness.
  MESSENGER. Sir, all
    Great give great thanks.
  SICINIUS. city?
  MESSENGER. point enter.
  SICINIUS. meet them,
    joy.                                     Exeunt




SCENE V.
Rome. street gate

Enter SENATORS VOLUMNIA, VIRGILIA, VALERIA, passing stage,
'With LORDS

  SENATOR. Behold patroness, life Rome!
    Call tribes together, praise gods,
    make triumphant fires; strew flowers them.
    Unshout noise banish'd Marcius,
    Repeal mother;
  ALL. Welcome, ladies, welcome!
                    [A flourish drums trumpets. Exeunt]




SCENE VI.
Corioli. public place

Enter TULLUS AUFIDIUS attendents

  AUFIDIUS. lords o' th' city here;
    Deliver paper' read it,
    Bid repair th' market-place, I,
    commons' ears,
    vouch truth it. accuse
    city ports hath enter'd and
    Intends t' people, hoping
    purge words. Dispatch.
                                               Exeunt attendants

           Enter CONSPIRATORS AUFIDIUS' faction

    welcome!
  CONSPIRATOR. general?
  AUFIDIUS. so
    man alms empoison'd,
    charity slain.  
  CONSPIRATOR. noble sir,
    hold intent wherein
    wish'd parties, deliver you
    great danger.
  AUFIDIUS. Sir, tell;
    proceed find people.
  CONSPIRATOR. people remain uncertain whilst
    'Twixt difference; fall either
    Makes survivor heir all.
  AUFIDIUS. it;
    pretext strike admits
    good construction. rais'd him, pawn'd
    Mine honour truth; heighten'd,
    watered plants dews flattery,
    Seducing friends; end
    bow'd nature, before
    rough, unswayable, free.
  CONSPIRATOR. Sir, stoutness
    stand consul, lost
    lack stooping-  
  AUFIDIUS. spoken of.
    banish'd for't, hearth,
    Presented knife throat. him;
    Made joint-servant me; gave way
    desires; nay, choose
    files, projects accomplish,
    freshest men; serv'd designments
    mine person; holp reap fame
    end his, pride
    wrong. Till, last,
    seem'd follower, partner; and
    wag'd countenance if
    mercenary.
  CONSPIRATOR. did, lord.
    army marvell'd it; and, last,
    carried Rome look'd
    spoil glory-
  AUFIDIUS. it;
    sinews stretch'd him.
    drops women's rheum,  
    cheap lies, sold blood labour
    great action; die,
    renew fall. But, hark!
                                                      [Drums and
                trumpets sound, great shouts people]
  CONSPIRATOR. native town enter'd post,
    welcomes home; returns
    Splitting air noise.
  CONSPIRATOR. patient fools,
    children hath slain, base throats tear
    giving glory.
  CONSPIRATOR. Therefore, vantage,
    Ere express move people
    say, feel sword,
    second. lies along,
    tale pronounc'd bury
    reasons body.
  AUFIDIUS. more:
    lords.
  
                     Enter LORDS city

  LORDS. home.
  AUFIDIUS. deserv'd it.
    But, worthy lords, heed perused
    written you?
  LORDS. have.
  LORD. grieve hear't.
    faults made last, think
    found easy fines; end
    begin, give away
    benefit levies, answering us
    charge, making treaty where
    yielding- admits excuse.
  AUFIDIUS. approaches; hear him.

            Enter CORIOLANUS, marching drum colours;
                      commoners him

  CORIOLANUS. Hail, lords! return'd soldier;  
    infected country's love
    parted hence, subsisting
    great command. know
    prosperously attempted, and
    bloody passage led wars to
    gates Rome. spoils brought home
    Doth counterpoise full part
    charges action. made peace
    honour Antiates
    shame th' Romans; deliver,
    Subscrib'd th' consuls patricians,
    seal o' th' Senate, what
    compounded on.
  AUFIDIUS. Read not, noble lords;
    traitor highest degree
    hath abus'd powers.
  CORIOLANUS. Traitor! now?
  AUFIDIUS. Ay, traitor, Marcius.
  CORIOLANUS. Marcius!
  AUFIDIUS. Ay, Marcius, Caius Marcius! Dost thou  
    grace thee robbery, thy stol'n name
    Coriolanus, Corioli?
    lords heads o' th' state, perfidiously
    betray'd business up,
    drops salt, city Rome-
    city- wife mother;
    Breaking oath resolution like
    twist rotten silk; admitting
    Counsel o' th' war; nurse's tears
    whin'd roar'd victory,
    pages blush'd him, men heart
    Look'd wond'ring others.
  CORIOLANUS. Hear'st thou, Mars?
  AUFIDIUS. god, thou boy tears-
  CORIOLANUS. Ha!
  AUFIDIUS. -no more.
  CORIOLANUS. Measureless liar, thou hast made heart
    great it. 'Boy'! O slave!
    Pardon me, lords, 'tis time ever
    forc'd scold. judgments, grave lords,  
    give cur lie; notion-
    wears stripes impress'd him, that
    bear beating grave- join
    thrust lie him.
  LORD. Peace, both, hear speak.
  CORIOLANUS. Cut pieces, Volsces; men lads,
    Stain edges me. 'Boy'! False hound!
    writ annals true, 'tis there
    That, eagle dove-cote, I
    Flutter'd Volscians Corioli.
    it. 'Boy'!
  AUFIDIUS. Why, noble lords,
    put mind blind fortune,
    shame, unholy braggart,
    Fore eyes ears?
  CONSPIRATORS. die for't.
  PEOPLE. Tear pieces. presently. kill'd my
    son. daughter. kill'd cousin Marcus. kill'd my
    father.
  LORD. Peace, ho! outrage- peace!  
    man noble, fame folds in
    orb o' th' earth. offences us
    judicious hearing. Stand, Aufidius,
    trouble peace.
  CORIOLANUS. O him,
    Aufidiuses, more- tribe,
    lawful sword!
  AUFIDIUS. Insolent villain!
  CONSPIRATORS. Kill, kill, kill, kill, kill him!
           [The CONSPIRATORS draw kill CORIOLANUS,who falls.
                                         AUFIDIUS stands him]
  LORDS. Hold, hold, hold, hold!
  AUFIDIUS. noble masters, hear speak.
  LORD. O Tullus!
  LORD. Thou hast deed whereat valour weep.
  LORD. Tread him. Masters all, quiet;
    Put swords.
  AUFIDIUS. lords, know- rage,
    Provok'd him, cannot- great danger
    man's life owe you, rejoice  
    cut off. honours
    call Senate, deliver
    loyal servant, endure
    heaviest censure.
  LORD. Bear body,
    mourn him. regarded
    noble corse herald
    follow um.
  LORD. impatience
    Takes Aufidius great part blame.
    make it.
  AUFIDIUS. rage gone,
    struck sorrow. up.
    Help, o' th' chiefest soldiers; one.
    Beat thou drum, speak mournfully;
    Trail steel pikes. city he
    Hath widowed unchilded one,
    hour bewail injury,
    noble memory.
    Assist.               Exeunt, bearing body CORIOLANUS  
                                          [A dead march sounded]


THE END

1609

CYMBELINE

by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  CYMBELINE, King Britain
  CLOTEN, son Queen husband
  POSTHUMUS LEONATUS, gentleman, husband Imogen
  BELARIUS, banished lord, disguised Morgan

  GUIDERIUS ARVIRAGUS, sons Cymbeline, disguised the
            names POLYDORE CADWAL, supposed sons Belarius
  PHILARIO, Italian, friend Posthumus
  IACHIMO,  Italian, friend Philario
  FRENCH GENTLEMAN, friend Philario
  CAIUS LUCIUS, General Roman Forces
  ROMAN CAPTAIN
  BRITISH CAPTAINS
  PISANIO, servant Posthumus
  CORNELIUS, physician
  LORDS Cymbeline's court
  GENTLEMEN same
  GAOLERS

  QUEEN, wife Cymbeline  
  IMOGEN, daughter Cymbeline queen
  HELEN, lady attending Imogen

  APPARITIONS

  Lords, Ladies, Roman Senators, Tribunes, Soothsayer, a
    Dutch Gentleman, Spanish Gentleman, Musicians, Officers,
    Captains, Soldiers, Messengers, Attendants

SCENE:
Britain; Italy



ACT I. SCENE I.
Britain. garden CYMBELINE'S palace

  GENTLEMAN. meet man frowns; bloods
    obey heavens courtiers
    King's.
  GENTLEMAN. matter?
  GENTLEMAN. daughter, heir of's kingdom, whom
    purpos'd wife's sole son- widow
    late married- hath referr'd herself
    poor worthy gentleman. wedded;
    husband banish'd; imprison'd. All
    outward sorrow, King
    touch'd heart.
  GENTLEMAN. King?
  GENTLEMAN. hath lost too. Queen,
    desir'd match. courtier,
    wear faces bent
    King's looks, hath heart not
    Glad thing scowl at.
  GENTLEMAN. so?
  GENTLEMAN. hath miss'd Princess thing  
    bad bad report; hath her-
    married her, alack, good man!
    banish'd- creature such
    As, seek regions earth
    like, failing
    compare. think
    fair outward stuff within
    Endows man he.
  GENTLEMAN. speak far.
  GENTLEMAN. extend him, sir, himself;
    Crush unfold
    measure duly.
  GENTLEMAN. birth?
  GENTLEMAN. delve root; father
    call'd Sicilius, join honour
    Romans Cassibelan,
    titles Tenantius, whom
    serv'd glory admir'd success,
    gain'd sur-addition Leonatus;
    had, gentleman question,  
    sons, who, wars o' th' time,
    Died swords hand; father,
    fond issue, sorrow
    quit being; gentle lady,
    Big gentleman, theme, deceas'd
    born. King takes babe
    protection, calls Posthumus Leonatus,
    Breeds makes bed-chamber,
    Puts learnings time
    make receiver of; took,
    air, fast 'twas minist'red,
    in's spring harvest, liv'd court-
    rare do- prais'd, lov'd,
    sample youngest; th' mature
    glass feated them; graver
    child guided dotards. mistress,
    banish'd- price
    Proclaims esteem'd virtue;
    election read
    kind man is.  
  GENTLEMAN. honour him
    report. pray me,
    sole child th' King?
  GENTLEMAN. child.
    sons- worth hearing,
    Mark it- eldest years old,
    I' th' swathing clothes other, nursery
    stol'n; hour guess knowledge
    went.
  GENTLEMAN. long ago?
  GENTLEMAN. twenty years.
  GENTLEMAN. king's children convey'd,
    slackly guarded, search slow
    trace them!
  GENTLEMAN. Howsoe'er 'tis strange,
    negligence laugh'd at,
    true, sir.
  GENTLEMAN. you.
  GENTLEMAN. forbear; gentleman,
    Queen, Princess.                              Exeunt  

              Enter QUEEN, POSTHUMUS, IMOGEN

  QUEEN. No, assur'd find me, daughter,
    slander stepmothers,
    Evil-ey'd you. prisoner, but
    gaoler deliver keys
    lock restraint. you, Posthumus,
    win th' offended King,
    advocate. Marry, yet
    fire rage him, 'twere good
    lean'd sentence patience
    wisdom inform you.
  POSTHUMUS. Highness,
    to-day.
  QUEEN. peril.
    fetch turn garden, pitying
    pangs barr'd affections, King
    Hath charg'd speak together.             Exit
  IMOGEN. O dissembling courtesy! fine tyrant  
    tickle wounds! dearest husband,
    fear father's wrath, nothing-
    reserv'd holy duty- what
    rage me. gone;
    abide hourly shot
    angry eyes, comforted live
    jewel world
    again.
  POSTHUMUS. queen! mistress!
    O lady, weep more, give cause
    suspected tenderness
    doth man. remain
    loyal'st husband e'er plight troth;
    residence Rome Philario's,
    father friend, me
    letter; thither write, queen,
    mine eyes drink words send,
    ink made gall.

                     Re-enter QUEEN  

  QUEEN. brief, pray you.
    King come, incur not
    displeasure. [Aside] move him
    walk way. wrong
    buy injuries, friends;
    Pays dear offences.                              Exit
  POSTHUMUS. taking leave
    long term live,
    loathness depart grow. Adieu!
  IMOGEN. Nay, stay little.
    riding air yourself,
    parting petty. here, love:
    diamond mother's; it, heart;
    till woo wife,
    Imogen dead.
  POSTHUMUS. How, how? Another?
    gentle gods, give have,
    sear embracements next
    bonds death! Remain, remain thou  
                                              [Puts ring]
    sense on. And, sweetest, fairest,
    poor exchange you,
    infinite loss, trifles
    win you. sake wear this;
    manacle love; place it
    fairest prisoner.     [Puts bracelet arm]
  IMOGEN. O gods!
    again?

                  Enter CYMBELINE LORDS

  POSTHUMUS. Alack, King!
  CYMBELINE. Thou basest thing, avoid; sight
    command thou fraught court
    thy unworthiness, thou diest. Away!
    Thou'rt poison blood.
  POSTHUMUS. gods protect you,
    bless good remainders court!
    gone.                                              Exit  
  IMOGEN. pinch death
    sharp is.
  CYMBELINE. O disloyal thing,
    shouldst repair youth, thou heap'st
    year's age me!
  IMOGEN. beseech you, sir,
    Harm vexation.
    senseless wrath; touch rare
    Subdues pangs, fears.
  CYMBELINE. Past grace? obedience?
  IMOGEN. Past hope, despair; past grace.
  CYMBELINE. mightst sole son queen!
  IMOGEN. O blessed not! chose eagle,
    avoid puttock.
  CYMBELINE. Thou took'st beggar, wouldst made throne
    seat baseness.
  IMOGEN. No; added
    lustre it.
  CYMBELINE. O thou vile one!
  IMOGEN. Sir,  
    fault lov'd Posthumus.
    bred playfellow, is
    man worth woman; overbuys me
    sum pays.
  CYMBELINE. What, art thou mad?
  IMOGEN. Almost, sir. Heaven restore me! were
    neat-herd's daughter, Leonatus
    neighbour shepherd's son!

                          Re-enter QUEEN

  CYMBELINE. Thou foolish thing!
    [To QUEEN] together. done
    command. her,
    pen up.
  QUEEN. Beseech patience.- Peace,
    Dear lady daughter, peace!- Sweet sovereign,
    Leave ourselves, make comfort
    advice.
  CYMBELINE. Nay, languish  
    drop blood day and, aged,
    Die folly.                          Exit, LORDS

                          Enter PISANIO

  QUEEN. Fie! give way.
    servant. now, sir! news?
  PISANIO. lord son drew master.
  QUEEN. Ha!
    harm, trust, done?
  PISANIO. been,
    master play'd fought,
    anger; parted
    gentlemen hand.
  QUEEN. glad on't.
  IMOGEN. son's father's friend; takes part
    draw exile! O brave sir!
    Afric together;
    needle, prick
    goer-back. master?  
  PISANIO. command. suffer me
    bring haven; left notes
    commands subject to,
    When't pleas'd employ me.
  QUEEN. hath been
    faithful servant. dare lay mine honour
    remain so.
  PISANIO. humbly Highness.
  QUEEN. Pray walk awhile.
  IMOGEN. half-hour hence,
    Pray speak me. least
    lord aboard. time leave me.        Exeunt




SCENE II.
Britain. public place

Enter CLOTEN LORDS

  LORD. Sir, advise shift shirt; violence
    action hath made reek sacrifice. air out,
    air in; abroad wholesome vent.
  CLOTEN. shirt bloody, shift it. hurt him?
  LORD. [Aside] No, faith; patience.
  LORD. Hurt him! body's passable carcass not
    hurt. throughfare steel hurt.
  LORD. [Aside] steel debt; o' th' back
    side town.
  CLOTEN. villain stand me.
  LORD. [Aside] No; fled forward still, your
    face.
  LORD. Stand you? land own; he
    added having, gave ground.
  LORD. [Aside] inches oceans.
    Puppies!
  CLOTEN. us.  
  LORD. [Aside] I, till measur'd long a
    fool ground.
  CLOTEN. love fellow, refuse me!
  LORD. [Aside] sin make true election, is
    damn'd.
  LORD. Sir, told always, beauty brain go
    together; good sign, small reflection
    wit.
  LORD. [Aside] shines fools, reflection
    hurt her.
  CLOTEN. Come, chamber. hurt
    done!
  LORD. [Aside] so; fall of
    ass, great hurt.
  CLOTEN. us?
  LORD. attend lordship.
  CLOTEN. Nay, come, together.
  LORD. Well, lord.                             Exeunt




SCENE III.
Britain. CYMBELINE'S palace

Enter IMOGEN PISANIO

  IMOGEN. thou grew'st shores o' th' haven,
    questioned'st sail; write,
    it, 'twere paper lost,
    offer'd mercy is. last
    spake thee?
  PISANIO. was: queen, queen!
  IMOGEN. wav'd handkerchief?
  PISANIO. kiss'd it, madam.
  IMOGEN. Senseless linen, happier I!
    all?
  PISANIO. No, madam; long
    make eye, care
    Distinguish others, keep
    deck, glove, hat, handkerchief,
    waving, fits stirs of's mind
    express slow soul sail'd on,
    swift ship.  
  IMOGEN. Thou shouldst made him
    crow, less, ere left
    after-eye him.
  PISANIO. Madam, did.
  IMOGEN. broke mine eyestrings, crack'd but
    him, till diminution
    space pointed sharp needle;
    Nay, till melted from
    smallness gnat air, then
    turn'd mine eye wept. But, good Pisanio,
    hear him?
  PISANIO. assur'd, madam,
    vantage.
  IMOGEN. leave him, had
    pretty things say. Ere him
    hours
    thoughts such; make swear
    shes Italy betray
    Mine interest honour; charg'd him,
    sixth hour morn, noon, midnight,  
    T' encounter orisons, then
    heaven him; ere could
    Give parting kiss set
    Betwixt charming words, father,
    tyrannous breathing north
    Shakes buds growing.

                        Enter LADY

  LADY. Queen, madam,
    Desires Highness' company.
  IMOGEN. things bid do, dispatch'd.
    attend Queen.
  PISANIO. Madam, shall.                                Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Rome. PHILARIO'S house

Enter PHILARIO, IACHIMO, FRENCHMAN, DUTCHMAN, SPANIARD

  IACHIMO. it, sir, Britain. then
    crescent note, expected prove worthy hath
    allowed of. look'd him
    admiration, catalogue his
    endowments tabled side, peruse by
    items.
  PHILARIO. speak furnish'd he
    makes within.
  FRENCHMAN. France; could
    behold sun firm eyes he.
  IACHIMO. matter marrying king's daughter, he
    weighed own, words him, I
    doubt not, great deal matter.
  FRENCHMAN. banishment.
  IACHIMO. Ay, approbation weep lamentable
    divorce colours wonderfully extend him, it
    fortify judgment, easy battery lay  
    flat, taking beggar, quality. it
    sojourn you? creeps acquaintance?
  PHILARIO. father soldiers together, have
    bound life.

                       Enter POSTHUMUS

    Briton. entertained as
    suits gentlemen knowing stranger his
    quality. beseech gentleman,
    commend noble friend mine. worthy is
    leave hereafter, story his
    hearing.
  FRENCHMAN. Sir, Orleans.
  POSTHUMUS. debtor courtesies,
    pay pay still.
  FRENCHMAN. Sir, o'errate poor kindness. glad did
    atone countryman you; pity have
    put mortal purpose bore,
    importance slight trivial nature.  
  POSTHUMUS. pardon, sir. young traveller;
    shunn'd heard every
    action guided others' experiences; mended
    judgment- offend mended- quarrel not
    altogether slight.
  FRENCHMAN. Faith, yes, put arbitrement swords, and
    likelihood confounded the
    fall'n both.
  IACHIMO. we, manners, difference?
  FRENCHMAN. Safely, think. 'Twas contention public, which
    may, contradiction, suffer report. like
    argument fell night, fell in
    praise country mistresses; gentleman time
    vouching- warrant bloody affirmation- more
    fair, virtuous, wise, chaste, constant, qualified, less
    attemptable, rarest ladies France.
  IACHIMO. lady living, gentleman's opinion,
    this, worn out.
  POSTHUMUS. holds virtue still, mind.
  IACHIMO. prefer fore Italy.  
  POSTHUMUS. provok'd France, abate
    nothing, profess adorer, friend.
  IACHIMO. fair good- kind hand-in-hand comparison-
    fair good lady Britain.
    diamond yours
    outlustres beheld, she
    excelled many; precious diamond that
    is, lady.
  POSTHUMUS. prais'd rated her. stone.
  IACHIMO. esteem at?
  POSTHUMUS. world enjoys.
  IACHIMO. unparagon'd mistress dead, she's
    outpriz'd trifle.
  POSTHUMUS. mistaken: sold given, there
    wealth purchase merit gift; the
    thing sale, gift gods.
  IACHIMO. gods you?
  POSTHUMUS. graces keep.
  IACHIMO. wear title yours; strange fowl
    light neighbouring ponds. ring stol'n too.  
    brace unprizable estimations, frail and
    casual; cunning thief, that-way-accomplish'd
    courtier, hazard winning last.
  POSTHUMUS. Italy accomplish'd courtier to
    convince honour mistress, holding loss of
    term frail. doubt store of
    thieves; notwithstanding, fear ring.
  PHILARIO. leave here, gentlemen.
  POSTHUMUS. Sir, heart. worthy signior, thank
    him, makes stranger me; familiar first.
  IACHIMO. times conversation ground
    fair mistress; make back yielding, had
    admittance opportunity friend.
  POSTHUMUS. No, no.
  IACHIMO. dare pawn moiety estate your
    ring, which, opinion, o'ervalues something. make
    wager confidence reputation; and,
    bar offence too, durst attempt any
    lady world.
  POSTHUMUS. great deal abus'd bold persuasion,  
    doubt sustain y'are worthy attempt.
  IACHIMO. that?
  POSTHUMUS. repulse; attempt, call it, deserve
    more- punishment too.
  PHILARIO. Gentlemen, this. suddenly; let
    die born, pray acquainted.
  IACHIMO. put estate neighbour's th'
    approbation spoke!
  POSTHUMUS. lady choose assail?
  IACHIMO. Yours, constancy stands safe. will
    lay ten thousand ducats ring that, commend the
    court lady is, advantage the
    opportunity conference, bring thence
    honour imagine reserv'd.
  POSTHUMUS. wage gold, gold it. ring I
    hold dear finger; 'tis part it.
  IACHIMO. friend, wiser. buy
    ladies' flesh million dram, preserve from
    tainting. religion you, fear.
  POSTHUMUS. custom tongue; bear graver  
    purpose, hope.
  IACHIMO. master speeches, undergo what's
    spoken, swear.
  POSTHUMUS. you? lend diamond till return.
    covenants drawn between's. mistress exceeds in
    goodness hugeness unworthy thinking. dare to
    match: ring.
  PHILARIO. lay.
  IACHIMO. gods, one. bring sufficient
    testimony enjoy'd dearest bodily part your
    mistress, ten thousand ducats yours; diamond
    too. off, leave honour have
    trust in, jewel, jewel, gold yours-
    provided commendation free entertainment.
  POSTHUMUS. embrace conditions; articles betwixt
    us. Only, answer: make voyage upon
    her, give directly understand prevail'd, am
    enemy- worth debate; remain
    unseduc'd, making otherwise, ill
    opinion th' assault made chastity  
    answer sword.
  IACHIMO. hand- covenant! things set down
    lawful counsel, straight Britain, the
    bargain catch cold starve. fetch gold and
    wagers recorded.
  POSTHUMUS. Agreed.                Exeunt POSTHUMUS IACHIMO
  FRENCHMAN. hold, you?
  PHILARIO. Signior Iachimo it. Pray follow 'em.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE V.
Britain. CYMBELINE'S palace

Enter QUEEN, LADIES, CORNELIUS

  QUEEN. Whiles dew's ground, gather flowers;
    Make haste; note them?
  LADY. I, madam.
  QUEEN. Dispatch.                                 Exeunt LADIES
    Now, Master Doctor, brought drugs?
  CORNELIUS. Pleaseth Highness, ay. are, madam.
                                              [Presenting box]
    beseech Grace, offence-
    conscience bids ask- wherefore have
    Commanded poisonous compounds
    movers languishing death,
    But, slow, deadly?
  QUEEN. wonder, Doctor,
    Thou ask'st question. been
    Thy pupil long? Hast thou learn'd how
    make perfumes? distil? preserve? yea, so
    great king doth woo oft  
    confections? proceeded-
    thou think'st devilish- is't meet
    amplify judgment in
    conclusions? forces
    thy compounds creatures as
    count worth hanging- human-
    vigour them, apply
    Allayments act, gather
    virtues effects.
  CORNELIUS. Highness
    practice make hard heart;
    Besides, effects be
    noisome infectious.
  QUEEN. O, content thee.

                        Enter PISANIO

    [Aside] flattering rascal; him
    work. master,
    enemy son.- now, Pisanio!  
    Doctor, service time ended;
    way.
  CORNELIUS. [Aside] suspect you, madam;
    harm.
  QUEEN. [To PISANIO] Hark thee, word.
  CORNELIUS. [Aside] her. doth has
    Strange ling'ring poisons. spirit,
    trust malice with
    drug damn'd nature. has
    stupefy dull sense awhile,
    perchance prove cats dogs,
    afterward higher; is
    danger show death makes,
    locking spirits time,
    fresh, reviving. fool'd
    false effect; truer
    false her.
  QUEEN. service, Doctor,
    send thee.
  CORNELIUS. humbly leave.                        Exit  
  QUEEN. Weeps still, say'st thou? Dost thou time
    quench, instructions enter
    folly possesses? thou work.
    thou shalt bring word loves son,
    thee instant thou art then
    great thy master; greater, for
    fortunes lie speechless, name
    gasp. Return cannot, nor
    Continue is. shift being
    exchange misery another,
    day to
    day's work him. shalt thou expect
    depender thing leans,
    built, friends
    prop him?
                  [The QUEEN drops box. PISANIO takes up]
    Thou tak'st up
    Thou know'st what; thy labour.
    thing made, hath King
    times redeem'd death.  
    cordial. Nay, prithee it;
    earnest good
    thee. thy mistress how
    case stands her; do't thyself.
    chance thou changest on; think
    Thou hast thy mistress still; boot, son,
    notice thee. move King
    shape thy preferment, such
    thou'lt desire; myself, chiefly,
    set thee desert, bound
    load thy merit richly. Call women.
    words.                              Exit PISANIO
    sly constant knave,
    shak'd; agent master,
    remembrancer hold
    hand-fast lord. that
    Which, take, unpeople her
    leigers sweet; after,
    bend humour, assur'd
    taste too.  

                   Re-enter PISANIO LADIES

    So, so. done, done.
    violets, cowslips, primroses,
    Bear closet. Fare thee well, Pisanio;
    words.                   Exeunt QUEEN LADIES
  PISANIO. do.
    good lord prove untrue
    choke myself- you.         Exit




SCENE VI.
Britain. palace

Enter IMOGEN alone

  IMOGEN. father cruel step-dame false;
    foolish suitor wedded lady
    hath husband banish'd. O, husband!
    supreme crown grief! repeated
    Vexations it! thief-stol'n,
    brothers, happy! miserable
    desire glorious. Blessed those,
    soe'er, honest wills,
    seasons comfort. be? Fie!

                    Enter PISANIO IACHIMO

  PISANIO. Madam, noble gentleman Rome
    lord letters.
  IACHIMO. Change you, madam?
    worthy Leonatus safety,
    greets Highness dearly.         [Presents letter]  
  IMOGEN. Thanks, good sir.
    kindly welcome.
  IACHIMO. [Aside] door rich!
    furnish'd mind rare,
    th' Arabian bird, I
    lost wager. Boldness friend!
    Arm me, audacity, head foot!
    Or, Parthian, flying fight;
    Rather, directly fly.
  IMOGEN. [Reads] 'He noblest note, whose
    kindnesses infinitely tied. Reflect him
    accordingly, trust.       LEONATUS.'

    read aloud;
    middle heart
    warm'd th' rest takes thankfully.
    welcome, worthy sir, I
    words bid you; find so
    do.
  IACHIMO. Thanks, fairest lady.  
    What, men mad? Hath nature eyes
    vaulted arch rich crop
    sea land, distinguish 'twixt
    fiery orbs twinn'd stones
    number'd beach, not
    Partition make spectacles precious
    'Twixt fair foul?
  IMOGEN. makes admiration?
  IACHIMO. i' th' eye, apes monkeys,
    'Twixt shes, chatter and
    Contemn mows other; i' th' judgment,
    idiots case favour would
    wisely definite; i' th' appetite;
    Sluttery, neat excellence oppos'd,
    make desire vomit emptiness,
    allur'd feed.
  IMOGEN. matter, trow?
  IACHIMO. cloyed will-
    satiate unsatisfied desire, tub
    fill'd running- ravening lamb,  
    Longs garbage.
  IMOGEN. What, dear sir,
    raps you? well?
  IACHIMO. Thanks, madam; well.- Beseech you, sir,
    Desire man's abode leave him.
    strange peevish.
  PISANIO. going, sir,
    give welcome.                                    Exit
  IMOGEN. Continues lord? health beseech you?
  IACHIMO. Well, madam.
  IMOGEN. dispos'd mirth? hope is.
  IACHIMO. Exceeding pleasant; stranger there
    merry gamesome. call'd
    Britain reveller.
  IMOGEN. here
    incline sadness, oft-times
    knowing why.
  IACHIMO. sad.
    Frenchman companion, one
    eminent monsieur that, seems, loves  
    Gallian girl home. furnaces
    thick sighs him; whiles jolly Briton-
    lord, mean- laughs from's free lungs, cries 'O,
    sides hold, man- knows
    history, report, proof,
    woman is, yea, choose
    be- will's free hours languish for
    Assured bondage?'
  IMOGEN. lord so?
  IACHIMO. Ay, madam, eyes flood laughter.
    recreation by
    hear mock Frenchman. heavens know
    men blame.
  IMOGEN. he, hope.
  IACHIMO. he; heaven's bounty might
    us'd thankfully. himself, 'tis much;
    you, account his, talents.
    Whilst bound wonder, bound
    pity too.
  IMOGEN. pity, sir?  
  IACHIMO. creatures heartily.
  IMOGEN. one, sir?
    me: wreck discern me
    Deserves pity?
  IACHIMO. Lamentable! What,
    hide radiant sun solace
    I' th' dungeon snuff?
  IMOGEN. pray you, sir,
    Deliver openness answers
    demands. pity me?
  IACHIMO. do,
    say, enjoy your- But
    office gods venge it,
    mine speak on't.
  IMOGEN. know
    me, concerns me; pray you-
    doubting things ill hurts more
    do; certainties
    past remedies, or, timely knowing,
    remedy born- discover  
    spur stop.
  IACHIMO. cheek
    bathe lips upon; hand, touch,
    touch, force feeler's soul
    th' oath loyalty; object, which
    Takes prisoner wild motion mine eye,
    Fixing here; I, damn'd then,
    Slaver lips common stairs
    mount Capitol; join gripes hands
    Made hard hourly falsehood- falsehood as
    labour; by-peeping eye
    Base illustrious smoky light
    fed stinking tallow- fit
    plagues hell time
    Encounter revolt.
  IMOGEN. lord, fear,
    forgot Britain.
  IACHIMO. himself. I
    Inclin'd intelligence pronounce
    beggary change; 'tis graces  
    mutest conscience tongue
    Charms report out.
  IMOGEN. hear more.
  IACHIMO. O dearest soul, doth strike heart
    pity doth make sick! lady
    fair, fasten'd empery,
    make great'st king double, partner'd
    tomboys hir'd exhibition
    coffers yield! diseas'd ventures
    play infirmities gold
    rottenness lend nature! boil'd stuff
    poison poison! reveng'd;
    bore queen, you
    Recoil great stock.
  IMOGEN. Reveng'd?
    reveng'd? true-
    heart mine ears
    haste abuse- true,
    reveng'd?
  IACHIMO. make  
    Live Diana's priest betwixt cold sheets,
    Whiles vaulting variable ramps,
    despite, purse? Revenge it.
    dedicate sweet pleasure,
    noble runagate bed,
    continue fast affection,
    close sure.
  IMOGEN. ho, Pisanio!
  IACHIMO. service tender lips.
  IMOGEN. Away! condemn mine ears have
    long attended thee. thou wert honourable,
    Thou wouldst told tale virtue, not
    end thou seek'st, base strange.
    Thou wrong'st gentleman far
    thy report thou honour; and
    Solicits lady disdains
    Thee devil alike.- ho, Pisanio!-
    King father made acquainted
    thy assault. fit
    saucy stranger court mart  
    Romish stew, expound
    beastly mind us, hath court
    cares for, daughter who
    respects all.- ho, Pisanio!
  IACHIMO. O happy Leonatus! say
    credit thy lady hath thee
    Deserves thy trust, thy perfect goodness
    assur'd credit. Blessed live long,
    lady worthiest sir ever
    Country call'd his! mistress, only
    worthiest fit! Give pardon.
    spoke affiance
    deeply rooted, make lord
    o'er; one
    truest manner'd, holy witch
    enchants societies him,
    Half men's hearts his.
  IMOGEN. make amends.
  IACHIMO. sits 'mongst men descended god:
    hath kind honour sets  
    mortal seeming. angry,
    mighty Princess, adventur'd
    taking false report, hath
    Honour'd confirmation great judgment
    election sir rare,
    err. love bear him
    Made fan thus; gods made you,
    Unlike others, chaffless. Pray pardon.
  IMOGEN. All's well, sir; pow'r i' th' court yours.
  IACHIMO. humble thanks. forgot
    T' entreat Grace small request,
    moment too, concerns
    lord; noble friends
    partners business.
  IMOGEN. Pray is't?
  IACHIMO. dozen Romans us, lord-
    feather wing- mingled sums
    buy present Emperor;
    I, factor rest, done
    France. 'Tis plate rare device, jewels  
    rich exquisite form, values great;
    curious, strange,
    safe stowage. you
    protection?
  IMOGEN. Willingly;
    pawn mine honour safety. Since
    lord hath interest them, them
    bedchamber.
  IACHIMO. trunk,
    Attended men. make bold
    send night;
    aboard to-morrow.
  IMOGEN. O, no, no.
  IACHIMO. Yes, beseech; short word
    length'ning return. Gallia
    cross'd seas purpose promise
    Grace.
  IMOGEN. pains.
    to-morrow!
  IACHIMO. O, must, madam.  
    beseech you, please
    greet lord writing, do't to-night.
    outstood time, material
    'To th' tender present.
  IMOGEN. write.
    Send trunk me; safe kept
    yielded you. welcome.           Exeunt

ACT II. SCENE I.
Britain. CYMBELINE'S palace

Enter CLOTEN LORDS

  CLOTEN. man luck! kiss'd jack,
    up-cast hit away! hundred pound on't; and
    whoreson jackanapes swearing, I
    borrowed mine oaths him, spend my
    pleasure.
  LORD. that? broke pate your
    bowl.
  LORD. [Aside] wit broke it, it
    run out.
  CLOTEN. gentleman dispos'd swear, any
    standers-by curtail oaths. Ha?
  LORD. No, lord; [Aside] crop ears them.
  CLOTEN. Whoreson dog! give satisfaction? been
    rank!
  LORD. [Aside] smell'd fool.
  CLOTEN. vex'd th' earth. pox on't! I
    noble am; dare fight me,  
    Queen mother. jackslave hath bellyful
    fighting, cock nobody
    match.
  LORD. [Aside] cock capon too; crow,
    cock, comb on.
  CLOTEN. Sayest thou?
  LORD. fit lordship undertake every
    companion give offence to.
  CLOTEN. No, that; fit commit offence to
    inferiors.
  LORD. Ay, fit lordship only.
  CLOTEN. Why, say.
  LORD. hear stranger court
    to-night?
  CLOTEN. stranger, on't?
  LORD. [Aside] strange fellow himself, it
    not.
  LORD. Italian come, and, 'tis thought, of
    Leonatus' friends.
  CLOTEN. Leonatus? banish'd rascal; another, whatsoever  
    be. told stranger?
  LORD. lordship's pages.
  CLOTEN. fit him? derogation
    in't?
  LORD. derogate, lord.
  CLOTEN. easily, think.
  LORD. [Aside] fool granted; issues,
    foolish, derogate.
  CLOTEN. Come, Italian. lost to-day at
    bowls win to-night him. Come, go.
  LORD. attend lordship.
                                    Exeunt CLOTEN LORD
    crafty devil mother
    yield world ass! woman that
    Bears brain; son
    twenty, heart,
    leave eighteen. Alas, poor princess,
    Thou divine Imogen, thou endur'st,
    Betwixt father thy step-dame govern'd,
    mother hourly coining plots, wooer  
    hateful foul expulsion is
    thy dear husband, horrid act
    divorce make! heavens hold firm
    walls thy dear honour, unshak'd
    temple, thy fair mind, thou mayst stand
    T' enjoy thy banish'd lord great land!         Exit




SCENE II.
Britain. IMOGEN'S bedchamber CYMBELINE'S palace; trunk corner

Enter IMOGEN bed, LADY attending

  IMOGEN. there? woman? Helen?
  LADY. you, madam.
  IMOGEN. hour it?
  LADY. midnight, madam.
  IMOGEN. read hours then. Mine eyes weak;
    Fold leaf left. bed.
    taper, leave burning;
    thou canst awake o' th' clock,
    prithee call me. Sleep hath seiz'd wholly.    Exit LADY
    protection commend me, gods.
    fairies tempters night
    Guard me, beseech ye!
                          [Sleeps. IACHIMO trunk]
  IACHIMO. crickets sing, man's o'er-labour'd sense
    Repairs rest. Tarquin thus
    softly press rushes ere waken'd  
    chastity wounded. Cytherea,
    bravely thou becom'st thy bed! fresh lily,
    whiter sheets! touch!
    kiss; kiss! Rubies unparagon'd,
    dearly do't! 'Tis breathing that
    Perfumes chamber thus. flame o' th' taper
    Bows under-peep lids
    th' enclosed lights, canopied
    windows white azure, lac'd
    blue heaven's tinct. design
    note chamber. write down:
    pictures; window; such
    Th' adornment bed; arras, figures-
    Why, such; contents o' th' story.
    Ah, natural notes body
    ten thousand meaner movables
    testify, t' enrich mine inventory.
    O sleep, thou ape death, lie dull her!
    sense monument,
    chapel lying! off, off;  
                                       [Taking bracelet]
    slippery Gordian knot hard!
    'Tis mine; witness outwardly,
    strongly conscience within,
    th' madding lord. left breast
    mole cinque-spotted, crimson drops
    I' th' bottom cowslip. voucher
    Stronger law make; secret
    force pick'd lock ta'en
    treasure honour. more. end?
    write riveted,
    Screw'd memory? hath reading late
    tale Tereus; leaf's turn'd down
    Philomel gave up. enough.
    th' trunk again, shut spring it.
    Swift, swift, dragons night, dawning
    bare raven's eye! lodge fear;
    heavenly angel, hell here.  [Clock strikes]
    One, two, three. Time, time!             Exit trunk




SCENE III.
CYMBELINE'S palace. ante-chamber adjoining IMOGEN'S apartments

Enter CLOTEN LORDS

  LORD. lordship patient man loss, most
    coldest turn'd ace.
  CLOTEN. make man cold lose.
  LORD. man patient noble temper of
    lordship. hot furious win.
  CLOTEN. Winning put man courage. this
    foolish Imogen, gold enough. morning,
    is't not?
  LORD. Day, lord.
  CLOTEN. music come. advised give her
    music mornings; penetrate.

                       Enter musicians

    on, tune. penetrate fingering, so.
    tongue too. do, remain;  
    give o'er. First, excellent good-conceited
    thing; after, wonderful sweet air, admirable rich words to
    it- consider.

                 SONG

      Hark, hark! lark heaven's gate sings,
        Phoebus 'gins arise,
      steeds water springs
        chalic'd flow'rs lies;
      winking Mary-buds begin
        ope golden eyes.
      pretty bin,
        lady sweet, arise;
          Arise, arise!

    So, gone. penetrate, music
    better; not, vice ears which
    horsehairs calves' guts, voice unpaved eunuch to
    boot, amend.                      Exeunt musicians  

                    Enter CYMBELINE QUEEN

  LORD. King.
  CLOTEN. glad late, reason up
    early. choose service done
    fatherly.- Good morrow Majesty gracious mother.
  CYMBELINE. Attend door stern daughter?
    forth?
  CLOTEN. assail'd musics, vouchsafes no
    notice.
  CYMBELINE. exile minion new;
    hath forgot him; time
    wear print remembrance out,
    yours.
  QUEEN. bound th' King,
    lets vantages may
    Prefer daughter. Frame yourself
    orderly soliciting, friended
    aptness season; make denials  
    Increase services; if
    inspir'd duties which
    tender her; obey her,
    Save command dismission tends,
    senseless.
  CLOTEN. Senseless? so.

                    Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. you, sir, ambassadors Rome;
    Caius Lucius.
  CYMBELINE. worthy fellow,
    Albeit angry purpose now;
    fault his. receive him
    honour sender;
    himself, goodness forespent us,
    extend notice. dear son,
    good morning mistress,
    Attend Queen us; need
    T' employ Roman. Come, queen.  
                                           Exeunt CLOTEN
  CLOTEN. up, speak her; not,
    lie dream. leave, ho!     [Knocks]
    women her; what
    line hands? 'Tis gold
    buys admittance; oft doth-yea, makes
    Diana's rangers false themselves, yield up
    deer th' stand o' th' stealer; 'tis gold
    makes true man kill'd saves thief;
    Nay, hangs thief true man. What
    undo? make
    women lawyer me, for
    understand case myself.
    leave.                                      [Knocks]

                            Enter LADY

  LADY. knocks?
  CLOTEN. gentleman.
  LADY. more?  
  CLOTEN. Yes, gentlewoman's son.
  LADY. more
    tailors dear yours
    justly boast of. lordship's pleasure?
  CLOTEN. lady's person; ready?
  LADY. Ay,
    chamber.
  CLOTEN. gold you; sell good report.
  LADY. How? good name? report you
    good? Princess!

                        Enter IMOGEN

  CLOTEN. Good morrow, fairest sister. sweet hand.
                                                       Exit LADY
  IMOGEN. Good morrow, sir. lay pains
    purchasing trouble. give
    telling poor thanks,
    scarce spare them.
  CLOTEN. swear love you.  
  IMOGEN. so, 'twere deep me.
    swear still, recompense still
    regard not.
  CLOTEN. answer.
  IMOGEN. yield, silent,
    speak. pray spare me. Faith,
    unfold equal discourtesy
    kindness; great knowing
    learn, taught, forbearance.
  CLOTEN. leave madness 'twere sin;
    not.
  IMOGEN. Fools mad folks.
  CLOTEN. call fool?
  IMOGEN. mad, do;
    patient, mad;
    cures both. sorry, sir,
    put forget lady's manners
    verbal; learn now, all,
    I, heart, pronounce,
    th' truth it, care you,  
    lack charity
    accuse hate you; rather
    felt make't boast.
  CLOTEN. sin against
    Obedience, owe father. For
    contract pretend base wretch,
    bred alms foster'd cold dishes,
    scraps o' th' court- contract, none.
    allowed meaner parties-
    mean?- knit souls-
    dependency
    brats beggary- self-figur'd knot,
    curb'd enlargement by
    consequence o' th' crown, foil
    precious note base slave,
    hilding livery, squire's cloth,
    pantler- eminent!
  IMOGEN. Profane fellow!
    Wert thou son Jupiter, more
    thou art besides, thou wert base  
    groom. Thou wert dignified enough,
    point envy, 'twere made
    Comparative virtues styl'd
    under-hangman kingdom, hated
    preferr'd well.
  CLOTEN. south fog rot him!
  IMOGEN. meet mischance come
    nam'd thee. mean'st garment
    hath clipp'd body dearer
    respect hairs thee,
    made men. now, Pisanio!

                    Enter PISANIO

  CLOTEN. 'His garments'! devil-
  IMOGEN. Dorothy woman hie thee presently.
  CLOTEN. 'His garment'!
  IMOGEN. sprited fool;
    Frighted, ang'red worse. bid woman
    Search jewel casually  
    Hath left mine arm. thy master's; shrew me,
    lose revenue
    king's Europe! think
    saw't morning; confident am
    night 'twas mine arm; kiss'd it.
    hope lord
    kiss aught he.
  PISANIO. 'Twill lost.
  IMOGEN. hope so. search.                 Exit PISANIO
  CLOTEN. abus'd me.
    'His meanest garment'!
  IMOGEN. Ay, so, sir.
    make 't action, call witness 't.
  CLOTEN. inform father.
  IMOGEN. mother too.
    good lady conceive, hope,
    worst me. leave you, sir,
    th' worst discontent.                             Exit
  CLOTEN. reveng'd.
    'His mean'st garment'! Well.                            Exit




SCENE IV.
Rome. PHILARIO'S house

Enter POSTHUMUS PHILARIO

  POSTHUMUS. Fear not, sir; sure
    win King bold honour
    remain hers.
  PHILARIO. means make him?
  POSTHUMUS. any; abide change time,
    Quake present winter's state, wish
    warmer days come. fear'd hopes
    barely gratify love; failing,
    die debtor.
  PHILARIO. goodness company
    O'erpays do. king
    Hath heard great Augustus. Caius Lucius
    do's commission throughly; think
    grant tribute, send th' arrearages,
    Romans, remembrance
    fresh grief.
  POSTHUMUS.  
    Statist none, be,
    prove war; hear
    legions Gallia sooner landed
    not-fearing Britain tidings
    penny tribute paid. countrymen
    men order'd Julius Caesar
    Smil'd lack skill, found courage
    Worthy frowning at. discipline,
    mingled courages, make known
    approvers people such
    mend world.

                      Enter IACHIMO

  PHILARIO. See! Iachimo!
  POSTHUMUS. swiftest harts posted land,
    winds comers kiss'd sails,
    make vessel nimble.
  PHILARIO. Welcome, sir.
  POSTHUMUS. hope briefness answer made  
    speediness return.
  IACHIMO. lady
    fairest look'd upon.
  POSTHUMUS. therewithal best; beauty
    casement allure false hearts,
    false them.
  IACHIMO. letters you.
  POSTHUMUS. tenour good, trust.
  IACHIMO. 'Tis like.
  PHILARIO. Caius Lucius Britain court
    there?
  IACHIMO. expected then,
    approach'd.
  POSTHUMUS. yet.
    Sparkles stone wont, is't not
    dull good wearing?
  IACHIMO. lost it,
    lost worth gold.
    make journey t' enjoy
    night sweet shortness  
    mine Britain; ring won.
  POSTHUMUS. stone's hard by.
  IACHIMO. whit,
    lady easy.
  POSTHUMUS. Make not, sir,
    loss sport. hope we
    continue friends.
  IACHIMO. Good sir, must,
    covenant. brought
    knowledge mistress home, grant
    question farther; now
    Profess winner honour,
    ring; wronger
    you, proceeded but
    wills.
  POSTHUMUS. make't apparent
    tasted bed, hand
    ring yours. not, foul opinion
    pure honour gains loses
    sword mine, masterless leaves  
    find them.
  IACHIMO. Sir, circumstances,
    truth make them,
    induce believe- strength
    confirm oath; doubt not
    give leave spare find
    not.
  POSTHUMUS. Proceed.
  IACHIMO. First, bedchamber,
    confess slept not, profess
    worth watching-it hang'd
    tapestry silk silver; story,
    Proud Cleopatra met Roman
    Cydnus swell'd banks, for
    press boats pride. piece work
    bravely done, rich, strive
    workmanship value; wonder'd
    rarely wrought,
    true life on't was-
  POSTHUMUS. true;  
    heard here, me
    other.
  IACHIMO. particulars
    justify knowledge.
  POSTHUMUS. must,
    honour injury.
  IACHIMO. chimney
    south chamber, chimneypiece
    Chaste Dian bathing. figures
    report themselves. cutter
    nature, dumb; outwent her,
    Motion breath left out.
  POSTHUMUS. thing
    relation likewise reap,
    Being, is, spoke of.
  IACHIMO. roof o' th' chamber
    golden cherubins fretted; andirons-
    forgot them- winking Cupids
    silver, foot standing, nicely
    Depending brands.  
  POSTHUMUS. honour!
    granted this, praise
    remembrance; description
    chamber saves
    wager laid.
  IACHIMO. Then, can,                [Shows bracelet]
    pale. beg leave air jewel. See!
    'tis again. married
    diamond; them.
  POSTHUMUS. Jove!
    behold it. that
    left her?
  IACHIMO. Sir- her- that.
    stripp'd arm; yet;
    pretty action outsell gift,
    enrich'd too. gave me, said
    priz'd once.
  POSTHUMUS. pluck'd of
    send me.
  IACHIMO. writes you, doth she?  
  POSTHUMUS. O, no, no, no! 'tis true. Here, too;
                                                [Gives ring]
    basilisk mine eye,
    Kills on't. honour
    beauty; truth semblance; love
    man. vows women
    bondage made
    virtues, nothing.
    O, measure false!
  PHILARIO. patience, sir,
    ring again; 'tis won.
    probable lost it, or
    women, corrupted
    Hath stol'n her?
  POSTHUMUS. true;
    hope by't. Back ring.
    Render corporal sign her,
    evident this; stol'n.
  IACHIMO. Jupiter, arm!
  POSTHUMUS. Hark you, swears; Jupiter swears.  
    'Tis true- nay, ring, 'tis true. sure
    lose it. attendants are
    sworn honourable- induc'd steal it!
    stranger! No, hath enjoy'd her.
    cognizance incontinency
    this: hath bought whore dearly.
    There, thy hire; fiends hell
    Divide you!
  PHILARIO. Sir, patient;
    strong believ'd
    persuaded of.
  POSTHUMUS. talk on't;
    hath colted him.
  IACHIMO. seek
    satisfying, breast-
    Worthy pressing- lies mole, proud
    delicate lodging. life,
    kiss'd it; gave present hunger
    feed again, full. remember
    stain her?  
  POSTHUMUS. Ay, doth confirm
    stain, big hell hold,
    it.
  IACHIMO. hear more?
  POSTHUMUS. Spare arithmetic; count turns.
    Once, million!
  IACHIMO. sworn-
  POSTHUMUS. swearing.
    swear done't, lie;
    kill thee thou dost deny
    Thou'st made cuckold.
  IACHIMO. deny nothing.
  POSTHUMUS. O tear limb-meal!
    do't, i' th' court, before
    father. something-                          Exit
  PHILARIO. besides
    government patience! won.
    follow pervert present wrath
    hath himself.
  IACHIMO. heart.                             Exeunt




SCENE V.
Rome. room PHILARIO'S house

Enter POSTHUMUS

  POSTHUMUS. men be, women
    half-workers? bastards,
    venerable man I
    call father where
    stamp'd. coiner tools
    Made counterfeit; mother seem'd
    Dian time. doth wife
    nonpareil this. O, vengeance, vengeance!
    lawful pleasure restrain'd,
    pray'd oft forbearance; with
    pudency rosy, sweet view on't
    warm'd Saturn; thought her
    chaste unsunn'd snow. O, devils!
    yellow Iachimo hour- was't not?
    less!- first? Perchance spoke not, but,
    full-acorn'd boar, German one,
    Cried 'O!' mounted; found opposition  
    look'd oppose she
    encounter guard. find out
    woman's part me! motion
    vice man affirm
    woman's part. lying, note it,
    woman's; flattering, hers; deceiving, hers;
    Lust rank thoughts, hers, hers; revenges, hers;
    Ambitions, covetings, change prides, disdain,
    Nice longing, slanders, mutability,
    faults man name, nay, hell knows,
    Why, hers, part all; all;
    vice
    constant, changing still
    vice minute one
    half that. write them,
    Detest them, curse them. 'tis greater skill
    true hate pray will:
    devils plague better.              Exit
