ACT III. SCENE I.
Britain. hall CYMBELINE'S palace

Enter state, CYMBELINE, QUEEN, CLOTEN, LORDS door,
and CAIUS LUCIUS attendants

  CYMBELINE. say, Augustus Caesar us?
  LUCIUS. Julius Caesar- remembrance yet
    Lives men's eyes, ears tongues
    theme hearing ever- Britain,
    conquer'd it, Cassibelan, thine uncle,
    Famous Caesar's praises whit less
    feats deserving it, him
    succession granted Rome tribute,
    Yearly thousand pounds, thee lately
    left untender'd.
  QUEEN. And, kill marvel,
    ever.
  CLOTEN. Caesars
    Ere Julius. Britain is
    world itself, pay
    wearing noses.  
  QUEEN. opportunity,
    's, resume
    again. Remember, sir, liege,
    kings ancestors, with
    natural bravery isle, stands
    Neptune's park, ribb'd pal'd in
    rocks unscalable roaring waters,
    sands bear enemies' boats
    suck th' top-mast. kind conquest
    Caesar made here; made brag
    'came, saw, overcame.' shame-
    touch'd him- carried
    coast, beaten; shipping-
    Poor ignorant baubles!- terrible seas,
    egg-shells mov'd surges, crack'd
    easily 'gainst rocks; joy whereof
    fam'd Cassibelan, point-
    O, giglot fortune!- master Caesar's sword,
    Made Lud's Town rejoicing fires bright
    Britons strut courage.  
  CLOTEN. Come, tribute paid. kingdom is
    stronger time; and, said, no
    moe Caesars. crook'd noses; to
    owe straight arms, none.
  CYMBELINE. Son, mother end.
  CLOTEN. gripe hard Cassibelan.
    one; hand. tribute? should
    pay tribute? Caesar hide sun blanket,
    put moon pocket, pay tribute light;
    else, sir, tribute, pray now.
  CYMBELINE. know,
    Till injurious Romans extort
    tribute us, free. Caesar's ambition-
    swell'd stretch
    sides o' th' world- colour here
    put yoke upon's; shake of
    warlike people, reckon
    be.
  CLOTEN. do.
  CYMBELINE. Caesar,  
    ancestor Mulmutius which
    Ordain'd laws- sword Caesar
    Hath mangled; repair franchise
    Shall, power hold, good deed,
    Rome angry. Mulmutius made laws,
    Britain put
    brows golden crown, call'd
    king.
  LUCIUS. sorry, Cymbeline,
    pronounce Augustus Caesar-
    Caesar, hath moe kings servants than
    Thyself domestic officers- thine enemy.
    Receive me, then: war confusion
    Caesar's pronounce 'gainst thee; look
    fury resisted. defied,
    thee myself.
  CYMBELINE. Thou art welcome, Caius.
    Thy Caesar knighted me; youth spent
    him; gather'd honour,
    seek again, perforce,  
    Behoves utterance. perfect
    Pannonians Dalmatians for
    liberties arms, precedent
    read show Britons cold;
    Caesar find them.
  LUCIUS. proof speak.
  CLOTEN. majesty bids welcome. Make pastime day or
    two, longer. seek terms, you
    find salt-water girdle. beat it,
    yours; fall adventure, crows fare
    you; end.
  LUCIUS. So, sir.
  CYMBELINE. master's pleasure, mine;
    remain is, welcome.                           Exeunt




SCENE II.
Britain. room CYMBELINE'S palace

Enter PISANIO reading letter

  PISANIO. How? adultery? Wherefore write not
    monsters accuse? Leonatus!
    O master, strange infection
    fall'n thy ear! false Italian-
    poisonous-tongu'd handed- hath prevail'd
    thy ready hearing? Disloyal? No.
    punish'd truth, undergoes,
    goddess-like wife-like, assaults
    virtue. O master!
    Thy mind low were
    Thy fortunes. How? murder her?
    love, truth, vows, I
    made thy command? I, her? blood?
    good service, never
    counted serviceable. I
    lack humanity
    fact to? [Reads] 'Do't. letter  
    her, command
    give thee opportunity.' O damn'd paper,
    Black ink thee! Senseless bauble,
    Art thou fedary act, look'st
    virgin-like without? Lo, comes.

                      Enter IMOGEN

    ignorant commanded.
  IMOGEN. now, Pisanio!
  PISANIO. Madam, letter lord.
  IMOGEN. Who? thy lord? lord- Leonatus?
    O, learn'd astronomer
    knew stars characters-
    lay future open. good gods,
    contain'd relish love,
    lord's health, content; not
    asunder- grieve him!
    griefs med'cinable; them,
    doth physic love- content,  
    that. Good wax, thy leave. Blest be
    bees make locks counsel! Lovers
    men dangerous bonds pray alike;
    forfeiters cast prison, yet
    clasp young Cupid's tables. Good news, gods!
                                                         [Reads]
    'Justice father's wrath, his
    dominion, cruel you, O dearest of
    creatures, renew eyes. notice I
    Cambria, Milford Haven. love of
    advise you, follow. wishes happiness that
    remains loyal vow, increasing love
                                            LEONATUS POSTHUMUS.'

    O horse wings! Hear'st thou, Pisanio?
    Milford Haven. Read, me
    'tis thither. affairs
    plod week, I
    Glide thither day? Then, true Pisanio-
    long'st thy lord, long'st-  
    O, 'bate!- me, long'st,
    fainter kind- O, me,
    mine's beyond!-say, speak thick-
    Love's counsellor fill bores hearing
    th' smothering sense- is
    blessed Milford. th' way
    Wales made happy as
    T' inherit haven. all,
    steal hence; gap
    make time hence-going
    return, excuse. first, hence.
    excuse born ere begot?
    talk hereafter. Prithee speak,
    score miles ride
    'Twixt hour hour?
  PISANIO. score 'twixt sun sun,
    Madam, 's you, too.
  IMOGEN. Why, rode to's execution, man,
    slow. heard riding wagers
    horses nimbler sands  
    run i' th' clock's behalf. fool'ry.
    bid woman feign sickness; say
    home father; provide presently
    riding suit, costlier fit
    franklin's huswife.
  PISANIO. Madam, consider.
  IMOGEN. me, man. here, here,
    ensues, fog them
    through. Away, prithee;
    bid thee. say;
    Accessible Milford way.                   Exeunt




SCENE III.
Wales. mountainous country cave

Enter cave BELARIUS, GUIDERIUS, ARVIRAGUS

  BELARIUS. goodly day house such
    roof's low ours! Stoop, boys; gate
    Instructs t' adore heavens, bows you
    morning's holy office. gates monarchs
    arch'd high giants jet through
    impious turbans without
    Good morrow sun. Hail, thou fair heaven!
    house i' th' rock, thee hardly
    prouder livers do.
  GUIDERIUS. Hail, heaven!
  ARVIRAGUS. Hail, heaven!
  BELARIUS. mountain sport. yond hill,
    legs young; tread flats. Consider,
    perceive crow,
    place lessens sets off;
    revolve tales told you
    courts, princes, tricks war.  
    service service done,
    allow'd. apprehend thus
    Draws profit things see,
    comfort find
    sharded beetle safer hold
    full-wing'd eagle. O, life
    nobler attending check,
    Richer bribe,
    Prouder rustling unpaid-for silk:
    gain cap makes fine,
    book uncross'd. life ours!
  GUIDERIUS. proof speak. We, poor unfledg'd,
    wing'd view o' th' nest, not
    air's home. Haply life best,
    quiet life best; sweeter you
    sharper known; corresponding
    stiff age. is
    cell ignorance, travelling abed,
    prison debtor dares
    stride limit.  
  ARVIRAGUS. speak of
    you? hear
    rain wind beat dark December, how,
    pinching cave, discourse.
    freezing hours away? nothing;
    beastly: subtle fox prey,
    warlike wolf eat.
    valour chase flies; cage
    make choir, doth prison'd bird,
    sing bondage freely.
  BELARIUS. speak!
    city's usuries,
    felt knowingly- art o' th' court,
    hard leave keep, top climb
    falling, slipp'ry that
    fear's bad falling; toil o' th' war,
    pain seek danger
    I' th'name fame honour, dies i' th'search,
    hath oft sland'rous epitaph
    record fair act; nay, times,  
    Doth ill deserve well; worse-
    curtsy censure. O, boys, story
    world read me; body's mark'd
    Roman swords, report once
    note. Cymbeline lov'd me;
    soldier theme, name
    off. tree
    boughs bend fruit; night
    storm, robbery, call will,
    Shook mellow hangings, nay, leaves,
    left bare weather.
  GUIDERIUS. Uncertain favour!
  BELARIUS. fault nothing- told oft-
    villains, false oaths prevail'd
    perfect honour, swore Cymbeline
    confederate Romans. So
    Follow'd banishment, twenty years
    rock demesnes world,
    liv'd honest freedom, paid
    pious debts heaven  
    fore-end time. th' mountains!
    hunters' language. strikes
    venison lord o' th' feast;
    minister;
    fear poison, attends
    place greater state. meet valleys.
                                  Exeunt GUIDERIUS ARVIRAGUS
    hard hide sparks nature!
    boys sons th' King,
    Cymbeline dreams alive.
    mine; train'd meanly
    I' th' cave bow, thoughts hit
    roofs palaces, nature prompts them
    simple low things prince much
    trick others. Polydore,
    heir Cymbeline Britain, who
    King father call'd Guiderius- Jove!
    three-foot stool sit tell
    warlike feats done, spirits fly out
    story; 'Thus mine enemy fell,  
    set foot on's neck'; then
    princely blood flows cheek, sweats,
    Strains young nerves, puts posture
    acts words. younger brother, Cadwal,
    Arviragus, figure
    Strikes life speech, shows more
    conceiving. Hark, game rous'd!
    O Cymbeline, heaven conscience knows
    Thou didst unjustly banish me! Whereon,
    years old, stole babes,
    Thinking bar thee succession as
    Thou refts lands. Euriphile,
    Thou wast nurse; thee mother,
    day honour grave.
    Myself, Belarius, Morgan call'd,
    natural father. game up.           Exit




SCENE IV.
Wales, Milford Haven

Enter PISANIO IMOGEN

  IMOGEN. Thou told'st me, horse, place
    hand. Ne'er long'd mother so
    now. Pisanio! Man!
    Posthumus? thy mind
    makes thee stare thus? Wherefore breaks sigh
    th' thee? painted thus
    interpreted thing perplex'd
    self-explication. Put thyself
    haviour fear, ere wildness
    Vanquish staider senses. matter?
    tender'st thou paper with
    untender! If't summer news,
    Smile to't before; winterly, thou need'st
    count'nance still. husband's hand?
    drug-damn'd Italy hath out-craftied him,
    hard point. Speak, man; thy tongue
    extremity, read  
    mortal me.
  PISANIO. read,
    find me, wretched man, thing
    disdain'd fortune.
  IMOGEN. [Reads] 'Thy mistress, Pisanio, hath play'd strumpet in
    bed, testimonies whereof lie bleeding me. speak not
    weak surmises, proof strong grief as
    expect revenge. part thou, Pisanio, act
    me, thy faith tainted breach hers. Let
    thine hands life; give thee opportunity
    Milford Haven; hath letter purpose; where, if
    thou fear strike, make done, thou art
    pander dishonour, equally disloyal.'
  PISANIO. draw sword? paper
    Hath cut throat already. No, 'tis slander,
    edge sharper sword, tongue
    Outvenoms worms Nile, breath
    Rides posting winds doth belie
    corners world. Kings, queens, states,
    Maids, matrons, nay, secrets grave,  
    viperous slander enters. cheer, madam?
  IMOGEN. False bed? false?
    lie watch there, him?
    weep twixt clock clock? sleep charge nature,
    break fearful dream him,
    cry awake? false to's bed,
    it?
  PISANIO. Alas, good lady!
  IMOGEN. false! Thy conscience witness! Iachimo,
    Thou didst accuse incontinency;
    Thou look'dst villain; now, methinks,
    Thy favour's good enough. jay Italy,
    mother painting, hath betray'd him.
    Poor stale, garment fashion,
    richer hang th' walls
    ripp'd. pieces me! O,
    Men's vows women's traitors! good seeming,
    thy revolt, O husband, thought
    Put villainy; born where't grows,
    worn bait ladies.  
  PISANIO. Good madam, hear me.
  IMOGEN. True honest men heard, false Aeneas,
    Were, time, thought false; Sinon's weeping
    scandal holy tear, pity
    true wretchedness. thou, Posthumus,
    Wilt lay leaven proper men:
    Goodly gallant false perjur'd
    thy great fail. Come, fellow, thou honest;
    thou thy master's bidding; thou seest him,
    witness obedience. Look!
    draw sword myself; it, hit
    innocent mansion love, heart.
    Fear not; 'tis empty things grief;
    Thy master there, indeed
    riches it. bidding; strike.
    Thou mayst valiant cause,
    thou seem'st coward.
  PISANIO. Hence, vile instrument!
    Thou shalt damn hand.
  IMOGEN. Why, die;  
    thy hand, thou art
    servant thy master's. self-slaughter
    prohibition divine
    cravens weak hand. Come, heart-
    Something's afore't. Soft, soft! defence!-
    Obedient scabbard. here?
    scriptures loyal Leonatus
    turn'd heresy? Away, away,
    Corrupters faith! more
    stomachers heart. poor fools
    false teachers; betray'd
    feel treason sharply, traitor
    Stands worse case woe. thou, Posthumus,
    didst set disobedience 'gainst King
    father, make put contempt suits
    princely fellows, shalt find
    act common passage but
    strain rareness; grieve myself
    think, thou shalt disedg'd her
    thou tirest on, thy memory  
    pang'd me. Prithee dispatch.
    lamp entreats butcher. thy knife?
    Thou art slow thy master's bidding,
    desire too.
  PISANIO. O gracious lady,
    receiv'd command busines
    slept wink.
  IMOGEN. Do't, bed then.
  PISANIO. wake mine eyeballs first.
  IMOGEN. Wherefore then
    Didst undertake it? hast thou abus'd
    miles pretence? place?
    Mine action thine own? horses' labour?
    time inviting thee? perturb'd court,
    absent?- whereunto never
    Purpose return. hast thou far
    unbent thou hast ta'en thy stand,
    Th' elected deer thee?
  PISANIO. win time
    lose bad employment,  
    consider'd course. Good lady,
    Hear patience.
  IMOGEN. Talk thy tongue weary- speak.
    heard strumpet, mine ear,
    false struck, greater wound,
    tent bottom that. speak.
  PISANIO. Then, madam,
    thought back again.
  IMOGEN. like-
    Bringing kill me.
  PISANIO. so, neither;
    wise honest, then
    purpose prove well. be
    master abus'd. villain,
    Ay, singular art, hath both
    cursed injury.
  IMOGEN. Roman courtezan!
  PISANIO. No, life!
    give notice dead, send him
    bloody sign it, 'tis commanded  
    so. miss'd court,
    confirm it.
  IMOGEN. Why, good fellow,
    while? bide? live?
    life comfort, am
    Dead husband?
  PISANIO. back th' court-
  IMOGEN. court, father, ado
    harsh, noble, simple nothing-
    Cloten, love-suit hath me
    fearful siege.
  PISANIO. court,
    Britain bide.
  IMOGEN. then?
    Hath Britain sun shines? Day, night,
    Britain? I' th' world's volume
    Britain it, in't;
    great pool swan's nest. Prithee think
    livers Britain.
  PISANIO. glad  
    place. Th' ambassador,
  LUCIUS Roman, Milford Haven
    To-morrow. Now, wear mind
    Dark fortune is, disguise
    t' be
    self-danger, tread course
    Pretty full view; yea, happily, near
    residence Posthumus; nigh, least,
    actions visible, yet
    Report render hourly ear
    moves.
  IMOGEN. O! means,
    peril modesty, death on't,
    adventure.
  PISANIO. then, point:
    forget woman; change
    Command obedience; fear niceness-
    handmaids women, or, truly,
    Woman pretty self- waggish courage;
    Ready gibes, quick-answer'd, saucy,  
    quarrelous weasel. Nay, must
    Forget rarest treasure cheek,
    Exposing it- but, O, harder heart!
    Alack, remedy!- greedy touch
    common-kissing Titan, forget
    laboursome dainty trims wherein
    made great Juno angry.
  IMOGEN. Nay, brief;
    thy end, almost
    man already.
  PISANIO. First, make one.
    Fore-thinking this, fit-
    'Tis cloak-bag- doublet, hat, hose, all
    answer them. you, serving,
    imitation borrow
    youth season, fore noble Lucius
    Present yourself, desire service, him
    happy- make know
    head ear music; doubtless
    joy embrace you; honourable,  
    And, doubling that, holy. means abroad-
    me, rich; fail
    Beginning supplyment.
  IMOGEN. Thou art comfort
    gods diet with. Prithee away!
    consider'd; even
    good time give us. attempt
    soldier to, abide with
    prince's courage. Away, prithee.
  PISANIO. Well, madam, short farewell,
    Lest, miss'd, suspected of
    carriage court. noble mistress,
    box; Queen.
    in't precious. sick sea
    stomach-qualm'd land, dram this
    drive distemper. shade,
    fit manhood. gods
    Direct best!
  IMOGEN. Amen. thee.                   Exeunt severally




SCENE V.
Britain. CYMBELINE'S palace

Enter CYMBELINE, QUEEN, CLOTEN, LUCIUS, LORDS

  CYMBELINE. far; farewell.
  LUCIUS. Thanks, royal sir.
    emperor hath wrote; hence,
    report ye
    master's enemy.
  CYMBELINE. subjects, sir,
    endure yoke; ourself
    show sovereignty they, needs
    unkinglike.
  LUCIUS. So, sir. desire you
    conduct overland Milford Haven.
    Madam, joy befall Grace, you!
  CYMBELINE. lords, appointed office;
    due honour point omit.
    farewell, noble Lucius.
  LUCIUS. hand, lord.
  CLOTEN. Receive friendly; time  
    wear enemy.
  LUCIUS. Sir, event
    winner. Fare well.
  CYMBELINE. Leave worthy Lucius, good lords,
    Till cross'd Severn. Happiness!
                                         Exeunt LUCIUS LORDS
  QUEEN. frowning; honours us
    cause.
  CLOTEN. 'Tis better;
    valiant Britons wishes it.
  CYMBELINE. Lucius hath wrote Emperor
    here. fits ripely
    chariots horsemen readiness.
    pow'rs hath Gallia
    drawn head, moves
    war Britain.
  QUEEN. 'Tis sleepy business,
    look'd speedily strongly.
  CYMBELINE. expectation thus
    Hath made forward. But, gentle queen,  
    daughter? hath appear'd
    Roman, hath tender'd
    duty day. like
    thing made malice duty;
    noted it. Call us, for
    slight sufferance.      Exit MESSENGER
  QUEEN. Royal sir,
    exile Posthumus, retir'd
    Hath life been; cure whereof, lord,
    'Tis time do. Beseech Majesty,
    Forbear sharp speeches her; lady
    tender rebukes words strokes,
    strokes death her.

                 Re-enter MESSENGER

  CYMBELINE. she, sir? How
    contempt answer'd?
  MESSENGER. you, sir,
    chambers lock'd, answer  
    th' loud noise make.
  QUEEN. lord, visit her,
    pray'd excuse keeping close;
    Whereto constrain'd infirmity
    duty leave unpaid you
    daily bound proffer. This
    wish'd make known; great court
    Made blame memory.
  CYMBELINE. doors lock'd?
    late? Grant, heavens, fear
    Prove false!                                            Exit
  QUEEN. Son, say, follow King.
  CLOTEN. man hers, Pisanio, servant,
    days.
  QUEEN. Go, after.                             Exit CLOTEN
    Pisanio, thou stand'st Posthumus!
    hath drug mine. pray absence
    Proceed swallowing that; believes
    thing precious. her,
    gone? Haply despair hath seiz'd her;  
    Or, wing'd fervour love, flown
    desir'd Posthumus. is
    death dishonour, end
    make good either. down,
    placing British crown.

                   Re-enter CLOTEN

    now, son?
  CLOTEN. 'Tis fled.
    cheer King. rages; none
    Dare him.
  QUEEN. better. May
    night forestall coming day!             Exit
  CLOTEN. love hate her; fair royal,
    hath courtly parts exquisite
    lady, ladies, woman. one
    hath, she, compounded,
    Outsells all. love therefore; but
    Disdaining throwing favours  
    low Posthumus slanders judgment
    rare chok'd; point
    conclude hate her, nay, indeed,
    reveng'd her. fools
    Shall-

                    Enter PISANIO

    here? What, packing, sirrah?
    hither. Ah, precious pander! Villain,
    thy lady? word, else
    Thou art straightway fiends.
  PISANIO. O good lord!
  CLOTEN. thy lady? or, Jupiter-
    again. Close villain,
    secret thy heart, rip
    Thy heart find it. Posthumus?
    weights baseness cannot
    dram worth drawn.
  PISANIO. Alas, lord,  
    him? miss'd?
    Rome.
  CLOTEN. she, sir? nearer.
    farther halting! Satisfy home
    her.
  PISANIO. O all-worthy lord!
  CLOTEN. All-worthy villain!
    Discover thy mistress once,
    word. 'worthy lord'!
    Speak, thy silence instant is
    Thy condemnation thy death.
  PISANIO. Then, sir,
    paper history knowledge
    Touching flight.                   [Presenting letter]
  CLOTEN. see't. pursue her
    Augustus' throne.
  PISANIO. [Aside] perish.
    enough; learns this
    prove travel, danger.
  CLOTEN. Humh!  
  PISANIO. [Aside] write lord dead. O Imogen,
    Safe mayst thou wander, safe return again!
  CLOTEN. Sirrah, letter true?
  PISANIO. Sir, think.
  CLOTEN. Posthumus' hand; know't. Sirrah, thou wouldst
    villain, true service, undergo those
    employments thee a
    industry- is, villainy soe'er bid thee do, to
    perform directly truly- thee honest man;
    thou shouldst means thy relief voice
    thy preferment.
  PISANIO. Well, good lord.
  CLOTEN. Wilt thou serve me? patiently constantly thou
    hast stuck bare fortune beggar Posthumus, thou
    canst not, gratitude, diligent follower
    mine. Wilt thou serve me?
  PISANIO. Sir, will.
  CLOTEN. Give thy hand; purse. Hast thy late
    master's garments thy possession?
  PISANIO. have, lord, lodging, suit wore  
    leave lady mistress.
  CLOTEN. service thou dost me, fetch suit hither. Let
    thy service; go.
  PISANIO. shall, lord.                                Exit
  CLOTEN. Meet thee Milford Haven! forgot thing;
    remember't anon. there, thou villain Posthumus, I
    kill thee. garments come. a
    time- bitterness belch heart- she
    held garment Posthumus respect noble
    natural person, adornment qualities.
    suit back ravish her; kill him,
    eyes. valour, then
    torment contempt. ground, speech of
    insultment ended dead body, lust hath dined-
    which, say, vex execute clothes that
    prais'd- court knock back, foot home
    again. hath despis'd rejoicingly, merry my
    revenge.

                Re-enter PISANIO, clothes  

    garments?
  PISANIO. Ay, noble lord.
  CLOTEN. long is't Milford Haven?
  PISANIO. scarce yet.
  CLOTEN. Bring apparel chamber; thing
    commanded thee. thou wilt a
    voluntary mute design. duteous true, preferment
    tender thee. revenge Milford, would
    wings follow it! Come, true.            Exit
  PISANIO. Thou bid'st loss; true thee
    prove false, be,
    true. Milford go,
    find thou pursuest. Flow, flow,
    heavenly blessings, her! fool's speed
    cross'd slowness! Labour meed!           Exit




SCENE VI.
Wales. cave BELARIUS

Enter IMOGEN alone, boy's clothes

  IMOGEN. man's life tedious one.
    tir'd myself, nights together
    made ground bed. sick
    resolution helps me. Milford,
    mountain-top Pisanio show'd thee,
    Thou wast ken. O Jove! think
    Foundations fly wretched; such, mean,
    reliev'd. beggars told me
    miss way. poor folks lie,
    afflictions them, knowing 'tis
    punishment trial? Yes; wonder,
    rich scarce true. lapse fulness
    sorer lie need; falsehood
    worse kings beggars. dear lord!
    Thou art o' th' false ones. thee
    hunger's gone; before, was
    point sink food. this?  
    path to't; 'tis savage hold.
    call; dare call. famine,
    Ere clean o'erthrow nature, makes valiant.
    Plenty peace breeds cowards; hardness ever
    hardiness mother. Ho! here?
    civil, speak; savage,
    lend. Ho! answer? enter.
    draw sword; mine enemy
    fear sword, me, scarcely on't.
    foe, good heavens!                 Exit cave

            Enter BELARIUS, GUIDERIUS, ARVIRAGUS

  BELARIUS. You, Polydore, prov'd woodman and
    master feast. Cadwal I
    play cook servant; 'tis match.
    sweat industry dry die
    end works to. Come, stomachs
    make homely savoury; weariness
    snore flint, resty sloth  
    Finds pillow hard. Now, peace here,
    Poor house, keep'st thyself!
  GUIDERIUS. weary.
  ARVIRAGUS. weak toil, strong appetite.
  GUIDERIUS. cold meat i' th' cave; browse that
    Whilst kill'd cook'd.
  BELARIUS. [Looking cave] Stay, in.
    eats victuals, think
    fairy.
  GUIDERIUS. matter, sir?
  BELARIUS.. Jupiter, angel! or, not,
    earthly paragon! Behold divineness
    elder boy!

                       Re-enter IMOGEN

  IMOGEN. Good masters, harm not.
    enter'd call'd, thought
    begg'd bought took. Good troth,
    stol'n nought; found  
    Gold strew'd i' th' floor. money meat.
    left board, soon
    made meal, parted
    pray'rs provider.
  GUIDERIUS. Money, youth?
  ARVIRAGUS. gold silver turn dirt,
    'tis reckon'd those
    worship dirty gods.
  IMOGEN. angry.
    Know, kill fault, should
    died made it.
  BELARIUS. bound?
  IMOGEN. Milford Haven.
  BELARIUS. name?
  IMOGEN. Fidele, sir. kinsman who
    bound Italy; embark'd Milford;
    going, spent hunger,
    fall'n offence.
  BELARIUS. Prithee, fair youth,
    churls, measure good minds  
    rude place live in. encounter'd!
    'Tis night; cheer
    Ere depart, stay eat it.
    Boys, bid welcome.
  GUIDERIUS. woman, youth,
    woo hard groom. honesty
    bid buy.
  ARVIRAGUS. make't comfort
    man. love brother;
    give him
    long absence, yours. welcome!
    sprightly, fall 'mongst friends.
  IMOGEN. 'Mongst friends,
    brothers. [Aside] they
    father's sons! prize
    less, equal ballasting
    thee, Posthumus.
  BELARIUS. wrings distress.
  GUIDERIUS. free't!
  ARVIRAGUS. I, whate'er be,  
    pain cost, danger! Gods!
  BELARIUS. [Whispering] Hark, boys.
  IMOGEN. [Aside] Great men,
    court bigger cave,
    attend themselves, virtue
    conscience seal'd them, laying by
    nothing-gift differing multitudes,
    out-peer twain. Pardon me, gods!
    change sex companion them,
    Leonatus' false.
  BELARIUS. so.
    Boys, dress hunt. Fair youth, in.
    Discourse heavy, fasting; supp'd,
    mannerly demand thee thy story,
    thou wilt speak it.
  GUIDERIUS. Pray draw near.
  ARVIRAGUS. night th' owl morn th' lark welcome.
  IMOGEN. Thanks, sir.
  ARVIRAGUS. pray draw near.                            Exeunt




SCENE VII.
Rome. public place

Enter ROMAN SENATORS TRIBUNES

  SENATOR. tenour Emperor's writ:
    common men action
    'Gainst Pannonians Dalmatians,
    legions Gallia are
    Full weak undertake wars against
    fall'n-off Britons, incite
    gentry business. creates
    Lucius proconsul; you, tribunes,
    levy, commands
    absolute commission. Long live Caesar!
  TRIBUNE. Lucius general forces?
  SENATOR. Ay.
  TRIBUNE. Remaining Gallia?
  SENATOR. legions
    spoke of, whereunto levy
    supplyant. words commission
    tie numbers time  
    dispatch.
  TRIBUNE. discharge duty.                    Exeunt




ACT IV. SCENE I.
Wales. cave BELARIUS

Enter CLOTEN alone

  CLOTEN. th' place meet, Pisanio
    mapp'd truly. fit garments serve me! should
    mistress, made made tailor, be
    fit too? rather- saving reverence word- 'tis said
    woman's fitness fits. play workman.
    dare speak myself, vain-glory man and
    glass confer chamber- mean, lines my
    body drawn his; young, strong, not
    beneath fortunes, advantage time,
    birth, alike conversant general services, and
    remarkable single oppositions. imperceiverant
    thing loves despite. mortality is! Posthumus, thy
    head, growing thy shoulders, this
    hour off; thy mistress enforced; thy garments cut pieces
    face; done, spurn home father,
    may, haply, angry rough usage; my
    mother, power testiness, turn  
    commendations. horse tied safe. Out, sword, a
    sore purpose! Fortune, put hand. very
    description meeting-place; fellow dares not
    deceive me.                                             Exit




SCENE II.
Wales. cave BELARIUS

Enter, cave, BELARIUS, GUIDERIUS, ARVIRAGUS, IMOGEN

  BELARIUS. [To IMOGEN] well. Remain cave;
    hunting.
  ARVIRAGUS. [To IMOGEN] Brother, stay here.
    brothers?
  IMOGEN. man man be;
    clay clay differs dignity,
    dust alike. sick.
  GUIDERIUS. hunting; abide him.
  IMOGEN. sick not, well;
    citizen wanton as
    die ere sick. you, leave me;
    Stick journal course. breach custom
    breach all. ill, me
    amend me; society comfort
    sociable. sick,
    reason it. Pray trust here.  
    rob myself; die,
    Stealing poorly.
  GUIDERIUS. love thee; spoke it.
    quantity, weight much
    love father.
  BELARIUS. What? how? how?
  ARVIRAGUS. sin so, sir, yoke me
    good brother's fault. why
    love youth, heard say
    Love's reason's reason. bier door,
    demand is't die, say
    'My father, youth.'
  BELARIUS. [Aside] O noble strain!
    O worthiness nature! breed greatness!
    Cowards father cowards base things sire base.
    Nature hath meal bran, contempt grace.
    father; be
    Doth miracle itself, lov'd me.-
    'Tis ninth hour o' th' morn.
  ARVIRAGUS. Brother, farewell.  
  IMOGEN. ye sport.
  ARVIRAGUS. health. [To BELARIUS] you, sir.
  IMOGEN. [Aside] kind creatures. Gods, lies have
      heard!
    courtiers all's savage court.
    Experience, O, thou disprov'st report!
    Th' imperious seas breed monsters; dish,
    Poor tributary rivers sweet fish.
    sick still; heart-sick. Pisanio,
    taste thy drug.                  [Swallows some]
  GUIDERIUS. stir him.
    gentle, unfortunate;
    Dishonestly afflicted, honest.
  ARVIRAGUS. answer me; hereafter
    more.
  BELARIUS. th' field, th' field!
    leave time. rest.
  ARVIRAGUS. long away.
  BELARIUS. Pray sick,
    huswife.  
  IMOGEN. Well, ill,
    bound you.
  BELARIUS. shalt ever.         Exit IMOGEN cave
    youth, howe'er distress'd, appears hath had
    Good ancestors.
  ARVIRAGUS. angel-like sings!
  GUIDERIUS. neat cookery! cut roots characters,
    sauc'd broths Juno sick,
    dieter.
  ARVIRAGUS. Nobly yokes
    smiling sigh, sigh
    smile;
    smile mocking sigh fly
    divine temple commix
    winds sailors rail at.
  GUIDERIUS. note
    grief patience, rooted both,
    Mingle spurs together.
  ARVIRAGUS. Grow patience!
    stinking elder, grief, untwine  
    perishing root increasing vine!
  BELARIUS. great morning. Come, away! there?

                      Enter CLOTEN

  CLOTEN. find runagates; villain
    Hath mock'd me. faint.
  BELARIUS. runagates?
    Means us? partly him; 'tis
    Cloten, son o' th' Queen. fear ambush.
    years, yet
    'tis he. held outlaws. Hence!
  GUIDERIUS. one; brother search
    companies near. Pray away;
    him.         Exeunt BELARIUS ARVIRAGUS
  CLOTEN. Soft! you
    fly thus? villain mountaineers?
    heard such. slave art thou?
  GUIDERIUS. thing
    slavish ne'er answering  
    'A slave' knock.
  CLOTEN. Thou art robber,
    law-breaker, villain. Yield thee, thief.
  GUIDERIUS. who? thee? art thou? I
    arm big thine, heart big?
    Thy words, grant, bigger, wear not
    dagger mouth. thou art;
    yield thee.
  CLOTEN. Thou villain base,
    Know'st clothes?
  GUIDERIUS. No, thy tailor, rascal,
    thy grandfather; made clothes,
    Which, seems, make thee.
  CLOTEN. Thou precious varlet,
    tailor made not.
  GUIDERIUS. Hence, then, thank
    man gave thee. Thou art fool;
    loath beat thee.
  CLOTEN. Thou injurious thief,
    Hear name, tremble.  
  GUIDERIUS. thy name?
  CLOTEN. Cloten, thou villain.
  GUIDERIUS. Cloten, thou double villain, thy name,
    tremble it. toad, adder, spider,
    'Twould move sooner.
  CLOTEN. thy fear,
    Nay, thy mere confusion, thou shalt know
    son th' Queen.
  GUIDERIUS. for't; seeming
    worthy thy birth.
  CLOTEN. Art afeard?
  GUIDERIUS. reverence, fear- wise:
    fools laugh, fear them.
  CLOTEN. Die death.
    slain thee proper hand,
    follow fled hence,
    gates Lud's Town set heads.
    Yield, rustic mountaineer.                  Exeunt, fighting

                Re-enter BELARIUS ARVIRAGUS  

  BELARIUS. company's abroad.
  ARVIRAGUS. world; mistake him, sure.
  BELARIUS. tell; long him,
    time hath blurr'd lines favour
    wore; snatches voice,
    burst speaking, his. absolute
    'Twas Cloten.
  ARVIRAGUS. place left them.
    brother make good time him,
    fell.
  BELARIUS. scarce made up,
    man, apprehension
    roaring terrors; defect judgment
    oft cease fear.

              Re-enter GUIDERIUS CLOTEN'S head

    But, see, thy brother.
  GUIDERIUS. Cloten fool, empty purse;  
    money in't. Hercules
    knock'd brains, none;
    this, fool borne
    head his.
  BELARIUS. hast thou done?
  GUIDERIUS. perfect what: cut Cloten's head,
    Son Queen, report;
    call'd traitor, mountaineer, swore
    single hand in,
    Displace heads where- gods!- grow,
    set Lud's Town.
  BELARIUS. undone.
  GUIDERIUS. Why, worthy father, lose
    swore take, lives? law
    Protects us; tender
    arrogant piece flesh threat us,
    Play judge executioner himself,
    fear law? company
    Discover abroad?
  BELARIUS. single soul  
    set eye on, safe reason
    attendants. humour
    mutation- ay, that
    bad thing worse- frenzy, not
    Absolute madness rav'd,
    bring alone. perhaps
    heard court we
    Cave here, hunt here, outlaws, time
    make stronger head- hearing,
    him, break swear
    fetch in; is't probable
    alone, undertaking
    suffering. good ground fear,
    fear body hath tail
    perilous head.
  ARVIRAGUS. ordinance
    gods foresay it. Howsoe'er,
    brother hath well.
  BELARIUS. mind
    hunt day; boy Fidele's sickness  
    make long forth.
  GUIDERIUS. sword,
    wave throat, ta'en
    head him. throw't creek
    rock, sea
    fishes Queen's son, Cloten.
    reck.                                      Exit
  BELARIUS. fear'twill reveng'd.
    Would, Polydore, thou hadst done't! valour
    thee enough.
  ARVIRAGUS. done't,
    revenge pursu'd me! Polydore,
    love thee brotherly, envy much
    Thou hast robb'd deed. revenges,
    strength meet, seek through,
    put answer.
  BELARIUS. Well, 'tis done.
    hunt to-day, seek danger
    profit. prithee rock.
    Fidele play cooks; stay  
    Till hasty Polydore return, bring him
    dinner presently.
  ARVIRAGUS. Poor sick Fidele!
    willingly him; gain colour
    parish Cloten's blood,
    praise charity.                          Exit
  BELARIUS. O thou goddess,
    Thou divine Nature, thou thyself thou blazon'st
    princely boys! gentle
    zephyrs blowing violet,
    wagging sweet head; rough,
    royal blood enchaf'd, rud'st wind
    top doth mountain pine
    make stoop th' vale. 'Tis wonder
    invisible instinct frame them
    royalty unlearn'd, honour untaught,
    Civility other, valour
    wildly grows them, yields crop
    sow'd. strange
    Cloten's portends,  
    death bring us.

                    Re-enter GUIDERIUS

  GUIDERIUS. brother?
    Cloten's clotpoll stream,
    embassy mother; body's hostage
    return.                               [Solemn music]
  BELARIUS. ingenious instrument!
    Hark, Polydore, sounds. occasion
    Hath Cadwal give motion? Hark!
  GUIDERIUS. home?
  BELARIUS. now.
  GUIDERIUS. mean? death dear'st mother
    speak before. solemn things
    answer solemn accidents. matter?
    Triumphs lamenting toys
    jollity apes grief boys.
    Cadwal mad?
  
       Re-enter ARVIRAGUS, IMOGEN dead, bearing
                         arms

  BELARIUS. Look, comes,
    brings dire occasion arms
    blame for!
  ARVIRAGUS. bird dead
    made on. rather
    skipp'd sixteen years age sixty,
    turn'd leaping time crutch,
    this.
  GUIDERIUS. O sweetest, fairest lily!
    brother wears thee half well
    thou grew'st thyself.
  BELARIUS. O melancholy!
    sound thy bottom? find
    ooze show coast thy sluggish crare
    Might'st easiliest harbour in? Thou blessed thing!
    Jove man thou mightst made; I,
    Thou diedst, rare boy, melancholy.  
    found him?
  ARVIRAGUS. Stark, see;
    smiling, fly tickled slumber,
    death's dart, laugh'd at; cheek
    Reposing cushion.
  GUIDERIUS. Where?
  ARVIRAGUS. O' th' floor;
    arms leagu'd. thought slept, put
    clouted brogues feet, rudeness
    Answer'd steps loud.
  GUIDERIUS. Why, sleeps.
    make grave bed;
    female fairies tomb haunted,
    worms thee.
  ARVIRAGUS. fairest flowers,
    Whilst summer lasts live here, Fidele,
    sweeten thy sad grave. Thou shalt lack
    flower thy face, pale primrose; nor
    azur'd hare-bell, thy veins; no, nor
    leaf eglantine, slander,  
    Out-sweet'ned thy breath. ruddock would,
    charitable bill- O bill, sore shaming
    rich-left heirs fathers lie
    monument!- bring thee this;
    Yea, furr'd moss besides, flow'rs none,
    winter-ground thy corse-
  GUIDERIUS. Prithee done,
    play wench-like words that
    serious. bury him,
    protract admiration what
    due debt. th' grave.
  ARVIRAGUS. Say, shall's lay him?
  GUIDERIUS. good Euriphile, mother.
  ARVIRAGUS. Be't so;
    us, Polydore, voices
    mannish crack, sing th' ground,
    mother; note words,
    Save Euriphile Fidele.
  GUIDERIUS. Cadwal,
    sing. weep, word thee;  
    notes sorrow tune worse
    priests fanes lie.
  ARVIRAGUS. speak it, then.
  BELARIUS. Great griefs, see, med'cine less, Cloten
    forgot. queen's son, boys;
    enemy, remember
    paid that. mighty rotting
    dust, reverence-
    angel world- doth make distinction
    place 'tween high low. foe princely;
    life, foe,
    bury prince.
  GUIDERIUS. Pray fetch hither.
    Thersites' body good Ajax',
    alive.
  ARVIRAGUS. fetch him,
    song whilst. Brother, begin.
                                                   Exit BELARIUS
  GUIDERIUS. Nay, Cadwal, lay head th' East;
    father hath reason for't.  
  ARVIRAGUS. 'Tis true.
  GUIDERIUS. on, then, remove him.
  ARVIRAGUS. So. Begin.

                      SONG

  GUIDERIUS. Fear heat o' th' sun
               furious winter's rages;
             Thou thy worldly task hast done,
               Home art gone, ta'en thy wages.
             Golden lads girls must,
             chimney-sweepers, dust.

  ARVIRAGUS. Fear frown o' th' great;
               Thou art past tyrant's stroke.
             Care clothe eat;
               thee reed oak.
             sceptre, learning, physic, must
             follow dust.
  
  GUIDERIUS. Fear lightning flash,
  ARVIRAGUS.   th' all-dreaded thunder-stone;
  GUIDERIUS. Fear slander, censure rash;
  ARVIRAGUS.   Thou hast finish'd joy moan.
  BOTH.      lovers young, lovers must
             Consign thee dust.

  GUIDERIUS. exorciser harm thee!
  ARVIRAGUS. witchcraft charm thee!
  GUIDERIUS. Ghost unlaid forbear thee!
  ARVIRAGUS. ill thee!
  BOTH.      Quiet consummation have,
             renowned thy grave!

         Re-enter BELARIUS body CLOTEN

  GUIDERIUS. obsequies. Come, lay down.
  BELARIUS. flowers; 'bout midnight, more.
    herbs cold dew o' th' night
    strewings fit'st graves. faces.  
    flow'rs, wither'd. so
    herblets strew.
    on, away. knees.
    ground gave again.
    pleasures past, pain.
                                           Exeunt IMOGEN
  IMOGEN. [Awaking] Yes, sir, Milford Haven. way?
    you. yond bush? Pray, thither?
    'Ods pittikins! mile yet?
    night. Faith, lie sleep.
    But, soft! bedfellow. O gods goddesses!
                                               [Seeing body]
    flow'rs pleasures world;
    bloody man, care on't. hope dream;
    thought cave-keeper,
    cook honest creatures. 'tis so;
    'Twas bolt nothing, shot nothing,
    brain makes fumes. eyes
    sometimes, judgments, blind. Good faith,
    tremble fear;  
    left heaven small drop pity
    wren's eye, fear'd gods, part it!
    dream's still. wake is
    me, me; imagin'd, felt.
    headless man? garments Posthumus?
    shape of's leg; hand,
    foot Mercurial, Martial thigh,
    brawns Hercules; Jovial face-
    Murder heaven! How! 'Tis gone. Pisanio,
    curses madded Hecuba gave Greeks,
    mine boot, darted thee! Thou,
    Conspir'd irregulous devil, Cloten,
    Hath cut lord. write read
    henceforth treacherous! Damn'd Pisanio
    Hath forged letters- damn'd Pisanio-
    bravest vessel world
    Struck main-top. O Posthumus! alas,
    thy head? that? Ay me! that?
    Pisanio kill'd thee heart,
    left head on. be? Pisanio?  
    'Tis Cloten; malice lucre them
    laid woe here. O, 'tis pregnant, pregnant!
    drug gave me, precious
    cordial me, found it
    Murd'rous th' senses? confirms home.
    Pisanio's deed, Cloten. O!
    Give colour pale cheek thy blood,
    horrider those
    chance find us. O, lord, lord!
                                    [Falls fainting body]

           Enter LUCIUS, CAPTAINS, SOOTHSAYER

  CAPTAIN. legions garrison'd Gallia,
    will, cross'd sea, attending
    Milford Haven; ships,
    readiness.
  LUCIUS. Rome?
  CAPTAIN. Senate hath stirr'd confiners
    gentlemen Italy, spirits,  
    promise noble service; come
    conduct bold Iachimo,
    Sienna's brother.
  LUCIUS. expect them?
  CAPTAIN. benefit o' th' wind.
  LUCIUS. forwardness
    Makes hopes fair. Command present numbers
    muster'd; bid captains to't. Now, sir,
    dream'd late war's purpose?
  SOOTHSAYER. night gods show'd vision-
    fast pray'd intelligence- thus:
    Jove's bird, Roman eagle, wing'd
    spongy south part west,
    vanish'd sunbeams; portends,
    sins abuse divination,
    Success th' Roman host.
  LUCIUS. Dream so,
    false. Soft, ho! trunk here
    top? ruin speaks sometime
    worthy building. How? page?  
    dead sleeping him? dead, rather;
    nature doth abhor make bed
    defunct, sleep dead.
    boy's face.
  CAPTAIN. alive, lord.
  LUCIUS. instruct body. Young one,
    Inform thy fortunes; seems
    crave demanded. this
    Thou mak'st thy bloody pillow? he
    That, noble nature did,
    Hath alter'd good picture? thy interest
    sad wreck? came't? is't? art thou?
  IMOGEN. nothing; not,
    better. master,
    valiant Briton good,
    mountaineers lies slain. Alas!
    masters. wander
    east occident; cry service;
    many, good; serve truly; never
    Find master.  
  LUCIUS. 'Lack, good youth!
    Thou mov'st thy complaining than
    Thy master bleeding. name, good friend.
  IMOGEN. Richard du Champ. [Aside] lie, do
    harm it, gods hear, hope
    pardon it.- you, sir?
  LUCIUS. Thy name?
  IMOGEN. Fidele, sir.
  LUCIUS. Thou dost approve thyself same;
    Thy fits thy faith, thy faith thy name.
    Wilt thy chance me? say
    Thou shalt master'd; but, sure,
    belov'd. Roman Emperor's letters,
    consul me, sooner
    thine worth prefer thee. me.
  IMOGEN. follow, sir. first, an't gods,
    hide master flies, deep
    poor pickaxes dig; when
    wild wood-leaves weeds ha' strew'd grave,
    century prayers,  
    can, o'er, weep sigh;
    leaving service, follow you,
    entertain me.
  LUCIUS. Ay, good youth;
    father thee master thee.
    friends,
    boy hath taught manly duties; us
    Find prettiest daisied plot can,
    make pikes partisans
    grave. Come, arm him. Boy, preferr'd
    thee us; interr'd
    soldiers can. cheerful; wipe thine eyes.
    falls means happier arise.            Exeunt




SCENE III.
Britain. CYMBELINE'S palace

Enter CYMBELINE, LORDS, PISANIO, attendants

  CYMBELINE. Again! bring word 'tis her.
                                               Exit attendant
    fever absence son;
    madness, life's danger. Heavens,
    deeply touch me! Imogen,
    great part comfort, gone; queen
    desperate bed, time
    fearful wars point me; son gone,
    needful present. strikes past
    hope comfort. thee, fellow,
    departure and
    Dost ignorant, enforce thee
    sharp torture.
  PISANIO. Sir, life yours;
    humbly set will; mistress,
    remains, gone,
    purposes return. Beseech Highness,  
    Hold loyal servant.
  LORD. Good liege,
    day missing here.
    dare bound true perform
    parts subjection loyally. Cloten,
    diligence seeking him,
    doubt found.
  CYMBELINE. time troublesome.
    [To PISANIO] slip season; jealousy
    depend.
  LORD. Majesty,
    Roman legions, Gallia drawn,
    landed coast, supply
    Roman gentlemen Senate sent.
  CYMBELINE. counsel son queen!
    amaz'd matter.
  LORD. Good liege,
    preparation affront less
    hear of. more, ready.
    put pow'rs motion  
    long move.
  CYMBELINE. you. withdraw,
    meet time seeks us. fear not
    Italy annoy us; but
    grieve chances here. Away!      Exeunt PISANIO
  PISANIO. heard letter master since
    wrote Imogen slain. 'Tis strange.
    hear mistress, promise
    yield tidings. know
    betid Cloten, remain
    Perplex'd all. heavens work.
    false honest; true, true.
    present wars find love country,
    note o' th' King, fall them.
    doubts, time clear'd:
    Fortune brings boats steer'd.      Exit




SCENE IV.
Wales. cave BELARIUS

Enter BELARIUS, GUIDERIUS, ARVIRAGUS

  GUIDERIUS. noise round us.
  BELARIUS. it.
  ARVIRAGUS. pleasure, sir, find life, lock it
    action adventure?
  GUIDERIUS. Nay, hope
    hiding us? Romans
    Britons slay us, receive us
    barbarous unnatural revolts
    use, slay after.
  BELARIUS. Sons,
    higher mountains; secure us.
    King's party going. Newness
    Cloten's death- known, muster'd
    bands-may drive render
    liv'd, extort from's that
    done, answer death,
    Drawn torture.  
  GUIDERIUS. is, sir, doubt
    time you
    satisfying us.
  ARVIRAGUS. likely
    hear Roman horses neigh,
    Behold quarter'd fires, eyes
    ears cloy'd importantly now,
    waste time note,
    are.
  BELARIUS. O, known
    army. years,
    Cloten young, see, wore him
    remembrance. And, besides, King
    Hath deserv'd service loves,
    find exile breeding,
    certainty hard life; aye hopeless
    courtesy cradle promis'd,
    hot summer's tanlings and
    shrinking slaves winter.
  GUIDERIUS. so,  
    cease be. Pray, sir, th' army.
    brother known; yourself
    thought, thereto o'ergrown,
    questioned.
  ARVIRAGUS. sun shines,
    thither. thing is't never
    man die! scarce look'd blood
    coward hares, hot goats, venison!
    bestrid horse, save had
    rider myself, ne'er wore rowel
    iron heel! asham'd
    holy sun, have
    benefit blest beams, remaining
    long poor unknown.
  GUIDERIUS. heavens, go!
    bless me, sir, give leave,
    care; not,
    hazard due fall by
    hands Romans!
  ARVIRAGUS. I. Amen.  
  BELARIUS. reason I, lives set
    slight valuation, reserve
    crack'd care. you, boys!
    country wars chance die,
    bed too, lads, lie.
    Lead, lead. [Aside] time long; blood thinks scorn
    Till fly show princes born.           Exeunt

ACT V. SCENE I.
Britain. Roman camp

Enter POSTHUMUS alone, bloody handkerchief

  POSTHUMUS. Yea, bloody cloth, thee; wish'd
    Thou shouldst colour'd thus. married ones,
    course, many
    murder wives themselves
    wrying little! O Pisanio!
    good servant commands;
    bond ones. Gods! you
    ta'en vengeance faults, never
    liv'd put this; saved
    noble Imogen repent, struck
    Me, wretch worth vengeance. alack,
    snatch faults; love,
    fall more. permit
    ills ills, elder worse,
    make dread it, doer's thrift.
    Imogen own. wills,
    make blest obey. brought  
    th' Italian gentry, fight
    lady's kingdom. 'Tis enough
    That, Britain, kill'd thy mistress; peace!
    give wound thee. Therefore, good heavens,
    Hear patiently purpose. disrobe me
    Italian weeds, suit myself
    Britain peasant. fight
    part with; die
    thee, O Imogen, life
    breath death. unknown,
    Pitied hated, face peril
    dedicate. make men know
    valour habits show.
    Gods, put strength o' th' Leonati me!
    shame guise o' th' world, begin
    fashion- within.              Exit




SCENE II.
Britain. field battle British Roman camps

Enter LUCIUS, IACHIMO, Roman army door, British army
at another, LEONATUS POSTHUMUS poor soldier.
They march out.  Alarums.  enter again, skirmish,
IACHIMO POSTHUMUS.  vanquisheth disarmeth IACHIMO,
and leaves him

  IACHIMO. heaviness guilt bosom
    Takes manhood. belied lady,
    Princess country, air on't
    Revengingly enfeebles me; carl,
    drudge nature's, subdu'd me
    profession? Knighthoods honours borne
    wear mine titles scorn.
    thy gentry, Britain, before
    lout exceeds lords, odds
    scarce men, gods.            Exit

    battle continues; BRITONS fly; CYMBELINE taken.
    enter rescue BELARIUS, GUIDERIUS, ARVIRAGUS  

  BELARIUS. Stand, stand! th' advantage ground;
    lane guarded; routs but
    villainy fears.
  GUIDERIUS ARVIRAGUS. Stand, stand, fight!

    Re-enter POSTHUMUS, seconds Britons; rescue
    CYMBELINE, exeunt. re-enter LUCIUS IACHIMO,
                         IMOGEN

  LUCIUS. Away, boy, troops, save thyself;
    friends kill friends, disorder's such
    war hoodwink'd.
  IACHIMO. 'Tis fresh supplies.
  LUCIUS. day turn'd strangely. betimes
    reinforce fly.                               Exeunt




SCENE III.
Another part field

Enter POSTHUMUS Britain LORD

  LORD. Cam'st thou made stand?
  POSTHUMUS. did:
    you, seems, fliers.
  LORD. did.
  POSTHUMUS. blame you, sir, lost,
    heavens fought. King himself
    wings destitute, army broken,
    backs Britons seen, flying,
    strait lane- enemy, full-hearted,
    Lolling tongue slaught'ring, work
    plentiful tools do't, struck down
    mortally, slightly touch'd, falling
    fear, strait pass damm'd
    dead men hurt behind, cowards living
    die length'ned shame.
  LORD. lane?
  POSTHUMUS. Close battle, ditch'd, wall'd turf,  
    gave advantage ancient soldier-
    honest one, warrant, deserv'd
    long breeding white beard to,
    for's country. Athwart lane
    He, striplings- lads run
    country base commit slaughter;
    faces fit masks, fairer
    preservation cas'd shame-
    Made good passage, cried fled
    'Our Britain's harts die flying, men.
    darkness fleet souls fly backwards! Stand;
    Romans give that,
    beasts, shun beastly, save
    back frown. Stand, stand!' three,
    thousand confident, act many-
    performers file all
    rest nothing- word 'Stand, stand!'
    Accommodated place, charming
    nobleness, turn'd
    distaff lance, gilded pale looks,  
    Part shame, part spirit renew'd; turn'd coward
    example- O, sin war
    Damn'd beginners!- gan look
    grin lions
    pikes o' th' hunters. began
    stop i' th' chaser, retire; anon
    rout, confusion thick. Forthwith fly,
    Chickens, stoop'd eagles; slaves,
    strides victors made; cowards,
    fragments hard voyages, became
    life o' th' need. found back-door open
    unguarded hearts, heavens, wound!
    slain before, dying, friends
    O'erborne i' th' wave. Ten chas'd one
    slaughterman twenty.
    die ere resist grown
    mortal bugs o' th' field.
  LORD. strange chance:
    narrow lane, man, boys.
  POSTHUMUS. Nay, it; made  
    things hear
    work any. rhyme upon't,
    vent mock'ry? one:
    'Two boys, man (twice boy), lane,
    Preserv'd Britons, Romans' bane.'
  LORD. Nay, angry, sir.
  POSTHUMUS. 'Lack, end?
    dares stand foe friend;
    made do,
    quickly fly friendship too.
    put rhyme.
  LORD. Farewell; angry.                             Exit
  POSTHUMUS. going? lord! O noble misery,
    i' th' field 'What news?' me!
    To-day honours
    sav'd carcasses! heel do't,
    died too! I, mine woe charm'd,
    find death hear groan,
    feel struck. ugly monster,
    'Tis strange hides fresh cups, soft beds,  
    Sweet words; hath moe ministers we
    draw knives i' th' war. Well, find him;
    favourer Briton,
    Briton, resum'd again
    part in. Fight more,
    yield veriest hind shall
    touch shoulder. Great slaughter is
    made th' Roman; great answer be
    Britons take. me, ransom's death;
    side spend breath,
    bear again,
    end means Imogen.

            Enter BRITISH CAPTAINS soldiers

  CAPTAIN. Great Jupiter prais'd! Lucius taken.
    'Tis thought man sons angels.
  CAPTAIN. fourth man, silly habit,
    gave th' affront them.
  CAPTAIN. 'tis reported;  
    'em found. Stand! there?
  POSTHUMUS. Roman,
    drooping seconds
    answer'd him.
  CAPTAIN. Lay hands him; dog!
    leg Rome return tell
    crows peck'd here. brags service,
    note. Bring th' King.

   Enter CYMBELINE, BELARIUS, GUIDERIUS, ARVIRAGUS, PISANIO, Roman
   captives. CAPTAINS present POSTHUMUS CYMBELINE, delivers
            gaoler. Exeunt omnes




SCENE IV.
Britain. prison

Enter POSTHUMUS GAOLERS

  GAOLER. stol'n, locks you;
    graze find pasture.
  GAOLER. Ay, stomach.                Exeunt GAOLERS
  POSTHUMUS. welcome, bondage! thou art way,
    think, liberty. better
    sick o' th' gout, rather
    Groan perpetuity cur'd
    th' physician death, key
    T' unbar locks. conscience, thou art fetter'd
    shanks wrists; good gods, give me
    penitent instrument pick bolt,
    Then, free ever! Is't sorry?
    children temporal fathers appease;
    Gods full mercy. repent,
    gyves,
    Desir'd constrain'd. satisfy,
    freedom 'tis main part,  
    stricter render all.
    clement vile men,
    broken debtors third,
    sixth, tenth, letting thrive again
    abatement; desire.
    Imogen's dear life mine; though
    'Tis dear, 'tis life; coin'd it.
    'Tween man man weigh stamp;
    light, pieces figure's sake;
    mine, yours. so, great pow'rs,
    audit, life,
    cancel cold bonds. O Imogen!
    speak thee silence.                      [Sleeps]

        Solemn music. Enter, apparition, SICILIUS
        LEONATUS, father POSTHUMUS, man attired
         warrior; leading hand ancient
          matron, WIFE, mother POSTHUMUS, with
        music them. Then, music, follows
           young LEONATI, brothers POSTHUMUS,  
              wounds, died wars.
          circle POSTHUMUS round lies sleeping

  SICILIUS. more, thou thunder-master, show
              Thy spite mortal flies.
            Mars fall out, Juno chide,
              thy adulteries
                Rates revenges.
            Hath poor boy aught well,
              face saw?
            died whilst womb stay'd
              Attending nature's law;
            father then, men report
              Thou orphans' father art,
            Thou shouldst been, shielded him
              earth-vexing smart.

  MOTHER.   Lucina lent aid,
              throes,
            Posthumus ripp'd,  
              crying 'mongst foes,
                thing pity.

  SICILIUS. Great Nature ancestry
              Moulded stuff fair
            deserv'd praise o' th' world
              great Sicilius' heir.

  BROTHER. mature man,
              Britain he
            stand parallel,
              fruitful object be
            eye Imogen, best
              deem dignity?

  MOTHER.   marriage wherefore mock'd,
              exil'd thrown
            Leonati seat cast
            dearest one,
              Sweet Imogen?  

  SICILIUS. suffer Iachimo,
              Slight thing Italy,
            taint nobler heart brain
              needless jealousy,
            geck scorn
              O' th' other's villainy?

  BROTHER. stiller seats came,
              parents twain,
            That, striking country's cause,
              Fell bravely slain,
            fealty Tenantius' right
              honour maintain.

  BROTHER. hardiment Posthumus hath
              Cymbeline perform'd.
            Then, Jupiter, thou king gods,
              hast thou adjourn'd
            graces merits due,  
              dolours turn'd?

  SICILIUS. Thy crystal window ope; out;
              longer exercise
            valiant race thy harsh
              potent injuries.

  MOTHER.   Since, Jupiter, son good,
              miseries.

  SICILIUS. Peep thy marble mansion. Help!
              poor ghosts cry
            th' shining synod rest
              thy deity.

  BROTHERS. Help, Jupiter! appeal,
              thy justice fly.

       JUPITER descends-in thunder lightning, sitting
       eagle. throws thunderbolt. GHOSTS  
                     fall knees

  JUPITER. more, petty spirits region low,
    Offend hearing; hush! dare ghosts
    Accuse Thunderer bolt, know,
    Sky-planted, batters rebelling coasts?
    Poor shadows Elysium, rest
    never-withering banks flow'rs.
    mortal accidents opprest:
    care is; 'tis ours.
    love cross; make gift,
    delay'd, delighted. content;
    low-laid son godhead uplift;
    comforts thrive, trials spent.
    Jovial star reign'd birth, in
    temple married. Rise fade!
    lord Lady Imogen,
    happier affliction made.
    tablet lay breast, wherein
    pleasure full fortune doth confine;  
    so, away; farther din
    Express impatience, stir mine.
    Mount, eagle, palace crystalline.            [Ascends]
  SICILIUS. thunder; celestial breath
    sulpherous smell; holy eagle
    Stoop'd foot us. ascension is
    sweet blest fields. royal bird
    Prunes immortal wing, cloys beak,
    god pleas'd.
  ALL. Thanks, Jupiter!
  SICILIUS. marble pavement closes, enter'd
    radiant roof. Away! and, blest,
    care perform great behest.   [GHOSTS vanish]

  POSTHUMUS. [Waking] Sleep, thou grandsire begot
    father me; thou hast created
    mother brothers. But, O scorn,
    Gone! born.
    awake. Poor wretches, depend
    greatness' favour, dream done;  
    Wake find nothing. But, alas, swerve;
    dream find, deserve,
    steep'd favours; I,
    golden chance, why.
    fairies haunt ground? book? O rare one!
    not, fangled world, garment
    Nobler covers. thy effects
    follow unlike courtiers,
    good promise.

    [Reads] 'When lion's whelp shall, unknown,
    seeking find, embrac'd piece tender air;
    stately cedar lopp'd branches which,
    dead years, revive, jointed old
    stock, freshly grow; Posthumus end miseries,
    Britain fortunate flourish peace plenty.'

    'Tis dream, stuff madmen
    Tongue, brain not; nothing,
    senseless speaking, speaking  
    sense untie. is,
    action life it, which
    keep, sympathy.

                  Re-enter GAOLER

  GAOLER. Come, sir, ready death?
  POSTHUMUS. Over-roasted rather; ready long ago.
  GAOLER. Hanging word, sir; ready that, are
    cook'd.
  POSTHUMUS. So, prove good repast spectators, dish
    pays shot.
  GAOLER. heavy reckoning you, sir. comfort is, you
    called payments, fear tavern bills,
    sadness parting, procuring mirth.
    faint meat, depart reeling much
    drink; paid much, are
    paid much; purse brain empty; brain heavier
    light, purse light, drawn of
    heaviness. O, contradiction quit. O,  
    charity penny cord! sums thousands trice. You
    true debitor creditor it; past, is, and
    come, discharge. neck, sir, pen, book, and
    counters; acquittance follows.
  POSTHUMUS. merrier die thou art live.
  GAOLER. Indeed, sir, sleeps feels toothache. a
    man sleep sleep, hangman to
    bed, change places officer; look
    you, sir, go.
  POSTHUMUS. I, fellow.
  GAOLER. death eyes in's head, then; so
    pictur'd. directed them
    know, not
    know, jump after-inquiry peril. you
    speed journey's end, return to
    one.
  POSTHUMUS. thee, fellow, eyes direct
    going, wink them.
  GAOLER. infinite mock this, man the
    eyes blindness! hanging's  
    winking.

                        Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. Knock manacles; bring prisoner King.
  POSTHUMUS. Thou bring'st good news: call'd made free.
  GAOLER. hang'd then.
  POSTHUMUS. Thou shalt freer gaoler; bolts the
    dead.                         Exeunt POSTHUMUS MESSENGER
  GAOLER. man marry gallows beget young gibbets,
    prone. Yet, conscience, verier
    knaves desire live, Roman; some
    die wills; I, were
    one. mind, mind good. O, there
    desolation gaolers gallowses! speak my
    present profit, hath preferment in't.     Exit




SCENE V.
Britain. CYMBELINE'S tent

Enter CYMBELINE, BELARIUS, GUIDERIUS, ARVIRAGUS, PISANIO, LORDS,
OFFICERS, attendants

  CYMBELINE. Stand side, gods made
    Preservers throne. Woe heart
    poor soldier richly fought,
    rags sham'd gilded arms, naked breast
    Stepp'd targes proof, found.
    happy find him, if
    grace make so.
  BELARIUS. saw
    noble fury poor thing;
    precious deeds promis'd nought
    beggary poor looks.
  CYMBELINE. tidings him?
  PISANIO. hath search'd dead living,
    trace him.
  CYMBELINE. grief, am
    heir reward; [To BELARIUS, GUIDERIUS, ARVIRAGUS]  
      add
    you, liver, heart, brain, Britain,
    grant lives. 'Tis time
    are. Report it.
  BELARIUS. Sir,
    Cambria born, gentlemen;
    boast true modest,
    add honest.
  CYMBELINE. Bow knees.
    Arise knights o' th' battle; create you
    Companions person, fit you
    dignities estates.

             Enter CORNELIUS LADIES

    business faces. sadly
    Greet victory? Romans,
    o' th' court Britain.
  CORNELIUS. Hail, great King!
    sour happiness report  
    Queen dead.
  CYMBELINE. worse physician
    report become? consider
    med'cine'life prolong'd, death
    seize doctor too. ended she?
  CORNELIUS. horror, madly dying, life;
    Which, cruel world, concluded
    cruel herself. confess'd
    report, you; women
    trip err, wet cheeks
    present finish'd.
  CYMBELINE. Prithee say.
  CORNELIUS. First, confess'd lov'd you; only
    Affected greatness you, you;
    Married royalty, wife place;
    Abhorr'd person.
  CYMBELINE. knew this;
    spoke dying, not
    lips opening it. Proceed.
  CORNELIUS. daughter, bore hand love  
    integrity, confess
    scorpion sight; life,
    flight prevented it, had
    Ta'en poison.
  CYMBELINE. O delicate fiend!
    is't read woman? more?
  CORNELIUS. More, sir, worse. confess had
    mortal mineral, which, took,
    minute feed life, ling'ring,
    inches waste you. time purpos'd,
    watching, weeping, tendance, kissing, to
    O'ercome show; time,
    fitted craft, work
    son th' adoption crown;
    failing end strange absence,
    Grew shameless-desperate, open'd, despite
    heaven men, purposes, repented
    evils hatch'd effected; so,
    Despairing, died.
  CYMBELINE. Heard this, women?  
  LADY. did, Highness.
  CYMBELINE. Mine eyes
    fault, beautiful;
    Mine ears, heard flattery; heart
    thought seeming. vicious
    mistrusted her; yet, O daughter!
    folly thou mayst say,
    prove thy feeling. Heaven mend all!

         Enter LUCIUS, IACHIMO, SOOTHSAYER, other
      Roman prisoners, guarded; POSTHUMUS behind, IMOGEN

    Thou com'st not, Caius, tribute; that
    Britons raz'd out, loss
    bold one, kinsmen made suit
    good souls appeas'd slaughter
    captives, ourself granted;
    estate.
  LUCIUS. Consider, sir, chance war. day
    accident; us,  
    not, blood cool, threaten'd
    prisoners sword. gods
    thus, lives
    call'd ransom, come. Sufficeth
    Roman Roman's heart suffer.
    Augustus lives on't; much
    peculiar care. thing only
    entreat: boy, Briton born,
    ransom'd. master had
    page kind, duteous, diligent,
    tender occasions, true,
    feat, nurse-like; virtue join
    request, make bold Highness
    deny; hath Briton harm
    serv'd Roman. Save him, sir,
    spare blood beside.
  CYMBELINE. surely him;
    favour familiar me. Boy,
    Thou hast look'd thyself grace,
    art mine own. why, wherefore  
    'Live, boy.' Ne'er thy master. Live;
    Cymbeline boon thou wilt,
    Fitting bounty thy state, give it;
    Yea, thou demand prisoner,
    noblest ta'en.
  IMOGEN. humbly Highness.
  LUCIUS. bid thee beg life, good lad,
    thou wilt.
  IMOGEN. No, no! Alack,
    work hand. thing
    Bitter death; life, good master,
    shuffle itself.
  LUCIUS. boy disdains me,
    leaves me, scorns me. Briefly die joys
    place truth girls boys.
    stands perplex'd?
  CYMBELINE. wouldst thou, boy?
    love thee more; more
    ask. Know'st thou look'st on? Speak,
    Wilt live? thy kin? thy friend?  
  IMOGEN. Roman, kin me
    Highness; who, born vassal,
    nearer.
  CYMBELINE. Wherefore ey'st so?
  IMOGEN. you, sir, private, please
    give hearing.
  CYMBELINE. Ay, heart,
    lend attention. thy name?
  IMOGEN. Fidele, sir.
  CYMBELINE. Thou'rt good youth, page;
    thy master. Walk me; speak freely.
                           [CYMBELINE IMOGEN converse apart]
  BELARIUS. boy reviv'd death?
  ARVIRAGUS. sand another
    resembles- sweet rosy lad
    died Fidele. you?
  GUIDERIUS. dead thing alive.
  BELARIUS. Peace, peace! further. eyes not; forbear.
    Creatures alike; were't he, sure
    spoke us.  
  GUIDERIUS. dead.
  BELARIUS. silent; further.
  PISANIO. [Aside] mistress.
    living, time run on
    good bad.               [CYMBELINE IMOGEN advance]
  CYMBELINE. Come, stand thou side;
    Make thy demand aloud. [To IACHIMO] Sir, step forth;
    Give answer boy, freely,
    Or, greatness grace it,
    honour, bitter torture shall
    Winnow truth falsehood. On, speak him.
  IMOGEN. boon gentleman render
    ring.
  POSTHUMUS. [Aside] him?
  CYMBELINE. diamond finger, say
    yours?
  IACHIMO. Thou'lt torture leave unspoken that
    spoke torture thee.
  CYMBELINE. How? me?
  IACHIMO. glad constrain'd utter  
    torments conceal. villainy
    ring; 'twas Leonatus' jewel,
    thou didst banish; and- grieve thee,
    doth me- nobler sir ne'er liv'd
    'Twixt sky ground. Wilt thou hear more, lord?
  CYMBELINE. belongs this.
  IACHIMO. paragon, thy daughter,
    heart drops blood false spirits
    Quail remember- Give leave, faint.
  CYMBELINE. daughter? her? Renew thy strength;
    thou shouldst live nature will
    die ere hear more. Strive, man, speak.
  IACHIMO. time- unhappy clock
    struck hour!- Rome- accurs'd
    mansion where!- 'twas feast- O, would
    viands poison'd, least
    heav'd head!- good Posthumus-
    say? good be
    ill men were, all
    rar'st good ones- sitting sadly  
    Hearing praise loves Italy
    beauty made barren swell'd boast
    speak; feature, laming
    shrine Venus straight-pight Minerva,
    Postures nature; condition,
    shop qualities man
    Loves woman for; hook wiving,
    Fairness strikes eye-
  CYMBELINE. stand fire.
    matter.
  IACHIMO. shall,
    thou wouldst grieve quickly. Posthumus,
    noble lord love one
    royal lover, hint;
    dispraising prais'd- therein
    calm virtue- began
    mistress' picture; tongue made,
    mind put in't, brags
    crack'd kitchen trulls, description
    Prov'd unspeaking sots.  
  CYMBELINE. Nay, nay, th' purpose.
  IACHIMO. daughter's chastity- begins.
    spake Dian hot dreams
    cold; whereat I, wretch,
    Made scruple praise, wager'd him
    Pieces gold 'gainst wore
    honour'd finger, attain
    suit place of's bed, win ring
    mine adultery. He, true knight,
    lesser honour confident
    find her, stakes ring;
    so, carbuncle
    Phoebus' wheel; safely, it
    worth of's car. Britain
    Post design. you, sir,
    Remember court, taught
    chaste daughter wide difference
    'Twixt amorous villainous. quench'd
    hope, longing, mine Italian brain
    Gan duller Britain operate  
    vilely; vantage, excellent;
    And, brief, practice prevail'd
    return'd simular proof enough
    make noble Leonatus mad,
    wounding belief renown
    tokens thus; averring notes
    chamber-hanging, pictures, bracelet-
    O cunning, it!- nay, marks
    secret person, not
    bond chastity crack'd,
    ta'en forfeit. Whereupon-
    Methinks now-
  POSTHUMUS. [Coming forward] Ay, thou dost,
    Italian fiend! Ay me, credulous fool,
    Egregious murderer, thief, anything
    due villains past, being,
    come! O, give cord, knife, poison,
    upright justicer! Thou, King, send out
    torturers ingenious. I
    th' abhorred things o' th' earth amend  
    worse they. Posthumus,
    kill'd thy daughter; villain-like, lie-
    caus'd lesser villain myself,
    sacrilegious thief, do't. temple
    virtue she; yea, herself.
    Spit, throw stones, cast mire me, set
    dogs o' th' street bay me. villain
    call'd Posthumus Leonatus, and
    villainy 'twas! O Imogen!
    queen, life, wife! O Imogen,
    Imogen, Imogen!
  IMOGEN. Peace, lord. Hear, hear!
  POSTHUMUS. Shall's play this? Thou scornful page,
    lies thy part.                [Strikes her. falls]
  PISANIO. O gentlemen, help!
    Mine mistress! O, lord Posthumus!
    ne'er kill'd Imogen till now. Help, help!
    Mine honour'd lady!
  CYMBELINE. world round?
  POSTHUMUS. staggers me?  
  PISANIO. Wake, mistress!
  CYMBELINE. so, gods strike me
    death mortal joy.
  PISANIO. fares mistress?
  IMOGEN. O, thee sight;
    Thou gav'st poison. Dangerous fellow, hence!
    Breathe princes are.
  CYMBELINE. tune Imogen!
  PISANIO. Lady,
    gods throw stones sulphur me, if
    box gave thought me
    precious thing! Queen.
  CYMBELINE. matter still?
  IMOGEN. poison'd me.
  CORNELIUS. O gods!
    left thing Queen confess'd,
    approve thee honest. 'If Pisanio
    Have' 'given mistress confection
    gave cordial, serv'd
    serve rat.'  
  CYMBELINE. this, Cornelius?
  CORNELIUS. Queen, sir, oft importun'd me
    temper poisons her; pretending
    satisfaction knowledge only
    killing creatures vile, cats dogs,
    esteem. I, dreading purpose
    danger, compound her
    stuff, which, ta'en cease
    present pow'r life, short time
    offices nature again
    due functions. ta'en it?
  IMOGEN. did, dead.
  BELARIUS. boys,
    error.
  GUIDERIUS. Fidele.
  IMOGEN. throw wedded lady you?
    rock, now
    Throw again.                              [Embracing him]
  POSTHUMUS. Hang fruit, soul,
    Till tree die!  
  CYMBELINE. now, flesh? child?
    What, mak'st thou dullard act?
    Wilt thou speak me?
  IMOGEN. [Kneeling] blessing, sir.
  BELARIUS. [To GUIDERIUS ARVIRAGUS] love this
      youth, blame ye not;
    motive for't.
  CYMBELINE. tears fall
    Prove holy water thee! Imogen,
    Thy mother's dead.
  IMOGEN. for't, lord.
  CYMBELINE. O, naught, long was
    meet strangely; son
    gone, where.
  PISANIO. lord,
    fear me, speak troth. Lord Cloten,
    lady's missing, me
    sword drawn, foam'd mouth, swore,
    discover'd gone,
    instant death. accident  
    feigned letter master's
    pocket, directed him
    seek mountains Milford;
    Where, frenzy, master's garments,
    enforc'd me, posts
    unchaste purpose, oath violate
    lady's honour. him
    not.
  GUIDERIUS. end story:
    slew there.
  CYMBELINE. Marry, gods forfend!
    thy good deeds lips
    Pluck hard sentence. Prithee, valiant youth,
    Deny't again.
  GUIDERIUS. spoke it, it.
  CYMBELINE. prince.
  GUIDERIUS. incivil one. wrongs me
    prince-like; provoke me
    language make spurn sea,
    roar me. cut off's head,  
    glad standing here
    tale mine.
  CYMBELINE. thee.
    thine tongue thou art condemn'd, must
    Endure law. Thou'rt dead.
  IMOGEN. headless man
    thought lord.
  CYMBELINE. Bind offender,
    presence.
  BELARIUS. Stay, sir King.
    man man slew,
    descended thyself, hath
    thee merited band Clotens
    scar for. [To guard] arms alone;
    born bondage.
  CYMBELINE. Why, soldier,
    Wilt thou undo worth thou art unpaid for
    tasting wrath? descent
    good we?
  ARVIRAGUS. spake far.  
  CYMBELINE. thou shalt die for't.
  BELARIUS. die three;
    prove on's good
    him. sons, must
    mine part unfold dangerous speech,
    haply you.
  ARVIRAGUS. danger's ours.
  GUIDERIUS. good his.
  BELARIUS. leave!
    Thou hadst, great King, subject who
    call'd Belarius.
  CYMBELINE. him? is
    banish'd traitor.
  BELARIUS. hath
    Assum'd age; banish'd man;
    traitor.
  CYMBELINE. hence,
    world save him.
  BELARIUS. hot.
    pay nursing thy sons,  
    confiscate all, soon
    receiv'd it.
  CYMBELINE. Nursing sons?
  BELARIUS. blunt saucy: knee.
    Ere arise prefer sons;
    spare father. Mighty sir,
    young gentlemen call father,
    sons, mine;
    issue loins, liege,
    blood begetting.
  CYMBELINE. How? issue?
  BELARIUS. father's. I, Morgan,
    Belarius banish'd.
    pleasure mere offence, punishment
    Itself, treason; suffer'd
    harm did. gentle princes-
    are- twenty years
    train'd up; arts as
    put them. breeding was, sir, as
    Highness knows. nurse, Euriphile,  
    theft wedded, stole children
    banishment; mov'd to't,
    receiv'd punishment before
    then. Beaten loyalty
    Excited treason. dear loss,
    'twas felt, shap'd
    end stealing them. But, gracious sir,
    sons again, lose
    sweet'st companions world.
    benediction covering heavens
    Fall heads dew! worthy
    inlay heaven stars.
  CYMBELINE. Thou weep'st speak'st.
    service more
    Unlike thou tell'st. lost children.
    they, wish
    pair worthier sons.
  BELARIUS. pleas'd awhile.
    gentleman, call Polydore,
    worthy prince, yours, true Guiderius;  
    gentleman, Cadwal, Arviragus,
    younger princely son; he, sir, lapp'd
    curious mantle, wrought th' hand
    queen mother, probation
    ease produce.
  CYMBELINE. Guiderius had
    neck mole, sanguine star;
    mark wonder.
  BELARIUS. he,
    hath natural stamp.
    wise nature's end donation,
    evidence now.
  CYMBELINE. O, I?
    mother birth three? Ne'er mother
    Rejoic'd deliverance more. Blest pray be,
    That, strange starting orbs,
    reign now! O Imogen,
    Thou hast lost kingdom.
  IMOGEN. No, lord;
    worlds by't. O gentle brothers,  
    met? O, hereafter
    truest speaker! call'd brother,
    sister: brothers,
    indeed.
  CYMBELINE. e'er meet?
  ARVIRAGUS. Ay, good lord.
  GUIDERIUS. meeting lov'd,
    Continu'd thought died.
  CORNELIUS. Queen's dram swallow'd.
  CYMBELINE. O rare instinct!
    hear through? fierce abridgment
    Hath circumstantial branches, which
    Distinction rich in. Where? liv'd you?
    serve Roman captive?
    parted brothers? met them?
    fled court? whither? These,
    motives battle, with
    more, demanded,
    by-dependences,
    chance chance; time place  
    serve long interrogatories. See,
    Posthumus anchors Imogen;
    she, harmless lightning, throws eye
    him, brothers, me, master, hitting
    object joy; counterchange
    severally all. quit ground,
    smoke temple sacrifices.
    [To BELARIUS] Thou art brother; hold thee ever.
  IMOGEN. father too, relieve me
    gracious season.
  CYMBELINE. o'erjoy'd
    Save bonds. joyful too,
    taste comfort.
  IMOGEN. good master,
    service.
  LUCIUS. Happy you!
  CYMBELINE. forlorn soldier, nobly fought,
    becom'd place grac'd
    thankings king.
  POSTHUMUS. am, sir,  
    soldier company three
    poor beseeming; 'twas fitment for
    purpose follow'd. he,
    Speak, Iachimo. down, might
    made finish.
  IACHIMO. [Kneeling] again;
    heavy conscience sinks knee,
    force did. life, beseech you,
    owe; ring first,
    bracelet truest princess
    swore faith.
  POSTHUMUS. Kneel me.
    pow'r spare you;
    malice forgive you. Live,
    deal better.
  CYMBELINE. Nobly doom'd!
    learn freeness son-in-law;
    Pardon's word all.
  ARVIRAGUS. holp us, sir,
    brother;  
    Joy'd are.
  POSTHUMUS. servant, Princes. Good lord Rome,
    Call soothsayer. slept, methought
    Great Jupiter, eagle back'd,
    Appear'd me, spritely shows
    mine kindred. wak'd, found
    label bosom; containing
    sense hardness can
    Make collection it. show
    skill construction.
  LUCIUS. Philarmonus!
  SOOTHSAYER. Here, good lord.
  LUCIUS. Read, declare meaning.
  SOOTHSAYER. [Reads] 'When lion's whelp shall, himself
    unknown, seeking find, embrac'd by
    piece tender air; stately cedar shall
    lopp'd branches which, dead years, shall
    revive, jointed stock, freshly grow;
    Posthumus end miseries, Britain fortunate
    flourish peace plenty.'  
    Thou, Leonatus, art lion's whelp;
    fit apt construction thy name,
    Leo-natus, doth import much.
    [To CYMBELINE] piece tender air, thy virtuous daughter,
    call 'mollis aer,' 'mollis aer'
    term 'mulier'; 'mulier' divine
    constant wife, now
    Answering letter oracle,
    Unknown you, unsought, clipp'd about
    tender air.
  CYMBELINE. hath seeming.
  SOOTHSAYER. lofty cedar, royal Cymbeline,
    Personates thee; thy lopp'd branches point
    Thy sons forth, who, Belarius stol'n,
    years thought dead, reviv'd,
    majestic cedar join'd, issue
    Promises Britain peace plenty.
  CYMBELINE. Well,
    peace begin. And, Caius Lucius,
    victor, submit Caesar  
    Roman empire, promising
    pay wonted tribute, which
    dissuaded wicked queen,
    heavens justice, hers,
    laid heavy hand.
  SOOTHSAYER. fingers pow'rs tune
    harmony peace. vision
    made Lucius ere stroke
    scarce-cold battle, instant
    full accomplish'd; Roman eagle,
    south west wing soaring aloft,
    Lessen'd beams o' th' sun
    vanish'd; foreshow'd princely eagle,
    Th'imperial Caesar, Caesar, unite
    favour radiant Cymbeline,
    shines west.
  CYMBELINE. Laud gods;
    crooked smokes climb nostrils
    bless'd altars. Publish peace
    subjects. Set forward;  
    Roman British ensign wave
    Friendly together. Lud's Town march;
    temple great Jupiter
    peace ratify; seal feasts.
    Set there! war cease,
    Ere bloody hands wash'd, peace.      Exeunt

THE END

1604


THE TRAGEDY HAMLET, PRINCE DENMARK


by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  Claudius, King Denmark.
  Marcellus, Officer.
  Hamlet, son former, nephew present king.
  Polonius, Lord Chamberlain.
  Horatio, friend Hamlet.
  Laertes, son Polonius.
  Voltemand, courtier.
  Cornelius, courtier.
  Rosencrantz, courtier.
  Guildenstern, courtier.
  Osric, courtier.
  Gentleman, courtier.
  Priest.
  Marcellus, officer.
  Bernardo, officer.
  Francisco, soldier
  Reynaldo, servant Polonius.
  Players.
  Clowns, gravediggers.
  Fortinbras, Prince Norway.  
  Norwegian Captain.
  English Ambassadors.

  Getrude, Queen Denmark, mother Hamlet.
  Ophelia, daughter Polonius.

  Ghost Hamlet's Father.

  Lords, ladies, Officers, Soldiers, Sailors, Messengers, Attendants.
