SCENE.- Elsinore.


ACT I. Scene I.
Elsinore. platform Castle.

Enter Sentinels-[first,] Francisco, [who paces down
at post; then] Bernardo, [who approaches him].

  Ber. there.?
  Fran. Nay, answer me. Stand unfold yourself.
  Ber. Long live King!
  Fran. Bernardo?
  Ber. He.
  Fran. carefully hour.
  Ber. 'Tis struck twelve. thee bed, Francisco.
  Fran. relief thanks. 'Tis bitter cold,
    sick heart.
  Ber. quiet guard?
  Fran. mouse stirring.
  Ber. Well, good night.
    meet Horatio Marcellus,
    rivals watch, bid make haste.

                    Enter Horatio Marcellus.  

  Fran. hear them. Stand, ho! there?
  Hor. Friends ground.
  Mar. liegemen Dane.
  Fran. Give good night.
  Mar. O, farewell, honest soldier.
    hath reliev'd you?
  Fran. Bernardo hath place.
    Give good night.                                   Exit.
  Mar. Holla, Bernardo!
  Ber. Say-
    What, Horatio ?
  Hor. piece him.
  Ber. Welcome, Horatio. Welcome, good Marcellus.
  Mar. What, thing appear'd to-night?
  Ber. nothing.
  Mar. Horatio 'tis fantasy,
    belief hold him
    Touching dreaded sight, us.
    entreated along,  
    watch minutes night,
    That, apparition come,
    approve eyes speak it.
  Hor. Tush, tush, 'twill appear.
  Ber. Sit awhile,
    assail ears,
    fortified story,
    nights seen.
  Hor. Well, sit down,
    hear Bernardo speak this.
  Ber. night all,
    yond star westward pole
    made t' illume part heaven
    burns, Marcellus myself,
    bell beating one-

                        Enter Ghost.

  Mar. Peace! break thee off! again!
  Ber. figure, King dead.  
  Mar. Thou art scholar; speak it, Horatio.
  Ber. King? Mark it, Horatio.
  Hor. like. harrows fear wonder.
  Ber. spoke to.
  Mar. Question it, Horatio.
  Hor. art thou usurp'st time night
    fair warlike form
    majesty buried Denmark
    march? heaven charge thee speak!
  Mar. offended.
  Ber. See, stalks away!
  Hor. Stay! Speak, speak! charge thee speak!
                                                     Exit Ghost.
  Mar. 'Tis answer.
  Ber. now, Horatio? tremble pale.
    fantasy?
    on't?
  Hor. God, believe
    true avouch
    mine eyes.  
  Mar. King?
  Hor. thou art thyself.
    armour on
    th' ambitious Norway combated.
    frown'd when, angry parle,
    smote sledded Polacks ice.
    'Tis strange.
  Mar. before, jump dead hour,
    martial stalk hath watch.
  Hor. thought work not;
    But, gross scope opinion,
    bodes strange eruption state.
  Mar. Good now, sit down, knows,
    strict observant watch
    nightly toils subject land,
    daily cast brazen cannon
    foreign mart implements war;
    impress shipwrights, sore task
    divide Sunday week.
    toward, sweaty haste  
    Doth make night joint-labourer day?
    is't inform me?
  Hor. I.
    least, whisper so. king,
    image appear'd us,
    Was, know, Fortinbras Norway,
    Thereto prick'd emulate pride,
    Dar'd combat; valiant Hamlet
    (For side world esteem'd him)
    slay Fortinbras; who, seal'd compact,
    ratified law heraldry,
    forfeit, life, lands
    stood seiz'd of, conqueror;
    moiety competent
    gaged king; return'd
    inheritance Fortinbras,
    vanquisher, as, comart
    carriage article design'd,
    fell Hamlet. Now, sir, young Fortinbras,
    unimproved mettle hot full,  
    Hath skirts Norway, there,
    Shark'd list lawless resolutes,
    food diet, enterprise
    hath stomach in't; other,
    doth state,
    recover us, strong hand
    terms compulsatory, foresaid lands
    father lost; this, it,
    main motive preparations,
    source watch, chief head
    post-haste romage land.
  Ber. e'en so.
    sort portentous figure
    armed watch, King
    question wars.
  Hor. mote trouble mind's eye.
    high palmy state Rome,
    ere mightiest Julius fell,
    graves stood tenantless, sheeted dead
    squeak gibber Roman streets;  
    stars trains fire, dews blood,
    Disasters sun; moist star
    influence Neptune's empire stands
    sick doomsday eclipse.
    precurse fierce events,
    harbingers preceding fates
    prologue omen coming on,
    heaven earth demonstrated
    climature countrymen.

                      Enter Ghost again.

    soft! behold! Lo, again!
    cross it, blast me.- Stay illusion!
                                               Spreads arms.
    thou hast sound, voice,
    Speak me.
    good thing done,
    thee ease, and, race me,
    Speak me.  
    thou art privy thy country's fate,
    happily foreknowing avoid,
    O, speak!
    thou hast uphoarded thy life
    Extorted treasure womb earth
    (For which, say, spirits oft walk death),
                                                 cock crows.
    Speak it! Stay, speak!- Stop it, Marcellus!
  Mar. strike partisan?
  Hor. Do, stand.
  Ber. 'Tis here!
  Hor. 'Tis here!
  Mar. 'Tis gone!
                                                     Exit Ghost.
    wrong, majestical,
    offer show violence;
    air, invulnerable,
    vain blows malicious mockery.
  Ber. speak, cock crew.
  Hor. started, guilty thing  
    fearful summons. heard
    cock, trumpet morn,
    Doth lofty shrill-sounding throat
    Awake god day; warning,
    sea fire, earth air,
    Th' extravagant erring spirit hies
    confine; truth herein
    present object made probation.
  Mar. faded crowing cock.
    ever, 'gainst season comes
    Saviour's birth celebrated,
    bird dawning singeth night long;
    then, say, spirit dare stir abroad,
    nights wholesome, planets strike,
    fairy takes, witch hath power charm,
    hallow'd gracious time.
  Hor. heard part it.
    look, morn, russet mantle clad,
    Walks o'er dew yon high eastward hill.
    Break watch up; advice  
    impart to-night
    young Hamlet; for, life,
    spirit, dumb us, speak him.
    consent acquaint it,
    needful loves, fitting duty?
    do't, pray; morning know
    find conveniently.           Exeunt.




Scene II.
Elsinore. room state Castle.

Flourish. [Enter Claudius, King Denmark, Gertrude Queen, Hamlet,
Polonius, Laertes sister Ophelia, [Voltemand, Cornelius,]
Lords Attendant.

  King. Hamlet dear brother's death
    memory green, befitted
    bear hearts grief, kingdom
    contracted brow woe,
    hath discretion fought nature
    wisest sorrow him
    remembrance ourselves.
    sister, queen,
    Th' imperial jointress warlike state,
    we, 'twere defeated joy,
    auspicious, dropping eye,
    mirth funeral, dirge marriage,
    equal scale weighing delight dole,
    wife; barr'd
    wisdoms, freely  
    affair along. all, thanks.
    follows, know, young Fortinbras,
    Holding weak supposal worth,
    thinking late dear brother's death
    state disjoint frame,
    Colleagued dream advantage,
    hath fail'd pester message
    Importing surrender lands
    Lost father, bands law,
    valiant brother. him.
    ourself time meeting.
    business is: writ
    Norway, uncle young Fortinbras,
    Who, impotent bedrid, scarcely hears
    nephew's purpose, suppress
    gait herein, levies,
    lists, full proportions made
    subject; dispatch
    You, good Cornelius, you, Voltemand,
    bearers greeting Norway,  
    Giving personal power
    business King, scope
    dilated articles allow.            [Gives paper.]
    Farewell, haste commend duty.
  Cor., Volt. that, things, show duty.
  King. doubt nothing. Heartily farewell.
                                 Exeunt Voltemand Cornelius.
    now, Laertes, news you?
    told suit. is't, Laertes?
    speak reason Dane
    lose voice. wouldst thou beg, Laertes,
    offer, thy asking?
    head native heart,
    hand instrumental mouth,
    throne Denmark thy father.
    wouldst thou have, Laertes?
  Laer. dread lord,
    leave favour return France;
    willingly Denmark
    show duty coronation,  
    confess, duty done,
    thoughts wishes bend France
    bow gracious leave pardon.
  King. father's leave? Polonius?
  Pol. hath, lord, wrung slow leave
    laboursome petition, last
    seal'd hard consent.
    beseech give leave go.
  King. thy fair hour, Laertes. Time thine,
    thy graces spend thy will!
    now, cousin Hamlet, son-
  Ham. [aside] kin, kind!
  King. clouds hang you?
  Ham. so, lord. i' th' sun.
  Queen. Good Hamlet, cast thy nighted colour off,
    thine eye friend Denmark.
    thy vailed lids
    Seek thy noble father dust.
    Thou know'st 'tis common. lives die,
    Passing nature eternity.  
  Ham. Ay, madam, common.
  Queen. be,
    thee?
  Ham. Seems, madam, Nay, is. 'seems.'
    'Tis inky cloak, good mother,
    customary suits solemn black,
    windy suspiration forc'd breath,
    No, fruitful river eye,
    dejected havior visage,
    forms, moods, shapes grief,
    'That denote truly. seem,
    actions man play;
    passeth show-
    trappings suits woe.
  King. 'Tis sweet commendable nature, Hamlet,
    give mourning duties father;
    know, father lost father;
    father lost, lost his, survivor bound
    filial obligation term
    obsequious sorrow. persever  
    obstinate condolement course
    impious stubbornness. 'Tis unmanly grief;
    shows incorrect heaven,
    heart unfortified, mind impatient,
    understanding simple unschool'd;
    be, common
    vulgar thing sense,
    peevish opposition
    heart? Fie! 'tis fault heaven,
    fault dead, fault nature,
    reason absurd, common theme
    death fathers, hath cried,
    corse till died to-day,
    'This so.' pray throw earth
    unprevailing woe, us
    father; world note
    throne,
    nobility love
    dearest father bears son
    impart you. intent  
    back school Wittenberg,
    retrograde desire;
    beseech you, bend remain
    cheer comfort eye,
    chiefest courtier, cousin, son.
  Queen. thy mother lose prayers, Hamlet.
    pray thee stay us, Wittenberg.
  Ham. obey you, madam.
  King. Why, 'tis loving fair reply.
    ourself Denmark. Madam, come.
    gentle unforc'd accord Hamlet
    Sits smiling heart; grace whereof,
    jocund health Denmark drinks to-day
    great cannon clouds tell,
    King's rouse heaven bruit again,
    Respeaking earthly thunder. away.
                                Flourish. Exeunt Hamlet.
  Ham. O solid flesh melt,
    Thaw, resolve dew!
    Everlasting fix'd  
    canon 'gainst self-slaughter! O God! God!
    weary, stale, flat, unprofitable
    world!
    Fie on't! ah, fie! 'Tis unweeded garden
    grows seed; things rank gross nature
    Possess merely. this!
    months dead! Nay, much, two.
    excellent king, this
    Hyperion satyr; loving mother
    beteem winds heaven
    Visit face roughly. Heaven earth!
    remember? Why, hang him
    increase appetite grown
    fed on; yet, month-
    on't! Frailty, thy woman!-
    month, ere shoes old
    poor father's body
    Niobe, tears- she, she
    (O God! beast discourse reason
    mourn'd longer) married uncle;  
    father's brother, father
    Hercules. month,
    Ere salt unrighteous tears
    left flushing galled eyes,
    married. O, wicked speed, post
    dexterity incestuous sheets!
    not, good.
    break heart, hold tongue!

          Enter Horatio, Marcellus, Bernardo.

  Hor. Hail lordship!
  Ham. glad well.
    Horatio!- forget myself.
  Hor. same, lord, poor servant ever.
  Ham. Sir, good friend- change you.
    make Wittenberg, Horatio?
    Marcellus?
  Mar. good lord!
  Ham. glad you.- [To Bernardo] Good even, sir.-  
    what, faith, make Wittenberg?
  Hor. truant disposition, good lord.
  Ham. hear enemy so,
    ear violence
    make truster report
    yourself. truant.
    affair Elsinore?
    teach drink deep ere depart.
  Hor. lord, father's funeral.
  Ham. prithee mock me, fellow student.
    mother's wedding.
  Hor. Indeed, lord, hard upon.
  Ham. Thrift, thrift, Horatio! funeral bak'd meats
    coldly furnish marriage tables.
    met dearest foe heaven
    day, Horatio!
    father- methinks father.
  Hor. O, where, lord?
  Ham. mind's eye, Horatio.
  Hor. once. goodly king.  
  Ham. man, all.
    again.
  Hor. lord, yesternight.
  Ham. Saw? who?
  Hor. lord, King father.
  Ham. King father?
  Hor. Season admiration while
    attent ear, till deliver
    witness gentlemen,
    marvel you.
  Ham. God's love hear!
  Hor. nights gentlemen
    (Marcellus Bernardo) watch
    dead vast middle night
    encount'red. figure father,
    Armed point exactly, cap-a-pe,
    Appears solemn march
    slow stately them. Thrice walk'd
    oppress'd fear-surprised eyes,
    truncheon's length; whilst distill'd  
    jelly act fear,
    Stand dumb speak him. me
    dreadful secrecy impart did,
    night watch;
    Where, deliver'd, time,
    Form thing, word made true good,
    apparition comes. knew father.
    hands like.
  Ham. this?
  Mar. lord, platform watch'd.
  Ham. speak it?
  Hor. lord, did;
    answer made none. methought
    lifted head address
    motion, speak;
    morning cock crew loud,
    sound shrunk haste away
    vanish'd sight.
  Ham. 'Tis strange.
  Hor. live, honour'd lord, 'tis true;  
    writ duty
    it.
  Ham. Indeed, indeed, sirs. troubles me.
    Hold watch to-night?
  [Mar. Ber.] do, lord.
  Ham. Arm'd, you?
  Both. Arm'd, lord.
  Ham. top toe?
  Both. lord, head foot.
  Ham. face?
  Hor. O, yes, lord! wore beaver up.
  Ham. What, look'd frowningly.
  Hor. countenance sorrow anger.
  Ham. Pale red?
  Hor. Nay, pale.
  Ham. fix'd eyes you?
  Hor. constantly.
  Ham. there.
  Hor. amaz'd you.
  Ham. like, like. Stay'd long?  
  Hor. moderate haste hundred.
  Both. Longer, longer.
  Hor. saw't.
  Ham. beard grizzled- no?
  Hor. was, life,
    sable silver'd.
  Ham. watch to-night.
    Perchance 'twill walk again.
  Hor. warr'nt will.
  Ham. assume noble father's person,
    speak it, hell gape
    bid hold peace. pray all,
    hitherto conceal'd sight,
    tenable silence still;
    whatsoever hap to-night,
    Give understanding tongue.
    requite loves. So, fare well.
    platform, 'twixt eleven twelve,
    visit you.
  All. duty honour.  
  Ham. loves, mine you. Farewell.
                                        Exeunt [all Hamlet].
    father's spirit- arms? well.
    doubt foul play. night come!
    Till sit still, soul. Foul deeds rise,
    earth o'erwhelm them, men's eyes.
Exit.




Scene III.
Elsinore. room house Polonius.

Enter Laertes Ophelia.

  Laer. necessaries embark'd. Farewell.
    And, sister, winds give benefit
    convoy assistant, sleep,
    hear you.
  Oph. doubt that?
  Laer. Hamlet, trifling favour,
    Hold fashion, toy blood;
    violet youth primy nature,
    Forward, permanent- sweet, lasting;
    perfume suppliance minute;
    more.
  Oph. so?
  Laer. more.
    nature crescent grow alone
    thews bulk; temple waxes,
    service mind soul
    Grows wide withal. loves now,  
    soil cautel doth besmirch
    virtue will; fear,
    greatness weigh'd, own;
    subject birth.
    not, unvalued persons do,
    Carve himself, choice depends
    safety health state,
    choice circumscrib'd
    voice yielding body
    Whereof head. loves you,
    fits wisdom it
    act place
    give deed; further
    main voice Denmark withal.
    weigh loss honour sustain
    credent ear list songs,
    lose heart, chaste treasure open
    unmast'red importunity.
    Fear it, Ophelia, fear it, dear sister,
    rear affection,  
    shot danger desire.
    chariest maid prodigal enough
    unmask beauty moon.
    Virtue scopes calumnious strokes.
    canker galls infants spring
    oft buttons disclos'd,
    morn liquid dew youth
    Contagious blastments imminent.
    wary then; safety lies fear.
    Youth rebels, near.
  Oph. th' effect good lesson keep
    watchman heart. But, good brother,
    ungracious pastors do,
    Show steep thorny heaven,
    Whiles, puff'd reckless libertine,
    primrose path dalliance treads
    recks rede.
  Laer. O, fear not!

                       Enter Polonius.  

    stay long. father comes.
    double blessing double grace;
    Occasion smiles leave.
  Pol. here, Laertes? Aboard, aboard, shame!
    wind sits shoulder sail,
    stay'd for. There- blessing thee!
    precepts thy memory
    thou character. Give thy thoughts tongue,
    unproportion'd thought act.
    thou familiar, means vulgar:
    friends thou hast, adoption tried,
    Grapple thy soul hoops steel;
    dull thy palm entertainment
    new-hatch'd, unfledg'd comrade. Beware
    entrance quarrel; in,
    Bear't th' opposed beware thee.
    Give man thine ear, thy voice;
    man's censure, reserve thy judgment.
    Costly thy habit thy purse buy,  
    express'd fancy; rich, gaudy;
    apparel oft proclaims man,
    France rank station
    select generous, chief that.
    borrower lender be;
    loan oft loses friend,
    borrowing dulls edge husbandry.
    all- thine true,
    follow, night day,
    Thou canst false man.
    Farewell. blessing season thee!
  Laer. humbly leave, lord.
  Pol. time invites you. Go, servants tend.
  Laer. Farewell, Ophelia, remember well
    you.
  Oph. 'Tis memory lock'd,
    key it.
  Laer. Farewell.                                          Exit.
  Pol. is't, Ophelia, hath you?
  Oph. you, touching Lord Hamlet.  
  Pol. Marry, bethought!
    'Tis told hath oft late
    private time you, yourself
    audience free bounteous.
    so- 'tis put me,
    caution- you
    understand clearly
    behooves daughter honour.
    you? Give truth.
  Oph. hath, lord, late made tenders
    affection me.
  Pol. Affection? Pooh! speak green girl,
    Unsifted perilous circumstance.
    tenders, call them?
  Oph. know, lord, think,
  Pol. Marry, teach you! baby
    ta'en tenders true pay,
    sterling. Tender dearly,
    (not crack wind poor phrase,
    Running thus) tender fool.  
  Oph. lord, hath importun'd love
    honourable fashion.
  Pol. Ay, fashion call it. to, to!
  Oph. hath countenance speech, lord,
    holy vows heaven.
  Pol. Ay, springes catch woodcocks! know,
    blood burns, prodigal soul
    Lends tongue vows. blazes, daughter,
    Giving light heat, extinct both
    promise, a-making,
    fire. time
    scanter maiden presence.
    Set entreatments higher rate
    command parley. Lord Hamlet,
    him, young,
    larger tether walk
    you. few, Ophelia,
    vows; brokers,
    dye investments show,
    mere implorators unholy suits,  
    Breathing sanctified pious bawds,
    beguile. all:
    not, plain terms, time forth
    slander moment leisure
    give words talk Lord Hamlet.
    to't, charge you. ways.
  Oph. obey, lord.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene IV.
Elsinore. platform Castle.

Enter Hamlet, Horatio, Marcellus.

  Ham. air bites shrewdly; cold.
  Hor. nipping eager air.
  Ham. hour now?
  Hor. lacks twelve.
  Mar. No, struck.
  Hor. Indeed? heard not. draws season
    spirit held wont walk.
                   flourish trumpets, pieces off.
    mean, lord?
  Ham. King doth wake to-night takes rouse,
    wassail, swagg'ring upspring reels,
    And, drains draughts Rhenish down,
    kettledrum trumpet bray out
    triumph pledge.
  Hor. custom?
  Ham. Ay, marry, is't;
    mind, native  
    manner born, custom
    honour'd breach observance.
    heavy-headed revel east west
    Makes traduc'd tax'd nations;
    clip drunkards swinish phrase
    Soil addition; takes
    achievements, perform'd height,
    pith marrow attribute.
    oft chances men
    That, vicious mole nature them,
    birth,- guilty,
    nature choose origin,-
    o'ergrowth complexion,
    Oft breaking pales forts reason,
    habit o'erleavens
    form plausive manners, men
    Carrying, say, stamp defect,
    nature's livery, fortune's star,
    virtues else- pure grace,
    infinite man undergo-  
    general censure corruption
    fault. dram e'il
    Doth noble substance dout scandal.

                         Enter Ghost.

  Hor. Look, lord, comes!
  Ham. Angels ministers grace defend us!
    thou spirit health goblin damn'd,
    Bring thee airs heaven blasts hell,
    thy intents wicked charitable,
    Thou com'st questionable shape
    speak thee. call thee Hamlet,
    King, father, royal Dane. O, answer me?
    burst ignorance, tell
    thy canoniz'd bones, hearsed death,
    burst cerements; sepulchre
    thee quietly inurn'd,
    Hath op'd ponderous marble jaws
    cast thee again.  
    thou, dead corse, complete steel,
    Revisits glimpses moon,
    Making night hideous, fools nature
    horridly shake disposition
    thoughts reaches souls?
    Say, this? wherefore? do?
                                           Ghost beckons Hamlet.
  Hor. beckons it,
    impartment desire
    alone.
  Mar. courteous action
    waves removed ground.
    it!
  Hor. No, means!
  Ham. speak. follow it.
  Hor. not, lord!
  Ham. Why, fear?
    set life pin's fee;
    soul, that,
    thing immortal itself?  
    waves again. follow it.
  Hor. tempt flood, lord,
    dreadful summit cliff
    beetles o'er base sea,
    assume other, horrible form
    deprive sovereignty reason
    draw madness? it.
    place puts toys desperation,
    motive, brain
    fadoms sea
    hears roar beneath.
  Ham. waves still.
    on. follow thee.
  Mar. go, lord.
  Ham. Hold hands!
  Hor. rul'd. go.
  Ham. fate cries out
    makes petty artire body
    hardy Nemean lion's nerve.
                                                [Ghost beckons.]  
    call'd. Unhand me, gentlemen.
    heaven, make ghost lets me!-
    say, away!- on. follow thee.
                                        Exeunt Ghost Hamlet.
  Hor. waxes desperate imagination.
  Mar. follow. 'Tis fit obey him.
  Hor. after. issue wail come?
  Mar. rotten state Denmark.
  Hor. Heaven direct it.
  Mar. Nay, follow him.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene V.
Elsinore. Castle. part fortifications.

Enter Ghost Hamlet.

  Ham. wilt thou lead me? Speak! further.
  Ghost. Mark me.
  Ham. will.
  Ghost. hour come,
    sulph'rous tormenting flames
    render myself.
  Ham. Alas, poor ghost!
  Ghost. Pity not, lend thy hearing
    unfold.
  Ham. Speak. bound hear.
  Ghost. art thou revenge, thou shalt hear.
  Ham. What?
  Ghost. thy father's spirit,
    Doom'd term walk night,
    day confin'd fast fires,
    Till foul crimes days nature
    burnt purg'd away. forbid  
    secrets prison house,
    tale unfold lightest word
    harrow thy soul, freeze thy young blood,
    Make thy eyes, stars, start spheres,
    Thy knotted combined locks part,
    hair stand end
    quills fretful porpentine.
    eternal blazon be
    ears flesh blood. List, list, O, list!
    thou didst thy dear father love-
  Ham. O God!
  Ghost. Revenge foul unnatural murther.
  Ham. Murther?
  Ghost. Murther foul, is;
    foul, strange, unnatural.
  Ham. Haste know't, I, wings swift
    meditation thoughts love,
    sweep revenge.
  Ghost. find thee apt;
    duller shouldst thou fat weed  
    rots ease Lethe wharf,
    Wouldst thou stir this. Now, Hamlet, hear.
    'Tis that, sleeping orchard,
    serpent stung me. ear Denmark
    forged process death
    Rankly abus'd. know, thou noble youth,
    serpent sting thy father's life
    wears crown.
  Ham. O prophetic soul!
    uncle?
  Ghost. Ay, incestuous, adulterate beast,
    witchcraft wit, traitorous gifts-
    O wicked wit gifts, power
    seduce!- won shameful lust
    seeming-virtuous queen.
    O Hamlet, falling-off there,
    me, love dignity
    hand hand vow
    made marriage, decline
    wretch natural gifts poor  
    mine!
    virtue, mov'd,
    lewdness court shape heaven,
    lust, radiant angel link'd,
    sate celestial bed
    prey garbage.
    soft! methinks scent morning air.
    be. Sleeping orchard,
    custom afternoon,
    secure hour thy uncle stole,
    juice cursed hebona vial,
    porches ears pour
    leperous distilment; effect
    Holds enmity blood man
    swift quicksilverr courses through
    natural gates alleys body,
    sudden vigour doth posset
    curd, eager droppings milk,
    thin wholesome blood. mine;
    instant tetter bark'd about,  
    lazar-like, vile loathsome crust
    smooth body.
    I, sleeping, brother's hand
    life, crown, queen, dispatch'd;
    Cut blossoms sin,
    Unhous'led, disappointed, unanel'd,
    reckoning made, account
    imperfections head.
  Ham. O, horrible! O, horrible! horrible!
  Ghost. thou hast nature thee, bear not.
    royal bed Denmark be
    couch luxury damned incest.
    But, howsoever thou pursuest act,
    Taint thy mind, thy soul contrive
    thy mother aught. Leave heaven,
    thorns bosom lodge
    prick sting her. Fare thee once.
    glowworm shows matin near
    gins pale uneffectual fire.
    Adieu, adieu, adieu! Remember me.                      Exit.  
  Ham. O host heaven! O earth! else?
    couple hell? Hold, hold, heart!
    you, sinews, grow instant old,
    bear stiffly up. Remember thee?
    Ay, thou poor ghost, memory holds seat
    distracted globe. Remember thee?
    Yea, table memory
    wipe trivial fond records,
    saws books, forms, pressures past
    youth observation copied there,
    thy commandment live
    book volume brain,
    Unmix'd baser matter. Yes, heaven!
    O pernicious woman!
    O villain, villain, smiling, damned villain!
    tables! Meet set down
    smile, smile, villain;
    Denmark.        [Writes.]
    So, uncle, are. word:
    'Adieu, adieu! Remember me.'  
    sworn't.
  Hor. (within) lord, lord!

                   Enter Horatio Marcellus.

  Mar. Lord Hamlet!
  Hor. Heaven secure him!
  Ham. it!
  Mar. Illo, ho, ho, lord!
  Ham. Hillo, ho, ho, boy! Come, bird, come.
  Mar. is't, noble lord?
  Hor. news, lord?
  Mar. O, wonderful!
  Hor. Good lord, it.
  Ham. No, reveal it.
  Hor. I, lord, heaven!
  Mar. I, lord.
  Ham. then? heart man it?
    secret?
  Both. Ay, heaven, lord.  
  Ham. neer villain dwelling Denmark
    arrant knave.
  Hor. ghost, lord, grave
    this.
  Ham. Why, right! right!
    so, circumstance all,
    hold fit shake hands part;
    You, business desires point you,
    man hath business desire,
    is; poor part,
    you, pray.
  Hor. wild whirling words, lord.
  Ham. offend you, heartily;
    Yes, faith, heartily.
  Hor. offence, lord.
  Ham. Yes, Saint Patrick, is, Horatio,
    offence too. Touching vision here,
    honest ghost, you.
    desire us,
    O'ermaster't may. now, good friends,  
    friends, scholars, soldiers,
    Give poor request.
  Hor. is't, lord? will.
  Ham. make to-night.
  Both. lord, not.
  Ham. Nay, swear't.
  Hor. faith,
    lord, I.
  Mar. I, lord- faith.
  Ham. sword.
  Mar. sworn, lord, already.
  Ham. Indeed, sword, indeed.

                 Ghost cries stage.

  Ghost. Swear.
  Ham. Aha boy, say'st thou so? Art thou there, truepenny?
    on! hear fellow cellarage.
    Consent swear.
  Hor. Propose oath, lord.  
  Ham. speak seen.
    Swear sword.
  Ghost. [beneath] Swear.
  Ham. Hic ubique? shift ground.
    hither, gentlemen,
    lay hands sword.
    speak heard:
    Swear sword.
  Ghost. [beneath] Swear sword.
  Ham. said, mole! Canst work i' th' earth fast?
    worthy pioner! remove, good friends."
  Hor. O day night, wondrous strange!
  Ham. stranger give welcome.
    things heaven earth, Horatio,
    dreamt philosophy.
    come!
    Here, before, never, mercy,
    strange odd soe'er bear myself
    (As perchance meet
    put antic disposition on),  
    you, times me, shall,
    arms encumb'red thus, head-shake,
    pronouncing doubtful phrase,
    'Well, well, know,' 'We could, would,'
    'If list speak,' 'There be, might,'
    ambiguous giving out, note
    aught me- do,
    grace mercy you,
    Swear.
  Ghost. [beneath] Swear.
                                                   [They swear.]
  Ham. Rest, rest, perturbed spirit! So, gentlemen,
    love commend you;
    poor man Hamlet is
    t' express love friending you,
    God willing, lack. together;
    fingers lips, pray.
    time joint. O cursed spite
    born set right!
    Nay, come, together.  
                                                         Exeunt.

Act II. Scene I.
Elsinore. room house Polonius.

Enter Polonius Reynaldo.

  Pol. Give money notes, Reynaldo.
  Rey. will, lord.
  Pol. marvell's wisely, good Reynaldo,
    visit him, make inquire
    behaviour.
  Rey. lord, intend it.
  Pol. Marry, said, said. you, sir,
    Enquire Danskers Paris;
    how, who, means, keep,
    company, expense; finding
    encompassment drift question
    son, nearer
    demands touch it.
    you, 'twere, distant knowledge him;
    thus, 'I father friends,
    part him.' mark this, Reynaldo?
  Rey. Ay, well, lord.  
  Pol. 'And part him, but,' say, 'not well.
    if't mean, wild
    Addicted so'; put him
    forgeries please; marry, rank
    dishonour him- heed that;
    But, sir, wanton, wild, usual slips
    companions noted known
    youth liberty.
  Rey. gaming, lord.
  Pol. Ay, drinking, fencing, swearing, quarrelling,
    Drabbing. far.
  Rey. lord, dishonour him.
  Pol. Faith, no, season charge.
    put scandal him,
    open incontinency.
    meaning. breathe faults quaintly
    taints liberty,
    flash outbreak fiery mind,
    savageness unreclaimed blood,
    general assault.  
  Rey. But, good lord-
  Pol. Wherefore this?
  Rey. Ay, lord,
    that.
  Pol. Marry, sir, drift,
    fetch warrant.
    laying slight sullies son
    'twere thing soil'd i' th' working,
    Mark you,
    party converse, sound,
    prenominate crimes
    youth breathe guilty, assur'd
    closes consequence:
    'Good sir,' so, 'friend,' 'gentleman'-
    phrase addition
    man country-
  Rey. good, lord.
  Pol. then, sir, 'a this- 'a does- say?
    mass, something! leave?
  Rey. 'closes consequence,' 'friend so,'  
    gentleman.'
  Pol. 'closes consequence'- Ay, marry!
    closes thus: 'I gentleman.
    yesterday, t'other day,
    then, then, such; and, say,
    'a gaming; o'ertook in's rouse;
    falling tennis'; perchance,
    'I enter house sale,'
    Videlicet, brothel, forth.
    now-
    bait falsehood takes carp truth;
    wisdom reach,
    windlasses assays bias,
    indirections find directions out.
    So, lecture advice,
    son. me, not
  Rey. lord, have.
  Pol. God b' wi' ye, fare ye well!
  Rey. Good lord!                                    [Going.]
  Pol. Observe inclination yourself.  
  Rey. shall, lord.
  Pol. ply music.
  Rey. Well, lord.
  Pol. Farewell!
                                                  Exit Reynaldo.

                       Enter Ophelia.

    now, Ophelia? matter?
  Oph. O lord, lord, affrighted!
  Pol. what, i' th' God I
  Oph. lord, sewing closet,
    Lord Hamlet, doublet unbrac'd,
    hat head, stockings foul'd,
    Ungart'red, down-gyved ankle;
    Pale shirt, knees knocking other,
    piteous purport
    loosed hell
    speak horrors- me.
  Pol. Mad thy love?  
  Oph. lord, know,
    fear it.
  Pol. he?
  Oph. wrist held hard;
    length arm,
    And, hand o'er brow,
    falls perusal face
    draw it. Long stay'd so.
    last, shaking mine arm,
    thrice head waving down,
    rais'd sigh piteous profound
    shatter bulk
    end being. done, lets go,
    head shoulder turn'd
    seem'd find eyes,
    o' doors help
    bended light me.
  Pol. Come, me. seek King.
    ecstasy love,
    violent property fordoes  
    leads desperate undertakings
    oft passion heaven
    afflict natures. sorry.
    What, hard words late?
  Oph. No, good lord; but, command,
    repel letters denied
    access me.
  Pol. hath made mad.
    heed judgment
    quoted him. fear'd trifle
    meant wrack thee; beshrew jealousy!
    heaven, proper age
    cast opinions
    common younger sort
    lack discretion. Come, King.
    known; which, close, move
    grief hide hate utter love.
    Come.
                                                         Exeunt.

Scene II.
Elsinore. room Castle.

Flourish. [Enter King Queen, Rosencrantz Guildenstern, cum aliis.

  King. Welcome, dear Rosencrantz Guildenstern.
    long you,
    provoke
    hasty sending. heard
    Hamlet's transformation. call it,
    Sith th' exterior man
    Resembles was. be,
    father's death, hath put him
    th' understanding himself,
    dream of. entreat both
    That, young clays brought him,
    neighbour'd youth haviour,
    vouchsafe rest court
    time; companies
    draw pleasures, gather
    occasion glean,  
    aught unknown afflicts thus
    That, open'd, lies remedy.
  Queen. Good gentlemen, hath talk'd you,
    men living
    adheres. you
    show gentry good will
    expend time awhile
    supply profit hope,
    visitation receive thanks
    fits king's remembrance.
  Ros. Majesties
    Might, sovereign power us,
    Put dread pleasures command
    entreaty.
  Guil. obey,
    give ourselves, full bent,
    lay service freely feet,
    commanded.
  King. Thanks, Rosencrantz gentle Guildenstern.
  Queen. Thanks, Guildenstern gentle Rosencrantz.  
    beseech instantly visit
    changed son.- Go, you,
    bring gentlemen Hamlet is.
  Guil. Heavens make presence practices
    Pleasant helpful him!
  Queen. Ay, amen!
                 Exeunt Rosencrantz Guildenstern, [with some
                                                    Attendants].

                         Enter Polonius.

  Pol. Th' ambassadors Norway, good lord,
    joyfully return'd.
  King. Thou hast father good news.
  Pol. I, lord? Assure you, good liege,
    hold duty hold soul,
    God gracious king;
    think- brain mine
    Hunts trail policy sure
    hath us'd do- found  
    Hamlet's lunacy.
  King. O, speak that! long hear.
  Pol. Give admittance th' ambassadors.
    news fruit great feast.
  King. Thyself grace them, bring in.
                                                [Exit Polonius.]
    tells me, dear Gertrude, hath found
    head source son's distemper.
  Queen. doubt main,
    father's death o'erhasty marriage.
  King. Well, sift him.

              Enter Polonius, Voltemand, Cornelius.

    Welcome, good friends.
    Say, Voltemand, brother Norway?
  Volt. fair return desires.
    first, suppress
    nephew's levies; appear'd
    preparation 'gainst Polack,  
    look'd into, found
    Highness; whereat griev'd,
    sickness, age, impotence
    falsely borne hand, sends arrests
    Fortinbras; he, brief, obeys,
    Receives rebuke Norway, and, fine,
    Makes vow uncle more
    give th' assay arms Majesty.
    Whereon Norway, overcome joy,
    thousand crowns annual fee
    commission employ soldiers,
    levied before, Polack;
    entreaty, shown,
                                                [Gives paper.]
    give quiet pass
    dominions enterprise,
    safety allowance
    set down.
  King. likes well;
    consider'd time read,  
    Answer, business.
    Meantime well-took labour.
    rest; night feast together.
    home!                       Exeunt Ambassadors.
  Pol. business ended.
    liege, madam, expostulate
    majesty be, duty is,
    day day, night night, time time.
    waste night, day, time.
    Therefore, brevity soul wit,
    tediousness limbs outward flourishes,
    brief. noble son mad.
    Mad call it; for, define true madness,
    is't mad?
    go.
  Queen. matter, art.
  Pol. Madam, swear art all.
    mad, 'tis true: 'tis true 'tis pity;
    pity 'tis 'tis true. foolish figure!
    farewell it, art.  
    Mad grant then. remains
    find effect-
    say, defect,
    effect defective cause.
    remains, remainder thus.
    Perpend.
    daughter (have mine),
    duty obedience, mark,
    Hath this. gather, surmise.
                                             [Reads] letter.
    'To celestial, soul's idol, beautified
      Ophelia,'-

    ill phrase, vile phrase; 'beautified' vile
      phrase.
    hear. Thus:
                                                        [Reads.]
    'In excellent white bosom, these, &c.'
  Queen. Hamlet her?
  Pol. Good madam, stay awhile. faithful.     [Reads.]  

          'Doubt thou stars fire;
            Doubt sun doth move;
          Doubt truth liar;
            doubt love.
      'O dear Ophelia, ill numbers; art to
    reckon groans; love thee best, O best, believe
    it. Adieu.
      'Thine evermore, dear lady, whilst machine him,
                                                          HAMLET.'

    This, obedience, hath daughter shown me;
    above, hath solicitings,
    fell time, means, place,
    mine ear.
  King. hath she
    Receiv'd love?
  Pol. me?
  King. man faithful honourable.
  Pol. fain prove so. think,  
    hot love wing
    (As perceiv'd it, that,
    daughter told me), you,
    dear Majesty queen here, think,
    play'd desk table book,
    heart winking, mute dumb,
    look'd love idle sight?
    think? No, round work
    young mistress bespeak:
    'Lord Hamlet prince, thy star.
    be.' prescripts gave her,
    lock resort,
    Admit messengers, receive tokens.
    done, fruits advice,
    he, repulsed, short tale make,
    Fell sadness, fast,
    watch, weakness,
    lightness, and, declension,
    madness raves,
    mourn for.  
  King. 'tis this?
  Queen. be, like.
  Pol. Hath time- fain that-
    Positively ''Tis so,'
    prov'd otherwise.?
  King. know.
  Pol. [points head shoulder] this, this
      otherwise.
    circumstances lead me, find
    truth hid, hid indeed
    centre.
  King. further?
  Pol. walks hours together
    lobby.
  Queen. indeed.
  Pol. time loose daughter him.
    arras then.
    Mark encounter. love not,
    reason fall'n thereon
    assistant state,  
    farm carters.
  King. it.

                 Enter Hamlet, reading book.

  Queen. sadly poor wretch reading.
  Pol. Away, beseech you, away
    board presently. O, give leave.
                       Exeunt King Queen, [with Attendants].
    good Lord Hamlet?
  Ham. Well, God-a-mercy.
  Pol. me, lord?
  Ham. Excellent well. fishmonger.
  Pol. I, lord.
  Ham. honest man.
  Pol. Honest, lord?
  Ham. Ay, sir. honest, world goes, man
    pick'd ten thousand.
  Pol. true, lord.
  Ham. sun breed maggots dead dog, god  
    kissing carrion- daughter?
  Pol. have, lord.
  Ham. walk i' th' sun. Conception blessing, not
    daughter conceive. Friend, to't.
  Pol. [aside] that? harping daughter. Yet
    knew first. fishmonger. far
    gone, gone! youth suff'red extremity
    love- this. speak again.- you
    read, lord?
  Ham. Words, words, words.
  Pol. matter, lord?
  Ham. who?
  Pol. mean, matter read, lord.
  Ham. Slanders, sir; satirical rogue men
    grey beards; faces wrinkled; eyes
    purging thick amber plum-tree gum; a
    plentiful lack wit, weak hams. which,
    sir, powerfully potently believe, hold it
    honesty set down; yourself, sir,
    if, crab, backward.  
  Pol. [aside] madness, method in't.-
   walk air, lord?
  Ham. grave?
  Pol. Indeed, o' th' air. [Aside] pregnant sometimes
    replies are! happiness madness hits on, which
    reason sanity prosperously delivered of. I
    leave suddenly contrive means meeting between
    daughter.- honourable lord, humbly take
    leave you.
  Ham. cannot, sir, more
    willingly part withal- life, life, my
    life,

                    Enter Rosencrantz Guildenstern.

  Pol. Fare well, lord.
  Ham. tedious fools!
  Pol. seek Lord Hamlet. is.
  Ros. [to Polonius] God save you, sir!
                                                Exit [Polonius].  
  Guil. honour'd lord!
  Ros. dear lord!
  Ham. excellent good friends! dost thou, Guildenstern? Ah,
    Rosencrantz! Good lads, ye both?
  Ros. indifferent children earth.
  Guil. Happy over-happy.
    Fortune's cap button.
  Ham. soles shoe?
  Ros. Neither, lord.
  Ham. live waist, middle her
    favours?
  Guil. Faith, privates we.
  Ham. secret parts Fortune? O! true! a
    strumpet. news ?
  Ros. None, lord, world's grown honest.
  Ham. doomsday near! news true. me
    question particular. you, good friends,
    deserved hands Fortune sends prison
    hither?
  Guil. Prison, lord?  
  Ham. Denmark's prison.
  Ros. world one.
  Ham. goodly one; confines, wards, and
    dungeons, Denmark o' th' worst.
  Ros. so, lord.
  Ham. Why, 'tis you; good
    bad thinking makes so. prison.
  Ros. Why, ambition makes one. 'Tis narrow your
    mind.
  Ham. O God, bounded nutshell count a
    king infinite space, bad dreams.
  Guil. dreams ambition; substance of
    ambitious shadow dream.
  Ham. dream shadow.
  Ros. Truly, hold ambition airy light quality that
    shadow's shadow.
  Ham. beggars bodies, monarchs outstretch'd
    heroes beggars' shadows. th' court? for, my
    fay, reason.
  Both. wait you.  
  Ham. matter! sort rest my
    servants; for, speak honest man, most
    dreadfully attended. beaten friendship, what
    make Elsinore?
  Ros. visit you, lord; occasion.
  Ham. Beggar am, poor thanks; you;
    sure, dear friends, dear halfpenny. Were
    for? inclining? free
    visitation? Come, deal justly me. Come, come! Nay, speak.
  Guil. say, lord?
  Ham. Why, anything- th' purpose. for; and
    kind confession looks, modesties
    craft colour. good King Queen
    you.
  Ros. end, lord?
  Ham. teach me. conjure rights
    fellowship, consonancy youth, the
    obligation ever-preserved love, dear a
    proposer charge withal, direct with
    me, no.  
  Ros. [aside Guildenstern] you?
  Ham. [aside] Nay then, eye you.- love me, hold
    off.
  Guil. lord, for.
  Ham. why. anticipation prevent your
    discovery, secrecy King Queen moult no
    feather. late- wherefore not- lost my
    mirth, forgone custom exercises; indeed, so
    heavily disposition goodly frame, earth,
    sterile promontory; excellent canopy, the
    air, you, brave o'erhanging firmament, majestical
    roof fretted golden fire- why, appeareth thing
    foul pestilent congregation vapours. a
    piece work man! noble reason! infinite in
    faculties! form moving express admirable! in
    action angel! apprehension god! the
    beauty world, paragon animals! what
    quintessence dust? Man delights me- no, woman
    neither, smiling so.
  Ros. lord, stuff thoughts.  
  Ham. laugh then, 'Man delights me'?
  Ros. think, lord, delight man, lenten
    entertainment players receive you. coted them
    way, coming offer service.
  Ham. plays king welcome- Majesty shall
    tribute me; adventurous knight foil and
    target; lover sigh gratis; humorous man shall
    end part peace; clown make laugh whose
    lungs tickle o' th' sere; lady mind
    freely, blank verse halt fort. players are
    they?
  Ros. wont delight in, the
    tragedians city.
  Ham. chances travel? residence, in
    reputation profit, ways.
  Ros. inhibition means late
    innovation.
  Ham. hold estimation the
    city? follow'd?
  Ros. not.  
  Ham. it? grow rusty?
  Ros. Nay, endeavour wonted pace; is,
    sir, eyrie children, eyases, cry top
    question tyrannically clapp'd fort. now
    fashion, berattle common stages (so call
    them) wearing rapiers afraid goosequills and
    dare scarce thither.
  Ham. What, children? maintains 'em? they
    escoted? pursue quality longer can
    sing? afterwards, grow
    common players (as like, means
    better), writers wrong make exclaim
    succession.
  Ros. Faith, sides; nation
    holds sin tarre controversy. was, a
    while, money bid argument poet player
    cuffs question.
  Ham. Is't possible?
  Guil. O, throwing brains.
  Ham. boys carry away?  
  Ros. Ay, do, lord- Hercules load too.
  Ham. strange; uncle King Denmark, and
    make mows father lived give
    twenty, forty, fifty, hundred ducats apiece picture in
    little. 'Sblood, natural, if
    philosophy find out.

                     Flourish Players.

  Guil. players.
  Ham. Gentlemen, Elsinore. hands, come! Th'
    appurtenance fashion ceremony. comply
    garb, extent players (which I
    show fairly outwards) like
    entertainment yours. welcome. uncle-father
    aunt-mother deceiv'd.
  Guil. what, dear lord?
  Ham. mad north-north-west. wind southerly I
    hawk handsaw.
  
                            Enter Polonius.

  Pol. you, gentlemen!
  Ham. Hark you, Guildenstern- too- ear hearer!
    great baby swaddling
    clouts.
  Ros. Happily time them; old
    man child.
  Ham. prophesy players. Mark it.-
   right, sir; Monday morning; twas indeed.
  Pol. lord, news you.
  Ham. lord, news you. Roscius actor in
    Rome-
  Pol. actors hither, lord.
  Ham. Buzz, buzz!
  Pol. honour-
  Ham. actor ass-
  Pol. actors world, tragedy, comedy,
    history, pastoral, pastoral-comical, historical-pastoral,
    tragical-historical, tragical-comical-historical-pastoral; scene  
    individable, poem unlimited. Seneca heavy, nor
    Plautus light. law writ liberty, are
    men.
  Ham. O Jephthah, judge Israel, treasure hadst thou!
  Pol. treasure he, lord?
  Ham. Why,

         'One fair daughter, more,
           loved passing well.'

  Pol. [aside] daughter.
  Ham. i' th' right, Jephthah?
  Pol. call Jephthah, lord, daughter I
    love passing well.
  Ham. Nay, not.
  Pol. then, lord?
  Ham. Why,

           'As lot, God wot,'

 then, know,
  
           'It pass, was.'

    row pious chanson show more; look
    abridgment comes.

                     Enter Players.

    welcome, masters; welcome, all.- glad thee
    well.- Welcome, good friends.- O, friend? Why, thy face is
    valanc'd thee last. Com'st' thou to' beard in
    Denmark?- What, young lady mistress? By'r Lady, your
    ladyship nearer heaven the
    altitude chopine. Pray God voice, piece of
    uncurrent gold, crack'd ring.- Masters, are
    welcome. e'en to't French falconers, fly at
    see. speech straight. Come, give a
    taste quality. Come, passionate speech.
  1. Play. speech, good lord?
  Ham. heard thee speak speech once, acted;
    was, once; play, remember, pleas'd  
    million, 'twas caviary general; (as I
    receiv'd it, others, judgments matters cried in
    top mine) excellent play, digested scenes,
    set modesty cunning. remember said
    sallets lines make matter savoury,
    matter phrase indict author of
    affectation; call'd honest method, wholesome as
    sweet, handsome fine. speech in't
    chiefly lov'd. 'Twas AEneas' tale Dido, thereabout it
    speaks Priam's slaughter. live in
    memory, begin line- see, see:

         'The rugged Pyrrhus, th' Hyrcanian beast-'

    'Tis so; begins Pyrrhus:

         'The rugged Pyrrhus, sable arms,
         Black purpose, night resemble
         lay couched ominous horse,
         Hath dread black complexion smear'd  
         heraldry dismal. Head foot
         total gules, horridly trick'd
         blood fathers, mothers, daughters, sons,
         Bak'd impasted parching streets,
         lend tyrannous damned light
         lord's murther. Roasted wrath fire,
         o'ersized coagulate gore,
         eyes carbuncles, hellish Pyrrhus
         grandsire Priam seeks.'

    So, proceed you.
  Pol. Fore God, lord, spoken, good accent good
     discretion.

  1. Play. 'Anon finds him,
      Striking short Greeks. antique sword,
      Rebellious arm, lies falls,
      Repugnant command. Unequal match'd,
      Pyrrhus Priam drives, rage strikes wide;
      whiff wind fell sword  
      Th' unnerved father falls. senseless Ilium,
      feel blow, flaming top
      Stoops base, hideous crash
      Takes prisoner Pyrrhus' ear. lo! sword,
      declining milky head
      reverend Priam, seem'd i' th' air stick.
      So, painted tyrant, Pyrrhus stood,
      And, neutral matter,
      nothing.
      But, see, storm,
      silence heavens, rack stand still,
      bold winds speechless, orb below
      hush death- anon dreadful thunder
      Doth rend region; so, Pyrrhus' pause,
      Aroused vengeance sets awork;
      Cyclops' hammers fall
      Mars's armour, forg'd proof eterne,
      remorse Pyrrhus' bleeding sword
      falls Priam.
      Out, out, thou strumpet Fortune! gods,  
      general synod power;
      Break spokes fellies wheel,
      bowl round nave hill heaven,
      low fiends!

  Pol. long.
  Ham. barber's, beard.- Prithee on.
    jig tale bawdry, sleeps. on; to
    Hecuba.

  1. Play. 'But who, O who, mobled queen-'

  Ham. 'The mobled queen'?
  Pol. good! 'Mobled queen' good.

  1. Play. 'Run barefoot down, threat'ning flames
      bisson rheum; clout head
      late diadem stood, robe,
      lank o'erteemed loins,
      blanket, alarm fear caught up-  
      seen, tongue venom steep'd
      'Gainst Fortune's state treason pronounc'd.
      gods then,
      Pyrrhus make malicious sport
      Mincing sword husband's limbs,
      instant burst clamour made
      (Unless things mortal move all)
      made milch burning eyes heaven
      passion gods.'

  Pol. Look, whe'r turn'd colour, tears in's
    eyes. Prithee more!
  Ham. 'Tis well. thee speak rest soon.-
    Good lord, players bestow'd? you
    hear? us'd; abstract brief
    chronicles time. death a
    bad epitaph ill report live.
  Pol. lord, desert.
  Ham. God's bodykins, man, better! man his
    desert, scape whipping?  
    honour dignity. deserve, merit in
    bounty. in.
  Pol. Come, sirs.
  Ham. Follow him, friends. hear play to-morrow.
                 Exeunt Polonius Players [except First].
    Dost thou hear me, friend? play 'The Murther of
    Gonzago'?
  1. Play. Ay, lord.
  Ham. ha't to-morrow night. could, need, study a
    speech dozen sixteen lines set and
    insert in't, not?
  1. Play. Ay, lord.
  Ham. well. Follow lord- mock not.
                                            [Exit Player.]
    good friends, leave till night. to
    Elsinore.
  Ros. Good lord!
  Ham. Ay, so, God b' wi' ye!
                            [Exeunt Rosencrantz Guildenstern
    alone.  
    O rogue peasant slave I!
    monstrous player here,
    fiction, dream passion,
    force soul conceit
    That, working, visage wann'd,
    Tears eyes, distraction in's aspect,
    broken voice, function suiting
    forms conceit? nothing!
    Hecuba!
    Hecuba him, Hecuba,
    weep her? do,
    motive cue passion
    have? drown stage tears
    cleave general ear horrid speech;
    Make mad guilty appal free,
    Confound ignorant, amaze indeed
    faculties eyes ears.
    I,
    dull muddy-mettled rascal, peak
    John-a-dreams, unpregnant cause,  
    nothing! No, king,
    property dear life
    damn'd defeat made. coward?
    calls villain? breaks pate across?
    Plucks beard blows face?
    Tweaks th' nose? lie i' th' throat
    deep lungs? this, ha?
    'Swounds, it! be
    pigeon-liver'd lack gall
    make oppression bitter, ere this
    fatted region kites
    slave's offal. Bloody bawdy villain!
    Remorseless, treacherous, lecherous, kindless villain!
    O, vengeance!
    Why, ass I! brave,
    I, son dear father murther'd,
    Prompted revenge heaven hell,
    (like whore) unpack heart words
    fall a-cursing drab,
    scullion!  
    Fie upon't! foh! About, brain! Hum, heard
    guilty creatures, sitting play,
    cunning scene
    struck soul presently
    proclaim'd malefactions;
    murther, tongue, speak
    miraculous organ, Players
    Play murther father
    mine uncle. observe looks;
    tent quick. blench,
    course. spirit seen
    devil; devil hath power
    T' assume pleasing shape; yea, perhaps
    weakness melancholy,
    potent spirits,
    Abuses damn me. grounds
    relative this. play's thing
    catch conscience King.         Exit.
