ACT III. Scene I.
Elsinore. room Castle.

Enter King, Queen, Polonius, Ophelia, Rosencrantz, Guildenstern, Lords.

  King. drift circumstance
    puts confusion,
    Grating harshly days quiet
    turbulent dangerous lunacy?
  Ros. confess feels distracted,
    means speak.
  Guil. find forward sounded,
    crafty madness aloof
    bring confession
    true state.
  Queen. receive well?
  Ros. gentleman.
  Guil. forcing disposition.
  Ros. Niggard question, demands
    free reply.
  Queen. assay  
    pastime?
  Ros. Madam, fell players
    o'erraught way. told him,
    kind joy
    hear it. court,
    And, think, order
    night play him.
  Pol. 'Tis true;
    beseech'd entreat Majesties
    hear matter.
  King. heart, doth content me
    hear inclin'd.
    Good gentlemen, give edge
    drive purpose delights.
  Ros. shall, lord.
                            Exeunt Rosencrantz Guildenstern.
  King. Sweet Gertrude, leave too;
    closely Hamlet hither,
    he, 'twere accident, here
    Affront Ophelia.  
    father (lawful espials)
    bestow that, unseen,
    encounter frankly judge
    gather him, behav'd,
    If't th' affliction love, no,
    suffers for.
  Queen. obey you;
    part, Ophelia, wish
    good beauties happy cause
    Hamlet's wildness. hope virtues
    bring wonted again,
    honours.
  Oph. Madam, may.
                                                   [Exit Queen.]
  Pol. Ophelia, walk here.- Gracious, you,
    bestow ourselves.- [To Ophelia] Read book,
    show exercise colour
    loneliness.- oft blame this,
    'Tis prov'd, devotion's visage
    pious action sugar o'er  
    Devil himself.
  King. [aside] O, 'tis true!
    smart lash speech doth give conscience!
    harlot's cheek, beautied plast'ring art,
    ugly thing helps it
    deed painted word.
    O heavy burthen!
  Pol. hear coming. withdraw, lord.
                                      Exeunt King Polonius].

                           Enter Hamlet.

  Ham. be, be- question:
    'tis nobler mind suffer
    slings arrows outrageous fortune
    arms sea troubles,
    opposing end them. die- sleep-
    more; sleep end
    heartache, thousand natural shocks
    flesh heir to. 'Tis consummation  
    Devoutly wish'd. die- sleep.
    sleep- perchance dream: ay, rub!
    sleep death dreams come
    shuffled mortal coil,
    give pause. respect
    makes calamity long life.
    bear whips scorns time,
    Th' oppressor's wrong, proud man's contumely,
    pangs despis'd love, law's delay,
    insolence office, spurns
    patient merit th' unworthy takes,
    quietus make
    bare bodkin? fardels bear,
    grunt sweat weary life,
    dread death-
    undiscover'd country, bourn
    traveller returns- puzzles will,
    makes bear ills have
    fly of?
    conscience make cowards all,  
    native hue resolution
    sicklied o'er pale cast thought,
    enterprises great pith moment
    regard currents turn awry
    lose action.- Soft now!
    fair Ophelia!- Nymph, thy orisons
    sins rememb'red.
  Oph. Good lord,
    honour day?
  Ham. humbly you; well, well, well.
  Oph. lord, remembrances yours
    longed long re-deliver.
    pray you, receive them.
  Ham. No, I!
    gave aught.
  Oph. honour'd lord, did,
    words sweet breath compos'd
    made things rich. perfume lost,
    again; noble mind
    Rich gifts wax poor givers prove unkind.  
    There, lord.
  Ham. Ha, ha! honest?
  Oph. lord?
  Ham. fair?
  Oph. means lordship?
  Ham. honest fair, honesty admit no
    discourse beauty.
  Oph. beauty, lord, commerce honesty?
  Ham. Ay, truly; power beauty sooner transform
    honesty bawd force honesty can
    translate beauty likeness. paradox,
    time proof. love once.
  Oph. Indeed, lord, made so.
  Ham. believ'd me; virtue so
    inoculate stock relish it. loved you
    not.
  Oph. deceived.
  Ham. thee nunnery! wouldst thou breeder of
    sinners? indifferent honest, accuse
    things mother borne me.  
    proud, revengeful, ambitious; offences my
    beck thoughts put in, imagination give
    shape, time act in. fellows I
    do, crawling earth heaven? arrant knaves all;
    us. thy ways nunnery. your
    father?
  Oph. home, lord.
  Ham. doors shut him, play fool
    in's house. Farewell.
  Oph. O, him, sweet heavens!
  Ham. thou dost marry, give thee plague thy dowry:
    thou chaste ice, pure snow, thou shalt escape
    calumny. thee nunnery. Go, farewell. thou wilt
    marry, marry fool; wise men what
    monsters make them. nunnery, go; quickly too.
    Farewell.
  Oph. O heavenly powers, restore him!
  Ham. heard paintings too, enough. God hath
    face, make another. jig, you
    amble, lisp; nickname God's creatures make  
    wantonness ignorance. to, on't! hath made
    mad. say, moe marriages. are
    married already- one- live; rest as
    are. nunnery, go.                            Exit.
  Oph. O, noble mind o'erthrown!
    courtier's, scholar's, soldier's, eye, tongue, sword,
    Th' expectancy rose fair state,
    glass fashion mould form,
    Th' observ'd observers- quite, down!
    I, ladies deject wretched,
    suck'd honey music vows,
    noble sovereign reason,
    sweet bells jangled, tune harsh;
    unmatch'd form feature blown youth
    Blasted ecstasy. O, woe me
    T' seen, see!

                   Enter King Polonius.

  King. Love? affections tend;  
    spake, lack'd form little,
    madness. soul
    O'er melancholy sits brood;
    doubt hatch disclose
    danger; prevent,
    quick determination
    set down: speed England
    demand neglected tribute.
    Haply seas, countries different,
    variable objects, expel
    something-settled matter heart,
    Whereon brains beating puts thus
    fashion himself. on't?
  Pol. well. believe
    origin commencement grief
    Sprung neglected love.- now, Ophelia?
    Lord Hamlet said.
    heard all.- lord, please;
    hold fit, play
    queen mother entreat  
    show grief. round him;
    plac'd you, ear
    conference. find not,
    England send him; confine where
    wisdom think.
  King. so.
    Madness great unwatch'd go.         Exeunt.




Scene II.
Elsinore. hall Castle.

Enter Hamlet Players.

  Ham. Speak speech, pray you, pronounc'd you,
    trippingly tongue. mouth it, our
    players do, live town crier spoke lines. do
    air hand, thus, all
    gently; torrent, tempest, (as say)
    whirlwind passion, acquire beget a
    temperance give smoothness. O, offends the
    soul hear robustious periwig-pated fellow tear passion to
    tatters, rags, split cars groundlings, who
    (for part) capable inexplicable dumb
    shows noise. fellow whipp'd o'erdoing
    Termagant. out-herods Herod. Pray avoid it.
  Player. warrant honour.
  Ham. tame neither; discretion your
    tutor. Suit action word, word action; with
    special observance, o'erstep modesty of
    nature: overdone purpose playing,  
    end, now, is, hold, as
    'twere, mirror nature; show Virtue feature,
    scorn image, age body time his
    form pressure. overdone, tardy off, though
    make unskilful laugh, make judicious
    grieve; censure allowance
    o'erweigh theatre others. O, players I
    play, heard praise, highly (not to
    speak profanely), that, accent of
    Christians, gait Christian, pagan, man, so
    strutted bellowed thought Nature's
    journeymen made men, made well, imitated
    humanity abominably.
  Player. hope reform'd indifferently us, sir.
  Ham. O, reform altogether! play clowns
    speak set them. them
    laugh, set quantity barren
    spectators laugh too, time necessary
    question play considered. villanous
    shows pitiful ambition fool it.  
    make ready.
                                                 Exeunt Players.

            Enter Polonius, Rosencrantz, Guildenstern.

    now, lord? King hear piece work?
  Pol. Queen too, presently.
  Ham. Bid players make haste, [Exit Polonius.] two
    hasten them?
  Both. will, lord.                       Exeunt two.
  Ham. What, ho, Horatio!

                      Enter Horatio.

  Hor. Here, sweet lord, service.
  Ham. Horatio, thou art e'en man
    e'er conversation cop'd withal.
  Hor. O, dear lord!
  Ham. Nay, flatter;
    advancement hope thee,  
    revenue hast thy good spirits
    feed clothe thee? poor flatter'd?
    No, candied tongue lick absurd pomp,
    crook pregnant hinges knee
    thrift follow fawning. Dost thou hear?
    dear soul mistress choice
    men distinguish, election
    Hath scald thee herself. thou hast been
    one, suff'ring all, suffers nothing;
    man Fortune's buffets rewards
    Hast ta'en equal thanks; blest those
    blood judgment commingled
    pipe Fortune's finger
    sound stop please. Give man
    passion's slave, wear him
    heart's core, ay, heart heart,
    thee. I
    play to-night King.
    scene circumstance,
    told thee, father's death.  
    prithee, thou seest act afoot,
    comment thy soul
    Observe uncle. occulted guilt
    unkennel speech,
    damned ghost seen,
    imaginations foul
    Vulcan's stithy. Give heedful note;
    mine eyes rivet face,
    judgments join
    censure seeming.
  Hor. Well, lord.
    steal aught whilst play playing,
    scape detecting, pay theft.

    Sound flourish. [Enter Trumpets Kettledrums. Danish
    march. [Enter King, Queen, Polonius, Ophelia, Rosencrantz,
      Guildenstern, Lords attendant, Guard
                       carrying torches.

  Ham. coming play. idle.  
    place.
  King. fares cousin Hamlet?
  Ham. Excellent, i' faith; chameleon's dish. eat air,
    promise-cramm'd. feed capons so.
  King. answer, Hamlet. words not
    mine.
  Ham. No, mine now. [To Polonius] lord, play'd once
    i' th' university, say?
  Pol. I, lord, accounted good actor.
  Ham. enact?
  Pol. enact Julius Caesar; kill'd i' th' Capitol; Brutus
    kill'd me.
  Ham. brute part kill capital calf there. Be
    players ready.
  Ros. Ay, lord. stay patience.
  Queen. hither, dear Hamlet, sit me.
  Ham. No, good mother. metal attractive.
  Pol. [to King] O, ho! mark that?
  Ham. Lady, lie lap?
                                  [Sits Ophelia's feet.]  
  Oph. No, lord.
  Ham. mean, head lap?
  Oph. Ay, lord.
  Ham. meant country matters?
  Oph. nothing, lord.
  Ham. fair thought lie maids' legs.
  Oph. is, lord?
  Ham. Nothing.
  Oph. merry, lord.
  Ham. Who, I?
  Oph. Ay, lord.
  Ham. O God, jig-maker! man merry?
    cheerfully mother looks, father died
    's hours.
  Oph. Nay 'tis months, lord.
  Ham. long? Nay then, devil wear black, a
    suit sables. O heavens! die months ago, forgotten
    yet? hope great man's memory outlive life
    half year. But, by'r Lady, build churches then; else
    suffer thinking on, hobby-horse,  
    epitaph 'For O, O, hobby-horse forgot!'

               Hautboys play. dumb show enters.

    Enter King Queen lovingly; Queen embracing
    her. kneels, makes show protestation
    him. takes up, declines head her
    neck. lays bank flowers. She, seeing
    asleep, leaves him. Anon fellow, takes his
    crown, kisses it, pours poison sleeper's ears, and
    leaves him. Queen returns, finds King dead, makes
    passionate action. Poisoner Mutes,
    again, condole her. dead body is
    carried away. Poisoner wooes Queen gifts; she
    harsh unwilling awhile, end accepts
    love.
                                                         Exeunt.

  Oph. means this, lord?
  Ham. Marry, miching malhecho; means mischief.  
  Oph. Belike show imports argument play.

                      Enter Prologue.

  Ham. fellow. players counsel;
    all.
  Oph. show meant?
  Ham. Ay, show show him. asham'd to
    show, shame means.
  Oph. naught, naught! mark play.

    Pro. us, tragedy,
      stooping clemency,
      beg hearing patiently.                     [Exit.]

  Ham. prologue, posy ring?
  Oph. 'Tis brief, lord.
  Ham. woman's love.

              Enter [two Players as] King Queen.  

    King. Full thirty times hath Phoebus' cart round
      Neptune's salt wash Tellus' orbed ground,
      thirty dozed moons borrowed sheen
      world times twelve thirties been,
      love hearts, Hymen hands,
      Unite comutual sacred bands.
    Queen. journeys sun moon
      Make count o'er ere love done!
      woe me! sick late,
      cheer state.
      distrust you. Yet, distrust,
      Discomfort you, lord, must;
      women's fear love holds quantity,
      aught, extremity.
      love is, proof hath made know;
      love siz'd, fear so.
      love great, littlest doubts fear;
      fears grow great, great love grows there.
    King. Faith, leave thee, love, shortly too;  
      operant powers functions leave do.
      thou shalt live fair world behind,
      Honour'd, belov'd, haply kind
      husband shalt thou-
    Queen. O, confound rest!
      love treason breast.
      husband accurst!
      wed killed first.

  Ham. [aside] Wormwood, wormwood!

    Queen. instances marriage move
      base respects thrift, love.
      time kill husband dead
      husband kisses bed.
    King. speak;
      determine oft break.
      Purpose slave memory,
      violent birth, poor validity;
      now, fruit unripe, sticks tree,  
      fill unshaken mellow be.
      'tis forget
      pay debt.
      passion propose,
      passion ending, doth purpose lose.
      violence grief joy
      enactures destroy.
      joy revels, grief doth lament;
      Grief joys, joy grieves, slender accident.
      world aye, 'tis strange
      loves fortunes change;
      'tis question left prove,
      love lead fortune, fortune love.
      great man down, mark favourite flies,
      poor advanc'd makes friends enemies;
      hitherto doth love fortune tend,
      lack friend,
      hollow friend doth try,
      Directly seasons enemy.
      But, orderly end begun,  
      wills fates contrary run
      devices overthrown;
      thoughts ours, ends own.
      thou wilt husband wed;
      die thy thoughts thy lord dead.
    Queen. earth give food, heaven light,
      Sport repose lock day night,
      desperation turn trust hope,
      anchor's cheer prison scope,
      opposite blanks face joy
      Meet well, destroy,
      pursue lasting strife,
      If, widow, wife!

  Ham. break now!

    King. 'Tis deeply sworn. Sweet, leave awhile.
      spirits grow dull, fain beguile
      tedious day sleep.
    Queen. Sleep rock thy brain,  
                                                    [He] sleeps.
      mischance twain!
Exit.

  Ham. Madam, play?
  Queen. lady doth protest much, methinks.
  Ham. O, word.
  King. heard argument? offence in't?
  Ham. No, no! jest, poison jest; offence i' th'
    world.
  King. call play?
  Ham. 'The Mousetrap.' Marry, how? Tropically. play the
    image murther Vienna. Gonzago duke's name;
    wife, Baptista. anon. 'Tis knavish piece of
    work; o' that? Majesty, free
    souls, touches not. gall'd jade winch; withers
    unwrung.

                         Enter Lucianus.
  
    Lucianus, nephew King.
  Oph. good chorus, lord.
  Ham. interpret love, see
    puppets dallying.
  Oph. keen, lord, keen.
  Ham. cost groaning edge.
  Oph. better, worse.
  Ham. husbands.- Begin, murtherer. Pox, leave
    thy damnable faces, begin! Come, croaking raven doth
    bellow revenge.

    Luc. Thoughts black, hands apt, drugs fit, time agreeing;
      Confederate season, creature seeing;
      Thou mixture rank, midnight weeds collected,
      Hecate's ban thrice blasted, thrice infected,
      Thy natural magic dire property
      wholesome life usurp immediately.
                                   Pours poison ears.

  Ham. poisons i' th' garden for's estate. name's Gonzago.  
    story extant, written choice Italian. You
    anon murtherer love Gonzago's wife.
  Oph. King rises.
  Ham. What, frighted false fire?
  Queen. fares lord?
  Pol. Give o'er play.
  King. Give light! Away!
  All. Lights, lights, lights!
                              Exeunt Hamlet Horatio.
  Ham.   Why, strucken deer weep,
          hart ungalled play;
         watch, sleep:
          runs world away.
    this, sir, forest feathers- rest my
    fortunes turn Turk me-with Provincial roses raz'd
    shoes, fellowship cry players, sir?
  Hor. Half share.
  Ham.   I!
         thou dost know, O Damon dear,
           realm dismantled  
         Jove himself; reigns here
           very, very- pajock.
  Hor. rhym'd.
  Ham. O good Horatio, ghost's word thousand
    pound! Didst perceive?
  Hor. well, lord.
  Ham. talk poisoning?
  Hor. note him.
  Ham.   Aha! Come, music! Come, recorders!
         King comedy,
         then, belike likes not, perdy.
    Come, music!

                Enter Rosencrantz Guildenstern.

  Guil. Good lord, vouchsafe word you.
  Ham. Sir, history.
  Guil. King, sir-
  Ham. Ay, sir, him?
  Guil. retirement, marvellous distemper'd.  
  Ham. drink, sir?
  Guil. No, lord; choler.
  Ham. wisdom show richer signify to
    doctor; put purgation perhaps
    plunge choler.
  Guil. Good lord, put discourse frame, start
    wildly affair.
  Ham. tame, sir; pronounce.
  Guil. Queen, mother, great affliction spirit
    hath you.
  Ham. welcome.
  Guil. Nay, good lord, courtesy breed.
    make wholesome answer, do
    mother's commandment; not, pardon return
    end business.
  Ham. Sir, cannot.
  Guil. What, lord?
  Ham. Make wholesome answer; wit's diseas'd. But, sir, such
    answer make, command; rather, say,
    mother. more, matter! mother,  
    say-
  Ros. says: behaviour hath struck into
    amazement admiration.
  Ham. O wonderful son, stonish mother! no
    sequel heels mother's admiration? Impart.
  Ros. desires speak closet ere bed.
  Ham. obey, ten times mother. any
    trade us?
  Ros. lord, love me.
  Ham. still, pickers stealers!
  Ros. Good lord, distemper? surely
    bar door liberty, deny griefs to
    friend.
  Ham. Sir, lack advancement.
  Ros. be, voice King himself
    succession Denmark?
  Ham. Ay, sir, 'while grass grows'- proverb something
    musty.

                     Enter Players recorders.  

    O, recorders! one. withdraw you- do
    recover wind me, drive me
    toil?
  Guil. O lord, duty bold, love unmannerly.
  Ham. understand that. play pipe?
  Guil. lord, cannot.
  Ham. pray you.
  Guil. me, cannot.
  Ham. beseech you.
  Guil. know, touch it, lord.
  Ham. easy lying. Govern ventages your
    fingers thumbs, give breath mouth, will
    discourse eloquent music. you, stops.
  Guil. command utt'rance harmony. I
    skill.
  Ham. Why, now, unworthy thing make me! You
    play me; stops; would
    pluck heart mystery; sound my
    lowest note top compass; music,  
    excellent voice, organ, make it
    speak. 'Sblood, easier play'd a
    pipe? Call instrument will, fret me,
    play me.

                        Enter Polonius.

    God bless you, sir!
  Pol. lord, Queen speak you, presently.
  Ham. yonder cloud shape camel?
  Pol. th' mass, 'tis camel indeed.
  Ham. Methinks weasel.
  Pol. back'd weasel.
  Ham. whale.
  Pol. whale.
  Ham. mother by-and-by.- fool the
    top bent.- by-and-by.
  Pol. so.                                      Exit.
  Ham. 'By-and-by' easily said.- Leave me, friends.
                                        [Exeunt Hamlet.]  
    'Tis witching time night,
    churchyards yawn, hell breathes out
    Contagion world. drink hot blood
    bitter business day
    quake on. Soft! mother!
    O heart, lose thy nature; ever
    soul Nero enter firm bosom.
    cruel, unnatural;
    speak daggers her, none.
    tongue soul hypocrites-
    words somever shent,
    give seals never, soul, consent!             Exit.




Scene III.
A room Castle.

Enter King, Rosencrantz, Guildenstern.

  King. not, stands safe us
    madness range. prepare you;
    commission forthwith dispatch,
    England you.
    terms estate endure
    Hazard doth hourly grow
    lunacies.
  Guil. provide.
    holy religious fear is
    bodies safe
    live feed Majesty.
  Ros. single peculiar life bound
    strength armour mind
    noyance; more
    spirit weal depends rests
    lives many. cesse majesty
    Dies alone, gulf doth draw  
    it. massy wheel,
    Fix'd summit highest mount,
    huge spokes ten thousand lesser things
    mortis'd adjoin'd; falls,
    small annexment, petty consequence,
    Attends boist'rous ruin. alone
    king sigh, general groan.
  King. Arm you, pray you, th', speedy voyage;
    fetters put fear,
    free-footed.
  Both. haste us.
                                               Exeunt Gentlemen.

                   Enter Polonius.

  Pol. lord, mother's closet.
    arras convey myself
    hear process. warrant tax home;
    And, said, wisely said,
    'Tis meet audience mother,  
    nature makes partial, o'erhear
    speech, vantage. Fare well, liege.
    call ere bed
    know.
  King. Thanks, dear lord.
                                                Exit [Polonius].
    O, offence rank, smells heaven;
    hath primal eldest curse upon't,
    brother's murther! Pray not,
    inclination sharp will.
    stronger guilt defeats strong intent,
    And, man double business bound,
    stand pause begin,
    neglect. cursed hand
    thicker brother's blood,
    rain sweet heavens
    wash white snow? Whereto serves mercy
    confront visage offence?
    prayer twofold force,
    forestalled ere fall,  
    pardon'd down? up;
    fault past. But, O, form prayer
    serve turn? 'Forgive foul murther'?
    be; possess'd
    effects murther-
    crown, mine ambition, queen.
    pardon'd retain th' offence?
    corrupted currents world
    Offence's gilded hand shove justice,
    oft 'tis wicked prize itself
    Buys law; 'tis above.
    shuffling; action lies
    true nature, compell'd,
    teeth forehead faults,
    give evidence. then? rests?
    repentance can. not?
    repent?
    O wretched state! O bosom black death!
    O limed soul, that, struggling free,
    Art engag'd! Help, angels! Make assay.  
    Bow, stubborn knees; heart strings steel,
    soft sinews new-born babe!
    well.                                  kneels.

                         Enter Hamlet.

  Ham. pat, praying;
    do't. heaven,
    reveng'd. scann'd.
    villain kills father; that,
    I, sole son, villain send
    heaven.
    Why, hire salary, revenge!
    father grossly, full bread,
    crimes broad blown, flush May;
    audit stands, save heaven?
    circumstance thought,
    'Tis heavy him; reveng'd,
    purging soul,
    fit seasoned passage?  
    No.
    Up, sword, thou horrid hent.
    drunk asleep; rage;
    th' incestuous pleasure bed;
    gaming, swearing, act
    relish salvation in't-
    trip him, heels kick heaven,
    soul damn'd black
    hell, whereto goes. mother stays.
    physic prolongs thy sickly days.              Exit.
  King. [rises] words fly up, thoughts remain below.
    Words thoughts heaven go.             Exit.




Scene IV.
The Queen's closet.

Enter Queen Polonius.

  Pol. straight. lay home him.
    pranks broad bear with,
    Grace hath screen'd stood between
    heat him. silence here.
    Pray round him.
  Ham. (within) Mother, mother, mother!
  Queen. warrant you; fear not. Withdraw; hear coming.
                              [Polonius hides arras.]

                          Enter Hamlet.

  Ham. Now, mother, matter?
  Queen. Hamlet, thou hast thy father offended.
  Ham. Mother, father offended.
  Queen. Come, come, answer idle tongue.
  Ham. Go, go, question wicked tongue.
  Queen. Why, now, Hamlet?  
  Ham. matter now?
  Queen. forgot me?
  Ham. No, rood, so!
    Queen, husband's brother's wife,
    (would so!) mother.
  Queen. Nay, set speak.
  Ham. Come, come, sit down. budge I
    till set glass
    inmost part you.
  Queen. wilt thou do? Thou wilt murther me?
    Help, help, ho!
  Pol. [behind] What, ho! help, help, help!
  Ham. [draws] now? rat? Dead ducat, dead!
            [Makes pass arras and] kills Polonius.
  Pol. [behind] O, slain!
  Queen. O me, hast thou done?
  Ham. Nay, not. King?
  Queen. O, rash bloody deed this!
  Ham. bloody deed- bad, good mother,
    kill king, marry brother.  
  Queen. kill king?
  Ham. Ay, lady, word.
                         [Lifts arras sees Polonius.]
    Thou wretched, rash, intruding fool, farewell!
    thee thy better. thy fortune.
    Thou find'st busy danger.
    Leave wringing hinds. Peace! sit down
    wring heart; shall
    made penetrable stuff;
    damned custom braz'd so
    proof bulwark sense.
  Queen. thou dar'st wag thy tongue
    noise rude me?
  Ham. act
    blurs grace blush modesty;
    Calls virtue hypocrite; takes rose
    fair forehead innocent love,
    sets blister there; makes marriage vows
    false dicers' oaths. O, deed
    body contraction plucks  
    soul, sweet religion makes
    rhapsody words! Heaven's face doth glow;
    Yea, solidity compound mass,
    tristful visage, doom,
    thought-sick act.
  Queen. Ay me, act,
    roars loud thunders index?
  Ham. th's picture, this,
    counterfeit presentment brothers.
    grace seated brow;
    Hyperion's curls; front Jove himself;
    eye Mars, threaten command;
    station herald Mercury
    lighted heaven-kissing hill:
    combination form indeed
    god set seal
    give world assurance man.
    husband. follows.
    husband, mildew'd ear
    Blasting wholesome brother. eyes?  
    fair mountain leave feed,
    batten moor? Ha! eyes
    call love; age
    heyday blood tame, humble,
    waits judgment; judgment
    step this? Sense have,
    motion; sense
    apoplex'd; madness err,
    sense ecstacy ne'er thrall'd
    reserv'd quantity choice
    serve difference. devil was't
    hath cozen'd hoodman-blind?
    Eyes feeling, feeling sight,
    Ears hands eyes, smelling sans all,
    sickly part true sense
    mope.
    O shame! thy blush? Rebellious hell,
    thou canst mutine matron's bones,
    flaming youth virtue wax
    melt fire. Proclaim shame  
    compulsive ardour charge,
    frost actively doth burn,
    reason panders will.
  Queen. O Hamlet, speak more!
    Thou turn'st mine eyes soul,
    black grained spots
    leave tinct.
  Ham. Nay, live
    rank sweat enseamed bed,
    Stew'd corruption, honeying making love
    nasty sty!
  Queen. O, speak more!
    words daggers enter mine ears.
    more, sweet Hamlet!
  Ham. murtherer villain!
    slave twentieth part tithe
    precedent lord; vice kings;
    cutpurse empire rule,
    shelf precious diadem stole
    put pocket!  
  Queen. more!

                Enter Ghost nightgown.

  Ham. king shreds patches!-
    Save hover o'er wings,
    heavenly guards! gracious figure?
  Queen. Alas, mad!
  Ham. tardy son chide,
    That, laps'd time passion, lets by
    Th' important acting dread command?
    O, say!
  Ghost. forget. visitation
    whet thy blunted purpose.
    look, amazement thy mother sits.
    O, step fighting soul
    Conceit weakest bodies strongest works.
    Speak her, Hamlet.
  Ham. you, lady?
  Queen. Alas, is't you,  
    bend eye vacancy,
    th' encorporal air hold discourse?
    eyes spirits wildly peep;
    And, sleeping soldiers th' alarm,
    bedded hairs, life excrements,
    Start stand end. O gentle son,
    beat flame thy distemper
    Sprinkle cool patience! Whereon look?
  Ham. him, him! pale glares!
    form conjoin'd, preaching stones,
    make capable.- me,
    piteous action convert
    stern effects. do
    true colour- tears perchance blood.
  Queen. speak this?
  Ham. there?
  Queen. all; see.
  Ham. hear?
  Queen. No, ourselves.
  Ham. Why, there! steals away!  
    father, habit liv'd!
    portal!
                                                     Exit Ghost.
  Queen. coinage brain.
    bodiless creation ecstasy
    cunning in.
  Ham. Ecstasy?
    pulse doth temperately time
    makes healthful music. madness
    utt'red. Bring test,
    matter reword; madness
    gambol from. Mother, love grace,
    Lay flattering unction soul
    trespass madness speaks.
    skin film ulcerous place,
    Whiles rank corruption, mining within,
    Infects unseen. Confess heaven;
    Repent past; avoid come;
    spread compost weeds
    make ranker. Forgive virtue;  
    fatness pursy times
    Virtue vice pardon beg-
    Yea, curb woo leave good.
  Queen. O Hamlet, thou hast cleft heart twain.
  Ham. O, throw worser part it,
    live purer half,
    Good night- uncle's bed.
    Assume virtue, not.
    monster, custom, sense doth eat
    habits evil, angel this,
    actions fair good
    likewise frock livery,
    aptly put on. Refrain to-night,
    lend kind easiness
    abstinence; easy;
    change stamp nature,
    [master] devil, throw out
    wondrous potency. more, good night;
    desirous blest,
    blessing beg you.- lord,  
    repent; heaven hath pleas'd so,
    punish this, me,
    scourge minister.
    bestow him, answer well
    death gave him. again, good night.
    cruel, kind;
    bad begins, worse remains behind.
    word more, good lady.
  Queen. do?
  Ham. this, means, bid do:
    bloat King tempt bed;
    Pinch wanton cheek; call mouse;
    him, pair reechy kisses,
    paddling neck damn'd fingers,
    Make ravel matter out,
    essentially madness,
    mad craft. 'Twere good know;
    queen, fair, sober, wise,
    paddock, bat, gib
    dear concernings hide? so?  
    No, sense secrecy,
    Unpeg basket house's top,
    birds fly, famous ape,
    conclusions, basket creep
    break neck down.
  Queen. thou assur'd, words made breath,
    breath life, life breathe
    thou hast me.
  Ham. England; that?
  Queen. Alack,
    forgot! 'Tis concluded on.
  Ham. letters seal'd; schoolfellows,
    trust adders fang'd,
    bear mandate; sweep way
    marshal knavery. work;
    'tis sport enginer
    Hoist petar; 't hard
    delve yard mines
    blow moon. O, 'tis sweet
    line crafts directly meet.  
    man set packing.
    lug guts neighbour room.-
    Mother, good night.- Indeed, counsellor
    still, secret, grave,
    life foolish peating knave.
    Come, sir, draw end you.
    Good night, mother.
                  [Exit Queen. Then] Exit Hamlet, tugging in
                                                       Polonius.

ACT IV. Scene I.
Elsinore. room Castle.

Enter King Queen, Rosencrantz Guildenstern.

  King. matter sighs. profound heaves
    translate; 'tis fit understand them.
    son?
  Queen. Bestow place while.
                          [Exeunt Rosencrantz Guildenstern.]
    Ah, mine lord, to-night!
  King. What, Gertrude? Hamlet?
  Queen. Mad sea wind contend
    mightier. lawless fit
    arras hearing stir,
    Whips rapier, cries 'A rat, rat!'
    brainish apprehension kills
    unseen good man.
  King. O heavy deed!
    us, there.
    liberty full threats all-
    yourself, us, one.  
    Alas, bloody deed answer'd?
    laid us, providence
    short, restrain'd, haunt
    mad young man. love
    understand fit,
    But, owner foul disease,
    divulging, feed
    pith life. gone?
  Queen. draw body hath kill'd;
    O'er madness, ore
    mineral metals base,
    Shows pure. weeps done.
  King. O Gertrude, away!
    sun sooner mountains touch
    ship hence; vile deed
    majesty skill
    countenance excuse. Ho, Guildenstern!

             Enter Rosencrantz Guildenstern.
  
    Friends both, join aid.
    Hamlet madness hath Polonius slain,
    mother's closet hath dragg'd him.
    seek out; speak fair, bring body
    chapel. pray haste this.
                          Exeunt [Rosencrantz Guildenstern].
    Come, Gertrude, call wisest friends
    do
    untimely done. [So haply slander-]
    whisper o'er world's diameter,
    level cannon blank,
    Transports poisoned shot- miss name
    hit woundless air.- O, away!
    soul full discord dismay.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene II.
Elsinore. passage Castle.

Enter Hamlet.

  Ham. Safely stow'd.
  Gentlemen. (within) Hamlet! Lord Hamlet!
  Ham. soft! noise? calls Hamlet? O, come.

               Enter Rosencrantz Guildenstern.

  Ros. done, lord, dead body?
  Ham. Compounded dust, whereto 'tis kin.
  Ros. 'tis, thence
    bear chapel.
  Ham. it.
  Ros. what?
  Ham. counsel, mine own. Besides, be
    demanded sponge, replication made son
    king?
  Ros. sponge, lord?
  Ham. Ay, sir; soaks King's countenance, rewards,  
    authorities. officers King service in
    end. them, ape, corner jaw;
    mouth'd, Swallowed. have
    glean'd, squeezing and, sponge, dry
    again.
  Ros. understand not, lord.
  Ham. glad it. knavish speech sleeps foolish ear.
  Ros. lord, body to
    King.
  Ham. body King, King body.
    King thing-
  Guil. thing, lord?
  Ham. nothing. Bring him. Hide fox, after.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene III.
Elsinore. room Castle.

Enter King.

  King. seek find body.
    dangerous man loose!
    put strong law him.
    lov'd distracted multitude,
    judgment, eyes;
    'tis so, th' offender's scourge weigh'd,
    offence. bear smooth even,
    sudden sending seem
    Deliberate pause. Diseases desperate grown
    desperate appliance reliev'd,
    all.

                    Enter Rosencrantz.

    O hath befall'n?
  Ros. dead body bestow'd, lord,
    him.  
  King. he?
  Ros. Without, lord; guarded, pleasure.
  King. Bring us.
  Ros. Ho, Guildenstern! Bring lord.

        Enter Hamlet Guildenstern [with Attendants].

  King. Now, Hamlet, Polonius?
  Ham. supper.
  King. supper? Where?
  Ham. eats, eaten. certain
    convocation politic worms e'en him. worm your
    emperor diet. fat creatures fat us, and
    fat maggots. fat king lean beggar
    variable service- dishes, table. the
    end.
  King. Alas, alas!
  Ham. man fish worm hath eat king, eat
    fish hath fed worm.
  King. dost thou this?  
  Ham. show king progress through
    guts beggar.
  King. Polonius?
  Ham. heaven. Send thither see. messenger find not
    there, seek i' th' place yourself. indeed, you
    find month, nose up
    stair, lobby.
  King. seek there. [To Attendants.]
  Ham. stay till come.
                                            [Exeunt Attendants.]
  King. Hamlet, deed, thine especial safety,-
    tender dearly grieve
    thou hast done,- send thee hence
    fiery quickness. prepare thyself.
    bark ready wind help,
    Th' associates tend, bent
    England.
  Ham. England?
  King. Ay, Hamlet.
  Ham. Good.  
  King. it, thou knew'st purposes.
  Ham. cherub sees them. come, England!
    Farewell, dear mother.
  King. Thy loving father, Hamlet.
  Ham. mother! Father mother man wife; man wife is
    flesh; so, mother. Come, England!
Exit.
  King. Follow foot; tempt speed aboard.
    Delay not; to-night.
    Away! seal'd done
    leans th' affair. Pray make haste.
                            Exeunt Rosencrantz Guildenstern]
    And, England, love thou hold'st aught,-
    great power thereof give thee sense,
    thy cicatrice raw red
    Danish sword, thy free awe
    Pays homage us,- thou mayst coldly set
    sovereign process, imports full,
    letters congruing effect,
    present death Hamlet. it, England;  
    hectic blood rages,
    thou cure me. Till 'tis done,
    Howe'er haps, joys ne'er begun.             Exit.

Scene IV.
Near Elsinore.

Enter Fortinbras Army stage.

  For. Go, Captain, greet Danish king.
    license Fortinbras
    Craves conveyance promis'd march
    kingdom. rendezvous.
    Majesty aught us,
    express duty eye;
    so.
  Capt. do't, lord.
  For. softly on.
                                   Exeunt [all Captain].

       Enter Hamlet, Rosencrantz, [Guildenstern,] others.

  Ham. Good sir, powers these?
  Capt. Norway, sir.
  Ham. purpos'd, sir, pray you?
  Capt. part Poland.  
  Ham. commands them, sir?
  Capt. nephew Norway, Fortinbras.
  Ham. main Poland, sir,
    frontier?
  Capt. speak, addition,
    gain patch ground
    hath profit name.
    pay ducats, five, farm it;
    yield Norway Pole
    ranker rate, sold fee.
  Ham. Why, Polack defend it.
  Capt. Yes, garrison'd.
  Ham. thousand souls twenty thousand ducats
    debate question straw.
    th' imposthume wealth peace,
    breaks, shows without
    man dies.- humbly you, sir.
  Capt. God b' wi' you, sir.                             [Exit.]
  Ros. Will't go, lord?
  Ham. straight. before.  
                                        [Exeunt Hamlet.]
    occasions inform me
    spur dull revenge! man,
    chief good market time
    sleep feed? beast, more.
    made large discourse,
    after, gave not
    capability godlike reason
    fust unus'd. Now, be
    Bestial oblivion, craven scruple
    thinking precisely th' event,-
    thought which, quarter'd, hath part wisdom
    parts coward,- know
    live 'This thing's do,'
    Sith cause, will, strength, means
    do't. Examples gross earth exhort me.
    Witness army mass charge,
    Led delicate tender prince,
    spirit, divine ambition puff'd,
    Makes mouths invisible event,  
    Exposing mortal unsure
    fortune, death, danger dare,
    eggshell. Rightly great
    stir great argument,
    greatly find quarrel straw
    honour's stake. stand then,
    father klll'd, mother stain'd,
    Excitements reason blood,
    sleep, shame see
    imminent death twenty thousand men
    fantasy trick fame
    graves beds, fight plot
    Whereon numbers cause,
    tomb continent
    hide slain? O, time forth,
    thoughts bloody, worth!            Exit.

Scene V.
Elsinore. room Castle.

Enter Horatio, Queen, Gentleman.

  Queen. speak her.
  Gent. importunate, distract.
    mood pitied.
  Queen. have?
  Gent. speaks father; hears
    tricks i' th' world, hems, beats heart;
    Spurns enviously straws; speaks things doubt,
    carry half sense. speech nothing,
    unshaped doth move
    hearers collection; aim it,
    botch words fit thoughts;
    Which, winks nods gestures yield them,
    make thought,
    sure, unhappily.
  Hor. 'Twere good spoken with; strew
    Dangerous conjectures ill-breeding minds.
  Queen. in.  
                                               [Exit Gentleman.]
    [Aside] sick soul (as sin's true nature is)
    toy Prologue great amiss.
    full artless jealousy guilt
    spills fearing spilt.

                 Enter Ophelia distracted.

  Oph. beauteous Majesty Denmark?
  Queen. now, Ophelia?
  Oph. (sings)
         true-love know
           one?
         cockle bat and' staff
           sandal shoon.

  Queen. Alas, sweet lady, imports song?
  Oph. you? Nay, pray mark.

    (Sings) dead gone, lady,  
              dead gone;
            head grass-green turf,
              heels stone.

    O, ho!
  Queen. Nay, Ophelia-
  Oph. Pray mark.

    (Sings) White shroud mountain snow-

                    Enter King.

  Queen. Alas, here, lord!
  Oph. (Sings)
           Larded sweet flowers;
         bewept grave go
           true-love showers.

  King. you, pretty lady?
  Oph. Well, God dild you! owl baker's daughter.  
    Lord, are, be. God at
    table!
  King. Conceit father.
  Oph. Pray words this; ask, what
    means, this:

    (Sings) To-morrow Saint Valentine's day,
              morning bedtime,
            maid window,
              Valentine.

            rose donn'd clo'es
              dupp'd chamber door,
            maid, maid
              departed more.

  King. Pretty Ophelia!
  Oph. Indeed, la, oath, make end on't!

    [Sings] Gis Saint Charity,  
              Alack, fie shame!
            Young men do't to't
              Cock, blame.

            Quoth she, 'Before tumbled me,
              promis'd wed.'

    answers:

            'So 'a' done, yonder sun,
              thou hadst bed.'

  King. long hath thus?
  Oph. hope well. patient; cannot
    choose weep lay i' th' cold ground.
    brother it; good
    counsel. Come, coach! Good night, ladies. Good night, sweet
    ladies. Good night, good night.                         Exit
  King. Follow close; give good watch, pray you.
                                                 [Exit Horatio.]  
    O, poison deep grief; springs
    father's death. O Gertrude, Gertrude,
    sorrows come, single spies.
    battalions! First, father slain;
    Next, son gone, violent author
    remove; people muddied,
    Thick unwholesome thoughts whispers
    good Polonius' death, greenly
    hugger-mugger inter him; Poor Ophelia
    Divided fair-judgment,
    Pictures mere beasts;
    Last, these,
    brother secret France;
    buzzers infect ear
    Feeds wonder, keep, clouds,
    pestilent speeches father's death,
    necessity, matter beggar'd,
    stick person arraign
    ear ear. O dear Gertrude, this,
    murd'ring piece, places  
    Give, superfluous death.                  noise within.
  Queen. Alack, noise this?
  King. Switzers? guard door.

                     Enter Messenger.

    matter?
  Mess. Save Yourself, lord:
    ocean, overpeering list,
    Eats flats impetuous haste
    Young Laertes, riotous head,
    O'erbears offices. rabble call lord;
    And, world begin,
    Antiquity forgot, custom known,
    ratifiers props word,
    cry 'Choose we! Laertes king!'
    Caps, hands, tongues applaud clouds,
    'Laertes king! Laertes king!'
                                                 noise within.
  Queen. cheerfully false trail cry!  
    O, counter, false Danish dogs!
  King. doors broke.

                    Enter Laertes others.

  Laer. king?- Sirs, staid without.
  All. No, in!
  Laer. pray give leave.
  All. will, will!
  Laer. you. door.      [Exeunt Followers.]
    O thou vile king,
    Give father!
  Queen. Calmly, good Laertes.
  Laer. drop blood calm proclaims bastard;
    Cries cuckold father; brands harlot
    chaste unsmirched brows
    true mother.
  King. cause, Laertes,
    thy rebellion giantlike?
    go, Gertrude. fear person.  
    divinity doth hedge king
    treason peep would,
    Acts will. me, Laertes,
    thou art incens'd. go, Gertrude.
    Speak, man.
  Laer. father?
  King. Dead.
  Queen. him!
  King. demand fill.
  Laer. dead? juggled with:
    hell, allegiance! vows, blackest devil
    Conscience grace, profoundest pit!
    dare damnation. point stand,
    world, give negligence,
    comes; reveng'd
    throughly father.
  King. stay you?
  Laer. will, world!
    means, husband well
    little.  
  King. Good Laertes,
    desire certainty
    dear father's death, is't writ revenge
    swoopstake draw friend foe,
    Winner loser?
  Laer. enemies.
  King. then?
  Laer. good friends wide ope arms
    And, kind life-rend'ring pelican,
    Repast blood.
  King. Why, speak
    good child true gentleman.
    guiltless father's death,
    sensibly grief it,
    level judgment pierce
    day eye.
                              noise within: 'Let in.'
  Laer. now? noise that?

                      Enter Ophelia.  

    O heat, dry brains! Tears times salt
    Burn sense virtue mine eye!
    heaven, thy madness paid weight
    Till scale turn beam. O rose May!
    Dear maid, kind sister, sweet Ophelia!
    O heavens! is't young maid's wits
    mortal man's life?
    Nature fine love, 'tis fine,
    sends precious instance itself
    thing loves.

  Oph. (sings)
         bore barefac'd bier
           (Hey nony, nony, hey nony)
         grave rain'd tear.

    Fare well, dove!
  Laer. Hadst thou thy wits, didst persuade revenge,
    move thus.  
  Oph. sing 'A-down a-down, call a-down-a.' O,
    wheel it! false steward, stole his
    master's daughter.
  Laer. nothing's matter.
  Oph. rosemary, remembrance. Pray you, love,
    remember. pansies, thoughts.
  Laer. document madness! Thoughts remembrance fitted.
  Oph. fennel you, columbines. rue you,
    me. call herb grace o' Sundays.
    O, wear rue difference! daisy. I
    give violets, wither'd father
    died. made good end.

    [Sings] bonny sweet Robin joy.

  Laer. Thought affliction, passion, hell itself,
    turns favour prettiness.
  Oph. (sings)
         again?
         again?
           No, no, dead;  
           thy deathbed;
         again.

         beard white snow,
         flaxen poll.
           gone, gone,
           cast moan.
         God 'a'mercy soul!

    Christian souls, pray God. God b' wi', you.
Exit.
  Laer. this, O God?
  King. Laertes, commune grief,
    deny right. apart,
    Make choice wisest friends will,
    hear judge 'twixt me.
    direct collateral hand
    find touch'd, kingdom give,
    crown, life, call ours,
    satisfaction; not,  
    content lend patience us,
    jointly labour soul
    give due content.
  Laer. so.
    means death, obscure funeral-
    trophy, sword, hatchment o'er bones,
    noble rite formal ostentation,-
    Cry heard, 'twere heaven earth,
    call't question.
  King. shall;
    th' offence great axe fall.
    pray me.
                                                          Exeunt

Scene VI.
Elsinore. room Castle.

Enter Horatio Attendant.

  Hor. speak me?
  Servant. Seafaring men, sir. letters you.
  Hor. in.
                                               [Exit Attendant.]
    part world
    greeted, Lord Hamlet.

                          Enter Sailors.

  Sailor. God bless you, sir.
  Hor. bless thee too.
  Sailor. 'A shall, sir, an't him. letter you,
    sir,- th' ambassador bound England- if
    Horatio, is.
  Hor. (reads letter) 'Horatio, thou shalt overlook'd
    this, give fellows means King. have
    letters him. Ere days sea, pirate  
    warlike appointment gave chase. Finding too
    slow sail, put compelled valour, grapple I
    boarded them. instant clear ship; I
    prisoner. dealt thieves
    mercy; knew did: good turn for
    them. King letters sent, repair thou
    speed thou wouldst fly death. words
    speak thine ear make thee dumb; too
    light bore matter. good fellows bring
    thee am. Rosencrantz Guildenstern hold course
    England. thee. Farewell.
                            'He thou knowest thine, HAMLET.'

    Come, give letters,
    do't speedier direct me
    brought them.                   Exeunt.

Scene VII.
Elsinore. room Castle.

Enter King Laertes.

  King. conscience acquittance seal,
    put heart friend,
    Sith heard, knowing ear,
    hath noble father slain
    Pursued life.
  Laer. appears. me
    proceeded feats
    crimeful capital nature,
    safety, wisdom, things else,
    stirr'd up.
  King. O, special reasons,
    you, perhaps, seein unsinew'd,
    strong. Queen mother
    Lives looks; myself,-
    virtue plague, which,-
    conjunctive life soul
    That, star moves sphere,  
    her. motive
    public count go
    great love general gender bear him,
    Who, dipping faults affection,
    Would, spring turneth wood stone,
    Convert graces; arrows,
    slightly timber'd loud wind,
    reverted bow again,
    aim'd them.
  Laer. noble father lost;
    sister driven desp'rate terms,
    worth, praises back again,
    Stood challenger mount age
    perfections. revenge come.
  King. Break sleeps that. think
    made stuff flat dull
    beard shook danger,
    pastime. shortly hear more.
    lov'd father, love ourself,
    that, hope, teach imagine-  

                 Enter Messenger letters.

    now? news?
  Mess. Letters, lord, Hamlet:
    Majesty; Queen.
  King. Hamlet? brought them?
  Mess. Sailors, lord, say; not.
    Claudio; receiv'd them
    brought them.
  King. Laertes, hear them.
    Leave us.
                                                 Exit Messenger.
    [Reads]'High Mighty,-You set naked your
    kingdom. To-morrow beg leave kingly eyes;
    (first pardon thereunto) recount the
    occasion sudden strange return.
                                                     'HAMLET.'
    mean? rest back?
    abuse, thing?  
  Laer. hand?
  King. 'Tis Hamlet's character. 'Naked!'
    postscript here, 'alone.'
    advise me?
  Laer. lost it, lord. come!
    warms sickness heart
    live teeth,
    'Thus didest thou.'
  King. so, Laertes
    (As so? otherwise?),
    rul'd me?
  Laer. Ay lord,
    o'errule peace.
  King. thine peace. return'd
    checking voyage, means
    undertake it, work him
    exploit ripe device,
    choose fall;
    death wind
    mother uncharge practice  
    call accident.
  Laer. lord, rul'd;
    rather, devise so
    organ.
  King. falls right.
    talk'd travel much,
    Hamlet's hearing, quality
    shine, sun parts
    pluck envy him
    one; that, regard,
    unworthiest siege.
  Laer. part that, lord?
  King. riband cap youth-
    needfull too; youth becomes
    light careless livery wears
    Thin settled age sables weeds,
    Importing health graveness. months since
    gentleman Normandy.
    myself, serv'd against, French,
    horseback; gallant  
    witchcraft in't. grew seat,
    wondrous brought horse
    incorps'd demi-natur'd
    brave beast. topp'd thought
    I, forgery shapes tricks,
    short did.
  Laer. Norman was't?
  King. Norman.
  Laer. life, Lamound.
  King. same.
  Laer. well. broach indeed
    gem nation.
  King. made confession you;
    gave masterly report
    art exercise defence,
    rapier especially,
    cried 'twould sight indeed
    match you. scrimers nation
    swore motion, guard, eye,
    oppos'd them. Sir, report  
    Hamlet envenom envy
    beg
    sudden coming o'er play you.
    Now, this-
  Laer. this, lord?
  King. Laertes, father dear you?
    painting sorrow,
    face heart,'
  Laer. this?
  King. love father;
    love begun time,
    see, passages proof,
    Time qualifies spark fire it.
    lives flame love
    kind wick snuff abate it;
    goodness still;
    goodness, growing plurisy,
    Dies too-much. do,
    would; 'would' changes,
    hath abatements delays  
    tongues, hands, accidents;
    'should' spendthrift sigh,
    hurts easing. quick o' th' ulcer!
    Hamlet back. undertake
    show father's son deed
    words?
  Laer. cut throat i' th' church!
  King. place murther sanctuarize;
    Revenge bounds. But, good Laertes,
    this? close chamber.
    return'd home.
    put praise excellence
    set double varnish fame
    Frenchman gave you; bring fine together
    wager heads. He, remiss,
    generous, free contriving,
    peruse foils; ease,
    shuffling, choose
    sword unbated, and, pass practice,
    Requite father.  
  Laer. do't!
    purpose anoint sword.
    bought unction mountebank,
    mortal that, dip knife it,
    draws blood cataplasm rare,
    Collected simples virtue
    moon, save thing death
    scratch'd withal. touch point
    contagion, that, gall slightly,
    death.
  King. this,
    Weigh convenience time means
    fit shape. fall,
    drift bad performance.
    'Twere assay'd. project
    back second, hold
    blast proof. Soft! see.
    make solemn wager cunnings-
    ha't!
    motion hot dry-  
    make bouts violent end-
    calls drink, prepar'd him
    chalice nonce; whereon sipping,
    chance escape venom'd stuck,
    purpose hold there.- stay, noise,

                           Enter Queen.

    now, sweet queen?
  Queen. woe doth tread another's heel,
    fast follow. sister's drown'd, Laertes.
  Laer. Drown'd! O, where?
  Queen. willow grows aslant brook,
    shows hoar leaves glassy stream.
    fantastic garlands come
    crowflowers, nettles, daisies, long purples,
    liberal shepherds give grosser name,
    cold maids dead men's fingers call them.
    pendant boughs coronet weeds
    Clamb'ring hang, envious sliver broke,  
    weedy trophies herself
    Fell weeping brook. clothes spread wide
    And, mermaid-like, awhile bore up;
    time chaunted snatches tunes,
    incapable distress,
    creature native indued
    element; long be
    Till garments, heavy drink,
    Pull'd poor wretch melodious lay
    muddy death.
  Laer. Alas, drown'd?
  Queen. Drown'd, drown'd.
  Laer. water hast thou, poor Ophelia,
    forbid tears; yet
    trick; nature custom holds,
    shame will. gone,
    woman out. Adieu, lord.
    speech fire, fain blaze
    folly douts it.                          Exit.
  King. follow, Gertrude.  
    calm rage I
    fear give start again;
    follow.
                                                         Exeunt.

ACT V. Scene I.
Elsinore. churchyard.

Enter Clowns, [with spades pickaxes].

  Clown. buried Christian burial wilfully
    seeks salvation?
  Other. thee is; make grave straight.
    crowner hath sate her, finds Christian burial.
  Clown. be, drown'd own
    defence?
  Other. Why, 'tis found so.
  Clown. se offendendo; else. lies
    point: drown wittingly, argues act; an
    act hath branches-it act, do, perform;
    argal, drown'd wittingly.
  Other. Nay, hear you, Goodman Delver!
  Clown. Give leave. lies water; good. stands the
    man; good. man water drown himself, is,
    nill he, goes- mark that. water to
    drown him, drowns himself. Argal, not
    guilty death shortens life.  
  Other. law?
  Clown. Ay, marry, is't- crowner's quest law.
  Other. ha' truth an't? a
    gentlewoman, buried o' Christian burial.
  Clown. Why, thou say'st! pity great folk
    count'nance world drown hang themselves
    even-Christen. Come, spade! no
    ancient gentlemen gard'ners, ditchers, grave-makers. They
    hold Adam's profession.
  Other. gentleman?
  Clown. 'A bore arms.
  Other. Why, none.
  Clown. What, art heathen? dost thou understand Scripture?
    Scripture Adam digg'd. dig arms? I'll
    put question thee. thou answerest the
    purpose, confess thyself-
  Other. to!
  Clown. builds stronger mason, the
    shipwright, carpenter?
  Other. gallows-maker; frame outlives thousand  
    tenants.
  Clown. thy wit well, good faith. gallows well.
    well? ill. Now,
    thou dost ill gallows built stronger the
    church. Argal, gallows thee. To't again, come!
  Other. builds stronger mason, shipwright, a
    carpenter?
  Clown. Ay, that, unyoke.
  Other. Marry, tell!
  Clown. To't.
  Other. Mass, tell.

                 Enter Hamlet Horatio afar off.

  Clown. Cudgel thy brains it, dull ass will
    mend pace beating; ask'd this
    question next, 'a grave-maker.' houses makes lasts
    till doomsday. Go, thee Yaughan; fetch stoup of
    liquor.
                                            [Exit Clown.]  

                       [Clown digs and] sings.

       youth love, love,
         Methought sweet;
       contract- O- time for- a- behove,
         O, methought there- a- nothing- a- meet.

  Ham. fellow feeling business, sings at
    grave-making?
  Hor. Custom hath made Property easiness.
  Ham. 'Tis e'en so. hand employment hath daintier
    sense.
  Clown. (sings)
         age stealing steps
           Hath clawed clutch,
         hath shipped intil land,
           such.
                                            [Throws skull.]
  
  Ham. skull tongue it, sing once. the
    knave jowls ground,as 'twere Cain's jawbone, that
    murther! pate Politician,
    ass o'erreaches; circumvent God,
    not?
  Hor. might, lord.
  Ham. courtier, 'Good morrow, sweet lord!
    dost thou, good lord?' Lord Such-a-one, that
    prais'd Lord Such-a-one's horse meant beg it- might
    not?
  Hor. Ay, lord.
  Ham. Why, e'en so! Lady Worm's, chapless, knock'd
    mazzard sexton's spade. fine revolution,
    trick see't. bones cost the
    breeding play loggets 'em? Mine ache think
    on't.
  Clown. (Sings)
         pickaxe spade, spade,
           shrouding sheet;
         O, Pit clay made  
           guest meet.
                                      Throws [another skull].

  Ham. another. skull lawyer?
    quiddits now, quillets, cases, tenures,
    tricks? suffer rude knave knock
    sconce dirty shovel, him
    action battery? Hum! fellow in's time a
    great buyer land, statutes, recognizances, his
    fines, double vouchers, recoveries. fine of
    fines, recovery recoveries, fine
    pate full fine dirt? vouchers vouch of
    purchases, double too, length breadth
    pair indentures? conveyances lands will
    scarcely lie box; th' inheritor no
    more, ha?
  Hor. jot more, lord.
  Ham. parchment made sheepskins?
  Hor. Ay, lord, calveskins too.
  Ham. sheep calves seek assurance that.  
    speak fellow. grave's this, sirrah?
  Clown. Mine, sir.

    [Sings] O, pit clay made
              guest meet.

  Ham. thine indeed, thou liest in't.
  Clown. lie on't, sir, 'tis yours.
    part, lie in't, mine.
  Ham. Thou dost lie in't, in't thine. 'Tis for
    dead, quick; thou liest.
  Clown. 'Tis quick lie, sir; 'twill you.
  Ham. man dost thou dig for?
  Clown. man, sir.
  Ham. woman then?
  Clown. neither.
  Ham. buried in't?
  Clown. woman, sir; but, rest soul, dead.
  Ham. absolute knave is! speak card, or
    equivocation undo us. Lord, Horatio, years
    note it, age grown picked toe  
    peasant heel courtier galls
    kibe.- long hast thou grave-maker?
  Clown. days i' th' year, to't day our
    king Hamlet overcame Fortinbras.
  Ham. long since?
  Clown. that? fool that. the
    day young Hamlet born- mad, sent
    England.
  Ham. Ay, marry, England?
  Clown. Why, 'a mad. 'A recover wits there;
    or, 'a not, 'tis great matter there.
  Ham. Why?
  Clown. 'Twill there. men mad as
    he.
  Ham. mad?
  Clown. strangely, say.
  Ham. strangely?
  Clown. Faith, e'en losing wits.
  Ham. ground?
  Clown. Why, Denmark. sexton here, man boy  
    thirty years.
  Ham. long man lie i' th' earth ere rot?
  Clown. Faith, 'a rotten 'a die (as many
    pocky corses now-a-days scarce hold laying in, I
    year year. tanner last
    year.
  Ham. another?
  Clown. Why, sir, hide tann'd trade 'a will
    water great while; water sore decayer of
    whoreson dead body. skull now. skull hath lien
    i' th' earth three-and-twenty years.
  Ham. it?
  Clown. whoreson, mad fellow's was. was?
  Ham. Nay, not.
  Clown. pestilence mad rogue! 'A pour'd flagon of
    Rhenish head once. skull, sir, Yorick's
    skull, King's jester.
  Ham. This?
  Clown. E'en that.
  Ham. see. [Takes skull.] Alas, poor Yorick! knew him,  
    Horatio. fellow infinite jest, excellent fancy. He
    hath borne back thousand tunes. abhorred
    imagination is! gorge rises it. hung those
    lips kiss'd oft. gibes
    now? gambols? songs? flashes merriment that
    wont set table roar? now, mock your
    grinning? chap- fall'n? lady's
    chamber, her, paint inch thick, this
    favour come. Make laugh that. Prithee, Horatio,
    thing.
  Hor. that, lord?
  Ham. Dost thou Alexander look'd o' fashion i' th' earth?
  Hor. E'en so.
  Ham. smelt so? Pah!
                                          [Puts skull.]
  Hor. E'en so, lord.
  Ham. base return, Horatio! not
    imagination trace noble dust Alexander till find it
    stopping bunghole?
  Hor. 'Twere curiously, so.  
  Ham. No, faith, jot; follow thither modesty
    enough, likelihood lead it; thus: Alexander died,
    Alexander buried, Alexander returneth dust; dust is
    earth; earth make loam; loam (whereto he
    converted) stop beer barrel?
    Imperious Caesar, dead turn'd clay,
    stop hole wind away.
    O, earth world awe
    patch wall t' expel winter's flaw!
    soft! soft! aside! King-

    Enter [priests with] coffin [in funeral procession], King,
             Queen, Laertes, Lords attendant.]

    Queen, courtiers. follow?
    maimed rites? doth betoken
    corse follow desp'rate hand
    Fordo life. 'Twas estate.
    Couch awhile, mark.
                                         [Retires Horatio.]  
  Laer. ceremony else?
  Ham. Laertes,
    noble youth. Mark.
  Laer. ceremony else?
  Priest. obsequies enlarg'd
    warranty. death doubtful;
    And, great command o'ersways order,
    ground unsanctified lodg'd
    Till trumpet. charitable prayers,
    Shards, flints, pebbles thrown her.
    allow'd virgin crants,
    maiden strewments, bringing home
    bell burial.
  Laer. done?
  Priest. done.
    profane service dead
    sing requiem rest her
    peace-parted souls.
  Laer. Lay i' th' earth;
    fair unpolluted flesh  
    violets spring! thee, churlish priest,
    minist'ring angel sister be
    thou liest howling.
  Ham. What, fair Ophelia?
  Queen. Sweets sweet! Farewell.
                                             [Scatters flowers.]
    hop'd thou shouldst Hamlet's wife;
    thought thy bride-bed deck'd, sweet maid,
    strew'd thy grave.
  Laer. O, treble woe
    Fall ten times treble cursed head
    wicked deed thy ingenious sense
    Depriv'd thee of! Hold earth awhile,
    Till caught mine arms.
                                             Leaps grave.
    pile dust quick dead
    Till flat mountain made
    T' o'ertop Pelion skyish head
    blue Olympus.
  Ham. [comes forward] grief  
    Bears emphasis? phrase sorrow
    Conjures wand'ring stars, makes stand
    wonder-wounded hearers? I,
    Hamlet Dane.                    [Leaps Laertes.
  Laer. devil thy soul!
                                            [Grapples him].
  Ham. Thou pray'st well.
    prithee thy fingers throat;
    For, splenitive rash,
    dangerous,
    thy wisdom fear. Hold thy hand!
  King. Pluck thein asunder.
  Queen. Hamlet, Hamlet!
  All. Gentlemen!
  Hor. Good lord, quiet.
             [The Attendants part them, the
                                                         grave.]
  Ham. Why, fight theme
    eyelids longer wag.
  Queen. O son, theme?  
  Ham. lov'd Ophelia. Forty thousand brothers
    (with quantity love)
    Make sum. wilt thou her?
  King. O, mad, Laertes.
  Queen. love God, forbear him!
  Ham. 'Swounds, show thou't do.
    Woo't weep? woo't fight? woo't fast? woo't tear thyself?
    Woo't drink esill? eat crocodile?
    do't. Dost thou whine?
    outface leaping grave?
    buried quick her, I.
    thou prate mountains, throw
    Millions acres us, till ground,
    Singeing pate burning zone,
    Make Ossa wart! Nay, thou'lt mouth,
    rant thou.
  Queen. mere madness;
    fit work him.
    Anon, patient female dove
    golden couplets disclos'd,  
    silence sit drooping.
  Ham. Hear you, sir!
    reason thus?
    lov'd ever. matter.
    Hercules may,
    cat mew, dog day.
Exit.
  King. pray thee, good Horatio, wait him.
                                                   Exit Horatio.
    [To Laertes] Strengthen patience night's speech.
    put matter present push.-
    Good Gertrude, set watch son.-
    grave living monument.
    hour quiet shortly see;
    Till patience proceeding be.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene II.
Elsinore. hall Castle.

Enter Hamlet Horatio.

  Ham. this, sir; other.
    remember circumstance?
  Hor. Remember it, lord!
  Ham. Sir, heart kind fighting
    sleep. Methought lay
    Worse mutinies bilboes. Rashly-
    prais'd rashness it; know,
    indiscretion serves well
    deep plots pall; learn us
    divinity shapes ends,
    Rough-hew will-
  Hor. certain.
  Ham. cabin,
    sea-gown scarf'd me, dark
    Grop'd find them; desire,
    Finger'd packet, fine withdrew
    mine room again; making bold  
    (My fears forgetting manners) unseal
    grand commission; found, Horatio
    (O royal knavery!), exact command,
    Larded sorts reasons,
    Importing Denmark's health, England's too,
    With, hoo! bugs goblins life-
    That, supervise, leisure bated,
    No, stay finding axe,
    head struck off.
  Hor. Is't possible?
  Ham. commission; read leisure.
    wilt thou bear proceed?
  Hor. beseech you.
  Ham. benetted round villanies,
    make prologue brains,
    begun play. sat down;
    Devis'd commission; wrote fair.
    hold it, statists do,
    baseness write fair, labour'd much
    forget learning; but, sir,  
    yeoman's service. Wilt thou know
    Th' effect wrote?
  Hor. Ay, good lord.
  Ham. earnest conjuration King,
    England faithful tributary,
    love palm flourish,
    peace wheaten garland wear
    stand comma 'tween amities,
    such-like as's great charge,
    That, view knowing contents,
    debatement further, less,
    bearers put sudden death,
    shriving time allow'd.
  Hor. seal'd?
  Ham. Why, heaven ordinant.
    father's signet purse,
    model Danish seal;
    Folded writ form th' other,
    Subscrib'd it, gave't th' impression, plac'd safely,
    changeling known. Now, day  
    sea-fight; sequent
    Thou know'st already.
  Hor. Guildenstern Rosencrantz to't.
  Ham. Why, man, make love employment!
    conscience; defeat
    insinuation grow.
    'Tis dangerous baser nature comes
    pass fell incensed points
    mighty opposites.
  Hor. Why, king this!
  Ham. not, thinks't thee, stand upon-
    hath kill'd king, whor'd mother;
    Popp'd th' election hopes;
    Thrown angle Proper life,
    coz'nage- is't perfect conscience
    quit arm? is't damn'd
    canker nature come
    evil?
  Hor. shortly England
    issue business there.  
  Ham. short; interim mine,
    man's life 'one.'
    sorry, good Horatio,
    Laertes forgot myself,
    image see
    portraiture his. court favours.
    bravery grief put me
    tow'ring passion.
  Hor. Peace! here?

                 Enter young Osric, courtier.

  Osr. lordship back Denmark.
  Ham. humbly you, sir. [Aside Horatio] Dost this
    waterfly?
  Hor. [aside Hamlet] No, good lord.
  Ham. [aside Horatio] Thy state gracious; 'tis a
    vice him. hath land, fertile. beast be
    lord beasts, crib stand king's mess. 'Tis
    chough; but, say, spacious possession dirt.  
  Osr. Sweet lord, lordship leisure, impart
    thing Majesty.
  Ham. receive it, sir, diligence spirit. Put your
    bonnet use. 'Tis head.
  Osr. lordship, hot.
  Ham. No, me, 'tis cold; wind northerly.
  Osr. indifferent cold, lord, indeed.
  Ham. methinks sultry hot complexion.
  Osr. Exceedingly, lord; sultry, 'twere- cannot
    how. But, lord, Majesty bade signify that
    laid great wager head. Sir, matter-
  Ham. beseech remember.
                           [Hamlet moves put hat.]
  Osr. Nay, good lord; mine ease, good faith. Sir, is
    newly court Laertes; me, absolute gentleman,
    full excellent differences, soft society and
    great showing. Indeed, speak feelingly him, card
    calendar gentry; find continent of
    part gentleman see.
  Ham. Sir, definement suffers perdition you; though,  
    know, divide inventorially dozy th' arithmetic of
    memory, yaw respect quick sail.
    But, verity extolment, soul great
    article, infusion dearth rareness as, make
    true diction him, semblable mirror, else
    trace him, umbrage, more.
  Osr. lordship speaks infallibly him.
  Ham. concernancy, sir? wrap gentleman more
    rawer breath
  Osr. Sir?
  Hor [aside Hamlet] Is't understand another
    tongue? do't, sir, really.
  Ham. imports nomination gentleman
  Osr. Laertes?
  Hor. [aside] purse empty already. All's golden words are
    spent.
  Ham. him, sir.
  Osr. ignorant-
  Ham. did, sir; yet, faith, did, not
    approve me. Well, sir?  
  Osr. ignorant excellence Laertes is-
  Ham. dare confess that, compare in
    excellence; man himself.
  Osr. mean, sir, weapon; imputation laid him
    them, meed unfellowed.
  Ham. weapon?
  Osr. Rapier dagger.
  Ham. weapons- well.
  Osr. King, sir, hath wager'd Barbary horses;
    impon'd, it, French
    rapiers poniards, assigns, girdle, hangers, and
    so. carriages, faith, dear fancy,
    responsive hilts, delicate carriages, of
    liberal conceit.
  Ham. call carriages?
  Hor. [aside Hamlet] knew edified margent
    ere done.
  Osr. carriages, sir, hangers.
  Ham. phrase germane matter could
    carry cannon sides. hangers till then.  
    on! Barbary horses French swords, their
    assigns, liberal-conceited carriages: French
    bet Danish. impon'd, call it?
  Osr. King, sir, hath laid that, dozen passes between
    him, exceed hits; hath
    laid twelve nine, trial
    lordship vouchsafe answer.
  Ham. answer no?
  Osr. mean, lord, opposition person trial.
  Ham. Sir, walk hall. Majesty,
    breathing time day me. foils be
    brought, gentleman willing, King hold purpose,
    win can; not, gain my
    shame odd hits.
  Osr. redeliver e'en so?
  Ham. effect, sir, flourish nature will.
  Osr. commend duty lordship.
  Ham. Yours, yours. [Exit Osric.] commend it
    himself; tongues for's turn.
  Hor. lapwing runs shell head.  
  Ham. comply dug suck'd it. he,
    bevy drossy age dotes
    on, tune time outward habit encounter-
    kind yesty collection, carries and
    fann'd winnowed opinions; blow
    trial-the bubbles out,

                            Enter Lord.

  Lord. lord, Majesty commended young Osric, who
    brings back him, attend hall. sends to
    pleasure hold play Laertes, will
    longer time.
  Ham. constant purposes; follow King's pleasure.
    fitness speaks, mine ready; whensoever, provided
    now.
  Lord. King Queen coming down.
  Ham. happy time.
  Lord. Queen desires gentle entertainment to
    Laertes fall play.  
  Ham. instructs me.
                                                    [Exit Lord.]
  Hor. lose wager, lord.
  Ham. so. France in
    continual practice. win odds. thou wouldst not
    ill all's heart. matter.
  Hor. Nay, good lord -
  Ham. foolery; kind gaingiving as
    trouble woman.
  Hor. mind dislike anything, obey it. forestall their
    repair fit.
  Ham. whit, defy augury; special providence in
    fall sparrow. now, 'tis come', be
    come, now; now, come:
    readiness all. man aught leaves,
    is't leave betimes? be.

    Enter King, Queen, Laertes, Osric, Lords, other
              Attendants foils gauntlets.
               table flagons wine it.  

  King. Come, Hamlet, come, hand me.
                    [The King puts Laertes' hand Hamlet's.]
  Ham. Give pardon, sir. wrong;
    pardon't, gentleman.
    presence knows,
    heard, punish'd
    sore distraction. done
    nature, honour, exception
    Roughly awake, proclaim madness.
    Was't Hamlet wrong'd Laertes? Hamlet.
    Hamlet away,
    wrong Laertes,
    Hamlet not, Hamlet denies it.
    it, then? madness. If't so,
    Hamlet faction wrong'd;
    madness poor Hamlet's enemy.
    Sir, audience,
    disclaiming purpos'd evil
    Free generous thoughts  
    shot arrow o'er house
    hurt brother.
  Laer. satisfied nature,
    motive case stir most
    revenge. terms honour
    stand aloof, reconcilement
    Till elder masters honour
    voice precedent peace
    ungor'd. till time
    receive offer'd love love,
    wrong it.
  Ham. embrace freely,
    brother's wager frankly play.
    Give foils. on.
  Laer. Come, me.
  Ham. foil, Laertes. mine ignorance
    skill shall, star i' th' darkest night,
    Stick fiery indeed.
  Laer. mock me, sir.
  Ham. No, bad.  
  King. Give foils, young Osric. Cousin Hamlet,
    wager?
  Ham. well, lord.
    Grace laid odds o' th' weaker side.
  King. fear it, both;
    better'd, odds.
  Laer. heavy; another.
  Ham. likes well. foils length?
                                                Prepare play.
  Osr. Ay, good lord.
  King. Set stoups wine table.
    Hamlet give hit,
    quit answer exchange,
    battlements ordnance fire;
    King drink Hamlet's breath,
    cup union throw
    Richer successive kings
    Denmark's crown worn. Give cups;
    kettle trumpet speak,
    trumpet cannoneer without,  
    cannons heavens, heaven earth,
    'Now King drinks Hamlet.' Come, begin.
    judges, bear wary eye.
  Ham. on, sir.
  Laer. Come, lord.                                play.
  Ham. One.
  Laer. No.
  Ham. Judgment!
  Osr. hit, palpable hit.
  Laer. Well, again!
  King. Stay, give drink. Hamlet, pearl thine;
    thy health.
               [Drum; trumpets sound; piece [within].
    Give cup.
  Ham. play bout first; set awhile.
    Come. (They play.) hit. you?
  Laer. touch, touch; confess't.
  King. son win.
  Queen. fat, scant breath.
    Here, Hamlet, napkin, rub thy brows.  
    Queen carouses thy fortune, Hamlet.
  Ham. Good madam!
  King. Gertrude, drink.
  Queen. will, lord; pray pardon me.          Drinks.
  King. [aside] poison'd cup; late.
  Ham. dare drink yet, madam; by-and-by.
  Queen. Come, wipe thy face.
  Laer. lord, hit now.
  King. think't.
  Laer. [aside] conscience.
  Ham. third, Laertes! dally.
    pray Pass violence;
    afeard make wanton me.
  Laer. so? on.                               Play.
  Osr. way.
  Laer. now!
                [Laertes wounds Hamlet; then] scuffling, they
                    change rapiers, [and Hamlet wounds Laertes].
  King. Part them! incens'd.
  Ham. Nay come! again!                         Queen falls.  
  Osr. Queen there, ho!
  Hor. bleed sides. it, lord?
  Osr. is't, Laertes?
  Laer. Why, woodcock mine springe, Osric.
    justly kill'd mine treachery.
  Ham. Queen?
  King. sounds bleed.
  Queen. No, no! drink, drink! O dear Hamlet!
    drink, drink! poison'd.                 [Dies.]
  Ham. O villany! Ho! door lock'd.
    Treachery! Seek out.
                                                [Laertes falls.]
  Laer. here, Hamlet. Hamlet, thou art slain;
    medicine world thee good.
    thee half hour life.
    treacherous instrument thy hand,
    Unbated envenom'd. foul practice
    Hath turn'd me. Lo, lie,
    rise again. Thy mother's poison'd.
    more. King, King's blame.  
  Ham. point envenom'd too?
    Then, venom, thy work.                    Hurts King.
  All. Treason! treason!
  King. O, defend me, friends! hurt.
  Ham. Here, thou incestuous, murd'rous, damned Dane,
    Drink potion! thy union here?
    Follow mother.                                 King dies.
  Laer. justly serv'd.
    poison temper'd himself.
    Exchange forgiveness me, noble Hamlet.
    Mine father's death thee,
    thine me!                                       Dies.
  Ham. Heaven make thee free it! follow thee.
    dead, Horatio. Wretched queen, adieu!
    pale tremble chance,
    mutes audience act,
    time (as fell sergeant, Death,
    strict arrest) O, you-
    be. Horatio, dead;
    Thou liv'st; report aright  
    unsatisfied.
  Hor. it.
    antique Roman Dane.
    liquor left.
  Ham. th'art man,
    Give cup. go! heaven, ha't.
    O good Horatio, wounded name
    (Things standing unknown) live me!
    thou didst hold thy heart,
    Absent thee felicity awhile,
    harsh world draw thy breath pain,
    story.         [March afar off, shot within.]
    warlike noise this?
  Osr. Young Fortinbras, conquest Poland,
    ambassadors England gives
    warlike volley.
  Ham. O, die, Horatio!
    potent poison o'ercrows spirit.
    live hear news England,
    prophesy th' election lights  
    Fortinbras. dying voice.
    him, th' occurrents, less,
    solicited- rest silence.             Dies.
  Hor. cracks noble heart. Good night, sweet prince,
    flights angels sing thee thy rest!
                                                 [March within.]
    drum hither?

    Enter Fortinbras English Ambassadors, Drum,
                  Colours, Attendants.

  Fort. sight?
  Hor. see?
    aught woe wonder, cease search.
  Fort. quarry cries havoc. O proud Death,
    feast thine eternal cell
    thou princes shot
    bloodily hast struck.
  Ambassador. sight dismal;
    affairs England late.  
    ears senseless give bearing
    commandment fulfill'd
    Rosencrantz Guildenstern dead.
    thanks?
  Hor. mouth,
    th' ability life you.
    gave commandment death.
    since, jump bloody question,
    Polack wars, England,
    arriv'd, give order bodies
    High stage view;
    speak unknowing world
    things about. hear
    carnal, bloody unnatural acts;
    accidental judgments, casual slaughters;
    deaths put cunning forc'd cause;
    And, upshot, purposes mistook
    Fall'n th' inventors' heads. I
    deliver.
  Fort. haste hear it,  
    call noblest audience.
    me, sorrow embrace fortune.
    rights memory kingdom
    now, claim vantage doth invite me.
  Hor. speak,
    mouth voice draw more.
    presently perform'd,
    men's minds wild, mischance
    plots errors happen.
  Fort. captains
    Bear Hamlet soldier stage;
    likely, put on,
    prov'd royally; passage
    soldiers' music rites war
    Speak loudly him.
    bodies. sight this
    field shows amiss.
    Go, bid soldiers shoot.
            Exeunt marching; peal ordnance
                                                   shot off.  


THE END

1598

THE PART KING HENRY FOURTH


by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  King Henry Fourth.
  Henry, Prince Wales, son King.
  Prince John Lancaster, son King.
  Earl Westmoreland.
  Sir Walter Blunt.
  Thomas Percy, Earl Worcester.
  Henry Percy, Earl Northumberland.
  Henry Percy, surnamed Hotspur, son.
  Edmund Mortimer, Earl March.
  Richard Scroop, Archbishop York.
  Archibald, Earl Douglas.
  Owen Glendower.
  Sir Richard Vernon.
  Sir John Falstaff.
  Sir Michael, friend Archbishop York.
  Poins.
  Gadshill
  Peto.
  Bardolph.
  
  Lady Percy, wife Hotspur, sister Mortimer.
  Lady Mortimer, daughter Glendower, wife Mortimer.
  Mistress Quickly, hostess Boar's Head Eastcheap.

  Lords, Officers, Sheriff, Vintner, Chamberlain, Drawers, two
    Carriers, Travellers, Attendants.
