SCENE.--England Wales.


ACT I. Scene I.
London. Palace.

Enter King, Lord John Lancaster, Earl Westmoreland,
[Sir Walter Blunt,] others.

  King. shaken are, wan care,
    Find time frighted peace pant
    breathe short-winded accents broils
    commenc'd stronds afar remote.
    thirsty entrance soil
    daub lips children's blood.
    trenching war channel fields,
    Bruise flow'rets armed hoofs
    hostile paces. opposed eyes
    Which, meteors troubled heaven,
    nature, substance bred,
    meet intestine shock
    furious close civil butchery,
    mutual well-beseeming ranks
    March oppos'd
    acquaintance, kindred, allies.  
    edge war, ill-sheathed knife,
    cut master. Therefore, friends,
    sepulchre Christ-
    soldier now, blessed cross
    impressed engag'd fight-
    Forthwith power English levy,
    arms moulded mother's womb
    chase pagans holy fields
    acres walk'd blessed feet
    fourteen hundred years ago nail'd
    advantage bitter cross.
    purpose twelvemonth old,
    bootless 'tis go.
    meet now. hear
    you, gentle cousin Westmoreland,
    yesternight Council decree
    forwarding dear expedience.
  West. liege, haste hot question
    limits charge set down
    yesternight; athwart  
    post Wales, loaden heavy news;
    worst noble Mortimer,
    Leading men Herefordshire fight
    irregular wild Glendower,
    rude hands Welshman taken,
    thousand people butchered;
    dead corpse misuse,
    beastly shameless transformation,
    Welshwomen be
    shame retold spoken of.
  King. tidings broil
    Brake business Holy Land.
  West. This, match'd other, did, gracious lord;
    uneven unwelcome news
    North, import:
    Holy-rood Day gallant Hotspur there,
    Young Harry Percy, brave Archibald,
    ever-valiant approved Scot,
    Holmedon met,
    spend sad bloody hour;  
    discharge artillery
    shape likelihood news told;
    brought them, heat
    pride contention horse,
    Uncertain issue way.
  King. dear, true-industrious friend,
    Sir Walter Blunt, lighted horse,
    Stain'd variation soil
    Betwixt Holmedon seat ours,
    hath brought smooth news.
    Earl Douglas discomfited;
    Ten thousand bold Scots, two-and-twenty knights,
    Balk'd blood Sir Walter see
    Holmedon's plains. prisoners, Hotspur took
    Mordake Earl Fife eldest son
    beaten Douglas, Earl Athol,
    Murray, Angus, Menteith.
    honourable spoil?
    gallant prize? Ha, cousin, not?
  West. faith,  
    conquest prince boast of.
  King. Yea, thou mak'st sad, mak'st sin
    envy Lord Northumberland
    father blest son-
    son theme honour's tongue,
    grove straightest plant;
    sweet Fortune's minion pride;
    Whilst I, praise him,
    riot dishonour stain brow
    young Harry. O prov'd
    night-tripping fairy exchang'd
    cradle clothes children lay,
    call'd mine Percy, Plantagenet!
    Harry, mine.
    thoughts. you, coz,
    young Percy's pride? prisoners
    adventure hath surpris'd
    keeps, sends word
    Mordake Earl Fife.
  West. uncle's teaching, Worcester,  
    Malevolent aspects,
    makes prune bristle up
    crest youth dignity.
  King. answer this;
    awhile neglect
    holy purpose Jerusalem.
    Cousin, Wednesday council we
    hold Windsor. inform lords;
    speed again;
    done
    anger uttered.
  West. liege.                                 Exeunt.




Scene II.
London. apartment Prince's.

Enter Prince Wales Sir John Falstaff.

  Fal. Now, Hal, time day it, lad?
  Prince. Thou art fat-witted drinking sack, and
    unbuttoning thee supper, sleeping benches after
    noon, thou hast forgotten demand thou
    wouldest know. devil hast thou time
    day, hours cups sack, minutes capons,
    clocks tongues bawds, dials signs leaping
    houses, blessed sun fair hot wench in
    flame-coloured taffeta, reason thou shouldst so
    superfluous demand time day.
  Fal. now, Hal; purses go
    moon stars, Phoebus, he, that
    wand'ring knight fair. prithee, sweet wag, thou art
    king, as, God save thy Grace-Majesty say, grace thou
    wilt none-
  Prince. What, none?
  Fal. No, troth; serve prologue  
    egg butter.
  Prince. Well, then? Come, roundly, roundly.
  Fal. Marry, then, sweet wag, thou art king, that
    squires night's body called thieves day's
    beauty. Diana's Foresters, Gentlemen Shade,
    Minions Moon; men men good
    government, governed sea is, noble chaste
    mistress moon, countenance steal.
  Prince. Thou sayest well, holds too; fortune of
    moon's men doth ebb flow sea, being
    governed, sea is, moon. As, proof now: purse
    gold resolutely snatch'd Monday night most
    dissolutely spent Tuesday morning; swearing 'Lay by,'
    spent crying 'Bring in'; ill low ebb the
    foot ladder, by-and-by high flow ridge
    gallows.
  Fal. Lord, thou say'st true, lad- hostess of
    tavern sweet wench?
  Prince. honey Hybla, lad castle- not
    buff jerkin sweet robe durance?  
  Fal. now, now, mad wag? What, thy quips thy
    quiddities? plague buff jerkin?
  Prince. Why, pox hostess tavern?
  Fal. Well, thou hast call'd reckoning time oft.
  Prince. call thee pay thy part?
  Fal. No; give thee thy due, thou hast paid there.
  Prince. Yea, elsewhere, coin stretch; and
    not, credit.
  Fal. Yea, us'd that, apparent thou
    art heir apparent- prithee, sweet wag, be
    gallows standing England thou art king? resolution
    fubb'd rusty curb father antic the
    law? thou, thou art king, hang thief.
  Prince. No; thou shalt.
  Fal. I? O rare! Lord, brave judge.
  Prince. Thou judgest false already. mean, thou shalt the
    hanging thieves rare hangman.
  Fal. Well, Hal, well; sort jumps humour as
    waiting court, you.
  Prince. obtaining suits?  
  Fal. Yea, obtaining suits, whereof hangman hath lean
    wardrobe. 'Sblood, melancholy gib-cat lugg'd
    bear.
  Prince. lion, lover's lute.
  Fal. Yea, drone Lincolnshire bagpipe.
  Prince. sayest thou hare, melancholy Moor
    Ditch?
  Fal. Thou hast unsavoury similes, art most
    comparative, rascalliest, sweet young prince. But, Hal, prithee
    trouble vanity. God thou knew
    commodity good names bought. lord of
    Council rated day street you, sir,
    mark'd not; talked wisely, I
    regarded not; talk'd wisely, street
    too.
  Prince. Thou didst well; wisdom cries streets, and
    man it.
  Fal. O, thou hast damnable iteration, art to
    corrupt saint. Thou hast harm me, Hal- God
    forgive thee it! knew thee, Hal, knew nothing;  
    I, man speak truly, of
    wicked. give life, give over!
    Lord, not, villain! damn'd for
    king's son Christendom.
  Prince. purse tomorrow, Jack?
  Fal. Zounds, thou wilt, lad! make one. not, call
    villain baffle me.
  Prince. good amendment life thee- praying to
    purse-taking.
  Fal. Why, Hal, 'tis vocation, Hal. 'Tis sin man to
    labour vocation.

                             Enter Poins.

    Poins! Gadshill set match. O, men
    saved merit, hole hell hot for
    him? omnipotent villain cried 'Stand!'
    true man.
  Prince. Good morrow, Ned.
  Poins. Good morrow, sweet Hal. Monsieur Remorse?  
    Sir John Sack Sugar? Jack, agrees devil thee
    thy soul, thou soldest Good Friday a
    cup Madeira cold capon's leg?
  Prince. Sir John stands word, devil his
    bargain; breaker proverbs. give
    devil due.
  Poins. art thou damn'd keeping thy word devil.
  Prince. damn'd cozening devil.
  Poins. But, lads, lads, to-morrow morning, o'clock
    early, Gadshill! pilgrims gong Canterbury with
    rich offerings, traders riding London fat purses. I
    vizards all; horses yourselves.
    Gadshill lies to-night Rochester. bespoke supper
    to-morrow night Eastcheap. secure sleep. If
    go, stuff purses full crowns; will
    not, tarry home hang'd!
  Fal. Hear ye, Yedward: tarry home not, hang you
    going.
  Poins. will, chops?
  Fal. Hal, wilt thou make one?  
  Prince. Who, rob? thief? I, faith.
  Fal. honesty, manhood, good fellowship thee,
    thou cam'st blood royal thou darest stand
    ten shillings.
  Prince. then, days madcap.
  Fal. Why, said.
  Prince. Well, will, tarry home.
  Fal. Lord, traitor then, thou art king.
  Prince. care not.
  Poins. Sir John, prithee, leave Prince alone. will
    lay reasons adventure go.
  Fal. Well, God give thee spirit persuasion ears
    profiting, thou speakest move hears
    believed, true prince (for recreation sake)
    prove false thief; poor abuses time want
    countenance. Farewell; find Eastcheap.
  Prince. Farewell, thou spring! farewell, All-hallown summer!
                                                  Exit Falstaff.
  Poins. Now, good sweet honey lord, ride to-morrow. I
    jest execute manage alone. Falstaff,  
    Bardolph, Peto, Gadshill rob men have
    waylaid; there; they
    booty, rob them, cut head off
    shoulders.
  Prince. part setting forth?
  Poins. Why, set appoint them
    place meeting, pleasure fail; and
    adventure exploit themselves; they
    sooner achieved, set them.
  Prince. Yea, 'tis horses, by
    habits, appointment, ourselves.
  Poins. Tut! horses see- tie the
    wood; wizards change leave them; and,
    sirrah, cases buckram nonce, immask our
    noted outward garments.
  Prince. Yea, doubt hard us.
  Poins. Well, them, true-bred
    cowards turn'd back; third, fight
    longer sees reason, forswear arms. virtue of
    jest lie incomprehensible lies fat  
    rogue meet supper: thirty, least,
    fought with; wards, blows, extremities he
    endured; reproof lies jest.
  Prince. Well, thee. Provide things necessary
    meet to-night Eastcheap. sup. Farewell.
  Poins. Farewell, lord.                                Exit.
  Prince. all, awhile uphold
    unyok'd humour idleness.
    imitate sun,
    doth permit base contagious clouds
    smother beauty world,
    That, lie himself,
    wanted, wond'red at
    breaking foul ugly mists
    vapours strangle him.
    year playing holidays,
    sport tedious work;
    seldom come, wish'd-for come,
    pleaseth rare accidents.
    So, loose behaviour throw  
    pay debt promised,
    word am,
    falsify men's hopes;
    And, bright metal sullen ground,
    reformation, glitt'ring o'er fault,
    show goodly attract eyes
    hath foil set off.
    offend make offence skill,
    Redeeming time men will.            Exit.




Scene III.
London. Palace.

Enter King, Northumberland, Worcester, Hotspur, Sir Walter Blunt,
with others.

  King. blood hath cold temperate,
    Unapt stir indignities,
    found me, accordingly
    tread patience; sure
    henceforth myself,
    Mighty fear'd, condition,
    hath smooth oil, soft young down,
    lost title respect
    proud soul ne'er pays proud.
  Wor. house, sovereign liege, deserves
    scourge greatness us'd it-
    greatness hands
    holp make portly.
  North. lord-
  King. Worcester, thee gone; see
    Danger disobedience thine eye.  
    O, sir, presence bold peremptory,
    majesty endure
    moody frontier servant brow.
    Tou good leave leave us. need
    'Your counsel, send you.
                                                 Exit Worcester.
    speak.
  North. Yea, good lord.
    prisoners Highness' demanded
    Harry Percy Holmedon took,
    Were, says, strength denied
    delivered Majesty.
    envy, therefore, misprision
    guilty fault, son.
  Hot. liege, deny prisoners.
    remember, fight done,
    dry rage extreme toll,
    Breathless faint, leaning sword,
    lord, neat trimly dress'd,
    Fresh bridegroom; chin reap'd  
    Show'd stubble land harvest home.
    perfumed milliner,
    'twixt finger thumb held
    pouncet box, anon
    gave nose, took't again;
    therewith angry, there,
    snuff; smil'd talk'd;
    soldiers bore dead bodies by,
    call'd untaught knaves, unmannerly,
    bring slovenly unhandsome corse
    Betwixt wind nobility.
    holiday lady terms
    questioned me, rest demanded
    prisoners Majesty's behalf.
    then, smarting wounds cold,
    pest'red popingay,
    grief impatience
    Answer'd neglectingly, what-
    should, not; made mad
    shine brisk, smell sweet,  
    talk waiting gentlewoman
    guns drums wounds- God save mark!-
    telling sovereignest thing earth
    parmacity bruise;
    great pity, was,
    villanous saltpetre digg'd
    bowels harmless earth,
    good tall fellow destroy'd
    cowardly; vile 'guns,
    soldier.
    bald unjointed chat his, lord,
    answered indirectly, said,
    beseech you, report
    current accusation
    Betwixt love high majesty.
  Blunt. circumstance considered, good lord,
    Whate'er Lord Harry Percy said
    person, place,
    time, rest retold,
    die, rise  
    wrong, impeach
    said, unsay now.
  King. Why, doth deny prisoners,
    proviso exception,
    charge ransom straight
    brother-in-law, foolish Mortimer;
    Who, soul, hath wilfully betray'd
    lives lead fight
    great magician, damn'd Glendower,
    daughter, hear, Earl March
    Hath married. coffers, then,
    emptied redeem traitor home?
    buy treason? indent fears
    lost forfeited themselves?
    No, barren mountains starve!
    hold man friend
    tongue penny cost
    ransom home revolted Mortimer.
  Hot. Revolted Mortimer?
    fall off, sovereign liege,  
    chance war. prove true
    tongue wounds,
    mouthed wounds, valiantly took
    gentle Severn's sedgy bank,
    single opposition hand hand,
    confound part hour
    changing hardiment great Glendower.
    times breath'd, times drink,
    agreement, swift Severn's flood;
    then, affrighted bloody looks,
    Ran fearfully trembling reeds
    hid crisp head hollow bank,
    Bloodstained valiant cohabitants.
    base rotten policy
    Colour working deadly wounds;
    noble Mortimer
    Receive many, willingly.
    slandered revolt.
  King. Thou dost belie him, Percy, thou dost belie him!
    encounter Glendower.  
    thee
    durst met devil alone
    Owen Glendower enemy.
    Art thou asham'd? But, sirrah, henceforth
    hear speak Mortimer.
    Send prisoners speediest means,
    hear kind me
    displease you. Lord Northumberland,
    license departure son.-
    Send prisoners, hear it.
                                 Exeunt King, [Blunt, Train]
  Hot. devil roar them,
    send them. straight
    so; heart,
    Albeit make hazard head.
  North. What, drunk choler? Stay, pause awhile.
    uncle.

                          Enter Worcester.
  
  Hot. Speak Mortimer?
    Zounds, speak him, soul
    mercy join him!
    Yea, part empty veins,
    shed dear blood drop drop dust,
    lift downtrod Mortimer
    high air unthankful king,
    ingrate cank'red Bolingbroke.
  North. Brother, King hath made nephew mad.
  Wor. struck heat gone?
  Hot. (forsooth) prisoners;
    urg'd ransom again
    wive's brother, cheek look'd pale,
    face turn'd eye death,
    Trembling Mortimer.
  Wor. blame him. proclaim'd
    Richard dead is, blood?
  North. was; heard proclamation.
    unhappy King
    (Whose wrongs God pardon!) set  
    Irish expedition;
    intercepted return
    depos'd, shortly murdered.
  Wor. death world's wide mouth
    Live scandaliz'd foully spoken of.
  Hot. soft, pray you. King Richard then
    Proclaim brother Edmund Mortimer
    Heir crown?
  North. did; hear it.
  Hot. Nay, blame cousin king,
    wish'd barren mountains starve.
    you, set crown
    head forgetful man,
    sake wear detested blot
    murtherous subornation- be
    world curses undergo,
    agents base means,
    cords, ladder, hangman rather?
    O, pardon descend low
    show line predicament  
    range subtile king!
    shame spoken days,
    fill chronicles time come,
    men nobility power
    gage unjust behalf
    (As you, God pardon it! done)
    put Richard, sweet lovely rose,
    plant thorn, canker, Bolingbroke?
    shame spoken
    fool'd, discarded, shook off
    shames ye underwent?
    No! time serves redeem
    banish'd honours restore yourselves
    good thoughts world again;
    Revenge jeering disdain'd contempt
    proud king, studies day night
    answer debt owes you
    bloody payment deaths.
    say-
  Wor. Peace, cousin, more;  
    now, unclasp secret book,
    quick-conceiving discontents
    read matter deep dangerous,
    full peril adventurous spirit
    o'erwalk current roaring loud
    unsteadfast footing spear.
  Hot. fall in, good night, sink swim!
    Send danger east west,
    honour cross north south,
    grapple. O, blood stirs
    rouse lion start hare!
  North. Imagination great exploit
    Drives bounds patience.
  Hot. heaven, methinks easy leap
    pluck bright honour pale-fac'd moon,
    dive bottom deep,
    fadom line touch ground,
    pluck drowned honour locks,
    doth redeem wear
    corrival dignities;  
    half-fac'd fellowship!
  Wor. apprehends world figures here,
    form attend.
    Good cousin, give audience while.
  Hot. cry mercy.
  Wor. noble Scots
    prisoners-
  Hot. all.
    God, Scot them!
    No, Scot save soul, not.
    them, hand!
  Wor. start away.
    lend ear purposes.
    prisoners keep.
  Hot. Nay, will! flat!
    ransom Mortimer,
    Forbade tongue speak Mortimer,
    find lies asleep,
    ear holloa 'Mortimer.'
    Nay;  
    starling taught speak
    'Mortimer,' give him
    anger motion.
  Wor. Hear you, cousin, word.
  Hot. studies solemnly defy
    Save gall pinch Bolingbroke;
    sword-and-buckler Prince Wales-
    father loves not
    glad met mischance,
    poisoned pot ale.
  Wor. Farewell, kinsman. talk you
    temper'd attend.
  North. Why, wasp-stung impatient fool
    Art thou break woman's mood,
    Tying thine ear tongue thine own!
  Hot. Why, you, whipp'd scourg'd rods,
    Nettled, stung pismires hear
    vile politician, Bolingbroke.
    Richard's time- call place-
    plague it! GIoucestershire-  
    'Twas madcap Duke uncle kept-
    uncle York- bow'd knee
    king smiles, Bolingbroke-
    'S blood!
    back Ravenspurgh-
  North. Berkeley Castle.
  Hot. true.
    Why, candy deal courtesy
    fawning greyhound proffer me!
    Look, 'when infant fortune age,'
    'gentle Harry Percy,' 'kind cousin'-
    O, devil cozeners!- God forgive me!
    Good uncle, tale, done.
  Wor. Nay, not, again.
    stay leisure.
  Hot. done, i' faith.
  Wor. Scottish prisoners.
    Deliver ransom straight,
    make Douglas' son mean
    powers Scotland; which, divers reasons  
    send written, assur'd
    easily granted. [To Northumberland] You, lord,
    son Scotland employ'd,
    secretly bosom creep
    noble prelate well-belov'd,
    Archbishop.
  Hot. York, not?
  Wor. True; bears hard
    brother's death Bristow, Lord Scroop.
    speak estimation,
    be, know
    ruminated, plotted, set down,
    stays behold face
    occasion bring on.
  Hot. smell it. life, well.
  North. game afoot thou let'st slip.
  Hot. Why, choose noble plot.
    power Scotland York
    join Mortimer, ha?
  Wor. shall.  
  Hot. faith, exceedingly aim'd.
  Wor. 'tis reason bids speed,
    save heads raising head;
    For, bear can,
    King debt,
    unsatisfied,
    Till hath found time pay home.
    doth begin
    make strangers love.
  Hot. does, does! reveng'd him.
  Wor. Cousin, farewell. this
    letters direct course.
    time ripe, suddenly,
    steal Glendower Lord Mortimer,
    Douglas, pow'rs once,
    fashion it, happily meet,
    bear fortunes strong arms,
    hold uncertainty.
  North. Farewell, good brother. thrive, trust.
  Hot. Uncle, adieu. O, hours short  
    Till fields blows groans applaud sport!    Exeunt.

ACT II. Scene I.
Rochester. inn yard.

Enter Carrier lantern hand.

  1. Car. Heigh-ho! day, hang'd.
    Charles' wain chimney, horse not
    pack'd.- What, ostler!
  Ost. [within] Anon, anon.
  1. Car. prithee, Tom, beat Cut's saddle, put flocks the
    point. Poor jade wrung withers cess.

                        Enter Carrier.

  2. Car. Peas beans dank dog, the
    give poor jades bots. house turned upside
    Robin Ostler died.
  1. Car. Poor fellow joyed price oats rose. It
    death him.
  2. Car. villanous house London road
    fleas. stung tench.
  1. Car. tench mass, ne'er king christen  
    bit cock.
  2. Car. Why, ne'er jordan, leak in
    chimney, chamber-lye breeds fleas loach.
  1. Car. What, ostler! hang'd! away!
  2. Car. gammon bacon razes ginger, be
    delivered Charing Cross.
  1. Car. God's body! turkeys pannier starved.
    What, ostler! plague thee! hast thou eye thy
    head? Canst hear? 'twere good deed drink to
    break pate thee, villain. Come, hang'd!
    Hast faith thee?

                           Enter Gadshill.

  Gads. Good morrow, carriers. o'clock?
  1. Car. o'clock.
  Gads. prithee lend lantern gelding the
    stable.
  1. Car. Nay, God, soft! trick worth that,
    i' faith.  
  Gads. pray thee lend thine.
  2. Car. Ay, when? canst tell? Lend thy lantern, quoth he? Marry,
    thee hang'd first!
  Gads. Sirrah carrier, time London?
  2. Car. Time bed candle, warrant thee.
    Come, neighbour Mugs, call gentlemen. will
    company, great charge.
                                              Exeunt [Carriers].
  Gads. What, ho! chamberlain!

                            Enter Chamberlain.

  Cham. hand, quoth pickpurse.
  Gads. fair as- 'at hand, quoth chamberlain'; for
    thou variest picking purses giving direction
    doth labouring: thou layest plot how.
  Cham. Good morrow, Master Gadshill. holds current told
    yesternight. franklin Wild Kent hath
    brought hundred marks gold. heard it
    company night supper- kind auditor;  
    hath abundance charge too, God what. are
    call eggs butter. away
    presently.
  Gads. Sirrah, meet Saint Nicholas' clerks, I'll
    give thee neck.
  Cham. No, it. pray thee hangman;
    thou worshippest Saint Nicholas man of
    falsehood may.
  Gads. talkest thou hangman? hang, make
    fat pair gallows; hang, Sir John hangs me,
    thou knowest starveling. Tut! other
    Troyans thou dream'st of, sport sake are
    content profession grace; (if matters
    look'd into) credit sake make whole.
    joined foot land-rakers, long-staff sixpenny
    strikers, mad mustachio purple-hued maltworms; but
    nobility, tranquillity, burgomasters great oneyers,
    hold in, strike sooner speak, and
    speak sooner drink, drink sooner pray; yet,
    zounds, lie; pray continually saint,  
    commonwealth, rather, pray her, prey her, for
    ride make boots.
  Cham. What, commonwealth boots? hold water
    foul way?
  Gads. will, will! Justice hath liquor'd her. steal in
    castle, cocksure. receipt fernseed, walk
    invisible.
  Cham. Nay, faith, beholding night
    fernseed walking invisible.
  Gads. Give thy hand. Thou shalt share purchase, as
    true man.
  Cham. Nay, it, false thief.
  Gads. to; 'homo' common men. Bid ostler
    bring gelding stable. Farewell, muddy knave.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene II.
The highway Gadshill.

Enter Prince Poins.

  Poins. Come, shelter, shelter! remov'd Falstaff's horse, and
    frets gumm'd velvet.
  Prince. Stand close.                        [They step aside.]

                             Enter Falstaff.

  Fal. Poins! Poins, hang'd! Poins!
  Prince. forward Peace, ye fat-kidney'd rascal! a
    brawling dost thou keep!
  Fal. Poins, Hal?
  Prince. walk'd top hill. seek him.
                                                  [Steps aside.]
  Fal. accurs'd rob thief's company. rascal hath
    removed horse tied where. travel but
    foot squire afoot, break wind.
    Well, doubt die fair death this, I
    scape hanging killing rogue. forsworn company  
    hourly time two-and-twenty years, bewitch'd
    rogue's company. rascal me
    medicines make love him, hang'd. be
    else. drunk medicines. Poins! Hal! plague both!
    Bardolph! Peto! starve ere rob foot further. An
    'twere good deed drink turn true man leave
    rogues, veriest varlet chewed a
    tooth. yards uneven ground threescore ten miles
    afoot me, stony-hearted villains well
    enough. plague thieves true to
    another! (They whistle.) Whew! plague all! Give my
    horse, rogues! give horse hang'd!
  Prince. [comes forward] Peace, ye fat-guts! Lie down, lay thine ear
    close ground, list thou canst hear tread of
    travellers.
  Fal. levers lift again, down? 'Sblood,
    bear mine flesh afoot coin
    thy father's exchequer. plague ye colt thus?
  Prince. Thou liest; thou art colted, thou art uncolted.
  Fal. prithee, good Prince Hal, horse, good king's  
    son.
  Prince. Out, ye rogue! ostler?
  Fal. hang thyself thine heir-apparent garters! be
    ta'en, peach this. ballads made you
    all, sung filthy tunes, cup sack poison.
    jest forward- afoot too- hate it.

             Enter Gadshill, [Bardolph Peto him].

  Gads. Stand!
  Fal. do, will.
  Poins. [comes fortward] O, 'tis setter. voice.
    Bardolph, news?
  Bar. Case ye, case ye! vizards! money the
    King's coming hill; 'tis King's exchequer.
  Fal. lie, ye rogue! 'Tis King's tavern.
  Gads. make all.
  Fal. hang'd.
  Prince. Sirs, front narrow lane; Ned
    Poins walk lower. scape encounter,  
    light us.
  Peto. them?
  Gads. ten.
  Fal. Zounds, rob us?
  Prince. What, coward, Sir John Paunch?
  Fal. Indeed, John Gaunt, grandfather; no
    coward, Hal.
  Prince. Well, leave proof.
  Poins. Sirrah Jack, thy horse stands hedge. thou
    need'st him, thou shalt find him. Farewell stand fast.
  Fal. strike him, hang'd.
  Prince. [aside Poins] Ned, disguises?
  Poins. [aside Prince] Here, hard by. Stand close.
                                      [Exeunt Prince Poins.]
  Fal. Now, masters, happy man dole, I. man to
    business.

                         Enter Travellers.

  Traveller. Come, neighbour.  
    boy lead horses hill;
    walk afoot awhile ease legs.
  Thieves. Stand!
  Traveller. Jesus bless us!
  Fal. Strike! them! cut villains' throats! Ah,
    whoreson caterpillars! bacon-fed knaves! hate youth. Down
    them! fleece them!
  Traveller. O, undone, ever!
  Fal. Hang ye, gorbellied knaves, ye undone? No, ye fat chuffs;
    store here! On, bacons on! What, ye knaves!
    young men live. grandjurors, ye? jure ye,
    faith!
                            rob bind them. Exeunt.

            Enter Prince Poins [in buckram suits].

  Prince. thieves bound true men. thou I
    rob thieves merrily London, argument
    week, laughter month, good jest ever.
  Poins. Stand close! hear coming.  
                                             [They stand aside.]

                       Enter Thieves again.

  Fal. Come, masters, share, horse day.
    Prince Poins arrant cowards, no
    equity stirring. valour Poins a
    wild duck.

        [As sharing, Prince Poins set upon
        them. run away, Falstaff, blow or
        two, runs awasy too, leaving booty them.]

  Prince. money!
  Poins. Villains!

  Prince. ease. merrily horse.
    thieves scattered, possess'd fear
    strongly dare meet other.
    takes fellow officer.  
    Away, good Ned. Falstaff sweats death
    lards lean earth walks along.
    Were't laughing, pity him.
  Poins. rogue roar'd!                           Exeunt.




Scene III.
Warkworth Castle.

Enter Hotspur solus, reading letter.

  Hot. 'But, mine part, lord, contented to
    there, respect love bear house.' be
    contented- then? respect love bears
    house! shows loves barn he
    loves house. more. 'The purpose undertake
    dangerous'- Why, certain! 'Tis dangerous a
    cold, sleep, drink; you, lord fool, of
    nettle, danger, pluck flower, safety. 'The purpose
    undertake dangerous, friends named uncertain,
    time unsorted, plot light the
    counterpoise great opposition.' so, so?
    again, shallow, cowardly hind, you
    lie. lack-brain this! Lord, plot good
    plot laid; friends true constant: good
    plot, good friends, full expectation; excellent plot,
    good friends. frosty-spirited rogue this! Why, my
    Lord York commends plot general  
    action. Zounds, rascal, brain him
    lady's fan. father, uncle, and
    myself; Lord Edmund Mortimer, Lord York, Owen
    Glendower? not, besides, Douglas? all
    letters meet arms ninth month,
    set forward already? pagan
    rascal this! infidel! Ha! now, very
    sincerity fear cold heart King lay open
    proceedings. O, divide buffets
    moving dish skim milk honourable action!
    Hang him, King! prepared. set
    forward to-night.

                         Enter Lady.

    now, Kate? leave hours.
  Lady. O good lord, alone?
    offence fortnight been
    banish'd woman Harry's bed,
    me, sweet lord, is't takes thee  
    Thy stomach, pleasure, thy golden sleep?
    dost thou bend thine eyes earth,
    start thou sit'st alone?
    hast thou lost fresh blood thy cheeks
    treasures rights thee
    thick-ey'd musing curs'd melancholy?
    thy faint slumbers thee watch'd,
    heard thee murmur tales iron wars,
    Speak terms manage thy bounding steed,
    Cry 'Courage! field!' thou hast talk'd
    sallies retires, trenches, tent,
    palisadoes, frontiers, parapets,
    basilisks, cannon, culverin,
    prisoners' ransom, soldiers slain,
    currents heady fight.
    Thy spirit thee hath war,
    hath bestirr'd thee thy sleep,
    beads sweat stood thy brow
    bubbles ill late-disturbed stream,
    thy face strange motions appear'd,  
    men restrain breath
    great sudden hest. O, portents these?
    heavy business hath lord hand,
    it, loves not.
  Hot. What, ho!

                    [Enter Servant.]

    Gilliams packet gone?
  Serv. is, lord, hour ago.
  Hot. Hath Butler brought horses sheriff?
  Serv. horse, lord, brought now.
  Hot. horse? roan, crop-ear, not?
  Serv. is, lord.
  Hot. roan throne.
    Well, back straight. O esperance!
    Bid Butler lead park.
                                                 [Exit Servant.]
  Lady. hear you, lord.
  Hot. say'st thou, lady?  
  Lady. carries away?
  Hot. Why, horse, love- horse!
  Lady. Out, mad-headed ape!
    weasel hath deal spleen
    toss'd with. faith,
    business, Harry; will!
    fear brother Mortimer doth stir
    title hath you
    line enterprise; go-
  Hot. afoot, weary, love.
  Lady. Come, come, paraquito, answer me
    Directly question ask.
    break thy finger, Harry,
    thou wilt things true.
  Hot. Away.
    Away, trifler! Love? love thee not;
    care thee, Kate. world
    play mammets tilt lips.
    bloody noses crack'd crowns,
    pass current too. Gods me, horse!  
    say'st thou, Kate? wouldst thou me?
  Lady. love me? indeed?
    Well, then; love not,
    love myself. love me?
    Nay, speak jest no.
  Hot. Come, wilt thou ride?
    a-horseback, swear
    love thee infinitely. hark you. Kate:
    henceforth question me
    go, reason whereabout.
    must, must; conclude,
    evening leave you, gentle Kate.
    wise; farther wise
    Harry Percy's wife; constant are,
    woman; secrecy,
    lady closer, believe
    Thou wilt utter thou dost know,
    trust thee, gentle Kate.
  Lady. How? far?
  Hot. inch further. hark you, Kate:  
    go, thither too;
    To-day set forth, to-morrow you.
    content you, Kate,?
  Lady. force.                                Exeunt.




Scene IV.
Eastcheap. Boar's Head Tavern.

Enter Prince Poins.

  Prince. Ned, prithee fat-room lend thy hand
    laugh little.
  Poins. hast been, Hal?
    Prince,. loggerheads or
    fourscore hogsheads. sounded bass-string of
    humility. Sirrah, sworn brother leash drawers and
    call christen names, Tom, Dick, and
    Francis. salvation that, though
    Prince Wales, king courtesy; tell
    flatly proud Jack Falstaff, Corinthian, a
    lad mettle, good boy (by Lord, call me!), and
    King England command good lads
    Eastcheap. call drinking deep, dying scarlet; when
    breathe watering, cry 'hem!' bid play it
    off. conclude, good proficient quarter an
    hour drink tinker language during
    life. thee, Ned, thou hast lost honour thou
    wert action. But, sweet Ned- sweeten  
    Ned, give thee pennyworth sugar, clapp'd even
    hand under-skinker, spake other
    English life 'Eight shillings sixpence,' 'You
    welcome,' shrill addition, 'Anon, anon, sir! Score
    pint bastard Half-moon,' so- but, Ned, drive
    time till Falstaff come, prithee thou stand some
    by-room question puny drawer end gave me
    sugar; thou leave calling 'Francis!' his
    tale 'Anon!' Step aside, show
    thee precedent.
  Poins. Francis!
  Prince. Thou art perfect.
  Poins. Francis!                                  [Exit Poins.]

                    Enter [Francis, a] Drawer.

  Fran. Anon, anon, sir.- Pomgarnet, Ralph.
  Prince. hither, Francis.
  Fran. lord?
  Prince. long hast thou serve, Francis?  
  Fran. Forsooth, years, to-
  Poins. [within] Francis!
  Fran. Anon, anon, sir.
  Prince. year! by'r Lady, long lease clinking of
    Pewter. But, Francis, darest thou valiant play the
    coward thy indenture show fair pair heels and
    run it?
  Fran. O Lord, sir, sworn books England I
    find heart-
  Poins. [within] Francis!
  Fran. Anon, sir.
  Prince. art thou, Francis?
  Fran. see. Michaelmas be-
  Poins. [within] Francis!
  Fran. Anon, sir. Pray stay little, lord.
  Prince. Nay, hark you, Francis. sugar thou gavest me-
    'twas pennyworth, wast not?
  Fran. O Lord! two!
  Prince. give thee thousand pound. thou
    wilt, and, thou shalt it.  
  Poins. [within] Francis!
  Fran. Anon, anon.
  Prince. Anon, Francis? No, Francis; to-morrow, Francis; or,
    Francis, Thursday; indeed, Francis, thou wilt. But
    Francis-
  Fran. lord?
  Prince. Wilt thou rob leathern-jerkin, crystal-button,
    not-pated, agate-ring, puke-stocking, caddis-garter,
    smooth-tongue, Spanish-pouch-
  Fran. O Lord, sir, mean?
  Prince. then, brown bastard drink; look
    you, Francis, white canvas doublet sully. Barbary,
    sir, much.
  Fran. What, sir?
  Poins. [within] Francis!
  Prince. Away, rogue! Dost thou hear call?
              call him. Drawer stands amazed,
                                    knowing go.

                         Enter Vintner.  

  Vint. What, stand'st thou still, hear'st calling? Look
    guests within. [Exit Francis.] lord, Sir John, with
    half-a-dozen more, door. in?
  Prince. awhile, open door.
                                                  [Exit Vintner.]
    Poins!
  Poins. [within] Anon, anon, sir.

                          Enter Poins.

  Prince. Sirrah, Falstaff rest thieves the
    door. merry?
  Poins. merry crickets, lad. hark ye; cunning
    match made jest drawer? Come, what's
    issue?
  Prince. humours showed humours
    days goodman Adam pupil age this
    present twelve o'clock midnight.
  
                         [Enter Francis.]

    o'clock, Francis?
  Fran. Anon, anon, sir.                                 [Exit.]
  Prince. fellow fewer words a
    parrot, son woman! industry upstairs and
    downstairs, eloquence parcel reckoning. yet
    Percy's mind, Hotspur North; kills some
    dozen Scots breakfast, washes hands, and
    wife, 'Fie quiet life! work.' 'O my
    sweet Harry,' she, 'how hast thou  kill'd to-day?'
    'Give roan horse drench,' he, answers 'Some
    fourteen,' hour after, 'a trifle, trifle.' prithee call in
    Falstaff. play Percy, damn'd brawn play Dame
    Mortimer wife. 'Rivo!' drunkard. Call ribs, call
    tallow.

           Enter Falstaff, [Gadshill, Bardolph, Peto;
                   Francis wine].
  
  Poins. Welcome, Jack. hast thou been?
  Fal. plague cowards, say, vengeance too! Marry and
    amen! Give cup sack, boy. Ere lead life long, I'll
    sew nether-stocks, mend foot too. plague of
    cowards! Give cup sack, rogue. virtue
    extant?
                                                    drinketh.
  Prince. Didst thou Titan kiss dish butter?
    Pitiful-hearted butter, melted sweet tale sun!
    thou didst, behold compound.
  Fal. rogue, lime sack too! but
    roguery found villanous man. coward worse than
    cup sack lime it- villanous coward! thy ways,
    Jack, die thou wilt; manhood, good manhood, not
    forgot face earth, shotten herring.
    lives good men unhang'd England; of
    fat, grows old. God while! bad world, I
    say. weaver; sing psalms anything. A
    plague cowards still!
  Prince. now, woolsack? mutter you?  
  Fal. king's son! beat thee thy kingdom a
    dagger lath drive thy subjects afore thee flock
    wild geese, wear hair face more. Prince
    Wales?
  Prince. Why, whoreson round man, matter?
  Fal. coward? Answer that- Poins there?
  Poins. Zounds, ye fat paunch, ye call coward, the
    Lord, stab thee.
  Fal. call thee coward? thee damn'd ere call thee
    coward, give thousand pound run fast as
    thou canst. straight shoulders; care
    sees back. Call backing friends? A
    plague backing! Give face me. Give me
    cup sack. rogue drunk to-day.
  Prince. O villain! thy lips scarce wip'd thou drunk'st
    last.
  Fal. that. (He drinketh.) plague cowards
    I.
  Prince. matter?
  Fal. matter? ta'en  
    thousand pound day morning.
  Prince. it, Jack? it?
  Fal. it, is. hundred poor of
    us!
  Prince. What, hundred, man?
  Fal. rogue half-sword dozen them
    hours together. scap'd miracle. times
    thrust doublet, hose; buckler cut
    through; sword hack'd handsaw- ecce signum!
    dealt man. do. A
    plague cowards! speak, speak less
    truth, villains sons darkness.
  Prince. Speak, sirs. it?
  Gads. set dozen-
  Fal. Sixteen least, lord.
  Gads. bound them.
  Peto. No, no, bound.
  Fal. rogue, bound, man them, Jew
    else- Ebrew Jew.
  Gads. sharing, fresh men sea us-  
  Fal. unbound rest, other.
  Prince. What, fought all?
  Fal. All? call all, fought with
    fifty them, bunch radish! or
    fifty poor Jack, two-legg'd
    creature.
  Prince. Pray God murd'red them.
  Fal. Nay, past praying for. pepper'd them. Two
    paid, rogues buckram suits. thee
    what, Hal- thee lie, spit face, call horse.
    Thou knowest ward. lay, bore point.
    rogues buckram drive me.
  Prince. What, four? Thou saidst now.
  Fal. Four, Hal. told thee four.
  Poins. Ay, ay, four.
  Fal. afront thrust me. made me
    ado points target, thus.
  Prince. Seven? Why, now.
  Fal. buckram?
  Poins. Ay, four, buckram suits.  
  Fal. Seven, hilts, villain else.
  Prince. [aside Poins] Prithee alone. more
    anon.
  Fal. Dost thou hear me, Hal?
  Prince. Ay, mark thee too, Jack.
  Fal. so, worth list'ning to. buckram
    told thee of-
  Prince. So, already.
  Fal. points broken-
  Poins. fell hose.
  Fal. Began give ground; close, in,
    foot hand, thought eleven paid.
  Prince. O monstrous! Eleven buckram men grown two!
  Fal. But, devil it, misbegotten knaves in
    Kendal green back drive me; so
    dark, Hal, thou couldst thy hand.
  Prince. lies father begets them- gross as
    mountain, open, palpable. Why, thou clay-brain'd guts, thou
    knotty-pated fool, thou whoreson obscene greasy tallow-catch-
  Fal. What, art thou mad? art thou mad? truth truth?  
  Prince. Why, couldst thou men Kendal green when
    dark thou couldst thy hand? Come, your
    reason. sayest thou this?
  Poins. Come, reason, Jack, reason.
  Fal. What, compulsion? Zounds, strappado or
    racks world, compulsion.
    Give reason compulsion? reasons plentiful as
    blackberries, give man reason compulsion, I.
  Prince. longer guilty, sin; sanguine
    coward, bed-presser, horseback-breaker, huge hill
    flesh-
  Fal. 'Sblood, starveling, elf-skin, dried
    neat's-tongue, bull's sizzle, stockfish- O breath to
    utter thee!- tailor's yard, sheath, you
    bowcase, vile standing tuck!
  Prince. Well, breathe awhile, again; thou
    hast tired thyself base comparisons, hear speak this.
  Poins. Mark, Jack.
  Prince. set four, bound were
    masters wealth. Mark plain tale put  
    down. set and, word, outfac'd
    prize, it; yea, show here
    house. And, Falstaff, carried guts as
    nimbly, quick dexterity, roar'd mercy, still
    run roar'd, heard bullcalf. slave art thou
    hack thy sword thou hast done, in
    fight! trick, device, starting hole canst thou now
    find hide thee open apparent shame?
  Poins. Come, hear, Jack. trick hast thou now?
  Fal. Lord, knew ye made ye. Why, hear
    you, masters. kill heir apparent? Should
    turn true prince? Why, thou knowest valiant as
    Hercules; beware instinct. lion touch true
    prince. Instinct great matter. coward on
    instinct. myself, thee, my
    life- valiant lion, thou true prince. But, by
    Lord, lads, glad money. Hostess, clap to
    doors. Watch to-night, pray to-morrow. Gallants, lads, boys,
    hearts gold, titles good fellowship you!
    What, merry? play extempore?  
  Prince. Content- argument thy running away.
  Fal. Ah, that, Hal, thou lovest me!

                             Enter Hostess.

  Host. O Jesu, lord Prince!
  Prince. now, lady hostess? say'st thou me?
  Host. Marry, lord, nobleman court door
    speak you. father.
  Prince. Give make royal man, send him
    back mother.
  Fal. manner man he?
  Host. man.
  Fal. doth gravity bed midnight? give him
    answer?
  Prince. Prithee do, Jack.
  Fal. Faith, send packing.
Exit.
  Prince. Now, sirs. By'r Lady, fought fair; you, Peto; so
    you, Bardolph. lions too, ran instinct,  
    touch true prince; no- fie!
  Bard. Faith, ran run.
  Prince. earnest, Falstaff's sword so
    hack'd?
  Peto. Why, hack'd dagger, swear
    truth England make in
    fight, persuaded like.
  Bard. Yea, tickle noses speargrass make them
    bleed, beslubber garments swear it
    blood true men. year
    before- blush'd hear monstrous devices.
  Prince. O villain! thou stolest cup sack eighteen years ago
    wert manner, thou hast blush'd
    extempore. Thou hadst fire sword thy side, thou
    ran'st away. instinct hadst thou it?
  Bard. lord, meteors? behold these
    exhalations?
  Prince. do.
  Bard. portend?
  Prince. Hot livers cold purses.  
  Bard. Choler, lord, rightly taken.
  Prince. No, rightly taken, halter.

                         Enter Falstaff.

    lean Jack; bare-bone. now, sweet
    creature bombast? long is't ago, Jack, thou sawest
    thine knee?
  Fal. knee? thy years, Hal, an
    eagle's talent waist; crept any
    alderman's thumb-ring. plague sighing grief! blows a
    man bladder. villanous news abroad. was
    Sir John Bracy father. court the
    morning. mad fellow North, Percy, of
    Wales gave Amamon bastinado, made Lucifer cuckold,
    swore devil true liegeman cross Welsh
    hook- plague call him?
  Poins. O, Glendower.
  Fal. Owen, Owen- same; son-in-law Mortimer, old
    Northumberland, sprightly Scot Scots, Douglas,  
    runs a-horseback hill perpendicular-
  Prince. rides high speed pistol kills a
    sparrow flying.
  Fal. hit it.
  Prince. sparrow.
  Fal. Well, rascal hath good metal him; run.
  Prince. Why, rascal art thou then, praise for
    running!
  Fal. A-horseback, ye cuckoo! afoot budge foot.
  Prince. Yes, Jack, instinct.
  Fal. grant ye, instinct. Well, too, one
    Mordake, thousand bluecaps more. Worcester stol'n away
    to-night; thy father's beard turn'd white news; you
    buy land cheap stinking mack'rel.
  Prince. then, like, hot June, this
    civil buffeting hold, buy maidenheads buy
    hobnails, hundreds.
  Fal. mass, lad, thou sayest true; have
    good trading way. me, Hal, art thou horrible
    afeard? Thou heir apparent, world pick thee  
    enemies fiend Douglas, spirit
    Percy, devil Glendower? Art thou horribly afraid?
    Doth thy blood thrill it?
  Prince. whit, i' faith. lack thy instinct.
  Fal. Well, thou wilt horribly chid to-morrow thou comest to
    thy father. thou love file, practise answer.
  Prince. thou stand father examine the
    particulars life.
  Fal. I? Content. chair state, dagger my
    sceptre, cushion my, crown.
  Prince. Thy state join'd-stool, thy golden sceptre
    leaden dagger, thy precious rich crown pitiful
    bald crown.
  Fal. Well, fire grace thee, shalt
    thou moved. Give cup sack make eyes red,
    thought wept; speak passion,
    King Cambyses' vein.
  Prince. Well, leg.
  Fal. speech. Stand aside, nobility.
  Host. O Jesu, excellent sport, i' faith!  
  Fal. Weep not, sweet queen, trickling tears vain.
  Host. O, Father, holds countenance!
  Fal. God's sake, lords, convey tristful queen!
    tears stop floodgates eyes.
  Host. O Jesu, doth harlotry players as
    see!
  Fal. Peace, good pintpot. Peace, good tickle-brain.- Harry, do
    marvel thou spendest thy time, thou
    art accompanied. camomile, trodden
    on, faster grows, youth, wasted, the
    sooner wears. thou art son partly thy mother's
    word, partly opinion, chiefly villanous trick of
    thine eye foolish hanging thy nether lip doth
    warrant me. thou son me, lies point: why,
    son me, art thou pointed at? blessed sun of
    heaven prove micher eat blackberries? question be
    ask'd. son England prove thief purses? A
    question ask'd. thing, Harry, thou hast
    heard of, land name
    pitch. pitch, ancient writers report, doth defile;  
    doth company thou keepest. For, Harry, speak
    thee drink, tears; pleasure, passion;
    words only, woes also: virtuous
    man noted thy company,  his
    name.
  Prince. manner man, Majesty?
  Fal. goodly portly man, i' faith, corpulent; cheerful
    look, pleasing eye, noble carriage; and, think,
    age fifty, or, by'r Lady, inclining threescore; and
    remember me, Falstaff. man be
    lewdly, given, deceiveth me; for, Harry, virtue his
    looks. tree fruit, fruit
    tree, then, peremptorily speak it, virtue in
    Falstaff. with, rest banish. now,
    thou naughty varlet, hast thou month?
  Prince. Dost thou speak king? thou stand me, I'll
    play father.
  Fal. Depose me? thou dost half gravely, majestically,
    word matter, hang heels a
    rabbit-sucker poulter's hare.  
  Prince. Well, set.
  Fal. stand. Judge, masters.
  Prince. Now, Harry, you?
  Fal. noble lord, Eastcheap.
  Prince. complaints hear thee grievous.
  Fal. 'Sblood, lord, false! Nay, tickle ye a
    young prince, i' faith.
  Prince. Swearest thou, ungracious boy? Henceforth ne'er me.
    Thou art violently carried grace. devil
    haunts thee likeness fat man; tun man is
    thy companion. dost thou converse trunk humours,
    bolting hutch beastliness, swoll'n parcel of
    dropsies, huge bombard sack, stuff'd cloakbag of
    guts, roasted Manningtree ox pudding belly,
    reverend vice, grey iniquity, father ruffian, that
    vanity years? good, taste sack drink
    it? neat cleanly, carve capon eat it?
    cunning, craft? crafty, villany?
    villanous, things? worthy, in
    nothing?  
  Fal. Grace you. means your
    Grace?
  Prince. villanous abominable misleader youth, Falstaff,
    white-bearded Satan.
  Fal. lord, man know.
  Prince. thou dost.
  Fal. harm say
    know. (the pity) white
    hairs witness it; (saving reverence) a
    whoremaster, utterly deny. sack sugar fault,
    God wicked! merry sin, many
    host damn'd. fat hated,
    Pharaoh's lean kine loved. No, good lord.
    Banish Peto, banish Bardolph, banish Poins; sweet Jack
    Falstaff, kind Jack Falstaff, true Jack Falstaff, valiant Jack
    Falstaff, valiant being, is, Jack
    Falstaff, banish thy Harry's company, banish thy
    Harry's company. Banish plump Jack, banish world!
  Prince. do, will.                      [A knocking heard.]
                        [Exeunt Hostess, Francis, Bardolph.]  

                     Enter Bardolph, running.

  Bard. O, lord, lord! sheriff monstrous watch
    door.
  Fal. Out, ye rogue! Play play. the
    behalf Falstaff.

                       Enter Hostess.

  Host. O Jesu, lord, lord!
  Prince. Heigh, heigh, devil rides fiddlestick!
    matter?
  Host. sheriff watch door. come
    search house. in?
  Fal. Dost thou hear, Hal? call true piece gold a
    counterfeit. Thou art essentially mad so.
  Prince. thou natural coward instinct.
  Fal. deny major. deny sheriff, so; not,
    enter. cart man,  
    plague bringing up! hope strangled
    halter another.
  Prince. hide thee arras. rest walk, above.
    Now, masters, true face good conscience.
  Fal. had; date out, therefore
    hide me.                                          Exit.
  Prince. Call sheriff.
                            [Exeunt Manent Prince Peto.]

                    Enter Sheriff Carrier.

    Now, Master Sheriff, me?
  Sher. First, pardon me, lord. hue cry
    Hath men house.
  Prince. men?
  Sher. known, gracious lord-
    gross fat man.
  Carrier. fat butter.
  Prince. man, assure you, here,
    time employ'd him.  
    And, sheriff, engage word thee
    to-morrow dinner time
    Send answer thee, man,
    charg'd withal;
    entreat leave house.
  Sher. will, lord. gentlemen
    robbery lost hundred marks.
  Prince. so. robb'd men,
    answerable; farewell.
  Sher. Good night, noble lord.
  Prince. good morrow, not?
  Sher. Indeed, lord, o'clock.
                                            Exit [with Carrier].
  Prince. oily rascal Paul's. call him
    forth.
  Peto. Falstaff! Fast asleep arras, snorting a
    horse.
  Prince. Hark hard fetches breath. Search pockets.
            searcheth pockets findeth papers.
    hast thou found?  
  Peto. papers, lord.
  Prince. whit be. Read them.

  Peto. [reads] 'Item. capon. . . . . . . . . . . . .  ii s. ii d.
                 Item, Sauce. . . . . . . . . . . . . .      iiii d.
                 Item, Sack gallons . . . . . . . . v s. viii d.
                 Item, Anchovies sack supper.  ii s. vi d.
                 Item, Bread. . . . . . . . . . . . . .          ob.'

  Prince. O monstrous! halfpennyworth bread this
    intolerable deal sack! else, close; we'll
    read advantage. sleep till day. to
    court morning . wars. thy place
    honourable. procure fat rogue charge of
    foot; know, death march twelve score. The
    money paid back advantage. betimes
    morning, good morrow, Peto.
  Peto. Good morrow, good lord.
                                                         Exeunt.

ACT III. Scene I.
Bangor. Archdeacon's house.

Enter Hotspur, Worcester, Lord Mortimer, Owen Glendower.

  Mort. promises fair, parties sure,
    induction full prosperous hope.
  Hot. Lord Mortimer, cousin Glendower,
    sit down?
    uncle Worcester. plague it!
    forgot map.
  Glend. No, is.
    Sit, cousin Percy; sit, good cousin Hotspur,
    oft Lancaster
    Doth speak you, cheek pale, with
    rising sigh wisheth heaven.
  Hot. hell, oft hears
    Owen Glendower spoke of.
  Glend. blame him. nativity
    front heaven full fiery shapes
    burning cressets, birth
    frame huge foundation earth  
    Shak'd coward.
  Hot. Why, season, your
    mother's cat kitten'd, been
    born.
  Glend. earth shake born.
  Hot. earth mind,
    suppose fearing shook.
  Glend. heavens fire, earth tremble.
  Hot. O, earth shook heavens fire,
    fear nativity.
    Diseased nature oftentimes breaks forth
    strange eruptions; oft teeming earth
    kind colic pinch'd vex'd
    imprisoning unruly wind
    womb, which, enlargement striving,
    Shakes beldame earth topples down
    Steeples mossgrown towers. birth
    grandam earth, distemp'rature,
    passion shook.
  Glend. Cousin, men  
    bear crossings. Give leave
    birth
    front heaven full fiery shapes,
    goats ran mountains, herds
    strangely clamorous frighted fields.
    signs mark'd extraordinary,
    courses life show
    roll common men.
    living, clipp'd sea
    chides banks England, Scotland, Wales,
    calls pupil hath read me?
    bring woman's son
    trace tedious ways art
    hold pace deep experiments.
  Hot. man speaks Welsh. dinner.
  Mort. Peace, cousin Percy; make mad.
  Glend. call spirits vasty deep.
  Hot. Why, I, man;
    call them?
  Glend. Why, teach you, cousin, command devil.  
  Hot. teach thee, coz, shame devil-
    telling truth. truth shame devil.
    thou power raise him, bring hither,
    sworn power shame hence.
    O, live, truth shame devil!
  Mort. Come, come, unprofitable chat.
  Glend. times hath Henry Bolingbroke made head
    power; thrice banks Wye
    sandy-bottom'd Severn him
    Bootless home weather-beaten back.
  Hot. Home boots, foul weather too?
    scapes agues, devil's name
  Glend. Come, map. divide right
    threefold order ta'en?
  Mort. Archdeacon hath divided it
    limits equally.
    England, Trent Severn hitherto,
    south east part assign'd;
    westward, Wales Severn shore,
    fertile land bound,  
    Owen Glendower; and, dear coz, you
    remnant northward lying Trent.
    indentures tripartite drawn;
    sealed interchangeably
    (A business night execute),
    To-morrow, cousin Percy, I
    good Lord Worcester set forth
    meet father Scottish bower,
    appointed us, Shrewsbury.
    father Glendower ready yet,
    fourteen days.
    [To Glend.] space drawn together
    tenants, friends, neighbouring gentlemen.
  Glend. shorter time send you, lords;
    conduct ladies come,
    steal leave,
    world water shed
    parting wives you.
  Hot. Methinks moiety, north Burton here,
    quantity equals yours.  
    river cranking in
    cuts land
    huge half-moon, monstrous cantle out.
    current ill place damm'd up,
    smug sliver Trent run
    channel fair evenly.
    wind deep indent
    rob rich bottom here.
  Glend. wind? shall, must! doth.
  Mort. Yea, but
    Mark bears course, runs up
    advantage side,
    Gelding opposed continent much
    side takes you.
  Wor. Yea, charge trench here
    north side win cape land;
    runs straight even.
  Hot. so. charge it.
  Glend. alt'red.
  Hot. you?  
  Glend. No, not.
  Hot. nay?
  Glend. No, I.
  Hot. understand then; speak Welsh.
  Glend. speak English, lord, you;
    train'd English court,
    Where, young, framed harp
    English ditty lovely well,
    gave tongue helpful ornament-
    virtue you.
  Hot. Marry,
    glad heart!
    kitten cry mew
    metre ballet-mongers.
    hear brazen canstick turn'd
    dry wheel grate axletree,
    set teeth edge,
    mincing poetry.
    'Tis forc'd gait shuffling nag,
  Glend. Come, Trent turn'd.  
  Hot. care. give thrice land
    well-deserving friend;
    bargain, mark ye me,
    cavil ninth part hair
    indentures drawn? gone?
  Glend. moon shines fair; night.
    haste writer, withal
    Break wives departure hence.
    afraid daughter run mad,
    doteth Mortimer.                    Exit.
  Mort. Fie, cousin Percy! cross father!
  Hot. choose. angers me
    telling moldwarp ant,
    dreamer Merlin prophecies,
    dragon finless fish,
    clip-wing'd griffin moulten raven,
    couching lion ramping cat,
    deal skimble-skamble stuff
    puts faith. what-
    held night hours  
    reckoning devils' names
    lackeys. cried 'hum,' 'Well, to!'
    mark'd word. O, tedious
    tired horse, railing wife;
    Worse smoky house. live
    cheese garlic windmill far
    feed cates talk me
    summer house Christendom).
  Mort. faith, worthy gentleman,
    Exceedingly read, profited
    strange concealments, valiant lion,
    wondrous affable, bountiful
    mines India. you, cousin?
    holds temper high respect
    curbs natural scope
    'cross humour. Faith, does.
    warrant man alive
    tempted done
    taste danger reproof.
    oft, entreat you.  
  Wor. faith, lord, wilful-blame,
    coming enough
    put patience.
    learn, lord, amend fault.
    show greatness, courage, blood-
    dearest grace renders you-
    oftentimes doth present harsh rage,
    Defect manners, government,
    Pride, haughtiness, opinion, disdain;
    haunting nobleman
    Loseth men's hearts, leaves stain
    beauty parts besides,
    Beguiling commendation.
  Hot. Well, school'd. Good manners speed!
    wives, leave.

            Enter Glendower Ladies.

  Mort. deadly spite angers me-
    wife speak English, Welsh.  
  Glend. daughter weeps; part you;
    soldier too, wars.
  Mort. Good father, aunt Percy
    follow conduct speedily.
               Glendower speaks Welsh, answers
                                                same.
  Glend. desperate here. peevish self-will'd harlotry,
    persuasion good upon.
                                       Lady speaks Welsh.
  Mort. understand thy looks. pretty Welsh
    thou pourest swelling heavens
    perfect in; and, shame,
    Barley answer thee.
                                        Lady Welsh.
    understand thy kisses, thou mine,
    feeling disputation.
    truant, love,
    Till learnt thy language: thy tongue
    Makes Welsh sweet ditties highly penn'd,
    Sung fair queen summer's bow'r,  
    ravishing division, lute.
  Glend. Nay, melt, run mad.
                                 Lady speaks Welsh.
  Mort. O, ignorance this!
  Glend. bids wanton rushes lay down
    rest gentle head lap,
    sing song pleaseth you
    eyelids crown god sleep,
    Charming blood pleasing heaviness,
    Making difference 'twixt wake sleep
    difference betwixt day night
    hour heavenly-harness'd team
    Begins golden progress East.
  Mort. heart sit hear sing.
    time book, think, drawn.
  Glend. so,
    musicians play you
    Hang air thousand leagues hence,
    straight here. Sit, attend.
  Hot. Come, Kate, thou art perfect lying down. Come, quick,  
    quick, lay head thy lap.
  Lady P. Go, ye giddy goose.
                                                music plays.
  Hot. perceive devil understands Welsh;
    'tis marvel, humorous.
    By'r Lady, good musician.
  Lady P. musical; are
    altogether govern'd humours. Lie still, ye thief, hear the
    lady sing Welsh.
  Hot. hear Lady, brach, howl Irish.
  Lady P. Wouldst thou thy head broken?
  Hot. No.
  Lady P. still.
  Hot. Neither! 'Tis woman's fault.
  Lady P. God thee!
  Hot. Welsh lady's bed.
  Lady P. that?
  Hot. Peace! sings.
                               Lady sings Welsh song.
    Come, Kate, song too.  
  Lady P. mine, good sooth.
  Hot. yours, good sooth? Heart! swear a
    comfit-maker's wife. 'Not you, good sooth!' 'as true I
    live!' 'as God mend me!' 'as day!'
    givest sarcenet surety thy oaths
    thou ne'er walk'st Finsbury.
    Swear me, Kate, lady thou art,
    good mouth-filling oath; leave 'in sooth'
    protest pepper gingerbread
    velvet guards Sunday citizens. Come, sing.
  Lady P. sing.
  Hot. 'Tis turn tailor redbreast-teacher. An
    indentures drawn, hours; so
    ye will.                                  Exit.
  Glend. Come, come, Lord Mortimer. slow
    hot Lord Percy fire go.
    book drawn; seal,
    horse immediately.
  Mort. heart.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene II.
London. Palace.

Enter King, Prince Wales, others.

  King. Lords, give leave. Prince Wales I
    private conference; hand,
    presently you.
                                                   Exeunt Lords.
    God so,
    displeasing service done,
    That, secret doom, blood
    breed revengement scourge me;
    thou dost thy passages life
    Make thou art mark'd
    hot vengeance rod heaven
    punish mistreadings. else,
    inordinate low desires,
    poor, bare, lewd, attempts,
    barren pleasures, rude society,
    thou art match'd withal grafted to,
    Accompany greatness thy blood  
    hold level thy princely heart?
  Prince. Majesty, could
    Quit offences clear excuse
    doubtless purge
    charged withal.
    extenuation beg
    As, reproof tales devis'd,
    oft ear greatness bear
    By, smiling pickthanks base newsmongers,
    may, things true youth
    Hath faulty wand'red irregular,
    pardon lily true submission.
  King. God pardon thee! wonder, Harry,
    thy affections, hold wing,
    flight thy ancestors.
    Thy place Council thou hast rudely lost,
    thy younger brother supplied,
    art alien hearts
    court princes blood.
    hope expectation thy time  
    ruin'd, soul man
    Prophetically forethink thy fall.
    lavish presence been,
    common-hackney'd eyes men,
    stale cheap vulgar company,
    Opinion, crown,
    loyal possession
    left reputeless banishment,
    fellow mark likelihood.
    seldom seen, stir
    But, comet, wond'red at;
    men children, 'This he!'
    say, 'Where? Bolingbroke?'
    stole courtesy heaven,
    dress'd humility
    pluck allegiance men's hearts,
    Loud shouts salutations mouths
    presence crowned King.
    person fresh new,
    presence, robe pontifical,  
    Ne'er wond'red at; state,
    Seldom sumptuous, show'd feast
    won rareness solemnity.
    skipping King, ambled down
    shallow jesters rash bavin wits,
    kindled burnt; carded state;
    Mingled royalty cap'ring fools;
    great profaned scorns
    gave countenance, name,
    laugh gibing boys stand push
    beardless vain comparative;
    Grew companion common streets,
    Enfeoff'd popularity;
    That, dally swallowed men's eyes,
    surfeited honey began
    loathe taste sweetness, whereof little
    much.
    So, occasion seen,
    cuckoo June,
    Heard, regarded- seen, eyes  
    As, sick blunted community,
    Afford extraordinary gaze,
    bent unlike majesty
    shines seldom admiring eyes;
    drows'd hung eyelids down,
    Slept face, rend'red aspect
    cloudy men adversaries,
    presence glutted, gorg'd, full.
    line, Harry, standest thou;
    thou hast lost thy princely privilege
    vile participation. eye
    aweary thy common sight,
    Save mine, hath desir'd thee more;
    doth do-
    Make blind foolish tenderness.
  Prince. hereafter, thrice-gracious lord,
    myself.
  King. world,
    thou art hour, Richard then
    France set foot Ravenspurgh;  
    Percy now.
    Now, sceptre, soul boot,
    hath worthy interest state
    thou, shadow succession;
    right, colour right,
    doth fill fields harness realm,
    Turns head lion's armed jaws,
    And, debt years thou,
    Leads ancient lords reverend Bishops on
    bloody battles bruising arms.
    never-dying honour hath got
    renowmed Douglas! high deeds,
    hot incursions great arms
    Holds soldiers chief majority
    military title capital
    kingdoms acknowledge Christ.
    Thrice hath Hotspur, Mars swathling clothes,
    infant warrior, enterprises
    Discomfited great Douglas; ta'en once,
    Enlarged him, made friend him,  
    fill mouth deep defiance up
    shake peace safety throne.
    this? Percy, Northumberland,
    Archbishop's Grace York, Douglas, Mortimer
    Capitulate up.
    wherefore news thee
    Why, Harry, thee foes,
    art nearest dearest enemy'
    Thou art enough, vassal fear,
    Base inclination, start spleen,
    fight Percy's pay,
    dog heels curtsy frowns,
    show thou art degenerate.
  Prince. so. find so.
    God forgive sway'd
    Majesty's good thoughts me!
    redeem Percy's head
    And, closing glorious day,
    bold son,
    wear garment blood,  
    stain favours bloody mask,
    Which, wash'd away, scour shame it.
    day, whene'er lights,
    child honour renown,
    gallant Hotspur, all-praised knight,
    unthought Harry chance meet.
    honour sitting helm,
    multitudes, head
    shames redoubled! time come
    make Northern youth exchange
    glorious deeds indignities.
    Percy factor, good lord,
    engross glorious deeds behalf;
    call hall strict account
    render glory up,
    Yea, slightest worship time,
    tear reckoning heart.
    God promise here;
    pleas'd perform,
    beseech Majesty salve  
    long-grown wounds intemperance.
    not, end life cancels bands,
    die hundred thousand deaths
    Ere break smallest parcel vow.
  King. hundred thousand rebels die this!
    Thou shalt charge sovereign trust herein.

                        Enter Blunt.

    now, good Blunt? Thy full speed.
  Blunt. hath business speak of.
    Lord Mortimer Scotland hath word
    Douglas English rebels met
    eleventh month Shrewsbury.
    mighty fearful head are,
    promises oil hand,
    off'red foul play state.
  King. Earl Westmoreland set to-day;
    son, Lord John Lancaster;
    advertisement days old.  
    Wednesday next, Harry, set forward;
    Thursday march. meeting
    Bridgenorth; and, Harry, march
    Gloucestershire; account,
    business valued, twelve days hence
    general forces Bridgenorth meet.
    hands full business. away.
    Advantage feeds fat men delay.            Exeunt.




Scene III.
Eastcheap. Boar's Head Tavern.

Enter Falstaff Bardolph.

  Fal. Bardolph, fall'n vilely action?
    bate? dwindle? Why, skin hangs like
    lady's loose gown! withered apple John.
    Well, repent, suddenly, liking.
    heart shortly, no
    strength repent. forgotten inside a
    church made of, peppercorn, brewer's horse. The
    inside church! Company, villanous company, hath the
    spoil me.
  Bard. Sir John, fretful live long.
  Fal. Why, it! Come, sing bawdy song; make merry. I
    virtuously gentleman be, virtuous
    enough: swore little, dic'd times week, to
    bawdy house quarter- hour, paid money
    borrowed- times, lived well, good
    compass; live order, compass.
  Bard. Why, fat, Sir John,  
    compass- reasonable compass, Sir John.
  Fal. thou amend thy face, amend life. Thou art our
    admiral, thou bearest lantern poop- 'tis the
    nose thee. Thou art Knight Burning Lamp.
  Bard. Why, Sir John, face harm.
  Fal. No, sworn. make good man doth
    death's-head memento mori. thy face I
    hellfire Dives lived purple; he
    robes, burning, burning. thou wert to
    virtue, swear thy face; oath 'By this
    fire, God's angel.' thou art altogether over,
    wert indeed, light thy face, son utter
    darkness. thou ran'st Gadshill night catch my
    horse, thou hadst ignis fatuus a
    ball wildfire, purchase money. O, thou art a
    perpetual triumph, everlasting bonfire-light! Thou hast saved
    thousand marks links torches, walking thee in
    night betwixt tavern tavern; sack thou hast
    drunk bought lights good cheap dearest
    chandler's Europe. maintained salamander  
    fire time two-and-thirty years. God reward for
    it!
  Bard. 'Sblood, face belly!
  Fal. God-a-mercy! heart-burn'd.

                          Enter Hostess.

    now, Dame Partlet hen? enquir'd pick'd
    pocket?
  Host. Why, Sir John, think, Sir John? I
    thieves house? search'd, enquired, so
    husband, man man, boy boy, servant servant. The
    tithe hair lost house before.
  Fal. Ye lie, hostess. Bardolph shav'd lost hair, and
    sworn pocket pick'd. to, woman, go!
  Host. Who, I? No; defy thee! God's light, call'd so
    mine house before!
  Fal. to, enough.
  Host. No, Sir John; me, Sir John. you, Sir
    John. owe money, Sir John, pick quarrel  
    beguile it. bought dozen shirts back.
  Fal. Dowlas, filthy dowlas! bakers'
    wives; made bolters them.
  Host. Now, true woman, holland shillings ell.
    owe money besides, Sir John, diet and
    by-drinkings, money lent you, four-and-twenty pound.
  Fal. part it; pay.
  Host. He? Alas, poor; hath nothing.
  Fal. How? Poor? face. call rich? them
    coin nose, coin cheeks. pay denier.
    What, make younker me? mine ease
    mine inn pocket pick'd? lost a
    seal-ring grandfather's worth forty mark.
  Host. O Jesu, heard Prince him, oft,
    ring copper!
  Fal. How? Prince Jack, sneak-cup. 'Sblood, were
    here, cudgel dog so.

      Enter Prince [and Poins], marching; Falstaff meets
          them, playing truncheon fife.  

    now, lad? wind door, i' faith? all
    march?
  Bard. Yea, two, Newgate fashion.
  Host. lord, pray hear me.
  Prince. say'st thou, Mistress Quickly? doth thy husband?
    love well; honest man.
  Host. Good lord, hear me.
  Fal. Prithee list me.
  Prince. say'st thou, Jack?
  Fal. night fell asleep arras my
    pocket pick'd. house turn'd bawdy house; pick
    pockets.
  Prince. didst thou lose, Jack?
  Fal. Wilt thou me, Hal? bonds forty pound
    apiece seal-ring grandfather's.
  Prince. trifle, eightpenny matter.
  Host. told him, lord, heard Grace so;
    and, lord, speaks vilely you, foul-mouth'd
    man is, cudgel you.  
  Prince. What! not?
  Host. faith, truth, womanhood else.
  Fal. faith thee stewed prune, no
    truth thee drawn fox; woman-hood, Maid
    Marian deputy's wife ward thee. Go, you
    thing, go!
  Host. Say, thing? thing?
  Fal. thing? Why, thing God on.
  Host. thing God on, thou shouldst it!
    honest man's wife, and, setting thy knight-hood aside,
    thou art knave call so.
  Fal. Setting thy womanhood aside, thou art beast say
    otherwise.
  Host. Say, beast, thou knave, thou?
  Fal. beast? Why, otter.
  Prince. otter, Sir John? otter?
  Fal. Why, fish flesh; man to
    her.
  Host. Thou art unjust man so. Thou man knows
    me, thou knave, thou!  
  Prince. Thou say'st true, hostess, slanders thee most
    grossly.
  Host. doth you, lord, day ought
    thousand pound.
  Prince. Sirrah, owe thousand pound?
  Fal. thousand pound, Hal? million! Thy love worth million;
    thou owest thy love.
  Host. Nay, lord, call'd Jack cudgel
    you.
  Fal. I, Bardolph?
  Bard. Indeed, Sir John, so.
  Fal. Yea. ring copper.
  Prince. say, 'tis copper. Darest thou good thy word now?
  Fal. Why, Hal, thou knowest, thou art man, dare; as
    thou art Prince, fear thee fear roaring lion's
    whelp.
  Prince. lion?
  Fal. King feared lion. Dost thou think
    fear thee fear thy father? Nay, do, pray God my
    girdle break.  
  Prince. O, should, thy guts fall thy knees!
    But, sirrah, room faith, truth, honesty in
    bosom thine. fill'd guts midriff.
    Charge honest woman picking thy pocket? Why, thou
    whoreson, impudent, emboss'd rascal, in
    thy pocket tavern reckonings, memorandums bawdy houses,
    poor pennyworth sugar candy make thee long-winded-
    thy pocket enrich'd injuries these, I
    villain. stand it; pocket
    wrong. Art thou ashamed?
  Fal. Dost thou hear, Hal? Thou knowest state innocency
    Adam fell; poor Jack Falstaff days of
    villany? Thou seest flesh man, and
    frailty. confess then, pick'd pocket?
  Prince. appears story.
  Fal. Hostess, forgive thee. make ready breakfast. Love thy
    husband, thy servants, cherish thy guests. Thou shalt
    find tractable honest reason. Thou seest pacified.
    -Still?- Nay, prithee gone. [Exit Hostess.] Now, Hal, the
    news court. robbery, lad- answered?  
  Prince. O sweet beef, good angel thee.
    money paid back again.
  Fal. O, paying back! 'Tis double labour.
  Prince. good friends father, anything.
  Fal. Rob exchequer thing thou doest, it
    unwash'd hands too.
  Bard. Do, lord.
  Prince. procured thee, Jack, charge foot.
  Fal. horse. find can
    steal well? O fine thief age two-and-twenty or
    thereabouts! heinously unprovided. Well, God thanked for
    rebels. offend virtuous. laud them, I
    praise them.
  Prince. Bardolph!
  Bard. lord?
  Prince. bear letter Lord John Lancaster,
    brother John; Lord Westmoreland.
                                                [Exit Bardolph.]
    Go, Poins, horse, horse; thou I
    thirty miles ride ere dinner time.  
                                                   [Exit Poins.]
    Jack, meet to-morrow Temple Hall
    o'clock afternoon.
    shalt thou thy charge. receive
    Money order furniture.
    land burning; Percy stands high;
    lower lie.                [Exit.]
  Fal. Rare words! brave world! Hostess, breakfast, come.
    O, tavern drum!
Exit.
