ACT IV. Scene I.
The rebel camp Shrewsbury.

Enter Harry Hotspur, Worcester, Douglas.

  Hot. said, noble Scot. speaking truth
    fine age thought flattery,
    attribution Douglas have
    soldier season's stamp
    general current world.
    God, flatter, defy
    tongues soothers! braver place
    heart's love hath man yourself.
    Nay, task word; approve me, lord.
  Doug. Thou art king honour.
    man potent breathes ground
    beard him.

                     Enter letters.

  Hot. so, 'tis well.-
    letters hast thou there?- you.  
  Messenger. letters father.
  Hot. Letters him? himself?
  Mess. come, lord; grievous sick.
  Hot. Zounds! leisure sick
    justling time? leads power?
    government along?
  Mess. letters bears mind, I, lord.
  Wor. prithee me, doth bed?
  Mess. did, lord, days ere set forth,
    time departure thence
    fear'd physicians.
  Wor. state time whole
    Ere sickness visited.
    health worth now.
  Hot. Sick now? droop now? sickness doth infect
    lifeblood enterprise.
    'Tis catching hither, camp.
    writes sickness-
    friends deputation not
    drawn; meet  
    lay dangerous dear trust
    soul remov'd own.
    doth give bold advertisement,
    small conjunction on,
    fortune dispos'd us;
    For, writes, quailing now,
    King possess'd
    purposes. it?
  Wor. father's sickness maim us.
  Hot. perilous gash, limb lopp'd off.
    yet, faith, not! present want
    find it. good
    set exact wealth states
    cast? set rich man
    nice hazard doubtful hour?
    good; read
    bottom soul hope,
    list, utmost bound
    fortunes.
  Doug. Faith, should;  
    remains sweet reversion.
    boldly spend hope what
    in.
    comfort retirement lives this.
  Hot. rendezvous, home fly unto,
    devil mischance big
    maidenhead affairs.
  Wor. father here.
    quality hair attempt
    Brooks division. thought
    away,
    wisdom, loyalty, mere dislike
    proceedings Earl hence.
    apprehension
    turn tide fearful faction
    breed kind question cause.
    off'ring side
    aloof strict arbitrement,
    stop sight-holes, loop whence
    eye reason pry us.  
    absence father's draws curtain
    shows ignorant kind fear
    dreamt of.
  Hot. strain far.
    absence make use:
    lends lustre great opinion,
    larger dare great enterprise,
    Earl here; men think,
    we, help, make head
    push kingdom, help
    o'erturn topsy-turvy down.
    well; joints whole.
  Doug. heart think. word
    Spoke Scotland term fear.

                 Enter Sir Richard Vernon.

  Hot. cousin Vernon! welcome, soul.
  Ver. Pray God news worth welcome, lord.
    Earl Westmoreland, thousand strong,  
    marching hitherwards; Prince John.
  Hot. harm. more?
  Ver. further, learn'd
    King person set forth,
    hitherwards intended speedily,
    strong mighty preparation.
  Hot. too. son,
    nimble-footed madcap Prince Wales,
    comrades, daff'd world aside
    bid pass?
  Ver. furnish'd, arms;
    plum'd estridges wind
    Bated eagles bath'd;
    Glittering golden coats images;
    full spirit month May
    gorgeous sun midsummer;
    Wanton youthful goats, wild young bulls.
    young Harry beaver on
    cushes thighs, gallantly arm'd,
    Rise ground feathered Mercury,  
    vaulted ease seat
    angel dropp'd clouds
    turn wind fiery Pegasus
    witch world noble horsemanship.
  Hot. more, more! Worse sun March,
    praise doth nourish agues. come.
    sacrifices trim,
    fire-ey'd maid smoky war
    hot bleeding offer them.
    mailed Mars altar sit
    ears blood. fire
    hear rich reprisal nigh,
    ours. Come, taste horse,
    bear thunderbolt
    bosom Prince Wales.
    Harry Harry shall, hot horse horse,
    Meet, ne'er part till drop corse.
    Glendower come!
  Ver. news.
    learn'd Worcester, rode along,  
    draw power fourteen days.
  Doug. worst tidings hear yet.
  Wor. Ay, faith, bears frosty sound.
  Hot. King's battle reach unto?
  Ver. thirty thousand.
  Hot. Forty be.
    father Glendower away,
    powers serve great day.
    Come, muster speedily.
    Doomsday near. Die all, die merrily.
  Doug. Talk dying. fear
    death death's hand half-year.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene II.
A public road Coventry.

Enter Falstaff Bardolph.

  Fal. Bardolph, thee Coventry; fill bottle of
    sack. soldiers march through. Sutton Co'fil'
    to-night.
  Bard. give money, Captain?
  Fal. Lay out, lay out.
  Bald. bottle makes angel.
  Fal. do, thy labour; make twenty,
    all; answer coinage. Bid lieutenant Peto
    meet town's end.
  Bard. Will, Captain. Farewell.                         Exit.
  Fal. ashamed soldiers, sous'd gurnet. I
    misused King's press damnably. exchange of
    hundred fifty soldiers, hundred odd pounds. I
    press good householders, yeomen's sons; inquire me
    contracted bachelors, ask'd the
    banes- commodity warm slaves lieve hear the
    devil drum; fear report caliver worse  
    struck fowl hurt wild duck. press'd such
    toasts-and-butter, hearts bellies bigger than
    pins' heads, bought services; my
    charge consists ancients, corporals, lieutenants,
    gentlemen companies- slaves ragged Lazarus the
    painted cloth, glutton's dogs licked sores; and
    soldiers, discarded unjust
    serving-men, younger sons Younger brothers, revolted tapsters,
    ostlers trade-fall'n; cankers calm world long
    peace; ten times dishonourable ragged fac'd
    ancient; fill rooms have
    bought services a
    hundred fifty tattered Prodigals from
    swine-keeping, eating draff husks. mad fellow met me
    way, told unloaded gibbets and
    press'd dead bodies. eye hath scarecrows. I'll
    march Coventry them, flat. Nay, the
    villains march wide betwixt legs, gyves on;
    prison. a
    shirt half company; half-shirt  
    napkins tack'd thrown shoulders a
    herald's coat sleeves; shirt, truth,
    stol'n host Saint Alban's, red-nose innkeeper
    Daventry. one; find linen on
    hedge.

              Enter Prince Lord Westmoreland.

  Prince. now, blown Jack? now, quilt?
  Fal. What, Hal? now, mad wag? devil dost thou in
    Warwickshire? good Lord Westmoreland, cry mercy. I
    thought honour Shrewsbury.
  West. Faith, Sir John, 'tis time there, and
    too; powers already. King, tell
    you, all. all, to-night.
  Fal. Tut, fear me. vigilant cat steal cream.
  Prince. think, steal cream indeed, thy theft hath already
    made thee butter. me, Jack, fellows that
    after?
  Fal. Mine, Hal, mine.  
  Prince. pitiful rascals.
  Fal. Tut, tut! good toss; food powder, food for
    powder. fill pit better. Tush, man, mortal
    men, mortal men.
  West. Ay, but, Sir John, methinks exceeding poor bare-
    beggarly.
  Fal. Faith, poverty, know, that; and
    bareness, surd learn'd me.
  Prince. No, sworn, call fingers the
    ribs bare. But, sirrah, make haste. Percy 's the
    field.
Exit.
  Fal. What, King encamp'd?
  West. is, Sir John. fear stay long.
                                                         [Exit.]
  Fal. Well,
    end fray beginning feast
    Fits dull fighter keen guest.                  Exit.




Scene III.
The rebel camp Shrewsbury.

Enter Hotspur, Worcester, Douglas, Vernon.

  Hot. fight to-night.
  Wor. be.
  Doug. give advantage.
  Ver. whit.
  Hot. so? supply?
  Ver. we.
  Hot. certain, 's doubtful.
  Wor. Good cousin, advis'd; stir to-night.
  Ver. not, lord.
  Doug. counsel well.
    speak fear cold heart.
  Ver. slander, Douglas. life-
    dare maintain life-
    well-respected honour bid on
    hold counsel weak fear
    you, lord, Scot day lives.
    to-morrow battle  
    fears.
  Doug. Yea, to-night.
  Ver. Content.
  Hot. To-night, I.
    Come, come, be. much,
    men great leading are,
    foresee impediments
    Drag back expedition. horse
    cousin Vernon's up.
    uncle Worcester's horse to-day;
    pride mettle asleep,
    courage hard labour tame dull,
    horse half half himself.
  Hot. horses enemy,
    general journey-bated brought low.
    part full rest.
  Wor. number King exceedeth ours.
    God's sake, cousin, stay till in.

              trumpet sounds parley.  

                 Enter Sir Walter Blunt.

  Blunt. gracious offers King,
    vouchsafe hearing respect.
  Hot. Welcome, Sir Walter Blunt, God
    determination!
    love well; some
    Envy great deservings good name,
    quality,
    stand enemy.
  Blunt. God defend stand so,
    long limit true rule
    stand anointed majesty!
    charge. King hath know
    nature griefs; whereupon
    conjure breast civil peace
    bold hostility, teaching duteous land
    Audacious cruelty. King
    good deserts forgot,  
    confesseth manifold,
    bids griefs, speed
    desires interest,
    pardon absolute these
    misled suggestion.
  Hot. King kind; King
    time promise, pay.
    father uncle myself
    give royalty wears;
    six-and-twenty strong,
    Sick world's regard, wretched low,
    poor unminded outlaw sneaking home,
    father gave shore;
    heard swear vow God
    Duke Lancaster,
    sue livery beg peace,
    tears innocency terms zeal,
    father, kind heart pity mov'd,
    Swore assistance, performed too.
    Now, lords barons realm  
    Perceiv'd Northumberland lean him,
    cap knee;
    Met boroughs, cities, villages,
    Attended bridges, stood lanes,
    Laid gifts him, proffer'd oaths,
    Give heirs pages, him
    heels golden multitudes.
    presently, greatness itself,
    Steps higher vow
    Made father, blood poor,
    naked shore Ravenspurgh;
    now, forsooth, takes reform
    edicts strait decrees
    lie heavy commonwealth;
    Cries abuses, weep
    country's wrongs; face,
    brow justice, win
    hearts angle for;
    Proceeded further- cut heads
    favourites absent King  
    deputation left here
    personal Irish war.
    But. Tut! hear this.
  Hot. point.
    short time lie depos'd King;
    depriv'd life;
    neck task'd state;
    make worse, suff'red kinsman March
    (Who is, owner placid,
    king) engag'd Wales,
    ransom lie forfeited;
    Disgrac'd happy victories,
    Sought entrap intelligence;
    Rated mine uncle Council board;
    rage dismiss'd father court;
    Broke oath oath, committed wrong wrong;
    conclusion drove seek out
    head safety, withal pry
    title, find
    indirect long continuance.  
  Blunt. return answer King?
  Hot. so, Sir Walter. withdraw awhile.
    King; impawn'd
    surety safe return again,
    morning early mine uncle
    Bring purposes; farewell.
  Blunt. accept grace love.
  Hot. shall.
  Blunt. Pray God do.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene IV.
York. Archbishop's Palace.

Enter Archbishop York Sir Michael.

  Arch. Hie, good Sir Michael; bear sealed brief
    winged haste Lord Marshal;
    cousin Scroop; rest
    directed. knew
    import, make haste.
  Sir M. good lord,
    guess tenour.
  Arch. do.
    To-morrow, good Sir Michael, day
    fortune ten thousand men
    bide touch; for, sir, Shrewsbury,
    understand,
    King mighty quick-raised power
    Meets Lord Harry; fear, Sir Michael,
    sickness Northumberland,
    power proportion,
    Owen Glendower's absence thence,  
    rated sinew too
    in, overrul'd prophecies-
    fear power Percy weak
    wage instant trial King.
  Sir M. Why, good lord, fear;
    Douglas Lord Mortimer.
  Arch. No, Mortimer there.
  Sir M. Mordake, Vernon, Lord Harry Percy,
    Lord Worcester, head
    gallant warriors, noble gentlemen.
  Arch. is; King hath drawn
    special head land together-
    Prince Wales, Lord John Lancaster,
    noble Westmoreland warlike Blunt,
    moe corrivals dear men
    estimation command arms.
  Sir M. Doubt not, lord, oppos'd.
  Arch. hope less, needful 'tis fear;
    And, prevent worst, Sir Michael, speed.
    Lord Percy thrive not, ere King  
    Dismiss power, means visit us,
    hath heard confederacy,
    'tis wisdom make strong him.
    make haste. write again
    friends; farewell, Sir Michael.
                                                         Exeunt.

ACT V. Scene I.
The King's camp Shrewsbury.

Enter King, Prince Wales, Lord John Lancaster, Sir Walter Blunt,
Falstaff.

  King. bloodily sun begins peer
    yon busky hill! day pale
    distemp'rature.
  Prince. southern wind
    Doth play trumpet purposes
    hollow whistling leaves
    Foretells tempest blust'ring day.
  King. Theft losers sympathize,
    foul win.

     trumpet sounds. Enter Worcester [and Vernon].

    How, now, Lord Worcester? 'Tis well
    meet terms
    meet. deceiv'd trust
    made doff easy robes peace  
    crush limbs ungentle steel.
    well, lord; well.
    it? unknit
    churlish knot all-abhorred war,
    move obedient orb again
    give fair natural light,
    exhal'd meteor,
    prodigy fear, portent
    broached mischief unborn times?
  Wor. Hear me, liege.
    mine part, content
    entertain lag-end life
    quiet hours; protest
    sought day dislike.
  King. sought it! then,
  Fal. Rebellion lay way, found it.
  Prince. Peace, chewet, peace!
  Wor. pleas'd Majesty turn looks
    favour house;
    remember you, lord,  
    dearest friends.
    staff office break
    Richard's time, posted day night
    meet kiss hand
    place account
    strong fortunate I.
    myself, brother, son
    brought home boldly outdare
    dangers time. swore us,
    swear oath Doncaster,
    purpose 'gainst state,
    claim new-fall'n right,
    seat Gaunt, dukedom Lancaster.
    swore aid. short space
    rain'd fortune show'ring head,
    flood greatness fell you-
    help, absent King,
    injuries wanton time,
    sufferances borne,
    contrarious winds held King  
    long unlucky Irish wars
    England repute dead-
    swarm fair advantages
    occasion quickly woo'd
    gripe general sway hand;
    Forgot oath Doncaster;
    And, fed us, us'd so
    ungentle gull, cuckoo's bird,
    Useth sparrow- oppress nest;
    Grew, feeding great bulk
    love thirst sight
    fear swallowing; nimble wing
    enforc'd safety sake fly
    sight raise present head;
    stand opposed means
    forg'd yourself
    unkind usage, dangerous countenance,
    violation faith troth
    Sworn tis younger enterprise.
  King. things, indeed, articulate,  
    Proclaim'd market crosses, read churches,
    face garment rebellion
    fine colour eye
    fickle changelings poor discontents,
    gape rub elbow news
    hurlyburly innovation.
    insurrection want
    water colours impaint cause,
    moody beggars, starving time
    pell-mell havoc confusion.
  Prince. armies soul
    pay full dearly encounter,
    join trial. nephew
    Prince Wales doth join world
    praise Henry Percy. hopes,
    present enterprise set head,
    braver gentleman,
    active-valiant valiant-young,
    daring bold, alive
    grace age noble deeds.  
    part, speak shame,
    truant chivalry;
    hear doth account too.
    father's Majesty-
    content odds
    great estimation,
    save blood side,
    fortune single fight.
  King. And, Prince Wales, dare venture thee,
    Albeit considerations infinite
    make it. No, good Worcester, no!
    love people well; love
    misled cousin's part;
    And, offer grace,
    he, they, you, yea, man
    friend again, his.
    cousin, bring word
    do. yield,
    Rebuke dread correction wait us,
    office. gone.  
    troubled reply.
    offer fair; advisedly.
                                    Exit Worcester [with Vernon]
  Prince. accepted, life.
    Douglas Hotspur together
    confident world arms.
  King. Hence, therefore, leader charge;
    For, answer, set them,
    God befriend just!
                                Exeunt. Manent Prince, Falstaff.
  Fal. Hal, thou battle bestride me, so!
    'Tis point friendship.
  Prince. Colossus thee friendship.
    thy prayers, farewell.
  Fal. 'twere bedtime, Hal, well.
  Prince. Why, thou owest God death.
Exit.
  Fal. 'Tis due yet. loath pay day.
    forward calls me? Well,
    'tis matter; honour pricks on. Yea, honour prick  
    on? then? honor set leg? No. Or
    arm? No. grief wound? No. Honour hath no
    skill surgery then? No. honour? word. that
    word honour? Air. trim reckoning! hath it? died a
    Wednesday. Doth feel it? No. Doth bear it? No. 'Tis
    insensible then? Yea, dead. live the
    living? No. Why? Detraction suffer it. I'll
    it. Honour mere scutcheon- ends catechism.
Exit.




Scene II.
The rebel camp.

Enter Worcester Sir Richard Vernon.

  Wor. O no, nephew know, Sir Richard,
    liberal kind offer King.
  Ver. 'Twere did.
  Wor. undone.
    possible, be
    King word loving us.
    suspect find time
    punish offence faults.
    Suspicion lives stuck full eyes;
    treason trusted fox
    Who, ne'er tame, cherish'd lock'd up,
    wild trick ancestors.
    can, sad merrily,
    Interpretation misquote looks,
    feed oxen stall,
    cherish'd, nearer death.
    nephew's trespass forgot;  
    hath excuse youth heat blood,
    adopted privilege-
    hare-brained Hotspur govern'd spleen.
    offences live head
    father's. train on;
    And, corruption us,
    We, spring all, pay all.
    Therefore, good cousin, Harry know,
    case, offer King.

               Enter Hotspur [and Douglas].

  Ver. Deliver will, 'tis so.
    cousin.
  Hot. uncle return'd.
    Deliver Lord Westmoreland.
    Uncle, news?
  Wor. King bid battle presently.
  Doug. Defy Lord Westmoreland.
  Hot. Lord Douglas, so.  
  Doug. Marry, shall, willingly.
Exit.
  Wor. mercy King.
  Hot. beg any, God forbid!
  Wor. told gently grievances,
    oath-breaking; mended thus,
    forswearing forsworn.
    calls rebels, traitors, aid scourge
    haughty arms hateful us.

                       Enter Douglas.

  Doug. Arm, gentlemen! arms! thrown
    brave defiance King Henry's teeth,
    Westmoreland, engag'd, bear it;
    choose bring quickly on.
  Wor. Prince Wales stepp'd King
    And, nephew, challeng'd single fight.
  Hot. O, quarrel lay heads,
    man draw short breath to-day  
    Harry Monmouth! me, me,
    show'd tasking? Seem'd contempt?
    No, soul. life
    hear challenge urg'd modestly,
    brother brother dare
    gentle exercise proof arms.
    gave duties man;
    Trimm'd praises princely tongue;
    Spoke deservings chronicle;
    Making praise
    dispraising praise valued you;
    And, prince indeed,
    made blushing cital himself,
    chid truant youth grace
    lie mast'red double spirit
    teaching learning instantly.
    pause; world,
    outlive envy day,
    England owe sweet hope,
    misconstrued wantonness.  
  Hot. Cousin, thou art enamoured
    follies. hear
    prince wild libertine.
    will, ere night
    embrace soldier's arm,
    shrink courtesy.
    Arm, arm speed! and, fellows, soldiers, friends,
    do
    I, gift tongue,
    lift blood persuasion.

                       Enter Messenger.

  Mess. lord, letters you.
  Hot. read now.-
    O gentlemen, time life short!
    spend shortness basely long
    life ride dial's point,
    ending arrival hour.
    live, live tread kings;  
    die, brave death, princes die us!
    consciences, arms fair,
    intent bearing just.

                  Enter Messenger.

  Mess. lord, prepare. King apace.
  Hot. cuts tale,
    profess talking. this-
    man best; draw I
    sword temper intend stain
    blood meet withal
    adventure perilous day.
    Now, Esperance! Percy! set on.
    Sound lofty instruments war,
    music embrace;
    For, heaven earth, shall
    time courtesy.
                          embrace. trumpets sound.
                                                       [Exeunt.]




Scene III.
Plain camps.

The King enters Power.  Alarum battle.  enter Douglas
and Sir Walter Blunt.

  Blunt. thy name, battle thus
    Thou crossest me? honour dost thou seek
    head?
  Doug. Douglas,
    haunt thee battle thus
    thou art king.
  Blunt. thee true.
  Doug. Lord Stafford dear to-day hath bought
    Thy likeness; thee, King Harry,
    sword hath ended him. thee,
    thou yield thee prisoner.
  Blunt. born yielder, thou proud Scot;
    thou shalt find king revenge
    Lord Stafford's death.

    fight. Douglas kills Blunt. enter Hotspur.  

  Hot. O Douglas, hadst thou fought Holmedon thus,
    triumph'd Scot.
  Doug. All's done, all's won. breathless lies King.
  Hot. Where?
  Doug. Here.
  Hot. This, Douglas? No. face full well.
    gallant knight was, Blunt;
    Semblably furnish'd King himself.
  Doug. fool thy soul, goes!
    borrowed title hast thou bought dear:
    didst thou thou wert king?
  Hot. King hath marching coats.
  Doug. Now, sword, kill coats;
    murder wardrop, piece piece,
    meet King.
  Hot. away!
    soldiers stand full fairly day.
                                                         Exeunt.
  
                 Alarum. Enter Falstaff solus.

  Fal. scape shot-free London, fear shot
    here. scoring pate. Soft! you?
    Sir Walter Blunt. honour you! vanity! am
    hot molten lead, heavy too. God lead me!
    weight mine bowels. led my
    rag-of-muffins pepper'd. my
    hundred fifty left alive; town's end, to
    beg life. here?

                         Enter Prince.

  Prince. What, stand'st thou idle here? Lend thy sword.
    nobleman lies stark stiff
    hoofs vaunting enemies,
    deaths unreveng'd. prithee
    Rend thy sword.
  Fal. O Hal, prithee give leave breathe awhile. Turk Gregory
    deeds arms day. paid  
    Percy; made sure.
  Prince. indeed, living kill thee.
    prithee lend thy sword.
  Fal. Nay, God, Hal, Percy alive, thou get'st my
    sword; pistol, thou wilt.
  Prince. Give me. What, case?
  Fal. Ay, Hal. 'Tis hot, 'tis hot. sack city.

    Prince draws finds bottle sack.

    What, time jest dally now?
                              throws bottle him. Exit.
  Fal. Well, Percy alive, pierce him. my
    way, so; not, willingly, make a
    carbonado me. grinning honour Sir Walter
    hath. Give life; save, so; not, honour comes
    unlook'd for, end.                      Exit.




Scene IV.
Another part field.

Alarum. Excursions. Enter King, Prince, Lord John Lancaster,
Earl Westmoreland

  King. prithee,
    Harry, withdraw thyself; thou bleedest much.
    Lord John Lancaster, him.
  John. I, lord, bleed too.
  Prince. beseech Majesty make up,
    retirement amaze friends.
  King. so.
    Lord Westmoreland, lead tent.
  West. Come, lord, lead tent.
  Prince. Lead me, lord, help;
    God forbid shallow scratch drive
    Prince Wales field this,
    stain'd nobility lies trodden on,
    rebels' arms triumph massacres!
  John. breathe long. Come, cousin Westmoreland,
    duty lies. God's sake, come.  
                          [Exeunt Prince John Westmoreland.]
  Prince. God, thou hast deceiv'd me, Lancaster!
    thee lord spirit.
    Before, lov'd thee brother, John;
    now, respect thee soul.
  King. hold Lord Percy point
    lustier maintenance for
    ungrown warrior.
  Prince. O, boy
    Lends mettle all!                                Exit.

                         Enter Douglas.

  Doug. king? grow Hydra's heads.
    Douglas, fatal those
    wear colours them. art thou
    counterfeit'st person king?
  King. King himself, who, Douglas, grieves heart
    shadows thou hast met,
    King. boys  
    Seek Percy thyself field;
    But, thou fall'st luckily,
    assay thee. defend thyself.
  Doug. fear thou art counterfeit;
    yet, faith, thou bearest thee king.
    mine thou art, whoe'er thou be,
    win thee.

   fight. King danger, enter Prince Wales.

  Prince. Hold thy head, vile Scot, thou art like
    hold again! spirits
    valiant Shirley, Stafford, Blunt arms.
    Prince Wales threatens thee,
    promiseth means pay.
                                     fight. Douglas flieth.
    Cheerly, lord. fares Grace?
    Sir Nicholas Gawsey hath succour sent,
    hath Clifton. Clifton straight.
  King. Stay breathe awhile.  
    Thou hast redeem'd thy lost opinion,
    show'd thou mak'st tender life,
    fair rescue thou hast brought me.
  Prince. O God! injury
    heark'ned death.
    so, alone
    insulting hand Douglas you,
    speedy end
    poisonous potions world,
    sav'd treacherous labour son.
  King. Make Clifton; Sir Nicholas Gawsey.
Exit.

                      Enter Hotspur.

  Hot. mistake not, thou art Harry Monmouth.
  Prince. Thou speak'st deny name.
  Hot. Harry Percy.
  Prince. Why, see
    valiant rebel name.  
    Prince Wales; not, Percy,
    share glory more.
    stars motion sphere,
    England brook double reign
    Harry Percy Prince Wales.
  Hot. it, Harry; hour come
    end God
    Thy arms great mine!
  Prince. make greater ere part thee,
    budding honours thy crest
    crop make garland head.
  Hot. longer brook thy vanities.
                                                     fight.

                      Enter Falstaff.

  Fal. said, Hal! it, Hal! Nay, find boy's play
    here, you.

   Enter Douglas. fighteth Falstaff, falls  
      dead. [Exit Douglas.] Prince killeth Percy.

  Hot. O Harry, thou hast robb'd youth!
    brook loss brittle life
    proud titles thou hast won me.
    wound thoughts worse thy sword flesh.
    thoughts slave, life, life time's fool,
    time, takes survey world,
    stop. O, prophesy,
    earthy cold hand death
    Lies tongue. No, Percy, thou art dust,
    food for-                                        [Dies.]
  Prince. worms, brave Percy. Fare thee well, great heart!
    Ill-weav'd ambition, art thou shrunk!
    body spirit,
    kingdom small bound;
    paces vilest earth
    room enough. earth bears thee dead
    Bears alive stout gentleman.
    thou wert courtesy,  
    make dear show zeal.
    favours hide thy mangled face;
    And, thy behalf, myself
    fair rites tenderness.
    Adieu, thy praise thee heaven!
    Thy ignominy sleep thee grave,
    rememb'red thy epitaph!
                               spieth Falstaff ground.
    What, acquaintance? flesh
    life? Poor Jack, farewell!
    spar'd man.
    O, heavy miss thee
    love vanity!
    Death hath struck fat deer to-day,
    dearer, bloody fray.
    Embowell'd thee by-and-by;
    Till blood noble Percy lie.                 Exit.

                     Falstaff riseth up.
  
  Fal. Embowell'd? thou embowel to-day, give leave to
    powder eat to-morrow. 'Sblood, 'twas time to
    counterfeit, hot termagant Scot paid scot lot
    too. Counterfeit? lie; counterfeit. die a
    counterfeit; counterfeit man hath not
    life man; counterfeit dying man thereby
    liveth, counterfeit, true perfect image
    life indeed. part valour discretion; the
    part saved life. Zounds, afraid of
    gunpowder Percy, dead. should
    counterfeit too, rise? faith, afraid would
    prove counterfeit. make sure; yea,
    swear kill'd him. rise I?
    confutes eyes, sees me. Therefore,
    sirrah [stabs him], wound thigh, you
    me.

   takes Hotspur hack. [Enter Prince, John of
                            Lancaster.
  
  Prince. Come, brother John; full bravely hast thou flesh'd
    Thy maiden sword.
  John. But, soft! here?
    fat man dead?
  Prince. did; dead,
    Breathless bleeding ground. Art thou alive,
    fantasy plays eyesight?
    prithee speak. trust eyes
    ears. Thou art thou seem'st.
  Fal. No, certain! double man; not
    Jack Falstaff, Jack. 's Percy. father
    honour, so; not, kill Percy
    himself. earl duke, assure you.
  Prince. Why, Percy kill'd myself, thee dead!
  Fal. Didst thou? Lord, Lord, world lying! I
    grant down, breath, he; we
    rose instant fought long hour Shrewsbury
    clock. believ'd, so; not, should
    reward valour bear sin heads. it
    death, gave wound thigh. man  
    alive deny it, zounds! make eat a
    piece sword.
  John. strangest tale beard.
  Prince. strangest fellow, brother John.
    Come, bring luggage nobly back.
    part, lie thee grace,
    gild happiest terms have.
                                           retreat sounded.
    trumpet sounds retreat; day ours.
    Come, brother, highest field,
    friends living, dead.
                          Exeunt [Prince Henry Prince John].
  Fal. follow, say, reward. rewards me, God
    reward him! grow great, grow less; purge,
    leave sack, live cleanly, nobleman do.
                                    Exit [bearing body].




Scene V.
Another part field.

The trumpets sound. [Enter King, Prince Wales, Lord John Lancaster,
Earl Westmoreland, Worcester Vernon prisoners.

  King. rebellion find rebuke.
    Ill-spirited Worcester! send grace,
    Pardon, terms love you?
    wouldst thou turn offers contrary?
    Misuse tenour thy kinsman's trust?
    knights party slain to-day,
    noble earl, creature else
    alive hour,
    Christian thou hadst borne
    Betwixt armies true intelligence.
  Wor. safety urg'd to;
    embrace fortune patiently,
    avoided fails me.
  King. Bear Worcester death, Vernon too;
    offenders pause upon.  
                         Exeunt Worcester Vernon, [guarded].
    field?
  Prince. noble Scot, Lord Douglas, saw
    fortune day turn'd him,
    Noble Percy slain men
    foot fear, fled rest;
    falling hill,he bruis'd
    pursuers him. tent
    Douglas is, beseech Grace
    dispose him.
  King. heart.
  Prince. brother John Lancaster, you
    honourable bounty belong.
    Douglas deliver him
    pleasure, ransomless free.
    valour shown crests today
    Hath taught cherish high deeds,
    bosom adversaries.
  John. Grace high courtesy,
    give immediately.  
  King. remains, divide power.
    You, son John, cousin Westmoreland,
    York bend dearest speed
    meet Northumberland prelate Scroop,
    Who, hear, busily arms.
    you, son Harry, Wales
    fight Glendower Earl March.
    Rebellion laud lose sway,
    Meeting check day;
    business fair done,
    leave till won.
                                                         Exeunt.


THE END

1598


SECOND PART KING HENRY IV

by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  RUMOUR, Presenter
  KING HENRY FOURTH

  HENRY, PRINCE WALES, HENRY
  PRINCE JOHN LANCASTER
  PRINCE HUMPHREY GLOUCESTER
  THOMAS, DUKE CLARENCE
    Sons Henry IV

  EARL NORTHUMBERLAND
  SCROOP, ARCHBISHOP YORK
  LORD MOWBRAY
  LORD HASTINGS
  LORD BARDOLPH
  SIR JOHN COLVILLE
  TRAVERS MORTON, retainers Northumberland
    Opposites King Henry IV

  EARL WARWICK
  EARL WESTMORELAND  
  EARL SURREY
  EARL KENT
  GOWER
  HARCOURT
  BLUNT
    King's party

  LORD CHIEF JUSTICE
  SERVANT, Lord Chief Justice

  SIR JOHN FALSTAFF
  EDWARD POINS
  BARDOLPH
  PISTOL
  PETO
    Irregular humourists

  PAGE, Falstaff

  ROBERT SHALLOW SILENCE, country Justices  
  DAVY, servant Shallow

  FANG SNARE, Sheriff's officers

  RALPH MOULDY
  SIMON SHADOW
  THOMAS WART
  FRANCIS FEEBLE
  PETER BULLCALF
    Country soldiers

  FRANCIS, drawer

  LADY NORTHUMBERLAND
  LADY PERCY, Percy's widow
  HOSTESS QUICKLY, Boar's Head, Eastcheap
  DOLL TEARSHEET

  LORDS, Attendants, Porter, Drawers, Beadles, Grooms, Servants,
    Speaker Epilogue  

                       SCENE: England

INDUCTION
                         INDUCTION.
           Warkworth. NORTHUMBERLAND'S Castle

            Enter RUMOUR, painted full tongues

  RUMOUR. Open ears; stop
    vent hearing loud Rumour speaks?
    I, orient drooping west,
    Making wind post-horse, unfold
    acts commenced ball earth.
    tongues continual slanders ride,
    language pronounce,
    Stuffing ears men false reports.
    speak peace covert emnity,
    smile safety, wounds world;
    Rumour, I,
    Make fearful musters prepar'd defence,
    Whiles big year, swoln grief,
    thought child stern tyrant war,
    matter? Rumour pipe
    Blown surmises, jealousies, conjectures,
    easy plain stop  
    blunt monster uncounted heads,
    still-discordant wav'ring multitude,
    play it. thus
    well-known body anatomize
    household? Rumour here?
    run King Harry's victory,
    Who, bloody field Shrewsbury,
    Hath beaten young Hotspur troops,
    Quenching flame bold rebellion
    rebels' blood. I
    speak true first? office is
    noise abroad Harry Monmouth fell
    wrath noble Hotspur's sword,
    King Douglas' rage
    Stoop'd anointed head low death.
    rumour'd peasant towns
    royal field Shrewsbury
    worm-eaten hold ragged stone,
    Hotspur's father, Northumberland,
    Lies crafty-sick. posts tiring on,  
    man brings news
    learnt me. Rumour's tongues
    bring smooth comforts false, worse true wrongs.
 Exit

ACT I. SCENE I.
Warkworth. NORTHUMBERLAND'S Castle

Enter LORD BARDOLPH

  LORD BARDOLPH. gate here, ho?

                   PORTER opens gate

    Earl?
  PORTER. are?
  LORD BARDOLPH. thou Earl
    Lord Bardolph doth attend here.
  PORTER. lordship walk'd orchard.
    honour knock gate,
    answer.

                      Enter NORTHUMBERLAND

  LORD BARDOLPH. Earl.                Exit PORTER
  NORTHUMBERLAND. news, Lord Bardolph? minute now
    father stratagem.  
    times wild; contention, horse
    Full high feeding, madly hath broke loose
    bears him.
  LORD BARDOLPH. Noble Earl,
    bring news Shrewsbury.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Good, God will!
  LORD BARDOLPH. good heart wish.
    King wounded death;
    And, fortune lord son,
    Prince Harry slain outright; Blunts
    Kill'd hand Douglas; young Prince John,
    Westmoreland, Stafford, fled field;
    Harry Monmouth's brawn, hulk Sir John,
    prisoner son. O, day,
    fought, followed, fairly won,
    till dignify times,
    Cxsar's fortunes!
  NORTHUMBERLAND. deriv'd?
    field? Shrewsbury?
  LORD BARDOLPH. spake one, lord, thence;  
    gentleman bred good name,
    freely rend'red news true.

                         Enter TRAVERS

  NORTHUMBERLAND. servant Travers, sent
    Tuesday listen news.
  LORD BARDOLPH. lord, over-rode way;
    furnish'd certainties
    haply retail me.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Now, Travers, good tidings you?
  TRAVERS. lord, Sir John Umfrevile turn'd back
    joyful tidings; and, hors'd,
    Out-rode me. spurring hard
    gentleman, forspent speed,
    stopp'd breathe bloodied horse.
    ask'd Chester; him
    demand news Shrewsbury.
    told rebellion bad luck,
    young Harry Percy's spur cold.  
    gave horse head
    And, bending forward, struck armed heels
    panting sides poor jade
    rowel-head; starting so,
    seem'd running devour way,
    Staying longer question.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Ha! Again:
    young Harry Percy's spur cold?
    Hotspur, Coldspur? rebellion
    met ill luck?
  LORD BARDOLPH. lord, what:
    young lord son day,
    mine honour, silken point
    give barony. talk it.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. gentleman rode Travers
    Give instances loss?
  LORD BARDOLPH. Who- he?
    hilding fellow stol'n
    horse rode and, life,
    Spoke venture. Look, news.  

                        Enter Morton

  NORTHUMBERLAND. Yea, man's brow, title-leaf,
    Foretells nature tragic volume.
    strand whereon imperious flood
    Hath left witness'd usurpation.
    Say, Morton, didst thou Shrewsbury?
  MORTON. ran Shrewsbury, noble lord;
    hateful death put ugliest mask
    fright party.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. doth son brother?
    Thou tremblest; whiteness thy cheek
    apter thy tongue thy errand.
    man, faint, spiritless,
    dull, dread look, woe-begone,
    Drew Priam's curtain dead night
    told half Troy burnt;
    Priam found fire ere tongue,
    Percy's death ere thou report'st it.  
    thou wouldst say: 'Your son thus;
    brother thus; fought noble Douglas'-
    Stopping greedy ear bold deeds;
    end, stop ear indeed,
    Thou hast sigh blow praise,
    Ending 'Brother, son, all, dead.'
  MORTON. Douglas living, brother, yet;
    lord son-
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Why, dead.
    ready tongue suspicion hath!
    fears thing know
    Hath instinct knowledge others' eyes
    fear'd chanced. speak, Morton;
    thou earl divination lies,
    sweet disgrace
    make thee rich wrong.
  MORTON. great gainsaid;
    spirit true, fears certain.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Yet, this, Percy's dead.
    strange confession thine eye;  
    Thou shak'st thy head, hold'st fear sin
    speak truth. slain, so:
    tongue offends reports death;
    doth sin doth belie dead,
    dead alive.
    bringer unwelcome news
    Hath losing office, tongue
    Sounds sullen bell,
    Rememb'red tolling departing friend.
  LORD BARDOLPH. think, lord, son dead.
  MORTON. force believe
    God seen;
    mine eyes bloody state,
    Rend'ring faint quittance, wearied out-breath'd,
    Harry Monmouth, swift wrath beat down
    never-daunted Percy earth,
    life sprung up.
    few, death- spirit lent fire
    dullest peasant camp-
    bruited once, fire heat  
    best-temper'd courage troops;
    metal party steeled;
    abated, rest
    Turn'd themselves, dull heavy lead.
    thing heavy itself
    enforcement flies greatest speed,
    men, heavy Hotspur's loss,
    Lend weight lightness fear
    arrows fled swifter aim
    soldiers, aiming safety,
    Fly field. noble Worcester
    ta'en prisoner; furious Scot,
    bloody Douglas, well-labouring sword
    times slain th' appearance King,
    Gan vail stomach grace shame
    turn'd backs, flight,
    Stumbling fear, took. sum all
    King hath won, hath out
    speedy power encounter you, lord,
    conduct young Lancaster  
    Westmoreland. news full.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. time mourn.
    poison physic; news,
    well, made sick,
    sick, measure made well;
    wretch fever-weak'ned joints,
    strengthless hinges, buckle life,
    Impatient fit, breaks fire
    keeper's arms, limbs,
    Weak'ned grief, enrag'd grief,
    thrice themselves. Hence, therefore, thou nice crutch!
    scaly gauntlet joints steel
    glove hand; hence, thou sickly coif!
    Thou art guard wanton head
    princes, flesh'd conquest, aim hit.
    bind brows iron; approach
    ragged'st hour time spite dare bring
    frown th' enrag'd Northumberland!
    heaven kiss earth! Nature's hand
    wild flood confin'd! order die!  
    world longer stage
    feed contention ling'ring act;
    spirit first-born Cain
    Reign bosoms, that, heart set
    bloody courses, rude scene end
    darkness burier dead!
  LORD BARDOLPH. strained passion doth wrong, lord.
  MORTON. Sweet Earl, divorce wisdom honour.
    lives loving complices
    Lean health; which, give o'er
    stormy passion, perforce decay.
    cast th' event war, noble lord,
    summ'd account chance said
    'Let make head.' pre-surmise
    dole blows son drop.
    knew walk'd o'er perils edge,
    fall o'er;
    advis'd flesh capable
    wounds scars, forward spirit
    lift trade danger rang'd;  
    'Go forth'; this,
    strongly apprehended, restrain
    stiff-borne action. hath befall'n,
    hath bold enterprise brought forth
    be?
  LORD BARDOLPH. engaged loss
    Knew ventured dangerous seas
    wrought life 'twas ten one;
    ventur'd, gain propos'd
    Chok'd respect peril fear'd;
    o'erset, venture again.
    Come, put forth, body goods.
  MORTON. 'Tis time. And, noble lord,
    hear certain, dare speak truth:
    gentle Archbishop York up
    well-appointed pow'rs. man
    double surety binds followers.
    lord son corpse,
    shadows shows men, fight;
    word 'rebellion' divide  
    action bodies souls;
    fight queasiness, constrain'd,
    men drink potions; weapons only
    Seem'd side, spirits souls
    word 'rebellion'- froze up,
    fish pond. Bishop
    Turns insurrection religion.
    Suppos'd sincere holy thoughts,
    follow'd body mind;
    doth enlarge rising blood
    fair King Richard, scrap'd Pomfret stones;
    Derives heaven quarrel cause;
    Tells doth bestride bleeding land,
    Gasping life great Bolingbroke;
    flock follow him.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. knew before; but, speak truth,
    present grief wip'd mind.
    me; counsel man
    aptest safety revenge.
    posts letters, make friends speed-  
    few, need.                Exeunt




SCENE II.
London. street

Enter SIR JOHN FALSTAFF, PAGE bearing sword buckler

  FALSTAFF. Sirrah, giant, doctor water?
  PAGE. said, sir, water good healthy water; but
    party owed it, moe diseases he
    knew for.
  FALSTAFF. Men sorts pride gird me. brain of
    foolish-compounded clay, man, invent anything
    intends laughter, invent invented on
    me. witty myself, wit in
    men. walk thee sow hath
    overwhelm'd litter one. Prince put thee into
    service reason set off, I
    judgment. Thou whoreson mandrake, thou art fitter be
    worn cap wait heels. mann'd with
    agate till now; inset gold nor
    silver, vile apparel, send back your
    master, jewel- juvenal, Prince master,  
    chin fledge. sooner beard grow the
    palm hand cheek; he
    stick face face-royal. God finish it
    will, 'tis hair amiss yet. at
    face-royal, barber earn sixpence it;
    crowing writ man his
    father bachelor. grace, almost
    mine, assure him. Master Dommelton about
    satin short cloak slops?
  PAGE. said, sir, procure assurance than
    Bardolph. band yours; the
    security.
  FALSTAFF. damn'd, Glutton; pray God tongue
    hotter! whoreson Achitophel! rascal-yea-forsooth knave, to
    bear gentleman hand, stand security! The
    whoreson smooth-pates wear high shoes, and
    bunches keys girdles; man with
    honest taking-up, stand security. I
    lief put ratsbane mouth offer stop
    security. look'd 'a twenty  
    yards satin, true knight, sends security.
    Well, sleep security; hath horn of
    abundance, lightness wife shines it; and
    see, lanthorn light him.
    Bardolph?
  PAGE. Smithfield buy worship horse.
  FALSTAFF. bought Paul's, buy horse in
    Smithfield. wife stews, were
    mann'd, hors'd, wiv'd.

              Enter LORD CHIEF JUSTICE SERVANT

  PAGE. Sir, nobleman committed the
    Prince striking Bardolph.
  FALSTAFF. Wait close; him.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. there?
  SERVANT. Falstaff, an't lordship.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. question robb'ry?
  SERVANT. He, lord; hath good service at
    Shrewsbury, and, hear, charge  
    Lord John Lancaster.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. What, York? Call back again.
  SERVANT. Sir John Falstaff!
  FALSTAFF. Boy, deaf.
  PAGE. speak louder; master deaf.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. is, hearing good.
    Go, pluck elbow; speak him.
  SERVANT. Sir John!
  FALSTAFF. What! young knave, begging! wars? Is
    employment? Doth King lack subjects? the
    rebels soldiers? shame side but
    one, worse shame beg worst side, were
    worse rebellion make it.
  SERVANT. mistake me, sir.
  FALSTAFF. Why, sir, honest man? Setting my
    knighthood soldiership aside, lied throat I
    so.
  SERVANT. pray you, sir, set knighthood your
    soldiership aside; give leave your
    throat, honest man.  
  FALSTAFF. give thee leave so! lay which
    grows me! thou get'st leave me, hang me; thou
    tak'st leave, thou wert hang'd. hunt counter.
    Hence! Avaunt!
  SERVANT. Sir, lord speak you.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Sir John Falstaff, word you.
  FALSTAFF. good lord! God give lordship good time day. I
    glad lordship abroad. heard lordship
    sick; hope lordship abroad advice. Your
    lordship, clean past youth, hath smack
    age you, relish saltness time; most
    humbly beseech lordship reverend care your
    health.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Sir John, expedition to
    Shrewsbury.
  FALSTAFF. An't lordship, hear Majesty return'd
    discomfort Wales.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. talk Majesty. I
    you.
  FALSTAFF. hear, moreover, Highness fall'n  
    whoreson apoplexy.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. God mend him! pray speak you.
  FALSTAFF. apoplexy, it, kind lethargy, an't
    lordship, kind sleeping blood, whoreson
    tingling.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. it? is.
  FALSTAFF. hath original grief, study, and
    perturbation brain. read effects
    Galen; kind deafness.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. fall'n disease, you
    hear you.
  FALSTAFF. well, lord, well. an't you, it
    disease listening, malady marking, that
    troubled withal.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. punish heels amend attention
    ears; care physician.
  FALSTAFF. poor Job, lord, patient. Your
    lordship minister potion imprisonment respect
    poverty; patient follow your
    prescriptions, wise make dram scruple,  
    scruple itself.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. you, matters you
    life, speak me.
  FALSTAFF. advis'd learned counsel laws
    land-service, come.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Well, truth is, Sir John, live great
    infamy.
  FALSTAFF. buckles belt live less.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. means slender, waste is
    great.
  FALSTAFF. otherwise; means greater
    waist slenderer.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. misled youthful Prince.
  FALSTAFF. young Prince hath misled me. fellow the
    great belly, dog.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Well, loath gall new-heal'd wound. Your
    day's service Shrewsbury hath gilded your
    night's exploit Gadshill. th' unquiet time for
    quiet o'erposting action.
  FALSTAFF. lord-  
  CHIEF JUSTICE. well, so: wake a
    sleeping wolf.
  FALSTAFF. wake wolf bad smell fox.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. What! candle, part burnt
    out.
  FALSTAFF. wassail candle, lord- tallow; of
    wax, growth approve truth.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. white hair face should
    effect gravity.
  FALSTAFF. effect gravy, gravy,
  CHIEF JUSTICE. follow young Prince down, his
    ill angel.
  FALSTAFF. so, lord. ill angel light;  hope he
    weighing. some
    respects, grant, go- tell. Virtue so
    regard costermongers' times true valour is
    turn'd berod; pregnancy made tapster, quick wit
    wasted giving reckonings; gifts appertinent to
    man, malice age shapes them, worth a
    gooseberry. capacities  
    young; measure heat livers the
    bitterness galls; vaward our
    youth, confess, wags too.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. set scroll youth,
    written characters age? Have
    moist eye, dry hand, yellow cheek, white beard, a
    decreasing leg, increasing belly? voice broken,
    wind short, chin double, wit single, every
    part blasted antiquity? call
    young? Fie, fie, fie, Sir John!
  FALSTAFF. lord, born clock the
    afternoon, white head round belly. my
    voice- lost hallooing singing anthems. To
    approve youth further, not. truth is, old
    judgment understanding; caper for
    thousand marks, lend money, him. For
    box ear Prince gave you- gave a
    rude prince, lord. check'd
    it; young lion repents- marry, ashes and
    sackcloth, silk sack.  
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Well, God send Prince companion!
  FALSTAFF. God send companion prince! rid my
    hands him.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Well, King hath sever'd you. hear are
    Lord John Lancaster Archbishop the
    Earl Northumberland.
  FALSTAFF. Yea; pretty sweet wit it. you
    pray, kiss Lady Peace home, armies
    join hot day; for, Lord, shirts
    me, sweat extraordinarily. a
    hot day, brandish bottle, might
    spit white again. dangerous action peep
    head thrust it. Well, ever;
    alway trick English nation, they
    good thing, make common. ye I
    man, give rest. God name
    terrible enemy is. be
    eaten death rust scoured with
    perpetual motion.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Well, honest, honest; God bless  
    expedition!
  FALSTAFF. lordship lend thousand pound furnish me
    forth?
  CHIEF JUSTICE. penny, penny; impatient to
    bear crosses. Fare well. Commend cousin
    Westmoreland.
                                Exeunt CHIEF JUSTICE SERVANT
  FALSTAFF. do, fillip three-man beetle. man no
    separate age covetousness 'a part young limbs
    lechery; gout galls one, pox pinches the
    other; degrees prevent curses. Boy!
  PAGE. Sir?
  FALSTAFF. money purse?
  PAGE. groats pence.
  FALSTAFF. remedy consumption the
    purse; borrowing lingers lingers out, disease
    incurable. bear letter Lord Lancaster; this
    Prince; Earl Westmoreland; old
    Mistress Ursula, weekly sworn marry I
    perceiv'd white hair chin. it;  
    find me.  [Exit PAGE]  pox gout! or, gout of
    pox! plays rogue great
    toe. 'Tis matter halt; wars colour,
    pension reasonable. good wit will
    make anything. turn diseases commodity.
 Exit




SCENE III.
York. ARCHBISHOP'S palace

Enter ARCHBISHOP, THOMAS MOWBRAY EARL MARSHAL, LORD HASTINGS,
and LORD BARDOLPH

  ARCHBISHOP. heard means;
    And, noble friends, pray all
    Speak plainly opinions hopes-
    first, Lord Marshal, it?
  MOWBRAY. occasion amis;
    gladly satisfied
    How, means, advance ourselves
    forehead bold big enough
    power puissance King.
  HASTINGS. present musters grow file
    twenty thousand men choice;
    supplies live largely hope
    great Northumberland, bosom burns
    incensed fire injuries.
  LORD BARDOLPH. question then, Lord Hastings, standeth thus:
    present twenty thousand  
    hold head Northumberland?
  HASTINGS. him, may.
  LORD BARDOLPH. Yea, marry, point;
    thought feeble,
    judgment step far
    Till assistance hand;
    For, theme bloody-fac'd this,
    Conjecture, expectation, surmise
    aids incertain, admitted.
  ARCHBISHOP. 'Tis true, Lord Bardolph; indeed
    young Hotspur's case Shrewsbury.
  LORD BARDOLPH. was, lord; lin'd hope,
    Eating air promise supply,
    Flatt'ring project power
    smaller smallest thoughts;
    so, great imagination
    Proper madmen, led powers death,
    And, winking, leapt destruction.
  HASTINGS. But, leave, hurt
    lay likelihoods forms hope.  
  LORD BARDOLPH. Yes, present quality war-
    instant action, foot-
    Lives hope, early spring
    th' appearing buds; prove fruit
    Hope warrant, despair
    frosts bite them. build,
    survey plot, draw model;
    figure house,
    rate cost erection;
    find outweighs ability,
    draw anew model
    fewer offices, desist
    build all? more, great work-
    pluck kingdom down
    set up- survey
    plot situation model,
    Consent foundation,
    Question surveyors, estate
    work undergo-
    weigh opposite;  
    fortify paper figures,
    names men men;
    draws model house
    power build it; who, half through,
    o'er leaves part-created cost
    naked subject weeping clouds
    waste churlish winter's tyranny.
  HASTINGS. Grant hopes- fair birth-
    still-born, possess'd
    utmost man expectation,
    body strong enough,
    are, equal King.
  LORD BARDOLPH. What, King twenty thousand?
  HASTINGS. more; nay, much, Lord Bardolph;
    divisions, times brawl,
    heads: power French,
    Glendower; perforce third
    us. unfirm King
    divided; coffers sound
    hollow poverty emptiness.  
  ARCHBISHOP. draw strengths together
    full puissance
    dreaded.
  HASTINGS. so,
    leaves back unarm'd, French Welsh
    Baying heels. fear that.
  LORD BARDOLPH. lead forces hither?
  HASTINGS. Duke Lancaster Westmoreland;
    Welsh, Harry Monmouth;
    substituted French
    notice.
  ARCHBISHOP. on,
    publish occasion arms.
    commonwealth sick choice;
    over-greedy love hath surfeited.
    habitation giddy unsure
    Hath buildeth vulgar heart.
    O thou fond many, loud applause
    Didst thou beat heaven blessing Bolingbroke
    thou wouldst be!  
    trimm'd thine desires,
    Thou, beastly feeder, art full him
    thou provok'st thyself cast up.
    So, so, thou common dog, didst thou disgorge
    Thy glutton bosom royal Richard;
    thou wouldst eat thy dead vomit up,
    howl'st find it. trust times?
    that, Richard liv'd, die
    enamour'd grave.
    Thou threw'st dust goodly head,
    proud London sighing on
    th' admired heels Bolingbroke,
    Criest 'O earth, yield king again,
    thou this!' O thoughts men accurs'd!
    Past best; things present, worst.
  MOWBRAY. draw numbers, set on?
  HASTINGS. time's subjects, time bids gone.
                                                          Exeunt
