ACT II. SCENE I.
London. street

Enter HOSTESS officers, FANG SNARE

  HOSTESS. Master Fang, ent'red action?
  FANG. ent'red.
  HOSTESS. yeoman? Is't lusty yeoman? 'a stand
    to't?
  FANG. Sirrah, Snare?
  HOSTESS. O Lord, ay! good Master Snare.
  SNARE. Here, here.
  FANG. Snare, arrest Sir John Falstaff.
  HOSTESS. Yea, good Master Snare; ent'red all.
  SNARE. chance cost lives, stab.
  HOSTESS. Alas day! heed him; stabb'd mine own
    house, beastly. good faith, 'a cares what
    mischief does, weapon out; foin any
    devil; spare man, woman, child.
  FANG. close him, care thrust.
  HOSTESS. No, neither; elbow.
  FANG. fist once; 'a vice!  
  HOSTESS. undone going; warrant you, an
    infinitive thing score. Good Master Fang, hold sure.
    Good Master Snare, scape. 'A continuantly to
    Pie-corner- saving manhoods- buy saddle; is
    indited dinner Lubber's Head Lumbert Street, to
    Master Smooth's silkman. pray you, exion is
    ent'red, case openly world, be
    brought answer. hundred mark long poor
    lone woman bear; borne, borne, borne; and
    fubb'd off, fubb'd off, fubb'd off, this
    day day, shame thought on. no
    honesty dealing; woman made ass and
    beast, bear knave's wrong.

            Enter SIR JOHN FALSTAFF, PAGE, BARDOLPH

    Yonder comes; arrant malmsey-nose knave, Bardolph,
    him. offices, offices, Master Fang and
    Master Snare; me, me, offices.
  FALSTAFF. now! mare's dead? matter?  
  FANG. Sir John, arrest suit Mistress Quickly.
  FALSTAFF. Away, varlets! Draw, Bardolph. Cut villian's
    head. Throw quean channel.
  HOSTESS. Throw channel! throw thee channel.
    Wilt thou? wilt thou? thou bastardly rogue! Murder, murder! Ah,
    thou honeysuckle villain! wilt thou kill God's officers the
    King's? Ah, thou honey-seed rogue! thou art honey-seed; a
    man-queller woman-queller.
  FALSTAFF. off, Bardolph.
  FANG. rescue! rescue!
  HOSTESS. Good people, bring rescue two. Thou wot, wot thou!
    thou wot, wot ta? Do, do, thou rogue! do, thou hemp-seed!
  PAGE. Away, scullion! rampallian! fustilarian!
    tickle catastrophe.

              Enter LORD CHIEF JUSTICE men

  CHIEF JUSTICE. matter? peace here, ho!
  HOSTESS. Good lord, good me. beseech you, stand me.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. now, Sir John! what, brawling here?  
    Doth place, time, business?
    York.
    Stand him, fellow; wherefore hang'st thou him?
  HOSTESS. O worshipful lord, an't Grace, a
    poor widow Eastcheap, arrested suit.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. sum?
  HOSTESS. some, lord; all- I
    have. hath eaten house home; hath put my
    substance fat belly his. it
    again, ride thee nights mare.
  FALSTAFF. ride mare, any
    vantage ground up.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. this, Sir John? Fie! man good
    temper endure tempest exclamation? not
    ashamed enforce poor widow rough by
    own?
  FALSTAFF. gross sum owe thee?
  HOSTESS. Marry, thou wert honest man, thyself money
    too. Thou didst swear parcel-gilt goblet, sitting in
    Dolphin chamber, round table, sea-coal fire,  
    Wednesday Wheeson week, Prince broke thy head for
    liking father singing-man Windsor- thou didst swear to
    then, washing thy wound, marry make my
    lady thy wife. Canst thou deny it? goodwife Keech, the
    butcher's wife, call gossip Quickly? Coming
    borrow mess vinegar, telling good dish of
    prawns, thou didst desire eat some, told
    thee ill green wound? didst thou not, she
    stairs, desire familiarity with
    poor people, ere long call madam?
    didst thou kiss me, bid fetch thirty
    shillings? put thee thy book-oath. Deny it, thou
    canst.
  FALSTAFF. lord, poor mad soul, and
    town eldest son you. hath in
    good case, and, truth is, poverty hath distracted her. But
    foolish officers, beseech redress
    them.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Sir John, Sir John, acquainted your
    manner wrenching true false way.  
    confident brow, throng words more
    impudent sauciness you, thrust level
    consideration. have, appears me, practis'd the
    easy yielding spirit woman, made serve uses
    purse person.
  HOSTESS. Yea, truth, lord.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Pray thee, peace. Pay debt owe her, and
    unpay villainy her; do
    sterling money, current repentance.
  FALSTAFF. lord, undergo sneap reply. You
    call honourable boldness impudent sauciness; man make
    curtsy nothing, virtuous. No, lord, humble
    duty rememb'red, suitor. do
    desire deliverance officers, hasty
    employment King's affairs.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. speak power wrong; answer in
    th' effect reputation, satisfy poor woman.
  FALSTAFF. hither, hostess.

                               Enter GOWER  

  CHIEF JUSTICE. Now, Master Gower, news?
  GOWER. King, lord, Harry Prince Wales
    hand. rest paper tells. [Gives letter]
  FALSTAFF. gentleman!
  HOSTESS. Faith, before.
  FALSTAFF. gentleman! Come, words it.
  HOSTESS. heavenly ground tread on, fain pawn
    plate tapestry dining-chambers.
  FALSTAFF. Glasses, glasses, drinking; thy
    walls, pretty slight drollery, story Prodigal, or
    German hunting, water-work, worth thousand these
    bed-hangers fly-bitten tapestries. ten pound,
    thou canst. Come, 'twere thy humours, not
    wench England. Go, wash thy face, draw the
    action. Come, thou humour me; dost not
    me? Come, come, thou wast set this.
  HOSTESS. Pray thee, Sir John, twenty nobles;
    i' faith, loath pawn plate, God save me, la!
  FALSTAFF. alone; make shift. fool  
    still.
  HOSTESS. Well, it, pawn gown.
    hope supper. pay together?
  FALSTAFF. live?  [To BARDOLPH]  Go, her, her; hook
    on, hook on.
  HOSTESS. Doll Tearsheet meet supper?
  FALSTAFF. words; her.
                          Exeunt HOSTESS, BARDOLPH, OFFICERS
  CHIEF JUSTICE. heard news.
  FALSTAFF. news, lord?
  CHIEF JUSTICE. lay King to-night?
  GOWER. Basingstoke, lord.
  FALSTAFF. hope, lord, all's well. news, lord?
  CHIEF JUSTICE. forces back?
  GOWER. No; fifteen hundred foot, hundred horse,
    march'd Lord Lancaster,
    Northumberland Archbishop.
  FALSTAFF. King back Wales, noble lord?
  CHIEF JUSTICE. letters presently.
    Come, me, good Master Gower.  
  FALSTAFF. lord!
  CHIEF JUSTICE. matter?
  FALSTAFF. Master Gower, entreat dinner?
  GOWER. wait good lord here, you, good Sir
    John.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Sir John, loiter long, to
    soldiers counties go.
  FALSTAFF. me, Master Gower?
  CHIEF JUSTICE. foolish master taught manners, Sir
    John?
  FALSTAFF. Master Gower, not, fool that
    taught me. fencing grace, lord; tap for
    tap, part fair.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Now, Lord lighten thee! Thou art great fool.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE II.
London. street

Enter PRINCE HENRY POINS

  PRINCE. God, exceeding weary.
  POINS. Is't that? thought weariness durst have
    attach'd high blood.
  PRINCE. Faith, me; discolours complexion of
    greatness acknowledge it. Doth show vilely to
    desire small beer?
  POINS. Why, prince loosely studied to
    remember weak composition.
  PRINCE. Belike appetite not-princely got; for, my
    troth, remember poor creature, small beer. But
    humble considerations make love my
    greatness. disgrace remember thy name, or
    thy face to-morrow, note pair silk
    stockings thou hast- viz., these, thy
    peach-colour'd ones- bear inventory thy shirts- as,
    superfluity, use! the
    tennis-court-keeper I; low ebb  
    linen thee thou keepest racket there; thou hast
    great while, rest thy low countries
    made shift eat thy holland. God whether
    bawl ruins thy linen inherit his
    kingdom; midwives children fault;
    world increases, kindreds mightily
    strengthened.
  POINS. ill follows, laboured hard, you
    talk idly! me, good young princes would
    so, fathers sick time is?
  PRINCE. thee thing, Poins?
  POINS. Yes, faith; excellent good thing.
  PRINCE. serve wits higher breeding thine.
  POINS. to; stand push thing will
    tell.
  PRINCE. Marry, thee meet sad, now
    father sick; albeit thee- it
    pleases me, fault better, call friend- be
    sad sad too.
  POINS. subject.  
  PRINCE. hand, thou thinkest devil's book
    thou Falstaff obduracy persistency: end
    man. thee heart bleeds inwardly my
    father sick; keeping vile company thou art hath
    reason ostentation sorrow.
  POINS. reason?
  PRINCE. wouldst thou weep?
  POINS. thee princely hypocrite.
  PRINCE. man's thought; thou art blessed
    fellow man thinks. man's thought the
    world road-way thine. man think
    hypocrite indeed. accites worshipful
    thought so?
  POINS. Why, lewd engraffed to
    Falstaff.
  PRINCE. thee.
  POINS. light, spoke on; hear mine
    ears. worst second
    brother proper fellow hands; two
    things, confess, help. mass,  
    Bardolph.

                         Enter BARDOLPH PAGE

  PRINCE. boy gave Falstaff. 'A me
    Christian; fat villain transform'd him
    ape.
  BARDOLPH. God save Grace!
  PRINCE. yours, noble Bardolph!
  POINS. Come, virtuous ass, bashful fool, be
    blushing? Wherefore blush now? maidenly man-at-arms
    become! Is't matter pottle-pot's
    maidenhead?
  PAGE. 'A calls e'en now, lord, red lattice, I
    discern part face window. I
    spied eyes; methought made holes the
    alewife's petticoat, peep'd through.
  PRINCE. boy profited?
  BARDOLPH. Away, whoreson upright rabbit, away!
  PAGE. Away, rascally Althaea's dream, away!  
  PRINCE. Instruct us, boy; dream, boy?
  PAGE. Marry, lord, Althaea dreamt delivered a
    firebrand; call dream.
  PRINCE. crown's worth good interpretation. 'tis, boy.
                                                [Giving crown]
  POINS. O blossom cankers!
    Well, sixpence preserve thee.
  BARDOLPH. make hang'd you, gallows
    wrong.
  PRINCE. doth thy master, Bardolph?
  BARDOLPH. Well, lord. heard Grace's coming town.
    letter you.
  POINS. Deliver'd good respect. doth martlemas,
    master?
  BARDOLPH. bodily health, sir.
  POINS. Marry, immortal part physician; moves
    him. sick, dies not.
  PRINCE. familiar dog;
    holds place, writes.
  POINS.  [Reads]  'John Falstaff, knight'- man  
    oft occasion himself, that
    kin King; prick finger they
    'There's King's blood spilt.' 'How that?'
    takes conceive. answer as
    ready borrower's cap: 'I King's poor cousin, sir.'
  PRINCE. Nay, kin us, fetch from
    Japhet. letter:  [Reads]  'Sir John Falstaff, knight, to
    son King nearest father, Harry Prince Wales,
    greeting.'
  POINS. Why, certificate.
  PRINCE. Peace!  [Reads]  'I imitate honourable Romans in
    brevity.'-
  POINS. means brevity breath, short-winded.
  PRINCE.  [Reads]  'I commend thee, commend thee, I
    leave thee. familiar Poins; misuses thy
    favours swears thou art marry sister Nell.
    Repent idle times thou mayst, farewell.
      Thine, yea no- as
        thou usest him- JACK FALSTAFF familiars,
        JOHN brothers sisters, SIR JOHN  
        Europe.'
  POINS. lord, steep letter sack make eat it.
  PRINCE. make eat twenty words. use
    thus, Ned? marry sister?
  POINS. God send wench worse fortune! so.
  PRINCE. Well, play fools time, spirits
    wise sit clouds mock us. master in
    London?
  BARDOLPH. Yea, lord.
  PRINCE. sups he? Doth boar feed frank?
  BARDOLPH. place, lord, Eastcheap.
  PRINCE. company?
  PAGE. Ephesians, lord, church.
  PRINCE. women him?
  PAGE. None, lord, Mistress Quickly Mistress Doll
    Tearsheet.
  PRINCE. pagan be?
  PAGE. proper gentlewoman, sir, kinswoman master's.
  PRINCE. kin parish heifers town bull.
    steal them, Ned, supper?  
  POINS. shadow, lord; follow you.
  PRINCE. Sirrah, boy, Bardolph, word master that
    town. silence.
  BARDOLPH. tongue, sir.
  PAGE. mine, sir, govern it.
  PRINCE. Fare well; go.            Exeunt BARDOLPH PAGE
    Doll Tearsheet road.
  POINS. warrant you, common Saint Albans and
    London.
  PRINCE. Falstaff bestow to-night his
    true colours, seen?
  POINS. Put leathern jerkins aprons, wait at
    table drawers.
  PRINCE. god bull? heavy descension! Jove's
    case. prince prentice? low transformation! That
    mine; purpose weigh the
    folly. Follow me, Ned.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE III.
Warkworth. castle

Enter NORTHUMBERLAND, LADY NORTHUMBERLAND, LADY PERCY

  NORTHUMBERLAND. pray thee, loving wife, gentle daughter,
    Give rough affairs;
    Put visage times
    be, them, Percy troublesome.
  LADY NORTHUMBERLAND. over, speak more.
    will; wisdom guide.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Alas, sweet wife, honour pawn;
    redeem it.
  LADY PERCY. O, yet, God's sake, wars!
    time was, father, broke word,
    endear'd now;
    Percy, heart's dear Harry,
    Threw northward father
    Bring powers; long vain.
    persuaded stay home?
    honours lost, son's.  
    yours, God heaven brighten it!
    his, stuck sun
    grey vault heaven; light
    chivalry England move
    brave acts. glass
    noble youth dress themselves.
    legs practis'd gait;
    speaking thick, nature made blemish,
    accents valiant;
    speak low tardily
    turn perfection abuse
    him: speech, gait,
    diet, affections delight,
    military rules, humours blood,
    mark glass, copy book,
    fashion'd others. him- O wondrous him!
    O miracle men!- leave-
    none, unseconded you-
    hideous god war
    disadvantage, abide field  
    sound Hotspur's name
    defensible. left him.
    Never, O never, ghost wrong
    hold honour precise nice
    him! alone.
    Marshal Archbishop strong.
    sweet Harry half numbers,
    To-day I, hanging Hotspur's neck,
    talk'd Monmouth's grave.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Beshrew heart,
    Fair daughter, draw spirits me
    lamenting ancient oversights.
    meet danger there,
    seek place,
    find worse provided.
  LADY NORTHUMBERLAND. O, fly Scotland
    Till nobles armed commons
    puissance made taste.
  LADY PERCY. ground vantage King,
    join them, rib steel,  
    make strength stronger; but, loves,
    themselves. son;
    suff'red; widow;
    length life enough
    rain remembrance mine eyes,
    grow sprout high heaven,
    recordation noble husband.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Come, come, me. 'Tis mind
    tide swell'd height,
    makes still-stand, running way.
    Fain meet Archbishop,
    thousand reasons hold back.
    resolve Scotland. I,
    Till time vantage crave company.               Exeunt




SCENE IV.
London. Boar's Head Tavern Eastcheap

Enter FRANCIS DRAWER

  FRANCIS. devil hast thou brought there-apple-johns? Thou
    knowest Sir John endure apple-john.
  DRAWER. Mass, thou say'st true. Prince set dish
    apple-johns him, told Sir
    Johns; and, putting hat, 'I leave
    dry, round, old, withered knights.' ang'red him
    heart; hath forgot that.
  FRANCIS. Why, then, cover set down; thou canst
    find Sneak's noise; Mistress Tearsheet fain hear some
    music.

                        Enter DRAWER

  DRAWER. Dispatch! room supp'd hot;
    straight.
  FRANCIS. Sirrah, Prince Master Poins anon; and
    put jerkins aprons; Sir John  
    it. Bardolph hath brought word.
  DRAWER. mass, uds; an
    excellent stratagem.
  DRAWER. find Sneak.
                                 Exeunt DRAWERS

                Enter HOSTESS DOLL TEARSHEET

  HOSTESS. I' faith, sweetheart, methinks excellent
    good temperality. pulsidge beats extraordinarily heart
    desire; colour, warrant you, red any
    rose, good truth, la! But, i' faith, drunk much
    canaries; marvellous searching wine, perfumes
    blood ere 'What's this?' now?
  DOLL. was- hem.
  HOSTESS. Why, said; good heart's worth gold.
    Lo, Sir John.

                          Enter FALSTAFF
  
  FALSTAFF.  [Singing]  'When Arthur court'- Empty the
    jordan.  [Exit FRANCIS]- [Singing]  'And worthy king'- How
    now, Mistress Doll!
  HOSTESS. Sick calm; yea, good faith.
  FALSTAFF. sect; calm, are
    sick.
  DOLL. pox damn you, muddy rascal! comfort you
    give me?
  FALSTAFF. make fat rascals, Mistress Doll.
  DOLL. make them! Gluttony diseases make them: make them
    not.
  FALSTAFF. cook make gluttony, make
    diseases, Doll. catch you, Doll, catch you; grant
    that, poor virtue, grant that.
  DOLL. Yea, joy, chains jewels.
  FALSTAFF. 'Your brooches, pearls, ouches.' serve bravely
    halting off; know, breach his
    pike bent bravely, surgery bravely; venture the
    charg'd chambers bravely-
  DOLL. Hang yourself, muddy conger, hang yourself!  
  HOSTESS. troth, fashion; meet
    fall discord. both, i' good truth, as
    rheumatic dry toasts; bear another's
    confirmities. good-year! bear, be
    you. weaker vessel, say, emptier
    vessel.
  DOLL. weak empty vessel bear huge full hogs-head?
    merchant's venture Bourdeaux stuff him; you
    hulk stuff'd hold. Come, be
    friends thee, Jack. Thou art wars; whether
    thee no, cares.

                            Re-enter FRANCIS

  FRANCIS. Sir, Ancient Pistol's speak you.
  DOLL. Hang him, swaggering rascal! hither; is
    foul-mouth'dst rogue England.
  HOSTESS. swagger, here. No, faith! I
    live neighbours; swaggerers. good
    fame best. Shut door.  
    swaggerers here; liv'd have
    swaggering now. Shut door, pray you.
  FALSTAFF. Dost thou hear, hostess?
  HOSTESS. Pray ye, pacify yourself, Sir John; no
    swaggerers here.
  FALSTAFF. Dost thou hear? mine ancient.
  HOSTESS. Tilly-fally, Sir John, ne'er me; ancient
    swagg'rer doors. Master Tisick, the
    debuty, t' day; and, me- 'twas longer ago
    Wednesday last, i' good faith!- 'Neighbour Quickly,' says
    he- Master Dumbe, minister, then- 'Neighbour Quickly,'
    'receive civil, for' 'you in
    ill name.' 'a so, whereupon. 'For' he
    'you honest woman thought on, heed
    guests receive. Receive' 'no swaggering
    companions.' here. bless hear
    said. No, swagg'rers.
  FALSTAFF. swagg'rer, hostess; tame cheater, i' faith; you
    stroke gently puppy greyhound. swagger
    Barbary hen, feathers turn back show  
    resistance. Call up, drawer.
                                                    Exit FRANCIS
  HOSTESS. Cheater, call him? bar honest man house,
    cheater; love swaggering, troth. am
    worse 'swagger.' Feel, masters, shake;
    you, warrant you.
  DOLL. do, hostess.
  HOSTESS. I? Yea, truth, I, 'twere aspen leaf. I
    abide swagg'rers.

                   Enter PISTOL, BARDOLPH, PAGE

  PISTOL. God save you, Sir John!
  FALSTAFF. Welcome, Ancient Pistol. Here, Pistol, charge with
    cup sack; discharge mine hostess.
  PISTOL. discharge her, Sir John, bullets.
  FALSTAFF. pistol-proof, sir; offend
    her.
  HOSTESS. Come, drink proofs bullets. drink no
    good, man's pleasure, I.  
  PISTOL. you, Mistress Dorothy; charge you.
  DOLL. Charge me! scorn you, scurvy companion. What! poor,
    base, rascally, cheating, lack-linen mate! Away, mouldy
    rogue, away! meat master.
  PISTOL. you, Mistress Dorothy.
  DOLL. Away, cut-purse rascal! filthy bung, away! this
    wine, thrust knife mouldy chaps, play the
    saucy cuttle me. Away, bottle-ale rascal! you
    basket-hilt stale juggler, you! when, pray you, sir?
    God's light, points shoulder? Much!
  PISTOL. God live murder ruff this.
  FALSTAFF. more, Pistol; here.
    Discharge company, Pistol.
  HOSTESS. No, good Captain Pistol; here, sweet captain.
  DOLL. Captain! Thou abominable damn'd cheater, art thou ashamed
    called captain? captains mind, would
    truncheon out, taking names you
    earn'd them. captain! slave, what? tearing
    poor whore's ruff bawdy-house? captain! hang him,
    rogue! lives mouldy stew'd prunes dried cakes.  
    captain! God's light, villains make word odious
    word 'occupy'; excellent good word it
    ill sorted. captains to't.
  BARDOLPH. Pray thee down, good ancient.
  FALSTAFF. Hark thee hither, Mistress Doll.
  PISTOL. I! thee what, Corporal Bardolph, tear
    her; reveng'd her.
  PAGE. Pray thee down.
  PISTOL. damn'd first; Pluto's damn'd lake, this
    hand, th' infernal deep, Erebus tortures vile also.
    Hold hook line, I. Down, down, dogs! down, faitors! Have
    Hiren here?
  HOSTESS. Good Captain Peesel, quiet; 'tis late, i' faith; I
    beseek now, aggravate choler.
  PISTOL. good humours, indeed! packhorses,
    hollow pamper'd jades Asia,
    thirty mile day,
    Compare Caesars, Cannibals,
    Troiant Greeks? Nay, damn with
    King Cerberus; welkin roar.  
    fall foul toys?
  HOSTESS. troth, Captain, bitter words.
  BARDOLPH. gone, good ancient; grow brawl anon.
  PISTOL. Die men dogs! Give crowns pins! Hiren
    here?
  HOSTESS. O' word, Captain, here. the
    good-year! deny her? God's sake, be
    quiet.
  PISTOL. feed fat, fair Calipolis.
    Come, give's sack.
    'Si fortune tormente sperato contento.'
    Fear broadsides? No, fiend give fire.
    Give sack; and, sweetheart, lie thou there.
                                         [Laying sword]
    full points here, etceteras nothings?
  FALSTAFF. Pistol, quiet.
  PISTOL. Sweet knight, kiss thy neaf. What! seven
    stars.
  DOLL. God's sake thrust stairs; endure a
    fustian rascal.  
  PISTOL. Thrust stairs! Galloway nags?
  FALSTAFF. Quoit down, Bardolph, shove-groat shilling.
    Nay, 'a speak nothing, 'a nothing
    here.
  BARDOLPH. Come, stairs.
  PISTOL. What! incision? imbrue?
                                        [Snatching sword]
    death rock asleep, abridge doleful days!
    Why, then, grievous, ghastly, gaping wounds
    Untwine Sisters Three! Come, Atropos, say!
  HOSTESS. goodly stuff toward!
  FALSTAFF. Give rapier, boy.
  DOLL. pray thee, Jack, pray thee, draw.
  FALSTAFF. stairs.
                                [Drawing driving PISTOL out]
  HOSTESS. goodly tumult! forswear keeping house afore
    tirrits frights. So; murder, warrant now.
    Alas, alas! put naked weapons, put naked weapons.
                                      Exeunt PISTOL BARDOLPH
  DOLL. pray thee, Jack, quiet; rascal's gone. Ah,  
    whoreson valiant villain, you!
  HOSTESS. hurt i' th' groin? Methought 'a made shrewd
    thrust belly.

                        Re-enter BARDOLPH

  FALSTAFF. turn'd doors?
  BARDOLPH. Yea, sir. rascal's drunk. hurt him, sir, i'
    th' shoulder.
  FALSTAFF. rascal! brave me!
  DOLL. Ah, sweet rogue, you! Alas, poor ape, thou
    sweat'st! Come, wipe thy face. on, whoreson
    chops. Ah, rogue! i' faith, love thee. Thou art valorous as
    Hector Troy, worth Agamemnon, ten times better
    Worthies. Ah, villain!
  FALSTAFF. rascally slave! toss rogue blanket.
  DOLL. Do, thou dar'st thy heart. thou dost, canvass
    thee pair sheets.

                          Enter musicians  

  PAGE. music come, sir.
  FALSTAFF. play. Play, sirs. Sit knee, Don. rascal
    bragging slave! rogue fled quick-silver.
  DOLL. I' faith, thou follow'dst church. Thou
    whoreson tidy Bartholomew boar-pig, wilt thou leave
    fighting days foining nights, begin patch thine
    body heaven?

       Enter, behind, PRINCE HENRY POINS disguised drawers

  FALSTAFF. Peace, good Doll! speak death's-head; do
    bid remember mine end.
  DOLL. Sirrah, humour's Prince of?
  FALSTAFF. good shallow young fellow. 'A made good
    pantler; 'a ha' chipp'd bread well.
  DOLL. Poins good wit.
  FALSTAFF. good wit! hang him, baboon! wit's thick as
    Tewksbury mustard; conceit a
    mallet.  
  DOLL. Prince love so, then?
  FALSTAFF. legs bigness, 'a plays at
    quoits well, eats conger fennel, drinks candles'
    ends flap-dragons, rides wild mare boys, and
    jumps join'd-stools, swears good grace, wears
    boots smooth, sign Leg, breeds
    bate telling discreet stories; gambol
    faculties 'a has, show weak mind body, the
    Prince admits him. Prince such
    another; weight hair turn scales their
    avoirdupois.
  PRINCE. nave wheel ears cut off?
  POINS. beat whore.
  PRINCE. whe'er wither'd elder hath poll claw'd
    parrot.
  POINS. strange desire years outlive
    performance?
  FALSTAFF. Kiss me, Doll.
  PRINCE. Saturn Venus year conjunction! th'
    almanac that?  
  POINS. fiery Trigon, man, lisping
    master's tables, note-book, counsel-keeper.
  FALSTAFF. Thou dost give flattering busses.
  DOLL. troth, kiss thee constant heart.
  FALSTAFF. old, old.
  DOLL. love thee love e'er scurvy young boy of
    all.
  FALSTAFF. stuff wilt kirtle of? receive money a
    Thursday. Shalt cap to-morrow. merry song, come. 'A
    grows late; bed. Thou't forget gone.
  DOLL. troth, thou't set a-weeping, thou say'st so.
    Prove dress handsome till thy return. Well,
    hearken a' th' end.
  FALSTAFF. sack, Francis.
  PRINCE & POINS. Anon, anon, sir.                   [Advancing]
  FALSTAFF. Ha! bastard son King's? art thou Poins
    brother?
  PRINCE. Why, thou globe sinful continents, life dost thou
    lead!
  FALSTAFF. thou. gentleman: thou art drawer.  
  PRINCE. true, sir, draw ears.
  HOSTESS. O, Lord preserve thy Grace! troth, to
    London. Lord bless sweet face thine. O Jesu, are
    Wales?
  FALSTAFF. Thou whoreson mad compound majesty, light
    flesh corrupt blood, thou art welcome.
                                    [Leaning band DOLL]
  DOLL. How, fat fool! scorn you.
  POINS. lord, drive revenge turn all
    merriment, heat.
  PRINCE. whoreson candle-mine, you, vilely speak of
    honest, virtuous, civil gentlewoman!
  HOSTESS. God's blessing good heart! is, my
    troth.
  FALSTAFF. Didst thou hear me?
  PRINCE. Yea; knew me, ran by
    Gadshill. knew back, spoke purpose to
    patience.
  FALSTAFF. No, no, no; so; thou wast within
    hearing.  
  PRINCE. drive confess wilful abuse, and
    handle you.
  FALSTAFF. abuse, Hal, o' mine honour; abuse.
  PRINCE. Not- dispraise me, call pander, and
    bread-chipper, what!
  FALSTAFF. abuse, Hal.
  POINS. abuse!
  FALSTAFF. abuse, Ned, i' th' world; honest Ned, none. I
    disprais'd wicked- wicked fall
    love thee; doing, part a
    careful friend true subject; thy father give me
    it. abuse, Hal; none, Ned, none; no, faith, boys,
    none.
  PRINCE. now, pure fear entire cowardice doth not
    make thee wrong virtuous gentlewoman close us? Is
    wicked? thine hostess wicked? thy
    boy wicked? honest Bardolph, zeal burns his
    nose, wicked?
  POINS. Answer, thou dead elm, answer.
  FALSTAFF. fiend hath prick'd Bardolph irrecoverable;  
    face Lucifer's privy-kitchen, doth but
    roast malt-worms. boy- good angel him;
    devil outbids too.
  PRINCE. women?
  FALSTAFF. them- hell already, burns poor
    souls. th' other- owe money; damn'd
    that, not.
  HOSTESS. No, warrant you.
  FALSTAFF. No, thou art not; thou art quit that.
    Marry, indictment thee suffering flesh
    eaten thy house, contrary law; I
    thou wilt howl.
  HOSTESS. vict'lers so. joint mutton a
    Lent?
  PRINCE. You, gentlewoman-
  DOLL. Grace?
  FALSTAFF. Grace flesh rebels against.
                                               [Knocking within]
  HOSTESS. knocks loud door? th' door there,
    Francis.  

                              Enter PETO

  PRINCE. Peto, now! news?
  PETO. King father Westminster;
    twenty weak wearied posts
    north; along
    met overtook dozen captains,
    Bare-headed, sweating, knocking taverns,
    Sir John Falstaff.
  PRINCE. heaven, Poins, feel blame
    idly profane precious time,
    tempest commotion, south,
    Borne black vapour, doth begin melt
    drop bare unarmed heads.
    Give sword cloak. Falstaff, good night.

                        Exeunt PRINCE, POINS, PETO, BARDOLPH

  FALSTAFF. sweetest morsel night,  
    hence, leave unpick'd.  [Knocking within]  More
    knocking door!

                      Re-enter BARDOLPH

    now! matter?
  BARDOLPH. court, sir, presently;
    dozen captains stay door you.
  FALSTAFF.  [To PAGE]. Pay musicians, sirrah.- Farewell,
    hostess; farewell, Doll. see, good wenches, men of
    merit sought after; undeserver sleep, man of
    action call'd on. Farewell, good wenches. sent
    post, ere go.
  DOLL. speak. heart ready burst!
    Well, sweet Jack, care thyself.
  FALSTAFF. Farewell, farewell.
                                    Exeunt FALSTAFF BARDOLPH
  HOSTESS. Well, fare thee well. thee twenty-nine
    years, peascod-time; honester truer-hearted man
    -well fare thee well.  
  BARDOLPH.  [ Within]  Mistress Tearsheet!
  HOSTESS. matter?
  BARDOLPH.  [ Within]  Bid Mistress Tearsheet master.
  HOSTESS. O, run Doll, run, run, good Come.  [To BARDOLPH]  She
    blubber'd.- Yea, come, Doll?           Exeunt

ACT III. SCENE I.
Westminster. palace

Enter KING nightgown, page

  KING. call Earls Surrey Warwick;
    But, ere come, bid o'er-read letters
    them. Make good speed.        Exit page
    thousands poorest subjects
    hour asleep! O sleep, O gentle sleep,
    Nature's soft nurse, frightened thee,
    thou weigh eyelids down,
    steep senses forgetfulness?
    rather, sleep, liest thou smoky cribs,
    uneasy pallets stretching thee,
    hush'd buzzing night-flies thy slumber,
    perfum'd chambers great,
    canopies costly state,
    lull'd sound sweetest melody?
    O thou dull god, liest thou vile
    loathsome beds, leav'st kingly couch
    watch-case common 'larum-bell?  
    Wilt thou high giddy mast
    Seal ship-boy's eyes, rock brains
    cradle rude imperious surge,
    visitation winds,
    ruffian billows top,
    Curling monstrous heads, hanging them
    deafing clamour slippery clouds,
    hurly death awakes?
    Canst thou, O partial sleep, give thy repose
    wet sea-boy hour rude;
    calmest stillest night,
    appliances means boot,
    Deny king? Then, happy low, lie down!
    Uneasy lies head wears crown.

                    Enter WARWICK Surrey

  WARWICK. good morrows Majesty!
  KING. good morrow, lords?
  WARWICK. 'Tis o'clock, past.  
  KING. then, good morrow all, lords.
    read o'er letters you?
  WARWICK. have, liege.
  KING. perceive body kingdom
    foul is; rank diseases grow,
    danger, heart it.
  WARWICK. body distempered;
    strength restored
    good advice medicine.
    Lord Northumberland cool'd.
  KING. O God! read book fate,
    revolution times
    Make mountains level, continent,
    Weary solid firmness, melt itself
    sea; times see
    beachy girdle ocean
    wide Neptune's hips; chances mock,
    fill cup alteration
    divers liquors! O, seen,
    happiest youth, viewing progress through,  
    perils past, crosses ensue,
    shut book sit die.
    'Tis ten years gone
    Richard Northumberland, great friends,
    feast together, years after
    wars. years since
    Percy man nearest soul;
    brother toil'd affairs
    laid love life foot;
    Yea, sake, eyes Richard
    Gave defiance. by-
    [To WARWICK]  You, cousin Nevil, remember-
    Richard, eye brim full tears,
    check'd rated Northumberland,
    speak words, prov'd prophecy?
    'Northumberland, thou ladder which
    cousin Bolingbroke ascends throne'-
    then, God knows, intent
    necessity bow'd state
    greatness compell'd kiss-  
    'The time come'- follow it-
    'The time foul sin, gathering head,
    break corruption' on,
    Foretelling time's condition
    division amity.
  WARWICK. history men's lives,
    Figuring natures times deceas'd;
    observ'd, man prophesy,
    aim, main chance things
    life, seeds
    weak beginning lie intreasured.
    things hatch brood time;
    And, form this,
    King Richard create perfect guess
    great Northumberland, false him,
    seed grow greater falseness;
    find ground root upon
    you.
  KING. things necessities?
    meet necessities;  
    word cries us.
    Bishop Northumberland
    fifty thousand strong.
  WARWICK. be, lord.
    Rumour doth double, voice echo,
    numbers feared. Grace
    bed. soul, lord,
    powers forth
    bring prize easily.
    comfort more, receiv'd
    instance Glendower dead.
    Majesty hath fortnight ill;
    unseasoned hours perforce ad
    sickness.
  KING. counsel.
    And, wars hand,
    would, dear lords, Holy Land.            Exeunt




SCENE II.
Gloucestershire. Justice, SHALLOW'S house

Enter SHALLOW SILENCE, meeting; MOULDY, SHADOW, WART, FEEBLE, BULLCALF,
and servants behind

  SHALLOW. on, on, on; give hand, sir; give me
    hand, sir. early stirrer, rood! doth my
    good cousin Silence?
  SILENCE. Good morrow, good cousin Shallow.
  SHALLOW. doth cousin, bed-fellow? fairest
    daughter mine, god-daughter Ellen?
  SILENCE. Alas, black ousel, cousin Shallow!
  SHALLOW. yea no, sir. dare cousin William become
    good scholar; Oxford still, not?
  SILENCE. Indeed, sir, cost.
  SHALLOW. 'A must, then, Inns o' Court shortly. of
    Clement's Inn; talk mad Shallow yet.
  SILENCE. call'd 'lusty Shallow' then, cousin.
  SHALLOW. mass, call'd anything; done
    too, roundly too. I, little
    John Doit Staffordshire, black George Barnes, Francis  
    Pickbone, Squele Cotsole man- such
    swinge-bucklers Inns Court again. to
    knew bona-robas were, them
    commandment. Jack Falstaff, Sir John, boy,
    page Thomas Mowbray, Duke Norfolk.
  SILENCE. Sir John, cousin, anon about
    soldiers?
  SHALLOW. Sir John, same. break
    Scoggin's head court gate, 'a crack thus
    high; day fight Sampson
    Stockfish, fruiterer, Gray's Inn. Jesu, Jesu, mad
    days spent! old
    acquaintance dead!
  SILENCE. follow, cousin.
  SHALLOW. Certain, 'tis certain; sure, sure. Death, the
    Psalmist saith, all; die. good yoke
    bullocks Stamford fair?
  SILENCE. troth, there.
  SHALLOW. Death certain. Double town living yet?
  SILENCE. Dead, sir.  
  SHALLOW. Jesu, Jesu, dead! drew good bow; dead! 'A shot a
    fine shoot. John Gaunt loved well, betted money on
    head. Dead! 'A clapp'd i' th' clout twelve
    score, carried forehand shaft fourteen fourteen
    half, man's heart good see.
    score ewes now?
  SILENCE. be- score good ewes worth
    ten pounds.
  SHALLOW. Double dead?

                    Enter BARDOLPH, him

  SILENCE. Sir John Falstaffs men, think.
  SHALLOW. Good morrow, honest gentlemen.
  BARDOLPH. beseech you, Justice Shallow?
  SHALLOW. Robert Shallow, sir, poor esquire county,
    King's justices peace. good
    pleasure me?
  BARDOLPH. captain, sir, commends you; captain, Sir
    John Falstaff- tall gentleman, heaven, gallant  
    leader.
  SHALLOW. greets well, sir; knew good back-sword man.
    doth good knight? lady wife doth?
  BARDOLPH. Sir, pardon; soldier accommodated a
    wife.
  SHALLOW. said, faith, sir; indeed
    too. 'Better accommodated!' good; yea, indeed, it. Good
    phrases surely, were, commendable.
    'Accommodated!' accommodo. good; good phrase.
  BARDOLPH. Pardon, sir; heard word. 'Phrase' call it?
    day, phrase; maintain word
    sword soldier-like word, word exceeding
    good command, heaven. Accommodated: is, man is, as
    say, accommodated; or, man being-whereby 'a be
    thought accommodated; excellent thing.

                              Enter FALSTAFF

  SHALLOW. just. Look, good Sir John. Give me
    good hand, give worship's good hand. troth,  
    bear years well. Welcome, good Sir
    John.
  FALSTAFF. glad well, good Master Robert Shallow.
    Master Surecard, think?
  SHALLOW. No, Sir John; cousin Silence, commission with
   me.
  FALSTAFF. Good Master Silence, befits the
    peace.
  SILENCE. good worship welcome.
  FALSTAFF. Fie! hot weather. Gentlemen, provided me
    half dozen sufficient men?
  SHALLOW. Marry, we, sir. sit?
  FALSTAFF. them, beseech you.
  SHALLOW. roll? roll? roll? Let
    see, see, see. So, so, so, so,- so, so- yea,
    marry, sir. Rafe Mouldy! call; do
    so, so. see; Mouldy?
  MOULDY. Here, an't you.
  SHALLOW. you, Sir John? good-limb'd fellow; young,
    strong, good friends.  
  FALSTAFF. thy Mouldy?
  MOULDY. Yea, an't you.
  FALSTAFF. 'Tis time thou wert us'd.
  SHALLOW. Ha, ha, ha! excellent, i' faith! Things are
    mouldy lack use. singular good! faith, said, Sir
    John; said.
  FALSTAFF. Prick him.
  MOULDY. prick'd before, me
    alone. dame undone husbandry
    drudgery. prick'd me; are
    men fitter I.
  FALSTAFF. to; peace, Mouldy; go. Mouldy, time
    spent.
  MOULDY. Spent!
  SHALLOW. Peace, fellow, peace; stand aside; are?
    th' other, Sir John- see. Simon Shadow!
  FALSTAFF. Yea, marry, sit under. be
    cold soldier.
  SHALLOW. Shadow?
  SHADOW. Here, sir.  
  FALSTAFF. Shadow, son art thou?
  SHADOW. mother's son, sir.
  FALSTAFF. Thy mother's son! enough; thy father's shadow.
    son female shadow male. often
    indeed; father's substance!
  SHALLOW. him, Sir John?
  FALSTAFF. Shadow serve summer. Prick him; a
    number shadows fill muster-book.
  SHALLOW. Thomas Wart!
  FALSTAFF. he?
  WART. Here, sir.
  FALSTAFF. thy Wart?
  WART. Yea, sir.
  FALSTAFF. Thou art ragged wart.
  SHALLOW. prick him, Sir John?
  FALSTAFF. superfluous; apparel built his
    back, frame stands pins. Prick more.
  SHALLOW. Ha, ha, ha! it, sir; it. commend
    well. Francis Feeble!
  FEEBLE. Here, sir.  
  FALSTAFF. trade art thou, Feeble?
  FEEBLE. woman's tailor, sir.
  SHALLOW. prick him, sir?
  FALSTAFF. may; man's tailor, ha'
    prick'd you. Wilt thou make holes enemy's battle as
    thou hast woman's petticoat?
  FEEBLE. good will, sir; more.
  FALSTAFF. said, good woman's tailor! said, courageous
    Feeble! Thou wilt valiant wrathful dove most
    magnanimous mouse. Prick woman's tailor- well, Master
    Shallow, deep, Master Shallow.
  FEEBLE. Wart gone, sir.
  FALSTAFF. thou wert man's tailor, thou mightst mend
    make fit go. put private
    soldier, leader thousands. that
    suffice, forcible Feeble.
  FEEBLE. suffice, sir.
  FALSTAFF. bound thee, reverend Feeble. next?
  SHALLOW. Peter Bullcalf o' th' green!
  FALSTAFF. Yea, marry, Bullcalf.  
  BULLCALF. Here, sir.
  FALSTAFF. Fore God, fellow! Come, prick Bullcalf till
    roar again.
  BULLCALF. O Lord! good lord captain-
  FALSTAFF. What, dost thou roar thou art prick'd?
  BULLCALF. O Lord, sir! diseased man.
  FALSTAFF. disease hast thou?
  BULLCALF. whoreson cold, sir, cough, sir, caught with
    ringing King's affairs coronation day, sir.
  FALSTAFF. Come, thou shalt wars gown. have
    thy cold; order thy friends shall
    ring thee. all?
  SHALLOW. call'd number. have
    here, sir; so, pray you, dinner.
  FALSTAFF. Come, drink you, tarry
    dinner. glad you, troth, Master Shallow.
  SHALLOW. O, Sir John, remember lay night the
    windmill Saint George's Field?
  FALSTAFF. that, Master Shallow, that.
  SHALLOW. Ha, 'twas merry night. Jane Nightwork alive?  
  FALSTAFF. lives, Master Shallow.
  SHALLOW. me.
  FALSTAFF. Never, never; abide
    Master Shallow.
  SHALLOW. mass, anger th' heart. then
    bona-roba. Doth hold well?
  FALSTAFF. Old, old, Master Shallow.
  SHALLOW. Nay, old; choose old;
    old; Robin Nightwork, Nightwork,
    Clement's Inn.
  SILENCE. fifty-five year ago.
  SHALLOW. Ha, cousin Silence, thou hadst this
    knight seen! Ha, Sir John, well?
  FALSTAFF. heard chimes midnight, Master Shallow.
  SHALLOW. have, have, have; faith, Sir
    John, have. watchword 'Hem, boys!' Come, to
    dinner; come, dinner. Jesus, days seen!
    Come, come.
                                Exeunt FALSTAFF JUSTICES
  BULLCALF. Good Master Corporate Bardolph, stand friend;  
    Harry ten shillings French crowns you. very
    truth, sir, lief hang'd, sir, go. yet, for
    mine part, sir, care; am
    unwilling and, mine part, desire stay my
    friends; else, sir, care mine part much.
  BARDOLPH. to; stand aside.
  MOULDY. And, good Master Corporal Captain, dame's sake,
    stand friend. I
    gone; old, herself. have
    forty, sir.
  BARDOLPH. to; stand aside.
  FEEBLE. troth, care not; man die once; owe God
    death. ne'er bear base mind. An't destiny, so;
    an't not, so. man's good serve 's Prince; and, let
    will, dies year quit the
    next.
  BARDOLPH. said; th'art good fellow.
  FEEBLE. Faith, bear base mind.

                    Re-enter FALSTAFF JUSTICES  

  FALSTAFF. Come, sir, men have?
  SHALLOW. please.
  BARDOLPH. Sir, word you. pound free Mouldy
    Bullcalf.
  FALSTAFF. to; well.
  SHALLOW. Come, Sir John, have?
  FALSTAFF. choose me.
  SHALLOW. Marry, then- Mouldy, Bullcalf, Feeble, Shadow.
  FALSTAFF. Mouldy Bullcalf: you, Mouldy, stay home till
    past service; part, Bullcalf, grow come
    it. you.
  SHALLOW. Sir John, Sir John, wrong. your
    likeliest men, serv'd best.
  FALSTAFF. me, Master Shallow, choose man?
    Care limb, thews, stature, bulk, big
    assemblance man! Give spirit, Master Shallow. Here's
    Wart; ragged appearance is. 'A charge you
    discharge motion pewterer's hammer, come
    swifter gibbets brewer's bucket.  
    half-fac'd fellow, Shadow- give man. He
    presents mark enemy; foeman great aim
    level edge penknife. And, retreat- swiftly
    Feeble, woman's tailor, run off! O, give the
    spare men, spare great ones. Put caliver into
    Wart's hand, Bardolph.
  BARDOLPH. Hold, Wart. Traverse- thus, thus, thus.
  FALSTAFF. Come, manage caliver. So- well. to; very
    good; exceeding good. O, give little, lean, old,
    chopt, bald shot. said, i' faith, Wart; th'art good scab.
    Hold, tester thee.
  SHALLOW. craft's master, doth right. I
    remember Mile-end Green, lay Clement's Inn- was
    Sir Dagonet Arthur's show- quiver
    fellow, 'a manage piece thus; 'a would
    about, in. 'Rah, tah,
    tah!' 'a say; 'Bounce!' 'a say; would
    'a go, 'a come. ne'er fellow.
  FALSTAFF. fellows well. Master Shallow, God you!
    Master Silence, words you: Fare  
    well! Gentlemen both, you. dozen mile to-night.
    Bardolph, give soldiers coats.
  SHALLOW. Sir John, Lord bless you; God prosper affairs;
    God send peace! return, visit house; old
    acquaintance renewed. Peradventure ye the
    court.
  FALSTAFF. Fore God, would.
  SHALLOW. to; spoke word. God you.
  FALSTAFF. Fare well, gentle gentlemen.  [Exeunt JUSTICES]  On,
    Bardolph; lead men away.  [Exeunt FALSTAFF]  I
    return, fetch justices. bottom of
    justice Shallow. Lord, Lord, subject men this
    vice lying! starv'd justice hath but
    prate wildness youth feats hath
    Turnbull Street; word lie, duer paid
    hearer Turk's tribute. remember at
    Clement's Inn, man made supper cheese-paring.
    'a naked, world fork'd radish,
    head fantastically carved knife. 'A so
    forlorn dimensions thick sight invisible. 'A  
    genius famine; lecherous monkey, the
    whores call'd mandrake. 'A rearward the
    fashion, sung tunes overscutch'd huswifes that
    heard carmen whistle, sware fancies or
    good-nights. Vice's dagger squire,
    talks familiarly John Gaunt sworn
    brother him; sworn 'a ne'er in
    Tiltyard; burst head crowding the
    marshal's men. it, told John Gaunt beat own
    name; thrust apparel an
    eel-skin; case treble hautboy mansion him, a
    court- land beeves. Well, acquainted
    return; 't hard make a
    philosopher's stones me. young dace bait for
    pike, reason law nature snap
    him. time shape, end.               Exit

ACT IV. SCENE I.
Yorkshire. Forest Gaultree

Enter ARCHBISHOP YORK, MOWBRAY, HASTINGS, others

  ARCHBISHOP. forest call'd
  HASTINGS. 'Tis Gaultree Forest, an't Grace.
  ARCHBISHOP. stand, lords, send discoverers forth
    numbers enemies.
  HASTINGS. already.
  ARCHBISHOP. 'Tis done.
    friends brethren great affairs,
    acquaint receiv'd
    New-dated letters Northumberland;
    cold intent, tenour, substance, thus:
    doth person, powers
    hold sortance quality,
    levy; whereupon
    retir'd, ripe growing fortunes,
    Scotland; concludes hearty prayers
    attempts overlive hazard  
    fearful meeting opposite.
  MOWBRAY. hopes touch ground
    dash pieces.

                          Enter MESSENGER

  HASTINGS. Now, news?
  MESSENGER. West forest, scarcely mile,
    goodly form enemy;
    And, ground hide, judge number
    rate thirty thousand.
  MOWBRAY. proportion gave out.
    sway face field.

                        Enter WESTMORELAND

  ARCHBISHOP. well-appointed leader fronts here?
  MOWBRAY. Lord Westmoreland.
  WESTMORELAND. Health fair greeting general,
    Prince, Lord John Duke Lancaster.  
  ARCHBISHOP. on, Lord Westmoreland, peace,
    doth concern coming.
  WESTMORELAND. Then, lord,
    Grace chief address
    substance speech. rebellion
    itself, base abject routs,
    Led bloody youth, guarded rags,
    countenanc'd boys beggary-
    say, damn'd commotion appear'd
    true, native, proper shape,
    You, reverend father, noble lords,
    dress ugly form
    base bloody insurrection
    fair honours. You, Lord Archbishop,
    civil peace maintain'd,
    beard silver hand peace hath touch'd,
    learning good letters peace hath tutor'd,
    white investments figure innocence,
    dove, blessed spirit peace-
    Wherefore ill translate  
    speech peace, bears grace,
    harsh boist'rous tongue war;
    Turning books graves, ink blood,
    pens lances, tongue divine
    loud trumpet point war?
  ARCHBISHOP. Wherefore this? question stands.
    Briefly end: diseas'd
    surfeiting wanton hours
    brought burning fever,
    bleed it; disease
    late King, Richard, infected, died.
    But, noble Lord Westmoreland,
    physician;
    enemy peace
    Troop throngs military men;
    show awhile fearful war
    diet rank minds sick happiness,
    purge th' obstructions begin stop
    veins life. Hear plainly.
    equal balance justly weigh'd  
    wrongs arms do, wrongs suffer,
    find griefs heavier offences.
    stream time doth run
    enforc'd quiet there
    rough torrent occasion;
    summary griefs,
    time serve, show articles;
    long ere offer'd King,
    suit gain audience:
    wrong'd, unfold griefs,
    denied access person,
    men wrong.
    dangers days newly gone,
    memory written earth
    appearing blood, examples
    minute's instance, present now,
    Hath put ill-beseeming arms;
    break peace, branch it,
    establish peace indeed,
    Concurring quality.  
  WESTMORELAND. appeal denied;
    galled King;
    peer hath suborn'd grate you
    seal lawless bloody book
    forg'd rebellion seal divine,
    consecrate commotion's bitter edge?
  ARCHBISHOP. brother general, commonwealth,
    brother horn household cruelty,
    make quarrel particular.
  WESTMORELAND. redress;
    were, belongs you.
  MOWBRAY. part, all
    feel bruises days before,
    suffer condition times
    lay heavy unequal hand
    honours?
  WESTMORELAND. O good Lord Mowbray,
    Construe times necessities,
    say, indeed, time,
    King, doth injuries.  
    Yet, part, appears me,
    King present time,
    inch ground
    build grief on. restor'd
    Duke Norfolk's signiories,
    noble well-rememb'red father's?
  MOWBRAY. thing, honour, father lost
    reviv'd breath'd me?
    King lov'd him, state stood then,
    force perforce compell'd banish him,
    Henry Bolingbroke he,
    mounted roused seats,
    neighing coursers daring spur,
    armed staves charge, beavers down,
    eyes fire sparkling sights steel,
    loud trumpet blowing together-
    Then, then, stay'd
    father breast Bolingbroke,
    O, King throw warder down-
    life hung staff threw-  
    threw himself, lives
    indictment dint sword
    miscarried Bolingbroke.
  WESTMORELAND. speak, Lord Mowbray, what.
    Earl Hereford reputed then
    England valiant gentleman.
    fortune smil'd?
    father victor there,
    ne'er borne Coventry;
    country, general voice,
    Cried hate him; prayers love
    set Hereford, doted on,
    bless'd grac'd King.
    mere digression purpose.
    princely general
    griefs; Grace
    give audience; wherein
    demands just,
    enjoy them, set off
    enemies.  
  MOWBRAY. hath forc'd compel offer;
    proceeds policy, love.
  WESTMORELAND. Mowbray. overween so.
    offer mercy, fear;
    For, lo! ken army lies-
    mine honour, confident
    give admittance thought fear.
    battle full names yours,
    men perfect arms,
    armour strong, best;
    reason hearts good.
    not, then, offer compell'd.
  MOWBRAY. Well, admit parley.
  WESTMORELAND. argues shame offence:
    rotten case abides handling.
  HASTINGS. Hath Prince John full commission,
    ample virtue father,
    hear absolutely determine
    conditions stand upon?
  WESTMORELAND. intended general's name.  
    muse make slight question.
  ARCHBISHOP. take, Lord Westmoreland, schedule,
    general grievances.
    article redress'd,
    members cause, hence,
    insinewed action,
    Acquitted true substantial form,
    present execution wills
    purposes confin'd-
    awful banks again,
    knit powers arm peace.
  WESTMORELAND. show general. you, lords,
    sight battles meet;
    end peace- God frame!-
    place diff'rence call swords
    decide it.
  ARCHBISHOP. lord, so.          Exit WESTMORELAND
  MOWBRAY. thing bosom tells me
    conditions peace stand.
  HASTINGS. Fear that: make peace  
    large terms absolute
    conditions consist upon,
    peace stand firm rocky mountains.
  MOWBRAY. Yea, valuation such
    slight false-derived cause,
    Yea, idle, nice, wanton reason,
    King taste action;
    That, royal faiths martyrs love,
    winnow'd rough wind
    corn light chaff,
    good bad find partition.
  ARCHBISHOP. No, no, lord. Note this: King weary
    dainty picking grievances;
    hath found end doubt death
    Revives greater heirs life;
    wipe tables clean,
    tell-tale memory
    repeat history los
    remembrance. full knows
    precisely weed land  
    misdoubts present occasion:
    foes enrooted friends
    That, plucking unfix enemy,
    doth unfasten shake friend.
    land, offensive wife
    hath enrag'd offer strokes,
    striking, holds infant up,
    hangs resolv'd correction arm
    uprear'd execution.
  HASTINGS. Besides, King hath wasted rods
    late offenders, doth lack
    instruments chastisement;
    power, fangless lion,
    offer, hold.
  ARCHBISHOP. 'Tis true;
    assur'd, good Lord Marshal,
    make atonement well,
    peace will, broken limb united,
    Grow stronger breaking.
  MOWBRAY. so.  
    return'd Lord Westmoreland.

                       Re-enter WESTMORELAND

  WESTMORELAND. Prince hand. Pleaseth lordship
    meet Grace distance 'tween armies?
  MOWBRAY. Grace York, God's then, set forward.
  ARCHBISHOP. Before, greet Grace. lord, come.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE II.
Another part forest

Enter, side, MOWBRAY, attended; afterwards, ARCHBISHOP,
HASTINGS, others; side, PRINCE JOHN LANCASTER,
WESTMORELAND, OFFICERS, others

  PRINCE JOHN. encount'red here, cousin Mowbray.
    Good day you, gentle Lord Archbishop;
    you, Lord Hastings, all.
    Lord York, show'd you
    flock, assembled bell,
    Encircled hear reverence
    exposition holy text
    iron man,
    Cheering rout rebels drum,
    Turning word sword, life death.
    man sits monarch's heart
    ripens sunshine favour,
    abuse countenance king,
    Alack, mischiefs set abroach
    shadow greatness! you, Lord Bishop,  
    so. hath heard spoken
    deep books God?
    speaker parliament,
    th' imagin'd voice God himself,
    opener intelligencer
    grace, sanctities heaven,
    dull workings. O, believe
    misuse reverence place,
    Employ countenance grace heav'n
    false favourite doth prince's name,
    deeds dishonourable? ta'en up,
    counterfeited zeal God,
    subjects substitute, father,
    peace heaven him
    up-swarm'd them.
  ARCHBISHOP. Good Lord Lancaster,
    father's peace;
    But, told Lord Westmoreland,
    time misord'red doth, common sense,
    Crowd crush monstrous form  
    hold safety up. Grace
    parcels particulars grief,
    hath scorn shov'd court,
    Whereon hydra son war born;
    dangerous eyes charm'd asleep
    grant desires;
    true obedience, madness cur'd,
    Stoop tamely foot majesty.
  MOWBRAY. not, ready fortunes
    man.
  HASTINGS. fall down,
    supplies attempt.
    miscarry, them;
    success mischief born,
    heir heir hold quarrel up
    Whiles England generation.
  PRINCE JOHN. shallow, Hastings, shallow,
    sound bottom after-times.
  WESTMORELAND. Pleaseth Grace answer directly
    articles.  
  PRINCE JOHN. well;
    swear here, honour blood,
    father's purposes mistook;
    lavishly
    Wrested meaning authority.
    lord, griefs speed redress'd;
    soul, shall. you,
    Discharge powers counties,
    ours; here, armies,
    drink friendly embrace,
    eyes bear tokens home
    restored love amity.
  ARCHBISHOP. princely word redresses.
  PRINCE JOHN. give you, maintain word;
    drink Grace.
  HASTINGS. Go, Captain, deliver army
    news peace. pay, part.
    them. Hie thee, Captain.
                                                    Exit Officer
  ARCHBISHOP. you, noble Lord Westmoreland.  
  WESTMORELAND. pledge Grace; knew pains
    bestow'd breed present peace,
    drink freely; love ye
    show openly hereafter.
  ARCHBISHOP. doubt you.
  WESTMORELAND. glad it.
    Health lord gentle cousin, Mowbray.
  MOWBRAY. health happy season,
    sudden ill.
  ARCHBISHOP. ill chances men merry;
    heaviness foreruns good event.
  WESTMORELAND. merry, coz; sudden sorrow
    Serves thus, 'Some good thing to-morrow.'
  ARCHBISHOP. me, passing light spirit.
  MOWBRAY. worse, rule true.
                                                 [Shouts within]
  PRINCE JOHN. word peace rend'red. Hark, shout!
  MOWBRAY. cheerful victory.
  ARCHBISHOP. peace nature conquest;
    parties nobly subdu'd,  
    party loser.
  PRINCE JOHN. Go, lord,
    army discharged too.
                                               Exit WESTMORELAND
    And, good lord, trains
    March us, peruse men
    cop'd withal.
  ARCHBISHOP. Go, good Lord Hastings,
    And, ere dismiss'd, march by.
                                                   Exit HASTINGS
  PRINCE JOHN. trust, lords, lie to-night together.

                      Re-enter WESTMORELAND

    Now, cousin, wherefore stands army still?
  WESTMORELAND. leaders, charge stand,
    hear speak.
  PRINCE JOHN. duties.

                        Re-enter HASTINGS  

  HASTINGS. lord, army dispers'd already.
    youthful steers unyok'd, courses
    East, west, north, south; school broke up,
    hurries home sporting-place.
  WESTMORELAND. Good tidings, Lord Hastings; which
    arrest thee, traitor, high treason;
    you, Lord Archbishop, you, Lord Mowbray,
    capital treason attach both.
  MOWBRAY. proceeding honourable?
  WESTMORELAND. assembly so?
  ARCHBISHOP. break faith?
  PRINCE JOHN. pawn'd thee none:
    promis'd redress grievances
    Whereof complain; which, mine honour,
    perform Christian care.
    you, rebels- taste due
    Meet rebellion acts yours.
    shallowly arms commence,
    Fondly brought here, foolishly hence.  
    Strike drums, pursue scatt'red stray.
    God, we, hath safely fought to-day.
    guard traitors block death,
    Treason's true bed yielder-up breath.          Exeunt




SCENE III.
Another part forest

Alarum; excursions. Enter FALSTAFF COLVILLE, meeting

  FALSTAFF. name, sir? condition you, of
    place, pray?
  COLVILLE. knight sir; Colville Dale.
  FALSTAFF. then, Colville name, knight your
    degree, place Dale. Colville your
    name, traitor degree, dungeon place- place
    deep enough; Colville Dale.
  COLVILLE. Sir John Falstaff?
  FALSTAFF. good man he, sir, whoe'er am. yield,
    sir, sweat you? sweat, drops
    thy lovers, weep thy death; rouse up
    fear trembling, observance mercy.
  COLVILLE. Sir John Falstaff, thought
    yield me.
  FALSTAFF. school tongues belly mine;
    tongue speaks word name.  
    belly indifferency, simply most
    active fellow Europe. womb, womb, womb undoes me.
    general.

            Enter PRINCE JOHN LANCASTER, WESTMORELAND,
                            BLUNT, others

  PRINCE JOHN. heat past; follow now.
    Call powers, good cousin Westmoreland.
                                               Exit WESTMORELAND
    Now, Falstaff, while?
    ended, come.
    tardy tricks will, life,
    time break gallows' back.
  FALSTAFF. sorry, lord, thus: never
    knew rebuke check reward valour. you
    swallow, arrow, bullet? I, poor and
    motion, expedition thought? speeded with
    extremest inch possibility; found'red nine
    score odd posts; here, travel tainted am, have,  
    pure immaculate valour, Sir John Colville the
    Dale,a furious knight valorous enemy. that?
    me, yielded; justly hook-nos'd
    fellow Rome-I came, saw, overcame.
  PRINCE JOHN. courtesy deserving.
  FALSTAFF. not. is, yield him; I
    beseech Grace, book'd rest day's
    deeds; or, Lord, ballad
    else, mine picture top on't, Colville kissing my
    foot; enforc'd, all
    show gilt twopences me, I, clear sky fame,
    o'ershine full moon doth cinders the
    element, show pins' heads her, word
    noble. right, desert mount.
  PRINCE JOHN. Thine's heavy mount.
  FALSTAFF. shine, then.
  PRINCE JOHN. Thine's thick shine.
  FALSTAFF. something, good lord, good,
    call will.
  PRINCE JOHN. thy Colville?  
  COLVILLE. is, lord.
  PRINCE JOHN. famous rebel art thou, Colville.
  FALSTAFF. famous true subject him.
  COLVILLE. am, lord, betters are
    led hither. rul'd me,
    won dearer have.
  FALSTAFF. sold themselves; thou, a
    kind fellow, gavest thyself gratis; thee for
    thee.

                       Re-enter WESTMORELAND

  PRINCE JOHN. Now, left pursuit?
  WESTMORELAND. Retreat made, execution stay'd.
  PRINCE JOHN. Send Colville, confederates,
    York, present execution.
    Blunt, lead hence; guard sure.
                                         Exeunt BLUNT others
    dispatch court, lords.
    hear King father sore sick.  
    news Majesty,
    Which, cousin, bear comfort him
    sober speed follow you.
  FALSTAFF. lord, beseech you, give leave through
    Gloucestershire; and, court, stand good lord,
    pray, good report.
  PRINCE JOHN. Fare well, Falstaff. I, condition,
    speak deserve.
                                         Exeunt FALSTAFF
  FALSTAFF. wit; 'twere your
    dukedom. Good faith, young sober-blooded boy doth not
    love me; man make laugh- marvel;
    drinks wine. demure boys come
    proof; thin drink doth over-cool blood, and
    making fish-meals, fall kind male
    green-sickness; then, marry, wenches. They
    generally fools cowards-which too,
    inflammation. good sherris-sack hath two-fold
    operation it. ascends brain; dries all
    foolish dull crudy vapours environ it; makes  
    apprehensive, quick, forgetive, full nimble, fiery, and
    delectable shapes; delivered o'er voice, tongue,
    birth, excellent wit. property of
    excellent sherris warming blood; before,
    cold settled, left liver white pale, the
    badge pusillanimity cowardice; sherris warms it,
    makes inwards parts extremes. It
    illumineth face, which, beacon, warning the
    rest kingdom, man, arm; vital
    commoners inland petty spirits muster their
    captain, heart, who, great puff'd retinue,
    doth deed courage- valour sherris. So
    skill weapon sack, sets
    a-work; learning, mere hoard gold devil
    till sack commences sets act use. Hereof comes
    Prince Harry valiant; cold blood did
    naturally inherit father, hath, lean, sterile, and
    bare land, manured, husbanded, till'd, excellent
    endeavour drinking good good store fertile sherris,
    hot valiant. thousand sons,  
    humane principle teach to
    forswear thin potations addict sack.

                           Enter BARDOLPH

    now, Bardolph!
  BARDOLPH. army discharged gone.
  FALSTAFF. go. Gloucestershire, will
    visit Master Robert Shallow, Esquire. already
    temp'ring finger thumb, shortly seal
    him. away.                                  Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Westminster. Jerusalem Chamber

Enter KING, PRINCE THOMAS CLARENCE, PRINCE HUMPHREY GLOUCESTER,
WARWICK, others

  KING. Now, lords, God doth give successful end
    debate bleedeth doors,
    youth lead higher fields,
    draw swords sanctified.
    navy address'd, power connected,
    substitutes absence invested,
    lies level wish.
    personal strength;
    pause till rebels, afoot,
    underneath yoke government.
  WARWICK. doubt Majesty
    enjoy.
  KING. Humphrey, son Gloucester,
    Prince brother?
  PRINCE HUMPHREY. hunt, lord, Windsor.
  KING. accompanied?  
  PRINCE HUMPHREY. know, lord.
  KING. brother, Thomas Clarence, him?
  PRINCE HUMPHREY. No, good lord, presence here.
  CLARENCE. lord father?
  KING. thee, Thomas Clarence.
    chance thou art Prince thy brother?
    loves thee, thou dost neglect him, Thomas.
    Thou hast place affection
    thy brothers; cherish it, boy,
    noble offices thou mayst effect
    mediation, dead,
    greatness thy brethren.
    omit not; blunt love,
    lose good advantage grace
    cold careless will;
    gracious observ'd.
    hath tear pity hand
    Open day melting charity;
    notwithstanding, incens'd, flint;
    humorous winter, sudden  
    flaws congealed spring day.
    temper, therefore, observ'd.
    Chide faults, reverently,
    perceive blood inclin'd mirth;
    But, moody, give line scope
    Till passions, whale ground,
    Confound working. Learn this, Thomas,
    thou shalt prove shelter thy friends,
    hoop gold bind thy brothers in,
    united vessel blood,
    Mingled venom suggestion-
    As, force perforce, age pour in-
    leak, work strong
    aconitum rash gunpowder.
  CLARENCE. observe care love.
  KING. art thou Windsor him, Thomas?
  CLARENCE. to-day; dines London.
  KING. accompanied? Canst thou that?
  CLARENCE. Poins, continual followers.
  KING. subject fattest soil weeds;  
    he, noble image youth,
    overspread them; grief
    Stretches hour death.
    blood weeps heart shape,
    forms imaginary, th'unguided days
    rotten times upon
    sleeping ancestors.
    headstrong riot hath curb,
    rage hot blood counsellors
    means lavish manners meet together,
    O, wings affections fly
    fronting peril oppos'd decay!
  WARWICK. gracious lord, quite.
    Prince studies companions
    strange tongue, wherein, gain language,
    'Tis needful immodest word
    look'd learnt; attain'd,
    Highness knows, use
    hated. So, gross terms,
    Prince will, perfectness time,  
    Cast followers; memory
    pattern measure live
    Grace mete lives other,
    Turning past evils advantages.
  KING. 'Tis seldom bee doth leave comb
    dead carrion.

                      Enter WESTMORELAND

    here? Westmoreland?
  WESTMORELAND. Health sovereign, happiness
    Added deliver!
    Prince John, son, doth kiss Grace's hand.
    Mowbray, Bishop Scroop, Hastings, all,
    brought correction law.
    rebel's sword unsheath'd,
    Peace puts olive everywhere.
    manner action hath borne
    leisure Highness read,
    particular.  
  KING. O Westmoreland, thou art summer bird,
    haunch winter sings
    lifting day.

                        Enter HARCOURT

    news.
  HARCOURT. enemies heaven Majesty;
    And, stand you, fall
    of!
    Earl Northumberland Lord Bardolph,
    great power English Scots,
    shrieve Yorkshire overthrown.
    manner true order fight
    packet, you, large.
  KING. wherefore good news make sick?
    Fortune hands full,
    write fair words foulest letters?
    stomach food-
    poor, health- feast,  
    takes stomach- rich
    abundance enjoy not.
    rejoice happy news;
    sight fails, brain giddy.
    O me! ill.
  PRINCE HUMPHREY. Comfort, Majesty!
  CLARENCE. O royal father!
  WESTMORELAND. sovereign lord, cheer yourself, up.
  WARWICK. patient, Princes; fits
    Highness ordinary.
    Stand him, give air; straight well.
  CLARENCE. No, no; long hold pangs.
    Th' incessant care labour mind
    Hath wrought mure confine in
    thin life through, break out.
  PRINCE HUMPHREY. people fear me; observe
    Unfather'd heirs loathly births nature.
    seasons change manners, year
    found months asleep, leapt over.
  CLARENCE. river hath thrice flow'd, ebb between;  
    folk, Time's doting chronicles,
    time before
    great grandsire, Edward, sick'd died.
  WARWICK. Speak lower, Princes, King recovers.
  PRINCE HUMPHREY. apoplexy end.
  KING. pray up, bear hence
    chamber. Softly, pray.                Exeunt




SCENE V.
Westminster. chamber

The KING lying bed; CLARENCE, GLOUCESTER, WARWICK,
and attendance

  KING. noise made, gentle friends;
    dull favourable hand
    whisper music weary spirit.
  WARWICK. Call music room.
  KING. Set crown pillow here.
  CLARENCE. eye hollow, much.
  WARWICK. noise! noise!

                        Enter PRINCE HENRY

  PRINCE. Duke Clarence?
  CLARENCE. here, brother, full heaviness.
  PRINCE. now! Rain doors, abroad!
    doth King?
  PRINCE HUMPHREY. Exceeding ill.
  PRINCE. Heard good news yet? him.  
  PRINCE HUMPHREY. alt'red hearing it.
  PRINCE. sick joy, recover physic.
  WARWICK. noise, lords. Sweet Prince, speak low;
    King father dispos'd sleep.
  CLARENCE. withdraw room.
  WARWICK. Will't Grace us?
  PRINCE. No; sit watch King.
                                       Exeunt PRINCE
    doth crown lie pillow,
    troublesome bedfellow?
    O polish'd perturbation! golden care!
    keep'st ports slumber open wide
    watchful night! Sleep now!
    sound half deeply sweet
    brow homely biggen bound
    Snores watch night. O majesty!
    thou dost pinch thy bearer, thou dost sit
    rich armour worn heat day
    scald'st safety. gates breath
    lies downy feather stirs not.  
    suspire, light weightless down
    Perforce move. gracious lord! father!
    sleep sound indeed; sleep
    golden rigol hath divorc'd
    English kings. Thy due me
    tears heavy sorrows blood
    nature, love, filial tenderness,
    Shall, O dear father, pay thee plenteously.
    due thee imperial crown,
    Which, thy place blood,
    Derives me.  [Putting crown]  Lo sits-
    God guard; put world's strength
    giant arm, force
    lineal honour me. thee
    mine leave 'tis left me.                Exit
  KING. Warwick! Gloucester! Clarence!

           Re-enter WARWICK, GLOUCESTER, CLARENCE

  CLARENCE. Doth King call?  
  WARWICK. Majesty? fares Grace?
  KING. leave alone, lords?
  CLARENCE. left Prince brother here, liege,
    undertook sit watch you.
  KING. Prince Wales! he? him.
    here.
  WARWICK. door open; way.
  PRINCE HUMPHREY. chamber stay'd.
  KING. crown? pillow?
  WARWICK. withdrew, liege, left here.
  KING. Prince hath ta'en hence. Go, seek out.
    hasty doth suppose
    sleep death?
    Find him, lord Warwick; chide hither.
                                                    Exit WARWICK
    part conjoins disease
    helps end me. See, sons, things are!
    quickly nature falls revolt
    gold object!
    foolish over-careful fathers  
    broke sleep thoughts,
    brains care, bones industry;
    engrossed pil'd up
    cank'red heaps strange-achieved gold;
    thoughtful invest
    sons arts martial exercises;
    When, bee, tolling flower
    virtuous sweets,
    thighs wax, mouths honey pack'd,
    bring hive, and, bees,
    murd'red pains. bitter taste
    Yields engrossments ending father.

                         Re-enter WARWICK

    stay long
    Till friend sickness hath determin'd me?
  WARWICK. lord, found Prince room,
    Washing kindly tears gentle cheeks,
    deep demeanour great sorrow,  
    tyranny, quaff'd blood,
    Would, beholding him, wash'd knife
    gentle eye-drops. coming hither.
  KING. wherefore crown?

                        Re-enter PRINCE HENRY

    Lo comes. me, Harry.
    Depart chamber, leave alone.
                          Exeunt KING PRINCE
  PRINCE. thought hear speak again.
  KING. Thy father, Harry, thought.
    stay long thee, weary thee.
    Dost thou hunger mine empty chair
    thou wilt invest thee honours
    thy hour ripe? O foolish youth!
    Thou seek'st greatness overwhelm thee.
    Stay little, cloud dignity
    held falling weak wind
    quickly drop; day dim.  
    Thou hast stol'n which, hours,
    thine offense; death
    Thou hast seal'd expectation.
    Thy life manifest thou lov'dst not,
    thou wilt die assur'd it.
    Thou hid'st thousand daggers thy thoughts,
    thou hast whetted thy stony heart,
    stab half hour life.
    What, canst thou forbear half hour?
    thee gone, dig grave thyself;
    bid merry bells ring thine ear
    thou art crowned, dead.
    tears bedew hearse
    drops balm sanctify thy head;
    compound forgotten dust;
    Give gave thee life worms.
    Pluck officers, break decrees;
    time mock form-
    Harry crown'd. Up, vanity:
    Down, royal state. sage counsellors, hence.  
    English court assemble now,
    region, apes idleness.
    Now, neighbour confines, purge scum.
    ruffian swear, drink, dance,
    Revel night, rob, murder, commit
    oldest sins newest kind ways?
    happy, trouble more.
    England double gild treble guilt;
    England give office, honour, might;
    Harry curb'd license plucks
    muzzle restraint, wild dog
    flesh tooth innocent.
    O poor kingdom, sick civil blows!
    care withhold thy riots,
    wilt thou riot thy care?
    O, thou wilt wilderness again.
    Peopled wolves, thy inhabitants!
  PRINCE. O, pardon me, liege! tears,
    moist impediments speech,
    forestall'd dear deep rebuke  
    Ere grief spoke heard
    far. crown,
    wears crown immortally
    Long guard yours!  [Kneeling]  affect more
    honour renown,
    obedience rise,
    true duteous spirit
    Teacheth prostrate exterior bending!
    God witness me, in
    found breath Majesty,
    cold struck heart! feign,
    O, present wildness die,
    live show th' incredulous world
    noble change purposed!
    Coming you, thinking dead-
    dead almost, liege, were-
    spake crown sense,
    upbraided it: 'The care thee depending
    Hath fed body father;
    thou gold art worst gold.  
    Other, fine carat, precious,
    Preserving life med'cine potable;
    thou, fine, honour'd, renown'd,
    Hast eat thy bearer up.' Thus, royal liege,
    Accusing it, put head,
    it- enemy
    face murd'red father-
    quarrel true inheritor.
    infect blood joy,
    swell thoughts strain pride;
    rebel vain spirit mine
    affection welcome
    Give entertainment it,
    God head,
    make poorest vassal is,
    doth awe terror kneel it!
  KING. O son,
    God put thy mind hence,
    thou mightst win thy father's love,
    Pleading wisely excuse it!  
    hither, Harry; sit thou bed,
    hear, think, latest counsel
    breathe. God knows, son,
    by-paths indirect crook'd ways
    met crown; well
    troublesome sat head:
    thee descend quiet,
    opinion, confirmation;
    soil achievement goes
    earth. seem'd me
    honour snatch'd boist'rous hand;
    living upbraid
    gain assistances;
    daily grew quarrel bloodshed,
    Wounding supposed peace. bold fears
    Thou seest peril answered;
    reign hath scene
    Acting argument. death
    mood; purchas'd
    Falls thee fairer sort;  
    thou garland wear'st successively.
    Yet, thou stand'st do,
    Thou art firm enough, griefs green;
    friends, thou make thy friends,
    stings teeth newly ta'en out;
    fell working advanc'd,
    power lodge fear
    displac'd; avoid,
    cut off; purpose now
    lead Holy Land,
    rest lying make look
    state. Therefore, Harry,
    thy busy giddy minds
    foreign quarrels, action, borne out,
    waste memory days.
    I, lungs wasted so
    strength speech utterly denied me.
    crown, O God, forgive;
    grant thee true peace live!
  PRINCE. gracious liege,  
    won it, wore it, it, gave me;
    plain possession be;
    common pain
    'Gainst world rightfully maintain.

       Enter PRINCE JOHN LANCASTER, WARWICK, LORDS, others

  KING. Look, look, John Lancaster.
  PRINCE JOHN. Health, peace, happiness, royal father!
  KING. Thou bring'st happiness peace, son John;
    health, alack, youthful wings flown
    bare wither'd trunk. thy sight
    worldly business makes period.
    Lord Warwick?
  PRINCE. Lord Warwick!
  KING. Doth belong
    lodging swoon?
  WARWICK. 'Tis call'd Jerusalem, noble lord.
  KING. Laud God! life end.
    hath prophesied years,  
    die Jerusalem;
    vainly suppos'd Holy Land.
    bear chamber; lie;
    Jerusalem Harry die.                    Exeunt
