ACT V. SCENE I.
Gloucestershire. SHALLOW'S house

Enter SHALLOW, FALSTAFF, BARDOLPH, PAGE

  SHALLOW. cock pie, sir, to-night.
    What, Davy, say!
  FALSTAFF. excuse me, Master Robert Shallow.
  SHALLOW. excuse you; excus'd; excuses
    admitted; excuse serve; shall
    excus'd. Why, Davy!

                            Enter DAVY

  DAVY. Here, sir.
  SHALLOW. Davy, Davy, Davy, Davy; see, Davy; see,
    Davy; see- yea, marry, William cook, bid hither.
    Sir John, excus'd.
  DAVY. Marry, sir, thus: precepts served; and,
    again, sir- sow headland wheat?
  SHALLOW. red wheat, Davy. William cook- no
    young pigeons?  
  DAVY. Yes, sir. smith's note shoeing and
    plough-irons.
  SHALLOW. cast, paid. Sir John, be
    excused.
  DAVY. Now, sir, link bucket had; and,
    sir, stop William's wages sack he
    lost day Hinckley fair?
  SHALLOW. 'A answer it. pigeons, Davy, couple of
    short-legg'd hens, joint mutton, pretty tiny
    kickshaws, William cook.
  DAVY. Doth man war stay night, sir?
  SHALLOW. Yea, Davy; well. friend i' th' court is
    penny purse. men well, Davy; they
    arrant knaves backbite.
  DAVY. worse backbitten, sir; have
    marvellous foul linen.
  SHALLOW. conceited, Davy- thy business, Davy.
  DAVY. beseech you, sir, countenance William Visor Woncot
    Clement Perkes o' th' hill.
  SHALLOW. There, complaints, Davy, Visor.  
    Visor arrant knave, knowledge.
  DAVY. grant worship knave, sir; God
    forbid, sir, knave countenance his
    friend's request. honest man, sir, speak for
    himself, knave not. serv'd worship truly,
    sir, years; quarter
    bear knave honest man, little
    credit worship. knave mine honest friend, sir;
    therefore, beseech you, countenanc'd.
  SHALLOW. to; wrong. about,
  DAVY.  [Exit DAVY]  you, Sir John? Come, come, come, off
    boots. Give hand, Master Bardolph.
  BARDOLPH. glad worship.
  SHALLOW. thee heart, kind Master Bardolph.
    [To PAGE]  welcome, tall fellow. Come, Sir John.
  FALSTAFF. follow you, good Master Robert Shallow.
    [Exit SHALLOW]  Bardolph, horses.  [Exeunt BARDOLPH
    PAGE]  sawed quantities, make four
    dozen bearded hermits' staves Master Shallow. a
    wonderful thing semblable coherence men's  
    spirits his. They, observing him, bear themselves
    foolish justices: he, conversing them, turned
    justice-like serving-man. spirits married in
    conjunction participation society flock
    consent, wild geese. suit to
    Master Shallow, humour men imputation of
    master; men, curry Master
    Shallow man command servants. is
    wise bearing ignorant carriage caught,
    men diseases, another; men heed
    company. devise matter Shallow
    Prince Harry continual laughter wearing six
    fashions, terms, actions; 'a laugh
    intervallums. O, lie slight
    oath, jest sad brow fellow never
    ache shoulders! O, laugh till
    face wet cloak ill laid up!
  SHALLOW.  [Within]  Sir John!
  FALSTAFF. come, Master Shallow; come, Master Shallow.
 Exit




SCENE II.
Westminster. palace

Enter, severally, WARWICK, LORD CHIEF JUSTICE

  WARWICK. now, Lord Chief Justice; away?
  CHIEF JUSTICE. doth King?
  WARWICK. Exceeding well; cares ended.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. hope, dead.
  WARWICK. walk'd nature;
    purposes lives more.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Majesty call'd him.
    service life
    Hath left open injuries.
  WARWICK. Indeed, young king loves not.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. doth not, arm myself
    condition time,
    hideously me
    drawn fantasy.

              Enter LANCASTER, CLARENCE, GLOUCESTER,  
                     WESTMORELAND, others

  WARWICK. heavy issue dead Harry.
    O living Harry temper
    he, worst gentlemen!
    nobles hold places
    strike sail spirits vile sort!
  CHIEF JUSTICE. O God, fear overturn'd.
  PRINCE JOHN. Good morrow, cousin Warwick, good morrow.
  GLOUCESTER & CLARENCE. Good morrow, cousin.
  PRINCE JOHN. meet men forgot speak.
  WARWICK. remember; argument
    heavy admit talk.
  PRINCE JOHN. Well, peace hath made heavy!
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Peace us, heavier!
  PRINCE HUMPHREY. O, good lord, lost friend indeed;
    dare swear borrow face
    sorrow- own.
  PRINCE JOHN. man assur'd grace find,
    stand coldest expectation.  
    sorrier; 'twere otherwise.
  CLARENCE. Well, speak Sir John Falstaff fair;
    swims stream quality.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. Sweet Princes, did, honour,
    Led th' impartial conduct soul;
    beg
    ragged forestall'd remission.
    truth upright innocency fail me,
    King master dead,
    hath him.
  WARWICK. Prince.

            Enter KING HENRY FIFTH, attended

  CHIEF JUSTICE. Good morrow, God save Majesty!
  KING. gorgeous garment, majesty,
    Sits easy think.
    Brothers, mix sadness fear.
    English, Turkish court;
    Amurath Amurath succeeds,  
    Harry Harry. sad, good brothers,
    For, faith, you.
    Sorrow royally appears
    deeply put fashion on,
    wear heart. Why, then, sad;
    entertain it, good brothers,
    joint burden laid all.
    me, heaven, bid assur'd,
    father brother too;
    bear love, bear cares.
    weep Harry's dead, I;
    Harry lives convert tears
    number hours happiness.
  BROTHERS. hope Majesty.
  KING. strangely me; most.
    are, think, assur'd love not.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. assur'd, measur'd rightly,
    Majesty hath hate me.
  KING. No?
    prince great hopes forget  
    great indignities laid me?
    What, rate, rebuke, roughly send prison,
    Th' heir England! easy?
    wash'd Lethe forgotten?
  CHIEF JUSTICE. person father;
    image power lay me;
    th' administration law,
    Whiles busy commonwealth,
    Highness pleased forget place,
    majesty power law justice,
    image King presented,
    struck seat judgment;
    Whereon, offender father,
    gave bold authority
    commit you. deed ill,
    contented, wearing garland,
    son set decrees nought,
    pluck justice awful bench,
    trip law, blunt sword
    guards peace safety person;  
    Nay, more, spurn royal image,
    mock workings body.
    Question royal thoughts, make case yours;
    father, propose son;
    Hear dignity profan'd,
    dreadful laws loosely slighted,
    Behold son disdain'd;
    imagine taking part
    And, power, soft silencing son.
    cold considerance, sentence me;
    And, king, speak state
    misbecame place,
    person, liege's sovereignty.
  KING. right, Justice, weigh well;
    bear balance sword;
    honours increase
    Till live son mine
    Offend you, obey you, did.
    live speak father's words:
    'Happy man bold  
    dares justice proper son;
    happy, son
    deliver greatness so
    hands justice.' commit me;
    commit hand
    Th' unstained sword us'd bear;
    remembrance- same
    bold, just, impartial spirit
    'gainst me. hand.
    father youth;
    voice sound prompt mine ear;
    stoop humble intents
    well-practis'd wise directions.
    And, Princes all, me, beseech you,
    father wild grave,
    tomb lie affections;
    spirits sadly survive,
    mock expectation world,
    frustrate prophecies, raze out
    Rotten opinion, hath writ  
    seeming. tide blood me
    Hath proudly flow'd vanity till now.
    doth turn ebb back sea,
    mingle state floods,
    flow henceforth formal majesty.
    call high court parliament;
    choose limbs noble counsel,
    great body state go
    equal rank govern'd nation;
    war, peace, once, be
    things acquainted familiar us;
    you, father, foremost hand.
    coronation done, accite,
    rememb'red, state;
    And- God consigning good intents-
    prince peer say,
    God shorten Harry's happy life day.               Exeunt




SCENE III.
Gloucestershire. SHALLOW'S orchard

Enter FALSTAFF, SHALLOW, SILENCE, BARDOLPH, PAGE, DAVY

  SHALLOW. Nay, orchard, where, arbour, we
    eat year's pippin mine graffing, dish
    caraways, forth. Come, cousin Silence. bed.
  FALSTAFF. Fore God, goodly dwelling rich.
  SHALLOW. Barren, barren, barren; beggars all, beggars all, Sir John
    -marry, good air. Spread, Davy, spread, Davy; said, Davy.
  FALSTAFF. Davy serves good uses; your
    serving-man husband.
  SHALLOW. good varlet, good varlet, good varlet, Sir
    John. mass, drunk sack supper. good
    varlet. sit down, sit down; come, cousin.
  SILENCE. Ah, sirrah! quoth-a-               [Singing]

              eat make good cheer,
              praise God merry year;
              flesh cheap females dear,  
              lusty lads roam there,
                  merrily,
                merrily.

  FALSTAFF. merry heart! Good Master Silence, give you
    health anon.
  SHALLOW. Give Master Bardolph wine, Davy.
  DAVY. Sweet sir, sit; anon; sweet sir, sit.
    Master Page, good Master Page, sit. Proface! in
    meat, drink. bear; heart's all.
 Exit
  SHALLOW. merry, Master Bardolph; and, soldier there,
    merry.
  SILENCE.  [Singing]

         merry, merry, wife all;
         women shrews, short tall;
         'Tis merry hall beards wag an;
           merry Shrove-tide.
         merry, merry.  

  FALSTAFF. Master Silence man this
    mettle.
  SILENCE. Who, I? merry ere now.

                          Re-enter DAVY

  DAVY.  [To BARDOLPH]  dish leather-coats you.
  SHALLOW. Davy!
  DAVY. worship! straight.  [To BARDOLPH]
    cup wine, sir?
  SILENCE.  [Singing]

         cup wine brisk fine,
         drink leman mine;
           merry heart lives long-a.

  FALSTAFF. said, Master Silence.
  SILENCE. merry, sweet o' th' night.
  FALSTAFF. Health long life you, Master Silence!  
  SILENCE.  [Singing]

         Fill cup, come,
         pledge mile th' bottom.

  SHALLOW. Honest Bardolph, welcome; thou want'st and
    wilt call, beshrew thy heart. Welcome, tiny thief
    too. drink Master Bardolph, all
    cabileros London.
  DAVY. hope London ere die.
  BARDOLPH. there, Davy!
  SHALLOW. mass, you'R crack quart together- ha! you
    not, Master Bardolph?
  BARDOLPH. Yea, sir, pottle-pot.
  SHALLOW. God's liggens, thee. knave stick by
    thee, assure thee that. 'A out, 'a; 'tis true
    bred.
  BARDOLPH. stick him, sir.
  SHALLOW. Why, spoke king. Lack nothing; merry.
    [One knocks door]  door there, ho! knocks?  
                                                       Exit DAVY
  FALSTAFF.  [To SILENCE, drunk bumper]  Why, have
    right.
  SILENCE.  [Singing]

         right,
         dub knight.
           Samingo.

    Is't so?
  FALSTAFF. 'Tis so.
  SILENCE. Is't so? then, man somewhat.

                        Re-enter DAVY

  DAVY. An't worship, Pistol the
    court news.
  FALSTAFF. court? in.

                        Enter PISTOL  

    now, Pistol?
  PISTOL. Sir John, God save you!
  FALSTAFF. wind blew hither, Pistol?
  PISTOL. ill wind blows man good. Sweet knight,
    thou art greatest men realm.
  SILENCE. By'r lady, 'a be, goodman Puff Barson.
  PISTOL. Puff!
    Puff thy teeth, recreant coward base!
    Sir John, thy Pistol thy friend,
    helter-skelter rode thee;
    tidings bring, lucky joys,
    golden times, happy news price.
  FALSTAFF. pray thee now, deliver man world.
  PISTOL. foutra world worldlings base!
    speak Africa golden joys.
  FALSTAFF. O base Assyrian knight, thy news?
    King Cophetua truth thereof.
  SILENCE.  [Singing]  Robin Hood, Scarlet, John.
  PISTOL. dunghill curs confront Helicons?  
    good news baffled?
    Then, Pistol, lay thy head Furies' lap.
  SHALLOW. Honest gentleman, breeding.
  PISTOL. Why, then, lament therefore.
  SHALLOW. Give pardon, sir. If, sir, news the
    court, ways- utter or
    conceal them. am, sir, King, authority.
  PISTOL. king, Bezonian? Speak, die.
  SHALLOW. King Harry.
  PISTOL. Harry Fourth- Fifth?
  SHALLOW. Harry Fourth.
  PISTOL. foutra thine office!
    Sir John, thy tender lambkin King;
    Harry Fifth's man. speak truth.
    Pistol lies, this; fig me, like
    bragging Spaniard.
  FALSTAFF. What, king dead?
  PISTOL. nail door. things speak just.
  FALSTAFF. Away, Bardolph! saddle horse. Master Robert Shallow,
    choose office thou wilt land, 'tis thine. Pistol,  
    double-charge thee dignities.
  BARDOLPH. O joyful day!
    knighthood fortune.
  PISTOL. What, bring good news?
  FALSTAFF. Carry Master Silence bed. Master Shallow, Lord
    Shallow, thou wilt- Fortune's steward. thy
    boots; ride night. O sweet Pistol! Away, Bardolph!
    [Exit BARDOLPH]  Come, Pistol, utter me; withal
    devise thyself good. Boot, boot, Master Shallow!
    young King sick me. man's
    horses: laws England commandment. Blessed are
    friends; woe Lord Chief Justice!
  PISTOL. vultures vile seize lungs also!
    'Where life late led?' they.
    Why, is; pleasant days!         Exeunt




SCENE IV.
London. street

Enter BEADLES, dragging HOSTESS QUICKLY DOLL TEARSHEET

  HOSTESS. No, thou arrant knave; God die,
    thee hang'd. Thou hast drawn shoulder of
    joint.
  BEADLE. constables delivered me; she
    whipping-cheer enough, warrant her. hath been
    man kill'd her.
  DOLL. Nut-hook, nut-hook, lie. on; thee what,
    thou damn'd tripe-visag'd rascal, child do
    miscarry, thou wert thou hadst struck thy mother, thou
    paper-fac'd villain.
  HOSTESS. O Lord, Sir John come! make a
    bloody day somebody. pray God fruit womb
    miscarry!
  BEADLE. do, dozen cushions again;
    eleven now. Come, charge me; for
    man dead Pistol beat you.  
  DOLL. what, thin man censer, you
    soundly swing'd this- blue-bottle rogue, filthy
    famish'd correctioner, swing'd, forswear
    half-kirtles.
  BEADLE. Come, come, knight-errant, come.
  HOSTESS. O God, overcome might!
    Well, sufferance ease.
  DOLL. Come, rogue, come; bring justice.
  HOSTESS. Ay, come, starv'd bloodhound.
  DOLL. Goodman death, goodman bones!
  HOSTESS. Thou atomy, thou!
  DOLL. Come, thin thing! come, rascal!
  BEADLE. well.                                Exeunt




SCENE V.
Westminster. Abbey

Enter GROOMS, strewing rushes

  GROOM. rushes, rushes!
  GROOM. trumpets sounded twice.
  GROOM. 'Twill o'clock ere the
    coronation. Dispatch, dispatch.                       Exeunt

        Trumpets sound, KING train pass
       stage. enter FALSTAFF, SHALLOW,
                  PISTOL, BARDOLPH, page

  FALSTAFF. Stand me, Master Robert Shallow; make the
    King grace. leer him, 'a by; do
    mark countenance give me.
  PISTOL. God bless thy lungs, good knight!
  FALSTAFF. here, Pistol; stand me.  [To SHALLOW]  O, if
    made liveries, bestowed the
    thousand pound borrowed you. 'tis matter; poor
    show doth better; doth infer zeal him.  
  SHALLOW. doth so.
  FALSTAFF. shows earnestness affection-
  SHALLOW. doth so.
  FALSTAFF. devotion-
  SHALLOW. doth, doth, doth.
  FALSTAFF. were, ride day night; deliberate,
    remember, patience shift me-
  SHALLOW. best, certain.
  FALSTAFF. stand stained travel, sweating with
    desire him; thinking else, putting affairs
    oblivion, to
    him.
  PISTOL. 'Tis 'semper idem' 'obsque hoc nihil est.' 'Tis in
    part.
  SHALLOW. 'Tis so, indeed.
  PISTOL. knight, inflame thy noble liver
    make thee rage.
    Thy Doll, Helen thy noble thoughts,
    base durance contagious prison;
    Hal'd thither  
    mechanical dirty hand.
    Rouse revenge ebon den fell Alecto's snake,
    Doll in. Pistol speaks nought truth.
  FALSTAFF. deliver her.
                         [Shouts,within, trumpets sound]
  PISTOL. roar'd sea, trumpet-clangor sounds.

        Enter KING train, LORD CHIEF JUSTICE
                               them

  FALSTAFF. God save thy Grace, King Hal; royal Hal!
  PISTOL. heavens thee guard keep, royal imp fame!
  FALSTAFF. God save thee, sweet boy!
  KING. Lord Chief Justice, speak vain man.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. wits? 'tis speak?
  FALSTAFF. king! Jove! speak thee, heart!
  KING. thee not, man. Fall thy prayers.
    ill white hairs fool jester!
    long dreamt kind man,
    surfeit-swell'd, old, profane;  
    awak'd, despise dream.
    Make thy body hence, thy grace;
    Leave gormandizing; grave doth gape
    thee thrice wider men-
    Reply fool-born jest;
    Presume thing was,
    God doth know, world perceive,
    turn'd self;
    company.
    thou dost hear been,
    Approach me, thou shalt thou wast,
    tutor feeder riots.
    Till banish thee, pain death,
    rest misleaders,
    person ten mile.
    competence life you,
    lack means enforce evils;
    And, hear reform yourselves,
    will, strengths qualities,
    Give advancement. charge, lord,  
    perform'd tenour word.
    Set on.                        Exeunt KING train
  FALSTAFF. Master Shallow, owe thousand pounds.
  SHALLOW. Yea, marry, Sir John; beseech have
    home me.
  FALSTAFF. be, Master Shallow. grieve at
    this; private him. you, must
    world. Fear advancements; the
    man make great.
  SHALLOW. perceive how, give doublet,
    stuff straw. beseech you, good Sir John, me
    hundred thousand.
  FALSTAFF. Sir, good word. heard
    colour.
  SHALLOW. colour fear die in, Sir John.
  FALSTAFF. Fear colours; dinner. Come, Lieutenant
    Pistol; come, Bardolph. night.

            Re-enter PRINCE JOHN, LORD CHIEF JUSTICE,
                            officers  

  CHIEF JUSTICE. Go, carry Sir John Falstaff Fleet;
    company him.
  FALSTAFF. lord, lord-
  CHIEF JUSTICE. speak. hear soon.
    away.
  PISTOL. Si fortuna tormenta, spero contenta.
           Exeunt PRINCE JOHN LORD CHIEF JUSTICE
  PRINCE JOHN. fair proceeding King's.
    hath intent wonted followers
    provided for;
    banish'd till conversations
    wise modest world.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. are.
  PRINCE JOHN. King hath call'd parliament, lord.
  CHIEF JUSTICE. hath.
  PRINCE JOHN. lay odds that, ere year expire,
    bear civil swords native fire
    France. heard bird sing,
    music, thinking, pleas'd King.  
    Come, hence?                                 Exeunt

EPILOGUE
                           EPILOGUE.

  fear, curtsy, speech. fear, your
displeasure; curtsy, duty; speech, beg pardons.
If good speech now, undo me; say
is mine making; what, indeed, will, doubt,
prove mine marring. purpose, venture.
Be you, well, end
of displeasing play, pray patience promise you
a better. meant, indeed, pay this; an
ill venture unluckily home, break, you, gentle
creditors, lose. promis'd be, commit
my body mercies. Bate some, pay some, and,
as debtors do, promise infinitely; kneel before
you- but, indeed, pray Queen.
  tongue entreat acquit me, command to
use legs? light payment-to dance of
your debt. good conscience make possible
satisfaction, I. gentlewomen forgiven
me. gentlemen not, gentlemen agree with
the gentlewomen, assembly.
  word more, beseech you. cloy'd fat
meat, humble author continue story, Sir John in
it, make merry fair Katherine France; where, for
anything know, Falstaff die sweat, 'a be
killed hard opinions; Oldcastle died martyr this
is man. tongue weary; legs too, bid
you good night.


THE END

1599

THE LIFE KING HENRY FIFTH

by William Shakespeare



DRAMATIS PERSONAE

  BARDOLPH,    "    "   "    "     "
  PISTOL,      "    "   "    "     "

  BOY                               HERALD

  CHARLES SIXTH, King France
  LEWIS, Dauphin                DUKE BURGUNDY
  DUKE ORLEANS                   DUKE BRITAINE
  DUKE BOURBON                   CONSTABLE FRANCE
  RAMBURES, French Lord
  GRANDPRE,    "    "
  GOVERNOR HARFLEUR              MONTJOY, French herald
  AMBASSADORS King England

  ISABEL, Queen France  
  KATHERINE, daughter Charles Isabel
  ALICE, lady attending her
  HOSTESS Boar's Head, Eastcheap; Mrs. Quickly, now
    married Pistol

  Lords, Ladies, Officers, Soldiers, Messengers, Attendants


                              SCENE:
                        England France

PROLOGUE
                            PROLOGUE.

                          Enter CHORUS

 CHORUS. O Muse fire, ascend
   brightest heaven invention,
   kingdom stage, princes act,
   monarchs behold swelling scene!
   warlike Harry, himself,
   Assume port Mars; heels,
   Leash'd hounds, famine, sword, fire,
   Crouch employment. pardon, gentles all,
   flat unraised spirits hath dar'd
   unworthy scaffold bring forth
   great object. cockpit hold
   vasty fields France? cram
   wooden O casques
   affright air Agincourt?
   O, pardon! crooked figure may
   Attest place million;
   us, ciphers great accompt,
   imaginary forces work.
   Suppose girdle walls  
   confin'd mighty monarchies,
   high upreared abutting fronts
   perilous narrow ocean parts asunder.
   Piece imperfections thoughts:
   thousand parts divide man,
   make imaginary puissance;
   Think, talk horses, them
   Printing proud hoofs i' th' receiving earth;
   'tis thoughts deck kings,
   Carry there, jumping o'er times,
   Turning th' accomplishment years
   hour-glass; supply,
   Admit Chorus history;
   prologue-like, humble patience pray
   Gently hear, kindly judge, play.               Exit

ACT I. SCENE I.
London. ante-chamber KING'S palace

Enter ARCHBISHOP CANTERBURY BISHOP ELY

 CANTERBURY. lord, you: bill urg'd
   th' eleventh year king's reign
   like, pass'd
   scambling unquiet time
   push farther question.
 ELY. how, lord, resist now?
 CANTERBURY. thought on. pass us,
   lose half possession;
   temporal lands men devout
   testament church
   strip us; valu'd thus-
   maintain, King's honour,
   Full fifteen earls fifteen hundred knights,
   thousand hundred good esquires;
   And, relief lazars weak age,
   indigent faint souls, past corporal toil,
   hundred alms-houses supplied;
   coffers King, beside,
   thousand pounds th' year: runs bill.
 ELY. drink deep.
 CANTERBURY. 'T drink cup all.
 ELY. prevention?
 CANTERBURY. King full grace fair regard.
 ELY. true lover holy Church.
 CANTERBURY. courses youth promis'd not.
   breath sooner left father's body  
   wildness, mortified him,
   Seem'd die too; yea, moment,
   Consideration angel came
   whipp'd th' offending Adam him,
   Leaving body paradise
   T'envelop celestial spirits.
   sudden scholar made;
   reformation flood,
   heady currance, scouring faults;
   Hydra-headed wilfulnes
   lose seat, once,
   king.
 ELY. blessed change.
 CANTERBURY. Hear reason divinity,
   And, all-admiring, wish
   desire King made prelate;
   Hear debate commonwealth affairs,
   hath study;
   List discourse war, hear
   fearful battle rend'red music.
   Turn policy,
   Gordian knot unloose,  
   Familiar garter; that, speaks,
   air, charter'd libertine, still,
   mute lurketh men's ears
   steal sweet honey'd sentences;
   art practic part life
   mistress theoric;
   Grace glean it,
   addiction courses vain,
   companies unletter'd, rude, shallow,
   hours fill'd riots, banquets, sports;
   noted study,
   retirement, sequestration
   open haunts popularity.
 ELY. strawberry grows underneath nettle,
   wholesome berries thrive ripen best
   Neighbour'd fruit baser quality;
   Prince obscur'd contemplation
   veil wildness; which, doubt,
   Grew summer grass, fastest night,
   Unseen, crescive faculty.
 CANTERBURY. so; miracles ceas'd;
   admit means  
   things perfected.
 ELY. But, good lord,
   mitigation bill
   Urg'd Commons? Doth Majesty
   Incline it, no?
 CANTERBURY. indifferent
   swaying part
   cherishing th' exhibiters us;
   made offer Majesty-
   spiritual convocation
   regard hand,
   open'd Grace large,
   touching France- give greater sum
   time clergy yet
   predecessors part withal.
 ELY. offer receiv'd, lord?
 CANTERBURY. good acceptance Majesty;
   Save time hear,
   perceiv'd Grace fain done,
   severals unhidden passages
   true tides dukedoms,
   generally crown seat France,
   Deriv'd Edward, great-grandfather.
 ELY. th' impediment broke off?
 CANTERBURY. French ambassador instant
   Crav'd audience; hour, think,  
   give hearing: o'clock?
 ELY. is.
 CANTERBURY. in, embassy;
   ready guess declare,
   Frenchman speak word it.
 ELY. wait you, long hear it.          Exeunt




SCENE II.
London. Presence Chamber KING'S palace

Enter KING, GLOUCESTER, BEDFORD, EXETER, WARWICK, WESTMORELAND,
and attendants

  KING HENRY. gracious Lord Canterbury?
  EXETER. presence.
  KING HENRY. Send him, good uncle.
  WESTMORELAND. call th' ambassador, liege?
  KING HENRY. yet, cousin; resolv'd,
    hear him, things weight
    task thoughts, France.

              Enter ARCHBISHOP CANTERBURY and
                       BISHOP ELY

  CANTERBURY. God angels guard sacred throne,
    make long it!
  KING HENRY. Sure, you.
    learned lord, pray proceed,
    justly religiously unfold  
    law Salique, France,
    bar claim;
    God forbid, dear faithful lord,
    fashion, wrest, bow reading,
    nicely charge understanding soul
    opening titles miscreate right
    Suits native colours truth;
    God doth many, health,
    drop blood approbation
    reverence incite to.
    heed impawn person,
    awake sleeping sword war-
    charge you, God, heed;
    kingdoms contend
    fall blood; guiltless drops
    woe, sore complaint,
    'Gainst wrongs edge swords
    makes waste mortality.
    conjuration speak, lord;
    hear, note, heart,  
    speak conscience wash'd
    pure sin baptism.
  CANTERBURY. hear me, gracious sovereign, peers,
    owe yourselves, lives, services,
    imperial throne. bar
    make Highness' claim France
    this, produce Pharamond:
    'In terram Salicam mulieres ne succedant'-
    'No woman succeed Salique land';
    Salique land French unjustly gloze
    realm France, Pharamond
    founder law female bar.
    authors faithfully affirm
    land Salique Germany,
    floods Sala Elbe;
    Charles Great, subdu'd Saxons,
    left settled French;
    Who, holding disdain German women
    dishonest manners life,
    Establish'd law: wit, female  
    inheritrix Salique land;
    Salique, said, 'twixt Elbe Sala,
    day Germany call'd Meisen.
    doth Salique law
    devised realm France;
    French possess Salique land
    hundred twenty years
    defunction King Pharamond,
    Idly suppos'd founder law;
    died year redemption
    hundred twenty-six; Charles Great
    Subdu'd Saxons, seat French
    river Sala, year
    hundred five. Besides, writers say,
    King Pepin, deposed Childeric,
    Did, heir general, descended
    Blithild, daughter King Clothair,
    Make claim title crown France.
    Hugh Capet also, usurp'd crown
    Charles Duke Lorraine, sole heir male  
    true line stock Charles Great,
    find title shows truth-
    pure truth corrupt naught-
    Convey'd th' heir th' Lady Lingare,
    Daughter Charlemain, son
    Lewis Emperor, Lewis son
    Charles Great. King Lewis Tenth,
    sole heir usurper Capet,
    quiet conscience,
    Wearing crown France, till satisfied
    fair Queen Isabel, grandmother,
    lineal Lady Ermengare,
    Daughter Charles foresaid Duke Lorraine;
    marriage line Charles Great
    re-united Crown France.
    that, clear summer's sun,
    King Pepin's title, Hugh Capet's claim,
    King Lewis satisfaction, appear
    hold tide female;
    kings France day,  
    hold Salique law
    bar Highness claiming female;
    choose hide net
    amply imbar crooked tides
    Usurp'd progenitors.
  KING HENRY. conscience make claim?
  CANTERBURY. sin head, dread sovereign!
    book Numbers writ,
    man dies, inheritance
    Descend daughter. Gracious lord,
    Stand own, unwind bloody flag,
    back mighty ancestors.
    Go, dread lord, great-grandsire's tomb,
    claim; invoke warlike spirit,
    great-uncle's, Edward Black Prince,
    French ground play'd tragedy,
    Making defeat fun power France,
    Whiles mighty father hill
    Stood smiling behold lion's whelp
    Forage blood French nobility.  
    O noble English, entertain
    half forces full pride France,
    half stand laughing by,
    work cold action!
  ELY. Awake remembrance valiant dead,
    puissant arm renew feats.
    heir; sit throne;
    blood courage renowned them
    Runs veins; thrice-puissant liege
    May-morn youth,
    Ripe exploits mighty enterprises.
  EXETER. brother kings monarchs earth
    expect rouse yourself,
    lions blood.
  WESTMORELAND. Grace hath means might-
    hath Highness; King England
    nobles richer loyal subjects,
    hearts left bodies England
    lie pavilion'd fields France.
  CANTERBURY. O, bodies follow, dear liege,  
    blood sword fire win right!
    aid whereof spiritualty
    raise Highness mighty sum
    clergy time
    Bring ancestors.
  KING HENRY. arm t' invade French,
    lay proportions defend
    Scot, make road us
    advantages.
  CANTERBURY. marches, gracious sovereign,
    wall sufficient defend
    inland pilfering borderers.
  KING HENRY. coursing snatchers only,
    fear main intendment Scot,
    hath giddy neighbour us;
    read great-grandfather
    forces France
    Scot unfurnish'd kingdom
    pouring, tide breach,
    ample brim fulness force,  
    Galling gleaned land hot assays,
    Girdling grievous siege castles towns;
    England, empty defence,
    Hath shook trembled th' ill neighbourhood.
  CANTERBURY. hath fear'd harm'd, liege;
    hear exampled herself:
    chivalry hath France,
    mourning widow nobles,
    hath defended
    impounded stray
    King Scots; send France,
    fill King Edward's fame prisoner kings,
    make chronicle rich praise
    ooze bottom sea
    sunken wreck sumless treasuries.
  WESTMORELAND. saying, true:

          'If France win,
          Scotland begin.'
  
    eagle England prey,
    unguarded nest weasel Scot
    sneaking, sucks princely eggs,
    Playing mouse absence cat,
    tear havoc eat.
  EXETER. follows, then, cat stay home;
    crush'd necessity,
    locks safeguard necessaries
    pretty traps catch petty thieves.
    armed hand doth fight abroad,
    Th' advised head defends home;
    government, high, low, lower,
    Put parts, doth consent,
    Congreeing full natural close,
    music.
  CANTERBURY. doth heaven divide
    state man divers functions,
    Setting endeavour continual motion;
    fixed aim but
    Obedience; work honey bees,  
    Creatures rule nature teach
    act order peopled kingdom.
    king, officers sorts,
    magistrates correct home;
    merchants venture trade abroad;
    soldiers, armed stings,
    Make boot summer's velvet buds,
    pillage merry march bring home
    tent-royal emperor;
    Who, busied majesty, surveys
    singing masons building roofs gold,
    civil citizens kneading honey,
    poor mechanic porters crowding in
    heavy burdens narrow gate,
    sad-ey'd justice, surly hum,
    Delivering o'er executors pale
    lazy yawning drone. infer,
    things, full reference
    consent, work contrariously;
    arrows loosed ways  
    mark, ways meet town,
    fresh streams meet salt sea,
    lines close dial's centre;
    thousand actions, afoot,
    End purpose, home
    defeat. France, liege.
    Divide happy England four;
    Whereof quarter France,
    withal make Gallia shake.
    we, thrice powers left home,
    defend doors dog,
    worried, nation lose
    hardiness policy.
  KING HENRY. Call messengers Dauphin.
                                          Exeunt attendants
    resolv'd; and, God's help
    yours, noble sinews power,
    France ours, bend awe,
    break pieces; sit,
    Ruling large ample empery  
    O'er France kingly dukedoms,
    lay bones unworthy urn,
    Tombless, remembrance them.
    history full mouth
    Speak freely acts, grave,
    Turkish mute, tongueless mouth,
    worshipp'd waxen epitaph.

                  Enter AMBASSADORS France

    prepar'd pleasure
    fair cousin Dauphin; hear
    greeting him, King.
  AMBASSADOR. May't Majesty give leave
    Freely render charge;
    sparingly show of
    Dauphin's meaning embassy?
  KING HENRY. tyrant, Christian king,
    grace passion subject
    wretches fett'red prisons;  
    frank uncurbed plainness
    Dauphin's mind.
  AMBASSADOR. then, few.
    Highness, sending France,
    claim dukedoms right
    great predecessor, King Edward Third.
    answer claim, Prince master
    savour youth,
    bids advis'd nought France
    nimble galliard won;
    revel dukedoms there.
    sends you, meeter spirit,
    tun treasure; and, lieu this,
    Desires dukedoms claim
    Hear you. Dauphin speaks.
  KING HENRY. treasure, uncle?
  EXETER. Tennis-balls, liege.
  KING HENRY. glad Dauphin pleasant us;
    present pains for.
    match'd rackets balls,  
    France, God's grace, play set
    strike father's crown hazard.
    hath made match wrangler
    courts France disturb'd
    chaces. understand well,
    o'er wilder days,
    measuring made them.
    valu'd poor seat England;
    therefore, living hence, give ourself
    barbarous licence; 'tis common
    men merriest home.
    Dauphin state,
    king, show sail greatness,
    rouse throne France;
    laid majesty
    plodded man working-days;
    rise full glory
    dazzle eyes France,
    Yea, strike Dauphin blind us.
    pleasant Prince mock  
    Hath turn'd balls gun-stones, soul
    stand sore charged wasteful vengeance
    fly them; thousand widows
    mock mock dear husbands;
    Mock mothers sons, mock castles down;
    ungotten unborn
    curse Dauphin's scorn.
    lies God,
    appeal; name,
    Dauphin, coming on,
    venge put forth
    rightful hand well-hallow'd cause.
    peace; Dauphin
    jest savour shallow wit,
    thousands weep laugh it.
    Convey safe conduct. Fare well.
                                              Exeunt AMBASSADORS
  EXETER. merry message.
  KING HENRY. hope make sender blush it.
    Therefore, lords, omit happy hour  
    give furth'rance expedition;
    thought France,
    Save God, run business.
    proportions wars
    collected, things thought upon
    reasonable swiftness ad
    feathers wings; for, God before,
    chide Dauphin father's door.
    man task thought
    fair action foot brought.         Exeunt

ACT II. PROLOGUE.

Flourish. Enter CHORUS

  CHORUS. youth England fire,
    silken dalliance wardrobe lies;
    thrive armourers, honour's thought
    Reigns solely breast man;
    sell pasture buy horse,
    mirror Christian kings
    winged heels, English Mercuries.
    sits Expectation air,
    hides sword hilts point
    crowns imperial, crowns, coronets,
    Promis'd Harry followers.
    French, advis'd good intelligence
    dreadful preparation,
    Shake fear pale policy
    Seek divert English purposes.
    O England! model thy greatness,
    body mighty heart,
    mightst thou honour thee do,  
    thy children kind natural!
    thy fault! France hath thee found out
    nest hollow bosoms, fills
    treacherous crowns; corrupted men-
    One, Richard Earl Cambridge, second,
    Henry Lord Scroop Masham, third,
    Sir Thomas Grey, knight, Northumberland,
    Have, gilt France- O guilt indeed!-
    Confirm'd conspiracy fearful France;
    hands grace kings die-
    hell treason hold promises,
    Ere ship France- Southampton.
    Linger patience on, digest
    Th' abuse distance, force play.
    sum paid, traitors agreed,
    King set London, scene
    transported, gentles, Southampton;
    play-house now, sit,
    France convey safe
    bring back, charming narrow seas  
    give gentle pass; for, may,
    offend stomach play.
    But, till King forth, till then,
    Southampton shift scene.                 Exit




SCENE I.
London. Boar's Head Tavern, Eastcheap

Enter CORPORAL NYM LIEUTENANT BARDOLPH

  BARDOLPH. met, Corporal Nym.
  NYM. Good morrow, Lieutenant Bardolph.
  BARDOLPH. What, Ancient Pistol friends yet?
  NYM. part, care not; little, time shall
    serve, smiles- may. dare
    fight; wink hold mine iron. simple
    one; though? toast cheese, endure
    cold man's sword will; end.
  BARDOLPH. bestow breakfast make friends; we'll
    sworn brothers France. Let't so, good Corporal
    Nym.
  NYM. Faith, live long may, it;
    live longer, may. my
    rest, rendezvous it.
  BARDOLPH. certain, Corporal, married Nell
    Quickly; wrong, were
    troth-plight her.  
  NYM. tell; things may. Men sleep, and
    throats time; say
    knives edges. may; patience a
    tired mare, plod. conclusions. Well, I
    tell.

                     Enter PISTOL HOSTESS

  BARDOLPH. Ancient Pistol wife. Good Corporal, be
    patient here.
  NYM. now, mine host Pistol!
  PISTOL. Base tike, call'st thou host?
    hand, swear scorn term;
    Nell lodgers.
  HOSTESS. No, troth, long; lodge board a
    dozen fourteen gentlewomen live honestly prick of
    needles, thought bawdy-house
    straight. [Nym draws] O well-a-day, Lady, drawn! Now
    wilful adultery murder committed.
  BARDOLPH. Good Lieutenant, good Corporal, offer here.
  NYM. Pish!  
  PISTOL. Pish thee, Iceland dog! thou prick-ear'd cur of
    Iceland!
  HOSTESS. Good Corporal Nym, show thy valour, put sword.
  NYM. shog off? solus.
  PISTOL. 'Solus,' egregious dog? O viper vile!
    'solus' thy mervailous face;
    'solus' thy teeth, thy throat,
    thy hateful lungs, yea, thy maw, perdy;
    And, worse, thy nasty mouth!
    retort 'solus' thy bowels;
    take, Pistol's cock up,
    flashing fire follow.
  NYM. Barbason: conjure me. humour to
    knock indifferently well. grow foul me, Pistol, I
    scour rapier, may, fair terms; you
    walk prick guts little, good terms,
    may, thaes humour it.
  PISTOL. O braggart vile damned furious wight!
    grave doth gape doting death near;
    exhale.                             [PISTOL draws]  
  BARDOLPH. Hear me, hear say: strikes first
    stroke run hilts, soldier.
                                                         [Draws]
  PISTOL. oath mickle might; fury abate.
                           [PISTOL Nym sheathe swords]
    Give thy fist, thy fore-foot give;
    Thy spirits tall.
  NYM. cut thy throat time other, fair terms; that
    humour it.
  PISTOL. 'Couple gorge!'
    word. thee defy again.
    O hound Crete, think'st thou spouse get?
    No; spital go,
    powd'ring tub infamy
    Fetch lazar kite Cressid's kind,
    Doll Tearsheet name, espouse.
    have, hold, quondam Quickly
    she; and- pauca, enough.
    to.
  
                        Enter Boy

  BOY. Mine host Pistol, master; your
    hostess- sick, bed. Good Bardolph, put
    thy face sheets, office warming-pan.
    Faith, ill.
  BARDOLPH. Away, rogue.
  HOSTESS. troth, yield crow pudding these
    days: King kill'd heart. Good husband, home
    presently.                            Exeunt HOSTESS BOY
  BARDOLPH. Come, make friends? France
    together; devil knives cut one
    another's throats?
  PISTOL. floods o'erswell, fiends food howl on!
  NYM. pay shillings won betting?
  PISTOL. Base slave pays.
  NYM. have; humour it.
  PISTOL. manhood compound: push home.
                                           [PISTOL Nym draw]
  BARDOLPH. sword, makes thrust kill  
    him; sword, will.
  PISTOL. Sword oath, oaths course.
                                            [Sheathes sword]
  BARDOLPH. Corporal Nym, thou wilt friends, friends; an
    thou wilt not, enemies too. Prithee put up.
  NYM. shillings won betting?
  PISTOL. noble shalt thou have, present pay;
    liquor likewise give thee,
    friendship combine, brotherhood.
    live Nym Nym live me.
    just? sutler be
    camp, profits accrue.
    Give thy hand.
  NYM. [Sheathing sword] noble?
  PISTOL. cash justly paid.
  NYM. [Shaking hands] Well, then, humour of't.

                       Re-enter HOSTESS

  HOSTESS. women, quickly Sir John.  
    Ah, poor heart! shak'd burning quotidian tertian
    lamentable behold. Sweet men, him.
  NYM. King hath run bad humours knight; even
    it.
  PISTOL. Nym, thou hast spoke right;
    heart fracted corroborate.
  NYM. King good king, may; passes
    humours careers.
  PISTOL. condole knight; for, lambkins, live.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE II.
Southampton. council-chamber

Enter EXETER, BEDFORD, WESTMORELAND

  BEDFORD. Fore God, Grace bold, trust traitors.
  EXETER. apprehended by.
  WESTMORELAND. smooth bear themselves,
    allegiance bosoms sat,
    Crowned faith constant loyalty!
  BEDFORD. King hath note intend,
    interception dream of.
  EXETER. Nay, man bedfellow,
    hath dull'd cloy'd gracious favours-
    should, foreign purse, sell
    sovereign's life death treachery!

               Trumpets sound. Enter KING, SCROOP,
                  CAMBRIDGE, GREY, attendants

  KING HENRY. sits wind fair, aboard.
    Lord Cambridge, kind Lord Masham,  
    you, gentle knight, give thoughts.
    pow'rs bear us
    cut passage force France,
    execution act
    head assembled them?
  SCROOP. doubt, liege, man best.
  KING HENRY. doubt that, persuaded
    carry heart hence
    grows fair consent ours;
    leave doth wish
    Success conquest attend us.
  CAMBRIDGE. monarch fear'd lov'd
    Majesty. not, think, subject
    sits heart-grief uneasines
    sweet shade government.
  GREY. True: father's enemies
    steep'd galls honey, serve you
    hearts create duty zeal.
  KING HENRY. great thankfulness,
    forget office hand  
    Sooner quittance desert merit
    weight worthiness.
  SCROOP. service steeled sinews toil,
    labour refresh hope,
    Grace incessant services.
  KING HENRY. judge less. Uncle Exeter,
    Enlarge man committed yesterday
    rail'd person. consider
    excess wine set on;
    advice pardon him.
  SCROOP. mercy, security.
    punish'd, sovereign, example
    Breed, sufferance, kind.
  KING HENRY. O, merciful!
  CAMBRIDGE. Highness, punish too.
  GREY. Sir,
    show great mercy give life,
    taste correction.
  KING HENRY. Alas, love care me
    heavy orisons 'gainst poor wretch!  
    faults proceeding distemper
    wink'd at, stretch eye
    capital crimes, chew'd, swallow'd, digested,
    us? enlarge man,
    Cambridge, Scroop, Grey, dear care
    tender preservation person,
    punish'd. French causes:
    late commissioners?
  CAMBRIDGE. one, lord.
    Highness bade to-day.
  SCROOP. me, liege.
  GREY. I, royal sovereign.
  KING HENRY. Then, Richard Earl Cambridge, yours;
    yours, Lord Scroop Masham; and, Sir Knight,
    Grey Northumberland, yours.
    Read them, worthiness.
    Lord Westmoreland, uncle Exeter,
    aboard to-night. Why, now, gentlemen?
    papers, lose
    complexion? ye change!  
    cheeks paper. Why, read there
    cowarded chas'd blood
    appearance?
  CAMBRIDGE. confess fault,
    submit Highness' mercy.
  GREY, SCROOP. appeal.
  KING HENRY. mercy quick late
   counsel suppress'd kill'd.
    dare, shame, talk mercy;
    reasons turn bosoms
    dogs masters, worrying you.
    you, princes noble peers,
    English monsters! Lord Cambridge here-
    apt love accord
    furnish appertinents
    Belonging honour; man
    Hath, light crowns, lightly conspir'd,
    sworn practices France
    kill Hampton; which
    knight, bounty bound  
    Cambridge is, hath likewise sworn. But, O,
    thee, Lord Scroop, thou cruel,
    Ingrateful, savage, inhuman creature?
    Thou didst bear key counsels,
    knew'st bottom soul,
    mightst coin'd gold,
    Wouldst thou practis'd thy use-
    foreign hire
    thee extract spark evil
    annoy finger? 'Tis strange
    That, truth stands gross
    black white, eye scarcely it.
    Treason murder together,
    yoke-devils sworn either's purpose,
    Working grossly natural cause
    admiration whoop them;
    thou, 'gainst proportion, didst bring in
    wait treason murder;
    whatsoever cunning fiend was
    wrought thee preposterously  
    Hath voice hell excellence;
    devils suggest treasons
    botch bungle damnation
    patches, colours, forms, fetch'd
    glist'ring semblances piety;
    temper'd thee bade thee stand up,
    Gave thee instance thou shouldst treason,
    dub thee traitor.
    demon hath gull'd thee thus
    lion gait walk world,
    return vasty Tartar back,
    legions 'I win
    soul easy Englishman's.'
    O, hast thou jealousy infected
    sweetness affiance! Show men dutiful?
    Why, didst thou. grave learned?
    Why, didst thou. noble family?
    Why, didst thou. religious?
    Why, didst thou. spare diet,
    Free gross passion mirth anger,  
    Constant spirit, swerving blood,
    Garnish'd deck'd modest complement,
    working eye ear,
    purged judgment trusting neither?
    finely bolted didst thou seem;
    thy fall hath left kind blot
    mark full-fraught man indued
    suspicion. weep thee;
    revolt thine, methinks, like
    fall man. faults open.
    Arrest answer law;
    God acquit practices!
  EXETER. arrest thee high treason, Richard Earl
      Cambridge.
    arrest thee high treason, Henry Lord Scroop
      Masham.
    arrest thee high treason, Thomas Grey,
      knight, Northumberland.
  SCROOP. purposes God justly hath discover'd,
    repent fault death;  
    beseech Highness forgive,
    body pay price it.
  CAMBRIDGE. me, gold France seduce,
    admit motive
    sooner effect intended;
    God thanked prevention,
    sufferance heartily rejoice,
    Beseeching God pardon me.
  GREY. faithful subject rejoice
    discovery dangerous treason
    hour joy o'er myself,
    Prevented damned enterprise.
    fault, body, pardon, sovereign.
  KING HENRY. God quit mercy! Hear sentence.
    conspir'd royal person,
    Join'd enemy proclaim'd, coffers
    Receiv'd golden earnest death;
    sold king slaughter,
    princes peers servitude,
    subjects oppression contempt,  
    kingdom desolation.
    Touching person seek revenge;
    kingdom's safety tender,
    ruin sought, laws
    deliver you. hence,
    Poor miserable wretches, death;
    taste whereof God mercy give
    patience endure, true repentance
    dear offences. Bear hence.
                     Exeunt CAMBRIDGE, SCROOP, GREY, guarded
    Now, lords, France; enterprise whereof
    glorious.
    doubt fair lucky war,
    God graciously hath brought light
    dangerous treason, lurking way
    hinder beginnings; doubt now
    rub smoothed way.
    Then, forth, dear countrymen; deliver
    puissance hand God,
    Putting straight expedition.  
    Cheerly sea; signs war advance;
    king England, king France!
                                                Flourish. Exeunt




SCENE III.
Eastcheap. Boar's Head tavern

Enter PISTOL, HOSTESS, NYM, BARDOLPH, Boy

  HOSTESS. Prithee, honey-sweet husband, bring thee to
     Staines.
  PISTOL. No; manly heart doth earn.
    Bardolph, blithe; Nym, rouse thy vaunting veins;
    Boy, bristle thy courage up. Falstaff dead,
    earn therefore.
  BARDOLPH. him, wheresome'er is, in
    heaven hell!
  HOSTESS. Nay, sure, hell: Arthur's bosom, if
    man Arthur's bosom. 'A made finer end, went
    christom child; 'a parted ev'n just
    twelve one, ev'n turning o' th' tide; for
    fumble sheets, play flowers,
    smile fingers' end, knew way;
    nose sharp pen, 'a babbl'd green
    fields. 'How now, Sir John!' quoth 'What, man, o' good
    cheer.' 'a cried 'God, God, God!' times.  
    I, comfort him, bid 'a God; hop'd
    trouble thoughts yet.
    'a bade lay clothes feet; put hand into
    bed felt them, cold stone; I
    felt knees, upward upward, cold
    stone.
  NYM. cried sack.
  HOSTESS. Ay, 'a did.
  BARDOLPH. women.
  HOSTESS. Nay, 'a not.
  BOY. Yes, 'a did, devils incarnate.
  HOSTESS. 'A abide carnation; 'twas colour never
    liked.
  BOY. 'A devil women.
  HOSTESS. 'A sort, indeed, handle women; was
    rheumatic, talk'd Whore Babylon.
  BOY. remember 'a flea stick Bardolph's nose,
    'a black soul burning hell?
  BARDOLPH. Well, fuel maintain'd fire: that's
    riches service.  
  NYM. shog? King Southampton.
  PISTOL. Come, away. love, give thy lips.
    chattles moveables;
    senses rule. word 'Pitch Pay.'
    Trust none;
    oaths straws, men's faiths wafer-cakes,
    Holdfast dog, duck.
    Therefore, Caveto thy counsellor.
    Go, clear thy crystals. Yoke-fellows arms,
    France, horse-leeches, boys,
    suck, suck, blood suck.
  BOY. unwholesome food, say.
  PISTOL. Touch soft mouth march.
  BARDOLPH. Farewell, hostess.                     [Kissing her]
  NYM. kiss, humour it; adieu.
  PISTOL. housewifery appear; close, thee command.
  HOSTESS. Farewell; adieu.                               Exeunt




SCENE IV.
France. KING'S palace

Flourish. Enter FRENCH KING, DAUPHIN, DUKES BERRI
and BRITAINE, CONSTABLE, others

  FRENCH KING. English full power us;
    carefully concerns
    answer royally defences.
    Dukes Berri Britaine,
    Brabant Orleans, make forth,
    you, Prince Dauphin, swift dispatch,
    line repair towns war
    men courage means defendant;
    England approaches makes fierce
    waters sucking gulf.
    fits us, then, provident
    fear teach us, late examples
    Left fatal neglected English
    fields.
  DAUPHIN. redoubted father,
    meet arm 'gainst foe;  
    peace dull kingdom,
    war quarrel question,
    defences, musters, preparations,
    maintain'd, assembled, collected,
    war expectation.
    Therefore, say, 'tis meet forth
    view sick feeble parts France;
    show fear-
    No, heard England
    busied Whitsun morris-dance;
    For, good liege, idly king'd,
    sceptre fantastically borne
    vain, giddy, shallow, humorous youth,
    fear attends not.
  CONSTABLE. O peace, Prince Dauphin!
    mistaken king.
    Question Grace late ambassadors
    great state heard embassy,
    supplied noble counsellors,
    modest exception, withal  
    terrible constant resolution,
    find vanities forespent
    Roman Brutus,
    Covering discretion coat folly;
    gardeners ordure hide roots
    spring delicate.
  DAUPHIN. Well, 'tis so, Lord High Constable;
    so, matter.
    cases defence 'tis weigh
    enemy mighty seems;
    proportions defence fill'd;
    weak niggardly projection
    Doth miser spoil coat scanting
    cloth.
  FRENCH KING. King Harry strong;
    And, Princes, strongly arm meet him.
    kindred hath flesh'd us;
    bred bloody strain
    haunted familiar paths.
    Witness memorable shame  
    Cressy battle fatally struck,
    princes capdv'd hand
    black name, Edward, Black Prince Wales;
    Whiles mountain sire- mountain standing,
    air, crown'd golden sun-
    heroical seed, smil'd him,
    Mangle work nature, deface
    patterns God French fathers
    twenty years made. stern
    victorious stock; fear
    native mightiness fate him.

                      Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. Ambassadors Harry King England
    crave admittance Majesty.
  FRENCH KING. give present audience. bring them.
                              Exeunt MESSENGER LORDS
    chase hotly followed, friends.
  DAUPHIN. Turn head stop pursuit; coward dogs  
    spend mouths threaten
    Runs them. Good sovereign,
    English short, know
    monarchy head.
    Self-love, liege, vile sin
    self-neglecting.

               Re-enter LORDS, EXETER train

  FRENCH KING. brother England?
  EXETER. him, greets Majesty:
    wills you, God Almighty,
    divest yourself, lay apart
    borrowed glories gift heaven,
    law nature nations, 'longs
    heirs- namely, crown,
    wide-stretched honours pertain,
    custom ordinance times,
    crown France. know
    'Tis sinister awkward claim,  
    Pick'd worm-holes long-vanish'd days,
    dust oblivion rak'd,
    sends memorable line,       [Gives paper]
    branch demonstrative;
    overlook pedigree.
    find evenly deriv'd
    fam'd famous ancestors,
    Edward Third, bids resign
    crown kingdom, indirectly held
    him, native true challenger.
  FRENCH KING. follows?
  EXETER. Bloody constraint; hide crown
    hearts, rake it.
    fierce tempest coming,
    thunder earthquake, Jove,
    requiring fail, compel;
    bids you, bowels Lord,
    Deliver crown; mercy
    poor souls hungry war
    Opens vasty jaws; head  
    Turning widows' tears, orphans' cries,
    dead men's blood, privy maidens' groans,
    husbands, fathers, betrothed lovers,
    swallowed controversy.
    claim, threat'ning, message;
    Dauphin presence here,
    expressly bring greeting too.
  FRENCH KING. us, further;
    To-morrow bear full intent
    Back brother England.
  DAUPHIN. Dauphin:
    stand him. England?
  EXETER. Scorn defiance, slight regard, contempt,
    misbecome
    mighty sender, doth prize at.
    king: father's Highness
    not, grant demands large,
    Sweeten bitter mock Majesty,
    call hot answer it
    caves womby vaultages France  
    chide trespass return mock
    accent ordinance.
  DAUPHIN. Say, father render fair return,
    will; desire
    odds England. end,
    matching youth vanity,
    present Paris balls.
  EXETER. make Paris Louvre shake it,
    mistress court mighty Europe;
    assur'd find difference,
    subjects found,
    promise greener days
    masters now. weighs time
    utmost grain; read
    losses, stay France.
  FRENCH KING. To-morrow mind full.
  EXETER. Dispatch speed, king
    question delay;
    footed land already.
  FRENCH KING. dispatch'd fair conditions.  
    night small breath pause
    answer matters consequence.      Flourish. Exeunt

ACT III. PROLOGUE.

Flourish. Enter CHORUS

  CHORUS. imagin'd wing swift scene flies,
    motion celerity
    thought. Suppose seen
    well-appointed King Hampton pier
    Embark royalty; brave fleet
    silken streamers young Phorbus fanning.
    Play fancies; behold
    hempen tackle ship-boys climbing;
    Hear shrill whistle doth order give
    sounds confus'd; behold threaden sails,
    Borne th' invisible creeping wind,
    Draw huge bottoms furrowed sea,
    Breasting lofty surge. O, think
    stand rivage behold
    city th' inconstant billows dancing;
    appears fleet majestical,
    Holding due Harfleur. Follow, follow!
    Grapple minds sternage navy  
    leave England dead midnight still,
    Guarded grandsires, babies, women,
    past arriv'd pith puissance;
    chin enrich'd
    appearing hair follow
    cull'd choice-drawn cavaliers France?
    Work, work thoughts, siege;
    Behold ordnance carriages,
    fatal mouths gaping girded Harfleur.
    Suppose th' ambassador French back;
    Tells Harry King doth offer him
    Katherine daughter, dowry
    petty unprofitable dukedoms.
    offer likes not; nimble gunner
    linstock devilish cannon touches,
                                   [Alarum, chambers off]
    them. kind,
    eke performance mind.             Exit

SCENE I.
France. Harfleur

Alarum. Enter KING, EXETER, BEDFORD, GLOUCESTER,
and soldiers scaling-ladders

  KING. breach, dear friends, more;
    close wall English dead.
    peace man
    modest stillness humility;
    blast war blows ears,
    imitate action tiger:
    Stiffen sinews, summon blood,
    Disguise fair nature hard-favour'd rage;
    lend eye terrible aspect;
    pry portage head
    brass cannon: brow o'erwhelm it
    fearfully doth galled rock
    O'erhang jutty confounded base,
    Swill'd wild wasteful ocean.
    set teeth stretch nostril wide;
    Hold hard breath, bend spirit  
    full height. On, on, noblest English,
    blood fet fathers war-proof-
    Fathers Alexanders
    parts morn till fought,
    sheath'd swords lack argument.
    Dishonour mothers; attest
    call'd fathers beget you.
    copy men grosser blood,
    teach war. you, good yeomen,
    limbs made England, show here
    mettle pasture; swear
    worth breeding- doubt not;
    base
    hath noble lustre eyes.
    stand greyhounds slips,
    Straining start. game's afoot:
    Follow spirit; charge
    Cry 'God Harry, England, Saint George!'
                           [Exeunt. Alarum, chambers off]




SCENE II.
Before Harfleur

Enter NYM, BARDOLPH, PISTOL, BOY

  BARDOLPH. On, on, on, on, on! breach, breach!
  NYM. Pray thee, Corporal, stay; knocks hot, for
    mine part case lives. humour too
    hot; plain-song it.
  PISTOL. plain-song just; humours abound:

        Knocks come; God's vassals drop die;
                    sword shield
                    bloody field
                 Doth win immortal fame.

  BOY. alehouse London! wouid give my
    fame pot ale safety.
  PISTOL. I:

               wishes prevail me,
               purpose fail me,
                   thither hie.  

  BOY.             duly, truly,
                   bird doth sing bough.

                         Enter FLUELLEN

  FLUELLEN. breach, dogs!
    Avaunt, cullions!                 [Driving forward]
  PISTOL. merciful, great duke, men mould.
    Abate thy rage, abate thy manly rage;
    Abate thy rage, great duke.
    Good bawcock, bate thy rage. lenity, sweet chuck.
  NYM. good humours. honour wins bad humours.
                                              Exeunt BOY
  BOY. young am, observ'd swashers. am
    boy three; three, would
    serve me, man me; antics do
    amount man. Bardolph, white-liver'd and
    red-fac'd; means whereof 'a faces out, fights not.
    Pistol, hath killing tongue quiet sword;  
    means whereof 'a breaks words weapons. Nym,
    hath heard men words men, and
    scorns prayers 'a thought
    coward; bad words match'd good
    deeds; 'a broke man's head own, that
    post drunk. steal anything,
    call purchase. Bardolph stole lute-case, bore twelve
    leagues, sold halfpence. Nym Bardolph are
    sworn brothers filching, Calais stole a
    fire-shovel; knew piece service men carry
    coals. familiar men's pockets their
    gloves handkerchers; makes my
    manhood, another's pocket put mine;
    plain pocketing wrongs. leave and
    seek service; villainy weak
    stomach, cast up.               Exit

                 Re-enter FLUELLEN, GOWER following

  GOWER. Captain Fluellen, presently mines;  
    Duke Gloucester speak you.
  FLUELLEN. mines! Duke good come
    mines; for, you, mines the
    disciplines war; concavities sufficient.
    For, you, th' athversary- discuss Duke,
    you- digt yard countermines; by
    Cheshu, 'a plow all, better
    directions.
  GOWER. Duke Gloucester, order siege is
    given, altogether directed Irishman- vallant
    gentleman, i' faith.
  FLUELLEN. Captain Macmorris, not?
  GOWER. be.
  FLUELLEN. Cheshu, ass, world: verify
    beard; directions true
    disciplines wars, you, Roman disciplines, than
    puppy-dog.

                 Enter MACMORRIS CAPTAIN JAMY
  
  GOWER. 'a comes; Scots captain, Captain Jamy, with
    him.
  FLUELLEN. Captain Jamy marvellous falorous gentleman, is
    certain, great expedition knowledge th' aunchient
    wars, knowledge directions. Cheshu,
    maintain argument military man the
    world, disciplines pristine wars Romans.
  JAMY. gud day, Captain Fluellen.
  FLUELLEN. God-den worship, good Captain James.
  GOWER. now, Captain Macmorris! quit mines? Have
    pioneers o'er?
  MACMORRIS. Chrish, la, tish ill done! work ish give over,
    trompet sound retreat. hand, swear, my
    father's soul, work ish ill done; ish give over; would
    blowed town, Chrish save me, la, hour. O,
    tish ill done, tish ill done; hand, tish ill done!
  FLUELLEN. Captain Macmorris, beseech now, voutsafe
    me, you, disputations you, partly touching or
    disciplines war, Roman wars, way
    argument, you, friendly communication; partly  
    satisfy opinion, partly satisfaction, you, of
    mind, touching direction military discipline,
    point.
  JAMY. sall vary gud, gud feith, gud captains bath; sall
    quit gud leve, pick occasion; sall I,
    marry.
  MACMORRIS. time discourse, Chrish save me. day
    hot, weather, wars, King, the
    Dukes; time discourse. town beseech'd, the
    trumpet call breach; talk and, Chrish, do
    nothing. 'Tis shame all, God sa' me, 'tis shame to
    stand still; shame, hand; throats be
    cut, works done; ish done, Chrish
    sa' me, la.
  JAMY. mess, ere theise eyes mine to
    slomber, ay'll de gud service, lig i' th' grund it;
    ay, death. pay't valorously may, that
    sall suerly do, breff long. Marry, wad
    full fain heard question 'tween tway.
  FLUELLEN. Captain Macmorris, think, you,  
    correction, nation-
  MACMORRIS. nation? ish nation? Ish villain, a
    bastard, knave, rascal. ish nation? talks
    nation?
  FLUELLEN. you, matter meant,
    Captain Macmorris, peradventure me
    affability discretion me, look
    you; good man yourself, disciplines of
    war derivation birth, other
    particularities.
  MACMORRIS. good man myself; so
    Chrish save me, cut head.
  GOWER. Gentlemen both, mistake other.
  JAMY. Ah! foul fault.              [A parley sounded]
  GOWER. town sounds parley.
  FLUELLEN. Captain Macmorris, opportunity
    required, you, bold know
    disciplines war; end.          Exeunt




SCENE III.
Before gates Harfleur

Enter GOVERNOR citizens walls.  Enter KING
and train gates

  KING HENRY. resolves Governor town?
    latest parle admit;
    mercy give yourselves
    Or, men proud destruction,
    Defy worst; for, soldier,
    thoughts best,
    begin batt'ry again,
    leave half-achieved Harfleur
    Till ashes lie buried.
    gates mercy shut up,
    flesh'd soldier, rough hard heart,
    liberty bloody hand range
    conscience wide hell, mowing grass
    fresh fair virgins flow'ring infants.
    impious war,
    Array'd flames, prince fiends,
    Do, smirch'd complexion, fell feats  
    Enlink'd waste desolation?
    is't cause,
    pure maidens fall hand
    hot forcing violation?
    rein hold licentious wickednes
    hill holds fierce career?
    bootless spend vain command
    th' enraged soldiers spoil,
    send precepts Leviathan
    ashore. Therefore, men Harfleur,
    pity town people
    Whiles soldiers command;
    Whiles cool temperate wind grace
    O'erblows filthy contagious clouds
    heady murder, spoil, villainy.
    not- why, moment see
    blind bloody foul hand
    Defile locks shrill-shrieking daughters;
    fathers silver beards,
    reverend heads dash'd walls;  
    naked infants spitted pikes,
    Whiles mad mothers howls confus'd
    break clouds, wives Jewry
    Herod's bloody-hunting slaughtermen.
    you? yield, avoid?
    Or, guilty defence, destroy'd?
  GOVERNOR. expectation hath day end:
    Dauphin, succours entreated,
    Returns powers ready
    raise great siege. Therefore, great King,
    yield town lives thy soft mercy.
    Enter gates; dispose ours;
    longer defensible.
  KING HENRY. Open gates. [Exit GOVERNOR] Come, uncle Exeter,
    enter Harfleur; remain,
    fortify strongly 'gainst French;
    mercy all. us, dear uncle,
    winter coming on, sickness growing
    soldiers, retire Calais.
    To-night Harfleur guest;  
    To-morrow march addrest.
               [Flourish. KING train enter town]




SCENE IV.
Rouen. FRENCH KING'S palace

Enter KATHERINE ALICE

  KATHERINE. Alice, tu ete en Angleterre, tu parles bien le
    langage.
  ALICE. peu, madame.
  KATHERINE. Je te prie, m'enseignez; il faut j'apprenne a
    parler. Comment appelez-vous la main en Anglais?
  ALICE. La main? Elle est appelee de hand.
  KATHERINE. De hand. les doigts?
  ALICE. Les doigts? Ma foi, j'oublie les doigts; mais je me
    souviendrai. Les doigts? Je pense qu'ils sont appeles de fingres;
    oui, de fingres.
  KATHERINE. La main, de hand; les doigts, de fingres. Je pense que
    je suis le bon ecolier; j'ai gagne deux mots d'Anglais vitement.
    Comment appelez-vous les ongles?
  ALICE. Les ongles? Nous les appelons de nails.
  KATHERINE. De nails. Ecoutez; dites-moi si je parle bien: de hand,
    de fingres, de nails.
  ALICE. C'est bien dit, madame; il est fort bon Anglais.  
  KATHERINE. Dites-moi l'Anglais pour le bras.
  ALICE. De arm, madame.
  KATHERINE. le coude?
  ALICE. D'elbow.
  KATHERINE. D'elbow. Je m'en fais la repetition de tous les mots que
    vous m'avez appris des present.
  ALICE. Il est trop difficile, madame, comme je pense.
  KATHERINE. Excusez-moi, Alice; ecoutez: d'hand, de fingre, de
    nails, d'arma, de bilbow.
  ALICE. D'elbow, madame.
  KATHERINE. O Seigneur Dieu, je m'en oublie! D'elbow.
    Comment appelez-vous le col?
  ALICE. De nick, madame.
  KATHERINE. De nick. le menton?
  ALICE. De chin.
  KATHERINE. De sin. Le col, de nick; le menton, de sin.
  ALICE. Oui. Sauf votre honneur, en verite, vous prononcez les mots
    aussi droit les natifs d'Angleterre.
  KATHERINE. Je ne doute point d'apprendre, par la grace de Dieu, et
    en peu de temps.  
  ALICE. N'avez-vous pas deja oublie ce je vous ai enseigne?
  KATHERINE. Non, je reciterai vous promptement: d'hand, de fingre,
    de mails-
  ALICE. De nails, madame.
  KATHERINE. De nails, de arm, de ilbow.
  ALICE. Sauf votre honneur, d'elbow.
  KATHERINE. Ainsi dis-je; d'elbow, de nick, de sin. Comment
    appelez-vous le pied la robe?
  ALICE. Le foot, madame; le count.
  KATHERINE. Le foot le count. O Seigneur Dieu! ils sont mots de
    son mauvais, corruptible, gros, impudique, pour les
    dames d'honneur d'user: je ne voudrais prononcer ces mots devant
    les seigneurs de France pour tout le monde. Foh! le foot le
    count! Neanmoins, je reciterai une autre fois ma lecon ensemble:
    d'hand, de fingre, de nails, d'arm, d'elbow, de nick, de sin, de
    foot, le count.
  ALICE. Excellent, madame!
  KATHERINE. C'est assez pour une fois: allons-nous diner.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE V.
The FRENCH KING'S palace

Enter KING FRANCE, DAUPHIN, DUKE BRITAINE,
the CONSTABLE FRANCE, others

  FRENCH KING. 'Tis hath pass'd river Somme.
  CONSTABLE. fought withal, lord,
    live France; quit an,
    give vineyards barbarous people.
  DAUPHIN. O Dieu vivant! sprays us,
    emptying fathers' luxury,
    scions, put wild savage stock,
    Spirt suddenly clouds,
    overlook grafters?
  BRITAINE. Normans, bastard Normans, Norman bastards!
    Mort Dieu, ma vie! march along
    Unfought withal, sell dukedom
    buy slobb'ry dirty farm
    nook-shotten isle Albion.
  CONSTABLE. Dieu de batailles! mettle?
    climate foggy, raw, dull;  
    whom, despite, sun pale,
    Killing fruit frowns? sodden water,
    drench sur-rein'd jades, barley-broth,
    Decoct cold blood valiant heat?
    quick blood, spirited wine,
    frosty? O, honour land,
    hang roping icicles
    houses' thatch, whiles frosty people
    Sweat drops gallant youth rich fields-
    Poor call native lords!
  DAUPHIN. faith honour,
    madams mock plainly say
    mettle bred out, give
    bodies lust English youth
    new-store France bastard warriors.
  BRITAINE. bid English dancing-schools
    teach lavoltas high swift corantos,
    grace heels
    lofty runaways.
  FRENCH KING. Montjoy herald? Speed hence;  
    greet England sharp defiance.
    Up, Princes, and, spirit honour edged
    sharper swords, hie field:
    Charles Delabreth, High Constable France;
    Dukes Orleans, Bourbon, Berri,
    Alengon, Brabant, Bar, Burgundy;
    Jaques Chatillon, Rambures, Vaudemont,
    Beaumont, Grandpre, Roussi, Fauconbridge,
    Foix, Lestrake, Bouciqualt, Charolois;
    High dukes, great princes, barons, lords, knights,
    great seats quit great shames.
    Bar Harry England, sweeps land
    pennons painted blood Harfleur.
    Rush host doth melted snow
    valleys, low vassal seat
    Alps doth spit void rheum upon;
    him, power enough,
    captive chariot Rouen
    Bring prisoner.
  CONSTABLE. great.  
    numbers few,
    soldiers sick famish'd march;
    sure, army,
    drop heart sink fear,
    achievement offer ransom.
  FRENCH KING. Therefore, Lord Constable, haste Montjoy,
    England send
    ransom give.
    Prince Dauphin, stay Rouen.
  DAUPHIN. so, beseech Majesty.
  FRENCH KING. patient, remain us.
    forth, Lord Constable Princes all,
    quickly bring word England's fall.          Exeunt




SCENE VI.
The English camp Picardy

Enter CAPTAINS, English Welsh, GOWER FLUELLEN

  GOWER. now, Captain Fluellen! bridge?
  FLUELLEN. assure excellent services committed
    bridge.
  GOWER. Duke Exeter safe?
  FLUELLEN. Duke Exeter magnanimous Agamemnon; a
    man love honour soul, heart, my
    duty, live, living, uttermost power. is
    not- God praised blessed!- hurt world, but
    bridge valiantly, excellent discipline. There
    aunchient Lieutenant bridge- my
    conscience valiant man Mark Antony; is
    man estimation world; as
    gallant service.
  GOWER. call him?
  FLUELLEN. call'd Aunchient Pistol.
  GOWER. not.
  
                            Enter PISTOL

  FLUELLEN. man.
  PISTOL. Captain, thee beseech favours.
    Duke Exeter doth love thee well.
  FLUELLEN. Ay, praise God; merited love his
    hands.
  PISTOL. Bardolph, soldier, firm sound heart,
    buxom valour, hath cruel fate
    giddy Fortune's furious fickle wheel,
    goddess blind,
    stands rolling restless stone-
  FLUELLEN. patience, Aunchient Pistol. Fortune painted
    blind, muffler afore eyes, signify that
    Fortune blind; painted wheel, to
    signify you, moral it, turning,
    inconstant, mutability, variation; foot, look
    you, fixed spherical stone, rolls, rolls, and
    rolls. good truth, poet makes excellent description
    it: Fortune excellent moral.  
  PISTOL. Fortune Bardolph's foe, frowns him;
    hath stol'n pax, hanged 'a be-
    damned death!
    gallows gape dog; man free,
    hemp windpipe suffocate.
    Exeter hath doom death
    pax price.
    Therefore, speak- Duke hear thy voice;
    Bardolph's vital thread cut
    edge penny cord vile reproach.
    Speak, Captain, life, thee requite.
  FLUELLEN. Aunchient Pistol, partly understand meaning.
  PISTOL. then, rejoice therefore.
  FLUELLEN. Certainly, Aunchient, thing rejoice at;
    if, you, brother, desire Duke to
    good pleasure, put execution; discipline
    used.
  PISTOL. Die damn'd! figo thy friendship!
  FLUELLEN. well.
  PISTOL. fig Spain!                                 Exit  
  FLUELLEN. good.
  GOWER. Why, arrant counterfeit rascal; remember him
    now- bawd, cutpurse.
  FLUELLEN. assure you, 'a utt'red prave words pridge
    summer's day. well; he
    spoke me, well, warrant you, time serve.
  GOWER. Why, 'tis gull fool rogue, to
    wars grace himself, return London, the
    form soldier. fellows perfect great
    commanders' names; learn rote services
    done- sconce, breach, a
    convoy; bravely, shot, disgrac'd, what
    terms enemy stood on; con perfectly the
    phrase war, trick new-tuned oaths; what
    beard General's cut horrid suit camp will
    foaming bottles ale-wash'd wits wonderful be
    thought on. learn slanders age,
    marvellously mistook.
  FLUELLEN. what, Captain Gower, perceive not
    man gladly make show world is;  
    find hole coat mind. [Drum within]
    Hark you, King coming; speak the
    pridge.

         Drum colours. Enter KING poor soldiers,
                          GLOUCESTER

    God pless Majesty!
  KING HENRY. now, Fluellen! Cam'st thou bridge?
  FLUELLEN. Ay, Majesty. Duke Exeter very
    gallantly maintain'd pridge; French off, look
    you, gallant prave passages. Marry, th'
    athversary possession pridge; enforced
    retire, Duke Exeter master pridge; can
    Majesty Duke prave man.
  KING HENRY. men lost, Fluellen!
  FLUELLEN. perdition th' athversary hath great,
    reasonable great; marry, part, Duke hath lost
    man, executed robbing a
    church- Bardolph, Majesty man; face  
    bubukles, whelks, knobs, flames o' fire; his
    lips blows nose, coal fire, sometimes
    plue red; nose executed fire's
    out.
  KING HENRY. offenders cut off. we
    give express charge marches country there
    compell'd villages, paid
    for, French upbraided abused disdainful
    language; lenity cruelty play kingdom the
    gentler gamester soonest winner.

                        Tucket. Enter MONTJOY

  MONTJOY. habit.
  KING HENRY. then, thee; thee?
  MONTJOY. master's mind.
  KING HENRY. Unfold it.
  MONTJOY. king. thou Harry England: we
    seem'd dead sleep; advantage soldier than
    rashness. rebuk'd Harfleur,  
    thought good bruise injury till full
    ripe. speak cue, voice imperial:
    England repent folly, weakness, admire our
    sufferance. Bid ransom, must
    proportion losses borne, subjects lost,
    disgrace digested; which, weight re-answer, his
    pettiness bow under. losses exchequer too
    poor; th' effusion blood, muster kingdom
    faint number; disgrace, person kneeling
    feet weak worthless satisfaction. add
    defiance; him, conclusion, hath betrayed his
    followers, condemnation pronounc'd. king and
    master; office.
  KING HENRY. thy name? thy quality.
  MONTJOY. Montjoy.
  KING HENRY. Thou dost thy office fairly. Turn thee back,
    thy king seek now,
    march Calais
    impeachment; for, sooth-
    'tis wisdom confess  
    enemy craft vantage-
    people sickness enfeebled;
    numbers lessen'd; have
    French;
    health, thee, herald,
    thought pair English legs
    march Frenchmen. forgive me, God,
    brag thus; air France
    Hath blown vice me; repent.
    Go, therefore, thy master am;
    ransom frail worthless trunk;
    army weak sickly guard;
    Yet, God before, on,
    France neighbour
    Stand way. thy labour, Montjoy.
    Go, bid thy master advise himself.
    pass, will; hind'red,
    tawny ground red blood
    Discolour; so, Montjoy, fare well.
    sum answer this:  
    seek battle are;
    are, say, shun it.
    master.
  MONTJOY. deliver so. Highness.     Exit
  GLOUCESTER. hope now.
  KING HENRY. God's hand, brother, theirs.
    March bridge, draws night;
    river encamp ourselves,
    to-morrow bid march away.                 Exeunt




SCENE VII.
The French camp Agincourt

Enter CONSTABLE FRANCE, LORD RAMBURES, DUKE ORLEANS,
the DAUPHIN, others

  CONSTABLE. Tut! armour world.
    day!
  ORLEANS. excellent armour; horse his
    due.
  CONSTABLE. horse Europe.
  ORLEANS. morning?
  DAUPHIN. Lord Orleans Lord High Constable, talk of
    horse armour?
  ORLEANS. provided prince the
    world.
  DAUPHIN. long night this! change horse with
    treads pasterns. Ca, ha! bounds the
    earth entrails hairs; le cheval volant, the
    Pegasus, chez les narines de feu! bestride soar, I
    hawk. trots air; earth sings touches it;
    basest horn hoof musical pipe  
    Hermes.
  ORLEANS. colour nutmeg.
  DAUPHIN. heat ginger. beast Perseus:
    pure air fire; dull elements earth water
    him, patient stillness his
    rider mounts him; horse, jades you
    call beasts.
  CONSTABLE. Indeed, lord, absolute excellent
    horse.
  DAUPHIN. prince palfreys; neigh the
    bidding monarch, countenance enforces homage.
  ORLEANS. more, cousin.
  DAUPHIN. Nay, man hath wit cannot, rising of
    lark lodging lamb, vary deserved praise my
    palfrey. theme fluent sea: turn sands into
    eloquent tongues, horse argument all: 'tis a
    subject sovereign reason on, sovereign's
    sovereign ride on; world- familiar and
    unknown- lay functions at
    him. writ sonnet praise began thus: 'Wonder  
    nature'-
  ORLEANS. heard sonnet begin one's mistress.
  DAUPHIN. imitate compos'd courser;
    horse mistress.
  ORLEANS. mistress bears well.
  DAUPHIN. well; prescript praise perfection a
    good mistress.
  CONSTABLE. Nay, methought yesterday mistress shrewdly
    shook back.
  DAUPHIN. yours.
  CONSTABLE. Mine bridled.
  DAUPHIN. O, belike gentle; rode a
    kern Ireland, French hose strait
    strossers.
  CONSTABLE. good judgment horsemanship.
  DAUPHIN. warn'd me, then: ride so, ride not
    warily, fall foul bogs. horse my
    mistress.
  CONSTABLE. lief mistress jade.
  DAUPHIN. thee, Constable, mistress wears hair.  
  CONSTABLE. make true boast that, sow to
    mistress.
  DAUPHIN. 'Le chien est retourne son propre vomissement, la
    truie lavee au bourbier.' Thou mak'st anything.
  CONSTABLE. horse mistress, such
    proverb kin purpose.
  RAMBURES. Lord Constable, armour tent
    to-night- stars suns it?
  CONSTABLE. Stars, lord.
  DAUPHIN. fall to-morrow, hope.
  CONSTABLE. sky want.
  DAUPHIN. be, bear superfluously, 'twere
    honour away.
  CONSTABLE. Ev'n horse bears praises, trot as
    brags dismounted.
  DAUPHIN. load desert! it
    day? trot to-morrow mile, be
    paved English faces.
  CONSTABLE. so, fear fac'd my
    way; morning, fain  
    ears English.
  RAMBURES. hazard twenty prisoners?
  CONSTABLE. hazard ere them.
  DAUPHIN. 'Tis midnight; arm myself.               Exit
  ORLEANS. Dauphin longs morning.
  RAMBURES. longs eat English.
  CONSTABLE. eat kills.
  ORLEANS. white hand lady, gallant prince.
  CONSTABLE. Swear foot, tread oath.
  ORLEANS. simply active gentleman France.
  CONSTABLE. activity, doing.
  ORLEANS. harm heard of.
  CONSTABLE. to-morrow: good name
    still.
  ORLEANS. valiant.
  CONSTABLE. told you.
  ORLEANS. he?
  CONSTABLE. Marry, told himself; car'd not
    knew it.
  ORLEANS. not; hidden virtue him.  
  CONSTABLE. faith, sir, is; but
      lackey.
    'Tis hooded valour, appears bate.
  ORLEANS. Ill-wind well.
  CONSTABLE. cap proverb 'There flattery in
    friendship.'
  ORLEANS. 'Give devil due.'
  CONSTABLE. plac'd! stands friend devil;
    eye proverb 'A pox devil!'
  ORLEANS. proverbs 'A fool's bolt
    shot.'
  CONSTABLE. shot over.
  ORLEANS. 'Tis time overshot.

                          Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. Lord High Constable, English lie fifteen
    hundred paces tents.
  CONSTABLE. hath measur'd ground?
  MESSENGER. Lord Grandpre.  
  CONSTABLE. valiant expert gentleman. day!
    Alas, poor Harry England! longs dawning we
    do.
  ORLEANS. wretched peevish fellow King of
    England, mope fat-brain'd followers his
    knowledge!
  CONSTABLE. English apprehension, run
    away.
  ORLEANS. lack; heads intellectual
    armour, wear heavy head-pieces.
  RAMBURES. island England breeds valiant creatures;
    mastiffs unmatchable courage.
  ORLEANS. Foolish curs, run winking mouth Russian
    bear, heads crush'd rotten apples! as
    valiant flea dare eat breakfast the
    lip lion.
  CONSTABLE. Just, just! men sympathise mastiffs
    robustious rough coming on, leaving wits their
    wives; give great meals beef iron steel;
    eat wolves fight devils.  
  ORLEANS. Ay, English shrewdly beef.
  CONSTABLE. find to-morrow stomachs to
    eat, fight. time arm. Come, we
    it?
  ORLEANS. o'clock; see- ten
    hundred Englishmen.              Exeunt
