ACT IV. PROLOGUE.

Enter CHORUS

  CHORUS. entertain conjecture time
    creeping murmur poring dark
    Fills wide vessel universe.
    camp camp, foul womb night,
    hum army stilly sounds,
    fix'd sentinels receive
    secret whispers other's watch.
    Fire answers fire, paly flames
    battle sees other's umber'd face;
    Steed threatens steed, high boastful neighs
    Piercing night's dull ear; tents
    armourers accomplishing knights,
    busy hammers closing rivets up,
    Give dreadful note preparation.
    country cocks crow, clocks ton,
    hour drowsy morning name.
    Proud numbers secure soul,
    confident over-lusty French  
    low-rated English play dice;
    chide cripple tardy-gaited night
    foul ugly witch doth limp
    tediously away. poor condemned English,
    sacrifices, watchful fires
    Sit patiently inly ruminate
    morning's danger; gesture sad
    Investing lank-lean cheeks war-worn coats
    Presenteth gazing moon
    horrid ghosts. O, now, behold
    royal captain ruin'd band
    Walking watch watch, tent tent,
    cry 'Praise glory head!'
    visits host;
    Bids good morrow modest smile,
    calls brothers, friends, countrymen.
    royal face note
    dread army hath enrounded him;
    doth dedicate jot colour
    weary all-watched night;  
    freshly looks, over-bears attaint
    cheerful semblance sweet majesty;
    wretch, pining pale before,
    Beholding him, plucks comfort looks;
    largess universal, sun,
    liberal eye doth give one,
    Thawing cold fear, gentle all
    Behold, unworthiness define,
    touch Harry night.
    scene battle fly;
    Where- O pity!- disgrace
    vile ragged foils,
    ill-dispos'd brawl ridiculous,
    Agincourt. sit see,
    Minding true things mock'ries be.         Exit




SCENE I.
France. English camp Agincourt

Enter KING, BEDFORD, GLOUCESTER

  KING HENRY. Gloucester, 'tis true great danger;
    greater courage be.
    Good morrow, brother Bedford. God Almighty!
    soul goodness things evil,
    men observingly distil out;
    bad neighbour makes early stirrers,
    healthful good husbandry.
    Besides, outward consciences
    preachers all, admonishing
    dress fairly end.
    gather honey weed,
    make moral devil himself.

                        Enter ERPINGHAM

    Good morrow, Sir Thomas Erpingham:
    good soft pillow good white head  
    churlish turf France.
  ERPINGHAM. so, liege; lodging likes better,
    'Now lie king.'
  KING HENRY. 'Tis good men love present pains
    example; spirit eased;
    mind quick'ned, doubt
    organs, defunct dead before,
    Break drowsy grave newly move
    casted slough fresh legerity.
    Lend thy cloak, Sir Thomas. Brothers both,
    Commend princes camp;
    good morrow them, anon
    Desire pavilion.
  GLOUCESTER. shall, liege.
  ERPINGHAM. attend Grace?
  KING HENRY. No, good knight:
    brothers lords England;
    bosom debate awhile,
    company.
  ERPINGHAM. Lord heaven bless thee, noble Harry!  
                                         Exeunt KING
  KING HENRY. God-a-mercy, heart! thou speak'st cheerfully.

                          Enter PISTOL

  PISTOL. Qui va la?
  KING HENRY. friend.
  PISTOL. Discuss me: art thou officer,
    art thou base, common, popular?
  KING HENRY. gentleman company.
  PISTOL. Trail'st thou puissant pike?
  KING HENRY. so. you?
  PISTOL. good gentleman Emperor.
  KING HENRY. King.
  PISTOL. King's bawcock heart gold,
    lad life, imp fame;
    parents good, fist valiant.
    kiss dirty shoe, heart-string
    love lovely bully. thy name?
  KING HENRY. Harry le Roy.  
  PISTOL. Le Roy! Cornish name; art thou Cornish crew?
  KING HENRY. No, Welshman.
  PISTOL. Know'st thou Fluellen?
  KING HENRY. Yes.
  PISTOL. knock leek pate
    Saint Davy's day.
  KING HENRY. wear dagger cap day, lest
    knock yours.
  PISTOL. Art thou friend?
  KING HENRY. kinsman too.
  PISTOL. figo thee, then!
  KING HENRY. you; God you!
  PISTOL. Pistol call'd.                         Exit
  KING HENRY. sorts fierceness.

                    Enter FLUELLEN GOWER

  GOWER. Captain Fluellen!
  FLUELLEN. So! Jesu Christ, speak fewer. the
    greatest admiration universal world, true  
    aunchient prerogatifes laws wars kept: you
    pains examine wars Pompey Great,
    find, warrant you, tiddle-taddle nor
    pibble-pabble Pompey's camp; warrant you, find the
    ceremonies wars, cares it, forms it,
    sobriety it, modesty it, otherwise.
  GOWER. Why, enemy loud; hear night.
  FLUELLEN. enemy ass, fool, prating
    coxcomb, meet, you, also, you, be
    ass, fool, prating coxcomb? own
    conscience, now?
  GOWER. speak lower.
  FLUELLEN. pray beseech will.
                                       Exeunt GOWER FLUELLEN
  KING HENRY. fashion,
    care valour Welshman.

          Enter soldiers: JOHN BATES, ALEXANDER COURT,
                       MICHAEL WILLIAMS
  
  COURT. Brother John Bates, morning breaks
    yonder?
  BATES. be; great desire the
    approach day.
  WILLIAMS. yonder beginning day, we
    end it. there?
  KING HENRY. friend.
  WILLIAMS. captain serve you?
  KING HENRY. Sir Thomas Erpingham.
  WILLIAMS. good commander kind gentleman. pray
    you, thinks estate?
  KING HENRY. men wreck'd sand, wash'd
    tide.
  BATES. hath told thought King?
  KING HENRY. No; meet should. speak it
    you, King man am: violet smells
    doth me; element shows doth to
    me; senses human conditions; ceremonies laid
    by, nakedness appears man; his
    affections higher mounted ours, yet, stoop,  
    stoop wing. Therefore, sees reason of
    fears, do, fears, doubt, relish
    are; yet, reason, man possess any
    appearance fear, he, showing it, dishearten his
    army.
  BATES. show outward courage will; believe, as
    cold night 'tis, Thames the
    neck; were, him, adventures, so
    quit here.
  KING HENRY. troth, speak conscience King: I
    is.
  BATES. alone; be
    ransomed, poor men's lives saved.
  KING HENRY. dare love ill here
    alone, howsoever speak this, feel men's minds;
    methinks die contented King's
    company, quarrel honourable.
  WILLIAMS. know.
  BATES. Ay, seek after; if
    King's subjects. wrong,  
    obedience King wipes crime us.
  WILLIAMS. good, King hath a
    heavy reckoning make legs arms heads,
    chopp'd battle, join day
    cry 'We died place'- swearing, crying
    surgeon, wives left poor them, some
    debts owe, children rawly left. I
    afeard die die battle; how
    charitably dispose blood their
    argument? Now, men die well, black
    matter King led it; disobey were
    proportion subjection.
  KING HENRY. So, son father about
    merchandise sinfully miscarry sea, imputation of
    wickedness, rule, imposed father
    him; servant, master's command
    transporting sum money, assailed robbers die in
    irreconcil'd iniquities, call business the
    master author servant's damnation. so:
    King bound answer endings  
    soldiers, father son, master servant;
    purpose death purpose their
    services. Besides, king, so
    spotless, arbitrement swords, out
    unspotted soldiers: peradventure the
    guilt premeditated contrived murder; some, beguiling
    virgins broken seals perjury; some, making wars
    bulwark, gored gentle bosom peace
    pillage robbery. Now, men defeated law
    outrun native punishment, outstrip men they
    wings fly God: war beadle, war His
    vengeance; men punish'd before-breach the
    King's laws King's quarrel. feared the
    death borne life away; safe
    perish. die unprovided, King
    guilty damnation guilty those
    impieties visited. subject's
    duty King's; subject's soul own.
    soldier wars sick man
    bed- wash mote conscience; dying so,  
    death advantage; dying, time blessedly
    lost preparation gained; escapes
    sin that, making God free offer, He
    outlive day greatness, teach
    prepare.
  WILLIAMS. 'Tis certain, man dies ill, ill his
    head- King answer it.
  BATES. desire answer me, determine
    fight lustily him.
  KING HENRY. heard King ransom'd.
  WILLIAMS. Ay, so, make fight cheerfully; our
    throats cut ransom'd, ne'er wiser.
  KING HENRY. live it, trust word after.
  WILLIAMS. pay then! perilous shot an
    elder-gun, poor private displeasure a
    monarch! turn sun ice with
    fanning face peacock's feather. trust
    word after! Come, 'tis foolish saying.
  KING HENRY. reproof round; angry
    you, time convenient.  
  WILLIAMS. quarrel live.
  KING HENRY. embrace it.
  WILLIAMS. thee again?
  KING HENRY. Give gage thine, wear my
    bonnet; thou dar'st acknowledge it, make it
    quarrel.
  WILLIAMS. glove; give thine.
  KING HENRY. There.
  WILLIAMS. wear cap; thou me
    say, to-morrow, 'This glove,' hand will
    thee box ear.
  KING HENRY. live it, challenge it.
  WILLIAMS. Thou dar'st hang'd.
  KING HENRY. Well, it, thee King's
    company.
  WILLIAMS. thy word. Fare thee well.
  BATES. friends, English fools, friends; have
    French quarrels enow, reckon.
  KING HENRY. Indeed, French lay twenty French crowns one
    beat us, bear shoulders;  
    English treason cut French crowns, to-morrow the
    King clipper.
                                                 Exeunt soldiers
    King! lives, souls,
    debts, careful wives,
    children, sins, lay King!
    bear all. O hard condition,
    Twin-born greatness, subject breath
    fool, sense feel
    wringing! infinite heart's ease
    kings neglect private men enjoy!
    kings privates too,
    Save ceremony- save general ceremony?
    art thou, thou idol Ceremony?
    kind god art thou, suffer'st more
    mortal griefs thy worshippers?
    thy rents? thy comings-in?
    O Ceremony, show thy worth!
    thy soul adoration?
    Art thou aught place, degree, form,  
    Creating awe fear men?
    thou art happy fear'd
    fearing.
    drink'st thou oft, homage sweet,
    poison'd flattery? O, sick, great greatness,
    bid thy ceremony give thee cure!
    Thinks thou fiery fever out
    titles blown adulation?
    give place flexure low bending?
    Canst thou, thou command'st beggar's knee,
    Command health it? No, thou proud dream,
    play'st subtly king's repose.
    king find thee; know
    'Tis balm, sceptre, ball,
    sword, mace, crown imperial,
    intertissued robe gold pearl,
    farced tide running fore king,
    throne sits on, tide pomp
    beats high shore world-
    No, these, thrice gorgeous ceremony,  
    these, laid bed majestical,
    sleep soundly wretched slave
    Who, body fill'd vacant mind,
    rest, cramm'd distressful bread;
    sees horrid night, child hell;
    But, lackey, rise set
    Sweats eye Pheebus, night
    Sleeps Elysium; day, dawn,
    Doth rise Hyperion horse;
    ever-running year
    profitable labour, grave.
    ceremony, wretch,
    Winding days toil nights sleep,
    fore-hand vantage king.
    slave, member country's peace,
    Enjoys it; gross brain wots
    watch king maintain peace
    hours peasant advantages.

                       Enter ERPINGHAM  

  ERPINGHAM. lord, nobles, jealous absence,
    Seek camp find you.
  KING. Good knight,
    Collect tent:
    thee.
  ERPINGHAM. do't, lord.                         Exit
  KING. O God battles, steel soldiers' hearts,
    Possess fear! now
    sense reck'ning, th' opposed numbers
    Pluck hearts them! to-day, O Lord,
    O, to-day, fault
    father made compassing crown!
    Richard's body interred new,
    bestowed contrite tears
    issued forced drops blood;
    hundred poor yearly pay,
    day wither'd hands hold up
    heaven, pardon blood; built
    chantries, sad solemn priests  
    Sing Richard's soul. do;
    worth,
    penitence all,
    Imploring pardon.

                         Enter GLOUCESTER

  GLOUCESTER. liege!
  KING HENRY. brother Gloucester's voice? Ay;
    thy errand, thee;
    day, friends, things, stay me.     Exeunt




SCENE II.
The French camp

Enter DAUPHIN, ORLEANS, RAMBURES, others

  ORLEANS. sun doth gild armour; up, lords!
  DAUPHIN. Montez cheval! horse! Varlet, laquais! Ha!
  ORLEANS. O brave spirit!
  DAUPHIN. Via! Les eaux la terre-
  ORLEANS. Rien puis? L'air le feu.
  DAUPHIN. Ciel! cousin Orleans.

                        Enter CONSTABLE

    Now, Lord Constable!
  CONSTABLE. Hark steeds present service neigh!
  DAUPHIN. Mount them, make incision hides,
    hot blood spin English eyes,
    dout superfluous courage, ha!
  RAMBURES. What, weep horses' blood?
    behold natural tears?
  
                        Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. English embattl'd, French peers.
  CONSTABLE. horse, gallant Princes! straight horse!
    behold yon poor starved band,
    fair show suck souls,
    Leaving shales husks men.
    work hands;
    Scarce blood sickly veins
    give naked curtle-axe stain
    French gallants to-day draw out,
    sheathe lack sport. blow them,
    vapour valour o'erturn them.
    'Tis positive 'gainst exceptions, lords,
    superfluous lackeys peasants-
    unnecessary action swarm
    squares battle- enow
    purge field of, hilding foe;
    mountain's basis by
    stand idle speculation-  
    honours not. say?
    do,
    done. trumpets sound
    tucket sonance note mount;
    approach dare field
    England couch fear yield.

                        Enter GRANDPRE

  GRANDPRE. stay long, lords France?
    Yond island carrions, desperate bones,
    Ill-favouredly morning field;
    ragged curtains poorly loose,
    air shakes passing scornfully;
    Big Mars bankrupt beggar'd host,
    faintly rusty beaver peeps.
    horsemen sit fixed candlesticks
    torch-staves hand; poor jades
    Lob heads, dropping hides hips,
    gum down-roping pale-dead eyes,  
    pale dull mouths gimmal'd bit
    Lies foul chaw'd grass, motionless;
    executors, knavish crows,
    Fly o'er them, impatient hour.
    Description suit words
    demonstrate life battle
    life lifeless shows itself.
  CONSTABLE. prayers stay death.
  DAUPHIN. send dinners fresh suits,
    give fasting horses provender,
    fight them?
  CONSTABLE. stay guidon. field!
    banner trumpet take,
    haste. Come, come, away!
    sun high, outwear day.              Exeunt




SCENE III.
The English camp

Enter GLOUCESTER, BEDFORD, EXETER, ERPINGHAM, host;
SALISBURY WESTMORELAND

  GLOUCESTER. King?
  BEDFORD. King rode view battle.
  WESTMORELAND. fighting men full three-score thousand.
  EXETER. one; besides, fresh.
  SALISBURY. God's arm strike us! 'tis fearful odds.
    God bye you, Princes all; charge.
    meet till meet heaven,
    joyfully, noble Lord Bedford,
    dear Lord Gloucester, good Lord Exeter,
    kind kinsman- warriors all, adieu!
  BEDFORD. Farewell, good Salisbury; good luck thee!
  EXETER. Farewell, kind lord. Fight valiantly to-day;
    thee wrong mind thee it,
    thou art fram'd firm truth valour.
                                                  Exit SALISBURY
  BEDFORD. full valour kindness;  
    Princely both.

                            Enter KING

  WESTMORELAND. O here
    ten thousand men England
    work to-day!
  KING. wishes so?
    cousin Westmoreland? No, fair cousin;
    mark'd die, enow
    country loss; live,
    fewer men, greater share honour.
    God's will! pray thee, man more.
    Jove, covetous gold,
    care doth feed cost;
    yearns men garments wear;
    outward things dwell desires.
    sin covet honour,
    offending soul alive.
    No, faith, coz, man England.
    God's peace! lose great honour  
    man methinks share me
    hope have. O, more!
    proclaim it, Westmoreland, host,
    hath stomach fight,
    depart; passport made,
    crowns convoy put purse;
    die man's company
    fears fellowship die us.
    day call'd feast Crispian.
    outlives day, safe home,
    stand tip-toe day nam'd,
    rouse Crispian.
    live day, age,
    yearly vigil feast neighbours,
    'To-morrow Saint Crispian.'
    strip sleeve show scars,
    'These wounds Crispian's day.'
    men forget; forgot,
    remember, advantages,
    feats day. names,  
    Familiar mouth household words-
    Harry King, Bedford Exeter,
    Warwick Talbot, Salisbury Gloucester-
    flowing cups freshly rememb'red.
    story good man teach son;
    Crispin Crispian ne'er by,
    day ending world,
    remembered-
    few, happy few, band brothers;
    to-day sheds blood me
    brother; ne'er vile,
    day gentle condition;
    gentlemen England now-a-bed
    accurs'd here,
    hold manhoods cheap whiles speaks
    fought Saint Crispin's day.

                      Re-enter SALISBURY

  SALISBURY. sovereign lord, bestow speed:  
    French bravely battles set,
    expedience charge us.
  KING HENRY. things ready, minds so.
  WESTMORELAND. Perish man mind backward now!
  KING HENRY. Thou dost England, coz?
  WESTMORELAND. God's will, liege! alone,
    help, fight royal battle!
  KING HENRY. Why, thou hast unwish'd thousand men;
    likes one.
    places. God all!

                     Tucket. Enter MONTJOY

  MONTJOY. thee, King Harry,
    thy ransom thou wilt compound,
    thy assured overthrow;
    thou art gulf
    Thou englutted. Besides, mercy,
    constable desires thee thou wilt mind
    Thy followers repentance, souls  
    make peaceful sweet retire
    fields, where, wretches, poor bodies
    lie fester.
  KING HENRY. hath thee now?
  MONTJOY. Constable France.
  KING HENRY. pray thee bear answer back:
    Bid achieve me, sell bones.
    Good God! mock poor fellows thus?
    man sell lion's skin
    beast liv'd kill'd hunting him.
    bodies doubt
    Find native graves; which, trust,
    witness live brass day's work.
    leave valiant bones France,
    Dying men, buried dunghills,
    fam'd; sun greet them
    draw honours reeking heaven,
    Leaving earthly parts choke clime,
    smell whereof breed plague France.
    Mark abounding valour English,  
    That, dead, bullet's grazing
    Break mischief,
    Killing relapse mortality.
    speak proudly: Constable
    warriors working-day;
    gayness gilt besmirch'd
    rainy marching painful field;
    piece feather host-
    Good argument, hope, fly-
    time hath worn slovenry.
    But, mass, hearts trim;
    poor soldiers ere night
    fresher robes, pluck
    gay coats o'er French soldiers' heads
    turn service. this-
    As, God please, shall- ransom then
    levied. Herald, save thou thy labour;
    thou ransom, gentle herald;
    none, swear, joints;
    have, leave 'em them,  
    yield little, Constable.
  MONTJOY. shall, King Harry. fare thee well:
    Thou shalt hear herald more.                  Exit
  KING HENRY. fear thou wilt ransom.

                    Enter DUKE YORK

  YORK. lord, humbly knee beg
    leading vaward.
  KING HENRY. it, brave York. Now, soldiers, march away;
    thou pleasest, God, dispose day!          Exeunt




SCENE IV.
The field battle

Alarum.  Excursions.  Enter FRENCH SOLDIER, PISTOL, BOY

  PISTOL. Yield, cur!
  FRENCH SOLDIER. Je pense vous etes le gentilhomme de bonne
    qualite.
  PISTOL. Cality! Calen o custure me! Art thou gentleman?
    thy name? Discuss.
  FRENCH SOLDIER. O Seigneur Dieu!
  PISTOL. O, Signieur Dew gentleman.
    Perpend words, O Signieur Dew, mark:
    O Signieur Dew, thou diest point fox,
    Except, O Signieur, thou give me
    Egregious ransom.
  FRENCH SOLDIER. O, prenez misericorde; ayez pitie de moi!
  PISTOL. Moy serve; forty moys;
    fetch thy rim thy throat
    drops crimson blood.
  FRENCH SOLDIER. Est-il impossible d'echapper la force de ton bras?  
  PISTOL. Brass, cur?
    Thou damned luxurious mountain-goat,
    Offer'st brass?
  FRENCH SOLDIER. O, pardonnez-moi!
  PISTOL. Say'st thou so? ton moys?
    hither, boy; slave French
    name.
  BOY. Ecoutez: comment etes-vous appele?
  FRENCH SOLDIER. Monsieur le Fer.
  BOY. Master Fer.
  PISTOL. Master Fer! fer him, firk him, ferret him-
   discuss French him.
  BOY. French fer, ferret, firk.
  PISTOL. Bid prepare; cut throat.
  FRENCH SOLDIER. dit-il, monsieur?
  BOY. Il commande vous dire vous faites vous pret; car ce
    soldat ici est dispose tout cette heure de couper votre gorge.
  PISTOL. Owy, cuppele gorge, permafoy!
    Peasant, thou give crowns, brave crowns;
    mangled shalt thou sword.  
  FRENCH SOLDIER. O, je vous supplie, pour l'amour de Dieu, me
    pardonner! Je suis gentilhomme de bonne maison. Gardez ma vie, et
    je vous donnerai deux cents ecus.
  PISTOL. words?
  BOY. prays save life; gentleman good
    house, ransom give hundred crowns.
  PISTOL. fury abate, I
    crowns take.
  FRENCH SOLDIER. Petit monsieur, dit-il?
  BOY. Encore qu'il est contre son jurement de pardonner aucun
    prisonnier, neamnoins, pour les ecus vous l'avez promis, il
    est content vous donner la liberte, le franchisement.
  FRENCH SOLDIER. Sur mes genoux je vous donne mille remercimens; et
    je m'estime heureux je suis tombe entre les mains d'un
    chevalier, je pense, le brave, vaillant, tres distingue
    seigneur d'Angleterre.
  PISTOL. Expound me, boy.
  BOY. you, knees, thousand thanks; he
    esteems happy hath fall'n hands one-
    thinks- brave, valorous, thrice-worthy  
    signieur England.
  PISTOL. suck blood, mercy show.
    Follow me.                                              Exit
  BOY. Suivez-vous le grand capitaine.       Exit FRENCH SOLDIER
    full voice issue empty heart; but
    true- empty vessel makes greatest sound.
    Bardolph Nym ten times valour roaring
    devil i' th' play, pare nails a
    wooden dagger; hang'd; be, if
    durst steal adventurously. stay the
    lackeys, luggage camp. French a
    good prey us, knew it; guard it
    boys.                                               Exit




SCENE V.
Another part field battle

Enter CONSTABLE, ORLEANS, BOURBON, DAUPHIN, RAMBURES

  CONSTABLE. O diable!
  ORLEANS. O Seigneur! le jour est perdu, tout est perdu!
  DAUPHIN. Mort Dieu, ma vie! confounded, all!
    Reproach everlasting shame
    Sits mocking plumes.                 [A short alarum]
    O mechante fortune! run away.
  CONSTABLE. Why, ranks broke.
  DAUPHIN. O perdurable shame! stab ourselves.
    wretches play'd dice for?
  ORLEANS. king ransom?
  BOURBON. Shame, eternal shame, shame!
    die honour: back again;
    follow Bourbon now,
    and, cap hand
    base pander, hold chamber-door
    Whilst slave, gender dog,  
    fairest daughter contaminated.
  CONSTABLE. Disorder, hath spoil'd us, friend now!
    heaps offer lives.
  ORLEANS. enow living field
    smother English throngs,
    order thought upon.
  BOURBON. devil order now! throng.
    life short, shame long.       Exeunt




SCENE VI.
Another part field

Alarum. Enter KING train, prisoners; EXETER, others

  KING HENRY. done, thrice-valiant countrymen;
    all's done- French field.
  EXETER. Duke York commends Majesty.
  KING HENRY. Lives he, good uncle? Thrice hour
    down; thrice again, fighting;
    helmet spur blood was.
  EXETER. array, brave soldier, doth lie
    Larding plain; bloody side,
    Yoke-fellow honour-owing wounds,
    noble Earl Suffolk lies.
    Suffolk died; York, haggled over,
    him, gore lay insteeped,
    takes beard, kisses gashes
    bloodily yawn face,
    cries aloud 'Tarry, cousin Suffolk.
    soul thine company heaven;  
    Tarry, sweet soul, mine, fly abreast;
    glorious well-foughten field
    chivalry.'
    words cheer'd up;
    smil'd face, raught hand,
    And, feeble grip, 'Dear lord,
    Commend service sovereign.'
    turn, Suffolk's neck
    threw wounded arm kiss'd lips;
    so, espous'd death, blood seal'd
    testament noble-ending love.
    pretty sweet manner forc'd
    waters stopp'd;
    man me,
    mother mine eyes
    gave tears.
  KING HENRY. blame not;
    For, hearing this, perforce compound
    mistful eyes, issue too.          [Alarum]
    hark! alarum same?  
    French reinforc'd scatter'd men.
    soldier kill prisoners;
    Give word through.                                Exeunt




SCENE VII.
Another part field

Enter FLUELLEN GOWER

  FLUELLEN. Kill poys luggage! 'Tis expressly the
    law arms; 'tis arrant piece knavery, mark now, as
    offert; conscience, now, not?
  GOWER. 'Tis boy left alive; cowardly
    rascals ran battle ha' slaughter;
    besides, burned carried the
    King's tent; wherefore King worthily hath caus'd every
    soldier cut prisoner's throat. O, 'tis gallant King!
  FLUELLEN. Ay, porn Monmouth, Captain Gower. call you
    town's Alexander Pig born?
  GOWER. Alexander Great.
  FLUELLEN. Why, pray you, 'pig' great? pig, great,
    mighty, huge, magnanimous, one
    reckonings, save phrase variations.
  GOWER. Alexander Great born Macedon; father
    called Philip Macedon, it.
  FLUELLEN. Macedon Alexander porn.  
    you, Captain, maps 'orld, warrant you
    sall find, comparisons Macedon Monmouth, that
    situations, you, alike. river in
    Macedon; river Monmouth; is
    call'd Wye Monmouth, prains the
    river; 'tis one, 'tis alike my
    fingers fingers, salmons both. you
    mark Alexander's life well, Harry Monmouth's life come
    indifferent well; figures things.
    Alexander- God knows, know- rages, furies,
    wraths, cholers, moods, his
    displeasures, indignations, little
    intoxicates prains, did, ales angers, look
    you, kill friend, Cleitus.
  GOWER. king that: kill'd his
    friends.
  FLUELLEN. done, mark now, tales out
    mouth ere made finished. speak the
    figures comparisons it; Alexander kill'd friend
    Cleitus, ales cups, Harry Monmouth,  
    wits good judgments, turn'd the
    fat knight great belly doublet; full jests,
    gipes, knaveries, mocks; forgot name.
  GOWER. Sir John Falstaff.
  FLUELLEN. he. good men porn at
    Monmouth.
  GOWER. Majesty.

            Alarum. Enter KING, WARWICK, GLOUCESTER,
            EXETER, others, prisoners. Flourish

  KING HENRY. angry France
    instant. trumpet, herald,
    Ride thou horsemen yond hill;
    fight us, bid down
    void field; offend sight.
    neither, them
    make skirr swift stones
    Enforced Assyrian slings;
    Besides, cut throats have,  
    man take
    taste mercy. so.

                      Enter MONTJOY

  EXETER. herald French, liege.
  GLOUCESTER. eyes humbler us'd be.
  KING HENRY. now! means this, herald? know'st thou not
    fin'd bones mine ransom?
    Com'st thou ransom?
  MONTJOY. No, great King;
    thee charitable licence,
    wander o'er bloody field
    book dead, bury them;
    sort nobles common men;
    princes- woe while!-
    Lie drown'd soak'd mercenary blood;
    vulgar drench peasant limbs
    blood princes; wounded steeds
    Fret fetlock deep gore, wild rage  
    Yerk armed heels dead masters,
    Killing twice. O, give leave, great King,
    view field safety, dispose
    dead bodies!
  KING HENRY. thee truly, herald,
    day no;
    horsemen peer
    gallop o'er field.
  MONTJOY. day yours.
  KING HENRY. Praised God, strength, it!
    castle call'd stands hard by?
  MONTJOY. call Agincourt.
  KING HENRY. call field Agincourt,
    Fought day Crispin Crispianus.
  FLUELLEN. grandfather famous memory, an't your
    Majesty, great-uncle Edward Plack Prince Wales,
    read chronicles, fought prave pattle here
    France.
  KING HENRY. did, Fluellen.
  FLUELLEN. Majesty true; Majesties  
    rememb'red it, Welshmen good service garden where
    leeks grow, wearing leeks Monmouth caps; your
    Majesty hour honourable badge service;
    Majesty takes scorn wear leek
    Saint Tavy's day.
  KING HENRY. wear memorable honour;
    Welsh, know, good countryman.
  FLUELLEN. water Wye wash Majesty's Welsh
    plood pody, that. pless and
    preserve long pleases Grace Majesty too!
  KING HENRY. Thanks, good countryman.
  FLUELLEN. Jeshu, Majesty's countryman, care who
    it; confess 'orld: be
    asham'd Majesty, praised Got, long Majesty
    honest man.

                       Enter WILLIAMS

  KING HENRY. God so! heralds him:
    Bring notice numbers dead  
    parts. Call yonder fellow hither.
                                     Exeunt heralds MONTJOY
  EXETER. Soldier, King.
  KING HENRY. Soldier, wear'st thou glove thy cap?
  WILLIAMS. An't Majesty, 'tis gage I
    fight withal, alive.
  KING HENRY. Englishman?
  WILLIAMS. An't Majesty, rascal swagger'd me
    night; who, 'a live dare challenge this
    glove, sworn box o' th' ear; see
    glove cap- swore, soldier, he
    wear alive- strike soundly.
  KING HENRY. you, Captain Fluellen, fit this
    soldier oath?
  FLUELLEN. craven villain else, an't your
    Majesty, conscience.
  KING HENRY. enemy gentlemen great sort, quite
    answer degree.
  FLUELLEN. good gentleman Devil is, as
    Lucifier Belzebub himself, necessary, Grace,  
    vow oath; perjur'd, you
    now, reputation arrant villain Jacksauce as
    black shoe trod God's ground earth, my
    conscience, la.
  KING HENRY. thy vow, sirrah, thou meet'st the
    fellow.
  WILLIAMS. Will, liege, live.
  KING HENRY. serv'st thou under?
  WILLIAMS. Captain Gower, liege.
  FLUELLEN. Gower good captain, good knowledge and
    literatured wars.
  KING HENRY. Call me, soldier.
  WILLIAMS. will, liege.                               Exit
  KING HENRY. Here, Fluellen; wear thou favour me, stick
    thy cap; Alencon together, I
    pluck'd glove helm. man challenge this, he
    friend Alencon enemy person; thou
    encounter such, apprehend him, thou dost love.
  FLUELLEN. Grace great honours desir'd in
    hearts subjects. fain man  
    legs find aggrief'd glove, is
    all; fain once, God grace
    see.
  KING HENRY. Know'st thou Gower?
  FLUELLEN. dear friend, you.
  KING HENRY. Pray thee, seek him, bring tent.
  FLUELLEN. fetch him.                               Exit
  KING HENRY. Lord Warwick brother Gloucester,
    Follow Fluellen closely heels;
    glove favour
    haply purchase box o' th' ear.
    soldier's: I, bargain, should
    Wear myself. Follow, good cousin Warwick;
    soldier strike him, judge
    blunt bearing word,
    sudden mischief arise it;
    Fluellen valiant,
    touch'd choler, hot gunpowder,
    quickly return injury;
    Follow, harm them.  
    me, uncle Exeter.                      Exeunt




SCENE VIII.
Before KING HENRY'S PAVILION

Enter GOWER WILLIAMS

  WILLIAMS. warrant knight you, Captain.

                         Enter FLUELLEN

  FLUELLEN. God's pleasure, Captain, beseech now,
    apace King: good you
    peradventure knowledge dream of.
  WILLIAMS. Sir, glove?
  FLUELLEN. glove? glove glove.
  WILLIAMS. this; challenge it.  [Strikes him]
  FLUELLEN. 'Sblood, arrant traitor any's universal
    world, France, England!
  GOWER. now, sir! villain!
  WILLIAMS. forsworn?
  FLUELLEN. Stand away, Captain Gower; give treason his
    payment plows, warrant you.
  WILLIAMS. traitor.  
  FLUELLEN. lie thy throat. charge Majesty's
    name, apprehend him: friend Duke Alencon's.

                  Enter WARWICK GLOUCESTER

  WARWICK. now! now! matter?
  FLUELLEN. Lord Warwick, is- praised God it!- a
    contagious treason light, you, shall
    desire summer's day. Majesty.

                  Enter KING EXETER

  KING HENRY. now! matter?
  FLUELLEN. liege, villain traitor, that, look
    Grace, struck glove Majesty out
    helmet Alencon.
  WILLIAMS. liege, glove: fellow it;
    gave change promis'd wear his
    cap; promis'd strike did; met man my
    glove cap, good word.  
  FLUELLEN. Majesty hear now, saving Majesty's manhood,
    arrant, rascally, beggarly, lousy knave is; hope
    Majesty pear testimony witness, will
    avouchment, glove Alencon Majesty
    give me; conscience, now.
  KING HENRY. Give thy glove, soldier; look, fellow of
      it.
    'Twas I, indeed, thou promised'st strike,
    thou hast bitter terms.
  FLUELLEN. Majesty, neck answer it, if
    martial law world.
  KING HENRY. canst thou make satisfaction?
  WILLIAMS. offences, lord, heart; came
    mine offend Majesty.
  KING HENRY. ourself thou didst abuse.
  WILLIAMS. Majesty yourself: appear'd me
    common man; witness night, garments, your
    lowliness; Highness suffer'd shape I
    beseech fault, mine; you
    for, made offence; therefore, beseech  
    Highness pardon me.
  KING HENRY. Here, uncle Exeter, fill glove crowns,
    give fellow. it, fellow;
    wear honour thy cap
    Till challenge it. Give crowns;
    And, Captain, friends him.
  FLUELLEN. day light, fellow mettle enough
    belly: hold, twelve pence you; pray you
    serve God, prawls, prabbles, and
    quarrels, dissensions, and, warrant you, better
    you.
  WILLIAMS. money.
  FLUELLEN. good will; serve you
    mend shoes. Come, wherefore pashful?
    shoes good. 'Tis good silling, warrant you, or
    change it.

                      Enter ENGLISH HERALD

  KING HENRY. Now, herald, dead numb'red?  
  HERALD. number slaught'red French.
                                                 [Gives paper]
  KING HENRY. prisoners good sort taken, uncle?
  EXETER. Charles Duke Orleans, nephew King;
    John Duke Bourbon, Lord Bouciqualt;
    lords barons, knights squires,
    Full fifteen hundred, common men.
  KING HENRY. note doth ten thousand French
    field lie slain; princes number,
    nobles bearing banners, lie dead
    hundred twenty-six; added these,
    knights, esquires, gallant gentlemen,
    thousand hundred; which
    hundred yesterday dubb'd knights.
    that, ten thousand lost,
    sixteen hundred mercenaries;
    rest princes, barons, lords, knights, squires,
    gentlemen blood quality.
    names nobles lie dead:
    Charles Delabreth, High Constable France;  
    Jaques Chatillon, Admiral France;
    master cross-bows, Lord Rambures;
    Great Master France, brave Sir Guichard Dolphin;
    John Duke Alencon; Antony Duke Brabant,
    brother Duke Burgundy;
    Edward Duke Bar. lusty earls,
    Grandpre Roussi, Fauconbridge Foix,
    Beaumont Marle, Vaudemont Lestrake.
    royal fellowship death!
    number English dead?
                                 [HERALD presents paper]
    Edward Duke York, Earl Suffolk,
    Sir Richard Kikely, Davy Gam, Esquire;
    name; men
    twenty. O God, thy arm here!
    us, thy arm alone,
    Ascribe all. When, stratagem,
    plain shock play battle,
    great los
    part th' other? it, God,  
    thine.
  EXETER. 'Tis wonderful!
  KING HENRY. Come, procession village;
    death proclaimed host
    boast praise God
    only.
  FLUELLEN. lawful, Majesty, how
    kill'd?
  KING HENRY. Yes, Captain; acknowledgment,
    God fought us.
  FLUELLEN. Yes, conscience, great good.
  KING HENRY. holy rites:
    sung 'Non nobis' 'Te Deum';
    dead charity enclos'd clay-
    Calais; England then;
    ne'er France arriv'd happy men.       Exeunt

ACT V. PROLOGUE.

Enter CHORUS

  CHORUS. Vouchsafe read story
    prompt them; have,
    humbly pray admit th' excuse
    time, numbers, due things,
    huge proper life
    presented. bear King
    Calais. Grant there. seen,
    Heave winged thoughts
    Athwart sea. Behold, English beach
    Pales flood men, wives, boys,
    shouts claps out-voice deep-mouth'd sea,
    Which, mighty whiffler, fore King
    prepare way. land,
    solemnly set London.
    swift pace hath thought now
    imagine Blackheath;
    lords desire borne
    bruised helmet bended sword  
    city. forbids it,
    free vainness self-glorious pride;
    Giving full trophy, signal, ostent,
    God. behold
    quick forge working-house thought,
    London doth pour citizens!
    mayor brethren sort-
    senators th' antique Rome,
    plebeians swarming heels-
    fetch conqu'ring Caesar in;
    As, lower loving likelihood,
    General gracious Empress-
    good time may- Ireland coming,
    Bringing rebellion broached sword,
    peaceful city quit
    him! more, cause,
    Harry. London place him-
    lamentation French
    Invites King England's stay home;
    Emperor's coming behalf France  
    order peace them; omit
    occurrences, chanc'd,
    Till Harry's back-return France.
    bring him; play'd
    interim, rememb'ring 'tis past.
    brook abridgment; eyes advance,
    thoughts, straight back France.     Exit




SCENE I.
France.  English camp

Enter FLUELLEN GOWER

  GOWER. Nay, right; wear leek to-day? Saint
    Davy's day past.
  FLUELLEN. occasions wherefore all
    things. you, ass friend, Captain Gower: the
    rascally, scald, beggarly, lousy, pragging knave, Pistol- which
    world petter a
    fellow, now, merits- me, prings
    pread salt yesterday, you, bid eat leek; it
    place breed contendon him; but
    bold wear cap till once
    again, piece desires.

                          Enter PISTOL

  GOWER. Why, comes, swelling turkey-cock.
  FLUELLEN. 'Tis matter swellings turkey-cocks.
    God pless you, Aunchient Pistol! scurvy, lousy knave, God  
    pless you!
  PISTOL. Ha! art thou bedlam? Dost thou thirst, base Troyan,
    fold Parca's fatal web?
    Hence! qualmish smell leek.
  FLUELLEN. peseech heartily, scurvy, lousy knave, my
    desires, requests, petitions, eat, you,
    leek; because, you, love it, your
    affections, appetites, digestions, not
    agree it, desire eat it.
  PISTOL. Cadwallader goats.
  FLUELLEN. goat you.  [Strikes him]  so
    good, scald knave, eat it?
  PISTOL. Base Troyan, thou shalt die.
  FLUELLEN. true, scald knave- God's is. I
    desire live meantime, eat victuals;
    come, sauce it.  [Striking again]  call'd me
    yesterday mountain-squire; make to-day squire of
    low degree. pray fall to; mock leek, can
    eat leek.
  GOWER. Enough, Captain, astonish'd him.  
  FLUELLEN. make eat part leek, will
    peat pate days. Bite, pray you, good your
    green wound ploody coxcomb.
  PISTOL. bite?
  FLUELLEN. Yes, certainly, doubt, question
    too, ambiguides.
  PISTOL. leek, horribly revenge- eat eat,
    swear-
  FLUELLEN. Eat, pray you; sauce your
    leek? leek swear by.
  PISTOL. Quiet thy cudgel: thou dost eat.
  FLUELLEN. good you, scald knave, heartily. Nay, pray you
    throw away; skin good broken coxcomb. When
    occasions leeks hereafter, pray mock at
    'em; all.
  PISTOL. Good.
  FLUELLEN. Ay, leeks good. Hold you, groat heal
    pate.
  PISTOL. groat!
  FLUELLEN. Yes, verily truth, it;  
    leek pocket eat.
  PISTOL. thy groat earnest revenge.
  FLUELLEN. owe pay cudgels; you
    woodmonger, buy cudgels. God bye
    you, you, heal pate.
 Exit
  PISTOL. hell stir this.
  GOWER. Go, go: couterfeit cowardly knave. mock
    ancient tradition, begun honourable respect, and
    worn memorable trophy predeceased valour, dare not
    avouch deeds words? gleeking
    galling gentleman thrice. thought,
    speak English native garb, could
    handle English cudgel; find otherwise,
    henceforth Welsh correction teach good English
    condition. Fare ye well.                                Exit
  PISTOL. Doth Fortune play huswife now?
    News Nell dead i' th' spital
    malady France;
    rendezvous cut off.  
    wax; weary limbs
    Honour cudgell'd. Well, bawd turn,
    lean cutpurse quick hand.
    England steal, steal;
    patches cudgell'd scars,
    swear Gallia wars.                Exit




SCENE II.
France. FRENCH KING'S palace

Enter door, KING HENRY, EXETER, BEDFORD, GLOUCESTER, WARWICK,
WESTMORELAND, LORDS; another, FRENCH KING, QUEEN ISABEL,
the PRINCESS KATHERINE, ALICE, LADIES; DUKE BURGUNDY,
and train

  KING HENRY. Peace meeting, wherefore met!
    brother France, sister,
    Health fair time day; joy good wishes
    fair princely cousin Katherine.
    And, branch member royalty,
    great assembly contriv'd,
    salute you, Duke Burgundy.
    And, princes French, peers, health all!
  FRENCH KING. joyous behold face,
    worthy brother England; fairly met!
    you, princes English, one.
  QUEEN ISABEL. happy issue, brother England,
    good day gracious meeting  
    glad behold eyes-
    eyes, hitherto home them,
    French met bent,
    fatal balls murdering basilisks;
    venom looks, fairly hope,
    lost quality; day
    change griefs quarrels love.
  KING HENRY. cry amen that, appear.
  QUEEN ISABEL. English princes an, salute you.
  BURGUNDY. duty both, equal love,
    Great Kings France England! labour'd
    wits, pains, strong endeavours,
    bring imperial Majesties
    bar royal interview,
    mightiness parts witness.
    office hath prevail'd
    face face royal eye eye
    congreeted, disgrace me
    demand, royal view,
    rub impediment  
    naked, poor, mangled Peace,
    Dear nurse arts, plenties, joyful births,
    garden world,
    fertile France, put lovely visage?
    Alas, hath France long chas'd!
    husbandry doth lie heaps,
    Corrupting fertility.
    vine, merry cheerer heart,
    Unpruned dies; hedges even-pleach'd,
    prisoners wildly overgrown hair,
    Put disorder'd twigs; fallow leas
    darnel, hemlock, rank fumitory,
    Doth root upon, coulter rusts
    deracinate savagery;
    mead, erst brought sweetly forth
    freckled cowslip, burnet, green clover,
    Wanting scythe, uncorrected, rank,
    Conceives idleness, teems
    hateful docks, rough thistles, kecksies, burs,
    Losing beauty utility.  
    vineyards, fallows, meads, hedges,
    Defective natures, grow wildness;
    houses children
    lost, learn time,
    sciences country;
    grow, savages- soldiers will,
    meditate blood-
    swearing stern looks, diffus'd attire,
    unnatural.
    reduce favout
    assembled; speech entreats
    gentle Peace
    expel inconveniences
    bless qualities.
  KING HENRY. If, Duke Burgundy, peace
    growth th' imperfections
    cited, buy peace
    full accord demands;
    tenours effects
    have, enschedul'd briefly, hands.  
  BURGUNDY. King hath heard them; yet
    answer made.
  KING HENRY. then, peace,
    urg'd, lies answer.
  FRENCH KING. cursorary eye
    O'erglanced articles; pleaseth Grace
    appoint council presently
    sit more, heed
    re-survey them, suddenly
    Pass accept peremptory answer.
  KING HENRY. Brother, shall. Go, uncle Exeter,
    brother Clarence, you, brother Gloucester,
    Warwick, Huntington, King;
    free power ratify,
    Augment, alter, wisdoms best
    advantageable dignity,
    thing demands;
    consign thereto. you, fair sister,
    princes stay us?
  QUEEN ISABEL. gracious brother, them;  
    Haply woman's voice good,
    articles nicely urg'd stood on.
  KING HENRY. leave cousin Katherine us;
    capital demand, compris'd
    fore-rank articles.
  QUEEN ISABEL. hath good leave.
                   Exeunt KING, KATHERINE, ALICE
  KING HENRY. Fair Katherine, fair,
    vouchsafe teach soldier terms
    enter lady's ear,
    plead love-suit gentle heart?
  KATHERINE. Majesty mock me; speak England.
  KING HENRY. O fair Katherine, love soundly your
    French heart, glad hear confess brokenly with
    English tongue. me, Kate?
  KATHERINE. Pardonnez-moi, vat me.
  KING HENRY. angel you, Kate, angel.
  KATHERINE. dit-il? je suis semblable les anges?
  ALICE. Oui, vraiment, sauf votre grace, ainsi dit-il.
  KING HENRY. so, dear Katherine, blush  
    affirm it.
  KATHERINE. O bon Dieu! les langues des hommes sont pleines de
    tromperies.
  KING HENRY. she, fair one? tongues men are
    full deceits?
  ALICE. Oui, dat de tongues de mans full deceits- dat is
    de Princess.
  KING HENRY. Princess English-woman. I' faith,
    Kate, wooing fit thy understanding: glad thou
    canst speak English; thou couldst, thou wouldst
    find plain king thou wouldst sold my
    farm buy crown. ways mince love, but
    directly 'I love you.' Then, urge farther than
    'Do faith?' wear suit. Give your
    answer; i' faith, do; clap hands bargain. say
    you, lady?
  KATHERINE. Sauf votre honneur, understand well.
  KING HENRY. Marry, put verses dance for
    sake, Kate, undid me; neither
    words measure, strength  
    measure, reasonable measure strength. win a
    lady leap-frog, vaulting saddle armour
    back, correction bragging spoken, I
    quickly leap wife. buffet love,
    bound horse favours, lay butcher,
    sit jack-an-apes, off. But, God, Kate, I
    greenly, gasp cloquence, no
    cunning protestation; downright oaths, use
    till urg'd, break urging. thou canst love a
    fellow temper, Kate, face worth sunburning,
    glass love sees there,
    thine eye thy cook. speak thee plain soldier. thou
    canst love this, me; not, thee I
    die true- thy love, Lord, no; love
    thee too. thou liv'st, dear Kate, fellow of
    plain uncoined constancy; perforce thee right,
    hath gift woo places; these
    fellows infinite tongue, rhyme into
    ladies' favours, reason again.
    What! speaker prater: rhyme ballad. good  
    leg fall; straight back stoop; black beard will
    turn white; curl'd pate grow bald; fair face will
    wither; full eye wax hollow. good heart, Kate, is
    sun moon; or, rather, sun, moon- for
    shines bright changes, truly.
    thou one, me; me, a
    soldier; soldier, king. say'st thou, then,
    love? Speak, fair, fairly, pray thee.
  KATHERINE. dat sould love de enemy France?
  KING HENRY. No, love enemy of
    France, Kate, loving love friend of
    France; love France part a
    village it; mine. And, Kate, France is
    mine yours, France mine.
  KATHERINE. vat dat.
  KING HENRY. No, Kate? thee French, sure
    hang tongue new-married wife her
    husband's neck, shook off. Je quand sur le
    possession de France, quand vous avez le possession de moi-
    see, then? Saint Denis speed!- donc votre est  
    France vous etes mienne. easy me, Kate, to
    conquer kingdom speak French: shall
    move thee French, laugh me.
  KATHERINE. Sauf votre honneur, le Francais vous parlez, il est
    meilleur l'Anglais lequel je parle.
  KING HENRY. No, faith, is't not, Kate; thy speaking my
    tongue, thine, falsely, granted to
    one. But, Kate, dost thou understand much
    English- Canst thou love me?
  KATHERINE. tell.
  KING HENRY. neighbours tell, Kate? them.
    Come, thou lovest me; night, into
    closet, question gentlewoman me; I
    know, Kate, dispraise parts you
    love heart. But, good Kate, mock mercifully; the
    rather, gentle Princess, love thee cruelly. ever
    thou beest mine, Kate, saving faith tells
    thou shalt, thee scambling, thou therefore
    prove good soldier-breeder. thou I, between
    Saint Denis Saint George, compound boy, half French, half  
    English, Constantinople Turk the
    beard? not? say'st thou, fair flower-de-luce?
  KATHERINE. dat.
  KING HENRY. No: 'tis know, promise; but
    promise, Kate, endeavour French part of
    boy; English moiety word king and
    bachelor. answer you, la belle Katherine du monde, mon
   tres cher divin deesse?
  KATHERINE. Majestee ave fausse French deceive de
    sage damoiselle dat en France.
  KING HENRY. Now, fie false French! mine honour, true
    English, love thee, Kate; honour dare swear thou
    lovest me; blood begins flatter thou dost,
    notwithstanding poor untempering effect visage. Now
    beshrew father's ambition! thinking civil wars when
    me; created stubborn outside, with
    aspect iron, woo ladies fright them.
    But, faith, Kate, elder wax, appear:
    comfort is, age, layer-up beauty, do
    spoil face; thou hast me, thou hast me,  
    worst; thou shalt wear me, thou wear me, and
    better. me, fair Katherine, have
    me? Put maiden blushes; avouch thoughts your
    heart empress; hand say
    'Harry England, thine.' word thou shalt sooner
    bless mine ear withal thee aloud 'England is
    thine, Ireland thine, France thine, Henry Plantagenet
    thine'; who, speak face, not
    fellow king, thou shalt find king good
    fellows. Come, answer broken music- thy voice is
    music thy English broken; therefore, Queen all, Katherine,
    break thy mind broken English, wilt thou me?
  KATHERINE. Dat de roi mon pere.
  KING HENRY. Nay, well, Kate- please
    him, Kate.
  KATHERINE. Den sall content me.
  KING HENRY. kiss hand, queen.
  KATHERINE. Laissez, mon seigneur, laissez, laissez! Ma foi, je ne
    veux point vous abaissiez votre grandeur en baisant la main
    d'une, notre seigneur, indigne serviteur; excusez-moi, je vous  
    supplie, mon tres puissant seigneur.
  KING HENRY. kiss lips, Kate.
  KATHERINE. Les dames demoiselles pour etre baisees devant leur
    noces, il n'est pas la coutume de France.
  KING HENRY. Madame interpreter, she?
  ALICE. Dat de fashion pour le ladies France- I
    vat baiser en Anglish.
  KING HENRY. kiss.
  ALICE. Majestee entendre bettre moi.
  KING HENRY. fashion maids France kiss
    married, say?
  ALICE. Oui, vraiment.
  KING HENRY. O Kate, nice customs curtsy great kings. Dear Kate,
    confin'd weak list country's
    fashion; makers manners, Kate; liberty that
    places stops mouth find-faults- will
    upholding nice fashion country in
    denying kiss; therefore, patiently yielding.  [Kissing
    her]  witchcraft lips, Kate: more
    eloquence sugar touch tongues  
    French council; sooner persuade Henry England
    general petition monarchs. father.

             Enter FRENCH POWER ENGLISH LORDS

  BURGUNDY. God save Majesty! royal cousin,
    Teach princess English?
  KING HENRY. learn, fair cousin, perfectly I
    love her; good English.
  BURGUNDY. apt?
  KING HENRY. tongue rough, coz, condition not
    smooth; that, voice heart of
    flattery me, conjure spirit love in
    true likeness.
  BURGUNDY. Pardon frankness mirth, answer for
    that. conjure her, make circle; if
    conjure love true likeness, naked
    blind. blame her, then, maid ros'd over
    virgin crimson modesty, deny appearance of
    naked blind boy naked self? were, lord,  
    hard condition maid consign to.
  KING HENRY. wink yield, love blind and
    enforces.
  BURGUNDY. excus'd, lord, what
    do.
  KING HENRY. Then, good lord, teach cousin consent
    winking.
  BURGUNDY. wink consent, lord, teach
    meaning; maids summer'd warm are
    flies Bartholomew-tide, blind, their
    eyes; endure handling, not
    abide on.
  KING HENRY. moral ties time hot summer; and
    catch fly, cousin, end, she
    blind too.
  BURGUNDY. love is, lord, loves.
  KING HENRY. so; may, you, love my
    blindness, fair French city fair
    French maid stands way.
  FRENCH KING. Yes, lord, perspectively, cities  
    turned maid; girdled maiden walls
    war hath ent'red.
  KING HENRY. Kate wife?
  FRENCH KING. you.
  KING HENRY. content, maiden cities talk wait
    her; maid stood show
    will.
  FRENCH KING. consented terms reason.
  KING HENRY. Is't so, lords England?
  WESTMORELAND. king hath granted article:
    daughter first; sequel, all,
    firm proposed natures.
  EXETER. hath subscribed this:
      Majesty demands King France, any
    occasion write matter grant, Highness
    form addition, French, Notre tres cher
    fils Henri, Roi d'Angleterre, Heritier de France; in
    Latin, Praeclarissimus filius noster Henricus, Rex Angliae et
    Haeres Franciae.
  FRENCH KING. not, brother, denied  
    request make pass.
  KING HENRY. pray you, then, love dear alliance,
    article rank rest;
    give daughter.
  FRENCH KING. her, fair son, blood raise up
    Issue me; contending kingdoms
    France England, shores pale
    envy other's happiness,
    cease hatred; dear conjunction
    Plant neighbourhood Christian-like accord
    sweet bosoms, war advance
    bleeding sword 'twixt England fair France.
  LORDS. Amen!
  KING HENRY. Now, welcome, Kate; bear witness all,
    kiss sovereign queen.       [Floulish]
  QUEEN ISABEL. God, maker marriages,
    Combine hearts one, realms one!
    man wife, two, love,
    'twixt kingdoms spousal
    ill office fell jealousy,  
    troubles oft bed blessed marriage,
    Thrust paction kingdoms,
    make divorce incorporate league;
    English French, French Englishmen,
    Receive other. God speak Amen!
  ALL. Amen!
  KING HENRY. Prepare marriage; day,
    Lord Burgundy, oath,
    peers', surety leagues.
    swear Kate, me,
    oaths prosp'rous be!
                                                  Sennet. Exeunt

EPILOGUE
                           EPILOGUE.

                          Enter CHORUS

  CHORUS. far, rough all-unable pen,
    bending author hath pursu'd story,
    room confining mighty men,
    Mangling starts full glory.
    Small time, but, small, greatly lived
    star England. Fortune made sword;
    world's garden achieved,
    left son imperial lord.
    Henry Sixth, infant bands crown'd king
    France England, king succeed;
    state managing
    lost France made England bleed;
    oft stage hath shown; and, sake,
    fair minds acceptance take.            Exit

THE END

1592

THE PART HENRY SIXTH

by William Shakespeare


Dramatis Personae

  KING HENRY SIXTH
  DUKE GLOUCESTER, uncle King, Protector
  DUKE BEDFORD, uncle King, Regent France
  THOMAS BEAUFORT, DUKE EXETER, great-uncle king
  HENRY BEAUFORT, great-uncle King, BISHOP WINCHESTER,
     CARDINAL
  JOHN BEAUFORT, EARL SOMERSET, Duke
  RICHARD PLANTAGENET, son Richard late Earl Cambridge,
    DUKE YORK
  EARL WARWICK
  EARL SALISBURY
  EARL SUFFOLK
  LORD TALBOT, EARL SHREWSBURY
  JOHN TALBOT, son
  EDMUND MORTIMER, EARL MARCH
  SIR JOHN FASTOLFE
  SIR WILLIAM LUCY
  SIR WILLIAM GLANSDALE
  SIR THOMAS GARGRAVE
  MAYOR LONDON  
  WOODVILLE, Lieutenant Tower
  VERNON, White Rose York faction
  BASSET, Red Rose Lancaster faction
  LAWYER
  GAOLERS, Mortimer
  CHARLES, Dauphin, King France
  REIGNIER, DUKE ANJOU, titular King Naples
  DUKE BURGUNDY
  DUKE ALENCON
  BASTARD ORLEANS
  GOVERNOR PARIS
  MASTER-GUNNER ORLEANS, SON
  GENERAL FRENCH FORCES Bordeaux
  FRENCH SERGEANT
  PORTER
  SHEPHERD, father Joan la Pucelle
  MARGARET, daughter Reignier, married to
    King Henry
  COUNTESS AUVERGNE
  JOAN LA PUCELLE, Commonly called JOAN ARC  

  Lords, Warders Tower, Heralds, Officers, Soldiers,
  Messengers, English French Attendants. Fiends appearing
    La Pucelle

SCENE:
England France




The Part King Henry Sixth


ACT I. SCENE 1.

Westminster Abbey

Dead March. Enter funeral KING HENRY FIFTH,
attended DUKE BEDFORD, Regent France,
the DUKE GLOUCESTER, Protector, DUKE EXETER,
the EARL WARWICK, BISHOP WINCHESTER

  BEDFORD. Hung heavens black, yield day to
    night! Comets, importing change times states,
    Brandish crystal tresses sky
    scourge bad revolting stars
    consented Henry's death!
    King Henry Fifth, famous live long!
    England ne'er lost king worth.
  GLOUCESTER. England ne'er king time.
    Virtue had, deserving command;
    brandish'd sword blind men beams;  
    arms spread wider dragon's wings;
    sparkling eyes, replete wrathful fire,
    dazzled drove back enemies
    mid-day sun fierce bent faces.
    say? deeds exceed speech:
    ne'er lift hand conquered.
  EXETER. mourn black; mourn blood?
    Henry dead revive.
    wooden coffin attend;
    death's dishonourable victory
    stately presence glorify,
    captives bound triumphant car.
    What! curse planets mishap
    plotted glory's overthrow?
    subtle-witted French
    Conjurers sorcerers, that, afraid him,
    magic verses contriv'd end?
  WINCHESTER. king bless'd King kings;
    French dreadful judgment-day
    dreadful sight.  
    battles Lord Hosts fought;
    Church's prayers made prosperous.
  GLOUCESTER. Church! it? churchmen
    pray'd,
    thread life decay'd.
    effeminate prince,
    school-boy overawe.
  WINCHESTER. Gloucester, whate'er like, thou art
    Protector
    lookest command Prince realm.
    Thy wife proud; holdeth thee awe
    God religious churchmen may.
  GLOUCESTER. religion, thou lov'st flesh;
    ne'er year church thou go'st,
    pray thy foes.
  BEDFORD. Cease, cease jars rest minds peace;
    altar. Heralds, wait us.
    gold, offer arms,
    arms avail not, Henry's dead.
    Posterity, await wretched years,  
    mothers' moist'ned eyes babes suck,
    isle made nourish salt tears,
    women left wail dead.
  HENRY Fifth, thy ghost invocate:
    Prosper realm, civil broils,
    Combat adverse planets heavens.
    glorious star thy soul make
    Julius Caesar bright

                          Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. honourable lords, health all!
    Sad tidings bring France,
    loss, slaughter, discomfiture:
    Guienne, Champagne, Rheims, Orleans,
    Paris, Guysors, Poictiers, lost.
  BEDFORD. say'st thou, man, dead Henry's corse?
    Speak softly, loss great towns
    make burst lead rise death.
  GLOUCESTER. Paris lost? Rouen yielded up?  
    Henry recall'd life again,
    news yield ghost.
  EXETER. lost? treachery us'd?
  MESSENGER. treachery, men money.
    soldiers muttered
    maintain factions;
    whilst field dispatch'd fought,
    disputing generals:
    ling'ring wars, cost;
    fly swift, wanteth wings;
    thinks, expense all,
    guileful fair words peace obtain'd.
    Awake, awake, English nobility!
    sloth dim honours, new-begot.
    Cropp'd flower-de-luces arms;
    England's coat half cut away.
  EXETER. tears wanting funeral,
    tidings call flowing tides.
  BEDFORD. concern; Regent France.
    Give steeled coat; fight France.  
    disgraceful wailing robes!
    Wounds lend French eyes,
    weep intermissive miseries.

                   Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. Lords, view letters full bad
    mischance.
    France revolted English quite,
    petty towns import.
    Dauphin Charles crowned king Rheims;
    Bastard Orleans join'd;
    Reignier, Duke Anjou, doth part;
    Duke Alencon flieth side.
  EXETER. Dauphin crowned king! fly him!
    O, fly reproach?
  GLOUCESTER. fly enemies' throats.
    Bedford, thou slack fight out.
  BEDFORD. Gloucester, doubt'st thou forwardness?
    army muster'd thoughts,  
    Wherewith France overrun.

                   Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. gracious lords, add your
    laments,
    Wherewith bedew King Henry's hearse,
    inform dismal fight
    Betwixt stout Lord Talbot French.
  WINCHESTER. What! Talbot overcame? Is't so?
  MESSENGER. O, no; Lord Talbot was
    o'erthrown.
    circumstance large.
    tenth August dreadful lord,
    Retiring siege Orleans,
    full scarce thousand troop,
    twenty thousand French
    round encompassed set upon.
    leisure enrank men;
    wanted pikes set archers;  
    whereof sharp stakes pluck'd hedges
    pitched ground confusedly
    horsemen breaking in.
    hours fight continued;
    valiant Talbot, human thought,
    Enacted wonders sword lance:
    Hundreds hell, durst stand him;
    Here, there, everywhere, enrag'd slew
    French exclaim'd devil arms;
    army stood agaz'd him.
    soldiers, spying undaunted spirit,
    'A Talbot! Talbot!' cried amain,
    rush'd bowels battle.
    conquest fully seal'd up
    Sir John Fastolfe play'd coward.
    He, vaward plac'd behind
    purpose relieve follow them-
    Cowardly fled, struck stroke;
    grew general wreck massacre.
    Enclosed enemies.  
    base Walloon, win Dauphin's grace,
    Thrust Talbot spear back;
    France, chief assembled strength,
    Durst presume face.
  BEDFORD. Talbot slain? slay myself,
    living idly pomp ease,
    Whilst worthy leader, wanting aid,
    dastard foemen betray'd.
  MESSENGER. O no, lives, prisoner,
    Lord Scales him, Lord Hungerford;
    rest slaughter'd likewise.
  BEDFORD. ransom pay.
    hale Dauphin headlong throne;
    crown ransom friend;
    lords change ours.
    Farewell, masters; task I;
    Bonfires France forthwith make
    great Saint George's feast withal.
    Ten thousand soldiers take,
    bloody deeds make Europe quake.  
  MESSENGER. need; Orleans besieg'd;
    English army grown weak faint;
    Earl Salisbury craveth supply
    men mutiny,
    they, few, watch multitude.
  EXETER. Remember, lords, oaths Henry sworn,
    quell Dauphin utterly,
    bring obedience yoke.
  BEDFORD. remember it, leave
    preparation.                             Exit
  GLOUCESTER. Tower haste can
    view th' artillery munition;
    proclaim young Henry king.              Exit
  EXETER. Eltham I, young King is,
    ordain'd special governor;
    safety devise.              Exit
  WINCHESTER.  [Aside]  hath place function to
    attend:
    left out; remains.
    long Jack office.  
    King Eltham intend steal,
    sit chiefest stern public weal.             Exeunt




                          SCENE 2.

                  France. Orleans

      Sound flourish. Enter CHARLES DAUPHIN, ALENCON,
           REIGNIER, marching drum soldiers

  CHARLES. Mars true moving, heavens
    earth, day known.
    Late shine English side;
    victors, smiles.
    towns moment have?
    pleasure lie Orleans;
    Otherwhiles famish'd English, pale ghosts,
    Faintly besiege hour month.
  ALENCON. porridge fat bull
    beeves.
    dieted mules
    provender tied mouths,
    piteous look, drowned mice.
  REIGNIER. raise siege. live idly here?
    Talbot taken, wont fear;  
    Remaineth mad-brain'd Salisbury,
    fretting spend gall
    men money hath make war.
  CHARLES. Sound, sound alarum; rush them.
    honour forlorn French!
    forgive death killeth me,
    sees back foot flee.             Exeunt

       alarum. beaten hack English, with
         great loss. Re-enter CHARLES, ALENCON, REIGNIER

  CHARLES. like? men I!
    Dogs! cowards! dastards! ne'er fled
    left midst enemies.
  REIGNIER. Salisbury desperate homicide;
    fighteth weary life.
    lords, lions wanting food,
    rush hungry prey.
  ALENCON. Froissart, countryman ours, records
    England Olivers Rowlands bred  
    time Edward reign.
    verified;
    Samsons Goliases
    sendeth skirmish. ten!
    Lean raw-bon'd rascals! e'er suppose
    courage audacity?
  CHARLES. leave town; hare-brain'd
    slaves,
    hunger enforce eager.
    them; teeth
    walls tear forsake siege.
  REIGNIER. odd gimmers device
    arms set, clocks, strike on;
    ne'er hold do.
    consent, alone.
  ALENCON. so.

                   Enter BASTARD ORLEANS

  BASTARD. Prince Dauphin? news him.  
  CHARLES. Bastard Orleans, thrice us.
  BASTARD. Methinks sad, cheer appall'd.
    Hath late overthrow wrought offence?
    dismay'd, succour hand.
    holy maid bring,
    Which, vision heaven,
    Ordained raise tedious siege
    drive English bounds France.
    spirit deep prophecy hath,
    Exceeding sibyls Rome:
    past descry.
    Speak, call in? words,
    unfallible.
  CHARLES. Go, call in.                       [Exit BASTARD]
    first, skill,
    Reignier, stand thou Dauphin place;
    Question proudly; thy stern;
    means sound skill hath.

                  Re-enter BASTARD ORLEANS  
                          JOAN LA PUCELLE

  REIGNIER. Fair maid, 't thou wilt wondrous feats?
  PUCELLE. Reignier, 't thou thinkest beguile me?
    Dauphin? Come, behind;
    thee well, before.
    amaz'd, hid me.
    private talk thee apart.
    Stand back, lords, give leave awhile.
  REIGNIER. takes bravely dash.
  PUCELLE. Dauphin, birth shepherd's daughter,
    wit untrain'd kind art.
    Heaven Lady gracious hath pleas'd
    shine contemptible estate.
    Lo, whilst waited tender lambs
    sun's parching heat display'd cheeks,
    God's Mother deigned me,
    vision full majesty
    Will'd leave base vocation
    free country calamity  
    aid promis'd assur'd success.
    complete glory reveal'd herself;
    black swart before,
    clear rays infus'd me
    beauty bless'd see.
    question thou canst possible,
    answer unpremeditated.
    courage combat thou dar'st,
    thou shalt find exceed sex.
    Resolve this: thou shalt fortunate
    thou receive thy warlike mate.
  CHARLES. Thou hast astonish'd thy high terms.
    proof thy valour make
    single combat thou shalt buckle me;
    thou vanquishest, thy words true;
    renounce confidence.
  PUCELLE. prepar'd; keen-edg'd sword,
    Deck'd flower-de-luces side,
    Touraine, Saint Katherine's churchyard,
    great deal iron chose forth.  
  CHARLES. come, o' God's name; fear woman.
  PUCELLE. live ne'er fly man.
                 [Here fight JOAN LA PUCELLE overcomes]
  CHARLES. Stay, stay thy hands; thou art Amazon,
    fightest sword Deborah.
  PUCELLE. Christ's Mother helps me, weak.
  CHARLES. Whoe'er helps thee, 'tis thou me.
    Impatiently burn thy desire;
    heart hands thou hast subdu'd.
    Excellent Pucelle, thy so,
    thy servant sovereign be.
    'Tis French Dauphin sueth thee thus.
  PUCELLE. yield rites love,
    profession's sacred above.
    chased thy foes hence,
    recompense.
  CHARLES. Meantime gracious thy prostrate thrall.
  REIGNIER. lord, methinks, long talk.
  ALENCON. Doubtless shrives woman smock;
    ne'er long protract speech.  
  REIGNIER. disturb him, mean?
  ALENCON. poor men know;
    women shrewd tempters tongues.
  REIGNIER. lord, you? devise on?
    give o'er Orleans, no?
  PUCELLE. Why, no, say; distrustful recreants!
    Fight till gasp; guard.
  CHARLES. confirm; fight out.
  PUCELLE. Assign'd English scourge.
    night siege assuredly raise.
    Expect Saint Martin's summer, halcyon days,
    entered wars.
    Glory circle water,
    ceaseth enlarge itself
    Till broad spreading disperse nought.
    Henry's death English circle ends;
    Dispersed glories included.
    proud insulting ship
    Caesar fortune bare once.
  CHARLES. Mahomet inspired dove?  
    Thou eagle art inspired then.
    Helen, mother great Constantine,
    Saint Philip's daughters thee.
    Bright star Venus, fall'n earth,
    reverently worship thee enough?
  ALENCON. Leave delays, raise siege.
  REIGNIER. Woman, thou canst save honours;
    Drive Orleans, immortaliz'd.
  CHARLES. Presently try. Come, it.
    prophet trust prove false.           Exeunt




                          SCENE 3.

                London. Tower gates

       Enter DUKE GLOUCESTER, serving-men
                       blue coats

  GLOUCESTER. survey Tower day;
    Henry's death, fear, conveyance.
    warders wait here?
    Open gates; 'tis Gloucester calls.
  WARDER.  [Within]  knocks so
    imperiously?
  SERVING-MAN. noble Duke Gloucester.
  WARDER.  [Within]  Whoe'er be, be
    in.
  SERVING-MAN. Villains, answer Lord
    Protector?
  WARDER.  [Within]  Lord protect him! we
    answer him.
    will'd.
  GLOUCESTER. willed you, stands  
    mine?
    Protector realm I.
    Break gates, warrantize.
    flouted dunghill grooms?
                  [GLOUCESTER'S men rush Tower gates, and
                         WOODVILLE Lieutenant speaks within]
  WOODVILLE.  [Within]  noise this? traitors
    here?
  GLOUCESTER. Lieutenant, voice hear?
    Open gates; Gloucester enter.
  WOODVILLE.  [Within]  patience, noble Duke, may
    open;
    Cardinal Winchester forbids.
    express commandment
    thou thine in.
  GLOUCESTER. Faint-hearted Woodville, prizest fore me?
    Arrogant Winchester, haughty prelate
    Henry, late sovereign, ne'er brook!
    Thou art friend God King.
    Open gates, shut thee shortly.  
  SERVING-MEN. Open gates Lord Protector,
    burst open, quickly.

       Enter PROTECTOR Tower gates WINCHESTER
                   men tawny coats

  WINCHESTER. now, ambitious Humphry! means
    this?
  GLOUCESTER. Peel'd priest, dost thou command be
    shut out?
  WINCHESTER. do, thou usurping proditor,
    Protector King realm.
  GLOUCESTER. Stand back, thou manifest conspirator,
    Thou contrived'st murder dead lord;
    Thou giv'st whores indulgences sin.
    canvass thee thy broad cardinal's hat,
    thou proceed thy insolence.
  WINCHESTER. Nay, stand thou back; budge foot.
    Damascus; thou cursed Cain,
    slay thy brother Abel, thou wilt.  
  GLOUCESTER. slay thee, drive thee back.
    Thy scarlet robes child's bearing-cloth
    carry thee place.
  WINCHESTER. thou dar'st; beard thee thy face.
  GLOUCESTER. What! dar'd bearded face?
    Draw, men, privileged place
    Blue-coats tawny-coats. Priest, beware beard;
    tug it, cuff soundly;
    feet stamp thy cardinal's hat;
    spite Pope dignities church,
    cheeks drag thee down.
  WINCHESTER. Gloucester, thou wilt answer the
    Pope.
  GLOUCESTER. Winchester goose! cry 'A rope, rope!'
    beat hence; stay?
    Thee chase hence, thou wolf sheep's array.
    Out, tawny-coats! Out, scarlet hypocrite!

         GLOUCESTER'S men beat CARDINAL'S
        men; enter hurly burly MAYOR  
                  LONDON OFFICERS

  MAYOR. Fie, lords! you, supreme magistrates,
    contumeliously break peace!
  GLOUCESTER. Peace, Mayor! thou know'st wrongs:
    Beaufort, God King,
    Hath distrain'd Tower use.
  WINCHESTER. Gloucester, foe citizens;
    motions war peace,
    O'ercharging free purses large fines;
    seeks overthrow religion,
    Protector realm,
    armour Tower,
    crown King suppress Prince.
  GLOUCESTER. answer thee words, blows.
                                      [Here skirmish again]
  MAYOR. Nought rests tumultuous strife
    make open proclamation.
    Come, officer, loud e'er thou canst,
    Cry.  
  OFFICER.  [Cries]  manner men assembled arms
    day God's peace King's, charge
    command you, Highness' name, repair to
    dwelling-places; wear, handle, or
    use, sword, weapon, dagger, henceforward, upon
    pain death.
  GLOUCESTER. Cardinal, breaker law;
    meet break minds large.
  WINCHESTER. Gloucester, meet thy cost, sure;
    Thy heart-blood day's work.
  MAYOR. call clubs away.
    Cardinal's haughty devil.
  GLOUCESTER. Mayor, farewell; thou dost thou
    mayst.
  WINCHESTER. Abominable Gloucester, guard thy head,
    intend ere long.
                    Exeunt, severally, GLOUCESTER WINCHESTER
                                             servants
  MAYOR. coast clear'd, depart.
    Good God, nobles stomachs bear!  
    fight forty year.                Exeunt




                               SCENE 4.

                        France. Orleans

               Enter, walls, MASTER-GUNNER
                       ORLEANS BOY

  MASTER-GUNNER. Sirrah, thou know'st Orleans is
    besieg'd,
    English suburbs won.
  BOY. Father, know; oft shot them,
    Howe'er unfortunate miss'd aim.
  MASTER-GUNNER. thou shalt not. thou rul'd
    me.
    Chief master-gunner town;
    procure grace.
    Prince's espials informed me
    English, suburbs close intrench'd,
    Wont, secret grate iron bars
    yonder tower, overpeer city,
    discover advantage
    vex shot assault.  
    intercept inconvenience,
    piece ordnance 'gainst plac'd;
    days watch'd
    them. thou watch,
    stay longer.
    thou spy'st any, run bring word;
    thou shalt find Governor's.               Exit
  BOY. Father, warrant you; care;
    trouble you, spy them.              Exit

          Enter SALISBURY TALBOT turrets, with
            SIR WILLIAM GLANSDALE, SIR THOMAS GARGRAVE,
                            others

  SALISBURY. Talbot, life, joy, return'd!
    wert thou handled prisoner?
    means got'st thou releas'd?
    Discourse, prithee, turret's top.
  TALBOT. Earl Bedford prisoner
    Call'd brave Lord Ponton de Santrailles;  
    exchang'd ransomed.
    baser man arms far
    Once, contempt, barter'd me;
    disdaining scorn'd, craved death
    vile esteem'd.
    fine, redeem'd desir'd.
    But, O! treacherous Fastolfe wounds heart
    bare fists execute,
    brought power.
  SALISBURY. tell'st thou thou wert entertain'd.
  TALBOT. scoffs, scorns, contumelious taunts,
    open market-place produc'd me
    public spectacle all;
    Here, they, terror French,
    scarecrow affrights children so.
    broke officers led me,
    nails digg'd stones ground
    hurl beholders shame;
    grisly countenance made fly;
    durst fear sudden death.  
    iron walls deem'd secure;
    great fear 'mongst spread
    suppos'd rend bars steel
    spurn pieces posts adamant;
    Wherefore guard chosen shot had
    walk'd minute-while;
    stir bed,
    Ready shoot heart.

                Enter BOY linstock

  SALISBURY. grieve hear torments endur'd;
    reveng'd sufficiently.
    supper-time Orleans:
    Here, grate, count one
    view Frenchmen fortify.
    in; sight delight thee.
    Sir Thomas Gargrave Sir William Glansdale,
    express opinions
    place make batt'ry next.  
  GARGRAVE. North Gate; stand lords.
  GLANSDALE. here, bulwark bridge.
  TALBOT. aught see, city famish'd,
    light skirmishes enfeebled.
                     [Here shoot SALISBURY GARGRAVE
                                                      fall down]
  SALISBURY. O Lord, mercy us, wretched sinners!
  GARGRAVE. O Lord, mercy me, woeful man!
  TALBOT. chance suddenly hath cross'd us?
    Speak, Salisbury; least, thou canst speak.
    far'st thou, mirror martial men?
    thy eyes thy cheek's side struck off!
    Accursed tower! accursed fatal hand
    hath contriv'd woeful tragedy!
    thirteen battles Salisbury o'ercame;
    Henry train'd wars;
    Whilst trump sound drum struck up,
    sword ne'er leave striking field.
    liv'st thou, Salisbury? thy speech doth fail,
    eye thou hast heaven grace;  
    sun eye vieweth world.
    Heaven, thou gracious alive
    Salisbury mercy thy hands!
    Bear body; bury it.
    Sir Thomas Gargrave, hast thou life?
    Speak Talbot; nay, him.
    Salisbury, cheer thy spirit comfort,
    Thou shalt die whiles
    beckons hand smiles me,
    'When dead gone,
    Remember avenge French.'
    Plantagenet, will; thee, Nero,
    Play lute, beholding towns burn.
    Wretched France name.
                  [Here alarum, thunders lightens]
    stir this? tumult's heavens?
    cometh alarum noise?

                          Enter MESSENGER
  
  MESSENGER. lord, lord, French gather'd
    head
    Dauphin, Joan la Pucelle join'd,
    holy prophetess risen up,
    great power raise siege.
                  [Here SALISBURY lifteth groans]
  TALBOT. Hear, hear dying Salisbury doth groan.
    irks heart reveng'd.
    Frenchmen, Salisbury you.
    Pucelle puzzel, dolphin dogfish,
    hearts stamp horse's heels
    make quagmire mingled brains.
    Convey Salisbury tent,
    dastard Frenchmen dare.
                                                  Alarum. Exeunt




                             SCENE 5.

                          Orleans

         alarum again, TALBOT pursueth the
      DAUPHIN driveth him. enter JOAN LA PUCELLE
       driving Englishmen her. enter TALBOT

  TALBOT. strength, valour, force?
    English troops retire, stay them;
    woman clad armour chaseth them.

                          Enter LA PUCELLE

    Here, comes. bout thee.
    Devil devil's dam, conjure thee;
    Blood draw thee-thou art witch
    straightway give thy soul thou serv'st.
  PUCELLE. Come, come, 'tis disgrace thee.
                                               [Here fight]
  TALBOT. Heavens, suffer hell prevail?
    breast burst straining courage.  
    shoulders crack arms asunder,
    chastise high minded strumpet.
                                              [They fight again]
  PUCELLE. Talbot, farewell; thy hour come.
    victual Orleans forthwith.
             [A short alarum; enter town soldiers]
    O'ertake thou canst; scorn thy strength.
    Go, go, cheer thy hungry starved men;
    Salisbury make testament.
    day ours, be.                Exit
  TALBOT. thoughts whirled potter's wheel;
    do.
    witch fear, force, Hannibal,
    Drives back troops conquers lists.
    bees smoke doves noisome stench
    hives houses driven away.
    call'd us, fierceness, English dogs;
    whelps crying run away.
                                                [A short alarum]
    Hark, countrymen! renew fight  
    tear lions England's coat;
    Renounce soil, give sheep lions' stead:
    Sheep run half treacherous wolf,
    horse oxen leopard,
    fly oft subdued slaves.
                                 [Alarum. skirmish]
    be-retire trenches.
    consented Salisbury's death,
    strike stroke revenge.
    Pucelle ent'red Orleans
    spite aught do.
    O, die Salisbury!
    shame hereof make hide head.
                                    Exit TALBOT. Alarum; retreat



                             SCENE 6.

                              ORLEANS

        Flourish. Enter walls, LA PUCELLE, CHARLES,
                REIGNIER, ALENCON, soldiers

  PUCELLE. Advance waving colours walls;
    Rescu'd Orleans English.
    Joan la Pucelle hath perform'd word.
  CHARLES. Divinest creature, Astraea's daughter,
    honour thee success?
    Thy promises Adonis' gardens,
    day bloom'd fruitful next.
    France, triumph thy glorious prophetess.
    Recover'd town Orleans.
    blessed hap ne'er befall state.
  REIGNIER. ring bells aloud the
    town?
    Dauphin, command citizens make bonfires
    feast banquet open streets
    celebrate joy God hath us.  
  ALENCON. France replete mirth joy
    hear play'd men.
  CHARLES. 'Tis Joan, we, day won;
    divide crown her;
    priests friars realm
    procession sing endless praise.
    statelier pyramis rear
    Rhodope's Memphis was.
    memory her, dead,
    ashes, urn precious
    rich jewel'd coffer Darius,
    Transported high festivals
    kings queens France.
    longer Saint Denis cry,
    Joan la Pucelle France's saint.
    in, banquet royally
    golden day victory. Flourish.           Exeunt
