ACT II. SCENE 1.

Before Orleans

Enter FRENCH SERGEANT SENTINELS

  SERGEANT. Sirs, places vigilant.
    noise soldier perceive
    walls, apparent sign
    knowledge court guard.
  SENTINEL. Sergeant, shall.           [Exit SERGEANT]
    poor servitors,
    sleep quiet beds,
    Constrain'd watch darkness, rain, cold.

             Enter TALBOT, BEDFORD, BURGUNDY, forces,
          scaling-ladders; drums beating dead
                              march

  TALBOT. Lord Regent, redoubted Burgundy,
    approach regions Artois,
    Wallon, Picardy, friends us,  
    happy night Frenchmen secure,
    day carous'd banqueted;
    Embrace opportunity,
    fitting quittance deceit,
    Contriv'd art baleful sorcery.
  BEDFORD. Coward France, wrongs fame,
    Despairing arm's fortitude,
    join witches hell!
  BURGUNDY. Traitors company.
    Pucelle term pure?
  TALBOT. maid, say.
  BEDFORD. maid! martial!
  BURGUNDY. Pray God prove masculine ere long,
    underneath standard French
    carry armour hath begun.
  TALBOT. Well, practise converse spirits:
    God fortress, conquering name
    resolve scale flinty bulwarks.
  BEDFORD. Ascend, brave Talbot; follow thee.
  TALBOT. together; far, guess,  
    make entrance ways;
    chance fail
    rise force.
  BEDFORD. Agreed; yond corner.
  BURGUNDY. this.
  TALBOT. Talbot mount make grave.
    Now, Salisbury, thee, right
    English Henry, night appear
    duty bound both.
             [The English scale walls cry 'Saint George!
                                                     Talbot!']
    SENTINEL. Arm! arm! enemy doth make assault.

           French leap o'er walls shirts.
           Enter, ways, BASTARD, ALENCON, REIGNIER,
                     half ready half unready

  ALENCON. now, lords? What, unready so?
  BASTARD. Unready! Ay, glad 'scap'd well.
  REIGNIER. 'Twas time, trow, wake leave beds,  
    Hearing alarums chamber doors.
  ALENCON. exploits follow'd arms
    Ne'er heard warlike enterprise
    venturous desperate this.
  BASTARD. Talbot fiend hell.
  REIGNIER. hell, heavens, sure, favour him
  ALENCON. cometh Charles; marvel sped.

                    Enter CHARLES LA PUCELLE

  BASTARD. Tut! holy Joan defensive guard.
  CHARLES. thy cunning, thou deceitful dame?
    Didst thou first, flatter withal,
    Make partakers gain
    loss ten times much?
  PUCELLE. Wherefore Charles impatient friend?
    times power alike?
    Sleeping waking, prevail
    blame lay fault me?
    Improvident soldiers! watch good  
    sudden mischief fall'n.
  CHARLES. Duke Alencon, default
    That, captain watch to-night,
    weighty charge.
  ALENCON. quarters safely kept
    whereof government,
    shamefully surpris'd.
  BASTARD. Mine secure.
  REIGNIER. mine, lord.
  CHARLES. And, myself, part night,
    quarter mine precinct
    employ'd passing fro
    relieving sentinels.
    break in?
  PUCELLE. Question, lords, case,
    way; 'tis found place
    weakly guarded, breach made.
    rests shift this
    gather soldiers, scatter'd dispers'd,
    lay platforms endamage them.  

               Alarum. Enter ENGLISH SOLDIER, crying
            'A Talbot! Talbot!' fly, leaving their
                           clothes behind

  SOLDIER. bold left.
    cry Talbot serves sword;
    loaden spoils,
    weapon name.                     Exit




                             SCENE 2.

                      ORLEANS. town

            Enter TALBOT, BEDFORD, BURGUNDY, CAPTAIN,
                           others

  BEDFORD. day begins break, night fled
    pitchy mantle over-veil'd earth.
    sound retreat cease hot pursuit.
                                               [Retreat sounded]
  TALBOT. Bring body Salisbury
    advance market-place,
    middle centre cursed town.
    paid vow soul;
    drop blood drawn him
    hath Frenchmen died to-night.
    ages behold
    ruin happened revenge him,
    chiefest temple erect
    tomb, corpse interr'd;
    which, read,  
    engrav'd sack Orleans,
    treacherous manner mournful death,
    terror France.
    But, lords, bloody massacre,
    muse met Dauphin's grace,
    new-come champion, virtuous Joan Arc,
    false confederates.
  BEDFORD. 'Tis thought, Lord Talbot, fight began,
    Rous'd sudden drowsy beds,
    troops armed men
    Leap o'er walls refuge field.
  BURGUNDY. Myself, discern
    smoke dusky vapours night,
    scar'd Dauphin trull,
    arm arm swiftly running,
    pair loving turtle-doves
    live asunder day night.
    things set order here,
    follow power have.
  
                          Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. hail, lords! princely train
    Call ye warlike Talbot, acts
    applauded realm France?
  TALBOT. Talbot; speak him?
  MESSENGER. virtuous lady, Countess Auvergne,
    modesty admiring thy renown,
    entreats, great lord, thou wouldst vouchsafe
    visit poor castle lies,
    boast hath beheld man
    glory fills world loud report.
  BURGUNDY. so? Nay, wars
    turn peaceful comic sport,
    ladies crave encount'red with.
    not, lord, despise gentle suit.
  TALBOT. Ne'er trust then; world men
    prevail oratory,
    hath woman's kindness overrul'd;
    return great  
    submission attend her.
    honours bear company?
  BEDFORD. No, truly; 'tis manners will;
    heard unbidden guests
    welcomest gone.
  TALBOT. then, alone, remedy,
    prove lady's courtesy.
    hither, Captain.  [Whispers]   perceive mind?
  CAPTAIN. do, lord, accordingly.           Exeunt




                             SCENE 3.

                      AUVERGNE. Castle

               Enter COUNTESS PORTER

  COUNTESS. Porter, remember gave charge;
    so, bring keys me.
  PORTER. Madam, will.
  COUNTESS. plot laid; things fall right,
    famous exploit.
    Scythian Tomyris Cyrus' death.
    Great rumour dreadful knight,
    achievements account.
    Fain mine eyes witness mine ears
    give censure rare reports.

    Enter MESSENGER TALBOT.

  MESSENGER. Madam, ladyship desir'd,
    message crav'd, Lord Talbot come.
  COUNTESS. welcome. What! man?  
  MESSENGER. Madam, is.
  COUNTESS. scourge France?
    Talbot, fear'd abroad
    mothers babes?
    report fabulous false.
    thought Hercules,
    Hector, grim aspect
    large proportion strong-knit limbs.
    Alas, child, silly dwarf!
    weak writhled shrimp
    strike terror enemies.
  TALBOT. Madam, bold trouble you;
    ladyship leisure,
    sort time visit you.              [Going]
  COUNTESS. means now? he
    goes.
  MESSENGER. Stay, Lord Talbot; lady craves
    abrupt departure.
  TALBOT. Marry, wrong belief,
    certify Talbot's here.  

                      Re-enter PORTER keys

  COUNTESS. thou he, art thou prisoner.
  TALBOT. Prisoner! whom?
  COUNTESS. me, blood-thirsty lord
    train'd thee house.
    Long time thy shadow hath thrall me,
    gallery thy picture hangs;
    substance endure like
    chain legs arms thine
    hast tyranny years
    Wasted country, slain citizens,
    sons husbands captivate.
  TALBOT. Ha, ha, ha!
  COUNTESS. Laughest thou, wretch? Thy mirth turn to
    moan.
  TALBOT. laugh ladyship fond
    aught Talbot's shadow
    Whereon practise severity.  
  COUNTESS. Why, art thou man?
  TALBOT. indeed.
  COUNTESS. substance too.
  TALBOT. No, no, shadow myself.
    deceiv'd, substance here;
    smallest part
    proportion humanity.
    you, madam, frame here,
    spacious lofty pitch
    roof sufficient 't.
  COUNTESS. riddling merchant nonce;
    here, here.
    contrarieties agree?
  TALBOT. show presently.

                   Winds horn; drums strike up;
                  peal ordnance. Enter soldiers

    you, madam? persuaded
    Talbot shadow himself?  
    substance, sinews, arms, strength,
    yoketh rebellious necks,
    Razeth cities, subverts towns,
    moment makes desolate.
  COUNTESS. Victorious Talbot! pardon abuse.
    find thou art fame hath bruited,
    gathered thy shape.
    presumption provoke thy wrath,
    reverence
    entertain thee thou art.
  TALBOT. dismay'd, fair lady; misconster
    mind Talbot mistake
    outward composition body.
    hath offended me.
    satisfaction crave
    only, patience, may
    Taste wine cates have,
    soldiers' stomachs serve well.
  COUNTESS. heart, honoured
    feast great warrior house.              Exeunt  




                            SCENE 4.

                   London. Temple garden

         Enter EARLS SOMERSET, SUFFOLK, WARWICK;
           RICHARD PLANTAGENET, VERNON, LAWYER

  PLANTAGENET. Great lords gentlemen, means this
    silence?
    Dare man answer case truth?
  SUFFOLK. Temple Hall loud;
    garden convenient.
  PLANTAGENET. maintain'd truth;
    wrangling Somerset th' error?
  SUFFOLK. Faith, truant law
    frame it;
    frame law will.
  SOMERSET. Judge you, Lord Warwick, then, us.
  WARWICK. hawks, flies higher pitch;
    dogs, hath deeper mouth;
    blades, bears temper;
    horses, doth bear best;  
    girls, hath merriest eye
    shallow spirit judgment;
    nice sharp quillets law,
    Good faith, wiser daw.
  PLANTAGENET. Tut, tut, mannerly forbearance:
    truth appears naked side
    purblind eye find out.
  SOMERSET. side apparell'd,
    clear, shining, evident,
    glimmer blind man's eye.
  PLANTAGENET. tongue-tied loath speak,
    dumb significants proclaim thoughts.
    true-born gentleman
    stands honour birth,
    suppose pleaded truth,
    brier pluck white rose me.
  SOMERSET. coward flatterer,
    dare maintain party truth,
    Pluck red rose thorn me.
  WARWICK. love colours; and, colour  
    base insinuating flattery,
    pluck white rose Plantagenet.
  SUFFOLK. pluck red rose young Somerset,
    withal held right.
  VERNON. Stay, lords gentlemen, pluck more
    Till conclude side
    fewest roses cropp'd tree
    yield opinion.
  SOMERSET. Good Master Vernon, objected;
    fewest, subscribe silence.
  PLANTAGENET. I.
  VERNON. Then, truth plainness case,
    pluck pale maiden blossom here,
    Giving verdict white rose side.
  SOMERSET. Prick finger pluck off,
    Lest, bleeding, paint white rose red,
    fall side so, will.
  VERNON. I, lord, opinion bleed,
    Opinion surgeon hurt
    side am.  
  SOMERSET. Well, well, on; else?
  LAWYER.  [To Somerset]  study books be
    false,
    argument held wrong you;
    sign whereof pluck white rose too.
  PLANTAGENET. Now, Somerset, argument?
  SOMERSET. scabbard, meditating that
    dye white rose bloody red.
  PLANTAGENET. Meantime cheeks counterfeit our
    roses;
    pale fear, witnessing
    truth side.
  SOMERSET. No, Plantagenet,
    'Tis fear anger thy cheeks
    Blush pure shame counterfeit roses,
    thy tongue confess thy error.
  PLANTAGENET. Hath thy rose canker, Somerset?
  SOMERSET. Hath thy rose thorn, Plantagenet?
  PLANTAGENET. Ay, sharp piercing, maintain truth;
    Whiles thy consuming canker eats falsehood.  
  SOMERSET. Well, find friends wear bleeding roses,
    maintain true,
    false Plantagenet dare seen.
  PLANTAGENET. Now, maiden blossom hand,
    scorn thee thy fashion, peevish boy.
  SUFFOLK. Turn thy scorns way, Plantagenet.
  PLANTAGENET. Proud Pole, will, scorn and
    thee.
  SUFFOLK. turn part thereof thy throat.
  SOMERSET. Away, away, good William de la Pole!
    grace yeoman conversing him.
  WARWICK. Now, God's will, thou wrong'st him, Somerset;
    grandfather Lionel Duke Clarence,
    son Edward, King England.
    Spring crestless yeomen deep root?
  PLANTAGENET. bears place's privilege,
    durst craven heart thus.
  SOMERSET. made me, maintain words
    plot ground Christendom.
    thy father, Richard Earl Cambridge,  
    treason executed late king's days?
    treason stand'st thou attainted,
    Corrupted, exempt ancient gentry?
    trespass lives guilty thy blood;
    till thou restor'd thou art yeoman.
  PLANTAGENET. father attached, attainted;
    Condemn'd die treason, traitor;
    prove men Somerset,
    growing time ripened will.
    partaker Pole, yourself,
    note book memory
    scourge apprehension.
    well, warn'd.
  SOMERSET. Ay, thou shalt find ready thee still;
    colours thy foes
    friends spite thee wear.
  PLANTAGENET. And, soul, pale angry rose,
    cognizance blood-drinking hate,
    ever, faction, wear,
    wither grave,  
    flourish height degree.
  SUFFOLK. forward, chok'd thy ambition!
    farewell meet thee next.                 Exit
  SOMERSET. thee, Pole. Farewell, ambitious
    Richard.                                                Exit
  PLANTAGENET. brav'd, perforce endure
    it!
  WARWICK. blot object house
    wip'd Parliament,
    Call'd truce Winchester Gloucester;
    thou created York,
    live accounted Warwick.
    Meantime, signal love thee,
    proud Somerset William Pole,
    thy party wear rose;
    prophesy: brawl to-day,
    Grown faction Temple Garden,
    send Red Rose White
    thousand souls death deadly night.
  PLANTAGENET. Good Master Vernon, bound  
    behalf pluck flower.
  VERNON. behalf wear same.
  LAWYER. I.
  PLANTAGENET. Thanks, gentle sir.
    Come, dinner. dare say
    quarrel drink blood day.            Exeunt




                             SCENE 5.

                       Tower London

         Enter MORTIMER, brought chair, GAOLERS

  MORTIMER. Kind keepers weak decaying age,
    dying Mortimer rest himself.
    man haled rack,
    fare limbs long imprisonment;
    grey locks, pursuivants death,
    Nestor-like aged age care,
    Argue end Edmund Mortimer.
    eyes, lamps wasting oil spent,
    Wax dim, drawing exigent;
    Weak shoulders, overborne burdening grief,
    pithless arms, withered vine
    droops sapless branches ground.
    feet, strengthless stay numb,
    Unable support lump clay,
    Swift-winged desire grave,
    witting comfort have.  
    me, keeper, nephew come?
  KEEPER. Richard Plantagenet, lord, come.
    Temple, chamber;
    answer return'd come.
  MORTIMER. Enough; soul satisfied.
    Poor gentleman! wrong doth equal mine.
    Henry Monmouth began reign,
    glory great arms,
    loathsome sequestration had;
    hath Richard obscur'd,
    Depriv'd honour inheritance.
    arbitrator despairs,
    Death, kind umpire men's miseries,
    sweet enlargement doth dismiss hence.
    troubles likewise expir'd,
    recover lost.

                     Enter RICHARD PLANTAGENET

  KEEPER. lord, loving nephew come.  
  MORTIMER. Richard Plantagenet, friend, come?
  PLANTAGENET. Ay, noble uncle, ignobly us'd,
    nephew, late despised Richard, comes.
  MORTIMER. Direct mine arms embrace neck
    bosom spend gasp.
    O, lips touch cheeks,
    kindly give fainting kiss.
    declare, sweet stem York's great stock,
    didst thou late thou wert despis'd?
  PLANTAGENET. First, lean thine aged back mine arm;
    And, ease, thee disease.
    day, argument case,
    words grew 'twixt Somerset me;
    terms us'd lavish tongue
    upbraid father's death;
    obloquy set bars tongue,
    requited him.
    Therefore, good uncle, father's sake,
    honour true Plantagenet,
    alliance sake, declare  
    father, Earl Cambridge, lost head.
  MORTIMER. cause, fair nephew, imprison'd me
    hath detain'd flow'ring youth
    loathsome dungeon, pine,
    cursed instrument decease.
  PLANTAGENET. Discover large was,
    ignorant guess.
  MORTIMER. will, fading breath permit
    death approach ere tale done.
    Henry Fourth, grandfather king,
    Depos'd nephew Richard, Edward's son,
    first-begotten lawful heir
    Edward king, descent;
    reign Percies north,
    Finding usurpation unjust,
    Endeavour'd advancement throne.
    reason mov'd warlike lords this
    Was, that-young Richard remov'd,
    Leaving heir begotten body-
    birth parentage;  
    mother derived am
    Lionel Duke Clarence, son
    King Edward Third; he
    John Gaunt doth bring pedigree,
    fourth heroic line.
    mark: haughty great attempt
    laboured plant rightful heir,
    lost liberty, lives.
    Long this, Henry Fifth,
    Succeeding father Bolingbroke, reign,
    Thy father, Earl Cambridge, deriv'd
    famous Edmund Langley, Duke York,
    Marrying sister, thy mother was,
    Again, pity hard distress,
    Levied army, weening redeem
    install'd diadem;
    But, rest, fell noble earl,
    beheaded. Mortimers,
    title rested, suppress'd.
  PLANTAGENET. Which, lord, honour last.  
  MORTIMER. True; thou seest issue have,
    fainting words warrant death.
    Thou art heir; rest thee gather;
    wary thy studious care.
  PLANTAGENET. Thy grave admonishments prevail me.
    methinks father's execution
    bloody tyranny.
  MORTIMER. silence, nephew, thou politic;
    Strong fixed house Lancaster
    mountain remov'd.
    thy uncle removing hence,
    princes courts cloy'd
    long continuance settled place.
  PLANTAGENET. O uncle, part young years
    redeem passage age!
  MORTIMER. Thou dost wrong me, slaughterer
    doth
    giveth wounds kill.
    Mourn not, thou sorrow good;
    give order funeral.  
    so, farewell; fair thy hopes,
    prosperous thy life peace war!          [Dies]
  PLANTAGENET. peace, war, befall thy parting soul!
    prison hast thou spent pilgrimage,
    hermit overpass'd thy days.
    Well, lock counsel breast;
    imagine, rest.
    Keepers, convey hence; myself
    burial life.
                Exeunt GAOLERS, hearing body MORTIMER
    dies dusky torch Mortimer,
    Chok'd ambition meaner sort;
    wrongs, bitter injuries,
    Somerset hath offer'd house,
    doubt honour redress;
    haste Parliament,
    restored blood,
    make ill th' advantage good.                Exit

ACT III. SCENE 1.

London. Parliament House

Flourish. Enter KING, EXETER, GLOUCESTER, WARWICK, SOMERSET, SUFFOLK;
the BISHOP WINCHESTER, RICHARD PLANTAGENET, others.
GLOUCESTER offers put bill; WINCHESTER snatches it, tears it

  WINCHESTER. Com'st thou deep premeditated lines,
    written pamphlets studiously devis'd?
    Humphrey Gloucester, thou canst accuse
    aught intend'st lay charge,
    invention, suddenly;
    sudden extemporal speech
    Purpose answer thou canst object.
  GLOUCESTER. Presumptuous priest, place commands my
    patience,
    thou shouldst find thou hast dishonour'd me.
    not, writing preferr'd
    manner thy vile outrageous crimes,  
    forg'd, able
    Verbatim rehearse method pen.
    No, prelate; thy audacious wickedness,
    Thy lewd, pestiferous, dissentious pranks,
    infants prattle thy pride.
    Thou art pernicious usurer;
    Froward nature, enemy peace;
    Lascivious, wanton, beseems
    man thy profession degree;
    thy treachery, manifest
    thou laid'st trap life,
    London Bridge Tower?
    Beside, fear me, thy thoughts sifted,
    King, thy sovereign, exempt
    envious malice thy swelling heart.
  WINCHESTER. Gloucester, defy thee. Lords, vouchsafe
    give hearing reply.
    covetous, ambitious, perverse,
    me, poor?
    haps seek advance  
    raise myself, wonted calling?
    dissension, preferreth peace
    do, provok'd?
    No, good lords, offends;
    incens'd hath incens'd Duke:
    sway he;
    King;
    engenders thunder breast
    makes roar accusations forth.
    good
  GLOUCESTER. good!
    Thou bastard grandfather!
  WINCHESTER. Ay, lordly sir; you, pray,
    imperious another's throne?
  GLOUCESTER. Protector, saucy priest?
  WINCHESTER. prelate church?
  GLOUCESTER. Yes, outlaw castle keeps,
    useth patronage theft.
  WINCHESTER. Unreverent Gloucester!
  GLOUCESTER. Thou art reverend  
    Touching thy spiritual function, thy life.
  WINCHESTER. Rome remedy this.
  WARWICK. Roam thither then.
  SOMERSET. lord, duty forbear.
  WARWICK. Ay, bishop overborne.
  SOMERSET. Methinks lord religious,
    office belongs such.
  WARWICK. Methinks lordship humbler;
    fitteth prelate plead.
  SOMERSET. Yes, holy state touch'd near.
  WARWICK. State holy unhallow'd, that?
    Grace Protector King?
  PLANTAGENET.  [Aside]  Plantagenet, see, hold his
    tongue,
    'Speak, sirrah, should;
    bold verdict enter talk lords?'
    fling Winchester.
  KING HENRY. Uncles Gloucester Winchester,
    special watchmen English weal,
    prevail, prayers prevail  
    join hearts love amity.
    O, scandal crown
    noble peers ye jar!
    me, lords, tender years tell
    Civil dissension viperous worm
    gnaws bowels commonwealth.
                  [A noise within: 'Down tawny coats!']
    tumult's this?
  WARWICK. uproar, dare warrant,
    Begun malice Bishop's men.
                              [A noise again: 'Stones! Stones!']

                Enter MAYOR LONDON, attended

  MAYOR. O, good lords, virtuous Henry,
    Pity city London, pity us!
    Bishop Duke Gloucester's men,
    Forbidden late carry weapon,
    fill'd pockets full pebble stones
    And, banding contrary parts,  
    pelt fast another's pate
    giddy brains knock'd out.
    windows broke street,
    fear compell'd shut shops.

        Enter skirmish, retainers GLOUCESTER and
               WINCHESTER, bloody pates

  KING HENRY. charge you, allegiance ourself,
    hold slaught'ring hands peace.
    Pray, uncle Gloucester, mitigate strife.
  SERVING-MAN. Nay, forbidden stones, we'll
    fall teeth.
  SERVING-MAN. ye dare, resolute.
                                                [Skirmish again]
  GLOUCESTER. household, leave peevish broil,
    set unaccustom'd fight aside.
  SERVING-MAN. lord, Grace a
    man
    upright, royal birth  
    Inferior Majesty;
    ere suffer prince,
    kind father commonweal,
    disgraced inkhorn mate,
    wives children fight
    bodies slaught'red thy foes.
  SERVING-MAN. Ay, parings nails
    pitch field dead.          [Begin again]
  GLOUCESTER. Stay, stay, say!
    love me, do,
    persuade forbear awhile.
  KING HENRY. O, discord doth afflict soul!
    you, Lord Winchester, behold
    sighs tears relent?
    pitiful, not?
    study prefer peace,
    holy churchmen delight broils?
  WARWICK. Yield, Lord Protector; yield, Winchester;
    obstinate repulse
    slay sovereign destroy realm.  
    mischief, murder too,
    Hath enacted enmity;
    peace, ye thirst blood.
  WINCHESTER. submit, yield.
  GLOUCESTER. Compassion King commands stoop,
    heart ere priest
    privilege me.
  WARWICK. Behold, Lord Winchester, Duke
    Hath banish'd moody discontented fury,
    smoothed brows doth appear;
    stem tragical?
  GLOUCESTER. Here, Winchester, offer thee hand.
  KING HENRY. Fie, uncle Beaufort! heard preach
    malice great grievous sin;
    maintain thing teach,
    prove chief offender same?
  WARWICK. Sweet King! Bishop hath kindly gird.
    shame, Lord Winchester, relent;
    What, child instruct do?
  WINCHESTER. Well, Duke Gloucester, yield thee;  
    Love thy love hand hand give.
  GLOUCESTER  [Aside]  Ay, but, fear me, hollow
    heart.
    here, friends loving countrymen:
    token serveth flag truce
    Betwixt followers.
    God, dissemble not!
  WINCHESTER  [Aside]  God, intend not!
  KING HENRY. O loving uncle, kind Duke Gloucester,
    joyful made contract!
    Away, masters! trouble more;
    join friendship, lords done.
  SERVING-MAN. Content: surgeon's.
  SERVING-MAN. I.
  SERVING-MAN. physic tavern
    affords.                         Exeunt servants, MAYOR, &C.
  WARWICK. Accept scroll, gracious sovereign;
    Richard Plantagenet
    exhibit Majesty.
  GLOUCESTER. urg'd, Lord Warwick; for, sweet  
    prince,
    Grace mark circumstance,
    great reason Richard right;
    occasions
    Eltham Place told Majesty.
  KING HENRY. occasions, uncle, force;
    Therefore, loving lords, pleasure is
    Richard restored blood.
  WARWICK. Richard restored blood;
    father's wrongs recompens'd.
  WINCHESTER. rest, willeth Winchester.
  KING HENRY. Richard true, alone
    inheritance give
    doth belong house York,
    spring lineal descent.
  PLANTAGENET. Thy humble servant vows obedience
    humble service till point death.
  KING HENRY. Stoop set knee foot;
    reguerdon duty done
    girt thee valiant sword York.  
    Rise, Richard, true Plantagenet,
    rise created princely Duke York.
  PLANTAGENET. thrive Richard thy foes fall!
    duty springs, perish they
    grudge thought Majesty!
  ALL. Welcome, high Prince, mighty Duke York!
  SOMERSET.  [Aside]  Perish, base Prince, ignoble Duke of
    York!
  GLOUCESTER. avail Majesty
    cross seas crown'd France:
    presence king engenders love
    subjects loyal friends,
    disanimates enemies.
  KING HENRY. Gloucester word, King Henry
    goes;
    friendly counsel cuts foes.
  GLOUCESTER. ships readiness.
                         Sennet. Flourish. Exeunt EXETER
  EXETER. Ay, march England France,
    ensue.  
    late dissension grown betwixt peers
    Burns feigned ashes forg'd love
    break flame;
    fest'red members rot degree
    Till bones flesh sinews fall away,
    base envious discord breed.
    fear fatal prophecy.
    time Henry nam'd Fifth
    mouth sucking babe:
    Henry born Monmouth win all,
    Henry born Windsor lose all.
    plain Exeter doth wish
    days finish ere hapless time.              Exit




                             SCENE 2.

                      France. Rouen

       Enter LA PUCELLE disguis'd, soldiers dressed
            countrymen, sacks backs

  PUCELLE. city gates, gates Rouen,
    policy make breach.
    heed, wary place words;
    Talk vulgar sort market-men
    gather money corn.
    entrance, hope shall,
    find slothful watch weak,
    sign give notice friends,
    Charles Dauphin encounter them.
  SOLDIER. sacks sack city,
    lords rulers Rouen;
    knock.                              [Knocks]
  WATCH.  [Within]  Qui est la?
  PUCELLE. Paysans, pauvres gens de France
    Poor market-folks sell corn.  
  WATCH. Enter, in; market-bell rung.
  PUCELLE. Now, Rouen, shake thy bulwarks the
    ground.

                               [LA PUCELLE, &c., enter town]

        Enter CHARLES, BASTARD, ALENCON, REIGNIER, forces

  CHARLES. Saint Denis bless happy stratagem!
    sleep secure Rouen.
  BASTARD. ent'red Pucelle practisants;
    there, specify
    safest passage in?
  ALENCON. thrusting torch yonder tower;
    discern'd shows meaning is
    that, weakness, ent'red.

             Enter LA PUCELLE, top, thrusting out
                         torch burning
  
  PUCELLE. Behold, happy wedding torch
    joineth Rouen countrymen,
    burning fatal Talbotites.                    Exit
  BASTARD. See, noble Charles, beacon friend;
    burning torch yonder turret stands.
  CHARLES. shine comet revenge,
    prophet fall foes!
  ALENCON. Defer time, delays dangerous ends;
    Enter, cry 'The Dauphin!' presently,
    execution watch. Alarum.           Exeunt

              alarum. Enter TALBOT excursion

  TALBOT. France, thou shalt rue treason thy tears,
    Talbot survive thy treachery.
  PUCELLE, witch, damned sorceress,
    Hath wrought hellish mischief unawares,
    escap'd pride France.             Exit

        alarum; excursions. BEDFORD brought sick  
          chair. Enter TALBOT BURGUNDY without;
         within, LA PUCELLE, CHARLES, BASTARD, ALENCON,
                 REIGNIER, walls

  PUCELLE. Good morrow, gallants! ye corn bread?
    Duke Burgundy fast
    buy rate.
    'Twas full darnel-do taste?
  BURGUNDY. Scoff on, vile fiend shameless courtezan.
    trust ere long choke thee thine own,
    make thee curse harvest corn.
  CHARLES. Grace starve, perhaps, time.
  BEDFORD. O, words, deeds, revenge treason!
  PUCELLE. do, good grey beard? Break a
    lance,
    run tilt death chair?
  TALBOT. Foul fiend France hag despite,
    Encompass'd thy lustful paramours,
    thee taunt valiant age
    twit cowardice man half dead?  
    Damsel, bout again,
    Talbot perish shame.
  PUCELLE. ye hot, sir? Yet, Pucelle, hold thy peace;
    Talbot thunder, rain follow.
                 [The English party whisper council]
    God speed parliament! Speaker?
  TALBOT. Dare ye meet field?
  PUCELLE. Belike lordship takes fools,
    no.
  TALBOT. speak railing Hecate,
    thee, Alencon, rest.
    ye, soldiers, fight out?
  ALENCON. Signior, no.
  TALBOT. Signior, hang! Base muleteers France!
    peasant foot-boys walls,
    dare arms gentlemen.
  PUCELLE. Away, captains! walls;
    Talbot means goodness looks.
    God b'uy, lord; you
    here.                      Exeunt walls  
  TALBOT. too, ere long,
    reproach Talbot's greatest fame!
    Vow, Burgundy, honour thy house,
    Prick'd public wrongs sustain'd France,
    town die;
    I, English Henry lives
    father conqueror,
    late betrayed town
    Great Coeur-de-lion's heart buried
    swear town die.
  BURGUNDY. vows equal partners thy vows.
  TALBOT. ere go, regard dying prince,
    valiant Duke Bedford. Come, lord,
    bestow place,
    Fitter sickness crazy age.
  BEDFORD. Lord Talbot, dishonour me;
    sit walls Rouen,
    partner weal woe.
  BURGUNDY. Courageous Bedford, persuade you.
  BEDFORD. hence; read  
    stout Pendragon litter sick
    field, vanquished foes.
    Methinks revive soldiers' hearts,
    found myself.
  TALBOT. Undaunted spirit dying breast!
    so. Heavens Bedford safe!
    ado, brave Burgundy,
    gather forces hand
    set boasting enemy.
          Exeunt town BEDFORD attendants

           alarum; excursions. Enter SIR JOHN FASTOLFE,
                           CAPTAIN

  CAPTAIN. away, Sir John Fastolfe, haste?
  FASTOLFE. away? save flight:
    overthrow again.
  CAPTAIN. What! leave Lord Talbot?
  FASTOLFE. Ay,
    Talbots world, save life.          Exit  
  CAPTAIN. Cowardly knight! ill fortune follow thee!
                                              Exit town

         Retreat; excursions. LA PUCELLE, ALENCON,
                      CHARLES fly

  BEDFORD. Now, quiet soul, depart heaven please,
    enemies' overthrow.
    trust strength foolish man?
    late daring scoffs
    glad fain flight save themselves.
            [BEDFORD dies carried chair]

          alarum. Re-enter TALBOT, BURGUNDY, rest

  TALBOT. Lost recovered day again!
    double honour, Burgundy.
    heavens glory victory!
  BURGUNDY. Warlike martial Talbot, Burgundy
    Enshrines thee heart, erects  
    Thy noble deeds valour's monuments.
  TALBOT. Thanks, gentle Duke. Pucelle now?
    familiar asleep.
    Bastard's braves, Charles gleeks?
    What, amort? Rouen hangs head grief
    valiant company fled.
    order town,
    Placing expert officers;
    depart Paris King,
    young Henry nobles lie.
  BURGUNDY. Lord Talbot pleaseth Burgundy.
  TALBOT. yet, go, forget
    noble Duke Bedford, late deceas'd,
    exequies fulfill'd Rouen.
    braver soldier couched lance,
    gentler heart sway court;
    kings mightiest potentates die,
    end human misery.                   Exeunt




                             SCENE 3.

                      plains Rouen

        Enter CHARLES, BASTARD, ALENCON, LA PUCELLE,
                          forces

  PUCELLE. Dismay not, Princes, accident,
    grieve Rouen recovered.
    Care cure, corrosive,
    things remedied.
    frantic Talbot triumph while
    peacock sweep tail;
    pull plumes train,
    Dauphin rest rul'd.
  CHARLES. guided thee hitherto,
    thy cunning diffidence;
    sudden foil breed distrust
  BASTARD. Search thy wit secret policies,
    make thee famous world.
    ALENCON. set thy statue holy place,
    thee reverenc'd blessed saint.  
    Employ thee, then, sweet virgin, good.
  PUCELLE. be; doth Joan devise:
    fair persuasions, mix'd sug'red words,
    entice Duke Burgundy
    leave Talbot follow us.
  CHARLES. Ay, marry, sweeting, that,
    France place Henry's warriors;
    nation boast us,
    extirped provinces.
  ALENCON. expuls'd France,
    tide earldom here.
  PUCELLE. honours perceive work
    bring matter wished end.
                                          [Drum sounds afar off]
    Hark! sound drum perceive
    powers marching Paris-ward.

          sound English march. Enter, pass over
                distance, TALBOT forces
  
    Talbot, colours spread,
    troops English him.

            French march. Enter DUKE BURGUNDY and
                         forces

    rearward Duke his.
    Fortune favour makes lag behind.
    Summon parley; talk him.
                                       [Trumpets sound parley]
  CHARLES. parley Duke Burgundy!
  BURGUNDY. craves parley Burgundy?
  PUCELLE. princely Charles France, thy countryman.
  BURGUNDY. say'st thou, Charles? marching
    hence.
  CHARLES. Speak, Pucelle, enchant thy words.
  PUCELLE. Brave Burgundy, undoubted hope France!
    Stay, thy humble handmaid speak thee.
  BURGUNDY. Speak on; over-tedious.
  PUCELLE. thy country, fertile France,  
    cities towns defac'd
    wasting ruin cruel foe;
    mother lowly babe
    death doth close tender dying eyes,
    See, pining malady France;
    Behold wounds, unnatural wounds,
    thou thyself hast woeful breast.
    O, turn thy edged sword way;
    Strike hurt, hurt help!
    drop blood drawn thy country's bosom
    grieve thee streams foreign gore.
    Return thee flood tears,
    wash thy country's stained spots.
  BURGUNDY. hath bewitch'd words,
    nature makes suddenly relent.
  PUCELLE. Besides, French France exclaims thee,
    Doubting thy birth lawful progeny.
    join'st thou lordly nation
    trust thee profit's sake?
    Talbot hath set footing France,  
    fashion'd thee instrument ill,
    English Henry lord,
    thou thrust fugitive?
    Call mind-and mark proof:
    Duke Orleans thy foe?
    England prisoner?
    heard thine enemy
    set free ransom paid,
    spite Burgundy friends.
    then, thou fight'st thy countrymen,
    join'st thy slaughtermen.
    Come, come, return; return, thou wandering lord;
    Charles rest thee arms.
  BURGUNDY. vanquished; haughty words hers
    batt'red roaring cannon-shot
    made yield knees.
    Forgive me, country, sweet countrymen
    And, lords, accept hearty kind embrace.
    forces power men yours;
    So, farewell, Talbot; longer trust thee.  
  PUCELLE. Frenchman-  [Aside]  turn turn
    again.
  CHARLES. Welcome, brave Duke! Thy friendship makes us
    fresh.
  BASTARD. doth beget courage breasts.
  ALENCON. Pucelle hath bravely play'd part this,
    doth deserve coronet gold.
  CHARLES. on, lords, join powers,
    seek prejudice foe.                Exeunt




                          SCENE 4.

                     Paris. palace

         Enter KING, GLOUCESTER, WINCHESTER, YORK,
             SUFFOLK, SOMERSET, WARWICK, EXETER,
           VERNON, BASSET, others. them, with
                     soldiers, TALBOT

  TALBOT. gracious Prince, honourable peers,
    Hearing arrival realm,
    awhile truce wars
    duty sovereign;
    sign whereof, arm hath reclaim'd
    obedience fifty fortresses,
    Twelve cities, walled towns strength,
    hundred prisoners esteem,
    Lets fall sword Highness' feet,
    submissive loyalty heart
    Ascribes glory conquest got
    God Grace.           [Kneels]
  KING HENRY. Lord Talbot, uncle Gloucester,  
    hath long resident France?
  GLOUCESTER. Yes, Majesty, liege.
  KING HENRY. Welcome, brave captain victorious lord!
    young, old,
    remember father said
    stouter champion handled sword.
    Long resolved truth,
    faithful service, toil war;
    tasted reward,
    reguerdon'd thanks,
    till face.
    stand up; good deserts
    create Earl Shrewsbury;
    coronation place.
              Sennet. Flourish. Exeunt VERNON BASSET
  VERNON. Now, sir, you, hot sea,
    Disgracing colours wear
    honour noble Lord York
    Dar'st thou maintain words thou spak'st?
  BASSET. Yes, sir; dare patronage  
    envious barking saucy tongue
    lord Duke Somerset.
  VERNON. Sirrah, thy lord honour is.
  BASSET. Why, he? good man York!
  VERNON. Hark ye: so. witness, ye that.
                                                   [Strikes him]
  BASSET. Villain, thou knowest law arms such
    whoso draws sword 'tis present death,
    blow broach thy dearest blood.
    Majesty crave
    liberty venge wrong;
    thou shalt meet thee thy cost.
  VERNON. Well, miscreant, you;
    And, after, meet sooner would.           Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE 1.

Park. palace

Enter KING, GLOUCESTER, WINCHESTER, YORK, SUFFOLK, SOMERSET, WARWICK,
TALBOT, EXETER, GOVERNOR PARIS, others

  GLOUCESTER. Lord Bishop, set crown head.
  WINCHESTER. God save King Henry, Sixth!
  GLOUCESTER. Now, Governor Paris, oath
                                               [GOVERNOR kneels]
    elect king him,
    Esteem friends friends,
    foes pretend
    Malicious practices state.
    ye do, righteous God!
                                   Exeunt GOVERNOR train

                    Enter SIR JOHN FASTOLFE

  FASTOLFE. gracious sovereign, rode Calais,  
    haste coronation,
    letter deliver'd hands,
    Writ Grace th' Duke Burgundy.
  TALBOT. Shame Duke Burgundy thee!
    vow'd, base knight, meet thee next
    tear Garter thy craven's leg,  [Plucking off]
    done, unworthily
    Thou wast installed high degree.
    Pardon me, princely Henry, rest:
    dastard, battle Patay,
    thousand strong,
    French ten one,
    met stroke given,
    trusty squire run away;
    assault lost twelve hundred men;
    divers gentlemen beside
    surpris'd prisoners.
    judge, great lords, amiss,
    cowards wear
    ornament knighthood-yea no.  
  GLOUCESTER. truth, fact infamous
    ill beseeming common man,
    knight, captain, leader.
  TALBOT. order ordain'd, lords,
    Knights Garter noble birth,
    Valiant virtuous, full haughty courage,
    grown credit wars;
    fearing death shrinking distress,
    resolute extremes.
    furnish'd sort
    Doth usurp sacred knight,
    Profaning honourable order,
    should, worthy judge,
    degraded, hedge-born swain
    doth presume boast gentle blood.
  KING HENRY. Stain thy countrymen, thou hear'st thy
    doom.
    packing, therefore, thou wast knight;
    Henceforth banish thee pain death.
                                                   Exit FASTOLFE  
    now, Lord Protector, view letter
    uncle Duke Burgundy.
  GLOUCESTER.  [Viewing superscription]  means his
    Grace, hath chang'd style?
    plain bluntly 'To King!'
    Hath forgot sovereign?
    doth churlish superscription
    Pretend alteration good-will?
    here?  [Reads]  'I have, especial cause,
    Mov'd compassion country's wreck,
    pitiful complaints
    oppression feeds upon,
    Forsaken pernicious faction,
    join'd Charles, rightful King France.'
    O monstrous treachery! so
    alliance, amity, oaths,
    found false dissembling guile?
  KING HENRY. What! Doth uncle Burgundy revolt?
  GLOUCESTER. doth, lord, foe.
  KING HENRY. worst letter doth contain?  
  GLOUCESTER. worst, all, lord, writes.
  KING HENRY. Lord Talbot talk with
    him
    give chastisement abuse.
    you, lord, content?
  TALBOT. Content, liege! Yes; prevented,
    begg'd employ'd.
  KING HENRY. gather strength march him
    straight;
    perceive ill brook treason.
    offence flout friends.
  TALBOT. go, lord, heart desiring still
    behold confusion foes.                  Exit

                       Enter VERNON BASSET

  VERNON. Grant combat, gracious sovereign.
  BASSET. me, lord, grant combat too.
  YORK. servant: hear him, noble Prince.
  SOMERSET. mine: sweet Henry, favour him.  
  KING HENRY. patient, lords, give leave speak.
    Say, gentlemen, makes exclaim,
    wherefore crave combat, whom?
  VERNON. him, lord; hath wrong.
  BASSET. him; hath wrong.
  KING HENRY. wrong whereof both
    complain? know, answer you.
  BASSET. Crossing sea England France,
    fellow here, envious carping tongue,
    Upbraided rose wear,
    sanguine colour leaves
    represent master's blushing cheeks
    stubbornly repugn truth
    question law
    Argu'd betwixt Duke York him;
    vile ignominious terms
    confutation rude reproach
    defence lord's worthiness,
    crave benefit law arms.
  VERNON. petition, noble lord;  
    forged quaint conceit
    set gloss bold intent,
    know, lord, provok'd him,
    exceptions badge,
    Pronouncing paleness flower
    Bewray'd faintness master's heart.
  YORK. malice, Somerset, left?
  SOMERSET. private grudge, Lord York, out,
    ne'er cunningly smother it.
  KING HENRY. Good Lord, madness rules brainsick
    men, slight frivolous cause
    factious emulations arise!
    Good cousins both, York Somerset,
    Quiet yourselves, pray, peace.
  YORK. dissension fight,
    Highness command peace.
  SOMERSET. quarrel toucheth alone;
    Betwixt decide then.
  YORK. pledge; accept it, Somerset.
  VERNON. Nay, rest began first.  
  BASSET. Confirm so, mine honourable lord.
  GLOUCESTER. Confirm so? Confounded strife;
    perish ye, audacious prate!
    Presumptuous vassals, asham'd
    immodest clamorous outrage
    trouble disturb King us?
    you, lords- methinks well
    bear perverse objections,
    occasion mouths
    raise mutiny betwixt yourselves.
    persuade course.
  EXETER. grieves Highness. Good lords, friends.
  KING HENRY. hither, combatants:
    Henceforth charge you, love favour,
    forget quarrel cause.
    you, lords, remember are:
    France, fickle wavering nation;
    perceive dissension looks
    disagree,
    grudging stomachs provok'd  
    wilful disobedience, rebel!
    Beside, infamy arise
    foreign princes certified
    toy, thing regard,
    King Henry's peers chief nobility
    Destroy'd lost realm France!
    O, conquest father,
    tender years; forgo
    trifle bought blood!
    umpire doubtful strife.
    reason, wear rose,
                                         [Putting red rose]
    suspicious
    incline Somerset York:
    kinsmen, love both.
    upbraid crown,
    Because, forsooth, King Scots crown'd.
    discretions persuade
    instruct teach;
    And, therefore, peace,  
    continue peace love.
    Cousin York, institute Grace
    Regent parts France.
    And, good Lord Somerset, unite
    troops horsemen bands foot;
    true subjects, sons progenitors,
    cheerfully digest
    angry choler enemies.
    Ourself, Lord Protector, rest,
    respite return Calais;
    England, hope ere long
    presented victories
    Charles, Alencon, traitorous rout.
                         Flourish. Exeunt YORK, WARWICK,
                                                  EXETER, VERNON
  WARWICK. Lord York, promise you, King
    Prettily, methought, play orator.
  YORK. did; not,
    wears badge Somerset.
  WARWICK. Tush, fancy; blame not;  
    dare presume, sweet prince, thought harm.
  YORK. wist did-but rest;
    affairs managed.
                                           Exeunt EXETER
  EXETER. didst thou, Richard, suppress thy voice;
    passions thy heart burst out,
    fear decipher'd there
    rancorous spite, furious raging broils,
    imagin'd suppos'd.
    howsoe'er, simple man sees
    jarring discord nobility,
    shouldering court,
    factious bandying favourites,
    doth presage ill event.
    'Tis sceptres children's hands;
    envy breeds unkind division:
    ruin, begins confusion.           Exit




                               SCENE 2.

                        France. Bordeaux

                   Enter TALBOT, trump drum

  TALBOT. gates Bordeaux, trumpeter;
    Summon general wall.

             Trumpet sounds parley. Enter, aloft, the
                 GENERAL FRENCH, others

    English John Talbot, Captains, calls forth,
    Servant arms Harry King England;
    open city gates,
    humble us, call sovereignvours
    homage obedient subjects,
    withdraw bloody power;
    frown proffer'd peace,
    tempt fury attendants,
    Lean famine, quartering steel, climbing fire;
    moment earth  
    lay stately air braving towers,
    forsake offer love.
  GENERAL FRENCH. Thou ominous fearful owl of
    death,
    nation's terror bloody scourge!
    period thy tyranny approacheth.
    thou canst enter death;
    For, protest, fortified,
    strong issue fight.
    thou retire, Dauphin, appointed,
    Stands snares war tangle thee.
    hand thee squadrons pitch'd
    wall thee liberty flight,
    canst thou turn thee redress
    death doth front thee apparent spoil
    pale destruction meets thee face.
    Ten thousand French ta'en sacrament
    rive dangerous artillery
    Christian soul English Talbot.
    Lo, thou stand'st, breathing valiant man,  
    invincible unconquer'd spirit!
    latest glory thy praise
    I, thy enemy, due thee withal;
    ere glass begins run
    Finish process sandy hour,
    eyes thee coloured
    thee withered, bloody, pale, dead.
                                                 [Drum afar off]
    Hark! hark! Dauphin's drum, warning bell,
    Sings heavy music thy timorous soul;
    mine ring thy dire departure out.             Exit
  TALBOT. fables not; hear enemy.
    Out, light horsemen, peruse wings.
    O, negligent heedless discipline!
    park'd bounded pale
    herd England's timorous deer,
    Maz'd yelping kennel French curs!
    English deer, blood;
    rascal-like fall pinch,
    rather, moody-mad desperate stags,  
    Turn bloody hounds heads steel
    make cowards stand aloof bay.
    Sell man life dear mine,
    find dear deer us, friends.
    God Saint George, Talbot England's right,
    Prosper colours dangerous fight!          Exeunt




                          SCENE 3.

                      Plains Gascony

        Enter YORK, trumpet soldiers. A
                   MESSENGER meets him

  YORK. speedy scouts return'd again
    dogg'd mighty army Dauphin?
  MESSENGER. return'd, lord, give out
    march'd Bordeaux power
    fight Talbot; march'd along,
    espials discovered
    mightier troops Dauphin led,
    join'd made march for
    Bordeaux.
  YORK. plague villain Somerset
    delays promised supply
    horsemen levied siege!
    Renowned Talbot doth expect aid,
    louted traitor villain
    noble chevalier.  
    God comfort necessity!
    miscarry, farewell wars France.

                      Enter SIR WILLIAM LUCY

  LUCY. Thou princely leader English strength,
    needful earth France,
    Spur rescue noble Talbot,
    girdled waist iron
    hemm'd grim destruction.
    Bordeaux, warlike Duke! Bordeaux, York!
    Else, farewell Talbot, France, England's honour.
  YORK. O God, Somerset, proud heart
    Doth stop cornets, Talbot's place!
    save valiant gentleman
    forfeiting traitor coward.
    Mad ire wrathful fury makes weep
    die remiss traitors sleep.
  LUCY. O, send succour distress'd lord!
  YORK. dies; lose; break warlike word.  
    mourn: France smiles. lose: daily get-
    long vile traitor Somerset.
  LUCY. God mercy brave Talbot's soul,
    son, young John, hours since
    met travel warlike father.
    years Talbot son;
    meet lives done.
  YORK. Alas, joy noble Talbot have
    bid young son grave?
    Away! vexation stops breath,
    sund'red friends greet hour death.
    Lucy, farewell; fortune can
    curse aid man.
    Maine, Blois, Poictiers, Tours, won away
    Long Somerset delay.         Exit forces
  LUCY. Thus, vulture sedition
    Feeds bosom great commanders,
    Sleeping neglection doth betray loss
    conquest scarce cold conqueror,
    ever-living man memory,  
    Henry Fifth. Whiles cross,
    Lives, honours, lands, all, hurry loss.          Exit




                             SCENE 4.

                     plains Gascony

        Enter SOMERSET, forces; OFFICER of
                     TALBOT'S him

  SOMERSET. late; send now.
    expedition York Talbot
    rashly plotted; general force
    sally town
    buckled with. daring Talbot
    Hath sullied gloss honour
    unheedful, desperate, wild adventure.
    York set fight die shame.
    That, Talbot dead, great York bear name.
  OFFICER. Sir William Lucy, me
    Set o'er-match'd forces aid.

                       Enter SIR WILLIAM LUCY

  SOMERSET. now, Sir William! sent?  
  LUCY. Whither, lord! bought sold Lord
    Talbot,
    Who, ring'd bold adversity,
    Cries noble York Somerset
    beat assailing death weak legions;
    whiles honourable captain there
    Drops bloody sweat war-wearied limbs
    And, advantage ling'ring, rescue,
    You, false hopes, trust England's honour,
    aloof worthless emulation.
    private discord away
    levied succours lend aid,
    he, renowned noble gentleman,
    Yield life world odds.
    Orleans Bastard, Charles, Burgundy,
    Alencon, Reignier, compass about,
    Talbot perisheth default.
  SOMERSET. York set on; York aid.
  LUCY. York fast Grace exclaims,
    Swearing withhold levied host,  
    Collected expedition.
  SOMERSET. York lies; horse.
    owe duty love,
    foul scorn fawn sending.
  LUCY. fraud England, force France,
    Hath entrapp'd noble minded Talbot.
    England bear life,
    dies betray'd fortune strife.
  SOMERSET. Come, go; dispatch horsemen straight;
    hours aid.
  LUCY. late rescue; ta'en slain,
    fly fled;
    fly Talbot never, might.
  SOMERSET. dead, brave Talbot, then, adieu!
  LUCY. fame lives world, shame you.       Exeunt


                               SCENE 5.

                   English camp Bordeaux

                    Enter TALBOT JOHN son

  TALBOT. O young John Talbot! send thee
    tutor thee stratagems war,
    Talbot's thee reviv'd
    sapless age weak unable limbs
    bring thy father drooping chair.
    But, O malignant ill-boding stars!
    thou art feast death,
    terrible unavoided danger;
    Therefore, dear boy, mount swiftest horse,
    direct thee thou shalt escape
    sudden flight. Come, dally not, gone.
  JOHN. Talbot, son?
    fly? O, love mother,
    Dishonour honourable name,
    make bastard slave me!
    world Talbot's blood  
    basely fled noble Talbot stood.
  TALBOT. Fly revenge death, slain.
  JOHN. flies ne'er return again.
  TALBOT. stay, die.
  JOHN. stay; and, father, fly.
    loss great, regard be;
    worth unknown, loss me;
    death French boast;
    will, hopes lost.
    Flight stain honour won;
    mine will, exploit done;
    fled vantage, swear;
    bow, fear.
    hope stay
    hour shrink run away.
    Here, knee, beg mortality,
    life preserv'd infamy.
  TALBOT. thy mother's hopes lie tomb?
  JOHN. Ay, shame mother's womb.
  TALBOT. blessing command thee go.  
  JOHN. fight will, fly foe.
  TALBOT. Part thy father sav'd thee.
  JOHN. part shame me.
  TALBOT. Thou hadst renown, canst lose it.
  JOHN. Yes, renowned name; flight abuse it?
  TALBOT. Thy father's charge clear thee stain.
  JOHN. witness me, slain.
    death apparent, fly.
  TALBOT. leave followers fight die?
    age tainted shame.
  JOHN. youth guilty blame?
    severed side
    twain divide.
    Stay, go, will, I;
    live father die.
  TALBOT. leave thee, fair son,
    Born eclipse thy life afternoon.
    Come, side side live die;
    soul soul France heaven fly.         Exeunt




                             SCENE 6.

                         field battle

         Alarum: excursions JOHN TALBOT hemm'd
                  about, TALBOT rescues him

  TALBOT. Saint George victory! Fight, soldiers, fight.
    Regent hath Talbot broke word
    left rage France sword.
    John Talbot? Pause thy breath;
    gave thee life rescu'd thee death.
  JOHN. O, father, thy son!
    life thou gav'st lost done
    Till thy warlike sword, fate,
    determin'd time thou gav'st date.
  TALBOT. Dauphin's crest thy sword struck
    fire,
    warm'd thy father's heart proud desire
    bold-fac'd victory. leaden age,
    Quicken'd youthful spleen warlike rage,
    Beat Alencon, Orleans, Burgundy,  
    pride Gallia rescued thee.
    ireful bastard Orleans, drew blood
    thee, boy, maidenhood
    thy fight, encountered
    And, interchanging blows, quickly shed
    bastard blood; disgrace
    Bespoke thus: 'Contaminated, base,
    misbegotten blood spill thine,
    poor, pure blood mine
    thou didst force Talbot, brave boy.'
    purposing Bastard destroy,
    strong rescue. Speak, thy father's care;
    Art thou weary, John? dost thou fare?
    Wilt thou leave battle, boy, fly,
    thou art seal'd son chivalry?
    Fly, revenge death dead:
    stands stead.
    O, folly it, wot,
    hazard lives small boat!
    to-day die Frenchmen's rage,  
    To-morrow die mickle age.
    gain stay:
    'Tis short'ning life day.
    thee thy mother dies, household's name,
    death's revenge, thy youth, England's fame.
    hazard thy stay;
    sav'd thou wilt fly away.
  JOHN. sword Orleans hath made smart;
    words draw life-blood heart.
    advantage, bought shame,
    save paltry life slay bright fame,
    young Talbot Talbot fly,
    coward horse bears fall die!
    peasant boys France,
    shame's scorn subject mischance!
    Surely, glory won,
    fly, Talbot's son;
    talk flight, boot;
    son Talbot, die Talbot's foot.
  TALBOT. follow thou thy desp'rate sire Crete,  
    Thou Icarus; thy life sweet.
    thou wilt fight, fight thy father's side;
    And, commendable prov'd, die pride.          Exeunt




                               SCENE 7.

                      part field

       Alarum; excursions. Enter TALBOT led SERVANT

  TALBOT. life? Mine gone.
    O, young Talbot? valiant John?
    Triumphant death, smear'd captivity,
    Young Talbot's valour makes smile thee.
    perceiv'd shrink knee,
    bloody sword brandish'd me,
    hungry lion commence
    Rough deeds rage stern impatience;
    angry guardant stood alone,
    Tend'ring ruin assail'd none,
    Dizzy-ey'd fury great rage heart
    Suddenly made side start
    clust'ring battle French;
    sea blood boy drench
    overmounting spirit; died,
    Icarus, blossom, pride.  

         Enter soldiers, bearing body JOHN TALBOT

  SERVANT. O dear lord, lo son borne!
  TALBOT. Thou antic Death, laugh'st scorn,
    Anon, thy insulting tyranny,
    Coupled bonds perpetuity,
    Talbots, winged lither sky,
    thy scape mortality.
    O thou wounds hard-favoured Death,
    Speak thy father ere thou yield thy breath!
    Brave Death speaking, no;
    Imagine Frenchman thy foe.
    Poor boy! smiles, methinks, say,
    Death French, Death died to-day.
    Come, come, lay father's arms.
    spirit longer bear harms.
    Soldiers, adieu! have,
    arms young John Talbot's grave.        [Dies]
  
            Enter CHARLES, ALENCON, BURGUNDY, BASTARD,
                     LA PUCELLE, forces

  CHARLES. York Somerset brought rescue in,
    found bloody day this.
  BASTARD. young whelp Talbot's, raging wood,
    flesh puny sword Frenchmen's blood!
  PUCELLE. encount'red him, said:
    'Thou maiden youth, vanquish'd maid.'
    proud majestical high scorn
    answer'd thus: 'Young Talbot born
    pillage giglot wench.'
    So, rushing bowels French,
    left proudly, unworthy fight.
  BURGUNDY. Doubtless made noble knight.
    lies inhearsed arms
    bloody nurser harms!
  BASTARD. Hew pieces, hack bones asunder,
    life England's glory, Gallia's wonder.
  CHARLES. O, no; forbear! fled  
    life, wrong dead.

            Enter SIR WILLIAM Lucy, attended; FRENCH
                         HERALD preceding

  LUCY. Herald, conduct Dauphin's tent,
    hath obtain'd glory day.
  CHARLES. submissive message art thou sent?
  LUCY. Submission, Dauphin! 'Tis mere French word:
    English warriors wot means.
    prisoners thou hast ta'en,
    survey bodies dead.
  CHARLES. prisoners ask'st thou? Hell prison is.
    thou seek'st.
  LUCY. great Alcides field,
    Valiant Lord Talbot, Earl Shrewsbury,
    Created rare success arms
    Great Earl Washford, Waterford, Valence,
    Lord Talbot Goodrig Urchinfield,
    Lord Strange Blackmere, Lord Verdun Alton,  
    Lord Cromwell Wingfield, Lord Furnival Sheffield,
    thrice victorious Lord Falconbridge,
    Knight noble order Saint George,
    Worthy Saint Michael, Golden Fleece,
    Great Marshal Henry Sixth
    wars realm France?
  PUCELLE. silly-stately style indeed!
    Turk, fifty kingdoms hath,
    Writes tedious style this.
    thou magnifi'st tides,
    Stinking fly-blown lies feet.
  LUCY. Talbot slain-the Frenchmen's scourge,
    kingdom's terror black Nemesis?
    O, mine eye-bans bullets turn'd,
    rage shoot faces!
    O dead life!
    fright realm France.
    picture left here,
    amaze proudest all.
    Give bodies, bear  
    give burial beseems worth.
  PUCELLE. upstart Talbot's ghost,
    speaks proud commanding spirit.
    God's sake, them; here,
    stink, putrefy air.
  CHARLES. Go, bodies hence.
  LUCY. bear hence; ashes be
    rear'd
    phoenix make France afeard.
  CHARLES. rid them, thou
    wilt.
    Paris conquering vein!
    ours, bloody Talbot's slain.          Exeunt




<<THIS ELECTRONIC VERSION COMPLETE WORKS WILLIAM

ACT V. SCENE 1.

London. palace

Sennet. Enter KING, GLOUCESTER, EXETER

  KING HENRY. perus'd letters Pope,
    Emperor, Earl Armagnac?
  GLOUCESTER. have, lord; intent this:
    humbly sue Excellence
    godly peace concluded of
    realms England France.
  KING HENRY. doth Grace affect motion?
  GLOUCESTER. Well, good lord, means
    stop effusion Christian blood
    stablish quietness side.
  KING HENRY. Ay, marry, uncle; thought
    impious unnatural
    immanity bloody strife
    reign professors faith.
  GLOUCESTER. Beside, lord, sooner effect
    surer bind knot amity,  
    Earl Armagnac, knit Charles,
    man great authority France,
    Proffers daughter Grace
    marriage, large sumptuous dowry.
  KING HENRY. Marriage, uncle! Alas, years young
    fitter study books
    wanton dalliance paramour.
    call th' ambassadors, and, please,
    answers one.
    content choice
    God's glory country's weal.

                   Enter Cardinal's habit
        BEAUFORT, PAPAL LEGATE, AMBASSADORS

  EXETER. What! Lord Winchester install'd
    call'd cardinal's degree?
    perceive verified
    Henry prophesy:
    'If cardinal,  
    make cap co-equal crown.'
  KING HENRY. Lords Ambassadors, suits
    consider'd debated on.
    purpose good reasonable,
    resolv'd
    draw conditions friendly peace,
    Lord Winchester mean
    transported presently France.
  GLOUCESTER. proffer lord master,
    inform'd Highness large,
    As, liking lady's virtuous gifts,
    beauty, dower,
    doth intend England's Queen.
  KING HENRY.  [To AMBASSADOR]  argument proof of
    contract,
    Bear jewel, pledge affection.
    so, Lord Protector, guarded
    safely brought Dover; inshipp'd,
    Commit fortune sea.
  
                        Exeunt WINCHESTER LEGATE
  WINCHESTER. Stay, Lord Legate; receive
    sum money promised
    delivered Holiness
    clothing grave ornaments.
  LEGATE. attend lordship's leisure.
  WINCHESTER.  [Aside]  Winchester submit, I
    trow,
    inferior proudest peer.
    Humphrey Gloucester, thou shalt perceive
    birth authority
    Bishop overborne thee.
    make thee stoop bend thy knee,
    sack country mutiny.                   Exeunt


                              SCENE 2.

                       France. Plains Anjou

              Enter CHARLES, BURGUNDY, ALENCON, BASTARD,
                   REIGNIER, LA PUCELLE, forces

  CHARLES. news, lords, cheer drooping
    spirits:
    'Tis stout Parisians revolt
    turn warlike French.
  ALENCON. march Paris, royal Charles France,
    back powers dalliance.
  PUCELLE. Peace them, turn us;
    ruin combat palaces!

                            Enter SCOUT

  SCOUT. Success valiant general,
    happiness accomplices!
  CHARLES. tidings send scouts? prithee speak.
  SCOUT. English army, divided  
    parties, conjoin'd one,
    means give battle presently.
  CHARLES. sudden, sirs, warning is;
    presently provide them.
  BURGUNDY. trust ghost Talbot there.
    gone, lord, fear.
  PUCELLE. base passions fear accurs'd.
    Command conquest, Charles, thine,
    Henry fret world repine.
  CHARLES. on, lords; France fortunate!
                                                          Exeunt




                            SCENE 3.

                         Angiers

              Alarum, excursions. Enter LA PUCELLE

  PUCELLE. Regent conquers Frenchmen fly.
    help, ye charming spells periapts;
    ye choice spirits admonish me
    give signs future accidents;             [Thunder]
    speedy helpers substitutes
    lordly monarch north,
    aid enterprise!

                          Enter FIENDS

    speedy quick appearance argues proof
    accustom'd diligence me.
    Now, ye familiar spirits cull'd
    powerful regions earth,
    once, France field.
                                       [They walk speak not]  
    O, hold silence over-long!
    wont feed blood,
    lop member give you
    earnest benefit,
    condescend now.
                                         [They hang heads]
    hope redress? body shall
    Pay recompense, grant suit.
                                        [They shake heads]
    body blood sacrifice
    Entreat wonted furtherance?
    soul-my body, soul, all,
    England give French foil.
                                                   [They depart]
    See! forsake me. time come
    France vail lofty-plumed crest
    head fall England's lap.
    ancient incantations weak,
    hell strong buckle with.
    Now, France, thy glory droopeth dust.            Exit  

          Excursions. Enter French English, fighting.
         LA PUCELLE YORK fight hand hand; LA PUCELLE
                    taken. French fly

  YORK. Damsel France, fast.
    Unchain spirits spelling charms,
    gain liberty.
    goodly prize, fit devil's grace!
    ugly witch doth bend brows
    if, Circe, change shape!
  PUCELLE. Chang'd worser shape thou canst be.
  YORK. O, Charles Dauphin proper man:
    shape dainty eye.
  PUCELLE. plaguing mischief fight Charles thee!
    ye suddenly surpris'd
    bloody hands, sleeping beds!
  YORK. Fell banning hag; enchantress, hold thy tongue.
  PUCELLE. prithee give leave curse awhile.
  YORK. Curse, miscreant, thou comest stake.  
                                                          Exeunt

          Alarum. Enter SUFFOLK, MARGARET hand

  SUFFOLK. thou wilt, thou art prisoner.
                                                  [Gazes her]
    O fairest beauty, fear fly!
    touch thee reverent hands;
    kiss fingers eternal peace,
    lay gently thy tender side.
    art thou? Say, honour thee.
  MARGARET. Margaret name, daughter king,
    King Naples-whosoe'er thou art.
  SUFFOLK. earl am, Suffolk call'd.
    offended, nature's miracle,
    Thou art allotted ta'en me.
    doth swan downy cygnets save,
    Keeping prisoner underneath wings.
    Yet, servile usage offend,
    free Suffolk's friend.     [She going]  
    O, stay!  [Aside]  power pass;
    hand free her, heart no.
    plays sun glassy streams,
    Twinkling counterfeited beam,
    gorgeous beauty mine eyes.
    Fain woo her, dare speak.
    call pen ink, write mind.
    Fie, de la Pole! disable thyself;
    Hast tongue? thy prisoner?
    Wilt thou daunted woman's sight?
    Ay, beauty's princely majesty such
    Confounds tongue makes senses rough.
  MARGARET. Say, Earl Suffolk, thy so,
    ransom pay pass?
    perceive thy prisoner.
  SUFFOLK.  [Aside]  canst thou deny thy
    suit,
    thou make trial love?
  MARGARET. speak'st thou not? ransom I
    pay?  
  SUFFOLK.  [Aside]  beautiful, woo'd;
    woman, won.
  MARGARET. Wilt thou accept ransom-yea no?
  SUFFOLK.  [Aside]  Fond man, remember thou hast a
    wife;
    Margaret thy paramour?
  MARGARET. leave him, hear.
  SUFFOLK.  [Aside]  marr'd; lies cooling
    card.
  MARGARET. talks random; sure, man mad.
  SUFFOLK.  [Aside]  dispensation had.
  MARGARET. answer me.
  SUFFOLK.  [Aside]  win Lady Margaret. whom?
    Why, King! Tush, wooden thing!
  MARGARET. talks wood. carpenter.
  SUFFOLK.  [Aside]  fancy satisfied,
    peace established realms.
    remains scruple too;
    father King Naples,
    Duke Anjou Maine, poor,  
    nobility scorn match.
  MARGARET. Hear ye, Captain-are leisure?
  SUFFOLK.  [Aside]  so, disdain ne'er much.
    Henry youthful, quickly yield.
    Madam, secret reveal.
  MARGARET.  [Aside]  enthrall'd? seems
    knight,
    dishonour me.
  SUFFOLK. Lady, vouchsafe listen say.
  MARGARET.  [Aside]  rescu'd French;
    crave courtesy.
  SUFFOLK. Sweet madam, give hearing cause
  MARGARET.  [Aside]  Tush! women captivate ere
    now.
  SUFFOLK. Lady, wherefore talk so?
  MARGARET. cry mercy, 'tis quid quo.
  SUFFOLK. Say, gentle Princess, suppose
    bondage happy, made queen?
  MARGARET. queen bondage vile
    slave base servility;  
    princes free.
  SUFFOLK. you,
    happy England's royal king free.
  MARGARET. Why, concerns freedom me?
  SUFFOLK. undertake make thee Henry's queen,
    put golden sceptre thy hand
    set precious crown thy head,
    thou wilt condescend my-
  MARGARET. What?
  SUFFOLK. love.
  MARGARET. unworthy Henry's wife.
  SUFFOLK. No, gentle madam; unworthy am
    woo fair dame wife
    portion choice myself.
    you, madam? ye content?
  MARGARET. father please, content.
  SUFFOLK. call captains colours forth!
    And, madam, father's castle walls
    crave parley confer him.
  
           Sound parley. Enter REIGNIER walls

    See, Reignier, see, thy daughter prisoner!
  REIGNIER. whom?
  SUFFOLK. me.
  REIGNIER. Suffolk, remedy?
    soldier unapt weep
    exclaim fortune's fickleness.
  SUFFOLK. Yes, remedy enough, lord.
    Consent, thy honour give consent,
    Thy daughter wedded king,
    pain woo'd won thereto;
    easy-held imprisonment
    Hath gain'd thy daughter princely liberty.
  REIGNIER. Speaks Suffolk thinks?
  SUFFOLK. Fair Margaret knows
    Suffolk doth flatter, face, feign.
  REIGNIER. thy princely warrant descend
    give thee answer thy demand.
                                    Exit REIGNIER walls  
  SUFFOLK. expect thy coming.

                Trumpets sound. Enter REIGNIER below

  REIGNIER. Welcome, brave Earl, territories;
    Command Anjou Honour pleases.
  SUFFOLK. Thanks, Reignier, happy sweet child,
    Fit made companion king.
    answer makes Grace suit?
  REIGNIER. thou dost deign woo worth
    princely bride lord,
    condition quietly
    Enjoy mine own, country Maine Anjou,
    Free oppression stroke war,
    daughter Henry's, please.
  SUFFOLK. ransom; deliver her.
    counties undertake
    Grace quietly enjoy.
  REIGNIER. again, Henry's royal name,
    deputy gracious king,  
    Give thee hand sign plighted faith.
  SUFFOLK. Reignier France, give thee kingly thanks,
    traffic king.
    [Aside]  yet, methinks, content
    mine attorney case.
    England news,
    make marriage solemniz'd.
    So, farewell, Reignier. Set diamond safe
    golden palaces, becomes.
  REIGNIER. embrace thee embrace
    Christian prince, King Henry, here.
  MARGARET. Farewell, lord. Good wishes, praise, and
    prayers,
    Suffolk Margaret.          [She going]
  SUFFOLK. Farewell, sweet madam. hark you, Margaret
    princely commendations king?
  MARGARET. commendations maid,
    virgin, servant, him.
  SUFFOLK. Words sweetly plac'd modestly directed.
    But, madam, trouble  
    loving token Majesty?
  MARGARET. Yes, good lord: pure unspotted heart,
    taint love, send King.
  SUFFOLK. withal.                         [Kisses her]
  MARGARET. thyself, presume
    send peevish tokens king.
                                    Exeunt REIGNIER MARGARET
  SUFFOLK. O, wert thou myself! But, Suffolk, stay;
    Thou mayst wander labyrinth:
    Minotaurs ugly treasons lurk.
    Solicit Henry wondrous praise.
    Bethink thee virtues surmount,
    natural graces extinguish art;
    Repeat semblance seas,
    That, thou com'st kneel Henry's feet,
    Thou mayst bereave wits wonder.         Exit




                               SCENE 4.

                  Camp DUKE YORK Anjou

                   Enter YORK, WARWICK, others
  YORK. Bring sorceress, condemn'd burn.

              Enter LA PUCELLE, guarded, SHEPHERD

  SHEPHERD. Ah, Joan, kills thy father's heart outright!
    sought country near,
    And, chance find thee out,
    behold thy timeless cruel death?
    Ah, Joan, sweet daughter Joan, die thee!
  PUCELLE. Decrepit miser! base ignoble wretch!
    descended gentler blood;
    Thou art father friend mine.
  SHEPHERD. Out, out! lords, you, 'tis so;
    beget her, parish knows.
    mother liveth yet, testify
    fruit bach'lorship.
  WARWICK. Graceless, wilt thou deny thy parentage?  
  YORK. argues kind life hath been-
    Wicked vile; death concludes.
  SHEPHERD. Fie, Joan, thou wilt obstacle!
    God thou art collop flesh;
    thy sake shed tear.
    Deny not, prithee, gentle Joan.
  PUCELLE. Peasant, avaunt! suborn'd man
    purpose obscure noble birth.
  SHEPHERD. 'Tis true, gave noble priest
    morn wedded mother.
    Kneel blessing, good girl.
    Wilt thou stoop? cursed time
    thy nativity. milk
    Thy mother gave thee thou suck'dst breast
    ratsbane thy sake.
    else, thou didst lambs afield,
    ravenous wolf eaten thee.
    Dost thou deny thy father, cursed drab?
    O, burn her, burn her! Hanging good.             Exit
  YORK. away; hath liv'd long,  
    fill world vicious qualities.
  PUCELLE. condemn'd:
    begotten shepherd swain,
    issued progeny kings;
    Virtuous holy, chosen above
    inspiration celestial grace,
    work exceeding miracles earth.
    wicked spirits.
    you, polluted lusts,
    Stain'd guiltless blood innocents,
    Corrupt tainted thousand vices,
    grace have,
    judge straight thing impossible
    compass wonders devils.
    No, misconceived! Joan Arc hath been
    virgin tender infancy,
    Chaste immaculate thought;
    maiden blood, rigorously effus'd,
    cry vengeance gates heaven.
  YORK. Ay, ay. execution!  
  WARWICK. hark ye, sirs; maid,
    Spare fagots, enow.
    Place barrels pitch fatal stake,
    torture shortened.
  PUCELLE. turn unrelenting hearts?
    Then, Joan, discover thine infirmity
    warranteth law thy privilege:
    child, ye bloody homicides;
    Murder fruit womb,
    ye hale violent death.
  YORK. heaven forfend! holy maid child!
  WARWICK. greatest miracle e'er ye wrought:
    strict preciseness this?
  YORK. Dauphin juggling.
    imagine refuge.
  WARWICK. Well, to; bastards live;
    Charles father it.
  PUCELLE. deceiv'd; child his:
    Alencon enjoy'd love.
  YORK. Alencon, notorious Machiavel!  
    dies, thousand lives.
  PUCELLE. O, give leave, deluded you.
    'Twas Charles Duke nam'd,
    Reignier, King Naples, prevail'd.
  WARWICK. married man! intolerable.
  YORK. Why, girl! well
    many-whom accuse.
  WARWICK. sign hath liberal free.
  YORK. yet, forsooth, virgin pure.
    Strumpet, thy words condemn thy brat thee.
    entreaty, vain.
  PUCELLE. lead hence-with leave my
    curse:
    glorious sun reflex beams
    country make abode;
    darkness gloomy shade death
    Environ you, till mischief despair
    Drive break necks hang yourselves!
                                                   Exit, guarded
  YORK. Break thou pieces consume ashes,  
    Thou foul accursed minister hell!

               Enter CARDINAL BEAUFORT, attended

  CARDINAL. Lord Regent, greet Excellence
    letters commission King.
    know, lords, states Christendom,
    Mov'd remorse outrageous broils,
    earnestly implor'd general peace
    Betwixt nation aspiring French;
    hand Dauphin train
    Approacheth, confer matter.
  YORK. travail turn'd effect?
    slaughter peers,
    captains, gentlemen, soldiers,
    quarrel overthrown
    sold bodies country's benefit,
    conclude effeminate peace?
    lost part towns,
    treason, falsehood, treachery,  
    great progenitors conquered?
    O Warwick, Warwick! foresee grief
    utter loss realm France.
  WARWICK. patient, York. conclude peace,
    strict severe covenants
    Frenchmen gain thereby.

        Enter CHARLES, ALENCON, BASTARD, REIGNIER, others

  CHARLES. Since, lords England, agreed
    peaceful truce proclaim'd France,
    informed yourselves
    conditions league be.
  YORK. Speak, Winchester; boiling choler chokes
    hollow passage poison'd voice,
    sight baleful enemies.
  CARDINAL. Charles, rest, enacted thus:
    That, regard King Henry consent,
    mere compassion lenity,
    ease country distressful war,  
    suffer breathe fruitful peace,
    true liegemen crown;
    And, Charles, condition thou wilt swear
    pay tribute submit thyself,
    Thou shalt plac'd viceroy him,
    enjoy thy regal dignity.
  ALENCON. shadow himself?
    Adorn temples coronet
    yet, substance authority,
    Retain privilege private man?
    proffer absurd reasonless.
  CHARLES. 'Tis possess'd
    half Gallian territories,
    reverenc'd lawful king.
    I, lucre rest unvanquish'd,
    Detract prerogative
    call'd viceroy whole?
    No, Lord Ambassador; keep
    than, coveting more,
    cast possibility all.  
  YORK. Insulting Charles! Hast thou secret means
    Us'd intercession obtain league,
    matter grows compromise
    Stand'st thou aloof comparison?
    accept title thou usurp'st,
    benefit proceeding king
    challenge desert,
    plague thee incessant wars.
  REIGNIER.  [To CHARLES]  lord, in
    obstinacy
    cavil contract.
    neglected, ten one
    find opportunity.
  ALENCON.  [To CHARLES]  truth, policy
    save subjects massacre
    ruthless slaughters daily seen
    proceeding hostility;
    compact truce,
    break pleasure serves.
  WARWICK. say'st thou, Charles? condition  
    stand?
  CHARLES. shall;
    reserv'd, claim interest
    towns garrison.
  YORK. swear allegiance Majesty:
    thou art knight, disobey
    rebellious crown England
    Thou, thy nobles, crown England.
                    [CHARLES rest give tokens fealty]
    So, dismiss army ye please;
    Hang ensigns, drums still,
    entertain solemn peace.                 Exeunt




                              SCENE 5.

                         London. palace

            Enter SUFFOLK, conference KING,
                     GLOUCESTER EXETER

  KING HENRY. wondrous rare description, noble Earl,
    beauteous Margaret hath astonish'd me.
    virtues, graced external gifts,
    breed love's settled passions heart;
    rigour tempestuous gusts
    Provokes mightiest hulk tide,
    driven breath renown
    suffer shipwreck arrive
    fruition love.
  SUFFOLK. Tush, good lord! superficial tale
    preface worthy praise.
    chief perfections lovely dame,
    sufficient skill utter them,
    make volume enticing lines,
    ravish dull conceit;  
    And, more, divine,
    full-replete choice delights,
    humble lowliness mind
    content command
    Command, mean, virtuous intents,
    love honour Henry lord.
  KING HENRY. Henry ne'er presume.
    Therefore, Lord Protector, give consent
    Margaret England's royal Queen.
  GLOUCESTER. give consent flatter sin.
    know, lord, Highness betroth'd
    lady esteem.
    dispense contract,
    deface honour reproach?
  SUFFOLK. doth ruler unlawful oaths;
    triumph, vow'd
    strength, forsaketh lists
    reason adversary's odds:
    poor earl's daughter unequal odds,
    broke offence.  
  GLOUCESTER. Why, what, pray, Margaret than
    that?
    father earl,
    glorious titles excel.
  SUFFOLK. Yes, lord, father king,
    King Naples Jerusalem;
    great authority France
    alliance confirm peace,
    Frenchmen allegiance.
  GLOUCESTER. Earl Armagnac do,
    kinsman Charles.
  EXETER. Beside, wealth doth warrant liberal dower;
    Reignier sooner receive give.
  SUFFOLK. dow'r, lords! Disgrace king,
    abject, base, poor,
    choose wealth perfect love.
    Henry enrich queen,
    seek queen make rich.
    worthless peasants bargain wives,
    market-men oxen, sheep, horse.  
    Marriage matter worth
    dealt attorneyship;
    will, Grace affects,
    companion nuptial bed.
    therefore, lords, affects most,
    reasons bindeth us
    opinions preferr'd;
    wedlock forced hell,
    age discord continual strife?
    contrary bringeth bliss,
    pattern celestial peace.
    match Henry, king,
    Margaret, daughter king?
    peerless feature, joined birth,
    Approves fit king;
    valiant courage undaunted spirit,
    women commonly seen,
    answer hope issue king;
    Henry, son conqueror,
    beget conquerors,  
    lady high resolve
    fair Margaret link'd love.
    yield, lords; conclude me
    Margaret Queen, she.
  KING HENRY. force report,
    noble Lord Suffolk, that
    tender youth attaint
    passion inflaming love,
    tell; assur'd,
    feel sharp dissension breast,
    fierce alarums hope fear,
    sick working thoughts.
    shipping; post, lord, France;
    Agree covenants; procure
    Lady Margaret vouchsafe come
    cross seas England, crown'd
    King Henry's faithful anointed queen.
    expenses sufficient charge,
    people gather tenth.
    gone, say; till return  
    rest perplexed thousand cares.
    you, good uncle, banish offence:
    censure were,
    are, excuse
    sudden execution will.
    conduct where, company,
    revolve ruminate grief.                    Exit
  GLOUCESTER. Ay, grief, fear me, last.
                                    Exeunt GLOUCESTER EXETER
  SUFFOLK. Suffolk hath prevail'd; goes,
    youthful Paris Greece,
    hope find event love
    prosper Troyan did.
    Margaret Queen, rule King;
    rule her, King, realm.          Exit


THE END

1591

THE PART KING HENRY SIXTH

by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  KING HENRY SIXTH
  HUMPHREY, DUKE GLOUCESTER, uncle
  CARDINAL BEAUFORT, BISHOP WINCHESTER, great-uncle King
  RICHARD PLANTAGENET, DUKE YORK
  EDWARD RICHARD, sons
  DUKE SOMERSET
  DUKE SUFFOLK
  DUKE BUCKINGHAM
  LORD CLIFFORD
  YOUNG CLIFFORD, son
  EARL SALISBURY
  EARL WARWICK
  LORD SCALES
  LORD SAY
  SIR HUMPHREY STAFFORD
  WILLIAM STAFFORD, brother
  SIR JOHN STANLEY
  VAUX
  MATTHEW GOFFE
  LIEUTENANT, SHIPMASTER, MASTER'S MATE, WALTER WHITMORE  
  GENTLEMEN, prisoners Suffolk
  JOHN HUME JOHN SOUTHWELL, priests
  ROGER BOLINGBROKE, conjurer
  SPIRIT raised him
  THOMAS HORNER, armourer
  PETER, man
  CLERK CHATHAM
  MAYOR SAINT ALBANS
  SAUNDER SIMPCOX, impostor
  ALEXANDER IDEN, Kentish gentleman
  JACK CADE, rebel
  GEORGE BEVIS, JOHN HOLLAND, DICK BUTCHER, SMITH WEAVER,
    MICHAEL, &c., followers Cade
  MURDERERS

  MARGARET, Queen King Henry
  ELEANOR, Duchess Gloucester
  MARGERY JOURDAIN, witch
  WIFE SIMPCOX
  
  Lords, Ladies, Attendants; Petitioners, Aldermen, Herald,
    Beadle, Sheriff, Officers, Citizens, Prentices, Falconers,
    Guards, Soldiers, Messengers, &c.
