SCENE:
England


ACT I. SCENE I.
London. palace

Flourish trumpets; hautboys. Enter KING, DUKE HUMPHREY
OF GLOUCESTER, SALISBURY, WARWICK, CARDINAL BEAUFORT, side;
the QUEEN, SUFFOLK, YORK, SOMERSET, BUCKINGHAM, other

  SUFFOLK. high imperial Majesty
    charge depart France,
    procurator Excellence,
    marry Princess Margaret Grace;
    So, famous ancient city Tours,
    presence Kings France Sicil,
    Dukes Orleans, Calaber, Bretagne, Alencon,
    earls, twelve barons, twenty reverend bishops,
    perform'd task, espous'd;
    humbly bended knee,
    sight England lordly peers,
    Deliver title Queen
    gracious hands, substance
    great shadow represent:  
    happiest gift marquis gave,
    fairest queen king receiv'd.
  KING HENRY. Suffolk, arise. Welcome, Queen Margaret:
    express kinder sign love
    kind kiss. O Lord, lends life,
    Lend heart replete thankfulness!
    thou hast beauteous face
    world earthly blessings soul,
    sympathy love unite thoughts.
  QUEEN. Great King England, gracious lord,
    mutual conference mind hath had,
    day, night, waking dreams,
    courtly company beads,
    you, mine alder-liefest sovereign,
    Makes bolder salute king
    ruder terms, wit affords
    over-joy heart doth minister.
  KING HENRY. sight ravish, grace speech,
    words y-clad wisdom's majesty,
    Makes wond'ring fall weeping joys,  
    fulness heart's content.
    Lords, cheerful voice love.
  ALL. [Kneeling] Long live Queen Margaret, England's happiness!
  QUEEN. all.                            [Flourish]
  SUFFOLK. Lord Protector, Grace,
    articles contracted peace
    sovereign French King Charles,
    eighteen months concluded consent.
  GLOUCESTER. [Reads] 'Imprimis: agreed French King
    Charles William de la Pole, Marquess Suffolk, ambassador
    Henry King England, Henry espouse the
    Lady Margaret, daughter Reignier King Naples, Sicilia,
    Jerusalem, crown Queen England ere thirtieth
    ensuing.
      Item: duchy Anjou county Maine be
    released delivered King father'-
                                           [Lets paper fall]
  KING HENRY. Uncle, now!
  GLOUCESTER. Pardon me, gracious lord;
    sudden qualm hath struck heart,  
    dimm'd mine eyes, read further.
  KING HENRY. Uncle Winchester, pray read on.
  CARDINAL. [Reads] 'Item: agreed the
    duchies Anjou Maine released delivered over
    King father, King of
    England's proper cost charges, dowry.'
  KING HENRY. well. Lord Marquess, kneel down.
    create thee Duke Suffolk,
    girt thee sword. Cousin York,
    discharge Grace Regent
    I' th' parts France, till term eighteen months
    full expir'd. Thanks, uncle Winchester,
    Gloucester, York, Buckingham, Somerset,
    Salisbury, Warwick;
    great favour done
    entertainment princely queen.
    Come, in, speed provide
    coronation perform'd.
                                 Exeunt KING, QUEEN, SUFFOLK
  GLOUCESTER. Brave peers England, pillars state,  
    Duke Humphrey unload grief
    grief, common grief land.
    What! brother Henry spend youth,
    valour, coin, people, wars?
    lodge open field,
    winter's cold summer's parching heat,
    conquer France, true inheritance?
    brother Bedford toil wits
    policy Henry got?
    yourselves, Somerset, Buckingham,
    Brave York, Salisbury, victorious Warwick,
    Receiv'd deep scars France Normandy?
    hath mine uncle Beaufort myself,
    learned Council realm,
    Studied long, sat Council House
    Early late, debating fro
    France Frenchmen awe?
    Highness infancy
    Crowned Paris, foes?
    labours honours die?  
    Henry's conquest, Bedford's vigilance,
    deeds war, counsel die?
    O peers England, shameful league!
    Fatal marriage, cancelling fame,
    Blotting names books memory,
    Razing characters renown,
    Defacing monuments conquer'd France,
    Undoing all, been!
  CARDINAL. Nephew, means passionate discourse,
    peroration circumstance?
    France, 'tis ours; still.
  GLOUCESTER. Ay, uncle, can;
    impossible should.
    Suffolk, new-made duke rules roast,
    Hath duchy Anjou Maine
    poor King Reignier, large style
    Agrees leanness purse.
  SALISBURY. Now, death died all,
    counties keys Normandy!
    wherefore weeps Warwick, valiant son?  
  WARWICK. grief past recovery;
    hope conquer again
    sword shed hot blood, mine eyes tears.
    Anjou Maine! win both;
    provinces arms mine conquer;
    cities wounds
    Deliver'd peaceful words?
    Mort Dieu!
  YORK. Suffolk's duke, suffocate,
    dims honour warlike isle!
    France torn rent heart
    yielded league.
    read England's kings had
    Large sums gold dowries wives;
    King Henry own
    match brings vantages.
  GLOUCESTER. proper jest, heard before,
    Suffolk demand fifteenth
    costs charges transporting her!
    stay'd France, starv'd France,  
    Before-
  CARDINAL. Lord Gloucester, ye grow hot:
    pleasure lord King.
  GLOUCESTER. Lord Winchester, mind;
    'Tis speeches mislike,
    'tis presence doth trouble ye.
    Rancour out: proud prelate, thy face
    thy fury; longer stay
    begin ancient bickerings.
    Lordings, farewell; say, gone,
    prophesied France lost ere long.              Exit
  CARDINAL. So, Protector rage.
    'Tis mine enemy;
    Nay, more, enemy all,
    great friend, fear me, King.
    Consider, lords, blood
    heir apparent English crown.
    Henry empire marriage
    wealthy kingdoms west,
    reason displeas'd it.  
    it, lords; smoothing words
    Bewitch hearts; wise circumspect.
    common people favour him,
    Calling 'Humphrey, good Duke Gloucester,'
    Clapping hands, crying loud voice
    'Jesu maintain royal excellence!'
    'God preserve good Duke Humphrey!'
    fear me, lords, flattering gloss,
    found dangerous Protector.
  BUCKINGHAM. protect sovereign,
    age govern himself?
    Cousin Somerset, join me,
    together, Duke Suffolk,
    quickly hoise Duke Humphrey seat.
  CARDINAL. weighty business brook delay;
    Duke Suffolk presently.                  Exit
  SOMERSET. Cousin Buckingham, Humphrey's pride
    greatness place grief us,
    watch haughty cardinal;
    insolence intolerable  
    princes land beside;
    Gloucester displac'd, Protector.
  BUCKINGHAM. thou I, Somerset, Protector,
    Duke Humphrey Cardinal.
                                  Exeunt BUCKINGHAM SOMERSET
  SALISBURY. Pride before, ambition him.
    labour preferment,
    Behoves labour realm.
    Humphrey Duke Gloucester
    bear noble gentleman.
    Oft haughty Cardinal-
    soldier man o' th' church,
    stout proud lord all-
    Swear ruffian demean himself
    Unlike ruler commonweal.
    Warwick son, comfort age,
    Thy deeds, thy plainness, thy housekeeping,
    Hath won greatest favour commons,
    Excepting good Duke Humphrey.
    And, brother York, thy acts Ireland,  
    bringing civil discipline,
    Thy late exploits heart France
    thou wert Regent sovereign,
    made thee fear'd honour'd people:
    Join public good,
    can, bridle suppress
    pride Suffolk Cardinal,
    Somerset's Buckingham's ambition;
    And, may, cherish Duke Humphrey's deeds
    tend profit land.
  WARWICK. God Warwick, loves land
    common profit country!
  YORK. York- [Aside] hath greatest cause.
  SALISBURY. make haste main.
  WARWICK. main! O father, Maine lost-
    Maine main force Warwick win,
    long breath last.
    Main chance, father, meant; meant Maine,
    win France, slain.
                                    Exeunt WARWICK SALISBURY  
  YORK. Anjou Maine French;
    Paris lost; state Normandy
    Stands tickle point gone.
    Suffolk concluded articles;
    peers agreed; Henry pleas'd
    dukedoms duke's fair daughter.
    blame all: is't them?
    'Tis thine give away, own.
    Pirates make cheap pennyworths pillage,
    purchase friends, give courtezans,
    revelling lords till gone;
    silly owner goods
    Weeps wrings hapless hands
    shakes head trembling stands aloof,
    shar'd borne away,
    Ready starve dare touch own.
    York sit fret bite tongue,
    lands bargain'd sold.
    Methinks realms England, France, Ireland,
    Bear proportion flesh blood  
    fatal brand Althaea burnt
    prince's heart Calydon.
    Anjou Maine French!
    Cold news me, hope France,
    fertile England's soil.
    day York claim own;
    Nevils' parts,
    make show love proud Duke Humphrey,
    spy advantage, claim crown,
    golden mark seek hit.
    proud Lancaster usurp right,
    hold sceptre childish fist,
    wear diadem head,
    church-like humours fits crown.
    Then, York, awhile, till time serve;
    Watch thou wake, asleep,
    pry secrets state;
    Till Henry, surfeiting joys love
    bride England's dear-bought queen,
    Humphrey peers fall'n jars;  
    raise aloft milk-white rose,
    sweet smell air perfum'd,
    standard bear arms York,
    grapple house Lancaster;
    force perforce make yield crown,
    bookish rule hath pull'd fair England down.       Exit




SCENE II.
The DUKE GLOUCESTER'S house

Enter DUKE wife ELEANOR

  DUCHESS. droops lord, over-ripen'd corn
    Hanging head Ceres' plenteous load?
    doth great Duke Humphrey knit brows,
    frowning favours world?
    thine eyes fix'd sullen earth,
    Gazing dim thy sight?
    see'st thou there? King Henry's diadem,
    Enchas'd honours world?
    so, gaze on, grovel thy face
    thy head circled same.
    Put thy hand, reach glorious gold.
    What, is't short? lengthen mine;
    heav'd up,
    lift heads heaven,
    abase sight low
    vouchsafe glance ground.
  GLOUCESTER. O Nell, sweet Nell, thou dost love thy lord,  
    Banish canker ambitious thoughts!
    thought, imagine ill
    king nephew, virtuous Henry,
    breathing mortal world!
    troublous dreams night doth make sad.
  DUCHESS. dream'd lord? me, requite it
    sweet rehearsal morning's dream.
  GLOUCESTER. Methought staff, mine office-badge court,
    broke twain; forgot,
    But, think, th' Cardinal;
    pieces broken wand
    plac'd heads Edmund Duke Somerset
    William de la Pole, Duke Suffolk.
    dream; doth bode God knows.
  DUCHESS. Tut, argument
    breaks stick Gloucester's grove
    lose head presumption.
    list me, Humphrey, sweet Duke:
    Methought sat seat majesty
    cathedral church Westminster,  
    chair kings queens crown'd;
    Henry Dame Margaret kneel'd me,
    head set diadem.
  GLOUCESTER. Nay, Eleanor, chide outright.
    Presumptuous dame, ill-nurtur'd Eleanor!
    Art thou woman realm,
    Protector's wife, belov'd him?
    Hast thou worldly pleasure command
    reach compass thy thought?
    wilt thou hammering treachery
    tumble thy husband thyself
    top honour disgrace's feet?
    me, hear more!
  DUCHESS. What, what, lord! choleric
    Eleanor telling dream?
    time dreams myself
    check'd.
  GLOUCESTER. Nay, angry; pleas'd again.

                       Enter MESSENGER  

  MESSENGER. Lord Protector, 'tis Highness' pleasure
    prepare ride Saint Albans,
    King Queen hawk.
  GLOUCESTER. go. Come, Nell, thou wilt ride us?
  DUCHESS. Yes, good lord, follow presently.
                                 Exeunt GLOUCESTER MESSENGER
    Follow must; before,
    Gloucester bears base humble mind.
    man, duke, blood,
    remove tedious stumbling-blocks
    smooth headless necks;
    And, woman, slack
    play part Fortune's pageant.
    there, Sir John? Nay, fear not, man,
    alone; thee I.

                           Enter HUME

  HUME. Jesus preserve royal Majesty!  
  DUCHESS. say'st thou? Majesty! Grace.
  HUME. But, grace God Hume's advice,
    Grace's title multiplied.
  DUCHESS. say'st thou, man? Hast thou conferr'd
    Margery Jourdain, cunning witch Eie,
    Roger Bolingbroke, conjurer?
    undertake good?
  HUME. promised, show Highness
    spirit rais'd depth underground
    make answer questions
    Grace propounded him
  DUCHESS. enough; questions;
    Saint Albans make return
    things effected full.
    Here, Hume, reward; make merry, man,
    thy confederates weighty cause.            Exit
  HUME. Hume make merry Duchess' gold;
    Marry, shall. But, now, Sir John Hume!
    Seal lips give words mum:
    business asketh silent secrecy.  
    Dame Eleanor gold bring witch:
    Gold amiss devil.
    gold flies coast-
    dare rich Cardinal,
    great new-made Duke Suffolk;
    find so; for, plain,
    They, knowing Dame Eleanor's aspiring humour,
    hired undermine Duchess,
    buzz conjurations brain.
    'A crafty knave broker';
    Suffolk Cardinal's broker.
    Hume, heed, near
    call pair crafty knaves.
    Well, stands; thus, fear, last
    Hume's knavery Duchess' wreck,
    attainture Humphrey's fall
    Sort will, gold all.            Exit




SCENE III.
London. palace

Enter PETITIONERS, PETER, Armourer's man, one

  PETITIONER. masters, stand close; Lord Protector
    by, deliver our
    supplications quill.
  PETITIONER. Marry, Lord protect him, good
    man, Jesu bless him!

                       Enter SUFFOLK QUEEN

  PETITIONER. 'a comes, methinks, Queen him.
    first, sure.
  PETITIONER. back, fool; Duke Suffolk and
    Lord Protector.
  SUFFOLK. now, fellow! Wouldst me?
  PETITIONER. pray, lord, pardon me; ye Lord
    Protector.
  QUEEN. [Reads] 'To Lord Protector!' supplications  
    lordship? them. thine?
  PETITIONER. Mine is, an't Grace, John
    Goodman, Lord Cardinal's man, keeping house lands,
    wife all, me.
  SUFFOLK. Thy wife too! wrong indeed. yours?
    here! [Reads] 'Against Duke Suffolk, enclosing
    commons Melford.' now, sir knave!
  PETITIONER. Alas, sir, poor petitioner our
    township.
  PETER. [Presenting petition] master, Thomas Horner,
    Duke York rightful heir crown.
  QUEEN. say'st thou? Duke York rightful
    heir crown?
  PETER. master was? No, forsooth. master he
    was, King usurper.
  SUFFOLK. there? [Enter servant] fellow in, and
    send master pursuivant presently. hear more
    matter King.
                                         Exit servant PETER
  QUEEN. you, love protected  
    wings Protector's grace,
    Begin suits anew, sue him.
                                       [Tears supplications]
    Away, base cullions! Suffolk, go.
  ALL. Come, gone.                               Exeunt
  QUEEN. Lord Suffolk, say, guise,
    fashions court England?
    government Britain's isle,
    royalty Albion's king?
    What, King Henry pupil still,
    surly Gloucester's governance?
    queen title style,
    made subject duke?
    thee, Pole, city Tours
    Thou ran'st tilt honour love
    stol'st ladies' hearts France,
    thought King Henry resembled thee
    courage, courtship, proportion;
    mind bent holiness,
    number Ave-Maries beads;  
    champions prophets apostles;
    weapons, holy saws sacred writ;
    study tilt-yard, loves
    brazen images canonized saints.
    college Cardinals
    choose Pope, carry Rome,
    set triple crown head;
    state fit holiness.
  SUFFOLK. Madam, patient. cause
    Highness England, I
    England work Grace's full content.
  QUEEN. haughty Protector, Beaufort
    imperious churchman; Somerset, Buckingham,
    grumbling York; these
    England King.
  SUFFOLK. all
    England Nevils;
    Salisbury Warwick simple peers.
  QUEEN. lords vex half much
    proud dame, Lord Protector's wife.  
    sweeps court troops ladies,
    empress Duke Humphrey's wife.
    Strangers court Queen.
    bears duke's revenues back,
    heart scorns poverty;
    live aveng'd her?
    Contemptuous base-born callet is,
    vaunted 'mongst minions t' day
    train worst wearing gown
    worth father's lands,
    Till Suffolk gave dukedoms daughter.
  SUFFOLK. Madam, lim'd bush her,
    plac'd quire enticing birds
    light listen lays,
    mount trouble again.
    So, rest. And, madam, list me,
    bold counsel this:
    fancy Cardinal,
    join lords,
    Till brought Duke Humphrey disgrace.  
    Duke York, late complaint
    make benefit.
    weed last,
    steer happy helm.

          Sound sennet. Enter KING, DUKE HUMPHREY,
     CARDINAL BEAUFORT, BUCKINGHAM, YORK, SOMERSET, SALISBURY,
              WARWICK, DUCHESS GLOUCESTER

  KING HENRY. part, noble lords, care which:
    Somerset York, all's me.
  YORK. York ill demean'd France,
    denay'd regentship.
  SOMERSET. Somerset unworthy place,
    York Regent; yield him.
  WARWICK. Grace worthy, yea no,
    Dispute that; York worthier.
  CARDINAL. Ambitious Warwick, thy betters speak.
  WARWICK. Cardinal's field.
  BUCKINGHAM. presence thy betters, Warwick.  
  WARWICK. Warwick live all.
  SALISBURY. Peace, son! show reason, Buckingham,
    Somerset preferr'd this.
  QUEEN. King, forsooth, so.
  GLOUCESTER. Madam, King himself
    give censure. women's matters.
  QUEEN. enough, Grace
    Protector Excellence?
  GLOUCESTER. Madam, Protector realm;
    pleasure resign place.
  SUFFOLK. Resign then, leave thine insolence.
    thou wert king- king thou?-
    commonwealth hath daily run wrack,
    Dauphin hath prevail'd seas,
    peers nobles realm
    bondmen thy sovereignty.
  CARDINAL. commons hast thou rack'd; clergy's bags
    lank lean thy extortions.
  SOMERSET. Thy sumptuous buildings thy wife's attire
    cost mass public treasury.  
  BUCKINGHAM. Thy cruelty execution
    offenders hath exceeded law,
    left thee mercy law.
  QUEEN. Thy sale offices towns France,
    known, suspect great,
    make thee quickly hop thy head.
                  Exit GLOUCESTER. QUEEN drops QUEEN fan
    Give fan. What, minion, ye not?
                        [She DUCHESS box ear]
    cry mercy, madam; you?
  DUCHESS. Was't I? Yea, was, proud Frenchwoman.
    beauty nails,
    set ten commandments face.
  KING HENRY. Sweet aunt, quiet; 'twas will.
  DUCHESS. will, good King? 't time;
    hamper thee dandle thee baby.
    place master wear breeches,
    strike Dame Eleanor unreveng'd.           Exit
  BUCKINGHAM. Lord Cardinal, follow Eleanor,
    listen Humphrey, proceeds.  
    tickled now; fume spurs,
    gallop destruction.            Exit

                      Re-enter GLOUCESTER

  GLOUCESTER. Now, lords, choler overblown
    walking quadrangle,
    talk commonwealth affairs.
    spiteful false objections,
    Prove them, lie open law;
    God mercy deal soul
    duty love king country!
    matter hand:
    say, sovereign, York meetest man
    Regent realm France.
  SUFFOLK. make election, give leave
    show reason, force,
    York unmeet man.
  YORK. thee, Suffolk, unmeet:
    First, flatter thee pride;  
    Next, appointed place,
    Lord Somerset here
    discharge, money, furniture,
    Till France won Dauphin's hands.
    time danc'd attendance will
    Till Paris besieg'd, famish'd, lost.
  WARWICK. witness; fouler fact
    traitor land commit.
  SUFFOLK. Peace, headstrong Warwick!
  WARWICK. Image pride, hold peace?

        Enter HORNER, Armourer, man PETER, guarded

  SUFFOLK. man accus'd treason:
    Pray God Duke York excuse himself!
  YORK. Doth accuse York traitor?
  KING HENRY. mean'st thou, Suffolk? me, these?
  SUFFOLK. Majesty, man
    doth accuse master high treason;
    words these: Richard Duke York  
    rightful heir English crown,
    Majesty usurper.
  KING HENRY. Say, man, thy words?
  HORNER. An't Majesty, thought
    matter. God witness, falsely accus'd the
    villain.
  PETER. [Holding hands] ten bones, lords, did
    speak garret night, scouring my
    Lord York's armour.
  YORK. Base dunghill villain mechanical,
    thy head thy traitor's speech.
    beseech royal Majesty,
    rigour law.
  HORNER`. Alas, lord, hang spake words. My
    accuser prentice; correct fault
    day, vow knees with
    me. good witness this; beseech your
    Majesty, cast honest man villain's
    accusation.
  KING HENRY. Uncle, law?  
  GLOUCESTER. doom, lord, judge:
    Somerset Regent o'er French,
    York breeds suspicion;
    day appointed them
    single combat convenient place,
    hath witness servant's malice.
    law, Duke Humphrey's doom.
  SOMERSET. humbly royal Majesty.
  HORNER. accept combat willingly.
  PETER. Alas, lord, fight; God's sake, pity case!
    spite man prevaileth me. O Lord, mercy upon
    me, fight blow! O Lord, heart!
  GLOUCESTER. Sirrah, fight hang'd.
  KING HENRY. prison; day combat shall
    month.
    Come, Somerset, thee away.   Flourish. Exeunt




SCENE IV.
London. DUKE GLOUCESTER'S garden

Enter MARGERY JOURDAIN, witch; priests, HUME SOUTHWELL;
and BOLINGBROKE

  HUME. Come, masters; Duchess, you, expects
    performance promises.
  BOLINGBROKE. Master Hume, provided; her
    ladyship behold hear exorcisms?
  HUME. Ay, else? Fear courage.
  BOLINGBROKE. heard reported woman an
    invincible spirit; convenient, Master Hume, that
    aloft busy below; pray go,
    God's name, leave us. [Exit HUME] Mother Jourdain, you
    prostrate grovel earth; John Southwell, read you; and
    work.

                 Enter DUCHESS aloft, HUME

  DUCHESS. said, masters; all. gear, the
    sooner better.  
  BOLINGBROKE. Patience, good lady; wizards times:
    Deep night, dark night, silent night,
    time night Troy set fire;
    time screech-owls cry ban-dogs howl,
    spirits walk ghosts break graves-
    time fits work hand.
    Madam, sit you, fear not: raise
    make fast hallow'd verge.

     [Here ceremonies belonging, make circle;
          BOLINGBROKE SOUTHWELL reads: 'Conjuro te,' &c.
     thunders lightens terribly; SPIRIT riseth]

  SPIRIT. Adsum.
  MARGERY JOURDAIN. Asmath,
    eternal God, power
    Thou tremblest at, answer ask;
    till thou speak thou shalt pass hence.
  SPIRIT. thou wilt; done.
  BOLINGBROKE. [Reads] 'First king: become?'  
  SPIRIT. Duke lives Henry depose;
    outlive, die violent death.
             [As SPIRIT speaks, SOUTHWELL writes answer]
  BOLINGBROKE. 'What fates await Duke Suffolk?'
  SPIRIT. water die end.
  BOLINGBROKE. 'What befall Duke Somerset?'
  SPIRIT. shun castles:
    Safer sandy plains
    castles mounted stand.
    done, endure.
  BOLINGBROKE. Descend darkness burning lake;
    False fiend, avoid!       Thunder lightning. Exit SPIRIT

               Enter DUKE YORK DUKE OF
                 BUCKINGHAM guard, break in

  YORK. Lay hands traitors trash.
    Beldam, watch'd inch.
    What, madam, there? King commonweal
    deeply indebted piece pains;  
    Lord Protector will, doubt not,
    guerdon'd good deserts.
  DUCHESS. half bad thine England's king,
    Injurious Duke, threatest cause.
  BUCKINGHAM. True, madam, all. this?
    them! clapp'd close,
    asunder. You, madam, us.
    Stafford, thee.
    trinkets forthcoming.
    All, away!
                Exeunt, above, DUCHESS HUME, guarded; below,
                       WITCH, SOUTHWELL BOLINGBROKE, guarded
  YORK. Lord Buckingham, methinks watch'd well.
    pretty plot, chosen build upon!
    Now, pray, lord, devil's writ.
    here?                                   [Reads]
    'The duke lives Henry depose;
    outlive, die violent death.'
    Why, just
    'Aio te, Aeacida, Romanos vincere posse.'  
    Well, rest:
    'Tell fate awaits Duke Suffolk?'
    'By water die end.'
    'What betide Duke Somerset?'
    'Let shun castles;
    Safer sandy plains
    castles mounted stand.'
    Come, come, lords;
    oracles attain'd,
    understood.
    King progress Saint Albans,
    husband lovely lady;
    Thither news fast horse carry them-
    breakfast Lord Protector.
  BUCKINGHAM. Grace give leave, Lord York,
    post, hope reward.
  YORK. pleasure, good lord.
    there, ho?

                       Enter serving-man  

    Invite Lords Salisbury Warwick
    to-morrow night. Away!                 Exeunt

ACT II. SCENE I.
Saint Albans

Enter KING, QUEEN, GLOUCESTER, CARDINAL, SUFFOLK,
with Falconers halloing

  QUEEN. me, lords, flying brook,
    sport years' day;
    Yet, leave, wind high,
    ten Joan out.
  KING HENRY. point, lord, falcon made,
    pitch flew rest!
    God creatures works!
    Yea, man birds fain climbing high.
  SUFFOLK. marvel, Majesty,
    Lord Protector's hawks tow'r well;
    master loves aloft,
    bears thoughts falcon's pitch.
  GLOUCESTER. lord, 'tis base ignoble mind
    mounts higher bird soar.
  CARDINAL. thought much; clouds.
  GLOUCESTER. Ay, lord Cardinal, that?  
    good Grace fly heaven?
  KING HENRY. treasury everlasting joy!
  CARDINAL. Thy heaven earth; thine eyes thoughts
    Beat crown, treasure thy heart;
    Pernicious Protector, dangerous peer,
    smooth'st King commonweal.
  GLOUCESTER. What, Cardinal, priesthood grown peremptory?
    Tantaene animis coelestibus irae?
    Churchmen hot? Good uncle, hide malice;
    holiness it?
  SUFFOLK. malice, sir; becomes
    good quarrel bad peer.
  GLOUCESTER. who, lord?
  SUFFOLK. Why, you, lord,
    An't lordly Lord's Protectorship.
  GLOUCESTER. Why, Suffolk, England thine insolence.
  QUEEN. thy ambition, Gloucester.
  KING HENRY. prithee, peace,
    Good Queen, whet furious peers;
    blessed peacemakers earth.  
  CARDINAL. blessed peace make
    proud Protector sword!
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside CARDINAL] Faith, holy uncle, 'twere
    that!
  CARDINAL. [Aside GLOUCESTER] Marry, thou dar'st.
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside CARDINAL] Make factious numbers the
      matter;
    thine person answer thy abuse.
  CARDINAL. [Aside GLOUCESTER] Ay, thou dar'st peep; an
      thou dar'st,
    evening east side grove.
  KING HENRY. now, lords!
  CARDINAL. me, cousin Gloucester,
    man put fowl suddenly,
    sport. [Aside GLOUCESTER] thy
      two-hand sword.
  GLOUCESTER. True, uncle.
  CARDINAL. [Aside GLOUCESTER] ye advis'd? east side of
    grove?
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside CARDINAL] Cardinal, you.  
  KING HENRY. Why, now, uncle Gloucester!
  GLOUCESTER. Talking hawking; else, lord.
    [Aside CARDINAL] Now, God's Mother, priest,
    shave crown this,
    fence fail.
  CARDINAL. [Aside GLOUCESTER] Medice, teipsum;
    Protector, to't well; protect yourself.
  KING HENRY. winds grow high; stomachs, lords.
    irksome music heart!
    strings jar, hope harmony?
    pray, lords, compound strife.

         Enter TOWNSMAN Saint Albans, crying 'A miracle!'

  GLOUCESTER. means noise?
    Fellow, miracle dost thou proclaim?
  TOWNSMAN. miracle! miracle!
  SUFFOLK. King, miracle.
  TOWNSMAN. Forsooth, blind man Saint Albans shrine
    half hour hath receiv'd sight;  
    man ne'er life before.
  KING HENRY. God prais'd believing souls
    light darkness, comfort despair!

           Enter MAYOR SAINT ALBANS brethren,
               bearing Simpcox chair;
                 WIFE multitude following

  CARDINAL. townsmen procession
    present Highness man.
  KING HENRY. Great comfort earthly vale,
    sight sin multiplied.
  GLOUCESTER. Stand by, masters; bring King;
    Highness' pleasure talk him.
  KING HENRY. Good fellow, circumstance,
    thee glorify Lord.
    What, hast thou long blind restor'd?
  SIMPCOX. Born blind, an't Grace.
  WIFE. Ay he.
  SUFFOLK. woman this?  
  WIFE. wife, an't worship.
  GLOUCESTER. Hadst thou mother, thou couldst better
    told.
  KING HENRY. wert thou born?
  SIMPCOX. Berwick north, an't Grace.
  KING HENRY. Poor soul, God's goodness hath great thee.
    day night unhallowed pass,
    remember Lord hath done.
  QUEEN. me, good fellow, cam'st thou chance,
    devotion, holy shrine?
  SIMPCOX. God knows, pure devotion; call'd
    hundred times oft'ner, sleep,
    good Saint Alban, 'Simpcox, come,
    Come, offer shrine, thee.'
  WIFE. true, forsooth; time oft
    heard voice call so.
  CARDINAL. What, art thou lame?
  SIMPCOX. Ay, God Almighty me!
  SUFFOLK. cam'st thou so?
  SIMPCOX. fall tree.  
  WIFE. plum tree, master.
  GLOUCESTER. long hast thou blind?
  SIMPCOX. O, born so, master!
  GLOUCESTER. What, wouldst climb tree?
  SIMPCOX. life, youth.
  WIFE. true; bought climbing dear.
  GLOUCESTER. Mass, thou lov'dst plums well, wouldst venture so.
  SIMPCOX. Alas, good master, wife desir'd damsons
    made climb, danger life.
  GLOUCESTER. subtle knave! serve:
    thine eyes; wink now; open them;
    opinion thou seest well.
  SIMPCOX. Yes, master, clear day, God Saint Alban.
  GLOUCESTER. Say'st thou so? colour cloak of?
  SIMPCOX. Red, master; red blood.
  GLOUCESTER. Why, said. colour gown of?
  SIMPCOX. Black, forsooth; coal-black jet.
  KING HENRY. Why, then, thou know'st colour jet of?
  SUFFOLK. yet, think, jet see.
  GLOUCESTER. cloaks gowns day many.  
  WIFE. day life.
  GLOUCESTER. me, sirrah, name?
  SIMPCOX. Alas, master, not.
  GLOUCESTER. name?
  SIMPCOX. not.
  GLOUCESTER. his?
  SIMPCOX. No, indeed, master.
  GLOUCESTER. thine name?
  SIMPCOX. Saunder Simpcox, you, master.
  GLOUCESTER. Then, Saunder, sit there, lying'st knave in
    Christendom. thou hadst born blind, thou mightst well
    names colours we
    wear. Sight distinguish colours; suddenly to
    nominate all, impossible. lords, Saint Alban here
    hath miracle; ye cunning be
    great restore cripple legs again?
  SIMPCOX. O master, could!
  GLOUCESTER. masters Saint Albans, beadles in
    town, things call'd whips?
  MAYOR. Yes, lord, Grace.  
  GLOUCESTER. send presently.
  MAYOR. Sirrah, fetch beadle straight.
                                               Exit attendant
  GLOUCESTER. fetch stool by. [A stool
    brought] Now, sirrah, save whipping,
    leap stool run away.
  SIMPCOX. Alas, master, stand alone!
    torture vain.

                         Enter BEADLE whips

  GLOUCESTER. Well, sir, find legs.
    Sirrah beadle, whip till leap stool.
  BEADLE. will, lord. on, sirrah; doublet
    quickly.
  SIMPCOX. Alas, master, do? stand.

           BEADLE hath hit once, leaps over
           stool runs away; follow cry
                             'A miracle!'  

  KING HENRY. O God, seest Thou this, bearest long?
  QUEEN. made laugh villain run.
  GLOUCESTER. Follow knave, drab away.
  WIFE. Alas, sir, pure need!
  GLOUCESTER. whipp'd market town till they
    Berwick, came.
                                 Exeunt MAYOR, BEADLE, WIFE, &c.
  CARDINAL. Duke Humphrey miracle to-day.
  SUFFOLK. True; made lame leap fly away.
  GLOUCESTER. miracles I:
    made day, lord, towns fly.

                         Enter BUCKINGHAM

  KING HENRY. tidings cousin Buckingham?
  BUCKINGHAM. heart doth tremble unfold:
    sort naughty persons, lewdly bent,
    countenance confederacy
    Lady Eleanor, Protector's wife,  
    ringleader head rout,
    practis'd dangerously state,
    Dealing witches conjurers,
    apprehended fact,
    Raising wicked spirits ground,
    Demanding King Henry's life death
    Highness' Privy Council,
    large Grace understand.
  CARDINAL. so, Lord Protector, means
    lady forthcoming London.
    news, think, hath turn'd weapon's edge;
    'Tis like, lord, hour.
  GLOUCESTER. Ambitious churchman, leave afflict heart.
    Sorrow grief vanquish'd powers;
    And, vanquish'd am, yield the
    meanest groom.
  KING HENRY. O God, mischiefs work wicked ones,
    Heaping confusion heads thereby!
  QUEEN. Gloucester, tainture thy nest;
    thyself faultless, thou wert best.  
  GLOUCESTER. Madam, myself, heaven appeal
    lov'd King commonweal;
    wife stands.
    hear heard.
    Noble is; forgot
    Honour virtue, convers'd such
    As, pitch, defile nobility,
    banish bed company
    give prey law shame,
    hath dishonoured Gloucester's honest name.
  KING HENRY. Well, night repose here.
    To-morrow London back again
    business thoroughly
    call foul offenders answers,
    poise justice' equal scales,
    beam stands sure, rightful prevails.
                                                Flourish. Exeunt




SCENE II.
London. DUKE YORK'S garden

Enter YORK, SALISBURY, WARWICK

  YORK. Now, good Lords Salisbury Warwick,
    simple supper ended, give leave
    close walk satisfy myself
    craving opinion tide,
    infallible, England's crown.
  SALISBURY. lord, long hear full.
  WARWICK. Sweet York, begin; thy claim good,
    Nevils thy subjects command.
  YORK. thus:
    Edward Third, lords, sons;
    first, Edward Black Prince, Prince Wales;
    second, William Hatfield; third,
    Lionel Duke Clarence; whom
    John Gaunt, Duke Lancaster;
    Edmund Langley, Duke York;
    sixth Thomas Woodstock, Duke Gloucester;
    William Windsor seventh last.  
    Edward Black Prince died father
    left Richard, son,
    Who, Edward Third's death, reign'd king
    Till Henry Bolingbroke, Duke Lancaster,
    eldest son heir John Gaunt,
    Crown'd Henry Fourth,
    Seiz'd realm, depos'd rightful king,
    poor queen France, came.
    Pomfret, where, know,
    Harmless Richard murdered traitorously.
  WARWICK. Father, Duke hath told truth;
    house Lancaster crown.
  YORK. hold force, right;
    Richard, son's heir, dead,
    issue son reign'd.
  SALISBURY. William Hatfield died heir.
  YORK. son, Duke Clarence, line
    claim crown, issue Philippe, daughter,
    married Edmund Mortimer, Earl March;
    Edmund issue, Roger Earl March;  
    Roger issue, Edmund, Anne, Eleanor.
  SALISBURY. Edmund, reign Bolingbroke,
    read, laid claim crown;
    And, Owen Glendower, king,
    captivity till died.
    But, rest.
  YORK. eldest sister, Anne,
    mother, heir crown,
    Married Richard Earl Cambridge, was
    Edmund Langley, Edward Third's son, son.
    claim kingdom: heir
    Roger Earl March, son
    Edmund Mortimer, married Philippe,
    Sole daughter Lionel Duke Clarence;
    So, issue elder son
    Succeed younger, King.
  WARWICK. plain proceedings plain this?
    Henry doth claim crown John Gaunt,
    fourth son: York claims third.
    Till Lionel's issue fails, reign.  
    fails yet, flourishes thee
    thy sons, fair slips stock.
    Then, father Salisbury, kneel together,
    private plot first
    salute rightful sovereign
    honour birthright crown.
  BOTH. Long live sovereign Richard, England's King!
  YORK. you, lords. king
    Till crown'd, sword stain'd
    heart-blood house Lancaster;
    suddenly perform'd,
    advice silent secrecy.
    dangerous days:
    Wink Duke Suffolk's insolence,
    Beaufort's pride, Somerset's ambition,
    Buckingham, crew them,
    Till snar'd shepherd flock,
    virtuous prince, good Duke Humphrey;
    'Tis seek; they, seeking that,
    find deaths, York prophesy.  
  SALISBURY. lord, break off; mind full.
  WARWICK. heart assures Earl Warwick
    day make Duke York king.
  YORK. And, Nevil, assure myself,
    Richard live make Earl Warwick
    greatest man England King.             Exeunt




SCENE III.
London. hall justice

Sound trumpets. Enter KING State: QUEEN, GLOUCESTER, YORK,
SUFFOLK, SALISBURY, guard, banish DUCHESS. Enter, guarded,
the DUCHESS GLOUCESTER, MARGERY JOURDAIN, HUME, SOUTHWELL, BOLINGBROKE

  KING HENRY. Stand forth, Dame Eleanor Cobham, Gloucester's wife:
    sight God us, guilt great;
    Receive sentence law sins
    God's book adjudg'd death.
    four, prison back again;
    place execution:
    witch Smithfield burnt ashes,
    strangled gallows.
    You, madam, nobly born,
    Despoiled honour life,
    Shall, days' open penance done,
    Live country banishment
    Sir John Stanley Isle Man.  
  DUCHESS. banishment; death.
  GLOUCESTER. Eleanor, law, thou seest, hath judged thee.
    justify law condemns.
             Exeunt DUCHESS prisoners, guarded
    Mine eyes full tears, heart grief.
    Ah, Humphrey, dishonour thine age
    bring thy head sorrow ground!
    beseech Majesty give leave go;
    Sorrow solace, mine age ease.
  KING HENRY. Stay, Humphrey Duke Gloucester; ere thou go,
    Give thy staff; Henry himself
    Protector be; God hope,
    stay, guide, lantern feet.
    peace, Humphrey, belov'd
    thou wert Protector thy King.
  QUEEN. reason king years
    protected child.
    God King Henry govern England's realm!
    Give staff, sir, King realm.
  GLOUCESTER. staff! Here, noble Henry, staff.  
    willingly resign
    ere thy father Henry made mine;
    willingly thy feet leave it
    ambitiously receive it.
    Farewell, good King; dead gone,
    honourable peace attend thy throne!                 Exit
  QUEEN. Why, Henry King, Margaret Queen,
    Humphrey Duke Gloucester scarce himself,
    bears shrewd maim: pulls once-
    lady banish'd limb lopp'd off.
    staff honour raught, stand
    fits be, Henry's hand.
  SUFFOLK. droops lofty pine hangs sprays;
    Eleanor's pride dies youngest days.
  YORK. Lords, go. Majesty,
    day appointed combat;
    ready appellant defendant,
    armourer man, enter lists,
    Highness behold fight.
  QUEEN. Ay, good lord; purposely  
    Left court, quarrel tried.
  KING HENRY. God's name, lists things fit;
    end it, God defend right!
  YORK. fellow worse bested,
    afraid fight, appellant,
    servant armourer, lords.

        Enter door, HORNER, Armourer, his
         NEIGHBOURS, drinking is
        drunk; enters drum and
       staff sand-bag fastened it; the
        door PETER, man, drum sandbag,
                  PRENTICES drinking him

  NEIGHBOUR. Here, neighbour Horner, drink cup of
    sack; fear not, neighbour, enough.
  NEIGHBOUR. here, neighbour, cup charneco.
  NEIGHBOUR. pot good double beer, neighbour;
    drink, fear man.
  HORNER. come, i' faith, pledge all; fig  
    Peter!
  PRENTICE. Here, Peter, drink thee; afraid.
  PRENTICE. merry, Peter, fear thy master: fight
    credit prentices.
  PETER. all. Drink, pray me, pray you; I
    draught world. Here, Robin, an
    die, give thee apron; and, Will, thou shalt my
    hammer; here, Tom, money have. O Lord
    bless me, pray God! deal master,
    hath learnt fence already.
  SALISBURY. Come, leave drinking fall blows.
    Sirrah, thy name?
  PETER. Peter, forsooth.
  SALISBURY. Peter? more?
  PETER. Thump.
  SALISBURY. Thump? thou thump thy master well.
  HORNER. Masters, hither, were, man's
    instigation, prove knave honest man; and
    touching Duke York, death meant him
    ill, King, Queen; therefore, Peter,  
    thee blow!
  YORK. Dispatch- knave's tongue begins double.
    Sound, trumpets, alarum combatants!
                 [Alarum. fight PETER strikes down]
  HORNER. Hold, Peter, hold! confess, confess treason.
                                                          [Dies]
  YORK. weapon. Fellow, God, good wine in
    thy master's way.
  PETER. O God, overcome mine enemies presence? O
    Peter, thou hast prevail'd right!
  KING HENRY. Go, traitor sight,
    death perceive guilt;
    God justice hath reveal'd us
    truth innocence poor fellow,
    thought murder'd wrongfully.
    Come, fellow, follow thy reward.
                                        Sound flourish. Exeunt




SCENE IV.
London. street

Enter DUKE HUMPHREY men, mourning cloaks

  GLOUCESTER. hath brightest day cloud,
    summer evermore succeeds
    Barren winter, wrathful nipping cold;
    cares joys abound, seasons fleet.
    Sirs, o'clock?
  SERVING-MAN. Ten, lord.
  GLOUCESTER. Ten hour appointed me
    watch coming punish'd duchess.
    Uneath endure flinty streets
    tread tender-feeling feet.
    Sweet Nell, ill thy noble mind abrook
    abject people gazing thy face,
    envious looks, laughing thy shame,
    erst follow thy proud chariot wheels
    thou didst ride triumph streets.
    But, soft! comes, prepare
    tear-stain'd eyes miseries.  

          Enter DUCHESS GLOUCESTER white sheet,
            taper burning hand, SIR JOHN
               STANLEY, SHERIFF, OFFICERS

  SERVING-MAN. Grace, sheriff.
  GLOUCESTER. No, stir lives; pass by.
  DUCHESS. you, lord, open shame?
    thou dost penance too. gaze!
    giddy multitude point
    nod heads throw eyes thee;
    Ah, Gloucester, hide thee hateful looks,
    And, thy closet pent up, rue shame
    ban thine enemies, mine thine!
  GLOUCESTER. patient, gentle Nell; forget grief.
  DUCHESS. Ah, Gloucester, teach forget myself!
    whilst thy married wife
    thou prince, Protector land,
    Methinks led along,
    Mail'd shame, papers back,  
    follow'd rabble rejoice
    tears hear deep-fet groans.
    ruthless flint doth cut tender feet,
    start, envious people laugh
    bid advised tread.
    Ah, Humphrey, bear shameful yoke?
    Trowest thou e'er world
    count happy enjoy sun?
    No; dark light night day;
    pomp hell.
    Duke Humphrey's wife,
    prince, ruler land;
    rul'd, prince was,
    stood whilst I, forlorn duchess,
    made pointing-stock
    idle rascal follower.
    thou mild, blush shame,
    stir till axe death
    Hang thee, shortly will.
    Suffolk-  
    hateth thee hates all-
    York, impious Beaufort, false priest,
    lim'd bushes betray thy wings,
    And, fly thou thou canst, tangle thee.
    fear thou thy foot snar'd,
    seek prevention thy foes.
  GLOUCESTER. Ah, Nell, forbear! Thou aimest awry.
    offend attainted;
    twenty times foes,
    twenty times power,
    procure scathe
    long loyal, true, crimeless.
    Wouldst rescue thee reproach?
    Why, thy scandal wip'd away,
    danger breach law.
    Thy greatest quiet, gentle Nell.
    pray thee sort thy heart patience;
    days' quickly worn.

                          Enter HERALD  

  HERALD. summon Grace Majesty's Parliament,
    Holden Bury month.
  GLOUCESTER. consent ne'er ask'd before!
    close dealing. Well, there.    Exit HERALD
    Nell, leave- and, master sheriff,
    penance exceed King's commission.
  SHERIFF. An't Grace, commission stays;
    Sir John Stanley appointed now
    Isle Man.
  GLOUCESTER. you, Sir John, protect lady here?
  STANLEY. charge, may't Grace.
  GLOUCESTER. Entreat worse pray
    well; world laugh again,
    live kindness if
    her. so, Sir John, farewell.
  DUCHESS. What, gone, lord, bid farewell!
  GLOUCESTER. Witness tears, stay speak.
                                  Exeunt GLOUCESTER servants
  DUCHESS. Art thou too? comfort thee!  
    abides me. joy death-
    Death, oft afeard,
    wish'd world's eternity.
    Stanley, prithee go, hence;
    care whither, beg favour,
    convey thou art commanded.
  STANLEY. Why, madam, Isle Man,
    us'd state.
  DUCHESS. bad enough, reproach-
    us'd reproachfully?
  STANLEY. duchess Duke Humphrey's lady;
    state us'd.
  DUCHESS. Sheriff, farewell, fare,
    thou hast conduct shame.
  SHERIFF. office; and, madam, pardon me.
  DUCHESS. Ay, ay, farewell; thy office discharg'd.
    Come, Stanley, go?
  STANLEY. Madam, penance done, throw sheet,
    attire journey.
  DUCHESS. shame shifted sheet.  
    No, hang richest robes
    show itself, attire can.
    Go, lead way; long prison.            Exeunt

ACT III. SCENE I.
The Abbey Bury St. Edmunds

Sound sennet. Enter KING, QUEEN, CARDINAL, SUFFOLK, YORK,
BUCKINGHAM, SALISBURY, WARWICK, Parliament

  KING HENRY. muse Lord Gloucester come.
    'Tis wont hindmost man,
    Whate'er occasion now.
  QUEEN. see, ye observe
    strangeness alter'd countenance?
    majesty bears himself;
    insolent late become,
    proud, peremptory, unlike himself?
    time mild affable,
    glance far-off look
    Immediately knee,
    court admir'd submission.
    meet morn,
    give time day,
    knits brow shows angry eye
    passeth stiff unbowed knee,  
    Disdaining duty belongs.
    Small curs regarded grin,
    great men tremble lion roars,
    Humphrey man England.
    note descent,
    fall mount;
    seemeth, then, policy-
    Respecting rancorous mind bears,
    advantage decease-
    royal person
    admitted Highness' Council.
    flattery hath won commons' hearts;
    make commotion,
    'Tis fear'd follow him.
    'tis spring, weeds shallow-rooted;
    Suffer now, o'ergrow garden
    choke herbs husbandry.
    reverent care bear lord
    Made collect dangers Duke.
    fond, woman's fear;  
    fear reasons supplant,
    subscribe, wrong'd Duke.
    Lord Suffolk, Buckingham, York,
    Reprove allegation can,
    conclude words effectual.
  SUFFOLK. hath Highness duke;
    put speak mind,
    told Grace's tale.
    Duchess, subornation,
    life, began devilish practices;
    privy faults,
    reputing high descent-
    King successive heir-
    high vaunts nobility,
    instigate bedlam brainsick Duchess
    wicked means frame sovereign's fall.
    Smooth runs water brook deep,
    simple show harbours treason.
    fox barks steal lamb.
    No, no, sovereign, Gloucester man  
    Unsounded yet, full deep deceit.
  CARDINAL. not, contrary form law,
    Devise strange deaths small offences done?
  YORK. not, protectorship,
    Levy great sums money realm
    soldiers' pay France, it?
    means whereof towns day revolted.
  BUCKINGHAM. Tut, petty faults faults unknown
    time bring light smooth Duke Humphrey.
  KING HENRY. lords, once: care us,
    mow thorns annoy foot,
    worthy praise; speak conscience?
    kinsman Gloucester innocent
    meaning treason royal person
    sucking lamb harmless dove:
    Duke virtuous, mild, given
    dream evil work downfall.
  QUEEN. Ah, dangerous fond affiance?
    dove? feathers borrow'd,
    disposed hateful raven.  
    lamb? skin surely lent him,
    inclin'd ravenous wolf.
    steal shape means deceit?
    heed, lord; welfare all
    Hangs cutting short fraudful man.

                          Enter SOMERSET

  SOMERSET. health gracious sovereign!
  KING HENRY. Welcome, Lord Somerset. news France?
  SOMERSET. interest territories
    utterly bereft you; lost.
  KING HENRY. Cold news, Lord Somerset; God's done!
  YORK. [Aside] Cold news me; hope France
    firmly hope fertile England.
    blossoms blasted bud,
    caterpillars eat leaves away;
    remedy gear ere long,
    sell title glorious grave.
  
                         Enter GLOUCESTER

  GLOUCESTER. happiness lord King!
    Pardon, liege, stay'd long.
  SUFFOLK. Nay, Gloucester, thou art soon,
    thou wert loyal thou art.
    arrest thee high treason here.
  GLOUCESTER. Well, Suffolk, thou shalt blush
    change countenance arrest:
    heart unspotted easily daunted.
    purest spring free mud
    clear treason sovereign.
    accuse me? guilty?
  YORK. 'Tis thought, lord, bribes France
    And, Protector, stay'd soldiers' pay;
    means whereof Highness hath lost France.
  GLOUCESTER. thought so? it?
    robb'd soldiers pay
    penny bribe France.
    God, watch'd night-  
    Ay, night night- studying good England!
    doit e'er wrested King,
    groat hoarded use,
    brought trial-day!
    No; pound mine proper store,
    tax needy commons,
    dispursed garrisons,
    ask'd restitution.
  CARDINAL. serves well, lord, much.
  GLOUCESTER. truth, God!
  YORK. protectorship devise
    Strange tortures offenders, heard of,
    England defam'd tyranny.
  GLOUCESTER. Why, 'tis whiles Protector
    Pity fault me;
    melt offender's tears,
    lowly words ransom fault.
    bloody murderer,
    foul felonious thief fleec'd poor passengers,
    gave condign punishment.  
    Murder indeed, bloody sin, tortur'd
    felon trespass else.
  SUFFOLK. lord, faults easy, quickly answer'd;
    mightier crimes laid charge,
    Whereof easily purge yourself.
    arrest Highness' name,
    commit Lord Cardinal
    time trial.
  KING HENRY. Lord Gloucester, 'tis special hope
    clear suspense.
    conscience tells innocent.
  GLOUCESTER. Ah, gracious lord, days dangerous!
    Virtue chok'd foul ambition,
    charity chas'd rancour's hand;
    Foul subornation predominant,
    equity exil'd Highness' land.
    complot life;
    death make island happy
    prove period tyranny,
    expend willingness.  
    mine made prologue play;
    thousands suspect peril
    conclude plotted tragedy.
    Beaufort's red sparkling eyes blab heart's malice,
    Suffolk's cloudy brow stormy hate;
    Sharp Buckingham unburdens tongue
    envious load lies heart;
    dogged York, reaches moon,
    overweening arm pluck'd back,
    false accuse doth level life.
    you, sovereign lady, rest,
    Causeless laid disgraces head,
    endeavour stirr'd up
    liefest liege mine enemy;
    Ay, laid heads together-
    notice conventicles-
    make guiltless life.
    false witness condemn me
    store treasons augment guilt.
    ancient proverb effected:  
    'A staff quickly found beat dog.'
  CARDINAL. liege, railing intolerable.
    care royal person
    treason's secret knife traitor's rage
    upbraided, chid, rated at,
    offender granted scope speech,
    'Twill make cool zeal Grace.
  SUFFOLK. Hath twit sovereign lady here
    ignominious words, clerkly couch'd,
    suborned swear
    False allegations o'erthrow state?
  QUEEN. give loser leave chide.
  GLOUCESTER. truer spoke meant: lose indeed.
    Beshrew winners, play'd false!
    losers leave speak.
  BUCKINGHAM. wrest sense, hold day.
    Lord Cardinal, prisoner.
  CARDINAL. Sirs, Duke, guard sure.
  GLOUCESTER. Ah, King Henry throws crutch
    legs firm bear body!  
    shepherd beaten thy side,
    wolves gnarling gnaw thee first.
    Ah, fear false! ah, were!
    For, good King Henry, thy decay fear.        Exit, guarded
  KING HENRY. lords, wisdoms seemeth best
    undo, ourself here.
  QUEEN. What, Highness leave Parliament?
  KING HENRY. Ay, Margaret; heart drown'd grief,
    flood begins flow mine eyes;
    body round engirt misery-
    miserable discontent?
    Ah, uncle Humphrey, thy face see
    map honour, truth, loyalty!
    yet, good Humphrey, hour come
    e'er prov'd thee false fear'd thy faith.
    louring star envies thy estate
    great lords, Margaret Queen,
    seek subversion thy harmless life?
    Thou didst wrong, man wrong;
    butcher takes calf,  
    binds wretch, beats strays,
    Bearing bloody slaughter-house,
    so, remorseless, borne hence;
    dam runs lowing down,
    harmless young went,
    nought wail darling's loss,
    bewails good Gloucester's case
    sad unhelpful tears, dimm'd eyes
    him, good,
    mighty vowed enemies.
    fortunes weep, 'twixt groan
    'Who's traitor? Gloucester none.'           Exit
  QUEEN. Free lords, cold snow melts sun's hot beams:
    Henry lord cold great affairs,
    full foolish pity; Gloucester's show
    Beguiles mournful crocodile
    sorrow snares relenting passengers;
    snake, roll'd flow'ring bank,
    shining checker'd slough, doth sting child
    beauty thinks excellent.  
    me, lords, wise I-
    judge mine wit good-
    Gloucester quickly rid world
    rid fear him.
  CARDINAL. die worthy policy;
    colour death.
    'Tis meet condemn'd law.
  SUFFOLK. But, mind, policy:
    King labour save life;
    commons haply rise save life;
    trivial argument,
    mistrust, shows worthy death.
  YORK. that, this, die.
  SUFFOLK. Ah, York, man alive fain I!
  YORK. 'Tis York hath reason death.
    But, Lord Cardinal, you, Lord Suffolk,
    think, speak souls:
    Were't empty eagle set
    guard chicken hungry kite
    place Duke Humphrey King's Protector?  
  QUEEN. poor chicken death.
  SUFFOLK. Madam, 'tis true; were't madness then
    make fox surveyor fold?
    accus'd crafty murderer,
    guilt idly posted over,
    purpose executed.
    No; die, fox,
    nature prov'd enemy flock,
    chaps stain'd crimson blood,
    Humphrey, prov'd reasons, liege.
    stand quillets slay him;
    gins, snares, subtlety,
    Sleeping waking, 'tis matter how,
    dead; good deceit
    mates intends deceit.
  QUEEN. Thrice-noble Suffolk, 'tis resolutely spoke.
  SUFFOLK. resolute, done,
    things spoke seldom meant;
    heart accordeth tongue,
    deed meritorious,  
    preserve sovereign foe,
    word, priest.
  CARDINAL. dead, Lord Suffolk,
    Ere due orders priest;
    consent censure deed,
    provide executioner-
    tender safety liege.
  SUFFOLK. hand deed worthy doing.
  QUEEN. I.
  YORK. I. spoke it,
    skills greatly impugns doom.

                          Enter POST

  POST. Great lords, Ireland amain
    signify rebels up
    put Englishmen sword.
    Send succours, lords, stop rage betime,
    wound grow uncurable;
    For, green, great hope help.  
  CARDINAL. breach craves quick expedient stop!
    counsel give weighty cause?
  YORK. Somerset Regent thither;
    'Tis meet lucky ruler employ'd,
    Witness fortune hath France.
  SOMERSET. York, far-fet policy,
    Regent me,
    stay'd France long.
  YORK. No, lose thou hast done.
    lost life betimes
    bring burden dishonour home
    staying long till lost.
    Show scar character'd thy skin:
    Men's flesh preserv'd seldom win.
  QUEEN. Nay then, spark prove raging fire,
    wind fuel brought feed with;
    more, good York; sweet Somerset, still.
    Thy fortune, York, hadst thou Regent there,
    happily prov'd worse his.
  YORK. What, worse nought? Nay, shame all!  
  SOMERSET. number, thee wishest shame!
  CARDINAL. Lord York, fortune is.
    Th' uncivil kerns Ireland arms
    temper clay blood Englishmen;
    Ireland lead band men,
    Collected choicely, county some,
    hap Irishmen?
  YORK. will, lord, Majesty.
  SUFFOLK. Why, authority consent,
    establish confirms;
    Then, noble York, thou task hand.
  YORK. content; provide soldiers, lords,
    Whiles order mine affairs.
  SUFFOLK. charge, Lord York, perform'd.
    return false Duke Humphrey.
  CARDINAL. him; deal him
    henceforth trouble more.
    break off; day spent.
    Lord Suffolk, talk event.
  YORK. Lord Suffolk, fourteen days  
    Bristol expect soldiers;
    ship Ireland.
  SUFFOLK. done, Lord York.
                                             Exeunt YORK
  YORK. Now, York, never, steel thy fearful thoughts
    change misdoubt resolution;
    thou hop'st be; thou art
    Resign death- worth th' enjoying.
    pale-fac'd fear mean-born man
    find harbour royal heart.
    Faster spring-time show'rs thought thought,
    thought thinks dignity.
    brain, busy labouring spider,
    Weaves tedious snares trap mine enemies.
    Well, nobles, well, 'tis politicly done
    send packing host men.
    fear warm starved snake,
    Who, cherish'd breasts, sting hearts.
    'Twas men lack'd, give me;
    kindly. assur'd  
    put sharp weapons madman's hands.
    Whiles Ireland nourish mighty band,
    stir England black storm
    blow ten thousand souls heaven hell;
    fell tempest cease rage
    golden circuit head,
    glorious sun's transparent beams,
    calm fury mad-bred flaw.
    minister intent
    seduc'd headstrong Kentishman,
    John Cade Ashford,
    make commotion, full can,
    tide John Mortimer.
    Ireland stubborn Cade
    Oppose troop kerns,
    fought long tiff thighs darts
    sharp-quill'd porpentine;
    end rescu'd, seen
    caper upright wild Morisco,
    Shaking bloody darts bells.  
    Full often, shag-hair'd crafty kern,
    Hath conversed enemy,
    undiscover'd again
    notice villainies.
    devil substitute;
    John Mortimer, dead,
    face, gait, speech, doth resemble.
    perceive commons' mind,
    affect house claim York.
    taken, rack'd, tortured;
    pain inflict him
    make mov'd arms.
    thrive, 'tis great will,
    Why, Ireland strength,
    reap harvest rascal sow'd;
    Humphrey dead, be,
    Henry put apart, me.                   Exit




SCENE II.
Bury St. Edmunds. room state

Enter MURDERERS running stage,
from murder DUKE HUMPHREY

  MURDERER. Run Lord Suffolk; know
    dispatch'd Duke, commanded.
  MURDERER. O do! done?
    Didst hear man penitent?

                           Enter SUFFOLK

  MURDERER. lord.
  SUFFOLK. Now, sirs, dispatch'd thing?
  MURDERER. Ay, good lord, dead.
  SUFFOLK. Why, said. Go, house;
    reward venturous deed.
    King peers hand.
    laid fair bed? things well,
    gave directions?
  MURDERER. 'Tis, good lord.  
  SUFFOLK. Away! gone.                       Exeunt MURDERERS

             Sound trumpets. Enter KING, QUEEN,
                CARDINAL, SOMERSET, attendants

  KING HENRY. call uncle presence straight;
    intend Grace to-day,
    guilty, 'tis published.
  SUFFOLK. call presently, noble lord.          Exit
  KING HENRY. Lords, places; and, pray all,
    Proceed straiter 'gainst uncle Gloucester
    true evidence, good esteem,
    approv'd practice culpable.
  QUEEN. God forbid malice prevail
    faultless condemn nobleman!
    Pray God acquit suspicion!
  KING HENRY. thee, Meg; words content much.

                           Re-enter SUFFOLK
  
    now! look'st thou pale? tremblest thou?
    uncle? matter, Suffolk?
  SUFFOLK. Dead bed, lord; Gloucester dead.
  QUEEN. Marry, God forfend!
  CARDINAL. God's secret judgment! dream to-night
    Duke dumb speak word.
                                               [The KING swoons]
  QUEEN. fares lord? Help, lords! King dead.
  SOMERSET. Rear body; wring nose.
  QUEEN. Run, go, help, help! O Henry, ope thine eyes!
  SUFFOLK. doth revive again; madam, patient.
  KING. O heavenly God!
  QUEEN. fares gracious lord?
  SUFFOLK. Comfort, sovereign! Gracious Henry, comfort!
  KING HENRY. What, doth Lord Suffolk comfort me?
    sing raven's note,
    dismal tune bereft vital pow'rs;
    thinks chirping wren,
    crying comfort hollow breast,
    chase conceived sound?  
    Hide thy poison sug'red words;
    Lay thy hands me; forbear, say,
    touch affrights serpent's sting.
    Thou baleful messenger, sight!
    thy eye-balls murderous tyranny
    Sits grim majesty fright world.
    me, thine eyes wounding;
    away; come, basilisk,
    kill innocent gazer thy sight;
    shade death find joy-
    life double death,'now Gloucester's dead.
  QUEEN. rate Lord Suffolk thus?
    Duke enemy him,
    Christian-like laments death;
    myself- foe me-
    liquid tears, heart-offending groans,
    blood-consuming sighs, recall life,
    blind weeping, sick groans,
    pale primrose blood-drinking sighs,
    noble Duke alive.  
    world deem me?
    hollow friends:
    judg'd made Duke away;
    slander's tongue wounded,
    princes' courts fill'd reproach.
    death. Ay me, unhappy!
    queen crown'd infamy!
  KING HENRY. Ah, woe Gloucester, wretched man!
  QUEEN. woe me, wretched is.
    What, dost thou turn away, hide thy face?
    loathsome leper- me.
    What, art thou adder waxen deaf?
    poisonous too, kill thy forlorn Queen.
    thy comfort shut Gloucester's tomb?
    Why, Dame Margaret ne'er thy joy.
    Erect statue worship it,
    make image alehouse sign.
    nigh wreck'd sea,
    awkward wind England's bank
    Drove back native clime?  
    boded well-forewarning wind
    'Seek scorpion's nest,
    set footing unkind shore'?
    curs'd gentle gusts,
    loos'd brazen caves;
    bid blow England's blessed shore,
    turn stern dreadful rock?
    Aeolus murderer,
    left hateful office thee.
    pretty-vaulting sea refus'd drown me,
    Knowing thou wouldst drown'd shore
    tears salt sea thy unkindness;
    splitting rocks cow'r'd sinking sands
    dash ragged sides,
    thy flinty heart, hard they,
    thy palace perish Margaret.
    ken thy chalky cliffs,
    thy shore tempest beat back,
    stood hatches storm;
    dusky sky began rob  
    earnest-gaping sight thy land's view,
    costly jewel neck-
    heart was, bound diamonds-
    threw thy land. sea receiv'd it;
    wish'd thy body heart.
    lost fair England's view,
    bid mine eyes packing heart,
    call'd blind dusky spectacles
    losing ken Albion's wished coast.
    tempted Suffolk's tongue-
    agent thy foul inconstancy-
    sit witch me, Ascanius did
    madding Dido unfold
    father's acts commenc'd burning Troy!
    witch'd her? thou false him?
    Ay me, more! Die, Margaret,
    Henry weeps thou dost live long.

               Noise within. Enter WARWICK, SALISBURY,
                          commons  

  WARWICK. reported, mighty sovereign,
    good Duke Humphrey traitorously murd'red
    Suffolk Cardinal Beaufort's means.
    commons, angry hive bees
    leader, scatter down
    care sting revenge.
    calm'd spleenful mutiny
    hear order death.
  KING HENRY. dead, good Warwick, 'tis true;
    died God knows, Henry.
    Enter chamber, view breathless corpse,
    comment sudden death.
  WARWICK. do, liege. Stay, Salisbury,
    rude multitude till return.                  Exit
                                   Exit SALISBURY commons
  KING HENRY. O Thou judgest things, stay thoughts-
    thoughts labour persuade soul
    violent hands laid Humphrey's life!
    suspect false, forgive me, God;  
    judgment doth belong Thee.
    Fain chafe paly lips
    twenty thousand kisses drain
    face ocean salt tears
    love dumb deaf trunk;
    fingers feel hand un-feeling;
    vain obsequies;
    survey dead earthy image,
    make sorrow greater?

               Bed put body. Enter WARWICK

  WARWICK. hither, gracious sovereign, view body.
  KING HENRY. deep grave made;
    soul fled worldly solace,
    For, him, life death.
  WARWICK. surely soul intends live
    dread King state Him
    free Father's wrathful curse,
    violent hands laid  
    life thrice-famed Duke.
  SUFFOLK. dreadful oath, sworn solemn tongue!
    instance Lord Warwick vow?
  WARWICK. blood settled face.
    Oft timely-parted ghost,
    ashy semblance, meagre, pale, bloodless,
    descended labouring heart,
    Who, conflict holds death,
    Attracts aidance 'gainst enemy,
    heart cools, ne'er returneth
    blush beautify cheek again.
    see, face black full blood;
    eye-balls liv'd,
    Staring full ghastly strangled man;
    hair uprear'd, nostrils stretch'd struggling;
    hands abroad display'd, grasp'd
    tugg'd life, strength subdu'd.
    Look, sheets hair, see, sticking;
    well-proportion'd beard made rough rugged,
    summer's corn tempest lodged.  
    murd'red here:
    signs probable.
  SUFFOLK. Why, Warwick, Duke death?
    Beaufort protection;
    we, hope, sir, murderers.
  WARWICK. vow'd Duke Humphrey's foes;
    you, forsooth, good Duke keep.
    'Tis feast friend;
    'tis found enemy.
  QUEEN. you, belike, suspect noblemen
    guilty Duke Humphrey's timeless death.
  WARWICK. finds heifer dead bleeding fresh,
    sees fast butcher axe,
    suspect 'twas made slaughter?
    finds partridge puttock's nest
    imagine bird dead,
    kite soar unbloodied beak?
    suspicious tragedy.
  QUEEN. butcher, Suffolk? knife?
    Beaufort term'd kite? talons?  
  SUFFOLK. wear knife slaughter sleeping men;
    vengeful sword, rusted ease,
    scoured rancorous heart
    slanders murder's crimson badge.
    thou dar'st, proud Lord Warwickshire,
    faulty Duke Humphrey's death.
                           Exeunt CARDINAL, SOMERSET, others
  WARWICK. dares Warwick, false Suffolk dare him?
  QUEEN. dares calm contumelious spirit,
    cease arrogant controller,
    Suffolk dare twenty thousand times.
  WARWICK. Madam, still- reverence say;
    word speak behalf
    slander royal dignity.
  SUFFOLK. Blunt-witted lord, ignoble demeanour,
    lady wrong'd lord much,
    Thy mother blameful bed
    stern untutor'd churl, noble stock
    graft crab-tree slip, fruit thou art,
    Nevils' noble race.  
  WARWICK. guilt murder bucklers thee,
    rob deathsman fee,
    Quitting thee ten thousand shames,
    sovereign's presence makes mild,
    would, false murd'rous coward, thy knee
    Make thee beg pardon thy passed speech
    thy mother thou meant'st,
    thou thyself born bastardy;
    And, fearful homage done,
    Give thee thy hire send thy soul hell,
    Pernicious blood-sucker sleeping men.
  SUFFOLK. Thou shalt waking shed thy blood,
    presence thou dar'st me.
  WARWICK. now, drag thee hence.
    Unworthy thou art, cope thee,
    service Duke Humphrey's ghost.
                                      Exeunt SUFFOLK WARWICK
  KING HENRY. stronger breastplate heart untainted?
    Thrice arm'd hath quarrel just;
    naked, lock'd steel,  
    conscience injustice corrupted.
                                                [A noise within]
  QUEEN. noise this?

       Re-enter SUFFOLK WARWICK, weapons drawn

  KING. Why, now, lords, wrathful weapons drawn
    presence! Dare bold?
    Why, tumultuous clamour here?
  SUFFOLK. trait'rous Warwick, men Bury,
    Set me, mighty sovereign.

                        Re-enter SALISBURY

  SALISBURY. [To Commons within] Sirs, stand apart, King
      mind.
    Dread lord, commons send word me
    Lord Suffolk straight death,
    banished fair England's territories,
    violence tear palace  
    torture grievous ling'ring death.
    good Duke Humphrey died;
    fear Highness' death;
    mere instinct love loyalty,
    Free stubborn opposite intent,
    thought contradict liking,
    Makes forward banishment.
    say, care royal person,
    Highness intend sleep
    charge man disturb rest,
    pain dislike pain death,
    Yet, notwithstanding strait edict,
    serpent forked tongue
    slily glided Majesty,
    wak'd,
    Lest, suffer'd harmful slumber,
    mortal worm make sleep eternal.
    cry, forbid,
    guard you, whe'er no,
    fell serpents false Suffolk is;  
    envenomed fatal sting
    loving uncle, twenty times worth,
    say, shamefully bereft life.
  COMMONS. [Within] answer King, Lord Salisbury!
  SUFFOLK. 'Tis commons, rude unpolish'd hinds,
    send message sovereign;
    you, lord, glad employ'd,
    show quaint orator are.
    honour Salisbury hath won
    lord ambassador
    sort tinkers King.
  COMMONS. [Within] answer King, break in!
  KING HENRY. Go, Salisbury, me
    tender loving care;
    cited them,
    purpose entreat;
    thoughts hourly prophesy
    Mischance state Suffolk's means.
    Majesty swear,
    unworthy deputy am,  
    breathe infection air
    days longer, pain death.
                                                  Exit SALISBURY
  QUEEN. O Henry, plead gentle Suffolk!
  KING HENRY. Ungentle Queen, call gentle Suffolk!
    more, say; thou dost plead him,
    Thou wilt add increase wrath.
    said, word;
    swear, irrevocable.
    days' space thou be'st found
    ground ruler of,
    world ransom thy life.
    Come, Warwick, come, good Warwick, me;
    great matters impart thee.
                                Exeunt QUEEN SUFFOLK
  QUEEN. Mischance sorrow you!
    Heart's discontent sour affliction
    playfellows company!
    you; devil make third,
    threefold vengeance tend steps!  
  SUFFOLK. Cease, gentle Queen, execrations,
    thy Suffolk heavy leave.
  QUEEN. Fie, coward woman soft-hearted wretch,
    thou spirit curse thine enemy?
  SUFFOLK. plague them! Wherefore curse them?
    curses kill doth mandrake's groan,
    invent bitter searching terms,
    curst, harsh, horrible hear,
    Deliver'd strongly fixed teeth,
    full signs deadly hate,
    lean-fac'd Envy loathsome cave.
    tongue stumble mine earnest words,
    Mine eyes sparkle beaten flint,
    Mine hair fix'd end, distract;
    Ay, joint curse ban;
    burden'd heart break,
    curse them. Poison drink!
    Gall, worse gall, daintiest taste!
    sweetest shade grove cypress trees!
    chiefest prospect murd'ring basilisks!  
    softest touch smart lizards' stings!
    music frightful serpent's hiss,
    boding screech-owls make consort full!
    foul terrors dark-seated hell-
  QUEEN. Enough, sweet Suffolk, thou torment'st thyself;
    dread curses, sun 'gainst glass,
    overcharged gun, recoil,
    turns force thyself.
  SUFFOLK. bade ban, bid leave?
    Now, ground banish'd from,
    curse winter's night,
    standing naked mountain top
    biting cold grass grow,
    minute spent sport.
  QUEEN. O, entreat thee cease! Give thy hand,
    dew mournful tears;
    rain heaven wet place
    wash woeful monuments.
    O, kiss printed thy hand,
    thou might'st seal,  
    thousand sighs breath'd thee!
    So, thee gone, grief;
    'Tis surmis'd whiles thou art standing by,
    surfeits thinking want.
    repeal thee or, assur'd,
    Adventure banished myself;
    banished am, thee.
    Go, speak me; gone.
    O, yet! friends condemn'd
    Embrace, kiss, ten thousand leaves,
    Loather hundred times part die.
    now, farewell; farewell life thee!
  SUFFOLK. poor Suffolk ten times banished,
    King times thrice thee,
    'Tis land care for, wert thou thence;
    wilderness populous enough,
    Suffolk thy heavenly company;
    thou art, world itself,
    pleasure world;
    thou art not, desolation.  
    more: Live thou joy thy life;
    joy nought thou liv'st.

                           Enter VAUX

  QUEEN. Vaux fast? news, prithee?
  VAUX. signify Majesty
    Cardinal Beaufort point death;
    suddenly grievous sickness him
    makes gasp, stare, catch air,
    Blaspheming God, cursing men earth.
    talks Duke Humphrey's ghost
    side; calls King
    whispers pillow, him,
    secrets overcharged soul;
    Majesty
    cries aloud him.
  QUEEN. heavy message King.       Exit VAUX
    Ay me! world! news these!
    wherefore grieve hour's poor loss,  
    Omitting Suffolk's exile, soul's treasure?
    only, Suffolk, mourn thee,
    southern clouds contend tears-
    earth's increase, mine sorrows?
    thee hence: King, thou know'st, coming;
    thou found me; thou art dead.
  SUFFOLK. depart thee live;
    thy sight die, else
    pleasant slumber thy lap?
    breathe soul air,
    mild gentle cradle-babe
    Dying mother's dug lips;
    Where, thy sight, raging mad
    cry thee close mine eyes,
    thee thy lips stop mouth;
    shouldst thou turn flying soul,
    breathe thy body,
    liv'd sweet Elysium.
    die thee die jest:
    thee die torture death.  
    O, stay, befall befall!
  QUEEN. Away! parting fretful corrosive,
    applied deathful wound.
    France, sweet Suffolk. hear thee;
    whereso'er thou art world's globe
    Iris find thee out.
  SUFFOLK. go.
  QUEEN. heart thee.           [She kisses him]
  SUFFOLK. jewel, lock'd woefull'st cask
    thing worth.
    splitted bark, sunder we:
    fall death.
  QUEEN. me.                       Exeunt severally




SCENE III.
London. CARDINAL BEAUFORT'S bedchamber

Enter KING, SALISBURY, WARWICK, CARDINAL bed

  KING HENRY. fares lord? Speak, Beaufort, thy sovereign.
  CARDINAL. thou be'st Death give thee England's treasure,
    purchase island,
    thou wilt live feel pain.
  KING HENRY. Ah, sign evil life
    death's approach terrible!
  WARWICK. Beaufort, thy sovereign speaks thee.
  CARDINAL. Bring trial will.
    Died bed? die?
    make men live, whe'er no?
    O, torture more! confess.
    Alive again? show is;
    give thousand pound him.
    hath eyes, dust hath blinded them.
    Comb hair; look, look! stands upright,
    lime-twigs set catch winged soul!
    Give drink; bid apothecary  
    Bring strong poison bought him.
  KING HENRY. O Thou eternal Mover heavens,
    gentle eye wretch!
    O, beat busy meddling fiend
    lays strong siege wretch's soul,
    bosom purge black despair!
  WARWICK. pangs death make grin
  SALISBURY. Disturb not, pass peaceably.
  KING HENRY. Peace soul, God's good pleasure be!
    Lord Card'nal, thou think'st heaven's bliss,
    Hold thy hand, make signal thy hope.
    dies, makes sign: O God, forgive him!
  WARWICK. bad death argues monstrous life.
  KING HENRY. Forbear judge, sinners all.
    Close eyes, draw curtain close;
    meditation.                         Exeunt
