ACT IV. SCENE I.
The coast Kent

Alarum.  Fight sea.  Ordnance off.  Enter LIEUTENANT,
a SHIPMASTER MATE, WALTER WHITMORE, sailors;
SUFFOLK GENTLEMEN, prisoners

  LIEUTENANT. gaudy, blabbing, remorseful day
    crept bosom sea;
    loud-howling wolves arouse jades
    drag tragic melancholy night;
    drowsy, slow, flagging wings
    Clip dead men's graves, misty jaws
    Breathe foul contagious darkness air.
    bring soldiers prize;
    For, whilst pinnace anchors Downs,
    make ransom sand,
    blood stain discoloured shore.
    Master, prisoner freely give thee;
    thou art mate make boot this;
    other, Walter Whitmore, thy share.  
  GENTLEMAN. ransom, master, know?
  MASTER. thousand crowns, lay head.
  MATE. give, yours.
  LIEUTENANT. What, pay thousand crowns,
    bear port gentlemen?
    Cut villains' throats- die shall;
    lives lost fight
    counterpois'd petty sum!
  GENTLEMAN. give it, sir: spare life.
  GENTLEMAN. I, write home straight.
  WHITMORE. lost mine eye laying prize aboard,
    [To SUFFOLK] therefore, revenge it, shalt thou die;
    these, will.
  LIEUTENANT. rash; ransom, live.
  SUFFOLK. George, gentleman:
    Rate thou wilt, thou shalt paid.
  WHITMORE. I: Walter Whitmore.
    now! start'st thou? What, doth death affright?
  SUFFOLK. Thy affrights me, sound death.
    cunning man calculate birth  
    told water die;
    make thee bloody-minded;
    Thy Gualtier, rightly sounded.
  WHITMORE. Gualtier Walter, care not:
    base dishonour blur name
    sword wip'd blot;
    Therefore, merchant-like sell revenge,
    Broke sword, arms torn defac'd,
    proclaim'd coward world.
  SUFFOLK. Stay, Whitmore, thy prisoner prince,
    Duke Suffolk, William de la Pole.
  WHITMORE. Duke Suffolk muffled rags?
  SUFFOLK. Ay, rags part Duke:
    Jove disguis'd, I?
  LIEUTENANT. Jove slain, thou shalt be.
  SUFFOLK. Obscure lowly swain, King Henry's blood,
    honourable blood Lancaster,
    shed jaded groom.
    Hast thou kiss'd thy hand held stirrup,
    Bareheaded plodded foot-cloth mule,  
    thought thee happy shook head?
    hast thou waited cup,
    Fed trencher, kneel'd board,
    feasted Queen Margaret?
    Remember it, make thee crestfall'n,
    Ay, allay thy abortive pride,
    voiding-lobby hast thou stood
    duly waited coming forth.
    hand mine hath writ thy behalf,
    charm thy riotous tongue.
  WHITMORE. Speak, Captain, stab forlorn swain?
  LIEUTENANT. words stab him, hath me.
  SUFFOLK. Base slave, thy words blunt, art thou.
  LIEUTENANT. Convey hence, longboat's side
    Strike head.
  SUFFOLK. Thou dar'st not, thy own.
  LIEUTENANT. Poole!
  SUFFOLK. Poole?
  LIEUTENANT. Ay, kennel, puddle, sink, filth dirt
    Troubles silver spring England drinks;  
    dam thy yawning mouth
    swallowing treasure realm.
    Thy lips, kiss'd Queen, sweep ground;
    thou smil'dst good Duke Humphrey's death
    senseless winds shalt grin vain,
    contempt hiss thee again;
    wedded thou hags hell
    daring affy mighty lord
    daughter worthless king,
    subject, wealth, diadem.
    devilish policy art thou grown great,
    And, ambitious Sylla, overgorg'd
    gobbets thy mother's bleeding heart.
    thee Anjou Maine sold France;
    false revolting Normans thee
    Disdain call lord; Picardy
    Hath slain governors, surpris'd forts,
    ragged soldiers wounded home.
    princely Warwick, Nevils all,
    dreadful swords drawn vain,  
    hating thee, rising arms;
    house York- thrust crown
    shameful murder guiltless king
    lofty proud encroaching tyranny-
    Burns revenging fire, hopeful colours
    Advance half-fac'd sun, striving shine,
    writ 'Invitis nubibus.'
    commons Kent arms;
    conclude, reproach beggary
    crept palace King,
    thee. Away! convey hence.
  SUFFOLK. O god, shoot thunder
    paltry, servile, abject drudges!
    Small things make base men proud: villain here,
    captain pinnace, threatens more
    Bargulus, strong Illyrian pirate.
    Drones suck eagles' blood rob beehives.
    impossible die
    lowly vassal thyself.
    Thy words move rage remorse me.  
    message Queen France:
    charge thee waft safely cross Channel.
  LIEUTENANT. Walter-
  WHITMORE. Come, Suffolk, waft thee thy death.
  SUFFOLK. Gelidus timor occupat artus: thee fear.
  WHITMORE. Thou shalt fear leave thee.
    What, ye daunted now? ye stoop?
  GENTLEMAN. gracious lord, entreat him, speak fair.
  SUFFOLK. Suffolk's imperial tongue stem rough,
    Us'd command, untaught plead favour.
    honour these
    humble suit: no, head
    Stoop block knees bow any
    Save God heaven king;
    sooner dance bloody pole
    stand uncover'd vulgar groom.
    True nobility exempt fear:
    bear dare execute.
  LIEUTENANT. Hale away, talk more.
  SUFFOLK. Come, soldiers, show cruelty ye can,  
    death forgot-
    Great men oft die vile bezonians:
    Roman sworder banditto slave
    Murder'd sweet Tully; Brutus' bastard hand
    Stabb'd Julius Caesar; savage islanders
    Pompey Great; Suffolk dies pirates.
                                        Exit WALTER SUFFOLK
  LIEUTENANT. these, ransom set,
    pleasure depart;
    us, go.
                              Exeunt GENTLEMAN

                Re-enter WHITMORE SUFFOLK'S body

  WHITMORE. head lifeless body lie,
    Queen mistress bury it.                   Exit
  GENTLEMAN. O barbarous bloody spectacle!
    body bear King.
    revenge not, friends;
    Queen, living held dear.  
                                              Exit body




SCENE II.
Blackheath

Enter GEORGE BEVIS JOHN HOLLAND

  GEORGE. thee sword, made lath; have
    days.
  JOHN. sleep now, then.
  GEORGE. thee Jack Cade clothier means dress the
    commonwealth, turn it, set nap it.
  JOHN. need, 'tis threadbare. Well, never
    merry world England gentlemen up.
  GEORGE. O miserable age! Virtue regarded handicraftsmen.
  JOHN. nobility scorn leather aprons.
  GEORGE. Nay, more, King's Council good workmen.
  JOHN. True; 'Labour thy vocation'; is
    'Let magistrates labouring men'; and
    magistrates.
  GEORGE. Thou hast hit it; sign brave
    mind hard hand.
  JOHN. them! them! Best's son, tanner of
    Wingham-  
  GEORGE. skins enemies make dog's
    leather of.
  JOHN. Dick butcher-
  GEORGE. sin struck down, ox, iniquity's throat
    cut calf.
  JOHN. Smith weaver-
  GEORGE. Argo, thread life spun.
  JOHN. Come, come, fall them.

                Drum. Enter CADE, DICK BUTCHER, SMITH
             WEAVER, SAWYER, infinite numbers

  CADE. John Cade, term'd supposed father-
  DICK. [Aside] rather, stealing cade herrings.
  CADE. enemies fall us, inspired the
    spirit putting kings princes- command silence.
  DICK. Silence!
  CADE. father Mortimer-
  DICK. [Aside] honest man good bricklayer.
  CADE. mother Plantagenet-  
  DICK. [Aside] knew well; midwife.
  CADE. wife descended Lacies-
  DICK. [Aside] was, indeed, pedlar's daughter, sold many
    laces.
  SMITH. [Aside] late, travel furr'd
    pack, washes bucks home.
  CADE. honourable house.
  DICK. [Aside] Ay, faith, field honourable, there
    born, hedge, father house but
    cage.
  CADE. Valiant am.
  SMITH. [Aside] 'A needs; beggary valiant.
  CADE. endure much.
  DICK. [Aside] question that; whipt three
    market days together.
  CADE. fear sword fire.
  SMITH. [Aside] fear sword, coat of
    proof.
  DICK. [Aside] methinks stand fear fire, being
    burnt i' th' hand stealing sheep.  
  CADE. brave, then, captain brave, vows
    reformation. England halfpenny loaves
    sold penny; three-hoop'd pot ten hoops; and
    make felony drink small beer. realm be
    common, Cheapside palfrey grass. And
    king- king be
  ALL. God save Majesty!
  CADE. you, good people- money; shall
    eat drink score, apparel one
    livery, agree brothers worship their
    lord.
  DICK. thing do, kill lawyers.
  CADE. Nay, do. lamentable thing, that
    skin innocent lamb made parchment? That
    parchment, scribbl'd o'er, undo man? the
    bee stings; 'tis bee's wax; seal once
    thing, mine man since. now! Who's
    there?

              Enter some, bringing CLERK CHATHAM  

  SMITH. clerk Chatham. write read cast
    accompt.
  CADE. O monstrous!
  SMITH. setting boys' copies.
  CADE. villain!
  SMITH. book pocket red letters in't.
  CADE. Nay, conjurer.
  DICK. Nay, make obligations write court-hand.
  CADE. for't; man proper man, mine honour;
    find guilty, die. hither, sirrah,
    examine thee. thy name?
  CLERK. Emmanuel.
  DICK. write top letters; 'twill hard
    you.
  CADE. alone. Dost thou write thy name, hast thou a
    mark thyself, honest plain-dealing man?
  CLERK. Sir, God, brought can
    write name.
  ALL. hath confess'd. him! villain  
    traitor.
  CADE. him, say! Hang pen inkhorn about
    neck.                            Exit CLERK

                           Enter MICHAEL

  MICHAEL. General?
  CADE. am, thou fellow.
  MICHAEL. Fly, fly, fly! Sir Humphrey Stafford brother are
    hard by, King's forces.
  CADE. Stand, villain, stand, fell thee down. be
    encount'red man good himself. knight,
    'a?
  MICHAEL. No.
  CADE. equal him, make knight presently.
    [Kneels] Rise up, Sir John Mortimer. [Rises] him!

                Enter SIR HUMPHREY STAFFORD WILLIAM
                  brother, drum soldiers
  
  STAFFORD. Rebellious hinds, filth scum Kent,
    Mark'd gallows, lay weapons down;
    Home cottages, forsake groom;
    King merciful revolt.
  WILLIAM STAFFORD. angry, wrathful, inclin'd blood,
    forward; yield die.
  CADE. silken-coated slaves, pass not;
    you, good people, speak,
    O'er whom, time come, hope reign;
    rightful heir crown.
  STAFFORD. Villain, thy father plasterer;
    thou thyself shearman, art thou not?
  CADE. Adam gardener.
  WILLIAM STAFFORD. that?
  CADE. Marry, this: Edmund Mortimer, Earl March,
    Married Duke Clarence' daughter, not?
  STAFFORD. Ay, sir.
  CADE. children birth.
  WILLIAM STAFFORD. false.
  CADE. Ay, question; 'tis true.  
    elder put nurse,
    beggar-woman stol'n away,
    And, ignorant birth parentage,
    bricklayer age.
    son I; deny can.
  DICK. Nay, 'tis true; king.
  SMITH. Sir, made chimney father's house, bricks
    alive day testify it; deny not.
  STAFFORD. credit base drudge's words
    speaks what?
  ALL. Ay, marry, we; ye gone.
  WILLIAM STAFFORD. Jack Cade, Duke York hath taught this.
  CADE. [Aside] lies, invented myself- to, sirrah,
    King father's sake, Henry the
    Fifth, time boys span-counter French crowns,
    content reign; Protector him.
  DICK. furthermore, Lord Say's head selling
    dukedom Maine.
  CADE. good reason; England main'd fain go
    staff, puissance holds up. Fellow kings,  
    Lord hath gelded commonwealth made
    eunuch; that, speak French, and
    traitor.
  STAFFORD. O gross miserable ignorance!
  CADE. Nay, answer can; Frenchmen enemies. to,
    then, this: speaks tongue an
    enemy good counsellor, no?
  ALL. No, no; head.
  WILLIAM STAFFORD. Well, gentle words prevail,
    Assail army King.
  STAFFORD. Herald, away; town
    Proclaim traitors Cade;
    fly battle ends
    May, wives'and children's sight,
    hang'd doors.
    King's friends, follow me.
                           Exeunt STAFFORDS soldiers
  CADE. love commons follow me.
    show men; 'tis liberty.
    leave lord, gentleman;  
    Spare clouted shoon,
    thrifty honest men such
    would- dare not- parts.
  DICK. order, march us.
  CADE. order order. Come,
    march forward.                                        Exeunt




SCENE III.
Another part Blackheath

Alarums fight, STAFFORDS slain.
Enter CADE rest

  CADE. Dick, butcher Ashford?
  DICK. Here, sir.
  CADE. fell thee sheep oxen, thou behavedst
    thyself thou hadst thine slaughter-house;
    reward thee- Lent long
    is, thou shalt licence kill a
    hundred lacking one.
  DICK. desire more.
  CADE. And, speak truth, thou deserv'st less. [Putting SIR
    HUMPHREY'S brigandine] monument victory bear,
    bodies dragged horse heels till come
    London, mayor's sword borne us.
  DICK. thrive good, break open gaols and
    prisoners.
  CADE. Fear that, warrant thee. Come, march towards
    London.                                               Exeunt




SCENE IV.
London. palace

Enter KING supplication, QUEEN SUFFOLK'S head;
the DUKE BUCKINGHAM, LORD SAY

  QUEEN. Oft heard grief softens mind
    makes fearful degenerate;
    revenge cease weep.
    cease weep, this?
    head lie throbbing breast;
    body embrace?
  BUCKINGHAM. answer makes Grace rebels'
    supplication?
  KING HENRY. send holy bishop entreat;
    God forbid simple souls
    perish sword! myself,
    bloody war cut short,
    parley Jack Cade general.
    stay, read again.
  QUEEN. Ah, barbarous villains! Hath lovely face  
    Rul'd wandering planet me,
    enforce relent
    unworthy behold same?
  KING HENRY. Lord Say, Jack Cade hath sworn thy head.
  SAY. Ay, hope Highness his.
  KING HENRY. now, madam!
    lamenting mourning Suffolk's death?
    fear me, love, dead,
    Thou wouldst mourn'd me.
  QUEEN. No, love, mourn, die thee.

                        Enter MESSENGER

  KING HENRY. now! news? com'st thou haste?
  MESSENGER. rebels Southwark; fly, lord!
    Jack Cade proclaims Lord Mortimer,
    Descended Duke Clarence' house,
    calls Grace usurper, openly,
    vows crown Westminster.
    army ragged multitude  
    hinds peasants, rude merciless;
    Sir Humphrey Stafford brother's death
    Hath heart courage proceed.
    scholars, lawyers, courtiers, gentlemen,
    call false caterpillars intend death.
  KING HENRY. O graceless men! do.
  BUCKINGHAM. gracious lord, retire Killingworth
    power rais'd put down.
  QUEEN. Ah, Duke Suffolk alive,
    Kentish rebels appeas'd!
  KING HENRY. Lord Say, traitors hate thee;
    Killingworth.
  SAY. Grace's person danger.
    sight odious eyes;
    city stay
    live secret may.

                      Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. Jack Cade hath London Bridge.  
    citizens fly forsake houses;
    rascal people, thirsting prey,
    Join traitor; jointly swear
    spoil city royal court.
  BUCKINGHAM. linger not, lord; away, horse.
  KING HENRY. Margaret; God, hope, succour us.
  QUEEN. hope gone, Suffolk deceas'd.
  KING HENRY. [To LORD SAY] Farewell, lord, trust Kentish
    rebels.
  BUCKINGHAM. Trust nobody, fear betray'd.
  SAY. trust mine innocence,
    bold resolute.                 Exeunt




SCENE V.
London. Tower

Enter LORD SCALES Tower, walking. enter CITIZENS,
below

  SCALES. now! Jack Cade slain?
  CITIZEN. No, lord, slain; have
    won bridge, killing withstand them.
    Lord Mayor craves aid honour the
    Tower, defend city rebels.
  SCALES. aid spare command,
    troubled myself;
    rebels assay'd win Tower.
    Smithfield, gather head,
    thither send Matthew Goffe;
    Fight King, country, lives;
    so, farewell, again.             Exeunt




SCENE VI.
London. Cannon street

Enter JACK CADE rest, strikes staff London Stone

  CADE. Mortimer lord city. here, sitting upon
    London Stone, charge command that, city's cost, the
    pissing conduit run claret wine year of
    reign. henceforward treason that
    calls Lord Mortimer.

                    Enter SOLDIER, running

  SOLDIER. Jack Cade! Jack Cade!
  CADE. Knock there.                    [They kill him]
  SMITH. fellow wise, call ye Jack Cade more;
    hath fair warning.
  DICK. lord, army gathered Smithfield.
  CADE. then, fight them. set
    London Bridge fire; and, can, burn Tower too.
    Come, away.                                     Exeunt




SCENE VII.
London. Smithfield

Alarums. MATTHEW GOFFE slain, rest.  enter JACK CADE,
with company

  CADE. So, sirs. pull Savoy; th'
    Inns Court; all.
  DICK. suit lordship.
  CADE. lordship, thou shalt word.
  DICK. laws England mouth.
  JOHN. [Aside] Mass, 'twill sore law then; thrust in
    mouth spear, 'tis yet.
  SMITH. [Aside] Nay, John, stinking law; breath
    stinks eating toasted cheese.
  CADE. thought it; so. Away, burn the
    records realm. mouth Parliament of
    England.
  JOHN. [Aside] biting statutes, his
    teeth pull'd out.
  CADE. henceforward things common.
  
                          Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. lord, prize, prize! Lord Say, which
    sold towns France; made pay twenty
    fifteens, shining pound, subsidy.

                Enter GEORGE BEVIS, LORD SAY

  CADE. Well, beheaded ten times. Ah, thou say,
    thou serge, nay, thou buckram lord! art thou point
    blank jurisdiction regal. canst thou answer my
    Majesty giving Normandy Mounsieur Basimecu the
    Dauphin France? thee presence, even
    presence Lord Mortimer, besom must
    sweep court clean filth thou art. Thou hast most
    traitorously corrupted youth realm erecting a
    grammar school; whereas, before, forefathers other
    books score tally, thou hast caused printing to
    us'd, and, contrary King, crown, dignity, thou
    hast built paper-mill. proved thy face thou  
    hast men thee talk noun verb, and
    abominable words Christian ear endure hear.
    Thou hast appointed justices peace, call poor men before
    matters answer. Moreover, thou
    hast put prison, read, thou
    hast hang'd them, when, indeed, have
    worthy live. Thou dost ride foot-cloth, dost
    thou not?
  SAY. that?
  CADE. Marry, thou ought'st thy horse wear cloak, when
    honester men thou hose doublets.
  DICK. work shirt too, myself, example, am
    butcher.
  SAY. men Kent-
  DICK. Kent?
  SAY. this: 'tis 'bona terra, mala gens.'
  CADE. him, him! speaks Latin.
  SAY. Hear speak, bear will.
    Kent, Commentaries Caesar writ,
    term'd civil'st place isle.  
    Sweet country, full riches;
    people liberal valiant, active, wealthy;
    makes hope void pity.
    sold Maine, lost Normandy;
    Yet, recover them, lose life.
    Justice favour done;
    Pray'rs tears mov'd me, gifts never.
    aught exacted hands,
    maintain King, realm, you?
    Large gifts bestow'd learned clerks,
    book preferr'd King,
    ignorance curse God,
    Knowledge wing wherewith fly heaven,
    possess'd devilish spirits
    forbear murder me.
    tongue hath parley'd foreign kings
    behoof.
  CADE. Tut, struck'st thou blow field?
  SAY. Great men reaching hands. Oft struck
    saw, struck dead.  
  GEORGE. O monstrous coward! What, folks?
  SAY. cheeks pale watching good.
  CADE. Give box o' th' ear, make 'em red again.
  SAY. Long sitting determine poor men's causes
    Hath made full sickness diseases.
  CADE. Ye hempen caudle then, hatchet.
  DICK. dost thou quiver, man?
  SAY. palsy, fear, provokes me.
  CADE. Nay, nods us, 'I'll with
    you'; head stand steadier pole, no.
    away, behead him.
  SAY. me: offended most?
    affected wealth honour? Speak.
    chests fill'd extorted gold?
    apparel sumptuous behold?
    injur'd, ye seek death?
    hands free guiltless bloodshedding,
    breast harbouring foul deceitful thoughts.
    O, live!
  CADE. [Aside] feel remorse words;  
    bridle it. die, pleading for
    life.- him! familiar tongue; he
    speaks o' God's name. Go, away, say, strike
    head presently, break son-in-law's
    house, Sir James Cromer, strike head, bring them
    poles hither.
  ALL. done.
  SAY. Ah, countrymen! make pray'rs,
    God obdurate yourselves,
    fare departed souls?
    relent save life.
  CADE. him, command ye.  [Exeunt with
    LORD SAY]  proudest peer realm wear head
    shoulders, pay tribute; a
    maid married, pay maidenhead ere they
    it. Men hold capite; charge and
    command wives free heart tongue
    tell.
  DICK. lord, Cheapside, up
    commodities bills?  
  CADE. Marry, presently.
  ALL. O, brave!

                      Re-enter heads

  CADE. braver? kiss another, they
    lov'd alive. part again, they
    consult giving towns France.
    Soldiers, defer spoil city night; these
    borne maces ride the
    streets, corner kiss. Away!     Exeunt




SCENE VIII.
Southwark

Alarum retreat. Enter CADE rabblement

  CADE. Fish Street! Saint Magnus' Corner! Kill knock
    down! Throw Thames!               [Sound parley]
    noise hear? Dare bold sound retreat
    parley command kill?

            Enter BUCKINGHAM CLIFFORD, attended

  BUCKINGHAM. Ay, dare disturb thee.
    relent, save life.
    Know, Cade, ambassadors King
    commons thou hast misled;
    pronounce free pardon all
    forsake thee home peace.
  CLIFFORD. ye, countrymen? ye relent
    yield mercy whilst 'tis offer'd you,
    rebel lead deaths?
    loves King, embrace pardon,  
    Fling cap 'God save Majesty!'
    hateth honours father,
    Henry Fifth, made France quake,
    Shake weapon pass by.
  ALL. God save King! God save King!
  CADE. What, Buckingham Clifford, ye brave?
    you, base peasants, ye him? be
    hang'd necks? Hath sword broke
    London gates, leave White Hart
    Southwark? thought ye arms
    till recovered ancient freedom. all
    recreants dastards, delight live slavery the
    nobility. break backs burdens, your
    houses heads, ravish wives daughters before
    faces. me, make shift one; God's curse
    light all!
  ALL. follow Cade, follow Cade!
  CLIFFORD. Cade son Henry Fifth,
    exclaim him?
    conduct heart France,  
    make meanest earls dukes?
    Alas, hath home, place fly to;
    live spoil,
    robbing friends us.
    Were't shame whilst live jar
    fearful French, late vanquished,
    make start o'er seas vanquish you?
    Methinks civil broil
    lording London streets,
    Crying 'Villiago!' meet.
    ten thousand base-born Cades miscarry
    stoop Frenchman's mercy.
    France, France, lost;
    Spare England, native coast.
    Henry hath money; strong manly.
    God side, doubt victory.
  ALL. Clifford! Clifford! follow King Clifford.
  CADE. feather lightly blown fro this
    multitude? Henry hales hundred
    mischiefs, makes leave desolate. lay  
    heads surprise me. sword make here
    staying. devils hell, through
    middest you! heavens honour witness that
    resolution me, followers' base and
    ignominious treasons, makes betake heels.
 Exit
  BUCKINGHAM. What, fled? some, follow him;
    brings head King
    thousand crowns reward.
                                             Exeunt them
    Follow me, soldiers; devise mean
    reconcile King.                   Exeunt




SCENE IX.
Killing, worth Castle

Sound trumpets. Enter KING, QUEEN, SOMERSET, terrace

  KING HENRY. king joy'd earthly throne
    command content I?
    sooner crept cradle
    made king, months old.
    subject long'd King
    long subject.

               Enter BUCKINGHAM CLIFFORD

  BUCKINGHAM. Health glad tidings Majesty!
  KING HENRY. Why, Buckingham, traitor Cade surpris'd?
    retir'd make strong?

     Enter, below, multitudes, halters necks

  CLIFFORD. fled, lord, powers yield,  
    humbly thus, halters necks,
    Expect Highness' doom life death.
  KING HENRY. Then, heaven, set ope thy everlasting gates,
    entertain vows praise!
    Soldiers, day redeem'd lives,
    show'd love Prince country.
    Continue good mind,
    Henry, infortunate,
    Assure yourselves, unkind.
    so, pardon all,
    dismiss countries.
  ALL. God save King! God save King!

                     Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. Grace advertised
    Duke York newly Ireland
    puissant mighty power
    gallowglasses stout kerns
    marching hitherward proud array,  
    proclaimeth, along,
    arms remove thee
    Duke Somerset, terms traitor.
  KING HENRY. stands state, 'twixt Cade York distress'd;
    ship that, scap'd tempest,
    straightway calm'd, boarded pirate;
    Cade driven back, men dispers'd,
    York arms him.
    pray thee, Buckingham, meet him
    reason arms.
    send Duke Edmund Tower-
    Somerset, commit thee thither
    army dismiss'd him.
  SOMERSET. lord,
    yield prison willingly,
    death, country good.
  KING HENRY. case rough terms,
    fierce brook hard language.
  BUCKINGHAM. will, lord, doubt deal
    things redound good.  
  KING HENRY. Come, wife, in, learn govern better;
    England curse wretched reign.
                                                Flourish. Exeunt




SCENE X.
Kent. Iden's garden

Enter CADE

  CADE. Fie ambitions! Fie myself, sword am
    ready famish! days hid woods and
    durst peep out, country laid me; now
    hungry that, lease life a
    thousand years, stay longer. Wherefore, brick
    wall climb'd garden, eat grass
    pick sallet while, amiss cool a
    man's stomach hot weather. word 'sallet'
    born good; time, sallet, my
    brain-pain cleft brown bill; time,
    dry, bravely marching, hath serv'd me
    quart-pot drink in; word 'sallet'
    serve feed on.

                             Enter IDEN

  IDEN. Lord, live turmoiled court  
    enjoy quiet walks these?
    small inheritance father left me
    Contenteth me, worth monarchy.
    seek wax great others' waning
    gather wealth care envy;
    Sufficeth maintains state,
    sends poor pleased gate.
  CADE. lord soil seize stray, for
    entering fee-simple leave. Ah, villain, thou wilt
    betray me, thousand crowns King carrying my
    head him; make thee eat iron ostrich and
    swallow sword great pin ere thou part.
  IDEN. Why, rude companion, whatsoe'er thou be,
    thee not; betray thee?
    Is't break garden
    thief rob grounds,
    Climbing walls spite owner,
    thou wilt brave saucy terms?
  CADE. Brave thee? Ay, blood broach'd, and
    beard thee too. well: eat meat  
    days, thou thy men leave you
    dead door-nail, pray God eat grass
    more.
  IDEN. Nay, ne'er said, England stands,
    Alexander Iden, esquire Kent,
    odds combat poor famish'd man.
    Oppose thy steadfast-gazing eyes mine;
    thou canst outface thy looks;
    Set limb limb, thou art lesser;
    Thy hand finger fist,
    Thy leg stick compared truncheon;
    foot fight strength thou hast,
    mine arm heaved air,
    Thy grave digg'd earth.
    words, greatness answers words,
    sword report speech forbears.
  CADE. valour, complete champion heard!
    Steel, thou turn edge, cut burly bon'd
    clown chines beef ere thou sleep thy sheath, beseech
    God knees thou mayst turn'd hobnails. [Here  
    fight; CADE falls] O, slain! famine hath slain
    me. ten thousand devils me, give the
    ten meals lost, defy all. Wither, garden, and
    henceforth burying place dwell house,
    unconquered soul Cade fled.
  IDEN. Is't Cade slain, monstrous traitor?
    Sword, hallow thee thy deed
    hang thee o'er tomb dead.
    Ne'er blood wiped thy point,
    thou shalt wear herald's coat
    emblaze honour thy master got.
  CADE. Iden, farewell; proud thy victory. Kent from
    hath lost man, exhort world be
    cowards; I, feared any, vanquished famine,
    valour.                                        [Dies]
  IDEN. thou wrong'st me, heaven judge.
    Die, damned wretch, curse bare thee!
    thrust thy body sword,
    I, thrust thy soul hell.
    drag thee headlong heels  
    dunghill, thy grave,
    cut thy ungracious head,
    bear triumph King,
    Leaving thy trunk crows feed upon.               Exit




<<THIS ELECTRONIC VERSION COMPLETE WORKS WILLIAM
SHAKESPEARE COPYRIGHT 1990-1993 WORLD LIBRARY, INC., IS
PROVIDED PROJECT GUTENBERG ETEXT ILLINOIS BENEDICTINE COLLEGE

SERVICE CHARGES DOWNLOAD TIME MEMBERSHIP.>>



ACT V. SCENE I.
Fields Dartford Blackheath

Enter YORK, army Irish, drum colours

  YORK. Ireland York claim right
    pluck crown feeble Henry's head:
    Ring bells aloud, burn bonfires clear bright,
    entertain great England's lawful king.
    Ah, sancta majestas! buy thee dear?
    obey rule;
    hand made handle nought gold.
    give due action words
    sword sceptre balance it.
    sceptre have, soul
    toss flower-de-luce France.

                         Enter BUCKINGHAM

    [Aside] here? Buckingham, disturb me?
    King hath him, sure: dissemble.
  BUCKINGHAM. York, thou meanest greet thee well.  
  YORK. Humphrey Buckingham, accept thy greeting.
    Art thou messenger, pleasure?
  BUCKINGHAM. messenger Henry, dread liege,
    reason arms peace;
    thou, subject am,
    thy oath true allegiance sworn,
    raise great power leave,
    dare bring thy force court.
  YORK. [Aside] Scarce speak, choler great.
    O, hew rocks fight flint,
    angry abject terms;
    now, Ajax Telamonius,
    sheep oxen spend fury.
    born King,
    king, kingly thoughts;
    make fair weather awhile,
    Till Henry weak strong.-
    Buckingham, prithee, pardon me
    answer while;
    mind troubled deep melancholy.  
    brought army hither
    remove proud Somerset King,
    Seditious Grace state.
  BUCKINGHAM. presumption thy part;
    thy arms end,
    King hath yielded thy demand:
    Duke Somerset Tower.
  YORK. thine honour, prisoner?
  BUCKINGHAM. mine honour, prisoner.
  YORK. Then, Buckingham, dismiss pow'rs.
    Soldiers, all; disperse yourselves;
    Meet to-morrow Saint George's field,
    pay wish.
    sovereign, virtuous Henry,
    Command eldest son, nay, sons,
    pledges fealty love.
    send live:
    Lands, goods, horse, armour, have,
    use, Somerset die.
  BUCKINGHAM. York, commend kind submission.  
    twain Highness' tent.

                  Enter KING, attendants

  KING HENRY. Buckingham, doth York intend harm us,
    marcheth thee arm arm?
  YORK. submission humility
    York doth present Highness.
  KING HENRY. intends forces thou dost bring?
  YORK. heave traitor Somerset hence,
    fight monstrous rebel Cade,
    heard discomfited.

                    Enter IDEN, CADE's head

  IDEN. rude condition
    pass presence king,
    Lo, present Grace traitor's head,
    head Cade, combat slew.
  KING HENRY. head Cade! Great God, art Thou!  
    O, view visage, dead,
    living wrought exceeding trouble.
    me, friend, art thou man slew him?
  IDEN. was, an't Majesty.
  KING HENRY. art thou call'd? thy degree?
  IDEN. Alexander Iden, name;
    poor esquire Kent loves king.
  BUCKINGHAM. you, lord, 'twere amiss
    created knight good service.
  KING HENRY. Iden, kneel down. [He kneels] Rise knight.
    give thee reward thousand marks,
    thou thenceforth attend us.
  IDEN. Iden live merit bounty,
    live true liege!

                    Enter QUEEN SOMERSET

  KING HENRY. See, Buckingham! Somerset th' Queen:
    Go, bid hide quickly Duke.
  QUEEN. thousand Yorks hide head,  
    boldly stand front face.
  YORK. now! Somerset liberty?
    Then, York, unloose thy long-imprisoned thoughts
    thy tongue equal thy heart.
    endure sight Somerset?
    False king, hast thou broken faith me,
    Knowing brook abuse?
    King call thee? No, thou art king;
    fit govern rule multitudes,
    dar'st not, no, canst rule traitor.
    head thine doth crown;
    Thy hand made grasp palmer's staff,
    grace awful princely sceptre.
    gold round engirt brows mine,
    smile frown, Achilles' spear,
    change kill cure.
    hand hold sceptre up,
    act controlling laws.
    Give place. heaven, thou shalt rule more
    O'er heaven created thy ruler.  
  SOMERSET. O monstrous traitor! arrest thee, York,
    capital treason 'gainst King crown.
    Obey, audacious traitor; kneel grace.
  YORK. Wouldst kneel? these,
    brook bow knee man.
    Sirrah, call sons bail:        Exit attendant
    know, ere thy ward,
    pawn swords enfranchisement.
  QUEEN. Call Clifford; bid amain,
    bastard boys York
    surety traitor father.
                                                 Exit BUCKINGHAM
  YORK. O blood-bespotted Neapolitan,
    Outcast Naples, England's bloody scourge!
    sons York, thy betters birth,
    father's bail; bane those
    surety refuse boys!

               Enter EDWARD RICHARD PLANTAGENET
  
    come: warrant make good.

                     Enter CLIFFORD SON

  QUEEN. Clifford deny bail.
  CLIFFORD. Health happiness lord King!
                                                        [Kneels]
  YORK. thee, Clifford. Say, news thee?
    Nay, fright angry look.
    thy sovereign, Clifford, kneel again;
    thy mistaking so, pardon thee.
  CLIFFORD. King, York, mistake;
    thou mistakes do.
    Bedlam him! man grown mad?
  KING HENRY. Ay, Clifford; bedlam ambitious humour
    Makes oppose king.
  CLIFFORD. traitor; Tower,
    chop factious pate his.
  QUEEN. arrested, obey;
    sons, says, give words him.  
  YORK. not, sons?
  EDWARD. Ay, noble father, words serve.
  RICHARD. words not, weapons shall.
  CLIFFORD. Why, brood traitors here!
  YORK. glass, call thy image so:
    thy king, thou false-heart traitor.
    Call stake brave bears,
    shaking chains
    astonish fell-lurking curs.
    Bid Salisbury Warwick me.

               Enter EARLS WARWICK SALISBURY

  CLIFFORD. thy bears? bait thy bears death,
    manacle berard chains,
    thou dar'st bring baiting-place.
  RICHARD. Oft hot o'er weening cur
    Run back bite, withheld;
    Who, suffer'd, bear's fell paw,
    Hath clapp'd tail legs cried;  
    piece service do,
    oppose match Lord Warwick.
  CLIFFORD. Hence, heap wrath, foul indigested lump,
    crooked thy manners thy shape!
  YORK. Nay, heat anon.
  CLIFFORD. heed, heat burn yourselves.
  KING HENRY. Why, Warwick, hath thy knee forgot bow?
    Salisbury, shame thy silver hair,
    Thou mad misleader thy brainsick son!
    What, wilt thou thy death-bed play ruffian
    seek sorrow thy spectacles?
    O, faith? O, loyalty?
    banish'd frosty head,
    find harbour earth?
    Wilt thou dig grave find war
    shame thine honourable age blood?
    art thou old, want'st experience?
    wherefore dost abuse it, thou hast it?
    shame! duty bend thy knee me,
    bows grave mickle age.  
  SALISBURY. lord, considered myself
    tide renowned duke,
    conscience repute Grace
    rightful heir England's royal seat.
  KING HENRY. Hast thou sworn allegiance me?
  SALISBURY. have.
  KING HENRY. Canst thou dispense heaven oath?
  SALISBURY. great sin swear sin;
    greater sin sinful oath.
    bound solemn vow
    murd'rous deed, rob man,
    force spotless virgin's chastity,
    reave orphan patrimony,
    wring widow custom'd right,
    reason wrong
    bound solemn oath?
  QUEEN. subtle traitor sophister.
  KING HENRY. Call Buckingham, bid arm himself.
  YORK. Call Buckingham, friends thou hast,
    resolv'd death dignity.  
  CLIFFORD. warrant thee, dreams prove true.
  WARWICK. bed dream again
    thee tempest field.
  CLIFFORD. resolv'd bear greater storm
    thou canst conjure to-day;
    write thy burgonet,
    thee thy household badge.
  WARWICK. Now, father's badge, Nevil's crest,
    rampant bear chain'd ragged staff,
    day wear aloft burgonet,
    mountain-top cedar shows,
    leaves spite storm,
    affright thee view thereof.
  CLIFFORD. thy burgonet rend thy bear
    tread foot contempt,
    berard protects bear.
  YOUNG CLIFFORD. arms, victorious father,
    quell rebels complices.
  RICHARD. Fie! charity, shame! Speak spite,
    Jesu Christ to-night.  
  YOUNG CLIFFORD. Foul stigmatic, thou canst tell.
  RICHARD. heaven, surely hell.
                                                Exeunt severally




SCENE II.
Saint Albans

Alarums battle. Enter WARWICK

  WARWICK. Clifford Cumberland, 'tis Warwick calls;
    thou dost hide thee bear,
    Now, angry trumpet sounds alarum
    dead men's cries fill empty air,
    Clifford, say, fight me.
    Proud northern lord, Clifford Cumberland,
  WARWICK hoarse calling thee arms.

                          Enter YORK

    now, noble lord! what, a-foot?
  YORK. deadly-handed Clifford slew steed;
    match match encount'red him,
    made prey carrion kites crows
    bonny beast lov'd well.

                      Enter CLIFFORD  

  WARWICK. time come.
  YORK. Hold, Warwick, seek thee chase,
    hunt deer death.
  WARWICK. Then, nobly, York; 'tis crown thou fight'st.
    intend, Clifford, thrive to-day,
    grieves soul leave thee unassail'd.            Exit
  CLIFFORD. seest thou me, York? dost thou pause?
  YORK. thy brave bearing love
    thou art fast mine enemy.
  CLIFFORD. thy prowess praise esteem
    'tis shown ignobly treason.
  YORK. thy sword,
    justice true express it!
  CLIFFORD. soul body action both!
  YORK. dreadful lay! Address thee instantly.
                                 [They fight CLIFFORD falls]
  CLIFFORD. La fin couronne les oeuvres.                  [Dies]
  YORK. war hath thee peace, thou art still.
    Peace soul, heaven, thy will!         Exit  

                     Enter YOUNG CLIFFORD

  YOUNG CLIFFORD. Shame confusion! rout;
    Fear frames disorder, disorder wounds
    guard. O war, thou son hell,
    angry heavens make minister,
    Throw frozen bosoms part
    Hot coals vengeance! soldier fly.
    dedicate war
    Hath self-love; loves himself
    Hath essentially, circumstance,
    valour.                 [Sees father's body]
    O, vile world end
    premised flames day
    Knit earth heaven together!
    general trumpet blow blast,
    Particularities petty sounds
    cease! Wast thou ordain'd, dear father,
    lose thy youth peace achieve  
    silver livery advised age,
    thy reverence thy chair-days thus
    die ruffian battle? sight
    heart turn'd stone; 'tis mine
    stony. York men spares;
    babes. Tears virginal
    dew fire;
    beauty, tyrant oft reclaims,
    flaming wrath oil flax.
    Henceforth pity:
    Meet infant house York,
    gobbets cut it
    wild Medea young Absyrtus did;
    cruelty seek fame.
    Come, thou ruin Clifford's house;
    Aeneas Anchises bear,
    bear thee manly shoulders;
    Aeneas bare living load,
    heavy woes mine.
                                              Exit body  

       Enter RICHARD SOMERSET fight. SOMERSET killed

  RICHARD. So, lie thou there;
    underneath alehouse' paltry sign,
    Castle Saint Albans, Somerset
    Hath made wizard famous death.
    Sword, hold thy temper; heart, wrathful still:
    Priests pray enemies, princes kill.             Exit

        Fight. Excursions. Enter KING, QUEEN, others

  QUEEN. Away, lord! slow; shame, away!
  KING HENRY. outrun heavens? Good Margaret, stay.
  QUEEN. made of? fight fly.
    manhood, wisdom, defence,
    give enemy way, secure us
    can, fly.
                                               [Alarum afar off]
    ta'en, bottom  
    fortunes; haply scape-
    may, neglect-
    London get, lov'd,
    breach fortunes made
    readily stopp'd.

                     Re-enter YOUNG CLIFFORD

  YOUNG CLIFFORD. heart's future mischief set,
    speak blasphemy ere bid fly;
    fly must; uncurable discomfit
    Reigns hearts present parts.
    Away, relief! live
    day fortune give.
    Away, lord, away!                                  Exeunt




SCENE III.
Fields Saint Albans

Alarum. Retreat. Enter YORK, RICHARD, WARWICK, soldiers,
with drum colours

  YORK. Salisbury, report him,
    winter lion, rage forgets
    Aged contusions brush time
    And, gallant brow youth,
    Repairs occasion? happy day
    itself, won foot,
    Salisbury lost.
  RICHARD. noble father,
    times to-day holp horse,
    times bestrid him, thrice led off,
    Persuaded act;
    danger was, met him;
    rich hangings homely house,
    feeble body.
    But, noble is, comes.
  
                         Enter SALISBURY

  SALISBURY. Now, sword, hast thou fought to-day!
    th' mass, all. you, Richard:
    God long live,
    hath pleas'd times to-day
    defended imminent death.
    Well, lords, have;
    'Tis foes time fled,
    opposites repairing nature.
  YORK. safety follow them;
    For, hear, King fled London
    call present court Parliament.
    pursue ere writs forth.
    Lord Warwick? them?
  WARWICK. them? Nay, them, can.
    Now, faith, lords, 'twas glorious day:
    Saint Albans' battle, won famous York,
    eterniz'd age come.
    Sound drum trumpets London all;  
    days befall!             Exeunt


THE END

1591

THE PART KING HENRY SIXTH

by William Shakespeare



DRAMATIS PERSONAE

  KING HENRY SIXTH
  EDWARD, PRINCE WALES, son
  LEWIS XI, King France           DUKE SOMERSET
  DUKE EXETER                     EARL OXFORD
  EARL NORTHUMBERLAND             EARL WESTMORELAND
  LORD CLIFFORD
  RICHARD PLANTAGENET, DUKE YORK
  EDWARD, EARL MARCH, KING EDWARD IV, son
  EDMUND, EARL RUTLAND, son
  GEORGE, DUKE CLARENCE, son
  RICHARD, DUKE GLOUCESTER, son
  DUKE NORFOLK                    MARQUIS MONTAGUE
  EARL WARWICK                    EARL PEMBROKE
  LORD HASTINGS                      LORD STAFFORD
  SIR JOHN MORTIMER, uncle Duke York
  SIR HUGH MORTIMER, uncle Duke York
  HENRY, EARL RICHMOND, youth
  LORD RIVERS, brother Lady Grey
  SIR WILLIAM STANLEY                SIR JOHN MONTGOMERY
  SIR JOHN SOMERVILLE                TUTOR, Rutland  
  MAYOR YORK                      LIEUTENANT TOWER
  NOBLEMAN                         KEEPERS
  HUNTSMAN
  SON killed father
  FATHER killed son

  QUEEN MARGARET
  LADY GREY, QUEEN Edward IV
  BONA, sister French Queen

  Soldiers, Attendants, Messengers, Watchmen, etc.




<<THIS ELECTRONIC VERSION COMPLETE WORKS WILLIAM
SHAKESPEARE COPYRIGHT 1990-1993 WORLD LIBRARY, INC., IS
PROVIDED PROJECT GUTENBERG ETEXT ILLINOIS BENEDICTINE COLLEGE
WITH PERMISSION.  ELECTRONIC MACHINE READABLE COPIES BE
DISTRIBUTED LONG COPIES (1) OTHERS
PERSONAL ONLY, (2) DISTRIBUTED USED
COMMERCIALLY.  PROHIBITED COMMERCIAL DISTRIBUTION INCLUDES ANY
SERVICE CHARGES DOWNLOAD TIME MEMBERSHIP.>>



SCENE:
England France

ACT I. SCENE I.
London. Parliament House

Alarum. Enter DUKE YORK, EDWARD, RICHARD, NORFOLK, MONTAGUE, WARWICK,
and soldiers, white roses hats

  WARWICK. King escap'd hands.
  YORK. pursu'd horsemen north,
    slily stole left men;
    Whereat great Lord Northumberland,
    warlike ears brook retreat,
    Cheer'd drooping army, himself,
    Lord Clifford, Lord Stafford, abreast,
    Charg'd main battle's front, and, breaking in,
    swords common soldiers slain.
  EDWARD. Lord Stafford's father, Duke Buckingham,
    slain wounded dangerous;
    cleft beaver downright blow.
    true, father, behold blood.
  MONTAGUE. And, brother, Earl Wiltshire's blood,
    encount'red battles join'd.  
  RICHARD. Speak thou me, did.
                                 [Throwing SOMERSET'S head]
  YORK. Richard hath deserv'd sons.
    Grace dead, Lord Somerset?
  NORFOLK. hope line John Gaunt!
  RICHARD. hope shake King Henry's head.
  WARWICK. I. Victorious Prince York,
    thee seated throne
    house Lancaster usurps,
    vow heaven eyes close.
    palace fearful King,
    regal seat. Possess it, York;
    thine, King Henry's heirs'.
  YORK. Assist then, sweet Warwick, will;
    broken force.
  NORFOLK. assist you; flies die.
  YORK. Thanks, gentle Norfolk. Stay me, lords;
    And, soldiers, stay lodge night.
                                                    [They up]
  WARWICK. King comes, offer violence.  
    seek thrust perforce.
  YORK. Queen day holds parliament,
    thinks council.
    words blows win right.
  RICHARD. Arm'd are, stay house.
  WARWICK. bloody parliament call'd,
    Plantagenet, Duke York, King,
    bashful Henry depos'd, cowardice
    Hath made by-words enemies.
  YORK. leave not, lords; resolute:
    possession right.
  WARWICK. King, loves best,
    proudest holds Lancaster,
    Dares stir wing Warwick shake bells.
    plant Plantagenet, root dares.
    Resolve thee, Richard; claim English crown.
                                      [YORK occupies throne]

       Flourish. Enter KING HENRY, CLIFFORD, NORTHUMBERLAND,
        WESTMORELAND, EXETER, others, red roses  
                            hats

  KING HENRY. lords, sturdy rebel sits,
    chair state! Belike means,
    Back'd power Warwick, false peer,
    aspire crown reign king.
    Earl Northumberland, slew thy father;
    thine, Lord Clifford; vow'd revenge
    him, sons, favourites, friends.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. not, heavens reveng'd me!
  CLIFFORD. hope thereof makes Clifford mourn steel.
  WESTMORELAND. What, suffer this? pluck down;
    heart anger burns; brook it.
  KING HENRY. patient, gentle Earl Westmoreland.
  CLIFFORD. Patience poltroons he;
    durst sit father liv'd.
    gracious lord, parliament
    assail family York.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. hast thou spoken, cousin; so.
  KING HENRY. Ah, city favours them,  
    troops soldiers beck?
  EXETER. Duke slain quickly fly.
  KING HENRY. thought Henry's heart,
    make shambles parliament house!
    Cousin Exeter, frowns, words, threats,
    war Henry means use.
    Thou factious Duke York, descend throne
    kneel grace mercy feet;
    thy sovereign.
  YORK. thine.
  EXETER. shame, down; made thee Duke York.
  YORK. 'Twas inheritance, earldom was.
  EXETER. Thy father traitor crown.
  WARWICK. Exeter, thou art traitor crown
    usurping Henry.
  CLIFFORD. follow natural king?
  WARWICK. True, Clifford; Richard Duke York.
  KING HENRY. stand, thou sit throne?
  YORK. so; content thyself.
  WARWICK. Duke Lancaster; King.  
  WESTMORELAND. King Duke Lancaster;
    Lord Westmoreland maintain.
  WARWICK. Warwick disprove it. forget
    chas'd field,
    slew fathers, colours spread
    March'd city palace gates.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Yes, Warwick, remember grief;
    And, soul, thou thy house rue it.
  WESTMORELAND. Plantagenet, thee, thy sons,
    Thy kinsmen, thy friends, lives
    drops blood father's veins.
  CLIFFORD. Urge more; words
    send thee, Warwick, messenger
    revenge death stir.
  WARWICK. Poor Clifford, scorn worthless threats!
  YORK. show title crown?
    not, swords plead field.
  KING HENRY. title hast thou, traitor, crown?
    Thy father was, thou art, Duke York;
    Thy grandfather, Roger Mortimer, Earl March:  
    son Henry Fifth,
    made Dauphin French stoop,
    seiz'd towns provinces.
  WARWICK. Talk France, sith thou hast lost all.
  KING HENRY. Lord Protector lost it, I:
    crown'd, months old.
  RICHARD. now, methinks lose.
    Father, tear crown usurper's head.
  EDWARD. Sweet father, so; set head.
  MONTAGUE. Good brother, thou lov'st honourest arms,
    fight stand cavilling thus.
  RICHARD. Sound drums trumpets, King fly.
  YORK. Sons, peace!
  KING HENRY. Peace thou! give King Henry leave speak.
  WARWICK. Plantagenet speak first. Hear him, lords;
    silent attentive too,
    interrupts live.
  KING HENRY. Think'st thou leave kingly throne,
    grandsire father sat?
    No; war unpeople realm;  
    Ay, colours, borne France,
    England heart's great sorrow,
    winding-sheet. faint you, lords?
    title's good, his.
  WARWICK. Prove it, Henry, thou shalt King.
  KING HENRY. Henry Fourth conquest crown.
  YORK. 'Twas rebellion king.
  KING HENRY. [Aside] say; title's weak.-
    me, king adopt heir?
  YORK. then?
  KING HENRY. may, lawful King;
    Richard, view lords,
    Resign'd crown Henry Fourth,
    heir father was, his.
  YORK. rose him, sovereign,
    made resign crown perforce.
  WARWICK. Suppose, lords, unconstrain'd,
    'twere prejudicial crown?
  EXETER. No; resign crown
    heir succeed reign.  
  KING HENRY. Art thou us, Duke Exeter?
  EXETER. right, pardon me.
  YORK. whisper you, lords, answer not?
  EXETER. conscience tells lawful King.
  KING HENRY. [Aside] revolt me, turn him.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Plantagenet, claim thou lay'st,
    Henry depos'd.
  WARWICK. Depos'd be, all.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Thou art deceiv'd. 'Tis thy southern power
    Essex, Norfolk, Suffolk, Kent,
    makes thee presumptuous proud,
    set Duke me.
  CLIFFORD. King Henry, thy title wrong,
    Lord Clifford vows fight thy defence.
    ground gape, swallow alive,
    kneel slew father!
  KING HENRY. O Clifford, thy words revive heart!
  YORK. Henry Lancaster, resign thy crown.
    mutter you, conspire you, lords?
  WARWICK. princely Duke York;  
    fill house armed men,
    chair state, sits,
    Write title usurping blood.
                                [He stamps foot the
                                       soldiers show themselves]
  KING HENRY. Lord Warwick, hear word:
    life-time reign king.
  YORK. Confirm crown mine heirs,
    thou shalt reign quiet thou liv'st.
  KING HENRY. content. Richard Plantagenet,
    Enjoy kingdom decease.
  CLIFFORD. wrong Prince son!
  WARWICK. good England himself!
  WESTMORELAND. Base, fearful, despairing Henry!
  CLIFFORD. hast thou injur'd thyself us!
  WESTMORELAND. stay hear articles.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. I.
  CLIFFORD. Come, cousin, Queen news.
  WESTMORELAND. Farewell, faint-hearted degenerate king,
    cold blood spark honour bides.  
  NORTHUMBERLAND. thou prey house York
    die bands unmanly deed!
  CLIFFORD. dreadful war mayst thou overcome,
    live peace abandon'd despis'd!
                                Exeunt NORTHUMBERLAND, CLIFFORD,
                                                WESTMORELAND
  WARWICK. Turn way, Henry, regard not.
  EXETER. seek revenge, yield.
  KING HENRY. Ah, Exeter!
  WARWICK. sigh, lord?
  KING HENRY. myself, Lord Warwick, son,
    unnaturally disinherit.
    may. [To YORK] entail
    crown thee thine heirs ever;
    Conditionally, thou oath
    cease civil war, and, whilst live,
    honour thy king sovereign,
    treason hostility
    seek put reign thyself.
  YORK. oath willingly take, perform.  
                                        [Coming throne]
  WARWICK. Long live King Henry! Plantagenet, embrace him.
  KING HENRY. long live thou, thy forward sons!
  YORK. York Lancaster reconcil'd.
  EXETER. Accurs'd seeks make foes!
                                   [Sennet. down]
  YORK. Farewell, gracious lord; castle.
  WARWICK. London soldiers.
  NORFOLK. Norfolk followers.
  MONTAGUE. sea, came.
                                             Exeunt YORKISTS
  KING HENRY. I, grief sorrow, court.

            Enter QUEEN MARGARET PRINCE WALES

  EXETER. Queen, bewray anger.
    steal away.
  KING HENRY. Exeter, I.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Nay, me; follow thee.
  KING HENRY. patient, gentle queen, stay.  
  QUEEN MARGARET. patient extremes?
    Ah, wretched man! died maid,
    thee, borne thee son,
    thou hast prov'd unnatural father!
    Hath deserv'd lose birthright thus?
    Hadst thou lov'd half I,
    felt pain once,
    nourish'd blood,
    Thou wouldst left thy dearest heart-blood there
    made savage duke thine heir,
    disinherited thine son.
  PRINCE WALES. Father, disinherit me.
    King, succeed?
  KING HENRY. Pardon me, Margaret; pardon me, sweet son.
    Earl Warwick Duke enforc'd me.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Enforc'd thee! Art thou King wilt be
      forc'd?
    shame hear thee speak. Ah, timorous wretch!
    Thou hast undone thyself, thy son, me;
    giv'n house York head  
    thou shalt reign sufferance.
    entail heirs crown,
    make thy sepulchre
    creep thy time?
    Warwick Chancellor lord Calais;
    Stern Falconbridge commands narrow seas;
    Duke made Protector realm;
    shalt thou safe? safety finds
    trembling lamb environed wolves.
    there, silly woman,
    soldiers toss'd pikes
    granted act.
    thou prefer'st thy life thine honour;
    thou dost, divorce myself,
    thy table, Henry, thy bed,
    act parliament repeal'd
    son disinherited.
    northern lords forsworn thy colours
    follow mine, spread;
    spread be, thy foul disgrace  
    utter ruin house York.
    leave thee. Come, son, away;
    army ready; come, them.
  KING HENRY. Stay, gentle Margaret, hear speak.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Thou hast spoke already; thee gone.
  KING HENRY. Gentle son Edward, thou wilt stay me?
  QUEEN MARGARET. Ay, murder'd enemies.
  PRINCE WALES. return victory field
    Grace; till follow her.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Come, son, away; linger thus.
                            Exeunt QUEEN MARGARET PRINCE
  KING HENRY. Poor queen! love son
    Hath made break terms rage!
    Reveng'd hateful Duke,
    haughty spirit, winged desire,
    cost crown, empty eagle
    Tire flesh son!
    loss lords torments heart.
    write them, entreat fair;
    Come, cousin, messenger.  
  EXETER. I, hope, reconcile all.        Exeunt




SCENE II.
Sandal Castle, Wakefield, Yorkshire

Flourish. Enter EDWARD, RICHARD, MONTAGUE

  RICHARD. Brother, youngest, give leave.
  EDWARD. No, play orator.
  MONTAGUE. reasons strong forcible.

                     Enter DUKE YORK

  YORK. Why, now, sons brother! strife?
    quarrel? began first?
  EDWARD. quarrel, slight contention.
  YORK. what?
  RICHARD. concerns Grace us-
    crown England, father, yours.
  YORK. Mine, boy? till King Henry dead.
  RICHARD. depends life death.
  EDWARD. heir, enjoy now.
    giving house Lancaster leave breathe,
    outrun you, father, end.  
  YORK. oath quietly reign.
  EDWARD. kingdom oath broken:
    break thousand oaths reign year.
  RICHARD. No; God forbid Grace forsworn.
  YORK. be, claim open war.
  RICHARD. prove contrary, hear speak.
  YORK. Thou canst not, son; impossible.
  RICHARD. oath moment, took
    true lawful magistrate
    hath authority swears.
    Henry none, usurp place;
    Then, 'twas made depose,
    oath, lord, vain frivolous.
    Therefore, arms. And, father, think
    sweet thing wear crown,
    circuit Elysium
    poets feign bliss joy.
    linger thus? rest
    white rose wear dy'd
    lukewarm blood Henry's heart.  
  YORK. Richard, enough; King, die.
    Brother, thou shalt London presently
    whet Warwick enterprise.
    Thou, Richard, shalt Duke Norfolk
    privily intent.
    You, Edward, Lord Cobham,
    Kentishmen willingly rise;
    trust, soldiers,
    Witty, courteous, liberal, full spirit.
    employ'd, resteth more
    seek occasion rise,
    King privy drift,
    house Lancaster?

                      Enter MESSENGER

    But, stay. news? com'st thou post?
  MESSENGER. Queen northern earls lords
    Intend besiege castle.
    hard twenty thousand men;  
    fortify hold, lord.
  YORK. Ay, sword. What! think'st thou fear them?
    Edward Richard, stay me;
    brother Montague post London.
    noble Warwick, Cobham, rest,
    left protectors King,
    pow'rful policy strengthen themselves
    trust simple Henry oaths.
  MONTAGUE. Brother, go; win them, fear not.
    humbly leave.                Exit

              Enter SIR JOHN SIR HUGH MORTIMER

  YORK. Sir john Sir Hugh Mortimer, mine uncles!
    Sandal happy hour;
    army Queen besiege us.
  SIR JOHN. need; meet field.
  YORK. What, thousand men?
  RICHARD. Ay, hundred, father, need.
    woman's general; fear?  
                                              [A march afar off]
  EDWARD. hear drums. set men order,
    issue bid battle straight.
  YORK. men twenty! odds great,
    doubt not, uncle, victory.
    battle won France,
    enemy hath ten one;
    success?           Exeunt




SCENE III.
Field battle Sandal Castle Wakefield

Alarum. Enter RUTLAND TUTOR

  RUTLAND. Ah, fly scape hands?
    Ah, tutor, bloody Clifford comes!

                  Enter CLIFFORD soldiers

  CLIFFORD. Chaplain, away! Thy priesthood saves thy life.
    brat accursed duke,
    father slew father, die.
  TUTOR. I, lord, bear company.
  CLIFFORD. Soldiers, him!
  TUTOR. Ah, Clifford, murder innocent child,
    thou hated God man.
                                    Exit, forced soldiers
  CLIFFORD. now, dead already? fear
    makes close eyes? open them.
  RUTLAND. pent-up lion o'er wretch
    trembles devouring paws;  
    walks, insulting o'er prey,
    comes, rend limbs asunder.
    Ah, gentle Clifford, kill thy sword,
    cruel threat'ning look!
    Sweet Clifford, hear speak die.
    subject thy wrath;
    thou reveng'd men, live.
  CLIFFORD. vain thou speak'st, poor boy; father's blood
    Hath stopp'd passage thy words enter.
  RUTLAND. father's blood open again:
    man, and, Clifford, cope him.
  CLIFFORD. thy brethren here, lives thine
    revenge sufficient me;
    No, digg'd thy forefathers' graves
    hung rotten coffins chains,
    slake mine ire ease heart.
    sight house York
    fury torment soul;
    till root accursed line
    leave alive, live hell.  
    Therefore-
  RUTLAND. O, pray death!
    thee pray: sweet Clifford, pity me.
  CLIFFORD. pity rapier's point affords.
  RUTLAND. thee harm; wilt thou slay me?
  CLIFFORD. Thy father hath.
  RUTLAND. 'twas ere born.
    Thou hast son; sake pity me,
    revenge thereof, sith God just,
    miserably slain I.
    Ah, live prison days;
    give occasion offence
    die, thou hast cause.
  CLIFFORD. cause!
    Thy father slew father; therefore, die.       [Stabs him]
  RUTLAND. Di faciant laudis summa sit ista tuae!         [Dies]
  CLIFFORD. Plantagenet, come, Plantagenet;
    thy son's blood cleaving blade
    rust weapon, till thy blood,
    Congeal'd this, make wipe both.          Exit




SCENE IV.
Another part field

Alarum. Enter DUKE YORK

  YORK. army Queen hath field.
    uncles slain rescuing me;
    followers eager foe
    Turn back fly, ships wind,
    lambs pursu'd hunger-starved wolves.
    sons- God hath bechanced them;
    know- demean'd themselves
    men born renown life death.
    times Richard make lane me,
    thrice cried 'Courage, father! fight out.'
    full oft Edward side
    purple falchion, painted hilt
    blood encount'red him.
    hardiest warriors retire,
    Richard cried 'Charge, give foot ground!'
    cried 'A crown, glorious tomb!
    sceptre, earthly sepulchre!'  
    charg'd again; alas!
    bodg'd again; swan
    bootless labour swim tide
    spend strength over-matching waves.
                                         [A short alarum within]
    Ah, hark! fatal followers pursue,
    faint fly fury;
    strong, shun fury.
    sands numb'red make life;
    stay, life end.

         Enter QUEEN MARGARET, CLIFFORD, NORTHUMBERLAND,
               PRINCE WALES, soldiers

    Come, bloody Clifford, rough Northumberland,
    dare quenchless fury rage;
    butt, abide shot.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Yield mercy, proud Plantagenet.
  CLIFFORD. Ay, mercy ruthless arm
    downright payment show'd father.  
    Phaethon hath tumbled car,
    made evening noontide prick.
  YORK. ashes, phoenix, bring forth
    bird revenge all;
    hope throw mine eyes heaven,
    Scorning whate'er afflict with.
    not? What! multitudes, fear?
  CLIFFORD. cowards fight fly further;
    doves peck falcon's piercing talons;
    desperate thieves, hopeless lives,
    Breathe invectives 'gainst officers.
  YORK. O Clifford, bethink thee again,
    thy thought o'errun time;
    And, thou canst blushing, view face,
    bite thy tongue slanders cowardice
    frown hath made thee faint fly ere this!
  CLIFFORD. bandy thee word word,
    buckler thee blows, one.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Hold, valiant Clifford; thousand causes
    prolong awhile traitor's life.  
    Wrath makes deaf; speak thou, Northumberland.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Hold, Clifford! honour much
    prick thy finger, wound heart.
    valour it, cur doth grin,
    thrust hand teeth,
    spurn foot away?
    war's prize vantages;
    ten impeach valour.
                         [They lay hands YORK, struggles]
  CLIFFORD. Ay, ay, strives woodcock gin.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. doth cony struggle net.
  YORK. triumph thieves conquer'd booty;
    true men yield, robbers o'er-match'd.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Grace now?
  QUEEN MARGARET. Brave warriors, Clifford Northumberland,
    Come, make stand molehill here
    raught mountains outstretched arms,
    parted shadow hand.
    What, England's king?
    Was't revell'd parliament  
    made preachment high descent?
    mess sons back now?
    wanton Edward lusty George?
    valiant crook-back prodigy,
    Dicky boy, grumbling voice
    wont cheer dad mutinies?
    Or, rest, darling Rutland?
    Look, York: stain'd napkin blood
    valiant Clifford rapier's point
    Made issue bosom boy;
    thine eyes water death,
    give thee dry thy cheeks withal.
    Alas, poor York! hate thee deadly,
    lament thy miserable state.
    prithee grieve make merry, York.
    What, hath thy fiery heart parch'd thine entrails
    tear fall Rutland's death?
    art thou patient, man? Thou shouldst mad;
    make thee mad mock thee thus.
    Stamp, rave, fret, sing dance.  
    Thou wouldst fee'd, see, make sport;
    York speak wear crown.
    crown York!-and, lords, bow low him.
    Hold hands whilst set on.
                             [Putting paper crown head]
    Ay, marry, sir, king!
    Ay, King Henry's chair,
    adopted heir.
    great Plantagenet
    crown'd broke solemn oath?
    bethink me, King
    Till King Henry shook hands death.
    pale head Henry's glory,
    rob temples diadem,
    life, holy oath?
    O, 'tis fault too
    crown crown head;
    And, whilst breathe, time dead.
  CLIFFORD. office, father's sake.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Nay, stay; hear orisons makes.  
  YORK. She-wolf France, worse wolves France,
    tongue poisons adder's tooth!
    ill-beseeming thy sex
    triumph Amazonian trull
    woes fortune captivates!
    thy face visard-like, unchanging,
    Made impudent evil deeds,
    assay, proud queen, make thee blush.
    thee thou cam'st, deriv'd,
    shame shame thee, wert thou shameless.
    Thy father bears type King Naples,
    Sicils Jerusalem,
    wealthy English yeoman.
    Hath poor monarch taught thee insult?
    not, boots thee not, proud queen;
    adage verified,
    beggars mounted run horse death.
    'Tis beauty doth oft make women proud;
    But, God knows, thy share thereof small.
    'Tis virtue doth make admir'd;  
    contrary doth make thee wond'red at.
    'Tis government makes divine;
    thereof makes thee abominable.
    Thou art opposite good
    Antipodes us,
    south septentrion.
    O tiger's heart wrapp'd woman's hide!
    couldst thou drain life-blood child,
    bid father wipe eyes withal,
    bear woman's face?
    Women soft, mild, pitiful, flexible:
    Thou stern, obdurate, flinty, rough, remorseless.
    Bid'st thou rage? Why, thou hast thy wish;
    Wouldst weep? Why, thou hast thy will;
    raging wind blows incessant showers,
    rage allays, rain begins.
    tears sweet Rutland's obsequies;
    drop cries vengeance death
    'Gainst thee, fell Clifford, thee, false Frenchwoman.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Beshrew me, passions move  
    check eyes tears.
  YORK. face hungry cannibals
    touch'd, stain'd blood;
    inhuman, inexorable-
    O, ten times more- tigers Hyrcania.
    See, ruthless queen, hapless father's tears.
    cloth thou dipp'dst blood sweet boy,
    tears wash blood away.
    thou napkin, boast this;
    thou tell'st heavy story right,
    soul, hearers shed tears;
    Yea, foes shed fast-falling tears
    'Alas, piteous deed!'
    There, crown, crown curse;
    thy comfort thee
    reap thy cruel hand!
    Hard-hearted Clifford, world;
    soul heaven, blood heads!
  NORTHUMBERLAND. slaughter-man kin,
    life weep him,  
    inly sorrow gripes soul.
  QUEEN MARGARET. What, weeping-ripe, Lord Northumberland?
    wrong all,
    quickly dry thy melting tears.
  CLIFFORD. oath, father's death.
                                                  [Stabbing him]
  QUEEN MARGARET. gentle-hearted king.
                                                  [Stabbing him]
  YORK. Open Thy gate mercy, gracious God!
    soul flies wounds seek Thee.
                                                          [Dies]
  QUEEN MARGARET. head, set York gates;
    York overlook town York.
                                                Flourish. Exeunt
