ACT II. SCENE I.
A plain Mortimer's Cross Herefordshire

A march. Enter EDWARD, RICHARD, power

  EDWARD. princely father scap'd,
    scap'd no
    Clifford's Northumberland's pursuit.
    ta'en, heard news;
    slain, heard news;
    scap'd, methinks heard
    happy tidings good escape.
    fares brother? sad?
  RICHARD. joy resolv'd
    valiant father become.
    battle range about,
    watch'd singled Clifford forth.
    Methought bore thickest troop
    doth lion herd neat;
    bear, encompass'd round dogs,
    pinch'd made cry,
    rest stand aloof bark him.  
    far'd father enemies;
    fled enemies warlike father.
    Methinks 'tis prize son.
    morning opes golden gates
    takes farewell glorious sun.
    resembles prime youth,
    Trimm'd younker prancing love!
  EDWARD. Dazzle mine eyes, suns?
  RICHARD. glorious suns, perfect sun;
    separated racking clouds,
    sever'd pale clear-shining sky.
    See, see! join, embrace, kiss,
    vow'd league inviolable.
    lamp, light, sun.
    heaven figures event.
  EDWARD. 'Tis wondrous strange, heard of.
    cites us, brother, field,
    we, sons brave Plantagenet,
    blazing meeds,
    notwithstanding join lights  
    overshine earth, world.
    Whate'er bodes, henceforward bear
    target fair shining suns.
  RICHARD. Nay, bear daughters- leave speak it,
    love breeder male.

                 Enter MESSENGER, blowing

    art thou, heavy foretell
    dreadful story hanging thy tongue?
  MESSENGER. Ah, woeful looker-on
    noble Duke York slain,
    princely father loving lord!
  EDWARD. O, speak more! heard much.
  RICHARD. died, hear all.
  MESSENGER. Environed foes,
    stood hope Troy
    Greeks ent'red Troy.
    Hercules yield odds;
    strokes, axe,  
    Hews fells hardest-timber'd oak.
    hands father subdu'd;
    slaught'red ireful arm
    unrelenting Clifford Queen,
    crown'd gracious Duke high despite,
    Laugh'd face; grief wept,
    ruthless Queen gave dry cheeks
    napkin steeped harmless blood
    sweet young Rutland, rough Clifford slain;
    scorns, foul taunts,
    head, gates York
    set same; doth remain,
    saddest spectacle e'er view'd.
  EDWARD. Sweet Duke York, prop lean upon,
    thou art gone, staff, stay.
    O Clifford, boist'rous Clifford, thou hast slain
    flow'r Europe chivalry;
    treacherously hast thou vanquish'd him,
    hand hand vanquish'd thee.
    soul's palace prison.  
    Ah, break hence, body
    ground closed rest!
    henceforth joy again;
    Never, O never, joy.
  RICHARD. weep, body's moisture
    Scarce serves quench furnace-burning heart;
    tongue unload heart's great burden,
    self-same wind speak withal
    kindling coals fires breast,
    burns flames tears quench.
    weep make depth grief.
    Tears babes; blows revenge me!
    Richard, bear thy name; venge thy death,
    die renowned attempting it.
  EDWARD. valiant duke hath left thee;
    dukedom chair left.
  RICHARD. Nay, thou princely eagle's bird,
    Show thy descent gazing 'gainst sun;
    chair dukedom, throne kingdom, say:
    thine, thou wert his.  

         March. Enter WARWICK, MONTAGUE, army

  WARWICK. now, fair lords! fare? news abroad?
  RICHARD. Great Lord Warwick, recount
    baleful news word's deliverance
    Stab poinards flesh till told,
    words add anguish wounds.
    O valiant lord, Duke York slain!
  EDWARD. O Warwick, Warwick! Plantagenet
    held thee dearly soul's redemption
    stern Lord Clifford death.
  WARWICK. Ten days ago drown'd news tears;
    now, add measure woes,
    things sith befall'n.
    bloody fray Wakefield fought,
    brave father breath'd latest gasp,
    Tidings, swiftly posts run,
    brought loss depart.
    I, London, keeper King,  
    Muster'd soldiers, gathered flocks friends,
    appointed, thought,
    March'd Saint Albans intercept Queen,
    Bearing King behalf along;
    scouts advertised
    coming full intent
    dash late decree parliament
    Touching King Henry's oath succession.
    Short tale make- Saint Albans met,
    battles join'd, sides fiercely fought;
    'twas coldness King,
    look'd full gently warlike queen,
    robb'd soldiers heated spleen,
    'twas report success,
    common fear Clifford's rigour,
    thunders captives blood death,
    judge; but, conclude truth,
    weapons lightning went:
    soldiers', night-owl's lazy flight
    idle thresher flail,  
    Fell gently down, struck friends.
    cheer'd justice cause,
    promise high pay great rewards,
    vain; heart fight,
    hope win day;
    fled: King Queen;
    Lord George brother, Norfolk, myself,
    haste post-haste join you;
    marches heard were
    Making head fight again.
  EDWARD. Duke Norfolk, gentle Warwick?
    George Burgundy England?
  WARWICK. miles Duke soldiers;
    brother, sent
    kind aunt, Duchess Burgundy,
    aid soldiers needful war.
  RICHARD. 'Twas odds, belike, valiant Warwick fled.
    Oft heard praises pursuit,
    ne'er till scandal retire.
  WARWICK. scandal, Richard, dost thou hear;  
    thou shalt strong hand mine
    pluck diadem faint Henry's head
    wring awful sceptre fist,
    famous bold war
    fam'd mildness, peace, prayer.
  RICHARD. well, Lord Warwick; blame not.
    'Tis love bear thy glories makes speak.
    troublous time done?
    throw coats steel
    wrap bodies black mourning-gowns,
    Numbering Ave-Maries beads?
    helmets foes
    devotion revengeful arms?
    last, 'Ay,' it, lords.
  WARWICK. Why, Warwick seek out;
    brother Montague.
    Attend me, lords. proud insulting Queen,
    Clifford haught Northumberland,
    feather moe proud birds,
    wrought easy-melting King wax.  
    swore consent succession,
    oath enrolled parliament;
    London crew gone
    frustrate oath beside
    make house Lancaster.
    power, think, thirty thousand strong.
    Norfolk myself,
    friends thou, brave Earl March,
    loving Welshmen canst procure,
    amount twenty thousand,
    Why, Via! London march amain,
    bestride foaming steeds,
    cry 'Charge foes!'
    turn back fly.
  RICHARD. Ay, methinks hear great Warwick speak.
    Ne'er live sunshine day
    cries 'Retire!' Warwick bid stay.
  EDWARD. Lord Warwick, thy shoulder lean;
    thou fail'st- God forbid hour!-
    Edward fall, peril heaven forfend.  
  WARWICK. longer Earl March, Duke York;
    degree England's royal throne,
    King England shalt thou proclaim'd
    borough pass along;
    throws cap joy
    fault make forfeit head.
    King Edward, valiant Richard, Montague,
    Stay longer, dreaming renown,
    sound trumpets task.
  RICHARD. Then, Clifford, thy heart hard steel,
    thou hast shown flinty thy deeds,
    pierce give thee mine.
  EDWARD. strike drums. God Saint George us!

                       Enter MESSENGER

  WARWICK. now! news?
  MESSENGER. Duke Norfolk sends word me
    Queen coming puissant host,
    craves company speedy counsel.  
  WARWICK. Why, sorts; brave warriors, away.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE II.
Before York

Flourish. Enter KING HENRY, QUEEN MARGARET, PRINCE WALES, CLIFFORD,
NORTHUMBERLAND, drum trumpets

  QUEEN MARGARET. Welcome, lord, brave town York.
    Yonder's head arch-enemy
    sought encompass'd crown.
    Doth object cheer heart, lord?
  KING HENRY. Ay, rocks cheer fear wreck-
    sight, irks soul.
    Withhold revenge, dear God; 'tis fault,
    wittingly infring'd vow.
  CLIFFORD. gracious liege, lenity
    harmful pity laid aside.
    lions cast gentle looks?
    beast usurp den.
    hand forest bear doth lick?
    spoils young face.
    scapes lurking serpent's mortal sting?  
    sets foot back,
    smallest worm turn, trodden on,
    doves peck safeguard brood.
    Ambitious York level thy crown,
    Thou smiling knit angry brows.
    He, Duke, son king,
    raise issue loving sire:
    Thou, king, bless'd goodly son,
    Didst yield consent disinherit him,
    argued thee unloving father.
    Unreasonable creatures feed young;
    man's face fearful eyes,
    Yet, protection tender ones,
    hath them- wings
    us'd fearful flight-
    Make war climb'd nest,
    Offering lives young's defence
    shame, liege, make precedent!
    pity goodly boy
    lose birthright father's fault,  
    long child
    'What great-grandfather grandsire got
    careless father fondly gave away'?
    Ah, shame this! boy;
    manly face, promiseth
    Successful fortune, steel thy melting heart
    hold thine leave thine him.
  KING HENRY. Full hath Clifford play'd orator,
    Inferring arguments mighty force.
    But, Clifford, me, didst thou hear
    things ill bad success?
    happy son
    father hoarding hell?
    leave son virtuous deeds behind;
    father left more!
    rest held rate
    brings thousand-fold care keep
    possession jot pleasure.
    Ah, cousin York! thy friends know
    doth grieve thy head here!  
  QUEEN MARGARET. lord, cheer spirits; foes nigh,
    soft courage makes followers faint.
    promis'd knighthood forward son:
    Unsheathe sword dub presently.
    Edward, kneel down.
  KING HENRY. Edward Plantagenet, arise knight;
    learn lesson: Draw thy sword right.
  PRINCE WALES. gracious father, kingly leave,
    draw apparent crown,
    quarrel death.
  CLIFFORD. Why, spoken prince.

                      Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. Royal commanders, readiness;
    band thirty thousand men
    Warwick, backing Duke York,
    towns, march along,
    Proclaims king, fly him.
    Darraign battle, hand.  
  CLIFFORD. Highness depart field:
    Queen hath success absent.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Ay, good lord, leave fortune.
  KING HENRY. Why, fortune too; stay.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. resolution, then, fight.
  PRINCE WALES. royal father, cheer noble lords,
    hearten fight defence.
    Unsheathe sword, good father; cry 'Saint George!'

         March. Enter EDWARD, GEORGE, RICHARD, WARWICK,
                NORFOLK, MONTAGUE, soldiers

  EDWARD. Now, perjur'd Henry, wilt thou kneel grace
    set thy diadem head,
    bide mortal fortune field?
  QUEEN MARGARET. rate thy minions, proud insulting boy.
    thee bold terms
    thy sovereign thy lawful king?
  EDWARD. king, bow knee.
    adopted heir consent:  
    when, oath broke; for, hear,
    King, wear crown,
    caus'd act parliament
    blot put son in.
  CLIFFORD. reason too:
    succeed father son?
  RICHARD. there, butcher? O, speak!
  CLIFFORD. Ay, crook-back, stand answer thee,
    he, proudest thy sort.
  RICHARD. 'Twas kill'd young Rutland, not?
  CLIFFORD. Ay, York, satisfied.
  RICHARD. God's sake, lords, give signal fight.
  WARWICK. say'st thou, Henry? Wilt thou yield crown?
  QUEEN MARGARET. Why, now, long-tongu'd Warwick! Dare speak?
    met Saint Albans last
    legs service hands.
  WARWICK. 'twas turn fly, 'tis thine.
  CLIFFORD. before, fled.
  WARWICK. 'Twas valour, Clifford, drove thence.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. No, manhood durst make stay.  
  RICHARD. Northumberland, hold thee reverently.
    Break parley; scarce refrain
    execution big-swol'n heart
    Clifford, cruel child-killer.
  CLIFFORD. slew thy father; call'st thou child?
  RICHARD. Ay, dastard treacherous coward,
    thou didst kill tender brother Rutland;
    ere sunset make thee curse deed.
  KING HENRY. words, lords, hear speak.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Defy then, hold close thy lips.
  KING HENRY. prithee give limits tongue:
    king, privileg'd speak.
  CLIFFORD. liege, wound bred meeting here
    cur'd words; still.
  RICHARD. Then, executioner, unsheathe thy sword.
    made all, resolv'd
    Clifford's manhood lies tongue.
  EDWARD. Say, Henry, right, no?
    thousand men broke fasts to-day
    ne'er dine thou yield crown.  
  WARWICK. thou deny, blood thy head;
    York justice puts armour on.
  PRINCE WALES. Warwick right,
    wrong, thing right.
  RICHARD. thee, thy mother stands;
    wot thou hast thy mother's tongue.
  QUEEN MARGARET. thou art thy sire dam;
    foul misshapen stigmatic,
    Mark'd destinies avoided,
    venom toads lizards' dreadful stings.
  RICHARD. Iron Naples hid English gilt,
    father bears title king-
    channel call'd sea-
    Sham'st thou not, knowing thou art extraught,
    thy tongue detect thy base-born heart?
  EDWARD. wisp straw worth thousand crowns
    make shameless callet herself.
    Helen Greece fairer thou,
    thy husband Menelaus;
    ne'er Agamemmon's brother wrong'd  
    false woman king thee.
    father revell'd heart France,
    tam'd King, made Dauphin stoop;
    match'd state,
    glory day;
    beggar bed
    grac'd thy poor sire bridal day,
    sunshine brew'd show'r him
    wash'd father's fortunes France
    heap'd sedition crown home.
    hath broach'd tumult thy pride?
    Hadst thou meek, title slept;
    we, pity gentle King,
    slipp'd claim age.
  GEORGE. sunshine made thy spring,
    thy summer bred increase,
    set axe thy usurping root;
    edge hath hit ourselves,
    thou, begun strike,
    leave till hewn thee down,  
    bath'd thy growing heated bloods.
  EDWARD. resolution defy thee;
    longer conference,
    thou deniest gentle King speak.
    Sound trumpets; bloody colours wave,
    victory grave!
  QUEEN MARGARET. Stay, Edward.
  EDWARD. No, wrangling woman, longer stay;
    words cost ten thousand lives day.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE III.
A field battle Towton Saxton, Yorkshire

Alarum; excursions. Enter WARWICK

  WARWICK. Forspent toil, runners race,
    lay breathe;
    strokes receiv'd blows repaid
    robb'd strong-knit sinews strength,
    spite spite rest awhile.

                     Enter EDWARD, running

  EDWARD. Smile, gentle heaven, strike, ungentle death;
    world frowns, Edward's sun clouded.
  WARWICK. now, lord. hap? hope good?

                         Enter GEORGE

  GEORGE. hap lost, hope sad despair;
    ranks broke, ruin us.  
    counsel give you? fly?
  EDWARD. Bootless flight: follow wings;
    weak are, shun pursuit.

                         Enter RICHARD

  RICHARD. Ah, Warwick, hast thou withdrawn thyself?
    Thy brother's blood thirsty earth hath drunk,
    Broach'd steely point Clifford's lance;
    pangs death cried,
    dismal clangor heard far,
    'Warwick, revenge! Brother, revenge death.'
    So, underneath belly steeds,
    stain'd fetlocks smoking blood,
    noble gentleman gave ghost.
  WARWICK. earth drunken blood.
    kill horse, fly.
    stand soft-hearted women here,
    Wailing losses, whiles foe doth rage,
    upon, tragedy  
    play'd jest counterfeiting actors?
    knee vow God above
    pause again, stand still,
    Till death hath clos'd eyes mine
    fortune measure revenge.
  EDWARD. O Warwick, bend knee thine,
    vow chain soul thine!
    ere knee rise earth's cold face
    throw hands, mine eyes, heart Thee,
    Thou setter-up plucker-down kings,
    Beseeching Thee, Thy stands
    foes body prey,
    Thy brazen gates heaven ope
    give sweet passage sinful soul.
    Now, lords, leave meet again,
    Where'er be, heaven earth.
  RICHARD. Brother, give thy hand; and, gentle Warwick,
    embrace thee weary arms.
    weep melt woe
    winter cut spring-time so.  
  WARWICK. Away, away! more, sweet lords, farewell.
  GEORGE. troops,
    give leave fly stay,
    call pillars stand us;
    thrive, promise rewards
    victors wear Olympian games.
    plant courage quailing breasts,
    hope life victory.
    Forslow longer; make amain.               Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Another part field

Excursions. Enter RICHARD CLIFFORD

  RICHARD. Now, Clifford, singled thee alone.
    Suppose arm Duke York,
    Rutland; bound revenge,
    Wert thou environ'd brazen wall.
  CLIFFORD. Now, Richard, thee alone.
    hand stabbed thy father York;
    hand slew thy brother Rutland;
    heart triumphs death
    cheers hands slew thy sire brother
    execute thyself;
    so, thee!                           [They fight]

                 Enter WARWICK; CLIFFORD flies

  RICHARD. Nay, Warwick, single chase;
    hunt wolf death.            Exeunt




SCENE V.
Another part field

Alarum. Enter KING HENRY alone

  KING HENRY. battle fares morning's war,
    dying clouds contend growing light,
    time shepherd, blowing nails,
    call perfect day night.
    sways way, mighty sea
    Forc'd tide combat wind;
    sways way, selfsame sea
    Forc'd retire fury wind.
    flood prevails, wind;
    better, best;
    tugging victors, breast breast,
    conqueror conquered.
    equal poise fell war.
    molehill sit down.
    God will, victory!
    Margaret queen, Clifford too,
    chid battle, swearing  
    prosper thence.
    dead, God's good so!
    world grief woe?
    O God! methinks happy life
    homely swain;
    sit hill, now,
    carve dials quaintly, point point,
    minutes run-
    makes hour full complete,
    hours brings day,
    days finish year,
    years mortal man live.
    known, divide times-
    hours tend flock;
    hours rest;
    hours contemplate;
    hours sport myself;
    days ewes young;
    weeks ere poor fools can;
    years ere shear fleece:  
    minutes, hours, days, months, years,
    Pass'd end created,
    bring white hairs quiet grave.
    Ah, life this! sweet! lovely!
    hawthorn bush sweeter shade
    shepherds silly sheep,
    doth rich embroider'd canopy
    kings fear subjects' treachery?
    O yes, doth; thousand-fold doth.
    conclude: shepherd's homely curds,
    cold thin drink leather bottle,
    wonted sleep fresh tree's shade,
    secure sweetly enjoys,
    prince's delicates-
    viands sparkling golden cup,
    body couched curious bed,
    care, mistrust, treason waits him.

       Alarum. Enter son hath kill'd Father, at
       door; FATHER hath kill'd Son,  
                         door

  SON. Ill blows wind profits nobody.
    man hand hand slew fight
    possessed store crowns;
    I, haply now,
    ere night yield life them
    man else, dead man doth me.
    this? O God! father's face,
    conflict unwares kill'd.
    O heavy times, begetting events!
    London King press'd forth;
    father, Earl Warwick's man,
    part York, press'd master;
    I, hands receiv'd life,
    hands life bereaved him.
    Pardon me, God, knew did.
    pardon, father, knew thee.
    tears wipe bloody marks;
    words till flow'd fill.  
  KING HENRY. O piteous spectacle! O bloody times!
    Whiles lions war battle dens,
    Poor harmless lambs abide enmity.
    Weep, wretched man; aid thee tear tear;
    hearts eyes, civil war,
    blind tears break o'ercharg'd grief.

               Enter FATHER, bearing SON

  FATHER. Thou stoutly hath resisted me,
    Give thy gold, thou hast gold;
    bought hundred blows.
    see. foeman's face?
    Ah, no, no, no, no, mine son!
    Ah, boy, life left thee,
    Throw thine eye! See, show'rs arise,
    Blown windy tempest heart
    thy wounds, kills mine eye heart!
    O, pity, God, miserable age!
    stratagems, fell, butcherly,  
    Erroneous, mutinous, unnatural,
    deadly quarrel daily doth beget!
    O boy, thy father gave thee life soon,
    hath bereft thee thy life late!
  KING HENRY. Woe woe! grief common grief!
    O death stay ruthful deeds!
    O pity, pity, gentle heaven, pity!
    red rose white face,
    fatal colours striving houses:
    purple blood resembles;
    pale cheeks, methinks, presenteth.
    Wither rose, flourish!
    contend, thousand lives perish.
  SON. mother father's death
    me, ne'er satisfied!
  FATHER. wife slaughter son
    Shed seas tears, ne'er satisfied!
  KING HENRY. country woeful chances
    Misthink King, satisfied!
  SON. son rued father's death?  
  FATHER. father bemoan'd son?
  KING HENRY. king griev'd subjects' woe?
    sorrow; mine ten times much.
  SON. bear thee hence, weep fill.
                                              Exit body
  FATHER. arms mine thy winding-sheet;
    heart, sweet boy, thy sepulchre,
    heart thine image ne'er go;
    sighing breast thy funeral bell;
    obsequious thy father be,
    loss thee, more,
    Priam valiant sons.
    bear thee hence; fight will,
    murdered kill.
                                              Exit body
  KING HENRY. Sad-hearted men, overgone care,
    sits king woeful are.

           Alarums, excursions. Enter QUEEN MARGARET,
                  PRINCE WALES, EXETER  

  PRINCE WALES. Fly, father, fly; friends fled,
    Warwick rages chafed bull.
    Away! death doth hold pursuit.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Mount you, lord; Berwick post amain.
    Edward Richard, brace greyhounds
    fearful flying hare sight,
    fiery eyes sparkling wrath,
    bloody steel grasp'd ireful hands,
    backs; amain.
  EXETER. Away! vengeance them.
    Nay, stay expostulate; make speed;
    after. before.
  KING HENRY. Nay, thee, good sweet Exeter.
    fear stay, love go
    Queen intends. Forward; away!             Exeunt




SCENE VI.
Another part field

A loud alarum. Enter CLIFFORD, wounded

  CLIFFORD. burns candle out; ay, dies,
    Which, whiles lasted, gave King Henry light.
    O Lancaster, fear thy overthrow
    body's parting soul!
    love fear glu'd friends thee;
    And, fall, thy tough commixture melts,
    Impairing Henry, strength'ning misproud York.
    common people swarm summer flies;
    fly gnats sun?
    shines Henry's enemies?
    O Phoebus, hadst thou consent
    Phaethon check thy fiery steeds,
    Thy burning car scorch'd earth!
    And, Henry, hadst thou sway'd kings do,
    thy father father did,
    Giving ground house York,
    sprung summer flies;  
    ten thousand luckless realm
    left mourning widows death;
    thou day hadst thy chair peace.
    doth cherish weeds gentle air?
    makes robbers bold lenity?
    Bootless plaints, cureless wounds.
    fly, strength hold flight.
    foe merciless pity;
    hands deserv'd pity.
    air hath deadly wounds,
    effuse blood doth make faint.
    Come, York Richard, Warwick rest;
    stabb'd fathers' bosoms: split breast.
                                                     [He faints]

       Alarum retreat. Enter EDWARD, GEORGE, RICHARD
               MONTAGUE, WARWICK, soldiers

  EDWARD. breathe we, lords. Good fortune bids pause
    smooth frowns war peaceful looks.  
    troops pursue bloody-minded Queen
    led calm Henry, king,
    doth sail, fill'd fretting gust,
    Command argosy stern waves.
    you, lords, Clifford fled them?
  WARWICK. No, 'tis impossible escape;
    For, face speak words,
    brother Richard mark'd grave;
    And, whereso'er is, surely dead.
                                     [CLIFFORD groans, dies]
  RICHARD. soul takes heavy leave?
    deadly groan, life death's departing.
    is.
  EDWARD. battle's ended,
    friend foe, gently used.
  RICHARD. Revoke doom mercy, 'tis Clifford;
    contented lopp'd branch
    hewing Rutland leaves put forth,
    set murd'ring knife root
    tender spray sweetly spring-  
    princely father, Duke York.
  WARWICK. gates York fetch head,
    father's head, Clifford there;
    whereof supply room.
    Measure measure answered.
  EDWARD. Bring fatal screech-owl house,
    sung death ours.
    death stop dismal threat'ning sound,
    ill-boding tongue speak.
  WARWICK. understanding bereft.
    Speak, Clifford, dost thou speaks thee?
    Dark cloudy death o'ershades beams life,
    sees hears say.
  RICHARD. O, did! so, perhaps, doth.
    'Tis policy counterfeit,
    avoid bitter taunts
    time death gave father.
  GEORGE. thou think'st, vex eager words.
  RICHARD. Clifford, mercy obtain grace.
  EDWARD. Clifford, repent bootless penitence.  
  WARWICK. Clifford, devise excuses thy faults.
  GEORGE. devise fell tortures thy faults.
  RICHARD. Thou didst love York, son York.
  EDWARD. Thou pitied'st Rutland, pity thee.
  GEORGE. Captain Margaret, fence now?
  WARWICK. mock thee, Clifford; swear thou wast wont.
  RICHARD. What, oath? Nay, world hard
    Clifford spare friends oath.
    dead; soul,
    hand buy hours' life,
    rail him,
    hand chop off, issuing blood
    Stifle villain unstanched thirst
    York young Rutland satisfy.
  WARWICK. Ay, dead. traitor's head,
    rear place father's stands.
    London triumphant march,
    crowned England's royal King;
    Warwick cut sea France,
    Lady Bona thy queen.  
    shalt thou sinew lands together;
    And, France thy friend, thou shalt dread
    scatt'red foe hopes rise again;
    greatly sting hurt,
    buzz offend thine ears.
    coronation;
    Brittany cross sea
    effect marriage, lord.
  EDWARD. thou wilt, sweet Warwick, be;
    thy shoulder build seat,
    undertake thing
    thy counsel consent wanting.
    Richard, create thee Duke Gloucester;
    George, Clarence; Warwick, ourself,
    undo pleaseth best.
  RICHARD. Duke Clarence, George Gloucester;
    Gloucester's dukedom ominous.
  WARWICK. Tut, foolish observation.
    Richard, Duke Gloucester. London
    honours possession.                   Exeunt

ACT III. SCENE I.
A chase north England

Enter KEEPERS, cross-bows hands

  KEEPER. thick-grown brake shroud ourselves,
    laund anon deer come;
    covert make stand,
    Culling principal deer.
  KEEPER. stay hill, shoot.
  KEEPER. be; noise thy cross-bow
    scare herd, shoot lost.
    stand both, aim best;
    And, time tedious,
    thee befell day
    self-place stand.
  KEEPER. man; stay till past.

        Enter KING HENRY, disguised, prayer-book

  KING HENRY. Scotland stol'n, pure love,
    greet mine land wishful sight.  
    No, Harry, Harry, 'tis land thine;
    Thy place fill'd, thy sceptre wrung thee,
    Thy balm wash'd wherewith thou wast anointed.
    bending knee call thee Caesar now,
    humble suitors press speak right,
    No, man redress thee;
    myself?
  KEEPER. Ay, deer skin's keeper's fee.
    quondam King; seize him.
  KING HENRY. embrace thee, sour adversity,
    wise men wisest course.
  KEEPER. linger we? lay hands him.
  KEEPER. Forbear awhile; hear more.
  KING HENRY. Queen son France aid;
    And, hear, great commanding Warwick
    thither crave French King's sister
    wife Edward. news true,
    Poor queen son, labour lost;
    Warwick subtle orator,
    Lewis prince won moving words.  
    account, then, Margaret win him;
    woman pitied much.
    sighs make batt'ry breast;
    tears pierce marble heart;
    tiger mild whiles doth mourn;
    Nero tainted remorse
    hear plaints, brinish tears.
    Ay, beg: Warwick, give.
    She, left side, craving aid Henry:
    He, right, wife Edward.
    weeps, Henry depos'd:
    smiles, Edward install'd;
    she, poor wretch, grief speak more;
    Whiles Warwick tells title, smooths wrong,
    Inferreth arguments mighty strength,
    conclusion wins King her
    promise sister, else,
    strengthen support King Edward's place.
    O Margaret, 'twill be; thou, poor soul,
    Art forsaken, thou went'st forlorn!  
  KEEPER. Say, art thou talk'st kings queens?
  KING HENRY. seem, born to:
    man least, be;
    men talk kings, I?
  KEEPER. Ay, thou talk'st thou wert king.
  KING HENRY. Why, am- mind; enough.
  KEEPER. But, thou king, thy crown?
  KING HENRY. crown heart, head;
    deck'd diamonds Indian stones,
    seen. crown call'd content;
    crown seldom kings enjoy.
  KEEPER. Well, king crown'd content,
    crown content contented
    us; think,
    king King Edward hath depos'd;
    subjects, sworn allegiance,
    apprehend enemy.
  KING HENRY. swear, break oath?
  KEEPER. No, oath; now.
  KING HENRY. dwell King England?  
  KEEPER. country, remain.
  KING HENRY. anointed king months old;
    father grandfather kings;
    sworn true subjects me;
    me, then, broke oaths?
  KEEPER. No;
    subjects king.
  KING HENRY. Why, dead? breathe man?
    Ah, simple men, swear!
    Look, blow feather face,
    air blows again,
    Obeying wind blow,
    yielding blows,
    Commanded greater gust,
    lightness common men.
    break oaths; sin
    mild entreaty make guilty.
    will, King commanded;
    kings: command, obey.
  KEEPER. true subjects King, King Edward.  
  KING HENRY. Henry,
    seated King Edward is.
  KEEPER. charge you, God's King's,
    officers.
  KING HENRY. God's name, lead; King's obey'd;
    God will, King perform;
    will, humbly yield unto.                Exeunt

SCENE II.
London. palace

Enter KING EDWARD, GLOUCESTER, CLARENCE, LADY GREY

  KING EDWARD. Brother Gloucester, Saint Albans' field
    lady's husband, Sir Richard Grey, slain,
    land seiz'd conqueror.
    suit repossess lands;
    justice deny,
    quarrel house York
    worthy gentleman lose life.
  GLOUCESTER. Highness grant suit;
    dishonour deny her.
  KING EDWARD. less; make pause.
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside CLARENCE] Yea, so?
    lady hath thing grant,
    King grant humble suit.
  CLARENCE. [Aside GLOUCESTER] game; true he
    wind!
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside CLARENCE] Silence!
  KING EDWARD. Widow, suit;  
    time mind.
  LADY GREY. gracious lord, brook delay.
    Highness resolve now;
    pleasure satisfy me.
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside] Ay, widow? warrant your
      lands,
    pleases pleasure you.
    Fight closer or, good faith, catch blow.
  CLARENCE. [Aside GLOUCESTER] fear not, chance
    fall.
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside CLARENCE] God forbid that, take
    vantages.
  KING EDWARD. children hast thou, widow, me.
  CLARENCE. [Aside GLOUCESTER] means beg child of
    her.
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside CLARENCE] Nay, whip me; rather
    give two.
  LADY GREY. Three, gracious lord.
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside] rul'd him.
  KING EDWARD. 'Twere pity lose father's lands.  
  LADY GREY. pitiful, dread lord, grant it, then.
  KING EDWARD. Lords, give leave; widow's wit.
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside] Ay, good leave you; have
      leave
    Till youth leave leave crutch.
                              [GLOUCESTER CLARENCE withdraw]
  KING EDWARD. me, madam, love children?
  LADY GREY. Ay, full dearly love myself.
  KING EDWARD. good?
  LADY GREY. good sustain harm.
  KING EDWARD. husband's lands, good.
  LADY GREY. Majesty.
  KING EDWARD. lands got.
  LADY GREY. bind Highness' service.
  KING EDWARD. service wilt thou give them?
  LADY GREY. command rests do.
  KING EDWARD. exceptions boon.
  LADY GREY. No, gracious lord, it.
  KING EDWARD. Ay, thou canst ask.
  LADY GREY. Why, Grace commands.  
  GLOUCESTER. plies hard; rain wears marble.
  CLARENCE. red fire! Nay, wax melt.
  LADY GREY. stops lord? hear task?
  KING EDWARD. easy task; 'tis love king.
  LADY GREY. perform'd, subject.
  KING EDWARD. Why, then, thy husband's lands freely give thee.
  LADY GREY. leave thousand thanks.
  GLOUCESTER. match made; seals curtsy.
  KING EDWARD. stay thee- 'tis fruits love mean.
  LADY GREY. fruits love mean, loving liege.
  KING EDWARD. Ay, but, fear me, sense.
    love, thinkst thou, sue get?
  LADY GREY. love till death, humble thanks, prayers;
    love virtue begs virtue grants.
  KING EDWARD. No, troth, love.
  LADY GREY. Why, thought did.
  KING EDWARD. partly perceive mind.
  LADY GREY. mind grant perceive
    Highness aims at, aim aright.
  KING EDWARD. thee plain, aim lie thee.  
  LADY GREY. plain, lie prison.
  KING EDWARD. Why, thou shalt thy husband's lands.
  LADY GREY. Why, mine honesty dower;
    loss purchase them.
  KING EDWARD. thou wrong'st thy children mightily.
  LADY GREY. Highness wrongs me.
    But, mighty lord, merry inclination
    Accords sadness suit.
    dismiss me, ay no.
  KING EDWARD. Ay, thou wilt ay request;
    No, thou dost demand.
  LADY GREY. Then, no, lord. suit end.
  GLOUCESTER. widow likes not; knits brows.
  CLARENCE. bluntest wooer Christendom.
  KING EDWARD. [Aside] doth argue replete modesty;
    words doth show wit incomparable;
    perfections challenge sovereignty.
    other, king;
    love, queen.
    King Edward thee queen?  
  LADY GREY. 'Tis done, gracious lord.
    subject fit jest withal,
    unfit sovereign.
  KING EDWARD. Sweet widow, state swear thee
    speak soul intends;
    enjoy thee love.
  LADY GREY. yield unto.
    queen,
    good concubine.
  KING EDWARD. cavil, widow; queen.
  LADY GREY. 'Twill grieve Grace sons call father.
  KING EDWARD.No daughters call thee mother.
    Thou art widow, thou hast children;
    And, God's Mother, I, bachelor,
    some. Why, 'tis happy thing
    father sons.
    Answer more, thou shalt queen.
  GLOUCESTER. ghostly father hath shrift.
  CLARENCE. made shriver, 'twas shrift.
  KING EDWARD. Brothers, muse chat had.  
  GLOUCESTER. widow likes not, sad.
  KING EDWARD. strange marry her.
  CLARENCE. who, lord?
  KING EDWARD. Why, Clarence, myself.
  GLOUCESTER. ten days' least.
  CLARENCE. day longer lasts.
  GLOUCESTER. extremes.
  KING EDWARD. Well, jest on, brothers; both
    suit granted husband's lands.

                       Enter NOBLEMAN

  NOBLEMAN. gracious lord, Henry foe taken
    brought prisoner palace gate.
  KING EDWARD. convey'd Tower.
    we, brothers, man him
    question apprehension.
    Widow, along. Lords, honourably.
                                       Exeunt GLOUCESTER
  GLOUCESTER. Ay, Edward women honourably.  
    wasted, marrow, bones, all,
    loins hopeful branch spring
    cross golden time for!
    yet, soul's desire me-
    lustful Edward's title buried-
    Clarence, Henry, son young Edward,
    unlook'd issue bodies,
    rooms ere place myself.
    cold premeditation purpose!
    Why, dream sovereignty;
    stands promontory
    spies far-off shore tread,
    Wishing foot equal eye;
    chides sea sunders thence,
    lade dry way-
    crown, off;
    chide means it;
    cut off,
    Flattering impossibilities.
    eye's quick, heart o'erweens much,  
    hand strength equal them.
    Well, kingdom Richard;
    pleasure world afford?
    make heaven lady's lap,
    deck body gay ornaments,
    witch sweet ladies words looks.
    O miserable thought! unlikely
    accomplish twenty golden crowns.
    Why, love forswore mother's womb;
    And, deal soft laws,
    corrupt frail nature bribe
    shrink mine arm wither'd shrub
    make envious mountain back,
    sits deformity mock body;
    shape legs unequal size;
    disproportion part,
    chaos, unlick'd bear-whelp
    carries impression dam.
    I, then, man belov'd?
    O monstrous fault harbour thought!  
    Then, earth affords joy me
    command, check, o'erbear such
    person myself,
    make heaven dream crown,
    whiles live t' account world hell,
    misshap'd trunk bear head
    round impaled glorious crown.
    crown,
    lives stand home;
    I- lost thorny wood
    rents thorns rent thorns,
    Seeking straying way
    knowing find open air,
    toiling desperately find out-
    Torment catch English crown;
    torment free myself
    hew bloody axe.
    Why, smile, murder whiles smile,
    cry 'Content!' grieves heart,
    wet cheeks artificial tears,  
    frame face occasions.
    drown sailors mermaid shall;
    slay gazers basilisk;
    play orator Nestor,
    Deceive slily Ulysses could,
    And, Sinon, Troy.
    add colours chameleon,
    Change shapes Protheus advantages,
    set murderous Machiavel school.
    this, crown?
    Tut, farther off, pluck down.           Exit




SCENE III.
France.  KING'S palace

Flourish.  Enter LEWIS French King, sister BONA,
his Admiral call'd BOURBON; PRINCE EDWARD, QUEEN MARGARET,
and EARL OXFORD.  LEWIS sits, riseth again

  LEWIS. Fair Queen England, worthy Margaret,
    Sit us. ill befits thy state
    birth thou shouldst stand Lewis doth sit.
  QUEEN MARGARET. No, mighty King France. Margaret
    strike sail learn serve
    kings command. was, confess,
    Great Albion's Queen golden days;
    mischance hath trod title down
    dishonour laid ground,
    seat fortune,
    humble seat conform myself.
  LEWIS. Why, say, fair Queen, springs deep despair?
  QUEEN MARGARET. fills mine eyes tears
    stops tongue, heart drown'd cares.  
  LEWIS. Whate'er be, thou thyself,
    sit thee side. [Seats him] Yield thy neck
    fortune's yoke, thy dauntless mind
    ride triumph mischance.
    plain, Queen Margaret, thy grief;
    eas'd, France yield relief.
  QUEEN MARGARET. gracious words revive drooping thoughts
    give tongue-tied sorrows leave speak.
    noble Lewis
    Henry, sole possessor love,
    Is, king, banish'd man,
    forc'd live Scotland forlorn;
    proud ambitious Edward Duke York
    Usurps regal title seat
    England's true-anointed lawful King.
    I, poor Margaret,
    son, Prince Edward, Henry's heir,
    crave thy lawful aid;
    thou fail us, hope done.
    Scotland hath help, help;  
    people peers misled,
    treasure seiz'd, soldiers put flight,
    And, thou seest, heavy plight.
  LEWIS. Renowned Queen, patience calm storm,
    bethink means break off.
  QUEEN MARGARET. stay, stronger grows foe.
  LEWIS. stay, succour thee.
  QUEEN MARGARET. O, impatience waiteth true sorrow.
    breeder sorrow!

                        Enter WARWICK

  LEWIS. approacheth boldly presence?
  QUEEN MARGARET. Earl Warwick, Edward's greatest friend.
  LEWIS. Welcome, brave Warwick! brings thee France?
                                      [He descends. ariseth]
  QUEEN MARGARET. Ay, begins storm rise;
    moves wind tide.
  WARWICK. worthy Edward, King Albion,
    lord sovereign, thy vowed friend,  
    come, kindness unfeigned love,
    thy royal person,
    crave league amity,
    lastly confirm amity
    nuptial knot, thou vouchsafe grant
    virtuous Lady Bona, thy fair sister,
    England's King lawful marriage.
  QUEEN MARGARET. [Aside] forward, Henry's hope done.
  WARWICK. [To BONA] And, gracious madam, king's behalf,
    commanded, leave favour,
    Humbly kiss hand, tongue
    passion sovereign's heart;
    fame, late ent'ring heedful ears,
    Hath plac'd thy beauty's image thy virtue.
  QUEEN MARGARET. King Lewis Lady Bona, hear speak
    answer Warwick. demand
    Springs Edward's well-meant honest love,
    deceit bred necessity;
    tyrants safely govern home
    abroad purchase great alliance?  
    prove tyrant reason suffice,
    Henry liveth still; dead,
    Prince Edward stands, King Henry's son.
    therefore, Lewis, league marriage
    Thou draw thy danger dishonour;
    usurpers sway rule while
    heav'ns just, time suppresseth wrongs.
  WARWICK. Injurious Margaret!
  PRINCE WALES. Queen?
  WARWICK. thy father Henry usurp;
    thou art prince queen.
  OXFORD. Warwick disannuls great John Gaunt,
    subdue greatest part Spain;
    And, John Gaunt, Henry Fourth,
    wisdom mirror wisest;
    And, wise prince, Henry Fifth,
    prowess conquered France.
    Henry lineally descends.
  WARWICK. Oxford, haps smooth discourse
    told Henry Sixth hath lost  
    Henry gotten?
    Methinks peers France smile that.
    rest: pedigree
    threescore years- silly time
    make prescription kingdom's worth.
  OXFORD. Why, Warwick, canst thou speak thy liege,
    thou obeyed'st thirty years,
    betray thy treason blush?
  WARWICK. Oxford fence right
    buckler falsehood pedigree?
    shame! Leave Henry, call Edward king.
  OXFORD. Call king injurious doom
    elder brother, Lord Aubrey Vere,
    death; so, father,
    downfall mellow'd years,
    nature brought door death?
    No, Warwick, no; life upholds arm,
    arm upholds house Lancaster.
  WARWICK. house York.
  LEWIS. Queen Margaret, Prince Edward, Oxford,  
    Vouchsafe request stand aside
    conference Warwick.
                                              [They stand aloof]
  QUEEN MARGARET. Heavens grant Warwick's words bewitch not!
  LEWIS. Now, Warwick, me, thy conscience,
    Edward true king? loath
    link lawful chosen.
  WARWICK. Thereon pawn credit mine honour.
  LEWIS. gracious people's eye?
  WARWICK. Henry unfortunate.
  LEWIS. further: dissembling set aside,
    truth measure love
    sister Bona.
  WARWICK. seems
    beseem monarch himself.
    heard swear
    love eternal plant
    Whereof root fix'd virtue's ground,
    leaves fruit maintain'd beauty's sun,
    Exempt envy, disdain,  
    Lady Bona quit pain.
  LEWIS. Now, sister, hear firm resolve.
  BONA. grant denial mine.
    [To WARWICK] confess ere day,
    heard king's desert recounted,
    Mine ear hath tempted judgment desire.
  LEWIS. Then, Warwick, thus: sister Edward's.
    forthwith articles drawn
    Touching jointure king make,
    dowry counterpois'd.
    Draw near, Queen Margaret, witness
    Bona wife English king.
  PRINCE WALES. Edward, English king.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Deceitful Warwick, thy device
    alliance make void suit.
    thy coming, Lewis Henry's friend.
  LEWIS. friend Margaret.
    title crown weak,
    Edward's good success,
    'tis reason releas'd  
    giving aid late promised.
    kindness hand
    estate requires mine yield.
  WARWICK. Henry lives Scotland case,
    nothing, lose.
    yourself, quondam queen,
    father maintain you,
    'twere troubled France.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Peace, impudent shameless Warwick,
    Proud setter puller kings!
    till talk tears,
    full truth, make King Lewis behold
    Thy sly conveyance thy lord's false love;
    birds self-same feather.
                                    [POST blowing horn within]
  LEWIS. Warwick, post thee.

                       Enter POST

  POST. lord ambassador, letters you,  
    brother, Marquis Montague.
    King Majesty.
    And, madam, you; not.
                                   [They read letters]
  OXFORD. fair Queen mistress
    Smiles news, Warwick frowns his.
  PRINCE WALES. Nay, mark Lewis stamps nettled.
    hope all's best.
  LEWIS. Warwick, thy news? yours, fair Queen?
  QUEEN MARGARET. Mine fill heart unhop'd joys.
  WARWICK. Mine, full sorrow heart's discontent.
  LEWIS. What, king married Lady Grey?
    now, soothe forgery his,
    Sends paper persuade patience?
    th' alliance seeks France?
    Dare presume scorn manner?
  QUEEN MARGARET. told Majesty before.
    proveth Edward's love Warwick's honesty.
  WARWICK. King Lewis, protest sight heaven,
    hope heavenly bliss,  
    clear misdeed Edward's-
    king, dishonours me,
    himself, shame.
    forget house York
    father untimely death?
    pass th' abuse niece?
    impale regal crown?
    put Henry native right?
    guerdon'd shame?
    Shame himself! desert honour;
    repair honour lost him
    renounce return Henry.
    noble Queen, grudges pass,
    henceforth thy true servitor.
    revenge wrong Lady Bona,
    replant Henry state.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Warwick, words turn'd hate love;
    forgive forget faults,
    joy thou becom'st King Henry's friend.
  WARWICK. friend, ay, unfeigned friend,  
    King Lewis vouchsafe furnish us
    bands chosen soldiers,
    undertake land coast
    force tyrant seat war.
    'Tis new-made bride succour him;
    Clarence, letters me,
    fall him
    matching wanton lust honour
    strength safety country.
  BONA. Dear brother, Bona reveng'd
    thy distressed queen?
  QUEEN MARGARET. Renowned Prince, poor Henry live
    thou rescue foul despair?
  BONA. quarrel English queen's one.
  WARWICK. mine, fair Lady Bona, joins yours.
  LEWIS. mine hers, thine, Margaret's.
    Therefore, last, firmly resolv'd
    aid.
  QUEEN MARGARET. give humble once.
  LEWIS. Then, England's messenger, return post  
    false Edward, thy supposed king,
    Lewis France sending masquers
    revel bride.
    Thou seest past; fear thy king withal.
  BONA. him, hope prove widower shortly,
    wear willow-garland sake.
  QUEEN MARGARET. mourning weeds laid aside,
    ready put armour on.
  WARWICK. hath wrong,
    uncrown ere't long.
    thy reward; gone.                       Exit POST
  LEWIS. But, Warwick,
    Thou Oxford, thousand men,
    cross seas bid false Edward battle:
    And, occasion serves, noble Queen
    Prince follow fresh supply.
    Yet, ere thou go, answer doubt:
    pledge thy firm loyalty?
  WARWICK. assure constant loyalty:
    Queen young Prince agree,  
    join mine eldest daughter joy
    forthwith holy wedlock bands.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Yes, agree, motion.
    Son Edward, fair virtuous,
    delay not- give thy hand Warwick;
    thy hand thy faith irrevocable
    Warwick's daughter thine.
  PRINCE WALES. Yes, accept her, deserves it;
    here, pledge vow, give hand.
                                  [He hand WARWICK]
  LEWIS. stay now? soldiers levied;
    thou, Lord Bourbon, High Admiral,
    waft royal fleet.
    long till Edward fall war's mischance
    mocking marriage dame France.
                                          Exeunt WARWICK
  WARWICK. Edward ambassador,
    return sworn mortal foe.
    Matter marriage charge gave me,
    dreadful war answer demand.  
    make stale me?
    turn jest sorrow.
    chief rais'd crown,
    chief bring again;
    pity Henry's misery,
    seek revenge Edward's mockery.                   Exit

ACT IV. SCENE I.
London. palace

Enter GLOUCESTER, CLARENCE, SOMERSET, MONTAGUE

  GLOUCESTER. me, brother Clarence, you
    marriage Lady Grey?
    Hath brother made worthy choice?
  CLARENCE. Alas, 'tis France!
    stay till Warwick made return?
  SOMERSET. lords, forbear talk; King.

           Flourish. Enter KING EDWARD, attended; LADY
          GREY, Queen; PEMBROKE, STAFFORD, HASTINGS,
      others. stand side, other

  GLOUCESTER. well-chosen bride.
  CLARENCE. mind plainly think.
  KING EDWARD. Now, brother Clarence, choice
    stand pensive half malcontent?
  CLARENCE. Lewis France Earl Warwick,
    weak courage judgment  
    offence abuse.
  KING EDWARD. Suppose offence cause;
    Lewis Warwick: Edward,
    King Warwick's will.
  GLOUCESTER. will, King.
    hasty marriage seldom proveth well.
  KING EDWARD. Yea, brother Richard, offended too?
  GLOUCESTER. I.
    No, God forbid sever'd
    God hath join'd together; ay, 'twere pity
    sunder yoke together.
  KING EDWARD. Setting scorns mislike aside,
    reason Lady Grey
    wife England's Queen.
    too, Somerset Montague,
    Speak freely think.
  CLARENCE. mine opinion: King Lewis
    enemy mocking him
    marriage Lady Bona.
  GLOUCESTER. Warwick, gave charge,  
    dishonoured marriage.
  KING EDWARD. Lewis Warwick appeas'd
    invention devise?
  MONTAGUE. join'd France alliance
    strength'ned commonwealth
    'Gainst foreign storms home-bred marriage.
  HASTINGS. Why, Montague itself
    England safe, true itself?
  MONTAGUE. safer 'tis back'd France.
  HASTINGS. 'Tis France trusting France.
    back'd God, seas
    hath giv'n fence impregnable,
    helps defend ourselves.
    safety lies.
  CLARENCE. speech Lord Hastings deserves
    heir Lord Hungerford.
  KING EDWARD. Ay, that? grant;
    stand law.
  GLOUCESTER. methinks Grace hath well
    give heir daughter Lord Scales  
    brother loving bride.
    fitted Clarence;
    bride bury brotherhood.
  CLARENCE. bestow'd heir
    Lord Bonville wife's son,
    leave brothers speed elsewhere.
  KING EDWARD. Alas, poor Clarence! wife
    thou art malcontent? provide thee.
  CLARENCE. choosing show'd judgment,
    shallow, give leave
    play broker mine behalf;
    end shortly mind leave you.
  KING EDWARD. Leave tarry, Edward King,
    tied brother's will.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. lords, pleas'd Majesty
    raise state title queen,
    right, confess
    ignoble descent:
    meaner fortune.
    title honours mine,  
    dislikes, pleasing,
    Doth cloud joys danger sorrow.
  KING EDWARD. love, forbear fawn frowns.
    danger sorrow befall thee,
    long Edward thy constant friend
    true sovereign obey?
    Nay, obey, love thee too,
    seek hatred hands;
    do, thee safe,
    feel vengeance wrath.
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside] hear, much, more.

                          Enter POST

  KING EDWARD. Now, messenger, letters news
    France?
  MESSENGER. sovereign liege, letters, words,
    I, special pardon,
    Dare relate.
  KING EDWARD. to, pardon thee; therefore, brief,  
    words thou canst guess them.
    answer makes King Lewis letters?
  MESSENGER. depart, words:
    'Go false Edward, supposed king,
    Lewis France sending masquers
    revel bride.'
  KING EDWARD. Lewis brave? Belike thinks Henry.
    Lady Bona marriage?
  MESSENGER. words, utt'red mild disdain:
    'Tell him, hope prove widower shortly,
    wear willow-garland sake.'
  KING EDWARD. blame her: less;
    wrong. Henry's queen?
    heard place.
  MESSENGER. 'Tell him' quoth 'my mourning weeds done,
    ready put armour on.'
  KING EDWARD. Belike minds play Amazon.
    Warwick injuries?
  MESSENGER. He, incens'd Majesty
    rest, discharg'd words:  
    'Tell hath wrong;
    uncrown ere't long.'
  KING EDWARD. Ha! durst traitor breathe proud words?
    Well, arm me, forewarn'd.
    wars pay presumption.
    say, Warwick friends Margaret?
  MESSENGER. Ay, gracious sovereign; link'd friendship
    young Prince Edward marries Warwick's daughter.
  CLARENCE. Belike elder; Clarence younger.
    Now, brother king, farewell, sit fast,
    Warwick's daughter;
    That, kingdom, marriage
    prove inferior yourself.
    love Warwick, follow me.
                                      Exit, SOMERSET follows
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside] I.
    thoughts aim matter; I
    Stay love Edward crown.
  KING EDWARD. Clarence Somerset Warwick!
    arm'd worst happen;  
    haste needful desp'rate case.
    Pembroke Stafford, behalf
    levy men make prepare war;
    already, quickly landed.
    person straight follow you.
                                    Exeunt PEMBROKE STAFFORD
    ere go, Hastings Montague,
    Resolve doubt. twain, rest,
    Warwick blood alliance.
    love Warwick me?
    so, depart him:
    foes hollow friends.
    mind hold true obedience,
    Give assurance friendly vow,
    suspect.
  MONTAGUE. God Montague proves true!
  HASTINGS. Hastings favours Edward's cause!
  KING EDWARD. Now, brother Richard, stand us?
  GLOUCESTER. Ay, withstand you.
  KING EDWARD. Why, so! victory.  
    hence, lose hour
    Till meet Warwick foreign pow'r.          Exeunt




SCENE II.
A plain Warwickshire

Enter WARWICK OXFORD, French soldiers

  WARWICK. Trust me, lord, hitherto well;
    common people numbers swarm us.

                 Enter CLARENCE SOMERSET

    Somerset Clarence comes.
    Speak suddenly, lords- friends?
  CLARENCE. Fear that, lord.
  WARWICK. Then, gentle Clarence, Warwick;
    welcome, Somerset. hold cowardice
    rest mistrustful noble heart
    Hath pawn'd open hand sign love;
    Clarence, Edward's brother,
    feigned friend proceedings.
    welcome, sweet Clarence; daughter thine.
    rests but, night's coverture,
    Thy brother carelessly encamp'd,  
    soldiers lurking towns about,
    attended simple guard,
    surprise pleasure?
    scouts found adventure easy;
    Ulysses stout Diomede
    sleight manhood stole Rhesus' tents,
    brought Thracian fatal steeds,
    we, cover'd night's black mantle,
    unawares beat Edward's guard
    seize himself- 'slaughter him,'
    intend surprise him.
    follow attempt,
    Applaud Henry leader.
                                         [They cry 'Henry!']
    then, silent sort.
    Warwick friends, God Saint George!    Exeunt



SCENE III.
Edward's camp, Warwick

Enter WATCHMEN, guard KING'S tent

  WATCHMAN. on, masters, man stand;
    King set sleep.
  WATCHMAN. What, bed?
  WATCHMAN. Why, no; hath made solemn vow
    lie natural rest
    Till Warwick suppress'd.
  WATCHMAN. To-morrow then, belike, day,
    Warwick men report.
  WATCHMAN. say, pray, nobleman that
    King resteth tent?
  WATCHMAN. 'Tis Lord Hastings, King's chiefest friend.
  WATCHMAN. O, So? commands King
    chief followers lodge towns him,
    cold field?
  WATCHMAN. 'Tis honour, dangerous.
  WATCHMAN. Ay, give worship quietness;
    dangerous honour.  
    Warwick knew estate stands,
    'Tis doubted waken him.
  WATCHMAN. halberds shut passage.
  WATCHMAN. Ay, wherefore guard royal tent
    defend person night-foes?

             Enter WARWICK, CLARENCE, OXFORD, SOMERSET,
                   French soldiers, silent all

  WARWICK. tent; stand guard.
    Courage, masters! Honour never!
    follow me, Edward ours.
  WATCHMAN. there?
  WATCHMAN. Stay, thou diest.

       WARWICK rest cry 'Warwick! Warwick!' and
      set guard, fly, crying 'Arm! Arm!' WARWICK
                   rest them

      drum playing trumpet sounding, re-enter WARWICK  
         rest, bringing KING gown,
   sitting chair. GLOUCESTER HASTINGS fly stage

  SOMERSET. fly there?
  WARWICK. Richard Hastings. go; Duke.
  KING EDWARD. Duke! Why, Warwick, parted,
    Thou call'dst King?
  WARWICK. Ay, case alter'd.
    disgrac'd embassade,
    degraded King,
    create Duke York.
    Alas, govern kingdom
    ambassadors,
    contented wife,
    brothers brotherly,
    study people's welfare,
    shroud enemies?
  KING EDWARD. Yea, brother Clarence, art thou too?
    Nay, Edward down.
    Yet, Warwick, mischance,  
    thee thyself thy complices,
    Edward bear King.
    fortune's malice overthrow state,
    mind exceeds compass wheel.
  WARWICK. Then, mind, Edward England's king;
                                           [Takes crown]
    Henry wear English crown
    true King indeed; thou shadow.
    Lord Somerset, request,
    forthwith Duke Edward convey'd
    brother, Archbishop York.
    fought Pembroke fellows,
    follow answer
    Lewis Lady Bona send him.
    farewell, good Duke York.
  KING EDWARD. fates impose, men abide;
    boots resist wind tide.
                                    [They lead forcibly]
  OXFORD. remains, lords, do
    march London soldiers?  
  WARWICK. Ay, thing do;
    free King Henry imprisonment,
    seated regal throne.               Exeunt




SCENE IV.
London. palace

Enter QUEEN ELIZABETH RIVERS

  RIVERS. Madam, makes sudden change?
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Why, brother Rivers, learn
    late misfortune befall'n King Edward?
  RIVERS. What, loss pitch'd battle Warwick?
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. No, loss royal person.
  RIVERS. sovereign slain?
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Ay, slain, prisoner;
    betray'd falsehood guard
    foe surpris'd unawares;
    And, understand,
    committed Bishop York,
    Fell Warwick's brother, foe.
  RIVERS. news, confess, full grief;
    Yet, gracious madam, bear may:
    Warwick lose hath won day.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Till then, fair hope hinder life's decay.
    wean despair  
    love Edward's offspring womb.
    makes bridle passion
    bear mildness misfortune's cross;
    Ay, ay, draw tear
    stop rising blood-sucking sighs,
    sighs tears blast drown
    King Edward's fruit, true heir th' English crown.
  RIVERS. But, madam, Warwick become?
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. inform'd London
    set crown Henry's head.
    Guess thou rest: King Edward's friends down.
    prevent tyrant's violence-
    trust hath broken faith-
    forthwith sanctuary
    save heir Edward's right.
    rest secure force fraud.
    Come, therefore, fly fly:
    Warwick us, die.               Exeunt




SCENE V.
A park Middleham Castle Yorkshire

Enter GLOUCESTER, LORD HASTINGS, SIR WILLIAM STANLEY, others

  GLOUCESTER. Now, Lord Hastings Sir William Stanley,
    Leave drew hither
    chiefest thicket park.
    stands case: King, brother,
    prisoner Bishop here, hands
    hath good usage great liberty;
    attended weak guard
    hunting disport himself.
    advertis'd secret means
    hour make way,
    colour usual game,
    find friends, horse men,
    set free captivity.

             Enter KING EDWARD HUNTSMAN him
  
  HUNTSMAN. way, lord; lies game.
  KING EDWARD. Nay, way, man. huntsmen stand.
    Now, brother Gloucester, Lord Hastings, rest,
    Stand close steal Bishop's deer?
  GLOUCESTER. Brother, time case requireth haste;
    horse stands ready park corner.
  KING EDWARD. then?
  HASTINGS. Lynn, lord; shipt Flanders.
  GLOUCESTER. guess'd, me; meaning.
  KING EDWARD. Stanley, requite thy forwardness.
  GLOUCESTER. wherefore stay we? 'Tis time talk.
  KING EDWARD. Huntsman, say'st thou? Wilt thou along?
  HUNTSMAN. tarry hang'd.
  GLOUCESTER. then, away; ha' ado.
  KING EDWARD. Bishop, farewell. Shield thee Warwick's frown,
    pray repossess crown.              Exeunt




SCENE VI.
London. Tower

Flourish. Enter KING HENRY, CLARENCE, WARWICK, SOMERSET, young HENRY,
EARL RICHMOND, OXFORD, MONTAGUE, LIEUTENANT TOWER, attendants

  KING HENRY. Master Lieutenant, God friends
    shaken Edward regal seat
    turn'd captive state liberty,
    fear hope, sorrows joys,
    enlargement thy due fees?
  LIEUTENANT. Subjects challenge sov'reigns;
    humble prayer prevail,
    crave pardon Majesty.
  KING HENRY. what, Lieutenant? me?
    Nay, thou requite thy kindness,
    made imprisonment pleasure;
    Ay, pleasure incaged birds
    Conceive when, moody thoughts,
    notes household harmony
    forget loss liberty.  
    But, Warwick, God, thou set'st free,
    chiefly God thee;
    author, thou instrument.
    Therefore, conquer fortune's spite
    living low fortune hurt me,
    people blessed land
    punish'd thwarting stars,
    Warwick, head wear crown,
    resign government thee,
    thou art fortunate thy deeds.
  WARWICK. Grace hath fam'd virtuous,
    wise virtuous
    spying avoiding fortune's malice,
    men rightly temper stars;
    thing blame Grace,
    choosing Clarence place.
  CLARENCE. No, Warwick, thou art worthy sway,
    heav'ns thy nativity
    Adjudg'd olive branch laurel crown,
    blest peace war;  
    yield thee free consent.
  WARWICK. choose Clarence Protector.
  KING HENRY. Warwick Clarence, give hands.
    join hands, hands hearts,
    dissension hinder government.
    make Protectors land,
    lead private life
    devotion spend days,
    sin's rebuke Creator's praise.
  WARWICK. answers Clarence sovereign's will?
  CLARENCE. consents, Warwick yield consent,
    thy fortune repose myself.
  WARWICK. Why, then, loath, content.
    yoke together, double shadow
    Henry's body, supply place;
    mean, bearing weight government,
    enjoys honour ease.
    And, Clarence, needful
    Forthwith Edward pronounc'd traitor,
    lands goods confiscated.  
  CLARENCE. else? succession determin'd.
  WARWICK. Ay, Clarence part.
  KING HENRY. But, chief affairs,
    entreat- command more-
    Margaret Queen son Edward
    return France speed;
    till here, doubtful fear
    joy liberty half eclips'd.
  CLARENCE. done, sovereign, speed.
  KING HENRY. Lord Somerset, youth that,
    tender care?
  SOMERSET. liege, young Henry, Earl Richmond.
  KING HENRY. hither, England's hope.
                                     [Lays hand head]
    secret powers
    Suggest truth divining thoughts,
    pretty lad prove country's bliss.
    full peaceful majesty;
    head nature fram'd wear crown,
    hand wield sceptre;  
    time bless regal throne.
    Make him, lords; he
    hurt me.

                          Enter POST

  WARWICK. news, friend?
  POST. Edward escaped brother
    fled, hears since, Burgundy.
  WARWICK. Unsavoury news! made escape?
  POST. convey'd Richard Duke Gloucester
    Lord Hastings, attended him
    secret ambush forest side
    Bishop's huntsmen rescu'd him;
    hunting daily exercise.
  WARWICK. brother careless charge.
    hence, sovereign, provide
    salve sore betide.
                   Exeunt SOMERSET, RICHMOND, OXFORD
  SOMERSET. lord, flight Edward's;  
    doubtless Burgundy yield help,
    wars befor't long.
    Henry's late presaging prophecy
    glad heart hope young Richmond,
    doth heart misgive me, conflicts,
    befall harm ours.
    Therefore, Lord Oxford, prevent worst,
    Forthwith send Brittany,
    Till storms past civil enmity.
  OXFORD. Ay, Edward repossess crown,
    'Tis Richmond rest down.
  SOMERSET. so; Brittany.
    therefore, speedily.              Exeunt




SCENE VII.
Before York

Flourish. Enter KING EDWARD, GLOUCESTER, HASTINGS, soldiers

  KING EDWARD. Now, brother Richard, Lord Hastings, rest,
    fortune maketh amends,
    interchange
    waned state Henry's regal crown.
    pass'd repass'd seas,
    brought desired Burgundy;
    remains, arriv'd
    Ravenspurgh haven gates York,
    enter, dukedom?
  GLOUCESTER. gates made fast! Brother, this;
    men stumble threshold
    foretold danger lurks within.
  KING EDWARD. Tush, man, abodements affright us.
    fair foul means enter in,
    friends repair us.
  HASTINGS. liege, knock summon them.  

         Enter, walls, MAYOR YORK and
                       BRETHREN

  MAYOR. lords, forewarned coming
    shut gates safety ourselves,
    owe allegiance Henry.
  KING EDWARD. But, Master Mayor, Henry King,
    Edward Duke York.
  MAYOR. True, good lord; less.
  KING EDWARD. Why, challenge dukedom,
    content alone.
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside] fox hath nose,
    find means make body follow.
  HASTINGS. Why, Master Mayor, stand doubt?
    Open gates; King Henry's friends.
  MAYOR. Ay, so? gates open'd.
                                                   [He descends]
  GLOUCESTER. wise stout captain, persuaded!
  HASTINGS. good man fain well,  
    'twere long him; ent'red,
    doubt not, I, persuade
    brothers reason.

             Enter, below, MAYOR ALDERMEN

  KING EDWARD. So, Master Mayor. gates shut
    night time war.
    What! fear not, man, yield keys;
                                                [Takes keys]
    Edward defend town thee,
    friends deign follow me.

           March. Enter MONTGOMERY drum soldiers

  GLOUCESTER. Brother, Sir John Montgomery,
    trusty friend, deceiv'd.
  KING EDWARD. Welcome, Sir john! arms?
  MONTGOMERY. King Edward time storm,
    loyal subject do.  
  KING EDWARD. Thanks, good Montgomery; forget
    title crown, claim
    dukedom till God send rest.
  MONTGOMERY. fare well, again.
    serve king duke.
    Drummer, strike up, march away.
                                      [The drum begins march]
  KING EDWARD. Nay, stay, Sir John, while, debate
    safe means crown recover'd.
  MONTGOMERY. talk debating? words:
    proclaim King,
    leave fortune gone
    back succour you.
    fight, pretend title?
  GLOUCESTER. Why, brother, wherefore stand nice points?
  KING EDWARD. grow stronger, make claim;
    Till 'tis wisdom conceal meaning.
  HASTINGS. scrupulous wit! arms rule.
  GLOUCESTER. fearless minds climb soonest crowns.
    Brother, proclaim hand;  
    bruit thereof bring friends.
  KING EDWARD. will; 'tis right,
    Henry usurps diadem.
  MONTGOMERY. Ay, sovereign speaketh himself;
    Edward's champion.
  HASTINGS. Sound trumpet; Edward proclaim'd.
    Come, fellow soldier, make thou proclamation.
                                   [Gives paper. Flourish]
  SOLDIER. [Reads] 'Edward Fourth, grace God,
    King England France, Lord Ireland, &c.'
  MONTGOMERY. whoso'er gainsays King Edward's right,
    challenge single fight.
                                          [Throws gauntlet]
  ALL. Long live Edward Fourth!
  KING EDWARD. Thanks, brave Montgomery, all;
    fortune serve me, requite kindness.
    night harbour York;
    morning sun raise car
    border horizon,
    forward Warwick mates;  
    wot Henry soldier.
    Ah, froward Clarence, evil beseems the
    flatter Henry forsake thy brother!
    Yet, may, meet thee Warwick.
    on, brave soldiers; doubt day,
    And, gotten, doubt large pay.        Exeunt




SCENE VIII.
London. palace

Flourish. Enter KING HENRY, WARWICK, MONTAGUE, CLARENCE, OXFORD, EXETER

  WARWICK. counsel, lords? Edward Belgia,
    hasty Germans blunt Hollanders,
    Hath pass'd safety narrow seas
    troops doth march amain London;
    giddy people flock him.
  KING HENRY. levy men beat back again.
  CLARENCE. fire quickly trodden out,
    Which, suffer'd, rivers quench.
  WARWICK. Warwickshire true-hearted friends,
    mutinous peace, bold war;
    muster up, thou, son Clarence,
    Shalt stir Suffolk, Norfolk, Kent,
    knights gentlemen thee.
    Thou, brother Montague, Buckingham,
    Northampton, Leicestershire, shalt find
    Men inclin'd hear thou command'st.  
    thou, brave Oxford, wondrous belov'd,
    Oxfordshire shalt muster thy friends.
    sovereign, loving citizens,
    island girt ocean
    modest Dian circled nymphs,
    rest London till him.
    Fair lords, leave stand reply.
    Farewell, sovereign.
  KING HENRY. Farewell, Hector Troy's true hope.
  CLARENCE. sign truth, kiss Highness' hand.
  KING HENRY. Well-minded Clarence, thou fortunate!
  MONTAGUE. Comfort, lord; leave.
  OXFORD. [Kissing KING'S band] seal truth bid
    adieu.
  KING HENRY. Sweet Oxford, loving Montague,
    once, happy farewell.
  WARWICK. Farewell, sweet lords; meet Coventry.
                              Exeunt KING EXETER
  KING HENRY. palace rest while.
    Cousin Exeter, thinks lordship?  
    Methinks power Edward hath field
    encounter mine.
  EXETER. doubt seduce rest.
  KING HENRY. fear; meed hath fame:
    stopp'd mine ears demands,
    posted suits slow delays;
    pity hath balm heal wounds,
    mildness hath allay'd swelling griefs,
    mercy dried water-flowing tears;
    desirous wealth,
    oppress'd great subsidies,
    forward revenge, err'd.
    love Edward me?
    No, Exeter, graces challenge grace;
    And, lion fawns lamb,
    lamb cease follow him.
                      [Shout 'A Lancaster! Lancaster!']
  EXETER. Hark, hark, lord! shouts these?

            Enter KING EDWARD, GLOUCESTER, soldiers  

  KING EDWARD. Seize shame-fac'd Henry, bear hence;
    proclaim King England.
    fount makes small brooks flow.
    stops thy spring; sea suck dry,
    swell higher ebb.
    Tower: speak.
                                     Exeunt KING HENRY
    And, lords, Coventry bend course,
    peremptory Warwick remains.
    sun shines hot; and, delay,
    Cold biting winter mars hop'd-for hay.
  GLOUCESTER. betimes, forces join,
    great-grown traitor unawares.
    Brave warriors, march amain Coventry.         Exeunt
