ACT V. SCENE I.
Coventry

Enter WARWICK, MAYOR COVENTRY, MESSENGERS,
and walls

  WARWICK. post valiant Oxford?
    thy lord, mine honest fellow?
  MESSENGER. Dunsmore, marching hitherward.
  WARWICK. brother Montague?
    post Montague?
  MESSENGER. Daintry, puissant troop.

                   Enter SIR JOHN SOMERVILLE

  WARWICK. Say, Somerville, loving son?
    thy guess nigh Clarence now?
  SOMERVILLE. Southam leave forces,
    expect hours hence.
                                                    [Drum heard]
  WARWICK. Clarence hand; hear drum.
  SOMERVILLE. his, lord; Southam lies.  
    drum Honour hears marcheth Warwick.
  WARWICK. be? Belike unlook'd friends.
  SOMERVILLE. hand, quickly know.

        March. Flourish. Enter KING EDWARD, GLOUCESTER,
                         soldiers

  KING EDWARD. Go, trumpet, walls, sound parle.
  GLOUCESTER. surly Warwick mans wall.
  WARWICK. O unbid spite! sportful Edward come?
    slept scouts seduc'd
    hear news repair?
  KING EDWARD. Now, Warwick, wilt thou ope city gates,
    Speak gentle words, humbly bend thy knee,
    Call Edward King, hands beg mercy?
    pardon thee outrages.
  WARWICK. Nay, rather, wilt thou draw thy forces hence,
    Confess set thee pluck'd thee down,
    Call Warwick patron, penitent?
    thou shalt remain Duke York.  
  GLOUCESTER. thought, least, King;
    make jest will?
  WARWICK. dukedom, sir, goodly gift?
  GLOUCESTER. Ay, faith, poor earl give.
    thee service good gift.
  WARWICK. 'Twas gave kingdom thy brother.
  KING EDWARD. 'tis mine, Warwick's gift.
  WARWICK. Thou art Atlas great weight;
    And, weakling, Warwick takes gift again;
    Henry King, Warwick subject.
  KING EDWARD. Warwick's king Edward's prisoner.
    And, gallant Warwick, answer this:
    body head off?
  GLOUCESTER. Alas, Warwick forecast,
    But, whiles thought steal single ten,
    king slily finger'd deck!
    left poor Henry Bishop's palace,
    ten meet Tower.
  KING EDWARD. 'Tis so; Warwick still.
  GLOUCESTER. Come, Warwick, time; kneel down, kneel down.  
    Nay, when? Strike now, iron cools.
  WARWICK. chop hand blow,
    fling thy face,
    bear low sail strike thee.
  KING EDWARD. Sail thou canst, wind tide thy friend,
    hand, fast wound thy coal-black hair,
    Shall, whiles thy head warm cut off,
    Write dust sentence thy blood:
    'Wind-changing Warwick change more.'

               Enter OXFORD, drum colours

  WARWICK. O cheerful colours! Oxford comes.
  OXFORD. Oxford, Oxford, Lancaster!
                              [He forces enter city]
  GLOUCESTER. gates open, enter too.
  KING EDWARD. foes set backs.
    Stand good array, doubt
    issue bid battle;
    not, city small defence,  
    quietly rouse traitors same.
  WARWICK. O, welcome, Oxford! thy help.

             Enter MONTAGUE, drum colours

  MONTAGUE. Montague, Montague, Lancaster!
                              [He forces enter city]
  GLOUCESTER. Thou thy brother buy treason
    dearest blood bodies bear.
  KING EDWARD. harder match'd, greater victory.
    mind presageth happy gain conquest.

             Enter SOMERSET, drum colours

  SOMERSET. Somerset, Somerset, Lancaster!
                              [He forces enter city]
  GLOUCESTER. thy name, Dukes Somerset,
    sold lives house York;
    thou shalt third, sword hold.
  
             Enter CLARENCE, drum colours

  WARWICK. lo George Clarence sweeps along,
    force bid brother battle;
    upright zeal prevails
    nature brother's love.
  CLARENCE. Clarence, Clarence, Lancaster!
  KING EDWARD. tu Brute- wilt thou stab Caesar too?
    parley, sirrah, George Clarence.
                  [Sound parley. RICHARD CLARENCE whisper]
  WARWICK. Come, Clarence, come. Thou wilt Warwick call.
  CLARENCE. [Taking red rose hat throwing
      WARWICK]
    Father Warwick, means?
    here, throw infamy thee.
    ruinate father's house,
    gave blood lime stones together,
    set Lancaster. Why, trowest thou, Warwick,
    Clarence harsh, blunt, unnatural,
    bend fatal instruments war  
    brother lawful King?
    thou wilt object holy oath.
    oath impiety
    Jephtha sacrific'd daughter.
    trespass made
    That, deserve brother's hands,
    proclaim thy mortal foe;
    resolution whereso'er meet thee-
    meet thee, thou stir abroad-
    plague thee thy foul misleading me.
    so, proud-hearted Warwick, defy thee,
    brother turn blushing cheeks.
    Pardon me, Edward, make amends;
    And, Richard, frown faults,
    henceforth unconstant.
  KING EDWARD. more, ten times belov'd,
    thou hadst deserv'd hate.
  GLOUCESTER. Welcome, good Clarence; brother-like.
  WARWICK. O passing traitor, perjur'd unjust!
  KING EDWARD. What, Warwick, wilt thou leave die town fight?  
    beat stones thine ears?
  WARWICK. Alas, coop'd defence!
    Barnet presently
    bid thee battle, Edward, thou dar'st.
  KING EDWARD. Yes, Warwick, Edward dares leads way.
    Lords, field; Saint George victory!
                                                 Exeunt YORKISTS
                         [March. WARWICK company follow]




SCENE II.
A field battle Barnet

Alarum excursions. Enter KING EDWARD, bringing WARWICK, wounded

  KING EDWARD. So, lie thou there. Die thou, die fear;
    Warwick bug fear'd all.
    Now, Montague, sit fast; seek thee,
    Warwick's bones thine company.            Exit
  WARWICK. Ah, nigh? me, friend foe,
    victor, York Warwick?
    that? mangled body shows,
    blood, strength, sick heart shows,
    yield body earth
    And, fall, conquest foe.
    yields cedar axe's edge,
    arms gave shelter princely eagle,
    shade ramping lion slept,
    top-branch overpeer'd Jove's spreading tree
    low shrubs winter's pow'rful wind.
    eyes, dimm'd death's black veil,  
    piercing mid-day sun
    search secret treasons world;
    wrinkles brows, fill'd blood,
    lik'ned oft kingly sepulchres;
    liv'd King, dig grave?
    durst smile Warwick bent brow?
    Lo glory smear'd dust blood!
    parks, walks, manors, had,
    forsake me; lands
    left body's length.
    pomp, rule, reign, earth dust?
    live can, die must.

                  Enter OXFORD SOMERSET

  SOMERSET. Ah, Warwick, Warwick! wert thou are,
    recover loss again.
    Queen France hath brought puissant power;
    heard news. Ah, couldst thou fly!
  WARWICK. then, fly. Ah, Montague,  
    thou there, sweet brother, hand,
    thy lips soul while!
    Thou lov'st not; for, brother, thou didst,
    Thy tears wash cold congealed blood
    glues lips speak.
    quickly, Montague, dead.
  SOMERSET. Ah, Warwick! Montague hath breath'd last;
    latest gasp cried Warwick,
    'Commend valiant brother.'
    said; spoke,
    sounded clamour vault,
    mought distinguish'd; last,
    hear, delivered groan,
    'O farewell, Warwick!'
  WARWICK. Sweet rest soul! Fly, lords, save yourselves:
    Warwick bids farewell, meet heaven.
                                                          [Dies]
  OXFORD. Away, away, meet Queen's great power!
                                  [Here bear body]




SCENE III.
Another part field

Flourish. Enter KING triumph; GLOUCESTER, CLARENCE, rest

  KING EDWARD. fortune upward course,
    grac'd wreaths victory.
    midst bright-shining day
    spy black, suspicious, threat'ning cloud
    encounter glorious sun
    Ere attain easeful western bed-
    mean, lords, powers Queen
    Hath rais'd Gallia arriv'd coast
    And, hear, march fight us.
  CLARENCE. gale disperse cloud
    blow source came;
    Thy beams dry vapours up,
    cloud engenders storm.
  GLOUCESTER. Queen valued thirty thousand strong,
    Somerset, Oxford, fled her.
    time breathe, assur'd  
    faction full strong ours.
  KING EDWARD. advertis'd loving friends
    hold Tewksbury;
    We, Barnet field,
    thither straight, willingness rids way;
    march strength augmented
    county along.
    Strike drum; cry 'Courage!' away.          Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Plains wear Tewksbury

Flourish. March. Enter QUEEN MARGARET, PRINCE EDWARD, SOMERSET, OXFORD,
and SOLDIERS

  QUEEN MARGARET. Great lords, wise men ne'er sit wail their
      loss,
    cheerly seek redress harms.
    mast blown overboard,
    cable broke, holding-anchor lost,
    half sailors swallow'd flood;
    lives pilot still. Is't meet he
    leave helm and, fearful lad,
    tearful eyes add water sea
    give strength hath much;
    Whiles, moan, ship splits rock,
    industry courage sav'd?
    Ah, shame! ah, fault this!
    Warwick anchor; that?
    Montague top-mast; him?
    slaught'red friends tackles; these?  
    Why, Oxford anchor?
    Somerset goodly mast?
    friends France shrouds tacklings?
    And, unskilful, Ned I
    allow'd skilful pilot's charge?
    helm sit weep,
    course, rough wind no,
    shelves rocks threaten wreck,
    good chide waves speak fair.
    Edward ruthless sea?
    Clarence quicksand deceit?
    Richard ragged fatal rock?
    enemies poor bark.
    swim; alas, 'tis while!
    Tread sand; why, quickly sink.
    Bestride rock; tide wash off,
    famish- threefold death.
    speak I, lords, understand,
    case fly us,
    hop'd-for mercy brothers  
    ruthless waves, sands, rocks.
    Why, courage then! avoided
    'Twere childish weakness lament fear.
  PRINCE WALES. Methinks woman valiant spirit
    Should, coward hear speak words,
    Infuse breast magnanimity
    make naked foil man-at-arms.
    speak doubting here;
    suspect fearful man,
    leave betimes,
    infect another
    make spirit himself.
    here- God forbid!-
    depart help.
  OXFORD. Women children high courage,
    warriors faint! Why, 'twere perpetual shame.
    O brave young Prince! thy famous grandfather
    Doth live thee. Long mayst thou Eve
    bear image renew glories!
  SOMERSET. fight hope,  
    home bed and, owl day,
    arise, mock'd wond'red at.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Thanks, gentle Somerset; sweet Oxford, thanks.
  PRINCE WALES. hath else.

                        Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. Prepare you, lords, Edward hand
    Ready fight; resolute.
  OXFORD. thought less. policy
    haste fast, find unprovided.
  SOMERSET. deceiv'd; readiness.
  QUEEN MARGARET. cheers heart, forwardness.
  OXFORD. pitch battle; budge.

      Flourish march. Enter, distance, KING EDWARD,
               GLOUCESTER, CLARENCE, soldiers

  KING EDWARD. Brave followers, yonder stands thorny wood
    Which, heavens' assistance strength,  
    roots hewn ere night.
    add fuel fire,
    wot ye blaze burn out.
    Give signal fight, it, lords.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Lords, knights, gentlemen, say
    tears gainsay; word speak,
    Ye see, drink water eye.
    Therefore, this: Henry, sovereign,
    prisoner foe; state usurp'd,
    realm slaughter-house, subjects slain,
    statutes cancell'd, treasure spent;
    yonder wolf makes spoil.
    fight justice. Then, God's name, lords,
    valiant, give signal fight.
                             Alarum, retreat, excursions. Exeunt




SCENE V.
Another part field

Flourish. Enter KING EDWARD, GLOUCESTER, CLARENCE, forces,
With QUEEN MARGARET, OXFORD, SOMERSET, prisoners

  KING EDWARD. period tumultuous broils.
    Oxford Hames Castle straight;
    Somerset, guilty head.
    Go, bear hence; hear speak.
  OXFORD. part, trouble thee words.
  SOMERSET. I, stoop patience fortune.
                             Exeunt OXFORD SOMERSET, guarded
  QUEEN MARGARET. part sadly troublous world,
    meet joy sweet Jerusalem.
  KING EDWARD. proclamation made finds Edward
    high reward, life?
  GLOUCESTER. is; lo youthful Edward comes.

                Enter soldiers, PRINCE EDWARD
  
  KING EDWARD. Bring gallant; hear speak.
    What, young man begin prick?
    Edward, satisfaction canst thou make
    bearing arms, stirring subjects,
    trouble thou hast turn'd to?
  PRINCE WALES. Speak subject, proud ambitious York.
    Suppose father's mouth;
    Resign thy chair, stand kneel thou,
    Whilst propose self-same words the
    Which, traitor, thou wouldst answer to.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Ah, thy father resolv'd!
  GLOUCESTER. worn petticoat
    ne'er stol'n breech Lancaster.
  PRINCE WALES. Aesop fable winter's night;
    currish riddle sorts place.
  GLOUCESTER. heaven, brat, plague ye word.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Ay, thou wast born plague men.
  GLOUCESTER. God's sake, captive scold.
  PRINCE WALES. Nay, scolding crookback rather.
  KING EDWARD. Peace, wilful boy, charm tongue.  
  CLARENCE. Untutor'd lad, thou art malapert.
  PRINCE WALES. duty; undutiful.
    Lascivious Edward, thou perjur'd George,
    thou misshapen Dick, ye all
    better, traitors ye are;
    thou usurp'st father's mine.
  KING EDWARD. that, likeness railer here.
                                                     [Stabs him]
  GLOUCESTER. Sprawl'st thou? that, end thy agony.
                                                     [Stabs him]
  CLARENCE. twitting perjury.
                                                     [Stabs him]
  QUEEN MARGARET. O, kill too!
  GLOUCESTER. Marry, shall.             [Offers kill her]
  KING EDWARD. Hold, Richard, hold; much.
  GLOUCESTER. live fill world words?
  KING EDWARD. What, doth swoon? means recovery.
  GLOUCESTER. Clarence, excuse King brother.
    London matter;
    Ere ye there, hear news.  
  CLARENCE. What? what?
  GLOUCESTER. Tower! Tower!                         Exit
  QUEEN MARGARET. O Ned, sweet Ned, speak thy mother, boy!
    Canst thou speak? O traitors! murderers!
    stabb'd Caesar shed blood all,
    offend, worthy blame,
    foul deed equal it.
    man: this, respect, child;
    men ne'er spend fury child.
    worse murderer, it?
    No, no, heart burst, speak-
    speak, heart burst.
    Butchers villains! bloody cannibals!
    sweet plant untimely cropp'd!
    children, butchers, had,
    thought stirr'd remorse.
    chance child,
    youth cut off
    As, deathsmen, rid sweet young prince!
  KING EDWARD. her; go, bear perforce.  
  QUEEN MARGARET. Nay, bear hence; dispatch here.
    sheathe thy sword; pardon thee death.
    What, wilt thou not? Then, Clarence, thou.
  CLARENCE. heaven, thee ease.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Good Clarence, do; sweet Clarence, thou it.
  CLARENCE. Didst thou hear swear it?
  QUEEN MARGARET. Ay, thou usest forswear thyself.
    'Twas sin before, 'tis charity.
    What! wilt thou not? devil's butcher,
    Hard-favour'd Richard? Richard, art thou?
    Thou art here. Murder thy alms-deed;
    Petitioners blood thou ne'er put'st back.
  KING EDWARD. Away, say; charge ye bear hence.
  QUEEN MARGARET. prince.
                                          Exit, led forcibly
  KING EDWARD. Richard gone?
  CLARENCE. London, post; and, guess,
    make bloody supper Tower.
  KING EDWARD. sudden, thing head.
    march hence. Discharge common sort  
    pay thanks; London
    gentle queen fares.
    this, hope, hath son me.               Exeunt




SCENE VI.
London. Tower

Enter KING HENRY GLOUCESTER LIEUTENANT, walls

  GLOUCESTER. Good day, lord. What, book hard?
  KING HENRY. Ay, good lord- lord, rather.
    'Tis sin flatter; 'good' better.
    'Good Gloucester' 'good devil' alike,
    preposterous; therefore, 'good lord.'
  GLOUCESTER. Sirrah, leave ourselves; confer.
                                                 Exit LIEUTENANT
  KING HENRY. flies reckless shepherd wolf;
    harmless sheep doth yield fleece,
    throat butcher's knife.
    scene death hath Roscius act?
  GLOUCESTER. Suspicion haunts guilty mind:
    thief doth fear bush officer.
  KING HENRY. bird hath limed bush
    trembling wings misdoubteth bush;
    I, hapless male sweet bird,  
    fatal object eye
    poor young lim'd, caught, kill'd.
  GLOUCESTER. Why, peevish fool Crete
    taught son office fowl!
    yet, wings, fool drown'd.
  KING HENRY. I, Daedalus; poor boy, Icarus;
    Thy father, Minos, denied course;
    sun sear'd wings sweet boy,
    Thy brother Edward; thyself, sea
    envious gulf swallow life.
    Ah, kill thy weapon, words!
    breast brook thy dagger's point
    ears tragic history.
    wherefore dost thou come? Is't life?
  GLOUCESTER. Think'st thou executioner?
  KING HENRY. persecutor thou art.
    murdering innocents executing,
    Why, thou executioner.
  GLOUCESTER. Thy son kill'd presumption.
  KING HENRY. Hadst thou kill'd thou didst presume,  
    Thou hadst liv'd kill son mine.
    prophesy, thousand
    mistrust parcel fear,
    man's sigh, widow's,
    orphan's water-standing eye-
    Men sons, wives husbands,
    Orphans parents' timeless death-
    rue hour thou wast born.
    owl shriek'd thy birth- evil sign;
    night-crow cried, aboding luckless time;
    Dogs howl'd, hideous tempest shook trees;
    raven rook'd chimney's top,
    chatt'ring pies dismal discords sung;
    Thy mother felt mother's pain,
    brought mother's hope,
    wit, indigest deformed lump,
    fruit goodly tree.
    Teeth hadst thou thy head thou wast born,
    signify thou cam'st bite world;
    rest true heard,  
    Thou cam'st-
  GLOUCESTER. hear more. Die, prophet, thy speech.
                                                     [Stabs him]
    this, rest, ordain'd.
  KING HENRY. Ay, slaughter this.
    O, God forgive sins pardon thee!               [Dies]
  GLOUCESTER. What, aspiring blood Lancaster
    Sink ground? thought mounted.
    sword weeps poor King's death.
    O, purple tears shed
    downfall house!
    spark life remaining,
    Down, hell; thee thither-
                                               [Stabs again]
    I, pity, love, fear.
    Indeed, 'tis true Henry told of;
    heard mother say
    world legs forward.
    reason, ye, make haste
    seek ruin usurp'd right?  
    midwife wonder'd; women cried
    'O, Jesus bless us, born teeth!'
    was, plainly signified
    snarl, bite, play dog.
    Then, heavens shap'd body so,
    hell make crook'd mind answer it.
    brother, brother;
    word 'love,' greybeards call divine,
    resident men another,
    me! alone.
    Clarence, beware; thou keep'st light,
    sort pitchy day thee;
    buzz abroad prophecies
    Edward fearful life;
    purge fear, thy death.
    King Henry Prince son gone.
    Clarence, thy turn next, rest;
    Counting bad till best.
    throw thy body room,
    triumph, Henry, thy day doom.  
                                              Exit body




SCENE VII.
London. palace

Flourish. Enter KING EDWARD, QUEEN ELIZABETH, CLARENCE, GLOUCESTER,
HASTINGS, NURSE, Young PRINCE, attendants

  KING EDWARD. sit England's royal throne,
    Repurchas'd blood enemies.
    valiant foemen, autumn's corn,
    mow'd tops pride!
    Dukes Somerset, threefold renown'd
    hardy undoubted champions;
    Cliffords, father son;
    Northumberlands- braver men
    Ne'er spurr'd coursers trumpet's sound;
    brave bears, Warwick Montague,
    chains fetter'd kingly lion
    made forest tremble roar'd.
    swept suspicion seat
    made footstool security.
    hither, Bess, kiss boy.  
    Young Ned, thee thine uncles myself
    armours watch'd winter's night,
    afoot summer's scalding heat,
    thou might'st repossess crown peace;
    labours thou shalt reap gain.
  GLOUCESTER. [Aside] blast harvest head laid;
    look'd world.
    shoulder ordain'd thick heave;
    heave weight break back.
    Work thou way- execute.
  KING EDWARD. Clarence Gloucester, love lovely queen;
    kiss princely nephew, brothers both.
  CLARENCE. duty owe Majesty
    seal lips sweet babe.
  KING EDWARD. Thanks, noble Clarence; worthy brother, thanks.
  GLOUCESTER. love tree thou sprang'st,
    Witness loving kiss give fruit.
    [Aside] truth, Judas kiss'd master
    cried 'All hail!' meant harm.
  KING EDWARD. seated soul delights,  
    country's peace brothers' loves.
  CLARENCE. Grace Margaret?
    Reignier, father, King France
    Hath pawn'd Sicils Jerusalem,
    ransom.
  KING EDWARD. her, waft France.
    rests spend time
    stately triumphs, mirthful comic shows,
    befits pleasure court?
    Sound drums trumpets. Farewell, sour annoy!
    here, hope, begins lasting joy.             Exeunt


THE END

1611

KING HENRY EIGHTH

by William Shakespeare


DRAMATIS PERSONAE

  KING HENRY EIGHTH
  CARDINAL WOLSEY               CARDINAL CAMPEIUS
  CAPUCIUS, Ambassador Emperor Charles V
  CRANMER, ARCHBISHOP CANTERBURY
  DUKE NORFOLK               DUKE BUCKINGHAM
  DUKE SUFFOLK               EARL SURREY
  LORD CHAMBERLAIN              LORD CHANCELLOR
  GARDINER, BISHOP WINCHESTER
  BISHOP LINCOLN             LORD ABERGAVENNY
  LORD SANDYS                   SIR HENRY GUILDFORD
  SIR THOMAS LOVELL             SIR ANTHONY DENNY
  SIR NICHOLAS VAUX             SECRETARIES Wolsey
  CROMWELL, servant Wolsey
  GRIFFITH, gentleman-usher Queen Katharine
  GENTLEMEN
  DOCTOR BUTTS, physician King
  GARTER KING-AT-ARMS
  SURVEYOR Duke Buckingham
  BRANDON, SERGEANT-AT-ARMS
  DOORKEEPER Council chamber  
  PORTER, MAN           PAGE Gardiner
  CRIER

  QUEEN KATHARINE, wife King Henry, divorced
  ANNE BULLEN, Maid Honour, Queen
  LADY, friend Anne Bullen
  PATIENCE, woman Queen Katharine

  Lord Mayor, Aldermen, Lords Ladies Dumb
       Shows; Women attending Queen; Scribes,
       Officers, Guards, Attendants; Spirits

                          SCENE:

              London; Westminster; Kimbolton



                 KING HENRY EIGHTH

                     PROLOGUE.

    make laugh; things now
    bear weighty brow,
    Sad, high, working, full state woe,
    noble scenes draw eye flow,
    present. pity here
    May, well, fall tear:
    subject deserve it. give
    money hope believe
    find truth too. see
    show two, agree
    play pass, willing,
    undertake shilling
    Richly short hours. they
    hear merry bawdy play,
    noise targets, fellow
    long motley coat guarded yellow,
    deceiv'd; for, gentle hearers, know,
    rank chosen truth show  
    fool fight is, forfeiting
    brains, opinion bring
    make true intend,
    leave understanding friend.
    Therefore, goodness sake, known
    happiest hearers town,
    sad, make ye. ye see
    persons noble story
    living; great,
    follow'd general throng sweat
    thousand friends; then, moment, see
    mightiness meets misery.
    merry then, say
    man weep wedding-day.

ACT I. SCENE 1.

London. palace

Enter DUKE NORFOLK door; other,
the DUKE BUCKINGHAM LORD ABERGAVENNY

  BUCKINGHAM. Good morrow, met. ye done
    France?
  NORFOLK. Grace,
    Healthful; fresh admirer
    there.
  BUCKINGHAM. untimely ague
    Stay'd prisoner chamber when
    suns glory, lights men,
    Met vale Andren.
  NORFOLK. 'Twixt Guynes Arde-
    present, salute horseback;
    Beheld them, lighted, clung
    embracement, grew together;
    they, thron'd weigh'd  
    compounded one?
  BUCKINGHAM. time
    chamber's prisoner.
  NORFOLK. lost
    view earthly glory; men say,
    Till time pomp single, married
    itself. day
    day's master, till last
    Made wonders its. To-day French,
    clinquant, gold, heathen gods,
    Shone English; to-morrow they
    Made Britain India: man stood
    Show'd mine. dwarfish pages were
    cherubins, gilt; madams too,
    us'd toil, sweat bear
    pride them, labour
    painting. masque
    cried incomparable; th' ensuing night
    Made fool beggar. kings,
    Equal lustre, best, worst,  
    presence present them: eye
    praise; present both,
    'Twas one, discerner
    Durst wag tongue censure. suns-
    phrase 'em-by heralds challeng'd
    noble spirits arms, perform
    thought's compass, fabulous story,
    enough, credit,
    Bevis believ'd.
  BUCKINGHAM. O, far!
  NORFOLK. belong worship, affect
    honour honesty, tract ev'rything
    good discourser lose life
    action's tongue to. royal:
    disposing nought rebell'd;
    Order gave thing view. office did
    Distinctly full function.
  BUCKINGHAM. guide-
    mean, set body limbs
    great sport together, guess?  
  NORFOLK. One, certes, promises element
    business.
  BUCKINGHAM. pray you, who, lord?
  NORFOLK. ord'red good discretion
    reverend Cardinal York.
  BUCKINGHAM. devil speed him! man's pie freed
    ambitious finger. he
    fierce vanities? wonder
    keech bulk
    rays o' th' beneficial sun,
    earth.
  NORFOLK. Surely, sir,
    stuff puts ends;
    For, propp'd ancestry, grace
    Chalks successors way, call'd upon
    high feats th' crown, allied
    eminent assistants, spider-like,
    self-drawing web, 'a note
    force merit makes way-
    gift heaven him, buys  
    place King.
  ABERGAVENNY. tell
    heaven hath him-let graver eye
    Pierce that; pride
    Peep part him. that?
    hell, devil niggard
    before, begins
    hell himself.
  BUCKINGHAM. devil,
    French out, him-
    privity o' th' King-t' appoint
    attend him? makes file
    gentry; part such
    great charge honour
    meant lay upon; letter,
    honourable board council out,
    fetch papers.
  ABERGAVENNY. know
    Kinsmen mine, least, have
    sicken'd estates  
    abound formerly.
  BUCKINGHAM. O, many
    broke backs laying manors 'em
    great journey. vanity
    minister communication of
    poor issue?
  NORFOLK. Grievingly think
    peace French values
    cost conclude it.
  BUCKINGHAM. man,
    hideous storm follow'd, was
    thing inspir'd, and, consulting, broke
    general prophecy-that tempest,
    Dashing garment peace, aboded
    sudden breach on't.
  NORFOLK. budded out;
    France hath flaw'd league, hath attach'd
    merchants' goods Bordeaux.
  ABERGAVENNY. therefore
    Th' ambassador silenc'd?  
  NORFOLK. Marry, is't.
  ABERGAVENNY. proper tide peace, purchas'd
    superfluous rate!
  BUCKINGHAM. Why, business
    reverend Cardinal carried.
  NORFOLK. Grace,
    state takes notice private difference
    Betwixt Cardinal. advise you-
    heart wishes you
    Honour plenteous safety-that read
    Cardinal's malice potency
    Together; further, that
    high hatred effect not
    minister power. nature,
    revengeful; sword
    Hath sharp edge-it's long and't said
    reaches far, 'twill extend,
    Thither darts it. Bosom counsel
    find wholesome. Lo, rock
    advise shunning.  

      Enter CARDINAL WOLSEY, purse borne before
      him, guard, SECRETARIES
      papers. CARDINAL passage fixeth his
      eye BUCKINGHAM, BUCKINGHAM him,
      full disdain

  WOLSEY. Duke Buckingham's surveyor? Ha!
    examination?
  SECRETARY. Here, you.
  WOLSEY. person ready?
  SECRETARY. Ay, Grace.
  WOLSEY. Well, more, Buckingham
    lessen big look.
                                          Exeunt WOLSEY train
  BUCKINGHAM. butcher's cur venom-mouth'd, I
    power muzzle him; best
    wake slumber. beggar's book
    Outworths noble's blood.
  NORFOLK. What, chaf'd?  
    God temp'rance; th' appliance only
    disease requires.
  BUCKINGHAM. read in's looks
    Matter me, eye revil'd
    abject object. instant
    bores trick. th' King;
    follow, outstare him.
  NORFOLK. Stay, lord,
    reason choler question
    'tis about. climb steep hills
    Requires slow pace first. Anger like
    full hot horse, allow'd way,
    Self-mettle tires him. man England
    advise you; yourself
    friend.
  BUCKINGHAM. King,
    mouth honour cry down
    Ipswich fellow's insolence; proclaim
    difference persons.
  NORFOLK. advis'd:  
    Heat furnace foe hot
    singe yourself. outrun
    violent swiftness run at,
    lose over-running. not
    fire mounts liquor till't run o'er
    augment wastes it? advis'd.
    English soul
    stronger direct yourself,
    sap reason quench
    allay fire passion.
  BUCKINGHAM. Sir,
    thankful you, along
    prescription; top-proud fellow-
    flow gan not, but
    sincere motions, intelligence,
    proofs clear founts July when
    grain gravel-I know
    corrupt treasonous.
  NORFOLK. treasonous.
  BUCKINGHAM. th' King say't, make vouch strong  
    shore rock. Attend: holy fox,
    wolf, both-for equal rav'nous
    subtle, prone mischief
    perform't, mind place
    Infecting another, yea, reciprocally-
    show pomp France
    home, suggests King master
    costly treaty, th' interview
    swallowed treasure glass
    break i' th' wrenching.
  NORFOLK. Faith, did.
  BUCKINGHAM. Pray, give favour, sir; cunning cardinal
    articles o' th' combination drew
    pleas'd; ratified
    cried 'Thus be' end
    give crutch th' dead. Count-Cardinal
    this, 'tis well; worthy Wolsey,
    err, it. follows,
    Which, it, kind puppy
    th' dam treason: Charles Emperor,  
    pretence Queen aunt-
    'twas colour, came
    whisper Wolsey-here makes visitation-
    fears interview betwixt
    England France amity
    Breed prejudice; league
    Peep'd harms menac'd him-privily
    Deals Cardinal; and, trow-
    well, Emperor
    Paid ere promis'd; suit granted
    Ere ask'd-but made,
    pav'd gold, Emperor desir'd,
    alter King's course,
    break foresaid peace. King know,
    me, Cardinal
    buy sell honour pleases,
    advantage.
  NORFOLK. sorry
    hear him, were
    mistaken in't.  
  BUCKINGHAM. No, syllable:
    pronounce shape
    proof.

       Enter BRANDON, SERGEANT-AT-ARMS him,
              guard

  BRANDON. office, sergeant: execute it.
  SERGEANT. Sir,
    lord Duke Buckingham, Earl
    Hereford, Stafford, Northampton, I
    Arrest thee high treason, name
    sovereign King.
  BUCKINGHAM. Lo you, lord,
    net fall'n me! perish
    device practice.
  BRANDON. sorry
    ta'en liberty, on
    business present; 'tis Highness' pleasure
    th' Tower.  
  BUCKINGHAM. nothing
    plead mine innocence; dye me
    makes whit'st part black. heav'n
    things! obey.
    O Lord Aberga'ny, fare well!
  BRANDON. Nay, bear company.
    [To ABERGAVENNY]  King
    pleas'd th' Tower, till know
    determines further.
  ABERGAVENNY. Duke said,
    heaven done, King's pleasure
    obey'd.
  BRANDON. warrant from
    King t' attach Lord Montacute bodies
    Duke's confessor, John de la Car,
    Gilbert Peck, chancellor-
  BUCKINGHAM. So, so!
    limbs o' th' plot; more, hope.
  BRANDON. monk o' th' Chartreux.
  BUCKINGHAM. O, Nicholas Hopkins?  
  BRANDON. He.
  BUCKINGHAM. surveyor false. o'er-great Cardinal
    Hath show'd gold; life spann'd already.
    shadow poor Buckingham,
    figure instant cloud puts on
    dark'ning clear sun. lord, farewell.
    Exeunt




ACT I. SCENE 2.

London. Council Chamber

Cornets. Enter KING HENRY, leaning CARDINAL'S shoulder, NOBLES,
and SIR THOMAS LOVELL, others. CARDINAL places himself
under KING'S feet side

  KING. life itself, heart it,
    great care; stood i' th' level
    full-charg'd confederacy, give thanks
    chok'd it. call'd us
    gentleman Buckingham's. person
    hear confessions justify;
    point point treasons master
    relate.

      noise within, crying 'Room Queen!'
      Enter QUEEN, usher'd DUKES NORFOLK
      SUFFOLK; kneels. KING riseth
      state, takes up, kisses placeth  
      him

  QUEEN KATHARINE. Nay, longer kneel: suitor.
  KING. Arise, place us. Half suit
    us: half power.
    moiety ere given;
    Repeat will, it.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. Majesty.
    love yourself, love
    unconsidered leave honour nor
    dignity office, point
    petition.
  KING. Lady mine, proceed.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. solicited, few,
    true condition, subjects
    great grievance: commissions
    'em hath flaw'd heart
    loyalties; wherein, although,
    good Lord Cardinal, vent reproaches
    bitterly putter-on  
    exactions, King master-
    honour Heaven shield soil!-even escapes not
    Language unmannerly; yea, breaks
    sides loyalty, appears
    loud rebellion.
  NORFOLK. appears-
    doth appear; for, taxations,
    clothiers all, maintain
    'longing, put of
    spinsters, carders, fullers, weavers, who
    Unfit life, compell'd hunger
    lack means, desperate manner
    Daring th' event th' teeth, uproar,
    danger serves them.
  KING. Taxation!
    Wherein? taxation? Lord Cardinal,
    blam'd alike us,
    taxation?
  WOLSEY. you, sir,
    single part aught  
    Pertains th' state, front file
    steps me.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. No, lord!
    others! frame
    Things alike, wholesome
    them, must
    Perforce acquaintance. exactions,
    Whereof sovereign note, are
    pestilent th' hearing; bear 'em
    back sacrifice th' load. say
    devis'd you, suffer
    hard exclamation.
  KING. exaction!
    nature it? kind, know,
    exaction?
  QUEEN KATHARINE. venturous
    tempting patience, bold'ned
    promis'd pardon. subjects' grief
    commissions, compels each
    sixth part substance, levied  
    delay; pretence this
    nam'd wars France. makes bold mouths;
    Tongues spit duties out, cold hearts freeze
    Allegiance them; curses now
    Live prayers did; pass
    tractable obedience slave
    incensed will. Highness
    give quick consideration, for
    primer business.
  KING. life,
    pleasure.
  WOLSEY. me,
    by
    single voice; pass'd but
    learned approbation judges. am
    Traduc'd ignorant tongues, know
    faculties person, be
    chronicles doing, say
    'Tis fate place, rough brake
    virtue through. stint  
    actions fear
    cope malicious censurers, ever
    rav'nous fishes vessel follow
    new-trimm'd, benefit further
    vainly longing. oft best,
    sick interpreters, weak ones, is
    ours, allow'd; worst, oft
    Hitting grosser quality, cried up
    act. stand still,
    fear motion mock'd carp'd at,
    root sit, sit
    State-statues only.
  KING. Things well
    care exempt fear:
    Things example, issue
    fear'd. precedent
    commission? believe, any.
    rend subjects laws,
    stick will. Sixth part each?
    trembling contribution! Why,  
    tree lop, bark, part o' th' timber;
    leave root, hack'd,
    air drink sap. county
    question'd send letters with
    Free pardon man denied
    force commission. Pray, tot;
    put care.
  WOLSEY. [Aside SECRETARY]  word you.
    letters writ shire
    King's grace pardon. grieved commons
    conceive me-let nois'd
    intercession revokement
    pardon comes. anon advise you
    proceeding.                         Exit SECRETARY

                    Enter SURVEYOR

  QUEEN KATHARINE. Duke Buckingham
    run displeasure.
  KING. grieves many.  
    gentleman learn'd rare speaker;
    nature bound; training such
    furnish instruct great teachers
    seek aid himself. see,
    noble benefits prove
    dispos'd, mind growing corrupt,
    turn vicious forms, ten times ugly
    fair. man complete,
    enroll'd 'mongst wonders, we,
    ravish'd list'ning, find
    hour speech minute-he, lady,
    Hath monstrous habits put graces
    his, black
    besmear'd hell. Sit us; hear-
    gentleman trust-of him
    Things strike honour sad. Bid recount
    fore-recited practices, whereof
    feel little, hear much.
  WOLSEY. Stand forth, bold spirit relate you,
    careful subject, collected  
    Duke Buckingham.
  KING. Speak freely.
  SURVEYOR. First, usual him-every day
    infect speech-that King
    issue die, carry so
    make sceptre his. words
    heard utter son-in-law,
    Lord Aberga'ny, oath menac'd
    Revenge Cardinal.
  WOLSEY. Highness, note
    dangerous conception point:
    friended wish, high person
    malignant, stretches
    friends.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. learn'd Lord Cardinal,
    Deliver charity.
  KING. Speak on.
    grounded title crown
    fail? point hast thou heard him
    time speak aught?  
  SURVEYOR. brought this
    vain prophecy Nicholas Henton.
  KING. Henton?
  SURVEYOR. Sir, Chartreux friar,
    confessor, fed minute
    words sovereignty.
  KING. know'st thou this?
  SURVEYOR. long Highness sped France,
    Duke Rose, parish
    Saint Lawrence Poultney, demand
    speech Londoners
    French journey. replied
    Men fear'd French prove perfidious,
    King's danger. Presently Duke
    'twas fear doubted
    'Twould prove verity words
    Spoke holy monk 'that oft' he
    'Hath me, wishing permit
    John de la Car, chaplain, choice hour
    hear matter moment;  
    confession's seal
    solemnly sworn spoke
    chaplain creature living but
    utter, demure confidence
    pausingly ensu'd: "Neither King nor's heirs,
    Duke, prosper; bid strive
    gain love o' th' commonalty; Duke
    govern England."'
  QUEEN KATHARINE. well,
    Duke's surveyor, lost office
    complaint o' th' tenants. good heed
    charge spleen noble person
    spoil nobler soul. say, heed;
    Yes, heartily beseech you.
  KING. on.
    forward.
  SURVEYOR. soul, speak truth.
    told lord Duke, th' devil's illusions
    monk deceiv'd, 'twas dangerous
       
    ruminate far, until
    forg'd design, which, believ'd,
    do. answer'd 'Tush,
    damage'; adding further
    That, King sickness fail'd,
    Cardinal's Sir Thomas Lovell's heads
    off.
  KING. Ha! what, rank? Ah ha!
    mischief man. Canst thou further?
  SURVEYOR. can, liege.
  KING. Proceed.
  SURVEYOR. Greenwich,
    Highness reprov'd Duke
    Sir William Bulmer-
  KING. remember
    time: sworn servant,
    Duke retain'd his. on: hence?
  SURVEYOR. 'If' quoth 'I committed-
    Tower thought-I play'd
    part father meant act  
    Th' usurper Richard; who, Salisbury,
    Made suit in's presence, granted,
    made semblance duty, would
    put knife him.'
  KING. giant traitor!
  WOLSEY. Now, madam, Highness live freedom,
    man prison?
  QUEEN KATHARINE. God mend all!
  KING. thee: say'st?
  SURVEYOR. 'the Duke father' 'knife,'
    stretch'd him, and, hand dagger,
    spread on's breast, mounting eyes,
    discharge horrible oath, tenour
    Was, evil us'd, outgo
    father performance
    irresolute purpose.
  KING. period,
    sheath knife us. attach'd;
    Call present trial. may
    Find mercy law, 'tis his; none,  
    seek't us. day night!
    traitor th' height.                                Exeunt




ACT I. SCENE 3.

London. palace

Enter LORD CHAMBERLAIN LORD SANDYS

  CHAMBERLAIN. Is't spells France juggle
    Men strange mysteries?
  SANDYS. customs,
    ridiculous,
    Nay, 'em unmanly, follow'd.
  CHAMBERLAIN. see, good English
    late voyage merely
    fit o' th' face; shrewd ones;
    hold 'em, swear directly
    noses counsellors
    Pepin Clotharius, state so.
  SANDYS. legs, lame ones. it,
    'em pace before, spavin
    springhalt reign'd 'em.
  CHAMBERLAIN. Death! lord,
    clothes pagan cut to't,  
    th' worn Christendom.

           Enter SIR THOMAS LOVELL

    now?
    news, Sir Thomas Lovell?
  LOVELL. Faith, lord,
    hear proclamation
    clapp'd court gate.
  CHAMBERLAIN. is't for?
  LOVELL. reformation travell'd gallants,
    fill court quarrels, talk, tailors.
  CHAMBERLAIN. glad 'tis there. pray monsieurs
    English courtier wise,
    Louvre.
  LOVELL. either,
    run conditions, leave remnants
    fool feather France,
    honourable points ignorance
    Pertaining thereunto-as fights fireworks;  
    Abusing men be,
    foreign wisdom-renouncing clean
    faith tennis, tall stockings,
    Short blist'red breeches, types travel
    understand honest men,
    pack playfellows. There, it,
    may, cum privilegio, wear away
    lag end lewdness laugh'd at.
  SANDYS. 'Tis time give 'em physic, diseases
    grown catching.
  CHAMBERLAIN. loss ladies
    trim vanities!
  LOVELL. Ay, marry,
    woe indeed, lords: sly whoresons
    speeding trick lay ladies.
    French song fiddle fellow.
  SANDYS. devil fiddle 'em! glad going,
    converting 'em. Now
    honest country lord, am, beaten
    long time play, bring plainsong  
    hour hearing; and, by'r Lady,
    Held current music too.
  CHAMBERLAIN. said, Lord Sandys;
    colt's tooth cast yet.
  SANDYS. No, lord,
    stamp.
  CHAMBERLAIN. Sir Thomas,
    a-going?
  LOVELL. Cardinal's;
    lordship guest too.
  CHAMBERLAIN. O, 'tis true;
    night makes supper, great one,
    lords ladies; be
    beauty kingdom, assure you.
  LOVELL. churchman bears bounteous mind indeed,
    hand fruitful land feeds us;
    dews fall everywhere.
  CHAMBERLAIN. doubt noble;
    black mouth him.
  SANDYS. may, lord; wherewithal.  
    Sparing show worse sin ill doctrine:
    Men liberal,
    set examples.
  CHAMBERLAIN. True, so;
    give great ones. barge stays;
    lordship along. Come, good Sir Thomas,
    late else; be,
    spoke to, Sir Henry Guildford,
    night comptrollers.
  SANDYS. lordship's.                                Exeunt




ACT I. SCENE 4.

London. Presence Chamber York Place

Hautboys. small table state Cardinal,
a longer table guests. enter ANNE BULLEN,
and divers LADIES GENTLEMEN, guests, door;
at door enter SIR HENRY GUILDFORD

  GUILDFORD. Ladies, general Grace
    Salutes ye all; night dedicates
    fair content you. here, hopes,
    noble bevy, brought her
    care abroad; merry
    As, first, good company, good wine, good welcome,
    make good people.

       Enter LORD CHAMBERLAIN, LORD SANDYS, SIR
                  THOMAS LOVELL

    O, lord, y'are tardy,  
    thought fair company
    Clapp'd wings me.
  CHAMBERLAIN. young, Sir Harry Guildford.
  SANDYS. Sir Thomas Lovell, Cardinal
    half lay thoughts him, these
    find running banquet ere rested
    'em. life,
    sweet society fair ones.
  LOVELL. O lordship confessor
    these!
  SANDYS. were;
    find easy penance.
  LOVELL. Faith, easy?
  SANDYS. easy bed afford it.
  CHAMBERLAIN. Sweet ladies, sit? Sir Harry,
    Place side; charge this.
    Grace ent'ring. Nay, freeze:
    women plac'd makes cold weather.
    Lord Sandys, 'em waking:
    Pray sit ladies.  
  SANDYS. faith,
    lordship. leave, sweet ladies.
                 [Seats ANNE BULLEN lady]
    chance talk wild, forgive me;
    father.
  ANNE. mad, sir?
  SANDYS. O, mad, exceeding mad, love too.
    bite none; now,
    kiss twenty breath.              [Kisses her]
  CHAMBERLAIN. said, lord.
    So, y'are fairly seated. Gentlemen,
    penance lies fair ladies
    Pass frowning.
  SANDYS. cure,
    alone.

         Hautboys. Enter CARDINAL WOLSEY, attended; and
                         takes state

  WOLSEY. Y'are welcome, fair guests. noble lady  
    gentleman freely merry
    friend. This, confirm welcome-
    all, good health!                             [Drinks]
  SANDYS. Grace noble.
    bowl hold thanks
    save talking.
  WOLSEY. Lord Sandys,
    beholding you. Cheer neighbours.
    Ladies, merry. Gentlemen,
    fault this?
  SANDYS. red wine rise
    fair cheeks, lord; 'em
    Talk silence.
  ANNE. merry gamester,
    Lord Sandys.
  SANDYS. Yes, make play.
    ladyship; pledge it, madam,
    'tis thing-
  ANNE. show me.
  SANDYS. told Grace talk anon.  
                             [Drum trumpet. Chambers discharg'd]
  WOLSEY. that?
  CHAMBERLAIN. there, ye.             Exit SERVANT
  WOLSEY. warlike voice,
    end, this? Nay, ladies, fear not:
    laws war y'are privileg'd.

            Re-enter SERVANT

  CHAMBERLAIN. now! is't?
  SERVANT. noble troop strangers-
    seem. Th' left barge landed,
    make, great ambassadors
    foreign princes.
  WOLSEY. Good Lord Chamberlain,
    Go, give 'em welcome; speak French tongue;
    pray receive 'em nobly conduct 'em
    presence, heaven beauty
    shine full them. attend him.
              Exit CHAMBERLAIN attended. rise, tables remov'd  
    broken banquet, mend it.
    good digestion all; more
    show'r ye; all.

      Hautboys. Enter KING, others, maskers,
      habited shepherds, usher'd LORD CHAMBERLAIN.
      pass directly CARDINAL,
      gracefully salute him

    noble company! pleasures?
  CHAMBERLAIN. speak English, pray'd
    Grace, that, heard fame
    noble fair assembly
    night meet here, less,
    great respect bear beauty,
    leave flocks and, fair conduct,
    Crave leave view ladies entreat
    hour revels 'em.
  WOLSEY. Say, Lord Chamberlain,
    poor house grace; pay 'em  
    thousand thanks, pray 'em pleasures.
                   [They choose ladies. KING chooses ANNE BULLEN]
  KING. fairest hand touch'd! O beauty,
    Till knew thee!                        [Music. Dance]
  WOLSEY. lord!
  CHAMBERLAIN. Grace?
  WOLSEY. Pray 'em me:
    'em, person,
    worthy place myself; whom,
    knew him, love duty
    surrender it.
  CHAMBERLAIN. will, lord.
                                         [He whispers maskers]
  WOLSEY. they?
  CHAMBERLAIN. one, confess,
    indeed; Grace
    Find out, it.
  WOLSEY. see, then.                    [Comes state]
    good leaves, gentlemen, make
    royal choice.  
  KING.  [Unmasking]  Ye found him, Cardinal.
    hold fair assembly; well, lord.
    churchman, or, you, Cardinal,
    judge unhappily.
  WOLSEY. glad
    Grace grown pleasant.
  KING. Lord Chamberlain,
    Prithee hither: fair lady's that?
  CHAMBERLAIN. An't Grace, Sir Thomas Bullen's
      daughter-
    Viscount Rochford-one Highness' women.
  KING. heaven, dainty one. Sweet heart,
    unmannerly out
    kiss you. health, gentlemen!
    round.
  WOLSEY. Sir Thomas Lovell, banquet ready
    I' th' privy chamber?
  LOVELL. Yes, lord.
  WOLSEY. Grace,
    fear, dancing heated.  
  KING. fear, much.
  WOLSEY. fresher air, lord,
    chamber.
  KING. Lead ladies, ev'ry one. Sweet partner,
    forsake you. merry:
    Good Lord Cardinal, half dozen healths
    drink fair ladies, measure
    lead 'em again; dream
    favour. music knock it.
                                                Exeunt, trumpets

ACT II. SCENE 1.

Westminster. street

Enter GENTLEMEN, doors

  GENTLEMAN. fast?
  GENTLEMAN. O, God save ye!
    Ev'n Hall, hear become
    great Duke Buckingham.
  GENTLEMAN. save you
    labour, sir. All's ceremony
    bringing back prisoner.
  GENTLEMAN. there?
  GENTLEMAN. Yes, indeed, I.
  GENTLEMAN. Pray, speak happen'd.
  GENTLEMAN. guess quickly what.
  GENTLEMAN. found guilty?
  GENTLEMAN. Yes, he, condemn'd upon't.
  GENTLEMAN. for't.
  GENTLEMAN. number more.
  GENTLEMAN. But, pray, pass'd it?  
  GENTLEMAN. little. great Duke.
    bar; accusations
    pleaded guilty, alleged
    sharp reasons defeat law.
    King's attorney, contrary,
    Urg'd examinations, proofs, confessions,
    divers witnesses; Duke desir'd
    brought, viva voce, face;
    appear'd surveyor,
    Sir Gilbert Peck chancellor, John Car,
    Confessor him, devil-monk,
    Hopkins, made mischief.
  GENTLEMAN. he
    fed prophecies?
  GENTLEMAN. same.
    accus'd strongly, fain
    flung him; not;
    peers, evidence,
    found guilty high treason. Much
    spoke, learnedly, life;  
    pitied forgotten.
  GENTLEMAN. this, bear him-self
  GENTLEMAN. brought th' bar hear
    knell rung out, judgment, stirr'd
    agony sweat extremely,
    spoke choler, ill hasty;
    fell again, sweetly
    rest show'd noble patience.
  GENTLEMAN. fears death.
  GENTLEMAN. Sure, not;
    womanish; cause
    grieve at.
  GENTLEMAN. Certainly
    Cardinal end this.
  GENTLEMAN. 'Tis likely,
    conjectures: first, Kildare's attainder,
    deputy Ireland, remov'd,
    Earl Surrey thither, haste too,
    father.
  GENTLEMAN. trick state  
    deep envious one.
  GENTLEMAN. return
    doubt requite it. noted,
    generally: King favours
    Cardinal instantly find employment,
    court too.
  GENTLEMAN. commons
    Hate perniciously, and, o' conscience,
    ten fathom deep: Duke much
    love dote on; call bounteous Buckingham,
    mirror courtesy-

      Enter BUCKINGHAM arraignment, tip-staves
      him; axe edge him; halberds
      side; accompanied SIR THOMAS
      LOVELL, SIR NICHOLAS VAUX, SIR WILLIAM SANDYS,
      common people, etc.

  GENTLEMAN. Stay there, sir,
    noble ruin'd man speak of.  
  GENTLEMAN. stand close, behold him.
  BUCKINGHAM. good people,
    pity me,
    Hear say, home lose me.
    day receiv'd traitor's judgment,
    die; yet, heaven bear witness,
    conscience, sink me
    axe falls, faithful!
    law bear malice death:
    'T done, premises, justice.
    sought Christians.
    will, heartily forgive 'em;
    'em glory mischief
    build evils graves great men,
    guiltless blood cry 'em.
    life world ne'er hope
    sue, King mercies
    dare make faults. lov'd me
    dare bold weep Buckingham,
    noble friends fellows, leave  
    bitter him, dying,
    good angels end;
    long divorce steel falls me
    Make prayers sweet sacrifice,
    lift soul heaven. Lead on, God's name.
  LOVELL. beseech Grace, charity,
    malice heart
    hid me, forgive frankly.
  BUCKINGHAM. Sir Thomas Lovell, free forgive you
    forgiven. forgive all.
    numberless offences
    'Gainst peace with. black envy
    mark grave. Commend Grace;
    speak Buckingham, pray him
    met half heaven. vows prayers
    King's, and, till soul forsake,
    cry blessings him. live
    Longer time years;
    belov'd loving rule be;
    time lead end,  
    Goodness fill monument!
  LOVELL. th' water side conduct Grace;
    give charge Sir Nicholas Vaux,
    undertakes end.
  VAUX. Prepare there;
    Duke coming; barge ready;
    fit furniture suits
    greatness person.
  BUCKINGHAM. Nay, Sir Nicholas,
    alone; state mock me.
    Lord High Constable
    Duke Buckingham; now, poor Edward Bohun.
    richer base accusers
    knew truth meant; seal it;
    blood make 'em day groan fort.
    noble father, Henry Buckingham,
    rais'd head usurping Richard,
    Flying succour servant Banister,
    distress'd, wretch betray'd
    trial fell; God's peace him!  
    Henry Seventh succeeding, pitying
    father's loss, royal prince,
    Restor'd honours, ruins
    Made noble. son,
    Henry Eighth, life, honour, name, all
    made happy, stroke taken
    world. trial,
    noble one; makes me
    happier wretched father;
    fortunes: both
    Fell servants, men lov'd most-
    unnatural faithless service.
    Heaven end all. Yet, hear me,
    dying man receive certain:
    liberal loves counsels,
    loose; make friends
    give hearts to, perceive
    rub fortunes, fall away
    water ye, found again
    sink ye. good people,  
    Pray me! forsake ye; hour
    long weary life me.
    Farewell;
    sad,
    Speak fell. done; God forgive me!
                                          Exeunt BUCKINGHAM train
  GENTLEMAN. O, full pity! Sir, calls,
    fear, curses heads
    authors.
  GENTLEMAN. Duke guiltless,
    'Tis full woe; give inkling
    ensuing evil, fall,
    Greater this.
  GENTLEMAN. Good angels us!
    be? doubt faith, sir?
  GENTLEMAN. secret weighty, 'twill require
    strong faith conceal it.
  GENTLEMAN. it;
    talk much.
  GENTLEMAN. confident.  
    shall, sir. late days hear
    buzzing separation
    King Katharine?
  GENTLEMAN. Yes, held not;
    King heard it, anger
    command Lord Mayor straight
    stop rumour allay tongues
    durst disperse it.
  GENTLEMAN. slander, sir,
    found truth now; grows again
    Fresher e'er was, held certain
    King venture it. Cardinal
    have, malice
    good Queen, possess'd scruple
    undo her. confirm too,
    Cardinal Campeius arriv'd lately;
    think, business.
  GENTLEMAN. 'Tis Cardinal;
    revenge Emperor
    bestowing  
    archbishopric Toledo, purpos'd.
  GENTLEMAN. hit mark; is't
        cruel
    feel smart this? Cardinal
    will, fall.
  GENTLEMAN. 'Tis woeful.
    open argue this;
    private more.                               Exeunt




ACT II. SCENE 2.

London. palace

Enter LORD CHAMBERLAIN reading letter

  CHAMBERLAIN. 'My lord,
    'The horses lordship for, care
    had, chosen, ridden, furnish'd. were
    young handsome, breed north.
    ready set London, man of
    Lord Cardinal's, commission, main power, took
    'em me, reason: master serv'd
    subject, King; stopp'd
    mouths, sir.'

    fear indeed. Well, them.
    all, think.

    Enter LORD CHAMBERLAIN DUKES NORFOLK SUFFOLK

  NORFOLK. met, Lord Chamberlain.  
  CHAMBERLAIN. Good day Graces.
  SUFFOLK. King employ'd?
  CHAMBERLAIN. left private,
    Full sad thoughts troubles.
  NORFOLK. cause?
  CHAMBERLAIN. marriage brother's wife
    crept conscience.
  SUFFOLK. No, conscience
    crept lady.
  NORFOLK. 'Tis so;
    Cardinal's doing; King-Cardinal,
    blind priest, eldest son fortune,
    Turns list. King day.
  SUFFOLK. Pray God do! else.
  NORFOLK. holily works business!
    zeal! For, crack'd league
    Emperor, Queen's great nephew,
    dives King's soul scatters
    Dangers, doubts, wringing conscience,
    Fears, despairs-and marriage;  
    restore King,
    counsels divorce, loss her
    jewel hung twenty years
    neck, lost lustre;
    loves excellence
    angels love good men with; her
    That, greatest stroke fortune falls,
    bless King-and pious?
  CHAMBERLAIN. Heaven counsel! 'Tis true
    news everywhere; tongue speaks 'em,
    true heart weeps 't. dare
    affairs main end-
    French King's sister. Heaven day open
    King's eyes, long slept upon
    bold bad man.
  SUFFOLK. free slavery.
  NORFOLK. pray, heartily, deliverance;
    imperious man work an
    princes pages. men's honours
    Lie lump him, fashion'd  
    pitch please.
  SUFFOLK. me, lords,
    love not, fear him-there's creed;
    made him, stand,
    King please; curses blessings
    Touch alike; th' breath in.
    knew him, him; leave him
    made proud-the Pope.
  NORFOLK. in;
    business put King
    sad thoughts work him.
    lord, bear company?
  CHAMBERLAIN. Excuse me,
    King otherwhere; besides,
    find unfit time disturb him.
    Health lordships!
  NORFOLK. Thanks, good Lord Chamberlain.
                            Exit LORD CHAMBERLAIN; KING draws
                               curtain sits reading pensively
  SUFFOLK. sad looks; sure, afflicted.  
  KING. there, ha?
  NORFOLK. Pray God angry.
  KING HENRY. there, say? dare thrust yourselves
    private meditations?
    I, ha?
  NORFOLK. gracious king pardons offences
    Malice ne'er meant. breach duty way
    business estate, come
    royal pleasure.
  KING. Ye bold.
    to; make ye times business.
    hour temporal affairs, ha?

      Enter WOLSEY CAMPEIUS commission

    there? good Lord Cardinal? O Wolsey,
    quiet wounded conscience,
    Thou art cure fit King.  [To CAMPEIUS]  You're
      welcome,
    learned reverend sir, kingdom.  
    it.  [To WOLSEY]  good lord, great care
    found talker.
  WOLSEY. Sir, cannot.
    Grace give hour
    private conference.
  KING.  [To NORFOLK SUFFOLK]  busy; go.
  NORFOLK.  [Aside SUFFOLK]  priest pride him!
  SUFFOLK.  [Aside NORFOLK]  speak of!
    sick place.
    continue.
  NORFOLK.  [Aside SUFFOLK]  do,
    venture have-at-him.
  SUFFOLK.  [Aside NORFOLK]  another.
                                           Exeunt NORFOLK SUFFOLK
  WOLSEY. Grace precedent wisdom
    princes, committing freely
    scruple voice Christendom.
    angry now? envy reach you?
    Spaniard, tied blood favour her,
    confess, goodness,  
    trial noble. clerks,
    learned ones, Christian kingdoms
    free voices. Rome nurse judgment,
    Invited noble self, hath sent
    general tongue us, good man,
    learned priest, Cardinal Campeius,
    present Highness.
  KING. mine arms bid welcome,
    holy conclave loves.
    man wish'd for.
  CAMPEIUS. Grace deserve strangers' loves,
    noble. Highness' hand
    tender commission; virtue-
    court Rome commanding-you, Lord
    Cardinal York, join'd servant
    unpartial judging business.
  KING. equal men. Queen acquainted
    Forthwith come. Gardiner?
  WOLSEY. Majesty lov'd her
    dear heart deny  
    woman place law-
    Scholars allow'd freely argue her.
  KING. Ay, have; favour
    best. God forbid else. Cardinal,
    Prithee call Gardiner me, secretary;
    find fit fellow.                              Exit WOLSEY

          Re-enter WOLSEY GARDINER

  WOLSEY.  [Aside GARDINER]  Give hand: much
      joy favour you;
    King's now.
  GARDINER.  [Aside WOLSEY]  commanded
    Grace, hand rais'd me.
  KING. hither, Gardiner.                   [Walks whispers]
  CAMPEIUS. Lord York, Doctor Pace
    man's place him?
  WOLSEY. Yes, was.
  CAMPEIUS. held learned man?
  WOLSEY. Yes, surely.  
  CAMPEIUS. me, ill opinion spread then,
    yourself, Lord Cardinal.
  WOLSEY. How! me?
  CAMPEIUS. stick envied him
    And, fearing rise, virtuous,
    foreign man still; griev'd him
    ran mad died.
  WOLSEY. Heav'n's peace him!
    Christian care enough. living murmurers
    places rebuke. fool,
    virtuous: good fellow,
    command him, appointment.
    else. Learn this, brother,
    live grip'd meaner persons.
  KING. Deliver modesty th' Queen.
                                                        Exit GARDINER
    convenient place of
    receipt learning Blackfriars;
    ye meet weighty business-
    Wolsey, furnish'd. O, lord,  
    grieve man leave
    sweet bedfellow? But, conscience, conscience!
    O, 'tis tender place! leave her.              Exeunt




ACT II. SCENE 3.

London. palace

Enter ANNE BULLEN LADY

  ANNE. neither. pang pinches:
    Highness liv'd long her, she
    good lady tongue ever
    Pronounce dishonour her-by life,
    knew harm-doing-O, now, after
    courses sun enthroned,
    growing majesty pomp, which
    leave thousand-fold bitter than
    'Tis sweet t' acquire-after process,
    give avaunt, pity
    move monster.
  LADY. Hearts hard temper
    Melt lament her.
  ANNE. O, God's will! better
    ne'er pomp; though't temporal,
    Yet, quarrel, fortune, divorce  
    bearer, 'tis sufferance panging
    soul body's severing.
  LADY. Alas, poor lady!
    stranger again.
  ANNE. more
    pity drop her. Verily,
    swear 'tis lowly born
    range humble livers content
    perk'd glist'ring grief
    wear golden sorrow.
  LADY. content
    having.
  ANNE. troth maidenhead,
    queen.
  LADY. Beshrew me, would,
    venture maidenhead 't; you,
    spice hypocrisy.
    fair parts woman you
    woman's heart, yet
    Affected eminence, wealth, sovereignty;  
    Which, sooth, blessings; gifts,
    Saving mincing, capacity
    soft cheveril conscience receive
    stretch it.
  ANNE. Nay, good troth.
  LADY. Yes, troth troth. queen!
  ANNE. No, riches heaven.
  LADY. 'Tis strange: threepence bow'd hire me,
    am, queen it. But, pray you,
    duchess? limbs
    bear load title?
  ANNE. No, truth.
  LADY. weakly made. Pluck little;
    young count way
    blushing to. back
    vouchsafe burden, 'tis weak
    boy.
  ANNE. talk!
    swear queen
    world.  
  LADY. faith, England
    venture emballing. myself
    Carnarvonshire, long'd
    th' crown that. Lo, here?

         Enter LORD CHAMBERLAIN

  CHAMBERLAIN. Good morrow, ladies. were't worth know
    secret conference?
  ANNE. good lord,
    demand; values asking.
    mistress' sorrows pitying.
  CHAMBERLAIN. gentle business becoming
    action good women; hope
    well.
  ANNE. Now, pray God, amen!
  CHAMBERLAIN. bear gentle mind, heav'nly blessings
    Follow creatures. may, fair lady,
    Perceive speak sincerely high notes
    Ta'en virtues, King's Majesty  
    Commends good opinion you, and
    purpose honour flowing
    Marchioness Pembroke; tide
    thousand pound year, annual support,
    grace adds.
  ANNE. know
    kind obedience tender;
    nothing, prayers
    words duly hallowed, wishes
    worth empty vanities; prayers wishes
    return. Beseech lordship,
    Vouchsafe speak obedience,
    blushing handmaid, Highness;
    health royalty pray for.
  CHAMBERLAIN. Lady,
    fail t' approve fair conceit
    King hath you.  [Aside]  perus'd well:
    Beauty honour mingled
    caught King; yet
    lady proceed gem  
    lighten isle?-I'll King
    spoke you.
  ANNE. honour'd lord!                       Exit LORD CHAMBERLAIN
  LADY. Why, is: see, see!
    begging sixteen years court-
    courtier beggarly-nor could
    pat betwixt early late
    suit pounds; you, O fate!
    fresh-fish here-fie, fie, fie upon
    compell'd fortune!-have mouth fill'd up
    open it.
  ANNE. strange me.
  LADY. tastes it? bitter? Forty pence, no.
    lady once-'tis story-
    queen, not,
    mud Egypt. heard it?
  ANNE. Come, pleasant.
  LADY. theme could
    O'ermount lark. Marchioness Pembroke!
    thousand pounds year pure respect!  
    obligation! life,
    promises moe thousands: honour's train
    longer foreskirt. time
    back bear duchess. Say,
    stronger were?
  ANNE. Good lady,
    Make mirth fancy,
    leave on't. being,
    salute blood jot; faints me
    follows.
    Queen comfortless, forgetful
    long absence. Pray, deliver
    y' heard her.
  LADY. me?                              Exeunt




ACT II. SCENE 4.

London. hall Blackfriars

Trumpets, sennet, cornets. Enter VERGERS, short silver wands;
next them, SCRIBES, habit doctors; them,
the ARCHBISHOP CANTERBURY alone; him, BISHOPS LINCOLN, ELY,
ROCHESTER, SAINT ASAPH; them, small distance,
follows GENTLEMAN bearing purse, great seal,
and Cardinal's hat; PRIESTS, bearing silver cross;
then GENTLEMAN USHER bareheaded, accompanied SERGEANT-AT-ARMS
bearing silver mace; GENTLEMEN bearing great silver pillars;
after them, side side, CARDINALS, WOLSEY CAMPEIUS;
two NOBLEMEN sword mace. enter KING QUEEN
and trains. KING takes place cloth state;
the CARDINALS sit judges. QUEEN takes place
some distance KING. BISHOPS place side
of court, manner consistory; SCRIBES.
The LORDS sit BISHOPS. rest attendants stand
in convenient order stage

  WOLSEY. Whilst commission Rome read,
    silence commanded.
  KING. need?
    hath publicly read,
    sides th' authority allow'd;
    spare time.
  WOLSEY. Be't so; proceed.
  SCRIBE. 'Henry King England, court.'
  CRIER. Henry King England, &c.
  KING. Here.
  SCRIBE. 'Katharine Queen England, court.'
  CRIER. Katharine Queen England, &c.

     QUEEN makes answer, rises chair,
     court, KING, kneels  
     feet; speaks

  QUEEN KATHARINE. Sir, desire justice,
    bestow pity me; for
    poor woman stranger,
    Born dominions, here
    judge indifferent, assurance
    equal friendship proceeding. Alas, sir,
    offended you? cause
    Hath behaviour displeasure
    proceed put of
    good grace me? Heaven witness,
    true humble wife,
    times conformable,
    fear kindle dislike,
    Yea, subject countenance-glad sorry
    inclin'd. hour
    contradicted desire
    made mine too? friends
    strove love, knew  
    mine enemy? friend mine
    deriv'd anger did
    Continue liking? Nay, gave notice
    discharg'd? Sir, call mind
    wife obedience
    Upward twenty years, blest
    children you. If, course
    process time, report,
    prove mine honour, aught,
    bond wedlock love duty,
    sacred person, God's name,
    Turn foul'st contempt
    Shut door me, give up
    sharp'st kind justice. you, sir,
    King, father, reputed for
    prince prudent, excellent
    unmatch'd wit judgment; Ferdinand,
    father, King Spain, reckon'd one
    wisest prince reign'd many
    year before. question'd  
    gather'd wise council them
    realm, debate business,
    deem'd marriage lawful. Wherefore humbly
    Beseech you, sir, spare till may
    friends Spain advis'd, counsel
    implore. not, i' th' God,
    pleasure fulfill'd!
  WOLSEY. here, lady,
    choice, reverend fathers-men
    singular integrity learning,
    Yea, elect o' th' land, assembled
    plead cause. bootless
    longer desire court, well
    quiet rectify
    unsettled King.
  CAMPEIUS. Grace
    Hath spoken justly; therefore, madam,
    fit royal session proceed
    that, delay, arguments
    produc'd heard.  
  QUEEN KATHARINE. Lord Cardinal,
    speak.
  WOLSEY. pleasure, madam?
  QUEEN KATHARINE. Sir,
    weep; but, thinking that
    queen, long dream'd so, certain
    daughter king, drops tears
    turn sparks fire.
  WOLSEY. patient yet.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. Will, humble; nay, before
    God punish me. believe,
    Induc'd potent circumstances, that
    mine enemy, make challenge
    judge; you
    blown coal betwixt lord me-
    God's dew quench! again,
    utterly abhor, yea, soul
    Refuse judge, more
    hold malicious foe not
    friend truth.  
  WOLSEY. profess
    speak yourself, yet
    stood charity display'd th' effects
    disposition gentle wisdom
    O'ertopping woman's pow'r. Madam, wrong:
    spleen you, injustice
    any; proceeded,
    shall, warranted
    commission Consistory,
    Yea, Consistory Rome. charge me
    blown coal: deny it.
    King present; him
    gainsay deed, wound,
    worthily, falsehood! Yea, much
    truth. know
    free report, knows
    wrong. him
    lies cure me, cure to
    Remove thoughts you; before
    Highness speak in, beseech  
    You, gracious madam, unthink speaking
    more.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. lord, lord,
    simple woman, weak
    T' oppose cunning. Y'are meek humble-mouth'd;
    sign place calling, full seeming,
    meekness humility; heart
    cramm'd arrogancy, spleen, pride.
    have, fortune Highness' favours,
    slightly o'er low steps, mounted
    pow'rs retainers, words,
    Domestics you, serve as't please
    pronounce office. you
    tender person's honour than
    high profession spiritual; again
    refuse judge here,
    all, appeal Pope,
    bring 'fore Holiness
    judg'd him.
                     [She curtsies KING, offers depart]  
  CAMPEIUS. Queen obstinate,
    Stubborn justice, apt accuse it, and
    Disdainful by't; 'tis well.
    away.
  KING. Call again.
  CRIER. Katharine Queen England, court.
  GENTLEMAN USHER. Madam, call'd back.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. note it? Pray way;
    call'd, return. Lord help!
    vex past patience. Pray pass on.
    tarry; no, more
    business appearance make
    courts.           Exeunt QUEEN attendants
  KING. thy ways, Kate.
    man i' th' world report has
    wife, nought trusted
    speaking false that. Thou art, alone-
    thy rare qualities, sweet gentleness,
    Thy meekness saint-like, wife-like government,
    Obeying commanding, thy parts  
    Sovereign pious else, speak thee out-
    queen earthly queens. noble born;
    true nobility has
    Carried me.
  WOLSEY. gracious sir,
    humblest manner require Highness
    declare hearing
    ears-for robb'd bound,
    unloos'd, there
    fully satisfied-whether I
    broach business Highness, or
    Laid scruple might
    Induce question on't, ever
    you, God such
    royal lady, spake word might
    prejudice present state,
    touch good person?
  KING. Lord Cardinal,
    excuse you; yea, mine honour,
    free from't. taught  
    enemies not
    so, but, village curs,
    Bark fellows do. these
    Queen put anger. Y'are excus'd.
    justified? ever
    wish'd sleeping business; desir'd
    stirr'd; oft hind'red, oft,
    passages made it. honour,
    speak good Lord Cardinal point,
    clear him. Now, mov'd to't,
    bold time attention.
    mark th' inducement. came-give heed to't:
    conscience receiv'd tenderness,
    Scruple, prick, speeches utter'd
    th' Bishop Bayonne, French ambassador,
    debating
    marriage 'twixt Duke Orleans and
    daughter Mary. I' th' progress business,
    Ere determinate resolution, he-
    Bishop-did require respite  
    King lord advertise
    daughter legitimate,
    Respecting marriage dowager,
    brother's wife. respite shook
    bosom conscience, enter'd me,
    Yea, splitting power, made tremble
    region breast, forc'd way
    maz'd considerings throng
    press'd caution. First, methought
    stood smile heaven, had
    Commanded nature lady's womb,
    conceiv'd male child me, should
    offices life to't than
    grave dead; male issue
    died made, shortly after
    world air'd them. thought
    judgment me, kingdom,
    worthy heir o' th' world, not
    gladded in't me. that
    weigh'd danger realms stood  
    issue's fail, gave me
    groaning throe. hulling in
    wild sea conscience, steer
    remedy, are
    present together; say
    meant rectify conscience, which
    feel full sick, well,
    reverend fathers land
    doctors learn'd. First, began private
    you, Lord Lincoln; remember
    oppression reek,
    mov'd you.
  LINCOLN. well, liege.
  KING. spoke long; pleas'd say
    satisfied me.
  LINCOLN. Highness,
    question stagger me-
    Bearing state mighty moment in't
    consequence dread-that committed
    daring'st counsel doubt,  
    entreat Highness course
    running here.
  KING. mov'd you,
    Lord Canterbury, leave
    make present summons. Unsolicited
    left reverend person court,
    consent proceeded
    hands seals; therefore, on,
    dislike i' th' world person
    good Queen, sharp thorny points
    alleged reasons, drives forward.
    Prove marriage lawful, life
    kingly dignity, contented
    wear moral state her,
    Katharine queen, primest creature
    paragon'd o' th' world.
  CAMPEIUS. Highness,
    Queen absent, 'tis needful fitness
    adjourn court till day;
    earnest motion  
    Made Queen call back appeal
    intends Holiness.
  KING.  [Aside]  perceive
    cardinals trifle me. abhor
    dilatory sloth tricks Rome.
    learn'd well-beloved servant, Cranmer,
    Prithee return. thy approach know
    comfort along. -Break court;
    say, set on.                   Exuent manner entered
