ACT III. SCENE 1.

London. QUEEN'S apartments

Enter QUEEN women, work

  QUEEN KATHARINE. thy lute, wench. soul grows
      sad troubles;
    Sing disperse 'em, thou canst. Leave working.

                    SONG

        Orpheus lute made trees,
        mountain tops freeze,
          Bow sing;
        music plants flowers
        sprung, sun showers
          made lasting spring.

        thing heard play,
        billows sea,
          Hung heads lay by.  
        sweet music art,
        Killing care grief heart
          Fall asleep hearing die.

              Enter GENTLEMAN

  QUEEN KATHARINE. now?
  GENTLEMAN. An't Grace, great Cardinals
    Wait presence.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. speak me?
  GENTLEMAN. will'd so, madam.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. Pray Graces
    near. [Exit GENTLEMAN] business
    me, poor weak woman, fall'n favour?
    coming. on't,
    good men, affairs righteous;
    hoods make monks.

         Enter CARDINALS, WOLSEY CAMPEIUS
  
  WOLSEY. Peace Highness!
  QUEEN KATHARINE. Graces find part housewife;
    all, worst happen.
    pleasures me, reverend lords?
  WOLSEY. you, noble madam, withdraw
    private chamber, give you
    full coming.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. Speak here;
    yet, o' conscience,
    Deserves corner. women
    speak free soul do!
    lords, care not-so happy
    number-if actions
    ev'ry tongue, ev'ry eye 'em,
    Envy base opinion set 'em,
    life even. business
    Seek out, wife in,
    boldly; truth loves open dealing.
  WOLSEY. Tanta est erga te mentis integritas, regina serenis-sima-
  QUEEN KATHARINE. O, good lord, Latin!  
    truant coming,
    language liv'd in;
    strange tongue makes strange, suspicious;
    Pray speak English. you,
    speak truth, poor mistress' sake:
    me, wrong. Lord Cardinal,
    willing'st sin committed
    absolv'd English.
  WOLSEY. Noble lady,
    integrity breed,
    service Majesty you,
    deep suspicion, faith meant
    accusation
    taint honour good tongue blesses,
    betray sorrow-
    much, good lady; know
    stand minded weighty difference
    King you, deliver,
    free honest men, opinions
    comforts cause.  
  CAMPEIUS. honour'd madam,
    Lord York, noble nature,
    Zeal obedience bore Grace,
    Forgetting, good man, late censure
    truth him-which far-
    Offers, do, sign peace,
    service counsel.
  QUEEN KATHARINE.  [Aside]  betray me.-
    lords, good wins;
    Ye speak honest men-pray God ye prove so!
    make ye suddenly answer,
    point weight, mine honour,
    life, fear, weak wit,
    men gravity learning,
    truth not. set work
    maids, full little, God knows, looking
    men business.
    sake been-for feel
    fit greatness-good Graces,
    time counsel cause.  
    Alas, woman, friendless, hopeless!
  WOLSEY. Madam, wrong King's love fears;
    hopes friends infinite.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. England
    profit; think, lords,
    Englishman dare give counsel?
    friend, 'gainst Highness' pleasure-
    grown desperate honest-
    live subject? Nay, forsooth, friends,
    weigh afflictions,
    trust grow to, live here;
    are, comforts, hence,
    mine country, lords.
  CAMPEIUS. Grace
    leave griefs, counsel.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. How, sir?
  CAMPEIUS. Put main King's protection;
    loving gracious. 'Twill much
    honour cause;
    trial law o'ertake ye  
    part disgrac'd.
  WOLSEY. tells rightly.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. Ye ye both-my ruin.
    Christian counsel? ye!
    Heaven yet: sits Judge
    king corrupt.
  CAMPEIUS. rage mistakes us.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. shame ye; holy men thought ye,
    soul, reverend cardinal virtues;
    cardinal sins hollow hearts fear ye.
    Mend 'em, shame, lords. comfort?
    cordial ye bring wretched lady-
    woman lost ye, laugh'd at, scorn'd?
    ye half miseries:
    charity; warned ye.
    heed, heaven's sake heed, once
    burden sorrows fall ye.
  WOLSEY. Madam, mere distraction;
    turn good offer envy.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. Ye turn nothing. Woe ye,  
    false professors! me-
    justice, pity,
    ye thing churchmen's habits-
    Put sick hands hates me?
    Alas! banish'd bed already,
    love long ago! old, lords,
    fellowship hold him
    obedience. happen
    wretchedness? studies
    Make curse this.
  CAMPEIUS. fears worse.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. liv'd long-let speak myself,
    virtue finds friends-a wife, true one?
    woman, dare vain-glory,
    branded suspicion?
    full affections
    met King, lov'd heav'n, obey'd him,
    Been, fondness, superstitious him,
    forgot prayers content him,
    rewarded? 'Tis well, lords.  
    Bring constant woman husband,
    ne'er dream'd joy pleasure,
    woman, most,
    add honour-a great patience.
  WOLSEY. Madam, wander good aim at.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. lord, dare make guilty,
    give willingly noble title
    master wed to: death
    e'er divorce dignities.
  WOLSEY. Pray hear me.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. trod English earth,
    felt flatteries grow it!
    Ye angels' faces, heaven hearts.
    now, wretched lady?
    unhappy woman living.
    [To WOMEN]  Alas, poor wenches, now
      fortunes?
    Shipwreck'd kingdom, pity,
    friends, hope; kindred weep me;
    grave allow'd me. My,  
    mistress field, flourish'd,
    hang head perish.
  WOLSEY. Grace
    brought ends honest,
    feel comfort. we, good lady,
    cause, wrong you? Alas, places,
    profession it;
    cure sorrows, sow 'em.
    goodness' sake, do;
    hurt yourself, ay, utterly
    Grow King's acquaintance, carriage.
    hearts princes kiss obedience,
    love it; stubborn spirits
    swell grow terrible storms.
    gentle, noble temper,
    soul calm. Pray us
    profess, peace-makers, friends, servants.
  CAMPEIUS. Madam, find so. wrong virtues
    weak women's fears. noble spirit,
    put you, casts  
    doubts false coin it. King loves you;
    Beware lose not. us, please
    trust business, ready
    utmost studies service.
  QUEEN KATHARINE. ye lords; pray
      forgive me
    us'd unmannerly;
    woman, lacking wit
    make seemly answer persons.
    Pray service Majesty;
    heart yet, prayers
    life. Come, reverend fathers,
    Bestow counsels me; begs
    thought, set footing here,
    bought dignities dear.              Exeunt



ACT III.SCENE 2.

London. palace

Enter DUKE NORFOLK, DUKE SUFFOLK, EARL SURREY,
and LORD CHAMBERLAIN

  NORFOLK. unite complaints
    force constancy, Cardinal
    stand them: omit
    offer time, promise
    sustain moe disgraces
    bear already.
  SURREY. joyful
    meet occasion give me
    Remembrance father-in-law, Duke,
    reveng'd him.
  SUFFOLK. peers
    uncontemn'd him, least
    Strangely neglected? regard
    stamp nobleness person
    himself?  
  CHAMBERLAIN. lords, speak pleasures.
    deserves know;
    him-though time
    us-I fear. cannot
    Bar access th' King, attempt
    him; hath witchcraft
    King in's tongue.
  NORFOLK. O, fear not!
    spell out; King hath found
    Matter mars
    honey language. No, settled,
    off, displeasure.
  SURREY. Sir,
    glad hear news this
    hour.
  NORFOLK. it, true:
    divorce contrary proceedings
    unfolded; appears
    mine enemy.
  SURREY.  
    practices light?
  SUFFOLK. Strangely.
  SURREY. O, how, how?
  SUFFOLK. Cardinal's letters Pope miscarried,
    th' eye o' th' King; read
    Cardinal entreat Holiness
    stay judgment o' th' divorce; if
    place, 'I do' quoth 'perceive
    king tangled affection to
    creature Queen's, Lady Anne Bullen.'
  SURREY. King this?
  SUFFOLK. it.
  SURREY. work?
  CHAMBERLAIN. King perceives coasts
    hedges way. point
    tricks founder, brings physic
    patient's death: King already
    Hath married fair lady.
  SURREY. had!
  SUFFOLK. happy wish, lord!  
    For, profess, it.
  SURREY. Now, joy
    Trace conjunction!
  SUFFOLK. amen to't!
  NORFOLK. men's!
  SUFFOLK. order coronation;
    Marry, young, left
    ears unrecounted. But, lords,
    gallant creature, complete
    mind feature. persuade her
    fall blessing land, shall
    memoriz'd.
  SURREY. King
    Digest letter Cardinal's?
    Lord forbid!
  NORFOLK. Marry, amen!
  SUFFOLK. No, no;
    moe wasps buzz nose
    make sting sooner. Cardinal Campeius
    stol'n Rome; hath ta'en leave;  
    left o' th' King unhandled, and
    posted, agent Cardinal,
    plot. assure you
    King cried 'Ha!' this.
  CHAMBERLAIN. Now, God incense him,
    cry 'Ha!' louder!
  NORFOLK. But, lord,
    returns Cranmer?
  SUFFOLK. return'd opinions; which
    satisfied King divorce,
    famous colleges
    Christendom. Shortly, believe,
    marriage publish'd, and
    coronation. Katharine more
    call'd queen, princess dowager
    widow Prince Arthur.
  NORFOLK. Cranmer's
    worthy fellow, hath ta'en pain
    King's business.
  SUFFOLK. has;  
    archbishop.
  NORFOLK. hear.
  SUFFOLK. 'Tis so.

        Enter WOLSEY CROMWELL

    Cardinal!
  NORFOLK. Observe, observe, moody.
  WOLSEY. packet, Cromwell,
    Gave't King?
  CROMWELL. hand, in's bedchamber.
  WOLSEY. Look'd o' th' inside paper?
  CROMWELL. Presently
    unseal them; view'd,
    mind; heed
    countenance. bade
    Attend morning.
  WOLSEY. ready
    abroad?
  CROMWELL. is.  
  WOLSEY. Leave awhile.                              Exit CROMWELL
    [Aside]  Duchess Alencon,
    French King's sister; marry her.
    Anne Bullen! No, Anne Bullens him;
    in't fair visage. Bullen!
    No, Bullens. Speedily wish
    hear Rome. Marchioness Pembroke!
  NORFOLK. discontented.
  SUFFOLK. hears King
    whet anger him.
  SURREY. Sharp enough,
    Lord, thy justice!
  WOLSEY.  [Aside]  late Queen's gentlewoman, knight's
      daughter,
    mistress' mistress! Queen's queen!
    candle burns clear. 'Tis snuff it;
    goes. virtuous
    deserving? for
    spleeny Lutheran; wholesome to
    lie i' th' bosom  
    hard-rul'd King. Again, sprung up
    heretic, arch one, Cranmer; one
    Hath crawl'd favour King,
    oracle.
  NORFOLK. vex'd something.

        Enter KING, reading schedule, LOVELL

  SURREY. 'twere fret string,
    master-cord on's heart!
  SUFFOLK. King, King!
  KING. piles wealth hath accumulated
    portion! expense th' hour
    flow him! How, i' th' thrift,
    rake together?-Now, lords,
    Cardinal?
  NORFOLK. lord, have
    Stood observing him. strange commotion
    brain: bites lip starts,
    Stops sudden, ground,  
    lays finger temple; straight
    Springs fast gait; stops again,
    Strikes breast hard; anon casts
    eye moon. strange postures
    set himself.
  KING. be
    mutiny in's mind. morning
    Papers state peruse,
    requir'd; wot found
    There-on conscience, put unwittingly?
    Forsooth, inventory, importing
    parcels plate, treasure,
    Rich stuffs, ornaments household; which
    find proud rate outspeaks
    Possession subject.
  NORFOLK. heaven's will;
    spirit put paper packet
    bless eye withal.
  KING. think
    contemplation earth  
    fix'd spiritual object, still
    dwell musings; afraid
    thinkings moon, worth
    considering.
                        [The KING takes seat whispers LOVELL,
                                           CARDINAL]
  WOLSEY. Heaven forgive me!
    God bless Highness!
  KING. Good, lord,
    full heavenly stuff, bear inventory
    graces mind; which
    running o'er. scarce time
    steal spiritual leisure span
    earthly audit; sure, that
    deem ill husband, glad
    companion.
  WOLSEY. Sir,
    holy offices time; time
    part business which
    bear i' th' state; nature require  
    times preservation, perforce
    I, frail son, brethren mortal,
    give tendance to.
  KING. well.
  WOLSEY. Highness yoke together,
    lend cause, well
    saying!
  KING. 'Tis again;
    'tis kind good deed well;
    words deeds. father lov'd you:
    did; deed crown
    word you. office
    heart; alone
    Employ'd high profits home,
    par'd present havings bestow
    bounties you.
  WOLSEY.  [Aside]  mean?
  SURREY.  [Aside]  Lord increase business!
  KING. made you
    prime man state? pray  
    pronounce found true;
    And, confess it, withal
    bound no. you?
  WOLSEY. sovereign, confess royal graces,
    Show'r'd daily, could
    studied purposes requite; went
    man's endeavours. endeavours,
    short desires,
    fil'd abilities; mine ends
    mine evermore pointed
    th' good sacred person and
    profit state. great graces
    Heap'd me, poor undeserver, I
    render allegiant thanks;
    pray'rs heaven you; loyalty,
    growing,
    Till death, winter, kill it.
  KING. Fairly answer'd!
    loyal obedient subject is
    illustrated; honour  
    pay act it, as, i' th' contrary,
    foulness punishment. presume
    That, hand open'd bounty you,
    heart dropp'd love, pow'r rain'd honour, more
    any, hand heart,
    brain, function power,
    Should, notwithstanding bond duty,
    'twere love's particular, more
    me, friend, any.
  WOLSEY. profess
    Highness' good labour'd
    mine own; am, have, be-
    world crack duty you,
    throw soul; perils did
    Abound thick thought make 'em, and
    forms horrid-yet duty,
    doth rock chiding flood,
    approach wild river break,
    stand unshaken yours.
  KING. 'Tis nobly spoken.  
    notice, lords, loyal breast,
    open 't. Read o'er this;
                                                  [Giving papers]
    after, this; breakfast with
    appetite have.
                Exit KING, frowning CARDINAL; NOBLES
                             throng him, smiling whispering
  WOLSEY. mean?
    sudden anger's this? reap'd it?
    parted frowning me, ruin
    Leap'd eyes; chafed lion
    daring huntsman gall'd him-
    makes nothing. read paper;
    fear, story anger. 'Tis so;
    paper undone me. 'Tis th' account
    world wealth drawn together
    mine ends; gain popedom,
    fee friends Rome. O negligence,
    Fit fool fall by! cross devil
    Made put main secret packet  
    King? cure this?
    device beat brains?
    'twill stir strongly; know
    way, right, spite fortune,
    bring again. this? 'To th' Pope.'
    letter, live, business
    writ to's Holiness. Nay then, farewell!
    touch'd highest point greatness,
    full meridian glory
    haste setting. fall
    bright exhalation evening,
    man more.

        Re-enter WOLSEY DUKES NORFOLK and
        SUFFOLK, EARL SURREY, LORD
        CHAMBERLAIN

  NORFOLK. Hear King's pleasure, Cardinal, commands you
    render great seal presently
    hands, confine  
    Asher House, Lord Winchester's,
    Till hear Highness.
  WOLSEY. Stay:
    commission, lords? Words carry
    Authority weighty.
  SUFFOLK. dares cross 'em,
    Bearing King's mouth expressly?
  WOLSEY. Till find words it-
    malice-know, officious lords,
    dare deny it. feel
    coarse metal ye moulded-envy;
    eagerly ye follow disgraces,
    fed ye; sleek wanton
    Ye thing bring ruin!
    Follow envious courses, men malice;
    Christian warrant 'em, doubt
    time find fit rewards. seal
    violence, King-
    Mine master-with hand gave me;
    Bade enjoy it, place honours,  
    life; and, confirm goodness,
    Tied letters-patents. Now, who'll it?
  SURREY. King, gave it.
  WOLSEY. then.
  SURREY. Thou art proud traitor, priest.
  WOLSEY. Proud lord, thou liest.
    forty hours Surrey durst better
    burnt tongue so.
  SURREY. Thy ambition,
    Thou scarlet sin, robb'd bewailing land
    noble Buckingham, father-in-law.
    heads thy brother cardinals,
    thee thy parts bound together,
    Weigh'd hair his. Plague policy!
    deputy Ireland;
    succour, King, all
    mercy fault thou gav'st him;
    Whilst great goodness, holy pity,
    Absolv'd axe.
  WOLSEY. This,  
    talking lord lay credit,
    answer false. Duke law
    Found deserts; innocent was
    private malice end,
    noble jury foul witness.
    lov'd words, lord, you
    honesty honour,
    loyalty truth
    King, royal master,
    Dare mate sounder man Surrey be
    love follies.
  SURREY. soul,
    long coat, priest, protects you; thou shouldst feel
    sword i' life-blood thee else. lords
    ye endure hear arrogance?
    fellow? live tamely,
    jaded piece scarlet,
    Farewell nobility! Grace forward
    dare cap larks.
  WOLSEY. goodness  
    poison thy stomach.
  SURREY. Yes, goodness
    gleaning land's wealth one,
    hands, Cardinal, extortion;
    goodness intercepted packets
    writ th' Pope King; goodness,
    provoke me, notorious.
    Lord Norfolk, noble,
    respect common good, state
    despis'd nobility, issues,
    Whom, live, scarce gentlemen-
    Produce grand sum sins, articles
    Collected life. startle you
    Worse sacring bell, brown wench
    Lay kissing arms, Lord Cardinal.
  WOLSEY. much, methinks, despise man,
    bound charity it!
  NORFOLK. articles, lord, King's hand;
    But, much, foul ones.
  WOLSEY. fairer  
    spotless mine innocence arise,
    King truth.
  SURREY. save you.
    memory remember
    articles; shall.
    Now, blush cry guilty, Cardinal,
    show honesty.
  WOLSEY. Speak on, sir;
    dare worst objections. blush,
    nobleman manners.
  SURREY. head. you!
    First, King's assent knowledge
    wrought legate; power
    maim'd jurisdiction bishops.
  NORFOLK. Then, writ Rome, else
    foreign princes, 'Ego Rex meus'
    inscrib'd; brought King
    servant.
  SUFFOLK. Then, knowledge
    King Council,  
    Ambassador Emperor, made bold
    carry Flanders great seal.
  SURREY. Item, large commission
    Gregory de Cassado, conclude,
    King's state's allowance,
    league Highness Ferrara.
  SUFFOLK. mere ambition caus'd
    holy hat stamp'd King's coin.
  SURREY. Then, innumerable substance,
    means leave conscience,
    furnish Rome prepare ways
    dignities, mere undoing
    kingdom. are,
    Which, you, odious,
    taint mouth with.
  CHAMBERLAIN. O lord,
    Press falling man far! 'Tis virtue.
    faults lie open laws; them,
    you, correct him. heart weeps him
    great self.  
  SURREY. forgive him.
  SUFFOLK. Lord Cardinal, King's pleasure is-
    things late,
    power legatine kingdom,
    Fall th' compass praemunire-
    writ sued you:
    forfeit goods, lands, tenements,
    Chattels, whatsoever, be
    King's protection. charge.
  NORFOLK. leave meditations
    live better. stubborn answer
    giving back great seal us,
    King it, and, doubt, you.
    fare well, good Lord Cardinal.
                                                Exeunt WOLSEY
  WOLSEY. farewell good bear me.
    Farewell, long farewell, greatness!
    state man: to-day puts forth
    tender leaves hopes; to-morrow blossoms
    bears blushing honours thick him;  
    day frost, killing frost,
    thinks, good easy man, full surely
    greatness a-ripening, nips root,
    falls, do. ventur'd,
    wanton boys swim bladders,
    summers sea glory;
    depth. high-blown pride
    length broke me, left me,
    Weary service, mercy
    rude stream, hide me.
    Vain pomp glory world, hate ye;
    feel heart open'd. O, wretched
    poor man hangs princes' favours!
    betwixt smile aspire to,
    sweet aspect princes, ruin
    pangs fears wars women have;
    falls, falls Lucifer,
    hope again.

         Enter CROMWELL, standing amazed  

    Why, now, Cromwell!
  CROMWELL. power speak, sir.
  WOLSEY. What, amaz'd
    misfortunes? thy spirit wonder
    great man decline? Nay, weep,
    fall'n indeed.
  CROMWELL. Grace?
  WOLSEY. Why, well;
    happy, good Cromwell.
    now, feel me
    peace earthly dignities,
    quiet conscience. King cur'd me,
    humbly Grace; shoulders,
    ruin'd pillars, pity, taken
    load sink navy-too honour.
    O, 'tis burden, Cromwell, 'tis burden
    heavy man hopes heaven!
  CROMWELL. glad Grace made it.
  WOLSEY. hope have. now, methinks,  
    fortitude soul feel,
    endure miseries greater far
    weak-hearted enemies dare offer.
    news abroad?
  CROMWELL. heaviest worst
    displeasure King.
  WOLSEY. God bless him!
  CROMWELL. Sir Thomas chosen
    Lord Chancellor place.
  WOLSEY. sudden.
    learned man. continue
    Long Highness' favour, justice
    truth's sake conscience; bones
    run sleeps blessings,
    tomb orphans' tears wept him!
    more?
  CROMWELL. Cranmer return'd welcome,
    Install'd Lord Archbishop Canterbury.
  WOLSEY. news indeed.
  CROMWELL. Last, Lady Anne,  
    King hath secrecy long married,
    day view'd open queen,
    chapel; voice now
    coronation.
  WOLSEY. weight pull'd down.
      O Cromwell,
    King me. glories
    woman lost ever.
    sun usher mine honours,
    gild noble troops waited
    smiles. thee me, Cromwell;
    poor fall'n man, unworthy now
    thy lord master. Seek King;
    sun, pray, set! told him
    true thou art. advance thee;
    memory stir him-
    noble nature-not let
    Thy hopeful service perish too. Good Cromwell,
    Neglect not; make now, provide
    thine future safety.  
  CROMWELL. O lord,
    leave you? forgo
    good, noble, true master?
    Bear witness, hearts iron,
    sorrow Cromwell leaves lord.
    King service; prayers
    yours.
  WOLSEY. Cromwell, shed tear
    miseries; thou hast forc'd me,
    thy honest truth, play woman.
    dry eyes; hear me, Cromwell,
    forgotten, be,
    sleep dull cold marble, mention
    heard of, taught thee-
    Wolsey, trod ways glory,
    sounded depths shoals honour,
    Found thee way, wreck, rise in-
    safe one, thy master miss'd it.
    Mark fall ruin'd me.
    Cromwell, charge thee, fling ambition:  
    sin fell angels. man then,
    image Maker, hope win it?
    Love thyself last; cherish hearts hate thee;
    Corruption wins honesty.
    thy hand carry gentle peace
    silence envious tongues. just, fear not;
    ends thou aim'st thy country's,
    Thy God's, truth's; then, thou fall'st, O Cromwell,
    Thou fall'st blessed martyr!
    Serve King, and-prithee lead in.
    inventory have
    penny; 'tis King's. robe,
    integrity heaven, all
    dare call mine own. O Cromwell, Cromwell!
    serv'd God half zeal
    serv'd King, mine age
    left naked mine enemies.
  CROMWELL. Good sir, patience.
  WOLSEY. have. Farewell
    hopes court! hopes heaven dwell.           Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE 1.

A street Westminster

Enter GENTLEMEN, meeting another

  GENTLEMAN. Y'are met again.
  GENTLEMAN. you.
  GENTLEMAN. stand here, and
      behold
    Lady Anne pass coronation?
  GENTLEMAN. 'Tis business. encounter
    Duke Buckingham trial.
  GENTLEMAN. 'Tis true. time offer'd
      sorrow;
    This, general joy.
  GENTLEMAN. 'Tis well. citizens,
    sure, shown full royal minds-
    As, 'em rights, forward-
    celebration day shows,
    Pageants, sights honour.
  GENTLEMAN. greater,  
    Nor, assure you, taken, sir.
  GENTLEMAN. bold contains,
    paper hand?
  GENTLEMAN. Yes; 'tis list
    claim offices day,
    custom coronation.
    Duke Suffolk first, claims
    High Steward; next, Duke Norfolk,
    Earl Marshal. read rest.
  GENTLEMAN. you, sir; known
      customs,
    beholding paper.
    But, beseech you, Katharine,
    Princess Dowager? business?
  GENTLEMAN. too. Archbishop
    Canterbury, accompanied other
    Learned reverend fathers order,
    Held late court Dunstable, miles of
    Ampthill, Princess lay; which
    cited them, appear'd not.  
    And, short, appearance and
    King's late scruple, main assent
    learned men, divorc'd,
    late marriage made effect;
    removed Kimbolton,
    remains sick.
  GENTLEMAN. Alas, good lady!                       [Trumpets]
    trumpets sound. Stand close, Queen coming.
[Hautboys]

              ORDER CORONATION.

    1. lively flourish trumpets.
    2. JUDGES.
    3. LORD CHANCELLOR, purse mace him.
    4. CHORISTERS singing.                                    [Music]
    5. MAYOR LONDON, bearing mace. GARTER, in
       coat arms, head wore gilt copper
       crown.
    6. MARQUIS DORSET, bearing sceptre gold, head  
       demi-coronal gold. him, EARL SURREY,
       bearing rod silver dove, crowned an
       earl's coronet. Collars Esses.
    7. DUKE SUFFOLK, robe estate, coronet on
       head, bearing long white wand, High Steward.
       him, DUKE NORFOLK, rod of
       marshalship, coronet head. Collars Esses.
    8. canopy borne CINQUE-PORTS; it
       QUEEN robe; hair richly adorned with
       pearl, crowned. side her, BISHOPS LONDON
       WINCHESTER.
    9. DUCHESS NORFOLK, coronal gold
       wrought flowers, bearing QUEEN'S train.
   10. LADIES COUNTESSES, plain circlets gold
       flowers.

             Exeunt, passing stage order state,
                                great flourish trumpets

  GENTLEMAN. royal train, me. know.  
    bears sceptre?
  GENTLEMAN. Marquis Dorset;
    Earl Surrey, rod.
  GENTLEMAN. bold brave gentleman. be
    Duke Suffolk?
  GENTLEMAN. 'Tis same-High Steward.
  GENTLEMAN. Lord Norfolk?
  GENTLEMAN. Yes.
  GENTLEMAN.  [Looking QUEEN]  Heaven
      bless thee!
    Thou hast sweetest face look'd on.
    Sir, soul, angel;
    king Indies arms,
    richer, strains lady;
    blame conscience.
  GENTLEMAN. bear
    cloth honour barons
    Cinque-ports.
  GENTLEMAN. men happy; all
      her.  
    carries train
    noble lady, Duchess Norfolk.
  GENTLEMAN. is; rest countesses.
  GENTLEMAN. coronets so. stars indeed,
    falling ones.
  GENTLEMAN. that.
                   Exit Procession, great flourish trumpets

               Enter GENTLEMAN

    God save you, sir! broiling?
  GENTLEMAN. crowds i' th' Abbey, finger
    wedg'd more; stifled
    mere rankness joy.
  GENTLEMAN. saw
    ceremony?
  GENTLEMAN. did.
  GENTLEMAN. it?
  GENTLEMAN. worth seeing.
  GENTLEMAN. Good sir, speak us.  
  GENTLEMAN. able. rich stream
    lords ladies, brought Queen
    prepar'd place choir, fell of
    distance her, Grace sat down
    rest awhile, half hour so,
    rich chair state, opposing freely
    beauty person people.
    me, sir, goodliest woman
    lay man; people
    full view of, noise arose
    shrouds make sea stiff tempest,
    loud, tunes; hats, cloaks-
    Doublets, think-flew up, faces
    loose, day lost. joy
    before. Great-bellied women,
    half week go, rams
    time war, shake press,
    make 'em reel 'em. man living
    'This wife' there, woven
    strangely piece.  
  GENTLEMAN. follow'd?
  GENTLEMAN. length Grace rose, with
      modest paces
    altar, kneel'd, saintlike
    Cast fair eyes heaven, pray'd devoutly.
    rose again, bow'd people;
    Archbishop Canterbury
    royal makings queen:
    holy oil, Edward Confessor's crown,
    rod, bird peace, emblems
    Laid nobly her; perform'd, choir,
    choicest music kingdom,
    sung 'Te Deum.' parted,
    full state pac'd back again
    York Place, feast held.
  GENTLEMAN. Sir,
    call York Place: past:
    Cardinal fell title's lost.
    'Tis King's, called Whitehall.
  GENTLEMAN. it;  
    'tis alter'd name
    fresh me.
  GENTLEMAN. reverend bishops
    side Queen?
  GENTLEMAN. Stokesly Gardiner: Winchester,
    Newly preferr'd King's secretary;
    other, London.
  GENTLEMAN. Winchester
    held great good lover Archbishop's,
    virtuous Cranmer.
  GENTLEMAN. land that;
    However, great breach. comes,
    Cranmer find friend shrink him.
  GENTLEMAN. be, pray you?
  GENTLEMAN. Thomas Cromwell,
    man esteem th' King, truly
    worthy friend. King made Master
    O' th' jewel House,
    one, already, Privy Council.
  GENTLEMAN. deserve more.  
  GENTLEMAN. Yes, doubt.
    Come, gentlemen, ye way, which
    th' court, ye guests:
    command. walk thither,
    ye more.
  BOTH. command us, sir.                               Exeunt




ACT IV. SCENE 2.

Kimbolton

Enter KATHARINE, Dowager, sick; led GRIFFITH, Gentleman Usher,
and PATIENCE, woman

  GRIFFITH. Grace?
  KATHARINE. O Griffith, sick death!
    legs loaden branches bow th' earth,
    leave burden. Reach chair.
    So-now, methinks, feel ease.
    Didst thou me, Griffith, thou led'st me,
    great child honour, Cardinal Wolsey,
    dead?
  GRIFFITH. Yes, madam; Grace,
    pain suffer'd, gave ear to't.
  KATHARINE. Prithee, good Griffith, died.
    well, stepp'd me, happily,
    example.
  GRIFFITH. Well, voice goes, madam;  
    stout Earl Northumberland
    Arrested York brought forward,
    man sorely tainted, answer,
    fell sick suddenly, grew ill
    sit mule.
  KATHARINE. Alas, poor man!
  GRIFFITH. last, easy roads, Leicester,
    Lodg'd abbey; reverend abbot,
    covent, honourably receiv'd him;
    gave words: 'O father Abbot,
    man, broken storms state,
    lay weary bones ye;
    Give earth charity!'
    bed; eagerly sickness
    Pursu'd nights this,
    hour eight-which himself
    Foretold last-full repentance,
    Continual meditations, tears, sorrows,
    gave honours world again,
    blessed part heaven, slept peace.  
  KATHARINE. rest; faults lie gently him!
    far, Griffith, give leave speak him,
    charity. man
    unbounded stomach, ranking
    princes; that, suggestion,
    Tied kingdom. Simony fair play;
    opinion law. I' th' presence
    untruths, double
    words meaning. never,
    meant ruin, pitiful.
    promises were, was, mighty;
    performance, now, nothing.
    body ill, gave
    clergy ill example.
  GRIFFITH. Noble madam,
    Men's evil manners live brass: virtues
    write water. Highness
    hear speak good now?
  KATHARINE. Yes, good Griffith;
    malicious else.  
  GRIFFITH. Cardinal,
    humble stock, undoubtedly
    fashion'd honour cradle.
    scholar, ripe good one;
    Exceeding wise, fair-spoken, persuading;
    Lofty sour lov'd not,
    men sought sweet summer.
    unsatisfied getting-
    sin-yet bestowing, madam,
    princely: witness him
    twins learning rais'd you,
    Ipswich Oxford! fell him,
    Unwilling outlive good it;
    other, unfinish'd, famous,
    excellent art, rising,
    Christendom speak virtue.
    overthrow heap'd happiness him;
    then, till then, felt himself,
    found blessedness little.
    And, add greater honours age  
    man give him, died fearing God.
  KATHARINE. death herald,
    speaker living actions,
    mine honour corruption,
    honest chronicler Griffith.
    hated living, thou hast made me,
    thy religious truth modesty,
    ashes honour. Peace him!
    patience, still, set lower:
    long trouble thee. Good Griffith,
    musicians play sad note
    nam'd knell, whilst sit meditating
    celestial harmony to.
                                              [Sad solemn music]
  GRIFFITH. asleep. Good wench, sit quiet,
    fear wake her. Softly, gentle Patience.

                 VISION.

      Enter, solemnly tripping another,  
      PERSONAGES clad white robes, wearing their
      heads garlands bays, golden vizards their
      faces; branches bays palm hands. They
      congee her, dance; and, certain
      changes, hold spare garland her
      head, make reverent curtsies.
      held garland deliver the
      two, observe same
      order changes, holding garland over
      head; done, deliver garland
      two, likewise observe order;
      which, inspiration, makes
      sleep signs rejoicing, holdeth her
      hands heaven. dancing vanish,
      carrying garland them. music continues

  KATHARINE. Spirits peace, ye? ye gone?
    leave wretchedness ye?
  GRIFFITH. Madam, here.
  KATHARINE. call for.  
    ye enter slept?
  GRIFFITH. None, madam.
  KATHARINE. No? not, now, blessed troop
    Invite banquet; bright faces
    Cast thousand beams me, sun?
    promis'd eternal happiness,
    brought garlands, Griffith, feel
    worthy wear. shall, assuredly.
  GRIFFITH. joyful, madam, good dreams
    Possess fancy.
  KATHARINE. Bid music leave,
    harsh heavy me.                    [Music ceases]
  PATIENCE. note
    Grace alter'd sudden?
    long face drawn! pale looks,
    earthly cold! Mark eyes.
  GRIFFITH. going, wench. Pray, pray.
  PATIENCE. Heaven comfort her!

             Enter MESSENGER  

  MESSENGER. An't Grace-
  KATHARINE. saucy fellow.
    Deserve reverence?
  GRIFFITH. blame,
    Knowing lose wonted greatness,
    rude behaviour. to, kneel.
  MESSENGER. humbly entreat Highness' pardon;
    haste made unmannerly. staying
    gentleman, King, you.
  KATHARINE. Admit entrance, Griffith; fellow
    ne'er again.                            Exit MESSENGER

              Enter LORD CAPUCIUS

    sight fail not,
    Lord Ambassador Emperor,
    royal nephew, Capucius.
  CAPUCIUS. Madam, same-your servant.
  KATHARINE. O, Lord,  
    times titles alter'd strangely
    knew me. But, pray you,
    pleasure me?
  CAPUCIUS. Noble lady,
    First, mine service Grace; next,
    King's request visit you,
    grieves weakness, me
    Sends princely commendations
    heartily entreats good comfort.
  KATHARINE. O good lord, comfort late,
    'Tis pardon execution:
    gentle physic, time, cur'd me;
    past comforts here, prayers.
    Highness?
  CAPUCIUS. Madam, good health.
  KATHARINE. do! flourish
    dwell worms, poor name
    Banish'd kingdom! Patience, letter
    caus'd write away?
  PATIENCE. No, madam.                       [Giving KATHARINE]  
  KATHARINE. Sir, humbly pray deliver
    lord King.
  CAPUCIUS. willing, madam.
  KATHARINE. commended goodness
    model chaste loves, young daughter-
    dews heaven fall thick blessings her!-
    Beseeching give virtuous breeding-
    young, noble modest nature;
    hope deserve well-and little
    love mother's sake, lov'd him,
    Heaven dearly. poor petition
    noble Grace pity
    wretched women long
    follow'd fortunes faithfully;
    one, dare avow-
    lie-but deserve,
    virtue true beauty soul,
    honesty decent carriage,
    good husband, noble;
    men happy 'em.  
    men-they poorest,
    poverty draw 'em me-
    wages duly paid 'em,
    remember by.
    heaven pleas'd longer life
    means, parted thus.
    contents; and, good lord,
    love dearest world,
    Christian peace souls departed,
    Stand poor people's friend, urge King
    right.
  CAPUCIUS. heaven, will,
    lose fashion man!
  KATHARINE. you, honest lord. Remember me
    humility Highness;
    long trouble passing
    world. death bless'd him,
    will. Mine eyes grow dim. Farewell,
    lord. Griffith, farewell. Nay, Patience,
    leave yet. bed;  
    Call women. dead, good wench,
    us'd honour; strew over
    maiden flowers, world know
    chaste wife grave. Embalm me,
    lay forth; unqueen'd, like
    queen, daughter king, inter me.
    more.                          Exeunt, leading KATHARINE

ACT V. SCENE 1.

London. gallery palace

Enter GARDINER, BISHOP WINCHESTER, PAGE torch him,
met SIR THOMAS LOVELL

  GARDINER. o'clock, boy, is't not?
  BOY. hath struck.
  GARDINER. hours necessities,
    delights; times repair nature
    comforting repose, us
    waste times. Good hour night, Sir Thomas!
    late?
  LOVELL. King, lord?
  GARDINER. did, Sir Thomas, left primero
    Duke Suffolk.
  LOVELL. too,
    bed. leave.
  GARDINER. yet, Sir Thomas Lovell. matter?
    haste.  
    great offence belongs to't, give friend
    touch late business. Affairs walk-
    spirits do-at midnight, have
    wilder nature business
    seeks despatch day.
  LOVELL. lord, love you;
    durst commend secret ear
    weightier work. Queen's labour,
    great extremity, fear'd
    labour end.
  GARDINER. fruit with
    pray heartily, find
    Good time, live; stock, Sir Thomas,
    grubb'd now.
  LOVELL. Methinks could
    Cry thee amen; conscience says
    good creature, and, sweet lady, does
    Deserve wishes.
  GARDINER. But, sir, sir-
    Hear me, Sir Thomas. Y'are gentleman  
    mine way; wise, religious;
    And, you, ne'er well-
    'Twill not, Sir Thomas Lovell, take't me-
    Till Cranmer, Cromwell, hands, she,
    Sleep graves.
  LOVELL. Now, sir, speak two
    remark'd i' th' kingdom. Cromwell,
    Jewel House, made Master
    O' th' Rolls, King's secretary; further, sir,
    Stands gap trade moe preferments,
    time load him. Th' Archbishop
    King's hand tongue, dare speak
    syllable him?
  GARDINER. Yes, yes, Sir Thomas,
    dare; ventur'd
    speak mind him; day,
    Sir-I you-I have
    Incens'd lords o' th' Council, is-
    is, is-
    arch heretic, pestilence  
    infect land; moved
    broken King, hath far
    ear complaint-of great grace
    princely care, foreseeing fell mischiefs
    reasons laid him-hath commanded
    To-morrow morning Council board
    convented. rank weed, Sir Thomas,
    root out. affairs
    hinder long-good night, Sir Thomas.
  LOVELL. good nights, lord; rest servant.
                                             Exeunt GARDINER PAGE

         Enter KING DUKE SUFFOLK

  KING. Charles, play to-night;
    mind's on't; hard me.
  SUFFOLK. Sir, win before.
  KING. little, Charles;
    not, fancy's play.
    Now, Lovell, Queen news?  
  LOVELL. personally deliver her
    commanded me, woman
    message; return'd thanks
    great'st humbleness, desir'd Highness
    heartily pray her.
  KING. say'st thou, ha?
    pray her? What, crying out?
  LOVELL. woman; suff'rance made
    pang death.
  KING. Alas, good lady!
  SUFFOLK. God safely quit burden, and
    gentle travail, gladding of
    Highness heir!
  KING. 'Tis midnight, Charles;
    Prithee bed; thy pray'rs remember
    Th' estate poor queen. Leave alone,
    company
    friendly to.
  SUFFOLK. Highness
    quiet night, good mistress  
    Remember prayers.
  KING. Charles, good night.                             Exit SUFFOLK

         Enter SIR ANTHONY DENNY

    Well, sir, follows?
  DENNY. Sir, brought lord Archbishop,
    commanded me.
  KING. Ha! Canterbury?
  DENNY. Ay, good lord.
  KING. 'Tis true. he, Denny?
  DENNY. attends Highness' pleasure.
  KING. Bring us.                                   Exit DENNY
  LOVELL.  [Aside]  bishop spake.
    happily hither.

         Re-enter DENNY, CRANMER

  KING. Avoid gallery.                     [LOVELL stay]
    Ha! said. gone.  
    What!                                     Exeunt LOVELL DENNY
  CRANMER.  [Aside]  fearful-wherefore frowns thus?
    'Tis aspect terror. All's well.
  KING. now, lord? desire know
    Wherefore you.
  CRANMER.  [Kneeling]  duty
    T'attend Highness' pleasure.
  KING. Pray you, arise,
    good gracious Lord Canterbury.
    Come, walk turn together;
    news you; come, come, hand.
    Ah, good lord, grieve speak,
    repeat follows.
    have, unwillingly, late
    Heard grievous-I say, lord,
    Grievous-complaints you; which, consider'd,
    mov'd Council shall
    morning us; know
    freedom purge yourself
    that, till trial charges  
    require answer, take
    patience contented
    make house Tow'r. brother us,
    fits proceed, witness
    you.
  CRANMER. humbly Highness
    glad catch good occasion
    throughly winnowed chaff
    corn fly asunder; know
    stands calumnious tongues
    myself, poor man.
  KING. Stand up, good Canterbury;
    Thy truth thy integrity rooted
    us, thy friend. Give thy hand, stand up;
    Prithee walk. Now, holidame,
    manner man you? lord, look'd
    petition that
    ta'en pains bring together
    accusers, heard you
    indurance further.  
  CRANMER. dread liege,
    good stand truth honesty;
    fail, mine enemies
    triumph o'er person; weigh not,
    virtues vacant. fear nothing
    me.
  KING. not
    state stands i' th' world, world?
    enemies many, small; practices
    bear proportion; ever
    justice truth o' th' question carries
    due o' th' verdict it; ease
    corrupt minds procure knaves corrupt
    swear you? things done.
    potently oppos'd, malice
    great size. Ween luck,
    perjur'd witness, Master,
    minister are, whiles liv'd
    naughty earth? to, to;
    precipice leap danger,  
    woo destruction.
  CRANMER. God Majesty
    Protect mine innocence, fall into
    trap laid me!
  KING. good cheer;
    prevail give to.
    comfort you, morning see
    them; chance,
    charging matters, commit you,
    persuasions contrary
    Fail use, vehemency
    Th' occasion instruct you. entreaties
    render remedy, ring
    Deliver them, appeal us
    make them. Look, good man weeps!
    honest, mine honour. God's blest Mother!
    swear true-hearted, soul
    kingdom. gone,
    bid you.
                                                         Exit CRANMER  
    strangled language tears.

           Enter LADY

  GENTLEMAN.  [Within]  back; you?
  LADY. back; tidings bring
    make boldness manners. Now, good angels
    Fly o'er thy royal head, shade thy person
    blessed wings!
  KING. Now, thy looks
    guess thy message. Queen deliver'd?
    ay, boy.
  LADY. Ay, ay, liege;
    lovely boy. God Heaven
    bless her! 'Tis girl,
    Promises boys hereafter. Sir, queen
    Desires visitation, be
    Acquainted stranger; 'tis you
    cherry cherry.
  KING. Lovell!  

           Enter LOVELL

  LOVELL. Sir?
  KING. Give hundred marks. Queen.            Exit
  LADY. hundred marks? light, ha' more!
    ordinary groom payment.
    more, scold him.
    girl him! I'll
    more, unsay't; now, 'tis hot,
    put issue.                                  Exeunt




ACT V. SCENE 2.

Lobby Council Chamber

Enter CRANMER, ARCHBISHOP CANTERBURY

  CRANMER. hope late; gentleman
    Council pray'd me
    make great haste. fast? means this? Ho!
    waits there? me?

           Enter KEEPER

  KEEPER. Yes, lord;
    you.
  CRANMER. Why?
  KEEPER. Grace wait till call'd for.

           Enter DOCTOR BUTTS

  CRANMER. So.
  BUTTS.  [Aside]  piece malice. glad  
    happily; King
    understand presently.                               Exit
  CRANMER.  [Aside]  'Tis Butts,
    King's physician; pass'd along,
    earnestly cast eyes me!
    Pray heaven sound disgrace! certain,
    purpose laid hate me-
    God turn hearts! sought malice-
    quench mine honour; shame make me
    Wait door, fellow councillor,
    'Mong boys, grooms, lackeys. pleasures
    fulfill'd, attend patience.

         Enter KING BUTTS window above

  BUTTS. show Grace strangest sight-
  KING. that, Butts?
  BUTTS. Highness day.
  KING. Body me, it?
  BUTTS. lord:  
    high promotion Grace Canterbury;
    holds state door, 'mongst pursuivants,
    Pages, footboys.
  KING. Ha, 'tis indeed.
    honour another?
    'Tis 'em yet. thought
    parted honesty 'em-
    good manners-as suffer
    man place, favour,
    dance attendance lordships' pleasures,
    door too, post packets.
    holy Mary, Butts, knavery!
    'em alone, draw curtain close;
    hear anon.                                   Exeunt




ACT V. SCENE 3.

The Council Chamber

A Council table brought in, chairs stools, placed
under state. Enter LORD CHANCELLOR, places upper end
of table left band, seat left void him,
as Canterbury's seat. DUKE SUFFOLK, DUKE NORFOLK, SURREY,
LORD CHAMBERLAIN, GARDINER, seat order side;
CROMWELL lower end, secretary. KEEPER door

  CHANCELLOR. Speak business, master secretary;
    met council?
  CROMWELL. honours,
    chief concerns Grace Canterbury.
  GARDINER. knowledge it?
  CROMWELL. Yes.
  NORFOLK. waits there?
  KEEPER. Without, noble lords?
  GARDINER. Yes.  
  KEEPER. Lord Archbishop;
    half hour, pleasures.
  CHANCELLOR. in.
  KEEPER. Grace enter now.

      CRANMER approaches Council table

  CHANCELLOR. good Lord Archbishop, sorry
    sit present, behold
    chair stand empty; men,
    natures frail capable
    flesh; angels; frailty
    wisdom, you, teach us,
    misdemean'd yourself, little,
    King first, laws, filling
    realm teaching chaplains-
    inform'd-with opinions,
    Divers dangerous; heresies,
    And, reform'd, prove pernicious.
  GARDINER. reformation sudden too,  
    noble lords; tame wild horses
    Pace 'em hands make 'em gentle,
    stop mouth stubborn bits spur 'em
    Till obey manage. suffer,
    easiness childish pity
    man's honour, contagious sickness,
    Farewell physic; then?
    Commotions, uproars, general taint
    state; late days neighbours,
    upper Germany, dearly witness,
    freshly pitied memories.
  CRANMER. good lords, hitherto progress
    life office, labour'd,
    study, teaching
    strong authority
    way, safely; end
    well. living-
    speak single heart, lords-
    man detests, stirs against,
    private conscience place,  
    Defacers public peace do.
    Pray heaven King find heart
    allegiance it! Men make
    Envy crooked malice nourishment
    Dare bite best. beseech lordships
    That, case justice, accusers,
    will, stand face face
    freely urge me.
  SUFFOLK. Nay, lord,
    be; councillor,
    virtue man dare accuse you.
  GARDINER. lord, business moment,
    short you. 'Tis Highness' pleasure
    consent, trial you,
    committed Tower;
    Where, private man again,
    dare accuse boldly,
    than, fear, provided for.
  CRANMER. Ah, good Lord Winchester, you;
    good friend; pass,  
    find lordship judge juror,
    merciful. end-
    'Tis undoing. Love meekness, lord,
    churchman ambition;
    Win straying souls modesty again,
    Cast away. clear myself,
    Lay weight ye patience,
    make doubt conscience
    daily wrongs. more,
    reverence calling makes modest.
  GARDINER. lord, lord, sectary;
    plain truth. painted gloss discovers,
    men understand you, words weakness.
  CROMWELL. Lord Winchester, y'are little,
    good favour, sharp; men noble,
    faulty, find respect
    been; 'tis cruelty
    load falling man.
  GARDINER. Good Master Secretary,
    cry honour mercy; may, worst  
    table, so.
  CROMWELL. Why, lord?
  GARDINER. favourer
    sect? Ye sound.
  CROMWELL. sound?
  GARDINER. sound, say.
  CROMWELL. half honest!
    Men's prayers seek you, fears.
  GARDINER. remember bold language.
  CROMWELL. Do.
    Remember bold life too.
  CHANCELLOR. much;
    Forbear, shame, lords.
  GARDINER. done.
  CROMWELL. I.
  CHANCELLOR. you, lord: stands agreed,
    it, voices, forthwith
    convey'd th' Tower prisoner;
    remain till King's pleasure
    us. agreed, lords?  
  ALL. are.
  CRANMER. mercy,
    th' Tower, lords?
  GARDINER. other
    expect? strangely troublesome.
    o' th' guard ready there.

           Enter guard

  CRANMER. me?
    traitor thither?
  GARDINER. Receive him,
    safe i' th' Tower.
  CRANMER. Stay, good lords,
    say. there, lords;
    virtue ring cause
    gripes cruel men give it
    noble judge, King master.
  CHAMBERLAIN. King's ring.
  SURREY. 'Tis counterfeit.  
  SUFFOLK. 'Tis ring, heav'n. told ye all,
    put dangerous stone a-rolling,
    'Twould fall ourselves.
  NORFOLK. think, lords,
    King suffer finger
    man vex'd?
  CHAMBERLAIN. 'Tis certain;
    life him!
    fairly on't!
  CROMWELL. mind gave me,
    seeking tales informations
    man-whose honesty devil
    disciples envy at-
    Ye blew fire burns ye. ye!

      Enter KING frowning them; takes seat

  GARDINER. Dread sovereign, bound heaven
    daily thanks, gave prince;
    good wise religious;  
    obedience makes church
    chief aim honour and, strengthen
    holy duty, dear respect,
    royal judgment hear
    betwixt great offender.
  KING. good sudden commendations,
    Bishop Winchester. not
    hear flattery now, presence
    thin bare hide offences.
    reach play spaniel,
    wagging tongue win me;
    whatsoe'er thou tak'st for, sure
    Thou hast cruel nature bloody.
    [To CRANMER]  Good man, sit down. proudest
    dares wag finger thee.
    holy, starve
    place thee not.
  SURREY. Grace-
  KING. No, sir, me.
    thought men understanding  
    wisdom Council; find none.
    discretion, lords, man,
    good man-few deserve title-
    honest man, wait lousy footboy
    chamber door? great are?
    Why, shame this! commission
    Bid ye forget yourselves? gave ye
    Power councillor him,
    groom. ye, see,
    malice integrity,
    utmost, ye mean;
    ye live.
  CHANCELLOR. far,
    dread sovereign, Grace
    tongue excuse all. purpos'd
    imprisonment rather-
    faith men-meant trial
    fair purgation world, malice,
    sure, me.
  KING. Well, well, lords, respect him;  
    him, well, worthy it.
    him: prince
    beholding subject,
    love service him.
    Make ado, embrace him;
    friends, shame, lords! Lord Canterbury,
    suit deny me:
    is, fair young maid baptism;
    godfather, answer her.
  CRANMER. greatest monarch alive glory
    honour; deserve it,
    poor humble subject you?
  KING. Come, come, lord, spare spoons. You
      have
    noble partners you: Duchess Norfolk
    Lady Marquis Dorset. you?
    more, Lord Winchester, charge you,
    Embrace love man.
  GARDINER. true heart
    brother-love it.  
  CRANMER. heaven
    Witness dear hold confirmation.
  KING. Good man, joyful tears show thy true heart.
    common voice, see, verified
    thee, thus: 'Do Lord Canterbury
    shrewd turn friend ever.'
    Come, lords, trifle time away; long
    young made Christian.
    made ye one, lords, remain;
    grow stronger, honour gain.                  Exeunt




ACT V. SCENE 4.

The palace yard

Noise tumult within. Enter PORTER MAN

  PORTER. leave noise anon, ye rascals. you
    court Paris garden? Ye rude slaves, leave your
    gaping.
    [Within: Good master porter, belong th' larder.]
  PORTER. Belong th' gallows, hang'd, ye rogue! Is
    place roar in? Fetch dozen crab-tree staves,
    strong ones; switches 'em. scratch
    heads. christenings? look
    ale cakes here, rude rascals?
  MAN. Pray, sir, patient; 'tis impossible,
    sweep 'em door cannons,
    scatter 'em 'tis make 'em sleep
    May-day morning; be.
    push Paul's stir 'em.
  PORTER. in, hang'd?
  MAN. Alas, not: tide in?  
    sound cudgel foot-
    poor remainder-could distribute,
    made spare, sir.
  PORTER. nothing, sir.
  MAN. Samson, Sir Guy, Colbrand,
    mow 'em me; spar'd any
    head hit, young old,
    she, cuckold cuckold-maker,
    ne'er hope chine again;
    cow, God save her!
    [ Within: hear, master porter?]
  PORTER. presently, good master puppy.
    door close, sirrah.
  MAN. do?
  PORTER. do, knock 'em th'
    dozens? Moorfields muster in? some
    strange Indian great tool court, the
    women besiege us? Bless me, fry fornication
    door! Christian conscience, christening
    beget thousand: father, godfather,  
    together.
  MAN. spoons bigger, sir. fellow
    door, brazier his
    face, for, o' conscience, twenty dog-days now
    reign in's nose; stand line,
    penance. fire-drake hit three
    times head, times nose discharged
    me; stands mortar-piece, blow us.
    haberdasher's wife small wit him, that
    rail'd till pink'd porringer fell head,
    kindling combustion state. miss'd the
    meteor once, hit woman, cried 'Clubs!'
    forty truncheoners draw
    succour, hope o' th' Strand, where
    quartered. fell on; made good place.
    length th' broomstaff me; defied 'em
    still; suddenly file boys 'em, loose shot,
    deliver'd show'r pebbles fain draw
    mine honour 'em win work: devil was
    'em, surely.  
  PORTER. youths thunder playhouse
    fight bitten apples; audience tribulation
    Tower-hill limbs Limehouse, dear
    brothers, endure. 'em Limbo
    Patrum, dance days;
    running banquet beadles come.

          Enter LORD CHAMBERLAIN

  CHAMBERLAIN. Mercy o' me, multitude here!
    grow too; parts coming,
    fair here! porters,
    lazy knaves? Y'have made fine hand, fellows.
    trim rabble in: these
    faithful friends o' th' suburbs? have
    Great store room, doubt, left ladies,
    pass back christening.
  PORTER. An't honour,
    men; do,
    torn pieces, done.  
    army rule 'em.
  CHAMBERLAIN. live,
    King blame for't, lay ye an
    th' heels, suddenly; heads
    Clap round fines neglect. Y'are lazy knaves;
    ye lie baiting bombards, when
    Ye service. Hark! trumpets sound;
    Th' christening.
    break press find out
    troops pass fairly, find
    Marshalsea hold ye play months.
  PORTER. Make Princess.
  MAN. great fellow,
    Stand close up, make head ache.
  PORTER. i' th' camlet, o' th' rail;
    peck o'er pales else.                         Exeunt




ACT V. SCENE 5.

The palace

Enter TRUMPETS, sounding; ALDERMEN, LORD MAYOR, GARTER, CRANMER,
DUKE NORFOLK, marshal's staff, DUKE SUFFOLK,
two Noblemen bearing great standing-bowls christening gifts;
then Noblemen bearing canopy, DUCHESS NORFOLK,
godmother, bearing CHILD richly habited mantle, etc.,
train borne LADY; MARCHIONESS DORSET,
the godmother, LADIES. troop pass stage,
and GARTER speaks

  GARTER. Heaven, thy endless goodness, send prosperous
    life, long ever-happy, high mighty
    Princess England, Elizabeth!

           Flourish. Enter KING guard
  
  CRANMER.  [Kneeling]  royal Grace the
      good Queen!
    noble partners pray:
    comfort, joy, gracious lady,
    Heaven laid make parents happy,
    hourly fall ye!
  KING. you, good Lord Archbishop.
    name?
  CRANMER. Elizabeth.
  KING. Stand up, lord.                   [The KING kisses child]
    kiss blessing: God protect thee!
    hand give thy life.
  CRANMER. Amen.
  KING. noble gossips, y'have prodigal;
    ye heartily. lady,
    English.
  CRANMER. speak, sir,
    heaven bids me; words utter
    flattery, find 'em truth.
    royal infant-heaven move her!-  
    cradle, promises
    land thousand blessings,
    time bring ripeness. be-
    living behold goodness-
    pattern princes living her,
    succeed. Saba never
    covetous wisdom fair virtue
    pure soul be. princely graces
    mould mighty piece is,
    virtues attend good,
    doubled her. Truth nurse her,
    Holy heavenly thoughts counsel her;
    lov'd fear'd. bless her:
    foes shake field beaten corn,
    hang heads sorrow. Good grows her;
    days man eat safety
    vine plants, sing
    merry songs peace neighbours.
    God known; her
    read perfect ways honour,  
    claim greatness, blood.
    peace sleep her; when
    bird dies, maiden phoenix
    ashes create heir
    great admiration herself,
    leave blessedness one-
    heaven call cloud darkness-
    sacred ashes honour
    star-like rise, great fame was,
    stand fix'd. Peace, plenty, love, truth, terror,
    servants chosen infant,
    his, vine grow him;
    bright sun heaven shine,
    honour greatness name
    be, make nations; flourish,
    mountain cedar reach branches
    plains him; children's children
    bless heaven.
  KING. Thou speakest wonders.
  CRANMER. be, happiness England,  
    aged princess; days her,
    day deed crown it.
    more! die-
    must, saints her-yet virgin;
    unspotted lily pass
    th' ground, world mourn her.
  KING. O Lord Archbishop,
    Thou hast made man; before
    happy child anything.
    oracle comfort pleas'd me
    heaven desire
    child does, praise Maker.
    ye all. you, good Lord Mayor,
    you, good brethren, beholding;
    receiv'd honour presence,
    ye find thankful. Lead way, lords;
    Ye Queen, ye,
    sick else. day, man think
    business house; stay.
    make holiday.                     Exeunt

KING_HENRY_VIII|EPILOGUE
              EPILOGUE.

    'Tis ten play please
    here. ease
    sleep act two; those, fear,
    W'have frighted trumpets; so, 'tis clear,
    'tis nought; hear city
    Abus'd extremely, cry 'That's witty!'
    neither; that, fear,
    expected good w'are hear
    play time in
    merciful construction good women;
    show'd 'em. smile
    'twill do, while
    men ours; 'tis ill hap
    hold ladies bid 'em clap.

THE END

1597

KING JOHN

by William Shakespeare



DRAMATIS PERSONAE

    KING JOHN
    PRINCE HENRY, son
    ARTHUR, DUKE BRITAINE, son Geffrey, late Duke of
      Britaine, elder brother King John
    EARL PEMBROKE
    EARL ESSEX
    EARL SALISBURY
    LORD BIGOT
    HUBERT DE BURGH
    ROBERT FAULCONBRIDGE, son Sir Robert Faulconbridge
    PHILIP BASTARD, half-brother
    JAMES GURNEY, servant Lady Faulconbridge
    PETER POMFRET, prophet

    KING PHILIP FRANCE
    LEWIS, Dauphin
    LYMOGES, Duke Austria
    CARDINAL PANDULPH, Pope's legate
    MELUN, French lord
    CHATILLON, ambassador France King John  

    QUEEN ELINOR, widow King Henry II mother to
      King John
    CONSTANCE, Mother Arthur
    BLANCH SPAIN, daughter King Castile
      niece King John
    LADY FAULCONBRIDGE, widow Sir Robert Faulconbridge

    Lords, Citizens Angiers, Sheriff, Heralds, Officers,
      Soldiers, Executioners, Messengers, Attendants

SCENE:
England France



ACT I. SCENE 1

KING JOHN's palace

Enter KING JOHN, QUEEN ELINOR, PEMBROKE, ESSEX, SALISBURY, others,
with CHATILLON

  KING JOHN. Now, say, Chatillon, France us?
  CHATILLON. Thus, greeting, speaks King France
    behaviour majesty,
    borrowed majesty, England here.
  ELINOR. strange beginning- 'borrowed majesty'!
  KING JOHN. Silence, good mother; hear embassy.
  CHATILLON. Philip France, true behalf
    thy deceased brother Geffrey's son,
    Arthur Plantagenet, lays lawful claim
    fair island territories,
    Ireland, Poictiers, Anjou, Touraine, Maine,
    Desiring thee lay sword
    sways usurpingly titles,
    put young Arthur's hand,
    Thy nephew royal sovereign.  
  KING JOHN. disallow this?
  CHATILLON. proud control fierce bloody war,
    enforce rights forcibly withheld.
  KING JOHN. war war, blood blood,
    Controlment controlment- answer France.
  CHATILLON. king's defiance mouth-
    farthest limit embassy.
  KING JOHN. Bear mine him, depart peace;
    thou lightning eyes France;
    ere thou canst report there,
    thunder cannon heard.
    hence! thou trumpet wrath
    sullen presage decay.
    honourable conduct have-
    Pembroke, 't. Farewell, Chatillon.
                                        Exeunt CHATILLON PEMBROKE
  ELINOR. now, son! said
    ambitious Constance cease
    Till kindled France world
    party son?  
    prevented made whole
    easy arguments love,
    manage kingdoms must
    fearful bloody issue arbitrate.
  KING JOHN. strong possession us!
  ELINOR. strong possession right,
    wrong me;
    conscience whispers ear,
    heaven hear.

                  Enter SHERIFF

  ESSEX. liege, strangest controversy
    country judg'd you
    e'er heard. produce men?
  KING JOHN. approach.                          Exit SHERIFF
    abbeys priories pay
    expedition's charge.

     Enter ROBERT FAULCONBRIDGE PHILIP, bastard  
                     brother

    men you?
  BASTARD. faithful subject I, gentleman
    Born Northamptonshire, eldest son,
    suppose, Robert Faulconbridge-
    soldier honour-giving hand
    Coeur-de-lion knighted field.
  KING JOHN. art thou?
  ROBERT. son heir Faulconbridge.
  KING JOHN. elder, art thou heir?
    mother then, seems.
  BASTARD. mother, mighty king-
    known- and, think, father;
    knowledge truth
    put o'er heaven mother.
    doubt, men's children may.
  ELINOR. thee, rude man! Thou dost shame thy mother,
    wound honour diffidence.
  BASTARD. I, madam? No, reason it-  
    brother's plea, mine;
    prove, 'a pops out
    fair hundred pound year.
    Heaven guard mother's honour land!
  KING JOHN. good blunt fellow. Why, younger born,
    Doth lay claim thine inheritance?
  BASTARD. why, land.
    slander'd bastardy;
    whe'er true begot no,
    lay mother's head;
    begot, liege-
    Fair fall bones pains me!-
    Compare faces judge yourself.
    Sir Robert beget both
    father, son him-
    O Sir Robert, father, knee
    give heaven thee!
  KING JOHN. Why, madcap hath heaven lent here!
  ELINOR. hath trick Coeur-de-lion's face;
    accent tongue affecteth him.  
    read tokens son
    large composition man?
  KING JOHN. Mine eye hath examined parts
    finds perfect Richard. Sirrah, speak,
    doth move claim brother's land?
  BASTARD. hath half-face, father.
    half face land:
    half-fac'd groat hundred pound year!
  ROBERT. gracious liege, father liv'd,
    brother employ father much-
  BASTARD. Well, sir, land:
    tale employ'd mother.
  ROBERT. dispatch'd embassy
    Germany, Emperor
    treat high affairs touching time.
    Th' advantage absence King,
    meantime sojourn'd father's;
    prevail shame speak-
    truth truth: large lengths seas shores
    father mother lay,  
    heard father speak himself,
    lusty gentleman got.
    death-bed bequeath'd
    lands me, death
    mother's son his;
    were, world
    Full fourteen weeks time.
    Then, good liege, mine,
    father's land, father's will.
  KING JOHN. Sirrah, brother legitimate:
    father's wife wedlock bear him,
    play false, fault hers;
    fault lies hazards husbands
    marry wives. me, brother,
    Who, say, pains son,
    father claim'd son his?
    sooth, good friend, father kept
    calf, bred cow, world;
    sooth, might; then, brother's,
    brother claim him; father,  
    his, refuse him. concludes:
    mother's son father's heir;
    father's heir father's land.
  ROBERT. father's force
    dispossess child his?
  BASTARD. force dispossess me, sir,
    me, think.
  ELINOR. hadst thou Faulconbridge,
    thy brother, enjoy thy land,
    reputed son Coeur-de-lion,
    Lord thy presence land beside?
  BASTARD. Madam, brother shape
    his, Sir Robert's his, him;
    legs riding-rods,
    arms eel-skins stuff'd, face thin
    mine ear durst stick rose
    men 'Look three-farthings goes!'
    And, shape, heir land-
    stir place,
    give foot face!  
    Sir Nob case.
  ELINOR. thee well. Wilt thou forsake thy fortune,
    Bequeath thy land follow me?
    soldier bound France.
  BASTARD. Brother, land, chance.
    face hath hundred pound year,
    sell face fivepence 'tis dear.
    Madam, follow death.
  ELINOR. Nay, thither.
  BASTARD. country manners give betters way.
  KING JOHN. thy name?
  BASTARD. Philip, liege, begun:
    Philip, good Sir Robert's wife's eldest son.
  KING JOHN. henceforth bear form thou bearest:
    Kneel thou Philip, rise great-
    Arise Sir Richard Plantagenet.
  BASTARD. Brother th' mother's side, give hand;
    father gave honour, gave land.
    blessed hour, night day,
    got, Sir Robert away!  
  ELINOR. spirit Plantagenet!
    thy grandam, Richard: call so.
  BASTARD. Madam, chance, truth; though?
    about, right,
    window, o'er hatch;
    dares stir day walk night;
    have, men catch.
    off, won shot;
    I, howe'er begot.
  KING JOHN. Go, Faulconbridge; hast thou thy desire:
    landless knight makes thee landed squire.
    Come, madam, come, Richard, speed
    France, France, need.
  BASTARD. Brother, adieu. Good fortune thee!
    thou wast i' th' honesty.
                                           Exeunt BASTARD
    foot honour was;
    foot land worse.
    Well, make Joan lady.
    'Good den, Sir Richard!'-'God-a-mercy, fellow!'  
    George, call Peter;
    new-made honour doth forget men's names:
    'Tis respective sociable
    conversion. traveller,
    toothpick worship's mess-
    knightly stomach suffic'd,
    suck teeth catechize
    picked man countries: 'My dear sir,'
    leaning mine elbow begin
    'I beseech you'-That question now;
    answer Absey book:
    'O sir,' answer 'at command,
    employment, service, sir!'
    'No, sir,' question 'I, sweet sir, yours.'
    so, ere answer question would,
    Saving dialogue compliment,
    talking Alps Apennines,
    Pyrenean river Po-
    draws supper conclusion so.
    worshipful society,  
    fits mounting spirit myself;
    bastard time
    doth smack observation-
    I, smack no;
    habit device,
    Exterior form, outward accoutrement,
    motion deliver
    Sweet, sweet, sweet poison age's tooth;
    Which, practise deceive,
    Yet, avoid deceit, learn;
    strew footsteps rising.
    haste riding-robes?
    woman-post this? Hath husband
    pains blow horn her?

      Enter LADY FAULCONBRIDGE, JAMES GURNEY

    O me, 'tis mother! now, good lady!
    brings court hastily?
  LADY FAULCONBRIDGE. slave, thy brother?  
      he
    holds chase mine honour down?
  BASTARD. brother Robert, Sir Robert's son?
    Colbrand giant, mighty man?
    Sir Robert's son seek so?
  LADY FAULCONBRIDGE. Sir Robert's son! Ay, thou unreverend boy,
    Sir Robert's son! scorn'st thou Sir Robert?
    Sir Robert's son, art thou.
  BASTARD. James Gurney, wilt thou give leave awhile?
  GURNEY. Good leave, good Philip.
  BASTARD. Philip-Sparrow! James,
    toys abroad-anon thee more.
                                                          Exit GURNEY
    Madam, Sir Robert's son;
    Sir Robert eat part me
    Good Friday, ne'er broke fast.
    Sir Robert do: well-marry, confess-
    me? Sir Robert it:
    handiwork. Therefore, good mother,
    beholding limbs?  
    Sir Robert holp make leg.
  LADY FAULCONBRIDGE. Hast thou conspired thy brother too,
    thine gain shouldst defend mine honour?
    means scorn, thou untoward knave?
  BASTARD. Knight, knight, good mother, Basilisco-like.
    What! dubb'd; shoulder.
    But, mother, Sir Robert's son:
    disclaim'd Sir Robert land;
    Legitimation, name, gone.
    Then, good mother, father-
    proper man, hope. it, mother?
  LADY FAULCONBRIDGE. Hast thou denied thyself Faulconbridge?
  BASTARD. faithfully deny devil.
  LADY FAULCONBRIDGE. King Richard Coeur-de-lion thy father.
    long vehement suit seduc'd
    make room husband's bed.
    Heaven lay transgression charge!
    Thou art issue dear offence,
    strongly urg'd past defence.
  BASTARD. Now, light, again,  
    Madam, father.
    sins bear privilege earth,
    doth yours: fault folly;
    lay heart dispose,
    Subjected tribute commanding love,
    fury unmatched force
    aweless lion wage fight
    princely heart Richard's hand.
    perforce robs lions hearts
    easily win woman's. Ay, mother,
    heart thee father!
    lives dares thou didst well
    got, send soul hell.
    Come, lady, show thee kin;
    Richard begot,
    thou hadst nay, sin.
    was, lies; 'twas not.                 Exeunt
