ACT II. SCENE 1

France. Angiers

Enter, side, AUSTRIA forces; other, KING PHILIP FRANCE,
LEWIS Dauphin, CONSTANCE, ARTHUR, forces

  KING PHILIP. Angiers met, brave Austria.
    Arthur, great forerunner thy blood,
    Richard, robb'd lion heart
    fought holy wars Palestine,
    brave duke early grave;
    amends posterity,
    importance come
    spread colours, boy, thy behalf;
    rebuke usurpation
    thy unnatural uncle, English John.
    Embrace him, love him, give hither.
  ARTHUR. God forgive Coeur-de-lion's death
    give offspring life,
    Shadowing wings war.
    give powerless hand,  
    heart full unstained love;
    gates Angiers, Duke.
  KING PHILIP. noble boy! thee right?
  AUSTRIA. thy cheek lay zealous kiss
    seal indenture love:
    home return
    Till Angiers thou hast France,
    pale, white-fac'd shore,
    foot spurns back ocean's roaring tides
    coops lands islanders-
    till England, hedg'd main,
    water-walled bulwark, secure
    confident foreign purposes-
    till utmost corner west
    Salute thee king. Till then, fair boy,
    home, follow arms.
  CONSTANCE. O, mother's thanks, widow's thanks,
    Till strong hand give strength
    make requital love!
  AUSTRIA. peace heaven lift swords  
    charitable war.
  KING PHILIP. then, work! cannon bent
    brows resisting town;
    Call chiefest men discipline,
    cull plots advantages.
    lay town royal bones,
    Wade market-place Frenchmen's blood,
    make subject boy.
  CONSTANCE. Stay answer embassy,
    unadvis'd stain swords blood;
    Lord Chatillon England bring
    peace urge war,
    repent drop blood
    hot rash haste indirectly shed.

                  Enter CHATILLON

  KING PHILIP. wonder, lady! Lo, thy wish,
    messenger Chatillon arriv'd.
    England says, briefly, gentle lord;  
    coldly pause thee. Chatillon, speak.
  CHATILLON. turn forces paltry siege
    stir mightier task.
    England, impatient demands,
    Hath put arms. adverse winds,
    leisure stay'd, time
    land legions I;
    marches expedient town,
    forces strong, soldiers confident.
    mother-queen,
    Ate, stirring blood strife;
    Lady Blanch Spain;
    bastard king's deceas'd;
    th' unsettled humours land-
    Rash, inconsiderate, fiery voluntaries,
    ladies' faces fierce dragons' spleens-
    sold fortunes native homes,
    Bearing birthrights proudly backs,
    make hazard fortunes here.
    brief, braver choice dauntless spirits  
    English bottoms waft o'er
    float swelling tide
    offence scathe Christendom.             [Drum beats]
    interruption churlish drums
    Cuts circumstance: hand;
    parley fight, prepare.
  KING PHILIP. unlook'd expedition!
  AUSTRIA. unexpected, much
    awake endeavour defence,
    courage mounteth occasion.
    then; prepar'd.

       Enter KING JOHN, ELINOR, BLANCH, BASTARD,
                 PEMBROKE, others

  KING JOHN. Peace France, France peace permit
    lineal entrance own!
    not, bleed France, peace ascend heaven,
    Whiles we, God's wrathful agent, correct
    proud contempt beats peace heaven!  
  KING PHILIP. Peace England, war return
    France England, live peace!
    England love, England's sake
    burden armour sweat.
    toil work thine;
    thou loving England art far
    thou hast under-wrought lawful king,
    Cut sequence posterity,
    Outfaced infant state, rape
    maiden virtue crown.
    thy brother Geffrey's face:
    eyes, brows, moulded his;
    abstract doth large
    died Geffrey, hand time
    draw huge volume.
    Geffrey thy elder brother born,
    son; England Geffrey's right,
    Geffrey's. God,
    thou art call'd king,
    living blood doth temples beat  
    owe crown thou o'er-masterest?
  KING JOHN. hast thou great commission, France,
    draw answer thy articles?
  KING PHILIP. supernal judge stirs good thoughts
    breast strong authority
    blots stains right.
    judge hath made guardian boy,
    warrant impeach thy wrong,
    chastise it.
  KING JOHN. Alack, thou dost usurp authority.
  KING PHILIP. Excuse beat usurping down.
  ELINOR. thou dost call usurper, France?
  CONSTANCE. make answer: thy usurping son.
  ELINOR. Out, insolent! Thy bastard king,
    thou mayst queen check world!
  CONSTANCE. bed thy son true
    thine thy husband; boy
    Liker feature father Geffrey
    thou John manners-being Eke
    rain water, devil dam.  
    boy bastard! soul, think
    father true begot;
    be, thou wert mother.
  ELINOR. good mother, boy, blots thy father.
  CONSTANCE. good grandam, boy, blot thee.
  AUSTRIA. Peace!
  BASTARD. Hear crier.
  AUSTRIA. devil art thou?
  BASTARD. play devil, sir, you,
    'a catch hide alone.
    hare proverb goes,
    valour plucks dead lions beard;
    smoke skin-coat catch right;
    Sirrah, 't; i' faith will, i' faith.
  BLANCH. O, lion's robe
    disrobe lion robe!
  BASTARD. lies sightly back him
    great Alcides' shows ass;
    But, ass, burden back,
    lay make shoulders crack.  
  AUSTRIA. cracker deafs ears
    abundance superfluous breath?
    King Philip, determine straight.
  KING PHILIP. Women fools, break conference.
    King John, sum all:
    England Ireland, Anjou, Touraine, Maine,
    Arthur, claim thee;
    Wilt thou resign lay thy arms?
  KING JOHN. life soon. defy thee, France.
    Arthur Britaine, yield thee hand,
    dear love give thee more
    e'er coward hand France win.
    Submit thee, boy.
  ELINOR. thy grandam, child.
  CONSTANCE. Do, child, grandam, child;
    Give grandam kingdom, grandam will
    Give plum, cherry, fig.
    good grandam!
  ARTHUR. Good mother, peace!
    low laid grave:  
    worth coil made me.
  ELINOR. mother shames so, poor boy, weeps.
  CONSTANCE. shame you, whe'er no!
    grandam's wrongs, mother's shames,
    Draws heaven-moving pearls poor eyes,
    heaven nature fee;
    Ay, crystal beads heaven brib'd
    justice revenge you.
  ELINOR. Thou monstrous slanderer heaven earth!
  CONSTANCE. Thou monstrous injurer heaven earth,
    Call slanderer! Thou thine usurp
    dominations, royalties, rights,
    oppressed boy; thy eldest son's son,
    Infortunate thee.
    Thy sins visited poor child;
    canon law laid him,
    generation
    Removed thy sin-conceiving womb.
  KING JOHN. Bedlam, done.
  CONSTANCE. say-  
    plagued sin,
    God hath made sin plague
    removed issue, plagued her
    plague; sin injury,
    injury beadle sin;
    punish'd person child,
    her-a plague her!
  ELINOR. Thou unadvised scold, produce
    bars title thy son.
  CONSTANCE. Ay, doubts that? will, wicked will;
    woman's will; cank'red grandam's will!
  KING PHILIP. Peace, lady! pause, temperate.
    ill beseems presence cry aim
    ill-tuned repetitions.
    trumpet summon walls
    men Angiers; hear speak
    title admit, Arthur's John's.

      Trumpet sounds. Enter citizens walls
  
  CITIZEN. hath warn'd walls?
  KING PHILIP. 'Tis France, England.
  KING JOHN. England itself.
    men Angiers, loving subjects-
  KING PHILIP. loving men Angiers, Arthur's subjects,
    trumpet call'd gentle parle-
  KING JOHN. advantage; hear first.
    flags France, advanced here
    eye prospect town,
    march'd endamagement;
    cannons bowels full wrath,
    ready mounted spit forth
    iron indignation 'gainst walls;
    preparation bloody siege
    merciless proceeding French
    Confront city's eyes, winking gates;
    approach sleeping stones
    waist doth girdle about
    compulsion ordinance
    time fixed beds lime  
    dishabited, wide havoc made
    bloody power rush peace.
    sight lawful king,
    painfully expedient march
    brought countercheck gates,
    save unscratch'd city's threat'ned cheeks-
    Behold, French amaz'd vouchsafe parle;
    now, bullets wrapp'd fire,
    make shaking fever walls,
    shoot calm words folded smoke,
    make faithless error cars;
    trust accordingly, kind citizens,
    in-your King, labour'd spirits,
    Forwearied action swift speed,
    Craves harbourage city walls.
  KING PHILIP. said, make answer both.
    Lo, hand, protection
    divinely vow'd right
    holds, stands young Plantagenet,
    Son elder brother man,  
    king o'er enjoys;
    down-trodden equity tread
    warlike march greens town,
    enemy you
    constraint hospitable zeal
    relief oppressed child
    Religiously provokes. pleased then
    pay duty owe
    owes it, namely, young prince;
    arms, muzzled bear,
    Save aspect, hath offence seal'd up;
    cannons' malice vainly spent
    th' invulnerable clouds heaven;
    blessed unvex'd retire,
    unhack'd swords helmets unbruis'd,
    bear home lusty blood again
    spout town,
    leave children, wives, you, peace.
    fondly pass proffer'd offer,
    'Tis roundure old-fac'd walls  
    hide messengers war,
    English discipline
    harbour'd rude circumference.
    us, city call lord
    behalf challeng'd it;
    give signal rage,
    stalk blood possession?
  CITIZEN. brief: King England's subjects;
    him, right, hold town.
  KING JOHN. Acknowledge King, in.
  CITIZEN. not; proves King,
    prove loyal. Till time
    ramm'd gates world.
  KING JOHN. Doth crown England prove King?
    that, bring witnesses:
    fifteen thousand hearts England's breed-
  BASTARD. Bastards else.
  KING JOHN. verify title lives.
  KING PHILIP. well-born bloods those-
  BASTARD. bastards too.  
  KING PHILIP. Stand face contradict claim.
  CITIZEN. Till compound worthiest,
    worthiest hold both.
  KING JOHN. God forgive sin souls
    everlasting residence,
    dew evening fall fleet
    dreadful trial kingdom's king!
  KING PHILIP. Amen, Amen! Mount, chevaliers; arms!
  BASTARD. Saint George, swing'd dragon, e'er since
    Sits on's horse back mine hostess' door,
    Teach fence!  [To AUSTRIA]  Sirrah, home,
    den, sirrah, lioness,
    set ox-head lion's hide,
    make monster you.
  AUSTRIA. Peace! more.
  BASTARD. O, tremble, hear lion roar!
  KING JOHN. higher plain, set forth
    appointment regiments.
  BASTARD. Speed advantage field.
  KING PHILIP. so; hill  
    Command rest stand. God right!              Exeunt

    Here, excursions, enter HERALD FRANCE,
              trumpets, gates

  FRENCH HERALD. men Angiers, open wide gates
    young Arthur, Duke Britaine, in,
    hand France day hath made
    work tears English mother,
    sons lie scattered bleeding ground;
    widow's husband grovelling lies,
    Coldly embracing discoloured earth;
    victory loss doth play
    dancing banners French,
    hand, triumphantly displayed,
    enter conquerors, proclaim
    Arthur Britaine England's King yours.

         Enter ENGLISH HERALD, trumpet
  
  ENGLISH HERALD. Rejoice, men Angiers, ring bells:
    King John, king England's, doth approach,
    Commander hot malicious day.
    armours march'd silver-bright
    return gilt Frenchmen's blood.
    stuck plume English crest
    removed staff France;
    colours return hands
    display march'd forth;
    jolly troop huntsmen come
    lusty English, purpled hands,
    Dy'd dying slaughter foes.
    Open gates give victors way.
  CITIZEN. Heralds, tow'rs behold
    onset retire
    armies, equality
    eyes censured.
    Blood hath bought blood, blows answer'd blows;
    Strength match'd strength, power confronted power;
    alike, alike like.  
    prove greatest. weigh even,
    hold town neither, both.

    Enter KINGS, powers, doors

  KING JOHN. France, hast thou blood cast away?
    Say, current run on?
    passage, vex'd thy impediment,
    leave native channel o'erswell
    disturb'd thy confining shores,
    thou silver water keep
    peaceful progress ocean.
  KING PHILIP. England, thou hast sav'd drop blood
    hot trial France;
    Rather, lost more. hand swear,
    sways earth climate overlooks,
    lay just-borne arms,
    put thee down, 'gainst arms bear,
    add royal number dead,
    Gracing scroll tells war's loss  
    slaughter coupled kings.
  BASTARD. Ha, majesty! high thy glory tow'rs
    rich blood kings set fire!
    O, doth Death line dead chaps steel;
    swords soldiers teeth, fangs;
    feasts, mousing flesh men,
    undetermin'd differences kings.
    stand royal fronts amazed thus?
    Cry 'havoc!' kings; back stained field,
    equal potents, fiery kindled spirits!
    confusion part confirm
    other's peace. Till then, blows, blood, death!
  KING JOHN. party townsmen admit?
  KING PHILIP. Speak, citizens, England; king?
  CITIZEN. King England, King.
  KING PHILIP. hold right.
  KING JOHN. great deputy
    bear possession person here,
    Lord presence, Angiers, you.
  CITIZEN. greater pow'r denies this;  
    till undoubted, lock
    scruple strong-barr'd gates;
    King'd fears, fears, resolv'd,
    king purg'd depos'd.
  BASTARD. heaven, scroyles Angiers flout you, kings,
    stand securely battlements
    theatre, gape point
    industrious scenes acts death.
    royal presences rul'd me:
    mutines Jerusalem,
    friends awhile, conjointly bend
    sharpest deeds malice town.
    east west France England mount
    battering cannon, charged mouths,
    Till soul-fearing clamours brawl'd down
    flinty ribs contemptuous city.
    play incessantly jades,
    till unfenced desolation
    Leave naked vulgar air.
    done, dissever united strengths  
    part mingled colours again,
    Turn face face bloody point point;
    moment Fortune cull forth
    side happy minion,
    favour give day,
    kiss glorious victory.
    wild counsel, mighty states?
    Smacks policy?
  KING JOHN. Now, sky hangs heads,
    well. France, knit pow'rs
    lay Angiers ground;
    fight king it?
  BASTARD. thou hast mettle king,
    wrong'd peevish town,
    Turn thou mouth thy artillery,
    ours, saucy walls;
    dash'd ground,
    defy other, pell-mell
    Make work ourselves, heaven hell.
  KING PHILIP. so. Say, assault?  
  KING JOHN. west send destruction
    city's bosom.
  AUSTRIA. north.
  KING PHILIP. thunder south
    rain drift bullets town.
  BASTARD.  [Aside]  O prudent discipline! north south,
    Austria France shoot other's mouth.
    stir it.-Come, away, away!
  CITIZEN. Hear us, great kings: vouchsafe awhile stay,
    show peace fair-fac'd league;
    Win city stroke wound;
    Rescue breathing lives die beds
    sacrifices field.
    Persever not, hear me, mighty kings.
  KING JOHN. Speak favour; bent hear.
  CITIZEN. daughter Spain, Lady Blanch,
    niece England; years
    Lewis Dauphin lovely maid.
    lusty love quest beauty,
    find fairer Blanch?  
    zealous love search virtue,
    find purer Blanch?
    love ambitious sought match birth,
    veins bound richer blood Lady Blanch?
    is, beauty, virtue, birth,
    young Dauphin complete-
    complete of, she;
    nothing, want,
    he.
    half part blessed man,
    Left finished she;
    fair divided excellence,
    fulness perfection lies him.
    O, silver currents, join,
    glorify banks bound in;
    shores streams made one,
    controlling bounds, be, Kings,
    princes, marry them.
    union battery can
    fast-closed gates; match  
    swifter spleen powder enforce,
    mouth passage fling wide ope
    give entrance; match,
    sea enraged half deaf,
    Lions confident, mountains rocks
    free motion-no, Death himself
    mortal fury half peremptory
    city.
  BASTARD. stay
    shakes rotten carcass Death
    rags! large mouth, indeed,
    spits death mountains, rocks seas;
    Talks familiarly roaring lions
    maids thirteen puppy-dogs!
    cannoneer begot lusty blood?
    speaks plain cannon-fire, smoke bounce;
    bastinado tongue;
    ears cudgell'd; word his
    buffets fist France.
    Zounds! bethump'd words  
    call'd brother's father dad.
  ELINOR. Son, list conjunction, make match;
    Give niece dowry large enough;
    knot thou shalt surely tie
    Thy unsur'd assurance crown
    yon green boy sun ripe
    bloom promiseth mighty fruit.
    yielding France;
    Mark whisper. Urge souls
    capable ambition,
    zeal, melted windy breath
    soft petitions, pity, remorse,
    Cool congeal was.
  CITIZEN. answer double majesties
    friendly treaty threat'ned town?
  KING PHILIP. Speak England first, hath forward first
    speak city: you?
  KING JOHN. Dauphin there, thy princely son,
    book beauty read 'I love,'
    dowry weigh equal queen;  
    Anjou, fair Touraine, Maine, Poictiers,
    side sea-
    city besieg'd-
    Find liable crown dignity,
    gild bridal bed, make rich
    titles, honours, promotions,
    beauty, education, blood,
    Holds hand princess world.
  KING PHILIP. say'st thou, boy? lady's face.
  LEWIS. do, lord, eye find
    wonder, wondrous miracle,
    shadow form'd eye;
    Which, shadow son,
    sun, makes son shadow.
    protest lov'd myself
    Till infixed beheld myself
    Drawn flattering table eye.
                                               [Whispers BLANCH]
  BASTARD.  [Aside]  Drawn flattering table eye,
    Hang'd frowning wrinkle brow,  
    quarter'd heart-he doth espy
    love's traitor. pity now,
    hang'd drawn quarter'd be
    love vile lout he.
  BLANCH. uncle's respect mine.
    aught makes like,
    sees moves liking
    ease translate will;
    will, speak properly,
    enforce eas'ly love.
    flatter you, lord,
    worthy love,
    this: you-
    churlish thoughts judge-
    find merit hate.
  KING JOHN. young ones? you, niece?
  BLANCH. bound honour do
    wisdom vouchsafe say.
  KING JOHN. Speak then, Prince Dauphin; love lady?
  LEWIS. Nay, refrain love;  
    love unfeignedly.
  KING JOHN. give Volquessen, Touraine, Maine,
    Poictiers, Anjou, provinces,
    thee; addition more,
    Full thirty thousand marks English coin.
    Philip France, thou pleas'd withal,
    Command thy son daughter join hands.
  KING PHILIP. likes well; young princes, close hands.
  AUSTRIA. lips too; assur'd
    assur'd.
  KING PHILIP. Now, citizens Angiers, ope gates,
    amity made;
    Saint Mary's chapel presently
    rites marriage solemniz'd.
    Lady Constance troop?
    not; match made up
    presence interrupted much.
    son? me, knows.
  LEWIS. sad passionate Highness' tent.
  KING PHILIP. And, faith, league made  
    give sadness cure.
    Brother England, content
    widow lady? came;
    we, God knows, turn'd way,
    vantage.
  KING JOHN. heal all,
    create young Arthur Duke Britaine,
    Earl Richmond; rich fair town
    make lord of. Call Lady Constance;
    speedy messenger bid repair
    solemnity. trust shall,
    fill measure will,
    measure satisfy so
    stop exclamation.
    haste suffer us
    unlook'd-for, unprepared pomp.
                                           Exeunt BASTARD
  BASTARD. Mad world! mad kings! mad composition!
    John, stop Arthur's tide whole,
    Hath willingly departed part;  
    France, armour conscience buckled on,
    zeal charity brought field
    God's soldier, rounded ear
    purpose-changer, sly devil,
    broker breaks pate faith,
    daily break-vow, wins all,
    kings, beggars, men, young men, maids,
    external thing lose
    word 'maid,' cheats poor maid that;
    smooth-fac'd gentleman, tickling commodity,
    Commodity, bias world-
    world, peised well,
    Made run ground,
    Till advantage, vile-drawing bias,
    sway motion, commodity,
    Makes head indifferency,
    direction, purpose, course, intent-
    bias, commodity,
    bawd, broker, all-changing word,
    Clapp'd outward eye fickle France,  
    Hath drawn determin'd aid,
    resolv'd honourable war,
    base vile-concluded peace.
    rail commodity?
    hath woo'd yet;
    power clutch hand
    fair angels salute palm,
    hand, unattempted yet,
    poor beggar raileth rich.
    Well, whiles beggar, rail
    sin rich;
    rich, virtue be
    vice beggary.
    kings break faith commodity,
    Gain, lord, worship thee.                   Exit

ACT III. SCENE 1.

France. FRENCH KING'S camp

Enter CONSTANCE, ARTHUR, SALISBURY

  CONSTANCE. married! swear peace!
    False blood false blood join'd! friends!
    Lewis Blanch, Blanch provinces?
    so; thou hast misspoke, misheard;
    advis'd, o'er thy tale again.
    be; thou dost 'tis so;
    trust trust thee, thy word
    vain breath common man:
    thee, man;
    king's oath contrary.
    Thou shalt punish'd frighting me,
    sick capable fears,
    Oppress'd wrongs, full fears;
    widow, husbandless, subject fears;
    woman, naturally born fears;
    thou confess thou didst jest,  
    vex'd spirits truce,
    quake tremble day.
    dost thou shaking thy head?
    dost thou sadly son?
    means hand breast thine?
    holds thine eye lamentable rheum,
    proud river peering o'er bounds?
    sad signs confirmers thy words?
    speak again-not thy tale,
    word, thy tale true.
  SALISBURY. true false
    give prove true.
  CONSTANCE. O, thou teach sorrow,
    Teach thou sorrow make die;
    belief life encounter so
    doth fury desperate men
    meeting fall die!
    Lewis marry Blanch! O boy, art thou?
    France friend England; me?
    Fellow, gone: brook thy sight;  
    news hath made thee ugly man.
  SALISBURY. harm I, good lady, done
    spoke harm done?
  CONSTANCE. harm heinous is
    makes harmful speak it.
  ARTHUR. beseech you, madam, content.
  CONSTANCE. thou bid'st content wert grim,
    Ugly, sland'rous thy mother's womb,
    Full unpleasing blots sightless stains,
    Lame, foolish, crooked, swart, prodigious,
    Patch'd foul moles eye-offending marks,
    care, content;
    love thee; no, thou
    thy great birth, deserve crown.
    thou art fair, thy birth, dear boy,
    Nature Fortune join'd make thee great:
    Nature's gifts thou mayst lilies boast,
    half-blown rose; Fortune, O!
    corrupted, chang'd, won thee;
    Sh' adulterates hourly thine uncle John,  
    golden hand hath pluck'd France
    tread fair respect sovereignty,
    made majesty bawd theirs.
    France bawd Fortune King John-
    strumpet Fortune, usurping John!
    me, thou fellow, France forsworn?
    Envenom words, thee gone
    leave woes alone
    bound under-bear.
  SALISBURY. Pardon me, madam,
    kings.
  CONSTANCE. Thou mayst, thou shalt; thee;
    instruct sorrows proud,
    grief proud, makes owner stoop.
    me, state great grief,
    kings assemble; grief's great
    supporter huge firm earth
    hold up.                     [Seats ground]
    sorrows sit;
    throne, bid kings bow it.  

       Enter KING JOHN, KING PHILIP, LEWIS, BLANCH,
       ELINOR, BASTARD, AUSTRIA, attendants

  KING PHILIP. 'Tis true, fair daughter, blessed day
    France festival.
    solemnize day glorious sun
    Stays plays alchemist,
    Turning splendour precious eye
    meagre cloddy earth glittering gold.
    yearly brings day about
    holiday.
  CONSTANCE.  [Rising]  wicked day, holy day!
    hath day deserv'd? hath done
    golden letters set
    high tides calendar?
    Nay, turn day week,
    day shame, oppression, perjury;
    Or, stand still, wives child
    Pray burdens fall day,  
    hopes prodigiously cross'd;
    day seamen fear wreck;
    bargains break day made;
    day, things begun ill end,
    Yea, faith hollow falsehood change!
  KING PHILIP. heaven, lady, cause
    curse fair proceedings day.
    pawn'd majesty?
  CONSTANCE. beguil'd counterfeit
    Resembling majesty, which, touch'd tried,
    Proves valueless; forsworn, forsworn;
    arms spill mine enemies' blood,
    arms strengthen yours.
    grappling vigour rough frown war
    cold amity painted peace,
    oppression hath made league.
    Arm, arm, heavens, perjur'd kings!
    widow cries: husband me, heavens!
    hours ungodly day
    Wear day peace; but, ere sunset,  
    Set armed discord 'twixt perjur'd kings!
    Hear me, O, hear me!
  AUSTRIA. Lady Constance, peace!
  CONSTANCE. War! war! peace! Peace war.
    O Lymoges! O Austria! thou dost shame
    bloody spoil. Thou slave, thou wretch, thou coward!
    Thou valiant, great villainy!
    Thou strong stronger side!
    Thou Fortune's champion dost fight
    humorous ladyship by
    teach thee safety! Thou art perjur'd too,
    sooth'st greatness. fool art thou,
    ramping fool, brag stamp swear
    party! Thou cold-blooded slave,
    Hast thou spoke thunder side,
    sworn soldier, bidding depend
    thy stars, thy fortune, thy strength,
    dost thou fall foes?
    Thou wear lion's hide! Doff shame,
    hang calf's-skin recreant limbs.  
  AUSTRIA. O man speak words me!
  BASTARD. hang calf's-skin recreant limbs.
  AUSTRIA. Thou dar'st so, villain, thy life.
  BASTARD. hang calf's-skin recreant limbs.
  KING JOHN. this: thou dost forget thyself.

                  Enter PANDULPH

  KING PHILIP. holy legate Pope.
  PANDULPH. Hail, anointed deputies heaven!
    thee, King John, holy errand is.
    Pandulph, fair Milan cardinal,
    Pope Innocent legate here,
    religiously demand
    thou Church, holy mother,
    wilfully dost spurn; force perforce
    Stephen Langton, chosen Archbishop
    Canterbury, holy see?
    This, foresaid holy father's name,
    Pope Innocent, demand thee.  
  KING JOHN. earthly interrogatories
    task free breath sacred king?
    Thou canst not, Cardinal, devise name
    slight, unworthy, ridiculous,
    charge answer, Pope.
    tale, mouth England
    Add more, Italian priest
    tithe toll dominions;
    heaven supreme head,
    So, great supremacy,
    reign uphold,
    th' assistance mortal hand.
    Pope, reverence set apart
    usurp'd authority.
  KING PHILIP. Brother England, blaspheme this.
  KING JOHN. kings Christendom
    led grossly meddling priest,
    Dreading curse money buy out,
    merit vile gold, dross, dust,
    Purchase corrupted pardon man,  
    sale sells pardon himself-
    rest, grossly led,
    juggling witchcraft revenue cherish;
    alone, oppose
    Pope, count friends foes.
  PANDULPH. lawful power have
    Thou shalt stand curs'd excommunicate;
    blessed doth revolt
    allegiance heretic;
    meritorious hand call'd,
    Canonized, worshipp'd saint,
    takes secret course
    Thy hateful life.
  CONSTANCE. O, lawful be
    room Rome curse awhile!
    Good father Cardinal, cry thou 'amen'
    keen curses; wrong
    tongue hath power curse right.
  PANDULPH. law warrant, lady, curse.
  CONSTANCE. mine too; law right,  
    lawful law bar wrong;
    Law give child kingdom here,
    holds kingdom holds law;
    Therefore, law perfect wrong,
    law forbid tongue curse?
  PANDULPH. Philip France, peril curse,
    hand arch-heretic,
    raise power France head,
    submit Rome.
  ELINOR. Look'st thou pale, France? thy hand.
  CONSTANCE. that, devil, France repent
    disjoining hands hell lose soul.
  AUSTRIA. King Philip, listen Cardinal.
  BASTARD. hang calf's-skin recreant limbs.
  AUSTRIA. Well, ruffian, pocket wrongs,
    Because-
  BASTARD. breeches carry them.
  KING JOHN. Philip, say'st thou Cardinal?
  CONSTANCE. say, Cardinal?
  LEWIS. Bethink you, father; difference  
    purchase heavy curse Rome
    light loss England friend.
    Forgo easier.
  BLANCH. curse Rome.
  CONSTANCE. O Lewis, stand fast! devil tempts thee here
    likeness untrimmed bride.
  BLANCH. Lady Constance speaks faith,
    need.
  CONSTANCE. O, thou grant need,
    lives death faith,
    infer principle-
    faith live death need.
    O then, tread need, faith mounts up:
    up, faith trodden down!
  KING JOHN. King mov'd, answers this.
  CONSTANCE. O remov'd him, answer well!
  AUSTRIA. so, King Philip; hang doubt.
  BASTARD. Hang calf's-skin, sweet lout.
  KING PHILIP. perplex'd say.
  PANDULPH. canst thou perplex thee more,  
    thou stand excommunicate curs'd?
  KING PHILIP. Good reverend father, make person yours,
    bestow yourself.
    royal hand mine newly knit,
    conjunction souls
    Married league, coupled link'd together
    religious strength sacred vows;
    latest breath gave sound words
    deep-sworn faith, peace, amity, true love,
    kingdoms royal selves;
    truce, before,
    longer wash hands,
    clap royal bargain peace,
    Heaven knows, besmear'd overstain'd
    slaughter's pencil, revenge paint
    fearful difference incensed kings.
    hands, purg'd blood,
    newly join'd love, strong both,
    Unyoke seizure kind regreet?
    Play fast loose faith? jest heaven,  
    Make unconstant children ourselves,
    snatch palm palm,
    Unswear faith sworn, marriage-bed
    smiling peace march bloody host,
    make riot gentle brow
    true sincerity? O, holy sir,
    reverend father, so!
    grace, devise, ordain, impose,
    gentle order; blest
    pleasure, continue friends.
  PANDULPH. form formless, order orderless,
    Save opposite England's love.
    Therefore, arms! champion church,
    church, mother, breathe curse-
    mother's curse-on revolting son.
    France, thou mayst hold serpent tongue,
    chafed lion mortal paw,
    fasting tiger safer tooth,
    peace hand thou dost hold.
  KING PHILIP. disjoin hand, faith.  
  PANDULPH. mak'st thou faith enemy faith;
    like. civil war set'st oath oath.
    Thy tongue thy tongue. O, thy vow
    made heaven, heaven perform'd,
    is, champion Church.
    thou swor'st sworn thyself
    performed thyself,
    thou hast sworn amiss
    amiss done;
    done, ill,
    truth it;
    act purposes mistook
    mistake again; indirect,
    indirection grows direct,
    falsehood cures, fire cools fire
    scorched veins new-burn'd.
    religion doth make vows kept;
    thou hast sworn religion
    thou swear'st thing thou swear'st,
    mak'st oath surety thy truth  
    oath; truth thou art unsure
    swear swears forsworn;
    mockery swear!
    thou dost swear forsworn;
    forsworn thou dost swear.
    thy vows thy first
    thyself rebellion thyself;
    conquest canst thou make
    arm thy constant thy nobler parts
    giddy loose suggestions;
    part pray'rs in,
    thou vouchsafe them. not, know
    peril curses fight thee
    heavy thou shalt shake off,
    despair die black weight.
  AUSTRIA. Rebellion, flat rebellion!
  BASTARD. Will't be?
    calf's-skin stop mouth thine?
  LEWIS. Father, arms!
  BLANCH. thy wedding-day?  
    blood thou hast married?
    What, feast slaughtered men?
    braying trumpets loud churlish drums,
    Clamours hell, measures pomp?
    O husband, hear me! ay, alack, new
    'husband' mouth! name,
    till time tongue ne'er pronounce,
    knee beg, arms
    mine uncle.
  CONSTANCE. O, knee,
    Made hard kneeling, pray thee,
    Thou virtuous Dauphin, alter doom
    Forethought heaven!
  BLANCH. thy love. motive may
    stronger thee wife?
  CONSTANCE. upholdeth thee upholds,
    honour. O, thine honour, Lewis, thine honour!
  LEWIS. muse Majesty doth cold,
    profound respects pull on.
  PANDULPH. denounce curse head.  
  KING PHILIP. Thou shalt need. England, fall thee.
  CONSTANCE. O fair return banish'd majesty!
  ELINOR. O foul revolt French inconstancy!
  KING JOHN. France, thou shalt rue hour hour.
  BASTARD. Time clock-setter, bald sexton Time,
    will? then, France rue.
  BLANCH. sun's o'ercast blood. Fair day, adieu!
    side withal?
    both: army hath hand;
    rage, hold both,
    whirl asunder dismember me.
    Husband, pray thou mayst win;
    Uncle, pray thou mayst lose;
    Father, fortune thine;
    Grandam, thy wishes thrive.
    wins, side lose:
    Assured loss match play'd.
  LEWIS. Lady, me, thy fortune lies.
  BLANCH. fortune lives, life dies.
  KING JOHN. Cousin, draw puissance together.  
                                                         Exit BASTARD
    France, burn'd inflaming wrath,
    rage heat hath condition
    allay, blood,
    blood, dearest-valu'd blood, France.
  KING PHILIP. Thy rage burn thee up, thou shalt turn
    ashes, ere blood quench fire.
    thyself, thou art jeopardy.
  KING JOHN. threats. arms hie!
                                                     Exeunt severally




SCENE 2.

France. Plains Angiers

Alarums, excursions. Enter BASTARD AUSTRIA'S head

  BASTARD. Now, life, day grows wondrous hot;
    airy devil hovers sky
    pours mischief. Austria's head lie there,
    Philip breathes.

          Enter KING JOHN, ARTHUR, HUBERT

  KING JOHN. Hubert, boy. Philip, make up:
    mother assailed tent,
    ta'en, fear.
  BASTARD. lord, rescued her;
    Highness safety, fear not;
    on, liege, pains
    bring labour happy end.                    Exeunt




SCENE 3.

France. Plains Angiers

Alarums, excursions, retreat. Enter KING JOHN, ELINOR, ARTHUR,
the BASTARD, HUBERT, LORDS

  KING JOHN.  [To ELINOR]  be; Grace stay
      behind,
    strongly guarded.  [To ARTHUR]  Cousin, sad;
    Thy grandam loves thee, thy uncle will
    dear thee thy father was.
  ARTHUR. O, make mother die grief!
  KING JOHN.  [To BASTARD]  Cousin, England! haste
      before,
    And, ere coming, thou shake bags
    hoarding abbots; imprisoned angels
    Set liberty; fat ribs peace
    hungry fed upon.
    commission utmost force.
  BASTARD. Bell, book, candle, drive back,
    gold silver becks on.  
    leave Highness. Grandam, pray,
    remember holy,
    fair safety. So, kiss hand.
  ELINOR. Farewell, gentle cousin.
  KING JOHN. Coz, farewell.
                                                         Exit BASTARD
  ELINOR. hither, kinsman; hark, word.
  KING JOHN. hither, Hubert. O gentle Hubert,
    owe thee much! wall flesh
    soul counts thee creditor,
    advantage means pay thy love;
    And, good friend, thy voluntary oath
    Lives bosom, dearly cherished.
    Give thy hand. thing say-
    fit time.
    heaven, Hubert, asham'd
    good respect thee.
  HUBERT. bounden Majesty.
  KING JOHN. Good friend, thou hast yet,
    thou shalt have; creep time ne'er slow,  
    thee good.
    thing say-but go:
    sun heaven, proud day,
    Attended pleasures world,
    wanton full gawds
    give audience. midnight bell
    iron tongue brazen mouth
    Sound drowsy race night;
    churchyard stand,
    thou possessed thousand wrongs;
    surly spirit, melancholy,
    bak'd thy blood made heavy-thick,
    runs tickling veins,
    Making idiot, laughter, men's eyes
    strain cheeks idle merriment,
    passion hateful purposes;
    thou couldst eyes,
    Hear thine cars, make reply
    tongue, conceit alone,
    eyes, ears, harmful sound words-  
    Then, brooded watchful day,
    thy bosom pour thoughts.
    But, ah, not! love thee well;
    And, troth, thou lov'st well.
  HUBERT. bid undertake,
    death adjunct act,
    heaven, it.
  KING JOHN. thou wouldst?
    Good Hubert, Hubert, Hubert, throw thine eye
    yon young boy. thee what, friend,
    serpent way;
    wheresoe'er foot mine doth tread,
    lies me. Dost thou understand me?
    Thou art keeper.
  HUBERT. so
    offend Majesty.
  KING JOHN. Death.
  HUBERT. lord?
  KING JOHN. grave.
  HUBERT. live.  
  KING JOHN. Enough!
    merry now. Hubert, love thee.
    Well, intend thee.
    Remember. Madam, fare well;
    send powers o'er Majesty.
  ELINOR. blessing thee!
  KING JOHN.  [To ARTHUR]  England, cousin, go;
    Hubert man, attend you
    true duty. Calais, ho!                  Exeunt




SCENE 4.

France. FRENCH KING's camp

Enter KING PHILIP, LEWIS, PANDULPH, attendants

  KING PHILIP. roaring tempest flood
    armado convicted sail
    scattered disjoin'd fellowship.
  PANDULPH. Courage comfort! well.
  KING PHILIP. well, run ill.
    beaten? Angiers lost?
    Arthur ta'en prisoner? Divers dear friends slain?
    bloody England England gone,
    O'erbearing interruption, spite France?
  LEWIS. hath won, hath fortified;
    hot speed advice dispos'd,
    temperate order fierce cause,
    Doth example; hath read heard
    kindred action this?
  KING PHILIP. bear England praise,
    find pattern shame.  

                   Enter CONSTANCE

    here! grave soul;
    Holding th' eternal spirit, will,
    vile prison afflicted breath.
    prithee, lady, me.
  CONSTANCE. Lo now! issue peace!
  KING PHILIP. Patience, good lady! Comfort, gentle Constance!
  CONSTANCE. No, defy counsel, redress,
    ends counsel, true redress-
    Death, death; O amiable lovely death!
    Thou odoriferous stench! sound rottenness!
    Arise couch lasting night,
    Thou hate terror prosperity,
    kiss thy detestable bones,
    put eyeballs thy vaulty brows,
    ring fingers thy household worms,
    stop gap breath fulsome dust,
    carrion monster thyself.  
    Come, grin me, thou smil'st,
    buss thee thy wife. Misery's love,
    O, me!
  KING PHILIP. O fair affliction, peace!
  CONSTANCE. No, no, not, breath cry.
    O tongue thunder's mouth!
    passion shake world,
    rouse sleep fell anatomy
    hear lady's feeble voice,
    scorns modern invocation.
  PANDULPH. Lady, utter madness sorrow.
  CONSTANCE. Thou art holy belie so.
    mad: hair tear mine;
    Constance; Geffrey's wife;
    Young Arthur son, lost.
    mad-I heaven were!
    'tis forget myself.
    O, could, grief forget!
    Preach philosophy make mad,
    thou shalt canoniz'd, Cardinal;  
    For, mad, grief,
    reasonable part produces reason
    deliver'd woes,
    teaches kill hang myself.
    mad forget son,
    madly babe clouts he.
    mad; well, feel
    plague calamity.
  KING PHILIP. Bind tresses. O, love note
    fair multitude hairs!
    chance silver drop hath fall'n,
    drop ten thousand wiry friends
    glue sociable grief,
    true, inseparable, faithful loves,
    Sticking calamity.
  CONSTANCE. England, will.
  KING PHILIP. Bind hairs.
  CONSTANCE. Yes, will; wherefore it?
    tore bonds, cried aloud
    'O hands redeem son,  
    hairs liberty!'
    envy liberty,
    commit bonds,
    poor child prisoner.
    And, father Cardinal, heard say
    friends heaven;
    true, boy again;
    birth Cain, male child,
    yesterday suspire,
    gracious creature born.
    canker sorrow eat bud
    chase native beauty cheek,
    hollow ghost,
    dim meagre ague's fit;
    die; and, rising again,
    meet court heaven
    him. never, never
    behold pretty Arthur more.
  PANDULPH. hold heinous respect grief.
  CONSTANCE. talks son.  
  KING PHILIP. fond grief child.
  CONSTANCE. Grief fills room absent child,
    Lies bed, walks me,
    Puts pretty looks, repeats words,
    Remembers gracious parts,
    Stuffs vacant garments form;
    reason fond grief.
    Fare well; loss I,
    give comfort do.
    form head,
                                                   [Tearing hair]
    disorder wit.
    O Lord! boy, Arthur, fair son!
    life, joy, food, ail world!
    widow-comfort, sorrows' cure!                      Exit
  KING PHILIP. fear outrage, follow her.         Exit
  LEWIS. world make joy.
    Life tedious twice-told tale
    Vexing dull ear drowsy man;
    bitter shame hath spoil'd sweet world's taste,  
    yields nought shame bitterness.
  PANDULPH. curing strong disease,
    instant repair health,
    fit strongest; evils leave
    departure show evil;
    lost losing day?
  LEWIS. days glory, joy, happiness.
  PANDULPH. won it, had.
    No, no; Fortune means men good,
    threat'ning eye.
    'Tis strange King John hath lost
    accounts won.
    griev'd Arthur prisoner?
  LEWIS. heartily glad hath him.
  PANDULPH. mind youthful blood.
    hear speak prophetic spirit;
    breath speak
    blow dust, straw, rub,
    path directly lead
    Thy foot England's throne. mark:  
    John hath seiz'd Arthur; be
    That, whiles warm life plays infant's veins,
    misplac'd John entertain hour,
    minute, nay, quiet breath rest.
    sceptre snatch'd unruly hand
    boisterously maintain'd gain'd,
    stands slipp'ry place
    Makes nice vile hold stay up;
    John stand then, Arthur fall;
    it, so.
  LEWIS. gain young Arthur's fall?
  PANDULPH. You, Lady Blanch wife,
    make claim Arthur did.
  LEWIS. lose it, life all, Arthur did.
  PANDULPH. green fresh world!
    John lays plots; times conspire you;
    steeps safety true blood
    find bloody safety untrue.
    act, evilly borne, cool hearts
    people freeze zeal,  
    small advantage step forth
    check reign cherish it;
    natural exhalation sky,
    scope nature, distemper'd day,
    common wind, customed event,
    pluck natural cause
    call meteors, prodigies, signs,
    Abortives, presages, tongues heaven,
    Plainly denouncing vengeance John.
  LEWIS. touch young Arthur's life,
    hold safe prisonment.
  PANDULPH. O, Sir, hear approach,
    young Arthur already,
    news dies; hearts
    people revolt him,
    kiss lips unacquainted change,
    pick strong matter revolt wrath
    bloody fingers' ends john.
    Methinks hurly foot;
    And, O, matter breeds  
    nam'd! bastard Faulconbridge
    England ransacking Church,
    Offending charity; dozen French
    arms, can
    train ten thousand English side;
    snow, tumbled about,
    Anon mountain. O noble Dauphin,
    King. 'Tis wonderful
    wrought discontent,
    souls topful offence.
    England go; whet King.
  LEWIS. Strong reasons makes strong actions. go;
    ay, King no.                   Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE 1.

England. castle

Enter HUBERT EXECUTIONERS

  HUBERT. Heat irons hot; thou stand
    arras. strike foot
    bosom ground, rush forth
    bind boy find me
    Fast chair. heedful; hence, watch.
  EXECUTIONER. hope warrant bear deed.
  HUBERT. Uncleanly scruples! Fear you. to't.
                                                  Exeunt EXECUTIONERS
    Young lad, forth; you.

                    Enter ARTHUR

  ARTHUR. Good morrow, Hubert.
  HUBERT. Good morrow, Prince.
  ARTHUR. prince, great tide
    prince, be. sad.  
  HUBERT. merrier.
  ARTHUR. Mercy me!
    Methinks body sad I;
    Yet, remember, France,
    Young gentlemen sad night,
    wantonness. christendom,
    prison sheep,
    merry day long;
    doubt
    uncle practises harm me;
    afraid me, him.
    fault Geffrey's son?
    No, indeed, ist not; heaven
    son, love me, Hubert.
  HUBERT.  [Aside]  talk him, innocent prate
    awake mercy, lies dead;
    sudden dispatch.
  ARTHUR. sick, Hubert? pale to-day;
    sooth, sick,
    sit night watch you.  
    warrant love me.
  HUBERT.  [Aside]  words possession bosom.-
    Read here, young Arthur.                        [Showing paper]
      [Aside]  now, foolish rheum!
    Turning dispiteous torture door!
    brief, resolution drop
    mine eyes tender womanish tears.-
    read it? fair writ?
  ARTHUR. fairly, Hubert, foul effect.
    hot irons burn mine eyes?
  HUBERT. Young boy, must.
  ARTHUR. you?
  HUBERT. will.
  ARTHUR. heart? head ache,
    knit handkerchief brows-
    had, princess wrought me-
    again;
    hand midnight held head;
    And, watchful minutes hour,
    anon cheer'd heavy time,  
    'What lack you?' 'Where lies grief?'
    'What good love perform you?'
    poor man's son lyen still,
    ne'er spoke loving word you;
    sick service prince.
    Nay, love crafty love,
    call cunning. Do, will.
    heaven pleas'd ill,
    Why, must. put mine eyes,
    eyes shall
    frown you?
  HUBERT. sworn it;
    hot irons burn out.
  ARTHUR. Ah, iron age it!
    iron itself, heat red-hot,
    Approaching eyes drink tears,
    quench fiery indignation
    matter mine innocence;
    Nay, that, consume rust
    fire harm mine eye.  
    stubborn-hard hammer'd iron?
    angel me
    told Hubert put mine eyes,
    believ'd him-no tongue Hubert's.
  HUBERT.  [Stamps]  forth.

     Re-enter EXECUTIONERS, cord, irons, etc.

    bid do.
  ARTHUR. O, save me, Hubert, save me! eyes out
    fierce bloody men.
  HUBERT. Give iron, say, bind here.
  ARTHUR. Alas, boist'rous rough?
    struggle, stand stone-still.
    heaven sake, Hubert, bound!
    Nay, hear me, Hubert! Drive men away,
    sit quiet lamb;
    stir, wince, speak word,
    iron angrily;
    Thrust men away, forgive you,  
    torment put to.
  HUBERT. Go, stand within; him.
  EXECUTIONER. pleas'd deed.
                                                  Exeunt EXECUTIONERS
  ARTHUR. Alas, chid friend!
    hath stern gentle heart.
    back, compassion may
    Give life yours.
  HUBERT. Come, boy, prepare yourself.
  ARTHUR. remedy?
  HUBERT. None, lose eyes.
  ARTHUR. O heaven, mote yours,
    grain, dust, gnat, wandering hair,
    annoyance precious sense!
    Then, feeling small things boisterous there,
    vile intent horrible.
  HUBERT. promise? to, hold tongue.
  ARTHUR. Hubert, utterance brace tongues
    pleading pair eyes.
    hold tongue, not, Hubert;  
    Or, Hubert, will, cut tongue,
    mine eyes. O, spare mine eyes,
    you!
    Lo, troth, instrument cold
    harm me.
  HUBERT. heat it, boy.
  ARTHUR. No, good sooth; fire dead grief,
    create comfort, us'd
    undeserved extremes. yourself:
    malice burning coal;
    breath heaven hath blown spirit out,
    strew'd repentant ashes head.
  HUBERT. breath revive it, boy.
  ARTHUR. do, make blush
    glow shame proceedings, Hubert.
    Nay, perchance sparkle eyes,
    And, dog compell'd fight,
    Snatch master doth tarre on.
    things wrong
    Deny office; lack  
    mercy fierce fire iron extends,
    Creatures note mercy-lacking uses.
  HUBERT. Well, live; touch thine eye
    treasure thine uncle owes.
    sworn, purpose, boy,
    iron burn out.
  ARTHUR. O, Hubert! while
    disguis'd.
  HUBERT. Peace; more. Adieu.
    uncle dead:
    fill dogged spies false reports;
    And, pretty child, sleep doubtless secure
    Hubert, wealth world,
    offend thee.
  ARTHUR. O heaven! you, Hubert.
  HUBERT. Silence; more. closely me.
    danger undergo thee.                         Exeunt




SCENE 2.

England. KING JOHN'S palace

Enter KING JOHN, PEMBROKE, SALISBURY, LORDS

  KING JOHN. sit, crown'd,
    look'd upon, hope, cheerful eyes.
  PEMBROKE. again, Highness pleas'd,
    superfluous: crown'd before,
    high royalty ne'er pluck'd off,
    faiths men ne'er stained revolt;
    Fresh expectation troubled land
    long'd-for change state.
  SALISBURY. Therefore, possess'd double pomp,
    guard title rich before,
    gild refined gold, paint lily,
    throw perfume violet,
    smooth ice, add hue
    rainbow, taper-light
    seek beauteous eye heaven garnish,
    wasteful ridiculous excess.
  PEMBROKE. royal pleasure done,
    act ancient tale told  
    And, repeating, troublesome,
    urged time unseasonable.
  SALISBURY. antique well-noted face
    plain form disfigured;
    shifted wind sail
    makes thoughts fetch about,
    Startles frights consideration,
    Makes sound opinion sick, truth suspected,
    putting fashion'd robe.
  PEMBROKE. workmen strive well,
    confound skill covetousness;
    oftentimes excusing fault
    Doth make fault worse th' excuse,
    patches set breach
    Discredit hiding fault
    fault patch'd.
  SALISBURY. effect, new-crown'd,
    breath'd counsel; pleas'd Highness
    overbear it; pleas'd,
    part  
    Doth make stand Highness will.
  KING JOHN. reasons double coronation
    possess'd with, strong;
    more, strong, lesser fear,
    indue with. Meantime ask
    reform'd well,
    perceive willingly
    hear grant requests.
  PEMBROKE. I, tongue these,
    sound purposes hearts,
    them- but, chief all,
    safety, them
    Bend studies, heartily request
    Th' enfranchisement Arthur, restraint
    Doth move murmuring lips discontent
    break dangerous argument:
    rest hold,
    fears-which, say, attend
    steps wrong-should move mew up
    tender kinsman, choke days  
    barbarous ignorance, deny youth
    rich advantage good exercise?
    time's enemies this
    grace occasions, suit
    bid liberty;
    goods ask
    weal, depending,
    Counts weal liberty.
  KING JOHN. so. commit youth
    direction.

                     Enter HUBERT

    [Aside]  Hubert, news you?
  PEMBROKE. man bloody deed:
    show'd warrant friend mine;
    image wicked heinous fault
    Lives eye; close aspect his
    Doth show mood troubled breast,
    fearfully 'tis  
    fear'd charge do.
  SALISBURY. colour King doth go
    purpose conscience,
    heralds 'twixt dreadful battles set.
    passion ripe break.
  PEMBROKE. breaks, fear issue thence
    foul corruption sweet child's death.
  KING JOHN. hold mortality's strong hand.
    Good lords, give living,
    suit demand dead:
    tells Arthur deceas'd to-night.
  SALISBURY. Indeed, fear'd sickness past cure.
  PEMBROKE. Indeed, heard death was,
    child felt sick.
    answer'd hence.
  KING JOHN. bend solemn brows me?
    bear shears destiny?
    commandment pulse life?
  SALISBURY. apparent foul-play; 'tis shame
    greatness grossly offer it.  
    thrive game! so, farewell.
  PEMBROKE. Stay yet, Lord Salisbury, thee
    find th' inheritance poor child,
    kingdom forced grave.
    blood ow'd breadth isle
    foot doth hold-bad world while!
    borne: break out
    sorrows, ere long doubt.            Exeunt LORDS
  KING JOHN. burn indignation. repent.
    foundation set blood,
    life achiev'd others' death.

                 Enter MESSENGER

    fearful eye thou hast; blood
    inhabit cheeks?
    foul sky clears storm.
    Pour thy weather-how France?
  MESSENGER. France England. pow'r
    foreign preparation  
    levied body land.
    copy speed learn'd them,
    told prepare,
    tidings arriv'd.
  KING JOHN. O, hath intelligence drunk?
    hath slept? mother's care,
    army drawn France,
    hear it?
  MESSENGER. liege, ear
    stopp'd dust: April died
    noble mother; hear, lord,
    Lady Constance frenzy died
    days before; rumour's tongue
    idly heard-if true false not.
  KING JOHN. Withhold thy speed, dreadful occasion!
    O, make league me, till pleas'd
    discontented peers! What! mother dead!
    wildly walks estate France!
    conduct pow'rs France
    thou truth giv'st landed here?  
  MESSENGER. Dauphin.
  KING JOHN. Thou hast made giddy
    tidings.

         Enter BASTARD PETER POMFRET

    Now! world
    proceedings? seek stuff
    head ill news, fun.
  BASTARD. afear'd hear worst,
    worst, unheard, fall head.
  KING JOHN. Bear me, cousin, amaz'd
    tide; breathe again
    Aloft flood, give audience
    tongue, speak will.
  BASTARD. sped clergymen
    sums collected express.
    travell'd land,
    find people strangely fantasied;
    Possess'd rumours, full idle dreams.  
    knowing fear, full fear;
    prophet brought me
    streets Pomfret, found
    hundreds treading heels;
    sung, rude harsh-sounding rhymes,
    That, ere Ascension-day noon,
    Highness deliver crown.
  KING JOHN. Thou idle dreamer, wherefore didst thou so?
  PETER. Foreknowing truth fall so.
  KING JOHN. Hubert, him; imprison him;
    day noon whereon says
    yield crown hang'd.
    Deliver safety; return,
    thee.
                                               Exit HUBERT PETER
    O gentle cousin,
    Hear'st thou news abroad, arriv'd?
  BASTARD. French, lord; men's mouths full it;
    Besides, met Lord Bigot Lord Salisbury,
    eyes red new-enkindled fire,  
    more, seek grave
    Arthur, kill'd to-night
    suggestion.
  KING JOHN. Gentle kinsman, go
    thrust thyself companies.
    loves again;
    Bring me.
  BASTARD. seek out.
  KING JOHN. Nay, make haste; foot before.
    O, subject enemies
    adverse foreigners affright towns
    dreadful pomp stout invasion!
    Mercury, set feathers thy heels,
    fly thought again.
  BASTARD. spirit time teach speed.
  KING JOHN. Spoke sprightful noble gentleman.
                                                         Exit BASTARD
    him; need
    messenger betwixt peers;
    thou he.  
  MESSENGER. heart, liege.                        Exit
  KING JOHN. mother dead!

                   Re-enter HUBERT

  HUBERT. lord, moons to-night;
    fixed, whirl about
    wondrous motion.
  KING JOHN. moons!
  HUBERT. men beldams streets
    prophesy dangerously;
    Young Arthur's death common mouths;
    talk him, shake heads,
    whisper ear;
    speaks doth gripe hearer's wrist,
    Whilst hears makes fearful action
    wrinkled brows, nods, rolling eyes.
    smith stand hammer, thus,
    whilst iron anvil cool,
    open mouth swallowing tailor's news;  
    Who, shears measure hand,
    Standing slippers, nimble haste
    falsely thrust contrary feet,
    Told thousand warlike French
    embattailed rank'd Kent.
    lean unwash'd artificer
    Cuts tale, talks Arthur's death.
  KING JOHN. seek'st thou possess fears?
    urgest thou oft young Arthur's death?
    Thy hand hath murd'red him. mighty cause
    dead, thou hadst kill him.
  HUBERT. had, lord! Why, provoke me?
  KING JOHN. curse kings attended
    slaves humours warrant
    break bloody house life,
    winking authority
    understand law; meaning
    dangerous majesty, perchance frowns
    humour advis'd respect.
  HUBERT. hand seal did.  
  KING JOHN. O, account 'twixt heaven earth
    made, hand seal
    Witness damnation!
    oft sight means ill deeds
    Make deeds ill done! Hadst thou by,
    fellow hand nature mark'd,
    Quoted sign'd deed shame,
    murder mind;
    But, taking note thy abhorr'd aspect,
    Finding thee fit bloody villainy,
    Apt, liable employ'd danger,
    faintly broke thee Arthur's death;
    thou, endeared king,
    Made conscience destroy prince.
  HUBERT. lord-
  KING JOHN. Hadst thou shook thy head made pause,
    spake darkly purposed,
    turn'd eye doubt face,
    bid tale express words,
    Deep shame struck dumb, made break off,  
    thy fears wrought fears me.
    thou didst understand signs,
    didst signs parley sin;
    Yea, stop, didst thy heart consent,
    thy rude hand act
    deed tongues held vile name.
    sight, more!
    nobles leave me; state braved,
    gates, ranks foreign pow'rs;
    Nay, body fleshly land,
    kingdom, confine blood breath,
    Hostility civil tumult reigns
    conscience cousin's death.
  HUBERT. Arm enemies,
    make peace soul you.
    Young Arthur alive. hand mine
    maiden innocent hand,
    painted crimson spots blood.
    bosom ent'red yet
    dreadful motion murderous thought  
    slander'd nature form,
    Which, howsoever rude exteriorly,
    cover fairer mind
    butcher innocent child.
  KING JOHN. Doth Arthur live? O, haste thee peers,
    Throw report incensed rage
    make tame obedience!
    Forgive comment passion made
    thy feature; rage blind,
    foul imaginary eyes blood
    Presented thee hideous thou art.
    O, answer not; closet bring
    angry lords expedient haste.
    conjure thee slowly; run fast.                  Exeunt




SCENE 3.

England. castle

Enter ARTHUR, walls

  ARTHUR. wall high, leap down.
    Good ground, pitiful hurt not!
    me; did,
    ship-boy's semblance hath disguis'd quite.
    afraid; venture it.
    break limbs,
    find thousand shifts away.
    good die go, die stay.              [Leaps down]
    O me! uncle's spirit stones.
    Heaven soul, England bones!
    [Dies]

          Enter PEMBROKE, SALISBURY, BIGOT

  SALISBURY. Lords, meet Saint Edmundsbury;
    safety, embrace  
    gentle offer perilous time.
  PEMBROKE. brought letter Cardinal?
  SALISBURY. Count Melun, noble lord France,
    private Dauphin's love
    general lines import.
  BIGOT. To-morrow morning meet then.
  SALISBURY. set forward; 'twill be
    long days' journey, lords, ere meet.

                 Enter BASTARD

  BASTARD. to-day met, distemper'd lords!
    King requests presence straight.
  SALISBURY. King hath dispossess'd us.
    line thin bestained cloak
    pure honours, attend foot
    leaves print blood where'er walks.
    Return so. worst.
  BASTARD. Whate'er think, good words, think, best.
  SALISBURY. griefs, manners, reason now.  
  BASTARD. reason grief;
    'twere reason manners now.
  PEMBROKE. Sir, sir, impatience hath privilege.
  BASTARD. 'Tis true-to hurt master, man else.
  SALISBURY. prison. lies here?
  PEMBROKE. O death, made proud pure princely beauty!
    earth hole hide deed.
  SALISBURY. Murder, hating hath done,
    Doth lay open urge revenge.
  BIGOT. Or, doom'd beauty grave,
    Found precious-princely grave.
  SALISBURY. Sir Richard, you? beheld,
    read heard, think?
    think, see,
    see? thought, object,
    Form another? top,
    height, crest, crest crest,
    murder's arms; bloodiest shame,
    wildest savagery, vilest stroke,
    wall-ey'd wrath staring rage  
    Presented tears soft remorse.
  PEMBROKE. murders past stand excus'd this;
    this, sole unmatchable,
    give holiness, purity,
    unbegotten sin times,
    prove deadly bloodshed jest,
    Exampled heinous spectacle.
  BASTARD. damned bloody work;
    graceless action heavy hand,
    work hand.
  SALISBURY. work hand!
    kind light ensue.
    shameful work Hubert's hand;
    practice purpose King;
    obedience forbid soul
    Kneeling ruin sweet life,
    breathing breathless excellence
    incense vow, holy vow,
    taste pleasures world,
    infected delight,  
    conversant ease idleness,
    Till set glory hand
    giving worship revenge.
  PEMBROKE. BIGOT. souls religiously confirm thy words.

                     Enter HUBERT

  HUBERT. Lords, hot haste seeking you.
    Arthur doth live; King hath you.
  SALISBURY. O, bold, blushes death!
    Avaunt, thou hateful villain, thee gone!
  HUBERT. villain.
  SALISBURY. rob law?                  [Drawing sword]
  BASTARD. sword bright, sir; put again.
  SALISBURY. till sheathe murderer's skin.
  HUBERT. Stand back, Lord Salisbury, stand back, say;
    heaven, sword's sharp yours.
    you, lord, forget yourself,
    tempt danger true defence;
    I, marking rage, forget  
    worth, greatness nobility.
  BIGOT. Out, dunghill! Dar'st thou brave nobleman?
  HUBERT. life; dare defend
    innocent life emperor.
  SALISBURY. Thou art murderer.
  HUBERT. prove so.
    none. tongue soe'er speaks false,
    speaks; speaks truly, lies.
  PEMBROKE. Cut pieces.
  BASTARD. peace, say.
  SALISBURY. Stand by, gall you, Faulconbridge.
  BASTARD. Thou wert gall devil, Salisbury.
    thou frown me, stir thy foot,
    teach thy hasty spleen shame,
    strike thee dead. Put thy sword betime;
    maul toasting-iron
    devil hell.
  BIGOT. wilt thou do, renowned Faulconbridge?
    villain murderer?
  HUBERT. Lord Bigot, none.  
  BIGOT. kill'd prince?
  HUBERT. 'Tis hour left well.
    honour'd him, lov'd him, weep
    date life sweet life's loss.
  SALISBURY. Trust cunning waters eyes,
    villainy rheum;
    he, long traded it, makes seem
    rivers remorse innocency.
    me, souls abhor
    Th' uncleanly savours slaughter-house;
    stifled smell sin.
  BIGOT. Bury, Dauphin there!
  PEMBROKE. King inquire out.
                                                         Exeunt LORDS
  BASTARD. good world! Knew fair work?
    infinite boundless reach
    mercy, thou didst deed death,
    Art thou damn'd, Hubert.
  HUBERT. hear me, sir.
  BASTARD. Ha! thee what:  
    Thou'rt damn'd black-nay, black-
    Thou art deep damn'd Prince Lucifer;
    ugly fiend hell
    thou shalt be, thou didst kill child.
  HUBERT. soul-
  BASTARD. thou didst consent
    cruel act, despair;
    thou want'st cord, smallest thread
    spider twisted womb
    serve strangle thee; rush beam
    hang thee on; wouldst thou drown thyself,
    Put water spoon
    ocean,
    stifle villain up
    suspect thee grievously.
  HUBERT. act, consent, sin thought,
    guilty stealing sweet breath
    embounded beauteous clay,
    hell pains torture me!
    left well.  
  BASTARD. Go, bear thine arms.
    amaz'd, methinks, lose way
    thorns dangers world.
    easy dost thou England up!
    morsel dead royalty
    life, right, truth realm
    fled heaven; England left
    tug scamble, part th' teeth
    unowed interest proud-swelling state.
    bare-pick'd bone majesty
    Doth dogged war bristle angry crest
    snarleth gentle eyes peace;
    powers home discontents home
    Meet line; vast confusion waits,
    doth raven sick-fall'n beast,
    imminent decay wrested pomp.
    happy cloak cincture can
    Hold tempest. Bear child,
    follow speed. King;
    thousand businesses hand,  
    heaven doth frown land.                Exeunt

ACT V. SCENE 1.
England. KING JOHN'S palace

Enter KING JOHN, PANDULPH, attendants

  KING JOHN. yielded hand
    circle glory.
  PANDULPH.  [Gives back crown]  again
    hand, holding Pope,
    sovereign greatness authority.
  KING JOHN. holy word; meet French;
    Holiness power
    stop marches fore inflam'd.
    discontented counties revolt;
    people quarrel obedience,
    Swearing allegiance love soul
    stranger blood, foreign royalty.
    inundation mistemp'red humour
    Rests qualified.
    pause not; present time's sick
    present med'cine minist'red  
    overthrow incurable ensues.
  PANDULPH. breath blew tempest up,
    stubborn usage Pope;
    gentle convertite,
    tongue hush storm war
    make fair weather blust'ring land.
    Ascension-day, remember well,
    oath service Pope,
    make French lay arms.                 Exit
  KING JOHN. Ascension-day? prophet
    Ascension-day noon
    crown give off? have.
    suppose constraint;
    But, heaven thank'd, voluntary.

                 Enter BASTARD

  BASTARD. Kent hath yielded; holds out
    Dover Castle. London hath receiv'd,
    kind host, Dauphin powers.  
    nobles hear you, gone
    offer service enemy;
    wild amazement hurries down
    number doubtful friends.
  KING JOHN. lords return again
    heard young Arthur alive?
    BASTARD. found dead, cast streets,
    empty casket, jewel life
    damn'd hand robbed ta'en away.
  KING JOHN. villain Hubert told live.
  BASTARD. So, soul, did, aught knew.
    wherefore droop? sad?
    great act, thought;
    world fear sad distrust
    Govern motion kingly eye.
    stirring time; fire fire;
    Threaten threat'ner, outface brow
    bragging horror; inferior eyes,
    borrow behaviours great,
    Grow great put  
    dauntless spirit resolution.
    Away, glister god war
    intendeth field;
    Show boldness aspiring confidence.
    What, seek lion den,
    fright there, make tremble there?
    O, said! Forage, run
    meet displeasure farther doors
    grapple ere nigh.
  KING JOHN. legate Pope hath me,
    made happy peace him;
    hath promis'd dismiss powers
    Led Dauphin.
  BASTARD. O inglorious league!
    we, footing land,
    Send fair-play orders, make compromise,
    Insinuation, parley, base truce,
    arms invasive? beardless boy,
    cock'red silken wanton, brave fields
    flesh spirit warlike soil,  
    Mocking air colours idly spread,
    find check? us, liege, arms.
    Perchance Cardinal make peace;
    Or, do, said
    purpose defence.
  KING JOHN. thou ordering present time.
  BASTARD. Away, then, good courage!
    Yet, know
    party meet prouder foe.                     Exeunt




SCENE 2.
England. DAUPHIN'S camp Saint Edmundsbury

Enter, arms, LEWIS, SALISBURY, MELUN, PEMBROKE, BIGOT, soldiers

  LEWIS. Lord Melun, copied out
    safe remembrance;
    Return precedent lords again,
    That, fair order written down,
    we, perusing o'er notes,
    wherefore sacrament,
    faiths firm inviolable.
  SALISBURY. sides broken.
    And, noble Dauphin, albeit swear
    voluntary zeal unurg'd faith
    proceedings; yet, me, Prince,
    glad sore time
    seek plaster contemn'd revolt,
    heal inveterate canker wound
    making many. O, grieves soul  
    draw metal side
    widow-maker! O, there
    honourable rescue defence
    Cries Salisbury!
    infection time
    That, health physic right,
    deal hand
    stern injustice confused wrong.
    is't pity, O grieved friends!
    we, sons children isle,
    born sad hour this;
    step stranger-march
    gentle bosom, fill up
    enemies' ranks-I withdraw weep
    spot enforced cause-
    grace gentry land remote
    follow unacquainted colours here?
    What, here? O nation, thou couldst remove!
    Neptune's arms, clippeth thee about,
    bear thee knowledge thyself  
    grapple thee pagan shore,
    Christian armies combine
    blood malice vein league,
    spend unneighbourly!
  LEWIS. noble temper dost thou show this;
    great affections wrestling thy bosom
    Doth make earthquake nobility.
    O, noble combat hast thou fought
    compulsion brave respect!
    wipe honourable dew
    silverly doth progress thy cheeks.
    heart hath melted lady's tears,
    ordinary inundation;
    effusion manly drops,
    show'r, blown tempest soul,
    Startles mine eyes makes amaz'd
    vaulty top heaven
    Figur'd o'er burning meteors.
    Lift thy brow, renowned Salisbury,
    great heart heave storm;  
    Commend waters baby eyes
    giant world enrag'd,
    met fortune feasts,
    Full warm blood, mirth, gossiping.
    Come, come; thou shalt thrust thy hand deep
    purse rich prosperity
    Lewis himself. So, nobles, all,
    knit sinews strength mine.

                Enter PANDULPH

    there, methinks, angel spake:
    holy legate apace,
    give warrant hand heaven
    actions set right
    holy breath.
  PANDULPH. Hail, noble prince France!
    this: King John hath reconcil'd
    Rome; spirit in,
    stood holy Church,  
    great metropolis Rome.
    thy threat'ning colours wind up
    tame savage spirit wild war,
    That, lion fostered hand,
    lie gently foot peace
    harmful show.
  LEWIS. Grace pardon me, back:
    high-born propertied,
    secondary control,
    serving-man instrument
    sovereign state world.
    breath kindled dead coal wars
    chastis'd kingdom myself
    brought matter feed fire;
    'tis huge blown out
    weak wind enkindled it.
    taught face right,
    Acquainted interest land,
    Yea, thrust enterprise heart;
    ye John hath made  
    peace Rome? peace me?
    I, honour marriage-bed,
    young Arthur, claim land mine;
    And, half-conquer'd, back
    John hath made peace Rome?
    Rome's slave? penny hath Rome borne,
    men provided, munition sent,
    underprop action? 't I
    undergo charge? I,
    claim liable,
    Sweat business maintain war?
    heard islanders shout out
    'Vive le roi!' bank'd towns?
    cards game
    easy match, play'd crown?
    give o'er yielded set?
    No, no, soul, said.
  PANDULPH. work.
  LEWIS. inside, return
    Till attempt glorified  
    ample hope promised
    drew gallant head war,
    cull'd fiery spirits world
    outlook conquest, renown
    jaws danger death.
                                                     [Trumpet sounds]
    lusty trumpet doth summon us?

             Enter BASTARD, attended

  BASTARD. fair play world,
    audience: speak.
    holy lord Milan, King
    come, learn dealt him;
    And, answer, scope
    warrant limited tongue.
  PANDULPH. Dauphin wilful-opposite,
    temporize entreaties;
    flatly lay arms.
  BASTARD. blood fury breath'd,  
    youth well. hear English King;
    royalty doth speak me.
    prepar'd, reason should.
    apish unmannerly approach,
    harness'd masque unadvised revel
    unhair'd sauciness boyish troops,
    King doth smile at; prepar'd
    whip dwarfish war, pigmy arms,
    circle territories.
    hand strength, door.
    cudgel make hatch,
    dive buckets concealed wells,
    crouch litter stable planks,
    lie pawns lock'd chests trunks,
    hug swine, seek sweet safety out
    vaults prisons, thrill shake
    crying nation's crow,
    Thinking voice armed Englishman-
    victorious hand feebled here
    chambers gave chastisement?  
    No. gallant monarch arms
    eagle o'er aery tow'rs
    souse annoyance nest.
    degenerate, ingrate revolts,
    bloody Neroes, ripping womb
    dear mother England, blush shame;
    ladies pale-visag'd maids,
    Amazons, tripping drums,
    thimbles armed gauntlets change,
    needles lances, gentle hearts
    fierce bloody inclination.
  LEWIS. end thy brave, turn thy face peace;
    grant thou canst outscold us. Fare thee well;
    hold time precious spent
    brabbler.
  PANDULPH. Give leave speak.
  BASTARD. No, speak.
  LEWIS. attend neither.
    Strike drums; tongue war,
    Plead interest here.  
  BASTARD. Indeed, drums, beaten, cry out;
    you, beaten. start
    echo clamour thy drum,
    hand drum ready brac'd
    reverberate loud thine:
    Sound another, shall,
    loud thine, rattle welkin's ear
    mock deep-mouth'd thunder; hand-
    trusting halting legate here,
    hath us'd sport need-
    warlike John; forehead sits
    bare-ribb'd death, office day
    feast thousands French.
  LEWIS. Strike drums find danger out.
  BASTARD. thou shalt find it, Dauphin, doubt.
    Exeunt




SCENE 3.

England. field battle

Alarums. Enter KING JOHN HUBERT

  KING JOHN. day us? O, me, Hubert.
  HUBERT. Badly, fear. fares Majesty?
  KING JOHN. fever hath troubled long
    Lies heavy me. O, heart sick!

                  Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. lord, valiant kinsman, Faulconbridge,
    Desires Majesty leave field
    send word go.
  KING JOHN. him, Swinstead, abbey there.
  MESSENGER. good comfort; great supply
    expected Dauphin here
    wreck'd nights ago Goodwin Sands;
    news brought Richard now.
    French fight coldly, retire themselves.  
  KING JOHN. Ay me, tyrant fever burns up
    good news.
    Set Swinstead; litter straight;
    Weakness possesseth me, faint.                    Exeunt




SCENE 4.

England. part battlefield

Enter SALISBURY, PEMBROKE, BIGOT

  SALISBURY. King stor'd friends.
  PEMBROKE. again; put spirit French;
    miscarry, miscarry too.
  SALISBURY. misbegotten devil, Faulconbridge,
    spite spite, upholds day.
  PEMBROKE. King John, sore sick, hath left field.

                 Enter MELUN, wounded

  MELUN. Lead revolts England here.
  SALISBURY. happy names.
  PEMBROKE. Count Melun.
  SALISBURY. Wounded death.
  MELUN. Fly, noble English, bought sold;
    Unthread rude eye rebellion,
    home discarded faith.  
    Seek King John, fall feet;
    French lords loud day,
    means recompense pains take
    cutting heads. hath sworn,
    him, moe me,
    altar Saint Edmundsbury;
    altar swore you
    Dear amity everlasting love.
  SALISBURY. possible? true?
  MELUN. hideous death view,
    Retaining quantity life,
    bleeds form wax
    Resolveth figure 'gainst fire?
    world make deceive,
    lose deceit?
    false, true
    die here, live truth?
    again, Lewis day,
    forsworn e'er eyes yours
    Behold day break east;  
    night, black contagious breath
    smokes burning crest
    old, feeble, day-wearied sun,
    ill night, breathing expire,
    Paying fine rated treachery
    treacherous fine lives.
    Lewis assistance win day.
    Commend Hubert, King;
    love him-and respect besides,
    grandsire Englishman-
    Awakes conscience confess this.
    lieu whereof, pray you, bear hence
    noise rumour field,
    remnant thoughts
    peace, part body soul
    contemplation devout desires.
  SALISBURY. thee; beshrew soul
    love favour form
    fair occasion, which
    untread steps damned flight,  
    bated retired flood,
    Leaving rankness irregular course,
    Stoop low bounds o'erlook'd,
    calmly run obedience
    ocean, great King John.
    arm give thee bear thee hence;
    cruel pangs death
    thine eye. Away, friends! flight,
    happy newness, intends right.
                                            Exeunt, leading MELUN




SCENE 5.

England. French camp

Enter LEWIS train

  LEWIS. sun heaven, methought, loath set,
    stay'd made western welkin blush,
    English measure backward ground
    faint retire. O, bravely off,
    volley needless shot,
    bloody toil, bid good night;
    wound tott'ring colours up,
    field lords it!

                 Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. prince, Dauphin?
  LEWIS. Here; news?
  MESSENGER. Count Melun slain; English lords
    persuasion fall'n off,
    supply, wish'd long,  
    cast sunk Goodwin Sands.
  LEWIS. Ah, foul shrewd news! Beshrew thy heart!
    sad to-night
    hath made me. said
    King John fly hour before
    stumbling night part weary pow'rs?
  MESSENGER. spoke it, true, lord.
  LEWIS. good quarter good care to-night;
    day I
    fair adventure to-morrow.                    Exeunt




SCENE 6.

An open place wear Swinstead Abbey

Enter BASTARD HUBERT, severally

  HUBERT. there? Speak, ho! speak quickly, shoot.
  BASTARD. friend. art thou?
  HUBERT. part England.
  BASTARD. dost thou go?
  HUBERT. thee? demand
    thine affairs thou mine?
  BASTARD. Hubert, think.
  HUBERT. Thou hast perfect thought.
    hazards believe
    Thou art friend know'st tongue well.
    art thou?
  BASTARD. thou wilt. thou please,
    Thou mayst befriend think
    Plantagenets.
  HUBERT. Unkind remembrance! thou eyeless night
    shame. Brave soldier, pardon  
    accent breaking thy tongue
    scape true acquaintance mine ear.
  BASTARD. Come, come; sans compliment, news abroad?
  HUBERT. Why, walk black brow night
    find out.
  BASTARD. Brief, then; news?
  HUBERT. O, sweet sir, news fitting night,
    Black, fearful, comfortless, horrible.
  BASTARD. Show wound ill news;
    woman, swoon it.
  HUBERT. King, fear, poison'd monk;
    left speechless broke out
    acquaint evil, might
    arm sudden time
    leisure this.
  BASTARD. it; taste him?
  HUBERT. monk, you; resolved villain,
    bowels suddenly burst out. King
    speaks, peradventure recover.
  BASTARD. didst thou leave tend Majesty?  
  HUBERT. Why, not? lords back,
    brought Prince Henry company;
    request King hath pardon'd them,
    Majesty.
  BASTARD. Withhold thine indignation, mighty heaven,
    tempt bear power!
    thee, Hubert, half power night,
    Passing flats, tide-
    Lincoln Washes devoured them;
    Myself, well-mounted, escap'd.
    Away, before! conduct King;
    doubt dead ere come.                     Exeunt




SCENE 7.

The orchard Swinstead Abbey

Enter PRINCE HENRY, SALISBURY, BIGOT

  PRINCE HENRY. late; life blood
    touch'd corruptibly, pure brain.
    suppose soul's frail dwelling-house,
    Doth idle comments makes
    Foretell ending mortality.

                   Enter PEMBROKE

  PEMBROKE. Highness doth speak, holds belief
    That, brought open air,
    allay burning quality
    fell poison assaileth him.
  PRINCE HENRY. brought orchard here.
    Doth rage?                                    Exit BIGOT
  PEMBROKE. patient
    left him; sung.  
  PRINCE HENRY. O vanity sickness! Fierce extremes
    continuance feel themselves.
    Death, prey'd outward parts,
    Leaves invisible, siege now
    mind, pricks wounds
    legions strange fantasies,
    Which, throng press hold,
    Confound themselves. 'Tis strange death sing.
    cygnet pale faint swan
    chants doleful hymn death,
    organ-pipe frailty sings
    soul body lasting rest.
  SALISBURY. good comfort, Prince; born
    set form indigest
    hath left shapeless rude.

       Re-enter BIGOT attendants, bring in
                KING JOHN chair

  KING JOHN. Ay, marry, soul hath elbow-room;  
    windows doors.
    hot summer bosom
    bowels crumble dust.
    scribbled form drawn pen
    parchment, fire
    shrink up.
  PRINCE HENRY. fares Majesty?
  KING JOHN. Poison'd-ill-fare! Dead, forsook, cast off;
    bid winter come
    thrust icy fingers maw,
    kingdom's rivers course
    burn'd bosom, entreat north
    make bleak winds kiss parched lips
    comfort cold. much;
    beg cold comfort; strait
    ingrateful deny that.
  PRINCE HENRY. O virtue tears,
    relieve you!
  KING JOHN. salt hot.
    hell; poison  
    fiend confin'd tyrannize
    unreprievable condemned blood.

                 Enter BASTARD

  BASTARD. O, scalded violent motion
    spleen speed Majesty!
  KING JOHN. O cousin, thou art set mine eye!
    tackle heart crack'd burnt,
    shrouds wherewith life sail
    turned thread, hair;
    heart hath poor string stay by,
    holds till thy news uttered;
    thou seest clod
    module confounded royalty.
  BASTARD. Dauphin preparing hitherward,
    God answer him;
    night part pow'r,
    advantage remove,
    Washes unwarily  
    Devoured unexpected flood.                 [The KING dies]
  SALISBURY. breathe dead news dead ear.
    liege! lord! king-now thus.
  PRINCE HENRY. run on, stop.
    surety world, hope, stay,
    king, clay?
  BASTARD. Art thou so? stay behind
    office thee revenge,
    soul wait thee heaven,
    earth hath thy servant still.
    Now, now, stars move spheres,
    pow'rs? Show mended faiths,
    instantly return again
    push destruction perpetual shame
    weak door fainting land.
    Straight seek, straight sought;
    Dauphin rages heels.
  SALISBURY. not, then, we:
    Cardinal Pandulph rest,
    half hour Dauphin,  
    brings offers peace
    honour respect take,
    purpose presently leave war.
  BASTARD. sees
    sinewed defence.
  SALISBURY. Nay, 'tis manner already;
    carriages hath dispatch'd
    sea-side, put quarrel
    disposing Cardinal;
    yourself, myself, lords,
    meet, afternoon post
    consummate business happily.
  BASTARD. so. you, noble Prince,
    princes spar'd,
    wait father's funeral.
  PRINCE HENRY. Worcester body interr'd;
    will'd it.
  BASTARD. Thither it, then;
    happily sweet put on
    lineal state glory land!  
    whom, submission, knee
    bequeath faithful services
    true subjection everlastingly.
  SALISBURY. tender love make,
    rest spot evermore.
  PRINCE HENRY. kind soul give thanks,
    tears.
  BASTARD. O, pay time needful woe,
    hath griefs.
    England did, shall,
    Lie proud foot conqueror,
    wound itself.
    princes home again,
    corners world arms,
    shock them. Nought make rue,
    England rest true.                     Exeunt

THE END

THE TRAGEDY JULIUS CAESAR

by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  JULIUS CAESAR, Roman statesman general
  OCTAVIUS, Triumvir Caesar's death, Augustus Caesar,
    emperor Rome
  MARK ANTONY, general friend Caesar, Triumvir death
  LEPIDUS, member Triumvirate
  MARCUS BRUTUS, leader conspiracy Caesar
  CASSIUS, instigator conspiracy
  CASCA,          conspirator Caesar
  TREBONIUS,           "          "     "
