SCENE: Rome, conspirators' camp Sardis,  plains Philippi.


ACT I. SCENE I.
Rome. street.

Enter Flavius, Marullus, Commoners.

  FLAVIUS. Hence, home, idle creatures, home.
    holiday? What, not,
    mechanical, walk
    laboring day sign
    profession? Speak, trade art thou?
  COMMONER. Why, sir, carpenter.
  MARULLUS. thy leather apron thy rule?
    dost thou thy apparel on?
    You, sir, trade you?
  COMMONER. Truly, sir, respect fine workman, am
    but, say, cobbler.
  MARULLUS. trade art thou? Answer directly.
  COMMONER. trade, sir, that, hope, safe
    conscience, indeed, sir, mender bad soles.
  MARULLUS. trade, thou knave? Thou naughty knave, trade?
  COMMONER. Nay, beseech you, sir, me; yet,
    out, sir, mend you.  
  MARULLUS. mean'st thou that? Mend me, thou saucy fellow!
  COMMONER. Why, sir, cobble you.
  FLAVIUS. Thou art cobbler, art thou?
  COMMONER. Truly, Sir, live awl; I
    meddle tradesman's matters, women's matters, with
    awl. indeed, sir, surgeon shoes; in
    great danger, recover them. proper men trod upon
    neat's leather handiwork.
  FLAVIUS. wherefore art thy shop today?
    dost thou lead men streets?
  COMMONER. Truly, sir, wear shoes myself
    work. indeed, sir, make holiday Caesar
    rejoice triumph.
  MARULLUS. Wherefore rejoice? conquest brings home?
    tributaries follow Rome
    grace captive bonds chariot wheels?
    blocks, stones, worse senseless things!
    O hard hearts, cruel men Rome,
    Knew Pompey? time oft
    climb'd walls battlements,  
    towers windows, yea, chimney tops,
    infants arms, sat
    livelong day patient expectation
    great Pompey pass streets Rome.
    chariot appear,
    made universal shout
    Tiber trembled underneath banks
    hear replication sounds
    Made concave shores?
    put attire?
    cull holiday?
    strew flowers way
    triumph Pompey's blood?
    gone!
    Run houses, fall knees,
    Pray gods intermit plague
    light ingratitude.
  FLAVIUS. Go, go, good countrymen, and, fault,
    Assemble poor men sort,
    Draw Tiber banks, weep tears  
    channel, till lowest stream
    kiss exalted shores all.
                                           Exeunt Commoners.
    basest metal moved;
    vanish tongue-tied guiltiness.
    Capitol;
    I. Disrobe images
    find deck'd ceremonies.
  MARULLUS. so?
    feast Lupercal.
  FLAVIUS. matter; images
    hung Caesar's trophies. about
    drive vulgar streets;
    too, perceive thick.
    growing feathers pluck'd Caesar's wing
    make fly ordinary pitch,
    soar view men
    servile fearfulness.              Exeunt.




SCENE II.
A public place.

Flourish. Enter Caesar; Antony, course; Calpurnia, Portia,
Decius, Cicero, Brutus, Cassius, Casca; great crowd follows,
among Soothsayer.

  CAESAR. Calpurnia!
  CASCA. Peace, ho! Caesar speaks.
                                                   Music ceases.
  CAESAR. Calpurnia!
  CALPURNIA. Here, lord.
  CAESAR. Stand directly Antonio's way,
    doth run course. Antonio!
  ANTONY. Caesar, lord?
  CAESAR. Forget speed, Antonio,
    touch Calpurnia, elders say
    barren, touched holy chase,
    Shake sterile curse.
  ANTONY. remember.
    Caesar "Do this," perform'd.
  CAESAR. Set on, leave ceremony out.           Flourish.  
  SOOTHSAYER. Caesar!
  CAESAR. Ha! calls?
  CASCA. Bid noise still. Peace again!
  CAESAR. press calls me?
    hear tongue, shriller music,
    Cry "Caesar." Speak, Caesar turn'd hear.
  SOOTHSAYER. Beware ides March.
  CAESAR. man that?
  BRUTUS. soothsayer beware ides March.
  CAESAR. Set face.
  CASSIUS. Fellow, throng; Caesar.
  CAESAR. say'st thou now? Speak again.
  SOOTHSAYER. Beware ides March.
  CAESAR. dreamer; leave him. Pass.
                      Sennet. Exeunt Brutus Cassius.
  CASSIUS. order course?
  BRUTUS. I.
  CASSIUS. pray you, do.
  BRUTUS. gamesome; lack part
    quick spirit Antony.  
    hinder, Cassius, desires;
    leave you.
  CASSIUS. Brutus, observe late;
    eyes gentleness
    show love wont have;
    bear stubborn strange hand
    friend loves you.
  BRUTUS. Cassius,
    deceived; veil'd look,
    turn trouble countenance
    myself. Vexed am
    late passions difference,
    Conceptions proper myself,
    give soil behaviors;
    good friends grieved-
    number, Cassius, one-
    construe neglect
    poor Brutus war
    Forgets shows love men.
  CASSIUS. Then, Brutus, mistook passion,  
    means whereof breast mine hath buried
    Thoughts great value, worthy cogitations.
    me, good Brutus, face?
  BRUTUS. No, Cassius, eye sees itself
    reflection, things.
  CASSIUS. 'Tis just,
    lamented, Brutus,
    mirrors turn
    hidden worthiness eye
    shadow. heard
    respect Rome,
    immortal Caesar, speaking Brutus
    groaning underneath age's yoke,
    wish'd noble Brutus eyes.
  BRUTUS. dangers lead me, Cassius,
    seek myself
    me?
  CASSIUS. Therefore, good Brutus, prepared hear,
    yourself
    reflection, glass  
    modestly discover yourself
    of.
    jealous me, gentle Brutus;
    common laugher, use
    stale ordinary oaths love
    protester, know
    fawn men hug hard
    scandal them, know
    profess banqueting
    rout, hold dangerous.
                                             Flourish shout.
  BRUTUS. means shouting? fear people
    Choose Caesar king.
  CASSIUS. Ay, fear it?
    so.
  BRUTUS. not, Cassius, love well.
    wherefore hold long?
    impart me?
    aught general good,
    Set honor eye death i'  
    indifferently.
    gods speed love
    honor fear death.
  CASSIUS. virtue you, Brutus,
    outward favor.
    Well, honor subject story.
    men
    life, but, single self,
    lief live be
    awe thing myself.
    born free Caesar, you;
    fed well, both
    Endure winter's cold he.
    once, raw gusty day,
    troubled Tiber chafing shores,
    Caesar me, "Darest thou, Cassius, now
    Leap angry flood
    swim yonder point?" word,
    Accoutred was, plunged in
    bade follow. did.  
    torrent roar'd, buffet it
    lusty sinews, throwing aside
    stemming hearts controversy.
    ere arrive point proposed,
    Caesar cried, "Help me, Cassius, sink!
    I, Aeneas great ancestor
    flames Troy shoulder
    Anchises bear, waves Tiber
    tired Caesar. man
    god, Cassius is
    wretched creature bend body
    Caesar carelessly nod him.
    fever Spain,
    fit mark
    shake. 'Tis true, god shake;
    coward lips color fly,
    eye bend doth awe world
    lose luster. hear groan.
    Ay, tongue bade Romans
    Mark write speeches books,  
    Alas, cried, "Give drink, Titinius,"
    sick girl. Ye gods! doth amaze me
    man feeble temper should
    start majestic world
    bear palm alone. Shout.                    Flourish.
  BRUTUS. general shout!
    applauses are
    honors heap'd Caesar.
  CASSIUS. Why, man, doth bestride narrow world
    Colossus, petty men
    Walk huge legs peep about
    find dishonorable graves.
    Men time masters fates:
    fault, dear Brutus, stars,
    underlings.
    Brutus Caesar: "Caesar"?
    sounded yours?
    Write together, fair name;
    Sound them, doth mouth well;
    Weigh them, heavy; conjure 'em,  
    "Brutus" start spirit "Caesar."
    Now, names gods once,
    meat doth Caesar feed
    grown great? Age, thou art shamed!
    Rome, thou hast lost breed noble bloods!
    age great flood
    famed man?
    till talk'd Rome
    wide walls encompass'd man?
    Rome indeed, room enough,
    man.
    O, heard fathers say
    Brutus brook'd
    eternal devil state Rome
    easily king.
  BRUTUS. love me, jealous;
    work to, aim.
    thought times,
    recount hereafter; present,
    not, love entreat you,  
    moved. said
    consider; say
    patience hear, find time
    meet hear answer high things.
    Till then, noble friend, chew this:
    Brutus villager
    repute son Rome
    hard conditions time
    lay us.
  CASSIUS. glad weak words
    struck show fire Brutus.

            Re-enter Caesar Train.

  BRUTUS. games done, Caesar returning.
  CASSIUS. pass by, pluck Casca sleeve,
    will, sour fashion, you
    hath proceeded worthy note today.
  BRUTUS. so. But, you, Cassius,
    angry spot doth glow Caesar's brow,  
    rest chidden train:
    Calpurnia's cheek pale, Cicero
    ferret fiery eyes
    Capitol,
    cross'd conference senators.
  CASSIUS. Casca matter is.
  CAESAR. Antonio!
  ANTONY. Caesar?
  CAESAR. men fat,
    Sleek-headed men, sleep o' nights:
    Yond Cassius lean hungry look;
    thinks much; men dangerous.
  ANTONY. Fear not, Caesar; dangerous;
    noble Roman given.
  CAESAR. fatter! fear not,
    liable fear,
    man avoid
    spare Cassius. reads much,
    great observer, looks
    deeds men. loves plays,  
    thou dost, Antony; hears music;
    Seldom smiles, smiles sort
    mock'd scorn'd spirit
    moved smile anything.
    men heart's ease
    Whiles behold greater themselves,
    dangerous.
    thee fear'd
    fear, Caesar.
    hand, ear deaf,
    thou think'st him.
              Sennet. Exeunt Caesar Train Casca.
  CASCA. pull'd cloak; speak me?
  BRUTUS. Ay, Casca, hath chanced today
    Caesar sad.
  CASCA. Why, him, not?
  BRUTUS. Casca chanced.
  CASCA. Why, crown offered him, offered him,
     put back hand, thus, the
     people fell ashouting.  
  BRUTUS. noise for?
  CASCA. Why, too.
  CASSIUS. shouted thrice. cry for?
  CASCA. Why, too.
  BRUTUS. crown offered thrice?
  CASCA. Ay, marry, wast, put thrice, time gentler
    other, putting mine honest neighbors
    shouted.
  CASSIUS. offered crown?
  CASCA. Why, Antony.
  BRUTUS. manner it, gentle Casca.
  CASCA. hang'd manner it. was
    mere foolery; mark it. Mark Antony offer a
    crown (yet 'twas crown neither, 'twas these
    coronets) and, told you, put once. all
    that, thinking, fain it. offered
    again; put again. But, thinking, he
    loath lay fingers it. offered it
    time; put time by; he
    refused it, rabblement hooted clapped chopped hands  
    threw sweaty nightcaps uttered deal of
    stinking breath Caesar refused crown had
    choked Caesar, swounded fell it. And
    mine part, durst laugh fear opening lips
    receiving bad air.
  CASSIUS. But, soft, pray you, what, Caesars wound?
  CASCA. fell marketplace foamed mouth was
    speechless.
  BRUTUS. 'Tis like. hath falling sickness.
  CASSIUS. No, Caesar hath not, you, I,
    honest Casca, falling sickness.
  CASCA. that, Caesar fell
    down. tagrag people clap hiss him
    pleased displeased them, do
    players theatre, true man.
  BRUTUS. himself?
  CASCA. Marry, fell down, perceived common
    herd glad refused crown, plucked ope doublet
    offered throat cut. man any
    occupation, word,  
    hell rogues. fell. came
    again, said, amiss,
    desired worships infirmity. or
    wenches stood cried, "Alas, good soul!" forgave
    hearts. heed of
    them; Caesar stabbed mothers, done
    less.
  BRUTUS. came, sad, away?
  CASCA. Ay.
  CASSIUS. Cicero anything?
  CASCA. Ay, spoke Greek.
  CASSIUS. effect?
  CASCA. Nay, that, ne'er i' face
    again; understood smiled and
    shook heads; mine part, Greek me. I
    news too: Marullus Flavius, pulling
    scarfs Caesar's images, put silence. Fare well.
    foolery yet, remember it.
  CASSIUS. tonight, Casca?
  CASCA. No, promised forth.  
  CASSIUS. dine tomorrow?
  CASCA. Ay, alive, mind hold, dinner worth
    eating.
  CASSIUS. Good, expect you.
  CASCA. so, farewell, both.                            Exit.
  BRUTUS. blunt fellow grown be!
    quick mettle school.
  CASSIUS. execution
    bold noble enterprise,
    puts tardy form.
    rudeness sauce good wit,
    men stomach digest words
    appetite.
  BRUTUS. is. time leave you.
    Tomorrow, speak me,
    home you, or, will,
    home wait you.
  CASSIUS. so. Till then, world.
                                                    Exit Brutus.
    Well, Brutus, thou art noble; yet,  
    Thy honorable mettle wrought
    disposed; meet
    noble minds likes;
    firm seduced?
    Caesar doth bear hard, loves Brutus.
    Brutus Cassius,
    humor me. night,
    hands, windows throw,
    citizens,
    Writings, tending great opinion
    Rome holds name, obscurely
    Caesar's ambition glanced at.
    Caesar seat sure;
    shake him, worse days endure.           Exit.




SCENE III.
A street. Thunder lightning.

Enter, opposite sides, Casca, sword drawn, Cicero.

  CICERO. Good even, Casca. Brought Caesar home?
    breathless, stare so?
  CASCA. moved, sway earth
    Shakes thing unfirm? O Cicero,
    tempests scolding winds
    rived knotty oaks, seen
    ambitious ocean swell rage foam
    exalted threatening clouds,
    till tonight, till now,
    tempest dropping fire.
    civil strife heaven,
    world saucy gods
    Incenses send destruction.
  CICERO. Why, wonderful?
  CASCA. common slave- sight-
    Held left hand, flame burn  
    twenty torches join'd, hand
    fire remain'd unscorch'd.
    Besides- ha' put sword-
    Capitol met lion,
    glaz'd surly by
    annoying me. drawn
    heap hundred ghastly women
    Transformed fear, swore saw
    Men fire walk streets.
    yesterday bird night sit
    noonday marketplace,
    Howling shrieking. prodigies
    conjointly meet, men say
    "These reasons; natural":
    portentous things
    climate point upon.
  CICERO. Indeed, strange-disposed time.
    men construe things fashion,
    Clean purpose things themselves.
    Caesar Capitol tomorrow?  
  CASCA. doth, bid Antonio
    Send word tomorrow.
  CICERO. Good then, Casca. disturbed sky
    walk in.
  CASCA. Farewell, Cicero.                          Exit Cicero.

                        Enter Cassius.

  CASSIUS. there?
  CASCA. Roman.
  CASSIUS. Casca, voice.
  CASCA. ear good. Cassius, night this!
  CASSIUS. pleasing night honest men.
  CASCA. knew heavens menace so?
  CASSIUS. earth full faults.
    part, walk'd streets,
    Submitting perilous night,
    unbraced, Casca, see,
    bared bosom thunderstone;
    cross blue lightning seem'd open  
    breast heaven, present myself
    aim flash it.
  CASCA. wherefore tempt heavens?
    part men fear tremble
    mighty gods tokens send
    dreadful heralds astonish us.
  CASSIUS. dull, Casca, sparks life
    Roman want,
    not. pale gaze
    put fear cast wonder
    strange impatience heavens.
    true cause
    fires, gliding ghosts,
    birds beasts quality kind,
    men, fools, children calculate,
    things change ordinance,
    natures, preformed faculties
    monstrous quality, why, find
    heaven hath infused spirits
    make instruments fear warning  
    monstrous state.
    I, Casca, thee man
    dreadful night,
    thunders, lightens, opens graves, roars
    doth lion Capitol,
    man mightier thyself me
    personal action, prodigious grown
    fearful, strange eruptions are.
  CASCA. 'Tis Caesar mean, not, Cassius?
  CASSIUS. is, Romans now
    thews limbs ancestors.
    But, woe while! fathers' minds dead,
    govern'd mothers' spirits;
    yoke sufferance show womanish.
  CASCA. senators tomorrow
    establish Caesar king,
    wear crown sea land
    place save Italy.
  CASSIUS. wear dagger then:
    Cassius bondage deliver Cassius.  
    Therein, ye gods, make weak strong;
    Therein, ye gods, tyrants defeat.
    stony tower, walls beaten brass,
    airless dungeon, strong links iron
    retentive strength spirit;
    life, weary worldly bars,
    lacks power dismiss itself.
    this, world besides,
    part tyranny bear
    shake pleasure.                  Thunder still.
  CASCA. I.
    bondman hand bears
    power cancel captivity.
  CASSIUS. Caesar tyrant then?
    Poor man! wolf
    sees Romans sheep.
    lion, Romans hinds.
    haste make mighty fire
    Begin weak straws. trash Rome,
    rubbish, offal, serves  
    base matter illuminate
    vile thing Caesar? But, O grief,
    hast thou led me? speak this
    bondman; know
    answer made. arm'd,
    dangers indifferent.
  CASCA. speak Casca, man
    fleering tell-tale. Hold, hand.
    factious redress griefs,
    set foot mine far
    farthest.
  CASSIUS. bargain made.
    you, Casca, moved already
    noblest-minded Romans
    undergo enterprise
    honorable-dangerous consequence;
    this, stay me
    Pompey's Porch. now, fearful night,
    stir walking streets,
    complexion element  
    favor's work hand,
    bloody, fiery, terrible.

                       Enter Cinna.

  CASCA. Stand close awhile, haste.
  CASSIUS. 'Tis Cinna, gait;
    friend. Cinna, haste so?
  CINNA. find you. that? Metellus Cimber?
  CASSIUS. No, Casca, incorporate
    attempts. stay'd for, Cinna?
  CINNA. glad on't. fearful night this!
    strange sights.
  CASSIUS. stay'd for? me.
  CINNA. Yes, are.
    O Cassius, could
    win noble Brutus party-
  CASSIUS. content. Good Cinna, paper,
    lay praetor's chair,
    Brutus find it; throw  
    window; set wax
    Brutus' statue. done,
    Repair Pompey's Porch, find us.
    Decius Brutus Trebonius there?
  CINNA. Metellus Cimber, gone
    seek house. Well, hie
    bestow papers bade me.
  CASSIUS. done, repair Pompey's Theatre.
                                                     Exit Cinna.
    Come, Casca, ere day
    Brutus house. parts him
    already, man entire
    encounter yields ours.
  CASCA. O, sits high people's hearts,
    offense us,
    countenance, richest alchemy,
    change virtue worthiness.
  CASSIUS. worth great him
    conceited. go,
    midnight, ere day  
    awake him.                Exeunt.

ACT II. SCENE I.

Enter Brutus orchard.

  BRUTUS. What, Lucius, ho!
    cannot, progress stars,
    Give guess day. Lucius, say!
    fault sleep soundly.
    When, Lucius, when? Awake, say! What, Lucius!

                            Enter Lucius.

  LUCIUS. Call'd you, lord?
  BRUTUS. taper study, Lucius.
    lighted, call here.
  LUCIUS. will, lord.                                 Exit.
  BRUTUS. death, and, part,
    personal spurn him,
    general. crown'd:
    change nature, question.
    bright day brings adder
    craves wary walking. Crown that,  
    then, grant, put sting him
    danger with.
    abuse greatness disjoins
    Remorse power, and, speak truth Caesar,
    affections sway'd
    reason. 'tis common proof
    lowliness young ambition's ladder,
    Whereto climber-upward turns face;
    attains upmost round,
    ladder turns back,
    clouds, scorning base degrees
    ascend. Caesar may;
    Then, may, prevent. And, quarrel
    bear color thing is,
    Fashion thus, is, augmented,
    run extremities;
    serpent's egg
    hatch'd kind grow mischievous,
    kill shell.
  
                        Re-enter Lucius.

  LUCIUS. taper burneth closet, sir.
    Searching window flint found
    paper seal'd up, sure
    lie bed.
                                           letter.
  BRUTUS. bed again, day.
    tomorrow, boy, ides March?
  LUCIUS. not, sir.
  BRUTUS. calendar bring word.
  LUCIUS. will, sir.                                     Exit.
  BRUTUS. exhalations whizzing air
    Give light read them.
                                     Opens letter reads.
    "Brutus, thou sleep'st: awake thyself!
    Rome, etc. Speak, strike, redress!"

    "Brutus, thou sleep'st: awake!"
    instigations dropp'd  
    up.
    "Shall Rome, etc." piece out.
    Rome stand man's awe? What, Rome?
    ancestors streets Rome
    Tarquin drive, call'd king.
    "Speak, strike, redress!" entreated
    speak strike? O Rome, make thee promise,
    redress follow, thou receivest
    Thy full petition hand Brutus!

                        Re-enter Lucius.

  LUCIUS. Sir, March wasted fifteen days.
                                                Knocking within.
  BRUTUS. 'Tis good. gate, knocks.
                                                    Exit Lucius.
    Cassius whet Caesar
    slept.
    acting dreadful thing
    motion, interim  
    phantasma hideous dream;
    genius mortal instruments
    council, state man,
    kingdom, suffers then
    nature insurrection.

                         Re-enter Lucius.

  LUCIUS. Sir, 'tis brother Cassius door,
    doth desire you.
  BRUTUS. alone?
  LUCIUS. No, sir, him.
  BRUTUS. them?
  LUCIUS. No, sir, hats pluck'd ears,
    half faces buried cloaks,
    means discover them
    mark favor.
  BRUTUS. 'em enter.                            Exit Lucius.
    faction. O Conspiracy,
    Shamest thou show thy dangerous brow night,  
    evils free? O, then, day
    wilt thou find cavern dark enough
    mask thy monstrous visage? Seek none, Conspiracy;
    Hide smiles affability;
    thou path, thy native semblance on,
    Erebus dim enough
    hide thee prevention.

    Enter conspirators, Cassius, Casca, Decius, Cinna,
                Metellus Cimber, Trebonius.

  CASSIUS. bold rest.
    Good morrow, Brutus, trouble you?
  BRUTUS. hour, awake night.
    men you?
  CASSIUS. Yes, man them, man here
    honors you, doth wish
    opinion yourself
    noble Roman bears you.
    Trebonius.  
  BRUTUS. hither.
  CASSIUS. This, Decius Brutus.
  BRUTUS. too.
CASSIUS. This, Casca; this, Cinna; this, Metellus Cimber.
  BRUTUS. welcome.
    watchful cares interpose themselves
    Betwixt eyes night?
  CASSIUS. entreat word?                 whisper.
  DECIUS. lies east. Doth day break here?
  CASCA. No.
  CINNA. O, pardon, sir, doth, yongrey lines
    fret clouds messengers day.
  CASCA. confess deceived.
    Here, point sword, sun arises,
    great growing south,
    Weighing youthful season year.
    months higher north
    presents fire, high east
    Stands Capitol, directly here.
  BRUTUS. Give hands over, one.
  CASSIUS. swear resolution.  
  BRUTUS. No, oath. face men,
    sufferance souls, time's abuse-
    motives weak, break betimes,
    man idle bed;
    high-sighted tyranny range on
    Till man drop lottery. these,
    do, bear fire enough
    kindle cowards steel valor
    melting spirits women, then, countrymen,
    spur cause
    prick redress? bond
    secret Romans spoke word
    palter? oath
    honesty honesty engaged
    fall it?
    Swear priests cowards men cautelous,
    feeble carrions suffering souls
    wrongs; bad swear
    creatures men doubt; stain
    virtue enterprise,  
    insuppressive mettle spirits,
    performance
    oath; drop blood
    Roman bears, nobly bears,
    guilty bastardy
    break smallest particle
    promise hath pass'd him.
  CASSIUS. Cicero? sound him?
    stand strong us.
  CASCA. leave out.
  CINNA. No, means.
  METELLUS. O, him, silver hairs
    purchase good opinion,
    buy men's voices commend deeds.
    judgement ruled hands;
    youths wildness whit appear,
    buried gravity.
  BRUTUS. O, not; break him,
    follow anything
    men begin.  
  CASSIUS. leave out.
  CASCA. fit.
  DECIUS. man touch'd Caesar?
  CASSIUS. Decius, urged. meet
    Mark Antony, beloved Caesar,
    outlive Caesar. find him
    shrewd contriver; means,
    improve them, stretch far
    annoy all, prevent,
    Antony Caesar fall together.
  BRUTUS. bloody, Caius Cassius,
    cut head hack limbs
    wrath death envy afterwards;
    Antony limb Caesar.
    sacrificers, butchers, Caius.
    stand spirit Caesar,
    spirit men blood.
    O, Caesar's spirit,
    dismember Caesar! But, alas,
    Caesar bleed it! And, gentle friends,  
    kill boldly, wrathfully;
    carve dish fit gods,
    hew carcass fit hounds;
    hearts, subtle masters do,
    Stir servants act rage
    chide 'em. make
    purpose envious,
    appearing common eyes,
    call'd purgers, murderers.
    Mark Antony, him,
    Caesar's arm
    Caesar's head off.
  CASSIUS. fear him,
    ingrated love bears Caesar-
  BRUTUS. Alas, good Cassius, him.
    love Caesar, do
    himself, thought die Caesar.
    should, given
    sports, wildness, company.
  TREBONIUS. fear him-let die,  
    live laugh hereafter.
                                                  Clock strikes.
  BRUTUS. Peace, count clock.
  CASSIUS. clock hath stricken three.
  TREBONIUS. 'Tis time part.
  CASSIUS. doubtful yet
    Caesar today no,
    superstitious grown late,
    main opinion held once
    fantasy, dreams, ceremonies.
    apparent prodigies,
    unaccustom'd terror night,
    persuasion augurers
    hold Capitol today.
  DECIUS. fear that. resolved,
    o'ersway him, loves hear
    unicorns betray'd trees,
    bears glasses, elephants holes,
    Lions toils, men flatterers;
    hates flatterers,  
    does, flattered.
    work;
    give humor true bent,
    bring Capitol.
  CASSIUS. Nay, fetch him.
  BRUTUS. eighth hour. utter most?
  CINNA. uttermost, fail then.
  METELLUS. Caius Ligarius doth bear Caesar hard,
    rated speaking Pompey.
    thought him.
  BRUTUS. Now, good Metellus, him.
    loves well, reasons;
    Send hither, fashion him.
  CASSIUS. morning 's. leave you, Brutus,
    And, friends, disperse yourselves, remember
    show true Romans.
  BRUTUS. Good gentlemen, fresh merrily;
    put purposes,
    bear Roman actors do,
    untired spirits formal constancy.  
    so, good morrow one.
                                          Exeunt Brutus.
    Boy! Lucius! Fast asleep? matter.
    Enjoy honey-heavy dew slumber;
    Thou hast figures fantasies,
    busy care draws brains men;
    thou sleep'st sound.

                           Enter Portia.

  PORTIA. Brutus, lord!
  BRUTUS. Portia, you? Wherefore rise now?
    health commit
    weak condition raw cold morning.
  PORTIA. neither. ungently, Brutus,
    Stole bed; yesternight supper
    suddenly arose walk'd about,
    Musing sighing, arms across;
    ask'd matter was,
    stared ungentle looks.  
    urged further; scratch'd head,
    impatiently stamp'd foot.
    insisted, answer'd not,
    angry waiter hand
    Gave sign leave you. did,
    Fearing strengthen impatience
    seem'd enkindled, withal
    Hoping effect humor,
    hath hour man.
    eat, talk, sleep,
    And, work shape
    hath prevail'd condition,
    you, Brutus. Dear lord,
    Make acquainted grief.
  BRUTUS. health, all.
  PORTIA. Brutus wise, and, health,
    embrace means it.
  BRUTUS. Why, do. Good Portia, bed.
  PORTIA. Brutus sick, physical
    walk unbraced suck humors  
    dank morning? What, Brutus sick,
    steal wholesome bed
    dare vile contagion night
    tempt rheumy unpurged air
    add sickness? No, Brutus,
    sick offense mind,
    virtue place
    of; and, knees,
    charm you, commended beauty,
    vows love great vow
    incorporate make one,
    unfold me, yourself, half,
    heavy men tonight
    resort you; been
    seven, hide faces
    darkness.
  BRUTUS. Kneel not, gentle Portia.
  PORTIA. need, gentle Brutus.
    bond marriage, me, Brutus,
    excepted secrets  
    appertain you? yourself
    But, were, sort limitation,
    meals, comfort bed,
    talk sometimes? Dwell suburbs
    good pleasure? more,
    Portia Brutus' harlot, wife.
  BRUTUS. true honorable wife,
    dear ruddy drops
    visit sad heart.
  PORTIA. true, secret.
    grant woman, withal
    woman Lord Brutus wife.
    grant woman, withal
    woman reputed, Cato's daughter.
    stronger sex,
    father'd husbanded?
    counsels, disclose 'em.
    made strong proof constancy,
    Giving voluntary wound
    thigh. bear patience  
    husband's secrets?
  BRUTUS. O ye gods,
    Render worthy noble wife! Knocking within.
    Hark, hark, knocks. Portia, awhile,
    thy bosom partake
    secrets heart.
    engagements construe thee,
    charactery sad brows.
    Leave haste. [Exit Portia.] Lucius, knocks?

                  Re-enter Lucius Ligarius.

  LUCIUS. sick man speak you.
  BRUTUS. Caius Ligarius, Metellus spake of.
    Boy, stand aside. Caius Ligarius, how?
  LIGARIUS. Vouchsafe good morrow feeble tongue.
  BRUTUS. O, time chose out, brave Caius,
    wear kerchief! sick!
  LIGARIUS. sick, Brutus hand
    exploit worthy honor.  
  BRUTUS. exploit hand, Ligarius,
    healthful ear hear it.
  LIGARIUS. gods Romans bow before,
    discard sickness! Soul Rome!
    Brave son, derived honorable loins!
    Thou, exorcist, hast conjured up
    mortified spirit. bid run,
    strive things impossible,
    Yea, them. do?
  BRUTUS. piece work make sick men whole.
  LIGARIUS. make sick?
  BRUTUS. also. is, Caius,
    unfold thee, going
    done.
  LIGARIUS. Set foot,
    heart new-fired follow you,
    what; sufficeth
    Brutus leads on.
  BRUTUS. Follow then.                                Exeunt.




SCENE II.
Caesar's house. Thunder lightning.

Enter Caesar, nightgown.

  CAESAR. heaven earth peace tonight.
    Thrice hath Calpurnia sleep cried out,
    "Help, ho! murther Caesar!" within?

                         Enter Servant.

  SERVANT. lord?
  CAESAR. bid priests present sacrifice,
    bring opinions success.
  SERVANT. will, lord.                                Exit.

                         Enter Calpurnia.

  CALPURNIA. you, Caesar? walk forth?
    stir house today.
  CAESAR. Caesar forth: things threaten'd me
    Ne'er look'd back;  
    face Caesar, vanished.
  CALPURNIA. Caesar, stood ceremonies,
    fright me. within,
    things heard seen,
    Recounts horrid sights watch.
    lioness hath whelped streets;
    graves yawn'd, yielded dead;
    Fierce fiery warriors fight clouds,
    ranks squadrons form war,
    drizzled blood Capitol;
    noise battle hurtled air,
    Horses neigh dying men groan,
    ghosts shriek squeal streets.
    O Caesar! things use,
    fear them.
  CAESAR. avoided
    end purposed mighty gods?
    Caesar forth, predictions
    world general Caesar.
  CALPURNIA. beggars die, comets seen;  
    heavens blaze death princes.
  CAESAR. Cowards die times deaths;
    valiant taste death once.
    wonders heard,
    strange men fear
    death, end,
    come.

                      Re-enter Servant.

    augurers?
  SERVANT. stir today.
    Plucking entrails offering forth,
    find heart beast.
  CAESAR. gods shame cowardice.
    Caesar beast heart
    stay home today fear.
    No, Caesar not. Danger full well
    Caesar dangerous he.
    lions litter'd day,  
    elder terrible.
    Caesar forth.
  CALPURNIA. Alas, lord,
    wisdom consumed confidence.
    today. Call fear
    house own.
    send Mark Antony Senate House,
    today.
    me, knee, prevail this.
  CAESAR. Mark Antony well,
    And, thy humor, stay home.

                        Enter Decius.

    Decius Brutus, so.
  DECIUS. Caesar, hail! Good morrow, worthy Caesar!
    fetch Senate House.
  CAESAR. happy time
    bear greeting senators
    today.  
    Cannot, false, dare not, falser:
    today. so, Decius.
  CALPURNIA. sick.
  CAESAR. Caesar send lie?
    conquest stretch'd mine arm far
    afeard greybeards truth?
    Decius, Caesar come.
  DECIUS. mighty Caesar, cause,
    laugh'd so.
  CAESAR. will: come,
    satisfy Senate.
    But, private satisfaction,
    love you, know.
    Calpurnia here, wife, stays home;
    dreamt tonight statue,
    Which, fountain hundred spouts,
    run pure blood, lusty Romans
    smiling bathe hands it.
    apply warnings portents
    evils imminent, knee  
    Hath begg'd stay home today.
  DECIUS. dream amiss interpreted;
    vision fair fortunate.
    statue spouting blood pipes,
    smiling Romans bathed,
    Signifies great Rome suck
    Reviving blood, great men press
    tinctures, stains, relics, cognizance.
    Calpurnia's dream signified.
  CAESAR. expounded it.
  DECIUS. have, heard say.
    now, Senate concluded
    give day crown mighty Caesar.
    send word come,
    minds change. Besides, mock
    Apt render'd, say
    "Break Senate till time,
    Caesar's wife meet dreams."
    Caesar hide himself, whisper
    "Lo, Caesar afraid"?  
    Pardon me, Caesar, dear dear love
    proceeding bids this,
    reason love liable.
  CAESAR. foolish fears now, Calpurnia!
    ashamed yield them.
    Give robe, go.

         Enter Publius, Brutus, Ligarius, Metellus, Casca,
                     Trebonius, Cinna.

    Publius fetch me.
  PUBLIUS. Good morrow,Caesar.
  CAESAR. Welcome, Publius.
    What, Brutus, stirr'd early too?
    Good morrow, Casca. Caius Ligarius,
    Caesar ne'er enemy
    ague hath made lean.
    is't o'clock?
  BRUTUS. Caesar, 'tis strucken eight.
  CAESAR. pains courtesy.  

                           Enter Antony.

    See, Antony, revels long o' nights,
    notwithstanding up. Good morrow, Antony.
  ANTONY. noble Caesar.
  CAESAR. Bid prepare within.
    blame waited for.
    Now, Cinna; now, Metellus; what, Trebonius,
    hour's talk store you;
    Remember call today;
    me, remember you.
  TREBONIUS. Caesar, will. [Aside.] be
    friends further.
  CAESAR. Good friends, taste wine me,
    friends straightway together.
  BRUTUS. [Aside.] same, O Caesar,
    heart Brutus yearns upon!            Exeunt.




SCENE III.
A street Capitol.

Enter Artemidorus, reading paper.

  ARTEMIDORUS. "Caesar, beware Brutus; heed Cassius; come
    Casca; eye Cinna; trust Trebonius; mark
    Metellus Cimber; Decius Brutus loves thee not; thou hast
    wronged Caius Ligarius. mind men,
    bent Caesar. thou beest immortal, look
    you. Security conspiracy. mighty gods
    defend thee!
                                        Thy lover, Artemidorus."
    stand till Caesar pass along,
    suitor give this.
    heart laments virtue live
    teeth emulation.
    thou read this, O Caesar, thou mayest live;
    not, Fates traitors contrive.           Exit.




SCENE IV.
Another part street, house Brutus.

Enter Portia Lucius.

  PORTIA. prithee, boy, run Senate House;
    Stay answer me, thee gone.
    dost thou stay?
  LUCIUS. errand, madam.
  PORTIA. thee there, again,
    Ere thee thou shouldst there.
    O constancy, strong side!
    Set huge mountain 'tween heart tongue!
    man's mind, woman's might.
    hard women counsel!
    Art thou yet?
  LUCIUS. Madam, do?
    Run Capitol, else?
    return you, else?
  PORTIA. Yes, bring word, boy, thy lord well,
    sickly forth; good note
    Caesar doth, suitors press him.  
    Hark, boy, noise that?
  LUCIUS. hear none, madam.
  PORTIA. Prithee, listen well.
    heard bustling rumor fray,
    wind brings Capitol.
  LUCIUS. Sooth, madam, hear nothing.

                     Enter Soothsayer.

  PORTIA. hither, fellow;
    hast thou been?
  SOOTHSAYER. mine house, good lady.
  PORTIA. is't o'clock?
  SOOTHSAYER. ninth hour, lady.
  PORTIA. Caesar Capitol?
  SOOTHSAYER. Madam, yet. stand
    pass Capitol.
  PORTIA. Thou hast suit Caesar, hast thou not?
  SOOTHSAYER. have, lady. Caesar
    good Caesar hear me,  
    beseech befriend himself.
  PORTIA. Why, know'st thou harm's intended him?
  SOOTHSAYER. be, fear chance.
    Good morrow you. street narrow,
    throng Caesar heels,
    senators, praetors, common suitors,
    crowd feeble man death.
    place void there
    Speak great Caesar along.               Exit.
  PORTIA. in. Ay me, weak thing
    heart woman is! O Brutus,
    heavens speed thee thine enterprise!
    Sure, boy heard me. Brutus hath suit
    Caesar grant. O, grow faint.
    Run, Lucius, commend lord;
    merry. again,
    bring word doth thee.
                                               Exeunt severally.

ACT III. SCENE I.
Rome. Capitol; Senate sitting above.
A crowd people, Artemidorus Soothsayer.

Flourish. Enter Caesar, Brutus, Cassius, Casca, Decius, Metellus,
Trebonius, Cinna, Antony, Lepidus, Popilius, Publius, others.

  CAESAR. ides March come.
  SOOTHSAYER. Ay, Caesar, gone.
  Hail, Caesar! Read schedule.
  DECIUS. Trebonius doth desire o'er read,
    leisure, humble suit.
  ARTEMIDORUS. O Caesar, read mine first, mine's suit
    touches Caesar nearer. Read it, great Caesar.
  CAESAR. touches ourself served.
  ARTEMIDORUS. Delay not, Caesar; read instantly.
  CAESAR. What, fellow mad?
  PUBLIUS. Sirrah, give place.
  CASSIUS. What, urge petitions street?
    Capitol.
  
      Caesar Senate House, rest follow.

  POPILIUS. enterprise today thrive.
  CASSIUS. enterprise, Popilius?
  POPILIUS. Fare well.
                                             Advances Caesar.
  BRUTUS. Popilius Lena?
  CASSIUS. wish'd today enterprise thrive.
    fear purpose discovered.
  BRUTUS. Look, makes Caesar. Mark him.
  CASSIUS. Casca,
    sudden, fear prevention.
    Brutus, done? known,
    Cassius Caesar turn back,
    slay myself.
  BRUTUS. Cassius, constant.
    Popilius Lena speaks purposes;
    For, look, smiles, Caesar doth change.
  CASSIUS. Trebonius time, for, you, Brutus,
    draws Mark Antony way.  
                                    Exeunt Antony Trebonius.
  DECIUS. Metellus Cimber? him
    presently prefer suit Caesar.
  BRUTUS. address'd; press him.
  CINNA. Casca, rears hand.
  CAESAR. ready? amiss
    Caesar Senate redress?
  METELLUS. high, mighty, puissant Caesar,
    Metellus Cimber throws thy seat
    humble heart.                                     Kneels.
  CAESAR. prevent thee, Cimber.
    couchings lowly courtesies
    fire blood ordinary men
    turn preordinance decree
    law children. fond
    Caesar bears rebel blood
    thaw'd true quality
    melteth fools- sweet words,
    Low-crooked court'sies, base spaniel-fawning.
    Thy brother decree banished.  
    thou dost bend pray fawn him,
    spurn thee cur way.
    Know, Caesar doth wrong, cause
    satisfied.
  METELLUS. voice worthy own,
    sound sweetly great Caesar's ear
    repealing banish'd brother?
  BRUTUS. kiss thy hand, flattery, Caesar,
    Desiring thee Publius Cimber may
    freedom repeal.
  CAESAR. What, Brutus?
  CASSIUS. Pardon, Caesar! Caesar, pardon!
    low thy foot doth Cassius fall
    beg enfranchisement Publius Cimber.
  CAESAR. moved, you;
    pray move, prayers move me;
    constant northern star,
    true-fix'd resting quality
    fellow firmament.
    skies painted unnumber'd sparks;  
    fire doth shine;
    doth hold place.
    world, 'tis furnish'd men,
    men flesh blood, apprehensive;
    number one
    unassailable holds rank,
    Unshaked motion; he,
    show it, this;
    constant Cimber banish'd,
    constant remain so.
  CINNA. O Caesar-
  CAESAR. Hence! Wilt thou lift Olympus?
  DECIUS. Great Caesar-
  CAESAR. Doth Brutus bootless kneel?
  CASCA. Speak, hands, me!
                        Casca first, Conspirators
                                  Marcus Brutus stab Caesar.
  CAESAR. tu, Brute?- fall, Caesar! Dies.
  CINNA. Liberty! Freedom! Tyranny dead!
    Run hence, proclaim, cry streets.  
  CASSIUS. common pulpits cry out
    "Liberty, freedom, enfranchisement!"
  BRUTUS. People senators, affrighted,
    Fly not, stand still; ambition's debt paid.
  CASCA. pulpit, Brutus.
  DECIUS. Cassius too.
  BRUTUS. Publius?
  CINNA. Here, confounded mutiny.
  METELLUS. Stand fast together, friend Caesar's
    chance-
  BRUTUS. Talk standing. Publius, good cheer,
    harm intended person,
    Roman else. them, Publius.
  CASSIUS. leave us, Publius, people
    Rushing age mischief.
  BRUTUS. so, man abide deed
    doers.

                        Re-enter Trebonius.
  
  CASSIUS. Antony?
  TREBONIUS. Fled house amazed.
    Men, wives, children stare, cry out, run
    doomsday.
  BRUTUS. Fates, pleasures.
    die, know; 'tis time
    drawing days men stand upon.
  CASSIUS. Why, cuts twenty years life
    Cuts years fearing death.
  BRUTUS. Grant that, death benefit;
    Caesar's friends abridged
    time fearing death. Stoop, Romans, stoop,
    bathe hands Caesar's blood
    elbows, besmear swords;
    walk forth, marketplace,
    waving red weapons o'er heads,
    cry, "Peace, freedom, liberty!"
  CASSIUS. Stoop then, wash. ages hence
    lofty scene acted over
    states unborn accents unknown!  
  BRUTUS. times Caesar bleed sport,
    Pompey's basis lies along
    worthier dust!
  CASSIUS. oft be,
    knot call'd
    men gave country liberty.
  DECIUS. What, forth?
  CASSIUS. Ay, man away.
    Brutus lead, grace heels
    boldest hearts Rome.

                        Enter Servant.

  BRUTUS. Soft, here? friend Antony's.
  SERVANT. Thus, Brutus, master bid kneel,
    Mark Antony bid fall down,
    And, prostrate, bade say:
    Brutus noble, wise, valiant, honest;
    Caesar mighty, bold, royal, loving.
    love Brutus honor him;  
    fear'd Caesar, honor'd him, loved him.
    Brutus vouchsafe Antony
    safely resolved
    Caesar hath deserved lie death,
    Mark Antony love Caesar dead
    Brutus living, follow
    fortunes affairs noble Brutus
    hazards untrod state
    true faith. master Antony.
  BRUTUS. Thy master wise valiant Roman;
    thought worse.
    him, place,
    satisfied and, honor,
    Depart untouch'd.
  SERVANT. fetch presently.                       Exit.
  BRUTUS. friend.
  CASSIUS. may, mind
    fears much, misgiving still
    Falls shrewdly purpose.
  
                          Re-enter Antony.

  BRUTUS. Antony. Welcome, Mark Antony.
  ANTONY. O mighty Caesar! Dost thou lie low?
    thy conquests, glories, triumphs, spoils,
    Shrunk measure? Fare thee well.
    not, gentlemen, intend,
    blood, rank.
    myself, hour fit
    Caesar's death's hour, instrument
    half worth swords, made rich
    noble blood world.
    beseech ye, bear hard,
    Now, whilst purpled hands reek smoke,
    Fulfill pleasure. Live thousand years,
    find apt die;
    place so, means death,
    Caesar, cut off,
    choice master spirits age.
  BRUTUS. O Antony, beg death us!  
    bloody cruel,
    As, hands present act
    do, hands
    bleeding business done.
    hearts not; pitiful;
    pity general wrong Rome-
    fire drives fire, pity pity-
    Hath deed Caesar. part,
    swords leaden points, Mark Antony;
    arms strength malice, hearts
    brothers' temper, receive in
    kind love, good thoughts, reverence.
  CASSIUS. voice strong man's
    disposing dignities.
  BRUTUS. patient till appeased
    multitude, fear,
    deliver cause
    I, love Caesar struck him,
    proceeded.
  ANTONY. doubt wisdom.  
    man render bloody hand.
    First, Marcus Brutus, shake you;
    Next, Caius Cassius, hand;
    Now, Decius Brutus, yours; yours, Metellus;
    Yours, Cinna; and, valiant Casca, yours;
    last, love, yours, good Trebonius.
    Gentlemen all- alas, say?
    credit stands slippery ground,
    bad ways conceit me,
    coward flatterer.
    love thee, Caesar, O, 'tis true!
    thy spirit now,
    grieve thee dearer thy death
    thy Antony making peace,
    Shaking bloody fingers thy foes,
    noble! presence thy corse?
    eyes thou hast wounds,
    Weeping fast stream thy blood,
    close
    terms friendship thine enemies.  
    Pardon me, Julius! wast thou bay'd, brave hart,
    didst thou fall, thy hunters stand,
    Sign'd thy spoil, crimson'd thy Lethe.
    O world, thou wast forest hart,
    this, indeed, O world, heart thee.
    deer strucken princes
    Dost thou lie!
  CASSIUS. Mark Antony-
  ANTONY. Pardon me, Caius Cassius.
    enemies Caesar this:
    Then, friend, cold modesty.
  CASSIUS. blame praising Caesar so;
    compact us?
    prick'd number friends,
    on, depend you?
  ANTONY. hands, indeed
    Sway'd point Caesar.
    Friends love all,
    hope give reasons
    Caesar dangerous.  
  BRUTUS. savage spectacle.
    reasons full good regard
    you, Antony, son Caesar,
    satisfied.
  ANTONY. seek;
    suitor may
    Produce body marketplace,
    pulpit, friend,
    Speak order funeral.
  BRUTUS. shall, Mark Antony.
  CASSIUS. Brutus, word you.
    [Aside Brutus.] do. consent
    Antony speak funeral.
    people moved
    utter?
  BRUTUS. pardon,
    pulpit first,
    show reason Caesar's death.
    Antony speak, protest
    speaks leave permission,  
    contented Caesar shall
    true rites lawful ceremonies.
    advantage wrong.
  CASSIUS. fall; not.
  BRUTUS. Mark Antony, here, Caesar's body.
    funeral speech blame us,
    speak good devise Caesar,
    do't permission,
    hand all
    funeral. speak
    pulpit whereto going,
    speech ended.
  ANTONY. so,
    desire more.
  BRUTUS. Prepare body then, follow us.
                                          Exeunt Antony.
  ANTONY. O, pardon me, thou bleeding piece earth,
    meek gentle butchers!
    Thou art ruins noblest man
    lived tide times.  
    Woe hand shed costly blood!
    thy wounds prophesy
    (Which dumb mouths ope ruby lips
    beg voice utterance tongue)
    curse light limbs men;
    Domestic fury fierce civil strife
    cumber parts Italy;
    Blood destruction use,
    dreadful objects familiar,
    mothers smile behold
    infants quarter'd hands war;
    pity choked custom fell deeds,
    Caesar's spirit ranging revenge,
    Ate side hot hell,
    confines monarch's voice
    Cry "Havoc!" slip dogs war,
    foul deed smell earth
    carrion men, groaning burial.

                        Enter Servant.  

    serve Octavius Caesar, not?
  SERVANT. do, Mark Antony.
  ANTONY. Caesar write Rome.
  SERVANT. receive letters, coming,
    bid word mouth-
    O Caesar!                                     Sees body.
  ANTONY. Thy heart big; thee weep.
    Passion, see, catching, mine eyes,
    beads sorrow stand thine,
    Began water. thy master coming?
  SERVANT. lies tonight leagues Rome.
  ANTONY. Post back speed hath chanced.
    mourning Rome, dangerous Rome,
    Rome safety Octavius yet;
    Hie hence, so. stay awhile,
    Thou shalt back till borne corse
    marketplace. try,
    oration, people take
    cruel issue bloody men,  
    thou shalt discourse
    young Octavius state things.
    Lend hand.                Exeunt Caesar's body.




SCENE II.
The Forum.

Enter Brutus Cassius, throng Citizens.

  CITIZENS. satisfied! satisfied!
  BRUTUS. follow give audience, friends.
    Cassius, street
    part numbers.
    hear speak, 'em stay here;
    follow Cassius, him;
    public reasons rendered
    Caesar's death.
  CITIZEN. hear Brutus speak.
  CITIZEN. hear Cassius compare reasons,
    severally hear rendered.
                               Exit Cassius, Citizens.
                                    Brutus pulpit.
  CITIZEN. noble Brutus ascended. Silence!
  BRUTUS. patient till last.
    Romans, countrymen, lovers! Hear cause, be
    silent, hear. mine honor,  
    respect mine honor, believe. Censure your
    wisdom, awake senses, judge. If
    assembly, dear friend Caesar's, to
    Brutus' love Caesar his. If
    friend demand Brutus rose Caesar, is
    answer: loved Caesar less, loved Rome
    more. Caesar living die slaves, than
    Caesar dead live freemen? Caesar loved me, I
    weep him; fortunate, rejoice it; was
    valiant, honor him; ambitious, slew him. There
    tears love, joy fortune, honor valor,
    death ambition. base a
    bondman? any, speak, offended. so
    rude Roman? any, speak, I
    offended. vile love country? If
    any, speak, offended. pause reply.
  ALL. None, Brutus, none.
  BRUTUS. offended. Caesar
    Brutus. question death is
    enrolled Capitol, glory extenuated,  
    worthy, offenses enforced, suffered death.

              Enter Antony others, Caesar's body.

    body, mourned Mark Antony, who, had
    hand death, receive benefit dying, a
    place commonwealth, not? I
    depart- that, slew lover good Rome, I
    dagger myself, country
    death.
  ALL. Live, Brutus, live, live!
  CITIZEN. Bring triumph home house.
  CITIZEN. Give statue ancestors.
  CITIZEN. Caesar.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. Caesar's parts
    crown'd Brutus.
  CITIZEN. bring house shouts and
    clamors.
  BRUTUS. countrymen-
  CITIZEN. Peace! Silence! Brutus speaks.  
  CITIZEN. Peace, ho!
  BRUTUS. Good countrymen, depart alone,
    And, sake, stay Antony.
    grace Caesar's corse, grace speech
    Tending Caesar's glories, Mark Antony,
    permission, allow'd make.
    entreat you, man depart,
    Save alone, till Antony spoke.                  Exit.
  CITIZEN. Stay, ho, hear Mark Antony.
  CITIZEN. public chair;
    hear him. Noble Antony, up.
  ANTONY. Brutus' sake, beholding you.
                                           pulpit.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. Brutus?
  CITIZEN. says, Brutus' sake,
    finds beholding all.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. 'Twere speak harm Brutus here.
  CITIZEN. Caesar tyrant.
  CITIZEN. Nay, certain.
    blest Rome rid him.  
  CITIZEN. Peace! hear Antony say.
  ANTONY. gentle Romans-
  ALL. Peace, ho! hear him.
  ANTONY. Friends, Romans, countrymen, lend ears!
    bury Caesar, praise him.
    evil men lives them,
    good oft interred bones;
    Caesar. noble Brutus
    Hath told Caesar ambitious;
    so, grievous fault,
    grievously hath Caesar answer'd it.
    Here, leave Brutus rest-
    Brutus honorable man;
    all, honorable men-
    speak Caesar's funeral.
    friend, faithful me;
    Brutus ambitious,
    Brutus honorable man.
    hath brought captives home Rome,
    ransoms general coffers fill.  
    Caesar ambitious?
    poor cried, Caesar hath wept;
    Ambition made sterner stuff:
    Brutus ambitious,
    Brutus honorable man.
    Lupercal
    thrice presented kingly crown,
    thrice refuse. ambition?
    Brutus ambitious,
    honorable man.
    speak disprove Brutus spoke,
    speak know.
    love once, cause;
    withholds mourn him?
    O judgement, thou art fled brutish beasts,
    men lost reason. Bear me;
    heart coffin Caesar,
    pause till back me.
  CITIZEN. Methinks reason sayings.
  CITIZEN. thou rightly matter,  
    Caesar great wrong.
  CITIZEN. he, masters?
    fear worse place.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. Mark'd ye words? crown;
    'tis ambitious.
  CITIZEN. found so, dear abide it.
  CITIZEN. Poor soul, eyes red fire weeping.
  CITIZEN. nobler man Rome Antony.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. mark him, begins speak.
  ANTONY. yesterday word Caesar might
    stood world. lies there,
    poor reverence.
    O masters! disposed stir
    hearts minds mutiny rage,
    Brutus wrong Cassius wrong,
    Who, know, honorable men.
    wrong; choose
    wrong dead, wrong you,
    wrong honorable men.
    parchment seal Caesar;  
    found closet, 'tis will.
    commons hear testament-
    Which, pardon me, read-
    kiss dead Caesar's wounds
    dip napkins sacred blood,
    Yea, beg hair memory,
    And, dying, mention wills,
    Bequeathing rich legacy
    issue.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. hear will. Read it, Mark Antony.
  ALL. will, will! hear Caesar's will.
  ANTONY. patience, gentle friends, read it;
    meet Caesar loved you.
    wood, stones, men;
    And, men, hearing Caesar,
    inflame you, make mad.
    'Tis good heirs,
    should, O, it!
  FOURTH CITIZEN. Read will; hear it, Antony.
    read will, Caesar's will.  
  ANTONY. patient? stay awhile?
    o'ershot it.
    fear wrong honorable men
    daggers stabb'd Caesar; fear it.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. traitors. Honorable men!
  ALL. will! testament!
  CITIZEN. villains, murtherers. will!
    Read will!
  ANTONY. compel read will?
    make ring corse Caesar,
    show made will.
    descend? give leave?
  ALL. down.
  CITIZEN. Descend.
                                  pulpit.
  CITIZEN. leave.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. ring, stand round.
  CITIZEN. Stand hearse, stand body.
  CITIZEN. Room Antony, noble Antony.
  ANTONY. Nay, press me, stand off.  
  ALL. Stand back; room, bear back!
  ANTONY. tears, prepare shed now.
    mantle. remember
    time Caesar put on;
    'Twas summer's evening, tent,
    day overcame Nervii.
    Look, place ran Cassius' dagger through;
    rent envious Casca made;
    well-beloved Brutus stabb'd;
    pluck'd cursed steel away,
    Mark blood Caesar follow'd it,
    rushing doors, resolved
    Brutus unkindly knock'd, no;
    Brutus, know, Caesar's angel.
    Judge, O gods, dearly Caesar loved him!
    unkindest cut all;
    noble Caesar stab,
    Ingratitude, strong traitors' arms,
    vanquish'd him. burst mighty heart,
    And, mantle muffling face,  
    base Pompey's statue,
    ran blood, great Caesar fell.
    O, fall there, countrymen!
    I, you, fell down,
    Whilst bloody treason flourish'd us.
    O, weep, perceive feel
    dint pity. gracious drops.
    Kind souls, weep behold
    Caesar's vesture wounded? here,
    himself, marr'd, see, traitors.
  CITIZEN. O piteous spectacle!
  CITIZEN. O noble Caesar!
  CITIZEN. O woeful day!
  FOURTH CITIZEN. O traitors villains!
  CITIZEN. O bloody sight!
  CITIZEN. revenged.
  ALL. Revenge! About! Seek! Burn! Fire! Kill!
    Slay! traitor live!
  ANTONY. Stay, countrymen.
  CITIZEN. Peace there! Hear noble Antony.  
  CITIZEN. hear him, follow him, die with
    him.
  ANTONY. Good friends, sweet friends, stir up
    sudden flood mutiny.
    deed honorable.
    private griefs have, alas, not,
    made it. wise honorable,
    will, doubt, reasons answer you.
    not, friends, steal hearts.
    orator, Brutus is;
    But, all, plain blunt man,
    love friend, full well
    gave public leave speak him.
    wit, words, worth,
    Action, utterance, power speech,
    stir men's blood. speak on;
    know;
    Show sweet Caesar's wounds, poor dumb mouths,
    bid speak me. Brutus,
    Brutus Antony, Antony  
    ruffle spirits put tongue
    wound Caesar move
    stones Rome rise mutiny.
  ALL. mutiny.
  CITIZEN. burn house Brutus.
  CITIZEN. Away, then! Come, seek conspirators.
  ANTONY. hear me, countrymen; hear speak.
  ALL. Peace, ho! Hear Antony, noble Antony!
  ANTONY. Why, friends, what.
    hath Caesar deserved loves?
    Alas, not; then.
    forgot told of.
  ALL. true, will! stay hear will.
  ANTONY. will, Caesar's seal.
    Roman citizen gives,
    man, seventy-five drachmas.
  CITIZEN. noble Caesar! revenge death.
  CITIZEN. O royal Caesar!
  ANTONY. Hear patience.
  ALL. Peace, ho!  
  ANTONY. Moreover, hath left walks,
    private arbors, new-planted orchards,
    side Tiber; hath left you,
    heirs forever- common pleasures,
    walk abroad recreate yourselves.
    Caesar! another?
  CITIZEN. Never, never. Come, away, away!
    burn body holy place
    brands fire traitors' houses.
    body.
  CITIZEN. fetch fire.
  CITIZEN. Pluck benches.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. Pluck forms, windows, anything.
                                  Exeunt Citizens body.
  ANTONY. work. Mischief, thou art afoot,
    thou thou wilt.

                        Enter Servant.

    now, fellow?  
  SERVANT. Sir, Octavius Rome.
  ANTONY. he?
  SERVANT. Lepidus Caesar's house.
  ANTONY. thither straight visit him.
    wish. Fortune merry,
    mood give anything.
  SERVANT. heard Brutus Cassius
    rid madmen gates Rome.
  ANTONY. notice people,
    moved them. Bring Octavius.          Exeunt.




SCENE III.
A street.

Enter Cinna poet.

  CINNA. dreamt tonight feast Caesar,
    things unluckily charge fantasy.
    wander doors,
    leads forth.

                        Enter Citizens.

  CITIZEN. name?
  CITIZEN. going?
  CITIZEN. dwell?
  FOURTH CITIZEN. married man bachelor?
  CITIZEN. Answer man directly.
  CITIZEN. Ay, briefly.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. Ay, wisely.
  CITIZEN. Ay, truly, best.
  CINNA. name? going? dwell? I
    married man bachelor? Then, answer man directly  
    briefly, wisely truly: wisely say, bachelor.
  CITIZEN. fools marry.
    bear bang that, fear. Proceed directly.
  CINNA. Directly, Caesar's funeral.
  CITIZEN. friend enemy?
  CINNA. friend.
  CITIZEN. matter answered directly.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. dwelling, briefly.
  CINNA. Briefly, dwell Capitol.
  CITIZEN. name, sir, truly.
  CINNA. Truly, Cinna.
  CITIZEN. Tear pieces, conspirator.
  CINNA. Cinna poet, Cinna poet.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. Tear bad verses, tear bad
    verses.
  CINNA. Cinna conspirator.
  FOURTH CITIZEN. matter, name's Cinna. Pluck his
    heart, turn going.
  CITIZEN. Tear him, tear him! Come, brands, ho, firebrands. To
    Brutus', Cassius'; burn all. Decius' house,  
    Casca's, Ligarius'. Away, go!             Exeunt.

ACT IV. SCENE I.
A house Rome. Antony, Octavius, Lepidus, seated table.

  ANTONY. die, names prick'd.
  OCTAVIUS. brother die; consent you, Lepidus?
  LEPIDUS. consent-
  OCTAVIUS. Prick down, Antony.
  LEPIDUS. condition Publius live,
    sister's son, Mark Antony.
  ANTONY. live; look, spot damn him.
    But, Lepidus, Caesar's house,
    Fetch hither, determine
    cut charge legacies.
  LEPIDUS. What, find here?
  OCTAVIUS. here, Capitol.            Exit Lepidus.
  ANTONY. slight unmeritable man,
    Meet errands. fit,
    three-fold world divided, stand
    share it?
  OCTAVIUS. thought him,
    voice prick'd die  
    black sentence proscription.
  ANTONY. Octavius, days you,
    lay honors man
    ease divers slanderous loads,
    bear ass bears gold,
    groan sweat business,
    led driven, point way;
    brought treasure will,
    load turn off,
    empty ass, shake ears
    graze commons.
  OCTAVIUS. will,
    valiant soldier.
  ANTONY. horse, Octavius, that
    appoint store provender.
    creature teach fight,
    wind, stop, run directly on,
    corporal motion govern'd spirit.
    And, taste, Lepidus so:
    taught, train'd, bid forth;  
    barren-spirited fellow, feeds
    objects, arts, imitations,
    Which, staled men,
    Begin fashion. talk him
    property. now, Octavius,
    Listen great things. Brutus Cassius
    levying powers; straight make head;
    alliance combined,
    friends made, means stretch'd;
    presently sit council,
    covert matters disclosed,
    open perils surest answered.
  OCTAVIUS. so, stake,
    bay'd enemies;
    smile hearts, fear,
    Millions mischiefs.                               Exeunt.




SCENE II.
Camp Sardis. Brutus' tent. Drum.

Enter Brutus, Lucilius, Lucius, Soldiers; Titinius Pindarus meet them.

  BRUTUS. Stand, ho!
  LUCILIUS. Give word, ho, stand.
  BRUTUS. now, Lucilius, Cassius near?
  LUCILIUS. hand, Pindarus come
    salutation master.
  BRUTUS. greets well. master, Pindarus,
    change, ill officers,
    Hath worthy wish
    Things undone; hand,
    satisfied.
  PINDARUS. doubt
    noble master appear
    is, full regard honor.
  BRUTUS. doubted. word, Lucilius,
    received you. resolved.
  LUCILIUS. courtesy respect enough,  
    familiar instances,
    free friendly conference,
    hath old.
  BRUTUS. Thou hast described
    hot friend cooling. note, Lucilius,
    love begins sicken decay
    useth enforced ceremony.
    tricks plain simple faith;
    hollow men, horses hot hand,
    Make gallant show promise mettle;
    endure bloody spur,
    fall crests deceitful jades
    Sink trial. army on?
  LUCILIUS. meant night Sard quarter'd;
    greater part, horse general,
    Cassius.                     Low march within.
  BRUTUS. Hark, arrived.
    March gently meet him.

                  Enter Cassius Powers.  

  CASSIUS. Stand, ho!
  BRUTUS. Stand, ho! Speak word along.
  SOLDIER. Stand!
  SOLDIER. Stand!
  SOLDIER. Stand!
  CASSIUS. noble brother, wrong.
  BRUTUS. Judge me, gods! Wrong mine enemies?
    And, so, wrong brother?
  CASSIUS. Brutus, sober form hides wrongs,
    them-
  BRUTUS. Cassius, content,
    Speak griefs softly, well.
    eyes armies here,
    perceive love us,
    wrangle. Bid move away;
    tent, Cassius, enlarge griefs,
    give audience.
  CASSIUS. Pindarus,
    Bid commanders lead charges  
    ground.
  BRUTUS. Lucilius, like, man
    tent till conference.
    Lucius Titinius guard door.             Exeunt.




SCENE III.
Brutus' tent.

Enter Brutus Cassius.

  CASSIUS. wrong'd doth this:
    condemn'd noted Lucius Pella
    taking bribes Sardians,
    letters, praying side,
    knew man, slighted off.
  BRUTUS. wrong'd write case.
  CASSIUS. time meet
    nice offense bear comment.
  BRUTUS. you, Cassius, yourself
    condemn'd itching palm,
    sell mart offices gold
    undeservers.
  CASSIUS. itching palm?
    Brutus speaks this,
    Or, gods, speech last.
  BRUTUS. Cassius honors corruption,
    chastisement doth hide head.  
  CASSIUS. Chastisement?
  BRUTUS. Remember March, ides March remember.
    great Julius bleed justice' sake?
    villain touch'd body, stab,
    justice? What, us,
    struck foremost man world
    supporting robbers, now
    Contaminate fingers base bribes
    sell mighty space large honors
    trash grasped thus?
    dog, bay moon,
    Roman.
  CASSIUS. Brutus, bait me,
    endure it. forget yourself
    hedge in. soldier, I,
    Older practice, abler yourself
    make conditions.
  BRUTUS. to, not, Cassius.
  CASSIUS. am.
  BRUTUS. not.  
  CASSIUS. Urge more, forget myself;
    mind health, tempt farther.
  BRUTUS. Away, slight man!
  CASSIUS. Is't possible?
  BRUTUS. Hear me, speak.
    give room rash choler?
    frighted madman stares?
  CASSIUS. O gods, ye gods! endure this?
  BRUTUS. this? Ay, more. Fret till proud heart break.
    show slaves choleric are,
    make bondmen tremble. bouge?
    observe you? stand crouch
    testy humor? gods,
    digest venom spleen,
    split you, for, day forth,
    mirth, yea, laughter,
    waspish.
  CASSIUS. this?
  BRUTUS. soldier:
    so, make vaunting true,  
    well. mine part,
    glad learn noble men.
  CASSIUS. wrong way, wrong me, Brutus.
    said, elder soldier, better.
    "better"?
  BRUTUS. did, care not.
  CASSIUS. Caesar lived, durst moved me.
  BRUTUS. Peace, peace! durst tempted him.
  CASSIUS. durst not?
  BRUTUS. No.
  CASSIUS. What, durst tempt him?
  BRUTUS. life durst not.
  CASSIUS. presume love;
    for.
  BRUTUS. for.
    terror, Cassius, threats,
    arm'd strong honesty,
    pass idle wind
    respect not. send you
    sums gold, denied me,  
    raise money vile means.
    heaven, coin heart
    drop blood drachmas wring
    hard hands peasants vile trash
    indirection. send
    gold pay legions,
    denied me. Cassius?
    answer'd Caius Cassius so?
    Marcus Brutus grows covetous
    lock rascal counters friends,
    ready, gods, thunderbolts,
    Dash pieces!
  CASSIUS. denied not.
  BRUTUS. did.
  CASSIUS. not. fool
    brought answer back. Brutus hath rived heart.
    friend bear friend's infirmities,
    Brutus makes mine greater are.
  BRUTUS. not, till practise me.
  CASSIUS. love not.  
  BRUTUS. faults.
  CASSIUS. friendly eye faults.
  BRUTUS. flatterer's not, appear
    huge high Olympus.
  CASSIUS. Come, Antony, young Octavius, come,
    Revenge Cassius,
    Cassius aweary world:
    Hated loves; braved brother;
    Check'd bondman; faults observed,
    Set notebook, learn'd conn'd rote,
    cast teeth. O, weep
    spirit mine eyes! dagger,
    naked breast; within, heart
    Dearer Pluto's mine, richer gold.
    thou Roman, forth;
    I, denied thee gold, give heart.
    Strike, thou didst Caesar, know,
    thou didst hate worst, thou lovedst better
    thou lovedst Cassius.
  BRUTUS. Sheathe dagger.  
    angry will, scope;
    will, dishonor humor.
    O Cassius, yoked lamb,
    carries anger flint bears fire,
    Who, enforced, shows hasty spark
    straight cold again.
  CASSIUS. Hath Cassius lived
    mirth laughter Brutus,
    grief blood ill-temper'd vexeth him?
  BRUTUS. spoke that, ill-temper'd too.
  CASSIUS. confess much? Give hand.
  BRUTUS. heart too.
  CASSIUS. O Brutus!
  BRUTUS. matter?
  CASSIUS. love bear me
    rash humor mother gave me
    Makes forgetful?
  BRUTUS. Yes, Cassius, henceforth,
    overearnest Brutus,
    mother chides, leave so.  
  POET. [Within.] generals.
    grudge 'em, 'tis meet
    alone.
  LUCILIUS. [Within.] them.
  POET. [Within.] death stay me.

      Enter Poet, Lucilius, Titinius, Lucius.

  CASSIUS. now, matter?
  POET. shame, generals! mean?
    Love, friends, men be;
    years, sure, ye.
  CASSIUS. Ha, ha! vilely doth cynic rhyme!
  BRUTUS. hence, sirrah; saucy fellow, hence!
  CASSIUS. Bear him, Brutus; 'tis fashion.
  BRUTUS. humor time.
    wars jigging fools?
    Companion, hence!
  CASSIUS. Away, away, gone!                       Exit Poet.
  BRUTUS. Lucilius Titinius, bid commanders  
    Prepare lodge companies tonight.
  CASSIUS. bring Messala you
    Immediately us.             Exeunt Lucilius Titinius.
  BRUTUS. Lucius, bowl wine!                   Exit Lucius.
  CASSIUS. angry.
  BRUTUS. O Cassius, sick griefs.
  CASSIUS. philosophy make use,
    give place accidental evils.
  BRUTUS. man bears sorrow better. Portia dead.
  CASSIUS. Ha? Portia?
  BRUTUS. dead.
  CASSIUS. 'scaped killing cross'd so?
    O insupportable touching loss!
    sickness?
  BRUTUS. Impatient absence,
    grief young Octavius Mark Antony
    made strong- death
    tidings came- fell distract,
    (her attendants absent) swallow'd fire.
  CASSIUS. died so?  
  BRUTUS. so.
  CASSIUS. O ye immortal gods!

               Re-enter Lucius, wine taper.

  BRUTUS. Speak her. Give bowl wine.
    bury unkindness, Cassius.              Drinks.
  CASSIUS. heart thirsty noble pledge.
  Fill, Lucius, till wine o'erswell cup;
  drink Brutus' love.               Drinks.
  BRUTUS. in, Titinius!                        Exit Lucius.

                 Re-enter Titinius, Messala.

    Welcome, good Messala.
    sit close taper here,
    call question necessities.
  CASSIUS. Portia, art thou gone?
  BRUTUS. more, pray you.
    Messala, received letters  
    young Octavius Mark Antony
    mighty power,
    Bending expedition Philippi.
  MESSALA. letters selfsame tenure.
  BRUTUS. addition?
  MESSALA. proscription bills outlawry
    Octavius, Antony, Lepidus
    put death hundred senators.
  BRUTUS. letters agree;
    Mine speak seventy senators died
    proscriptions, Cicero one.
  CASSIUS. Cicero one!
  MESSALA. Cicero dead,
    order proscription.
    letters wife, lord?
  BRUTUS. No, Messala.
  MESSALA. letters writ her?
  BRUTUS. Nothing, Messala.
  MESSALA. That, methinks, strange.
  BRUTUS. you? Hear aught yours?  
  MESSALA. No, lord.
  BRUTUS. Now, Roman, true.
  MESSALA. Roman bear truth tell:
    dead, strange manner.
  BRUTUS. Why, farewell, Portia. die, Messala.
    meditating die once
    patience endure now.
  MESSALA. great men great losses endure.
  CASSIUS. art you,
    nature bear so.
  BRUTUS. Well, work alive. think
    marching Philippi presently?
  CASSIUS. good.
  BRUTUS. reason?
  CASSIUS. is:
    'Tis enemy seek us;
    waste means, weary soldiers,
    offense, whilst lying still
    full rest, defense, nimbleness.
  BRUTUS. Good reasons force give place better.  
    people 'twixt Philippi ground
    stand forced affection,
    grudged contribution.
    enemy, marching them,
    make fuller number up,
    refresh'd, new-added, encouraged;
    advantage cut off
    Philippi face there,
    people back.
  CASSIUS. Hear me, good brother.
  BRUTUS. pardon. note beside
    utmost friends,
    legions brim-full, ripe:
    enemy increaseth day;
    We, height, ready decline.
    tide affairs men
    flood leads fortune;
    Omitted, voyage life
    bound shallows miseries.
    full sea afloat,  
    current serves,
    lose ventures.
  CASSIUS. Then, will, on;
    meet Philippi.
  BRUTUS. deep night crept talk,
    nature obey necessity,
    niggard rest.
    say?
  CASSIUS. more. Good night.
    Early tomorrow rise hence.
  BRUTUS. Lucius!

                       Re-enter Lucius.

    gown.                                        Exit Lucius.
    Farewell, good Messala;
    Good night, Titinius; noble, noble Cassius,
    Good night good repose.
  CASSIUS. O dear brother!
    ill beginning night.  
    division 'tween souls!
    not, Brutus.
  BRUTUS. well.
  CASSIUS. Good night, lord.
  BRUTUS. Good night, good brother.
  TITINIUS. MESSALA. Good night, Lord Brutus.
  BRUTUS. Farewell, everyone.
                                          Exeunt Brutus.

               Re-enter Lucius, gown.

    Give gown. thy instrument?
  LUCIUS. tent.
  BRUTUS. What, thou speak'st drowsily?
    Poor knave, blame thee not, thou art o'erwatch'd.
    Call Claudio men,
    sleep cushions tent.
  LUCIUS. Varro Claudio!

                   Enter Varro Claudio.  

  VARRO. Calls lord?
  BRUTUS. pray you, sirs, lie tent sleep;
    raise by
    business brother Cassius.
  VARRO. you, stand watch pleasure.
  BRUTUS. so. Lie down, good sirs.
    bethink me.
    Lucius, book sought so;
    put pocket gown.
                                     Varro Claudio lie down.
  LUCIUS. lordship give me.
  BRUTUS. Bear me, good boy, forgetful.
    Canst thou hold thy heavy eyes awhile,
    touch thy instrument strain two?
  LUCIUS. Ay, lord, an't you.
  BRUTUS. does, boy.
    trouble thee much, thou art willing.
  LUCIUS. duty, sir.
  BRUTUS. urge thy duty past thy might;  
    young bloods time rest.
  LUCIUS. slept, lord, already.
  BRUTUS. done, thou shalt sleep again;
    hold thee long. live,
    good thee.                   Music, song.
    sleepy tune. O murtherous slumber,
    Layest thou thy leaden mace boy
    plays thee music? Gentle knave, good night.
    thee wrong wake thee.
    thou dost nod, thou break'st thy instrument;
    thee; and, good boy, good night.
    see, see; leaf turn'd down
    left reading? is, think.        Sits down.

                 Enter Ghost Caesar.

    ill taper burns! Ha, here?
    weakness mine eyes
    shapes monstrous apparition.
    me. Art thou anything?  
    Art thou god, angel, devil
    makest blood cold hair stare?
    Speak thou art.
  GHOST. Thy evil spirit, Brutus.
  BRUTUS. comest thou?
  GHOST. thee thou shalt Philippi.
  BRUTUS. Well, thee again?
  GHOST. Ay, Philippi.
  BRUTUS. Why, thee Philippi then.     Exit Ghost.
    heart thou vanishest.
    Ill spirit, hold talk thee.
    Boy! Lucius! Varro! Claudio! Sirs, awake!
    Claudio!
  LUCIUS. strings, lord, false.
  BRUTUS. thinks instrument.
    Lucius, awake!
  LUCIUS. lord?
  BRUTUS. Didst thou dream, Lucius, thou criedst out?
  LUCIUS. lord, cry.
  BRUTUS. Yes, thou didst. Didst thou anything?  
  LUCIUS. Nothing, lord.
  BRUTUS. Sleep again, Lucius. Sirrah Claudio!
    [To Varro.] Fellow thou, awake!
  VARRO. lord?
  CLAUDIO. lord?
  BRUTUS. cry out, sirs, sleep?
  VARRO. CLAUDIO. we, lord?
  BRUTUS. Ay, anything?
  VARRO. No, lord, nothing.
  CLAUDIO. I, lord.
  BRUTUS. commend brother Cassius;
    Bid set powers betimes before,
    follow.
  VARRO. CLAUDIO. done, lord.             Exeunt.
