ACT V. SCENE I.
The plains Philippi.

Enter Octavius, Antony, Army.

  OCTAVIUS. Now, Antony, hopes answered.
    enemy down,
    hills upper regions.
    proves so. battles hand;
    warn Philippi here,
    Answering demand them.
  ANTONY. Tut, bosoms, know
    Wherefore it. content
    visit places, down
    fearful bravery, thinking face
    fasten thoughts courage;
    'tis so.

                    Enter Messenger.

  MESSENGER. Prepare you, generals.
    enemy gallant show;  
    bloody sign battle hung out,
    immediately.
  ANTONY. Octavius, lead battle softly on,
    left hand field.
  OCTAVIUS. hand I, thou left.
  ANTONY. cross exigent?
  OCTAVIUS. cross you, so.

      March. Drum. Enter Brutus, Cassius, Army;
           Lucilius, Titinius, Messala, others.

  BRUTUS. stand, parley.
  CASSIUS. Stand fast, Titinius; talk.
  OCTAVIUS. Mark Antony, give sign battle?
  ANTONY. No, Caesar, answer charge.
    Make forth, generals words.
  OCTAVIUS. Stir signal signal.
  BRUTUS. Words blows. so, countrymen?
  OCTAVIUS. love words better, do.
  BRUTUS. Good words bad strokes, Octavius.  
  ANTONY. bad strokes, Brutus, give good words.
    Witness hole made Caesar's heart,
    Crying "Long live! Hail, Caesar!"
  CASSIUS. Antony,
    posture blows unknown;
    words, rob Hybla bees,
    leave honeyless.
  ANTONY. stingless too.
  BRUTUS. O, yes, soundless too,
    stol'n buzzing, Antony,
    wisely threat sting.
  ANTONY. Villains! vile daggers
    Hack'd sides Caesar.
    show'd teeth apes, fawn'd hounds,
    bow'd bondmen, kissing Caesar's feet;
    Whilst damned Casca, cur, behind
    Strooke Caesar neck. O flatterers!
  CASSIUS. Flatterers? Now, Brutus, yourself.
    tongue offended today,
    Cassius ruled.  
  OCTAVIUS. Come, come, cause. arguing make sweat,
    proof turn redder drops.
    Look,
    draw sword conspirators;
    sword again?
    Never, till Caesar's thirty wounds
    avenged, till Caesar
    added slaughter sword traitors.
  BRUTUS. Caesar, thou canst die traitors' hands,
    thou bring'st thee.
  OCTAVIUS. hope,
    born die Brutus' sword.
  BRUTUS. O, thou wert noblest thy strain,
    Young man, thou couldst die honorable.
  CASSIUS. peevish school boy, worthless honor,
    Join'd masker reveler!
  ANTONY. Cassius still!
  OCTAVIUS. Come, Antony, away!
    Defiance, traitors, hurl teeth.
    dare fight today, field;  
    not, stomachs.
                        Exeunt Octavius, Antony, Army.
  CASSIUS. Why, now, blow and, swell billow, swim bark!
    storm up, hazard.
  BRUTUS. Ho, Lucilius! Hark, word you.
  LUCILIUS. [Stands forth.] lord?
                             Brutus Lucilius converse apart.
  CASSIUS. Messala!
  MESSALA. [Stands forth.] general?
  CASSIUS. Messala,
    birthday, day
    Cassius born. Give thy hand, Messala.
    thou witness that, will,
    Pompey was, compell'd set
    battle liberties.
    held Epicurus strong,
    opinion. change mind,
    partly credit things presage.
    Coming Sardis, ensign
    mighty eagles fell, perch'd,  
    Gorging feeding soldiers' hands,
    Philippi consorted us.
    morning fled gone,
    steads ravens, crows, kites
    Fly o'er heads downward us,
    sickly prey. shadows seem
    canopy fatal, which
    army lies, ready give ghost.
  MESSALA. so.
  CASSIUS. partly,
    fresh spirit resolved
    meet perils constantly.
  BRUTUS. so, Lucilius.
  CASSIUS. Now, noble Brutus,
    gods today stand friendly may,
    Lovers peace, lead days age!
    But, affairs men rest incertain,
    reason worst befall.
    lose battle, this
    time speak together.  
    determined do?
  BRUTUS. rule philosophy
    blame Cato death
    give himself- how,
    find cowardly vile,
    fear fall, prevent
    time life- arming patience
    stay providence high powers
    govern below.
  CASSIUS. Then, lose battle,
    contented led triumph
    streets Rome?
  BRUTUS. No, Cassius, no. not, thou noble Roman,
    Brutus bound Rome;
    bears great mind. day
    end work ides March begun.
    meet not.
    everlasting farewell take.
    Forever, forever, farewell, Cassius!
    meet again, why, smile;  
    not, parting made.
  CASSIUS. Forever forever farewell, Brutus!
    meet again, smile indeed;
    not, 'tis true parting made.
  BRUTUS. then, lead on. O, man know
    end day's business ere come!
    sufficeth day end,
    end known. Come, ho! Away!           Exeunt.




SCENE II.
The field battle.

Alarum. Enter Brutus Messala.

  BRUTUS. Ride, ride, Messala, ride, give bills
    legions side.             Loud alarum.
    set once, perceive
    cold demeanor Octavia's wing,
    sudden push overthrow.
    Ride, ride, Messala. down.         Exeunt.




SCENE III.
Another part field.

Alarums. Enter Cassius Titinius.

  CASSIUS. O, look, Titinius, look, villains fly!
    mine turn'd enemy.
    ensign mine turning back;
    slew coward, him.
  TITINIUS. O Cassius, Brutus gave word early,
    Who, advantage Octavius,
    eagerly. soldiers fell spoil,
    Whilst Antony enclosed.

                       Enter Pindarus.

  PINDARUS. Fly off, lord, fly off;
    Mark Antony tents, lord;
    Fly, therefore, noble Cassius, fly off.
  CASSIUS. hill enough. Look, look, Titinius:
    tents perceive fire?
  TITINIUS. are, lord.  
  CASSIUS. Titinius, thou lovest me,
    Mount thou horse hide thy spurs him,
    Till brought thee yonder troops
    again, rest assured
    yond troops friend enemy.
  TITINIUS. again, thought.     Exit.
  CASSIUS. Go, Pindarus, higher hill;
    sight thick; regard Titinius,
    thou notest field.
                                      Pindarus ascends hill.
    day breathed first: time round,
    begin, end;
    life run compass. Sirrah, news?
  PINDARUS. [Above.] O lord!
  CASSIUS. news?
  PINDARUS. [Above.] Titinius enclosed round about
    horsemen, make spur;
    spurs on. him.
    Now, Titinius! light. O, lights too.
    ta'en [Shout.] And, hark! shout joy.  
  CASSIUS. down; behold more.
    O, coward am, live long,
    friend ta'en face!
                                              Pindarus descends.
    hither, sirrah.
    Parthia thee prisoner,
    swore thee, saving thy life,
    whatsoever bid thee do,
    Thou shouldst attempt it. now, thine oath;
    freeman, good sword,
    ran Caesar's bowels, search bosom.
    Stand answer: here, thou hilts;
    face cover'd, 'tis now,
    Guide thou sword. [Pindarus stabs him.] Caesar, thou art
      revenged,
    sword kill'd thee.                  Dies.
  PINDARUS. So, free, been,
    Durst will. O Cassius!
    country Pindarus run,
    Roman note him.              Exit.  

                Re-enter Titinius Messala.

  MESSALA. change, Titinius, Octavius
    overthrown noble Brutus' power,
    Cassius' legions Antony.
  TITINIUS. tidings comfort Cassius.
  MESSALA. leave him?
  TITINIUS. disconsolate,
    Pindarus bondman, hill.
  MESSALA. lies ground?
  TITINIUS. lies living. O heart!
  MESSALA. he?
  TITINIUS. No, he, Messala,
    Cassius more. O setting sun,
    thy red rays thou dost sink night,
    red blood Cassius' day set,
    sun Rome set! day gone;
    Clouds, dews, dangers come; deeds done!
    Mistrust success hath deed.  
  MESSALA. Mistrust good success hath deed.
    O hateful error, melancholy's child,
    dost thou show apt thoughts men
    things not? O error, conceived,
    Thou comest happy birth,
    kill'st mother engender'd thee!
  TITINIUS. What, Pindarus! art thou, Pindarus?
  MESSALA. Seek him, Titinius, whilst meet
    noble Brutus, thrusting report
    ears. "thrusting" it,
    piercing steel darts envenomed
    ears Brutus
    tidings sight.
  TITINIUS. Hie you, Messala,
    seek Pindarus while.        Exit Messala.
    didst thou send forth, brave Cassius?
    meet thy friends? they
    Put brows wreath victory,
    bid give thee? Didst thou hear shouts?
    Alas, thou hast misconstrued everything!  
    But, hold thee, garland thy brow;
    Thy Brutus bid give thee, I
    bidding. Brutus, apace,
    regarded Caius Cassius.
    leave, gods, Roman's part.
    Come, Cassius' sword, find Titinius' heart.
                                                  Kills himself.

       Alarum. Re-enter Messala, Brutus, young Cato,
                         others.

  BRUTUS. Where, where, Messala, doth body lie?
  MESSALA. Lo, yonder, Titinius mourning it.
  BRUTUS. Titinius' face upward.
  CATO. slain.
  BRUTUS. O Julius Caesar, thou art mighty yet!
    Thy spirit walks abroad, turns swords
    proper entrails.                     Low alarums.
  CATO. Brave Titinius!
    whe'er crown'd dead Cassius!  
  BRUTUS. Romans living these?
    Romans, fare thee well!
    impossible Rome
    breed thy fellow. Friends, owe moe tears
    dead man pay.
    find time, Cassius, find time.
    therefore, Thasos send body;
    funerals camp,
    discomfort us. Lucilius, come,
    come, young Cato; field.
    Labio Flavio, set battles on.
    'Tis o'clock, Romans, ere night
    fortune fight.              Exeunt.




SCENE IV.
Another part field.

Alarum. Enter, fighting, Soldiers armies; Brutus, young Cato,
Lucilius, others.

  BRUTUS. Yet, countrymen, O, hold heads!
  CATO. bastard doth not? me?
    proclaim field.
    son Marcus Cato, ho!
    foe tyrants, country's friend.
    son Marcus Cato, ho!
  BRUTUS. Brutus, Marcus Brutus, I;
    Brutus, country's friend; Brutus!       Exit.
  LUCILIUS. O young noble Cato, art thou down?
    Why, thou diest bravely Titinius,
    mayst honor'd, Cato's son.
  SOLDIER. Yield, thou diest.
  LUCILIUS. yield die.
    [Offers money.] thou wilt kill straight:
    Kill Brutus, honor'd death.
  SOLDIER. not. noble prisoner!  
  SOLDIER. Room, ho! Antony, Brutus ta'en.
  SOLDIER. news. general.

                         Enter Antony.

    Brutus ta'en, Brutus ta'en, lord.
  ANTONY. he?
  LUCILIUS. Safe, Antony, Brutus safe enough.
    dare assure thee enemy
    alive noble Brutus;
    gods defend great shame!
    find him, alive dead,
    found Brutus, himself.
  ANTONY. Brutus, friend, but, assure you,
    prize worth. man safe,
    Give kindness; have
    men friends enemies. on,
    wheer Brutus alive dead,
    bring word Octavius' tent
    chanced.                           Exeunt.




SCENE V.
Another part field.

Enter Brutus, Dardanius, Clitus, Strato, Volumnius.

  BRUTUS. Come, poor remains friends, rest rock.
  CLITUS. Statilius show'd torchlight, but, lord,
    back. ta'en slain.
  BRUTUS. Sit thee down, Clitus. Slaying word:
    deed fashion. Hark thee, Clitus.        Whispers.
  CLITUS. What, I, lord? No, world.
  BRUTUS. Peace then, words.
  CLITUS. kill myself.
  BRUTUS. Hark thee, Dardanius.                        Whispers.
  DARDANIUS. deed?
  CLITUS. O Dardanius!
  DARDANIUS. O Clitus!
  CLITUS. ill request Brutus make thee?
  DARDANIUS. kill him, Clitus. Look, meditates.
  CLITUS. noble vessel full grief,
    runs eyes.
  BRUTUS. hither, good Volumnius, list word.  
  VOLUMNIUS. lord?
  BRUTUS. Why, this, Volumnius:
    ghost Caesar hath appear'd me
    times night; Sardis once,
    night Philippi fields.
    hour come.
  VOLUMNIUS. so, lord.
  BRUTUS. Nay is, Volumnius.
    Thou seest world, Volumnius, goes;
    enemies beat pit;            Low alarums.
    worthy leap ourselves
    tarry till push us. Good Volumnius,
    Thou know'st school together;
    love old, prithee,
    Hold thou sword-hilts, whilst run it.
  VOLUMNIUS. office friend, lord.
                                                   Alarum still.
  CLITUS. Fly, fly, lord, tarrying here.
  BRUTUS. Farewell you, you, you, Volumnius.
    Strato, thou hast asleep;  
    Farewell thee too, Strato. Countrymen,
    heart doth joy life
    found man true me.
    glory losing day,
    Octavius Mark Antony
    vile conquest attain unto.
    So, fare once, Brutus' tongue
    Hath ended life's history.
    Night hangs mine eyes, bones rest
    labor'd attain hour.
                            Alarum. Cry within, "Fly, fly, fly!"
  CLITUS. Fly, lord, fly.
  BRUTUS. Hence! follow.
                        Exeunt Clitus, Dardanius, Volumnius.
    prithee, Strato, stay thou thy lord.
    Thou art fellow good respect;
    Thy life hath smatch honor it.
    Hold sword, turn thy face,
    run it. Wilt thou, Strato?
  STRATO. Give hand first. Fare well, lord.  
  BRUTUS. Farewell, good Strato.              Runs sword.
    Caesar, still;
    kill'd thee half good will.            Dies.

     Alarum. Retreat. Enter Octavius, Antony, Messala,
                 Lucilius, Army.

  OCTAVIUS. man that?
  MESSALA. master's man. Strato, thy master?
  STRATO. Free bondage in, Messala:
    conquerors make fire him;
    Brutus overcame himself,
    man hath honor death.
  LUCILIUS. Brutus found. thee, Brutus,
    thou hast proved Lucilius' true.
  OCTAVIUS. served Brutus, entertain them.
    Fellow, wilt thou bestow thy time me?
  STRATO. Ay, Messala prefer you.
  OCTAVIUS. so, good Messala.
  MESSALA. died master, Strato?  
  STRATO. held sword, run it.
  MESSALA. Octavius, follow thee
    latest service master.
  ANTONY. noblest Roman all.
    conspirators, save he,
    envy great Caesar;
    only, general honest thought
    common good all, made them.
    life gentle, elements
    mix'd Nature stand up
    world, "This man!"
  OCTAVIUS. virtue him
    respect rites burial.
    tent bones tonight lie,
    soldier, ordered honorably.
    call field rest, away,
    part glories happy day.              Exeunt.


THE END

1606


THE TRAGEDY KING LEAR

by William Shakespeare




Dramatis Personae

      Lear, King Britain.
      King France.
      Duke Burgundy.
      Duke Cornwall.
      Duke Albany.
      Earl Kent.
      Earl Gloucester.
      Edgar, son Gloucester.
      Edmund, bastard son Gloucester.
      Curan, courtier.
      Man, tenant Gloucester.
      Doctor.
      Lear's Fool.
      Oswald, steward Goneril.
      Captain Edmund's command.
      Gentlemen.
      Herald.
      Servants Cornwall.

      Goneril, daughter Lear.
      Regan, daughter Lear.
      Cordelia, daughter Lear.

      Knights attending Lear, Officers, Messengers, Soldiers,
        Attendants.




<<THIS ELECTRONIC VERSION COMPLETE WORKS WILLIAM
SHAKESPEARE COPYRIGHT 1990-1993 WORLD LIBRARY, INC., IS
PROVIDED PROJECT GUTENBERG ETEXT ILLINOIS BENEDICTINE COLLEGE

Scene: - Britain.


ACT I. Scene I.
[King Lear's Palace.]

Enter Kent, Gloucester, Edmund. [Kent Glouceste converse.
Edmund stands back.]

  Kent. thought King affected Duke Albany than
     Cornwall.
  Glou. us; now, division the
     kingdom, appears Dukes values most, for
     equalities weigh'd curiosity make
     choice either's moiety.
  Kent. son, lord?
  Glou. breeding, sir, hath charge. often
     blush'd acknowledge braz'd to't.
  Kent. conceive you.
  Glou. Sir, young fellow's mother could; grew
     round-womb'd, indeed, sir, son cradle ere she
     husband bed. smell fault?
  Kent. fault undone, issue so
     proper.
  Glou. have, sir, son order law, year elder than
     this, dearer account. knave came
     saucily world for,  
     mother fair, good sport making, the
     whoreson acknowledged.- noble gentleman,
     Edmund?
  Edm. [comes forward] No, lord.
  Glou. Lord Kent. Remember honourable
     friend.
  Edm. services lordship.
  Kent. love you, sue better.
  Edm. Sir, study deserving.
  Glou. hath years, again.
                                                 Sound sennet.
     King coming.

      Enter bearing coronet; Lear; Dukes of
      Albany Cornwall; next, Goneril, Regan, Cordelia, with
                              Followers.

  Lear. Attend lords France Burgundy, Gloucester.
  Glou. shall, liege.
                                 Exeunt [Gloucester Edmund].
  Lear. Meantime express darker purpose.
     Give map there. divided  
     kingdom; 'tis fast intent
     shake cares business age,
     Conferring younger strengths we
     Unburthen'd crawl death. son Cornwall,
     you, loving son Albany,
     hour constant publish
     daughters' dowers, future strife
     prevented now. princes, France Burgundy,
     Great rivals youngest daughter's love,
     Long court made amorous sojourn,
     answer'd. me, daughters
     (Since divest rule,
     Interest territory, cares state),
     doth love most?
     largest bounty extend
     nature doth merit challenge. Goneril,
     eldest-born, speak first.
  Gon. Sir, love words wield matter;
     Dearer eyesight, space, liberty;
     valued, rich rare;  
     life, grace, health, beauty, honour;
     child e'er lov'd, father found;
     love makes breath poor, speech unable.
     manner love you.
  Cor. [aside] Cordelia speak? Love, silent.
  Lear. bounds, line this,
     shadowy forests champains rich'd,
     plenteous rivers wide-skirted meads,
     make thee lady. thine Albany's issue
     perpetual.- daughter,
     dearest Regan, wife Cornwall? Speak.
  Reg. Sir, made
     selfsame metal sister is,
     prize worth. true heart
     find names deed love;
     short, profess
     enemy joys
     precious square sense possesses,
     find felicitate
     dear Highness' love.  
  Cor. [aside] poor Cordelia!
     so; love's
     richer tongue.
  Lear. thee thine hereditary ever
     Remain ample fair kingdom,
     space, validity, pleasure
     conferr'd Goneril.- Now, joy,
     last, least; young love
     vines France milk Burgundy
     Strive interest; draw
     opulent sisters? Speak.
  Cor. Nothing, lord.
  Lear. Nothing?
  Cor. Nothing.
  Lear. nothing. Speak again.
  Cor. Unhappy am, heave
     heart mouth. love Majesty
     bond; less.
  Lear. How, how, Cordelia? Mend speech little,
     mar fortunes.  
  Cor. Good lord,
     begot me, bred me, lov'd me; I
     Return duties back fit,
     Obey you, love you, honour you.
     sisters husbands, say
     love all? Haply, wed,
     lord hand plight carry
     Half love him, half care duty.
     marry sisters,
     love father all.
  Lear. thy heart this?
  Cor. Ay, good lord.
  Lear. young, untender?
  Cor. young, lord, true.
  Lear. so! thy truth thy dower!
     For, sacred radiance sun,
     mysteries Hecate night;
     operation orbs
     exist cease be;
     disclaim paternal care,  
     Propinquity property blood,
     stranger heart me
     Hold thee ever. barbarous Scythian,
     makes generation messes
     gorge appetite, bosom
     neighbour'd, pitied, reliev'd,
     thou daughter.
  Kent. Good liege-
  Lear. Peace, Kent!
     dragon wrath.
     lov'd most, thought set rest
     kind nursery.- avoid sight!-
     grave peace give
     father's heart her! Call France! stirs?
     Call Burgundy! Cornwall Albany,
     daughters' dowers digest third;
     pride, calls plainness, marry her.
     invest jointly power,
     Preeminence, large effects
     troop majesty. Ourself, monthly course,  
     reservation hundred knights,
     sustain'd, abode
     Make due turns. retain
     name, th' additions king. sway,
     Revenue, execution rest,
     Beloved sons, yours; confirm,
     coronet part betwixt you.
  Kent. Royal Lear,
     honour'd king,
     Lov'd father, master follow'd,
     great patron thought prayers-
  Lear. bow bent drawn; make shaft.
  Kent. fall rather, fork invade
     region heart! Kent unmannerly
     Lear mad. wouldst thou do, man?
     Think'st thou duty dread speak
     power flattery bows? plainness honour's bound
     majesty falls folly. Reverse thy doom;
     thy consideration check
     hideous rashness. Answer life judgment,  
     Thy youngest daughter love thee least,
     empty-hearted low sound
     Reverbs hollowness.
  Lear. Kent, thy life, more!
  Kent. life held pawn
     wage thine enemies; fear lose it,
     Thy safety motive.
  Lear. sight!
  Kent. better, Lear, remain
     true blank thine eye.
  Lear. Apollo-
  Kent. Apollo, King,
     Thou swear'st thy gods vain.
  Lear. O vassal! miscreant!
                                   [Lays hand sword.]
  Alb., Corn. Dear sir, forbear!
  Kent. Do!
     Kill thy physician, fee bestow
     foul disease. Revoke thy gift,
     Or, whilst vent clamour throat,  
     thee thou dost evil.
  Lear. Hear me, recreant!
     thine allegiance, hear me!
     thou hast sought make break vow-
     durst yet- strain'd pride
     sentence power,-
     nature place bear,-
     potency made good, thy reward.
     days allot thee provision
     shield thee diseases world,
     sixth turn thy hated back
     kingdom. If, tenth day following,
     Thy banish'd trunk found dominions,
     moment thy death. Away! Jupiter,
     revok'd.
  Kent. Fare thee well, King. thou wilt appear,
     Freedom lives hence, banishment here.
     [To Cordelia] gods dear shelter thee, maid,
     justly think'st hast rightly said!
     [To Regan Goneril] large speeches deeds  
        approve,
     good effects spring words love.
     Kent, O princes, bids adieu;
     shape country new.
Exit.

  Flourish. Enter Gloucester, France Burgundy; Attendants.

  Glou. France Burgundy, noble lord.
  Lear. Lord Burgundy,
     address you, king
     Hath rivall'd daughter. least
     require present dower her,
     cease quest love?
  Bur. royal Majesty,
     crave hath Highness offer'd,
     tender less.
  Lear. noble Burgundy,
     dear us, hold so;
     price fall'n. Sir, stands.
     aught substance,
     it, displeasure piec'd,  
     more, fitly Grace,
     there, yours.
  Bur. answer.
  Lear. you, infirmities owes,
     Unfriended, adopted hate,
     Dow'r'd curse, stranger'd oath,
     her, leave her?
  Bur. Pardon me, royal sir.
     Election makes conditions.
  Lear. leave her, sir; for, pow'r made me,
     wealth. [To France] you, great King,
     love make stray
     match hate; beseech you
     T' avert liking worthier way
     wretch nature asham'd
     t' acknowledge hers.
  France. strange,
     object,
     argument praise, balm age,
     best, dearest, trice time  
     Commit thing monstrous dismantle
     folds favour. offence
     unnatural degree
     monsters it, fore-vouch'd affection
     Fall'n taint; her
     faith reason miracle
     plant me.
  Cor. beseech Majesty,
     glib oily art
     speak purpose not, intend,
     do't speak- make known
     vicious blot, murther, foulness,
     unchaste action dishonoured step,
     hath depriv'd grace favour;
     richer-
     still-soliciting eye, tongue
     glad not, it
     Hath lost liking.
  Lear. thou
     Hadst born t' pleas'd better.  
  France. this- tardiness nature
     leaves history unspoke
     intends do? Lord Burgundy,
     lady? Love's love
     mingled stands
     Aloof th' entire point. her?
     dowry.
  Bur. Royal Lear,
     Give portion propos'd,
     Cordelia hand,
     Duchess Burgundy.
  Lear. Nothing! sworn; firm.
  Bur. lost father
     lose husband.
  Cor. Peace Burgundy!
     respects fortune love,
     wife.
  France. Fairest Cordelia, art rich, poor;
     choice, forsaken; lov'd, despis'd!
     Thee thy virtues seize upon.  
     lawful cast away.
     Gods, gods! 'tis strange cold'st neglect
     love kindle inflam'd respect.
     Thy dow'rless daughter, King, thrown chance,
     queen us, ours, fair France.
     dukes wat'rish Burgundy
     buy unpriz'd precious maid me.
     Bid farewell, Cordelia, unkind.
     Thou losest here, find.
  Lear. Thou hast her, France; thine; we
     daughter, see
     face again. gone
     grace, love, benison.
     Come, noble Burgundy.
             Flourish. Exeunt Lear, Burgundy, [Cornwall, Albany,
                                    Gloucester, Attendants].
  France. Bid farewell sisters.
  Cor. jewels father, wash'd eyes
     Cordelia leaves you. are;
     And, sister, loath call  
     faults nam'd. father.
     professed bosoms commit him;
     yet, alas, stood grace,
     prefer place!
     farewell both.
  Gon. Prescribe duties.
  Reg. study
     content lord, hath receiv'd you
     fortune's alms. obedience scanted,
     worth wanted.
  Cor. Time unfold plighted cunning hides.
     cover faults, shame derides.
     prosper!
  France. Come, fair Cordelia.
                                     Exeunt France Cordelia.
  Gon. Sister, nearly
     appertains both. father to-night.
  Reg. certain, you; month us.
  Gon. full age is. observation we
     made hath little. lov'd  
     sister most, poor judgment hath cast her
     appears grossly.
  Reg. 'Tis infirmity age; hath slenderly
     himself.
  Gon. soundest time hath rash; then
     receive age, the
     imperfections long-ingraffed condition, therewithal
     unruly waywardness infirm choleric years bring with
     them.
  Reg. unconstant starts this
     Kent's banishment.
  Gon. compliment leave-taking France and
     him. Pray hit together. father carry authority
     dispositions bears, surrender his
     offend us.
  Reg. on't.
  Gon. something, i' th' heat.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene II.
The Earl Gloucester's Castle.

Enter [Edmund the] Bastard solus, [with letter].

  Edm. Thou, Nature, art goddess; thy law
     services bound. Wherefore I
     Stand plague custom, permit
     curiosity nations deprive me,
     twelve fourteen moonshines
     Lag brother? bastard? wherefore base?
     dimensions compact,
     mind generous, shape true,
     honest madam's issue? brand us
     base? baseness? bastardy? base, base?
     Who, lusty stealth nature, take
     composition fierce quality
     doth, dull, stale, tired bed,
     th' creating tribe fops
     'tween asleep wake? then,
     Legitimate Edgar, land.
     father's love bastard Edmund
     th' legitimate. Fine word- 'legitimate'!
     Well, legitimate, letter speed,  
     invention thrive, Edmund base
     top th' legitimate. grow; prosper.
     Now, gods, stand bastards!

                          Enter Gloucester.

  Glou. Kent banish'd thus? France choler parted?
     King to-night? subscrib'd pow'r?
     Confin'd exhibition? done
     gad? Edmund, now? news?
  Edm. lordship, none.
                                           [Puts letter.]
  Glou. earnestly seek put letter?
  Edm. news, lord.
  Glou. paper reading?
  Edm. Nothing, lord.
  Glou. No? needed terrible dispatch your
     pocket? quality hath hide
     itself. see. Come, nothing, need
     spectacles.
  Edm. beseech you, sir, pardon me. letter brother
     o'er-read;  
     perus'd, find fit o'erlooking.
  Glou. Give letter, sir.
  Edm. offend, detain give it. contents, as
     part understand them, blame.
  Glou. see, see!
  Edm. hope, brother's justification, wrote as
     essay taste virtue.

  Glou. (reads) 'This policy reverence age makes world
     bitter times; fortunes us
     till oldness relish them. begin find idle
     fond bondage oppression aged tyranny, sways,
     hath power, suffer'd. me, that
     speak more. father sleep till I
     wak'd him, enjoy half revenue ever, live
     beloved brother,
                                                        'EDGAR.'

     Hum! Conspiracy? 'Sleep till wak'd him, enjoy half
     revenue.' son Edgar! hand write this? heart
     brain breed in? you? brought it?
  Edm. brought me, lord: cunning it.  
     found thrown casement closet.
  Glou. character brother's?
  Edm. matter good, lord, durst swear his;
     respect that, fain not.
  Glou. his.
  Edm. hand, lord; hope heart the
     contents.
  Glou. Hath sounded business?
  Edm. Never, lord. heard oft maintain fit
     that, sons perfect age, fathers declining, father
     ward son, son manage revenue.
  Glou. O villain, villain! opinion letter! Abhorred
     villain! Unnatural, detested, brutish villain! worse than
     brutish! Go, sirrah, seek him. apprehend him. Abominable
     villain! he?
  Edm. know, lord. suspend
     indignation brother till derive him
     testimony intent, run course;
     where, violently proceed him, mistaking his
     purpose, make great gap honour shake  
     pieces heart obedience. dare pawn life
     hath writ feel affection your
     honour, pretence danger.
  Glou. so?
  Edm. honour judge meet, place shall
     hear confer auricular assurance your
     satisfaction, delay very
     evening.
  Glou. monster.
  Edm. not, sure.
  Glou. father, tenderly loves him.
     Heaven earth! Edmund, seek out; wind him, pray
     you; frame business wisdom. unstate
     due resolution.
  Edm. seek him, sir, presently; convey business I
     find means, acquaint withal.
  Glou. late eclipses sun moon portend good to
     us. wisdom nature reason thus, yet
     nature finds scourg'd sequent effects. Love cools,
     friendship falls off, brothers divide. cities, mutinies;  
     countries, discord; palaces, treason; bond crack'd
     'twixt son father. villain mine the
     prediction; son father: King falls bias
     nature; father child. best
     time. Machinations, hollowness, treachery, all
     ruinous disorders follow disquietly graves. Find out
     villain, Edmund; lose thee nothing; it
     carefully. noble true-hearted Kent banish'd! his
     offence, honesty! 'Tis strange.                       Exit.
  Edm. excellent foppery world, that, are
     sick fortune, surfeit behaviour, make
     guilty disasters sun, moon, stars; if
     villains necessity; fools heavenly compulsion;
     knaves, thieves, treachers spherical pre-dominance;
     drunkards, liars, adulterers enforc'd obedience of
     planetary influence; evil in, divine
     thrusting on. admirable evasion whore-master man, lay
     goatish disposition charge star! father
     compounded mother Dragon's Tail, my
     nativity Ursa Major, rough  
     lecherous. Fut! am, the
     maidenliest star firmament twinkled bastardizing.
     Edgar-

                             Enter Edgar.

     pat! comes, catastrophe comedy. My
     cue villainous melancholy, sigh Tom o' Bedlam.
     O, eclipses portend divisions! Fa, sol, la, mi.
  Edg. now, brother Edmund? contemplation you
     in?
  Edm. thinking, brother, prediction read day,
     follow eclipses.
  Edg. busy that?
  Edm. promise you, effects writes succeed unhappily: as
     unnaturalness child parent; death,
     dearth, dissolutions ancient amities; divisions state,
     menaces maledictions king nobles; needless
     diffidences, banishment friends, dissipation cohorts,
     nuptial breaches, what.
  Edg. long sectary astronomical?
  Edm. Come, come! father last?  
  Edg. night by.
  Edm. Spake him?
  Edg. Ay, hours together.
  Edm. Parted good terms? Found displeasure by
     word countenance
  Edg. all.
  Edm. Bethink offended him; my
     entreaty forbear presence time hath
     qualified heat displeasure, instant so
     rageth mischief person would
     scarcely allay.
  Edg. villain hath wrong.
  Edm. fear. pray continent forbearance till
     speed rage slower; and, say, retire me
     lodging, fitly bring hear my
     lord speak. Pray ye, go! key. stir abroad,
     arm'd.
  Edg. Arm'd, brother?
  Edm. Brother, advise best. arm'd. honest man
     good meaning you. told  
     heard; faintly, image and
     horror it. Pray you, away!
  Edg. hear anon?
  Edm. serve business.
                                                     Exit Edgar.
     credulous father! brother noble,
     nature harms
     suspects none; foolish honesty
     practices ride easy! business.
     me, birth, lands wit;
     me's meet fashion fit.
Exit.




Scene III.
The Duke Albany's Palace.

Enter Goneril [her] Steward [Oswald].

  Gon. father strike gentleman chiding fool?
  Osw. Ay, madam.
  Gon. day night, wrongs me! hour
     flashes gross crime other
     sets odds. endure it.
     knights grow riotous, upbraids us
     trifle. returns hunting,
     speak him. sick.
     slack services,
     well; fault answer.
                                                 [Horns within.]
  Osw. coming, madam; hear him.
  Gon. Put weary negligence please,
     fellows. question.
     distaste it, sister,
     mind mine one,
     overrul'd. Idle man,  
     manage authorities
     hath away! Now, life,
     fools babes again, us'd
     checks flatteries, abus'd.
     Remember said.
  Osw. well, madam.
  Gon. knights colder you.
     grows it, matter. Advise fellows so.
     breed occasions, shall,
     speak. write straight sister
     hold course. Prepare dinner.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene IV.
The Duke Albany's Palace.

Enter Kent, [disguised].

  Kent. accents borrow,
     speech defuse, good intent
     carry full issue
     raz'd likeness. Now, banish'd Kent,
     thou canst serve thou dost stand condemn'd,
     come, thy master, thou lov'st,
     find thee full labours.

         Horns within. Enter Lear, [Knights,] Attendants.

  Lear. stay jot dinner; ready. [Exit
     Attendant.] now? art thou?
  Kent. man, sir.
  Lear. dost thou profess? wouldst thou us?
  Kent. profess seem, serve truly
     put trust, love honest, to
     converse wise little, fear  
     judgment, fight choose, eat fish.
  Lear. art thou?
  Kent. honest-hearted fellow, poor King.
  Lear. thou be'st poor subject king, thou
     art poor enough. wouldst thou?
  Kent. Service.
  Lear. wouldst thou serve?
  Kent. You.
  Lear. Dost thou me, fellow?
  Kent. No, sir; countenance would
     fain call master.
  Lear. that?
  Kent. Authority.
  Lear. services canst thou do?
  Kent. honest counsel, ride, run, mar curious tale in
     telling deliver plain message bluntly. which
     ordinary men fit for, qualified in, me
     diligence.
  Lear. art thou?
  Kent. young, sir, love woman singing,  
     dote anything. years back forty-eight.
  Lear. Follow me; thou shalt serve me. thee worse after
     dinner, part thee yet. Dinner, ho, dinner!
     knave? fool? call fool hither.

                                            [Exit attendant.]

                     Enter [Oswald the] Steward.

     You, you, sirrah, daughter?
  Osw. you-                                      Exit.
  Lear. fellow there? Call clotpoll back.
     [Exit Knight.] fool, ho? world's
     asleep.

                            [Enter Knight]

     now? mongrel?
  Knight. says, lord, daughter well.
  Lear. slave back call'd him?  
  Knight. Sir, answered roundest manner, not.
  Lear. not?
  Knight. lord, matter is; judgment
     Highness entertain'd ceremonious affection
     wont. great abatement kindness appears
     general dependants Duke also
     daughter.
  Lear. Ha! say'st thou so?
  Knight. beseech pardon me, lord, mistaken; for
     duty silent Highness wrong'd.
  Lear. Thou rememb'rest mine conception. have
     perceived faint neglect late, rather
     blamed mine jealous curiosity pretence
     purpose unkindness. into't. But
     fool? days.
  Knight. young lady's France, sir, fool
     hath pined away.
  Lear. that; noted well. my
     daughter speak her. [Exit Knight.] you, call
     fool.  
                                            [Exit Attendant.]

                     Enter [Oswald the] Steward.

     O, you, sir, you! hither, sir. I, sir?
  Osw. lady's father.
  Lear. 'My lady's father'? lord's knave! whoreson dog! you
     slave! cur!
  Osw. these, lord; beseech pardon.
  Lear. bandy me, rascal?
                                                  [Strikes him.]
  Osw. strucken, lord.
  Kent. tripp'd neither, base football player?
                                            [Trips heels.
  Lear. thee, fellow. Thou serv'st me, love thee.
  Kent. Come, sir, arise, away! teach differences. Away,
     away! measure lubber's length again, tarry; but
     away! to! wisdom? So.
                                               [Pushes out.]
  Lear. Now, friendly knave, thee. earnest thy  
     service.                                     [Gives money.]

                             Enter Fool.

  Fool. hire too. coxcomb.
                                          [Offers Kent cap.]
  Lear. now, pretty knave? dost thou?
  Fool. Sirrah, coxcomb.
  Kent. Why, fool?
  Fool. Why? taking one's part favour. Nay, thou
     canst smile wind sits, thou'lt catch cold shortly.
     There, coxcomb! Why, fellow hath banish'd on's
     daughters, blessing will. If
     thou follow him, thou wear coxcomb.- now,
     nuncle? coxcombs daughters!
  Lear. Why, boy?
  Fool. gave living, I'ld coxcombs myself.
     mine! beg thy daughters.
  Lear. heed, sirrah- whip.
  Fool. Truth's dog kennel; whipp'd out,  
     Lady brach stand th' fire stink.
  Lear. pestilent gall me!
  Fool. Sirrah, teach thee speech.
  Lear. Do.
  Fool. Mark it, nuncle.
          thou showest,
          Speak thou knowest,
          Lend thou owest,
          Ride thou goest,
          Learn thou trowest,
          Set thou throwest;
          Leave thy drink thy whore,
          in-a-door,
          thou shalt more
          tens score.
  Kent. nothing, fool.
  Fool. 'tis breath unfeed lawyer- gave me
     for't. make nothing, nuncle?
  Lear. Why, no, boy. made nothing.
  Fool. [to Kent] Prithee him, rent land  
     to. fool.
  Lear. bitter fool!
  Fool. Dost thou difference, boy, bitter
     fool sweet fool?
  Lear. No, lad; teach me.
  Fool.   lord counsell'd thee
            give thy land,
          place me-
            thou stand.
          sweet bitter fool
            presently appear;
          motley here,
            found there.
  Lear. Dost thou call fool, boy?
  Fool. thy titles thou hast away; thou wast
     born with.
  Kent. altogether fool, lord.
  Fool. No, faith; lords great men me. a
     monopoly out, part on't. ladies too, they
     fool myself;  
     snatching. Give egg, nuncle, give thee two
     crowns.
  Lear. crowns be?
  Fool. Why, cut egg i' th' middle eat the
     meat, crowns egg. thou clovest thy crown i'
     th' middle gav'st parts, thou bor'st thine ass on
     thy back o'er dirt. Thou hadst wit thy bald crown
     thou gav'st thy golden away. speak in
     this, whipp'd finds so.

     [Sings]    Fools ne'er grace year,
                  wise men grown foppish;
                wits wear,
                  manners apish.

  Lear. wont full songs, sirrah?
  Fool. us'd it, nuncle, thou mad'st thy daughters
     thy mother; thou gav'st rod, put'st down
     thine breeches,
  
     [Sings]    sudden joy weep,
                  sorrow sung,
                king play bo-peep
                  fools among.

     Prithee, nuncle, schoolmaster teach thy fool to
     lie. fain learn lie.
  Lear. lie, sirrah, whipp'd.
  Fool. marvel kin thou thy daughters are. me
     whipp'd speaking true; thou'lt whipp'd lying;
     whipp'd holding peace. be
     kind o' thing fool! thee,
     nuncle. Thou hast pared thy wit o' sides left nothing
     i' th' middle. o' parings.

                            Enter Goneril.

  Lear. now, daughter? makes frontlet on? Methinks you
     o' late i' th' frown.
  Fool. Thou wast pretty fellow thou hadst care  
     frowning. thou art O figure. better
     thou art now: fool, thou art nothing.
     [To Goneril] Yes, forsooth, hold tongue. face
     bids me, nothing. Mum, mum!

            crust crum,
            Weary all, some.-

     [Points Lear] sheal'd peascod.
  Gon. only, sir, all-licens'd fool,
     insolent retinue
     hourly carp quarrel, breaking forth
     rank not-to-be-endured riots. Sir,
     thought, making you,
     found safe redress, grow fearful,
     yourself, too, late spoke done,
     protect course, put on
     allowance; should, fault
     scape censure, redresses sleep,
     Which, tender wholesome weal,  
     working offence
     shame, necessity
     call discreet proceeding.
  Fool. know, nuncle,

          hedge-sparrow fed cuckoo long
          head bit young.

     candle, left darkling.
  Lear. daughter?
  Gon. Come, sir,
     make good wisdom
     Whereof fraught, put away
     dispositions late transform you
     rightly are.
  Fool. ass cart draws horse?
     Whoop, Jug, love thee!
  Lear. Doth me? Lear.
     Doth Lear walk thus? speak thus? eyes?
     notion weakens, discernings  
     lethargied- Ha! waking? 'Tis so!
     am?
  Fool. Lear's shadow.
  Lear. learn that; for, marks sovereignty,
     Knowledge, reason, false persuaded
     daughters.
  Fool. make obedient father.
  Lear. name, fair gentlewoman?
  Gon. admiration, sir, o' th' savour
     pranks. beseech you
     understand purposes aright.
     reverend, wise.
     hundred knights squires;
     Men disorder'd, debosh'd, bold
     court, infected manners,
     Shows riotous inn. Epicurism lust
     Make tavern brothel
     grac'd palace. shame doth speak
     instant remedy. desir'd
     thing begs  
     disquantity train,
     remainder depend
     men besort age,
     themselves, you.
  Lear. Darkness devils!
     Saddle horses! Call train together!
     Degenerate bastard, trouble thee;
     left daughter.
  Gon. strike people, disorder'd rabble
     Make servants betters.

                            Enter Albany.

  Lear. Woe late repents!- O, sir, come?
     will? Speak, sir!- Prepare horses.
     Ingratitude, thou marble-hearted fiend,
     hideous thou show'st thee child
     sea-monster!
  Alb. Pray, sir, patient.
  Lear. [to Goneril] Detested kite, thou liest!  
     train men choice rarest parts,
     particulars duty know
     exact regard support
     worships name.- O small fault,
     ugly didst thou Cordelia show!
     Which, engine, wrench'd frame nature
     fix'd place; drew heart love
     added gall. O Lear, Lear, Lear!
     Beat gate thy folly  [Strikes head.]
     thy dear judgment out! Go, go, people.
  Alb. lord, guiltless, ignorant
     hath mov'd you.
  Lear. so, lord.
     Hear, Nature, hear! dear goddess, hear!
     Suspend thy purpose, thou didst intend
     make creature fruitful.
     womb convey sterility;
     Dry organs increase;
     derogate body spring
     babe honour her! teem,  
     Create child spleen, live
     thwart disnatur'd torment her.
     stamp wrinkles brow youth,
     cadent tears fret channels cheeks,
     Turn mother's pains benefits
     laughter contempt, feel
     sharper serpent's tooth is
     thankless child! Away, away!                Exit.
  Alb. Now, gods adore, whereof this?
  Gon. afflict cause;
     disposition scope
     dotage it.

                             Enter Lear.

  Lear. What, fifty followers clap?
     fortnight?
  Alb. matter, sir?
  Lear. thee. [To Goneril] Life death! asham'd
     thou hast power shake manhood thus;  
     hot tears, break perforce,
     make thee worth them. Blasts fogs thee!
     Th' untented woundings father's curse
     Pierce sense thee!- fond eyes,
     Beweep again, pluck ye out,
     cast you, waters lose,
     temper clay. Yea, this?
     so. left daughter,
     kind comfortable.
     hear thee, nails
     flay thy wolvish visage. Thou shalt find
     resume shape thou dost think
     cast ever; thou shalt, warrant thee.
                            Exeunt [Lear, Kent, Attendants].
  Gon. mark that, lord?
  Alb. partial, Goneril,
     great love bear -
  Gon. Pray you, content.- What, Oswald, ho!
     [To Fool] You, sir, knave fool, master!
  Fool. Nuncle Lear, nuncle Lear, tarry! fool thee.  

          fox caught her,
          daughter,
          slaughter,
          cap buy halter.
          fool after.                       Exit.
  Gon. man hath good counsel! hundred knights?
     'Tis politic safe keep
     point hundred knights; yes, dream,
     buzz, fancy, complaint, dislike,
     enguard dotage pow'rs
     hold lives mercy.- Oswald, say!
  Alb. Well, fear far.
  Gon. Safer trust far.
     harms fear,
     fear taken. heart.
     hath utter'd writ sister.
     sustain hundred knights,
     show'd th' unfitness-
  
                     Enter [Oswald the] Steward.

     now, Oswald?
     What, writ letter sister?
  Osw. Yes, madam.
  Gon. company, horse!
     Inform full fear,
     thereto add reasons own
     compact more. gone,
     hasten return. [Exit Oswald.] No, no, lord!
     milky gentleness yours,
     condemn not, yet, pardon,
     task wisdom
     prais'd harmful mildness.
  Alb. eyes pierce tell.
     Striving better, oft mar well.
  Gon. Nay then-
  Alb. Well, well; th' event.                            Exeunt.




Scene V.
Court Duke Albany's Palace.

Enter Lear, Kent, Fool.

  Lear. Gloucester letters. Acquaint my
     daughter her
     demand letter. diligence speedy, I
     afore you.
  Kent. sleep, lord, till delivered letter.
Exit.
  Fool. man's brains in's heels, were't danger of
     kibes?
  Lear. Ay, boy.
  Fool. prithee merry. Thy wit ne'er slip-shod.
  Lear. Ha, ha, ha!
  Fool. Shalt thy daughter thee kindly; though
     crab's apple, tell
     tell.
  Lear. canst tell, boy?
  Fool. taste crab crab. Thou
     canst one's nose stands i' th' middle on's face?  
  Lear. No.
  Fool. Why, one's eyes side's nose, a
     man smell out, 'a spy into.
  Lear. wrong.
  Fool. Canst oyster makes shell?
  Lear. No.
  Fool. neither; snail house.
  Lear. Why?
  Fool. Why, put's head in; give daughters,
     leave horns case.
  Lear. forget nature. kind father!- horses
     ready?
  Fool. Thy asses 'em. reason stars
     moe pretty reason.
  Lear. eight?
  Fool. indeed. Thou wouldst make good fool.
  Lear. tak't perforce! Monster ingratitude!
  Fool. thou wert fool, nuncle, I'ld thee beaten being
     thy time.
  Lear. that?  
  Fool. Thou shouldst till thou hadst wise.
  Lear. O, mad, mad, sweet heaven!
     temper; mad!

                         [Enter Gentleman.]

     now? horses ready?
  Gent. Ready, lord.
  Lear. Come, boy.
  Fool. maid now, laughs departure,
     maid long, things cut shorter
                                                         Exeunt.

ACT II. Scene I.
A court Castle Earl Gloucester.

Enter [Edmund the] Bastard Curan, meeting.

  Edm. Save thee, Curan.
  Cur. you, sir. father, him
     notice Duke Cornwall Regan Duchess be
     night.
  Edm. that?
  Cur. Nay, not. heard news abroad- the
     whisper'd ones, ear-kissing arguments?
  Edm. I. Pray you, they?
  Cur. heard wars 'twixt Dukes
     Cornwall Albany?
  Edm. word.
  Cur. do, then, time. Fare well, sir.      Exit.
  Edm. Duke to-night? better! best!
     weaves perforce business.
     father hath set guard brother;
     thing, queasy question,
     act. Briefness fortune, work!  
     Brother, word! Descend! Brother, say!

                             Enter Edgar.

     father watches. O sir, fly place!
     Intelligence hid.
     good advantage night.
     spoken 'gainst Duke Cornwall?
     coming hither; now, i' th' night, i' th' haste,
     Regan him. said
     party 'gainst Duke Albany?
     Advise yourself.
  Edg. on't, word.
  Edm. hear father coming. Pardon me!
     cunning draw sword you.
     Draw, defend yourself; quit well.-
     Yield! father. Light, ho, here!
     Fly, brother.- Torches, torches!- farewell.
                                                     Exit Edgar.
     blood drawn beget opinion  
     fierce endeavour. [Stabs arm.] seen
        drunkards
     sport.- Father, father!-
     Stop, stop! help?

             Enter Gloucester, Servants torches.

  Glou. Now, Edmund, villain?
  Edm. stood dark, sharp sword out,
     Mumbling wicked charms, conjuring moon
     stand 's auspicious mistress.
  Glou. he?
  Edm. Look, sir, bleed.
  Glou. villain, Edmund?
  Edm. Fled way, sir. means could-
  Glou. Pursue him, ho! after.        [Exeunt Servants].
     means what?
  Edm. Persuade murther lordship;
     told revenging gods
     'Gainst parricides thunders bend;  
     Spoke manifold strong bond
     child bound th' father- sir, fine,
     loathly opposite stood
     unnatural purpose, fell motion
     prepared sword charges home
     unprovided body, lanch'd mine arm;
     alarum'd spirits,
     Bold quarrel's right, rous'd th' encounter,
     gasted noise made,
     Full suddenly fled.
  Glou. fly far.
     land remain uncaught;
     found- dispatch. noble Duke master,
     worthy arch patron, to-night.
     authority proclaim it
     find, deserve thanks,
     Bringing murderous caitiff stake;
     conceals him, death.
  Edm. dissuaded intent
     found pight it, curst speech  
     threaten'd discover him. replied,
     'Thou unpossessing bastard, dost thou think,
     stand thee, reposal
     trust, virtue, worth thee
     Make thy words faith'd? No. deny
     (As would; ay, thou didst produce
     character), I'ld turn all
     thy suggestion, plot, damned practice;
     thou make dullard world,
     thought profits death
     pregnant potential spurs
     make thee seek it.'
  Glou. Strong fast'ned villain!
     deny letter? him.
                                                  Tucket within.
     Hark, Duke's trumpets! comes.
     ports bar; villain scape;
     Duke grant that. Besides, picture
     send near, kingdom
     due note him, land,  
     Loyal natural boy, work means
     make thee capable.

                Enter Cornwall, Regan, Attendants.

  Corn. now, noble friend? hither
     (Which call now) heard strange news.
  Reg. true, vengeance short
     pursue th' offender. dost, lord?
  Glou. O madam, heart crack'd, crack'd!
  Reg. What, father's godson seek life?
     father nam'd? Edgar?
  Glou. O lady, lady, shame hid!
  Reg. companion riotous knights
     tend father?
  Glou. not, madam. 'Tis bad, bad!
  Edm. Yes, madam, consort.
  Reg. marvel ill affected.
     'Tis put man's death,
     th' expense waste revenues.  
     present evening sister
     inform'd them, cautions
     That, sojourn house,
     there.
  Corn. I, assure thee, Regan.
     Edmund, hear shown father
     childlike office.
  Edm. 'Twas duty, sir.
  Glou. bewray practice, receiv'd
     hurt see, striving apprehend him.
  Corn. pursued?
  Glou. Ay, good lord.
  Corn. taken, more
     fear'd harm. Make purpose,
     strength please. you, Edmund,
     virtue obedience doth instant
     commend itself, ours.
     Natures deep trust need;
     seize on.
  Edm. serve you, sir,  
     Truly, else.
  Glou. Grace.
  Corn. visit you-
  Reg. season, threading dark-ey'd night.
     Occasions, noble Gloucester, poise,
     advice.
     father hath writ, hath sister,
     differences, thought fit
     answer home. messengers
     attend dispatch. good friend,
     Lay comforts bosom, bestow
     needful counsel business,
     craves instant use.
  Glou. serve you, madam.
     Graces welcome.
                                               Exeunt. Flourish.




Scene II.
Before Gloucester's Castle.

Enter Kent [Oswald the] Steward, severally.

  Osw. Good dawning thee, friend. Art house?
  Kent. Ay.
  Osw. set horses?
  Kent. I' th' mire.
  Osw. Prithee, thou lov'st me, me.
  Kent. love thee not.
  Osw. then, care thee.
  Kent. thee Lipsbury Pinfold, make thee care for
     me.
  Osw. dost thou thus? thee not.
  Kent. Fellow, thee.
  Osw. dost thou for?
  Kent. knave; rascal; eater broken meats; base, proud,
     shallow, beggarly, three-suited, hundred-pound, filthy,
     worsted-stocking knave; lily-liver'd, action-taking, whoreson,
     glass-gazing, superserviceable, finical rogue;
     one-trunk-inheriting slave; wouldst bawd of
     good service, art composition knave,  
     beggar, coward, pander, son heir mongrel bitch;
     beat clamorous whining, thou deny the
     syllable thy addition.
  Osw. Why, monstrous fellow art thou, rail one
     thee thee!
  Kent. brazen-fac'd varlet art thou, deny thou knowest me!
     days ago beat thee tripp'd thy heels
     King? [Draws sword.] Draw, rogue! for, though
     night, moon shines. make sop o' th'
     moonshine o' you. Draw, whoreson cullionly barbermonger!
     draw!
  Osw. Away! thee.
  Kent. Draw, rascal! letters King, and
     Vanity puppet's part royalty father.
     Draw, rogue, carbonado shanks! Draw, you
     rascal! ways!
  Osw. Help, ho! murther! help!
  Kent. Strike, slave! Stand, rogue! Stand, neat slave!
     Strike!                                        [Beats him.]  
  Osw. Help, ho! murther! murther!

      Enter Edmund, rapier drawn, Gloucester, Cornwall,
                           Regan, Servants.

  Edm. now? matter?                 Parts [them].
  Kent. you, goodman boy, please! Come, flesh ye!
     on, young master!
  Glou. Weapons? arms? matter here?
  Corn. peace, lives!
     dies strikes again. matter?
  Reg. messengers sister King
  Corn. difference? Speak.
  Osw. scarce breath, lord.
  Kent. marvel, bestirr'd valour. cowardly
     rascal, nature disclaims thee; tailor made thee.
  Corn. Thou art strange fellow. tailor make man?
  Kent. Ay, tailor, sir. stonecutter painter have
     made ill, hours trade.
  Corn. Speak yet, grew quarrel?  
  Osw. ancient ruffian, sir, life spar'd
     suit grey beard-
  Kent. Thou whoreson zed! thou unnecessary letter! lord, if
     give leave, tread unbolted villain into
     mortar daub walls jakes him. 'Spare grey
     beard,' wagtail?
  Corn. Peace, sirrah!
     beastly knave, reverence?
  Kent. Yes, sir, anger hath privilege.
  Corn. art thou angry?
  Kent. slave wear sword,
     wears honesty. smiling rogues these,
     rats, oft bite holy cords atwain
     intrinse t' unloose; smooth passion
     natures lords rebel,
     Bring oil fire, snow colder moods;
     Renege, affirm, turn halcyon beaks
     gale vary masters,
     Knowing naught (like dogs) following.
     plague epileptic visage!  
     Smile speeches, fool?
     Goose, Sarum Plain,
     I'ld drive ye cackling home Camelot.
  Corn. What, art thou mad, fellow?
  Glou. fell out? that.
  Kent. contraries hold antipathy
     knave.
  Corn. dost thou call knave? fault?
  Kent. countenance likes not.
  Corn. perchance mine, his, hers.
  Kent. Sir, 'tis occupation plain.
     faces time
     stands shoulder see
     instant.
  Corn. fellow
     Who, prais'd bluntness, doth affect
     saucy roughness, constrains garb
     nature. flatter, he!
     honest mind plain- speak truth!
     it, so; not, plain.  
     kind knaves plainness
     Harbour craft corrupter ends
     twenty silly-ducking observants
     stretch duties nicely.
  Kent. Sir, good faith, sincere verity,
     th' allowance great aspect,
     influence, wreath radiant fire
     flickering Phoebus' front-
  Corn. mean'st this?
  Kent. dialect, discommend much. I
     know, sir, flatterer. beguil'd plain
     accent plain knave, which, part, be,
     win displeasure entreat to't.
  Corn. th' offence gave him?
  Osw. gave any.
     pleas'd King master late
     strike me, misconstruction;
     he, conjunct, flattering displeasure,
     Tripp'd behind; down, insulted, rail'd
     put deal man  
     worthied him, praises King
     attempting self-subdu'd;
     And, fleshment dread exploit,
     Drew again.
  Kent. rogues cowards
     Ajax fool.
  Corn. Fetch stocks!
     stubborn ancient knave, reverent braggart,
     teach you-
  Kent. Sir, learn.
     Call stocks me. serve King;
     employment you.
     small respect, show bold malice
     grace person master,
     Stocking messenger.
  Corn. Fetch stocks! life honour,
     sit till noon.
  Reg. Till noon? Till night, lord, night too!
  Kent. Why, madam, father's dog,
     so.  
  Reg. Sir, knave, will.
  Corn. fellow selfsame colour
     sister speaks of. Come, bring stocks!
                                             Stocks brought out.
  Glou. beseech Grace so.
     fault much, good King master
     check for't. purpos'd low correction
     basest contemn'dest wretches
     pilf'rings common trespasses
     punish'd with. King ill
     he, slightly valued messenger,
     restrain'd.
  Corn. answer that.
  Reg. sister receive worse,
     gentleman abus'd, assaulted,
     affairs. Put legs.-
                                    [Kent put stocks.]
     Come, good lord, away.
                           Exeunt [all Gloucester Kent].
  Glou. thee, friend. 'Tis Duke's pleasure,  
     disposition, world knows,
     rubb'd stopp'd. entreat thee.
  Kent. Pray not, sir. watch'd travell'd hard.
     time sleep out, rest whistle.
     good man's fortune grow heels.
     Give good morrow!
  Glou. Duke 's blame this; 'twill ill taken.
Exit.
  Kent. Good King, approve common saw,
     Thou heaven's benediction com'st
     warm sun!
     Approach, thou beacon globe,
     thy comfortable beams may
     Peruse letter. sees miracles
     misery. 'tis Cordelia,
     hath fortunately inform'd
     obscured course- [reads] 'shall find time
     enormous state, seeking give
     Losses remedies'- weary o'erwatch'd,
     vantage, heavy eyes, behold  
     shameful lodging.
     Fortune, good night; smile more, turn thy wheel.
                                                         Sleeps.




Scene III.
The open country.

Enter Edgar.

  Edg. heard proclaim'd,
     happy hollow tree
     Escap'd hunt. port free, place
     guard unusual vigilance
     attend taking. Whiles scape,
     preserve myself; bethought
     basest poorest shape
     penury, contempt man,
     Brought beast. face grime filth,
     Blanket loins, elf hair knots,
     presented nakedness outface
     winds persecutions sky.
     country proof precedent
     Bedlam beggars, who, roaring voices,
     Strike numb'd mortified bare arms
     Pins, wooden pricks, nails, sprigs rosemary;
     horrible object, low farms,  
     Poor pelting villages, sheepcotes, mills,
     lunatic bans, prayers,
     Enforce charity. 'Poor Turlygod! poor Tom!'
     yet! Edgar am.             Exit.




Scene IV.
Before Gloucester's Castle; Kent stocks.

Enter Lear, Fool, Gentleman.

  Lear. 'Tis strange depart home,
     send back messenger.
  Gent. learn'd,
     night purpose them
     remove.
  Kent. Hail thee, noble master!
  Lear. Ha!
     Mak'st thou shame thy pastime?
  Kent. No, lord.
  Fool. Ha, ha! look! wears cruel garters. Horses tied the
     head, dogs bears th' neck, monkeys th' loins, men
     th' legs. man's over-lusty legs, wears
     wooden nether-stocks.
  Lear. hath thy place mistook
     set thee here?
  Kent. she-
     son daughter.  
  Lear. No.
  Kent. Yes.
  Lear. No, say.
  Kent. yea.
  Lear. No, no, not!
  Kent. Yes, have.
  Lear. Jupiter, swear no!
  Kent. Juno, swear ay!
  Lear. durst do't;
     not, do't. 'Tis worse murther
     respect violent outrage.
     Resolve modest haste way
     Thou mightst deserve impose usage,
     Coming us.
  Kent. lord, home
     commend Highness' letters them,
     Ere risen place show'd
     duty kneeling, reeking post,
     Stew'd haste, half breathless, panting forth
     Goneril mistress salutations;  
     Deliver'd letters, spite intermission,
     presently read; contents,
     summon'd meiny, straight horse,
     Commanded follow attend
     leisure answer, gave cold looks,
     meeting messenger,
     perceiv'd poison'd mine-
     fellow late
     Display'd saucily Highness-
     man wit me, drew.
     rais'd house loud coward cries.
     son daughter found trespass worth
     shame suffers.
  Fool. Winter's yet, wild geese fly way.

          Fathers wear rags
            make children blind;
          fathers bear bags
            children kind.
          Fortune, arrant whore,  
          Ne'er turns key th' poor.

     this, thou shalt dolours thy
     daughters thou canst year.
  Lear. O, mother swells heart!
     Hysterica passio! Down, thou climbing sorrow!
     Thy element's below! daughter?
  Kent. Earl, sir, within.
  Lear. Follow not;
     Stay here.                                            Exit.
  Gent. Made offence speak of?
  Kent. None.
     chance King small number?
  Fool. thou hadst set i' th' stocks question,
     thou'dst deserv'd it.
  Kent. Why, fool?
  Fool. set thee school ant, teach thee no
     labouring i' th' winter. follow noses led by
     eyes blind men, nose twenty
     smell stinking. thy hold great  
     wheel runs hill, break thy neck following
     it; great upward, draw thee after.
     wise man thee counsel, give mine again. I
     knaves follow it, fool it.
          sir serves seeks gain,
            form,
          pack begins rain
            leave thee storm.
          tarry; fool stay,
            wise man fly.
          knave turns fool runs away;
            fool knave, perdy.
  Kent. learn'd this, fool?
  Fool. i' th' stocks, fool.

                      Enter Lear Gloucester

  Lear. Deny speak me? sick? weary?
     travell'd night? Mere fetches-
     images revolt flying off!  
     Fetch answer.
  Glou. dear lord,
     fiery quality Duke,
     unremovable fix'd is
     course.
  Lear. Vengeance! plague! death! confusion!
     Fiery? quality? Why, Gloucester, Gloucester,
     I'ld speak Duke Cornwall wife.
  Glou. Well, good lord, inform'd so.
  Lear. Inform'd them? Dost thou understand me, man?
  Glou. Ay, good lord.
  Lear. King speak Cornwall; dear father
     daughter speak, commands service.
     inform'd this? breath blood!
     Fiery? fiery Duke? hot Duke that-
     No, yet! well.
     Infirmity doth neglect office
     Whereto health bound. ourselves
     nature, oppress'd, commands mind
     suffer body. forbear;  
     fallen headier will,
     indispos'd sickly fit
     sound man.- Death state! Wherefore
     sit here? act persuades me
     remotion Duke her
     practice only. Give servant forth.
     Duke 's wife I'ld speak them-
     Now, presently. Bid hear me,
     chamber door beat drum
     Till cry sleep death.
  Glou. betwixt you.                 Exit.
  Lear. O me, heart, rising heart! down!
  Fool. Cry it, nuncle, cockney eels she
     put 'em i' th' paste alive. knapp'd 'em o' th' coxcombs with
     stick cried 'Down, wantons, down!' 'Twas brother that,
     pure kindness horse, buttered hay.

             Enter Cornwall, Regan, Gloucester, Servants.

  Lear. Good morrow both.  
  Corn. Hail Grace!
                                       Kent set liberty.
  Reg. glad Highness.
  Lear. Regan, are; reason
     so. thou shouldst glad,
     divorce thy mother's tomb,
     Sepulchring adultress. [To Kent] O, free?
     time that.- Beloved Regan,
     Thy sister's naught. O Regan, hath tied
     Sharp-tooth'd unkindness, vulture, here!
                                   [Lays hand heart.]
     scarce speak thee. Thou'lt believe
     deprav'd quality- O Regan!
  Reg. pray you, sir, patience. hope
     desert
     scant duty.
  Lear. Say, that?
  Reg. sister least
     fail obligation. If, sir, perchance
     restrain'd riots followers,  
     'Tis ground, wholesome end,
     clears blame.
  Lear. curses her!
  Reg. O, sir, old!
     Nature stands verge
     confine. rul'd, led
     discretion discerns state
     yourself. pray you
     sister make return;
     wrong'd her, sir.
  Lear. forgiveness?
     mark house:
     'Dear daughter, confess old.          [Kneels.]
     Age unnecessary. knees beg
     vouchsafe raiment, bed, food.'
  Reg. Good sir, more! unsightly tricks.
     Return sister.
  Lear. [rises] Never, Regan!
     hath abated half train;
     Look'd black me; struck tongue,  
     serpent-like, heart.
     stor'd vengeances heaven fall
     ingrateful top! Strike young bones,
     taking airs, lameness!
  Corn. Fie, sir, fie!
  Lear. nimble lightnings, dart blinding flames
     scornful eyes! Infect beauty,
     fen-suck'd fogs, drawn pow'rful sun,
     fall blast pride!
  Reg. O blest gods! me
     rash mood on.
  Lear. No, Regan, thou shalt curse.
     Thy tender-hefted nature give
     Thee o'er harshness. eyes fierce; thine
     comfort, burn. 'Tis thee
     grudge pleasures, cut train,
     bandy hasty words, scant sizes,
     And, conclusion, oppose bolt
     coming in. Thou know'st
     offices nature, bond childhood,  
     Effects courtesy, dues gratitude.
     Thy half o' th' kingdom hast thou forgot,
     thee endow'd.
  Reg. Good sir, th' purpose.
                                                  Tucket within.
  Lear. put man i' th' stocks?
  Corn. trumpet's that?
  Reg. know't- sister's. approves letter,
     here.

                     Enter [Oswald the] Steward.

     lady come?
  Lear. slave, easy-borrowed pride
     Dwells fickle grace follows.
     Out, varlet, sight!
  Corn. means Grace?

                            Enter Goneril.
  
  Lear. stock'd servant? Regan, good hope
     Thou didst on't.- here? O heavens!
     love men, sweet sway
     obedience- old,
     Make cause! Send down, part!
     [To Goneril] Art asham'd beard?-
     O Regan, wilt thou hand?
  Gon. th' hand, sir? offended?
     All's offence indiscretion finds
     dotage terms so.
  Lear. O sides, tough!
     hold? man i' th' stocks?
  Corn. set there, sir; disorders
     Deserv'd advancement.
  Lear. You? you?
  Reg. pray you, father, weak, so.
     If, till expiration month,
     return sojourn sister,
     Dismissing half train, me.
     home, provision  
     needful entertainment.
  Lear. Return her, fifty men dismiss'd?
     No, abjure roofs, choose
     wage enmity o' th' air,
     comrade wolf owl-
     Necessity's sharp pinch! Return her?
     Why, hot-blooded France, dowerless took
     youngest born, brought
     knee throne, and, squire-like, pension beg
     base life afoot. Return her?
     Persuade slave sumpter
     detested groom.                 [Points Oswald.]
  Gon. choice, sir.
  Lear. prithee, daughter, make mad.
     trouble thee, child; farewell.
     meet, another.
     thou art flesh, blood, daughter;
     disease flesh,
     call mine. Thou art boil,
     plague sore, embossed carbuncle  
     corrupted blood. chide thee.
     shame will, call it.
     bid Thunder-bearer shoot
     tales thee high-judging Jove.
     Mend thou canst; thy leisure;
     patient, stay Regan,
     hundred knights.
  Reg. altogether so.
     look'd yet, provided
     fit welcome. Give ear, sir, sister;
     mingle reason passion
     content old, so-
     does.
  Lear. spoken?
  Reg. dare avouch it, sir. What, fifty followers?
     well? more?
     Yea, many, sith charge danger
     Speak 'gainst great number? house
     people, commands,
     Hold amity? 'Tis hard; impossible.  
  Gon. you, lord, receive attendance
     calls servants, mine?
  Reg. not, lord? chanc'd slack ye,
     control them. me
     (For spy danger), entreat you
     bring five-and-twenty. more
     give place notice.
  Lear. gave all-
  Reg. good time gave it!
  Lear. Made guardians, depositaries;
     reservation followed
     number. What, you
     five-and-twenty, Regan? so?
  Reg. speak't lord. me.
  Lear. wicked creatures well-favour'd
     wicked; worst
     Stands rank praise. [To Goneril] thee.
     Thy fifty doth double five-and-twenty,
     thou art love.
  Gon. Hear, me, lord.  
     five-and-twenty, ten, five,
     follow house many
     command tend you?
  Reg. one?
  Lear. O, reason need! basest beggars
     poorest thing superfluous.
     nature nature needs,
     Man's life cheap beast's. Thou art lady:
     warm gorgeous,
     Why, nature thou gorgeous wear'st
     scarcely thee warm. But, true need-
     heavens, give patience, patience need!
     here, gods, poor man,
     full grief age; wretched both.
     stirs daughters' hearts
     father, fool much
     bear tamely; touch noble anger,
     women's weapons, water drops,
     Stain man's cheeks! No, unnatural hags!
     revenges  
     world shall- things-
     yet, not; be
     terrors earth! weep.
     No, weep.
     full weeping, heart
     break hundred thousand flaws
     ere weep. O fool, mad!
              Exeunt Lear, Gloucester, Kent, Fool. Storm and
                                                        tempest.
  Corn. withdraw; 'twill storm.
  Reg. house little; man 's people
     bestow'd.
  Gon. 'Tis blame; hath put rest
     taste folly.
  Reg. particular, receive gladly,
     follower.
  Gon. purpos'd.
     Lord Gloucester?
  Corn. man forth.
  
                          Enter Gloucester.

     return'd.
  Glou. King high rage.
  Corn. going?
  Glou. calls horse, whither.
  Corn. 'Tis give way; leads himself.
  Gon. lord, entreat means stay.
  Glou. Alack, night on, bleak winds
     sorely ruffle. miles about
     scarce bush.
  Reg. O, sir, wilful men
     injuries procure
     schoolmasters. Shut doors.
     attended desperate train,
     incense to, apt
     ear abus'd, wisdom bids fear.
  Corn. Shut doors, lord: 'tis wild night.
     Regan counsels well. o' th' storm.        [Exeunt.]
