ACT III. Scene I.
A heath.

Storm still. Enter Kent Gentleman doors.

  Kent. there, foul weather?
  Gent. minded weather, unquietly.
  Kent. you. King?
  Gent. Contending fretful elements;
     Bids wind blow earth sea,
     swell curled waters 'bove main,
     things change cease; tears white hair,
     impetuous blasts, eyeless rage,
     Catch fury make of;
     Strives world man outscorn
     to-and-fro-conflicting wind rain.
     night, cub-drawn bear couch,
     lion belly-pinched wolf
     fur dry, unbonneted runs,
     bids all.
  Kent. him?
  Gent. fool, labours outjest  
     heart-struck injuries.
  Kent. Sir, you,
     dare warrant note
     Commend dear thing you. division
     (Although face cover'd
     mutual cunning) 'twixt Albany Cornwall;
     (as not, great stars
     Thron'd set high?) servants, less,
     France spies speculations
     Intelligent state. hath seen,
     snuffs packings Dukes,
     hard rein borne
     kind King, deeper,
     Whereof, perchance, furnishings-
     But, true is, France power
     scattered kingdom, already,
     Wise negligence, secret feet
     ports point
     show open banner. you:
     credit dare build  
     make speed Dover, find
     you, making report
     unnatural bemadding sorrow
     King hath plain.
     gentleman blood breeding,
     knowledge assurance offer
     office you.
  Gent. talk you.
  Kent. No, not.
     confirmation more
     out-wall, open purse take
     contains. Cordelia
     (As fear shall), show ring,
     fellow is
     know. Fie storm!
     seek King.
  Gent. Give hand. say?
  Kent. words, but, effect, yet:
     That, found King (in pain
     way, this), lights  
     Holla other.
                                             Exeunt [severally].




Scene II.
Another part heath.

Storm still. Enter Lear Fool.

  Lear. Blow, winds, crack cheeks! rage! blow!
     cataracts hurricanoes, spout
     Till drench'd steeples, drown'd cocks!
     sulph'rous thought-executing fires,
     Vaunt-couriers oak-cleaving thunderbolts,
     Singe white head! thou, all-shaking thunder,
     Strike flat thick rotundity o' th' world,
     Crack Nature's moulds, germains spill once,
     makes ingrateful man!
  Fool. O nuncle, court holy water dry house this
     rain water o' door. Good nuncle, in, thy daughters
     blessing! night pities nether wise men fools.
  Lear. Rumble thy bellyful! Spit, fire! spout, rain!
     rain, wind, thunder, fire daughters.
     tax you, elements, unkindness.
     gave kingdom, call'd children,
     owe subscription. fall  
     horrible pleasure. stand slave,
     poor, infirm, weak, despis'd man.
     call servile ministers,
     pernicious daughters join
     high-engender'd battles 'gainst head
     white this! O! O! 'tis foul!
  Fool. house put 's head good head-piece.
          codpiece house
            head any,
          head louse:
            beggars marry many.
          man makes toe
            heart make
          corn cry woe,
            turn sleep wake.
     fair woman made mouths a
     glass.

                             Enter Kent.
  
  Lear. No, pattern patience;
     nothing.
  Kent. there?
  Fool. Marry, grace codpiece; wise man a
     fool.
  Kent. Alas, sir, here? Things love night
     Love nights these. wrathful skies
     Gallow wanderers dark
     make caves. man,
     sheets fire, bursts horrid thunder,
     groans roaring wind rain, never
     Remember heard. Man's nature carry
     Th' affliction fear.
  Lear. great gods,
     dreadful pudder o'er heads,
     Find enemies now. Tremble, thou wretch,
     hast thee undivulged crimes
     Unwhipp'd justice. Hide thee, thou bloody hand;
     Thou perjur'd, thou simular man virtue
     art incestuous. Caitiff, pieces shake  
     covert convenient seeming
     Hast practis'd man's life. Close pent-up guilts,
     Rive concealing continents, cry
     dreadful summoners grace. man
     sinn'd sinning.
  Kent. Alack, bareheaded?
     Gracious lord, hard hovel;
     friendship lend 'gainst tempest.
     Repose there, whilst hard house
     (More harder stones whereof 'tis rais'd,
     now, demanding you,
     Denied in) return, force
     scanted courtesy.
  Lear. wits begin turn.
     on, boy. dost, boy? Art cold?
     cold myself. straw, fellow?
     art necessities strange,
     make vile things precious. Come, hovel.
     Poor fool knave, part heart
     thee.  
  Fool. [sings]

          tiny wit-
            hey, ho, wind rain-
          make content fortunes fit,
             rain raineth day.

  Lear. True, good boy. Come, bring hovel.
                                         Exeunt [Lear Kent].
  Fool. brave night cool courtesan. speak a
     prophecy ere go:
          priests word matter;
          brewers mar malt water;
          nobles tailors' tutors,
          heretics burn'd, wenches' suitors;
          case law right,
          squire debt poor knight;
          slanders live tongues,
          cutpurses throngs;
          usurers gold i' th' field,  
          bawds whores churches build:
          realm Albion
          great confusion.
          time, lives see't,
          us'd feet.
     prophecy Merlin make, live time.
Exit.




Scene III.
Gloucester's Castle.

Enter Gloucester Edmund.

  Glou. Alack, alack, Edmund, unnatural dealing! When
     desir'd leave pity him, me
     mine house, charg'd pain perpetual
     displeasure speak him, entreat him, any
     sustain him.
  Edm. savage unnatural!
  Glou. to; nothing. division betwixt Dukes,
     worse matter that. received letter this
     night- 'tis dangerous spoken- lock'd letter in
     closet. injuries King bears revenged
     home; part power footed; incline to
     King. seek privily relieve him. and
     maintain talk Duke, charity him
     perceived. me, ill bed. I
     die for't, threat'ned me, King master
     relieved. strange thing toward, Edmund.
     Pray careful.                                  Exit.  
  Edm. courtesy, forbid thee, Duke
     Instantly know, letter too.
     fair deserving, draw me
     father loses- all.
     younger rises doth fall.             Exit.




Scene IV.
The heath. hovel.

Storm still. Enter Lear, Kent, Fool.

  Kent. place, lord. Good lord, enter.
     tyranny open night 's rough
     nature endure.
  Lear. alone.
  Kent. Good lord, enter here.
  Lear. Wilt break heart?
  Kent. break mine own. Good lord, enter.
  Lear. Thou think'st 'tis contentious storm
     Invades skin. 'tis thee;
     greater malady fix'd,
     lesser scarce felt. Thou'dst shun bear;
     thy flight lay raging sea,
     Thou'dst meet bear i' th' mouth. mind's free,
     body's delicate. tempest mind
     Doth senses feeling else
     Save beats there. Filial ingratitude!
     mouth tear hand  
     lifting food to't? punish home!
     No, weep more. night
     'To shut out! Pour on; endure.
     night this! O Regan, Goneril!
     kind father, frank heart gave all!
     O, madness lies; shun that!
     that.
  Kent. Good lord, enter here.
  Lear. Prithee thyself; seek thine ease.
     tempest give leave ponder
     things hurt more. in.
     [To Fool] In, boy; first.- houseless poverty-
     Nay, thee in. pray, sleep.
                                                    Exit [Fool].
     Poor naked wretches, wheresoe'er are,
     bide pelting pitiless storm,
     houseless heads unfed sides,
     loop'd window'd raggedness, defend you
     seasons these? O, ta'en
     care this! physic, pomp;  
     Expose thyself feel wretches feel,
     thou mayst shake superflux them
     show heavens just.
  Edg. [within] Fathom half, fathom half! Poor Tom!

                     Enter Fool [from hovel].

  Fool. here, nuncle, spirit. me, me!
  Kent. Give thy hand. there?
  Fool. spirit, spirit! name's poor Tom.
  Kent. art thou dost grumble i' th' straw?
     forth.

                 Enter Edgar [disguised madman].

  Edg. Away! foul fiend me! sharp hawthorn
     blows cold wind. Humh! thy cold bed, warm thee.
  Lear. Hast thou thy daughters, art thou come
     this?
  Edg. poor Tom? foul fiend hath led  
     fire flame, ford whirlpool, o'er
     bog quagmire; hath laid knives pillow and
     halters pew, set ratsbane porridge, made proud
     heart, ride bay trotting horse four-inch'd
     bridges, shadow traitor. Bless thy five
     wits! Tom 's acold. O, de, de, de. Bless thee from
     whirlwinds, star-blasting, taking! poor Tom charity,
     foul fiend vexes. now- there-
     again- there!
                                                    Storm still.
  Lear. What, daughters brought pass?
     Couldst thou save nothing? Didst thou give 'em all?
  Fool. Nay, reserv'd blanket, sham'd.
  Lear. plagues pendulous air
     Hang fated o'er men's faults light thy daughters!
  Kent. hath daughters, sir.
  Lear. Death, traitor! subdu'd nature
     lowness unkind daughters.
     fashion discarded fathers
     mercy flesh?  
     Judicious punishment! 'Twas flesh begot
     pelican daughters.
  Edg. Pillicock sat Pillicock's Hill. 'Allow, 'allow, loo, loo!
  Fool. cold night turn fools madmen.
  Edg. heed o' th' foul fiend; obey thy parents: thy word
     justly; swear not; commit man's sworn spouse; set not
     thy sweet heart proud array. Tom 's acold.
  Lear. hast thou been?
  Edg. servingman, proud heart mind; curl'd hair,
     wore gloves cap; serv'd lust mistress' heart and
     act darkness her; swore oaths spake
     words, broke sweet face heaven; that
     slept contriving lust, wak'd it. Wine lov'd
     deeply, dice dearly; woman out-paramour'd Turk.
     False heart, light ear, bloody hand; hog sloth, fox
     stealth, wolf greediness, dog madness, lion prey.
     creaking shoes rustling silks betray
     thy poor heart woman. thy foot brothel, thy hand
     placket, thy pen lender's book, defy foul
     fiend. hawthorn blows cold wind;  
     suum, mun, hey, no, nonny. Dolphin boy, boy, sessa! let
     trot by.
                                                    Storm still.
  Lear. Why, thou wert thy grave answer thy
     uncover'd body extremity skies. man than
     this? well. Thou ow'st worm silk, beast
     hide, sheep wool, cat perfume. Ha! three
     on's sophisticated! Thou art thing itself;
     unaccommodated man poor, bare, forked
     animal thou art. Off, off, lendings! Come, unbutton
     here.
                                         [Tears clothes.]
  Fool. Prithee, nuncle, contented! 'Tis naughty night swim
     in. fire wild field lecher's
     heart- small spark, rest on's body cold. Look, here
     walking fire.

                    Enter Gloucester torch.

  Edg. foul fiend Flibbertigibbet. begins curfew,  
     walks till cock. web pin,
     squints eye, makes harelip; mildews white wheat,
     hurts poor creature earth.

           Saint Withold footed thrice 'old;
           met nightmare, fold;
              Bid alight
              troth plight,
           aroint thee, witch, aroint thee!

  Kent. fares Grace?
  Lear. he?
  Kent. there? is't seek?
  Glou. there? names?
  Edg. Poor Tom, eats swimming frog, toad, todpole,
     wall-newt water; fury heart, when
     foul fiend rages, eats cow-dung sallets, swallows the
     rat ditch-dog, drinks green mantle the
     standing pool; whipp'd tithing tithing, and
     stock-punish'd imprison'd; hath suits  
     back, shirts body, horse ride, weapons to
     wear;

          mice rats, small deer,
          Tom's food long year.

     Beware follower. Peace, Smulkin! peace, thou fiend!
  Glou. What, hath Grace company?
  Edg. prince darkness gentleman!
     Modo call'd, Mahu.
  Glou. flesh blood grown vile, lord,
     doth hate it.
  Edg. Poor Tom 's acold.
  Glou. me. duty suffer
     T' obey daughters' hard commands.
     injunction bar doors
     tyrannous night hold you,
     ventur'd seek out
     bring fire food ready.
  Lear. talk philosopher.  
     thunder?
  Kent. Good lord, offer; th' house.
  Lear. talk word learned Theban.
     study?
  Edg. prevent fiend kill vermin.
  Lear. word private.
  Kent. Importune go, lord.
     wits begin t' unsettle.
  Glou. Canst thou blame him?
                                                    Storm still.
     daughters seek death. Ah, good Kent!
     thus- poor banish'd man!
     Thou say'st King grows mad: thee, friend,
     mad myself. son,
     outlaw'd blood. sought life
     lately, late. lov'd him, friend-
     father son dearer. True thee,
     grief hath craz'd wits. night 's this!
     beseech Grace-
  Lear. O, cry mercy, sir.  
     Noble philosopher, company.
  Edg. Tom's acold.
  Glou. In, fellow, there, th' hovel; thee warm.
  Lear. Come, all.
  Kent. way, lord.
  Lear. him!
     philosopher.
  Kent. Good lord, soothe him; fellow.
  Glou. on.
  Kent. Sirrah, on; us.
  Lear. Come, good Athenian.
  Glou. words, words! hush.
  Edg. Child Rowland dark tower came;
     word still

          Fie, foh, fum!
          smell blood British man.
                                                         Exeunt.

Scene V.
Gloucester's Castle.

Enter Cornwall Edmund.

  Corn. revenge ere depart house.
  Edm. How, lord, censured, nature to
     loyalty, fears of.
  Corn. perceive altogether brother's evil
     disposition made seek death; provoking merit, set
     awork reproveable badness himself.
  Edm. malicious fortune repent just!
     letter spoke of, approves an
     intelligent party advantages France. O heavens! that
     treason not- detector!
  Corn. Duchess.
  Edm. matter paper certain, mighty
     business hand.
  Corn. True false, hath made thee Earl Gloucester.
     Seek thy father is, ready our
     apprehension.
  Edm. [aside] find comforting King, stuff  
     suspicion fully.- persever loyalty,
     conflict sore blood.
  Corn. lay trust thee, thou shalt find dearer
     father love.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene VI.
A farmhouse Gloucester's Castle.

Enter Gloucester, Lear, Kent, Fool, Edgar.

  Glou. open air; thankfully. will
     piece comfort addition can. be
     long you.
  Kent. power wits impatience.
     gods reward kindness!
                                              Exit [Gloucester].
  Edg. Frateretto calls me, tells Nero angler the
     lake darkness. Pray, innocent, beware foul fiend.
  Fool. Prithee, nuncle, madman gentleman a
     yeoman.
  Lear. king, king!
  Fool. No, yeoman gentleman son; a
     mad yeoman sees son gentleman him.
  Lear. thousand red burning spits
     hizzing 'em-
  Edg. foul fiend bites back.
  Fool. mad trusts tameness wolf, horse's
     health, boy's love, whore's oath.  
  Lear. done; arraign straight.
     [To Edgar] Come, sit thou here, learned justicer.
     [To Fool] Thou, sapient sir, sit here. Now, she-foxes!
  Edg. Look, stands glares! Want'st thou eyes trial,
     madam?

             o'er bourn, Bessy, me.

  Fool.      boat hath leak,
             speak
           dares thee.

  Edg. foul fiend haunts poor Tom voice nightingale.
     Hoppedance cries Tom's belly white herring. Croak
     not, black angel; food thee.
  Kent. you, sir? Stand amaz'd.
     lie rest cushions?
  Lear. trial first. Bring evidence.
     [To Edgar] Thou, robed man justice, thy place.
     [To Fool] thou, yokefellow equity,  
     Bench side. [To Kent] o' th' commission,
     Sit too.
  Edg. deal justly.

          Sleepest wakest thou, jolly shepherd?
            Thy sheep corn;
          blast thy minikin mouth
            Thy sheep harm.

     Purr! cat gray.
  Lear. Arraign first. 'Tis Goneril. oath before
     honourable assembly, kicked poor King father.
  Fool. hither, mistress. Goneril?
  Lear. deny it.
  Fool. Cry mercy, joint-stool.
  Lear. another, warp'd proclaim
     store heart made on. Stop there!
     Arms, arms! sword! fire! Corruption place!
     False justicer, hast thou scape?
  Edg. Bless thy wits!  
  Kent. O pity! Sir, patience now
     oft boasted retain?
  Edg. [aside] tears begin part much
     mar counterfeiting.
  Lear. dogs all,
     Tray, Blanch, Sweetheart, see, bark me.
  Edg. Tom throw head them. Avaunt, curs!
           thy mouth black white,
           Tooth poisons bite;
           Mastiff, greyhound, mongrel grim,
           Hound spaniel, brach lym,
           Bobtail tyke trundle-tall-
           Tom make weep wail;
           For, throwing head,
           Dogs leap hatch, fled.
     de, de, de. Sessa! Come, march wakes fairs market
     towns. Poor Tom, thy horn dry.
  Lear. anatomize Regan. breeds her
     heart. nature makes hard
     hearts? [To Edgar] You, sir- entertain  
     hundred; fashion garments. You'll
     Persian attire; chang'd.
  Kent. Now, good lord, lie rest awhile.
  Lear. Make noise, make noise; draw curtains.
     So, so, so. supper i' th' morning. So, so, so.
  Fool. bed noon.

                          Enter Gloucester.

  Glou. hither, friend. King master?
  Kent. Here, sir; trouble not; wits gone.
  Glou. Good friend, prithee thy arms.
     o'erheard plot death him.
     litter ready; lay in't
     drive Dover, friend, thou shalt meet
     protection. thy master.
     thou shouldst dally half hour, life,
     thine, offer defend him,
     Stand assured loss. up, up!
     follow me, provision  
     Give thee quick conduct.
  Kent. Oppressed nature sleeps.
     rest balm'd thy broken senses,
     Which, convenience allow,
     Stand hard cure. [To Fool] Come, bear thy master.
     Thou stay behind.
  Glou. Come, come, away!
                                         Exeunt [all Edgar].
  Edg. betters bearing woes,
     scarcely miseries foes.
     suffers suffers i' th' mind,
     Leaving free things happy shows behind;
     mind sufferance doth o'erskip
     grief hath mates, bearing fellowship.
     light portable pain now,
     makes bend makes King bow,
     childed fathered! Tom, away!
     Mark high noises, thyself bewray
     false opinion, wrong thought defiles thee,
     thy proof repeals reconciles thee.  
     hap to-night, safe scape King!
     Lurk, lurk.                                         [Exit.]




Scene VII.
Gloucester's Castle.

Enter Cornwall, Regan, Goneril, [Edmund the] Bastard, Servants.

  Corn. [to Goneril] Post speedily lord husband, show him
     letter. army France landed.- Seek traitor
     Gloucester.
                                  [Exeunt Servants.]
  Reg. Hang instantly.
  Gon. Pluck eyes.
  Corn. Leave displeasure. Edmund, sister
     company. revenges bound traitorous
     father fit beholding. Advise Duke you
     going, festinate preparation. bound the
     like. posts swift intelligent betwixt us.
     Farewell, dear sister; farewell, Lord Gloucester.

                     Enter [Oswald the] Steward.

     now? King?  
  Osw. Lord Gloucester hath convey'd hence.
     thirty knights,
     Hot questrists him, met gate;
     Who, lord's dependants,
     Dover, boast
     well-armed friends.
  Corn. horses mistress.
  Gon. Farewell, sweet lord, sister.
  Corn. Edmund, farewell.
                           Exeunt Goneril, [Edmund, Oswald].
     seek traitor Gloucester,
     Pinion thief, bring us.
                                        [Exeunt Servants.]
     pass life
     form justice, power
     court'sy wrath, men
     blame, control.

            Enter Gloucester, brought three.
  
     there? traitor?
  Reg. Ingrateful fox! 'tis he.
  Corn. Bind fast corky arms.
  Glou. mean, Graces? Good friends, consider
     guests. foul play, friends.
  Corn. Bind him, say.
                                            [Servants bind him.]
  Reg. Hard, hard. O filthy traitor!
  Glou. Unmerciful lady are, none.
  Corn. chair bind him. Villain, thou shalt find-
                                       [Regan plucks beard.]
  Glou. kind gods, 'tis ignobly done
     pluck beard.
  Reg. white, traitor!
  Glou. Naughty lady,
     hairs thou dost ravish chin
     quicken, accuse thee. host.
     robber's hands hospitable favours
     ruffle thus. do?
  Corn. Come, sir, letters late France?  
  Reg. simple-answer'd, truth.
  Corn. confederacy traitors
     Late footed kingdom?
  Reg. hands lunatic King?
     Speak.
  Glou. letter guessingly set down,
     neutral heart,
     oppos'd.
  Corn. Cunning.
  Reg. false.
  Corn. hast thou King?
  Glou. Dover.
  Reg. Wherefore Dover? Wast thou charg'd peril-
  Corn. Wherefore Dover? answer that.
  Glou. tied th' stake, stand course.
  Reg. Wherefore Dover, sir?
  Glou. thy cruel nails
     Pluck poor eyes; thy fierce sister
     anointed flesh stick boarish fangs.
     sea, storm bare head  
     hell-black night endur'd, buoy'd up
     quench'd steeled fires.
     Yet, poor heart, holp heavens rain.
     wolves thy gate howl'd stern time,
     Thou shouldst said, 'Good porter, turn key.'
     cruels subscrib'd. see
     winged vengeance overtake children.
  Corn. See't shalt thou never. Fellows, hold chair.
     eyes thine set foot.
  Glou. live till old,
     Give help!- O cruel! O ye gods!
  Reg. side mock another. Th' too!
  Corn. vengeance-
  1. Serv. Hold hand, lord!
     serv'd child;
     service you
     bid hold.
  Reg. now, dog?
  1. Serv. wear beard chin,
     I'ld shake quarrel.  
  Reg. mean?
  Corn. villain!                               Draw fight.
  1. Serv. Nay, then, on, chance anger.
  Reg. Give thy sword. peasant stand thus?
                        takes sword runs behind.
  1. Serv. O, slain! lord, eye left
     mischief him. O!                     dies.
  Corn. more, prevent it. Out, vile jelly!
     thy lustre now?
  Glou. dark comfortless! son Edmund?
     Edmund, enkindle sparks nature
     quit horrid act.
  Reg. Out, treacherous villain!
     Thou call'st hates thee. he
     made overture thy treasons us;
     good pity thee.
  Glou. O follies! Edgar abus'd.
     Kind gods, forgive that, prosper him!
  Reg. thrust gates, smell
     Dover.  
                                     Exit [one] Gloucester.
     is't, lord? you?
  Corn. receiv'd hurt. Follow me, lady.
     Turn eyeless villain. Throw slave
     dunghill. Regan, bleed apace.
     Untimely hurt. Give arm.
                                  Exit [Cornwall, led Regan].
  2. Serv. care wickedness do,
     man good.
  3. Serv. live long,
     end meet death,
     Women turn monsters.
  2. Serv. follow Earl, bedlam
     lead would. roguish madness
     anything.
  3. Serv. thou. fetch flax whites eggs
     apply bleeding face. heaven him!
                                                         Exeunt.

ACT IV. Scene I.
The heath.

Enter Edgar.

  Edg. thus, contemn'd,
     contemn'd flatter'd. worst,
     lowest dejected thing fortune,
     Stands esperance, lives fear.
     lamentable change best;
     worst returns laughter. then,
     Thou unsubstantial air embrace!
     wretch thou hast blown worst
     Owes thy blasts.

                 Enter Gloucester, led Man.

     here?
     father, poorly led? World, world, O world!
     thy strange mutations make hate thee,
     Life yield age.
  Man. O good lord,  
     tenant, father's tenant,
     fourscore years.
  Glou. Away, thee away! Good friend, gone.
     Thy comforts good all;
     Thee hurt.
  Man. way.
  Glou. way, eyes;
     stumbled saw. Full oft 'tis seen
     means secure us, mere defects
     Prove commodities. Ah dear son Edgar,
     food thy abused father's wrath!
     live thee touch,
     I'ld eyes again!
  Man. now? there?
  Edg. [aside] O gods! is't 'I worst'?
     worse e'er was.
  Man. 'Tis poor mad Tom.
  Edg. [aside] worse yet. worst not
     long 'This worst.'
  Man. Fellow, goest?  
  Glou. beggarman?
  Man. Madman beggar too.
  Glou. reason, beg.
     I' th' night's storm fellow saw,
     made man worm. son
     mind, mind
     scarce friends him. heard since.
     flies wanton boys th' gods.
     kill sport.
  Edg. [aside] be?
     Bad trade play fool sorrow,
     Ang'ring others.- Bless thee, master!
  Glou. naked fellow?
  Man. Ay, lord.
  Glou. prithee thee gone. sake
     Thou wilt o'ertake mile twain
     I' th' Dover, ancient love;
     bring covering naked soul,
     entreat lead me.
  Man. Alack, sir, mad!  
  Glou. 'Tis time's plague madmen lead blind.
     bid thee, thy pleasure.
     rest, gone.
  Man. bring 'parel have,
     on't will.                                  Exit.
  Glou. Sirrah naked fellow-
  Edg. Poor Tom's acold. [Aside] daub further.
  Glou. hither, fellow.
  Edg. [aside] must.- Bless thy sweet eyes, bleed.
  Glou. Know'st thou Dover?
  Edg. stile gate, horseway footpath. Poor Tom hath been
     scar'd good wits. Bless thee, good man's son, from
     foul fiend! fiends poor Tom once: of
     lust, Obidicut; Hobbididence, prince dumbness; Mahu, of
     stealing; Modo, murder; Flibbertigibbet, mopping and
     mowing, possesses chambermaids waiting women. So,
     bless thee, master!
  Glou. Here, Purse, thou heavens' plagues
     humbled strokes. wretched
     Makes thee happier. Heavens, deal still!  
     superfluous lust-dieted man,
     slaves ordinance, see
     feel, feel pow'r quickly;
     distribution undo excess,
     man enough. Dost thou Dover?
  Edg. Ay, master.
  Glou. cliff, high bending head
     fearfully confined deep.
     Bring brim it,
     repair misery thou dost bear
     rich me. place
     leading need.
  Edg. Give thy arm.
     Poor Tom lead thee.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene II.
Before Duke Albany's Palace.

Enter Goneril [Edmund the] Bastard.

  Gon. Welcome, lord. marvel mild husband
     met way.

                     Enter [Oswald the] Steward.

     Now, master?
  Osw. Madam, within, man chang'd.
     told army landed:
     smil'd it. told coming:
     answer was, 'The worse.' Gloucester's treachery
     loyal service son
     inform'd him, call'd sot
     told turn'd wrong side out.
     dislike pleasant him;
     like, offensive.
  Gon. [to Edmund] further.
     cowish terror spirit,  
     dares undertake. feel wrongs
     tie answer. wishes way
     prove effects. Back, Edmund, brother.
     Hasten musters conduct pow'rs.
     change arms home give distaff
     husband's hands. trusty servant
     pass us. Ere long hear
     (If dare venture behalf)
     mistress's command. Wear this.          [Gives favour.]
     Spare speech.
     Decline head. kiss, durst speak,
     stretch thy spirits air.
     Conceive, fare thee well.
  Edm. ranks death!                        Exit.
  Gon. dear Gloucester!
     O, difference man man!
     thee woman's services due;
     fool usurps body.
  Osw. Madam, lord.                          Exit.
  
                            Enter Albany.

  Gon. worth whistle.
  Alb. O Goneril,
     worth dust rude wind
     Blows face! fear disposition.
     nature contemns origin
     bordered itself.
     sliver disbranch
     material sap, perforce wither
     deadly use.
  Gon. more! text foolish.
  Alb. Wisdom goodness vile vile;
     Filths savour themselves. done?
     Tigers, daughters, perform'd?
     father, gracious aged man,
     reverence head-lugg'd bear lick,
     barbarous, degenerate, madded.
     good brother suffer it?
     man, prince, benefited!  
     heavens visible spirits
     Send quickly tame vile offences,
     come,
     Humanity perforce prey itself,
     monsters deep.
  Gon. Milk-liver'd man!
     bear'st cheek blows, head wrongs;
     hast thy brows eye discerning
     Thine honour thy suffering; know'st
     Fools villains pity punish'd
     Ere mischief. thy drum?
     France spreads banners noiseless land,
     plumed helm thy state begins threat,
     Whiles thou, moral fool, sit'st still, criest
     'Alack, so?'
  Alb. thyself, devil!
     Proper deformity fiend
     horrid woman.
  Gon. O vain fool!
  Alb. Thou changed self-cover'd thing, shame!  
     Bemonster thy feature! Were't fitness
     hands obey blood,
     apt dislocate tear
     Thy flesh bones. Howe'er thou art fiend,
     woman's shape doth shield thee.
  Gon. Marry, manhood mew!

                          Enter Gentleman.

  Alb. news?
  Gent. O, good lord, Duke Cornwall 's dead,
     Slain servant, put out
     eye Gloucester.
  Alb. Gloucester's eyes?
  Gent. servant bred, thrill'd remorse,
     Oppos'd act, bending sword
     great master; who, thereat enrag'd,
     Flew him, fell'd dead;
     harmful stroke since
     Hath pluck'd after.  
  Alb. shows above,
     justicers, nether crimes
     speedily venge! O poor Gloucester!
     Lose eye?
  Gent. Both, both, lord.
     letter, madam, craves speedy answer.
     'Tis sister.
  Gon. [aside] well;
     widow, Gloucester her,
     building fancy pluck
     hateful life. way
     news tart.- read, answer.
Exit.
  Alb. son eyes?
  Gent. lady hither.
  Alb. here.
  Gent. No, good lord; met back again.
  Alb. wickedness?
  Gent. Ay, good lord. 'Twas inform'd him,
     quit house purpose, punishment  
     freer course.
  Alb. Gloucester, live
     thee love thou show'dst King,
     revenge thine eyes. hither, friend.
     thou know'st.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene III.
The French camp Dover.

Enter Kent Gentleman.

  Kent. King France suddenly back the
     reason?
  Gent. left imperfect state, his
     coming thought of, imports kingdom much
     fear danger personal return required and
     necessary.
  Kent. hath left general?
  Gent. Marshal France, Monsieur La Far.
  Kent. letters pierce Queen demonstration of
     grief?
  Gent. Ay, sir. them, read presence,
     ample tear trill'd down
     delicate cheek. seem'd queen
     passion, who, rebel-like,
     Sought king o'er her.
  Kent. O, mov'd her?
  Gent. rage. Patience sorrow strove  
     express goodliest. seen
     Sunshine rain once: smiles tears
     like, way. happy smilets
     play'd ripe lip seem'd know
     guests eyes, parted thence
     pearls diamonds dropp'd. brief,
     Sorrow rarity belov'd,
     it.
  Kent. Made verbal question?
  Gent. Faith, heav'd father
     Pantingly forth, press'd heart;
     Cried 'Sisters, sisters! Shame ladies! Sisters!
     Kent! father! sisters! What, i' th' storm? i' th' night?
     pity believ'd!' shook
     holy water heavenly eyes,
     clamour moisten'd. started
     deal grief alone.
  Kent. stars,
     stars us, govern conditions;
     mate mate beget  
     issues. spoke since?
  Gent. No.
  Kent. King return'd?
  Gent. No, since.
  Kent. Well, sir, poor distressed Lear's i' th' town;
     sometime, tune, remembers
     about, means
     yield daughter.
  Gent. Why, good sir?
  Kent. sovereign shame elbows him; unkindness,
     stripp'd benediction, turn'd her
     foreign casualties, gave dear rights
     dog-hearted daughters- things sting
     mind venomously burning shame
     Detains Cordelia.
  Gent. Alack, poor gentleman!
  Kent. Albany's Cornwall's powers heard not?
  Gent. 'Tis so; afoot.
  Kent. Well, sir, bring master Lear
     leave attend him. dear  
     concealment wrap awhile.
     aright, grieve
     Lending acquaintance. pray go
     me.                                      Exeunt.




Scene IV.
The French camp.

Enter, Drum Colours, Cordelia, Doctor, Soldiers.

  Cor. Alack, 'tis he! Why, met now
     mad vex'd sea, singing aloud,
     Crown'd rank fumiter furrow weeds,
     hardocks, hemlock, nettles, cuckoo flow'rs,
     Darnel, idle weeds grow
     sustaining corn. century send forth.
     Search acre high-grown field
     bring eye. [Exit Officer.] man's
        wisdom
     restoring bereaved sense?
     helps outward worth.
  Doct. means, madam.
     foster nurse nature repose,
     lacks. provoke him
     simples operative, power
     close eye anguish.
  Cor. blest secrets,  
     unpublish'd virtues earth,
     Spring tears! aidant remediate
     good man's distress! Seek, seek him!
     ungovern'd rage dissolve life
     means lead it.

                           Enter Messenger.

  Mess. News, madam.
     British pow'rs marching hitherward.
  Cor. 'Tis before. preparation stands
     expectation them. O dear father,
     thy business about.
     great France
     mourning important tears hath pitied.
     blown ambition doth arms incite,
     love, dear love, ag'd father's right.
     hear him!
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene V.
Gloucester's Castle.

Enter Regan [Oswald the] Steward.

  Reg. brother's pow'rs set forth?
  Osw. Ay, madam.
  Reg. person there?
  Osw. Madam, ado.
     sister soldier.
  Reg. Lord Edmund spake lord home?
  Osw. No, madam.
  Reg. import sister's letter him?
  Osw. not, lady.
  Reg. Faith, posted matter.
     great ignorance, Gloucester's eyes out,
     live. arrives moves
     hearts us. Edmund, think, gone,
     pity misery, dispatch
     nighted life; moreover, descry
     strength o' th' enemy.
  Osw. him, madam, letter.  
  Reg. troops set to-morrow. Stay us.
     ways dangerous.
  Osw. not, madam.
     lady charg'd duty business.
  Reg. write Edmund? you
     Transport purposes word? Belike,
     Something- what- love thee much-
     unseal letter.
  Osw. Madam, rather-
  Reg. lady love husband;
     that; late here
     gave strange eliads speaking looks
     noble Edmund. bosom.
  Osw. I, madam?
  Reg. speak understanding. Y'are! know't.
     advise note.
     lord dead; Edmund talk'd,
     convenient hand
     lady's. gather more.
     find him, pray give this;  
     mistress hears you,
     pray desire call wisdom her.
     farewell.
     chance hear blind traitor,
     Preferment falls cuts off.
  Osw. meet him, madam! show
     party follow.
  Reg. Fare thee well.                                   Exeunt.




Scene VI.
The country Dover.

Enter Gloucester, Edgar [like Peasant].

  Glou. th' top hill?
  Edg. climb now. labour.
  Glou. Methinks ground even.
  Edg. Horrible steep.
     Hark, hear sea?
  Glou. No, truly.
  Edg. Why, then, senses grow imperfect
     eyes' anguish.
  Glou. indeed.
     Methinks thy voice alter'd, thou speak'st
     phrase matter thou didst.
  Edg. Y'are deceiv'd. chang'd
     garments.
  Glou. Methinks y'are spoken.
  Edg. on, sir; place. Stand still. fearful
     dizzy 'tis cast one's eyes low!
     crows choughs wing midway air  
     Show scarce gross beetles. Halfway down
     Hangs gathers sampire- dreadful trade!
     Methinks bigger head.
     fishermen walk beach
     mice; yond tall anchoring bark,
     Diminish'd cock; cock, buoy
     small sight. murmuring surge
     th' unnumb'red idle pebble chafes
     heard high. more,
     brain turn, deficient sight
     Topple headlong.
  Glou. Set stand.
  Edg. Give hand. foot
     th' extreme verge. beneath moon
     leap upright.
  Glou. hand.
     Here, friend, purse; jewel
     worth poor man's taking. Fairies gods
     Prosper thee! thou off;
     Bid farewell, hear thee going.  
  Edg. fare ye well, good sir.
  Glou. heart.
  Edg. [aside]. trifle despair
     cure it.
  Glou. O mighty gods!                            kneels.
     world renounce, and, sights,
     Shake patiently great affliction off.
     bear longer fall
     quarrel great opposeless wills,
     snuff loathed part nature should
     Burn out. Edgar live, O, bless him!
     Now, fellow, fare thee well.
                                  falls [forward swoons].
  Edg. Gone, sir, farewell.-
     conceit rob
     treasury life life itself
     Yields theft. thought,
     thought past.- Alive dead?
     Ho you, sir! friend! Hear you, sir? Speak!-
     pass indeed. revives.  
     you, sir?
  Glou. Away, die.
  Edg. Hadst thou aught gossamer, feathers, air,
     fadom precipitating,
     Thou'dst shiver'd egg; thou dost breathe;
     Hast heavy substance; bleed'st not; speak'st; art sound.
     Ten masts make altitude
     thou hast perpendicularly fell.
     Thy life miracle. Speak again.
  Glou. fall'n, no?
  Edg. dread summit chalky bourn.
     a-height. shrill-gorg'd lark far
     heard. up.
  Glou. Alack, eyes!
     wretchedness depriv'd benefit
     end death? 'Twas comfort
     misery beguile tyrant's rage
     frustrate proud will.
  Edg. Give arm.
     Up- so. is't? Feel legs? stand.  
  Glou. well, well.
  Edg. strangeness.
     crown o' th' cliff thing that
     parted you?
  Glou. poor unfortunate beggar.
  Edg. stood below, methought eyes
     full moons; thousand noses,
     Horns whelk'd wav'd enridged sea.
     fiend. Therefore, thou happy father,
     clearest gods, make honours
     men's impossibility, preserv'd thee.
  Glou. remember now. Henceforth bear
     Affliction till cry itself
     'Enough, enough,' die. thing speak of,
     man. 'twould say
     'The fiend, fiend'- led place.
  Edg. Bear free patient thoughts.

         Enter Lear, mad, [fantastically dressed weeds].
  
     here?
     safer sense ne'er accommodate
     master thus.
  Lear. No, touch coming;
     King himself.
  Edg. O thou side-piercing sight!
  Lear. Nature 's art respect. press
     money. fellow handles bow crow-keeper. Draw me
     clothier's yard. Look, look, mouse! Peace, peace; piece
     toasted cheese do't. gauntlet; prove it
     giant. Bring brown bills. O, flown, bird! i'
     th' clout, i' th' clout! Hewgh! Give word.
  Edg. Sweet marjoram.
  Lear. Pass.
  Glou. voice.
  Lear. Ha! Goneril white beard? flatter'd dog,
     told white hairs beard ere black ones
     there. 'ay' 'no' said! 'Ay' and
     'no' good divinity. rain wet me
     once, wind make chatter; thunder  
     peace bidding; found 'em, smelt 'em
     out. to, men o' words! told was
     everything. 'Tis lie- ague-proof.
  Glou. trick voice remember.
     Is't King?
  Lear. Ay, inch king!
     stare, subject quakes.
     pardon man's life. thy cause?
     Adultery?
     Thou shalt die. Die adultery? No.
     wren to't, small gilded fly
     lecher sight.
     copulation thrive; Gloucester's bastard son
     kinder father daughters
     'tween lawful sheets.
     To't, luxury, pell-mell! lack soldiers.
     Behold yond simp'ring dame,
     face forks presageth snow,
     minces virtue, shake head
     hear pleasure's name.  
     fitchew soiled horse to't
     riotous appetite.
     waist Centaurs,
     women above.
     girdle gods inherit,
     Beneath fiend's.
     hell, darkness, sulphurous pit;
     burning, scalding, stench, consumption. Fie, fie, fie! pah, pah!
     Give ounce civet, good apothecary, sweeten my
     imagination. money thee.
  Glou. O, kiss hand!
  Lear. wipe first; smells mortality.
  Glou. O ruin'd piece nature! great world
     wear naught. Dost thou me?
  Lear. remember thine eyes enough. Dost thou squiny me?
     No, thy worst, blind Cupid! love. Read thou this
     challenge; mark penning it.
  Glou. letters suns, one.
  Edg. [aside] report. is,
     heart breaks it.  
  Lear. Read.
  Glou. What, case eyes?
  Lear. O, ho, me? eyes head, no
     money purse? eyes heavy case, purse
     light. world goes.
  Glou. feelingly.
  Lear. What, art mad? man world eyes.
     thine ears. yond justice rails yond
     simple thief. Hark thine ear. Change places and, handy-dandy,
     justice, thief? Thou hast a
     farmer's dog bark beggar?
  Glou. Ay, sir.
  Lear. creature run cur? thou mightst behold
     great image authority: dog's obeyed office.
     Thou rascal beadle, hold thy bloody hand!
     dost thou lash whore? Strip thine back.
     Thou hotly lusts kind
     thou whip'st her. usurer hangs cozener.
     tatter'd clothes small vices appear;
     Robes furr'd gowns hide all. Plate sin gold,  
     strong lance justice hurtless breaks;
     Arm rags, pygmy's straw pierce it.
     offend, none- none! 'em.
     me, friend, power
     seal th' accuser's lips. thee glass eyes
     And, scurvy politician, seem
     things thou dost not. Now, now, now, now!
     Pull boots. Harder, harder! So.
  Edg. O, matter impertinency mix'd!
     Reason, madness!
  Lear. thou wilt weep fortunes, eyes.
     thee enough; thy Gloucester.
     Thou patient. crying hither;
     Thou know'st, time smell air
     wawl cry. preach thee. Mark.
  Glou. Alack, alack day!
  Lear. born, cry come
     great stage fools. This' good block.
     delicate stratagem shoe
     troop horse felt. put't proof,  
     stol'n sons-in-law,
     kill, kill, kill, kill, kill, kill!

                 Enter Gentleman [with Attendants].

  Gent. O, is! Lay hand him.- Sir,
     dear daughter-
  Lear. rescue? What, prisoner? even
     natural fool fortune. well;
     ransom. surgeon;
     cut th' brains.
  Gent. anything.
  Lear. seconds? myself?
     Why, make man man salt,
     eyes garden waterpots,
     Ay, laying autumn's dust.
  Gent. Good sir-
  Lear. die bravely, smug bridegroom. What!
     jovial. Come, come, king;
     masters, that?  
  Gent. royal one, obey you.
  Lear. life in't. Nay, it, it
     running. Sa, sa, sa, sa!
                              Exit running. [Attendants follow.]
  Gent. sight pitiful meanest wretch,
     Past speaking king! Thou hast daughter
     redeems nature general curse
     twain brought to.
  Edg. Hail, gentle sir.
  Gent. Sir, speed you. will?
  Edg. hear aught, sir, battle toward?
  Gent. vulgar. hears that
     distinguish sound.
  Edg. But, favour,
     near's army?
  Gent. speedy foot. main descry
     Stands hourly thought.
  Edg. sir. all.
  Gent. Queen special here,
     army mov'd on.  
  Edg. you, sir
                                               Exit [Gentleman].
  Glou. ever-gentle gods, breath me;
     worser spirit tempt again
     die please!
  Edg. pray you, father.
  Glou. Now, good sir, you?
  Edg. poor man, made tame fortune's blows,
     Who, art feeling sorrows,
     pregnant good pity. Give hand;
     lead biding.
  Glou. Hearty thanks.
     bounty benison heaven
     boot, boot!

                     Enter [Oswald the] Steward.

  Osw. proclaim'd prize! happy!
     eyeless head thine fram'd flesh
     raise fortunes. Thou unhappy traitor,  
     Briefly thyself remember. sword out
     destroy thee.
  Glou. thy friendly hand
     Put strength to't.
                                             [Edgar interposes.]
  Osw. Wherefore, bold peasant,
     Dar'st thou support publish'd traitor? Hence!
     th' infection fortune take
     hold thee. arm.
  Edg. Chill go, zir, vurther 'cagion.
  Osw. go, slave, thou diest!
  Edg. Good gentleman, gait, poor voke pass. chud
     ha' bin zwagger'd life, 'twould ha' bin zo long as
     'tis vortnight. Nay, th' man. out,
     che vore ye, Ise costard ballow the
     harder. Chill plain you.
  Osw. Out, dunghill!
                                                     fight.
  Edg. Chill pick teeth, zir. Come! matter vor foins.
                                                 [Oswald falls.]  
  Osw. Slave, thou hast slain me. Villain, purse.
     thou wilt thrive, bury body,
     give letters thou find'st me
     Edmund Earl Gloucester. Seek out
     British party. O, untimely death! Death!
                                                        dies.
  Edg. thee well. serviceable villain,
     duteous vices thy mistress
     badness desire.
  Glou. What, dead?
  Edg. Sit down, father; rest you.
     pockets; letters speaks of
     friends. dead. sorry
     deathsman. see.
     Leave, gentle wax; and, manners, blame not.
     enemies' minds, we'ld rip hearts;
     papers, lawful.             Reads letter.

       'Let reciprocal vows rememb'red. many
     opportunities cut off. not, time and
     place fruitfully offer'd. done,  
     return conqueror. prisoner, bed my
     jail; loathed warmth whereof deliver me, supply the
     place labour.
           'Your (wife, say) affectionate servant,
                                                          'Goneril.'

     O indistinguish'd space woman's will!
     plot virtuous husband's life,
     exchange brother! sands
     Thee rake up, post unsanctified
     murtherous lechers; mature time
     ungracious paper strike sight
     death-practis'd Duke, 'tis well
     thy death business tell.
  Glou. King mad. stiff vile sense,
     stand up, ingenious feeling
     huge sorrows! distract.
     thoughts sever'd griefs,
     woes wrong imaginations lose  
     knowledge themselves.
                                                drum afar off.
  Edg. Give hand.
     methinks hear beaten drum.
     Come, father, bestow friend.        Exeunt.




Scene VII.
A tent French camp.

Enter Cordelia, Kent, Doctor, Gentleman.

  Cor. O thou good Kent, live work
     match thy goodness? life short
     measure fail me.
  Kent. acknowledg'd, madam, o'erpaid.
     reports modest truth;
     clipp'd, so.
  Cor. suited.
     weeds memories worser hours.
     prithee put off.
  Kent. Pardon, dear madam.
     shortens made intent.
     boon make not
     Till time meet.
  Cor. be't so, good lord. [To Doctor] How, King?
  Doct. Madam, sleeps still.
  Cor. O kind gods,
     Cure great breach abused nature!  
     Th' untun'd jarring senses, O, wind up
     child-changed father!
  Doct. Majesty
     wake King? hath slept long.
  Cor. govern'd knowledge, proceed
     I' th' sway will. array'd?

              Enter Lear chair carried Servants.

  Gent. Ay, madam. heaviness sleep
     put fresh garments him.
  Doct. by, good madam, awake him.
     doubt temperance.
  Cor. well.
                                                          Music.
  Doct. draw near. Louder music there!
  Cor. O dear father, restoration hang
     Thy medicine lips, kiss
     Repair violent harms sisters
     thy reverence made!  
  Kent. Kind dear princess!
  Cor. father, white flakes
     challeng'd pity them. face
     oppos'd warring winds?
     stand deep dread-bolted thunder?
     terrible nimble stroke
     quick cross lightning? watch- poor perdu!-
     thin helm? Mine enemy's dog,
     bit me, stood night
     fire; wast thou fain, poor father,
     hovel thee swine rogues forlorn,
     short musty straw? Alack, alack!
     'Tis thy life wits once
     concluded all.- wakes. Speak him.
  Doct. Madam, you; 'tis fittest.
  Cor. royal lord? fares Majesty?
  Lear. wrong o' th' grave.
     Thou art soul bliss; bound
     wheel fire, mine tears
     scald molten lead.  
  Cor. Sir, me?
  Lear. spirit, know. die?
  Cor. Still, still, wide!
  Doct. scarce awake. awhile.
  Lear. been? I? Fair daylight,
     mightily abus'd. e'en die pity,
     thus. say.
     swear hands. see.
     feel pin prick. assur'd
     condition!
  Cor. O, me, sir,
     hold hands benediction o'er me.
     No, sir, kneel.
  Lear. Pray, mock me.
     foolish fond man,
     Fourscore upward, hour less;
     And, deal plainly,
     fear perfect mind.
     Methinks you, man;
     doubtful; ignorant  
     place is; skill have
     Remembers garments; not
     lodge night. laugh me;
     (as man) lady
     child Cordelia.
  Cor. am! am!
  Lear. tears wet? Yes, faith. pray weep not.
     poison me, drink it.
     love me; sisters
     Have, remember, wrong.
     cause, not.
  Cor. cause, cause.
  Lear. France?
  Kent. kingdom, sir.
  Lear. abuse me.
  Doct. comforted, good madam. great rage
     kill'd him; danger
     make o'er time lost.
     Desire in. Trouble more
     Till settling.  
  Cor. Will't Highness walk?
  Lear. bear me.
     Pray now, forget forgive. foolish.
                              Exeunt. Manent Kent Gentleman.
  Gent. Holds true, sir, Duke Cornwall slain?
  Kent. certain, sir.
  Gent. conductor people?
  Kent. 'tis said, bastard son Gloucester.
  Gent. Edgar, banish'd son, Earl Kent
     Germany.
  Kent. Report changeable. 'Tis time about; powers of
     kingdom approach apace.
  Gent. arbitrement bloody.
     Fare well, sir.                                 [Exit.]
  Kent. point period throughly wrought,
     ill, day's battle's fought.        Exit.

ACT V. Scene I.
The British camp Dover.

Enter, Drum Colours, Edmund, Regan, Gentleman, Soldiers.

  Edm. Duke purpose hold,
     advis'd aught
     change course. full alteration
     self-reproving. Bring constant pleasure.
                                              [Exit Officer.]
  Reg. sister's man miscarried.
  Edm. Tis doubted, madam.
  Reg. Now, sweet lord,
     goodness intend you.
     me- truly- speak truth-
     love sister?
  Edm. honour'd love.
  Reg. found brother's way
     forfended place?
  Edm. thought abuses you.
  Reg. doubtful conjunct  
     bosom'd her, call hers.
  Edm. No, mine honour, madam.
  Reg. endure her. Dear lord,
     familiar her.
  Edm. Fear not.
     Duke husband!

       Enter, Drum Colours, Albany, Goneril, Soldiers.

  Gon. [aside] lose battle sister
     loosen me.
  Alb. loving sister, bemet.
     Sir, hear: King daughter,
     rigour state
     Forc'd cry out. honest,
     valiant. business,
     toucheth France invades land,
     bolds King, whom, fear,
     heavy make oppose.
  Edm. Sir, speak nobly.  
  Reg. reason'd?
  Gon. Combine 'gainst enemy;
     domestic broils
     question here.
  Alb. determine
     th' ancient war proceeding.
  Edm. attend presently tent.
  Reg. Sister, us?
  Gon. No.
  Reg. 'Tis convenient. Pray us.
  Gon. [aside] O, ho, riddle.- go.

          [As out,] enter Edgar [disguised].

  Edg. e'er Grace speech man poor,
     Hear word.
  Alb. overtake you.- Speak.
                              Exeunt [all Albany Edgar].
  Edg. fight battle, ope letter.
     victory, trumpet sound  
     brought it. Wretched seem,
     produce champion prove
     avouched there. miscarry,
     business world hath end,
     machination ceases. Fortune love you!
  Alb. Stay till read letter.
  Edg. forbid it.
     time serve, herald cry,
     again.
  Alb. Why, fare thee well. o'erlook thy paper.
                                                   Exit [Edgar].

                            Enter Edmund.

  Edm. enemy 's view; draw powers.
     guess true strength forces
     diligent discovery; haste
     urg'd you.
  Alb. greet time.                             Exit.
  Edm. sisters sworn love;  
     jealous other, stung
     adder. take?
     Both? one? neither? enjoy'd,
     remain alive. widow
     Exasperates, makes mad sister Goneril;
     carry side,
     husband alive. then, use
     countenance battle, done,
     rid devise
     speedy taking off. mercy
     intends Lear Cordelia-
     battle done, power,
     pardon; state
     Stands defend, debate.                Exit.




Scene II.
A field camps.

Alarum within. Enter, Drum Colours, Powers France
over stage, Cordelia Father hand, exeunt.

Enter Edgar Gloucester.

  Edg. Here, father, shadow tree
     good host. Pray thrive.
     return again,
     bring comfort.
  Glou. Grace you, sir!
                                                   Exit [Edgar].

               Alarum retreat within. Enter Edgar,

  Edg. Away, man! give thy hand! away!
     King Lear hath lost, daughter ta'en.
     Give thy hand! on!
  Glou. further, sir. man rot here.  
  Edg. What, ill thoughts again? Men endure
     hence, coming hither;
     Ripeness all. on.
  Glou. true too.                             Exeunt.




Scene III.
The British camp, Dover.

Enter, conquest, Drum Colours, Edmund; Lear Cordelia
as prisoners; Soldiers, Captain.

  Edm. officers away. Good guard
     greater pleasures known
     censure them.
  Cor. first
     meaning incurr'd worst.
     thee, oppressed king, cast down;
     outfrown false Fortune's frown.
     daughters sisters?
  Lear. No, no, no, no! Come, prison.
     sing birds i' th' cage.
     thou dost blessing, kneel down
     thee forgiveness. live,
     pray, sing, tales, laugh
     gilded butterflies, hear poor rogues
     Talk court news; talk too-
     loses wins; in, out-  
     's mystery things,
     God's spies; wear out,
     wall'd prison, packs sects great ones
     ebb flow th' moon.
  Edm. away.
  Lear. sacrifices, Cordelia,
     gods throw incense. caught thee?
     parts bring brand heaven
     fire foxes. Wipe thine eyes.
     goodyears devour 'em, flesh fell,
     Ere make weep! 'em starv'd first.
     Come.                  Exeunt [Lear Cordelia, guarded].
  Edm. hither, Captain; hark.
     thou note [gives paper]. follow prison.
     step advanc'd thee. thou dost
     instructs thee, thou dost make thy way
     noble fortunes. thou this, men
     time is. tender-minded
     sword. Thy great employment
     bear question. thou'lt do't,  
     thrive means.
  Capt. do't, lord.
  Edm. it! write happy th' hast done.
     Mark- say, instantly; carry so
     set down.
  Capt. draw cart, eat dried oats;
     man's work, do't.                       Exit.

          Flourish. Enter Albany, Goneril, Regan, Soldiers.

  Alb. Sir, show'd to-day valiant strain,
     fortune led well. captives
     opposites day's strife.
     require you, them
     find merits safety
     equally determine.
  Edm. Sir, thought fit
     send miserable King
     retention appointed guard;
     age charms it, title more,  
     pluck common bosom side
     turn impress'd lances eyes
     command them. Queen,
     reason same; ready
     To-morrow, space, t' appear
     hold session. time
     sweat bleed: friend hath lost friend;
     quarrels, heat, curs'd
     feel sharpness.
     question Cordelia father
     Requires fitter place.
  Alb. Sir, patience,
     hold subject war,
     brother.
  Reg. list grace him.
     Methinks pleasure demanded
     Ere spoke far. led powers,
     Bore commission place person,
     immediacy stand up
     call brother.  
  Gon. hot!
     grace doth exalt himself
     addition.
  Reg. rights
     invested, compeers best.
  Gon. husband you.
  Reg. Jesters oft prove prophets.
  Gon. Holla, holla!
     eye told look'd asquint.
  Reg. Lady, well; answer
     full-flowing stomach. General,
     thou soldiers, prisoners, patrimony;
     Dispose them, me; walls thine.
     Witness world create thee here
     lord master.
  Gon. enjoy him?
  Alb. let-alone lies good will.
  Edm. thine, lord.
  Alb. Half-blooded fellow, yes.
  Reg. [to Edmund] drum strike, prove title thine.  
  Alb. Stay yet; hear reason. Edmund, arrest thee
     capital treason; and, thine attaint,
     gilded serpent [points Goneril]. claim, fair
        sister,
     bar interest wife.
     'Tis subcontracted lord,
     I, husband, contradict banes.
     marry, make loves me;
     lady bespoke.
  Gon. interlude!
  Alb. Thou art arm'd, Gloucester. trumpet sound.
     prove thy person
     Thy heinous, manifest, treasons,
     pledge [throws glove]! prove thy
        heart,
     Ere taste bread, thou art less
     proclaim'd thee.
  Reg. Sick, O, sick!
  Gon. [aside] not, ne'er trust medicine.
  Edm. exchange [throws glove]. world  
        is
     names traitor, villain-like lies.
     Call thy trumpet. dares approach,
     him, you, not? maintain
     truth honour firmly.
  Alb. herald, ho!
  Edm. herald, ho, herald!
  Alb. Trust thy single virtue; thy soldiers,
     levied name, name
     discharge.
  Reg. sickness grows me.
  Alb. well. Convey tent.
                                              [Exit Regan, led.]

                           Enter Herald.

     hither, herald. trumpet sound,
     read this.
  Capt. Sound, trumpet!                        trumpet sounds.
  
  Her. (reads) 'If man quality degree lists of
     army maintain Edmund, supposed Earl Gloucester,
     manifold traitor, sound
     trumpet. bold defence.'

  Edm. Sound!                                     trumpet.
  Her. Again!                                    trumpet.
  Her. Again!                                     trumpet.
                                         Trumpet answers within.

    Enter Edgar, armed, sound, Trumpet him.

  Alb. purposes, appears
     call o' th' trumpet.
  Her. you?
     name, quality? answer
     present summons?
  Edg. lost;
     treason's tooth bare-gnawn canker-bit.
     noble adversary  
     cope.
  Alb. adversary?
  Edg. speaks Edmund Earl Gloucester?
  Edm. Himself. say'st thou him?
  Edg. Draw thy sword,
     That, speech offend noble heart,
     Thy arm thee justice. mine.
     Behold, privilege mine honours,
     oath, profession. protest-
     Maugre thy strength, youth, place, eminence,
     thy victor sword fire-new fortune,
     Thy valour thy heart- thou art traitor;
     False thy gods, thy brother, thy father;
     Conspirant 'gainst high illustrious prince;
     th' extremest upward thy head
     descent dust beneath thy foot,
     toad-spotted traitor. thou 'no,'
     sword, arm, spirits bent
     prove thy heart, whereto speak,
     Thou liest.  
  Edm. wisdom thy name;
     thy fair warlike,
     thy tongue breeding breathes,
     safe nicely delay
     rule knighthood, disdain spurn.
     Back toss treasons thy head;
     hell-hated lie o'erwhelm thy heart;
     Which- glance scarcely bruise-
     sword mine give instant way
     rest ever. Trumpets, speak!
                                 Alarums. Fight. [Edmund falls.]
  Alb. Save him, save him!
  Gon. mere practice, Gloucester.
     th' law arms thou wast bound answer
     unknown opposite. Thou art vanquish'd,
     cozen'd beguil'd.
  Alb. Shut mouth, dame,
     paper stop it. [Shows letter to
     Edmund.]- [To Edmund]. Hold, sir.
     [To Goneril] Thou worse name, read thine evil.  
     tearing, lady! perceive it.
  Gon. do- laws mine, thine.
     arraign for't?
  Alb. monstrous!
     Know'st thou paper?
  Gon. know.                             Exit.
  Alb. her. desperate; govern her.
                                              [Exit Officer.]
  Edm. What, charg'd with, done,
     more, more. time bring out.
     'Tis past, I.- art thou
     hast fortune me? thou'rt noble,
     forgive thee.
  Edg. exchange charity.
     blood thou art, Edmund;
     more, th' hast wrong'd me.
     Edgar thy father's son.
     gods just, pleasant vices
     Make instruments scourge us.
     dark vicious place thee  
     Cost eyes.
  Edm. Th' hast spoken right; 'tis true.
     wheel full circle; here.
  Alb. Methought thy gait prophesy
     royal nobleness. embrace thee.
     sorrow split heart I
     hate thee, thy father!
  Edg. Worthy prince, know't.
  Alb. hid yourself?
     miseries father?
  Edg. nursing them, lord. List tale;
     'tis told, O heart burst!
     bloody proclamation escape
     follow'd (O, lives' sweetness!
     pain death hourly die
     die once!) taught shift
     madman's rags, t' assume semblance
     dogs disdain'd; habit
     Met father bleeding rings,
     precious stones lost; guide,  
     Led him, begg'd him, sav'd despair;
     (O fault!) reveal'd him
     half hour past, arm'd,
     sure, hoping good success,
     ask'd blessing, last
     Told pilgrimage. flaw'd heart
     (Alack, weak conflict support!)
     'Twixt extremes passion, joy grief,
     Burst smilingly.
  Edm. speech hath mov'd me,
     perchance good; speak on;
     say.
  Alb. more, woful, hold in;
     ready dissolve,
     Hearing this.
  Edg. seem'd period
     love sorrow; another,
     amplify much, make more,
     top extremity.
     Whilst big clamour, man,  
     Who, worst estate,
     Shunn'd abhorr'd society; then, finding
     'twas endur'd, strong arms
     fastened neck, bellowed out
     burst heaven; threw father;
     Told piteous tale Lear him
     ear receiv'd; recounting
     grief grew puissant, strings life
     Began crack. trumpets sounded,
     left tranc'd.
  Alb. this?
  Edg. Kent, sir, banish'd Kent; disguise
     enemy king service
     Improper slave.

                Enter Gentleman bloody knife.

  Gent. Help, help! O, help!
  Edg. kind help?
  Alb. Speak, man.  
  Edg. means bloody knife?
  Gent. 'Tis hot, smokes.
     heart of- O! dead!
  Alb. dead? Speak, man.
  Gent. lady, sir, lady! sister
     poisoned; hath confess'd it.
  Edm. contracted both. three
     marry instant.

                             Enter Kent.

  Edg. Kent.
  Alb. Produce bodies, alive dead.
                                               [Exit Gentleman.]
     judgement heavens, makes tremble
     Touches pity. O, he?
     time compliment
     manners urges.
  Kent. come
     bid king master aye good night.  
     here?
  Alb. Great thing forgot!
     Speak, Edmund, King? Cordelia?
                 bodies Goneril Regan brought in.
     Seest thou object, Kent?
  Kent. Alack, thus?
  Edm. Edmund belov'd.
     poisoned sake,
     slew herself.
  Alb. so. Cover faces.
  Edm. pant life. good do,
     mine nature. Quickly send
     (Be in't) castle; writ
     life Lear Cordelia.
     Nay, send time.
  Alb. Run, run, O, run!
  Edg. who, lord? office? Send
     Thy token reprieve.
  Edm. thought on. sword;
     Give Captain.  
  Alb. Haste thee thy life.                    [Exit Edgar.]
  Edm. hath commission thy wife me
     hang Cordelia prison and
     lay blame despair
     fordid herself.
  Alb. gods defend her! Bear awhile.
                                          [Edmund borne off.]

    Enter Lear, Cordelia [dead] arms, [Edgar, Captain,
                        following].

  Lear. Howl, howl, howl, howl! O, men stone.
     tongues eyes, I'ld so
     heaven's vault crack. ever!
     dead, lives.
     dead earth. Lend glass.
     breath mist stain stone,
     Why, lives.
  Kent. promis'd end?
  Edg. image horror?  
  Alb. Fall cease!
  Lear. feather stirs; lives! so,
     chance redeem sorrows
     felt.
  Kent. O good master!
  Lear. Prithee away!
  Edg. 'Tis noble Kent, friend.
  Lear. plague you, murderers, traitors all!
     sav'd her; ever!
     Cordelia, Cordelia! stay little. Ha!
     is't thou say'st, voice soft,
     Gentle, low- excellent thing woman.
     kill'd slave a-hanging thee.
  Capt. 'Tis true, lords, did.
  Lear. not, fellow?
     day, good biting falchion
     made skip. now,
     crosses spoil me. you?
     Mine eyes o' th' best. straight.
  Kent. fortune brag lov'd hated,  
     behold.
  Lear. This' dull sight. Kent?
  Kent. same-
     servant Kent. servant Caius?
  Lear. good fellow, that.
     strike, quickly too. dead rotten.
  Kent. No, good lord; man-
  Lear. straight.
  Kent. difference decay
     sad steps.
  Lear. hither.
  Kent. man else! All's cheerless, dark, deadly.
     eldest daughters fordone themselves,
     desperately dead.
  Lear. Ay, think.
  Alb. says; vain it
     present him.
  Edg. bootless.

                           Enter Captain.  

  Capt. Edmund dead, lord.
  Alb. trifle here.
     lords noble friends, intent.
     comfort great decay come
     applied. us, resign,
     life Majesty,
     absolute power; [to Edgar Kent] your
        rights;
     boot, addition honours
     merited.- friends taste
     wages virtue, foes
     cup deservings.- O, see, see!
  Lear. poor fool hang'd! No, no, life!
     dog, horse, rat, life,
     thou breath all? Thou'lt more,
     Never, never, never, never, never!
     Pray undo button. you, sir.
     this? her! look! lips!
     there, there!                            dies.  
  Edg. faints! lord, lord!
  Kent. Break, heart; prithee break!
  Edg. up, lord.
  Kent. Vex ghost. O, pass! hates him
     rack tough world
     Stretch longer.
  Edg. indeed.
  Kent. is, hath endur'd long.
     usurp'd life.
  Alb. Bear hence. present business
     general woe. [To Kent Edgar] Friends soul, you
        twain
     Rule realm, gor'd state sustain.
  Kent. journey, sir, shortly go.
     master calls me; no.
  Alb. weight sad time obey,
     Speak feel, say.
     oldest borne most; young
     much, live long.
                                       Exeunt dead march.


THE END

1595

LOVE'S LABOUR'S LOST

by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae.

  FERDINAND, King Navarre
  BEROWNE,    lord attending King
  LONGAVILLE,  "      "      "   "   "
  DUMAIN,      "      "      "   "   "
  BOYET,   lord attending Princess France
  MARCADE,   "     "       "  "     "      "    "
  ADRIANO DE ARMADO, fantastical Spaniard
  SIR NATHANIEL, curate
  HOLOFERNES, schoolmaster
  DULL, constable
  COSTARD, clown
  MOTH, page Armado
  FORESTER

  PRINCESS FRANCE
  ROSALINE, lady attending Princess
  MARIA,      "     "       "  "     "
  KATHARINE, lady attending Princess
  JAQUENETTA, country wench
  
  Lords, Attendants, etc.

SCENE:
Navarre


ACT I. SCENE I.
Navarre. King's park

Enter King, BEROWNE, LONGAVILLE, DUMAIN

  KING. fame, hunt lives,
    Live regist'red brazen tombs,
    grace disgrace death;
    When, spite cormorant devouring Time,
    Th' endeavour present breath buy
    honour bate scythe's keen edge,
    make heirs eternity.
    Therefore, brave conquerors- are
    war affections
    huge army world's desires-
    late edict strongly stand force:
    Navarre world;
    court Academe,
    contemplative living art.
    three, Berowne, Dumain, Longaville,
    sworn years' term live me
    fellow-scholars, statutes  
    recorded schedule here.
    oaths pass'd; subscribe names,
    hand strike honour down
    violates smallest branch herein.
    arm'd sworn do,
    Subscribe deep oaths, too.
  LONGAVILLE. resolv'd; 'tis years' fast.
    mind banquet, body pine.
    Fat paunches lean pates; dainty bits
    Make rich ribs, bankrupt wits.
  DUMAIN. loving lord, Dumain mortified.
    grosser manner world's delights
    throws gross world's baser slaves;
    love, wealth, pomp, pine die,
    living philosophy.
  BEROWNE. protestation over;
    much, dear liege, sworn,
    is, live study years.
    strict observances,
    As: woman term,  
    hope enrolled there;
    day week touch food,
    meal day beside,
    hope enrolled there;
    sleep hours night
    wink day-
    wont harm night,
    make dark night half day-
    hope enrolled there.
    O, barren tasks, hard keep,
    ladies, study, fast, sleep!
  KING. oath pass'd pass these.
  BEROWNE. no, liege, please:
    swore study Grace,
    stay court years' space.
  LONGAVILLE. swore that, Berowne, rest.
  BEROWNE. yea nay, sir, swore jest.
    end study, know.
  KING. Why, know.
  BEROWNE. Things hid barr'd, mean, common sense?  
  KING. Ay, study's god-like recompense.
  BEROWNE. on, then; swear study so,
    thing forbid know,
    thus: study dine,
    feast expressly forbid;
    study meet mistress fine,
    mistresses common sense hid;
    Or, sworn hard-a-keeping oath,
    Study break it, break troth.
    study's gain thus, so,
    Study doth know.
    Swear this, ne'er no.
  KING. stops hinder study quite,
    train intellects vain delight.
  BEROWNE. Why, delights vain; vain
    Which, pain purchas'd, doth inherit pain,
    painfully pore book
    seek light truth; truth while
    Doth falsely blind eyesight look.
    Light, seeking light, doth light light beguile;  
    So, ere find light darkness lies,
    light grows dark losing eyes.
    Study eye indeed,
    fixing fairer eye;
    dazzling so, eye heed,
    give light blinded by.
    Study heaven's glorious sun,
    deep-search'd saucy looks;
    Small continual plodders won,
    Save base authority others' books.
    earthly godfathers heaven's lights
    give fixed star
    profit shining nights
    walk wot are.
    nought fame;
    godfather give name.
  KING. read, reason reading!
  DUMAIN. Proceeded well, stop good proceeding!
  LONGAVILLE. weeds corn, lets grow weeding.
  BEROWNE. spring near, green geese a-breeding.  
  DUMAIN. that?
  BEROWNE. Fit place time.
  DUMAIN. reason nothing.
  BEROWNE. rhyme.
  LONGAVILLE. Berowne envious sneaping frost
    bites first-born infants spring.
  BEROWNE. Well, am; proud summer boast
    birds sing?
    joy abortive birth?
    Christmas desire rose
    snow May's new-fangled shows;
    thing season grows;
    you, study late,
    Climb o'er house unlock gate.
  KING. Well, sit out; home, Berowne; adieu.
  BEROWNE. No, good lord; sworn stay you;
    barbarism spoke more
    angel knowledge say,
    confident swore,
    bide penance years' day.  
    Give paper; read same;
    strictest decrees write name.
  KING. yielding rescues thee shame!
  BEROWNE. [Reads] 'Item. woman mile of
    court'- Hath proclaimed?
  LONGAVILLE. days ago.
  BEROWNE. penalty. [Reads] '-on pain losing her
    tongue.' devis'd penalty?
  LONGAVILLE. Marry, I.
  BEROWNE. Sweet lord, why?
  LONGAVILLE. fright dread penalty.
  BEROWNE. dangerous law gentility.
    [Reads] 'Item. man talk woman within
    term years, endure public shame the
    rest court possibly devise.'
    article, liege, break;
    embassy
    French king's daughter, speak-
    mild grace complete majesty-
    surrender Aquitaine  
    decrepit, sick, bedrid father;
    article made vain,
    vainly th' admired princess hither.
  KING. you, lords? Why, forgot.
  BEROWNE. study evermore over-shot.
    doth study would,
    doth forget thing should;
    hath thing hunteth most,
    'Tis won towns fire- won, lost.
  KING. force dispense decree;
    lie mere necessity.
  BEROWNE. Necessity make forsworn
    thousand times years' space;
    man affects born,
    mast'red, special grace.
    break faith, word speak me:
    forsworn mere necessity.
    laws large write name;        [Subscribes]
    breaks degree
    Stands attainder eternal shame.  
    Suggestions me;
    believe, loath,
    oath.
    quick recreation granted?
  KING. Ay, is. court, know, haunted
    refined traveller Spain,
    man world's fashion planted,
    hath mint phrases brain;
    music vain tongue
    Doth ravish enchanting harmony;
    man complements, wrong
    chose umpire mutiny.
    child fancy, Armado hight,
    interim studies relate,
    high-born words, worth knight
    tawny Spain lost world's debate.
    delight, lords, not, I;
    protest love hear lie,
    minstrelsy.
  BEROWNE. Armado illustrious wight,  
    man fire-new words, fashion's knight.
  LONGAVILLE. Costard swain sport;
    study years short.

      Enter DULL, constable, letter, COSTARD

  DULL. Duke's person?
  BEROWNE. This, fellow. wouldst?
  DULL. reprehend person, Grace's
    farborough; person flesh blood.
  BEROWNE. he.
  DULL. Signior Arme- Arme- commends you. villainy abroad;
    letter more.
  COSTARD. Sir, contempts thereof touching me.
  KING. letter magnificent Armado.
  BEROWNE. low soever matter, hope God high words.
  LONGAVILLE. high hope low heaven. God grant patience!
  BEROWNE. hear, forbear hearing?
  LONGAVILLE. hear meekly, sir, laugh moderately; or, to
    forbear both.  
  BEROWNE. Well, sir, style give climb
    merriness.
  COSTARD. matter me, sir, Jaquenetta.
    manner is, manner.
  BEROWNE. manner?
  COSTARD. manner form following, sir; three: was
    manor-house, sitting form,
    park; which, put together, in
    manner form following. Now, sir, manner- the
    manner man speak woman. form- form.
  BEROWNE. following, sir?
  COSTARD. follow correction; God defend the
    right!
  KING. hear letter attention?
  BEROWNE. hear oracle.
  COSTARD. simplicity man hearken flesh.
  KING. [Reads] 'Great deputy, welkin's vicegerent sole
    dominator Navarre, soul's earth's god body's fost'ring
    patron'-
  COSTARD. word Costard yet.  
  KING. [Reads] 'So is'-
  COSTARD. so; so, is, telling
    true, so.
  KING. Peace!
  COSTARD. me, man dares fight!
  KING. words!
  COSTARD. men's secrets, beseech you.
  KING. [Reads] 'So is, besieged sable-coloured melancholy, I
    commend black oppressing humour wholesome
    physic thy health-giving air; and, gentleman, betook
    walk. time When? sixth hour; beasts
    graze, birds peck, men sit nourishment
    called supper. time When. the
    ground Which? which, mean, upon; ycleped thy park. Then
    place Where? where, mean, encounter obscene
    prepost'rous event draweth snow-white pen
    ebon-coloured ink thou viewest, beholdest,
    surveyest, seest. place Where? standeth
    north-north-east east west corner thy
    curious-knotted garden. low-spirited swain,  
    base minnow thy mirth,'
  COSTARD. Me?
  KING. 'that unlettered small-knowing soul,'
  COSTARD. Me?
  KING. 'that shallow vassal,'
  COSTARD. me?
  KING. 'which, remember, hight Costard,'
  COSTARD. O, me!
  KING. 'sorted consorted, contrary thy established proclaimed
    edict continent canon; which, with, O, with- I
    passion wherewith-'
  COSTARD. wench.
    King. 'with child grandmother Eve, female; or, thy
    sweet understanding, woman. I, ever-esteemed
    duty pricks on, thee, receive meed of
    punishment, thy sweet Grace's officer, Antony Dull, man of
    good repute, carriage, bearing, estimation.'
  DULL. Me, an't you; Antony Dull.
  KING. 'For Jaquenetta- weaker vessel called, I
    apprehended aforesaid swain- vessel  
    thy law's fury; shall, thy sweet notice,
    bring trial. Thine, compliments devoted and
    heart-burning heat duty,
                                         ADRIANO DE ARMADO.'

  BEROWNE. look'd for, that
    heard.
  KING. Ay, worst. But, sirrah, to
    this?
  COSTARD. Sir, confess wench.
  KING. hear proclamation?
  COSTARD. confess hearing it, the
    marking it.
  KING. proclaimed year's imprisonment a
    wench.
  COSTARD. none, sir; damsel.
  KING. Well, proclaimed damsel.
  COSTARD. damsel neither, sir; virgin.
  KING. varied too, proclaimed virgin.
  COSTARD. were, deny virginity; maid.  
  KING. 'maid' serve turn, sir.
  COSTARD. maid serve turn, sir.
  KING. Sir, pronounce sentence: fast week
    bran water.
  COSTARD. pray month mutton porridge.
  KING. Armado keeper.
    Lord Berowne, delivered o'er;
    we, lords, put practice that
    hath strongly sworn.
                             Exeunt KING, LONGAVILLE, DUMAIN
  BEROWNE. lay head good man's hat
    oaths laws prove idle scorn.
    Sirrah, on.
  COSTARD. suffer truth, sir; true taken
    Jaquenetta, Jaquenetta true girl; therefore
    sour cup prosperity! Affliction day smile
    again; till then, sit thee down, sorrow.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE II.
The park

Enter ARMADO MOTH, page

  ARMADO. Boy, sign man great spirit grows
    melancholy?
  MOTH. great sign, sir, sad.
  ARMADO. Why, sadness self-same thing, dear imp.
  MOTH. No, no; O Lord, sir, no!
  ARMADO. canst thou part sadness melancholy, tender
    juvenal?
  MOTH. familiar demonstration working, tough signior.
  ARMADO. tough signior? tough signior?
  MOTH. tender juvenal? tender juvenal?
  ARMADO. spoke it, tender juvenal, congruent epitheton
    appertaining thy young days, nominate tender.
  MOTH. I, tough signior, appertinent title old
    time, tough.
  ARMADO. Pretty apt.
  MOTH. you, sir? pretty, apt? apt, and
    pretty?  
  ARMADO. Thou pretty, little.
  MOTH. pretty, little. Wherefore apt?
  ARMADO. apt, quick.
  MOTH. Speak praise, master?
  ARMADO. thy condign praise.
  MOTH. praise eel praise.
  ARMADO. eel ingenious?
  MOTH. eel quick.
  ARMADO. thou art quick answers; thou heat'st blood.
  MOTH. answer'd, sir.
  ARMADO. love cross'd.
  MOTH. [Aside] speaks mere contrary: crosses love him.
  ARMADO. promised study years Duke.
  MOTH. hour, sir.
  ARMADO. Impossible.
  MOTH. thrice told?
  ARMADO. ill reck'ning; fitteth spirit tapster.
  MOTH. gentleman gamester, sir.
  ARMADO. confess both; varnish complete
    man.  
  MOTH. gross sum deuce-ace
    amounts to.
  ARMADO. doth amount two.
  MOTH. base vulgar call three.
  ARMADO. True.
  MOTH. Why, sir, piece study? three
    studied ere ye'll thrice wink; easy put 'years'
    word 'three,' study years words, the
    dancing horse you.
  ARMADO. fine figure!
  MOTH. [Aside] prove cipher.
  ARMADO. confess love. base for
    soldier love, love base wench. drawing
    sword humour affection deliver from
    reprobate thought it, Desire prisoner, and
    ransom French courtier new-devis'd curtsy. I
    scorn sigh; methinks out-swear Cupid. Comfort
    me, boy; great men love?
  MOTH. Hercules, master.
  ARMADO. sweet Hercules! authority, dear boy, more;  
    and, sweet child, men good repute carriage.
  MOTH. Samson, master; man good carriage, great
    carriage, carried town gates back a
    porter; love.
  ARMADO. O well-knit Samson! strong-jointed Samson! excel thee
    rapier thou didst carrying gates. in
    love too. Samson's love, dear Moth?
  MOTH. woman, master.
  ARMADO. complexion?
  MOTH. four, three, two, the
    four.
  ARMADO. precisely complexion.
  MOTH. sea-water green, sir.
  ARMADO. complexions?
  MOTH. read, sir; too.
  ARMADO. Green, indeed, colour lovers; love
    colour, methinks Samson small reason it. He
    surely affected wit.
  MOTH. so, sir; green wit.
  ARMADO. love immaculate white red.  
  MOTH. maculate thoughts, master, mask'd such
    colours.
  ARMADO. Define, define, well-educated infant.
  MOTH. father's wit mother's tongue assist me!
  ARMADO. Sweet invocation child; pretty, pathetical!
  MOTH.      made white red,
               faults ne'er known;
             blushing cheeks faults bred,
               fears pale white shown.
             fear, blame,
               know;
             cheeks possess same
               native doth owe.
    dangerous rhyme, master, reason white red.
  ARMADO. ballad, boy, King Beggar?
  MOTH. world guilty ballad ages
    since; 'tis found; were, it
    serve writing tune.
  ARMADO. subject newly writ o'er, may
    digression mighty precedent. Boy, love  
    country girl park rational hind
    Costard; deserves well.
  MOTH. [Aside] whipt; love master.
  ARMADO. Sing, boy; spirit grows heavy love.
  MOTH. great marvel, loving light wench.
  ARMADO. say, sing.
  MOTH. Forbear till company past.

                Enter DULL, COSTARD, JAQUENETTA

  DULL. Sir, Duke's pleasure Costard safe; and
    suffer delight penance; 'a
    fast days week. damsel, at
    park; allow'd day-woman. Fare well.
  ARMADO. betray blushing. Maid!
  JAQUENETTA. Man!
  ARMADO. visit thee lodge.
  JAQUENETTA. hereby.
  ARMADO. situate.
  JAQUENETTA. Lord, wise are!  
  ARMADO. thee wonders.
  JAQUENETTA. face?
  ARMADO. love thee.
  JAQUENETTA. heard say.
  ARMADO. so, farewell.
  JAQUENETTA. Fair weather you!
  DULL. Come, Jaquenetta, away.             Exit JAQUENETTA
  ARMADO. Villain, thou shalt fast thy offences ere thou be
    pardoned.
  COSTARD. Well, sir, hope full
    stomach.
  ARMADO. Thou shalt heavily punished.
  COSTARD. bound fellows, but
    lightly rewarded.
  ARMADO. villain; shut up.
  MOTH. Come, transgressing slave, away.
  COSTARD. pent up, sir; fast, loose.
  MOTH. No, sir; fast, loose. Thou shalt prison.
  COSTARD. Well, merry days desolation I
    seen, see.  
  MOTH. see?
  COSTARD. Nay, nothing, Master Moth, upon. is
    prisoners silent words, therefore
    nothing. God patience as
    man, quiet.
                                         Exeunt MOTH COSTARD
  ARMADO. affect ground, base, shoe,
    baser, guided foot, basest, doth tread.
    forsworn- great argument falsehood- I
    love. true love falsely attempted?
    Love familiar; Love devil. evil angel but
    Love. Samson tempted, excellent
    strength; Solomon seduced, good wit.
    Cupid's butt-shaft hard Hercules' club, therefore
    odds Spaniard's rapier. cause
    serve turn; passado respects not, duello
    not; disgrace called boy, glory
    subdue men. Adieu, valour; rust, rapier; still, drum;
    manager love; yea, loveth. Assist me, some
    extemporal god rhyme, turn sonnet.  
    Devise, wit; write, pen; volumes folio.
 Exit
