ACT II. SCENE II.
The park

Enter PRINCESS FRANCE, attending ladies,
ROSALINE, MARIA, KATHARINE, BOYET, LORDS

  BOYET. Now, madam, summon dearest spirits.
    King father sends,
    sends, embassy:
    Yourself, held precious world's esteem,
    parley sole inheritor
    perfections man owe,
    Matchless Navarre; plea weight
    Aquitaine, dowry queen.
    prodigal dear grace
    Nature making graces dear,
    starve general world beside
    prodigally gave you.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Good Lord Boyet, beauty, mean,
    painted flourish praise.
    Beauty bought judgment eye,
    utt'red base sale chapmen's tongues;  
    proud hear worth
    counted wise
    spending wit praise mine.
    task tasker: good Boyet,
    ignorant all-telling fame
    Doth noise abroad Navarre hath made vow,
    Till painful study outwear years,
    woman approach silent court.
    to's seemeth needful course,
    enter forbidden gates,
    pleasure; behalf,
    Bold worthiness, single you
    best-moving fair solicitor.
    daughter King France,
    business, craving quick dispatch,
    Importunes personal conference Grace.
    Haste, signify much; attend,
    humble-visag'd suitors, high will.
  BOYET. Proud employment, willingly go.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. pride pride, so.  
                                                      Exit BOYET
    votaries, loving lords,
    vow-fellows virtuous duke?
  LORD. Lord Longaville one.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. man?
  MARIA. him, madam; marriage feast,
    Lord Perigort beauteous heir
    Jaques Falconbridge, solemnized
    Normandy, Longaville.
    man sovereign parts, peerless esteem'd,
    fitted arts, glorious arms;
    ill well.
    soil fair virtue's gloss,
    virtue's gloss stain soil,
    sharp wit match'd blunt will,
    edge hath power cut, wills
    spare power.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. merry mocking lord, belike; is't so?
  MARIA. humours know.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. short-liv'd wits wither grow.  
    rest?
  KATHARINE. young Dumain, well-accomplish'd youth,
    virtue love virtue loved;
    power harm, knowing ill,
    hath wit make ill shape good,
    shape win grace wit.
    Duke Alencon's once;
    good saw
    report great worthiness.
  ROSALINE. students time
    him, heard truth.
    Berowne call him; merrier man,
    limit mirth,
    spent hour's talk withal.
    eye begets occasion wit,
    object doth catch
    turns mirth-moving jest,
    fair tongue, conceit's expositor,
    Delivers apt gracious words
    aged ears play truant tales,  
    younger hearings ravished;
    sweet voluble discourse.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. God bless ladies! love,
    hath garnished
    bedecking ornaments praise?
  LORD. Boyet.

                       Re-enter BOYET

  PRINCESS FRANCE. Now, admittance, lord?
  BOYET. Navarre notice fair approach,
    competitors oath
    address'd meet you, gentle lady,
    came. Marry, learnt:
    means lodge field,
    besiege court,
    seek dispensation oath,
    enter unpeopled house.
                                    [The LADIES-IN-WAITING mask]
  
             Enter KING, LONGAVILLE, DUMAIN, BEROWNE,
                         ATTENDANTS

    Navarre.
  KING. Fair Princess, court Navarre.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. 'Fair' give back again; 'welcome' I
    yet. roof court high yours, and
    wide fields base mine.
  KING. welcome, madam, court.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. then; conduct thither.
  KING. Hear me, dear lady: sworn oath-
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Lady lord! forsworn.
  KING. world, fair madam, will.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Why, break it; will, nothing
    else.
  KING. ladyship ignorant is.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. lord so, ignorance wise,
    knowledge prove ignorance.
    hear Grace hath sworn house-keeping.
    'Tis deadly sin oath, lord,  
    sin break it.
    pardon me, sudden bold;
    teach teacher ill beseemeth me.
    Vouchsafe read purpose coming,
    suddenly resolve suit.         [Giving paper]
  KING. Madam, will, suddenly may.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. sooner away,
    prove perjur'd make stay.
  BEROWNE. dance Brabant once?
  KATHARINE. dance Brabant once?
  BEROWNE. did.
  KATHARINE. needless question!
  BEROWNE. quick.
  KATHARINE. 'Tis long you, spur questions.
  BEROWNE. wit 's hot, speeds fast, 'twill tire.
  KATHARINE. till leave rider mire.
  BEROWNE. time o' day?
  KATHARINE. hour fools ask.
  BEROWNE. fair befall mask!
  KATHARINE. Fair fall face covers!  
  BEROWNE. send lovers!
  KATHARINE. Amen, none.
  BEROWNE. Nay, gone.
  KING. Madam, father doth intimate
    payment hundred thousand crowns;
    half entire sum
    Disbursed father wars.
    we, have,
    Receiv'd sum, remains unpaid
    hundred thousand more, surety which,
    part Aquitaine bound us,
    valued money's worth.
    King father restore
    half unsatisfied,
    give Aquitaine,
    hold fair friendship Majesty.
    that, seems, purposeth,
    doth demand repaid
    hundred thousand crowns; demands,
    payment hundred thousand crowns,  
    title live Aquitaine;
    depart withal,
    money father lent,
    Aquitaine gelded is.
    Dear Princess, requests far
    reason's yielding, fair make
    yielding 'gainst reason breast,
    satisfied France again.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. King father wrong,
    wrong reputation name,
    unseeming confess receipt
    hath faithfully paid.
  KING. protest heard it;
    And, prove it, repay back
    yield Aquitaine.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. arrest word.
    Boyet, produce acquittances
    sum special officers
    Charles father.
  KING. Satisfy so.  
  BOYET. Grace, packet come,
    specialties bound;
    To-morrow sight them.
  KING. suffice me; interview
    liberal reason yield unto.
    Meantime receive hand
    honour, breach honour, may
    Make tender thy true worthiness.
    come, fair Princess, gates;
    receiv'd
    deem lodg'd heart,
    denied fair harbour house.
    good thoughts excuse me, farewell.
    To-morrow visit again.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Sweet health fair desires consort your
    Grace!
  KING. Thy thee place.
                                            Exit attendants
  BEROWNE. Lady, commend mine heart.
  ROSALINE. Pray you, commendations;  
    glad it.
  BEROWNE. heard groan.
  ROSALINE. fool sick?
  BEROWNE. Sick heart.
  ROSALINE. Alack, blood.
  BEROWNE. good?
  ROSALINE. physic 'ay.'
  BEROWNE. prick't eye?
  ROSALINE. point, knife.
  BEROWNE. Now, God save thy life!
  ROSALINE. long living!
  BEROWNE. stay thanksgiving.                [Retiring]
  DUMAIN. Sir, pray you, word: lady same?
  BOYET. heir Alencon, Katharine name.
  DUMAIN. gallant lady! Monsieur, fare well.          Exit
  LONGAVILLE. beseech word: white?
  BOYET. woman sometimes, light.
  LONGAVILLE. Perchance light light. desire name.
  BOYET. hath herself; desire shame.
  LONGAVILLE. Pray you, sir, daughter?  
  BOYET. mother's, heard.
  LONGAVILLE. God's blessing beard!
  BOYET. Good sir, offended;
    heir Falconbridge.
  LONGAVILLE. Nay, choler ended.
    sweet lady.
  BOYET. unlike, sir; be.           Exit LONGAVILLE
  BEROWNE. cap?
  BOYET. Rosaline, good hap.
  BEROWNE. wedded no?
  BOYET. will, sir, so.
  BEROWNE. welcome, sir; adieu!
  BOYET. Farewell me, sir, you.
                                     Exit BEROWNE. LADIES Unmask
  MARIA. Berowne, merry mad-cap lord;
    word jest.
  BOYET. jest word.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. his
    word.
  BOYET. grapple board.  
  KATHARINE. hot sheeps, marry!
  BOYET. wherefore ships?
    sheep, sweet lamb, feed lips.
  KATHARINE. sheep pasture- finish jest?
  BOYET. grant pasture me.     [Offering kiss her]
  KATHARINE. so, gentle beast;
    lips common, be.
  BOYET. Belonging whom?
  KATHARINE. fortunes me.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Good wits jangling; but, gentles,
      agree;
    civil war wits used
    Navarre book-men, 'tis abused.
  BOYET. observation, seldom lies,
    heart's rhetoric disclosed eyes,
    Deceive now, Navarre infected.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. what?
  BOYET. lovers entitle 'affected.'
  PRINCESS FRANCE. reason?
  BOYET. Why, behaviours make retire  
    court eye, peeping desire.
    heart, agate, print impressed,
    Proud form, eye pride expressed;
    tongue, impatient speak see,
    stumble haste eyesight be;
    senses sense make repair,
    feel fairest fair.
    Methought senses lock'd eye,
    jewels crystal prince buy;
    Who, tend'ring worth glass'd,
    point buy them, pass'd.
    face's margent quote amazes
    eyes eyes enchanted gazes.
    give Aquitaine his,
    give sake loving kiss.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Come, pavilion. Boyet dispos'd.
  BOYET. speak words eye hath disclos'd;
    made mouth eye,
    adding tongue lie.
  MARIA. Thou art love-monger, speakest skilfully.  
  KATHARINE. Cupid's grandfather, learns news him.
  ROSALINE. Venus mother; father but
    grim.
  BOYET. hear, mad wenches?
  MARIA. No.
  BOYET. What, then; see?
  MARIA. Ay, gone.
  BOYET. hard me.                         Exeunt

ACT III. SCENE I.
The park

Enter ARMADO MOTH

  ARMADO. Warble, child; make passionate sense hearing.
                                         [MOTH sings Concolinel]
  ARMADO. Sweet air! Go, tenderness years, key, give
    enlargement swain, bring festinately hither; must
    employ letter love.
  MOTH. Master, win love French brawl?
  ARMADO. meanest thou? Brawling French?
  MOTH. No, complete master; jig tune tongue's
    end, canary feet, humour turning your
    eyelids, sigh note sing note, the
    throat, swallowed love singing love, sometime
    nose, snuff'd love smelling love,
    hat penthouse-like o'er shop eyes, with
    arms cross'd thin-belly doublet, rabbit a
    spit, hands pocket, man old
    painting; long tune, snip away.
    complements, humours; betray nice  
    wenches, betrayed these; make men
    note- note me?- affected these.
  ARMADO. hast thou purchased experience?
  MOTH. penny observation.
  ARMADO. O- O-
  MOTH. hobby-horse forgot.
  ARMADO. Call'st thou love 'hobby-horse'?
  MOTH. No, master; hobby-horse colt, love
    hackney. forgot love?
  ARMADO. had.
  MOTH. Negligent student! learn heart.
  ARMADO. heart heart, boy.
  MOTH. heart, master; prove.
  ARMADO. wilt thou prove?
  MOTH. man, live; this, by, in, without, the
    instant. heart love her, heart by
    her; heart love her, heart love with
    her; heart love her, heart you
    enjoy her.
  ARMADO. three.  
  MOTH. times more, all.
  ARMADO. Fetch swain; carry letter.
  MOTH. message sympathiz'd- horse ambassador an
    ass.
  ARMADO. Ha, ha, sayest thou?
  MOTH. Marry, sir, send ass horse, is
    slow-gaited. go.
  ARMADO. short; away.
  MOTH. swift lead, sir.
  ARMADO. meaning, pretty ingenious?
    lead metal heavy, dull, slow?
  MOTH. Minime, honest master; rather, master, no.
  ARMADO. lead slow.
  MOTH. swift, sir, so:
    lead slow fir'd gun?
  ARMADO. Sweet smoke rhetoric!
    reputes cannon; bullet, he;
    shoot thee swain.
  MOTH. Thump, then, flee.                            Exit
  ARMADO. acute juvenal; volable free grace!  
    thy favour, sweet welkin, sigh thy face;
    rude melancholy, valour thee place.
    herald return'd.

                       Re-enter MOTH COSTARD

  MOTH. wonder, master! costard broken shin.
  ARMADO. enigma, riddle; come, thy l'envoy; begin.
  COSTARD. egma, riddle, l'envoy; salve mail, sir.
    O, sir, plantain, plain plantain; l'envoy, l'envoy; no
    salve, sir, plantain!
  ARMADO. virtue thou enforcest laughter; thy silly thought, my
    spleen; heaving lungs provokes ridiculous
    smiling. O, pardon me, stars! Doth inconsiderate take
    salve l'envoy, word 'l'envoy' salve?
  MOTH. wise other? l'envoy salve?
  ARMADO. No, page; epilogue discourse make plain
    obscure precedence hath tofore sain.
    it:
           fox, ape, humble-bee,  
           odds, three.
    moral. l'envoy.
  MOTH. add l'envoy. moral again.
  ARMADO.  fox, ape, humble-bee,
           odds, three.
  MOTH.    goose door,
           stay'd odds adding four.
    begin moral, follow l'envoy.
           fox, ape, humble-bee,
           odds, three.
  ARMADO.  goose door,
           Staying odds adding four.
  MOTH. good l'envoy, ending goose; desire more?
  COSTARD. boy hath sold bargain, goose, flat.
    Sir, pennyworth good, goose fat.
    sell bargain cunning fast loose;
    see: fat l'envoy; ay, fat goose.
  ARMADO. hither, hither. argument begin?
  MOTH. costard broken shin.
    call'd l'envoy.  
  COSTARD. True, plantain. argument in;
    boy's fat l'envoy, goose bought;
    ended market.
  ARMADO. me: costard broken shin?
  MOTH. sensibly.
  COSTARD. Thou hast feeling it, Moth; speak that
      l'envoy.
    I, Costard, running out, safely within,
    Fell threshold broke shin.
  ARMADO. talk matter.
  COSTARD. Till matter shin.
  ARMADO. Sirrah Costard. enfranchise thee.
  COSTARD. O, Marry Frances! smell l'envoy, some
    goose, this.
  ARMADO. sweet soul, setting thee liberty,
    enfreedoming thy person; thou wert immured, restrained,
    captivated, bound.
  COSTARD. True, true; purgation, me
    loose.
  ARMADO. give thee thy liberty, set thee durance; and,  
    lieu thereof, impose thee this: bear this
    significant [giving letter] country maid Jaquenetta;
    remuneration, ward mine honour is
    rewarding dependents. Moth, follow.                  Exit
  MOTH. sequel, I. Signior Costard, adieu.
  COSTARD. sweet ounce man's flesh, incony Jew!
                                                       Exit MOTH
    remuneration. Remuneration! O, the
    Latin word farthings. farthings- remuneration.
    'What's price inkle?'- 'One penny.'- 'No, give
    remuneration.' Why, carries it. Remuneration! Why, is
    fairer French crown. buy sell of
    word.

                          Enter BEROWNE

  BEROWNE. good knave Costard, exceedingly met!
  COSTARD. Pray you, sir, carnation ribbon man buy for
    remuneration?
  BEROWNE. remuneration?  
  COSTARD. Marry, sir, halfpenny farthing.
  BEROWNE. Why, then, three-farthing worth silk.
  COSTARD. worship. God wi' you!
  BEROWNE. Stay, slave; employ thee.
    thou wilt win favour, good knave,
    thing entreat.
  COSTARD. done, sir?
  BEROWNE. afternoon.
  COSTARD. Well, it, sir; fare well.
  BEROWNE. Thou knowest is.
  COSTARD. know, sir, it.
  BEROWNE. Why, villain, thou first.
  COSTARD. worship to-morrow morning.
  BEROWNE. afternoon.
    Hark, slave, this:
    Princess hunt park,
    train gentle lady;
    tongues speak sweetly, name,
    Rosaline call her. her,
    white hand thou commend  
    seal'd-up counsel. thy guerdon; go.
                                         [Giving shilling]
  COSTARD. Gardon, O sweet gardon! remuneration; a
    'leven-pence farthing better; sweet gardon! it,
    sir, print. Gardon- remuneration!                    Exit
  BEROWNE. I, forsooth, love; I, love's whip;
    beadle humorous sigh;
    critic, nay, night-watch constable;
    domineering pedant o'er boy,
    mortal magnificent!
    wimpled, whining, purblind, wayward boy,
    senior-junior, giant-dwarf, Dan Cupid;
    Regent love-rhymes, lord folded arms,
    Th' anointed sovereign sighs groans,
    Liege loiterers malcontents,
    Dread prince plackets, king codpieces,
    Sole imperator, great general
    trotting paritors. O heart!
    corporal field,
    wear colours tumbler's hoop!  
    What! love, sue, seek wife-
    woman, German clock,
    a-repairing, frame,
    aright, watch,
    watch'd right!
    Nay, perjur'd, worst all;
    And, three, love worst all,
    whitely wanton velvet brow,
    pitch balls stuck face eyes;
    Ay, and, heaven, deed,
    Argus eunuch guard.
    sigh her! watch her!
    pray her! to; plague
    Cupid impose neglect
    almighty dreadful might.
    Well, love, write, sigh, pray, sue, groan:
    men love lady, Joan.              Exit

ACT IV. SCENE I.
The park

Enter PRINCESS, ROSALINE, MARIA, KATHARINE, BOYET, LORDS, ATTENDANTS,
and FORESTER

  PRINCESS FRANCE. King spurr'd horse so
      hard
    steep uprising hill?
  BOYET. not; he.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Whoe'er 'a was, 'a show'd mounting mind.
    Well, lords, to-day dispatch;
    Saturday return France.
    Then, forester, friend, bush
    stand play murderer in?
  FORESTER. Hereby, edge yonder coppice;
    stand make fairest shoot.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. beauty fair shoot,
    thou speak'st fairest shoot.
  FORESTER. Pardon me, madam, meant so.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. What, what? praise me, no?
    O short-liv'd pride! fair? Alack woe!  
  FORESTER. Yes, madam, fair.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Nay, paint now;
    fair not, praise mend brow.
    Here, good glass, telling true:
                                             [ Giving money]
    Fair payment foul words due.
  FORESTER. fair inherit.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. See, see, beauty sav'd merit.
    O heresy fair, fit days!
    giving hand, foul, fair praise.
    come, bow. mercy kill,
    shooting accounted ill;
    save credit shoot:
    wounding, pity do't;
    wounding, show skill,
    praise purpose meant kill.
    And, question, sometimes:
    Glory grows guilty detested crimes,
    When, fame's sake, praise, outward part,
    bend working heart;  
    praise seek spill
    poor deer's blood heart means ill.
  BOYET. curst wives hold self-sovereignty
    praise sake, strive be
    Lords o'er lords?
  PRINCESS FRANCE. praise; praise afford
    lady subdues lord.

                       Enter COSTARD

  BOYET. member commonwealth.
  COSTARD. God dig-you-den all! Pray you, head lady?
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Thou shalt her, fellow, rest that
    heads.
  COSTARD. greatest lady, highest?
  PRINCESS FRANCE. thickest tallest.
  COSTARD. thickest tallest! so; truth truth.
    waist, mistress, slender wit,
    o' maids' girdles waist fit.
    chief woman? thickest here.  
  PRINCESS FRANCE. will, sir? will?
  COSTARD. letter Monsieur Berowne one
    Lady Rosaline.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. O, thy letter, thy letter! good friend
      mine.
    Stand aside, good bearer. Boyet, carve.
    Break capon.
  BOYET. bound serve.
    letter mistook; importeth here.
    writ Jaquenetta.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. read it, swear.
    Break neck wax, give ear.
  BOYET. [Reads] 'By heaven, thou art fair infallible;
    true thou art beauteous; truth thou art lovely.
    fairer fair, beautiful beauteous, truer truth
    itself, commiseration thy heroical vassal. The
    magnanimous illustrate king Cophetua set eye the
    pernicious indubitate beggar Zenelophon; that
    rightly say, 'Veni, vidi, vici'; annothanize in
    vulgar,- O base obscure vulgar!- videlicet, came, saw,  
    overcame. came, one; saw, two; overcame, three. came?-
    king. come?- see. see?-to overcome.
    he?- beggar. he?- beggar. Who
    overcame he?- beggar. conclusion victory; whose
    side?- king's. captive enrich'd; side?- the
    beggar's. catastrophe nuptial; side?- the
    king's. No, one, both. king, so
    stands comparison; thou beggar, witnesseth thy
    lowliness. command thy love? may. enforce thy
    love? could. entreat thy love? will. shalt thou
    exchange rags?- robes, tittles?- titles, thyself?
    -me. expecting thy reply, profane lips thy foot, my
    eyes thy picture, heart thy part.
                  Thine dearest design industry,
                                           ADRIANO DE ARMADO.

    'Thus dost thou hear Nemean lion roar
    'Gainst thee, thou lamb, standest prey;
    Submissive fall princely feet before,
    forage incline play.  
    thou strive, poor soul, thou then?
    Food rage, repasture den.'
  PRINCESS FRANCE. plume feathers indited this
      letter?
    vane? weathercock? hear better?
  BOYET. deceived remember style.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. memory bad, o'er it
    erewhile.
  BOYET. Armado Spaniard, court;
    phantasime, Monarcho, makes sport
    Prince book-mates.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Thou fellow, word.
    gave thee letter?
  COSTARD. told you: lord.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. shouldst thou give it?
  COSTARD. lord lady.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. lord lady?
  COSTARD. Lord Berowne, good master mine,
    lady France call'd Rosaline.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Thou hast mistaken letter. Come, lords,  
      away.
    [To ROSALINE] Here, sweet, put this; 'twill thine another
      day.                             Exeunt PRINCESS TRAIN
  BOYET. shooter? shooter?
  ROSALINE. teach know?
  BOYET. Ay, continent beauty.
  ROSALINE. Why, bears bow.
    Finely put off!
  BOYET. lady kill horns; but, thou marry,
    Hang neck, horns year miscarry.
    Finely put on!
  ROSALINE. then, shooter.
  BOYET. deer?
  ROSALINE. choose horns, near.
    Finely put indeed!
  MARIA. wrangle her, Boyet, strikes the
    brow.
  BOYET. hit lower. hit now?
  ROSALINE. thee saying, man
    King Pepin France boy, touching hit  
    it?
  BOYET. answer thee old, woman when
    Queen Guinever Britain wench, touching hit
    it.
  ROSALINE. [Singing]
            Thou canst hit it, hit it, hit it,
            Thou canst hit it, good man.
  BOYET.    cannot, cannot, cannot,
            cannot, can.
                                   Exeunt ROSALINE KATHARINE
  COSTARD. troth, pleasant! fit it!
  MARIA. mark marvellous shot; hit it.
  BOYET. mark! O, mark mark! mark, lady!
    mark prick in't, mete at, be.
  MARIA. Wide o' bow-hand! I' faith, hand out.
  COSTARD. Indeed, 'a shoot nearer, ne'er hit the
    clout.
  BOYET. hand out, belike hand in.
  COSTARD. upshoot cleaving pin.
  MARIA. Come, come, talk greasily; lips grow foul.  
  COSTARD. hard pricks, sir; challenge to
    bowl.
  BOYET. fear rubbing; good-night, good owl.
                                          Exeunt BOYET MARIA
  COSTARD. soul, swain, simple clown!
    Lord, Lord! ladies put down!
    O' troth, sweet jests, incony vulgar wit!
    smoothly off, obscenely, were, fit.
    Armado th' t'one side- O, dainty man!
    walk lady bear fan!
    kiss hand, sweetly 'a swear!
    page t' side, handful wit!
    Ah, heavens, pathetical nit!
    Sola, sola!                                     Exit COSTARD




SCENE II.
The park

From shooting within, enter HOLOFERNES, SIR NATHANIEL, DULL

  NATHANIEL. reverent sport, truly; testimony of
    good conscience.
  HOLOFERNES. deer was, know, sanguis, blood; ripe as
    pomewater, hangeth jewel ear caelo,
    sky, welkin, heaven; anon falleth crab on
    face terra, soil, land, earth.
  NATHANIEL. Truly, Master Holofernes, epithets sweetly
    varied, scholar least; but, sir, assure ye was
    buck head.
  HOLOFERNES. Sir Nathaniel, haud credo.
  DULL. 'Twas haud credo; 'twas pricket.
  HOLOFERNES. barbarous intimation! kind insinuation,
    were, via, way, explication; facere, were,
    replication, rather, ostentare, show, were, his
    inclination, undressed, unpolished, uneducated,
    unpruned, untrained, unlettered, ratherest  
    unconfirmed fashion, insert haud credo deer.
  DULL. deer haud credo; 'twas pricket.
  HOLOFERNES. Twice-sod simplicity, bis coctus!
    O thou monster Ignorance, deformed dost thou look!
  NATHANIEL. Sir, hath fed dainties bred in
      book;
    hath eat paper, were; hath drunk ink; his
    intellect replenished; animal, sensible
    duller parts;
    barren plants set thankful should
      be-
    taste feeling are- parts do
      fructify he.
    ill vain, indiscreet, fool,
    So, patch set learning, school.
    But, omne bene, I, father's mind:
    brook weather love wind.
  DULL. book-men: wit
    month Cain's birth weeks as
      yet?  
  HOLOFERNES. Dictynna, goodman Dull; Dictynna, goodman Dull.
  DULL. Dictynna?
  NATHANIEL. title Phoebe, Luna, moon.
  HOLOFERNES. moon month Adam more,
    raught weeks five-score.
    Th' allusion holds exchange.
  DULL. 'Tis true, indeed; collusion holds exchange.
  HOLOFERNES. God comfort thy capacity! th' allusion holds in
    exchange.
  DULL. polusion holds exchange; moon is
    month old; say, beside, 'twas pricket
    Princess kill'd.
  HOLOFERNES. Sir Nathaniel, hear extemporal epitaph on
    death deer? And, humour ignorant, call deer
    Princess kill'd pricket.
  NATHANIEL. Perge, good Master Holofernes, perge, please
    abrogate scurrility.
  HOLOFERNES. affect letter, argues
    facility.
  
    preyful Princess pierc'd prick'd pretty pleasing
      pricket.
    sore; sore till made sore shooting.
    dogs yell; put el sore, sorel jumps thicket-
    pricket sore, sorel; people fall a-hooting.
    sore sore, L sore makes fifty sores o' sorel.
    sore hundred make adding L.

  NATHANIEL. rare talent!
  DULL. [Aside] talent claw, claws a
    talent.
  HOLOFERNES. gift have, simple, simple; foolish
    extravagant spirit, full forms, figures, shapes, objects,
    ideas, apprehensions, motions, revolutions. begot in
    ventricle memory, nourish'd womb pia mater, and
    delivered mellowing occasion. gift good in
    acute, thankful it.
  NATHANIEL. Sir, praise Lord you, my
    parishioners; sons tutor'd you, their
    daughters profit greatly you. good member  
    commonwealth.
  HOLOFERNES. Mehercle, sons ingenious, want
    instruction; daughters capable, put to
    them; but, vir sapit qui pauca loquitur. soul feminine saluteth
    us.

                    Enter JAQUENETTA COSTARD

  JAQUENETTA. God give good morrow, Master Person.
  HOLOFERNES. Master Person, quasi pers-one. be
    pierc'd one?
  COSTARD. Marry, Master Schoolmaster, likest a
    hogshead.
  HOLOFERNES. Piercing hogshead! good lustre conceit turf
    earth; fire flint, pearl swine; 'tis
    pretty; well.
  JAQUENETTA. Good Master Parson, good read letter;
    Costard, Armado. I
    beseech read it.
  HOLOFERNES. Fauste, precor gelida quando pecus omne umbra  
    Ruminat-
    forth. Ah, good Mantuan! speak thee as
    traveller doth Venice:
                   Venetia, Venetia,
                   Chi ti vede, ti pretia.
    Mantuan, Mantuan! understandeth thee not,
    loves thee not-
                      Ut, re, sol, la, mi, fa.
    pardon, sir, contents? as
    Horace his- What, soul, verses?
  NATHANIEL. Ay, sir, learned.
  HOLOFERNES. hear staff, stanze, verse; lege, domine.
  NATHANIEL. [Reads] 'If love make forsworn, swear to
      love?
    Ah, faith hold, beauty vowed!
    forsworn, thee faithful prove;
    thoughts oaks, thee osiers bowed.
    Study bias leaves, makes book thine eyes,
    pleasures live art comprehend.
    knowledge mark, thee suffice;  
    learned tongue thee commend;
    ignorant soul sees thee wonder;
    praise thy parts admire.
    Thy eye Jove's lightning bears, thy voice dreadful thunder,
    Which, anger bent, music sweet fire.
    Celestial thou art, O, pardon love wrong,
    singes heaven's praise earthly tongue.'
  HOLOFERNES. find apostrophas, miss accent:
    supervise canzonet. numbers ratified;
    but, elegancy, facility, golden cadence poesy,
    caret. Ovidius Naso man. why, indeed, 'Naso' for
    smelling odoriferous flowers fancy, jerks of
    invention? Imitari nothing: doth hound master, the
    ape keeper, tired horse rider. But, damosella virgin,
    directed you?
  JAQUENETTA. Ay, sir, Monsieur Berowne, strange
    queen's lords.
  HOLOFERNES. overglance superscript: 'To snow-white
    hand beauteous Lady Rosaline.' on
    intellect letter, nomination party  
    writing person written unto: 'Your Ladyship's all
    desired employment, Berowne.' Sir Nathaniel, Berowne one
    votaries King; hath framed letter
    sequent stranger queen's accidentally, by
    progression, hath miscarried. Trip go, sweet;
    deliver paper royal hand King; may
    concern much. Stay thy compliment; forgive thy duty. Adieu.
  JAQUENETTA. Good Costard, me. Sir, God save life!
  COSTARD. thee, girl.
                                   Exeunt COSTARD JAQUENETTA
  NATHANIEL. Sir, fear God, very
    religiously; and, father saith-
  HOLOFERNES. Sir, father; fear colourable
    colours. return verses: you, Sir
    Nathaniel?
  NATHANIEL. Marvellous pen.
  HOLOFERNES. dine to-day father's pupil of
    mine; where, if, repast, gratify
    table grace, will, privilege the
    parents foresaid child pupil, undertake ben  
    venuto; prove verses unlearned,
    savouring poetry, wit, invention. beseech your
    society.
  NATHANIEL. too; society, saith text, the
    happiness life.
  HOLOFERNES. certes, text infallibly concludes it.
    [To DULL] Sir, invite too; nay:
    pauca verba. Away; gentles game, to
    recreation.                                       Exeunt




SCENE III.
The park

Enter BEROWNE, paper band, alone

  BEROWNE. King hunting deer: coursing myself.
    pitch'd toil: tolling pitch- pitch that
    defiles. Defile! foul word. Well, 'set thee down, sorrow!' for
    fool said, I, fool. Well
    proved, wit. Lord, love mad Ajax: kills
    sheep; kills me- sheep. proved o' side. I
    love; do, hang me. I' faith, not. O, her
    eye! light, eye, love her- yes,
    eyes. Well, world lie, and
    lie throat. heaven, love; hath taught to
    rhyme, melancholy; part rhyme, and
    melancholy. Well, hath o' sonnets already; the
    clown bore it, fool it, lady hath it: sweet
    clown, sweeter fool, sweetest lady! world, not
    care pin in. a
    paper; God give grace groan!
                                            [Climbs tree]  

                      Enter KING, paper

  KING. Ay me!
  BEROWNE. Shot, heaven! Proceed, sweet Cupid; thou hast thump'd
    thy bird-bolt left pap. faith, secrets!
  KING. [Reads]
      'So sweet kiss golden sun not
      fresh morning drops rose,
      thy eye-beams, fresh rays smote
      night dew cheeks flows;
      shines silver moon half bright
      transparent bosom deep,
      doth thy face tears mine give light.
      Thou shin'st tear weep;
      drop coach doth carry thee;
      ridest thou triumphing woe.
      behold tears swell me,
      thy glory grief show.
      love thyself; thou wilt  
      tears glasses, make weep.
      O queen queens! dost thou excel
      thought tongue mortal tell.'
    griefs? drop paper-
    Sweet leaves, shade folly. here?
                                                   [Steps aside]

                  Enter LONGAVILLE, paper

    What, Longaville, reading! Listen, car.
  BEROWNE. Now, thy likeness, fool appear!
  LONGAVILLE. Ay me, forsworn!
  BEROWNE. Why, perjure, wearing papers.
  KING. love, hope; sweet fellowship shame!
  BEROWNE. drunkard loves name.
  LONGAVILLE. perjur'd so?
  BEROWNE. put thee comfort: know;
    Thou makest triumviry, corner-cap society,
    shape Love's Tyburn hangs simplicity.
  LONGAVILLE. fear stubborn lines lack power move.  
    O sweet Maria, empress love!
    numbers tear, write prose.
  BEROWNE. O, rhymes guards wanton Cupid's hose:
    Disfigure slop.
  LONGAVILLE. go.          [He reads sonnet]
      'Did heavenly rhetoric thine eye,
      'Gainst world hold argument,
      Persuade heart false perjury?
      Vows thee broke deserve punishment.
      woman forswore; prove,
      Thou goddess, forswore thee:
      vow earthly, thou heavenly love;
      Thy grace gain'd cures disgrace me.
      Vows breath, breath vapour is;
      thou, fair sun, earth dost shine,
      Exhal'st vapour-vow; thee is.
      broken, fault mine;
      broke, fool wise
      lose oath win paradise?'
  BEROWNE. liver-vein, makes flesh deity,  
    green goose goddess- pure, pure idolatry.
    God amend us, God amend! o' th' way.

                      Enter DUMAIN, paper

  LONGAVILLE. send this?- Company! Stay.
                                                   [Steps aside]
  BEROWNE. 'All hid, hid'- infant play.
    demigod sit sky,
    wretched fools' secrets heedfully o'er-eye.
    sacks mill! O heavens, wish!
    Dumain transformed! woodcocks dish!
  DUMAIN. O divine Kate!
  BEROWNE. O profane coxcomb!
  DUMAIN. heaven, mortal eye!
  BEROWNE. earth, not, corporal: lie.
  DUMAIN. amber hairs foul hath amber quoted.
  BEROWNE. amber-colour'd raven noted.
  DUMAIN. upright cedar.
  BEROWNE. Stoop, say;  
    shoulder child.
  DUMAIN. fair day.
  BEROWNE. Ay, days; sun shine.
  DUMAIN. O wish!
  LONGAVILLE. mine!
  KING. mine too,.good Lord!
  BEROWNE. Amen, mine! good word?
  DUMAIN. forget her; fever she
    Reigns blood, rememb'red be.
  BEROWNE. fever blood? Why, incision
    saucers. Sweet misprision!
  DUMAIN. read ode writ.
  BEROWNE. mark love vary wit.
  DUMAIN. [Reads]
        'On day-alack day!-
        Love, month May,
        Spied blossom passing fair
        Playing wanton air.
        velvet leaves wind,
        unseen, passage find;  
        lover, sick death,
        Wish'd heaven's breath.
        "Air," quoth "thy cheeks blow;
        Air, triumph so!
        But, alack, hand sworn
        Ne'er pluck thee thy thorn;
        Vow, alack, youth unmeet,
        Youth apt pluck sweet.
        call sin me
        forsworn thee;
        Thou Jove swear
        Juno Ethiope were;
        deny Jove,
        Turning mortal thy love."'
    send; plain
    express true love's fasting pain.
    O, King, Berowne Longaville,
    lovers too! Ill, ill,
    forehead wipe perjur'd note;
    offend alike dote.  
  LONGAVILLE. [Advancing] Dumain, thy love charity,
    love's grief desir'st society;
    pale, blush, know,
    o'erheard napping so.
  KING. [Advancing] Come, sir, blush; his, case such.
    chide him, offending much:
    love Maria! Longaville
    sonnet sake compile;
    lay wreathed arms athwart
    loving bosom, heart.
    closely shrouded bush,
    mark'd both, blush.
    heard guilty rhymes, observ'd fashion,
    sighs reek you, noted passion.
    'Ay me!' one. 'O Jove!' cries.
    One, hairs gold; crystal other's eyes.
    [To LONGAVILLE] paradise break faith troth;
    [To Dumain] Jove love infringe oath.
    Berowne hear
    Faith infringed zeal swear?  
    scorn, spend wit!
    triumph, leap, laugh it!
    wealth see,
    me.
  BEROWNE. [Descending] step whip hypocrisy,
    Ah, good liege, pray thee pardon me.
    Good heart, grace hast thou reprove
    worms loving, art love?
    eyes make coaches; tears
    princess appears;
    perjur'd; 'tis hateful thing;
    Tush, minstrels sonneting.
    ashamed? Nay, not,
    you, o'ershot?
    found mote; King mote see;
    beam find three.
    O, scene fool'ry seen,
    sighs, groans, sorrow, teen!
    O, me, strict patience sat,
    king transformed gnat!  
    great Hercules whipping gig,
    profound Solomon tune jig,
    Nestor play push-pin boys,
    critic Timon laugh idle toys!
    lies thy grief, O, me, good Dumain?
    And, gentle Longaville, lies thy pain?
    liege's? breast.
    caudle, ho!
  KING. bitter thy jest.
    betrayed thy over-view?
  BEROWNE. me, betrayed you.
    honest, hold sin
    break vow engaged in;
    betrayed keeping company
    men you, men inconstancy.
    write thing rhyme?
    groan Joan? spend minute's time
    pruning me? hear I
    praise hand, foot, face, eye,
    gait, state, brow, breast, waist,  
    leg, limb-
  KING. Soft! fast?
    true man thief gallops so?
  BEROWNE. post love; good lover, go.

                 Enter JAQUENETTA COSTARD

  JAQUENETTA. God bless King!
  KING. present hast thou there?
  COSTARD. treason.
  KING. makes treason here?
  COSTARD. Nay, makes nothing, sir.
  KING. mar neither,
    treason peace together.
  JAQUENETTA. beseech Grace, letter read;
    person misdoubts it: 'twas treason, said.
  KING. Berowne, read over.        [BEROWNE reads letter]
    hadst thou it?
  JAQUENETTA. Costard.
  KING. hadst thou it?  
  COSTARD. Dun Adramadio, Dun Adramadio.
                                      [BEROWNE tears letter]
  KING. now! you? dost thou tear it?
  BEROWNE. toy, liege, toy! Grace fear it.
  LONGAVILLE. move passion, hear
     it.
  DUMAIN. Berowne's writing, name.
                                       [Gathering pieces]
  BEROWNE. [ COSTARD] Ah, whoreson loggerhead, born
      shame.
    Guilty, lord, guilty! confess, confess.
  KING. What?
  BEROWNE. fools lack'd fool make mess;
    He, he, you- you, liege!- I
    pick-purses love, deserve die.
    O, dismiss audience, more.
    DUMAIN. number even.
  BEROWNE. True, true, four.
    turtles gone?
  KING. Hence, sirs, away.  
  COSTARD. Walk true folk, traitors stay.
                                   Exeunt COSTARD JAQUENETTA
  BEROWNE. Sweet lords, sweet lovers, O, embrace!
    true flesh blood be.
    sea ebb flow, heaven show face;
    Young blood doth obey decree.
    cross born,
    hands forsworn.
  KING. What, rent lines show love thine?
  BEROWNE. 'Did they?' quoth you. sees heavenly Rosaline
    That, rude savage man Inde
    op'ning gorgeous east,
    Bows vassal head and, strucken blind,
    Kisses base ground obedient breast?
    peremptory eagle-sighted eye
    Dares heaven brow
    blinded majesty?
  KING. zeal, fury hath inspir'd thee now?
    love, mistress, gracious moon;
    She, attending star, scarce light.  
  BEROWNE. eyes eyes, Berowne.
    O, love, day turn night!
    complexions cull'd sovereignty
    meet, fair, fair cheek,
    worthies make dignity,
    doth seek.
    Lend flourish gentle tongues-
    Fie, painted rhetoric! O, not!
    things sale seller's praise belongs:
    passes praise; praise short doth blot.
    wither'd hermit, five-score winters worn,
    shake fifty, eye.
    Beauty doth varnish age, new-born,
    crutch cradle's infancy.
    O, 'tis sun maketh things shine!
  KING. heaven, thy love black ebony.
  BEROWNE. ebony her? O wood divine!
    wife wood felicity.
    O, give oath? book?
    swear beauty doth beauty lack,  
    learn eye look.
    face fair full black.
  KING. O paradox! Black badge hell,
    hue dungeons, school night;
    beauty's crest heavens well.
  BEROWNE. Devils soonest tempt, resembling spirits light.
    O, black lady's brows deckt,
    mourns painting usurping hair
    ravish doters false aspect;
    born make black fair.
    favour turns fashion days;
    native blood counted painting now;
    red avoid dispraise
    Paints black, imitate brow.
  DUMAIN. chimney-sweepers black.
  LONGAVILLE. time colliers counted bright.
  KING. Ethiopes sweet complexion crack.
  DUMAIN. Dark candles now, dark light.
  BEROWNE. mistresses dare rain
    fear colours wash'd away.  
  KING. 'Twere good did; for, sir, plain,
    find fairer face wash'd to-day.
  BEROWNE. prove fair, talk till doomsday here.
  KING. devil fright thee she.
  DUMAIN. knew man hold vile stuff dear.
  LONGAVILLE. Look, thy love: foot face see.
                                              [Showing shoe]
  BEROWNE. O, streets paved thine eyes,
    feet dainty tread!
  DUMAIN. O vile! Then, goes, upward lies
    street walk'd overhead.
  KING. this? love?
  BEROWNE. sure; forsworn.
  KING. leave chat; and, good Berowne, prove
    loving lawful, faith torn.
  DUMAIN. Ay, marry, there; flattery evil.
  LONGAVILLE. O, authority proceed;
    tricks, quillets, cheat devil!
  DUMAIN. salve perjury.
  BEROWNE. 'Tis need.  
    you, then, affection's men-at-arms.
    swear unto:
    fast, study, woman-
    Flat treason 'gainst kingly state youth.
    Say, fast? stomachs young,
    abstinence engenders maladies.
    And, vow'd study, lords,
    forsworn book,
    dream, pore, thereon look?
    you, lord, you, you,
    found ground study's excellence
    beauty woman's face?
    women's eyes doctrine derive:
    ground, books, academes,
    doth spring true Promethean fire.
    Why, universal plodding poisons up
    nimble spirits arteries,
    motion long-during action tires
    sinewy vigour traveller.
    Now, woman's face,  
    forsworn eyes,
    study too, causer vow;
    author world
    Teaches beauty woman's eye?
    Learning adjunct ourself,
    learning likewise is;
    ladies' eyes,
    ourselves.
    likewise learning there?
    O, made vow study, lords,
    vow forsworn books.
    you, liege, you, you,
    leaden contemplation found out
    fiery numbers prompting eyes
    beauty's tutors enrich'd with?
    slow arts brain;
    therefore, finding barren practisers,
    Scarce show harvest heavy toil;
    love, learned lady's eyes,
    Lives immured brain,  
    motion elements
    Courses swift thought power,
    power double power,
    functions offices.
    adds precious eye:
    lover's eyes gaze eagle blind.
    lover's ear hear lowest sound,
    suspicious head theft stopp'd.
    Love's feeling soft sensible
    tender horns cockled snails:
    Love's tongue proves dainty Bacchus gross taste.
    valour, Love Hercules,
    climbing trees Hesperides?
    Subtle Sphinx; sweet musical
    bright Apollo's lute, strung hair.
    Love speaks, voice gods
    Make heaven drowsy harmony.
    durst poet touch pen write
    ink temp'red Love's sighs;
    O, lines ravish savage ears,  
    plant tyrants mild humility.
    women's eyes doctrine derive.
    sparkle Promethean fire;
    books, arts, academes,
    show, contain, nourish, world,
    aught proves excellent.
    fools women forswear;
    Or, keeping sworn, prove fools.
    wisdom's sake, word men love;
    Love's sake, word loves men;
    men's sake, authors women;
    women's sake, men men-
    lose oaths find ourselves,
    lose oaths.
    religion forsworn;
    charity fulfils law,
    sever love charity?
  KING. Saint Cupid, then! and, soldiers, field!
  BEROWNE. Advance standards, them, lords;
    Pell-mell, them! advis'd,  
    conflict, sun them.
  LONGAVILLE. plain-dealing; lay glozes by.
    resolve woo girls France?
  KING. win too; devise
    entertainment tents.
  BEROWNE. First, park conduct thither;
    homeward man attach hand
    fair mistress. afternoon
    strange pastime solace them,
    shortness time shape;
    revels, dances, masks, merry hours,
    Forerun fair Love, strewing flowers.
  KING. Away, away! time omitted
    betime, fitted.
  BEROWNE. Allons! allons! Sow'd cockle reap'd corn,
    justice whirls equal measure.
    Light wenches prove plagues men forsworn;
    so, copper buys treasure.            Exeunt
