ACT V. SCENE I.
The park

Enter HOLOFERNES, SIR NATHANIEL, DULL

  HOLOFERNES. Satis quod sufficit.
  NATHANIEL. praise God you, sir. reasons dinner have
    sharp sententious; pleasant scurrility, witty
    affection, audacious impudency, learned without
    opinion, strange heresy. converse quondam
    day companion King's intituled, nominated,
    called, Adriano de Armado.
  HOLOFERNES. Novi hominem tanquam te. humour lofty, his
    discourse peremptory, tongue filed, eye ambitious, his
    gait majestical general behaviour vain, ridiculous, and
    thrasonical. picked, spruce, affected, odd,
    were, peregrinate, call it.
  NATHANIEL. singular choice epithet.
                                      [Draws table-book]
  HOLOFERNES. draweth thread verbosity finer than
    staple argument. abhor fanatical phantasimes,
    insociable point-devise companions; rackers  
    orthography, speak 'dout' fine, 'doubt';
    'det' pronounce 'debt'- d, e, b, t, d, e, t.
    clepeth calf 'cauf,' half 'hauf'; neighbour vocatur
    'nebour'; 'neigh' abbreviated 'ne.' abhominable- he
    call 'abbominable.' insinuateth insanie: ne
    intelligis, domine? make frantic, lunatic.
  NATHANIEL. Laus Deo, bone intelligo.
  HOLOFERNES. 'Bone'?- 'bone' 'bene.' Priscian little
    scratch'd; 'twill serve.

                 Enter ARMADO, MOTH, COSTARD

  NATHANIEL. Videsne quis venit?
  HOLOFERNES. Video, gaudeo.
  ARMADO. [To MOTH] Chirrah!
  HOLOFERNES. Quare 'chirrah,' 'sirrah'?
  ARMADO. Men peace, encount'red.
  HOLOFERNES. military sir, salutation.
  MOTH. [Aside COSTARD] great feast of
    languages stol'n scraps.  
  COSTARD. O, liv'd long alms-basket words. I
    marvel thy master hath eaten thee word, thou are
    long head honorificabilitudinitatibus; thou art
    easier swallowed flap-dragon.
  MOTH. Peace! peal begins.
  ARMADO. [To HOLOFERNES] Monsieur, lett'red?
  MOTH. Yes, yes; teaches boys hornbook. a, b, spelt
    backward horn head?
  HOLOFERNES. Ba, pueritia, horn added.
  MOTH. Ba, silly sheep horn. hear learning.
  HOLOFERNES. Quis, quis, thou consonant?
  MOTH. vowels, repeat them; the
    fifth, I.
  HOLOFERNES. repeat them: a, e, I-
  MOTH. sheep; concludes it: o, U.
  ARMADO. Now, salt wave Mediterraneum, sweet touch,
    quick venue wit- snip, snap, quick home. rejoiceth my
    intellect. True wit!
  MOTH. Offer'd child man; wit-old.
  HOLOFERNES. figure? figure?  
  MOTH. Horns.
  HOLOFERNES. Thou disputes infant; whip thy gig.
  MOTH. Lend horn make one, whip your
    infamy circum circa- gig cuckold's horn.
  COSTARD. penny world, thou shouldst it
    buy ginger-bread. Hold, remuneration had
    thy master, thou halfpenny purse wit, thou pigeon-egg of
    discretion. O, heavens pleased thou wert but
    bastard, joyful father wouldst thou make me! to;
    thou hast ad dunghill, fingers' ends, say.
  HOLOFERNES. O, smell false Latin; 'dunghill' unguem.
  ARMADO. Arts-man, preambulate; singuled the
    barbarous. educate youth charge-house the
    top mountain?
  HOLOFERNES. mons, hill.
  ARMADO. sweet pleasure, mountain.
  HOLOFERNES. do, sans question.
  ARMADO. Sir, King's sweet pleasure affection to
    congratulate Princess pavilion, posteriors of
    day; rude multitude call afternoon.  
  HOLOFERNES. posterior day, generous sir, liable,
    congruent, measurable, afternoon. word well
    cull'd, chose, sweet, apt, assure you, sir, assure.
  ARMADO. Sir, King noble gentleman, familiar, do
    assure ye, good friend. us, let
    pass. beseech thee, remember thy courtesy. beseech
    thee, apparel thy head. importunate most
    designs, great import indeed, too- that
    pass; thee Grace, the
    world, lean poor shoulder, royal
    finger dally excrement, mustachio; but,
    sweet heart, pass. world, recount fable:
    special honours pleaseth greatness impart
    Armado, soldier, man travel, hath world;
    pass. is- but, sweet heart, do
    implore secrecy- King present the
    Princess, sweet chuck, delightful ostentation, show,
    pageant, antic, firework. Now, understanding the
    curate sweet good eruptions sudden
    breaking-out mirth, were, acquainted withal,  
    end crave assistance.
  HOLOFERNES. Sir, present Worthies.
    Sir Nathaniel, entertainment time, some
    show posterior day, rend'red our
    assistance, King's command, gallant,
    illustrate, learned gentleman, Princess- say
    fit present Worthies.
  NATHANIEL. find men worthy present them?
  HOLOFERNES. Joshua, yourself; myself, Alexander; gallant
    gentleman, Judas Maccabaeus; swain, great
    limb joint, pass Pompey Great; page, Hercules.
  ARMADO. Pardon, sir; error: quantity that
    Worthy's thumb; big end club.
  HOLOFERNES. audience? present Hercules in
    minority: enter exit strangling snake; I
    apology purpose.
  MOTH. excellent device! So, audience hiss, may
    cry 'Well done, Hercules; thou crushest snake!' is
    make offence gracious, grace to
    it.  
  ARMADO. rest Worthies?
  HOLOFERNES. play myself.
  MOTH. Thrice-worthy gentleman!
  ARMADO. thing?
  HOLOFERNES. attend.
  ARMADO. have, fadge not, antic. beseech you,
    follow.
  HOLOFERNES. Via, goodman Dull! Thou spoken word this
    while.
  DULL. understood neither, sir.
  HOLOFERNES. Allons! employ thee.
  DULL. make dance, so, play
    tabor Worthies, dance hay.
  HOLOFERNES. dull, honest Dull! sport, away.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE II.
The park

Enter PRINCESS, MARIA, KATHARINE, ROSALINE

  PRINCESS FRANCE. Sweet hearts, rich ere depart,
    fairings plentifully in.
    lady wall'd diamonds!
    loving King.
  ROSALINE. Madam, that?
  PRINCESS FRANCE. this! Yes, love rhyme
    cramm'd sheet paper
    Writ o' sides leaf, margent all,
    fain seal Cupid's name.
  ROSALINE. make godhead wax;
    hath thousand year boy.
  KATHARINE. Ay, shrewd unhappy gallows too.
  ROSALINE. ne'er friends him: 'a kill'd sister.
  KATHARINE. made melancholy, sad, heavy;
    died. light, you,
    merry, nimble, stirring spirit,
    'a grandam ere died.  
    you; light heart lives long.
  ROSALINE. dark meaning, mouse, light word?
  KATHARINE. light condition beauty dark.
  ROSALINE. light find meaning out.
  KATHARINE. mar light taking snuff;
    darkly end argument.
  ROSALINE. do, i' th' dark.
  KATHARINE. you; light wench.
  ROSALINE. Indeed, weigh you; light.
  KATHARINE. weigh not? O, care me.
  ROSALINE. Great reason; 'past cure past care.'
  PRINCESS FRANCE. bandied both; set wit play'd.
    But, Rosaline, favour too?
    it? it?
  ROSALINE. knew.
    face fair yours,
    favour great: witness this.
    Nay, verses too, Berowne;
    numbers true, and, numb'ring too,
    fairest goddess ground.  
    compar'd twenty thousand fairs.
    O, hath drawn picture letter!
  PRINCESS FRANCE. like?
  ROSALINE. letters; praise.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Beauteous ink- good conclusion.
  KATHARINE. Fair text B copy-book.
  ROSALINE. Ware pencils, ho! die debtor,
    red dominical, golden letter:
    O face full O's!
  KATHARINE. pox jest! beshrew shrows!
  PRINCESS FRANCE. But, Katharine, fair
    Dumain?
  KATHARINE. Madam, glove.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. send twain?
  KATHARINE. Yes, madam; and, moreover,
    thousand verses faithful lover;
    huge translation hypocrisy,
    Vilely compil'd, profound simplicity.
  MARIA. This, pearl, Longaville;
    letter long half mile.  
  PRINCESS FRANCE. less. Dost thou heart
    chain longer letter short?
  MARIA. Ay, hands part.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. wise girls mock lovers so.
  ROSALINE. worse fools purchase mocking so.
    Berowne torture ere go.
    O knew th' week!
    make fawn, beg, seek,
    wait season, observe times,
    spend prodigal wits bootless rhymes,
    shape service wholly hests,
    make proud make proud jests!
    pertaunt-like o'ersway state
    fool, fate.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. surely caught, are
      catch'd,
    wit turn'd fool; folly, wisdom hatch'd,
    Hath wisdom's warrant school,
    wit's grace grace learned fool.
  ROSALINE. blood youth burns excess  
    gravity's revolt wantonness.
  MARIA. Folly fools bears strong note
    fool'ry wise wit doth dote,
    power thereof doth apply
    prove, wit, worth simplicity.

                          Enter BOYET

  PRINCESS FRANCE. Boyet, mirth face.
  BOYET. O, stabb'd laughter! Grace?
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Thy news, Boyet?
  BOYET. Prepare, madam, prepare!
    Arm, wenches, arm! Encounters mounted are
    peace. Love doth approach disguis'd,
    Armed arguments; surpris'd.
    Muster wits; stand defence;
    hide heads cowards, fly hence.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Saint Dennis Saint Cupid! they
    charge breath us? Say, scout, say.
  BOYET. cool shade sycamore  
    thought close mine eyes half hour;
    When, lo, interrupt purpos'd rest,
    shade behold addrest
    King companions; warily
    stole neighbour thicket by,
    overheard overhear-
    That, by, disguis'd here.
    herald pretty knavish page,
    heart hath conn'd embassage.
    Action accent teach there:
    'Thus thou speak' 'thus thy body bear,'
    anon made doubt
    Presence majestical put out;
    'For' quoth King 'an angel shalt thou see;
    fear thou, speak audaciously.'
    boy replied 'An angel evil;
    fear'd devil.'
    laugh'd, clapp'd shoulder,
    Making bold wag praises bolder.
    rubb'd elbow, thus, fleer'd, swore  
    speech spoke before.
    finger thumb
    Cried 'Via! do't, come.'
    caper'd, cried 'All well.'
    fourth turn'd toe, fell.
    tumble ground,
    zealous laughter, profound,
    spleen ridiculous appears,
    check folly, passion's solemn tears.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. what, what, visit us?
  BOYET. do, do, apparell'd thus,
    Muscovites Russians, guess.
    purpose parley, court, dance;
    love-feat advance
    mistress; know
    favours bestow.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. so? gallants task'd,
    For, ladies, mask'd;
    man grace,
    suit, lady's face.  
    Hold, Rosaline, favour thou shalt wear,
    King court thee dear;
    Hold, thou this, sweet, give thine,
    Berowne Rosaline.
    change favours too; loves
    Woo contrary, deceiv'd removes.
  ROSALINE. on, then, wear favours sight.
  KATHARINE. But, changing, intent?
  PRINCESS FRANCE. effect intent cross theirs.
    mocking merriment,
    mock mock intent.
    counsels unbosom shall
    loves mistook, mock'd withal
    occasion meet
    visages display'd talk greet.
  ROSALINE. dance, desire to't?
  PRINCESS FRANCE. No, death, move foot,
    penn'd speech render grace;
    'tis spoke turn face.
  BOYET. Why, contempt kill speaker's heart,  
    divorce memory part.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. it; make doubt
    rest ne'er in, out.
    sport sport sport o'erthrown,
    make ours, own;
    stay, mocking intended game,
    mock'd depart shame.
                                         [Trumpet sounds within]
  BOYET. trumpet sounds; mask'd; maskers come.
                                               [The LADIES mask]

          Enter BLACKAMOORS music, MOTH Prologue, the
     KING LORDS maskers, guise Russians

  MOTH. hail, richest heauties earth!
  BOYET. Beauties richer rich taffeta.
  MOTH. holy parcel fairest dames
                            [The LADIES turn backs him]
    turn'd their- backs- mortal views!
  BEROWNE. eyes, villain, eyes.  
  MOTH. turn'd eyes mortal views!
    Out-
  BOYET. True; indeed.
  MOTH. favours, heavenly spirits, vouchsafe
    behold-
  BEROWNE. behold, rogue.
  MOTH. behold sun-beamed eyes- your
    sun-beamed eyes-
  BOYET. answer epithet;
    call 'daughter-beamed eyes.'
  MOTH. mark me, brings out.
  BEROWNE. perfectness? gone, rogue.
                                                       Exit MOTH
  ROSALINE. strangers? minds, Boyet.
    speak language, 'tis will
    plain man recount purposes.
    would.
  BOYET. Princess?
  BEROWNE. peace gentle visitation.
  ROSALINE. they, they?  
  BOYET. peace gentle visitation.
  ROSALINE. Why, have; bid gone.
  BOYET. it, gone.
  KING. measur'd miles
    tread measure grass.
  BOYET. measur'd mile
    tread measure grass.
  ROSALINE. so. inches
    mile? measured many,
    measure, then, eas'ly told.
  BOYET. measur'd miles,
    miles, Princess bids tell
    inches doth fill mile.
  BEROWNE. measure weary steps.
  BOYET. hears herself.
  ROSALINE. weary steps
    weary miles o'ergone
    numb'red travel mile?
  BEROWNE. number spend you;
    duty rich, infinite,  
    accompt.
    Vouchsafe show sunshine face,
    we, savages, worship it.
  ROSALINE. face moon, clouded too.
  KING. Blessed clouds, clouds do.
    Vouchsafe, bright moon, thy stars, shine,
    clouds removed, watery eyne.
  ROSALINE. O vain petitioner! beg greater matter;
    Thou requests moonshine water.
  KING. measure vouchsafe change.
    Thou bid'st beg; begging strange.
  ROSALINE. Play, music, then. Nay, soon.
    yet? dance! change moon.
  KING. dance? estranged?
  ROSALINE. moon full; changed.
  KING. Moon, Man.
    music plays; vouchsafe motion it.
  ROSALINE. ears vouchsafe it.
  KING. legs it.
  ROSALINE. strangers, chance,  
    nice; hands. dance.
  KING. hands then?
  ROSALINE. part friends.
    Curtsy, sweet hearts; measure ends.
  KING. measure measure; nice.
  ROSALINE. afford price.
  KING. Price yourselves. buys company?
  ROSALINE. absence only.
  KING. be.
  ROSALINE. bought; adieu-
    visor half you.
  KING. deny dance, hold chat.
  ROSALINE. private then.
  KING. pleas'd that.       [They converse apart]
  BEROWNE. White-handed mistress, sweet word thee.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Honey, milk, sugar; three.
  BEROWNE. Nay, then, treys, grow nice,
    Metheglin, wort, malmsey; run dice!
    half dozen sweets.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Seventh sweet, adieu!  
    cog, play you.
  BEROWNE. word secret.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. sweet.
  BEROWNE. Thou grievest gall.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Gall! bitter.
  BEROWNE. meet.                 [They converse apart]
  DUMAIN. vouchsafe change word?
  MARIA. it.
  DUMAIN. Fair lady-
  MARIA. so? Fair lord-
    fair lady.
  DUMAIN. you,
    private, bid adieu.
                                           [They converse apart]
  KATHARINE. What, vizard made tongue?
  LONGAVILLE. reason, lady, ask.
  KATHARINE. O reason! Quickly, sir; long.
  LONGAVILLE. double tongue mask,
    afford speechless vizard half.
  KATHARINE. 'Veal' quoth Dutchman. 'veal' calf?  
  LONGAVILLE. calf, fair lady!
  KATHARINE. No, fair lord calf.
  LONGAVILLE. part word.
  KATHARINE. No, half.
    wean it; prove ox.
  LONGAVILLE. butt sharp mocks!
    give horns, chaste lady? so.
  KATHARINE. die calf, horns grow.
  LONGAVILLE. word private ere die.
  KATHARINE. Bleat softly, then; butcher hears cry.
                                           [They converse apart]
  BOYET. tongues mocking wenches keen
    razor's edge invisible,
    Cutting smaller hair seen,
    sense sense; sensible
    Seemeth conference; conceits wings,
    Fleeter arrows, bullets, wind, thought, swifter things.
  ROSALINE. word more, maids; break off, break off.
  BEROWNE. heaven, dry-beaten pure scoff!
  KING. Farewell, mad wenches; simple wits.  
                             Exeunt KING, LORDS, BLACKAMOORS
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Twenty adieus, frozen Muscovits.
    breed wits wondered at?
  BOYET. Tapers are, sweet breaths puff'd out.
  ROSALINE. Well-liking wits have; gross, gross; fat, fat.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. O poverty wit, kingly-poor flout!
    not, you, hang to-night?
    vizards show faces?
    pert Berowne count'nance quite.
  ROSALINE. lamentable cases!
    King weeping-ripe good word.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Berowne swear suit.
  MARIA. Dumain service, sword.
    'No point' quoth I; servant straight mute.
  KATHARINE. Lord Longaville o'er heart;
    trow call'd me?
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Qualm, perhaps.
  KATHARINE. Yes, good faith.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Go, sickness thou art!
  ROSALINE. Well, wits worn plain statute-caps.  
    hear? King love sworn.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. quick Berowne hath plighted faith me.
  KATHARINE. Longaville service born.
  MARIA. Dumain mine, bark tree.
  BOYET. Madam, pretty mistresses, give ear:
    Immediately here
    shapes; be
    digest harsh indignity.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. return?
  BOYET. will, will, God knows,
    leap joy, lame blows;
    Therefore, change favours; and, repair,
    Blow sweet roses summer air.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. blow? blow? Speak understood.
  BOYET. Fair ladies mask'd roses bud:
    Dismask'd, damask sweet commixture shown,
    angels vailing clouds, roses blown.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Avaunt, perplexity! do
    return shapes woo?
  ROSALINE. Good madam, advis'd,  
    mock still, disguis'd.
    complain fools here,
    Disguis'd Muscovites, shapeless gear;
    were, end
    shallow shows prologue vilely penn'd,
    rough carriage ridiculous,
    presented tent us.
  BOYET. Ladies, withdraw; gallants hand.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Whip tents, roes run o'er land.
                 Exeunt PRINCESS, ROSALINE, KATHARINE, MARIA

         Re-enter KING, BEROWNE, LONGAVILLE, DUMAIN,
                        proper habits

  KING. Fair sir, God save you! Princess?
  BOYET. tent. Majesty
    Command service thither?
  KING. vouchsafe audience word.
  BOYET. will; she, know, lord.          Exit
  BEROWNE. fellow pecks wit pigeons pease,  
    utters God doth please.
    wit's pedlar, retails wares
    wakes, wassails, meetings, markets, fairs;
    sell gross, Lord doth know,
    grace grace show.
    gallant pins wenches sleeve;
    Adam, tempted Eve.
    'A carve too, lisp; he
    kiss'd hand courtesy;
    ape form, Monsieur Nice,
    That, plays tables, chides dice
    honourable terms; nay, sing
    meanly; ushering,
    Mend can. ladies call sweet;
    stairs, treads them, kiss feet.
    flow'r smiles one,
    show teeth white whales-bone;
    consciences die debt
    Pay due 'honey-tongued Boyet.'
  KING. blister sweet tongue, heart,  
    put Armado's page part!

        Re-enter PRINCESS, ushered BOYET; ROSALINE,
                      MARIA, KATHARINE

  BEROWNE. comes! Behaviour, wert thou
    Till man show'd thee? art thou now?
  KING. hail, sweet madam, fair time day!
  PRINCESS FRANCE. 'Fair' 'all hail' foul, conceive.
  KING. Construe speeches better, may.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. better; give leave.
  KING. visit you, purpose now
    lead court; vouchsafe then.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. field hold me, hold vow:
    God, I, delights perjur'd men.
  KING. Rebuke provoke.
    virtue eye break oath.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. nickname virtue: vice have
      spoke;
    virtue's office breaks men's troth.  
    maiden honour, pure
    unsullied lily, protest,
    world torments endure,
    yield house's guest;
    hate breaking be
    heavenly oaths, vowed integrity.
  KING. O, liv'd desolation here,
    Unseen, unvisited, shame.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. so, lord; so, swear;
    pastimes here, pleasant game;
    mess Russians left late.
  KING. How, madam! Russians!
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Ay, truth, lord;
    Trim gallants, full courtship state.
  ROSALINE. Madam, speak true. so, lord.
    lady, manner days,
    courtesy undeserving praise.
    confronted four
    Russian habit; stayed hour
    talk'd apace; hour, lord,  
    bless happy word.
    dare call fools; think,
    thirsty, fools fain drink.
  BEROWNE. jest dry me. Fair gentle sweet,
    wit makes wise things foolish; greet,
    eyes seeing, heaven's fiery eye,
    light lose light; capacity
    nature huge store
    Wise things foolish rich things poor.
  ROSALINE. proves wise rich, eye-
  BEROWNE. fool, full poverty.
  ROSALINE. doth belong,
    fault snatch words tongue.
  BEROWNE. O, yours, possess.
  ROSALINE. fool mine?
  BEROWNE. give less.
  ROSALINE. vizards wore?
  BEROWNE. Where? when? vizard? demand this?
  ROSALINE. There, then, vizard; superfluous case
    hid worse show'd face.  
  KING. descried; mock downright.
  DUMAIN. confess, turn jest.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Amaz'd, lord? Highness sad?
  ROSALINE. Help, hold brows! swoon! pale?
    Sea-sick, think, coming Muscovy.
  BEROWNE. pour stars plagues perjury.
    face brass hold longer out?
    stand I, lady- dart thy skill me,
    Bruise scorn, confound flout,
    Thrust thy sharp wit ignorance,
    Cut pieces thy keen conceit;
    thee dance,
    Russian habit wait.
    O, trust speeches penn'd,
    motion school-boy's tongue,
    vizard friend,
    woo rhyme, blind harper's song.
    Taffeta phrases, silken terms precise,
    Three-pil'd hyperboles, spruce affectation,
    Figures pedantical- summer-flies  
    blown full maggot ostentation.
    forswear them; protest,
    white glove- white hand, God knows!-
    Henceforth wooing mind express'd
    russet yeas, honest kersey noes.
    And, begin, wench- God me, law!-
    love thee sound, sans crack flaw.
  ROSALINE. Sans 'sans,' pray you.
  BEROWNE. trick
    rage; bear me, sick;
    leave degrees. Soft, see-
    Write 'Lord mercy us' three;
    infected; hearts lies;
    plague, caught eyes.
    lords visited; free,
    Lord's tokens see.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. No, free gave tokens us.
  BEROWNE. states forfeit; seek undo us.
  ROSALINE. so; true,
    stand forfeit, sue?  
  BEROWNE. Peace; you.
  ROSALINE. not, intend.
  BEROWNE. Speak yourselves; wit end.
  KING. Teach us, sweet madam, rude transgression
    fair excuse.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. fairest confession.
    now, disguis'd?
  KING. Madam, was.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. advis'd?
  KING. was, fair madam.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. here,
    whisper lady's ear?
  KING. world respect her.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. challenge this, reject
    her.
  KING. mine honour, no.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Peace, peace, forbear;
    oath broke, force forswear.
  KING. Despise break oath mine.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. will; it. Rosaline,  
    Russian whisper ear?
  ROSALINE. Madam, swore hold dear
    precious eyesight, me
    world; adding thereto, moreover,
    wed me, die lover.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. God give thee joy him! noble lord
     honourably doth uphold word.
  KING. you, madam? life, troth,
    swore lady oath.
  ROSALINE. heaven, did; and, confirm plain,
    gave this; it, sir, again.
  KING. faith Princess give;
    knew jewel sleeve.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Pardon me, sir, jewel wear;
    Lord Berowne, him, dear.
    What, me, pearl again?
 BEROWNE. either; remit twain.
    trick on't: consent,
    Knowing aforehand merriment,
    dash Christmas comedy.
    carry-tale, please-man, slight zany,  
    mumble-news, trencher-knight, Dick,
    smiles cheek years trick
    make lady laugh dispos'd,
    Told intents before; disclos'd,
    ladies change favours; we,
    signs, woo'd sign she.
    Now, perjury add terror,
    forsworn error.
    is; [To BOYET] you
    Forestall sport, make untrue?
    lady's foot th' squier,
    laugh apple eye?
    stand back, sir, fire,
    Holding trencher, jesting merrily?
    put page out. Go, allow'd;
    Die will, smock shroud.
    leer me, you? eye
    Wounds leaden sword.
  BOYET. Full merrily
    Hath brave manage, career, run.  
  BEROWNE. Lo, tilting straight! Peace; done.

                          Enter COSTARD

    Welcome, pure wit! Thou part'st fair fray.
  COSTARD. O Lord, sir, know
     Worthies no?
  BEROWNE. What, three?
  COSTARD. No, sir; vara fine,
    pursents three.
  BEROWNE. times thrice nine.
  COSTARD. so, sir; correction, sir,
    hope so.
    beg us, sir, assure you, sir; we
      know;
    hope, sir, times thrice, sir-
  BEROWNE. nine.
  COSTARD. correction, sir, whereuntil doth amount.
  BEROWNE. Jove, threes nine.
  COSTARD. O Lord, sir, pity living  
    reck'ning, sir.
  BEROWNE. it?
  COSTARD. O Lord, sir, parties themselves, actors, sir, will
    show whereuntil doth amount. mine part, am, they
    say, parfect man poor man, Pompion Great,
    sir.
  BEROWNE. Art thou Worthies?
  COSTARD. pleased worthy Pompey Great;
    mine part, degree Worthy; am
    stand him.
  BEROWNE. Go, bid prepare.
  COSTARD. turn finely off, sir; care.
                                                    Exit COSTARD
  KING. Berowne, shame us; approach.
  BEROWNE. shame-proof, lord, 'tis policy
    show worse King's company.
  KING. come.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Nay, good lord, o'errule now.
    sport pleases doth how;
    zeal strives content, contents  
    Dies zeal presents.
    form confounded makes form mirth,
    great things labouring perish birth.
  BEROWNE. description sport, lord.

                        Enter ARMADO

  ARMADO. Anointed, implore expense thy royal sweet
    breath utter brace words.
           [Converses KING, delivers paper]
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Doth man serve God?
  BEROWNE. you?
  PRINCESS FRANCE. 'A speaks man God making.
  ARMADO. one, fair, sweet, honey monarch; for, I
    protest, schoolmaster exceeding fantastical; vain,
    vain; put it, say, fortuna de la
    guerra. peace mind, royal couplement!
                                                     Exit ARMADO
  KING. good presence Worthies. presents
    Hector Troy; swain, Pompey Great; parish curate,  
    Alexander; Arinado's page, Hercules; pedant, Judas
    Maccabaeus.
    Worthies show thrive,
    change habits present five.
  BEROWNE. show.
  KING. deceived, 'tis so.
  BEROWNE. pedant, braggart, hedge-priest, fool, and
    boy:
    Abate throw novum, world again
    pick such, vein.
  KING. ship sail, amain.

                   Enter COSTARD, armed POMPEY

  COSTARD. Pompey am-
  BEROWNE. lie, he.
  COSTARD. Pompey am-
  BOYET. libbard's head knee.
  BEROWNE. said, mocker; friends thee.
  COSTARD. Pompey am, Pompey surnam'd Big-  
   DUMAIN. Great.
  COSTARD. Great, sir.
    Pompey surnam'd Great,
    oft field, targe shield, make foe to
      sweat;
    travelling coast, bere chance,
    lay arms legs sweet lass France.

    ladyship 'Thanks, Pompey,' done.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Great thanks, great Pompey.
  COSTARD. 'Tis worth; hope perfect.
    made fault Great.
  BEROWNE. hat halfpenny, Pompey proves Worthy.

                 Enter SIR NATHANIEL, ALEXANDER

  NATHANIEL. world liv'd, world's commander;
    east, west, north, south, spread conquering might.
    scutcheon plain declares Alisander-
  BOYET. nose says, no, not; stands right.  
  BEROWNE. nose smells 'no' this, tender-smelling
    knight.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. conqueror dismay'd. Proceed, good
    Alexander.
  NATHANIEL. world liv'd, world's commander-
  BOYET. true, 'tis right, so, Alisander.
  BEROWNE. Pompey Great!
  COSTARD. servant, Costard.
  BEROWNE. conqueror, Alisander.
  COSTARD. [To Sir Nathaniel] O, Sir, overthrown Alisander
    conqueror! scrap'd painted cloth for
    this. lion, holds poleaxe sitting close-stool,
    Ajax. ninth Worthy. conqueror
    afeard speak! Run shame, Alisander.
    [Sir Nathaniel retires] There, an't you, foolish
    mild man; honest man, you, dash'd. a
    marvellous good neighbour, faith, good bowler; for
    Alisander- alas! 'tis- o'erparted. there
    Worthies a-coming speak mind sort.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Stand aside, good Pompey.  

         Enter HOLOFERNES, JUDAS; MOTH, HERCULES

  HOLOFERNES. Great Hercules presented imp,
    club kill'd Cerberus, three-headed canus;
    babe, child, shrimp,
    strangle serpents manus.
    Quoniam seemeth minority,
    Ergo apology.
    state thy exit, vanish.      [MOTH retires]
    Judas am-
  DUMAIN. Judas!
  HOLOFERNES. Iscariot, sir.
    Judas am, ycliped Maccabaeus.
  DUMAIN. Judas Maccabaeus clipt plain Judas.
  BEROWNE. kissing traitor. art thou prov'd Judas?
  HOLOFERNES. Judas am-
  DUMAIN. shame you, Judas!
  HOLOFERNES. you, sir?
  BOYET. make Judas hang himself.  
  HOLOFERNES. Begin, sir; elder.
  BEROWNE. followed: Judas hanged elder.
  HOLOFERNES. put countenance.
  BEROWNE. thou hast face.
  HOLOFERNES. this?
  BOYET. cittern-head.
  DUMAIN. head bodkin.
  BEROWNE. death's face ring.
  LONGAVILLE. face Roman coin, scarce seen.
  BOYET. pommel Coesar's falchion.
  DUMAIN. carv'd-bone face flask.
  BEROWNE. Saint George's half-cheek brooch.
  DUMAIN. Ay, brooch lead.
  BEROWNE. Ay, worn cap tooth-drawer. now,
    forward; put thee countenance.
  HOLOFERNES. put countenance.
  BEROWNE. False: thee faces.
  HOLOFERNES. outfac'd all.
  BEROWNE. thou wert lion so.
  BOYET. Therefore, ass, go.  
    adieu, sweet Jude! Nay, dost thou stay?
  DUMAIN. end name.
  BEROWNE. ass Jude; give him- Jud-as, away.
  HOLOFERNES. generous, gentle, humble.
  BOYET. light Monsieur Judas! grows dark, stumble.
                                            [HOLOFERNES retires]
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Alas, poor Maccabaeus, hath baited!

                   Enter ARMADO, HECTOR

  BEROWNE. Hide thy head, Achilles; Hector arms.
  DUMAIN. mocks home me, merry.
  KING. Hector Troyan respect this.
  BOYET. Hector?
  DUMAIN. Hector clean-timber'd.
  LONGAVILLE. leg big Hector's.
  DUMAIN. calf, certain.
  BOYET. No; indued small.
  BEROWNE. Hector.
  DUMAIN. god painter, makes faces.  
  ARMADO. armipotent Mars, lances almighty,
    Gave Hector gift-
  DUMAIN. gilt nutmeg.
  BEROWNE. lemon.
  LONGAVILLE. Stuck cloves.
  DUMAIN. No, cloven.
  ARMADO. Peace!
    armipotent Mars, lances almighty,
    Gave Hector gift, heir Ilion;
    man breathed fight ye,
    morn till night pavilion.
    flower-
  DUMAIN. mint.
  LONGAVILLE. columbine.
  ARMADO. Sweet Lord Longaville, rein thy tongue.
  LONGAVILLE. give rein, runs against
    Hector.
  DUMAIN. Ay, Hector's greyhound.
  ARMADO. sweet war-man dead rotten; sweet chucks, beat
    bones buried; breathed, man.  
    forward device. [To PRINCESS] Sweet royalty,
    bestow sense hearing.

          [BEROWNE steps forth, speaks COSTARD]

  PRINCESS FRANCE. Speak, brave Hector; delighted.
  ARMADO. adore thy sweet Grace's slipper.
  BOYET. [Aside DUMAIN] Loves foot.
  DUMAIN. [Aside BOYET] yard.
  ARMADO. Hector surmounted Hannibal-
  COSTARD. party gone, fellow Hector, gone; two
    months way.
  ARMADO. meanest thou?
  COSTARD. Faith, play honest Troyan, poor wench
    cast away. quick; child brags belly already;
    'tis yours.
  ARMADO. Dost thou infamonize potentates? Thou shalt die.
  COSTARD. Hector whipt Jaquenetta quick by
    him, hang'd Pompey dead him.
  DUMAIN. rare Pompey!  
  BOYET. Renowned Pompey!
  BEROWNE. Greater Great! Great, great, great Pompey! Pompey the
    Huge!
  DUMAIN. Hector trembles.
  BEROWNE. Pompey moved. Ates, Ates! Stir on! stir
    on!
  DUMAIN. Hector challenge him.
  BEROWNE. Ay, 'a man's blood belly will
    flea.
  ARMADO. North Pole, challenge thee.
  COSTARD. fight pole, Northern man; I'll
    slash; sword. bepray you, borrow my
    arms again.
  DUMAIN. Room incensed Worthies!
  COSTARD. shirt.
  DUMAIN. resolute Pompey!
  MOTH. Master, buttonhole lower. see
    Pompey uncasing combat? you? lose
    reputation.
  ARMADO. Gentlemen soldiers, pardon me; combat  
    shirt.
  DUMAIN. deny it: Pompey hath made challenge.
  ARMADO. Sweet bloods, will.
  BEROWNE. reason 't?
  ARMADO. naked truth is: shirt; woolward
    penance.
  BOYET. True, enjoined Rome linen;
    when, sworn, wore dishclout of
    Jaquenetta's, 'a wears heart favour.

                 Enter messenger, MONSIEUR MARCADE

  MARCADE. God save you, madam!
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Welcome, Marcade;
    thou interruptest merriment.
  MARCADE. sorry, madam; news bring
    heavy tongue. King father-
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Dead, life!
  MARCADE. so; tale told.
  BEROWNE. WOrthies away; scene begins cloud.  
  ARMADO. mine part, breathe free breath. the
    day wrong hole discretion, will
    soldier.                 Exeunt WORTHIES
  KING. fares Majesty?
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Boyet, prepare; to-night.
  KING. Madam, so; beseech stay.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Prepare, say. you, gracious lords,
    fair endeavours, entreat,
    new-sad soul, vouchsafe
    rich wisdom excuse hide
    liberal opposition spirits,
    over-boldly borne ourselves
    converse breath- gentleness
    guilty it. Farewell, worthy lord.
    heavy heart bears nimble tongue.
    Excuse so, coming short thanks
    great suit easily obtain'd.
  KING. extreme parts time extremely forms
    purpose speed;
    loose decides  
    long process arbitrate.
    mourning brow progeny
    Forbid smiling courtesy love
    holy suit fain convince,
    Yet, love's argument foot,
    cloud sorrow justle it
    purpos'd; wail friends lost
    wholesome-profitable
    rejoice friends newly found.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. understand not; griefs double.
  BEROWNE. Honest plain words pierce ear grief;
    badges understand King.
    fair sakes neglected time,
    Play'd foul play oaths; beauty, ladies,
    Hath deformed us, fashioning humours
    opposed end intents;
    hath seem'd ridiculous,
    love full unbefitting strains,
    wanton child, skipping vain;
    Form'd eye therefore, eye,  
    Full strange shapes, habits, forms,
    Varying subjects eye doth roll
    varied object glance;
    parti-coated presence loose love
    Put us, heavenly eyes
    misbecom'd oaths gravities,
    heavenly eyes faults
    Suggested make. Therefore, ladies,
    love yours, error love makes
    likewise yours. prove false,
    false true
    make both- fair ladies, you;
    falsehood, sin,
    purifies turns grace.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. receiv'd letters, full love;
    favours, ambassadors love;
    And, maiden council, rated them
    courtship, pleasant jest, courtesy,
    bombast lining time;
    devout respects  
    been; met loves
    fashion, merriment.
  DUMAIN. letters, madam, show'd jest.
  LONGAVILLE. looks.
  ROSALINE. quote so.
  KING. Now, latest minute hour,
    Grant loves.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. time, methinks, short
    make world-without-end bargain in.
    No, no, lord, Grace perjur'd much,
    Full dear guiltiness; this,
    love, cause,
    aught- me:
    oath trust; speed
    forlorn naked hermitage,
    Remote pleasures world;
    stay twelve celestial signs
    brought annual reckoning.
    austere insociable life
    Change offer made heat blood,  
    frosts fasts, hard lodging thin weeds,
    Nip gaudy blossoms love,
    bear trial, love,
    Then, expiration year,
    Come, challenge me, challenge deserts;
    And, virgin palm kissing thine,
    thine; and, till instant, shut
    woeful mournful house,
    Raining tears lamentation
    remembrance father's death.
    thou deny, hands part,
    intitled other's heart.
  KING. this, this, deny,
    flatter powers mine rest,
    sudden hand death close mine eye!
    hermit then, heart thy breast.
  BEROWNE. me, love? me?
  ROSALINE. purged too, sins rack'd;
    attaint faults perjury;
    Therefore, favour get,  
    twelvemonth spend, rest,
    seek weary beds people sick.
  DUMAIN. me, love? me?
    wife?
  KATHARINE. beard, fair health, honesty;
    threefold love three.
  DUMAIN. O, you, gentle wife?
  KATHARINE. so, lord; twelvemonth day
    mark words smooth-fac'd wooers say.
    King doth lady come;
    Then, love, give some.
  DUMAIN. serve thee true faithfully till then.
  KATHARINE. swear not, ye forsworn again.
  LONGAVILLE. Maria?
  MARIA. twelvemonth's end
    change black gown faithful friend.
  LONGAVILLE. stay patience; time long.
  MARIA. liker you; taller young.
  BEROWNE. Studies lady? Mistress, me;
    Behold window heart, mine eye,  
    humble suit attends thy answer there.
    Impose service thy love.
  ROSALINE. Oft heard you, Lord Berowne,
    you; world's large tongue
    Proclaims man replete mocks,
    Full comparisons wounding flouts,
    estates execute
    lie mercy wit.
    weed wormwood fruitful brain,
    therewithal win me, please,
    won,
    twelvemonth term day day
    Visit speechless sick, converse
    groaning wretches; task be,
    fierce endeavour wit,
    enforce pained impotent smile.
  BEROWNE. move wild laughter throat death?
    be; impossible;
    Mirth move soul agony.
  ROSALINE. Why, choke gibing spirit,  
    influence begot loose grace
    shallow laughing hearers give fools.
    jest's prosperity lies ear
    hears it, tongue
    makes it; then, sickly ears,
    Deaf'd clamours dear groans,
    hear idle scorns, continue then,
    fault withal.
    not, throw spirit,
    find empty fault,
    joyful reformation.
  BEROWNE. twelvemonth? Well, befall befall,
    jest twelvemonth hospital.
  PRINCESS FRANCE. [ King] Ay, sweet lord, take
    leave.
  KING. No, madam; bring way.
  BEROWNE. wooing doth end play:
    Jack hath Jill. ladies' courtesy
    made sport comedy.
  KING. Come, sir, twelvemonth an' day,  
    'twill end.
  BEROWNE. long play.

                          Re-enter ARMADO

  ARMADO. Sweet Majesty, vouchsafe me-
  PRINCESS FRANCE. Hector?
  DUMAIN. worthy knight Troy.
  ARMADO. kiss thy royal finger, leave. a
    votary: vow'd Jaquenetta hold plough her
    sweet love year. But, esteemed greatness, you
    hear dialogue learned men compiled in
    praise Owl Cuckoo? the
    end show.
  KING. Call quickly; so.
  ARMADO. Holla! approach.

                            Enter All

    side Hiems, Winter; Ver, Spring-  
    maintained Owl, th' Cuckoo. Ver, begin.

                      SPRING
         daisies pied violets blue
         lady-smocks silver-white
         cuckoo-buds yellow hue
         paint meadows delight,
         cuckoo tree
         Mocks married men, sings he:
              'Cuckoo;
         Cuckoo, cuckoo'- O word fear,
         Unpleasing married ear!

         shepherds pipe oaten straws,
         merry larks ploughmen's clocks;
         turtles tread, rooks daws,
         maidens bleach summer smocks;
         cuckoo tree
         Mocks married men, sings he:
              'Cuckoo;  
         Cuckoo, cuckoo'- O word fear,
         Unpleasing married ear!


                    WINTER

         icicles hang wall,
         Dick shepherd blows nail,
         Tom bears logs hall,
         milk frozen home pail,
         blood nipp'd, ways foul,
         nightly sings staring owl:
              'Tu-who;
         Tu-whit, Tu-who'- merry note,
         greasy Joan doth keel pot.

         aloud wind doth blow,
         coughing drowns parson's saw,
         birds sit brooding snow,
         Marian's nose red raw,
         roasted crabs hiss bowl,  
         nightly sings staring owl:
              'Tu-who;
         Tu-whit, To-who'- merry note,
         greasy Joan doth keel pot.

  ARMADO. words Mercury harsh songs Apollo.
    way: way.                            Exeunt

THE END

1606

THE TRAGEDY MACBETH


by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  DUNCAN, King Scotland
  MACBETH, Thane Glamis Cawdor, general King's army
  LADY MACBETH, wife
  MACDUFF, Thane Fife, nobleman Scotland
  LADY MACDUFF, wife
  MALCOLM, elder son Duncan
  DONALBAIN, younger son Duncan
  BANQUO, Thane Lochaber, general King's army
  FLEANCE, son
  LENNOX, nobleman Scotland
  ROSS, nobleman Scotland
  MENTEITH nobleman Scotland
  ANGUS, nobleman Scotland
  CAITHNESS, nobleman Scotland
  SIWARD, Earl Northumberland, general English forces
  YOUNG SIWARD, son
  SEYTON, attendant Macbeth
  HECATE, Queen Witches
  Witches
  Boy, Son Macduff  
  Gentlewoman attending Lady Macbeth
  English Doctor
  Scottish Doctor
  Sergeant
  Porter
  Man
  Ghost Banquo Apparitions
  Lords, Gentlemen, Officers, Soldiers, Murtherers, Attendants,
     Messengers

SCENE: Scotland England


ACT I. SCENE I.
A desert place. Thunder lightning.

Enter Witches.

  WITCH. meet again?
    thunder, lightning, rain?
  WITCH. hurlyburly's done,
    battle's lost won.
  WITCH. ere set sun.
  WITCH. place?
  WITCH. heath.
  WITCH. meet Macbeth.
  WITCH. come, Graymalkin.
  ALL. Paddock calls. Anon!
    Fair foul, foul fair.
    Hover fog filthy air.                Exeunt.




SCENE II.
A camp Forres. Alarum within.

Enter Duncan, Malcolm, Donalbain, Lennox, Attendants,
meeting bleeding Sergeant.

  DUNCAN. bloody man that? report,
    seemeth plight, revolt
    newest state.
  MALCOLM. sergeant
    good hardy soldier fought
    'Gainst captivity. Hail, brave friend!
    King knowledge broil
    thou didst leave it.
  SERGEANT. Doubtful stood,
    spent swimmers cling together
    choke art. merciless Macdonwald-
    Worthy rebel, that
    multiplying villainies nature
    swarm -from Western Isles
    kerns gallowglasses supplied;
    Fortune, damned quarrel smiling,  
    Show'd rebel's whore. all's weak;
    brave Macbeth -well deserves name-
    Disdaining Fortune, brandish'd steel,
    smoked bloody execution,
    Valor's minion carved passage
    Till faced slave,
    ne'er shook hands, bade farewell him,
    Till unseam'd nave chaps,
    fix'd head battlements.
  DUNCAN. O valiant cousin! Worthy gentleman!
  SERGEANT. sun 'gins reflection
    Shipwrecking storms direful thunders break,
    spring comfort seem'd come
    Discomfort swells. Mark, King Scotland, mark.
    sooner justice had, valor arm'd,
    Compell'd skipping kerns trust heels,
    Norweyan lord, surveying vantage,
    furbish'd arms supplies men,
    Began fresh assault.
  DUNCAN. Dismay'd  
    captains, Macbeth Banquo.?
  SERGEANT. Yes,
    sparrows eagles, hare lion.
    sooth, report were
    cannons overcharged double cracks,
    they
    Doubly redoubled strokes foe.
    meant bathe reeking wounds,
    memorize Golgotha,
    tell-
    faint; gashes cry help.
  DUNCAN. thy words thee thy wounds;
    smack honor both. surgeons.
                                        Exit Sergeant, attended.
    here?

                       Enter Ross.

  MALCOLM worthy Thane Ross.
  LENNOX. haste eyes!  
    speak things strange.
  ROSS. God save King!
  DUNCAN. camest thou, worthy Thane?
  ROSS. Fife, great King,
    Norweyan banners flout sky
    fan people cold.
    Norway himself, terrible numbers,
    Assisted disloyal traitor
    Thane Cawdor, began dismal conflict,
    Till Bellona's bridegroom, lapp'd proof,
    Confronted self-comparisons,
    Point point rebellious, arm 'gainst arm,
    Curbing lavish spirit; and, conclude,
    victory fell us.
  DUNCAN. Great happiness!
  ROSS. now
    Sweno, Norways' king, craves composition;
    deign burial men
    Till disbursed, Saint Colme's Inch,
    Ten thousand dollars general use.  
  DUNCAN. Thane Cawdor deceive
    bosom interest. pronounce present death,
    title greet Macbeth.
  ROSS. done.
  DUNCAN. hath lost, noble Macbeth hath won.
                                                         Exeunt.




SCENE III.
A heath. Thunder.

Enter Witches.

  WITCH. hast thou been, sister?
  WITCH. Killing swine.
  WITCH. Sister, thou?
  WITCH. sailor's wife chestnuts lap,
    mounch'd, mounch'd, mounch'd. "Give me," quoth I.
    "Aroint thee, witch!" rump-fed ronyon cries.
    husband's Aleppo gone, master Tiger;
    sieve thither sail,
    And, rat tail,
    do, do, do.
  WITCH. give thee wind.
  WITCH. Thou'rt kind.
  WITCH. another.
  WITCH. other,
    ports blow,
    quarters know
    I' shipman's card.  
    drain dry hay:
    Sleep night day
    Hang penthouse lid;
    live man forbid.
    Weary se'nnights times nine
    dwindle, peak, pine;
    bark lost,
    tempest-toss'd.
    have.
  WITCH. Show me, show me.
  WITCH. pilot's thumb,
    Wreck'd homeward come.                Drum within.
  WITCH. drum, drum!
    Macbeth doth come.
  ALL. weird sisters, hand hand,
    Posters sea land,
    about, about,
    Thrice thine, thrice mine,
    thrice again, make nine.
    Peace! charm's wound up.  

                 Enter Macbeth Banquo.

  MACBETH. foul fair day seen.
  BANQUO. is't call'd Forres? these
    wither'd wild attire,
    inhabitants o' earth,
    on't? Live you? aught
    man question? understand me,
    choppy finger laying
    skinny lips. women,
    beards forbid interpret
    so.
  MACBETH. Speak, can. you?
  WITCH. hail, Macbeth, hail thee, Thane Glamis!
  WITCH. hail, Macbeth, hail thee, Thane Cawdor!
  WITCH. hail, Macbeth, shalt King hereafter!
  BANQUO. Good sir, start, fear
    Things sound fair? I' truth,
    ye fantastical  
    outwardly ye show? noble partner
    greet present grace great prediction
    noble royal hope,
    rapt withal. speak not.
    seeds time,
    grain grow not,
    Speak me, beg fear
    favors hate.
  WITCH. Hail!
  WITCH. Hail!
  WITCH. Hail!
  WITCH. Lesser Macbeth, greater.
  WITCH. happy, happier.
  WITCH. Thou shalt kings, thou none.
    hail, Macbeth Banquo!
  WITCH. Banquo Macbeth, hail!
  MACBETH. Stay, imperfect speakers, more.
    Sinel's death Thane Glamis;
    Cawdor? Thane Cawdor lives,
    prosperous gentleman; King  
    Stands prospect belief,
    Cawdor. whence
    owe strange intelligence, why
    blasted heath stop way
    prophetic greeting? Speak, charge you.
                                                 Witches vanish.
  BANQUO. earth hath bubbles water has,
    them. vanish'd?
  MACBETH. air, seem'd corporal melted
    breath wind. stay'd!
  BANQUO. things speak about?
    eaten insane root
    takes reason prisoner?
  MACBETH. children kings.
  BANQUO. King.
  MACBETH. Thane Cawdor too. so?
  BANQUO. selfsame tune words. here?

                Enter Ross Angus.
  
  ROSS. King hath happily received, Macbeth,
    news thy success; reads
    Thy personal venture rebels' fight,
    wonders praises contend
    thine his. Silenced that,
    viewing o'er rest o' selfsame day,
    finds thee stout Norweyan ranks,
    afeard thyself didst make,
    Strange images death. thick hail
    post post, bear
    Thy praises kingdom's great defense,
    pour'd him.
  ANGUS. sent
    give thee, royal master, thanks;
    herald thee sight,
    pay thee.
  ROSS. earnest greater honor,
    bade me, him, call thee Thane Cawdor.
    addition, hail, worthy Thane,
    thine.  
  BANQUO. What, devil speak true?
  MACBETH. Thane Cawdor lives. dress me
    borrow'd robes?
  ANGUS. Thane lives yet,
    heavy judgement bears life
    deserves lose. combined
    Norway, line rebel
    hidden vantage, both
    labor'd country's wreck, not;
    treasons capital, confess'd proved,
    overthrown him.
  MACBETH. [Aside.] Glamis, Thane Cawdor!
    greatest behind. [To Ross Angus] your
      pains.
    [Aside Banquo] hope children kings,
    gave Thane Cawdor me
    Promised them?
  BANQUO. [Aside Macbeth.] That, trusted home,
    enkindle crown,
    Thane Cawdor. 'tis strange;  
    oftentimes, win harm,
    instruments darkness truths,
    Win honest trifles, betray's
    deepest consequence-
    Cousins, word, pray you.
  MACBETH. [Aside.] truths told,
    happy prologues swelling act
    imperial theme-I you, gentlemen.
    [Aside.] supernatural soliciting
    ill, good. ill,
    hath earnest success,
    Commencing truth? Thane Cawdor.
    good, yield suggestion
    horrid image doth unfix hair
    make seated heart knock ribs,
    nature? Present fears
    horrible imaginings:
    thought, murther fantastical,
    Shakes single state man function
    smother'd surmise,  
    not.
  BANQUO. Look, partner's rapt.
  MACBETH. [Aside.] chance King, why, chance may
      crown me
    stir.
  BANQUO. honors him,
    strange garments, cleave mould
    aid use.
  MACBETH. [Aside.] may,
    Time hour runs roughest day.
  BANQUO. Worthy Macbeth, stay leisure.
  MACBETH. Give favor; dull brain wrought
    things forgotten. Kind gentlemen, pains
    register'd day turn
    leaf read them. King.
    hath chanced, time,
    interim weigh'd it, speak
    free hearts other.
  BANQUO. gladly.
  MACBETH. Till then, enough. Come, friends.             Exeunt.




SCENE IV.
Forres. palace.

Flourish. Enter Duncan, Malcolm, Donalbain, Lennox, Attendants.

  DUNCAN. execution Cawdor? not
    commission return'd?
  MALCOLM. liege,
    back. spoke
    die, report
    frankly confess'd treasons,
    Implored Highness' pardon, set forth
    deep repentance. life
    leaving it; died
    studied death,
    throw dearest thing owed
    'twere careless trifle.
  DUNCAN. art
    find mind's construction face:
    gentleman built
    absolute trust.  

             Enter Macbeth, Banquo, Ross, Angus.

    O worthiest cousin!
    sin ingratitude now
    heavy me. Thou art before,
    swiftest wing recompense slow
    overtake thee. thou hadst deserved,
    proportion payment
    mine! left say,
    thy due pay.
  MACBETH. service loyalty lowe,
    it, pays itself. Highness' part
    receive duties, duties
    throne state, children servants,
    should, everything
    Safe love honor.
  DUNCAN. hither.
    begun plant thee, labor
    make thee full growing. Noble Banquo,  
    hast deserved, known
    so; infold thee
    hold thee heart.
  BANQUO. grow,
    harvest own.
  DUNCAN. plenteous joys,
    Wanton fullness, seek hide themselves
    drops sorrow. Sons, kinsmen, thanes,
    places nearest, know
    establish estate upon
    eldest, Malcolm, hereafter
    Prince Cumberland; honor must
    unaccompanied invest only,
    signs nobleness, stars, shine
    deservers. Inverness,
    bind you.
  MACBETH. rest labor, you.
    harbinger, make joyful
    hearing wife approach;
    humbly leave.  
  DUNCAN. worthy Cawdor!
  MACBETH. [Aside.] Prince Cumberland! step
    fall down, o'erleap,
    lies. Stars, hide fires;
    light black deep desires.
    eye wink hand; be
    eye fears, done, see.          Exit.
  DUNCAN. True, worthy Banquo! full valiant,
    commendations fed;
    banquet me. him,
    care bid welcome.
    peerless kinsman.                  Flourish. Exeunt.




SCENE V.
Inverness. Macbeth's castle.

Enter Lady Macbeth, reading letter.

  LADY MACBETH. "They met day success, have
    learned perfectest report than
    mortal knowledge. burned desire question them
    further, made air, vanished.
    Whiles stood rapt it, missives the
    King, all-hailed 'Thane Cawdor'; title,
    before, weird sisters saluted referred the
    coming time 'Hail, King shalt be!' I
    thought good deliver thee, dearest partner greatness,
    thou mightst lose dues rejoicing, being
    ignorant greatness promised thee. Lay thy heart,
    farewell."

    Glamis thou art, Cawdor, shalt be
    thou art promised. fear thy nature.
    full o' milk human kindness
    catch nearest way. Thou wouldst great;  
    Art ambition, without
    illness attend it. thou wouldst highly,
    wouldst thou holily; wouldst play false,
    wouldst wrongly win. Thou'ldst have, great Glamis,
    cries, "Thus thou do, thou it;
    thou dost fear do
    wishest undone." Hie thee hither,
    pour spirits thine ear,
    chastise valor tongue
    impedes thee golden round,
    fate metaphysical aid doth seem
    thee crown'd withal.

                     Enter Messenger.

    tidings?
  MESSENGER. King tonight.
  LADY MACBETH. Thou'rt mad it!
    thy master him? who, were't so,
    inform'd preparation.  
  MESSENGER. you, true; Thane coming.
    fellows speed him,
    Who, dead breath, scarcely more
    make message.
  LADY MACBETH. Give tending;
    brings great news.                        Exit Messenger.
    raven hoarse
    croaks fatal entrance Duncan
    battlements. Come, spirits
    tend mortal thoughts, unsex here
    fill crown toe top-full
    direst cruelty! Make thick blood,
    Stop access passage remorse,
    compunctious visitings nature
    Shake fell purpose peace between
    effect it! woman's breasts,
    milk gall, murthering ministers,
    sightless substances
    wait nature's mischief! Come, thick night,
    pall thee dunnest smoke hell  
    keen knife wound makes
    heaven peep blanket dark
    cry, "Hold, hold!"

                    Enter Macbeth.

    Great Glamis! Worthy Cawdor!
    Greater both, all-hail hereafter!
    Thy letters transported beyond
    ignorant present, feel now
    future instant.
  MACBETH. dearest love,
    Duncan tonight.
  LADY MACBETH. hence?
  MACBETH. Tomorrow, purposes.
  LADY MACBETH. O, never
    sun morrow see!
    face, Thane, book men
    read strange matters. beguile time,
    time; bear eye,  
    hand, tongue; innocent flower,
    serpent it. coming
    provided for; put
    night's great business dispatch,
    nights days come
    Give solely sovereign sway masterdom.
  MACBETH. speak further.
  LADY MACBETH. clear;
    alter favor fear.
    Leave rest me.                            Exeunt.




SCENE VI.
Before Macbeth's castle.  Hautboys torches.

Enter Duncan, Malcolm, Donalbain, Banquo, Lennox, Macduff, Ross, Angus,
and Attendants.

  DUNCAN. castle hath pleasant seat; air
    Nimbly sweetly recommends itself
    gentle senses.
  BANQUO. guest summer,
    temple-haunting martlet, approve
    loved mansionry heaven's breath
    Smells wooingly here. jutty, frieze,
    Buttress, coign vantage, bird
    Hath made pendant bed procreant cradle;
    breed haunt, observed
    air delicate.

                     Enter Lady Macbeth.

  DUNCAN. See, see, honor'd hostess!
    love trouble,  
    love. teach you
    bid God 'ield pains,
    trouble.
  LADY MACBETH. service
    point done, double,
    poor single business contend
    honors deep broad wherewith
    Majesty loads house. old,
    late dignities heap'd them,
    rest hermits.
  DUNCAN. Thane Cawdor?
    coursed heels purpose
    purveyor; rides well,
    great love, sharp spur, hath holp him
    home us. Fair noble hostess,
    guest tonight.
  LADY MACBETH. servants ever
    theirs, themselves, theirs, compt,
    make audit Highness' pleasure,
    return own.  
  DUNCAN. Give hand;
    Conduct mine host. love highly,
    continue graces him.
    leave, hostess.                              Exeunt.




SCENE VII
Macbeth's castle.  Hautboys torches.

Enter Sewer divers Servants dishes service, pass over
the stage.  enter Macbeth.

  MACBETH. 'tis done, 'twere well
    quickly. assassination
    trammel consequence, catch,
    surcease, success; blow
    be-all end-all -here,
    here, bank shoal time,
    We'ld jump life come. cases
    judgement here, teach
    Bloody instructions, taught return
    plague inventor. even-handed justice
    Commends ingredients poison'd chalice
    lips. double trust:
    First, kinsman subject,
    Strong deed; then, host,
    murtherer shut door,  
    bear knife myself. Besides, Duncan
    Hath borne faculties meek, hath been
    clear great office, virtues
    plead angels trumpet-tongued against
    deep damnation taking-off,
    pity, naked new-born babe
    Striding blast, heaven's cherubin horsed
    sightless couriers air,
    blow horrid deed eye,
    tears drown wind. spur
    prick sides intent, only
    Vaulting ambition, o'erleaps itself
    falls other.

                 Enter Lady Macbeth.

    now, news?
  LADY MACBETH. supp'd. left chamber?
  MACBETH. Hath ask'd me?
  LADY MACBETH. has?  
  MACBETH. proceed business:
    hath honor'd late, bought
    Golden opinions sorts people,
    worn newest gloss,
    cast soon.
  LADY MACBETH. hope drunk
    dress'd yourself? Hath slept since?
    wakes now, green pale
    freely? time
    account thy love. Art thou afeard
    thine act valor
    thou art desire? Wouldst thou that
    thou esteem'st ornament life
    live coward thine esteem,
    Letting "I dare not" wait "I would"
    poor cat i' adage?
  MACBETH. Prithee, peace!
    dare man;
    dares none.
  LADY MACBETH. beast wast  
    made break enterprise me?
    durst it, man,
    And, were, would
    man. time place
    adhere, make both.
    made themselves, fitness now
    unmake you. suck know
    tender 'tis love babe milks me-
    would, smiling face,
    pluck'd nipple boneless gums
    dash'd brains sworn you
    this.
  MACBETH. fail?
  LADY MACBETH. fail?
    screw courage sticking-place
    fail. Duncan asleep-
    Whereto day's hard journey
    Soundly invite him- chamberlains
    wine wassail convince
    memory, warder brain,  
    fume receipt reason
    limbeck only. swinish sleep
    drenched natures lie death,
    perform upon
    unguarded Duncan? put upon
    spongy officers, bear guilt
    great quell?
  MACBETH. Bring men-children only,
    thy undaunted mettle compose
    males. received,
    mark'd blood sleepy two
    chamber daggers,
    done't?
  LADY MACBETH. dares receive other,
    make griefs clamor roar
    death?
  MACBETH. settled bend up
    corporal agent terrible feat.
    Away, mock time fairest show:
    False face hide false heart doth know.  
                                                         Exeunt.

ACT II. SCENE I.
Inverness. Court Macbeth's castle.

Enter Banquo Fleance, bearing torch him.

  BANQUO. night, boy?
  FLEANCE. moon down; heard clock.
  BANQUO. twelve.
  FLEANCE. take't 'tis later, sir.
  BANQUO. Hold, sword. husbandry heaven,
    candles out. thee too.
    heavy summons lies lead me,
    sleep. Merciful powers,
    Restrain cursed thoughts nature
    repose!

           Enter Macbeth Servant torch.

    Give sword.
    there?
  MACBETH. friend.
  BANQUO. What, sir, rest? King's abed.  
    hath unusual pleasure and
    great largess offices.
    diamond greets wife withal,
    kind hostess, shut up
    measureless content.
  MACBETH. unprepared,
    servant defect,
    free wrought.
  BANQUO. All's well.
    dreamt night weird sisters:
    show'd truth.
  MACBETH. them;
    Yet, entreat hour serve,
    spend words business,
    grant time.
  BANQUO. kind'st leisure.
  MACBETH. cleave consent, 'tis,
    make honor you.
  BANQUO. lose none
    seeking augment it,  
    bosom franchised allegiance clear,
    counsel'd.
  MACBETH. Good repose while.
  BANQUO. Thanks, sir, you.
                                     Exeunt Banquo. Fleance.
  MACBETH. bid thy mistress, drink ready,
    strike bell. thee bed.     Exit Servant.
    dagger me,
    handle hand? Come, clutch thee.
    thee not, thee still.
    Art thou not, fatal vision, sensible
    feeling sight? art thou but
    dagger mind, false creation,
    Proceeding heat-oppressed brain?
    thee yet, form palpable
    draw.
    Thou marshal'st going,
    instrument use.
    Mine eyes made fools o' senses,
    worth rest. thee still,  
    thy blade dudgeon gouts blood,
    before. thing:
    bloody business informs
    mine eyes. o'er half-world
    Nature dead, wicked dreams abuse
    curtain'd sleep; witchcraft celebrates
    Pale Hecate's offerings; wither'd Murther,
    Alarum'd sentinel, wolf,
    howl's watch, stealthy pace,
    Tarquin's ravishing strides, design
    Moves ghost. Thou firm-set earth,
    Hear steps, walk, fear
    Thy stones prate whereabout,
    present horror time,
    suits it. Whiles threat, lives;
    Words heat deeds cold breath gives.
                                                   bell rings.
    go, done; bell invites me.
    Hear not, Duncan, knell
    summons thee heaven, hell.               Exit.




SCENE II.
The same.

Enter Lady Macbeth.

  LADY MACBETH. hath made drunk hath made bold;
    hath quench'd hath fire. Hark! Peace!
    owl shriek'd, fatal bellman,
    stern'st good night. it:
    doors open, surfeited grooms
    mock charge snores. drugg'd possets
    death nature contend them,
    live die.
  MACBETH. [Within.] there' what, ho!
  LADY MACBETH. Alack, afraid awaked
    'tis done. attempt deed
    Confounds us. Hark! laid daggers ready;
    miss 'em. resembled
    father slept, done't.

                      Enter Macbeth,
  
    husband!
  MACBETH. deed. Didst thou hear noise?
  LADY MACBETH. heard owl scream crickets cry.
    speak?
  MACBETH. When?
  LADY MACBETH. Now.
  MACBETH. descended?
  LADY MACBETH. Ay.
  MACBETH. Hark!
    lies i' chamber?
  LADY MACBETH. Donalbain.
  MACBETH. sight.           [Looks hands.
  LADY MACBETH. foolish thought, sight.
  MACBETH. laugh 's sleep, cried,
      "Murther!"
    wake other. stood heard them,
    prayers address'd them
    sleep.
  LADY MACBETH. lodged together.
  MACBETH. cried, "God bless us!" "Amen" other,  
    hangman's hands.
    Listening fear, "Amen,"
    say, "God bless us!"
  LADY MACBETH. deeply.
  MACBETH. wherefore pronounce "Amen"?
    blessing, "Amen"
    Stuck throat.
  LADY MACBETH. deeds thought
    ways; so, make mad.
  MACBETH. heard voice cry, "Sleep more!
    Macbeth murther sleep" -the innocent sleep,
    Sleep knits ravel'd sleave care,
    death day's life, sore labor's bath,
    Balm hurt minds, great nature's course,
    Chief nourisher life's feast-
  LADY MACBETH. mean?
  MACBETH. cried, "Sleep more!" house;
    "Glamis hath murther'd sleep, Cawdor
    sleep more. Macbeth sleep more."
  LADY MACBETH. cried? Why, worthy Thane,  
    unbend noble strength, think
    brainsickly things. Go, water
    wash filthy witness hand.
    bring daggers place?
    lie there. carry them, smear
    sleepy grooms blood.
  MACBETH. more.
    afraid done;
    on't dare not.
  LADY MACBETH. Infirm purpose!
    Give daggers. sleeping dead
    pictures; 'tis eye childhood
    fears painted devil. bleed,
    gild faces grooms withal,
    guilt.         Exit. Knocking within.
  MACBETH. knocking?
    is't me, noise appals me?
    hands here? Ha, pluck mine eyes!
    great Neptune's ocean wash blood
    Clean hand? No, hand  
    multitudinous seas incarnadine,
    Making green red.

                   Re-enter Lady Macbeth.

  LADY MACBETH. hands color, shame
    wear heart white. [Knocking within.] hear knocking
    south entry. Retire chamber.
    water clears deed.
    easy then! constancy
    Hath left unattended. [Knocking within.] Hark, knocking.
    nightgown, occasion call us
    show watchers. lost
    poorly thoughts.
  MACBETH. deed, 'twere myself.
                                                Knocking within.
    Wake Duncan thy knocking! thou couldst!
                                                         Exeunt.




SCENE III.
The same.

Enter Porter. Knocking within.

  PORTER. knocking indeed! man porter Hell
    Gate, turning key. [Knocking within.]
    Knock, knock, knock! there, i' Belzebub? Here's
    farmer hanged th' expectation plenty. Come
    time! napkins enow you; sweat fort.
    [Knocking within.] Knock, knock! there, th' other
    devil's name? Faith, equivocator swear in
    scales scale, committed treason
    God's sake, equivocate heaven. O,
    in, equivocator. [Knocking within.] Knock, knock, knock!
    there? Faith, English tailor hither, for
    stealing French hose. in, tailor; may
    roast goose. [Knocking within.] Knock, knock! at
    quiet! you? place cold hell. I'll
    devil-porter further. thought of
    professions, primrose everlasting
    bonfire. [Knocking within.] Anon, anon! pray you, remember  
    porter.
                                                 Opens gate.

                       Enter Macduff Lennox.

  MACDUFF. late, friend, ere bed,
    lie late?
  PORTER. Faith, sir, carousing till cock; and
    drink, sir, great provoker things.
  MACDUFF. things drink provoke?
  PORTER. Marry, sir, nose-painting, sleep, urine. Lechery, sir,
    provokes unprovokes: provokes desire, takes
    performance. drink an
    equivocator lechery: makes him, mars him; sets
    on, takes off; persuades disheartens
    him; makes stand stand to; conclusion,
    equivocates sleep, giving lie, leaves him.
  MACDUFF. drink gave thee lie night.
  PORTER. did, sir, i' throat me; requited
    lie, and, think, strong him,  
    legs sometime, made shift cast him.
  MACDUFF. thy master stirring?

                             Enter Macbeth.

    knocking awaked him; comes.
  LENNOX. Good morrow, noble sir.
  MACBETH. morrow, both.
  MACDUFF. King stirring, worthy Thane?
  MACBETH. yet.
  MACDUFF. command call timely him;
    slipp'd hour.
  MACBETH. bring him.
  MACDUFF. joyful trouble you,
    'tis one.
  MACBETH. labor delight physics pain.
    door.
  MACDUFF make bold call,
    'tis limited service.                           Exit.
  LENNOX. King today?  
  MACBETH. does; appoint so.
  LENNOX. night unruly. lay,
    chimneys blown down, and, say,
    Lamentings heard i' air, strange screams death,
    prophesying accents terrible
    dire combustion confused events
    hatch'd woeful time. obscure bird
    Clamor'd livelong night. earth
    feverous shake.
  MACBETH. 'Twas rough fight.
  LENNOX. young remembrance parallel
    fellow it.

                      Re-enter Macduff.

  MACDUFF. O horror, horror, horror! Tongue heart
    conceive thee.
  MACBETH. LENNOX. matter?
  MACDUFF. Confusion hath made masterpiece.
    sacrilegious murther hath broke ope  
    Lord's anointed temple stole thence
    life o' building.
  MACBETH. is't say? life?
  LENNOX. Majesty?
  MACDUFF. Approach chamber, destroy sight
    Gorgon. bid speak;
    See, speak yourselves.
                                      Exeunt Macbeth Lennox.
    Awake, awake!
    Ring alarum bell. Murther treason!
    Banquo Donalbain! Malcolm, awake!
    Shake downy sleep, death's counterfeit,
    death itself! Up, up, see
    great doom's image! Malcolm! Banquo!
    graves rise up, walk sprites
    countenance horror! Ring bell.       Bell rings.

                     Enter Lady Macbeth.

  LADY MACBETH. business,  
    hideous trumpet calls parley
    sleepers house? Speak, speak!
  MACDUFF. O gentle lady,
    'Tis hear speak:
    repetition woman's ear
    murther fell.

                     Enter Banquo.

    O Banquo, Banquo!
    royal master's murther'd.
  LADY MACBETH. Woe, alas!
    What, house?
  BANQUO. cruel anywhere.
    Dear Duff, prithee, contradict thyself,
    so.

          Re-enter Macbeth Lennox, Ross.

  MACBETH. died hour chance,  
    lived blessed time, instant
    mortality.
    toys; renown grace dead,
    wine life drawn, mere lees
    left vault brag of.

                Enter Malcolm Donalbain.

  DONALBAIN. amiss?
  MACBETH. are, know't.
    spring, head, fountain blood
    stopped, source stopp'd.
  MACDUFF. royal father's murther'd.
   MALCOLM. O, whom?
  LENNOX. chamber, seem'd, done't.
    hands faces badged blood;
    daggers, unwiped found
    pillows.
    stared, distracted; man's life
    trusted them.  
  MACBETH. O, repent fury,
    kill them.
  MACDUFF. Wherefore so?
  MACBETH. wise, amazed, temperate furious,
    Loyal neutral, moment? man.
    expedition violent love
    Outrun pauser reason. lay Duncan,
    silver skin laced golden blood,
    gash'd stabs look'd breach nature
    ruin's wasteful entrance; there, murtherers,
    Steep'd colors trade, daggers
    Unmannerly breech'd gore. refrain,
    heart love, heart
    Courage make 's love known?
  LADY MACBETH. hence, ho!
  MACDUFF. lady.
  MALCOLM. [Aside Donalbain.] hold tongues,
    claim argument ours?
  DONALBAIN. [Aside Malcolm.] spoken here, where
      fate,  
    Hid auger hole, rush seize us?
    away,
    tears brew'd.
  MALCOLM. [Aside Donalbain.] strong sorrow
    foot motion.
  BANQUO. lady.
                                    Lady Macbeth carried out.
    naked frailties hid,
    suffer exposure, meet
    question bloody piece work
    further. Fears scruples shake us.
    great hand God stand, thence
    undivulged pretense fight
    treasonous malice.
  MACDUFF. I.
  ALL. all.
  MACBETH. briefly put manly readiness
    meet i' hall together.
  ALL. contented.
                           Exeunt Malcolm Donalbain.  
  MALCOLM. do? consort them.
    show unfelt sorrow office
    false man easy. England.
  DONALBAIN. Ireland, I; separated fortune
    safer. are
    daggers men's smiles; blood,
    nearer bloody.
  MALCOLM. murtherous shaft shot
    Hath lighted, safest way
    avoid aim. horse;
    dainty leave-taking,
    shift away. warrant theft
    steals mercy left.
                                                         Exeunt.




SCENE IV.
Outside Macbeth's castle.

Enter Ross Man.

  MAN. Threescore ten remember well,
    volume time seen
    Hours dreadful things strange, sore night
    Hath trifled knowings.
  ROSS. Ah, good father,
    Thou seest heavens, troubled man's act,
    Threaten bloody stage. clock 'tis day,
    dark night strangles traveling lamp.
    Is't night's predominance, day's shame,
    darkness face earth entomb,
    living light kiss it?
  MAN. 'Tis unnatural,
    deed done. Tuesday last
    falcon towering pride place
    mousing owl hawk'd kill'd.
  ROSS. Duncan's horses-a thing strange certain-
    Beauteous swift, minions race,  
    Turn'd wild nature, broke stalls, flung out,
    Contending 'gainst obedience, make
    War mankind.
  MAN. 'Tis eat other.
  ROSS. so, amazement mine eyes
    look'd upon't.

                     Enter Macduff.

    good Macduff.
    world, sir, now?
  MACDUFF. Why, not?
  ROSS. Is't bloody deed?
  MACDUFF. Macbeth hath slain.
  ROSS. Alas, day!
    good pretend?
  MACDUFF. suborn'd:
    Malcolm Donalbain, King's sons,
    stol'n fled, puts them
    Suspicion deed.  
  ROSS. 'Gainst nature still!
    Thriftless ambition, wilt ravin up
    Thine life's means! 'tis like
    sovereignty fall Macbeth.
  MACDUFF. named, Scone
    invested.
  ROSS. Duncan's body?
  MACDUFF. Carried Colmekill,
    sacred storehouse predecessors
    guardian bones.
  ROSS. Scone?
  MACDUFF. No, cousin, Fife.
  ROSS. Well, thither.
  MACDUFF. Well, things there.
    Adieu,
    robes sit easier new!
  ROSS. Farewell, father.
  MAN. God's benison those
    make good bad friends foes!
                                                         Exeunt.
