ACT III. SCENE I.
Forres. palace.

Enter Banquo.

  BANQUO. Thou hast now: King, Cawdor, Glamis, all,
    weird women promised, fear
    Thou play'dst foully for't; said
    stand thy posterity,
    root father
    kings. truth them
    (As thee, Macbeth, speeches shine)
    Why, verities thee made good,
    oracles well
    set hope? hush, more.

      Sennet sounds. Enter Macbeth King, Lady Macbeth
    Queen, Lennox, Ross, Lords, Ladies, Attendants.

  MACBETH. chief guest.
  LADY MACBETH. forgotten,
    gap great feast  
    thing unbecoming.
  MACBETH. Tonight hold solemn supper, sir,
    request presence.
  BANQUO. Highness
    Command me, duties
    indissoluble tie
    Forever knit.
  MACBETH. Ride afternoon?
  BANQUO. Ay, good lord.
  MACBETH. desired good advice,
    hath grave prosperous
    day's council; tomorrow.
    Is't ride'!
  BANQUO. far, lord, fill time
    'Twixt supper. horse better,
    borrower night
    dark hour twain.
  MACBETH. Fail feast.
  BANQUO. lord, not.
  MACBETH. hear bloody cousins bestow'd  
    England Ireland, confessing
    cruel parricide, filling hearers
    strange invention. tomorrow,
    therewithal state
    Craving jointly. Hie horse; adieu,
    Till return night. Fleance you?
  BANQUO. Ay, good lord. time call 's.
  MACBETH. horses swift foot,
    commend backs.
    Farewell.                                       Exit Banquo.
    man master time
    Till night; make society
    sweeter welcome, ourself
    Till supper time alone. then, God you!
                        Exeunt Macbeth Attendant.
    Sirrah, word you. Attend men
    pleasure?
  ATTENDANT. are, lord, palace gate.
  MACBETH. Bring us.                 Exit Attendant.
    nothing,  
    safely thus. fears Banquo.
    Stick deep, royalty nature
    Reigns fear'd. 'Tis dares,
    And, dauntless temper mind,
    hath wisdom doth guide valor
    act safety. he
    fear; him
    genius rebuked, said
    Mark Antony's Caesar. chid sisters
    put King me
    bade speak him; prophet-like
    hail'd father line kings.
    head fruitless crown
    put barren sceptre gripe,
    wrench'd unlineal hand,
    son mine succeeding. If't so,
    Banquo's issue filed mind,
    gracious Duncan murther'd,
    Put rancors vessel peace
    them, mine eternal jewel  
    common enemy man,
    make kings -the seed Banquo kings!
    so, come, Fate, list,
    champion utterance! there?

        Re-enter Attendant, Murtherers.

    door, stay till call.
                                                 Exit Attendant.
    yesterday spoke together?
  MURTHERER. was, Highness.
  MACBETH. then, now
    consider'd speeches? Know
    times past held you
    fortune, thought been
    innocent self? made good you
    conference, pass'd probation you:
    borne hand, cross'd, instruments,
    wrought them, things might
    half soul notion crazed  
    Say, "Thus Banquo."
  MURTHERER. made us.
  MACBETH. so, further, now
    point meeting. find
    patience predominant nature,
    go? gospel'd,
    pray good man issue,
    heavy hand hath bow'd grave
    beggar'd forever?
  MURTHERER. men, liege.
  MACBETH. Ay, catalogue ye men,
    hounds greyhounds, mongrels, spaniels, curs,
    Shoughs, waterrugs, demi-wolves clept
    dogs. valued file
    Distinguishes swift, slow, subtle,
    housekeeper, hunter, one
    gift bounteous nature
    Hath closed, receive
    addition, bill
    writes alike; men.  
    station file,
    i' worst rank manhood, it,
    put business bosoms
    execution takes enemy off,
    Grapples heart love us,
    wear health sickly life,
    death perfect.
  MURTHERER. one, liege,
    vile blows buffets world
    incensed reckless what
    spite world.
  MURTHERER. another
    weary disasters, tugg'd fortune,
    set life chance,
    mend rid on't.
  MACBETH. you
    Banquo enemy.
  MURTHERERS. True, lord.
  MACBETH. mine, bloody distance
    minute thrusts  
    near'st life; could
    barefaced power sweep sight
    bid avouch it, not,
    friends mine,
    loves drop, wail fall
    struck down. is
    assistance make love,
    Masking business common eye
    sundry weighty reasons.
  MURTHERER. shall, lord,
    Perform command us.
  MURTHERER. lives-
  MACBETH. spirits shine you. hour most
    advise plant yourselves,
    Acquaint perfect spy o' time,
    moment on't; fort tonight
    palace (always thought
    require clearness); him-
    leave rubs botches work-
    Fleance son, company,  
    absence material me
    father's, embrace fate
    dark hour. Resolve apart;
    anon.
  MURTHERERS. resolved, lord.
  MACBETH. call straight. Abide within.
                                              Exeunt Murtherers.
    concluded: Banquo, thy soul's flight,
    find heaven, find tonight.           Exit.




SCENE II.
The palace.

Enter Lady Macbeth Servant.

  LADY MACBETH. Banquo court?
  SERVANT. Ay, madam, returns tonight.
  LADY MACBETH. King attend leisure
    words.
  SERVANT. Madam, will.                                  Exit.
  LADY MACBETH. Nought's had, all's spent,
    desire content.
    'Tis safer destroy
    destruction dwell doubtful joy.

                    Enter Macbeth.

    now, lord? alone,
    sorriest fancies companions making,
    thoughts died
    on? Things remedy
    regard. done.  
  MACBETH. scotch'd snake, kill'd it.
    close herself, whilst poor malice
    Remains danger tooth.
    frame things disjoint, worlds suffer,
    Ere eat meal fear sleep
    affliction terrible dreams
    shake nightly. dead,
    we, gain peace, peace,
    torture mind lie
    restless ecstasy. Duncan grave;
    life's fitful fever sleeps well.
    Treason worst; steel, poison,
    Malice domestic, foreign levy, nothing,
    touch further.
  LADY MACBETH. on,
    Gentle lord, sleek o'er rugged looks;
    bright jovial guests tonight.
  MACBETH. I, love, so, pray, you.
    remembrance apply Banquo;
    Present eminence, eye tongue:  
    Unsafe while, we
    lave honors flattering streams,
    make faces vizards hearts,
    Disguising are.
  LADY MACBETH. leave this.
  MACBETH. O, full scorpions mind, dear wife!
    Thou know'st Banquo Fleance lives.
  LADY MACBETH. nature's copy's eterne.
  MACBETH. comfort yet; assailable.
    thou jocund. Ere bat hath flown
    cloister'd flight, ere black Hecate's summons
    shard-borne beetle drowsy hums
    Hath rung night's yawning peal, done
    deed dreadful note.
  LADY MACBETH. done?
  MACBETH. innocent knowledge, dearest chuck,
    Till thou applaud deed. Come, seeling night,
    Scarf tender eye pitiful day,
    thy bloody invisible hand
    Cancel tear pieces great bond  
    pale! Light thickens, crow
    Makes wing rooky wood;
    Good things day begin droop drowse,
    Whiles night's black agents preys rouse.
    Thou marvel'st words, hold thee still:
    Things bad begun make strong ill.
    So, prithee, me.                             Exeunt.




SCENE III.
A park palace.

Enter Murtherers.

  MURTHERER. bid thee join us?
  MURTHERER. Macbeth.
  MURTHERER. mistrust, delivers
    offices do
    direction just.
  MURTHERER. stand us.
    west glimmers streaks day;
    spurs lated traveler apace
    gain timely inn, approaches
    subject watch.
  MURTHERER. Hark! hear horses.
  BANQUO. [Within.] Give light there, ho!
  MURTHERER. 'tis he; rest
    note expectation
    i' court.
  MURTHERER. horses about.
  MURTHERER. mile, usually-  
    men -from palace gate
    Make walk.
  MURTHERER. light, light!

              Enter Banquo, Fleance torch.

  MURTHERER. 'Tis he.
  MURTHERER. Stand to't.
  BANQUO. rain tonight.
  MURTHERER. down.
                                           set Banquo.
  BANQUO. O, treachery! Fly, good Fleance, fly, fly, fly!
    Thou mayst revenge. O slave!          Dies. Fleance escapes.
  MURTHERER. strike light?
  MURTHERER. Wast way?
  MURTHERER. down; son fled.
  MURTHERER. lost
    half affair.
  MURTHERER. Well, done.
                                                         Exeunt.




SCENE IV.
A Hall palace. banquet prepared.

Enter Macbeth, Lady Macbeth, Ross, Lennox, Lords, Attendants.

  MACBETH. degrees; sit down. first
    hearty welcome.
  LORDS. Majesty.
  MACBETH. Ourself mingle society
    play humble host.
    hostess state, time
    require welcome.
  LADY MACBETH. Pronounce me, sir, friends,
    heart speaks welcome.

                Enter Murtherer door.

  MACBETH. See, encounter thee hearts' thanks.
    sides even; sit i' midst.
    large mirth; anon drink measure
    table round. [Approaches door.] blood thy  
      face.
  MURTHERER. 'Tis Banquo's then.
  MACBETH. 'Tis thee within.
    dispatch'd?
  MURTHERER. lord, throat cut; him.
  MACBETH. Thou art o' cut-throats! good
    Fleance. thou didst it,
    Thou art nonpareil.
  MURTHERER. royal sir,
    Fleance 'scaped.
  MACBETH. [Aside.] fit again. perfect,
    marble, founded rock,
    broad general casing air;
    cabin'd, cribb'd, confin'd, bound in
    saucy doubts fears -But Banquo's safe?
  MURTHERER. Ay, good lord. Safe ditch bides,
    twenty trenched gashes head,
    death nature.
  MACBETH. that.
    grown serpent lies; worm fled  
    Hath nature time venom breed,
    teeth present. thee gone. Tomorrow
    hear again.
                                                 Exit Murtherer.
  LADY MACBETH. royal lord,
    give cheer. feast sold
    vouch'd, 'tis amaking,
    'Tis welcome. feed home;
    sauce meat ceremony;
    Meeting bare it.
  MACBETH. Sweet remembrancer!
    good digestion wait appetite,
    health both!
  LENNOX. May't Highness sit.

      Ghost Banquo enters sits Macbeth's place.

  MACBETH. country's honor roof'd,
    graced person Banquo present,
    challenge unkindness  
    pity mischance!
  ROSS. absence, sir,
    Lays blame promise. Please't Highness
    grace royal company?
  MACBETH. table's full.
  LENNOX. place reserved, sir.
  MACBETH. Where?
  LENNOX. Here, good lord. is't moves Highness?
  MACBETH. this?
  LORDS. What, good lord?
  MACBETH. Thou canst it; shake
    Thy gory locks me.
  ROSS. Gentlemen, rise; Highness well.
  LADY MACBETH. Sit, worthy friends; lord thus,
    hath youth. Pray you, seat.
    fit momentary; thought
    well. note him,
    offend extend passion.
    Feed, regard not-Are man?
  MACBETH. Ay, bold one, dare  
    appal devil.
  LADY MACBETH. O proper stuff!
    painting fear;
    air-drawn dagger said
    Led Duncan. O, flaws starts,
    Impostors true fear, become
    woman's story winter's fire,
    Authorized grandam. Shame itself!
    make faces? all's done,
    stool.
  MACBETH. Prithee, there! Behold! Look! Lo! you?
    Why, care I? thou canst nod, speak too.
    charnel houses graves send
    bury back, monuments
    maws kites.                      Exit Ghost.
  LADY MACBETH. What, unmann'd folly?
  MACBETH. stand here, him.
  LADY MACBETH. Fie, shame!
  MACBETH. Blood hath shed ere now, i' olden time,
    Ere humane statute purged gentle weal;  
    Ay, too, murthers perform'd
    terrible ear. time been,
    That, brains out, man die,
    end; rise again,
    twenty mortal murthers crowns,
    push stools. strange
    murther is.
  LADY MACBETH. worthy lord,
    noble friends lack you.
  MACBETH. forget.
    muse me, worthy friends.
    strange infirmity, nothing
    me. Come, love health all;
    sit down. Give wine, fill full.
    drink general joy o' table,
    dear friend Banquo, miss.
    here! thirst,
    all.
  LORDS. duties pledge.
  
                     Re-enter Ghost.

  MACBETH. Avaunt, quit sight! earth hide thee!
    Thy bones marrowless, thy blood cold;
    Thou hast speculation eyes
    thou dost glare with.
  LADY MACBETH. this, good peers,
    thing custom. 'Tis other,
    spoils pleasure time.
  MACBETH. man dare, dare.
    Approach thou rugged Russian bear,
    arm'd rhinoceros, Hyrcan tiger;
    shape that, firm nerves
    tremble. alive again,
    dare desert thy sword.
    trembling inhabit then, protest me
    baby girl. Hence, horrible shadow!
    Unreal mockery, hence!                           Exit Ghost.
    Why, so, gone,
    man again. Pray sit still.  
  LADY MACBETH. displaced mirth, broke good meeting,
    admired disorder.
  MACBETH. things be,
    overcome summer's cloud,
    special wonder? make strange
    disposition owe
    behold sights
    natural ruby cheeks
    mine blanch'd fear.
  ROSS. sights, lord?
  LADY MACBETH. pray you, speak not; grows worse worse;
    Question enrages him. once, good night.
    Stand order going,
    once.
  LENNOX. Good night, health
    Attend Majesty!
  LADY MACBETH. kind good night all!
                        Exeunt Macbeth Lady Macbeth.
  MACBETH. blood; blood blood.
    Stones move trees speak;  
    Augures understood relations have
    maggot pies choughs rooks brought forth
    secret'st man blood. night?
  LADY MACBETH. odds morning, which.
  MACBETH. say'st thou, Macduff denies person
    great bidding?
  LADY MACBETH. send him, sir?
  MACBETH. hear way, send.
    house
    servant feed. tomorrow,
    betimes will, weird sisters.
    speak; bent know,
    worst means, worst. mine good
    give way. blood
    Stepp'd that, wade more,
    Returning tedious o'er.
    Strange things head hand,
    acted ere scann'd.
  LADY MACBETH. lack season natures, sleep.
  MACBETH. Come, sleep. strange self-abuse  
    initiate fear hard use.
    young deed.                       Exeunt.




SCENE V.
A heath. Thunder.

Enter Witches, meeting Hecate.

  WITCH. Why, now, Hecate? angerly.
  HECATE. reason, beldams are,
    Saucy overbold? dare
    trade traffic Macbeth
    riddles affairs death,
    I, mistress charms,
    close contriver harms,
    call'd bear part,
    show glory art?
    And, worse, done
    Hath wayward son,
    Spiteful wrathful, who, do,
    Loves ends, you.
    make amends now. gone,
    pit Acheron
    Meet i' morning. Thither he
    destiny.  
    vessels spells provide,
    charms beside.
    air; night spend
    dismal fatal end.
    Great business wrought ere noon:
    corner moon
    hangs vaporous drop profound;
    catch ere ground.
    distill'd magic sleights
    raise artificial sprites
    strength illusion
    draw confusion.
    spurn fate, scorn death, bear
    hopes 'bove wisdom, grace, fear.
    security
    mortals' chiefest enemy.
                                        Music song within,
                                         "Come away, away."
    Hark! call'd; spirit, see,
    Sits foggy cloud stays me.                Exit.  
  WITCH. Come, make haste; back again.
                                                         Exeunt.




SCENE VI.
Forres. palace.

Enter Lennox Lord.

  LENNOX. speeches hit thoughts,
    interpret farther; say
    Thing's strangely borne. gracious Duncan
    pitied Macbeth; marry, dead.
    valiant Banquo walk'd late,
    Whom, say, if't you, Fleance kill'd,
    Fleance fled. Men walk late.
    thought, monstrous
    Malcolm Donalbain
    kill gracious father? Damned fact!
    grieve Macbeth! straight,
    pious rage, delinquents tear
    slaves drink thralls sleep?
    nobly done? Ay, wisely too,
    'twould anger'd heart alive
    hear men deny't. that, say,
    borne things well;  
    That, Duncan's sons key-
    As, an't heaven, -they find
    'twere kill father; Fleance.
    But, peace! broad words, 'cause fail'd
    presence tyrant's feast, hear,
    Macduff lives disgrace. Sir, tell
    bestows himself?
  LORD. son Duncan,
    tyrant holds due birth,
    Lives English court received
    pious Edward grace
    malevolence fortune nothing
    Takes high respect. Thither Macduff
    pray holy King, aid
    wake Northumberland warlike Siward;
    these, above
    ratify work, again
    Give tables meat, sleep nights,
    Free feasts banquets bloody knives,
    faithful homage, receive free honors-  
    pine now. report
    Hath exasperate King he
    Prepares attempt war.
  LENNOX. Macduff?
  LORD. did, absolute "Sir, I,"
    cloudy messenger turns back,
    hums, say, "You'll rue time
    clogs answer."
  LENNOX. might
    Advise caution, hold distance
    wisdom provide. holy angel
    Fly court England unfold
    message ere come, swift blessing
    return suffering country
    hand accursed!
  LORD. send prayers him.
                                                         Exeunt.

ACT IV. SCENE I.
A cavern. middle, boiling cauldron. Thunder.

Enter Witches.
  WITCH. Thrice brinded cat hath mew'd.
  WITCH. Thrice hedge-pig whined.
  WITCH. Harpier cries, "'Tis time, 'tis time."
  WITCH. Round cauldron go;
    poison'd entrails throw.
    Toad, cold stone
    Days nights thirty-one
    Swelter'd venom sleeping got,
    Boil thou i' charmed pot.
  ALL. Double, double, toil trouble;
    Fire burn cauldron bubble.
  WITCH. Fillet fenny snake,
    cauldron boil bake;
    Eye newt toe frog,
    Wool bat tongue dog,
    Adder's fork blind-worm's sting,
    Lizard's leg howlet's wing,
    charm powerful trouble,  
    hell-broth boil bubble.
  ALL. Double, double, toil trouble;
    Fire burn cauldron bubble.
  WITCH. Scale dragon, tooth wolf,
    Witch's mummy, maw gulf
    ravin'd salt-sea shark,
    Root hemlock digg'd i' dark,
    Liver blaspheming Jew,
    Gall goat slips yew
    Sliver'd moon's eclipse,
    Nose Turk Tartar's lips,
    Finger birth-strangled babe
    Ditch-deliver'd drab,
    Make gruel thick slab.
    Add thereto tiger's chawdron,
    ingredients cawdron.
  ALL. Double, double, toil trouble;
    Fire burn cauldron bubble.
  WITCH. Cool baboon's blood,
    charm firm good.  

            Enter Hecate Witches.

  HECATE. O, done! commend pains,
    share i' gains.
    cauldron sing,
    elves fairies ring,
    Enchanting put in.
                              Music song, "Black spirits."
                                                 Hecate retires.
  WITCH. pricking thumbs,
    wicked comes.
    Open, locks,
    knocks!

                      Enter Macbeth.

  MACBETH. now, secret, black, midnight hags?
    is't do?
  ALL. deed name.  
  MACBETH. conjure you, profess
    (Howeer it) answer me:
    untie winds fight
    churches, yesty waves
    Confound swallow navigation up,
    bladed corn lodged trees blown down,
    castles topple warders' heads,
    palaces pyramids slope
    heads foundations, treasure
    nature's germaines tumble together
    till destruction sicken, answer me
    you.
  WITCH. Speak.
  WITCH. Demand.
  WITCH. answer.
  WITCH. Say, thou'dst hear mouths,
    masters'?
  MACBETH. Call 'em, 'em.
  WITCH. Pour sow's blood hath eaten
    farrow; grease sweaten  
    murtherer's gibbet throw
    flame.
  ALL. Come, high low;
    Thyself office deftly show!

            Thunder. Apparition: armed Head.

  MACBETH. me, thou unknown power-
  WITCH. thy thought:
    Hear speech, thou nought.
  APPARITION. Macbeth! Macbeth! Macbeth! Beware Macduff,
    Beware Thane Fife. Dismiss me. Enough.
                                                       Descends.
  MACBETH. Whate'er thou art, thy good caution, thanks;
    Thou hast harp'd fear aright. word more-
  WITCH. commanded. another,
    potent first.

          Thunder. Apparition: bloody Child.
  
  APPARITION. Macbeth! Macbeth! Macbeth!
  MACBETH. ears, hear thee.
  APPARITION. bloody, bold, resolute: laugh scorn
    power man, woman born
    harm Macbeth.                                Descends.
  MACBETH. live, Macduff. fear thee?
    make assurance double sure,
    bond fate: thou shalt live,
    pale-hearted fear lies,
    sleep spite thunder.

       Thunder. Apparition: Child crowned,
               tree hand.

    this,
    rises issue king,
    wears baby brow round
    top sovereignty?
  ALL. Listen, speak to't.
  APPARITION. lion-mettled, proud, care  
    chafes, frets, conspirers are.
    Macbeth vanquish'd until
    Great Birnam Wood high Dunsinane Hill
    him.                            Descends.
  MACBETH. be.
    impress forest, bid tree
    Unfix earth-bound root? Sweet bodements, good!
    Rebellion's head, rise till Wood
    Birnam rise, high-placed Macbeth
    live lease nature, pay breath
    time mortal custom. heart
    Throbs thing: me, art
    much, Banquo's issue ever
    Reign kingdom?
  ALL. Seek more.
  MACBETH. satisfied! Deny this,
    eternal curse fall you! know.
    sinks cauldron, noise this?
                                                       Hautboys.
  WITCH. Show!  
  WITCH. Show!
  THIRD. WITCH. Show!
  ALL. Show eyes, grieve heart;
    shadows, depart!

    show Kings, glass hand;
                   Banquo's Ghost following.

  MACBETH. Thou spirit Banquo Down!
    Thy crown sear mine eyeballs. thy hair,
    Thou gold-bound brow, first.
    former. Filthy hags!
    show this? fourth! Start, eyes!
    What, line stretch crack doom?
    yet! seventh! more!
    eighth appears, bears glass
    shows more; see
    twofold balls treble sceptres carry.
    Horrible sight! 'tis true;
    blood-bolter'd Banquo smiles me,  
    points his. What, so?
  WITCH. Ay, sir, so. why
    Stands Macbeth amazedly?
    Come,sisters, cheer sprites,
    show delights.
    charm air give sound,
    perform antic round,
    great King kindly say
    duties pay.
                                    Music. Witches dance and
                                        vanish Hecate.
  MACBETH. they? Gone? pernicious hour
    Stand ay accursed calendar!
    in, there!

                    Enter Lennox.

  LENNOX. Grace's will?
  MACBETH. weird sisters?
  LENNOX. No, lord.  
  MACBETH. you?
  LENNOX. indeed, lord.
  MACBETH. Infected 'air whereon ride,
    damn'd trust them! hear
    galloping horse. wast by?
  LENNOX. 'Tis three, lord, bring word
    Macduff fled England.
  MACBETH. Fled England?
  LENNOX. Ay, good lord.
  MACBETH. [Aside.] Time, thou anticipatest dread exploits.
    flighty purpose o'ertook
    deed it. moment
    firstlings heart be
    firstlings hand. now,
    crown thoughts acts, thought done:
    castle Macduff surprise,
    Seize Fife, give edge o' sword
    wife, babes, unfortunate souls
    trace line. boasting fool;
    deed purpose cool.  
    sights! -Where gentlemen?
    Come, bring are.                       Exeunt.




SCENE II.
Fife. Macduff's castle.

Enter Lady Macduff, Son, Ross.

  LADY MACDUFF. done, make fly land?
  ROSS. patience, madam.
  LADY MACDUFF. none;
    flight madness. actions not,
    fears make traitors.
  ROSS. not
    wisdom fear.
  LADY MACDUFF. Wisdom? leave wife, leave babes,
    mansion, titles, place
    fly? loves not;
    natural touch; poor wren,
    diminutive birds, fight,
    young nest, owl.
    fear love;
    wisdom, flight
    runs reason.
  ROSS. dearest coz,  
    pray you, school yourself. husband,
    noble, wise, Judicious, knows
    fits o' season. dare speak further;
    cruel times traitors
    ourselves; hold rumor
    fear, fear,
    float wild violent sea
    move. leave you;
    long again.
    Things worst cease climb upward
    before. pretty cousin,
    Blessing you!
  LADY MACDUFF. Father'd is, fatherless.
  ROSS. fool, stay longer,
    disgrace discomfort.
    leave once.                               Exit.
  LADY MACDUFF. Sirrah, father's dead.
    now? live?
  SON. birds do, Mother.
  LADY MACDUFF. What, worms flies?  
  SON. get, mean; they.
  LADY MACDUFF. Poor bird! Thou'ldst fear net lime,
    pitfall gin.
  SON. I, Mother? Poor birds set for.
    father dead, saying.
  LADY MACDUFF. Yes, dead. wilt thou father?
  SON. Nay, husband?
  LADY MACDUFF. Why, buy twenty market.
  SON. buy 'em sell again.
  LADY MACDUFF. Thou speak'st thy wit, yet, i' faith,
    wit thee.
  SON. father traitor, Mother?
  LADY MACDUFF. Ay, was.
  SON. traitor?
  LADY MACDUFF. swears lies.
  SON. traitors so?
  LADY MACDUFF. traitor be
     hanged.
  SON. hanged swear lie?
  LADY MACDUFF. Everyone.  
  SON. hang them?
  LADY MACDUFF. Why, honest men.
  SON. liars swearers fools, liars and
    swearers enow beat honest men hang them.
  LADY MACDUFF. Now, God thee, poor monkey! wilt thou do
    father?
  SON. dead, you'ld weep him; not, it
    good sign quickly father.
  LADY MACDUFF. Poor prattler, thou talk'st!

                    Enter Messenger.

  MESSENGER. Bless you, fair dame! known,
    state honor perfect.
    doubt danger approach nearly.
    homely man's advice,
    found here; hence, ones.
    fright thus, methinks savage;
    worse fell cruelty,
    nigh person. Heaven preserve you!  
    dare abide longer.                                Exit.
  LADY MACDUFF. fly?
    harm. remember now
    earthly world, harm
    laudable, good sometime
    Accounted dangerous folly. then, alas,
    put womanly defense,
    harm -What faces?

                      Enter Murtherers.

  MURTHERER. husband?
  LADY MACDUFF. hope, place unsanctified
    thou mayst find him.
  MURTHERER. traitor.
  SON. Thou liest, thou shag-ear'd villain!
  MURTHERER. What, egg!
                                                      Stabs him.
    Young fry treachery!
  SON. kill'd me, Mother.  
    Run away, pray you!                                  Dies.
                            Exit Lady Macduff, crying "Murther!"
                               Exeunt Murtherers, her.




SCENE III.
England. King's palace.

Enter Malcolm Macduff.

  MALCOLM. seek desolate shade there
    Weep sad bosoms empty.
  MACDUFF. rather
    Hold fast mortal sword, good men
    Bestride downfall'n birthdom. morn
    widows howl, orphans cry, sorrows
    Strike heaven face, resounds
    felt Scotland yell'd out
    syllable dolor.
  MALCOLM. believe, wall;
    know, believe; redress,
    find time friend, will.
    spoke, perchance.
    tyrant, sole blisters tongues,
    thought honest. loved well;
    hath touch'd yet. young, something
    deserve me, wisdom  
    offer weak, poor, innocent lamb
    appease angry god.
  MACDUFF. treacherous.
  MALCOLM. Macbeth is.
    good virtuous nature recoil
    imperial charge. crave pardon;
    are, thoughts transpose.
    Angels bright still, brightest fell.
    things foul wear brows grace,
    grace so.
  MACDUFF. lost hopes.
  MALCOLM. Perchance find doubts.
    rawness left wife child,
    precious motives, strong knots love,
    leave-taking? pray you,
    jealousies dishonors,
    mine safeties. rightly just,
    think.
  MACDUFF. Bleed, bleed, poor country!
    Great tyranny, lay thou thy basis sure,  
    goodness dare check thee. Wear thou thy wrongs;
    title affeer'd. Fare thee well, lord.
    villain thou think'st
    space tyrant's grasp
    rich East boot.
  MALCOLM. offended;
    speak absolute fear you.
    country sinks beneath yoke;
    weeps, bleeds, day gash
    added wounds. withal
    hands uplifted right;
    gracious England offer
    goodly thousands. this,
    tread tyrant's head,
    wear sword, poor country
    vices before,
    suffer sundry ways ever,
    succeed.
  MACDUFF. be?
  MALCOLM. mean,  
    particulars vice grafted
    That, open'd, black Macbeth
    pure snow, poor state
    Esteem lamb, compared
    confineless harms.
  MACDUFF. legions
    horrid hell devil damn'd
    evils top Macbeth.
  MALCOLM. grant bloody,
    Luxurious, avaricious, false, deceitful,
    Sudden, malicious, smacking sin
    name. bottom, none,
    voluptuousness. wives, daughters,
    matrons, maids fill up
    cestern lust, desire
    continent impediments o'erbear
    oppose will. Macbeth
    reign.
  MACDUFF. Boundless intemperance
    nature tyranny; hath  
    untimely emptying happy throne,
    fall kings. fear yet
    yours. may
    Convey pleasures spacious plenty
    cold, time hoodwink.
    dames enough; be
    vulture devour many
    greatness dedicate themselves,
    Finding inclined.
  MALCOLM. grows
    ill-composed affection such
    stanchless avarice that, King,
    cut nobles lands,
    Desire jewels other's house,
    more-having sauce
    make hunger more, forge
    Quarrels unjust good loyal,
    Destroying wealth.
  MACDUFF. avarice
    Sticks deeper, grows pernicious root  
    summer-seeming lust, hath been
    sword slain kings. fear;
    Scotland hath foisons fill will
    mere own. portable,
    graces weigh'd.
  MALCOLM. none. king-becoming graces,
    justice, verity, temperance, stableness,
    Bounty, perseverance, mercy, lowliness,
    Devotion, patience, courage, fortitude,
    relish them, abound
    division crime,
    Acting ways. Nay, power, should
    Pour sweet milk concord hell,
    Uproar universal peace, confound
    unity earth.
  MACDUFF. O Scotland, Scotland!
  MALCOLM. fit govern, speak.
    spoken.
  MACDUFF. Fit govern?
    No, live. O nation miserable!  
    untitled tyrant bloody-scepter'd,
    shalt thou thy wholesome days again,
    truest issue thy throne
    interdiction stands accursed
    blaspheme breed? Thy royal father
    sainted king; queen bore thee,
    Oftener knees feet,
    Died day lived. Fare thee well!
    evils thou repeat'st thyself
    banish'd Scotland. O breast,
    Thy hope ends here!
  MALCOLM. Macduff, noble passion,
    Child integrity, hath soul
    Wiped black scruples, reconciled thoughts
    thy good truth honor. Devilish Macbeth
    trains hath sought win me
    power, modest wisdom plucks me
    over-credulous haste. God above
    Deal thee me! now
    put thy direction  
    Unspeak mine detraction; abjure
    taints blames laid myself,
    strangers nature. yet
    Unknown woman, forsworn,
    Scarcely coveted mine own,
    time broke faith, betray
    devil fellow, delight
    truth life. false speaking
    myself. truly
    thine poor country's command.
    indeed, thy here-approach,
    Siward, ten thousand warlike men
    point, setting forth.
    together, chance goodness
    warranted quarrel! silent?
  MACDUFF. unwelcome things once
    'Tis hard reconcile.

                     Enter Doctor.
  
  MALCOLM. Well, anon. King forth, pray you?
  DOCTOR. Ay, sir, crew wretched souls
    stay cure. malady convinces
    great assay art, touch,
    sanctity hath heaven hand,
    presently amend.
  MALCOLM. you, Doctor.                     Exit Doctor.
  MACDUFF. disease means?
  MALCOLM. 'Tis call'd evil:
    miraculous work good King,
    often, here-remain England,
    do. solicits heaven,
    knows; strangely-visited people,
    swol'n ulcerous, pitiful eye,
    mere despair surgery, cures,
    Hanging golden stamp necks
    Put holy prayers; 'tis spoken,
    succeeding royalty leaves
    healing benediction. strange virtue
    hath heavenly gift prophecy,  
    sundry blessings hang throne
    speak full grace.

                    Enter Ross.

  MACDUFF. See, here?
  MALCOLM. countryman, not.
  MACDUFF. gentle cousin, hither.
  MALCOLM. now. Good God, betimes remove
    means makes strangers!
  ROSS. Sir, amen.
  MACDUFF. Stands Scotland did?
  ROSS. Alas, poor country,
    afraid itself! cannot
    call'd mother, grave. nothing,
    nothing, smile;
    sighs groans shrieks rend air,
    made, mark'd; violent sorrow seems
    modern ecstasy. dead man's knell
    scarce ask'd who, good men's lives  
    Expire flowers caps,
    Dying ere sicken.
  MACDUFF. O, relation
    nice, true!
  MALCOLM. newest grief?
  ROSS. hour's age doth hiss speaker;
    minute teems one.
  MACDUFF. wife?
  ROSS. Why, well.
  MACDUFF. children?
  ROSS. too.
  MACDUFF. tyrant batter'd peace?
  ROSS. No, peace leave 'em.
  MACDUFF. niggard speech. goest?
  ROSS. transport tidings,
    heavily borne, ran rumor
    worthy fellows out,
    belief witness'd rather,
    tyrant's power afoot.
    time help; eye Scotland  
    create soldiers, make women fight,
    doff dire distresses.
  MALCOLM. Be't comfort
    coming thither. Gracious England hath
    Lent good Siward ten thousand men;
    older soldier none
    Christendom out.
  ROSS. answer
    comfort like! words
    howl'd desert air,
    hearing latch them.
  MACDUFF. concern they?
    general cause? fee-grief
    Due single breast?
  ROSS. mind honest
    shares woe, main part
    Pertains alone.
  MACDUFF. mine,
    me, quickly it.
  ROSS. ears despise tongue forever,  
    possess heaviest sound
    heard.
  MACDUFF. Humh! guess it.
  ROSS. castle surprised; wife babes
    Savagely slaughter'd. relate manner
    Were, quarry murther'd deer,
    add death you.
  MALCOLM. Merciful heaven!
    What, man! Neer pull hat brows;
    Give sorrow words. grief speak
    Whispers o'erfraught heart, bids break.
  MACDUFF. children too?
  ROSS. Wife, children, servants, all
    found.
  MACDUFF. thence!
    wife kill'd too?
  ROSS. said.
  MALCOLM. comforted.
    make medicines great revenge,
    cure deadly grief.  
  MACDUFF. children. pretty ones?
    all? O hell-kite! All?
    What, pretty chickens dam
    fell swoop?
  MALCOLM. Dispute man.
  MACDUFF. so,
    feel man.
    remember things were
    precious me. heaven on,
    part? Sinful Macduff,
    struck thee! Naught am,
    demerits, mine,
    Fell slaughter souls. Heaven rest now!
  MALCOLM. whetstone sword. grief
    Convert anger; blunt heart, enrage it.
  MACDUFF. O, play woman mine eyes
    braggart tongue! But, gentle heavens,
    Cut short intermission; front front
    Bring thou fiend Scotland myself;
    sword's length set him; 'scape,  
    Heaven forgive too!
  MALCOLM. tune manly.
    Come, King; power ready,
    lack leave. Macbeth
    ripe shaking, powers above
    Put instruments. Receive cheer may,
    night long finds day.          Exeunt.

ACT V. SCENE I.
Dunsinane. Anteroom castle.

Enter Doctor Physic Waiting Gentlewoman.

  DOCTOR. nights watched you, perceive no
    truth report. walked?
  GENTLEWOMAN. Majesty field, her
    rise bed, throw nightgown her, unlock her
    closet, paper, fold it, write upon't, read it,
    seal it, return bed; while
    fast sleep.
  DOCTOR. great perturbation nature, receive the
    benefit sleep effects watching! slumbery
    agitation, walking actual performances,
    what, time, heard say?
  GENTLEWOMAN. That, sir, report her.
  DOCTOR. me, 'tis meet should.
  GENTLEWOMAN. anyone, witness to
    confirm speech.

                Enter Lady Macbeth taper.  

    Lo you, comes! guise, and, my
    life, fast asleep. Observe her; stand close.
  DOCTOR. light?
  GENTLEWOMAN. Why, stood her. light her
     continually; 'tis command.
  DOCTOR. see, eyes open.
  GENTLEWOMAN. Ay, sense shut.
  DOCTOR. now? rubs hands.
  GENTLEWOMAN. accustomed action her, thus
    washing hands. continue quarter of
    hour.
  LADY MACBETH. spot.
  DOCTOR. Hark, speaks! set her, to
    satisfy remembrance strongly.
  LADY MACBETH. Out, damned spot! Out, say! One- -why 'tis
    time do't. Hell murky. Fie, lord, fie! soldier, and
    afeard? fear it, call our
    power account? thought man have
    blood him?  
  DOCTOR. mark that?
  LADY MACBETH. Thane Fife wife; now? What,
    hands neer clean? o' that, lord, more
    o' that. mar starting.
  DOCTOR. to, to; not.
  GENTLEWOMAN. spoke not, that.
    Heaven known.
  LADY MACBETH. smell blood still. perfumes
    Arabia sweeten hand. Oh, oh, oh!
  DOCTOR. sigh there! heart sorely charged.
  GENTLEWOMAN. heart bosom the
    dignity body.
  DOCTOR. Well, well, well-
  GENTLEWOMAN. Pray God be, sir.
  DOCTOR. disease practice. those
    walked sleep died holily their
    beds.
  LADY MACBETH. Wash hands, put nightgown, so
    pale. again, Banquo's buried; out
    on's grave.  
  DOCTOR. so?
  LADY MACBETH. bed, bed; knocking gate. Come,
    come, come, come, give hand.What's undone.
    bed, bed, bed.
Exit.
  DOCTOR. bed?
  GENTLEWOMAN. Directly.
  DOCTOR. Foul whisperings abroad. Unnatural deeds
    breed unnatural troubles; infected minds
    deaf pillows discharge secrets.
    divine physician.
    God, God, forgive all! her;
    Remove means annoyance,
    eyes her. good night.
    mind mated amazed sight.
    think, dare speak.
  GENTLEWOMAN. Good night, good doctor.
                                                         Exeunt.




SCENE II.
The country Dunsinane. Drum colors.

Enter Menteith, Caithness, Angus, Lennox, Soldiers.

  MENTEITH. English power near, led Malcolm,
    uncle Siward, good Macduff.
    Revenges burn them, dear causes
    bleeding grim alarm
    Excite mortified man.
  ANGUS. Birnam Wood
    meet them; coming.
  CAITHNESS. Donalbain brother?
  LENNOX. certain, sir, not; file
    gentry. Seward's son
    unrough youths now
    Protest manhood.
  MENTEITH. tyrant?
  CAITHNESS. Great Dunsinane strongly fortifies.
    mad; others, lesser hate him,
    call valiant fury; but, certain,
    buckle distemper'd  
    belt rule.
  ANGUS. feel
    secret murthers sticking hands,
    minutely revolts upbraid faith-breach;
    commands move command,
    love. feel title
    Hang loose him, giant's robe
    dwarfish thief.
  MENTEITH. blame
    pester'd senses recoil start,
    condemn
    there?
  CAITHNESS. Well, march on
    give obedience 'tis owed.
    Meet medicine sickly weal,
    pour we, country's purge,
    drop us.
  LENNOX. needs
    dew sovereign flower drown weeds.
    Make march Birnam.           Exeunt marching.




SCENE III.
Dunsinane. room castle.

Enter Macbeth, Doctor, Attendants.

  MACBETH. Bring reports; fly all!
    Till Birnam Wood remove Dunsinane
    taint fear. boy Malcolm?
    born woman? spirits know
    mortal consequences pronounced thus:
    "Fear not, Macbeth; man born woman
    e'er power thee." fly, false Thanes,
    mingle English epicures!
    mind sway heart bear
    sag doubt shake fear.

                       Enter Servant.

    devil damn thee black, thou cream-faced loon!
    got'st thou goose look?
  SERVANT. ten thousand-
  MACBETH. Geese, villain?  
  SERVANT. Soldiers, sir.
  MACBETH. prick thy face over-red thy fear,
    Thou lily-liver'd boy. soldiers, patch?
    Death thy soul! linen cheeks thine
    counselors fear. soldiers, whey-face?
  SERVANT. English force, you.
  MACBETH. thy face hence.                    Exit Servant.
    Seyton-I sick heart,
    behold- Seyton, say!- push
    cheer disseat now.
    lived long enough. life
    fall'n sear, yellow leaf,
    accompany age,
    honor, love, obedience, troops friends,
    have; stead,
    Curses, loud deep, mouth-honor, breath,
    poor heart fain deny dare not.
    Seyton!

                       Enter Seyton.  

  SEYTON. gracious pleasure?
  MACBETH. news more?
  SEYTON. confirm'd, lord, reported.
  MACBETH. fight, 'til bones flesh hack'd.
    Give armor.
  SEYTON. 'Tis needed yet.
  MACBETH. put on.
    Send horses, skirr country round,
    Hang talk fear. Give mine armor.
    patient, doctor?
  DOCTOR. sick, lord,
    troubled thick-coming fancies,
    rest.
  MACBETH. Cure that.
    Canst thou minister mind diseased,
    Pluck memory rooted sorrow,
    Raze written troubles brain,
    sweet oblivious antidote
    Cleanse stuff'd bosom perilous stuff  
    weighs heart?
  DOCTOR. patient
    minister himself.
  MACBETH. Throw physic dogs, it.
    Come, put mine armor on; give staff.
    Seyton, send out. Doctor, Thanes fly me.
    Come, sir, dispatch. thou couldst, doctor, cast
    water land, find disease
    purge sound pristine health,
    applaud thee echo,
    applaud again. Pull't off, say.
    rhubarb, cyme, purgative drug
    scour English hence? Hearst thou them?
  DOCTOR. Ay, good lord, royal preparation
    Makes hear something.
  MACBETH. Bring me.
    afraid death bane
    Till Birnam Forest Dunsinane.
  DOCTOR. [Aside.] Dunsinane clear,
    Profit draw here.             Exeunt.




SCENE IV.
Country Birnam Wood. Drum colors.

Enter Malcolm, Seward Son, Macduff, Menteith, Caithness,
Angus, Lennox, Ross, Soldiers, marching.

  MALCOLM. Cousins, hope days hand
    chambers safe.
  MENTEITH. doubt nothing.
  SIWARD. wood us?
  MENTEITH. Wood Birnam.
  MALCOLM. soldier hew bough,
    bear't him; shadow
    numbers host, make discovery
    Err report us.
  SOLDIERS. done.
  SIWARD. learn confident tyrant
    Dunsinane endure
    setting before't.
  MALCOLM. 'Tis main hope;
    advantage given,
    revolt,  
    serve constrained things
    hearts absent too.
  MACDUFF. censures
    Attend true event, put on
    Industrious soldiership.
  SIWARD. time approaches
    due decision make know
    owe.
    Thoughts speculative unsure hopes relate,
    issue strokes arbitrate.
    advance war.
                                                Exeunt Marching.




SCENE V.
Dunsinane. castle.

Enter Macbeth, Seyton, Soldiers, drum colors.

  MACBETH. Hang banners outward walls;
    cry still, "They come!" castle's strength
    laugh siege scorn. lie
    Till famine ague eat up.
    forced ours,
    met dareful, beard beard,
    beat backward home.
                                          cry women within.
    noise?
  SEYTON. cry women, good lord.            Exit.
  MACBETH. forgot taste fears:
    time been, senses cool'd
    hear night-shriek, fell hair
    dismal treatise rouse stir
    life in't. supp'd full horrors;
    Direness, familiar slaughterous thoughts,
    start me.  

                  Re-enter Seyton.
     Wherefore cry?
  SEYTON. Queen, lord, dead.
  MACBETH. died hereafter;
    time word.
    Tomorrow, tomorrow, tomorrow
    Creeps petty pace day day
    syllable recorded time;
    yesterdays lighted fools
    dusty death. Out, out, candle!
    Life's walking shadow, poor player
    struts frets hour stage
    heard more. tale
    Told idiot, full sound fury,
    Signifying nothing.

                 Enter Messenger.

    Thou comest thy tongue; thy story quickly.  
  MESSENGER. Gracious lord,
    report saw,
    it.
  MACBETH. Well, say, sir.
  MESSENGER. stand watch hill,
    look'd Birnam, anon, methought,
    Wood began move.
  MACBETH. Liar slave!
  MESSENGER. endure wrath, if't so.
    mile coming;
    say, moving grove.
  MACBETH. thou speak'st false,
    tree shalt thou hang alive,
    Till famine cling thee; thy speech sooth,
    care thou dost much.
    pull resolution begin
    doubt equivocation fiend
    lies truth. "Fear not, till Birnam Wood
    Dunsinane," wood
    Dunsinane. Arm, arm, out!  
    avouches appear,
    flying tarrying here.
    'gin aweary sun
    estate o' world undone.
    Ring alarum bell! Blow, wind! Come, wrack!
    die harness back.         Exeunt.




SCENE VI.
Dunsinane.  castle.

Enter Malcolm, Siward, Macduff, Army, boughs.
Drum colors.

  MALCOLM. enough; leavy screens throw down,
    show are. You, worthy uncle,
    cousin, noble son,
    Lead battle. Worthy Macduff we
    's remains do,
    order.
  SIWARD. Fare well.
    find tyrant's power tonight,
    beaten fight.
  MACDUFF. Make trumpets speak, give breath,
    clamorous harbingers blood death.
                                                         Exeunt.




SCENE VII.
Dunsinane.  castle.  Alarums.

Enter Macbeth.

  MACBETH. tied stake; fly,
    bear-like fight course. he
    born woman? one
    fear, none.

                     Enter young Siward.

  YOUNG SIWARD. thy name?
  MACBETH. Thou'lt afraid hear it.
  YOUNG SIWARD. No, thou call'st thyself hotter name
    hell.
  MACBETH. name's Macbeth.
  YOUNG SIWARD. devil pronounce title
    hateful mine ear.
  MACBETH. No, fearful.
  YOUNG SIWARD O Thou liest, abhorred tyrant; sword
    prove lie thou speak'st.  
                          fight, young Seward slain.
  MACBETH. Thou wast born woman.
    swords smile at, weapons laugh scorn,
    Brandish'd man woman born.              Exit.

                Alarums. Enter Macduff.

  MACDUFF. noise is. Tyrant, show thy face!
    thou slain stroke mine,
    wife children's ghosts haunt still.
    strike wretched kerns, arms
    hired bear staves. thou, Macbeth,
    sword, unbatter'd edge,
    sheathe undeeded. thou shouldst be;
    great clatter, greatest note
    bruited. find him, Fortune!
    beg not.                           Exit. Alarums.

                Enter Malcolm Siward.
  
  SIWARD. way, lord; castle's gently render'd.
    tyrant's people sides fight,
    noble Thanes bravely war,
    day professes yours,
    do.
  MALCOLM. met foes
    strike us.
  SIWARD. Enter, sir, castle.
                                                 Exeunt. Alarum.




SCENE VIII.
Another part field.

Enter Macbeth.

  MACBETH. play Roman fool die
    mine sword? Whiles lives, gashes
    them.

                      Enter Macduff.

  MACDUFF. Turn, hell hound, turn!
  MACBETH. men avoided thee.
    thee back, soul charged
    blood thine already.
  MACDUFF. words.
    voice sword, thou bloodier villain
    terms give thee out!                    fight.
  MACBETH. Thou losest labor.
    easy mayst thou intrenchant air
    thy keen sword impress make bleed.
    fall thy blade vulnerable crests;  
    bear charmed life, yield
    woman born.
  MACDUFF. Despair thy charm,
    angel thou hast served
    thee, Macduff mother's womb
    Untimely ripp'd.
  MACBETH. Accursed tongue tells so,
    hath cow'd part man!
    juggling fiends believed
    patter double sense,
    word promise ear
    break hope. fight thee.
  MACDUFF. yield thee, coward,
    live show gaze o' time.
    thee, rarer monsters are,
    Painted pole, underwrit,
    "Here tyrant."
  MACBETH. yield,
    kiss ground young Malcolm's feet,
    baited rabble's curse.  
    Birnam Wood Dunsinane,
    thou opposed, woman born,
    last. body
    throw warlike shield! Lay on, Macduff,
    damn'd cries, "Hold, enough!"
                                       Exeunt fighting. Alarums.




SCENE IX.

Retreat. Flourish. Enter, drum colors, Malcolm, Siward, Ross,
the Thanes, Soldiers.

  MALCOLM. friends miss safe arrived.
  SIWARD. off, yet, see,
    great day cheaply bought.
  MALCOLM. Macduff missing, noble son.
  ROSS. son, lord, paid soldier's debt.
    lived till man,
    sooner prowess confirm'd
    unshrinking station fought,
    man died.
  SIWARD. dead?
  ROSS. Ay, brought field. sorrow
    measured worth, then
    hath end.
  SIWARD. hurts before?
  ROSS. Ay, front.
  SIWARD. then, God's soldier he!
    sons hairs,  
    fairer death.
    knell knoll'd.
  MALCOLM. worth sorrow,
    spend him.
  SIWARD. worth more:
    parted paid score,
    God him! newer comfort.

             Re-enter Macduff, Macbeth's head.

  MACDUFF. Hail, King, thou art. Behold stands
    usurper's cursed head. time free.
    thee compass'd thy kingdom's pearl
    speak salutation minds,
    voices desire aloud mine-
    Hail, King Scotland!
  ALL. Hail, King Scotland!                         Flourish.
  MALCOLM. spend large expense time
    reckon loves
    make you. Thanes kinsmen,  
    Henceforth Earls, Scotland
    honor named. do,
    planted newly time,
    calling home exiled friends abroad
    fled snares watchful tyranny,
    Producing cruel ministers
    dead butcher fiend-like queen,
    Who, 'tis thought, violent hands
    life; this, needful else
    calls us, grace Grace
    perform measure, time, place.
    one,
    invite crown'd Scone.
                                               Flourish. Exeunt.
                 -THE END-

1605


MEASURE MEASURE

by William Shakespeare



DRAMATIS PERSONAE

  VINCENTIO, Duke
  ANGELO, Deputy
  ESCALUS, ancient Lord
  CLAUDIO, young gentleman
  LUCIO, fantastic
  Gentlemen
  VARRIUS, gentleman, servant Duke
  PROVOST
  THOMAS, friar
  PETER, friar
  JUSTICE
  ELBOW, simple constable
  FROTH, foolish gentleman
  POMPEY, clown servant Mistress Overdone
  ABHORSON, executioner
  BARNARDINE, dissolute prisoner

  ISABELLA, sister Claudio
  MARIANA, betrothed Angelo
  JULIET, beloved Claudio  
  FRANCISCA, nun
  MISTRESS OVERDONE, bawd

  Lords, Officers, Citizens, Boy, Attendants

SCENE:
Vienna


ACT I. SCENE I.
The DUKE'S palace

Enter DUKE, ESCALUS, LORDS, ATTENDANTS

  DUKE. Escalus!
  ESCALUS. lord.
  DUKE. government properties unfold
    t' affect speech discourse,
    put science
    Exceeds, that, lists advice
    strength give you; remains
    sufficiency- worth able-
    work. nature people,
    city's institutions, terms
    common justice, y'are pregnant in
    art practice hath enriched any
    remember. commission,
    warp. Call hither,
    say, bid us, Angelo.         Exit ATTENDANT
    figure bear?
    special soul  
    Elected absence supply;
    Lent terror, dress'd love,
    deputation organs
    power. it?
  ESCALUS. Vienna worth
    undergo ample grace honour,
    Lord Angelo.

                          Enter ANGELO

  DUKE. comes.
  ANGELO. obedient Grace's will,
    pleasure.
  DUKE. Angelo,
    kind character thy life
    th' observer doth thy history
    Fully unfold. Thyself thy belongings
    thine proper waste
    Thyself thy virtues, thee.
    Heaven doth torches do,  
    light themselves; virtues
    us, 'twere alike
    not. Spirits finely touch'd
    fine issues; Nature lends
    smallest scruple excellence
    But, thrifty goddess, determines
    glory creditor,
    use. bend speech
    part advertise.
    Hold, therefore, Angelo-
    remove thou full ourself;
    Mortality mercy Vienna
    Live thy tongue heart. Escalus,
    question, thy secondary.
    thy commission.
  ANGELO. Now, good lord,
    test made metal,
    noble great figure
    stamp'd it.
  DUKE. evasion!  
    leaven'd prepared choice
    Proceeded you; honours.
    haste quick condition
    prefers itself, leaves unquestion'd
    Matters needful value. write you,
    time concernings importune,
    us, know
    doth befall here. So, fare well.
    th' hopeful execution leave you
    commissions.
  ANGELO. give leave, lord,
    bring way.
  DUKE. haste admit it;
    you, mine honour, do
    scruple: scope mine own,
    enforce qualify laws
    soul good. Give hand;
    privily away. love people,
    stage eyes;
    well, relish  
    loud applause Aves vehement;
    man safe discretion
    affect it. more, fare well.
  ANGELO. heavens give safety purposes!
  ESCALUS. Lead bring back happiness!
  DUKE. you. Fare well.                         Exit
  ESCALUS. desire you, sir, give leave
    free speech you; concerns me
    bottom place:
    pow'r have, strength nature
    instructed.
  ANGELO. 'Tis me. withdraw together,
    satisfaction have
    Touching point.
  ESCALUS. wait honour.                    Exeunt




SCENE II.
A street

Enter Lucio GENTLEMEN

  LUCIO. Duke, dukes, composition
    King Hungary, dukes fall the
    King.
  GENTLEMAN. Heaven grant peace, King of
    Hungary's!
  GENTLEMAN. Amen.
  LUCIO. Thou conclud'st sanctimonious pirate to
    sea Ten Commandments, scrap'd table.
  GENTLEMAN. 'Thou shalt steal'?
  LUCIO. Ay, raz'd.
  GENTLEMAN. Why, 'twas commandment command captain
    rest functions: put steal.
    soldier that, thanksgiving before
    meat, relish petition prays peace.
  GENTLEMAN. heard soldier dislike it.
  LUCIO. thee; thou wast grace was
    said.  
  GENTLEMAN. No? dozen times least.
  GENTLEMAN. What, metre?
  LUCIO. proportion language.
  GENTLEMAN. think, religion.
  LUCIO. Ay, not? Grace grace, controversy; as,
    example, thou thyself art wicked villain, all
    grace.
  GENTLEMAN. Well, pair shears us.
  LUCIO. grant; lists velvet.
    Thou art list.
  GENTLEMAN. thou velvet; thou art good velvet; thou'rt
    three-pil'd piece, warrant thee. lief list of
    English kersey pil'd, thou art pil'd, French
    velvet. speak feelingly now?
  LUCIO. thou dost; and, indeed, painful feeling of
    thy speech. will, thine confession, learn begin
    thy health; but, whilst live, forget drink thee.
  GENTLEMAN. wrong, not?
  GENTLEMAN. Yes, thou hast, thou art tainted or
    free.  

                        Enter MISTRESS OVERDONE

  LUCIO. Behold, behold, Madam Mitigation comes! have
    purchas'd diseases roof to-
  GENTLEMAN. what, pray?
  GENTLEMAN. Judge.
  GENTLEMAN. thousand dolours year.
  GENTLEMAN. Ay, more.
  LUCIO. French crown more.
  GENTLEMAN. Thou art figuring diseases me, thou
    art full error; sound.
  LUCIO. Nay, not, say, healthy; sound things
    hollow: thy bones hollow; impiety made feast
    thee.
  GENTLEMAN. now! hips profound
    sciatica?
  MRS. OVERDONE. Well, well! yonder arrested carried
    prison worth thousand all.
  GENTLEMAN. that, pray thee?  
  MRS. OVERDONE. Marry, sir, Claudio, Signior Claudio.
  GENTLEMAN. Claudio prison? 'Tis so.
  MRS. OVERDONE. Nay, 'tis so: arrested; him
    carried away; and, more, days his
    head chopp'd off.
  LUCIO. But, fooling, so. Art
    thou this?
  MRS. OVERDONE. it; Madam
    Julietta child.
  LUCIO. me, be; promis'd meet hours
    since, precise promise-keeping.
  GENTLEMAN. Besides, know, draws the
    speech purpose.
  GENTLEMAN. agreeing proclamation.
  LUCIO. Away; learn truth it.
                                      Exeunt Lucio GENTLEMEN
  MRS. OVERDONE. Thus, war, sweat, what
    gallows, poverty, custom-shrunk.

                               Enter POMPEY  

    now! news you?
  POMPEY. Yonder man carried prison.
  MRS. OVERDONE. Well, done?
  POMPEY. woman.
  MRS. OVERDONE. offence?
  POMPEY. Groping trouts peculiar river.
  MRS. OVERDONE. What! maid child him?
  POMPEY. No; woman maid him. not
   heard proclamation, you?
  MRS. OVERDONE. proclamation, man?
  POMPEY. houses suburbs Vienna pluck'd down.
  MRS. OVERDONE. city?
  POMPEY. stand seed; too, that
    wise burgher put them.
  MRS. OVERDONE. houses resort suburbs be
    pull'd down?
  POMPEY. ground, mistress.
  MRS. OVERDONE. Why, change commonwealth!
    me?  
  POMPEY. Come, fear you: good counsellors lack clients.
    change place change trade; I'll
    tapster still. Courage, pity you;
    worn eyes service, will
    considered.
  MRS. OVERDONE. here, Thomas Tapster? withdraw.
  POMPEY. Signior Claudio, led provost prison;
    Madam Juliet.                             Exeunt

            Enter PROVOST, CLAUDIO, JULIET, OFFICERS;
                            LUCIO following

  CLAUDIO. Fellow, dost thou show th' world?
    Bear prison, committed.
  PROVOST. evil disposition,
    Lord Angelo special charge.
  CLAUDIO. demigod Authority
    Make pay offence weight
    words heaven: will, will;
    not, so; 'tis just.  
  LUCIO. Why, now, Claudio, restraint?
  CLAUDIO. liberty, Lucio, liberty;
    surfeit father fast,
    scope immoderate use
    Turns restraint. natures pursue,
    rats ravin proper bane,
    thirsty evil; drink die.
  LUCIO. speak wisely arrest, send for
    creditors; yet, truth, lief
    foppery freedom morality imprisonment.
    thy offence, Claudio?
  CLAUDIO. speak offend again.
  LUCIO. What, is't murder?
  CLAUDIO. No.
  LUCIO. Lechery?
  CLAUDIO. Call so.
  PROVOST. Away, sir; go.
  CLAUDIO. word, good friend. Lucio, word you.
  LUCIO. hundred, good. lechery look'd
    after?  
  CLAUDIO. stands me: true contract
    possession Julietta's bed.
    lady; fast wife,
    Save denunciation lack
    outward order; to,
    propagation dow'r
    Remaining coffer friends.
    thought meet hide love
    Till time made us. chances
    stealth mutual entertainment,
    character gross, writ Juliet.
  LUCIO. child, perhaps?
  CLAUDIO. Unhappily, so.
    deputy Duke-
    fault glimpse newness,
    body public be
    horse whereon governor doth ride,
    Who, newly seat, know
    command, lets straight feel spur;
    tyranny place,  
    eminence fills up,
    stagger in. governor
    Awakes enrolled penalties
    have, unscour'd armour, hung th' wall
    long nineteen zodiacs round
    worn; and, name,
    puts drowsy neglected act
    Freshly me. 'Tis surely name.
  LUCIO. warrant is; thy head stands tickle thy
    shoulders milkmaid, love, sigh off.
    Send Duke, appeal him.
  CLAUDIO. so, found.
    prithee, Lucio, kind service:
    day sister cloister enter,
    receive approbation;
    Acquaint danger state;
    Implore her, voice, make friends
    strict deputy; bid assay him.
    great hope that; youth
    prone speechless dialect  
    move men; beside, hath prosperous art
    play reason discourse,
    persuade.
  LUCIO. pray may; encouragement like,
    stand grievous imposition, the
    enjoying thy life, thus
    foolishly lost game tick-tack. her.
  CLAUDIO. you, good friend Lucio.
  LUCIO. hours.
  CLAUDIO. Come, officer, away.                           Exeunt




SCENE III.
A monastery

Enter DUKE FRIAR THOMAS

  DUKE. No, holy father; throw thought;
    dribbling dart love
    pierce complete bosom. desire thee
    give secret harbour hath purpose
    grave wrinkled aims ends
    burning youth.
  FRIAR. Grace speak it?
  DUKE. holy sir, you
    lov'd life removed,
    held idle price haunt assemblies
    youth, cost, witless bravery keeps.
    deliver'd Lord Angelo,
    man stricture firm abstinence,
    absolute power place Vienna,
    supposes travell'd Poland;
    strew'd common ear,
    received. Now, pious sir,  
    demand this.
  FRIAR. Gladly, lord.
  DUKE. strict statutes biting laws,
    needful bits curbs headstrong steeds,
    fourteen years slip;
    o'ergrown lion cave,
    prey. Now, fond fathers,
    bound threat'ning twigs birch,
    stick children's sight
    terror, use, time rod
    mock'd fear'd; decrees,
    Dead infliction, dead;
    liberty plucks justice nose;
    baby beats nurse, athwart
    decorum.
  FRIAR. rested Grace
    unloose tied-up justice pleas'd;
    dreadful seem'd
    Lord Angelo.
  DUKE. fear, dreadful.  
    Sith 'twas fault give people scope,
    'Twould tyranny strike gall them
    bid do; bid done,
    evil deeds permissive pass
    punishment. Therefore, indeed, father,
    Angelo impos'd office;
    may, th' ambush name, strike home,
    nature fight
    slander. behold sway,
    will, 'twere brother order,
    Visit prince people. Therefore, prithee,
    Supply habit, instruct me
    formally person bear me
    true friar. Moe reasons action
    leisure render you.
    Only, one: Lord Angelo precise;
    Stands guard envy; scarce confesses
    blood flows, appetite
    bread stone. see,
    power change purpose, seemers be.         Exeunt




SCENE IV.
A nunnery

Enter ISABELLA FRANCISCA

  ISABELLA. nuns farther privileges?
  FRANCISCA. large enough?
  ISABELLA. Yes, truly; speak desiring more,
    wishing strict restraint
    sisterhood, votarists Saint Clare.
  LUCIO. [ Within] Ho! Peace place!
  ISABELLA. calls?
  FRANCISCA. man's voice. Gentle Isabella,
    Turn key, business him:
    may, not; unsworn;
    vow'd, speak men
    presence prioress;
    Then, speak, show face,
    Or, show face, speak.
    calls again; pray answer him.        Exit FRANCISCA
  ISABELLA. Peace prosperity! is't calls?
  
                           Enter LUCIO

  LUCIO. Hail, virgin, be, cheek-roses
    Proclaim less. stead me
    bring sight Isabella,
    novice place, fair sister
    unhappy brother Claudio?
  ISABELLA. 'unhappy brother'? ask
    rather, make know
    Isabella, sister.
  LUCIO. Gentle fair, brother kindly greets you.
    weary you, prison.
  ISABELLA. Woe me! what?
  LUCIO. which, judge,
    receive punishment thanks:
    hath friend child.
  ISABELLA. Sir, make story.
  LUCIO. true.
    not- 'tis familiar sin
    maids lapwing, jest,  
    Tongue heart- play virgins so:
    hold thing enskied sainted,
    renouncement immortal spirit,
    talk'd sincerity,
    saint.
  ISABELLA. blaspheme good mocking me.
  LUCIO. it. Fewness truth, 'tis thus:
    brother lover embrac'd.
    feed grow full, blossoming time
    seedness bare fallow brings
    teeming foison, plenteous womb
    Expresseth full tilth husbandry.
  ISABELLA. child him? cousin Juliet?
  LUCIO. cousin?
  ISABELLA. Adoptedly, school-maids change names
    vain apt affection.
  LUCIO. is.
  ISABELLA. O, marry her!
  LUCIO. point.
    Duke strangely hence;  
    Bore gentlemen, one,
    hand, hope action; learn,
    nerves state,
    givings-out infinite distance
    true-meant design. place,
    full line authority,
    Governs Lord Angelo, man blood
    snow-broth, feels
    wanton stings motions sense,
    doth rebate blunt natural edge
    profits mind, study fast.
    He- give fear liberty,
    long run hideous law,
    mice lions- hath pick'd act
    heavy sense brother's life
    Falls forfeit; arrests it,
    close rigour statute
    make example. hope gone,
    grace fair prayer
    soften Angelo. pith business  
    'Twixt poor brother.
  ISABELLA. Doth seek life?
  LUCIO. censur'd him
    Already, and, hear, Provost hath
    warrant execution.
  ISABELLA. Alas! poor ability's me
    good?
  LUCIO. Assay pow'r have.
  ISABELLA. power, alas, doubt!
  LUCIO. doubts traitors,
    make lose good oft win
    fearing attempt. Lord Angelo,
    learn know, maidens sue,
    Men give gods; weep kneel,
    petitions freely theirs
    owe them.
  ISABELLA. do.
  LUCIO. speedily.
  ISABELLA. straight;
    longer staying give Mother  
    Notice affair. humbly you.
    Commend brother; night
    send word success.
  LUCIO. leave you.
  ISABELLA. Good sir, adieu.                              Exeunt
