ACT II. Scene I.
A hall ANGELO'S house

Enter ANGELO, ESCALUS, JUSTICE, PROVOST, OFFICERS, ATTENDANTS

  ANGELO. make scarecrow law,
    Setting fear birds prey,
    shape till custom make it
    perch, terror.
  ESCALUS. Ay, yet
    keen, cut little
    fall bruise death. Alas! gentleman,
    save, noble father.
    honour know,
    strait virtue,
    That, working affections,
    time coher'd place, place wishing,
    resolute acting blood
    attain'd th' effect purpose
    life
    Err'd point censure him,  
    pull'd law you.
  ANGELO. 'Tis thing tempted, Escalus,
    thing fall. deny
    jury, passing prisoner's life,
    sworn twelve thief two
    Guiltier try. open made justice,
    justice seizes. laws
    thieves pass thieves? 'Tis pregnant,
    jewel find, stoop take't,
    it; see
    tread upon, it.
    extenuate offence
    faults; me,
    I, censure him, offend,
    mine judgment pattern death,
    partial. Sir, die.
  ESCALUS. wisdom will.
  ANGELO. Provost?
  PROVOST. Here, honour.
  ANGELO. Claudio  
    executed to-morrow morning;
    Bring confessor; prepar'd;
    utmost pilgrimage.        Exit PROVOST
  ESCALUS. [Aside] Well, heaven forgive him! forgive all!
    rise sin, virtue fall;
    run breaks ice, answer none,
    condemned fault alone.

         Enter ELBOW OFFICERS FROTH POMPEY

  ELBOW. Come, bring away; good people a
    commonweal abuses common houses,
    law; bring away.
  ANGELO. now, sir! name, matter?
  ELBOW. honour, poor Duke's constable,
    Elbow; lean justice, sir, bring
    good honour notorious benefactors.
  ANGELO. Benefactors! Well- benefactors they? not
    malefactors?
  ELBOW. honour, are;  
    precise villains are, of, void all
    profanation world good Christians have.
  ESCALUS. well; wise officer.
  ANGELO. to; quality of? Elbow name? Why
    dost thou speak, Elbow?
  POMPEY. cannot, sir; elbow.
  ANGELO. you, sir?
  ELBOW. He, sir? tapster, sir; parcel-bawd; serves bad
    woman; house, sir, was, say, pluck'd the
    suburbs; professes hot-house, which, think, a
    ill house too.
  ESCALUS. that?
  ELBOW. Wife, sir, detest heaven honour-
  ESCALUS. How! thy wife!
  ELBOW. Ay, sir; heaven, honest woman-
  ESCALUS. Dost thou detest therefore?
  ELBOW. say, sir, detest also, she, that
    house, bawd's house, pity life,
    naughty house.
  ESCALUS. dost thou that, constable?  
  ELBOW. Marry, sir, wife; who, woman
    cardinally given, accus'd fornication,
    adultery, uncleanliness there.
  ESCALUS. woman's means?
  ELBOW. Ay, sir, Mistress Overdone's means; spit in
    face, defied him.
  POMPEY. Sir, honour, so.
  ELBOW. Prove varlets here, thou honourable man,
    prove it.
  ESCALUS. hear misplaces?
  POMPEY. Sir, great child; longing, saving your
    honour's reverence, stew'd prunes. Sir, the
    house, distant time stood, were, a
    fruit dish, dish pence; honours seen
    dishes; China dishes, good dishes.
  ESCALUS. to, to; matter dish, sir.
  POMPEY. No, indeed, sir, pin; the
    right; point. say, Mistress Elbow, being, as
    say, child, great-bellied, longing, I
    said, prunes; dish, said,  
    Master Froth here, man, eaten rest, I
    said, and, say, paying honestly; for, you
    know, Master Froth, give pence again-
  FROTH. No, indeed.
  POMPEY. well; then, rememb'red, cracking
    stones foresaid prunes-
  FROTH. Ay, indeed.
  POMPEY. Why, well; telling then, rememb'red,
    past cure thing you
    wot of, good diet, told you-
  FROTH. true.
  POMPEY. Why, then-
  ESCALUS. Come, tedious fool. purpose: was
    Elbow's wife hath complain of? me
    her.
  POMPEY. Sir, honour yet.
  ESCALUS. No, sir, not.
  POMPEY. Sir, it, honour's leave. And,
    beseech you, Master Froth here, sir, man of
    fourscore pound year; father died Hallowmas- was't  
    Hallowmas, Master Froth?
  FROTH. All-hallond eve.
  POMPEY. Why, well; hope truths. He, sir, sitting, as
    say, lower chair, sir; 'twas Bunch Grapes,
    where, indeed, delight sit, not?
  FROTH. so; open room, good winter.
  POMPEY. Why, then; hope truths.
  ANGELO. night Russia,
    nights longest there; leave,
    leave hearing cause,
    Hoping find good whip all.
  ESCALUS. less. Good morrow lordship.
    [Exit ANGELO] Now, sir, on; Elbow's wife,
    more?
  POMPEY. Once?- sir. once.
  ELBOW. beseech you, sir, man wife.
  POMPEY. beseech honour, me.
  ESCALUS. Well, sir, gentleman her?
  POMPEY. beseech you, sir, gentleman's face. Good
    Master Froth, honour; 'tis good purpose. Doth  
    honour mark face?
  ESCALUS. Ay, sir, well.
  POMPEY. Nay, beseech you, mark well.
  ESCALUS. Well, so.
  POMPEY. Doth honour harm face?
  ESCALUS. Why, no.
  POMPEY. suppos'd book face worst thing
    him. Good then; face worst thing him,
    Master Froth constable's wife harm? would
    honour.
  ESCALUS. right, constable; it?
  ELBOW. First, you, house respected house; next,
    respected fellow; mistress respected
    woman.
  POMPEY. hand, sir, wife respected person than
    all.
  ELBOW. Varlet, thou liest; thou liest, wicket varlet; time is
    respected man, woman, or
    child.
  POMPEY. Sir, respected married her.  
  ESCALUS. wiser here, Justice Iniquity? this
    true?
  ELBOW. O thou caitiff! O thou varlet! O thou wicked Hannibal! I
    respected married her! was
    respected her, me, worship me
    poor Duke's officer. Prove this, thou wicked Hannibal, or
    mine action batt'ry thee.
  ESCALUS. box o' th' ear, your
    action slander too.
  ELBOW. Marry, good worship it. is't your
    worship's pleasure wicked caitiff?
  ESCALUS. Truly, officer, hath offences that
    thou wouldst discover thou couldst, continue his
    courses till thou know'st are.
  ELBOW. Marry, worship it. Thou seest, thou wicked
    varlet, now, thee: thou art continue now,
    thou varlet; thou art continue.
  ESCALUS. born, friend?
  FROTH. Vienna, sir.
  ESCALUS. fourscore pounds year?  
  FROTH. Yes, an't you, sir.
  ESCALUS. So. trade of, sir?
  POMPEY. tapster, poor widow's tapster.
  ESCALUS. mistress' name?
  POMPEY. Mistress Overdone.
  ESCALUS. Hath husband?
  POMPEY. Nine, sir; Overdone last.
  ESCALUS. Nine! me, Master Froth. Master Froth, I
    acquainted tapsters: draw you,
    Master Froth, hang them. gone, me
    hear you.
  FROTH. worship. mine part, into
    room taphouse drawn in.
  ESCALUS. Well, it, Master Froth; farewell. [Exit FROTH]
    me, Master Tapster; name, Master
    Tapster?
  POMPEY. Pompey.
  ESCALUS. else?
  POMPEY. Bum, sir.
  ESCALUS. Troth, bum greatest thing you;  
    that, beastliest sense, Pompey Great. Pompey,
    partly bawd, Pompey, howsoever colour a
    tapster. not? Come, true; better
    you.
  POMPEY. Truly, sir, poor fellow live.
  ESCALUS. live, Pompey- bawd? you
    trade, Pompey? lawful trade?
  POMPEY. law it, sir.
  ESCALUS. law it, Pompey; be
    allowed Vienna.
  POMPEY. worship geld splay youth of
    city?
  ESCALUS. No, Pompey.
  POMPEY. Truly, sir, poor opinion, to't then. If
    worship order drabs knaves, you
    fear bawds.
  ESCALUS. pretty orders beginning, you: it
    heading hanging.
  POMPEY. head hang offend ten
    year together, glad give commission  
    heads; law hold Vienna ten year, rent fairest
    house it, threepence bay. live come
    pass, Pompey told so.
  ESCALUS. you, good Pompey; and, requital prophecy,
    hark you: advise you, find upon
    complaint whatsoever- no, dwelling do; I
    do, Pompey, beat tent, prove shrewd
    Caesar you; plain dealing, Pompey, whipt.
    time, Pompey, fare well.
  POMPEY. worship good counsel; [Aside] I
    follow flesh fortune determine.
    Whip me? No, no; carman whip jade;
    valiant heart's whipt trade.         Exit
  ESCALUS. me, Master Elbow; hither, Master
    Constable. long place constable?
  ELBOW. year half, sir.
  ESCALUS. thought, readiness office, had
    continued time. years together?
  ELBOW. half, sir.
  ESCALUS. Alas, hath great pains you! wrong  
    put oft upon't. men ward
    sufficient serve it?
  ELBOW. Faith, sir, wit matters; are
    chosen, glad choose them; some
    piece money, all.
  ESCALUS. you, bring names seven, the
    sufficient parish.
  ELBOW. worship's house, sir?
  ESCALUS. house. Fare well.              [Exit ELBOW]
    o'clock, you?
  JUSTICE. Eleven, sir.
  ESCALUS. pray home dinner me.
  JUSTICE. humbly you.
  ESCALUS. grieves death Claudio;
    remedy.
  JUSTICE. Lord Angelo severe.
  ESCALUS. needful:
    Mercy oft so;
    Pardon nurse woe.
    yet, poor Claudio! remedy.  
    Come, sir.                                            Exeunt




SCENE II.
Another room ANGELO'S house

Enter PROVOST SERVANT

  SERVANT. hearing cause; straight.
    you.
  PROVOST. Pray do. [Exit SERVANT] know
    pleasure; relent. Alas,
    hath offended dream!
    sects, ages, smack vice; he
    die 't!

                            Enter ANGELO

  ANGELO. Now, matter, Provost?
  PROVOST. Claudio die to-morrow?
  ANGELO. thee yea? Hadst thou order?
    dost thou again?
  PROVOST. rash;
    good correction, seen
    When, execution, judgment hath  
    Repented o'er doom.
  ANGELO. to; mine.
    office, give place,
    spar'd.
  PROVOST. crave honour's pardon.
    done, sir, groaning Juliet?
    hour.
  ANGELO. Dispose her
    fitter place, speed.

                           Re-enter SERVANT

  SERVANT. sister man condemn'd
    Desires access you.
  ANGELO. Hath sister?
  PROVOST. Ay, good lord; virtuous maid,
    shortly sisterhood,
    already.
  ANGELO. Well, admitted.                Exit SERVANT
    fornicatress remov'd;  
    needful lavish means;
    order for't.

                         Enter Lucio ISABELLA

  PROVOST. [Going] Save honour!
  ANGELO. Stay while. [To ISABELLA] Y'are welcome; what's
    will?
  ISABELLA. woeful suitor honour,
    honour hear me.
  ANGELO. Well; suit?
  ISABELLA. vice abhor,
    desire meet blow justice;
    plead, must;
    plead, am
    war 'twixt not.
  ANGELO. Well; matter?
  ISABELLA. brother condemn'd die;
    beseech you, fault,
    brother.  
  PROVOST. [Aside] Heaven give thee moving graces.
  ANGELO. Condemn fault actor it!
    Why, fault's condemn'd ere done;
    Mine cipher function,
    fine faults fine stands record,
    actor.
  ISABELLA. O severe law!
    brother, then. Heaven honour!
  LUCIO. [To ISABELLA] Give't o'er so; again, entreat him,
    Kneel him, hang gown;
    cold: pin,
    tame tongue desire it.
    him, say.
  ISABELLA. die?
  ANGELO. Maiden, remedy.
  ISABELLA. Yes; pardon him.
    heaven man grieve mercy.
  ANGELO. do't.
  ISABELLA. you, would?
  ANGELO. Look, not, do.  
  ISABELLA. do't, world wrong,
    heart touch'd remorse
    mine him?
  ANGELO. sentenc'd; 'tis late.
  LUCIO. [To ISABELLA] cold.
  ISABELLA. late? Why, no; I, speak word,
    call back again. Well, this:
    ceremony great longs,
    king's crown deputed sword,
    marshal's truncheon judge's robe,
    half good grace
    mercy does.
    you, he,
    slipp'd him; he, you,
    stern.
  ANGELO. Pray gone.
  ISABELLA. heaven potency,
    Isabel! thus?
    No; 'twere judge
    prisoner.  
  LUCIO. [To ISABELLA] Ay, touch him; vein.
  ANGELO. brother forfeit law,
    waste words.
  ISABELLA. Alas! Alas!
    Why, souls forfeit once;
    vantage took
    Found remedy. be
    He, top judgment, should
    judge are? O, that;
    mercy breathe lips,
    man made.
  ANGELO. content, fair maid.
    law, condemn brother.
    kinsman, brother, son,
    him. die to-morrow.
  ISABELLA. To-morrow! O, sudden! Spare him, spare him.
    prepar'd death. kitchens
    kill fowl season; serve heaven
    respect minister
    gross selves? Good, good lord, bethink you.  
    hath died offence?
    committed it.
  LUCIO. [Aside] Ay, said.
  ANGELO. law hath dead, hath slept.
    dar'd evil
    th' edict infringe
    answer'd deed. 'tis awake,
    Takes note done, and, prophet,
    glass shows future evils-
    remissness conceiv'd,
    progress hatch'd born-
    successive degrees,
    live end.
  ISABELLA. show pity.
  ANGELO. show show justice;
    pity know,
    dismiss'd offence gall,
    that, answering foul wrong,
    Lives act another. satisfied;
    brother dies to-morrow; content.  
  ISABELLA. sentence,
    suffers. O, excellent
    giant's strength! tyrannous
    giant.
  LUCIO. [To ISABELLA] said.
  ISABELLA. great men thunder
    Jove does, Jove quiet,
    pelting petty officer
    heaven thunder,
    thunder. Merciful Heaven,
    Thou rather, thy sharp sulphurous bolt,
    Splits unwedgeable gnarled oak
    soft myrtle. man, proud man,
    Dress'd authority,
    ignorant assur'd,
    glassy essence, angry ape,
    Plays fantastic tricks high heaven
    makes angels weep; who, speens,
    laugh mortal.
  LUCIO. [To ISABELLA] O, him, him, wench! relent;  
    coming; perceive 't.
  PROVOST. [Aside] Pray heaven win him.
  ISABELLA. weigh brother ourself.
    Great men jest saints: 'tis wit them;
    foul profanation.
  LUCIO. [To ISABELLA] Thou'rt i' th' right, girl; o' that.
  ISABELLA. captain's choleric word
    soldier flat blasphemy.
  LUCIO. [To ISABELLA] Art avis'd o' that? on't.
  ANGELO. put sayings me?
  ISABELLA. authority, err others,
    Hath kind medicine itself
    skins vice o' th' top. bosom,
    Knock there, heart doth know
    brother's fault. confess
    natural guiltiness his,
    sound thought tongue
    brother's life.
  ANGELO. [Aside] speaks, 'tis
    sense sense breeds it.- Fare well.  
  ISABELLA. Gentle lord, turn back.
  ANGELO. bethink me. to-morrow.
  ISABELLA. Hark bribe you; good lord, turn back.
  ANGELO. How, bribe me?
  ISABELLA. Ay, gifts heaven share you.
  LUCIO. [To ISABELLA) marr'd else.
  ISABELLA. fond sicles tested gold,
    stones, rate rich poor
    fancy values them; true prayers
    heaven enter there
    Ere sun-rise, prayers preserved souls,
    fasting maids, minds dedicate
    temporal.
  ANGELO. Well; to-morrow.
  LUCIO. [To ISABELLA] to; 'tis well; away.
  ISABELLA. Heaven honour safe!
  ANGELO. [Aside] Amen; I
    temptation
    prayers cross.
  ISABELLA. hour to-morrow  
    attend lordship?
  ANGELO. time 'fore noon.
  ISABELLA. Save honour!              Exeunt ANGELO
  ANGELO. thee; thy virtue!
    this, this? fault mine?
    tempter tempted, sins most?
    Ha!
    she; doth tempt; I
    That, lying violet sun,
    carrion does, flow'r,
    Corrupt virtuous season. be
    modesty betray sense
    woman's lightness? waste ground enough,
    desire raze sanctuary,
    pitch evils there? O, fie, fie, fie!
    dost thou, art thou, Angelo?
    Dost thou desire foully things
    make good? O, brother live!
    Thieves robbery authority
    judges steal themselves. What, love her,  
    desire hear speak again,
    feast eyes? is't dream on?
    O cunning enemy, that, catch saint,
    saints dost bait thy hook! dangerous
    temptation doth goad on
    sin loving virtue. strumpet,
    double vigour, art nature,
    stir temper; virtuous maid
    Subdues quite. till now,
    men fond, smil'd wond'red how.          Exit




SCENE III.
A prison

Enter, severally, DUKE, disguised FRIAR, PROVOST

  DUKE. Hail you, Provost! are.
  PROVOST. Provost. will, good friar?
  DUKE. Bound charity blest order,
    visit afflicted spirits
    prison. common right
    them, make know
    nature crimes, minister
    accordingly.
  PROVOST. that, needful.

                          Enter JULIET

    Look, one; gentlewoman mine,
    Who, falling flaws youth,
    Hath blister'd report. child;
    it, sentenc'd- young man
    fit offence  
    die this.
  DUKE. die?
  PROVOST. think, to-morrow.
    [To JULIET] provided you; stay awhile
    conducted.
  DUKE. Repent you, fair one, sin carry?
  JULIET. do; bear shame patiently.
  DUKE. teach arraign conscience,
    penitence, sound
    hollowly put on.
  JULIET. gladly learn.
  DUKE. Love man wrong'd you?
  JULIET. Yes, love woman wrong'd him.
  DUKE. then, seems, offenceful act
    mutually committed.
  JULIET. Mutually.
  DUKE. sin heavier kind his.
  JULIET. confess it, repent it, father.
  DUKE. 'Tis meet so, daughter; repent
    sin hath brought shame,  
    sorrow ourselves, heaven,
    Showing spare heaven love it,
    stand fear-
  JULIET. repent evil,
    shame joy.
  DUKE. rest.
    partner, hear, die to-morrow,
    instruction him.
    Grace you! Benedicite!                          Exit
  JULIET. die to-morrow! O, injurious law,
    respites life comfort
    dying horror!
  PROVOST. 'Tis pity him.                              Exeunt




SCENE IV.
ANGELO'S house

Enter ANGELO

  ANGELO. pray think, pray
    subjects. Heaven hath empty words,
    Whilst invention, hearing tongue,
    Anchors Isabel. Heaven mouth,
    chew name,
    heart strong swelling evil
    conception. state whereon studied
    Is, good thing read,
    Grown sere tedious; yea, gravity,
    Wherein- man hear me- pride,
    boot change idle plume
    air beats vain. O place, O form,
    dost thou thy case, thy habit,
    Wrench awe fools, tie wiser souls
    thy false seeming! Blood, thou art blood.
    write 'good angel' devil's horn;
    'Tis devil's crest.  

                           Enter SERVANT

    now, there?
  SERVANT. Isabel, sister, desires access you.
  ANGELO. Teach way. [Exit SERVANT] O heavens!
    blood muster heart,
    Making unable itself
    dispossessing parts
    fitness?
    play foolish throngs swoons;
    him, stop air
    revive; so
    general subject well-wish'd king
    Quit part, obsequious fondness
    Crowd presence, untaught love
    offence.

                            Enter ISABELLA
  
    now, fair maid?
  ISABELLA. pleasure.
  ANGELO. me
    demand 'tis. brother live.
  ISABELLA. so! Heaven honour!
  ANGELO. live awhile, and, be,
    long I; die.
  ISABELLA. sentence?
  ANGELO. Yea.
  ISABELLA. When? beseech you; reprieve,
    Longer shorter, fitted
    soul sicken not.
  ANGELO. Ha! Fie, filthy vices! good
    pardon hath nature stol'n
    man made, remit
    saucy sweetness coin heaven's image
    stamps forbid; 'tis easy
    Falsely life true made
    put metal restrained means
    make false one.  
  ISABELLA. 'Tis set heaven, earth.
  ANGELO. so? pose quickly.
    rather- law
    brother's life; or, redeem him,
    Give body sweet uncleanness
    hath stain'd?
  ISABELLA. Sir, this:
    give body soul.
  ANGELO. talk soul; compell'd sins
    Stand number accompt.
  ISABELLA. you?
  ANGELO. Nay, warrant that; speak
    thing say. Answer this:
    I, voice recorded law,
    Pronounce sentence brother's life;
    charity sin
    save brother's life?
  ISABELLA. do't,
    peril soul
    sin all, charity.  
  ANGELO. Pleas'd do't peril soul,
    equal poise sin charity.
  ISABELLA. beg life, sin,
    Heaven bear it! granting suit,
    sin, make morn prayer
    added faults mine,
    answer.
  ANGELO. Nay, hear me;
    sense pursues mine; ignorant
    so, craftily; good.
  ISABELLA. ignorant, good
    graciously better.
  ANGELO. wisdom wishes bright
    doth tax itself; black masks
    Proclaim enshielded beauty ten times louder
    beauty could, display'd. mark me:
    received plain, speak gross-
    brother die.
  ISABELLA. So.
  ANGELO. offence so, appears,  
    Accountant law pain.
  ISABELLA. True.
  ANGELO. Admit save life,
    subscribe that, other,
    But, loss question, you, sister,
    Finding desir'd person
    credit judge, great place,
    fetch brother manacles
    all-binding law; were
    earthly save either
    lay treasures body
    supposed, suffer-
    do?
  ISABELLA. poor brother myself;
    is, terms death,
    Th' impression keen whips wear rubies,
    strip death bed
    longing sick for, ere yield
    body shame.
  ANGELO. brother die.  
  ISABELLA. 'twere cheaper way:
    brother died once
    sister, redeeming him,
    die ever.
  ANGELO. you, then, cruel sentence
    slander'd so?
  ISABELLA. Ignominy ransom free pardon
    houses: lawful mercy
    kin foul redemption.
  ANGELO. seem'd late make law tyrant;
    prov'd sliding brother
    merriment vice.
  ISABELLA. O, pardon me, lord! oft falls out,
    have, speak mean:
    excuse thing hate
    advantage dearly love.
  ANGELO. frail.
  ISABELLA. brother die,
    fedary he
    Owe succeed thy weakness.  
  ANGELO. Nay, women frail too.
  ISABELLA. Ay, glasses view themselves,
    easy broke make forms.
    Women, heaven! Men creation mar
    profiting them. Nay, call ten times frail;
    soft complexions are,
    credulous false prints.
  ANGELO. well;
    testimony sex,
    suppose made stronger
    faults shake frames, bold.
    arrest words. are,
    is, woman; more, none;
    one, express'd
    external warrants, show now
    putting destin'd livery.
  ISABELLA. tongue one; gentle, lord,
    intreat speak language.
  ANGELO. Plainly conceive, love you.
  ISABELLA. brother love Juliet,  
    die for't.
  ANGELO. not, Isabel, give love.
  ISABELLA. virtue hath license in't,
    fouler is,
    pluck others.
  ANGELO. me, mine honour,
    words express purpose.
  ISABELLA. Ha! honour believ'd,
    pernicious purpose! Seeming, seeming!
    proclaim thee, Angelo, for't.
    Sign present pardon brother
    Or, outstretch'd throat, world aloud
    man thou art.
  ANGELO. thee, Isabel?
    unsoil'd name, th' austereness life,
    vouch you, place i' th' state,
    accusation overweigh
    stifle report,
    smell calumny. begun,
    give sensual race rein:  
    Fit thy consent sharp appetite;
    Lay nicety prolixious blushes
    banish sue for; redeem thy brother
    yielding thy body will;
    die death,
    thy unkindness death draw out
    ling'ring sufferance. Answer to-morrow,
    Or, affection guides most,
    prove tyrant him. you,
    can: false o'erweighs true.        Exit
  ISABELLA. complain? this,
    me? O perilous mouths
    bear self-same tongue
    condemnation approof,
    Bidding law make curtsy will;
    Hooking wrong th' appetite,
    follow draws! brother.
    hath fall'n prompture blood,
    hath mind honour
    That, twenty heads tender  
    twenty bloody blocks, yield up
    sister body stoop
    abhorr'd pollution.
    Then, Isabel, live chaste, and, brother, die:
    brother chastity.
    Angelo's request,
    fit mind death, soul's rest.         Exit

ACT III. SCENE I.
The prison

Enter DUKE, disguised before, CLAUDIO, PROVOST

  DUKE. So, hope pardon Lord Angelo?
  CLAUDIO. miserable medicine
    hope:
    hope Eve, prepar'd die.
  DUKE. absolute death; death life
    sweeter. Reason life.
    lose thee, lose thing
    fools keep. breath thou art,
    Servile skyey influences,
    dost habitation thou keep'st
    Hourly afflict. Merely, thou art Death's fool;
    thou labour'st thy flight shun
    run'st still. Thou art noble;
    th' accommodations thou bear'st
    nurs'd baseness. Thou 'rt means valiant;
    thou dost fear soft tender fork
    poor worm. Thy rest sleep,  
    thou oft provok'st; grossly fear'st
    Thy death, more. Thou art thyself;
    thou exists thousand grains
    issue dust. Happy thou art not;
    thou hast not, thou striv'st get,
    thou hast, forget'st. Thou art certain;
    thy complexion shifts strange effects,
    moon. thou art rich, thou'rt poor;
    For, ass back ingots bows,
    Thou bear'st thy heavy riches journey,
    Death unloads thee. Friend hast thou none;
    thine bowels call thee sire,
    mere effusion thy proper loins,
    curse gout, serpigo, rheum,
    ending thee sooner. Thou hast youth age,
    But, were, after-dinner's sleep,
    Dreaming both; thy blessed youth
    aged, doth beg alms
    palsied eld; thou art rich,
    Thou hast heat, affection, limb, beauty,  
    make thy riches pleasant. this
    bears life? life
    Lie hid moe thousand deaths; death fear,
    makes odds even.
  CLAUDIO. humbly you.
    sue live, find seek die;
    And, seeking death, find life. on.
  ISABELLA. [Within] What, ho! Peace here; grace good company!
  PROVOST. there? in; deserves welcome.
  DUKE. Dear sir, ere long visit again.
  CLAUDIO. holy sir, you.

                        Enter ISABELLA

  ISABELLA. business word Claudio.
  PROVOST. welcome. Look, signior, sister.
  DUKE. Provost, word you.
  PROVOST. please.
  DUKE. Bring hear speak, conceal'd.
                                         Exeunt DUKE PROVOST  
  CLAUDIO. Now, sister, comfort?
  ISABELLA. Why,
    comforts are; good, good, indeed.
    Lord Angelo, affairs heaven,
    Intends swift ambassador,
    everlasting leiger.
    Therefore, appointment make speed;
    To-morrow set on.
  CLAUDIO. remedy?
  ISABELLA. None, remedy as, save head,
    cleave heart twain.
  CLAUDIO. any?
  ISABELLA. Yes, brother, live:
    devilish mercy judge,
    implore it, free life,
    fetter till death.
  CLAUDIO. Perpetual durance?
  ISABELLA. Ay, just; perpetual durance, restraint,
    world's vastidity had,
    determin'd scope.  
  CLAUDIO. nature?
  ISABELLA. as, consenting to't,
    bark honour trunk bear,
    leave naked.
  CLAUDIO. point.
  ISABELLA. O, fear thee, Claudio; quake,
    thou feverous life shouldst entertain,
    winters respect
    perpetual honour. Dar'st thou die?
    sense death apprehension;
    poor beetle tread upon
    corporal sufferance finds pang great
    giant dies.
  CLAUDIO. give shame?
    resolution fetch
    flow'ry tenderness? die,
    encounter darkness bride
    hug mine arms.
  ISABELLA. spake brother; father's grave
    utter voice. Yes, thou die:  
    Thou art noble conserve life
    base appliances. outward-sainted deputy,
    settled visage deliberate word
    Nips youth i' th' head, follies doth enew
    falcon doth fowl, devil;
    filth cast, appear
    pond deep hell.
  CLAUDIO. precise Angelo!
  ISABELLA. O, 'tis cunning livery hell
    damned'st body invest cover
    precise guards! Dost thou think, Claudio,
    yield virginity
    Thou mightst freed?
  CLAUDIO. O heavens! be.
  ISABELLA. Yes, give't thee, rank offence,
    offend still. night's time
    abhor name,
    thou diest to-morrow.
  CLAUDIO. Thou shalt do't.
  ISABELLA. O, life!  
    throw deliverance
    frankly pin.
  CLAUDIO. Thanks, dear Isabel.
  ISABELLA. ready, Claudio, death to-morrow.
  CLAUDIO. Yes. affections him
    make bite law th' nose
    force it? sin;
    deadly least.
  ISABELLA. least?
  CLAUDIO. damnable, wise,
    momentary trick
    perdurably fin'd?- O Isabel!
  ISABELLA. brother?
  CLAUDIO. Death fearful thing.
  ISABELLA. shamed life hateful.
  CLAUDIO. Ay, die, where;
    lie cold obstruction, rot;
    warm motion become
    kneaded clod; delighted spirit
    bathe fiery floods reside  
    thrilling region thick-ribbed ice;
    imprison'd viewless winds,
    blown restless violence round about
    pendent world; worse worst
    lawless incertain thought
    Imagine howling- 'tis horrible.
    weariest loathed worldly life
    age, ache, penury, imprisonment,
    lay nature paradise
    fear death.
  ISABELLA. Alas, alas!
  CLAUDIO. Sweet sister, live.
    sin save brother's life,
    Nature dispenses deed far
    virtue.
  ISABELLA. O beast!
    O faithless coward! O dishonest wretch!
    Wilt thou made man vice?
    Is't kind incest life
    thine sister's shame? think?  
    Heaven shield mother play'd father fair!
    warped slip wilderness
    Ne'er issu'd blood. defiance;
    Die; perish. bending down
    Reprieve thee thy fate, proceed.
    pray thousand prayers thy death,
    word save thee.
  CLAUDIO. Nay, hear me, Isabel.
  ISABELLA. O fie, fie, fie!
    Thy sin's accidental, trade.
    Mercy thee prove bawd;
    'Tis thou diest quickly.
  CLAUDIO. O, hear me, Isabella.

                            Re-enter DUKE

  DUKE. Vouchsafe word, young sister, word.
  ISABELLA. will?
  DUKE. dispense leisure, have
    speech you; satisfaction require  
    likewise benefit.
  ISABELLA. superfluous leisure; stay stolen out
    affairs; attend awhile.
                                                   [Walks apart]
  DUKE. Son, overheard hath pass'd your
    sister. Angelo purpose corrupt her; hath
    made assay virtue practise judgment the
    disposition natures. She, truth honour her,
    hath made gracious denial glad to
    receive. confessor Angelo, true;
    prepare death. satisfy your
    resolution hopes fallible; to-morrow die;
    knees make ready.
  CLAUDIO. sister pardon. love life
    sue rid it.
  DUKE. Hold there. Farewell. [Exit CLAUDIO] Provost, word with
    you.

                          Re-enter PROVOST
  
  PROVOST. will, father?
  DUKE. That, come, gone. Leave while
    maid; mind promises habit loss touch
    company.
  PROVOST. good time.                            Exit PROVOST
  DUKE. hand hath made fair hath made good; the
    goodness cheap beauty makes beauty goodness;
    grace, soul complexion, body
    fair. assault Angelo hath made you,
    fortune hath convey'd understanding; and, frailty
    hath examples falling, Angelo. How
    content substitute, save brother?
  ISABELLA. resolve him; brother
    die law son unlawfully born. But, O, how
    good Duke deceiv'd Angelo! return, and
    speak him, open lips vain, discover his
    government.
  DUKE. amiss; yet, matter stands,
    avoid accusation: made trial only.
    fasten ear advisings; love  
    good remedy presents itself. make believe
    uprighteously poor wronged lady merited
    benefit; redeem brother angry law; stain to
    gracious person; absent Duke, if
    peradventure return hearing this
    business.
  ISABELLA. hear speak farther; spirit do
    appears foul truth spirit.
  DUKE. Virtue bold, goodness fearful. not
    heard speak Mariana, sister Frederick, great
    soldier miscarried sea?
  ISABELLA. heard lady, good words her
    name.
  DUKE. Angelo married; affianced by
    oath, nuptial appointed; time the
    contract limit solemnity brother Frederick was
    wreck'd sea, perished vessel dowry his
    sister. mark heavily befell poor gentlewoman:
    lost noble renowned brother, love toward
    kind natural; portion sinew  
    fortune, marriage-dowry; both, combinate
    husband, well-seeming Angelo.
  ISABELLA. so? Angelo leave her?
  DUKE. Left tears, dried his
    comfort; swallowed vows whole, pretending discoveries
    dishonour; few, bestow'd lamentation, which
    wears sake; he, marble tears, is
    washed them, relents not.
  ISABELLA. merit death poor maid from
    world! corruption life man
    live! avail?
  DUKE. rupture easily heal; cure it
    saves brother, dishonour in
    it.
  ISABELLA. Show how, good father.
  DUKE. forenamed maid hath continuance her
    affection; unjust unkindness, reason should
    quenched love, hath, impediment current,
    made violent unruly. Angelo; answer his
    requiring plausible obedience; agree demands  
    point; refer advantage: first, that
    stay long; time all
    shadow silence it; place answer convenience.
    granted course- all: shall
    advise wronged maid stead appointment, your
    place. encounter acknowledge hereafter, may
    compel recompense; here, this, brother
    saved, honour untainted, poor Mariana advantaged, and
    corrupt deputy scaled. maid frame make fit for
    attempt. carry may, the
    doubleness benefit defends deceit reproof. What
    it?
  ISABELLA. image content already; trust it
    grow prosperous perfection.
  DUKE. lies holding up. Haste speedily to
    Angelo; night entreat bed, give him
    promise satisfaction. presently Saint Luke's; there,
    moated grange, resides dejected Mariana. that
    place call me; dispatch Angelo, be
    quickly.  
  ISABELLA. comfort. Fare well, good father.
                                                Exeunt severally




Scene II.
The street prison

Enter, side, DUKE disguised before; other, ELBOW,
and OFFICERS POMPEY

  ELBOW. Nay, remedy it, needs
    buy sell men women beasts, the
    world drink brown white bastard.
  DUKE. O heavens! stuff here?
  POMPEY. 'Twas merry world since, usuries, merriest
    put down, worser allow'd order law furr'd
    gown warm; furr'd fox lamb-skins too, to
    signify craft, richer innocency, stands the
    facing.
  ELBOW. way, sir. Bless you, good father friar.
  DUKE. you, good brother father. offence hath man made
    you, sir?
  ELBOW. Marry, sir, hath offended law; and, sir, him
    thief too, sir, found him, sir, a
    strange picklock, deputy.
  DUKE. Fie, sirrah, bawd, wicked bawd!  
    evil thou causest done,
    thy means live. thou think
    'tis cram maw clothe back
    filthy vice; thyself
    'From abominable beastly touches
    drink, eat, array myself, live.'
    Canst thou thy living life,
    stinkingly depending? mend, mend.
  POMPEY. Indeed, stink sort, sir; yet, sir,
    prove-
  DUKE. Nay, devil thee proofs sin,
    Thou wilt prove his. prison, officer;
    Correction instruction work
    Ere rude beast profit.
  ELBOW. deputy, sir; warning.
    deputy abide whoremaster; whoremonger,
    him, good mile errand.
  DUKE. all, be,
    faults, faults seeming, free.
  ELBOW. neck waist- cord, sir.  

                          Enter LUCIO

  POMPEY. spy comfort; cry bail. gentleman, friend
    mine.
  LUCIO. now, noble Pompey! What, wheels Caesar? Art
    thou led triumph? What, Pygmalion's images,
    newly made woman, putting hand the
    pocket extracting clutch'd? reply, ha? say'st
    thou tune, matter, method? Is't drown'd i' th'
    rain, ha? say'st thou, trot? world was,
    man? way? sad, words? how? The
    trick it?
  DUKE. thus, thus; worse!
  LUCIO. doth dear morsel, thy mistress? Procures still,
    ha?
  POMPEY. Troth, sir, hath eaten beef, is
    tub.
  LUCIO. Why, 'tis good; it; so; ever
    fresh whore powder'd bawd- unshunn'd  
    consequence; so. Art prison, Pompey?
  POMPEY. Yes, faith, sir.
  LUCIO. Why, 'tis amiss, Pompey. Farewell; go, thee
    thither. debt, Pompey- how?
  ELBOW. bawd, bawd.
  LUCIO. Well, then, imprison him. imprisonment due a
    bawd, why, 'tis right. Bawd doubtless, of
    antiquity, too; bawd-born. Farewell, good Pompey. Commend to
    prison, Pompey. turn good husband now, Pompey; you
    house.
  POMPEY. hope, sir, good worship bail.
  LUCIO. No, indeed, not, Pompey; wear. will
    pray, Pompey, increase bondage. not
    patiently, why, mettle more. Adieu trusty Pompey.
    Bless you, friar.
  DUKE. you.
  LUCIO. Bridget paint still, Pompey, ha?
  ELBOW. ways, sir; come.
  POMPEY. bail then, sir?
  LUCIO. Then, Pompey, now. news abroad, friar? news?  
  ELBOW. ways, sir; come.
  LUCIO. kennel, Pompey, go.

                               Exeunt ELBOW, POMPEY OFFICERS

    news, friar, Duke?
  DUKE. none. any?
  LUCIO. Emperor Russia; some, is
    Rome; he, you?
  DUKE. where; wheresoever, well.
  LUCIO. mad fantastical trick steal the
    state usurp beggary born to. Lord Angelo
    dukes absence; puts transgression to't.
  DUKE. in't.
  LUCIO. lenity lechery harm him;
    crabbed way, friar.
  DUKE. general vice, severity cure it.
  LUCIO. Yes, good sooth, vice great kindred; is
    allied; impossible extirp quite, friar, till
    eating drinking put down. Angelo  
    made man woman downright creation. it
    true, you?
  DUKE. made, then?
  LUCIO. report sea-maid spawn'd him; some, begot
    stock-fishes. makes
    water urine congeal'd ice; true. he
    motion generative; infallible.
  DUKE. pleasant, sir, speak apace.
  LUCIO. Why, ruthless thing him, rebellion
    codpiece life man! Duke that
    absent this? Ere hang'd man the
    hundred bastards, paid nursing a
    thousand. feeling sport; knew service,
    instructed mercy.
  DUKE. heard absent Duke detected women; was
    inclin'd way.
  LUCIO. O, sir, deceiv'd.
  DUKE. 'Tis possible.
  LUCIO. Who- Duke? Yes, beggar fifty; use
    put ducat clack-dish. Duke crotchets  
    him. drunk too; inform you.
  DUKE. wrong, surely.
  LUCIO. Sir, his. shy fellow Duke; and
    withdrawing.
  DUKE. What, prithee, cause?
  LUCIO. No, pardon; 'tis secret lock'd teeth
    lips; understand: greater file
    subject held Duke wise.
  DUKE. Wise? Why, question was.
  LUCIO. superficial, ignorant, unweighing fellow.
  DUKE. envy you, folly, mistaking; very
    stream life, business hath helmed, must, a
    warranted need, give proclamation. but
    testimonied bringings-forth, to
    envious scholar, statesman, soldier. you
    speak unskilfully; or, knowledge more, much
    dark'ned malice.
  LUCIO. Sir, him, love him.
  DUKE. Love talks knowledge, knowledge dearer
    love.  
  LUCIO. Come, sir, know.
  DUKE. that, speak.
    But, Duke return, prayers may, me
    desire make answer him. honest you
    spoke, courage maintain it; bound call
    you; pray name?
  LUCIO. Sir, Lucio, Duke.
  DUKE. better, sir, live report you.
  LUCIO. fear not.
  DUKE. O, hope Duke return more; imagine me
    unhurtful opposite. But, indeed, harm:
    forswear again.
  LUCIO. hang'd first. Thou art deceiv'd me, friar. no
    this. Canst thou Claudio die to-morrow no?
  DUKE. die, sir?
  LUCIO. Why? filling bottle tun-dish. Duke
    talk return'd again. ungenitur'd agent will
    unpeople province continency; sparrows build in
    house-eaves lecherous. Duke would
    dark deeds darkly answered; bring  
    light. return'd! Marry, Claudio condemned
    untrussing. Farewell, good friar; prithee pray me. The
    Duke, thee again, eat mutton Fridays. not
    past yet; and, thee, mouth beggar
    smelt brown bread garlic. so.
    Farewell.                                               Exit
  DUKE. greatness mortality
    censure scape; back-wounding calumny
    whitest virtue strikes. king strong
    tie gall slanderous tongue?
    here?

             Enter ESCALUS, PROVOST, OFFICERS with
                           MISTRESS OVERDONE

  ESCALUS. Go, prison.
  MRS. OVERDONE. Good lord, good me; honour is
    accounted merciful man; good lord.
  ESCALUS. Double treble admonition, forfeit the
    kind! make mercy swear play tyrant.  
  PROVOST. bawd eleven years' continuance, your
    honour.
  MRS. OVERDONE. lord, Lucio's information me.
    Mistress Kate Keepdown child Duke's time;
    promis'd marriage. child year quarter old
    Philip Jacob; myself; goes
    abuse me.
  ESCALUS. fellow fellow license. call'd
    us. prison. to; words. [Exeunt
    OFFICERS MISTRESS OVERDONE]  Provost, brother Angelo will
    alter'd: Claudio die to-morrow. furnish'd
    divines, charitable preparation. brother
    wrought pity, him.
  PROVOST. you, friar hath him, advis'd
    th' entertainment death.
  ESCALUS. Good even, good father.
  DUKE. Bliss goodness you!
  ESCALUS. you?
  DUKE. country, chance now
    time. brother  
    gracious order, late See
    special business Holiness.
  ESCALUS. news abroad i' th' world?
  DUKE. None, great fever goodness the
    dissolution cure it. Novelty request; and,
    is, dangerous aged kind is
    virtuous constant undertakeing. scarce
    truth alive make societies secure; security enough
    make fellowships accurst. riddle runs the
    wisdom world. news enough, every
    day's news. pray you, sir, disposition Duke?
  ESCALUS. that, strifes, contended to
    himself.
  DUKE. pleasure to?
  ESCALUS. rejoicing merry merry at
    profess'd make rejoice; gentleman all
    temperance. leave events, prayer they
    prove prosperous; desire find
    Claudio prepar'd. made understand lent him
    visitation.  
  DUKE. professes received sinister measure his
    judge, willingly humbles determination of
    justice. framed himself, instruction his
    frailty, deceiving promises life; I, good
    leisure, discredited him, resolv'd die.
  ESCALUS. paid heavens function, prisoner
    debt calling. labour'd poor
    gentleman extremest shore modesty; brother
    justice found severe hath forc'd him
    Justice.
  DUKE. life answer straitness proceeding, it
    well; chance fail, hath
    sentenc'd himself.
  ESCALUS. visit prisoner. Fare well.
  DUKE. Peace you!            Exeunt ESCALUS PROVOST

         sword heaven bear
         holy severe;
         Pattern know,
         Grace stand, virtue go;  
         paying
         self-offences weighing.
         Shame cruel striking
         Kills faults liking!
         treble shame Angelo,
         weed vice grow!
         O, man hide,
         angel outward side!
         likeness, made crimes,
         Make practice times,
         draw idle spiders' strings
         ponderous substantial things!
         Craft vice apply.
         Angelo to-night lie
         betrothed despised;
         disguise shall, th' disguised,
         Pay falsehood false exacting,
         perform contracting.                    Exit




Act IV. Scene I.
The moated grange Saint Duke's

Enter MARIANA; BOY singing

                             SONG

           Take, O, lips away,
             sweetly forsworn;
           eyes, break day,
             Lights mislead morn;
           kisses bring again, bring again;
           Seals love, seal'd vain, seal'd vain.

                  Enter DUKE, disguised before

  MARIANA. Break thy song, haste thee quick away;
    man comfort, advice
    Hath still'd brawling discontent.          Exit BOY
    cry mercy, sir, wish
    found musical.
    excuse me, so,  
    mirth displeas'd, pleas'd woe.
  DUKE. 'Tis good; music oft hath charm
    make bad good good provoke harm.
    pray hath inquir'd to-day. Much
    time promis'd meet.
  MARIANA. inquir'd after; sat day.

                         Enter ISABELLA

  DUKE. constantly you. time now. I
    crave forbearance little. call upon
    anon, advantage yourself.
  MARIANA. bound you.                        Exit
  DUKE. met, come.
    news good deputy?
  ISABELLA. hath garden circummur'd brick,
    western side vineyard back'd;
    vineyard planched gate
    makes opening bigger key;
    doth command door  
    vineyard garden leads.
    made promise
    heavy middle night
    call him.
  DUKE. knowledge find way?
  ISABELLA. ta'en due wary note upon't;
    whispering guilty diligence,
    action precept, show me
    o'er.
  DUKE. tokens
    'greed observance?
  ISABELLA. No, none, repair i' th' dark;
    possess'd stay
    brief; made know
    servant along,
    stays me; persuasion is
    brother.
  DUKE. 'Tis borne up.
    made Mariana
    word this. ho, within! forth.  

                       Re-enter MARIANA

    pray acquainted maid;
    good.
  ISABELLA. desire like.
  DUKE. persuade respect you?
  MARIANA. Good friar, do, found it.
  DUKE. Take, then, companion hand,
    hath story ready ear.
    attend leisure; make haste;
    vaporous night approaches.
  MARIANA. Will't walk aside?
                                     Exeunt MARIANA ISABELLA
  DUKE. O place greatness! Millions false eyes
    stuck thee. Volumes report
    Run false, contrarious quest
    thy doings. Thousand escapes wit
    Make thee father idle dream,
    rack thee fancies.  

                 Re-enter MARIANA ISABELLA

    Welcome, agreed?
  ISABELLA. enterprise her, father,
    advise it.
  DUKE. consent,
    entreaty too.
  ISABELLA. say,
    depart him, but, soft low,
    'Remember brother.'
  MARIANA. Fear not.
  DUKE. Nor, gentle daughter, fear all.
    husband pre-contract.
    bring 'tis sin,
    Sith justice title him
    Doth flourish deceit. Come, go;
    corn's reap, tithe's sow.       Exeunt




SCENE II.
The prison

Enter PROVOST POMPEY

  PROVOST. hither, sirrah. cut man's head?
  POMPEY. man bachelor, sir, can; a
    married man, wife's head, cut a
    woman's head.
  PROVOST. Come, sir, leave snatches yield direct
    answer. To-morrow morning die Claudio Barnardine. Here
    prison common executioner, office lacks a
    helper; assist him, redeem
    gyves; not, full time of
    imprisonment, deliverance unpitied whipping, for
    notorious bawd.
  POMPEY. Sir, unlawful bawd time mind; yet
    content lawful hangman. glad to
    receive instructions fellow partner.
  PROVOST. ho, Abhorson! Abhorson there?

                          Enter ABHORSON  

  ABHORSON. call, sir?
  PROVOST. Sirrah, fellow to-morrow your
    execution. meet, compound year,
    abide you; not, present,
    dismiss him. plead estimation you; hath
    bawd.
  ABHORSON. bawd, sir? Fie him! discredit mystery.
  PROVOST. to, sir; weigh equally; feather turn the
    scale.                                                  Exit
  POMPEY. Pray, sir, good favour- surely, sir, good
    favour hanging look- call,
    sir, occupation mystery?
  ABHORSON. Ay, sir; mystery.
  POMPEY. Painting, sir, heard say, mystery; your
    whores, sir, members occupation, painting, do
    prove occupation mystery; mystery be
    hanging, hang'd, imagine.
  ABHORSON. Sir, mystery.
  POMPEY. Proof?  
  ABHORSON. true man's apparel fits thief: too
    thief, true man thinks big enough; it
    big thief, thief thinks enough; so
    true man's apparel fits thief.

                          Re-enter PROVOST

  PROVOST. agreed?
  POMPEY. Sir, serve him; find hangman more
    penitent trade bawd; doth oftener forgiveness.
  PROVOST. You, sirrah, provide block axe to-morrow
    o'clock.
  ABHORSON. on, bawd; instruct thee trade; follow.
  POMPEY. desire learn, sir; hope, occasion
    turn, find yare; truly,
    sir, kindness owe good turn.
  PROVOST. Call Barnardine Claudio.
                                      Exeunt ABHORSON POMPEY
    Th' pity; jot other,
    murderer, brother.  

                           Enter CLAUDIO

    Look, warrant, Claudio, thy death;
    'Tis dead midnight, to-morrow
    Thou made immortal. Barnardine?
  CLAUDIO. fast lock'd sleep guiltless labour
    lies starkly traveller's bones.
    wake.
  PROVOST. good him?
    Well, go, prepare yourself. [Knocking within] hark, what
      noise?
    Heaven give spirits comfort!               Exit CLAUDIO
    [Knocking continues] by.
    hope pardon reprieve
    gentle Claudio.

                 Enter DUKE, disguised before

    Welcome, father.  
  DUKE. wholesom'st spirits night
    Envelop you, good Provost! call'd late?
  PROVOST. None, curfew rung.
  DUKE. Isabel?
  PROVOST. No.
  DUKE. then, ere't long.
  PROVOST. comfort Claudio?
  DUKE. hope.
  PROVOST. bitter deputy.
  DUKE. so, so; life parallel'd
    stroke line great justice;
    doth holy abstinence subdue
    spurs pow'r
    qualify others. meal'd that
    corrects, tyrannous;
    so, just. [Knocking within] they
      come.                                         Exit PROVOST
    gentle provost; seldom when
    steeled gaoler friend men. [Knocking within]
    now, noise! spirit's possess'd haste  
    wounds th' unsisting postern strokes.

                        Re-enter PROVOST

  PROVOST. stay officer
    Arise in; call'd up.
  DUKE. countermand Claudio yet
    die to-morrow?
  PROVOST. None, sir, none.
  DUKE. dawning, Provost, is,
    hear ere morning.
  PROVOST. Happily
    know; comes
    countermand; we.
    Besides, siege justice,
    Lord Angelo hath public ear
    Profess'd contrary.

                         Enter MESSENGER  
    lordship's man.
  DUKE. Claudio's pardon.
  MESSENGER. lord hath note; further
    charge, swerve smallest article it,
    time, matter, circumstance. Good morrow; for
    it, day.
  PROVOST. obey him.                      Exit MESSENGER
  DUKE. [Aside] pardon, purchas'd sin
    pardoner in;
    hath offence quick celerity,
    borne high authority.
    vice makes mercy, mercy's extended
    fault's love th' offender friended.
    Now, sir, news?
  PROVOST. told you: Lord Angelo, belike thinking remiss mine
    office, awakens unwonted putting-on; methinks
    strangely, hath us'd before.
  DUKE. Pray you, hear.
  PROVOST. [Reads] 'Whatsoever hear contrary, let
    Claudio executed clock, and, afternoon,  
    Barnardine. satisfaction, Claudio's
    head five. duly performed, thought
    depends deliver. fail not
    office, answer peril.'
    this, sir?
  DUKE. Barnardine executed th'
    afternoon?
  PROVOST. Bohemian born; nurs'd bred.
    prisoner years old.
  DUKE. absent Duke deliver'd him
    liberty executed him? heard his
    manner so.
  PROVOST. friends wrought reprieves him; and, indeed,
    fact, till government Lord Angelo, to
    undoubted proof.
  DUKE. apparent?
  PROVOST. manifest, denied himself.
  DUKE. Hath borne penitently prison? to
    touch'd?
  PROVOST. man apprehends death dreadfully  
    drunken sleep; careless, reckless, fearless, past,
    present, come; insensible mortality desperately
    mortal.
  DUKE. advice.
  PROVOST. hear none. hath evermore liberty the
    prison; give leave escape hence, not; drunk many
    times day, days drunk. oft
    awak'd him, carry execution, show'd a
    warrant it; hath moved all.
  DUKE. anon. written brow, Provost,
    honesty constancy. read truly, ancient skill
    beguiles me; boldness cunning lay myself
    hazard. Claudio, warrant execute, no
    greater forfeit law Angelo hath sentenc'd him. To
    make understand manifested effect, crave four
    days' respite; present and
    dangerous courtesy.
  PROVOST. Pray, sir, what?
  DUKE. delaying death.
  PROVOST. Alack! it, hour limited,  
    express command, penalty, deliver head view
    Angelo? make case Claudio's, cross the
    smallest.
  DUKE. vow mine order, warrant you, instructions
    guide. Barnardine morning executed,
    head borne Angelo.
  PROVOST. Angelo hath both, discover favour.
  DUKE. O, death's great disguiser; add it. Shave
    head tie beard; desire the
    penitent bar'd death. is
    common. fall and
    good fortune, saint profess, plead against
    life.
  PROVOST. Pardon me, good father; oath.
  DUKE. sworn Duke, deputy?
  PROVOST. substitutes.
  DUKE. made offence Duke avouch
    justice dealing?
  PROVOST. likelihood that?
  DUKE. resemblance, certainty.  
    fearful, coat, integrity, persuasion, can
    ease attempt you, meant, pluck
    fears you. you, sir, hand seal of
    Duke. character, doubt not; signet is
    strange you.
  PROVOST. both.
  DUKE. contents return Duke; shall
    anon over-read pleasure, find within
    days here. thing Angelo knows
    not; day receives letters strange tenour,
    perchance Duke's death, perchance entering some
    monastery; but, chance, writ. Look, th'
    unfolding star calls shepherd. Put into
    amazement things be: difficulties but
    easy known. Call executioner, with
    Barnardine's head. give present shrift, advise
    place. amaz'd, shall
    absolutely resolve you. away; clear dawn.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE III.
The prison

Enter POMPEY

  POMPEY. acquainted house of
    profession; Mistress Overdone's own
    house, customers. First, young
    Master Rash; commodity brown paper old
    ginger, score seventeen pounds, made five
    marks ready money. Marry, ginger request,
    women dead. Master
    Caper, suit Master Threepile mercer, four
    suits peach-colour'd satin, peaches beggar.
    young Dizy, young Master Deepvow, and
    Master Copperspur, Master Starvelackey, rapier dagger
    man, young Dropheir kill'd lusty Pudding, Master
    Forthlight tilter, brave Master Shootie great
    traveller, wild Halfcan stabb'd Pots, and, think,
    forty more- great doers trade, 'for the
    Lord's sake.'
  
                            Enter ABHORSON

  ABHORSON. Sirrah, bring Barnardine hither.
  POMPEY. Master Barnardine! rise hang'd, Master
    Barnardine!
  ABHORSON. ho, Barnardine!
  BARNARDINE. [Within] pox o' throats! makes noise
    there? you?
  POMPEY. friends, sir; hangman. good, sir,
    rise put death.
  BARNARDINE. [ ] Away, rogue, away; sleepy.
  ABHORSON. awake, quickly too.
  POMPEY. Pray, Master Barnardine, awake till executed, and
    sleep afterwards.
  ABHORSON. him, fetch out.
  POMPEY. coming, sir, coming; hear straw rustle.

                             Enter BARNARDINE

  ABHORSON. axe block, sirrah?  
  POMPEY. ready, sir.
  BARNARDINE. now, Abhorson, news you?
  ABHORSON. Truly, sir, desire clap prayers;
    for, you, warrant's come.
  BARNARDINE. rogue, drinking night; not
    fitted for't.
  POMPEY. O, better, sir! drinks night is
    hanged betimes morning sleep sounder next
    day.

                  Enter DUKE, disguised before

  ABHORSON. you, sir, ghostly father.
    jest now, you?
  DUKE. Sir, induced charity, hearing hastily are
    depart, advise you, comfort you, pray with
    you.
  BARNARDINE. Friar, I; drinking hard night, and
    time prepare me, beat my
    brains billets. consent die day,  
    certain.
  DUKE. O, Sir, must; beseech you
    forward journey go.
  BARNARDINE. swear die to-day man's persuasion.
  DUKE. hear you-
  BARNARDINE. word; me, to
    ward; to-day.                  Exit
  DUKE. Unfit live die. O gravel heart!
    him, fellows; bring block.
                                      Exeunt ABHORSON POMPEY

                            Enter PROVOST

  PROVOST. Now, sir, find prisoner?
  DUKE. creature unprepar'd, unmeet death;
    transport mind is
    damnable.
  PROVOST. prison, father,
    died morning cruel fever
    Ragozine, notorious pirate,  
    man Claudio's years; beard head
    colour. omit
    reprobate till inclin'd,
    satisfy deputy visage
    Ragozine, Claudio?
  DUKE. O, 'tis accident heaven provides!
    Dispatch presently; hour draws on
    Prefix'd Angelo. done,
    command; whiles I
    Persuade rude wretch willingly die.
  PROVOST. done, good father, presently.
    Barnardine die afternoon;
    continue Claudio,
    save danger come
    alive?
  DUKE. done:
    Put secret holds, Barnardine Claudio.
    Ere sun hath made journal greeting
    generation, find
    safety manifested.  
  PROVOST. free dependant.
  DUKE. Quick, dispatch, send head Angelo.
                                                    Exit PROVOST
    write letters Angelo-
    Provost, bear them- contents
    witness home,
    that, great injunctions, bound
    enter publicly. desire
    meet consecrated fount,
    league city; thence,
    cold gradation well-balanc'd form.
    proceed Angelo.

                         Re-enter PROVOST

  PROVOST. head; carry myself.
  DUKE. Convenient it. Make swift return;
    commune things
    ear yours.
  PROVOST. make speed.                             Exit  
  ISABELLA. [ ] Peace, ho, here!
  DUKE. tongue Isabel. know
    brother's pardon hither;
    ignorant good,
    make heavenly comforts despair
    expected.

                           Enter ISABELLA

  ISABELLA. Ho, leave!
  DUKE. Good morning you, fair gracious daughter.
  ISABELLA. better, holy man.
    Hath deputy brother's pardon?
  DUKE. hath releas'd him, Isabel, world.
    head Angelo.
  ISABELLA. Nay, so.
  DUKE. other.
    Show wisdom, daughter, close patience,
  ISABELLA. O, pluck eyes!
  DUKE. admitted sight.  
  ISABELLA. Unhappy Claudio! Wretched Isabel!
    Injurious world! damned Angelo!
  DUKE. hurts profits jot;
    Forbear it, therefore; give heaven.
    Mark say, find
    syllable faithful verity.
    Duke home to-morrow. Nay, dry eyes.
    covent, confessor,
    instance. hath carried
    Notice Escalus Angelo,
    prepare meet gates,
    give pow'r. can, pace wisdom
    good path go,
    bosom wretch,
    Grace Duke, revenges heart,
    general honour.
  ISABELLA. directed you.
  DUKE. letter, then, Friar Peter give;
    'Tis Duke's return.
    Say, token, desire company  
    Mariana's house to-night. yours
    perfect withal; bring you
    Duke; head Angelo
    Accuse home home. poor self,
    combined sacred vow,
    absent. Wend letter.
    Command fretting waters eyes
    light heart; trust holy order,
    pervert course. here?

                           Enter LUCIO

  LUCIO. Good even. Friar, Provost?
  DUKE. within, sir.
  LUCIO. O pretty Isabella, pale mine heart thine eyes
    red. Thou patient. fain dine with
    water bran; dare head fill belly; one
    fruitful meal set to't. Duke be
    to-morrow. troth, Isabel, lov'd thy brother. the
    fantastical Duke dark corners home,  
    lived.                                         Exit ISABELLA
  DUKE. Sir, Duke marvellous beholding reports;
    is, lives them.
  LUCIO. Friar, thou knowest Duke do; a
    woodman thou tak'st for.
  DUKE. Well, answer day. Fare ye well.
  LUCIO. Nay, tarry; thee; thee pretty
    tales Duke.
  DUKE. told already, sir, be
    true; true, enough.
  LUCIO. wench child.
  DUKE. thing?
  LUCIO. Yes, marry, I; fain forswear it: would
    married rotten medlar.
  DUKE. Sir, company fairer honest. Rest well.
  LUCIO. troth, thee lane's end. bawdy
    talk offend you, it. Nay, friar, a
    kind burr; stick.                          Exeunt




SCENE IV.
ANGELO'S house

Enter ANGELO ESCALUS

  ESCALUS. letter hath writ hath disvouch'd other.
  ANGELO. uneven distracted manner. actions show much
    madness; pray heaven wisdom tainted! why
    meet gates, redeliver authorities there?
  ESCALUS. guess not.
  ANGELO. proclaim hour his
    ent'ring that, crave redress injustice, should
    exhibit petitions street?
  ESCALUS. shows reason that: dispatch of
     complaints; deliver devices hereafter, which
    power stand us.
  ANGELO. Well, beseech you, proclaim'd;
    Betimes i' th' morn call house;
    Give notice men sort suit
    meet him.
  ESCALUS. shall, sir; fare well.
  ANGELO. Good night.                               Exit ESCALUS  
    deed unshapes quite, makes unpregnant
    dull proceedings. deflow'red maid!
    eminent body enforc'd
    law it! tender shame
    proclaim maiden loss,
    tongue me! reason dares no;
    authority bears credent bulk
    scandal touch
    confounds breather. liv'd,
    Save riotous youth, dangerous sense,
    times ta'en revenge,
    receiving dishonour'd life
    ransom shame. liv'd!
    Alack, grace forgot,
    right; would, not.         Exit




SCENE V.
Fields town

Enter DUKE habit, Friar PETER

  DUKE. letters fit time deliver me.   [Giving letters]
    Provost purpose plot.
    matter afoot, instruction
    hold special drift;
    blench that
    doth minister. Go, call Flavius' house,
    stay; give notice
    Valentinus, Rowland, Crassus,
    bid bring trumpets gate;
    send Flavius first.
    PETER. speeded well.                  Exit FRIAR

                             Enter VARRIUS

  DUKE. thee, Varrius; thou hast made good haste.
    Come, walk. friends
    greet anon. gentle Varrius!           Exeunt




SCENE VI.
A street city gate

Enter ISABELLA MARIANA

  ISABELLA. speak indirectly loath;
    truth; accuse so,
    part. advis'd it;
    says, veil full purpose.
  MARIANA. rul'd him.
  ISABELLA. Besides, tells that, peradventure
    speak adverse side,
    strange; 'tis physic
    bitter sweet end.
  MARIANA. Friar Peter-

                         Enter FRIAR PETER

  ISABELLA. O, peace! friar come.
  PETER. Come, found stand fit,
    vantage Duke
    pass you. trumpets sounded;  
    generous gravest citizens
    hent gates, upon
    Duke ent'ring; therefore, hence, away.         Exeunt

ACT V. SCENE I.
The city gate

Enter doors DUKE, VARRIUS, LORDS; ANGELO, ESCALUS, Lucio,
PROVOST, OFFICERS, CITIZENS

  DUKE. worthy cousin, fairly met!
    faithful friend, glad you.
  ANGELO, ESCALUS. Happy return royal Grace!
  DUKE. hearty thankings both.
    made inquiry you, hear
    goodness justice soul
    yield public thanks,
    Forerunning requital.
  ANGELO. make bonds greater.
  DUKE. O, desert speaks loud; wrong it
    lock wards covert bosom,
    deserves, characters brass,
    forted residence 'gainst tooth time
    razure oblivion. Give hand.
    subject see, make know
    outward courtesies fain proclaim  
    Favours within. Come, Escalus,
    walk hand,
    good supporters you.

                 Enter FRIAR PETER ISABELLA

  PETER. time; speak loud, kneel him.
  ISABELLA. Justice, O royal Duke! Vail regard
    wrong'd- fain maid!
    O worthy Prince, dishonour eye
    throwing object
    Till heard true complaint,
    justice, justice, justice, justice.
  DUKE. Relate wrongs. what? whom? brief.
    Lord Angelo give justice;
    Reveal him.
  ISABELLA. O worthy Duke,
    bid seek redemption devil!
    Hear yourself; speak
    punish me, believ'd,  
    wring redress you. Hear me, O, hear me, here!
  ANGELO. lord, wits, fear me, firm;
    hath suitor brother,
    Cut justice-
  ISABELLA. justice!
  ANGELO. speak bitterly strange.
  ISABELLA. strange, truly, speak.
    Angelo's forsworn, strange?
    Angelo's murderer, is't strange?
    Angelo adulterous thief,
    hypocrite, virgin-violator,
    strange strange?
  DUKE. Nay, ten times strange.
  ISABELLA. truer Angelo
    true strange;
    Nay, ten times true; truth truth
    th' end reck'ning.
  DUKE. her. Poor soul,
    speaks th' infirmity sense.
  ISABELLA. O Prince! conjure thee, thou believ'st  
    comfort world,
    thou neglect opinion
    touch'd madness. Make impossible
    unlike: 'tis impossible
    one, wicked'st caitiff ground,
    shy, grave, just, absolute,
    Angelo; Angelo,
    dressings, characts, titles, forms,
    arch-villain. it, royal Prince,
    less, nothing; more,
    badness.
  DUKE. mine honesty,
    mad, other,
    madness hath oddest frame sense,
    dependency thing thing,
    e'er heard madness.
  ISABELLA. O gracious Duke,
    Harp that; banish reason
    inequality; reason serve
    make truth hid,  
    hide false true.
  DUKE. mad
    Have, sure, lack reason. say?
  ISABELLA. sister Claudio,
    Condemn'd act fornication
    lose head; condemn'd Angelo.
    I, probation sisterhood,
    brother; Lucio
    messenger-
  LUCIO. I, an't Grace.
    Claudio, desir'd her
    gracious fortune Lord Angelo
    poor brother's pardon.
  ISABELLA. he, indeed.
  DUKE. bid speak.
  LUCIO. No, good lord;
    wish'd hold peace.
  DUKE. now, then;
    Pray note it; have
    business yourself, pray heaven  
    perfect.
  LUCIO. warrant honour.
  DUKE. warrant's yourself; heed to't.
  ISABELLA. gentleman told tale.
  LUCIO. Right.
  DUKE. right; i' wrong
    speak time. Proceed.
  ISABELLA. went
    pernicious caitiff deputy.
  DUKE. madly spoken.
  ISABELLA. Pardon it;
    phrase matter.
  DUKE. Mended again. matter- proceed.
  ISABELLA. brief- set needless process by,
    persuaded, pray'd, kneel'd,
    refell'd me, replied,
    length- vile conclusion
    begin grief shame utter:
    not, gift chaste body
    concupiscible intemperate lust,  
    Release brother; and, debatement,
    sisterly remorse confutes mine honour,
    yield him. morn betimes,
    purpose surfeiting, sends warrant
    poor brother's head.
  DUKE. likely!
  ISABELLA. O true!
  DUKE. heaven, fond wretch, thou know'st thou speak'st,
    thou art suborn'd honour
    hateful practice. First, integrity
    Stands blemish; next, imports reason
    vehemency pursue
    Faults proper himself. offended,
    weigh'd thy brother himself,
    cut off. hath set on;
    Confess truth, advice
    Thou cam'st complain.
  ISABELLA. all?
    Then, O blessed ministers above,
    patience; and, ripened time,  
    Unfold evil wrapt up
    countenance! Heaven shield Grace woe,
    I, wrong'd, unbelieved go!
  DUKE. fain gone. officer!
    prison her! permit
    blasting scandalous breath fall
    us? practice.
    knew intent coming hither?
  ISABELLA. here, Friar Lodowick.
  DUKE. ghostly father, belike. Lodowick?
  LUCIO. lord, him; 'tis meddling friar.
    man; lay, lord,
    words spake Grace
    retirement, swing'd soundly.
  DUKE. Words me? This's good friar, belike!
    set wretched woman here
    substitute! friar found.
  LUCIO. yesternight, lord, friar,
    prison; saucy friar,
    scurvy fellow.  
  PETER. Blessed royal Grace!
    stood by, lord, heard
    royal ear abus'd. First, hath woman
    wrongfully accus'd substitute;
    free touch soil her
    ungot.
  DUKE. less.
    Friar Lodowick speaks of?
  PETER. man divine holy;
    scurvy, temporary meddler,
    reported gentleman;
    And, trust, man yet
    Did, vouches, misreport Grace.
  LUCIO. lord, villainously; it.
  PETER. Well, time clear himself;
    instant sick, lord,
    strange fever. mere request-
    knowledge complaint
    Intended 'gainst Lord Angelo- hither
    speak, mouth, doth  
    true false; he, oath
    probation, make full clear,
    Whensoever convented. First, woman-
    justify worthy nobleman,
    vulgarly personally accus'd-
    hear disproved eyes,
    Till confess it.
  DUKE. Good friar, hear it.         Exit ISABELLA guarded
    smile this, Lord Angelo?
    O heaven, vanity wretched fools!
    Give seats. Come, cousin Angelo;
    impartial; judge
    cause.

                     Enter MARIANA veiled

    witness, friar?
  show face, speak.
  MARIANA. Pardon, lord; show face
    husband bid me.  
  DUKE. What, married?
  MARIANA. No, lord.
  DUKE. maid?
  MARIANA. No, lord.
  DUKE. widow, then?
  MARIANA. Neither, lord.
  DUKE. Why, then; maid, widow, wife.
  LUCIO. lord, punk; neither
    maid, widow, wife.
  DUKE. Silence fellow. cause
    prattle himself.
  LUCIO. Well, lord.
  MARIANA. lord, confess ne'er married,
    confess, besides, maid.
    husband; husband
    knew me.
  LUCIO. drunk, then, lord; better.
  DUKE. benefit silence, thou wert too!
  LUCIO. Well, lord.
  DUKE. witness Lord Angelo.  
  MARIANA. to't, lord:
    accuses fornication,
    self-same manner doth accuse husband;
    charges him, lord, time
    depose mine arms,
    th' effect love.
  ANGELO. Charges moe me?
  MARIANA. know.
  DUKE. No? husband.
  MARIANA. Why, just, lord, Angelo,
    thinks ne'er knew body,
    thinks Isabel's.
  ANGELO. strange abuse. thy face.
  MARIANA. husband bids me; unmask.
                                                     [Unveiling]
    face, thou cruel Angelo,
    thou swor'st worth on;
    hand which, vow'd contract,
    fast belock'd thine; body
    match Isabel,  
    supply thee thy garden-house
    imagin'd person.
  DUKE. woman?
  LUCIO. Carnally, says.
  DUKE. Sirrah, more.
  LUCIO. Enough, lord.
  ANGELO. lord, confess woman;
    years speech marriage
    Betwixt her; broke off,
    Partly promised proportions
    short composition; chief
    reputation disvalued
    levity. time years
    spake her, her, heard her,
    faith honour.
  MARIANA. Noble Prince,
    light heaven words breath,
    sense truth truth virtue,
    affianc'd man's wife strongly
    words make vows. And, good lord,  
    Tuesday night gone, in's garden-house,
    knew wife. true,
    safety raise knees,
    confixed here,
    marble monument!
  ANGELO. smile till now.
    Now, good lord, give scope justice;
    patience touch'd. perceive
    poor informal women more
    instruments mightier member
    sets on. way, lord,
    find practice out.
  DUKE. Ay, heart;
    punish height pleasure.
    Thou foolish friar, thou pernicious woman,
    Compact gone, think'st thou thy oaths,
    swear saint,
    testimonies worth credit,
    seal'd approbation? You, Lord Escalus,
    Sit cousin; lend kind pains  
    find abuse, 'tis deriv'd.
    friar set on;
    for.
  PETER. lie here, lord! indeed
    Hath set women complaint.
    provost place abides,
    fetch him.
  DUKE. Go, instantly.                        Exit PROVOST
    you, noble well-warranted cousin,
    concerns hear matter forth,
    injuries best
    chastisement. leave you;
    stir till determin'd
    slanderers.
  ESCALUS. lord, throughly.             Exit DUKE
    Signior Lucio, knew Friar Lodowick be
    dishonest person?
  LUCIO. 'Cucullus facit monachum': honest his
    clothes; hath spoke villainous speeches the
    Duke.  
  ESCALUS. entreat abide till and
    enforce him. find friar notable
    fellow.
  LUCIO. Vienna, word.
  ESCALUS. Call Isabel again; speak with
    her. [Exit ATTENDANT] Pray you, lord, give leave to
    question; handle her.
  LUCIO. he, report.
  ESCALUS. you?
  LUCIO. Marry, sir, think, handled privately, would
    sooner confess; perchance, publicly, asham'd.

       Re-enter OFFICERS ISABELLA; PROVOST the
                    DUKE friar's habit

  ESCALUS. darkly work her.
  LUCIO. way; women light midnight.
  ESCALUS. on, mistress; gentlewoman denies that
    said.
  LUCIO. lord, rascal spoke of,  
    Provost.
  ESCALUS. good time. Speak till call upon
    you.
  LUCIO. Mum.
  ESCALUS. Come, sir; set women slander Lord
    Angelo? confess'd did.
  DUKE. 'Tis false.
  ESCALUS. How! are?
  DUKE. Respect great place! devil
    honour'd burning throne!
    Duke? 'Tis hear speak.
  ESCALUS. Duke's us; hear speak;
    speak justly.
  DUKE. Boldly, least. But, O, poor souls,
    seek lamb fox,
    Good night redress! Duke gone?
    too. Duke's unjust
    retort manifest appeal,
    put trial villain's mouth
    accuse.  
  LUCIO. rascal; spoke of.
  ESCALUS. Why, thou unreverend unhallowed friar,
    Is't thou hast suborn'd women
    accuse worthy man, but, foul mouth,
    witness proper ear,
    call villain; glance him
    th' Duke himself, tax injustice?
    hence; th' rack him! touze you
    Joint joint, purpose.
    What, 'unjust'!
  DUKE. hot; Duke
    Dare stretch finger mine he
    Dare rack own; subject not,
    provincial. business state
    Made looker-on Vienna,
    corruption boil bubble
    Till o'errun stew: laws faults,
    faults countenanc'd strong statutes
    Stand forfeits barber's shop,
    mock mark.  
  ESCALUS. Slander th' state! prison!
  ANGELO. vouch him, Signior Lucio?
    man of?
  LUCIO. 'Tis he, lord. hither, good-man bald-pate.
    me?
  DUKE. remember you, sir, sound voice. met at
    prison, absence Duke.
  LUCIO. O so? remember Duke?
  DUKE. notedly, sir.
  LUCIO. so, sir? Duke fleshmonger, fool, and
    coward, reported be?
  DUKE. must, sir, change persons ere make my
    report; you, indeed, spoke him; more, worse.
  LUCIO. O thou damnable fellow! pluck thee nose for
    thy speeches?
  DUKE. protest love Duke love myself.
  ANGELO. Hark villain close now, treasonable
    abuses!
  ESCALUS. fellow talk'd withal. to
    prison! Provost? prison! Lay bolts  
    him; speak more. giglets
    too, confederate companion!
                            [The PROVOST lays bands DUKE]
  DUKE. Stay, sir; stay awhile.
  ANGELO. What, resists he? him, Lucio.
  LUCIO. Come, sir; come, sir; come, sir; foh, sir! Why, you
    bald-pated lying rascal, hooded, you? Show your
    knave's visage, pox you! Show sheep-biting face,
    hang'd hour! Will't off?
             [Pulls FRIAR'S bood discovers DUKE]
  DUKE. Thou art knave e'er mad'st duke.
    First, Provost, bail gentle three.
    [To Lucio] Sneak away, sir, friar you
    word anon. Lay hold him.
  LUCIO. prove worse hanging.
  DUKE. [To ESCALUS] spoke pardon; sit down.
    borrow place him. [To ANGELO] Sir, leave.
    Hast thou word, wit, impudence,
    thee office? thou hast,
    Rely till tale heard,  
    hold longer out.
  ANGELO. O dread lord,
    guiltier guiltiness,
    undiscernible,
    perceive Grace, pow'r divine,
    Hath look'd passes. Then, good Prince,
    longer session hold shame,
    trial mine confession;
    sentence then, sequent death,
    grace beg.
  DUKE. hither, Mariana.
    Say, wast thou e'er contracted woman?
  ANGELO. was, lord.
  DUKE. Go, marry instantly.
    office, friar; consummate,
    Return again. him, Provost.
                Exeunt ANGELO, MARIANA, FRIAR PETER, PROVOST
  ESCALUS. lord, amaz'd dishonour
    strangeness it.
  DUKE. hither, Isabel.  
    friar prince. then
    Advertising holy business,
    changing heart habit, still
    Attorney'd service.
  ISABELLA. O, give pardon,
    I, vassal employ'd pain'd
    unknown sovereignty.
  DUKE. pardon'd, Isabel.
    now, dear maid, free us.
    brother's death, know, sits heart;
    marvel obscur'd myself,
    Labouring save life, rather
    Make rash remonstrance hidden pow'r
    lost. O kind maid,
    swift celerity death,
    slower foot on,
    brain'd purpose. peace him!
    life life, past fearing death,
    lives fear. Make comfort,
    happy brother.  
  ISABELLA. do, lord.

       Re-enter ANGELO, MARIANA, FRIAR PETER, PROVOST

  DUKE. new-married man approaching here,
    salt imagination hath wrong'd
    well-defended honour, pardon
    Mariana's sake; adjudg'd brother-
    criminal double violation
    sacred chastity promise-breach,
    Thereon dependent, brother's life-
    mercy law cries out
    audible, proper tongue,
    'An Angelo Claudio, death death!'
    Haste pays haste, leisure answers leisure;
    doth quit like, Measure Measure.
    Then, Angelo, thy fault's manifested,
    Which, thou wouldst deny, denies thee vantage.
    condemn thee block
    Claudio stoop'd death, haste.  
    him!
  MARIANA. O gracious lord,
    hope mock husband.
  DUKE. husband mock'd husband.
    Consenting safeguard honour,
    thought marriage fit; imputation,
    knew you, reproach life,
    choke good come. possessions,
    confiscation ours,
    instate widow withal
    buy husband.
  MARIANA. O dear lord,
    crave other, man.
  DUKE. crave him; definitive.
  MARIANA. Gentle liege-                           [Kneeling]
  DUKE. lose labour.
    death! [To LUCIO] Now, sir, you.
  MARIANA. O good lord! Sweet Isabel, part;
    Lend knees, life come
    lend life service.  
  DUKE. sense importune her.
    kneel mercy fact,
    brother's ghost paved bed break,
    horror.
  MARIANA. Isabel,
    Sweet Isabel, kneel me;
    Hold hands, nothing; speak all.
    men moulded faults;
    And, most, better
    bad; husband.
    O Isabel, lend knee?
  DUKE. dies Claudio's death.
  ISABELLA. [Kneeling] bounteous sir,
    Look, you, man condemn'd,
    brother liv'd. partly think
    due sincerity govern'd deeds
    Till me; so,
    die. brother justice,
    thing died;
    Angelo,  
    act o'ertake bad intent,
    buried intent
    perish'd way. Thoughts subjects;
    Intents thoughts.
  MARIANA. Merely, lord.
  DUKE. suit's unprofitable; stand up, say.
    bethought fault.
    Provost, Claudio beheaded
    unusual hour?
  PROVOST. commanded so.
  DUKE. special warrant deed?
  PROVOST. No, good lord; private message.
  DUKE. discharge office;
    Give keys.
  PROVOST. Pardon me, noble lord;
    thought fault, knew not;
    repent me, advice;
    testimony whereof, prison,
    private order died,
    reserv'd alive.  
  DUKE. he?
  PROVOST. Barnardine.
  DUKE. thou hadst Claudio.
    fetch hither; him.      Exit PROVOST
  ESCALUS. learned wise
    you, Lord Angelo, appear'd,
    slip grossly, heat blood
    lack temper'd judgment afterward.
  ANGELO. sorrow procure;
    deep sticks penitent heart
    crave death willingly mercy;
    'Tis deserving, entreat it.

       Re-enter PROVOST, BARNARDINE, CLAUDIO (muffled)
                            JULIET

  DUKE. Barnardine?
  PROVOST. This, lord.
  DUKE. friar told man.
    Sirrah, thou art stubborn soul,  
    apprehends world,
    squar'st thy life according. Thou'rt condemn'd;
    But, earthly faults, quit all,
    pray thee mercy provide
    times come. Friar, advise him;
    leave hand. muffl'd fellow's that?
  PROVOST. prisoner sav'd,
    died Claudio lost head;
    Claudio himself.    [Unmuffles CLAUDIO]
  DUKE. [To ISABELLA] brother, sake
    pardon'd; lovely sake,
    Give hand mine,
    brother too. fitter time that.
    Lord Angelo perceives safe;
    Methinks quick'ning eye.
    Well, Angelo, evil quits well.
    love wife; worth worth yours.
    find apt remission myself;
    place pardon.
    Lucio] You, sirrah, knew fool, coward,  
    luxury, ass, madman!
    deserv'd you
    extol thus?
  LUCIO. Faith, lord, spoke trick.
    hang it, may; would
    whipt.
  DUKE. Whipt first, sir, hang'd after.
    Proclaim it, Provost, round city,
    woman wrong'd lewd fellow-
    heard swear one
    begot child, appear,
    marry her. nuptial finish'd,
    whipt hang'd.
  LUCIO. beseech Highness, marry whore. Your
    Highness made duke; good lord, not
    recompense making cuckold.
  DUKE. mine honour, thou shalt marry her.
    Thy slanders forgive; therewithal
    Remit thy forfeits. prison;
    pleasure executed.  
  LUCIO. Marrying punk, lord, pressing death, whipping,
    hanging.
  DUKE. Slandering prince deserves it.
                                      Exeunt OFFICERS LUCIO
    She, Claudio, wrong'd, restore.
    Joy you, Mariana! Love her, Angelo;
    confess'd her, virtue.
    Thanks, good friend Escalus, thy goodness;
    gratulate.
    Thanks, Provost, thy care secrecy;
    employ thee worthier place.
    Forgive him, Angelo, brought home
    head Ragozine Claudio's:
    Th' offence pardons itself. Dear Isabel,
    motion imports good;
    Whereto ear incline,
    mine yours, mine.
    So, bring palace, show
    meet know.
                                                          Exeunt  

THE END

1597

THE MERCHANT VENICE

by William Shakespeare



DRAMATIS PERSONAE

  DUKE VENICE
  PRINCE MOROCCO, suitor Portia
  PRINCE ARRAGON,    "    "    "
  ANTONIO, merchant Venice
  BASSANIO, friend, suitor Portia
  SOLANIO,   friend Antonio Bassanio
  SALERIO,      "    "    "     "     "
  GRATIANO,     "    "    "     "     "
  LORENZO, love Jessica
  SHYLOCK, rich Jew
  TUBAL, Jew, friend
  LAUNCELOT GOBBO, clown, servant Shylock
  GOBBO, father Launcelot
  LEONARDO, servant Bassanio
  BALTHASAR, servant Portia
  STEPHANO,     "     "    "

  PORTIA, rich heiress
  NERISSA, waiting-maid
  JESSICA, daughter Shylock  

  Magnificoes Venice, Officers Court Justice,
    Gaoler, Servants, Attendants
