SCENE:
Venice, PORTIA'S house Belmont


ACT I. SCENE I.
Venice. street

Enter ANTONIO, SALERIO, SOLANIO

  ANTONIO. sooth, sad.
    wearies me; wearies you;
    caught it, found it, it,
    stuff 'tis made of, whereof born,
    learn;
    want-wit sadness makes me
    ado myself.
  SALERIO. mind tossing ocean;
    argosies, portly sail-
    signiors rich burghers flood,
    pageants sea-
    overpeer petty traffickers,
    curtsy them, reverence,
    fly woven wings.
  SOLANIO. me, sir, venture forth,
    part affections would
    hopes abroad.  
    Plucking grass sits wind,
    Peering maps ports, piers, roads;
    object make fear
    Misfortune ventures, doubt,
    make sad.
  SALERIO. wind, cooling broth,
    blow ague thought
    harm wind great sea.
    sandy hour-glass run
    shallows flats,
    wealthy Andrew dock'd sand,
    Vailing high top lower ribs
    kiss burial. church
    holy edifice stone,
    bethink straight dangerous rocks,
    Which, touching gentle vessel's side,
    scatter spices stream,
    Enrobe roaring waters silks,
    And, word, worth this,
    worth nothing? thought  
    this, lack thought
    thing bechanc'd make sad?
    me; Antonio
    sad merchandise.
  ANTONIO. me, no; fortune it,
    ventures bottom trusted,
    place; estate
    fortune present year;
    merchandise makes sad.
  SOLANIO. love.
  ANTONIO. Fie, fie!
  SOLANIO. love neither? sad
    merry; 'twere easy
    laugh leap merry,
    sad. Now, two-headed Janus,
    Nature hath fram'd strange fellows time:
    evermore peep eyes,
    laugh parrots bag-piper;
    vinegar aspect
    show teeth smile  
    Nestor swear jest laughable.

               Enter BASSANIO, LORENZO, GRATIANO

    Bassanio, noble kinsman,
    Gratiano Lorenzo. Fare ye well;
    leave company.
  SALERIO. stay'd till made merry,
    worthier friends prevented me.
  ANTONIO. worth dear regard.
    business calls you,
    embrace th' occasion depart.
  SALERIO. Good morrow, good lords.
  BASSANIO. Good signiors both, laugh? when.
    grow exceeding strange; so?
  SALERIO. make leisures attend yours.
                                      Exeunt SALERIO SOLANIO
  LORENZO. Lord Bassanio, found Antonio,
    leave you; dinner-time,
    pray you, mind meet.  
  BASSANIO. fail you.
  GRATIANO. well, Signior Antonio;
    respect world;
    lose buy care.
    me, marvellously chang'd.
  ANTONIO. hold world world, Gratiano-
    stage, man play part,
    mine sad one.
  GRATIANO. play fool.
    mirth laughter wrinkles come;
    liver heat wine
    heart cool mortifying groans.
    man blood warm within
    Sit grandsire cut alabaster,
    Sleep wakes, creep jaundice
    peevish? thee what, Antonio-
    love thee, 'tis love speaks-
    sort men visages
    cream mantle standing pond,
    wilful stillness entertain,  
    purpose dress'd opinion
    wisdom, gravity, profound conceit;
    'I Sir Oracle,
    ope lips dog bark.'
    O Antonio, these
    reputed wise
    nothing; when, sure,
    speak, damn ears
    Which, hearing them, call brothers fools.
    thee time.
    fish melancholy bait
    fool gudgeon, opinion.
    Come, good Lorenzo. Fare ye awhile;
    end exhortation dinner.
  LORENZO. Well, leave till dinner-time.
    dumb wise men,
    Gratiano lets speak.
  GRATIANO. Well, company years moe,
    Thou shalt sound thine tongue.
  ANTONIO. Fare well; grow talker gear.  
  GRATIANO. Thanks, i' faith, silence commendable
    neat's tongue dried, maid vendible.
                                     Exeunt GRATIANO LORENZO
  ANTONIO. now?
  BASSANIO. Gratiano speaks infinite deal nothing, than
    man Venice. reasons grains wheat hid
    in, bushels chaff: seek day ere find
    them, worth search.
  ANTONIO. Well; lady same
    swore secret pilgrimage,
    to-day promis'd of?
  BASSANIO. 'Tis unknown you, Antonio,
    disabled mine estate
    showing swelling port
    faint means grant continuance;
    make moan abridg'd
    noble rate; chief care
    fairly great debts
    time, prodigal,
    Hath left gag'd. you, Antonio,  
    owe most, money love;
    love warranty
    unburden plots purposes
    clear debts owe.
  ANTONIO. pray you, good Bassanio, it;
    stand, do,
    eye honour, assur'd
    purse, person, extremest means,
    Lie unlock'd occasions.
  BASSANIO. school-days, lost shaft,
    shot fellow self-same flight
    self-same way, advised watch,
    find forth; adventuring both
    oft found both. urge childhood proof,
    pure innocence.
    owe much; and, wilful youth,
    owe lost; please
    shoot arrow way
    shoot first, doubt,
    watch aim, find both,  
    bring hazard back again
    thankfully rest debtor first.
  ANTONIO. well, spend time
    wind love circumstance;
    doubt wrong
    making question uttermost
    made waste have.
    do
    knowledge done,
    prest it; therefore, speak.
  BASSANIO. Belmont lady richly left,
    fair and, fairer word,
    wondrous virtues. eyes
    receive fair speechless messages.
    Portia- undervalu'd
    Cato's daughter, Brutus' Portia.
    wide world ignorant worth;
    winds blow coast
    Renowned suitors, sunny locks
    Hang temples golden fleece,  
    makes seat Belmont Colchos' strond,
    Jasons quest her.
    O Antonio, means
    hold rival place them,
    mind presages thrift
    questionless fortunate.
  ANTONIO. Thou know'st fortunes sea;
    money commodity
    raise present sum; forth,
    credit Venice do;
    rack'd, uttermost,
    furnish thee Belmont fair Portia.
    presently inquire, I,
    money is; question make
    trust sake.                Exeunt





SCENE II.
Belmont. PORTIA'S house

Enter PORTIA waiting-woman, NERISSA

  PORTIA. troth, Nerissa, body aweary this
    great world.
  NERISSA. be, sweet madam, miseries the
    abundance good fortunes are; yet, aught I
    see, sick surfeit that
    starve nothing. happiness, therefore, be
    seated mean: superfluity sooner white hairs, but
    competency lives longer.
  PORTIA. Good sentences, pronounc'd.
  NERISSA. better, followed.
  PORTIA. easy good do,
    chapels churches, poor men's cottages princes'
    palaces. good divine instructions; I
    easier teach twenty good one
    twenty follow mine teaching. brain devise
    laws blood, hot temper leaps o'er cold decree;
    hare madness youth, skip o'er meshes good  
    counsel cripple. reasoning fashion to
    choose husband. O me, word 'choose'! neither
    choose refuse dislike; a
    living daughter curb'd dead father. not
    hard, Nerissa, choose one, refuse none?
  NERISSA. father virtuous, holy men death
    good inspirations; lott'ry hath
    devised chests, gold, silver, lead- whereof
    chooses meaning chooses you- doubt be
    chosen rightly rightly love. But
    warmth affection these
    princely suitors come?
  PORTIA. pray thee over-name them; thou namest them, will
    describe them; description, level my
    affection.
  NERISSA. First, Neapolitan prince.
  PORTIA. Ay, colt indeed, doth talk of
    horse; makes great appropriation good
    parts shoe himself; afear'd lady his
    mother play'd false smith.  
  NERISSA. County Palatine.
  PORTIA. doth frown, 'An will
    me, choose.' hears merry tales smiles not. fear
    prove weeping philosopher grows old, so
    full unmannerly sadness youth. married
    death's-head bone mouth of
    these. God defend two!
  NERISSA. French lord, Monsieur Le Bon?
  PORTIA. God made him, pass man. In
    truth, sin mocker, he- why, hath a
    horse Neapolitan's, bad habit of
    frowning Count Palatine; man man. a
    throstle sing falls straight a-cap'ring; fence with
    shadow; marry him, marry twenty
    husbands. despise me, forgive him; he
    love madness, requite him.
  NERISSA. Falconbridge, young baron of
    England?
  PORTIA. him, understands me,
    him: hath Latin, French, Italian,  
    court swear poor pennyworth
    English. proper man's picture; alas, can
    converse dumb-show? oddly suited! he
    bought doublet Italy, round hose France, bonnet
    Germany, behaviour everywhere.
  NERISSA. Scottish lord, neighbour?
  PORTIA. hath neighbourly charity him, borrowed
    box ear Englishman, swore pay him
    able; Frenchman surety,
    seal'd another.
  NERISSA. young German, Duke Saxony's
    nephew?
  PORTIA. vilely morning sober; most
    vilely afternoon drunk. best, is
    worse man, worst, little
    beast. worst fall fell, hope I
    make shift him.
  NERISSA. offer choose, choose casket,
    refuse perform father's will, should
    refuse accept him.  
  PORTIA. Therefore, fear worst, pray thee set deep
    glass Rhenish wine contrary casket; devil be
    temptation without, choose it. I
    anything, Nerissa, ere married sponge.
  NERISSA. fear, lady, lords;
    acquainted determinations, is
    return home, trouble more
    suit, won sort father's
    imposition, depending caskets.
  PORTIA. live Sibylla, die chaste as
    Diana, obtained manner father's will. I
    glad parcel wooers reasonable; not
    dote absence, pray God
    grant fair departure.
  NERISSA. remember, lady, father's time, a
    Venetian, scholar soldier, company of
    Marquis Montferrat?
  PORTIA. Yes, yes, Bassanio; think, call'd.
  NERISSA. True, madam; he, men foolish eyes
    look'd upon, deserving fair lady.  
  PORTIA. remember well, remember worthy thy
    praise.

                         Enter SERVINGMAN

    now! news?
  SERVINGMAN. strangers seek you, madam, their
    leave; forerunner fifth, Prince of
    Morocco, brings word Prince master here
    to-night.
  PORTIA. bid good heart I
    bid farewell, glad his
    approach; condition saint complexion
    devil, shrive wive me.
    Come, Nerissa. Sirrah, before.
    Whiles shut gate wooer, knocks the
      door.                                               Exeunt




SCENE III.
Venice. public place

Enter BASSANIO SHYLOCK Jew

  SHYLOCK. thousand ducats- well.
  BASSANIO. Ay, sir, months.
  SHYLOCK. months- well.
  BASSANIO. which, told you, Antonio bound.
  SHYLOCK. Antonio bound- well.
  BASSANIO. stead me? pleasure me? your
    answer?
  SHYLOCK. thousand ducats months, Antonio bound.
  BASSANIO. answer that.
  SHYLOCK. Antonio good man.
  BASSANIO. heard imputation contrary?
  SHYLOCK. Ho, no, no, no, no; meaning good man
    understand sufficient; means
    supposition: hath argosy bound Tripolis, another
    Indies; understand, moreover, Rialto, hath a
    Mexico, fourth England- ventures he
    hath, squand'red abroad. ships boards, sailors  
    men; land-rats water-rats, water-thieves and
    land-thieves- pirates; peril of
    waters, winds, rocks. man is, notwithstanding,
    sufficient. thousand ducats- bond.
  BASSANIO. assur'd may.
  SHYLOCK. assur'd may; and, assured, I
    bethink me. speak Antonio?
  BASSANIO. dine us.
  SHYLOCK. Yes, smell pork, eat habitation your
    prophet, Nazarite, conjured devil into! buy with
    you, sell you, talk you, walk you, so
    following; eat you, drink you, pray
    you. news Rialto? here?

                            Enter ANTONIO

  BASSANIO. Signior Antonio.
  SHYLOCK.  [Aside]  fawning publican looks!
    hate Christian;
    low simplicity  
    lends money gratis, brings down
    rate usance Venice.
    catch hip,
    feed fat ancient grudge bear him.
    hates sacred nation; rails,
    merchants congregate,
    me, bargains, well-won thrift,
    calls interest. Cursed tribe
    forgive him!
  BASSANIO. Shylock, hear?
  SHYLOCK. debating present store,
    And, guess memory,
    instantly raise gross
    full thousand ducats. that?
    Tubal, wealthy Hebrew tribe,
    furnish me. soft! months
    desire?  [To ANTONIO]  Rest fair, good signior;
    worship man mouths.
  ANTONIO. Shylock, albeit lend borrow
    taking giving excess,  
    Yet, supply ripe friend,
    break custom.  [To BASSANIO]  possess'd
    ye would?
  SHYLOCK. Ay, ay, thousand ducats.
  ANTONIO. months.
  SHYLOCK. forgot- months; told so.
    then, bond; and, see- hear you,
    Methoughts lend borrow
    advantage.
  ANTONIO. it.
  SHYLOCK. Jacob graz'd uncle Laban's sheep-
    Jacob holy Abram was,
    wise mother wrought behalf,
    possessor; ay, third-
  ANTONIO. him? interest?
  SHYLOCK. No, interest; not, say,
    Directly int'rest; mark Jacob did:
    Laban compromis'd
    eanlings streak'd pied
    fall Jacob's hire, ewes, rank,  
    end autumn turned rams;
    work generation was
    woolly breeders act,
    skilful shepherd pill'd wands,
    And, deed kind,
    stuck fulsome ewes,
    Who, conceiving, eaning time
    Fall parti-colour'd lambs, Jacob's.
    thrive, blest;
    thrift blessing, men steal not.
  ANTONIO. venture, sir, Jacob serv'd for;
    thing power bring pass,
    sway'd fashion'd hand heaven.
    inserted make interest good?
    gold silver ewes rams?
  SHYLOCK. tell; make breed fast.
    note me, signior.
  ANTONIO.  [Aside]  Mark this, Bassanio,
    devil cite Scripture purpose.
    evil soul producing holy witness  
    villain smiling cheek,
    goodly apple rotten heart.
    O, goodly falsehood hath!
  SHYLOCK. thousand ducats- 'tis good round sum.
    months twelve; see, rate-
  ANTONIO. Well, Shylock, beholding you?
  SHYLOCK. Signior Antonio, time oft
    Rialto rated me
    moneys usances;
    borne patient shrug,
    suff'rance badge tribe;
    call misbeliever, cut-throat dog,
    spit Jewish gaberdine,
    mine own.
    then, appears help;
    to, then; me, say
    'Shylock, moneys.' so-
    void rheum beard
    foot spurn stranger cur
    threshold; moneys suit.  
    you? say
    'Hath dog money? possible
    cur lend thousand ducats?' Or
    bend low and, bondman's key,
    bated breath whisp'ring humbleness,
    this:
    'Fair sir, spit Wednesday last,
    spurn'd day; time
    call'd dog; courtesies
    lend moneys'?
  ANTONIO. call thee again,
    spit thee again, spurn thee too.
    thou wilt lend money, lend not
    thy friends- friendship take
    breed barren metal friend?-
    lend thine enemy,
    break thou mayst face
    Exact penalty.
  SHYLOCK. Why, you, storm!
    friends you, love,  
    Forget shames stain'd with,
    Supply present wants, doit
    usance moneys, hear me.
    kind offer.
  BASSANIO. kindness.
  SHYLOCK. kindness show.
    notary, seal there
    single bond, and, merry sport,
    repay day,
    place, sum sums are
    Express'd condition, forfeit
    nominated equal pound
    fair flesh, cut taken
    part body pleaseth me.
  ANTONIO. Content, faith; seal bond,
    kindness Jew.
  BASSANIO. seal bond me;
    dwell necessity.
  ANTONIO. Why, fear not, man; forfeit it;
    months- month  
    bond expires- expect return
    thrice times bond.
  SHYLOCK. O father Abram, Christians are,
    hard dealings teaches suspect
    thoughts others! Pray you, this:
    break day, gain
    exaction forfeiture?
    pound man's flesh man
    estimable, profitable neither,
    flesh muttons, beefs, goats. say,
    buy favour, extend friendship;
    it, so; not, adieu;
    And, love, pray wrong not.
  ANTONIO. Yes, Shylock, seal bond.
  SHYLOCK. meet forthwith notary's;
    Give direction merry bond,
    purse ducats straight,
    house, left fearful guard
    unthrifty knave, presently
    you.  
  ANTONIO. Hie thee, gentle Jew.                    Exit SHYLOCK
    Hebrew turn Christian: grows kind.
  BASSANIO. fair terms villain's mind.
  ANTONIO. on; dismay;
    ships home month day.            Exeunt

ACT II. SCENE I.
Belmont. PORTIA'S house

Flourish cornets. Enter PRINCE MOROCCO, tawny Moor white,
and FOLLOWERS accordingly, PORTIA, NERISSA, train

  PRINCE Morocco. Mislike complexion,
    shadowed livery burnish'd sun,
    neighbour, bred.
    Bring fairest creature northward born,
    Phoebus' fire scarce thaws icicles,
    make incision love
    prove blood reddest, mine.
    thee, lady, aspect mine
    Hath fear'd valiant; love, swear
    best-regarded virgins clime
    lov'd too. change hue,
    steal thoughts, gentle queen.
  PORTIA. terms choice solely led
    nice direction maiden's eyes;
    Besides, lott'ry destiny  
    Bars voluntary choosing.
    But, father scanted me,
    hedg'd wit yield myself
    wife wins means told you,
    Yourself, renowned Prince, stood fair
    comer look'd yet
    affection.
  PRINCE MOROCCO. you.
    Therefore, pray you, lead caskets
    fortune. scimitar,
    slew Sophy Persian prince,
    won fields Sultan Solyman,
    o'erstare sternest eyes look,
    Outbrave heart daring earth,
    Pluck young sucking cubs she-bear,
    Yea, mock lion 'a roars prey,
    win thee, lady. But, alas while!
    Hercules Lichas play dice
    man, greater throw
    turn fortune weaker band.  
    Alcides beaten page;
    I, blind Fortune leading me,
    Miss unworthier attain,
    die grieving.
  PORTIA. chance,
    attempt choose all,
    swear choose, choose wrong,
    speak lady afterward
    marriage; advis'd.
  PRINCE MOROCCO. not; come, bring chance.
  PORTIA. First, forward temple. dinner
    hazard made.
  PRINCE MOROCCO. Good fortune then,
    make blest cursed'st men!
                                           [Cornets, exeunt]




SCENE II.
Venice. street

Enter LAUNCELOT GOBBO

  LAUNCELOT. conscience serve run this
    Jew master. fiend mine elbow tempts me, saying
    'Gobbo, Launcelot Gobbo, good Launcelot' 'good Gobbo' or
    'good Launcelot Gobbo, legs, start, run away.'
    conscience 'No; heed, honest Launcelot, heed,
    honest Gobbo' or, aforesaid, 'honest Launcelot Gobbo, not
    run; scorn running thy heels.' Well, courageous
    fiend bids pack. 'Via!' fiend; 'away!' the
    fiend. 'For heavens, rouse brave mind' fiend
    'and run.' Well, conscience, hanging neck my
    heart, wisely 'My honest friend Launcelot, being
    honest man's son' 'an honest woman's son'; for
    father smack, grow to, a
    kind taste- well, conscience 'Launcelot, budge not.'
    'Budge,' fiend. 'Budge not,' conscience.
    'Conscience,' I, (you counsel well.' 'Fiend,' I, 'you
    counsel well.' rul'd conscience, stay  
    Jew master, who- God bless mark!- kind devil;
    and, run Jew, ruled fiend,
    who- saving reverence!- devil himself. the
    Jew devil incarnation; and, conscience, my
    conscience kind hard conscience offer counsel
    stay Jew. fiend friendly
    counsel. run, fiend; heels commandment; I
    run.

                     Enter GOBBO, basket

  GOBBO. Master young man, you, pray you, to
    master Jew's?
  LAUNCELOT.  [Aside]  O heavens! true-begotten father,
    who, sand-blind, high-gravel blind, not.
    confusions him.
  GOBBO. Master young gentleman, pray you, to
    master Jew's?
  LAUNCELOT. Turn hand turning, but, at
    turning all, left; marry,  
    turning, turn hand, turn indirectly Jew's
    house.
  GOBBO. God's sonties, 'twill hard hit! tell
    Launcelot, dwells him, dwell or
    no?
  LAUNCELOT. Talk young Master Launcelot?  [Aside]  Mark me
    now; raise waters.- Talk young Master
    Launcelot?
  GOBBO. master, sir, poor man's son; father, I
    say't, honest exceeding poor man, and, God thanked, well
    live.
  LAUNCELOT. Well, father 'a will, talk young
    Master Launcelot.
  GOBBO. worship's friend, Launcelot, sir.
  LAUNCELOT. pray you, ergo, man, ergo, beseech you, talk
    young Master Launcelot?
  GOBBO. Launcelot, an't mastership.
  LAUNCELOT. Ergo, Master Launcelot. Talk Master Launcelot,
    father; young gentleman, Fates Destinies
    odd sayings, Sisters branches  
    learning, deceased; or, plain
    terms, heaven.
  GOBBO. Marry, God forbid! boy staff age, my
    prop.
  LAUNCELOT. cudgel hovel-post, staff a
    prop? me, father?
  GOBBO. Alack day, not, young gentleman; pray
    me, boy- God rest soul!- alive dead?
  LAUNCELOT. me, father?
  GOBBO. Alack, sir, sand-blind; not.
  LAUNCELOT. Nay, indeed, eyes, fail the
    knowing me: wise father child. Well,
    man, news son. Give blessing;
    truth light; murder hid long; man's son
    may, end truth out.
  GOBBO. Pray you, sir, stand up; Launcelot my
    boy.
  LAUNCELOT. Pray you, fooling it, give
    blessing; Launcelot, boy was, son
    is, child be.  
  GOBBO. son.
  LAUNCELOT. that; am
    Launcelot, Jew's man, Margery wife my
    mother.
  GOBBO. Margery, indeed. sworn, thou be
    Launcelot, thou art mine flesh blood. Lord worshipp'd
    be, beard hast thou got! Thou hast hair
    thy chin Dobbin fill-horse tail.
  LAUNCELOT. seem, then, Dobbin's tail grows backward;
    hair tail face
    him.
  GOBBO. Lord, art thou chang'd! dost thou thy master
    agree? brought present. 'gree now?
  LAUNCELOT. Well, well; but, mine part, set my
    rest run away, rest till run ground.
    master's Jew. Give present! Give halter. I
    famish'd service; finger with
    ribs. Father, glad come; give present to
    Master Bassanio, rare liveries; I
    serve him, run God ground. O rare  
    fortune! man. him, father, Jew, I
    serve Jew longer.

         Enter BASSANIO, LEONARDO, FOLLOWER two

  BASSANIO. so; hasted supper be
    ready farthest clock. letters
    delivered, put liveries making, desire Gratiano to
    anon lodging.                      Exit SERVANT
  LAUNCELOT. him, father.
  GOBBO. God bless worship!
  BASSANIO. Gramercy; wouldst thou aught me?
  GOBBO. son, sir, poor boy-
  LAUNCELOT. poor boy, sir, rich Jew's man, would,
    sir, father specify-
  GOBBO. hath great infection, sir, say, serve-
  LAUNCELOT. short long is, serve Jew, and
    desire, father specify-
  GOBBO. master he, saving worship's reverence, are
    scarce cater-cousins-  
  LAUNCELOT. brief, truth Jew, done
    wrong, doth me, father, hope man,
    frutify you-
  GOBBO. dish doves bestow your
    worship; suit is-
  LAUNCELOT. brief, suit impertinent myself, as
    worship honest man; and, say
    it, man, poor man, father.
  BASSANIO. speak both. you?
  LAUNCELOT. Serve you, sir.
  GOBBO. defect matter, sir.
  BASSANIO. thee well; thou hast obtain'd thy suit.
    Shylock thy master spoke day,
    hath preferr'd thee, preferment
    leave rich Jew's service become
    follower poor gentleman.
  LAUNCELOT. proverb parted master
    Shylock you, sir: grace God, sir, hath
    enough.
  BASSANIO. Thou speak'st well. Go, father, thy son.  
    leave thy master, inquire
    lodging out.  [To SERVANT]  Give livery
    guarded fellows'; done.
  LAUNCELOT. Father, in. service, no! ne'er a
    tongue head!  [Looking palm]  Well; man in
    Italy fairer table doth offer swear book- I
    good fortune. to, simple line life;
    small trifle wives; alas, fifteen wives nothing;
    a'leven widows maids simple coming-in man.
    scape drowning thrice, peril life
    edge feather-bed-here simple scapes. Well, if
    Fortune woman, good wench gear. Father,
    come; leave Jew twinkling.
                                  Exeunt LAUNCELOT GOBBO
  BASSANIO. pray thee, good Leonardo, this.
    things bought orderly bestowed,
    Return haste, feast to-night
    esteem'd acquaintance; hie thee, go.
  LEONARDO. endeavours herein.
  
                          Enter GRATIANO

  GRATIANO. master?
  LEONARDO. Yonder, sir, walks.                          Exit
  GRATIANO. Signior Bassanio!
  BASSANIO. Gratiano!
  GRATIANO. suit you.
  BASSANIO. obtain'd it.
  GRATIANO. deny me: Belmont.
  BASSANIO. Why, must. hear thee, Gratiano:
    Thou art wild, rude, bold voice-
    Parts thee happily enough,
    eyes faults;
    thou art known, show
    liberal. Pray thee, pain
    allay cold drops modesty
    Thy skipping spirit; thy wild behaviour
    misconst'red place to
    lose hopes.
  GRATIANO. Signior Bassanio, hear me:  
    put sober habit,
    Talk respect, swear then,
    Wear prayer-books pocket, demurely,
    Nay more, grace hood mine eyes
    hat, sigh, amen,
    observance civility
    studied sad ostent
    grandam, trust more.
  BASSANIO. Well, bearing.
  GRATIANO. Nay, bar to-night; gauge me
    to-night.
  BASSANIO. No, pity;
    entreat put on
    boldest suit mirth, friends
    purpose merriment. fare well;
    business.
  GRATIANO. Lorenzo rest;
    visit supper-time.                 Exeunt




SCENE III.
Venice. SHYLOCK'S house

Enter JESSICA LAUNCELOT

  JESSICA. thou wilt leave father so.
    house hell; thou, merry devil,
    Didst rob taste tediousness.
    fare thee well; ducat thee;
    And, Launcelot, supper shalt thou see
    Lorenzo, thy master's guest.
    Give letter; secretly.
    farewell. father
    talk thee.
  LAUNCELOT. Adieu! tears exhibit tongue. beautiful pagan,
    sweet Jew! Christian play knave get
    thee, deceived. But, adieu! foolish drops do
    drown manly spirit; adieu!
  JESSICA. Farewell, good Launcelot.              Exit LAUNCELOT
    Alack, heinous sin me
    asham'd father's child!
    daughter blood,  
    manners. O Lorenzo,
    thou promise, end strife,
    Christian thy loving wife.                 Exit




SCENE IV.
Venice. street

Enter GRATIANO, LORENZO, SALERIO, SOLANIO

  LORENZO. Nay, slink suppertime,
    Disguise lodging, return
    hour.
  GRATIANO. made good preparation.
  SALERIO. spoke torch-bearers.
  SOLANIO. 'Tis vile, quaintly ordered;
    mind undertook.
  LORENZO. 'Tis o'clock; hours
    furnish us.

                 Enter LAUNCELOT, letter

    Friend Launcelot, news?
  LAUNCELOT. break this, seem
    signify.
  LORENZO. hand; faith, 'tis fair hand,
    whiter paper writ  
    fair hand writ.
  GRATIANO. Love-news, faith!
  LAUNCELOT. leave, sir.
  LORENZO. goest thou?
  LAUNCELOT. Marry, sir, bid master, Jew, sup
    to-night master, Christian.
  LORENZO. Hold, here, this. gentle Jessica
    fail her; speak privately.
    Go, gentlemen,                                Exit LAUNCELOT
    prepare masque to-night?
    provided torch-bearer.
  SALERIO. Ay, marry, straight.
  SOLANIO. I.
  LORENZO. Meet Gratiano
    Gratiano's lodging hour hence.
  SALERIO. 'Tis good so.        Exeunt SALERIO SOLANIO
  GRATIANO. letter fair Jessica?
  LORENZO. thee all. hath directed
    father's house;
    gold jewels furnish'd with;  
    page's suit hath readiness.
    e'er Jew father heaven,
    gentle daughter's sake;
    dare misfortune cross foot,
    excuse,
    issue faithless Jew.
    Come, me, peruse thou goest;
    Fair Jessica torch-bearer.                Exeunt




SCENE V.
Venice. SHYLOCK'S house

Enter SHYLOCK LAUNCELOT

  SHYLOCK. Well, thou shalt see; thy eyes thy judge,
    difference Shylock Bassanio.-
    What, Jessica!- Thou shalt gormandize
    thou hast me- What, Jessica!-
    sleep snore, rend apparel out-
    Why, Jessica, say!
  LAUNCELOT. Why, Jessica!
  SHYLOCK. bids thee call? bid thee call.
  LAUNCELOT. worship wont nothing
    bidding.

                          Enter JESSICA

  JESSICA. Call you? will?
  SHYLOCK. bid supper, Jessica;
    keys. wherefore go?
    bid love; flatter me;  
    hate, feed upon
    prodigal Christian. Jessica, girl,
    house. loath go;
    ill a-brewing rest,
    dream money-bags to-night.
  LAUNCELOT. beseech you, sir, go; young master doth expect your
    reproach.
  SHYLOCK. his.
  LAUNCELOT. conspired together; you
    masque, do, nothing
    nose fell a-bleeding Black Monday o'clock
    i' th' morning, falling year Ash Wednesday four
    year, th' afternoon.
  SHYLOCK. What, masques? Hear me, Jessica:
    Lock doors, hear drum,
    vile squealing wry-neck'd fife,
    Clamber casements then,
    thrust head public street
    gaze Christian fools varnish'd faces;
    stop house's ears- casements;  
    sound shallow fopp'ry enter
    sober house. Jacob's staff, swear
    mind feasting to-night;
    go. me, sirrah;
    come.
  LAUNCELOT. before, sir. Mistress, window for
    this.
        Christian by
        worth Jewess' eye.                        Exit
  SHYLOCK. fool Hagar's offspring, ha?
  JESSICA. words 'Farewell, mistress'; else.
  SHYLOCK. patch kind enough, huge feeder,
    Snail-slow profit, sleeps day
    wild-cat; drones hive me,
    part him; part him
    waste
    borrowed purse. Well, Jessica, in;
    return immediately.
    bid you, shut doors you.
    Fast bind, fast find-  
    proverb stale thrifty mind.                  Exit
  JESSICA. Farewell; fortune crost,
    father, daughter, lost.                  Exit




SCENE VI.
Venice. SHYLOCK'S house

Enter maskers, GRATIANO SALERIO

  GRATIANO. pent-house Lorenzo
    Desired make stand.
  SALERIO. hour past.
  GRATIANO. marvel out-dwells hour,
    lovers run clock.
  SALERIO. O, ten times faster Venus' pigeons fly
    seal love's bonds made wont
    obliged faith unforfeited!
  GRATIANO. holds: riseth feast
    keen appetite sits down?
    horse doth untread again
    tedious measures unbated fire
    pace first? things are
    spirit chased enjoyed.
    younker prodigal
    scarfed bark puts native bay,
    Hugg'd embraced strumpet wind;  
    prodigal doth return,
    over-weather'd ribs ragged sails,
    Lean, rent, beggar'd strumpet wind!

                       Enter LORENZO

  SALERIO. Lorenzo; hereafter.
  LORENZO. Sweet friends, patience long abode!
    I, affairs, made wait.
    play thieves wives,
    watch long then. Approach;
    dwells father Jew. Ho! within?

           Enter JESSICA, above, boy's clothes

  JESSICA. you? me, certainty,
    Albeit swear tongue.
  LORENZO. Lorenzo, thy love.
  JESSICA. Lorenzo, certain; love indeed;
    love much?  
    you, Lorenzo, yours?
  LORENZO. Heaven thy thoughts witness thou art.
  JESSICA. Here, catch casket; worth pains.
    glad 'tis night, me,
    asham'd exchange;
    love blind, lovers see
    pretty follies commit,
    For, could, Cupid blush
    transformed boy.
  LORENZO. Descend, torch-bearer.
  JESSICA. What! hold candle shames?
    themselves, good sooth, light.
    Why, 'tis office discovery, love,
    obscur'd.
  LORENZO. you, sweet,
    lovely garnish boy.
    once,
    close night doth play runaway,
    stay'd Bassanio's feast.
  JESSICA. make fast doors, gild  
    moe ducats, straight.
                                                      Exit above

  GRATIANO. Now, hood, gentle, Jew.
  LORENZO. Beshrew me, love heartily,
    wise, judge her,
    fair is, mine eyes true,
    true is, hath prov'd herself;
    therefore, herself, wise, fair, true,
    constant soul.

                     Enter JESSICA, below

    What, art thou come? On, gentlemen, away;
    masquing mates time stay.
                                   Exit JESSICA SALERIO

                        Enter ANTONIO

  ANTONIO. there?  
  GRATIANO. Signior Antonio?
  ANTONIO. Fie, fie, Gratiano, rest?
    'Tis o'clock; friends stay you;
    masque to-night; wind about;
    Bassanio presently aboard;
    twenty seek you.
  GRATIANO. glad on't; desire delight
    sail to-night.              Exeunt




SCENE VII.
Belmont. PORTIA's house

Flourish cornets. Enter PORTIA, PRINCE MOROCCO,
and trains

  PORTIA. draw curtains discover
    caskets noble Prince.
    make choice.
  PRINCE MOROCCO. first, gold, inscription bears:
    'Who chooseth gain men desire.'
    second, silver, promise carries:
    'Who chooseth deserves.'
    third, dull lead, warning blunt:
    'Who chooseth give hazard hath.'
    choose right?
  PORTIA. picture, Prince;
    choose that, withal.
  PRINCE MOROCCO. god direct judgment! see;
    survey th' inscriptions back again.
    leaden casket?
    'Who chooseth give hazard hath.'  
    give- what? lead? Hazard lead!
    casket threatens; men hazard all
    hope fair advantages.
    golden mind stoops shows dross;
    give hazard aught lead.
    silver virgin hue?
    'Who chooseth deserves.'
    deserves! Pause there, Morocco,
    weigh thy hand.
    thou beest rated thy estimation,
    Thou dost deserve enough, enough
    extend lady;
    afeard deserving
    weak disabling myself.
    deserve? Why, lady!
    birth deserve her, fortunes,
    graces, qualities breeding;
    these, love deserve.
    stray'd farther, chose here?
    grav'd gold:  
    'Who chooseth gain men desire.'
    Why, lady! world desires her;
    corners earth come
    kiss shrine, mortal-breathing saint.
    Hyrcanian deserts vasty wilds
    wide Arabia throughfares now
    princes view fair Portia.
    watery kingdom, ambitious head
    Spits face heaven, bar
    stop foreign spirits, come
    o'er brook fair Portia.
    heavenly picture.
    Is't lead her? 'Twere damnation
    base thought; gross
    rib cerecloth obscure grave.
    silver immur'd,
    ten times undervalued gold?
    O sinful thought! rich gem
    set worse gold. England
    coin bears figure angel  
    Stamp'd gold; insculp'd upon.
    angel golden bed
    Lies within. Deliver key;
    choose, thrive may!
  PORTIA. There, it, Prince, form lie there,
    yours.                [He opens golden casket]
  PRINCE MOROCCO. O hell! here?
    carrion Death, empty eye
    written scroll! read writing.
         'All glisters gold,
         heard told;
         man life hath sold
         behold.
         Gilded tombs worms infold.
         wise bold,
         Young limbs, judgment old,
         answer inscroll'd.
         Fare well, suit cold.'
      Cold indeed, labour lost,
      farewell, heat, welcome, frost.  
    Portia, adieu! griev'd heart
    tedious leave; losers part.
                        Exit train. Flourish cornets
  PORTIA. gentle riddance. Draw curtains, go.
    complexion choose so.               Exeunt




SCENE VIII.
Venice. street

Enter SALERIO SOLANIO

  SALERIO. Why, man, Bassanio sail;
    Gratiano along;
    ship Lorenzo not.
  SOLANIO. villain Jew outcries rais'd Duke,
    search Bassanio's ship.
  SALERIO. late, ship sail;
    Duke understand
    gondola together
    Lorenzo amorous Jessica;
    Besides, Antonio certified Duke
    Bassanio ship.
  SOLANIO. heard passion confus'd,
    strange, outrageous, variable,
    dog Jew utter streets.
    'My daughter! O ducats! O daughter!
    Fled Christian! O Christian ducats!
    Justice! law! ducats daughter!  
    sealed bag, sealed bags ducats,
    double ducats, stol'n daughter!
    jewels- stones, rich precious stones,
    Stol'n daughter! Justice! Find girl;
    hath stones ducats.'
  SALERIO. Why, boys Venice follow him,
    Crying, stones, daughter, ducats.
  SOLANIO. good Antonio day,
    pay this.
  SALERIO. Marry, rememb'red;
    reason'd Frenchman yesterday,
    told me, narrow seas part
    French English, miscarried
    vessel country richly fraught.
    thought Antonio told me,
    wish'd silence his.
  SOLANIO. Antonio hear;
    suddenly, grieve him.
  SALERIO. kinder gentleman treads earth.
    Bassanio Antonio part.  
    Bassanio told make speed
    return. answered 'Do so;
    Slubber business sake, Bassanio,
    stay riping time;
    Jew's bond hath me,
    enter mind love;
    merry, employ chiefest thoughts
    courtship, fair ostents love
    conveniently there.'
    there, eye big tears,
    Turning face, put hand him,
    affection wondrous sensible
    wrung Bassanio's hand; parted.
  SOLANIO. loves world him.
    pray thee, find out,
    quicken embraced heaviness
    delight other.
  SALERIO. so.                                      Exeunt




SCENE IX.
Belmont. PORTIA'S house

Enter NERISSA, SERVITOR

  NERISSA. Quick, quick, pray thee, draw curtain straight;
    Prince Arragon hath ta'en oath,
    election presently.

       Flourish cornets. Enter PRINCE ARRAGON,
                    PORTIA, trains

  PORTIA. Behold, stand caskets, noble Prince.
    choose contain'd,
    Straight nuptial rites solemniz'd;
    fail, speech, lord,
    immediately.
  ARRAGON. enjoin'd oath observe things:
    First, unfold one
    casket 'twas chose; next, fail
    casket, life
    woo maid marriage;  
    Lastly,
    fail fortune choice,
    Immediately leave gone.
  PORTIA. injunctions doth swear
    hazard worthless self.
  ARRAGON. address'd me. Fortune now
    heart's hope! Gold, silver, base lead.
    'Who chooseth give hazard hath.'
    fairer ere give hazard.
    golden chest? Ha! see:
    'Who chooseth gain men desire.'
    men desire- 'many' meant
    fool multitude, choose show,
    learning fond eye doth teach;
    pries th' interior, but, martlet,
    Builds weather outward wall,
    force road casualty.
    choose men desire,
    jump common spirits
    rank barbarous multitudes.  
    Why, thee, thou silver treasure-house!
    title thou dost bear.
    'Who chooseth deserves.'
    too; about
    cozen fortune, honourable
    stamp merit? presume
    wear undeserved dignity.
    O estates, degrees, offices,
    deriv'd corruptly, clear honour
    purchas'd merit wearer!
    cover stand bare!
    commanded command!
    low peasantry gleaned
    true seed honour! honour
    Pick'd chaff ruin times,
    varnish'd! Well, choice.
    'Who chooseth deserves.'
    assume desert. Give key this,
    instantly unlock fortunes here.
                                    [He opens silver casket]  
  PORTIA.  [Aside]  long pause find there.
  ARRAGON. here? portrait blinking idiot
    Presenting schedule! read it.
    unlike art thou Portia!
    unlike hopes deservings!
    'Who chooseth deserves.'
    deserve fool's head?
    prize? deserts better?
  PORTIA. offend judge distinct offices
    opposed natures.
  ARRAGON. here?  [Reads]

         'The fire times this;
         times judgment is
         choose amiss.
         shadows kiss,
         shadow's bliss.
         fools alive iwis
         Silver'd o'er, this.
         wife bed,  
         head.
         gone; sped.'

         fool appear
         time linger here.
         fool's head woo,
         two.
         Sweet, adieu! oath,
         Patiently bear wroth.         Exit train

  PORTIA. hath candle sing'd moth.
    O, deliberate fools! choose,
    wisdom wit lose.
  NERISSA. ancient heresy:
    Hanging wiving destiny.
  PORTIA. Come, draw curtain, Nerissa.

                       Enter SERVANT

  SERVANT. lady?  
  PORTIA. Here; lord?
  SERVANT. Madam, alighted gate
    young Venetian, before
    signify th' approaching lord,
    bringeth regreets;
    wit, commends courteous breath,
    Gifts rich value. seen
    ambassador love.
    day April sweet
    show costly summer hand
    fore-spurrer lord.
  PORTIA. more, pray thee; half afeard
    Thou wilt anon kin thee,
    Thou spend'st high-day wit praising him.
    Come, come, Nerissa, long see
    Quick Cupid's post mannerly.
  NERISSA. Bassanio, Lord Love, thy be!        Exeunt
