ACT III. SCENE I.
Venice. street

Enter SOLANIO SALERIO

  SOLANIO. Now, news Rialto?
  SALERIO. Why, lives uncheck'd Antonio hath ship
    rich lading wreck'd narrow seas; Goodwins think
    call place, dangerous flat fatal, the
    carcases tall ship lie buried, say, my
    gossip Report honest woman word.
  SOLANIO. lying gossip knapp'd
    ginger made neighbours wept death a
    husband. true, slips prolixity or
    crossing plain highway talk, good Antonio, the
    honest Antonio- O title good name
    company!-
  SALERIO. Come, full stop.
  SOLANIO. Ha! sayest thou? Why, end is, hath lost a
    ship.
  SALERIO. prove end losses.
  SOLANIO. amen betimes, devil cross prayer,  
    likeness Jew.

                             Enter SHYLOCK

    now, Shylock? news merchants?
  SHYLOCK. knew, well, you, my
    daughter's flight.
  SALERIO. certain; I, part, knew tailor made
    wings flew withal.
  SOLANIO. Shylock, part, knew bird flidge;
    complexion leave dam.
  SHYLOCK. damn'd it.
  SALERIO. certain, devil judge.
  SHYLOCK. flesh blood rebel!
  SOLANIO. it, carrion! Rebels years?
  SHYLOCK. daughter flesh blood.
  SALERIO. difference thy flesh than
    jet ivory; bloods is
    red wine Rhenish. us, hear whether
    Antonio loss sea no?  
  SHYLOCK. bad match: bankrupt, prodigal,
    dare scarce show head Rialto; beggar, was
    us'd smug mart. bond. He
    wont call usurer; bond. wont
    lend money Christian courtesy; bond.
  SALERIO. Why, sure, forfeit, thou wilt his
    flesh. good for?
  SHYLOCK. bait fish withal. feed else, will
    feed revenge. hath disgrac'd hind'red half a
    million; laugh'd losses, mock'd gains, scorned my
    nation, thwarted bargains, cooled friends, heated mine
    enemies. reason? Jew. Hath Jew eyes?
    Hath Jew hands, organs, dimensions, senses, affections,
    passions, fed food, hurt weapons,
    subject diseases, healed means, warmed
    cooled winter summer, Christian is? If
    prick us, bleed? tickle us, laugh?
    poison us, die? wrong us, we
    revenge? rest, resemble you
    that. Jew wrong Christian, humility?  
    Revenge. Christian wrong Jew, sufferance
    Christian example? Why, revenge. villainy teach me
    execute; itshall hard the
    instruction.

                    Enter MAN ANTONIO

  MAN. Gentlemen, master Antonio house, desires to
    speak both.
  SALERIO. seek him.

                          Enter TUBAL

  SOLANIO. tribe; be
    match'd, devil turn Jew.
                                Exeunt SOLANIO, SALERIO, MAN
  SHYLOCK. now, Tubal, news Genoa? Hast thou found my
    daughter?
  TUBAL. hear her, find her.
  SHYLOCK. there, there, there, there! diamond gone, cost  
    thousand ducats Frankfort! curse fell our
    nation till now; felt till now. thousand ducats in
    that, precious, precious jewels. daughter
    dead foot, jewels ear; were
    hears'd foot, ducats coffin! news of
    them? Why, so- spent search. Why,
    thou- loss loss! thief much, to
    find thief; satisfaction, revenge; ill luck
    stirring lights o' shoulders; sighs o' my
    breathing; tears o' shedding!
  TUBAL. Yes, men ill luck too: Antonio, heard in
    Genoa-
  SHYLOCK. What, what, what? Ill luck, ill luck?
  TUBAL. Hath argosy cast coming Tripolis.
  SHYLOCK. God, God. true, true?
  TUBAL. spoke sailors escaped wreck.
  SHYLOCK. thee, good Tubal. Good news, good news- ha, ha!-
    heard Genoa.
  TUBAL. daughter spent Genoa, heard, night,
    fourscore ducats.  
  SHYLOCK. Thou stick'st dagger me- gold
    again. Fourscore ducats sitting! Fourscore ducats!
  TUBAL. divers Antonio's creditors company to
    Venice swear choose break.
  SHYLOCK. glad it; plague him, torture him; I
    glad it.
  TUBAL. showed ring daughter
    monkey.
  SHYLOCK. her! Thou torturest me, Tubal. my
    turquoise; Leah bachelor; not
    wilderness monkeys.
  TUBAL. Antonio undone.
  SHYLOCK. Nay, true; true. Go, Tubal, fee an
    officer; bespeak fortnight before. heart of
    him, forfeit; for, Venice, make what
    merchandise will. Go, Tubal, meet synagogue; go,
    good Tubal; synagogue, Tubal.                  Exeunt




SCENE II.
Belmont. PORTIA'S house

Enter BASSANIO, PORTIA, GRATIANO, NERISSA, trains

  PORTIA. pray tarry; pause day two
    hazard; for, choosing wrong,
    lose company; forbear while.
    tells me- love-
    lose you; yourself
    Hate counsels quality.
    understand well-
    maiden hath tongue thought-
    detain month two
    venture me. teach you
    choose right, forsworn;
    be; miss me;
    do, make sin,
    forsworn. Beshrew eyes!
    o'erlook'd divided me;
    half yours, half yours-  
    Mine own, say; mine, yours,
    yours. O! naughty times
    Puts bars owners rights;
    so, yours, yours. Prove so,
    fortune hell it, I.
    speak long, 'tis peize time,
    eke it, draw length,
    stay election.
  BASSANIO. choose;
    am, live rack.
  PORTIA. rack, Bassanio? confess
    treason mingled love.
  BASSANIO. ugly treason mistrust
    makes fear th' enjoying love;
    amity life
    'Tween snow fire treason love.
  PORTIA. Ay, fear speak rack,
    men enforced speak anything.
  BASSANIO. Promise life, confess truth.
  PORTIA. then, confess live.  
  BASSANIO. 'Confess' 'love'
    sum confession.
    O happy torment, torturer
    Doth teach answers deliverance!
    fortune caskets.
  PORTIA. Away, then; lock'd them.
    love me, find out.
    Nerissa rest, stand aloof;
    music sound doth make choice;
    Then, lose, makes swan-like end,
    Fading music. comparison
    stand proper, eye stream
    wat'ry death-bed him. win;
    music then? music is
    flourish true subjects bow
    new-crowned monarch; is
    dulcet sounds break day
    creep dreaming bridegroom's ear
    summon marriage. goes,
    presence, love,  
    young Alcides redeem
    virgin tribute paid howling Troy
    sea-monster. stand sacrifice;
    rest aloof Dardanian wives,
    bleared visages view
    issue th' exploit. Go, Hercules!
    Live thou, live. dismay
    view fight thou mak'st fray.

                            SONG

      whilst BASSANIO comments caskets himself

                 fancy bred,
                 heart head,
                 begot, nourished?
                   Reply, reply.
                 engend'red eyes,
                 gazing fed; fancy dies
                 cradle lies.  
                   ring fancy's knell:
                   begin it- Ding, dong, bell.
  ALL.           Ding, dong, bell.

  BASSANIO. outward shows themselves;
    world deceiv'd ornament.
    law, plea tainted corrupt
    But, season'd gracious voice,
    Obscures show evil? religion,
    damned error sober brow
    bless it, approve text,
    Hiding grossness fair ornament?
    vice simple assumes
    mark virtue outward parts.
    cowards, hearts false
    stairs sand, wear chins
    beards Hercules frowning Mars;
    Who, search'd, livers white milk!
    assume valour's excrement
    render redoubted. beauty  
    'tis purchas'd weight,
    works miracle nature,
    Making lightest wear it;
    crisped snaky golden locks
    make wanton gambols wind
    supposed fairness known
    dowry head-
    skull bred sepulchre.
    ornament guiled shore
    dangerous sea; beauteous scarf
    Veiling Indian beauty; word,
    truth cunning times put on
    entrap wisest. Therefore, thou gaudy gold,
    Hard food Midas, thee;
    thee, thou pale common drudge
    'Tween man man; thou, thou meagre lead,
    threaten'st dost promise aught,
    Thy plainness moves eloquence,
    choose I. Joy consequence!
  PORTIA.  [Aside]  passions fleet air,  
    doubtful thoughts, rash-embrac'd despair,
    shudd'ring fear, green-ey'd jealousy!
    O love, moderate, allay thy ecstasy,
    measure rain thy joy, scant excess!
    feel thy blessing. Make less,
    fear surfeit.
  BASSANIO.  [Opening leaden casket]  find here?
    Fair Portia's counterfeit! demi-god
    Hath creation? Move eyes?
    riding balls mine
    motion? sever'd lips,
    Parted sugar breath; sweet bar
    sunder sweet friends. hairs
    painter plays spider, hath woven
    golden mesh t' entrap hearts men
    Faster gnats cobwebs. eyes-
    them? made one,
    Methinks power steal his,
    leave unfurnish'd. far
    substance praise doth wrong shadow  
    underprizing it, shadow
    Doth limp substance. scroll,
    continent summary fortune.
         'You choose view,
         Chance fair choose true!
         fortune falls you,
         content seek new.
         pleas'd this,
         hold fortune bliss,
         Turn lady is
         claim loving kiss.'
    gentle scroll. Fair lady, leave;
    note, give receive.
    contending prize,
    thinks hath people's eyes,
    Hearing applause universal shout,
    Giddy spirit, gazing doubt
    peals praise no;
    So, thrice-fair lady, stand so,
    doubtful true,  
    confirm'd, sign'd, ratified you.
  PORTIA. me, Lord Bassanio, stand,
    am. alone
    ambitious wish
    better, you
    trebled twenty times myself,
    thousand times fair, ten thousand times rich,
    stand high account
    virtues, beauties, livings, friends,
    Exceed account. full sum me
    sum which, term gross,
    unlesson'd girl, unschool'd, unpractis'd;
    Happy this, old
    learn; happier this,
    bred dull learn;
    Happiest gentle spirit
    Commits directed,
    lord, governor, king.
    mine yours
    converted. lord  
    fair mansion, master servants,
    Queen o'er myself; now, now,
    house, servants, myself,
    yours- lord's. give ring,
    part from, lose, give away,
    presage ruin love,
    vantage exclaim you.
  BASSANIO. Madam, bereft words;
    blood speaks veins;
    confusion powers
    As, oration fairly spoke
    beloved prince, doth appear
    buzzing pleased multitude,
    something, blent together,
    Turns wild nothing, save joy
    Express'd express'd. ring
    Parts finger, parts life hence;
    O, bold Bassanio's dead!
  NERISSA. lord lady, time
    stood wishes prosper  
    cry 'Good joy.' Good joy, lord lady!
  GRATIANO. Lord Bassanio, gentle lady,
    joy wish,
    me;
    And, honours solemnize
    bargain faith, beseech you
    time married too.
  BASSANIO. heart, thou canst wife.
  GRATIANO. lordship, one.
    eyes, lord, swift yours:
    mistress, beheld maid;
    lov'd, lov'd; intermission
    pertains me, lord, you.
    fortune stood caskets there,
    mine too, matter falls;
    wooing sweat again,
    swearing till roof dry
    oaths love, last- promise last-
    promise fair here
    love, provided fortune  
    Achiev'd mistress.
  PORTIA. true, Nerissa?
  NERISSA. Madam, is, stand pleas'd withal.
  BASSANIO. you, Gratiano, good faith?
  GRATIANO. Yes, faith, lord.
  BASSANIO. feast honoured marriage.
  GRATIANO. play them: boy thousand
    ducats.
  NERISSA. What, stake down?
  GRATIANO. No; ne'er win sport, stake down-
    here? Lorenzo infidel?
    What, Venetian friend, Salerio!

          Enter LORENZO, JESSICA, SALERIO, messenger
                           Venice

  BASSANIO. Lorenzo Salerio, hither,
    youth int'rest here
    power bid welcome. leave,
    bid friends countrymen,  
    Sweet Portia, welcome.
  PORTIA. I, lord;
    welcome.
  LORENZO. honour. part, lord,
    purpose here;
    meeting Salerio way,
    entreat me, past nay,
    along.
  SALERIO. did, lord,
    reason it. Signior Antonio
    Commends you.               [Gives BASSANIO letter]
  BASSANIO. Ere ope letter,
    pray good friend doth.
  SALERIO. sick, lord, mind;
    well, mind; letter there
    show estate.        [BASSANIO opens letter]
  GRATIANO. Nerissa, cheer yond stranger; bid welcome.
    hand, Salerio. news Venice?
    doth royal merchant, good Antonio?
    glad success:  
    Jasons, won fleece.
  SALERIO. won fleece hath lost.
  PORTIA. shrewd contents yond paper
    steals colour Bassanio's cheek:
    dear friend dead, world
    turn constitution
    constant man. What, worse worse!
    leave, Bassanio: half yourself,
    freely half anything
    paper brings you.
  BASSANIO. O sweet Portia,
    unpleasant'st words
    blotted paper! Gentle lady,
    impart love you,
    freely told wealth had
    Ran veins- gentleman;
    told true. yet, dear lady,
    Rating nothing, see
    braggart. told you
    state nothing, told  
    worse nothing; indeed
    engag'd dear friend,
    Engag'd friend mere enemy,
    feed means. letter, lady,
    paper body friend,
    word gaping wound
    Issuing life-blood. true, Salerio?
    Hath ventures fail'd? What, hit?
    Tripolis, Mexico, England,
    Lisbon, Barbary, India,
    vessel scape dreadful touch
    merchant-marring rocks?
  SALERIO. one, lord.
    Besides, that, had
    present money discharge Jew,
    it. know
    creature bear shape man
    keen greedy confound man.
    plies Duke morning night,
    doth impeach freedom state,  
    deny justice. Twenty merchants,
    Duke himself, magnificoes
    greatest port, persuaded him;
    drive envious plea
    forfeiture, justice, bond.
  JESSICA. him, heard swear
    Tubal Chus, countrymen,
    Antonio's flesh
    twenty times sum
    owe him; know, lord,
    law, authority, power, deny not,
    hard poor Antonio.
  PORTIA. dear friend trouble?
  BASSANIO. dearest friend me, kindest man,
    condition'd unwearied spirit
    courtesies; whom
    ancient Roman honour appears
    draws breath Italy.
  PORTIA. sum owes Jew?
  BASSANIO. me, thousand ducats.  
  PORTIA. What! more?
    Pay thousand, deface bond;
    Double thousand, treble that,
    friend description
    lose hair Bassanio's fault.
    church call wife,
    Venice friend;
    lie Portia's side
    unquiet soul. gold
    pay petty debt twenty times over.
    paid, bring true friend along.
    maid Nerissa meantime
    live maids widows. Come, away;
    wedding day.
    Bid friends welcome, show merry cheer;
    dear bought, love dear.
    hear letter friend.
  BASSANIO.  [Reads]  'Sweet Bassanio, ships miscarried,
    creditors grow cruel, estate low, bond the
    Jew forfeit; since, paying it, impossible  
    live, debts clear'd I, might
    death. Notwithstanding, pleasure; if
    love persuade come, letter.'
  PORTIA. O love, dispatch business gone!
  BASSANIO. good leave away,
    make haste; but, till again,
    bed e'er guilty stay,
    rest interposer 'twixt twain.               Exeunt




SCENE III.
Venice. street

Enter SHYLOCK, SOLANIO, ANTONIO, GAOLER

  SHYLOCK. Gaoler, him. mercy-
    fool lent money gratis.
    Gaoler, him.
  ANTONIO. Hear yet, good Shylock.
  SHYLOCK. bond; speak bond.
    sworn oath bond.
    Thou call'dst dog thou hadst cause,
    But, dog, beware fangs;
    Duke grant justice. wonder,
    Thou naughty gaoler, thou art fond
    abroad request.
  ANTONIO. pray thee hear speak.
  SHYLOCK. bond. hear thee speak;
    bond; speak more.
    made soft dull-ey'd fool,
    shake head, relent, sigh, yield,
    Christian intercessors. Follow not;  
    speaking; bond.             Exit
  SOLANIO. impenetrable cur
    men.
  ANTONIO. alone;
    follow bootless prayers.
    seeks life; reason know:
    oft deliver'd forfeitures
    times made moan me;
    hates me.
  SOLANIO. Duke
    grant forfeiture hold.
  ANTONIO. Duke deny law;
    commodity strangers have
    Venice, denied,
    impeach justice state,
    trade profit city
    Consisteth nations. Therefore, go;
    griefs losses bated me
    spare pound flesh
    To-morrow bloody creditor.  
    Well, gaoler, on; pray God Bassanio come
    pay debt, care not.          Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Belmont. PORTIA'S house

Enter PORTIA, NERISSA, LORENZO, JESSICA, BALTHASAR

  LORENZO. Madam, speak presence,
    noble true conceit
    godlike amity, appears strongly
    bearing absence lord.
    knew show honour,
    true gentleman send relief,
    dear lover lord husband,
    prouder work
    customary bounty enforce you.
  PORTIA. repent good,
    now; companions
    converse waste time together,
    souls bear equal yoke love,
    proportion
    lineaments, manners, spirit,
    makes Antonio,
    bosom lover lord,  
    lord. so,
    cost bestowed
    purchasing semblance soul
    state hellish cruelty!
    praising myself;
    Therefore, it; hear things.
    Lorenzo, commit hands
    husbandry manage house
    lord's return; mine part,
    heaven breath'd secret vow
    live prayer contemplation,
    attended Nerissa here,
    husband lord's return.
    monastery miles off,
    abide. desire you
    deny imposition,
    love necessity
    lays you.
  LORENZO. Madam, heart
    obey fair commands.  
  PORTIA. people mind,
    acknowledge Jessica
    place Lord Bassanio myself.
    fare till meet again.
  LORENZO. Fair thoughts happy hours attend you!
  JESSICA. ladyship heart's content.
  PORTIA. wish, pleas'd
    back you. Fare well, Jessica.
                                      Exeunt JESSICA LORENZO
    Now, Balthasar,
    found thee honest-true,
    find thee still. letter,
    thou th' endeavour man
    speed Padua; thou render this
    cousin's hands, Doctor Bellario;
    notes garments doth give thee,
    Bring them, pray thee, imagin'd speed
    traject, common ferry
    trades Venice. Waste time words,
    thee gone; thee.  
  BALTHASAR. Madam, convenient speed.         Exit
  PORTIA. on, Nerissa, work hand
    of; husbands
    us.
  NERISSA. us?
  PORTIA. shall, Nerissa; habit
    accomplished
    lack. hold thee wager,
    accoutred young men,
    prove prettier fellow two,
    wear dagger braver grace,
    speak change man boy
    reed voice; turn mincing steps
    manly stride; speak frays
    fine bragging youth; quaint lies,
    honourable ladies sought love,
    denying, fell sick died-
    withal. repent,
    that, kill'd them.
    twenty puny lies tell,  
    men swear discontinued school
    twelvemonth. mind
    thousand raw tricks bragging Jacks,
    practise.
  NERISSA. Why, turn men?
  PORTIA. Fie, question's that,
    thou wert lewd interpreter!
    come, thee device
    coach, stays us
    park gate; haste away,
    measure twenty miles to-day.              Exeunt




SCENE V.
Belmont. garden

Enter LAUNCELOT JESSICA

  LAUNCELOT. Yes, truly; for, you, sins father to
    laid children; therefore, promise you, fear you.
    plain you, speak agitation of
    matter; o' good cheer, are
    damn'd. hope good, and
    kind bastard hope, neither.
  JESSICA. hope that, pray thee?
  LAUNCELOT. Marry, partly hope father not-
   Jew's daughter.
  JESSICA. kind bastard hope indeed; sins my
    mother visited me.
  LAUNCELOT. fear damn'd father and
    mother; shun Scylla, father, fall into
    Charybdis, mother; well, ways.
  JESSICA. sav'd husband; hath made a
    Christian.
  LAUNCELOT. Truly, blame he; Christians enow  
    before, e'en live another. This
    making Christians raise price hogs; grow all
    pork-eaters, shortly rasher the
    coals money.

                             Enter LORENZO

  JESSICA. husband, Launcelot, say; he
    comes.
  LORENZO. grow jealous shortly, Launcelot, you
    wife corners.
  JESSICA. Nay, fear us, Lorenzo; Launcelot are
    out; tells flatly mercy heaven,
    Jew's daughter; good member
    commonwealth, converting Jews Christians you
    raise price pork.
  LORENZO. answer commonwealth you
    negro's belly; Moor child
    you, Launcelot.
  LAUNCELOT. Moor reason;  
    honest woman, I
    for.
  LORENZO. fool play word! best
    grace wit shortly turn silence, discourse grow
    commendable parrots. in, sirrah; bid them
    prepare dinner.
  LAUNCELOT. done, sir; stomachs.
  LORENZO. Goodly Lord, wit-snapper you! bid them
    prepare dinner.
  LAUNCELOT. too, sir, 'cover' word.
  LORENZO. cover, then, sir?
  LAUNCELOT. so, sir, neither; duty.
  LORENZO. quarrelling occasion! Wilt thou show the
    wealth thy wit instant? pray thee understand a
    plain man plain meaning: thy fellows, bid cover
    table, serve meat, dinner.
  LAUNCELOT. table, sir, serv'd in; meat,
    sir, cover'd; coming dinner, sir, why,
    humours conceits govern.
 Exit  
  LORENZO. O dear discretion, words suited!
    fool hath planted memory
    army good words; know
    fools stand place,
    Garnish'd him, tricksy word
    Defy matter. cheer'st thou, Jessica?
    now, good sweet, thy opinion,
    dost thou Lord Bassanio's wife?
  JESSICA. Past expressing. meet
    Lord Bassanio live upright life,
    For, blessing lady,
    finds joys heaven earth;
    earth merit it,
    reason heaven.
    Why, gods play heavenly match,
    wager lay earthly women,
    Portia one, else
    Pawn'd other; poor rude world
    Hath fellow.
  LORENZO. husband  
    Hast thou wife.
  JESSICA. Nay, opinion that.
  LORENZO. anon; dinner.
  JESSICA. Nay, praise stomach.
  LORENZO. No, pray thee, serve table-talk;
    howsome'er thou speak'st, 'mong things
    digest it.
  JESSICA. Well, set forth.                      Exeunt




ACT IV. SCENE I.
Venice. court justice

Enter DUKE, MAGNIFICOES, ANTONIO, BASSANIO, GRATIANO, SALERIO,
and OTHERS

  DUKE VENICE. What, Antonio here?
  ANTONIO. Ready, Grace.
  DUKE VENICE. thee; thou art answer
    stony adversary, inhuman wretch,
    Uncapable pity, void empty
    dram mercy.
  ANTONIO. heard
    Grace hath ta'en great pains qualify
    rigorous course; stands obdurate,
    lawful means carry me
    envy's reach, oppose
    patience fury, arm'd
    suffer quietness spirit
    tyranny rage his.
  DUKE VENICE. one, call Jew court.
  SALERIO. ready door; comes, lord.  

                          Enter SHYLOCK

  DUKE VENICE. Make room, stand face.
    Shylock, world thinks, too,
    thou leadest fashion thy malice
    hour act; then, 'tis thought,
    Thou'lt show thy mercy remorse, strange
    thy strange apparent cruelty;
    thou exacts penalty,
    pound poor merchant's flesh,
    Thou wilt loose forfeiture,
    But, touch'd human gentleness love,
    Forgive moiety principal,
    Glancing eye pity losses,
    late huddled back-
    Enow press royal merchant down,
    pluck commiseration state
    brassy bosoms rough hearts flint,
    stubborn Turks Tartars, train'd  
    offices tender courtesy.
    expect gentle answer, Jew.
  SHYLOCK. possess'd Grace purpose,
    holy Sabbath sworn
    due forfeit bond.
    deny it, danger light
    charter city's freedom.
    choose have
    weight carrion flesh receive
    thousand ducats. answer that,
    humour- answer'd?
    house troubled rat,
    pleas'd give ten thousand ducats
    ban'd? What, answer'd yet?
    men love gaping pig;
    mad behold cat;
    others, bagpipe sings i' th' nose,
    urine; affection,
    Mistress passion, sways mood
    likes loathes. Now, answer:  
    firm reason rend'red
    abide gaping pig;
    he, harmless cat;
    he, woollen bagpipe, force
    yield inevitable shame
    offend, offended;
    give reason, not,
    lodg'd hate loathing
    bear Antonio, follow thus
    losing suit him. answered?
  BASSANIO. answer, thou unfeeling man,
    excuse current thy cruelty.
  SHYLOCK. bound thee answers.
  BASSANIO. men kill things love?
  SHYLOCK. Hates man thing kill?
  BASSANIO. offence hate first.
  SHYLOCK. What, wouldst thou serpent sting thee twice?
  ANTONIO. pray you, question Jew.
    stand beach
    bid main flood bate usual height;  
    question wolf,
    hath made ewe bleat lamb;
    forbid mountain pines
    wag high tops make noise
    fretten gusts heaven;
    hard
    seek soften that- harder?-
    jewish heart. Therefore, beseech you,
    Make moe offers, farther means,
    plain conveniency
    judgment, Jew will.
  BASSANIO. thy thousand ducats six.
  SHYLOCK. ducat thousand ducats
    parts, part ducat,
    draw them; bond.
  DUKE VENICE. shalt thou hope mercy, rend'ring none?
  SHYLOCK. judgment dread, wrong?
    purchas'd slave,
    Which, fike asses dogs mules,
    abject slavish parts,  
    bought them; you
    'Let free, marry heirs-
    sweat burdens?- beds
    made soft yours, palates
    season'd viands'? answer
    'The slaves ours.' answer you:
    pound flesh demand him
    dearly bought, 'tis mine, it.
    deny me, fie law!
    force decrees Venice.
    stand judgment; answer; it?
  DUKE VENICE. power dismiss court,
    Bellario, learned doctor,
    determine this,
    to-day.
  SALERIO. lord, stays without
    messenger letters doctor,
    Padua.
  DUKE VENICE. Bring letters; call messenger.
  BASSANIO. Good cheer, Antonio! What, man, courage yet!  
    Jew flesh, blood, bones, all,
    Ere thou shalt lose drop blood.
  ANTONIO. tainted wether flock,
    Meetest death; weakest kind fruit
    Drops earliest ground, me.
    employ'd, Bassanio,
    live still, write mine epitaph.

           Enter NERISSA dressed lawyer's clerk

  DUKE VENICE. Padua, Bellario?
  NERISSA. both, lord. Bellario greets Grace.
                                             [Presents letter]
  BASSANIO. dost thou whet thy knife earnestly?
  SHYLOCK. cut forfeiture bankrupt there.
  GRATIANO. thy sole, thy soul, harsh Jew,
    Thou mak'st thy knife keen; metal can,
    No, hangman's axe, bear half keenness
    thy sharp envy. prayers pierce thee?
  SHYLOCK. No, thou hast wit make.  
  GRATIANO. O, thou damn'd, inexecrable dog!
    thy life justice accus'd.
    Thou mak'st waver faith,
    hold opinion Pythagoras
    souls animals infuse themselves
    trunks men. Thy currish spirit
    Govern'd wolf who, hang'd human slaughter,
    gallows fell soul fleet,
    And, whilst thou layest thy unhallowed dam,
    Infus'd thee; thy desires
    wolfish, bloody, starv'd ravenous.
  SHYLOCK. Till thou canst rail seal bond,
    Thou offend'st thy lungs speak loud;
    Repair thy wit, good youth, fall
    cureless ruin. stand law.
  DUKE VENICE. letter Bellario doth commend
    young learned doctor court.
    he?
  NERISSA. attendeth hard by
    answer, admit him.  
  DUKE VENICE. heart. you
    give courteous conduct place.
    Meantime, court hear Bellario's letter.
  CLERK.  [Reads]  'Your Grace understand receipt
    letter sick; instant your
    messenger came, loving visitation young doctor
    Rome- Balthazar. acquainted cause
    controversy Jew Antonio merchant; we
    turn'd o'er books together; furnished opinion
    which, bettered learning-the greatness whereof I
    commend- importunity fill
    Grace's request stead. beseech lack
    years impediment lack reverend estimation,
    knew young body head. leave him
    gracious acceptance, trial publish his
    commendation.'

      Enter PORTIA BALTHAZAR, dressed Doctor Laws

  DUKE VENICE. hear learn'd Bellario, writes;  
    here, it, doctor come.
    Give hand; Bellario?
  PORTIA. did, lord.
  DUKE VENICE. welcome; place.
    acquainted difference
    holds present question court?
  PORTIA. informed throughly cause.
    merchant here, Jew?
  DUKE VENICE. Antonio Shylock, stand forth.
  PORTIA. Shylock?
  SHYLOCK. Shylock name.
  PORTIA. strange nature suit follow;
    rule Venetian law
    impugn proceed.
    stand danger, not?
  ANTONIO. Ay, says.
  PORTIA. confess bond?
  ANTONIO. do.
  PORTIA. Jew merciful.
  SHYLOCK. compulsion I? that.  
  PORTIA. quality mercy strain'd;
    droppeth gentle rain heaven
    place beneath. blest:
    blesseth takes.
    'Tis mightiest mightiest; becomes
    throned monarch crown;
    sceptre shows force temporal power,
    attribute awe majesty,
    doth sit dread fear kings;
    mercy sceptred sway,
    enthroned hearts kings,
    attribute God himself;
    earthly power doth show likest God's
    mercy seasons justice. Therefore, Jew,
    justice thy plea, this-
    justice us
    salvation; pray mercy,
    prayer doth teach render
    deeds mercy. spoke much
    mitigate justice thy plea,  
    thou follow, strict court Venice
    give sentence 'gainst merchant there.
  SHYLOCK. deeds head! crave law,
    penalty forfeit bond.
  BASSANIO. Yes; tender court;
    Yea, sum; suffice,
    bound pay ten times o'er
    forfeit hands, head, heart;
    suffice, appear
    malice bears truth. And, beseech you,
    Wrest law authority;
    great wrong,
    curb cruel devil will.
  PORTIA. be; power Venice
    alter decree established;
    'Twill recorded precedent,
    error, example,
    rush state; be.
  SHYLOCK. Daniel judgment! Yea, Daniel!
    O wise young judge, honour thee!  
  PORTIA. pray you, bond.
  SHYLOCK. 'tis, reverend Doctor; is.
  PORTIA. Shylock, thrice thy money off'red thee.
  SHYLOCK. oath, oath! oath heaven.
    lay perjury soul?
    No, Venice.
  PORTIA. Why, bond forfeit;
    lawfully Jew claim
    pound flesh, cut off
    Nearest merchant's heart. merciful.
    thrice thy money; bid tear bond.
  SHYLOCK. paid tenour.
    doth worthy judge;
    law; exposition
    Hath sound; charge law,
    Whereof well-deserving pillar,
    Proceed judgment. soul swear
    power tongue man
    alter me. stay bond.
  ANTONIO. heartily beseech court  
    give judgment.
  PORTIA. then, is:
    prepare bosom knife.
  SHYLOCK. O noble judge! O excellent young man!
  PORTIA. intent purpose law
    Hath full relation penalty,
    appeareth due bond.
  SHYLOCK. 'Tis true. O wise upright judge,
    elder art thou thy looks!
  PORTIA. Therefore, lay bare bosom.
  SHYLOCK. Ay, breast-
    bond; doth not, noble judge?
    'Nearest heart,' words.
  PORTIA. so. balance weigh
    flesh?
  SHYLOCK. ready.
  PORTIA. surgeon, Shylock, charge,
    stop wounds, bleed death.
  SHYLOCK. nominated bond?
  PORTIA. express'd, that?  
    'Twere good charity.
  SHYLOCK. find it; 'tis bond.
  PORTIA. You, merchant, say?
  ANTONIO. little: arm'd prepar'd.
    Give hand, Bassanio; fare well.
    Grieve fall'n you,
    Fortune shows kind
    custom. use
    wretched man outlive wealth,
    view hollow eye wrinkled brow
    age poverty; ling'ring penance
    misery doth cut off.
    Commend honourable wife;
    process Antonio's end;
    lov'd you; speak fair death;
    And, tale told, bid judge
    Bassanio love.
    Repent lose friend,
    repents pays debt;
    Jew cut deep enough,  
    pay instantly heart.
  BASSANIO. Antonio, married wife
    dear life itself;
    life itself, wife, world,
    esteem'd thy life;
    lose all, ay, sacrifice all
    devil, deliver you.
  PORTIA. wife give that,
    hear make offer.
  GRATIANO. wife protest love;
    heaven, could
    Entreat power change currish Jew.
  NERISSA. 'Tis offer back;
    make unquiet house.
  SHYLOCK.  [Aside]  Christian husbands! a
    daughter-
    stock Barrabas
    husband, Christian!-
    trifle time; pray thee pursue sentence.
  PORTIA. pound merchant's flesh thine.  
    court awards law doth give it.
  SHYLOCK. rightful judge!
  PORTIA. cut flesh breast.
    law court awards it.
  SHYLOCK. learned judge! sentence! Come, prepare.
  PORTIA. Tarry little; else.
    bond doth give thee jot blood:
    words expressly 'a pound flesh.'
    thy bond, thou thy pound flesh;
    But, cutting it, thou dost shed
    drop Christian blood, thy lands goods
    Are, laws Venice, confiscate
    state Venice.
  GRATIANO. O upright judge! Mark, Jew. O learned judge!
  SHYLOCK. law?
  PORTIA. Thyself shalt act;
    For, thou urgest justice, assur'd
    Thou shalt justice, thou desir'st.
  GRATIANO. O learned judge! Mark, Jew. learned judge!
  SHYLOCK. offer then: pay bond thrice,  
    Christian go.
  BASSANIO. money.
  PORTIA. Soft!
    Jew justice. Soft! haste.
    penalty.
  GRATIANO. O Jew! upright judge, learned judge!
  PORTIA. Therefore, prepare thee cut flesh.
    Shed thou blood, cut thou more
    pound flesh; thou tak'st more
    pound- much
    makes light heavy substance,
    division twentieth part
    poor scruple; nay, scale turn
    estimation hair-
    Thou diest, thy goods confiscate.
  GRATIANO. Daniel, Daniel, Jew!
    Now, infidel, hip.
  PORTIA. doth Jew pause? thy forfeiture.
  SHYLOCK. Give principal, go.
  BASSANIO. ready thee; is.  
  PORTIA. hath refus'd open court;
    justice, bond.
  GRATIANO. Daniel I, Daniel!
    thee, Jew, teaching word.
  SHYLOCK. barely principal?
  PORTIA. Thou shalt forfeiture
    thy peril, Jew.
  SHYLOCK. Why, devil give good it!
    stay longer question.
  PORTIA. Tarry, Jew.
    law hath hold you.
    enacted laws Venice,
    proved alien
    direct indirect attempts
    seek life citizen,
    party 'gainst doth contrive
    seize half goods; half
    privy coffer state;
    offender's life lies mercy
    Duke only, 'gainst voice.  
    predicament, say, thou stand'st;
    appears manifest proceeding
    indirectly, directly too,
    Thou hast contrived life
    defendant; thou hast incurr'd
    danger rehears'd.
    Down, therefore, beg mercy Duke.
  GRATIANO. Beg thou mayst leave hang thyself;
    yet, thy wealth forfeit state,
    Thou hast left cord;
    thou hang'd state's charge.
  DUKE VENICE. thou shalt difference spirit,
    pardon thee thy life thou it.
    half thy wealth, Antonio's;
    half general state,
    humbleness drive fine.
  PORTIA. Ay, state; Antonio.
  SHYLOCK. Nay, life all, pardon that.
    house prop
    doth sustain house; life  
    means live.
  PORTIA. mercy render him, Antonio?
  GRATIANO. halter gratis; else, God's sake!
  ANTONIO. lord Duke court
    quit fine half goods;
    content, have
    half use, render it
    death gentleman
    stole daughter-
    things provided more; that, favour,
    presently Christian;
    other, record gift,
    court, dies possess'd
    son Lorenzo daughter.
  DUKE VENICE. this, recant
    pardon late pronounced here.
  PORTIA. Art thou contented, Jew? dost thou say?
  SHYLOCK. content.
  PORTIA. Clerk, draw deed gift.
  SHYLOCK. pray you, give leave hence;  
    well; send deed me
    sign it.
  DUKE VENICE. thee gone, it.
  GRATIANO. christ'ning shalt thou god-fathers;
    judge, thou shouldst ten more,
    bring thee gallows, font.
                                                    Exit SHYLOCK
  DUKE VENICE. Sir, entreat home dinner.
  PORTIA. humbly desire Grace pardon;
    night Padua,
    meet presently set forth.
  DUKE VENICE. leisure serves not.
    Antonio, gratify gentleman,
    mind bound him.
                             Exeunt DUKE, MAGNIFICOES, train
  BASSANIO. worthy gentleman, friend
    wisdom day acquitted
    grievous penalties; lieu whereof
    thousand ducats, due Jew,
    freely cope courteous pains withal.  
  ANTONIO. stand indebted, above,
    love service evermore.
  PORTIA. paid satisfied,
    I, delivering you, satisfied,
    account paid.
    mind mercenary.
    pray you, meet again;
    well, leave.
  BASSANIO. Dear sir, force attempt further;
    remembrance us, tribute,
    fee. Grant things, pray you,
    deny me, pardon me.
  PORTIA. press far, yield.
    [To ANTONIO]  Give gloves, wear sake.
    [To BASSANIO]  And, love, ring you.
    draw back hand; more,
    love deny this.
  BASSANIO. ring, good sir- alas, trifle;
    shame give this.
  PORTIA. this;  
    now, methinks, mind it.
  BASSANIO.. depends value.
    dearest ring Venice give you,
    find proclamation;
    this, pray you, pardon me.
  PORTIA. see, sir, liberal offers;
    taught beg, now, methinks,
    teach beggar answer'd.
  BASSANIO. Good sir, ring wife;
    And, put on, made vow
    sell, give, lose it.
  PORTIA. 'scuse serves men save gifts.
    wife mad woman,
    deserv'd ring,
    hold enemy ever
    giving me. Well, peace you!
                                       Exeunt PORTIA NERISSA
  ANTONIO. Lord Bassanio, ring.
    deservings, love withal,
    valued 'gainst wife's commandment.  
  BASSANIO. Go, Gratiano, run overtake him;
    Give ring, bring him, thou canst,
    Antonio's house. Away, make haste.        Exit GRATIANO
    Come, thither presently;
    morning early both
    Fly Belmont. Come, Antonio.                    Exeunt




SCENE II.
Venice. street

Enter PORTIA NERISSA

  PORTIA. Inquire Jew's house out, give deed,
    sign it; tonight,
    day husbands home.
    deed Lorenzo.

                          Enter GRATIANO

  GRATIANO. Fair sir, o'erta'en.
    Lord Bassanio, advice,
    Hath ring, doth entreat
    company dinner.
  PORTIA. be.
    ring accept thankfully,
    so, pray you, him. Furthermore,
    pray show youth Shylock's house.
  GRATIANO. do.
  NERISSA. Sir, speak you.  
    [Aside PORTIA]  husband's ring,
    make swear ever.
  PORTIA.  [To NERISSA]  Thou Mayst, warrant. old
      swearing
    give rings men;
    outface them, outswear too.
    [Aloud]  Away, make haste, thou know'st tarry.
  NERISSA. Come, good sir, show house?
                                                          Exeunt




ACT V. SCENE I.
Belmont. garden PORTIA'S house

Enter LORENZO JESSICA

  LORENZO. moon shines bright. night this,
    sweet wind gently kiss trees,
    make noise- night,
    Troilus methinks mounted Troyan walls,
    sigh'd soul Grecian tents,
    Cressid lay night.
  JESSICA. night
    Thisby fearfully o'ertrip dew,
    lion's shadow ere himself,
    ran dismayed away.
  LORENZO. night
    Stood Dido willow hand
    wild sea-banks, waft love
    Carthage.
  JESSICA. night
    Medea gathered enchanted herbs
    renew AEson.
 LORENZO. night  
    Jessica steal wealthy Jew,
    unthrift love run Venice
    Belmont.
  JESSICA. night
    young Lorenzo swear lov'd well,
    Stealing soul vows faith,
    ne'er true one.
  LORENZO. night
    pretty Jessica, shrew,
    Slander love, forgave her.
  JESSICA. out-night you, body come;
    But, hark, hear footing man.

                       Enter STEPHANO

  LORENZO. fast silence night?
  STEPHANO. friend.
  LORENZO. friend! friend? name, pray you, friend?
  STEPHANO. Stephano name, bring word
    mistress break day  
    Belmont; doth stray about
    holy crosses, kneels prays
    happy wedlock hours.
  LORENZO. her?
  STEPHANO. holy hermit maid.
    pray you, master return'd?
  LORENZO. not, heard him.
    in, pray thee, Jessica,
    ceremoniously prepare
    mistress house.

                         Enter LAUNCELOT

  LAUNCELOT. Sola, sola! wo ha, ho! sola, sola!
  LORENZO. calls?
  LAUNCELOT. Sola! Master Lorenzo? Master Lorenzo! Sola,
    sola!
  LORENZO. Leave holloaing, man. Here!
  LAUNCELOT. Sola! Where, where?
  LORENZO. Here!  
  LAUNCELOT. post master his
    horn full good news; master ere morning.
 Exit
  LORENZO. Sweet soul, in, expect coming.
    matter- in?
    friend Stephano, signify, pray you,
    house, mistress hand;
    bring music air.       Exit STEPHANO
    sweet moonlight sleeps bank!
    sit sounds music
    Creep ears; soft stillness night
    touches sweet harmony.
    Sit, Jessica. floor heaven
    thick inlaid patines bright gold;
    smallest orb thou behold'st
    motion angel sings,
    quiring young-ey'd cherubins;
    harmony immortal souls,
    whilst muddy vesture decay
    Doth grossly close in, hear it.  

                          Enter MUSICIANS

    Come, ho, wake Diana hymn;
    sweetest touches pierce mistress' ear.
    draw home music.                        [Music]
  JESSICA. merry hear sweet music.
  LORENZO. reason spirits attentive;
    note wild wanton herd,
    race youthful unhandled colts,
    Fetching mad bounds, bellowing neighing loud,
    hot condition blood-
    hear perchance trumpet sound,
    air music touch ears,
    perceive make mutual stand,
    savage eyes turn'd modest gaze
    sweet power music. poet
    feign Orpheus drew trees, stones, floods;
    nought stockish, hard, full rage,
    music time doth change nature.  
    man hath music himself,
    mov'd concord sweet sounds,
    fit treasons, stratagems, spoils;
    motions spirit dull:as night,
    affections dark Erebus.
    man trusted. Mark music.

                    Enter PORTIA NERISSA

  PORTIA. light burning hall.
    candle throws beams!
    shines good deed naughty world.
  NERISSA. moon shone, candle.
  PORTIA. doth greater glory dim less:
    substitute shines brightly king
    king by, state
    Empties itself, doth inland brook
    main waters. Music! hark!
  NERISSA. music, madam, house.
  PORTIA. good, see, respect;  
    Methinks sounds sweeter day.
  NERISSA. Silence bestows virtue it, madam.
  PORTIA. crow doth sing sweetly lark
    attended; think
    ne nightingale, sing day,
    goose cackling, thought
    musician wren.
    things season season'd are
    praise true perfection!
    Peace, ho! moon sleeps Endymion,
    awak'd.                      [Music ceases]
  LORENZO. voice,
    deceiv'd, Portia.
  PORTIA. blind man cuckoo,
    bad voice.
  LORENZO. Dear lady, home.
  PORTIA. praying husbands' welfare,
    speed, hope, words.
    return'd?
  LORENZO. Madam, yet;  
    messenger before,
    signify coming.
  PORTIA.. in, Nerissa;
    Give order servants take
    note absent hence;
    you, Lorenzo; Jessica, you.        [A tucket sounds]
  LORENZO. husband hand; hear trumpet.
    tell-tales, madam, fear not.
  PORTIA. night methinks daylight sick;
    paler; 'tis day
    day sun hid.

       Enter BASSANIO, ANTONIO, GRATIANO, followers

  BASSANIO. hold day Antipodes,
    walk absence sun.
  PORTIA. give light, light,
    light wife doth make heavy husband,
    Bassanio me;
    God sort all! home, lord.  
  BASSANIO. you, madam; give friend.
    man, Antonio,
    infinitely bound.
  PORTIA. sense bound him,
    For, hear, bound you.
  ANTONIO. acquitted of.
  PORTIA. Sir, house.
    ways words,
    scant breathing courtesy.
  GRATIANO.  [To NERISSA]  yonder moon swear wrong;
    faith, gave judge's clerk.
    gelt it, part,
    it, love, heart.
  PORTIA. quarrel, ho, already! matter?
  GRATIANO. hoop gold, paltry ring
    give me, posy was
    world cutler's poetry
    knife, 'Love me, leave not.'
  NERISSA. talk posy value?
    swore me, give you,  
    wear till hour death,
    lie grave;
    me, vehement oaths,
    respective it.
    Gave judge's clerk! No, God's judge,
    clerk ne'er wear hair on's face it.
  GRATIANO. will, live man.
  NERISSA. Ay, woman live man.
  GRATIANO. hand gave youth,
    kind boy, scrubbed boy
    higher thyself, judge's clerk;
    prating boy begg'd fee;
    heart deny him.
  PORTIA. blame, plain you,
    part slightly wife's gift,
    thing stuck oaths finger
    riveted faith flesh.
    gave love ring, made swear
    part it, stands;
    dare sworn leave  
    pluck finger wealth
    world masters. Now, faith, Gratiano,
    give wife unkind grief;
    'twere me, mad it.
  BASSANIO.  [Aside]  Why, cut left hand off,
    swear lost ring defending it.
  GRATIANO. Lord Bassanio gave ring away
    judge begg'd it, indeed
    Deserv'd too; boy, clerk,
    pains writing, begg'd mine;
    man master aught
    rings.
  PORTIA. ring gave you, lord?
    that, hope, receiv'd me.
  BASSANIO. add lie fault,
    deny it; finger
    Hath ring it; gone.
  PORTIA. void false heart truth;
    heaven, ne'er bed
    ring.  
  NERISSA. yours
    Till mine.
  BASSANIO. Sweet Portia,
    gave ring,
    gave ring,
    conceive gave ring,
    unwillingly left ring,
    nought accepted ring,
    abate strength displeasure.
  PORTIA. virtue ring,
    half worthiness gave ring,
    honour ring,
    parted ring.
    man unreasonable,
    pleas'd defended it
    terms zeal, wanted modesty
    urge thing held ceremony?
    Nerissa teaches believe:
    die for't woman ring.
  BASSANIO. No, honour, madam, soul,  
    woman it, civil doctor,
    refuse thousand ducats me,
    begg'd ring; deny him,
    suffer'd displeas'd away-
    held life
    dear friend. say, sweet lady?
    enforc'd send him;
    beset shame courtesy;
    honour ingratitude
    besmear it. Pardon me, good lady;
    blessed candles night,
    there, begg'd
    ring give worthy doctor.
  PORTIA. doctor e'er house;
    hath jewel loved,
    swear me,
    liberal you;
    deny have,
    No, body, husband's bed.
    shall, it.  
    Lie night home; watch Argus;
    not, left alone,
    Now, mine honour mine own,
    doctor mine bedfellow.
  NERISSA. clerk; advis'd
    leave mine protection.
  GRATIANO. Well, so, then;
    For, do, mar young clerk's pen.
  ANTONIO. th' unhappy subject quarrels.
  PORTIA. Sir, grieve you; withstanding.
  BASSANIO. Portia, forgive enforced wrong;
    hearing friends
    swear thee, thine fair eyes,
    myself-
  PORTIA. Mark that!
    eyes doubly sees himself,
    eye one; swear double self,
    oath credit.
  BASSANIO. Nay, hear me.
    Pardon fault, soul swear  
    break oath thee.
  ANTONIO. lend body wealth,
    Which, husband's ring,
    miscarried; dare bound again,
    soul forfeit, lord
    break faith advisedly.
  PORTIA. surety. Give this,
    bid other.
  ANTONIO. Here, Lord Bassanio, swear ring.
  BASSANIO. heaven, gave doctor!
  PORTIA. him. Pardon me, Bassanio,
    For, ring, doctor lay me.
  NERISSA. pardon me, gentle Gratiano,
    scrubbed boy, doctor's clerk,
    lieu this, night lie me.
  GRATIANO. Why, mending highways
    summer, ways fair enough.
    What, cuckolds ere deserv'd it?
  PORTIA. Speak grossly. amaz'd.
    letter; read leisure;  
    Padua, Bellario;
    find Portia doctor,
    Nerissa clerk. Lorenzo here
    witness set you,
    return'd; yet
    Enter'd house. Antonio, welcome;
    news store you
    expect. Unseal letter soon;
    find argosies
    richly harbour suddenly.
    strange accident
    chanced letter.
  ANTONIO. dumb.
  BASSANIO. doctor, knew not?
  GRATIANO. clerk make cuckold?
  NERISSA. Ay, clerk means it,
    live man.
  BASSANIO. Sweet doctor, bedfellow;
    absent, lie wife.
  ANTONIO. Sweet lady, life living;  
    read ships
    safely road.
  PORTIA. now, Lorenzo!
    clerk hath good comforts you.
  NERISSA. Ay, give fee.
    give Jessica,
    rich Jew, special deed gift,
    death, dies possess'd of.
  LORENZO. Fair ladies, drop manna way
    starved people.
  PORTIA. morning,
    satisfied
    events full. in,
    charge inter'gatories,
    answer things faithfully.
  GRATIANO. so. inter'gatory
    Nerissa sworn is,
    till night stay,
    bed now, hours day.
    day come, dark,  
    Till couching doctor's clerk.
    Well, live, fear thing
    sore keeping safe Nerissa's ring.               Exeunt

THE END

1601

THE MERRY WIVES WINDSOR

by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  SIR JOHN FALSTAFF
  FENTON, young gentleman
  SHALLOW, country justice
  SLENDER, cousin Shallow

    Gentlemen Windsor
  FORD
  PAGE
  WILLIAM PAGE, boy, son Page
  SIR HUGH EVANS, Welsh parson
  DOCTOR CAIUS, French physician
  HOST Garter Inn

    Followers Falstaff
  BARDOLPH
  PISTOL
  NYM
  ROBIN, page Falstaff
  SIMPLE, servant Slender
  RUGBY, servant Doctor Caius  

  MISTRESS FORD
  MISTRESS PAGE
  MISTRESS ANNE PAGE, daughter
  MISTRESS QUICKLY, servant Doctor Caius
  SERVANTS Page, Ford, etc.

SCENE:
Windsor, neighbourhood


The Merry Wives Windsor



ACT I. SCENE 1.

Windsor. PAGE'S house

Enter JUSTICE SHALLOW, SLENDER, SIR HUGH EVANS

  SHALLOW. Sir Hugh, persuade not; make Star
    Chamber matter it; twenty Sir John Falstaffs,
    abuse Robert Shallow, esquire.
  SLENDER. county Gloucester, Justice Peace, and
    Coram.
  SHALLOW. Ay, cousin Slender, Custalorum.
  SLENDER. Ay, Ratolorum too; gentleman born,
    Master Parson, writes 'Armigero' bill,
    warrant, quittance, obligation-'Armigero.'
  SHALLOW. Ay, do; time three
    hundred years.
  SLENDER. successors, him, hath done't;
    ancestors, him, may: may
    give dozen white luces coat.
  SHALLOW. coat.
  EVANS. dozen white louses coat well;  
    agrees well, passant; familiar beast man, and
    signifies love.
  SHALLOW. luce fresh fish; salt fish old
    coat.
  SLENDER. quarter, coz.
  SHALLOW. may, marrying.
  EVANS. marring indeed, quarter it.
  SHALLOW. whit.
  EVANS. Yes, py'r lady! quarter coat, there
    skirts yourself, simple conjectures;
    one. Sir John Falstaff committed
    disparagements you, church, be
    glad benevolence, make atonements and
    compremises you.
  SHALLOW. Council hear it; riot.
  EVANS. meet Council hear riot; no
    fear riot; Council, you, desire
    hear fear Got, hear riot; your
    vizaments that.
  SHALLOW. Ha! o' life, young again, sword  
    end it.
  EVANS. petter friends sword end it;
    device prain, which
    peradventure prings goot discretions it. Anne
    Page, daughter Master George Page, is
    pretty virginity.
  SLENDER. Mistress Anne Page? brown hair, and
    speaks small woman.
  EVANS. fery person orld, you
    desire; hundred pounds moneys, and
    gold, silver, grandsire death's-bed-Got
    deliver joyful resurrections!-give, to
    overtake seventeen years old. goot motion we
    leave pribbles prabbles, desire marriage
    Master Abraham Mistress Anne Page.
  SHALLOW. grandsire leave hundred pound?
  EVANS. Ay, father make petter penny.
  SHALLOW. young gentlewoman; good
    gifts.
  EVANS. hundred pounds, possibilities, goot gifts.  
  SHALLOW. Well, honest Master Page. Falstaff
    there?
  EVANS. lie? despise liar do
    despise false; despise not
    true. knight Sir John there; and, beseech you, be
    ruled well-willers. peat door Master
    Page.
    [Knocks]  What, hoa! pless house here!
  PAGE.  [Within]  there?

                            Enter PAGE

  EVANS. Got's plessing, friend, Justice
  Shallow; young Master Slender, peradventures
    tale, matters grow your
    likings.
  PAGE. glad worships well. for
    venison, Master Shallow.
  SHALLOW. Master Page, glad you; good do
    good heart! wish'd venison better; ill  
    kill'd. doth good Mistress Page?-and you
    heart, la! heart.
  PAGE. Sir, you.
  SHALLOW. Sir, you; yea no, do.
  PAGE. glad you, good Master Slender.
  SLENDER. fallow greyhound, sir? heard say
    outrun Cotsall.
  PAGE. judg'd, sir.
  SLENDER. confess, confess.
  SHALLOW. not. 'Tis fault; 'tis fault;
    'tis good dog.
  PAGE. cur, sir.
  SHALLOW. Sir, good dog, fair dog. be
    said? good, fair. Sir John Falstaff here?
  PAGE. Sir, within; good office
    you.
  EVANS. spoke Christians speak.
  SHALLOW. hath wrong'd me, Master Page.
  PAGE. Sir, doth sort confess it.
  SHALLOW. confessed, redressed;  
    so, Master Page? hath wrong'd me; hath; a
    word, hath, me; Robert Shallow, esquire, saith
    wronged.
  PAGE. Sir John.

      Enter SIR JOHN FALSTAFF, BARDOLPH, NYM, PISTOL

  FALSTAFF. Now, Master Shallow, complain to
    King?
  SHALLOW. Knight, beaten men, kill'd deer,
    broke open lodge.
  FALSTAFF. kiss'd keeper's daughter.
  SHALLOW. Tut, pin! answer'd.
  FALSTAFF. answer straight: this.
    answer'd.
  SHALLOW. Council this.
  FALSTAFF. 'Twere counsel:
    laugh'd at.
  EVANS. Pauca verba, Sir John; goot worts.
  FALSTAFF. Good worts! good cabbage! Slender, broke  
    head; matter me?
  SLENDER. Marry, sir, matter head you;
    cony-catching rascals, Bardolph, Nym,
    Pistol. carried tavern, made me
    drunk, pick'd pocket.
  BARDOLPH. Banbury cheese!
  SLENDER. Ay, matter.
  PISTOL. now, Mephostophilus!
  SLENDER. Ay, matter.
  NYM. Slice, say! pauca, pauca; slice! humour.
  SLENDER. Simple, man? tell, cousin?
  EVANS. Peace, pray you. understand. is
    umpires matter, understand: is,
    Master Page, fidelicet Master Page; myself,
    fidelicet myself; party is, lastly and
    finally, mine host Garter.
  PAGE. hear end them.
  EVANS. Fery goot. make prief note-book;
    ork great
    discreetly can.  
  FALSTAFF. Pistol!
  PISTOL. hears ears.
  EVANS. tevil tam! phrase this, 'He hears
    ear'? Why, affectations.
  FALSTAFF. Pistol, pick Master Slender's purse?
  SLENDER. Ay, gloves, he-or might
    mine great chamber else!-of
    groats mill-sixpences, Edward
    shovel-boards cost shilling pence apiece
    Yead Miller, gloves.
  FALSTAFF. true, Pistol?
  EVANS. No, false, pick-purse.
  PISTOL. Ha, thou mountain-foreigner! Sir John master
    mine,
    combat challenge latten bilbo.
    Word denial thy labras here!
    Word denial! Froth scum, thou liest.
  SLENDER. gloves, then, 'twas he.
  NYM. avis'd, sir, pass good humours; say
    'marry trap' you, run nuthook's humour  
    me; note it.
  SLENDER. hat, then, red face it; for
    remember made me
    drunk, altogether ass.
  FALSTAFF. you, Scarlet John?
  BARDOLPH. Why, sir, part, gentleman had
    drunk sentences.
  EVANS. senses; fie, ignorance is!
  BARDOLPH. fap, sir, was, say, cashier'd;
    conclusions pass'd careers.
  SLENDER. Ay, spake Latin too; 'tis matter;
    ne'er drunk whilst live again, honest,
    civil, godly company, trick. drunk, be
    drunk fear God, with
    drunken knaves.
  EVANS. udge me, virtuous mind.
  FALSTAFF. hear matters deni'd, gentlemen; you
    hear it.

          Enter MISTRESS ANNE PAGE wine; MISTRESS  
               FORD MISTRESS PAGE, following

  PAGE. Nay, daughter, carry wine in; drink within.
                                                  Exit ANNE PAGE
  SLENDER. O heaven! Mistress Anne Page.
  PAGE. now, Mistress Ford!
  FALSTAFF. Mistress Ford, troth, well
    met; leave, good mistress.              [Kisses her]
  PAGE. Wife, bid gentlemen welcome. Come, a
    hot venison pasty dinner; come, gentlemen, hope we
    drink unkindness.
                      Exeunt SHALLOW, SLENDER, EVANS
  SLENDER. forty shillings Book of
    Songs Sonnets here.

                          Enter SIMPLE

    How, Simple! been? wait on
    myself, I? Book Riddles you,
    you?  
  SIMPLE. Book Riddles! Why, lend Alice
    Shortcake Allhallowmas last, fortnight afore
    Michaelmas?
  SHALLOW. Come, coz; come, coz; stay you. word
    you, coz; marry, this, coz: is, 'twere, a
    tender, kind tender, made afar Sir Hugh here. Do
    understand me?
  SLENDER. Ay, sir, find reasonable; so, I
    reason.
  SHALLOW. Nay, understand me.
  SLENDER. do, sir.
  EVANS. Give ear motions: Master Slender, will
    description matter you, capacity it.
  SLENDER. Nay, cousin Shallow says; pray
    pardon me; justice peace country,
    simple stand here.
  EVANS. question. question is
    marriage.
  SHALLOW. Ay, point, sir.
  EVANS. Marry it; point it; Mistress Anne  
    Page.
  SLENDER. Why, so, marry any
    reasonable demands.
  EVANS. affection oman? command to
    mouth lips; divers philosophers
    hold lips parcel mouth. Therefore,
    precisely, carry good maid?
  SHALLOW. Cousin Abraham Slender, love her?
  SLENDER. hope, sir, that
    reason.
  EVANS. Nay, Got's lords ladies! speak possitable,
    carry desires her.
  SHALLOW. must. you, good dowry,
    marry her?
  SLENDER. greater thing request,
    cousin, reason.
  SHALLOW. Nay, conceive me, conceive me, sweet coz; what
    pleasure you, coz. love maid?
  SLENDER. marry her, sir, request; there
    great love beginning, heaven decrease  
    acquaintance, married and
    occasion another. hope upon
    familiarity grow contempt. say
    'marry her,' marry her; freely dissolved,
    dissolutely.
  EVANS. fery discretion answer, save fall the
    ord 'dissolutely': ort is, meaning,
    'resolutely'; meaning good.
  SHALLOW. Ay, cousin meant well.
  SLENDER. Ay, hang'd, la!

                       Re-enter ANNE PAGE

  SHALLOW. fair Mistress Anne. were
    young sake, Mistress Anne!
  ANNE. dinner table; father desires your
    worships' company.
  SHALLOW. wait him, fair Mistress Anne!
  EVANS. Od's plessed will! absence grace.
                                        Exeunt SHALLOW EVANS  
  ANNE. Will't worship in, sir?
  SLENDER. No, you, forsooth, heartily; very
    well.
  ANNE. dinner attends you, sir.
  SLENDER. a-hungry, you, forsooth. Go,
    sirrah, man, wait cousin
  Shallow.  [Exit SIMPLE]  justice peace may
    beholding friend man. men
    boy yet, till mother dead. though?
    live poor gentleman born.
  ANNE. worship; not
    sit till come.
  SLENDER. I' faith, eat nothing; as
    did.
  ANNE. pray you, sir, walk in.
  SLENDER. walk here, you. bruis'd my
    shin th' day playing sword dagger with
    master fence-three veneys dish stew'd prunes
    -and, ward defending head, hot shin,
    and, troth, abide smell hot meat  
    since. dogs bark so? bears i' th'
    town?
  ANNE. are, sir; heard talk'd of.
  SLENDER. love sport well; quarrel at
    man England. afraid, the
    bear loose, not?
  ANNE. Ay, indeed, sir.
  SLENDER. meat drink now. seen
    Sackerson loose twenty times, the
    chain; warrant you, women cried and
    shriek'd pass'd; women, indeed, cannot
    abide 'em; ill-favour'd rough things.

                         Re-enter PAGE

  PAGE. Come, gentle Master Slender, come; stay you.
  SLENDER. eat nothing, you, sir.
  PAGE. cock pie, choose, sir! Come,
    come.
  SLENDER. Nay, pray lead way.  
  PAGE. on, sir.
  SLENDER. Mistress Anne, first.
  ANNE. I, sir; pray on.
  SLENDER. Truly, first; truly, la! do
    wrong.
  ANNE. pray you, sir.
  SLENDER. unmannerly troublesome. You
    wrong indeed, la!                         Exeunt




SCENE 2.

Before PAGE'S house

Enter SIR HUGH EVANS SIMPLE

  EVANS. ways, Doctor Caius' house which
    way; dwells Mistress Quickly, which
    manner nurse, dry nurse, cook,
    laundry, washer, wringer.
  SIMPLE. Well, sir.
  EVANS. Nay, petter yet. Give letter; a
    oman altogether's acquaintance Mistress Anne
    Page; letter desire require solicit
    master's desires Mistress Anne Page. pray you
    gone. make end dinner; pippins
    cheese come.                                   Exeunt




SCENE 3.

The Garter Inn

Enter FALSTAFF, HOST, BARDOLPH, NYM, PISTOL, ROBIN

  FALSTAFF. Mine host Garter!
  HOST. bully rook? Speak scholarly and
    wisely.
  FALSTAFF. Truly, mine host, turn my
    followers.
  HOST. Discard, bully Hercules; cashier; wag; trot,
    trot.
  FALSTAFF. sit ten pounds week.
  HOST. Thou'rt emperor-Caesar, Keiser, Pheazar. I
    entertain Bardolph; draw, tap; I
    well, bully Hector?
  FALSTAFF. so, good mine host.
  HOST. spoke; follow.  [To BARDOLPH]  me
    thee froth lime. word; follow.   Exit HOST
  FALSTAFF. Bardolph, follow him. tapster good trade;
    cloak makes jerkin; wither'd serving-man  
    fresh tapster. Go; adieu.
  BARDOLPH. life desir'd; thrive.
  PISTOL. O base Hungarian wight! Wilt thou spigot
    wield?                                         Exit BARDOLPH
  NYM. drink. humour conceited?
  FALSTAFF. glad acquit tinder-box: his
    thefts open; filching unskilful
    singer-he time.
  NYM. good humour steal minute's rest.
  PISTOL. 'Convey' wise call. 'Steal' foh! fico the
    phrase!
  FALSTAFF. Well, sirs, heels.
  PISTOL. Why, then, kibes ensue.
  FALSTAFF. remedy; cony-catch; must
    shift.
  PISTOL. Young ravens food.
  FALSTAFF. Ford town?
  PISTOL. ken wight; substance good.
  FALSTAFF. honest lads, about.
  PISTOL. yards, more.  
  FALSTAFF. quips now, Pistol. Indeed, waist
    yards about; waste; about
    thrift. Briefly, make love Ford's wife; I
    spy entertainment her; discourses, carves, she
    leer invitation; construe action her
    familiar style; hardest voice behaviour, be
    English'd rightly, 'I Sir John Falstaff's.'
    PISTOL. hath studied well, translated out
    honesty English.
  NYM. anchor deep; humour pass?
  FALSTAFF. Now, report rule her
    husband's purse; hath legion angels.
  PISTOL. devils entertain; 'To her, boy,' I.
  NYM. humour rises; good; humour angels.
  FALSTAFF. writ letter her; here
    Page's wife, gave good eyes
    too, examin'd parts judicious oeillades;
    beam view gilded foot, my
    portly belly.
  PISTOL. sun dunghill shine.  
  NYM. thee humour.
  FALSTAFF. O, o'er exteriors such
    greedy intention appetite eye to
    scorch burning-glass! letter to
    her. bears purse too; region Guiana, all
    gold bounty. cheaters both, they
    exchequers me; East West
    Indies, trade both. Go, bear thou this
    letter Mistress Page; thou Mistress Ford. We
    thrive, lads, thrive.
  PISTOL. Sir Pandarus Troy become,
    side wear steel? Lucifer all!
  NYM. run base humour. Here, the
    humour-letter; haviour reputation.
  FALSTAFF.  [To ROBIN]  Hold, sirrah; bear letters
    tightly;
    Sail pinnace golden shores.
    Rogues, hence, avaunt! vanish hailstones, go;
    Trudge, plod i' th' hoof; seek shelter, pack!
    Falstaff learn humour age;  
    French thrift, rogues; myself, skirted page.
                                       Exeunt FALSTAFF ROBIN
  PISTOL. vultures gripe thy guts! gourd fullam
    holds,
    high low beguiles rich poor;
    Tester pouch thou shalt lack,
    Base Phrygian Turk!
  NYM. operations head humours of
    revenge.
  PISTOL. Wilt thou revenge?
  NYM. welkin star!
  PISTOL. wit steel?
  NYM. humours, I.
    discuss humour love Page.
  PISTOL. Ford eke unfold
    Falstaff, varlet vile,
    dove prove, gold hold,
    soft couch defile.
  NYM. humour cool; incense Page deal
    poison; possess yellowness;  
    revolt mine dangerous. true humour.
  PISTOL. Thou art Mars malcontents; thee;
    troop on.                                             Exeunt




SCENE 4.

DOCTOR CAIUS'S house

Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY, SIMPLE, RUGBY

  QUICKLY. What, John Rugby! pray thee casement
    master, Master Doctor
    Caius, coming. do, i' faith, find the
    house, abusing God's patience and
    King's English.
  RUGBY. watch.
  QUICKLY. Go; posset for't night, in
    faith, end sea-coal fire.  [Exit RUGBY]  An
    honest, willing, kind fellow, servant in
    house withal; and, warrant you, tell-tale no
    breed-bate; worst fault prayer; is
    peevish way; fault;
    pass. Peter Simple is?
  SIMPLE. Ay, fault better.
  QUICKLY. Master Slender's master?
  SIMPLE. Ay, forsooth.  
  QUICKLY. wear great round beard, a
    glover's paring-knife?
  SIMPLE. No, forsooth; hath whey face, a
    yellow beard, Cain-colour'd beard.
  QUICKLY. softly-sprighted man, not?
  SIMPLE. Ay, forsooth; tall man hands as
    head; hath fought a
    warrener.
  QUICKLY. you? O, remember him. Does
    hold head, were, strut gait?
  SIMPLE. Yes, indeed, he.
  QUICKLY. Well, heaven send Anne Page worse fortune!
    Master Parson Evans your
    master. Anne good girl, wish-

                         Re-enter RUGBY

  RUGBY. Out, alas! master.
  QUICKLY. shent. Run here, good young
    man; closet.  [Shuts SIMPLE closet]   
    stay long. What, John Rugby! John! what, John,
    say! Go, John, inquire master; doubt be
    home.  [Singing]
    down, down, adown-a, etc.

                       Enter DOCTOR CAIUS

  CAIUS. Vat sing? des toys. Pray you, go
    vetch closet boitier vert-a box, green-a
    box. intend vat speak? green-a box.
  QUICKLY. Ay, forsooth, fetch you.  [Aside]  glad
    himself; found young man,
    horn-mad.
  CAIUS. Fe, fe, fe fe! ma foi, il fait fort chaud. Je m'en vais a
    la cour-la grande affaire.
  QUICKLY. this, sir?
  CAIUS. Oui; mette le au mon pocket: depeche, quickly. Vere
    dat knave, Rugby?
  QUICKLY. What, John Rugby? John!
  RUGBY. Here, sir.  
  CAIUS. John Rugby, Jack Rugby.
    Come, take-a rapier, heel the
    court.
  RUGBY. 'Tis ready, sir, porch.
    CAIUS. trot, tarry long. Od's me! Qu'ai j'oublie?
    Dere simples closet dat vill the
    varld leave behind.
  QUICKLY. Ay me, find young man there, be
    mad!
  CAIUS. O diable, diable! vat closet? Villainy! larron!
    [Pulling SIMPLE out]  Rugby, rapier!
  QUICKLY. Good master, content.
  CAIUS. Wherefore content-a?
  QUICKLY. young man honest man.
  CAIUS. de honest man closet? Dere is
    honest man dat closet.
  QUICKLY. beseech you, phlegmatic; hear the
    truth it. errand Parson Hugh.
  CAIUS. Vell?
  SIMPLE. Ay, forsooth, desire to-  
  QUICKLY. Peace, pray you.
  CAIUS. Peace-a tongue. Speak-a tale.
  SIMPLE. desire honest gentlewoman, maid, to
    speak good word Mistress Anne Page master,
    marriage.
  QUICKLY. all, indeed, la! ne'er put finger
    fire, not.
  CAIUS. Sir Hugh send-a you? Rugby, baillez paper.
    Tarry little-a-while.                        [Writes]
  QUICKLY.  [Aside SIMPLE]  glad quiet; he
    throughly moved, heard him
    loud melancholy. notwithstanding, man, I'll
    master good can; yea and
    is, French doctor, master-I call him
    master, you, house; wash,
    wring, brew, bake, scour, dress meat drink, make the
    beds, myself-
  SIMPLE.  [Aside QUICKLY]  'Tis great charge come
    body's hand.
  QUICKLY.  [Aside SIMPLE]  avis'd o' that?  
    find great charge; early down
    late; notwithstanding-to ear, would
    words it-my master love with
    Mistress Anne Page; notwithstanding that, know
    Anne's mind-that's there.
  CAIUS. jack'nape; give-a letter Sir Hugh; gar,
    shallenge; cut troat de park; will
    teach scurvy jack-a-nape priest meddle make. You
    gone; good tarry here. gar, will
    cut stones; gar, stone
    throw dog.                             Exit SIMPLE
  QUICKLY. Alas, speaks friend.
  CAIUS. matter-a ver dat. tell-a dat I
    Anne Page myself? gar, vill kill de Jack
    priest; appointed mine host de Jarteer to
    measure weapon. gar, Anne
    Page.
  QUICKLY. Sir, maid loves you, well. We
    give folks leave prate. good-year!
  CAIUS. Rugby, court me. gar,  
    Anne Page, turn head door.
    Follow heels, Rugby.               Exeunt CAIUS RUGBY
  QUICKLY. have-An fool's-head own. No,
    Anne's mind that; woman Windsor
    Anne's mind do; more
    her, heaven.
  FENTON.  [Within]  there? ho!
  QUICKLY. there, trow? house, pray
    you.

                          Enter FENTON

  FENTON. now, good woman, dost thou?
  QUICKLY. pleases good worship to
    ask.
  FENTON. news? pretty Mistress Anne?
  QUICKLY. truth, sir, pretty, honest, and
    gentle; friend, by
    way; praise heaven it.
  FENTON. good, think'st thou? lose  
    suit?
  QUICKLY. Troth, sir, hands above; but
    notwithstanding, Master Fenton, sworn book
    loves you. worship wart eye?
  FENTON. Yes, marry, I; that?
  QUICKLY. Well, hangs tale; good faith, such
    Nan; but, detest, honest maid broke
    bread. hour's talk wart; never
    laugh maid's company! But, indeed, is
    allicholy musing; you-well,
    to.
  FENTON. Well, to-day. Hold, money
    thee; thy voice behalf. thou seest
    me, commend me.
  QUICKLY. I? I' faith, will; your
    worship wart time confidence;
    wooers.
  FENTON. Well, farewell; great haste now.
  QUICKLY. Farewell worship.  [Exit FENTON]  Truly,
    honest gentleman; Anne loves not;  
    Anne's mind does. 't, what
    forgot?                                          Exit
