ACT II. SCENE 1.

Before PAGE'S house

Enter MISTRESS PAGE, letter

  MRS. PAGE. What! scap'd love-letters holiday-time
    beauty, subject them? Let
    see.                                              [Reads]
    'Ask reason love you; Love use
    Reason precisian, admits counsellor.
    young, I; to, then, there's
    sympathy. merry, I; ha! ha! there's
    sympathy. love sack, I; you
    desire sympathy? suffice thee, Mistress Page
    least, love soldier suffice-that love
    thee. say, Pity me: 'tis soldier-like phrase;
    say, Love me. me,
    Thine true knight,
    day night,
    kind light,
    might,  
    thee fight,
    JOHN FALSTAFF.'
    Herod Jewry this! O wicked, wicked world!
    well-nigh worn pieces age show
    young gallant! unweighed behaviour
    hath Flemish drunkard pick'd-with devil's name!
    -out conversation, dares manner
    assay me? Why, hath thrice company!
    him? frugal mirth.
    Heaven forgive me! Why, exhibit bill parliament
    putting men. be
    reveng'd him? reveng'd be, guts
    made puddings.

                       Enter MISTRESS FORD

  MRS. FORD. Mistress Page! trust me, your
    house.
  MRS. PAGE. And, trust me, coming you. look
    ill.  
  MRS. FORD. Nay, ne'er that; show to
    contrary.
  MRS. PAGE. Faith, do, mind.
  MRS. FORD. Well, do, then; yet, say, show to
    contrary. O Mistress Page, give counsel.
  MRS. PAGE. matter, woman?
  MRS. FORD. O woman, trifling respect,
    honour!
  MRS. PAGE. Hang trifle, woman; honour. What
    it? Dispense trifles; it?
  MRS. FORD. hell eternal moment
    so, knighted.
  MRS. PAGE. What? Thou liest. Sir Alice Ford! knights
    hack; thou shouldst alter article thy
    gentry.
  MRS. FORD. burn daylight. Here, read, read; perceive
    knighted. worse fat
    men long eye make difference men's
    liking. swear; prais'd women's
    modesty, gave orderly well-behaved reproof  
    uncomeliness sworn disposition
    truth words; no
    adhere place Hundredth
    Psalm tune 'Greensleeves.' tempest, trow,
    threw whale, tuns oil belly,
    ashore Windsor? revenged him? I
    entertain hope, till
    wicked fire lust melted grease.
    hear like?
  MRS. PAGE. Letter letter, Page and
    Ford differs. thy great comfort mystery ill
    opinions, twin-brother thy letter; thine
    inherit first, for, protest, mine shall. warrant he
    hath thousand letters, writ blank space for
    names-sure, more!-and second
    edition. print them, doubt; cares not
    puts press put two. I
    giantess lie Mount Pelion. Well,
    find twenty lascivious turtles ere chaste
    man.  
  MRS. FORD. Why, same; hand, the
    words. doth us?
  MRS. PAGE. Nay, not; makes ready to
    wrangle mine honesty. entertain like
    acquainted withal; for, sure, he
    strain myself, would
    boarded fury.
  MRS. FORD. 'Boarding' call it? him
    deck.
  MRS. PAGE. I; hatches, never
    sea again. reveng'd him; appoint a
    meeting, give show comfort suit, lead
    fine-baited delay, till hath pawn'd his
    horses mine host Garter.
  MRS. FORD. Nay, consent act villainy against
    sully chariness honesty. O
    husband letter! give eternal food
    jealousy.
  MRS. PAGE. Why, comes; good man
    too; jealousy giving  
    cause; that, hope, unmeasurable distance.
  MRS. FORD. happier woman.
  MRS. PAGE. consult greasy knight.
    hither.                                   [They retire]

           Enter FORD PISTOL, PAGE Nym

  FORD. Well, hope so.
  PISTOL. Hope curtal dog affairs.
    Sir John affects thy wife.
  FORD. Why, sir, wife young.
  PISTOL. woos high low, rich poor,
    young old, another, Ford;
    loves gallimaufry. Ford, perpend.
  FORD. Love wife!
  PISTOL. liver burning hot. Prevent, thou,
    Sir Actaeon he, Ringwood thy heels.
    O, odious name!
  FORD. name, sir?
  PISTOL. horn, say. Farewell.  
    heed, open eye, thieves foot night;
    heed, ere summer comes, cuckoo birds sing.
    Away, Sir Corporal Nym.
    it, Page; speaks sense.               Exit PISTOL
  FORD.  [Aside]  patient; find this.
  NYM.  [To PAGE]  true; humour of
    lying. hath wronged humours; should
    borne humour'd letter her; sword,
    bite necessity. loves wife;
    short long.
    Corporal Nym; speak, avouch;
    'Tis true. Nym, Falstaff loves wife.
    Adieu! love humour bread cheese; and
    humour it. Adieu.                    Exit Nym
  PAGE. 'The humour it,' quoth 'a! fellow frights
    English wits.
  FORD. seek Falstaff.
  PAGE. heard drawling, affecting rogue.
  FORD. find it-well.
  PAGE. Cataian priest o'  
    th' town commended true man.
  FORD. 'Twas good fellow. Well.

             MISTRESS PAGE MISTRESS FORD forward

  PAGE. now, Meg!
  MRS. PAGE. you, George? Hark you.
  MRS. FORD. now, sweet Frank, art thou melancholy?
  FORD. melancholy! melancholy. home;
    go.
  MRS. FORD. Faith, thou hast crotchets thy head now.
    go, Mistress Page?

                     Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY

  MRS. PAGE. you. dinner, George?
    [Aside MRS. FORD]  yonder; shall
    messenger paltry knight.
  MRS. FORD.  [Aside MRS. PAGE]  Trust me, thought on
    her; fit it.  
  MRS. PAGE. daughter Anne?
  QUICKLY. Ay, forsooth; and, pray, good Mistress Anne?
  MRS. PAGE. see; hour's talk
    you.           Exeunt MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD, and
                                                MISTRESS QUICKLY
  PAGE. now, Master Ford!
  FORD. heard knave told me, not?
  PAGE. Yes; heard told me?
  FORD. truth them?
  PAGE. Hang 'em, slaves! knight offer it;
    accuse intent our
    wives yoke discarded men; rogues, now
    service.
  FORD. men?
  PAGE. Marry, they.
  FORD. that. lie the
    Garter?
  PAGE. Ay, marry, he. intend voyage
    wife, turn loose him; what
    sharp words, lie head.  
  FORD. misdoubt wife; loath to
    turn together. man confident. would
    lie head. satisfied.

                           Enter HOST

  PAGE. ranting host Garter comes.
    liquor pate money purse
    merrily. now, mine host!
  HOST. now, bully rook! Thou'rt gentleman.  [To
    SHALLOW following]  Cavaleiro Justice, say.

                         Enter SHALLOW

  SHALLOW. follow, mine host, follow. Good and
    twenty, good Master Page! Master Page, with
    us? sport hand.
  HOST. him, Cavaleiro Justice; him, bully rook.
  SHALLOW. Sir, fray fought Sir Hugh
    Welsh priest Caius French doctor.  
  FORD. Good mine host o' th' Garter, word you.
  HOST. say'st thou, bully rook?         [They aside]
  SHALLOW.  [To PAGE] behold it? My
    merry host hath measuring weapons; and,
    think, hath appointed contrary places; for, believe
    me, hear parson jester. Hark, you
    sport be.               [They converse apart]
  HOST. Hast thou suit knight, guest-cavaleiro.
  FORD. None, protest; give pottle burnt
    sack give recourse him, is
    Brook-only jest.
  HOST. hand, bully; thou shalt egress regress-
    well?-and thy Brook. merry
    knight. go, Mynheers?
  SHALLOW. you, mine host.
  PAGE. heard Frenchman hath good skill his
    rapier.
  SHALLOW. Tut, sir, told more. these
    times stand distance, passes, stoccadoes, and
    what. 'Tis heart, Master Page; 'tis here,  
    'tis here. time long sword would
    made tall fellows skip rats.
  HOST. Here, boys, here, here! wag?
  PAGE. you. hear scold than
    fight.                                   Exeunt FORD
  FORD. Page secure fool, stands firmly on
    wife's frailty, put opinion so
    easily. company Page's house, what
    made not. Well, into
    't, disguise sound Falstaff. find her
    honest, lose labour; otherwise, 'tis labour
    bestowed.                                          Exit




SCENE 2.

A room Garter Inn

Enter FALSTAFF PISTOL

  FALSTAFF. lend thee penny.
  PISTOL. retort sum equipage.
  FALSTAFF. penny.
  PISTOL. Why, world's mine oyster. with
    sword open.
  FALSTAFF. penny. content, sir, should
    lay countenance pawn. grated good
    friends reprieves coach-fellow,
    Nym; look'd grate, a
    geminy baboons. damn'd hell swearing to
    gentlemen friends good soldiers tall fellows;
    Mistress Bridget lost handle fan,
    't mine honour thou hadst not.
  PISTOL. Didst thou share? Hadst thou fifteen pence?
  FALSTAFF. Reason, rogue, reason. Think'st thou I'll
    endanger soul gratis? word, hang me,  
    gibbet you. Go-a short knife throng!-
    manor Pickt-hatch; go. bear letter
    me, rogue! stand honour! Why,
    thou unconfinable baseness, to
    terms honour precise. I, I, myself
    sometimes, leaving fear God left hand, hiding
    mine honour necessity, fain shuffle, hedge,
    lurch; you, rogue, ensconce rags,
    cat-a-mountain looks, red-lattice phrases, and
    bold-beating oaths, shelter honour!
    it, you!
  PISTOL. relent; thou man?

                          Enter ROBIN

  ROBIN. Sir, woman speak you.
  FALSTAFF. approach.

                     Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY
  
  QUICKLY. Give worship good morrow.
  FALSTAFF. Good morrow, good wife.
  QUICKLY. so, an't worship.
  FALSTAFF. Good maid, then.
  QUICKLY. sworn;
    mother was, hour born.
  FALSTAFF. swearer. me?
  QUICKLY. vouchsafe worship word two?
  FALSTAFF. thousand, fair woman; vouchsafe
    thee hearing.
  QUICKLY. Mistress Ford, sir-I pray, little
    nearer ways. dwell Master Doctor
    Caius.
  FALSTAFF. Well, on: Mistress Ford, say-
  QUICKLY. worship true. pray worship
    nearer ways.
  FALSTAFF. warrant thee hears-mine people,
    mine people.
  QUICKLY. so? God bless them, make his
    servants!  
  FALSTAFF. Well; Mistress Ford, her?
  QUICKLY. Why, sir, good creature. Lord, Lord, your
    worship's wanton! Well, heaven forgive you, of
    us, pray.
  FALSTAFF. Mistress Ford; come, Mistress Ford-
  QUICKLY. Marry, short long it: you
    brought canaries 'tis wonderful.
    courtier all, court lay Windsor,
    brought canary. Yet
    knights, lords, gentlemen, with
    coaches; warrant you, coach coach, letter after
    letter, gift gift; smelling sweetly, musk, so
    rushling, warrant you, silk gold; alligant
    terms; wine sugar the
    fairest, won woman's heart; I
    warrant you, eye-wink her.
    twenty angels morning; I
    defy angels, sort, say, the
    honesty; and, warrant you, get
    sip cup proudest all;  
    earls, nay, more,
    pensioners; but, warrant you, her.
  FALSTAFF. me? brief, good she-
    Mercury.
  QUICKLY. Marry, hath receiv'd letter; the
    thousand times; you
    notify husband absence house
    ten eleven.
  FALSTAFF. Ten eleven?
  QUICKLY. Ay, forsooth; see
    picture, says, wot of. Master Ford, her
    husband, home. Alas, sweet woman leads
    ill life him! jealousy man; leads a
    frampold life him, good heart.
  FALSTAFF. Ten eleven. Woman, commend her; I
    fail her.
  QUICKLY. Why, well. messenger
    worship. Mistress Page hath hearty commendations
    too; ear, as
    fartuous civil modest wife, one, you,  
    miss morning evening prayer, in
    Windsor, whoe'er other; bade your
    worship husband seldom home, she
    hopes time. knew woman so
    dote man: surely charms, la! Yes,
    truth.
  FALSTAFF. I, assure thee; setting attraction my
    good parts aside, charms.
  QUICKLY. Blessing heart 't!
  FALSTAFF. But, pray thee, this: Ford's wife and
    Page's wife acquainted love me?
  QUICKLY. jest indeed! little
    grace, hope-that trick indeed! Mistress Page
    desire send page loves.
    husband marvellous infection page;
    Master Page honest man. wife in
    Windsor leads life does; will,
    will, all, pay all, bed she
    list, rise list, will; she
    deserves it; kind woman Windsor,  
    one. send page; remedy.
  FALSTAFF. Why, will.
  QUICKLY. Nay, then; and, you, come
    both; case a
    nay-word, another's mind, boy
    understand thing; 'tis good that
    children wickedness. folks, you
    know, discretion, say, world.
  FALSTAFF. Fare thee well; commend both.
    purse; thy debtor. Boy, with
    woman.  [Exeunt QUICKLY ROBIN]  news
    distracts me.
  PISTOL.  [Aside]  punk Cupid's carriers;
    Clap sails; pursue; fights;
    Give fire; prize, ocean whelm all!    Exit
  FALSTAFF. Say'st thou so, Jack; thy ways; make
    thy body done. look
    thee? Wilt thou, expense money,
    gainer? Good body, thee. say
    'tis grossly done; fairly done, matter.  

                         Enter BARDOLPH

  BARDOLPH. Sir John, Master Brook would
    fain speak you, acquainted you; hath
    worship moming's draught sack.
  FALSTAFF. Brook name?
  BARDOLPH. Ay, sir.
  FALSTAFF. Call in.  [Exit BARDOLPH]  Brooks are
    me, o'erflows liquor. Ah, ha! Mistress
    Ford Mistress Page, encompass'd you? to;
    via!

              Re-enter BARDOLPH, FORD disguised

  FORD. Bless you, sir!
  FALSTAFF. you, sir! speak me?
  FORD. make bold press preparation upon
    you.
  FALSTAFF. welcome. will? Give leave,  
    drawer.                                        Exit BARDOLPH
  FORD. Sir, gentleman spent much; name
    Brook.
  FALSTAFF. Good Master Brook, desire acquaintance
    you.
  FORD. Good Sir John, sue yours-not charge you; I
    understand plight for
    lender are; hath something
    embold'ned unseason'd intrusion; say, if
    money before, ways lie open.
  FALSTAFF. Money good soldier, sir, on.
  FORD. Troth, bag money troubles me; if
    bear it, Sir John, all, half, easing
    carriage.
  FALSTAFF. Sir, deserve your
    porter.
  FORD. you, sir, give hearing.
  FALSTAFF. Speak, good Master Brook; glad be
    servant.
  FORD. Sir, hear scholar-I  
    -and man long me, I
    good means desire make acquainted
    you. discover thing you, wherein
    lay open mine imperfection; but,
    good Sir John, eye follies, you
    hear unfolded, turn register your
    own, pass reproof easier, sith you
    easy offender.
  FALSTAFF. well, sir; proceed.
  FORD. gentlewoman town, husband's
    Ford.
  FALSTAFF. Well, sir.
  FORD. long lov'd her, and, protest you, bestowed
    her; doting observance;
    engross'd opportunities meet her; fee'd slight occasion
    niggardly give sight her; not
    bought presents give her, given
    largely given;
    briefly, pursu'd love hath pursued me; which
    hath wing occasions. whatsoever  
    merited, mind means, meed, I
    sure, received none, experience jewel;
    purchased infinite rate, hath
    taught this:
    'Love shadow flies substance love pursues;
    Pursuing flies, flying pursues.'
  FALSTAFF. receiv'd promise satisfaction at
    hands?
  FORD. Never.
  FALSTAFF. importun'd purpose?
  FORD. Never.
    FALSTAFF. quality love, then?
  FORD. fair house built man's ground; so
    lost edifice mistaking place where
    erected it.
  FALSTAFF. purpose unfolded me?
  FORD. told that, told all. Some
    honest me, other
    places enlargeth mirth shrewd
    construction made her. Now, Sir John, heart  
    purpose: gentleman excellent
    breeding, admirable discourse, great admittance, authentic in
    place person, generally allow'd many
    war-like, courtlike, learned preparations.
  FALSTAFF. O, sir!
  FORD. it, it. money; spend it,
    spend it; spend more; spend have; give so
    time exchange lay amiable
    siege honesty Ford's wife; art of
    wooing, win consent you; man may, you
    any.
    FALSTAFF. apply vehemency your
    affection, win enjoy?
    Methinks prescribe preposterously.
  FORD. O, understand drift. dwells securely the
    excellency honour folly soul dares
    present itself; bright look'd against.
    Now, detection hand,
    desires instance argument commend themselves;
    drive ward purity,  
    reputation, marriage vow, thousand her
    defences, strongly embattl'd against
    me. to't, Sir John?
  FALSTAFF. Master Brook, make bold your
    money; next, give hand; last, gentleman,
    shall, will, enjoy Ford's wife.
  FORD. O good sir!
  FALSTAFF. shall.
  FORD. money, Sir John; none.
  FALSTAFF. Mistress Ford, Master Brook; shall
    none. her, you, own
    appointment; assistant, or
    go-between, parted me; between
    ten eleven; time jealous rascally
    knave, husband, forth. at
    night; speed.
  FORD. blest acquaintance. Ford,
    Sir?
  FALSTAFF. Hang him, poor cuckoldly knave! him
    not; wrong call poor;  
    jealous wittolly knave hath masses money; which
    wife well-favour'd. the
    key cuckoldly rogue's coffer; harvest-home.
  FORD. knew Ford, sir, avoid him
    him.
  FALSTAFF. Hang him, mechanical salt-butter rogue! will
    stare wits; awe cudgel;
    hang meteor o'er cuckold's horns. Master
    Brook, thou shalt predominate the
    peasant, thou shalt lie wife. at
    night. Ford's knave, aggravate style; thou,
    Master Brook, shalt knave cuckold.
    night.                               Exit
  FORD. damn'd Epicurean rascal this! heart is
    ready crack impatience. improvident
    jealousy? wife hath him; hour fix'd;
    match made. man thought this? See
    hell false woman! bed abus'd,
    coffers ransack'd, reputation gnawn at; shall
    receive villainous wrong, stand  
    adoption abominable terms, me
    wrong. Terms! names! Amaimon sounds well; Lucifer,
    well; Barbason, well; devils' additions, names
    fiends. cuckold! Wittol! Cuckold! devil himself
    hath name. Page ass, secure ass; trust
    wife; jealous; trust Fleming
    butter, Parson Hugh Welshman my
    cheese, Irishman aqua-vitae bottle, thief to
    walk ambling gelding, wife herself. Then
    plots, ruminates, devises; what
    hearts effect, break
    hearts effect. God prais'd my
    jealousy! Eleven o'clock hour. prevent this, detect
    wife, reveng'd Falstaff, laugh Page.
    it; hours minute
    late. Fie, fie, fie! cuckold! cuckold! cuckold!     Exit




SCENE 3.

A field Windsor

Enter CAIUS RUGBY

  CAIUS. Jack Rugby!
  RUGBY. Sir?
  CAIUS. Vat de clock, Jack?
  RUGBY. 'Tis past hour, sir, Sir Hugh promis'd to
    meet.
  CAIUS. gar, save soul dat come; has
    pray Pible dat come; gar, Jack Rugby,
    dead already, come.
  RUGBY. wise, sir; knew worship kill
    came.
  CAIUS. gar, de herring dead vill kill him. Take
    rapier, Jack; vill vill kill him.
  RUGBY. Alas, sir, fence!
  CAIUS. Villainy, rapier.
  RUGBY. Forbear; company.
  
            Enter HOST, SHALLOW, SLENDER, PAGE

  HOST. Bless thee, bully doctor!
  SHALLOW. Save you, Master Doctor Caius!
  PAGE. Now, good Master Doctor!
  SLENDER. Give good morrow, sir.
  CAIUS. Vat you, one, two, tree, four, for?
  HOST. thee fight, thee foin, thee traverse;
    thee here, thee there; thee pass thy
    punto, thy stock, thy reverse, thy distance, thy montant.
    dead, Ethiopian? dead, Francisco? Ha,
    bully! Aesculapius? Galen? heart
    elder? Ha! dead, bully stale? dead?
  CAIUS. gar, de coward Jack priest de world; is
    show face.
  HOST. Thou art Castalion-King-Urinal. Hector Greece,
    boy!
  CAIUS. pray you, bear witness stay or
    seven, tree hours him, come.
  SHALLOW. wiser man, Master Doctor: curer  
    souls, curer bodies; fight,
    hair professions. true,
    Master Page?
  PAGE. Master Shallow, great fighter,
    man peace.
  SHALLOW. Bodykins, Master Page, old, and
    peace, sword out, finger itches make
    one. justices, doctors, churchmen,
    Master Page, salt youth us; are
    sons women, Master Page.
  PAGE. 'Tis true, Master Shallow.
  SHALLOW. found so, Master Page. Master Doctor
  CAIUS, fetch home. sworn peace;
    show'd wise physician, Sir Hugh
    hath shown wise patient churchman. You
    me, Master Doctor.
  HOST. Pardon, Guest Justice. word, Mounseur Mockwater.
  CAIUS. Mock-vater! Vat dat?
  HOST. Mockwater, English tongue, valour, bully.
  CAIUS. gar, mockvater de Englishman.  
    Scurvy jack-dog priest! gar, vill cut ears.
  HOST. clapper-claw thee tightly, bully.
  CAIUS. Clapper-de-claw! Vat dat?
  HOST. is, make thee amends.
  CAIUS. gar, clapper-de-claw me; for,
    gar, vill it.
  HOST. provoke to't, wag.
  CAIUS. tank dat.
  HOST. And, moreover, bully-but first:  [Aside others]
    Master Guest, Master Page, eke Cavaleiro Slender,
    town Frogmore.
  PAGE.  [Aside]  Sir Hugh there, he?
  HOST.  [Aside]  there. humour in; and
    bring doctor fields. well?
  SHALLOW.  [Aside]  it.
  PAGE, SHALLOW, SLENDER. Adieu, good Master Doctor.
                               Exeunt PAGE, SHALLOW, SLENDER
  CAIUS. gar, vill kill de priest; speak jack-
    an-ape Anne Page.
  HOST. die. Sheathe thy impatience; throw cold water  
    thy choler; fields Frogmore;
    bring thee Mistress Anne Page is, a
    farm-house, a-feasting; thou shalt woo her. Cried
    game! well?
  CAIUS. gar, dank vor dat; gar, love you; and
    procure-a de good guest, de earl, de knight, de
    lords, de gentlemen, patients.
  HOST. thy adversary Anne
    Page. well?
  CAIUS. gar, 'tis good; vell said.
  HOST. wag, then.
  CAIUS. heels, Jack Rugby.                    Exeunt

ACT III SCENE 1.

A field Frogmore

Enter SIR HUGH EVANS SIMPLE

  EVANS. pray now, good Master Slender's serving-man,
    friend Simple name, you
    look'd Master Caius, calls Doctor of
    Physic?
  SIMPLE. Marry, sir, pittie-ward, park-ward; every
    way; Windsor way, town way.
  EVANS. fehemently desire that
    way.
  SIMPLE. will, Sir.                                      Exit
  EVANS. Pless soul, full chollors am, trempling
    mind! glad deceived me. How
    melancholies am! knog urinals knave's
    costard goot opportunities ork. Pless
    soul!                                             [Sings]
    shallow rivers, falls
    Melodious birds sings madrigals;  
    make peds roses,
    thousand fragrant posies.
    shallow-
    Mercy me! great dispositions cry.     [Sings]
    Melodious birds sing madrigals-
    Whenas sat Pabylon-
    thousand vagram posies.
    shallow, etc.

                       Re-enter SIMPLE

  SIMPLE. Yonder is, coming way, Sir Hugh.
  EVANS. welcome.                                   [Sings]
    shallow rivers, falls-
    Heaven prosper right! weapons he?
  SIMPLE. weapons, sir. master, Master
    Shallow, gentleman, Frogmore, the
    stile, way.
  EVANS. Pray give gown; your
    arms.                                     [Takes book]  

               Enter PAGE, SHALLOW, SLENDER

  SHALLOW. now, Master Parson! Good morrow, good
    Sir Hugh. gamester dice, good student
     book, wonderful.
  SLENDER.  [Aside]  Ah, sweet Anne Page!
  PAGE. Save you, good Sir Hugh!
  EVANS. Pless mercy sake, you!
  SHALLOW. What, sword word! study
    both, Master Parson?
  PAGE. youthful still, doublet hose, raw
    rheumatic day!
  EVANS. reasons it.
  PAGE. good office, Master
    Parson.
  EVANS. Fery well; it?
  PAGE. Yonder reverend gentleman, who, belike having
    received wrong person, odds with
    gravity patience saw.  
  SHALLOW. lived fourscore years upward; never
    heard man place, gravity, learning, wide of
    respect.
  EVANS. he?
  PAGE. him: Master Doctor Caius, the
    renowned French physician.
  EVANS. Got's passion heart! lief
    mess porridge.
  PAGE. Why?
  EVANS. knowledge Hibocrates and
    Galen, knave besides-a cowardly knave you
    desires acquainted withal.
  PAGE. warrant you, man fight him.
  SLENDER.  [Aside]  O sweet Anne Page!
  SHALLOW. appears so, weapons. asunder;
    Doctor Caius.

                 Enter HOST, CAIUS, RUGBY

  PAGE. Nay, good Master Parson, weapon.  
  SHALLOW. you, good Master Doctor.
  HOST. Disarm them, question; keep
    limbs hack English.
  CAIUS. pray you, let-a speak word ear.
    Verefore meet-a me?
  EVANS.  [Aside CAIUS]  Pray patience; in
    good time.
  CAIUS. gar, de coward, de Jack dog, John ape.
  EVANS.  [Aside CAIUS]  Pray you, be
    laughing-stocks men's humours; desire in
    friendship, make amends.
    [Aloud]  knog urinals knave's cogscomb
    missing meetings appointments.
  CAIUS. Diable! Jack Rugby-mine Host de Jarteer-have I
    stay kill him? not, de place did
    appoint?
  EVANS. Christians soul, now, you, the
    place appointed. judgment mine host the
    Garter.
  HOST. Peace, say, Gallia Gaul, French Welsh,  
    soul-curer body-curer.
  CAIUS. Ay, dat good! excellent!
  HOST. Peace, say. Hear mine host Garter. I
    politic? subtle? Machiavel? lose my
    doctor? No; potions motions. I
    lose parson, priest, Sir Hugh? No; me
    proverbs noverbs. Give thy hand, terrestrial;
    so. Give thy hand, celestial; so. Boys art, have
    deceiv'd both; directed wrong places;
    hearts mighty, skins whole, burnt
    sack issue. Come, lay swords pawn. Follow
    me, lads peace; follow, follow, follow.
  SHALLOW. Trust me, mad host. Follow, gentlemen, follow.
  SLENDER.  [Aside]  O sweet Anne Page!
                                  Exeunt CAIUS EVANS
  CAIUS. Ha, perceive dat? make-a de sot us,
    ha, ha?
  EVANS. well; made vlouting-stog. I
    desire friends; knog prains
    revenge scall, scurvy, cogging  
    companion, host Garter.
  CAIUS. gar, heart. promise bring me
    Anne Page; gar, deceive too.
  EVANS. Well, smite noddles. Pray follow.
                                                          Exeunt

SCENE 2.

The street Windsor

Enter MISTRESS PAGE ROBIN

  MRS. PAGE. Nay, way, gallant; were
    wont follower, leader. Whether
    lead mine eyes, eye master's heels?
  ROBIN. rather, forsooth, man than
    follow dwarf.
  MRS. PAGE. O, flattering boy; a
    courtier.

                          Enter FORD

  FORD. met, Mistress Page. you?
  MRS. PAGE. Truly, sir, wife. home?
  FORD. Ay; idle hang together, of
    company. think, husbands dead, two
    marry.
  MRS. PAGE. that-two husbands.  
  FORD. pretty weathercock?
  MRS. PAGE. dickens my
    husband of. call knight's
    name, sirrah?
  ROBIN. Sir John Falstaff.
  FORD. Sir John Falstaff!
  MRS. PAGE. He, he; hit on's name. such
    league good man he! wife at
    home indeed?
  FORD. is.
  MRS. PAGE. leave, sir. sick till her.
                                      Exeunt MRS. PAGE ROBIN
  FORD. Page brains? Hath eyes? Hath any
    thinking? Sure, sleep; hath them. Why,
    boy carry letter twenty mile easy cannon
    shoot pointblank twelve score. pieces wife's
    inclination; folly motion advantage; and
    wife, Falstaff's boy her. A
    man hear show'r sing wind. Falstaff's
    boy her! Good plots! laid; revolted  
    wives share damnation together. Well; him,
    torture wife, pluck borrowed veil modesty
    Mistress Page, divulge Page himself
    secure wilful Actaeon; violent proceedings
    neighbours cry aim.  [Clock strikes]
    clock cue, assurance bids me
    search; find Falstaff. prais'd
    mock'd; positive earth firm
    Falstaff there. go.

     Enter PAGE, SHALLOW, SLENDER, HOST, SIR HUGH EVANS,
                              CAIUS, RUGBY

  SHALLOW, PAGE, &C. met, Master Ford.
  FORD. Trust me, good knot; good cheer home,
    pray me.
  SHALLOW. excuse myself, Master Ford.
  SLENDER. I, sir; appointed dine with
    Mistress Anne, break more
    money speak of.  
  SHALLOW. linger'd match Anne
    Page cousin Slender, day have
    answer.
  SLENDER. hope good will, father Page.
  PAGE. have, Master Slender; stand wholly you. But
    wife, Master Doctor, altogether.
  CAIUS. Ay, be-gar; de maid love-a me; nursh-a
    Quickly mush.
  HOST. young Master Fenton? capers,
    dances, eyes youth, writes verses, speaks
    holiday, smells April May; carry 't, will
    carry 't; 'tis buttons; carry 't.
  PAGE. consent, promise you. gentleman is
    having: company wild Prince and
    Poins; high region, much. No,
    knit knot fortunes finger of
    substance; her, simply; the
    wealth waits consent, consent goes
    way.
  FORD. beseech you, heartily, home  
    dinner: cheer, sport; will
    show monster. Master Doctor, go; shall
    you, Master Page; you, Sir Hugh.
  SHALLOW. Well, fare well; freer
    wooing Master Page's.          Exeunt SHALLOW SLENDER
  CAIUS. home, John Rugby; anon.            Exit RUGBY
  HOST. Farewell, hearts; honest knight
    Falstaff, drink canary him.               Exit HOST
  FORD.  [Aside]  drink pipe-wine with
    him. make dance. go, gentles?
  ALL. monster.                 Exeunt

SCENE 3.

FORD'S house

Enter MISTRESS FORD MISTRESS PAGE

  MRS. FORD. What, John! what, Robert!
  MRS. PAGE. Quickly, quickly! buck-basket-
  MRS. FORD. warrant. What, Robin, say!

                 Enter SERVANTS basket

  MRS. PAGE. Come, come, come.
  MRS. FORD. Here, set down.
  MRS. PAGE. Give men charge; brief.
  MRS. FORD. Marry, told before, John Robert, be
    ready hard brew-house; suddenly
    call you, forth, and, pause or
    staggering, basket shoulders. done,
    trudge haste, carry whitsters
    Datchet Mead, empty muddy ditch
    close Thames side.  
  Mrs. PAGE. it?
  MRS. FORD. ha' told over; lack no
    direction. gone, call'd.
                                               Exeunt SERVANTS
  MRS. PAGE. Robin.

                         Enter ROBIN

  MRS. FORD. now, eyas-musket, news with
    you?
  ROBIN. Master Sir John back-door,
    Mistress Ford, requests company.
  MRS. PAGE. Jack-a-Lent, true us?
  ROBIN. Ay, sworn. master your
    here, hath threat'ned put everlasting
    liberty, it; swears turn away.
  MRS. PAGE. Thou 'rt good boy; secrecy thine shall
    tailor thee, make thee doublet and
    hose. hide me.
  MRS. FORD. so. thy master alone.  [Exit  
  ROBIN]  Mistress Page, remember cue.
  MRS. PAGE. warrant thee; act it, hiss me.
                                                Exit MRS. PAGE
  MRS. FORD. to, then; unwholesome
    humidity, gross wat'ry pumpion; teach to
    turtles jays.

                      Enter FALSTAFF

  FALSTAFF. caught thee, heavenly jewel?
    Why, die, liv'd long enough; is
    period ambition. O blessed hour!
  MRS. FORD. O sweet Sir John!
  FALSTAFF. Mistress Ford, cog, prate,
    Mistress Ford. sin wish; thy
    husband dead; speak lord, I
    make thee lady.
  MRS. FORD. lady, Sir John? Alas, pitiful
    lady.
  FALSTAFF. court France show another.  
    thine eye emulate diamond; thou hast
    arched beauty brow the
    ship-tire, tire-valiant, tire Venetian admittance.
  MRS. FORD. plain kerchief, Sir John; brows become
    else, neither.
  FALSTAFF. Lord, thou art tyrant so; thou
    wouldst make absolute courtier, firm fixture of
    thy foot give excellent motion thy gait a
    semi-circled farthingale. thou wert, Fortune
    thy foe were, Nature, thy friend. Come, thou canst not
    hide it.
  MRS. FORD. me, thing me.
  FALSTAFF. made love thee? persuade thee
    extra-ordinary thee. Come, cannot
    cog, thou art that, these
    lisping hawthorn-buds women men's
    apparel, smell Bucklersbury simple time; I
    cannot; love thee, thee; thou deserv'st it.
  MRS. FORD. betray me, sir; fear love Mistress
    Page.  
  FALSTAFF. Thou mightst love walk the
    Counter-gate, hateful reek a
    lime-kiln.
  MRS. FORD. Well, heaven love you; you
    day find it.
  FALSTAFF. mind; deserve it.
  MRS. FORD. Nay, you, do; could
    mind.
  ROBIN.  [Within]  Mistress Ford, Mistress Ford! here's
    Mistress Page door, sweating blowing looking
    wildly, speak presently.
  FALSTAFF. me; ensconce behind
    arras.
  MRS. FORD. Pray you, so; tattling woman.
                                      [FALSTAFF hides himself]

               Re-enter MISTRESS PAGE ROBIN

    matter? now!
  MRS. PAGE. O Mistress Ford, done?  
    sham'd, y'are overthrown, y'are undone ever.
  MRS. FORD. matter, good Mistress Page?
  MRS. PAGE. O well-a-day, Mistress Ford, honest
    man husband, give suspicion!
  MRS. FORD. suspicion?
  MRS. PAGE. suspicion? you, how
    mistook you!
  MRS. FORD. Why, alas, matter?
  MRS. PAGE. husband's coming hither, woman, all
    officers Windsor, search gentleman he
    house, consent, an
    ill advantage absence. undone.
  MRS. FORD. 'Tis so, hope.
  MRS. PAGE. Pray heaven a
    man here; 'tis husband's coming,
    half Windsor heels, search one. I
    you. clear, why,
    glad it; friend here, convey,
    convey out. amaz'd; call senses you;
    defend reputation, bid farewell good life  
    ever.
  MRS. FORD. do? gentleman, dear
    friend; fear mine shame peril.
    thousand pound the
    house.
  MRS. PAGE. shame, stand 'you rather' 'you
    rather'! husband's hand; bethink of
    conveyance; house hide him. O,
    deceiv'd me! Look, basket; be
    reasonable stature, creep here; throw
    foul linen him, bucking, or-it is
    whiting-time-send men Datchet
    Mead.
  MRS. FORD. big there. do?
  FALSTAFF.  [Coming forward]  't, 't. O,
    't! in, in; follow friend's counsel;
    in.
  MRS. PAGE. What, Sir John Falstaff!      [Aside FALSTAFF]
    letters, knight?
  FALSTAFF.  [Aside MRS. PAGE]  love thee  
    thee; away.-Let creep here; never-
    [Gets basket; cover foul linen]
  MRS. PAGE. cover master, boy. Call men,
    Mistress Ford. dissembling knight!
  MRS. FORD. What, John! Robert! John!                Exit ROBIN

                 Re-enter SERVANTS

    Go, clothes here, quickly; the
    cowl-staff? drumble. Carry laundress
    Datchet Mead; quickly, come.

         Enter FORD, PAGE, CAIUS, SIR HUGH EVANS

  FORD. Pray near. suspect cause, why
    make sport me, jest; deserve
    it. now, bear this?
  SERVANT. laundress, forsooth.
  MRS. FORD. Why, bear it?
    meddle buck-washing.  
  FORD. Buck? wash buck!
    Buck, buck, buck! ay, buck! warrant you, buck; of
    season too, appear.  [Exeunt SERVANTS with
    basket]  Gentlemen, dream'd to-night; my
    dream. Here, here, keys; ascend chambers,
    search, seek, find out. warrant unkennel fox.
    stop first.  [Locking door]  So, now
    uncape.
  PAGE. Good Master Ford, contented; wrong yourself
    much.
  FORD. True, Master Page. Up, gentlemen, sport
    anon; follow me, gentlemen.                             Exit
  EVANS. fery fantastical humours jealousies.
  CAIUS. gar, 'tis fashion France; jealous
    France.
  PAGE. Nay, follow him, gentlemen; issue his
    search.                        Exeunt EVANS, PAGE, CAIUS
  MRS. PAGE. double excellency this?
  MRS. FORD. pleases better, my
    husband deceived, Sir John.  
  MRS. PAGE. taking husband
    ask'd basket!
  MRS. FORD. half afraid washing; so
    throwing water benefit.
  MRS. PAGE. Hang him, dishonest rascal! the
    strain distress.
  MRS. FORD. husband hath special suspicion
    Falstaff's here, gross his
    jealousy till now.
  MRS. PAGE. lay plot that, have
    tricks Falstaff. dissolute disease scarce
    obey medicine.
  MRS. FORD. send foolish carrion, Mistress
    Quickly, him, excuse throwing water,
    give hope, betray another
    punishment?
  MRS. PAGE. it; to-morrow
    o'clock, amends.

       Re-enter FORD, PAGE, CAIUS, SIR HUGH EVANS  

  FORD. find him; knave bragg'd that
    compass.
  MRS. PAGE.  [Aside MRS. FORD]  Heard that?
  MRS. FORD. well, Master Ford, you?
  FORD. Ay, so.
  MRS. FORD. Heaven make thoughts!
  FORD. Amen.
  MRS. PAGE. mighty wrong, Master Ford.
  FORD. Ay, ay; bear it.
  EVANS. pody house, the
    chambers, coffers, presses, heaven forgive
    sins day judgment!
  CAIUS. gar, too; bodies.
  PAGE. Fie, fie, Master Ford, asham'd? What
    spirit, devil suggests imagination? ha'
    distemper kind wealth Windsor
    Castle.
  FORD. 'Tis fault, Master Page; suffer it.
  EVANS. suffer pad conscience. wife  
    honest omans desires thousand, five
    hundred too.
  CAIUS. gar, 'tis honest woman.
  FORD. Well, promis'd dinner. Come, come, walk in
    Park. pray pardon me; make
    this. Come, wife, come,
    Mistress Page; pray pardon me; pray heartly,
    pardon me.
  PAGE. in, gentlemen; but, trust me, mock him.
    invite to-morrow morning house breakfast;
    after, a-birding together; fine hawk for
    bush. so?
  FORD. thing.
  EVANS. one, make company.
  CAIUS. two, make-a turd.
  FORD. Pray go, Master Page.
  EVANS. pray now, remembrance to-morrow the
    lousy knave, mine host.
  CAIUS. Dat good; gar, heart.
  EVANS. lousy knave, gibes mockeries!  
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE 4.

Before PAGE'S house

Enter FENTON ANNE PAGE

  FENTON. thy father's love;
    turn him, sweet Nan.
  ANNE. Alas, then?
  FENTON. Why, thou thyself.
    doth object great birth;
    that, state gall'd expense,
    seek heal wealth.
    these, bars lays me,
    riots past, wild societies;
    tells 'tis thing impossible
    love thee property.
  ANNE.. tells true.
  FENTON. No, heaven speed time come!
    Albeit confess thy father's wealth
    motive woo'd thee, Anne;
    Yet, wooing thee, found thee  
    stamps gold, sums sealed bags;
    'tis riches thyself
    aim at.
  ANNE. Gentle Master Fenton,
    seek father's love; seek it, sir.
    opportunity humblest suit
    attain it, then-hark hither.
                                           [They converse apart]

        Enter SHALLOW, SLENDER, MISTRESS QUICKLY

  SHALLOW. Break talk, Mistress Quickly; kinsman
    speak himself.
  SLENDER. make shaft bolt 't; 'slid, 'tis but
    venturing.
  SHALLOW. dismay'd.
  SLENDER. No, dismay me. care that,
    afeard.
  QUICKLY. Hark ye, Master Slender speak word
    you.  
  ANNE. him.  [Aside]  father's choice.
    O, world vile ill-favour'd faults
    handsome hundred pounds year!
  QUICKLY. good Master Fenton? Pray you, a
    word you.
  SHALLOW. coming; her, coz. O boy, thou hadst a
    father!
  SLENDER. father, Mistress Anne; uncle tell
    good jests him. Pray you, uncle, Mistress Anne
    jest father stole geese pen, good
    uncle.
  SHALLOW. Mistress Anne, cousin loves you.
  SLENDER. Ay, do; love woman in
    Gloucestershire.
  SHALLOW. maintain gentlewoman.
  SLENDER. Ay, cut longtail, the
    degree squire.
  SHALLOW. make hundred fifty pounds
    jointure.
  ANNE. Good Master Shallow, woo himself.  
  SHALLOW. Marry, it; that
    good comfort. calls you, coz; leave you.
  ANNE. Now, Master Slender-
  SLENDER. Now, good Mistress Anne-
  ANNE. will?
  SLENDER. Will! 'Od's heartlings, pretty jest
    indeed! ne'er made yet, heaven; not
    sickly creature, give heaven praise.
  ANNE. mean, Master Slender, me?
  SLENDER. Truly, mine part nothing
    you. father uncle hath made motions;
    luck, so; not, happy man dole! They
    things can. ask
    father; comes.

            Enter PAGE MISTRESS PAGE

  PAGE. Now, Master Slender! Love him, daughter Anne-
    Why, now, Master Fenton here?
    wrong me, sir, haunt house.  
    told you, sir, daughter dispos'd of.
  FENTON. Nay, Master Page, impatient.
  MRS. PAGE. Good Master Fenton, child.
  PAGE. match you.
  FENTON. Sir, hear me?
  PAGE. No, good Master Fenton.
    Come, Master Shallow; come, son Slender; in.
    Knowing mind, wrong me, Master Fenton.
                               Exeunt PAGE, SHALLOW, SLENDER
  QUICKLY. Speak Mistress Page.
  FENTON. Good Mistress Page, love daughter
    righteous fashion do,
    Perforce, checks, rebukes, manners,
    advance colours love,
    retire. good will.
  ANNE. Good mother, marry yond fool.
  MRS. PAGE. not; seek husband.
  QUICKLY. master, Master Doctor.
  ANNE. Alas, set quick i' th' earth.
    bowl'd death turnips.  
  MRS. PAGE. Come, trouble yourself. Good Master
    Fenton,
    friend, enemy;
    daughter question loves you,
    find her, affected;
    Till then, farewell, sir; in;
    father angry.
  FENTON. Farewell, gentle mistress; farewell, Nan.
                                       Exeunt MRS. PAGE ANNE
  QUICKLY. now: 'Nay,' 'will cast
    child fool, physician? on
    Master Fenton.' doing.
  FENTON. thee; pray thee, to-night
    Give sweet Nan ring. thy pains.
  QUICKLY. Heaven send thee good fortune!  [Exit
    FENTON]  kind heart hath; woman run through
    fire water kind heart. my
    master Mistress Anne; Master Slender had
    her; or, sooth, Master Fenton her; will
    three, promis'd,  
    good word; speciously Master
    Fenton. Well, errand Sir John Falstaff
    mistresses. beast slack it!
 Exit




SCENE 5.

The Garter Inn

Enter FALSTAFF BARDOLPH

  FALSTAFF. Bardolph, say!
  BARDOLPH. Here, sir.
  FALSTAFF. fetch quart sack; put toast 't.
                                                   Exit BARDOLPH
    liv'd carried basket, barrow of
    butcher's offal, thrown Thames? Well, if
    serv'd trick, brains ta'en out
    butter'd, give dog new-year's gift.
    rogues slighted river remorse
    drown'd blind bitch's puppies, fifteen
    i' th' litter; size have
    kind alacrity sinking; bottom deep as
    hell down. drown'd shore
    shelvy shallow-a death abhor; water
    swells man; thing when
    swell'd! mountain  
    mummy.

                  Re-enter BARDOLPH, sack

  BARDOLPH. Mistress Quickly, sir, speak you
  FALSTAFF. Come, pour sack Thames
    water; belly's cold swallow'd
    snowballs pills cool reins. Call in.
  BARDOLPH. in, woman.

                     Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY

  QUICKLY. leave; cry mercy. Give your
    worship good morrow.
  FALSTAFF. chalices. Go, brew pottle
    sack finely.
  BARDOLPH. eggs, sir?
  FALSTAFF. Simple itself; pullet-sperm my
    brewage.  [Exit BARDOLPH]  now!
  QUICKLY. Marry, sir, worship Mistress  
    Ford.
  FALSTAFF. Mistress Ford! ford enough; was
    thrown ford; belly full ford.
  QUICKLY. Alas day, good heart, fault!
    men; mistook their
    erection.
  FALSTAFF. mine, build foolish woman's
    promise.
  QUICKLY. Well, laments, sir, it, yearn
    heart it. husband morning
    a-birding; desires between
    nine; carry word quickly. make
    amends, warrant you.
  FALSTAFF. Well, visit her. so; bid her
    man is. frailty, then
    judge merit.
  QUICKLY. her.
  FALSTAFF. so. ten, say'st thou?
  QUICKLY. nine, sir.
  FALSTAFF. Well, gone; miss her.  
  QUICKLY. Peace you, sir.                          Exit
  FALSTAFF. marvel hear Master Brook; me
    word stay within. money well. O, he
    comes.

                       Enter FORD disguised

  FORD. Bless you, sir!
  FALSTAFF. Now, Master Brook, what
    hath pass'd Ford's wife?
  FORD. That, indeed, Sir John, business.
  FALSTAFF. Master Brook, lie you; her
    house hour appointed me.
  FORD. sped you, sir?
  FALSTAFF. ill-favouredly, Master Brook.
  FORD. so, sir; change determination?
  FALSTAFF. No. Master Brook; peaking cornuto her
    husband, Master Brook, dwelling continual 'larum of
    jealousy, instant our, encounter, after
    embrac'd, kiss'd, protested, and, were, spoke  
    prologue comedy; heels rabble his
    companions, thither provoked instigated his
    distemper, and, forsooth, search house wife's
    love.
  FORD. What, there?
  FALSTAFF. there.
  FORD. search you, find you?
  FALSTAFF. hear. good luck it, comes
    Mistress Page, intelligence Ford's approach;
    and, invention Ford's wife's distraction, they
    convey'd buck-basket.
  FORD. buck-basket!
  FALSTAFF. Lord, buck-basket! Ramm'd with
    foul shirts smocks, socks, foul stockings, greasy
    napkins, that, Master Brook, rankest compound
    villainous smell offended nostril.
  FORD. long lay there?
  FALSTAFF. Nay, hear, Master Brook, have
    suffer'd bring woman evil good. Being
    cramm'd basket, couple Ford's knaves,  
    hinds, call'd mistress carry in
    foul clothes Datchet Lane; on
    shoulders; met jealous knave master the
    door; ask'd their
    basket. quak'd fear lunatic knave have
    search'd it; Fate, ordaining cuckold,
    held hand. Well, search, away
    foul clothes. mark sequel, Master
    Brook-I suffered pangs deaths: first,
    intolerable fright detected jealous rotten
    bell-wether; next, compass'd good bilbo the
    circumference peck, hilt point, heel head; and
    then, stopp'd in, strong distillation, with
    stinking clothes fretted grease. that
    -a man kidney. that-that subject to
    heat butter; man continual dissolution thaw. It
    miracle scape suffocation. height of
    bath, half-stew'd grease, like
    Dutch dish, thrown Thames, cool'd,
    glowing hot, surge, horse-shoe;  
    -hissing hot. that, Master Brook.
  FORD. good sadness, sir, sake you
    suffer'd this. suit, then, desperate;
    undertake more.
  FALSTAFF. Master Brook, thrown Etna, I
    Thames, ere leave thus. Her
    husband morning a-birding; received from
    embassy meeting; 'twixt is
    hour, Master Brook.
  FORD. 'Tis past already, sir.
  FALSTAFF. it? address appointment.
    convenient leisure, shall
    speed; conclusion crowned
    enjoying her. Adieu. her, Master
    Brook; Master Brook, cuckold Ford.            Exit
  FORD. Hum! ha! vision? dream? sleep?
    Master Ford, awake; awake, Master Ford. hole
    made coat, Master Ford. 'tis be
    married; 'tis linen buck-baskets! Well, will
    proclaim am; lecher;  
    house. scape me; 'tis impossible he
    should; creep halfpenny purse into
    pepper box. But, devil guides aid
    him, search impossible places. I
    avoid, make
    tame. horns make mad, proverb
    me-I'll horn mad.                            Exit

ACT IV. SCENE I.

Windsor. street

Enter MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS QUICKLY, WILLIAM

  MRS. PAGE. Master Ford's already, think'st thou?
  QUICKLY. this; presently; truly
    courageous mad throwing the
    water. Mistress Ford desires suddenly.
  MRS. PAGE. by; bring my
    young man school. master comes;
    'tis playing day, see.

                     Enter SIR HUGH EVANS

    now, Sir Hugh, school to-day?
  EVANS. No; Master Slender boys leave play.
  QUICKLY. Blessing heart!
  MRS. PAGE. Sir Hugh, husband son profits
    world book; pray some
    questions accidence.  
  EVANS. hither, William; hold head; come.
  MRS. PAGE. on, sirrah; hold head; answer your
    master; afraid.
  EVANS. William, numbers nouns?
  WILLIAM. Two.
  QUICKLY. Truly, thought number
    more, 'Od's nouns.'
  EVANS. Peace tattlings. 'fair,' William?
  WILLIAM. Pulcher.
  QUICKLY. Polecats! fairer things polecats,
    sure.
  EVANS. simplicity oman; pray you, peace.
    'lapis,' William?
  WILLIAM. stone.
  EVANS. 'a stone,' William?
  WILLIAM. pebble.
  EVANS. No, 'lapis'; pray remember prain.
  WILLIAM. Lapis.
  EVANS. good William. he, William, that
    lend articles?  
  WILLIAM. Articles borrowed pronoun, be
    declined: Singulariter, nominativo; hic, haec, hoc.
  EVANS. Nominativo, hig, hag, hog; pray you, mark: genitivo,
    hujus. Well, accusative case?
  WILLIAM. Accusativo, hinc.
  EVANS. pray you, remembrance, child.
    Accusativo, hung, hang, hog.
  QUICKLY. 'Hang-hog' Latin bacon, warrant you.
  EVANS. Leave prabbles, oman. focative
    case, William?
  WILLIAM. O-vocativo, O.
  EVANS. Remember, William: focative caret.
  QUICKLY. good root.
  EVANS. Oman, forbear.
  MRS. PAGE. Peace.
  EVANS. genitive case plural, William?
  WILLIAM. Genitive case?
  EVANS. Ay.
  WILLIAM. Genitive: horum, harum, horum.
  QUICKLY. Vengeance Jenny's case; fie her!  
    her, child, whore.
  EVANS. shame, oman.
  QUICKLY. ill teach child words. He
    teaches hick hack, fast
    themselves; call 'horum'; fie you!
  EVANS. Oman, art thou lunatics? Hast thou understandings
    thy cases, numbers genders? Thou
    art foolish Christian creatures desires.
  MRS. PAGE. Prithee hold thy peace.
  EVANS. Show now, William, declensions your
    pronouns.
  WILLIAM. Forsooth, forgot.
  EVANS. qui, quae, quod; forget qui's, your
    quae's, quod's, preeches. your
    ways play; go.
  MRS. PAGE. scholar thought was.
  EVANS. good sprag memory. Farewell, Mistress Page.
  MRS. PAGE. Adieu, good Sir Hugh.                 Exit SIR HUGH
    home, boy. Come, stay long.            Exeunt




SCENE 2.

FORD'S house

Enter FALSTAFF MISTRESS FORD

  FALSTAFF. Mistress Ford, sorrow hath eaten my
    sufferance. obsequious love, I
    profess requital hair's breadth; only, Mistress Ford, in
    simple office love, accoutrement,
    complement, ceremony it. your
    husband now?
  MRS. FORD. a-birding, sweet Sir John.
  MRS. PAGE.  [Within]  hoa, gossip Ford, hoa!
  MRS. FORD. Step th' chamber, Sir John.      Exit FALSTAFF

                      Enter MISTRESS PAGE

  MRS. PAGE. now, sweetheart, home besides
    yourself?
  MRS. FORD. Why, mine people.
  MRS. PAGE. Indeed?  
  MRS. FORD. No, certainly.  [Aside her]  Speak louder.
  MRS. PAGE. Truly, glad here.
  MRS. FORD. Why?
  MRS. PAGE. Why, woman, husband lunes
    again. takes yonder husband; rails
    married mankind; curses Eve's daughters,
    complexion soever; buffets the
    forehead, crying 'Peer-out, peer-out!' madness I
    beheld seem'd tameness, civility, patience,
    distemper now. glad fat knight
    here.
  MRS. FORD. Why, talk him?
  MRS. PAGE. him; swears carried out,
    time search'd him, basket; protests to
    husband here; hath drawn the
    rest company sport, make another
    experiment suspicion. glad knight not
    here; foolery.
  MRS. FORD. he, Mistress Page?
  MRS. PAGE. Hard by, street end; anon.  
  MRS. FORD. undone: knight here.
  MRS. PAGE. Why, then, utterly sham'd, but
    dead man. woman you! him,
    him; shame murder.
  MRS. FORD. go? bestow
    him? put basket again?

                  Re-enter FALSTAFF

  FALSTAFF. No, i' th' basket. go
    ere come?
  MRS. PAGE. Alas, Master Ford's brothers watch the
    door pistols, issue out; you
    slip ere came. make here?
  FALSTAFF. do? creep chimney.
  MRS. FORD. discharge their
    birding-pieces.
  MRS. PAGE. Creep kiln-hole.
  FALSTAFF. it?
  MRS. FORD. seek there, word. press,  
    coffer, chest, trunk, well, vault, hath abstract for
    remembrance places, his
    note. hiding house.
  FALSTAFF. then.
  MRS. PAGE. semblance, die,
    Sir John. disguis'd.
  MRS. FORD. disguise him?
  MRS. PAGE. Alas day, not! woman's
    gown big him; put a
    hat, muffler, kerchief, escape.
  FALSTAFF. Good hearts, devise something; extremity
    mischief.
  MRS. FORD. Maid's aunt, fat woman Brainford, has
    gown above.
  MRS. PAGE. word, serve him; big he
    is; thrumm'd hat, muffler too. Run
    up, Sir John.
  MRS. FORD. Go, go, sweet Sir John. Mistress Page will
    linen head.
  MRS. PAGE. Quick, quick; dress straight. Put  
    gown while.                         Exit FALSTAFF
  MRS. FORD. husband meet this
    shape; abide woman Brainford; he
    swears witch, forbade house, hath
    threat'ned beat her.
  MRS. PAGE. Heaven guide thy husband's cudgel; and
    devil guide cudgel afterwards!
  MRS. FORD. husband coming?
  MRS. PAGE. Ay, good sadness he; talks basket
    too, howsoever hath intelligence.
  MRS. FORD. that; appoint men carry
    basket again, meet door they
    time.
  MRS. PAGE. Nay, presently; dress
    witch Brainford.
  MRS. FORD. direct men with
    basket. up; bring linen straight.   Exit
  MRS. PAGE. Hang him, dishonest varlet! misuse
    enough.
    leave proof, do,  
    Wives merry honest too.
    act jest laugh;
    'Tis true: swine eats draff.      Exit

            Re-enter MISTRESS FORD, SERVANTS

  MRS. FORD. Go, sirs, basket shoulders;
    master hard door; bid set down, obey
    him; quickly, dispatch.                                 Exit
  SERVANT. Come, come, up.
  SERVANT. Pray heaven full knight again.
  SERVANT. hope not; lief bear lead.

    Enter FORD, PAGE, SHALLOW, CAIUS, SIR HUGH EVANS

  FORD. Ay, prove true, Master Page, any
    unfool again? Set basket, villain!
    call wife. Youth basket! O panderly
    rascals, knot, ging, pack, conspiracy
    me. devil sham'd. What, wife,  
    say! Come, forth; behold honest clothes you
    send bleaching.
  PAGE. Why, passes, Master Ford; loose
    longer; pinion'd.
  EVANS. Why, lunatics. mad mad dog.
  SHALLOW. Indeed, Master Ford, well, indeed.
  FORD. too, sir.

                     Re-enter MISTRESS FORD

    hither, Mistress Ford; Mistress Ford, honest
    woman, modest wife, virtuous creature, hath
    jealous fool husband! suspect cause,
    Mistress, I?
  MRS. FORD. Heaven witness, do, suspect
    dishonesty.
  FORD. said, brazen-face; hold out. forth, sirrah.
                           [Pulling clothes basket]
  PAGE. passes!
  MRS. FORD. asham'd? clothes alone.  
  FORD. find anon.
  EVANS. 'Tis unreasonable. wife's
    clothes? away.
  FORD. Empty basket, say.
  MRS. FORD. Why, man, why?
  FORD. Master Page, man, convey'd
    house yesterday basket. not
    again? house is; my
    intelligence true; jealousy reasonable.
    Pluck linen.
  MRS. FORD. find man there, die flea's
    death.
  PAGE. man.
  SHALLOW. fidelity, well, Master Ford; this
    wrongs you.
  EVANS. Master Ford, pray, follow the
    imaginations heart; jealousies.
  FORD. Well, seek for.
  PAGE. No, brain.
  FORD. search house time. find  
    seek, show colour extremity; for
    table sport; 'As jealous as
    Ford, search'd hollow walnut wife's leman.'
    Satisfy more; search me.
  MRS. FORD. What, hoa, Mistress Page! old
    woman down; husband chamber.
  FORD. woman? woman's that?
  MRS. FORD. Why, maid's aunt Brainford.
  FORD. witch, quean, cozening quean! not
    forbid house? errands, she? We
    simple men; brought pass
    profession fortune-telling. works by
    charms, spells, th' figure, daub'ry this
    is, element. nothing. down, you
    witch, hag you; down, say.
  MRS. FORD. Nay, good sweet husband! Good gentlemen, let
    strike woman.

   Re-enter FALSTAFF woman's clothes, MISTRESS PAGE
  
  MRS. PAGE. Come, Mother Prat; come. give hand.
  FORD. prat her.  [Beating him]  door, you
    witch, hag, you. baggage, polecat, ronyon!
    Out, out! conjure you, fortune-tell you.
                                                   Exit FALSTAFF
  MRS. PAGE. asham'd? kill'd the
    poor woman.
  MRS. FORD. Nay, it. 'Tis goodly credit you.
  FORD. Hang her, witch!
  EVANS. yea no, oman witch indeed; I
    oman great peard; spy great peard
    muffler.
  FORD. follow, gentlemen? beseech follow;
    issue jealousy; cry no
    trail, trust open again.
  PAGE. obey humour further. Come,
    gentlemen.            Exeunt MRS. FORD MRS. PAGE
  MRS. PAGE. Trust me, beat pitifully.
  MRS. FORD. Nay, th' mass, not; beat him
    unpitifully methought.  
  MRS. PAGE. cudgel hallow'd hung o'er the
    altar; hath meritorious service.
  MRS. FORD. you? we, warrant of
    womanhood witness good conscience, pursue
    revenge?
  MRS. PAGE. spirit wantonness scar'd of
    him; devil fee-simple, fine and
    recovery, never, think, waste,
    attempt again.
  MRS. FORD. husbands serv'd
    him?
  MRS. PAGE. Yes, means; scrape the
    figures husband's brains. find their
    hearts poor unvirtuous fat knight further
    afflicted, ministers.
  MRS. FORD. warrant publicly sham'd;
    methinks period jest, should
    publicly sham'd.
  MRS. PAGE. Come, forge then; shape it. I
    things cool.                           Exeunt  




SCENE 3.

The Garter Inn

Enter HOST BARDOLPH

  BARDOLPH. Sir, Germans desire your
    horses; Duke to-morrow court, and
    meet him.
  HOST. duke secretly? hear
    court. speak gentlemen;
    speak English?
  BARDOLPH. Ay, sir; call you.
  HOST. horses, make pay;
    sauce them; house week at
    command; turn'd guests. must
    off; sauce them. Come.                      Exeunt




SCENE 4

FORD'S house

Enter PAGE, FORD, MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD, SIR HUGH EVANS

  EVANS. 'Tis discretions oman ever
    upon.
  PAGE. send letters instant?
  MRS. PAGE. quarter hour.
  FORD. Pardon me, wife. Henceforth, thou wilt;
    suspect sun cold
    thee wantonness. doth thy honour stand,
    late heretic,
    firm faith.
  PAGE. 'Tis well, 'tis well; more.
    extreme submission offence;
    plot forward. wives
    again, make public sport,
    Appoint meeting fat fellow,
    disgrace it.  
  FORD. spoke of.
  PAGE. How? send word meet Park
    midnight? Fie, fie! come!
  EVANS. thrown rivers; has
    grievously peaten oman; methinks there
    terrors him, come;
    methinks flesh punish'd; desires.
  PAGE. too.
  MRS. FORD. Devise comes,
    devise bring thither.
  MRS. PAGE. tale Heme Hunter,
    keeper Windsor Forest,
    Doth winter-time, midnight,
    Walk round oak, great ragg'd horns;
    blasts tree, takes cattle,
    makes milch-kine yield blood, shakes chain
    hideous dreadful manner.
    heard spirit, know
    superstitious idle-headed eld
    Receiv'd, deliver age,  
    tale Heme Hunter truth.
  PAGE. fear
    deep night walk Herne's oak.
    this?
  MRS. FORD. Marry, device-
    Falstaff oak meet us,
    Disguis'd, Heme, huge horns head.
  PAGE. Well, doubted come,
    shape. brought thither,
    him? plot?
  MRS. PAGE. likewise thought upon, and
    thus:
    Nan Page daughter, son,
    growth, dress
    urchins, ouphes, fairies, green white,
    rounds waxen tapers heads,
    rattles hands; sudden,
    Falstaff, she, I, newly met,
    sawpit rush once
    diffused song; sight  
    great amazedness fly.
    encircle about,
    fairy-like, pinch unclean knight;
    why, hour fairy revel,
    sacred paths dares tread
    shape profane.
  MRS. FORD. till truth,
    supposed fairies pinch sound,
    burn tapers.
  MRS. PAGE. truth known,
    present ourselves; dis-horn spirit,
    mock home Windsor.
  FORD. children must
    practis'd nev'r 't.
  EVANS. teach children behaviours; will
    jack-an-apes also, burn knight my
    taber.
  FORD. excellent. buy vizards.
  MRS. PAGE. Nan Queen Fairies,
    Finely attired robe white.  
  PAGE. silk buy.  [Aside]  time
    Master Slender steal Nan away,
    marry Eton.-Go, send Falstaff straight.
  FORD. Nay, again, Brook;
    purpose. Sure, come.
  MRS. PAGE. Fear that. properties
    tricking fairies.
  EVANS. it. admirable pleasures, fery
    honest knaveries.               Exeunt PAGE, FORD, EVANS
  MRS. PAGE. Go, Mistress Ford.
    Send Quickly Sir John mind.
                                                  Exit MRS. FORD
    Doctor; hath good will,
    he, marry Nan Page.
    Slender, landed, idiot;
    husband affects.
    Doctor money'd, friends
    Potent court; he, he, her,
    twenty thousand worthier crave her.      Exit




SCENE 5.

The Garter Inn

Enter HOST SIMPLE

  HOST. wouldst thou have, boor? What, thick-skin?
    Speak, breathe, discuss; brief, short, quick, snap.
  SIMPLE. Marry, sir, speak Sir John Falstaff
    Master Slender.
  HOST. chamber, house, castle, his
    standing-bed truckle-bed; 'tis painted the
    story Prodigal, fresh new. Go, knock can; he'll
    speak Anthropophaginian thee. Knock, say.
  SIMPLE. woman, fat woman, into
    chamber; bold stay, sir, till down;
    speak her, indeed.
  HOST. Ha! fat woman? knight robb'd. call.
    Bully knight! Bully Sir John! Speak thy lungs
    military. Art thou there? thine host, thine Ephesian, calls.
  FALSTAFF.  [Above]  now, mine host?
  HOST. Bohemian-Tartar tarries coming  
    thy fat woman. descend, bully, descend;
    chambers honourible. Fie, privacy, fie!

                    Enter FALSTAFF

  FALSTAFF. was, mine host, fat woman even
    with, me; gone.
  SIMPLE. Pray you, sir, was't wise woman of
    Brainford?
  FALSTAFF. Ay, marry it, mussel-shell. you
    her?
  SIMPLE. master, sir, Master Slender, her,
    streets, know, sir, one
    Nym, sir, beguil'd chain, chain no.
  FALSTAFF. spake woman it.
  SIMPLE. she, pray, sir?
  FALSTAFF Marry, man that
    beguil'd Master Slender chain cozen'd it.
  SIMPLE. spoken woman
    herself; things spoken too,  
    him.
  FALSTAFF. they? know.
  HOST. Ay, come; quick.
  SIMPLE. conceal them, sir.
  FALSTAFF. Conceal them, thou diest.
    SIMPLE.. Why, sir, Mistress
    Anne Page: master's fortune to
    no.
  FALSTAFF. 'Tis, 'tis fortune.
  SIMPLE. sir?
  FALSTAFF. her, no. Go; woman told me
    so.
  SIMPLE. bold so, sir?
  FALSTAFF. Ay, sir, bold?
  SIMPLE., worship; make master glad
    tidings.                              Exit SIMPLE
  HOST. Thou art clerkly, thou art clerkly, Sir John. Was
    wise woman thee?
  FALSTAFF. Ay, was, mine host; hath
    taught wit learn'd life;  
    paid neither, paid my
    learning.

                    Enter BARDOLPH

  BARDOLPH. Out, alas, sir, cozenage, mere cozenage!
  HOST. horses? Speak them, varletto.
  BARDOLPH. Run cozeners; I
    Eton, threw of
    them, slough mire; set spurs away, like
    German devils, Doctor Faustuses.
  HOST. meet Duke, villain; not
    fled. Germans honest men.

                 Enter SIR HUGH EVANS

  EVANS. mine host?
  HOST. matter, sir?
  EVANS. care entertainments. friend
    mine town tells  
    cozen-germans cozen'd hosts Readins,
    Maidenhead, Colebrook, horses money. for
    good will, you; wise, full gibes and
    vlouting-stogs, 'tis convenient be
    cozened. Fare well.                                 Exit

                  Enter DOCTOR CAIUS

  CAIUS. Vere mine host de Jarteer?
  HOST. Here, Master Doctor, perplexity doubtful
    dilemma.
  CAIUS. vat dat; tell-a dat you
    make grand preparation Duke de Jamany. my
    trot, dere duke court come; I
    good will. Adieu.                          Exit
  HOST. Hue cry, villain, go! Assist me, knight; am
    undone. Fly, run, hue cry, villain; undone.
                                        Exeunt HOST BARDOLPH
  FALSTAFF. world cozen'd, have
    cozen'd beaten too. car  
    court transformed, my
    transformation hath wash'd cudgell'd, they
    melt fat, drop drop, liquor
    fishermen's boots me; warrant whip me
    fine wits till crestfall'n dried pear.
    prosper'd forswore primero. Well,
    wind long prayers,
    repent.

                Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY

    Now! you?
  QUICKLY. parties, forsooth.
  FALSTAFF. devil party dam other!
    bestowed. suffer'd more
    sakes, villainous inconstancy of
    man's disposition bear.
  QUICKLY. suffer'd? Yes, warrant;
    speciously them; Mistress Ford, good heart, beaten
    black blue, white spot her.  
  FALSTAFF. tell'st thou black blue? was
    beaten colours rainbow; and
    apprehended witch Brainford. But
    admirable dexterity wit, counterfeiting the
    action woman, deliver'd me, knave constable
    set i' th' stocks, i' th' common stocks, witch.
  QUICKLY. Sir, speak chamber; you
    hear things go, and, warrant, content.
    letter somewhat. Good hearts, ado
    bring together! Sure, not
    serve heaven well, cross'd.
  FALSTAFF. chamber.                      Exeunt




SCENE 6.

The Garter Inn

Enter FENTON HOST

  HOST. Master Fenton, talk me; mind heavy; I
    give all.
  FENTON. hear speak. Assist purpose,
    And, gentleman, give the
    hundred pound gold loss.
  HOST. hear you, Master Fenton; will, least,
    counsel.
  FENTON. time time acquainted you
    dear love bear fair Anne Page;
    Who, mutually, hath answer'd affection,
    chooser,
    wish. letter her
    contents at;
    mirth whereof larded matter
    neither, singly, manifested
    show both. Fat Falstaff  
    Hath great scene. image jest
    show large. Hark, good mine host:
    To-night Heme's oak, 'twixt twelve one,
    sweet Nan present Fairy Queen-
    purpose here-in disguise,
    jests rank foot,
    father hath commanded slip
    Slender, Eton
    Immediately marry; hath consented.
    Now, sir,
    mother, strong match
    firm Doctor Caius, hath appointed
    likewise shuffle away
    sports tasking minds,
    dean'ry, priest attends,
    Straight marry her. mother's plot
    seemingly obedient likewise hath
    Made promise doctor. rests:
    father means white;
    habit, Slender sees time  
    hand bid go,
    him; mother hath intended
    denote doctor-
    mask'd vizarded-
    quaint green loose enrob'd,
    ribands pendent, flaring 'bout head;
    doctor spies vantage ripe,
    pinch hand, and, token,
    maid hath consent him.
  HOST. means deceive, father mother?
  FENTON. Both, good host, me.
    rests-that procure vicar
    stay church, 'twixt twelve one,
    lawful marrying,
    give hearts united ceremony.
  HOST. Well, husband device; vicar.
    Bring maid, lack priest.
  FENTON. evermore bound thee;
    Besides, make present recompense.              Exeunt

ACT V. SCENE 1.

The Garter Inn

Enter FALSTAFF MISTRESS QUICKLY

  FALSTAFF. Prithee, prattling; go. I'll, hold. is
    time; hope good luck lies odd numbers.
    Away, go; divinity odd numbers, either
    nativity, chance, death. Away.
  QUICKLY. provide chain, to
    pair horns.
  FALSTAFF. Away, say; time wears; hold head, and
    mince.                                     Exit MRS. QUICKLY

                 Enter FORD disguised

    now, Master Brook. Master Brook, matter will
    tonight never. Park about
    midnight, Herne's oak, wonders.
  FORD. yesterday, sir, told me
    appointed?  
  FALSTAFF. her, Master Brook, see, a
    poor man; her, Master Brook, a
    poor woman. knave Ford, husband, hath
    finest mad devil jealousy him, Master Brook, that
    govern'd frenzy. you-he beat grievously
    shape woman; shape man, Master
    Brook, fear Goliath weaver's beam; because
    life shuttle. haste; with
    me; I'll. all, Master Brook. pluck'd geese,
    play'd truant, whipp'd top, knew 'twas to
    beaten till lately. Follow me. strange things
    knave-Ford, to-night revenged,
    deliver wife hand. Follow. Strange
    things hand, Master Brook! Follow.                 Exeunt




SCENE 2.

Windsor Park

Enter PAGE, SHALLOW, SLENDER

  PAGE. Come, come; couch i' th' Castle ditch till we
    light fairies. Remember, son Slender, daughter.
  SLENDER. Ay, forsooth; spoke her, have
    nay-word another. in
    white cry 'mum'; cries 'budget,' we
    another.
  SHALLOW. good too; mum
    budget? white decipher enough.
    hath struck ten o'clock.
  PAGE. night dark; light spirits well.
    Heaven prosper sport! man means evil the
    devil, horns. away;
    follow me.                                            Exeunt




SCENE 3.

A street leading Park

Enter MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD, DOCTOR CAIUS

  MRS. PAGE. Master Doctor, daughter green; when
    time, hand, to
    deanery, dispatch quickly. the
    Park; together.
  CAIUS. vat do; adieu.
  MRS. PAGE. Fare well, sir.  [Exit CAIUS]  husband
    rejoice abuse Falstaff will
    chafe doctor's marrying daughter; 'tis no
    matter; chiding great deal of
    heartbreak.
  MRS. FORD. Nan now, troop fairies, and
    Welsh devil, Hugh?
  MRS. PAGE. couch'd pit hard Heme's
    oak, obscur'd lights; which, instant of
    Falstaff's meeting, display the
    night.
  MRS. FORD. choose amaze him.
  MRS. PAGE. amaz'd, mock'd;  
    amaz'd, mock'd.
  MRS. FORD. betray finely.
  MRS. PAGE. lewdsters lechery,
    betray treachery.
  MRS. FORD. hour draws on. oak, oak!
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE 4.

Windsor Park

Enter SIR HUGH EVANS satyr, fairies

  EVANS. Trib, trib, fairies; come; remember parts.
    pold, pray you; follow pit; I
    give watch-ords, pid you. Come, come; trib,
    trib.                                                 Exeunt




SCENE 5.

Another part Park

Enter FALSTAFF disguised HERNE

  FALSTAFF. Windsor bell hath struck twelve; minute
    draws on. hot-blooded gods assist me!
    Remember, Jove, thou wast bull thy Europa; love set thy
    horns. O powerful love! respects makes a
    beast man; man beast. also,
    Jupiter, swan, love Leda. O omnipotent love!
    god drew complexion goose! A
    fault form beast-O Jove, beastly
    fault!-and fault semblance fowl-
    on't, Jove, foul fault! gods hot backs
    poor men do? me, Windsor
    stag; fattest, think, i' th' forest. Send cool
    rut-time, Jove, blame piss tallow?
    here? doe?

        Enter MISTRESS FORD MISTRESS PAGE  

  MRS. FORD. Sir John! Art thou there, deer, male deer.
  FALSTAFF. doe black scut! sky rain
    potatoes; thunder tune Greensleeves, hail
    kissing-comfits, snow eringoes; tempest
    provocation, shelter here.      [Embracing her]
  MRS. FORD. Mistress Page me, sweetheart.
  FALSTAFF. Divide brib'd buck, haunch; I
    sides myself, shoulders fellow
    walk, horns bequeath husbands. Am
    woodman, ha? Speak Heme Hunter? Why,
    Cupid child conscience; makes restitution.
    true spirit, welcome!           [A noise horns]
  MRS. PAGE. Alas, noise?
  MRS. FORD. Heaven forgive sins!
  FALSTAFF. be?
  MRS. FORD. } Away, away.
  MRS. PAGE. } Away, away.                        [They run off]
  FALSTAFF. devil damn'd, the
    oil set hell fire;  
    cross thus.

        Enter SIR HUGH EVANS satyr, ANNE PAGE as
      fairy, Fairy Queen, fairies, and
               Hobgoblin; tapers

  FAIRY QUEEN. Fairies, black, grey, green, white,
    moonshine revellers, shades night,
    orphan heirs fixed destiny,
    Attend office quality.
    Crier Hobgoblin, make fairy oyes.
  PUCK. Elves, list names; silence, airy toys.
    Cricket, Windsor chimneys shalt thou leap;
    fires thou find'st unrak'd, hearths unswept,
    pinch maids blue bilberry;
    radiant Queen hates sluts sluttery.
  FALSTAFF. fairies; speaks die.
    wink couch; man works eye.
                                       [Lies face]
  EVANS. Pede? you, find maid  
    That, ere sleep, thrice prayers said,
    Raise organs fantasy
    Sleep sound careless infancy;
    sleep sins,
    Pinch them, arms, legs, backs, shoulders, sides, shins.
  FAIRY QUEEN. About, about;
    Search Windsor castle, elves, out;
    Strew good luck, ouphes, sacred room,
    stand till perpetual doom
    state wholesome state 'tis fit,
    Worthy owner owner it.
    chairs order scour
    juice balm precious flower;
    fair instalment, coat, sev'ral crest,
    loyal blazon, evermore blest!
    nightly, meadow-fairies, sing,
    Garter's compass, ring;
    Th' expressure bears, green be,
    fertile-fresh field see;
    'Honi soit qui mal y pense' write  
    em'rald tufts, flow'rs purple, blue white;
    sapphire, pearl, rich embroidery,
    Buckled fair knighthood's bending knee.
    Fairies flow'rs charactery.
    Away, disperse; till 'tis o'clock,
    dance custom round oak
    Herne Hunter forget.
  EVANS. Pray you, lock hand hand; order set;
    twenty glow-worms lanterns be,
    guide measure round tree.
    But, stay. smell man middle earth.
  FALSTAFF. Heavens defend Welsh fairy, he
    transform piece cheese!
  PUCK. Vile worm, thou wast o'erlook'd thy birth.
  FAIRY QUEEN. trial-fire touch finger-end;
    chaste, flame back descend,
    turn pain; start,
    flesh corrupted heart.
  PUCK. trial, come.
  EVANS. Come, wood fire?  
             [They put tapers fingers, starts]
  FALSTAFF. Oh, oh, oh!
  FAIRY QUEEN. Corrupt, corrupt, tainted desire!
    him, fairies; sing scornful rhyme;
    And, trip, pinch time.
  SONG.
    Fie sinful fantasy!
    Fie lust luxury!
    Lust bloody fire,
    Kindled unchaste desire,
    Fed heart, flames aspire,
    thoughts blow them, higher higher.
    Pinch him, fairies, mutually;
    Pinch villainy;
    Pinch burn turn about,
    Till candles star-light moonshine out.

        song pinch FALSTAFF. DOCTOR
        CAIUS way, steals fairy in
        green; SLENDER way, takes fairy  
        white; FENTON steals ANNE PAGE. noise
        hunting heard within. fairies run away.
        FALSTAFF pulls buck's head, rises

       Enter PAGE, FORD, MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD, and
                        SIR HUGH EVANS

  PAGE. Nay, fly; watch'd now.
    Heme Hunter serve turn?
  MRS. PAGE. pray you, come, hold jest higher.
    Now, good Sir John, Windsor wives?
    these, husband? fair yokes
    forest town?
  FORD. Now, sir, cuckold now? Master Brook,
    Falstaff's knave, cuckoldly knave; horns,
    Master Brook; and, Master Brook, hath enjoyed of
    Ford's buck-basket, cudgel, twenty pounds
    money, paid Master Brook; horses
    arrested it, Master Brook.
  MRS. FORD. Sir John, ill luck;  
    meet. love again; will
    count deer.
  FALSTAFF. begin perceive made ass.
  FORD. Ay, ox too; proofs extant.
  FALSTAFF. fairies? four
    times thought fairies; the
    guiltiness mind, sudden surprise powers,
    drove grossness foppery receiv'd belief,
    teeth rhyme reason, they
    fairies. wit made Jack-a-Lent
    'tis ill employment.
  EVANS. Sir John Falstaff, serve Got, leave desires,
    fairies pinse you.
  FORD. said, fairy Hugh.
  EVANS. leave jealousies too, pray you.
  FORD. mistrust wife again, till thou art able
    woo good English.
  FALSTAFF. laid brain sun, dried it, that
    matter prevent gross, o'er-reaching this?
    ridden Welsh goat too? cox-comb  
    frieze? 'Tis time chok'd piece of
    toasted cheese.
  EVANS. Seese good give putter; belly all
    putter.
  FALSTAFF. 'Seese' 'putter'! liv'd stand the
    taunt makes fritters English? enough
    decay lust late-walking realm.
  MRS. PAGE. Why, Sir John, think, would
    thrust virtue hearts head and
    shoulders, scruple hell,
    devil made delight?
  FORD. What, hodge-pudding? bag flax?
  MRS. PAGE. puff'd man?
  PAGE. Old, cold, wither'd, intolerable entrails?
  FORD. slanderous Satan?
  PAGE. poor Job?
  FORD. wicked wife?
  EVANS. fornications, taverns, sack,
    wine, metheglins, drinkings, swearings,
    starings, pribbles prabbles?  
  FALSTAFF. Well, theme; start me;
    dejected; answer Welsh flannel;
    ignorance plummet o'er me; will.
  FORD. Marry, sir, bring Windsor, Master
    Brook, cozen'd money, you
    pander. have
    suffer'd, repay money biting
    affliction.
  PAGE. cheerful, knight; thou shalt eat posset
    tonight house, desire thee laugh my
    wife, laughs thee. Master Slender hath
    married daughter.
  MRS. PAGE.  [Aside]  Doctors doubt that; Anne Page be
    daughter, is, this, Doctor Caius' wife.

                        Enter SLENDER

  SLENDER. Whoa, ho, ho, father Page!
  PAGE. Son, now! now, son! dispatch'd'?
  SLENDER. Dispatch'd! make Gloucestershire  
    on't; hang'd, la, else!
  PAGE. what, son?
  SLENDER. yonder Eton marry Mistress Anne
    Page, great lubberly boy. i'
    th' church, swing'd him, have
    swing'd me. Anne Page,
    stir!-and 'tis postmaster's boy.
  PAGE. life, then, wrong.
  SLENDER. that? so, I
    boy girl. married him, all
    woman's apparel, him.
  PAGE. Why, folly. how
    daughter garments?
  SLENDER. white cried 'mum' she
    cried 'budget' Anne appointed; was
    Anne, postmaster's boy.
  MRS. PAGE. Good George, angry. knew your
    purpose; turn'd daughter green; and, indeed, she
    Doctor dean'ry, married.
  
                         Enter CAIUS

  CAIUS. Vere Mistress Page? gar, cozened; ha'
    married garcon, boy; paysan, gar, boy; is
    Anne Page; gar, cozened.
  MRS. PAGE. Why, green?
  CAIUS. Ay, gar, 'tis boy; gar, raise all
    Windsor.                                          Exit CAIUS
  FORD. strange. hath Anne?
  PAGE. heart misgives me; Master Fenton.

                  Enter FENTON ANNE PAGE

    now, Master Fenton!
  ANNE. Pardon, good father. Good mother, pardon.
  PAGE. Now, Mistress, chance Master
    Slender?
  MRS. PAGE. Master Doctor, maid?
  FENTON. amaze her. Hear truth it.
    married shamefully,  
    proportion held love.
    truth is, I, long contracted,
    dissolve us.
    Th' offence holy hath committed;
    deceit loses craft,
    disobedience, unduteous title,
    doth evitate shun
    thousand irreligious cursed hours,
    forced marriage brought her.
  FORD. Stand amaz'd; remedy.
    love, heavens guide state;
    Money buys lands, wives sold fate.
  FALSTAFF. glad, ta'en special stand
    strike me, arrow hath glanc'd.
  PAGE. Well, remedy? Fenton, heaven give thee joy!
    eschew'd embrac'd.
  FALSTAFF. night-dogs run, sorts deer chas'd.
  MRS. PAGE. Well, muse further. Master Fenton,
    Heaven give many, merry days!
    Good husband, home,  
    laugh sport o'er country fire;
    Sir John all.
  FORD. so. Sir John,
    Master Brook hold word;
    he, to-night, lie Mistress Ford.       Exeunt

THE END

1596

A MIDSUMMER NIGHT'S DREAM

by William Shakespeare



DRAMATIS PERSONAE

  THESEUS, Duke Athens
  EGEUS, father Hermia
  LYSANDER, love Hermia
  DEMETRIUS, love Hermia
  PHILOSTRATE, Master Revels Theseus
  QUINCE, carpenter
  SNUG, joiner
  BOTTOM, weaver
  FLUTE, bellows-mender
  SNOUT, tinker
  STARVELING, tailor

  HIPPOLYTA, Queen Amazons, bethrothed Theseus
  HERMIA, daughter Egeus, love Lysander
  HELENA, love Demetrius

  OBERON, King Fairies
  TITANIA, Queen Fairies
  PUCK, ROBIN GOODFELLOW
  PEASEBLOSSOM, fairy  
  COBWEB, fairy
  MOTH, fairy
  MUSTARDSEED, fairy

  PROLOGUE, PYRAMUS, THISBY, WALL, MOONSHINE, LION presented by:
    QUINCE, BOTTOM, FLUTE, SNOUT, STARVELING, SNUG

  Fairies attending King Queen
  Attendants Theseus Hippolyta
