SCENE:
Athens wood it


ACT I. SCENE I.
Athens. palace THESEUS

Enter THESEUS, HIPPOLYTA, PHILOSTRATE, ATTENDANTS

  THESEUS. Now, fair Hippolyta, nuptial hour
    Draws apace; happy days bring in
    moon; but, O, methinks, slow
    moon wanes! lingers desires,
    step-dame dowager,
    Long withering young man's revenue.
  HIPPOLYTA. days quickly steep night;
    nights quickly dream time;
    moon, silver bow
    New-bent heaven, behold night
    solemnities.
  THESEUS. Go, Philostrate,
    Stir Athenian youth merriments;
    Awake pert nimble spirit mirth;
    Turn melancholy funerals;
    pale companion pomp.     Exit PHILOSTRATE
    Hippolyta, woo'd thee sword,  
    won thy love thee injuries;
    wed thee key,
    pomp, triumph, revelling.

          Enter EGEUS, daughter HERMIA, LYSANDER,
                           DEMETRIUS

  EGEUS. Happy Theseus, renowned Duke!
  THESEUS. Thanks, good Egeus; news thee?
  EGEUS. Full vexation I, complaint
    child, daughter Hermia.
    Stand forth, Demetrius. noble lord,
    man hath consent marry her.
    Stand forth, Lysander. And, gracious Duke,
    man hath bewitch'd bosom child.
    Thou, thou, Lysander, thou hast rhymes,
    interchang'd love-tokens child;
    Thou hast moonlight window sung,
    feigning voice, verses feigning love,
    stol'n impression fantasy  
    bracelets thy hair, rings, gawds, conceits,
    Knacks, trifles, nosegays, sweetmeats- messengers
    strong prevailment unhardened youth;
    cunning hast thou filch'd daughter's heart;
    Turn'd obedience, due me,
    stubborn harshness. And, gracious Duke,
    Grace
    Consent marry Demetrius,
    beg ancient privilege Athens:
    mine dispose her;
    gentleman
    death, law
    Immediately provided case.
  THESEUS. you, Hermia? advis'd, fair maid.
    father god;
    compos'd beauties; yea, one
    form wax,
    imprinted, power
    leave figure, disfigure it.
    Demetrius worthy gentleman.  
  HERMIA. Lysander.
  THESEUS. is;
    But, kind, wanting father's voice,
    held worthier.
  HERMIA. father look'd eyes.
  THESEUS. eyes judgment look.
  HERMIA. entreat Grace pardon me.
    power made bold,
    concern modesty
    presence plead thoughts;
    beseech Grace know
    worst befall case,
    refuse wed Demetrius.
  THESEUS. die death, abjure
    society men.
    Therefore, fair Hermia, question desires,
    youth, examine blood,
    Whether, yield father's choice,
    endure livery nun,
    aye shady cloister mew'd,  
    live barren sister life,
    Chanting faint hymns cold fruitless moon.
    Thrice-blessed master blood
    undergo maiden pilgrimage;
    earthlier happy rose distill'd
    withering virgin thorn
    Grows, lives, dies, single blessedness.
  HERMIA. grow, live, die, lord,
    Ere yield virgin patent up
    lordship, unwished yoke
    soul consents give sovereignty.
  THESEUS. time pause; moon-
    sealing-day betwixt love me
    everlasting bond fellowship-
    day prepare die
    disobedience father's will,
    wed Demetrius, would,
    Diana's altar protest
    aye austerity single life.
  DEMETRIUS. Relent, sweet Hermia; and, Lysander, yield  
    Thy crazed title right.
  LYSANDER. father's love, Demetrius;
    Hermia's; marry him.
  EGEUS. Scornful Lysander, true, hath love;
    mine love render him;
    mine; her
    estate Demetrius.
  LYSANDER. am, lord, deriv'd he,
    possess'd; love his;
    fortunes fairly rank'd,
    vantage, Demetrius';
    And, boasts be,
    belov'd beauteous Hermia.
    prosecute right?
    Demetrius, avouch head,
    Made love Nedar's daughter, Helena,
    won soul; she, sweet lady, dotes,
    Devoutly dotes, dotes idolatry,
    spotted inconstant man.
  THESEUS. confess heard much,  
    Demetrius thought spoke thereof;
    But, over-full self-affairs,
    mind lose it. But, Demetrius, come;
    come, Egeus; me;
    private schooling both.
    you, fair Hermia, arm yourself
    fit fancies father's will,
    law Athens yields up-
    means extenuate-
    death, vow single life.
    Come, Hippolyta; cheer, love?
    Demetrius, Egeus, along;
    employ business
    nuptial, confer you
    concerns yourselves.
  EGEUS. duty desire follow you.
                              Exeunt LYSANDER HERMIA
  LYSANDER. now, love! cheek pale?
    chance roses fade fast?
  HERMIA. Belike rain,  
    Beteem tempest eyes.
  LYSANDER. Ay me! aught read,
    hear tale history,
    true love run smooth;
    blood-
  HERMIA. O cross! high enthrall'd low.
  LYSANDER. misgraffed respect years-
  HERMIA. O spite! engag'd young.
  LYSANDER. stood choice friends-
  HERMIA. O hell! choose love another's eyes.
  LYSANDER. Or, sympathy choice,
    War, death, sickness, lay siege it,
    Making momentary sound,
    Swift shadow, short dream,
    lightning collied night
    That, spleen, unfolds heaven earth,
    ere man hath power 'Behold!'
    jaws darkness devour up;
    quick bright things confusion.
  HERMIA. true lovers cross'd,  
    stands edict destiny.
    teach trial patience,
    customary cross,
    due love thoughts dreams sighs,
    Wishes tears, poor Fancy's followers.
  LYSANDER. good persuasion; therefore, hear me, Hermia.
    widow aunt, dowager
    great revenue, hath child-
    Athens house remote leagues-
    respects son.
    There, gentle Hermia, marry thee;
    place sharp Athenian law
    pursue us. thou lovest then,
    Steal thy father's house to-morrow night;
    wood, league town,
    meet thee Helena
    observance morn May,
    stay thee.
  HERMIA. good Lysander!
    swear thee Cupid's strongest bow,  
    arrow, golden head,
    simplicity Venus' doves,
    knitteth souls prospers loves,
    fire burn'd Carthage Queen,
    false Troyan sail seen,
    vows men broke,
    number women spoke,
    place thou hast appointed me,
    To-morrow meet thee.
  LYSANDER. promise, love. Look, Helena.

                         Enter HELENA

  HERMIA. God speed fair Helena! away?
  HELENA. Call fair? fair unsay.
    Demetrius loves fair. O happy fair!
    eyes lode-stars tongue's sweet air
    tuneable lark shepherd's ear,
    wheat green, hawthorn buds appear.
    Sickness catching; O, favour so,  
    catch, fair Hermia, ere go!
    ear catch voice, eye eye,
    tongue catch tongue's sweet melody.
    world mine, Demetrius bated,
    rest give translated.
    O, teach look, art
    sway motion Demetrius' heart!
  HERMIA. frown him, loves still.
  HELENA. O frowns teach smiles skill!
  HERMIA. give curses, love.
  HELENA. O prayers affection move!
  HERMIA. hate, me.
  HELENA. love, hateth me.
  HERMIA. folly, Helena, fault mine.
  HELENA. None, beauty; fault mine!
  HERMIA. comfort: face;
    Lysander fly place.
    time Lysander see,
    Seem'd Athens paradise me.
    O, then, graces love dwell,  
    hath turn'd heaven hell!
  LYSANDER. Helen, minds unfold:
    To-morrow night, Phoebe doth behold
    silver visage wat'ry glass,
    Decking liquid pearl bladed grass,
    time lovers' flights doth conceal,
    Athens' gates devis'd steal.
  HERMIA. wood I
    faint primrose beds wont lie,
    Emptying bosoms counsel sweet,
    Lysander meet;
    Athens turn eyes,
    seek friends stranger companies.
    Farewell, sweet playfellow; pray thou us,
    good luck grant thee thy Demetrius!
    word, Lysander; starve sight
    lovers' food till morrow deep midnight.
  LYSANDER. will, Hermia. [Exit HERMIA] Helena, adieu;
    him, Demetrius dote you.                   Exit
  HELENA. happy o'er be!  
    Athens thought fair she.
    that? Demetrius thinks so;
    know.
    errs, doting Hermia's eyes,
    I, admiring qualities.
    Things base vile, holding quantity,
    Love transpose form dignity.
    Love eyes, mind;
    wing'd Cupid painted blind.
    hath Love's mind judgment taste;
    Wings eyes figure unheedy haste;
    Love child,
    choice oft beguil'd.
    waggish boys game forswear,
    boy Love perjur'd everywhere;
    ere Demetrius look'd Hermia's eyne,
    hail'd oaths mine;
    hail heat Hermia felt,
    dissolv'd, show'rs oaths melt.
    fair Hermia's flight;  
    wood to-morrow night
    Pursue her; intelligence
    thanks, dear expense.
    enrich pain,
    sight thither back again.               Exit




SCENE II.
Athens. QUINCE'S house

Enter QUINCE, SNUG, BOTTOM FLUTE, SNOUT, STARVELING

  QUINCE. company here?
  BOTTOM. call generally, man man, according
    scrip.
  QUINCE. scroll man's thought
    fit, Athens, play interlude Duke
    Duchess wedding-day night.
  BOTTOM. First, good Peter Quince, play treats on; then
    read names actors; grow point.
  QUINCE. Marry, play 'The Lamentable Comedy most
    Cruel Death Pyramus Thisby.'
  BOTTOM. good piece work, assure you, merry. Now,
    good Peter Quince, call actors scroll. Masters,
    spread yourselves.
  QUINCE. Answer, call you. Nick Bottom, weaver.
  BOTTOM. Ready. part for, proceed.
  QUINCE. You, Nick Bottom, set Pyramus.  
  BOTTOM. Pyramus? lover, tyrant?
  QUINCE. lover, kills gallant love.
  BOTTOM. tears true performing it. I
    it, audience eyes; move storms; I
    condole measure. rest- chief humour is
    tyrant. play Ercles rarely, part tear cat
    in, make split.

                 'The raging rocks
                 shivering shocks
                 break locks
                   prison gates;

                 Phibbus' car
                 shine far,
                 make mar
                   foolish Fates.'

    lofty. rest players. is
    Ercles' vein, tyrant's vein: lover condoling.  
  QUINCE. Francis Flute, bellows-mender.
  FLUTE. Here, Peter Quince.
  QUINCE. Flute, Thisby you.
  FLUTE. Thisby? wand'ring knight?
  QUINCE. lady Pyramus love.
  FLUTE. Nay, faith, play woman; beard coming.
  QUINCE. one; play mask, may
    speak small will.
  BOTTOM. hide face, play Thisby too.
    speak monstrous voice: 'Thisne, Thisne!'
    [Then speaking small] 'Ah Pyramus, lover dear! Thy
    Thisby dear, lady dear!'
  QUINCE. No, no, play Pyramus; and, Flute, Thisby.
  BOTTOM. Well, proceed.
  QUINCE. Robin Starveling, tailor.
  STARVELING. Here, Peter Quince.
  QUINCE. Robin Starveling, play Thisby's mother.
    Tom Snout, tinker.
  SNOUT. Here, Peter Quince.
  QUINCE. You, Pyramus' father; myself, Thisby's father; Snug,  
    joiner, you, lion's part. And, hope, play fitted.
  SNUG. lion's part written? Pray you, be, give it
    me, slow study.
  QUINCE. extempore, roaring.
  BOTTOM. play lion too. roar any
    man's heart good hear me; roar make the
    Duke 'Let roar again, roar again.'
  QUINCE. terribly, fright the
    Duchess ladies, shriek; were
    hang all.
  ALL. hang us, mother's son.
  BOTTOM. grant you, friends, fright ladies out
    wits, discretion hang us;
    aggravate voice so, roar gently
    sucking dove; roar 'twere nightingale.
  QUINCE. play part Pyramus; Pyramus a
    sweet-fac'd man; proper man, summer's
    day; lovely gentleman-like man; needs
    play Pyramus.
  BOTTOM. Well, undertake it. beard play  
    in?
  QUINCE. Why, will.
  BOTTOM. discharge straw-colour beard, your
    orange-tawny beard, purple-in-grain beard, your
    French-crown-colour beard, perfect yellow.
  QUINCE. French crowns hair all, then
    play bare-fac'd. But, masters, parts; and
    entreat you, request you, desire you, con by
    to-morrow night; meet palace wood, mile without
    town, moonlight; rehearse; meet in
    city, dogg'd company, devices known.
    meantime draw bill properties, our
    play wants. pray you, fail not.
  BOTTOM. meet; rehearse obscenely and
    courageously. pains; perfect; adieu.
  QUINCE. Duke's oak meet.
  BOTTOM. Enough; hold, cut bow-strings.               Exeunt

ACT II. SCENE I.
A wood Athens

Enter FAIRY door, PUCK another

  PUCK. now, spirit! wander you?
  FAIRY.      hill, dale,
                bush, brier,
              park, pale,
                flood, fire,
              wander where,
              Swifter moon's sphere;
              serve Fairy Queen,
              dew orbs green.
              cowslips tall pensioners be;
              gold coats spots see;
              rubies, fairy favours,
              freckles live savours.

    seek dewdrops here,
    hang pearl cowslip's ear.
    Farewell, thou lob spirits; gone.  
    Queen elves anon.
  PUCK. King doth revels to-night;
    heed Queen sight;
    Oberon passing fell wrath,
    attendant hath
    lovely boy, stolen Indian king.
    sweet changeling;
    jealous Oberon child
    Knight train, trace forests wild;
    perforce withholds loved boy,
    Crowns flowers, makes joy.
    meet grove green,
    fountain clear, spangled starlight sheen,
    square, elves fear
    Creep acorn cups hide there.
  FAIRY. mistake shape making quite,
    shrewd knavish sprite
    Call'd Robin Goodfellow. he
    frights maidens villagery,
    Skim milk, labour quern,  
    bootless make breathless housewife churn,
    make drink bear barm,
    Mislead night-wanderers, laughing harm?
    Hobgoblin call you, sweet Puck,
    work, good luck.
    he?
  PUCK. Thou speakest aright:
    merry wanderer night.
    jest Oberon, make smile
    fat bean-fed horse beguile,
    Neighing likeness filly foal;
    lurk gossip's bowl
    likeness roasted crab,
    And, drinks, lips bob,
    withered dewlap pour ale.
    wisest aunt, telling saddest tale,
    three-foot stool mistaketh me;
    slip bum, topples she,
    'tailor' cries, falls cough;
    quire hold hips laugh,  
    waxen mirth, neeze, swear
    merrier hour wasted there.
    room, fairy, Oberon.
  FAIRY. mistress. gone!

       Enter OBERON door, TRAIN, TITANIA,
                        another, hers

  OBERON. Ill met moonlight, proud Titania.
  TITANIA. What, jealous Oberon! Fairies, skip hence;
    forsworn bed company.
  OBERON. Tarry, rash wanton; thy lord?
  TITANIA. thy lady; know
    thou hast stolen fairy land,
    shape Corin sat day,
    Playing pipes corn, versing love
    amorous Phillida. art thou here,
    farthest steep India,
    that, forsooth, bouncing Amazon,
    buskin'd mistress warrior love,  
    Theseus wedded, come
    give bed joy prosperity?
  OBERON. canst thou thus, shame, Titania,
    Glance credit Hippolyta,
    Knowing thy love Theseus?
    Didst thou lead glimmering night
    Perigouna, ravished?
    make fair Aegles break faith,
    Ariadne Antiopa?
  TITANIA. forgeries jealousy;
    never, middle summer's spring,
    Met hill, dale, forest, mead,
    paved fountain, rushy brook,
    beached margent sea,
    dance ringlets whistling wind,
    thy brawls thou hast disturb'd sport.
    winds, piping vain,
    revenge, suck'd sea
    Contagious fogs; which, falling land,
    Hath pelting river made proud  
    overborne continents.
    ox hath stretch'd yoke vain,
    ploughman lost sweat, green corn
    Hath rotted ere youth attain'd beard;
    fold stands empty drowned field,
    crows fatted murrion flock;
    men's morris fill'd mud,
    quaint mazes wanton green,
    lack tread, undistinguishable.
    human mortals winter here;
    night hymn carol blest;
    moon, governess floods,
    Pale anger, washes air,
    rheumatic diseases abound.
    distemperature see
    seasons alter: hoary-headed frosts
    Fall fresh lap crimson rose;
    Hiems' thin icy crown
    odorous chaplet sweet summer buds
    Is, mockery, set. spring, summer,  
    childing autumn, angry winter, change
    wonted liveries; mazed world,
    increase, which.
    progeny evils comes
    debate, dissension;
    parents original.
  OBERON. amend it, then; lies you.
    Titania cross Oberon?
    beg changeling boy
    henchman.
  TITANIA. Set heart rest;
    fairy land buys child me.
    mother vot'ress order;
    And, spiced Indian air, night,
    Full hath gossip'd side;
    sat Neptune's yellow sands,
    Marking th' embarked traders flood;
    laugh'd sails conceive,
    grow big-bellied wanton wind;
    she, pretty swimming gait  
    Following- womb rich young squire-
    imitate, sail land,
    fetch trifles, return again,
    voyage, rich merchandise.
    she, mortal, boy die;
    sake rear boy;
    sake part him.
  OBERON. long wood intend stay?
  TITANIA. Perchance till Theseus' wedding-day.
    patiently dance round,
    moonlight revels, us;
    not, shun me, spare haunts.
  OBERON. Give boy thee.
  TITANIA. thy fairy kingdom. Fairies, away.
    chide downright longer stay.
                                     Exit TITANIA train
  OBERON. Well, thy way; thou shalt grove
    Till torment thee injury.
    gentle Puck, hither. Thou rememb'rest
    sat promontory,  
    heard mermaid dolphin's back
    Uttering dulcet harmonious breath
    rude sea grew civil song,
    stars shot madly spheres
    hear sea-maid's music.
  PUCK. remember.
  OBERON. time saw, thou couldst not,
    Flying cold moon earth
    Cupid, arm'd; aim took
    fair vestal, throned west,
    loos'd love-shaft smartly bow,
    pierce hundred thousand hearts;
    young Cupid's fiery shaft
    Quench'd chaste beams wat'ry moon;
    imperial vot'ress passed on,
    maiden meditation, fancy-free.
    mark'd bolt Cupid fell.
    fell western flower,
    milk-white, purple love's wound,
    maidens call Love-in-idleness.  
    Fetch flow'r, herb showed thee once.
    juice sleeping eyelids laid
    make man woman madly dote
    live creature sees.
    Fetch herb, thou again
    Ere leviathan swim league.
  PUCK. put girdle round earth
    forty minutes.                                  Exit PUCK
  OBERON. juice,
    watch Titania asleep,
    drop liquor eyes;
    thing waking upon,
    lion, bear, wolf, bull,
    meddling monkey, busy ape,
    pursue soul love.
    ere charm sight,
    herb,
    make render page me.
    here? invisible;
    overhear conference.  

               Enter DEMETRIUS, HELENA him

  DEMETRIUS. love thee not, pursue not.
    Lysander fair Hermia?
    slay, slayeth me.
    Thou told'st stol'n wood,
    I, wood wood,
    meet Hermia.
    Hence, thee gone, follow more.
  HELENA. draw me, hard-hearted adamant;
    draw iron, heart
    true steel. Leave power draw,
    power follow you.
  DEMETRIUS. entice you? speak fair?
    Or, rather, plainest truth
    love you?
  HELENA. love more.
    spaniel; and, Demetrius,
    beat me, fawn you.  
    spaniel, spurn me, strike me,
    Neglect me, lose me; give leave,
    Unworthy am, follow you.
    worser place beg love,
    place high respect me,
    dog?
  DEMETRIUS. Tempt hatred spirit;
    sick thee.
  HELENA. sick you.
  DEMETRIUS. impeach modesty much
    leave city commit yourself
    hands loves not;
    trust opportunity night,
    ill counsel desert place,
    rich worth virginity.
  HELENA. virtue privilege that:
    night face,
    night;
    doth wood lack worlds company,
    you, respect, world.  
    alone
    world me?
  DEMETRIUS. run thee hide brakes,
    leave thee mercy wild beasts.
  HELENA. wildest hath heart you.
    Run will; story chang'd:
    Apollo flies, Daphne holds chase;
    dove pursues griffin; mild hind
    Makes speed catch tiger- bootless speed,
    cowardice pursues valour flies.
  DEMETRIUS. stay thy questions; go;
    Or, thou follow me, believe
    thee mischief wood.
  HELENA. Ay, temple, town, field,
    mischief. Fie, Demetrius!
    wrongs set scandal sex.
    fight love men do;
    woo'd, made woo.
                                                  Exit DEMETRIUS
    follow thee, make heaven hell,  
    die hand love well.             Exit HELENA
  OBERON. Fare thee well, nymph; ere leave grove,
    Thou shalt fly him, seek thy love.

                            Re-enter PUCK

    Hast thou flower there? Welcome, wanderer.
  PUCK. Ay, is.
  OBERON. pray thee give me.
    bank wild thyme blows,
    oxlips nodding violet grows,
    over-canopied luscious woodbine,
    sweet musk-roses, eglantine;
    sleeps Titania night,
    Lull'd flowers dances delight;
    snake throws enamell'd skin,
    Weed wide wrap fairy in;
    juice streak eyes,
    make full hateful fantasies.
    thou it, seek grove:  
    sweet Athenian lady love
    disdainful youth; anoint eyes;
    thing espies
    lady. Thou shalt man
    Athenian garments hath on.
    Effect care, prove
    fond love.
    thou meet ere cock crow.
  PUCK. Fear not, lord; servant so.      Exeunt




SCENE II.
Another part wood

Enter TITANIA, train

  TITANIA. now, roundel fairy song;
    Then, part minute, hence:
    kill cankers musk-rose buds;
    war rere-mice leathern wings,
    make small elves coats; back
    clamorous owl nightly hoots wonders
    quaint spirits. Sing asleep;
    offices, rest.

                          FAIRIES Sing

  FAIRY. spotted snakes double tongue,
               Thorny hedgehogs, seen;
               Newts blind-worms, wrong,
               fairy Queen.
  CHORUS.      Philomel melody
               Sing sweet lullaby.  
               Lulla, lulla, lullaby; lulla, lulla, lullaby.
               harm
               spell charm
               lovely lady nigh.
               good night, lullaby.
  FAIRY.  Weaving spiders, here;
                 Hence, long-legg'd spinners, hence.
                 Beetles black, approach near;
                 Worm snail offence.
  CHORUS.      Philomel melody, etc.       [TITANIA Sleeps]
  FAIRY. away; well.
               aloof stand sentinel.          Exeunt FAIRIES

      Enter OBERON squeezes flower TITANIA'S eyelids

  OBERON. thou seest thou dost wake,
    thy true-love take;
    Love languish sake.
    ounce, cat, bear,
    Pard, boar bristled hair,  
    thy eye appear
    thou wak'st, thy dear.
    Wake vile thing near.                      Exit

                     Enter LYSANDER HERMIA

  LYSANDER. Fair love, faint wand'ring wood;
    And, speak troth, forgot way;
    rest us, Hermia, good,
    tarry comfort day.
  HERMIA. so, Lysander: find bed,
    bank rest head.
  LYSANDER. turf serve pillow both;
    heart, bed, bosoms, troth.
  HERMIA. Nay, good Lysander; sake, dear,
    Lie yet; lie near.
  LYSANDER. O, sense, sweet, innocence!
    Love takes meaning love's conference.
    heart knit,
    heart make it;  
    bosoms interchained oath,
    bosoms single troth.
    side bed-room deny,
    lying so, Hermia, lie.
  HERMIA. Lysander riddles prettily.
    beshrew manners pride,
    Hermia meant Lysander lied!
    But, gentle friend, love courtesy
    Lie off, human modesty;
    separation said
    virtuous bachelor maid,
    distant; good night, sweet friend.
    Thy love ne'er alter till thy sweet life end!
  LYSANDER. Amen, amen, fair prayer I;
    end life end loyalty!
    bed; sleep give thee rest!
  HERMIA. half wisher's eyes press'd!
                                                    [They sleep]

                          Enter PUCK  

  PUCK.      forest gone,
             Athenian found none
             eyes approve
             flower's force stirring love.
             Night silence- here?
             Weeds Athens doth wear:
             he, master said,
             Despised Athenian maid;
             maiden, sleeping sound,
             dank dirty ground.
             Pretty soul! durst lie
             lack-love, kill-courtesy.
             Churl, thy eyes throw
             power charm doth owe:
             thou wak'st love forbid
             Sleep seat thy eyelid.
             awake gone;
             Oberon.                      Exit
  
               Enter DEMETRIUS HELENA, running

  HELENA. Stay, thou kill me, sweet Demetrius.
  DEMETRIUS. charge thee, hence, haunt thus.
  HELENA. O, wilt thou darkling leave me? so.
  DEMETRIUS. Stay thy peril; go.            Exit
  HELENA. O, breath fond chase!
    prayer, lesser grace.
    Happy Hermia, wheresoe'er lies,
    hath blessed attractive eyes.
    eyes bright? salt tears;
    so, eyes oft'ner wash'd hers.
    No, no, ugly bear,
    beasts meet run fear;
    marvel Demetrius
    Do, monster, fly presence thus.
    wicked dissembling glass mine
    Made compare Hermia's sphery eyne?
    here? Lysander! ground!
    Dead, asleep? blood, wound.  
    Lysander, live, good sir, awake.
  LYSANDER. [Waking] run fire thy sweet sake.
    Transparent Helena! Nature shows art,
    thy bosom makes thy heart.
    Demetrius? O, fit word
    vile perish sword!
  HELENA. so, Lysander; so.
    love Hermia? Lord, though?
    Hermia loves you; content.
  LYSANDER. Content Hermia! No: repent
    tedious minutes spent.
    Hermia Helena love:
    change raven dove?
    man reason sway'd,
    reason worthier maid.
    Things growing ripe season;
    I, young, till ripe reason;
    touching point human skill,
    Reason marshal will,
    leads eyes, o'erlook  
    Love's stories, written Love's richest book.
  HELENA. Wherefore keen mockery born?
    hands deserve scorn?
    Is't enough, is't enough, young man,
    never, no, can,
    Deserve sweet Demetrius' eye,
    flout insufficiency?
    Good troth, wrong, good sooth, do,
    disdainful manner woo.
    fare well; perforce confess
    thought lord true gentleness.
    O, lady man refus'd
    abus'd!                  Exit
  LYSANDER. sees Hermia. Hermia, sleep thou there;
    mayst thou Lysander near!
    For, surfeit sweetest things
    deepest loathing stomach brings,
    heresies men leave
    hated deceive,
    thou, surfeit heresy,  
    hated, me!
    And, powers, address love might
    honour Helen, knight!                  Exit
  HERMIA. [Starting] me, Lysander, me; thy best
    pluck crawling serpent breast.
    Ay me, pity! dream here!
    Lysander, quake fear.
    Methought serpent eat heart away,
    sat smiling cruel prey.
    Lysander! What, remov'd? Lysander! lord!
    What, hearing gone? sound, word?
    Alack, you? Speak, hear;
    Speak, loves! swoon fear.
    No? perceive nigh.
    death find immediately.              Exit

ACT III. SCENE I.
The wood. TITANIA lying asleep

Enter QUINCE, SNUG, BOTTOM, FLUTE, SNOUT, STARVELING

  BOTTOM. met?
  QUINCE. Pat, pat; marvellous convenient place our
    rehearsal. green plot stage, hawthorn
    brake tiring-house; action, will
    Duke.
  BOTTOM. Peter Quince!
  QUINCE. sayest thou, bully Bottom?
  BOTTOM. things comedy Pyramus Thisby that
    please. First, Pyramus draw sword kill
    himself; ladies abide. answer that?
  SNOUT. By'r lakin, parlous fear.
  STARVELING. leave killing out, is
    done.
  BOTTOM. whit; device make well. Write a
    prologue; prologue harm
    swords, Pyramus kill'd indeed;  
    assurance, Pyramus not
    Pyramus Bottom weaver. put fear.
  QUINCE. Well, prologue; written
    six.
  BOTTOM. No, make more; written eight.
  SNOUT. ladies afeard lion?
  STARVELING. fear it, promise you.
  BOTTOM. Masters, bring in-
    God shield us!- lion ladies dreadful thing; for
    fearful wild-fowl lion living; and
    to't.
  SNOUT. prologue lion.
  BOTTOM. Nay, name, half face seen
    lion's neck; speak through,
    thus, defect: 'Ladies,' 'Fair ladies, I
    you' 'I request you' 'I entreat you
    fear, tremble. life yours! I
    lion, pity life. No, such
    thing; man men are.' there, indeed, him
    name, plainly Snug joiner.  
  QUINCE. Well, so. hard things- that
    is, bring moonlight chamber; for, know, Pyramus
    Thisby meet moonlight.
  SNOUT. Doth moon shine night play play?
  BOTTOM. calendar, calendar! almanack; find out
    moonshine, find moonshine.
  QUINCE. Yes, doth shine night.
  BOTTOM. Why, leave casement great chamber
    window, play, open; moon shine the
    casement.
  QUINCE. Ay; bush thorns a
    lantern, disfigure present person
    Moonshine. thing: wall in
    great chamber; Pyramus Thisby, story, did
    talk chink wall.
  SNOUT. bring wall. you, Bottom?
  BOTTOM. man present Wall; some
    plaster, loam, rough-cast him, signify
    wall; hold fingers thus, cranny
    Pyramus Thisby whisper.  
  QUINCE. be, well. Come, sit down, every
    mother's son, rehearse parts. Pyramus, begin; when
    spoken speech, enter brake; every
    cue.

                          Enter PUCK behind

  PUCK. hempen homespuns swagg'ring here,
    cradle Fairy Queen?
    What, play toward! auditor;
    actor perhaps, cause.
  QUINCE. Speak, Pyramus. Thisby, stand forth.
  BOTTOM. Thisby, flowers odious savours sweet-
  QUINCE. 'Odious'- odorous!
  BOTTOM. -odours savours sweet;
    hath thy breath, dearest Thisby dear.
    hark, voice! Stay thou awhile,
    thee appear.                    Exit
  PUCK. stranger Pyramus e'er played here!           Exit
  FLUTE. speak now?  
  QUINCE. Ay, marry, you; understand to
    noise heard, again.
  FLUTE. radiant Pyramus, lily-white hue,
    colour red rose triumphant brier,
    brisky juvenal, eke lovely Jew,
    true truest horse, tire,
    meet thee, Pyramus, Ninny's tomb.
  QUINCE. 'Ninus' tomb,' man! Why, speak yet; that
    answer Pyramus. speak part once, cues, and
    all. Pyramus enter: cue past; 'never tire.'
  FLUTE. O- true truest horse, y tire.

            Re-enter PUCK, BOTTOM ass's head

  BOTTOM. fair, Thisby, thine.
  QUINCE. O monstrous! O strange! haunted. Pray, masters! fly,
    masters! Help!
                                  Exeunt BOTTOM PUCK
  PUCK. follow you; lead round,
    bog, bush, brake, brier;  
    horse be, hound,
    hog, headless bear, fire;
    neigh, bark, grunt, roar, burn,
    horse, hound, hog, bear, fire, turn.
Exit
  BOTTOM. run away? knavery make me
    afeard.

                          Re-enter SNOUT

  SNOUT. O Bottom, thou art chang'd! thee?
  BOTTOM. see? ass-head own, you?
                                                      Exit SNOUT

                          Re-enter QUINCE

  QUINCE. Bless thee, Bottom, bless thee! Thou art translated.
 Exit
  BOTTOM. knavery: make ass me; to
    fright me, could. stir place,  
    can; walk here, sing, that
    hear afraid.                     [Sings]

          ousel cock, black hue,
            orange-tawny bill,
          throstle note true,
            wren quill.

  TITANIA. angel wakes flow'ry bed?
  BOTTOM. [Sings]
          finch, sparrow, lark,
            plain-song cuckoo grey,
          note full man doth mark,
            dares answer nay-
    for, indeed, set wit foolish bird?
    give bird he, cry 'cuckoo' so?
  TITANIA. pray thee, gentle mortal, sing again.
    Mine ear enamoured thy note;
    mine eye enthralled thy shape;
    thy fair virtue's force perforce doth move me,  
    view, say, swear, love thee.
  BOTTOM. Methinks, mistress, reason that.
    yet, truth, reason love company
    now-a-days. pity honest
    neighbours make friends. Nay, gleek upon
    occasion.
  TITANIA. Thou art wise thou art beautiful.
  BOTTOM. so, neither; wit this
    wood, serve mine turn.
  TITANIA. wood desire go;
    Thou shalt remain thou wilt no.
    spirit common rate;
    summer doth tend state;
    love thee; therefore, me.
    give thee fairies attend thee;
    fetch thee jewels deep,
    sing, thou pressed flowers dost sleep;
    purge thy mortal grossness so
    thou shalt airy spirit go.
    Peaseblossom! Cobweb! Moth! Mustardseed!  

       Enter PEASEBLOSSOM, COBWEB, MOTH, MUSTARDSEED

  PEASEBLOSSOM. Ready.
  COBWEB. I.
  MOTH. I.
  MUSTARDSEED. I.
  ALL. go?
  TITANIA. kind courteous gentleman;
    Hop walks gambol eyes;
    Feed apricocks dewberries,
    purple grapes, green figs, mulberries;
    honey bags steal humble-bees,
    night-tapers crop waxen thighs,
    light fiery glow-worm's eyes,
    love bed arise;
    pluck wings painted butterflies,
    fan moonbeams sleeping eyes.
    Nod him, elves, courtesies.
  PEASEBLOSSOM. Hail, mortal!  
  COBWEB. Hail!
  MOTH. Hail!
  MUSTARDSEED. Hail!
  BOTTOM. cry worships mercy, heartily; beseech your
    worship's name.
  COBWEB. Cobweb.
  BOTTOM. desire acquaintance, good Master
    Cobweb. cut finger, make bold you. Your
    name, honest gentleman?
  PEASEBLOSSOM. Peaseblossom.
  BOTTOM. pray you, commend Mistress Squash, mother, and
    Master Peascod, father. Good Master Peaseblossom, shall
    desire acquaintance too. name, beseech you,
    sir?
  MUSTARDSEED. Mustardseed.
  BOTTOM. Good Master Mustardseed, patience well. That
    cowardly giant-like ox-beef hath devour'd gentleman
    house. promise kindred hath made eyes water
    ere now. desire acquaintance, good Master
    Mustardseed.  
  TITANIA. Come, wait him; lead bower.
    moon, methinks, wat'ry eye;
    weeps, weeps flower;
    Lamenting enforced chastity.
    Tie love's tongue, bring silently.          Exeunt




SCENE II.
Another part wood

Enter OBERON

  OBERON. Titania awak'd;
    Then, eye,
    dote extremity.

                          Enter PUCK

    messenger. now, mad spirit!
    night-rule haunted grove?
  PUCK. mistress monster love.
    close consecrated bower,
    dull sleeping hour,
    crew patches, rude mechanicals,
    work bread Athenian stalls,
    met rehearse play
    Intended great Theseus' nuptial day.
    shallowest thickskin barren sort,
    Pyramus presented, sport
    Forsook scene ent'red brake;  
    advantage take,
    ass's nole fixed head.
    Anon Thisby answered,
    mimic comes. spy,
    wild geese creeping fowler eye,
    russet-pated choughs, sort,
    Rising cawing gun's report,
    Sever madly sweep sky,
    sight fellows fly;
    stamp here, o'er o'er falls;
    murder cries, Athens calls.
    sense weak, lost fears strong,
    Made senseless things begin wrong,
    briers thorns apparel snatch;
    sleeves, hats, yielders things catch.
    led distracted fear,
    left sweet Pyramus translated there;
    moment, pass,
    Titania wak'd, straightway lov'd ass.
  OBERON. falls devise.  
    hast thou latch'd Athenian's eyes
    love-juice, bid thee do?
  PUCK. sleeping- finish'd too-
    Athenian woman side;
    That, wak'd, force ey'd.

                 Enter DEMETRIUS HERMIA

  OBERON. Stand close; Athenian.
  PUCK. woman, man.
  DEMETRIUS. O, rebuke loves so?
    Lay breath bitter bitter foe.
  HERMIA. chide, thee worse,
    thou, fear, hast curse.
    thou hast slain Lysander sleep,
    o'er shoes blood, plunge deep,
    kill too.
    sun true day
    me. stolen away
    sleeping Hermia?  
    earth bor'd, moon
    centre creep displease
    brother's noontide th' Antipodes.
    thou hast murd'red him;
    murderer look- dead, grim.
  DEMETRIUS. murdered look; I,
    Pierc'd heart stern cruelty;
    you, murderer, bright, clear,
    yonder Venus glimmering sphere.
  HERMIA. Lysander? he?
    Ah, good Demetrius, wilt thou give me?
  DEMETRIUS. give carcass hounds.
  HERMIA. Out, dog! out, cur! Thou driv'st past bounds
    maiden's patience. Hast thou slain him, then?
    Henceforth numb'red men!
    O, true; true, sake!
    Durst thou look'd awake,
    hast thou kill'd sleeping? O brave touch!
    worm, adder, much?
    adder it; doubler tongue  
    thine, thou serpent, adder stung.
  DEMETRIUS. spend passion mispris'd mood:
    guilty Lysander's blood;
    dead, aught tell.
  HERMIA. pray thee, well.
  DEMETRIUS. could, therefore?
  HERMIA. privilege more.
    thy hated presence part so;
    dead no.                Exit
  DEMETRIUS. fierce vein;
    Here, therefore, remain.
    sorrow's heaviness doth heavier grow
    debt bankrupt sleep doth sorrow owe;
    slight measure pay,
    tender make stay.         [Lies down]
  OBERON. hast thou done? Thou hast mistaken quite,
    laid love-juice true-love's sight.
    thy misprision perforce ensue
    true love turn'd, false turn'd true.
  PUCK. fate o'er-rules, that, man holding troth,  
    million fail, confounding oath oath.
  OBERON. wood swifter wind,
    Helena Athens thou find;
    fancy-sick pale cheer,
    sighs love costs fresh blood dear.
    illusion thou bring here;
    charm eyes appear.
  PUCK. go, go; go,
    Swifter arrow Tartar's bow.               Exit
  OBERON.       Flower purple dye,
                Hit Cupid's archery,
                Sink apple eye.
                love doth espy,
                shine gloriously
                Venus sky.
                thou wak'st, by,
                Beg remedy.

                       Re-enter PUCK
  
  PUCK.         Captain fairy band,
                Helena hand,
                youth mistook me
                Pleading lover's fee;
                fond pageant see?
                Lord, fools mortals be!
  OBERON.       Stand aside. noise make
                Demetrius awake.
  PUCK.         woo one.
                sport alone;
                things me
                befall prepost'rously.

                   Enter LYSANDER HELENA

  LYSANDER. woo scorn?
    Scorn derision tears.
    vow, weep; vows born,
    nativity truth appears.
    things scorn you,  
    Bearing badge faith, prove true?
  HELENA. advance cunning more.
    truth kills truth, O devilish-holy fray!
    vows Hermia's. give o'er?
    Weigh oath oath, weigh:
    vows me, put scales,
    weigh; light tales.
  LYSANDER. hod judgment swore.
  HELENA. none, mind, give o'er.
  LYSANDER. Demetrius loves her, loves you.
  DEMETRIUS. [Awaking] O Helen, goddess, nymph, perfect, divine!
    what, love, compare thine eyne?
    Crystal muddy. O, ripe show
    Thy lips, kissing cherries, tempting grow!
    pure congealed white, high Taurus' snow,
    Fann'd eastern wind, turns crow
    thou hold'st thy hand. O, kiss
    princess pure white, seal bliss!
  HELENA. O spite! O hell! bent
    set merriment.  
    civil knew courtesy,
    injury.
    hate me, do,
    join souls mock too?
    men, men show,
    gentle lady so:
    vow, swear, superpraise parts,
    hate hearts.
    rivals, love Hermia;
    rivals, mock Helena.
    trim exploit, manly enterprise,
    conjure tears poor maid's eyes
    derision! noble sort
    offend virgin, extort
    poor soul's patience, make sport.
  LYSANDER. unkind, Demetrius; so;
    love Hermia. know;
    here, good will, heart,
    Hermia's love yield part;
    Helena bequeath,  
    love till death.
  HELENA. mockers waste idle breath.
  DEMETRIUS. Lysander, thy Hermia; none.
    e'er lov'd her, love gone.
    heart guest-wise sojourn'd,
    Helen home return'd,
    remain.
  LYSANDER. Helen, so.
  DEMETRIUS. Disparage faith thou dost know,
    Lest, thy peril, thou aby dear.
    thy love comes; yonder thy dear.

                       Enter HERMIA

  HERMIA. Dark night, eye function takes,
    ear quick apprehension makes;
    doth impair sense,
    pays hearing double recompense.
    Thou art mine eye, Lysander, found;
    Mine ear, it, brought thy sound.  
    unkindly didst thou leave so?
  LYSANDER. stay love doth press go?
  HERMIA. love press Lysander side?
  LYSANDER. Lysander's love, bide-
    Fair Helena, engilds night
    yon fiery oes eyes light.
    seek'st thou me? make thee know
    hate bare thee made leave thee so?
  HERMIA. speak think; be.
  HELENA. Lo, confederacy!
    perceive conjoin'd three
    fashion false sport spite me.
    Injurious Hermia! ungrateful maid!
    conspir'd, contriv'd,
    bait foul derision?
    counsel shar'd,
    sisters' vows, hours spent,
    chid hasty-footed time
    parting us- O, forgot?
    school-days' friendship, childhood innocence?  
    We, Hermia, artificial gods,
    needles created flower,
    sampler, sitting cushion,
    warbling song, key;
    hands, sides, voices, minds,
    incorporate. grew together,
    double cherry, parted,
    union partition,
    lovely berries moulded stern;
    So, bodies, heart;
    first, coats heraldry,
    Due one, crowned crest.
    rent ancient love asunder,
    join men scorning poor friend?
    friendly, 'tis maidenly;
    sex, I, chide it,
    feel injury.
  HERMIA. amazed passionate words;
    scorn not; scorn me.
  HELENA. set Lysander, scorn,  
    follow praise eyes face?
    made love, Demetrius,
    spurn foot,
    call goddess, nymph, divine, rare,
    Precious, celestial? Wherefore speaks this
    hates? wherefore doth Lysander
    Deny love, rich soul,
    tender me, forsooth, affection,
    setting on, consent?
    grace you,
    hung love, fortunate,
    miserable most, love unlov'd?
    pity despise.
  HERMIA. understand this.
  HELENA. Ay, do- persever, counterfeit sad looks,
    Make mouths turn back,
    Wink other; hold sweet jest up;
    sport, carried, chronicled.
    pity, grace, manners,
    make argument.  
    fare ye well; 'tis partly fault,
    death, absence, remedy.
  LYSANDER. Stay, gentle Helena; hear excuse;
    love, life, soul, fair Helena!
  HELENA. O excellent!
  HERMIA. Sweet, scorn so.
  DEMETRIUS. entreat, compel.
  LYSANDER. Thou canst compel entreat;
    Thy threats strength weak prayers
    Helen, love thee, life do;
    swear lose thee
    prove false love thee not.
  DEMETRIUS. love thee do.
  LYSANDER. thou so, withdraw, prove too.
  DEMETRIUS. Quick, come.
  HERMIA. Lysander, whereto this?
  LYSANDER. Away, Ethiope!
  DEMETRIUS. No, no, will
    break loose- follow,
    not. tame man; go!  
  LYSANDER. Hang off, thou cat, thou burr; vile thing, loose,
    shake thee serpent.
  HERMIA. grown rude? change this,
    Sweet love?
  LYSANDER. Thy love! Out, tawny Tartar, out!
    Out, loathed med'cine! O hated potion, hence!
  HERMIA. jest?
  HELENA. Yes, sooth; you.
  LYSANDER. Demetrius, word thee.
  DEMETRIUS. bond; perceive
    weak bond holds you; trust word.
  LYSANDER. What, hurt her, strike her, kill dead?
    hate her, harm so.
  HERMIA. What! greater harm hate?
    Hate me! wherefore? O me! news, love?
    Hermia? Lysander?
    fair erewhile.
    night lov'd me; night left me.
    then, left me- O, gods forbid!-
    earnest, say?  
  LYSANDER. Ay, life!
    desire thee more.
    hope, question, doubt;
    certain, truer; 'tis jest
    hate thee love Helena.
  HERMIA. O me! juggler! cankerblossom!
    thief love! What! night,
    stol'n love's heart him?
  HELENA. Fine, i' faith!
    modesty, maiden shame,
    touch bashfulness? What! tear
    Impatient answers gentle tongue?
    Fie, fie! counterfeit, puppet you!
  HERMIA. 'Puppet!' so? Ay, game.
    perceive hath made compare
    statures; hath urg'd height;
    personage, tall personage,
    height, forsooth, hath prevail'd him.
    grown high esteem
    dwarfish low?  
    low I, thou painted maypole? Speak.
    low I? low
    nails reach thine eyes.
  HELENA. pray you, mock me, gentlemen,
    hurt me. curst;
    gift shrewishness;
    maid cowardice;
    strike me. think,
    lower myself,
    match her.
  HERMIA. 'Lower' hark, again.
  HELENA. Good Hermia, bitter me.
    evermore love you, Hermia,
    counsels, wrong'd you;
    Save that, love Demetrius,
    told stealth wood.
    you; love him;
    hath chid hence, threat'ned me
    strike me, spurn me, nay, kill too;
    now, quiet go,  
    Athens bear folly back,
    follow further. go.
    simple fond am.
  HERMIA. Why, gone! is't hinders you?
  HELENA. foolish heart leave behind.
  HERMIA. What! Lysander?
  HELENA. Demetrius.
  LYSANDER. afraid; harm thee, Helena.
  DEMETRIUS. No, sir, not, part.
  HELENA. O, angry, keen shrewd;
    vixen school;
    And, little, fierce.
  HERMIA. 'Little' again! 'low' 'little'!
    suffer flout thus?
    her.
  LYSANDER. gone, dwarf;
    minimus, hind'ring knot-grass made;
    bead, acorn.
  DEMETRIUS. officious
    behalf scorns services.  
    alone; speak Helena;
    part; thou dost intend
    show love her,
    Thou shalt aby it.
  LYSANDER. holds not.
    follow, thou dar'st, right,
    thine mine, Helena.
  DEMETRIUS. Follow! Nay, thee, cheek jowl.
                                   Exeunt LYSANDER DEMETRIUS
  HERMIA. You, mistress, coil long you.
    Nay, back.
  HELENA. trust you, I;
    longer stay curst company.
    hands mine quicker fray;
    legs longer though, run away.                 Exit
  HERMIA. amaz'd, say.            Exit
  OBERON. thy negligence. thou mistak'st,
    committ'st thy knaveries wilfully.
  PUCK. me, king shadows, mistook.
    man  
    Athenian garments on?
    blameless proves enterprise
    'nointed Athenian's eyes;
    glad sort,
    jangling esteem sport.
  OBERON. Thou seest lovers seek place fight.
    Hie therefore, Robin, overcast night;
    starry welkin cover thou anon
    drooping fog black Acheron,
    lead testy rivals astray
    another's way.
    Lysander frame thy tongue,
    stir Demetrius bitter wrong;
    rail thou Demetrius;
    thou lead thus,
    Till o'er brows death-counterfeiting sleep
    leaden legs batty wings doth creep.
    crush herb Lysander's eye;
    liquor hath virtuous property,
    error  
    make eyeballs roll wonted sight.
    wake, derision
    dream fruitless vision;
    back Athens lovers wend
    league date till death end.
    Whiles affair thee employ,
    queen, beg Indian boy;
    charmed eye release
    monster's view, things peace.
  PUCK. fairy lord, haste,
    night's swift dragons cut clouds full fast;
    yonder shines Aurora's harbinger,
    approach ghosts, wand'ring there,
    Troop home churchyards. Damned spirits all
    cross-ways floods burial,
    wormy beds gone,
    fear day shames upon;
    wilfully exil'd light,
    aye consort black-brow'd night.
  OBERON. spirits sort:  
    Morning's love oft made sport;
    And, forester, groves tread
    till eastern gate, fiery red,
    Opening Neptune fair blessed beams,
    Turns yellow gold salt green streams.
    But, notwithstanding, haste, make delay;
    effect business ere day.         Exit OBERON
  PUCK.      down, down,
             lead down.
             fear'd field town.
             Goblin, lead down.
    one.

                      Enter LYSANDER

  LYSANDER. art thou, proud Demetrius? Speak thou now.
  PUCK. Here, villain, drawn ready. art thou?
  LYSANDER. thee straight.
  PUCK. Follow me, then,
    plainer ground.      Exit LYSANDER voice  

                      Enter DEMETRIUS

  DEMETRIUS. Lysander, speak again.
    Thou runaway, thou coward, art thou fled?
    Speak! bush? dost thou hide thy head?
  PUCK. Thou coward, art thou bragging stars,
    Telling bushes thou look'st wars,
    wilt come? Come, recreant, come, thou child;
    whip thee rod. defil'd
    draws sword thee.
  DEMETRIUS. Yea, art thou there?
  PUCK. Follow voice; manhood here.       Exeunt

                      Re-enter LYSANDER

  LYSANDER. me, dares on;
    calls, gone.
    villain lighter heel'd I.
    fast, faster fly,  
    fallen dark uneven way,
    rest me. [Lies down] Come, thou gentle day.
    thou show thy grey light,
    find Demetrius, revenge spite.        [Sleeps]

                 Re-enter PUCK DEMETRIUS

  PUCK. Ho, ho, ho! Coward, com'st thou not?
  DEMETRIUS. Abide me, thou dar'st; wot
    Thou run'st me, shifting place,
    dar'st stand, face.
    art thou now?
  PUCK. hither; here.
  DEMETRIUS. Nay, then, thou mock'st me. Thou shalt buy dear,
    thy face daylight see;
    Now, thy way. Faintness constraineth me
    measure length cold bed.
    day's approach visited.
                                          [Lies sleeps]
  
                       Enter HELENA

  HELENA. O weary night, O long tedious night,
    Abate thy hours! Shine comforts east,
    back Athens daylight,
    poor company detest.
    sleep, shuts sorrow's eye,
    Steal awhile mine company.              [Sleeps]
  PUCK.       three? more;
              kinds makes four.
              comes, curst sad.
              Cupid knavish lad,
              make poor females mad.

                     Enter HERMIA

  HERMIA. weary, woe,
    Bedabbled dew, torn briers,
    crawl, go;
    legs pace desires.  
    rest till break day.
    Heavens shield Lysander, fray!
                                          [Lies sleeps]
  PUCK.          ground
                 Sleep sound;
                 apply
                 eye,
          Gentle lover, remedy.
                        [Squeezing juice LYSANDER'S eyes]
                 thou wak'st,
                 Thou tak'st
                 True delight
                 sight
          thy lady's eye;
          country proverb known,
          man own,
          waking shown:
                 Jack Jill;
                 Nought ill;
    man mare again, well.  
 Exit

ACT IV. SCENE I.
The wood. LYSANDER, DEMETRIUS, HELENA, HERMIA, lying asleep

Enter TITANIA Bottom; PEASEBLOSSOM, COBWEB, MOTH, MUSTARDSEED,
and FAIRIES attending;
                      OBERON behind, unseen

  TITANIA. Come, sit thee flow'ry bed,
    thy amiable cheeks coy,
    stick musk-roses thy sleek smooth head,
    kiss thy fair large ears, gentle joy.
  BOTTOM. Peaseblossom?
  PEASEBLOSSOM. Ready.
  BOTTOM. Scratch head, Peaseblossom.
    Mounsieur Cobweb?
  COBWEB. Ready.
  BOTTOM. Mounsieur Cobweb; good mounsieur, weapons in
    hand kill red-hipp'd humble-bee top a
    thistle; and, good mounsieur, bring honey-bag. fret
    action, mounsieur; and, good mounsieur,
    care honey-bag break not; loath  
    overflown honey-bag, signior. Mounsieur
    Mustardseed?
  MUSTARDSEED. Ready.
  BOTTOM. Give neaf, Mounsieur Mustardseed. Pray you, leave
    curtsy, good mounsieur.
  MUSTARDSEED. will?
  BOTTOM. Nothing, good mounsieur, Cavalery Cobweb to
    scratch. barber's, mounsieur; methinks am
    marvellous hairy face; tender ass, if
    hair tickle scratch.
  TITANIA. What, wilt thou hear music, sweet love?
  BOTTOM. reasonable good ear music. tongs
    bones.
  TITANIA. say, sweet love, thou desirest eat.
  BOTTOM. Truly, peck provender; munch good dry
    oats. Methinks great desire bottle hay. Good
    hay, sweet hay, hath fellow.
  TITANIA. venturous fairy seek
    squirrel's hoard, fetch thee nuts.
  BOTTOM. handful dried peas. But,  
    pray you, people stir me; exposition
    sleep me.
  TITANIA. Sleep thou, wind thee arms.
    Fairies, gone, ways away.       Exeunt FAIRIES
    doth woodbine sweet honeysuckle
    Gently entwist; female ivy so
    Enrings barky fingers elm.
    O, love thee! dote thee!         [They sleep]

                         Enter PUCK

  OBERON. [Advancing] Welcome, good Robin. Seest thou sweet
      sight?
    dotage begin pity;
    For, meeting late wood,
    Seeking sweet favours hateful fool,
    upbraid fall her.
    hairy temples rounded
    coronet fresh fragrant flowers;
    dew buds  
    wont swell round orient pearls
    Stood pretty flowerets' eyes,
    tears disgrace bewail.
    pleasure taunted her,
    mild terms begg'd patience,
    changeling child;
    straight gave me, fairy sent
    bear bower fairy land.
    boy, undo
    hateful imperfection eyes.
    And, gentle Puck, transformed scalp
    head Athenian swain,
    awaking do
    Athens back repair,
    night's accidents
    fierce vexation dream.
    release Fairy Queen.
                                             [Touching eyes]
           thou wast wont be;
           thou wont see.  
           Dian's bud o'er Cupid's flower
           Hath force blessed power.
    Now, Titania; wake you, sweet queen.
  TITANIA. Oberon! visions seen!
    Methought enamour'd ass.
  OBERON. lies love.
  TITANIA. things pass?
    O, mine eyes loathe visage now!
  OBERON. Silence awhile. Robin, head.
    Titania, music call; strike dead
    common sleep sense.
  TITANIA. Music, ho, music, charmeth sleep!
  PUCK. thou wak'st thine fool's eyes peep.
  OBERON. Sound, music. Come, Queen, hands me,
                                                         [Music]
    rock ground whereon sleepers be.
    thou amity,
    to-morrow midnight solemnly
    Dance Duke Theseus' house triumphantly,
    bless fair prosperity.  
    pairs faithful lovers be
    Wedded, Theseus, jollity.
  PUCK.       Fairy King, attend mark;
              hear morning lark.
  OBERON.     Then, Queen, silence sad,
              Trip night's shade.
              globe compass soon,
              Swifter wand'ring moon.
  TITANIA.    Come, lord; flight,
              night
              sleeping found
              mortals ground.           Exeunt

        winding horns, enter THESEUS, HIPPOLYTA,
                      EGEUS, train

  THESEUS. Go, you, find forester;
    observation perform'd,
    vaward day,
    love hear music hounds.  
    Uncouple western valley; go.
    Dispatch, say, find forester.    Exit ATTENDANT
    will, fair Queen, mountain's top,
    mark musical confusion
    hounds echo conjunction.
  HIPPOLYTA. Hercules Cadmus once
    wood Crete bay'd bear
    hounds Sparta; hear
    gallant chiding, for, groves,
    skies, fountains, region near
    Seem'd mutual cry. heard
    musical discord, sweet thunder.
  THESEUS. hounds bred Spartan kind,
    flew'd, sanded; heads hung
    ears sweep morning dew;
    Crook-knee'd dew-lapp'd Thessalian bulls;
    Slow pursuit, match'd mouth bells,
    each. cry tuneable
    holla'd to, cheer'd horn,
    Crete, Sparta, Thessaly.  
    Judge hear. But, soft, nymphs these?
  EGEUS. lord, daughter asleep,
    Lysander, Demetrius is,
    Helena, Nedar's Helena.
    together.
  THESEUS. doubt rose early observe
    rite May; and, hearing intent,
    grace solemnity.
    speak, Egeus; day
    Hermia give answer choice?
  EGEUS. is, lord.
  THESEUS. Go, bid huntsmen wake horns.
                           [Horns shout within. sleepers
                                     awake kneel THESEUS]
    Good-morrow, friends. Saint Valentine past;
    Begin wood-birds couple now?
  LYSANDER. Pardon, lord.
  THESEUS. pray all, stand up.
    rival enemies;
    gentle concord world  
    hatred jealousy
    sleep hate, fear enmity?
  LYSANDER. lord, reply amazedly,
    Half sleep, half waking; yet, swear,
    here,
    But, think- speak,
    bethink me, is-
    Hermia hither. intent
    Athens, might,
    peril Athenian law-
  EGEUS. Enough, enough, Lord; enough;
    beg law, law head.
    stol'n away, would, Demetrius,
    defeated me:
    wife, consent,
    consent wife.
  DEMETRIUS. lord, fair Helen told stealth,
    purpose wood;
    fury them,
    Fair Helena fancy me.  
    But, good lord, wot power-
    power is- love Hermia,
    Melted snow, now
    remembrance idle gaud
    childhood dote upon;
    faith, virtue heart,
    object pleasure mine eye,
    Helena. her, lord,
    betroth'd ere Hermia.
    But, sickness, loathe food;
    But, health, natural taste,
    it, love it, long it,
    evermore true it.
  THESEUS. Fair lovers, fortunately met;
    discourse hear anon.
    Egeus, overbear will;
    temple, by, us
    couples eternally knit.
    And, morning worn,
    purpos'd hunting set aside.  
    Athens, three;
    hold feast great solemnity.
    Come, Hippolyta.
                     Exeunt THESEUS, HIPPOLYTA, EGEUS, train
  DEMETRIUS. things small undistinguishable,
    far-off mountains turned clouds.
  HERMIA. Methinks things parted eye,
    thing double.
  HELENA. methinks;
    found Demetrius jewel,
    Mine own, mine own.
  DEMETRIUS. sure
    awake? me
    sleep, dream. think
    Duke here, bid follow him?
  HERMIA. Yea, father.
  HELENA. Hippolyta.
  LYSANDER. bid follow temple.
  DEMETRIUS. Why, then, awake; follow him;
    recount dreams.             Exeunt  
  BOTTOM. [Awaking] cue comes, call me, answer. My
    'Most fair Pyramus.' Heigh-ho! Peter Quince! Flute, the
    bellows-mender! Snout, tinker! Starveling! God's life,
    stol'n hence, left asleep! rare vision.
    dream, past wit man dream was.
    Man ass expound dream. Methought
    was- man what. Methought was, and
    methought had, man patch'd fool, offer
    methought had. eye man hath heard, the
    ear man hath seen, man's hand taste, his
    tongue conceive, heart report, dream was. I
    Peter Quince write ballad dream. shall
    call'd 'Bottom's Dream,' hath bottom; will
    sing end play, Duke.
    Peradventure, make gracious, sing at
    death.                                              Exit




SCENE II.
Athens. QUINCE'S house

Enter QUINCE, FLUTE, SNOUT, STARVELING

  QUINCE. Bottom's house? home yet?
  STARVELING. heard of. doubt transported.
  FLUTE. not, play marr'd; not
    forward, doth it?
  QUINCE. possible. man Athens able
    discharge Pyramus he.
  FLUTE. No; hath simply wit handicraft man in
    Athens.
  QUINCE. Yea, person too; paramour for
    sweet voice.
  FLUTE. 'paragon.' paramour is- God bless us!- A
    thing naught.

                           Enter SNUG

  SNUG. Masters, Duke coming temple; two
    lords ladies married. sport  
    forward, made men.
  FLUTE. O sweet bully Bottom! hath lost sixpence day
    life; scaped sixpence day. the
    Duke sixpence day playing Pyramus, I'll
    hanged. deserved it: sixpence day Pyramus,
    nothing.

                           Enter BOTTOM

  BOTTOM. lads? hearts?
  QUINCE. Bottom! O courageous day! O happy hour!
  BOTTOM. Masters, discourse wonders; what;
    you, true Athenian. you
    everything, fell out.
  QUINCE. hear, sweet Bottom.
  BOTTOM. word me. is, the
    Duke hath dined. apparel together; good strings your
    beards, ribbons pumps; meet presently palace;
    man o'er part; short long is, our
    play preferr'd. case, Thisby clean linen;  
    plays lion pare nails, shall
    hang lion's claws. And, dear actors, eat no
    onions garlic, utter sweet breath; not
    doubt hear sweet comedy. words.
    Away, go, away!                                       Exeunt

ACT V. SCENE I.
Athens. palace THESEUS

Enter THESEUS, HIPPOLYTA, PHILOSTRATE, LORDS, ATTENDANTS

  HIPPOLYTA. 'Tis strange, Theseus, lovers speak of.
  THESEUS. strange true. believe
    antique fables, fairy toys.
    Lovers madmen seething brains,
    shaping fantasies, apprehend
    cool reason comprehends.
    lunatic, lover, poet,
    imagination compact.
    sees devils vast hell hold;
    madman. lover, frantic,
    Sees Helen's beauty brow Egypt.
    poet's eye, fine frenzy rolling,
    Doth glance heaven earth, earth heaven;
    imagination bodies forth
    forms things unknown, poet's pen
    Turns shapes, airy  
    local habitation name.
    tricks hath strong imagination
    That, apprehend joy,
    comprehends bringer joy;
    night, imagining fear,
    easy bush suppos'd bear?
  HIPPOLYTA. story night told over,
    minds transfigur'd together,
    witnesseth fancy's images,
    grows great constancy,
    howsoever strange admirable.

          Enter LYSANDER, DEMETRIUS, HERMIA, HELENA

  THESEUS. lovers, full joy mirth.
    Joy, gentle friends, joy fresh days love
    Accompany hearts!
  LYSANDER. us
    Wait royal walks, board, bed!
  THESEUS. now; masques, dances have,  
    wear long age hours
    after-supper bed-time?
    usual manager mirth?
    revels hand? play
    ease anguish torturing hour?
    Call Philostrate.
  PHILOSTRATE. Here, mighty Theseus.
  THESEUS. Say, abridgment evening?
    masque? music? beguile
    lazy time, delight?
  PHILOSTRATE. sports ripe;
    Make choice Highness first.
                                                [Giving paper]
  THESEUS. 'The battle Centaurs, sung
    Athenian eunuch harp.'
    that: told love,
    glory kinsman Hercules.
    'The riot tipsy Bacchanals,
    Tearing Thracian singer rage.'
    device, play'd  
    Thebes conqueror.
    'The thrice Muses mourning death
    Learning, late deceas'd beggary.'
    satire, keen critical,
    sorting nuptial ceremony.
    'A tedious scene young Pyramus
    love Thisby; tragical mirth.'
    Merry tragical! tedious brief!
    hot ice wondrous strange snow.
    find concord discord?
  PHILOSTRATE. play is, lord, ten words long,
    play;
    ten words, lord, long,
    makes tedious; play
    word apt, player fitted.
    tragical, noble lord, is;
    Pyramus doth kill himself.
    rehears'd, confess,
    Made mine eyes water; merry tears
    passion loud laughter shed.  
  THESEUS. play it?
  PHILOSTRATE. Hard-handed men work Athens here,
    labour'd minds till now;
    toil'd unbreathed memories
    play nuptial.
  THESEUS. hear it.
  PHILOSTRATE. No, noble lord,
    you. heard over,
    nothing, world;
    find sport intents,
    Extremely stretch'd conn'd cruel pain,
    service.
  THESEUS. hear play;
    amiss
    simpleness duty tender it.
    Go, bring in; places, ladies.
                                                Exit PHILOSTRATE
  HIPPOLYTA. love wretchedness o'er-charged,
    duty service perishing.
  THESEUS. Why, gentle sweet, thing.  
  HIPPOLYTA. kind.
  THESEUS. kinder we, give nothing.
    sport mistake;
    poor duty do, noble respect
    Takes might, merit.
    come, great clerks purposed
    greet premeditated welcomes;
    shiver pale,
    Make periods midst sentences,
    Throttle practis'd accent fears,
    And, conclusion, dumbly broke off,
    paying welcome. Trust me, sweet,
    silence pick'd welcome;
    modesty fearful duty
    read rattling tongue
    saucy audacious eloquence.
    Love, therefore, tongue-tied simplicity
    speak capacity.

                       Re-enter PHILOSTRATE  

  PHILOSTRATE. Grace, Prologue address'd.
  THESEUS. approach.              [Flourish trumpets]

                 Enter QUINCE PROLOGUE

  PROLOGUE. offend, good will.
    think, offend,
    good will. show simple skill,
    true beginning end.
    then, despite.
    come, minding content you,
    true intent is. delight
    here. repent you,
    actors band; and, show,
    all, know,
  THESEUS. fellow doth stand points.
  LYSANDER. hath rid prologue rough colt; not
    stop. good moral, lord: speak, but
    speak true.  
  HIPPOLYTA. hath play'd prologue child a
    recorder- sound, government.
  THESEUS. speech tangled chain; im paired,
    disordered. next?

          Enter, trumpet them, dumb show,
            PYRAMUS THISBY, WALL, MOONSHINE, LION

  PROLOGUE. Gentles, perchance show;
    on, till truth make things plain.
    man Pyramus, know;
    beauteous lady Thisby certain.
    man, lime rough-cast, doth present
    Wall, vile Wall lovers sunder;
    Walls chink, poor souls, content
    whisper. man wonder.
    man, lanthorn, dog, bush thorn,
    Presenteth Moonshine; for, know,
    moonshine lovers scorn
    meet Ninus' tomb, there, woo.  
    grisly beast, Lion hight name,
    trusty Thisby, coming night,
    scare away, affright;
    fled, mantle fall;
    Lion vile bloody mouth stain.
    Anon Pyramus, sweet youth tall,
    finds trusty Thisby's mantle slain;
    Whereat blade, bloody blameful blade,
    bravely broach'd boiling bloody breast;
    Thisby, tarrying mulberry shade,
    dagger drew, died. rest,
    Lion, Moonshine, Wall, lovers twain,
    large discourse remain.
                               Exeunt PROLOGUE, PYRAMUS, THISBY,
                                             LION, MOONSHINE
  THESEUS. lion speak.
  DEMETRIUS. wonder, lord: lion may, asses do.
  WALL. interlude doth befall
    I, Snout name, present wall;
    wall  
    crannied hole chink,
    lovers, Pyramus Thisby,
    whisper secretly.
    loam, rough-cast, stone, doth show
    wall; truth so;
    cranny is, sinister,
    fearful lovers whisper.
  THESEUS. desire lime hair speak better?
  DEMETRIUS. wittiest partition heard
    discourse, lord.

                       Enter PYRAMUS

  THESEUS. Pyramus draws wall; silence.
  PYRAMUS. O grim-look'd night! O night hue black!
    O night, art day not!
    O night, O night, alack, alack, alack,
    fear Thisby's promise forgot!
    thou, O wall, O sweet, O lovely wall,
    stand'st father's ground mine;  
    Thou wall, O wall, O sweet lovely wall,
    Show thy chink, blink mine eyne.
                                     [WALL holds fingers]
    Thanks, courteous wall. Jove shield thee this!
    I? Thisby see.
    O wicked wall, bliss,
    Curs'd thy stones deceiving me!
  THESEUS. wall, methinks, sensible, curse again.
  PYRAMUS. No, truth, sir, not. Deceiving Thisby's
    cue. enter now, spy wall.
    fall pat told you; yonder comes.

                          Enter THISBY

  THISBY. O wall, full hast thou beard moans,
    parting fair Pyramus me!
    cherry lips kiss'd thy stones,
    Thy stones lime hair knit thee.
  PYRAMUS. voice; chink,
    spy hear Thisby's face.  
    Thisby!
  THISBY. love! thou art love, think.
  PYRAMUS. thou wilt, thy lover's grace;
    Limander trusty still.
  THISBY. Helen, till Fates kill.
  PYRAMUS. Shafalus Procrus true.
  THISBY. Shafalus Procrus, you.
  PYRAMUS. O, kiss hole vile wall.
  THISBY. kiss wall's hole, lips all.
  PYRAMUS. Wilt thou Ninny's tomb meet straightway?
  THISBY. Tide life, tide death, delay.
                                       Exeunt PYRAMUS THISBY
  WALL. I, Wall, part discharged so;
    And, done, Wall doth go.           Exit WALL
  THESEUS. moon neighbours.
  DEMETRIUS. remedy, lord, walls wilful hear
    warning.
  HIPPOLYTA. silliest stuff heard.
  THESEUS. kind shadows; worst are
    worse, imagination amend them.  
  HIPPOLYTA. imagination then, theirs.
  THESEUS. imagine worse themselves,
    pass excellent men. noble beasts in, a
    man lion.

                   Enter LION MOONSHINE

  LION. You, ladies, you, gentle hearts fear
    smallest monstrous mouse creeps floor,
    now, perchance, quake tremble here,
    lion rough wildest rage doth roar.
    Snug joiner am
    lion fell, lion's dam;
    For, lion strife
    place, 'twere pity life.
  THESEUS. gentle beast, good conscience.
  DEMETRIUS. beast, lord, e'er saw.
  LYSANDER. lion fox valour.
  THESEUS. True; goose discretion.
  DEMETRIUS. so, lord; valour carry  
    discretion, fox carries goose.
  THESEUS. discretion, sure, carry valour; for
    goose carries fox. well. Leave his
    discretion, listen Moon.
  MOONSHINE. lanthorn doth horned moon present-
  DEMETRIUS. worn horns head.
  THESEUS. crescent, horns invisible the
    circumference.
  MOONSHINE. lanthorn doth horned moon present;
    Man i' th' Moon be.
  THESEUS. greatest error rest; man should
    put lantern. man i' th' moon?
  DEMETRIUS. dares candle; for, see, it
    snuff.
  HIPPOLYTA. aweary moon. change!
  THESEUS. appears, small light discretion, is
    wane; yet, courtesy, reason, stay
    time.
  LYSANDER. Proceed, Moon.
  MOON. lanthorn  
    moon; I, Man i' th' Moon; thorn-bush, thorn-bush;
    dog, dog.
  DEMETRIUS. Why, lantern; these
    moon. silence; Thisby.

                        Re-enter THISBY

  THISBY. Ninny's tomb. love?
  LION. [Roaring] O-                           [THISBY runs off]
  DEMETRIUS. roar'd, Lion.
  THESEUS. run, Thisby.
  HIPPOLYTA. shone, Moon. Truly, moon shines good
    grace.            [The LION tears THISBY'S Mantle, exit]
  THESEUS. mous'd, Lion.

                        Re-enter PYRAMUS

  DEMETRIUS. Pyramus.
  LYSANDER. lion vanish'd.
  PYRAMUS. Sweet Moon, thee thy sunny beams;  
    thee, Moon, shining bright;
    For, thy gracious golden, glittering gleams,
    trust truest Thisby sight.
             stay, O spite!
             mark, poor knight,
           dreadful dole here!
             Eyes, see?
             he?
           O dainty duck! O dear!
             Thy mantle good,
             What! stain'd blood?
           Approach, ye Furies fell.
             O Fates! come, come;
             Cut thread thrum;
           Quail, crush, conclude, quell.
  THESEUS. passion, death dear friend, go
    make man sad.
  HIPPOLYTA. Beshrew heart, pity man.
  PYRAMUS. O wherefore, Nature, didst thou lions frame?
    lion vile hath deflower'd dear;  
    is- no, no- fairest dame
    liv'd, lov'd, lik'd, look'd cheer.
             Come, tears, confound;
             Out, sword, wound
           pap Pyramus;
             Ay, left pap,
             heart doth hop.               [Stabs himself]
           die I, thus, thus, thus.
             dead,
             fled;
           soul sky.
             Tongue, lose thy light;
             Moon, thy flight.             [Exit MOONSHINE]
           die, die, die, die, die.                   [Dies]
  DEMETRIUS. die, ace, him; one.
  LYSANDER. ace, man; dead; nothing.
  THESEUS. surgeon recover yet
    prove ass.
  HIPPOLYTA. chance Moonshine Thisby back
    finds lover?  

                       Re-enter THISBY

  THESEUS. find starlight. comes; her
    passion ends play.
  HIPPOLYTA. Methinks long a
    Pyramus; hope brief.
  DEMETRIUS. mote turn balance, Pyramus, which
    Thisby, better- man, God warrant us: a
    woman, God bless us!
  LYSANDER. hath spied sweet eyes.
  DEMETRIUS. moans, videlicet:-
  THISBY.      Asleep, love?
               What, dead, dove?
             O Pyramus, arise,
               Speak, speak. dumb?
               Dead, dead? tomb
             cover thy sweet eyes.
               lily lips,
               cherry nose,  
             yellow cowslip cheeks,
               gone, gone;
               Lovers, make moan;
             eyes green leeks.
               O Sisters Three,
               Come, me,
             hands pale milk;
               Lay gore,
               shore
             shears thread silk.
               Tongue, word.
               Come, trusty sword;
             Come, blade, breast imbrue.      [Stabs herself]
               farewell, friends;
               Thisby ends;
             Adieu, adieu, adieu.                         [Dies]
  THESEUS. Moonshine Lion left bury dead.
  DEMETRIUS. Ay, Wall too.
  BOTTOM. [Starting up] No, assure you; wall that
    parted fathers. Epilogue,  
    hear Bergomask dance company?
  THESEUS. epilogue, pray you; play excuse.
    excuse; players dead none
    blamed. Marry, writ played Pyramus, and
    hang'd Thisby's garter, fine
    tragedy. is, truly; notably discharg'd. But
    come, Bergomask; epilogue alone.     [A dance]
    iron tongue midnight hath told twelve.
    Lovers, bed; 'tis fairy time.
    fear out-sleep coming morn,
    night overwatch'd.
    palpable-gross play hath beguil'd
    heavy gait night. Sweet friends, bed.
    fortnight hold solemnity,
    nightly revels jollity.                    Exeunt

                     Enter PUCK broom

  PUCK.      hungry lion roars,
             wolf behowls moon;  
             Whilst heavy ploughman snores,
             weary task fordone.
             wasted brands glow,
             Whilst screech-owl, screeching loud,
             Puts wretch lies woe
             remembrance shroud.
             time night
             graves, gaping wide,
             lets sprite,
             church-way paths glide.
             fairies, run
             triple Hecate's team
             presence sun,
             darkness dream,
             frolic. mouse
             disturb hallowed house.
             broom before,
             sweep dust door.

         Enter OBERON TITANIA, train  

  OBERON.    house give glimmering light,
             dead drowsy fire;
             elf fairy sprite
             Hop light bird brier;
             ditty, me,
             Sing dance trippingly.
  TITANIA.      First, rehearse song rote,
                word warbling note;
                Hand hand, fairy grace,
                sing, bless place.

           [OBERON leading, FAIRIES sing dance]

  OBERON.    Now, break day,
             house fairy stray.
             bride-bed we,
             blessed be;
             issue create
             fortunate.  
             couples three
             true loving be;
             blots Nature's hand
             issue stand;
             mole, hare-lip, scar,
             mark prodigious, are
             Despised nativity,
             children be.
             field-dew consecrate,
             fairy gait,
             chamber bless,
             palace, sweet peace;
             owner blest
             safety rest.
             Trip away; make stay;
             Meet break day.    Exeunt PUCK
  PUCK.      shadows offended,
             this, mended,
             slumb'red here
             visions appear.  
             weak idle theme,
             yielding dream,
             Gentles, reprehend.
             pardon, mend.
             And, honest Puck,
             unearned luck
             scape serpent's tongue,
             make amends ere long;
             Puck liar call.
             So, good night all.
             Give hands, friends,
             Robin restore amends.                Exit

THE END

1599


MUCH ADO NOTHING


by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  Pedro, Prince Arragon.
  John, bastard brother.
  Claudio, young lord Florence.
  Benedick, Young lord Padua.
  Leonato, Governor Messina.
  Antonio, man, brother.
  Balthasar, attendant Pedro.
  Borachio, follower John.
  Conrade, follower John.
  Friar Francis.
  Dogberry, Constable.
  Verges, Headborough.
  Sexton.
  Boy.

  Hero, daughter Leonato.
  Beatrice, niece Leonato.
  Margaret, waiting gentlewoman attending Hero.
  Ursula, waiting gentlewoman attending Hero.

  Messengers, Watch, Attendants, etc.  




<<THIS ELECTRONIC VERSION COMPLETE WORKS WILLIAM
SHAKESPEARE COPYRIGHT 1990-1993 WORLD LIBRARY, INC., IS
PROVIDED PROJECT GUTENBERG ETEXT ILLINOIS BENEDICTINE COLLEGE
WITH PERMISSION.  ELECTRONIC MACHINE READABLE COPIES BE
