ACT V. Scene I.
The street, Leonato's house.

Enter Leonato brother [ Antonio].

  Ant. thus, kill yourself,
    'tis wisdom grief
    yourself.
  Leon. pray thee cease thy counsel,
    falls mine ears profitless
    water sieve. Give counsel,
    comforter delight mine ear
    wrongs suit mine.
    Bring father lov'd child,
    joy overwhelm'd mine,
    bid speak patience.
    Measure woe length breadth mine,
    answer strain strain,
    thus, grief such,
    lineament, branch, shape, form.
    smile stroke beard,
    Bid sorrow wag, cry 'hem' groan,  
    Patch grief proverbs, make misfortune drunk
    candle-wasters--bring me,
    gather patience.
    man; for, brother, men
    counsel speak comfort grief
    feel; but, tasting it,
    counsel turns passion, before
    give preceptial medicine rage,
    Fetter strong madness silken thread,
    Charm ache air agony words.
    No, no! 'Tis men's office speak patience
    wring load sorrow,
    man's virtue sufficiency
    moral endure
    himself. give counsel.
    griefs cry louder advertisement.
  Ant. men children differ.
  Leon. pray thee peace. flesh blood;
    philosopher
    endure toothache patiently,  
    writ style gods
    made push chance sufferance.
  Ant. bend harm yourself.
    Make offend suffer too.
  Leon. thou speak'st reason. Nay, so.
    soul doth Hero belied;
    Claudio know; Prince,
    dishonour her.

              Enter Pedro Claudio.

  Ant. Prince Claudio hastily.
  Pedro. Good den, Good den.
  Claud. Good day you.
  Leon. Hear you, lords!
  Pedro. haste, Leonato.
  Leon. haste, lord! well, fare well, lord.
    hasty now? Well, one.
  Pedro. Nay, quarrel us, good man.
  Ant. quarrelling,  
    lie low.
  Claud. wrongs him?
  Leon. Marry, thou dost wrong me, thou dissembler, thou!
    Nay, lay thy hand thy sword;
    fear thee not.
  Claud. Mary, beshrew hand
    give age fear.
    faith, hand meant sword.
  Leon. Tush, tush, man! fleer jest me
    speak dotard fool,
    privilege age brag
    young, do,
    old. Know, Claudio, thy head,
    Thou hast wrong'd mine innocent child me
    forc'd lay reverence by
    And, grey hairs bruise days,
    challenge thee trial man.
    thou hast belied mine innocent child;
    Thy slander hath heart,
    lied buried ancestors-  
    O, tomb scandal slept,
    Save hers, fram'd thy villany!
  Claud. villany?
  Leon. Thine, Claudio; thine say.
  Pedro. right, man
  Leon. lord, lord,
    prove body dare,
    nice fence active practice,
    youth bloom lustihood.
  Claud. Away! you.
  Leon. Canst thou daff me? Thou hast kill'd child.
    thou kill'st me, boy, thou shalt kill man.
    And. kill us, men indeed
    matter; kill first.
    Win wear me! answer me.
    Come, follow me, boy,. Come, sir boy, follow me.
    Sir boy, whip foining fence!
    Nay, gentleman, will.
  Leon. Brother--
  Ant. Content yourself. God lov'd niece,  
    dead, slander'd death villains,
    dare answer man indeed
    dare serpent tongue.
    Boys, apes, braggarts, jacks, milksops!
  Leon. Brother Anthony--
  Ant. Hold content. What, man! them, yea,
    weigh, utmost scruple,
    Scambling, outfacing, fashion-monging boys,
    lie cog flout, deprave slander,
    anticly, show outward hideousness,
    speak half dozen dang'rous words,
    hurt enemies, durst;
    all.
  Leon. But, brother Anthony--
  Ant. Come, 'tis matter.
    meddle; deal this.
  Pedro. Gentlemen both, wake patience.
    heart daughter's death;
    But, honour, charg'd nothing
    true, full proof.  
  Leon. lord, lord--
  Pedro. hear you.
  Leon. No? Come, brother, away!--I heard.
  Ant. shall, smart it.
                                                    Exeunt ambo.

                  Enter Benedick.

  Pedro. See, see! man seek.
  Claud. Now, signior, news?
  Bene. Good day, lord.
  Pedro. Welcome, signior. part fray.
  Claud. lik'd noses snapp'd two
    men teeth.
  Pedro. Leonato brother. think'st thou? fought,
    doubt young them.
  Bene. false quarrel true valour. seek
    both.
  Claud. seek thee; high-proof
    melancholy, fain beaten away. Wilt thou thy  
    wit?
  Bene. scabbard. draw it?
  Pedro. Dost thou wear thy wit thy side?
  Claud. so, their
    wit. bid thee draw, minstrel--draw to
    pleasure us.
  Pedro. honest man, pale. Art thou sick or
    angry?
  Claud. What, courage, man! care kill'd cat, thou hast
    mettle thee kill care.
  Bene. Sir, meet wit career charge it
    me. pray choose subject.
  Claud. Nay then, give staff; broke cross.
  Pedro. light, more. angry
    indeed.
  Claud. be, turn girdle.
  Bene. speak word ear?
  Claud. God bless challenge!
  Bene. [aside Claudio] villain. jest not; make
    good dare, dare, dare.  
    right, protest cowardice. kill'd a
    sweet lady, death fall heavy you. hear
    you.
  Claud. Well, meet you, good cheer.
  Pedro. What, feast, feast?
  Claud. I' faith, him, hath bid calve's head and
    capon, carve curiously, my
    knife's naught. find woodcock too?
  Bene. Sir, wit ambles well; easily.
  Pedro. thee Beatrice prais'd thy wit day. I
    thou hadst fine wit: 'True,' she, 'a fine little
    one.' 'No,' I, 'a great wit.' 'Right,' she, 'a great
    gross one.' 'Nay,' I, 'a good wit.' 'Just,' she, 'it
    hurts nobody.' 'Nay,' I, 'the gentleman wise.' 'Certain,'
    she, wise gentleman.' 'Nay,' I, 'he hath the
    tongues.' 'That believe' she, 'for swore thing me
    Monday night forswore Tuesday morning. a
    double tongue; tongues.' hour
    transshape thy virtues. she
    concluded sigh, thou wast proper'st man Italy.  
  Claud. wept heartily cared not.
  Pedro. Yea, did; yet, that, not
    hate deadly, love dearly. man's
    daughter told all.
  Claud. All, all! moreover, God hid the
    garden.
  Pedro. set savage bull's horns the
    Benedick's head?
  Claud. Yea, text underneath, 'Here dwells Benedick, married
    man'?
  Bene. Fare well, boy; mind. leave to
    gossiplike humour. break jests braggards their
    blades, God thanked hurt not. lord, many
    courtesies you. discontinue company. Your
    brother bastard fled Messina. you
    kill'd sweet innocent lady. Lord Lackbeard there, he
    meet; till peace him.
                                                         [Exit.]
  Pedro. earnest.
  Claud. profound earnest; and, warrant you,  
    love Beatrice.
  Pedro. hath challeng'd thee.
  Claud. sincerely.
  Pedro. pretty thing man doublet and
    hose leaves wit!

  Enter Constables [Dogberry Verges, Watch, leading]
                      Conrade Borachio.

  Claud. giant ape; ape doctor to
    man.
  Pedro. But, soft you, be! Pluck up, heart, sad!
    brother fled?
  Dog. you, sir. justice tame you, ne'er
    weigh reasons balance. Nay, cursing
    hypocrite once, look'd to.
  Pedro. now? brother's men bound? Borachio one.
  Claud. Hearken offence, lord.
  Pedro. Officers, offence men done?
  Dog. Marry, sir, committed false report; moreover,  
    spoken untruths; secondarily, slanders; sixth and
    lastly, belied lady; thirdly, verified
    unjust things; conclude, lying knaves.
  Pedro. First, thee done; thirdly, thee
    offence; sixth lastly, committed;
    conclude, lay charge.
  Claud. Rightly reasoned, division; troth
    meaning suited.
  Pedro. offended, masters, bound to
    answer? learned constable cunning be
    understood. offence?
  Bora. Sweet Prince, farther mine answer. you
    hear me, Count kill me. deceived your
    eyes. wisdoms discover, shallow
    fools brought light, night overheard me
    confessing man, John brother incensed to
    slander Lady Hero; brought orchard and
    court Margaret Hero's garments; disgrac'd her
    marry her. villany record,
    seal death repeat  
    shame. lady dead mine master's false
    accusation; briefly, desire reward a
    villain.
  Pedro. Runs speech iron blood?
  Claud. drunk poison whiles utter'd it.
  Pedro. brother set thee this?
  Bora. Yea, paid richly practice it.
  Pedro. compos'd fram'd treachery,
    fled villany.
  Claud. Sweet Hero, thy image doth appear
    rare semblance lov'd first.
  Dog. Come, bring plaintiffs. time sexton hath
    reformed Signior Leonato matter. And, masters, not
    forget specify, time place serve, an
    ass.
  Verg. Here, Master Signior Leonato, sexton too.

          Enter Leonato, brother [Antonio], Sexton.

  Leon. villain? eyes,  
    That, note man him,
    avoid him. he?
  Bora. wronger, me.
  Leon. Art thou slave thy breath hast kill'd
    Mine innocent child?
  Bora. Yea, alone.
  Leon. No, so, villain! thou beliest thyself.
    stand pair honourable men--
    fled--that hand it.
    princes daughter's death.
    Record high worthy deeds.
    'Twas bravely done, bethink it.
  Claud. pray patience;
    speak. Choose revenge yourself;
    Impose penance invention
    lay sin. sinn'd not
    mistaking.
  Pedro. soul, I!
    yet, satisfy good man,
    bend heavy weight  
    enjoin to.
  Leon. bid bid daughter live-
    impossible; pray both,
    Possess people Messina here
    innocent died; love
    labour aught sad invention,
    Hang epitaph tomb,
    sing bones--sing to-night.
    To-morrow morning house,
    son-in-law,
    nephew. brother hath daughter,
    copy child dead,
    heir us.
    Give giv'n cousin,
    dies revenge.
  Claud. O noble sir!
    over-kindness doth wring tears me.
    embrace offer; dispose
    henceforth poor Claudio.
  Leon. To-morrow expect coming;  
    To-night leave. naughty man
    fact face brought Margaret,
    pack'd wrong,
    Hir'd brother.
  Bora. No, soul, not;
    knew spoke me;
    hath virtuous
    her.
  Dog. Moreover, sir, white black, this
    plaintiff here, offender, call ass. beseech let
    rememb'red punishment. watch heard them
    talk Deformed. wears key ear, a
    lock hanging it, borrows money God's name, he
    hath us'd long paid men grow hard-hearted
    lend God's sake. Pray examine upon
    point.
  Leon. thee thy care honest pains.
  Dog. worship speaks thankful reverent youth,
    praise God you.
  Leon. thy pains. [Gives money.]  
  Dog. God save foundation!
  Leon. Go, discharge thee thy prisoner, thee.
  Dog. leave arrant knave worship, beseech
    worship correct yourself, others.
    God worship! worship well. God restore you
    health! humbly give leave depart; merry
    meeting wish'd, God prohibit it! Come, neighbour.
                                   Exeunt [Dogberry Verges].
  Leon. to-morrow morning, lords, farewell.
  Ant. Farewell, lords. to-morrow.
  Pedro. fall.
  Claud. To-night mourn Hero.
                                 [Exeunt Pedro Claudio.]
  Leon. [to Watch] Bring fellows on.--We'll talk with
      Margaret,
    acquaintance grew lewd fellow.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene II.
Leonato's orchard.

Enter Benedick Margaret [meeting].

  Bene. Pray thee, sweet Mistress Margaret, deserve hands
    helping speech Beatrice.
  Marg. write sonnet praise beauty?
  Bene. high style, Margaret, man living come
    it; comely truth thou deservest it.
  Marg. man me? Why, below
    stairs?
  Bene. Thy wit quick greyhound's mouth--it catches.
  Marg. blunt fencer's foils, hit hurt
    not.
  Bene. manly wit, Margaret: hurt woman.
    pray thee call Beatrice. give thee bucklers.
  Marg. Give swords; bucklers own.
  Bene. them, Margaret, put pikes a
    vice, dangerous weapons maids.
  Marg. Well, call Beatrice you, hath legs.
  Bene. come.  
                                                  Exit Margaret.
       [Sings] god love,
               sits above
           me, me,
             pitiful deserve--

    singing; loving Leander good swimmer,
    Troilus employer panders, book full of
    quondam carpet-mongers, names run smoothly the
    road blank verse--why, turn'd
    poor love. Marry, show in
    rhyme. tried. find rhyme 'lady' 'baby'
    --an innocent rhyme; 'scorn,' 'horn'--a hard rhyme; for
    'school', 'fool'--a babbling rhyme: ominous endings! No, I
    born rhyming planet, woo festival
    terms.

                    Enter Beatrice.

    Sweet Beatrice, wouldst thou call'd thee?  
  Beat. Yea, signior, depart bid me.
  Bene. O, stay till then!
  Beat. 'Then' spoken. Fare now. yet, ere go, let
    for, is, knowing hath
    pass'd Claudio.
  Bene. foul words; kiss thee.
  Beat. Foul words foul wind, foul wind foul
    breath, foul breath noisome. depart
    unkiss'd.
  Bene. Thou hast frighted word sense, so
    forcible thy wit. thee plainly, Claudio
    undergoes challenge; shortly hear him
    subscribe coward. pray thee me,
    bad parts didst thou fall love me?
  Beat. together, maintain'd politic state of
    evil admit good part intermingle with
    them. good parts suffer love
    me?
  Bene. Suffer love!--a good epithet. suffer love indeed, I
    love thee will.  
  Beat. spite heart, think. Alas, poor heart! you
    spite sake, spite yours, never
    love friend hates.
  Bene. Thou wise woo peaceably.
  Beat. appears confession. wise man
    twenty, praise himself.
  Bene. old, instance, Beatrice, liv'd time of
    good neighbours. man erect age tomb
    ere dies, live longer monument bell
    rings widow weeps.
  Beat. long that, you?
  Bene. Question: why, hour clamour quarter rheum.
    expedient wise, Worm (his
    conscience) find impediment contrary, trumpet
    virtues, myself. praising
    myself, who, bear witness, praiseworthy. now
    me, doth cousin?
  Beat. ill.
  Bene. you?
  Beat. ill too.  
  Bene. Serve God, love me, mend. leave too, for
    haste.

                         Enter Ursula.

  Urs. Madam, uncle. Yonder's coil home.
    proved Lady Hero hath falsely accus'd, Prince
    Claudio mightily abus'd, John author all,
    fled gone. presently?
  Beat. hear news, signior?
  Bene. live thy heart, die thy lap, buried thy
    eyes; moreover, thee thy uncle's.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene III.
A churchyard.

Enter Claudio, Pedro, tapers,
[followed Musicians].

  Claud. monument Leonato?
  Lord. is, lord.
  Claud. [reads scroll]

                      Epitaph.

        death slanderous tongues
          Hero lies.
        Death, guerdon wrongs,
          fame dies.
        life died shame
        Lives death glorious fame.

    Hang thou tomb,
                                          [Hangs scroll.]
    Praising dumb.  
    Now, music, sound, sing solemn hymn.

                     Song.

        Pardon, goddess night,
        slew thy virgin knight;
        which, songs woe,
        Round tomb go.
        Midnight, assist moan,
        sigh groan
          Heavily, heavily,
        Graves, yawn yield dead,
        Till death uttered
          Heavily, heavily.

  Claud. thy bones good night!
    Yearly rite.
  Pedro. Good morrow, masters. Put torches out.
    wolves prey'd, look, gentle day,
    wheels Phoebus, round  
    Dapples drowsy east spots grey.
    all, leave us. Fare well.
  Claud. Good morrow, masters. way.
  Pedro. Come, put weeds,
    Leonato's go.
  Claud. Hymen luckier issue speeds
    rend'red woe.          Exeunt.




Scene IV
The hall Leonato's house.

Enter Leonato, Benedick, [Beatrice,] Margaret, Ursula, Antonio,
Friar [Francis], Hero.

  Friar. innocent?
  Leon. Prince Claudio, accus'd her
    error heard debated.
    Margaret fault this,
    will, appears
    true question.
  Ant. Well, glad things sort well.
  Bene. I, faith enforc'd
    call young Claudio reckoning it.
  Leon. Well, daughter, gentlewomen all,
    Withdraw chamber yourselves,
    send you, mask'd.
                                                  Exeunt Ladies.
    Prince Claudio promis'd hour
    visit me. office, brother:
    father brother's daughter,  
    give young Claudio.
  Ant. confirm'd countenance.
  Bene. Friar, entreat pains, think.
  Friar. what, signior?
  Bene. bind me, undo me--one them.
    Signior Leonato, truth is, good signior,
    niece eye favour.
  Leon. eye daughter lent her. 'Tis true.
  Bene. eye love requite her.
  Leon. sight whereof me,
    Claudio, Prince; will?
  Bene. answer, sir, enigmatical;
    But, will, is, good will
    stand ours, day conjoin'd
    state honourable marriage;
    which, good friar, desire help.
  Leon. heart liking.
  Friar. help.

       Enter Pedro Claudio other.  

    Prince Claudio.
  Pedro. Good morrow fair assembly.
  Leon. Good morrow, Prince; good morrow, Claudio.
    attend you. determin'd
    To-day marry brother's daughter?
  Claud. hold mind, Ethiope.
  Leon. Call forth, brother. friar ready.
                                                 [Exit Antonio.]
  Pedro. Good morrow, Benedick. Why, matter
    February face,
    full frost, storm, cloudiness?
  Claud. thinks savage bull.
    Tush, fear not, man! tip thy horns gold,
    Europa rejoice thee,
    Europa lusty Jove
    play noble beast love.
  Bene. Bull Jove, sir, amiable low,
    strange bull leap'd father's cow
    calf noble feat  
    you, bleat.

       Enter [Leonato's] brother [Antonio], Hero, Beatrice,
            Margaret, Ursula, [the ladies wearing masks].

  Claud. owe you. reckonings.
    lady seize upon?
  Ant. she, give her.
  Claud. then, mine. Sweet, face.
  Leon. No, till hand
    friar swear marry her.
  Claud. Give hand holy friar.
    husband me.
  Hero. liv'd wife;       [Unmasks.]
    lov'd husband.
  Claud. Hero!
  Hero. certainer.
    Hero died defil'd; live,
    surely live, maid.
  Pedro. Hero! Hero dead!  
  Leon. died, lord, whiles slander liv'd.
  Friar. amazement qualify,
    When, holy rites ended,
    largely fair Hero's death.
    Meantime familiar,
    chapel presently.
  Bene. Soft fair, friar. Beatrice?
  Beat. [unmasks] answer name. will?
  Bene. love me?
  Beat. Why, no; reason.
  Bene. Why, uncle, Prince, Claudio
    deceived; swore did.
  Beat. love me?
  Bene. Troth, no; reason.
  Beat. Why, cousin, Margaret, Ursula
    deceiv'd; swear did.
  Bene. swore sick me.
  Beat. swore well-nigh dead me.
  Bene. 'Tis matter. love me?
  Beat. No, truly, friendly recompense.  
  Leon. Come, cousin, love gentleman.
  Claud. sworn upon't loves her;
    paper written hand,
    halting sonnet pure brain,
    Fashion'd Beatrice.
  Hero. another,
    Writ cousin's hand, stol'n pocket,
    affection Benedick.
  Bene. miracle! hands hearts.
    Come, thee; but, light, thee pity.
  Beat. deny you; but, good day, yield upon
    great persuasion, partly save life, told
    consumption.
  Bene. Peace! stop mouth.             [Kisses her.]
  Beat. thee what, Prince: college wit-crackers cannot
    flout humour. Dost thou care satire or
    epigram? No. man beaten brains, 'a shall
    wear handsome him. brief, purpose to
    marry, purpose world say
    it; flout  
    it; man giddy thing, conclusion.
    thy part, Claudio, beaten thee; in
    thou art kinsman, live unbruis'd, love my
    cousin.
  Claud. hop'd thou wouldst denied Beatrice, I
    cudgell'd thee thy single life, make thee a
    double-dealer, question thou wilt cousin do
    exceeding narrowly thee.
  Bene. Come, come, friends. dance ere are
    married, lighten hearts wives' heels.
  Leon. dancing afterward.
  Bene. First, word! play, music. Prince, thou art
    sad. thee wife, thee wife! staff more
    reverent tipp'd horn.

                       Enter Messenger.

  Mess. lord, brother John ta'en flight,
    brought armed men back Messina.
  Bene. till to-morrow. devise thee brave  
    punishments him. Strike up, pipers!
                                                Dance. [Exeunt.]


THE END

1605


THE TRAGEDY OTHELLO, MOOR VENICE

by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  OTHELLO, Moor, general Venetian forces
  DESDEMONA, wife
  IAGO, ensign Othello
  EMILIA, wife, lady-in-waiting Desdemona
  CASSIO, lieutenant Othello
  DUKE VENICE
  BRABANTIO, Venetian Senator, father Desdemona
  GRATIANO, nobleman Venice, brother Brabantio
  LODOVICO, nobleman Venice, kinsman Brabantio
  RODERIGO, rejected suitor Desdemona
  BIANCA, mistress Cassio
  MONTANO, Cypriot official
  Clown service Othello
  Senators, Sailors, Messengers, Officers, Gentlemen, Musicians, and
    Attendants

SCENE: Venice Cyprus

ACT I. SCENE I.
Venice. street.

Enter Roderigo Iago.

  RODERIGO. Tush, me! unkindly
    thou, Iago, hast purse
    strings thine, shouldst this.
  IAGO. 'Sblood, hear me.
    dream matter,
    Abhor me.
  RODERIGO. Thou told'st thou didst hold thy hate.
  IAGO. Despise me, not. great city,
    personal suit make lieutenant,
    Off-capp'd him; and, faith man,
    price, worth worse place.
    he, loving pride purposes,
    Evades them, bumbast circumstance
    Horribly stuff'd epithets war,
    And, conclusion,
    Nonsuits mediators; for, "Certes," he,
    "I chose officer."  
    he?
    Forsooth, great arithmetician,
    Michael Cassio, Florentine
    (A fellow damn'd fair wife)
    set squadron field,
    division battle knows
    spinster; bookish theoric,
    toged consuls propose
    masterly he. Mere prattle practice
    soldiership. he, sir, election;
    I, eyes proof
    Rhodes, Cyprus, grounds
    Christian heathen, belee'd calm'd
    debitor creditor. counter-caster,
    He, good time, lieutenant be,
    I- God bless mark!- Moorship's ancient.
  RODERIGO. heaven, hangman.
  IAGO. Why, remedy. 'Tis curse service,
    Preferment letter affection,
    gradation,  
    Stood heir first. Now, sir, judge yourself
    term affined
    love Moor.
  RODERIGO.           follow then.
  IAGO. O, sir, content you.
    follow serve turn him:
    masters, masters
    follow'd. mark
    duteous knee-crooking knave,
    doting obsequious bondage
    Wears time, master's ass,
    nought provender, old, cashier'd.
    Whip honest knaves. are
    Who, trimm'd forms visages duty,
    hearts attending themselves,
    throwing shows service lords
    thrive them; lined coats
    homage. fellows soul,
    profess myself.
    For, sir,  
    Roderigo,
    Moor, Iago.
    him, follow myself;
    Heaven judge, love duty,
    so, peculiar end.
    outward action doth demonstrate
    native act figure heart
    complement extern, 'tis long after
    wear heart sleeve
    daws peck at: am.
  RODERIGO. full fortune thick-lips owe,
    carry't thus!
  IAGO.                     Call father,
    Rouse him, make him, poison delight,
    Proclaim streets, incense kinsmen,
    And, fertile climate dwell,
    Plague flies. joy joy,
    throw vexation on't
    lose color.
  RODERIGO. father's house; call aloud.  
  IAGO. Do, timorous accent dire yell
    when, night negligence, fire
    spied populous cities.
  RODERIGO. What, ho, Brabantio! Signior Brabantio, ho!
  IAGO. Awake! What, ho, Brabantio! Thieves! Thieves! Thieves!
    house, daughter, bags!
    Thieves! Thieves!

                Brabantio appears above, window.

  BRABANTIO. reason terrible summons?
    matter there?
  RODERIGO. Signior, family within?
  IAGO. doors lock'd?
  BRABANTIO.                   Why? Wherefore this?
  IAGO. 'Zounds, sir, robb'd! shame, put gown;
    heart burst, lost half soul;
    now, now, now, black ram
    tupping white ewe. Arise, arise!
    Awake snorting citizens bell,  
    devil make grandsire you.
    Arise, say!
  BRABANTIO. What, lost wits?
  RODERIGO. reverend signior, voice?
  BRABANTIO. I. you?
  RODERIGO. Roderigo.
  BRABANTIO.                     worser welcome.
    charged thee haunt doors.
    honest plainness thou hast heard say
    daughter thee; now, madness,
    full supper distempering draughts,
    malicious bravery, dost thou come
    start quiet.
  RODERIGO. Sir, sir, sir-
  BRABANTIO.               thou sure
    spirit place power
    make bitter thee.
  RODERIGO.                      Patience, good sir.
  BRABANTIO. tell'st thou robbing? Venice;
    house grange.  
  RODERIGO.                   grave Brabantio,
    simple pure soul you.
  IAGO. 'Zounds, sir, serve God,
    devil bid you. service you
    ruffians, daughter covered a
    Barbary horse; nephews neigh you; have
    coursers cousins, gennets germans.
  BRABANTIO. profane wretch art thou?
  IAGO. one, sir, daughter the
    Moor making beast backs.
  BRABANTIO. Thou villain.
  IAGO.                          are- senator.
  BRABANTIO. thou shalt answer; thee, Roderigo.
  RODERIGO. Sir, answer anything. But, beseech you,
    If't pleasure wise consent,
    partly find is, fair daughter,
    odd-even dull watch o' night,
    Transported worse guard
    knave common hire, gondolier,
    gross clasps lascivious Moor-  
    you, allowance,
    bold saucy wrongs;
    this, manners me
    wrong rebuke. believe
    That, sense civility,
    play trifle reverence.
    daughter, leave,
    again, hath made gross revolt,
    Tying duty, beauty, wit, fortunes
    extravagant wheeling stranger
    everywhere. Straight satisfy yourself:
    chamber house,
    loose justice state
    deluding you.
  BRABANTIO.               Strike tinder, ho!
    Give taper! Call people!
    accident unlike dream;
    Belief oppresses already.
    Light, say, light!                                  Exit above.
  IAGO.                  Farewell, leave you.  
    meet, wholesome place,
    produced- as, stay, shall-
    Moor; know, state,
    gall check,
    safety cast him, embark'd
    loud reason Cyprus wars,
    stands act, that, souls,
    fathom none
    lead business; regard,
    hate hell pains,
    necessity present life,
    show flag sign love,
    sign. surely find him,
    Lead Sagittary raised search,
    him. farewell.                  Exit.

            Enter, below, Brabantio, nightgown, and
                        Servants torches.

  BRABANTIO. true evil: is,  
    despised time
    nought bitterness. Now, Roderigo,
    didst thou her? O unhappy girl!
    Moor, say'st thou? father!
    didst thou 'twas she? O, deceives me
    Past thought! you? tapers.
    Raise kindred. married, you?
  RODERIGO. Truly, are.
  BRABANTIO. O heaven! out? O treason blood!
    Fathers, trust daughters' minds
    act. charms
    property youth maidhood
    abused? read, Roderigo,
    thing?
  RODERIGO.             Yes, sir, indeed.
  BRABANTIO. Call brother. O, her!
    way, another. know
    apprehend Moor?
  RODERIGO. discover him, please
    good guard me.  
  BRABANTIO. Pray you, lead on. house call;
    command most. weapons, ho!
    raise special officers night.
    On, good Roderigo, deserve pains.               Exeunt.




SCENE II.
Another street.

Enter Othello, Iago, Attendants torches.

  IAGO. trade war slain men,
    hold stuff o' conscience
    contrived murther. lack iniquity
    service. ten times
    thought yerk'd ribs.
  OTHELLO. 'Tis is.
  IAGO.                          Nay, prated
    spoke scurvy provoking terms
    honor
    That, godliness have,
    full hard forbear him. pray you, sir,
    fast married? assured this,
    magnifico beloved,
    hath effect voice potential
    double Duke's. divorce you,
    put restraint grievance
    law, enforce on,  
    give cable.
  OTHELLO.               spite.
    services, signiory,
    out-tongue complaints. 'Tis know-
    Which, boasting honor,
    promulgate- fetch life being
    men royal siege, demerits
    speak unbonneted proud fortune
    reach'd. know, Iago,
    love gentle Desdemona,
    unhoused free condition
    Put circumscription confine
    sea's worth. But, look! lights yond?
  IAGO. raised father friends.
    in.
  OTHELLO.               I; found.
    parts, title, perfect soul
    manifest rightly. they?
  IAGO. Janus, no.
  
           Enter Cassio Officers torches.

  OTHELLO. servants Duke? lieutenant?
    goodness night you, friends!
    news?
  CASSIO.             Duke greet you, general,
    requires haste-post-haste appearance,
    instant.
  OTHELLO.               matter, you?
  CASSIO. Cyprus, divine;
    business heat. galleys
    dozen sequent messengers
    night another's heels;
    consuls, raised met,
    Duke's already. hotly call'd for,
    When, lodging found,
    Senate hath quests
    search out.
  OTHELLO.             'Tis found you.
    spend word house  
    you.                                            Exit.
  CASSIO.            Ancient, makes here?
  IAGO. Faith, tonight hath boarded land carack;
    prove lawful prize, made forever.
  CASSIO. understand.
  IAGO.                        married.
  CASSIO.                                    who?

                          Re-enter Othello.

  IAGO. Marry, to- Come, captain, go?
  OTHELLO.                                     you.
  CASSIO. troop seek you.
  IAGO. Brabantio. General, advised,
    bad intent.

         Enter Brabantio, Roderigo, Officers torches
                             weapons.

  OTHELLO.                  Holla! Stand there!  
  RODERIGO. Signior, Moor.
  BRABANTIO.                         him, thief!
                                             draw sides.
  IAGO. You, Roderigo! Come, sir, you.
  OTHELLO. bright swords, dew rust them.
    Good signior, command years
    weapons.
  BRABANTIO. O thou foul thief, hast thou stow'd daughter?
    Damn'd thou art, thou hast enchanted her,
    refer things sense,
    chains magic bound,
    maid tender, fair, happy,
    opposite marriage shunn'd
    wealthy, curled darlings nation,
    have, incur general mock,
    Run guardage sooty bosom
    thing thou- fear, delight.
    Judge world, 'tis gross sense
    thou hast practiced foul charms,
    Abused delicate youth drugs minerals  
    weaken motion. have't disputed on;
    'Tis probable, palpable thinking.
    apprehend attach thee
    abuser world, practicer
    arts inhibited warrant.
    Lay hold him. resist,
    Subdue peril.
  OTHELLO.                   Hold hands,
    inclining rest.
    cue fight, it
    prompter. go
    answer charge?
  BRABANTIO.                    prison, till fit time
    law direct session
    Call thee answer.
  OTHELLO.               obey?
    Duke therewith satisfied,
    messengers side,
    present business state
    bring him?  
  OFFICER.        'Tis true, worthy signior;
    Duke's council, noble self,
    sure, for.
  BRABANTIO.                How? Duke council?
    time night? Bring away;
    Mine's idle cause. Duke himself,
    brothers state,
    feel wrong 'twere own;
    actions passage free,
    Bond slaves pagans statesmen be.            Exeunt.




SCENE III.
A council chamber. Duke Senators sitting table;
Officers attending.

  DUKE. composition news
    credit.
  SENATOR.            disproportion'd;
    letters hundred galleys.
  DUKE. mine, hundred forty.
  SENATOR.                      mine, hundred.
    jump account-
    cases, aim reports,
    'Tis oft difference- confirm
    Turkish fleet, bearing Cyprus.
  DUKE. Nay, judgement.
    secure error,
    main article approve
    fearful sense.
  SAILOR. [Within.] What, ho! What, ho! What, ho!
  OFFICER. messenger galleys.

                            Enter Sailor.
  
  DUKE.                                Now, business?
  SAILOR. Turkish preparation makes Rhodes,
    bid report state
    Signior Angelo.
  DUKE. change?
  SENATOR.                    be,
    assay reason; 'tis pageant
    false gaze. consider
    importancy Cyprus Turk,
    understand
    concerns Turk Rhodes,
    facile question bear it,
    stands warlike brace,
    altogether lacks abilities
    Rhodes dress'd in. make thought this,
    Turk unskillful
    leave latest concerns first,
    Neglecting attempt ease gain,
    wake wage danger profitless.
  DUKE. Nay, confidence, Rhodes.  
  OFFICER. news.

                          Enter Messenger.

  MESSENGER. Ottomites, reverend gracious,
    Steering due isle Rhodes,
    injointed fleet.
  SENATOR. Ay, thought. many, guess?
  MESSENGER. thirty sail; re-stem
    backward course, bearing frank appearance
    purposes Cyprus. Signior Montano,
    trusty valiant servitor,
    free duty recommends thus,
    prays him.
  DUKE. 'Tis Cyprus.
    Marcus Luccicos, town?
  SENATOR. Florence.
  DUKE. Write him, post-post-haste dispatch.
  SENATOR. Brabantio valiant Moor.
  
       Enter Brabantio, Othello, Iago, Roderigo, Officers.

  DUKE. Valiant Othello, straight employ you
    general enemy Ottoman.
    [To Brabantio.] you; welcome, gentle signior;
    lack'd counsel tonight.
  BRABANTIO. yours. Good Grace, pardon me:
    place aught heard business
    Hath raised bed, doth general care
    hold me; grief
    flood-gate o'erbearing nature
    engluts swallows sorrows,
    itself.
  DUKE.                     Why, matter?
  BRABANTIO. daughter! O, daughter!
  ALL.                                    Dead?
  BRABANTIO.                                    Ay, me.
    abused, stol'n corrupted
    spells medicines bought mountebanks;
    nature preposterously err,  
    deficient, blind, lame sense,
    Sans witchcraft not.
  DUKE. Whoe'er foul proceeding
    Hath beguiled daughter herself
    her, bloody book law
    read bitter letter
    sense, yea, proper son
    Stood action.
  BRABANTIO.              Humbly Grace.
    man, Moor, now, seems,
    special mandate state affairs
    Hath brought.
  ALL.                   for't.
  DUKE. [To Othello.] part this?
  BRABANTIO. Nothing, so.
  OTHELLO. potent, grave, reverend signiors,
    noble approved good masters,
    ta'en man's daughter,
    true; true, married her;
    head front offending  
    Hath extent, more. Rude speech,
    blest soft phrase peace;
    arms mine years' pith,
    Till moons wasted, used
    dearest action tented field,
    great world speak,
    pertains feats broil battle;
    grace cause
    speaking myself. Yet, gracious patience,
    round unvarnish'd tale deliver
    love: drugs, charms,
    conjuration, mighty magic-
    proceeding charged withal-
    won daughter.
  BRABANTIO.            maiden bold,
    spirit quiet motion
    Blush'd herself; she- spite nature,
    years, country, credit, everything-
    fall love fear'd on!
    judgement maim'd imperfect,  
    confess perfection err
    rules nature, driven
    find practices cunning hell
    be. vouch again
    mixtures powerful o'er blood,
    dram conjured effect,
    wrought her.
  DUKE.                  vouch proof,
    overt test
    thin habits poor likelihoods
    modern prefer him.
  SENATOR. But, Othello, speak.
    indirect forced courses
    Subdue poison young maid's affections?
    request, fair question
    soul soul affordeth?
  OTHELLO.                     beseech you,
    Send lady Sagittary,
    speak father.
    find foul report,  
    trust, office hold you,
    away, sentence
    fall life.
  DUKE.                     Fetch Desdemona hither.
  OTHELLO. Ancient, conduct them; place.
                                          Exeunt Iago Attendants.
    till come, heaven
    confess vices blood,
    justly grave ears present
    thrive fair lady's love
    mine.
  DUKE. it, Othello.
  OTHELLO. father loved me, oft invited me,
    question'd story life
    year year, battles, sieges, fortunes,
    pass'd.
    ran through, boyish days
    moment bade it:
    spake disastrous chances,
    moving accidents flood field,  
    hair-breadth 'scapes i' imminent deadly breach,
    insolent foe
    sold slavery, redemption thence
    portance travels' history;
    antres vast deserts idle,
    Rough quarries, rocks, hills heads touch heaven,
    hint speak- process-
    Cannibals eat,
    Anthropophagi, men heads
    grow beneath shoulders. hear
    Desdemona incline;
    house affairs draw thence,
    haste dispatch,
    She'ld again, greedy ear
    Devour discourse; observing,
    pliant hour, found good means
    draw prayer earnest heart
    pilgrimage dilate,
    Whereof parcels heard,
    intentively. consent,  
    beguile tears
    speak distressful stroke
    youth suffer'd. story done,
    gave pains world sighs;
    swore, faith, 'twas strange, 'twas passing strange;
    'Twas pitiful, 'twas wondrous pitiful.
    wish'd heard it, wish'd
    heaven made man; thank'd me,
    bade me, friend loved her,
    teach story,
    woo her. hint spake:
    loved dangers pass'd,
    loved pity them.
    witchcraft used.
    lady; witness it.

                Enter Desdemona, Iago, Attendants.

  DUKE. tale win daughter too.
    Good Brabantio,  
    mangled matter best:
    Men broken weapons use
    bare hands.
  BRABANTIO.               pray you, hear speak.
    confess half wooer,
    Destruction head, bad blame
    Light man! hither, gentle mistress.
    perceive noble company
    owe obedience?
  DESDEMONA.                      noble father,
    perceive divided duty.
    bound life education;
    life education learn me
    respect you; lord duty,
    hitherto daughter. husband,
    duty mother show'd
    you, preferring father,
    challenge profess
    Due Moor, lord.
  BRABANTIO.                  God you! done.  
    Grace, state affairs;
    adopt child it.
    hither, Moor.
    give thee heart
    Which, thou hast already, heart
    thee. sake, jewel,
    glad soul child;
    thy escape teach tyranny,
    hang clogs them. done, lord.
  DUKE. speak yourself, lay sentence
    Which, grise step, lovers
    favor.
    remedies past, griefs ended
    worst, late hopes depended.
    mourn mischief past gone
    draw mischief on.
    preserved Fortune takes,
    Patience injury mockery makes.
    robb'd smiles steals thief;
    robs spends bootless grief.  
  BRABANTIO. Turk Cyprus beguile;
    lose long smile.
    bears sentence well, bears
    free comfort hears;
    bears sentence sorrow
    That, pay grief, poor patience borrow.
    sentences, sugar gall,
    strong sides, equivocal.
    words words; hear
    bruised heart pierced ear.
    humbly beseech you, proceed affairs state.
  DUKE. Turk mighty preparation makes Cyprus.
    Othello, fortitude place you; and
    substitute allowed sufficiency,
    opinion, sovereign mistress effects, throws safer
    voice you. content slubber gloss
    fortunes stubborn boisterous
    expedition.
  OTHELLO. tyrant custom, grave senators,
    Hath made flinty steel couch war  
    thrice-driven bed down. agnize
    natural prompt alacrity
    find hardness undertake
    present wars Ottomites.
    humbly bending state,
    crave fit disposition wife,
    Due reference place exhibition,
    accommodation besort
    levels breeding.
  DUKE.                          please,
    Be't father's.
  BRABANTIO.              so.
  OTHELLO. I.
  DESDEMONA.      I. reside
    put father impatient thoughts
    eye. gracious Duke,
    unfolding lend prosperous ear,
    find charter voice
    assist simpleness.
  DUKE. you, Desdemona?  
  DESDEMONA. love Moor live him,
    downright violence storm fortunes
    trumpet world. heart's subdued
    quality lord.
    Othello's visage mind,
    honors valiant parts
    soul fortunes consecrate.
    that, dear lords, left behind,
    moth peace, war,
    rites love bereft me,
    heavy interim support
    dear absence. him.
  OTHELLO. voices.
    Vouch me, heaven, beg not
    palate appetite,
    comply heat- young affects
    defunct- proper satisfaction;
    free bounteous mind.
    heaven defend good souls, think
    great business scant  
    me. No, light-wing'd toys
    feather'd Cupid seel wanton dullness
    speculative officed instruments,
    disports corrupt taint business,
    housewives make skillet helm,
    indign base adversities
    Make head estimation!
  DUKE. privately determine,
    stay going. affair cries haste,
    speed answer't: tonight.
  DESDEMONA. Tonight, lord?
  DUKE.                        night.
  OTHELLO.                                 heart.
  DUKE. i' morning meet again.
    Othello, leave officer behind,
    commission bring you,
    things quality respect
    doth import you.
  OTHELLO.              Grace, ancient;
    man honesty trust.  
    conveyance assign wife,
    needful good Grace think
    me.
  DUKE.                  so.
    Good night everyone. [To Brabantio.] And, noble signior,
    virtue delighted beauty lack,
    son-in-law fair black.
  SENATOR. Adieu, brave Moor, Desdemona well.
  BRABANTIO. her, Moor, thou hast eyes see;
    deceived father, thee.
                                 Exeunt Duke, Senators, Officers.
  OTHELLO. life faith! Honest Iago,
    Desdemona leave thee.
    prithee, thy wife attend her,
    bring advantage.
    Come, Desdemona, hour
    love, worldly matters direction,
    spend thee. obey time.
                                        Exeunt Othello Desdemona.
  RODERIGO. Iago!  
  IAGO. say'st thou, noble heart?
  RODERIGO. do, thinkest thou?
  IAGO. Why, bed sleep.
  RODERIGO. incontinently drown myself.
  IAGO. thou dost, love thee after.
    Why, thou silly gentleman!
  RODERIGO. silliness live live torment, then
    prescription die death physician.
  IAGO. O villainous! looked world times
    years, distinguish betwixt benefit and
    injury, found man knew love himself. Ere I
    drown love guinea hen, I
    change humanity baboon.
  RODERIGO. do? confess shame fond,
    virtue amend it.
  IAGO. Virtue? fig! 'Tis thus.
    bodies gardens, wills gardeners; so
    plant nettles sow lettuce, set hyssop weed
    thyme, supply gender herbs distract with
    many, sterile idleness manured  
    industry, why, power corrigible authority lies in
    wills. balance lives scale of
    reason poise sensuality, blood baseness of
    natures conduct preposterous conclusions.
    reason cool raging motions, carnal stings,
    unbitted lusts; whereof this, call love, to
    sect scion.
  RODERIGO. be.
  IAGO. lust blood permission the
    will. Come, man! Drown thyself? Drown cats blind
    puppies. professed thy friend, confess knit to
    thy deserving cables perdurable toughness; never
    stead thee now. Put money thy purse; follow thou
    wars; defeat thy favor usurped beard. say, put
    money thy purse. Desdemona long
    continue love Moor- put money thy purse- his
    her. violent commencement, thou shalt an
    answerable sequestration- put money thy purse. Moors
    changeable wills- fill thy purse money. The
    food luscious locusts,  
    shortly acerb coloquintida. change youth;
    sated body, find error her
    choice. change, must; put money in
    thy purse. thou wilt damn thyself, delicate
    drowning. Make money thou canst. sanctimony
    frail vow betwixt erring barbarian supersubtle
    Venetian hard wits tribe hell,
    thou shalt enjoy her- make money. pox drowning
    thyself! clean way. Seek thou be
    hanged compassing thy joy drowned without
    her.
  RODERIGO. Wilt thou fast hopes, depend issue?
  IAGO. Thou art me- go, make money. told thee often,
    retell thee again, hate Moor. is
    hearted; thine hath reason. conjunctive our
    revenge him. thou canst cuckold him, thou dost thyself
    pleasure, sport. events womb time
    delivered. Traverse, go, provide thy money. will
    tomorrow. Adieu.
  RODERIGO. meet i' morning?  
  IAGO. lodging.
  RODERIGO. thee betimes.
  IAGO. to, farewell. hear, Roderigo?
  RODERIGO. you?
  IAGO. drowning, hear?
  RODERIGO. changed; sell land.             Exit.
  IAGO. make fool purse;
    mine gain'd knowledge profane
    time expend snipe
    sport profit. hate Moor,
    thought abroad 'twixt sheets
    office. if't true,
    mere suspicion kind
    surety. holds well,
    purpose work him.
    Cassio's proper man. now-
    place, plume will
    double knavery- How, how?- see-
    time, abuse Othello's ear
    familiar wife.  
    hath person smooth dispose
    suspected- framed make women false.
    Moor free open nature,
    thinks men honest so,
    tenderly led nose
    asses are.
    have't. engender'd. Hell night
    bring monstrous birth world's light.
     Exit.

ACT II. SCENE I.
A seaport Cyprus. open place quay.

Enter Montano Gentlemen.

  MONTANO. cape discern sea?
  GENTLEMAN. all. high-wrought flood;
    cannot, 'twixt heaven main,
    Descry sail.
  MONTANO. Methinks wind hath spoke aloud land;
    fuller blast ne'er shook battlements.
    hath ruffian'd sea,
    ribs oak, mountains melt them,
    hold mortise? hear this?
  GENTLEMAN. segregation Turkish fleet.
    stand foaming shore,
    chidden billow pelt clouds;
    wind-shaked surge, high monstrous mane,
    cast water burning bear,
    quench guards ever-fixed pole.
    molestation view
    enchafed flood.  
  MONTANO.                 Turkish fleet
    enshelter'd embay'd, drown'd;
    impossible bear out.

                       Enter Gentleman.

  GENTLEMAN. News, lads! wars done.
    desperate tempest hath bang'd Turks,
    designment halts. noble ship Venice
    Hath grievous wreck sufferance
    part fleet.
  MONTANO. How? true?
  GENTLEMAN.            ship put in,
    Veronesa. Michael Cassio,
    Lieutenant warlike Moor, Othello,
    shore; Moor sea,
    full commission Cyprus.
  MONTANO. glad on't; 'tis worthy governor.
  GENTLEMAN. Cassio, speak comfort
    Touching Turkish loss, sadly  
    prays Moor safe; parted
    foul violent tempest.
  MONTANO.                         Pray heavens be,
    served him, man commands
    full soldier. seaside, ho!
    vessel in
    throw eyes brave Othello,
    till make main aerial blue
    indistinct regard.
  GENTLEMAN. Come, so,
    minute expectancy
    arrivance.

                            Enter Cassio.

  CASSIO. Thanks, valiant warlike isle,
    approve Moor! O, heavens
    Give defense elements,
    lost dangerous sea.
  MONTANO. shipp'd?  
  CASSIO. bark stoutly timber'd, pilot
    expert approved allowance;
    hopes, surfeited death,
    Stand bold cure.
                              cry within, "A sail, sail, sail!"

                      Enter fourth Gentleman.

                        noise?
  FOURTH GENTLEMAN. town empty; brow o' sea
    Stand ranks people, cry, "A sail!"
  CASSIO. hopes shape governor.
                                                          Guns heard.
  GENTLEMAN. discharge shot courtesy-
    friends least.
  CASSIO.                 pray you, sir, forth,
    give truth 'tis arrived.
  GENTLEMAN. shall.                                    Exit.
  MONTANO. But, good lieutenant, general wived?
  CASSIO. fortunately: hath achieved maid  
    paragons description wild fame,
    excels quirks blazoning pens,
    essential vesture creation
    tire ingener.

                      Re-enter Gentleman.

                           now! put in?
  GENTLEMAN. 'Tis Iago, ancient general.
  CASSIO. favorable happy speed:
    Tempests themselves, high seas, howling winds,
    gutter'd rocks, congregated sands,
    Traitors ensteep'd clog guiltless keel,
    sense beauty, omit
    mortal natures, letting safely by
    divine Desdemona.
  MONTANO.                she?
  CASSIO. spake of, great captain's captain,
    Left conduct bold Iago,
    footing anticipates thoughts  
    se'nnight's speed. Great Jove, Othello guard,
    swell sail thine powerful breath,
    bless bay tall ship,
    Make love's quick pants Desdemona's arms,
    Give renew'd fire extincted spirits,
    bring Cyprus comfort.

       Enter Desdemona, Emilia Iago, Roderigo, Attendants.

                                  O, behold,
    riches ship shore!
    Ye men Cyprus, knees.
    Hall thee, lady! grace heaven,
    Before, thee, hand,
    Enwheel thee round!
  DESDEMONA.            you, valiant Cassio.
    tidings lord?
  CASSIO. arrived, aught
    shortly here.
  DESDEMONA. O, fear- lost company?  
  CASSIO. great contention sea skies
    Parted fellowship- But, hark! sail.
                          cry within, "A sail, sail!" Guns heard.
  GENTLEMAN. give greeting citadel;
    likewise friend.
  CASSIO.                      news.
                                                      Exit Gentleman.
    Good ancient, welcome. [To Emilia.] Welcome, mistress.
    gall patience, good Iago,
    extend manners; 'tis breeding
    bold show courtesy.             Kisses her.
  IAGO. Sir, give lips
    tongue oft bestows me,
    You'ld enough.
  DESDEMONA.            Alas, speech.
  IAGO. faith, much;
    find list sleep.
    Marry, ladyship grant,
    puts tongue heart
    chides thinking.  
  EMILIA. so.
  IAGO. on, on. pictures doors,
    Bells parlors, wildcats kitchens,
    Saints injuries, devils offended,
    Players housewifery, housewives beds.
  DESDEMONA. O, fie thee, slanderer!
  IAGO. Nay, true, Turk:
    rise play, bed work.
  EMILIA. write praise.
  IAGO.                                  No, not.
  DESDEMONA. wouldst thou write me, thou shouldst
    praise me?
  IAGO. O gentle lady, put to't,
    critical.
  DESDEMONA. on, assay- harbor?
  IAGO. Ay, madam.
  DESDEMONA. merry, beguile
    thing otherwise.
    Come, wouldst thou praise me?
  IAGO. it, invention  
    pate birdlime frieze;
    plucks brains all. Muse labors,
    deliver'd.
    fair wise, fairness wit,
    one's use, useth it.
  DESDEMONA. praised! black witty?
  IAGO. black, thereto wit,
    find white blackness fit.
  DESDEMONA. Worse worse.
  EMILIA. fair foolish?
  IAGO. foolish fair,
    folly help'd heir.
  DESDEMONA. fond paradoxes make fools laugh i' the
    alehouse. miserable praise hast thou foul and
    foolish?
  IAGO. foul foolish thereunto,
    foul pranks fair wise do.
  DESDEMONA. O heavy ignorance! Thou praisest worst best. what
    praise couldst thou bestow deserving woman indeed, that
    authority merit justly put vouch  
    malice itself?
  IAGO. fair proud,
    tongue loud,
    lack'd gold gay,
    Fled said, "Now may";
    that, anger'd, revenge nigh,
    Bade wrong stay displeasure fly;
    wisdom frail
    change cod's head salmon's tail;
    ne'er disclose mind,
    suitors behind;
    wight, wight were-
  DESDEMONA. what?
  IAGO. suckle fools chronicle small beer.
  DESDEMONA. O lame impotent conclusion! learn him,
    Emilia, thy husband. you, Cassio? not
    profane liberal counselor?
  CASSIO. speaks home, madam. relish the
    soldier scholar.
  IAGO. [Aside.] takes palm; ay, said, whisper.  
    web ensnare great fly as
    Cassio. Ay, smile her, do; gyve thee thine own
    courtship. true; 'tis so, indeed. tricks these
    strip lieutenantry, had
    kissed fingers oft, are
    apt play sir in. good. kissed! excellent
    courtesy! 'tis so, indeed. fingers lips?
    clyster-pipes sake! [Trumpet within.]
    Moor! trumpet.
  CASSIO. 'Tis so.
  DESDEMONA. meet receive him.
  CASSIO. Lo, comes!

                    Enter Othello Attendants.

  OTHELLO. O fair warrior!
  DESDEMONA.                  dear Othello!
  OTHELLO. great content
    me. O soul's joy!
    tempest calms,  
    winds blow till waken'd death!
    laboring bark climb hills seas
    Olympus-high, duck low
    hell's heaven! die,
    'Twere happy; fear
    soul hath content absolute
    comfort this
    Succeeds unknown fate.
  DESDEMONA.                  heavens forbid
    loves comforts increase,
    days grow!
  OTHELLO.                    Amen that, sweet powers!
    speak content;
    stops here; joy.
    this, this, greatest discords          Kisses her.
    e'er hearts make!
  IAGO.                     [Aside.] O, tuned now!
    set pegs make music,
    honest am.
  OTHELLO.             Come, castle.  
    News, friends: wars done, Turks drown'd.
    acquaintance isle?
    Honey, desired Cyprus;
    found great love them. O sweet,
    prattle fashion, dote
    mine comforts. prithee, good Iago,
    bay disembark coffers.
    Bring thou master citadel;
    good one, worthiness
    challenge respect. Come, Desdemona,
    met Cyprus.
                                    Exeunt Iago Roderigo.
  IAGO. thou meet presently harbor. hither. thou
    be'st valiant- base men love a
    nobility natures native them- list me.
    lieutenant tonight watches court guard. First, I
    thee this: Desdemona directly love him.
  RODERIGO. him? Why, 'tis possible.
  IAGO. Lay thy finger thus, thy soul instructed. Mark me
    violence loved Moor, bragging  
    telling fantastical lies. love for
    prating? thy discreet heart it. eye be
    fed; delight devil? When
    blood made dull act sport, be,
    inflame give satiety fresh appetite,
    loveliness favor, sympathy years, manners, beauties-
    Moor defective in. Now, these
    required conveniences, delicate tenderness find itself
    abused, begin heave gorge, disrelish abhor Moor;
    nature instruct compel second
    choice. sir, granted- pregnant and
    unforced position- stands eminently degree this
    fortune Cassio does? knave voluble; further
    conscionable putting mere form civil humane
    seeming, compass salt hidden loose
    affection? Why, none, why, none- slipper subtle knave, a
    finder occasions, eye stamp and
    counterfeit advantages, true advantage present
    itself- devilish knave! Besides, knave handsome, young,
    hath requisites folly green minds  
    after- pestilent complete knave, woman hath found
    already.
  RODERIGO. her; full blest
    condition.
  IAGO. Blest fig's-end! wine drinks made grapes. If
    blest, loved Moor. Blest
    pudding! Didst thou paddle palm hand?
    Didst mark that?
  RODERIGO. Yes, did; courtesy.
  IAGO. Lechery, hand; index obscure prologue the
    history lust foul thoughts. met their
    lips breaths embraced together. Villainous thoughts,
    Roderigo! mutualities marshal way, hard hand
    master main exercise, incorporate conclusion.
    Pish! But, sir, ruled me. brought from
    Venice. Watch tonight; command, lay't you.
    Cassio not. you. find some
    occasion anger Cassio, speaking loud, or
    tainting discipline, please,
    time favorably minister.  
  RODERIGO. Well.
  IAGO. Sir, rash sudden choler, haply may
    strike you. Provoke him, may; that
    Cyprus mutiny, qualification shall
    true taste displanting Cassio.
    shorter journey desires means
    prefer them, impediment most
    profitably removed, expectation
    prosperity.
  RODERIGO. this, bring opportunity.
  IAGO. warrant thee. Meet citadel. must
    fetch necessaries ashore. Farewell.
  RODERIGO. Adieu.                                              Exit.
  IAGO. Cassio loves her, it;
    loves him, 'tis apt great credit.
    Moor, endure not,
    constant, loving, noble nature,
    dare prove Desdemona
    dear husband. Now, love too,
    absolute lust, peradventure  
    stand accountant great sin,
    partly led diet revenge,
    suspect lusty Moor
    Hath leap'd seat; thought whereof
    Doth poisonous mineral gnaw inwards,
    content soul
    Till even'd him, wife wife.
    failing so, put Moor
    jealousy strong
    judgement cure. thing do,
    poor trash Venice, trace
    quick hunting, stand putting on,
    Michael Cassio hip,
    Abuse Moor rank garb
    (For fear Cassio nightcap too),
    Make Moor me, love me, reward me
    making egregiously ass
    practicing peace quiet
    madness. 'Tis here, confused:
    Knavery's plain face till used.               Exit.




SCENE II.
A street.

Enter Herald proclamation; people following.

  HERALD. Othello's pleasure, noble valiant general,
    tidings arrived, importing mere
    perdition Turkish fleet, man put into
    triumph; dance, make bonfires, man what
    sport revels addiction leads him; these
    beneficial news, celebration nuptial. much
    pleasure proclaimed. offices open, and
    full liberty feasting present hour five
    till bell told eleven. Heaven bless isle Cyprus
    noble general Othello!                            Exeunt.




SCENE III.
A hall castle.

Enter Othello, Desdemona, Cassio, Attendants.

  OTHELLO. Good Michael, guard tonight.
    teach honorable stop,
    outsport discretion.
  CASSIO. Iago hath direction do;
    notwithstanding personal eye
    to't.
  OTHELLO.            Iago honest.
    Michael, good night. Tomorrow earliest
    speech you. Come, dear love,
    purchase made, fruits ensue;
    profit's 'tween you.
    Good night.
                           Exeunt Othello, Desdemona, Attendants.

                             Enter Iago.

  CASSIO. Welcome, Iago; watch.  
  IAGO. hour, lieutenant; 'tis ten o' clock. Our
    general cast early love Desdemona; let
    blame. hath made wanton night
    her, sport Jove.
  CASSIO. exquisite lady.
  IAGO. And, warrant her, full game.
  CASSIO. fresh delicate creature.
  IAGO. eye has! Methinks sounds parley to
    provocation.
  CASSIO. inviting eye; methinks modest.
  IAGO. speaks, alarum love?
  CASSIO. perfection.
  IAGO. Well, happiness sheets! Come, lieutenant, a
    stope wine, brace Cyprus gallants
    fain measure health black Othello.
  CASSIO. tonight, good Iago. poor unhappy brains
    drinking. courtesy invent other
    custom entertainment.
  IAGO. O, friends! cup; drink you.
  CASSIO. drunk cup tonight, craftily  
    qualified too, behold innovation makes here. am
    unfortunate infirmity, dare task weakness with
    more.
  IAGO. What, man! 'Tis night revels, gallants desire it.
  CASSIO. they?
  IAGO. door; pray you, call in.
  CASSIO. do't, dislikes me.                        Exit.
  IAGO. fasten cup him,
    hath drunk tonight already,
    full quarrel offense
    young mistress' dog. sick fool Roderigo,
    love hath turn'd wrong side out,
    Desdemona hath tonight caroused
    Potations pottle-deep; watch.
    lads Cyprus, noble swelling spirits,
    hold honors wary distance,
    elements warlike isle,
    tonight fluster'd flowing cups,
    watch too. Now, 'mongst flock drunkards,
    put Cassio action  
    offend isle. come.
    consequence approve dream,
    boat sails freely, wind stream.

           Re-enter Cassio; Montano Gentlemen;
                    Servants wine.

  CASSIO. 'Fore God, rouse already.
  MONTANO. Good faith, one; past pint, a
    soldier.
  IAGO. wine, ho!

    [Sings.]   "And canakin clink, clink;
               canakin clink.
                 soldier's man;
                 O, man's life's span;
               soldier drink."

    wine, boys!
  CASSIO. 'Fore God, excellent song.  
  IAGO. learned England, potent in
    potting. Dane, German, swag-bellied Hollander-
    Drink, ho!- English.
  CASSIO. Englishman expert drinking?
  IAGO. Why, drinks facility Dane dead drunk; he
    sweats overthrow Almain; Hollander a
    vomit ere pottle filled.
  CASSIO. health general!
  MONTANO. it, lieutenant, justice.
  IAGO. O sweet England!

    [Sings.]   "King Stephen and-a worthy peer,
                 breeches cost crown;
               held sixpence dear,
                 call'd tailor lown.

               "He wight high renown,
                 thou art low degree.
               'Tis pride pulls country down;
                 thine auld cloak thee."  

    wine, ho!
  CASSIO. Why, exquisite song other.
  IAGO. hear't again?
  CASSIO. No, hold unworthy place does
    things. Well, God's all, souls be
    saved, souls saved.
  IAGO. true, good lieutenant.
  CASSIO. mine part- offense general, man
    quality- hope saved.
  IAGO. too, lieutenant.
  CASSIO. Ay, but, leave, me; lieutenant to
    saved ancient. this; to
    affairs. God forgive sins! Gentlemen, to
    business. think, gentlemen, drunk: my
    ancient, hand, left. not
    drunk now; stand enough, speak enough.
  ALL. Excellent well.
  CASSIO. Why, then; am
    drunk.                                                      Exit.  
  MONTANO. platform, masters; come, set watch.
  IAGO. fellow before;
    soldier fit stand Caesar
    give direction. vice;
    'Tis virtue equinox,
    long other. 'Tis pity him.
    fear trust Othello puts in
    odd time infirmity
    shake island.
  MONTANO.                  thus?
  IAGO. 'Tis evermore prologue sleep.
    watch horologe double set,
    drink rock cradle.
  MONTANO.                        well
    general put mind it.
    sees not, good nature
    Prizes virtue appears Cassio
    evils. true?

                           Enter Roderigo.  

  IAGO. [Aside him.] now, Roderigo!
    pray you, lieutenant; go.              Exit Roderigo.
  MONTANO. 'tis great pity noble Moor
    hazard place second
    ingraft infirmity.
    honest action say
    Moor.
  IAGO.             I, fair island.
    love Cassio well, much
    cure evil- But, hark! noise?
                                          cry within, "Help, help!"

                Re-enter Cassio, driving Roderigo.

  CASSIO. 'Zounds! rogue! rascal!
  MONTANO. matter, lieutenant?
  CASSIO. knave teach duty! beat knave a
    twiggen bottle.
  RODERIGO. Beat me!  
  CASSIO. Dost thou prate, rogue?                   Strikes Roderigo.
  MONTANO. Nay, good lieutenant; pray you, sir, hold hand.
  CASSIO. go, sir, knock o'er mazzard.
  MONTANO. Come, come, drunk.
  CASSIO. Drunk?                                          fight.
  IAGO. [Aside Roderigo.] Away, say; cry mutiny.
                                                       Exit Roderigo.
    Nay, good lieutenant! God's will, gentlemen!
    Help, ho!- Lieutenant- sir- Montano- sir-
    Help, masters!- goodly watch indeed!
                                                        bell rings.
    rings bell?- Diablo, ho!
    town rise. God's will, lieutenant, hold!
    shamed forever.

                   Re-enter Othello Attendants.

  OTHELLO.                      matter here?
  MONTANO. 'Zounds, bleed still; hurt death.
   Faints.  
  OTHELLO. Hold, lives!
  IAGO. Hold, ho! Lieutenant- sir- Montano- gentlemen-
    forgot place sense duty?
    Hold! general speaks you! Hold, hold, shame!
  OTHELLO. Why, now, ho! ariseth this?
    turn'd Turks, that
    heaven hath forbid Ottomites?
    Christian shame, put barbarous brawl.
    stirs carve rage
    Holds soul light; dies motion.
    Silence dreadful bell; frights isle
    propriety. matter, masters?
    Honest Iago, look'st dead grieving,
    Speak: began this? thy love, charge thee.
  IAGO. know. Friends now, now,
    quarter, terms bride groom
    Devesting bed; then, now
    (As planet unwitted men),
    Swords out, tilting other's breast,
    opposition bloody. speak  
    beginning peevish odds;
    action glorious lost
    legs brought part it!
  OTHELLO. it, Michael, forgot?
  CASSIO. pray you, pardon me; speak.
  OTHELLO. Worthy Montano, wont civil;
    gravity stillness youth
    world hath noted, great
    mouths wisest censure. matter,
    unlace reputation thus,
    spend rich opinion name
    night-brawler? Give answer it.
  MONTANO. Worthy Othello, hurt danger.
    officer, Iago, inform you-
    spare speech, offends me-
    know. aught
    amiss night,
    self-charity vice,
    defend sin
    violence assails us.  
  OTHELLO.                    Now, heaven,
    blood begins safer guides rule,
    passion, judgement collied,
    Assays lead way. stir,
    lift arm, you
    sink rebuke. Give know
    foul rout began, set on,
    approved offense,
    twinn'd me, birth,
    lose me. What! town war,
    wild, people's hearts brimful fear,
    manage private domestic quarrel,
    night, court guard safety!
    'Tis monstrous. Iago, began't?
  MONTANO. partially affined, leagued office,
    Thou dost deliver truth,
    Thou art soldier.
  IAGO.                  Touch near:
    tongue cut mouth
    offense Michael Cassio;  
    Yet, persuade myself, speak truth
    wrong him. is, general.
    Montano speech,
    fellow crying help,
    Cassio determined sword,
    execute him. Sir, gentleman
    Steps Cassio entreats pause.
    crying fellow pursue,
    clamor- fell out-
    town fall fright. He, swift foot,
    Outran purpose; return'd rather
    heard clink fall swords,
    Cassio high oath, till tonight
    ne'er before. back-
    brief- found close together,
    blow thrust, were
    part them.
    matter report.
    men men; forget.
    Cassio wrong him,  
    men rage strike best,
    surely Cassio, believe, received
    fled strange indignity,
    patience pass.
  OTHELLO.                         know, Iago,
    Thy honesty love doth mince matter,
    Making light Cassio. Cassio, love thee,
    officer mine.

                    Re-enter Desdemona, attended.

    Look, gentle love raised up!
    make thee example.
  DESDEMONA.                   matter?
  OTHELLO. All's now, sweeting; bed.
    Sir, hurts, surgeon.
    Lead off.                             Exit Montano, attended.
    Iago, care town,
    silence vile brawl distracted.
    Come, Desdemona, 'tis soldiers' life.  
    balmy slumbers waked strife.
                                      Exeunt Iago Cassio.
  IAGO. What, hurt, lieutenant?
  CASSIO. Ay, past surgery.
  IAGO. Marry, heaven forbid!
  CASSIO. Reputation, reputation, reputation! O, lost my
    reputation! lost immortal part myself, what
    remains bestial. reputation, Iago, reputation!
  IAGO. honest man, thought received bodily
    wound; sense reputation. Reputation
    idle false imposition; oft merit and
    lost deserving. lost reputation all,
    repute loser. What, man! are
    ways recover general again. cast his
    mood, punishment policy malice; one
    beat offenseless dog affright imperious lion. Sue
    again, yours.
  CASSIO. sue despised deceive good a
    commander slight, drunken, indiscreet an
    officer. Drunk? speak parrot? squabble? swagger? swear?  
    discourse fustian one's shadow? O thou invisible
    spirit wine, thou hast by, call
    thee devil!
  IAGO. sword?
    you?
  CASSIO. not.
  IAGO. Is't possible?
  CASSIO. remember mass things, distinctly; a
    quarrel, wherefore. O God, men put an
    enemy mouths steal brains! should,
    joy, pleasance, revel, applause, transform ourselves
    beasts!
  IAGO. Why, enough. thus
     recovered?
  CASSIO. hath pleased devil drunkenness give place the
    devil wrath: unperfectness shows another, make me
    frankly despise myself.
  IAGO. Come, severe moraler. time, place,
    condition country stands, heartily wish
    befallen; is, mend  
    good.
  CASSIO. place again; a
    drunkard! mouths Hydra, answer would
    stop all. man, fool, and
    presently beast! O strange! inordinate cup unblest,
    ingredient devil.
  IAGO. Come, come, good wine good familiar creature, be
    used. Exclaim it. And, good lieutenant, I
    love you.
  CASSIO. approved it, sir. drunk!
  IAGO. man living drunk time, man. I'll
    do. general's wife the
    general. respect, hath devoted
    contemplation, mark, denotement
    parts graces. Confess freely her;
    importune put place again. so
    free, kind, apt, blessed disposition, holds a
    vice goodness requested. This
    broken joint husband entreat splinter;
    and, fortunes lay worth naming, crack  
    love grow stronger before.
  CASSIO. advise well.
  IAGO. protest, sincerity love honest kindness.
  CASSIO. freely; betimes morning beseech
    virtuous Desdemona undertake me. desperate my
    fortunes check here.
  IAGO. right. Good night, lieutenant, the
    watch.
  CASSIO. Good night, honest Iago.                              Exit.
  IAGO. play villain?
    advice free give honest,
    Probal thinking, course
    win Moor again? 'tis easy
    inclining Desdemona subdue
    honest suit. framed fruitful
    free elements. her
    win Moor, were't renounce baptism,
    seals symbols redeemed sin,
    soul enfetter'd love,
    make, unmake, list,  
    appetite play god
    weak function. villain
    counsel Cassio parallel course,
    Directly good? Divinity hell!
    devils blackest sins put on,
    suggest heavenly shows,
    now. whiles honest fool
    Plies Desdemona repair fortune,
    pleads strongly Moor,
    pour pestilence ear,
    repeals body's lust;
    strives good,
    undo credit Moor.
    turn virtue pitch,
    goodness make net
    enmesh all.

                           Enter Roderigo.

                                now, Roderigo!  
  RODERIGO. follow chase, hound that
    hunts, fills cry. money spent; I
    tonight exceedingly cudgeled; the
    issue be, experience pains; and
    so, money wit, return to
    Venice.
  IAGO. poor patience!
    wound heal degrees?
    Thou know'st work wit witchcraft,
    wit depends dilatory time.
    Does't well? Cassio hath beaten thee,
    thou small hurt hast cashier'd Cassio.
    things grow fair sun,
    fruits blossom ripe.
    Content thyself awhile. mass, 'tis morning;
    Pleasure action make hours short.
    Retire thee; thou art billeted.
    Away, say. Thou shalt hereafter.
    Nay, thee gone. [Exit Roderigo.] things done:
    wife move Cassio mistress-  
    set on;
    draw Moor apart,
    bring jump Cassio find
    Soliciting wife. Ay, way;
    Dull device coldness delay.                      Exit.
