ACT III. SCENE I.
Before castle.

Enter Cassio Musicians.

  CASSIO. Masters, play here, content pains; Something
    brief; bid "Good morrow, general."
    Music.

                             Enter Clown.

  CLOWN. Why, masters, instruments Naples, that
    speak i' nose thus?
  MUSICIAN. How, sir, how?
  CLOWN. these, pray you, wind instruments?
  MUSICIAN. Ay, marry, they, sir.
  CLOWN. O, hangs tail.
  MUSICIAN. hangs tale, sir?
  CLOWN. Marry, sir, wind instrument know. But,
    masters, money you; general likes your
    music, desires you, love's sake, make more
    noise it.  
  MUSICIAN. Well, sir, not.
  CLOWN. music heard, to't again;
    but, say, hear music general greatly
    care.
  MUSICIAN. such, sir.
  CLOWN. put pipes bag, away.
    Go, vanish air, away!                      Exeunt Musicians.
  CASSIO. Dost thou hear, honest friend?
  CLOWN. No, hear honest friend; hear you.
  CASSIO. Prithee, thy quillets. poor piece gold
    thee. gentlewoman attends general's wife be
    stirring, Cassio entreats favor
    speech. Wilt thou this?
  CLOWN. stirring, sir. stir hither, seem
    notify her.
  CASSIO. Do, good friend.                             Exit Clown.

                             Enter Iago.

                              happy time, Iago.  
  IAGO. abed, then?
  CASSIO. Why, no; day broke
    parted. made bold, Iago,
    send wife. suit her
    virtuous Desdemona
    Procure access.
  IAGO.                     send presently;
    devise draw Moor
    way, converse business
    free.
  CASSIO. humbly for't. [Exit Iago.] knew
    Florentine kind honest.

                            Enter Emilia.

  EMILIA. Good morrow, good lieutenant. sorry
    displeasure, well.
    general wife talking it,
    speaks stoutly. Moor replies
    hurt great fame Cyprus  
    great affinity wholesome wisdom
    refuse you; protests loves you
    suitor likings
    safest occasion front
    bring again.
  CASSIO.                  Yet, beseech you,
    fit, done,
    Give advantage discourse
    Desdemona alone.
  EMILIA.                 Pray you, in.
    bestow time
    speak bosom freely.
  CASSIO.                       bound you.
   Exeunt.




SCENE II.
A room castle.

Enter Othello, Iago, Gentlemen.

  OTHELLO. letters give, Iago, pilot,
    duties Senate.
    done, walking works;
    Repair me.
  IAGO.                 Well, good lord, do't.
  OTHELLO. fortification, gentlemen, see't?
  GENTLEMEN. wait lordship.                   Exeunt.




SCENE III.
The garden castle.

Enter Desdemona, Cassio, Emilia.

  DESDEMONA. thou assured, good Cassio, do
    abilities thy behalf.
  EMILIA. Good madam, do. warrant grieves husband
    his.
  DESDEMONA. O, honest fellow. doubt, Cassio,
    lord again
    friendly were.
  CASSIO.                    Bounteous madam,
    Michael Cassio,
    true servant.
  DESDEMONA. know't: you. love lord:
    long; assured
    strangeness stand farther off
    politic distance.
  CASSIO.                       Ay, but, lady,
    policy long,
    feed nice waterish diet,  
    breed circumstances,
    absent place supplied,
    general forget love service.
  DESDEMONA. doubt that. Emilia here
    give thee warrant thy place, assure thee,
    vow friendship, perform it
    article. lord rest;
    watch tame talk patience;
    bed school, board shrift;
    intermingle does
    Cassio's suit. merry, Cassio,
    thy solicitor die
    give thy away.

                Enter Othello Iago, distance.

  EMILIA. Madam, lord.
  CASSIO. Madam, leave.
  DESDEMONA. Nay, stay hear speak.
  CASSIO. Madam, now. ill ease,  
    Unfit mine purposes.
  DESDEMONA. Well, discretion.                   Exit Cassio.
  IAGO. Ha! that.
  OTHELLO. dost thou say?
  IAGO. Nothing, lord; if- what.
  OTHELLO. Cassio parted wife?
  IAGO. Cassio, lord! No, sure, it,
    steal guilty-like,
    coming.
  OTHELLO.             'twas he.
  DESDEMONA. now, lord!
    talking suitor here,
    man languishes displeasure.
  OTHELLO. is't mean?
  DESDEMONA. Why, lieutenant, Cassio. Good lord,
    grace power move you,
    present reconciliation take;
    loves you,
    errs ignorance cunning,
    judgement honest face.  
    prithee, call back.
  OTHELLO.                    now?
  DESDEMONA. Ay, sooth; humbled
    hath left part grief me
    suffer him. Good love, call back.
  OTHELLO. now, sweet Desdemona; time.
  DESDEMONA. shall't shortly?
  OTHELLO.                           sooner, sweet, you.
  DESDEMONA. Shall't tonight supper?
  OTHELLO.                                 No, tonight.
  DESDEMONA. Tomorrow dinner then?
  OTHELLO.                         dine home;
    meet captains citadel.
  DESDEMONA. tomorrow night, Tuesday morn,
    Tuesday noon, night, Wednesday morn.
    prithee, time, not
    Exceed days. faith, penitent;
    trespass, common reason-
    Save that, say, wars make example
    best- fault  
    incur private check. come?
    me, Othello. soul,
    me, deny,
    stand mammering on. What? Michael Cassio,
    awooing you, time
    spoke dispraisingly
    Hath ta'en part- do
    bring in! Trust me, much-
  OTHELLO. Prithee, more. will;
    deny thee nothing.
  DESDEMONA.                  Why, boon;
    'Tis entreat wear gloves,
    feed nourishing dishes, warm,
    sue peculiar profit
    person. Nay, suit
    touch love indeed,
    full poise difficult weight,
    fearful granted.
  OTHELLO.                     deny thee nothing,
    Whereon, beseech thee, grant this,  
    leave myself.
  DESDEMONA. deny you? No. Farewell, lord.
  OTHELLO. Farewell, Desdemona; thee straight.
  DESDEMONA. Emilia, come. fancies teach you;
    Whate'er be, obedient.
                                         Exeunt Desdemona Emilia.
  OTHELLO. Excellent wretch! Perdition catch soul,
    love thee! love thee not,
    Chaos again.
  IAGO. noble lord-
  OTHELLO.             dost thou say, Iago?
  IAGO. Michael Cassio, woo'd lady,
    love?
  OTHELLO. did, last. dost thou ask?
  IAGO. satisfaction thought;
    harm.
  OTHELLO.           thy thought, Iago?
  IAGO. acquainted her.
  OTHELLO. O, yes, oft.
  IAGO. Indeed!  
  OTHELLO. Indeed? ay, indeed. Discern'st thou aught that?
    honest?
  IAGO. Honest, lord?
  OTHELLO. Honest? Ay, honest.
  IAGO. lord, aught know.
  OTHELLO. dost thou think?
  IAGO. Think, lord?
  OTHELLO. Think, lord? heaven, echoes me,
    monster thought
    hideous shown. Thou dost something.
    heard thee now, thou like'st that,
    Cassio left wife. didst like?
    told thee counsel
    wooing, thou criedst, "Indeed!"
    didst contract purse thy brow together,
    thou hadst shut thy brain
    horrible conceit. thou dost love me,
    Show thy thought.
  IAGO. lord, love you.
  OTHELLO.                            thou dost;  
    thou'rt full love honesty
    weigh'st thy words thou givest breath,
    stops thine fright more;
    things false disloyal knave
    tricks custom; man just
    close dilations, working heart,
    passion rule.
  IAGO.                       Michael Cassio,
    dare sworn honest.
  OTHELLO. too.
  IAGO.                    Men seem;
    not, none!
  OTHELLO. Certain, men seem.
  IAGO. Cassio's honest man.
  OTHELLO. Nay, this.
    prithee, speak thy thinkings,
    thou dost ruminate, give thy worst thoughts
    worst words.
  IAGO.                 Good lord, pardon me;
    bound act duty,  
    bound slaves free to.
    Utter thoughts? Why, vile false;
    palace whereinto foul things
    intrude not? breast pure,
    uncleanly apprehensions
    leets law-days, session sit
    meditations lawful?
  OTHELLO. Thou dost conspire thy friend, Iago,
    thou think'st wrong'd makest ear
    stranger thy thoughts.
  IAGO.                         beseech you-
    perchance vicious guess,
    As, confess, nature's plague
    spy abuses, oft jealousy
    Shapes faults not- wisdom yet,
    imperfectly conceits,
    notice, build trouble
    scattering unsure observance.
    quiet good,
    manhood, honesty, wisdom,  
    thoughts.
  OTHELLO.                       dost thou mean?
  IAGO. Good man woman, dear lord,
    jewel souls.
    steals purse steals trash; 'tis something, nothing;
    'Twas mine, 'tis his, slave thousands;
    filches good name
    Robs enriches him
    makes poor indeed.
  OTHELLO. heaven, thy thoughts.
  IAGO. cannot, heart hand;
    not, whilst 'tis custody.
  OTHELLO. Ha!
  IAGO.        O, beware, lord, jealousy!
    green-eyed monster, doth mock
    meat feeds on. cuckold lives bliss
    Who, fate, loves wronger;
    O, damned minutes tells o'er
    dotes, doubts, suspects, strongly loves!
  OTHELLO. O misery!  
  IAGO. Poor content rich, rich enough;
    riches fineless poor winter
    fears poor.
    Good heaven, souls tribe defend
    jealousy!
  OTHELLO.         Why, this?
    Think'st thou I'ld make life jealousy,
    follow moon
    fresh suspicions? No! doubt
    resolved. Exchange goat
    turn business soul
    exsufflicate blown surmises,
    Matching thy inference. 'Tis make jealous
    wife fair, feeds well, loves company,
    free speech, sings, plays, dances well;
    virtue is, virtuous.
    mine weak merits draw
    smallest fear doubt revolt;
    eyes chose me. No, Iago,
    doubt; doubt, prove;  
    proof, this-
    love jealousy!
  IAGO. glad it, reason
    show love duty bear you
    franker spirit. Therefore, bound,
    Receive me. speak proof.
    wife; observe Cassio;
    Wear eye thus, jealous secure.
    free noble nature
    self-bounty abused. to't.
    country disposition well;
    Venice heaven pranks
    dare show husbands; conscience
    leave't undone, keep't unknown.
  OTHELLO. Dost thou so?
  IAGO. deceive father, marrying you;
    seem'd shake fear looks,
    loved most.
  OTHELLO.               did.
  IAGO.                                  Why, then.  
    young give seeming,
    seel father's eyes close oak-
    thought 'twas witchcraft- blame;
    humbly beseech pardon
    loving you.
  OTHELLO.                   bound thee forever.
  IAGO. hath dash'd spirits.
  OTHELLO. jot, jot.
  IAGO.                          I'faith, fear has.
    hope spoke
    love. moved;
    pray strain speech
    grosser issues larger reach
    suspicion.
  OTHELLO. not.
  IAGO.                so, lord,
    speech fall vile success
    thoughts aim at. Cassio's worthy friend-
    lord, moved.
  OTHELLO.                       No, moved.  
    Desdemona's honest.
  IAGO. Long live so! long live so!
  OTHELLO. yet, nature erring itself-
  IAGO. Ay, point, as- bold you-
    affect proposed matches
    clime, complexion, degree,
    Whereto things nature tends-
    Foh, smell rank,
    Foul disproportion, thoughts unnatural.
    pardon me. position
    Distinctly speak her; fear,
    will, recoiling judgement,
    fall match country forms,
    happily repent.
  OTHELLO.              Farewell, farewell.
    thou dost perceive, more;
    Set thy wife observe. Leave me, Iago.
  IAGO. [Going.] lord, leave.
  OTHELLO. marry? honest creature doubtless
    Sees more, more, unfolds.  
  IAGO. [Returning.] lord, entreat honor
    scan thing further; leave time.
    fit Cassio place,
    fills great ability,
    Yet, hold awhile,
    perceive means.
    Note lady strain entertainment
    strong vehement importunity;
    that. meantime,
    thought busy fears-
    worthy fear am-
    hold free, beseech honor.
  OTHELLO. Fear government.
  IAGO. leave.                              Exit.
  OTHELLO. fellow's exceeding honesty,
    qualities, learned spirit,
    human dealings. prove haggard,
    jesses dear heartstrings,
    I'ld whistle wind
    prey fortune. Haply, black  
    soft parts conversation
    chamberers have, declined
    vale years- much-
    gone. abused, relief
    loathe her. O curse marriage,
    call delicate creatures ours,
    appetites! toad,
    live vapor dungeon,
    corner thing love
    others' uses. Yet, 'tis plague great ones:
    Prerogatived base;
    'Tis destiny unshunnable, death.
    forked plague fated us
    quicken. Desdemona comes:

                    Re-enter Desdemona Emilia.

    false, O, heaven mocks itself!
    believe't.
  DESDEMONA.            now, dear Othello!  
    dinner, generous islanders
    invited, attend presence.
  OTHELLO. blame.
  DESDEMONA.              speak faintly?
    well?
  OTHELLO. pain forehead here.
  DESDEMONA. Faith, watching; 'twill again.
    bind hard, hour
    well.
  OTHELLO.           napkin little;
            puts handkerchief him, drops it.
    alone. Come, you.
  DESDEMONA. well.
                                        Exeunt Othello Desdemona.
  EMILIA. glad found napkin;
    remembrance Moor.
    wayward husband hath hundred times
    Woo'd steal it; loves token,
    conjured it,
    reserves evermore  
    kiss talk to. work ta'en out,
    give't Iago. it
    Heaven knows, I;
    fantasy.

                            Re-enter Iago.

  IAGO. now, alone?
  EMILIA. chide; thing you.
  IAGO. thing me? common thing-
  EMILIA. Ha!
  IAGO. foolish wife.
  EMILIA. O, all? give now
    handkerchief?
  IAGO.                         handkerchief?
  EMILIA. handkerchief?
    Why, Moor gave Desdemona,
    bid steal.
  IAGO. Hast stol'n her?
  EMILIA. No, faith; drop negligence,  
    And, advantage, took't up.
    Look, is.
  IAGO.               good wench; give me.
  EMILIA. with't, earnest
    filch it?
  IAGO. [Snatching it.] Why, you?
  EMILIA. If't purpose import,
    Give't again. Poor lady, run mad
    lack it.
  IAGO. acknown on't; it.
    Go, leave me.                                        Exit Emilia.
    Cassio's lodging lose napkin,
    find it. Trifles light air
    jealous confirmations strong
    proofs holy writ; something.
    Moor poison:
    Dangerous conceits natures poisons,
    scarce found distaste,
    act blood
    Burn mines sulphur. so.  
    Look, comes!

                          Re-enter Othello.

                          poppy, mandragora,
    drowsy syrups world,
    medicine thee sweet sleep
    thou owedst yesterday.
  OTHELLO.                       Ha, ha, false me?
  IAGO. Why, now, general! that.
  OTHELLO. Avaunt! gone! Thou hast set rack.
    swear 'tis abused
    know't little.
  IAGO.                          now, lord?
  OTHELLO. sense stol'n hours lust?
    saw't not, thought not, harm'd me;
    slept night well, free merry;
    found Cassio's kisses lips.
    robb'd, wanting stol'n,
    know't robb'd all.  
  IAGO. hear this.
  OTHELLO. happy general camp,
    Pioners all, tasted sweet body,
    known. O, forever
    Farewell tranquil mind! Farewell content!
    Farewell plumed troop big wars
    make ambition virtue! O, farewell,
    Farewell neighing steed shrill trump,
    spirit-stirring drum, ear-piercing fife,
    royal banner, quality,
    Pride, pomp, circumstance glorious war!
    O mortal engines, rude throats
    immortal Jove's dread clamors counterfeit,
    Farewell! Othello's occupation's gone!
  IAGO. Is't possible, lord?
  OTHELLO. Villain, thou prove love whore;
    it. Give ocular proof;
    Or, worth man's eternal soul,
    Thou hadst born dog
    answer waked wrath!  
  IAGO.                         Is't this?
  OTHELLO. Make see't; prove it,
    probation bear hinge loop
    hang doubt on; woe thy life!
  IAGO. noble lord-
  OTHELLO. thou dost slander torture me,
    pray more; abandon remorse;
    horror's head horrors accumulate;
    deeds make heaven weep, earth amazed;
    canst thou damnation add
    Greater that.
  IAGO.                O grace! O heaven defend me!
    man? soul sense?
    God wi' you; mine office. O wretched fool,
    livest make thine honesty vice!
    O monstrous world! note, note, O world,
    direct honest safe.
    profit, hence
    love friend sith love breeds offense.
  OTHELLO. Nay, stay; thou shouldst honest.  
  IAGO. wise; honesty's fool,
    loses works for.
  OTHELLO.                       world,
    wife honest, not;
    thou art just, thou art not.
    proof. name, fresh
    Dian's visage, begrimed black
    mine face. cords knives,
    Poison fire, suffocating streams,
    endure it. satisfied!
  IAGO. see, sir, eaten passion;
    repent put you.
    satisfied?
  OTHELLO.                  Would? Nay, will.
  IAGO. may. But, how? satisfied, lord?
    you, supervisor, grossly gape on?
    Behold topp'd?
  OTHELLO.             Death damnation! O!
  IAGO. tedious difficulty, think,
    bring prospect. Damn then,  
    mortal eyes bolster
    own! then? then?
    say? satisfaction?
    impossible this
    prime goats, hot monkeys,
    salt wolves pride, fools gross
    ignorance made drunk. yet, say,
    imputation strong circumstances,
    lead directly door truth,
    give satisfaction, have't.
  OTHELLO. Give living reason disloyal.
  IAGO. office;
    sith enter'd far,
    Prick'd to't foolish honesty love,
    on. lay Cassio lately
    And, troubled raging tooth,
    sleep.
    kind men loose soul,
    sleeps mutter affairs;
    kind Cassio.  
    sleep heard say, "Sweet Desdemona,
    wary, hide loves";
    then, sir, gripe wring hand,
    Cry, "O sweet creature!" kiss hard,
    pluck'd kisses roots,
    grew lips; laid leg
    thigh, sigh'd kiss'd; then
    Cried, "Cursed fate gave thee Moor!"
  OTHELLO. O monstrous! monstrous!
  IAGO.                            Nay, dream.
  OTHELLO. denoted foregone conclusion.
    'Tis shrewd doubt, dream.
  IAGO. thicken proofs
    demonstrate thinly.
  OTHELLO.                      tear pieces.
  IAGO. Nay, wise; done;
    honest yet. this;
    handkerchief
    Spotted strawberries wife's hand?
  OTHELLO. gave one; 'twas gift.  
  IAGO. that; handkerchief-
    wife's- today
    Cassio wipe beard with.
  OTHELLO.                          that-
  IAGO. that, hers,
    speaks proofs.
  OTHELLO. O, slave forty thousand lives!
    poor, weak revenge.
    'tis true. here, Iago,
    fond love blow heaven.
    'Tis gone.
    Arise, black vengeance, thy hollow hell!
    Yield up, O love, thy crown hearted throne
    tyrannous hate! Swell, bosom, thy fraught,
    'tis aspics' tongues!
  IAGO.                          content.
  OTHELLO. O, blood, blood, blood!
  IAGO. Patience, say; mind change.
  OTHELLO. Never, Iago. Pontic Sea,
    icy current compulsive  
    Ne'er feels retiring ebb, due on
    Propontic Hellespont,
    bloody thoughts, violent pace,
    ne'er back, ne'er ebb humble love,
    Till capable wide revenge
    Swallow up. Now, yond marble heaven,
    due reverence sacred vow                      Kneels.
    engage words.
  IAGO.                     rise yet.                  Kneels.
    Witness, ever-burning lights above,
    elements clip round about,
    Witness Iago doth give up
    execution wit, hands, heart,
    wrong'd Othello's service! command,
    obey remorse,
    bloody business ever.                             rise.
  OTHELLO.                     greet thy love,
    vain thanks, acceptance bounteous,
    instant put thee to't:
    days hear thee  
    Cassio's alive.
  IAGO. friend dead, 'tis request;
    live.
  OTHELLO.            Damn her, lewd minx! O, damn her!
    Come, apart; withdraw,
    furnish swift means death
    fair devil. art thou lieutenant.
  IAGO. forever.                                Exeunt.




SCENE IV.
Before castle.

Enter Desdemona, Emilia, Clown.

  DESDEMONA. know, sirrah, Lieutenant Cassio lies?
  CLOWN. dare lies anywhere.
  DESDEMONA. Why, man?
  CLOWN. soldier; soldier lies, is
    stabbing.
  DESDEMONA. to! lodges he?
  CLOWN. lodges, lie.
  DESDEMONA. made this?
  CLOWN. lodges, devise lodging,
    lies lies there, lie mine own
    throat.
  DESDEMONA. inquire edified report?
  CLOWN. catechize world him; is, make questions
    answer.
  DESDEMONA. Seek him, bid hither. moved my
    lord behalf hope well.
  CLOWN. compass man's wit,  
    attempt it.                                Exit.
  DESDEMONA. lose handkerchief, Emilia?
  EMILIA. not, madam.
  DESDEMONA. me, lost purse
    Full crusadoes; and, noble Moor
    true mind made baseness
    jealous creatures are, enough
    put ill thinking.
  EMILIA.                       jealous?
  DESDEMONA. Who, he? sun born
    Drew humors him.
  EMILIA.                          Look, comes.
  DESDEMONA. leave till Cassio
    call'd him.

                            Enter Othello.

                      is't you, lord?
  OTHELLO. Well, good lady. [Aside.] O, hardness dissemble!
    you, Desdemona?  
  DESDEMONA.               Well, good lord.
  OTHELLO. Give hand. hand moist, lady.
  DESDEMONA. felt age sorrow.
  OTHELLO. argues fruitfulness liberal heart;
    Hot, hot, moist. hand requires
    sequester liberty, fasting, prayer,
    castigation, exercise devout,
    young sweating devil here
    commonly rebels. 'Tis good hand,
    frank one.
  DESDEMONA. may, indeed, so;
    'twas hand gave heart.
  OTHELLO. liberal hand. hearts gave hands;
    heraldry hands, hearts.
  DESDEMONA. speak this. now, promise.
  OTHELLO. promise, chuck?
  DESDEMONA. bid Cassio speak you.
  OTHELLO. salt rheum offends me;
    Lend thy handkerchief.
  DESDEMONA. Here, lord.  
  OTHELLO. gave you.
  DESDEMONA. me.
  OTHELLO. Not?
  DESDEMONA. No, faith, lord.
  OTHELLO. fault. handkerchief
    Egyptian mother give;
    charmer, read
    thoughts people. told her, it,
    'Twould make amiable subdue father
    love, lost it
    made gift it, father's eye
    hold loathed spirits hunt
    fancies. dying gave me,
    bid me, fate wive,
    give her. so, heed on't;
    Make darling precious eye;
    lose't give't perdition
    match.
  DESDEMONA.                     Is't possible?
  OTHELLO. 'Tis true; magic web it.  
    sibyl, number'd world
    sun hundred compasses,
    prophetic fury sew'd work;
    worms hallow'd breed silk,
    dyed mummy skillful
    Conserved maiden's hearts.
  DESDEMONA.                      Indeed! is't true?
  OTHELLO. veritable; to't well.
  DESDEMONA. God seen't!
  OTHELLO. Ha! wherefore?
  DESDEMONA. speak startingly rash?
  OTHELLO. Is't lost? is't gone? speak, o' way?
  DESDEMONA. Heaven bless us!
  OTHELLO. you?
  DESDEMONA. lost; were?
  OTHELLO. How?
  DESDEMONA. say, lost.
  OTHELLO. Fetch't, it.
  DESDEMONA. Why, can, sir, now.
    trick put suit.  
    Pray you, Cassio received again.
  OTHELLO. Fetch handkerchief, mind misgives.
  DESDEMONA. Come, come,
    meet sufficient man.
  OTHELLO. handkerchief!
  DESDEMONA.                 pray, talk Cassio.
  OTHELLO. handkerchief!
  DESDEMONA.                 man time
    Hath founded good fortunes love,
    Shared dangers you-
  OTHELLO. handkerchief!
  DESDEMONA. sooth, blame.
  OTHELLO. Away!                                                Exit.
  EMILIA. man jealous?
  DESDEMONA. ne'er before.
    handkerchief;
    unhappy loss it.
  EMILIA. 'Tis year shows man.
    stomachs food;
    eat hungerly, full  
    belch us. you! Cassio husband.

                        Enter Cassio Iago.

  IAGO. way; 'tis do't.
    And, lo, happiness! importune her.
  DESDEMONA. now, good Cassio! news you?
  CASSIO. Madam, suit: beseech you
    virtuous means again
    Exist member love
    office heart
    honor. delay'd.
    offense mortal kind
    service past present sorrows
    purposed merit futurity
    ransom love again,
    benefit;
    clothe forced content
    shut course
    Fortune's alms.  
  DESDEMONA.           Alas, thrice-gentle Cassio!
    advocation tune;
    lord lord, him
    favor humor alter'd.
    spirit sanctified,
    spoken best
    stood blank displeasure
    free speech! awhile patient.
    will; will
    dare. suffice you.
  IAGO. lord angry?
  EMILIA.                 now,
    strange unquietness.
  IAGO. angry? cannon,
    hath blown ranks air
    And, devil, arm
    Puff'd brother. angry?
    moment then. meet him.
    matter in't angry.
  DESDEMONA. prithee, so.                             Exit Iago.  
                               state,
    Venice unhatch'd practice
    Made demonstrable Cyprus him,
    Hath puddled clear spirit; cases
    Men's natures wrangle inferior things,
    great object. 'Tis so;
    finger ache, indues
    healthful members sense
    pain. Nay, men gods,
    observancy
    fits bridal. Beshrew much, Emilia,
    was, unhandsome warrior am,
    Arraigning unkindness soul;
    find suborn'd witness,
    indicted falsely.
  EMILIA. Pray heaven state matters, think,
    conception jealous toy
    you.
  DESDEMONA. Alas day, gave cause!
  EMILIA. jealous souls answer'd so;  
    jealous cause,
    jealous jealous. 'Tis monster
    Begot itself, born itself.
  DESDEMONA. Heaven monster Othello's mind!
  EMILIA. Lady, amen.
  DESDEMONA. seek him. Cassio, walk hereabout.
    find fit, move suit,
    seek effect uttermost.
  CASSIO. humbly ladyship.
                                         Exeunt Desdemona Emilia.

                            Enter Bianca.

  BIANCA. Save you, friend Cassio!
  CASSIO.                          make home?
    you, fair Bianca?
    I'faith, sweet love, coming house.
  BIANCA. lodging, Cassio.
    What, week away? days nights?
    score hours? lovers' absent hours,  
    tedious dial score times?
    O weary reckoning!
  CASSIO.              Pardon me, Bianca.
    leaden thoughts press'd;
    continuate time
    Strike score absence. Sweet Bianca,
                                  Desdemona's handkerchief.
    work out.
  BIANCA.                  O Cassio, this?
    token newer friend.
    felt absence feel cause.
    Is't this? Well, well.
  CASSIO.                          to, woman!
    Throw vile guesses devil's teeth,
    them. jealous now
    mistress, remembrance.
    No, faith, Bianca.
  BIANCA.                    Why, it?
  CASSIO. not, sweet. found chamber.
    work well. Ere demanded-  
    will- I'ld copied.
    it, do't; leave time.
  BIANCA. Leave you! wherefore?
  CASSIO. attend general;
    addition, wish,
    woman'd.
  BIANCA.                       Why, pray you?
  CASSIO. love not.
  BIANCA.                          love me.
    pray you, bring little,
    night.
  CASSIO. 'Tis bring you,
    attend here, soon.
  BIANCA. 'Tis good; circumstanced.            Exeunt.

ACT IV. SCENE I.
Cyprus. castle.

Enter Othello Iago.

  IAGO. so?
  OTHELLO.                 so, Iago?
  IAGO.                                    What,
    kiss private?
  OTHELLO.              unauthorized kiss.
  IAGO. naked friend bed
    hour more, meaning harm?
  OTHELLO. Naked bed, Iago, harm!
    hypocrisy devil.
    virtuously so,
    devil virtue tempts tempt heaven.
  IAGO. nothing, 'tis venial slip.
    give wife handkerchief-
  OTHELLO. then?
  IAGO. Why, then, 'tis hers, lord, hers,
    may, think, bestow't man.
  OTHELLO. protectress honor too.  
    give that?
  IAGO. honor essence seen;
    oft not.
    handkerchief-
  OTHELLO. heaven, gladly forgot it.
    Thou said'st- O, o'er memory,
    doth raven o'er infected house,
    Boding all- handkerchief.
  IAGO. Ay, that?
  OTHELLO.                good now.
  IAGO.                                           What,
    wrong?
    heard say- knaves abroad,
    having, importunate suit,
    voluntary dotage mistress,
    Convinced supplied them, choose
    blab-
  OTHELLO.              Hath anything?
  IAGO. hath, lord; assured,
    unswear.  
  OTHELLO.                      hath said?
  IAGO. Faith, did- did.
  OTHELLO. What? what?
  IAGO. Lie-
  OTHELLO. her?
  IAGO.              her, her, will.
  OTHELLO. Lie her! lie her! lie her, they
    belie her. Lie her! 'Zounds, fulsome! Handkerchief-
    confessions- handkerchief! confess hanged labor-
    first, hanged, confess. tremble it.
    Nature invest shadowing passion without
    instruction. words shakes thus. Pish!
    Noses, ears, lips. Is't possible? Confess? Handkerchief? O
    devil!
                                                   Falls trance.
  IAGO. Work on,
    medicine, work! credulous fools caught,
    worthy chaste dames thus,
    guiltless, meet reproach. What, ho! lord!
    lord, say! Othello!  

                            Enter Cassio.

                             now, Cassio!
  CASSIO. matter?
  IAGO. lord fall'n epilepsy.
    fit; yesterday.
  CASSIO. Rub temples.
  IAGO.                              No, forbear;
    lethargy quiet course.
    not, foams mouth, by
    Breaks savage madness. Look, stirs.
    withdraw while,
    recover straight. gone,
    great occasion speak you.            Exit Cassio.
    it, general? hurt head?
  OTHELLO. Dost thou mock me?
  IAGO.                       mock you? No, heaven.
    bear fortune man!
  OTHELLO. horned man's monster beast.  
  IAGO. beast populous city,
    civil monster.
  OTHELLO. confess it?
  IAGO.                       Good sir, man;
    bearded fellow yoked
    draw you. millions alive
    nightly lie unproper beds
    dare swear peculiar. case better.
    O, 'tis spite hell, fiend's arch-mock,
    lip wanton secure couch,
    suppose chaste! No, know,
    knowing am, be.
  OTHELLO. O, thou art wise; 'tis certain.
  IAGO.                                    Stand awhile apart,
    Confine patient list.
    Whilst o'erwhelmed grief-
    passion unsuiting man-
    Cassio hither. shifted away,
    laid good 'scuse ecstasy;
    Bade anon return speak  
    promised. encave yourself
    mark fleers, gibes, notable scorns,
    dwell region face;
    make tale anew,
    Where, how, oft, long ago, when
    hath cope wife.
    say, mark gesture. Marry, patience,
    spleen,
    man.
  OTHELLO.                Dost thou hear, Iago?
    found cunning patience;
    (dost thou hear?) bloody.
  IAGO.                                amiss;
    time all. withdraw?
                                                     Othello retires.
    question Cassio Bianca,
    housewife selling desires
    Buys bread clothes. creature
    dotes Cassio, 'tis strumpet's plague
    beguile beguiled one.  
    He, hears her, refrain
    excess laughter. comes.

                           Re-enter Cassio.

    smile, Othello mad;
    unbookish jealousy construe
    Poor Cassio's smiles, gestures, light behavior
    wrong. now, lieutenant?
  CASSIO. worser give addition
    kills me.
  IAGO. Ply Desdemona well, on't.
    Now, suit lay Bianco's power,
    quickly speed!
  CASSIO.                         Alas, poor caitiff!
  OTHELLO. Look, laughs already!
  IAGO. knew woman love man so.
  CASSIO. Alas, poor rogue! think, i'faith, loves me.
  OTHELLO. denies faintly laughs out.
  IAGO. hear, Cassio?  
  OTHELLO.                   importunes him
    o'er. to; said, said.
  IAGO. marry her.
    intend it?
  CASSIO. Ha, ha, ha!
  OTHELLO. triumph, Roman? triumph?
  CASSIO. marry her! What? customer! prithee, bear charity
    wit; unwholesome. Ha, ha, ha!
  OTHELLO. So, so, so, so. laugh win.
  IAGO. Faith, cry marry her.
  CASSIO. Prithee, true.
  IAGO. villain else.
  OTHELLO. scored me? Well.
  CASSIO. monkey's giving out. persuaded I
    marry her, love flattery, my
    promise.
  OTHELLO. Iago beckons me; begins story.
  CASSIO. now; haunts place. was
    day talking sea bank Venetians, and
    thither bauble, and, hand, falls  
    neck-
  OTHELLO. Crying, "O dear Cassio!" were; gesture imports
    it.
  CASSIO. hangs lolls weeps me; hales pulls
    me. Ha, ha, ha!
  OTHELLO. tells plucked chamber. O, see
    nose yours, dog throw to.
  CASSIO. Well, leave company.
  IAGO. me! comes.
  CASSIO. 'Tis fitchew! marry, perfumed one.

                            Enter Bianca.

    haunting me?
  BIANCA. devil dam haunt you! by
    handkerchief gave now? fine fool to
    it. work? piece work that
    find chamber left it
    there! minx's token, work?
    There, give hobbyhorse. Wheresoever it,  
    work on't.
  CASSIO. now, sweet Bianca! now! now!
  OTHELLO. heaven, handkerchief!
  BIANCA. supper tonight, may; not,
    prepared for.                        Exit.
  IAGO. her, her.
  CASSIO. Faith, must; rail i' street else.
  IAGO. there?
  CASSIO. Faith, intend so.
  IAGO. Well, chance you, fain speak
    you.
  CASSIO. Prithee, come; you?
  IAGO. to; more.                              Exit Cassio.
  OTHELLO. [Advancing.] murther him, Iago?
  IAGO. perceive laughed vice?
  OTHELLO. O Iago!
  IAGO. handkerchief?
  OTHELLO. mine?
  IAGO. Yours, hand. prizes foolish
    woman wife! gave him, hath whore.  
  OTHELLO. years akilling. fine woman! fair
    woman! sweet woman!
  IAGO. Nay, forget that.
  OTHELLO. Ay, rot, perish, damned tonight, for
    live. No, heart turned stone; strike it,
    hurts hand. O, world hath sweeter creature.
    lie emperor's side, command tasks.
  IAGO. Nay, way.
  OTHELLO. Hang her! is. delicate her
    needle, admirable musician. O, sing savageness
    bear. high plenteous wit invention-
  IAGO. worse this.
  OTHELLO. O, thousand, thousand times. then, gentle a
    condition!
  IAGO. Ay, gentle.
  OTHELLO. Nay, certain. pity it, Iago!
    O Iago, pity it, Iago!
  IAGO. fond iniquity, give patent to
    offend, for, touch you, nobody.
  OTHELLO. chop messes. Cuckold me!  
  IAGO. O, 'tis foul her.
  OTHELLO. mine officer!
  IAGO. fouler.
  OTHELLO. poison, Iago, night. expostulate
    her, body beauty unprovide mind again. This
    night, Iago.
  IAGO. poison, strangle bed, bed
    hath contaminated.
  OTHELLO. Good, good, justice pleases, good.
  IAGO. Cassio, undertaker. hear more
    midnight.
  OTHELLO. Excellent good. [A trumpet within.] trumpet that
    same?
  IAGO. Venice, sure. 'Tis Lodovico
    Duke. And, wife him.

              Enter Lodovico, Desdemona, Attendants.

  LODOVICO. God save worthy general!
  OTHELLO.                               heart, sir.  
  LODOVICO. Duke Senators Venice greet you.
                                                  letter.
  OTHELLO. kiss instrument pleasures.
                                         Opens letter, reads.
  DESDEMONA. news, good cousin Lodovico?
  IAGO. glad you, signior;
    Cyprus.
  LODOVICO. you. Lieutenant Cassio?
  IAGO. Lives, sir.
  DESDEMONA. Cousin, fall'n lord
    unkind breech; make well.
  OTHELLO. that?
  DESDEMONA. lord?
  OTHELLO. [Reads.] "This fail do, will-"
  LODOVICO. call; busy paper.
    division 'twixt lord Cassio?
  DESDEMONA. unhappy one. much
    atone them, love bear Cassio.
  OTHELLO. Fire brimstone!
  DESDEMONA. lord?  
  OTHELLO. wise?
  DESDEMONA. What, angry?
  LODOVICO.                     letter moved him;
    For, think, command home,
    Deputing Cassio government.
  DESDEMONA. troth, glad on't.
  OTHELLO.                                Indeed!
  DESDEMONA.                                      lord?
  OTHELLO. glad mad.
  DESDEMONA.                         Why, sweet Othello?
  OTHELLO. Devil!                                        Strikes her.
  DESDEMONA. deserved this.
  LODOVICO. lord, believed Venice,
    swear saw't. 'Tis much.
    Make amends; weeps.
  OTHELLO.                      O devil, devil!
    earth teem woman's tears,
    drop falls prove crocodile.
    sight!
  DESDEMONA. [Going.] stay offend you.  
  LODOVICO. Truly, obedient lady.
    beseech lordship, call back.
  OTHELLO. Mistress!
  DESDEMONA. lord?
  OTHELLO. her, sir?
  LODOVICO.                              Who, I, lord?
  OTHELLO. Ay, make turn.
    Sir, turn turn, on,
    turn again; weep, sir, weep;
    obedient, say, obedient,
    obedient. Proceed tears.
    this, sir- O well-painted passion!-
    commanded home. away;
    send anon. Sir, obey mandate,
    return Venice. Hence, avaunt!
                                                      Exit Desdemona.
    Cassio place. And, sir, tonight,
    entreat together.
    welcome, sir, Cyprus. Goats monkeys!
     Exit.  
  LODOVICO. noble Moor full Senate
    Call sufficient? nature
    passion shake? solid virtue
    shot accident dart chance
    graze pierce?
  IAGO.                             changed.
  LODOVICO. wits safe? light brain?
  IAGO. is. breathe censure
    be: not,
    heaven were!
  LODOVICO.                    What, strike wife!
  IAGO. Faith, well; knew
    stroke prove worst!
  LODOVICO.                            use?
    letters work blood,
    create fault?
  IAGO.                        Alas, alas!
    honesty speak
    known. observe him,
    courses denote  
    save speech. after,
    mark continues.
  LODOVICO. deceived him.             Exeunt.




SCENE II.
A room castle.

Enter Othello Emilia.

  OTHELLO. nothing, then?
  EMILIA. heard, suspect.
  OTHELLO. Yes, Cassio together.
  EMILIA. harm, heard
    syllable breath made them.
  OTHELLO. What, whisper?
  EMILIA.                                Never, lord.
  OTHELLO. send o' way?
  EMILIA. Never.
  OTHELLO. fetch fan, gloves, mask, nothing?
  EMILIA. Never, lord.
  OTHELLO. strange.
  EMILIA. durst, lord, wager honest,
    Lay soul stake. other,
    Remove thought; doth abuse bosom.
    wretch put head,
    heaven requite serpent's curse!  
    honest, chaste, true,
    man happy; purest wives
    foul slander.
  OTHELLO.              Bid hither; go.         Exit Emilia.
    enough; simple bawd
    much. subtle whore,
    closet lock key villainous secrets.
    kneel pray; do't.

                     Enter Desdemona Emilia.

  DESDEMONA. lord, will?
  OTHELLO.                               Pray, chuck, hither.
  DESDEMONA. pleasure?
  OTHELLO.                          eyes;
    face.
  DESDEMONA.         horrible fancy's this?
  OTHELLO. [To Emilia.] function, mistress,
    Leave procreants shut door;
    Cough, cry "hem," come.  
    mystery, mystery; nay, dispatch.           Exit Emilia.
  DESDEMONA. knees, doth speech import?
    understand fury words,
    words.
  OTHELLO. Why, art thou?
  DESDEMONA. wife, lord, true loyal wife.
  OTHELLO. Come, swear it, damn thyself;
    Lest, heaven, devils themselves
    fear seize thee. double-damn'd;
    Swear thou art honest.
  DESDEMONA.               Heaven doth it.
  OTHELLO. Heaven thou art false hell.
  DESDEMONA. whom, lord? whom? false?
  OTHELLO. O Desdemona! Away! away! away!
  DESDEMONA. Alas heavy day! weep?
    motive tears, lord?
    haply father suspect
    instrument calling back,
    Lay blame me. lost him,
    Why, lost too.  
  OTHELLO.                    pleased heaven
    affliction, rain'd
    kinds sores shames bare head,
    Steep'd poverty lips,
    captivity utmost hopes,
    found place soul
    drop patience; but, alas, make me
    fixed figure time scorn
    point slow unmoving finger at!
    bear too, well, well;
    there, garner'd heart,
    live bear life;
    fountain current runs,
    dries up; discarded thence!
    cistern foul toads
    knot gender in! Turn thy complexion there,
    Patience, thou young rose-lipp'd cherubin,
    Ay, there, grim hell!
  DESDEMONA. hope noble lord esteems honest.
  OTHELLO. O, ay, summer flies shambles,  
    quicken blowing. O thou weed,
    art lovely fair smell'st sweet
    sense aches thee, thou hadst ne'er born!
  DESDEMONA. Alas, ignorant sin committed?
  OTHELLO. fair paper, goodly book,
    Made write "whore" upon? committed?
    Committed? O thou public commoner!
    make forges cheeks,
    cinders burn modesty,
    speak thy deeds. committed!
    Heaven stops nose it, moon winks;
    bawdy wind, kisses meets,
    hush'd hollow mine earth,
    hear it. committed?
    Impudent strumpet!
  DESDEMONA.           heaven, wrong.
  OTHELLO. strumpet?
  DESDEMONA.                       No, Christian.
    preserve vessel lord
    foul unlawful touch  
    strumpet, none.
  OTHELLO. What, whore?
  DESDEMONA.                  No, saved.
  OTHELLO. Is't possible?
  DESDEMONA. O, heaven forgive us!
  OTHELLO.                         cry mercy then;
    cunning whore Venice
    married Othello. [Raises voice.] You, mistress,
    office opposite Saint Peter,
    gate hell!

                           Re-enter Emilia.

                               You, you, ay, you!
    course; money pains.
    pray you, turn key, counsel.             Exit.
  EMILIA. Alas, gentleman conceive?
    you, madam? you, good lady?
  DESDEMONA. Faith, half asleep.
  EMILIA. Good madam, matter lord?  
  DESDEMONA. who?
  EMILIA. Why, lord, madam.
  DESDEMONA. thy lord?
  EMILIA.                     yours, sweet lady.
  DESDEMONA. none. talk me, Emilia;
    weep, answer none
    water. Prithee, tonight
    Lay bed wedding sheets. Remember,
    call thy husband hither.
  EMILIA.                        change indeed!
     Exit.
  DESDEMONA. 'Tis meet so, meet.
    behaved, stick
    small'st opinion misuse?

                      Re-enter Emilia Iago.

  IAGO. pleasure, madam? is't you?
  DESDEMONA. tell. teach young babes
    gentle means easy tasks.  
    chid so, good faith,
    child chiding.
  IAGO.                      matter, lady?
  EMILIA. Alas, Iago, lord hath bewhored her,
    Thrown heavy terms her,
    true hearts bear.
  DESDEMONA. name, Iago?
  IAGO.                            name, fair lady?
  DESDEMONA. lord was.
  EMILIA. call'd whore; beggar drink
    laid terms callet.
  IAGO. so?
  DESDEMONA. know; such.
  IAGO. weep, weep. Alas day!
  EMILIA. Hath forsook noble matches,
    father country friends,
    call'd whore? make weep?
  DESDEMONA. wretched fortune.
  IAGO.                                 Beshrew for't!
    trick him?  
  DESDEMONA.                       Nay, heaven doth know.
  EMILIA. hang'd, eternal villain,
    busy insinuating rogue,
    cogging, cozening slave, office,
    devised slander; hang'd else.
  IAGO. Fie, man; impossible.
  DESDEMONA. be, heaven pardon him!
  EMILIA. halter pardon him! hell gnaw bones!
    call whore? company?
    place? time? form? likelihood?
    Moor's abused villainous knave,
    base notorious knave, scurvy fellow.
    O heaven, companions thou'ldst unfold,
    put honest hand whip
    lash rascals naked world
    east west!
  IAGO.                             Speak door.
  EMILIA. O, fie them! squire was
    turn'd wit seamy side without,
    made suspect Moor.  
  IAGO. fool; to.
  DESDEMONA.                   O good Iago,
    win lord again?
    Good friend, him, light heaven,
    lost him. kneel:
    e'er trespass 'gainst love
    discourse thought actual deed,
    mine eyes, mine ears, sense,
    Delighted form,
    yet, did,
    will, shake off
    beggarly divorcement, love dearly,
    Comfort forswear me! Unkindness much,
    unkindness defeat life,
    taint love. "whore."
    doth abhor speak word;
    act addition earn
    world's mass vanity make me.
  IAGO. pray you, content; 'tis humor:
    business state offense,  
    chide you.
  DESDEMONA. 'twere other-
  IAGO. 'Tis so, warrant.                      Trumpets within.
    Hark, instruments summon supper!
    messengers Venice stay meat.
    in, weep not; things well.
                                         Exeunt Desdemona Emilia.

                           Enter Roderigo.

    now, Roderigo!
  RODERIGO. find thou dealest justly me.
  IAGO. contrary?
  RODERIGO. day thou daffest device, Iago; and
    rather, now, keepest conveniency
    suppliest advantage hope. indeed
    longer endure it; persuaded put peace
    foolishly suffered.
  IAGO. hear me, Roderigo?
  RODERIGO. Faith, heard much, words  
    performances kin together.
  IAGO. charge unjustly.
  RODERIGO. nought truth. wasted my
    means. jewels deliver Desdemona
    half corrupted votarist. told hath
    received returned expectations comforts sudden
    respect acquaintance; find none.
  IAGO. Well, to, well.
  RODERIGO. well! to! to, man; 'tis very
    well. hand, 'tis scurvy, begin find
    fopped it.
  IAGO. well.
  RODERIGO. 'tis well. make known
    Desdemona. return jewels, give over
    suit repent unlawful solicitation; not, assure
    seek satisfaction you.
  IAGO. now.
  RODERIGO. Ay, protest intendment of
    doing.
  IAGO. Why, mettle thee;  
    instant build thee opinion before. Give
    thy hand, Roderigo. Thou hast just
    exception; yet, protest, dealt directly thy
    affair.
  RODERIGO. hath appeared.
  IAGO. grant hath appeared, suspicion is
    wit judgement. But, Roderigo, thou hast that
    thee indeed, greater reason than
    ever, purpose, courage, valor, night show it; if
    thou night enjoy Desdemona, from
    world treachery devise engines life.
  RODERIGO. Well, it? reason compass?
  IAGO. Sir, especial commission Venice depute
    Cassio Othello's place.
  RODERIGO. true? Othello Desdemona return again
    Venice.
  IAGO. O, no; Mauritania, takes the
    fair Desdemona, abode lingered some
    accident; determinate removing of
    Cassio.  
  RODERIGO. mean, removing him?
  IAGO. Why, making uncapable Othello's place; knocking out
    brains.
  RODERIGO. do?
  IAGO. Ay, dare profit right. sups
    tonight harlotry, thither him. knows
    honorable fortune. watch going
    thence, fashion fall twelve and
    one, pleasure; second
    attempt, fall us. Come, stand not
    amazed it, me; show a
    necessity death bound put
    him. high supper-time, night grows to
    waste. it.
  RODERIGO. hear reason this.
  IAGO. satisfied.                           Exeunt.




SCENE III.
Another room castle.

Enter Othello, Lodovico, Desdemona, Emilia, Attendants.

  LODOVICO. beseech you, sir, trouble further.
  OTHELLO. O, pardon me; 'twill good walk.
  LODOVICO. Madam, good night; humbly ladyship.
  DESDEMONA. honor welcome.
  OTHELLO.                               walk, sir?
    O- Desdemona-
  DESDEMONA. lord?
  OTHELLO. bed instant; returned
    forthwith. Dismiss attendant there; done.
  DESDEMONA. will, lord.
                            Exeunt Othello, Lodovico, Attendants.
  EMILIA. now? gentler did.
  DESDEMONA. return incontinent.
    hath commanded bed,
    bade dismiss you.
  EMILIA.                       Dismiss me?
  DESDEMONA. bidding; therefore, good Emilia,  
    Give nightly wearing, adieu.
    displease him.
  EMILIA. him!
  DESDEMONA. I. love doth approve him,
    stubbornness, checks, frowns-
    Prithee, unpin me- grace favor them.
  EMILIA. laid sheets bade bed.
  DESDEMONA. All's one. Good faith, foolish minds!
    die thee, prithee shroud me
    sheets.
  EMILIA.                        Come, come, talk.
  DESDEMONA. mother maid call'd Barbary;
    love, loved proved mad
    forsake her. song "willow";
    thing 'twas, express'd fortune,
    died singing it. song tonight
    mind; do
    hang head side
    sing poor Barbary. Prithee, dispatch.
  EMILIA. fetch nightgown?  
  DESDEMONA.                               No, unpin here.
    Lodovico proper man.
  EMILIA. handsome man.
  DESDEMONA. speaks well.
  EMILIA. lady Venice walked barefoot to
    Palestine touch nether lip.
  DESDEMONA. [Sings.]

        "The poor soul sat sighing sycamore tree,
          Sing green willow;
        hand bosom, head knee,
          Sing willow, willow, willow.
        fresh streams ran her, murmur'd moans,
          Sing willow, willow, willow;
        salt tears fell her, soften'd stones-"

    Lay these-

    [Sings.]   "Sing willow, willow, willow-"
  
    Prithee, hie thee; anon-
    [Sings.]   "Sing green willow garland.
               blame him; scorn approve-"

    Nay, next. Hark, is't knocks?
  EMILIA. wind.
  DESDEMONA. [Sings.]

        "I call'd love false love; then?
          Sing willow, willow, willow.
        court moe women, couch moe men-"

    thee gone; good night. Mine eyes itch;
    Doth bode weeping?
  EMILIA.                   'Tis there.
  DESDEMONA. heard so. O, men, men!
    Dost thou conscience think- me, Emilia-
    women abuse husbands
    gross kind?
  EMILIA.               such, question.  
  DESDEMONA. Wouldst thou deed world?
  EMILIA. Why, you?
  DESDEMONA.                  No, heavenly light!
  EMILIA. heavenly light; do't well
    i' dark.
  DESDEMONA. Wouldst thou deed world?
  EMILIA. world's huge thing; great price
    small vice.
  DESDEMONA.          troth, thou wouldst not.
  EMILIA. troth, should, undo't done.
    Marry, thing joint-ring, for
    measures lawn, gowns, petticoats, caps, any
    petty exhibition; but, world- why, not
    make husband cuckold make monarch? should
    venture purgatory for't.
  DESDEMONA. Beshrew me, wrong
    world.
  EMILIA. Why, wrong wrong i' world; the
    world labor, 'tis wrong world, you
    quickly make right.  
  DESDEMONA. woman.
  EMILIA. Yes, dozen, vantage store the
      world played for.
    husbands' faults
    wives fall; slack duties
    pour treasures foreign laps,
    break peevish jealousies,
    Throwing restraint us, strike us,
    scant despite,
    Why, galls, grace,
    revenge. husbands know
    wives sense them; smell
    palates sweet sour,
    husbands have. do
    change others? sport?
    is. doth affection breed it?
    doth. Is't frailty errs?
    too. affections,
    Desires sport, frailty, men have?
    well; know,  
    ills do, ills instruct so.
  DESDEMONA. Good night, good night. Heaven send,
    pick bad bad, bad mend!                Exeunt.

ACT V. SCENE I.
Cyprus. street.

Enter Iago Roderigo:

  IAGO. Here, stand bulk; straight come.
    Wear thy good rapier bare, put home.
    Quick, quick; fear nothing; thy elbow.
    makes us, mars us; that,
    fix firm thy resolution.
  RODERIGO. hand; miscarry in't.
  IAGO. Here, thy hand, bold, thy stand.
  Retires.
  RODERIGO. great devotion deed;
    hath satisfying reasons.
    'Tis man gone. Forth, sword; dies.
  IAGO. rubb'd young quat sense,
    grows angry. Now, kill Cassio,
    Cassio him, kill other,
    makes gain. Live Roderigo,
    calls restitution large
    gold jewels bobb'd him,  
    gifts Desdemona;
    be. Cassio remain,
    hath daily beauty life
    makes ugly; besides, Moor
    unfold him; stand peril.
    No, die. Be't so. hear coming.

                            Enter Cassio.

  RODERIGO. gait; 'tis he. Villain, thou diest!
                                              Makes pass Cassio.
  CASSIO. thrust mine enemy indeed,
    coat thou know'st;
    make proof thine.           Draws, wounds Roderigo.
  RODERIGO.                     O, slain!
            Iago wounds Cassio leg, exit.
  CASSIO. maim'd forever. Help, ho! Murther! Murther!
    Falls.

                            Enter Othello.  

  OTHELLO. voice Cassio; Iago word.
  RODERIGO. O, villain am!
  OTHELLO.                        so.
  CASSIO. O, help, ho! Light! surgeon!
  OTHELLO. 'Tis he. O brave Iago, honest just,
    hast noble sense thy friend's wrong!
    Thou teachest me. Minion, dear lies dead,
    unblest fate hies. Strumpet, come!
    heart charms, thine eyes, blotted;
    Thy bed lust-stain'd lust's blood spotted.
     Exit.

                     Enter Lodovico Gratiano.

  CASSIO. What, ho! watch? passage? Murther! Murther!
  GRATIANO. 'Tis mischance; cry direful.
  CASSIO. O, help!
  LODOVICO. Hark!
  RODERIGO. O wretched villain!  
  LODOVICO. groan; heavy night.
    counterfeits; think't unsafe
    cry help.
  RODERIGO. come? bleed death.
  LODOVICO. Hark!

                     Re-enter Iago, light.

  GRATIANO. shirt, light weapons.
  IAGO. there? noise cries murther?
  LODOVICO. know.
  IAGO.                     hear cry?
  CASSIO. Here, here! heaven's sake, me!
  IAGO.                                       matter?
  GRATIANO. Othello's ancient, it.
  LODOVICO. indeed; valiant fellow.
  IAGO. cry grievously?
  CASSIO. Iago? O, spoil'd, undone villains!
    Give help.
  IAGO. O me, lieutenant! villains this?  
  CASSIO. hereabout,
    make away.
  IAGO.                   O treacherous villains!
    [To Lodovico Gratiano.] there?
    give help.
  RODERIGO. O, here!
  CASSIO. them.
  IAGO.                       O murtherous slave! O villain!
                                                      Stabs Roderigo.
  RODERIGO. O damn'd Iago! O inhuman dog!
  IAGO. Kill men i' dark! bloody thieves?
    silent town! Ho! Murther! Murther!
    be? good evil?
  LODOVICO. prove us, praise us.
  IAGO. Signior Lodovico?
  LODOVICO. He, sir.
  IAGO. cry mercy. Cassio hurt villains.
  GRATIANO. Cassio?
  IAGO. is't, brother?
  CASSIO. leg cut two.  
  IAGO.                         Marry, heaven forbid!
    Light, gentlemen; bind shirt.

                            Enter Bianca.

  BIANCA. matter, ho? is't cried?
  IAGO. is't cried?
  BIANCA. O dear Cassio, sweet Cassio! O Cassio, Cassio,
     Cassio!
  IAGO. O notable strumpet! Cassio, suspect
    mangled you?
  CASSIO. No.
  GRATIANO. find thus; seek you.
  IAGO. Lend garter. So. O, chair,
    bear easily hence!
  BIANCA. Alas, faints! O Cassio, Cassio, Cassio!
  IAGO. Gentlemen all, suspect trash
    party injury.
    Patience awhile, good Cassio. Come, come;
    Lend light. face no?  
    Alas, friend dear countryman
    Roderigo? No- yes, sure. O heaven! Roderigo.
  GRATIANO. What, Venice?
  IAGO. he, sir. him?
  GRATIANO.                             him! ay.
  IAGO. Signior Gratiano? cry gentle pardon;
    bloody accidents excuse manners,
    neglected you.
  GRATIANO.                glad you.
  IAGO. you, Cassio? O, chair, chair!
  GRATIANO. Roderigo!
  IAGO. He, he, 'tis he. [A chair brought in.] O, said:
      chair.
    good man bear carefully hence;
    fetch general's surgeon. [To Bianca.] you, mistress,
    Save labor. lies slain here, Cassio,
    dear friend; malice you?
  CASSIO. world; man.
  IAGO. [To Bianca.] What, pale? O, bear o' air.
                                   Cassio Roderigo borne off.  
    Stay you, good gentlemen. pale, mistress?
    perceive gastness eye?
    Nay, stare, hear anon.
    Behold well; pray you, her.
    see, gentlemen? Nay, guiltiness speak,
    tongues use.

                            Enter Emilia.

  EMILIA. 'Las, matter? matter, husband?
  IAGO. Cassio hath set dark
    Roderigo, fellows 'scaped;
    slain, Roderigo dead.
  EMILIA. Alas, good gentleman! alas, good Cassio!
  IAGO. fruit whoring. Prithee, Emilia,
    Cassio supp'd tonight.
    What, shake that?
  BIANCA. supp'd house; shake not.
  IAGO. O, so? charge you, me.
  EMILIA. Fie, fie thee, strumpet!  
  BIANCA. strumpet, life honest
    abuse me.
  EMILIA.                      I! foh! fie thee!
  IAGO. Kind gentlemen, poor Cassio dress'd.
    Come, mistress, tell's tale.
    Emilia, run citadel,
    lord lady hath happ'd!
    on? [Aside.] night
    makes fordoes quite.                 Exeunt.




SCENE II.
A bedchamber castle. Desdemona bed asleep; light burning.

Enter Othello.

  OTHELLO. cause, cause, soul.
    you, chaste stars!
    cause. shed blood,
    scar whiter skin snow
    smooth monumental alabaster.
    die, betray men.
    Put light, put light.
    quench thee, thou flaming minister,
    thy light restore,
    repent me; put thy light,
    Thou cunning'st pattern excelling nature,
    Promethean heat
    thy light relume. pluck'd rose,
    give vital growth again,
    wither; smell tree.      Kisses her.
    O, balmy breath, dost persuade
    Justice break sword! more, more;  
    thou art dead, kill thee,
    love thee after. more, last;
    sweet ne'er fatal. weep,
    cruel tears; sorrow's heavenly,
    strikes doth love. wakes.
  DESDEMONA. there? Othello?
  OTHELLO.                         Ay, Desdemona.
  DESDEMONA. bed, lord?
  OTHELLO. pray'd tonight, Desdemona?
  DESDEMONA. Ay, lord.
  OTHELLO. bethink crime
    Unreconciled heaven grace,
    Solicit straight.
  DESDEMONA. Alas, lord, that?
  OTHELLO. Well, it, brief; walk by.
    kill thy unprepared spirit.
    No, heaven forfend! kill thy soul.
  DESDEMONA. Talk killing?
  OTHELLO. Ay, do.
  DESDEMONA. heaven mercy me!  
  OTHELLO. Amen, heart!
  DESDEMONA. so, hope kill me.
  OTHELLO. Hum!
  DESDEMONA. fear you, fatal then
    eyes roll so. fear not,
    guiltiness not; feel fear.
  OTHELLO. thy sins.
  DESDEMONA.                  loves bear you.
  OTHELLO. Ay, thou diest.
  DESDEMONA. death's unnatural kills loving.
    Alas, gnaw nether lip?
    bloody passion shakes frame.
    portents; hope, hope,
    point me.
  OTHELLO.                   Peace, still!
  DESDEMONA. so. matter?
  OTHELLO. handkerchief loved gave thee
    Thou gavest Cassio.
  DESDEMONA.               No, life soul!
    Send man, him.  
  OTHELLO.                         Sweet soul, heed,
    heed perjury; thou thy deathbed.
  DESDEMONA. Ay, die.
  OTHELLO.                           Yes, presently:
    confess thee freely thy sin,
    deny article oath
    remove choke strong conception
    groan withal. Thou art die.
  DESDEMONA. Lord mercy me!
  OTHELLO.                               say, amen.
  DESDEMONA. mercy too! did
    Offend life; loved Cassio
    general warranty heaven
    love. gave token.
  OTHELLO. heaven, handkerchief 's hand.
    O perjured woman! Thou dost stone heart,
    makest call intend do
    murther, thought sacrifice.
    handkerchief.
  DESDEMONA.                found then;  
    gave him. Send hither;
    confess truth.
  OTHELLO.                   hath confess'd.
  DESDEMONA. What, lord?
  OTHELLO. hath thee.
  DESDEMONA.                       How? unlawfully?
  OTHELLO. Ay.
  DESDEMONA. so.
  OTHELLO.                       No, mouth stopp'd;
    Honest Iago hath ta'en order for't.
  DESDEMONA. O, fear interprets! What, dead?
  OTHELLO. hairs lives, great revenge
    stomach all.
  DESDEMONA. Alas, betray'd, undone!
  OTHELLO. Out, strumpet! Weep'st thou face?
  DESDEMONA. O, banish me, lord, kill not!
  OTHELLO. Down, strumpet!
  DESDEMONA. Kill tomorrow; live tonight!
  OTHELLO. Nay, strive-
  DESDEMONA. half hour!  
  OTHELLO.                     done, pause.
  DESDEMONA. prayer!
  OTHELLO.                        late.     stifles her.
  EMILIA. [Within.] lord, lord! What, ho! lord, lord!
  OTHELLO. noise this? dead? dead?
    cruel merciful;
    thee linger thy pain.
    So, so.
  EMILIA. [Within.] What, ho! lord, lord!
  OTHELLO.                                      there?
  EMILIA. [Within.] O, good lord, speak word you!
  OTHELLO. Yes, 'tis Emilia. by. dead.
    'Tis speak Cassio's death.
    noise here. Ha! moving?
    grave. in? were't good?
    stirs again. No. do?
    in, speak wife.
    wife! wife! wife? wife.
    O, insupportable! O heavy hour!
    Methinks huge eclipse  
    sun moon, affrighted globe
    yawn alteration.
  EMILIA. [Within.] beseech you
    speak you, O, good lord!
  OTHELLO. forgot thee. O, in, Emilia.
    Soft, by. curtains draw.
    art thou?                                 Unlocks door.

                            Enter Emilia.

                    matter thee now?
  EMILIA. O, good lord, yonder's foul murthers done!
  OTHELLO. What, now?
  EMILIA. now, lord.
  OTHELLO. error moon;
    nearer earth wont
    makes men mad.
  EMILIA. Cassio, lord, hath kill'd young Venetian
    Call'd Roderigo.
  OTHELLO.           Roderigo kill'd?  
    Cassio kill'd?
  EMILIA.              No, Cassio kill'd.
  OTHELLO. Cassio kill'd! murther's tune,
    sweet revenge grows harsh.
  DESDEMONA. O, falsely, falsely murther'd!
  EMILIA.                                   Alas, cry that?
  OTHELLO. That? what?
  EMILIA. Out, alas! lady's voice.
    Help! help, ho! help! O lady, speak again!
    Sweet Desdemona! O sweet mistress, speak!
  DESDEMONA. guiltless death die.
  EMILIA. O, hath deed?
  DESDEMONA. Nobody; myself. Farewell;
    Commend kind lord. O, farewell!                    Dies.
  OTHELLO. Why, murther'd?
  EMILIA.                                    Alas, knows?
  OTHELLO. heard herself, I.
  EMILIA. so; report truth.
  OTHELLO. liar burning hell;
    'Twas kill'd her.  
  EMILIA.                    O, angel she,
    blacker devil!
  OTHELLO. turn'd folly, whore.
  EMILIA. Thou dost belie her, thou art devil.
  OTHELLO. false water.
  EMILIA.                          Thou art rash fire, say
    false. O, heavenly true!
  OTHELLO. Cassio top her; thy husband else.
    O, damn'd beneath depth hell,
    proceed grounds
    extremity. Thy husband knew all.
  EMILIA. husband?
  OTHELLO. Thy husband.
  EMILIA. false wedlock?
  OTHELLO. Ay, Cassio. Nay, true,
    heaven make world
    entire perfect chrysolite,
    I'ld sold it.
  EMILIA.                          husband?
  OTHELLO. Ay, 'twas told first.  
    honest man is, hates slime
    sticks filthy deeds.
  EMILIA.                        husband?
  OTHELLO. iteration, woman? thy husband.
  EMILIA. O mistress, villainy hath made mocks love!
    husband false!
  OTHELLO.                             He, woman;
    thy husband. Dost understand word?
    friend, thy husband, honest, honest Iago.
  EMILIA. so, pernicious soul
    Rot half grain day! lies heart.
    fond filthy bargain.
  OTHELLO. Ha!
  EMILIA. thy worst;
    deed thine worthy heaven
    thou wast worthy her.
  OTHELLO.                     Peace, best.
  EMILIA. Thou hast half power harm
    hurt. O gull! O dolt!
    ignorant dirt! Thou hast deed-  
    care thy sword; make thee known,
    lost twenty lives. Help! help, ho! help!
    Moor hath kill'd mistress! Murther, murther!

              Enter Montano, Gratiano, Iago, others.

  MONTANO. matter? now, general?
  EMILIA. O, come, Iago? well,
    men lay murthers neck.
  GRATIANO. matter?
  EMILIA. Disprove villain, thou be'st man.
    thou told'st wife false;
    thou didst not, thou'rt villain.
    Speak, heart full.
  IAGO. told thought, told more
    found apt true.
  EMILIA. false?
  IAGO. did.
  EMILIA. told lie, odious, damned lie;
    soul, lie, wicked lie!  
    false Cassio? Cassio?
  IAGO. Cassio, mistress. to, charm tongue.
  EMILIA. charm tongue; bound speak.
    mistress lies murther'd bed-
  ALL. O heavens forfend!
  EMILIA. reports set murther on.
  OTHELLO. Nay, stare not, masters; true indeed.
  GRATIANO. 'Tis strange truth.
  MONTANO. O monstrous act!
  EMILIA.                   Villainy, villainy, villainy!
    upon't, think, smell't, O villainy!
    thought then. kill grief.
    O villainy, villainy!
  IAGO. What, mad? charge you, home.
  EMILIA. Good gentlemen, leave speak;
    'Tis proper obey him, now.
    Perchance, Iago, ne'er home.
  OTHELLO. O! O! O!                                 Falls bed.
  EMILIA.           Nay, lay thee roar;
    thou hast kill'd sweetest innocent  
    e'er lift eye.
  OTHELLO.            [Rises.] O, foul!
    scarce you, uncle; lies niece,
    breath hands newly stopp'd.
    act shows horrible grim.
  GRATIANO. Poor Desdemon! glad thy father's dead.
    Thy match mortal him, pure grief
    Shore thread twain; live now,
    sight make desperate turn,
    Yea, curse angel side,
    fall reprobation.
  OTHELLO. 'Tis pitiful, Iago knows
    Cassio hath act shame
    thousand times committed. Cassio confess'd it,
    gratify amorous works
    recognizance pledge love
    gave her. hand,
    handkerchief, antique token
    father gave mother.
  EMILIA. O heaven! O heavenly powers!  
  IAGO. 'Zounds! Hold peace.
  EMILIA.                         'Twill out, 'twill. peace?
    No, speak liberal north;
    heaven men devils, all,
    All, all, cry shame me, speak.
  IAGO. wise, home.
  EMILIA.                          not.
                                          Iago offers stab Emilia.
  GRATIANO.                                    Fie!
    sword woman?
  EMILIA. O thou dull Moor! handkerchief thou speak'st of
    found fortune give husband,
    solemn earnestness,
    belong'd trifle,
    begg'd steal it.
  IAGO.                          Villainous whore!
  EMILIA. give Cassio? No, alas, found it,
    give't husband.
  IAGO.                          Filth, thou liest!
  EMILIA. heaven, not, not, gentlemen.  
    O murtherous coxcomb! fool
    good wife?
  OTHELLO.                  stones heaven
    serve thunder? Precious villain!
                                         runs Iago, Montano
                                      disarms him. Iago stabs Emilia.
  GRATIANO. woman falls; sure, hath kill'd wife.
  EMILIA. Ay, ay! O, lay mistress' side.          Exit Iago.
  GRATIANO. gone, wife's kill'd.
  MONTANO. 'Tis notorious villain. weapon,
    recover'd Moor.
    Come, guard door without; pass,
    kill rather. villain,
    'tis damned slave.       Exeunt Othello Emilia.
  OTHELLO.                   valiant neither,
    puny whipster sword.
    honor outlive honesty?
    all.
  EMILIA.          thy song bode, lady?
    Hark, canst thou hear me? play swan,  
    die music. [Sings.] "Willow, willow, willow."
    Moor, chaste; loved thee, cruel Moor;
    soul bliss, speak true;
    speaking think, die, die.                       Dies.
  OTHELLO. weapon chamber;
    sword Spain, ice-brook's temper-
    O, is. Uncle, forth.
  GRATIANO. [Within.] thou attempt it, cost thee dear.
    Thou hast weapon, perforce suffer.
  OTHELLO. then, speak me,
    Or, naked am, assault thee.

                          Re-enter Gratiano.

  GRATIANO. matter?
  OTHELLO.                      Behold, weapon;
    sustain
    soldier's thigh. day
    arm good sword
    made impediments  
    twenty times stop. But, O vain boast!
    control fate? 'Tis now.
    afraid, weapon'd;
    journey's end, butt
    sea-mark utmost sail.
    back dismay'd? 'Tis lost fear.
    Man rush Othello's breast,
    retires. Othello go?
    Now, dost thou now? O ill-starr'd wench!
    Pale thy smock! meet compt,
    thine hurl soul heaven,
    fiends snatch it. Cold, cold, girl?
    thy chastity. O cursed, cursed slave!
    Whip me, ye devils,
    possession heavenly sight!
    Blow winds! Roast sulphur!
    Wash steep-down gulfs liquid fire!
    O Desdemon! dead, Desdemon! dead!
    O! O! O!
  
         Enter Lodovico, Montano, Cassio carried chair,
                  Officers Iago, prisoner.

  LODOVICO. rash unfortunate man?
  OTHELLO. Othello. am.
  LODOVICO. viper? Bring villain forth.
  OTHELLO. feet; fable.
    thou be'st devil, kill thee.      Wounds Iago.
  LODOVICO. Wrench sword him.
  IAGO.                                bleed, sir, kill'd.
  OTHELLO. neither. I'ld thee live,
    For, sense, 'tis happiness die.
  LODOVICO. O thou Othello, wert good,
    Fall'n practice damned slave,
    thee?
  OTHELLO.                      Why, anything;
    honorable murtherer, will,
    nought hate, honor.
  LODOVICO. wretch hath part confess'd villainy.
    consent Cassio's death?  
  OTHELLO. Ay.
  CASSIO. Dear general, gave cause.
  OTHELLO. it, pardon.
    you, pray, demand demi-devil
    hath ensnared soul body?
  IAGO. Demand nothing; know, know.
    time speak word.
  LODOVICO. What, pray?
  GRATIANO.                    Torments ope lips.
  OTHELLO. Well, thou dost best.
  LODOVICO. Sir, understand hath befall'n,
    Which, think, not. letter
    Found pocket slain Roderigo,
    another. imports
    death Cassio undertook
    Roderigo.
  OTHELLO. O villain!
  CASSIO.             heathenish gross!
  LODOVICO. discontented paper,
    Found pocket too; this, seems,  
    Roderigo meant damned villain;
    that, belike, Iago interim
    satisfied him.
  OTHELLO.                     O pernicious caitiff!
    you, Cassio, handkerchief
    wife's?
  CASSIO.               found chamber;
    confess'd now
    dropp'd special purpose
    wrought desire.
  OTHELLO.                       O fool! fool! fool!
  CASSIO. Roderigo's letter,
    upbraids Iago, made him
    Brave watch, whereon came
    cast. spake
    long dead, Iago hurt him,
    Iago set on.
  LODOVICO. forsake room, us.
    power command off,
    Cassio rules Cyprus. slave,  
    cunning cruelty
    torment hold long,
    his. close prisoner rest,
    Till nature fault known
    Venetian state. Come, bring away.
  OTHELLO. Soft you; word go.
    state service, know't.
    that. pray you, letters,
    unlucky deeds relate,
    Speak am; extenuate,
    set aught malice. speak
    loved wisely well;
    easily jealous, but, wrought,
    Perplex'd extreme; hand,
    base Indian, threw pearl away
    Richer tribe; subdued eyes,
    Albeit unused melting mood,
    Drop tears fast Arabian trees
    medicinal gum. Set this;
    besides, Aleppo once,  
    malignant turban'd Turk
    Beat Venetian traduced state,
    throat circumcised dog
    smote him, thus.                               Stabs himself.
  LODOVICO. O bloody period!
  GRATIANO.                  spoke marr'd.
  OTHELLO. kiss'd thee ere kill'd thee. this,
    Killing myself, die kiss.
                                          Falls bed, dies.
  CASSIO. fear, thought weapon;
    great heart.
  LODOVICO.         [To Iago.] O Spartan dog,
    fell anguish, hunger, sea!
    tragic loading bed;
    thy work. object poisons sight;
    hid. Gratiano, house,
    seize fortunes Moor,
    succeed you. you, Lord Governor,
    Remains censure hellish villain,
    time, place, torture. O, enforce it!  
    straight aboard, state
    heavy act heavy heart relate.                   Exeunt.


THE END

1596


KING RICHARD SECOND


by William Shakespeare



DRAMATIS PERSONAE

  KING RICHARD SECOND
  JOHN GAUNT, Duke Lancaster - uncle King
  EDMUND LANGLEY, Duke York - uncle King
  HENRY, surnamed BOLINGBROKE, Duke Hereford, son of
    John Gaunt, King Henry IV
  DUKE AUMERLE, son Duke York
  THOMAS MOWBRAY, Duke Norfolk
  DUKE SURREY
  EARL SALISBURY
  EARL BERKELEY
  BUSHY - favourites King Richard
  BAGOT -     "      "   "     "
  GREEN -     "      "   "     "
  EARL NORTHUMBERLAND
  HENRY PERCY, surnamed HOTSPUR, son
  LORD Ross                             LORD WILLOUGHBY
  LORD FITZWATER                        BISHOP CARLISLE
  ABBOT WESTMINSTER                  LORD MARSHAL
  SIR STEPHEN SCROOP                    SIR PIERCE EXTON
  CAPTAIN band Welshmen         GARDENERS  

  QUEEN King Richard
  DUCHESS YORK
  DUCHESS GLOUCESTER, widow Thomas Woodstock,
    Duke Gloucester
  LADY attending Queen

  Lords, Heralds, Officers, Soldiers, Keeper, Messenger,
    Groom, Attendants
