SCENE:
England Wales


ACT I. SCENE I.
London. palace

Enter RICHARD, JOHN GAUNT, NOBLES attendants

  KING RICHARD. John Gaunt, time-honoured Lancaster,
    Hast thou, thy oath band,
    Brought Henry Hereford, thy bold son,
    make good boist'rous late appeal,
    leisure hear,
    Duke Norfolk, Thomas Mowbray?
  GAUNT. have, liege.
  KING RICHARD. me, moreover, hast thou sounded him
    appeal Duke ancient malice,
    worthily, good subject should,
    ground treachery him?
  GAUNT. sift argument,
    apparent danger him
    Aim'd Highness-no inveterate malice.
  KING RICHARD. call presence: face face
    frowning brow brow, hear  
    accuser accused freely speak.
    High-stomach'd full ire,
    rage, deaf sea, hasty fire.

         Enter BOLINGBROKE MOWBRAY

  BOLINGBROKE. years happy days befall
    gracious sovereign, loving liege!
  MOWBRAY. day other's happiness
    heavens, envying earth's good hap,
    Add immortal title crown!
  KING RICHARD. both; flatters us,
    appeareth come;
    Namely, appeal high treason.
    Cousin Hereford, dost thou object
    Duke Norfolk, Thomas Mowbray?
  BOLINGBROKE. First-heaven record speech!
    devotion subject's love,
    Tend'ring precious safety prince,
    free misbegotten hate,  
    appellant princely presence.
    Now, Thomas Mowbray, turn thee,
    mark greeting well; speak
    body make good earth,
    divine soul answer heaven-
    Thou art traitor miscreant,
    good so, bad live,
    fair crystal sky,
    uglier clouds fly.
    more, aggravate note,
    foul traitor's stuff thy throat;
    wish-so sovereign-ere move,
    tongue speaks, drawn sword prove.
  MOWBRAY. cold words accuse zeal.
    'Tis trial woman's war,
    bitter clamour eager tongues,
    arbitrate betwixt twain;
    blood hot cool'd this.
    tame patience boast
    hush'd nought say.  
    First, fair reverence Highness curbs me
    giving reins spurs free speech;
    post return'd
    terms treason doubled throat.
    Setting high blood's royalty,
    kinsman liege,
    defy him, spit him,
    Call slanderous coward villain;
    maintain, odds
    meet him, tied run afoot
    frozen ridges Alps,
    ground inhabitable
    Englishman durst set foot.
    Meantime defend loyalty-
    hopes, falsely doth lie
  BOLINGBROKE. Pale trembling coward, throw gage,
    Disclaiming kindred King;
    lay high blood's royalty,
    fear, reverence, makes thee except.
    guilty dread left thee strength  
    mine honour's pawn, stoop.
    rites knighthood else
    make good thee, arm arm,
    spoke thou canst worst devise.
  MOWBRAY. up; sword swear
    gently laid knighthood shoulder
    answer thee fair degree
    chivalrous design knightly trial;
    mount, alive light
    traitor unjustly fight!
  KING RICHARD. doth cousin lay Mowbray's charge?
    great inherit us
    thought ill him.
  BOLINGBROKE. speak, life prove true-
    Mowbray hath receiv'd thousand nobles
    lendings Highness' soldiers,
    hath detain'd lewd employments
    false traitor injurious villain.
    Besides, battle prove-
    here, furthest verge  
    survey'd English eye-
    treasons eighteen years
    Complotted contrived land
    Fetch false Mowbray head spring.
    say, maintain
    bad life make good,
    plot Duke Gloucester's death,
    Suggest soon-believing adversaries,
    consequently, traitor coward,
    Sluic'd innocent soul streams blood;
    blood, sacrificing Abel's, cries,
    tongueless caverns earth,
    justice rough chastisement;
    And, glorious worth descent,
    arm it, life spent.
  KING RICHARD. high pitch resolution soars!
    Thomas Norfolk, say'st thou this?
  MOWBRAY. O, sovereign turn face
    bid ears deaf,
    Till told slander blood  
    God good men hate foul liar.
  KING RICHARD. Mowbray, impartial eyes cars.
    brother, nay, kingdom's heir,
    father's brother's son,
    sceptre's awe make vow,
    neighbour nearness sacred blood
    privilege partialize
    unstooping firmness upright soul.
    subject, Mowbray; art thou:
    Free speech fearless thee allow.
  MOWBRAY. Then, Bolingbroke, low thy heart,
    false passage thy throat, thou liest.
    parts receipt Calais
    Disburs'd duly Highness' soldiers;
    part reserv'd consent,
    sovereign liege debt
    remainder dear account
    France fetch queen:
    swallow lie. Gloucester's death-
    slew not, disgrace  
    Neglected sworn duty case.
    you, noble Lord Lancaster,
    honourable father foe,
    lay ambush life,
    trespass doth vex grieved soul;
    ere receiv'd sacrament
    confess it, begg'd
    Grace's pardon; hope it.
    fault. rest appeal'd,
    issues rancour villain,
    recreant degenerate traitor;
    boldly defend,
    interchangeably hurl gage
    overweening traitor's foot
    prove loyal gentleman
    blood chamber'd bosom.
    haste whereof, heartily pray
    Highness assign trial day.
  KING RICHARD. Wrath-kindled gentlemen, rul'd me;
    purge choler letting blood-  
    prescribe, physician;
    Deep malice makes deep incision.
    Forget, forgive; conclude agreed:
    doctors month bleed.
    Good uncle, end begun;
    calm Duke Norfolk, son.
  GAUNT. make-peace age.
    Throw down, son, Duke Norfolk's gage.
  KING RICHARD. And, Norfolk, throw his.
  GAUNT. When, Harry, when?
    Obedience bids bid again.
  KING RICHARD. Norfolk, throw down; bid.
    boot.
  MOWBRAY. throw, dread sovereign, thy foot;
    life thou shalt command, shame:
    duty owes; fair name,
    death, lives grave
    dark dishonour's thou shalt have.
    disgrac'd, impeach'd, baffl'd here;
    Pierc'd soul slander's venom'd spear,  
    balm cure heart-blood
    breath'd poison.
  KING RICHARD. Rage withstood:
    Give gage-lions make leopards tame.
  MOWBRAY. Yea, change spots. shame,
    resign gage. dear dear lord,
    purest treasure mortal times afford
    spotless reputation; away,
    Men gilded loam painted clay.
    jewel ten-times barr'd-up chest
    bold spirit loyal breast.
    Mine honour life; grow one;
    honour me, life done:
    Then, dear liege, mine honour try;
    live, die.
  KING RICHARD. Cousin, throw gage; begin.
  BOLINGBROKE. O, God defend soul deep sin!
    crest-fallen father's sight?
    pale beggar-fear impeach height
    outdar'd dastard? Ere tongue  
    wound honour feeble wrong
    sound base parle, teeth tear
    slavish motive recanting fear,
    spit bleeding high disgrace,
    shame doth harbour, Mowbray's face.
                                                      Exit GAUNT
  KING RICHARD. born sue, command;
    make friends,
    ready, lives answer it,
    Coventry, Saint Lambert's day.
    swords lances arbitrate
    swelling difference settled hate;
    atone you, see
    Justice design victor's chivalry.
    Lord Marshal, command officers-at-arms
    ready direct home alarms.                 Exeunt




SCENE 2.
London. DUKE LANCASTER'S palace

Enter JOHN GAUNT DUCHESS GLOUCESTER

  GAUNT. Alas, part Woodstock's blood
    Doth solicit exclaims
    stir butchers life!
    correction lieth hands
    made fault correct,
    Put quarrel heaven;
    Who, hours ripe earth,
    rain hot vengeance offenders' heads.
  DUCHESS. Finds brotherhood thee sharper spur?
    Hath love thy blood living fire?
    Edward's sons, whereof thyself art one,
    vials sacred blood,
    fair branches springing root.
    dried nature's course,
    branches Destinies cut;
    Thomas, dear lord, life, Gloucester,
    vial full Edward's sacred blood,  
    flourishing branch royal root,
    crack'd, precious liquor spilt;
    hack'd down, summer leaves faded,
    envy's hand murder's bloody axe.
    Ah, Gaunt, blood thine! bed, womb,
    mettle, mould, fashion'd thee,
    Made man; thou livest breathest,
    art thou slain him. Thou dost consent
    large measure thy father's death
    thou seest thy wretched brother die,
    model thy father's life.
    Call patience, Gaunt-it despair;
    suff'ring thy brother slaught'red,
    Thou showest naked pathway thy life,
    Teaching stern murder butcher thee.
    men entitle patience
    pale cold cowardice noble breasts.
    say? safeguard thine life
    venge Gloucester's death.
  GAUNT. God's quarrel; God's substitute,  
    deputy anointed sight,
    Hath caus'd death; wrongfully,
    heaven revenge; lift
    angry arm minister.
  DUCHESS. then, alas, complain myself?
  GAUNT. God, widow's champion defence.
  DUCHESS. then, will. Farewell, Gaunt.
    Thou goest Coventry, behold
    cousin Hereford fell Mowbray fight.
    O, sit husband's wrongs Hereford's spear,
    enter butcher Mowbray's breast!
    Or, misfortune miss career,
    Mowbray's sins heavy bosom
    break foaming courser's back
    throw rider headlong lists,
    caitiff recreant cousin Hereford!
    Farewell, Gaunt; thy brother's wife,
    companion, Grief, end life.
  GAUNT. Sister, farewell; Coventry.
    good stay thee me!  
  DUCHESS. word more- grief boundeth falls,
    empty hollowness, weight.
    leave begun,
    sorrow ends seemeth done.
    Commend thy brother, Edmund York.
    Lo, all- nay, depart so;
    all, quickly go;
    remember more. Bid him- ah, what?-
    good speed Plashy visit me.
    Alack, good York see
    empty lodgings unfurnish'd walls,
    Unpeopled offices, untrodden stones?
    hear groans?
    commend me; there
    seek sorrow dwells where.
    Desolate, desolate, die;
    leave thee takes weeping eye.          Exeunt




SCENE 3.
The lists Coventry

Enter LORD MARSHAL DUKE AUMERLE

  MARSHAL. Lord Aumerle, Harry Hereford arm'd?
  AUMERLE. Yea, points; longs enter in.
  MARSHAL. Duke Norfolk, spightfully bold,
    Stays summons appelant's trumpet.
  AUMERLE. then, champions prepar'd, stay
    Majesty's approach.

     trumpets sound, KING enters nobles,
     GAUNT, BUSHY, BAGOT, GREEN, others. set,
     enter MOWBRAY, Duke folk, arms, defendant, and
     HERALD

  KING RICHARD. Marshal, demand yonder champion
    arrival arms;
    name; orderly proceed
    swear justice cause.
  MARSHAL. God's King's, thou art,  
    thou comest knightly clad arms;
    man thou com'st, thy quarrel.
    Speak thy knighthood thy oath;
    defend thee heaven thy valour!
  MOWBRAY. Thomas Mowbray, Duke Norfolk;
    engaged oath-
    God defend knight violate!-
    defend loyalty truth
    God, King, succeeding issue,
    Duke Hereford appeals me;
    And, grace God mine arm,
    prove him, defending myself,
    traitor God, King, me.
    fight, defend heaven!

   trumpets sound. Enter BOLINGBROKE, Duke Hereford,
            appellant, armour, HERALD

  KING RICHARD. Marshal, yonder knight arms,
    cometh  
    plated habiliments war;
    formally, law,
    Depose justice cause.
  MARSHAL. thy name? wherefore com'st thou hither
    King Richard royal lists?
    comest thou? thy quarrel?
    Speak true knight, defend thee heaven!
  BOLINGBROKE. Harry Hereford, Lancaster, Derby,
    I; ready stand arms
    prove, God's grace body's valour,
    lists Thomas Mowbray, Duke Norfolk,
    traitor, foul dangerous,
    God heaven, King Richard, me.
    fight, defend heaven!
  MARSHAL. pain death, person bold
    daring-hardy touch lists,
    Marshal officers
    Appointed direct fair designs.
  BOLINGBROKE. Lord Marshal, kiss sovereign's hand,
    bow knee Majesty;  
    Mowbray men
    vow long weary pilgrimage.
    ceremonious leave
    loving farewell friends.
  MARSHAL. appellant duty greets Highness,
    craves kiss hand leave.
  KING RICHARD. descend fold arms.
    Cousin Hereford, thy right,
    thy fortune royal fight!
    Farewell, blood; to-day thou shed,
    Lament may, revenge thee dead.
  BOLINGBROKE. O, noble eye profane tear
    me, gor'd Mowbray's spear.
    confident falcon's flight
    bird, Mowbray fight.
    loving lord, leave you;
    you, noble cousin, Lord Aumerle;
    sick, death,
    lusty, young, cheerly drawing breath.
    Lo, English feasts, regreet  
    daintiest last, make end sweet.
    O thou, earthly author blood,
    youthful spirit, regenerate,
    Doth twofold vigour lift up
    reach victory head,
    Add proof mine armour thy prayers,
    thy blessings steel lance's point,
    enter Mowbray's waxen coat
    furbish John o' Gaunt,
    lusty haviour son.
  GAUNT. God thy good make thee prosperous!
    swift lightning execution,
    thy blows, doubly redoubled,
    Fall amazing thunder casque
    thy adverse pernicious enemy.
    Rouse thy youthful blood, valiant, live.
  BOLINGBROKE. Mine innocence Saint George thrive!
  MOWBRAY. God fortune cast lot,
    lives dies, true King Richard's throne,
    loyal, just, upright gentleman.  
    captive freer heart
    Cast chains bondage, embrace
    golden uncontroll'd enfranchisement,
    dancing soul doth celebrate
    feast battle mine adversary.
    mighty liege, companion peers,
    mouth happy years.
    gentle jocund jest
    fight: truth hath quiet breast.
  KING RICHARD. Farewell, lord, securely espy
    Virtue valour couched thine eye.
    Order trial, Marshal, begin.
  MARSHAL. Harry Hereford, Lancaster, Derby,
    Receive thy lance; God defend right!
  BOLINGBROKE. Strong tower hope, cry amen.
  MARSHAL. [To officer] bear lance Thomas,
      Duke Norfolk.
  HERALD. Harry Hereford, Lancaster, Derby,
    Stands God, sovereign, himself,
    pain found false recreant,  
    prove Duke Norfolk, Thomas Mowbray,
    traitor God, King, him;
    dares set forward fight.
  HERALD. standeth Thomas Mowbray, Duke Norfolk,
    pain found false recreant,
    defend himself, approve
    Henry Hereford, Lancaster, Derby,
    God, sovereign, disloyal,
    Courageously free desire
    Attending signal begin.
  MARSHAL. Sound trumpets; set forward, combatants.
                                           [A charge sounded]
    Stay, King hath thrown warder down.
  KING RICHARD. lay helmets spears,
    return back chairs again.
    Withdraw us; trumpets sound
    return dukes decree.

    long flourish, KING consults Council
  
    Draw near,
    list council done.
    kingdom's earth soil'd
    dear blood hath fostered;
    eyes hate dire aspect
    civil wounds plough'd neighbours' sword;
    eagle-winged pride
    sky-aspiring ambitious thoughts,
    rival-hating envy, set you
    wake peace, country's cradle
    Draws sweet infant breath gentle sleep;
    rous'd boist'rous untun'd drums,
    harsh-resounding trumpets' dreadful bray,
    grating shock wrathful iron arms,
    quiet confines fright fair peace
    make wade kindred's blood-
    banish territories.
    You, cousin Hereford, pain life,
    Till summers enrich'd fields
    regreet fair dominions,  
    tread stranger paths banishment.
  BOLINGBROKE. done. comfort be-
    sun warms shine me,
    golden beams lent
    point gild banishment.
  KING RICHARD. Norfolk, thee remains heavier doom,
    unwillingness pronounce:
    sly slow hours determinate
    dateless limit thy dear exile;
    hopeless word 'never return'
    Breathe thee, pain life.
  MOWBRAY. heavy sentence, sovereign liege,
    unlook'd Highness' mouth.
    dearer merit, deep maim
    cast common air,
    deserved Highness' hands.
    language learnt forty years,
    native English, forgo;
    tongue's more
    unstringed viol harp;  
    cunning instrument cas'd up
    Or, open, put hands
    touch tune harmony.
    mouth engaol'd tongue,
    Doubly portcullis'd teeth lips;
    dull, unfeeling, barren ignorance
    made gaoler attend me.
    fawn nurse,
    years pupil now.
    thy sentence, then, speechless death,
    robs tongue breathing native breath?
  KING RICHARD. boots thee compassionate;
    sentence plaining late.
  MOWBRAY. turn countrv's light,
    dwell solemn shades endless night.
  KING RICHARD. Return again, oath thee.
    Lay royal sword banish'd hands;
    Swear duty owe God,
    part banish yourselves,
    oath administer:  
    shall, truth God,
    Embrace other's love banishment;
    other's face;
    write, regreet, reconcile
    louring tempest home-bred hate;
    advised purpose meet
    plot, contrive, complot ill,
    'Gainst us, state, subjects, land.
  BOLINGBROKE. swear.
  MOWBRAY. I, this.
  BOLINGBROKE. Norfolk, mine enemy.
    time, King permitted us,
    souls wand'red air,
    Banish'd frail sepulchre flesh,
    flesh banish'd land-
    Confess thy treasons ere thou fly realm;
    thou hast go, bear along
    clogging burden guilty soul.
  MOWBRAY. No, Bolingbroke; traitor,
    blotted book life,  
    heaven banish'd hence!
    thou art, God, thou, I, know;
    soon, fear, King rue.
    Farewell, liege. stray:
    Save back England, world's way.            Exit
  KING RICHARD. Uncle, glasses thine eyes
    thy grieved heart. Thy sad aspect
    Hath number banish'd years
    Pluck'd away. [To BOLINGBROKE] frozen winters spent,
    Return home banishment.
  BOLINGBROKE. long time lies word!
    lagging winters wanton springs
    End word: breath Kings.
  GAUNT. liege regard me
    shortens years son's exile;
    vantage reap thereby,
    ere years hath spend
    change moons bring times about,
    oil-dried lamp time-bewasted light
    extinct age endless night;  
    inch taper burnt done,
    blindfold death son.
  KING RICHARD. Why, uncle, thou hast years live.
  GAUNT. minute, King, thou canst give:
    Shorten days thou canst sullen sorrow
    pluck nights me, lend morrow;
    Thou can'st time furrow age,
    stop wrinkle pilgrimage;
    Thy word current death,
    dead, thy kingdom buy breath.
  KING RICHARD. Thy son banish'd good advice,
    Whereto thy tongue party-verdict gave.
    justice seem'st thou lour?
  GAUNT. Things sweet taste prove digestion sour.
    urg'd judge; rather
    bid argue father.
    O, stranger, child,
    smooth fault mild.
    partial slander sought avoid,
    sentence life destroy'd.  
    Alas, look'd say
    strict make mine away;
    gave leave unwilling tongue
    wrong.
  KING RICHARD. Cousin, farewell; and, uncle, bid so.
    years banish him, go.
                                  Flourish. Exit KING train
  AUMERLE. Cousin, farewell; presence know,
    remain paper show.
  MARSHAL. lord, leave I, ride
    land side.
  GAUNT. O, purpose dost thou hoard thy words,
    thou returnest greeting thy friends?
  BOLINGBROKE. leave you,
    tongue's office prodigal
    breathe abundant dolour heart.
  GAUNT. Thy grief thy absence time.
  BOLINGBROKE. Joy absent, grief present time.
  GAUNT. winters? quickly gone.
  BOLINGBROKE. men joy; grief makes hour ten.  
  GAUNT. Call travel thou tak'st pleasure.
  BOLINGBROKE. heart sigh miscall so,
    finds enforced pilgrimage.
  GAUNT. sullen passage thy weary steps
    Esteem foil thou art set
    precious jewel thy home return.
  BOLINGBROKE. Nay, rather, tedious stride make
    remember deal world
    wander jewels love.
    serve long apprenticehood
    foreign passages; end,
    freedom, boast else
    journeyman grief?
  GAUNT. places eye heaven visits
    wise man ports happy havens.
    Teach thy necessity reason thus:
    virtue necessity.
    King banish thee,
    thou King. Woe doth heavier sit
    perceives faintly home.  
    Go, thee purchase honour,
    King exil'd thee; suppose
    Devouring pestilence hangs air
    thou art flying fresher clime.
    thy soul holds dear, imagine it
    lie thou goest, thou com'st.
    Suppose singing birds musicians,
    grass whereon thou tread'st presence strew'd,
    flowers fair ladies, thy steps more
    delightful measure dance;
    gnarling sorrow hath power bite
    man mocks sets light.
  BOLINGBROKE. O, hold fire hand
    thinking frosty Caucasus?
    cloy hungry edge appetite
    bare imagination feast?
    wallow naked December snow
    thinking fantastic summer's heat?
    O, no! apprehension good
    greater feeling worse.  
    Fell sorrow's tooth doth rankle more
    bites, lanceth sore.
  GAUNT. Come, come, son, bring thee thy way.
    thy youtli cause, stay.
  BOLINGBROKE. Then, England's ground, farewell; sweet soil, adieu;
    mother, nurse, bears yet!
    Where'er wander, boast can:
    banish'd, trueborn English man.          Exeunt




SCENE 4.
London. court

Enter KING, BAGOT GREEN, door;
and DUKE AUMERLE another

  KING RICHARD. observe. Cousin Aumerle,
    brought high Hereford way?
  AUMERLE. brought high Hereford, call so,
    high way, left him.
  KING RICHARD. say, store parting tears shed?
  AUMERLE. Faith, me; north-east wind,
    blew bitterly faces,
    Awak'd sleeping rheum, chance
    grace hollow parting tear.
  KING RICHARD. cousin parted him?
  AUMERLE. 'Farewell.'
    And, heart disdained tongue
    profane word, taught craft
    counterfeit oppression grief
    words seem'd buried sorrow's grave.
    Marry, word 'farewell' length'ned hours  
    added years short banishment,
    volume farewells;
    not, me.
  KING RICHARD. cousin, cousin; 'tis doubt,
    time call home banishment,
    kinsman friends.
    Ourself, Bushy, Bagot here, Green,
    Observ'd courtship common people;
    dive hearts
    humble familiar courtesy;
    reverence throw slaves,
    Wooing poor craftsmen craft smiles
    patient underbearing fortune,
    'twere banish affects him.
    bonnet oyster-wench;
    brace draymen bid God speed well
    tribute supple knee,
    'Thanks, countrymen, loving friends';
    England reversion his,
    subjects' degree hope.  
  GREEN. Well, gone; thoughts!
    rebels stand Ireland,
    Expedient manage made, liege,
    Ere leisure yicld means
    advantage Highness' loss.
  KING RICHARD. ourself person war;
    And, coffers, great court
    liberal largess, grown light,
    enforc'd farm royal realm;
    revenue whereof furnish us
    affairs hand. short,
    substitutes home blank charters;
    Whereto, men rich,
    subscribe large sums gold,
    send supply wants;
    make Ireland presently.

                     Enter BUSHY

    Bushy, news?  
  BUSHY. John Gaunt grievous sick, lord,
    Suddenly taken; hath poste-haste
    entreat Majesty visit him.
  KING RICHARD. lies he?
  BUSHY. Ely House.
  KING RICHARD. put it, God, physician's mind
    grave immediately!
    lining coffers make coats
    deck soldiers Irish wars.
    Come, gentlemen, visit him.
    Pray God make haste, late!
  ALL. Amen.                                              Exeunt

ACT II. SCENE I.
London. Ely House

Enter JOHN GAUNT, sick, DUKE YORK, etc.

  GAUNT. King come, breathe last
    wholesome counsel unstaid youth?
  YORK. Vex yourself, strive breath;
    vain counsel ear.
  GAUNT. O, tongues dying men
    Enforce attention deep harmony.
    words scarce, seldom spent vain;
    breathe truth breathe words -in pain.
    listen'd more
    youth ease taught glose;
    men's ends mark'd lives before.
    setting sun, music close,
    taste sweets, sweetest last,
    Writ remembrance things long past.
    Richard life's counsel hear,
    death's sad tale undeaf ear.
  YORK. No; stopp'd flattering sounds,  
    praises, taste wise fond,
    Lascivious metres, venom sound
    open ear youth doth listen;
    Report fashions proud Italy,
    manners tardy apish nation
    Limps base imitation.
    doth world thrust vanity-
    new, respect vile-
    quickly buzz'd ears?
    late counsel heard
    doth mutiny wit's regard.
    Direct choose.
    'Tis breath thou lack'st, breath wilt thou lose.
  GAUNT. Methinks prophet inspir'd,
    expiring foretell him:
    rash fierce blaze riot last,
    violent fires burn themselves;
    Small showers long, sudden storms short;
    tires betimes spurs fast betimes;
    eager feeding food doth choke feeder;  
    Light vanity, insatiate cormorant,
    Consuming means, preys itself.
    royal throne kings, scept'red isle,
    earth majesty, seat Mars,
    Eden, demi-paradise,
    fortress built Nature herself
    infection hand war,
    happy breed men, world,
    precious stone set silver sea,
    serves office wall,
    moat defensive house,
    envy happier lands;
    blessed plot, earth, realm, England,
    nurse, teeming womb royal kings,
    Fear'd breed, famous birth,
    Renowned deeds home,
    Christian service true chivalry,
    sepulchre stubborn Jewry
    world's ransom, blessed Mary's Son;
    land dear souls, dear dear land,  
    Dear reputation world,
    leas'd out-I die pronouncing it-
    tenement pelting farm.
    England, bound triumphant sea,
    rocky shore beats back envious siege
    wat'ry Neptune, bound shame,
    inky blots rotten parchment bonds;
    England, wont conquer others,
    Hath made shameful conquest itself.
    Ah, scandal vanish life,
    happy ensuing death!

    Enter KING QUEEN, AUMERLE, BUSHY, GREEN, BAGOT,
                Ross, WILLOUGHBY

  YORK. King come; deal mildly youth,
    young hot colts rag'd rage more.
  QUEEN. fares noble uncle Lancaster?
  KING RICHARD. comfort, man? is't aged Gaunt?
  GAUNT. O, befits composition!  
    Gaunt, indeed; gaunt old.
    grief hath tedious fast;
    abstains meat gaunt?
    sleeping England long time watch'd;
    Watching breeds leanness, leanness gaunt.
    pleasure fathers feed upon
    strict fast-I children's looks;
    fasting, hast thou made gaunt.
    Gaunt grave, gaunt grave,
    hollow womb inherits nought bones.
  KING RICHARD. sick men play nicely names?
  GAUNT. No, misery makes sport mock itself:
    thou dost seek kill me,
    mock name, great king, flatter thee.
  KING RICHARD. dying men flatter live?
  GAUNT. No, no; men living flatter die.
  KING RICHARD. Thou, a-dying, sayest thou flatterest me.
  GAUNT. O, no! thou diest, sicker be.
  KING RICHARD. health, breathe, thee ill.
  GAUNT. made thee ill;  
    Ill see, thee ill.
    Thy death-bed lesser thy land
    thou liest reputation sick;
    thou, careless patient thou art,
    Commit'st thy anointed body cure
    physicians wounded thee:
    thousand flatterers sit thy crown,
    compass bigger thy head;
    yet, incaged small verge,
    waste whit lesser thy land.
    O, thy grandsire prophet's eye
    son's son destroy sons,
    thy reach laid thy shame,
    Deposing thee thou wert possess'd,
    art possess'd depose thyself.
    Why, cousin, wert thou regent world,
    shame land lease;
    thy world enjoying land,
    shame shame so?
    Landlord England art thou now, King.  
    Thy state law bondslave law;
    thou-
  KING RICHARD. lunatic lean-witted fool,
    Presuming ague's privilege,
    Darest thy frozen admonition
    Make pale cheek, chasing royal blood
    fury native residence.
    seat's royal majesty,
    Wert thou brother great Edward's son,
    tongue runs roundly thy head
    run thy head thy unreverent shoulders.
  GAUNT. O, Spare not, brother Edward's son,
    father Edward's son;
    blood already, pelican,
    Hast thou tapp'd out, drunkenly carous'd.
    brother Gloucester, plain well-meaning soul-
    fair befall heaven 'mongst happy souls!-
    precedent witness good
    thou respect'st spilling Edward's blood.
    Join present sickness have;  
    thy unkindness crooked age,
    crop long withered flower.
    Live thy shame, die shame thee!
    words thy tormentors be!
    Convey bed, grave.
    Love live love honour have.
                               Exit, borne attendants
  KING RICHARD. die age sullens have;
    hast thou, grave.
  YORK. beseech Majesty impute words
    wayward sickliness age him.
    loves you, life, holds dear
    Harry Duke Hereford, here.
  KING RICHARD. Right, true: Hereford's love, his;
    theirs, mine; is.

                Enter NORTHUMBERLAND

  NORTHUMBERLAND. liege, Gaunt commends Majesty.
  KING RICHARD. he?  
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Nay, nothing; said.
    tongue stringless instrument;
    Words, life, all, Lancaster hath spent.
  YORK. York bankrupt so!
    death poor, ends mortal woe.
  KING RICHARD. ripest fruit falls, doth he;
    time spent, pilgrimage be.
    that. Irish wars.
    supplant rough rug-headed kerns,
    live venom venom else
    privilege live.
    great affairs charge,
    assistance seize us
    plate, coin, revenues, moveables,
    Whereof uncle Gaunt stand possess'd.
  YORK. long patient? Ah, long
    tender duty make suffer wrong?
    Gloucester's death, Hereford's banishment,
    Gaunt's rebukes, England's private wrongs,
    prevention poor Bolingbroke  
    marriage, disgrace,
    made sour patient cheek
    bend wrinkle sovereign's face.
    noble Edward's sons,
    thy father, Prince Wales, first.
    war lion rag'd fierce,
    peace gentle lamb mild,
    young princely gentleman.
    face thou hast, look'd he,
    Accomplish'd number thy hours;
    frown'd, French
    friends. noble hand
    win spend, spent that
    triumphant father's hand won.
    hands guilty kindred blood,
    bloody enemies kin.
    O Richard! York grief,
    compare between-
  KING RICHARD. Why, uncle, matter?
  YORK. O liege,  
    Pardon me, please; not, I, pleas'd
    pardoned, content withal.
    Seek seize gripe hands
    royalties rights banish'd Hereford?
    Gaunt dead? doth Hereford live?
    Gaunt just? Harry true?
    deserve heir?
    heir well-deserving son?
    Hereford's rights away, Time
    charters customary rights;
    to-morrow ensue to-day;
    thyself-for art thou king
    fair sequence succession?
    Now, afore God-God forbid true!-
    wrongfully seize Hereford's rights,
    Call letters patents hath
    attorneys-general sue
    livery, deny off'red homage,
    pluck thousand dangers head,
    lose thousand well-disposed hearts,  
    prick tender patience thoughts
    honour allegiance think.
  KING RICHARD. will, seize hands
    plate, goods, money, lands.
  YORK. while. liege, farewell.
    ensue hereof tell;
    bad courses understood
    events fall good.              Exit
  KING RICHARD. Go, Bushy, Earl Wiltshire straight;
    Bid repair Ely House
    business. To-morrow next
    Ireland; 'tis time, trow.
    create, absence ourself,
    Uncle York Lord Governor England;
    just, lov'd well.
    on, queen; to-morrow part;
    merry, time stay short.
                   Flourish. Exeunt KING, QUEEN, BUSHY, AUMERLE,
                                                GREEN, BAGOT
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Well, lords, Duke Lancaster dead.  
    Ross. living too; son Duke.
  WILLOUGHBY. Barely title, revenues.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Richly both, justice right.
  ROSS. heart great; break silence,
    Ere't disburdened liberal tongue.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Nay, speak thy mind; ne'er speak more
    speaks thy words thee harm!
  WILLOUGHBY. thou wouldst speak Duke Hereford?
    so, boldly, man;
    Quick mine ear hear good him.
  ROSS. good him;
    call good pity him,
    Bereft gelded patrimony.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Now, afore God, 'tis shame wrongs borne
    him, royal prince, moe
    noble blood declining land.
    King himself, basely led
    flatterers; inform,
    hate, 'gainst an,
    King severely prosecute  
    'Gainst us, lives, children, heirs.
  ROSS. commons hath pill'd grievous taxes;
    lost hearts; nobles hath find
    ancient quarrels lost hearts.
  WILLOUGHBY. daily exactions devis'd,
    blanks, benevolences, wot what;
    what, God's name, doth this?
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Wars hath wasted it, warr'd hath not,
    basely yielded compromise
    noble ancestors achiev'd blows.
    hath spent peace wars.
  ROSS. Earl Wiltshire hath realm farm.
  WILLOUGHBY. King's grown bankrupt broken man.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Reproach dissolution hangeth him.
  ROSS. hath money Irish wars,
    burdenous taxations notwithstanding,
    robbing banish'd Duke.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. noble kinsman-most degenerate king!
    But, lords, hear fearful tempest sing,
    seek shelter avoid storm;  
    wind sit sore sails,
    strike not, securely perish.
  ROSS. wreck suffer;
    unavoided danger now
    suffering wreck.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. so; hollow eyes death
    spy life peering; dare say
    tidings comfort is.
  WILLOUGHBY. Nay, share thy thoughts thou dost ours.
  ROSS. confident speak, Northumberland.
    thyself, and, speaking so,
    Thy words thoughts; bold.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. thus: Le Port Blanc, bay
    Brittany, receiv'd intelligence
    Harry Duke Hereford, Rainold Lord Cobham,
    late broke Duke Exeter,
    brother, Archbishop late Canterbury,
    Sir Thomas Erpingham, Sir John Ramston,
    Sir John Norbery, Sir Robert Waterton, Francis Quoint-
    these, furnish'd Duke Britaine,  
    tall ships, thousand men war,
    making due expedience,
    shortly touch northern shore.
    ere this, stay
    departing King Ireland.
    shake slavish yoke,
    Imp drooping country's broken wing,
    Redeem broking pawn blemish'd crown,
    Wipe dust hides sceptre's gilt,
    make high majesty itself,
    post Ravenspurgh;
    faint, fearing so,
    Stay secret, go.
  ROSS. horse, horse! Urge doubts fear.
  WILLOUGHBY. Hold horse, there.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE 2.
Windsor Castle

Enter QUEEN, BUSHY, BAGOT

  BUSHY. Madam, Majesty sad.
    promis'd, parted King,
    lay life-harming heaviness
    entertain cheerful disposition.
  QUEEN. King, did; myself
    it; cause
    guest grief,
    Save bidding farewell sweet guest
    sweet Richard. methinks
    unborn sorrow, ripe fortune's womb,
    coming me, soul
    trembles. thing grieves
    parting lord King.
  BUSHY. substance grief hath twenty shadows,
    shows grief itself, so;
    sorrow's eye, glazed blinding tears,
    Divides thing entire objects,  
    perspectives which, rightly gaz'd upon,
    Show confusion-ey'd awry,
    Distinguish form. sweet Majesty,
    awry lord's departure,
    Find shapes grief wail;
    Which, look'd is, nought shadows
    not. Then, thrice-gracious Queen,
    lord's departure weep not-more seen;
    be, 'tis false sorrow's eye,
    things true weeps things imaginary.
  QUEEN. so; soul
    Persuades otherwise. Howe'er be,
    sad; heavy sad
    As-though, thinking, thought think-
    Makes heavy faint shrink.
  BUSHY. 'Tis conceit, gracious lady.
  QUEEN. 'Tis less: conceit deriv'd
    forefather grief; mine so,
    hath begot grief,
    hath grieve;  
    'Tis reversion possess-
    what,
    name; 'tis nameless woe, wot.

                   Enter GREEN

  GREEN. God save Majesty! met, gentlemen.
    hope King shipp'd Ireland.
  QUEEN. hopest thou so? 'Tis hope is;
    designs crave haste, haste good hope.
    wherefore dost thou hope shipp'd?
  GREEN. he, hope, retir'd power
    driven despair enemy's hope
    strongly hath set footing land.
    banish'd Bolingbroke repeals himself,
    uplifted arms safe arriv'd
    Ravenspurgh.
  QUEEN. God heaven forbid!
  GREEN. Ah, madam, 'tis true; worse,
    Lord Northumberland, son young Henry Percy,  
    Lords Ross, Beaumond, Willoughby,
    powerful friends, fled him.
  BUSHY. proclaim'd Northumberland
    rest revolted faction traitors?
  GREEN. have; Earl Worcester
    Hath broken staff, resign'd stewardship,
    household servants fled him
    Bolingbroke.
  QUEEN. So, Green, thou art midwife woe,
    Bolingbroke sorrow's dismal heir.
    hath soul brought prodigy;
    I, gasping new-deliver'd mother,
    woe woe, sorrow sorrow join'd.
  BUSHY. Despair not, madam.
  QUEEN. hinder me?
    despair, enmity
    cozening hope-he flatterer,
    parasite, keeper-back death,
    gently dissolve bands life,
    false hope lingers extremity.  

                    Enter YORK

  GREEN. Duke York.
  QUEEN. signs war aged neck.
    O, full careful business looks!
    Uncle, God's sake, speak comfortable words.
  YORK. so, belie thoughts.
    Comfort's heaven; earth,
    lives crosses, cares, grief.
    husband, save off,
    Whilst make lose home.
    left underprop land,
    Who, weak age, support myself.
    sick hour surfeit made;
    friends flatter'd him.

                   Enter SERVINGMAN

  SERVINGMAN. lord, son came.  
  YORK. was-why will!
    nobles fled, commons cold
    will, fear, revolt Hereford's side.
    Sirrah, thee Plashy, sister Gloucester;
    Bid send presently thousand pound.
    Hold, ring.
  SERVINGMAN. lord, forgot lordship,
    To-day, by, called there-
    grieve report rest.
  YORK. is't, knave?
  SERVINGMAN. hour came, Duchess died.
  YORK. God mercy! tide woes
    rushing woeful land once!
    do. God,
    untruth provok'd it,
    King cut head brother's.
    What, posts dispatch'd Ireland?
    money wars?
    Come, sister-cousin, say-pray, pardon me.
    Go, fellow, thee home, provide carts,  
    bring armour there.
                                                 Exit SERVINGMAN
    Gentlemen, muster men?
    order affairs
    disorderly thrust hands,
    me. kinsmen.
    T'one sovereign, oath
    duty bids defend; t'other again
    kinsman, King hath wrong'd,
    conscience kindred bids right.
    Well, do.-Come, cousin,
    dispose you. Gentlemen, muster men
    meet presently Berkeley.
    Plashy too,
    time permit. uneven,
    left seven.
                                           Exeunt YORK QUEEN
  BUSHY. wind sits fair news Ireland.
    returns. levy power
    Proportionable enemy  
    unpossible.
  GREEN. Besides, nearness King love
    hate love King.
  BAGOT. wavering commons; love
    Lies purses; whoso empties them,
    fills hearts deadly hate.
  BUSHY. King stands generally condemn'd.
  BAGOT. judgment lie them, we,
    King.
  GREEN. Well, refuge straight Bristow Castle.
    Earl Wiltshire there.
  BUSHY. Thither you; office
    hateful commons perform us,
    Eke curs tear pieces.
    us?
  BAGOT. No; Ireland Majesty.
    Farewell. heart's presages vain,
    part ne'er meet again.
  BUSHY. York thrives beat back Bolingbroke.
  GREEN. Alas, poor Duke! task undertakes  
    numb'ring sands drinking oceans dry.
    side fights, thousands fly.
    Farewell once-for once, all, ever.
  BUSHY. Well, meet again.
  BAGOT. fear me, never.                                Exeunt




SCENE 3.
Gloucestershire

Enter BOLINGBROKE NORTHUMBERLAND, forces

  BOLINGBROKE. it, lord, Berkeley now?
  NORTHUMBERLAND. me, noble lord,
    stranger Gloucestershire.
    high wild hills rough uneven ways
    Draws miles, makes wearisome;
    fair discourse hath sugar,
    Making hard sweet delectable.
    bethink weary way
    Ravenspurgh Cotswold found
    Ross Willoughby, wanting company,
    Which, protest, hath beguil'd
    tediousness process travel.
    sweet'ned hope have
    present benefit possess;
    hope joy joy
    hope enjoy'd. weary lords
    make short, mine hath  
    sight have, noble company.
  BOLINGBROKE. company
    good words. here?

                 Enter HARRY PERCY

  NORTHUMBERLAND. son, young Harry Percy,
    brother Worcester, whencesoever.
    Harry, fares uncle?
  PERCY. thought, lord, learn'd health you.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Why, Queen?
  PERCY. No, good lord; hath forsook court,
    Broken staff office, dispers'd
    household King.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. reason?
    resolv'd spake together.
  PERCY. lordship proclaimed traitor.
    he, lord, Ravenspurgh,
    offer service Duke Hereford;
    Berkeley, discover  
    power Duke York levied there;
    directions repair Ravenspurgh.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. forgot Duke Hereford, boy?
  PERCY. No, good lord; forgot
    ne'er remember; knowledge,
    life him.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. learn now; Duke.
  PERCY. gracious lord, tender service,
    is, tender, raw, young;
    elder days ripen, confirm
    approved service desert.
  BOLINGBROKE. thee, gentle Percy; sure
    count happy
    soul rememb'ring good friends;
    fortune ripens thy love,
    thy true love's recompense.
    heart covenant makes, hand seals it.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Berkeley? stir
    good York men war?
  PERCY. stands castle, yon tuft trees,  
    Mann'd hundred men, heard;
    Lords York, Berkeley, Seymour-
    noble estimate.

                  Enter Ross WILLOUGHBY

  NORTHUMBERLAND. Lords Ross Willoughby,
    Bloody spurring, fiery-red haste.
  BOLINGBROKE. Welcome, lords. wot love pursues
    banish'd traitor. treasury
    unfelt thanks, which, enrich'd,
    love labour's recompense.
  ROSS. presence makes rich, noble lord.
  WILLOUGHBY. surmounts labour attain it.
  BOLINGBROKE. Evermore thanks, exchequer poor;
    Which, till infant fortune years,
    Stands bounty. here?

                     Enter BERKELEY
  
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Lord Berkeley, guess.
  BERKELEY. Lord Hereford, message you.
  BOLINGBROKE. lord, answer is-'to Lancaster';
    seek England;
    find title tongue
    make reply aught say.
  BERKELEY. Mistake not, lord; 'tis meaning
    raze title honour out.
    you, lord, come-what lord will-
    gracious regent land,
    Duke York, pricks on
    advantage absent time,
    fright native peace self-borne arms.

                 Enter YORK, attended

  BOLINGBROKE. transport words you;
    Grace person. noble uncle!
                                                     [Kneels]
  YORK. Show thy humble heart, thy knee,  
    duty deceivable false.
  BOLINGBROKE. gracious uncle!-
  YORK. Tut, tut!
    Grace grace, uncle uncle.
    traitor's uncle; word 'grace'
    ungracious mouth profane.
    banish'd forbidden legs
    Dar'd touch dust England's ground?
    'why?'-why dar'd march
    miles peaceful bosom,
    Frighting pale-fac'd villages war
    ostentation despised arms?
    Com'st thou anointed King hence?
    Why, foolish boy, King left behind,
    loyal bosom lies power.
    lord hot youth
    brave Gaunt, thy father, myself
    Rescued Black Prince, young Mars men,
    ranks thousand French,
    O, quickly arm mine,  
    prisoner palsy, chastise the
    minister correction thy fault!
  BOLINGBROKE gracious uncle, fault;
    condition stands wherein?
  YORK. condition worst degree-
    gross rebellion detested treason.
    Thou art banish'd man, art come
    expiration thy time,
    braving arms thy sovereign.
  BOLINGBROKE. banish'd, banish'd Hereford;
    come, Lancaster.
    And, noble uncle, beseech Grace
    wrongs indifferent eye.
    father, methinks you
    Gaunt alive. O, then, father,
    permit stand condemn'd
    wandering vagabond; rights royalties
    Pluck'd arms perforce, away
    upstart unthrifts? Wherefore born?
    cousin king King England,  
    granted Duke Lancaster.
    son, Aumerle, noble cousin;
    died, trod down,
    found uncle Gaunt father
    rouse wrongs chase bay.
    denied sue livery here,
    letters patents give leave.
    father's goods distrain'd sold;
    amiss employ'd.
    do? subject,
    challenge law-attorneys denied me;
    personally lay claim
    inheritance free descent.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. noble Duke hath abused.
  ROSS. stands Grace right.
  WILLOUGHBY. Base men endowments made great.
  YORK. lords England, this:
    feeling cousin's wrongs,
    labour'd right;
    kind come, braving arms,  
    carver cut way,
    find wrong-it be;
    abet kind
    Cherish rebellion, rebels all.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. noble Duke hath sworn coming is
    own; that
    strongly sworn give aid;
    joy breaks oath!
  YORK. Well, well, issue arms.
    mend it, confess,
    power weak ill left;
    could, gave life,
    attach make stoop
    sovereign mercy King;
    cannot, you
    remain neuter. So, fare well;
    enter castle,
    repose night.
  BOLINGBROKE. offer, uncle, accept.
    win Grace  
    Bristow Castle, held
    Bushy, Bagot, complices,
    caterpillars commonwealth,
    sworn weed pluck away.
  YORK. you; pause,
    loath break country's laws.
    friends foes, are.
    Things past redress past care.        Exeunt




SCENE 4.
A camp Wales

Enter EARL SALISBURY WELSH CAPTAIN

  CAPTAIN. Lord Salisbury, stay'd ten days
    countrymen together,
    hear tidings King;
    disperse ourselves. Farewell.
  SALISBURY. Stay day, thou trusty Welshman;
    King reposeth confidence thee.
  CAPTAIN. 'Tis thought King dead; stay.
    bay trees country wither'd,
    meteors fright fixed stars heaven;
    pale-fac'd moon bloody earth,
    lean-look'd prophets whisper fearful change;
    Rich men sad, ruffians dance leap-
    fear lose enjoy,
    enjoy rage war.
    signs forerun death fall kings.
    Farewell. countrymen fled,
    assur'd Richard King dead.             Exit  
  SALISBURY. Ah, Richard, eyes heavy mind,
    thy glory shooting star
    Fall base earth firmament!
    sun sets weeping lowly west,
    Witnessing storms come, woe, unrest;
    Thy friends fled, wait thy foes;
    crossly thy good fortune goes.               Exit

ACT III. SCENE I.
BOLINGBROKE'S camp Bristol

Enter BOLINGBROKE, YORK, NORTHUMBERLAND, PERCY, ROSS, WILLOUGHBY,
BUSHY GREEN, prisoners

  BOLINGBROKE. Bring men.
    Bushy Green, vex souls-
    presently souls part bodies-
    urging pernicious lives,
    'twere charity; yet, wash blood
    hands, view men
    unfold deaths:
    misled prince, royal king,
    happy gentleman blood lineaments,
    unhappied disfigured clean;
    manner sinful hours
    Made divorce betwixt queen him;
    Broke possession royal bed,
    stain'd beauty fair queen's cheeks
    tears drawn eyes foul wrongs;
    Myself-a prince fortune birth,  
    King blood, love
    Till make misinterpret me-
    stoop'd neck injuries
    sigh'd English breath foreign clouds,
    Eating bitter bread banishment,
    Whilst fed signories,
    Dispark'd parks fell'd forest woods,
    windows torn household coat,
    Raz'd imprese, leaving sign
    Save men's opinions living blood
    show world gentleman.
    more, this,
    Condemns death. delivered over
    execution hand death.
  BUSHY. stroke death me
    Bolingbroke England. Lords, farewell.
  GREEN. comfort heaven souls,
    plague injustice pains hell.
  BOLINGBROKE. Lord Northumberland, dispatch'd.
           Exeunt NORTHUMBERLAND, others, prisoners  
    Uncle, Queen house;
    God's sake, fairly entreated.
    send kind commends;
    special care delivered.
  YORK. gentleman mine dispatch'd
    letters love large.
  BOLINGBROKE. Thanks, gentle uncle. Come, lords, away,
    fight Glendower complices.
    Awhile work, holiday.                    Exeunt




SCENE 2.
The coast Wales. castle view

Drums. Flourish colours. Enter KING, BISHOP CARLISLE,
AUMERLE, soldiers

  KING RICHARD. Barkloughly Castle hand?
  AUMERLE. Yea, lord. brooks Grace air
    late tossing breaking seas?
  KING RICHARD. well. weep joy
    stand kingdom again.
    Dear earth, salute thee hand,
    rebels wound thee horses' hoofs.
    long-parted mother child
    Plays fondly tears smiles meeting,
    weeping-smiling greet thee, earth,
    thee favours royal hands.
    Feed thy sovereign's foe, gentle earth,
    thy sweets comfort ravenous sense;
    thy spiders, suck thy venom,
    heavy-gaited toads, lie way,
    annoyance treacherous feet  
    usurping steps trample thee;
    Yield stinging nettles mine enemies;
    thy bosom pluck flower,
    Guard it, pray thee, lurking adder,
    double tongue mortal touch
    Throw death thy sovereign's enemies.
    Mock senseless conjuration, lords.
    earth feeling, stones
    Prove armed soldiers, ere native king
    falter foul rebellion's arms.
  CARLISLE. Fear not, lord; Power made king
    Hath power king spite all.
    means heaven yields embrac'd
    neglected; else, heaven would,
    not, heaven's offer refuse,
    proffered means succour redress.
  AUMERLE. means, lord, remiss;
    Whilst Bolingbroke, security,
    Grows strong great substance power.
  KING RICHARD. Discomfortable cousin! know'st thou  
    searching eye heaven hid,
    globe, lights lower world,
    thieves robbers range abroad unseen
    murders outrage boldly here;
    terrestrial ball
    fires proud tops eastern pines
    darts light guilty hole,
    murders, treasons, detested sins,
    cloak night pluck'd backs,
    Stand bare naked, trembling themselves?
    thief, traitor, Bolingbroke,
    hath revell'd night,
    Whilst wand'ring Antipodes,
    rising throne, east,
    treasons sit blushing face,
    endure sight day,
    self-affrighted tremble sin.
    water rough rude sea
    wash balm anointed king;
    breath worldly men depose  
    deputy elected Lord.
    man Bolingbroke hath press'd
    lift shrewd steel golden crown,
    God Richard hath heavenly pay
    glorious angel. Then, angels fight,
    Weak men fall; heaven guards right.

                 Enter SALISBURY

    Welcome, lord. lies power?
  SALISBURY. farther off, gracious lord,
    weak arm. Discomfort guides tongue,
    bids speak despair.
    day late, fear me, noble lord,
    Hath clouded thy happy days earth.
    O, call back yesterday, bid time return,
    thou shalt twelve thousand fighting men!
    To-day, to-day, unhappy day, late,
    O'erthrows thy joys, friends, fortune, thy state;
    Welshmen, hearing thou wert dead,  
    Bolingbroke, dispers'd, fled.
  AUMERLE. Comfort, liege, Grace pale?
  KING RICHARD. blood twenty thousand men
    triumph face, fled;
    And, till blood thither again,
    reason pale dead?
    souls safe, fly side;
    time hath set blot pride.
  AUMERLE. Comfort, liege; remember are.
  KING RICHARD. forgot myself; King?
    Awake, thou coward majesty! thou sleepest.
    King's twenty thousand names?
    Arm, arm, name! puny subject strikes
    thy great glory. ground,
    Ye favourites king; high?
    High thoughts. uncle York
    Hath power serve turn. here?

                   Enter SCROOP
  
  SCROOP. health happiness betide liege
    care-tun'd tongue deliver him.
  KING RICHARD. Mine ear open heart prepar'd.
    worst worldly loss thou canst unfold.
    Say, kingdom lost? Why, 'twas care,
    loss rid care?
    Strives Bolingbroke great we?
    Greater be; serve God,
    serve too, fellow so.
    Revolt subjects? mend;
    break faith God us.
    Cry woe, destruction, ruin, decay-
    worst death, death day.
  SCROOP. Glad Highness arm'd
    bear tidings calamity.
    unseasonable stormy day
    makes silver rivers drown shores,
    world dissolv'd tears,
    high limits swells rage
    Bolingbroke, covering fearful land  
    hard bright steel hearts harder steel.
    White-beards arm'd thin hairless scalps
    thy majesty; boys, women's voices,
    Strive speak big, clap female joints
    stiff unwieldy arms thy crown;
    Thy beadsmen learn bend bows
    double-fatal yew thy state;
    Yea, distaff-women manage rusty bills
    thy seat: young rebel,
    worse power tell.
  KING RICHARD. well, thou tell'st tale in.
    Earl Wiltshire? Bagot?
    Bushy? Green?
    dangerous enemy
    Measure confines peaceful steps?
    prevail, heads pay it.
    warrant made peace Bolingbroke.
  SCROOP. Peace made indeed, lord.
  KING RICHARD. O villains, vipers, damn'd redemption!
    Dogs, easily won fawn man!  
    Snakes, heart-blood warm'd, sting heart!
    Judases, thrice worse Judas!
    make peace? Terrible hell make war
    spotted souls offence!
  SCROOP. Sweet love, see, changing property,
    Turns sourest deadly hate.
    uncurse souls; peace made
    heads, hands; curse
    felt worst death's destroying wound
    lie full low, grav'd hollow ground.
  AUMERLE. Bushy, Green, Earl Wiltshire dead?
  SCROOP. Ay, Bristow lost heads.
  AUMERLE. Duke father power?
  KING RICHARD. matter where-of comfort man speak.
    talk graves, worms, epitaphs;
    Make dust paper, rainy eyes
    Write sorrow bosom earth.
    choose executors talk wills;
    so-for bequeath
    Save deposed bodies ground?  
    lands, lives, an, Bolingbroke's.
    death
    small model barren earth
    serves paste cover bones.
    God's sake sit ground
    sad stories death kings:
    depos'd, slain war,
    haunted ghosts depos'd,
    poison'd wives, sleeping kill'd,
    murder'd-for hollow crown
    rounds mortal temples king
    Death court; antic sits,
    Scoffing state grinning pomp;
    Allowing breath, scene,
    monarchize, fear'd, kill looks;
    Infusing vain conceit,
    flesh walls life
    brass impregnable; and, humour'd thus,
    last, pin
    Bores castle wall, farewell, king!  
    Cover heads, mock flesh blood
    solemn reverence; throw respect,
    Tradition, form, ceremonious duty;
    mistook while.
    live bread you, feel want,
    Taste grief, friends: subjected thus,
    king?
  CARLISLE. lord, wise men ne'er sit wail woes,
    presently prevent ways wail.
    fear foe, fear oppresseth strength,
    Gives, weakness, strength foe,
    follies fight yourself.
    Fear slain-no worse fight;
    fight die death destroying death,
    fearing dying pays death servile breath.
  AUMERLE. father hath power; inquire him,
    learn make body limb.
  KING RICHARD. Thou chid'st well. Proud Bolingbroke, come
    change blows thee day doom.
    ague fit fear over-blown;  
    easy task win own.
    Say, Scroop, lies uncle power?
    Speak sweetly, man, thy sour.
  SCROOP. Men judge complexion sky
    state inclination day;
    dull heavy eye,
    tongue hath heavier tale say.
    play torturer, small small
    lengthen worst spoken:
    uncle York join'd Bolingbroke;
    northern castles yielded up,
    southern gentlemen arms
    party.
  KING RICHARD. Thou hast enough.
      [To AUMERLE] Beshrew thee, cousin, didst lead forth
    sweet despair!
    now? comfort now?
    heaven, hate everlastingly
    bids comfort more.
    Flint Castle; pine away;  
    king, woe's slave, kingly woe obey.
    power have, discharge; go
    ear land hath hope grow,
    none. man speak again
    alter this, counsel vain.
  AUMERLE. liege, word.
  KING RICHARD. double wrong
    wounds flatteries tongue.
    Discharge followers; away,
    Richard's night Bolingbroke's fair day.       Exeunt




SCENE 3.
Wales. Flint Castle

Enter, drum colours, BOLINGBROKE, YORK, NORTHUMBERLAND,
and forces

  BOLINGBROKE. intelligence learn
    Welshmen dispers'd; Salisbury
    meet King, landed
    private friends coast.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. news fair good, lord.
    Richard hath hid head.
  YORK. beseem Lord Northumberland
    'King Richard.' Alack heavy day
    sacred king hide head!
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Grace mistakes; brief,
    Left title out.
  YORK. time hath been,
    him, would
    shorten you,
    taking head, head's length.
  BOLINGBROKE. Mistake not, uncle, should.  
  YORK. not, good cousin, should,
    mistake. heavens heads.
  BOLINGBROKE. it, uncle; oppose myself
    will. here?

                    Enter PERCY

    Welcome, Harry. What, castle yield?
  PIERCY. castle royally mann'd, lord,
    thy entrance.
  BOLINGBROKE. Royally!
    Why, king?
  PERCY. Yes, good lord,
    doth king; King Richard lies
    limits yon lime stone;
    Lord Aumerle, Lord Salisbury,
    Sir Stephen Scroop, clergyman
    holy reverence; who, learn.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. O, belike Bishop Carlisle.
  BOLINGBROKE. [To NORTHUMBERLAND] Noble lord,  
    rude ribs ancient castle;
    brazen trumpet send breath parley
    ruin'd ears, deliver:
    Henry Bolingbroke
    knees doth kiss King Richard's hand,
    sends allegiance true faith heart
    royal person; come
    feet lay arms power,
    Provided banishment repeal'd
    lands restor'd freely granted;
    not, advantage power
    lay summer's dust showers blood
    Rain'd wounds slaughtered Englishmen;
    mind Bolingbroke
    crimson tempest bedrench
    fresh green lap fair King Richard's land,
    stooping duty tenderly show.
    Go, signify much, march
    grassy carpet plain.
           [NORTHUMBERLAND advances Castle, trumpet]  
    march noise threat'ning drum,
    castle's tottered battlements
    fair appointments perus'd.
    Methinks King Richard meet
    terror elements
    fire water, thund'ring shock
    meeting tears cloudy cheeks heaven.
    fire, yielding water;
    rage his, whilst earth rain
    waters-on earth, him.
    March on, mark King Richard looks.

      Parle without, answer within; flourish.
      Enter walls, KING, BISHOP CARLISLE,
      AUMERLE, SCROOP, SALISBURY

    See, see, King Richard doth appear,
    doth blushing discontented sun
    fiery portal east,
    perceives envious clouds bent  
    dim glory stain track
    bright passage occident.
  YORK. king. Behold, eye,
    bright eagle's, lightens forth
    Controlling majesty. Alack, alack, woe,
    harm stain fair show!
  KING RICHARD. [To NORTHUMBERLAND] amaz'd; long
      stood
    watch fearful bending thy knee,
    thought ourself thy lawful King;
    be, dare thy joints forget
    pay awful duty presence?
    not, show hand God
    hath dismiss'd stewardship;
    hand blood bone
    gripe sacred handle sceptre,
    profane, steal, usurp.
    all, done,
    torn souls turning us,
    barren bereft friends,  
    know-my master, God omnipotent,
    mustering clouds behalf
    Armies pestilence; strike
    children unborn unbegot,
    lift vassal hands head
    threat glory precious crown.
    Bolingbroke, yon methinks stands,
    stride makes land
    dangerous treason; open
    purple testament bleeding war;
    ere crown live peace,
    Ten thousand bloody crowns mothers' sons
    ill flower England's face,
    Change complexion maid-pale peace
    scarlet indignation, bedew
    pastures' grass faithful English blood.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. King Heaven forbid lord King
    civil uncivil arms
    rush'd upon! Thy thrice noble cousin,
    Harry Bolingbroke, doth humbly kiss thy hand;  
    honourable tomb swears
    stands royal grandsire's bones,
    royalties bloods,
    Currents spring gracious head,
    buried hand warlike Gaunt,
    worth honour himself,
    Comprising sworn said,
    coming hath scope
    lineal royalties, beg
    Enfranchisement knees;
    thy royal party granted once,
    glittering arms commend rust,
    barbed steeds stables, heart
    faithful service Majesty.
    swears he, prince, just;
    gentleman credit him.
  KING RICHARD. Northumberland, King returns:
    noble cousin hither;
    number fair demands
    accomplish'd contradiction.  
    gracious utterance thou hast
    Speak gentle hearing kind commends.
    [To AUMERLE] debase ourselves, cousin, not,
    poorly speak fair?
    call back Northumberland, send
    Defiance traitor, die?
  AUMERLE. No, good lord; fight gentle words
    Till time lend friends, friends helpful swords.
  KING RICHARD. O God, O God! e'er tongue mine
    laid sentence dread banishment
    yon proud man again
    words sooth! O great
    grief, lesser name!
    forget been!
    remember now!
    Swell'st thou, proud heart? give thee scope beat,
    foes scope beat thee me.
  AUMERLE. Northumberland back Bolingbroke.
  KING RICHARD. King now? submit?
    King it. depos'd?  
    King contented. lose
    king? God's name, go.
    give jewels set beads,
    gorgeous palace hermitage,
    gay apparel almsman's gown,
    figur'd goblets dish wood,
    sceptre palmer's walking staff,
    subjects pair carved saints,
    large kingdom grave,
    grave, obscure grave-
    buried king's high way,
    common trade, subjects' feet
    hourly trample sovereign's head;
    heart tread whilst live,
    buried once, head?
    Aumerle, thou weep'st, tender-hearted cousin!
    make foul weather despised tears;
    sighs lodge summer corn
    make dearth revolting land.
    play wantons woes  
    make pretty match shedding tears?
    thus: drop place
    Till fretted pair graves
    earth; and, laid-there lies
    kinsmen digg'd graves weeping eyes.
    ill well? Well, well, see
    talk idly, laugh me.
    mighty prince, Lord Northumberland,
    King Bolingbroke? Majesty
    Give Richard leave live till Richard die?
    make leg, Bolingbroke ay.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. lord, base court doth attend
    speak you; down?
  KING RICHARD. Down, come, glist'ring Phaethon,
    Wanting manage unruly jades.
    base court? Base court, kings grow base,
    traitors' calls, grace.
    base court? down? Down, court! down, king!
    night-owls shriek mounting larks sing.
                                               Exeunt  
  BOLINGBROKE. Majesty?
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Sorrow grief heart
    Makes speak fondly, frantic man;
    come.

          Enter KING, attendants, below

  BOLINGBROKE. Stand apart,
    show fair duty Majesty.   [He kneels down]
    gracious lord-
  KING RICHARD. Fair cousin, debase princely knee
    make base earth proud kissing it.
    heart feel love
    unpleas'd eye courtesy.
    Up, cousin, up; heart up, know,
    [Touching head] high least, your
      knee low.
  BOLINGBROKE. gracious lord, mine own.
  KING RICHARD. yours, yours, all.
  BOLINGBROKE. mine, redoubted lord,  
    true service deserve love.
  KING RICHARD. deserve. deserve have
    strong'st surest get.
    Uncle, give hands; nay, dry eyes:
    Tears show love, remedies.
    Cousin, young father,
    heir.
    have, give, too;
    force do.
    Set London. Cousin, so?
  BOLINGBROKE. Yea, good lord.
  KING RICHARD. no.         Flourish. Exeunt




SCENE 4.
The DUKE YORK's garden

Enter QUEEN LADIES

  QUEEN. sport devise garden
    drive heavy thought care?
  LADY. Madam, play bowls.
  QUEEN. 'Twill make world full rubs
    fortune runs bias.
  LADY. Madam, dance.
  QUEEN. legs measure delight,
    poor heart measure grief;
    dancing, girl; sport.
  LADY. Madam, tales.
  QUEEN. sorrow joy?
  LADY. either, madam.
  QUEEN. neither, girl;
    joy, altogether wanting,
    doth remember sorrow;
    grief, altogether had,
    adds sorrow joy;  
    repeat,
    boots complain.
  LADY. Madam, sing.
  QUEEN. 'Tis well' thou hast cause;
    thou shouldst wouldst thou weep.
  LADY. weep, madam, good.
  QUEEN. sing, weeping good,
    borrow tear thee.

           Enter GARDENER SERVANTS

    stay, gardeners.
    step shadow trees.
    wretchedness row pins,
    talk state, doth so
    change: woe forerun woe.
                                       [QUEEN LADIES retire]
  GARDENER. Go, bind thou yon dangling apricocks,
    Which, unruly children, make sire
    Stoop oppression prodigal weight;  
    Give supportance bending twigs.
    thou, Eke executioner
    Cut heads fast growing sprays
    lofty commonwealth:
    government.
    employ'd, root away
    noisome weeds profit suck
    soil's fertility wholesome flowers.
  SERVANT. we, compass pale,
    law form due proportion,
    Showing, model, firm estate,
    sea-walled garden, land,
    full weeds; fairest flowers chok'd up,
    fruit trees unprun'd, hedges ruin'd,
    knots disordered, wholesome herbs
    Swarming caterpillars?
  GARDENER. Hold thy peace.
    hath suffer'd disorder'd spring
    Hath met fall leaf;
    weeds broad-spreading leaves shelter,  
    seem'd eating hold up,
    pluck'd root Bolingbroke-
    Earl Wiltshire, Bushy, Green.
  SERVANT. What, dead?
  GARDENER. are; Bolingbroke
    Hath seiz'd wasteful King. O, pity it
    trimm'd dress'd land
    garden! time year
    wound bark, skin fruit trees,
    Lest, over-proud sap blood,
    riches confound itself;
    great growing men,
    Ev'd bear, taste
    fruits duty. Superfluous branches
    lop away, bearing boughs live;
    so, home crown,
    waste idle hours hath thrown down.
  SERVANT. What, King deposed?
  GARDENER. Depress'd already, depos'd
    'Tis doubt be. Letters night  
    dear friend good Duke York's
    black tidings.
  QUEEN. O, press'd death speaking!
                                                [Coming forward]
    Thou, Adam's likeness, set dress garden,
    dares thy harsh rude tongue sound unpleasing news?
    Eve, serpent, hath suggested the
    make fall cursed man?
    dost thou King Richard depos'd?
    Dar'st thou, thou thing earth,
    Divine downfall? Say, where, when, how,
    Cam'st thou ill tidings? Speak, thou wretch.
  GARDENER. Pardon me, madam; joy have
    breathe news; true.
    King Richard, mighty hold
    Bolingbroke. fortunes weigh'd.
    lord's scale himself,
    vanities make light;
    balance great Bolingbroke,
    himself, English peers,  
    odds weighs King Richard down.
    Post London, find so;
    speak doth know.
  QUEEN. Nimble mischance, art light foot,
    Doth thy embassage belong me,
    it? O, thou thinkest
    serve last, longest keep
    Thy sorrow breast. Come, ladies, go
    meet London London's King woe.
    What, born this, sad look
    grace triumph great Bolingbroke?
    Gard'ner, telling news woe,
    Pray God plants thou graft'st grow!
                                         Exeunt QUEEN LADIES
  GARDENER. Poor Queen, thy state worse,
    skill subject thy curse.
    fall tear; place
    set bank rue, sour herb grace.
    Rue, ruth, shortly seen,
    remembrance weeping queen.                Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE 1.
Westminster Hall

Enter, Parliament, BOLINGBROKE, AUMERLE, NORTHUMBERLAND, PERCY,
FITZWATER, SURREY, BISHOP CARLISLE, ABBOT WESTMINSTER,
and others; HERALD, OFFICERS, BAGOT

  BOLINGBROKE. Call Bagot.
    Now, Bagot, freely speak thy mind-
    thou dost noble Gloucester's death;
    wrought King, perform'd
    bloody office timeless end.
  BAGOT. set face Lord Aumerle.
  BOLINGBROKE. Cousin, stand forth, man.
  BAGOT. Lord Aumerle, daring tongue
    Scorns unsay hath deliver'd.
    dead time Gloucester's death plotted
    heard 'Is arm length,
    reacheth restful English Court
    Calais, mine uncle's head?'
    talk time  
    heard refuse
    offer hundred thousand crowns
    Bolingbroke's return England;
    Adding withal, blest land be
    cousin's death.
  AUMERLE. Princes, noble lords,
    answer make base man?
    dishonour fair stars
    equal terms give chastisement?
    must, mine honour soil'd
    attainder slanderous lips.
    gage, manual seal death
    marks thee hell. thou liest,
    maintain thou hast false
    thy heart-blood, base
    stain temper knightly sword.
  BOLINGBROKE. Bagot, forbear; thou shalt up.
  AUMERLE. Excepting one, best
    presence hath mov'd so.
  FITZWATER. thy valour stand sympathy,  
    gage, Aumerle, gage thine.
    fair sun shows thou stand'st,
    heard thee say, vauntingly thou spak'st it,
    thou wert noble Gloucester's death.
    thou deniest twenty times, thou liest;
    turn thy falsehood thy heart,
    forged, rapier's point.
  AUMERLE. Thou dar'st not, coward, live day.
  FITZWATER. Now, soul, hour.
  AUMERLE. Fitzwater, thou art damn'd hell this.
  PERCY. Aumerle, thou liest; honour true
    appeal thou art unjust;
    thou art so, throw gage,
    prove thee extremest point
    mortal breathing. Seize it, thou dar'st.
  AUMERLE. not, hands rot of
    brandish revengeful steel
    glittering helmet foe!
  LORD. task earth like, forsworn Aumerle;
    spur thee fun lies  
    halloa'd thy treacherous ear
    sun sun. honour's pawn;
    Engage trial, thou darest.
  AUMERLE. sets else? heaven, throw all!
    thousand spirits breast
    answer twenty thousand you.
  SURREY. Lord Fitzwater, remember well
    time Aumerle talk.
  FITZWATER. 'Tis true; presence then,
    witness true.
  SURREY. false, heaven, heaven true.
  FITZWATER. Surrey, thou liest.
  SURREY. Dishonourable boy!
    lie lie heavy sword
    render vengeance revenge
    Till thou lie-giver lie he
    earth quiet thy father's skull.
    proof whereof, honour's pawn;
    Engage trial, thou dar'st.
  FITZWATER. fondly dost thou spur forward horse!  
    dare eat, drink, breathe, live,
    dare meet Surrey wilderness,
    spit whilst lies,
    lies, lies. bond faith,
    tie thee strong correction.
    intend thrive world,
    Aumerle guilty true appeal.
    Besides, heard banish'd Norfolk say
    thou, Aumerle, didst send thy men
    execute noble Duke Calais.
  AUMERLE. honest Christian trust gage
    Norfolk lies. throw this,
    repeal'd honour.
  BOLINGBROKE. differences rest gage
    Till Norfolk repeal'd-repeal'd be
    And, mine enemy, restor'd again
    lands signories. return'd,
    Aumerle enforce trial.
  CARLISLE. honourable day seen.
    time hath banish'd Norfolk fought  
    Jesu Christ glorious Christian field,
    Streaming ensign Christian cross
    black pagans, Turks, Saracens;
    And, toil'd works war, retir'd himself
    Italy; there, Venice, gave
    body pleasant country's earth,
    pure soul captain, Christ,
    colours fought long.
  BOLINGBROKE. Why, Bishop, Norfolk dead?
  CARLISLE. surely live, lord.
  BOLINGBROKE. Sweet peace conduct sweet soul bosom
    good Abraham! Lords appellants,
    differences rest gage
    Till assign days trial

                 Enter YORK, attended

  YORK. Great Duke Lancaster, the
    plume-pluck'd Richard, soul
    Adopts thee heir, high sceptre yields  
    possession thy royal hand.
    Ascend throne, descending him-
    long live Henry, fourth name!
  BOLINGBROKE. God's name, ascend regal throne.
  CARLISLE. Marry, God forbid!
    Worst royal presence speak,
    beseeming speak truth.
    God noble presence
    noble upright judge
    noble Richard! true noblesse would
    Learn forbearance foul wrong.
    subject give sentence king?
    sits Richard's subject?
    Thieves judg'd hear,
    apparent guilt them;
    figure God's majesty,
    captain, steward, deputy elect,
    Anointed, crowned, planted years,
    judg'd subject inferior breath,
    present? O, forfend it, God,  
    Christian climate souls refin'd
    show heinous, black, obscene deed!
    speak subjects, subject speaks,
    Stirr'd God, boldly king.
    Lord Hereford here, call king,
    foul traitor proud Hereford's king;
    crown him, prophesy-
    blood English manure ground,
    future ages groan foul act;
    Peace sleep Turks infidels,
    seat peace tumultuous wars
    kin kin kind kind confound;
    Disorder, horror, fear, mutiny,
    inhabit, land call'd
    field Golgotha dead men's skulls.
    O, raise house house,
    woefullest division prove
    fell cursed earth.
    Prevent it, resist it, so,
    child, child's children, cry woe.  
  NORTHUMBERLAND. argued, sir; and, pains,
    capital treason arrest here.
    Lord Westminster, charge
    safely till day trial.
    you, lords, grant commons' suit?
  BOLINGBROKE. Fetch Richard, common view
    surrender; proceed
    suspicion.
  YORK. conduct.                              Exit
  BOLINGBROKE. Lords, arrest,
    Procure sureties days answer.
    beholding love,
    look'd helping hands.

      Re-enter YORK, KING RICHARD, OFFICERS
                bearing regalia

  KING RICHARD. Alack, king,
    shook regal thoughts
    Wherewith reign'd? learn'd  
    insinuate, flatter, bow, bend knee.
    Give sorrow leave awhile tutor me
    submission. remember
    favours men. mine?
    cry 'All hail!' me?
    Judas Christ; he, twelve,
    Found truth one; I, twelve thousand, none.
    God save King! man amen?
    priest clerk? then, amen.
    God save King! he;
    yet, amen, heaven me.
    service hither?
  YORK. office thine good will
    tired majesty make thee offer-
    resignation thy state crown
    Henry Bolingbroke.
  KING RICHARD. Give crown. Here, cousin, seize crown.
    Here, cousin,
    side hand, side thine.
    golden crown deep  
    owes buckets, filling another;
    emptier dancing air,
    down, unseen, full water.
    bucket fun tears I,
    Drinking griefs, whilst mount high.
  BOLINGBROKE. thought resign.
  KING RICHARD. crown am; griefs mine.
    glories state depose,
    griefs; king those.
  BOLINGBROKE. Part cares give crown.
  KING RICHARD. cares set pluck cares down.
    care loss care, care done;
    care gain care, care won.
    cares give have, away;
    tend crown, stay.
  BOLINGBROKE. contented resign crown?
  KING RICHARD. Ay, no; no, ay; be;
    no, resign thee.
    mark undo myself:
    give heavy weight head,  
    unwieldy sceptre hand,
    pride kingly sway heart;
    mine tears wash balm,
    mine hands give crown,
    mine tongue deny sacred state,
    mine breath release duteous oaths;
    pomp majesty forswear;
    manors, rents, revenues, forgo;
    acts, decrees, statutes, deny.
    God pardon oaths broke me!
    God vows unbroke made thee!
    Make me, have, griev'd,
    thou pleas'd, hast achiev'd.
    Long mayst thou live Richard's seat sit,
    lie Richard earthly pit.
    God save King Henry, unking'd Richard says,
    send years sunshine days!
    remains?
  NORTHUMBERLAND. more; read
    accusations, grievous crimes  
    Committed person followers
    state profit land;
    That, confessing them, souls men
    deem worthily depos'd.
  KING RICHARD. so? ravel out
    weav'd-up follies? Gentle Northumberland,
    thy offences record,
    shame thee fair troop
    read lecture them? thou wouldst,
    shouldst thou find heinous article,
    deposing king
    cracking strong warrant oath,
    Mark'd blot, damn'd book heaven.
    Nay, stand me
    Whilst wretchedness doth bait myself,
    you, Pilate, wash hands,
    Showing outward pity-yet Pilates
    deliver'd sour cross,
    water wash sin.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. lord, dispatch; read o'er  
    articles.
  KING RICHARD. Mine eyes full tears; see.
    salt water blinds much
    sort traitors here.
    Nay, turn mine eyes myself,
    find traitor rest;
    soul's consent
    T'undeck pompous body king;
    Made glory base, sovereignty slave,
    Proud majesty subject, state peasant.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. lord-
  KING RICHARD. lord thine, thou haught insulting man,
    man's lord; name, tide-
    No, font-
    'tis usurp'd. Alack heavy day,
    worn winters out,
    call myself!
    O mockery king snow,
    Standing sun Bolingbroke
    melt water drops!  
    Good king, great king, greatly good,
    word sterling England,
    command mirror straight,
    show face have
    bankrupt majesty.
  BOLINGBROKE. fetch looking-glass.
                                               Exit attendant
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Read o'er paper glass doth come.
  KING RICHARD. Fiend, thou torments ere hell.
  BOLINGBROKE. Urge more, Lord Northumberland.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. Commons not, then, satisfied.
  KING RICHARD. satisfied. read enough,
    book indeed
    sins writ, myself.

                Re-enter attendant glass

    Give glass, read.
    deeper wrinkles yet? Hath sorrow struck
    blows face mine  
    made deeper wounds? O flatt'ring glass,
    followers prosperity,
    Thou dost beguile me! face face
    day household roof
    ten thousand men? face
    sun make beholders wink?
    face fac'd follies
    out-fac'd Bolingbroke?
    brittle glory shineth face;
    brittle glory face;
                        [Dashes glass ground]
    is, crack'd hundred shivers.
    Mark, silent king, moral sport-
    sorrow hath destroy'd face.
  BOLINGBROKE. shadow sorrow hath destroy'd
    shadow face.
  KING RICHARD. again.
    shadow sorrow? Ha! see.
    'Tis true: grief lies within;
    external manner laments  
    shadows unseen grief
    swells silence tortur'd soul.
    lies substance; thee, king,
    thy great bounty, giv'st
    wail, teachest way
    lament cause. beg boon,
    trouble more.
    obtain it?
  BOLINGBROKE. it, fair cousin.
  KING RICHARD. Fair cousin! greater king;
    king, flatterers
    subjects; subject,
    king flatterer.
    great, beg.
  BOLINGBROKE. ask.
  KING RICHARD. have?
  BOLINGBROKE. shall.
  KING RICHARD. give leave go.
  BOLINGBROKE. Whither?
  KING RICHARD. will, sights.  
  BOLINGBROKE. Go, convey Tower.
  KING RICHARD. O, good! Convey! Conveyers all,
    rise nimbly true king's fall.
                     Exeunt KING RICHARD, Lords Guard
  BOLINGBROKE. Wednesday solemnly set down
    coronation. Lords, prepare yourselves.
                    Exeunt ABBOT WESTMINSTER, the
                                 BISHOP CARLISLE, AUMERLE
  ABBOT. woeful pageant beheld.
  CARLISLE. woe's come; children unborn
    feel day sharp thorn.
  AUMERLE. holy clergymen, plot
    rid realm pernicious blot?
  ABBOT. lord,
    freely speak mind herein,
    sacrament
    bury mine intents, effect
    happen devise.
    brows full discontent,
    hearts sorrow, eyes tears.  
    home supper; lay
    plot show merry day.                 Exeunt
