ACT V. SCENE 1.
London. street leading Tower

Enter QUEEN, attendants

  QUEEN. King come; way
    Julius Caesar's ill-erected tower,
    flint bosom condemned lord
    doom'd prisoner proud Bolingbroke.
    rest, rebellious earth
    resting true King's queen.

            Enter KING RICHARD Guard

    soft, see, see,
    fair rose wither. up, behold,
    pity dissolve dew,
    wash fresh true-love tears.
    Ah, thou, model Troy stand;
    Thou map honour, thou King Richard's tomb,
    King Richard; thou beauteous inn,
    hard-favour'd grief lodg'd thee,  
    triumph alehouse guest?
  KING RICHARD. Join grief, fair woman, so,
    make end sudden. Learn, good soul,
    state happy dream;
    awak'd, truth are
    Shows this: sworn brother, sweet,
    grim Necessity; and
    league till death. Hie thee France,
    cloister thee religious house.
    holy lives win world's crown,
    profane hours thrown down.
  QUEEN. What, Richard shape mind
    Transform'd weak'ned? Hath Bolingbroke depos'd
    Thine intellect? Hath thy heart?
    lion dying thrusteth paw
    wounds earth, else, rage
    o'erpow'r'd; wilt thou, pupil-like,
    correction mildly, kiss rod,
    fawn rage base humility,
    art lion king beasts?  
  KING RICHARD. king beasts, indeed! aught beasts,
    happy king men.
    Good queen, prepare thee France.
    dead, thou takest,
    death-bed, thy living leave.
    winter's tedious nights sit fire
    good folks, thee tales
    woeful ages long ago betid;
    ere thou bid good night, quit griefs
    thou lamentable tale me,
    send hearers weeping beds;
    why, senseless brands sympathize
    heavy accent thy moving tongue,
    compassion weep fire out;
    mourn ashes, coal-black,
    deposing rightful king.

             Enter NORTHUMBERLAND attended

  NORTHUMBERLAND. lord, mind Bolingbroke chang'd;  
    Pomfret, Tower.
    And, madam, order ta'en you:
    swift speed France.
  KING RICHARD. Northumberland, thou ladder wherewithal
    mounting Bolingbroke ascends throne,
    time hours age
    is, ere foul sin gathering head
    break corruption. Thou shalt think
    divide realm give thee half
    little, helping all;
    thou, knowest way
    plant unrightful kings, wilt again,
    ne'er urg'd, way
    pluck headlong usurped throne.
    love wicked men converts fear;
    fear hate; hate turns both
    worthy danger deserved death.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. guilt head, end.
    leave, part; part forthwith.
  KING RICHARD. Doubly divorc'd! Bad men, violate  
    twofold marriage-'twixt crown me,
    betwixt married wife.
    unkiss oath 'twixt thee me;
    so, kiss 'twas made.
    Part us, Northumberland; north,
    shivering cold sickness pines clime;
    wife France, set pomp,
    adorned sweet May,
    back Hallowmas short'st day.
  QUEEN. divided? part?
  KING RICHARD. Ay, hand hand, love, heart heart.
  QUEEN. Banish both, send King me.
  NORTHUMBERLAND. love, policy.
  QUEEN. thither go.
  KING RICHARD. two, weeping, make woe.
    Weep thou France, thee here;
    near, ne'er near.
    Go, count thy sighs; mine groans.
  QUEEN. longest longest moans.
  KING RICHARD. step groan, short,  
    piece heavy heart.
    Come, come, wooing sorrow brief,
    Since, wedding it, length grief.
    kiss stop mouths, dumbly part;
    give mine, thy heart.
  QUEEN. Give mine again; 'twere good part
    kill thy heart.
    So, mine again, gone.
    strive kill groan.
  KING RICHARD. make woe wanton fond delay.
    more, adieu; rest sorrow say.            Exeunt




SCENE 2.
The DUKE YORK's palace

Enter DUKE YORK DUCHESS

  DUCHESS. Lord, told rest,
    weeping made break story off,
    cousins' coming London.
  YORK. leave?
  DUCHESS. sad stop, lord,
    rude misgoverned hands windows' tops
    Threw dust rubbish King Richard's head.
  YORK. Then, said, Duke, great Bolingbroke,
    Mounted hot fiery steed
    aspiring rider seem'd know,
    slow stately pace course,
    Whilst tongues cried 'God save thee, Bolingbroke!'
    thought windows spake,
    greedy young old
    casements darted desiring eyes
    visage; walls
    painted imagery  
    'Jesu preserve thee! Welcome, Bolingbroke!'
    Whilst he, side turning,
    Bareheaded, lower proud steed's neck,
    Bespake thus, 'I you, countrymen.'
    doing, pass'd along.
  DUCHESS. Alack, poor Richard! rode whilst?
  YORK. theatre eyes men
    well-grac'd actor leaves stage
    idly bent enters next,
    Thinking prattle tedious;
    so, contempt, men's eyes
    scowl gentle Richard; man cried 'God save him!'
    joyful tongue gave home;
    dust thrown sacred head;
    gentle sorrow shook off,
    face combating tears smiles,
    badges grief patience,
    God, strong purpose, steel'd
    hearts men, perforce melted,
    barbarism pitied him.  
    heaven hath hand events,
    high bound calm contents.
    Bolingbroke sworn subjects now,
    state honour aye allow.
  DUCHESS. son Aumerle.
  YORK. Aumerle was
    lost Richard's friend,
    madam, call Rudand now.
    Parliament pledge truth
    lasting fealty new-made king.

                  Enter AUMERLE

  DUCHESS. Welcome, son. violets now
    strew green lap spring?
  AUMERLE. Madam, not, greatly care not.
    God lief one.
  YORK. Well, bear spring time,
    cropp'd prime.
    news Oxford? justs triumphs hold?  
  AUMERLE. aught know, lord, do.
  YORK. there, know.
  AUMERLE. God prevent not, purpose so.
  YORK. seal thy bosom?
    Yea, look'st thou pale? writing.
  AUMERLE. lord, 'tis nothing.
  YORK. matter, then, it.
    satisfied; writing.
  AUMERLE. beseech Grace pardon me;
    matter small consequence
    reasons seen.
  YORK. reasons, sir, see.
    fear, fear-
  DUCHESS. fear?
    'Tis bond ent'red into
    gay apparel 'gainst triumph-day.
  YORK. Bound himself! doth bond
    bound to? Wife, thou art fool.
    Boy, writing.
  AUMERLE. beseech you, pardon me; show it.  
  YORK. satisfied; it, say.
                [He plucks bosom, reads it]
    Treason, foul treason! Villain! traitor! slave!
  DUCHESS. matter, lord?
  YORK. Ho! there?

                    Enter servant

    Saddle horse.
    God mercy, treachery here!
  DUCHESS. Why, York, it, lord?
  YORK. Give boots, say; saddle horse.
                                                    Exit servant
    Now, mine honour, life, troth,
    appeach villain.
  DUCHESS. matter?
  YORK. Peace, foolish woman.
  DUCHESS. peace. matter, Aumerle?
  AUMERLE. Good mother, content; more
    poor life answer.  
  DUCHESS. Thy life answer!
  YORK. Bring boots. King.

              man enters boots

  DUCHESS. Strike him, Aumerle. Poor boy, thou art amaz'd.
    Hence, villain! sight.
  YORK. Give boots, say.
  DUCHESS. Why, York, wilt thou do?
    Wilt thou hide trespass thine own?
    sons? have?
    teeming date drunk time?
    wilt thou pluck fair son mine age
    rob happy mother's name?
    thee? thine own?
  YORK. Thou fond mad woman,
    Wilt thou conceal dark conspiracy?
    dozen ta'en sacrament,
    interchangeably set hands
    kill King Oxford.  
  DUCHESS. none;
    here. him?
  YORK. Away, fond woman! twenty times son
    appeach him.
  DUCHESS. Hadst thou groan'd him
    done, thou wouldst pitiful.
    thy mind: thou dost suspect
    disloyal thy bed
    bastard, thy son.
    Sweet York, sweet husband, mind.
    thee man be
    me, kin,
    love him.
  YORK. Make way, unruly woman!                             Exit
  DUCHESS. After, Aumerle! Mount thee horse;
    Spur post, King,
    beg thy pardon ere accuse thee.
    long behind; old,
    doubt ride fast York;
    rise ground  
    Till Bolingbroke pardon'd thee. Away, gone.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE 3.
Windsor Castle

Enter BOLINGBROKE King, PERCY, LORDS

  BOLINGBROKE. man unthrifty son?
    'Tis full months last.
    plague hang us, 'tis he.
    God, lords, found.
    Inquire London, 'mongst taverns there,
    there, say, daily doth frequent
    unrestrained loose companions,
    such, say, stand narrow lanes
    beat watch rob passengers,
    he, young wanton effeminate boy,
    Takes point honour support
    dissolute crew.
  PERCY. lord, days Prince,
    told triumphs held Oxford.
  BOLINGBROKE. gallant?
  PERCY. answer was, stews,
    common'st creature pluck glove  
    wear favour; that
    unhorse lustiest challenger.
  BOLINGBROKE. dissolute desperate; both
    sparks hope, elder years
    happily bring forth. here?

                Enter AUMERLE amazed

  AUMERLE. King?
  BOLINGBROKE. means cousin stares looks
    wildly?
  AUMERLE. God save Grace! beseech Majesty,
    conference Grace alone.
  BOLINGBROKE. Withdraw yourselves, leave alone.
                                          Exeunt PERCY LORDS
    matter cousin now?
  AUMERLE. knees grow earth,
                                                    [Kneels]
    tongue cleave roof mouth,
    pardon ere rise speak.  
  BOLINGBROKE. Intended committed fault?
    first, heinous e'er be,
    win thy after-love pardon thee.
  AUMERLE. give leave turn key,
    man enter till tale done.
  BOLINGBROKE. thy desire.
            [The DUKE YORK knocks door crieth]
  YORK. [Within] liege, beware; thyself;
    Thou hast traitor thy presence there.
  BOLINGBROKE. [Drawing] Villain, make thee safe.
  AUMERLE. Stay thy revengeful hand; thou hast fear.
  YORK. [Within] Open door, secure, foolhardy King.
    I, love, speak treason thy face?
    Open door, break open.

                    Enter YORK

  BOLINGBROKE. matter, uncle? Speak;
    Recover breath; danger,
    arm encounter it.
  YORK. Peruse writing here, thou shalt  
    treason haste forbids show.
  AUMERLE. Remember, thou read'st, thy promise pass'd.
    repent me; read there;
    heart confederate hand.
  YORK. was, villain, ere thy hand set down.
    tore traitor's bosom, King;
    Fear, love, begets penitence.
    Forget pity him, thy pity prove
    serpent sting thee heart.
  BOLINGBROKE. O heinous, strong, bold conspiracy!
    O loyal father treacherous son!
    Thou sheer, immaculate, silver fountain,
    stream muddy passages
    Hath held current defil'd himself!
    Thy overflow good converts bad;
    thy abundant goodness excuse
    deadly blot thy digressing son.
  YORK. virtue vice's bawd;
    spend mine honour shame,
    thriftless sons scraping fathers' gold.  
    Mine honour lives dishonour dies,
    sham'd life dishonour lies.
    Thou kill'st life; giving breath,
    traitor lives, true man's put death.
  DUCHESS. [Within] ho, liege, God's sake, in.
  BOLINGBROKE. shrill-voic'd suppliant makes eager cry?
  DUCHESS. [Within] woman, thine aunt, great King; 'tis I.
    Speak me, pity me, open door.
    beggar begs begg'd before.
  BOLINGBROKE. scene alt'red thing,
    chang'd 'The Beggar King.'
    dangerous cousin, mother in.
    pray foul sin.
  YORK. thou pardon whosoever pray,
    sins forgiveness prosper may.
    fest'red joint cut off, rest rest sound;
    rest confound.

                 Enter DUCHESS
  
  DUCHESS. O King, hard-hearted man!
    Love loving itself, can.
  YORK. Thou frantic woman, dost thou make here?
    thy dugs traitor rear?
  DUCHESS. Sweet York, patient. Hear me, gentle liege.
                                                     [Kneels]
  BOLINGBROKE. Rise up, good aunt.
  DUCHESS. yet, thee beseech.
    walk knees,
    day happy sees
    Till thou give joy; thou bid joy
    pardoning Rutland, transgressing boy.
  AUMERLE. mother's prayers bend knee.
                                                     [Kneels]
  YORK. both, true joints bended be.
                                                     [Kneels]
    Ill mayst thou thrive, thou grant grace!
  DUCHESS. Pleads earnest? face;
    eyes drop tears, prayers jest;
    words mouth, breast.  
    prays faintly denied;
    pray heart soul, beside.
    weary joints gladly rise, know;
    knees kneel till ground grow.
    prayers full false hypocrisy;
    true zeal deep integrity.
    prayers out-pray his; have
    mercy true prayer have.
  BOLINGBROKE. Good aunt, stand up.
  DUCHESS. 'stand up';
    'pardon' first, 'stand up.'
    thy nurse, thy tongue teach,
    'Pardon' word thy speech.
    long'd hear word till now;
    'pardon,' King; pity teach thee how.
    word short, short sweet;
    word 'pardon' kings' mouths meet.
  YORK. Speak French, King, 'pardonne moy.'
  DUCHESS. Dost thou teach pardon pardon destroy?
    Ah, sour husband, hard-hearted lord,  
    sets word word!
    Speak 'pardon' 'tis current land;
    chopping French understand.
    Thine eye begins speak, set thy tongue there;
    thy piteous heart plant thou thine ear,
    hearing plaints prayers pierce,
    Pity move thee 'pardon' rehearse.
  BOLINGBROKE. Good aunt, stand up.
  DUCHESS. sue stand;
    Pardon suit hand.
  BOLINGBROKE. pardon him, God pardon me.
  DUCHESS. O happy vantage kneeling knee!
    sick fear. Speak again.
    'pardon' doth pardon twain,
    makes pardon strong.
  BOLINGBROKE. heart
    pardon him.
  DUCHESS. god earth thou art.
  BOLINGBROKE. trusty brother-in-law Abbot,
    rest consorted crew,  
    Destruction straight dog heels.
    Good uncle, order powers
    Oxford, where'er traitors are.
    live world, swear,
    them, where.
    Uncle, farewell; and, cousin, adieu;
    mother hath pray'd, prove true.
  DUCHESS. Come, son; pray God make thee new.      Exeunt




SCENE 4.
Windsor Castle

Enter SIR PIERCE EXTON servant

  EXTON. Didst thou mark King, words spake?
    'Have friend rid living fear?'
    so?
  SERVANT. words.
  EXTON. 'Have friend?' quoth he. spake twice
    urg'd together, not?
  SERVANT. did.
  EXTON. And, speaking it, wishtly look'd me,
    'I thou wert man
    divorce terror heart';
    Meaning King Pomfret. Come, go.
    King's friend, rid foe.         Exeunt




SCENE 5.
Pomfret Castle. dungeon Castle

Enter KING RICHARD

  KING RICHARD. studying compare
    prison live world
    And, world populous
    creature myself,
    it. hammer out.
    brain prove female soul,
    soul father; beget
    generation still-breeding thoughts,
    thoughts people world,
    humours people world,
    thought contented. sort,
    thoughts things divine, intermix'd
    scruples, set word itself
    word,
    thus: 'Come, ones'; again,
    'It hard camel
    thread postern small needle's eye.'  
    Thoughts tending ambition, plot
    wonders: vain weak nails
    tear passage flinty ribs
    hard world, ragged prison walls;
    And, cannot, die pride.
    Thoughts tending content flatter themselves
    fortune's slaves,
    last; silly beggars
    Who, sitting stocks, refuge shame,
    sit there;
    thought find kind ease,
    Bearing misfortunes back
    endur'd like.
    play person people,
    contented. king;
    treasons make beggar,
    am. crushing penury
    Persuades king;
    king'd again; by
    unking'd Bolingbroke,  
    straight nothing. whate'er be,
    I, man man is,
    pleas'd till eas'd
    nothing.                    [The music plays]
    Music hear?
    Ha, ha! time. sour sweet music is
    time broke proportion kept!
    music men's lives.
    daintiness ear
    check time broke disorder'd string;
    But, concord state time,
    ear hear true time broke.
    wasted time, doth time waste me;
    hath time made numb'ring clock:
    thoughts minutes; sighs jar
    watches mine eyes, outward watch,
    Whereto finger, dial's point,
    pointing still, cleansing tears.
    sir, sound tells hour is
    clamorous groans strike heart,  
    bell. sighs, tears, groans,
    Show minutes, times, hours; time
    Runs posting Bolingbroke's proud joy,
    stand fooling here, Jack clock.
    music mads me. sound more;
    holp madmen wits,
    make wise men mad.
    blessing heart me!
    'tis sign love; love Richard
    strange brooch all-hating world.

              Enter GROOM stable

  GROOM. Hail, royal Prince!
  KING RICHARD. Thanks, noble peer!
    cheapest ten groats dear.
    art thou? comest thou hither,
    man sad dog
    brings food make misfortune live?
  GROOM. poor groom thy stable, King,  
    thou wert king; who, travelling York,
    ado length leave
    royal master's face.
    O, ern'd heart, beheld,
    London streets, coronation-day,
    Bolingbroke rode roan Barbary-
    horse thou hast bestrid,
    horse carefully dress'd!
  KING RICHARD. Rode Barbary? me, gentle friend,
    him?
  GROOM. proudly disdain'd ground.
  KING RICHARD. proud Bolingbroke back!
    jade hath eat bread royal hand;
    hand hath made proud clapping him.
    stumble? fall down,
    pride fall, break neck
    proud man usurp back?
    Forgiveness, horse! rail thee,
    thou, created aw'd man,
    Wast born bear? made horse;  
    bear burden ass,
    Spurr'd, gall'd, tir'd, jauncing Bolingbroke.

              Enter KEEPER meat

  KEEPER. Fellow, give place; longer stay.
  KING RICHARD. thou love me, 'tis time thou wert away.
  GROOM. tongue dares not, heart say.
 Exit
  KEEPER. lord, will't fall to?
  KING RICHARD. Taste thou art wont do.
  KEEPER. lord, dare not. Sir Pierce Exton,
    King, commands contrary.
  KING RICHARD. devil Henry Lancaster thee!
    Patience stale, weary it.
                                           [Beats KEEPER]
  KEEPER. Help, help, help!
    murderers, EXTON servants, rush in, armed
  KING RICHARD. now! means death rude assault?
    Villain, thy hand yields thy death's instrument.  
                         [Snatching weapon killing one]
    thou fill room hell.
              [He kills another, EXTON strikes down]
    hand burn never-quenching fire
    staggers person. Exton, thy fierce hand
    Hath King's blood stain'd King's land.
    Mount, mount, soul! thy seat high;
    Whilst gross flesh sinks downward, die.
                                                       [Dies]
  EXTON. full valour royal blood.
    spill'd. O, deed good!
    devil, told well,
    deed chronicled hell.
    dead King living King bear.
    rest, give burial here.       Exeunt




SCENE 6.
Windsor Castle

Flourish. Enter BOLINGBROKE, DUKE YORK, LORDS
and attendants

  BOLINGBROKE. Kind uncle York, latest news hear
    rebels consum'd fire
    town Ciceter Gloucestershire;
    ta'en slain hear not.

              Enter NORTHUMBERLAND

    Welcome, lord. news?
  NORTHUMBERLAND. First, thy sacred state happiness.
    news is, London sent
    heads Salisbury, Spencer, Blunt, Kent.
    manner taking appear
    large discoursed paper here.
  BOLINGBROKE. thee, gentle Percy, thy pains;
    thy worth add worthy gains.
  
                  Enter FITZWATER

  FITZWATER. lord, Oxford London
    heads Brocas Sir Bennet Seely;
    dangerous consorted traitors
    sought Oxford thy dire overthrow.
  BOLINGBROKE. Thy pains, Fitzwater, forgot;
    noble thy merit, wot.

         Enter PERCY, BISHOP CARLISLE

  PERCY. grand conspirator, Abbot Westminster,
    clog conscience sour melancholy,
    Hath yielded body grave;
    Carlisle living, abide
    Thy kingly doom, sentence pride.
  BOLINGBROKE. Carlisle, doom:
    Choose secret place, reverend room,
    thou hast, joy thy life;
    thou liv'st peace, die free strife;  
    mine enemy thou hast been,
    High sparks honour thee seen.

      Enter EXTON, attendants, hearing coffin

  EXTON. Great King, coffin present
    Thy buried fear. breathless lies
    mightiest thy greatest enemies,
    Richard Bordeaux, brought.
  BOLINGBROKE. Exton, thee not; thou hast wrought
    deed slander thy fatal hand
    head famous land.
  EXTON. mouth, lord, deed.
  BOLINGBROKE. love poison poison need,
    thee. dead,
    hate murderer, love murdered.
    guilt conscience thou thy labour,
    good word princely favour;
    Cain wander shades night,
    show thy head day light.  
    Lords, protest soul full woe
    blood sprinkle make grow.
    Come, mourn lament,
    put sullen black incontinent.
    make voyage Holy Land,
    wash blood guilty hand.
    March sadly after; grace mournings here
    weeping untimely bier.                  Exeunt

THE END

1593

KING RICHARD III

by William Shakespeare


Dramatis Personae

  EDWARD FOURTH

    Sons King
  EDWARD, PRINCE WALES KING EDWARD V
  RICHARD, DUKE YORK,

    Brothers King
  GEORGE, DUKE CLARENCE,
  RICHARD, DUKE GLOUCESTER, KING RICHARD III

  YOUNG SON CLARENCE (Edward, Earl Warwick)
  HENRY, EARL RICHMOND, KING HENRY VII
  CARDINAL BOURCHIER, ARCHBISHOP CANTERBURY
  THOMAS ROTHERHAM, ARCHBISHOP YORK
  JOHN MORTON, BISHOP ELY
  DUKE BUCKINGHAM
  DUKE NORFOLK
  EARL SURREY, son
  EARL RIVERS, brother King Edward's Queen
  MARQUIS DORSET LORD GREY, sons
  EARL OXFORD  
  LORD HASTINGS
  LORD LOVEL
  LORD STANLEY, called EARL DERBY
  SIR THOMAS VAUGHAN
  SIR RICHARD RATCLIFF
  SIR WILLIAM CATESBY
  SIR JAMES TYRREL
  SIR JAMES BLOUNT
  SIR WALTER HERBERT
  SIR WILLIAM BRANDON
  SIR ROBERT BRAKENBURY, Lieutenant Tower
  CHRISTOPHER URSWICK, priest
  LORD MAYOR LONDON
  SHERIFF WILTSHIRE
  HASTINGS, pursuivant
  TRESSEL BERKELEY, gentlemen attending Lady Anne
  ELIZABETH, Queen King Edward IV
  MARGARET, widow King Henry VI
  DUCHESS YORK, mother King Edward IV
  LADY ANNE, widow Edward, Prince Wales, son King  
    Henry VI; married Duke Gloucester
  YOUNG DAUGHTER CLARENCE (Margaret Plantagenet,
    Countess Salisbury)
  Ghosts, Richard's victims
  Lords, Gentlemen, Attendants; Priest, Scrivener, Page, Bishops,
    Aldermen, Citizens, Soldiers, Messengers, Murderers, Keeper

SCENE: England

King Richard Third



ACT I. SCENE 1.

London. street

Enter RICHARD, DUKE GLOUCESTER, solus

  GLOUCESTER. winter discontent
    Made glorious summer sun York;
    clouds lour'd house
    deep bosom ocean buried.
    brows bound victorious wreaths;
    bruised arms hung monuments;
    stern alarums chang'd merry meetings,
    dreadful marches delightful measures.
    Grim-visag'd war hath smooth'd wrinkled front,
    now, mounting barbed steeds
    fright souls fearful adversaries,
    capers nimbly lady's chamber
    lascivious pleasing lute.
    I-that shap'd sportive tricks,
    made court amorous looking-glass-
    I-that rudely stamp'd, love's majesty
    strut wanton ambling nymph-  
    I-that curtail'd fair proportion,
    Cheated feature dissembling nature,
    Deform'd, unfinish'd, time
    breathing world scarce half made up,
    lamely unfashionable
    dogs bark halt them-
    Why, I, weak piping time peace,
    delight pass time,
    spy shadow sun
    descant mine deformity.
    therefore, prove lover
    entertain fair well-spoken days,
    determined prove villain
    hate idle pleasures days.
    Plots laid, inductions dangerous,
    drunken prophecies, libels, dreams,
    set brother Clarence King
    deadly hate other;
    King Edward true just
    subtle, false, treacherous,  
    day Clarence closely mew'd up-
    prophecy G
    Edward's heirs murderer be.
    Dive, thoughts, soul. Clarence comes.

             Enter CLARENCE, guarded, BRAKENBURY

    Brother, good day. means armed guard
    waits Grace?
  CLARENCE. Majesty,
    Tend'ring person's safety, hath appointed
    conduct convey th' Tower.
  GLOUCESTER. cause?
  CLARENCE. George.
  GLOUCESTER. Alack, lord, fault yours:
    should, that, commit godfathers.
    O, belike Majesty hath intent
    new-christ'ned Tower.
    matter, Clarence? know?
  CLARENCE. Yea, Richard, know; protest  
    not; but, learn,
    hearkens prophecies dreams,
    cross-row plucks letter G,
    wizard told G
    issue disinherited be;
    And, George begins G,
    thought he.
    These, learn, toys these
    Hath mov'd Highness commit now.
  GLOUCESTER. Why, men rul'd women:
    'Tis King sends Tower;
    Lady Grey wife, Clarence, 'tis she
    tempers extremity.
    good man worship,
    Antony Woodville, brother there,
    made send Lord Hastings Tower,
    present day delivered?
    safe, Clarence; safe.
  CLARENCE. heaven, man secure
    Queen's kindred, night-walking heralds  
    trudge betwixt King Mistress Shore.
    Heard humble suppliant
    Lord Hastings was, delivery?
  GLOUCESTER. Humbly complaining deity
    Lord Chamberlain liberty.
    what-I way,
    favour King,
    men wear livery:
    jealous o'er-worn widow, herself,
    brother dubb'd gentlewomen,
    mighty gossips monarchy.
  BRAKENBURY. beseech Graces pardon me:
    Majesty hath straitly charge
    man private conference,
    degree soever, brother.
  GLOUCESTER. so; an't worship, Brakenbury,
    partake thing say:
    speak treason, man; King
    wise virtuous, noble queen
    struck years, fair, jealous;  
    Shore's wife hath pretty foot,
    cherry lip, bonny eye, passing pleasing tongue;
    Queen's kindred made gentlefolks.
    you, sir? deny this?
  BRAKENBURY. this, lord, naught do.
  GLOUCESTER. Naught Mistress Shore! thee,
    fellow,
    doth naught her, excepting one,
    secretly alone.
  BRAKENBURY. one, lord?
  GLOUCESTER. husband, knave! Wouldst thou betray me?
  BRAKENBURY. beseech Grace pardon me, and
    withal
    Forbear conference noble Duke.
  CLARENCE. thy charge, Brakenbury, will
    obey.
  GLOUCESTER. Queen's abjects obey.
    Brother, farewell; King;
    whatsoe'er employ in-
    call King Edward's widow sister-  
    perform enfranchise you.
    Meantime, deep disgrace brotherhood
    Touches deeper imagine.
  CLARENCE. pleaseth well.
  GLOUCESTER. Well, imprisonment long;
    deliver lie you.
    Meantime, patience.
  CLARENCE. perforce. Farewell.
                          Exeunt CLARENCE, BRAKENBURY, guard
  GLOUCESTER. tread path thou shalt ne'er return.
    Simple, plain Clarence, love thee so
    shortly send thy soul heaven,
    heaven present hands.
    here? new-delivered Hastings?

                       Enter LORD HASTINGS

  HASTINGS. Good time day gracious lord!
  GLOUCESTER. good Lord Chamberlain!
    open air.  
    hath lordship brook'd imprisonment?
  HASTINGS. patience, noble lord, prisoners must;
    live, lord, give thanks
    imprisonment.
  GLOUCESTER. doubt, doubt; Clarence too;
    enemies his,
    prevail'd you.
  HASTINGS. pity eagles mew'd
    Whiles kites buzzards prey liberty.
  GLOUCESTER. news abroad?
  HASTINGS. news bad abroad home:
    King sickly, weak, melancholy,
    physicians fear mightily.
  GLOUCESTER. Now, Saint John, news bad indeed.
    O, hath evil diet long
    overmuch consum'd royal person!
    'Tis grievous thought upon.
    he? bed?
  HASTINGS. is.
  GLOUCESTER. before, follow you.  
                                                   Exit HASTINGS
    live, hope, die
    Till George pack'd posthorse heaven.
    urge hatred Clarence
    lies steel'd weighty arguments;
    And, fail deep intent,
    Clarence hath day live;
    done, God King Edward mercy,
    leave world bustle in!
    marry Warwick's youngest daughter.
    kill'd husband father?
    readiest make wench amends
    husband father;
    I-not love
    secret close intent
    marrying reach unto.
    run horse market.
    Clarence breathes; Edward lives reigns;
    gone, count gains.         Exit




SCENE 2.

London. street

Enter corpse KING HENRY SIXTH, halberds guard it;
LADY ANNE mourner, attended TRESSEL BERKELEY

  ANNE. Set down, set honourable load-
    honour shrouded hearse;
    Whilst awhile obsequiously lament
    Th' untimely fall virtuous Lancaster.
    Poor key-cold figure holy king!
    Pale ashes house Lancaster!
    Thou bloodless remnant royal blood!
    lawful invocate thy ghost
    hear lamentations poor Anne,
    Wife thy Edward, thy slaughtered son,
    Stabb'd self-same hand made wounds.
    Lo, windows thy life
    pour helpless balm poor eyes.
    O, cursed hand made holes!
    Cursed heart heart it!  
    Cursed blood blood hence!
    direful hap betide hated wretch
    makes wretched death thee
    adders, spiders, toads,
    creeping venom'd thing lives!
    child, abortive it,
    Prodigious, untimely brought light,
    ugly unnatural aspect
    fright hopeful mother view,
    heir unhappiness!
    wife, made
    miserable death him
    made young lord thee!
    Come, Chertsey holy load,
    Paul's interred there;
    weary weight
    Rest you, whiles lament King Henry's corse.
                                [The bearers coffin]

                      Enter GLOUCESTER  

  GLOUCESTER. Stay, bear corse, set down.
  ANNE. black magician conjures fiend
    stop devoted charitable deeds?
  GLOUCESTER. Villains, set corse; or, Saint Paul,
    make corse disobeys!
  GENTLEMAN. lord, stand back, coffin
    pass.
  GLOUCESTER. Unmannerd dog! Stand thou, command.
    Advance thy halberd higher breast,
    Or, Saint Paul, strike thee foot
    spurn thee, beggar, thy boldness.
                               [The bearers set coffin]
  ANNE. What, tremble? afraid?
    Alas, blame not, mortal,
    mortal eyes endure devil.
    Avaunt, thou dreadful minister hell!
    Thou hadst power mortal body,
    soul thou canst have; therefore, gone.
  GLOUCESTER. Sweet saint, charity, curst.  
  ANNE. Foul devil, God's sake, trouble not;
    thou hast made happy earth thy hell
    Fill'd cursing cries deep exclaims.
    thou delight view thy heinous deeds,
    Behold pattern thy butcheries.
    O, gentlemen, see, see! Dead Henry's wounds
    Open congeal'd mouths bleed afresh.
    Blush, blush, thou lump foul deformity,
    'tis thy presence exhales blood
    cold empty veins blood dwells;
    Thy deeds inhuman unnatural
    Provokes deluge unnatural.
    O God, blood mad'st, revenge death!
    O earth, blood drink'st, revenge death!
    Either, heav'n, lightning strike murd'rer dead;
    Or, earth, gape open wide eat quick,
    thou dost swallow good king's blood,
    hell-govern'd arm hath butchered.
  GLOUCESTER. Lady, rules charity,
    renders good bad, blessings curses.  
  ANNE. Villain, thou knowest law God man:
    beast fierce touch pity.
  GLOUCESTER. none, beast.
  ANNE. O wonderful, devils truth!
  GLOUCESTER. wonderful angels angry.
    Vouchsafe, divine perfection woman,
    supposed crimes give leave
    circumstance acquit myself.
  ANNE. Vouchsafe, diffus'd infection man,
    evils give leave
    circumstance accuse thy cursed self.
  GLOUCESTER. Fairer tongue thee, have
    patient leisure excuse myself.
  ANNE. Fouler heart thee, thou canst make
    excuse current hang thyself.
  GLOUCESTER. despair accuse myself.
  ANNE. despairing shalt thou stand excused
    worthy vengeance thyself
    didst unworthy slaughter others.
  GLOUCESTER. slew not?  
  ANNE. slain.
    dead are, and, devilish slave, thee.
  GLOUCESTER. kill husband.
  ANNE. Why, alive.
  GLOUCESTER. Nay, dead, slain Edward's hands.
  ANNE. thy foul throat thou liest: Queen Margaret saw
    Thy murd'rous falchion smoking blood;
    thou didst bend breast,
    thy brothers beat point.
  GLOUCESTER. provoked sland'rous tongue
    laid guilt guiltless shoulders.
  ANNE. Thou wast provoked thy bloody mind,
    dream'st aught butcheries.
    Didst thou kill king?
  GLOUCESTER. grant ye.
  ANNE. Dost grant me, hedgehog? Then, God grant to
    Thou mayst damned wicked deed!
    O, gentle, mild, virtuous!
  GLOUCESTER. King Heaven, hath
    him.  
  ANNE. heaven, thou shalt come.
  GLOUCESTER. holp send him
    thither,
    fitter place earth.
  ANNE. thou unfit place hell.
  GLOUCESTER. Yes, place else, hear it.
  ANNE. dungeon.
  GLOUCESTER. bed-chamber.
  ANNE. Ill rest betide chamber thou liest!
  GLOUCESTER. it, madam, till lie you.
  ANNE. hope so.
  GLOUCESTER. so. But, gentle Lady Anne,
    leave keen encounter wits,
    fall slower method-
    causer timeless deaths
    Plantagenets, Henry Edward,
    blameful executioner?
  ANNE. Thou wast accurs'd effect.
  GLOUCESTER. beauty effect-
    beauty haunt sleep  
    undertake death world
    live hour sweet bosom.
  ANNE. thought that, thee, homicide,
    nails rend beauty cheeks.
  GLOUCESTER. eyes endure beauty's
    wreck;
    blemish stood by.
    world cheered sun,
    that; day, life.
  ANNE. Black night o'ershade thy day, death thy life!
  GLOUCESTER. Curse thyself, fair creature; thou art both.
  ANNE. were, reveng'd thee.
  GLOUCESTER. quarrel unnatural,
    reveng'd loveth thee.
  ANNE. quarrel reasonable,
    reveng'd kill'd husband.
  GLOUCESTER. bereft thee, lady, thy husband
    thee husband.
  ANNE. doth breathe earth.
  GLOUCESTER. lives loves thee could.  
  ANNE. him.
  GLOUCESTER. Plantagenet.
  ANNE. Why, he.
  GLOUCESTER. self-same name, nature.
  ANNE. he?
  GLOUCESTER. Here.  [She spits him]  dost thou spit
    me?
  ANNE. mortal poison, thy sake!
  GLOUCESTER. poison sweet place.
  ANNE. hung poison fouler toad.
    sight! Thou dost infect mine eyes.
  GLOUCESTER. Thine eyes, sweet lady, infected mine.
  ANNE. basilisks strike thee dead!
  GLOUCESTER. were, die once;
    kill living death.
    eyes thine mine drawn salt tears,
    Sham'd aspects store childish drops-
    eyes, shed remorseful tear,
    No, father York Edward wept
    hear piteous moan Rutland made  
    black-fac'd Clifford shook sword him;
    thy warlike father, child,
    Told sad story father's death,
    twenty times made pause sob weep
    standers-by wet cheeks
    trees bedash'd rain-in sad time
    manly eyes scorn humble tear;
    sorrows exhale
    Thy beauty hath, made blind weeping.
    sued friend enemy;
    tongue learn sweet smoothing word;
    But, thy beauty propos'd fee,
    proud heart sues, prompts tongue speak.
                                   [She scornfully him]
    Teach thy lip scorn; made
    kissing, lady, contempt.
    thy revengeful heart forgive,
    Lo lend thee sharp-pointed sword;
    thou hide true breast
    soul adoreth thee,  
    lay naked deadly stroke,
    humbly beg death knee.
      [He lays breast open; offers sword]
    Nay, pause; kill King Henry-
    'twas thy beauty provoked me.
    Nay, dispatch; 'twas stabb'd young Edward-
    'twas thy heavenly face set on.
                                           [She falls sword]
    sword again, me.
  ANNE. Arise, dissembler; thy death,
    thy executioner.
  GLOUCESTER. bid kill myself, it;
  ANNE. already.
  GLOUCESTER. thy rage.
    Speak again, word
    hand, thy love kill thy love,
    thy love kill truer love;
    deaths shalt thou accessary.
  ANNE. knew thy heart.
  GLOUCESTER. 'Tis figur'd tongue.  
  ANNE. fear false.
  GLOUCESTER. man true.
  ANNE. put sword.
  GLOUCESTER. Say, then, peace made.
  ANNE. shalt thou hereafter.
  GLOUCESTER. live hope?
  ANNE. men, hope, live so.
  GLOUCESTER. Vouchsafe wear ring.
  ANNE. give.               [Puts ring]
  GLOUCESTER. ring encompasseth thy finger,
    thy breast encloseth poor heart;
    Wear them, thine.
    thy poor devoted servant may
    beg favour thy gracious hand,
    Thou dost confirm happiness ever.
  ANNE. it?
  GLOUCESTER. leave sad designs
    hath mourner,
    presently repair Crosby House;
    Where-after solemnly interr'd  
    Chertsey monast'ry noble king,
    wet grave repentant tears-
    expedient duty you.
    divers unknown reasons, beseech you,
    Grant boon.
  ANNE. heart; joys too
    penitent.
    Tressel Berkeley, me.
  GLOUCESTER. Bid farewell.
  ANNE. 'Tis deserve;
    teach flatter you,
    Imagine farewell already.
                             Exeunt GENTLEMEN LADY ANNE
  GLOUCESTER. Sirs, corse.
  GENTLEMEN. Chertsey, noble lord?
  GLOUCESTER. No, White Friars; attend coming.
                                       Exeunt GLOUCESTER
    woman humour woo'd?
    woman humour won?
    her; long.  
    What! kill'd husband father-
    heart's extremest hate,
    curses mouth, tears eyes,
    bleeding witness hatred by;
    God, conscience, bars me,
    friends back suit all
    plain devil dissembling looks,
    win her, world nothing!
    Ha!
    Hath forgot brave prince,
    Edward, lord, I, months since,
    Stabb'd angry mood Tewksbury?
    sweeter lovelier gentleman-
    Fram'd prodigality nature,
    Young, valiant, wise, doubt royal-
    spacious world afford;
    abase eyes me,
    cropp'd golden prime sweet prince
    made widow woeful bed?
    me, equals Edward's moiety?  
    me, halts misshapen thus?
    dukedom beggarly denier,
    mistake person while.
    life, finds, cannot,
    marv'llous proper man.
    charges looking-glass,
    entertain score tailors
    study fashions adorn body.
    crept favour myself,
    maintain cost.
    turn yon fellow grave,
    return lamenting love.
    Shine out, fair sun, till bought glass,
    shadow pass.                     Exit




SCENE 3.

London. palace

Enter QUEEN ELIZABETH, LORD RIVERS, LORD GREY

  RIVERS. patience, madam; doubt Majesty
    recover accustom'd health.
  GREY. brook ill, makes worse;
    Therefore, God's sake, entertain good comfort,
    cheer Grace quick merry eyes.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. dead, betide on
    me?
  GREY. harm loss lord.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. loss lord includes all
    harms.
  GREY. heavens bless'd goodly son
    comforter gone.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Ah, young; minority
    put trust Richard Gloucester,
    man loves me, you.
  RIVER. concluded Protector?  
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. determin'd, concluded yet;
    be, King miscarry.

                     Enter BUCKINGHAM DERBY

  GREY. Lords Buckingham Derby.
  BUCKINGHAM. Good time day royal Grace!
  DERBY. God make Majesty joyful been.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Countess Richmond, good Lord
    Derby,
    good prayer scarcely amen.
    Yet, Derby, notwithstanding wife
    loves me, you, good lord, assur'd
    hate proud arrogance.
  DERBY. beseech you, believe
    envious slanders false accusers;
    Or, accus'd true report,
    Bear weakness, proceeds
    wayward sickness grounded malice.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. King to-day, Lord  
    Derby?
  DERBY. Duke Buckingham I
    visiting Majesty.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. likelihood amendment,
    Lords?
  BUCKINGHAM. Madam, good hope; Grace speaks
    cheerfully.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. God grant health! confer
    him?
  BUCKINGHAM. Ay, madam; desires make atonement
    Duke Gloucester brothers,
    Lord Chamberlain;
    warn royal presence.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. well! will
    be.
    fear happiness height.

              Enter GLOUCESTER, HASTINGS, DORSET

  GLOUCESTER. wrong, endure it.  
    complains King
    I, forsooth, stern love not?
    holy Paul, love Grace lightly
    fill ears dissentious rumours.
    flatter fair,
    Smile men's faces, smooth, deceive, cog,
    Duck French nods apish courtesy,
    held rancorous enemy.
    plain man live harm
    simple truth abus'd
    silken, sly, insinuating Jacks?
  GREY. presence speaks Grace?
  GLOUCESTER. thee, hast honesty grace.
    injur'd thee? thee wrong,
    thee, thee, faction?
    plague all! royal Grace-
    God preserve wish!-
    quiet searce breathing while
    trouble lewd complaints.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Brother Gloucester, mistake  
    matter.
    King, royal disposition
    provok'd suitor else-
    Aiming, belike, interior hatred
    outward action shows itself
    children, brothers, myself-
    Makes send learn ground.
  GLOUCESTER. tell; world grown bad
    wrens make prey eagles dare perch.
    Jack gentleman,
    gentle person made Jack.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Come, come, meaning,
    brother Gloucester:
    envy advancement friends';
    God grant you!
  GLOUCESTER. Meantime, God grants you.
    brother imprison'd means,
    disgrac'd, nobility
    Held contempt; great promotions
    daily ennoble  
    scarce days worth noble.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. rais'd careful
    height
    contented hap enjoy'd,
    incense Majesty
    Duke Clarence, been
    earnest advocate plead him.
    lord, shameful injury
    Falsely draw vile suspects.
  GLOUCESTER. deny mean
    Lord Hastings' late imprisonment.
  RIVERS. may, lord; for-
  GLOUCESTER. may, Lord Rivers? Why, knows
    so?
    more, sir, denying that:
    fair preferments
    deny aiding hand therein,
    lay honours high desert.
    not? may-ay, marry, she-
  RIVERS. What, marry, she?  
  GLOUCESTER. What, marry, she? Marry king,
    bachelor, handsome stripling too.
    Iwis grandam worser match.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Lord Gloucester, long
    borne
    blunt upbraidings bitter scoffs.
    heaven, acquaint Majesty
    gross taunts oft endur'd.
    country servant-maid
    great queen condition-
    baited, scorn'd, stormed at.

                Enter QUEEN MARGARET, behind

    Small joy England's Queen.
  QUEEN MARGARET. less'ned small, God, I
    beseech Him!
    Thy honour, state, seat, due me.
  GLOUCESTER. What! Threat telling the
    King?  
    spare not. said
    avouch't presence King.
    dare adventure th' Tow'r.
    'Tis time speak-my pains forgot.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Out, devil! remember to
    well:
    Thou kill'dst husband Henry Tower,
    Edward, poor son, Tewksbury.
  GLOUCESTER. Ere queen, ay, husband
    King,
    pack-horse great affairs,
    weeder-out proud adversaries,
    liberal rewarder friends;
    royalize blood spent mine own.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Ay, blood or
    thine.
  GLOUCESTER. time husband Grey
    factious house Lancaster;
    And, Rivers, you. husband
    Margaret's battle Saint Albans slain?  
    put minds, forget,
    ere this, are;
    Withal, been, am.
  QUEEN MARGARET. murd'rous villain, thou art.
  GLOUCESTER. Poor Clarence forsake father, Warwick,
    Ay, forswore himself-which Jesu pardon!-
  QUEEN MARGARET. God revenge!
  GLOUCESTER. fight Edward's party crown;
    meed, poor lord, mewed up.
    God heart flint Edward's,
    Edward's soft pitiful mine.
    childish-foolish world.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Hie thee hell shame leave this
    world,
    Thou cacodemon; thy kingdom is.
  RIVERS. Lord Gloucester, busy days
    urge prove enemies,
    follow'd lord, sovereign king.
    you, king.
  GLOUCESTER. be! pedlar.  
    heart, thought thereof!
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. joy, lord, suppose
    enjoy country's king,
    joy suppose me
    enjoy, Queen thereof.
  QUEEN MARGARET. joy enjoys Queen thereof;
    she, altogether joyless.
    longer hold patient.                 [Advancing]
    Hear me, wrangling pirates, fall out
    sharing pill'd me.
    trembles me?
    that, Queen, bow subjects,
    that, depos'd, quake rebels?
    Ah, gentle villain, turn away!
  GLOUCESTER. Foul wrinkled witch, mak'st thou my
    sight?
  QUEEN MARGARET. repetition thou hast marr'd,
    make thee go.
  GLOUCESTER. Wert thou banished pain death?
  QUEEN MARGARET. was; find pain  
    banishment
    death yield abode.
    husband son thou ow'st me;
    thou kingdom; allegiance.
    sorrow yours;
    pleasures usurp mine.
  GLOUCESTER. curse noble father laid thee,
    thou didst crown warlike brows paper
    thy scorns drew'st rivers eyes,
    dry gav'st Duke clout
    Steep'd faultless blood pretty Rutland-
    curses bitterness soul
    Denounc'd thee fall'n thee;
    God, we, hath plagu'd thy bloody deed.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. God innocent.
  HASTINGS. O, 'twas foulest deed slay babe,
    merciless e'er heard of!
  RIVERS. Tyrants wept reported.
  DORSET. man prophesied revenge it.
  BUCKINGHAM. Northumberland, present, wept it.  
  QUEEN MARGARET. What, snarling came,
    Ready catch throat,
    turn hatred me?
    York's dread curse prevail heaven
    Henry's death, lovely Edward's death,
    kingdom's loss, woeful banishment,
    answer peevish brat?
    curses pierce clouds enter heaven?
    then, give way, dull clouds, quick curses!
    war, surfeit die king,
    murder, make king!
    Edward thy son, Prince Wales,
    Edward son, Prince Wales,
    Die youth untimely violence!
    Thyself queen, queen,
    Outlive thy glory, wretched self!
    Long mayest thou live wail thy children's death,
    another, thee now,
    Deck'd thy rights, thou art stall'd mine!
    Long die thy happy days thy death;  
    And, length'ned hours grief,
    Die mother, wife, England's Queen!
    Rivers Dorset, standers by,
    wast thou, Lord Hastings, son
    stabb'd bloody daggers. God, pray him,
    live natural age,
    unlook'd accident cut off!
  GLOUCESTER. thy charm, thou hateful wither'd
    hag.
  QUEEN MARGARET. leave thee? Stay, dog, thou
    shalt hear me.
    heaven grievous plague store
    Exceeding thee,
    O, till thy sins ripe,
    hurl indignation
    thee, troubler poor world's peace!
    worm conscience be-gnaw thy soul!
    Thy friends suspect traitors thou liv'st,
    deep traitors thy dearest friends!
    sleep close deadly eye thine,  
    tormenting dream
    Affrights thee hell ugly devils!
    Thou elvish-mark'd, abortive, rooting hog,
    Thou wast seal'd thy nativity
    slave nature son hell,
    Thou slander thy heavy mother's womb,
    Thou loathed issue thy father's loins,
    Thou rag honour, thou detested-
  GLOUCESTER. Margaret!
  QUEEN MARGARET. Richard!
  GLOUCESTER. Ha?
  QUEEN MARGARET. call thee not.
  GLOUCESTER. cry thee mercy then, think
    thou hadst call'd bitter names.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Why, did, look'd reply.
    O, make period curse!
  GLOUCESTER. 'Tis me, ends in-Margaret.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. breath'd curse
    yourself.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Poor painted queen, vain flourish  
    fortune!
    strew'st thou sugar bottled spider
    deadly web ensnareth thee about?
    Fool, fool! thou whet'st knife kill thyself.
    day thou shalt me
    thee curse poisonous bunch-back'd toad.
  HASTINGS. False-boding woman, end thy frantic curse,
    thy harm thou move patience.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Foul shame you! all
    mov'd mine.
  RIVERS. serv'd, taught your
      duty.
  QUEEN MARGARET. serve me
    duty,
    Teach queen subjects.
    O, serve well, teach duty!
  DORSET. Dispute her; lunatic.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Peace, Master Marquis, malapert;
    fire-new stamp honour scarce current.
    O, young nobility judge  
    'twere lose miserable!
    stand high blasts shake them,
    fall dash pieces.
  GLOUCESTER. Good counsel, marry; learn it, learn it, Marquis.
  DORSET. touches you, lord, me.
  GLOUCESTER. Ay, more; born high,
    aery buildeth cedar's top,
    dallies wind, scorns sun.
  QUEEN MARGARET. turns sun shade-alas! alas!
    Witness son, shade death,
    bright out-shining beams thy cloudy wrath
    Hath eternal darkness folded up.
    aery buildeth aery's nest.
    O God seest it, suffer it;
    won blood, lost so!
  BUCKINGHAM. Peace, peace, shame, charity!
  QUEEN MARGARET. Urge charity shame me.
    Uncharitably dealt,
    shamefully hopes butcher'd.
    charity outrage, life shame;  
    shame live sorrow's rage!
  BUCKINGHAM. done, done.
  QUEEN MARGARET. O princely Buckingham, kiss thy
    hand
    sign league amity thee.
    fair befall thee thy noble house!
    Thy garments spotted blood,
    thou compass curse.
  BUCKINGHAM. here; curses pass
    lips breathe air.
  QUEEN MARGARET. ascend sky
    awake God's gentle-sleeping peace.
    O Buckingham, heed yonder dog!
    fawns, bites; bites,
    venom tooth rankle death:
    him, beware him;
    Sin, death, hell, set marks him,
    ministers attend him.
  GLOUCESTER. doth say, Lord Buckingham?
  BUCKINGHAM. respect, gracious lord.  
  QUEEN MARGARET. What, dost thou scorn gentle
    counsel,
    soothe devil warn thee from?
    O, remember day,
    split thy heart sorrow,
    poor Margaret prophetess!
    Live subjects hate,
    yours, God's!               Exit
  BUCKINGHAM. hair doth stand end hear curses.
  RIVERS. doth mine. muse liberty.
  GLOUCESTER. blame her; God's holy Mother,
    hath wrong; repent
    part thereof her.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. knowledge.
  GLOUCESTER. vantage wrong.
    hot good
    cold thinking now.
    Marry, Clarence, repaid;
    frank'd fatting pains;
    God pardon thereof!  
  RIVERS. virtuous Christian-like conclusion,
    pray scathe us!
  GLOUCESTER. ever-  [Aside]  advis'd;
    curs'd now, curs'd myself.

                         Enter CATESBY

  CATESBY. Madam, Majesty doth you,
    Grace, you, gracious lords.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Catesby, come. Lords, go
    me?
  RIVERS. wait Grace.
                                       Exeunt GLOUCESTER
  GLOUCESTER. wrong, begin brawl.
    secret mischiefs set abroach
    lay grievous charge others.
    Clarence, cast darkness,
    beweep simple gulls;
    Namely, Derby, Hastings, Buckingham;
    'tis Queen allies  
    stir King Duke brother.
    it, withal whet me
    reveng'd Rivers, Dorset, Grey;
    sigh and, piece Scripture,
    God bids good evil.
    clothe naked villainy
    odd ends stol'n holy writ,
    saint play devil.

                       Enter MURDERERS

    But, soft, executioners.
    now, hardy stout resolved mates!
    dispatch thing?
  MURDERER. are, lord, the
    warrant,
    admitted is.
  GLOUCESTER. thought upon; me.
                                             [Gives warrant]
    done, repair Crosby Place.  
    But, sirs, sudden execution,
    Withal obdurate, hear plead;
    Clarence well-spoken, perhaps
    move hearts pity, mark him.
  MURDERER. Tut, tut, lord, stand to
    prate;
    Talkers good doers. assur'd
    hands tongues.
  GLOUCESTER. eyes drop millstones fools' eyes fall
    tears.
    you, lads; business straight;
    Go, go, dispatch.
  MURDERER. will, noble lord.                 Exeunt




SCENE 4.

London. Tower

Enter CLARENCE KEEPER

  KEEPER. Grace heavily to-day?
  CLARENCE. O, pass'd miserable night,
    full fearful dreams, ugly sights,
    That, Christian faithful man,
    spend night
    'twere buy world happy days-
    full dismal terror time!
  KEEPER. dream, lord? pray you
    me.
  CLARENCE. Methoughts broken Tower
    embark'd cross Burgundy;
    company brother Gloucester,
    cabin tempted walk
    hatches. look'd England,
    cited thousand heavy times,
    wars York Lancaster,
    befall'n us. pac'd  
    giddy footing hatches,
    Methought Gloucester stumbled, falling
    Struck me, thought stay him, overboard
    tumbling billows main.
    O Lord, methought pain drown,
    dreadful noise waters ears,
    sights ugly death eyes!
    Methoughts thousand fearful wrecks,
    thousand men fishes gnaw'd upon,
    Wedges gold, great anchors, heaps pearl,
    Inestimable stones, unvalued jewels,
    scatt'red bottom sea;
    lay dead men's skulls, holes
    eyes inhabit crept,
    'twere scorn eyes, reflecting gems,
    woo'd slimy bottom deep
    mock'd dead bones lay scatt'red by.
  KEEPER. leisure time death
    gaze secrets deep?
  CLARENCE. Methought had; strive  
    yield ghost, envious flood
    Stopp'd soul forth
    find empty, vast, wand'ring air;
    smother'd panting bulk,
    burst belch sea.
  KEEPER. Awak'd sore agony?
  CLARENCE. No, no, dream lengthen'd life.
    O, began tempest soul!
    pass'd, methought, melancholy flood
    sour ferryman poets write of,
    kingdom perpetual night.
    greet stranger soul
    great father-in-law, renowned Warwick,
    spake aloud 'What scourge perjury
    dark monarchy afford false Clarence?'
    vanish'd. wand'ring by
    shadow angel, bright hair
    Dabbled blood, shriek'd aloud
    'Clarence come-false, fleeting, perjur'd Clarence,
    stabb'd field Tewksbury.  
    Seize him, Furies, torment!'
    that, methoughts, legion foul fiends
    Environ'd me, howled mine ears
    hideous cries that, noise,
    trembling wak'd, season after
    hell,
    terrible impression made dream.
  KEEPER. marvel, lord, affrighted you;
    afraid, methinks, hear it.
  CLARENCE. Ah, Keeper, Keeper, things
    give evidence soul
    Edward's sake, requites me!
    O God! deep prayers appease Thee,
    Thou wilt aveng'd misdeeds,
    execute Thy wrath alone;
    O, spare guiltless wife poor children!
  KEEPER, prithee sit awhile;
    soul heavy, fain sleep.
  KEEPER. will, lord. God give Grace good rest.
                                               [CLARENCE sleeps]  

                  Enter BRAKENBURY Lieutenant

  BRAKENBURY. Sorrow breaks seasons reposing hours,
    Makes night morning noontide night.
    Princes titles glories,
    outward honour toil;
    unfelt imaginations
    feel world restless cares,
    tides low name
    differs outward fame.

                      Enter MURDERERS

  MURDERER. Ho! here?
  BRAKENBURY. wouldst thou, fellow, cam'st
    thou hither?
  MURDERER. speak Clarence, came
    legs.
  BRAKENBURY. What, brief?  
  MURDERER. 'Tis better, sir, tedious. Let
    commission talk more.
                                           [BRAKENBURY reads it]
  BRAKENBURY. am, this, commanded deliver
    noble Duke Clarence hands.
    reason meant hereby,
    guiltless meaning.
    lies Duke asleep; keys.
    King signify him
    resign'd charge.
  MURDERER. may, sir; 'tis point wisdom. Fare
    well.                       Exeunt BRAKENBURY KEEPER
  MURDERER. What, stab sleeps?
  MURDERER. No; 'twas cowardly, when
    wakes.
  MURDERER. Why, wake great
    judgment-day.
  MURDERER. Why, stabb'd him
    sleeping.
  MURDERER. urging word judgment hath  
    bred kind remorse me.
  MURDERER. What, art thou afraid?
  MURDERER. kill him, warrant; to
    damn'd killing him, warrant can
    defend me.
  MURDERER. thought thou hadst resolute.
  MURDERER. am, live.
  MURDERER. back Duke Gloucester and
    so.
  MURDERER. Nay, prithee, stay little. hope this
    passionate humour mine change; wont to
    hold tells twenty.
  MURDERER. dost thou feel thyself now?
    MURDERER. Faith, dregs conscience
    me.
  MURDERER. Remember reward, deed's
    done.
  MURDERER. Zounds, dies; forgot reward.
  MURDERER. thy conscience now?
  MURDERER. O, Duke Gloucester's purse!  
  MURDERER. opens purse give our
    reward, thy conscience flies out.
  MURDERER. 'Tis matter; go; or
    entertain it.
  MURDERER. thee again?
  MURDERER. meddle it-it makes man
    coward: man steal, accuseth him; man
    swear, checks him; man lie his
    neighbour's wife, detects him. 'Tis blushing shame-
    fac'd spirit mutinies man's bosom; fills man
    full obstacles: made restore purse gold
    that-by chance found. beggars man it.
    turn'd towns cities dangerous thing;
    man means live endeavours trust
    live it.
  MURDERER. Zounds, 'tis elbow,
    persuading kill Duke.
  MURDERER. devil thy mind believe
    not; insinuate thee make the
    sigh.  
  MURDERER. strong-fram'd; prevail with
    me.
  MURDERER. Spoke tall man respects thy
    reputation. Come, fall work?
  MURDERER. costard hilts of
    thy sword, chop malmsey-butt the
    room.
  MURDERER. O excellent device! make sop of
    him.
  MURDERER. Soft! wakes.
  MURDERER. Strike!
  MURDERER. No, reason him.
  CLARENCE. art thou, Keeper? Give cup wine.
  MURDERER. wine enough, lord,
    anon.
  CLARENCE. God's name, art thou?
  MURDERER. man, are.
  CLARENCE. am, royal.
  MURDERER. are, loyal.
  CLARENCE. Thy voice thunder, thy humble.  
  MURDERER. voice King's, looks
    mine own.
  CLARENCE. darkly deadly dost thou speak!
    eyes menace me. pale?
    hither? Wherefore come?
  MURDERER. To, to, to-
  CLARENCE. murder me?
  MURDERERS. Ay, ay.
  CLARENCE. scarcely hearts so,
    hearts it.
    Wherein, friends, offended you?
  MURDERER. Offended not, King.
  CLARENCE. reconcil'd again.
  MURDERER. Never, lord; prepare die.
  CLARENCE. drawn world men
    slay innocent? offence?
    evidence doth accuse me?
    lawful quest verdict up
    frowning judge, pronounc'd
    bitter sentence poor Clarence' death?  
    convict law,
    threaten death unlawful.
    charge you, hope redemption
    Christ's dear blood shed grievous sins,
    depart lay hands me.
    deed undertake damnable.
  MURDERER. do, command.
  MURDERER. hath commanded our
    King.
  CLARENCE. Erroneous vassals! great King kings
    Hath tables law commanded
    thou shalt murder. then
    Spurn edict fulfil man's?
    heed; holds vengeance hand
    hurl heads break law.
  MURDERER. vengeance doth hurl
    thee
    false forswearing, murder too;
    Thou didst receive sacrament fight
    quarrel house Lancaster.  
  MURDERER. traitor God
    Didst break vow; thy treacherous blade
    Unripp'dst bowels thy sov'reign's son.
  MURDERER. thou wast sworn cherish and
    defend.
  MURDERER. canst thou urge God's dreadful law
    us,
    thou hast broke dear degree?
  CLARENCE. Alas! sake ill deed?
    Edward, brother, sake.
    sends murder this,
    sin deep I.
    God avenged deed,
    O, doth publicly.
    quarrel pow'rful arm;
    indirect lawless course
    cut offended Him.
  MURDERER. made thee bloody minister
    gallant-springing brave Plantagenet,
    princely novice, struck dead thee?  
  CLARENCE. brother's love, devil, rage.
  MURDERER. Thy brother's love, duty, thy
    faults,
    Provoke slaughter thee.
  CLARENCE. love brother, hate me;
    brother, love well.
    hir'd meed, back again,
    send brother Gloucester,
    reward life
    Edward tidings death.
  MURDERER. deceiv'd: brother Gloucester
    hates you.
  CLARENCE. O, no, loves me, holds dear.
    me.
  MURDERER. Ay, will.
  CLARENCE. princely father York
    Bless'd sons victorious arm
    charg'd soul love other,
    thought divided friendship.
    Bid Gloucester this, weep.  
  MURDERER. Ay, millstones; lesson'd weep.
  CLARENCE. O, slander him, kind.
  MURDERER. Right, snow harvest. Come, you
    deceive yourself:
    'Tis sends destroy here.
    CLARENCE. be; bewept fortune
    hugg'd arms, swore sobs
    labour delivery.
  MURDERER. Why, doth, delivers you
    earth's thraldom joys heaven.
  MURDERER. Make peace God, die,
    lord.
  CLARENCE. holy feeling souls
    counsel make peace God,
    souls blind
    war God murd'ring me?
    O, sirs, consider: set on
    deed hate deed.
  MURDERER. do?
  CLARENCE. Relent, save souls.  
  MURDERER. Relent! No, 'tis cowardly womanish.
  CLARENCE. relent beastly, savage, devilish.
    you, prince's son,
    pent liberty now,
    murderers you,
    entreat life?
    friend, spy pity thy looks;
    O, thine eye flatterer,
    thou side entreat me-
    beg distress.
    begging prince beggar pities not?
  MURDERER. you, lord.
  MURDERER.  [Stabbing him]  that, that. all
    do,
    drown malmsey-butt within.
                                              Exit body
  MURDERER. bloody deed, desperately
    dispatch'd!
    fain, Pilate, wash hands
    grievous murder!  

                       Re-enter MURDERER

  MURDERER-How now, mean'st thou thou
    help'st not?
    heavens, Duke slack have
    been!
  MURDERER. knew sav'd his
    brother!
    thou fee, say;
    repent Duke slain.                 Exit
  MURDERER. I. Go, coward thou art.
    Well, hide body hole,
    Till Duke give order burial;
    meed, away;
    out, stay.            Exit

ACT II. SCENE 1.

London. palace

Flourish. Enter KING EDWARD sick, QUEEN ELIZABETH, DORSET, RIVERS,
HASTINGS, BUCKINGHAM, GREY, others

  KING EDWARD. Why, so. good day's
    work.
    peers, continue united league.
    day expect embassage
    Redeemer redeem hence;
    peace soul part heaven,
    made friends peace earth.
    Hastings Rivers, other's hand;
    Dissemble hatred, swear love.
  RIVERS. heaven, soul purg'd grudging hate;
    hand seal true heart's love.
  HASTINGS. thrive I, swear like!
  KING EDWARD. heed dally king;
    supreme King kings
    Confound hidden falsehood award  
    other's end.
  HASTINGS. prosper I, swear perfect love!
  RIVERS. I, love Hastings heart!
  KING EDWARD. Madam, exempt this;
    you, son Dorset; Buckingham, you:
    factious other.
    Wife, love Lord Hastings, kiss hand;
    do, unfeignedly.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. There, Hastings; more
    remember
    hatred, thrive mine!
  KING EDWARD. Dorset, embrace him; Hastings, love Lord
    Marquis.
  DORSET. interchange love, protest,
    part inviolable.
  HASTINGS. swear I.                       [They embrace]
  KING EDWARD. Now, princely Buckingham, seal thou this
    league
    thy embracements wife's allies,
    make happy unity.  
  BUCKINGHAM.  [To QUEEN]  Buckingham
    doth turn hate
    Grace, duteous love
    Doth cherish yours, God punish me
    hate expect love!
    employ friend
    assured friend,
    Deep, hollow, treacherous, full guile,
    me! beg God
    cold love yours.
                                                  [They embrace]
  KING EDWARD. pleasing cordial, princely Buckingham,
    thy vow sickly heart.
    wanteth brother Gloucester here
    make blessed period peace.
  BUCKINGHAM. And, good time,
    Sir Richard Ratcliff Duke.

                      Enter GLOUCESTER, RATCLIFF
  
  GLOUCESTER. Good morrow sovereign king and
    Queen;
    And, princely peers, happy time day!
  KING EDWARD. Happy, indeed, spent day.
    Gloucester, deeds charity,
    Made peace enmity, fair love hate,
    swelling wrong-incensed peers.
  GLOUCESTER. blessed labour, sovereign lord.
    princely heap, here,
    false intelligence wrong surmise,
    Hold foe-
    unwittingly, rage,
    aught committed borne
    presence, desire
    reconcile friendly peace:
    'Tis death enmity;
    hate it, desire good men's love.
    First, madam, entreat true peace you,
    purchase duteous service;
    you, noble cousin Buckingham,  
    grudge lodg'd us;
    you, you, Lord Rivers, Dorset,
    desert frown'd me;
    you, Lord Woodville, and, Lord Scales, you;
    Dukes, earls, lords, gentlemen-indeed, all.
    Englishman alive
    soul jot odds
    infant born to-night.
    God humility.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. holy day hereafter.
    God strifes compounded.
    sovereign lord, beseech Highness
    brother Clarence grace.
  GLOUCESTER. Why, madam, off'red love this,
    flouted royal presence?
    gentle Duke dead?
                                                [They start]
    injury scorn corse.
  KING EDWARD. dead! knows
    is?  
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. All-seeing heaven, world this!
  BUCKINGHAM. pale, Lord Dorset, rest?
  DORSET. Ay, good lord; man presence
    red colour hath forsook cheeks.
  KING EDWARD. Clarence dead? order revers'd.
  GLOUCESTER. he, poor man, order died,
    winged Mercury bear;
    tardy cripple bare countermand
    lag buried.
    God grant some, noble loyal,
    Nearer bloody thoughts, blood,
    Deserve worse wretched Clarence did,
    current suspicion!

                           Enter DERBY

  DERBY. boon, sovereign, service done!
  KING EDWARD. prithee, peace; soul full sorrow.
  DERBY. rise Highness hear me.
  KING EDWARD. thou requests.  
  DERBY. forfeit, sovereign, servant's life;
    slew to-day riotous gentleman
    attendant Duke Norfolk.
  KING EDWARD. tongue doom brother's death,
    tongue give pardon slave?
    brother killed man-his fault thought,
    punishment bitter death.
    sued him? Who, wrath,
    Kneel'd feet, bid advis'd?
    spoke brotherhood? spoke love?
    told poor soul forsake
    mighty Warwick fight me?
    told me, field Tewksbury
    Oxford down, rescued me
    'Dear Brother, live, king'?
    told me, lay field
    Frozen death, lap me
    garments, give himself,
    thin naked, numb cold night?
    remembrance brutish wrath  
    Sinfully pluck'd, man you
    race put mind.
    carters waiting-vassals
    drunken slaughter defac'd
    precious image dear Redeemer,
    straight knees pardon, pardon;
    I, unjustly too, grant you.        [DERBY rises]
    brother man speak;
    I, ungracious, speak myself
    him, poor soul. proudest all
    beholding life;
    beg life.
    O God, fear thy justice hold
    me, you, mine, yours, this!
    Come, Hastings, closet. Ah, poor Clarence!
                                 Exeunt KING QUEEN
  GLOUCESTER. fruits rashness. Mark'd not
    guilty kindred Queen
    Look'd pale hear Clarence' death?
    O, urge King!  
    God revenge it. Come, lords, go
    comfort Edward company?
  BUCKINGHAM. wait Grace.                    Exeunt




SCENE 2.

London. palace

Enter DUCHESS YORK, SON DAUGHTER CLARENCE

  SON. Good grandam, us, father dead?
  DUCHESS. No, boy.
  DAUGHTER. weep oft, beat breast,
    cry 'O Clarence, unhappy son!'?
  SON. us, shake head,
    call orphans, wretches, castaways,
    noble father alive?
  DUCHESS. pretty cousins, mistake both;
    lament sickness King,
    loath lose him, father's death;
    lost sorrow wail lost.
  SON. conclude, grandam, dead.
    King mine uncle blame it.
    God revenge it; importune
    earnest prayers effect.
  DAUGHTER. I.  
  DUCHESS. Peace, children, peace! King doth love you
    well.
    Incapable shallow innocents,
    guess caus'd father's death.
  SON. Grandam, can; good uncle Gloucester
    Told King, provok'd Queen,
    Devis'd impeachments imprison him.
    uncle told so, wept,
    pitied me, kindly kiss'd cheek;
    Bade rely father,
    love dearly child.
  DUCHESS. Ah, deceit steal gentle shape,
    virtuous vizor hide deep vice!
    son; ay, shame;
    dugs drew deceit.
  SON. uncle dissemble, grandam?
  DUCHESS. Ay, boy.
  SON. it. Hark! noise this?

            Enter QUEEN ELIZABETH, hair  
                ears; RIVERS DORSET her

  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Ah, hinder wail and
    weep,
    chide fortune, torment myself?
    join black despair soul
    enemy.
  DUCHESS. means scene rude impatience?
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. make act tragic violence.
  EDWARD, lord, thy son, king, dead.
    grow branches root gone?
    wither leaves sap?
    live, lament; die, brief,
    swift-winged souls catch King's,
    obedient subjects follow him
    kingdom ne'er-changing night.
  DUCHESS. Ah, interest thy sorrow
    title thy noble husband!
    bewept worthy husband's death,
    liv'd images;  
    mirrors princely semblance
    crack'd pieces malignant death,
    comfort false glass,
    grieves shame him.
    Thou art widow, thou art mother
    hast comfort thy children left;
    death hath snatch'd husband mine arms
    pluck'd crutches feeble hands-
    Clarence Edward. O, I-
    Thine moiety moan-
    overgo thy woes drown thy cries?
  SON. Ah, aunt, wept father's death!
    aid kindred tears?
  DAUGHTER. fatherless distress left unmoan'd;
    widow-dolour likewise unwept!
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Give lamentation;
    barren bring complaints.
    springs reduce currents mine eyes
    I, govern'd watery moon,
    send plenteous tears drown world!  
    Ah husband, dear Lord Edward!
  CHILDREN. Ah father, dear Lord Clarence!
  DUCHESS. Alas both, mine, Edward Clarence!
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. stay Edward? he's
    gone.
  CHILDREN. stay Clarence? gone.
  DUCHESS. stays they? gone.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. widow dear loss.
  CHILDREN. orphans dear loss.
  DUCHESS. mother dear loss.
    Alas, mother griefs!
    woes parcell'd, mine general.
    Edward weeps, I:
    Clarence weep, doth she.
    babes Clarence weep, I:
    Edward weep, they.
    Alas, me, threefold distress'd,
    Pour tears! sorrow's nurse,
    pamper lamentation.
  DORSET. Comfort, dear mother. God displeas'd  
    unthankfulness doing.
    common worldly things 'tis called ungrateful
    dull unwillingness repay debt
    bounteous hand kindly lent;
    opposite heaven,
    requires royal debt lent you.
  RIVERS. Madam, bethink you, careful mother,
    young prince son. Send straight him;
    crown'd; comfort lives.
    Drown desperate sorrow dead Edward's grave,
    plant joys living Edward's throne.

               Enter GLOUCESTER, BUCKINGHAM, DERBY,
                      HASTINGS, RATCLIFF

  GLOUCESTER. Sister, comfort. cause
    wail dimming shining star;
    harms wailing them.
    Madam, mother, cry mercy;
    Grace. Humbly knee  
    crave blessing.
  DUCHESS. God bless thee; put meekness thy breast,
    Love, charity, obedience, true duty!
  GLOUCESTER. Amen!  [Aside]  make die good old
    man!
    butt end mother's blessing;
    marvel Grace leave out.
  BUCKINGHAM. cloudy princes heart-sorrowing
    peers,
    bear heavy mutual load moan,
    cheer other's love.
    spent harvest king,
    reap harvest son.
    broken rancour high-swol'n hearts,
    splinter'd, knit, join'd together,
    gently preserv'd, cherish'd, kept.
    seemeth good that, train,
    Forthwith Ludlow young prince fet
    London, crown'd King.

 RIVERS. train, Lord  
    Buckingham?
  BUCKINGHAM. Marry, lord, multitude
    new-heal'd wound malice break out,
    dangerous
    estate green ungovern'd;
    horse bears commanding rein
    direct himself,
    fear harm harm apparent,
    opinion, prevented.
  GLOUCESTER. hope King made peace us;
    compact firm true me.
  RIVERS. me; so, think, an.
    Yet, green, put
    apparent likelihood breach,
    haply company urg'd;
    noble Buckingham
    meet fetch Prince.
  HASTINGS. I.
  GLOUCESTER. so; determine
    straight post Ludlow.  
    Madam, you, sister, go
    give censures business?
                        Exeunt BUCKINGHAM GLOUCESTER
  BUCKINGHAM. lord, journeys Prince,
    God sake, stay home;
    sort occasion,
    index story late talk'd of,
    part Queen's proud kindred Prince.
  GLOUCESTER. self, counsel's consistory,
    oracle, prophet, dear cousin,
    I, child, thy direction.
    Ludlow then, stay behind.        Exeunt




SCENE 3.

London. street

Enter CITIZEN door, other

  CITIZEN. Good morrow, neighbour. so
    fast?
  CITIZEN. promise you, scarcely myself.
    Hear news abroad?
  CITIZEN. Yes, King dead.
  CITIZEN. Ill news, by'r lady; seldom the
    better.
    fear, fear 'twill prove giddy world.

                        Enter CITIZEN

  CITIZEN. Neighbours, God speed!
  CITIZEN. Give good morrow, sir.
  CITIZEN. Doth news hold good King Edward's
    death?
  CITIZEN. Ay, sir, true; God while!  
  CITIZEN. Then, masters, troublous
    world.
  CITIZEN. No, no; God's good grace, son shall
    reign.
  CITIZEN. Woe land govern'd child.
  CITIZEN. hope government,
    Which, nonage, council him,
    And, full ripened years, himself,
    doubt, then, till then, govern well.
  CITIZEN. stood state Henry Sixth
    crown'd Paris months old.
  CITIZEN. Stood state so? No, no, good friends,
    God wot;
    land famously enrich'd
    politic grave counsel; King
    virtuous uncles protect Grace.
  CITIZEN. Why, hath this, father and
    mother.
  CITIZEN. father,
    father all;  
    emulation nearest
    touch near, God prevent not.
    O, full danger Duke Gloucester!
    Queen's sons brothers haught proud;
    rul'd, rule,
    sickly land solace before.
  CITIZEN. Come, come, fear worst; be
    well.
  CITIZEN. clouds seen, wise men put on
    cloaks;
    great leaves fall, winter hand;
    sun sets, doth night?
    Untimely storms make men expect dearth.
    well; but, God sort so,
    'Tis deserve expect.
  CITIZEN. Truly, hearts men fun fear.
    reason man
    heavily fun dread.
  CITIZEN. days change, so;
    divine instinct men's minds mistrust  
    Ensuing danger; proof see
    water swell boist'rous storm.
    leave God. away?
  CITIZEN. Marry, justices.
  CITIZEN. I; bear company.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE 4.

London. palace

Enter ARCHBISHOP YORK, young DUKE YORK, QUEEN ELIZABETH,
and DUCHESS YORK

  ARCHBISHOP. night, hear, lay Stony Stratford,
    Northampton rest to-night;
    To-morrow day here.
  DUCHESS. long heart Prince.
    hope grown him.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. hear no; son York
    overta'en growth.
  YORK. Ay, mother; so.
  DUCHESS. Why, good cousin, good grow.
  YORK. Grandam, night sit supper,
    uncle Rivers talk'd grow
    brother. 'Ay,' quoth uncle Gloucester
    'Small herbs grace: great weeds grow apace.'
    since, methinks, grow fast,
    sweet flow'rs slow weeds make haste.  
  DUCHESS. Good faith, good faith, hold
    object thee.
    wretched'st thing young,
    long a-growing leisurely
    That, rule true, gracious.
  ARCHBISHOP. doubt is, gracious madam.
  DUCHESS. hope is; mothers doubt.
  YORK. Now, troth, rememb'red,
    uncle's Grace flout
    touch growth nearer touch'd mine.
  DUCHESS. How, young York? prithee hear it.
  YORK. Marry, uncle grew fast
    gnaw crust hours old.
    'Twas full years ere tooth.
    Grandam, biting jest.
  DUCHESS. prithee, pretty York, told thee this?
  YORK. Grandam, nurse.
  DUCHESS. nurse! dead ere thou wast
    born.
  YORK. 'twere she, told me.  
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. parlous boy! to, too
    shrewd.
  ARCHBISHOP. Good madam, angry child.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Pitchers ears.

                        Enter MESSENGER

  ARCHBISHOP. messenger. news?
  MESSENGER. news, lord, grieves report.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. doth Prince?
  MESSENGER. Well, madam, health.
  DUCHESS. thy news?
  MESSENGER. Lord Rivers Lord Grey
    Pomfret, them
    Sir Thomas Vaughan, prisoners.
  DUCHESS. hath committed them?
  MESSENGER. mighty Dukes, Gloucester Buckingham.
  ARCHBISHOP. offence?
  MESSENGER. sum can, disclos'd.
    nobles committed  
    unknown me, gracious lord.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Ay me, ruin house!
    tiger hath seiz'd gentle hind;
    Insulting tyranny begins jet
    innocent aweless throne.
    Welcome, destruction, blood, massacre!
    see, map, end all.
  DUCHESS. Accursed unquiet wrangling days,
    mine eyes beheld!
    husband lost life crown;
    sons toss'd
    joy weep gain loss;
    seated, domestic broils
    Clean over-blown, conquerors
    Make war themselves-brother brother,
    Blood blood, self. O, preposterous
    frantic outrage, end thy damned spleen,
    die, death more!
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Come, come, boy; to
    sanctuary.  
    Madam, farewell.
  DUCHESS. Stay, you.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. cause.
  ARCHBISHOP.  [To QUEEN]  gracious lady, go.
    thither bear treasure goods.
    part, resign Grace
    seal keep; betide me
    tender yours!
    Go, conduct sanctuary.                Exeunt
