ACT III. SCENE 1.

London. street

The trumpets sound. Enter PRINCE WALES, GLOUCESTER, BUCKINGHAM,
CATESBY, CARDINAL BOURCHIER, others

  BUCKINGHAM. Welcome, sweet Prince, London, your
    chamber.
  GLOUCESTER. Welcome, dear cousin, thoughts' sovereign.
    weary hath made melancholy.
  PRINCE. No, uncle; crosses way
    made tedious, wearisome, heavy.
    uncles me.
  GLOUCESTER. Sweet Prince, untainted virtue your
    years
    Hath div'd world's deceit;
    distinguish man
    outward show; which, God knows,
    Seldom jumpeth heart.
    uncles dangerous;
    Grace attended sug'red words  
    look'd poison hearts.
    God false friends!
  PRINCE. God false friends! were
    none.
  GLOUCESTER. lord, Mayor London greet
    you.

                Enter LORD MAYOR train

  MAYOR. God bless Grace health happy days!
  PRINCE. you, good lord, all.
    thought mother brother York
    long ere met way.
    Fie, slug Hastings, not
    no!

                        Enter LORD HASTINGS

  BUCKINGHAM. And, good time, sweating
    Lord.  
  PRINCE. Welcome, lord. What, mother come?
  HASTINGS. occasion, God knows, I,
    Queen mother brother York
    sanctuary. tender Prince
    fain meet Grace,
    mother perforce withheld.
  BUCKINGHAM. Fie, indirect peevish course
    hers? Lord Cardinal, Grace
    Persuade Queen send Duke York
    princely brother presently?
    deny, Lord Hastings, him
    jealous arms pluck perforce.
  CARDINAL. Lord Buckingham, weak oratory
    mother win Duke York,
    Anon expect here; obdurate
    mild entreaties, God heaven forbid
    infringe holy privilege
    blessed sanctuary! land
    guilty deep sin.
  BUCKINGHAM. senseless-obstinate, lord,  
    ceremonious traditional.
    Weigh grossness age,
    break sanctuary seizing him.
    benefit thereof granted
    dealings deserv'd place
    wit claim place.
    Prince hath claim'd deserv'd it,
    therefore, mine opinion, it.
    Then, taking there,
    break privilege charter there.
    Oft heard sanctuary men;
    sanctuary children till now.
  CARDINAL. lord, o'errule mind once.
    on, Lord Hastings, me?
  HASTINGS. go, lord.
  PRINCE. Good lords, make speedy haste may.
                                    Exeunt CARDINAL HASTINGS
    Say, uncle Gloucester, brother come,
    sojourn till coronation?
  GLOUCESTER. royal self.  
    counsel you, day two
    Highness repose Tower,
    thought fit
    health recreation.
  PRINCE. Tower, place.
    Julius Caesar build place, lord?
  BUCKINGHAM. did, gracious lord, begin place,
    Which, since, succeeding ages re-edified.
  PRINCE. record, reported
    Successively age age, built it?
  BUCKINGHAM. record, gracious lord.
  PRINCE. say, lord, regist'red,
    Methinks truth Eve age age,
    'twere retail'd posterity,
    general all-ending day.
  GLOUCESTER.  [Aside]  wise young, say, never
    live long.
  PRINCE. you, uncle?
  GLOUCESTER. say, characters, fame lives long.
    [Aside]  Thus, formal vice, Iniquity,  
    moralize meanings word.
  PRINCE. Julius Caesar famous man;
    valour enrich wit,
    wit set make valour live.
    Death makes conquest conqueror;
    lives fame, life.
    what, cousin Buckingham-
  BUCKINGHAM. What, gracious lord?
  PRINCE. live man,
    win ancient France again,
    die soldier liv'd king.
  GLOUCESTER.  [Aside]  Short summers lightly forward
    spring.

              Enter HASTINGS, young YORK, CARDINAL

  BUCKINGHAM. Now, good time, Duke of
    York.
  PRINCE. Richard York, fares loving brother?
  YORK. Well, dread lord; now.  
  PRINCE. Ay brother, grief, yours.
    late died title,
    death hath lost majesty.
  GLOUCESTER. fares cousin, noble Lord York?
  YORK. you, gentle uncle. O, lord,
    idle weeds fast growth.
    Prince brother hath outgrown far.
  GLOUCESTER. hath, lord.
  YORK. idle?
  GLOUCESTER. O, fair cousin, so.
  YORK. beholding I.
  GLOUCESTER. command sovereign;
    power kinsman.
  YORK. pray you, uncle, give dagger.
  GLOUCESTER. dagger, cousin? heart!
  PRINCE. beggar, brother?
  YORK. kind uncle, give,
    toy, grief give.
  GLOUCESTER. greater gift give cousin.
  YORK. greater gift! O, sword it!  
  GLOUCESTER. Ay, gentle cousin, light enough.
  YORK. O, then, part light gifts:
    weightier things beggar nay.
  GLOUCESTER. heavy Grace wear.
  YORK. weigh lightly, heavier.
  GLOUCESTER. What, weapon, little
    Lord?
  YORK. would, call me.
  GLOUCESTER. How?
  YORK. Little.
  PRINCE. Lord York cross talk.
    Uncle, Grace bear him.
  YORK. mean, bear me, bear me.
    Uncle, brother mocks me;
    little, ape,
    thinks bear shoulders.
  BUCKINGHAM. sharp-provided wit reasons!
    mitigate scorn uncle
    prettily aptly taunts himself.
    cunning young wonderful.  
  GLOUCESTER. lord, will't pass along?
    good cousin Buckingham
    mother, entreat her
    meet Tower you.
  YORK. What, Tower, lord?
  PRINCE. Lord Protector so.
  YORK. sleep quiet Tower.
  GLOUCESTER. Why, fear?
  YORK. Marry, uncle Clarence' angry ghost.
    grandam told murder'd there.
  PRINCE. fear uncles dead.
  GLOUCESTER. live, hope.
  PRINCE. live, hope fear.
    come, lord; heavy heart,
    Thinking them, Tower.
    sennet.
              Exeunt GLOUCESTER, BUCKINGHAM, CATESBY
  BUCKINGHAM. you, lord, prating York
    incensed subtle mother
    taunt scorn opprobriously?  
  GLOUCESTER. doubt, doubt. O, 'tis perilous boy;
    Bold, quick, ingenious, forward, capable.
    mother's, top toe.
  BUCKINGHAM. Well, rest. hither, Catesby.
    Thou art sworn deeply effect intend
    closely conceal impart.
    Thou know'st reasons urg'd way.
    think'st thou? easy matter
    make William Lord Hastings mind,
    instalment noble Duke
    seat royal famous isle?
  CATESBY. father's sake loves Prince
    won aught him.
  BUCKINGHAM. think'st thou Stanley? Will
    he?
  CATESBY. Hastings doth.
  BUCKINGHAM. then, this: go, gentle
    Catesby,
    And, off, sound thou Lord Hastings
    doth stand affected purpose;  
    summon to-morrow Tower,
    sit coronation.
    thou dost find tractable us,
    Encourage him, reasons;
    leaden, icy, cold, unwilling,
    thou too, break talk,
    give notice inclination;
    to-morrow hold divided councils,
    thyself shalt highly employ'd.
  GLOUCESTER. Commend Lord William. him,
    Catesby,
    ancient knot dangerous adversaries
    To-morrow blood Pomfret Castle;
    bid lord, joy good news,
    Give Mistress Shore gentle kiss more.
  BUCKINGHAM. Good Catesby, effect business soundly.
  CATESBY. good lords both, heed can.
  GLOUCESTER. hear you, Catesby, ere sleep?
  CATESBY. shall, lord.
  GLOUCESTER. Crosby House, find both.  
                                                    Exit CATESBY
  BUCKINGHAM. Now, lord, we
    perceive
    Lord Hastings yield complots?
  GLOUCESTER. Chop head-something will
    determine.
    And, King, claim thou me
    earldom Hereford movables
    Whereof King brother possess'd.
  BUCKINGHAM. claim promise Grace's hand.
  GLOUCESTER. yielded kindness.
    Come, betimes, afterwards
    digest complots form.              Exeunt




SCENE 2.

Before LORD HASTING'S house

Enter MESSENGER door HASTINGS

  MESSENGER. lord, lord!                        [Knocking]
  HASTINGS.  [Within]  knocks?
  MESSENGER. Lord Stanley.
  HASTINGS.  [Within]  is't o'clock?
  MESSENGER. stroke four.

                        Enter LORD HASTINGS

  HASTINGS. Lord Stanley sleep tedious
    nights?
  MESSENGER. appears say.
    First, commends noble self.
  HASTINGS. then?
  MESSENGER. certifies lordship night
    dreamt boar razed helm.
    Besides, councils kept,
    determin'd  
    make rue th' other.
    sends lordship's pleasure-
    presently horse him
    speed post north
    shun danger soul divines.
  HASTINGS. Go, fellow, go, return thy lord;
    Bid fear separated council:
    honour one,
    good friend Catesby;
    proceed toucheth us
    Whereof intelligence.
    fears shallow, instance;
    dreams, simple
    trust mock'ry unquiet slumbers.
    fly boar boar pursues
    incense boar follow us
    make pursuit chase.
    Go, bid thy master rise me;
    Tower,
    Where, see, boar kindly.  
  MESSENGER. go, lord, say.
 Exit

                         Enter CATESBY

  CATESBY. good morrows noble lord!
  HASTINGS. Good morrow, Catesby; early stirring.
    news, news, tott'ring state?
  CATESBY. reeling world indeed, lord;
    stand upright
    Till Richard wear garland realm.
  HASTINGS. How, wear garland! Dost thou the
    crown?
  CATESBY. Ay, good lord.
  HASTINGS. crown mine cut my
    shoulders
    crown foul misplac'd.
    canst thou guess doth aim it?
  CATESBY. Ay, life; hopes find forward
    party gain thereof;  
    sends good news,
    day enemies,
    kindred Queen, die Pomfret.
  HASTINGS. Indeed, mourner news,
    adversaries;
    give voice Richard's side
    bar master's heirs true descent,
    God death.
  CATESBY. God lordship gracious mind!
  HASTINGS. laugh twelve month hence,
    brought master's hate,
    live tragedy.
    Well, Catesby, ere fortnight make older,
    send packing on't.
  CATESBY. 'Tis vile thing die, gracious lord,
    men unprepar'd it.
  HASTINGS. O monstrous, monstrous! falls out
    Rivers, Vaughan, Grey; 'twill do
    men safe
    thou I, who, thou knowest, dear  
    princely Richard Buckingham.
  CATESBY. Princes make high account you-
    [Aside]  account head bridge.
  HASTINGS. do, deserv'd it.

                      Enter LORD STANLEY

    on, on; boar-spear, man?
    Fear boar, unprovided?
  STANLEY. lord, good morrow; good morrow, Catesby.
    jest on, but, holy rood,
    councils, I.
  HASTINGS. lord, hold life dear yours,
    days, protest,
    precious 'tis now.
    you, state secure,
    triumphant am?
  STANLEY. lords Pomfret, rode from
    London,
    jocund suppos'd states sure,  
    mistrust;
    day o'ercast.
    sudden stab rancour misdoubt;
    Pray God, say, prove needless coward.
    What, Tower? day spent.
  HASTINGS. Come, come, you. Wot what, my
    Lord?
    To-day lords talk'd beheaded.
  STANLEY. They, truth, wear their
    heads
    accus'd wear hats.
    come, lord, away.

                 Enter HASTINGS, pursuivant

  HASTINGS. before; talk good fellow.
                                      Exeunt STANLEY CATESBY
    now, Hastings! world thee?
  PURSUIVANT. lordship ask.
  HASTINGS. thee, man, 'tis  
    thou met'st meet:
    prisoner Tower
    suggestion Queen's allies;
    now, thee-keep thyself-
    day enernies put death,
    state e'er was.
  PURSUIVANT. God hold it, honour's good content!
  HASTINGS. Gramercy, Hastings; there, drink me.
                                          [Throws purse]
  PURSUIVANT. honour.                          Exit

                            Enter PRIEST

  PRIEST. met, lord; glad honour.
  HASTINGS. thee, good Sir John, heart.
    debt exercise;
    Sabbath, content you.
                                        [He whispers ear]
  PRIEST. wait lordship.
  
                            Enter BUCKINGHAM

  BUCKINGHAM. What, talking priest, Lord
    Chamberlain!
    friends Pomfret, priest:
    honour hath shriving work hand.
  HASTINGS. Good faith, met holy man,
    men talk mind.
    What, Tower?
  BUCKINGHAM. do, lord, long stay there;
    return lordship thence.
  HASTINGS. Nay, enough, stay dinner there.
  BUCKINGHAM.  [Aside]  supper too, thou
    knowest not.-
    Come, go?
  HASTINGS. wait lordship.                 Exeunt




SCENE 3.

Pomfret Castle

Enter SIR RICHARD RATCLIFF, halberds, carrying Nobles,
RIVERS, GREY, VAUGHAN, death

  RIVERS. Sir Richard Ratcliff, thee this:
    To-day shalt thou behold subject die
    truth, duty, loyalty.
  GREY. God bless Prince pack you!
    knot damned blood-suckers.
  VAUGHAN. live cry woe hereafter.
  RATCLIFF. Dispatch; limit lives out.
  RIVERS. O Pomfret, Pomfret! O thou bloody prison,
    Fatal ominous noble peers!
    guilty closure thy walls
  RICHARD hack'd death;
    slander thy dismal seat,
    give thee guiltless blood drink.
  GREY. Margaret's curse fall'n heads,
    exclaim'd Hastings, you, I,  
    standing Richard stabb'd son.
  RIVERS. curs'd Richard, curs'd she
    Buckingham,
    curs'd Hastings. O, remember, God,
    hear prayer them, us!
    sister, princely sons,
    satisfied, dear God, true blood,
    Which, thou know'st, unjustly spilt.
  RATCLIFF. Make haste; hour death expiate.
  RIVERS. Come, Grey; come, Vaughan; embrace.
    Farewell, meet heaven.              Exeunt




SCENE 4

London. Tower

Enter BUCKINGHAM, DERBY, HASTINGS, BISHOP ELY, RATCLIFF, LOVEL,
with seat table

  HASTINGS. Now, noble peers, met
    determine coronation.
    God's speak-when royal day?
  BUCKINGHAM. things ready royal time?
  DERBY. is, nomination.
  BISHOP ELY. To-morrow judge happy day.
  BUCKINGHAM. Lord Protector's mind
    herein?
    noble Duke?
  BISHOP ELY. Grace, think, soonest know
    mind.
  BUCKINGHAM. other's faces; hearts,
    mine yours;
    his, lord, mine.
    Lord Hastings, love.  
  HASTINGS. Grace, loves well;
    purpose coronation
    sounded him, deliver'd
    gracious pleasure therein.
    you, honourable lords, time;
    Duke's behalf give voice,
    Which, presume, gentle part.

                       Enter GLOUCESTER

  BISHOP ELY. happy time, Duke himself.
  GLOUCESTER. noble lords cousins an, good morrow.
    long sleeper, trust
    absence doth neglect great design
    presence concluded.
  BUCKINGHAM. cue, lord,
  WILLIAM Lord Hastings pronounc'd part-
    mean, voice crowning King.
  GLOUCESTER. Lord Hastings man be
    bolder;  
    lordship loves well.
    lord Ely, Holborn
    good strawberries garden there.
    beseech send them.
  BISHOP ELY. Marry will, lord, heart.
 Exit
  GLOUCESTER. Cousin Buckingham, word you.
                                               [Takes aside]
    Catesby hath sounded Hastings business,
    finds testy gentleman hot
    lose head ere give consent
    master's child, worshipfully terms it,
    lose royalty England's throne.
  BUCKINGHAM. Withdraw awhile; you.
                                Exeunt GLOUCESTER BUCKINGHAM
  DERBY. set day triumph.
    To-morrow, judgment, sudden;
    provided
    be, day prolong'd.
  
                    Re-enter BISHOP ELY

  BISHOP ELY. lord Duke Gloucester?
    strawberries.
  HASTINGS. Grace cheerfully smooth this
    morning;
    conceit likes well
    bids good morrow spirit.
    man Christendom
    lesser hide love hate he;
    face straight heart.
  DERBY. heart perceive face
    livelihood show'd to-day?
  HASTINGS. Marry, man offended;
    For, he, shown looks.

               Re-enter GLOUCESTER BUCKINGHAM

  GLOUCESTER. pray all, deserve
    conspire death devilish plots  
    damned witchcraft, prevail'd
    body hellish charms?
  HASTINGS. tender love bear Grace, lord,
    Makes forward princely presence
    doom th' offenders, whosoe'er be.
    say, lord, deserved death.
  GLOUCESTER. eyes witness evil.
    bewitch'd; behold, mine arm
    blasted sapling wither'd up.
    Edward's wife, monstrous witch,
    Consorted harlot strumpet Shore,
    witchcraft marked me.
  HASTINGS. deed, noble lord-
  GLOUCESTER. If?-thou protector damned strumpet,
    Talk'st thou ifs? Thou art traitor.
    head! Saint Paul swear
    dine same.
    Lovel Ratcliff, done.
    rest love me, rise follow me.
                    Exeunt HASTINGS, LOVEL, RATCLIFF  
  HASTINGS. Woe, woe, England! whit me;
    I, fond, prevented this.
  STANLEY dream boar raze helms,
    scorn disdain fly.
    times to-day foot-cloth horse stumble,
    started look'd Tower,
    loath bear slaughter-house.
    O, priest spake me!
    repent told pursuivant,
    triumphing, mine enemies
    To-day Pomfret bloodily butcher'd,
    secure grace favour.
    O Margaret, Margaret, thy heavy curse
    lighted poor Hastings' wretched head!
  RATCLIFF. Come, come, dispatch; Duke at
    dinner.
    Make short shrift; longs head.
  HASTINGS. O momentary grace mortal men,
    hunt grace God!
    builds hope air good  
    Lives drunken sailor mast,
    Ready nod tumble down
    fatal bowels deep.
  LOVEL. Come, come, dispatch; 'tis bootless exclaim.
  HASTINGS. O bloody Richard! Miserable England!
    prophesy fearfull'st time thee
    wretched age hath look'd upon.
    Come, lead block; bear head.
    smile shortly dead.           Exeunt




SCENE 5.

London. Tower-walls

Enter GLOUCESTER BUCKINGHAM rotten armour, marvellous ill-favoured

  GLOUCESTER. Come, cousin, canst thou quake change
    thy colour,
    Murder thy breath middle word,
    begin, stop again,
    thou distraught mad terror?
  BUCKINGHAM. Tut, counterfeit deep tragedian;
    Speak back, pry side,
    Tremble start wagging straw,
    Intending deep suspicion. Ghastly looks
    service, enforced smiles;
    ready offices
    time grace stratagems.
    what, Catesby gone?
  GLOUCESTER. is; and, see, brings mayor along.

                 Enter LORD MAYOR CATESBY  

  BUCKINGHAM. Lord Mayor-
  GLOUCESTER. drawbridge there!
  BUCKINGHAM. Hark! drum.
  GLOUCESTER. Catesby, o'erlook walls.
  BUCKINGHAM. Lord Mayor, reason sent-
  GLOUCESTER. back, defend thee; enemies.
  BUCKINGHAM. God innocence defend guard us!

           Enter LOVEL RATCLIFF, HASTINGS' head

  GLOUCESTER. patient; friends-Ratcliff Lovel.
  LOVEL. head ignoble traitor,
    dangerous unsuspected Hastings.
  GLOUCESTER. dear lov'd man weep.
    plainest harmless creature
    breath'd earth Christian;
    Made book, soul recorded
    history secret thoughts.
    smooth daub'd vice show virtue  
    That, apparent open guilt omitted,
    conversation Shore's wife-
    liv'd attainder suspects.
  BUCKINGHAM. Well, well, covert'st shelt'red
    traitor
    liv'd.
    imagine, believe-
    Were't great preservation
    live it-that subtle traitor
    day plotted, council-house,
    murder good Lord Gloucester.
  MAYOR. so?
  GLOUCESTER. What! Turks Infidels?
    would, form law,
    Proceed rashly villain's death
    extreme peril case,
    peace England persons' safety,
    Enforc'd execution?
  MAYOR. Now, fair befall you! deserv'd death;
    good Graces proceeded  
    warn false traitors attempts.
    look'd hands
    fell Mistress Shore.
  BUCKINGHAM. determin'd die
    lordship end-
    loving haste friends,
    meanings, prevented-
    Because, lord, heard
    traitor speak, timorously confess
    manner purpose treasons:
    signified same
    citizens, haply may
    Misconster wail death.
  MAYOR. But, good lord, Grace's words serve
    heard speak;
    doubt, noble Princes both,
    acquaint duteous citizens
    proceedings cause.
  GLOUCESTER. end wish'd lordship here,
    T' avoid censures carping world.  
  BUCKINGHAM. late intent,
    witness hear intend.
    so, good Lord Mayor, bid farewell.
                                                 Exit LORD MAYOR
  GLOUCESTER. Go, after, after, cousin Buckingham.
    Mayor Guildhall hies post.
    There, meet'st advantage time,
    Infer bastardy Edward's children.
    Edward put death citizen
    make son
    Heir crown-meaning house,
    sign thereof termed so.
    Moreover, urge hateful luxury
    bestial appetite change lust,
    stretch'd servants, daughters, wives,
    raging eye savage heart
    control lusted make prey.
    Nay, need, person:
    them, mother child
    insatiate Edward, noble York  
    princely father wars France
    And, true computation time,
    Found issue begot;
    appeared lineaments,
    noble Duke father.
    touch sparingly, 'twere off;
    Because, lord, mother lives.
  BUCKINGHAM. Doubt not, lord, play orator
    golden fee plead
    myself; so, lord, adieu.
  GLOUCESTER. thrive well, bring Baynard's
    Castle;
    find accompanied
    reverend fathers learned bishops.
  BUCKINGHAM. go; o'clock
    news Guildhall affords.           Exit
  GLOUCESTER. Go, Lovel, speed Doctor Shaw.
    [To CATESBY]  thou Friar Penker. Bid both
    Meet hour Baynard's Castle.
                                       Exeunt GLOUCESTER  
    privy order
    draw brats Clarence sight,
    give order manner person
    time recourse Princes.                Exit




SCENE 6.

London. street

Enter SCRIVENER

  SCRIVENER. indictment good Lord Hastings;
    set hand fairly engross'd
    to-day read o'er Paul's.
    mark sequel hangs together:
    Eleven hours spent write over,
    yesternight Catesby me;
    precedent full long a-doing;
    hours Hastings liv'd,
    Untainted, unexamin'd, free, liberty.
    good world while! gros
    palpable device?
    bold sees not?
    Bad world; nought,
    ill dealing thought.          Exit




SCENE 7.

London. Baynard's Castle

Enter GLOUCESTER BUCKINGHAM, doors

  GLOUCESTER. now, now! citizens?
  BUCKINGHAM. Now, holy Mother Lord,
    citizens mum, word.
  GLOUCESTER. Touch'd bastardy Edward's
    children?
  BUCKINGHAM. did; contract Lady Lucy,
    contract deputy France;
    Th' insatiate greediness desire,
    enforcement city wives;
    tyranny trifles; bastardy,
    got, father France,
    resemblance, Duke.
    Withal infer lineaments,
    idea father,
    form nobleness mind;
    Laid open victories Scotland,
    discipline war, wisdom peace,  
    bounty, virtue, fair humility;
    Indeed, left fitting purpose
    Untouch'd slightly handled discourse.
    mine oratory drew end
    bid love country's good
    Cry 'God save Richard, England's royal King!'
  GLOUCESTER. so?
  BUCKINGHAM. No, God me, spake word;
    But, dumb statues breathing stones,
    Star'd other, look'd deadly pale.
    saw, reprehended them,
    ask'd Mayor meant wilfull silence.
    answer was, people used
    spoke Recorder.
    urg'd tale again.
    'Thus saith Duke, hath Duke inferr'd'-
    spoke warrant himself.
    done, followers mine own
    lower end hall hurl'd caps,
    ten voices cried 'God save King Richard!'  
    vantage few-
    'Thanks, gentle citizens friends,' quoth I
    'This general applause cheerful shout
    Argues wisdoms love Richard.'
    brake away.
  GLOUCESTER. What, tongueless blocks they? Would
    speak?
    Mayor brethren come?
  BUCKINGHAM. Mayor hand. Intend fear;
    spoke mighty suit;
    prayer-book hand,
    stand churchmen, good lord;
    ground make holy descant;
    easily won requests.
    Play maid's part: answer nay, it.
  GLOUCESTER. go; plead them
    nay thee myself,
    doubt bring happy issue.
  BUCKINGHAM. Go, go, leads; Lord Mayor
    knocks.                                      Exit GLOUCESTER  

           Enter LORD MAYOR, ALDERMEN, citizens

    Welcome, lord. dance attendance here;
    Duke spoke withal.

                         Enter CATESBY

    Now, Catesby, lord request?
  CATESBY. doth entreat Grace, noble lord,
    visit to-morrow day.
    within, reverend fathers,
    Divinely bent meditation;
    worldly suits mov'd,
    draw holy exercise.
  BUCKINGHAM. Return, good Catesby, gracious Duke;
    him, myself, Mayor Aldermen,
    deep designs, matter great moment,
    importing general good,
    conference Grace.  
  CATESBY. signify straight.          Exit
  BUCKINGHAM. Ah ha, lord, prince Edward!
    lolling lewd love-bed,
    knees meditation;
    dallying brace courtezans,
    meditating deep divines;
    sleeping, engross idle body,
    praying, enrich watchful soul.
    Happy England virtuous prince
    Grace sovereignty thereof;
    But, sure, fear win it.
  MAYOR. Marry, God defend Grace nay!
  BUCKINGHAM. fear will. Catesby again.

                          Re-enter CATESBY

    Now, Catesby, Grace?
  CATESBY. lord,
    wonders end assembled
    troops citizens him.  
    Grace warn'd thereof before,
    fears, lord, good him.
  BUCKINGHAM. noble cousin should
    Suspect good him.
    heaven, perfect love;
    return Grace.
                                                    Exit CATESBY
    holy devout religious men
    beads, 'tis draw thence,
    sweet zealous contemplation.

           Enter GLOUCESTER aloft, BISHOPS.
                      CATESBY returns

  MAYOR. Grace stands 'tween clergymen!
  BUCKINGHAM. props virtue Christian prince,
    stay fall vanity;
    And, see, book prayer hand,
    True ornaments holy man.
    Famous Plantagenet, gracious Prince,  
    Lend favourable ear requests,
    pardon interruption
    thy devotion Christian zeal.
  GLOUCESTER. lord, apology:
    beseech Grace pardon me,
    Who, earnest service God,
    Deferr'd visitation friends.
    But, leaving this, Grace's pleasure?
  BUCKINGHAM. that, hope, pleaseth God above,
    good men ungovern'd isle.
  GLOUCESTER. suspect offence
    disgracious city's eye,
    reprehend ignorance.
  BUCKINGHAM. have, lord. please
    Grace,
    entreaties, amend fault!
  GLOUCESTER. wherefore breathe Christian land?
  BUCKINGHAM. then, fault resign
    supreme seat, throne majestical,
    scept'red office ancestors,  
    state fortune due birth,
    lineal glory royal house,
    corruption blemish'd stock;
    Whiles mildness sleepy thoughts,
    waken country's good,
    noble isle doth proper limbs;
    face defac'd scars infamy,
    royal stock graft ignoble plants,
    should'red swallowing gulf
    dark forgetfulness deep oblivion.
    recure, heartily solicit
    gracious charge
    kingly government land-
    protector, steward, substitute,
    lowly factor another's gain;
    successively, blood blood,
    birth, empery, own.
    this, consorted citizens,
    worshipful loving friends,
    vehement instigation,  
    move Grace.
  GLOUCESTER. depart silence
    bitterly speak reproof
    fitteth degree condition.
    answer, haply think
    Tongue-tied ambition, replying, yielded
    bear golden yoke sovereignty,
    fondly impose me;
    reprove suit yours,
    season'd faithful love me,
    Then, side, check'd friends.
    Therefore-to speak, avoid first,
    then, speaking, incur last-
    Definitively answer you:
    love deserves thanks, desert
    Unmeritable shuns high request.
    First, obstacles cut away,
    path crown,
    ripe revenue due birth,
    poverty spirit,  
    mighty defects,
    hide greatness-
    bark brook mighty sea-
    greatness covet hid,
    vapour glory smother'd.
    But, God thank'd, me-
    you, need.
    royal tree hath left royal fruit
    Which, mellow'd stealing hours time,
    seat majesty
    make, doubt, happy reign.
    lay lay me-
    fortune happy stars,
    God defend wring him.
  BUCKINGHAM. lord, argues conscience your
    Grace;
    respects thereof nice trivial,
    circumstances considered.
    Edward brother's son.
    too, Edward's wife;  
    contract Lady Lucy-
    mother lives witness vow-
    afterward substitute betroth'd
    Bona, sister King France.
    put off, poor petitioner,
    care-craz'd mother sons,
    beauty-waning distressed widow,
    afternoon days,
    Made prize purchase wanton eye,
    Seduc'd pitch height degree
    base declension loath'd bigamy.
    her, unlawful bed, got
    Edward, manners call Prince.
    bitterly expostulate,
    Save that, reverence alive,
    give sparing limit tongue.
    Then, good lord, royal self
    proffer'd benefit dignity;
    bless land withal,
    draw noble ancestry  
    corruption abusing times
    lineal true-derived course.
  MAYOR. Do, good lord; citizens entreat you.
  BUCKINGHAM. Refuse not, mighty lord, proffer'd love.
  CATESBY. O, make joyful, grant lawful suit!
  GLOUCESTER. Alas, heap care me?
    unfit state majesty.
    beseech you, amiss:
    yield you.
  BUCKINGHAM. refuse it-as, love zeal,
    Loath depose child, brother's son;
    tenderness heart
    gentle, kind, effeminate remorse,
    noted kindred
    egally estates-
    know, whe'er accept suit no,
    brother's son reign king;
    plant throne
    disgrace downfall house;
    resolution leave you.  
    Come, citizens. Zounds, entreat more.
  GLOUCESTER. O, swear, lord Buckingham.
                          Exeunt BUCKINGHAM, MAYOR, citizens
  CATESBY. Call again, sweet Prince, accept suit.
    deny them, land rue it.
  GLOUCESTER. enforce world cares?
    Call again. made stones,
    penetrable kind entreaties,
    Albeit conscience soul.

                  Re-enter BUCKINGHAM rest

    Cousin Buckingham, sage grave men,
    buckle fortune back,
    bear burden, whe'er no,
    patience endure load;
    black scandal foul-fac'd reproach
    Attend sequel imposition,
    mere enforcement acquittance me
    impure blots stains thereof;  
    God doth know, partly see,
    desire this.
  MAYOR. God bless Grace! it, it.
  GLOUCESTER. so, truth.
  BUCKINGHAM. salute royal title-
    Long live King Richard, England's worthy King!
  ALL. Amen.
  BUCKINGHAM. To-morrow crown'd?
  GLOUCESTER. please, so.
  BUCKINGHAM. To-morrow, then, attend Grace;
    so, joyfully, leave.
  GLOUCESTER.  [To BISHOPS]  Come, holy
    work again.
    Farewell, cousin; farewell, gentle friends.        Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE 1.

London. Tower

Enter QUEEN ELIZABETH, DUCHESS YORK, MARQUIS DORSET, door;
ANNE, DUCHESS GLOUCESTER, leading LADY MARGARET PLANTAGENET,
CLARENCE's young daughter, door

  DUCHESS. meets here? niece Plantagenet,
    Led hand kind aunt Gloucester?
    Now, life, wand'ring Tower,
    pure heart's love, greet tender Princes.
    Daughter, met.
  ANNE. God give Graces both
    happy joyful time day!
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. you, good sister! Whither
    away?
  ANNE. farther Tower; and, guess,
    devotion yourselves,
    gratulate gentle Princes there.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Kind sister, thanks; enter  
    together.

                       Enter BRAKENBURY

    good time, lieutenant comes.
    Master Lieutenant, pray you, leave,
    doth Prince, young son York?
  BRAKENBURY. well, dear madam. patience,
    suffer visit them.
    King hath strictly charg'd contrary.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. King! that?
  BRAKENBURY. Lord Protector.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Lord protect kingly
    title!
    Hath set bounds love me?
    mother; bar them?
  DUCHESS. father's mother; them.
  ANNE. aunt law, love mother.
    bring sights; bear thy blame,
    thy office thee peril.  
  BRAKENBURY. No, madam, no. leave so;
    bound oath, pardon me.            Exit

                         Enter STANLEY

  STANLEY. meet you, ladies, hour hence,
    salute Grace York mother
    reverend looker-on fair queens.
    [To ANNE]  Come, madam, straight to
    Westminster,
    crowned Richard's royal queen.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Ah, cut lace asunder
    pent heart scope beat,
    swoon dead-killing news!
  ANNE. Despiteful tidings! O unpleasing news!
  DORSET. good cheer; mother, fares Grace?
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. O Dorset, speak me, thee
    gone!
    Death destruction dogs thee thy heels;
    Thy mother's ominous children.  
    thou wilt outstrip death, cross seas,
    live Richmond, reach hell.
    Go, hie thee, hie thee slaughter-house,
    thou increase number dead,
    make die thrall Margaret's curse,
    mother, wife, England's counted queen.
  STANLEY. Full wise care counsel, madam.
    swift advantage hours;
    letters son
    behalf, meet way.
    ta'en tardy unwise delay.
  DUCHESS. O ill-dispersing wind misery!
    O accursed womb, bed death!
    cockatrice hast thou hatch'd world,
    unavoided eye murderous.
  STANLEY. Come, madam, come; haste sent.
  ANNE. unwillingness go.
    O, God inclusive verge
    golden metal round brow
    red-hot steel, sear brains!  
    Anointed deadly venom,
    die ere men 'God save Queen!'
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Go, go, poor soul; envy thy glory.
    feed humour, thyself harm.
  ANNE. No, why? husband now
    me, follow'd Henry's corse;
    scarce blood wash'd hands
    issued angel husband,
    dear saint weeping follow'd-
    O, when, say, look'd Richard's face,
    wish: 'Be thou' quoth 'accurs'd
    making me, young, widow;
    thou wed'st, sorrow haunt thy bed;
    thy wife, mad,
    miserable life thee
    thou hast made dear lord's death.'
    Lo, ere repeat curse again,
    small time, woman's heart
    Grossly grew captive honey words
    prov'd subject mine soul's curse,  
    hitherto hath held eyes rest;
    hour bed
    enjoy golden dew sleep,
    timorous dreams awak'd.
    Besides, hates father Warwick;
    will, doubt, shortly rid me.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Poor heart, adieu! pity thy complaining.
  ANNE. soul mourn yours.
  DORSET. Farewell, thou woeful welcomer glory!
  ANNE. Adieu, poor soul, tak'st thy leave it!
  DUCHESS.  [To DORSET]  thou Richmond, good
    fortune guide thee!
    [To ANNE]  thou Richard, good angels tend
    thee!  [To QUEEN ELIZABETH]  thou sanctuary, good
    thoughts possess thee!
    grave, peace rest lie me!
    Eighty odd years sorrow seen,
    hour's joy wreck'd week teen.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Stay, back the
    Tower.  
    Pity, ancient stones, tender babes
    envy hath immur'd walls,
    Rough cradle pretty ones.
    Rude ragged nurse, sullen playfellow
    tender princes, babies well.
    foolish sorrows bids stones farewell.         Exeunt




SCENE 2.

London. palace

Sound sennet. Enter RICHARD, pomp, KING; BUCKINGHAM, CATESBY,
RATCLIFF, LOVEL, PAGE, others

  KING RICHARD. Stand apart. Cousin Buckingham!
  BUCKINGHAM. gracious sovereign?
  KING RICHARD. Give thy hand.
                           [Here ascendeth throne. Sound]
    high, thy advice
    thy assistance, King Richard seated.
    wear glories day;
    last, rejoice them?
  BUCKINGHAM. live they, last!
  KING RICHARD. Ah, Buckingham, play touch,
    thou current gold indeed.
    Young Edward lives-think speak.
  BUCKINGHAM. on, loving lord.
  KING RICHARD. Why, Buckingham, King.
  BUCKINGHAM. Why, are, thrice-renowned lord.  
  KING RICHARD. Ha! King? 'Tis so; Edward lives.
  BUCKINGHAM. True, noble Prince.
  KING RICHARD. O bitter consequence:
    Edward live-true noble Prince!
    Cousin, thou wast wont dull.
    plain? bastards dead.
    suddenly perform'd.
    say'st thou now? Speak suddenly, brief.
  BUCKINGHAM. Grace pleasure.
  KING RICHARD. Tut, tut, thou art ice; thy kindness freezes.
    Say, thy consent die?
  BUCKINGHAM. Give breath, pause,
    dear Lord,
    positively speak this.
    resolve presently.                    Exit
  CATESBY.  [Aside another]  King angry; see, he
    gnaws lip.
  KING RICHARD. converse iron-witted fools
                                      [Descends throne]
    unrespective boys;  
    considerate eyes.
    High-reaching Buckingham grows circumspect.
    Boy!
  PAGE. lord?
  KING RICHARD. Know'st thou corrupting
    gold
    tempt close exploit death?
  PAGE. discontented gentleman
    humble means match haughty spirit.
    Gold good twenty orators,
    will, doubt, tempt anything.
  KING RICHARD. name?
  PAGE. name, lord, Tyrrel.
  KING RICHARD. partly man. Go, call hither,
    boy.                                               Exit PAGE
    deep-revolving witty Buckingham
    neighbour counsels.
    Hath long held me, untir'd,
    stops breath? Well, so.
  
                            Enter STANLEY

    now, Lord Stanley! news?
  STANLEY. Know, loving lord,
    Marquis Dorset, hear, fled
    Richmond, parts abides.    [Stands apart]
  KING RICHARD. hither, Catesby. Rumour abroad
    Anne, wife, grievous sick;
    order keeping close.
    Inquire poor gentleman,
    marry straight Clarence' daughter-
    boy foolish, fear him.
    thou dream'st! again, give out
    Anne, queen, sick die.
    it; stands upon
    stop hopes growth damage me.
                                                    Exit CATESBY
    married brother's daughter,
    kingdom stands brittle glass.
    Murder brothers, marry her!  
    Uncertain gain! in
    blood sin pluck sin.
    Tear-falling pity dwells eye.

                     Re-enter PAGE, TYRREL

    thy Tyrrel?
  TYRREL. James Tyrrel, obedient subject.
  KING RICHARD. Art thou, indeed?
  TYRREL. Prove me, gracious lord.
  KING RICHARD. Dar'st'thou resolve kill friend mine?
  TYRREL. you;
    kill enemies.
  KING RICHARD. Why, thou hast it. deep enemies,
    Foes rest, sweet sleep's disturbers,
    thee deal upon.
  TYRREL, bastards Tower.
  TYRREL. open means them,
    rid fear them.
  KING RICHARD. Thou sing'st sweet music. Hark,  
    hither, Tyrrel.
    Go, token. Rise, lend thine ear.      [Whispers]
    so: done,
    love thee prefer thee it.
  TYRREL. dispatch straight.                      Exit

                    Re-enter BUCKINGHAM

    BUCKINGHAM. lord, consider'd mind
    late request sound in.
  KING RICHARD. Well, rest. Dorset fled to
    Richmond.
  BUCKINGHAM. hear news, lord.
  KING RICHARD. Stanley, wife's son: well, look
    it.
  BUCKINGHAM. lord, claim gift, due promise,
    honour faith pawn'd:
    Th' earldom Hereford movables
    promised possess.
  KING RICHARD. Stanley, wife; convey  
    Letters Richmond, answer it.
  BUCKINGHAM. Highness request?
  KING RICHARD. remember me: Henry Sixth
    prophesy Richmond King,
    Richmond peevish boy.
    king!-perhaps-
  BUCKINGHAM. lord-
  KING RICHARD. chance prophet that
    time
    told me, by, kill him?
  BUCKINGHAM. lord, promise earldom-
  KING RICHARD. Richmond! Exeter,
    mayor courtesy show'd castle
    call'd Rugemount, started,
    bard Ireland told once
    live long Richmond.
  BUCKINGHAM. lord-
  KING RICHARD. Ay, o'clock?
  BUCKINGHAM. bold put Grace mind
    promis'd me.  
  KING RICHARD. Well, o'clock?
  BUCKINGHAM. stroke ten.
  KING RICHARD. Well, strike.
  BUCKINGHAM. strike?
  KING RICHARD. Jack thou keep'st the
    stroke
    Betwixt thy begging meditation.
    giving vein to-day.
  BUCKINGHAM. resolve suit.
  KING RICHARD. Thou troublest me; vein.
                                       Exeunt Buckingham
  BUCKINGHAM. thus? Repays deep service
    contempt? Made King this?
    O, Hastings, gone
    Brecknock fearful head on!               Exit




SCENE 3.

London. palace

Enter TYRREL

  TYRREL. tyrannous bloody act done,
    arch deed piteous massacre
    land guilty of.
    Dighton Forrest, suborn
    piece ruthless butchery,
    Albeit flesh'd villains, bloody dogs,
    Melted tenderness mild compassion,
    Wept children deaths' sad story.
    'O, thus' quoth Dighton 'lay gentle babes'-
    'Thus, thus,' quoth Forrest 'girdling another
    alabaster innocent arms.
    lips red roses stalk,
    summer beauty kiss'd other.
    book prayers pillow lay;
    once,' quoth Forrest 'almost chang'd mind;
    But, O, devil'-there villain stopp'd;
    Dighton told on: 'We smothered  
    replenished sweet work nature
    prime creation e'er framed.'
    conscience remorse
    speak; left both,
    bear tidings bloody King.

                        Enter KING RICHARD

    comes. health, sovereign lord!
  KING RICHARD. Kind Tyrrel, happy thy news?
  TYRREL. thing gave charge
    Beget happiness, happy then,
    done.
  KING RICHARD. didst thou dead?
  TYRREL. did, lord.
  KING RICHARD. buried, gentle Tyrrel?
  TYRREL. chaplain Tower hath buried them;
    where, truth, know.
  KING RICHARD. me, Tyrrel, supper,
    thou shalt process death.  
    Meantime, thee good
    inheritor thy desire.
    Farewell till then.
  TYRREL. humbly leave.                           Exit
  KING RICHARD. son Clarence pent close;
    daughter meanly match'd marriage;
    sons Edward sleep Abraham's bosom,
    Anne wife hath bid world good night.
    Now, Britaine Richmond aims
    young Elizabeth, brother's daughter,
    knot proudly crown,
    I, jolly thriving wooer.

                           Enter RATCLIFF

  RATCLIFF. lord!
  KING RICHARD. Good bad news, thou com'st so
    bluntly?
  RATCLIFF. Bad news, lord: Morton fled Richmond;
    Buckingham, back'd hardy Welshmen,  
    field, power increaseth.
  KING RICHARD. Ely Richmond troubles near
    Buckingham rash-levied strength.
    Come, learn'd fearful commenting
    leaden servitor dull delay;
    Delay leads impotent snail-pac'd beggary.
    fiery expedition wing,
    Jove's Mercury, herald king!
    Go, muster men. counsel shield.
    traitors brave field.       Exeunt




SCENE 4.

London. palace

Enter QUEEN MARGARET

  QUEEN MARGARET. prosperity begins mellow
    drop rotten mouth death.
    confines slily lurk'd
    watch waning mine enemies.
    dire induction witness to,
    France, hoping consequence
    prove bitter, black, tragical.
    Withdraw thee, wretched Margaret. here?
                                                       [Retires]

           Enter QUEEN ELIZABETH DUCHESS YORK

  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Ah, poor princes! ah, tender
    babes!
    unblown flowers, new-appearing sweets!
    gentle souls fly air
    fix'd doom perpetual,  
    Hover airy wings
    hear mother's lamentation.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Hover her; right
    Hath dimm'd infant morn aged night.
  DUCHESS. miseries craz'd voice
    woe-wearied tongue mute.
    Edward Plantagenet, art thou dead?
  QUEEN MARGARET. Plantagenet doth quit Plantagenet,
    Edward Edward pays dying debt.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Wilt thou, O God, fly gentle
    lambs
    throw entrails wolf?
    didst thou sleep deed done?
  QUEEN MARGARET. holy Harry died, sweet
    son.
  DUCHESS. Dead life, blind sight, poor mortal living ghost,
    Woe's scene, world's shame, grave's due life usurp'd,
    abstract record tedious days,
    Rest thy unrest England's lawful earth,    [Sitting down]
    Unlawfully made drunk innocent blood.  
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Ah, thou wouldst afford a
    grave
    thou canst yield melancholy seat!
    hide bones, rest here.
    Ah, hath mourn we?
                                           [Sitting her]
  QUEEN MARGARET.  [Coming forward]  ancient sorrow be
    reverend,
    Give mine benefit seniory,
    griefs frown upper hand.
    sorrow admit society,        [Sitting them]
    o'er woes viewing mine.
    Edward, till Richard kill'd him;
    husband, till Richard kill'd him:
    Thou hadst Edward, till Richard kill'd him;
    Thou hadst Richard, till Richard kill'd him.
  DUCHESS. Richard too, thou didst kill him;
    Rutland too, thou holp'st kill him.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Thou hadst Clarence too, Richard
    kill'd him.  
    kennel thy womb hath crept
    hell-hound doth hunt death.
    dog, teeth eyes
    worry lambs lap gentle blood,
    foul defacer God's handiwork,
    excellent grand tyrant earth
    reigns galled eyes weeping souls,
    Thy womb loose chase graves.
    O upright, just, true-disposing God,
    thee carnal cur
    Preys issue mother's body
    makes pew-fellow others' moan!
  DUCHESS. O Harry's wife, triumph woes!
    God witness me, wept thine.
  QUEEN MARGARET. Bear me; hungry revenge,
    cloy beholding it.
    Thy Edward dead, kill'd Edward;
    Edward dead, quit Edward;
    Young York boot, they
    Match'd high perfection loss.  
    Thy Clarence dead stabb'd Edward;
    beholders frantic play,
    Th' adulterate Hastings, Rivers, Vaughan, Grey,
    Untimely smother'd dusky graves.
    Richard lives, hell's black intelligencer;
    reserv'd factor buy souls
    send thither. hand, hand,
    Ensues piteous unpitied end.
    Earth gapes, hell burns, fiends roar, saints pray,
    suddenly convey'd hence.
    Cancel bond life, dear God, pray,
    live 'The dog dead.'
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. O, thou didst prophesy time would
      come
    thee curse
    bottled spider, foul bunch-back'd toad!
  QUEEN MARGARET. Call'd thee vain flourish my
      fortune;
    call'd thee poor shadow, painted queen,
    presentation was,  
    flattering index direful pageant,
    heav'd a-high hurl'd below,
    mother mock'd fair babes,
    dream thou wast, garish flag
    aim dangerous shot,
    sign dignity, breath, bubble,
    queen jest, fill scene.
    thy husband now? thy brothers?
    thy sons? dost thou joy?
    sues, kneels, 'God save Queen'?
    bending peers flattered thee?
    thronging troops thee?
    Decline this, thou art:
    happy wife, distressed widow;
    joyful mother, wails name;
    su'd to, humbly sues;
    Queen, caitiff crown'd care;
    scorn'd me, scorn'd me;
    fear'd all, fearing one;
    commanding all, obey'd none.  
    hath justice whirl'd about
    left thee prey time,
    thought thou wast
    torture thee more, thou art.
    Thou didst usurp place, dost thou not
    Usurp proportion sorrow?
    thy proud neck bears half burden'd yoke,
    slip weary head
    leave burden thee.
    Farewell, York's wife, queen sad mischance;
    English woes make smile France.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. O thou skill'd curses, stay awhile
    teach curse mine enemies!
  QUEEN MARGARET. Forbear sleep nights, fast the
      days;
    Compare dead happiness living woe;
    thy babes sweeter were,
    slew fouler is.
    Bett'ring thy loss makes bad-causer worse;
    Revolving teach thee curse.  
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. words dull; O, quicken them
    thine!
  QUEEN MARGARET. Thy woes make sharp and
    pierce mine.                                       Exit
  DUCHESS. calamity fun words?
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Windy attorneys client woes,
    Airy succeeders intestate joys,
    Poor breathing orators miseries,
    scope; impart
    else, case heart.
  DUCHESS. so, tongue-tied. me,
    breath bitter words smother
    damned son thy sweet sons smother'd.
    trumpet sounds; copious exclaims.

         Enter KING RICHARD train, marching with
                     drums trumpets

  KING RICHARD. intercepts expedition?
  DUCHESS. O, intercepted thee,  
    strangling thee accursed womb,
    slaughters, wretch, thou hast done!
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Hidest thou forehead golden
    crown
    Where't branded, right,
    slaughter Prince ow'd crown,
    dire death poor sons brothers?
    me, thou villain slave, children?
  DUCHESS. Thou toad, thou toad, thy brother
    Clarence?
    Ned Plantagenet, son?
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. gentle Rivers, Vaughan,
    Grey?
  DUCHESS. kind Hastings?
  KING RICHARD. flourish, trumpets! Strike alarum, drums!
    heavens hear tell-tale women
    Rail Lord's anointed. Strike, say!
                                             [Flourish. Alarums]
    patient entreat fair,
    clamorous report war  
    drown exclamations.
  DUCHESS. Art thou son?
  KING RICHARD. Ay, God, father, yourself.
  DUCHESS. patiently hear impatience.
  KING RICHARD. Madam, touch condition
    brook accent reproof.
  DUCHESS. O, speak!
  KING RICHARD. Do, then; hear.
  DUCHESS. mild gentle words.
  KING RICHARD. brief, good mother; haste.
  DUCHESS. Art thou hasty? stay'd thee,
    God knows, torment agony.
  KING RICHARD. comfort you?
  DUCHESS. No, holy rood, thou know'st well
    Thou cam'st earth make earth hell.
    grievous burden thy birth me;
    Tetchy wayward thy infancy;
    Thy school-days frightful, desp'rate, wild, furious;
    Thy prime manhood daring, bold, venturous;
    Thy age confirm'd, proud, subtle, sly, bloody,  
    mild, harmful-kind hatred.
    comfortable hour canst thou name
    grac'd thy company?
  KING RICHARD. Faith, Humphrey Hour, call'd
    Grace
    breakfast company.
    disgracious eye,
    march offend you, madam.
    Strike drum.
  DUCHESS. prithee hear speak.
  KING RICHARD. speak bitterly.
  DUCHESS. Hear word;
    speak thee again.
  KING RICHARD. So.
  DUCHESS. thou wilt die God's ordinance
    Ere war thou turn conqueror;
    grief extreme age perish
    behold thy face again.
    thee grievous curse,
    day battle tire thee  
    complete armour thou wear'st!
    prayers adverse party fight;
    souls Edward's children
    Whisper spirits thine enemies
    promise success victory.
    Bloody thou art; bloody thy end.
    Shame serves thy life doth thy death attend.        Exit
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. cause, less
      spirit curse
    Abides me; amen her.
  KING RICHARD. Stay, madam, talk word you.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. moe sons royal blood
    thee slaughter. daughters, Richard,
    praying nuns, weeping queens;
    level hit lives.
  KING RICHARD. daughter call'd Elizabeth.
    Virtuous fair, royal gracious.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. die this? O, her
      live,
    corrupt manners, stain beauty,  
    Slander false Edward's bed,
    Throw veil infamy;
    live unscarr'd bleeding slaughter,
    confess Edward's daughter.
  KING RICHARD. Wrong birth; royal
    Princess.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. save life so.
  KING RICHARD. life safest birth.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. safety died her
      brothers.
  KING RICHARD. Lo, birth good stars opposite.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. No, lives ill friends were
      contrary.
  KING RICHARD. unavoided doom destiny.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. True, avoided grace makes destiny.
    babes destin'd fairer death,
    grace bless'd thee fairer life.
  KING RICHARD. speak slain cousins.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Cousins, indeed; uncle
      cozen'd  
    comfort, kingdom, kindred, freedom, life.
    hand soever lanc'd tender hearts,
    Thy head, indirectly, gave direction.
    doubt murd'rous knife dull blunt
    Till whetted thy stone-hard heart
    revel entrails lambs.
    stiff grief makes wild grief tame,
    tongue thy ears boys
    Till nails anchor'd thine eyes;
    I, desp'rate bay death,
    poor bark, sails tackling reft,
    Rush pieces thy rocky bosom.
  KING RICHARD. Madam, thrive enterprise
    dangerous success bloody wars,
    intend good yours
    harm'd!
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. good cover'd face of
      heaven,
    discover'd, good?
  KING RICHARD. advancement children, gentle  
    lady.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. scaffold, lose their
    heads?
  KING RICHARD. dignity height Fortune,
    high imperial type earth's glory.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Flatter sorrow report it;
    state, dignity, honour,
    Canst thou demise child mine?
  KING RICHARD. have-ay, all
    withal endow child thine;
    Lethe thy angry soul
    Thou drown sad remembrance wrongs
    thou supposest thee.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. brief, process thy
      kindness
    longer telling thy kindness' date.
  KING RICHARD. know, soul love thy
    daughter.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. daughter's mother thinks her
    soul.  
  KING RICHARD. think?
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. thou dost love daughter from
      thy soul.
    thy soul's love didst thou love brothers,
    heart's love thee it.
  KING RICHARD. hasty confound meaning.
    soul love thy daughter
    intend make Queen England.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Well, then, dost thou be
    king?
  KING RICHARD. makes Queen. else
    be?
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. What, thou?
  KING RICHARD. so. it?
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. canst thou woo her?
  KING RICHARD. learn you,
    acquainted humour.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. wilt thou learn me?
  KING RICHARD. Madam, heart.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Send her, man slew  
    brothers,
    pair bleeding hearts; thereon engrave
    'Edward' 'York.' haply weep;
    present her-as Margaret
    thy father, steep'd Rutland's blood-
    handkerchief; which, her, drain
    purple sap sweet brother's body,
    bid wipe weeping eyes withal.
    inducement move love,
    Send letter thy noble deeds;
    thou mad'st uncle Clarence,
    uncle Rivers; ay, sake
    Mad'st quick conveyance good aunt Anne.
  KING RICHARD. mock me, madam; way
    win daughter.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. way;
    thou couldst put shape
    Richard hath this.
  KING RICHARD. love her.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Nay, choose  
      hate thee,
    bought love bloody spoil.
  KING RICHARD. amended.
    Men deal unadvisedly sometimes,
    after-hours leisure repent.
    kingdom sons,
    make amends give daughter.
    kill'd issue womb,
    quicken increase beget
    Mine issue blood daughter.
    grandam's love
    doating title mother;
    children step below,
    metal, blood;
    pain, save night groans
    Endur'd her, bid sorrow.
    children vexation youth;
    mine comfort age.
    loss son King,
    loss daughter made Queen.  
    make amends would,
    accept kindness can.
    Dorset son, fearful soul
    Leads discontented steps foreign soil,
    fair alliance quickly home
    high promotions great dignity.
    King, calls beauteous daughter wife,
    Familiarly call thy Dorset brother;
    mother king,
    ruins distressful times
    Repair'd double riches content.
    What! goodly days see.
    liquid drops tears shed
    again, transform'd orient pearl,
    Advantaging loan interest
    ten times double gain happiness.
    Go, then, mother, thy daughter go;
    Make bold bashful years experience;
    Prepare ears hear wooer's tale;
    Put tender heart th' aspiring flame  
    golden sovereignty; acquaint Princes
    sweet silent hours marriage joys.
    arm mine hath chastised
    petty rebel, dull-brain'd Buckingham,
    Bound triumphant garlands come,
    lead thy daughter conqueror's bed;
    retail conquest won,
    sole victoress, Caesar's Caesar.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. say? father's
      brother
    lord? uncle?
    slew brothers uncles?
    title woo thee
    God, law, honour, love
    make pleasing tender years?
  KING RICHARD. Infer fair England's peace alliance.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. purchase with
    still-lasting war.
  KING RICHARD. King, command,
    entreats.  
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. hands King's
    King forbids.
  KING RICHARD. high mighty queen.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. wail title, mother doth.
  KING RICHARD. love everlastingly.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. long title 'ever' last?
  KING RICHARD. Sweetly force fair life's end.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. long fairly sweet life
    last?
  KING RICHARD. long heaven nature lengthens it.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. long hell Richard likes it.
  KING RICHARD. I, sovereign, subject low.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. she, subject, loathes such
    sovereignty.
  KING RICHARD. eloquent behalf her.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. honest tale speeds plainly
    told.
  KING RICHARD. plainly loving tale.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Plain honest harsh style.
  KING RICHARD. reasons shallow quick.  
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. O, no, reasons deep and
      dead-
    deep dead, poor infants, graves.
  KING RICHARD. Harp string, madam; past.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Harp till heartstrings
    break.
  KING RICHARD. Now, George, garter, my
    crown-
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Profan'd, dishonour'd, third
    usurp'd.
  KING RICHARD. swear-
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. nothing; oath:
    Thy George, profan'd, hath lost lordly honour;
    Thy garter, blemish'd, pawn'd knightly virtue;
    Thy crown, usurp'd, disgrac'd kingly glory.
    thou wouldst swear believ'd,
    Swear thou hast wrong'd.
  KING RICHARD. Then, self-
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Thy self-misus'd.
  KING RICHARD. Now, world-  
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. 'Tis full thy foul wrongs.
  KING RICHARD. father's death-
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. Thy life hath dishonour'd.
  KING RICHARD. Why, then, God-
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. God's wrong all.
    thou didst fear break oath Him,
    unity King husband made
    Thou hadst broken, brothers died.
    thou hadst fear'd break oath Him,
    Th' imperial metal, circling thy head,
    grac'd tender temples child;
    Princes breathing here,
    now, tender bedfellows dust,
    Thy broken faith hath made prey worms.
    canst thou swear now?
  KING RICHARD. time come.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. thou hast wronged time
    o'erpast;
    tears wash
    time, time past wrong'd thee.  
    children live fathers thou hast slaughter'd,
    Ungovern'd youth, wail age;
    parents live children thou hast butcheed,
    barren plants, wail age.
    Swear time come; thou hast
    Misus'd ere us'd, times ill-us'd o'erpast.
  KING RICHARD. intend prosper repent,
    thrive dangerous affairs
    hostile arms! confound!
    Heaven fortune bar happy hours!
    Day, yield thy light; nor, night, thy rest!
    opposite planets good luck
    proceeding!-if, dear heart's love,
    Immaculate devotion, holy thoughts,
    tender thy beauteous princely daughter.
    consists happiness thine;
    her, thee,
    Herself, land, Christian soul,
    Death, desolation, ruin, decay.
    avoided this;  
    avoided this.
    Therefore, dear mother-I call so-
    attorney love her;
    Plead be, been;
    deserts, deserve.
    Urge necessity state times,
    peevish-fond great designs.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. tempted devil thus?
  KING RICHARD. Ay, devil tempt good.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. forget myself?
  KING RICHARD. Ay, self's remembrance wrong
    yourself.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. thou didst kill children.
  KING RICHARD. daughter's womb bury them;
    Where, nest spicery, breed
    themselves, recomforture.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. win daughter thy will?
  KING RICHARD. happy mother deed.
  QUEEN ELIZABETH. go. Write shortly,
    understand mind.  
  KING RICHARD. Bear true love's kiss; so, farewell.
                               Kissing her. Exit QUEEN ELIZABETH
    Relenting fool, shallow, changing woman!

                 Enter RATCLIFF; CATESBY following

    now! news?
  RATCLIFF. mighty sovereign, western coast
    Rideth puissant navy; shores
    Throng doubtful hollow-hearted friends,
    Unarm'd, unresolv'd beat back.
    'Tis thought Richmond admiral;
    hull, expecting aid
    Buckingham ashore.
  KING RICHARD. light-foot friend post Duke of
    Norfolk.
    Ratcliff, thyself-or Catesby; he?
  CATESBY. Here, good lord.
  KING RICHARD. Catesby, fly Duke.
  CATESBY. lord, convenient haste.  
  KING RICHARD. Ratcliff, hither. Post Salisbury;
    thou com'st thither-  [To CATESBY]  Dull,
    unmindfull villain,
    stay'st thou here, go'st Duke?
  CATESBY. First, mighty liege, Highness' pleasure,
    Grace deliver him.
  KING RICHARD. O, true, good Catesby. Bid levy straight
    greatest strength power make
    meet suddenly Salisbury.
  CATESBY. go.                                            Exit
  RATCLIFF. What, you, Salisbury?
  KING RICHARD. Why, wouldst thou I
    go?
  RATCLIFF. Highness told post before.
  KING RICHARD. mind chang'd.

                           Enter LORD STANLEY

  STANLEY, news you?
  STANLEY. good, liege,  
    hearing;
    bad reported.
  KING RICHARD. Hoyday, riddle! good bad!
    need'st thou run miles about,
    thou mayest thy tale nearest way?
    more, news?
  STANLEY. Richmond seas.
  KING RICHARD. sink, seas him!
    White-liver'd runagate, doth there?
  STANLEY. not, mighty sovereign, guess.
  KING RICHARD. Well, guess?
  STANLEY. Stirr'd Dorset, Buckingham, Morton,
    makes England claim crown.
  KING RICHARD. chair empty? sword unsway'd?
    King dead, empire unpossess'd?
    heir York alive we?
    England's King great York's heir?
    makes seas.
  STANLEY. that, liege, guess.
  KING RICHARD. liege,  
    guess wherefore Welshman comes.
    Thou wilt revolt fly him, fear.
  STANLEY. No, good lord; mistrust not.
  KING RICHARD. thy power then, beat back?
    thy tenants thy followers?
    western shore,
    Safe-conducting rebels ships?
  STANLEY. No, good lord, friends north.
  KING RICHARD. Cold friends me. the
    north,
    serve sovereign west?
  STANLEY. commanded, mighty King.
    Pleaseth Majesty give leave,
    muster friends meet Grace
    time Majesty please.
  KING RICHARD. Ay, ay, thou wouldst join with
    Richmond;
    trust thee.
  STANLEY. mighty sovereign,
    hold friendship doubtful.  
    false.
  KING RICHARD. Go, then, muster men. leave behind
    son, George Stanley. heart firm,
    head's assurance frail.
  STANLEY. deal prove true you.         Exit

                          Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. gracious sovereign, Devonshire,
    friends advertised,
    Sir Edward Courtney haughty prelate,
    Bishop Exeter, elder brother,
    moe confederates, arms.

                         Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. Kent, liege, Guilfords in
    arms;
    hour competitors
    Flock rebels, power grows strong.  

                         Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. lord, army great Buckingham-
  KING RICHARD. you, owls! songs of
    death?                                      [He strikes him]
    There, thou till thou bring news.
  MESSENGER. news Majesty
    sudden floods fall waters
    Buckingham's army dispers'd scatter'd;
    wand'red alone,
    man whither.
  KING RICHARD. cry thee mercy.
    purse cure blow thine.
    Hath well-advised friend proclaim'd
    Reward brings traitor in?
  MESSENGER. proclamation hath made,
    Lord.

                      Enter MESSENGER  

  FOURTH MESSENGER. Sir Thomas Lovel Lord Marquis
    Dorset,
    'Tis said, liege, Yorkshire arms.
    good comfort bring Highness-
    Britaine navy dispers'd tempest.
    Richmond Dorsetshire boat
    shore, banks
    assistants, yea no;
    answer'd Buckingham
    party. He, mistrusting them,
    Hois'd sail, made Britaine.
  KING RICHARD. March on, march on, in
    arms;
    fight foreign enemies,
    beat rebels home.

                          Re-enter CATESBY

  CATESBY. liege, Duke Buckingham taken-  
    news. Earl Richmond
    mighty power landed Milford
    colder tidings, told.
  KING RICHARD. Salisbury! reason
    here
    royal battle won lost.
    order Buckingham brought
    Salisbury; rest march me.
    Flourish.                                             Exeunt




SCENE 5.

LORD DERBY'S house

Enter STANLEY SIR CHRISTOPHER URSWICK

  STANLEY. Sir Christopher, Richmond me:
    sty deadly boar
    son George Stanley frank'd hold;
    revolt, young George's head;
    fear holds present aid.
    So, thee gone; commend thy lord.
    Withal Queen hath heartily consented
    espouse Elizabeth daughter.
    me, princely Richmond now?
  CHRISTOPHER. Pembroke, Ha'rford west Wales.
  STANLEY. men resort him?
  CHRISTOPHER. Sir Walter Herbert, renowned soldier;
  SIR Gilbert Talbot, Sir William Stanley,
  OXFORD, redoubted Pembroke, Sir James Blunt,
    Rice ap Thomas, valiant crew;
    great worth;
    London bend power,  
    fought withal.
  STANLEY. Well, hie thee thy lord; kiss hand;
    letter resolve mind.
    Farewell.                                             Exeunt

ACT V. SCENE 1.

Salisbury. open place

Enter SHERIFF guard, BUCKINGHAM, led execution

  BUCKINGHAM. King Richard speak with
    him?
  SHERIFF. No, good lord; patient.
  BUCKINGHAM. Hastings, Edward's children, Grey, and
    Rivers,
    Holy King Henry, thy fair son Edward,
    Vaughan, miscarried
    underhand corrupted foul injustice,
    moody discontented souls
    clouds behold present hour,
    revenge mock destruction!
    All-Souls' day, fellow, not?
  SHERIFF. is, lord.
  BUCKINGHAM. Why, All-Souls' day body's
    doomsday.
    day King Edward's time  
    wish'd fall found
    False children wife's allies;
    day wish'd fall
    false faith trusted;
    This, All-Souls' day fearful soul
    determin'd respite wrongs;
    high All-Seer dallied with
    Hath turn'd feigned prayer head
    earnest begg'd jest.
    doth force swords wicked men
    turn points masters' bosoms.
    Margaret's curse falls heavy neck.
    'When he' quoth 'shall split thy heart sorrow,
    Remember Margaret prophetess.'
    lead me, officers, block shame;
    Wrong hath wrong, blame due blame.          Exeunt




SCENE 2.

Camp Tamworth

Enter RICHMOND, OXFORD, SIR JAMES BLUNT, SIR WALTER HERBERT, others,
with drum colours

  RICHMOND. Fellows arms, loving friends,
    Bruis'd underneath yoke tyranny,
    bowels land
    march'd impediment;
    receive father Stanley
    Lines fair comfort encouragement.
    wretched, bloody, usurping boar,
    spoil'd summer fields fruitful vines,
    Swills warm blood wash, makes trough
    embowell'd bosoms-this foul swine
    centre isle,
    town Leicester, learn.
    Tamworth thither day's march.
    God's cheerly on, courageous friends,
    reap harvest perpetual peace  
    bloody trial sharp war.
  OXFORD. man's conscience thousand men,
    fight guilty homicide.
  HERBERT. doubt friends turn us.
  BLUNT. hath friends friends fear,
    dearest fly him.
  RICHMOND. vantage. God's march.
    True hope swift flies swallow's wings;
    Kings makes gods, meaner creatures kings.      Exeunt




SCENE 3.

Bosworth Field

Enter KING RICHARD arms, NORFOLK, RATCLIFF,
the EARL SURREYS others

  KING RICHARD. pitch tent, Bosworth
    field.
    Lord Surrey, sad?
  SURREY. heart ten times lighter looks.
  KING RICHARD. Lord Norfolk!
  NORFOLK. Here, gracious liege.
  KING RICHARD. Norfolk, knocks; ha! we
    not?
  NORFOLK. give take, loving lord.
  KING RICHARD. tent! lie to-night;
                      [Soldiers begin set KING'S tent]
    to-morrow? Well, all's that.
    hath descried number traitors?
  NORFOLK. thousand utmost power.
  KING RICHARD. Why, battalia trebles account;
    Besides, King's tower strength,  
    adverse faction want.
    tent! Come, noble gentlemen,
    survey vantage ground.
    Call men sound direction.
    lack discipline, make delay;
    For, lords, to-morrow busy day.                  Exeunt

             Enter, side field,
          RICHMOND, SIR WILLIAM BRANDON, OXFORD, DORSET,
              others. pitch RICHMOND'S tent

  RICHMOND. weary sun hath made golden set,
    bright tract fiery car
    token goodly day to-morrow.
    Sir William Brandon, bear standard.
    Give ink paper tent.
    draw form model battle,
    Limit leader charge,
    part proportion small power.
    Lord Oxford-you, Sir William Brandon-  
    you, Sir Walter Herbert-stay me.
    Earl Pembroke regiment;
    Good Captain Blunt, bear good night him,
    hour morning
    Desire Earl tent.
    thing more, good Captain, me-
    Lord Stanley quarter'd, know?
  BLUNT. mista'en colours much-
    assur'd done-
    regiment lies half mile least
    South mighty power King.
  RICHMOND. peril possible,
    Sweet Blunt, make good means speak him
    give needful note.
  BLUNT. life, lord, undertake it;
    so, God give quiet rest to-night!
  RICHMOND. Good night, good Captain Blunt. Come,
    gentlemen,
    consult to-morrow's business.
    tent; dew raw cold.  
                                   [They withdraw tent]

            Enter, his-tent, KING RICHARD, NORFOLK,
                       RATCLIFF, CATESBY

  KING RICHARD. is't o'clock?
  CATESBY. supper-time, lord;
    o'clock.
  KING RICHARD. to-night.
    Give ink paper.
    What, beaver easier was?
    armour laid tent?
  CATESBY. is, liege; things readiness.
  KING RICHARD. Good Norfolk, hie thee thy charge;
    careful watch, choose trusty sentinels.
  NORFOLK. go, lord.
  KING RICHARD. Stir lark to-morrow, gentle Norfolk.
  NORFOLK. warrant you, lord.                          Exit
  KING RICHARD. Catesby!
  CATESBY. lord?  
  KING RICHARD. Send pursuivant-at-arms
    Stanley's regiment; bid bring power
    sunrising, son George fall
    blind cave eternal night.           Exit CATESBY
    Fill bowl wine. Give watch.
    Saddle white Surrey field to-morrow.
    staves sound, heavy.
    Ratcliff!
  RATCLIFF. lord?
  KING RICHARD. Saw'st thou melancholy Lord
    Northumberland?
  RATCLIFF. Thomas Earl Surrey himself,
    cock-shut time, troop troop
    army, cheering soldiers.
  KING RICHARD. So, satisfied. Give bowl wine.
    alacrity spirit
    cheer mind wont have.
    Set down. ink paper ready?
  RATCLIFF. is, lord.
  KING RICHARD. Bid guard watch; leave me.  
  RATCLIFF, mid night tent
    arm me. Leave me, say.
                                   Exit RATCLIFF. RICHARD sleeps

               Enter DERBY RICHMOND tent;
                        LORDS attending

  DERBY. Fortune victory sit thy helm!
  RICHMOND. comfort dark night afford
    thy person, noble father-in-law!
    me, fares loving mother?
  DERBY. I, attorney, bless thee thy mother,
    prays continually Richmond's good.
    that. silent hours steal on,
    flaky darkness breaks east.
    brief, season bids be,
    Prepare thy battle early morning,
    put thy fortune arbitrement
    bloody strokes mortal-staring war.
    I, may-that cannot-  
    advantage deceive time
    aid thee doubtful shock arms;
    thy side forward,
    Lest, seen, thy brother, tender George,
    executed father's sight.
    Farewell; leisure fearful time
    Cuts ceremonious vows love
    ample interchange sweet discourse
    so-long-sund'red friends dwell upon.
    God give leisure rites love!
    more, adieu; valiant, speed well!
  RICHMOND. Good lords, conduct regiment.
    strive troubled thoughts nap,
    leaden slumber peise to-morrow
    mount wings victory.
    more, good night, kind lords gentlemen.
                                         Exeunt RICHMOND
    O Thou, captain account myself,
    forces gracious eye;
    Put hands Thy bruising irons wrath,  
    crush heavy fall
    usurping helmets adversaries!
    Make Thy ministers chastisement,
    praise Thee victory!
    Thee commend watchful soul
    Ere fall windows mine eyes.
    Sleeping waking, O, defend still!            [Sleeps]

            Enter GHOST YOUNG PRINCE EDWARD,
                    son HENRY SIXTH

  GHOST.  [To RICHARD]  sit heavy thy soul
    to-morrow!
    thou stabb'dst prime youth
    Tewksbury; despair, therefore, die!
    [To RICHMOND]  cheerful, Richmond; wronged
    souls
    butcher'd princes fight thy behalf.
    King Henry's issue, Richmond, comforts thee.
  
              Enter GHOST HENRY SIXTH

  GHOST.  [To RICHARD]  mortal, anointed
    body
    thee punched full deadly holes.
    Tower me. Despair, die.
    Harry Sixth bids thee despair die.
    [To RICHMOND]  Virtuous holy, thou conqueror!
    Harry, prophesied thou shouldst King,
    Doth comfort thee thy sleep. Live flourish!

                   Enter GHOST CLARENCE

  GHOST.  [To RICHARD]  sit heavy thy soul
    to-morrow! wash'd death fulsome wine,
    Poor Clarence, thy guile betray'd death!
    To-morrow battle me,
    fall thy edgeless sword. Despair die!
    [To RICHMOND]  Thou offspring house Lancaster,
    wronged heirs York pray thee.  
    Good angels guard thy battle! Live flourish!

           Enter GHOSTS RIVERS, GREY, VAUGHAN

  GHOST RIVERS.  [To RICHARD]  sit heavy thy
    soul to-morrow,
    Rivers died Pomfret! Despair die!
  GHOST GREY.  [To RICHARD]  Grey, let
    thy soul despair!
  GHOST VAUGHAN.  [To RICHARD]  Vaughan,
    guilty fear
    fall thy lance. Despair die!
  ALL.  [To RICHMOND]  Awake, wrongs in
    Richard's bosom
    conquer him. Awake win day.

                Enter GHOST HASTINGS

  GHOST.  [To RICHARD]  Bloody guilty, guiltily awake,
    bloody battle end thy days!  
    Lord Hastings. Despair die.
    [To RICHMOND]   Quiet untroubled soul, awake, awake!
    Arm, fight, conquer, fair England's sake!

         Enter GHOSTS young PRINCES

  GHOSTS.  [To RICHARD]  Dream thy cousins smothered in
    Tower.
    lead thy bosom, Richard,
    weigh thee ruin, shame, death!
    Thy nephews' souls bid thee despair die.
    [To RICHMOND]  Sleep, Richmond, sleep peace, and
    wake joy;
    Good angels guard thee boar's annoy!
    Live, beget happy race kings!
    Edward's unhappy sons bid thee flourish.

          Enter GHOST LADY ANNE, wife

  GHOST.  [To RICHARD]  Richard, thy wife, wretched  
    Anne thy wife
    slept quiet hour thee
    fills thy sleep perturbations.
    To-morrow battle me,
    fall thy edgeless sword. Despair die.
    [To RICHMOND]  Thou quiet soul, sleep thou quiet sleep;
    Dream success happy victory.
    Thy adversary's wife doth pray thee.

                   Enter GHOST BUCKINGHAM

  GHOST.  [To RICHARD]  help'd thee
    crown;
    felt thy tyranny.
    O, battle Buckingham,
    die terror thy guiltiness!
    Dream on, dream bloody deeds death;
    Fainting, despair; despairing, yield thy breath!
    [To RICHMOND]  died hope ere lend thee aid;
    cheer thy heart thou dismay'd:  
    God good angels fight Richmond's side;
    Richard falls height pride.
            [The GHOSTS vanish. RICHARD starts dream]
  KING RICHARD. Give horse. Bind wounds.
    mercy, Jesu! Soft! dream.
    O coward conscience, dost thou afflict me!
    lights burn blue. dead midnight.
    Cold fearful drops stand trembling flesh.
    fear? Myself? by.
    Richard loves Richard; is, I.
    murderer here? No-yes, am.
    fly. What, myself? Great reason why-
    revenge. What, myself!
    Alack, love myself. Wherefore? good
    myself?
    O, no! Alas, hate myself
    hateful deeds committed myself!
    villain; lie, not.
    Fool, thyself speak well. Fool, flatter.
    conscience hath thousand tongues,  
    tongue brings tale,
    tale condemns villain.
    Perjury, perjury, high'st degree;
    Murder, stern murder, dir'st degree;
    sins, us'd degree,
    Throng bar, crying 'Guilty! guilty!'
    despair. creature loves me;
    die soul pity me:
    wherefore they, myself
    Find pity myself?
    Methought souls murder'd
    tent, threat
    To-morrow's vengeance head Richard.

                            Enter RATCLIFF

  RATCLIFF. lord!
  KING RICHARD. Zounds, there?
  RATCLIFF. Ratcliff, lord; 'tis I. early village-cock
    Hath salutation morn;  
    friends buckle armour.
  KING RICHARD. O Ratcliff, dream'd fearful dream!
    think'st thou-will friends prove true?
  RATCLIFF. doubt, lord.
  KING RICHARD. O Ratcliff, fear, fear.
  RATCLIFF. Nay, good lord, afraid shadows.
  KING RICHARD apostle Paul, shadows to-night
    stuck terror soul Richard
    substance ten thousand soldiers
    Armed proof led shallow Richmond.
    'Tis day. Come, me;
    tents play eaves-dropper,
    shrink me.                 Exeunt

          Enter LORDS RICHMOND sitting tent

  LORDS. Good morrow, Richmond!
  RICHMOND. Cry mercy, lords watchful gentlemen,
    ta'en tardy sluggard here.
  LORDS. slept, lord?  
  RICHMOND. sweetest sleep fairest-boding dreams
    ent'red drowsy head
    departure had, lords.
    Methought souls bodies Richard murder'd
    tent cried victory.
    promise soul jocund
    remembrance fair dream.
    morning it, lords?
  LORDS. stroke four.
  RICHMOND. Why, 'tis time arm give direction.

                 ORATION SOLDIERS

    said, loving countrymen,
    leisure enforcement time
    Forbids dwell upon; remember this:
    God good fight side;
    prayers holy saints wronged souls,
    high-rear'd bulwarks, stand faces;
    Richard except, fight  
    win follow.
    follow? Truly, gentlemen,
    bloody tyrant homicide;
    rais'd blood, blood establish'd;
    made means hath,
    slaughtered means him;
    base foul stone, made precious foil
    England's chair, falsely set;
    hath God's enemy.
    fight God's enemy,
    God justice ward soldiers;
    sweat put tyrant down,
    sleep peace, tyrant slain;
    fight country's foes,
    country's foes pay pains hire;
    fight safeguard wives,
    wives home conquerors;
    free children sword,
    children's children quits age.
    Then, God rights,  
    Advance standards, draw swords.
    me, ransom bold attempt
    cold corpse earth's cold face;
    thrive, gain attempt
    share part thereof.
    Sound drums trumpets boldly cheerfully;
    God Saint George! Richmond victory!           Exeunt

           Re-enter KING RICHARD, RATCLIFF, attendants,
                         forces

  KING RICHARD. Northumberland touching
    Richmond?
  RATCLIFF. trained arms.
  KING RICHARD. truth; Surrey
    then?
  RATCLIFF. smil'd, 'The purpose.'
  KING right; is.
                                                 [Clock strikes]
    clock there. Give calendar.  
    sun to-day?
  RATCLIFF. I, lord.
  KING RICHARD. disdains shine; book
    brav'd east hour ago.
    black day somebody.
    Ratcliff!
  RATCLIFF. lord?
  KING RICHARD. sun to-day;
    sky doth frown lour army.
    dewy tears ground.
    shine to-day! Why, me
    Richmond? selfsame heaven
    frowns sadly him.

                       Enter NORFOLK

  NORFOLK. Arm, arm, lord; foe vaunts field.
  KING RICHARD. Come, bustle, bustle; caparison horse;
    Call Lord Stanley, bid bring power.
    lead soldiers plain,  
    battle ordered:
    foreward drawn length,
    Consisting equally horse foot;
    archers midst.
    John Duke Norfolk, Thomas Earl Surrey,
    leading foot horse.
    directed, follow
    main battle, puissance side
    winged chiefest horse.
    This, Saint George boot! think'st thou,
    Norfolk?
  NORFOLK. good direction, warlike sovereign.
    found tent morning.
                                        [He sheweth paper]
  KING RICHARD.                                          [Reads]
    'Jockey Norfolk, bold,
    Dickon thy master bought sold.'
    thing devised enemy.
    Go, gentlemen, man charge.
    babbling dreams affright souls;  
    Conscience word cowards use,
    Devis'd strong awe.
    strong arms conscience, swords law.
    March on, join bravely, pell-mell;
    heaven, hand hand hell.

                      ORATION ARMY

    inferr'd?
    Remember cope withal-
    sort vagabonds, rascals, runaways,
    scum Britaines, base lackey peasants,
    o'er-cloyed country vomits forth
    desperate adventures assur'd destruction.
    sleeping safe, bring unrest;
    lands, bless'd beauteous wives,
    restrain one, distain other.
    doth lead paltry fellow,
    Long Britaine mother's cost?
    milk-sop, life  
    Felt cold shoes snow?
    whip stragglers o'er seas again;
    Lash over-weening rags France,
    famish'd beggars, weary lives;
    Who, dreaming fond exploit,
    means, poor rats, hang'd themselves.
    conquered, men conquer us,
    bastard Britaines, fathers
    land beaten, bobb'd, thump'd,
    And, record, left heirs shame.
    enjoy lands? lie wives,
    Ravish daughters?  [Drum afar off]  Hark! hear their
    drum.
    Fight, gentlemen England! Fight, bold yeomen!
    Draw, archers, draw arrows head!
    Spur proud horses hard, ride blood;
    Amaze welkin broken staves!

                        Enter MESSENGER
  
    Lord Stanley? bring power?
  MESSENGER. lord, doth deny come.
  KING RICHARD. son George's head!
  NORFOLK. lord, enemy pass'd marsh.
    battle George Stanley die.
  KING RICHARD. thousand hearts great my
    bosom.
    Advance standards, set foes;
    ancient word courage, fair Saint George,
    Inspire spleen fiery dragons!
    them! Victory sits helms.                 Exeunt




SCENE 4.

Another part field

Alarum; excursions. Enter NORFOLK forces; CATESBY

  CATESBY. Rescue, Lord Norfolk, rescue, rescue!
    King enacts wonders man,
    Daring opposite danger.
    horse slain, foot fights,
    Seeking Richmond throat death.
    Rescue, fair lord, day lost.

                     Alarums. Enter KING RICHARD

  KING RICHARD. horse! horse! kingdom horse!
  CATESBY. Withdraw, lord! horse.
  KING RICHARD. Slave, set life cast
    stand hazard die.
    Richmonds field;
    slain to-day him.
    horse! horse! kingdom horse!             Exeunt  




SCENE 5.

Another part field

Alarum. Enter RICHARD RICHMOND; fight; RICHARD slain.
Retreat flourish. Enter RICHMOND, DERBY bearing crown,
with LORDS

  RICHMOND. God arms prais'd, victorious friends;
    day ours, bloody dog dead.
  DERBY. Courageous Richmond, hast thou acquit thee!
    Lo, here, long-usurped royalty
    dead temples bloody wretch
    pluck'd off, grace thy brows withal.
    Wear it, enjoy it, make it.
  RICHMOND. Great God heaven, Amen all!
    But, young George Stanley living.
  DERBY. is, lord, safe Leicester town,
    Whither, you, withdraw us.
  RICHMOND. men slain side?
  DERBY. John Duke Norfolk, Walter Lord Ferrers,
    Sir Robert Brakenbury, Sir William Brandon.
  RICHMOND. Inter bodies births.  
    Proclaim pardon soldiers fled
    submission return us.
    then, ta'en sacrament,
    unite white rose red.
    Smile heaven fair conjunction,
    long frown'd emnity!
    traitor hears me, Amen?
    England hath long mad, scarr'd herself;
    brother blindly shed brother's blood,
    father rashly slaughter'd son,
    son, compell'd, butcher sire;
    divided York Lancaster,
    Divided dire division,
    O, Richmond Elizabeth,
    true succeeders royal house,
    God's fair ordinance conjoin together!
    heirs, God, thy so,
    Enrich time smooth-fac'd peace,
    smiling plenty, fair prosperous days!
    Abate edge traitors, gracious Lord,  
    reduce bloody days again
    make poor England weep streams blood!
    live taste land's increase
    treason wound fair land's peace!
    civil wounds stopp'd, peace lives again-
    long live here, God Amen!            Exeunt

THE END
