1595


THE TRAGEDY ROMEO JULIET

by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  Chorus.

  Escalus, Prince Verona.
  Paris, young Count, kinsman Prince.
  Montague, heads houses variance other.
  Capulet, heads houses variance other.
  Man, Capulet family.
  Romeo, son Montague.
  Tybalt, nephew Lady Capulet.
  Mercutio, kinsman Prince friend Romeo.
  Benvolio, nephew Montague, friend Romeo
  Tybalt, nephew Lady Capulet.
  Friar Laurence, Franciscan.
  Friar John, Franciscan.
  Balthasar, servant Romeo.
  Abram, servant Montague.
  Sampson, servant Capulet.
  Gregory, servant Capulet.
  Peter, servant Juliet's nurse.
  Apothecary.  
  Musicians.
  Officer.

  Lady Montague, wife Montague.
  Lady Capulet, wife Capulet.
  Juliet, daughter Capulet.
  Nurse Juliet.

  Citizens Verona; Gentlemen Gentlewomen houses;
    Maskers, Torchbearers, Pages, Guards, Watchmen, Servants, and
    Attendants.

                            SCENE.--Verona; Mantua.



                        PROLOGUE

                        Enter Chorus.

  Chor. households, alike dignity,
    fair Verona, lay scene,
    ancient grudge break mutiny,
    civil blood makes civil hands unclean.
    fatal loins foes
    pair star-cross'd lovers life;
    misadventur'd piteous overthrows
    Doth death bury parents' strife.
    fearful passage death-mark'd love,
    continuance parents' rage,
    Which, children's end, naught remove,
    hours' traffic stage;
    patient ears attend,
    miss, toil strive mend.
                                                         [Exit.]

SERVICE CHARGES DOWNLOAD TIME MEMBERSHIP.>>



ACT I. Scene I.
Verona. public place.

Enter Sampson Gregory (with swords bucklers) house Capulet.

  Samp. Gregory, word, carry coals.
  Greg. No, colliers.
  Samp. mean, choler, draw.
  Greg. Ay, live, draw neck collar.
  Samp. strike quickly, moved.
  Greg. thou art quickly moved strike.
  Samp. dog house Montague moves me.
  Greg. move stir, valiant stand.
    Therefore, thou art moved, thou runn'st away.
  Samp. dog house move stand. the
    wall man maid Montague's.
  Greg. shows thee weak slave; weakest the
    wall.
  Samp. 'Tis true; women, weaker vessels, are
    thrust wall. push Montague's men
    wall thrust maids wall.
  Greg. quarrel masters men.  
  Samp. 'Tis one. show tyrant. fought
    men, cruel maids- cut off
    heads.
  Greg. heads maids?
  Samp. Ay, heads maids, maidenheads.
    sense thou wilt.
  Greg. sense feel it.
  Samp. feel stand; 'tis I
    pretty piece flesh.
  Greg. 'Tis thou art fish; thou hadst, thou hadst been
    poor-John. Draw thy tool! house of
    Montagues.

           Enter Servingmen [Abram Balthasar].

  Samp. naked weapon out. Quarrel! back thee.
  Greg. How? turn thy back run?
  Samp. Fear not.
  Greg. No, marry. fear thee!
  Samp. law sides; begin.  
  Greg. frown pass by, list.
  Samp. Nay, dare. bite thumb them; is
    disgrace them, bear it.
  Abr. bite thumb us, sir?
  Samp. bite thumb, sir.
  Abr. bite thumb us, sir?
  Samp. [aside Gregory] law side ay?
  Greg. [aside Sampson] No.
  Samp. No, sir, bite thumb you, sir; bite my
    thumb, sir.
  Greg. quarrel, sir?
  Abr. Quarrel, sir? No, sir.
  Samp. do, sir, you. serve good man you.
  Abr. better.
  Samp. Well, sir.

                        Enter Benvolio.

  Greg. [aside Sampson] 'better.' my
    master's kinsmen.  
  Samp. Yes, better, sir.
  Abr. lie.
  Samp. Draw, men. Gregory, remember thy swashing blow.
                                                     fight.
  Ben. Part, fools! [Beats swords.]
    Put swords. do.

                          Enter Tybalt.

  Tyb. What, art thou drawn heartless hinds?
    Turn thee Benvolio! thy death.
  Ben. peace. Put thy sword,
    manage part men me.
  Tyb. What, drawn, talk peace? hate word
    hate hell, Montagues, thee.
    thee, coward!                            fight.

     Enter officer, Citizens clubs or
                          partisans.
  
  Officer. Clubs, bills, partisans! Strike! beat down!
  Citizens. Capulets! Montagues!

           Enter Capulet gown, Wife.

  Cap. noise this? Give long sword, ho!
  Wife. crutch, crutch! call sword?
  Cap. sword, say! Montague come
    flourishes blade spite me.

                 Enter Montague Wife.

  Mon. Thou villain Capulet!- Hold not, go.
  M. Wife. Thou shalt stir foot seek foe.

                Enter Prince Escalus, Train.

  Prince. Rebellious subjects, enemies peace,
    Profaners neighbour-stained steel-
    hear? What, ho! men, beasts,  
    quench fire pernicious rage
    purple fountains issuing veins!
    pain torture, bloody hands
    Throw mistempered weapons ground
    hear sentence moved prince.
    civil brawls, bred airy word
    thee, Capulet, Montague,
    thrice disturb'd quiet streets
    made Verona's ancient citizens
    Cast grave beseeming ornaments
    wield partisans, hands old,
    Cank'red peace, part cank'red hate.
    disturb streets again,
    lives pay forfeit peace.
    time rest depart away.
    You, Capulet, me;
    And, Montague, afternoon,
    farther pleasure case,
    Freetown, common judgment place.
    more, pain death, men depart.  
              Exeunt [all Montague, Wife, Benvolio].
  Mon. set ancient quarrel abroach?
    Speak, nephew, began?
  Ben. servants adversary
    yours, close fighting ere approach.
    drew part them. instant came
    fiery Tybalt, sword prepar'd;
    Which, breath'd defiance ears,
    swung head cut winds,
    Who, hurt withal, hiss'd scorn.
    interchanging thrusts blows,
    more, fought part part,
    Till Prince came, parted part.
  M. Wife. O, Romeo? to-day?
    glad fray.
  Ben. Madam, hour worshipp'd sun
    Peer'd golden window East,
    troubled mind drave walk abroad;
    Where, underneath grove sycamore
    westward rooteth city's side,  
    early walking son.
    made; ware me
    stole covert wood.
    I- measuring affections own,
    sought found,
    weary self-
    Pursu'd humour, Pursuing his,
    gladly shunn'd gladly fled me.
  Mon. morning hath seen,
    tears augmenting fresh morning's dew,
    Adding clouds clouds deep sighs;
    all-cheering sun
    farthest East bean draw
    shady curtains Aurora's bed,
    light steals home heavy son
    private chamber pens himself,
    Shuts windows, locks fair daylight
    makes artificial night.
    Black portentous humour prove
    good counsel remove.  
  Ben. noble uncle, cause?
  Mon. learn him
  Ben. importun'd means?
  Mon. friend;
    he, affections' counsellor,
    himself- true-
    secret close,
    sounding discovery,
    bud bit envious worm
    Ere spread sweet leaves air
    dedicate beauty sun.
    learn sorrows grow,
    willingly give cure know.

                       Enter Romeo.

  Ben. See, comes. step aside,
    grievance, denied.
  Mon. thou wert happy thy stay
    hear true shrift. Come, madam, away,  
                                     Exeunt [Montague Wife].
  Ben. Good morrow, cousin.
  Rom. day young?
  Ben. struck nine.
  Rom. Ay me! sad hours long.
    father fast?
  Ben. was. sadness lengthens Romeo's hours?
  Rom. makes short.
  Ben. love?
  Rom. Out-
  Ben. love?
  Rom. favour love.
  Ben. Alas love, gentle view,
    tyrannous rough proof!
  Rom. Alas love, view muffled still,
    eyes pathways will!
    dine? O me! fray here?
    not, heard all.
    hate, love.
    then, O brawling love! O loving hate!  
    O anything, create!
    O heavy lightness! vanity!
    Misshapen chaos well-seeming forms!
    Feather lead, bright smoke, cold fire, sick health!
    Still-waking sleep, is
    love feel I, feel love this.
    Dost thou laugh?
  Ben. No, coz, weep.
  Rom. Good heart, what?
  Ben. thy good heart's oppression.
  Rom. Why, love's transgression.
    Griefs mine lie heavy breast,
    thou wilt propagate, prest
    thine. love thou hast shown
    Doth add grief mine own.
    Love smoke rais'd fume sighs;
    purg'd, fire sparkling lovers' eyes;
    vex'd, sea nourish'd lovers' tears.
    else? madness discreet,
    choking gall, preserving sweet.  
    Farewell, coz.
  Ben. Soft! along.
    leave so, wrong.
  Rom. Tut! lost myself; here:
    Romeo, where.
  Ben. sadness, love?
  Rom. What, groan thee?
  Ben. Groan? Why, no;
    sadly who.
  Rom. Bid sick man sadness make will.
    Ah, word ill urg'd ill!
    sadness, cousin, love woman.
  Ben. aim'd suppos'd lov'd.
  Rom. good markman! fair love.
  Ben. fair mark, fair coz, soonest hit.
  Rom. Well, hit miss. hit
    Cupid's arrow. hath Dian's wit,
    And, strong proof chastity arm'd,
    Love's weak childish bow lives unharm'd.
    stay siege loving terms,  
    bide th' encounter assailing eyes,
    ope lap saint-seducing gold.
    O, rich beauty; poor
    That, dies, beauty dies store.
  Ben. hath sworn live chaste?
  Rom. hath, sparing makes huge waste;
    beauty, starv'd severity,
    Cuts beauty posterity.
    fair, wise, wisely fair,
    merit bliss making despair.
    hath forsworn love, vow
    live dead live now.
  Ben. rul'd me: forget her.
  Rom. O, teach forget think!
  Ben. giving liberty thine eyes.
    Examine beauties.
  Rom. 'Tis way
    call (exquisite) question more.
    happy masks kiss fair ladies' brows,
    black puts mind hide fair.  
    strucken blind forget
    precious treasure eyesight lost.
    Show mistress passing fair,
    doth beauty serve note
    read pass'd passing fair?
    Farewell. Thou canst teach forget.
  Ben. pay doctrine, die debt.      Exeunt.




Scene II.
A Street.

Enter Capulet, County Paris, [Servant] -the Clown.

  Cap. Montague bound I,
    penalty alike; 'tis hard, think,
    men peace.
  Par. honourable reckoning both,
    pity 'tis liv'd odds long.
    now, lord, suit?
  Cap. o'er before:
    child stranger world,
    hath change fourteen years;
    summers wither pride
    Ere ripe bride.
  Par. Younger happy mothers made.
  Cap. marr'd early made.
    earth hath swallowed hopes she;
    hopeful lady earth.
    woo her, gentle Paris, heart;
    consent part.  
    agree, scope choice
    Lies consent fair voice.
    night hold accustom'd feast,
    Whereto invited guest,
    love; store,
    more, welcome, makes number more.
    poor house behold night
    Earth-treading stars make dark heaven light.
    comfort lusty young men feel
    apparell'd April heel
    limping Winter treads, delight
    fresh female buds night
    Inherit house. Hear all, see,
    merit be;
    Which, view many, mine, one,
    stand number, reck'ning none.
    Come, me. [To Servant, giving paper] Go, sirrah,
      trudge about
    fair Verona; find persons out
    names written there, say,  
    house pleasure stay-
                                     Exeunt [Capulet Paris].
  Serv. Find names written here? written
    shoemaker meddle yard tailor
    last, fisher pencil painter with
    nets; find persons names are
    writ, find names writing person hath
    writ. learned. good time!

                   Enter Benvolio Romeo.

  Ben. Tut, man, fire burns another's burning;
    pain lessoned another's anguish;
    Turn giddy, holp backward turning;
    desperate grief cures another's languish.
    thou infection thy eye,
    rank poison die.
  Rom. plantain leaf excellent that.
  Ben. what, pray thee?
  Rom. broken shin.  
  Ben. Why, Romeo, art thou mad?
  Rom. mad, bound madman is;
    Shut Prison, food,
    Whipp'd tormented and- God-den, good fellow.
  Serv. God gi' go-den. pray, sir, read?
  Rom. Ay, mine fortune misery.
  Serv. learned book. pray, you
    read see?
  Rom. Ay, letters language.
  Serv. Ye honestly. Rest merry!
  Rom. Stay, fellow; read.                       reads.

      'Signior Martino wife daughters;
      County Anselmo beauteous sisters;
      lady widow Vitruvio;
      Signior Placentio lovely nieces;
      Mercutio brother Valentine;
      Mine uncle Capulet, wife, daughters;
      fair niece Rosaline Livia;
      Signior Valentio cousin Tybalt;  
      Lucio lively Helena.'

    [Gives back paper.] fair assembly. come?
  Serv. Up.
  Rom. Whither?
  Serv. supper, house.
  Rom. house?
  Serv. master's.
  Rom. ask'd before.
  Serv. asking. master great rich
    Capulet; house Montagues, pray come
    crush cup wine. Rest merry!               Exit.
  Ben. ancient feast Capulet's
    Sups fair Rosaline thou lov'st;
    admired beauties Verona.
    thither, unattainted eye
    Compare face show,
    make thee thy swan crow.
  Rom. devout religion mine eye
    Maintains falsehood, turn tears fires;  
    these, who, drown'd, die,
    Transparent heretics, burnt liars!
    fairer love? all-seeing sun
    Ne'er match world begun.
  Ben. Tut! fair, by,
    pois'd eye;
    crystal scales weigh'd
    lady's love maid
    show shining feast,
    scant show best.
  Rom. along, sight shown,
    rejoice splendour own.              [Exeunt.]




Scene III.
Capulet's house.

Enter Capulet's Wife, Nurse.

  Wife. Nurse, daughter? Call me.
  Nurse. Now, maidenhead twelve year old,
    bade come. What, lamb! ladybird!
    God forbid! girl? What, Juliet!

                         Enter Juliet.

  Jul. now? calls?
  Nurse. mother.
  Jul. Madam, here.
    will?
  Wife. matter- Nurse, give leave awhile,
    talk secret. Nurse, back again;
    rememb'red me, thou's hear counsel.
    Thou knowest daughter's pretty age.
  Nurse. Faith, age hour.
  Wife. fourteen.  
  Nurse. lay fourteen teeth-
    yet, teen spoken, four-
    fourteen. long now
    Lammastide?
  Wife. fortnight odd days.
  Nurse. odd, days year,
    Lammas Eve night fourteen.
    Susan (God rest Christian souls!)
    age. Well, Susan God;
    good me. But, said,
    Lammas Eve night fourteen;
    she, marry; remember well.
    'Tis earthquake eleven years;
    wean'd (I forget it),
    days year, day;
    laid wormwood dug,
    Sitting sun dovehouse wall.
    lord Mantua.
    Nay, bear brain. But, said,
    taste wormwood nipple  
    dug felt bitter, pretty fool,
    tetchy fall dug!
    Shake, quoth dovehouse! 'Twas need, trow,
    bid trudge.
    time eleven years,
    stand high-lone; nay, th' rood,
    run waddled about;
    day before, broke brow;
    husband (God soul!
    'A merry man) child.
    'Yea,' quoth he, 'dost thou fall thy face?
    Thou wilt fall backward thou hast wit;
    Wilt thou not, Jule?' and, holidam,
    pretty wretch left crying, 'Ay.'
    jest about!
    warrant, live thousand yeas,
    forget it. 'Wilt thou not, Jule?' quoth he,
    And, pretty fool, stinted, 'Ay.'
  Wife. this. pray thee hold thy peace.
  Nurse. Yes, madam. choose laugh  
    leave crying 'Ay.'
    yet, warrant, bad brow
    bump big young cock'rel's stone;
    perilous knock; cried bitterly.
    'Yea,' quoth husband, 'fall'st thy face?
    Thou wilt fall backward thou comest age;
    Wilt thou not, Jule?' stinted, 'Ay.'
  Jul. stint thou too, pray thee, nurse, I.
  Nurse. Peace, done. God mark thee grace!
    Thou wast prettiest babe e'er nurs'd.
    live thee married once, wish.
  Wife. Marry, 'marry' theme
    talk of. me, daughter Juliet,
    stands disposition married?
  Jul. honour dream of.
  Nurse. honour? thine nurse,
    thou hadst suck'd wisdom thy teat.
  Wife. Well, marriage now. Younger you,
    Verona, ladies esteem,
    made mothers. count,  
    mother years
    maid. brief:
    valiant Paris seeks love.
  Nurse. man, young lady! lady, man
    world- man wax.
  Wife. Verona's summer hath flower.
  Nurse. Nay, flower, faith- flower.
  Wife. you? love gentleman?
    night behold feast.
    Read o'er volume young Paris' face,
    find delight writ beauty's pen;
    Examine married lineament,
    lends content;
    obscur'd fair volume lies
    Find written margent eyes,
    precious book love, unbound lover,
    beautify lacks cover.
    fish lives sea, 'tis pride
    fair fair hide.
    book many's eyes doth share glory,  
    gold clasps locks golden story;
    share doth possess,
    making less.
  Nurse. less? Nay, bigger! Women grow men
  Wife. Speak briefly, Paris' love?
  Jul. like, liking move;
    deep endart mine eye
    consent strength make fly.

                        Enter Servingman.

  Serv. Madam, guests come, supper serv'd up, call'd, my
    young lady ask'd for, nurse curs'd pantry, and
    extremity. wait. beseech you
    follow straight.
  Wife. follow thee.                       Exit [Servingman].
    Juliet, County stays.
  Nurse. Go, girl, seek happy nights happy days.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene IV.
A street.

Enter Romeo, Mercutio, Benvolio, Maskers; Torchbearers.

  Rom. What, speech spoke excuse?
    apology?
  Ben. date prolixity.
    Cupid hoodwink'd scarf,
    Bearing Tartar's painted bow lath,
    Scaring ladies crowkeeper;
    without-book prologue, faintly spoke
    prompter, entrance;
    But, measure will,
    measure measure, gone.
  Rom. Give torch. ambling.
    heavy, bear light.
  Mer. Nay, gentle Romeo, dance.
  Rom. I, me. dancing shoes
    nimble soles; soul lead
    stakes ground move.  
  Mer. lover. Borrow Cupid's wings
    soar common bound.
  Rom. sore enpierced shaft
    soar light feathers; bound
    bound pitch dull woe.
    love's heavy burthen sink.
  Mer. And, sink it, burthen love-
    great oppression tender thing.
  Rom. love tender thing? rough,
    rude, boist'rous, pricks thorn.
  Mer. love rough you, rough love.
    Prick love pricking, beat love down.
    Give case put visage in.
    visor visor! care I
    curious eye doth quote deformities?
    beetle brows blush me.
  Ben. Come, knock enter; sooner in
    man betake legs.
  Rom. torch me! wantons light heart
    Tickle senseless rushes heels;  
    proverb'd grandsire phrase,
    candle-holder on;
    game ne'er fair, done.
  Mer. Tut! dun's mouse, constable's word!
    thou art Dun, draw thee mire
    sir-reverence love, thou stick'st
    ears. Come, burn daylight, ho!
  Rom. Nay, so.
  Mer. mean, sir, delay
    waste lights vain, lamps day.
    good meaning, judgment sits
    times ere wits.
  Rom. well, masque;
    'tis wit go.
  Mer. Why, ask?
  Rom. dreamt dream to-night.
  Mer. I.
  Rom. Well, yours?
  Mer. dreamers lie.
  Rom. bed asleep, dream things true.  
  Mer. O, Queen Mab hath you.
    fairies' midwife, comes
    shape bigger agate stone
    forefinger alderman,
    Drawn team atomies
    Athwart men's noses lie asleep;
    wagon spokes made long spinners' legs,
    cover, wings grasshoppers;
    traces, smallest spider's web;
    collars, moonshine's wat'ry beams;
    whip, cricket's bone; lash, film;
    wagoner, small grey-coated gnat,
    half big round worm
    Prick'd lazy finger maid;
    chariot empty hazelnut,
    Made joiner squirrel grub,
    Time o' mind fairies' coachmakers.
    state 'gallops night night
    lovers' brains, dream love;
    O'er courtiers' knees, dream cursies straight;  
    O'er lawyers' fingers, straight dream fees;
    O'er ladies' lips, straight kisses dream,
    oft angry Mab blisters plagues,
    breaths sweetmeats tainted are.
    gallops o'er courtier's nose,
    dreams smelling suit;
    tithe-pig's tail
    Tickling parson's nose 'a lies asleep,
    dreams benefice.
    driveth o'er soldier's neck,
    dreams cutting foreign throats,
    breaches, ambuscadoes, Spanish blades,
    healths fadom deep; anon
    Drums ear, starts wakes,
    frighted, swears prayer two
    sleeps again. Mab
    plats manes horses night
    bakes elflocks foul sluttish, hairs,
    untangled misfortune bodes
    hag, maids lie backs,  
    presses learns bear,
    Making women good carriage.
    she-
  Rom. Peace, peace, Mercutio, peace!
    Thou talk'st nothing.
  Mer. True, talk dreams;
    children idle brain,
    Begot vain fantasy;
    thin substance air,
    inconstant wind, wooes
    frozen bosom North
    And, anger'd, puffs thence,
    Turning face dew-dropping South.
  Ben. wind talk blows ourselves.
    Supper done, late.
  Rom. fear, early; mind misgives
    consequence, hanging stars,
    bitterly begin fearful date
    night's revels expire term
    despised life, clos'd breast,  
    vile forfeit untimely death.
    hath steerage course
    Direct sail! On, lusty gentlemen!
  Ben. Strike, drum.
                           march stage. [Exeunt.]




Scene V.
Capulet's house.

Servingmen napkins.

  1. Serv. Potpan, helps away?
    shift trencher! scrape trencher!
  2. Serv. good manners lie men's hands,
    unwash'd too, 'tis foul thing.
  1. Serv. join-stools, remove court-cubbert, look
    plate. Good thou, save piece marchpane and, as
    thou loves me, porter Susan Grindstone Nell.
    Anthony, Potpan!
  2. Serv. Ay, boy, ready.
  1. Serv. look'd call'd for, ask'd sought
    for, great chamber.
  3. Serv. too. Cheerly, boys!
    brisk awhile, longer liver all.      Exeunt.

    Enter Maskers, Enter, [with Servants,] Capulet, Wife,
              Juliet, Tybalt, Guests
               Gentlewomen Maskers.  

  Cap. Welcome, gentlemen! Ladies toes
    Unplagu'd corns bout you.
    Ah ha, mistresses! all
    deny dance? makes dainty,
    swear hath corns. ye now?
    Welcome, gentlemen! day
    worn visor tell
    whispering tale fair lady's ear,
    please. 'Tis gone, 'tis gone, 'tis gone!
    welcome, gentlemen! Come, musicians, play.
    hall, hall! give room! foot it, girls.
                                    Music plays, dance.
    light, knaves! turn tables up,
    quench fire, room grown hot.
    Ah, sirrah, unlook'd-for sport well.
    Nay, sit, nay, sit, good cousin Capulet,
    past dancing days.
    long is't I
    mask?  
  2. Cap. By'r Lady, thirty years.
  Cap. What, man? 'Tis much, 'tis much!
    'Tis nuptial Lucentio,
    Pentecost quickly will,
    five-and-twenty years, mask'd.
  2. Cap. 'Tis more, 'tis more! son elder, sir;
    son thirty.
  Cap. that?
    son ward years ago.
  Rom. [to Servingman] lady's that, doth enrich hand
    yonder knight?
  Serv. not, sir.
  Rom. O, doth teach torches burn bright!
    hangs cheek night
    rich jewel Ethiop's ear-
    Beauty rich use, earth dear!
    shows snowy dove trooping crows
    yonder lady o'er fellows shows.
    measure done, watch place stand
    And, touching hers, make blessed rude hand.  
    heart love till now? Forswear it, sight!
    ne'er true beauty till night.
  Tyb. This, voice, Montague.
    Fetch rapier, boy. What, dares slave
    hither, cover'd antic face,
    fleer scorn solemnity?
    Now, stock honour kin,
    strike dead hold sin.
  Cap. Why, now, kinsman? Wherefore storm so?
  Tyb. Uncle, Montague, foe;
    villain, spite
    scorn solemnity night.
  Cap. Young Romeo it?
  Tyb. 'Tis he, villain Romeo.
  Cap. Content thee, gentle coz, alone.
    'A bears portly gentleman,
    And, truth, Verona brags him
    virtuous well-govern'd youth.
    wealth town
    house disparagement.  
    patient, note him.
    will; thou respect,
    Show fair presence put frowns,
    ill-beseeming semblance feast.
  Tyb. fits villain guest.
    endure him.
  Cap. endur'd.
    What, goodman boy? shall. to!
    master here, you? to!
    endure him? God mend soul!
    make mutiny guests!
    set cock-a-hoop! man!
  Tyb. Why, uncle, 'tis shame.
  Cap. to, to!
    saucy boy. Is't so, indeed?
    trick chance scathe you. what.
    contrary me! Marry, 'tis time.-
    said, hearts!- princox- go!
    quiet, or- light, light!- shame!
    make quiet; what!- Cheerly, hearts!  
  Tyb. Patience perforce wilful choler meeting
    Makes flesh tremble greeting.
    withdraw; intrusion shall,
    sweet, convert bitt'rest gall.          Exit.
  Rom. profane unworthiest hand
    holy shrine, gentle fine this:
    lips, blushing pilgrims, ready stand
    smooth rough touch tender kiss.
  Jul. Good pilgrim, wrong hand much,
    mannerly devotion shows this;
    saints hands pilgrims' hands touch,
    palm palm holy palmers' kiss.
  Rom. saints lips, holy palmers too?
  Jul. Ay, pilgrim, lips pray'r.
  Rom. O, then, dear saint, lips hands do!
    pray; grant thou, faith turn despair.
  Jul. Saints move, grant prayers' sake.
  Rom. move prayer's effect take.
    lips, thine sin purg'd.  [Kisses her.]
  Jul. lips sin took.  
  Rom. Sin lips? O trespass sweetly urg'd!
    Give sin again.                          [Kisses her.]
  Jul. kiss th' book.
  Nurse. Madam, mother craves word you.
  Rom. mother?
  Nurse. Marry, bachelor,
    mother lady house.
    good lady, wise virtuous.
    nurs'd daughter talk'd withal.
    you, lay hold her
    chinks.
  Rom. Capulet?
    O dear account! life foe's debt.
  Ben. Away, gone; sport best.
  Rom. Ay, fear; unrest.
  Cap. Nay, gentlemen, prepare gone;
    trifling foolish banquet towards.
    e'en so? then, all.
    you, honest gentlemen. Good night.
    torches here! [Exeunt Maskers.] then, bed.  
    Ah, sirrah, fay, waxes late;
    rest.
                              Exeunt [all Juliet Nurse].
  Jul. hither, nurse. yond gentleman?
  Nurse. son heir Tiberio.
  Jul. door?
  Nurse. Marry, that, think, young Petruchio.
  Jul. there, dance?
  Nurse. not.
  Jul. name.- married,
    grave wedding bed.
  Nurse. Romeo, Montague,
    son great enemy.
  Jul. love, sprung hate!
    early unknown, late!
    Prodigious birth love me
    love loathed enemy.
  Nurse. this? this?
  Jul. rhyme learnt now
    danc'd withal.  
                                     calls within, 'Juliet.'
  Nurse. Anon, anon!
    Come, away; strangers gone.        Exeunt.

PROLOGUE

Enter Chorus.

  Chor. desire doth deathbed lie,
    young affection gapes heir;
    fair love groan'd die,
    tender Juliet match'd, fair.
    Romeo belov'd, loves again,
    Alike bewitched charm looks;
    foe suppos'd complain,
    steal love's sweet bait fearful hooks.
    held foe, access
    breathe vows lovers swear,
    love, means less
    meet beloved anywhere;
    passion lends power, time means, meet,
    Temp'ring extremities extreme sweet.
Exit.




ACT II. Scene I.
A lane wall Capulet's orchard.

Enter Romeo alone.

  Rom. forward heart here?
    Turn back, dull earth, find thy centre out.
                     [Climbs wall leaps it.]

                   Enter Benvolio Mercutio.

  Ben. Romeo! cousin Romeo! Romeo!
  Mer. wise,
    And, life, hath stol'n home bed.
  Ben. ran way, leapt orchard wall.
    Call, good Mercutio.
  Mer. Nay, conjure too.
    Romeo! humours! madman! passion! lover!
    thou likeness sigh;
    Speak rhyme, satisfied!
    Cry 'Ay me!' pronounce 'love' 'dove';
    Speak gossip Venus fair word,  
    nickname purblind son heir,
    Young Adam Cupid, shot trim
    King Cophetua lov'd beggar maid!
    heareth not, stirreth not, moveth not;
    ape dead, conjure him.
    conjure thee Rosaline's bright eyes.
    high forehead scarlet lip,
    fine foot, straight leg, quivering thigh,
    demesnes adjacent lie,
    thy likeness thou us!
  Ben. hear thee, thou wilt anger him.
  Mer. anger him. 'Twould anger him
    raise spirit mistress' circle
    strange nature, letting stand
    Till laid conjur'd down.
    spite; invocation
    fair honest: mistress' name,
    conjure raise him.
  Ben. Come, hath hid trees
    consorted humorous night.  
    Blind love befits dark.
  Mer. love blind, love hit mark.
    sit medlar tree
    mistress kind fruit
    maids call medlars laugh alone.
    O, Romeo, were, O were
    open cetera, thou pop'rin pear!
    Romeo, good night. truckle-bed;
    field-bed cold sleep.
    Come, go?
  Ben. then, 'tis vain
    'To seek means found.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene II.
Capulet's orchard.

Enter Romeo.

  Rom. jests scars felt wound.

                     Enter Juliet window.

    soft! light yonder window breaks?
    East, Juliet sun!
    Arise, fair sun, kill envious moon,
    sick pale grief
    thou maid art fair she.
    maid, envious.
    vestal livery sick green,
    fools wear it. Cast off.
    lady; O, love!
    O knew were!
    speaks, nothing. that?
    eye discourses; answer it.
    bold; 'tis speaks.  
    fairest stars heaven,
    business, entreat eyes
    twinkle spheres till return.
    eyes there, head?
    brightness cheek shame stars
    daylight doth lamp; eyes heaven
    airy region stream bright
    birds sing night.
    leans cheek hand!
    O glove hand,
    touch cheek!
  Jul. Ay me!
  Rom. speaks.
    O, speak again, bright angel! thou art
    glorious night, o'er head,
    winged messenger heaven
    white-upturned wond'ring eyes
    mortals fall back gaze him
    bestrides lazy-pacing clouds
    sails bosom air.  
  Jul. O Romeo, Romeo! wherefore art thou Romeo?
    Deny thy father refuse thy name!
    Or, thou wilt not, sworn love,
    longer Capulet.
  Rom. [aside] hear more, speak this?
  Jul. 'Tis thy enemy.
    Thou art thyself, Montague.
    Montague? hand, foot,
    arm, face, part
    Belonging man. O, name!
    name? call rose
    smell sweet.
    Romeo would, Romeo call'd,
    Retain dear perfection owes
    title. Romeo, doff thy name;
    name, part thee,
    myself.
  Rom. thee thy word.
    Call love, baptiz'd;
    Henceforth Romeo.  
  Jul. man art thou that, bescreen'd night,
    stumblest counsel?
  Rom. name
    thee am.
    name, dear saint, hateful myself,
    enemy thee.
    written, tear word.
  Jul. ears drunk hundred words
    tongue's utterance, sound.
    Art thou Romeo, Montague?
  Rom. Neither, fair saint, thee dislike.
  Jul. cam'st thou hither, me, wherefore?
    orchard walls high hard climb,
    place death, thou art,
    kinsmen find thee here.
  Rom. love's light wings o'erperch walls;
    stony limits hold love out,
    love do, dares love attempt.
    thy kinsmen me.
  Jul. thee, murther thee.  
  Rom. Alack, lies peril thine eye
    twenty swords! thou sweet,
    proof enmity.
  Jul. world thee here.
  Rom. night's cloak hide sight;
    thou love me, find here.
    life ended hate
    death prorogued, wanting thy love.
  Jul. direction found'st thou place?
  Rom. love, prompt enquire.
    lent counsel, lent eyes.
    pilot; yet, wert thou far
    vast shore wash'd farthest sea,
    adventure merchandise.
  Jul. Thou knowest mask night face;
    maiden blush bepaint cheek
    thou hast heard speak to-night.
    Fain dwell form- fain, fain deny
    spoke; farewell compliment!
    Dost thou love me, thou wilt 'Ay';  
    thy word. Yet, thou swear'st,
    Thou mayst prove false. lovers' perjuries,
    Jove laughs. O gentle Romeo,
    thou dost love, pronounce faithfully.
    thou thinkest quickly won,
    frown, perverse, thee nay,
    thou wilt woo; else, world.
    truth, fair Montague, fond,
    thou mayst haviour light;
    trust me, gentleman, prove true
    cunning strange.
    strange, confess,
    thou overheard'st, ere ware,
    true-love passion. pardon me,
    impute yielding light love,
    dark night hath discovered.
  Rom. Lady, yonder blessed moon swear,
    tips silver fruit-tree tops-
  Jul. O, swear moon, th' inconstant moon,
    monthly circled orb,  
    thy love prove likewise variable.
  Rom. swear by?
  Jul. swear all;
    thou wilt, swear thy gracious self,
    god idolatry,
    thee.
  Rom. heart's dear love-
  Jul. Well, swear. joy thee,
    joy contract to-night.
    rash, unadvis'd, sudden;
    lightning, doth cease be
    Ere 'It lightens.' Sweet, good night!
    bud love, summer's ripening breath,
    prove beauteous flow'r meet.
    Good night, good night! sweet repose rest
    thy heart breast!
  Rom. O, wilt thou leave unsatisfied?
  Jul. satisfaction canst thou to-night?
  Rom. Th' exchange thy love's faithful vow mine.
  Jul. gave thee mine thou didst request it;  
    give again.
  Rom. Would'st thou withdraw it? purpose, love?
  Jul. frank give thee again.
    thing have.
    bounty boundless sea,
    love deep; give thee,
    have, infinite.
    hear noise within. Dear love, adieu!
                                           [Nurse] calls within.
    Anon, good nurse! Sweet Montague, true.
    Stay little, again.                [Exit.]
  Rom. O blessed, blessed night! afeard,
    night, dream,
    flattering-sweet substantial.

                       Enter Juliet above.

  Jul. words, dear Romeo, good night indeed.
    thy bent love honourable,
    Thy purpose marriage, send word to-morrow,  
    procure thee,
    time thou wilt perform rite;
    fortunes thy foot lay
    follow thee lord world.
  Nurse. (within) Madam!
  Jul. come, anon.- thou meanest well,
    beseech thee-
  Nurse. (within) Madam!
  Jul. By-and-by come.-
    cease thy suit leave grief.
    To-morrow send.
  Rom. thrive soul-
  Jul. thousand times good night!                        Exit.
  Rom. thousand times worse, thy light!
    Love love schoolboys books;
    love love, school heavy looks.

                     Enter Juliet again, [above].

  Jul. Hist! Romeo, hist! O falconer's voice  
    lure tassel-gentle back again!
    Bondage hoarse speak aloud;
    tear cave Echo lies,
    make airy tongue hoarse mine
    repetition Romeo's name.
    Romeo!
  Rom. soul calls name.
    silver-sweet sound lovers' tongues night,
    softest music attending ears!
  Jul. Romeo!
  Rom. dear?
  Jul. o'clock to-morrow
    send thee?
  Rom. hour nine.
  Jul. fail. 'Tis twenty years till then.
    forgot call thee back.
  Rom. stand till thou remember it.
  Jul. forget, thee stand there,
    Rememb'ring love thy company.
  Rom. stay, thee forget,  
    Forgetting home this.
  Jul. 'Tis morning. thee gone-
    farther wanton's bird,
    lets hop hand,
    poor prisoner twisted gyves,
    silk thread plucks back again,
    loving-jealous liberty.
  Rom. thy bird.
  Jul. Sweet, I.
    kill thee cherishing.
    Good night, good night! Parting sweet sorrow,
    good night till morrow.
                                                         [Exit.]
  Rom. Sleep dwell thine eyes, peace thy breast!
    sleep peace, sweet rest!
    ghostly father's cell,
    crave dear hap tell.
 Exit




Scene III.
Friar Laurence's cell.

Enter Friar, [Laurence] alone, basket.

  Friar. grey-ey'd morn smiles frowning night,
    Check'ring Eastern clouds streaks light;
    flecked darkness drunkard reels
    day's path Titan's fiery wheels.
    Non, ere sun advance burning eye
    day cheer night's dank dew dry,
    up-fill osier cage ours
    baleful weeds precious-juiced flowers.
    earth nature's mother tomb.
    burying gave, womb;
    womb children divers kind
    sucking natural bosom find;
    virtues excellent,
    some, different.
    O, mickle powerful grace lies
    plants, herbs, stones, true qualities;
    naught vile earth doth live  
    earth special good doth give;
    aught good but, strain'd fair use,
    Revolts true birth, stumbling abuse.
    Virtue turns vice, misapplied,
    vice sometime's action dignified.
    infant rind small flower
    Poison hath residence, medicine power;
    this, smelt, part cheers part;
    tasted, slays senses heart.
    opposed kings encamp still
    man herbs- grace rude will;
    worser predominant,
    Full canker death eats plant.

                        Enter Romeo.

  Rom. Good morrow, father.
  Friar. Benedicite!
    early tongue sweet saluteth me?
    Young son, argues distempered head  
    bid good morrow thy bed.
    Care watch man's eye,
    care lodges sleep lie;
    unbruised youth unstuff'd brain
    Doth couch limbs, golden sleep doth reign.
    thy earliness doth assure
    Thou art uprous'd distemp'rature;
    so, hit right-
    Romeo hath bed to-night.
  Rom. true-the sweeter rest mine.
  Friar. God pardon sin! Wast thou Rosaline?
  Rom. Rosaline, ghostly father? No.
    forgot name, name's woe.
  Friar. good son! hast thou then?
  Rom. thee ere thou again.
    feasting mine enemy,
    sudden hath wounded me
    wounded. remedies
    thy holy physic lies.
    bear hatred, blessed man, for, lo,  
    intercession likewise steads foe.
  Friar. plain, good son, homely thy drift
    Riddling confession finds riddling shrift.
  Rom. plainly heart's dear love set
    fair daughter rich Capulet;
    mine hers, set mine,
    combin'd, save thou combine
    holy marriage. When, where, how
    met, woo'd, made exchange vow,
    thee pass; pray,
    thou consent marry to-day.
  Friar. Holy Saint Francis! change here!
    Rosaline, thou didst love dear,
    forsaken? Young men's love lies
    hearts, eyes.
    Jesu Maria! deal brine
    Hath wash'd thy sallow cheeks Rosaline!
    salt water thrown waste,
    season love, doth taste!
    sun thy sighs heaven clears,  
    Thy groans ring mine ancient ears.
    Lo, thy cheek stain doth sit
    tear wash'd yet.
    e'er thou wast thyself, woes thine,
    Thou woes Rosaline.
    art thou chang'd? Pronounce sentence then:
    Women fall strength men.
  Rom. Thou chid'st oft loving Rosaline.
  Friar. doting, loving, pupil mine.
  Rom. bad'st bury love.
  Friar. grave
    lay in, have.
  Rom. pray thee chide not. love now
    Doth grace grace love love allow.
    so.
  Friar. O, knew well
    Thy love read rote, spell.
    come, young waverer, me.
    respect thy assistant be;
    alliance happy prove  
    turn households' rancour pure love.
  Rom. O, hence! stand sudden haste.
  Friar. Wisely, slow. stumble run fast.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene IV.
A street.

Enter Benvolio Mercutio.

  Mer. devil Romeo be?
    home to-night?
  Ben. father's. spoke man.
  Mer. Why, pale hard-hearted wench, Rosaline,
    Torments run mad.
  Ben. Tybalt, kinsman Capulet,
    Hath letter father's house.
  Mer. challenge, life.
  Ben. Romeo answer it.
  Mer. man write answer letter.
  Ben. Nay, answer letter's master, dares, being
    dared.
  Mer. Alas, poor Romeo, dead! stabb'd white
    wench's black eye; shot ear love song; the
    pin heart cleft blind bow-boy's butt-shaft;
    man encounter Tybalt?
  Ben. Why, Tybalt?  
  Mer. Prince Cats, you. O, the
    courageous captain compliments. fights sing
    pricksong-keeps time, distance, proportion; rests his
    minim rest, one, two, bosom! very
    butcher silk button, duellist, duellist! gentleman of
    house, cause. Ah, the
    immortal passado! punto reverse! hay.
  Ben. what?
  Mer. pox antic, lisping, affecting fantasticoes- these
    tuners accent! 'By Jesu, good blade! tall
    man! good whore!' Why, lamentable thing,
    grandsir, afflicted strange
    flies, fashion-mongers, pardona-mi's, stand so
    form sit ease old
    bench? O, bones, bones!

                               Enter Romeo.

  Ben. Romeo! Romeo!
  Mer. roe, dried herring. O flesh, flesh, art  
    thou fishified! numbers Petrarch flowed
    in. Laura, lady, kitchen wench (marry, a
    love berhyme her), Dido dowdy, Cleopatra gypsy,
    Helen Hero hildings harlots, gray eye so,
    purpose. Signior Romeo, bon jour! French
    salutation French slop. gave counterfeit
    fairly night.
  Rom. Good morrow both. counterfeit give you?
  Mer. slip, sir, slip. conceive?
  Rom. Pardon, good Mercutio. business great, a
    case mine man strain courtesy.
  Mer. say, case constrains a
    man bow hams.
  Rom. Meaning, cursy.
  Mer. Thou hast kindly hit it.
  Rom. courteous exposition.
  Mer. Nay, pink courtesy.
  Rom. Pink flower.
  Mer. Right.
  Rom. Why, pump well-flower'd.  
  Mer. said! Follow jest till thou hast worn thy
    pump, that, single sole worn, jest may
    remain, wearing, solely singular.
  Rom. O single-sold jest, solely singular singleness!
  Mer. us, good Benvolio! wits faint.
  Rom. Swits spurs, swits spurs! cry match.
  Mer. Nay, wits run wild-goose chase, done; thou
    hast wild goose thy wits than, sure, I
    five. goose?
  Rom. Thou wast thou wast there
    goose.
  Mer. bite thee ear jest.
  Rom. Nay, good goose, bite not!
  Mer. Thy wit bitter sweeting; sharp sauce.
  Rom. not, then, serv'd sweet goose?
  Mer. O, wit cheveril, stretches inch
    narrow ell broad!
  Rom. stretch word 'broad,' which, added the
    goose, proves thee wide broad goose.
  Mer. Why, groaning love? art  
    thou sociable, art thou Romeo; art thou thou art, by
    art nature. drivelling love a
    great natural runs lolling hide bauble in
    hole.
  Ben. Stop there, stop there!
  Mer. Thou desirest stop tale hair.
  Ben. Thou wouldst made thy tale large.
  Mer. O, thou art deceiv'd! made short; was
    depth tale, meant occupy
    argument longer.
  Rom. goodly gear!

                      Enter Nurse Man [Peter].

  Mer. sail, sail!
  Ben. Two, two! shirt smock.
  Nurse. Peter!
  Peter. Anon.
  Nurse. fan, Peter.
  Mer. Good Peter, hide face; fan's fairer face  
    two.
  Nurse. God ye good morrow, gentlemen.
  Mer. God ye good-den, fair gentlewoman.
  Nurse. good-den?
  Mer. 'Tis less, ye; bawdy hand dial now
    prick noon.
  Nurse. you! man you!
  Rom. One, gentlewoman, God hath made mar.
  Nurse. troth, said. 'For mar,' quoth
    'a? Gentlemen, find young
    Romeo?
  Rom. you; young Romeo older have
    found sought him. youngest of
    name, fault worse.
  Nurse. well.
  Mer. Yea, worst well? took, i' faith! wisely,
    wisely.
  Nurse. he, sir, desire confidence you.
  Ben. endite supper.
  Mer. bawd, bawd, bawd! ho!  
  Rom. hast thou found?
  Mer. hare, sir; hare, sir, lenten pie, is
    stale hoar ere spent
                                     walks sings.

                   hare hoar,
                   hare hoar,
                good meat Lent;
                   hare hoar
                   score
                hoars ere spent.

    Romeo, father's? dinner thither.
  Rom. follow you.
  Mer. Farewell, ancient lady. Farewell,
    [sings] lady, lady, lady.
                                      Exeunt Mercutio, Benvolio.
  Nurse. Marry, farewell! Pray you, Sir, saucy merchant was
    full ropery?
  Rom. gentleman, nurse, loves hear talk  
    speak minute stand month.
  Nurse. 'a speak me, down, 'a
    lustier is, twenty jacks; cannot,
    find shall. Scurvy knave! his
    flirt-gills; skains-mates. thou stand
    too, suffer knave pleasure!
  Peter. man pleasure. had, weapon
    quickly out, warrant you. dare draw soon
    man, occasion good quarrel, law
    side.
  Nurse. Now, afore God, vexed part me
    quivers. Scurvy knave! Pray you, sir, word; and, told you,
    young lady bid enquire out. bid say, will
    myself; ye, ye lead her
    fool's paradise, say, gross kind of
    behaviour, say; gentlewoman young; and
    therefore, deal double her, an
    ill thing off'red gentlewoman, weak dealing.
  Rom. Nurse, commend thy lady mistress. protest unto
    thee-  
  Nurse. Good heart, faith much. Lord,
    Lord! joyful woman.
  Rom. wilt thou her, nurse? Thou dost mark me.
  Nurse. her, sir, protest, which, take
    it, gentlemanlike offer.
  Rom. Bid devise
    means shrift afternoon;
    Friar Laurence' cell
    shriv'd married. thy pains.
  Nurse. No, truly, sir; penny.
  Rom. to! shall.
  Nurse. afternoon, sir? Well, there.
  Rom. stay, good nurse, abbey wall.
    hour man thee
    bring thee cords made tackled stair,
    high topgallant joy
    convoy secret night.
    Farewell. trusty, quit thy pains.
    Farewell. Commend thy mistress.
  Nurse. God heaven bless thee! Hark you, sir.  
  Rom. say'st thou, dear nurse?
  Nurse. man secret? ne'er hear say,
    counsel, putting away?
  Rom. warrant thee man's true steel.
  Nurse. Well, sir, mistress sweetest lady. Lord, Lord!
    'twas prating thing- O, nobleman in
    town, Paris, fain lay knife aboard; she, good
    soul, lieve toad, toad, him. anger
    sometimes, Paris properer man; but
    warrant you, so, pale clout
    versal world. Doth rosemary Romeo begin with
    letter?
  Rom. Ay, nurse; that? R.
  Nurse. Ah, mocker! dog's name. R the- No; know
    begins letter; hath prettiest
    sententious it, rosemary, good
    hear it.
  Rom. Commend thy lady.
  Nurse. Ay, thousand times. [Exit Romeo.] Peter!
  Peter. Anon.  
  Nurse. Peter, fan, before, apace.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene V.
Capulet's orchard.

Enter Juliet.

  Jul. clock struck send nurse;
    half hour 'promis'd return.
    Perchance meet him. so.
    O, lame! Love's heralds thoughts,
    ten times faster glide sun's beams
    Driving back shadows low'ring hills.
    nimble-pinion'd doves draw Love,
    hath wind-swift Cupid wings.
    sun highmost hill
    day's journey, till twelve
    long hours; come.
    affections warm youthful blood,
    swift motion ball;
    words bandy sweet love,
    me,
    folks, feign dead-
    Unwieldy, slow, heavy pale lead.  

                      Enter Nurse [and Peter].

    O God, comes! O honey nurse, news?
    Hast thou met him? Send thy man away.
  Nurse. Peter, stay gate.
                                                   [Exit Peter.]
  Jul. Now, good sweet nurse- O Lord, look'st thou sad?
    news sad, merrily;
    good, thou shamest music sweet news
    playing sour face.
  Nurse. aweary, give leave awhile.
    Fie, bones ache! jaunce had!
  Jul. thou hadst bones, thy news.
    Nay, come, pray thee speak. Good, good nurse, speak.
  Nurse. Jesu, haste! stay awhile?
    breath?
  Jul. art thou breath thou hast breath
    thou art breath?
    excuse thou dost make delay  
    longer tale thou dost excuse.
    thy news good bad? Answer that.
    either, stay circumstance.
    satisfied, is't good bad?
  Nurse. Well, made simple choice; to
    choose man. Romeo? No, he. face than
    man's, leg excels men's; hand a
    foot, body, talk'd on, they
    past compare. flower courtesy, but, I'll
    warrant him, gentle lamb. thy ways, wench; serve God.
    What, din'd home?
  Jul. No, no. before.
    marriage? that?
  Nurse. Lord, head aches! head I!
    beats fall twenty pieces.
    back o' t' side,- ah, back, back!
    Beshrew heart sending about
    catch death jauncing down!
  Jul. I' faith, thou art well.
    Sweet, sweet, Sweet nurse, me, love?  
  Nurse. love says, honest gentleman, courteous,
    kind, handsome; and, warrant, virtuous- is
    mother?
  Jul. mother? Why, within.
    be? oddly thou repliest!
    'Your love says, honest gentleman,
    "Where mother?"'
  Nurse. O God's Lady dear!
    hot? Marry up, trow.
    poultice aching bones?
    Henceforward messages yourself.
  Jul. coil! Come, Romeo?
  Nurse. leave shrift to-day?
  Jul. have.
  Nurse. hie Friar Laurence' cell;
    stays husband make wife.
    wanton blood cheeks:
    scarlet straight news.
    Hie church; way,
    fetch ladder, love  
    climb bird's nest dark.
    drudge, toil delight;
    bear burthen night.
    Go; dinner; hie cell.
  Jul. Hie high fortune! Honest nurse, farewell.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene VI.
Friar Laurence's cell.

Enter Friar [Laurence] Romeo.

  Friar. smile heavens holy act
    after-hours sorrow chide not!
  Rom. Amen, amen! sorrow can,
    countervail exchange joy
    short minute sight.
    thou close hands holy words,
    love-devouring death dare-
    call mine.
  Friar. violent delights violent ends
    triumph die, fire powder,
    Which, kiss, consume. sweetest honey
    loathsome deliciousness
    taste confounds appetite.
    love moderately: long love doth so;
    swift arrives tardy slow.

                     Enter Juliet.  

    lady. O, light foot
    ne'er wear everlasting flint.
    lover bestride gossamer
    idles wanton summer air,
    fall; light vanity.
  Jul. Good ghostly confessor.
  Friar. Romeo thee, daughter, both.
  Jul. him, much.
  Rom. Ah, Juliet, measure thy joy
    heap'd mine, thy skill more
    blazon it, sweeten thy breath
    neighbour air, rich music's tongue
    Unfold imagin'd happiness both
    Receive dear encounter.
  Jul. Conceit, rich matter words,
    Brags substance, ornament.
    beggars count worth;
    true love grown excess
    sum sum half wealth.  
  Friar. Come, me, make short work;
    For, leaves, stay alone
    Till Holy Church incorporate one.
                                                       [Exeunt.]

ACT III. Scene I.
A public place.

Enter Mercutio, Benvolio, Men.

  Ben. pray thee, good Mercutio, retire.
    day hot, Capulets abroad.
    meet, scape brawl,
    now, hot days, mad blood stirring.
  Mer. Thou art fellows that, enters the
    confines tavern, claps sword table says
    'God send thee!' operation second
    cup draws drawer, need.
  Ben. fellow?
  Mer. Come, come, thou art hot jack thy mood in
    Italy; moved moody, moody be
    moved.
  Ben. to?
  Mer. Nay, such, shortly, for
    kill other. Thou! why, thou wilt quarrel man
    hath hair hair beard thou hast.
    Thou wilt quarrel man cracking nuts,  
    reason thou hast hazel eyes. eye eye
    spy quarrel? Thy head full quarrels as
    egg full meat; thy head hath beaten as
    addle egg quarrelling. Thou hast quarrell'd man
    coughing street, hath wakened thy dog that
    hath lain asleep sun. Didst thou fall a
    tailor wearing doublet Easter, another
    tying shoes riband? thou wilt
    tutor quarrelling!
  Ben. apt quarrel thou art, man buy
    fee simple life hour quarter.
  Mer. fee simple? O simple!

                       Enter Tybalt others.

  Ben. head, Capulets.
  Mer. heel, care not.
  Tyb. Follow close, speak them.
    Gentlemen, good den. word you.
  Mer. word us?  
    Couple something; make word blow.
  Tyb. find apt that, sir, give me
    occasion.
  Mer. occasion giving
  Tyb. Mercutio, thou consortest Romeo.
  Mer. Consort? What, dost thou make minstrels? thou make
    minstrels us, hear discords. my
    fiddlestick; make dance. Zounds, consort!
  Ben. talk public haunt men.
    withdraw private place
    reason coldly grievances,
    depart. eyes gaze us.
  Mer. Men's eyes made look, gaze.
    budge man's pleasure,

                        Enter Romeo.

  Tyb. Well, peace you, sir. man.
  Mer. hang'd, sir, wear livery.
    Marry, field, follower!  
    worship sense call man.
  Tyb. Romeo, love bear thee afford
    term this: thou art villain.
  Rom. Tybalt, reason love thee
    Doth excuse appertaining rage
    greeting. Villain none.
    farewell. thou knowest not.
  Tyb. Boy, excuse injuries
    thou hast me; turn draw.
  Rom. protest injur'd thee,
    love thee thou canst devise
    Till thou shalt reason love;
    good Capulet, tender
    dearly mine own, satisfied.
  Mer. O calm, dishonourable, vile submission!
    Alla stoccata carries away.                      [Draws.]
    Tybalt, ratcatcher, walk?
  Tyb. wouldst thou me?
  Mer. Good King Cats, lives. I
    make bold withal, and, hereafter,  
    dry-beat rest eight. pluck sword of
    pitcher ears? Make haste, mine ears
    ere out.
  Tyb. you.                                    [Draws.]
  Rom. Gentle Mercutio, put thy rapier up.
  Mer. Come, sir, passado!
                                                   [They fight.]
  Rom. Draw, Benvolio; beat weapons.
    Gentlemen, shame! forbear outrage!
    Tybalt, Mercutio, Prince expressly hath
    Forbid bandying Verona streets.
    Hold, Tybalt! Good Mercutio!
         Tybalt Romeo's arm thrusts Mercutio in, flies
                                           [with Followers].
  Mer. hurt.
    plague o' houses! sped.
    hath nothing?
  Ben. What, art thou hurt?
  Mer. Ay, ay, scratch, scratch. Marry, 'tis enough.
    page? Go, villain, fetch surgeon.  
                                                    [Exit Page.]
  Rom. Courage, man. hurt much.
  Mer. No, 'tis deep well, wide church door;
    'tis enough, 'twill serve. to-morrow, you
    find grave man. peppered, warrant, this
    world. plague o' houses! Zounds, dog, rat, a
    mouse, cat, scratch man death! braggart, rogue, a
    villain, fights book arithmetic! devil
    us? hurt arm.
  Rom. thought best.
  Mer. house, Benvolio,
    faint. plague o' houses!
    made worms' meat me. it,
    soundly too. houses!
                                 [Exit. [supported Benvolio].
  Rom. gentleman, Prince's ally,
    friend, hath mortal hurt
    behalf- reputation stain'd
    Tybalt's slander- Tybalt, hour
    Hath kinsman. O sweet Juliet,  
    Thy beauty hath made effeminate
    temper soft'ned valour's steel

                      Enter Benvolio.

  Ben. O Romeo, Romeo, brave Mercutio's dead!
    gallant spirit hath aspir'd clouds,
    untimely scorn earth.
  Rom. day's black fate moe days doth depend;
    begins woe end.

                       Enter Tybalt.

  Ben. furious Tybalt back again.
  Rom. Alive triumph, Mercutio slain?
    heaven respective lenity,
    fire-ey'd fury conduct now!
    Now, Tybalt, 'villain' back again
    late thou gavest me; Mercutio's soul
    heads,  
    Staying thine company.
    thou I, both, him.
  Tyb. Thou, wretched boy, didst consort here,
    Shalt hence.
  Rom. determine that.
                                       fight. Tybalt falls.
  Ben. Romeo, away, gone!
    citizens up, Tybalt slain.
    Stand amaz'd. Prince doom thee death
    thou art taken. Hence, gone, away!
  Rom. O, fortune's fool!
  Ben. dost thou stay?
                                                     Exit Romeo.
                      Enter Citizens.

  Citizen. ran kill'd Mercutio?
    Tybalt, murtherer, ran he?
  Ben. lies Tybalt.
  Citizen. Up, sir, me.
    charge thee Prince's obey.  

  Enter Prince [attended], Montague, Capulet, Wives,
                     [others].

  Prince. vile beginners fray?
  Ben. O noble Prince. discover all
    unlucky manage fatal brawl.
    lies man, slain young Romeo,
    slew thy kinsman, brave Mercutio.
  Cap. Wife. Tybalt, cousin! O brother's child!
    O Prince! O husband! O, blood spill'd
    dear kinsman! Prince, thou art true,
    blood shed blood Montague.
    O cousin, cousin!
  Prince. Benvolio, began bloody fray?
  Ben. Tybalt, slain, Romeo's hand stay.
    Romeo, spoke fair, bid bethink
    nice quarrel was, urg'd withal
    high displeasure. this- uttered
    gentle breath, calm look, knees humbly bow'd-  
    truce unruly spleen
    Tybalt deaf peace, tilts
    piercing steel bold Mercutio's breast;
    Who, hot, turns deadly point point,
    And, martial scorn, hand beats
    Cold death sends
    back Tybalt, dexterity
    Retorts it. Romeo cries aloud,
    'Hold, friends! friends, part!' swifter tongue,
    agile arm beats fatal points,
    'twixt rushes; underneath arm
    envious thrust Tybalt hit life
    stout Mercutio, Tybalt fled;
    by-and-by back Romeo,
    newly entertain'd revenge,
    to't lightning; for, ere I
    draw part them, stout Tybalt slain;
    And, fell, Romeo turn fly.
    truth, Benvolio die.
  Cap. Wife. kinsman Montague;  
    Affection makes false, speaks true.
    twenty fought black strife,
    twenty kill life.
    beg justice, thou, Prince, give.
    Romeo slew Tybalt; Romeo live.
  Prince. Romeo slew him; slew Mercutio.
    price dear blood doth owe?
  Mon. Romeo, Prince; Mercutio's friend;
    fault concludes law end,
    life Tybalt.
  Prince. offence
    Immediately exile hence.
    interest hate's proceeding,
    blood rude brawls doth lie a-bleeding;
    amerce strong fine
    repent loss mine.
    deaf pleading excuses;
    tears prayers purchase abuses.
    none. Romeo haste,
    Else, found, hour last.  
    Bear body, attend will.
    Mercy murders, pardoning kill.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene II.
Capulet's orchard.

Enter Juliet alone.

  Jul. Gallop apace, fiery-footed steeds,
    Phoebus' lodging! wagoner
    Phaeton whip West
    bring cloudy night immediately.
    Spread thy close curtain, love-performing night,
    runaway eyes wink, Romeo
    Leap arms untalk'd unseen.
    Lovers amorous rites
    beauties; or, love blind,
    agrees night. Come, civil night,
    Thou sober-suited matron, black,
    learn lose winning match,
    Play'd pair stainless maidenhoods.
    Hood unmann'd blood, bating cheeks,
    thy black mantle till strange love, grown bold,
    true love acted simple modesty.
    Come, night; come, Romeo; come, thou day night;  
    thou wilt lie wings night
    Whiter snow raven's back.
    Come, gentle night; come, loving, black-brow'd night;
    Give Romeo; and, die,
    cut stars,
    make face heaven fine
    world love night
    pay worship garish sun.
    O, bought mansion love,
    possess'd it; sold,
    enjoy'd. tedious day
    night festival
    impatient child hath robes
    wear them. O, nurse,

                Enter Nurse, cords.

    brings news; tongue speaks
    Romeo's speaks heavenly eloquence.
    Now, nurse, news? hast thou there? cords  
    Romeo bid thee fetch?
  Nurse. Ay, ay, cords.
                                             [Throws down.]
  Jul. Ay me! news? dost thou wring thy hands
  Nurse. Ah, weraday! dead, dead, dead!
    undone, lady, undone!
    Alack day! gone, kill'd, dead!
  Jul. heaven envious?
  Nurse. Romeo can,
    heaven cannot. O Romeo, Romeo!
    thought it? Romeo!
  Jul. devil art thou dost torment thus?
    torture roar'd dismal hell.
    Hath Romeo slain himself? thou 'I,'
    bare vowel 'I' poison more
    death-darting eye cockatrice.
    I, 'I';
    eyes shut make thee answer 'I.'
    slain, 'I'; not, 'no.'
    sounds determine weal woe.  
  Nurse. wound, mine eyes,
    (God save mark!) manly breast.
    piteous corse, bloody piteous corse;
    Pale, pale ashes, bedaub'd blood,
    gore-blood. swounded sight.
  Jul. O, break, heart! poor bankrout, break once!
    prison, eyes; ne'er liberty!
    Vile earth, earth resign; end motion here,
    thou Romeo press heavy bier!
  Nurse. O Tybalt, Tybalt, friend had!
    O courteous Tybalt! honest gentleman
    live thee dead!
  Jul. storm blows contrary?
    Romeo slaught'red, Tybalt dead?
    dear-lov'd cousin, dearer lord?
    Then, dreadful trumpet, sound general doom!
    living, gone?
  Nurse. Tybalt gone, Romeo banished;
    Romeo kill'd him, banished.
  Jul. O God! Romeo's hand shed Tybalt's blood?  
  Nurse. did, did! alas day, did!
  Jul. O serpent heart, hid flow'ring face!
    dragon fair cave?
    Beautiful tyrant! fiend angelical!
    Dove-feather'd raven! wolvish-ravening lamb!
    Despised substance divinest show!
    opposite thou justly seem'st-
    damned saint, honourable villain!
    O nature, hadst thou hell
    thou didst bower spirit fiend
    mortal paradise sweet flesh?
    book vile matter
    fairly bound? O, deceit dwell
    gorgeous palace!
  Nurse. trust,
    faith, honesty men; perjur'd,
    forsworn, naught, dissemblers.
    Ah, man? Give aqua vitae.
    griefs, woes, sorrows make old.
    Shame Romeo!  
  Jul. Blister'd thy tongue
    wish! born shame.
    brow shame asham'd sit;
    'tis throne honour crown'd
    Sole monarch universal earth.
    O, beast chide him!
  Nurse. speak kill'd cousin?
  Jul. speak ill husband?
    Ah, poor lord, tongue smooth thy name
    I, thy three-hours wife, mangled it?
    wherefore, villain, didst thou kill cousin?
    villain cousin kill'd husband.
    Back, foolish tears, back native spring!
    tributary drops belong woe,
    you, mistaking, offer joy.
    husband lives, Tybalt slain;
    Tybalt's dead, slain husband.
    comfort; wherefore weep then?
    word was, worser Tybalt's death,
    murd'red me. forget fain;  
    O, presses memory
    damned guilty deeds sinners' minds!
    'Tybalt dead, Romeo- banished.'
    'banished,' word 'banished,'
    Hath slain ten thousand Tybalts. Tybalt's death
    woe enough, ended there;
    Or, sour woe delights fellowship
    needly rank'd griefs,
    not, 'Tybalt's dead,'
    Thy father, thy mother, nay, both,
    modern lamentation mov'd?
    rearward Tybalt's death,
    'Romeo banished'- speak word
    father, mother, Tybalt, Romeo, Juliet,
    slain, dead. 'Romeo banished'-
    end, limit, measure, bound,
    word's death; words woe sound.
    father mother, nurse?
  Nurse. Weeping wailing Tybalt's corse.
    them? bring thither.  
  Jul. Wash wounds tears? Mine spent,
    dry, Romeo's banishment.
    cords. Poor ropes, beguil'd,
    I, Romeo exil'd.
    made highway bed;
    I, maid, die maiden-widowed.
    Come, cords; come, nurse. wedding bed;
    death, Romeo, maidenhead!
  Nurse. Hie chamber. find Romeo
    comfort you. wot is.
    Hark ye, Romeo night.
    him; hid Laurence' cell.
  Jul. O, find him! give ring true knight
    bid farewell.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene III.
Friar Laurence's cell.

Enter Friar [Laurence].

  Friar. Romeo, forth; forth, thou fearful man.
    Affliction enanmour'd thy parts,
    thou art wedded calamity.

                         Enter Romeo.

  Rom. Father, news? Prince's doom
    sorrow craves acquaintance hand
    not?
  Friar. familiar
    dear son sour company.
    bring thee tidings Prince's doom.
  Rom. doomsday Prince's doom?
  Friar. gentler judgment vanish'd lips-
    body's death, body's banishment.
  Rom. Ha, banishment? merciful, 'death';
    exile hath terror look,  
    death. 'banishment.'
  Friar. Verona art thou banished.
    patient, world broad wide.
  Rom. world Verona walls,
    purgatory, torture, hell itself.
    banished banish'd world,
    world's exile death. 'banishment'
    death misterm'd. Calling death 'banishment,'
    Thou cut'st head golden axe
    smilest stroke murders me.
  Friar. O deadly sin! O rude unthankfulness!
    Thy fault law calls death; kind Prince,
    Taking thy part, hath rush'd law,
    turn'd black word death banishment.
    dear mercy, thou seest not.
  Rom. 'Tis torture, mercy. Heaven here,
    Juliet lives; cat dog
    mouse, unworthy thing,
    Live heaven her;
    Romeo not. validity,  
    honourable state, courtship lives
    carrion flies Romeo. seize
    white dear Juliet's hand
    steal immortal blessing lips,
    Who, pure vestal modesty,
    blush, thinking kisses sin;
    Romeo not- banished.
    flies do, fly;
    free men, banished.
    sayest thou exile death?
    Hadst thou poison mix'd, sharp-ground knife,
    sudden death, ne'er mean,
    'banished' kill me- 'banished'?
    O friar, damned word hell;
    Howling attends it! hast thou heart,
    divine, ghostly confessor,
    sin-absolver, friend profess'd,
    mangle word 'banished'?
  Friar. Thou fond mad man, hear speak.
  Rom. O, thou wilt speak banishment.  
  Friar. give thee armour word;
    Adversity's sweet milk, philosophy,
    comfort thee, thou art banished.
  Rom. 'banished'? Hang philosophy!
    philosophy make Juliet,
    Displant town, reverse prince's doom,
    helps not, prevails not. Talk more.
  Friar. O, madmen ears.
  Rom. they, wise men eyes?
  Friar. dispute thee thy estate.
  Rom. Thou canst speak thou dost feel.
    Wert thou young I, Juliet thy love,
    hour married, Tybalt murdered,
    Doting me, banished,
    mightst thou speak, mightst thou tear thy hair,
    fall ground, now,
    Taking measure unmade grave.
                                                 Knock [within].
  Friar. Arise; knocks. Good Romeo, hide thyself.
  Rom. I; breath heartsick groans,  
    Mist-like infold search eyes.          Knock.
  Friar. Hark, knock! there? Romeo, arise;
    Thou wilt taken.- Stay awhile!- Stand up;          Knock.
    Run study.- By-and-by!- God's will,
    simpleness this.- come, come!             Knock.
    knocks hard? you? will
  Nurse. [within] in, errand.
    Lady Juliet.
  Friar. then.

                       Enter Nurse.

  Nurse. O holy friar, O, me, holy friar
    lady's lord, Romeo?
  Friar. ground, tears made drunk.
  Nurse. O, mistress' case,
    case!
  Friar. O woeful sympathy!
    Piteous predicament!
  Nurse. lies she,  
    Blubb'ring weeping, weeping blubbering.
    Stand up, stand up! Stand, man.
    Juliet's sake, sake, rise stand!
    fall deep O?
  Rom. (rises) Nurse-
  Nurse. Ah sir! ah sir! Well, death's end all.
  Rom. Spakest thou Juliet? her?
    Doth murtherer,
    stain'd childhood joy
    blood remov'd own?
    she? doth she! says
    conceal'd lady cancell'd love?
  Nurse. O, nothing, sir, weeps weeps;
    falls bed, starts up,
    Tybalt calls; Romeo cries,
    falls again.
  Rom. name,
    Shot deadly level gun,
    murther her; name's cursed hand
    Murder'd kinsman. O, me, friar, me,  
    vile part anatomy
    Doth lodge? me, sack
    hateful mansion.                     [Draws dagger.]
  Friar. Hold thy desperate hand.
    Art thou man? Thy form cries thou art;
    Thy tears womanish, thy wild acts denote
    unreasonable fury beast.
    Unseemly woman man!
    ill-beseeming beast both!
    Thou hast amaz'd me. holy order,
    thought thy disposition temper'd.
    Hast thou slain Tybalt? Wilt thou slay thyself?
    slay thy lady thy life lives,
    damned hate thyself?
    railest thou thy birth, heaven, earth?
    birth heaven earth, meet
    thee once; thou wouldst lose.
    Fie, fie, thou shamest thy shape, thy love, thy wit,
    Which, usurer, abound'st all,
    usest true  
    bedeck thy shape, thy love, thy wit.
    Thy noble shape form wax
    Digressing valour man;
    Thy dear love sworn hollow perjury,
    Killing love thou hast vow'd cherish;
    Thy wit, ornament shape love,
    Misshapen conduct both,
    powder skilless soldier's flask,
    afire thine ignorance,
    thou dismemb'red thine defence.
    What, rouse thee, man! Thy Juliet alive,
    dear sake thou wast dead.
    art thou happy. Tybalt kill thee,
    thou slewest Tybalt. art thou happy too.
    law, threat'ned death, thy friend
    turns exile. art thou happy.
    pack blessings light thy back;
    Happiness courts thee array;
    But, misbhav'd sullen wench,
    Thou pout'st thy fortune thy love.  
    heed, heed, die miserable.
    thee thy love, decreed,
    Ascend chamber, comfort her.
    thou stay till watch set,
    thou canst pass Mantua,
    thou shalt live till find time
    blaze marriage, reconcile friends,
    Beg pardon Prince, call thee back
    twenty hundred thousand times joy
    thou went'st lamentation.
    before, nurse. Commend thy lady,
    bid hasten house bed,
    heavy sorrow makes apt unto.
    Romeo coming.
  Nurse. O Lord, stay'd night
    hear good counsel. O, learning is!
    lord, lady come.
  Rom. so, bid sweet prepare chide.
  Nurse. ring bid give you, sir.
    Hie you, make haste, grows late.           Exit.  
  Rom. comfort reviv'd this!
  Friar. hence; good night; stands state:
    watch set,
    break day disguis'd hence.
    Sojourn Mantua. find man,
    signify time time
    good hap chances here.
    Give thy hand. 'Tis late. Farewell; good night.
  Rom. joy past joy calls me,
    grief part thee.
    Farewell.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene IV.
Capulet's house

Enter Capulet, Wife, Paris.

  Cap. Things fall'n out, sir, unluckily
    time move daughter.
    you, lov'd kinsman Tybalt dearly,
    I. Well, born die.
    'Tis late; to-night.
    promise you, company,
    abed hour ago.
  Par. times woe afford tune woo.
    Madam, good night. Commend daughter.
  Lady. will, mind early to-morrow;
    To-night mew'd heaviness.
  Cap. Sir Paris, make desperate tender
    child's love. rul'd
    respects me; nay more, doubt not.
    Wife, ere bed;
    Acquaint son Paris' love
    bid (mark me?) Wednesday next-  
    But, soft! day this?
  Par. Monday, lord.
  Cap. Monday! ha, ha! Well, Wednesday soon.
    Thursday be- Thursday, her
    married noble earl.
    ready? haste?
    great ado- friend two;
    hark you, Tybalt slain late,
    thought held carelessly,
    kinsman, revel much.
    half dozen friends,
    end. Thursday?
  Par. lord, Thursday to-morrow.
  Cap. Well, gone. Thursday then.
    Juliet ere bed;
    Prepare her, wife, wedding day.
    Farewell, lord.- Light chamber, ho!
    Afore me, late
    call early by-and-by.
    Good night.  
                                                          Exeunt




Scene V.
Capulet's orchard.

Enter Romeo Juliet aloft, Window.

  Jul. Wilt thou gone? day.
    nightingale, lark,
    pierc'd fearful hollow thine ear.
    Nightly sings yond pomegranate tree.
    me, love, nightingale.
  Rom. lark, herald morn;
    nightingale. Look, love, envious streaks
    lace severing clouds yonder East.
    Night's candles burnt out, jocund day
    Stands tiptoe misty mountain tops.
    live, stay die.
  Jul. Yond light daylight; it, I.
    meteor sun exhales
    thee night torchbearer
    light thee Mantua.
    stay yet; thou need'st gone.
  Rom. ta'en, put death.  
    content, thou wilt so.
    yon grey morning's eye,
    'Tis pale reflex Cynthia's brow;
    lark notes beat
    vaulty heaven high heads.
    care stay go.
    Come, death, welcome! Juliet wills so.
    is't, soul? talk; day.
  Jul. is, is! Hie hence, gone, away!
    lark sings tune,
    Straining harsh discords unpleasing sharps.
    lark makes sweet division;
    doth so, divideth us.
    lark loathed toad chang'd eyes;
    O, chang'd voices too,
    arm arm voice doth affray,
    Hunting thee hunt's-up day!
    O, gone! light light grows.
  Rom. light light- dark dark woes!
  
                          Enter Nurse.

  Nurse. Madam!
  Jul. Nurse?
  Nurse. lady mother coming chamber.
    day broke; wary, about.
  Jul. Then, window, day in, life out.
                                                         [Exit.]
  Rom. Farewell, farewell! kiss, descend.
                                                  goeth down.
  Jul. Art thou so, lord, love, friend?
    hear thee day hour,
    minute days.
    O, count years
    Ere behold Romeo!
  Rom. Farewell!
    omit opportunity
    convey greetings, love, thee.
  Jul. O, think'st thou meet again?
  Rom. doubt not; woes serve  
    sweet discourses time come.
  Jul. O God, ill-divining soul!
    Methinks thee, thou art below,
    dead bottom tomb.
    eyesight fails, thou look'st pale.
  Rom. trust me, love, eye you.
    Dry sorrow drinks blood. Adieu, adieu!
Exit.
  Jul. O Fortune, Fortune! men call thee fickle.
    thou art fickle, dost thou him
    renown'd faith? fickle, Fortune,
    hope thou wilt long
    send back.
  Lady. [within] Ho, daughter! up?
  Jul. is't calls? lady mother.
    late, early?
    unaccustom'd procures hither?

                       Enter Mother.
  
  Lady. Why, now, Juliet?
  Jul. Madam, well.
  Lady. Evermore weeping cousin's death?
    What, wilt thou wash grave tears?
    thou couldst, thou couldst make live.
    done. grief shows love;
    grief shows wit.
  Jul. weep feeling loss.
  Lady. feel loss, friend
    weep for.
  Jul. Feeling loss,
    choose weep friend.
  Lady. Well, girl, thou weep'st death
    villain lives slaughter'd him.
  Jul. villain, madam?
  Lady. villain Romeo.
  Jul. [aside] Villain miles asunder.-
    God pardon him! do, heart;
    man doth grieve heart.
  Lady. traitor murderer lives.  
  Jul. Ay, madam, reach hands.
    venge cousin's death!
  Lady. vengeance it, fear thou not.
    weep more. send Mantua,
    banish'd runagate doth live,
    give unaccustom'd dram
    Tybalt company;
    hope thou wilt satisfied.
  Jul. satisfied
    Romeo till behold him- dead-
    poor heart kinsman vex'd.
    Madam, find man
    bear poison, temper it;
    Romeo should, receipt thereof,
    sleep quiet. O, heart abhors
    hear nam'd him,
    wreak love bore cousin Tybalt
    body hath slaughter'd him!
  Lady. Find thou means, find man.
    thee joyful tidings, girl.  
  Jul. joy needy time.
    they, beseech ladyship?
  Lady. Well, well, thou hast careful father, child;
    who, put thee thy heaviness,
    Hath sorted sudden day joy
    thou expects look'd for.
  Jul. Madam, happy time! day that?
  Lady. Marry, child, early Thursday morn
    gallant, young, noble gentleman,
    County Paris, Saint Peter's Church,
    happily make thee joyful bride.
  Jul. Saint Peter's Church, Peter too,
    make joyful bride!
    haste, wed
    Ere husband woo.
    pray lord father, madam,
    marry yet; do, swear
    Romeo, hate,
    Paris. news indeed!
  Lady. father. yourself,  
    hands.

                   Enter Capulet Nurse.

  Cap. sun sets air doth drizzle dew,
    sunset brother's son
    rains downright.
    now? conduit, girl? What, tears?
    Evermore show'ring? body
    Thou counterfeit'st bark, sea, wind:
    thy eyes, call sea,
    ebb flow tears; bark thy body is
    Sailing salt flood; winds, thy sighs,
    Who, raging thy tears them,
    sudden calm overset
    Thy tempest-tossed body. now, wife?
    delivered decree?
  Lady. Ay, sir; none, thanks.
    fool married grave!
  Cap. Soft! you, you, wife.  
    How? none? Doth give thanks?
    proud? Doth count blest,
    Unworthy is, wrought
    worthy gentleman bridegroom?
  Jul. proud have, thankful have.
    Proud hate,
    thankful hate meant love.
  Cap. How, how, how, how, choplogic? this?
    'Proud'- 'I you'- 'I not'-
    'not proud'? Mistress minion you,
    thankings, proud prouds,
    fettle fine joints 'gainst Thursday next
    Paris Saint Peter's Church,
    drag thee hurdle thither.
    Out, green-sickness carrion out, baggage!
    tallow-face!
  Lady. Fie, fie! what, mad?
  Jul. Good father, beseech knees,
    Hear patience speak word.
  Cap. Hang thee, young baggage! disobedient wretch!  
    thee what- thee church Thursday
    face.
    Speak not, reply not, answer me!
    fingers itch. Wife, scarce thought blest
    God lent child;
    much,
    curse her.
    her, hilding!
  Nurse. God heaven bless her!
    blame, lord, rate so.
  Cap. why, Lady Wisdom? Hold tongue,
    Good Prudence. Smatter gossips, go!
  Nurse. speak treason.
  Cap. O, God-i-god-en!
  Nurse. speak?
  Cap. Peace, mumbling fool!
    Utter gravity o'er gossip's bowl,
    not.
  Lady. hot.
  Cap. God's bread makes mad. Day, night, late, early,  
    home, abroad, alone, company,
    Waking sleeping, care hath been
    match'd; provided
    gentleman princely parentage,
    fair demesnes, youthful, nobly train'd,
    Stuff'd, say, honourable parts,
    Proportion'd one's thought man-
    wretched puling fool,
    whining mammet, fortune's tender,
    answer 'I'll wed, love;
    young, pray pardon me'!
    But, wed, pardon you.
    Graze will, house me.
    to't, on't; jest.
    Thursday near; lay hand heart, advise:
    mine, give friend;
    not, hang, beg, starve, die streets,
    For, soul, ne'er acknowledge thee,
    mine thee good.
    Trust to't. Bethink you. forsworn.         Exit.  
  Jul. pity sitting clouds
    sees bottom grief?
    O sweet mother, cast away!
    Delay marriage month, week;
    not, make bridal bed
    dim monument Tybalt lies.
  Lady. Talk me, speak word.
    thou wilt, thee.            Exit.
  Jul. O God!- O nurse, prevented?
    husband earth, faith heaven.
    faith return earth
    husband send heaven
    leaving earth? Comfort me, counsel me.
    Alack, alack, heaven practise stratagems
    soft subject myself!
    say'st thou? Hast thou word joy?
    comfort, nurse.
  Nurse. Faith, is.
    Romeo banish'd; world nothing
    dares ne'er back challenge you;  
    do, stealth.
    Then, case stands doth,
    married County.
    O, lovely gentleman!
    Romeo's dishclout him. eagle, madam,
    Hath green, quick, fair eye
    Paris hath. Beshrew heart,
    happy match,
    excels first; not,
    dead- 'twere good were
    living him.
  Jul. Speak'st thou thy heart?
  Nurse. soul too; beshrew both.
  Jul. Amen!
  Nurse. What?
  Jul. Well, thou hast comforted marvellous much.
    in; lady gone,
    displeas'd father, Laurence' cell,
    make confession absolv'd.
  Nurse. Marry, will; wisely done.           Exit.  
  Jul. Ancient damnation! O wicked fiend!
    sin forsworn,
    dispraise lord tongue
    hath prais'd compare
    thousand times? Go, counsellor!
    Thou bosom henceforth twain.
    friar remedy.
    fail, power die.            Exit.
