ACT IV. Scene I.
Friar Laurence's cell.

Enter Friar, [Laurence] County Paris.

  Friar. Thursday, sir? time short.
  Par. father Capulet so,
    slow slack haste.
  Friar. lady's mind.
    Uneven course; not.
  Par. Immoderately weeps Tybalt's death,
    talk'd love;
    Venus smiles house tears.
    Now, sir, father counts dangerous
    give sorrow sway,
    wisdom hastes marriage
    stop inundation tears,
    Which, minded alone,
    put society.
    reason haste.
  Friar. [aside] knew slow'd.-
    Look, sir, lady cell.  

                    Enter Juliet.

  Par. Happily met, lady wife!
  Jul. be, sir, wife.
  Par. be, love, Thursday next.
  Jul. be.
  Friar. text.
  Par. make confession father?
  Jul. answer that, confess you.
  Par. deny love me.
  Jul. confess love him.
  Par. ye, sure, love me.
  Jul. so, price,
    spoke back, face.
  Par. Poor soul, thy face abus'd tears.
  Jul. tears small victory that,
    bad spite.
  Par. Thou wrong'st tears report.
  Jul. slander, sir, truth;  
    spake, spake face.
  Par. Thy face mine, thou hast sland'red it.
  Jul. so, mine own.
    leisure, holy father, now,
    evening mass
  Friar. leisure serves me, pensive daughter, now.
    lord, entreat time alone.
  Par. God shield disturb devotion!
    Juliet, Thursday early rouse ye.
    Till then, adieu, holy kiss.             Exit.
  Jul. O, shut door! thou hast so,
    weep me- past hope, past cure, past help!
  Friar. Ah, Juliet, thy grief;
    strains past compass wits.
    hear thou must, prorogue it,
    Thursday married County.
  Jul. not, friar, thou hear'st this,
    thou prevent it.
    thy wisdom thou canst give help,
    thou call resolution wise  
    knife presently.
    God join'd heart Romeo's, thou hands;
    ere hand, thee Romeo's seal'd,
    label deed,
    true heart treacherous revolt
    Turn another, slay both.
    Therefore, thy long-experienc'd time,
    Give present counsel; or, behold,
    'Twixt extremes bloody knife
    play empire, arbitrating that
    commission thy years art
    issue true honour bring.
    long speak. long die
    thou speak'st speak remedy.
  Friar. Hold, daughter. spy kind hope,
    craves desperate execution
    desperate prevent.
    If, marry County Paris
    Thou hast strength slay thyself,
    thou wilt undertake  
    thing death chide shame,
    cop'st death scape it;
    And, thou dar'st, give thee remedy.
  Jul. O, bid leap, marry Paris,
    battlements yonder tower,
    walk thievish ways, bid lurk
    serpents are; chain roaring bears,
    shut nightly charnel house,
    O'ercover'd dead men's rattling bones,
    reeky shanks yellow chapless skulls;
    bid new-made grave
    hide dead man shroud-
    Things that, hear told, made tremble-
    fear doubt,
    live unstain'd wife sweet love.
  Friar. Hold, then. home, merry, give consent
    marry Paris. Wednesday to-morrow.
    To-morrow night thou lie alone;
    nurse lie thee thy chamber.
    thou vial, bed,  
    distilled liquor drink thou off;
    presently thy veins run
    cold drowsy humour; pulse
    native progress, surcease;
    warmth, breath, testify thou livest;
    roses thy lips cheeks fade
    paly ashes, thy eyes' windows fall
    death shuts day life;
    part, depriv'd supple government,
    Shall, stiff stark cold, death;
    borrowed likeness shrunk death
    Thou shalt continue two-and-forty hours,
    awake pleasant sleep.
    Now, bridegroom morning comes
    rouse thee thy bed, art thou dead.
    Then, manner country is,
    thy robes uncovered bier
    Thou shalt borne ancient vault
    kindred Capulets lie.
    time, thou shalt awake,  
    Romeo letters drift;
    come; I
    watch thy waking, night
    Romeo bear thee Mantua.
    free thee present shame,
    inconstant toy womanish fear
    Abate thy valour acting it.
  Jul. Give me, give me! O, fear!
  Friar. Hold! gone, strong prosperous
    resolve. send friar speed
    Mantua, letters thy lord.
  Jul. Love give strength! strength afford.
    Farewell, dear father.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene II.
Capulet's house.

Enter Father Capulet, Mother, Nurse, Servingmen,
                        three.

  Cap. guests invite writ.
                                            [Exit Servingman.]
    Sirrah, hire twenty cunning cooks.
  Serv. ill, sir; lick
    fingers.
  Cap. canst thou so?
  Serv. Marry, sir, 'tis ill cook lick own
    fingers. lick fingers with
    me.
  Cap. Go, begone.
                                                Exit Servingman.
    unfurnish'd time.
    What, daughter Friar Laurence?
  Nurse. Ay, forsooth.
  Cap. Well, chance good her.
    peevish self-will'd harlotry is.  

                        Enter Juliet.

  Nurse. shrift merry look.
  Cap. now, headstrong? gadding?
  Jul. learnt repent sin
    disobedient opposition
    behests, enjoin'd
    holy Laurence fall prostrate here
    beg pardon. Pardon, beseech you!
    Henceforward rul'd you.
  Cap. Send County. this.
    knot knit to-morrow morning.
  Jul. met youthful lord Laurence' cell
    gave becomed love might,
    stepping o'er bounds modesty.
  Cap. Why, glad on't. well. Stand up.
    as't be. County.
    Ay, marry, go, say, fetch hither.
    Now, afore God, reverend holy friar,  
    city bound him.
  Jul. Nurse, closet
    sort needful ornaments
    fit furnish to-morrow?
  Mother. No, till Thursday. time enough.
  Cap. Go, nurse, her. church to-morrow.
                                        Exeunt Juliet Nurse.
  Mother. short provision.
    'Tis night.
  Cap. Tush, stir about,
    things well, warrant thee, wife.
    thou Juliet, deck her.
    bed to-night; alone.
    play housewife once. What, ho!
    forth; well, walk myself
    County Paris, prepare up
    to-morrow. heart wondrous light,
    wayward girl reclaim'd.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene III.
Juliet's chamber.

Enter Juliet Nurse.

  Jul. Ay, attires best; but, gentle nurse,
    pray thee leave to-night;
    orisons
    move heavens smile state,
    Which, thou knowest, cross full sin.

                          Enter Mother.

  Mother. What, busy, ho? help?
  Jul. No, madam; cull'd necessaries
    behooffull state to-morrow.
    you, left alone,
    nurse night sit you;
    hands full all
    sudden business.
  Mother. Good night.
    thee bed, rest; thou hast need.  
                                      Exeunt [Mother Nurse.]
  Jul. Farewell! God meet again.
    faint cold fear thrills veins
    freezes heat life.
    call back comfort me.
    Nurse!- here?
    dismal scene act alone.
    Come, vial.
    mixture work all?
    married to-morrow morning?
    No, No! forbid it. Lie thou there.
                                             Lays dagger.
    poison friar
    Subtilly hath minist'red dead,
    marriage dishonour'd
    married Romeo?
    fear is; methinks not,
    hath holy man.
    entertain bad thought.
    if, laid tomb,  
    wake time Romeo
    redeem me? fearful point!
    stifled vault,
    foul mouth healthsome air breathes in,
    die strangled ere Romeo comes?
    Or, live, like
    horrible conceit death night,
    terror place-
    vault, ancient receptacle
    hundred years bones
    buried ancestors pack'd;
    bloody Tybalt, green earth,
    Lies fest'ring shroud; where, say,
    hours night spirits resort-
    Alack, alack, I,
    early waking- loathsome smells,
    shrieks mandrakes torn earth,
    living mortals, hearing them, run mad-
    O, wake, distraught,
    Environed hideous fears,  
    madly play forefathers' joints,
    pluck mangled Tybalt shroud.,
    And, rage, great kinsman's bone
    club dash desp'rate brains?
    O, look! methinks cousin's ghost
    Seeking Romeo, spit body
    rapier's point. Stay, Tybalt, stay!
    Romeo, come! drink thee.

        [drinks and] falls bed curtains.




Scene IV.
Capulet's house.

Enter Lady House Nurse.

  Lady. Hold, keys fetch spices, nurse.
  Nurse. call dates quinces pastry.

                       Enter Capulet.

  Cap. Come, stir, stir, stir! cock hath crow'd,
    curfew bell hath rung, 'tis o'clock.
    bak'd meats, good Angelica;
    Spare cost.
  Nurse. Go, cot-quean, go,
    bed! Faith, sick to-morrow
    night's watching.
  Cap. No, whit. What, watch'd ere now
    night lesser cause, ne'er sick.
  Lady. Ay, mouse-hunt time;
    watch watching now.
                                          Exeunt Lady Nurse.  
  Cap. jealous hood, jealous hood!

  Enter [Fellows, spits logs baskets.

    there? Now, fellow,
  Fellow. Things cook, sir; what.
  Cap. Make haste, make haste. [Exit Fellow.] Sirrah, fetch drier
      logs.
    Call Peter; show thee are.
  Fellow. head, sir, find logs
    trouble Peter matter.
  Cap. Mass, said; merry whoreson, ha!
    Thou shalt loggerhead. [Exit Fellow.] Good faith, 'tis day.
    County music straight,
    would.                         Play music.
    hear near.
    Nurse! Wife! What, ho! What, nurse, say!

                              Enter Nurse.  
    waken Juliet; trim up.
    chat Paris. Hie, make haste,
    Make haste! bridegroom already:
    Make haste, say.
                                                       [Exeunt.]




Scene V.
Juliet's chamber.

[Enter Nurse.]

  Nurse. Mistress! what, mistress! Juliet! Fast, warrant her, she.
    Why, lamb! why, lady! Fie, slug-abed!
    Why, love, say! madam! sweetheart! Why, bride!
    What, word? pennyworths now!
    Sleep week; night, warrant,
    County Paris hath set rest
    rest little. God forgive me!
    Marry, amen. sound asleep!
    wake her. Madam, madam, madam!
    Ay, County bed!
    fright up, i' faith. be?
                                     [Draws curtains.]
    What, dress'd, clothes, again?
    wake you. Lady! lady! lady!
    Alas, alas! Help, help! lady's dead!
    O weraday born!
    aqua-vitae, ho! lord! lady!  

                           Enter Mother.

  Mother. noise here?
  Nurse. O lamentable day!
  Mother. matter?
  Nurse. Look, look! O heavy day!
  Mother. O me, O me! child, life!
    Revive, up, die thee!
    Help, help! Call help.

                            Enter Father.

  Father. shame, bring Juliet forth; lord come.
  Nurse. dead, deceas'd; dead! Alack day!
  Mother. Alack day, dead, dead, dead!
  Cap. Ha! her. alas! cold,
    blood settled, joints stiff;
    Life lips long separated.
    Death lies untimely frost  
    sweetest flower field.
  Nurse. O lamentable day!
  Mother. O woful time!
  Cap. Death, hath ta'en make wail,
    Ties tongue speak.

  Enter Friar [Laurence] County [Paris], Musicians.

  Friar. Come, bride ready church?
  Cap. Ready go, return.
    O son, night thy wedding day
    Hath Death lain thy wife. See, lies,
    Flower was, deflowered him.
    Death son-in-law, Death heir;
    daughter hath wedded. die
    leave all. Life, living, Death's.
  Par. thought long morning's face,
    doth give sight this?
  Mother. Accurs'd, unhappy, wretched, hateful day!
    miserable hour e'er time  
    lasting labour pilgrimage!
    one, poor one, poor loving child,
    thing rejoice solace in,
    cruel Death hath catch'd sight!
  Nurse. O woe? O woful, woful, woful day!
    lamentable day, woful day
    behold!
    O day! O day! O day! O hateful day!
    black day this.
    O woful day! O woful day!
  Par. Beguil'd, divorced, wronged, spited, slain!
    detestable Death, thee beguil'd,
    cruel cruel thee overthrown!
    O love! O life! life, love death
  Cap. Despis'd, distressed, hated, martyr'd, kill'd!
    Uncomfortable time, cam'st thou now
    murther, murther solemnity?
    O child! O child! soul, child!
    Dead art thou, dead! alack, child dead,
    child joys buried!  
  Friar. Peace, ho, shame! Confusion's cure lives not
    confusions. Heaven yourself
    part fair maid! heaven hath all,
    maid.
    part death,
    heaven part eternal life.
    sought promotion,
    'twas heaven advanc'd;
    weep ye now, advanc'd
    clouds, high heaven itself?
    O, love, love child ill
    run mad, well.
    married lives married long,
    married dies married young.
    Dry tears stick rosemary
    fair corse, and, custom is,
    array bear church;
    fond nature bids lament,
    nature's tears reason's merriment.
  Cap. things ordained festival  
    Turn office black funeral-
    instruments melancholy bells,
    wedding cheer sad burial feast;
    solemn hymns sullen dirges change;
    bridal flowers serve buried corse;
    things change contrary.
  Friar. Sir, in; and, madam, him;
    go, Sir Paris. prepare
    follow fair corse grave.
    heavens low'r ill;
    Move crossing high will.
                           Exeunt. Manent Musicians [and Nurse].
  1. Mus. Faith, put pipes gone.
  Nurse. Honest good fellows, ah, put up, put up!
    pitiful case.            [Exit.]
  1. Mus. Ay, troth, case amended.

                         Enter Peter.

  Pet. Musicians, O, musicians, 'Heart's ease,' 'Heart's ease'!  
    O, live, play 'Heart's ease.'
  1. Mus. 'Heart's ease'',
  Pet. O, musicians, heart plays 'My heart full
    woe.' O, play merry dump comfort me.
  1. Mus. dump we! 'Tis time play now.
  Pet. then?
  1. Mus. No.
  Pet. give soundly.
  1. Mus. give us?
  Pet. money, faith, gleek. give the
     minstrel.
  1. Mus. give serving-creature.
  Pet. lay serving-creature's dagger pate.
    carry crotchets. you, fa you. note
    me?
  1. Mus. fa us, note us.
  2. Mus. Pray put dagger, put wit.
  Pet. wit! dry-beat iron
    wit, put iron dagger. Answer men.
  
           'When griping grief heart doth wound,
             doleful dumps mind oppress,
           music silver sound'-

    'silver sound'? 'music silver sound'?
    you, Simon Catling?
  1. Mus. Marry, sir, silver hath sweet sound.
  Pet. Pretty! You, Hugh Rebeck?
  2. Mus. 'silver sound' musicians sound silver.
  Pet. Pretty too! you, James Soundpost?
  3. Mus. Faith, say.
  Pet. O, cry mercy! singer. you. It
    'music silver sound' musicians gold
    sounding.

           'Then music silver sound
             speedy doth lend redress.'         [Exit.

  1. Mus. pestilent knave same?
  2. Mus. Hang him, Jack! Come, here, tarry  
    mourners, stay dinner.
                                                         Exeunt.

ACT V. Scene I.
Mantua. street.

Enter Romeo.

  Rom. trust flattering truth sleep
    dreams presage joyful news hand.
    bosom's lord sits lightly throne,
    day unaccustom'd spirit
    Lifts ground cheerful thoughts.
    dreamt lady found dead
    (Strange dream dead man leave think!)
    breath'd life kisses lips
    reviv'd emperor.
    Ah me! sweet love possess'd,
    love's shadows rich joy!

                Enter Romeo's Man Balthasar, booted.

    News Verona! now, Balthasar?
    Dost thou bring letters friar?
    doth lady? father well?  
    fares Juliet? again,
    ill well.
  Man. well, ill.
    body sleeps Capel's monument,
    immortal part angels lives.
    laid low kindred's vault
    presently post you.
    O, pardon bringing ill news,
    leave office, sir.
  Rom. e'en so? defy you, stars!
    Thou knowest lodging. ink paper
    hire posthorses. to-night.
  Man. beseech you, sir, patience.
    pale wild import
    misadventure.
  Rom. Tush, thou art deceiv'd.
    Leave thing bid thee do.
    Hast thou letters friar?
  Man. No, good lord.
  Rom. matter. thee  
    hire horses. thee straight.
                                               Exit [Balthasar].
    Well, Juliet, lie thee to-night.
    means. O mischief, thou art swift
    enter thoughts desperate men!
    remember apothecary,
    hereabouts 'a dwells, late noted
    tatt'red weeds, overwhelming brows,
    Culling simples. Meagre looks,
    Sharp misery worn bones;
    needy shop tortoise hung,
    alligator stuff'd, skins
    ill-shaped fishes; shelves
    beggarly account empty boxes,
    Green earthen pots, bladders, musty seeds,
    Remnants packthread, cakes roses
    thinly scattered, make show.
    Noting penury, said,
    'An man poison now
    sale present death Mantua,  
    lives caitiff wretch sell him.'
    O, thought forerun need,
    needy man sell me.
    remember, house.
    holiday, beggar's shop shut. What, ho! apothecary!

                        Enter Apothecary.

  Apoth. calls loud?
  Rom. hither, man. thou art poor.
    Hold, forty ducats. have
    dram poison, soon-speeding gear
    disperse veins
    life-weary taker mall fall dead,
    trunk discharg'd breath
    violently hasty powder fir'd
    Doth hurry fatal cannon's womb.
  Apoth. mortal drugs have; Mantua's law
    death utters them.
  Rom. Art thou bare full wretchedness  
    fearest die? Famine thy cheeks,
    oppression starveth thine eyes,
    Contempt beggary hangs thy back:
    world thy friend, world's law;
    world affords law make thee rich;
    poor, break this.
  Apoth. poverty consents.
  Rom. pay thy poverty thy will.
  Apoth. Put liquid thing will
    drink off, strength
    twenty men, dispatch straight.
  Rom. thy gold- worse poison men's souls,
    murther loathsome world,
    poor compounds thou mayst sell.
    sell thee poison; thou hast sold none.
    Farewell. Buy food thyself flesh.
    Come, cordial poison, me
    Juliet's grave; thee.
                                                         Exeunt.




Scene II.
Verona. Friar Laurence's cell.

Enter Friar John Friar Laurence.

  John. Holy Franciscan friar, brother, ho!

                      Enter Friar Laurence.

  Laur. voice Friar John.
    Mantua. Romeo?
    Or, mind writ, give letter.
  John. find barefoot brother out,
    order, associate me
    city visiting sick,
    finding him, searchers town,
    Suspecting house
    infectious pestilence reign,
    Seal'd doors, forth,
    speed Mantua stay'd.
  Laur. bare letter, then, Romeo?
  John. send it- again-  
    messenger bring thee,
    fearful infection.
  Laur. Unhappy fortune! brotherhood,
    letter nice, full charge,
    dear import; neglecting it
    danger. Friar John, hence,
    iron crow bring straight
    cell.
  John. Brother, bring thee.                 Exit.
  Laur. Now, monument alone.
    hours fair Juliet wake.
    beshrew Romeo
    Hath notice accidents;
    write Mantua,
    cell till Romeo come-
    Poor living corse, clos'd dead man's tomb!        Exit.




Scene III.
Verona. churchyard; monument Capulets.

Enter Paris Page flowers [a torch].

  Par. Give thy torch, boy. Hence, stand aloof.
    put out, seen.
    yond yew tree lay thee along,
    Holding thine ear close hollow ground.
    foot churchyard tread
    (Being loose, unfirm, digging graves)
    thou shalt hear it. Whistle me,
    signal thou hear'st approach.
    Give flowers. bid thee, go.
  Page. [aside] afraid stand alone
    churchyard; adventure.     [Retires.]
  Par. Sweet flower, flowers thy bridal bed strew
    (O woe! thy canopy dust stones)
    sweet water nightly dew;
    Or, wanting that, tears distill'd moans.
    obsequies thee keep
    Nightly strew, thy grave weep.  
                                                    Whistle Boy.
    boy warning doth approach.
    cursed foot wanders to-night
    cross obsequies true love's rite?
    What, torch? Muffle me, night, awhile.     [Retires.]

       Enter Romeo, Balthasar torch, mattock,
                    crow iron.

  Rom. Give mattock wrenching iron.
    Hold, letter. Early morning
    thou deliver lord father.
    Give light. thy life charge thee,
    Whate'er thou hearest seest, stand aloof
    interrupt course.
    descend bed death
    partly behold lady's face,
    chiefly dead finger
    precious ring- ring use
    dear employment. hence, gone.  
    thou, jealous, dost return pry
    farther intend do,
    heaven, tear thee joint joint
    strew hungry churchyard thy limbs.
    time intents savage-wild,
    fierce inexorable far
    empty tigers roaring sea.
  Bal. gone, sir, trouble you.
  Rom. shalt thou show friendship. thou that.
    Live, prosperous; farewell, good fellow.
  Bal. [aside] same, hide hereabout.
    fear, intents doubt.        [Retires.]
  Rom. Thou detestable maw, thou womb death,
    Gorg'd dearest morsel earth,
    enforce thy rotten jaws open,
    cram thee food.
                                           Romeo opens tomb.
  Par. banish'd haughty Montague
    murd'red love's cousin- grief
    supposed fair creature died-  
    villanous shame
    dead bodies. apprehend him.
    Stop thy unhallowed toil, vile Montague!
    vengeance pursu'd death?
    Condemned villain, apprehend thee.
    Obey, me; thou die.
  Rom. indeed; hither.
    Good gentle youth, tempt desp'rate man.
    Fly leave me. gone;
    affright thee. beseech thee, youth,
    sin head
    urging fury. O, gone!
    heaven, love thee myself,
    arm'd myself.
    Stay not, gone. Live, say
    madman's mercy bid thee run away.
  Par. defy thy, conjuration
    apprehend thee felon here.
  Rom. Wilt thou provoke me? thee, boy!
                                                     fight.  
  Page. O Lord, fight! call watch.
                                            [Exit. Paris falls.]
  Par. O, slain! thou merciful,
    Open tomb, lay Juliet.                   [Dies.]
  Rom. faith, will. peruse face.
    Mercutio's kinsman, noble County Paris!
    man betossed soul
    attend rode? think
    told Paris married Juliet.
    so? dream so?
    mad, hearing talk Juliet
    so? O, give thy hand,
    writ sour misfortune's book!
    bury thee triumphant grave.
    grave? O, no, lanthorn, slaught'red youth,
    lies Juliet, beauty makes
    vault feasting presence full light.
    Death, lie thou there, dead man interr'd.
                                         [Lays tomb.]
    oft men point death  
    merry! keepers call
    lightning death. O, I
    Call lightning? O love! wife!
    Death, hath suck'd honey thy breath,
    Hath power thy beauty.
    Thou art conquer'd. Beauty's ensign yet
    crimson thy lips thy cheeks,
    death's pale flag advanced there.
    Tybalt, liest thou thy bloody sheet?
    O, favour thee
    hand cut thy youth twain
    sunder thine enemy?
    Forgive me, cousin.' Ah, dear Juliet,
    art thou fair? believe
    unsubstantial Death amorous,
    lean abhorred monster keeps
    Thee dark paramour?
    fear stay thee
    palace dim night
    Depart again. Here, remain  
    worms thy chambermaids. O, here
    set everlasting rest
    shake yoke inauspicious stars
    world-wearied flesh. Eyes, last!
    Arms, embrace! and, lips, O you
    doors breath, seal righteous kiss
    dateless bargain engrossing death!
    Come, bitter conduct; come, unsavoury guide!
    Thou desperate pilot, run on
    dashing rocks thy seasick weary bark!
    love! [Drinks.] O true apothecary!
    Thy drugs quick. kiss die.          Falls.

    Enter Friar [Laurence], lanthorn, crow, spade.

  Friar. Saint Francis speed! oft to-night
    feet stumbled graves! there?
  Bal. one, friend, well.
  Friar. Bliss you! me, good friend,
    torch yond vainly lends light  
    grubs eyeless skulls? discern,
    burneth Capels' monument.
  Bal. doth so, holy sir; master,
    love.
  Friar. it?
  Bal. Romeo.
  Friar. long hath there?
  Bal. Full half hour.
  Friar. vault.
  Bal. dare not, sir.
    master hence,
    fearfully menace death
    stay intents.
  Friar. Stay then; alone. Fear me.
    O, fear ill unthrifty thing.
  Bal. sleep yew tree here,
    dreamt master fought,
    master slew him.
  Friar. Romeo!
    Alack, alack, blood stains  
    stony entrance sepulchre?
    masterless gory swords
    lie discolour'd place peace? [Enters tomb.]
    Romeo! O, pale! else? What, Paris too?
    steep'd blood? Ah, unkind hour
    guilty lamentable chance! lady stirs.
                                                   Juliet rises.
  Jul. O comfortable friar! lord?
    remember be,
    am. Romeo?
  Friar. hear noise. Lady, nest
    death, contagion, unnatural sleep.
    greater power contradict
    Hath thwarted intents. Come, away.
    Thy husband thy bosom lies dead;
    Paris too. Come, dispose thee
    sisterhood holy nuns.
    Stay question, watch coming.
    Come, go, good Juliet. dare longer stay.
  Jul. Go, thee hence, away.  
                                                   Exit [Friar].
    here? cup, clos'd true love's hand?
    Poison, see, hath timeless end.
    O churl! drunk all, left friendly drop
    after? kiss thy lips.
    Haply poison doth hang them
    make die restorative.             [Kisses him.]
    Thy lips warm!
  Chief Watch. [within] Lead, boy. way?
    Yea, noise? brief. O happy dagger!
                                      [Snatches Romeo's dagger.]
    thy sheath; rest, die.
                  stabs falls [on Romeo's body].

                Enter [Paris's] Boy Watch.

  Boy. place. There, torch doth burn.
  Chief Watch. 'the ground bloody. Search churchyard.
    Go, you; whoe'er find attach.
                                     [Exeunt Watch.]  
    Pitiful sight! lies County slain;
    Juliet bleeding, warm, newly dead,
    hath lain days buried.
    Go, Prince; run Capulets;
    Raise Montagues; search.
                                   [Exeunt Watch.]
    ground whereon woes lie,
    true ground piteous woes
    circumstance descry.

     Enter [some Watch,] Romeo's Man [Balthasar].

  2. Watch. Romeo's man. found churchyard.
  Chief Watch. Hold safety till Prince hither.

          Enter Friar [Laurence] Watchman.

  3. Watch. friar trembles, sighs, weeps.
    mattock spade him
    coming churchyard side.  
  Chief Watch. great suspicion! Stay friar too.

              Enter Prince [and Attendants].

  Prince. misadventure early up,
    calls person morning rest?

            Enter Capulet Wife [with others].

  Cap. be, shriek abroad?
  Wife. people street cry 'Romeo,'
    'Juliet,' 'Paris'; run,
    open outcry, monument.
  Prince. fear startles ears?
  Chief Watch. Sovereign, lies County Paris slain;
    Romeo dead; Juliet, dead before,
    Warm kill'd.
  Prince. Search, seek, foul murder comes.
  Chief Watch. friar, slaughter'd Romeo's man,
    instruments fit open  
    dead men's tombs.
  Cap. O heavens! O wife, daughter bleeds!
    dagger hath mista'en, for, lo, house
    empty back Montague,
    missheathed daughter's bosom!
  Wife. O me! sight death bell
    warns age sepulchre.

               Enter Montague [and others].

  Prince. Come, Montague; thou art early up
    thy son heir early down.
  Mon. Alas, liege, wife dead to-night!
    Grief son's exile hath stopp'd breath.
    woe conspires mine age?
  Prince. Look, thou shalt see.
  Mon. O thou untaught! manners this,
    press thy father grave?
  Prince. Seal mouth outrage while,
    Till clear ambiguities  
    spring, head, true descent;
    general woes
    lead death. Meantime forbear,
    mischance slave patience.
    Bring parties suspicion.
  Friar. greatest, least,
    suspected, time place
    Doth make me, direful murther;
    stand, impeach purge
    condemned excus'd.
  Prince. thou dost this.
  Friar. brief, short date breath
    long tedious tale.
    Romeo, dead, husband Juliet;
    she, dead, Romeo's faithful wife.
    married them; stol'n marriage day
    Tybalt's doomsday, untimely death
    Banish'd new-made bridegroom city;
    whom, Tybalt, Juliet pin'd.
    You, remove siege grief her,  
    Betroth'd married perforce
    County Paris. me
    wild bid devise mean
    rid marriage,
    cell kill herself.
    gave (so tutored art)
    sleeping potion; effect
    intended, wrought her
    form death. Meantime writ Romeo
    dire night
    borrowed grave,
    time potion's force cease.
    bore letter, Friar John,
    stay'd accident, yesternight
    Return'd letter back. alone
    prefixed hour waking
    kindred's vault;
    Meaning closely cell
    Till conveniently send Romeo.
    came, minute ere time  
    awaking, untimely lay
    noble Paris true Romeo dead.
    wakes; entreated forth
    bear work heaven patience;
    noise scare tomb,
    she, desperate, me,
    But, seems, violence herself.
    know, marriage
    nurse privy; aught this
    Miscarried fault, life
    sacrific'd, hour time,
    rigour severest law.
  Prince. thee holy man.
    Romeo's man? this?
  Bal. brought master news Juliet's death;
    post Mantua
    place, monument.
    letter early bid give father,
    threat'ned death, vault,
    departed left there.  
  Prince. Give letter. it.
    County's page rais'd watch?
    Sirrah, made master place?
  Boy. flowers strew lady's grave;
    bid stand aloof, did.
    Anon light ope tomb;
    by-and-by master drew him;
    ran call watch.
  Prince. letter doth make good friar's words,
    love, tidings death;
    writes buy poison
    poor pothecary, therewithal
    vault die, lie Juliet.
    enemies? Capulet, Montage,
    scourge laid hate,
    heaven finds means kill joys love!
    I, winking you, discords too,
    lost brace kinsmen. punish'd.
  Cap. O brother Montague, give thy hand.
    daughter's jointure,  
    demand.
  Mon. give thee more;
    raise Statue pure gold,
    whiles Verona known,
    figure rate set
    true faithful Juliet.
  Cap. rich Romeo's lady's lie-
    Poor sacrifices enmity!
  Prince. glooming peace morning brings.
    sun sorrow show head.
    hence, talk sad things;
    pardon'd, punished;
    story woe
    Juliet Romeo.
                                                   Exeunt omnes.

THE END

1594





THE TAMING SHREW

by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

    Persons Induction
  LORD
  CHRISTOPHER SLY, tinker
  HOSTESS
  PAGE
  PLAYERS
  HUNTSMEN
  SERVANTS

  BAPTISTA MINOLA, gentleman Padua
  VINCENTIO, Merchant Pisa
  LUCENTIO, son Vincentio, love Bianca
  PETRUCHIO, gentleman Verona, suitor Katherina

    Suitors Bianca
  GREMIO
  HORTENSIO

    Servants Lucentio
  TRANIO  
  BIONDELLO

    Servants Petruchio
  GRUMIO
  CURTIS

  PEDANT

    Daughters Baptista
  KATHERINA, shrew
  BIANCA

  WIDOW

  Tailor, Haberdasher, Servants attending Baptista and
    Petruchio

                             SCENE:
            Padua, PETRUCHIO'S house country

SC_1
                      INDUCTION. SCENE I.
                  alehouse heath

                      Enter HOSTESS SLY

  SLY. pheeze you, faith.
  HOSTESS. pair stocks, rogue!
  SLY. Y'are baggage; Slys rogues. the
    chronicles: Richard Conqueror. Therefore, paucas
    pallabris; world slide. Sessa!
  HOSTESS. pay glasses burst?
  SLY. No, denier. by, Saint Jeronimy, thy cold bed
    warm thee.
  HOSTESS. remedy; fetch third-borough.
 Exit
  SLY. Third, fourth, borough, answer law.
    budge inch, boy; come, kindly.
                                                  [Falls asleep]

       Wind horns. Enter LORD bunting, train

  LORD. Huntsman, charge thee, tender hounds;  
    Brach Merriman, poor cur, emboss'd;
    couple Clowder deep-mouth'd brach.
    Saw'st thou not, boy, Silver made good
    hedge corner, coldest fault?
    lose dog twenty pound.
  HUNTSMAN. Why, Belman good he, lord;
    cried merest loss,
    to-day pick'd dullest scent;
    Trust me, dog.
  LORD. Thou art fool; Echo fleet,
    esteem worth dozen such.
    well, all;
    To-morrow intend hunt again.
  HUNTSMAN. will, lord.
  LORD. here? dead, drunk?
    See, doth breathe?
  HUNTSMAN. breathes, lord. warm'd ale,
    bed cold sleep soundly.
  LORD. O monstrous beast, swine lies!
    Grim death, foul loathsome thine image!  
    Sirs, practise drunken man.
    you, convey'd bed,
    Wrapp'd sweet clothes, rings put fingers,
    delicious banquet bed,
    brave attendants wakes,
    beggar forget himself?
  HUNTSMAN. me, lord, choose.
  HUNTSMAN. strange wak'd.
  LORD. flatt'ring dream worthless fancy.
    up, manage jest:
    Carry gently fairest chamber,
    hang round wanton pictures;
    Balm foul head warm distilled waters,
    burn sweet wood make lodging sweet;
    Procure music ready wakes,
    make dulcet heavenly sound;
    chance speak, ready straight,
    low submissive reverence
    'What honour command?'
    attend silver basin  
    Full rose-water bestrew'd flowers;
    bear ewer, diaper,
    'Will't lordship cool hands?'
    ready costly suit,
    apparel wear;
    hounds horse,
    lady mourns disease;
    Persuade hath lunatic,
    And, is, dreams,
    mighty lord.
    do, kindly, gentle sirs;
    pastime passing excellent,
    husbanded modesty.
  HUNTSMAN. lord, warrant play part
    true diligence
    is.
  LORD. gently, bed him;
    office wakes.
                          [SLY carried out. trumpet sounds]
    Sirrah, trumpet 'tis sounds-  
                                                    Exit SERVANT
    Belike noble gentleman means,
    Travelling journey, repose here.

                         Re-enter SERVINGMAN

    now! it?
  SERVANT. An't honour, players
    offer service lordship.
  LORD. Bid near.

                             Enter PLAYERS

    Now, fellows, welcome.
  PLAYERS. honour.
  LORD. intend stay to-night?
  PLAYER. lordship accept duty.
  LORD. heart. fellow remember
    play'd farmer's eldest son;
    'Twas woo'd gentlewoman well.  
    forgot name; but, sure, part
    aptly fitted naturally perform'd.
  PLAYER. 'twas Soto honour means.
  LORD. 'Tis true; thou didst excellent.
    Well, happy time,
    sport hand
    cunning assist much.
    lord hear play to-night;
    doubtful modesties,
    Lest, over-eying odd behaviour,
    honour heard play,
    break merry passion
    offend him; you, sirs,
    smile, grows impatient.
  PLAYER. Fear not, lord; ourselves,
    veriest antic world.
  LORD. Go, sirrah, buttery,
    give friendly one;
    house affords.
                                       Exit PLAYERS  
    Sirrah, Bartholomew page,
    dress'd suits lady;
    done, conduct drunkard's chamber,
    call 'madam,' obeisance.
    me- win love-
    bear honourable action,
    hath observ'd noble ladies
    lords, accomplished;
    duty drunkard do,
    soft low tongue lowly courtesy,
    'What is't honour command,
    lady humble wife
    show duty make love?'
    kind embracements, tempting kisses,
    declining head bosom,
    Bid shed tears, overjoyed
    noble lord restor'd health,
    years hath esteemed him
    poor loathsome beggar.
    boy woman's gift  
    rain shower commanded tears,
    onion shift,
    Which, napkin close convey'd,
    enforce watery eye.
    dispatch'd haste thou canst;
    Anon give thee instructions.     Exit SERVINGMAN
    boy usurp grace,
    Voice, gait, action, gentlewoman;
    long hear call drunkard 'husband';
    men stay laughter
    homage simple peasant.
    counsel them; haply presence
    abate over-merry spleen,
    grow extremes.             Exeunt

SC_2
                            SCENE II.
               bedchamber LORD'S house

    Enter aloft SLY, ATTENDANTS; apparel, basin
             ewer, appurtenances; LORD

  SLY. God's sake, pot small ale.
  SERVANT. Will't lordship drink cup sack?
  SERVANT. Will't honour taste conserves?
  SERVANT. raiment honour wear to-day?
  SLY. Christophero Sly; call 'honour' 'lordship.' I
    ne'er drank sack life; give conserves,
    give conserves beef. Ne'er raiment wear,
    doublets backs, stockings than
    legs, shoes feet- nay, feet than
    shoes, shoes toes overleather.
  LORD. Heaven cease idle humour honour!
    O, mighty man descent,
    possessions, high esteem,
    infused foul spirit!
  SLY. What, make mad? Christopher Sly, old
    Sly's son Burton Heath; birth pedlar, education  
    cardmaker, transmutation bear-herd, present
    profession tinker? Marian Hacket, fat ale-wife of
    Wincot, not; fourteen pence on
    score sheer ale, score lying'st knave in
    Christendom. What! bestraught.  [Taking pot ale]
    Here's-
  SERVANT. O, makes lady mourn!
  SERVANT. O, makes servants droop!
  LORD. kindred shuns house,
    beaten strange lunacy.
    O noble lord, bethink thee thy birth!
    Call home thy ancient thoughts banishment,
    banish abject lowly dreams.
    thy servants attend thee,
    office ready thy beck.
    Wilt thou music? Hark! Apollo plays,            [Music]
    twenty caged nightingales sing.
    wilt thou sleep? thee couch
    Softer sweeter lustful bed
    purpose trimm'd Semiramis.  
    thou wilt walk: bestrew ground.
    wilt thou ride? Thy horses trapp'd,
    harness studded gold pearl.
    Dost thou love hawking? Thou hast hawks soar
    morning lark. wilt thou hunt?
    Thy hounds make welkin answer them
    fetch echoes hollow earth.
  SERVANT. thou wilt course; thy greyhounds swift
    breathed stags; ay, fleeter roe.
  SERVANT. Dost thou love pictures? fetch thee
      straight
    Adonis painted running brook,
    Cytherea sedges hid,
    move wanton breath
    waving sedges play wi' th' wind.
  LORD. show thee lo maid
    beguiled surpris'd,
    lively painted deed done.
  SERVANT. Daphne roaming thorny wood,
    Scratching legs, swear bleeds  
    sight sad Apollo weep,
    workmanly blood tears drawn.
  LORD. Thou art lord, lord.
    Thou hast lady beautiful
    woman waning age.
  SERVANT. And, till tears hath shed thee
    envious floods o'er-run lovely face,
    fairest creature world;
    inferior none.
  SLY. lord lady?
    dream? dream'd till now?
    sleep: see, hear, speak;
    smell sweet savours, feel soft things.
    life, lord indeed,
    tinker, Christopher Sly.
    Well, bring lady sight;
    again, pot o' th' smallest ale.
  SERVANT. Will't Mightiness wash hands?
    O, joy wit restor'd!
    O, knew are!  
    fifteen years dream;
    Or, wak'd, wak'd slept.
  SLY. fifteen years! fay, goodly nap.
    speak time?
  SERVANT. O, yes, lord, idle words;
    lay goodly chamber,
    ye beaten door;
    rail hostess house,
    present leet,
    brought stone jugs seal'd quarts.
    call Cicely Hacket.
  SLY. Ay, woman's maid house.
  SERVANT. Why, sir, house maid,
    men reckon'd up,
    Stephen Sly, John Naps Greece,
    Peter Turph, Henry Pimpernell;
    twenty names men these,
    were, man saw.
  SLY. Now, Lord thanked good amends!
  ALL. Amen.  

           Enter PAGE lady, ATTENDANTS

  SLY. thee; thou shalt lose it.
  PAGE. fares noble lord?
  SLY. Marry, fare well; cheer enough.
    wife?
  PAGE. Here, noble lord; thy her?
  SLY. wife, call husband?
    men call 'lord'; goodman.
  PAGE. husband lord, lord husband;
    wife obedience.
  SLY. well. call her?
  LORD. Madam.
  SLY. Al'ce madam, Joan madam?
  LORD. Madam, else; lords call ladies.
  SLY. Madam wife, dream'd
    slept fifteen year more.
  PAGE. Ay, time thirty me,
    time abandon'd bed.  
  SLY. 'Tis much. Servants, leave alone.
                                                 Exeunt SERVANTS
    Madam, undress you, bed.
  PAGE. Thrice noble lord, entreat you
    pardon night two;
    Or, so, sun set.
    physicians expressly charg'd,
    peril incur malady,
    absent bed.
    hope reason stands excuse.
  SLY. Ay, stands tarry long. would
    loath fall dreams again. tarry in
    flesh blood.

                       Enter MESSENGER

  MESSENGER. honour's players, hearing amendment,
    play pleasant comedy;
    doctors hold meet,
    sadness hath congeal'd blood,  
    melancholy nurse frenzy.
    thought good hear play
    frame mind mirth merriment,
    bars thousand harms lengthens life.
  SLY. Marry, will; play it. comonty a
    Christmas gambold tumbling-trick?
  PAGE. No, good lord, pleasing stuff.
  SLY. What, household stuff?
  PAGE. kind history.
  SLY. Well, see't. Come, madam wife, sit side let
    world slip;-we ne'er younger.
                                                 [They sit down]

          flourish trumpets announces play

ACT I. SCENE I.
Padua. public place

Enter LUCENTIO man TRANIO

  LUCENTIO. Tranio, great desire had
    fair Padua, nursery arts,
    arriv'd fruitful Lombardy,
    pleasant garden great Italy,
    father's love leave arm'd
    good thy good company,
    trusty servant approv'd all,
    breathe, haply institute
    learning ingenious studies.
    Pisa, renowned grave citizens,
    Gave father first,
    merchant great traffic world,
    Vincentio, Bentivolii;
    Vincentio's son, brought Florence,
    serve hopes conceiv'd,
    deck fortune virtuous deeds.
    therefore, Tranio, time study,  
    Virtue part philosophy
    apply treats happiness
    virtue specially achiev'd.
    thy mind; Pisa left
    Padua leaves
    shallow plash plunge deep,
    satiety seeks quench thirst.
  TRANIO. Mi perdonato, gentle master mine;
    affected yourself;
    Glad continue resolve
    suck sweets sweet philosophy.
    Only, good master, admire
    virtue moral discipline,
    Stoics stocks, pray,
    devote Aristotle's checks
    Ovid outcast abjur'd.
    Balk logic acquaintance have,
    practise rhetoric common talk;
    Music poesy quicken you;
    mathematics metaphysics,  
    Fall find stomach serves you.
    profit grows pleasure ta'en;
    brief, sir, study affect.
  LUCENTIO. Gramercies, Tranio, dost thou advise.
    If, Biondello, thou wert ashore,
    put readiness,
    lodging fit entertain
    friends time Padua beget.

      Enter BAPTISTA daughters, KATHERINA
        BIANCA; GREMIO, pantaloon; HORTENSIO,
        suitor BIANCA. LUCENTIO TRANIO stand by

    stay awhile; company this?
  TRANIO. Master, show town.
  BAPTISTA. Gentlemen, importune farther,
    firmly resolv'd know;
    is, bestow youngest daughter
    husband elder.
    love Katherina,  
    love well,
    Leave court pleasure.
  GREMIO. cart rather. rough me.
    There, there, Hortensio, wife?
  KATHERINA.  [To BAPTISTA]  pray you, sir, will
    make stale mates?
  HORTENSIO. Mates, maid! that? mates you,
    gentler, milder mould.
  KATHERINA. I' faith, sir, fear;
    Iwis halfway heart;
    were, doubt care be
    comb noddle three-legg'd stool,
    paint face, fool.
  HORTENSIO. devils, good Lord deliver us!
  GREMIO. me, too, good Lord!
  TRANIO. Husht, master! good pastime toward;
    wench stark mad wonderful froward.
  LUCENTIO. other's silence see
    Maid's mild behaviour sobriety.
    Peace, Tranio!  
  TRANIO. said, master; mum! gaze fill.
  BAPTISTA. Gentlemen, make good
    said- Bianca, in;
    displease thee, good Bianca,
    love thee ne'er less, girl.
  KATHERINA. pretty peat! best
    Put finger eye, knew why.
  BIANCA. Sister, content discontent.
    Sir, pleasure humbly subscribe;
    books instruments company,
    look, practise myself.
  LUCENTIO. Hark, Tranio, thou mayst hear Minerva speak!
  HORTENSIO. Signior Baptista, strange?
    good effects
    Bianca's grief.
  GREMIO. mew up,
    Signior Baptista, fiend hell,
    make bear penance tongue?
  BAPTISTA. Gentlemen, content ye; resolv'd.
    in, Bianca.                                   Exit BIANCA  
    taketh delight
    music, instruments, poetry,
    Schoolmasters house
    Fit instruct youth. you, Hortensio,
    Or, Signior Gremio, you, such,
    Prefer hither; cunning men
    kind, liberal
    mine children good bringing-up;
    so, farewell. Katherina, stay;
    commune Bianca.                 Exit
  KATHERINA. Why, trust too, not?
    What! appointed hours, though, belike,
    knew leave? Ha!          Exit
  GREMIO. devil's dam; gifts good
    hold you. There! Love great,
    Hortensio, blow nails together, fast fairly
    out; cake's dough sides. Farewell; yet, love
    bear sweet Bianca, means light fit man
    teach delights, her
    father.  
  HORTENSIO. I, Signior Gremio; word, pray. Though
    nature quarrel brook'd parle, now, upon
    advice, toucheth both- access to
    fair mistress, happy rivals Bianca's love- to
    labour effect thing specially.
  GREMIO. that, pray?
  HORTENSIO. Marry, sir, husband sister.
  GREMIO. husband? devil.
  HORTENSIO. husband.
  GREMIO. devil. Think'st thou, Hortensio, father
    rich, man fool married hell?
  HORTENSIO. Tush, Gremio! pass patience mine to
    endure loud alarums, why, man, good fellows the
    world, man light them, all
    faults, money enough.
  GREMIO. tell; lief dowry this
    condition: whipp'd high cross morning.
  HORTENSIO. Faith, say, small choice rotten
    apples. But, come; bar law makes friends, it
    friendly maintain'd till helping  
    Baptista's eldest daughter husband set youngest free
    husband, to't afresh. Sweet Bianca! Happy man
    dole! runs fastest ring. you,
    Signior Gremio?
  GREMIO. agreed; horse in
    Padua begin wooing woo her, wed her,
    bed her, rid house her! on.
                                     Exeunt GREMIO HORTENSIO
  TRANIO. pray, sir, me, possible
    love sudden hold?
  LUCENTIO. O Tranio, till found true,
    thought likely.
    see! idly stood on,
    found effect love idleness;
    plainness confess thee,
    art secret dear
    Anna Queen Carthage was-
    Tranio, burn, pine, perish, Tranio,
    achieve young modest girl.
    Counsel me, Tranio, thou canst;  
    Assist me, Tranio, thou wilt.
  TRANIO. Master, time chide now;
    Affection rated heart;
    love touch'd you, nought remains so:
    'Redime te captum quam queas minimo.'
  LUCENTIO. Gramercies, lad. forward; contents;
    rest comfort, thy counsel's sound.
  TRANIO. Master, look'd longly maid.
    mark'd pith all.
  LUCENTIO. O, yes, sweet beauty face,
    daughter Agenor had,
    made great Jove humble hand,
    knees kiss'd Cretan strand.
  TRANIO. more? Mark'd sister
    Began scold raise storm
    mortal ears endure din?
  LUCENTIO. Tranio, coral lips move,
    breath perfume air;
    Sacred sweet her.
  TRANIO. Nay, 'tis time stir trance.  
    pray, awake, sir. love maid,
    Bend thoughts wits achieve her. stands:
    elder sister curst shrewd
    That, till father rid hands her,
    Master, love live maid home;
    closely mew'd up,
    annoy'd suitors.
  LUCENTIO. Ah, Tranio, cruel father's he!
    art thou advis'd care
    cunning schoolmasters instruct her?
  TRANIO. Ay, marry, I, sir, 'tis plotted.
  LUCENTIO. it, Tranio.
  TRANIO. Master, hand,
    inventions meet jump one.
  LUCENTIO. thine first.
  TRANIO. schoolmaster,
    undertake teaching maid-
    device.
  LUCENTIO. is. done?
  TRANIO. possible; bear part  
    Padua Vincentio's son;
    house ply book, friends,
    Visit countrymen, banquet them?
  LUCENTIO. Basta, content thee, full.
    house,
    distinguish'd faces
    man master. thus:
    Thou shalt master, Tranio, stead,
    house port servants, should;
    be- Florentine,
    Neapolitan, meaner man Pisa.
    'Tis hatch'd, so. Tranio, once
    Uncase thee; colour'd hat cloak.
    Biondello comes, waits thee;
    charm tongue.
  TRANIO. need.                [They exchange habits]
    brief, sir, sith pleasure is,
    tied obedient-
    father charg'd parting:
    'Be serviceable son' quoth he,  
    'twas sense-
    content Lucentio,
    love Lucentio.
  LUCENTIO. Tranio, Lucentio loves;
    slave t' achieve maid
    sudden sight hath thrall'd wounded eye.

                       Enter BIONDELLO.

    rogue. Sirrah, been?
  BIONDELLO. been! Nay, now! you?
    Master, fellow Tranio stol'n clothes?
    stol'n his? both? Pray, news?
  LUCENTIO. Sirrah, hither; 'tis time jest,
    frame manners time.
    fellow Tranio here, save life,
    Puts apparel count'nance on,
    escape put his;
    quarrel ashore
    kill'd man, fear descried.  
    Wait him, charge you, becomes,
    make save life.
    understand me?
  BIONDELLO. I, sir? Ne'er whit.
  LUCENTIO. jot Tranio mouth:
    Tranio chang'd Lucentio.
  BIONDELLO. him; too!
  TRANIO. I, faith, boy, after,
    Lucentio Baptista's youngest daughter.
    But, sirrah, sake master's, advise
    manners discreetly kind companies.
    alone, why, Tranio;
    places master Lucentio.
  LUCENTIO. Tranio, go.
    thing rests, thyself execute-
    make wooers. thou why-
    Sufficeth, reasons good weighty.      Exeunt

                 Presenters speak
  
  SERVANT. lord, nod; mind play.
  SLY. Yes, Saint Anne I. good matter, surely; there
    it?
  PAGE. lord, 'tis begun.
  SLY. 'Tis excellent piece work, madam lady
    'twere done!                        [They sit mark]




SCENE II.
Padua. HORTENSIO'S house

Enter PETRUCHIO man GRUMIO

  PETRUCHIO. Verona, leave,
    friends Padua; all
    beloved approved friend,
    Hortensio; trow house.
    Here, sirrah Grumio, knock, say.
 GRUMIO. Knock, sir! knock?
    man rebus'd worship?
  PETRUCHIO. Villain, say, knock soundly.
  GRUMIO. Knock here, sir? Why, sir, I, sir, I
    knock here, sir?
  PETRUCHIO. Villain, say, knock gate,
    rap well, knock knave's pate.
  GRUMIO. master grown quarrelsome. knock first,
    worst.
  PETRUCHIO. be?
    Faith, sirrah, knock ring it;
    sol-fa, sing it.
                                     [He wrings ears]  
  GRUMIO. Help, masters, help! master mad.
  PETRUCHIO. knock bid you, sirrah villain!

                        Enter HORTENSIO

  HORTENSIO. now! matter? friend Grumio my
    good friend Petruchio! Verona?
  PETRUCHIO. Signior Hortensio, part fray?
    'Con tutto il cuore ben trovato' say.
  HORTENSIO. Alla nostra casa ben venuto,
    Molto honorato signor mio Petruchio.
    Rise, Grumio, rise; compound quarrel.
  GRUMIO. Nay, 'tis matter, sir, 'leges Latin. this
    lawful leave service- you, sir:
    bid knock rap soundly, sir. Well, fit
    servant master so; being, perhaps, aught I
    see, thirty, pip out?
    God knock'd first,
    Grumio worst.
  PETRUCHIO. senseless villain! Good Hortensio,  
    bade rascal knock gate,
    heart it.
  GRUMIO. Knock gate? O heavens! Spake words
    plain: 'Sirrah knock here, rap here, knock well, and
    knock soundly'? 'knocking gate'?
  PETRUCHIO. Sirrah, gone, talk not, advise you.
  HORTENSIO. Petruchio, patience; Grumio's pledge;
    Why, this's heavy chance 'twixt you,
    ancient, trusty, pleasant servant Grumio.
    now, sweet friend, happy gale
    Blows Padua Verona?
  PETRUCHIO. wind scatters young men world
    seek fortunes farther home,
    small experience grows. few,
    Signior Hortensio, stands me:
    Antonio, father, deceas'd,
    thrust maze,
    Haply wive thrive may;
    Crowns purse have, goods home,
    abroad world.  
  HORTENSIO. Petruchio, roundly thee
    thee shrewd ill-favour'd wife?
    Thou'dst counsel,
    promise thee rich,
    rich; th'art friend,
    thee her.
  PETRUCHIO. Signior Hortensio, 'twixt friends we
    words suffice; therefore, thou know
    rich Petruchio's wife,
    wealth burden wooing dance,
    foul Florentius' love,
    Sibyl, curst shrewd
    Socrates' Xanthippe worse-
    moves not, removes, least,
    Affection's edge me, rough
    swelling Adriatic seas.
    wive wealthily Padua;
    wealthily, happily Padua.
  GRUMIO. Nay, you, sir, tells flatly mind is.
    Why, give gold marry puppet  
    aglet-baby, trot ne'er tooth head, though
    diseases fifty horses. Why, nothing
    amiss, money withal.
  HORTENSIO. Petruchio, stepp'd in,
    continue broach'd jest.
    can, Petruchio, thee wife
    wealth enough, young beauteous;
    Brought gentlewoman;
    fault, faults enough,
    Is- intolerable curst,
    shrewd froward measure
    That, state worser is,
    wed mine gold.
  PETRUCHIO. Hortensio, peace! thou know'st gold's effect.
    father's name, 'tis enough;
    board chide loud
    thunder clouds autumn crack.
  HORTENSIO. father Baptista Minola,
    affable courteous gentleman;
    Katherina Minola,  
    Renown'd Padua scolding tongue.
  PETRUCHIO. father, her;
    knew deceased father well.
    sleep, Hortensio, till her;
    bold you
    give encounter,
    accompany thither.
  GRUMIO. pray you, sir, humour lasts. O' my
    word, knew do, scolding
    good him. call half a
    score knaves so. Why, nothing; begin once, he'll
    rail rope-tricks. what, sir: stand
    little, throw figure face, so
    disfigure eyes see
    withal cat. not, sir.
  HORTENSIO. Tarry, Petruchio, thee,
    Baptista's treasure is.
    hath jewel life hold,
    youngest daughter, beautiful Bianca;
    withholds me, more,  
    Suitors rivals love;
    Supposing thing impossible-
    defects rehears'd-
    Katherina woo'd.
    order hath Baptista ta'en,
    access Bianca
    Till Katherine curst husband.
  GRUMIO. Katherine curst!
    title maid titles worst.
  HORTENSIO. friend Petruchio grace,
    offer disguis'd sober robes
    Baptista schoolmaster
    music, instruct Bianca;
    device least
    leave leisure make love her,
    unsuspected court herself.

        Enter GREMIO LUCENTIO disguised CAMBIO

  GRUMIO. knavery! See, beguile folks,  
    young folks lay heads together! Master, master, about
    you. there, ha?
  HORTENSIO. Peace, Grumio! rival love. Petruchio,
    stand awhile.
  GRUMIO. proper stripling, amorous!
                                              [They stand aside]
  GREMIO. O, well; perus'd note.
    Hark you, sir; fairly bound-
    books love, hand;
    read lectures her.
    understand me- beside
    Signior Baptista's liberality,
    mend largess. paper too,
    perfum'd;
    sweeter perfume itself
    to. read her?
  LUCENTIO. Whate'er read her, plead you
    patron, stand assur'd,
    firmly place;
    Yea, successful words  
    you, scholar, sir.
  GREMIO. O learning, thing is!
  GRUMIO. O woodcock, ass is!
  PETRUCHIO. Peace, sirrah!
  HORTENSIO. Grumio, mum!                       [Coming forward]
    God save you, Signior Gremio!
  GREMIO. met, Signior Hortensio.
    Trow going? Baptista Minola.
    promis'd enquire carefully
    schoolmaster fair Bianca;
    good fortune lighted well
    young man; learning behaviour
    Fit turn, read poetry
    books- good ones, warrant ye.
  HORTENSIO. 'Tis well; met gentleman
    Hath promis'd another,
    fine musician instruct mistress;
    whit duty
    fair Bianca, beloved me.
  GREMIO. Beloved me- deeds prove.  
  GRUMIO. bags prove.
  HORTENSIO. Gremio, 'tis time vent love.
    Listen me, speak fair
    news indifferent good either.
    gentleman chance met,
    agreement liking,
    undertake woo curst Katherine;
    Yea, marry her, dowry please.
  GREMIO. said, done, well.
    Hortensio, told faults?
  PETRUCHIO. irksome brawling scold;
    all, masters, hear harm.
  GREMIO. No, say'st so, friend? countryman?
  PETRUCHIO. Born Verona, Antonio's son.
    father dead, fortune lives me;
    hope good days long see.
  GREMIO. O Sir, life wife strange!
    stomach, to't God's name;
    assisting all.
    woo wild-cat?  
  PETRUCHIO. live?
  GRUMIO. woo her? Ay, hang her.
  PETRUCHIO. intent?
    din daunt mine ears?
    time heard lions roar?
    heard sea, puff'd winds,
    Rage angry boar chafed sweat?
    heard great ordnance field,
    heaven's artillery thunder skies?
    pitched battle heard
    Loud 'larums, neighing steeds, trumpets' clang?
    woman's tongue,
    half great blow hear
    chestnut fariner's fire?
    Tush! tush! fear boys bugs.
  GRUMIO. fears none.
  GREMIO. Hortensio, hark:
    gentleman happily arriv'd,
    mind presumes, good ours.
  HORTENSIO. promis'd contributors  
    bear charge wooing, whatsoe'er.
  GREMIO. will- provided win her.
  GRUMIO. good dinner.

    Enter TRANIO, bravely apparelled LUCENTIO, BIONDELLO

  TRANIO. Gentlemen, God save you! bold,
    me, beseech you, readiest way
    house Signior Baptista Minola?
  BIONDELLO. fair daughters; is't mean?
  TRANIO. he, Biondello.
  GREMIO. Hark you, sir, to-
  TRANIO. her, sir; do?
  PETRUCHIO. chides, sir, hand, pray.
  TRANIO. love chiders, sir. Biondello, away.
  LUCENTIO.  [Aside]  begun, Tranio.
  HORTENSIO. Sir, word ere go.
    suitor maid talk of, yea no?
  TRANIO. be, sir, offence?
  GREMIO. No; words hence.  
  TRANIO. Why, sir, pray, streets free
    you?
  GREMIO. she.

  TRANIO. reason, beseech you?
  GREMIO. reason, know,
    choice love Signior Gremio.
  HORTENSIO. chosen Signior Hortensio.
  TRANIO. Softly, masters! gentlemen,
    right- hear patience.
    Baptista noble gentleman,
    father unknown,
    And, daughter fairer is,
    suitors have, one.
    Fair Leda's daughter thousand wooers;
    fair Bianca have;
    shall: Lucentio make one,
    Paris hope speed alone.
  GREMIO. What, gentleman out-talk all!
  LUCENTIO. Sir, give head; prove jade.  
  PETRUCHIO. Hortensio, end words?
  HORTENSIO. Sir, bold you,
    Baptista's daughter?
  TRANIO. No, sir, hear hath two:
    famous scolding tongue
    beauteous modesty.
  PETRUCHIO. Sir, sir, first's me; by.
  GREMIO. Yea, leave labour great Hercules,
    Alcides' twelve.
  PETRUCHIO. Sir, understand me, sooth:
    youngest daughter, hearken for,
    father access suitors,
    promise man
    elder sister wed.
    younger free, before.
  TRANIO. so, sir, man
    stead all, rest;
    break ice, feat,
    Achieve elder, set younger free
    access- hap  
    graceless ingrate.
  HORTENSIO. Sir, well, conceive;
    profess suitor,
    must, do, gratify gentleman,
    rest generally beholding.
  TRANIO. Sir, slack; sign whereof,
    ye contrive afternoon,
    quaff carouses mistress' health;
    adversaries law-
    Strive mightily, eat drink friends.
  GRUMIO, BIONDELLO. O excellent motion! Fellows, gone.
  HORTENSIO. motion's good indeed, so.
    Petruchio, ben venuto.                Exeunt

ACT Il. SCENE I.
Padua. BAPTISTA'S house

Enter KATHERINA BIANCA

  BIANCA. Good sister, wrong not, wrong yourself,
    make bondmaid slave me-
    disdain; gawds,
    Unbind hands, pull myself,
    Yea, raiment, petticoat;
    command do,
    duty elders.
  KATHERINA. thy suitors charge thee tell
    thou lov'st best. thou dissemble not.
  BIANCA. me, sister, men alive
    beheld special face
    fancy other.
  KATHERINA. Minion, thou liest. Is't Hortensio?
  BIANCA. affect him, sister, swear
    plead him.
  KATHERINA. O then, belike, fancy riches more:
    Gremio fair.  
  BIANCA. envy so?
    Nay, jest; perceive
    jested while.
    prithee, sister Kate, untie hands.
  KATHERINA. [Strikes her]  jest, rest so.

                            Enter BAPTISTA

  BAPTISTA. Why, now, dame! grows insolence?
    Bianca, stand aside- poor girl! weeps.
                                                [He unbinds her]
    ply thy needle; meddle her.
    shame, thou hilding devilish spirit,
    dost thou wrong ne'er wrong thee?
    cross thee bitter word?
  KATHERINA. silence flouts me, reveng'd.
                                            [Flies BIANCA]
  BAPTISTA. What, sight? Bianca, thee in.
                                                     Exit BIANCA
  KATHERINA. What, suffer me? Nay,  
    treasure, husband;
    dance bare-foot wedding-day,
    love lead apes hell.
    Talk me; sit weep,
    Till find occasion revenge.          Exit KATHERINA
  BAPTISTA. gentleman griev'd I?
    here?

        Enter GREMIO, LUCENTIO habit man;
         PETRUCHIO, HORTENSIO musician; TRANIO,
    LUCENTIO, boy, BIONDELLO, bearing lute books

  GREMIO. Good morrow, neighbour Baptista.
  BAPTISTA. Good morrow, neighbour Gremio.
    God save you, gentlemen!
  PETRUCHIO. you, good sir! Pray, daughter
    Call'd Katherina, fair virtuous?
  BAPTISTA. daughter, sir, call'd Katherina.
  GREMIO. blunt; orderly.
  PETRUCHIO. wrong me, Signior Gremio; give leave.  
    gentleman Verona, sir,
    That, hearing beauty wit,
    affability bashful modesty,
    wondrous qualities mild behaviour,
    bold show forward guest
    house, make mine eye witness
    report oft heard.
    And, entrance entertainment,
    present man mine,
                                          [Presenting HORTENSIO]
    Cunning music mathematics,
    instruct fully sciences,
    Whereof ignorant.
    Accept him, wrong-
    Licio, born Mantua.
  BAPTISTA. Y'are welcome, sir, good sake;
    daughter Katherine, know,
    turn, grief.
  PETRUCHIO. part her;
    company.  
  BAPTISTA. Mistake not; speak find.
    you, sir? call name?
  PETRUCHIO. Petruchio name, Antonio's son,
    man Italy.
  BAPTISTA. well; sake.
  GREMIO. Saving tale, Petruchio, pray,
    poor petitioners speak too.
    Bacare! marvellous forward.
  PETRUCHIO. O, pardon me, Signior Gremio! fain doing.
  GREMIO. doubt not, sir; curse wooing.
    Neighbour, gift grateful, it. To
    express kindness, myself, kindly
    beholding any, freely give young
    scholar  [Presenting LUCENTIO]  hath long studying at
    Rheims; cunning Greek, Latin, languages, the
    music mathematics. Cambio. Pray accept
    service.
  BAPTISTA. thousand thanks, Signior Gremio. Welcome, good Cambio.
    [To TRANIO]  But, gentle sir, methinks walk stranger.
    bold coming?  
  TRANIO. Pardon me, sir, boldness mine own
    That, stranger city here,
    make suitor daughter,
    Bianca, fair virtuous.
    firm resolve unknown me
    preferment eldest sister.
    liberty request-
    That, knowledge parentage,
    'mongst rest woo,
    free access favour rest.
    education daughters
    bestow simple instrument,
    small packet Greek Latin books.
    accept them, worth great.
  BAPTISTA. Lucentio name? whence, pray?
  TRANIO. Pisa, sir; son Vincentio.
  BAPTISTA. mighty man Pisa. report
    well. welcome, sir.
    lute, set books;
    pupils presently.  
    Holla, within!

                         Enter SERVANT

    Sirrah, lead gentlemen
    daughters; both
    tutors. Bid well.

                Exit SERVANT leading HORTENSIO carrying lute
                                     LUCENTIO books

    walk orchard,
    dinner. passing welcome,
    pray yourselves.
  PETRUCHIO. Signior Baptista, business asketh haste,
    day woo.
    knew father well, me,
    Left solely heir lands goods,
    bettered decreas'd.
    me, daughter's love,  
    dowry wife?
  BAPTISTA. death, half lands
    And, possession, twenty thousand crowns.
  PETRUCHIO. dowry, assure of
    widowhood, survive me,
    lands leases whatsoever.
    specialities drawn us,
    covenants hand.
  BAPTISTA. Ay, special thing obtain'd,
    is, love; all.
  PETRUCHIO. Why, nothing; you, father,
    peremptory proud-minded;
    raging fires meet together,
    consume thing feeds fury.
    fire grows great wind,
    extreme gusts blow fire all.
    her, yields me;
    rough, woo babe.
  BAPTISTA. mayst thou woo, happy thy speed
    thou arm'd unhappy words.  
  PETRUCHIO. Ay, proof, mountains winds,
    shake blow perpetually.

             Re-enter HORTENSIO, head broke

  BAPTISTA. now, friend! dost thou pale?
  HORTENSIO. fear, promise you, pale.
  BAPTISTA. What, daughter prove good musician?
  HORTENSIO. sooner prove soldier:
    Iron hold her, lutes.
  BAPTISTA. Why, thou canst break lute?
  HORTENSIO. Why, no; hath broke lute me.
    mistook frets,
    bow'd hand teach fingering,
    When, impatient devilish spirit,
    'Frets, call these?' quoth 'I'll fume them.'
    word struck head,
    instrument pate made way;
    stood amazed while,
    pillory, lute,  
    call rascal fiddler
    twangling Jack, twenty vile terms,
    studied misuse so.
  PETRUCHIO. Now, world, lusty wench;
    love ten times e'er did.
    O, long chat her!
  BAPTISTA. Well, me, discomfited;
    Proceed practice younger daughter;
    apt learn, thankful good turns.
    Signior Petruchio, us,
    send daughter Kate you?
  PETRUCHIO. pray do.             Exeunt PETRUCHIO
    attend here,
    woo spirit comes.
    rail; why, plain
    sings sweetly nightingale.
    frown; clear
    morning roses newly wash'd dew.
    mute, speak word;
    commend volubility,  
    uttereth piercing eloquence.
    bid pack, give thanks,
    bid stay week;
    deny wed, crave day
    banns, married.
    comes; :Lnd.now, Petruchio, speak.

                        Enter KATHERINA

    Good morrow, Kate- name, hear.
  KATHERINA. heard, hard hearing:
    call Katherine talk me.
  PETRUCHIO. lie, faith, call'd plain Kate,
    bonny Kate, Kate curst;
    But, Kate, prettiest Kate Christendom,
    Kate Kate Hall, super-dainty Kate,
    dainties Kates, therefore, Kate,
    me, Kate consolation-
    Hearing thy mildness prais'd town,
    Thy virtues spoke of, thy beauty sounded,  
    deeply thee belongs,
    mov'd woo thee wife.
  KATHERINA. Mov'd! good time! mov'd hither
    Remove hence. knew first
    moveable.
  PETRUCHIO. Why, moveable?
  KATHERINA. join'd-stool.
  PETRUCHIO. Thou hast hit it. Come, sit me.
  KATHERINA. Asses made bear, you.
  PETRUCHIO. Women made bear, you.
  KATHERINA. jade you, mean.
  PETRUCHIO. Alas, good Kate, burden thee!
    For, knowing thee young light-
  KATHERINA. light swain catch;
    heavy weight be.
  PETRUCHIO. be! should- buzz!
  KATHERINA. ta'en, buzzard.
  PETRUCHIO. O, slow-wing'd turtle, buzzard thee?
  KATHERINA. Ay, turtle, takes buzzard.
  PETRUCHIO. Come, come, wasp; i' faith, angry.  
  KATHERINA. waspish, beware sting.
  PETRUCHIO. remedy pluck out.
  KATHERINA. Ay, fool find lies.
  PETRUCHIO. wasp wear sting?
    tail.
  KATHERINA. tongue.
  PETRUCHIO. tongue?
  KATHERINA. Yours, talk tales; farewell.
  PETRUCHIO. What, tongue tail? Nay, again,
    Good Kate; gentleman.
  KATHERINA. try.                    [She strikes him]
  PETRUCHIO. swear cuff you, strike again.
  KATHERINA. lose arms.
    strike me, gentleman;
    gentleman, arms.
  PETRUCHIO. herald, Kate? O, put thy books!
  KATHERINA. crest- coxcomb?
  PETRUCHIO. combless cock, Kate hen.
  KATHERINA. cock mine: crow craven.
  PETRUCHIO. Nay, come, Kate, come; sour.  
  KATHERINA. fashion, crab.
  PETRUCHIO. Why, crab; sour.
  KATHERINA. is, is.
  PETRUCHIO. show me.
  KATHERINA. glass would.
  PETRUCHIO. What, face?
  KATHERINA. aim'd young one.
  PETRUCHIO. Now, Saint George, young you.
  KATHERINA. wither'd.
  PETRUCHIO. 'Tis cares.
  KATHERINA. care not.
  PETRUCHIO. Nay, hear you, Kate- sooth, scape so.
  KATHERINA. chafe you, tarry; go.
  PETRUCHIO. No, whit; find passing gentle.
    'Twas told rough, coy, sullen,
    find report liar;
    thou art pleasant, gamesome, passing courteous,
    slow speech, sweet springtime flowers.
    Thou canst frown, thou canst askance,
    bite lip, angry wenches will,  
    hast thou pleasure cross talk;
    thou mildness entertain'st thy wooers;
    gentle conference, soft affable.
    world report Kate doth limp?
    O sland'rous world! Kate hazel-twig
    straight slender, brown hue
    hazel-nuts, sweeter kernels.
    O, thee walk. Thou dost halt.
  KATHERINA. Go, fool, thou keep'st command.
  PETRUCHIO. Dian grove
    Kate chamber princely gait?
    O, thou Dian, Kate;
    Kate chaste, Dian sportful!
  KATHERINA. study goodly speech?
  PETRUCHIO. extempore, mother wit.
  KATHERINA. witty mother! witless son.
  PETRUCHIO. wise?
  KATHERINA. Yes, warm.
  PETRUCHIO. Marry, mean, sweet Katherine, thy bed.
    therefore, setting chat aside,  
    plain terms: father hath consented
    wife dowry greed on;
    you, nill you, marry you.
    Now, Kate, husband turn;
    For, light, thy beauty,
    Thy beauty doth make thee well,
    Thou married man me;
    born tame you, Kate,
    bring wild Kate Kate
    Conformable household Kates.

               Re-enter BAPTISTA, GREMIO, TRANIO

    father. make denial;
    Katherine wife.
  BAPTISTA. Now, Signior Petruchio, speed daughter?
  PETRUCHIO. well, sir? well?
    impossible speed amiss.
  BAPTISTA. Why, now, daughter Katherine, dumps?
  KATHERINA. Call daughter? promise  
    show'd tender fatherly regard
    wed half lunatic,
    mad-cap ruffian swearing Jack,
    thinks oaths face matter out.
  PETRUCHIO. Father, 'tis thus: world
    talk'd talk'd amiss her.
    curst, policy,
    For,she's froward, modest dove;
    hot, temperate morn;
    patience prove Grissel,
    Roman Lucrece chastity.
    And, conclude, 'greed together
    Sunday wedding-day.
  KATHERINA. thee hang'd Sunday first.
  GREMIO. Hark, Petruchio; thee hang'd first.
  TRANIO. speeding? Nay, good-night part!
  PETRUCHIO. patient, gentlemen. choose myself;
    pleas'd, you?
    'Tis bargain'd 'twixt twain, alone,
    curst company.  
    'tis incredible believe.
    loves me- O, kindest Kate!
    hung neck, kiss kiss
    vied fast, protesting oath oath,
    twink won love.
    O, novices! 'Tis world see,
    tame, men women alone,
    meacock wretch make curstest shrew.
    Give thy hand, Kate; Venice,
    buy apparel 'gainst wedding-day.
    Provide feast, father, bid guests;
    Katherine fine.
  BAPTISTA. say; give hands.
    God send joy, Petruchio! 'Tis match.
  GREMIO, TRANIO. Amen, we; witnesses.
  PETRUCHIO. Father, wife, gentlemen, adieu.
    Venice; Sunday apace;
    rings things, fine array;
    kiss me, Kate; married Sunday.
                        Exeunt PETRUCHIO KATHERINA severally  
  GREMIO. match clapp'd suddenly?
  BAPTISTA. Faith, gentlemen, play merchant's part,
    venture madly desperate mart.
  TRANIO. 'Twas commodity lay fretting you;
    'Twill bring gain, perish seas.
  BAPTISTA. gain seek quiet match.
  GREMIO. doubt hath quiet catch.
    now, Baptista, younger daughter:
    day long looked for;
    neighbour, suitor first.
  TRANIO. love Bianca more
    words witness thoughts guess.
  GREMIO. Youngling, thou canst love dear I.
  TRANIO. Greybeard, thy love doth freeze.
  GREMIO. thine doth fry.
    Skipper, stand back; 'tis age nourisheth.
  TRANIO. youth ladies' eyes flourisheth.
  BAPTISTA. Content you, gentlemen; compound strife.
    'Tis deeds win prize, both
    assure daughter greatest dower  
    Bianca's love.
    Say, Signior Gremio, assure her?
  GREMIO. First, know, house city
    richly furnished plate gold,
    Basins ewers lave dainty hands;
    hangings Tyrian tapestry;
    ivory coffers stuff'd crowns;
    cypress chests arras counterpoints,
    Costly apparel, tents, canopies,
    Fine linen, Turkey cushions boss'd pearl,
    Valance Venice gold needle-work;
    Pewter brass, things belongs
    house housekeeping. farm
    hundred milch-kine pail,
    score fat oxen standing stalls,
    things answerable portion.
    struck years, confess;
    die to-morrow hers,
    whilst live mine.
  TRANIO. 'only' in. Sir, list me:  
    father's heir son;
    daughter wife,
    leave houses good
    rich Pisa's walls one
    Signior Gremio Padua;
    thousand ducats year
    fruitful land, jointure.
    What, pinch'd you, Signior Gremio?
  GREMIO. thousand ducats year land!
    [Aside]  land amounts all.-
    have, argosy
    lying Marseilles road.
    What, chok'd argosy?
  TRANIO. Gremio, 'tis father hath less
    great argosies, galliasses,
    twelve tight galleys. assure her,
    whate'er thou off'rest next.
  GREMIO. Nay, off'red all; more;
    have;
    me, mine.  
  TRANIO. Why, maid mine world
    firm promise; Gremio out-vied.
  BAPTISTA. confess offer best;
    father make assurance,
    own. Else, pardon me;
    die him, dower?
  TRANIO. cavil; old, young.
  GREMIO. young men die old?
  BAPTISTA. Well, gentlemen,
    resolv'd: Sunday know
    daughter Katherine married;
    Now, Sunday Bianca
    bride you, make assurance;
    not, Signior Gremio.
    leave, both.
  GREMIO. Adieu, good neighbour.                   Exit BAPTISTA
    Now, fear thee not.
    Sirrah young gamester, father fool
    give thee all, waning age
    Set foot thy table. Tut, toy!  
    Italian fox kind, boy.              Exit
  TRANIO. vengeance crafty withered hide!
    fac'd card ten.
    'Tis head master good:
    reason suppos'd Lucentio
    father, call'd suppos'd Vincentio;
    wonder- fathers commonly
    children; case wooing
    child sire, fail cunning.
 Exit
