ACT III. SCENE I.
Padua. BAPTISTA'S house

Enter LUCENTIO CAMBIO, HORTENSIO LICIO, BIANCA

  LUCENTIO. Fiddler, forbear; grow forward, sir.
    forgot entertainment
    sister Katherine welcome'd withal?
  HORTENSIO. But, wrangling pedant, is
    patroness heavenly harmony.
    give leave prerogative;
    music spent hour,
    lecture leisure much.
  LUCENTIO. Preposterous ass, read far
    music ordain'd!
    refresh mind man
    studies usual pain?
    give leave read philosophy,
    pause serve harmony.
  HORTENSIO. Sirrah, bear braves thine.
  BIANCA. Why, gentlemen, double wrong
    strive resteth choice.  
    arn breeching scholar schools,
    tied hours 'pointed times,
    learn lessons myself.
    cut strife: sit down;
    instrument, play whiles!
    lecture ere tun'd.
  HORTENSIO. leave lecture tune?
  LUCENTIO. never- tune instrument.
  BIANCA. left last?
  LUCENTIO. Here, madam:
    'Hic ibat Simois, hic est Sigeia tellus,
    Hic steterat Priami regia celsa senis.'
  BIANCA. Construe them.
  LUCENTIO. 'Hic ibat' told before- 'Simois' Lucentio-
    'hic est' son Vincentio Pisa- 'Sigeia tellus' disguised
    love- 'Hic steterat' Lucentio that
    a-wooing- 'Priami' man Tranio- 'regia' bearing my
    port- 'celsa senis' beguile pantaloon.
  HORTENSIO. Madam, instrument's tune.
  BIANCA. hear. O fie! treble jars.  
  LUCENTIO. Spit hole, man, tune again.
  BIANCA. construe it: 'Hic ibat Simois' I
    not- 'hic est Sigeia tellus' trust not- 'Hic
    steterat Priami' heed hear not- 'regia' presume not-
   'celsa senis' despair not.
  HORTENSIO. Madam, 'tis tune.
  LUCENTIO. bass.
  HORTENSIO. bass right; 'tis base knave jars.
    [Aside]  fiery forward pedant is!
    Now, life, knave doth court love.
    Pedascule, watch yet.
  BIANCA. time believe, mistrust.
  LUCENTIO. Mistrust not- sure, AEacides
    Ajax, call'd grandfather.
  BIANCA. master; else, promise you,
    arguing doubt;
    rest. Now, Licio, you.
    Good master, unkindly, pray,
    pleasant both.
  HORTENSIO.  [To LUCENTIO]  walk give leave  
      awhile;
    lessons make music Parts.
  LUCENTIO. formal, sir? Well, wait,
    [Aside]  watch withal; for, deceiv'd,
    fine musician groweth amorous.
  HORTENSIO. Madam, touch instrument
    learn order fingering,
    begin rudiments art,
    teach gamut briefer sort,
    pleasant, pithy, effectual,
    hath taught trade;
    writing fairly drawn.
  BIANCA. Why, past gamut long ago.
  HORTENSIO. read gamut Hortensio.
  BIANCA.  [Reads]
         '"Gamut" am, ground accord-
         "A re" plead Hortensio's passion-
         "B mi" Bianca, thy lord-
         "C fa ut" loves affection-
         "D sol re" clef, notes I-  
         "E la mi" show pity die.'
    Call gamut? Tut, not!
    fashions best; nice
    change true rules odd inventions.

                       Enter SERVANT

  SERVANT. Mistress, father prays leave books
    dress sister's chamber up.
    to-morrow wedding-day.
  BIANCA. Farewell, sweet masters, both; gone.
                                       Exeunt BIANCA SERVANT
  LUCENTIO. Faith, mistress, stay.
 Exit
  HORTENSIO. pry pedant;
    Methinks love.
    thy thoughts, Bianca, humble
    cast thy wand'ring eyes stale-
    Seize thee list. find thee ranging,
  HORTENSIO quit thee changing.             Exit




SCENE II.
Padua. BAPTISTA'So house

Enter BAPTISTA, GREMIO, TRANIO LUCENTIO, KATHERINA, BIANCA,
LUCENTIO CAMBIO, ATTENDANTS

  BAPTISTA.  [To TRANIO]  Signior Lucentio, 'pointed day
    Katherine Petruchio married,
    hear son-in-law.
    said? mockery be
    bridegroom priest attends
    speak ceremonial rites marriage!
    Lucentio shame ours?
  KATHERINA. shame mine; must, forsooth, forc'd
    give hand, oppos'd heart,
    mad-brain rudesby, full spleen,
    woo'd haste means wed leisure.
    told you, I, frantic fool,
    Hiding bitter jests blunt behaviour;
    And, noted merry man,
    woo thousand, 'point day marriage,
    Make friends invited, proclaim banns;  
    means wed hath woo'd.
    world point poor Katherine,
    'Lo, mad Petruchio's wife,
    marry her!'
  TRANIO. Patience, good Katherine, Baptista too.
    life, Petruchio means well,
    fortune stays word.
    blunt, passing wise;
    merry, withal honest.
  KATHERINA. Katherine though!
                    Exit, weeping, BIANCA others
  BAPTISTA. Go, girl, blame thee weep,
    injury vex saint;
    shrew thy impatient humour.

                           Enter BIONDELLO

    Master, master! News, news heard of!
  BAPTISTA. too? be?
  BIONDELLO. Why, news hear Petruchio's coming?  
  BAPTISTA. come?
  BIONDELLO. Why, no, sir.
  BAPTISTA. then?
  BIONDELLO. coming.
  BAPTISTA. here?
  BIONDELLO. stands sees there.
  TRANIO. But, say, thine news?
  BIONDELLO. Why, Petruchio coming- hat old
    jerkin; pair breeches thrice turn'd; pair boots
    candle-cases, buckled, lac'd; old
    rusty sword ta'en town armoury, broken hilt,
    chapeless; broken points; horse hipp'd, an
    motley saddle stirrups kindred; besides, possess'd
    glanders mose chine, troubled with
    lampass, infected fashions, full windgalls, sped
    spavins, rayed yellows, past cure fives,
    stark spoil'd staggers, begnawn bots, sway'd in
    back shoulder-shotten, near-legg'd before, a
    half-cheek'd bit, head-stall sheep's leather which,
    restrained stumbling, hath  
    burst, repaired knots; girth times piec'd,
    woman's crupper velure, hath letters her
    fairly set studs, piec'd with
    pack-thread.
  BAPTISTA. him?
  BIONDELLO. O, sir, lackey, world caparison'd like
    horse- linen stock leg kersey boot-hose
    other, gart'red red blue list; hat, and
    humour forty fancies prick'd in't feather; a
    monster, monster apparel, Christian
    footboy gentleman's lackey.
  TRANIO. 'Tis odd humour pricks fashion;
    oftentimes lie mean-apparell'd.
  BAPTISTA. glad come, howsoe'er comes.
  BIONDELLO. Why, sir, not.
  BAPTISTA. Didst thou comes?
  BIONDELLO. Who? Petruchio came?
  BAPTISTA. Ay, Petruchio came.
  BIONDELLO. No, sir; horse back.
  BAPTISTA. Why, one.  
  BIONDELLO. Nay, Saint Jamy,
             hold penny,
             horse man
             one,
             many.

                  Enter PETRUCHIO GRUMIO

  PETRUCHIO. Come, gallants? home?
  BAPTISTA. welcome, sir.
  PETRUCHIO. well.
  BAPTISTA. halt not.
  TRANIO. apparell'd
    were.
  PETRUCHIO. better, rush thus.
    Kate? lovely bride?
    father? Gentles, methinks frown;
    wherefore gaze goodly company
    wondrous monument,
    comet unusual prodigy?  
  BAPTISTA. Why, sir, wedding-day.
    sad, fearing come;
    sadder, unprovided.
    Fie, doff habit, shame estate,
    eye-sore solemn festival!
  TRANIO. occasion import
    Hath long detain'd wife,
    unlike yourself?
  PETRUCHIO. Tedious tell, harsh hear;
    Sufficeth word,
    part enforced digress,
    leisure excuse
    satisfied withal.
    Kate? stay long her;
    morning wears, 'tis time church.
  TRANIO. bride unreverent robes;
    chamber, put clothes mine.
  PETRUCHIO. I, me; visit her.
  BAPTISTA. thus, trust, marry her.
  PETRUCHIO. Good sooth, thus; ha' words;  
    married, clothes.
    repair wear me
    change poor accoutrements,
    'Twere Kate myself.
    fool chat you,
    bid good-morrow bride
    seal title lovely kiss!
                                  Exeunt PETRUCHIO PETRUCHIO
  TRANIO. hath meaning mad attire.
    persuade him, possible,
    put ere church.
  BAPTISTA. event this.
              Exeunt BAPTISTA, GREMIO, BIONDELLO, ATTENDENTS
  TRANIO. love concerneth ad
    father's liking; bring pass,
    imparted worship,
    man- whate'er be
    skills much; fit turn-
    Vincentio Pisa,
    make assurance Padua  
    greater sums promised.
    quietly enjoy hope
    marry sweet Bianca consent.
  LUCENTIO. fellow schoolmaster
    Doth watch Bianca's steps narrowly,
    'Twere good, methinks, steal marriage;
    perform'd, world no,
    mine world.
  TRANIO. degrees into
    watch vantage business;
    over-reach greybeard, Gremio,
    narrow-prying father, Minola,
    quaint musician, amorous Licio-
    master's sake, Lucentio.

                           Re-enter GREMIO

    Signior Gremio, church?
  GREMIO. willingly e'er school.
  TRANIO. bride bridegroom coming home?  
  GREMIO. bridegroom, you? 'Tis groom indeed,
    grumbling groom, girl find.
  TRANIO. Curster she? Why, 'tis impossible.
  GREMIO. Why, devil, devil, fiend.
  TRANIO. Why, devil, devil, devil's dam.
  GREMIO. Tut, lamb, dove, fool, him!
    you, Sir Lucentio: priest
    Katherine wife,
    'Ay, gogs-wouns' quoth he, swore loud
    That, amaz'd, priest fall book;
    stoop'd up,
    mad-brain'd bridegroom cuff
    fell priest book, book priest.
    'Now up,' quoth 'if list.'
  TRANIO. wench, rose again?
  GREMIO. Trembled shook, stamp'd swore
    vicar meant cozen him.
    ceremonies done
    calls wine: 'A health!' quoth he, if
    abroad, carousing mates  
    storm; quaff'd muscadel,
    threw sops sexton's face,
    reason
    beard grew thin hungerly
    seem'd sops drinking.
    done, bride neck,
    kiss'd lips clamorous smack
    parting church echo.
    I, this, shame;
    me, know, rout coming.
    mad marriage before.
    Hark, hark! hear minstrels play.         [Music plays]

       Enter PETRUCHIO, KATHERINA, BIANCA, BAPTISTA, HORTENSIO,
                         GRUMIO, train

  PETRUCHIO. Gentlemen friends, pains.
    dine to-day,
    prepar'd great store wedding cheer
    is- haste doth call hence,  
    leave.
  BAPTISTA. Is't to-night?
  PETRUCHIO. to-day night come.
    Make wonder; knew business,
    entreat stay.
    And, honest company, all
    beheld give myself
    patient, sweet, virtuous wife.
    Dine father, drink health me.
    hence; farewell all.
  TRANIO. entreat stay till dinner.
  PETRUCHIO. be.
  GREMIO. entreat you.
  PETRUCHIO. be.
  KATHERINA. entreat you.
  PETRUCHIO. content.
  KATHERINA. content stay?
  PETRUCHIO. content entreat stay;
    stay, entreat can.
  KATHERINA. Now, love me, stay.  
  PETRUCHIO. Grumio, horse.
  GRUMIO. Ay, sir, ready; oats eaten horses.
  KATHERINA. Nay, then,
    thou canst, to-day;
    No, to-morrow, till myself.
    door open, sir; lies way;
    jogging whiles boots green;
    me, till myself.
    'Tis prove jolly surly groom
    roundly.
  PETRUCHIO. O Kate, content thee; prithee angry.
  KATHERINA. angry; hast thou do?
    Father, quiet; stay leisure.
  GREMIO. Ay, marry, sir, begins work.
  KATHERINA. Gentlemen, forward bridal dinner.
    woman made fool
    spirit resist.
  PETRUCHIO. forward, Kate, thy command.
    Obey bride, attend her;
    feast, revel domineer,  
    Carouse full measure maidenhead;
    mad merry, hang yourselves.
    bonny Kate, me.
    Nay, big, stamp, stare, fret;
    master mine own-
    goods, chattels, house,
    household stuff, field, barn,
    horse, ox, ass, thing,
    stands; touch dare;
    bring mine action proudest he
    stops Padua. Grumio,
    Draw thy weapon; beset thieves;
    Rescue thy mistress, thou man.
    Fear not, sweet wench; touch thee, Kate;
    buckler thee million.
                         Exeunt PETRUCHIO, KATHERINA, GRUMIO
  BAPTISTA. Nay, go, couple quiet ones.
  GREMIO. quickly, die laughing.
  TRANIO. mad matches, like.
  LUCENTIO. Mistress, opinion sister?  
  BIANCA. That, mad herself, madly mated.
  GREMIO. warrant him, Petruchio Kated.
  BAPTISTA. Neighbours friends, bride bridegroom wants
    supply places table,
    junkets feast.
    Lucentio, supply bridegroom's place;
    Bianca sister's room.
  TRANIO. sweet Bianca practise bride it?
  BAPTISTA. shall, Lucentio. Come, gentlemen, go.
                                                          Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE I.
PETRUCHIO'S country house

Enter GRUMIO

  GRUMIO. Fie, fie tired jades, mad masters, all
    foul ways! man beaten? man ray'd? Was
    man weary? make fire, are
    coming warm them. pot soon
    hot, lips freeze teeth, tongue roof
    mouth, heart belly, ere fire to
    thaw me. blowing fire warm myself; for,
    weather, taller man cold.
    Holla, ho! Curtis!

                            Enter CURTIS

  CURTIS. calls coldly?
  GRUMIO. piece ice. thou doubt it, thou mayst slide my
    shoulder heel greater run head my
    neck. fire, good Curtis.
  CURTIS. master wife coming, Grumio?  
  GRUMIO. O, ay, Curtis, ay; fire, fire; cast no
    water.
  CURTIS. hot shrew reported?
  GRUMIO. was, good Curtis, frost; thou know'st
    winter tames man, woman, beast; hath tam'd old
    master, mistress, myself, fellow Curtis.
  CURTIS. Away, three-inch fool! beast.
  GRUMIO. inches? Why, thy horn foot, long
    least. wilt thou make fire, complain
    thee mistress, hand- hand- thou
    shalt feel, thy cold comfort, slow thy hot
    office?
  CURTIS. prithee, good Grumio, world?
  GRUMIO. cold world, Curtis, office thine; and
    fire. thy duty, thy duty, master and
    mistress frozen death.
  CURTIS. fire ready; therefore, good Grumio, news?
  GRUMIO. Why, 'Jack boy! ho, boy!' news thou wilt.
  CURTIS. Come, full cony-catching!
  GRUMIO. Why, therefore, fire; caught extreme cold.  
    cook? supper ready, house trimm'd, rushes
    strew'd, cobwebs swept, serving-men fustian,
    white stockings, officer wedding-garment on?
    jacks fair within, jills fair without, carpets
    laid, order?
  CURTIS. ready; therefore, pray thee, news.
  GRUMIO. horse tired; master mistress fall'n
    out.
  CURTIS. How?
  GRUMIO. saddles dirt; hangs a
    tale.
  CURTIS. ha't, good Grumio.
  GRUMIO. Lend thine ear.
  CURTIS. Here.
  GRUMIO. There.                                  [Striking him]
  CURTIS. 'tis feel tale, hear tale.
  GRUMIO. 'tis call'd tale; cuff
    knock car beseech list'ning. begin:
    Imprimis, foul hill, master riding my
    mistress-  
  CURTIS. horse?
  GRUMIO. thee?
  CURTIS. Why, horse.
  GRUMIO. thou tale. hadst thou cross'd me, thou
    shouldst heard horse fell horse;
    thou shouldst heard miry place, was
    bemoil'd, left horse her, beat me
    horse stumbled, waded dirt to
    pluck me, swore, pray'd pray'd
    before, cried, horses ran away, bridle was
    burst, lost crupper- things worthy memory,
    die oblivion, thou return unexperienc'd to
    thy grave.
  CURTIS. reck'ning shrew she.
  GRUMIO. Ay, thou proudest find
    home. talk this? Call forth
    Nathaniel, Joseph, Nicholas, Philip, Walter, Sugarsop, the
    rest; heads sleekly comb'd, blue coats brush'd
    garters indifferent knit; curtsy with
    left legs, presume touch hair mastcr's  
    horse-tail till kiss hands. ready?
  CURTIS. are.
  GRUMIO. Call forth.
  CURTIS. hear, ho? meet master, countenance my
    mistress.
  GRUMIO. Why, hath face own.
  CURTIS. that?
  GRUMIO. Thou, seems, calls company countenance her.
  CURTIS. call credit her.
  GRUMIO. Why, borrow them.

                     Enter SERVINGMEN

  NATHANIEL. home, Grumio!
  PHILIP. now, Grumio!
  JOSEPH. What, Grumio!
  NICHOLAS. Fellow Grumio!
  NATHANIEL. now, lad!
  GRUMIO. Welcome, you!- now, you!- what, you!- fellow, you!- and
    greeting. Now, spruce companions, ready,  
    things neat?
  NATHANIEL. things ready. master?
  GRUMIO. E'en hand, alighted this; not-
   Cock's passion, silence! hear master.

                     Enter PETRUCHIO KATHERINA

  PETRUCHIO. knaves? What, man door
    hold stirrup horse!
    Nathaniel, Gregory, Philip?
  SERVANTS. Here, here, sir; here, sir.
  PETRUCHIO. Here, sir! here, sir! here, sir! here, sir!
    logger-headed unpolish'd grooms!
    What, attendance? regard? duty?
    foolish knave before?
  GRUMIO. Here, sir; foolish before.
  PETRUCHIO. peasant swain! whoreson malt-horse drudge!
    bid thee meet park
    bring rascal knaves thee?
  GRUMIO. Nathaniel's coat, sir, fully made,  
    Gabriel's pumps unpink'd i' th' heel;
    link colour Peter's hat,
    Walter's dagger sheathing;
    fine Adam, Ralph, Gregory;
    rest ragged, old, beggarly;
    Yet, are, meet you.
  PETRUCHIO. Go, rascals, fetch supper in.
                                   Exeunt SERVINGMEN

    [Sings]  life late led?
             those-

    Sit down, Kate, welcome. Soud, soud, soud, soud!

                 Re-enter SERVANTS supper

    Why, when, say? Nay, good sweet Kate, merry.
    boots, rogues! villains, when?

    [Sings]  friar orders grey,  
             walked way-

    Out, rogue! pluck foot awry;
    that, mend plucking other.
                                                   [Strikes him]
    merry, Kate. water, here, what, ho!

                      Enter water

    spaniel Troilus? Sirrah, hence,
    bid cousin Ferdinand hither:
                                                 Exit SERVINGMAN
    One, Kate, kiss acquainted with.
    slippers? water?
    Come, Kate, wash, heartily.
    whoreson villain! fall?    [Strikes him]
  KATHERINA. Patience, pray you; 'twas fault unwilling.
  PETRUCHIO. whoreson, beetle-headed, flap-ear'd knave!
    Come, Kate, sit down; stomach.
    give thanks, sweet Kate, I?  
    this? Mutton?
  SERVANT. Ay.
  PETRUCHIO. brought it?
  PETER. I.
  PETRUCHIO. 'Tis burnt; meat.
    dogs these? rascal cook?
    durst villains bring dresser
    serve love not?
    There, you, trenchers, cups, all;
                                [Throws meat, etc., them]
    heedless joltheads unmanner'd slaves!
    What, grumble? straight.
                                                 Exeunt SERVANTS
  KATHERINA. pray you, husband, disquiet;
    meat well, contented.
  PETRUCHIO. thee, Kate, 'twas burnt dried away,
    expressly forbid touch it;
    engenders choler, planteth anger;
    'twere fast,
    Since, ourselves, choleric,  
    feed over-roasted flesh.
    patient; to-morrow 't mended.
    night fast company.
    Come, bring thee thy bridal chamber.        Exeunt

                     Re-enter SERVANTS severally

  NATHANIEL. Peter, didst like?
  PETER. kills humour.

                            Re-enter CURTIS

  GRUMIO. he?
  CURTIS. chamber. Making sermon continency her,
    rails, swears, rates, she, poor soul,
    stand, look, speak.
    sits risen dream.
    Away, away! coming hither.                  Exeunt

                       Re-enter PETRUCHIO  

  PETRUCHIO. politicly begun reign,
    'tis hope end successfully.
    falcon sharp passing empty.
    till stoop full-gorg'd,
    lure.
    man haggard,
    make come, keeper's call,
    is, watch her, watch kites
    bate beat, obedient.
    eat meat to-day, eat;
    night slept not, to-night not;
    meat, undeserved fault
    find making bed;
    fling pillow, bolster,
    coverlet, sheets;
    Ay, amid hurly intend
    reverend care her-
    And, conclusion, watch night;
    chance nod rail brawl  
    clamour awake.
    kill wife kindness,
    curb mad headstrong humour.
    tame shrew,
    speak; 'tis charity show.                Exit




SCENE II.
Padua. BAPTISTA'S house

Enter TRANIO LUCENTIO, HORTENSIO LICIO

  TRANIO. 't possible, friend Licio, Mistress Bianca
    Doth fancy Lucentio?
    you, sir, bears fair hand.
  HORTENSIO. Sir, satisfy said,
    Stand mark manner teaching.
                                              [They stand aside]

               Enter BIANCA, LUCENTIO CAMBIO

  LUCENTIO. Now, mistress, profit read?
  BIANCA. What, master, read you, resolve that.
  LUCENTIO. read profess, 'The Art Love.'
  BIANCA. prove, sir, master art!
  LUCENTIO. you, sweet dear, prove mistress heart.
                                                   [They retire]
  HORTENSIO. Quick proceeders, marry! me, pray,
    durst swear Mistress Blanca  
    Lov'd world Lucentio.
  TRANIO. O despiteful love! unconstant womankind!
    thee, Licio, wonderful.
  HORTENSIO. Mistake more; Licio.
    musician be;
    scorn live disguise
    leaves gentleman
    makes god cullion.
    Know, sir, call'd Hortensio.
  TRANIO. Signior Hortensio, heard
    entire affection Bianca;
    mine eyes witness lightness,
    you, contented,
    Forswear Bianca love ever.
  HORTENSIO. See, kiss court! Signior Lucentio,
    hand, firmly vow
    woo more, forswear her,
    unworthy favours
    fondly flatter'd withal.
  TRANIO. unfeigned oath,  
    marry entreat;
    Fie her! beastly doth court him!
  HORTENSIO. world forsworn!
    me, surely mine oath,
    married wealtlly widow
    Ere days pass, hath long lov'd me
    lov'd proud disdainful haggard.
    farewell, Signior Lucentio.
    Kindness women, beauteous looks,
    win love; leave,
    resolution swore before.                        Exit
  TRANIO. Mistress Bianca, bless grace
    'longeth lover's blessed case!
    Nay, ta'en napping, gentle love,
    forsworn Hortensio.
  BIANCA. Tranio, jest; forsworn me?
  TRANIO. Mistress, have.
  LUCENTIO. rid Licio.
  TRANIO. I' faith, lusty widow now,
    woo'd wedded day.  
  BIANCA. God give joy!
  TRANIO. Ay, tame her.
  BIANCA. so, Tranio.
  TRANIO. Faith, taming-school.
  BIANCA. taming-school! What, place?
  TRANIO. Ay, mistress; Petruchio master,
    teacheth tricks eleven twenty long,
    tame shrew charm chattering tongue.

                       Enter BIONDELLO

  BIONDELLO. O master, master, watch'd long
    dog-weary; spied
    ancient angel coming hill
    serve turn.
  TRANIO. he, Biondello?
  BIONDELLO. Master, mercatante pedant,
    what; formal apparel,
    gait countenance surely father.
  LUCENTIO. him, Tranio?  
  TRANIO. credulous trust tale,
    make glad Vincentio,
    give assurance Baptista Minola
    Vincentio.
    love, alone.
                                      Exeunt LUCENTIO BIANCA

                         Enter PEDANT

  PEDANT. God save you, sir!
  TRANIO. you, sir; welcome.
    Travel on, farthest?
  PEDANT. Sir, farthest week two;
    farther, Rome;
    Tripoli, God lend life.
  TRANIO. countryman, pray?
  PEDANT. Mantua.
  TRANIO. Mantua, sir? Marry, God forbid,
    Padua, careless life!
  PEDANT. life, sir! How, pray? hard.  
  TRANIO. 'Tis death Mantua
    Padua. cause?
    ships stay'd Venice; Duke,
    private quarrel 'twixt Duke him,
    Hath publish'd proclaim'd openly.
    'Tis marvel- newly come,
    heard proclaim'd about.
  PEDANT. Alas, sir, worse so!
    bills money exchange
    Florence, deliver them.
  TRANIO. Well, sir, courtesy,
    do, advise you-
    First, me, Pisa?
  PEDANT. Ay, sir, Pisa been,
    Pisa renowned grave citizens.
  TRANIO. Vincentio?
  PEDANT. not, heard him,
    merchant incomparable wealth.
  TRANIO. father, sir; and, sooth say,
    count'nance doth resemble you.  
  BIONDELLO.  [Aside]  apple doth oyster, all
    one.
  TRANIO. save life extremity,
    favour sake;
    worst fortunes
    Sir Vincentio.
    credit undertake,
    house friendly lodg'd;
    should.
    understand me, sir. stay
    Till business city.
    court'sy, sir, accept it.
  PEDANT. O, sir, do; repute ever
    patron life liberty.
  TRANIO. make matter good.
    This, way, understand:
    father look'd day
    pass assurance dow'r marriage
    'Twixt Baptista's daughter here.
    circumstances instruct you.  
    clothe you.              Exeunt




SCENE III.
PETRUCHIO'S house

Enter KATHERINA GRUMIO

  GRUMIO. No, no, forsooth; dare life.
  KATHERINA. wrong, spite appears.
    What, marry famish me?
    Beggars father's door
    entreaty present alms;
    not, meet charity;
    I, knew entreat,
    needed entreat,
    starv'd meat, giddy lack sleep;
    oaths waking, brawling fed;
    spites wants-
    perfect love;
    say, sleep eat,
    'Twere deadly sickness present death.
    prithee repast;
    care what, wholesome food.
  GRUMIO. neat's foot?  
  KATHERINA. 'Tis passing good; prithee it.
  GRUMIO. fear choleric meat.
    fat tripe finely broil'd?
  KATHERINA. well; good Grumio, fetch me.
  GRUMIO. tell; fear 'tis choleric.
    piece beef mustard?
  KATHERINA. dish love feed upon.
  GRUMIO. Ay, mustard hot little.
  KATHERINA. beef, mustard rest.
  GRUMIO. Nay, not; mustard,
    beef Grumio.
  KATHERINA. both, one, thou wilt.
  GRUMIO. mustard beef.
  KATHERINA. Go, thee gone, thou false deluding slave,
                                                     [Beats him]
    feed'st meat.
    Sorrow thee pack you
    triumph misery!
    Go, thee gone, say.
  
               Enter PETRUCHIO, HORTENSIO meat

  PETRUCHIO. fares Kate? What, sweeting, amort?
  HORTENSIO. Mistress, cheer?
  KATHERINA. Faith, cold be.
  PETRUCHIO. Pluck thy spirits, cheerfully me.
    Here, love, thou seest diligent am,
    dress thy meat myself, bring thee.
    sure, sweet Kate, kindness merits thanks.
    What, word? Nay, thou lov'st not,
    pains sorted proof.
    Here, dish.
  KATHERINA. pray you, stand.
  PETRUCHIO. poorest service repaid thanks;
    mine, touch meat.
  KATHERINA. you, sir.
  HORTENSIO. Signior Petruchio, fie! blame.
    Come, Mistress Kate, bear company.
  PETRUCHIO.  [Aside]  Eat all, Hortensio, thou lovest me.-
    good thy gentle heart!  
    Kate, eat apace. now, honey love,
    return thy father's house
    revel bravely best,
    silken coats caps, golden rings,
    ruffs cuffs farthingales things,
    scarfs fans double change brav'ry.
    amber bracelets, beads, knav'ry.
    What, hast thou din'd? tailor stays thy leisure,
    deck thy body ruffling treasure.

                          Enter TAILOR

    Come, tailor, ornaments;
    Lay gown.

                        Enter HABERDASHER

    news you, sir?
  HABERDASHER. cap worship bespeak.
  PETRUCHIO. Why, moulded porringer;  
    velvet dish. Fie, fie! 'tis lewd filthy;
    Why, 'tis cockle walnut-shell,
    knack, toy, trick, baby's cap.
    it. Come, bigger.
  KATHERINA. bigger; doth fit time,
    gentlewomen wear caps these.
  PETRUCHIO. gentle, too,
    till then.
  HORTENSIO.  [Aside]  haste.
  KATHERINA. Why, sir, trust leave speak;
    speak will. child, babe.
    betters endur'd mind,
    cannot, stop ears.
    tongue anger heart,
    heart, concealing it, break;
    shall, free
    uttermost, please, words.
  PETRUCHIO. Why, thou say'st true; paltry cap,
    custard-coffin, bauble, silken pie;
    love thee thou lik'st not.  
  KATHERINA. Love love not, cap;
    have, none.    Exit HABERDASHER
  PETRUCHIO. Thy gown? Why, ay. Come, tailor, see't.
    O mercy, God! masquing stuff here?
    this? sleeve? 'Tis demi-cannon.
    What, down, carv'd appletart?
    snip nip cut slish slash,
    censer barber's shop.
    Why, devil's name, tailor, call'st thou this?
  HORTENSIO.  [Aside]  cap gown.
  TAILOR. bid make orderly well,
    fashion time.
  PETRUCHIO. Marry, did; rememb'red,
    bid mar time.
    Go, hop kennel home,
    hop custom, sir.
    it; hence! make it.
  KATHERINA. fashion'd gown,
    quaint, pleasing, commendable;
    Belike make puppet me.  
  PETRUCHIO. Why, true; means make puppet thee.
  TAILOR. worship means make puppet her.
  PETRUCHIO. O monstrous arrogance! Thou liest, thou thread, thou
      thimble,
    Thou yard, three-quarters, half-yard, quarter, nail,
    Thou flea, thou nit, thou winter-cricket thou-
    Brav'd mine house skein thread!
    Away, thou rag, thou quantity, thou remnant;
    bemete thee thy yard
    thou shalt prating whilst thou liv'st!
    thee, I, thou hast marr'd gown.
  TAILOR. worship deceiv'd; gown made
    master direction.
    Grumio gave order done.
  GRUMIO. gave order; gave stuff.
  TAILOR. desire made?
  GRUMIO. Marry, sir, needle thread.
  TAILOR. request cut?
  GRUMIO. Thou hast fac'd things.
  TAILOR. have.  
  GRUMIO. Face me. Thou hast brav'd men; brave me. I
    fac'd brav'd. thee, bid thy
    master cut gown; bid cut pieces.
    Ergo, thou liest.
  TAILOR. Why, note fashion testify.
  PETRUCHIO. Read it.
  GRUMIO. note lies in's throat, so.
  TAILOR.  [Reads]  'Imprimis, loose-bodied gown'-
  GRUMIO. Master, loose-bodied gown, sew the
    skirts beat death bottom brown bread; I
    gown.
  PETRUCHIO. Proceed.
  TAILOR.  [Reads]  'With small compass'd cape'-
  GRUMIO. confess cape.
  TAILOR.  [Reads]  'With trunk sleeve'-
  GRUMIO. confess sleeves.
  TAILOR.  [Reads]  'The sleeves curiously cut.'
  PETRUCHIO. Ay, villainy.
  GRUMIO. Error i' th' bill, sir; error i' th' bill! commanded the
    sleeves cut out, sew'd again;  
    prove thee, thy finger armed thimble.
  TAILOR. true say; thee place where, thou
    shouldst it.
  GRUMIO. thee straight; thou bill, give thy
    meteyard, spare me.
  HORTENSIO. God-a-mercy, Grumio! odds.
  PETRUCHIO. Well, sir, brief, gown me.
  GRUMIO. i' th' right, sir; 'tis mistress.
  PETRUCHIO. Go, thy master's use.
  GRUMIO. Villain, thy life! mistress' gown for
    thy master's use!
  PETRUCHIO. Why, sir, conceit that?
  GRUMIO. O, sir, conceit deeper for.
    mistress' gown master's use!
    O fie, fie, fie!
  PETRUCHIO.  [Aside]  Hortensio, thou wilt tailor paid.-
    hence; gone, more.
  HORTENSIO. Tailor, pay thee thy gown to-morrow;
    unkindness hasty words.
    Away, say; commend thy master.           Exit TAILOR  
  PETRUCHIO. Well, come, Kate; father's
    honest habiliments;
    purses proud, garments poor;
    'tis mind makes body rich;
    sun breaks darkest clouds,
    honour peereth meanest habit.
    What, jay precious lark
    feathers beautiful?
    adder eel
    painted skin contents eye?
    O no, good Kate; art thou worse
    poor furniture array.
    thou account'st shame, lay me;
    frolic; forthwith
    feast sport thy father's house.
    call men, straight him;
    bring horses Long-lane end;
    mount, thither walk foot.
    see; 'tis o'clock,
    dinner-time.  
  KATHERINA. dare assure you, sir, 'tis two,
    'twill supper-time ere there.
  PETRUCHIO. ere horse.
    speak, do, do,
    crossing it. Sirs, 't alone;
    to-day; ere do,
    o'clock is.
  HORTENSIO. Why, gallant command sun.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Padua. BAPTISTA'S house

Enter TRANIO LUCENTIO, PEDANT dressed VINCENTIO

  TRANIO. Sir, house; call?
  PEDANT. Ay, else? And, deceived,
    Signior Baptista remember me
    twenty years ago Genoa,
    lodgers Pegasus.
  TRANIO. 'Tis well; hold own, case,
    austerity longeth father.

                       Enter BIONDELLO

  PEDANT. warrant you. But, sir, boy;
    'Twere good school'd.
  TRANIO. Fear him. Sirrah Biondello,
    duty throughly, advise you.
    Imagine 'twere Vincentio.
  BIONDELLO. Tut, fear me.  
  TRANIO. hast thou thy errand Baptista?
  BIONDELLO. told father Venice,
    look'd day Padua.
  TRANIO. Th'art tall fellow; hold thee drink.
    Baptista. Set countenance, sir.

                 Enter BAPTISTA, LUCENTIO CAMBIO

    Signior Baptista, happily met.
    [To PEDANT] Sir, gentleman told of;
    pray stand good father now;
    Give Bianca patrimony.
  PEDANT. Soft, son!
    Sir, leave: Padua
    gather debts, son Lucentio
    Made acquainted weighty cause
    love daughter himself;
    And- good report hear you,
    love beareth daughter,
    him- stay long,  
    content, good father's care,
    match'd; and, like
    worse I, agreement
    find ready willing
    consent bestow'd;
    curious you,
    Signior Baptista, hear well.
  BAPTISTA. Sir, pardon say.
    plainness shortness well.
    true son Lucentio here
    Doth love daughter, loveth him,
    dissemble deeply affections;
    therefore, this,
    father deal him,
    pass daughter sufficient dower,
    match made, done-
    son daughter consent.
  TRANIO. you, sir. best
    affied, assurance ta'en
    part's agreement stand?  
  BAPTISTA. house, Lucentio, know
    Pitchers ears, servants;
    Besides, Gremio heark'ning still,
    happily interrupted.
  TRANIO. lodging, you.
    doth father lie; night
    pass business privately well.
    Send daughter servant here;
    boy fetch scrivener presently.
    worst this, slender warning
    thin slender pittance.
  BAPTISTA. likes well. Cambio, hie home,
    bid Bianca make ready straight;
    And, will, hath happened-
    Lucentio's father arriv'd Padua,
    Lucentio's wife.      Exit LUCENTIO
  BIONDELLO. pray gods may, heart.
  TRANIO. Dally gods, thee gone.
                                                  Exit BIONDELLO
    Signior Baptista, lead way?  
    Welcome! mess cheer;
    Come, sir; Pisa.
  BAPTISTA. follow you.                                 Exeunt

            Re-enter LUCENTIO CAMBIO, BIONDELLO

  BIONDELLO. Cambio.
  LUCENTIO. say'st thou, Biondello?
  BIONDELLO. master wink laugh you?
  LUCENTIO. Biondello, that?
  BIONDELLO. Faith, nothing; left expound
    meaning moral signs tokens.
  LUCENTIO. pray thee moralize them.
  BIONDELLO. thus: Baptista safe, talking deceiving
    father deceitful son.
  LUCENTIO. him?
  BIONDELLO. daughter brought supper.
  LUCENTIO. then?
  BIONDELLO. priest Saint Luke's church command
    hours.  
  LUCENTIO. this?
  BIONDELLO. tell, busied a
    counterfeit assurance. assurance her, cum privilegio
    ad imprimendum solum; th' church priest, clerk, and
    sufficient honest witnesses.
    for, say,
    bid Bianca farewell day.
  LUCENTIO. Hear'st thou, Biondello?
  BIONDELLO. tarry. knew wench married afternoon
    garden parsley stuff rabbit; so
    you, sir; adieu, sir. master hath appointed to
    Saint Luke's bid priest ready you
    appendix.
 Exit
  LUCENTIO. will, contented.
    pleas'd; wherefore doubt?
    Hap hap may, roundly her;
    hard Cambio her.              Exit




SCENE V.
A public road

Enter PETRUCHIO, KATHERINA, HORTENSIO, SERVANTS

  PETRUCHIO. on, God's name; father's.
    Good Lord, bright goodly shines moon!
  KATHERINA. moon? sun! moonlight now.
  PETRUCHIO. moon shines bright.
  KATHERINA. sun shines bright.
  PETRUCHIO. mother's son, myself,
    moon, star, list,
    ere journey father's house.
    fetch horses back again.
    Evermore cross'd cross'd; cross'd!
  HORTENSIO. says, go.
  KATHERINA. Forward, pray, far,
    moon, sun, please;
    call rush-candle,
    Henceforth vow me.
  PETRUCHIO. moon.
  KATHERINA. moon.  
  PETRUCHIO. Nay, lie; blessed sun.
  KATHERINA. Then, God bless'd, blessed sun;
    sun not, not;
    moon mind.
    nam'd, is,
    Katherine.
  HORTENSIO. Petruchio, thy ways, field won.
  PETRUCHIO. Well, forward, forward! bowl run,
    unluckily bias.
    But, soft! Company coming here.

                            Enter VINCENTIO

    [To VINCENTIO]  Good-morrow, gentle mistress; away?-
    me, sweet Kate, too,
    Hast thou beheld fresher gentlewoman?
    war white red cheeks!
    stars spangle heaven beauty
    eyes heavenly face?
    Fair lovely maid, good day thee.  
    Sweet Kate, embrace beauty's sake.
  HORTENSIO. 'A make man mad, make woman him.
  KATHERINA. Young budding virgin, fair fresh sweet,
    away, thy abode?
    Happy parents fair child;
    Happier man favourable stars
    Allots thee lovely bed-fellow.
  PETRUCHIO. Why, now, Kate, hope thou art mad!
    man, old, wrinkled, faded, withered,
    maiden, thou sayst is.
  KATHERINA. Pardon, father, mistaking eyes,
    bedazzled sun
    seemeth green;
    perceive thou art reverend father.
    Pardon, pray thee, mad mistaking.
  PETRUCHIO. Do, good grandsire, withal make known
    thou travellest- us,
    joyful thy company.
  VINCENTIO. Fair sir, merry mistress,
    strange encounter amaz'd me,  
    call'd Vincentio, dwelling Pisa,
    bound Padua, visit
    son mine, long seen.
  PETRUCHIO. name?
  VINCENTIO. Lucentio, gentle sir.
  PETRUCHIO. Happily met; happier thy son.
    law, reverend age,
    entitle thee loving father:
    sister wife, gentlewoman,
    Thy son hath married. not,
    grieved- good esteem,
    dowry wealthy, worthy birth;
    Beside, qualified beseem
    spouse noble gentleman.
    embrace Vincentio;
    wander thy honest son,
    thy arrival full joyous.
  VINCENTIO. true; pleasure,
    pleasant travellers, break jest
    company overtake?  
  HORTENSIO. assure thee, father, is.
  PETRUCHIO. Come, along, truth hereof;
    merriment hath made thee jealous.
                                        Exeunt HORTENSIO
  HORTENSIO. Well, Petruchio, put heart.
    widow; froward,
    hast thou taught Hortensio untoward.         Exit

ACT V. SCENE I.
Padua. LUCENTIO'S house

Enter BIONDELLO, LUCENTIO, BIANCA; GREMIO before

  BIONDELLO. Softly swiftly, sir, priest ready.
  LUCENTIO. fly, Biondello; chance at
    home, leave us.
  BIONDELLO. Nay, faith, church back, then
    back master's can.
                          Exeunt LUCENTIO, BIANCA, BIONDELLO
  GREMIO. marvel Cambio while.

           Enter PETRUCHIO, KATHERINA, VINCENTIO, GRUMIO,
                          ATTENDANTS

  PETRUCHIO. Sir, door; Lucentio's house;
    father's bears market-place;
    Thither I, leave you, sir.
  VINCENTIO. choose drink go;
    command here,  
    likelihood cheer toward.         [Knocks]
  GREMIO. busy within; knock louder.
                                [PEDANT window]
  PEDANT. knocks beat gate?
  VINCENTIO. Signior Lucentio within, sir?
  PEDANT. within, sir, spoken withal.
  VINCENTIO. man bring hundred pound make
    merry withal?
  PEDANT. hundred pounds yourself; so
    long live.
  PETRUCHIO. Nay, told son beloved Padua. Do
    hear, sir? leave frivolous circumstances, pray tell
    Signior Lucentio father Pisa, here
    door speak him.
  PEDANT. Thou liest: father Padua, looking
    window.
  VINCENTIO. Art thou father?
  PEDANT. Ay, sir; mother says, her.
  PETRUCHIO.  [To VINCENTIO]  Why, now, gentleman!
    Why, flat knavery man's name.  
  PEDANT. Lay hands villain; 'a means cozen
    city countenance.

                       Re-enter BIONDELLO

  BIONDELLO. church together. God send 'em
    good shipping! here? Mine master, Vicentio! we
    undone brought nothing.
  VINCENTIO.  [Seeing BIONDELLO]  hither, crack-hemp.
  BIONDELLO. hope choose, sir.
  VINCENTIO. hither, rogue. What, forgot me?
  BIONDELLO. Forgot you! No, sir. forget you, never
    life.
  VINCENTIO. What, notorious villain, didst thou thy
    master's father, Vincentio?
  BIONDELLO. What, worshipful master? Yes, marry, sir; see
    window.
  VINCENTIO. Is't so, indeed?               [He beats BIONDELLO]
  BIONDELLO. Help, help, help! madman murder me.
 Exit  
  PEDANT. Help, son! help, Signior Baptista!     Exit above
  PETRUCHIO. Prithee, Kate, stand end this
    controversy.                              [They stand aside]

       Re-enter PEDANT below; BAPTISTA, TRANIO, SERVANTS

  TRANIO. Sir, offer beat servant?
  VINCENTIO. I, sir? Nay, you, sir? O immortal gods!
    O fine villain! silken doublet, velvet hose, scarlet cloak,
    copatain hat! O, undone! undone! play the
    good husband home, son servant spend the
    university.
  TRANIO. now! matter?
  BAPTISTA. What, man lunatic?
  TRANIO. Sir, sober ancient gentleman habit, but
    words show madman. Why, sir, 'cerns I
    wear pearl gold? good father, to
    maintain it.
  VINCENTIO. Thy father! O villain! sailmaker Bergamo.
  BAPTISTA. mistake, sir; mistake, sir. Pray,  
    name?
  VINCENTIO. name! knew name! brought him
    years old, Tranio.
  PEDANT. Away, away, mad ass! Lucentio; mine
    son, heir lands me, Signior Vicentio.
  VINCENTIO. Lucentio! O, hath murd'red master! Lay hold on
    him, charge you, Duke's name. O, son, son! Tell
    me, thou villain, son, Lucentio?
  TRANIO. Call officer.

                      Enter OFFICER

    Carry mad knave gaol. Father Baptista, charge you
    forthcoming.
  VINCENTIO. Carry gaol!
  GREMIO. Stay, Officer; prison.
  BAPTISTA. Talk not, Signior Gremio; prison.
  GREMIO. heed, Signior Baptista, cony-catch'd in
    business; dare swear Vincentio.
  PEDANT. Swear thou dar'st.  
  GREMIO. Nay, dare swear it.
  TRANIO. thou wert Lucentio.
  GREMIO. Yes, thee Signior Lucentio.
  BAPTISTA. dotard; gaol him!
  VINCENTIO. strangers hal'd abus'd. O monstrous
    villain!

          Re-enter BIONDELLO, LUCENTIO BIANCA

  BIONDELLO. O, spoil'd; yonder is! Deny him, forswear
    him, undone.
         Exeunt BIONDELLO, TRANIO, PEDANT, fast be
  LUCENTIO.  [Kneeling]  Pardon, sweet father.
  VINCENTIO. Lives sweet son?
  BIANCA. Pardon, dear father.
  BAPTISTA. hast thou offended?
    Lucentio?
  LUCENTIO. Lucentio,
    son Vincentio,
    marriage made thy daughter mine,  
    counterfeit supposes blear'd thine eyne.
  GREMIO. packing, witness, deceive all!
  VINCENTIO. damned villain, Tranio,
    fac'd brav'd matter so?
  BAPTISTA. Why, me, Cambio?
  BIANCA. Cambio chang'd Lucentio.
  LUCENTIO. Love wrought miracles. Bianca's love
    Made exchange state Tranio,
    bear countenance town;
    happily arrived last
    wished haven bliss.
    Tranio did, enforc'd to;
    pardon him, sweet father, sake.
  VINCENTIO. slit villain's nose to
    gaol.
  BAPTISTA.  [To LUCENTIO]  hear, sir? married my
    daughter good will?
  VINCENTIO. Fear not, Baptista; content you, to; I
    revenged villainy.               Exit
  BAPTISTA. sound depth knavery.       Exit  
  LUCENTIO. pale, Bianca; thy father frown.
                                      Exeunt LUCENTIO BIANCA
  GREMIO. cake dough, rest;
    hope share feast.           Exit
  KATHERINA. Husband, follow end ado.
  PETRUCHIO. kiss me, Kate, will.
  KATHERINA. What, midst street?
  PETRUCHIO. What, art thou asham'd me?
  KATHERINA. No, sir; God forbid; asham'd kiss.
  PETRUCHIO. Why, then, home again. Come, sirrah, away.
  KATHERINA. Nay, give thee kiss; pray thee, love, stay.
  PETRUCHIO. well? Come, sweet Kate:
    never, late.           Exeunt




SCENE II.
LUCENTIO'S house

Enter BAPTISTA, VINCENTIO, GREMIO, PEDANT, LUCENTIO, BIANCA,
PETRUCHIO, KATHERINA, HORTENSIO, WIDOW. SERVINGMEN TRANIO,
BIONDELLO, GRUMIO, bringing banquet

  LUCENTIO. last, long, jarring notes agree;
    time raging war done
    smile scapes perils overblown.
    fair Bianca, bid father welcome,
    self-same kindness thine.
    Brother Petruchio, sister Katherina,
    thou, Hortensio, thy loving widow,
    Feast best, house.
    banquet close stomachs up
    great good cheer. Pray you, sit down;
    sit chat eat.            [They sit]
  PETRUCHIO. sit sit, eat eat!
  BAPTISTA. Padua affords kindness, son Petruchio.
  PETRUCHIO. Padua affords kind.  
  HORTENSIO. sakes word true.
  PETRUCHIO. Now, life, Hortensio fears widow.
  WIDOW. trust afeard.
  PETRUCHIO. sensible, miss sense:
    Hortensio afeard you.
  WIDOW. giddy thinks world turns round.
  PETRUCHIO. Roundly replied.
  KATHERINA. Mistress, that?
  WIDOW. conceive him.
  PETRUCHIO. Conceives me! likes Hortensio that?
  HORTENSIO. widow conceives tale.
  PETRUCHIO. mended. Kiss that, good widow.
  KATHERINA. 'He giddy thinks world turns round.'
    pray meant that.
  WIDOW. husband, troubled shrew,
    Measures husband's sorrow woe;
    meaning.
  KATHERINA. meaning.
  WIDOW. Right, you.
  KATHERINA. mean, indeed, respecting you.  
  PETRUCHIO. her, Kate!
  HORTENSIO. her, widow!
  PETRUCHIO. hundred marks, Kate put down.
  HORTENSIO. office.
  PETRUCHIO. Spoke officer- ha' thee, lad.
                                           [Drinks HORTENSIO]
  BAPTISTA. likes Gremio quick-witted folks?
  GREMIO. me, sir, butt well.
  BIANCA. Head butt! hasty-witted body
    head butt head horn.
  VINCENTIO. Ay, mistress bride, hath awakened you?
  BIANCA. Ay, frighted me; sleep again.
  PETRUCHIO. Nay, not; begun,
    bitter jest two.
  BIANCA. bird? shift bush,
    pursue draw bow.
    all.
                             Exeunt BIANCA, KATHERINA, WIDOW
  PETRUCHIO. hath prevented me. Here, Signior Tranio,
    bird aim'd at, hit not;  
    health shot miss'd.
  TRANIO. O, sir, Lucentio slipp'd greyhound,
    runs himself, catches master.
  PETRUCHIO. good swift simile, currish.
  TRANIO. 'Tis well, sir, hunted yourself;
    'Tis thought deer hold bay.
  BAPTISTA. O, O, Petruchio! Tranio hits now.
  LUCENTIO. thee gird, good Tranio.
  HORTENSIO. Confess, confess; hath hit here?
  PETRUCHIO. 'A gall'd me, confess;
    And, jest glance me,
    'Tis ten maim'd outright.
  BAPTISTA. Now, good sadness, son Petruchio,
    thou hast veriest shrew all.
  PETRUCHIO. Well, no; therefore, assurance,
    send wife,
    wife obedient,
    doth send her,
    win wager propose.
  HORTENSIO. Content. wager?  
  LUCENTIO. Twenty crowns.
  PETRUCHIO. Twenty crowns?
    venture hawk hound,
    twenty times wife.
  LUCENTIO. hundred then.
  HORTENSIO. Content.
  PETRUCHIO. match! 'tis done.
  HORTENSIO. begin?
  LUCENTIO. I.
    Go, Biondello, bid mistress me.
  BIONDELLO. go.                                          Exit
  BAPTISTA. Son, half Bianca comes.
  LUCENTIO. halves; bear myself.

                          Re-enter BIONDELLO

    now! news?
  BIONDELLO. Sir, mistress sends word
    busy come.
  PETRUCHIO. How! busy, come!  
    answer?
  GREMIO. Ay, kind too.
    Pray God, sir, wife send worse.
  PETRUCHIO. hope better.
  HORTENSIO. Sirrah Biondello, entreat wife
    forthwith.                      Exit BIONDELLO
  PETRUCHIO. O, ho! entreat her!
    Nay, come.
  HORTENSIO. afraid, sir,
    can, entreated.

                            Re-enter BIONDELLO

    Now, wife?
  BIONDELLO. goodly jest hand:
    come; bids her.
  PETRUCHIO. Worse worse; come! O vile,
    Intolerable, endur'd!
    Sirrah Grumio, mistress;
    command me.                    Exit GRUMIO  
  HORTENSIO. answer.
  PETRUCHIO. What?
  HORTENSIO. not.
  PETRUCHIO. fouler fortune mine, end.

                             Re-enter KATHERINA

  BAPTISTA. Now, holidame, Katherina!
  KATHERINA. sir, send me?
  PETRUCHIO. sister, Hortensio's wife?
  KATHERINA. sit conferring parlour fire.
  PETRUCHIO. Go, fetch hither; deny come.
    Swinge soundly husbands.
    Away, say, bring straight.
                                                  Exit KATHERINA
  LUCENTIO. wonder, talk wonder.
  HORTENSIO. is. bodes.
  PETRUCHIO. Marry, peace bodes, love, quiet life,
    awful rule, supremacy;
    And, short, sweet happy.  
  BAPTISTA. fair befall thee, good Petruchio!
    wager thou hast won; ad
    losses twenty thousand crowns;
    dowry daughter,
    chang'd, been.
  PETRUCHIO. Nay, win wager yet,
    show sign obedience,
    new-built virtue obedience.

                 Re-enter KATHERINA BIANCA WIDOW

    comes, brings froward wives
    prisoners womanly persuasion.
    Katherine, cap not:
    bauble, throw underfoot.
                                            [KATHERINA complies]
  WIDOW. Lord, sigh
    Till brought silly pass!
  BIANCA. Fie! foolish duty call this?
  LUCENTIO. duty foolish too;  
    wisdom duty, fair Bianca,
    Hath cost hundred crowns supper-time!
  BIANCA. fool laying duty.
  PETRUCHIO. Katherine, charge thee, headstrong women
    duty owe lords husbands.
  WIDOW. Come, come, mocking; telling.
  PETRUCHIO. on, say; begin her.
  WIDOW. not.
  PETRUCHIO. shall. begin her.
  KATHERINA. Fie, fie! unknit threatening unkind brow,
    dart scornful glances eyes
    wound thy lord, thy king, thy governor.
    blots thy beauty frosts bite meads,
    Confounds thy fame whirlwinds shake fair buds,
    sense meet amiable.
    woman mov'd fountain troubled-
    Muddy, ill-seeming, thick, bereft beauty;
    so, dry thirsty
    deign sip touch drop it.
    Thy husband thy lord, thy life, thy keeper,  
    Thy head, thy sovereign; cares thee,
    thy maintenance commits body
    painful labour sea land,
    watch night storms, day cold,
    Whilst thou liest warm home, secure safe;
    craves tribute thy hands
    love, fair looks, true obedience-
    payment great debt.
    duty subject owes prince,
    woman oweth husband;
    froward, peevish, sullen, sour,
    obedient honest will,
    foul contending rebel
    graceless traitor loving lord?
    asham'd women simple
    offer war kneel peace;
    seek rule, supremacy, sway,
    bound serve, love, obey.
    bodies soft weak smooth,
    Unapt toll trouble world,  
    soft conditions hearts
    agree external parts?
    Come, come, froward unable worins!
    mind hath big yours,
    heart great, reason haply more,
    bandy word word frown frown;
    lances straws,
    strength weak, weakness past compare,
    are.
    vail stomachs, boot,
    place hands husband's foot;
    token duty, please,
    hand ready, ease.
  PETRUCHIO. Why, wench! on, kiss me, Kate.
  LUCENTIO. Well, thy ways, lad, thou shalt ha't.
  VINCENTIO. 'Tis good hearing children toward.
  LUCENTIO. harsh hearing women froward.
  PETRUCHIO. Come, Kate, bed.
    married, sped.
    [To LUCENTIO]  'Twas won wager, hit white;  
    winner, God give good night!
                                  Exeunt PETRUCHIO KATHERINA
  HORTENSIO. thy ways; thou hast tam'd curst shrow.
  LUCENTIO. 'Tis wonder, leave, tam'd so.
                                                          Exeunt

THE END

1612

THE TEMPEST

by William Shakespeare



DRAMATIS PERSONAE

  ALONSO, King Naples
  SEBASTIAN, brother
  PROSPERO, Duke Milan
  ANTONIO, brother, usurping Duke Milan
  FERDINAND, son King Naples
  GONZALO, honest counsellor

    Lords
  ADRIAN
  FRANCISCO
  CALIBAN, savage deformed slave
  TRINCULO, jester
  STEPHANO, drunken butler
  MASTER SHIP
  BOATSWAIN
  MARINERS

  MIRANDA, daughter Prospero

  ARIEL, airy spirit  

    Spirits
  IRIS
  CERES
  JUNO
  NYMPHS
  REAPERS
  Spirits attending Prospero

SCENE:
A ship sea; uninhabited island



THE TEMPEST
ACT I. SCENE 1

On ship sea; tempestuous noise thunder lightning heard

Enter SHIPMASTER BOATSWAIN

  MASTER. Boatswain!
  BOATSWAIN. Here, master; cheer?
  MASTER. Good! Speak th' mariners; fall to't yarely, or
    run aground; bestir, bestir.               Exit

                       Enter MARINERS

  BOATSWAIN. Heigh, hearts! cheerly, cheerly, hearts!
    yare, yare! topsail. Tend th' master's
    whistle. Blow till thou burst thy wind, room enough.

          Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, FERDINAND
                     GONZALO, OTHERS

  ALONSO. Good boatswain, care. master?  
    Play men.
  BOATSWAIN. pray now, below.
  ANTONIO. master, boson?
  BOATSWAIN. hear him? mar labour;
    cabins; assist storm.
  GONZALO. Nay, good, patient.
  BOATSWAIN. sea is. Hence! cares these
    roarers king? cabin! silence! Trouble
    not.
  GONZALO. Good, remember thou hast aboard.
  BOATSWAIN. love myself. are
    counsellor; command elements to
    silence, work peace present, not
    hand rope more. authority; cannot, give
    liv'd long, make ready
    cabin mischance hour, so
    hap.-Cheerly, good hearts!-Out way, say.
 Exit
  GONZALO. great comfort fellow. Methinks
    hath drowning mark him; complexion  
    perfect gallows. Stand fast, good Fate, hanging;
    make rope destiny cable, doth
    advantage. born hang'd, our
    case miserable.                                    Exeunt

                     Re-enter BOATSWAIN

  BOATSWAIN. topmast. Yare, lower, lower!
    Bring wi' th' maincourse.  [A cry within]  A
    plague howling! louder the
    weather office.

           Re-enter SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, GONZALO

    again! here? give o'er, and
    drown? mind sink?
  SEBASTIAN. pox o' throat, bawling, blasphemous,
    incharitable dog!
  BOATSWAIN. Work you, then.
  ANTONIO. Hang, cur; hang, whoreson, insolent noisemaker;  
    afraid drown'd thou art.
  GONZALO. warrant drowning, ship were
    stronger nutshell, leaky unstanched
    wench.
  BOATSWAIN. Lay a-hold, a-hold; set courses; off
    sea again; lay off.

                    Enter MARINERS, Wet
  MARINERS. lost! prayers, prayers! lost!
                                                          Exeunt
  BOATSWAIN. What, mouths cold?
  GONZALO. King Prince prayers!
    assist them,
    case theirs.
  SEBASTIAN. patience.
  ANTONIO. cheated lives drunkards.
    wide-chopp'd rascal-would thou mightst lie drowning
    washing ten tides!
  GONZALO. hang'd yet,
    drop water swear it,  
    gape wid'st glut him.
    [A confused noise within: Mercy us!
    split, split! Farewell, wife children!
    Farewell, brother! split, split, split!]
  ANTONIO. sink wi' th' King.
  SEBASTIAN. leave him.
                                    Exeunt ANTONIO SEBASTIAN
  GONZALO. give thousand furlongs sea for
    acre barren ground-long heath, brown furze, any
    thing. wills done, fain die
    dry death.                                            Exeunt




SCENE 2

The Island. PROSPERO'S cell

Enter PROSPERO MIRANDA

  MIRANDA. art, dearest father, have
    Put wild waters roar, allay them.
    sky, seems, pour stinking pitch,
    sea, mounting th' welkin's cheek,
    Dashes fire out. O, suffered
    suffer! brave vessel,
    doubt noble creature her,
    Dash'd pieces! O, cry knock
    heart! Poor souls, perish'd.
    god power, would
    sunk sea earth ere
    good ship swallow'd and
    fraughting souls her.
  PROSPERO. conected;
    amazement; piteous heart
    harm done.
  MIRANDA. O, woe day!  
  PROSPERO. harm.
    care thee,
    thee, dear one, thee, daughter, who
    Art ignorant thou art, nought knowing
    am, better
    Prospero, master full poor cell,
    thy greater father.
  MIRANDA. know
    meddle thoughts.
  PROSPERO. 'Tis time
    inform thee farther. Lend thy hand,
    pluck magic garment me. So,
                                          [Lays mantle]
    Lie art. Wipe thou thine eyes; comfort.
    direful spectacle wreck, touch'd
    virtue compassion thee,
    provision mine art
    safely ordered soul-
    No, perdition hair
    Betid creature vessel  
    thou heard'st cry, thou saw'st sink.
    Sit down, thou farther.
  MIRANDA. often
    Begun am; stopp'd,
    left bootless inquisition,
    Concluding 'Stay; yet.'
  PROSPERO. hour's come;
    minute bids thee ope thine ear.
    Obey, attentive. Canst thou remember
    time cell?
    thou canst; thou wast not
    years old.
  MIRANDA. Certainly, sir, can.
  PROSPERO. what? house, person?
    thing image, me, that
    Hath thy remembrance?
  MIRANDA. 'Tis off,
    dream assurance
    remembrance warrants. not
    Four, five, women once, tended me?  
  PROSPERO. Thou hadst, more, Miranda. it
    lives thy mind? seest thou else
    dark backward abysm time?
    thou rememb'rest aught, ere thou cam'st here,
    thou cam'st thou mayst.
  MIRANDA. not.
  PROSPERO. Twelve year since, Miranda, twelve year since,
    Thy father Duke Milan, and
    prince power.
  MIRANDA. Sir, father?
  PROSPERO. Thy mother piece virtue, and
    thou wast daughter; thy father
    Duke Milan, heir
    princess worse issued.
  MIRANDA. O, heavens!
    foul play thence?
    blessed was't did?
  PROSPERO. Both, both, girl.
    foul play, thou say'st, heav'd thence;
    blessedly holp hither.  
  MIRANDA. O, heart bleeds
    o' th' teen turn'd to,
    remembrance. you, farther.
  PROSPERO. brother thy uncle, call'd Antonio-
    pray thee, mark brother should
    perfidious. He, thyself
    world lov'd, put
    manage state; time
    signories first,
    Prospero prime duke, reputed
    dignity, liberal arts
    parallel, study-
    government cast brother
    state grew stranger, transported
    rapt secret studies. Thy false uncle-
    Dost thou attend me?
  MIRANDA. Sir, heedfully.
  PROSPERO. perfected grant suits,
    deny them, t' advance, who
    trash over-topping, created  
    creatures mine, say, chang'd 'em,
    form'd 'em; key
    officer office, set hearts i' th' state
    tune pleas'd ear; was
    ivy hid princely trunk
    suck'd verdure on't. Thou attend'st not.
  MIRANDA. O, good sir, do!
  PROSPERO. pray thee, mark me.
    neglecting worldly ends, dedicated
    closeness bettering mind
    which, retir'd,
    O'er-priz'd popular rate, false brother
    Awak'd evil nature; trust,
    good parent, beget him
    falsehood, contrary great
    trust was; limit,
    confidence sans bound. lorded,
    revenue yielded,
    power exact, one
    truth, telling it,  
    Made sinner memory,
    credit lie-he believe
    Duke; o' th' substitution,
    executing th' outward face royalty
    prerogative. ambition growing-
    Dost thou hear?
  MIRANDA. tale, sir, cure deafness.
  PROSPERO. screen part play'd
    play'd for, be
    Absolute Milan. Me, poor man-my library
    dukedom large enough-of temporal royalties
    thinks incapable; confederates,
    dry sway, wi' th' King Naples,
    give annual tribute, homage,
    Subject coronet crown, bend
    dukedom, unbow'd-alas, poor Milan!-
    ignoble stooping.
  MIRANDA. O heavens!
  PROSPERO. Mark condition, th' event, me
    brother.  
  MIRANDA. sin
    nobly grandmother:
    Good wombs borne bad sons.
  PROSPERO. condition:
    King Naples, enemy
    inveterate, hearkens brother's suit;
    was, he, lieu o' th' premises,
    homage, tribute,
    presently extirpate mine
    dukedom, confer fair Milan
    honours brother. Whereon,
    treacherous army levied, midnight
    Fated th' purpose, Antonio open
    gates Milan; and, i' th' dead darkness,
    ministers th' purpose hurried thence
    thy crying self.
  MIRANDA. Alack, pity!
    I, rememb'ring cried then,
    cry o'er again; hint
    wrings mine eyes to't.  
  PROSPERO. Hear further,
    bring thee present busines
    now's 's; story
    impertinent.
  MIRANDA. Wherefore not
    hour destroy us?
  PROSPERO. demanded, wench!
    tale provokes question. Dear, durst not,
    dear love people bore me; set
    mark bloody business; but
    colours fairer painted foul ends.
    few, hurried aboard bark;
    Bore leagues sea, prepared
    rotten carcass butt, rigg'd,
    tackle, sail, mast; rats
    Instinctively quit it. hoist us,
    cry th' sea, roar'd us; sigh
    th' winds, pity, sighing back again,
    loving wrong.
  MIRANDA. Alack, trouble  
    you!
  PROSPERO. O, cherubin
    Thou wast preserve me! Thou didst smile,
    Infused fortitude heaven,
    deck'd sea drops full salt,
    burden groan'd; rais'd me
    undergoing stomach, bear up
    ensue.
  MIRANDA. ashore?
  PROSPERO. Providence divine.
    food fresh water that
    noble Neapolitan, Gonzalo,
    charity, appointed
    Master design, give us, with
    Rich garments, linens, stuffs, necessaries,
    steaded much; so, gentleness,
    Knowing lov'd books, furnish'd me
    mine library volumes that
    prize dukedom.
  MIRANDA.  
    man!
  PROSPERO. arise.                    [Puts mantle]
    Sit still, hear sea-sorrow.
    island arriv'd; here
    I, thy schoolmaster, made thee profit
    princess' can, time
    vainer hours, tutors careful.
  MIRANDA. Heavens for't! now, pray you,
      sir,
    'tis beating mind, reason
    raising sea-storm?
  PROSPERO. forth:
    accident strange, bountiful Fortune,
    dear lady, hath mine enemies
    Brought shore; prescience
    find zenith doth depend upon
    auspicious star, influence
    court not, omit, fortunes
    droop. cease questions;
    Thou art inclin'd sleep; 'tis good dullness,  
    give way. thou canst choose.
                                                [MIRANDA sleeps]
    away, servant; come; ready now.
    Approach, Ariel. Come.

                        Enter ARIEL

  ARIEL. hail, great master! grave sir, hail! come
    answer thy pleasure; be't fly,
    swim, dive fire, ride
    curl'd clouds. thy strong bidding task
    Ariel quality.
  PROSPERO. Hast thou, spirit,
    Perform'd point tempest bade thee?
  ARIEL. article.
    boarded King's ship; beak,
    waist, deck, cabin,
    flam'd amazement. divide,
    burn places; topmast,
    yards, bowsprit, flame distinctly,  
    meet join Jove's lightning, precursors
    O' th' dreadful thunder-claps, momentary
    sight-outrunning not; fire cracks
    sulphurous roaring mighty Neptune
    besiege, make bold waves tremble,
    Yea, dread trident shake.
  PROSPERO. brave spirit!
    firm, constant, coil
    infect reason?
  ARIEL. soul
    felt fever mad, play'd
    tricks desperation. mariners
    Plung'd foaming brine, quit vessel,
    afire me; King's son, Ferdinand,
    hair up-staring-then reeds, hair-
    man leapt; cried 'Hell empty,
    devils here.'
  PROSPERO. Why, spirit!
    nigh shore?
  ARIEL. Close by, master.  
  PROSPERO. they, Ariel, safe?
  ARIEL. hair perish'd;
    sustaining garments blemish,
    fresher before; and, thou bad'st me,
    troops dispers'd 'bout isle.
    King's son landed himself,
    left cooling air sighs
    odd angle isle, sitting,
    arms sad knot.
  PROSPERO. King's ship,
    mariners, thou hast dispos'd,
    rest o' th' fleet?
  ARIEL. Safely harbour
    King's ship; deep nook, once
    Thou call'dst midnight fetch dew
    still-vex'd Bermoothes, hid;
    mariners hatches stowed,
    Who, charm join'd suff'red labour,
    left asleep; rest o' th' fleet,
    dispers'd, met again,  
    Mediterranean flote
    Bound sadly home Naples,
    Supposing King's ship wreck'd,
    great person perish.
  PROSPERO. Ariel, thy charge
    perform'd; work.
    time o' th' day?
  ARIEL. Past mid season.
  PROSPERO. glasses. time 'twixt now
    spent preciously.
  ARIEL. toil? thou dost give pains,
    remember thee thou hast promis'd,
    perform'd me.
  PROSPERO. now, moody?
    is't thou canst demand?
  ARIEL. liberty.
  PROSPERO. time out? more!
  ARIEL. prithee,
    Remember thee worthy service,
    Told thee lies, made thee mistakings, serv'd  
    grudge grumblings. Thou didst promise
    bate full year.
  PROSPERO. Dost thou forget
    torment free thee?
  ARIEL. No.
  PROSPERO. Thou dost; think'st tread ooze
    salt deep,
    run sharp wind north,
    business veins o' th' earth
    bak'd frost.
  ARIEL. not, sir.
  PROSPERO. Thou liest, malignant thing. Hast thou forgot
    foul witch Sycorax, age envy
    grown hoop? Hast thou forgot her?
  ARIEL. No, sir.
  PROSPERO. Thou hast. born?
    Speak; me.
  ARIEL. Sir, Argier.
  PROSPERO. O, so? must
    month recount thou hast been,  
    thou forget'st. damn'd witch Sycorax,
    mischiefs manifold, sorceries terrible
    enter human hearing, Argier
    Thou know'st banish'd; thing did
    life. true?
  ARIEL. Ay, sir.
  PROSPERO. blue-ey'd hag brought child,
    left th'sailors. Thou, slave,
    thou report'st thyself, wast servant;
    And, thou wast spirit delicate
    act earthy abhorr'd commands,
    Refusing grand hests, confine thee,
    potent ministers,
    unmitigable rage,
    cloven pine; rift
    Imprison'd thou didst painfully remain
    dozen years; space died,
    left thee there, thou didst vent thy groans
    fast mill-wheels strike. island-
    Save son litter here,  
    freckl'd whelp, hag-born-not honour'd with
    human shape.
  ARIEL. Yes, Caliban son.
  PROSPERO. Dull thing, so; he, Caliban
    service. Thou know'st
    torment find thee in; thy groans
    make wolves howl, penetrate breasts
    ever-angry bears; torment
    lay damn'd, Sycorax
    undo. mine art,
    arriv'd heard thee, made gape
    pine, thee out.
  ARIEL. thee, master.
  PROSPERO. thou murmur'st, rend oak
    peg thee knotty entrails, till
    Thou hast howl'd twelve winters.
  ARIEL. Pardon, master;
    correspondent command,
    spriting gently.
  PROSPERO. so; days  
    discharge thee.
  ARIEL. noble master!
    do? what. do?
  PROSPERO. make thyself nymph o' th' sea; subject
    sight thine mine, invisible
    eyeball else. shape,
    't. Go, diligence!
                                                      Exit ARIEL
    Awake, dear heart, awake; thou hast slept well;
    Awake.
  MIRANDA. strangeness story put
    Heaviness me.
  PROSPERO. Shake off. on,
    visit Caliban, slave, never
    Yields kind answer.
  MIRANDA. 'Tis villain, sir,
    love on.
  PROSPERO. 'tis,
    miss him: make fire,
    Fetch wood, serves offices  
    profit us. ho! slave! Caliban!
    Thou earth, thou! Speak.
  CALIBAN.   [ Within]  wood within.
  PROSPERO. forth, say; business thee.
    Come, thou tortoise! when?

             Re-enter ARIEL water-nymph

    Fine apparition! quaint Ariel,
    Hark thine ear.
  ARIEL. lord, done.                         Exit
  PROSPERO. Thou poisonous slave, devil himself
    thy wicked dam, forth!

                       Enter CALIBAN

  CALIBAN. wicked dew e'er mother brush'd
    raven's feather unwholesome fen
    Drop both! south-west blow ye
    blister o'er!  
  PROSPERO. this, sure, to-night thou shalt cramps,
    Side-stitches pen thy breath up; urchins
    Shall, vast night work,
    exercise thee; thou shalt pinch'd
    thick honeycomb, pinch stinging
    bees made 'em.
  CALIBAN. eat dinner.
    island's mine, Sycorax mother,
    thou tak'st me. thou cam'st first,
    Thou strok'st made me, wouldst give me
    Water berries in't, teach how
    bigger light, less,
    burn day night; lov'd thee,
    show'd thee qualities o' th' isle,
    fresh springs, brine-pits, barren place fertile.
    Curs'd so! charms
    Sycorax, toads, beetles, bats, light you!
    subjects have,
    mine king; sty me
    hard rock, whiles  
    rest o' th' island.
  PROSPERO. Thou lying slave,
    stripes move, kindness! us'd thee,
    Filth thou art, human care, lodg'd thee
    mine cell, till thou didst seek violate
    honour child.
  CALIBAN. O ho, O ho! Would't done.
    Thou didst prevent me; peopl'd else
    isle Calibans.
  MIRANDA. Abhorred slave,
    print goodness wilt take,
    capable ill! pitied thee,
    pains make thee speak, taught thee hour
    thing other. thou didst not, savage,
    thine meaning, wouldst gabble like
    thing brutish, endow'd thy purposes
    words made known. thy vile race,
    thou didst learn, in't good natures
    abide with; wast thou
    Deservedly confin'd rock, hadst  
    Deserv'd prison.
  CALIBAN. taught language, profit on't
    Is, curse. red plague rid you
    learning language!
  PROSPERO. Hag-seed, hence!
    Fetch fuel. quick, thou 'rt best,
    answer business. Shrug'st thou, malice?
    thou neglect'st, dost unwillingly
    command, rack thee cramps,
    Fill thy bones aches, make thee roar,
    beasts tremble thy din.
  CALIBAN. No, pray thee.
    [Aside]  obey. art pow'r,
    control dam's god, Setebos,
    make vassal him.
  PROSPERO. So, slave; hence!                       Exit CALIBAN

         Re-enter ARIEL invisible, playing ad singing;
                     FERDINAND following
  
                          ARIEL'S SONG.
            yellow sands,
              hands;
            Curtsied kiss'd,
              wild waves whist,
            Foot featly there,
            And, sweet sprites, burden bear.
              Hark, hark!
            [Burden dispersedly: Bow-wow.]
              watch dogs bark.
            [Burden dispersedly: Bow-wow.]
              Hark, hark! hear
            strain strutting chanticleer
              Cry, Cock-a-diddle-dow.
  FERDINAND. music be? I' th' air th'
    earth?
    sounds more; waits upon
    god o' th' island. Sitting bank,
    Weeping King father's wreck,
    music crept waters,  
    Allaying fury passion
    sweet air; follow'd it,
    hath drawn rather. 'tis gone.
    No, begins again.

                   ARIEL'S SONG
         Full fathom thy father lies;
           bones coral made;
         pearls eyes;
           doth fade
         doth suffer sea-change
         rich strange.
         Sea-nymphs hourly ring knell:
           [Burden: Ding-dong.]
         Hark! hear them-Ding-dong bell.

  FERDINAND. ditty remember drown'd father.
    mortal business, sound
    earth owes. hear me.
  PROSPERO. fringed curtains thine eye advance,  
    thou seest yond.
  MIRANDA. is't? spirit?
    Lord, about! me, sir,
    carries brave form. 'tis spirit.
  PROSPERO. No, wench; eats sleeps hath senses
    have, such. gallant thou seest
    wreck; stain'd
    grief, beauty's canker, thou mightst call him
    goodly person. hath lost fellows,
    strays find 'em.
  MIRANDA. call him
    thing divine; natural
    noble.
  PROSPERO.  [Aside]  on, see,
    soul prompts it. Spirit, fine spirit! free thee
    days this.
  FERDINAND. sure, goddess
    airs attend! Vouchsafe pray'r
    remain island;
    good instruction give  
    bear here. prime request,
    pronounce, is, O wonder!
    maid no?
  MIRANDA. wonder, sir;
    maid.
  FERDINAND. language? Heavens!
    speak speech,
    'tis spoken.
  PROSPERO. How? best?
    wert thou, King Naples heard thee?
  FERDINAND. single thing, now, wonders
    hear thee speak Naples. hear me;
    weep. Naples,
    mine eyes, ebb, beheld
    King father wreck'd.
  MIRANDA. Alack, mercy!
  FERDINAND. Yes, faith, lords, Duke Milan
    brave son twain.
  PROSPERO.  [Aside]  Duke Milan
    braver daughter control thee,  
    'twere fit do't. sight
    chang'd eyes. Delicate Ariel,
    set thee free this.  [To FERDINAND]  word, good
    sir;
    fear wrong; word.
  MIRANDA. speaks father ungently? This
    man e'er saw; first
    e'er sigh'd for. Pity move father
    inclin'd way!
  FERDINAND. O, virgin,
    affection forth, make you
    Queen Naples.
  PROSPERO. Soft, Sir! word more.
    [Aside]  either's pow'rs; swift
    busines
    uneasy make, light winning
    Make prize light.  [To FERDINAND]  word more; I
    charge thee
    thou attend me; thou dost usurp
    thou ow'st not; hast put thyself  
    island spy, win it
    me, lord on't.
  FERDINAND. No, man.
  MIRANDA. ill dwell temple.
    ill spirit fair house,
    Good things strive dwell with't.
  PROSPERO. Follow me.
    Speak him; traitor. Come;
    manacle thy neck feet together.
    Sea-water shalt thou drink; thy food be
    fresh-brook mussels, wither'd roots, husks
    acorn cradled. Follow.
  FERDINAND. No;
    resist entertainment till
    Mine enemy power.
                          [He draws, charmed moving]
  MIRANDA. O dear father,
    Make rash trial him, for
    gentle, fearful.
  PROSPERO. What, say,  
    foot tutor? Put thy sword up, traitor;
    mak'st show dar'st strike, thy conscience
    possess'd guilt. thy ward;
    disarm thee stick
    make thy weapon drop.
  MIRANDA. Beseech you, father!
  PROSPERO. Hence! Hang garments.
  MIRANDA. Sir, pity;
    surety.
  PROSPERO. Silence! word more
    make chide thee, hate thee. What!
    advocate impostor! hush!
    Thou think'st shapes he,
    Caliban. Foolish wench!
    th' men Caliban,
    angels.
  MIRANDA. affections
    humble; ambition
    goodlier man.
  PROSPERO. on; obey.  
    Thy nerves infancy again,
    vigour them.
  FERDINAND. are;
    spirits, dream, bound up.
    father's loss, weakness feel,
    wreck friends, man's threats
    subdu'd, light me,
    prison day
    Behold maid. corners o' th' earth
    liberty make of; space enough
    prison.
  PROSPERO.  [Aside]  works.  [To FERDINAND]  on.-
    Thou hast well, fine Ariel!  [To FERDINAND]  Follow
    me.
    [To ARIEL]  Hark thou shalt me.
  MIRANDA. comfort;
    father's nature, sir,
    appears speech; unwonted
    him.
  PROSPERO.  [To ARIEL]  Thou shalt free  
    mountain winds; do
    points command.
  ARIEL. th' syllable.
  PROSPERO.  [To FERDINAND]  Come, follow.  [To MIRANDA]
    Speak him.                                    Exeunt
