ACT II. SCENE 1

Another part island

Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, GONZALO, ADRIAN, FRANCISCO, OTHERS

  GONZALO. Beseech you, sir, merry; cause,
    all, joy; escape
    loss. hint woe
    common; day, sailor's wife,
    masters merchant, merchant,
    theme woe; miracle,
    preservation, millions
    speak us. wisely, good sir, weigh
    sorrow comfort.
  ALONSO. Prithee, peace.
  SEBASTIAN. receives comfort cold porridge.
  ANTONIO. visitor give o'er so.
  SEBASTIAN. Look, winding watch wit; by
    strike.
  GONZALO. Sir-
  SEBASTIAN. One-Tell.  
  GONZALO. grief entertain'd offer'd,
    th' entertainer-
  SEBASTIAN. dollar.
  GONZALO. Dolour him, indeed; spoken
    truer purpos'd.
  SEBASTIAN. wiselier meant you
    should.
  GONZALO. Therefore, lord-
  ANTONIO. Fie, spendthrift tongue!
  ALONSO. prithee, spare.
  GONZALO. Well, done; yet-
  SEBASTIAN. talking.
  ANTONIO. Which, Adrian, good wager, first
    begins crow?
  SEBASTIAN. cock.
  ANTONIO. cock'rel.
  SEBASTIAN. Done. wager?
  ANTONIO. laughter.
  SEBASTIAN. match!
  ADRIAN. island desert-  
  ANTONIO. Ha, ha, ha!
  SEBASTIAN. So, paid.
  ADRIAN. Uninhabitable, inaccessible-
  SEBASTIAN. Yet-
  ADRIAN. Yet-
  ANTONIO. miss't.
  ADRIAN. subtle, tender, delicate
    temperance.
  ANTONIO. Temperance delicate wench.
  SEBASTIAN. Ay, subtle; learnedly
    deliver'd.
  ADRIAN. air breathes sweetly.
  SEBASTIAN. lungs, rotten ones.
  ANTONIO. Or, 'twere perfum'd fen.
  GONZALO. advantageous life.
  ANTONIO. True; save means live.
  SEBASTIAN. none, little.
  GONZALO. lush lusty grass looks! green!
  ANTONIO. ground tawny.
  SEBASTIAN. eye green in't.  
  ANTONIO. misses much.
  SEBASTIAN. No; doth mistake truth totally.
  GONZALO. rarity is, almost
    credit-
  SEBASTIAN. vouch'd rarities are.
  GONZALO. garments, being, were, drench'd
    sea, hold, notwithstanding, freshness and
    glosses, new-dy'd, stain'd salt
    water.
  ANTONIO. pockets speak, it
    lies?
  SEBASTIAN. Ay, falsely pocket report.
  GONZALO. Methinks garments fresh when
    put Afric, marriage the
    King's fair daughter Claribel King Tunis.
  SEBASTIAN. 'Twas sweet marriage, prosper in
    return.
  ADRIAN. Tunis grac'd paragon
    queen.
  GONZALO. widow Dido's time.  
  ANTONIO. Widow! pox o' that! 'widow'
    in? Widow Dido!
  SEBASTIAN. 'widower Aeneas' too?
    Good Lord, it!
  ADRIAN. 'Widow Dido' you? make study of
    that. Carthage, Tunis.
  GONZALO. Tunis, sir, Carthage.
  ADRIAN. Carthage?
  GONZALO. assure you, Carthage.
  ANTONIO. word miraculous harp.
  SEBASTIAN. hath rais'd wall, houses too.
  ANTONIO. impossible matter make easy next?
  SEBASTIAN. carry island home his
    pocket, give son apple.
  ANTONIO. And, sowing kernels sea, bring
    islands.
  GONZALO. Ay.
  ANTONIO. Why, good time.
  GONZALO. Sir, talking garments now
    fresh Tunis marriage  
    daughter, Queen.
  ANTONIO. rarest e'er there.
  SEBASTIAN. Bate, beseech you, widow Dido.
  ANTONIO. O, widow Dido! Ay, widow Dido.
  GONZALO. not, sir, doublet fresh day I
    wore it? mean, sort.
  ANTONIO. 'sort' fish'd for.
  GONZALO. wore daughter's marriage?
  ALONSO. cram words mine ears against
    stomach sense. never
    Married daughter there; for, coming thence,
    son lost; and, rate, too,
    Italy removed
    ne'er her. O thou mine heir
    Naples Milan, strange fish
    Hath made meal thee?
  FRANCISCO. Sir, live;
    beat surges him,
    ride backs; trod water,
    enmity flung aside, breasted  
    surge swoln met him; bold head
    'Bove contentious waves kept, oared
    good arms lusty stroke
    th' shore, o'er wave-worn basis bowed,
    stooping relieve him. doubt
    alive land.
  ALONSO. No, no, gone.
  SEBASTIAN. Sir, great loss,
    bless Europe daughter,
    lose African;
    she, least, banish'd eye,
    hath wet grief on't.
  ALONSO. Prithee, peace.
  SEBASTIAN. kneel'd to, importun'd otherwise
    us; fair soul herself
    Weigh'd loathness obedience at
    end o' th' beam bow. lost son,
    fear, ever. Milan Naples have
    Moe widows business' making,
    bring men comfort them;  
    fault's own.
  ALONSO. dear'st o' th' loss.
  GONZALO. lord Sebastian,
    truth speak doth lack gentleness,
    time speak in; rub sore,
    bring plaster.
  SEBASTIAN. well.
  ANTONIO. chirurgeonly.
  GONZALO. foul weather all, good sir,
    cloudy.
  SEBASTIAN. Foul weather?
  ANTONIO. foul.
  GONZALO. plantation isle, lord-
  ANTONIO. sow 't nettle-seed.
  SEBASTIAN. docks, mallows.
  GONZALO. king on't, do?
  SEBASTIAN. Scape drunk wine.
  GONZALO. I' th' commonwealth contraries
    Execute things; kind traffic
    admit; magistrate;  
    Letters known; riches, poverty,
    service, none; contract, succession,
    Bourn, bound land, tilth, vineyard, none;
    metal, corn, wine, oil;
    occupation; men idle, all;
    women too, innocent pure;
    sovereignty-
  SEBASTIAN. king on't.
  ANTONIO. end commonwealth forgets the
    beginning.
  GONZALO. things common nature produce
    sweat endeavour. Treason, felony,
    Sword, pike, knife, gun, engine,
    have; nature bring forth,
    kind, foison, abundance,
    feed innocent people.
  SEBASTIAN. marrying 'mong subjects?
  ANTONIO. None, man; idle; whores knaves.
  GONZALO. perfection govern, sir,
    T' excel golden age.  
  SEBASTIAN. Save Majesty!
  ANTONIO. Long live Gonzalo!
  GONZALO. And-do mark me, sir?
  ALONSO. Prithee, more; thou dost talk me.
  GONZALO. Highness; to
    minister occasion gentlemen, such
    nimble lungs laugh
    nothing.
  ANTONIO. 'Twas laugh'd at.
  GONZALO. kind merry fooling to
    you; continue, laugh still.
  ANTONIO. blow given!
  SEBASTIAN. fall'n flat-long.
  GONZALO. gentlemen brave mettle; would
    lift moon sphere, continue
    weeks changing.

          Enter ARIEL, invisible, playing solemn music

  SEBASTIAN. so, a-bat-fowling.  
  ANTONIO. Nay, good lord, angry.
  GONZALO. No, warrant you; adventure my
    discretion weakly. laugh asleep, am
    heavy?
  ANTONIO. sleep, hear us.
                   [All sleep ALONSO, SEBASTIAN ANTONIO]
  ALONSO. What, asleep! mine eyes
    Would, themselves, shut thoughts; find
    inclin'd so.
  SEBASTIAN. you, sir,
    omit heavy offer it:
    seldom visits sorrow; doth,
    comforter.
  ANTONIO. two, lord,
    guard person rest,
    watch safety.
  ALONSO. you-wondrous heavy!
                                     [ALONSO sleeps. Exit ARIEL]
  SEBASTIAN. strange drowsiness possesses them!
  ANTONIO. quality o' th' climate.  
  SEBASTIAN. Why
    Doth eyelids sink? find not
    dispos'd sleep.
  ANTONIO. I; spirits nimble.
    fell all, consent;
    dropp'd, thunder-stroke. might,
    Worthy Sebastian? O, might! more!
    methinks thy face,
    thou shouldst be; th' occasion speaks thee; and
    strong imagination sees crown
    Dropping thy head.
  SEBASTIAN. What, art thou waking?
  ANTONIO. hear speak?
  SEBASTIAN. do; surely
    sleepy language, thou speak'st
    thy sleep. thou didst say?
    strange repose, asleep
    eyes wide open; standing, speaking, moving,
    fast asleep.
  ANTONIO. Noble Sebastian,  
    Thou let'st thy fortune sleep-die rather; wink'st
    Whiles thou art waking.
  SEBASTIAN. Thou dost snore distinctly;
    meaning thy snores.
  ANTONIO. custom; you
    too, heed me; do
    Trebles thee o'er.
  SEBASTIAN. Well, standing water.
  ANTONIO. teach flow.
  SEBASTIAN. so: ebb,
    Hereditary sloth instructs me.
  ANTONIO. O,
    knew purpose cherish,
    Whiles mock it! how, stripping it,
    invest it! Ebbing men indeed,
    often, bottom run
    fear sloth.
  SEBASTIAN. Prithee on.
    setting thine eye cheek proclaim
    matter thee; birth, indeed,  
    throes thee yield.
  ANTONIO. Thus, sir:
    lord weak remembrance, this
    memory
    earth'd, hath persuaded-
    spirit persuasion, only
    Professes persuade-the King son's alive,
    'Tis impossible undrown'd
    sleeps swims.
  SEBASTIAN. hope
    undrown'd.
  ANTONIO. O, 'no hope'
    great hope you! hope is
    high hope, even
    Ambition pierce wink beyond,
    doubt discovery there. grant me
    Ferdinand drown'd?
  SEBASTIAN. gone.
  ANTONIO. me,
    heir Naples?  
  SEBASTIAN. Claribel.
  ANTONIO. Queen Tunis; dwells
    Ten leagues man's life; Naples
    note, sun post,
    Man i' th' Moon's slow, till newborn chins
    rough razorable; whom
    sea-swallow'd, cast again,
    destiny, perform act
    Whereof past prologue, come
    discharge.
  SEBASTIAN. stuff this! you?
    'Tis true, brother's daughter's Queen Tunis;
    heir Naples; 'twixt regions
    space.
  ANTONIO. space ev'ry cubit
    cry 'How Claribel
    Measure back Naples? Tunis,
    Sebastian wake.' death
    hath seiz'd them; why, worse
    are. rule Naples  
    sleeps; lords prate
    amply unnecessarily
    Gonzalo; make
    chough deep chat. O, bore
    mind do! sleep this
    advancement! understand me?
  SEBASTIAN. Methinks do.
  ANTONIO. content
    Tender good fortune?
  SEBASTIAN. remember
    supplant brother Prospero.
  ANTONIO. True.
    garments sit me,
    feater before. brother's servants
    fellows; men.
  SEBASTIAN. But, conscience-
  ANTONIO. Ay, sir; lies that? 'twere kibe,
    'Twould put slipper; feel not
    deity bosom; twenty consciences
    stand 'twixt Milan, candied  
    melt, ere molest! lies brother,
    earth lies upon,
    like-that's dead;
    obedient steel, inches it,
    lay bed ever; whiles you, thus,
    perpetual wink aye put
    ancient morsel, Sir Prudence, who
    upbraid course. rest,
    suggestion cat laps milk;
    clock business that
    befits hour.
  SEBASTIAN. Thy case, dear friend,
    precedent; thou got'st Milan,
    Naples. Draw thy sword. stroke
    free thee tribute thou payest;
    King love thee.
  ANTONIO. Draw together;
    rear hand, like,
    fall Gonzalo.
  SEBASTIAN. O, word.                  [They talk apart]  

          Re-enter ARIEL, invisible, music song

  ARIEL. master art foresees danger
    you, friend, in; sends forth-
    project dies-to living.
                                        [Sings GONZALO'S ear]
    snoring lie,
    Open-ey'd conspiracy
    time doth take.
    life care,
    Shake slumber, beware.
    Awake, awake!

  ANTONIO. sudden.
  GONZALO. Now, good angels
    Preserve King!                               [They wake]
  ALONSO. Why, now?-Ho, awake!-Why drawn?
    Wherefore ghastly looking?
  GONZALO. matter?  
  SEBASTIAN. Whiles stood securing repose,
    now, heard hollow burst bellowing
    bulls, lions; did't wake you?
    struck mine ear terribly.
  ALONSO. heard nothing.
  ANTONIO. O, 'twas din fright monster's ear,
    make earthquake! roar
    herd lions.
  ALONSO. Heard this, Gonzalo?
  GONZALO. mine honour, sir, heard humming,
    strange too, awake me;
    shak'd you, sir, cried; mine eyes open'd,
    weapons drawn-there noise,
    verily. 'Tis stand guard,
    quit place. draw weapons.
  ALONSO. Lead ground; make further
    search
    poor son.
  GONZALO. Heavens beasts!
    is, sure, i' th' island.  
  ALONSO. Lead away.
  ARIEL. Prospero lord done;
    So, King, safely seek thy son.               Exeunt




SCENE 2

Another part island

Enter CALIBAN, burden wood. noise thunder heard

  CALIBAN. infections sun sucks up
    bogs, fens, flats, Prosper fall, make him
    inch-meal disease! spirits hear me,
    curse. pinch,
    Fright urchin-shows, pitch i' th' mire,
    lead me, firebrand, dark
    way, bid 'em; but
    trifle set me;
    apes mow chatter me,
    bite me; hedgehogs which
    Lie tumbling barefoot way, mount
    pricks footfall; I
    wound adders, cloven tongues
    hiss madness.

                         Enter TRINCULO  

    Lo, now, lo!
    spirit his, torment me
    bringing wood slowly. fall flat;
    Perchance mind me.
  TRINCULO. bush shrub bear any
    weather all, storm brewing; hear it
    sing i' th' wind. Yond black cloud, yond huge one,
    foul bombard shed liquor. If
    thunder before, to
    hide head. Yond cloud choose fall by
    pailfuls. here? man fish? dead or
    alive? fish: smells fish; ancient and
    fish-like smell; kind not-of-the-newest Poor-John. A
    strange fish! England now, was, and
    fish painted, holiday fool but
    give piece silver. monster
    make man; strange beast makes man; when
    give doit relieve lame beggar, they
    lay ten dead Indian. Legg'd  
    man, fins arms! Warm, o' troth! now
    loose opinion; hold longer: no
    fish, islander, hath suffered by
    thunderbolt.  [Thunder]  Alas, storm again! My
    creep gaberdine; no
    shelter hereabout. Misery acquaints man with
    strange bed-fellows. shroud till dregs
    storm past.

            Enter STEPHANO singing; bottle hand

  STEPHANO. sea, sea,
    die ashore-
    scurvy tune sing man's funeral;
    well, comfort.                            [Drinks]

    master, swabber, boatswain, I,
    gunner, mate,
    Lov'd Mall, Meg, Marian, Margery,
    car'd Kate;  
    tongue tang,
    cry sailor 'Go hang!'
    lov'd savour tar pitch,
    tailor scratch where'er itch.
    sea, boys, hang!

    scurvy tune too; comfort.
                                                        [Drinks]
  CALIBAN. torment me. O!
  STEPHANO. matter? devils here? you
    put tricks 's savages men Ind? Ha! I
    scap'd drowning afeard four
    legs; hath said: proper man ever
    legs make give ground; it
    again, Stephano breathes at
    nostrils.
  CALIBAN. spirit torments me. O!
  STEPHANO. monster isle legs,
    hath got, it, ague. devil
    learn language? give  
    relief, that. recover him, and
    tame, Naples him, a
    present emperor trod neat's
    leather.
  CALIBAN. torment me, prithee; bring wood
    home faster.
  STEPHANO. fit now, talk the
    wisest. taste bottle; never
    drunk wine afore, remove fit. If
    recover him, tame, take
    him; pay hath him,
    soundly.
  CALIBAN. Thou dost hurt; thou wilt anon,
    thy trembling; Prosper works thee.
  STEPHANO. ways; open mouth; is
    give language you, cat. Open your
    mouth; shake shaking, you, and
    soundly; friend. Open
    chaps again.
  TRINCULO. voice; be-but  
    drown'd; devils. O, defend me!
  STEPHANO. legs voices; delicate monster!
    forward voice, now, speak his
    friend; backward voice utter foul speeches and
    detract. wine bottle recover
    him, ague. Come-Amen! pour some
    thy mouth.
  TRINCULO. Stephano!
  STEPHANO. Doth thy mouth call me? Mercy, mercy!
    devil, monster; leave him; I
    long spoon.
  TRINCULO. Stephano! thou beest Stephano, touch me, and
    speak me; Trinculo-be afeard-thy good
    friend Trinculo.
  STEPHANO. thou beest Trinculo, forth; pull
    lesser legs; Trinculo's legs, these
    they. Thou art Trinculo indeed! cam'st thou
    siege moon-calf? vent
    Trinculos?
  TRINCULO. kill'd thunderstroke.  
    art thou drown'd, Stephano? hope thou are
    drown'd. storm overblown? hid the
    dead moon-calf's gaberdine fear storm. And
    art thou living, Stephano? O Stephano, Neapolitans
    scap'd!
  STEPHANO. Prithee, turn about; stomach not
    constant.
  CALIBAN.  [Aside]  fine things, not
    sprites.
    brave god, bears celestial liquor.
    kneel him.
  STEPHANO. didst thou scape? cam'st thou hither?
    Swear bottle thou cam'st hither-I escap'd
    butt sack, sailors heaved o'erboard-
    bottle, made bark tree, with
    mine hands, cast ashore.
  CALIBAN. swear bottle thy true
    subject, liquor earthly.
  STEPHANO. Here; swear thou escap'dst.
  TRINCULO. Swum ashore, man, duck; swim  
    duck, sworn.
  STEPHANO.  [Passing bottle]  Here, kiss book. Though
    thou canst swim duck, thou art made a
    goose.
  TRINCULO. O Stephano, hast this?
  STEPHANO. butt, man; cellar rock by
    th' seaside, wine hid. now, moon-calf!
    thine ague?
  CALIBAN. Hast thou dropp'd heaven?
  STEPHANO. o' th' moon, assure thee; Man
    i' th' Moon, time was.
  CALIBAN. thee her, adore thee. My
    mistress show'd thee, thy dog thy bush.
  STEPHANO. Come, swear that; kiss book. will
    furnish anon contents. Swear.
                                                [CALIBAN drinks]
  TRINCULO. good light, shallow
    monster!
    afeard him! weak monster! Man i' th'
    Moon! poor credulous monster! drawn,  
    monster, good sooth!
  CALIBAN. show thee fertile inch o' th' island;
    kiss thy foot. prithee god.
  TRINCULO. light, perfidious drunken
    monster! god's asleep rob bottle.
  CALIBAN. kiss thy foot; swear thy
    subject.
  STEPHANO. on, then; down, swear.
  TRINCULO. laugh death puppy-
    headed monster. scurvy monster! find in
    heart beat him-
  STEPHANO. Come, kiss.
  TRINCULO. poor monster's drink. An
    abominable monster!
  CALIBAN. show thee springs; pluck thee
    berries;
    fish thee, thee wood enough.
    plague tyrant serve!
    bear sticks, follow thee,
    Thou wondrous man.  
  TRINCULO. ridiculous monster, make of
    poor drunkard!
  CALIBAN. prithee bring thee crabs grow;
    long nails dig thee pig-nuts;
    Show thee jay's nest, instruct thee how
    snare nimble marmoset; bring thee
    clust'ring filberts, thee
    Young scamels rock. Wilt thou me?
  STEPHANO. prithee now, lead more
    talking. Trinculo, King company else
    drown'd, inherit here. Here, bear bottle.
    Fellow Trinculo, fill again.
  CALIBAN.  [Sings drunkenly]  Farewell, master; farewell,
    farewell!
  TRINCULO. howling monster; drunken monster!
  CALIBAN. dams make fish;
    fetch firing
    requiring,
    scrape trenchering, wash dish.
    'Ban 'Ban, Ca-Caliban,  
    master-Get man.
    Freedom, high-day! high-day, freedom! freedom, high-
    day, freedom!
  STEPHANO. O brave monster! Lead way.                Exeunt

ACT III. SCENE 1

Before PROSPERO'S cell

Enter FERDINAND, hearing log

  FERDINAND. sports painful, their
    labour
    Delight sets off; kinds baseness
    nobly undergone, poor matters
    Point rich ends. task
    heavy odious, but
    mistress serve quickens dead,
    makes labours pleasures. O, is
    Ten times gentle father's crabbed;
    compos'd harshness. remove
    thousands logs, pile up,
    sore injunction; sweet mistress
    Weeps sees work, baseness
    executor. forget;
    sweet thoughts refresh labours,
    busy, it.
  
        Enter MIRANDA; PROSPERO distance, unseen

  MIRANDA. Alas, now; pray you,
    Work hard; lightning had
    Burnt logs enjoin'd pile.
    Pray, set rest you; burns,
    'Twill weep wearied you. father
    hard study; pray, now, rest yourself;
    safe hours.
  FERDINAND. O dear mistress,
    sun set discharge
    strive do.
  MIRANDA. sit down,
    bear logs while; pray give that;
    carry pile.
  FERDINAND. No, precious creature;
    crack sinews, break back,
    dishonour undergo,
    sit lazy by.
  MIRANDA.  
    you; it
    ease; good it,
    against.
  PROSPERO.  [Aside]  Poor worm, thou art infected!
    visitation shows it.
  MIRANDA. wearily.
  FERDINAND. No, noble mistress; 'tis fresh morning me
    night. beseech you,
    Chiefly set prayers,
    name?
  MIRANDA. Miranda-O father,
    broke hest so!
  FERDINAND. Admir'd Miranda!
    dearest world! Full lady
    ey'd regard; time
    Th' harmony tongues hath bondage
    Brought diligent ear; virtues
    lik'd women, any
    full soul, defect her
    quarrel noblest grace ow'd,  
    put foil; you, O you,
    perfect peerless, created
    creature's best!
  MIRANDA. know
    sex; woman's face remember,
    Save, glass, mine own; seen
    call men you, good friend,
    dear father. features abroad,
    skilless of; but, modesty,
    jewel dower, wish
    companion world you;
    imagination form shape,
    yourself, of. prattle
    wildly, father's precepts
    forget.
  FERDINAND. am, condition,
    prince, Miranda; think, king-
    so!-and endure
    wooden slavery suffer
    flesh-fly blow mouth. Hear soul speak:  
    instant you, did
    heart fly service; resides
    make slave it; sake
    patient log-man.
  MIRANDA. love me?
  FERDINAND. O heaven, O earth, bear witness sound,
    crown profess kind event,
    speak true! hollowly, invert
    boded mischief! I,
    limit i' th' world,
    love, prize, honour you.
  MIRANDA. fool
    weep glad of.
  PROSPERO.  [Aside]  Fair encounter
    rare affections! Heavens rain grace
    breeds 'em!
  FERDINAND. Wherefore weep you?
  MIRANDA. mine unworthiness, dare offer
    desire give, take
    die want. trifling;  
    seeks hide itself,
    bigger bulk shows. Hence, bashful cunning!
    prompt me, plain holy innocence!
    wife, marry me;
    not, die maid. fellow
    deny me; servant,
    no.
  FERDINAND. mistress, dearest;
    humble ever.
  MIRANDA. husband, then?
  FERDINAND. Ay, heart willing
    bondage e'er freedom. hand.
  MIRANDA. mine, heart in't. farewell
    Till half hour hence.
  FERDINAND. thousand thousand!
                          Exeunt FERDINAND MIRANDA severally
  PROSPERO. glad be,
    surpris'd withal; rejoicing
    more. book;
    ere supper time perform  
    business appertaining.                             Exit




SCENE 2

Another part island

Enter CALIBAN, STEPHANO, TRINCULO

  STEPHANO. me-when butt drink
    water, drop before; bear up, board
    'em. Servant-monster, drink me.
  TRINCULO. Servant-monster! folly island! They
    isle: of
    them; th' brain'd us, state
    totters.
  STEPHANO. Drink, servant-monster, bid thee; thy
    eyes set thy head.
  TRINCULO. set else? brave
    monster indeed, set tail.
  STEPHANO. man-monster hath drown'd tongue in
    sack. part, sea drown me; swam, ere
    recover shore, thirty leagues, off
    on. light, thou shalt lieutenant,
    monster, standard.
  TRINCULO. lieutenant, list; standard.  
  STEPHANO. run, Monsieur Monster.
  TRINCULO. neither; lie dogs, and
    neither.
  STEPHANO. Moon-calf, speak thy life, thou beest
    good moon-calf.
  CALIBAN. thy honour? lick thy shoe.
    serve him; valiant.
  TRINCULO. Thou liest, ignorant monster: case
    justle constable. Why, thou debosh'd fish, thou,
    man coward hath drunk sack
    to-day? Wilt thou monstrous lie, but
    half fish half monster?
  CALIBAN. Lo, mocks me! Wilt thou him, my
    lord?
  TRINCULO. 'Lord' quoth he! monster such
    natural!
  CALIBAN. Lo, lo again! Bite death, prithee.
  STEPHANO. Trinculo, good tongue head; if
    prove mutineer-the tree! poor monster's
    subject, suffer indignity.  
  CALIBAN. noble lord. Wilt thou pleas'd to
    hearken suit made thee?
  STEPHANO. Marry I; kneel repeat it; stand,
    Trinculo.

                     Enter ARIEL, invisible

  CALIBAN. told thee before, subject tyrant,
    sorcerer, cunning hath cheated the
    island.
  ARIEL. Thou liest.
  CALIBAN. Thou liest, thou jesting monkey, thou;
    valiant master destroy thee.
    lie.
  STEPHANO. Trinculo, trouble in's tale,
    hand, supplant teeth.
  TRINCULO. Why, nothing.
  STEPHANO. Mum, then, more. Proceed.
  CALIBAN. say, sorcery isle;
    it. thy greatness  
    Revenge him-for thou dar'st,
    thing dare not-
  STEPHANO. certain.
  CALIBAN. Thou shalt lord it, serve thee.
  STEPHANO. compass'd? Canst thou
    bring party?
  CALIBAN. Yea, yea, lord; yield thee asleep,
    thou mayst knock nail head.
  ARIEL. Thou liest; thou canst not.
  CALIBAN. pied ninny's this! Thou scurvy patch!
    beseech thy greatness, give blows,
    bottle him. gone
    drink nought brine; show him
    quick freshes are.
  STEPHANO. Trinculo, run danger; interrupt
    monster word and, hand, turn
    mercy o' doors, make stock-fish thee.
  TRINCULO. Why, I? nothing. farther
    off.
  STEPHANO. Didst thou lied?  
  ARIEL. Thou liest.
  STEPHANO. so? thou that.  [Beats him]  like
    this, give lie time.
  TRINCULO. give lie. o' wits and
    hearing too? pox o' bottle! sack and
    drinking do. murrain monster, devil
    fingers!
  CALIBAN. Ha, ha, ha!
  STEPHANO. Now, forward tale.-Prithee stand
    off.
  CALIBAN. Beat enough; time, beat
    too.
  STEPHANO. Stand farther. Come, proceed.
  CALIBAN. Why, told thee, 'tis custom him
    I' th' afternoon sleep; thou mayst brain him,
    seiz'd books; log
    Batter skull, paunch stake,
    cut wezand thy knife. Remember
    possess books; them
    sot, am, hath  
    spirit command; hate him
    rootedly I. Burn books.
    brave utensils-for calls them-
    Which, house, deck withal.
    deeply is
    beauty daughter; himself
    Calls nonpareil. woman
    Sycorax dam she;
    surpasseth Sycorax
    great'st least.
  STEPHANO. brave lass?
  CALIBAN. Ay, lord; thy bed, warrant,
    bring thee brave brood.
  STEPHANO. Monster, kill man; daughter I
    King Queen-save Graces!-and Trinculo
    thyself viceroys. Dost thou plot,
    Trinculo?
  TRINCULO. Excellent.
  STEPHANO. Give thy hand; beat thee; but
    thou liv'st, good tongue thy head.  
  CALIBAN. half hour asleep.
    Wilt thou destroy then?
  STEPHANO. Ay, mine honour.
  ARIEL. master.
  CALIBAN. Thou mak'st merry; full pleasure.
    jocund; troll catch
    taught while-ere?
  STEPHANO. thy request, monster, reason, any
    reason. on, Trinculo, sing.              [Sings]

    Flout 'em scout 'em,
    scout 'em flout 'em;
    Thought free.

  CALIBAN. tune.
                      [ARIEL plays tune tabor pipe]
  STEPHANO. same?
  TRINCULO. tune catch, play'd the
    picture Nobody.
  STEPHANO. thou beest man, show thyself thy  
    likeness; thou beest devil, take't thou list.
  TRINCULO. O, forgive sins!
  STEPHANO. dies pays debts. defy thee. Mercy
    us!
  CALIBAN. Art thou afeard?
  STEPHANO. No, monster, I.
  CALIBAN. afeard. isle full noises,
    Sounds, sweet airs, give delight, hurt not.
    thousand twangling instruments
    hum mine ears; voices,
    That, wak'd long sleep,
    make sleep again; then, dreaming,
    clouds methought open show riches
    Ready drop me, that, wak'd,
    cried dream again.
  STEPHANO. prove brave kingdom me, I
    music nothing.
  CALIBAN. Prospero destroy'd.
  STEPHANO. by; remember story.
  TRINCULO. sound away; follow it,  
    work.
  STEPHANO. Lead, monster; follow. see
    taborer; lays on.
  TRINCULO. Wilt come? follow, Stephano.             Exeunt




SCENE 3

Another part island

Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, GONZALO, ADRIAN, FRANCISCO, OTHERS

  GONZALO. By'r lakin, further, sir;
    bones ache. maze trod, indeed,
    forth-rights meanders! patience,
    rest me.
  ALONSO. lord, blame thee,
    attach'd weariness
    th' dulling spirits; sit rest.
    put hope, it
    longer flatterer; drown'd
    stray find, sea mocks
    frustrate search land. Well, go.
  ANTONIO.  [Aside SEBASTIAN]  glad he's
    hope.
    not, repulse, forgo purpose
    resolv'd t' effect.
  SEBASTIAN.  [Aside ANTONIO]  advantage  
    throughly.
  ANTONIO.  [Aside SEBASTIAN]  to-night;
    For, oppress'd travel, they
    not, cannot, vigilance
    fresh.
  SEBASTIAN.  [Aside ANTONIO]  say, to-night; more.

           Solemn strange music; PROSPERO the
           top, invisible. Enter strange SHAPES,
           bringing banquet; dance with
           gentle actions salutations; inviting the
           KING, etc., eat, depart

  ALONSO. harmony this? good friends, hark!
  GONZALO. Marvellous sweet music!
  ALONSO. Give kind keepers, heavens! these?
  SEBASTIAN. living drollery. believe
    unicorns; Arabia
    tree, phoenix' throne, phoenix
    hour reigning-there.  
  ANTONIO. both;
    credit, me,
    sworn 'tis true; travellers ne'er lie,
    fools home condemn 'em.
  GONZALO. Naples
    report now, me?
    say, islanders,
    certes people island,
    monstrous shape yet, note,
    manners gentle-kind of
    human generation find
    Many, nay, any.
  PROSPERO.  [Aside]  Honest lord,
    Thou hast well; present
    worse devils.
  ALONSO. muse
    shapes, gesture, sound, expressing,
    tongue, kind
    excellent dumb discourse.
  PROSPERO.  [Aside]  Praise departing.  
  FRANCISCO. vanish'd strangely.
  SEBASTIAN. matter, since
    left viands behind; stomachs.
    Will't taste here?
  ALONSO. I.
  GONZALO. Faith, sir, fear. boys,
    mountaineers,
    Dewlapp'd bulls, throats hanging 'em
    Wallets flesh? men
    heads stood breasts? find
    putter-out bring us
    Good warrant of.
  ALONSO. stand to, feed,
    last; matter, feel
    past. Brother, lord Duke,
    Stand to, we.

       Thunder lightning. Enter ARIEL, harpy;
       claps wings table; and, quaint
                device, banquet vanishes  

  ARIEL. men sin, Destiny,
    hath instrument lower world
    in't, never-surfeited sea
    Hath caus'd belch you; island
    man doth inhabit-you 'mongst men
    unfit live. made mad;
    such-like valour men hang drown
    proper selves.
                     [ALONSO, SEBASTIAN etc., draw swords]
    fools! fellows
    ministers Fate; elements
    swords temper'd well
    Wound loud winds, bemock'd-at stabs
    Kill still-closing waters, diminish
    dowle plume; fellow-ministers
    invulnerable. hurt,
    swords massy strengths
    uplifted. remember-
    business you-that  
    Milan supplant good Prospero;
    Expos'd sea, hath requit it,
    Him, innocent child; foul deed
    pow'rs, delaying, forgetting, have
    Incens'd seas shores, yea, creatures,
    peace. Thee thy son, Alonso,
    bereft; pronounce me
    Ling'ring perdition, worse death
    once, step step attend
    ways; wraths guard from-
    here, desolate isle, falls
    heads-is heart's sorrow,
    clear life ensuing.

        vanishes thunder; then, soft music, enter
        SHAPES again, dance, mocks mows,
                carrying table

  PROSPERO. Bravely figure harpy hast thou
    Perform'd, Ariel; grace had, devouring.  
    instruction hast thou bated
    thou hadst say; so, good life
    observation strange, meaner ministers
    kinds done. high charms work,
    mine enemies knit up
    distractions. pow'r;
    fits leave them, visit
    Young Ferdinand, suppose drown'd,
    mine lov'd darling.                   Exit above
  GONZALO. I' th' holy, sir, stand you
    strange stare?
  ALONSO. O, monstrous, monstrous!
    Methought billows spoke, told it;
    winds sing me; thunder,
    deep dreadful organ-pipe, pronounc'd
    Prosper; bass trespass.
    son i' th' ooze bedded; and
    seek deeper e'er plummet sounded,
    lie mudded.                          Exit
  SEBASTIAN. fiend time,  
    fight legions o'er.
  ANTONIO. thy second.      Exeunt SEBASTIAN ANTONIO
  GONZALO. desperate; great guilt,
    poison work great time after,
    gins bite spirits. beseech you,
    suppler joints, follow swiftly,
    hinder ecstasy
    provoke to.
  ADRIAN. Follow, pray you.                             Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE 1

Before PROSPERO'S cell

Enter PROSPERO, FERDINAND, MIRANDA

  PROSPERO. austerely punish'd you,
    compensation makes amends; for
    mine life,
    live; again
    tender thy hand. thy vexations
    trials thy love, thou
    Hast strangely stood test; here, afore heaven,
    ratify rich gift. O Ferdinand!
    smile boast off,
    thou shalt find outstrip praise,
    make halt her.
  FERDINAND. it
    oracle.
  PROSPERO. Then, gift, thine acquisition
    Wort'hily purchas'd, daughter. But
    thou dost break virgin-knot before
    sanctimonious ceremonies  
    full holy rite minist'red,
    sweet aspersion heavens fall
    make contract grow; barren hate,
    Sour-ey'd disdain, discord, bestrew
    union bed weeds loathly
    hate both. heed,
    Hymen's lamps light you.
  FERDINAND. hope
    quiet days, fair issue, long life,
    love 'tis now, murkiest den,
    opportune place, strong'st suggestion
    worser genius can, melt
    Mine honour lust, away
    edge day's celebration,
    Phoebus' steeds founder'd
    Night chain'd below.
  PROSPERO. Fairly spoke.
    Sit, then, talk her; thine own.
    What, Ariel! industrious servant, Ariel!
  
                           Enter ARIEL

  ARIEL. potent master? am.
  PROSPERO. Thou thy meaner fellows service
    worthily perform; you
    trick. bring rabble,
    O'er give thee pow'r, place.
    Incite quick motion; must
    Bestow eyes young couple
    vanity mine art; promise,
    expect me.
  ARIEL. Presently?
  PROSPERO. Ay, twink.
  ARIEL. 'come' 'go,'
    breathe twice, cry 'so, so,'
    one, tripping toe,
    mop mow.
    love me, master? No?
  PROSPERO. Dearly, delicate Ariel. approach
    Till thou dost hear call.  
  ARIEL. Well! conceive.                                  Exit
  PROSPERO. thou true; give dalliance
    rein; strongest oaths straw
    th' fire i' th' blood. abstemious,
    good night vow!
  FERDINAND. warrant you, sir,
    white cold virgin snow heart
    Abates ardour liver.
  PROSPERO. Well!
    come, Ariel, bring corollary,
    spirit; appear, pertly.
    tongue! eyes! silent.                 [Soft music]

                         Enter IRIS

  IRIS. Ceres, bounteous lady, thy rich leas
    wheat, rye, barley, vetches, oats, pease;
    Thy turfy mountains, live nibbling sheep,
    flat meads thatch'd stover, keep;
    Thy banks pioned twilled brims,  
    spongy April thy hest betrims,
    make cold nymphs chaste crowns; thy broom groves,
    shadow dismissed bachelor loves,
    lass-lorn; thy pole-clipt vineyard;
    thy sea-marge, sterile rocky hard,
    thou thyself dost air-the Queen o' th' sky,
    wat'ry arch messenger I,
    Bids thee leave these; sovereign grace,
    grass-plot, place,
    sport. peacocks fly amain.
                                      [JUNO descends car]
    Approach, rich Ceres, entertain.

                        Enter CERES

  CERES. Hail, many-coloured messenger, ne'er
    Dost disobey wife Jupiter;
    Who, thy saffron wings, flow'rs
    Diffusest honey drops, refreshing show'rs;
    end thy blue bow dost crown  
    bosky acres unshrubb'd down,
    Rich scarf proud earth-why hath thy Queen
    Summon'd short-grass'd green?
  IRIS. contract true love celebrate,
    donation freely estate
    blest lovers.
  CERES. me, heavenly bow,
    Venus son, thou dost know,
    attend Queen? plot
    means dusky Dis daughter got,
    blind boy's scandal'd company
    forsworn.
  IRIS. society
    afraid. met Deity
    Cutting clouds Paphos, son
    Dove-drawn her. thought done
    wanton charm man maid,
    vows bed-rite paid
    Till Hymen's torch lighted; vain.
    Mars's hot minion return'd again;  
    waspish-headed son broke arrows,
    Swears shoot more, play sparrows,
    boy out.                       [JUNO alights]
  CERES. Highest Queen State,
    Great Juno, comes; gait.
  JUNO. bounteous sister? me
    bless twain, prosperous be,
    honour'd issue.                     [They sing]
  JUNO. Honour, riches, marriage-blessing,
    Long continuance, increasing,
    Hourly joys you!
    Juno sings blessings you.
  CERES. Earth's increase, foison plenty,
    Barns gamers empty;
    Vines clust'ring bunches growing,
    Plants goodly burden bowing;
    Spring farthest,
    end harvest!
    Scarcity shun you,
    Ceres' blessing you.  
  FERDINAND. majestic vision, and
    Harmonious charmingly. bold
    spirits?
  PROSPERO. Spirits, mine art
    confines call'd enact
    present fancies.
  FERDINAND. live ever;
    rare wond'red father wise
    Makes place Paradise.
           [JUNO CERES whisper, send IRIS employment]
  PROSPERO. Sweet now, silence;
    Juno Ceres whisper seriously.
    do; hush, mute,
    spell marr'd.
  IRIS. nymphs, call'd Naiads, wind'ring brooks,
    sedg'd crowns harmless looks,
    Leave crisp channels, green land
    Answer summons; Juno command.
    Come, temperate nymphs, celebrate
    contract true love; late.  

                      Enter NYMPHS

    sun-burnt sicklemen, August weary,
    furrow, merry;
    Make holiday; rye-straw hats put on,
    fresh nymphs encounter one
    country footing.

        Enter REAPERS, properly habited; join
         NYMPHS graceful dance; the
         end whereof PROSPERO starts suddenly, speaks,
          which, strange, hollow, confused
                  noise, heavily vanish

  PROSPERO.  [Aside]  forgot foul conspiracy
    beast Caliban confederates
    life; minute plot
    come.  [To SPIRITS]  done; avoid; no
    more!  
  FERDINAND. strange; father's passion
    works strongly.
  MIRANDA. till day
    touch'd anger distemper'd.
  PROSPERO. look, son, mov'd sort,
    dismay'd; cheerful, sir.
    revels ended. actors,
    foretold you, spirits, and
    melted air, thin air;
    And, baseless fabric vision,
    cloud-capp'd towers, gorgeous palaces,
    solemn temples, great globe itself,
    Yea, inherit, dissolve,
    And, insubstantial pageant faded,
    Leave rack behind. stuff
    dreams made on; life
    rounded sleep. Sir, vex'd;
    Bear weakness; brain troubled;
    disturb'd infirmity.
    pleas'd, retire cell  
    repose; turn walk
    beating mind.
  FERDINAND, MIRANDA. peace.                 Exeunt
  PROSPERO. Come, thought. thee, Ariel; come.

                       Enter ARIEL

  ARIEL. Thy thoughts cleave to. thy pleasure?
  PROSPERO. Spirit,
    prepare meet Caliban.
  ARIEL. Ay, commander. presented 'Ceres.'
    thought told thee it; fear'd
    anger thee.
  PROSPERO. again, didst thou leave varlets?
  ARIEL. told you, sir, red-hot drinking;
    full valour smote air
    breathing faces; beat ground
    kissing feet; bending
    project. beat tabor,
    unback'd colts prick'd ears,  
    Advanc'd eyelids, lifted noses
    smelt music; charm'd cars,
    calf-like lowing follow'd through
    Tooth'd briers, sharp furzes, pricking goss, thorns,
    ent'red frail shins. left them
    I' th' filthy mantled pool cell,
    dancing th' chins, foul lake
    O'erstunk feet.
  PROSPERO. done, bird.
    Thy shape invisible retain thou still.
    trumpery house, bring hither
    stale catch thieves.
  ARIEL. go, go.                                        Exit
  PROSPERO. devil, born devil, nature
    Nurture stick; pains,
    Humanely taken, all, lost, lost;
    age body uglier grows,
    mind cankers. plague all,
    roaring.
  
       Re-enter ARIEL, loaden glistering apparel, &c.

    Come, hang line.
                          [PROSPERO ARIEL remain, invisible]

         Enter CALIBAN, STEPHANO, TRINCULO, wet

  CALIBAN. Pray you, tread softly, blind mole not
    Hear foot fall; cell.
  STEPHANO. Monster, fairy, harmless
    fairy, play'd Jack us.
  TRINCULO. Monster, smell horse-piss my
    nose great indignation.
  STEPHANO. mine. hear, monster? should
    displeasure you, you-
  TRINCULO. Thou wert lost monster.
  CALIBAN. Good lord, give thy favour still.
    patient, prize bring thee to
    hoodwink mischance; speak softly.
    All's hush'd midnight yet.  
  TRINCULO. Ay, lose bottles pool!
  STEPHANO. disgrace dishonour in
    that, monster, infinite loss.
  TRINCULO. wetting; is
    harmless fairy, monster.
  STEPHANO. fetch bottle, o'er
    ears labour.
  CALIBAN. Prithee, king, quiet. Seest thou here,
    mouth o' th' cell; noise, enter.
    good mischief make island
    Thine ever, I, thy Caliban,
    aye thy foot-licker.
  STEPHANO. Give thy hand. begin bloody
    thoughts.
  TRINCULO. O King Stephano! O peer! O worthy Stephano!
    wardrobe thee!
  CALIBAN. alone, thou fool; trash.
  TRINCULO. O, ho, monster; belongs a
    frippery. O King Stephano!
  STEPHANO. Put gown, Trinculo; hand,  
    gown.
  TRINCULO. Thy Grace it.
  CALIBAN. dropsy drown fool! mean
    dote luggage? 't alone,
    murder first. awake,
    toe crown fill skins pinches;
    Make strange stuff.
  STEPHANO. quiet, monster. Mistress line, not
    jerkin? jerkin line; now,
    jerkin, lose hair, prove bald
    jerkin.
  TRINCULO. Do, do. steal line level, an't like
    Grace.
  STEPHANO. thee jest; garment
    for't. Wit unrewarded king of
    country. 'Steal line level' excellent
    pass pate; garmet for't.
  TRINCULO. Monster, come, put lime fingers,
    rest.
  CALIBAN. on't. lose time,  
    turn'd barnacles, apes
    foreheads villainous low.
  STEPHANO. Monster, lay-to fingers; bear this
    hogshead wine is, turn out
    kingdom. to, carry this.
  TRINCULO. this.
  STEPHANO. Ay, this.

          noise hunters beard. Enter divers SPIRITS, in
             shape dogs hounds, bunting about;
                   PROSPERO ARIEL setting on

  PROSPERO. Hey, Mountain, hey!
  ARIEL. Silver! goes, Silver!
  PROSPERO. Fury, Fury! There, Tyrant, there! Hark, hark!
                [CALIBAN, STEPHANO, TRINCULO driven out]
    charge goblins grind joints
    dry convulsions, shorten sinews
    aged cramps, pinch-spotted make them
    pard cat o' mountain.  
  ARIEL. Hark, roar.
  PROSPERO. hunted soundly. hour
    Lies mercy mine enemies.
    Shortly labours end, thou
    Shalt air freedom; little
    Follow, service.                            Exeunt

ACT V. SCENE 1

Before PROSPERO'S cell

Enter PROSPERO magic robes, ARIEL

  PROSPERO. project gather head;
    charms crack not, spirits obey; time
    upright carriage. day?
  ARIEL. sixth hour; time, lord,
    work cease.
  PROSPERO. so,
    rais'd tempest. Say, spirit,
    fares King 's followers?
  ARIEL. Confin'd together
    fashion gave charge;
    left them; prisoners, sir,
    line-grove weather-fends cell;
    budge till release. King,
    brother, yours, abide distracted,
    remainder mourning them,
    Brim full sorrow dismay; chiefly
    term'd, sir, 'the good lord, Gonzalo';  
    tears run beard, winter's drops
    eaves reeds. charm strongly works 'em
    beheld affections
    tender.
  PROSPERO. Dost thou so, spirit?
  ARIEL. Mine would, sir, human.
  PROSPERO. mine shall.
    Hast thou, art air, touch, feeling
    afflictions, myself,
    kind, relish sharply,
    Passion they, kindlier mov'd thou art?
    high wrongs struck th' quick,
    nobler reason 'gainst fury
    part; rarer action is
    virtue vengeance; penitent,
    sole drift purpose doth extend
    frown further. release them, Ariel;
    charms break, senses restore,
    themselves.
  ARIEL. fetch them, sir.                              Exit  
  PROSPERO. Ye elves hills, brooks, standing lakes, and
    groves;
    ye sands printless foot
    chase ebbing Neptune, fly him
    back; demi-puppets that
    moonshine green sour ringlets make,
    Whereof ewe bites; pastime
    make midnight mushrooms, rejoice
    hear solemn curfew; aid-
    Weak masters ye be-I be-dimm'd
    noontide sun, call'd mutinous winds,
    'twixt green sea azur'd vault
    Set roaring war. dread rattling thunder
    fire, rifted Jove's stout oak
    bolt; strong-bas'd promontory
    made shake, spurs pluck'd up
    pine cedar. Graves command
    wak'd sleepers, op'd, 'em forth,
    potent art. rough magic
    abjure; and, requir'd  
    heavenly music-which do-
    work mine end senses that
    airy charm for, break staff,
    Bury fathoms earth,
    deeper plummet sound
    drown book.                            [Solem music]

            enters ARIEL before; ALONSO, with
          frantic gesture, attended GONZALO; SEBASTIAN
           ANTONIO manner, attended ADRIAN
           FRANCISCO. enter circle which
          PROSPERO made, stand charm'd; which
                    PROSPERO observing, speaks

    solemn air, comforter
    unsettled fancy, cure thy brains,
    useless, boil'd thy skull! stand,
    spell-stopp'd.
    Holy Gonzalo, honourable man,
    Mine eyes, ev'n sociable show thine,  
    Fall fellowly drops. charm dissolves apace,
    morning steals night,
    Melting darkness, rising senses
    Begin chase ignorant fumes mantle
    clearer reason. O good Gonzalo,
    true preserver, loyal sir
    thou follow'st! pay thy graces
    Home word deed. cruelly
    Didst thou, Alonso, daughter;
    Thy brother furtherer act.
    Thou art pinch'd for't now, Sebastian. Flesh blood,
    You, brother mine, entertain'd ambition,
    Expell'd remorse nature, who, Sebastian-
    pinches strong-
    kill'd king, forgive thee,
    Unnatural thou art. understanding
    Begins swell, approaching tide
    shortly fill reasonable shore
    lies foul muddy. them
    me, me. Ariel,  
    Fetch hat rapier cell;           Exit ARIEL
    discase me, present
    Milan. Quickly, spirit
    Thou shalt ere long free.

        ARIEL, returning, sings helps attire him

    bee sucks, suck I;
    cowslip's bell lie;
    couch owls cry.
    bat's back fly
    summer merrily.
    Merrily, merrily live now
    blossom hangs bough.

  PROSPERO. Why, dainty Ariel! miss thee;
    thou shalt freedom. So, so, so.
    King's ship, invisible thou art;
    shalt thou find mariners asleep
    hatches; master boatswain  
    awake, enforce place;
    presently, prithee.
  ARIEL. drink air me, return
    ere pulse beat.                           Exit
  GONZALO. torment, trouble, amazement,
    Inhabits here. heavenly power guide us
    fearful country!
  PROSPERO. Behold, Sir King,
    wronged Duke Milan, Prospero.
    assurance living prince
    speak thee, embrace thy body;
    thee thy company bid
    hearty welcome.
  ALONSO. Whe'er thou be'st no,
    enchanted trifle abuse me,
    late been, know. Thy pulse
    Beats, flesh blood; and, thee,
    Th' affliction mind amends, which,
    fear, madness held me. crave-
    all-a strange story.  
    Thy dukedom resign, entreat
    Thou pardon wrongs. Prospero
    living here?
  PROSPERO. First, noble friend,
    embrace thine age, honour cannot
    measur'd confin'd.
  GONZALO. be
    not, swear.
  PROSPERO. taste
    subtleties o' th' isle, you
    things certain. Welcome, friends all!
    [Aside SEBASTIAN ANTONIO]  you, brace of
      lords, minded,
    pluck Highness' frown you,
    justify traitors; time
    tales.
  SEBASTIAN.  [Aside]  devil speaks him.
  PROSPERO. No.
    you, wicked sir, call brother
    infect mouth, forgive  
    Thy rankest fault-all them; require
    dukedom thee, perforce know
    Thou restore.
  ALONSO. thou beest Prospero,
    Give particulars thy preservation;
    thou hast met here, hours since
    wreck'd shore; lost-
    sharp point remembrance is!-
    dear son Ferdinand.
  PROSPERO. woe for't, sir.
  ALONSO. Irreparable loss; patience
    past cure.
  PROSPERO. think
    sought help, soft grace
    loss sovereign aid,
    rest content.
  ALONSO. loss!
  PROSPERO. great late; and, supportable
    make dear loss, means weaker
    call comfort you,  
    lost daughter.
  ALONSO. daughter!
    O heavens, living Naples,
    King Queen there! were, wish
    mudded oozy bed
    son lies. lose daughter?
  PROSPERO. tempest. perceive lords
    encounter admire
    devour reason, scarce think
    eyes offices truth, words
    natural breath; but, howsoe'er have
    justled senses, certain
    Prospero, duke
    thrust Milan; strangely
    shore, wrecked, landed
    lord on't. this;
    'tis chronicle day day,
    relation breakfast, nor
    Befitting meeting. Welcome, sir;
    cell's court; attendants,  
    subjects abroad; pray you, in.
    dukedom again,
    requite good thing;
    bring wonder, content ye
    dukedom.

          PROSPERO discovers FERDINAND MIRANDA,
                      playing chess

  MIRANDA. Sweet lord, play false.
  FERDINAND. No, dearest love,
    world.
  MIRANDA. Yes, score kingdoms wrangle
    call fair play.
  ALONSO. prove
    vision island, dear son
    lose.
  SEBASTIAN. high miracle!
  FERDINAND. seas threaten, merciful;
    curs'd cause.                   [Kneels]  
  ALONSO. blessings
    glad father compass thee about!
    Arise, thou cam'st here.
  MIRANDA. O, wonder!
    goodly creatures here!
    beauteous mankind is! O brave world
    people in't!
  PROSPERO. 'Tis thee.
  ALONSO. maid thou wast play?
    eld'st acquaintance hours;
    goddess hath sever'd us,
    brought together?
  FERDINAND. Sir, mortal;
    immortal Providence mine.
    chose father
    advice, thought one. She
    daughter famous Duke Milan,
    heard renown
    before; have
    Receiv'd life; father  
    lady makes me.
  ALONSO. hers.
    But, O, oddly sound I
    child forgiveness!
  PROSPERO. There, sir, stop;
    burden remembrances with
    heaviness gone.
  GONZALO. inly wept,
    spoke ere this. down, gods,
    couple drop blessed crown;
    chalk'd way
    brought hither.
  ALONSO. say, Amen, Gonzalo!
  GONZALO. Milan thrust Milan, issue
    Kings Naples? O, rejoice
    common joy, set down
    gold lasting pillars: voyage
    Claribel husband find Tunis;
    Ferdinand, brother, found wife
    lost; Prospero dukedom  
    poor isle; ourselves
    man own.
  ALONSO.  [To FERDINAND MIRANDA]  Give your
    hands.
    grief sorrow embrace heart
    doth joy.
  GONZALO. so. Amen!

           Re-enter ARIEL, MASTER BOATSWAIN
                     amazedly following

    O look, sir; look, sir! us!
    prophesied, gallows land,
    fellow drown. Now, blasphemy,
    swear'st grace o'erboard, oath shore?
    Hast thou mouth land? news?
  BOATSWAIN. news safely found
    King company; next, ship-
    glasses gave split-
    tight yare, bravely rigg'd,  
    put sea.
  ARIEL.  [Aside PROSPERO]  Sir, service
    went.
  PROSPERO.  [Aside ARIEL]  tricksy spirit!
  ALONSO. natural events; strengthen
    strange stranger. Say, hither?
  BOATSWAIN. think, sir, awake,
    strive you. dead sleep,
    And-how, not-all clapp'd hatches;
    Where, now, strange noises
    roaring, shrieking, howling, jingling chains,
    moe diversity sounds, horrible,
    awak'd; straightway liberty;
    we, trim, freshly beheld
    royal, good, gallant ship; master
    Cap'ring eye her. trice, you,
    dream, divided them,
    brought moping hither.
  ARIEL.  [Aside PROSPERO]  Was't done?
  PROSPERO.  [Aside ARIEL]  Bravely, diligence. Thou  
    shalt free.
  ALONSO. strange maze e'er men trod;
    business nature
    conduct of. oracle
    rectify knowledge.
  PROSPERO. Sir, liege,
    infest mind beating on
    strangeness business; pick'd leisure,
    shortly, single resolve you,
    probable, every
    happen'd accidents; till when, cheerful
    thing well.  [Aside ARIEL]  Come
    hither, spirit;
    Set Caliban companions free;
    Untie spell.  [Exit ARIEL]  fares gracious sir?
    missing company
    odd lads remember not.

         Re-enter ARIEL, driving CALIBAN, STEPHANO, and
  
  TRINCULO, stolen apparel
  STEPHANO. man shift rest, man
    care himself; fortune. Coragio,
    bully-monster, coragio!
  TRINCULO. true spies wear head,
    goodly sight.
  CALIBAN. O Setebos, brave spirits indeed!
    fine master is! afraid
    chastise me.
  SEBASTIAN. Ha, ha!
    things these, lord Antonio?
    money buy'em?
  ANTONIO. like; them
    plain fish, doubt marketable.
  PROSPERO. Mark badges men, lords,
    true. mis-shapen knave-
    mother witch, strong
    control moon, make flows ebbs,
    deal command power.
    robb'd me; demi-devil-  
    bastard one-had plotted them
    life. fellows you
    own; thing darkness I
    Acknowledge mine.
  CALIBAN. pinch'd death.
  ALONSO. Stephano, drunken butler?
  SEBASTIAN. drunk now; wine?
  ALONSO. Trinculo reeling ripe; they
    Find grand liquor hath gilded 'em?
    cam'st thou pickle?
  TRINCULO. pickle you
    that, fear me, bones. I
    fear fly-blowing.
  SEBASTIAN. Why, now, Stephano!
  STEPHANO. O, touch not; Stephano, a
    cramp.
  PROSPERO. king o' isle, sirrah?
  STEPHANO. sore one, then.
  ALONSO.  [Pointing CALIBAN]  strange thing
    e'er look'd on.  
  PROSPERO. disproportioned manners
    shape. Go, sirrah, cell;
    companions; look
    pardon, trim handsomely.
  CALIBAN. Ay, will; wise hereafter,
    seek grace. thrice-double ass
    drunkard god,
    worship dull fool!
  PROSPERO. to; away!
  ALONSO. Hence, bestow luggage found it.
  SEBASTIAN. stole it, rather.
                          Exeunt CALIBAN, STEPHANO, TRINCULO
  PROSPERO. Sir, invite Highness train
    poor cell, rest
    night; which, part it, waste
    discourse as, doubt, make it
    quick away-the story life,
    accidents by
    isle. morn
    bring ship, Naples,  
    hope nuptial
    dear-belov'd solemnized,
    retire Milan, where
    thought grave.
  ALONSO. long
    hear story life, must
    ear strangely.
  PROSPERO. deliver all;
    promise calm seas, auspicious gales,
    sail expeditious catch
    royal fleet off.  [Aside ARIEL]  Ariel,
      chick,
    thy charge. elements
    free, fare thou well!-Please you, draw near.
                                                          Exeunt



EPILOGUE
                             EPILOGUE
                        Spoken PROSPERO

          charms o'erthrown,
          strength have's mine own,
          faint. 'tis true,
          confin'd you,
          Naples. not,
          dukedom got,
          pardon'd deceiver, dwell
          bare island spell;
          release bands
          good hands.
          Gentle breath sails
          fill, project fails,
          please. want
          Spirits enforce, art enchant;
          ending despair
          reliev'd prayer,
          pierces assaults
          Mercy itself, frees faults.
          crimes pardon'd be,  
          indulgence set free.

THE END

1608

THE LIFE TIMON ATHENS

by William Shakespeare



DRAMATIS PERSONAE

    TIMON Athens

    LUCIUS
    LUCULLUS
    SEMPRONIUS
       flattering lords

    VENTIDIUS, Timon's false friends
    ALCIBIADES, Athenian captain
    APEMANTUS, churlish philosopher
    FLAVIUS, steward Timon

    FLAMINIUS
    LUCILIUS
    SERVILIUS
       Timon's servants

    CAPHIS
    PHILOTUS
    TITUS  
    HORTENSIUS
       servants Timon's creditors

    POET
    PAINTER
    JEWELLER
    MERCHANT
    MERCER
    ATHENIAN
    STRANGERS
    PAGE
    FOOL

    PHRYNIA
    TIMANDRA
       mistresses Alcibiades

    CUPID
    AMAZONS
      Masque  

    Lords, Senators, Officers, Soldiers, Servants, Thieves, and
      Attendants




<<THIS ELECTRONIC VERSION COMPLETE WORKS WILLIAM
SHAKESPEARE COPYRIGHT 1990-1993 WORLD LIBRARY, INC., IS
PROVIDED PROJECT GUTENBERG ETEXT ILLINOIS BENEDICTINE COLLEGE

SCENE:
Athens neighbouring woods


ACT I. SCENE I.
Athens. TIMON'S house

Enter POET, PAINTER, JEWELLER, MERCHANT, MERCER, doors

  POET. Good day, sir.
  PAINTER. glad y'are well.
  POET. long; world?
  PAINTER. wears, sir, grows.
  POET. Ay, known.
    rarity? strange,
    manifold record matches? See,
    Magic bounty, spirits thy power
    Hath conjur'd attend! merchant.
  PAINTER. both; th' other's jeweller.
  MERCHANT. O, 'tis worthy lord!
  JEWELLER. Nay, fix'd.
  MERCHANT. incomparable man; breath'd, were,
    untirable continuate goodness.
    passes.
  JEWELLER. jewel here-  
  MERCHANT. O, pray see't. Lord Timon, sir?
  JEWELLER. touch estimate. that-
  POET. recompense prais'd vile,
    stains glory happy verse
    aptly sings good.
  MERCHANT. [Looking jewel] 'Tis good form.
  JEWELLER. rich. water, ye.
  PAINTER. rapt, sir, work, dedication
    great lord.
  POET. thing slipp'd idly me.
    poesy gum, oozes
    'tis nourish'd. fire i' th' flint
    Shows till struck: gentle flame
    Provokes itself, current flies
    bound chafes. there?
  PAINTER. picture, sir. book forth?
  POET. heels presentment, sir.
    piece.
  PAINTER. 'Tis good piece.
  POET. 'tis; excellent.  
  PAINTER. Indifferent.
  POET. Admirable. grace
    Speaks standing! mental power
    eye shoots forth! big imagination
    Moves lip! th' dumbness gesture
    interpret.
  PAINTER. pretty mocking life.
    touch; is't good?
  POET. it
    tutors nature. Artificial strife
    Lives touches, livelier life.

              Enter SENATORS, pass over

  PAINTER. lord followed!
  POET. senators Athens- happy man!
  PAINTER. Look, moe!
  POET. confluence, great flood visitors.
    rough work shap'd man
    beneath world doth embrace hug  
    amplest entertainment. free drift
    Halts particularly, moves itself
    wide sea tax. levell'd malice
    Infects comma hold,
    flies eagle flight, bold on,
    Leaving tract behind.
  PAINTER. understand you?
  POET. unbolt you.
    conditions, minds-
    glib slipp'ry creatures as
    grave austere quality, tender down
    services Lord Timon. large fortune,
    good gracious nature hanging,
    Subdues properties love tendance
    sorts hearts; yea, glass-fac'd flatterer
    Apemantus, things loves better
    abhor himself; drops down
    knee him, returns peace
    rich Timon's nod.
  PAINTER. speak together.  
  POET. Sir, high pleasant hill
    Feign'd Fortune thron'd. base o' th' mount
    rank'd deserts, kind natures
    labour bosom sphere
    propagate states. all
    eyes sovereign lady fix'd
    personate Lord Timon's frame,
    Fortune ivory hand wafts her;
    present grace present slaves servants
    Translates rivals.
  PAINTER. 'Tis conceiv'd scope.
    throne, Fortune, hill, methinks,
    man beckon'd rest below,
    Bowing head steepy mount
    climb happiness, express'd
    condition.
  POET. Nay, sir, hear on.
    fellows late-
    value- moment
    Follow strides, lobbies fill tendance,  
    Rain sacrificial whisperings ear,
    Make sacred stirrup, him
    Drink free air.
  PAINTER. Ay, marry, these?
  POET. Fortune shift change mood
    Spurns late beloved, dependants,
    labour'd mountain's top
    knees hands, slip down,
    accompanying declining foot.
  PAINTER. 'Tis common.
    thousand moral paintings show
    demonstrate quick blows Fortune's
    pregnantly words. well
    show Lord Timon eyes seen
    foot head.

         Trumpets sound. Enter TIMON, addressing himself
          courteously suitor, MESSENGER from
         VENTIDIUS talking him; LUCILIUS other
                       servants  

  TIMON. Imprison'd he, you?
  MESSENGER. Ay, good lord. talents debt;
    means short, creditors strait.
    honourable letter desires
    shut up; failing,
    Periods comfort.
  TIMON. Noble Ventidius! Well.
    feather shake of
    friend me. him
    gentleman deserves help,
    have. pay debt, free him.
  MESSENGER. lordship binds him.
  TIMON. Commend him; send ransom;
    enfranchis'd, bid me.
    'Tis feeble up,
    support after. Fare well.
  MESSENGER. happiness honour!                  Exit

                      Enter ATHENIAN  

  ATHENIAN. Lord Timon, hear speak.
  TIMON. Freely, good father.
  ATHENIAN. Thou hast servant nam'd Lucilius.
  TIMON. so; him?
  ATHENIAN. noble Timon, call man thee.
  TIMON. Attends here, no? Lucilius!
  LUCILIUS. Here, lordship's service.
  ATHENIAN. fellow here, Lord Timon, thy creature,
    night frequents house. man
    inclin'd thrift,
    estate deserves heir rais'd
    holds trencher.
  TIMON. Well; further?
  ATHENIAN. daughter I, kin else,
    confer got.
    maid fair, o' th' youngest bride,
    bred dearest cost
    qualities best. man thine
    Attempts love; prithee, noble lord,  
    Join forbid resort;
    spoke vain.
  TIMON. man honest.
  ATHENIAN. be, Timon.
    honesty rewards itself;
    bear daughter.
  TIMON. love him?
  ATHENIAN. young apt:
    precedent passions instruct us
    levity's youth.
  TIMON. Love maid?
  LUCILIUS. Ay, good lord, accepts it.
  ATHENIAN. marriage consent missing,
    call gods witness choose
    Mine heir beggars world,
    dispossess all.
  TIMON. endow'd,
    mated equal husband?
  ATHENIAN. talents present; future, all.
  TIMON. gentleman mine hath serv'd long;.  
    build fortune strain little,
    'tis bond men. Give thy daughter:
    bestow, counterpoise,
    make weigh her.
  ATHENIAN. noble lord,
    Pawn honour, his.
  TIMON. hand thee; mine honour promise.
  LUCILIUS. Humbly lordship. may
    state fortune fall keeping
    owed you!
                                Exeunt LUCILIUS ATHENIAN
  POET. [Presenting poem] Vouchsafe labour, long live your
    lordship!
  TIMON. you; hear anon;
    away. there, friend?
  PAINTER. piece painting, beseech
    lordship accept.
  TIMON. Painting welcome.
    painting natural man;
    dishonour traffics man's nature,  
    outside; pencill'd figures are
    give out. work,
    find it; wait attendance
    Till hear me.
  PAINTER. gods preserve ye!
  TIMON. fare you, gentleman. Give hand;
    dine together. Sir, jewel
    Hath suffered praise.
  JEWELLER. What, lord! Dispraise?
  TIMON. mere satiety commendations;
    pay for't 'tis extoll'd,
    unclew quite.
  JEWELLER. lord, 'tis rated
    sell give; know
    Things value, differing owners,
    prized masters. Believe't, dear lord,
    mend jewel wearing it.
  TIMON. mock'd.

                      Enter APEMANTUS  

  MERCHANT. No, good lord; speaks common tongue,
    men speak him.
  TIMON. here; chid?
  JEWELLER. bear, lordship.
  MERCHANT. spare none.
  TIMON. Good morrow thee, gentle Apemantus!
  APEMANTUS. Till gentle, stay thou thy good morrow;
    thou art Timon's dog, knaves honest.
  TIMON. dost thou call knaves? Thou know'st not.
  APEMANTUS. Athenians?
  TIMON. Yes.
  APEMANTUS. repent not.
  JEWELLER. me, Apemantus?
  APEMANTUS. Thou know'st do; call'd thee thy name.
  TIMON. Thou art proud, Apemantus.
  APEMANTUS. Timon.
  TIMON. art going?
  APEMANTUS. knock honest Athenian's brains.
  TIMON. deed thou't die for.  
  APEMANTUS. Right, death th' law.
  TIMON. lik'st thou picture, Apemantus?
  APEMANTUS. best, innocence.
  TIMON. Wrought painted it?
  APEMANTUS. wrought made painter; he's
    filthy piece work.
  PAINTER. Y'are dog.
  APEMANTUS. Thy mother's generation; she, dog?
  TIMON. Wilt dine me, Apemantus?
  APEMANTUS. No; eat lords.
  TIMON. thou shouldst, thou'dst anger ladies.
  APEMANTUS. O, eat lords; great bellies.
  TIMON. lascivious apprehension.
  APEMANTUS. thou apprehend'st thy labour.
  TIMON. dost thou jewel, Apemantus?
  APEMANTUS. plain dealing, cost man
    doit.
  TIMON. dost thou 'tis worth?
  APEMANTUS. worth thinking. now, poet!
  POET. now, philosopher!  
  APEMANTUS. Thou liest.
  POET. Art one?
  APEMANTUS. Yes.
  POET. lie not.
  APEMANTUS. Art poet?
  POET. Yes.
  APEMANTUS. thou liest. thy work, thou hast
    feign'd worthy fellow.
  POET. feign'd- so.
  APEMANTUS. Yes, worthy thee, pay thee thy
    labour. loves flattered worthy o' th' flatterer.
    Heavens, lord!
  TIMON. wouldst then, Apemantus?
  APEMANTUS. E'en Apemantus now: hate lord heart.
  TIMON. What, thyself?
  APEMANTUS. Ay.
  TIMON. Wherefore?
  APEMANTUS. angry wit lord.- Art thou a
    merchant?
  MERCHANT. Ay, Apemantus.  
  APEMANTUS. Traffic confound thee, gods not!
  MERCHANT. traffic it, gods it.
  APEMANTUS. Traffic's thy god, thy god confound thee!

                Trumpet sounds. Enter MESSENGER

  TIMON. trumpet's that?
  MESSENGER. 'Tis Alcibiades, twenty horse,
    companionship.
  TIMON. Pray entertain them; give guide us.
                                          Exeunt attendants
    dine me. hence
    Till thank'd you. dinner's done
    Show piece. joyful sights.

                Enter ALCIBIADES, rest

    welcome, sir!                             [They salute]
  APEMANTUS. So, so, there!
    Aches contract starve supple joints!  
    small love sweet knaves,
    courtesy! strain man's bred out
    baboon monkey.
  ALCIBIADES. Sir, sav'd longing, feed
    hungerly sight.
  TIMON. welcome, sir!
    Ere depart share bounteous time
    pleasures. Pray you, in.
                                        Exeunt APEMANTUS

                        Enter LORDS

  LORD. time o' day is't, Apemantus?
  APEMANTUS. Time honest.
  LORD. time serves still.
  APEMANTUS. accursed thou omit'st it.
  LORD. Thou art Lord Timon's feast.
  APEMANTUS. Ay; meat fill knaves wine heat fools.
  LORD. Fare thee well, fare thee well.
  APEMANTUS. Thou art fool bid farewell twice.  
  LORD. Why, Apemantus?
  APEMANTUS. Shouldst thyself, give
    thee none.
  LORD. Hang thyself.
  APEMANTUS. No, thy bidding; make thy requests
    thy friend.
  LORD. Away, unpeaceable dog, spurn thee hence.
  APEMANTUS. fly, dog, heels o' th' ass.  Exit
  LORD. opposite humanity. Come, in
    taste Lord Timon's bounty? outgoes
    heart kindness.
  LORD. pours out: Plutus, god gold,
    steward; meed repays
    Sevenfold itself; gift him
    breeds giver return exceeding
    quittance.
  LORD. noblest mind carries
    govern'd man.
  LORD. Long live fortunes! in?
  LORD. company.                      Exeunt




SCENE II.
A room state TIMON'S house

Hautboys playing loud music. great banquet serv'd in;
FLAVIUS attending; enter LORD TIMON, states,
the ATHENIAN LORDS, VENTIDIUS, TIMON redeem'd prison.
Then comes, dropping all, APEMANTUS, discontentedly, himself

  VENTIDIUS. honoured Timon,
    hath pleas'd gods remember father's age,
    call long peace.
    happy, left rich.
    Then, grateful virtue bound
    free heart, return talents,
    Doubled service, help
    deriv'd liberty.
  TIMON. O, means,
    Honest Ventidius! mistake love;
    gave freely ever; none
    gives, receives.
    betters play game, dare  
    imitate them: faults rich fair.
  VENTIDIUS. noble spirit!
  TIMON. Nay, lords, ceremony devis'd first
    set gloss faint deeds, hollow welcomes,
    Recanting goodness, ere 'tis shown;
    true friendship none.
    Pray, sit; ye fortunes
    fortunes me.                           [They sit]
  LORD. lord, confess'd it.
  APEMANTUS. Ho, ho, confess'd it! Hang'd it, not?
  TIMON. O, Apemantus, welcome.
  APEMANTUS. No;
    make welcome.
    thee thrust doors.
  TIMON. Fie, th'art churl; ye humour there
    man; 'tis blame.
    say, lords, Ira furor brevis est; yond man ever
    angry. Go, table himself; neither
    affect company fit for't indeed.
  APEMANTUS. stay thine apperil, Timon.  
    observe; give thee warning on't.
  TIMON. heed thee. Th'art Athenian, therefore
    welcome. power; prithee meat make
    thee silent.
  APEMANTUS. scorn thy meat; 't'would choke me, ne'er
    flatter thee. O gods, number men eats Timon, he
    sees 'em not! grieves dip meat one
    man's blood; madness is, cheers too.
    men dare trust men.
    Methinks invite knives:
    Good meat safer lives.
    for't; fellow sits now,
    parts bread him, pledges breath divided
    draught, readiest man kill him. 'T proved. If
    huge man fear drink meals.
    spy windpipe's dangerous notes:
    Great men drink harness throats.
  TIMON. lord, heart! health round.
  LORD. flow way, good lord.
  APEMANTUS. Flow way! brave fellow! tides well.  
    healths make thee thy state ill, Timon.
    weak sinner, honest water, which
    ne'er left man i' th' mire.
    food equals; odds.'
    Feasts proud give gods.

                  APEMANTUS' Grace

           Immortal gods, crave pelf;
           pray man myself.
           Grant prove fond
           trust man oath bond,
           harlot weeping,
           dog a-sleeping,
           keeper freedom,
           friends, 'em.
           Amen. fall to't.
           Rich men sin, eat root.       [Eats drinks]

    good dich thy good heart, Apemantus!  
  TIMON. Captain Alcibiades, heart's field now.
  ALCIBIADES. heart service, lord.
  TIMON. breakfast enemies dinner of
    friends.
  ALCIBIADES. bleeding new, lord, meat
    'em; friend feast.
  APEMANTUS. flatterers thine enemies then, that
    thou mightst kill 'em, bid 'em.
  LORD. happiness, lord, you
    hearts, express part of
    zeals, perfect.
  TIMON. O, doubt, good friends, gods have
    provided you. been
    friends else? charitable title from
    thousands, chiefly belong heart? told
    modesty speak own
    behalf; confirm you. O gods, I, what
    friends ne'er 'em?
    needless creatures living, ne'er
    'em; resemble sweet instruments hung  
    cases, sounds themselves. Why, have
    wish'd poorer, nearer you. We
    born benefits; properer call
    riches friends? O, precious
    comfort 'tis brothers commanding one
    another's fortunes! O, joy's e'en made ere't born!
    Mine eyes hold water, methinks. forget their
    faults, drink you.
  APEMANTUS. Thou weep'st make drink, Timon.
  LORD. Joy conception eyes,
    instant babe sprung up.
  APEMANTUS. Ho, ho! laugh babe bastard.
  LORD. promise you, lord, mov'd much.
  APEMANTUS. Much!                                [Sound tucket]
  TIMON. means trump?

                        Enter SERVANT

    now?
  SERVANT. you, lord, ladies  
    desirous admittance.
  TIMON. Ladies! wills?
  SERVANT. forerunner, lord, bears
    office signify pleasures.
  TIMON. pray admitted.

                          Enter CUPID
  CUPID. Hail thee, worthy Timon, all
    bounties taste! Senses
    Acknowledge thee patron, freely
    gratulate thy plenteous bosom. Th' Ear,
    Taste, Touch, Smell, pleas'd thy table rise;
    feast thine eyes.
  TIMON. all; 'em kind admittance.
    Music, make welcome.                        Exit CUPID
  LORD. see, lord, ample y'are belov'd.

      Music. Re-enter CUPID, witb Masque LADIES Amazons,
          lutes hands, dancing playing
  
  APEMANTUS. Hoy-day, sweep vanity way!
    dance? mad women.
    madness glory life,
    pomp shows oil root.
    make fools disport ourselves,
    spend flatteries drink men
    age void again
    poisonous spite envy.
    lives depraved depraves?
    dies bears spurn graves
    friends' gift?
    fear dance now
    day stamp me. 'T done:
    Men shut doors setting sun.

         LORDS rise table, adoring of
        TIMON; show loves, single an
          Amazon, dance, men witb women, lofty
            strain hautboys, cease
  
  TIMON. pleasures grace, fair ladies,
    Set fair fashion entertainment,
    half beautiful kind;
    added worth unto't lustre,
    entertain'd mine device;
    for't.
  LADY. lord, best.
  APEMANTUS. Faith, worst filthy, hold
    taking, doubt me.
  TIMON. Ladies, idle banquet attends you;
    dispose yourselves.
  LADIES. thankfully, lord.
                                         Exeunt CUPID LADIES
  TIMON. Flavius!
  FLAVIUS. lord?
  TIMON. casket bring hither.
  FLAVIUS. Yes, lord. [Aside] jewels yet!
    crossing in's humour,
    him- i' faith, should-
    all's spent, cross'd then, could.  
    'Tis pity bounty eyes behind,
    man ne'er wretched mind.          Exit
  LORD. men?
  SERVANT. Here, lord, readiness.
  LORD. horses!

               Re-enter FLAVIUS, casket

  TIMON. O friends,
    word you. you, good lord,
    entreat honour much
    advance jewel; accept wear it,
    Kind lord.
  LORD. gifts-
  ALL. all.

                       Enter SERVANT

  SERVANT. lord, nobles Senate newly
    alighted visit you.  
  TIMON. fairly welcome.                   Exit SERVANT
  FLAVIUS. beseech honour, vouchsafe word; does
    concern near.
  TIMON. Near! then, time hear thee. prithee let's
    provided show entertainment.
  FLAVIUS. [Aside] scarce how.

                     Enter SERVANT

  SERVANT. vour honour, Lord Lucius, his
    free love, hath presented milk-white horses, trapp'd
    silver.
  TIMON. accept fairly. presents
    worthily entertain'd.                        Exit SERVANT

                      Enter SERVANT

    now! news?
  SERVANT. you, lord, honourable gentleman, Lord
    Lucullus, entreats company to-morrow hunt  
    honour brace greyhounds.
  TIMON. hunt him; receiv'd,
    fair reward.                        Exit SERVANT
  FLAVIUS. [Aside] to?
    commands provide give great gifts,
    empty coffer;
    purse, yield this,
    show beggar heart is,
    power make wishes good.
    promises fly state
    speaks debt; owes
    ev'ry word. kind now
    Pays interest for't; land's put books.
    Well, gently put office
    forc'd out!
    Happier friend feed
    e'en enemies exceed.
    bleed inwardly lord.                           Exit
  TIMON. wrong;
    bate merits.  
    Here, lord, trifle love.
  LORD. common receive it.
  LORD. O, soul bounty!
  TIMON. remember, lord, gave good words other
    day bay courser rode on. 'Tis lik'd it.
  LORD. O, beseech pardon me, lord, that.
  TIMON. word, lord: man
    justly praise affect.
    weigh friend's affection mine own.
    true; call you.
  LORDS. O, welcome!
  TIMON. visitations
    kind heart 'tis give;
    Methinks deal kingdoms friends
    ne'er weary. Alcibiades,
    Thou art soldier, seldom rich.
    charity thee; thy living
    'mongst dead, lands thou hast
    Lie pitch'd field.
  ALCIBIADES. Ay, defil'd land, lord.  
  LORD. virtuously bound-
  TIMON. you.
  LORD. infinitely endear'd-
  TIMON. you. Lights, lights!
  LORD. happiness, honour, fortunes, with
    you, Lord Timon!
  TIMON. Ready friends.
                              Exeunt APEMANTUS TIMON
  APEMANTUS. coil's here!
    Serving becks jutting-out bums!
    doubt legs worth sums
    'em. Friendship's full dregs:
    Methinks false hearts sound legs.
    honest fools lay wealth curtsies.
  TIMON. Now, Apemantus, thou wert sullen
    good thee.
  APEMANTUS. No, nothing; brib'd too, there
    left rail thee, thou wouldst sin
    faster. Thou giv'st long, Timon, fear thou wilt give
    thyself paper shortly. feasts, pomps,  
    vain-glories?
  TIMON. Nay, begin rail society once, sworn to
    give regard you. Farewell; music.
 Exit
  APEMANTUS. So. Thou wilt hear now: thou shalt then. I'll
    lock thy heaven thee.
    O men's ears be
    counsel deaf, flattery!                   Exit
