ACT II. SCENE I.
A SENATOR'S house

Enter SENATOR, papers hand

  SENATOR. late, thousand. Varro Isidore
    owes thousand; sum,
    makes twenty. motion
    raging waste? hold; not.
    gold, steal beggar's dog
    give Timon, why, dog coins gold.
    sell horse buy twenty moe
    he, why, give horse Timon,
    nothing, give him, foals straight,
    horses. porter gate,
    smiles invites
    pass by. hold; reason
    sound state safety. Caphis, ho!
    Caphis, say!

                         Enter CAPHIS
  
  CAPHIS. Here, sir; pleasure?
  SENATOR. cloak haste Lord Timon;
    Importune moneys; ceas'd
    slight denial, silenc'd when
    'Commend master' cap
    Plays hand, thus; him
    cry me, serve turn
    mine own; days times past,
    reliances fracted dates
    smit credit. love honour him,
    break back heal finger.
    needs, relief
    toss'd turn'd words,
    find supply immediate. gone;
    Put importunate aspect,
    visage demand; fear,
    feather sticks wing,
    Lord Timon left naked gull,
    flashes phoenix. gone.
  CAPHIS. go, sir.  
  SENATOR. bonds you,
    dates compt.
  CAPHIS. will, sir.
  SENATOR. Go.                                            Exeunt




SCENE II.
Before TIMON'S house

Enter FLAVIUS, TIMON'S Steward, bills hand

  FLAVIUS. care, stop! senseless expense
    maintain it
    cease flow riot; takes account
    things him, resumes care
    continue. mind
    unwise kind.
    done? hear till feel.
    round him. hunting.
    Fie, fie, fie, fie!

       Enter CAPHIS, SERVANTS ISIDORE VARRO

  CAPHIS. Good even, Varro. What, money?
  VARRO'S SERVANT. Is't business too?
  CAPHIS. is. too, Isidore?
  ISIDORE'S SERVANT. so.
  CAPHIS. discharg'd!  
  VARRO'S SERVANT. fear it.
  CAPHIS. lord.

            Enter TIMON train, ALCIBIADES

  TIMON. dinner's again,
    Alcibiades.- me? will?
  CAPHIS. lord, note dues.
  TIMON. Dues! you?
  CAPHIS. Athens here, lord.
  TIMON. steward.
  CAPHIS. lordship, hath put off
    succession days month.
    master awak'd great occasion
    call own, humbly prays you
    noble parts suit
    giving right.
  TIMON. Mine honest friend,
    prithee repair morning.
  CAPHIS. Nay, good lord-  
  TIMON. thyself, good friend.
  VARRO'S SERVANT. Varro's servant, good lord-
  ISIDORE'S SERVANT. Isidore: humbly prays speedy
    payment-
  CAPHIS. know, lord, master's wants-
  VARRO'S SERVANT. 'Twas due forfeiture, lord, weeks and
    past.
  ISIDORE'S SERVANT. steward puts off, lord; and
    expressly lordship.
  TIMON. Give breath.
    beseech you, good lords, on;
    wait instantly.
                                     Exeunt ALCIBIADES LORDS
    [To FLAVIUS] hither. Pray you,
    world encount'red
    clamorous demands date-broke bonds
    detention long-since-due debts,
    honour?
  FLAVIUS. you, gentlemen,
    time unagreeable business.  
    importunacy cease till dinner,
    make lordship understand
    Wherefore paid.
  TIMON. so, friends.
    entertain'd.                              Exit
  FLAVIUS. Pray draw near.                                  Exit

                      Enter APEMANTUS FOOL

  CAPHIS. Stay, stay, fool Apemantus.
    ha' sport 'em.
  VARRO'S SERVANT. Hang him, abuse us!
  ISIDORE'S SERVANT. plague him, dog!
  VARRO'S SERVANT. dost, fool?
  APEMANTUS. Dost dialogue thy shadow?
  VARRO'S SERVANT. speak thee.
  APEMANTUS. No, 'tis thyself. [To FOOL] away.
  ISIDORE'S SERVANT. [To VARRO'S SERVANT] fool hangs on
    back already.
  APEMANTUS. No, thou stand'st single; th'art yet.  
  CAPHIS. fool now?
  APEMANTUS. ask'd question. Poor rogues usurers'
    men! Bawds gold want!
  SERVANTS. we, Apemantus?
  APEMANTUS. Asses.
  SERVANTS. Why?
  APEMANTUS. are, know
    yourselves. Speak 'em, fool.
  FOOL. you, gentlemen?
  SERVANTS. Gramercies, good fool. mistress?
  FOOL. e'en setting water scald chickens you
    are. Corinth!
  APEMANTUS. Good! gramercy.

                           Enter PAGE

  FOOL. you, mistress' page.
  PAGE. [To FOOL] Why, now, Captain? wise
    company? dost thou, Apemantus?
  APEMANTUS. rod mouth, answer thee  
    profitably!
  PAGE. Prithee, Apemantus, read superscription these
    letters; which.
  APEMANTUS. Canst read?
  PAGE. No.
  APEMANTUS. learning die, then, day thou art
    hang'd. Lord Timon; Alcibiades. Go; thou wast
    born bastard, thou't die bawd.
  PAGE. Thou wast whelp'd dog, thou shalt famish dog's death.
    Answer not: gone.                             Exit PAGE
  APEMANTUS. E'en thou outrun'st grace.
    Fool, Lord Timon's.
  FOOL. leave there?
  APEMANTUS. Timon stay home. serve usurers?
  SERVANTS. Ay; serv'd us!
  APEMANTUS. I- good trick hangman serv'd
    thief.
  FOOL. usurers' men?
  SERVANTS. Ay, fool.
  FOOL. usurer fool servant. mistress  
    one, fool. men borrow your
    masters, approach sadly merry; enter my
    mistress' house merrily sadly. reason this?
  VARRO'S SERVANT. render one.
  APEMANTUS. then, account thee whoremaster a
    knave; notwithstanding, thou shalt esteemed.
  VARRO'S SERVANT. whoremaster, fool?
  FOOL. fool good clothes, thee. 'Tis a
    spirit. 't appears lord; lawyer;
    philosopher, stones moe than's
    artificial one. knight; and, generally,
    shapes man fourscore to
    thirteen, spirit walks in.
  VARRO'S SERVANT. Thou art altogether fool.
  FOOL. thou altogether wise man.
    foolery have, wit thou lack'st.
  APEMANTUS. answer Apemantus.
  VARRO'S SERVANT. Aside, aside; Lord Timon.

                    Re-enter TIMON FLAVIUS  

  APEMANTUS. me, fool, come.
  FOOL. follow lover, elder brother, woman;
    philosopher.
                                       Exeunt APEMANTUS FOOL
  FLAVIUS. Pray walk near; speak anon.
                                                 Exeunt SERVANTS
  TIMON. make marvel wherefore ere time
    fully laid state me,
    rated expense
    leave means.
  FLAVIUS. hear me
    leisures propos'd.
  TIMON. to;
    Perchance single vantages took
    indisposition put back,
    unaptness made minister
    excuse yourself.
  FLAVIUS. O good lord,
    times brought accounts,  
    Laid you; throw off
    found mine honesty.
    When, trifling present, bid me
    Return much, shook head wept;
    Yea, 'gainst th' authority manners, pray'd you
    hold hand close. endure
    seldom, slight checks, have
    Prompted ebb estate
    great flow debts. lov'd lord,
    hear now- late!- now's time:
    greatest lacks half
    pay present debts.
  TIMON. land sold.
  FLAVIUS. 'Tis engag'd, forfeited gone;
    remains stop mouth
    present dues. future apace;
    defend interim? length
    reck'ning?
  TIMON. Lacedaemon land extend.
  FLAVIUS. O good lord, world word;  
    give breath,
    quickly gone!
  TIMON. true.
  FLAVIUS. suspect husbandry falsehood,
    Call th' exactest auditors
    set proof. gods bless me,
    offices oppress'd
    riotous feeders, vaults wept
    drunken spilth wine, room
    Hath blaz'd lights bray'd minstrelsy,
    retir'd wasteful cock
    set mine eyes flow.
  TIMON. Prithee more.
  FLAVIUS. 'Heavens,' 'the bounty lord!
    prodigal bits slaves peasants
    night englutted! Lord Timon's?
    heart, head, sword, force, means, Lord Timon's?
    Great Timon, noble, worthy, royal Timon!'
    Ah! means buy praise,
    breath whereof praise made.  
    Feast-won, fast-lost; cloud winter show'rs,
    flies couch'd.
  TIMON. Come, sermon further.
    villainous bounty hath pass'd heart;
    Unwisely, ignobly, given.
    dost thou weep? Canst thou conscience lack
    lack friends? Secure thy heart:
    broach vessels love,
    argument hearts borrowing,
    Men men's fortunes frankly use
    bid thee speak.
  FLAVIUS. Assurance bless thoughts!
  TIMON. And, sort, mine crown'd
    account blessings; these
    friends. perceive you
    Mistake fortunes; wealthy friends.
    there! Flaminius! Servilius!

           Enter FLAMINIUS, SERVILIUS, SERVANT
  
  SERVANTS. lord! lord!
  TIMON. dispatch severally- Lord Lucius; Lord
    Lucullus you; hunted honour to-day. Sempronius.
    Commend loves; proud, say, occasions
    found time 'em supply money. the
    request fifty talents.
  FLAMINIUS. said, lord.          Exeunt SERVANTS
  FLAVIUS. [Aside] Lord Lucius Lucullus? Humh!
  TIMON. you, sir, senators,
    whom, state's health, have
    Deserv'd hearing. Bid 'em send o' th' instant
    thousand talents me.
  FLAVIUS. bold,
    knew general way,
    signet name;
    shake heads, here
    richer return.
  TIMON. Is't true? be?
  FLAVIUS. answer, joint corporate voice,
    fall, treasure,  
    would, sorry- honourable-
    wish'd- not-
    hath amiss- noble nature
    catch wrench- well!- 'tis pity-
    so, intending matters,
    distasteful looks, hard fractions,
    half-caps cold-moving nods,
    froze silence.
  TIMON. gods, reward them!
    Prithee, man, cheerly. fellows
    ingratitude hereditary.
    blood cak'd, 'tis cold, seldom flows;
    'Tis lack kindly warmth kind;
    nature, grows earth,
    fashion'd journey dull heavy.
    Ventidius. Prithee sad,
    Thou art true honest; ingeniously speak,
    blame belongs thee. Ventidius lately
    Buried father, death stepp'd
    great estate. poor,  
    Imprison'd, scarcity friends,
    clear'd talents. Greet me,
    Bid suppose good necessity
    Touches friend, craves rememb'red
    talents. had, give't fellows
    'tis instant due. Nev'r speak think
    Timon's fortunes 'mong friends sink.
  FLAVIUS. it.
    thought bounty's foe;
    free itself, thinks so.           Exeunt

ACT III. SCENE I.
LUCULLUS' house

FLAMINIUS waiting speak LUCULLUS. Enter SERVANT him

  SERVANT. told lord you; coming you.
  FLAMINIUS. you, sir.

                           Enter LUCULLUS

  SERVANT. lord.
  LUCULLUS. [Aside] Lord Timon's men? gift, warrant. Why,
    hits right; dreamt silver basin ewer to-night-
    Flaminius, honest Flaminius, welcome,
    sir. Fill wine. [Exit SERVANT] that
    honourable, complete, freehearted gentleman Athens, thy very
    bountiful good lord master?
  FLAMINIUS. health well, sir.
  LUCULLUS. glad health well, sir. what
    hast thou thy cloak, pretty Flaminius?
  FLAMINIUS. Faith, empty box, sir, lord's  
    behalf entreat honour supply;  who, having
    great instant occasion fifty talents, hath to
    lordship furnish him, doubting present
    assistance therein.
  LUCULLIUS. La, la, la, la! 'Nothing doubting' he? Alas, good
    lord! noble gentleman 'tis, good a
    house. time ha' din'd told him
    on't; supper purpose him
    spend less; embrace counsel, warning
    coming. man fault, honesty his. ha'
    told on't, ne'er from't.

                    Re-enter SERVANT, wine

  SERVANT. lordship, wine.
  LUCULLUS. Flaminius, noted thee wise. thee.
  FLAMINIUS. lordship speaks pleasure.
  LUCULLUS. observed thee towardly prompt spirit,
    give thee thy due, belongs reason, and
    canst time well, time thee well. Good parts  
    thee. [To SERVANT] gone, sirrah. [Exit SERVANT] Draw
    nearer, honest Flaminius. Thy lord's bountiful gentleman; but
    thou art wise, thou know'st enough, thou com'st
    me, time lend money, bare
    friendship security. solidares thee.
    Good boy, wink me, thou saw'st not. Fare thee well.
  FLAMINIUS. Is't world differ,
    alive liv'd? Fly, damned baseness,
    worships thee.         [Throwing money back]
  LUCULLUS. Ha! thou art fool, fit thy master.
 Exit
  FLAMINIUS. add number scald thee!
    molten coin thy damnation,
    Thou disease friend himself!
    friendship faint milky heart
    turns nights? O gods,
    feel master's passion! slave
    honour lord's meat him;
    thrive turn nutriment
    turn'd poison?  
    O, diseases work upon't!
    sick death, part nature
    lord paid power
    expel sickness, prolong hour!                Exit




SCENE II.
A public place

Enter Lucius, STRANGERS

  LUCIUS. Who, Lord Timon? good friend, an
    honourable gentleman.
  STRANGER. less, but
    strangers him. thing, lord, and
    hear common rumours: Lord Timon's happy hours
    past, estate shrinks him.
  LUCIUS. Fie, no: it; money.
  STRANGER. this, lord, long ago
     men Lord Lucullus borrow many
    talents; nay, urg'd extremely for't, showed necessity
    belong'd to't, denied.
  LUCIUS. How?
  STRANGER. you, denied, lord.
  LUCIUS. strange case that! Now, gods, am
    asham'd on't. Denied honourable man! little
    honour show'd in't. part, confess have
    received small kindnesses him, money, plate, jewels,  
    such-like trifles, comparing his; yet, he
    mistook me, ne'er denied his
    occasion talents.

                             Enter SERVILIUS

  SERVILIUS. See, good hap, yonder's lord; sweat see
    honour.- honour'd lord!
  LUCIUS. Servilius? kindly met, sir. Fare thee well; commend
    thy honourable virtuous lord, exquisite friend.
  SERVILIUS. honour, lord hath sent-
  LUCIUS. Ha! sent? endeared lord:
    sending. him, think'st thou? what
    now?
  SERVILIUS. present occasion now, lord,
    requesting lordship supply instant many
    talents.
  LUCIUS. lordship merry me;
    fifty-five hundred talents.
  SERVILIUS. time less, lord.  
    occasion virtuous
    urge half faithfully.
  LUCIUS. Dost thou speak seriously, Servilius?
  SERVILIUS. soul, 'tis true, sir.
  LUCIUS. wicked beast disfurnish such
    good time, ha' shown honourable! How
    unluckily happ'ned purchase day a
    part undo great deal honour! Servilius, now
    gods, do- beast, say! I
    sending Lord Timon myself, gentlemen can
    witness; wealth Athens done't
    now. Commend bountifully good lordship, hope his
    honour conceive fairest me, power
    kind. me: count my
    greatest afflictions, say, pleasure an
    honourable gentleman. Good Servilius, befriend far
    mine words him?
  SERVILIUS. Yes, sir, shall.
  LUCIUS. good turn, Servilius.
                                                  Exit SERVILIUS  
    True, said, Timon shrunk indeed;
    denied speed.            Exit
  STRANGER. observe this, Hostilius?
  STRANGER. Ay, well.
  STRANGER. Why, world's soul; same
      piece
    flatterer's spirit. call friend
    dips dish? For, knowing,
    Timon lord's father,
    credit purse;
    Supported estate; nay, Timon's money
    paid men wages. ne'er drinks
    Timon's silver treads lip;
    yet- O, monstrousness man
    ungrateful shape!-
    deny him, respect his,
    charitable men afford beggars.
  STRANGER. Religion groans it.
  STRANGER. mine part,
    tasted Timon life,  
    bounties me
    mark friend; protest,
    noble mind, illustrious virtue,
    honourable carriage,
    necessity made me,
    put wealth donation,
    half return'd him,
    love heart. perceive
    Men learn pity dispense;
    policy sits conscience.                     Exeunt




SCENE III.
SEMPRONIUS' house

Enter SEMPRONIUS SERVANT TIMON'S

  SEMPRONIUS. trouble in't? Hum! 'Bove others?
    Lord Lucius Lucullus;
    Ventidius wealthy too,
    redeem'd prison. these
    Owe estates him.
  SERVANT. lord,
    touch'd found base metal, for
    denied him.
  SEMPRONIUS. How! denied him?
    Ventidius Lucullus denied him?
    send me? Three? Humh!
    shows love judgment him.
    refuge? friends, physicians,
    Thrice give over. th' cure me?
    disgrac'd in't; angry him,
    place. sense for't,
    occasions woo'd first;  
    For, conscience, man
    e'er received gift him.
    backwardly now
    requite last? No;
    prove argument laughter
    th' rest, 'mongst lords thought fool.
    worth thrice sum
    first, mind's sake;
    courage good. return,
    faint reply answer join:
    bates mine honour coin.           Exit
  SERVANT. Excellent! lordship's goodly villain. devil
    knew made man politic- cross'd himself
    by't; but, end, villainies man
    set clear. fairly lord strives foul!
    Takes virtuous copies wicked, hot
    ardent zeal set realms fire.
    nature politic love.
    lord's hope; fled,
    Save gods. friends dead,  
    Doors ne'er acquainted wards
    bounteous year employ'd
    guard master.
    liberal allows:
    wealth house.         Exit




SCENE IV.
A hall TIMON'S house

Enter VARRO'S MEN, meeting LUCIUS' SERVANT, others,
all servants TIMON's creditors, wait coming out.
Then enter TITUS HORTENSIUS

  VARRO'S SERVANT. met; good morrow, Titus Hortensius.
  TITUS. you, kind Varro.
  HORTENSIUS. Lucius! What, meet together?
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. Ay, business command all;
    mine money.
  TITUS. ours.

                          Enter PHILOTUS

  LUCIUS' SERVANT. Sir Philotus too!
  PHILOTUS. Good day once.
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. welcome, good brother, hour?
  PHILOTUS. Labouring nine.
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. much?
  PHILOTUS. lord yet?  
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. yet.
  PHILOTUS. on't; wont shine seven.
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. Ay, days wax'd shorter him;
    prodigal course
    sun's, recoverable.
    fear
    'Tis deepest winter Lord Timon's purse;
    is, reach deep yet
    Find little.
  PHILOTUS. fear that.
  TITUS. show t' observe strange event.
    lord sends money.
  HORTENSIUS. true, does.
  TITUS. wears jewels Timon's gift,
    wait money.
  HORTENSIUS. heart.
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. Mark strange shows
    Timon pay owes;
    e'en lord wear rich jewels
    send money 'em.  
  HORTENSIUS. weary charge, gods witness;
    lord hath spent Timon's wealth,
    ingratitude makes worse stealth.
  VARRO'S SERVANT. Yes, mine's thousand crowns; what's
    yours?
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. thousand mine.
  VARRO'S SERVANT. 'Tis deep; th'
      sum
    master's confidence mine,
    surely equall'd.

                           Enter FLAMINIUS

  TITUS. Lord Timon's men.
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. Flaminius! Sir, word. Pray, lord ready to
    forth?
  FLAMINIUS. No, indeed, not.
  TITUS. attend lordship; pray signify much.
  FLAMINIUS. that; diligent.
 Exit  

                 Enter FLAVIUS, cloak, muffled

  LUCIUS' SERVANT. Ha! steward muffled so?
    cloud. Call him, call him.
  TITUS. hear, sir?
  VARRO'S SERVANT. leave, sir.
  FLAVIUS. ye me, friend?
  TITUS. wait money here, sir.
  FLAVIUS. Ay,
    money waiting,
    'Twere enough.
    preferr'd sums bills
    false masters eat lord's meat?
    smile, fawn debts,
    th' int'rest glutt'nous maws.
    wrong stir up;
    pass quietly.
    Believe't, lord made end:
    reckon, spend.  
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. Ay, answer serve.
  FLAVIUS. 'twill serve, 'tis base you,
    serve knaves.                                   Exit
  VARRO'S SERVANT. How! cashier'd worship mutter?
  VARRO'S SERVANT. matter what; poor, that's
    revenge enough. speak broader house
    put head in? rail great buildings.

                          Enter SERVILIUS

  TITUS. O, Servilius; answer.
  SERVILIUS. beseech you, gentlemen, repair other
    hour, derive from't; take't soul, lord
    leans wondrously discontent. comfortable temper has
    forsook him; health chamber.
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. chambers sick;
    health,
    Methinks sooner pay debts,
    make clear gods.
  SERVILIUS. Good gods!  
  TITUS. answer, sir.
  FLAMINIUS. [Within] Servilius, help! lord! lord!

           Enter TIMON, rage, FLAMINIUS following

  TIMON. What, doors oppos'd passage?
    free, house
    retentive enemy, gaol?
    place feasted, now,
    mankind, show iron heart?
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. Put now, Titus.
  TITUS. lord, bill.
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. mine.
  HORTENSIUS. mine, lord.
  VARRO'S SERVANTS. ours, lord.
  PHILOTUS. bills.
  TIMON. Knock 'em; cleave girdle.
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. Alas, lord-
  TIMON. Cut heart sums.
  TITUS. Mine, fifty talents.  
  TIMON. blood.
  LUCIUS' SERVANT. thousand crowns, lord.
  TIMON. thousand drops pays that. yours? yours?
  VARRO'S SERVANT. lord-
  VARRO'S SERVANT. lord-
  TIMON. Tear me, me, gods fall you!      Exit
  HORTENSIUS. Faith, perceive masters throw caps at
    money. debts call'd desperate ones, a
    madman owes 'em.                                      Exeunt

                    Re-enter TIMON FLAVIUS

  TIMON. e'en put breath me, slaves.
    Creditors? Devils!
  FLAVIUS. dear lord-
  TIMON. so?
  FLAMINIUS. lord-
  TIMON. so. steward!
  FLAVIUS. Here, lord.
  TIMON. fitly? Go, bid friends again:  
    Lucius, Lucullus, Sempronius- all.
    feast rascals.
  FLAVIUS. O lord,
    speak distracted soul;
    left furnish out
    moderate table.
  TIMON. thy care.
    Go, charge thee, invite all; tide
    knaves more; cook provide.        Exeunt




SCENE V.
The Senate House

Enter SENATORS door, ALCIBIADES meeting them, attendants

  SENATOR. lord, voice to't: fault's bloody.
    'Tis die:
    emboldens sin mercy.
  SENATOR. true; law bruise him.
  ALCIBIADES. Honour, health, compassion, Senate!
  SENATOR. Now, Captain?
  ALCIBIADES. humble suitor virtues;
    pity virtue law,
    tyrants cruelly.
    pleases time fortune lie heavy
    friend mine, hot blood
    Hath stepp'd law, past depth
    heed plunge into't.
    man, setting fate aside,
    comely virtues;
    soil fact cowardice-  
    honour buys fault-
    noble fury fair spirit,
    reputation touch'd death,
    oppose foe;
    sober unnoted passion
    behove anger ere 'twas spent,
    prov'd argument.
  SENATOR. undergo strict paradox,
    Striving make ugly deed fair;
    words pains labour'd
    bring manslaughter form set
    Quarrelling head valour; which, indeed,
    valour misbegot, world
    sects factions newly born.
    valiant wisely suffer
    worst man breathe,
    make wrongs outsides,
    wear raiment, carelessly,
    ne'er prefer injuries heart,
    bring danger.  
    wrongs evils, enforce kill,
    folly 'tis hazard life ill!
  ALCIBIADES. lord-
  SENATOR. make gross sins clear:
    revenge valour, bear.
  ALCIBIADES. lords, then, favour, pardon me
    speak captain:
    fond men expose battle,
    endure threats? Sleep upon't,
    foes quietly cut throats,
    repugnancy? be
    valour bearing, make we
    Abroad? Why, then, women valiant,
    stay home, bearing carry it;
    ass captain lion; fellow
    Loaden irons wiser judge,
    wisdom suffering. O lords,
    great, pitifully good.
    condemn rashness cold blood?
    kill, grant, sin's extremest gust;  
    But, defence, mercy, 'tis just.
    anger impiety;
    man angry?
    Weigh crime this.
  SENATOR. breathe vain.
  ALCIBIADES. vain! service done
    Lacedaemon Byzantium
    sufficient briber life.
  SENATOR. that?
  ALCIBIADES. Why, say, lords, fair service,
    slain fight enemies;
    full valour bear himself
    conflict, made plenteous wounds!
  SENATOR. made plenty 'em.
    sworn rioter; sin often
    Drowns takes valour prisoner.
    foes, enough
    overcome him. beastly fury
    commit outrages
    cherish factions. 'Tis inferr'd  
    days foul drink dangerous.
  SENATOR. dies.
  ALCIBIADES. Hard fate! died war.
    lords, parts him-
    arm purchase time,
    debt none- yet, move you,
    deserts his, join 'em both;
    And, reverend ages love
    Security, pawn victories, all
    honours you, good returns.
    crime owes law life,
    Why, war receive't valiant gore;
    law strict, war more.
  SENATOR. law: dies. Urge more
    height displeasure. Friend brother,
    forfeits blood spills another.
  ALCIBIADES. so? be. lords,
    beseech you, me.
  SENATOR. How!
  ALCIBIADES. Call remembrances.  
  SENATOR. What!
  ALCIBIADES. age forgot me;
    prove base
    sue, denied common grace.
    wounds ache you.
  SENATOR. dare anger?
    'Tis words, spacious effect:
    banish thee ever.
  ALCIBIADES. Banish me!
    Banish dotage! Banish usury
    makes Senate ugly.
  SENATOR. days' shine Athens thee,
    Attend weightier judgment. And, swell spirit,
    executed presently.              Exeunt SENATORS
  ALCIBIADES. gods live
    bone, you!
    worse mad; back foes,
    told money out
    coin large interest, myself
    Rich large hurts. this?  
    balsam usuring Senate
    Pours captains' wounds? Banishment!
    ill; hate banish'd;
    worthy spleen fury,
    strike Athens. cheer up
    discontented troops, lay hearts.
    'Tis honour lands odds;
    Soldiers brook wrongs gods.         Exit




SCENE VI.
A banqueting hall TIMON'S house

Music. Tables set out; servants attending. Enter divers LORDS,
friends TIMON, doors

  LORD. good time day you, sir.
  LORD. you. honourable lord
    day.
  LORD. thoughts tiring encount'red.
    hope low made trial
    friends.
  LORD. be, persuasion new
    feasting.
  LORD. so. hath earnest inviting,
    occasions urge put off; hath
    conjur'd them, appear.
  LORD. manner debt importunate
    business, hear excuse. sorry, he
    borrow me, provision out.
  LORD. sick grief too, understand all
    things go.  
  LORD. man so. borrowed of
    you?
  LORD. thousand pieces.
  LORD. thousand pieces!
  LORD. you?
  LORD. me, sir- comes.

                   Enter TIMON attendants

  TIMON. heart, gentlemen both! fare you?
  LORD. best, hearing lordship.
  LORD. swallow summer we
    lordship.
  TIMON. [Aside] willingly leaves winter; summer-birds
    men- Gentlemen, dinner recompense long
    stay; feast ears music awhile, fare so
    harshly o' th' trumpet's sound; to't presently.
  LORD. hope remains unkindly lordship that
    return'd empty messenger.
  TIMON. O sir, trouble you.  
  LORD. noble lord-
  TIMON. Ah, good friend, cheer?
  LORD. honourable lord, e'en sick shame that,
    lordship day me, so
    unfortunate beggar.
  TIMON. on't, sir.
  LORD. hours before-
  TIMON. cumber remembrance. [The banquet
    brought in] Come, bring together.
  LORD. cover'd dishes!
  LORD. Royal cheer, warrant you.
  LORD. Doubt that, money season yield it.
  LORD. you? news?
  LORD. Alcibiades banish'd. Hear it?
  LORDS. Alcibiades banish'd!
  LORD. 'Tis so, it.
  LORD. How? how?
  LORD. pray you, what?
  TIMON. worthy friends, draw near?
  LORD. anon. noble feast toward.  
  LORD. man still.
  LORD. Will't hold? Will't hold?
  LORD. does; time will- so-
  LORD. conceive.
  TIMON. man stool spur lip
    mistress; diet places alike. Make not
    city feast it, meat cool ere agree upon
    place. Sit, sit. gods require thanks:

    great benefactors, sprinkle society thankfulness.
    gifts make prais'd; reserve to
    give, deities despised. Lend man enough,
    lend another; god-heads to
    borrow men, men forsake gods. Make meat be
    beloved man it. assembly of
    twenty score villains. sit twelve women
    table, dozen be- are. rest of
    foes, O gods, senators Athens, the
    common lag people, amiss them, gods, make
    suitable destruction. present friends,  
    nothing, bless them, are
    welcome.

    Uncover, dogs, lap.        [The dishes uncovered and
                                  full warm water]
  SPEAK. lordship mean?
  OTHER. not.
  TIMON. feast behold,
    knot mouth-friends! Smoke lukewarm water
    perfection. Timon's last;
    Who, stuck spangled flatteries,
    Washes off, sprinkles faces
                             [Throwing water faces]
    reeking villainy. Live loath'd long,
    smiling, smooth, detested parasites,
    Courteous destroyers, affable wolves, meek bears,
    fools fortune, trencher friends, time's flies,
    Cap knee slaves, vapours, minute-lacks!
    man beast infinite malady
    Crust o'er! What, dost thou go?  
    Soft, thy physic first; thou too, thou.
    Stay, lend thee money, borrow none.       [Throws the
                            dishes them, drives out]
    What, motion? Henceforth feast
    Whereat villain's guest.
    Burn house! Sink Athens! Henceforth hated be
    Timon man humanity!                          Exit

                           Re-enter LORDS

  LORD. now, lords!
  LORD. quality Lord Timon's fury?
  LORD. Push! cap?
  FOURTH LORD. lost gown.
  LORD. mad lord, nought humours sways him.
    gave jewel th' day, beat of
    hat. jewel?
  LORD. cap?
  LORD. 'tis.
  FOURTH LORD. lies gown.  
  LORD. make stay.
  LORD. Lord Timon's mad.
  LORD. feel't bones.
  FOURTH LORD. day diamonds, day stones.
                                                          Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE I.
Without walls Athens

Enter TIMON

  TIMON. back thee. O thou wall
    girdles wolves, dive earth
    fence Athens! Matrons, turn incontinent.
    Obedience, fail children! Slaves fools,
    Pluck grave wrinkled Senate bench
    minister steads. general filths
    Convert, o' th' instant, green virginity.
    Do't parents' eyes. Bankrupts, hold fast;
    render back, knives
    cut trusters' throats. Bound servants, steal:
    Large-handed robbers grave masters are,
    pill law. Maid, thy master's bed:
    Thy mistress o' th' brothel. Son sixteen,
    Pluck lin'd crutch thy limping sire,
    beat brains. Piety fear,
    Religion gods, peace, justice, truth,
    Domestic awe, night-rest, neighbourhood,  
    Instruction, manners, mysteries, trades,
    Degrees, observances, customs laws,
    Decline confounding contraries
    confusion live. Plagues incident men,
    potent infectious fevers heap
    Athens, ripe stroke. Thou cold sciatica,
    Cripple senators, limbs halt
    lamely manners. Lust liberty,
    Creep minds marrows youth,
    'gainst stream virtue strive
    drown riot. Itches, blains,
    Sow th' Athenian bosoms, crop
    general leprosy! Breath infect breath,
    society, friendship, may
    poison! bear thee
    nakedness, thou detestable town!
    thou too, multiplying bans.
    Timon woods, find
    Th' unkindest beast kinder mankind.
    gods confound- hear me, good gods all-  
    Athenians wall!
    grant, Timon grows, hate grow
    race mankind, high low!
    Amen.                                                   Exit




SCENE II.
Athens. TIMON's house

Enter FLAVIUS, SERVANTS

  SERVANT. Hear you, Master Steward, master?
    undone, cast off, remaining?
  FLAVIUS. Alack, fellows, you?
    recorded righteous gods,
    poor you.
  SERVANT. house broke!
    noble master fall'n! gone, not
    friend fortune arm
    him?
  SERVANT. turn backs
    companion, thrown grave,
    familiars buried fortunes
    Slink away; leave false vows him,
    empty purses pick'd; poor self,
    dedicated beggar air,
    disease all-shunn'd poverty,
    Walks, contempt, alone. fellows.  

                     Enter SERVANTS

  FLAVIUS. broken implements ruin'd house.
  SERVANT. hearts wear Timon's livery;
    faces. fellows still,
    Serving alike sorrow. Leak'd bark;
    we, poor mates, stand dying deck,
    Hearing surges threat. part
    sea air.
  FLAVIUS. Good fellows all,
    latest wealth share you.
    meet, Timon's sake,
    fellows; shake heads say,
    'twere knell master's fortune,
    'We days.' some.
                                             [Giving money]
    Nay, put hands. word more!
    part rich sorrow, parting poor.
                                [Embrace, part ways]  
    O fierce wretchedness glory brings us!
    wealth exempt,
    riches point misery contempt?
    mock'd glory, live
    dream friendship,
    pomp, state compounds,
    painted, varnish'd friends?
    Poor honest lord, brought low heart,
    Undone goodness! Strange, unusual blood,
    man's worst sin good!
    dares half kind again?
    bounty, makes gods, mar men.
    dearest lord- blest accurst,
    Rich wretched- thy great fortunes
    made thy chief afflictions. Alas, kind lord!
    flung rage ingrateful seat
    monstrous friends; to
    Supply life, command it.
    follow enquire out.
    serve mind will;  
    Whilst gold, steward still.          Exit




SCENE III.
The woods sea-shore. TIMON'S cave

Enter TIMON woods

  TIMON. O blessed breeding sun, draw earth
    Rotten humidity; thy sister's orb
    Infect air! Twinn'd brothers womb-
    procreation, residence, birth,
    Scarce dividant- touch fortunes:
    greater scorns lesser. nature,
    sores lay siege, bear great fortune
    contempt nature.
    Raise beggar deny't lord:
    senator bear contempt hereditary,
    beggar native honour.
    pasture lards rother's sides,
    makes lean. dares, dares,
    purity manhood stand upright,
    'This man's flatterer'? be,
    all; grise fortune
    smooth'd below. learned pate  
    Ducks golden fool. All's oblique;
    level cursed natures
    direct villainy. abhorr'd
    feasts, societies, throngs men!
    semblable, yea, himself, Timon disdains.
    Destruction fang mankind! Earth, yield roots.
                                                       [Digging]
    seeks thee, sauce palate
    thy operant poison. here?
    Gold? Yellow, glittering, precious gold? No, gods,
    idle votarist. Roots, clear heavens!
    make black white, foul fair,
    Wrong right, base noble, young, coward valiant.
    Ha, gods! this? What, this, gods? Why, this
    lug priests servants sides,
    Pluck stout men's pillows heads-
    yellow slave
    knit break religions, bless th' accurs'd,
    Make hoar leprosy ador'd, place thieves
    give title, knee, approbation,  
    senators bench. it
    makes wappen'd widow wed again-
    spital-house ulcerous sores
    cast gorge embalms spices
    'April day again. Come, damn'd earth,
    Thou common whore mankind, puts odds
    rout nations, make thee
    thy nature.                        [March afar off]
    Ha! drum? Th'art quick,
    bury thee. Thou't go, strong thief,
    gouty keepers thee stand.
    Nay, stay thou earnest.          [Keeping gold]

          Enter ALCIBIADES, drum fife, warlike
                  manner; PHRYNIA TIMANDRA

  ALCIBIADES. art thou there? Speak.
  TIMON. beast, thou art. canker gnaw thy heart
    showing eyes man!
  ALCIBIADES. thy name? man hateful thee  
    art thyself man?
  TIMON. Misanthropos, hate mankind.
    thy part, thou wert dog,
    love thee something.
  ALCIBIADES. thee well;
    thy fortunes unlearn'd strange.
  TIMON. thee too; thee
    desire know. Follow thy drum;
    man's blood paint ground, gules, gules.
    Religious canons, civil laws, cruel;
    war be? fell whore thine
    Hath destruction thy sword
    cherubin look.
  PHRYNIA. Thy lips rot off!
  TIMON. kiss thee; rot returns
    thine lips again.
  ALCIBIADES. noble Timon change?
  TIMON. moon does, wanting light give.
    renew not, moon;
    suns borrow of.  
  ALCIBIADES. Noble Timon,
    friendship thee?
  TIMON. None, to
    Maintain opinion.
  ALCIBIADES. it, Timon?
  TIMON. Promise friendship, perform none. thou wilt not
    promise, gods plague thee, thou art man! thou dost
    perform, confound thee, thou art man!
  ALCIBIADES. heard sort thy miseries.
  TIMON. Thou saw'st prosperity.
  ALCIBIADES. now; blessed time.
  TIMON. thine now, held brace harlots.
  TIMANDRA. th' Athenian minion world
    Voic'd regardfully?
  TIMON. Art thou Timandra?
  TIMANDRA. Yes.
  TIMON. whore still; love thee thee.
    Give diseases, leaving thee lust.
    Make thy salt hours. Season slaves
    tubs baths; bring rose-cheek'd youth  
    tub-fast diet.
  TIMANDRA. Hang thee, monster!
  ALCIBIADES. Pardon him, sweet Timandra, wits
    drown'd lost calamities.
    gold late, brave Timon,
    whereof doth daily make revolt
    penurious band. heard, griev'd,
    cursed Athens, mindless thy worth,
    Forgetting thy great deeds, neighbour states,
    thy sword fortune, trod them-
  TIMON. prithee beat thy drum thee gone.
  ALCIBIADES. thy friend, pity thee, dear Timon.
  TIMON. dost thou pity thou dost trouble?
    alone.
  ALCIBIADES. Why, fare thee well;
    gold thee.
  TIMON. it: eat it.
  ALCIBIADES. laid proud Athens heap-
  TIMON. War'st thou 'gainst Athens?
  ALCIBIADES. Ay, Timon, cause.  
  TIMON. gods confound thy conquest;
    thee after, thou hast conquer'd!
  ALCIBIADES. me, Timon?
  TIMON. killing villains
    Thou wast born conquer country.
    Put thy gold. on. gold. on.
    planetary plague, Jove
    o'er high-vic'd city hang poison
    sick air; thy sword skip one.
    Pity honour'd age white beard:
    usurer. Strike counterfeit matron:
    habit honest,
    Herself's bawd. virgin's cheek
    Make soft thy trenchant sword; milk paps
    window bars bore men's eyes
    leaf pity writ,
    set horrible traitors. Spare babe
    dimpled smiles fools exhaust mercy;
    bastard oracle
    Hath doubtfully pronounc'd thy throat cut,  
    mince sans remorse. Swear abjects;
    Put armour thine ears thine eyes,
    proof yells mothers, maids, babes,
    sight priests holy vestments bleeding,
    pierce jot. gold pay thy soldiers.
    Make large confusion; and, thy fury spent,
    Confounded thyself! Speak not, gone.
  ALCIBIADES. Hast thou gold yet? gold thou givest me,
    thy counsel.
  TIMON. Dost thou, dost thou not, heaven's curse thee!
  PHRYNIA TIMANDRA. Give gold, good Timon.
    Hast thou more?
  TIMON. make whore forswear trade,
    make whores bawd. Hold up, sluts,
    aprons mountant; oathable,
    swear, terribly swear,
    strong shudders heavenly agues,
    Th' immortal gods hear you. Spare oaths;
    trust conditions. whores still;
    pious breath seeks convert you-  
    strong whore, allure him, burn up;
    close fire predominate smoke,
    turncoats. pains months
    contrary! thatch poor thin roofs
    burdens dead- hang'd,
    matter. Wear them, betray them. Whore still;
    Paint till horse mire face.
    pox wrinkles!
  PHRYNIA TIMANDRA. Well, gold. then?
    Believe't gold.
  TIMON. Consumptions sow
    hollow bones man; strike sharp shins,
    mar men's spurring. Crack lawyer's voice,
    false title plead,
    sound quillets shrilly. Hoar flamen,
    scolds quality flesh
    believes himself. nose,
    flat, bridge away
    that, foresee,
    Smells general weal. Make curl'd-pate ruffians bald,  
    unscarr'd braggarts war
    Derive pain you. Plague all,
    activity defeat quell
    source erection. gold.
    damn others, damn you,
    ditches grave all!
  PHRYNIA TIMANDRA. counsel money, bounteous
    Timon.
  TIMON. whore, mischief first; earnest.
  ALCIBIADES. Strike drum Athens. Farewell, Timon;
    thrive well, visit thee again.
  TIMON. hope well, thee more.
  ALCIBIADES. thee harm.
  TIMON. Yes, thou spok'st me.
  ALCIBIADES. Call'st thou harm?
  TIMON. Men daily find it. thee away, take
    Thy beagles thee.
  ALCIBIADES. offend him. Strike.
                                Drum beats. Exeunt TIMON
  TIMON. nature, sick man's unkindness,  
    hungry! Common mother, thou,         [Digging]
    womb unmeasurable infinite breast
    Teems feeds all; self-same mettle,
    Whereof thy proud child, arrogant man, puff'd,
    Engenders black toad adder blue,
    gilded newt eyeless venom'd worm,
    th' abhorred births crisp heaven
    Whereon Hyperion's quick'ning fire doth shine-
    Yield him, thy human sons doth hate,
    thy plenteous bosom, poor root!
    Ensear thy fertile conceptious womb,
    bring ingrateful man!
    great tigers, dragons, wolves, bears;
    Teem monsters thy upward face
    Hath marbled mansion above
    presented!- O, root! Dear thanks!-
    Dry thy marrows, vines, plough-torn leas,
    Whereof ingrateful man, liquorish draughts
    morsels unctuous, greases pure mind,
    consideration slips-  

                        Enter APEMANTUS

    man? Plague, plague!
  APEMANTUS. directed hither. Men report
    Thou dost affect manners dost them.
  TIMON. 'Tis, then, thou dost dog,
    imitate. Consumption catch thee!
  APEMANTUS. thee nature infected,
    poor unmanly melancholy sprung
    change fortune. spade, place?
    slave-like habit care?
    Thy flatterers wear silk, drink wine, lie soft,
    Hug diseas'd perfumes, forgot
    Timon was. Shame woods
    putting cunning carper.
    thou flatterer now, seek thrive
    undone thee: hinge thy knee,
    breath thou'lt observe
    Blow thy cap; praise vicious strain,  
    call excellent. Thou wast told thus;
    Thou gav'st thine ears, tapsters bade welcome,
    knaves approachers. 'Tis just
    thou turn rascal; hadst thou wealth again
    Rascals have't. assume likeness.
  TIMON. thee, throw myself.
  APEMANTUS. Thou hast cast thyself, thyself;
    madman long, fool. What, think'st
    bleak air, thy boisterous chamberlain,
    put thy shirt warm? moist trees,
    outliv'd eagle, page thy heels
    skip thou point'st out? cold brook,
    Candied ice, caudle thy morning taste
    cure thy o'ernight's surfeit? Call creatures
    naked natures live spite
    wreakful heaven, bare unhoused trunks,
    conflicting elements expos'd,
    Answer mere nature- bid flatter thee.
    O, thou shalt find-
  TIMON. fool thee. Depart.  
  APEMANTUS. love thee e'er did.
  TIMON. hate thee worse.
  APEMANTUS. Why?
  TIMON. Thou flatter'st misery.
  APEMANTUS. flatter not, thou art caitiff.
  TIMON. dost thou seek out?
  APEMANTUS. vex thee.
  TIMON. villain's office fool's.
    Dost thyself in't?
  APEMANTUS. Ay.
  TIMON. What, knave too?
  APEMANTUS. thou didst put sour-cold habit on
    castigate thy pride, 'twere well; thou
    Dost enforcedly. Thou'dst courtier again
    Wert thou beggar. misery
    Outlives incertain pomp, crown'd before.
    filling still, complete;
    other, high wish. state, contentless,
    Hath distracted wretched being,
    Worse worst, content.  
    Thou should'st desire die, miserable.
  TIMON. breath miserable.
    Thou art slave Fortune's tender arm
    favour clasp'd, bred dog.
    Hadst thou, swath, proceeded
    sweet degrees world affords
    passive drugs it
    Freely command, thou wouldst plung'd thyself
    general riot, melted thy youth
    beds lust, learn'd
    icy precepts respect, followed
    sug'red game thee. myself,
    world confectionary;
    mouths, tongues, eyes, hearts men
    duty, frame employment;
    numberless stuck, leaves
    oak, winter's brush
    Fell boughs, left open, bare
    storm blows- bear this,
    knew better, burden.  
    Thy nature commence sufferance; time
    Hath made thee hard in't. shouldst thou hate men?
    flatter'd thee. hast thou given?
    thou wilt curse, thy father, poor rag,
    thy subject; who, spite, put stuff
    she-beggar compounded thee
    Poor rogue hereditary. Hence, gone.
    thou hadst born worst men,
    Thou hadst knave flatterer.
  APEMANTUS. Art thou proud yet?
  TIMON. Ay, thee.
  APEMANTUS. I, was
    prodigal.
  TIMON. I, now.
    wealth shut thee,
    give thee leave hang it. thee gone.
    life Athens this!
    eat it.                         [Eating root]
  APEMANTUS. Here! mend thy feast.
                                             [Offering food]  
  TIMON. mend company: thyself.
  APEMANTUS. mend mine th' lack thine.
  TIMON. 'Tis mended so; botch'd.
    not, were.
  APEMANTUS. wouldst thou Athens?
  TIMON. Thee thither whirlwind. thou wilt,
    gold; look, have.
  APEMANTUS. gold.
  TIMON. truest;
    sleeps hired harm.
  APEMANTUS. liest nights, Timon?
  TIMON. me.
    feed'st thou days, Apemantus?
  APEMANTUS. stomach. finds meat; rather, eat it.
  TIMON. poison obedient, knew mind!
  APEMANTUS. wouldst thou send it?
  TIMON. sauce thy dishes.
  APEMANTUS. middle humanity thou knewest, the
    extremity ends. thou wast thy gilt thy
    perfume, mock'd thee curiosity; thy rags  
    thou know'st none, art despis'd contrary. a
    medlar thee; eat it.
  TIMON. hate feed not.
  APEMANTUS. Dost hate medlar?
  TIMON. Ay, thee.
  APEMANTUS. th' hadst hated medlars sooner, thou shouldst have
    loved thyself now. man didst thou unthrift
    beloved means?
  TIMON. Who, means thou talk'st of, didst thou ever
    belov'd?
  APEMANTUS. Myself.
  TIMON. understand thee: thou hadst means dog.
  APEMANTUS. things world canst thou nearest compare to
    thy flatterers?
  TIMON. Women nearest; men, men things themselves. What
    wouldst thou world, Apemantus, lay thy
    power?
  APEMANTUS. Give beasts, rid men.
  TIMON. Wouldst thou thyself fall confusion men, and
    remain beast beasts?  
  APEMANTUS. Ay, Timon.
  TIMON. beastly ambition, gods grant thee t' attain to!
    thou wert lion, fox beguile thee; thou wert
    lamb, fox eat thee; thou wert fox, lion
    suspect thee, when, peradventure, thou wert accus'd the
    ass. thou wert ass, thy dulness torment thee; and
    thou liv'dst breakfast wolf. thou wert
    wolf, thy greediness afflict thee, oft thou
    shouldst hazard thy life thy dinner. Wert thou unicorn,
    pride wrath confound thee, make thine the
    conquest thy fury. Wert thou bear, thou wouldst kill'd by
    horse; wert thou horse, thou wouldst seiz'd the
    leopard; wert thou leopard, thou wert german lion, and
    spots thy kindred jurors thy life. thy safety
    remotion, thy defence absence. beast couldst thou
    subject beast? beast art thou
    already, seest thy loss transformation!
  APEMANTUS. thou couldst speaking me, thou
    mightst hit here. commonwealth Athens is
    forest beasts.  
  TIMON. ass broke wall, thou art the
    city?
  APEMANTUS. Yonder poet painter. plague company
    light thee! fear catch it, give way. I
    do, thee again.
  TIMON. living thee, thou shalt be
    welcome. beggar's dog Apemantus.
  APEMANTUS. Thou art cap fools alive.
  TIMON. thou wert clean spit upon!
  APEMANTUS. plague thee! thou art bad curse.
  TIMON. villains stand thee pure.
  APEMANTUS. leprosy thou speak'st.
  TIMON. thee.
    beat thee- infect hands.
  APEMANTUS. tongue rot off!
  TIMON. Away, thou issue mangy dog!
    Choler kill thou art alive;
    swoon thee.
  APEMANTUS. thou wouldst burst!
  TIMON. Away,  
    Thou tedious rogue! lose
    stone thee.                     [Throws stone him]
  APEMANTUS. Beast!
  TIMON. Slave!
  APEMANTUS. Toad!
  TIMON. Rogue, rogue, rogue!
    sick false world, love nought
    mere necessities upon't.
    Then, Timon, presently prepare thy grave;
    Lie light foam sea beat
    Thy gravestone daily; make thine epitaph,
    death others' lives laugh.
    [Looks gold] O thou sweet king-killer, dear divorce
    'Twixt natural son sire! thou bright defiler
    Hymen's purest bed! thou valiant Mars!
    Thou young, fresh, lov'd, delicate wooer,
    blush doth thaw consecrated snow
    lies Dian's lap! thou visible god,
    sold'rest close impossibilities,
    mak'st kiss! speak'st tongue  
    purpose! O thou touch hearts!
    thy slave man rebels, thy virtue
    Set confounding odds, beasts
    world empire!
  APEMANTUS. 'twere so!
    till dead. th' hast gold.
    Thou wilt throng'd shortly.
  TIMON. Throng'd to?
  APEMANTUS. Ay.
  TIMON. Thy back, prithee.
  APEMANTUS. Live, love thy misery!
  TIMON. Long live so, die! [Exit APEMANTUS] quit. More
    things men? Eat, Timon, abhor them.

                       Enter BANDITTI

  BANDIT. gold? poor
    fragment, slender ort remainder. mere of
    gold falling-from friends drove this
    melancholy.  
  BANDIT. nois'd hath mass treasure.
  BANDIT. make assay him; care for't,
    supply easily; covetously reserve it, how
    shall's it?
  BANDIT. True; bears him. 'Tis hid.
  BANDIT. he?
  BANDITTI. Where?
  BANDIT. 'Tis description.
  BANDIT. He; him.
  BANDITTI. Save thee, Timon!
  TIMON. Now, thieves?
  BANDITTI. Soldiers, thieves.
  TIMON. too, women's sons.
  BANDITTI. thieves, men want.
  TIMON. greatest is, meat.
    want? Behold, earth hath roots;
    mile break hundred springs;
    oaks bear mast, briars scarlet hips;
    bounteous housewife Nature bush
    Lays full mess you. Want! want?  
  BANDIT. live grass, berries, water,
    beasts birds fishes.
  TIMON. beasts themselves, birds, fishes;
    eat men. con
    thieves profess'd, work not
    holier shapes; boundless theft
    limited professions. Rascal thieves,
    gold. Go, suck subtle blood o' th' grape
    Till high fever seethe blood froth,
    scape hanging. Trust physician;
    antidotes poison, slays
    Moe rob. wealth lives together;
    villainy, do, protest do't,
    workmen. thievery:
    sun's thief, great attraction
    Robs vast sea; moon's arrant thief,
    pale fire snatches sun;
    sea's thief, liquid surge resolves
    moon salt tears; earth's thief,
    feeds breeds composture stol'n  
    gen'ral excrement- thing's thief.
    laws, curb whip, rough power
    uncheck'd theft. Love yourselves; away,
    Rob another. gold. Cut throats;
    meet thieves. Athens go,
    Break open shops; steal
    thieves lose it. Steal this
    give you; gold confound howsoe'er!
    Amen.
  BANDIT. charm'd profession by
    persuading it.
  BANDIT. 'Tis malice mankind advises
    us; thrive mystery.
  BANDIT. enemy, give my
    trade.
  BANDIT. peace Athens. time so
    miserable man true.              Exeunt THIEVES

                         Enter FLAVIUS, TIMON
  
  FLAVIUS. O gods!
    yond despis'd ruinous man lord?
    Full decay failing? O monument
    good deeds evilly bestow'd!
    alteration honour
    desp'rate made!
    viler thing earth friends,
    bring noblest minds basest ends!
    rarely meet time's guise,
    man wish'd love enemies!
    Grant love, woo
    mischief do!
    caught eye; present
    honest grief him, lord
    serve life. dearest master!
  TIMON. Away! art thou?
  FLAVIUS. forgot me, sir?
  TIMON. dost that? forgot men;
    Then, thou grant'st th'art man, forgot thee.
  FLAVIUS. honest poor servant yours.  
  TIMON. thee not.
    honest man me, I.
    knaves, serve meat villains.
  FLAVIUS. gods witness,
    Nev'r poor steward wear truer grief
    undone lord mine eyes you.
  TIMON. What, dost thou weep? nearer. love thee
    thou art woman disclaim'st
    Flinty mankind, eyes give
    lust laughter. Pity's sleeping.
    Strange times, weep laughing, weeping!
  FLAVIUS. beg me, good lord,
    T' accept grief, whilst poor wealth lasts
    entertain steward still.
  TIMON. steward
    true, just, comfortable?
    turns dangerous nature mild.
    behold thy face. Surely, man
    born woman.
    Forgive general exceptless rashness,  
    perpetual-sober gods! proclaim
    honest man- mistake not, one;
    more, pray- steward.
    fain hated mankind!
    thou redeem'st thyself. all, save thee,
    fell curses.
    Methinks thou art honest wise;
    oppressing betraying me
    Thou mightst sooner service;
    arrive masters
    lord's neck. true,
    doubt ne'er sure,
    thy kindness subtle, covetous,
    usuring kindness, rich men deal gifts,
    Expecting return twenty one?
  FLAVIUS. No, worthy master, breast
    Doubt suspect, alas, plac'd late!
    fear'd false times feast:
    Suspect estate least.
    show, heaven knows, love,  
    Duty, zeal, unmatched mind,
    Care food living; it,
    honour'd lord,
    benefit points me,
    hope present, exchange
    wish, power wealth
    requite making rich yourself.
  TIMON. thee, 'tis so! Thou singly honest man,
    Here, take. gods, misery,
    thee treasure. Go, live rich happy,
    condition'd; thou shalt build men;
    Hate all, curse all, show charity none,
    famish'd flesh slide bone
    Ere thou relieve beggar. Give dogs
    thou deniest men; prisons swallow 'em,
    Debts wither 'em nothing. men blasted woods,
    diseases lick false bloods!
    so, farewell thrive.
  FLAVIUS. O, stay
    comfort you, master.  
  TIMON. thou hat'st curses,
    Stay not; fly whilst thou art blest free.
    Ne'er thou man, ne'er thee.
                                                Exeunt severally

ACT V. SCENE I.
The woods. TIMON's cave

Enter POET PAINTER

  PAINTER. note place, he
    abides.
  POET. thought him? rumour hold true he's
    full gold?
  PAINTER. Certain. Alcibiades reports it; Phrynia Timandra had
    gold him. likewise enrich'd poor straggling soldiers with
    great quantity. 'Tis gave steward mighty sum.
  POET. breaking friends?
  PAINTER. else. palm Athens again,
    flourish highest. 'tis amiss tender
    loves suppos'd distress his; show
    honestly us, load purposes what
    travail for, true report his
    having.
  POET. present him?
  PAINTER. time visitation; will
    promise excellent piece.  
  POET. serve too, intent coming
    him.
  PAINTER. Good best. Promising air o' th' time;
    opens eyes expectation. Performance duller
    act, plainer simpler kind people
    deed use. promise most
    courtly fashionable; performance kind or
    testament argues great sickness judgment that
    makes it.

                    Enter TIMON cave

  TIMON. [Aside] Excellent workman! Thou canst paint man bad
    thyself.
  POET. thinking provided him. It
    personating himself; satire softness
    prosperity, discovery infinite flatteries that
    follow youth opulency.
  TIMON. [Aside] thou stand villain thine own
    work? Wilt thou whip thine faults men? so,  
    gold thee.
  POET. Nay, seek him;
    sin estate
    profit meet late.
  PAINTER. True;
    day serves, black-corner'd night,
    Find thou want'st free offer'd light.
    Come.
  TIMON. [Aside] meet turn. god's gold,
    worshipp'd baser temple
    swine feed!
    'Tis thou rig'st bark plough'st foam,
    Settlest admired reverence slave.
    thee worship! thy saints aye
    crown'd plagues, thee obey!
    Fit meet them.                   [Advancing cave]
  POET. Hail, worthy Timon!
  PAINTER. late noble master!
  TIMON. liv'd honest men?
  POET. Sir,  
    open bounty tasted,
    Hearing retir'd, friends fall'n off,
    thankless natures- O abhorred spirits!-
    whips heaven large enough-
    What! you,
    star-like nobleness gave life influence
    being! rapt, cover
    monstrous bulk ingratitude
    size words.
  TIMON. naked: men see't better.
    honest, are,
    Make known.
  PAINTER. myself
    travail'd great show'r gifts,
    sweetly felt it.
  TIMON. Ay, honest men.
  PAINTER. offer service.
  TIMON. honest men! Why, requite you?
    eat roots, drink cold water- No?
  BOTH. do, do, service.  
  TIMON. Y'are honest men. Y'have heard gold;
    have. Speak truth; y'are honest men.
  PAINTER. said, noble lord; therefore
    friend I.
  TIMON. Good honest men! Thou draw'st counterfeit
    Athens. Th'art best;
    Thou counterfeit'st lively.
  PAINTER. So, so, lord.
  TIMON. E'en so, sir, say. [To POET] thy fiction,
    Why, thy verse swells stuff fine smooth
    thou art natural thine art.
    this, honest-natur'd friends,
    fault.
    Marry, 'tis monstrous you; I
    pains mend.
  BOTH. Beseech honour
    make us.
  TIMON. ill.
  BOTH. thankfully, lord.
  TIMON. indeed?  
  BOTH. Doubt not, worthy lord.
  TIMON. trusts knave
    mightily deceives you.
  BOTH. we, lord?
  TIMON. Ay, hear cog, dissemble,
    gross patchery, love him, feed him,
    bosom; remain assur'd
    made-up villain.
  PAINTER. such, lord.
  POET. I.
  TIMON. you, love well; give gold,
    Rid villains companies.
    Hang stab them, drown draught,
    Confound course, me,
    give gold enough.
  BOTH. them, lord; them.
  TIMON. way, this- company;
    man apart, single alone,
    arch-villain company.
    [To PAINTER] If, thou art, villians be,  
    him. [To POET] thou wouldst reside
    villain is, abandon.-
    Hence, pack! gold; gold, ye slaves.
    [To PAINTER] work me; payment; hence!
    [To POET] alchemist; make gold that.-
    Out, rascal dogs!                [Beats drives out]

                    Enter FLAVIUS SENATORS

  FLAVIUS. vain speak Timon;
    set himself
    man
    friendly him.
  SENATOR. Bring cave.
    part promise th' Athenians
    speak Timon.
  SENATOR. times alike
    Men same; 'twas time griefs
    fram'd thus. Time, fairer hand,
    Offering fortunes days,  
    man make him. Bring him,
    chance may.
  FLAVIUS. cave.
    Peace content here! Lord Timon! Timon!
    out, speak friends. Th' Athenians
    reverend Senate greet thee.
    Speak them, noble Timon.

                   Enter TIMON cave

  TIMON. Thou sun comforts, burn. Speak hang'd!
    true word blister, false
    cauterizing root o' th' tongue,
    Consuming speaking!
  SENATOR. Worthy Timon-
  TIMON. you, Timon.
  SENATOR. senators Athens greet thee, Timon.
  TIMON. them; send back plague,
    catch them.
  SENATOR. O, forget  
    thee.
    senators consent love
    Entreat thee back Athens, thought
    special dignities, vacant lie
    thy wearing.
  SENATOR. confess
    thee forgetfulness general, gross;
    public body, doth seldom
    Play recanter, feeling itself
    lack Timon's aid, hath sense withal
    fail, restraining aid Timon,
    send make sorrowed render,
    recompense fruitful
    offence weigh dram;
    Ay, heaps sums love wealth
    thee blot wrongs theirs
    write thee figures love,
    read thine.
  TIMON. witch it;
    Surprise brink tears.  
    Lend fool's heart woman's eyes,
    beweep comforts, worthy senators.
  SENATOR. thee return us,
    Athens, thine ours, take
    captainship, thou shalt met thanks,
    Allow'd absolute power, thy good name
    Live authority. drive back
    Alcibiades th' approaches wild,
    Who, boar savage, doth root up
    country's peace.
  SENATOR. shakes threat'ning sword
    walls Athens.
  SENATOR. Therefore, Timon-
  TIMON. Well, sir, will. will, sir, thus:
    Alcibiades kill countrymen,
    Alcibiades Timon,
    Timon cares not. sack fair Athens,
    goodly aged men th' beards,
    Giving holy virgins stain
    contumelious, beastly, mad-brain'd war,  
    know- Timon speaks it
    pity aged youth-
    choose care not,
    take't worst; knives care not,
    throats answer. myself,
    whittle th' unruly camp
    prize love before
    reverend'st throat Athens. leave you
    protection prosperous gods,
    thieves keepers.
  FLAVIUS. Stay not, all's vain.
  TIMON. Why, writing epitaph;
    to-morrow. long sickness
    health living begins mend,
    brings things. Go, live still;
    Alcibiades plague, his,
    long enough!
  SENATOR. speak vain.
  TIMON. love country, not
    rejoices common wreck,  
    common bruit doth put it.
  SENATOR. spoke.
  TIMON. Commend loving countrymen-
  SENATOR. words lips pass through
    them.
  SENATOR. enter ears great triumphers
    applauding gates.
  TIMON. Commend them,
    that, ease griefs,
    fears hostile strokes, aches, losses,
    pangs love, incident throes
    nature's fragile vessel doth sustain
    life's uncertain voyage, kindness them-
    teach prevent wild Alcibiades' wrath.
  SENATOR. well; return again.
  TIMON. tree, grows close,
    mine invites cut down,
    shortly fell it. friends,
    Athens, sequence degree
    high low throughout, whoso  
    stop affliction, haste,
    hither, ere tree hath felt axe,
    hang himself. pray greeting.
  FLAVIUS. Trouble further; find him.
  TIMON. again; Athens
    Timon hath made everlasting mansion
    beached verge salt flood,
    day embossed froth
    turbulent surge cover. Thither come,
    gravestone oracle.
    Lips, sour words language end:
    amiss, plague infection mend!
    Graves men's works death gain!
    Sun, hide thy beams. Timon hath reign.
                                        Exit TIMON cave
  SENATOR. discontents unremovably
    Coupled nature.
  SENATOR. hope dead. return
    strain means left us
    dear peril.  
  SENATOR. requires swift foot.                  Exeunt




SCENE II.
Before walls Athens

Enter SENATORS MESSENGER

  SENATOR. Thou hast painfully discover'd; files
    full thy report?
  MESSENGER. spoke least.
    Besides, expedition promises
    Present approach.
  SENATOR. stand hazard bring Timon.
  MESSENGER. met courier, mine ancient friend,
    Whom, general part oppos'd,
    love force,
    made speak friends. man riding
    Alcibiades Timon's cave
    letters entreaty, imported
    fellowship i' th' city,
    part sake mov'd.

               Enter SENATORS, TIMON
  
  SENATOR. brothers.
  SENATOR. talk Timon, expect.
    enemies' drum heard, fearful scouring
    Doth choke air dust. In, prepare.
    fall, fear; foes snare.         Exeunt




SCENE III.
The TIMON's cave, rude tomb seen

Enter SOLDIER woods, seeking TIMON

  SOLDIER. description place.
    here? Speak, ho! answer? this?
    Timon dead, hath outstretch'd span.
    beast rear'd this; live man.
    Dead, sure; grave. tomb
    read; character wax.
    captain hath figure skill,
    ag'd interpreter, young days;
    proud Athens set this,
    fall mark ambition is.                 Exit




SCENE IV.
Before walls Athens

Trumpets sound. Enter ALCIBIADES powers Athens

  ALCIBIADES. Sound coward lascivious town
    terrible approach.

       Sound parley. SENATORS walls

    Till fill'd time
    licentious measure, making wills
    scope justice; till now, myself, such
    slept shadow power,
    wander'd travers'd arms, breath'd
    sufferance vainly. time flush,
    crouching marrow, bearer strong,
    Cries 'No more!' breathless wrong
    sit pant great chairs ease,
    pursy insolence break wind
    fear horrid flight.
  SENATOR. Noble young,  
    thy griefs mere conceit,
    Ere thou hadst power fear,
    thee, give thy rages balm,
    wipe ingratitude loves
    quantity.
  SENATOR. woo
    Transformed Timon city's love
    humble message promis'd means.
    unkind, deserve
    common stroke war.
  SENATOR. walls ours
    erected hands whom
    receiv'd griefs; such
    great tow'rs, trophies, schools, fall
    private faults them.
  SENATOR. living
    motives out;
    Shame, wanted cunning, excess
    Hath broke hearts. March, noble lord,
    city thy banners spread.  
    decimation tithed death-
    thy revenges hunger food
    nature loathes- thou destin'd tenth,
    hazard spotted die
    die spotted.
  SENATOR. offended;
    were, square take,
    are, revenge: crimes, lands,
    inherited. Then, dear countryman,
    Bring thy ranks, leave thy rage;
    Spare thy Athenian cradle, kin
    Which, bluster thy wrath, fall
    offended. shepherd
    Approach fold cull th' infected forth,
    kill together.
  SENATOR. thou wilt,
    Thou shalt enforce thy smile
    hew to't thy sword.
  SENATOR. Set thy foot
    rampir'd gates ope,  
    thou wilt send thy gentle heart before
    thou't enter friendly.
  SENATOR. Throw thy glove,
    token thine honour else,
    thou wilt wars thy redress
    confusion, thy powers
    make harbour town till we
    seal'd thy full desire.
  ALCIBIADES. glove;
    Descend, open uncharged ports.
    enemies Timon's mine own,
    set reproof,
    Fall, more. And, atone fears
    noble meaning, man
    pass quarter offend stream
    regular justice city's bounds,
    render'd public laws
    heaviest answer.
  BOTH. 'Tis nobly spoken.
  ALCIBIADES. Descend, words.  
                       [The SENATORS descend open gates]

                 Enter SOLDIER Messenger

  SOLDIER. noble General, Timon dead;
    Entomb'd hem o' th' sea;
    grave-stone insculpture, which
    wax brought away, soft impression
    Interprets poor ignorance.

                  ALCIBIADES reads Epitaph

    'Here lies wretched corse, wretched soul bereft;
    Seek name. plague consume wicked caitiffs left!
    lie I, Timon, alive living men hate.
    Pass by, curse thy fill; pass, stay thy
      gait.'
    express thee thy spirits.
    thou abhorr'dst human griefs,
    Scorn'dst brain's flow, droplets  
    niggard nature fall, rich conceit
    Taught thee make vast Neptune weep aye
    thy low grave, faults forgiven. Dead
    noble Timon, memory
    more. Bring city,
    olive, sword;
    Make war breed peace, make peace stint war, make each
    Prescribe other, other's leech.
    drums strike.                                 Exeunt

THE END

1594

THE TRAGEDY TITUS ANDRONICUS

by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  SATURNINUS, son late Emperor Rome, Emperor
  BASSIANUS, brother Saturninus
  TITUS ANDRONICUS, noble Roman
  MARCUS ANDRONICUS, Tribune People, brother Titus

    Sons Titus Andronicus:
  LUCIUS
  QUINTUS
  MARTIUS
  MUTIUS

  YOUNG LUCIUS, boy, son Lucius
  PUBLIUS, son Marcus Andronicus

    Kinsmen Titus:
  SEMPRONIUS
  CAIUS
  VALENTINE

  AEMILIUS, noble Roman  

    Sons Tamora:
  ALARBUS
  DEMETRIUS
  CHIRON

  AARON, Moor, beloved Tamora
  CAPTAIN
  MESSENGER
  CLOWN

  TAMORA, Queen Goths
  LAVINIA, daughter Titus Andronicus
  NURSE, black CHILD

  Romans Goths, Senators, Tribunes, Officers, Soldiers, and
    Attendants




<<THIS ELECTRONIC VERSION COMPLETE WORKS WILLIAM
SHAKESPEARE COPYRIGHT 1990-1993 WORLD LIBRARY, INC., IS
PROVIDED PROJECT GUTENBERG ETEXT ILLINOIS BENEDICTINE COLLEGE

COMMERCIALLY.  PROHIBITED COMMERCIAL DISTRIBUTION INCLUDES ANY
