                          SCENE:
               Rome neighbourhood


ACT 1. SCENE I.
Rome. Capitol

Flourish. Enter TRIBUNES SENATORS aloft; enter below
SATURNINUS followers door, BASSIANUS followers
at other, drums trumpets

  SATURNINUS. Noble patricians, patrons right,
    Defend justice arms;
    And, countrymen, loving followers,
    Plead successive title swords.
    born son last
    ware imperial diadem Rome;
    father's honours live me,
    wrong mine age indignity.
  BASSIANUS. Romans, friends, followers, favourers right,
    Bassianus, Caesar's son,
    gracious eyes royal Rome,
    passage Capitol;
    suffer dishonour approach
    imperial seat, virtue consecrate,  
    justice, continence, nobility;
    desert pure election shine;
    And, Romans, fight freedom choice.

        Enter MARCUS ANDRONICUS aloft, crown

  MARCUS. Princes, strive factions friends
    Ambitiously rule empery,
    people Rome, stand
    special party, common voice
    election Roman empery
    Chosen Andronicus, surnamed Pius
    good great deserts Rome.
    nobler man, braver warrior,
    Lives day city walls.
    Senate accited home,
    weary wars barbarous Goths,
    sons, terror foes,
    Hath yok'd nation strong, train'd arms.
    Ten years spent undertook  
    Rome, chastised arms
    enemies' pride; times hath return'd
    Bleeding Rome, bearing valiant sons
    coffins field; day
    monument Andronici
    sacrifice expiation,
    slain noblest prisoner Goths.
    last, laden honour's spoils,
    Returns good Andronicus Rome,
    Renowned Titus, flourishing arms.
    entreat, honour name
    worthily succeed,
    Capitol Senate's right,
    pretend honour adore,
    withdraw abate strength,
    Dismiss followers, and, suitors should,
    Plead deserts peace humbleness.
  SATURNINUS. fair Tribune speaks calm thoughts.
  BASSIANUS. Marcus Andronicus, affy
    thy uprightness integrity,  
    love honour thee thine,
    Thy noble brother Titus sons,
    thoughts humbled all,
    Gracious Lavinia, Rome's rich ornament,
    dismiss loving friends,
    fortunes people's favour
    Commit balance weigh'd.
                                Exeunt soldiers BASSIANUS
  SATURNINUS. Friends, forward right,
    dismiss all,
    love favour country
    Commit myself, person, cause.
                               Exeunt soldiers SATURNINUS
    Rome, gracious me
    confident kind thee.
    Open gates in.
  BASSIANUS. Tribunes, me, poor competitor.
                    [Flourish. Senate House]

                      Enter CAPTAIN  

  CAPTAIN. Romans, make way. good Andronicus,
    Patron virtue, Rome's champion,
    Successful battles fights,
    honour fortune return'd
    circumscribed sword
    brought yoke enemies Rome.

        Sound drums trumpets, enter MARTIUS
        MUTIUS, TITUS' sons; men
        bearing coffin covered black; LUCIUS
        QUINTUS, sons; TITUS ANDRONICUS;
        TAMORA Queen Goths, three
        sons, ALARBUS, DEMETRIUS, CHIRON, AARON the
        Moor, others,  be. set down
        coffin TITUS speaks

  TITUS. Hail, Rome, victorious thy mourning weeds!
    Lo, bark hath discharg'd fraught
    Returns precious lading bay  
    weigh'd anchorage,
    Cometh Andronicus, bound laurel boughs,
    re-salute country tears,
    Tears true joy return Rome.
    Thou great defender Capitol,
    Stand gracious rites intend!
    Romans, twenty valiant sons,
    Half number King Priam had,
    Behold poor remains, alive dead!
    survive Rome reward love;
    bring latest home,
    burial ancestors.
    Goths leave sheathe sword.
    Titus, unkind, careless thine own,
    suffer'st thou thy sons, unburied yet,
    hover dreadful shore Styx?
    Make lay brethren.
                                            [They open tomb]
    greet silence, dead wont,
    sleep peace, slain country's wars.  
    O sacred receptacle joys,
    Sweet cell virtue nobility,
    sons hast thou mine store
    thou wilt render more!
  LUCIUS. Give proudest prisoner Goths,
    hew limbs, pile
    Ad manes fratrum sacrifice flesh
    earthy prison bones,
    shadows unappeas'd,
    disturb'd prodigies earth.
  TITUS. give you- noblest survives,
    eldest son distressed queen.
  TAMORA. Stay, Roman brethen! Gracious conqueror,
    Victorious Titus, rue tears shed,
    mother's tears passion son;
    thy sons dear thee,
    O, son dear me!
    Sufficeth brought Rome
    beautify thy triumphs, return
    Captive thee thy Roman yoke;  
    sons slaughtered streets
    valiant doings country's cause?
    O, fight king commonweal
    piety thine, these.
    Andronicus, stain thy tomb blood.
    Wilt thou draw nature gods?
    Draw merciful.
    Sweet mercy nobility's true badge.
    Thrice-noble Titus, spare first-born son.
  TITUS. Patient yourself, madam, pardon me.
    brethren, Goths beheld
    Alive dead; brethren slain
    Religiously sacrifice.
    son mark'd, die must
    T' appease groaning shadows gone.
  LUCIUS. him, make fire straight;
    swords, pile wood,
    hew limbs till clean consum'd.
                                Exeunt TITUS' SONS, ALARBUS
  TAMORA. O cruel, irreligious piety!  
  CHIRON. Scythia half barbarous!
  DEMETRIUS. Oppose Scythia ambitious Rome.
    Alarbus rest, survive
    tremble Titus' threat'ning look.
    Then, madam, stand resolv'd, hope withal
    self-same gods arm'd Queen Troy
    opportunity sharp revenge
    Thracian tyrant tent
    favour Tamora, Queen Goths-
    Goths Goths Tamora queen-
    quit bloody wrongs foes.

            Re-enter LUCIUS, QUINTUS, MARTIUS, and
   MUTIUS, sons ANDRONICUS, swords bloody

  LUCIUS. See, lord father, perform'd
    Roman rites: Alarbus' limbs lopp'd,
    entrails feed sacrificing fire,
    smoke incense doth perfume sky.
    Remaineth nought inter brethren,  
    loud 'larums Rome.
  TITUS. so, Andronicus
    Make latest farewell souls.
                 [Sound trumpets lay coffin tomb]
    peace honour rest here, sons;
    Rome's readiest champions, repose rest,
    Secure worldly chances mishaps!
    lurks treason, envy swells,
    grow damned drugs, storms,
    noise, silence eternal sleep.
    peace honour rest here, sons!

                       Enter LAVINIA

  LAVINIA. peace honour live Lord Titus long;
    noble lord father, live fame!
    Lo, tomb tributary tears
    render brethren's obsequies;
    thy feet kneel, tears joy
    Shed earth thy return Rome.  
    O, bless thy victorious hand,
    fortunes Rome's citizens applaud!
  TITUS. Kind Rome, hast lovingly reserv'd
    cordial mine age glad heart!
    Lavinia, live; outlive thy father's days,
    fame's eternal date, virtue's praise!

          Enter, above, MARCUS ANDRONICUS TRIBUNES;
          re-enter SATURNINUS, BASSIANUS, attendants

  MARCUS. Long live Lord Titus, beloved brother,
    Gracious triumpher eyes Rome!
  TITUS. Thanks, gentle Tribune, noble brother Marcus.
  MARCUS. welcome, nephews, successful wars,
    survive sleep fame.
    Fair lords, fortunes alike all
    country's service drew swords;
    safer triumph funeral pomp
    hath aspir'd Solon's happiness
    triumphs chance honour's bed.  
    Titus Andronicus, people Rome,
    friend justice thou hast been,
    Send thee me, Tribune trust,
    par]iament white spotless hue;
    thee election empire
    late-deceased Emperor's sons:
    candidatus then, put on,
    set head headless Rome.
  TITUS. head glorious body fits
    shakes age feebleness.
    robe trouble you?
    chosen proclamations to-day,
    To-morrow yield rule, resign life,
    set abroad business all?
    Rome, thy soldier forty years,
    led country's strength successfully,
    buried twenty valiant sons,
    Knighted field, slain manfully arms,
    service noble country.
    Give staff honour mine age,  
    sceptre control world.
    Upright held it, lords, held last.
  MARCUS. Titus, thou shalt obtain empery.
  SATURNINUS. Proud ambitious Tribune, canst thou tell?
  TITUS. Patience, Prince Saturninus.
  SATURNINUS. Romans, right.
    Patricians, draw swords, sheathe not
    Till Saturninus Rome's Emperor.
    Andronicus, thou shipp'd hell
    rob people's hearts!
  LUCIUS. Proud Saturnine, interrupter good
    noble-minded Titus means thee!
  TITUS. Content thee, Prince; restore thee
    people's hearts, wean themselves.
  BASSIANUS. Andronicus, flatter thee,
    honour thee, till die.
    faction thou strengthen thy friends,
    thankful be; men
    noble minds honourable meed.
  TITUS. People Rome, people's Tribunes here,  
    voices suffrages:
    ye bestow friendly Andronicus?
  TRIBUNES. gratify good Andronicus,
    gratulate safe return Rome,
    people accept admits.
  TITUS. Tribunes, you; suit make,
    create Emperor's eldest son,
    Lord Saturnine; virtues will, hope,
    Reflect Rome Titan's rays earth,
    ripen justice commonweal.
    Then, elect advice,
    Crown him, 'Long live Emperor!'
  MARCUS. voices applause sort,
    Patricians plebeians, create
    Lord Saturninus Rome's great Emperor;
    'Long live Emperor Saturnine!'
                           [A long flourish till down]
  SATURNINUS. Titus Andronicus, thy favours done
    election day
    give thee part thy deserts,  
    deeds requite thy gentleness;
    onset, Titus, advance
    Thy honourable family,
    Lavinia make emperess,
    Rome's royal mistress, mistress heart,
    sacred Pantheon espouse.
    me, Andronicus, doth motion thee?
  TITUS. doth, worthy lord, match
    hold highly honoured Grace,
    sight Rome, Saturnine,
    King commander commonweal,
    wide world's Emperor, consecrate
    sword, chariot, prisoners,
    Presents worthy Rome's imperious lord;
    Receive then, tribute owe,
    Mine honour's ensigns humbled thy feet.
  SATURNINUS. Thanks, noble Titus, father life.
    proud thee thy gifts
    Rome record; forget
    unspeakable deserts,  
    Romans, forget fealty me.
  TITUS.  [To TAMORA]  Now, madam, prisoner emperor;
    honour state
    nobly followers.
  SATURNINUS.  [Aside]  goodly lady, trust me; hue
    choose, choose anew.-
    Clear up, fair Queen, cloudy countenance;
    chance war hath wrought change cheer,
    Thou com'st made scorn Rome-
    Princely thy usage way.
    Rest word, discontent
    Daunt hopes. Madam, comforts you
    make greater Queen Goths.
    Lavinia, displeas'd this?
  LAVINIA. I, lord, sith true nobility
    Warrants words princely courtesy.
  SATURNINUS. Thanks, sweet Lavinia. Romans, go.
    Ransomless set prisoners free.
    Proclaim honours, lords, trump drum.
                                                      [Flourish]  
  BASSIANUS. Lord Titus, leave, maid mine.
                                               [Seizing LAVINIA]
  TITUS. How, sir! earnest then, lord?
  BASSIANUS. Ay, noble Titus, resolv'd withal
    reason right.
  MARCUS. Suum cuique Roman justice:
    prince justice seizeth own.
  LUCIUS. shall, Lucius live.
  TITUS. Traitors, avaunt! Emperor's guard?
    Treason, lord- Lavinia surpris'd!
  SATURNINUS. Surpris'd! whom?
  BASSIANUS. justly may
    Bear betroth'd world away.
                        Exeunt BASSIANUS MARCUS LAVINIA
  MUTIUS. Brothers, convey away,
    sword door safe.
                             Exeunt LUCIUS, QUINTUS, MARTIUS
  TITUS. Follow, lord, bring back.
  MUTIUS. lord, pass here.
  TITUS. What, villain boy!  
    Bar'st Rome?
  MUTIUS. Help, Lucius, help!
            TITUS kills him. fray, exeunt SATURNINUS,
                            TAMORA, DEMETRIUS, CHIRON, AARON

                      Re-enter Lucius

  LUCIUS. lord, unjust, so:
    wrongful quarrel slain son.
  TITUS. thou sons mine;
    sons dishonour me.

                 Re-enter aloft EMPEROR
      TAMORA Sons, AARON Moor

    Traitor, restore Lavinia Emperor.
  LUCIUS. Dead, will; wife,
    another's lawful promis'd love.                 Exit
  SATURNINUS. No, Titus, no; Emperor not,
    her, thee, thy stock.  
    trust leisure mocks once;
    Thee never, thy traitorous haughty sons,
    Confederates dishonour me.
    Rome make stale
    Saturnine? Full well, Andronicus,
    Agree deeds proud brag thine
    saidst begg'd empire thy hands.
  TITUS. O monstrous! reproachful words these?
  SATURNINUS. thy ways; go, give changing piece
    flourish'd sword.
    valiant son-in-law thou shalt enjoy;
    fit bandy thy lawless sons,
    ruffle commonwealth Rome.
  TITUS. words razors wounded heart.
  SATURNINUS. therefore, lovely Tamora, Queen Goths,
    That, stately Phoebe 'mongst nymphs,
    Dost overshine gallant'st dames Rome,
    thou pleas'd sudden choice,
    Behold, choose thee, Tamora, bride
    create thee Emperess Rome.  
    Speak, Queen Goths, dost thou applaud choice?
    swear Roman gods-
    Sith priest holy water near,
    tapers burn bright, everything
    readiness Hymenaeus stand-
    re-salute streets Rome,
    climb palace, till place
    lead espous'd bride me.
  TAMORA. sight heaven Rome swear,
    Saturnine advance Queen Goths,
    handmaid desires,
    loving nurse, mother youth.
  SATURNINUS. Ascend, fair Queen, Pantheon. Lords, accompany
    noble Emperor lovely bride,
    heavens Prince Saturnine,
    wisdom hath fortune conquered;
    consummate spousal rites.
                                            Exeunt TITUS
  TITUS. bid wait bride.
  TITUS, wert thou wont walk alone,  
    Dishonoured thus, challenged wrongs?

                      Re-enter MARCUS,
        TITUS' SONS, LUCIUS, QUINTUS, MARTIUS

  MARCUS. O Titus, see, O, thou hast done!
    bad quarrel slain virtuous son.
  TITUS. No, foolish Tribune, no; son mine-
    thou, these, confederates deed
    hath dishonoured family;
    Unworthy brother unworthy sons!
  LUCIUS. give burial, becomes;
    Give Mutius burial bretheren.
  TITUS. Traitors, away! rests tomb.
    monument hundred years hath stood,
    sumptuously re-edified;
    soldiers Rome's servitors
    Repose fame; basely slain brawls.
    Bury can, here.
  MARCUS. lord, impiety you.  
    nephew Mutius' deeds plead him;
    buried bretheren.
  QUINTUS & MARTIUS. shall, accompany.
  TITUS. 'And shall!' villain spake word?
  QUINTUS. vouch place here.
  TITUS. What, bury despite?
  MARCUS. No, noble Titus, entreat thee
    pardon Mutius bury him.
  TITUS. Marcus, thou hast struck crest,
    boys mine honour thou hast wounded.
    foes repute one;
    trouble more, gone.
  MARTIUS. himself; withdraw.
  QUINTUS. I, till Mutius' bones buried.
                                [The BROTHER SONS kneel]
  MARCUS. Brother, doth nature plead-
  QUINTUS. Father, doth nature speak-
  TITUS. Speak thou more, rest speed.
  MARCUS. Renowned Titus, half soul-
  LUCIUS. Dear father, soul substance all-  
  MARCUS. Suffer thy brother Marcus inter
    noble nephew virtue's nest,
    died honour Lavinia's cause.
    Thou art Roman- barbarous.
    Greeks advice bury Ajax,
    slew himself; wise Laertes' son
    graciously plead funerals.
    young Mutius, then, thy joy,
    barr'd entrance here.
  TITUS. Rise, Marcus, rise;
    dismal'st day e'er saw,
    dishonoured sons Rome!
    Well, bury him, bury next.
                                   [They put MUTIUS tomb]
  LUCIUS. lie thy bones, sweet Mutius, thy friends,
    Till trophies adorn thy tomb.
  ALL.  [Kneeling]  man shed tears noble Mutius;
    lives fame died virtue's cause.
  MARCUS. lord- step dreary dumps-
    subtle Queen Goths  
    sudden advanc'd Rome?
  TITUS. not, Marcus, is-
    device no, heavens tell.
    not, then, beholding man
    brought high good turn far?
  MARCUS. Yes, nobly remunerate.

           Flourish. Re-enter EMPEROR, TAMORA
        SONS, MOOR, door;
    door, BASSIANUS LAVINIA, others

  SATURNINUS. So, Bassianus, play'd prize:
    God give joy, sir, gallant bride!
  BASSIANUS. yours, lord! more,
    less; leave.
  SATURNINUS. Traitor, Rome law power,
    Thou thy faction repent rape.
  BASSIANUS. Rape, call it, lord, seize own,
    true betrothed love, wife?
    laws Rome determine all;
    possess'd mine.  
  SATURNINUS. 'Tis good, sir. short us;
    live sharp you.
  BASSIANUS. lord, done, may,
    Answer must, life.
    give Grace know:
    duties owe Rome,
    noble gentleman, Lord Titus here,
    opinion honour wrong'd,
    That, rescue Lavinia,
    hand slay youngest son,
    zeal you, highly mov'd wrath
    controll'd frankly gave.
    Receive favour, Saturnine,
    hath express'd deeds
    father friend thee Rome.
  TITUS. Prince Bassianus, leave plead deeds.
    'Tis thou dishonoured me.
    Rome righteous heavens judge
    lov'd honoured Saturnine!
  TAMORA. worthy lord, Tamora  
    gracious princely eyes thine,
    hear speak indifferently all;
    suit, sweet, pardon past.
  SATURNINUS. What, madam! dishonoured openly,
    basely put revenge?
  TAMORA. so, lord; gods Rome forfend
    author dishonour you!
    mine honour dare undertake
    good Lord Titus' innocence all,
    fury dissembled speaks griefs.
    suit graciously him;
    Lose noble friend vain suppose,
    sour afflict gentle heart.
    [Aside SATURNINUS]  lord, rul'd me,
      won last;
    Dissemble griefs discontents.
    newly planted throne;
    Lest, then, people, patricians too,
    survey Titus' part,
    supplant ingratitude,  
    Rome reputes heinous sin,
    Yield entreats, alone:
    find day massacre all,
    raze faction family,
    cruel father traitorous sons,
    sued dear son's life;
    make 'tis queen
    Kneel streets beg grace vain.-
    Come, come, sweet Emperor; come, Andronicus.
    good man, cheer heart
    dies tempest thy angry frown.
  SATURNINUS. Rise, Titus, rise; Empress hath prevail'd.
  TITUS. Majesty her, lord;
    words, looks, infuse life me.
  TAMORA. Titus, incorporate Rome,
    Roman adopted happily,
    advise Emperor good.
    day quarrels die, Andronicus;
    mine honour, good lord,
    reconcil'd friends you.  
    you, Prince Bassianus, pass'd
    word promise Emperor
    mild tractable.
    fear not, lords- you, Lavinia.
    advice, humbled knees,
    pardon Majesty.
  LUCIUS. do, vow heaven Highness
    mildly might,
    Tend'ring sister's honour own.
  MARCUS. mine honour protest.
  SATURNINUS. Away, talk not; trouble more.
  TAMORA. Nay, nay, sweet Emperor, friends.
    Tribune nephews kneel grace.
    denied. Sweet heart, back.
  SATURNINUS. Marcus, thy sake, thy brother's here,
    lovely Tamora's entreats,
    remit young men's heinous faults.
    Stand up.
    Lavinia, left churl,
    found friend; death swore  
    part bachelor priest.
    Come, Emperor's court feast brides,
    guest, Lavinia, friends.
    day love-day, Tamora.
  TITUS. To-morrow, Majesty
    hunt panther hart me,
    horn hound give Grace bonjour.
  SATURNINUS. so, Titus, gramercy too.
                                          Exeunt. Sound trumpets

ACT II. SCENE I.
Rome. palace

Enter AARON

  AARON. climbeth Tamora Olympus' top,
    Safe Fortune's shot, sits aloft,
    Secure thunder's crack lightning flash,
    Advanc'd pale envy's threat'ning reach.
    golden sun salutes morn,
    And, gilt ocean beams,
    Gallops zodiac glistening coach
    overlooks highest-peering hills,
    Tamora.
    wit doth earthly honour wait,
    virtue stoops trembles frown.
    Then, Aaron, arm thy heart fit thy thoughts
    mount aloft thy imperial mistress,
    mount pitch thou triumph long.
    Hast prisoner held, fett'red amorous chains,
    faster bound Aaron's charming eyes
    Prometheus tied Caucasus.  
    slavish weeds servile thoughts!
    bright shine pearl gold,
    wait new-made emperess.
    wait, I? wanton queen,
    goddess, Semiramis, nymph,
    siren charm Rome's Saturnine,
    shipwreck commonweal's.
    Hullo! storm this?

            Enter CHIRON DEMETRIUS, braving

  DEMETRIUS. Chiron, thy years wit, thy wits edge
    manners, intrude grac'd,
    may, aught thou knowest, affected be.
  CHIRON. Demetrius, thou dost over-ween all;
    this, bear braves.
    'Tis difference year two
    Makes gracious thee fortunate:
    fit thou
    serve deserve mistress' grace;  
    sword thee approve,
    plead passions Lavinia's love.
  AARON.  [Aside]  Clubs, clubs! lovers the
    peace.
  DEMETRIUS. Why, boy, mother, unadvis'd,
    Gave dancing rapier side,
    desperate grown threat friends?
    to; lath glued sheath
    Till handle it.
  CHIRON. Meanwhile, sir, skill have,
    Full shalt thou perceive dare.
  DEMETRIUS. Ay, boy, grow ye brave?              [They draw]
  AARON.  [Coming forward]  Why, now, lords!
    Emperor's palace dare ye draw
    maintain quarrel openly?
    Full wot ground grudge:
    million gold
    concerns;
    noble mother more
    dishonoured court Rome.  
    shame, put up.
  DEMETRIUS. I, till sheath'd
    rapier bosom, withal
    Thrust reproachful speeches throat
    hath breath'd dishonour here.
  CHIRON. prepar'd full resolv'd,
    Foul-spoken coward, thund'rest thy tongue,
    thy weapon dar'st perform.
  AARON. Away, say!
    Now, gods warlike Goths adore,
    pretty brabble undo all.
    Why, lords, dangerous
    jet prince's right?
    What, Lavinia loose,
    Bassianus degenerate,
    love quarrels broach'd
    controlment, justice, revenge?
    Young lords, beware; Empress know
    discord's ground, music please.
  CHIRON. care not, I, knew world:  
    love Lavinia world.
  DEMETRIUS. Youngling, learn thou make meaner choice:
    Lavina thine elder brother's hope.
  AARON. Why, ye mad, ye Rome
    furious impatient be,
    brook competitors love?
    you, lords, plot deaths
    device.
  CHIRON. Aaron, thousand deaths
    propose achieve love.
  AARON. achieve her- how?
  DEMETRIUS. mak'st thou strange?
    woman, woo'd;
    woman, won;
    Lavinia, lov'd.
    What, man! water glideth mill
    wots miller of; easy is
    cut loaf steal shive, know.
    Bassianus Emperor's brother,
    worn Vulcan's badge.  
  AARON.  [Aside]  Ay, good Saturninus may.
  DEMETRIUS. despair court it
    words, fair looks, liberality?
    What, hast thou full struck doe,
    borne cleanly keeper's nose?
  AARON. Why, then, snatch so
    serve turns.
  CHIRON. Ay, turn served.
  DEMETRIUS. Aaron, thou hast hit it.
  AARON. hit too!
    tir'd ado.
    Why, hark ye, hark ye! fools
    square this? offend you, then,
    speed?
  CHIRON. Faith, me.
  DEMETRIUS. me, one.
  AARON. shame, friends, join jar.
    'Tis policy stratagem do
    affect; resolve
    achieve,  
    perforce accomplish may.
    me: Lucrece chaste
    Lavinia, Bassianus' love.
    speedier ling'ring languishment
    pursue, found path.
    lords, solemn hunting hand;
    lovely Roman ladies troop;
    forest walks wide spacious,
    unfrequented plots are
    Fitted kind rape villainy.
    Single thither dainty doe,
    strike home force words.
    way, all, stand hope.
    Come, come, Empress, sacred wit
    villainy vengeance consecrate,
    acquaint intend;
    file engines advice
    suffer square yourselves,
    wishes' height advance both.
    Emperor's court house Fame,  
    palace full tongues, eyes, ears;
    woods ruthless, dreadful, deaf, dull.
    speak strike, brave boys, turns;
    serve lust, shadowed heaven's eye,
    revel Lavinia's treasury.
  CHIRON. Thy counsel, lad, smells cowardice.
  DEMETRIUS. Sit fas aut nefas, till find stream
    cool heat, charm calm fits,
    Styga, manes vehor.                           Exeunt




SCENE II.
A forest Rome

Enter TITUS ANDRONICUS, sons, LUCIUS, QUINTUS, MARTIUS,
making noise hounds horns; MARCUS

  TITUS. hunt up, morn bright grey,
    fields fragrant, woods green.
    Uncouple here, make bay,
    wake Emperor lovely bride,
    rouse Prince, ring hunter's peal,
    court echo noise.
    Sons, charge, ours,
    attend Emperor's person carefully.
    troubled sleep night,
    dawning day comfort hath inspir'd.

         cry hounds, wind horns peal.
       enter SATURNINUS, TAMORA, BASSIANUS LAVINIA,
            CHIRON, DEMETRIUS, attendants  
    good morrows Majesty!
    Madam, good!
    promised Grace hunter's peal.
  SATURNINUS. rung lustily, lords-
    early new-married ladies.
  BASSIANUS. Lavinia, you?
  LAVINIA. no;
    broad awake hours more.
  SATURNINUS. then, horse chariots have,
    sport.  [To TAMORA]  Madam, ye see
    Roman hunting.
  MARCUS. dogs, lord,
    rouse proudest panther chase,
    climb highest promontory top.
  TITUS. horse follow game
    Makes way, run swallows o'er plain.
  DEMETRIUS. Chiron, hunt not, we, horse hound,
    hope pluck dainty doe ground.             Exeunt




SCENE III.
A lonely part forest

Enter AARON alone, bag gold

  AARON. wit none,
    bury gold tree
    inherit it.
    thinks abjectly
    gold coin stratagem,
    Which, cunningly effected, beget
    excellent piece villainy.
    repose, sweet gold, unrest
                                                [Hides gold]
    alms Empress' chest.

               Enter TAMORA alone, Moor

  TAMORA. lovely Aaron, wherefore look'st thou sad
    make gleeful boast?
    birds chant melody bush;
    snakes lie rolled cheerful sun;  
    green leaves quiver cooling wind
    make chequer'd shadow ground;
    sweet shade, Aaron, sit,
    babbling echo mocks hounds,
    Replying shrilly well-tun'd horns,
    double hunt heard once,
    sit mark yellowing noise;
    And- conflict suppos'd
    wand'ring prince Dido enjoyed,
    happy storm surpris'd,
    curtain'd counsel-keeping cave-
    may, wreathed other's arms,
    pastimes done, possess golden slumber,
    Whiles hounds horns sweet melodious birds
    nurse's song
    lullaby bring babe asleep.
  AARON. Madam, Venus govern desires,
    Saturn dominator mine.
    signifies deadly-standing eye,
    silence cloudy melancholy,  
    fleece woolly hair uncurls
    adder doth unroll
    fatal execution?
    No, madam, venereal signs.
    Vengeance heart, death hand,
    Blood revenge hammering head.
    Hark, Tamora, empress soul,
    hopes heaven rests thee-
    day doom Bassianus;
    Philomel lose tongue to-day,
    Thy sons make pillage chastity,
    wash hands Bassianus' blood.
    Seest thou letter? up, pray thee,
    give King fatal-plotted scroll.
    question more; espied.
    parcel hopeful booty,
    dreads lives' destruction.

                Enter BASSIANUS LAVINIA
  
  TAMORA. Ah, sweet Moor, sweeter life!
  AARON. more, great Empress: Bassianus comes.
    cross him; fetch thy sons
    back thy quarrels, whatsoe'er be.               Exit
  BASSIANUS. here? Rome's royal Emperess,
    Unfurnish'd well-beseeming troop?
    Dian, habited her,
    hath abandoned holy groves
    general hunting forest?
  TAMORA. Saucy controller private steps!
    pow'r Dian had,
    Thy temples planted presently
    horns, Actaeon's; hounds
    drive thy new-transformed limbs,
    Unmannerly intruder thou art!
  LAVINIA. patience, gentle Emperess,
    'Tis thought goodly gift horning,
    doubted Moor you
    singled thy experiments.
    Jove shield husband hounds to-day!  
    'Tis pity stag.
  BASSIANUS. me, Queen, swarth Cimmerian
    Doth make honour body's hue,
    Spotted, detested, abominable.
    sequest'red train,
    Dismounted snow-white goodly steed,
    wand'red obscure plot,
    Accompanied barbarous Moor,
    foul desire conducted you?
  LAVINIA. And, intercepted sport,
    Great reason noble lord rated
    sauciness. pray hence,
    joy raven-coloured love;
    valley fits purpose passing well.
  BASSIANUS. King brother notice this.
  LAVINIA. Ay, slips made noted long.
    Good king, mightily abused!
  TAMORA. Why, patience endure this.

                  Enter CHIRON DEMETRIUS  

  DEMETRIUS. now, dear sovereign, gracious mother!
    doth Highness pale wan?
  TAMORA. reason, you, pale?
    'ticed place.
    barren detested vale is:
    trees, summer, forlorn lean,
    Overcome moss baleful mistletoe;
    shines sun; breeds,
    nightly owl fatal raven.
    show'd abhorred pit,
    told me, here, dead time night,
    thousand fiends, thousand hissing snakes,
    Ten thousand swelling toads, urchins,
    make fearful confused cries
    mortal body hearing it
    straight fall mad die suddenly.
    sooner told hellish tale
    straight told bind here
    body dismal yew,  
    leave miserable death.
    call'd foul adulteress,
    Lascivious Goth, bitterest terms
    ear hear effect;
    wondrous fortune come,
    vengeance executed.
    Revenge it, love mother's life,
    ye henceforth call'd children.
  DEMETRIUS. witness thy son.
                                               [Stabs BASSIANUS]
  CHIRON. me, struck home show strength.
                                                    [Also stabs]
  LAVINIA. Ay, come, Semiramis- nay, barbarous Tamora,
    fits thy nature thy own!
  TAMORA. Give poniard; know, boys,
    mother's hand mother's wrong.
  DEMETRIUS. Stay, madam, belongs her;
    thrash corn, burn straw.
    minion stood chastity,
    nuptial vow, loyalty,  
    painted hope braves mightiness;
    carry grave?
  CHIRON. do, eunuch.
    Drag husband secret hole,
    make dead trunk pillow lust.
  TAMORA. ye honey desire,
    wasp outlive, sting.
  CHIRON. warrant you, madam, make sure.
    Come, mistress, perforce enjoy
    nice-preserved honesty yours.
  LAVINIA. O Tamora! thou bearest woman's face-
  TAMORA. hear speak; her!
  LAVINIA. Sweet lords, entreat hear word.
  DEMETRIUS. Listen, fair madam: glory
    tears; heart them
    unrelenting flint drops rain.
  LAVINIA. tiger's young teach dam?
    O, learn wrath- taught thee;
    milk thou suck'dst turn marble,
    thy teat thou hadst thy tyranny.  
    mother breeds sons alike:
    [To CHIRON]  thou entreat show woman's pity.
  CHIRON. What, wouldst thou prove bastard?
  LAVINIA. 'Tis true, raven doth hatch lark.
    heard- O, find now!-
    lion, mov'd pity, endure
    princely paws par'd away.
    ravens foster forlorn children,
    whilst birds famish nests;
    O, me, thy hard heart no,
    kind, pitiful!
  TAMORA. means; her!
  LAVINIA. O, teach thee! father's sake,
    gave thee life slain thee,
    obdurate, open thy deaf ears.
  TAMORA. Hadst thou person ne'er offended me,
    sake pitiless.
    Remember, boys, pour'd tears vain
    save brother sacrifice;
    fierce Andronicus relent.  
    her, will;
    worse lov'd me.
  LAVINIA. O Tamora, call'd gentle queen,
    thine hands kill place!
    'tis life begg'd long;
    Poor slain Bassianus died.
  TAMORA. beg'st thou, then? Fond woman, go.
  LAVINIA. 'Tis present death beg; thing more,
    womanhood denies tongue tell:
    O, worse killing lust,
    tumble loathsome pit,
    man's eye behold body;
    this, charitable murderer.
  TAMORA. rob sweet sons fee;
    No, satisfy lust thee.
  DEMETRIUS. Away! thou hast stay'd long.
  LAVINIA. grace? womanhood? Ah, beastly creature,
    blot enemy general name!
    Confusion fall-
  CHIRON. Nay, stop mouth. Bring thou husband.  
    hole Aaron bid hide him.

                 DEMETRIUS throws body
           BASSIANUS pit; exeunt
         DEMETRIUS CHIRON, dragging LAVINIA

  TAMORA. Farewell, sons; make sure.
    Ne'er heart merry cheer indeed
    Till Andronici made away.
    seek lovely Moor,
    spleenful sons trull deflower.          Exit

                  Re-enter AARON, two
             TITUS' sons, QUINTUS MARTIUS

  AARON. on, lords, foot before;
    Straight bring loathsome pit
    espied panther fast asleep.
  QUINTUS. sight dull, whate'er bodes.
  MARTIUS. mine, promise you; shame,  
    leave sport sleep awhile.
                                            [Falls pit]
  QUINTUS. What, art thou fallen? subtle hole this,
    mouth covered rude-growing briers,
    leaves drops new-shed blood
    fresh morning dew distill'd flowers?
    fatal place me.
    Speak, brother, hast thou hurt thee fall?
  MARTIUS. O brother, dismal'st object hurt
    eye sight made heart lament!
  AARON.  [Aside]  fetch King find here,
    guess
    made brother.         Exit
  MARTIUS. dost comfort me, out
    unhallow'd blood-stained hole?
  QUINTUS. surprised uncouth fear;
    chilling sweat o'er-runs trembling joints;
    heart suspects mine eye see.
  MARTIUS. prove thou hast true divining heart,
    Aaron thou den,  
    fearful sight blood death.
  QUINTUS. Aaron gone, compassionate heart
    permit mine eyes behold
    thing whereat trembles surmise;
    O, is, ne'er till now
    child fear what.
  MARTIUS. Lord Bassianus lies beray'd blood,
    heap, slaughtered lamb,
    detested, dark, blood-drinking pit.
  QUINTUS. dark, dost thou 'tis he?
  MARTIUS. bloody finger doth wear
    precious ring lightens hole,
    Which, taper monument,
    Doth shine dead man's earthy cheeks,
    shows ragged entrails pit;
    pale shine moon Pyramus
    night lay bath'd maiden blood.
    O brother, thy fainting hand-
    fear hath made thee faint, hath-
    fell devouring receptacle,  
    hateful Cocytus' misty mouth.
  QUINTUS. Reach thy hand, thee out,
    Or, wanting strength thee good,
    pluck'd swallowing womb
    deep pit, poor Bassianus' grave.
    strength pluck thee brink.
  MARTIUS. strength climb thy help.
  QUINTUS. Thy hand more; loose again,
    Till thou art aloft, below.
    Thou canst me- thee.        [Falls in]

            Enter EMPEROR AARON Moor

  SATURNINUS. me! hole here,
    leapt it.
    Say, art thou didst descend
    gaping hollow earth?
  MARTIUS. unhappy sons Andronicus,
    Brought unlucky hour,
    find thy brother Bassianus dead.  
  SATURNINUS. brother dead! thou dost jest:
    lady lodge
    north side pleasant chase;
    'Tis hour left there.
  MARTIUS. left alive;
    But, alas! found dead.

                   Re-enter TAMORA, with
         attendants; TITUS ANDRONICUS Lucius

  TAMORA. lord King?
  SATURNINUS. Here, Tamora; griev'd killing grief.
  TAMORA. thy brother Bassianus?
  SATURNINUS. bottom dost thou search wound;
    Poor Bassianus lies murdered.
  TAMORA. late bring fatal writ,
    complot timeless tragedy;
    greatly man's face fold
    pleasing smiles murderous tyranny.
                                 [She giveth SATURNINE letter]  
    SATURNINUS.  [Reads]  'An miss meet handsomely,
    Sweet huntsman- Bassianus 'tis mean-
    thou dig grave him.
    Thou know'st meaning. thy reward
    nettles elder-tree
    overshades mouth pit
    decreed bury Bassianus.
    this, purchase thy lasting friends.'
    O Tamora! heard like?
    pit elder-tree.
    Look, sirs, find huntsman out
    murdered Bassianus here.
  AARON. gracious lord, bag gold.
  SATURNINUS.  [To TITUS]  thy whelps, fell curs bloody
      kind,
    bereft brother life.
    Sirs, drag pit prison;
    bide devis'd
    never-heard-of torturing pain them.
  TAMORA. What, pit? O wondrous thing!  
    easily murder discovered!
  TITUS. High Emperor, feeble knee
    beg boon, tears lightly shed,
    fell fault accursed sons-
    Accursed fault prov'd them-
  SATURNINUS. prov'd! apparent.
    found letter? Tamora, you?
  TAMORA. Andronicus up.
  TITUS. did, lord, bail;
    For, fathers' reverend tomb, vow
    ready Highness' will
    answer suspicion lives.
  SATURNINUS. Thou shalt bail them; thou follow me.
    bring murdered body, murderers;
    speak word- guilt plain;
    For, soul, worse end death,
    end executed.
  TAMORA. Andronicus, entreat King.
    Fear thy sons; enough.
  TITUS. Come, Lucius, come; stay talk them.     Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Another part forest

Enter Empress' sons, DEMETRIUS CHIRON, LAVINIA,
her hands cut off, tongue cut out, ravish'd

  DEMETRIUS. So, tell, thy tongue speak,
    'twas cut thy tongue ravish'd thee.
  CHIRON. Write thy mind, bewray thy meaning so,
    thy stumps thee play scribe.
  DEMETRIUS. signs tokens scrowl.
  CHIRON. home, call sweet water, wash thy hands.
  DEMETRIUS. hath tongue call, hands wash;
    leave silent walks.
  CHIRON. 'twere cause, hang myself.
  DEMETRIUS. thou hadst hands thee knit cord.
                                     Exeunt DEMETRIUS CHIRON

           Wind horns. Enter MARCUS, hunting

  MARCUS. this?- niece, flies fast?  
    Cousin, word: husband?
    dream, wealth wake me!
    wake, planet strike down,
    slumber eternal sleep!
    Speak, gentle niece. stern ungentle hands
    Hath lopp'd, hew'd, made thy body bare
    branches- sweet ornaments
    circling shadows kings sought sleep in,
    gain great happiness
    half thy love? dost speak me?
    Alas, crimson river warm blood,
    bubbling fountain stirr'd wind,
    Doth rise fall thy rosed lips,
    Coming thy honey breath.
    Tereus hath deflowered thee,
    And, thou shouldst detect him, cut thy tongue.
    Ah, thou turn'st thy face shame!
    notwithstanding loss blood-
    conduit issuing spouts-
    thy cheeks red Titan's face  
    Blushing encount'red cloud.
    speak thee? 'tis so?
    O, knew thy heart, knew beast,
    rail ease mind!
    Sorrow concealed, oven stopp'd,
    Doth burn heart cinders is.
    Fair Philomel, lost tongue,
    tedious sampler sew'd mind;
    But, lovely niece, cut thee.
    craftier Tereus, cousin, hast thou met,
    hath cut pretty fingers off
    sew'd Philomel.
    O, monster lily hands
    Tremble aspen leaves lute
    make silken strings delight kiss them,
    touch'd life!
    heard heavenly harmony
    sweet tongue hath made,
    dropp'd knife, fell asleep,
    Cerberus Thracian poet's feet.  
    Come, go, make thy father blind,
    sight blind father's eye;
    hour's storm drown fragrant meads,
    months tears thy father's eyes?
    draw back, mourn thee;
    O, mourning case thy misery!                Exeunt

ACT III. SCENE I.
Rome. street

Enter JUDGES, TRIBUNES, SENATORS, TITUS' sons
MARTIUS QUINTUS bound, passing stage place execution,
and TITUS before, pleading

  TITUS. Hear me, grave fathers; noble Tribunes, stay!
    pity mine age, youth spent
    dangerous wars whilst securely slept;
    blood Rome's great quarrel shed,
    frosty nights watch'd,
    bitter tears, see
    Filling aged wrinkles cheeks,
    pitiful condemned sons,
    souls corrupted 'tis thought.
    twenty sons wept,
    died honour's lofty bed.
                          [ANDRONICUS lieth down, judges
                     pass prisoners, exeunt]
    these, Tribunes, dust write  
    heart's deep languor soul's sad tears.
    tears stanch earth's dry appetite;
    sons' sweet blood make shame blush.
    O earth, befriend thee rain
    distil ancient urns,
    youthful April show'rs.
    summer's drought drop thee still;
    winter warm tears melt snow
    eternal spring-time thy face,
    thou refuse drink dear sons' blood.

             Enter Lucius weapon drawn

    O reverend Tribunes! O gentle aged men!
    Unbind sons, reverse doom death,
    say, wept before,
    tears prevailing orators.
  LUCIUS. O noble father, lament vain;
    Tribunes hear not, man by,
    recount sorrows stone.  
  TITUS. Ah, Lucius, thy brothers plead!
    Grave Tribunes, entreat you.
  LUCIUS. gracious lord, tribune hears speak.
  TITUS. Why, 'tis matter, man: hear,
    mark me; mark,
    pity me; plead must,
    bootless them.
    sorrows stones;
    answer distress,
    sort Tribunes,
    intercept tale.
    weep, humbly feet
    Receive tears, weep me;
    attired grave weeds,
    Rome afford tribunes these.
    stone soft wax: tribunes hard stones.
    stone silent offendeth not,
    tribunes tongues doom men death.
                                                         [Rises]
    wherefore stand'st thou thy weapon drawn?  
  LUCIUS. rescue brothers death;
    attempt judges pronounc'd
    everlasting doom banishment.
  TITUS. O happy man! befriended thee.
    Why, foolish Lucius, dost thou perceive
    Rome wilderness tigers?
    Tigers prey, Rome affords prey
    mine; happy art thou then
    devourers banished!
    brother Marcus here?

                 Enter MARCUS LAVINIA

  MARCUS. Titus, prepare thy aged eyes weep,
    so, thy noble heart break.
    bring consuming sorrow thine age.
  TITUS. consume me? then.
  MARCUS. thy daughter.
  TITUS. Why, Marcus, is.
  LUCIUS. Ay me! object kills me.  
  TITUS. Faint-hearted boy, arise, her.
    Speak, Lavinia, accursed hand
    Hath made thee handless thy father's sight?
    fool hath added water sea,
    brought fagot bright-burning Troy?
    grief height thou cam'st,
    Nilus disdaineth bounds.
    Give sword, chop hands too,
    fought Rome, vain;
    nurs'd woe feeding life;
    bootless prayer held up,
    serv'd effectless use.
    service require them
    cut other.
    'Tis well, Lavinia, thou hast hands;
    hands Rome service vain.
  LUCIUS. Speak, gentle sister, hath martyr'd thee?
  MARCUS. O, delightful engine thoughts
    blabb'd pleasing eloquence
    torn pretty hollow cage,  
    sweet melodious bird sung
    Sweet varied notes, enchanting ear!
  LUCIUS. O, thou her, hath deed?
  MARCUS. O, found straying park,
    Seeking hide doth deer
    hath receiv'd unrecuring wound.
  TITUS. dear, wounded her
    Hath hurt kill'd dead;
    stand rock,
    Environ'd wilderness sea,
    marks waxing tide grow wave wave,
    Expecting envious surge
    brinish bowels swallow him.
    death wretched sons gone;
    stands son, banish'd man,
    brother, weeping woes.
    soul greatest spurn
    dear Lavinia, dearer soul.
    thy picture plight,
    madded me;  
    behold thy lively body so?
    Thou hast hands wipe thy tears,
    tongue hath martyr'd thee;
    Thy husband dead, death
    Thy brothers condemn'd, dead this.
    Look, Marcus! Ah, son Lucius, her!
    brothers, fresh tears
    Stood cheeks, doth honey dew
    gath'red lily withered.
  MARCUS. Perchance weeps kill'd husband;
    Perchance innocent.
  TITUS. kill thy husband, joyful,
    law hath ta'en revenge them.
    No, no, foul deed;
    Witness sorrow sister makes.
    Gentle Lavinia, kiss thy lips,
    make sign thee ease.
    thy good uncle thy brother Lucius
    thou sit round fountain,
    behold cheeks  
    stain'd, meadows dry
    miry slime left flood?
    fountain gaze long,
    Till fresh taste clearness,
    made brine-pit bitter tears?
    cut hands thine?
    bite tongues, dumb shows
    Pass remainder hateful days?
    do? tongues
    Plot device misery
    make wonder'd time come.
  LUCIUS. Sweet father, cease tears; grief
    wretched sister sobs weeps.
  MARCUS. Patience, dear niece. Good Titus, dry thine eyes.
  TITUS. Ah, Marcus, Marcus! Brother, wot
    Thy napkin drink tear mine,
    thou, poor man, hast drown'd thine own.
  LUCIUS. Ah, Lavinia, wipe thy cheeks.
  TITUS. Mark, Marcus, mark! understand signs.
    tongue speak,  
    brother thee:
    napkin, true tears bewet,
    service sorrowful cheeks.
    O, sympathy woe this
    Limbo bliss!

                   Enter AARON Moor

  AARON. Titus Andronicus, lord Emperor
    Sends thee word, that, thou love thy sons,
    Marcus, Lucius, thyself, Titus,
    you, chop hand
    send King: same
    send thee thy sons alive,
    ransom fault.
  TITUS. O gracious Emperor! O gentle Aaron!
    raven sing lark
    sweet tidings sun's uprise?
    heart send Emperor hand.
    Good Aaron, wilt thou chop off?  
  LUCIUS. Stay, father! noble hand thine,
    hath thrown enemies,
    sent. hand serve turn,
    youth spare blood you,
    mine save brothers' lives.
  MARCUS. hands hath defended Rome
    rear'd aloft bloody battle-axe,
    Writing destruction enemy's castle?
    O, high desert!
    hand hath idle; serve
    ransom nephews death;
    worthy end.
  AARON. Nay, come, agree hand along,
    fear die pardon come.
  MARCUS. hand go.
  LUCIUS. heaven, go!
  TITUS. Sirs, strive more; with'red herbs these
    meet plucking up, mine.
  LUCIUS. Sweet father, thought thy son,
    redeem brothers death.  
  MARCUS. father's sake mother's care,
    show brother's love thee.
  TITUS. Agree you; spare hand.
  LUCIUS. fetch axe.
  MARCUS. axe.
                                        Exeunt LUCIUS MARCUS
  TITUS. hither, Aaron, deceive both;
    Lend thy hand, give thee mine.
  AARON.  [Aside]  call'd deceit, honest,
    whilst live deceive men so;
    deceive sort,
    ere half hour pass.
                                       [He cuts TITUS' hand]

                 Re-enter LUCIUS MARCUS

 TITUS. stay strife. dispatch'd.
    Good Aaron, give Majesty hand;
    hand warded him
    thousand dangers; bid bury it.
    hath merited- have.  
    sons, account them
    jewels purchas'd easy price;
    dear too, bought mine own.
  AARON. go, Andronicus; thy hand
    thy sons thee.
    [Aside]  heads mean. O, villainy
    Doth fat thoughts it!
    fools good, fair men call grace:
    Aaron soul black face.           Exit
  TITUS. O, lift hand heaven,
    bow feeble ruin earth;
    power pities wretched tears,
    call!  [To LAVINIA]  What, would'st thou kneel me?
    Do, then, dear heart; heaven hear prayers,
    sighs breathe welkin dim
    stain sun fog, clouds
    hug melting bosoms.
  MARCUS. O brother, speak possibility,
    break deep extremes.
  TITUS. sorrow deep, bottom?  
    passions bottomless them.
  MARCUS. reason govern thy lament.
  TITUS. reason miseries,
    limits bind woes.
    heaven doth weep, doth earth o'erflow?
    winds rage, doth sea wax mad,
    Threat'ning welkin big-swol'n face?
    wilt thou reason coil?
    sea; hark sighs blow.
    weeping welkin, earth;
    sea moved sighs;
    earth continual tears
    deluge, overflow'd drown'd;
    bowels hide woes,
    drunkard vomit them.
    give leave; losers leave
    ease stomachs bitter tongues.

        Enter MESSENGER, heads hand
  
  MESSENGER. Worthy Andronicus, ill art thou repaid
    good hand thou sent'st Emperor.
    heads thy noble sons;
    thy hand, scorn thee back-
    Thy grief sports, thy resolution mock'd,
    woe thy woes,
    remembrance father's death.             Exit
  MARCUS. hot Aetna cool Sicily,
    heart ever-burning hell!
    miseries borne.
    weep weep doth ease deal,
    sorrow flouted double death.
  LUCIUS. Ah, sight make deep wound,
    detested life shrink thereat!
    death life bear name,
    life hath interest breathe!
                                          [LAVINIA kisses TITUS]
  MARCUS. Alas, poor heart, kiss comfortless
    frozen water starved snake.
  TITUS. fearful slumber end?  
  MARCUS. farewell, flatt'ry; die, Andronicus.
    Thou dost slumber: thy sons' heads,
    Thy warlike hand, thy mangled daughter here;
    Thy banish'd son dear sight
    Struck pale bloodless; thy brother, I,
    stony image, cold numb.
    Ah! control thy griefs.
    Rent thy silver hair, thy hand
    Gnawing thy teeth; dismal sight
    closing wretched eyes.
    time storm; art thou still?
  TITUS. Ha, ha, ha!
  MARCUS. dost thou laugh? fits hour.
  TITUS. Why, tear shed;
    Besides, sorrow enemy,
    usurp wat'ry eyes
    make blind tributary tears.
    find Revenge's cave?
    heads speak me,
    threat bliss  
    Till mischiefs return'd again
    throats committed them.
    Come, task do.
    heavy people, circle about,
    turn you
    swear soul wrongs.
    vow made. Come, brother, head,
    hand bear.
    And, Lavinia, thou shalt employ'd this;
    Bear thou hand, sweet wench, thy teeth.
    thee, boy, go, thee sight;
    Thou art exile, thou stay.
    Hie Goths raise army there;
    ye love me, do,
    kiss part, do.
                                           Exeunt Lucius
  LUCIUS. Farewell, Andronicus, noble father,
    woefull'st man liv'd Rome.
    Farewell, proud Rome; till Lucius again,
    leaves pledges dearer life.  
    Farewell, Lavinia, noble sister;
    O, thou wert thou tofore hast been!
    Lucius Lavinia lives
    oblivion hateful griefs.
    Lucius live, requite wrongs
    make proud Saturnine emperess
    Beg gates Tarquin queen.
    Goths, raise pow'r
    reveng'd Rome Saturnine.                   Exit




SCENE II.
Rome. TITUS' house

A banquet.

Enter TITUS, MARCUS, LAVINIA, boy YOUNG LUCIUS

  TITUS. so, sit; eat more
    preserve strength us
    revenge bitter woes ours.
    Marcus, unknit sorrow-wreathen knot;
    Thy niece I, poor creatures, hands,
    passionate tenfold grief
    folded arms. poor hand mine
    left tyrannize breast;
    Who, heart, mad misery,
    Beats hollow prison flesh,
    thump down.
    [To LAVINIA]  Thou map woe, dost talk signs!
    thy poor heart beats outrageous beating,
    Thou canst strike make still.
    Wound sighing, girl, kill groans;
    knife thy teeth  
    thy heart make thou hole,
    tears thy poor eyes fall
    run sink and, soaking in,
    Drown lamenting fool sea-salt tears.
  MARCUS. Fie, brother, fie! Teach lay
    violent hands tender life.
  TITUS. now! sorrow made thee dote already?
    Why, Marcus, man mad I.
    violent hands lay life?
    Ah, wherefore dost thou urge hands?
    bid Aeneas tale o'er
    Troy burnt made miserable?
    O, handle theme, talk hands,
    remember none.
    Fie, fie, franticly square talk,
    forget hands,
    Marcus word hands!
    Come, fall to; and, gentle girl, eat this:
    drink. Hark, Marcus, says-
    interpret martyr'd signs;  
    drinks drink tears,
    Brew'd sorrow, mesh'd cheeks.
    Speechless complainer, learn thy thought;
    thy dumb action perfect
    begging hermits holy prayers.
    Thou shalt sigh, hold thy stumps heaven,
    wink, nod, kneel, make sign,
    wrest alphabet,
    practice learn thy meaning.
  BOY. Good grandsire, leave bitter deep laments;
    Make aunt merry pleasing tale.
  MARCUS. Alas, tender boy, passion mov'd,
    Doth weep grandsire's heaviness.
  TITUS. Peace, tender sapling; thou art made tears,
    tears quickly melt thy life away.
                          [MARCUS strikes dish knife]
    dost thou strike at, Marcus, thy knife?
  MARCUS. kill'd, lord- fly.
  TITUS. thee, murderer, thou kill'st heart!
    Mine eyes cloy'd view tyranny;  
    deed death innocent
    Titus' brother. thee gone;
    thou art company.
  MARCUS. Alas, lord, kill'd fly.
  TITUS. 'But!' fly father mother?
    hang slender gilded wings
    buzz lamenting doings air!
    Poor harmless fly,
    pretty buzzing melody
    make merry! thou hast kill'd him.
  MARCUS. Pardon me, sir; black ill-favour'd fly,
    Empress' Moor; kill'd him.
  TITUS. O, O, O!
    pardon reprehending thee,
    thou hast charitable deed.
    Give thy knife, insult him,
    Flattering Moor
    purposely poison me.
    thyself, Tamora.
    Ah, sirrah!  
    Yet, think, brought low
    kill fly
    likeness coal-black Moor.
  MARCUS. Alas, poor man! grief wrought him,
    takes false shadows true substances.
  TITUS. Come, away. Lavinia, me;
    thy closet, read thee
    Sad stories chanced times old.
    Come, boy, me; thy sight young,
    thou shalt read mine begin dazzle.        Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE I.
Rome. TITUS' garden

Enter YOUNG LUCIUS LAVINIA running him,
and boy flies books arm.

Enter TITUS MARCUS

  BOY. Help, grandsire, help! aunt Lavinia
    everywhere, why.
    Good uncle Marcus, swift comes!
    Alas, sweet aunt, mean.
  MARCUS. Stand me, Lucius; fear thine aunt.
  TITUS. loves thee, boy, thee harm.
  BOY. Ay, father Rome did.
  MARCUS. means niece Lavinia signs?
  TITUS. Fear not, Lucius; doth mean.
    See, Lucius, makes thee.
    Somewhither thee her.
    Ah, boy, Cornelia care
    Read sons hath read thee
    Sweet poetry Tully's Orator.
  MARCUS. Canst thou guess wherefore plies thee thus?  
  BOY. lord, not, I, guess,
    fit frenzy possess her;
    heard grandsire full oft
    Extremity griefs make men mad;
    read Hecuba Troy
    Ran mad sorrow. made fear;
    Although, lord, noble aunt
    Loves dear e'er mother did,
    not, fury, fright youth;
    made throw books, fly-
    Causeless, perhaps. pardon me, sweet aunt;
    And, madam, uncle Marcus go,
    willingly attend ladyship.
  MARCUS. Lucius, will.           [LAVINIA turns her
                     stumps books Lucius fall]
  TITUS. now, Lavinia! Marcus, means this?
    book desires see.
    it, girl, these?- Open them, boy.-
    thou art deeper read skill'd;
    choice library,  
    beguile thy sorrow, till heavens
    Reveal damn'd contriver deed.
    lifts arms sequence thus?
  MARCUS. means one
    Confederate fact; ay, was,
    heaven heaves revenge.
  TITUS. Lucius, book tosseth so?
  BOY. Grandsire, 'tis Ovid's Metamorphoses;
    mother gave me.
  MARCUS. love gone,
    cull'd rest.
  TITUS. Soft! busily turns leaves! her.
    find? Lavinia, read?
    tragic tale Philomel
    treats Tereus' treason rape;
    rape, fear, root thy annoy.
  MARCUS. See, brother, see! Note quotes leaves.
  TITUS. Lavinia, wert thou surpris'd, sweet girl,
    Ravish'd wrong'd Philomela was,
    Forc'd ruthless, vast, gloomy woods?  
    See, see!
    Ay, place hunt-
    O, never, hunted there!-
    Pattern'd poet describes,
    nature made murders rapes.
  MARCUS. O, nature build foul den,
    gods delight tragedies?
  TITUS. Give signs, sweet girl, friends,
    Roman lord durst deed.
    slunk Saturnine, Tarquin erst,
    left camp sin Lucrece' bed?
  MARCUS. Sit down, sweet niece; brother, sit me.
    Apollo, Pallas, Jove, Mercury,
    Inspire me, treason find!
    lord, here! here, Lavinia!
                                    [He writes his
                       staff, guides feet mouth]
    sandy plot plain; guide, thou canst,
    me. writ name
    hand all.  
    Curs'd heart forc'd shift!
    Write thou, good niece, display last
    God discovered revenge.
    Heaven guide thy pen print thy sorrows plain,
    traitors truth!
                               [She takes staff mouth
                          guides stumps, writes]
    O, ye read, lord, hath writ?
  TITUS. 'Stuprum- Chiron- Demetrius.'
  MARCUS. What, what! lustful sons Tamora
    Performers heinous bloody deed?
  TITUS. Magni Dominator poli,
    Tam lentus audis scelera? tam lentus vides?
  MARCUS. O, calm thee, gentle lord! know
    written earth
    stir mutiny mildest thoughts,
    arm minds infants exclaims.
    lord, kneel me; Lavinia, kneel;
    kneel, sweet boy, Roman Hector's hope;
    swear me- as, woeful fere  
    father chaste dishonoured dame,
    Lord Junius Brutus sware Lucrece' rape-
    prosecute, good advice,
    Mortal revenge traitorous Goths,
    blood die reproach.
  TITUS. 'Tis enough, knew how;
    hunt bear-whelps, beware:
    dam wake; wind ye once,
    lion deeply league,
    lulls whilst playeth back,
    sleeps list.
    young huntsman, Marcus; alone;
    come, leaf brass,
    gad steel write words,
    lay by. angry northern wind
    blow sands Sibyl's leaves abroad,
    lesson, then? Boy, you?
  BOY. say, lord, man
    mother's bedchamber safe
    base bondmen yoke Rome.  
  MARCUS. Ay, boy! Thy father hath full oft
    ungrateful country like.
  BOY. And, uncle, I, live.
  TITUS. Come, mine armoury.
    Lucius, fit thee; withal boy
    carry Empress' sons
    Presents intend send both.
    Come, come; thou'lt message, wilt thou not?
  BOY. Ay, dagger bosoms, grandsire.
  TITUS. No, boy, so; teach thee course.
    Lavinia, come. Marcus, house.
    Lucius brave court;
    Ay, marry, we, sir! waited on.
                         Exeunt TITUS, LAVINIA, YOUNG LUCIUS
  MARCUS. O heavens, hear good man groan
    relent, compassion him?
    Marcus, attend ecstasy,
    hath scars sorrow heart
    foemen's marks batt'red shield,
    revenge.  
    Revenge heavens Andronicus!                 Exit




SCENE II.
Rome. palace

Enter AARON, DEMETRIUS CHIRON, door; door,
YOUNG LUCIUS bundle weapons, verses writ them

  CHIRON. Demetrius, son Lucius;
    hath message deliver us.
  AARON. Ay, mad message mad grandfather.
  BOY. lords, humbleness may,
    greet honours Andronicus-
    [Aside]  pray Roman gods confound both!
  DEMETRIUS. Gramercy, lovely Lucius. news?
  BOY.  [Aside]  decipher'd, news,
    villains mark'd rape.- you,
    grandsire, advis'd, hath me
    goodliest weapons armoury
    gratify honourable youth,
    hope Rome; bid say;
    do, gifts present
    lordships, that, need,  
    armed appointed well.
    leave both-  [Aside]  bloody villains.
                               Exeunt YOUNG LUCIUS attendant
  DEMETRIUS. here? scroll, written round about.
    see:
    [Reads]  'Integer vitae, scelerisque purus,
    eget Mauri iaculis, nec arcu.'
  CHIRON. O, 'tis verse Horace, well;
    read grammar long ago.
  AARON. Ay, just- verse Horace. Right, it.
    [Aside]  Now, thing ass!
    sound jest! man hath found guilt,
    sends weapons wrapp'd lines
    wound, feeling, quick.
    witty Empress afoot,
    applaud Andronicus' conceit.
    rest unrest awhile-
    now, young lords, was't happy star
    Led Rome, strangers, so,
    Captives, advanced height?  
    good palace gate
    brave Tribune brother's hearing.
  DEMETRIUS. good great lord
    Basely insinuate send gifts.
  AARON. reason, Lord Demetrius?
    daughter friendly?
  DEMETRIUS. thousand Roman dames
    bay, turn serve lust.
  CHIRON. charitable full love.
  AARON. lacks mother amen.
  CHIRON. twenty thousand more.
  DEMETRIUS. Come, pray gods
    beloved mother pains.
  AARON.  [Aside]  Pray devils; gods over.
                                                [Trumpets sound]
  DEMETRIUS. Emperor's trumpets flourish thus?
  CHIRON. Belike, joy Emperor hath son.
  DEMETRIUS. Soft! here?

            Enter NURSE, blackamoor CHILD  

  NURSE. Good morrow, lords.
    O, me, Aaron Moor?
  AARON. Well, less, ne'er whit all,
    Aaron is; Aaron now?
  NURSE. O gentle Aaron, undone!
    help, woe betide thee evermore!
  AARON. Why, caterwauling dost thou keep!
    dost thou wrap fumble thy arms?
  NURSE. O, hide heaven's eye:
    Empress' shame stately Rome's disgrace!
    delivered, lord; delivered.
  AARON. whom?
  NURSE. brought a-bed.
  AARON. Well, God give good rest! hath her?
  NURSE. devil.
  AARON. Why, devil's dam;
    joyful issue.
  NURSE. joyless, dismal, black, sorrowful issue!
    babe, loathsome toad  
    fair-fac'd breeders clime;
    Empress sends thee, thy stamp, thy seal,
    bids thee christen thy dagger's point.
  AARON. Zounds, ye whore! black base hue?
    Sweet blowse, beauteous blossom sure.
  DEMETRIUS. Villain, hast thou done?
  AARON. thou canst undo.
  CHIRON. Thou hast undone mother.
  AARON. Villain, thy mother.
  DEMETRIUS. therein, hellish dog, thou hast undone her.
    Woe chance, damn'd loathed choice!
    Accurs'd offspring foul fiend!
  CHIRON. live.
  AARON. die.
  NURSE. Aaron, must; mother wills so.
  AARON. What, it, nurse? man I
    execution flesh blood.
  DEMETRIUS. broach tadpole rapier's point.
    Nurse, give me; sword dispatch it.
  AARON. Sooner sword plough thy bowels up.  
                     [Takes CHILD NURSE, draws]
    Stay, murderous villains, kill brother!
    Now, burning tapers sky
    shone brightly boy got,
    dies scimitar's sharp point
    touches first-born son heir.
    you, younglings, Enceladus,
    threat'ning band Typhon's brood,
    great Alcides, god war,
    seize prey father's hands.
    What, what, ye sanguine, shallow-hearted boys!
    Ye white-lim'd walls! ye alehouse painted signs!
    Coal-black hue
    scorns bear hue;
    water ocean
    turn swan's black legs white,
    lave hourly flood.
    Empress age
    mine own- excuse can.
  DEMETRIUS. Wilt thou betray thy noble mistress thus?  
  AARON. mistress mistress: self,
    vigour picture youth.
    world prefer;
    maugre world safe,
    smoke Rome.
  DEMETRIUS. mother sham'd.
  CHIRON. Rome despise foul escape.
  NURSE. Emperor rage doom death.
  CHIRON. blush ignomy.
  AARON. Why, privilege beauty bears:
    Fie, treacherous hue, betray blushing
    close enacts counsels thy heart!
    young lad fram'd leer.
    black slave smiles father,
    'Old lad, thine own.'
    brother, lords, sensibly fed
    self-blood gave life you;
    womb imprisoned were
    enfranchised light.
    Nay, brother surer side,  
    seal stamped face.
  NURSE. Aaron, Empress?
  DEMETRIUS. Advise thee, Aaron, done,
    subscribe thy advice.
    Save thou child, safe.
  AARON. sit consult.
    son wind you:
    there; talk pleasure safety.
                                                      [They sit]
  DEMETRIUS. women child his?
  AARON. Why, so, brave lords! join league
    lamb; brave Moor,
    chafed boar, mountain lioness,
    ocean swells Aaron storms.
    say, again, child?
  NURSE. Cornelia midwife myself;
    delivered Empress.
  AARON. Emperess, midwife, yourself.
    counsel third's away:
    Empress, said.      [He kills her]  
    Weeke weeke!
    cries pig prepared spit.
  DEMETRIUS. mean'st thou, Aaron? Wherefore didst thou this?
  AARON. O Lord, sir, 'tis deed policy.
    live betray guilt ours-
    long-tongu'd babbling gossip? No, lords, no.
    full intent:
    far, Muliteus, countryman-
    wife yesternight brought bed;
    child her, fair are.
    pack him, give mother gold,
    circumstance all,
    child advanc'd,
    received Emperor's heir
    substituted place mine,
    calm tempest whirling court;
    Emperor dandle own.
    Hark ye, lords. physic,
                                         [Pointing NURSE]
    bestow funeral;  
    fields near, gallant grooms.
    done, longer days,
    send midwife presently me.
    midwife nurse made away,
    ladies tattle please.
  CHIRON. Aaron, thou wilt trust air
    secrets.
  DEMETRIUS. care Tamora,
    highly bound thee.

         Exeunt DEMETRIUS CHIRON, bearing dead NURSE

  AARON. Goths, swift swallow flies,
    dispose treasure mine arms,
    secretly greet Empress' friends.
    on, thick-lipp'd slave, bear hence;
    puts shifts.
    make feed berries roots,
    feed curds whey, suck goat,
    cabin cave, bring  
    warrior command camp.
                                             Exit CHILD




SCENE III.
Rome. public place

Enter TITUS, bearing arrows letters ends them;
with MARCUS, YOUNG LUCIUS, gentlemen,
PUBLIUS, SEMPRONIUS, CAIUS, bows

  TITUS. Come, Marcus, come; kinsmen, way.
    Sir boy, archery;
    ye draw home enough, 'tis straight.
    Terras Astrea reliquit,
    rememb'red, Marcus; gone, fled.
    Sirs, tools. You, cousins, shall
    sound ocean cast nets;
    Happily catch sea;
    justice land.
    No; Publius Sempronius, it;
    'Tis dig mattock spade,
    pierce inmost centre earth;
    Then, Pluto's region,
    pray deliver petition.
    justice aid,  
    Andronicus,
    Shaken sorrows ungrateful Rome.
    Ah, Rome! Well, well, made thee miserable
    time threw people's suffrages
    doth tyrannize o'er me.
    gone; pray careful all,
    leave man-of-war unsearch'd.
    wicked Emperor shipp'd hence;
    And, kinsmen, pipe justice.
  MARCUS. O Publius, heavy case,
    thy noble uncle distract?
  PUBLIUS. Therefore, lords, highly concerns
    day night t' attend carefully,
    feed humour kindly may
    Till time beget careful remedy.
  MARCUS. Kinsmen, sorrows past remedy.
    Join Goths, revengeful war
    wreak Rome ingratitude,
    vengeance traitor Saturnine.
  TITUS. Publius, now? now, masters?  
    What, met her?
  PUBLIUS. No, good lord; Pluto sends word,
    Revenge hell, shall.
    Marry, Justice, employ'd,
    thinks, Jove heaven, else,
    perforce stay time.
  TITUS. doth wrong feed delays.
    dive burning lake below
    pull Acheron heels.
    Marcus, shrubs, cedars we,
    big-bon'd men fram'd Cyclops' size;
    metal, Marcus, steel back,
    wrung wrongs backs bear;
    And, sith justice earth hell,
    solicit heaven, move gods
    send justice wreak wrongs.
    Come, gear. good archer, Marcus.
                                      [He arrows]
    'Ad Jovem' you; 'Ad Apollinem.'
    'Ad Martem' myself.  
    Here, boy, 'To Pallas'; 'To Mercury.'
    'To Saturn,' Caius- Saturnine:
    good shoot wind.
    it, boy. Marcus, loose bid.
    word, written effect;
    god left unsolicited.
  MARCUS. Kinsmen, shoot shafts court;
    afflict Emperor pride.
  TITUS. Now, masters, draw.  [They shoot]  O, said, Lucius!
    Good boy, Virgo's lap! Give Pallas.
  MARCUS. lord, aim mile moon;
    letter Jupiter this.
  TITUS. Ha! ha!
    Publius, Publius, hast thou done?
    See, see, thou hast shot Taurus' horns.
  MARCUS. sport, lord: Publius shot,
    Bull, gall'd, gave Aries knock
    fell Ram's horns court;
    find Empress' villain?
    laugh'd, told Moor choose  
    give master present.
  TITUS. Why, goes! God give lordship joy!

    Enter CLOWN, basket pigeons it

    News, news heaven! Marcus, post come.
    Sirrah, tidings? letters?
    justice? Jupiter?
  CLOWN. Ho, gibbet-maker? hath down
    again, man hang'd till week.
  TITUS. Jupiter, thee?
  CLOWN. Alas, sir, Jupiter; drank all
    life.
  TITUS. Why, villain, art thou carrier?
  CLOWN. Ay, pigeons, sir; else.
  TITUS. Why, didst thou heaven?
  CLOWN. heaven! Alas, sir, there. God forbid I
    bold press heaven young days. Why, am
    pigeons Tribunal Plebs, matter
    brawl betwixt uncle Emperal's men.  
  MARCUS. Why, sir, fit serve your
    oration; deliver pigeons Emperor you.
  TITUS. me, deliver oration Emperor a
    grace?
  CLOWN. Nay, truly, sir, grace life.
  TITUS. Sirrah, hither. Make ado,
    give pigeons Emperor;
    thou shalt justice hands.
    Hold, hold! money thy charges.
    Give pen ink. Sirrah, grace deliver a
    supplication?
  CLOWN. Ay, sir.
  TITUS. supplication you. to
    him, approach kneel; kiss foot;
    deliver pigeons; reward. I'll
    hand, sir; bravely.
  CLOWN. warrant you, sir; alone.
  TITUS. Sirrah, hast thou knife? it.
    Here, Marcus, fold oration;
    thou hast made humble suppliant.  
    thou hast Emperor,
    Knock door, says.
  CLOWN. God you, sir; will.
  TITUS. Come, Marcus, go. Publius, follow me.     Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Rome. palace

Enter EMPEROR, EMPRESS sons, DEMETRIUS CHIRON;
LORDS others. EMPEROR brings arrows hand TITUS
shot him

  SATURNINUS. Why, lords, wrongs these! seen
    emperor Rome overborne,
    Troubled, confronted thus; and, extent
    egal justice, us'd contempt?
    lords, know, mightful gods,
    disturbers peace
    Buzz people's ears, nought hath pass'd
    law wilful sons
    Andronicus. if
    sorrows overwhelm'd wits,
    afflicted wreaks,
    fits, frenzy, bitterness?
    writes heaven redress.
    See, 'To Jove' 'To Mercury';
    'To Apollo'; 'To God War'-  
    Sweet scrolls fly streets Rome!
    libelling Senate,
    blazoning unjustice where?
    goodly humour, not, lords?
    Rome justice were.
    live, feigned ecstasies
    shelter outrages;
    justice lives
    Saturninus' health; whom, sleep,
    awake fury shall
    Cut proud'st conspirator lives.
  TAMORA. gracious lord, lovely Saturnine,
    Lord life, commander thoughts,
    Calm thee, bear faults Titus' age,
    Th' effects sorrow valiant sons
    loss hath pierc'd deep scarr'd heart;
    comfort distressed plight
    prosecute meanest best
    contempts.  [Aside]  Why, become
    High-witted Tamora gloze all.  
    But, Titus, touch'd thee quick,
    Thy life-blood out; Aaron wise,
    safe, anchor port.

                       Enter CLOWN

    now, good fellow! Wouldst thou speak us?
  CLOWN. Yes, forsooth, mistriship Emperial.
  TAMORA. Empress am, yonder sits Emperor.
  CLOWN. 'Tis he.- God Saint Stephen give godden. have
    brought letter couple pigeons here.
                                   [SATURNINUS reads letter]
  SATURNINUS. away, hang presently.
  CLOWN. money have?
  TAMORA. Come, sirrah, hang'd.
  CLOWN. Hang'd! by'r lady, brought neck fair
    end.                                          [Exit guarded]
  SATURNINUS. Despiteful intolerable wrongs!
    endure monstrous villainy?
    device proceeds.  
    borne- traitorous sons
    died law murder brother
    means butchered wrongfully?
    drag villain hair;
    age honour shape privilege.
    proud mock thy slaughterman,
    Sly frantic wretch, holp'st make great,
    hope thyself govern Rome me.

                   Enter NUNTIUS AEMILIUS

    news thee, Aemilius?
  AEMILIUS. Arm, lords! Rome cause.
    Goths gathered head; power
    high resolved men, bent spoil,
    march amain, conduct
    Lucius, son Andronicus;
    threats revenge do
    Coriolanus did.
  SATURNINUS. warlike Lucius general Goths?  
    tidings nip me, hang head
    flowers frost, grass beat storms.
    Ay, begins sorrows approach.
    'Tis common people love much;
    hath heard say-
    walked private man-
    Lucius' banishment wrongfully,
    wish'd Lucius emperor.
  TAMORA. fear? city strong?
  SATURNINUS. Ay, citizens favour Lucius,
    revolt succour him.
  TAMORA. King, thy thoughts imperious thy name!
    sun dimm'd, gnats fly it?
    eagle suffers birds sing,
    careful thereby,
    Knowing shadow wings
    pleasure stint melody;
    mayest thou giddy men Rome.
    cheer thy spirit; thou, Emperor,
    enchant Andronicus  
    words sweet, dangerous,
    baits fish honey-stalks sheep,
    wounded bait,
    rotted delicious feed.
  SATURNINUS. entreat son us.
  TAMORA. Tamora entreat him, will;
    smooth fill aged ears
    golden promises, that, heart
    impregnable, ears deaf,
    ear heart obey tongue.
    [To AEMILIUS]  thou ambassador;
    Emperor requests parley
    warlike Lucius, appoint meeting
    father's house, Andronicus.
  SATURNINUS. Aemilius, message honourably;
    stand hostage safety,
    Bid demand pledge best.
  AEMILIUS. bidding effectually.            Exit
  TAMORA. Andronicus,
    temper art have,  
    pluck proud Lucius warlike Goths.
    now, sweet Emperor, blithe again,
    bury thy fear devices.
  SATURNINUS. successantly, plead him.
                                                          Exeunt
