1602


TWELFTH NIGHT; OR, WILL

by William Shakespeare



DRAMATIS PERSONAE

  ORSINO, Duke Illyria
  SEBASTIAN, brother Viola
  ANTONIO, sea captain, friend Sebastian
  SEA CAPTAIN, friend Viola
  VALENTINE, gentleman attending Duke
  CURIO, gentleman attending Duke
  SIR TOBY BELCH, uncle Olivia
  SIR ANDREW AGUECHEEK
  MALVOLIO, steward Olivia
  FABIAN, servant Olivia
  FESTE, clown, servant Olivia

  OLIVIA, rich countess
  VIOLA, sister Sebastian
  MARIA, Olivia's waiting woman

  Lords, Priests, Sailors, Officers, Musicians, Attendants




<<THIS ELECTRONIC VERSION COMPLETE WORKS WILLIAM
SHAKESPEARE COPYRIGHT 1990-1993 WORLD LIBRARY, INC., IS
PROVIDED PROJECT GUTENBERG ETEXT ILLINOIS BENEDICTINE COLLEGE
WITH PERMISSION.  ELECTRONIC MACHINE READABLE COPIES BE
DISTRIBUTED LONG COPIES (1) OTHERS
PERSONAL ONLY, (2) DISTRIBUTED USED
COMMERCIALLY.  PROHIBITED COMMERCIAL DISTRIBUTION INCLUDES ANY
SERVICE CHARGES DOWNLOAD TIME MEMBERSHIP.>>



SCENE:
A city Illyria; sea-coast it



ACT I. SCENE I.
The DUKE'S palace

Enter ORSINO, Duke Illyria, CURIO, LORDS; MUSICIANS attending

  DUKE. music food love, play on,
    Give excess it, that, surfeiting,
    appetite sicken die.
    strain again! dying fall;
    O, o'er ear sweet sound
    breathes bank violets,
    Stealing giving odour! Enough, more;
    'Tis sweet before.
    O spirit love, quick fresh art thou!
    That, notwithstanding thy capacity
    Receiveth sea, nought enters there,
    validity pitch soe'er,
    falls abatement low price
    minute. full shapes fancy,
    high fantastical.
  CURIO. hunt, lord?  
  DUKE. What, Curio?
  CURIO. hart.
  DUKE. Why, do, noblest have.
    O, mine eyes Olivia first,
    Methought purg'd air pestilence!
    instant turn'd hart,
    desires, fell cruel hounds,
    E'er pursue me.

                     Enter VALENTINE

    now! news her?
  VALENTINE. lord, admitted,
    handmaid return answer:
    element itself, till years' heat,
    behold face ample view;
    cloistress veiled walk,
    water day chamber round
    eye-offending brine; season
    brother's dead love, fresh  
    lasting sad remembrance.
  DUKE. O, hath heart fine frame
    pay debt love brother,
    love rich golden shaft
    Hath kill'd flock affections else
    live her; liver, brain, heart,
    sovereign thrones, supplied fill'd,
    sweet perfections, king!
    sweet beds flow'rs:
    Love-thoughts lie rich canopied bow'rs.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE II.
The sea-coast

Enter VIOLA, CAPTAIN, SAILORS

  VIOLA. country, friends, this?
  CAPTAIN. Illyria, lady.
  VIOLA. Illyria?
    brother Elysium.
    Perchance drown'd- you, sailors?
  CAPTAIN. perchance saved.
  VIOLA. O poor brother! perchance be.
  CAPTAIN. True, madam, and, comfort chance,
    Assure yourself, ship split,
    you, poor number saved you,
    Hung driving boat, brother,
    provident peril, bind himself-
    Courage hope teaching practice-
    strong mast liv'd sea;
    Where, Arion dolphin's back,
    hold acquaintance waves
    long see.  
  VIOLA. so, gold.
    Mine escape unfoldeth hope,
    Whereto thy speech serves authority,
    him. Know'st thou country?
  CAPTAIN. Ay, madam, well; bred born
    hours' travel place.
  VIOLA. governs here?
  CAPTAIN. noble duke, nature name.
  VIOLA. name?
  CAPTAIN. Orsino.
  VIOLA. Orsino! heard father him.
    bachelor then.
  CAPTAIN. now, late;
    month ago hence,
    'twas fresh murmur- as, know,
    great prattle of-
    seek love fair Olivia.
  VIOLA. she?
  CAPTAIN. virtuous maid, daughter count
    died twelvemonth since, leaving  
    protection son, brother,
    shortly died; dear love,
    say, hath abjur'd company
    sight men.
  VIOLA. O serv'd lady,
    delivered world,
    Till made mine occasion mellow,
    estate is!
  CAPTAIN. hard compass,
    admit kind suit-
    No, Duke's.
  VIOLA. fair behaviour thee, Captain;
    nature beauteous wall
    Doth oft close pollution, thee
    thou hast mind suits
    thy fair outward character.
    prithee, pay thee bounteously,
    Conceal am, aid
    disguise haply become
    form intent. serve duke:  
    Thou shalt present eunuch him;
    worth thy pains, sing
    speak sorts music,
    worth service.
    hap time commit;
    shape thou silence wit.
  CAPTAIN. eunuch mute be;
    tongue blabs, mine eyes see.
  VIOLA. thee. Lead on.                        Exeunt




SCENE III.
OLIVIA'S house

Enter SIR TOBY BELCH MARIA

  SIR TOBY. plague means niece death her
    brother thus? care's enemy life.
  MARIA. troth, Sir Toby, earlier o' nights;
    cousin, lady, takes great exceptions ill hours.
  SIR TOBY. Why, excepted.
  MARIA. Ay, confine modest limits
    order.
  SIR TOBY. Confine! confine finer am. These
    clothes good drink in, boots too;
    not, hang straps.
  MARIA. quaffing drinking undo you; heard lady
    talk yesterday, foolish knight brought in
    night wooer.
  SIR TOBY. Who? Sir Andrew Aguecheek?
  MARIA. Ay, he.
  SIR TOBY. tall man any's Illyria.
  MARIA. th' purpose?  
  SIR TOBY. Why, thousand ducats year.
  MARIA. Ay, year ducats; a
    fool prodigal.
  SIR TOBY. Fie so! plays o' th' viol-de-gamboys,
    speaks languages word word book,
    hath good gifts nature.
  MARIA. hath indeed, natural; for, a
    fool, great quarreller; hath gift a
    coward allay gust hath quarrelling, 'tis thought
    prudent quickly gift grave.
  SIR TOBY. hand, scoundrels subtractors that
    him. they?
  MARIA. add, moreover, drunk nightly company.
  SIR TOBY. drinking healths niece; drink as
    long passage throat drink Illyria.
    coward coystrill drink niece
    till brains turn o' th' toe parish-top. What, wench!
    Castiliano vulgo! Sir Andrew Agueface.

                    Enter SIR ANDREW AGUECHEEK  

  AGUECHEEK. Sir Toby Belch! now, Sir Toby Belch!
  SIR TOBY. Sweet Sir Andrew!
  AGUECHEEK. Bless you, fair shrew.
  MARIA. too, sir.
  SIR TOBY. Accost, Sir Andrew, accost.
  AGUECHEEK. that?
  SIR TOBY. niece's chambermaid.
  AGUECHEEK. Good Mistress Accost, desire acquaintance.
  MARIA. Mary, sir.
  AGUECHEEK. Good Mistress Mary Accost-
  SIR Toby. mistake, knight. 'Accost' front her, board her,
    woo her, assail her.
  AGUECHEEK. troth, undertake company.
    meaning 'accost'?
  MARIA. Fare well, gentlemen.
  SIR TOBY. thou part so, Sir Andrew, thou mightst never
    draw sword again!
  AGUECHEEK. part so, mistress, draw
    sword again. Fair lady, fools hand?  
  MARIA. Sir, th' hand.
  AGUECHEEK. Marry, have; hand.
  MARIA. Now, sir, thought free. pray you, bring hand to
    th' buttry-bar drink.
  AGUECHEEK. Wherefore, sweetheart? metaphor?
  MARIA. dry, sir.
  AGUECHEEK. Why, so; ass my
    hand dry. jest?
  MARIA. dry jest, sir.
  AGUECHEEK. full them?
  MARIA. Ay, sir, fingers' ends; marry, let
    hand, barren.                        Exit MARIA
  SIR TOBY. O knight, thou lack'st cup canary! see
    thee put down?
  AGUECHEEK. life, think; canary put
    down. Methinks wit Christian
    ordinary man has; great eater beef, I
    harm wit.
  SIR TOBY. question.
  AGUECHEEK. thought that, forswear it. ride home  
    to-morrow, Sir Toby.
  SIR TOBY. Pourquoi, dear knight?
  AGUECHEEK. 'pourquoi'- do? bestowed
    time tongues fencing, dancing, and
    bear-baiting. Oh, arts!
  SIR TOBY. hadst thou excellent head hair.
  AGUECHEEK. Why, mended hair?
  SIR TOBY. Past question; thou seest curl nature.
  AGUECHEEK. enough, does't not?
  SIR TOBY. Excellent; hangs flax distaff, hope to
    huswife thee legs spin off.
  AGUECHEEK. Faith, home to-morrow, Sir Toby. niece will
    seen, be, me;
    Count hard woos her.
  SIR TOBY. o' th' Count; match her
    degree, estate, years, wit; heard her
    swear't. Tut, life in't, man.
  AGUECHEEK. stay month longer. fellow o' th' strangest
    mind i' th' world; delight masques revels sometimes
    altogether.  
  SIR TOBY. Art thou good kickshawses, knight?
  AGUECHEEK. man Illyria, whatsoever be, the
    degree betters; compare man.
  SIR TOBY. thy excellence galliard, knight?
  AGUECHEEK. Faith, cut caper.
  SIR TOBY. cut mutton to't.
  AGUECHEEK. back-trick simply strong as
    man Illyria.
  SIR TOBY. Wherefore things hid? Wherefore these
    gifts curtain 'em? dust, like
    Mistress Mall's picture? dost thou church a
    galliard home coranto? walk a
    jig; make water sink-a-pace. What
    dost thou mean? world hide virtues in? think, by
    excellent constitution thy leg, form'd the
    star galliard.
  AGUECHEEK. Ay, 'tis strong, indifferent in
    flame-colour'd stock. set revels?
  SIR TOBY. else? born Taurus?
  AGUECHEEK. Taurus? sides heart.  
  SIR TOBY. No, sir; legs thighs. caper. Ha,
    higher! Ha, ha, excellent!                            Exeunt




SCENE IV.
The DUKE'S palace

Enter VALENTINE, VIOLA man's attire

  VALENTINE. Duke continue favours you, Cesario,
    advanc'd; hath three
    days, stranger.
  VIOLA. fear humour negligence, call
    question continuance love. inconstant, sir,
    favours?
  VALENTINE. No, me.

                  Enter DUKE, CURIO, ATTENDANTS

  VIOLA. you. Count.
  DUKE. Cesario, ho?
  VIOLA. attendance, lord, here.
  DUKE. Stand awhile aloof. Cesario,
    Thou know'st all; unclasp'd
    thee book secret soul.
    Therefore, good youth, address thy gait her;  
    denied access, stand doors,
    thy fixed foot grow
    Till thou audience.
  VIOLA. Sure, noble lord,
    abandon'd sorrow
    spoke, admit me.
  DUKE. clamorous leap civil bounds,
    make unprofited return.
  VIOLA. speak her, lord, then?
  DUKE. O, unfold passion love,
    Surprise discourse dear faith!
    thee act woes:
    attend thy youth
    nuncio's grave aspect.
  VIOLA. so, lord.
  DUKE. Dear lad, it,
    belie thy happy years
    thou art man: Diana's lip
    smooth rubious; thy small pipe
    maiden's organ, shrill sound,  
    semblative woman's part.
    thy constellation apt
    affair. attend him-
    All, will, best
    company. Prosper this,
    thou shalt live freely thy lord
    call fortunes thine.
  VIOLA. best
    woo lady. [Aside] Yet, barful strife!
    Whoe'er woo, wife.




SCENE V.
OLIVIA'S house

Enter MARIA CLOWN

  MARIA. Nay, thou hast been, open
    lips wide bristle enter thy excuse; my
    lady hang thee thy absence.
  CLOWN. hang me. hang'd world needs
    fear colours.
  MARIA. Make good.
  CLOWN. fear.
  MARIA. good lenten answer. thee was
    born, 'I fear colours.'
  CLOWN. Where, good Mistress Mary?
  MARIA. wars; bold your
    foolery.
  CLOWN. Well, God give wisdom it; are
    fools, talents.
  MARIA. hang'd long absent; be
    turn'd away- good hanging you?
  CLOWN. good hanging prevents bad marriage; turning  
    away, summer bear out.
  MARIA. resolute, then?
  CLOWN. so, neither; resolv'd points.
  MARIA. break, hold; break,
    gaskins fall.
  CLOWN. Apt, good faith, apt! Well, thy way; Sir Toby
    leave drinking, thou wert witty piece Eve's flesh
    Illyria.
  MARIA. Peace, rogue, o' that. lady. Make
    excuse wisely, best.                      Exit

                     Enter OLIVIA MALVOLIO

  CLOWN. Wit, an't thy will, put good fooling! wits
    thee oft prove fools; am
    lack thee pass wise man. says
    Quinapalus? 'Better witty fool foolish wit.' God bless
    thee, lady!
  OLIVIA. fool away.
  CLOWN. hear, fellows? lady.  
  OLIVIA. to, y'are dry fool; you. Besides, you
    grow dishonest.
  CLOWN. faults, madonna, drink good counsel amend;
    give dry fool drink, fool dry. Bid the
    dishonest man mend himself: mend, longer
    dishonest; cannot, botcher mend him. Anything
    mended patch'd; virtue transgresses but
    patch'd sin, sin amends patch'd virtue.
    simple syllogism serve, so; not,
    remedy? true cuckold calamity, so
    beauty's flower. lady bade fool; therefore, I
    again, away.
  OLIVIA. Sir, bade you.
  CLOWN. Misprision highest degree! Lady, 'Cucullus facit
    monachum'; wear motley my
    brain. Good madonna, give leave prove fool.
  OLIVIA. it?
  CLOWN. Dexteriously, good madonna.
  OLIVIA. Make proof.
  CLOWN. catechize it, madonna.  
    Good mouse virtue, answer me.
  OLIVIA. Well, sir, idleness, bide your
    proof.
  CLOWN. Good madonna, mourn'st thou?
  OLIVIA. Good fool, brother's death.
  CLOWN. soul hell, madonna.
  OLIVIA. soul heaven, fool.
  CLOWN. fool, madonna, mourn brother's soul
    heaven. fool, gentlemen.
  OLIVIA. fool, Malvolio? Doth mend?
  MALVOLIO. Yes, do, till pangs death shake him.
    Infirmity, decays wise, doth make fool.
  CLOWN. God send you, sir, speedy infirmity, better
    increasing folly! Sir Toby sworn fox;
    pass word twopence fool.
  OLIVIA. that, Malvolio?
  MALVOLIO. marvel ladyship takes delight barren
    rascal; put day ordinary fool
    brain stone. now, of
    guard already; laugh minister occasion him,  
    gagg'd. protest wise men crow at
    set kind fools fools' zanies.
  OLIVIA. O, sick self-love, Malvolio, taste a
    distemper'd appetite. generous, guiltless, free
    disposition, things bird-bolts deem
    cannon bullets. slander allow'd fool, he
    rail; railing discreet man, though
    reprove.
  CLOWN. Mercury endue thee leasing, thou speak'st well
    fools!

                             Re-enter MARIA

  MARIA. Madam, gate young gentleman desires
    speak you.
  OLIVIA. Count Orsino, it?
  MARIA. not, madam; 'tis fair young man, attended.
  OLIVIA. people hold delay?
  MARIA. Sir Toby, madam, kinsman.
  OLIVIA. Fetch off, pray you; speaks madman.  
    Fie him! [Exit MARIA] you, Malvolio: suit from
    Count, sick, home- dismiss
    it. [Exit MALVOLIO] see, sir, fooling grows old,
    people dislike it.
  CLOWN. Thou hast spoke us, madonna, thy eldest son should
    fool; skull Jove cram brains! For- comes-
    thy kin weak pia mater.

                         Enter SIR TOBY

  OLIVIA. mine honour, half drunk! gate, cousin?
  SIR TOBY. gentleman.
  OLIVIA. gentleman! gentleman?
  SIR TOBY. 'Tis gentleman here. [Hiccups] plague o' these
    pickle-herring! now, sot!
  CLOWN. Good Sir Toby!
  OLIVIA. Cousin, cousin, early this
    lethargy?
  SIR TOBY. Lechery! defy lechery. gate.
  OLIVIA. Ay, marry; he?  
  SIR TOBY. devil will, care not; give me
    faith, I. Well, one.                       Exit
  OLIVIA. drunken man like, fool?
  CLOWN. drown'd man, fool, madman: draught above
    heat makes fool; mads him; drowns
    him.
  OLIVIA. thou seek crowner, sit o' coz;
    degree drink, drown'd; look
    him.
  CLOWN. mad yet, madonna, fool the
    madman.                                                 Exit

                           Re-enter MALVOLIO

  MALVOLIO. Madam, yond young fellow swears speak you. I
    told sick; takes understand much,
     speak you. told were
    asleep; foreknowledge too, and
    speak you. him,
    lady? fortified denial.  
  OLIVIA. speak me.
  MALVOLIO. told so; stand door
    sheriff's post, supporter bench, he'll
    speak you.
  OLIVIA. kind o' man he?
  MALVOLIO. Why, mankind.
  OLIVIA. manner man?
  MALVOLIO. ill manner; speak you, no.
  OLIVIA. personage years he?
  MALVOLIO. man, young boy;
    squash 'tis peascod, codling 'tis
    apple; 'tis standing water, boy and
    man. well-favour'd, speaks shrewishly; one
    mother's milk scarce him.
  OLIVIA. approach. Call gentlewoman.
  MALVOLIO. Gentlewoman, lady calls.                     Exit

                          Re-enter MARIA

  OLIVIA. Give veil; come, throw o'er face;  
    hear Orsino's embassy.

                             Enter VIOLA

  VIOLA. honourable lady house, she?
  OLIVIA. Speak me; answer her. will?
  VIOLA. radiant, exquisite, unmatchable beauty- pray you
    lady house, her. I
    loath cast speech; for, is
    excellently penn'd, great pains con it. Good
    beauties, sustain scorn; comptible, to
    sinister usage.
  OLIVIA. you, sir?
  VIOLA. studied, that
    question's part. Good gentle one, give modest
    assurance lady house, proceed in
    speech.
  OLIVIA. comedian?
  VIOLA. No, profound heart; yet, fangs malice
    swear, play. lady house?  
  OLIVIA. usurp myself, am.
  VIOLA. certain, she, usurp yourself; for
    bestow reserve. from
    commission. speech praise, then
    show heart message.
  OLIVIA. important in't. forgive praise.
  VIOLA. Alas, great pains study it, 'tis poetical.
  OLIVIA. feigned; pray in. I
    heard saucy gates, allow'd approach
    hear you. mad, be
    gone; reason, brief; 'tis time moon
    make skipping dialogue.
  MARIA. hoist sail, sir? lies way.
  VIOLA. No, good swabber, hull longer.
    mollification giant, sweet lady.
  OLIVIA. mind.
  VIOLA. messenger.
  OLIVIA. Sure, hideous matter deliver, the
    courtesy fearful. Speak office.
  VIOLA. concerns ear. bring overture war,  
    taxation homage: hold olive hand; words as
    full peace matter.
  OLIVIA. began rudely. you? you?
  VIOLA. rudeness hath appear'd learn'd my
    entertainment. secret as
    maidenhead- cars, divinity; other's, profanation.
  OLIVIA. Give place alone; hear divinity.
    [Exeunt MARIA ATTENDANTS] Now, sir, text?
  VIOLA. sweet lady-
  OLIVIA. comfortable doctrine, it.
    lies text?
  VIOLA. Orsino's bosom.
  OLIVIA. bosom! chapter bosom?
  VIOLA. answer method: heart.
  OLIVIA. O, read it; heresy. say?
  VIOLA. Good madam, face.
  OLIVIA. commission lord negotiate my
    face? text; draw curtain
    show picture. [Unveiling] you, sir, I
    present. Is't done?  
  VIOLA. Excellently done, God all.
  OLIVIA. 'Tis grain, sir; 'twill endure wind weather.
  VIOLA. 'Tis beauty blent, red white
    Nature's sweet cunning hand laid on.
    Lady, cruell'st alive,
    lead graces grave,
    leave world copy.
  OLIVIA. O, sir, hard-hearted; give out
    divers schedules beauty. inventoried, every
    particle utensil labell'd will: as- item, lips
    indifferent red; item, grey eyes lids them; item, one
    neck, chin, forth. praise me?
  VIOLA. are: proud;
    But, devil, fair.
    lord master loves you- O, love
    recompens'd crown'd
    nonpareil beauty!
  OLIVIA. love me?
  VIOLA. adorations, fertile tears,
    groans thunder love, sighs fire.  
  OLIVIA. lord mind; love him.
    suppose virtuous, noble,
    great estate, fresh stainless youth;
    voices divulg'd, free, learn'd, valiant,
    dimension shape nature
    gracious person; love him.
    answer long ago.
  VIOLA. love master's flame,
    suff'ring, deadly life,
    denial find sense;
    understand it.
  OLIVIA. Why, you?
  VIOLA. Make willow cabin gate,
    call soul house;
    Write loyal cantons contemned love
    sing loud dead night;
    Halloo reverberate hals,
    make babbling gossip air
    Cry 'Olivia!' O, rest
    elements air earth  
    pity me!
  OLIVIA. much.
    parentage?
  VIOLA. fortunes, state well:
    gentleman.
  OLIVIA. lord.
    love him; send more-
    perchance again
    takes it. Fare well.
    pains; spend me.
  VIOLA. fee'd post, lady; purse;
    master, myself, lacks recompense.
    Love make heart flint love;
    fervour, master's, be
    Plac'd contempt! Farewell, fair cruelty.             Exit
  OLIVIA. 'What parentage?'
    'Above fortunes, state well:
    gentleman.' sworn thou art;
    Thy tongue, thy face, thy limbs, actions, spirit,
    give thee five-fold blazon. fast! Soft, soft!  
    master man. now!
    quickly catch plague?
    Methinks feel youth's perfections
    invisible subtle stealth
    creep mine eyes. Well, be.
    ho, Malvolio!

                        Re-enter MALVOLIO

  MALVOLIO. Here, madam, service.
  OLIVIA. Run peevish messenger,
    County's man. left ring him,
    not. it.
    Desire flatter lord,
    hold hopes; him.
    youth to-morrow,
    give reasons for't. Hie thee, Malvolio.
  MALVOLIO. Madam, will.                                  Exit
  OLIVIA. what, fear find
    Mine eye great flatterer mind.  
    Fate, show thy force: owe;
    decreed be; so!                Exit

ACT II. SCENE I.
The sea-coast

Enter ANTONIO SEBASTIAN

  ANTONIO. stay longer; with
    you?
  SEBASTIAN. patience, no. stars shine darkly me; the
    malignancy fate distemper yours; I
    crave leave bear evils alone. It
    bad recompense love lay you.
  ANTONIO. bound.
  SEBASTIAN. No, sooth, sir; determinate voyage mere
    extravagancy. perceive excellent touch of
    modesty extort to
    in; charges manners express
    myself. then, Antonio, Sebastian,
    call'd Roderigo; father Sebastian of
    Messaline heard of. left him
    sister, born hour; heavens had
    pleas'd, ended! you, sir, alter'd that;
    hour breach sea  
    sister drown'd.
  ANTONIO. Alas day!
  SEBASTIAN. lady, sir, resembled me,
    accounted beautiful; with
    estimable overfar that, will
    boldly publish her: bore mind envy call
    fair. drown'd already, sir, salt water, seem
    drown remembrance more.
  ANTONIO. Pardon me, sir, bad entertainment.
  SEBASTIAN. O good Antonio, forgive trouble.
  ANTONIO. murder love, your
    servant.
  SEBASTIAN. undo done- is, kill
    recover'd-desire not. Fare ye once;
    bosom full kindness, manners of
    mother that, occasion more, mine eyes tell
    tales me. bound Count Orsino's court. Farewell.
 Exit
  ANTONIO. gentleness gods thee!
    cnemies Orsino's court,  
    shortly thee there.
    may, adore thee so
    danger sport, go.            Exit




SCENE II.
A street

Enter VIOLA MALVOLIO doors

  MALVOLIO. ev'n Countess Olivia?
  VIOLA. now, sir; moderate pace arriv'd but
    hither.
  MALVOLIO. returns ring you, sir; saved
    pains, yourself. adds, moreover,
    put lord desperate assurance will
    him. thing more: hardy to
    affairs, report lord's
    taking this. Receive so.
  VIOLA. ring me; it.
  MALVOLIO. Come, sir, peevishly threw her; is
    return'd. worth stooping for, it
    lies eye; not, finds it.
 Exit
  VIOLA. left ring her; means lady?
    Fortune forbid charm'd her!
    made good view me; indeed,  
    methought eyes lost tongue,
    speak starts distractedly.
    loves me, sure: cunning passion
    Invites churlish messenger.
    lord's ring! Why, none.
    man. so- 'tis-
    Poor lady, love dream.
    Disguise, thou art wickedness
    pregnant enemy much.
    easy proper-false
    women's waxen hearts set forms!
    Alas, frailty cause, we!
    made of, be.
    fadge? master loves dearly,
    I, poor monster, fond him;
    she, mistaken, dote me.
    this? man,
    state desperate master's love;
    woman- alas day!-
    thriftless sighs poor Olivia breathe!  
    O Time, thou untangle this, I;
    hard knot t' untie!                  Exit




SCENE III.
OLIVIA'S house

Enter SIR TOBY SIR ANDREW

  SIR TOBY. Approach, Sir Andrew. abed midnight to
    betimes; 'diluculo surgere' thou know'st-
  AGUECHEEK. Nay, troth, not; late
    late.
  SIR TOBY. false conclusion! hate unfill'd can. be
    midnight bed early; go
    bed midnight bed betimes. lives
    consist elements?
  AGUECHEEK. Faith, say; consists of
    eating drinking.
  SIR TOBY. Th'art scholar; eat drink.
    Marian, say! stoup wine.

                          Enter CLOWN

  AGUECHEEK. fool, i' faith.
  CLOWN. now, hearts! picture 'we  
    three'?
  SIR TOBY. Welcome, ass. catch.
  AGUECHEEK. troth, fool excellent breast. had
    forty shillings leg, sweet a
    breath sing, fool has. sooth, thou wast very
    gracious fooling night, thou spok'st Pigrogromitus,
    Vapians passing equinoctial Queubus; 'twas very
    good, i' faith. thee sixpence thy leman; hadst it?
  CLOWN. impeticos thy gratillity; Malvolio's nose no
    whipstock. lady white hand, Myrmidons no
    bottle-ale houses.
  AGUECHEEK. Excellent! Why, fooling, is
    done. Now, song.
  SIR TOBY. on, sixpence you. song.
  AGUECHEEK. testril too; knight give a-
CLOWN. love-song, song good life?
  SIR TOBY. love-song, love-song.
  AGUECHEEK. Ay, ay; care good life.

                         CLOWN sings
  
         O mistress mine, roaming?
         O, stay hear; true love's coming,
           sing high low.
           Trip further, pretty sweeting;
           Journeys end lovers meeting,
           wise man's son doth know.

  AGUECHEEK. Excellent good, i' faith!
  SIR TOBY. Good, good!

                         CLOWN sings

           love? 'Tis hereafter;
           Present mirth hath present laughter;
             unsure.
           delay lies plenty,
           kiss me, sweet twenty;
             Youth's stuff endure.

  AGUECHEEK. mellifluous voice, true knight.  
  SIR TOBY. contagious breath.
  AGUECHEEK. sweet contagious, i' faith.
  SIR TOBY. hear nose, dulcet contagion. shall
    make welkin dance indeed? rouse night-owl in
    catch draw souls weaver? do
    that?
  AGUECHEEK. love me, do't. dog catch.
  CLOWN. By'r lady, sir, dogs catch well.
  AGUECHEEK. certain. catch 'Thou knave.'
  CLOWN. 'Hold thy peace, thou knave' knight? constrain'd
    in't call thee knave, knight.
  AGUECHEEK. 'Tis time constrained call
    knave. Begin, fool: begins 'Hold thy peace.'
  CLOWN. begin hold peace.
  AGUECHEEK. Good, i' faith! Come, begin.           [Catch sung]

                         Enter MARIA

  MARIA. caterwauling here! lady not
    call'd steward Malvolio, bid turn  
    doors, trust me.
  SIR TOBY. lady's Cataian, politicians, Malvolio's a
    Peg-a-Ramsey,                                    [Sings]
                  merry men we.
    consanguineous? blood? Tilly-vally,
    lady.                                                [Sings]
              dwelt man Babylon,
              Lady, lady.
  CLOWN. Beshrew me, knight's admirable fooling.
  AGUECHEEK. Ay, dispos'd, I
    too; grace, natural.
  SIR TOBY. [Sings] O' twelfth day December-
  MARIA. love o' God, peace!

                       Enter MALVOLIO

  MALVOLIO. masters, mad? you? no
    wit, manners, honesty, gabble tinkers this
    time night? ye make ale-house lady's house, that
    ye squeak coziers' catches mitigation  
    remorse voice? respect place, persons, nor
    time, you?
  SIR TOBY. time, sir, catches. Sneck up!
  MALVOLIO. Sir Toby, round you. lady bade tell
    that, harbours kins-man, nothing
    allied disorders. separate your
    misdemeanours, house; not, would
    leave her, bid you
    farewell.
  SIR TOBY. [Sings] Farewell, dear heart, gone.
  MARIA. Nay, good Sir Toby.
  CLOWN. [Sings] eyes show days done.
  MALVOLIO. Is't so?
  SIR TOBY. [Sings] die.           [Falls down]
  CLOWN. [Sings] Sir Toby, lie.
  MALVOLIO. credit you.
  SIR TOBY. [Sings] bid go?
  CLOWN. [Sings] do?
  SIR TOBY. [Sings] bid go, spare not?
  CLOWN. [Sings] O, no, no, no, no, dare not.  
  SIR TOBY. [Rising] o' tune, sir! Ye lie. Art a
    steward? Dost thou think, thou art virtuous, shall
    cakes ale?
  CLOWN. Yes, Saint Anne; ginger hot i' th' mouth
    too.
 SIR TOBY. Th' art i' th' right. Go, sir, rub chain crumbs.
    stoup wine, Maria!
  MALVOLIO. Mistress Mary, priz'd lady's favour anything
    contempt, give means uncivil
    rule; it, hand.
 Exit
  MARIA. shake ears.
  AGUECHEEK. 'Twere good deed drink man's ahungry,
    challenge field, break promise him
    make fool him.
  SIR TOBY. Do't, knight. write thee challenge; I'll
    deliver thy indignation word mouth.
  MARIA. Sweet Sir Toby, patient to-night; youth of
    Count's to-day lady, quiet.
    Monsieur Malvolio, him; gull
    nayword, make common recreation,  
    wit lie straight bed. can
    it.
  SIR TOBY. Possess us, possess us; him.
  MARIA. Marry, sir, kind Puritan.
  AGUECHEEK. O, thought that, beat dog.
  SIR TOBY. What, Puritan? Thy exquisite reason, dear
    knight?
  AGUECHEEK. exquisite reason for't, reason good
    enough.
  MARIA. devil Puritan is, constantly a
    time-pleaser; affection'd ass cons state book and
     utters great swarths; persuaded himself, so
    cramm'd, thinks, excellencies grounds
    faith love him; vice in
    revenge find notable work.
  SIR TOBY. wilt thou do?
  MARIA. drop obscure epistles love;
    wherein, colour beard, shape leg, the
    manner gait, expressure eye, forehead, and
    complexion, find feelingly personated.  
    write lady, niece; forgotten matter we
    make distinction hands.
  SIR TOBY. Excellent! smell device.
  AGUECHEEK. have't nose too.
  SIR TOBY. think, letters thou wilt drop, that
    niece, love him.
  MARIA. purpose is, indeed, horse colour.
  AGUECHEEK. horse make ass.
  MARIA. Ass, doubt not.
  AGUECHEEK. O, 'twill admirable!
  MARIA. Sport royal, warrant you. physic work with
    him. plant two, fool make third, where
    find letter; observe construction it. For
    night, bed, dream event. Farewell.
 Exit
  SIR TOBY. Good night, Penthesilea.
  AGUECHEEK. me, good wench.
  SIR TOBY. beagle true-bred, adores me.
    o' that?
  AGUECHEEK. ador'd too.  
  SIR TOBY. bed, knight. Thou hadst send more
    money.
  AGUECHEEK. recover niece, foul out.
  SIR TOBY. Send money, knight; thou hast i' th' end,
    call Cut.
  AGUECHEEK. not, trust me; will.
  SIR TOBY. Come, come, burn sack; 'tis late go
    bed now. Come, knight; come, knight.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE IV.
The DUKE'S palace

Enter DUKE, VIOLA, CURIO, OTHERS

  DUKE. Give music. Now, good morrow, friends.
    Now, good Cesario, piece song,
    antique song heard night;
    Methought relieve passion much,
    light airs recollected terms
    brisk giddy-paced times.
    Come, verse.
  CURIO. here, lordship, sing
    it.
  DUKE. it?
  CURIO. Feste, jester, lord; fool Lady Olivia's
    father delight in. house.
  DUKE. Seek out, play tune while.
                                       Exit CURIO. [Music plays]
    hither, boy. thou shalt love,
    sweet pangs remember me;
    true lovers are,  
    Unstaid skittish motions else
    Save constant image creature
    belov'd. dost thou tune?
  VIOLA. echo seat
    Love thron'd.
  DUKE. Thou dost speak masterly.
    life upon't, young thou art, thine eye
    Hath stay'd favour loves;
    Hath not, boy?
  VIOLA. little, favour.
  DUKE. kind woman is't?
  VIOLA. complexion.
  DUKE. worth thee, then. years, i' faith?
  VIOLA. years, lord.
  DUKE. old, heaven! woman take
    elder herself; wears him,
    sways level husband's heart.
    For, boy, praise ourselves,
    fancies giddy unfirm,
    longing, wavering, sooner lost won,  
    women's are.
  VIOLA. well, lord.
  DUKE. thy love younger thyself,
    thy affection hold bent;
    women roses, fair flow'r
    display'd doth fall hour.
  VIOLA. are; alas, so!
    die, perfection grow!

                  Re-enter CURIO CLOWN

  DUKE. O, fellow, come, song night.
    Mark it, Cesario; plain;
    spinsters knitters sun,
    free maids weave thread bones,
    chant it; silly sooth,
    dallies innocence love,
    age.
  CLOWN. ready, sir?
  DUKE. Ay; prithee, sing.                               [Music]  

                     FESTE'S SONG

            away, away, death;
          sad cypress laid;
            Fly away, fly away, breath,
          slain fair cruel maid.
          shroud white, stuck yew,
                 O, prepare it!
          part death true
                 share it.

            flower, flower sweet,
          black coffin strown;
            friend, friend greet
          poor corpse bones thrown;
          thousand thousand save,
                 Lay me, O, where
          Sad true lover find grave,
                 weep there!  

  DUKE. thy pains.
  CLOWN. pains, sir; pleasure singing, sir.
  DUKE. pay thy pleasure, then.
  CLOWN. Truly, sir, pleasure paid time another.
  DUKE. Give leave leave thee.
  CLOWN. melancholy god protect thee; tailor make thy
    doublet changeable taffeta, thy mind opal. I
    men constancy put sea, business
    everything, intent everywhere: it
    makes good voyage nothing. Farewell.
                                                      Exit CLOWN
  DUKE. rest give place.
                                     Exeunt CURIO ATTENDANTS
    more, Cesario,
    thee yond sovereign cruelty.
    love, noble world,
    Prizes quantity dirty lands;
    parts fortune hath bestow'd her,
    hold giddily Fortune;  
    'tis miracle queen gems
    Nature pranks attracts soul.
  VIOLA. love you, sir?
  DUKE. answer'd.
  VIOLA. Sooth, must.
    lady, is,
    Hath love great pang heart
    Olivia. love her;
    so. answer'd?
  DUKE. woman's sides
    bide beating strong passion
    love doth give heart; woman's heart
    big hold much; lack retention.
    Alas, love call'd appetite-
    motion liver, palate-
    suffer surfeit, cloyment, revolt;
    mine hungry sea,
    digest much. Make compare
    love woman bear me
    owe Olivia.  
  VIOLA. Ay, know-
  DUKE. dost thou know?
  VIOLA. love women men owe.
    faith, true heart we.
    father daughter lov'd man,
    perhaps, woman,
    lordship.
  DUKE. history?
  VIOLA. blank, lord. told love,
    concealment, worm i' th' bud,
    Feed damask cheek. pin'd thought;
    green yellow melancholy
    sat Patience monument,
    Smiling grief. love indeed?
    men more, swear more, indeed
    shows will; prove
    vows, love.
  DUKE. died thy sister love, boy?
  VIOLA. daughters father's house,
    brothers too- not.  
    Sir, lady?
  DUKE. Ay, theme.
    haste. Give jewel; say
    love give place, bide denay.             Exeunt




SCENE V.
OLIVIA'S garden

Enter SIR TOBY, SIR ANDREW, FABIAN

  SIR TOBY. thy ways, Signior Fabian.
  FABIAN. Nay, come; lose scruple sport be
    boil'd death melancholy.
  SIR TOBY. Wouldst thou glad niggardly rascally
    sheep-biter notable shame?
  FABIAN. exult, man; brought o' favour
    lady bear-baiting here.
  SIR TOBY. anger bear again; fool
    black blue- not, Sir Andrew?
  AGUECHEEK. not, pity lives.

                       Enter MARIA

  SIR TOBY. villain.
    now, metal India!
  MARIA. ye box-tree. Malvolio's coming down
    walk. yonder i' sun practising behaviour  
    shadow half hour. Observe him, love of
    mockery, letter make contemplative idiot
    him. Close, jesting! [As men hide drops
    letter] Lie thou there; trout be
    caught tickling.
 Exit

                      Enter MALVOLIO

  MALVOLIO. 'Tis fortune; fortune. Maria told she
    affect me; heard near, that,
    fancy, complexion. Besides, she
    exalted respect that
    her. on't?
  SIR TOBY. overweening rogue!
  FABIAN. O, peace! Contemplation makes rare turkey-cock him;
    jets advanc'd plumes!
  AGUECHEEK. 'Slight, beat rogue-
  SIR TOBY. Peace, say.
  MALVOLIO. Count Malvolio!  
  SIR TOBY. Ah, rogue!
  AGUECHEEK. Pistol him, pistol him.
  SIR TOBY. Peace, peace!
  MALVOLIO. for't: Lady Strachy married
    yeoman wardrobe.
  AGUECHEEK. Fie him, Jezebel!
  FABIAN. O, peace! deeply in; imagination blows
    him.
  MALVOLIO. months married her, sitting my
    state-
  SIR TOBY. O, stone-bow hit eye!
  MALVOLIO. Calling officers me, branch'd velvet gown,
    day-bed- left Olivia sleeping-
  SIR TOBY. Fire brimstone!
  FABIAN. O, peace, peace!
  MALVOLIO. humour state; demure
    travel regard, telling place they
    theirs, kinsman Toby-
  SIR TOBY. Bolts shackles!
  FABIAN. O, peace, peace, peace! Now, now.  
  MALVOLIO. people, obedient start, make for
    him. frown while, perchance wind watch, play
    my- rich jewel. Toby approaches; curtsies me-
  SIR TOBY. fellow live?
  FABIAN. silence drawn cars, peace.
  MALVOLIO. extend hand thus, quenching familiar smile
   austere regard control-
  SIR TOBY. Toby blow o' lips then?
  MALVOLIO. 'Cousin Toby, fortunes cast your
    niece give prerogative speech'-
  SIR TOBY. What, what?
  MALVOLIO. 'You amend drunkenness'-
  SIR TOBY. Out, scab!
  FABIAN. Nay, patience, break sinews plot.
  MALVOLIO. 'Besides, waste treasure time a
    foolish knight'-
  AGUECHEEK. me, warrant you.
  MALVOLIO. 'One Sir Andrew.'
  AGUECHEEK. knew 'twas I; call fool.
  MALVOLIO. employment here?  
                                          [Taking letter]
  FABIAN. woodcock gin.
  SIR TOBY. O, peace! spirit humours intimate reading
    aloud him!
  MALVOLIO. life, lady's hand: very
    C's, U's, T's; makes great P's. It
    is, contempt question, hand.
  AGUECHEEK. C's, U's, T's. that?
  MALVOLIO. [Reads] 'To unknown belov'd, this, good
    wishes.' phrases! leave, wax. Soft! the
    impressure Lucrece seal; 'tis lady.
    be?
  FABIAN. wins him, liver all.
  MALVOLIO. [Reads]

                    Jove love,
                      who?
                    Lips, move;
                    man know.'
  
    'No man know.' follows? numbers alter'd!
    'No man know.' thee, Malvolio?
  SIR TOBY. Marry, hang thee, brock!
  MALVOLIO. [Reads]

             'I command adore;
               silence, Lucrece knife,
             bloodless stroke heart doth gore;
               M. O. A. I. doth sway life.'

  FABIAN. fustian riddle!
  SIR TOBY. Excellent wench, I.
  MALVOLIO. 'M. O. A. I. doth sway life.'
    Nay, see, see, see.
  FABIAN. dish o' poison dress'd him!
  SIR TOBY. wing staniel checks it!
  MALVOLIO. 'I command adore.' Why, command me: I
    serve her; lady. Why, evident formal
    capacity; obstruction this. end- what
    alphabetical position portend? make  
    resemble me. Softly! M. O. A. I.-
  SIR TOBY. O, ay, make that! cold scent.
  FABIAN. Sowter cry upon't this, rank
    fox.
  MALVOLIO. M- Malvolio; M- why, begins name.
  FABIAN. work out?
    cur excellent faults.
  MALVOLIO. M- consonancy sequel; that
    suffers probation: follow, O does.
  FABIAN. O end, hope.
  SIR TOBY. Ay, cudgel him, make cry 'O!'
  MALVOLIO. behind.
  FABIAN. Ay, eye you, more
    detraction heels fortunes you.
  MALVOLIO. M. O. A. I. simulation former; and
    yet, crush little, bow me, of
    letters name. Soft! prose.
                                                         [Reads]
      'If fall thy hand, revolve. stars above
    thee; afraid greatness. born great,  
    achieve greatness, greatness thrust 'em. Thy
    Fates open hands; thy blood spirit embrace them;
    and, inure thyself thou art be, cast thy
    humble slough fresh. opposite kinsman, surly
    servants; thy tongue tang arguments state; put
    thyself trick singularity. advises thee that
    sighs thee. Remember commended thy yellow stockings, and
    wish'd thee cross-garter'd. say, remember, to,
    thou art made, thou desir'st so; not, thee
    steward still, fellow servants, worthy touch
    Fortune's fingers. Farewell. alter services with
    thee,
                                         FORTUNATE-UNHAPPY.'

    Daylight champain discovers more. open. be
    proud, read politic authors, baffle Sir Toby, I
    wash gross acquaintance, point-devise very
    man. fool imagination jade me; for
    reason excites this, lady loves me. did
    commend yellow stockings late, praise leg  
    cross-garter'd; manifests love, and
    kind injunction drives habits her
    liking. stars happy. strange, stout, in
    yellow stockings, cross-garter'd, swiftness of
    putting on. Jove stars praised! a
    postscript.

    [Reads] 'Thou canst choose am. thou
    entertain'st love, thy smiling; thy smiles
    thee well. presence smile, dear my
    sweet, prithee.'

    Jove, thee. smile; thou
    wilt me.                                           Exit
  FABIAN. give part sport pension of
    thousands paid Sophy.
  SIR TOBY. marry wench device.
  AGUECHEEK. too.
  SIR TOBY. dowry jest.
  
                          Enter MARIA

  AGUECHEEK. neither.
  FABIAN. noble gull-catcher.
  SIR TOBY. Wilt thou set thy foot o' neck?
  AGUECHEEK. o' mine either?
  SIR TOBY. play freedom tray-trip, thy
    bond-slave?
  AGUECHEEK. I' faith, either?
  SIR TOBY. Why, thou hast put dream the
    image leaves run mad.
  MARIA. Nay, true; work him?
  SIR TOBY. aqua-vita! midwife.
  AIARIA. fruits sport, mark his
    approach lady. yellow
    stockings, 'tis colour abhors, cross-garter'd, a
    fashion detests; smile her, now
    unsuitable disposition, addicted a
    melancholy is, turn notable
    contempt. it, follow me.  
  SIR TOBY. gates Tartar, thou excellent devil wit!
  AGUECHEEK. make too.                           Exeunt

ACT III. SCENE I.
OLIVIA'S garden

Enter VIOLA, CLOWN tabor

  VIOLA. Save thee, friend, thy music!
    Dost thou live thy tabor?
  CLOWN. No, sir, live church.
  VIOLA. Art thou churchman?
  CLOWN. matter, sir: live church; live
    house, house doth stand church.
  VIOLA. thou mayst king lies beggar, beggar
    dwell him; church stands thy tabor, thy tabor
    stand church.
  CLOWN. said, sir. age! sentence a
    chev'ril glove good wit. quickly wrong side be
    turn'd outward!
  VIOLA. Nay, certain; dally nicely words may
    quickly make wanton.
  CLOWN. would, therefore, sister name, sir.
  VIOLA. Why, man?
  CLOWN. Why, sir, name's word; dally word  
    make sister wanton. words rascals
    bonds disgrac'd them.
  VIOLA. Thy reason, man?
  CLOWN. Troth, sir, yield words, words
    grown false loath prove reason them.
  VIOLA. warrant thou art merry fellow car'st nothing.
  CLOWN. so, sir; care something; conscience,
    sir, care you. care nothing, sir,
    make invisible.
  VIOLA. Art thou Lady Olivia's fool?
  CLOWN. No, indeed, sir; Lady Olivia folly; keep
    fool, sir, till married; fools husbands
    pilchers herrings- husband's bigger. am
    fool, corrupter words.
  VIOLA. thee late Count Orsino's.
  CLOWN. Foolery, sir, walk orb sun- it
    shines everywhere. sorry, sir, fool be
    oft master mistress: your
    wisdom there.
  VIOLA. Nay, thou pass me, thee.  
    Hold, expenses thee.             [Giving coin]
  CLOWN. Jove, commodity hair, send beard!
  VIOLA. troth, thee, sick one;
    [Aside] grow chin.- thy lady
    within?
  CLOWN. pair bred, sir?
  VIOLA. Yes, put use.
  CLOWN. play Lord Pandarus Phrygia, sir, bring a
    Cressida Troilus.
  VIOLA. understand you, sir; 'tis begg'd.
                                           [Giving coin]
  CLOWN. matter, hope, great, sir, begging beggar:
    Cressida beggar. lady within, sir. construe to
    come; of
    welkin- 'element' word overworn.
                                                      Exit CLOWN
  VIOLA. fellow wise play fool;
    craves kind wit.
    observe mood jests,
    quality persons, time;  
    And, haggard, check feather
    eye. practice
    full labour wise man's art;
    folly wisely shows fit;
    wise men, folly-fall'n, taint wit.

                Enter SIR TOBY SIR ANDREW

  SIR TOBY. Save you, gentleman!
  VIOLA. you, sir.
  AGUECHEEK. Dieu vous garde, monsieur.
  VIOLA. vous aussi; votre serviteur.
  AGUECHEEK. hope, sir, are; yours.
  SIR TOBY. encounter house? niece desirous you
    enter, trade her.
  VIOLA. bound niece, sir; mean, list my
    voyage.
  SIR TOBY. Taste legs, sir; put motion.
  VIOLA. legs understand me, sir, understand what
    bidding taste legs.  
  SIR TOBY. mean, go, sir, enter.
  VIOLA. answer gait entrance. are
    prevented.

                  Enter OLIVIA MARIA

    excellent accomplish'd lady, heavens rain odours you!
  AGUECHEEK. youth's rare courtier- 'Rain odours' well!
  VIOLA. matter hath voice, lady, pregnant
    vouchsafed car.
  AGUECHEEK. 'Odours,' 'pregnant,' 'vouchsafed'- 'em all
    ready.
  OLIVIA. garden door shut, leave hearing.
    [Exeunt OLIVIA VIOLA] Give hand, sir.
  VIOLA. duty, madam, humble service.
  OLIVIA. name?
  VIOLA. Cesario servant's name, fair Princess.
  OLIVIA. servant, sir! 'Twas merry world
    lowly feigning call'd compliment.
    Y'are servant Count Orsino, youth.  
  VIOLA. yours, yours:
    servant's servant servant, madam.
  OLIVIA. him, him; thoughts,
    blanks fill'd me!
  VIOLA. Madam, whet gentle thoughts
    behalf.
  OLIVIA. O, leave, pray you:
    bade speak him;
    But, undertake suit,
    hear solicit that
    music spheres.
  VIOLA. Dear lady-
  OLIVIA. Give leave, beseech you. send,
    enchantment here,
    ring chase you; abuse
    Myself, servant, and, fear me, you.
    hard construction sit,
    force shameful cunning
    knew yours. think?
    set mine honour stake,  
    baited th' unmuzzled thoughts
    tyrannous heart think? receiving
    shown: cypress, bosom,
    Hides heart. So, hear speak.
  VIOLA. Pity YOU.
  OLIVIA. degree love.
  VIOLA. No, grize; 'tis vulgar proof
    oft pity enemies.
  OLIVIA. Why, then, methinks 'tis time smile again.
    O world, apt poor proud!
    prey, better
    fall lion wolf!       [Clock strikes]
    clock upbraids waste time.
    afraid, good youth; you;
    yet, wit youth harvest,
    wife reap proper man.
    lies way, due west.
  VIOLA. westward-ho!
    Grace good disposition attend ladyship!
    nothing, madam, lord me?  
  OLIVIA. Stay.
    prithee thou think'st me.
  VIOLA. are.
  OLIVIA. so, you.
  VIOLA. right: am.
  OLIVIA. be!
  VIOLA. better, madam, am?
    might, fool.
  OLIVIA. O, deal scorn beautiful
    contempt anger lip!
    murd'rous guilt shows soon
    love hid: love's night noon.
    Cesario, roses spring,
    maidhood, honour, truth, thing,
    love thee that, maugre thy pride,
    wit reason passion hide.
    extort thy reasons clause,
    woo, thou hast cause;
    reason reason fetter:
    Love sought good, unsought better.  
  VIOLA. innocence swear, youth,
    heart, bosom, truth,
    woman has; none
    mistress it, save alone.
    adieu, good madam; more
    master's tears deplore.
  OLIVIA. again; thou mayst move
    heart abhors love.         Exeunt




SCENE II.
OLIVIA'S house

Enter SIR TOBY, SIR ANDREW FABIAN

  AGUECHEEK. No, faith, stay jot longer.
  SIR TOBY. Thy reason, dear venom, give thy reason.
  FABIAN. yield reason, Sir Andrew.
  AGUECHEEK. Marry, niece favours Count's
    servingman bestow'd me; saw't i' th'
    orchard.
  SIR TOBY. thee while, boy? that.
  AGUECHEEK. plain now.
  FABIAN. great argument love you.
  AGUECHEEK. 'Slight! make ass o' me?
  FABIAN. prove legitimate, sir, oaths judgment
    reason.
  SIR TOBY. grand-jurymen Noah a
    sailor.
  FABIAN. show favour youth sight to
    exasperate you, awake dormouse valour, put fire in
    heart brimstone liver.  
    accosted her; excellent jests, fire-new the
    mint, bang'd youth dumbness. was
    look'd hand, baulk'd. double gilt of
    opportunity time wash off, sail'd
    north lady's opinion; hang an
    icicle Dutchman's beard, redeem some
    laudable attempt valour policy.
  AGUECHEEK. An't way, valour, policy I
    hate; lief Brownist politician.
  SIR TOBY. Why, then, build thy fortunes basis of
    valour. Challenge Count's youth fight him; hurt
    eleven places. niece note it; assure
    thyself love-broker world prevail in
    man's commendation woman report valour.
  FABIAN. this, Sir Andrew.
  AGUECHEEK. bear challenge him?
  SIR TOBY. Go, write martial hand; curst brief; is
    matter witty, eloquent full invention.
    Taunt license ink; thou thou'st some
    thrice, amiss; lies lie  
    thy sheet paper, sheet big the
    bed Ware England, set 'em down; it. be
    gall thy ink, thou write goose-pen, no
    matter. it.
  AGUECHEEK. find you?
  SIR TOBY. call thee cubiculo. Go.
                                                 Exit SIR ANDREW
  FABIAN. dear manakin you, Sir Toby.
  SIR TOBY. dear him, lad- thousand strong,
    so.
  FABIAN. rare letter him; not
    deliver't?
  SIR TOBY. trust then; means stir youth
    answer. oxen wainropes hale them
    together. Andrew, open'd find much
    blood liver clog foot flea, eat the
    rest th' anatomy.
  FABIAN. opposite, youth, bears visage great
    presage cruelty.
  
                         Enter MARIA

  SIR TOBY. youngest wren comes.
  MARIA. desire spleen, laugh into
    stitches, follow me. Yond gull Malvolio turned heathen, very
    renegado; Christian means saved by
    believing rightly impossible passages of
    grossness. yellow stockings.
  SIR TOBY. cross-garter'd?
  MARIA. villainously; pedant school i' th'
    church. dogg'd murderer. obey every
    point letter dropp'd betray him. smile
    face lines map the
    augmentation Indies. thing as
    'tis;  forbear hurling things him. lady
    strike him; do, smile take't great
    favour.
  SIR TOBY. Come, bring us, bring is.         Exeunt




SCENE III.
A street

Enter SEBASTIAN ANTONIO

  SEBASTIAN. troubled you;
    make pleasure pains,
    chide you.
  ANTONIO. stay you: desire,
    sharp filed steel, spur forth;
    love you- much
    drawn longer voyage-
    jealousy befall travel,
    skilless parts; stranger,
    Unguided unfriended, prove
    Rough unhospitable. love,
    arguments fear,
    Set pursuit.
  SEBASTIAN. kind Antonio,
    answer make thanks,
    thanks, thanks; oft good turns
    shuffl'd uncurrent pay;  
    worth conscience firm,
    find dealing. do?
    reliques town?
  ANTONIO. To-morrow, sir; lodging.
  SEBASTIAN. weary, 'tis long night;
    pray you, satisfy eyes
    memorials things fame
    renown city.
  ANTONIO. pardon me.
    danger walk streets:
    sea-fight 'gainst Count galleys
    service; note, indeed,
    That, ta'en here, scarce answer'd.
  SEBASTIAN. Belike slew great number people.
  ANTONIO.Th' offence bloody nature;
    Albeit quality time quarrel
    bloody argument.
    answer'd repaying
    them; which, traffic's sake,
    city did. stood out;  
    which, lapsed place,
    pay dear.
  SEBASTIAN. walk open.
  ANTONIO. doth fit me. Hold, sir, purse;
    south suburbs, Elephant,
    lodge. bespeak diet,
    Whiles beguile time feed knowledge
    viewing town; me.
  SEBASTIAN. purse?
  ANTONIO. Haply eye light toy
    desire purchase; store,
    think, idle markets, sir.
  SEBASTIAN. purse-bearer, leave for
    hour.
  ANTONIO. th' Elephant.
  SEBASTIAN. remember.                               Exeunt




SCENE IV.
OLIVIA'S garden

Enter OLIVIA MARIA

  OLIVIA. him; come.
    feast him? bestow him?
    youth bought oft begg'd borrow'd.
    speak loud.
    Malvolio? sad civil,
    suits servant fortunes.
    Malvolio?
  MARIA. coming, madam; strange manner.
    possess'd, madam.
  OLIVIA. Why, matter? rave?
  MARIA. No, madam, smile. ladyship were
    guard come; man is
    tainted in's wits.
  OLIVIA. call hither.                         Exit MARIA
    mad he,
    sad merry madness equal be.
  
               Re-enter MARIA MALVOLIO

    now, Malvolio!
  MALVOLIO. Sweet lady, ho, ho.
  OLIVIA. Smil'st thou?
    thee sad occasion.
  MALVOLIO. Sad, lady? sad. make some
    obstruction blood, cross-gartering; that?
    eye one, true
    sonnet is: 'Please all.'
  OLIVIA. Why, dost thou, man? matter thee?
  MALVOLIO. black mind, yellow legs.
    hands, commands executed.
    sweet Roman hand.
  OLIVIA. Wilt thou bed, Malvolio?
  MALVOLIO. bed? Ay, sweetheart, thee.
  OLIVIA. God comfort thee! dost thou smile so, kiss thy hand
    oft?
  MARIA. you, Malvolio?
  MALVOLIO. request? Yes, nightingales answer daws!  
  MARIA. ridiculous boldness lady?
  MALVOLIO. 'Be afraid greatness.' 'Twas writ.
  OLIVIA. mean'st thou that, Malvolio?
  AIALVOLIO. 'Some born great,'-
  OLIVIA. Ha?
  MALVOLIO. 'Some achieve greatness,'-
  OLIVIA. say'st thou?
  MALVOLIO. 'And greatness thrust them.'
  OLIVIA. Heaven restore thee!
  MALVOLIO. 'Remember commended thy yellow stockings,'-
  OLIVIA. 'Thy yellow stockings?'
  MALVOLIO. 'And wish'd thee cross-garterd.'
  OLIVIA. 'Cross-garter'd?'
  MALVOLIO. 'Go to, thou made, thou desir'st so';-
  OLIVIA. made?
  MALVOLIO. 'If not, thee servant still.'
  OLIVIA. Why, midsummer madness.

                     Enter SERVANT
  
  SERVANT. Madam, young gentleman Count Orsino's is
    return'd; entreat back; attends your
    ladyship's pleasure.
  OLIVIA. him. [Exit SERVANT] Good Maria, this
    fellow look'd to. cousin Toby? my
    people special care him; miscarry
    half dowry.
                                         Exeunt OLIVIA MARIA
  MALVOLIO. O, ho! now? worse man Sir
    Toby me! concurs directly letter: she
    sends purpose, stubborn him; she
    incites letter. 'Cast thy humble slough,' says
    she. 'Be opposite kinsman, surly servants; thy
    tongue tang arguments state; put thyself trick
    singularity' sets manner how, as: a
    sad face, reverend carriage, slow tongue, habit of
    sir note, forth. lim'd her; is
    Jove's doing, Jove make thankful! away
    now- 'Let fellow look'd to.' 'Fellow,' 'Malvolio' nor
    degree, 'fellow.' Why, adheres together,  
    dram scruple, scruple scruple, obstacle,
    incredulous unsafe circumstance- said? Nothing
    full prospect my
    hopes. Well, Jove, I, doer this, be
    thanked.

             Re-enter MARIA, SIR TOBY FABIAN

  SIR TOBY. he, sanctity? the
    devils hell drawn little, Legion possess'd
    him, speak him.
  FABIAN. is, is. is't you, sir?
  SIR TOBY. is't you, man?
  MALVOLIO. off; discard you. enjoy private; off.
  MARIA. Lo, hollow fiend speaks him! tell
    you? Sir Toby, lady prays care him.
  MALVOLIO. Ah, ha! so?
  SIR TOBY. to, to; peace, peace; deal gently him.
    alone. you, Malvolio? is't you? What, man,
    defy devil; consider, enemy mankind.  
  MALVOLIO. say?
  MARIA. La you, speak ill devil, takes at
    heart! Pray God bewitched.
  FABIAN. Carry water th' wise woman.
  MARIA. Marry, to-morrow morning, live. My
    lady lose say.
  MALVOLIO. now, mistress!
  MARIA. O Lord!
  SIR TOBY. Prithee hold thy peace; way. not
    move him? him.
  FABIAN. gentleness- gently, gently. fiend rough,
    roughly us'd.
  SIR TOBY. Why, now, bawcock!
    dost thou, chuck?
  MALVOLIO. Sir!
  SIR TOBY. Ay, Biddy, me. What, man, 'tis gravity
    play cherrypit Satan. Hang him, foul collier!
  MARIA. prayers, good Sir Toby, pray.
  MALVOLIO. prayers, minx!
  MARIA. No, warrant you, hear godliness.  
  MALVOLIO. Go, hang all! idle shallow things; I
    element; hereafter.
 Exit
  SIR TOBY. Is't possible?
  FABIAN. play'd stage now, condemn as
    improbable fiction.
  SIR TOBY. genius hath infection device,
    man.
  MARIA. Nay, pursue now, device air taint.
  FABIAN. Why, make mad indeed.
  MARIA. house quieter.
  SIR TOBY. Come, dark room bound. niece
    belief mad. carry thus, for
    pleasure penance, till pastime, tired of
    breath, prompt mercy him; time will
    bring device bar crown thee finder of
    madmen. see, see.

                     Enter SIR ANDREW
  
  FABIAN. matter morning.
  AGUECHEEK. challenge; read it. warrant vinegar
    pepper in't.
  FABIAN. Is't saucy?
  AGUECHEEK. Ay, is't, warrant him; read.
  SIR TOBY. Give me. [Reads] 'Youth, whatsoever thou art, thou art
    scurvy fellow.'
  FABIAN. Good valiant.
  SIR TOBY. [Reads] 'Wonder not, admire thy mind, do
    call thee so, show thee reason for't.'
  FABIAN. good note; blow law.
  SIR TOBY. [Reads] 'Thou com'st Lady Olivia, sight
    thee kindly; thou liest thy throat; not
    matter challenge thee for.'
  FABIAN. brief, exceeding good sense- less.
  SIR TOBY. [Reads] 'I waylay thee home; be
    thy chance kill me'-
  FABIAN. Good.
  SIR TOBY. 'Thou kill'st rogue villain.'
  FABIAN. o' th' windy side law. Good!  
  SIR TOBY. [Reads] 'Fare thee well; God mercy of
    souls! mercy mine; hope better,
    thyself. Thy friend, thou usest him, thy
    sworn enemy,
                                              ANDREW AGUECHEEK.'

    letter move not, legs cannot. give't him.
  MARIA. fit occasion for't; some
    commerce lady, depart.
  SIR TOBY. Go, Sir Andrew; scout corner the
    orchard, bum-baily; thou seest him, draw;
    thou draw'st, swear horrible; pass oft
    terrible oath, swaggering accent sharply twang'd
    off, manhood approbation proof would
    earn'd him. Away.
  AGUECHEEK. Nay, swearing.                Exit
  SIR TOBY. deliver letter; behaviour of
    young gentleman good capacity and
    breeding; employment lord niece confirms
    less. letter, excellently ignorant,  
    breed terror youth: find a
    clodpole. But, sir, deliver challenge word of
    mouth, set Aguecheek notable report valour, drive the
    gentleman- youth aptly receive it- most
    hideous opinion rage, skill, fury, impetuosity. This
    fright kill the
    look, cockatrices.

                Re-enter OLIVIA. VIOLA

  FABIAN. niece; give till take
    leave, presently him.
  SIR TOBY. meditate horrid message a
    challenge.
                              Exeunt SIR TOBY, FABIAN, MARIA
  OLIVIA. heart stone,
    laid mine honour unchary out;
    reproves fault;
    headstrong potent fault is
    mocks reproof.  
  VIOLA. haviour passion bears
    master's griefs.
  OLIVIA. Here, wear jewel me; 'tis picture.
    Refuse not; hath tongue vex you.
    beseech to-morrow.
    deny,
    honour sav'd give?
  VIOLA. this- true love master.
  OLIVIA. mine honour give that
    you?
  VIOLA. acquit you.
  OLIVIA. Well, to-morrow. Fare thee well;
    fiend thee bear soul hell.           Exit

              Re-enter SIR TOBY SIR FABIAN

  SIR TOBY. Gentleman, God save thee.
  VIOLA. you, sir.
  SIR TOBY. defence thou hast, betake thee tot. nature
    wrongs thou hast him, not; thy  
    intercepter, full despite, bloody hunter, attends
    thee orchard end. Dismount thy tuck, yare thy
    preparation, thy assailant quick, skilful, deadly.
  VIOLA. mistake, sir; man hath quarrel me;
    remembrance free clear image offence
    man.
  SIR TOBY. find otherwise, assure you; therefore, you
    hold life price, betake guard; your
    opposite hath youth, strength, skill, wrath, can
    furnish man withal.
  VIOLA. pray you, sir, he?
  SIR TOBY. knight, dubb'd unhatch'd rapier carpet
    consideration; devil private brawl. Souls and
    bodies hath divorc'd three; incensement moment
    implacable satisfaction pangs of
    death sepulchre. Hob-nob word- give't take't.
  VIOLA. return house desire conduct
    lady. fighter. heard kind men
    put quarrels purposely taste valour;
    belike man quirk.  
  SIR TOBY. Sir, no; indignation derives very
    competent injury; therefore, give desire.
    Back house, undertake with
    safety answer him; on,
    strip sword stark naked; meddle must, that's
    certain, forswear wear iron you.
  VIOLA. uncivil strange. beseech this
    courteous office knight offence him
    is: negligence, purpose.
  SIR TOBY. so. Signior Fabian, stay gentleman
    till return.                                Exit SIR TOBY
  VIOLA. Pray you, sir, matter?
  FABIAN. knight incens'd you, mortal
    arbitrement; circumstance more.
  VIOLA. beseech you, manner man he?
  FABIAN. wonderful promise, read form,
    find proof valour. is
    indeed, sir, skilful, bloody, fatal opposite that
    possibly found part Illyria. you
    walk him? make peace can.  
  VIOLA. bound for't. would
    sir priest sir knight. care knows
    mettle.                                 Exeunt

                Re-enter SIR TOBY SIR ANDREW

  SIR TOBY. Why, man, devil; a
    firago. pass him, rapier, scabbard, all, he
    stuck mortal motion is
    inevitable; answer, pays surely feet
    hit ground step on. fencer the
    Sophy.
  AGUECHEEK. Pox on't, meddle him.
  SIR TOBY. Ay, pacified; Fabian scarce
    hold yonder.
  AGUECHEEK. Plague on't; thought valiant, so
    cunning fence, damn'd ere have
    challeng'd him. matter slip, give him
    horse, grey Capilet.
  SIR TOBY. make motion. Stand here, make good show on't;  
    end perdition souls. [Aside] Marry,
    ride horse ride you.

              Re-enter FABIAN VIOLA

    [To FABIAN] horse quarrel; have
    persuaded youth's devil.
  FABIAN. [To SIR TOBY] horribly conceited him; pants
   pale, bear heels.
  SIR TOBY. [To VIOLA] remedy, sir: fight you
    for's oath sake. Marry, hath bethought his
    quarrel, finds scarce worth talking of.
    draw supportance vow; protests he
    hurt you.
  VIOLA. [Aside] Pray God defend me! thing make me
    lack man.
  FABIAN. Give ground furious.
  SIR TOBY. Come, Sir Andrew, remedy; gentleman will,
    honour's sake, bout you; the
    duello avoid it; promis'd me, gentleman  
    soldier, hurt you. on; to't.
  AGUECHEEK. Pray God oath!                [They draw]

                      Enter ANTONIO

  VIOLA. assure 'tis will.
  ANTONIO. Put sword. young gentleman
    offence, fault me:
    offend him, defy you.
  SIR TOBY. You, sir! Why, you?
  ANTONIO. One, sir, love dares more
    heard brag will.
  SIR TOBY. Nay, undertaker, you.
                                                     [They draw]

                         Enter OFFICERS

  FABIAN. O good Sir Toby, hold! officers.
  SIR TOBY. [To ANTONIO] anon.
  VIOLA. Pray, sir, put sword up, please.  
  AGUECHEEK. Marry, I, sir; promis'd you, be
    good word. bear easily reins well.
  OFFICER. man; thy office.
  OFFICER. Antonio, arrest thee suit
    Count Orsino.
  ANTONIO. mistake me, sir.
  OFFICER. No, sir, jot; favour well,
    sea-cap head.
    away; well.
  ANTONIO. obey. [To VIOLA] seeking you;
    remedy; answer it.
    do, necessity
    Makes purse? grieves me
    you
    befalls myself. stand amaz'd;
    comfort.
  OFFICER. Come, sir, away.
  ANTONIO. entreat money.
  VIOLA. money, sir?
    fair kindness show'd here,  
    part prompted present trouble,
    lean low ability
    lend something. much;
    make division present you;
    Hold, half coffer.
  ANTONIO. deny now?
    Is't deserts you
    lack persuasion? tempt misery,
    make unsound man
    upbraid kindnesses
    you.
  VIOLA. none,
    voice feature.
    hate ingratitude man
    lying, vainness, babbling drunkenness,
    taint vice strong corruption
    Inhabits frail blood.
  ANTONIO. O heavens themselves!
  OFFICER. Come, sir, pray go.
  ANTONIO. speak little. youth  
    snatch'd half jaws death,
    Reliev'd sanctity love,
    image, methought promise
    venerable worth, devotion.
  OFFICER. us? time by; away.
  ANTONIO. But, O, vile idol proves god!
    Thou hast, Sebastian, good feature shame.
    nature blemish mind:
    call'd deform'd unkind.
    Virtue beauty; beauteous evil
    empty trunks, o'erflourish'd devil.
  OFFICER. man grows mad. him.
    Come, come, sir.
  ANTONIO. Lead on.                        Exit OFFICERS
  VIOLA. Methinks words passion fly
    believes himself; I.
    Prove true, imagination, O, prove true,
    I, dear brother, ta'en you!
  SIR TOBY. hither, knight; hither, Fabian; whisper
    o'er couplet sage saws.  
  VIOLA. nam'd Sebastian. brother know
    living glass; so
    favour brother; went
    fashion, colour, ornament,
    imitate. O, prove,
    Tempests kind, salt waves fresh love!        Exit
  SIR TOBY. dishonest paltry boy, coward a
    hare. dishonesty appears leaving friend in
    necessity denying him; cowardship, Fabian.
  FABIAN. coward, devout coward, religious it.
  AGUECHEEK. 'Slid, beat him.
  SIR TOBY. Do; cuff soundly, draw thy sword.
  AGUECHEEK. not-                                  Exit
  FABIAN. Come, event.
  SIR TOBY. dare lay money 'twill yet.
                                                          Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE I.
Before OLIVIA'S house

Enter SEBASTIAN CLOWN

  CLOWN. make you?
  SEBASTIAN. to, to, thou art foolish fellow; clear
    thee.
  CLOWN. held out, i' faith! No, you; not
    lady, bid speak her; your
    Master Cesario; nose neither.
    so.
  SEBASTIAN. prithee vent thy folly else.
    Thou know'st me.
  CLOWN. Vent folly! heard word great man, and
    applies fool. Vent folly! afraid great
    lubber, world, prove cockney. prithee now, ungird
    thy strangeness, vent lady. Shall
    vent thou art coming?
  SEBASTIAN. prithee, foolish Greek, depart me;
    money thee; tarry longer
    give worse payment.  
  CLOWN. troth, thou hast open hand. wise men that
    give fools money good report fourteen
    years' purchase.

             Enter SIR ANDREW, SIR TOBY, FABIAN

  AGUECHEEK. Now, sir, met again?
    [Striking SEBASTIAN] you.
  SEBASTIAN. Why, thee, there, there.
    people mad?
  SIR TOBY. Hold, sir, throw dagger o'er house.
                                             [Holding SEBASTIAN]
  CLOWN. lady straight. of
    coats two-pence.                               Exit
  SIR TOBY. on, sir; hold.
  AGUECHEEK. Nay, alone. work with
    him; action battery him, any
    law Illyria; struck first, matter for
    that.
  SEBASTIAN. thy hand.  
  SIR TOBY. Come, sir, go. Come, young soldier,
    put iron; flesh'd. on.
  SEBASTIAN. free thee. wouldst thou now?
    thou dar'st tempt further, draw thy sword.     [Draws]
  SIR TOBY. What, what? Nay, ounce this
    malapert blood you. [Draws]

                        Enter OLIVIA

  OLIVIA. Hold, Toby; thy life, charge thee hold.
  SIR TOBY. Madam!
  OLIVIA. thus? Ungracious wretch,
    Fit mountains barbarous caves,
    manners ne'er preach'd! sight!
    offended, dear Cesario-
    Rudesby, gone!
                         Exeunt SIR TOBY, SIR ANDREW, FABIAN
    prithee, gentle friend,
    thy fair wisdom, thy passion, sway
    uncivil unjust extent  
    thy peace. house,
    hear thou fruitless pranks
    ruffian hath botch'd up, thou thereby
    Mayst smile this. Thou shalt choose go;
    deny. Beshrew soul me!
    started poor heart mine thee.
  SEBASTIAN. relish this? runs stream?
    mad, dream.
    fancy sense Lethe steep;
    dream, sleep!
  OLIVIA. Nay, come, prithee. thou'dst rul'd me!
  SEBASTIAN. Madam, will.
  OLIVIA. O, so, be!                           Exeunt




SCENE II.
OLIVIA'S house

Enter MARIA CLOWN

  MARIA. Nay, prithee, put gown beard; make him
    thou art Sir Topas curate; quickly. call
    Sir Toby whilst.                                    Exit
  CLOWN. Well, put on, dissemble in't; and
    dissembled gown. I
    tall function lean to
    thought good student; honest man a
    good housekeeper fairly careful man a
    great scholar. competitors enter.

                 Enter SIR TOBY MARIA

  SIR TOBY. Jove bless thee, Master Parson.
  CLOWN. Bonos dies, Sir Toby; hermit Prague, that
    pen ink, wittily niece King
    Gorboduc 'That is'; I, Master Parson, Master
    Parson; 'that' that, 'is' is?  
  SIR TOBY. him, Sir Topas.
  CLOWN. ho, say! Peace prison!
  SIR TOBY. knave counterfeits well; good knave.
  MALVOLIO. [Within] calls there?
  CLOWN. Sir Topas curate, visit Malvolio the
    lunatic.
  MALVOLIO. Sir Topas, Sir Topas, good Sir Topas, lady.
  CLOWN. Out, hyperbolical fiend! vexest thou man!
    Talkest thou ladies?
  SIR TOBY. said, Master Parson.
  MALVOLIO. Sir Topas, man wronged. Good Sir Topas, do
    mad; laid hideous darkness.
  CLOWN. Fie, thou dishonest Satan! call thee modest
    terms, gentle devil
    courtesy. Say'st thou house dark?
  MALVOLIO. hell, Sir Topas.
  CLOWN. Why, hath bay windows transparent barricadoes, the
    clerestories south north lustrous ebony; and
    complainest thou obstruction?
  MALVOLIO. mad, Sir Topas. house dark.  
  CLOWN. Madman, thou errest. darkness but
    ignorance; thou art puzzled Egyptians in
    fog.
  MALVOLIO. house dark ignorance, though
    ignorance dark hell; man
    abus'd. mad are; make trial it
    constant question.
  CLOWN. opinion Pythagoras wild fowl?
  MALVOLIO. soul grandam haply inhabit bird.
  CLOWN. think'st thou opinion?
  MALVOLIO. nobly soul, approve his
    opinion.
  CLOWN. Fare thee well. Remain thou darkness: thou shalt
   hold th' opinion Pythagoras ere thy wits; and
    fear kill woodcock, thou dispossess soul thy
    grandam. Fare thee well.
  MALVOLIO. Sir Topas, Sir Topas!
  SIR TOBY. exquisite Sir Topas!
  CLOWN. Nay, waters.
  MARIA. Thou mightst thy beard gown:  
    sees thee not.
  SIR TOBY. thine voice, bring word thou
    find'st him. rid knavery. may
    conveniently deliver'd, were; far
    offence niece pursue safety
    sport upshot. chamber.
                                                 Exit MARIA
  CLOWN. [Sings] Hey, Robin, jolly Robin,
    thy lady does.
  MALVOLIO. Fool!
  CLOWN. [Sings] lady unkind, perdy.
  MALVOLIO. Fool!
  CLOWN. [Sings] Alas, so?
  MALVOLIO. Fool say!
  CLOWN. [Sings] loves another- calls, ha?
  MALVOLIO. Good fool, thou wilt deserve hand,
    candle, pen, ink, paper; a
    gentleman, live thankful thee for't.
  CLOWN. Master Malvolio?
  MALVOLIO. Ay, good fool.  
  CLOWN. Alas, sir, fell wits?
  MALVOLIO. Fool, man notoriously abus'd;
    wits, fool, thou art.
  CLOWN. well? mad indeed, in
    wits fool.
  MALVOLIO. propertied me; darkness, send
    ministers me, asses, face my
    wits.
  CLOWN. Advise what. say: minister here.
    [Speaking SIR TOPAS] Malvolio, thy wits heavens restore!
    Endeavour thyself sleep, leave thy vain bibble-babble.
  MALVOLIO. Sir Topas!
  CLOWN. Maintain words him, good fellow.- Who, I, sir? Not
    I, sir. God buy you, good Sir Topas.- Marry, amen.- sir, I
    will.
  MALVOLIO. Fool, fool, fool, say!
  CLOWN. Alas, sir, patient. you, sir? shent for
    speaking you.
  MALVOLIO. Good fool, light paper.
    thee wits man Illyria.  
  CLOWN. Well-a-day were, sir!
  MALVOLIO. hand, am. Good fool, ink, paper, and
    light; convey set lady. shall
    advantage thee bearing letter did.
  CLOWN. to't. true, mad
    indeed, counterfeit?
  MALVOLIO. me, not; thee true.
  CLOWN. Nay, ne'er madman till brains.
    fetch light paper ink.
  MALVOLIO. Fool, requite highest degree; prithe be
    gone.
  CLOWN. [Singing]
                   gone, sir,
                   anon, sir,
                 again,
                   trice,
                   Vice,
                 sustain;

                 dagger lath,  
                 rage wrath,
                   Cries, Ah, ha! devil,
                 mad lad,
                 Pare thy nails, dad.
                   Adieu, goodman devil.                    Exit




SCENE III.
OLIVIA'S garden

Enter SEBASTIAN

  SEBASTIAN. air; glorious sun;
    pearl gave me, feel't see't;
    'tis enwraps thus,
    'tis madness. Antonio, then?
    find Elephant;
    was; found credit,
    range town seek out.
    counsel golden service;
    soul disputes sense
    error, madness,
    doth accident flood fortune
    exceed instance, discourse,
    ready distrust mine eyes
    wrangle reason, persuades me
    trust mad,
    lady's mad; 'twere so,
    sway house, command followers,  
    give back affairs dispatch
    smooth, discreet, stable bearing,
    perceive does. in't
    deceivable. lady comes.

                Enter OLIVIA PRIEST

  OLIVIA. Blame haste mine. well,
    holy man
    chantry by; there, him
    underneath consecrated roof,
    Plight fun assurance faith,
    jealous doubtful soul
    live peace. conceal it
    Whiles note,
    time celebration keep
    birth. say?
  SEBASTIAN. follow good man, you;
    And, sworn truth, true.
  OLIVIA. lead way, good father; heavens shine  
    fairly note act mine!           Exeunt
