ACT V. SCENE I.
Before OLIVIA's house

Enter CLOWN FABIAN

  FABIAN. Now, thou lov'st me, letter.
  CLOWN. Good Master Fabian, grant request.
  FABIAN. Anything.
  CLOWN. desire letter.
  FABIAN. give dog, recompense desire dog
    again.

             Enter DUKE, VIOLA, CURIO, LORDS

  DUKE. Belong Lady Olivia, friends?
  CLOWN. Ay, sir, trappings.
  DUKE. thee well. dost thou, good fellow?
  CLOWN. Truly, sir, foes worse my
    friends.
  DUKE. contrary: thy friends.
  CLOWN. No, sir, worse.
  DUKE. be?  
  CLOWN. Marry, sir, praise make ass me. my
    foes plainly ass; foes, sir, I
    profit knowledge myself, friends abused;
    that, conclusions kisses, negatives make
    affirmatives, then, worse friends, and
    foes.
  DUKE. Why, excellent.
  CLOWN. troth, sir, no; my
    friends.
  DUKE. Thou shalt worse me. gold.
  CLOWN. double-dealing, sir, could
    make another.
  DUKE. O, give ill counsel.
  CLOWN. Put grace pocket, sir, once, let
    flesh blood obey it.
  DUKE. Well, sinner double-dealer.
    another.
  CLOWN. Primo, secundo, tertio, good play; saying
    'The pays all.' triplex, sir, good tripping
    measure; bells Saint Bennet, sir, put mind-  
    one, two, three.
  DUKE. fool money throw; you
    lady speak her, bring
    you, awake bounty further.
  CLOWN. Marry, sir, lullaby bounty till again. go,
    sir; desire having
    sin covetousness. But, say, sir, bounty
    nap; awake anon.                       Exit

                 Enter ANTONIO OFFICERS

  VIOLA. man, sir, rescue me.
  DUKE. face remember well;
    besmear'd
    black Vulcan smoke war.
    baubling vessel captain of,
    shallow draught bulk unprizable,
    scathful grapple make
    noble bottom fleet
    envy tongue los  
    Cried fame honour him. matter?
  OFFICER. Orsino, Antonio
    Phoenix fraught Candy;
    Tiger board
    young nephew Titus lost leg.
    streets, desperate shame state,
    private brabble apprehend him.
  VIOLA. kindness, sir; drew side;
    conclusion put strange speech me.
    'twas distraction.
  DUKE. Notable pirate, thou salt-water thief!
    foolish boldness brought thee mercies
    thou, terms bloody dear,
    Hast made thine enemies?
  ANTONIO. Orsino, noble sir,
    pleas'd shake names give me:
    Antonio thief pirate,
    confess, base ground enough,
    Orsino's enemy. witchcraft drew hither:
    ingrateful boy side  
    rude sea's enrag'd foamy mouth
    redeem; wreck past hope was.
    life gave him, thereto ad
    love retention restraint,
    dedication; sake,
    expose myself, pure love,
    danger adverse town;
    Drew defend beset;
    apprehended, false cunning,
    meaning partake danger,
    Taught face acquaintance,
    grew twenty years removed thing
    wink; denied mine purse,
    recommended use
    half hour before.
  VIOLA. be?
  DUKE. town?
  ANTONIO. To-day, lord; months before,
    int'rim, minute's vacancy,
    day night company.  

              Enter OLIVIA ATTENDANTS

  DUKE. Countess; heaven walks earth.
    thee, fellow- fellow, thy words madness.
    months youth hath tended me-
    anon. aside.
  OLIVIA. lord, have,
    Olivia serviceable?
    Cesario, promise me.
  VIOLA. Madam?
  DUKE. Gracious Olivia-
  OLIVIA. say, Cesario? Good lord-
  VIOLA. lord speak; duty hushes me.
  OLIVIA. aught tune, lord,
    fat fulsome mine ear
    howling music.
  DUKE. cruel?
  OLIVIA. constant, lord.
  DUKE. What, perverseness? uncivil lady,  
    ingrate unauspicious altars
    soul faithfull'st off'rings hath breath'd out
    e'er devotion tender'd! do?
  OLIVIA. lord, him.
  DUKE. not, heart it,
    Egyptian thief point death,
    Kill love?- savage jealousy
    savours nobly. hear this:
    non-regardance cast faith,
    partly instrument
    screws true place favour,
    Live marble-breasted tyrant still;
    minion, love,
    whom, heaven swear, tender dearly,
    tear cruel eye
    sits crowned master's spite.
    Come, boy, me; thoughts ripe mischief:
    sacrifice lamb love
    spite raven's heart dove.
  VIOLA. I, jocund, apt, willingly,  
    rest, thousand deaths die.
  OLIVIA. Cesario?
  VIOLA. love
    love eyes, life,
    More, mores, e'er love wife.
    feign, witnesses above
    Punish life tainting love!
  OLIVIA. Ay me, detested! beguil'd!
  VIOLA. beguile you? wrong?
  OLIVIA. Hast thou forgot thyself? long?
    Call holy father.                Exit ATTENDANT
  DUKE. Come, away!
  OLIVIA. Whither, lord? Cesario, husband, stay.
  DUKE. Husband?
  OLIVIA. Ay, husband; deny?
  DUKE. husband, sirrah?
  VIOLA. No, lord, I.
  OLIVIA. Alas, baseness thy fear
    makes thee strangle thy propriety.
    Fear not, Cesario, thy fortunes up;  
    thou know'st thou art, thou art
    great thou fear'st.

                   Enter PRIEST

    O, welcome, father!
    Father, charge thee, thy reverence,
    unfold- intended
    darkness occasion now
    Reveals 'tis ripe- thou dost know
    Hath newly pass'd youth me.
  PRIEST. contract eternal bond love,
    Confirm'd mutual joinder hands,
    Attested holy close lips,
    Strength'ned interchangement rings;
    ceremony compact
    Seal'd function, testimony;
    when, watch hath told me, grave,
    travell'd hours.
  DUKE. O thou dissembling cub! wilt thou be,  
    time hath sow'd grizzle thy case?
    thy craft quickly grow
    thine trip thine overthrow?
    Farewell, her; direct thy feet
    thou henceforth meet.
  VIOLA. lord, protest-
  OLIVIA. O, swear!
    Hold faith, thou fear.

                  Enter SIR ANDREW

  AGUECHEEK. love God, surgeon!
    Send presently Sir Toby.
  OLIVIA. matter?
  AGUECHEEK. broke head across, Sir Toby a
    bloody coxcomb too. love God, help! rather
    forty pound home.
  OLIVIA. this, Sir Andrew?
  AGUECHEEK. Count's gentleman, Cesario. a
    coward, devil incardinate.  
  DUKE. gentleman, Cesario?
  AGUECHEEK. Od's lifelings, is! broke head for
    nothing; did, set do't Sir Toby.
  VIOLA. speak me? hurt you.
    drew sword cause;
    bespake fair hurt not.

                Enter SIR TOBY CLOWN

  AGUECHEEK. bloody coxcomb hurt, hurt me; think
    set bloody coxcomb. Sir Toby halting;
    hear more; drink, would
    tickl'd othergates did.
  DUKE. now, gentleman? is't you?
  SIR TOBY. one; hurt me, th' end on't.
    Sot, didst Dick Surgeon, sot?
  CLOWN. O, drunk, Sir Toby, hour agone; eyes set at
    i' th' morning.
  SIR TOBY. rogue passy measures pavin. hate a
    drunken rogue.  
  OLIVIA. him. hath made havoc them?
  AGUECHEEK. you, Sir Toby, dress'd
    together.
  SIR TOBY. help- ass-head coxcomb knave, a
    thin fac'd knave, gull?
  OLIVIA. bed, hurt look'd to.
                  Exeunt CLOWN, FABIAN, SIR TOBY, SIR ANDREW

                      Enter SEBASTIAN

  SEBASTIAN. sorry, madam, hurt kinsman;
    But, brother blood,
    wit safety.
    throw strange regard me, that
    perceive hath offended you.
    Pardon me, sweet one, vows
    made late ago.
  DUKE. face, voice, habit, persons!
    natural perspective, not.
  SEBASTIAN. Antonio, O dear Antonio!  
    hours rack'd tortur'd me
    lost thee!
  ANTONIO. Sebastian you?
  SEBASTIAN. Fear'st thou that, Antonio?
  ANTONIO. made division yourself?
    apple cleft twin
    creatures. Sebastian?
  OLIVIA. wonderful!
  SEBASTIAN. stand there? brother;
    deity nature
    everywhere. sister
    blind waves surges devour'd.
    charity, kin me?
    countryman, name, parentage?
  VIOLA. Messaline; Sebastian father.
    Sebastian brother too;
    suited watery tomb;
    spirits assume form suit,
    fright us.
  SEBASTIAN. spirit indeed,  
    dimension grossly clad
    womb participate.
    woman, rest even,
    tears fall cheek,
    'Thrice welcome, drowned Viola!'
  VIOLA. father mole brow.
  SEBASTIAN. mine.
  VIOLA. died day Viola birth
    numb'red thirteen years.
  SEBASTIAN. O, record lively soul!
    finished mortal act
    day made sister thirteen years.
  VIOLA. lets make happy both
    masculine usurp'd attire,
    embrace till circumstance
    place, time, fortune, cohere jump
    Viola; confirm,
    bring captain town,
    lie maiden weeds; gentle help
    preserv'd serve noble Count.  
    occurrence fortune since
    Hath lady lord.
  SEBASTIAN. [To OLIVIA] it, lady, mistook;
    nature bias drew that.
    contracted maid;
    therein, life, deceiv'd;
    betroth'd maid man.
  DUKE. amaz'd; noble blood.
    so, glass true,
    share happy wreck.
    [To VIOLA] Boy, thou hast thousand times
    Thou shouldst love woman me.
  VIOLA. sayings overswear;
    swearings true soul
    doth orbed continent fire
    severs day night.
  DUKE. Give thy hand;
    thee thy woman's weeds.
  VIOLA. captain bring shore
    Hath maid's garments. He, action,  
    durance, Malvolio's suit,
    gentleman follower lady's.
  OLIVIA. enlarge him. Fetch Malvolio hither;
    yet, alas, remember me,
    say, poor gentleman, distract.

        Re-enter CLOWN, letter, FABIAN

    extracting frenzy mine own
    remembrance banish'd his.
    he, sirrah?
  CLOWN. Truly, madam, holds Belzebub stave's end well
    man case do. writ letter you; I
    't to-day morning, madman's
    epistles gospels, skills are
    deliver'd.
  OLIVIA. Open't, read it.
  CLOWN. edified fool delivers the
    madman. [Reads madly ] 'By Lord, madam-'
  OLIVIA. now! Art thou mad?  
  CLOWN. No, madam, read madness. ladyship have
    be, vox.
  OLIVIA. Prithee read i' thy wits.
  CLOWN. do, madonna; read wits read
    thus; perpend, Princess, give ear.
  OLIVIA. [To FABIAN] Read you, sirrah.
  FABIAN. [Reads] 'By Lord, madam, wrong me, world
    it. put darkness given
    drunken cousin rule me, benefit my
    senses ladyship. letter that
    induced semblance put on, doubt not
    shame. you
    please. leave duty unthought of, speak of
    injury.
                                        MADLY-US'D MALVOLIO'

  OLIVIA. write this?
  CLOWN. Ay, Madam.
  DUKE. savours distraction.
  OLIVIA. deliver'd, Fabian; bring hither.  
                                                     Exit FABIAN
    lord, you, things thought on,
    sister wife,
    day crown th' alliance on't, you,
    house, proper cost.
  DUKE. Madam, apt t' embrace offer.
    [To VIOLA] master quits you; and, service done
      him,
    mettle sex,
    beneath soft tender breeding,
    call'd master long,
    hand; time be
    master's mistress.
  OLIVIA. sister! she.

                Re-enter FABIAN, MALVOLIO

  DUKE. madman?
  OLIVIA. Ay, lord, same.
    now, Malvolio!  
  MALVOLIO. Madam, wrong,
    Notorious wrong.
  OLIVIA. I, Malvolio? No.
  MALVOLIO. Lady, have. Pray peruse letter.
    deny hand;
    Write can, hand phrase;
    'tis seal, invention;
    this. Well, grant then,
    me, modesty honour,
    clear lights favour,
    Bade smiling cross-garter'd you,
    put yellow stockings, frown
    Sir Toby lighter people;
    And, acting obedient hope,
    suffer'd imprison'd,
    dark house, visited priest,
    made notorious geck gul
    e'er invention play'd on? why.
  OLIVIA. Alas, Malvolio, writing,
    Though, confess, character;  
    question 'tis Maria's hand.
    bethink me, she
    told thou wast mad; cam'st smiling,
    forms presuppos'd
    thee letter. Prithee, content;
    practice hath shrewdly pass'd thee,
    But, grounds authors it,
    Thou shalt plaintiff judge
    thine cause.
  FABIAN. Good madam, hear speak,
    quarrel brawl come
    Taint condition present hour,
    wond'red at. hope not,
    freely confess Toby
    Set device Malvolio here,
    stubborn uncourteous parts
    conceiv'd him. Maria writ
    letter, Sir Toby's great importance,
    recompense whereof hath married her.
    sportful malice follow'd  
    pluck laughter revenge,
    injuries justly weigh'd
    sides pass'd.
  OLIVIA. Alas, poor fool, baffl'd thee!
  CLOWN. Why, 'Some born great, achieve greatness, some
    greatness thrown them.' one, sir, this
    interlude- Sir Topas, sir; one. 'By Lord,
    fool, mad!' remember- 'Madam, laugh you
    barren rascal? smile not, gagg'd'? thus
    whirligig time brings revenges.
  MALVOLIO. reveng'd pack you.
 Exit
  OLIVIA. hath notoriously abus'd.
  DUKE. Pursue him, entreat peace;
    hath told captain yet.
    known, golden time convents,
    solemn combination made
    dear souls. Meantime, sweet sister,
    part hence. Cesario, come;
    man;  
    habits seen,
    Orsino's mistress, fancy's queen.
                                        Exeunt CLOWN

                        CLOWN sings

           tiny boy,
             hey, ho, wind rain,
           foolish thing toy,
             rain raineth day.

           man's estate,
             hey, ho, wind rain,
           'Gainst knaves thieves men shut gate,
             rain raineth day.

           came, alas! wive,
             hey, ho, wind rain,
           swaggering thrive,
             rain raineth day.  

           beds,
             hey, ho, wind rain,
           toss-pots drunken heads,
             rain raineth day.

           great ago world begun,
             hey, ho, wind rain,
           one, play done,
           strive day.
 Exit

THE END

1595

THE GENTLEMEN VERONA

by William Shakespeare



DRAMATIS PERSONAE

  DUKE MILAN, father Silvia
  VALENTINE, gentlemen
  PROTEUS,    "  "   "   "     "
  ANTONIO, father Proteus
  THURIO, foolish rival Valentine
  EGLAMOUR, agent Silvia escape
  SPEED, clownish servant Valentine
  LAUNCE, Proteus
  PANTHINO, servant Antonio
  HOST, Julia lodges Milan
  OUTLAWS, Valentine

  JULIA, lady Verona, beloved Proteus
  SILVIA, Duke's daughter, beloved Valentine
  LUCETTA, waiting-woman Julia

  SERVANTS
  MUSICIANS




<<THIS ELECTRONIC VERSION COMPLETE WORKS WILLIAM
SHAKESPEARE COPYRIGHT 1990-1993 WORLD LIBRARY, INC., IS
PROVIDED PROJECT GUTENBERG ETEXT ILLINOIS BENEDICTINE COLLEGE
WITH PERMISSION.  ELECTRONIC MACHINE READABLE COPIES BE

SERVICE CHARGES DOWNLOAD TIME MEMBERSHIP.>>



SCENE:  
Verona; Milan; frontiers Mantua


ACT I. SCENE I.
Verona. open place

Enter VALENTINE PROTEUS

  VALENTINE. Cease persuade, loving Proteus:
    Home-keeping youth homely wits.
    Were't affection chains thy tender days
    sweet glances thy honour'd love,
    entreat thy company
    wonders world abroad,
    Than, living dully sluggardiz'd home,
    Wear thy youth shapeless idleness.
    thou lov'st, love still, thrive therein,
    would, love begin.
  PROTEUS. Wilt thou gone? Sweet Valentine, adieu!
    thy Proteus, thou haply seest
    rare noteworthy object thy travel.
    partaker thy happiness
    thou dost meet good hap; thy danger,
    danger environ thee,
    Commend thy grievance holy prayers,  
    thy headsman, Valentine.
  VALENTINE. love-book pray success?
  PROTEUS. book love pray thee.
  VALENTINE. shallow story deep love:
    young Leander cross'd Hellespont.
  PROTEUS. deep story deeper love;
    shoes love.
  VALENTINE. 'Tis true; boots love,
    swum Hellespont.
  PROTEUS. boots! Nay, give boots.
  VALENTINE. No, not, boots thee not.
  PROTEUS. What?
  VALENTINE. love- scorn bought groans,
    Coy heart-sore sighs, fading moment's mirth
    twenty watchful, weary, tedious nights;
    haply won, hapless gain;
    lost, grievous labour won;
    However, folly bought wit,
    wit folly vanquished.
  PROTEUS. So, circumstance, call fool.  
  VALENTINE. So, circumstance, fear prove.
  PROTEUS. 'Tis love cavil at; Love.
  VALENTINE. Love master, masters you;
    yoked fool,
    Methinks, chronicled wise.
  PROTEUS. writers say, sweetest bud
    eating canker dwells, eating love
    Inhabits finest wits all.
  VALENTINE. writers say, forward bud
    eaten canker ere blow,
    love young tender wit
    turn'd folly, blasting bud,
    Losing verdure prime,
    fair effects future hopes.
    wherefore waste time counsel the
    art votary fond desire?
    adieu. father road
    Expects coming, shipp'd.
  PROTEUS. thither bring thee, Valentine.
  VALENTINE. Sweet Proteus, no; leave.  
    Milan hear thee letters
    thy success love, news else
    Betideth absence thy friend;
    likewise visit thee mine.
  PROTEUS. happiness bechance thee Milan!
  VALENTINE. home; farewell!
                                                  Exit VALENTINE
  PROTEUS. honour hunts, love;
    leaves friends dignify more:
    leave myself, friends, love.
    Thou, Julia, thou hast metamorphis'd me,
    Made neglect studies, lose time,
    War good counsel, set world nought;
    Made wit musing weak, heart sick thought.

                         Enter SPEED

  SPEED. Sir Proteus, save you! master?
  PROTEUS. parted embark Milan.
  SPEED. Twenty shipp'd already,  
    play'd sheep losing him.
  PROTEUS. sheep doth stray,
    shepherd awhile away.
  SPEED. conclude master shepherd then, and
    sheep?
  PROTEUS. do.
  SPEED. then, horns horns, wake sleep.
  PROTEUS. silly answer, fitting sheep.
  SPEED. proves sheep.
  PROTEUS. True; thy master shepherd.
  SPEED. Nay, deny circumstance.
  PROTEUS. hard prove another.
  SPEED. shepherd seeks sheep, sheep the
    shepherd; seek master, master seeks me;
    therefore, sheep.
  PROTEUS. sheep fodder follow shepherd; shepherd for
    food sheep: thou wages followest thy master;
    thy master wages thee. Therefore, thou art a
    sheep.
  SPEED. proof make cry 'baa.'  
  PROTEUS. dost thou hear? Gav'st thou letter Julia?
  SPEED. Ay, sir; I, lost mutton, gave letter her, lac'd
    mutton; she, lac'd mutton, gave me, lost mutton, nothing
    labour.
  PROTEUS. small pasture store muttons.
  SPEED. ground overcharg'd, stick her.
  PROTEUS. Nay, astray: 'twere pound you.
  SPEED. Nay, sir, pound serve carrying your
    letter.
  PROTEUS. mistake; pound- pinfold.
  SPEED. pound pin? Fold over,
    'Tis threefold carrying letter lover.
  PROTEUS. she?
  SPEED.  [Nodding]  Ay.
  PROTEUS. Nod- ay. Why, 'noddy.'
  SPEED. mistook, sir; nod; she
    nod; 'Ay.'
  PROTEUS. set 'noddy.'
  SPEED. pains set together, for
    pains.  
  PROTEUS. No, no; bearing letter.
  SPEED. Well, perceive fain bear you.
  PROTEUS. Why, sir, bear me?
  SPEED. Marry, sir, letter, orderly; the
    word 'noddy' pains.
  PROTEUS. Beshrew me, quick wit.
  SPEED. overtake slow purse.
  PROTEUS. Come, come, open matter; brief, she?
  SPEED. Open purse, money matter both
    delivered.
  PROTEUS. Well, sir, pains. she?
  SPEED. Truly, sir, win her.
  PROTEUS. Why, couldst thou perceive her?
  SPEED. Sir, perceive her; no, so
    ducat delivering letter; hard to
    brought mind, fear prove hard in
    telling mind. Give token stones, as
    hard steel.
  PROTEUS. she? Nothing?
  SPEED. No, 'Take thy pains.' testify  
    bounty, you, testern'd me; requital
    whereof, henceforth carry letters yourself; so, sir,
    commend master.
  PROTEUS. Go, go, gone, save ship wreck,
    perish, thee aboard,
    destin'd drier death shore.         Exit SPEED
    send messenger.
    fear Julia deign lines,
    Receiving worthless post.              Exit




SCENE II.
Verona. garden JULIA'S house

Enter JULIA LUCETTA

  JULIA. say, Lucetta, alone,
    Wouldst thou counsel fall love?
  LUCETTA. Ay, madam; stumble unheedfully.
  JULIA. fair resort gentlemen
    day parle encounter me,
    thy opinion worthiest love?
  LUCETTA. you, repeat names; show mind
    shallow simple skill.
  JULIA. think'st thou fair Sir Eglamour?
  LUCETTA. knight well-spoken, neat, fine;
    But, you, mine.
  JULIA. think'st thou rich Mercatio?
  LUCETTA. wealth; himself, so.
  JULIA. think'st thou gentle Proteus?
  LUCETTA. Lord, Lord! folly reigns us!
  JULIA. now! means passion name?
  LUCETTA. Pardon, dear madam; 'tis passing shame  
    I, unworthy body am,
    censure lovely gentlemen.
  JULIA. Proteus, rest?
  LUCETTA. thus: good best.
  JULIA. reason?
  LUCETTA. woman's reason:
    so, so.
  JULIA. wouldst thou cast love him?
  LUCETTA. Ay, thought love cast away.
  JULIA. Why, he, rest, hath mov'd me.
  LUCETTA. he, rest, think, loves ye.
  JULIA. speaking shows love small.
  LUCETTA. Fire closest burns all.
  JULIA. love show love.
  LUCETTA. O, love men love.
  JULIA. knew mind.
  LUCETTA. Peruse paper, madam.
  JULIA. 'To Julia'- Say, whom?
  LUCETTA. contents show.
  JULIA. Say, say, gave thee?  
  LUCETTA. Sir Valentine's page; sent, think, Proteus.
    you; I, way,
    receive it; pardon fault, pray.
  JULIA. Now, modesty, goodly broker!
    Dare presume harbour wanton lines?
    whisper conspire youth?
    Now, trust me, 'tis office great worth,
    officer fit place.
    There, paper; return'd;
    return sight.
  LUCETTA. plead love deserves fee hate.
  JULIA. ye gone?
  LUCETTA. ruminate.                           Exit
  JULIA. yet, o'erlook'd letter.
    shame call back again,
    pray fault chid her.
    fool she, maid
    force letter view!
    maids, modesty, 'No' that
    profferer construe 'Ay.'  
    Fie, fie, wayward foolish love,
    testy babe scratch nurse,
    presently, humbled, kiss rod!
    churlishly chid Lucetta hence,
    willingly here!
    angerly taught brow frown,
    joy enforc'd heart smile!
    penance call Lucetta back
    remission folly past.
    ho! Lucetta!

                     Re-enter LUCETTA

  LUCETTA. ladyship?
  JULIA. Is't dinner time?
  LUCETTA. were,
    kill stomach meat
    maid.
  JULIA. is't gingerly?
  LUCETTA. Nothing.  
  JULIA. didst thou stoop then?
  LUCETTA. paper fall.
  JULIA. paper nothing?
  LUCETTA. me.
  JULIA. lie concerns.
  LUCETTA. Madam, lie concerns,
    false interpreter.
  JULIA. love hath writ rhyme.
  LUCETTA. sing it, madam, tune.
    Give note; ladyship set.
  JULIA. toys possible.
    sing tune 'Light o' Love.'
  LUCETTA. heavy light tune.
  JULIA. Heavy! belike hath burden then.
  LUCETTA. Ay; melodious it, sing it.
  JULIA. you?
  LUCETTA. reach high.
  JULIA. song.     [LUCETTA withholds letter]
    now, minion!
  LUCETTA. tune still, sing out.  
    methinks tune.
  JULIA. not!
  LUCETTA. No, madam; 'tis sharp.
  JULIA. You, minion, saucy.
  LUCETTA. Nay, flat
    mar concord harsh descant;
    wanteth fill song.
  JULIA. drown'd unruly bass.
  LUCETTA. Indeed, bid base Proteus.
  JULIA. babble henceforth trouble me.
    coil protestation!         [Tears letter]
    Go, gone; papers lie.
    fing'ring them, anger me.
  LUCETTA. makes strange; pleas'd
    ang'red letter.                   Exit
  JULIA. Nay, ang'red same!
    O hateful hands, tear loving words!
    Injurious wasps, feed sweet honey
    kill bees yield stings!
    kiss paper amends.  
    Look, writ 'kind Julia.' Unkind Julia,
    revenge thy ingratitude,
    throw thy bruising stones,
    Trampling contemptuously thy disdain.
    writ 'love-wounded Proteus.'
    Poor wounded name! bosom,,as bed,
    lodge thee till thy wound throughly heal'd;
    search sovereign kiss.
    thrice 'Proteus' written down.
    calm, good wind, blow word away
    Till found letter letter-
    mine name; whirlwind bear
    ragged, fearful, hanging rock,
    throw raging sea.
    Lo, line writ:
    'Poor forlorn Proteus, passionate Proteus,
    sweet Julia.' tear away;
    not, sith prettily
    couples complaining names.
    fold another;  
    kiss, embrace, contend, will.

                        Re-enter LUCETTA

  LUCETTA. Madam,
    Dinner ready, father stays.
  JULIA. Well, go.
  LUCETTA. What, papers lie tell-tales here?
  JULIA. respect them, up.
  LUCETTA. Nay, laying down;
    lie catching cold.
  JULIA. month's mind them.
  LUCETTA. Ay, madam, sights see;
    things too, judge wink.
  JULIA. Come, come; will't go?                Exeunt




SCENE III.
Verona. ANTONIO'S house

Enter ANTONIO PANTHINO

  ANTONIO. me, Panthino, sad talk that
    Wherewith brother held cloister?
  PANTHINO. 'Twas nephew Proteus, son.
  ANTONIO. Why, him?
  PANTHINO. wond'red lordship
    suffer spend youth home,
    men, slender reputation,
    Put sons seek preferment out:
    wars, fortune there;
    discover islands away;
    studious universities.
    any, exercises,
    Proteus, son, meet;
    request importune you
    spend time home,
    great impeachment age,
    travel youth.  
  ANTONIO. need'st thou importune that
    Whereon month hammering.
    consider'd loss time,
    perfect man,
    tutor'd world:
    Experience industry achiev'd,
    perfected swift time.
    send him.
  PANTHINO. lordship ignorant
    companion, youthful Valentine,
    Attends Emperor royal court.
  ANTONIO. well.
  PANTHINO. 'Twere good, think, lordship thither:
    practise tilts tournaments,
    Hear sweet discourse, converse noblemen,
    eye exercise
    Worthy youth nobleness birth.
  ANTONIO. thy counsel; hast thou advis'd;
    thou mayst perceive it,
    execution make known:  
    speediest expedition
    dispatch Emperor's court.
  PANTHINO. To-morrow, you, Alphonso
    gentlemen good esteem
    journeying salute Emperor,
    commend service will.
  ANTONIO. Good company; Proteus go.

                        Enter PROTEUS

    And- good time!- break him.
  PROTEUS. Sweet love! sweet lines! sweet life!
    hand, agent heart;
    oath love, honour's pawn.
    O fathers applaud loves,
    seal happiness consents!
    O heavenly Julia!
  ANTONIO. now! letter reading there?
  PROTEUS. May't lordship, 'tis word two
    commendations Valentine,  
    Deliver'd friend him.
  ANTONIO. Lend letter; news.
  PROTEUS. news, lord; writes
    happily lives, well-belov'd
    daily graced Emperor;
    Wishing him, partner fortune.
  ANTONIO. stand affected wish?
  PROTEUS. relying lordship's will,
    depending friendly wish.
  ANTONIO. sorted wish.
    Muse suddenly proceed;
    will, will, end.
    resolv'd thou shalt spend time
    Valentinus Emperor's court;
    maintenance friends receives,
    exhibition thou shalt me.
    To-morrow readiness go-
    Excuse not, peremptory.
  PROTEUS. lord, provided;
    you, deliberate day two.  
  ANTONIO. thou want'st thee.
    stay; to-morrow thou go.
    on, Panthino; employ'd
    hasten expedition.
                                     Exeunt ANTONIO PANTHINO
  PROTEUS. shunn'd fire fear burning,
    drench'd sea, drown'd.
    fear'd show father Julia's letter,
    exceptions love;
    vantage mine excuse
    Hath excepted love.
    O, spring love resembleth
    uncertain glory April day,
    shows beauty sun,
    cloud takes away!

                       Re-enter PANTHINO

  PANTHINO. Sir Proteus, father calls you;
    haste; therefore, pray you, go.  
  PROTEUS. Why, is: heart accords thereto;
    thousand times answers 'No.'             Exeunt

ACT II. SCENE I.
Milan. DUKE'S palace

Enter VALENTINE SPEED

  SPEED. Sir, glove.
  VALENTINE. mine: gloves on.
  SPEED. Why, then, yours; one.
  VALENTINE. Ha! see; ay, give me, mine;
    Sweet ornament decks thing divine!
    Ah, Silvia! Silvia!
  SPEED.  [Calling]  Madam Silvia! Madam Silvia!
  VALENTINE. now, sirrah?
  SPEED. hearing, sir.
  VALENTINE. Why, sir, bade call her?
  SPEED. worship, sir; mistook.
  VALENTINE. Well, forward.
  SPEED. chidden slow.
  VALENTINE. to, sir; me, Madam Silvia?
  SPEED. worship loves?
  VALENTINE. Why, love?
  SPEED. Marry, special marks: first, learn'd,  
    Sir Proteus, wreath arms malcontent; relish a
    love-song, robin redbreast; walk alone, that
    pestilence; sigh, school-boy lost his
    B C; weep, young wench buried grandam;
    fast, takes diet; watch, fears
    robbing; speak puling, beggar Hallowmas. were
    wont, laughed, crow cock; walk'd, to
    walk lions; fasted, presently
    dinner; look'd sadly, money.
    metamorphis'd mistress, that, look
    you, master.
  VALENTINE. things perceiv'd me?
  SPEED. perceiv'd ye.
  VALENTINE. me? cannot.
  SPEED. you! Nay, certain; for, so
    simple, would; follies
    follies you, shine the
    water urinal, eye sees a
    physician comment malady.
  VALENTINE. me, dost thou lady Silvia?  
  SPEED. gaze so, sits supper?
  VALENTINE. Hast thou observ'd that? she, mean.
  SPEED. Why, sir, not.
  VALENTINE. Dost thou gazing her, know'st
    not?
  SPEED. hard-favour'd, sir?
  VALENTINE. fair, boy, well-favour'd.
  SPEED. Sir, enough.
  VALENTINE. dost thou know?
  SPEED. fair as, you, well-favour'd.
  VALENTINE. beauty exquisite, favour
    infinite.
  SPEED. painted, all
    count.
  VALENTINE. painted? count?
  SPEED. Marry, sir, painted, make fair, man counts
    beauty.
  VALENTINE. esteem'st thou me? account beauty.
  SPEED. deform'd.
  VALENTINE. long hath deform'd?  
  SPEED. lov'd her.
  VALENTINE. lov'd her, still
    beautiful.
  SPEED. love her, her.
  VALENTINE. Why?
  SPEED. Love blind. O mine eyes; own
    eyes lights wont chid Sir
    Proteus ungarter'd!
  VALENTINE. then?
  SPEED. present folly passing deformity; he,
    love, garter hose; you, being
    love, put hose.
  VALENTINE. Belike, boy, love; morning you
    wipe shoes.
  SPEED. True, sir; love bed. you, you
    swing'd love, makes bolder chide you
    yours.
  VALENTINE. conclusion, stand affected her.
  SPEED. set, affection cease.
  VALENTINE. night enjoin'd write lines  
    loves.
  SPEED. you?
  VALENTINE. have.
  SPEED. lamely writ?
  VALENTINE. No, boy, them.

                           Enter SILVIA

    Peace! comes.
  SPEED.  [Aside]  O excellent motion! O exceeding puppet!
    interpret her.
  VALENTINE. Madam mistress, thousand good morrows.
  SPEED.  [Aside]  O, give ye good ev'n!
    million manners.
  SILVIA. Sir Valentine servant, thousand.
  SPEED.  [Aside]  give interest, him.
  VALENTINE. enjoin'd me, writ letter
    secret nameless friend yours;
    unwilling proceed in,
    duty ladyship.  
  SILVIA. you, gentle servant. 'Tis clerkly done.
  VALENTINE. trust me, madam, off;
    For, ignorant goes,
    writ random, doubtfully.
  SILVIA. Perchance pains?
  VALENTINE. No, madam; stead you, write,
    command, thousand times much;
    yet-
  SILVIA. pretty period! Well, guess sequel;
    it- care not.
    again- you-
    Meaning henceforth trouble more.
  SPEED.  [Aside]  will; another' yet.'
  VALENTINE. means ladyship? it?
  SILVIA. Yes, yes; lines quaintly writ;
    But, unwillingly, again.
    Nay, them.                      [Gives hack letter]
  VALENTINE. Madam, you.
  SILVIA. Ay, ay, writ them, sir, request;
    them; you:  
    writ movingly.
  VALENTINE. you, write ladyship another.
  SILVIA. writ, sake read over;
    you, so; not, why, so.
  VALENTINE. me, madam, then?
  SILVIA. Why, you, labour.
    good morrow, servant.                     Exit SILVIA
  SPEED. O jest unseen, inscrutable, invisible,
    nose man's face, weathercock steeple!
    master sues her; hath taught suitor,
    pupil, tutor.
    O excellent device! heard better,
    master, scribe, write letter?
  VALENTINE. now, sir! reasoning yourself?
  SPEED. Nay, rhyming: 'tis reason.
  VALENTINE. what?
  SPEED. spokesman Madam Silvia?
  VALENTINE. whom?
  SPEED. yourself; why, woos figure.
  VALENTINE. figure?  
  SPEED. letter, say.
  VALENTINE. Why, hath writ me.
  SPEED. she, hath made write yourself?
    Why, perceive jest?
  VALENTINE. No, me.
  SPEED. believing indeed, sir. perceive her
    earnest?
  VALENTINE. gave angry word.
  SPEED. Why, hath letter.
  VALENTINE. letter writ friend.
  SPEED. letter hath deliver'd, end.
  VALENTINE. worse.
  SPEED. warrant 'tis well.
    'For writ her; she, modesty,
    idle time, reply;
    fearing messenger mind discover,
    hath taught love write lover.'
    speak print, print found it. muse you,
    sir? 'Tis dinner time.
  VALENTINE. din'd.  
  SPEED. Ay, hearken, sir; chameleon Love feed on
    air, nourish'd victuals, would
    fain meat. O, mistress! moved, moved.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE II.
Verona. JULIA'S house

Enter PROTEUS JULIA

  PROTEUS. patience, gentle Julia.
  JULIA. must, remedy.
  PROTEUS. possibly can, return.
  JULIA. turn not, return sooner.
    remembrance thy Julia's sake.
                                                 [Giving ring]
  PROTEUS. Why, then, make exchange. Here, this.
  JULIA. seal bargain holy kiss.
  PROTEUS. hand true constancy;
    hour o'erslips day
    sigh not, Julia, thy sake,
    ensuing hour foul mischance
    Torment love's forgetfulness!
    father stays coming; answer not;
    tide now- nay, thy tide tears:
    tide stay longer should.
    Julia, farewell!                                  Exit JULIA  
    What, word?
    Ay, true love do: speak;
    truth hath deeds words grace it.

                          Enter PANTHINO

  PANTHINO. Sir Proteus, stay'd for.
  PROTEUS. Go; come, come.
    Alas! parting strikes poor lovers dumb.          Exeunt




SCENE III.
Verona. street

Enter LAUNCE, leading dog

  LAUNCE. Nay, 'twill hour ere weeping; the
    kind Launces fault. receiv'd my
    proportion, Prodigious Son, Sir
    Proteus Imperial's court. Crab dog the
    sourest-natured dog lives: mother weeping, father
    wailing, sister crying, maid howling, cat wringing her
    hands, house great perplexity; this
    cruel-hearted cur shed tear. stone, pebble
    stone, pity dog. Jew have
    wept parting; why, grandam eyes,
    you, wept blind parting. Nay, show you
    manner it. shoe father; no, left shoe is
    father; no, no, left shoe mother; nay, so
    neither; yes, so, so, hath worser sole. This
    shoe hole mother, father. A
    vengeance 't! 'tis. Now, sir, staff sister,
    for, you, white lily small wand;  
    hat Nan maid; dog; no, dog himself,
    dog- O, dog me, myself; ay, so, so.
    father: 'Father, blessing.' not
    shoe speak word weeping; kiss father;
    well, weeps on. mother. O could
    speak wood woman! Well, kiss her- 'tis;
    mother's breath down. sister;
    mark moan makes. dog sheds a
    tear, speaks word; lay dust my
    tears.

                            Enter PANTHINO

  PANTHINO. Launce, away, away, aboard! Thy master shipp'd, and
    thou art post oars. matter? weep'st
    thou, man? Away, ass! lose tide tarry any
    longer.
  LAUNCE. matter tied lost; the
    unkindest tied man tied.
  PANTHINO. unkindest tide?  
  LAUNCE. Why, tied here, Crab, dog.
  PANTHINO. Tut, man, thou'lt lose flood, and, losing
    flood, lose thy voyage, and, losing thy voyage, lose thy
    master, and, losing thy master, lose thy service, and, in
    losing thy service- dost thou stop mouth?
  LAUNCE. fear thou shouldst lose thy tongue.
  PANTHINO. lose tongue?
  LAUNCE. thy tale.
  PANTHINO. thy tail!
  LAUNCE. Lose tide, voyage, master, the
    service, tied! Why, man, river dry, able
    fill tears; wind down, drive
    boat sighs.
  PANTHINO. Come, away, man; call thee.
  LAUNCE. Sir, call thou dar'st.
  PANTHINO. thou go?
  LAUNCE. Well, go.                                Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Milan. DUKE'S palace

Enter SILVIA, VALENTINE, THURIO, SPEED

  SILVIA. Servant!
  VALENTINE. Mistress?
  SPEED. Master, Sir Thurio frowns you.
  VALENTINE. Ay, boy, love.
  SPEED. you.
  VALENTINE. mistress, then.
  SPEED. 'Twere good knock'd him.                       Exit
  SILVIA. Servant, sad.
  VALENTINE. Indeed, madam, so.
  THURIO. not?
  VALENTINE. Haply do.
  THURIO. counterfeits.
  VALENTINE. you.
  THURIO. not?
  VALENTINE. Wise.
  THURIO. instance contrary?
  VALENTINE. folly.  
  THURIO. quote folly?
  VALENTINE. quote jerkin.
  THURIO. jerkin doublet.
  VALENTINE. Well, then, double folly.
  THURIO. How?
  SILVIA. What, angry, Sir Thurio! change colour?
  VALENTINE. Give leave, madam; kind chameleon.
  THURIO. hath mind feed blood live your
    air.
  VALENTINE. said, sir.
  THURIO. Ay, sir, too, time.
  VALENTINE. well, sir; end ere begin.
  SILVIA. fine volley words, gentlemen, quickly shot off.
  VALENTINE. 'Tis indeed, madam; giver.
  SILVIA. that, servant?
  VALENTINE. Yourself, sweet lady; gave fire. Sir Thurio
    borrows wit ladyship's looks, spends he
    borrows kindly company.
  THURIO. Sir, spend word word me, make your
    wit bankrupt.  
  VALENTINE. well, sir; exchequer words,
    and, think, treasure give followers; it
    appears bare liveries live bare words.

                             Enter DUKE

  SILVIA. more, gentlemen, more. father.
  DUKE. Now, daughter Silvia, hard beset.
    Sir Valentine, father good health.
    letter friends
    good news?
  VALENTINE. lord, thankful
    happy messenger thence.
  DUKE. ye Antonio, countryman?
  VALENTINE. Ay, good lord, gentleman
    worth worthy estimation,
    desert reputed.
  DUKE. Hath son?
  VALENTINE. Ay, good lord; son deserves
    honour regard father.  
  DUKE. well?
  VALENTINE. knew myself; infancy
    convers'd spent hours together;
    idle truant,
    Omitting sweet benefit time
    clothe mine age angel-like perfection,
    hath Sir Proteus, name,
    Made fair advantage days:
    years young, experience old;
    head unmellowed, judgment ripe;
    And, word, worth
    praises bestow,
    complete feature mind,
    good grace grace gentleman.
  DUKE. Beshrew me, sir, make good,
    worthy empress' love
    meet emperor's counsellor.
    Well, sir, gentleman me
    commendation great potentates,
    means spend time awhile.  
    'tis unwelcome news you.
  VALENTINE. wish'd thing, he.
  DUKE. him, then, worth-
    Silvia, speak you, you, Sir Thurio;
    Valentine, cite it.
    send presently.           Exit DUKE
  VALENTINE. gentleman told ladyship
    mistresss
    hold eyes lock'd crystal looks.
  SILVIA. Belike hath enfranchis'd them
    pawn fealty.
  VALENTINE. Nay, sure, holds prisoners still.
  SILVIA. Nay, then, blind; and, blind,
    seek you?
  VALENTINE. Why, lady, Love hath twenty pair eyes.
  THURIO. Love hath eye all.
  VALENTINE. lovers, Thurio, yourself;
    homely object Love wink.              Exit THURIO

                         Enter PROTEUS  

  SILVIA. done, done; gentleman.
  VALENTINE. Welcome, dear Proteus! Mistress, beseech you
    Confirm special favour.
  SILVIA. worth warrant hither,
    oft wish'd hear from.
  VALENTINE. Mistress, is; sweet lady, entertain him
    fellow-servant ladyship.
  SILVIA. low mistress high servant.
  PROTEUS. so, sweet lady; servant
    worthy mistress.
  VALENTINE. Leave discourse disability;
    Sweet lady, entertain servant.
  PROTEUS. duty boast of, else.
  SILVIA. duty meed.
    Servant, worthless mistress.
  PROTEUS. die yourself.
  SILVIA. welcome?
  PROTEUS. worthless.
  
                          Re-enter THURIO

  THURIO. Madam, lord father speak you.
  SILVIA. wait pleasure. Come, Sir Thurio,
    me. more, servant, welcome.
    leave confer home affairs;
    hear you.
  PROTEUS. attend ladyship.
                                        Exeunt SILVIA THURIO
  VALENTINE. Now, me, came?
  PROTEUS. friends well, commended.
  VALENTINE. yours?
  PROTEUS. left health.
  VALENTINE. lady, thrives love?
  PROTEUS. tales love wont weary you;
    joy love-discourse.
  VALENTINE. Ay, Proteus, life alter'd now;
    penance contemning Love,
    high imperious thoughts punish'd me
    bitter fasts, penitential groans,  
    nightly tears, daily heart-sore sighs;
    For, revenge contempt love,
    Love hath chas'd sleep enthralled eyes
    made watchers mine heart's sorrow.
    O gentle Proteus, Love's mighty lord,
    hath humbled confess
    woe correction,
    service joy earth.
    discourse, love;
    break fast, dine, sup, sleep,
    naked love.
  PROTEUS. Enough; read fortune eye.
    idol worship so?
  VALENTINE. she; heavenly saint?
  PROTEUS. No; earthly paragon.
  VALENTINE. Call divine.
  PROTEUS. flatter her.
  VALENTINE. O, flatter me; love delights praises!
  PROTEUS. sick gave bitter pills,
    minister you.  
  VALENTINE. speak truth her; divine,
    principality,
    Sovereign creatures earth.
  PROTEUS. mistress.
  VALENTINE. Sweet, any;
    thou wilt love.
  PROTEUS. reason prefer mine own?
  VALENTINE. thee prefer too:
    dignified high honour-
    bear lady's train, base earth
    vesture chance steal kiss
    And, great favour growing proud,
    Disdain root summer-swelling flow'r
    make rough winter everlastingly.
  PROTEUS. Why, Valentine, braggardism this?
  VALENTINE. Pardon me, Proteus; nothing
    her, worth makes worthies nothing;
    alone.
  PROTEUS. alone.
  VALENTINE. world! Why, man, mine own;  
    rich jewel
    twenty seas, sand pearl,
    water nectar, rocks pure gold.
    Forgive dream thee,
    thou seest dote love.
    foolish rival, father likes
    possessions huge,
    along; after,
    love, thou know'st, full jealousy.
  PROTEUS. loves you?
  VALENTINE. Ay, betroth'd; nay more, marriage-hour,
    cunning manner flight,
    Determin'd of- climb window,
    ladder made cords, means
    Plotted 'greed happiness.
    Good Proteus, chamber,
    affairs aid thy counsel.
  PROTEUS. before; enquire forth;
    road disembark
    necessaries use;  
    presently attend you.
  VALENTINE. make haste?
  PROTEUS. will.                                Exit VALENTINE
    heat heat expels
    nail strength drives another,
    remembrance love
    newer object forgotten.
    mind, Valentinus' praise,
    true perfection, false transgression,
    makes reasonless reason thus?
    fair; Julia love-
    love, love thaw'd;
    waxen image 'gainst fire
    Bears impression thing was.
    Methinks zeal Valentine cold,
    love wont.
    O! love lady much,
    reason love little.
    dote advice
    advice begin love her!  
    'Tis picture beheld,
    hath dazzled reason's light;
    perfections,
    reason blind.
    check erring love, will;
    not, compass skill.               Exit




SCENE V.
Milan. street

Enter SPEED LAUNCE severally

  SPEED. Launce! mine honesty, Padua.
  LAUNCE. Forswear thyself, sweet youth, welcome. I
    reckon always, man undone till hang'd,
    place till shot paid, and
    hostess 'Welcome!'
  SPEED. on, madcap; alehouse you
    presently; where, shot pence, thou shalt have
    thousand welcomes. But, sirrah, thy master part with
    Madam Julia?
  LAUNCE. Marry, clos'd earnest, parted very
    fairly jest.
  SPEED. marry him?
  LAUNCE. No.
  SPEED. then? marry her?
  LAUNCE. No, neither.
  SPEED. What, broken?
  LAUNCE. No, fish.  
  SPEED. then, stands matter them?
  LAUNCE. Marry, thus: stands him, stands well
    her.
  SPEED. ass art thou! understand thee not.
  LAUNCE. block art thou thou canst not! staff
    understands me.
  SPEED. thou say'st?
  LAUNCE. Ay, too; thee, lean, my
    staff understands me.
  SPEED. stands thee, indeed.
  LAUNCE. Why, stand-under under-stand one.
  SPEED. true, will't match?
  LAUNCE. dog. ay, will; no, will;
    shake tail nothing, will.
  SPEED. conclusion is, then, will.
  LAUNCE. Thou shalt secret a
    parable.
  SPEED. 'Tis so. But, Launce, say'st thou
    master notable lover?
  LAUNCE. knew otherwise.  
  SPEED. how?
  LAUNCE. notable lubber, thou reportest be.
  SPEED. Why, thou whoreson ass, thou mistak'st me.
  LAUNCE. Why, fool, meant thee, meant thy master.
  SPEED. thee master hot lover.
  LAUNCE. Why, thee care burn love.
    thou wilt, alehouse; not, thou art an
    Hebrew, Jew, worth Christian.
  SPEED. Why?
  LAUNCE. thou hast charity thee to
    ale Christian. Wilt thou go?
  SPEED. thy service.                                  Exeunt




SCENE VI.
Milan. DUKE's palace

Enter PROTEUS

  PROTEUS. leave Julia, forsworn;
    love fair Silvia, forsworn;
    wrong friend, forsworn;
    ev'n pow'r gave oath
    Provokes threefold perjury:
    Love bade swear, Love bids forswear.
    O sweet-suggesting Love, thou hast sinn'd,
    Teach me, thy tempted subject, excuse it!
    adore twinkling star,
    worship celestial sun.
    Unheedful vows heedfully broken;
    wit resolved will
    learn wit t' exchange bad better.
    Fie, fie, unreverend tongue, call bad
    sovereignty oft thou hast preferr'd
    twenty thousand soul-confirming oaths!
    leave love, do;  
    leave love love.
    Julia lose, Valentine lose;
    them, lose myself;
    lose them, find loss:
    Valentine, myself; Julia, Silvia.
    dearer friend;
    love precious itself;
    Silvia- witness heaven, made fair!-
    Shows Julia swarthy Ethiope.
    forget Julia alive,
    Rememb'ring love dead;
    Valentine hold enemy,
    Aiming Silvia sweeter friend.
    prove constant myself
    treachery us'd Valentine.
    night meaneth corded ladder
    climb celestial Silvia's chamber window,
    counsel, competitor.
    presently give father notice
    disguising pretended flight,  
    Who, enrag'd, banish Valentine,
    Thurio, intends, wed daughter;
    But, Valentine gone, quickly cross
    sly trick blunt Thurio's dull proceeding.
    Love, lend wings make purpose swift,
    thou hast lent wit plot drift.            Exit




SCENE VII.
Verona. JULIA'S house

Enter JULIA LUCETTA

  JULIA. Counsel, Lucetta; gentle girl, assist me;
    And, ev'n kind love, conjure thee,
    art table thoughts
    visibly character'd engrav'd,
    lesson good mean
    How, honour, undertake
    journey loving Proteus.
  LUCETTA. Alas, wearisome long!
  JULIA. true-devoted pilgrim weary
    measure kingdoms feeble steps;
    hath Love's wings fly,
    flight made dear,
    divine perfection, Sir Proteus.
  LUCETTA. forbear till Proteus make return.
  JULIA. O, know'st thou soul's food?
    Pity dearth pined in
    longing food long time.  
    Didst thou inly touch love.
    Thou wouldst kindle fire snow
    seek quench fire love words.
  LUCETTA. seek quench love's hot fire,
    qualify fire's extreme rage,
    burn bounds reason.
  JULIA. thou dam'st up, burns.
    current gentle murmur glides,
    Thou know'st, stopp'd, impatiently doth rage;
    fair hindered,
    makes sweet music th' enamell'd stones,
    Giving gentle kiss sedge
    overtaketh pilgrimage;
    winding nooks strays,
    sport, wild ocean.
    go, hinder course.
    patient gentle stream,
    make pastime weary step,
    Till step brought love;
    rest as, turmoil,  
    blessed soul doth Elysium.
  LUCETTA. habit along?
  JULIA. woman, prevent
    loose encounters lascivious men;
    Gentle Lucetta, fit weeds
    beseem well-reputed page.
  LUCETTA. then, ladyship cut hair.
  JULIA. No, girl; knit silken strings
    twenty odd-conceited true-love knots-
    fantastic youth
    greater time show be.
  LUCETTA. fashion, madam, make breeches?
  JULIA. fits 'Tell me, good lord,
    compass wear farthingale.'
    ev'n fashion thou likes, Lucetta.
  LUCETTA. codpiece, madam.
  JULIA. Out, out, Lucetta, ill-favour'd.
  LUCETTA. round hose, madam, now's worth pin,
    codpiece stick pins on.
  JULIA. Lucetta, thou lov'st me,  
    thou think'st meet, mannerly.
    me, wench, world repute me
    undertaking unstaid journey?
    fear make scandaliz'd.
  LUCETTA. so, stay home not.
  JULIA. Nay, not.
  LUCETTA. dream infamy, go.
    Proteus journey come,
    matter displeas'd gone.
    fear scarce pleas'd withal.
  JULIA. least, Lucetta, fear:
    thousand oaths, ocean tears,
    instances infinite love,
    Warrant Proteus.
  LUCETTA. servants deceitful men.
  JULIA. Base men base effect!
    truer stars govern Proteus' birth;
    words bonds, oaths oracles,
    love sincere, thoughts immaculate,
    tears pure messengers heart,  
    heart fraud heaven earth.
  LUCETTA. Pray heav'n prove him.
  JULIA. Now, thou lov'st me, wrong
    bear hard opinion truth;
    deserve love loving him.
    presently chamber,
    note stand of
    furnish longing journey.
    mine leave thy dispose,
    goods, lands, reputation;
    Only, lieu thereof, dispatch hence.
    Come, answer not, presently;
    impatient tarriance.                       Exeunt

ACT III. SCENE I.
Milan. DUKE'S palace

Enter DUKE, THURIO, PROTEUS

  DUKE. Sir Thurio, give leave, pray, awhile;
    secrets confer about.            Exit THURIO
    me, Proteus, me?
  PROTEUS. gracious lord, discover
    law friendship bids conceal;
    But, call mind gracious favours
    me, undeserving am,
    duty pricks utter that
    worldly good draw me.
    Know, worthy prince, Sir Valentine, friend,
    night intends steal daughter;
    made privy plot.
    determin'd bestow her
    Thurio, gentle daughter hates;
    stol'n you,
    vexation age.
    Thus, duty's sake, chose  
    cross friend intended drift
    Than, concealing it, heap head
    pack sorrows press down,
    unprevented, timeless grave.
  DUKE. Proteus, thee thine honest care,
    requite, command live.
    love seen,
    Haply judg'd fast asleep,
    oftentimes purpos'd forbid
    Sir Valentine company court;
    But, fearing jealous aim err
    so, unworthily, disgrace man,
    rashness shunn'd,
    gave gentle looks, find
    thyself hast disclos'd me.
    And, thou mayst perceive fear this,
    Knowing tender youth suggested,
    nightly lodge upper tow'r,
    key whereof kept;
    convey'd away.  
  PROTEUS. Know, noble lord, devis'd mean
    chamber window ascend
    corded ladder fetch down;
    youthful lover gone,
    presently;
    Where, you, intercept him.
    But, good lord, cunningly
    discovery aimed at;
    love you, hate friend,
    Hath made publisher pretence.
  DUKE. mine honour, know
    light thee this.
  PROTEUS. Adieu, lord; Sir Valentine coming.         Exit

                        Enter VALENTINE

  DUKE. Sir Valentine, fast?
  VALENTINE. Grace, messenger
    stays bear letters friends,
    deliver them.  
  DUKE. import?
  VALENTINE. tenour doth signify
    health happy court.
  DUKE. Nay then, matter; stay awhile;
    break thee affairs
    touch near, thou secret.
    'Tis unknown thee sought
    match friend Sir Thurio daughter.
  VALENTINE. well, lord; and, sure, match
    rich honourable; besides, gentleman
    full virtue, bounty, worth, qualities
    Beseeming wife fair daughter.
    grace win fancy him?
  DUKE. No, trust me; peevish, sullen, froward,
    Proud, disobedient, stubborn, lacking duty;
    child
    fearing father;
    And, thee, pride hers,
    advice, hath drawn love her;
    And, thought remnant mine age  
    cherish'd childlike duty,
    full resolv'd wife
    turn in.
    beauty wedding-dow'r;
    possessions esteems not.
  VALENTINE. Grace this?
  DUKE. lady, Verona here,
    affect; nice, coy,
    nought esteems aged eloquence.
    Now, therefore, thee tutor-
    long agone forgot court;
    Besides, fashion time chang'd-
    bestow myself
    regarded sun-bright eye.
  VALENTINE. Win gifts, respect words:
    Dumb jewels silent kind
    quick words move woman's mind.
  DUKE. scorn present her.
  VALENTINE. woman scorns contents her.
    Send another; give o'er,  
    scorn makes after-love more.
    frown, 'tis hate you,
    beget love you;
    chide, 'tis gone,
    why, fools mad left alone.
    repulse, doth say;
    'Get gone' doth 'Away!'
    Flatter praise, commend, extol graces;
    ne'er black, angels' faces.
    man hath tongue, say, man,
    tongue win woman.
  DUKE. promis'd friends
    youthful gentleman worth;
    severely resort men,
    man hath access day her.
  VALENTINE. resort night.
  DUKE. Ay, doors lock'd keys safe,
    man hath recourse night.
  VALENTINE. lets enter window?
  DUKE. chamber aloft, ground,  
    built shelving climb it
    apparent hazard life.
  VALENTINE. ladder, quaintly made cords,
    cast pair anchoring hooks,
    serve scale Hero's tow'r,
    bold Leander adventure it.
  DUKE. Now, thou art gentleman blood,
    Advise ladder.
  VALENTINE. it? Pray, sir, that.
  DUKE. night; Love child,
    longs by.
  VALENTINE. o'clock ladder.
  DUKE. But, hark thee; alone;
    convey ladder thither?
  VALENTINE. light, lord, bear it
    cloak length.
  DUKE. cloak long thine serve turn?
  VALENTINE. Ay, good lord.
  DUKE. thy cloak.
    length.  
  VALENTINE. Why, cloak serve turn, lord.
  DUKE. fashion wear cloak?
    pray thee, feel thy cloak me.
    letter same? here? 'To Silvia'!
    engine fit proceeding!
    bold break seal once.          [Reads]
      'My thoughts harbour Silvia nightly,
        slaves me, send flying.
      O, master lightly,
        lodge where, senseless, lying!
      herald thoughts thy pure bosom rest them,
        I, king, thither importune,
      curse grace grace hath blest them,
        servants' fortune.
      curse myself, me,
        harbour lord be.'
    here?
      'Silvia, night enfranchise thee.'
    'Tis so; ladder purpose.
    Why, Phaethon- thou art Merops' son-  
    Wilt thou aspire guide heavenly car,
    thy daring folly burn world?
    Wilt thou reach stars shine thee?
    Go, base intruder, over-weening slave,
    Bestow thy fawning smiles equal mates;
    patience, thy desert,
    privilege thy departure hence.
    favours
    Which, much, bestow'd thee.
    thou linger territories
    Longer swiftest expedition
    give thee time leave royal court,
    heaven! wrath exceed love
    bore daughter thyself.
    gone; hear thy vain excuse,
    But, thou lov'st thy life, make speed hence.    Exit
  VALENTINE. death living torment?
    die banish'd myself,
    Silvia myself; banish'd her
    self, deadly banishment.  
    light light, Silvia seen?
    joy joy, Silvia by?
    by,
    feed shadow perfection.
    Silvia night,
    music nightingale;
    Silvia day,
    day upon.
    essence, leave be
    fair influence
    Foster'd, illumin'd, cherish'd, alive.
    fly death, fly deadly doom:
    Tarry here, attend death;
    fly hence, fly life.

                      Enter PROTEUS LAUNCE

  PROTEUS. Run, boy, run, run, seek out.
  LAUNCE. So-ho, so-ho!
  PROTEUS. seest thou?  
  LAUNCE. find: hair 's head 'tis a
    Valentine.
  PROTEUS. Valentine?
  VALENTINE. No.
  PROTEUS. then? spirit?
  VALENTINE. Neither.
  PROTEUS. then?
  VALENTINE. Nothing.
  LAUNCE. speak? Master, strike?
  PROTEUS. wouldst thou strike?
  LAUNCE. Nothing.
  PROTEUS. Villain, forbear.
  LAUNCE. Why, sir, strike nothing. pray you-
  PROTEUS. Sirrah, say, forbear. Friend Valentine, word.
  VALENTINE. ears stopp'd hear good news,
    bad hath possess'd them.
  PROTEUS. dumb silence bury mine,
    harsh, untuneable, bad.
  VALENTINE. Silvia dead?
  PROTEUS. No, Valentine.  
  VALENTINE. Valentine, indeed, sacred Silvia.
    Hath forsworn me?
  PROTEUS. No, Valentine.
  VALENTINE. Valentine, Silvia forsworn me.
    news?
  LAUNCE. Sir, proclamation vanished.
  PROTEUS. thou art banished- O, news!-
    hence, Silvia, thy friend.
  VALENTINE. O, fed woe already,
    excess make surfeit.
    Doth Silvia banished?
  PROTEUS. Ay, ay; hath offered doom-
    Which, unrevers'd, stands effectual force-
    sea melting pearl, call tears;
    father's churlish feet tender'd;
    them, knees, humble self,
    Wringing hands, whiteness them
    waxed pale woe.
    bended knees, pure hands held up,
    Sad sighs, deep groans, silver-shedding tears,  
    penetrate uncompassionate sire-
    Valentine, ta'en, die.
    Besides, intercession chaf'd so,
    thy repeal suppliant,
    close prison commanded her,
    bitter threats biding there.
  VALENTINE. more; word thou speak'st
    malignant power life:
    so, pray thee breathe mine ear,
    ending anthem endless dolour.
  PROTEUS. Cease lament thou canst help,
    study thou lament'st.
    Time nurse breeder good.
    thou stay thou canst thy love;
    Besides, thy staying abridge thy life.
    Hope lover's staff; walk that,
    manage despairing thoughts.
    Thy letters here, thou art hence,
    Which, writ me, deliver'd
    milk-white bosom thy love.  
    time serves expostulate.
    Come, convey thee city gate;
    And, ere part thee, confer large
    concern thy love affairs.
    thou lov'st Silvia, thyself,
    Regard thy danger, me.
  VALENTINE. pray thee, Launce, thou seest boy,
    Bid make haste meet Northgate.
  PROTEUS. Go, sirrah, find out. Come, Valentine.
  VALENTINE. O dear Silvia! Hapless Valentine!
                                    Exeunt VALENTINE PROTEUS
  LAUNCE. fool, you, wit think
    master kind knave; but
    knave. lives love; am
    love; team horse pluck me; nor
    'tis love; 'tis woman; woman not
    myself; 'tis milkmaid; 'tis maid, for
    hath gossips; 'tis maid, master's
    maid serves wages. hath qualities a
    water-spaniel- bare Christian.  
    cate-log  [Pulling paper]  condition. 'Inprimis: She
    fetch carry.' Why, horse more; nay, horse
    fetch, carry; a
    jade. 'Item: milk.' you, sweet virtue maid
    clean hands.

                             Enter SPEED

  SPEED. now, Signior Launce! news mastership?
  LAUNCE. master's ship? Why, sea.
  SPEED. Well, vice still: mistake word. news,
    then, paper?
  LAUNCE. black'st news thou heard'st.
  SPEED. Why, man? black?
  LAUNCE. Why, black ink.
  SPEED. read them.
  LAUNCE. Fie thee, jolt-head; thou canst read.
  SPEED. Thou liest; can.
  LAUNCE. thee. this: begot thee?
  SPEED. Marry, son grandfather.  
  LAUNCE. O illiterate loiterer. son thy grandmother.
    proves thou canst read.
  SPEED. Come, fool, come; thy paper.
  LAUNCE.  [Handing paper]  There; Saint Nicholas thy
    speed.
  SPEED.  [Reads]  'Inprimis: milk.'
  LAUNCE. Ay, can.
  SPEED. 'Item: brews good ale.'
  LAUNCE. thereof proverb: Blessing heart, you
    brew good ale.
  SPEED. 'Item: sew.'
  LAUNCE. 'Can so?'
  SPEED. 'Item: knit.'
  LAUNCE. man care stock wench, can
    knit stock.
  SPEED. 'Item: wash scour.'
  LAUNCE. special virtue; wash'd and
    scour'd.
  SPEED. 'Item: spin.'
  LAUNCE. set world wheels, spin  
    living.
  SPEED. 'Item: hath nameless virtues.'
  LAUNCE. 'bastard virtues'; indeed
    fathers, names.
  SPEED. 'Here follow vices.'
  LAUNCE. Close heels virtues.
  SPEED. 'Item: kiss'd fasting, respect her
    breath.'
  LAUNCE. Well, fault mended breakfast.
    Read on.
  SPEED. 'Item: hath sweet mouth.'
  LAUNCE. makes amends sour breath.
  SPEED. 'Item: doth talk sleep.'
  LAUNCE. matter that, sleep talk.
  SPEED. 'Item: slow words.'
  LAUNCE. O villain, set vices! slow
    words woman's virtue. pray thee, with't; and
    place chief virtue.
  SPEED. 'Item: proud.'
  LAUNCE. too; Eve's legacy, ta'en  
    her.
  SPEED. 'Item: hath teeth.'
  LAUNCE. care neither, love crusts.
  SPEED. 'Item: curst.'
  LAUNCE. Well, is, hath teeth bite.
  SPEED. 'Item: praise liquor.'
  LAUNCE. liquor good, shall; not, will;
    good things praised.
  SPEED. 'Item: liberal.'
  LAUNCE. tongue cannot, writ slow
    of; purse not, shut. of
    thing may, help. Well, proceed.
  SPEED. 'Item: hath hair wit, faults
    hairs, wealth faults.'
  LAUNCE. Stop there; her; mine, mine,
    thrice article. Rehearse more.
  SPEED. 'Item: hath hair wit'-
  LAUNCE. hair wit. be; prove it: cover of
    salt hides salt, salt;
    hair covers wit wit,  
    greater hides less. next?
  SPEED. 'And faults hairs'-
  LAUNCE. monstrous. O out!
  SPEED. 'And wealth faults.'
  LAUNCE. Why, word makes faults gracious. Well, have
    her; match, impossible-
  SPEED. then?
  LAUNCE. Why, thee- thy master stays thee
    Northgate.
  SPEED. me?
  LAUNCE. thee! ay, art thou? hath stay'd man
    thee.
  SPEED. him?
  LAUNCE. Thou run him, thou hast stay'd long that
    scarce serve turn.
  SPEED. didst sooner? Pox love letters!
 Exit
  LAUNCE. swing'd reading letter. unmannerly
    slave thrust secrets! after, to
    rejoice boy's correction.                        Exit




SCENE II.
Milan. DUKE'S palace

Enter DUKE THURIO

  DUKE. Sir Thurio, fear love you
    Valentine banish'd sight.
  THURIO. exile hath despis'd most,
    Forsworn company rail'd me,
    desperate obtaining her.
  DUKE. weak impress love figure
    Trenched ice, hour's heat
    Dissolves water doth lose form.
    time melt frozen thoughts,
    worthless Valentine forgot.

                          Enter PROTEUS

    now, Sir Proteus! countryman,
    proclamation, gone?
  PROTEUS. Gone, good lord.
  DUKE. daughter takes grievously.  
  PROTEUS. time, lord, kill grief.
  DUKE. believe; Thurio thinks so.
    Proteus, good conceit hold thee-
    thou hast shown sign good desert-
    Makes confer thee.
  PROTEUS. Longer prove loyal Grace
    live Grace.
  DUKE. Thou know'st willingly effect
    match Sir Thurio daughter.
  PROTEUS. do, lord.
  DUKE. also, think, thou art ignorant
    opposes will.
  PROTEUS. did, lord, Valentine here.
  DUKE. Ay, perversely persevers so.
    make girl forget
    love Valentine, love Sir Thurio?
  PROTEUS. slander Valentine
    falsehood, cowardice, poor descent-
    things women highly hold hate.
  DUKE. Ay, spoke hate.  
  PROTEUS. Ay, enemy deliver it;
    circumstance spoken
    esteemeth friend.
  DUKE. undertake slander him.
  PROTEUS. that, lord, loath do:
    'Tis ill office gentleman,
    friend.
  DUKE. good word advantage him,
    slander endamage him;
    office indifferent,
    entreated friend.
  PROTEUS. prevail'd, lord; it
    aught speak dispraise,
    long continue love him.
    weed love Valentine,
    love Sir Thurio.
  THURIO. Therefore, unwind love him,
    ravel good none,
    provide bottom me;
    praising  
    worth dispraise Sir Valentine.
  DUKE. And, Proteus, dare trust kind,
    know, Valentine's report,
    Love's firm votary
    revolt change mind.
    warrant access
    Silvia confer large-
    lumpish, heavy, melancholy,
    And, friend's sake, glad you-
    temper persuasion
    hate young Valentine love friend.
  PROTEUS. effect.
    you, Sir Thurio, sharp enough;
    lay lime tangle desires
    wailful sonnets, composed rhymes
    full-fraught serviceable vows.
  DUKE. Ay,
    force heaven-bred poesy.
  PROTEUS. altar beauty
    sacrifice tears, sighs, heart;  
    Write till ink dry, tears
    Moist again, frame feeling line
    discover integrity;
    Orpheus' lute strung poets' sinews,
    golden touch soften steel stones,
    Make tigers tame, huge leviathans
    Forsake unsounded deeps dance sands.
    dire-lamenting elegies,
    Visit night lady's chamber window
    sweet consort; instruments
    Tune deploring dump- night's dead silence
    sweet-complaining grievance.
    This, nothing, inherit her.
  DUKE. discipline shows thou hast love.
  THURIO. thy advice night put practice;
    Therefore, sweet Proteus, direction-giver,
    city presently
    sort gentlemen skill'd music.
    sonnet serve turn
    give onset thy good advice.  
  DUKE. it, gentlemen!
  PROTEUS. wait Grace till supper,
    afterward determine proceedings.
  DUKE. it! pardon you.             Exeunt

ACT IV. SCENE I.
The frontiers Mantua. forest

Enter OUTLAWS

  OUTLAW. Fellows, stand fast; passenger.
  OUTLAW. ten, shrink not, 'em.

                  Enter VALENTINE SPEED

  OUTLAW. Stand, sir, throw ye;
    not, make sit, rifle you.
  SPEED. Sir, undone; villains
    travellers fear much.
  VALENTINE. friends-
  OUTLAW. so, sir; enemies.
  OUTLAW. Peace! hear him.
  OUTLAW. Ay, beard, we; proper man.
  VALENTINE. wealth lose;
    man cross'd adversity;
    riches poor habiliments,
    disfurnish me,  
    sum substance have.
  OUTLAW. travel you?
  VALENTINE. Verona.
  OUTLAW. you?
  VALENTINE. Milan.
  OUTLAW. long sojourn'd there?
  VALENTINE. sixteen months, longer stay'd,
    crooked fortune thwarted me.
  OUTLAW. What, banish'd thence?
  VALENTINE. was.
  OUTLAW. offence?
  VALENTINE. torments rehearse:
    kill'd man, death repent;
    slew manfully fight,
    false vantage base treachery.
  OUTLAW. Why, ne'er repent it, so.
    banish'd small fault?
  VALENTINE. was, held glad doom.
  OUTLAW. tongues?
  VALENTINE. youthful travel made happy,  
    miserable.
  OUTLAW. bare scalp Robin Hood's fat friar,
    fellow king wild faction!
  OUTLAW. him. Sirs, word.
  SPEED. Master, them; honourable kind thievery.
  VALENTINE. Peace, villain!
  OUTLAW. this: to?
  VALENTINE. fortune.
  OUTLAW. Know, then, gentlemen,
    fury ungovern'd youth
    Thrust company awful men;
    Verona banished
    practising steal lady,
    heir, allied Duke.
  OUTLAW. Mantua, gentleman
    Who, mood, stabb'd heart.
  OUTLAW. such-like petty crimes these.
    purpose- cite faults
    hold excus'd lawless lives;
    And, partly, beautified  
    goodly shape, report
    linguist, man perfection
    quality want-
  OUTLAW. Indeed, banish'd man,
    Therefore, rest, parley you.
    content general-
    make virtue necessity,
    live wilderness?
  OUTLAW. say'st thou? Wilt thou consort?
    'ay' captain all.
    thee homage, rul'd thee,
    Love thee commander king.
  OUTLAW. thou scorn courtesy thou diest.
  OUTLAW. Thou shalt live brag offer'd.
  VALENTINE. offer, live you,
    Provided outrages
    silly women poor passengers.
  OUTLAW. No, detest vile base practices.
    Come, us; bring thee crews,
    show thee treasure got;  
    Which, ourselves, rest thy dispose.       Exeunt




SCENE II.
Milan. DUKE'S palace, SILVIA'S window

Enter PROTEUS

  PROTEUS. false Valentine,
    unjust Thurio.
    colour commending him
    access love prefer;
    Silvia fair, true, holy,
    corrupted worthless gifts.
    protest true loyalty her,
    twits falsehood friend;
    beauty commend vows,
    bids forsworn
    breaking faith Julia lov'd;
    notwithstanding sudden quips,
    whereof quell lover's hope,
    Yet, spaniel-like, spurns love
    grows fawneth still.

                 Enter THURIO MUSICIANS  

    Thurio. window,
    give evening music ear.
  THURIO. now, Sir Proteus, crept us?
  PROTEUS. Ay, gentle Thurio; love
    creep service go.
  THURIO. Ay, hope, sir, love here.
  PROTEUS. Sir, do; hence.
  THURIO. Who? Silvia?
  PROTEUS. Ay, Silvia- sake.
  THURIO. own. Now, gentlemen,
    tune, lustily awhile.

    Enter distance, HOST, JULIA boy's clothes

  HOST. Now, young guest, methinks allycholly; pray you,
    it?
  JULIA. Marry, mine host, merry.
  HOST. Come, merry; bring shall
    hear music, gentleman ask'd for.  
  JULIA. hear speak?
  HOST. Ay, shall.                        [Music plays]
  JULIA. music.
  HOST. Hark, hark!
  JULIA. these?
  HOST. Ay; peace! hear 'em.

                   SONG
         Silvia? she,
           swains commend her?
         Holy, fair, wise she;
           heaven grace lend her,
         admired be.

         kind fair?
           beauty lives kindness.
         Love doth eyes repair,
           blindness;
         And, help'd, inhabits there.
  
         Silvia sing
           Silvia excelling;
         excels mortal thing
           dull earth dwelling.
         'To garlands bring.

  HOST. now, sadder before?
    you, man? music likes not.
  JULIA. mistake; musician likes not.
  HOST. Why, pretty youth?
  JULIA. plays false, father.
  HOST. How, tune strings?
  JULIA. so; false grieves very
    heart-strings.
  HOST. quick ear.
  JULIA. Ay, deaf; makes slow heart.
  HOST. perceive delight music.
  JULIA. whit, jars so.
  HOST. Hark, fine change music!
  JULIA. Ay, change spite.  
  HOST. play thing?
  JULIA. play thing.
    But, Host, doth Sir Proteus, talk on,
    resort gentlewoman?
  HOST. Launce, man, told me: lov'd of
    nick.
  JULIA. Launce?
  HOST. seek dog, to-morrow, master's
    command, carry present lady.
  JULIA. Peace, stand aside; company parts.
  PROTEUS. Sir Thurio, fear you; plead
    cunning drift excels.
  THURIO. meet we?
  PROTEUS. Saint Gregory's well.
  THURIO. Farewell.                  Exeunt THURIO MUSICIANS

                  Enter SILVIA above, window

  PROTEUS. Madam, good ev'n ladyship.
  SILVIA. music, gentlemen.  
    spake?
  PROTEUS. One, lady, knew pure heart's truth,
    quickly learn voice.
  SILVIA. Sir Proteus, it.
  PROTEUS. Sir Proteus, gentle lady, servant.
  SILVIA. will?
  PROTEUS. compass yours.
  SILVIA. wish; this,
    presently hie home bed.
    Thou subtle, perjur'd, false, disloyal man,
    Think'st thou shallow, conceitless,
    seduced thy flattery
    hast deceiv'd thy vows?
    Return, return, make thy love amends.
    me, pale queen night swear,
    granting thy request
    despise thee thy wrongful suit,
    intend chide myself
    time spend talking thee.
  PROTEUS. grant, sweet love, love lady;  
    dead.
  JULIA.  [Aside]  'Twere false, speak it;
    buried.
  SILVIA. be; Valentine, thy friend,
    Survives, whom, thyself art witness,
    betroth'd; art thou asham'd
    wrong thy importunacy?
  PROTEUS. likewise hear Valentine dead.
  SILVIA. suppose I; grave
    Assure thyself love buried.
  PROTEUS. Sweet lady, rake earth.
  SILVIA. thy lady's grave, call thence;
    Or, least, sepulchre thine.
  JULIA.  [Aside]  heard that.
  PROTEUS. Madam, heart obdurate,
    Vouchsafe picture love,
    picture hanging chamber;
    speak, sigh weep;
    For, substance perfect self
    devoted, shadow;  
    shadow make true love.
  JULIA.  [Aside]  'twere substance, would, sure, deceive it
    make shadow, am.
  SILVIA. loath idol, sir;
    falsehood well
    worship shadows adore false shapes,
    Send morning, send it;
    so, good rest.
  PROTEUS. wretches o'ernight
    wait execution morn.
                                       Exeunt PROTEUS SILVIA
  JULIA. Host, go?
  HOST. halidom, fast asleep.
  JULIA. Pray you, lies Sir Proteus?
  HOST. Marry, house. Trust me, 'tis day.
  JULIA. so; hath longest night
    e'er watch'd, heaviest.           Exeunt




SCENE III.
Under SILVIA'S window

Enter EGLAMOUR

  EGLAMOUR. hour Madam Silvia
    Entreated call mind;
    great matter employ in.
    Madam, madam!

             Enter SILVIA above, window

  SILVIA. calls?
  EGLAMOUR. servant friend;
    attends ladyship's command.
  SILVIA. Sir Eglamour, thousand times good morrow!
  EGLAMOUR. many, worthy lady, yourself!
    ladyship's impose,
    early service
    pleasure command in.
  SILVIA. O Eglamour, thou art gentleman-
    flatter, swear not-  
    Valiant, wise, remorseful, accomplish'd.
    Thou art ignorant dear good will
    bear banish'd Valentine;
    father enforce marry
    Vain Thurio, soul abhors.
    Thyself hast lov'd; heard thee say
    grief thy heart
    thy lady thy true love died,
    grave thou vow'dst pure chastity.
    Sir Eglamour, Valentine,
    Mantua, hear makes abode;
    And, ways dangerous pass,
    desire thy worthy company,
    faith honour repose.
    Urge father's anger, Eglamour,
    grief, lady's grief,
    justice flying hence
    unholy match,
    heaven fortune rewards plagues.
    desire thee, heart  
    full sorrows sea sands,
    bear company me;
    not, hide thee,
    venture depart alone.
  EGLAMOUR. Madam, pity grievances;
    virtuously plac'd,
    give consent you,
    Recking betideth me
    good befortune you.
    go?
  SILVIA. evening coming.
  EGLAMOUR. meet you?
  SILVIA. Friar Patrick's cell,
    intend holy confession.
  EGLAMOUR. fail ladyship. Good morrow, gentle lady.
  SILVIA. Good morrow, kind Sir Eglamour.                 Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Under SILVIA'S Window

Enter LAUNCE dog

  LAUNCE. man's servant play cur him, you,
    hard- brought puppy; sav'd
    drowning, blind brothers and
    sisters it. taught him, say
    precisely 'Thus teach dog.' deliver him
    present Mistress Silvia master; no
    sooner dining-chamber, steps trencher
    steals capon's leg. O, 'tis foul thing cur
    companies! have, should
    say, takes dog indeed, be, it
    were, dog things. wit he, to
    fault did, verily been
    hang'd for't; live, suffer'd for't. shall
    judge. thrusts company four
    gentleman-like dogs Duke's table; been
    there, bless mark, pissing chamber smelt
    him. 'Out dog' one; 'What cur that?'  
    another; 'Whip out' third; 'Hang up' the
    Duke. I, acquainted smell before, knew it
    Crab, fellow whips dogs.
    'Friend,' quoth 'you whip dog.' 'Ay, marry I'
    quoth he. 'You wrong,' quoth I; "twas the
    thing wot of.' makes ado, whips of
    chamber. masters servant? Nay,
    sworn, sat stock puddings hath
    stol'n, executed; stood the
    pillory geese hath kill'd, suffer'd
    for't. Thou think'st now. Nay, remember trick
    serv'd leave Madam Silvia. bid
    thee mark do? didst thou heave
    leg make water gentlewoman's farthingale?
    Didst thou trick?

               Enter PROTEUS, JULIA boy's clothes

  PROTEUS. Sebastian thy name? thee well,
    employ thee service presently.  
  JULIA. please; can.
  PROTEUS..I hope thou wilt.  [To LAUNCE]  now, whoreson
      peasant!
    days loitering?
  LAUNCE. Marry, sir, carried Mistress Silvia dog bade me.
  PROTEUS. jewel?
  LAUNCE. Marry, dog cur, tells currish
    good present.
  PROTEUS. receiv'd dog?
  LAUNCE. No, indeed, not; brought back
    again.
  PROTEUS. What, didst thou offer me?
  LAUNCE. Ay, sir; squirrel stol'n the
    hangman's boys market-place; offer'd mine
    own, dog big ten yours, gift
    greater.
  PROTEUS. Go, thee find dog again,
    ne'er return sight.
    Away, say. Stayest thou vex here?        Exit LAUNCE
    slave end turns shame!  
    Sebastian, entertained thee
    Partly youth
    discretion business,
    'tis trusting yond foolish lout,
    chiefly thy face thy behaviour,
    Which, augury deceive not,
    Witness good bringing up, fortune, truth;
    Therefore, thou, entertain thee.
    presently, ring thee,
    Deliver Madam Silvia-
    lov'd deliver'd me.
  JULIA. lov'd her, leave token.
    dead, belike?
  PROTEUS. so; lives.
  JULIA. Alas!
  PROTEUS. dost thou cry 'Alas'?
  JULIA. choose
    pity her.
  PROTEUS. Wherefore shouldst thou pity her?
  JULIA. methinks lov'd  
    love lady Silvia.
    dreams forgot love:
    dote cares love.
    'Tis pity love contrary;
    thinking makes cry 'Alas!'
  PROTEUS. Well, give ring, therewithal
    letter. chamber. lady
    claim promise heavenly picture.
    message done, hie home chamber,
    thou shalt find sad solitary.      Exit PROTEUS
  JULIA. women message?
    Alas, poor Proteus, thou hast entertain'd
    fox shepherd thy lambs.
    Alas, poor fool, pity him
    heart despiseth me?
    loves her, despiseth me;
    love him, pity him.
    ring gave him, parted me,
    bind remember good will;
    I, unhappy messenger,  
    plead obtain,
    carry refus'd,
    praise faith, disprais'd.
    master's true confirmed love,
    true servant master
    prove false traitor myself.
    woo him, coldly
    As, heaven knows, speed.

                     Enter SILVIA, attended

    Gentlewoman, good day! pray mean
    bring speak Madam Silvia.
  SILVIA. her, she?
  JULIA. she, entreat patience
    hear speak message on.
  SILVIA. whom?
  JULIA. master, Sir Proteus, madam.
  SILVIA. O, sends picture?
  JULIA. Ay, madam.  
  SILVIA. Ursula, bring picture there.
    Go, give master this. me,
    Julia, changing thoughts forget,
    fit chamber shadow.
  JULIA. Madam, peruse letter.
    Pardon me, madam; unadvis'd
    Deliver'd paper not.
    letter ladyship.
  SILVIA. pray thee again.
  JULIA. be; good madam, pardon me.
  SILVIA. There, hold!
    master's lines.
    stuff'd protestations,
    full new-found oaths, wul break
    easily tear paper.
  JULIA. Madam, sends ladyship ring.
  SILVIA. shame sends me;
    heard thousand times
    Julia gave departure.
    false finger profan'd ring,  
    Mine Julia wrong.
  JULIA. you.
  SILVIA. say'st thou?
  JULIA. you, madam, tender her.
    Poor gentlewoman, master wrongs much.
  SILVIA. Dost thou her?
  JULIA. myself.
    woes, protest
    wept hundred times.
  SILVIA. Belike thinks Proteus hath forsook her.
  JULIA. doth, sorrow.
  SILVIA. passing fair?
  JULIA. hath fairer, madam, is.
    master lov'd well,
    She, judgment, fair you;
    neglect looking-glass
    threw sun-expelling mask away,
    air hath starv'd roses cheeks
    pinch'd lily-tincture face,
    black I.  
  SILVIA. tall she?
  JULIA. stature; Pentecost,
    pageants delight play'd,
    youth play woman's part,
    trimm'd Madam Julia's gown;
    served fit, men's judgments,
    garment made me;
    height.
    time made weep good,
    play lamentable part.
    Madam, 'twas Ariadne passioning
    Theseus' perjury unjust flight;
    lively acted tears
    poor mistress, moved therewithal,
    Wept bitterly; dead
    thought felt sorrow.
  SILVIA. beholding thee, gentle youth.
    Alas, poor lady, desolate left!
    weep myself, thy words.
    Here, youth, purse; give thee  
    thy sweet mistress' sake, thou lov'st her.
    Farewell.                        Exit SILVIA ATTENDANTS
  JULIA. for't, e'er her.
    virtuous gentlewoman, mild beautiful!
    hope master's suit cold,
    respects mistress' love much.
    Alas, love trifle itself!
    picture; see. think,
    tire, face mine
    full lovely hers;
    painter flatter'd little,
    flatter much.
    hair auburn, mine perfect yellow;
    difference love,
    colour'd periwig.
    eyes grey glass, mine;
    Ay, forehead's low, mine's high.
    respects her
    make respective myself,
    fond Love blinded god?  
    Come, shadow, come, shadow up,
    'tis thy rival. O thou senseless form,
    Thou shalt worshipp'd, kiss'd, lov'd, ador'd!
    sense idolatry
    substance statue thy stead.
    thee kindly thy mistress' sake,
    us'd so; else, Jove vow,
    scratch'd unseeing eyes,
    make master love thee.                Exit
