ACT V. SCENE I.
Milan. abbey

Enter EGLAMOUR

  EGLAMOUR. sun begins gild western sky,
    hour
    Silvia Friar Patrick's cell meet me.
    fail, lovers break hours
    time,
    spur expedition.

                         Enter SILVIA

    comes. Lady, happy evening!
  SILVIA. Amen, amen! on, good Eglamour,
    postern abbey wall;
    fear attended spies.
  EGLAMOUR. Fear not. forest leagues off;
    recover that, enough.               Exeunt




SCENE II.
Milan. DUKE'S palace

Enter THURIO, PROTEUS, JULIA SEBASTIAN

  THURIO. Sir Proteus, Silvia suit?
  PROTEUS. O, sir, find milder was;
    takes exceptions person.
  THURIO. What, leg long?
  PROTEUS. No; little.
  THURIO. wear boot make rounder.
  JULIA.  [Aside]  love spurr'd loathes.
  THURIO. face?
  PROTEUS. fair one.
  THURIO. Nay, then, wanton lies; face black.
  PROTEUS. pearls fair; is:
    Black men pearls beauteous ladies' eyes.
  JULIA.  [Aside]  'Tis true, pearls put ladies' eyes;
    wink them.
  THURIO. likes discourse?
  PROTEUS. Ill, talk war.
  THURIO. discourse love peace?  
  JULIA.  [Aside]  better, indeed, hold peace.
  THURIO. valour?
  PROTEUS. O, sir, makes doubt that.
  JULIA.  [Aside]  not, cowardice.
  THURIO. birth?
  PROTEUS. deriv'd.
  JULIA.  [Aside]  True; gentleman fool.
  THURIO. Considers possessions?
  PROTEUS. O, ay; pities them.
  THURIO. Wherefore?
  JULIA.  [Aside]  ass owe them.
  PROTEUS. lease.
  JULIA. Duke.

                          Enter DUKE

  DUKE. now, Sir Proteus! now, Thurio!
    Sir Eglamour late?
  THURIO. I.
  PROTEUS. I.  
  DUKE. daughter?
  PROTEUS. Neither.
  DUKE. then,
    fled peasant Valentine;
    Eglamour company.
    'Tis true; Friar Lawrence met both
    penance wander'd forest;
    knew well, guess'd she,
    But, mask'd, it;
    Besides, intend confession
    Patrick's cell even; not.
    likelihoods confirm flight hence;
    Therefore, pray you, stand discourse,
    mount presently, meet me
    rising mountain foot
    leads Mantua, fled.
    Dispatch, sweet gentlemen, follow me.               Exit
  THURIO. Why, peevish girl
    flies fortune her.
    after, reveng'd Eglamour  
    love reckless Silvia.                   Exit
  PROTEUS. follow, Silvia's love
    hate Eglamour, her.              Exit
  JULIA. follow, cross love
    hate Silvia, love.            Exit




SCENE III.
The frontiers Mantua. forest

Enter OUTLAWS SILVA

  OUTLAW. Come, come.
    patient; bring captain.
  SILVIA. thousand mischances one
    learn'd brook patiently.
  OUTLAW. Come, bring away.
  OUTLAW. gentleman her?
  OUTLAW. nimble-footed, hath outrun us,
    Moyses Valerius follow him.
    thou west end wood;
    captain; follow fled.
    thicket beset; 'scape.
  OUTLAW. Come, bring captain's cave;
    Fear not; bears honourable mind,
    woman lawlessly.
  SILVIA. O Valentine, endure thee!            Exeunt




SCENE IV.
Another part forest

Enter VALENTINE

  VALENTINE. doth breed habit man!
    shadowy desert, unfrequented woods,
    brook flourishing peopled towns.
    sit alone, unseen any,
    nightingale's complaining notes
    Tune distresses record woes.
    O thou dost inhabit breast,
    Leave mansion long tenantless,
    Lest, growing ruinous, building fall
    leave memory was!
    Repair thy presence, Silvia:
    Thou gentle nymph, cherish thy forlorn swain.
    halloing stir to-day?
    mates, make wills law,
    unhappy passenger chase.
    love well; do
    uncivil outrages.  
    Withdraw thee, Valentine. here?
                                                   [Steps aside]

          Enter PROTEUS, SILVIA, JULIA Sebastian

  PROTEUS. Madam, service you,
    respect aught servant doth,
    hazard life, rescue him
    forc'd honour love.
    Vouchsafe me, meed, fair look;
    smaller boon beg,
    this, sure, give.
  VALENTINE.  [Aside]  dream hear!
    Love, lend patience forbear awhile.
  SILVIA. O miserable, unhappy am!
  PROTEUS. Unhappy you, madam, ere came;
    coming made happy.
  SILVIA. thy approach thou mak'st unhappy.
  JULIA.  [Aside]  me, approacheth presence.
  SILVIA. seized hungry lion,  
    breakfast beast
    false Proteus rescue me.
    O, heaven judge love Valentine,
    life's tender soul!
    full much, be,
    detest false, perjur'd Proteus.
    gone; solicit more.
  PROTEUS. dangerous action, stood death,
    undergo calm look?
    O, 'tis curse love, approv'd,
    women love belov'd!
  SILVIA. Proteus love belov'd!
    Read Julia's heart, thy love,
    dear sake thou didst rend thy faith
    thousand oaths; oaths
    Descended perjury, love me.
    Thou hast faith left now, thou'dst two,
    worse none; none
    plural faith, one.
    Thou counterfeit thy true friend!  
  PROTEUS. love,
    respects friend?
  SILVIA. men Proteus.
  PROTEUS. Nay, gentle spirit moving words
    change milder form,
    woo soldier, arms' end,
    love 'gainst nature love- force ye.
  SILVIA. O heaven!
  PROTEUS. force thee yield desire.
  VALENTINE. Ruffian! rude uncivil touch;
    Thou friend ill fashion!
  PROTEUS. Valentine!
  VALENTINE. Thou common friend, faith love-
    friend now; treacherous man,
    Thou hast beguil'd hopes; nought mine eye
    persuaded me. dare say
    friend alive: thou wouldst disprove me.
    trusted, one's hand
    perjured bosom? Proteus,
    trust thee more,  
    count world stranger thy sake.
    private wound deepest. O time accurst!
    'Mongst foes friend worst!
  PROTEUS. shame guilt confounds me.
    Forgive me, Valentine; hearty sorrow
    sufficient ransom offence,
    tender 't here; suffer
    e'er commit.
  VALENTINE. paid;
    receive thee honest.
    repentance satisfied
    heaven earth, pleas'd;
    penitence th' Eternal's wrath's appeas'd.
    And, love plain free,
    mine Silvia give thee.
  JULIA. O unhappy!                                  [Swoons]
  PROTEUS. boy.
  VALENTINE. Why, boy! why, wag! now!
    matter? up; speak.
  JULIA. O good sir, master charg'd deliver ring Madam  
    Silvia, which, neglect, done.
  PROTEUS. ring, boy?
  JULIA. 'tis; it.
  PROTEUS. How! see. Why, ring gave Julia.
  JULIA. O, cry mercy, sir, mistook;
    ring Silvia.
  PROTEUS. cam'st thou ring?
    depart gave Julia.
  JULIA. Julia give me;
    Julia brought hither.
  PROTEUS. How! Julia!
  JULIA. Behold gave aim thy oaths,
    entertain'd 'em deeply heart.
    oft hast thou perjury cleft root!
    O Proteus, habit make thee blush!
    thou asham'd me
    immodest raiment- shame live
    disguise love.
    lesser blot, modesty finds,
    Women change shapes men minds.  
  PROTEUS. men minds! 'tis true. O heaven, man
    constant, perfect! error
    Fills faults; makes run th' sins:
    Inconstancy falls ere begins.
    Silvia's face spy
    fresh Julia's constant eye?
  VALENTINE. Come, come, hand either.
    blest make happy close;
    'Twere pity friends long foes.
  PROTEUS. Bear witness, heaven, ever.
  JULIA. mine.

                Enter OUTLAWS, DUKE THURIO

  OUTLAW. prize, prize, prize!
  VALENTINE. Forbear, forbear, say; lord Duke.
    Grace man disgrac'd,
    Banished Valentine.
  DUKE. Sir Valentine!
  THURIO. Yonder Silvia; Silvia's mine.  
  VALENTINE. Thurio, give back, embrace thy death;
    measure wrath;
    Silvia thine; again,
    Verona hold thee. stands
    possession touch-
    dare thee breathe love.
  THURIO. Sir Valentine, care her, I;
    hold fool endanger
    body girl loves not.
    claim not, thine.
  DUKE. degenerate base art thou
    make means thou hast done
    leave slight conditions.
    Now, honour ancestry,
    applaud thy spirit, Valentine,
    thee worthy empress' love.
    then, forget griefs,
    Cancel grudge, repeal thee home again,
    Plead state thy unrivall'd merit,
    subscribe: Sir Valentine,  
    Thou art gentleman, deriv'd;
    thou thy Silvia, thou hast deserv'd her.
  VALENTINE. Grace; gift hath made happy.
    beseech you, daughter's sake,
    grant boon you.
  DUKE. grant thine own, whate'er be.
  VALENTINE. banish'd men, withal,
    men endu'd worthy qualities;
    Forgive committed here,
    recall'd exile:
    reformed, civil, full good,
    fit great employment, worthy lord.
  DUKE. Thou hast prevail'd; pardon them, thee;
    Dispose thou know'st deserts.
    Come, go; include jars
    triumphs, mirth, rare solemnity.
  VALENTINE. And, walk along, dare bold
    discourse make Grace smile.
    page, lord?
  DUKE. boy hath grace him; blushes.  
  VALENTINE. warrant you, lord- grace boy.
  DUKE. saying?
  VALENTINE. you, pass along,
    hath fortuned.
    Come, Proteus, 'tis penance hear
    story loves discovered.
    done, day marriage yours;
    feast, house, mutual happiness!     Exeunt

THE END

1611

THE WINTER'S TALE

by William Shakespeare



Dramatis Personae

  LEONTES, King Sicilia
  MAMILLIUS, son, young Prince Sicilia
  CAMILLO,    lord Sicilia
  ANTIGONUS,    "   "     "
  CLEOMENES,    "   "     "
  DION,         "   "     "
  POLIXENES, King Bohemia
  FLORIZEL, son, Prince Bohemia
  ARCHIDAMUS, lord Bohemia
  SHEPHERD, reputed father Perdita
  CLOWN, son
  AUTOLYCUS, rogue
  MARINER
  GAOLER
  TIME, Chorus

  HERMIONE, Queen Leontes
  PERDITA, daughter Leontes Hermione
  PAULINA, wife Antigonus
  EMILIA, lady attending Queen  
  MOPSA,   shepherdess
  DORCAS,        "

  Lords, Gentlemen, Ladies, Officers, Servants, Shepherds,
    Shepherdesses

                              SCENE:
                       Sicilia Bohemia




<<THIS ELECTRONIC VERSION COMPLETE WORKS WILLIAM
SHAKESPEARE COPYRIGHT 1990-1993 WORLD LIBRARY, INC., IS
PROVIDED PROJECT GUTENBERG ETEXT ILLINOIS BENEDICTINE COLLEGE

SERVICE CHARGES DOWNLOAD TIME MEMBERSHIP.>>



ACT I. SCENE I.
Sicilia. palace LEONTES

Enter CAMILLO ARCHIDAMUS

  ARCHIDAMUS. chance, Camillo, visit Bohemia, the
    occasion whereon services foot, see,
    said, great difference betwixt Bohemia your
    Sicilia.
  CAMILLO. coming summer King Sicilia means to
    pay Bohemia visitation justly owes him.
  ARCHIDAMUS. entertainment shame be
    justified loves; indeed-
  CAMILLO. Beseech you-
  ARCHIDAMUS. Verily, speak freedom knowledge: we
    magnificence, rare- to
    say. give sleepy drinks, senses,
    unintelligent insufficience, may, cannot
    praise us, accuse us.
  CAMILLO. pay great deal dear freely.
  ARCHIDAMUS. me, speak understanding instructs me
    mine honesty puts utterance.  
  CAMILLO. Sicilia show overkind Bohemia. were
    train'd childhoods; rooted betwixt
    affection choose branch now.
    mature dignities royal necessities made
    separation society, encounters, not
    personal, royally attorneyed interchange gifts,
    letters, loving embassies; seem'd together,
    absent; shook hands, vast; embrac'd it
    ends opposed winds. heavens continue their
    loves!
  ARCHIDAMUS. world malice or
    matter alter it. unspeakable comfort young
    Prince Mamillius; gentleman greatest promise that
    note.
  CAMILLO. agree hopes him. a
    gallant child; physics subject, makes old
    hearts fresh; crutches ere born desire
    life man.
  ARCHIDAMUS. content die?
  CAMILLO. Yes; excuse desire  
    live.
  ARCHIDAMUS. King son, desire live on
    crutches till one.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE II.
Sicilia. palace LEONTES

Enter LEONTES, POLIXENES, HERMIONE, MAMILLIUS, CAMILLO, ATTENDANTS

  POLIXENES. wat'ry star hath been
    shepherd's note left throne
    burden. Time long again
    fill'd up, brother, thanks;
    perpetuity
    debt. therefore, cipher,
    standing rich place, multiply
    'We you' thousands moe
    it.
  LEONTES. Stay while,
    pay part.
  POLIXENES. Sir, to-morrow.
    question'd fears chance
    breed absence, blow
    sneaping winds home, make say
    'This put truly.' Besides, stay'd  
    tire royalty.
  LEONTES. tougher, brother,
    put to't.
  POLIXENES. longer stay.
  LEONTES. sev'night longer.
  POLIXENES. sooth, to-morrow.
  LEONTES. part time between's then; that
    gainsaying.
  POLIXENES. Press not, beseech you, so.
    tongue moves, none, i' th' world,
    win me. now,
    necessity request, although
    'Twere needful denied it. affairs
    drag homeward; hinder
    love whip me; stay
    charge trouble. save both,
    Farewell, brother.
  LEONTES. Tongue-tied, Queen? Speak you.
  HERMIONE. thought, sir, held peace until
    drawn oaths stay. You, sir,  
    Charge coldly. sure
    Bohemia's well- satisfaction
    by-gone day proclaim'd. him,
    beat ward.
  LEONTES. said, Hermione.
  HERMIONE. longs son strong;
    then, go;
    swear so, stay;
    thwack distaffs.
    [To POLIXENES]  royal presence I'll
    adventure borrow week. Bohemia
    lord, give commission
    month gest
    Prefix'd for's parting.- Yet, good deed, Leontes,
    love thee jar o' th' clock behind
    lady lord.- stay?
  POLIXENES. No, madam.
  HERMIONE. Nay, will?
  POLIXENES. not, verily.
  HERMIONE. Verily!  
    put limber vows; I,
    seek t' unsphere stars oaths,
    'Sir, going.' Verily,
    go; lady's 'verily' is
    potent lord's. yet?
    Force prisoner,
    guest; pay fees
    depart, save thanks. you?
    prisoner guest? dread 'verily,'
    be.
  POLIXENES. guest, then, madam:
    prisoner import offending;
    easy commit
    punish.
  HERMIONE. gaoler then,
    kind. hostess. Come, question you
    lord's tricks boys.
    pretty lordings then!
  POLIXENES. were, fair Queen,
    lads thought  
    day to-morrow to-day,
    boy eternal.
  HERMIONE. lord
    verier wag o' th' two?
  POLIXENES. twinn'd lambs frisk i' th' sun
    bleat th' other. chang'd
    innocence innocence; knew not
    doctrine ill-doing, dream'd
    did. pursu'd life,
    weak spirits ne'er higher rear'd
    stronger blood, answer'd heaven
    Boldly 'Not guilty,' imposition clear'd
    Hereditary ours.
  HERMIONE. gather
    tripp'd since.
  POLIXENES. O sacred lady,
    Temptations born 's, for
    unfledg'd days wife girl;
    precious cross'd eyes
    young playfellow.  
  HERMIONE. Grace boot!
    make conclusion, say
    queen devils. Yet, on;
    Th' offences made answer,
    sinn'd us, us
    continue fault, slipp'd not
    us.
  LEONTES. won yet?
  HERMIONE. stay, lord.
  LEONTES. request not.
    Hermione, dearest, thou spok'st
    purpose.
  HERMIONE. Never?
  LEONTES. once.
  HERMIONE. What! well? was't before?
    prithee me; cram's praise, make's
    fat tame things. good deed dying tongueless
    Slaughters thousand waiting that.
    praises wages; ride's
    soft kiss thousand furlongs ere  
    spur heat acre. th' goal:
    good deed entreat stay;
    first? elder sister,
    mistake you. O, Grace!
    spoke th' purpose- When?
    Nay, have't; long.
  LEONTES. Why, when
    crabbed months sour'd death,
    Ere make thee open thy white hand
    clap thyself love; didst thou utter
    'I ever.'
  HERMIONE. 'Tis Grace indeed.
    Why, lo now, spoke th' purpose twice:
    earn'd royal husband;
    Th' friend.
                                  [Giving hand POLIXENES]
  LEONTES.  [Aside]  hot, hot!
    mingle friendship mingling bloods.
    tremor cordis me; heart dances,
    joy, joy. entertainment  
    free face put on; derive liberty
    heartiness, bounty, fertile bosom,
    agent. 'T may, grant;
    paddling palms pinching fingers,
    are, making practis'd smiles
    looking-glass; sigh, 'twere
    mort o' th' deer. O, entertainment
    bosom likes not, brows! Mamillius,
    Art thou boy?
  MAMILLIUS. Ay, good lord.
  LEONTES. I' fecks!
    Why, bawcock. What! hast smutch'd thy nose?
    copy mine. Come, Captain,
    neat- neat, cleanly, Captain.
    steer, heifer, calf,
    call'd neat.- virginalling
    palm?- now, wanton calf,
    Art thou calf?
  MAMILLIUS. Yes, will, lord.
  LEONTES. Thou want'st rough pash shoots have,  
    full me; are
    eggs. Women so,
    anything. false
    o'er-dy'd blacks, wind, waters- false
    dice wish'd fixes
    bourn 'twixt mine; true
    boy me. Come, sir page,
    welkin eye. Sweet villain!
    dear'st! collop! thy dam?- may't be?
    Affection! thy intention stabs centre.
    Thou dost make things held,
    Communicat'st dreams- be?-
    unreal thou coactive art,
    fellow'st nothing. 'tis credent
    Thou mayst co-join something; thou dost-
    commission; find it,
    infection brains
    hard'ning brows.
  POLIXENES. means Sicilia?
  HERMIONE. unsettled.  
  POLIXENES. How, lord!
    cheer? is't you, brother?
  HERMIONE. look
    held brow distraction.
    mov'd, lord?
  LEONTES. No, good earnest.
    nature betray folly,
    tenderness, make pastime
    harder bosoms! lines
    boy's face, methoughts recoil
    Twenty-three years; unbreech'd,
    green velvet coat; dagger muzzl'd,
    bite master prove,
    ornaments oft do, dangerous.
    like, methought, kernel,
    squash, gentleman. Mine honest friend,
    eggs money?
  MAMILLIUS. No, lord, fight.
  LEONTES. will? Why, happy man be's dole! brother,
    fond young prince  
    ours?
  POLIXENES. home, sir,
    exercise, mirth, matter;
    sworn friend, mine enemy;
    parasite, soldier, statesman, all.
    makes July's day short December,
    varying childness cures me
    Thoughts thick blood.
  LEONTES. stands squire
    Offic'd me. walk, lord,
    leave graver steps. Hermione,
    thou lov'st show brother's welcome;
    dear Sicily cheap;
    thyself young rover, he's
    Apparent heart.
  HERMIONE. seek us,
    i' th' garden. Shall's attend there?
  LEONTES. bents dispose you; found,
    beneath sky.  [Aside]  angling now,
    perceive give line.  
    to, to!
    holds neb, bill him!
    arms boldness wife
    allowing husband!

                      Exeunt POLIXENES, HERMIONE, ATTENDANTS

    already!
    Inch-thick, knee-deep, o'er head ears fork'd one!
    Go, play, boy, play; thy mother plays, I
    Play too; disgrac'd part, issue
    hiss grave. Contempt clamour
    knell. Go, play, boy, play. been,
    deceiv'd, cuckolds ere now;
    man is, present,
    speak this, holds wife th' arm
    thinks sluic'd in's absence,
    pond fish'd neighbour, by
    Sir Smile, neighbour. Nay, comfort in't,
    Whiles men gates gates open'd,  
    mine, will. despair
    hath revolted wives, tenth mankind
    hang themselves. Physic for't none;
    bawdy planet, strike
    'tis predominant; 'tis pow'rfull, it,
    east, west, north, south. concluded,
    barricado belly. Know't,
    enemy
    bag baggage. thousand on's
    disease, feel't not. now, boy!
  MAMILLIUS. you, say.
  LEONTES. Why, comfort.
    What! Camillo there?
  CAMILLO. Ay, good lord.
  LEONTES. play, Mamillius; thou'rt honest man.
                                                  Exit MAMILLIUS
    Camillo, great sir stay longer.
  CAMILLO. ado make anchor hold;
    cast out, home.
  LEONTES. Didst note it?  
  CAMILLO. stay petitions; made
    business material.
  LEONTES. Didst perceive it?
    [Aside]  already; whisp'ring, rounding,
    'Sicilia so-forth.' 'Tis gone
    gust last.- came't, Camillo,
    stay?
  CAMILLO. good Queen's entreaty.
  LEONTES. 'At Queen's' be't. 'Good' pertinent;
    is, not. taken
    understanding pate thine?
    thy conceit soaking, draw in
    common blocks. noted, is't,
    finer natures, severals
    head-piece extraordinary? Lower messes
    Perchance business purblind? Say.
  CAMILLO. Business, lord? understand
    Bohemia stays longer.
  LEONTES. Ha?
  CAMILLO. Stays longer.  
  LEONTES. Ay, why?
  CAMILLO. satisfy Highness, entreaties
    gracious mistress.
  LEONTES. Satisfy
    Th' entreaties mistress! Satisfy!
    suffice. trusted thee, Camillo,
    nearest things heart, well
    chamber-councils, wherein, priest-like, thou
    Hast cleans'd bosom- thee departed
    Thy penitent reform'd; been
    Deceiv'd thy integrity, deceiv'd
    so.
  CAMILLO. forbid, lord!
  LEONTES. bide upon't: thou art honest; or,
    thou inclin'st way, thou art coward,
    hoxes honesty behind, restraining
    requir'd; thou counted
    servant grafted trust,
    negligent; fool
    seest game play'd home, rich stake drawn,  
    tak'st jest.
  CAMILLO. gracious lord,
    negligent, foolish, fearful:
    man free
    negligence, folly, fear,
    infinite doings world,
    puts forth. affairs, lord,
    wilfull-negligent,
    folly; industriously
    play'd fool, negligence,
    weighing end; fearful
    thing issue doubted,
    Whereof execution cry out
    non-performance, 'twas fear
    oft infects wisest. These, lord,
    allow'd infirmities honesty
    free of. But, beseech Grace,
    plainer me; trespass
    visage; deny it,
    'Tis mine.  
  LEONTES. Ha' seen, Camillo-
    past doubt; have, eye-glass
    thicker cuckold's horn- heard-
    vision apparent rumour
    mute- thought- cogitation
    Resides man think-
    wife slippery? thou wilt confess-
    impudently negative,
    eyes ears thought- say
    wife's hobby-horse, deserves name
    rank flax-wench puts to
    troth-plight. Say't justify't.
  CAMILLO. stander-by hear
    sovereign mistress clouded so, without
    present vengeance taken. Shrew heart!
    spoke less
    this; reiterate sin
    deep that, true.
  LEONTES. whispering nothing?
    leaning cheek cheek? meeting noses?  
    Kissing inside lip? Stopping career
    laughter sigh?- note infallible
    breaking honesty. Horsing foot foot?
    Skulking corners? Wishing clocks swift;
    Hours, minutes; noon, midnight? eyes
    Blind pin web theirs, only,
    unseen wicked- nothing?
    Why, world in't nothing;
    covering sky nothing; Bohemia nothing;
    nothing; nothings,
    nothing.
  CAMILLO. Good lord, cur'd
    diseas'd opinion, betimes;
    'tis dangerous.
  LEONTES. be, 'tis true.
  CAMILLO. No, no, lord.
  LEONTES. is; lie, lie.
    thou liest, Camillo, hate thee;
    Pronounce thee gross lout, mindless slave,
    hovering temporizer  
    Canst thine eyes good evil,
    Inclining both. wife's liver
    Infected life, live
    running glass.
  CAMILLO. her?
  LEONTES. Why, wears medal, hanging
    neck, Bohemia; who- I
    servants true bare eyes
    alike mine honour profits,
    thrifts, that
    undo doing. Ay, thou,
    cupbearer- meaner form
    bench'd rear'd worship; mayst see,
    Plainly heaven sees earth earth sees heaven,
    gall'd- mightst bespice cup
    give mine enemy lasting wink;
    draught cordial.
  CAMILLO. Sir, lord,
    this; rash potion,
    ling'ring dram work  
    Maliciously poison. cannot
    crack dread mistress,
    sovereignly honourable.
    lov'd thee-
  LEONTES. Make thy question, rot!
    Dost muddy, unsettled,
    appoint vexation; sully
    purity whiteness sheets-
    preserve sleep, spotted
    goads, thorns, nettles, tails wasps;
    Give scandal blood o' th' Prince, son-
    mine, love mine-
    ripe moving 't? this?
    man blench?
  CAMILLO. you, sir.
    do; fetch Bohemia for't;
    Provided that, remov'd, Highness
    queen first,
    son's sake; sealing
    injury tongues courts kingdoms  
    allied yours.
  LEONTES. Thou dost advise me
    mine set down.
    give blemish honour, none.
  CAMILLO. lord,
    then; countenance clear
    friendship wears feasts, Bohemia
    queen. cupbearer;
    wholesome beverage,
    Account servant.
  LEONTES. all:
    Do't, thou hast half heart;
    Do't not, thou split'st thine own.
  CAMILLO. do't, lord.
  LEONTES. friendly, thou hast advis'd me.   Exit
  CAMILLO. O miserable lady! But, me,
    case stand in? poisoner
    good Polixenes; ground do't
    obedience master; one
    Who, rebellion himself,  
    too. deed,
    Promotion follows. find example
    thousands struck anointed kings
    flourish'd after, do't; since
    brass, stone, parchment, bears one,
    villainy forswear't. must
    Forsake court. do't, no, certain
    break-neck. Happy star reign now!
    Bohemia.

                     Enter POLIXENES

  POLIXENES. strange. Methinks
    favour begins warp. speak?
    Good day, Camillo.
  CAMILLO. Hail, royal sir!
  POLIXENES. news i' th' court?
  CAMILLO. rare, lord.
  POLIXENES. King hath countenance
    lost province, region  
    Lov'd loves himself; met him
    customary compliment, he,
    Wafting eyes th' contrary falling
    lip contempt, speeds me;
    leaves breeding
    manners.
  CAMILLO. dare know, lord.
  POLIXENES. How, dare not! not. know, dare not
    intelligent me? 'Tis thereabouts;
    For, yourself, know, must,
    dare not. Good Camillo,
    chang'd complexions mirror
    shows mine chang'd too; be
    party alteration, finding
    alter'd with't.
  CAMILLO. sickness
    puts distemper; but
    disease; caught
    well.
  POLIXENES. How! caught me?  
    Make sighted basilisk;
    look'd thousands sped better
    regard, kill'd so. Camillo-
    gentleman; thereto
    Clerk-like experienc'd, adorns
    gentry parents' noble names,
    success gentle- beseech you,
    aught behove knowledge
    Thereof inform'd, imprison't not
    ignorant concealment.
  CAMILLO. answer.
  POLIXENES. sickness caught me, well?
    answer'd. Dost thou hear, Camillo?
    conjure thee, parts man
    honour acknowledge, whereof least
    suit mine, thou declare
    incidency thou dost guess harm
    creeping me; off, near;
    prevented, be;
    not, bear it.  
  CAMILLO. Sir, you;
    charg'd honour, him
    honourable. mark counsel,
    ev'n swiftly as
    utter it, me
    Cry lost, goodnight.
  POLIXENES. On, good Camillo.
  CAMILLO. appointed murder you.
  POLIXENES. whom, Camillo?
  CAMILLO. King.
  POLIXENES. what?
  CAMILLO. thinks, nay, confidence swears,
    't instrument
    vice to't, touch'd queen
    Forbiddenly.
  POLIXENES. O, blood turn
    infected jelly, name
    yok'd betray Best!
    Turn freshest reputation to
    savour strike dullest nostril  
    arrive, approach shunn'd,
    Nay, hated too, worse great'st infection
    e'er heard read!
  CAMILLO. Swear thought over
    star heaven and
    influences, well
    Forbid sea obey moon
    oath remove counsel shake
    fabric folly, foundation
    pil'd faith continue
    standing body.
  POLIXENES. grow?
  CAMILLO. not; 'tis safer to
    Avoid grown question 'tis born.
    dare trust honesty,
    lies enclosed trunk you
    bear impawn'd, to-night.
    followers whisper business;
    will, twos threes, posterns,
    Clear o' th' city. myself, put  
    fortunes service, here
    discovery lost. uncertain,
    For, honour parents, I
    utt'red truth; seek prove,
    dare stand by; safer
    condemn'd King's mouth, thereon
    execution sworn.
  POLIXENES. thee:
    heart in's face. Give thy hand;
    pilot me, thy places shall
    neighbour mine. ships ready, and
    people expect departure
    days ago. jealousy
    precious creature; rare,
    great; and, person's mighty,
    violent; conceive
    dishonour'd man ever
    Profess'd him, why, revenges must
    made bitter. Fear o'ershades me.
    Good expedition friend, comfort  
    gracious Queen, part theme, nothing
    ill-ta'en suspicion! Come, Camillo;
    respect thee father, if
    Thou bear'st life hence. avoid.
  CAMILLO. mine authority command
    keys posterns. Highness
    urgent hour. Come, sir, away.             Exeunt

ACT II. SCENE I.
Sicilia. palace LEONTES

Enter HERMIONE, MAMILLIUS, LADIES

  HERMIONE. boy you; troubles me,
    'Tis past enduring.
  LADY. Come, gracious lord,
    playfellow?
  MAMILLIUS. No, you.
  LADY. Why, sweet lord?
  MAMILLIUS. kiss hard, speak if
    baby still. love better.
  LADY. so, lord?
  MAMILLIUS. because
    brows blacker; black brows, say,
    women best; not
    hair there, semicircle
    half-moon made pen.
  LADY. taught't this?
  MAMILLIUS. learn'd women's faces. Pray now,
    colour eyebrows?  
  LADY. Blue, lord.
  MAMILLIUS. Nay, mock. lady's nose
    blue, eyebrows.
  LADY. Hark ye:
    Queen mother rounds apace. shall
    Present services fine prince
    days; wanton us,
    you.
  LADY. spread late
    goodly bulk. Good time encounter her!
  HERMIONE. wisdom stirs you? Come, sir, now
    again. Pray sit us,
    tell's tale.
  MAMILLIUS. Merry sad shall't be?
  HERMIONE. merry will.
  MAMILLIUS. sad tale's winter. one
    sprites goblins.
  HERMIONE. that, good sir.
    on, sit down; on, best
    fright sprites; pow'rfull it.  
  MAMILLIUS. man-
  HERMIONE. Nay, come, sit down; on.
  MAMILLIUS. Dwelt churchyard- softly;
    Yond crickets hear it.
  HERMIONE. then,
    give't mine ear.

             Enter LEONTES, ANTIGONUS, LORDS, OTHERS

  LEONTES. met there? train? Camillo him?
  LORD. tuft pines met them; never
    men scour way. ey'd them
    ships.
  LEONTES. blest I
    censure, true opinion!
    Alack, lesser knowledge! accurs'd
    blest! cup
    spider steep'd, drink, depart,
    partake venom, knowledge
    infected; present  
    Th' abhorr'd ingredient eye, make known
    hath drunk, cracks gorge, sides,
    violent hefts. drunk, spider.
    Camillo this, pander.
    plot life, crown;
    All's true mistrusted. false villain
    employ'd pre-employ'd him;
    discover'd design, I
    Remain pinch'd thing; yea, trick
    play will. posterns
    easily open?
  LORD. great authority;
    hath prevail'd so
    command.
  LEONTES. know't well.
    Give boy. glad nurse him;
    bear signs me, you
    blood him.
  HERMIONE. this? Sport?
  LEONTES. Bear boy hence; her;  
    him; sport herself
                                          [MAMILLIUS led out]
    big with- 'tis Polixenes
    made thee swell thus.
  HERMIONE. not,
    sworn saying,
    Howe'er lean th' nayward.
  LEONTES. You, lords,
    her, mark well; about
    'She goodly lady' and
    justice hearts thereto ad
    'Tis pity honest- honourable.'
    Praise without-door form,
    faith deserves high speech, straight
    shrug, hum ha, petty brands
    calumny doth use- O, out!-
    mercy does, calumny sear
    Virtue itself- shrugs, hum's ha's,
    goodly, between,
    Ere honest. be't known,  
    grieve be,
    adultress.
  HERMIONE. villain so,
    replenish'd villain world,
    villain: you, lord,
    mistake.
  LEONTES. mistook, lady,
    Polixenes Leontes. O thou thing!
    call creature thy place,
    barbarism, making precedent,
    language degrees
    mannerly distinguishment leave out
    Betwixt prince beggar. said
    adultress; whom.
    More, traitor; Camillo is
    federary her, knows
    shame herself
    vile principal- she's
    bed-swerver, bad those
    vulgars give bold'st titles; ay, privy  
    late escape.
  HERMIONE. No, life,
    Privy this. grieve you,
    clearer knowledge, that
    publish'd me! Gentle lord,
    scarce throughly say
    mistake.
  LEONTES. No; mistake
    foundations build upon,
    centre big bear
    school-boy's top. prison.
    speak afar guilty
    speaks.
  HERMIONE. ill planet reigns.
    patient till heavens look
    aspect favourable. Good lords,
    prone weeping, sex
    Commonly are- vain dew
    Perchance dry pities- have
    honourable grief lodg'd burns  
    Worse tears drown. Beseech all, lords,
    thoughts qualified charities
    instruct you, measure me; so
    King's perform'd!
  LEONTES.  [To GUARD]  heard?
  HERMIONE. is't me? Beseech highness
    women me, see
    plight requires it. weep, good fools;
    cause; mistress
    deserv'd prison, abound tears
    out: action on
    grace. Adieu, lord.
    wish'd sorry; now
    trust shall. women, come; leave.
  LEONTES. Go, bidding; hence!
                            Exeunt HERMIONE, guarded, LADIES
  LORD. Beseech Highness, call Queen again.
  ANTIGONUS. do, sir, justice
    Prove violence, great suffer,
    Yourself, queen, son.  
  LORD. her, lord,
    dare life lay down- do't, sir,
    t' accept it- Queen spotless
    I' th' eyes heaven you- mean
    accuse her.
  ANTIGONUS. prove
    otherwise, stables where
    lodge wife; couples her;
    feel farther trust her;
    inch woman world,
    Ay, dram woman's flesh false,
    be.
  LEONTES. Hold peaces.
  LORD. Good lord-
  ANTIGONUS. speak, ourselves.
    abus'd, putter-on
    damn'd for't. knew villain!
    land-damn him. honour-flaw'd-
    daughters: eldest eleven;
    third, five;  
    prove true, pay 't. mine honour,
    geld 'em all; fourteen see
    bring false generations. co-heirs;
    glib they
    produce fair issue.
  LEONTES. Cease; more.
    smell business sense cold
    dead man's nose; see't feel't
    feel thus; withal
    instruments feel.
  ANTIGONUS. so,
    grave bury honesty;
    grain face sweeten
    dungy earth.
  LEONTES. What! Lack credit?
  LORD. lack I, lord,
    ground; content me
    honour true suspicion,
    blam'd for't might.
  LEONTES. Why,  
    Commune this, follow
    forceful instigation? prerogative
    Calls counsels; natural goodness
    Imparts this; which, you- stupified
    skill- not
    Relish truth us, inform yourselves
    advice. matter,
    loss, gain, ord'ring on't, all
    Properly ours.
  ANTIGONUS. wish, liege,
    silent judgment it,
    overture.
  LEONTES. be?
    thou art ignorant age,
    thou wert born fool. Camillo's flight,
    Added familiarity-
    gross touch'd conjecture,
    lack'd sight only, nought approbation
    seeing, circumstances
    Made th' deed- doth push proceeding.  
    Yet, greater confirmation-
    For, act importance, 'twere
    piteous wild- dispatch'd post
    sacred Delphos, Apollo's temple,
    Cleomenes Dion, know
    stuff'd sufficiency. Now, oracle
    bring all, spiritual counsel had,
    stop spur me. well?
  LORD. done, lord.
  LEONTES. satisfied, more
    know, oracle
    Give rest th' minds he
    ignorant credulity not
    th' truth. thought good
    free person confin'd,
    treachery fled hence
    left perform. Come, follow us;
    speak public; business
    raise all.
  ANTIGONUS.  [Aside]  laughter, it,  
    good truth known.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE II.
Sicilia. prison

Enter PAULINA, GENTLEMAN, ATTENDANTS

  PAULINA. keeper prison- call him;
    knowledge am.              Exit GENTLEMAN
    Good lady!
    court Europe good thee;
    dost thou prison?

                 Re-enter GENTLEMAN GAOLER

    Now, good sir,
    me, not?
  GAOLER. worthy lady,
    honour.
  PAULINA. Pray you, then,
    Conduct Queen.
  GAOLER. not, madam;
    contrary express commandment.
  PAULINA. ado, lock honesty honour  
    Th' access gentle visitors! Is't lawful, pray you,
    women- them? Emilia?
  GAOLER. you, madam,
    put attendants,
    bring Emilia forth.
  PAULINA. pray now, call her.
    Withdraw yourselves.                       Exeunt ATTENDANTS
  GAOLER. And, madam,
    present conference.
  PAULINA. Well, be't so, prithee.                   Exit GAOLER
    ado make stain stain
    passes colouring.

                 Re-enter GAOLER, EMILIA

    Dear gentlewoman,
    fares gracious lady?
  EMILIA. great forlorn
    hold together. frights griefs,
    tender lady hath borne greater,  
    is, time, deliver'd.
  PAULINA. boy?
  EMILIA. daughter, goodly babe,
    Lusty, live. Queen receives
    comfort in't; 'My poor prisoner,
    innocent you.'
  PAULINA. dare sworn.
    dangerous unsafe lunes i' th' King, beshrew them!
    told on't, shall. office
    woman best; take't me;
    prove honey-mouth'd, tongue blister,
    red-look'd anger be
    trumpet more. Pray you, Emilia,
    Commend obedience Queen;
    dares trust babe,
    show't King, undertake be
    advocate th' loud'st. know
    soften sight o' th' child:
    silence pure innocence
    Persuades speaking fails.  
  EMILIA. worthy madam,
    honour goodness evident
    free undertaking miss
    thriving issue; lady living
    meet great errand. ladyship
    visit room, presently
    Acquaint Queen noble offer
    to-day hammer'd design,
    durst tempt minister honour,
    denied.
  PAULINA. her, Emilia,
    tongue have; wit flow from't
    boldness bosom, let't doubted
    good.
  EMILIA. blest it!
    Queen. nearer.
  GAOLER. Madam, if't Queen send babe,
    incur pass it,
    warrant.
  PAULINA. fear it, sir.  
    child prisoner womb, is
    law process great Nature thence
    Freed enfranchis'd- party to
    anger King, guilty of,
    be, trespass Queen.
  GAOLER. it.
  PAULINA. fear. mine honour, I
    stand betwixt danger.                    Exeunt




SCENE III.
Sicilia. palace LEONTES

Enter LEONTES, ANTIGONUS, LORDS, SERVANTS

  LEONTES. night day rest! weakness
    bear matter thus- mere weakness. If
    being- part o' th' cause,
    She, th' adultress; harlot king
    mine arm, blank
    level brain, plot-proof; she
    hook me- gone,
    fire, moiety rest
    again. there?
  SERVANT. lord?
  LEONTES. boy?
  SERVANT. good rest to-night;
    'Tis hop'd sickness discharg'd.
  LEONTES. nobleness!
    Conceiving dishonour mother,
    straight declin'd, droop'd, deeply,
    Fasten'd fix'd shame on't himself,  
    Threw spirit, appetite, sleep,
    downright languish'd. Leave solely. Go,
    fares.  [Exit SERVANT]  Fie, fie! thought him!
    thought revenges way
    Recoil me- mighty,
    parties, alliance. be,
    time serve; present vengeance,
    her. Camillo Polixenes
    Laugh me, make pastime sorrow.
    laugh reach them; nor
    she, pow'r.

                 Enter PAULINA, CHILD

  LORD. enter.
  PAULINA. Nay, rather, good lords, me.
    Fear tyrannous passion more, alas,
    Queen's life? gracious innocent soul,
    free jealous.
  ANTIGONUS. enough.  
  SERVANT. Madam, hath slept to-night; commanded
    him.
  PAULINA. hot, good sir;
    bring sleep. 'Tis you,
    creep shadows him, sigh
    needless heavings- you
    Nourish awaking: I
    words medicinal true,
    Honest either, purge humour
    presses sleep.
  LEONTES. noise there, ho?
  PAULINA. noise, lord; needful conference
    gossips Highness.
  LEONTES. How!
    audacious lady! Antigonus,
    charg'd thee me;
    knew would.
  ANTIGONUS. told so, lord,
    displeasure's peril, mine,
    visit you.  
  LEONTES. What, canst rule her?
  PAULINA. dishonesty can: this,
    done-
    Commit committing honour- trust it,
    rule me.
  ANTIGONUS. La now, hear!
    rein, run;
    stumble.
  PAULINA. Good liege, come-
    beseech hear me, professes
    loyal servant, physician,
    obedient counsellor; dares
    so, comforting evils,
    yours- come
    good Queen.
  LEONTES. Good Queen!
  PAULINA. Good Queen, lord, good Queen- good Queen;
    combat make good, I
    man, worst you.
  LEONTES. Force hence.  
  PAULINA. makes trifles eyes
    hand me. mine accord off;
    errand. good Queen,
    good, hath brought daughter;
    'tis; commends blessing.
                                         [Laying child]
  LEONTES. Out!
    mankind witch! her, o' door!
    intelligencing bawd!
  PAULINA. so.
    ignorant you
    entitling me; honest
    mad; enough, warrant,
    world goes, pass honest.
  LEONTES. Traitors!
    push out? Give bastard.
    [To ANTIGONUS]  Thou dotard, thou art woman-tir'd, unroosted
    thy Dame Partlet here. bastard;
    Take't up, say; give't thy crone.
  PAULINA.  
    Unvenerable thy hands, thou
    Tak'st Princess forced baseness
    put upon't!
  LEONTES. dreads wife.
  PAULINA. did; 'twere past doubt
    call children yours.
  LEONTES. nest traitors!
  ANTIGONUS. none, good light.
  PAULINA. I; any
    here; himself; he
    sacred honour himself, Queen's,
    hopeful son's, babe's, betrays slander,
    sting sharper sword's; not-
    For, case stands, curse
    compell'd 't- remove
    root opinion, rotten
    oak stone sound.
  LEONTES. callat
    boundless tongue, late hath beat husband,
    baits me! brat mine;  
    issue Polixenes.
    it, dam
    Commit fire.
  PAULINA. yours.
    And, lay th' proverb charge,
    'tis worse. Behold, lords,
    print little, matter
    copy father- eye, nose, lip,
    trick of's frown, forehead; nay, valley,
    pretty dimples chin cheek; smiles;
    mould frame hand, nail, finger.
    thou, good goddess Nature, hast made it
    it, thou hast
    ordering mind too, 'mongst colours
    yellow in't, suspect, does,
    children husband's!
  LEONTES. gross hag!
    And, lozel, thou art worthy hang'd
    wilt stay tongue.
  ANTIGONUS. Hang husbands  
    feat, leave yourself
    subject.
  LEONTES. more, hence.
  PAULINA. unworthy unnatural lord
    more.
  LEONTES. ha' thee burnt.
  PAULINA. care not.
    heretic makes fire,
    burns in't. call tyrant
    cruel usage Queen-
    produce accusation
    weak-hing'd fancy- savours
    tyranny, ignoble make you,
    Yea, scandalous world.
  LEONTES. allegiance,
    chamber her! tyrant,
    life? durst call so,
    one. her!
  PAULINA. pray you, push me; gone.
    babe, lord; 'tis yours. Jove send  
    guiding spirit! hands?
    tender o'er follies
    good, you.
    So, so. Farewell; gone.                          Exit
  LEONTES. Thou, traitor, hast set thy wife this.
    child! with't. thou, hast
    heart tender o'er it, hence,
    instantly consum'd fire;
    thou, thou. straight.
    hour bring word 'tis done,
    good testimony, seize thy life,
    thou call'st thine. thou refuse,
    wilt encounter wrath, so;
    bastard brains proper hands
    dash out. Go, fire;
    thou set'st thy wife.
  ANTIGONUS. not, sir.
    lords, noble fellows, please,
    clear in't.
  LORDS. can. royal liege,  
    guilty coming hither.
  LEONTES. liars all.
  LORD. Beseech Highness, give credit.
    serv'd you; beseech
    esteem us; knees beg,
    recompense dear services
    Past come, change purpose,
    horrible, bloody, must
    Lead foul issue. kneel.
  LEONTES. feather wind blows.
    live bastard kneel
    call father? burn now
    curse then. it; live.
    neither.  [To ANTIGONUS]  You, Sir, hither.
    tenderly officious
    Lady Margery, midwife there,
    save bastard's life- 'tis bastard,
    beard's grey- adventure
    save brat's life?
  ANTIGONUS. Anything, lord,  
    ability undergo,
    nobleness impose. least, much:
    pawn blood left
    save innocent- possible.
  LEONTES. possible. Swear sword
    Thou wilt perform bidding.
  ANTIGONUS. will, lord.
  LEONTES. Mark, perform it- seest thou? fail
    point in't be
    Death thyself, thy lewd-tongu'd wife,
    time pardon. enjoin thee,
    thou art liegeman us, thou carry
    female bastard hence; thou bear it
    remote desert place, out
    dominions; thou leave it,
    mercy, protection
    favour climate. strange fortune
    us, justice charge thee,
    thy soul's peril thy body's torture,
    thou commend strangely place  
    chance nurse end it. up.
  ANTIGONUS. swear this, present death
    merciful. on, poor babe.
    powerful spirit instruct kites ravens
    thy nurses! Wolves bears, say,
    Casting savageness aside, done
    offices pity. Sir, prosperous
    deed require! blessing
    cruelty fight thy side,
    Poor thing, condemn'd loss!           Exit child
  LEONTES. No, rear
    Another's issue.

                         Enter SERVANT

  SERVANT. Highness, posts
    th' oracle come
    hour since. Cleomenes Dion,
    arriv'd Delphos, landed,
    Hasting th' court.  
  LORD. you, sir, speed
    Hath account.
  LEONTES. Twenty-three days
    absent; 'tis good speed; foretells
    great Apollo suddenly have
    truth appear. Prepare you, lords;
    Summon session, arraign
    disloyal lady; for, hath
    publicly accus'd, have
    open trial. lives,
    heart burden me. Leave me;
    bidding.                            Exeunt

ACT III. SCENE I.
Sicilia. road Capital

Enter CLEOMENES DION

  CLEOMENES. climate's delicate, air sweet,
    Fertile isle, temple surpassing
    common praise bears.
  DION. report,
    caught me, celestial habits-
    Methinks term them- reverence
    grave wearers. O, sacrifice!
    ceremonious, solemn, unearthly,
    i' th' off'ring!
  CLEOMENES. all, burst
    ear-deaf'ning voice o' th' oracle,
    Kin Jove's thunder, surpris'd sense
    nothing.
  DION. th' event o' th' journey
    Prove successful Queen- O, be't so!-
    hath rare, pleasant, speedy,
    time worth on't.  
  CLEOMENES. Great Apollo
    Turn th' best! proclamations,
    forcing faults Hermione,
    like.
  DION. violent carriage it
    clear end business. oracle-
    Apollo's great divine seal'd up-
    contents discover, rare
    rush knowledge. Go; fresh horses.
    gracious issue!                            Exeunt




SCENE II.
Sicilia. court justice

Enter LEONTES, LORDS, OFFICERS

  LEONTES. sessions, great grief pronounce,
    pushes 'gainst heart- party tried,
    daughter king, wife, one
    belov'd. clear'd
    tyrannous, openly
    Proceed justice, due course,
    guilt purgation.
    Produce prisoner.
  OFFICER. Highness' pleasure Queen
    person court.

         Enter HERMIONE, trial, PAULINA, LADIES

    Silence!
  LEONTES. Read indictment.
  OFFICER.  [Reads]  'Hermione, Queen worthy Leontes, King of
    Sicilia, thou art accused arraigned high treason,  
    committing adultery Polixenes, King Bohemia; and
    conspiring Camillo life sovereign
    lord King, thy royal husband: pretence whereof by
    circumstances partly laid open, thou, Hermione, contrary the
    faith allegiance true subject, didst counsel aid them,
    safety, fly night.'
  HERMIONE. that
    contradicts accusation, and
    testimony part other
    myself, scarce boot me
    'Not guilty.' Mine integrity
    counted falsehood shall, express it,
    receiv'd. thus- pow'rs divine
    Behold human actions, do,
    doubt innocence make
    False accusation blush, tyranny
    Tremble patience. You, lord, know-
    so- past life
    Hath continent, chaste, true,
    unhappy;  
    history pattern, devis'd
    play'd spectators; behold me-
    fellow royal bed, owe
    moiety throne, great king's daughter,
    mother hopeful prince- standing
    prate talk life honour fore
    hear. life, prize it
    weigh grief, spare; honour,
    'Tis derivative mine,
    stand for. appeal
    conscience, sir, Polixenes
    court, grace,
    merited so; came,
    encounter uncurrent I
    strain'd t' thus; jot beyond
    bound honour, act will
    inclining, hard'ned hearts
    hear me, near'st kin
    Cry fie grave!
  LEONTES. ne'er heard  
    bolder vices wanted
    impudence gainsay did
    perform first.
  HERMIONE. true enough;
    'tis saying, sir, due me.
  LEONTES. it.
  HERMIONE. mistress of
    fault, not
    acknowledge. Polixenes,
    accus'd, confess
    lov'd honour requir'd;
    kind love become
    lady me; love such,
    other, commanded;
    done, me
    disobedience ingratitude
    friend; love spoke,
    speak, infant, freely,
    yours. conspiracy:
    tastes, dish'd  
    how; it
    Camillo honest man;
    left court, gods themselves,
    Wotting I, ignorant.
  LEONTES. knew departure, know
    underta'en in's absence.
  HERMIONE. Sir,
    speak language understand not.
    life stands level dreams,
    lay down.
  LEONTES. actions dreams.
    bastard Polixenes,
    dream'd it. past shame-
    fact so- past truth;
    deny concerns avails; as
    Thy brat hath cast out, itself,
    father owning it- indeed
    criminal thee it- thou
    Shalt feel justice; easiest passage
    death.  
  HERMIONE. Sir, spare threats.
    bug fright seek.
    life commodity.
    crown comfort life, favour,
    give lost, feel gone,
    went; joy
    fruits body, presence
    barr'd, infectious; comfort,
    Starr'd unluckily, breast-
    innocent milk innocent mouth-
    Hal'd murder; post
    Proclaim'd strumpet; immodest hatred
    child-bed privilege denied, 'longs
    women fashion; lastly, hurried
    place, i' th' open air, before
    strength limit. Now, liege,
    blessings alive
    fear die. proceed.
    hear this- mistake not: life,
    prize straw, mine honour  
    free- condemn'd
    surmises, proofs sleeping else
    jealousies awake, you
    'Tis rigour, law. honours all,
    refer oracle:
    Apollo judge!
  LORD. request
    altogether just. Therefore, bring forth,
    Apollo's name, oracle.
                                         Exeunt OFFICERS
  HERMIONE. Emperor Russia father;
    O alive, beholding
    daughter's trial! see
    flatness misery; eyes
    pity, revenge!

           Re-enter OFFICERS, CLEOMENES DION

  OFFICER. swear sword justice
    you, Cleomenes Dion,  
    Delphos, brought
    seal'd-up oracle, hand deliver'd
    great Apollo's priest; then
    dar'd break holy seal
    read secrets in't.
  CLEOMENES, DION. swear.
  LEONTES. Break seals read.
  OFFICER.  [Reads]  'Hermione chaste; Polixenes blameless;
    Camillo true subject; Leontes jealous tyrant; innocent
    babe begotten; King live heir, if
    lost found.'
  LORDS. blessed great Apollo!
  HERMIONE. Praised!
  LEONTES. Hast thou read truth?
  OFFICER. Ay, lord; so
    set down.
  LEONTES. truth i' th' oracle.
    sessions proceed. mere falsehood.

                        Enter SERVANT  

  SERVANT. lord King, King!
  LEONTES. business?
  SERVANT. O sir, hated report it:
    Prince son, mere conceit fear
    Queen's speed, gone.
  LEONTES. How! Gone?
  SERVANT. dead.
  LEONTES. Apollo's angry; heavens themselves
    strike injustice.                 [HERMIONE swoons]
    now, there!
  PAULINA. news mortal Queen. down
    death doing.
  LEONTES. hence.
    heart o'ercharg'd; recover.
    believ'd mine suspicion.
    Beseech tenderly apply her
    remedies life.
                         Exeunt PAULINA LADIES HERMIONE
    Apollo, pardon  
    great profaneness 'gainst thine oracle.
    reconcile Polixenes,
    woo queen, recall good Camillo-
    proclaim man truth, mercy.
    For, transported jealousies
    bloody thoughts revenge, chose
    Camillo minister poison
    friend Polixenes; done
    good mind Camillo tardied
    swift command, death with
    Reward threaten encourage him,
    done. He, humane
    fill'd honour, kingly guest
    Unclasp'd practice, quit fortunes here,
    knew great, hazard
    incertainties commended,
    richer honour. glisters
    rust! piety
    deeds make blacker!
  
                      Re-enter PAULINA

  PAULINA. Woe while!
    O, cut lace, heart, cracking it,
    Break too!
  LORD. fit this, good lady?
  PAULINA. studied torments, tyrant, hast me?
    wheels, racks, fires? flaying, boiling
    leads oils? newer torture
    receive, word deserves
    taste thy worst? Thy tyranny
    working thy jealousies,
    Fancies weak boys, green idle
    girls nine- O, done,
    run mad indeed, stark mad; all
    Thy by-gone fooleries spices it.
    thou betray'dst Polixenes, 'twas nothing;
    show thee, fool, inconstant,
    damnable ingrateful. was't much
    Thou wouldst poison'd good Camillo's honour,  
    kill king- poor trespasses,
    monstrous standing by; whereof reckon
    casting crows thy baby daughter
    little, devil
    shed water fire ere done't;
    is't directly laid thee, death
    young Prince, honourable thoughts-
    Thoughts high tender- cleft heart
    conceive gross foolish sire
    Blemish'd gracious dam. not, no,
    Laid thy answer; last- O lords,
    said, cry 'Woe!'- Queen, Queen,
    sweet'st, dear'st creature's dead; vengeance
    For't dropp'd yet.
  LORD. higher pow'rs forbid!
  PAULINA. dead; swear't. word oath
    Prevail not, see. bring
    Tincture lustre lip, eye,
    Heat outwardly breath within, serve you
    gods. But, O thou tyrant!  
    repent things, heavier
    thy woes stir; betake thee
    despair. thousand knees
    Ten thousand years together, naked, fasting,
    barren mountain, winter
    storm perpetual, move gods
    thou wert.
  LEONTES. on, on.
    Thou canst speak much; deserv'd
    tongues talk bitt'rest.
  LORD. more;
    Howe'er business goes, made fault
    I' th' boldness speech.
  PAULINA. for't.
    faults make, them.
    repent. Alas, show'd much
    rashness woman! touch'd
    th' noble heart. past help
    past grief. receive affliction
    petition; beseech you,  
    punish'd minded you
    forget. Now, good liege,
    Sir, royal sir, forgive foolish woman.
    love bore queen- lo, fool again!
    speak more, children;
    remember lord,
    lost too. patience you,
    nothing.
  LEONTES. Thou didst speak well
    truth; receive better
    pitied thee. Prithee, bring me
    dead bodies queen son.
    grave both. shall
    death appear, unto
    shame perpetual. day visit
    chapel lie; tears shed there
    recreation. long nature
    bear exercise, long
    daily vow it. Come, lead me
    sorrows.                                     Exeunt




SCENE III.
Bohemia. sea-coast

Enter ANTIGONUS CHILD, MARINER

  ANTIGONUS. Thou art perfect ship hath touch'd upon
    deserts Bohemia?
  MARINER. Ay, lord, fear
    landed ill time; skies grimly
    threaten present blusters. conscience,
    heavens hand angry
    frown 's.
  ANTIGONUS. sacred wills done! Go, aboard;
    thy bark. long before
    call thee.
  MARINER. Make haste; not
    i' th' land; 'tis loud weather;
    Besides, place famous creatures
    prey upon't.
  ANTIGONUS. thou away;
    follow instantly.
  MARINER. glad heart  
    rid o' th' business.                           Exit
  ANTIGONUS. Come, poor babe.
    heard, believ'd, spirits o' th' dead
    walk again. thing be, thy mother
    Appear'd night; ne'er dream
    waking. creature,
    head side another-
    vessel sorrow,
    fill'd becoming; pure white robes,
    sanctity, approach
    cabin lay; thrice bow'd me;
    And, gasping begin speech, eyes
    spouts; fury spent, anon
    break her: 'Good Antigonus,
    fate, thy disposition,
    Hath made thy person thrower-out
    poor babe, thine oath,
    Places remote Bohemia,
    weep, leave crying; and, babe
    counted lost ever, Perdita  
    prithee call't. ungentle business,
    Put thee lord, thou ne'er shalt see
    Thy wife Paulina more.' so, shrieks,
    melted air. Affrighted much,
    time collect myself, thought
    slumber. Dreams toys;
    Yet, once, yea, superstitiously,
    squar'd this. believe
    Hermione hath suffer'd death, that
    Apollo would, issue
    King Polixenes, laid,
    life death, earth
    father. Blossom, speed thee well!
                                         [Laying child]
    lie, thy character; these
                                          [Laying bundle]
    may, fortune please, breed thee, pretty,
    rest thine. storm begins. Poor wretch,
    thy mother's fault art expos'd
    loss follow! Weep cannot,  
    heart bleeds; accurs'd I
    oath enjoin'd this. Farewell!
    day frowns more. Thou'rt have
    lullaby rough; saw
    heavens dim day.  [Noise hunt within]  savage
      clamour!
    aboard! chase;
    ever.                  Exit, pursued bear

                      Enter SHEPHERD

  SHEPHERD. age ten and
    twenty, youth sleep rest; is
    wenches child, wronging
    ancientry, stealing, fighting-  [Horns]  Hark now! Would
    boil'd brains nineteen twenty hunt
    weather? scar'd sheep, I
    fear wolf sooner find master. I
    them, 'tis sea-side, browsing ivy. Good luck, an't
    thy will! here?  [Taking child]  Mercy  
    on's, barne! pretty barne. boy child, wonder? A
    pretty one; pretty one- sure, scape. not
    bookish, read waiting-gentlewoman scape. This
    stair-work, trunk-work, behind-door-work;
    warmer poor thing here. I'll
    pity; tarry till son come; halloo'd
    now. Whoa-ho-hoa!

                          Enter CLOWN

  CLOWN. Hilloa, loa!
  SHEPHERD. What, art near? thou'lt thing talk when
    thou art dead rotten, hither. ail'st thou, man?
  CLOWN. sights, sea land! am
    sea, sky; betwixt the
    firmament thrust bodkin's point.
  SHEPHERD. Why, boy, it?
  CLOWN. chafes, rages, it
    takes shore! point. O, most
    piteous cry poor souls! 'em,  
    'em; ship boring moon mainmast, anon
    swallowed yeast froth, thrust cork a
    hogshead. land service- bear tore
    shoulder-bone; cried help, his
    Antigonus, nobleman! make end ship-
    sea flap-dragon'd it; first, poor
    souls roared, sea mock'd them; poor gentleman
    roared, bear mock'd him, roaring louder sea
    weather.
  SHEPHERD. mercy, this, boy?
  CLOWN. Now, now; wink'd sights; the
    men cold water, bear half din'd the
    gentleman; now.
  SHEPHERD. help'd man!
  CLOWN. ship-side, help'd her;
    charity lack'd footing.
  SHEPHERD. Heavy matters, heavy matters! thee here, boy.
    bless thyself; thou met'st things dying, things
    new-born. sight thee; thee, bearing-cloth for
    squire's child! thee here; up, up, boy; open't.  
    So, see- told rich fairies.
    changeling. Open't. within, boy?
  CLOWN. made man; sins youth are
    forgiven you, live. Gold! gold!
  SHEPHERD. fairy gold, boy, 'twill prove so. with't,
    close. Home, home, way! lucky, boy; and
    requires secrecy. sheep go.
    Come, good boy, home.
  CLOWN. findings. the
    bear gentleman, hath eaten. They
    curst hungry. him
    left, bury it.
  SHEPHERD. good deed. thou mayest discern which
    left is, fetch th' sight him.
  CLOWN. Marry, I; put i' th' ground.
  SHEPHERD. 'Tis lucky day, boy; good deeds on't.
                                                          Exeunt
