ACT IV. SCENE I.

Enter TIME, CHORUS

  TIME. I, some, all, joy terror
    good bad, makes unfolds error,
    me, Time,
    wings. Impute crime
    swift passage slide
    O'er sixteen years, leave growth untried
    wide gap, pow'r
    o'erthrow law, self-born hour
    plant o'erwhelm custom. pass
    am, ere ancient'st order was
    receiv'd. witness to
    times brought in; do
    th' freshest things reigning, make stale
    glistering present, tale
    it. patience allowing,
    turn glass, give scene growing
    slept between. Leontes leaving-
    Th' effects fond jealousies grieving  
    shuts himself- imagine me,
    Gentle spectators, be
    fair Bohemia; remember well
    mention'd son o' th' King's, Florizel
    you; speed pace
    speak Perdita, grown grace
    Equal wond'ring. ensues
    list prophesy; Time's news
    'tis brought forth. shepherd's daughter,
    adheres, after,
    th' argument Time. allow,
    spent time worse ere now;
    never, Time doth say
    wishes earnestly may.                      Exit




SCENE II.
Bohemia. palace POLIXENES

Enter POLIXENES CAMILLO

  POLIXENES. pray thee, good Camillo, importunate: 'tis
    sickness denying thee anything; death grant this.
  CAMILLO. fifteen years country; have
    part aired abroad, desire lay bones
    there. Besides, penitent King, master, hath me;
    feeling sorrows allay, o'erween to
    so, spur departure.
  POLIXENES. thou lov'st me, Camillo, wipe rest thy
    services leaving now. thee thine own
    goodness hath made. thee want
    thee; thou, made businesses thee can
    sufficiently manage, stay execute thyself, or
    thee services thou hast done; I
    considered- cannot- more
    thankful thee study; profit the
    heaping friendships. fatal country Sicilia, prithee,
    speak more; naming punishes remembrance  
    penitent, thou call'st him, reconciled king, my
    brother; loss precious queen children are
    afresh lamented. me, saw'st thou the
    Prince Florizel, son? Kings unhappy, issue
    gracious, losing have
    approved virtues.
  CAMILLO. Sir, days Prince. his
    happier affairs unknown; missingly
    noted late retired court, frequent
    princely exercises hath appeared.
  POLIXENES. considered much, Camillo, care,
    eyes service his
    removedness; intelligence, is
    seldom house homely shepherd- man, say,
    nothing, imagination his
    neighbours, grown unspeakable estate.
  CAMILLO. heard, sir, man, hath daughter of
    rare note. report extended be
    thought begin cottage.
  POLIXENES. likewise part intelligence; but, fear,  
    angle plucks son thither. Thou shalt accompany the
    place; will, appearing are, some
    question shepherd; simplicity not
    uneasy son's resort thither. Prithee my
    present partner business, lay thoughts of
    Sicilia.
  CAMILLO. willingly obey command.
  POLIXENES. Camillo! disguise ourselves.
                                                          Exeunt




SCENE III.
Bohemia. road SHEPHERD'S cottage

Enter AUTOLYCUS, singing

      daffodils begin peer,
        heigh! doxy dale,
      Why, sweet o' year,
        red blood reigns winter's pale.

      white sheet bleaching hedge,
        heigh! sweet birds, O, sing!
      Doth set pugging tooth edge,
        quart ale dish king.

      lark, tirra-lirra chants,
        heigh! heigh! thrush jay,
      summer songs aunts,
        lie tumbling hay.

    serv'd Prince Florizel, time wore three-pile;
    service.  

      mourn that, dear?
        pale moon shines night;
      wander there,
        right.

      tinkers leave live,
        bear sow-skin budget,
      account give
        stocks avouch it.

    traffic sheets; kite builds, lesser linen.
    father nam'd Autolycus; who, being, am, litter'd under
    Mercury, likewise snapper-up unconsidered trifles. With
    die drab purchas'd caparison; revenue the
    silly-cheat. Gallows knock powerful highway;
    beating hanging terrors me; life come, I
    sleep thought it. prize! prize!

                            Enter CLOWN  

  CLOWN. see: 'leven wether tods; tod yields pound
    odd shilling; fifteen hundred shorn, wool to?
  AUTOLYCUS.  [Aside]  springe hold, cock's mine.
  CLOWN. 't counters. see: to
    buy sheep-shearing feast? pound sugar, five
    pound currants, rice- sister mine with
    rice? father hath made mistress feast, she
    lays on. hath made twenty nosegays the
    shearers- three-man song-men all, good ones; they
    means bases; Puritan them,
    sings psalms hornpipes. saffron colour
    warden pies; mace; dates- none, note;
    nutmegs, seven; race ginger, beg; four
    pound prunes, raisins o' th' sun.
  AUTOLYCUS.  [Grovelling ground]  O born!
  CLOWN. I' th' me!
  AUTOLYCUS. O, me, me! Pluck rags; then,
    death, death!
  CLOWN. Alack, poor soul! thou hast rags lay  
    thee, off.
  AUTOLYCUS. O sir, loathsomeness offend the
    stripes received, mighty millions.
  CLOWN. Alas, poor man! million beating great
    matter.
  AUTOLYCUS. robb'd, sir, beaten; money apparel ta'en
    me, detestable things put me.
  CLOWN. What, horseman footman?
  AUTOLYCUS. footman, sweet sir, footman.
  CLOWN. Indeed, footman, garments left
    thee; horseman's coat, hath hot
    service. Lend thy hand, thee. Come, lend thy
    hand.                                       [Helping up]
  AUTOLYCUS. O, good sir, tenderly, O!
  CLOWN. Alas, poor soul!
  AUTOLYCUS. O, good sir, softly, good sir; fear, sir, shoulder
    blade out.
  CLOWN. now! Canst stand?
  AUTOLYCUS. Softly, dear sir  [Picks pocket];  good sir, softly.
    ha' charitable office.  
  CLOWN. Dost lack money? money thee.
  AUTOLYCUS. No, good sweet sir; no, beseech you, sir. a
    kinsman past quarters mile hence, was
    going; money want. Offer no
    money, pray you; kills heart.
  CLOWN. manner fellow robb'd you?
  AUTOLYCUS. fellow, sir, with
    troll-my-dames; knew servant Prince. cannot
    tell, good sir, virtues was, was
    whipt court.
  CLOWN. vices, say; virtue whipt the
    court. cherish make stay there; no
    abide.
  AUTOLYCUS. Vices, say, sir. man well; hath
    ape-bearer; process-server, bailiff; then
    compass'd motion Prodigal Son, married tinker's
    wife mile land living lies; and, having
    flown knavish professions, settled rogue.
    call Autolycus.
  CLOWN. him! prig, life, prig! haunts wakes,  
    fairs, bear-baitings.
  AUTOLYCUS. true, sir; he, sir, he; rogue put
    apparel.
  CLOWN. cowardly rogue Bohemia; but
    look'd big spit him, run.
  AUTOLYCUS. confess you, sir, fighter; false
    heart way, knew, warrant him.
  CLOWN. now?
  AUTOLYCUS. Sweet sir, was; stand walk.
    leave pace softly my
    kinsman's.
  CLOWN. bring thee way?
  AUTOLYCUS. No, good-fac'd sir; no, sweet sir.
  CLOWN. fare thee well. buy spices our
    sheep-shearing.
  AUTOLYCUS. Prosper you, sweet sir!                  Exit CLOWN
    purse hot purchase spice. with
    sheep-shearing too. make cheat bring
    another, shearers prove sheep, unroll'd,
    put book virtue!  
                                                         [Sings]
            Jog on, jog on, footpath way,
              merrily hent stile-a;
            merry heart day,
              sad tires mile-a.                   Exit




SCENE IV.
Bohemia. SHEPHERD'S cottage

Enter FLORIZEL PERDITA

  FLORIZEL. unusual weeds part you
    give life- shepherdess, Flora
    Peering April's front. sheep-shearing
    meeting petty gods,
    Queen on't.
  PERDITA. Sir, gracious lord,
    chide extremes me-
    O, pardon them! high self,
    gracious mark o' th' land, obscur'd
    swain's wearing; me, poor lowly maid,
    goddess-like prank'd up. feasts
    mess folly, feeders
    Digest custom, blush
    attir'd; swoon, think,
    show glass.
  FLORIZEL. bless time
    good falcon made flight  
    Thy father's ground.
  PERDITA. Jove afford cause!
    difference forges dread; greatness
    Hath us'd fear. tremble
    father, accident,
    pass way, did. O, Fates!
    work, noble,
    Vilely bound up? say? how
    I, borrowed flaunts, behold
    sternness presence?
  FLORIZEL. Apprehend
    jollity. gods themselves,
    Humbling deities love, taken
    shapes beasts them: Jupiter
    bull bellow'd; green Neptune
    ram bleated; fire-rob'd god,
    Golden Apollo, poor humble swain,
    now. transformations
    piece beauty rarer,
    chaste, desires  
    Run mine honour, lusts
    Burn hotter faith.
  PERDITA. O, but, sir,
    resolution hold 'tis
    Oppos'd, be, th' pow'r King.
    necessities,
    speak, change purpose,
    life.
  FLORIZEL. Thou dearest Perdita,
    forc'd thoughts, prithee, darken not
    mirth o' th' feast. thine, fair,
    father's; be
    Mine own, any, if
    thine. constant,
    destiny no. merry, gentle;
    Strangle thoughts thing
    behold while. guests coming.
    Lift countenance, day
    celebration nuptial which
    sworn come.  
  PERDITA. O Lady Fortune,
    Stand auspicious!
  FLORIZEL. See, guests approach.
    Address entertain sprightly,
    red mirth.

        Enter SHEPHERD, POLIXENES CAMILLO, disguised;
                 CLOWN, MOPSA, DORCAS, OTHERS

  SHEPHERD. Fie, daughter! wife liv'd, upon
    day pantler, butler, cook;
    dame servant; welcom'd all; serv'd all;
    sing song dance turn; here
    upper end o' th' table, i' th' middle;
    shoulder, his; face o' fire
    labour, thing quench it
    sip. retired,
    feasted one, not
    hostess meeting. Pray bid
    unknown friends to's welcome,  
    make friends, known.
    Come, quench blushes, present yourself
    are, Mistress o' th' Feast. on,
    bid sheep-shearing,
    good flock prosper.
  PERDITA.  [To POLIXENES]  Sir, welcome.
    father's me
    hostess-ship o' th' day.  [To CAMILLO]
    welcome, sir.
    Give flow'rs there, Dorcas. Reverend sirs,
    rosemary rue; keep
    savour winter long.
    Grace remembrance both!
    shearing.
  POLIXENES. Shepherdess-
    fair you- fit ages
    flow'rs winter.
  PERDITA. Sir, year growing ancient,
    summer's death birth
    trembling winter, fairest flow'rs o' th' season  
    carnations streak'd gillyvors,
    call nature's bastards. kind
    rustic garden's barren; care not
    slips them.
  POLIXENES. Wherefore, gentle maiden,
    neglect them?
  PERDITA. heard said
    art piedness shares
    great creating nature.
  POLIXENES. be;
    nature made mean
    nature makes mean; art
    adds nature, art
    nature makes. see, sweet maid, marry
    gentler scion wildest stock,
    make conceive bark baser kind
    bud nobler race. art
    mend nature- change rather; but
    art nature.
  PERDITA. is.  
  POLIXENES. make garden rich gillyvors,
    call bastards.
  PERDITA. put
    dibble earth set slip them;
    painted wish
    youth 'twere well, therefore
    Desire breed me. flow'rs you:
    Hot lavender, mints, savory, marjoram;
    marigold, bed wi' th' sun,
    rises weeping; flow'rs
    middle summer, given
    men middle age. Y'are welcome.
  CAMILLO. leave grazing, flock,
    live gazing.
  PERDITA. Out, alas!
    lean blasts January
    blow through. Now, fair'st friend,
    flow'rs o' th' spring might
    time day- yours, yours,
    wear virgin branches  
    maidenheads growing. O Proserpina,
    flowers that, frighted, thou let'st fall
    Dis's waggon!- daffodils,
    swallow dares, take
    winds March beauty; violets, dim
    sweeter lids Juno's eyes
    Cytherea's breath; pale primroses,
    die unmarried ere behold
    Bright Phoebus strength- malady
    incident maids; bold oxlips, and
    crown-imperial; lilies kinds,
    flow'r-de-luce one. O, lack
    make garlands of, sweet friend
    strew o'er o'er!
  FLORIZEL. What, corse?
  PERDITA. No; bank love lie play on;
    corse; if- buried,
    quick, mine arms. Come, flow'rs.
    Methinks play do
    Whitsun pastorals. Sure, robe mine  
    change disposition.
  FLORIZEL. do
    betters done. speak, sweet,
    ever. sing,
    buy sell so; give alms;
    Pray so; and, ord'ring affairs,
    sing too. dance, you
    wave o' th' sea, do
    that; move still, so,
    function. doing,
    singular particular,
    Crowns present deeds,
    acts queens.
  PERDITA. O Doricles,
    praises large. youth,
    true blood peeps fairly through't,
    plainly give unstain'd shepherd,
    wisdom fear, Doricles,
    woo'd false way.
  FLORIZEL.  
    skill fear purpose
    put to't. But, come; dance, pray.
    hand, Perdita; turtles pair
    part.
  PERDITA. swear 'em.
  POLIXENES. prettiest low-born lass ever
    Ran green-sward; seems
    smacks greater herself,
    noble place.
  CAMILLO. tells something
    makes blood out. Good sooth, is
    queen curds cream.
  CLOWN. on, strike up.
  DORCAS. Mopsa mistress; marry, garlic,
    mend kissing with!
  MOPSA. Now, good time!
  CLOWN. word, word; stand manners.
    Come, strike up.                                     [Music]

          dance SHEPHERDS SHEPHERDESSES  

  POLIXENES. Pray, good shepherd, fair swain this
    dances daughter?
  SHEPHERD. call Doricles, boasts himself
    worthy feeding; it
    report, it:
    sooth. loves daughter;
    too; gaz'd moon
    water stand read,
    'twere daughter's eyes; and, plain,
    half kiss choose
    loves best.
  POLIXENES. dances featly.
  SHEPHERD. thing; report it
    silent. young Doricles
    light her, bring that
    dreams of.

                      Enter SERVANT
  
  SERVANT. O master, hear pedlar door, you
    dance tabor pipe; no, bagpipe
    move you. sings tunes faster you'll
    money; utters eaten ballads, men's
    ears grew tunes.
  CLOWN. better; in. love a
    ballad well, doleful matter merrily set
    down, pleasant thing sung lamentably.
  SERVANT. hath songs man woman sizes; milliner
    fit customers gloves. prettiest
    love-songs maids; bawdry, strange; with
    delicate burdens dildos fadings, 'jump thump
    her'; stretch-mouth'd rascal would, were,
    mischief, break foul gap matter, makes the
    maid answer 'Whoop, harm, good man'- puts off,
    slights him, 'Whoop, harm, good man.'
  POLIXENES. brave fellow.
  CLOWN. me, thou talkest admirable conceited fellow.
    unbraided wares?
  SERVANT. hath ribbons colours i' th' rainbow; points,  
    lawyers Bohemia learnedly handle, though
    th' gross; inkles, caddisses, cambrics,
    lawns. sings 'em gods goddesses; you
    smock she-angel, chants the
    sleeve-hand work square on't.
  CLOWN. Prithee bring in; approach singing.
  PERDITA. Forewarn scurrilous words in's tunes.
                                                    Exit SERVANT
  CLOWN. pedlars you'd
    think, sister.
  PERDITA. Ay, good brother, think.

                   Enter AUTOLYCUS, Singing

           Lawn white driven snow;
           Cypress black e'er crow;
           Gloves sweet damask roses;
           Masks faces noses;
           Bugle bracelet, necklace amber,
           Perfume lady's chamber;  
           Golden quoifs stomachers,
           lads give dears;
           Pins poking-sticks steel-
           maids lack head heel.
           Come, buy me, come; buy, buy;
           Buy, lads, lasses cry.
           Come, buy.

  CLOWN. love Mopsa, thou shouldst no
    money me; enthrall'd am, the
    bondage ribbons gloves.
  MOPSA. promis'd feast; too
    late now.
  DORCAS. hath promis'd that, liars.
  MOPSA. hath paid promis'd you. paid you
    more, shame give again.
  CLOWN. manners left maids? wear their
    plackets bear faces? not
    milking-time, bed, kiln-hole, whistle
    secrets, tittle-tattling  
    guests? 'Tis whisp'ring. Clammer tongues, and
    word more.
  MOPSA. done. Come, promis'd tawdry-lace, pair
    sweet gloves.
  CLOWN. told thee cozen'd way, lost
    money?
  AUTOLYCUS. indeed, sir, cozeners abroad; it
    behoves men wary.
  CLOWN. Fear thou, man; thou shalt lose here.
  AUTOLYCUS. hope so, sir; parcels of
    charge.
  CLOWN. hast here? Ballads?
  MOPSA. Pray now, buy some. love ballad print a-life, for
    true.
  AUTOLYCUS. doleful tune: usurer's wife
    brought bed twenty money-bags burden, she
    long'd eat adders' heads toads carbonado'd.
  MOPSA. true, you?
  AUTOLYCUS. true, month old.
  DORCAS. Bless marrying usurer!  
  AUTOLYCUS. midwife's to't, Mistress Taleporter,
    honest wives present. I
    carry lies abroad?
  MOPSA. Pray now, buy it.
  CLOWN. on, lay by; moe ballads; we'll
    buy things anon.
  AUTOLYCUS. ballad, fish appeared the
    coast Wednesday fourscore April, forty thousand fathom
    water, sung ballad hard hearts of
    maids. thought woman, turn'd cold
    fish exchange flesh lov'd her.
    ballad pitiful, true.
  DORCAS. true too, you?
  AUTOLYCUS. justices' hands it; witnesses my
    pack hold.
  CLOWN. Lay too. Another.
  AUTOLYCUS. merry ballad, pretty one.
  MOPSA. merry ones.
  AUTOLYCUS. Why, passing merry one, tune
    'Two maids wooing man.' scarce maid westward  
    sings it; 'tis request, you.
  MOPSA. sing it. thou'lt bear part, thou shalt hear;
    'tis parts.
  DORCAS. tune on't month ago.
  AUTOLYCUS. bear part; 'tis occupation.
    you.

                        SONG

  AUTOLYCUS. hence, go
             fits know.
  DORCAS.    Whither?
  MOPSA.       O, whither?
  DORCAS.        Whither?
  MOPSA.     thy oath full well
             Thou thy secrets tell.
  DORCAS.    too! thither
  MOPSA.     thou goest th' grange mill.
  DORCAS.    either, thou dost ill.
  AUTOLYCUS. Neither.  
  DORCAS.    What, neither?
  AUTOLYCUS. Neither.
  DORCAS.    Thou hast sworn love be.
  MOPSA.     Thou hast sworn me.
             goest? Say, whither?

  CLOWN. song anon ourselves; father and
    gentlemen sad talk, trouble them. Come,
    bring thy pack me. Wenches, buy both.
    Pedlar, choice. Follow me, girls.
                                      Exit DORCAS MOPSA
  AUTOLYCUS. pay 'em.
                                         Exit AUTOLYCUS, Singing

             buy tape,
             lace cape,
           dainty duck, dear-a?
             silk, thread,
             toys head,
           new'st fin'st, fin'st wear-a?  
             pedlar;
             Money's meddler
           doth utter men's ware-a.

                   Re-enter SERVANT

  SERVANT. Master, carters, shepherds, three
    neat-herds, swineherds, made men
    hair; call Saltiers, dance which
    wenches gallimaufry gambols, not
    in't; o' th' mind, rough
    bowling, please
    plentifully.
  SHEPHERD. Away! on't; homely
    foolery already. know, sir, weary you.
  POLIXENES. weary refresh us. Pray, these
    threes herdsmen.
  SERVANT. them, report, sir, hath danc'd
    King; worst jumps twelve
    foot half th' squier.  
  SHEPHERD. Leave prating; good men pleas'd, let
    in; quickly now.
  SERVANT. Why, stay door, sir.                     Exit

                    dance twelve SATYRS

  POLIXENES.  [To SHEPHERD]  O, father, that
      hereafter.
    [To CAMILLO]  gone? 'Tis time part them.
    simple tells much.  [To FLORIZEL]  now, fair
      shepherd!
    heart full take
    mind feasting. Sooth, young
    handed love do, wont
    load knacks; ransack'd
    pedlar's silken treasury pour'd it
    acceptance: go
    marted him. lass
    Interpretation abuse call this
    lack love bounty, straited  
    reply, make care
    happy holding her.
  FLORIZEL. sir, know
    prizes trifles are.
    gifts pack'd lock'd
    heart, already,
    deliver'd. O, hear breathe life
    ancient sir, whom, seem,
    Hath lov'd. thy hand- hand,
    soft dove's white it,
    Ethiopian's tooth, fann'd snow bolted
    th' northern blasts o'er.
  POLIXENES. this?
    prettily young swain wash
    hand fair before! put out.
    protestation; hear
    profess.
  FLORIZEL. Do, witness to't.
  POLIXENES. neighbour too?
  FLORIZEL. he,  
    he, men- earth, heavens, all:
    That, crown'd imperial monarch,
    Thereof worthy, fairest youth
    made eye swerve, force knowledge
    man's, prize them
    love; employ all;
    Commend condemn service
    perdition.
  POLIXENES. Fairly offer'd.
  CAMILLO. shows sound affection.
  SHEPHERD. But, daughter,
    him?
  PERDITA. speak
    well, well; no, better.
    th' pattern mine thoughts cut out
    purity his.
  SHEPHERD. hands, bargain!
    And, friends unknown, bear witness to't:
    give daughter him, make
    portion equal his.  
  FLORIZEL. O, be
    I' th' virtue daughter. dead,
    dream yet;
    wonder. on,
    Contract fore witnesses.
  SHEPHERD. Come, hand;
    And, daughter, yours.
  POLIXENES. Soft, swain, awhile, beseech you;
    father?
  FLORIZEL. have, him?
  POLIXENES. this?
  FLORIZEL. shall.
  POLIXENES. Methinks father
    nuptial son guest
    table. Pray you, more,
    father grown incapable
    reasonable affairs? stupid
    age alt'ring rheums? speak, hear,
    man man, dispute estate?
    Lies bed-rid,  
    childish?
  FLORIZEL. No, good sir;
    health, ampler strength indeed
    age.
  POLIXENES. white beard,
    offer him, so, wrong
    unfilial. Reason son
    choose wife; good reason
    father- joy else
    fair posterity- hold counsel
    business.
  FLORIZEL. yield this;
    But, reasons, grave sir,
    'tis fit know, acquaint
    father business.
  POLIXENES. know't.
  FLORIZEL. not.
  POLIXENES. Prithee him.
  FLORIZEL. No, not.
  SHEPHERD. him, son; grieve  
    knowing thy choice.
  FLORIZEL. Come, come, not.
    Mark contract.
  POLIXENES.  [Discovering himself]  Mark divorce, young sir,
    son dare call; thou art base
    acknowledg'd- thou sceptre's heir,
    affects sheep-hook! Thou, traitor,
    hanging thee but
    Shorten thy life week. thou, fresh piece
    excellent witchcraft, force know
    royal fool thou cop'st with-
  SHEPHERD. O, heart!
  POLIXENES. thy beauty scratch'd briers made
    homely thy state. thee, fond boy,
    thou dost sigh
    thou shalt knack- never
    thou shalt- bar thee succession;
    hold thee blood, no, kin,
    Farre Deucalion off. Mark thou words.
    Follow court. Thou churl, time,  
    full displeasure, free thee
    dead blow it. you, enchantment,
    Worthy herdsman- yea, too
    makes himself, honour therein,
    Unworthy thee- henceforth thou
    rural latches entrance open,
    hoop body thy embraces,
    devise death cruel thee
    thou art tender to't.                                Exit
  PERDITA. undone!
    afeard; twice
    speak plainly
    self-same sun shines court
    Hides visage cottage, but
    alike.  [To FLORIZEL]  Will't you, sir, gone?
    told this. Beseech you,
    state care. dream mine-
    awake, queen inch farther,
    milk ewes weep.
  CAMILLO. Why, now, father!  
    Speak ere thou diest.
  SHEPHERD. speak think,
    dare know.  [To FLORIZEL]  O sir,
    undone man fourscore-three
    thought fill grave quiet, yea,
    die bed father died,
    lie close honest bones; now
    hangman put shroud lay me
    priest shovels dust. [To PERDITA] O cursed wretch,
    knew'st Prince, wouldst adventure
    mingle faith him!- Undone, undone!
    die hour, liv'd
    die desire.                                   Exit
  FLORIZEL. me?
    sorry, afeard; delay'd,
    alt'red. was, am:
    straining plucking back; following
    leash unwillingly.
  CAMILLO. Gracious, lord,
    father's temper. time  
    speech- guess
    purpose him- hardly
    endure sight yet, fear;
    Then, till fury Highness settle,
    him.
  FLORIZEL. purpose it.
    Camillo?
  CAMILLO. he, lord.
  PERDITA. told 'twould thus!
    dignity last
    till 'twere known!
  FLORIZEL. fail by
    violation faith; then
    nature crush sides o' th' earth together
    mar seeds within! Lift thy looks.
    succession wipe me, father; I
    heir affection.
  CAMILLO. advis'd.
  FLORIZEL. am- fancy; reason
    thereto obedient, reason;  
    not, senses, pleas'd madness,
    bid welcome.
  CAMILLO. desperate, sir.
  FLORIZEL. call it; fulfil vow:
    honesty. Camillo,
    Bohemia, pomp may
    thereat glean'd, sun sees or
    close earth wombs, profound seas hides
    unknown fathoms, break oath
    fair belov'd. Therefore, pray you,
    father's honour'd friend,
    miss me- as, faith, not
    more- cast good counsels
    passion. Fortune
    Tug time come. know,
    deliver: put sea
    hold shore.
    opportune have
    vessel rides fast by, prepar'd
    design. hold  
    benefit knowledge, nor
    Concern reporting.
  CAMILLO. O lord,
    spirit easier advice.
    stronger need.
  FLORIZEL. Hark, Perdita.                     [Takes aside]
    [To CAMILLO]  hear by.
  CAMILLO. irremovable,
    Resolv'd flight. happy if
    frame serve turn,
    Save danger, love honour,
    Purchase sight dear Sicilia
    unhappy king, master, whom
    thirst see.
  FLORIZEL. Now, good Camillo,
    fraught curious business that
    leave ceremony.
  CAMILLO. Sir, think
    heard poor services i' th' love
    borne father?  
  FLORIZEL. nobly
    deserv'd. father's music
    speak deeds; care
    recompens'd thought on.
  CAMILLO. Well, lord,
    love King,
    nearest him, is
    gracious self, embrace direction.
    ponderous settled project
    suffer alteration, mine honour,
    point receiving
    Highness; may
    Enjoy mistress, whom, see,
    disjunction made by,
    heavens forfend! ruin- marry her;
    endeavours absence
    discontenting father strive qualify,
    bring liking.
  FLORIZEL. How, Camillo,
    this, miracle, done?  
    call thee man,
    trust thee.
  CAMILLO. thought on
    place whereto go?
  FLORIZEL. yet;
    th' unthought-on accident guilty
    wildly do, profess
    slaves chance flies
    wind blows.
  CAMILLO. list me.
    follows, change purpose
    undergo flight: make Sicilia,
    present fair princess-
    so, see, be- fore Leontes.
    habited becomes
    partner bed. Methinks see
    Leontes opening free arms weeping
    welcomes forth; asks thee 'Son, forgiveness!'
    'twere i' th' father's person; kisses hands
    fresh princess; o'er o'er divides  
    'Twixt unkindness kindness- th' one
    chides hell, bids grow
    Faster thought time.
  FLORIZEL. Worthy Camillo,
    colour visitation I
    Hold him?
  CAMILLO. King father
    greet give comforts. Sir,
    manner bearing him, with
    father deliver,
    Things betwixt three, write down;
    point sitting
    say, perceive
    father's bosom there
    speak heart.
  FLORIZEL. bound you.
    sap this.
  CAMILLO. promising
    wild dedication yourselves
    unpath'd waters, undream'd shores,  
    miseries enough; hope you,
    shake another;
    anchors, who
    office stay you
    loath be. Besides, know
    Prosperity's bond love,
    fresh complexion heart together
    Affliction alters.
  PERDITA. true:
    affliction subdue cheek,
    mind.
  CAMILLO. Yea, so?
    father's house years
    born such.
  FLORIZEL. good Camillo,
    forward breeding as
    i' th' rear o' birth.
  CAMILLO. 'tis pity
    lacks instructions, mistress
    teach.  
  PERDITA. pardon, sir; this
    blush thanks.
  FLORIZEL. prettiest Perdita!
    But, O, thorns stand upon! Camillo-
    Preserver father, me;
    medicine house- do?
    furnish'd Bohemia's son;
    Sicilia.
  CAMILLO. lord,
    Fear this. fortunes
    lie there. care
    royally appointed if
    scene play mine. instance, sir,
    want- word.
                                               [They talk aside]

                     Re-enter AUTOLYCUS

  AUTOLYCUS. Ha, ha! fool Honesty is! Trust, sworn
    brother, simple gentleman! sold trumpery;  
    counterfeit stone, ribbon, glass, pomander, brooch,
    table-book, ballad, knife, tape, glove, shoe-tie, bracelet,
    horn-ring, pack fasting. throng should
    buy first, trinkets hallowed brought a
    benediction buyer; means purse was
    picture; saw, good rememb'red. My
    clown, reasonable man, grew in
    love wenches' song stir pettitoes
    till tune words, drew rest the
    herd senses stuck ears. might
    pinch'd placket, senseless; 'twas geld a
    codpiece purse; fil'd keys hung in
    chains. hearing, feeling, sir's song, admiring
    it. time lethargy pick'd and
    cut festival purses; man come
    whoobub daughter King's son and
    scar'd choughs chaff, left purse alive in
    army.

              CAMILLO, FLORIZEL, PERDITA forward  

  CAMILLO. Nay, letters, means there
    arrive, clear doubt.
  FLORIZEL. procure King Leontes?
  CAMILLO. satisfy father.
  PERDITA. Happy you!
    speak shows fair.
  CAMILLO.  [seeing AUTOLYCUS]  here?
    make instrument this; omit
    give aid.
  AUTOLYCUS.  [Aside]  overheard now- why, hanging.
  CAMILLO. now, good fellow! shak'st thou so?
    Fear not, man; harm intended thee.
  AUTOLYCUS. poor fellow, sir.
  CAMILLO. Why, still; steal thee.
    thy poverty make exchange;
    discase thee instantly- thou a
    necessity in't- change garments gentleman. Though
    pennyworth side worst, hold thee, there's
    boot.  [Giving money]  
  AUTOLYCUS. poor fellow, sir.  [Aside]  ye well
    enough.
  CAMILLO. Nay, prithee dispatch. gentleman half flay'd
    already.
  AUTOLYCUS. camest, sir?  [Aside]  smell trick
    on't.
  FLORIZEL. Dispatch, prithee.
  AUTOLYCUS. Indeed, earnest; conscience
    it.
  CAMILLO. Unbuckle, unbuckle.

             FLORIZEL AUTOLYCUS exchange garments

    Fortunate mistress- prophecy
    home ye!- retire yourself
    covert; sweetheart's hat
    pluck o'er brows, muffle face,
    Dismantle you, and, can, disliken
    truth seeming, may-
    fear eyes over- shipboard  
    undescried.
  PERDITA. play lies
    bear part.
  CAMILLO. remedy.
    there?
  FLORIZEL. meet father,
    call son.
  CAMILLO. Nay, hat.
                                          [Giving PERDITA]
    Come, lady, come. Farewell, friend.
  AUTOLYCUS. Adieu, sir.
  FLORIZEL. O Perdita, twain forgot!
    Pray word.                       [They converse apart]
  CAMILLO.  [Aside]  King
    escape, bound;
    hope prevail
    force after; company
    re-view Sicilia, sight
    woman's longing.
  FLORIZEL. Fortune speed us!  
    set on, Camillo, th' sea-side.
  CAMILLO. swifter speed better.
                           Exeunt FLORIZEL, PERDITA, CAMILLO
  AUTOLYCUS. understand business, hear it. open
    ear, quick eye, nimble hand, a
    cut-purse; good nose requisite also, smell work for
    th' senses. time unjust man doth
    thrive. exchange boot! boot
    exchange! Sure, gods year connive
    us, extempore. Prince is
    piece iniquity- stealing father his
    clog heels. thought piece honesty to
    acquaint King withal, do't. hold more
    knavery conceal it; constant my
    profession.

                   Re-enter CLOWN SHEPHERD

    Aside, aside- matter hot brain. lane's
    end, shop, church, session, hanging, yields careful man  
    work.
  CLOWN. See, see; man now! but
    King changeling flesh and
    blood.
  SHEPHERD. Nay, hear me.
  CLOWN. Nay- hear me.
  SHEPHERD. to, then.
  CLOWN. flesh blood, flesh blood
    offended King; flesh blood to
    punish'd him. Show things found her, those
    secret things- her. done,
    law whistle; warrant you.
  SHEPHERD. King all, word- yea, son's
    pranks too; who, say, honest man, his
    father me, make King's
    brother-in-law.
  CLOWN. Indeed, brother-in-law farthest have
    him; blood dearer know
    ounce.
  AUTOLYCUS.  [Aside]  wisely, puppies!  
  SHEPHERD. Well, King. fardel
    make scratch beard.
  AUTOLYCUS.  [Aside]  impediment complaint may
    flight master.
  CLOWN. Pray heartily palace.
  AUTOLYCUS.  [Aside]  naturally honest, so
    chance. pocket pedlar's excrement.
    [Takes false beard]  now, rustics! you
    bound?
  SHEPHERD. th' palace, worship.
  AUTOLYCUS. affairs there, what, whom, condition of
    fardel, place dwelling, names, ages,
    having, breeding, fitting be
    known- discover.
  CLOWN. plain fellows, sir.
  AUTOLYCUS. lie: rough hairy. lying; it
    tradesmen, give soldiers the
    lie; pay stamped coin, stabbing
    steel; give lie.
  CLOWN. worship one,  
    manner.
  SHEPHERD. courtier, an't you, sir?
  AUTOLYCUS. no, courtier. Seest thou
    air court enfoldings? Hath gait in
    measure court? Receives thy nose court-odour
    me? Reflect thy baseness court-contempt? Think'st
    thou, insinuate, toaze thee thy business, I
    courtier? courtier cap-a-pe, that
    push pluck back thy business there; I
    command open thy affair.
  SHEPHERD. business, sir, King.
  AUTOLYCUS. advocate hast thou him?
  SHEPHERD. not, an't you.
  CLOWN. Advocate's court-word pheasant; none.
  SHEPHERD. None, sir; pheasant, cock hen.
  AUTOLYCUS. blessed simple men!
    nature made are,
    disdain.
  CLOWN. great courtier.
  SHEPHERD. garments rich, wears handsomely.  
  CLOWN. noble fantastical.
    great man, warrant; picking on's teeth.
  AUTOLYCUS. fardel there? i' th' fardel? Wherefore that
    box?
  SHEPHERD. Sir, lies secrets fardel box which
    King; this
    hour, th' speech him.
  AUTOLYCUS. Age, thou hast lost thy labour.
  SHEPHERD. Why, Sir?
  AUTOLYCUS. King palace; aboard new
    ship purge melancholy air himself; for, thou be'st
    capable things serious, thou King full of
    grief.
  SHEPHERD. 'tis said, sir- son, have
    married shepherd's daughter.
  AUTOLYCUS. shepherd hand-fast, fly; the
    curses have, tortures feel, break the
    back man, heart monster.
  CLOWN. so, sir?
  AUTOLYCUS. suffer wit make heavy  
    vengeance bitter; germane him, though
    remov'd fifty times, hangman- which,
    great pity, necessary. old
    sheep-whistling rogue, ram-tender, offer his
    daughter grace! ston'd; that
    death soft him, I. Draw throne a
    sheep-cote!- deaths few, sharpest easy.
  CLOWN. man e'er son, sir, hear, an't you,
    sir?
  AUTOLYCUS. son- flay'd alive; 'nointed
    honey, set head wasp's nest; stand
    till quarters dram dead; recover'd again
    aqua-vitae hot infusion; then, raw is,
    hottest day prognostication proclaims, set
    brick wall, sun southward eye upon
    him, behold flies blown death. But
    talk traitorly rascals, miseries be
    smil'd at, offences capital? me, seem
    honest plain men, King. Being
    gently consider'd, bring aboard,  
    tender persons presence, whisper behalfs;
    man King effect suits, here
    man it.
  CLOWN. great authority. Close him, give him
    gold; authority stubborn bear, oft led
    nose gold. Show inside purse the
    hand, ado. Remember- ston'd flay'd
    alive.
  SHEPHERD. An't you, sir, undertake business us,
    gold have. make more, leave
    young man pawn till bring you.
  AUTOLYCUS. promised?
  SHEPHERD. Ay, sir.
  AUTOLYCUS. Well, give moiety. party this
    business?
  CLOWN. sort, sir; case pitiful one, I
    hope flay'd it.
  AUTOLYCUS. O, case shepherd's son! Hang him,
    made example.
  CLOWN. Comfort, good comfort! King show  
    strange sights. 'tis daughter my
    sister; else. Sir, give this
    man does, business performed; remain, he
    says, pawn till brought you.
  AUTOLYCUS. trust you. Walk sea-side; on
    right-hand; hedge, follow you.
  CLOWN. blest man, say, blest.
  SHEPHERD. before, bids us. provided us
    good.                              Exeunt SHEPHERD CLOWN
  AUTOLYCUS. mind honest, Fortune not
    suffer me: drops booties mouth. courted a
    double occasion- gold, means Prince master
    good; turn back advancement? I
    bring moles, blind ones, aboard him. he
    fit shore again, complaint they
    King concerns nothing, call rogue for
    officious; proof title, and
    shame belongs to't. present them. There
    matter it.                                    Exit

ACT V. SCENE I.
Sicilia. palace LEONTES

Enter LEONTES, CLEOMENES, DION, PAULINA, OTHERS

  CLEOMENES. Sir, enough, perform'd
    saint-like sorrow. fault make
    redeem'd; indeed, paid down
    penitence trespass. last,
    heavens done: forget evil;
    forgive yourself.
  LEONTES. Whilst remember
    virtues, forget
    blemishes them, of
    wrong myself; much
    heirless hath made kingdom, and
    Destroy'd sweet'st companion e'er man
    Bred hopes of.
  PAULINA. True, true, lord.
    If, one, wedded world,
    good
    make perfect woman, kill'd  
    unparallel'd.
  LEONTES. so. Kill'd!
    kill'd! so; thou strik'st me
    Sorely, did. bitter
    thy tongue thought. Now, good now,
    seldom.
  CLEOMENES. all, good lady.
    spoken thousand things would
    time benefit, grac'd
    kindness better.
  PAULINA. those
    wed again.
  DION. so,
    pity state, remembrance
    sovereign name; little
    dangers, Highness' fail issue,
    drop kingdom devour
    Incertain lookers-on. holy
    rejoice queen well?
    holier than, royalty's repair,  
    present comfort, future good,
    bless bed majesty again
    sweet fellow to't?
  PAULINA. worthy,
    Respecting gone. Besides, gods
    fulfill'd secret purposes;
    divine Apollo said,
    Is't tenour oracle,
    King Leontes heir
    Till lost child found? shall,
    monstrous human reason
    Antigonus break grave
    me; who, life,
    perish infant. 'Tis counsel
    lord heavens contrary,
    Oppose wills.  [To LEONTES]  Care issue;
    crown find heir. Great Alexander
    Left th' worthiest; successor
    best.
  LEONTES. Good Paulina,  
    hast memory Hermione,
    know, honour, O I
    squar'd thy counsel! Then, now,
    look'd queen's full eyes,
    treasure lips-
  PAULINA. left them
    rich yielded.
  LEONTES. Thou speak'st truth.
    wives; therefore, wife. worse,
    us'd, make sainted spirit
    possess corpse, stage,
    offend now, soul-vex'd,
    begin 'Why me'-
  PAULINA. power,
    cause.
  LEONTES. had; incense me
    murder married.
  PAULINA. so.
    ghost walk'd, bid mark
    eye, dull part in't  
    chose her; shriek, ears
    rift hear me; words follow'd
    'Remember mine.'
  LEONTES. Stars, stars,
    eyes dead coals! Fear thou wife;
    wife, Paulina.
  PAULINA. swear
    marry free leave?
  LEONTES. Never, Paulina; blest spirit!
  PAULINA. Then, good lords, bear witness oath.
  CLEOMENES. tempt over-much.
  PAULINA. another,
    Hermione picture,
    Affront eye.
  CLEOMENES. Good madam-
  PAULINA. done.
    Yet, lord marry- will, sir,
    remedy will- give office
    choose queen. young
    former;  
    As, walk'd queen's ghost, joy
    arms.
  LEONTES. true Paulina,
    marry till thou bid'st us.
  PAULINA. That
    queen's breath;
    till then.

                       Enter GENTLEMAN

  GENTLEMAN. Prince Florizel,
    Son Polixenes, princess- she
    fairest beheld- desires access
    high presence.
  LEONTES. him? not
    father's greatness. approach,
    circumstance sudden, tells us
    'Tis visitation fram'd, forc'd
    accident. train?
  GENTLEMAN. few,  
    mean.
  LEONTES. princess, you, him?
  GENTLEMAN. Ay; peerless piece earth, think,
    e'er sun shone bright on.
  PAULINA. O Hermione,
    present time doth boast itself
    gone, thy grave
    Give now! Sir, yourself
    writ so, writing now
    colder theme: 'She been,
    equall'd.' verse
    Flow'd beauty once; 'tis shrewdly ebb'd,
    better.
  GENTLEMAN. Pardon, madam.
    forgot- pardon;
    other, obtain'd eye,
    tongue too. creature,
    begin sect, quench zeal
    professors else, make proselytes
    bid follow.  
  PAULINA. How! women?
  GENTLEMAN. Women love woman
    worth man; men, is
    rarest women.
  LEONTES. Go, Cleomenes;
    Yourself, assisted honour'd friends,
    Bring embracement.                        Exeunt
    Still, 'tis strange
    steal us.
  PAULINA. prince,
    Jewel children, hour, pair'd
    lord; full month
    births.
  LEONTES. Prithee more; cease. Thou know'st
    dies talk'd of. Sure,
    gentleman, thy speeches
    bring may
    Unfurnish reason.

         Re-enter CLEOMENES, FLORIZEL, PERDITA,  
                            ATTENDANTS

    come.
    mother true wedlock, Prince;
    print royal father off,
    Conceiving you. twenty-one,
    father's image hit you
    air, call brother,
    him, speak wildly
    perform'd before. dearly welcome!
    fair princess- goddess! O, alas!
    lost couple 'twixt heaven earth
    stood begetting as
    You, gracious couple, do. lost-
    mine folly- society,
    Amity too, brave father, whom,
    bearing misery, desire life
    him.
  FLORIZEL. command
    touch'd Sicilia,  
    Give king, friend,
    send brother; and, infirmity,
    waits worn times, hath seiz'd
    wish'd ability, himself
    lands waters 'twixt throne his
    Measur'd, you; loves,
    bade so, sceptres
    bear living.
  LEONTES. O brother-
    Good gentleman!- wrongs thee stir
    Afresh me; thy offices,
    rarely kind, interpreters
    behind-hand slackness! hither,
    spring th' earth. hath too
    Expos'd paragon th' fearful usage,
    ungentle, dreadful Neptune,
    greet man worth pains, less
    Th' adventure person?
  FLORIZEL. Good, lord,
    Libya.  
  LEONTES. warlike Smalus,
    noble honour'd lord, fear'd lov'd?
  FLORIZEL. royal sir, thence; daughter
    tears proclaim'd his, parting her; thence,
    prosperous south-wind friendly, cross'd,
    execute charge father gave me
    visiting Highness. train
    Sicilian shores dismiss'd;
    Bohemia bend, signify
    success Libya, sir,
    arrival wife's safety
    are.
  LEONTES. blessed gods
    Purge infection air whilst you
    climate here! holy father,
    graceful gentleman, person,
    sacred is, sin,
    heavens, taking angry note,
    left issueless; father's blest,
    heaven merits it, you,  
    Worthy goodness. been,
    son daughter look'd on,
    goodly things you!

                      Enter LORD

  LORD. noble sir,
    report bear credit,
    proof nigh. you, great sir,
    Bohemia greets me;
    Desires attach son, has-
    dignity duty cast off-
    Fled father, hopes, with
    shepherd's daughter.
  LEONTES. Bohemia? Speak.
  LORD. city; him.
    speak amazedly; becomes
    marvel message. court
    Whiles hast'ning- chase, seems,
    fair couple- meets  
    father lady and
    brother, country quitted
    young prince.
  FLORIZEL. Camillo betray'd me;
    honour honesty till now
    Endur'd weathers.
  LORD. Lay't charge;
    King father.
  LEONTES. Who? Camillo?
  LORD. Camillo, sir; spake him; now
    poor men question. I
    Wretches quake. kneel, kiss earth;
    Forswear speak.
    Bohemia stops ears, threatens them
    divers deaths death.
  PERDITA. O poor father!
    heaven sets spies us, have
    contract celebrated.
  LEONTES. married?
  FLORIZEL. not, sir, be;  
    stars, see, kiss valleys first.
    odds high low's alike.
  LEONTES. lord,
    daughter king?
  FLORIZEL. is,
    wife.
  LEONTES. 'once,' good father's speed,
    slowly. sorry,
    sorry, broken liking
    tied duty; sorry
    choice rich worth beauty,
    enjoy her.
  FLORIZEL. Dear, up.
    Fortune, visible enemy,
    chase father, pow'r jot
    Hath change loves. Beseech you, sir,
    Remember ow'd time
    now. thought affections,
    Step mine advocate; request
    father grant precious things trifles.  
  LEONTES. so, beg precious mistress,
    counts trifle.
  PAULINA. Sir, liege,
    eye hath youth in't. month
    Fore queen died, worth gazes
    now.
  LEONTES. thought her
    made.  [To FLORIZEL]  petition
    unanswer'd. father.
    honour o'erthrown desires,
    friend you. errand
    him; therefore, follow me,
    mark make. Come, good lord.         Exeunt




SCENE II.
Sicilia. palace LEONTES

Enter AUTOLYCUS GENTLEMAN

  AUTOLYCUS. Beseech you, sir, present relation?
  GENTLEMAN. opening fardel, heard the
    shepherd deliver manner found it; whereupon, after
    amazedness, commanded chamber;
    this, methought heard shepherd found child.
  AUTOLYCUS. gladly issue it.
  GENTLEMAN. make broken delivery business; the
    perceived King Camillo notes of
    admiration. seem'd almost, staring another, to
    tear cases eyes; speech dumbness,
    language gesture; look'd heard of
    world ransom'd, destroyed. notable passion wonder
    appeared them; wisest beholder knew but
    th' importance joy sorrow- in
    extremity be.

                    Enter GENTLEMAN  

    gentleman happily more. news, Rogero?
  GENTLEMAN. bonfires. oracle fulfill'd:
    King's daughter found. deal broken out
    hour ballad-makers express it.

                    Enter GENTLEMAN

    Lady Paulina's steward; deliver more.
    now, sir? news, call'd true, like
    tale verity strong suspicion. the
    King found heir?
  GENTLEMAN. true, truth pregnant by
    circumstance. hear swear see, is
    unity proofs. mantle Queen Hermione's; her
    jewel neck it; letters Antigonus found with
    it, character; majesty the
    creature resemblance mother; affection nobleness
    nature shows breeding; evidences-
    proclaim certainty King's daughter.  
    meeting kings?
  GENTLEMAN. No.
  GENTLEMAN. lost sight seen,
    spoken of. beheld joy crown
    another, manner seem'd sorrow wept take
    leave them; joy waded tears. casting up
    eyes, holding hands, countenance such
    distraction garment, favour.
    king, ready leap joy found
    daughter, joy loss, cries 'O, thy
    mother, thy mother!' asks Bohemia forgiveness; embraces
    son-in-law; worries daughter clipping
    her. shepherd, stands a
    weather-bitten conduit kings' reigns. heard of
    encounter, lames report follow and
    undoes description it.
  GENTLEMAN. What, pray you, Antigonus, carried
    child?
  GENTLEMAN. tale still, matter to
    rehearse, credit asleep ear open:  
    torn pieces bear. avouches shepherd's son, who
    innocence, much, justify him, but
    handkerchief rings Paulina knows.
  GENTLEMAN. bark followers?
  GENTLEMAN. Wreck'd instant master's death,
    view shepherd; instruments
    aided expose child lost was
    found. But, O, noble combat 'twixt joy sorrow was
    fought Paulina! eye declin'd loss her
    husband, elevated oracle fulfill'd. She
    lifted Princess earth, locks embracing
    pin heart, be
    danger losing.
  GENTLEMAN. dignity act worth audience of
    kings princes; acted.
  GENTLEMAN. prettiest touches all, that
    angl'd mine eyes- caught water, the
    fish- was, relation Queen's death, the
    manner to't bravely confess'd lamented the
    King, attentivenes wounded daughter; till, sign  
    dolour another, 'Alas!'- fain say-
    bleed tears; heart wept blood. most
    marble changed colour; swooned, sorrowed. all
    world seen't, woe universal.
  GENTLEMAN. returned court?
  GENTLEMAN. No. Princess hearing mother's statue,
    keeping Paulina- piece years doing
    newly perform'd rare Italian master, Julio
    Romano, who, eternity put breath into
    work, beguile nature custom, perfectly is
    ape. Hermione hath Hermione say
    speak stand hope answer- thither with
    greediness affection gone, intend
    sup.
  GENTLEMAN. thought great matter in
    hand; hath privately thrice day, since
    death Hermione, visited removed house. we
    thither, company piece rejoicing?
  GENTLEMAN. benefit of
    access? wink eye grace born.  
    absence makes unthrifty knowledge. along.
                                                Exeunt GENTLEMEN
  AUTOLYCUS. Now, dash life me, would
    preferment drop head. brought man son
    aboard Prince; told heard talk fardel I
    what; time over-fond shepherd's
    daughter- be- began much
    sea-sick, better, extremity weather
    continuing, mystery remained undiscover'd. 'tis one
    me; finder-out secret, not
    relish'd discredits.

                    Enter SHEPHERD CLOWN

    good will, already
    appearing blossoms fortune.
  SHEPHERD. Come, boy; past moe children, thy sons and
    daughters gentlemen born.
  CLOWN. met, sir. denied fight this
    day, gentleman born.  
    clothes? gentleman
    born. robes gentlemen born. Give
    lie, do; gentleman born.
  AUTOLYCUS. now, sir, gentleman born.
  CLOWN. Ay, time hours.
  SHEPHERD. I, boy.
  CLOWN. have; gentleman born father;
    King's son hand call'd brother; and
    kings call'd father brother; Prince,
    brother, Princess, sister, call'd father father.
    wept; gentleman-like tears that
    shed.
  SHEPHERD. live, son, shed more.
  CLOWN. Ay; 'twere hard luck, preposterous
    estate are.
  AUTOLYCUS. humbly beseech you, sir, pardon faults I
    committed worship, give good report
    Prince master.
  SHEPHERD. Prithee, son, do; gentle, are
    gentlemen.  
  CLOWN. Thou wilt amend thy life?
  AUTOLYCUS. Ay, good worship.
  CLOWN. Give thy hand. swear Prince thou art as
    honest true fellow Bohemia.
  SHEPHERD. it, swear it.
  CLOWN. swear it, gentleman? boors franklins
    it: swear it.
  SHEPHERD. false, son?
  CLOWN. ne'er false, true gentleman swear in
    behalf friend. swear Prince thou art a
    tall fellow thy hands thou wilt drunk; I
    thou art tall fellow thy hands thou wilt be
    drunk. swear it; thou wouldst tall
    fellow thy hands.
  AUTOLYCUS. prove so, sir, power.
  CLOWN. Ay, means, prove tall fellow. wonder
    thou dar'st venture drunk tall fellow,
    trust not. Hark! kings princes, kindred, are
    Queen's picture. Come, follow us; thy
    good masters.                                         Exeunt




SCENE III.
Sicilia. chapel PAULINA's house

Enter LEONTES, POLIXENES, FLORIZEL, PERDITA, CAMILLO, PAULINA,
LORDS ATTENDANTS

  LEONTES. O grave good Paulina, great comfort
    thee!
  PAULINA. What, sovereign sir,
    well, meant well. services
    paid home; vouchsaf'd,
    crown'd brother contracted
    Heirs kingdoms, poor house visit,
    surplus grace, never
    life answer.
  LEONTES. O Paulina,
    honour trouble; came
    statue queen. gallery
    pass'd through, content
    singularities; not
    daughter upon,
    statue mother.  
  PAULINA. liv'd peerless,
    dead likeness, believe,
    Excels look'd upon
    hand man hath done; it
    Lonely, apart. is. Prepare
    life lively mock'd ever
    sleep mock'd death. Behold; 'tis well.
                [PAULINA draws curtain, discovers HERMIONE
                                         standing statue]
    silence; shows off
    wonder; speak. First, you, liege.
    near?
  LEONTES. natural posture!
    Chide me, dear stone, indeed
    Thou art Hermione; rather, thou art she
    thy chiding; tender
    infancy grace. yet, Paulina,
    Hermione wrinkled, nothing
    aged seems.
  POLIXENES. O, much!  
  PAULINA. carver's excellence,
    lets sixteen years makes her
    liv'd now.
  LEONTES. done,
    good comfort is
    piercing soul. O, stood,
    life majesty- warm life,
    coldly stands- woo'd her!
    asham'd. stone rebuke me
    stone it? O royal piece,
    magic thy majesty, has
    evils conjur'd remembrance, and
    thy admiring daughter spirits,
    Standing stone thee!
  PERDITA. give leave,
    'tis superstition that
    kneel, implore blessing. Lady,
    Dear queen, ended began,
    Give hand kiss.
  PAULINA. O, patience!  
    statue newly fix'd, colour's
    dry.
  CAMILLO. lord, sorrow sore laid on,
    sixteen winters blow away,
    summers dry. Scarce joy
    long live; sorrow
    kill'd sooner.
  POLIXENES. Dear brother,
    pow'r
    grief he
    piece himself.
  PAULINA. Indeed, lord,
    thought sight poor image
    wrought you- stone mine-
    show'd it.
  LEONTES. draw curtain.
  PAULINA. longer gaze on't, fancy
    anon moves.
  LEONTES. be, be.
    dead, methinks already-  
    make it? See, lord,
    deem breath'd, veins
    verily bear blood?
  POLIXENES. Masterly done!
    life warm lip.
  LEONTES. fixture eye motion in't,
    mock'd art.
  PAULINA. draw curtain.
    lord's transported that
    anon lives.
  LEONTES. O sweet Paulina,
    Make twenty years together!
    settled senses world match
    pleasure madness. 't alone.
  PAULINA. sorry, sir, stirr'd you; but
    afflict farther.
  LEONTES. Do, Paulina;
    affliction taste sweet
    cordial comfort. Still, methinks,
    air her. fine chisel  
    cut breath? man mock me,
    kiss her.
  PAULINA. Good lord, forbear.
    ruddiness lip wet;
    mar kiss it; stain own
    oily painting. draw curtain?
  LEONTES. No, twenty years.
  PERDITA. long I
    Stand by, looker-on.
  PAULINA. forbear,
    Quit presently chapel, resolve you
    amazement. behold it,
    make statue move indeed, descend,
    hand, think-
    protest against- assisted
    wicked powers.
  LEONTES. make do
    content on; speak
    content hear; 'tis easy
    make speak move.  
  PAULINA. requir'd
    awake faith. stand still;
    unlawful business
    about, depart.
  LEONTES. Proceed.
    foot stir.
  PAULINA. Music, awake her: strike.                     [Music]
    'Tis time; descend; stone more; approach;
    Strike marvel. Come;
    fill grave up. Stir; nay, away.
    Bequeath death numbness, him
    Dear life redeems you. perceive stirs.
                         [HERMIONE pedestal]
    Start not; actions holy as
    hear spell lawful. shun her
    die again; then
    kill double. Nay, present hand.
    young woo'd her; age
    suitor?
  LEONTES. O, warm!  
    magic, art
    Lawful eating.
  POLIXENES. embraces him.
  CAMILLO. hangs neck.
    pertain life, speak too.
  POLIXENES. Ay, make manifest liv'd,
    stol'n dead.
  PAULINA. living,
    told you, hooted at
    tale; appears lives
    speak not. Mark while.
    interpose, fair madam. Kneel,
    pray mother's blessing. Turn, good lady;
    Perdita found.
  HERMIONE. gods, down,
    sacred vials pour graces
    daughter's head! me, mine own,
    hast thou preserv'd? liv'd? found
    Thy father's court? thou shalt hear I,
    Knowing Paulina oracle  
    Gave hope thou wast being, preserv'd
    issue.
  PAULINA. time that,
    desire push trouble
    joys relation. together,
    precious winners all; exultation
    Partake one. I, turtle,
    wing wither'd bough, there
    mate, found again,
    Lament till lost.
  LEONTES. O peace, Paulina!
    Thou shouldst husband consent,
    thine wife. match,
    made between's vows. Thou hast found mine;
    how, question'd; her,
    thought, dead; have, vain, many
    prayer grave. seek far-
    him, partly mind- find thee
    honourable husband. Come, Camillo,
    hand worth honesty  
    richly noted, justified
    us, pair kings. place.
    What! brother. pardons,
    e'er put holy looks
    ill suspicion. son-in-law,
    son King, heavens directing,
    troth-plight daughter. Good Paulina,
    Lead leisurely
    demand answer part
    Perform'd wide gap time first
    dissever'd. Hastily lead away.                Exeunt

THE END

1609

A LOVER'S COMPLAINT

by William Shakespeare



  hill concave womb reworded
  plaintful story sist'ring vale,
  spirits t'attend double voice accorded,
  laid list sad-tuned tale,
  Ere long espied fickle maid full pale,
  Tearing papers, breaking rings atwain,
  Storming world sorrow's wind rain.

  head platted hive straw,
  fortified visage sun,
  Whereon thought saw
  carcase beauty spent done.
  Time scythed youth begun,
  youth quit, spite heaven's fell rage
  beauty peeped lattice seared age.

  Oft heave napkin eyne,
  conceited characters,
  Laund'ring silken figures brine
  seasoned woe pelleted tears,
  reading contents bears;  
  shrieking undistinguished woe,
  clamours size, high low.

  levelled eyes carriage ride,
  batt'ry spheres intend;
  diverted poor balls tied
  th' orbed earth; extend
  view on; anon gazes lend
  place once, fixed,
  mind sight distractedly commixed.

  hair, loose tied formal plat,
  Proclaimed careless hand pride;
  some, untucked, descended sheaved hat,
  Hanging pale pined cheek beside;
  threaden fillet bide,
  And, true bondage, break thence,
  slackly braided loose negligence.

  thousand favours maund drew  
  amber, crystal, beaded jet,
  river threw,
  weeping margent set;
  usury applying wet wet,
  monarchs' hands lets bounty fall
  cries some, excess begs all.

  folded schedules one,
  perused, sighed, tore, gave flood;
  Cracked ring posied gold bone,
  Bidding find sepulchres mud;
  Found moe letters sadly penned blood,
  sleided silk feat affectedly
  Enswathed sealed curious secrecy.

  bathed fluxive eyes,
  kissed, 'gan tear;
  Cried, 'O false blood, thou register lies,
  unapproved witness dost thou bear!
  Ink black damned here!  
  said, top rage lines rents,
  Big discontents breaking contents.

  reverend man grazed cattle nigh,
  blusterer ruffle knew
  court, city, by
  swiftest hours observed flew,
  afflicted fancy fastly drew;
  And, privileged age, desires know
  grounds motives woe.

  slides grained bat,
  comely distant sits side;
  desires her, sat,
  grievance hearing divide.
  aught applied
  suffering ecstasy assuage,
  'Tis promised charity age.

  'Father,' says, 'though behold  
  injury blasting hour,
  judgement old:
  age, sorrow, hath power.
  spreading flower,
  Fresh myself, self-applied
  Love myself, love beside.

  'But woe me! early attended
  youthful suit- gain grace-
  O, nature's outwards commended
  maidens' eyes stuck face.
  Love lacked dwelling made place;
  fair parts abide,
  lodged newly deified.

  'His browny locks hang crooked curls;
  light occasion wind
  lips silken parcels hurls.
  sweet do, aptly find:
  eye enchant mind;  
  visage drawn
  largeness thinks Paradise sawn.

  'Small show man chin;
  phoenix began appear,
  unshorn velvet, termless skin,
  bare out-bragged web wear:
  showed visage cost dear;
  nice affections wavering stood doubt
  was, without.

  'His qualities beauteous form,
  maiden-tongued was, thereof free;
  men moved him, storm
  oft 'twixt April see,
  winds breathe sweet, unruly be.
  rudeness authorized youth
  livery falseness pride truth.

  'Well ride, men say,  
  "That horse mettle rider takes:
  Proud subjection, noble sway,
  rounds, bounds, course, stop makes!"
  controversy question takes
  horse deed,
  manage th' well-doing steed.

  'But quickly side verdict went:
  real habitude gave life grace
  appertainings ornament,
  Accomplished himself, case,
  aids, made fairer place,
  additions; purposed trim
  Pierced grace, graced him.

  'So tip subduing tongue
  kind arguments question deep,
  replication prompt, reason strong,
  advantage wake sleep.
  make weeper laugh, laugher weep,  
  dialect skill,
  Catching passions craft will,

  'That general bosom reign
  young, old, sexes enchanted,
  dwell thoughts, remain
  personal duty, haunted.
  Consents bewitched, ere desire, granted,
  dialogued say,
  Asked wills, made wills obey.

  'Many picture get,
  serve eyes, put mind;
  fools th' imagination set
  goodly objects abroad find
  lands mansions, thought assigned;
  labouring moe pleasures bestow them
  true gouty landlord doth owe them.

  'So have, touched hand,  
  Sweetly supposed mistress heart.
  woeful self, freedom stand,
  fee-simple, part,
  art youth, youth art,
  Threw affections charmed power
  Reserved stalk gave flower.

  'Yet not, equals did,
  Demand him, desired yielded;
  Finding honour forbid,
  safest distance mine honour shielded.
  Experience bulwarks builded
  proofs new-bleeding, remained foil
  false jewel, amorous spoil.

  'But ah, shunned precedent
  destined ill assay?
  forced examples, 'gainst content,
  put by-past perils way?
  Counsel stop awhile stay;  
  rage, advice seen
  blunting make wills keen.

  'Nor satisfaction blood
  curb others' proof,
  forbod sweets good
  fear harms preach behoof.
  O appetite, judgement stand aloof!
  palate hath taste,
  Reason weep, cry thy last.

  'For man's untrue,
  knew patterns foul beguiling;
  Heard plants others' orchards grew;
  deceits gilded smiling;
  Knew vows brokers defiling;
  Thought characters words art,
  bastards foul adulterate heart.

  'And long terms held city,  
  Till 'gan besiege me: "Gentle maid,
  suffering youth feeling pity,
  holy vows afraid.
  ye sworn said;
  feasts love called unto,
  Till ne'er invite woo.

  '"All offences abroad see
  errors blood, mind;
  Love made not; acture be,
  party true kind.
  sought shame shame find;
  shame remains
  reproach contains.

  '"Among mine eyes seen,
  flame heart warmed,
  affection put th' smallest teen,
  leisures charmed.
  Harm them, ne'er harmed;  
  hearts liveries, mine free,
  reigned commanding monarchy.

  '"Look tributes wounded fancies me,
  paled pearls rubies red blood;
  Figuring passions likewise lent me
  grief blushes, aptly understood
  bloodless white encrimsoned mood-
  Effects terror dear modesty,
  Encamped hearts, fighting outwardly.

  '"And, lo, behold talents hair,
  twisted metal amorously empleached,
  receiv'd fair,
  kind acceptance weepingly beseeched,
  annexions fair gems enriched,
  deep-brained sonnets amplify
  stone's dear nature, worth, quality.

  '"The diamond? why, 'twas beautiful hard,  
  Whereto invised properties tend;
  deep-green em'rald, fresh regard
  Weak sights sickly radiance amend;
  heaven-hued sapphire opal blend
  objects manifold; stone,
  wit blazoned, smiled, made moan.

  '"Lo, trophies affections hot,
  pensived subdued desires tender,
  Nature hath charged hoard not,
  yield render-
  is, you, origin ender;
  these, force, oblations be,
  altar, enpatron me.

  '"O advance phraseless hand
  white weighs airy scale praise;
  similes command,
  Hallowed sighs burning lungs raise;
  minister obeys  
  Works you; audit comes
  distract parcels combined sums.

  '"Lo, device nun,
  sister sanctified, holiest note,
  late noble suit court shun,
  rarest havings made blossoms dote;
  sought spirits richest coat,
  cold distance, remove
  spend living eternal love.

  '"But, O sweet, labour is't leave
  thing not, mast'ring strives,
  Playing place form receive,
  Playing patient sports unconstrained gyves!
  fame contrives,
  scars battle scapeth flight,
  makes absence valiant, might.

  '"O pardon boast true!  
  accident brought eye
  moment force subdue,
  caged cloister fly.
  Religious love put religion's eye.
  tempted, immured,
  tempt liberty procured.

  '"How mighty are, O hear tell!
  broken bosoms belong
  emptied fountains well,
  mine pour ocean among.
  strong o'er them, o'er strong,
  victory congest,
  compound love physic cold breast.

  '"My parts pow'r charm sacred nun,
  Who, disciplined, ay, dieted grace,
  Believed eyes t'assail begun,
  vows consecrations giving place,
  O potential love, vow, bond, space,  
  thee hath sting, knot, confine,
  thou art all, things thine.

  '"When thou impressest, precepts worth
  stale example? thou wilt inflame,
  coldly impediments stand forth,
  wealth, filial fear, law, kindred, fame!
  Love's arms peace, 'gainst rule, 'gainst sense, 'gainst shame.
  sweetens, suff'ring pangs bears,
  aloes forces, shocks fears.

  '"Now hearts mine depend,
  Feeling break, bleeding groans pine,
  supplicant sighs extend,
  leave batt'ry make 'gainst mine,
  Lending soft audience sweet design,
  credent soul strong-bonded oath,
  prefer undertake troth."

  'This said, wat'ry eyes dismount,  
  sights till levelled face;
  cheek river running fount
  brinish current downward flowed apace.
  O, channel stream gave grace!
  glazed crystal gate glowing roses
  flame water hue encloses.

  'O father, hell witchcraft lies
  small orb tear!
  inundation eyes
  rocky heart water wear?
  breast cold warmed here?
  O cleft effect! cold modesty, hot wrath,
  fire chill extincture hath.

  'For lo, passion, art craft,
  resolved reason tears;
  white stole chastity daffed,
  Shook sober guards civil fears;
  appears,  
  melting; drops diff'rence bore:
  poisoned me, mine restore.

  'In plenitude subtle matter,
  Applied cautels, strange forms receives,
  burning blushes weeping water,
  swooning paleness; takes leaves,
  either's aptness, deceives,
  blush speeches rank, weep woes,
  turn white swoon tragic shows;

  'That heart level came
  scape hail all-hurting aim,
  Showing fair nature kind tame;
  And, veiled them, win maim.
  thing sought exclaim;
  burned heart-wished luxury,
  preached pure maid praised cold chastity.

  'Thus garment Grace  
  naked concealed fiend covered,
  th' unexperient gave tempter place,
  Which, cherubin, hovered.
  Who, young simple, lovered?
  Ay me, fell, question make
  sake.

  'O, infected moisture eye,
  O, false fire cheek glowed,
  O, forced thunder heart fly,
  O, sad breath spongy lungs bestowed,
  O, borrowed motion, owed,
  betray fore-betrayed,
  pervert reconciled maid.'

THE END
